column2: Okathui hi amei-amā maleisāmana, kala kathuka chiwui ari arāp tangmangting eina leisai; kala Varewui Manglā china tara̱tungli zatung-zatvā sai.
Kala Varena hānga, “Kahor leiranu”; chieina kahor leihaowa.
Kala kahor chi phāhaira da Varena thei; kala Varena kahor chi tangkhamangwui eina ngatei ngasaka.
Varena kahor chili Ngashun, kala tangkhamang chili Ngayā da hoi. Chithang ngazin eina ngathor chi kharethangna.
Kala Varena khamasaiwui azingli khalei tara̱ eina khamasaiwui atungli khalei tara̱ chi ngatei ngasaka. Kala chi tākam eina shoka.
Varena khamasai chili Kazingram hoi. Chithang ngazin eina ngathor chi kakhanethangna.
Kala Varena hānga, “Kazingli khalei tara̱ chi apam akhali kazipkha sāhaida ngalei katheng leiranu.” Kala chi tākam eina shoka.
Katheng chili Varena Ngalei hoi, kala tara̱ kazipkha sākahai chili Shamadru hoi. Kala chi phāhaira da Varena thei.
Kala Varena, “Ngaleina akhār khārda thingnā-ra̱hā, athā kazang arongyurbing, kala atheirong yurna kachichāwui ayur athishurda athā kazanga athei matheiranu” da hānga. Kala chi tākam eina shoka.
Ngaleili thingnā-ra̱hā kachungkha shoka, arong ayur ngatateida athā zangsera, kala thingrongbingna athei matheida ayur ayurwui athishurda athā zangsera. Kala chi Varena phāhaira da thei.
Chithang ngazin eina ngathor chi kakathumathangna.
Varena hānga, “Ngashun eina ngayā ngatei khavai kazingwui khamasaili kahorbing leiranu, kala china atam, zimiksho kala zingkum theikhui khavai sāranu,
kala okathuili horkhavai kazingramwui khamasaili kahor leiranu.” Kala chi tākam eina shoka.
Varena kahor kahakva̱ khani sai, hakkhamei kahor china ngashun mungkhavai, teokhamei kahor china ngayā mungkhavai; kala ana sirā kachungkhala sākhui.
Kala okathuili horkhavai saikora chi kazingramwui khamasaili Varena haimi,
china ngashun eina ngayā mungkhavai, kala kahor eina tangkhamang ngatei ngasak khavaina. Kala chi Varena phāhaira da thei.
Chithang ngazin eina ngathor chi khamatethangna.
Kala Varena hānga, “Tara̱wui eina manglākapai kachungkha shokranu, kala okathuili vānaobingna kazingramwui khamasaili yongzatranu.”
Chithāda sāda Varena shamadrulungli hakkhamahā sāyur kala tara̱lungli ngarikazata kharingyur kachiva̱, kala angachāng kakā vānaoyur kachiva̱ sākhui. Kala chi Varena phāhaira da thei.
Kala Varena athumli somida hānga, “Athei matheilu kala mataisanglu kala shamadruwui tara̱lungli chipemlu, kala okathuili vānao mayāsangranu.”
Chithang ngazin eina ngathor chi kaphangā thangna.
Varena hānga, “Ngaleiwui eina manglākapaiyur kachiva̱: sha̱kei, ngarikazata yur, kala sāyur shokranu.” Kala chi tākam eina shoka.
Kala Varena sāyur ayāyāva̱, sha̱kei ayur ngatateida kala ngaleili ngarikazata ayur ngatateida shokngasaka. Kala chi phāhaira da Varena thei.
Chithāda Varena awui sakrin khuida mi sākhui, Varewui sakrin khuida mayarnao sākhui; mayarnao eina sha̱nao chi sākhui.

Kala Varena anili somida hānga, “Athei matheilu kala mayāsanglu, okathui chipemlu kala khamunga sālu; shamadruwui khaih, kazingwui vānao, kala ngaleitungli ngawokazat manglākapai kachiva̱wuitungli munglu.”
Varena hānga, “Yanglu, okathui apam huptali khalei athā kapanga akhar katonga, kala atheili athā kazanga atheirong kachiva̱ ina khamina; naniwui vang kashakazā ngasāra.

Kala okathuili khalei sāyur saikora, kazingwui vānaoyur saikora kala ngaleitungli ngarikazata, kala khaksuida kharinga yur kachiva̱li, khamateka thingnā-ra̱hā kachiva̱ kashakazā sākhavai ina mihaira.” Kala chi tākam eina shoka.
Kala Varena sākahai saikora chi yanglaga phālakhaira da ana thei. Chithang ngazin eina ngathor chi katharuka thangna.
Chithāda sāda kazingram eina okathui kala chiwui alungli khalei aning-anang saikora sākuphaowa.
Kala kashinethang Varena ana sāda khalei saikora kupserhaowa, kala kashinethang chi ngasāmkhui.
Chieina Varena kashinethang chi somida tharngasaka, kaja Varena sākahai saikora kuphaida chithang ngasāmkhui.
Kazing eina ngalei kasā tharanwui thotbing chi hina.
ngaleitungli akhar maleisāmana, kala luiwui thingnā-ra̱hābing makhārshokrangsai kaja
kha ngaleiwui eina leijui ngapānkālaga okathui katongali tara̱ chaimi —
Kala
Kala ngaleiwui eina mik khangayama kala kashakazā sākapai thingrong ayur ayāyāva̱ phorngasaka. Yāmgui chiwui alungthungli kharingawui thingrong kala kashi-kaphā kathei thingrongla phorngasaka.
Yāmgui chili tara̱ chaimi khavai Edenwui eina kong akha longshoka, kala chiwui eina ngayarkhaida kong mati ngasāhaowa.
Khare chiwui aming Pishon hoi; sinā khaleipam Havilah ngaleili kuimareida khalonga kong china;
chiwui sinā mathālaka; bdellium kala onyxla samphanga.
Kakhane kong chiwui aming Gihon hoi; Cush ngalei kuimareida khalong kong china.
Kala Assyriawui zingshoshong khalonga Tigris kong china kakathumana. Kala khamate chi Euphratesna.
Kala
kha kashi-kaphā theithangmei khavai thingrongwui athei chi mashaipaimara, kaja chi shaithang na thira.”
Chiwui thili
Chieina
Mi china sha̱kei yur saikora, kala kazingramwui vānaobing, kala khararwui sāyurbing saikorali aming phokmi, kha awui vanga ali ngachonmishapa kachā akhala masamphangmana.
Chieina
kala
Chieina mi china hānga,
“Ara hi iwui ara̱kuiwui ara̱kuina,
kala iwui asāwui asāna;
ali Sha̱nao hora,
kaja ali Mayarnaowui eina khuishokkakhuina.”
Kala ala apreiva̱la, khanini asāmsai eina leisai, kha makhayakmana.
Chieina sha̱nao china phara̱ chili hānga, “Inina yāmgui chiwui thingrongbingwui athei chi shaipaiserra;
kha Varena hānga, ‘Yāmguiwui alungthungli khalei thingrong chiwui athei mashaipaimara, kasing eina tangda masingza̱paimara, singza̱akha thira ji.’”
Kha phara̱ china sha̱nao chili hānga, “Nani mathimara.
Varena thei kaja, nanina hi shaikhaleoda naniwui mik rakhaora; kala kashi-kaphā theida Vare thāhaora.”

Chieina sha̱nao china thingrong chi kashakazāwui vang mathai da kathei eina, kala mikli ngayam ngasak kahai eina kala thingrong china thangmei ngasaka jihaoda, ana chiwui athei chi khuida shai; kala agaharalila kateokha mi, kala ana shai.
Chieina aniwui mik rakhaowa, kala ani asāmsai eina lei kaji theihaowa; chieina anina khaorātheinā khopkazemkhuilaga ngavai khavai sākhui.
Zingyinlam
Kha
Ana ngahānkai, “Yāmguilungli ina nawui akhon shai, kha I khamahong eina leikahaiwui vang ngacheehaida ngathum kahaina.”
Ana hānga, “Na khamahong eina leili da khipāna hāngkhala? Ina nali mashaialu kaji thingrong chiwui athei shaihaola?”
Mi china ngahānkai, “Nana iwui vang khami sha̱nao china arong chiwui athei chi mida ina shaihaowa.”
Chieina
Varena phara̱ chili hānga,
“Nana hithāda kasāwui vang,
sha̱keiwui ngachaili kala
ramsā saikorawui ngachaili nali khonshi kahaina;
nawuk eina ngamenzatra,
kala nawui mirin peichaoda ngalei zālaga okthuira.
Ina sha̱nao naniwui ngachaili kala nawui athei eina awui atheiwui ngachaili yangshi khangarok leingasakra;
ana nakui naikhaira,
kala nana aphei maja̱li makeira.”
Sha̱nao chili ana hānga,
“Ina nali nao khavaiwui kachotkachāng haklak eina mataisangmira,
chotchānglak eina nana nao pharākhuira,
chithālala nana nagaharali ningchāngchingra,
kala ana nawuitungli mungra.”
“Nana napreiva̱wui tui khanganāwui vang,
kala ina nali ‘Chi mashaialu’
da kaso kahai thingthei chi kashaiwui vang ngalei hi nawui vang eina khonkashi ngasāhaira;
nawui mirin peida chotlak eina ot sāda phāshak phazāra,
ka̱shāt, kuivā nawui vang shokra;
kala luili kashok thingnā-ra̱hā eina na ringra.
Nana ngaleili malatvāranglakha eina tangda shairanra̱ shokta phazāra;
kaja nali ngalei eina sākakhuina;
na chifana, kala chifa ngasāluira.”
Mi china apreiva̱li Eve hoi, kaja ana kharing saikorawui ava̱va̱na.
Kala
chiwui vang eina

Ana mi chili kashamshokhaowa; kala kharingwui thingrong shongfa chi mayon khavai Eden yāmguiwui zingshoshong cherubim kala achikun peida nganingung nganingkhavā meiwon kashoka raighai akha da haihaowa.
Adamna apreiva̱ Eveli khangaso eina nao vaida Cainli pharai; kala hithāda hānga, “
Chiwui thili preiva̱ china agato Abelli pharai. Abelna yaokahom ot sai, kala Cainna luikhavā ot sai.
Atamwui athishurda Cainna awui luili kashok theishirai
kala Abelna yaoshangwui anao pharākhare kala asākakā yaonaothao chigata. Kala
kha Cain eina awui kachigat ana makhuisangmimana. Chiwui vang Cain malungvātlakhaowa, kala ning khāsuthaowa.
na Cainli hānga, “Na khisāda malungvātta ningkhāsuthaokhala?
Nana mathāda saakha nalila makhuimimarala, nana mathāda masaakha moreina khāmongli rimdalei; kala nali ningkachāngna, nana chili yuikhavai sāphalungra.”
Chieina
Chieina
Ara napāng eina tāngasak kahai nagatowui ashee, khamor makālaga zimkhui kahaiya ngalei chiwui eina nali khonshihaira.
Nana lui vālala theishirai mathāda mashokluimara; okathuili na ara ramsom makhavaiya yāmkazata mi ngasāra.”
Cainna
Yanglu, aja nana ili apam hiwui eina kashamhaira; kala nawui eina ngathummihaora; ara I okathuili ramsom makhavaia, yāmkazata mi ngasāhaoda kathatheina ili shaothathaora.”
Chieina
Chiwui thili Cainna
Cainna apreiva̱li khangaso eina Enochli pharai, kala ana keinung akha semkāda anao mayarawui ming khuida keinung chi Enoch phoka.
Enochwui naoli Irad hoi; Iradna Me-huja-elli pharai; kala Me-huja-elna Me-thusha-elli, Me-thusha-elna Lamechli pharai.
Lamech ngalā khani ngashira, akhali Adah, kala akhapāva̱li Zillah hoi.
Adahna Jaballi pharai; ana kachonshimli pamda sei kakeibingwui avāva̱na.
Agatoli Jubal hoi; sipa̱, tingteilā kala pipe kasingabing chiwui avāva̱na.
Zillahna Tubal-cainli pharai; ana pithrai eina mariwui akap kasembingwui avāva̱na. Tubal-cainwui azarva̱li Naamah hoi.
Lamechna awui preiva̱ khaninili hānga:
“Adah eina Zillah, iwui kahāng nganālu;
Lamechwui preiva̱ khani,
Ina kahāng khuisanglu:
yaronnao akhana ili shaoda khamā za̱khamiwui vang,
ina ali shaothathaira.
Cainli shini shida athut khuiakha,
kachangkhat eina Lamechli hangshinida
shini shida khuira.”
Adamna apreiva̱li ngasoluishitta mayarnao akha pharai, kala aming Seth hoi, kaja apreiva̱na hānga, “Abelli Cainna shaothathaoda awui mahut Varena ili nao khangatei akha mihaira.”
Sethla mayarnao akha pharai, kala aming Enosh hoi. Atam chiwui eina thuida mina
Mayarnao eina sha̱nao ana sākhui, kala sākhuilaga somida aming Mi da hoi.
Adamna zingkum shākha thumrā okthuihailaga awui azak tākam kahai, ali khangamāna mayarnao akha pharākhui kala aming Seth hoi.
Seth pharā kahaiwui thili zingkum shāchishat ringvāda khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Adamna zingkum shāchiko thumrā okthuilaga thihaowa.
Sethna zingkum shākha phangā kākashung eina Enoshli pharai.
Enoshli pharā kahaiwui thili zingkum shāchishat apā shini ringvāda khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Sethna zingkum shāchiko tharāda khani okthuilaga thihaowa.
Enoshna zingkum hangchiko kākashung eina Kenanli pharai.
Kenanli pharāhailaga kum shāchishat tharāda phangā okthuivāda khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Enoshna kum shāchiko apa phangā okthuilaga thihaowa.
Kenanna kum hangshini kākashung eina Ma-halalelli pharai.
Ma-halalelli pharāhailaga Kenan kum shāchishat hangmati okthuivāda nao khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Kenanna kum shāchiko apā tharā okthuilaga thihaowa.
Maha-lalelna kum hangtharukta phangā kakā eina Jaredli pharai.
Jaredli pharāhailaga Ma-halalelna kum shāchishat thumrā okthuivāda nao khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Ma-halalelna kum shāchishat hangchikoda phangā okthuilaga thihaowa.
Jaredna kum shākha hangtharukta khani kākashung eina Enochli pharai.
Enoch pharāhailaga Jaredna kum shāchishat okthuivāda nao khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Jaredna kum shāchiko hangtharukta khani okthuilaga thihaowa.
Enochna kum hangtharukta phangā kākashung eina Methuselahli pharai.
Methuselah pharāhailaga Enochna Vareli ngavaplak eina kum shākathum okthuivāda khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Enochna kum shākathum hangtharukta phangā okthui.
Enoch Vareli ngavapta okthuisai, chiwui thili a maleithuwa; kaja Varena ali khuithuihaowa.
Mathuselahna kum shākha hangchishatta shini kākashung eina Lamechli pharai.
Lamechli pharāhailaga kum shāshini hangchishatta khani okthuivāda nao khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Mathuselahna kum shāchiko hangtharukta chiko okthuilaga thihaowa.
Lamechna kum shākha hangchishatta khani kākashung eina mayarnao akha pharai,
kala naowui aming Noah phokmida hānga, “
Noahli pharāhailaga Lamech kum shāphangā hangchikoda phangā okthuivāda nao khangatei mayarnaola sha̱naola pharai.
Chithāda sāda Lamechna kum shāshini hangshinida shini okthuilaga thihaowa.
Noah kum shāphangā kākashung eina Shem, Ham, kala Japhet athumli pharai.
Varewui naomayara ngarāna miwui naongalāva̱ ngarāwui khamathā chi theilaga; athumna kapangkakhui chi khalattawui preiva̱ sāda ngakuma.
Chieina

Atam chitharān Nephilimbing okathuili pānsai, kala Varewui naomayara ngarāna mibingwui naongalāva̱ ngarāli ngakumda nao kachungkha pharā kahaiwui thilila leisai. Achālakha aming kazata kala kapanga mi chi athumna.
Kala okathuili mikumo semhaikasāwui vang
Chieina
Kha
Noahwui naothot hithai. Noah khamashunga mina, awui thotli shātmakakā mina; Noahna Vareli ngavaplak eina okthui.
Noahwui nao Shem, Ham kala Japheth hoda kathum leisai.
Chitharān okathui hi Varewui mangāli khamakhao mirin kala khangama̱ khangazaina pemsai.
Varena okathui hi theilaga, yanglu, makhaolak eina thei; kaja phasā khavai athum saikora kachichāwui ningkachāng athishurda zatsai.

Chieina Varena Noahli hānga, “Phasā khavai saikora shimān khavai ina machukhaira; kaja athumwui eina okathui hi khangama̱ khangazaina pemtinghaira; yanglu, okathui eina ngasoda athumli ina shimān ngasakra.
Gopher thing eina nakhalatta marikhong akha sākhuilu; alungli kā khailu, kala khe eina alung ayār saphinlu.
Chi hithāda sāki kajina: marikhong chiwui asān khuining shākathumra, aretna khuining hangphangā, kala kajuina khuining thumra jira.
Marikhong chiwui akhum sāsanglu, kala chi khuining akha juimeida kāfalu, kala arāpli khāmong wutlu; nemkhamei mathāng kakhane, kala kakathuma sāsangra.
Kaja yanglu, ina okathuili tara̱ phongshilongra, kazingramwui azingli khalei khak-kasuia yur saikora shimān ngasakra; okathuili khalei saikora thiserra.
Kha ina nali tuingashit akha sāra, na, napreiva̱, nanaomayara ngarā kala athumwui preiva̱ngarā nali ngasoda marikhongli zangserra.
Asā vaida kharingyur kachiva̱ nali ngasoda ringkhavai, ayur kachiva̱wui khanini, chiya avā akha, ava̱ akha da marikhongli zangngasaklu.
Vānaola ayur-ayā athishurda, kala sāyurla ayur-ayā athishurda kala ngaleili ngawokazat kachiva̱ ayur peida, khanini nali ngasoda ringkhavai zangngasaklu.
Kala kashakazā sakapai yur saikorala khuiphunglu kala kazipkhuilu; kaja chi nathumwui vangla kala athumwui vangla kashakazā sāra.”
Varena kakaso athishurda Noahna sāsera.
Chiwui thili
Kathara sāyurwui eina avā eina ava̱ ngawor shinini khuiphunglu, kala makathara sāyurwui avā eina ava̱ ngaworkharip khuilu;
kala kazingli yongkazat vānaola avā eina ava̱ ngawor shinini khuilu, hi okathuili athumwui athei mashimān khavaina.
Kaja shinithangwui thili ina okathuili ngashun ngayā hangmatithang kazing rongasakra; kala ina sākahai kharing yur kachiva̱ okathuiwui eina shimān ngasakra.”
Kala
Okathuili tara̱ kaphong tharān Noahwui zingkum shātharuk kāhairasai.
Kala tara̱ kaphongwui eina yāmshok khavai Noah, apreiva̱, anaomayara ngarā kala athumwui preiva̱ ngarāla marikhongli zangserhaowa.
Kathara sāyur, makathara sāyur, vānaoyur kala ngaleitungli ngarik kazat yur saikora,
avā eina ava̱, ngawowor eina Noahli ngasoda, Varewui kakaso athishurda marikhongli zangserhaowa.
Kala kashinethangwui thili okathuili tara̱ phonghaowa.
Ngashun hangmati ngayā hangmati okathuili kazing rothai.
Chithang Noah kala awui naomayara ngarā Shem, Ham, Japheth kala apreiva̱ eina naongarāwui preiva̱ kathum, athumli ngasoda,
athum kala sāyur kachiva̱, sha̱keiyur kachiva̱, ngarikazata yur, vānaoyurla peida marikhongli zangsera.
Noahli ngasoda kharing khaksui suida khalei saikora ngawowor eina marikhongli zangserhaowa.
Varena kakaso athishurda phasā khavai yur saikorawui avā eina ava̱ kātong kahai eina
Zimiksho hangmatithang zingchā machatlakmada tara̱ chungkhangai chungkāda marikhong chi ngaphongkāhaowa, kala kajuiva̱ ngaphongkāhaowa.
Okathuili tara̱ kaphong chi markhangai marda marikhong chi tara̱tungli ngaphongkāhaowa.
Tara̱ chi hakmahānāhaida kazingramwui azingli khalei kajujuiya kaphung saikora ngaphumserhaowa;
tara̱na phungreitungli pemkāda khuining tharāda phangā tumhaowa.
Okathuili phasā khavai yur vānao, sha̱kei, ramsā, okathuili asum asum eina paikazata kala mi saikora thihaowa;
ngalei kathengtungli khalei nātāngkhurli khaksui kasuia kachiva̱ thiserhaowa.
Ngaleitungli khalei kharingyur kachiva̱, mi, sāyur, kala ngarikazata yur, kazingramli yongkazata saikora okathuiwui eina shimānhaowa. Noah eina ali ngasokasābingmāng taishoka.
Kala okathuili zimiksho shākha hangphangāthang tara̱ phonga.
Kha Varena marikhonglungli khalei Noah, kala sha̱kei eina sāyur saikorali phaningunga. Kala Varena okathuili masi phanngasakta tara̱ thengmamanhaowa.
Kathuka ura̱la kala kazingramwui charfala saphinmihaida kazing maro ngasakthuwa,
kala okathuili tara̱ ngahap mamānhaowa. Zimiksho shākha hangphangāthangwui thili tara̱ ngasunhaowa;
kachāng kashinewui zimiksho tharāda kashinethang marikhong chi Ararat phungreili tāngasāma.
Kachāng tharā makāshungranglakha eina tangda tara̱ ngahapmamānda kachāng katharāwui zimiksho kharethang phungreitonbing theiphokhaowa.
Zimiksho hangmati thangwui thili Noahna ana sāsang kahai charfa chi shoyanga,
kala hangkhāyur akha chihoi; kala vānao china okathuitungli tara̱ mathengranglakha eina tangda yongung yongvai.
Chiwui thili tara̱ katheng makatheng yangkhavai nāsha̱ akha chihoi;
kha nāsha̱ chi pa̱khavaipam maleithuda marikhong chili latungrāsai; kaja ngaleitungli tara̱ mathengchaorangsai. Chieina apāng tāngshokta vānao chi khuilaga marikhonglungli sangluihaowa.
Ana shinithang ngarailaga nāsha̱ chi chiholuishita;
kala nāsha̱ china chithang ngazin ali hanunga, kala yanglu, nganaozaonao eina olivenā akha khamorli ngatamsai; chieina tara̱ thenghaira da Noahna theihaowa.
Chiwui thili ana shinithang shānglaga nāsha̱ chi chiholuishita; kha malatungluithuwa.

Noahwui zingkum shātharuk apā akhawui kachāng khare kala zimiksho kharethang ngaleitungli tara̱ thengchenghaowa; kala Noahna marikhongwui akhum khuishokhailaga yanga, kala yanglu, ngaleitung thenghairasai.
Kachāng kakhanewui zimiksho maga̱da kashinethang ngalei thenghaowa.
Chieina Varena Noahli hānga,
“Na, napreiva̱, nanaomayara ngarā kala athumwui preiva̱ ngarā marikhongwui eina tungserlu.
Asā khavai kharing yur, vānaoyur, ngaleitungli ngarikazata yur, nali khangaso saikorala thānshokserlu, chieina okathuili athumna nao kachungkha pharāsangda okathuili athei matheida mayāsangra.”
Chieina Noahna apreiva̱, naomayara ngarā kala athumwui preiva̱ ngarāli ngasoda shoka.
Sāyur kachiva̱, ngarikazat yur kachiva̱, vānaoyur kachiva̱ kala okathuili kharinga yur saikora marikhongwui eina shoksera.
Chieina Noahna
Kala
Okathui leilakha eina tangda khayao eina kahāt, kasik eina kasā, si eina lum, ngashun eina ngayā mangasāmmara.”

Okathuiwui sāyur kachiva̱, khamasaiwui vānaoyur kachiva̱, ngaleili ngarikazat yur kachiva̱ kala tara̱lungli khalei khaihyur kachiva̱ nathumli ngacheera; athum saikora nathumwui pāngli horsangmi kahaina.
Khangatha̱a kharing yur saikora nathumwui kashakazāsera; kala ina nathumli khamateka thingnā-ra̱hā mikahai thāda ot kachiva̱ mihaira.
Kha asāli ashee zangda mashaipaimana, kaja ashee hiya manglāna.
Nathumwui manglā kakhuiapāli ina makahatlakla athut khuira; sāyur kachiva̱la miwui manglā kakhuia chili ina athut khuira, kala achinā akhawui mirinwui vang mi akhawui mirin hāngsangra.
Kachikathāna mi akhali ashee tāngasakakha alila mina ashee tāngasakra, kachiwui vangkhala kaja mi hi Varewui sakrin khuida sākahaina.
Chieina nathum athei matheida khamataila mataisanglu, mayāsangda apam kachiva̱li okthuilu.”
Varena Noah kala anaomayara ngarāli hānga,
“Yanglu, ina nathumli kala naoda rāki kaji ara̱-azāli,
kala nathumli ngasoda khalei kharing yurbing, kaja vānao, sha̱kei, ramsā marikhongwui eina ngasokashokbing saikorali tuingashit akha kasāna.
Iwui tuingashit hina, kaja ara asā khavai saikora tara̱ kaphong eina mathiluilakmara kala okathui shimān khavai tara̱ maphongluilakmara.”
Kala Varena hānga, “I eina nathum kala nathumli ngasoda khalei manglākapai saikorawui alungli iwui tuingashit khudam hi khanaowa mithot eina tangda leira.
Iwui chāngjingawut muiyā tungli haihaira, hina I eina okathui tuingashitwui khudam sāra.
Ina okathuili muiyā ngapān khangasak tharān kala muiyālungli chāngjingawut kachithei tharān,
I eina nathumwui ngachaili, kala manglākapai kachiva̱li iwui tuingashit chi ina phaningungra; kala asā khavai saikorali shimān khavai tara̱ maphongluilakmara.
Muiyālungli chāngjingawut kashok tharān ina chi yanglaga Vare eina okathuili khalei asā khavaibingwui kharinga yur kachiva̱wui ngachaili katang makhavai tuingashit chi ina phaningungra.”
Varena Noahli hānga, “I eina okathuili khalei asā khavai ayur saikorawui ngachaili ina tuingashit sākahaiwui khudam china.”
Marikhong eina kashok Noahwui naobing chiya, Shem, Ham, Japheth athum hina. Hamna Canaanli pharai.
Ashi kathum hi Noahwui nao ngarāna, kala athumwui eina okathui vāshungda mi mayāsanga.
Lui vākhare mi chi Noahna. Ana drakhā yāmgui akha sākhui;
kala chiwui atheira̱ manglaga maliphaida awui kachonshimli khamahong eina pivāhaowa.
Canaanshi avā Hamna avāva̱wui mahonghat kahai chi theilaga kayāngli achinā khanili shokhānga.
Chieina Shem eina Japhethna kachon akha aniwui yārtuili parlaga sa̱na̱zangda avāva̱wui khamasai phasā chili farormi; ani avāva̱wui shong mayangzangmana kala awui khamahong chi matheimana.
Noahna mathingkhaung eina ngakarthuida naopaishowui sākahai chi theida hānga,
“Canaanli khonkashi ngasāranu;
achinā ngarāwui raonaobingwui raonao sāranu.”
Kala ana hāngluishita,
“Shemli iwui
kala Canaanna awui raonao sāranu.
Varena Japhethli mataisang ngasakra,
kala Shemwui kachonshimli pamranu,
kala Canaanna awui raonao sāranu.”
Tara̱ kaphongwui thili Noahna zingkum shākathum hangphangā ringvai.
Chithāda Noahna zingkum shāchiko hangphangā okthuilaga thihaowa.
Hi Noahwui naongarā Shem, Ham, kala Japhethwui naotunbing chi hithai; ra̱phongwui thili athumwui nao mayarnao kachungkha pharai.
Japhethwui naotunbing: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech kala Tiras.
Gomerwui naotunbing; Ashkenaz, Riphath kala Togarmah.
Javanwui naotunbing: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, kala Dodanim.
Ngayipheili kasombing chi athumwui eina khangayaona. Japhethwui naomayara ngarā, athum kachichāwui ngaleili, kachichā shimkhurna yur sāda kachichāwui tuiyur matui.
Hamwui naotunbing: Cush, Egypt, Put kala Canaan.
Cushwui naotunbing: Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah kala Sabteca. Ramahwui naotunbing: Sheba eina Dedan.
Cushna Nimrodli pharai; kala ana okathuili kapanga miwui ngachaili kharena.
wui miktāli kapanga sā rengkathei akhana, chieina “
Awui awunga ngalei haokaphok chi Babel, Erech, kala Accad hibing hina, saikora hi Shinar ngaleili lei.
Ngalei chiwui eina ana Assyriali vālaga Nineveh, Rehoboth-Ir, Calah, kala
Nineveh eina Calahwui ngachaili khalei Resen kaho kahaka keinung chi asākai.
Egyptna Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naph-tuhim,
Pathrusim, Casluhim (awui eina Philistinenaobing shoka), kala Caphtorimwui avāva̱na.
Canaan hina pharākhare Sidonwui avāva̱na, chiwui thili Hethli pharai,
kala Jebusbing, Amorbing, Girgashbing,
Hivbing, Arkbing, Sinbing,
Arvadbing, Zemarbing kala Hamatshina. Chiwui thili Canaanwui shimkhurbing apam kachida ngayaovai.
Kala Canaannaobingwui ram Gerarwui Sidon eina thuilaga Gaza vāshung kala Sodomshong Gomorrah, Admah, kala Zeboiim, Lasha eina tangda vāshunga.
Hi Hamwui naomayara ngarā, shimkhurbing, athumwui tuibing, kala athumwui ngaleibing kala athumwui miyurbingna.
Shem, Japhethwui ama, Eberwui naongarāwui avāva̱la nao kachungkha pharai.
Shemwui naomayara ngarā: Elam, Asshur, Arpachshad, Lud kala Aram.
Aramwui naomayara ngarā: Uz, Hul, Gether kala Mash.
Arpachshadna Shelahli pharai; kala Shelahna Eberli pharai.
Eberna mayarnao khani pharai; akhawui ming Peleg hoi, kaja awui atamli okathui hi ngayarkhaihaowa, kala achināwui aming Joktan hoi.
Joktanna Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Obal, Abima-el, Sheba,
Ophir Havilah, kala Jobab athumli pharai; saikora hi Joktanwui naosera.
Athumna kapāna ram Shepharshong Mesha eina thuilaga zimikshoshongwui phungrei hupta vāshunga.
Hi Shemwui naomayara ngarā, shimkhurbing, athumwui tuibing, athumwui ngaleibing kala athum miyurbingna.
Hi Noahwui naomayara ngarāwui shimkhursera, athumwui mithot kala miyur athishurda, kala hiwui eina thuida okathuili miyur ngayaovāser kajina.
Chitharān okathui katonga tuiyur akhamāngsai, tuikhurla machungmana.
Kala zimikshoshong athumna khavā tharan Shinar ngaleili tampāk akha leisāda chili asoma.
Kala athum akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta hānga, “Ralu, ithum chek semlaga rikkazakkhuisa.” Chithāda sāda ngalungwui vang chek kala nāpkhavaiwui vang khe shichina.

Chiwui thili athumna hānga, “Raserlu, ithum keinung akha sākhuisa, kala dolanshim kajuiva̱ akhala aton kazingramli kazokta sākhuisa, kaja ithumwui ming zatkhavai sāsa, chi maningakha ithum okathui apam katongali chaiyānghaora.”
na mibingwui naomayarabingna sākahai keinung eina dolanshim chi yangkhavai tai.
Kala
Ralu, ithumna tālaga athumwui tui pa̱ngapāmihaosa; akhana akhawui tui mashaaranu.”
Chithāda sāda
Chiwui vang eina apam chiwui aming Babel hoi, kaja apam chili
Hi Shemwui naotunbingna. Ana kum shākha kākashung eina Arpachshadli pharai, hi tara̱ phongda kum khaniwui thilina;
Shemna Arpakshadli pharā kahaiwui thili kum shāphangā ringvāda sha̱nao mayarnao khangateila pharai.
Arpachshadna kum thumrāda phangā kākashung eina Shelahli pharai;
Arpachshadna Shelahli pharā kahaiwui thili kum shāmati apā kathum ringvāda sha̱nao mayarnao khangateila pharai.
Shelahna kum thumrā kākashung eina Eberli pharai;
Shelahna Eberli pharākakhuiwui thili kum shāmati apā kathum ringvāda mayarnao sha̱nao khangateila pharai.
Eberna kum thumrāda mati kākashung eina Pelegli pharai;
kala Eberna Pelegli kapharāwui thili kum shāmati thumra ringvāda khangatei mayarnao sha̱nao khangateila pharai.
Pelegna kum thumrā kākashung eina Reuli pharai;
Pelegna Reuli pharā kahaiwui thili kum shākhani apā chiko ringvāda mayarnao sha̱nao khangateila pharai.
Reuna kum thumrāda khani kākashung eina Serugli pharai;
Reuna Serugli pharā kahaiwui thili kum shākhani apā shini ringvāda mayarnao sha̱nao khangateila pharai.
Serugna kum thumrā kākashung eina Nahorli pharai;
Serugna Nahorli pharā kahaiwui thili kum shākhani ringvālaga mayarnao sha̱nao khangateila pharai.
Nahorna kum maga̱da chiko kākashung eina Terahli pharai;
Nahorna Terahli pharā kahaiwui thili kum shākha tharāda chiko ringvāda mayarnao sha̱nao khangateila pharai.
Terahna kum hangshini kākashung eina Abram, Nahor kala Haranli pharai.
Hibing hi Terahwui naotunbingna. Terahna Abram, Nahor kala Haranli pharai; Haranna Lotli pharai;
Chaldea ngaleiwui Ur kaho kha̱, ali pharā khavaipamli avāva̱ Terah mathiranglakha Haran thihaowa.
Kala Abram eina Nahorla ngalā khui; Abram preiva̱li Sarai, kala Nahor preiva̱li Milcah hoi; Milcah eina Iscahli Haranna pharai.
Kala Sarai naoshuma; nao maleimana.

Terahna anaomayara Abram, Haranwui naomayara, awui ara̱ Lot, kala anaomayara Abramwui preiva̱ arihāva̱ Saraili ngasoda Chaldeawui ngalei Urwui eina Canaanli vākhavai zata, kha athumna Haranli vākashung chitharān chili asomhaowa.
Terahna kum shākhani apā phangā kākashung eina Haranli thihaowa.
Kala ina nali kahaka yur akha sāngasakta nali sokhamila somira, nawui ming reingasakta, somi kahaia mi akha sāngasakra.
nali khonkashe chili inala khonshira
kala okathui shimkhur hupta nawui mangā eina sokhami ngasāra.
Chieina
Abramna apreiva̱ Sarai, agatowui naomayara Lot, kala athumna kazipsang kahai lan kala Haranli samkaphang mibingla zangserda Canaanli vākhavai zata. Athumna Canaan ngaleili vākashung eina,
Abramna Sechem kaho apamli khalei Morehwui shirimthingpam chili kānvai. Atam chitharān Canaannaobingna ngalei chili pamsai.
Chitharān
Chiwui thili Bethelwui zingshoshong khalei phungreishong vāda awui kachonshim vākhaningkai; chiwui zingtunshong Bethel, kala zingshoshong Ai lei; kala ana chili
Chiwui thili Abramna Negebshong tāmamāna.
Ana Egyptli tāshungnanai, ana apreiva̱ Saraili hānga, “Na ngalā khamathāva̱na kaji ina thei;
Egyptnaobingna nali kathei eina ‘Hi apreiva̱na’ jihenra; chieina athumna ili sāthathenra, kha nali ringngasakra.
Chiwui vang eina izarva̱na jihaolu, chithakha nawui mangā eina I kalā mashimara, kala nawui mangā eina imanglā kharing samphangra.”
Abramna Egypt tākashung tharan aramnaobingna sha̱naopava̱ chi mathāshuna da thei.
Kala Pharaohwui wungnaobingna theilaga, awui azak khamathā chi Pharaohli unghānga. Chieina sha̱naopava̱ chili Pharaohwui dolanli thānvāhaowa.
Kala awui mangā eina ana Abramli lumlak eina sai, kala Abramna awui eina yao mukkā, gadhā avā, rao sha̱nao mayarnao, gadhā ava̱ kala ut kachungkha samphanga.
Kha Abram preiva̱ Saraiwui vang eina
Chi theilaga Pharaohna Abramli hokhuida hānga, “Nana ili khi kasākhala, napreiva̱na da ili khisāda mahāngmakhala?
Khisāda ‘A izarva̱na’ da hāngkhala, nazarva̱na kajiwui vang ina ipreiva̱ sākhavai kakhui maningmala? Ara napreiva̱li khuilaga thuiulu.”
Kala Pharaohna awui apongli awui mibingli kakaso athishurda, athumna apreiva̱ eina awui khalalei saikora khuiphungda thuihaowa.
Chieina Abramna apreiva̱, kala awui khalalei saikora, kala Lot zangda Egyptwui eina Negebshong latshanga.
Abram sha̱keila, lupāsāla, sinala shānglak eina leisai.
Negebwui eina zatlaga Bethel eina Aiwui ngachaili khare kachāng shimnao sakahaipam Bethel mashangshungranglakha eina tangda zatlaga apam chili shangkashung eina,
ana khareli hanphut sahaikasā apam chili Abramna
Kala Abramli ngasokazata Lotla awui yao eina sha̱kei kala kachonshim leisai,
chieina ani pamkharum hi ngalei chiwui eina samkaphang china mashapthuwa; kaja aniwui sha̱kei, lan chungnāhaida mangasopampaithuwa,
kala Abram eina Lotwui sei kahombing kharar ngarokhaowa. Atam chitharān ngalei chili Canaannaobing eina Periznaobing pamsai.
Chieina Abramna Lotli hānga, “Iniwui ngachaili kala iniwui sei kahomnaowui ngachaili makharar ngarokaranu, kaja ini shimkhur akhana.
Lam katonga hi nawui mangāli khalei maningmala? Iwui eina na ngateithuiulu. Nana uishong khuiga jiakha ina yāshong vāra; nana yāshong khuiga jiakha ina uishong vāra.”
Chieina Lotna ngashānyanglaga Jordan tampāk chi
Chieina Lotna Jordan tampāk saikora kapangkhuiya, kala Lotna zingshoshong vāhaowa; chithāda sāda ani ngapākhaowa.
Abramna Canaanli soma, kala Lotna tampākwui keinung ngachaili pamda Sodom vāshungda awui kachonshim khaningkai.
Chitharān Sodomwui mibing hi makaphā makhayā
Lotna pākthui kahaiwui thili
kaja nana kathei ram saikora hi ina nali kala nawui naotunbingli katang mavaila mira.
Nawui ara̱-azā okathuiwui chifayākha ngasā ngasakra; chieina mina chifa shānkhuishapakha nawui ara̱-azāla shānkhuishapra.
Ngakarthuida ngalei chiwui asān-aret peida zatlu, ina hi nali mira.”
Chieina Abramna awui kachonshim khuiphungda zatlaga Hebronli khalei Mamrewui shirimthing ngalemli asoma; kala chili ana
Shinarwui awunga Amraphel, Ellasarwui awunga Arioch, Elamwui awunga Ched-or-laomer kala Goiimwui awunga Tidal, athumwui thotli,
athumna Sodomwui awunga Birsha, Admahwui awunga Shinab, Zeboiimwui awunga Shemeber kala Bela (kaja Zoar)wui awunga athumli rai ngarara.
Athum saikorawui khangaruma raimi, Siddim Leiwuk (chiya, Salt Sea) li vākazipsera.
Zingkum tharāda khani athumna Ched-or-laomerwui azingli pamsai, kha tharāda kakathuma kum ali rai sāphokhaowa.
Tharada khamate kum Ched-or-laomerna kala awui ngasotnao wungnaobingli thānda Ashteroth-karnaimli khalei Rephaimnaoli, Hamli khalei Zuzimnaoli, Shaveh-kiriathaimli khalei,
kala El-paran lamhāngwui amarei vāshungda khalei Seir Kaphungwui Horbingli rai yuihaowa;
chiwui thili athumna hanungda Enmishpat (chiya, Kadesh), kala Amalekbingwui ngalei saikora, kala Hazazon-tamarli khalei Amorbinglila yuiserhaowa.
Chiwui thili Sodomwui awunga, Gomorrahwui awunga, Admahwui awunga, Zeboiimwui awunga, kala Bela, (chiya, Zoar)wui awunga athum phangā ngarumda Siddimwui tampākli,
Elemwui awunga Ched-or-laomer, Goiimwui awunga Tidal, Shinarwui awunga Amraphel, kala Ellasarwui awunga Arioch athum matili rai sai.
Chitharān Siddimwui Tampāk hiya bitumen khewui chomna pemsai. Chieina Sodom eina Gomorrahwui awunga khani china khayām chitharān mi kaikha chili tāzanghaowa; kataibing chiya phungreili yāmkāhaowa.
Chithāda yangkashibingna Sodom eina Gomorrahwui ot saikora ngaponkhuida unghaowa;
Abramwui agatowui naomayara Lotla chili pamsāhaoda awui lan eina ngasoda ali khuithuirumhaowa.
Mi akha yāmshokta Hebrewpā Abramli pao unghānga, ana Eshcol eina Anerwui achinā Amorwui Mamrewui shirimthing ngalemli pamsai, athum hi Abramli khavak sāda leisai.
Abramna awui theisāli tukthuihaira da kashā eina awui shimkhurli pharākasang ana tamchitheikazak kahai mi shākathum tharāda chishat thānlaga Dan shangshungda kharomvai.
Kala ana ngayāshong awui raimibing ngayarlaga, a eina awui raobingna kasham-khayānglaga Damascuswui atungshong khalei Hobahli kharomshanga.
Chithāda awui theisā Lot, awui lan, sha̱naobing kala mi saikorala akhuiluishita.
Kala Salemwui awunga Reikhamataia Varewui pāngmon Melchizedekna khamui eina drakhāra̱ khuivāngaroka;
kala ana somida hānga,
“Kazing ngalei kasā Juikhamataia Varena
Abramli somiranu;
kala nali yangkasheli nawui pāngli sangkhame Juikhamataia Vare chili sochikatranu!”
Kala Abramna ot kachiva̱ khum tharāwui akha chi ali mi.
Kala Sodomwui awungana Abramli hānga, “Mibing hiya ili milu, kha otbing chiya na jihaolu.”
Kha Abramna Sodomwui awungali hānga, “Reimeikap kaje kazingram eina okathui kasāa
kaja kazaira̱nao akha eina tangda kala pheihop khara̱nao eina tangda, nawui ot akhala makhuimara, kaja nana ‘Abramli ina shāngkhangasakna’ jipaishina.
I khikha makhuimara, kha iwui mibingna zākahai kala ili khangasobingwui yar milu; Aner, Eshcol, kala Mamre athumna athumwui yar khuiranu.”
Hiwui thili Abramli
Kha Abramna hānga, “O
Abramna hānga, “Yanglu, nana ili naothei mamimana; kala iwui shimli pharākasang raonaona shimlui khuihaorali.”
Kala yanglu,
Kala ana ali ayarshong thānshokta hānga, “Kazingramshong yangkālu; nana sirabing chi shānkhuishapakha shānkhuilu.” Chieina ana hānga, “Nawui naotunla chiyākhara.”
Ana
Kala
Kha ana hānga, “O
Ana hānga, “Kum kathumwui muklānao akha, kum kathumwui me avā akha, kum kathumwui yaovānao akha, nāsha̱ akha kala kha̱na̱ akha da ili khuirāmilu.”
Chieina ana khuivāsera, kala kaikhanini sālaga akhawuitungli akha ngashomda hai, kha vānaobing chiya mangakaimana.
Khalāng sāshaana sā kathipam chili yongkharā eina Abramna kashamhaowa.
Chieina
kha athumna otram ngatha̱khami yur chiwuitungli iwui khamashung bichar tāshungra, kala athumna lan kachungkha khuiphungda shokluira.
Nava chingri eina nashāvā ngarāwui ngalemli vāra; rarlak kahai atamli mathālak eina chifara.
Athumna mithot khamateli hili latungluira, kaja Amornaobingna morei kasā makāshungranga.”
Zimik tunhaida tangmang kahai tharān meikhut kashoka meiham akha kala meiwon kakā zarmei akha kashuirak shokta ngakai kahai sākhumbing chiwui ngachaili kānvāhaowa.
Chithang
chiya chiwui alungli khalei Ken, Keniz, Kadmon,
Hit, Periz, Rephaim,
Amor, Canaan, Girgash kala Jebusbingwui ngalei china.”
Chitharān Abram preiva̱ Sarai nao mapharāthuwa. Awui rao Egyptwui sha̱nao akha Hagar hoda leisai;
kala Saraina Abramli hānga, “Yanglu,
Chithāda sāda Abramna Canaan ngaleili kum tharā sompam kahaiwui thili, apreiva̱ Saraina awui rao Egyptpava̱ Hagar hi agahara Abramwui preiva̱ sākhavai mihaowa.
Abramna Hagarli ngasopida nao vaihaowa; kala nao vaihaira da kathei eina akhavaiva̱li matheimithuwa.
Kala Saraina Abramli hānga, “Ili khayon kasā saikora nali tāranu! Iwui rao nali ngaso khavai mi, kha ara nao vaihaira da kathei eina ana ili matheimithura.
Kha Abramna Saraili hānga, “Yanglu, nawui raopava̱ hi nawui pāngli lei; nawui ningkachāng athishurda ali sālu.” Chieina Saraina ali sāshilak eina sāda Hagar yāmhaowa.
Shurwui shongfashong lamhāng akhali, ura̱ khaleipam akhali
Kala ana hānga, “Saraiwui rao sha̱nao Hagar, na kachiwui eina rāda kachili vāki kajikhala?” Hagarna ngahānkai, “Ishachon Saraiwui eina yāmkazatna.”
wui kazingrao china ali hānga, “Latungda nachonwui kahāng nganālu.”
Kazingrao china hānglui, “Ina nawui ara̱-azā kachungkha mataisangmida athum mashānkhararra ngasāra.”
Kazingrao china hithādala hānglui, “Yanglu, na nao vaida lei, kala mayarnao akha pharāra; awui ming Ishmael hora; kaja
Ava mi akhawui sakashe gadhā thāra, mi kachiva̱na ali mamayāmara, kala ana mi kachiva̱li mamayāmara, kala ana athei-asā khipalikha mamayā ngarokla okthuira.”
Chiwui vang ana ali khangazeka
Chiwui vang ra̱khong chili Beer-lahai-roi da hoi, hi Kadesh eina Beredwui ngachaili lei.
Hagarna Abramwui naomayara Ishmael kapharā tharān Abram kum hangchishatta tharuk kāhairasai.
Abram kum hangchikoda chiko kākashung tharān
Kala ina iniwui alungli iwui tuingashit sāra, kala nali sorngasaida mataisangmira.”
Chieina Abramna ngaleili ngakhumzanga, kala Varena ali hānga,
“Yanglu, iwui tuingashit nali ngasomida lei, nana shānda makakhui yurwui avāva̱ ngasāra.
Nawui ming Abram maholuimara, kha Abraham hohaora; kaja ina nali shānda makakhui yurwui avāva̱ sāngasakhaira.
Ina nali sorngasaida athei mathei ngasakta yur kachungkha kala wungnao kachungkha nawui eina shokra.
Kala iwui khangashit katang makhavai tuingashit akha sāda na eina nawui ara̱-azābingwui thot vāshungda ina mayonmira, nawui kala nawui ara̱-azābingwui Vare sāchingra.
Kala nana zatta khalei Canaan ngalei hupta katang mavaila nawui kala nawui ara̱-azābingwui ngasā khavai mira, kala ina athumwui Vare sāra.”
Kala Varena Abrahamli hānga, “Nala kala nawui thili kharā ara̱-azābingla athumwui mithot peida iwui tuingashit mayonra.
Hi I eina na kala nawui thili rāki kaji ara̱-aza̱bingwui ngachaili mayonki kaji tuingashit china: Nathumwui alungli mayarnao kachiva̱ ahui rimshokra.
Nawui phasā ahui rimshokra, I eina nawui ngachaili china tuingashitwui machut sāra.
Nathumwui alungli pharāda chishatthang kāshung kahaiya mayarnao, nawui shimkhurli kapharāranu, nawui theisā makhaning pheisā eina yur khangateiwui nao lokakhuiranu, mithot peida ahui rimshokserra,
nawui shimkhurli kapharāranu, nawui pheisā eina lokakhuiranu, rimshokphalungra. Chithāda sāda iwui tuingashit hi naphasāli katang makhavai tuingashit sāda leichingra.
Ahui marimkashoka mayarnao, chile awui yurwui eina katatphalungra; ana iwui tuingashit sākakhaina.”
Kala Varena Abrahamli hānga, “Napreiva̱ Saraiwui vanga, nana awui ming Sarai maholuimara, kha Sarah
Ina ali somira, kala chili lāngda awui eina ina nali naomayara akha mira; ina ali somira, kala ana miyur kachungkhawui ava̱va̱ sāra; awui eina miyur kachungkhawui awungabing shokra.”
Chieina Abrahamna ngakhumzangda mana̱da akhalatta hānga, “Kum shākha kāshung kahai mi akhana nao pharārala? Kum hangchiko kāshung kahaiva̱ Sarahna nao leirala?”
Kala Abrahamna Vareli hānga, “O Ishmaelna nawui mangāli okthuichingranu!”
Varena hānga, “Maningmana, kha napreiva̱ Sarahna nali nao mayarnao akha pharāmira, kala nana awui ming Isaac hora. Ali kala awui ara̱-azābingli mashimānla iwui tuingashit hi leingasakchingra.

Ishmaelwui pongli ina nawui tui shāhaira; yanglu, ina ali somira kala ali athei mathei ngasakra kala kachungkha mataisangmira; ana wungnao tharāda khaniwui avāva̱ ngasāra, kala ina ali kahaka yur akha sāngasakra.
Kha iwui tuingashitva Sarahna zingkuma hitharan pharāki kaje nawui nao Isaacli sāra.”
Chān ngazek khuihailaga Varena Abrahamwui eina thuihaowa.
Chiwui thili Abrahamna anaomayara Ishmael kala awui shimli pharākasang raobing kala lupā eina lokakhui raonaobing saikora Varena kakaso athishurda chithang ngalāngda ahui rimshokmi.
Abrahamna ahui rimkashok chitharān a kum hangchikoda chiko kāshunghairasai.
Kala anaomayara Ishmaelna ahui rimkashok tharān kum tharāda kathum kāshunghairasai.
Chithang Abraham eina awui nao Ishmael ahui rimshokhaowa;
kala ashi shimkhurli kapharā, kala yur kateiwui eina lokakhui mayarnao saikora ali ngasoda ahui rimshoksera.
Mamrewui shirimthingpamli, ngashunshong sāhaida, awui kachonshim khāmongli pamlakha
Ana kapeikakā eina, yanglu mi kathum awui mangāli nganingkasā thei. Ana athumli kathei eina totot angakhumzanga,
kala hānga “Iwui amei, I hi nathumna ngahānkhangaia mi akhana jiakha narao ili mamakānthuimihaialu.
Tara̱nao khuirāmiranu, phei pheolaga thingphei khaya̱li ngasāmkhuisālu,
naraowui shimli rāhaokada ina kashakazā ngahomkha ungkhuimiga, chiwui thili nathum thuinaolu.”
“Nana kahāng thāda sālu” da athumna hānga.
Chieina Abrahamna kachonshimli totot yongungda Sarahli hānga, “Mathir khamathā nailaga mi kathumwui vang khangarān sālu.”
Kala Abrahamna totot seishangli vālaga asā kakā seinao akha khuida awui raoli khuimi, kala ana totot hangmi.
Chiwui thili ana seina̱khan, seina̱, kala ana hangkahai sā chi athumli khuivāmi; kala athumna zālakha ana thingpheili nganingpama.
Athumna ali ngahāna, “Napreiva̱ Sarah kali leilikhala?” Ana, “Shimlungli leili” da ngahānkai.
Chitharān Abraham eina Sarah sarlākhairasai; Sarah naotheila chathairasai. Sha̱naowui khangachāla ngasāmhairasai.
“Ila, igaharala sarhaira, kathāda ina nao pharāda ringkaphā samphangrakhala?” da awui ningli ngathumda mana̱ya.
na Abrahamli hānga, “Khisāda Sarahna mana̱da, ‘I nao vaikachangluirala, ara sarhaira’ jikhala?
Kha Sarahna, “I mamana̱mana” da hānga, kaja a ngacheehaowa. Ana hānga, “Maningmana, na mana̱ya.”
Chiwui thili athumna zatphokta Sodomshong ngashānvai; kala Abrahamna athumli shongfali athai.
na hānga, “Ina sāki kaji chi Abrahamli mahāngla ngathumhaorala,
kaja Abraham hi pangshap khalei kahaka yur akha ngasāra kala awui vang eina okathui miyur saikora sokhami ngasāra kaji thatheilaga?
Maningmana, kaja awui naongarāli, kala awui shimkhurli anaolamshong eina tangda kathar eina khamashung eina
Chiwui thili
athumli khamatui ina kashā saikora chi athumna sākachangkhatka kathākhala kaji ina tāyanglaga theira.”
Chieina mibing chiwui eina mai ngareida Sodomshong tāhaowa, kha Abrahamna
Kala Abrahamna anganaida ngahāna, “Khamashunga athumlila makaphā athumli ngasoda shimān ngasakrala?
Chānjam sāda keinung chiwui alungli kathara mi hangphangā leisasi kaja, athum kathara hangphangā chiwui vang keinung chi mayangmila shimān ngasakrala?

Khatharabingli makaphābing eina ngasoda shaokathat, kaja katharbingla makaphābingwui kashimānli zangkhangasak chi nawui eina katāva̱li leiranu! Okathui katongawui Bichar akhavāna mashun bichar masāmarala?”
Chieina
Abrahamna ngahānkai, “Yanglu, ina
Chānjam sāda hangphangā chiwui ngachaili phangā vātsasi kaja, phangā khavāt chiwui vang nana keinung katonga shimān ngasakrala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Hangmatida phangāmāng leisālala ina mashimān ngasakmara.”
Abrahamna ngahānluishita, “Chānjam sāda hangmatimāng leisasi kaja kathāra?” Ana ngahānkai, “Hangmati chiwui vang mashimān ngasakmara.”
Chieina ana hānga, “
Ana ngahānkai, “Thumrāwui mangā eina ina mashimān ngasakmara.”
Ana hānga, “Yanglu, ina
Chiwui thili ana hānga, “
Ana ngahānkai, “Tharā chiwui mangā eina ina mashimān ngasakmara.”
Abrahamli ngazekkhui kahaiwui thili
Sodomwui ngaveili Lot pamda leilakha kazingrao khani chi ngazinshong Sodomli tarāsai. Anili theikhaleoda Lotna vāngaroka, kala ngakhumshāmhailaga,
ana hānga, “Amei khani, arui ngayā narao iwui shimli ungngasāmkhuilu, kala pheipāng pheokhuilu, chiwui thili ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuida zatnaolu.”
Anina hānga, “Masāpaimara, ini shongfali pisangra.”
Kha ana anili panglāk eina kahāngwui vang ashi shimli unga; kala kashakazā khamathā kala khawok makazang khamui ngarānmida athum phāshak phāzai.
Kha athumna ngayā mapiranglakha Sodom keinungwui mibing khararnaosan mateila katongana shim chi rākuinamhaowa;
kala athumna Lotli hoda, “Arui ngayā nashiwuili kharā kha̱mi chi kali leikhala? Anili hili khuishoklu, ngasovaiga.”
Lotna khanukshong eina shokta, awui thili khāmong shungnamhailaga
hānga, “Ichināngarā, ina nathumli kapona, hiyākha sāshida masaalu.
Yanglu, mayarnao matheilakrang kaji inao ngalāva̱ khani leili; ina anili chishotka, nathumwui ningkachāng sālu; kha mi khani hili khikha mathāmialu, kaja ani iwui shimli rāzang kahaina.”

Kha athumna hānga, “Shongfa chikālu!” kala athumna hānga, “Mipa hi kha̱mi sāda rālaga bichar sāki jikhaningli! Anipāli hailaklaga napāli sakmeida sātha̱ra.” Chieina athumna Lotli namrada khāmong sākhai khavai vai.
Kha mi khani china pāng katingshokta Lotli aniwui ngalemli shimlungshong khuikāhaowa, kala khāmong shungnamhaowa.
Kala anina shim chiwui khāmong ngalemli khalei khararnaosan katongali mik ngapeomiserhaida khāmong phākachupzatuwa.
Chiwui thili anina Lotli hānga, “Hili nashi mi khangatei khaleila? Narihā ngarā, naomayara ngarā, naongalāva̱ ngarā, maningakha nawui mi keinungli khalei athumli apam hiwui eina khuishokserhaolu;
kaja apam hi inina shimān ngasaki jihaira; kachiwui vangkhala kaja hiwui mibingli chupchup khamatui
Chieina Lotna anao ngalāva̱ khanili ngakumki kaje arihā khani chili ahoi, “Ngakarthuida apam hiwui eina thuiulu; khikhala jila keinung hi

Ngathor kazing kathang eina kazingraobing china Lotli, “Ngakarthuida napreiva̱ eina nanao ngalāva̱ khani khalei hi khuithuiulu, chi maningakha keinungwui kashong khalāngli nathumla shimānnarhaipaishina.” da malung katunglak eina hānga.
Kha ana ningchungpamhaowa; chithālala
Athumli khuishok kahaiwui thili hānga, “Mathi khavai yāmulu, khanuk makapeiungalu; kala tampāklungli mangasāmlakalu; phungreishong yāmkāhaolu, maningakha nathumlila chuithathaora.”
Kala Lotna athumli ngahānkai, “Chi mathāmilu, amei ngarā;
yanglu, narao ili ngahānngailak eina lukhamashan kachungkha chitheimida imanglā huimihaira; kha ina phungreili mayāmvārarmara, kaja kalāshāt china rāngaphankhuida ila thirumhaora.
Yanglu, araa chili kathei keinungnao chi teolaka, katāla matāmana, ina chili ngayinkhuika, apam kateonao chili mavāngayinkhuipaimarala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Yanglu, nana kapo hila mayāmihaoga, kaja nana kahāng keinung chi masākhaimimara.
Thākta chili yāmvaulu; kaja nathum chili mavāshungranglakha ina khikha masāpaithura.” Chiwui vang eina keinung chili Zoar da hoi.
Lotna Zoarli vākashung chitharān zimik shokhairasai.
Chiwui thili
kala keinung khanini shimān ngasaka, tampākla, keinung chili okathui mi saikora, kala ngaleitungli kakhārra akhala mashāklakmana.
Lotwui khanukshong kazata apreiva̱na yangkhaungwui vang machiwui pakra̱ sāthuihaowa.
Ngathorthakva̱ Abrahamna ana
kala ana Sodom eina Gomorrahshong kala tampāk chiwui apam saikorali ngashānkhayang eina, yanglu, apam chiwui meikhut chi mei shātkharungwui thāda thei.
Chithāda Lotna somkasa tampāk chiwui keinungbing chi shimān khangasak chitharān Varena Abrahamli phaningungmida Lotli keinung chiwui eina shokngasakhaowa.
Chiwui thili Lotna Zoarli mapamlengthuda, anao ngalāva̱ khanili ngasoda phungreili apama; kala athum lungkhur akhali apama.
Khararva̱ china agatuiva̱li hānga, “Ishāvā sārhaira, kala okathuiwui khangachā zatkhanā thāda inili ngakum khavai okathuili mayarnaola maleilākthura.
Chieina rālu, ishāvāli marip ngasakhailaga ini ali ngasopisa; chithākha iniwui nao ishāvāwui eina samphangda amachi leipaira.”
Chithang ngayā anina avāva̱li marip ngasakhaowa, kala khararva̱na avāva̱li kāngasopiya; kha katharān kāpi, katharān thuihao kaji avāva̱na matheimana.

Akhama kathā khararva̱ china agatuiva̱li hānga, “Yanglu, angayā ina ishāvāli ngasopihaira, ajala marip ngasakluida ashama nani ngasopilu; chithāda sāda iniwui nao ishāvāwui eina samphangda amachi leipaira.”
Chieina chithang ngayāla anina avāva̱li marip ngasakluishita; kala agatuiva̱na avāva̱li kāngasopiya; kha katharān kāpi, katharān thuihao kaji avāva̱na matheimana.
Chithāda sāda Lotwui naongalāva̱ khanini chi avāva̱wui nao vaithathuihaowa.
Khararva̱na mayarnao akha pharai; kala aming Moab hoi. Aja ana Moab mibingwui avāva̱na.
Khanganuiva̱nala mayarnao akha pharai, kala Ben-ammi hoi; aja ana Ammon mibingwui avāva̱na.
Apam chiwui eina Abrahamna Negebwui ramshong vāda Kadesh eina Shurwui ngachaili tāpama; kala Gerarli vai.
Abrahamna apreiva̱ Sarahli “Azarva̱na” da hānga. Chieina Gerarwui awunga Abimelechna Sarahli khui.
Kha mangshong Varena Abimelechli rāhānga, “Yanglu, nana kakhuia sha̱nao chiwui vang eina na thiki jiura, kaja ava mi kateiwui preiva̱na.”
Abimelechna mangasomirangsāthuda hānga, “
Akhalattana ‘Hi izarva̱na’ kala sha̱naopava̱nala ‘A ipāna’ majimala? Chiwui vang ining katong eina kala ipāng kathar eina kasāna.”
Chieina Varena awui mangshongli hānga, “Mha, nana ningkathar eina kasāna kaji ina thei, kala nana iwuitungli morei masā khavai khāmkhame chi ina; chieina ali masāza̱ khangasakna.
Chiwui vang eina apreiva̱ chi hanmihaolu, ava marān akhana, ana nawui vang seihā sāmida na ringra. Kha nana mahanmiakha na thilakra, kala nawui khalei saikorala thira da theilu.”
Chieina Abimelechna ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuida awui raobing saikorali hokhuilaga tui saikora chi hāngchithei, kala athum saikora ngacheelakhaowa.

Chieina Abimelechna Abrahamli hokhuida hānga, “Nana ithumli khi kasākhala? Ina nali khi morei sāhaoda nana ili kala iwui wungramli hakkhamahā morei phungrākhamikhala? Masākhangayi ot chi nana sāhaira.”
Kala Abimelechna Abrahamli hānglui, “Nana khi phaningda hikathā ot kasākhala?”
Abrahamna hānga, “Apam hili Vareli khangachee maleimana kala ipreiva̱wui vang athumna ili shaothathaipaishina da kaphaningwui vang hithāda kasāna.
Chili lāngda kachangkhat hāngsa jiakha izara̱ shokpapama, kaja ishāvāwui naongalāva̱na, ishāva̱wui maningmana, chieina ipreiva̱ ngasā kahaina.
Kala Varena ili ishāvāwui shim eina thuikhangasak chitharān ina ali kahāngna, ‘Ithumna khavāvāpam kachida ili napāna’ da hāngmilu jikahaina.”
Chieina Abimelechna seila, yaola, awui rao sha̱nao mayarnao kachungkha Abrahamli mida apreiva̱ Sarahlila hanmihaowa.
Kala Abimelechna hānga, “Yanglu, iwui ngalei, nawui mangāli theida lei; nana somkhangai apam chili sompaira.”
Sarahlila hānga, “Yanglu, ina napāli lupāsā thingkha mihaira; nawui ngasokazat mi saikorawui mangāli nali khayon maleimana da mashung ngasak kahaina.”
Chieina Abrahamna Vareli seihā sai; kala Varena Abimelechli raimihaowa; kala apreiva̱la, rao sha̱naobingla raimida athum nao pharāhaowa.
Kaja Abraham preiva̱̱ Sarahwui vang eina Varena Abimelechwui shimkhurli sha̱nao saikorawui naopam shungkhamiserhairasai.
Kala Sarah nao vaihaowa, kala asarlamshong Varena hāngkahai atam horzakta Abrahamli mayarnao akha pharāmi.
Sarahna kapharā naomayara chiwui aming Abrahamna Isaac phokmi.
Kala Varena kaso kahai athishurda Isaac pharāda chishatthang kākashung eina Abrahamna ahui rimshokmi.
Awui naomayara Isaacli pharāthang Abrahamwui kum shākha kāhairasai.
Kala Sarahna hānga, “Varena ili mana̱ khavai sāmihaira; kala hi kashā mi kachiva̱na ili mana̱rumra.”
Kala ana hānglui, “Sarahna nao pharāda na̱ shimanra da khipāna Abrahamli hāngsārakhala? Kha awui asārlam atamli ina ali naomayarnao akha pharāmihaira.”
Nao chi rarmamānda zattheiuwa; kala Isaacna na̱ reithang Abrahamna zātkhān kahakva̱ akha sai.
Kha Egyptwui sha̱nao Hagarna kapharā Abrahamwui naomayara eina anaomayara Isaac ngareo khanganao chi Sarahna thei.
Chieina ana Abrahamli hānga, “Raopava̱ eina anaomayarali kashamhaolu, kaja raowui naona iwui nao Isaacli shimlui makhuirumpaimara.”
Anaomayarawui vang phaninglaga Abraham ning maringphāthuwa.
Kha Varena Abrahamli hānga, “Nao chiwui vang kala sha̱nao chiwui vang ning maringkaphā masaalu; Sarahna nali kahāng kachiva̱ thāda sālu, kaja Isaacwui eina nawui ara̱-azāwui ming phokki kajina.
Kala raopava̱wui naomayarawui einala ina yur akha shokngasakra, kaja ala nawui naotheina.”
Chieina Abrahamna ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuida khamui kala tara̱ sāhuiham khatkha Hagarwui yartuili parmi kala nao chi eina ngasoda chithothaowa. Kala ana zatta Beer-shebawui lamhāngli nganingzata.
Sāhuihamwui tara̱ chi kānkahai eina awui nao chi thingphei akhali vāhaihaowa.
Chiwui thili lungherkha chāng tāmeida vālaga ana khana̱da apama, kaja “Nao hiwui kathi I matheingaimana” da ana hānga. Ana khana̱da pamlakha nao china panglāk eina chapshokrāsai.

Kala Varena nao chiwui khon shai; kala Varewui kazingraona atungshong eina vaotāda Hagarli hānga, “Khina nali khanang ngasakhaokhala Hagar? Mangacheealu, kaja naona leida khaleipam chiwui eina awui kachapkhon Varena shāhaira.
Ngakarthuilu, naomayara chi khangkāda vamkhuilu, khikhalajila ina ali kahaka yur akha sāngasakra.”
Chiwui thili Varena awui mik rakngasaka, kala ana ra̱khong akha thei; ana sāhuikhong chili tara̱ achipemkhuida naoli shimana.
Nao chi rarmamānda Varena ngasomi; ana lamhāngli okthuida malā kakāp themlākhaowa.
Ana Paranwui lamhāngli okthui kala apreiva̱ sākhavai ava̱va̱na Egyptwui ngalānao akha khuisangmi.

chiwui vang eina ili, inaongarāli, lah iwui ara̱-azālila mikhanam ot masālakmara da Varewui ming singda ina nali ning horsangchaoda kasā thāda, nana kazat ngalei chili ilila chithāda sāra da shākhi sālu.”
Abrahamna ngahānkai, “Ina shākhi sāra.”
Abimelechwui raobingna ra̱khong ngapaithui kahaiwui vang Abrahamna mamayāmada kahāng chitharān,
Abimelechna ngahānkai, “Hi khipānakhala kaji I matheimana; nanala ili mahāngthuda aja rākashālaka.”
Chieina Abrahamna yao eina mukkā khuida Abimelechli miya, kala ani tuingashit sāngaroka.
Abrahamna yaovā shini yaoshangwui eina ngateida hai.
Chieina Abimelechna Abrahamli hānga, “Nana yaovā shini ngateida kahai hiwui kakhalat khikhala?”
Ana hānga, “Yaovā shini hi na khuilu, kala ra̱khong hi ina kakhonna kaji nana shākhi sāra.”
Chiwui vang eina apam chi Beer-sheba hoi, kaja apam chili ani shākhi sāda khamayā mingaroka.
Chithāda sāda anina Beer-shebali tuingashit sāngaroka. Chiwui thili Abimelech eina raimi akhavā Phicolna ngakarthuida Philistine ngaleili latunghaowa.
Beershebali Abrahamna tamarisk akha lingsangda Mashimānda Makashimān
Abrahamna Philistine ngaleili sha̱rākha pama.
Ana hānga, “Nawui akhamāng kaje naomayara nana leishilak kahai Isaacli Moriah ngaleili, ina chitheiki kaji phungrei chili thānvāda rikkatā kachigat akha sāda apha̱haolu.”
Ngathorthakva̱ Abrahamna ngakarthuida gadhānaoli ot shaksāmi; kala yaronnao khanili thānphung kala Isaacli ngasoda hanphut sākhavai thing phākhuilaga Varena kakaso pamli vai.
Kakathumathang Abrahamna ngashān khavā tharān apam chi katāva̱li thei.
Chieina yaronao khani chili Abrahamna, “Hili gadhā eina ngasoda pamsālu; ini vānaoni lākhashong akhorumlaga ungrāsanaoga.” da hānga.
Kala rikkatā kachigat riktā khavai thing chi khuilaga naomayara Isaacli ngava̱ ngasaka, kala ana mei eina khainao khuiphunga. Chithāda ani ngasothuihaowa.
Kala Isaacna avāva̱ Abrahamli “Avā” da kaho eina “Khikhala inao, I hili leili” da ngahānkai. Chieina ana ngahāna, “Yanglu, meila, thingla leihaira, kha pha̱phayā khavai yaonao kali leili?”
Abrahamna hānga, “Inao, rikkatā kachigatwui vang Vare akhalattana yaonao ngarānmira.” da hānglaga ani ngasothuiuwa.
Chiwui thili pāng khangkāda khainao yonkhuilaga anao mayarli sāthat khavai sai.
Kha
Ana hānga, “Nao chili napāng maparalu, lah ali khikha mathālu; nawui nao akhamāng kaje chi eina tangda iwui vang kashivām maleimana kaji theilaga na Vareli ngacheeya kaji ina theihaira.”

Kala Abrahamna amik kapeikakā tharān, yanglu, awui khanukshong khararli angachi ngaruishāntitlaga yaovā akha leisai; kala Abrahamna yaovā chi akhuilaga Isaacwui mahut rikkatā kachigat sāda pha̱phayāhaowa.
Chieina Abrahamna apam chili
Kala
hānga, “I khalattana nali ngashit kahaina, nana nanaomayara akhamāng chila iwui vang mashivāmlakla kasāwui vang,
kachangkhat ina nali somira, kala ina nawui ara̱-azā kazingli khalei sirāyākha kala kongpheiwui situiyākha ngasā ngasakra. Kala nawui ara̱-azāna nawui yangkashebingwui ngavei khavangra.
Kala nawui ara̱-azāwui mangā eina okathuiwui miyur saikora sokhami ngasāra, kaja nana iwui kahāng nganai.”
Chieina awui rao khaniwui chili latunglaga athum ngasoda Beer-shebali ungshunga, kala Abrahamna Beer-shebali pama.
Chiwui thili Abrahamli hithāda rāhānga, “Yanglu, nachinā Nahorwui preiva̱ Milcah nao kachungkha pharāhaira:
Khararrali Uz, agatoli Buz, Kemuelwui avāva̱ Aram,
Chesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaph kala Bethuel.”
Rebekahli Bethuelna pharai. Ashi chishat hi Abrahamwui achinā Nahorwui preiva̱̱ Milcahwui naosera.
Chili lāngda Nahorwui angashirva̱ Reumahna Tebah, Gaham, Tahash kala Maacahli pharai.
Sarah kum shākha maga̱da shini okthui, hi Sarahwui mirin zingkumna.
Sarah Canaan ngaleili khalei Kiriath-arba (chiya Hebron) li thihaowa; kala Abrahamna Sarahwui vang wukkhanangda chapngachai.
Kala Abrahamna awui kathi khaleipam chiwui eina ngakarthuida Hitnaobingli hānga,
“Iya kha̱mi sāda nathumwui ngachaili hunakha rākapamna; chieina chikhur sākhavai ili apam akha khamilu, chithakha kathi hi chizanpaira.”
Hitnaobingna ngahānkai,

“Ithumwui tui khuimilu, amei, nava ithumwui ngachaili pangshap sāshapa wungnao akhana. Ithumwui chikhur leida khalei hili nana ningchāngmeikap kaji chikhurli chizanpaira; ithum khipānakha makhāmmara, lah makhamayāla masāmara.”
Abrahamna ngakarthuida ngalei chiwui mibing, Hitnaobingli kui mashungzangda khayākashi mi.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Kathi hi chizanpai khavai iwui vang nathumna mayāmiakha ili nganāmilu, Zoharwui naomayara Ephronli,
awui luipheili khalei Machpelah kaho lungkhur chi mikhavai kahāngmilu. Nathumwui mangāli luiman horzakta ili chitheida ishiwui chikhur sākhavai lokhuira.”
Atam chili Ephronla Hitnaobingli ngasoda pamsai; kala Hitnaopa Ephronna Hitnaobingwui mangāli ana Abrahamli hānga;
“Khuikhalailu, amei, nganāmilu; iramnao saikorawui mangāli ina lui chila lungkhur chila nali thāda mikahaina; kathi chi chili chizanpaira.”
Chiwui thili Abrahamna ngalei chiwui mibingwui mangāli kui mashungzangda khayākashi mi.
Kala ana Ephronli aramnao saikorawui mangāli hānga, “Kha nana mayāmiakha iwui tui kakhuimilu, ishi chikhur sāchang khavai ngalei chiwui aman kakhuimilu.”
Ephronna Abrahamli ngahānkai,
“Amei, ili nganāmilu, lui chiwui aman lupāsā shekel shāmati sha̱kha china iniwui vang khi sārakhala? Kathi chi chizanmalu.”
Abrahamna Ephronwui chi mayāhaowa; kala Abrahamna Hitnaobingwui mangāli hāngkatā lupāsā shekel shāmati aramwui leih kasānaobingna zatkhāna athishurda Ephronli onmihaowa.
Chithāda Mamrewui zingshoshong khalei Machpelah kaho Ephronwui lui chi, lungkhur pamla, luipam chila Abrahamli miserhaowa.
Kala awui keinung ngaveili kharā Hitnaobing saikorawui mangāli Abrahamwui sāhaira da horsangmi.
Chiwui thili Mamre (chiya, Hebron) wui zingshoshong, Canaan ngaleili khalei Machpelahwui lungkhurli Abrahamna apreiva̱ Sarahli chifahaowa.
Lui kala chiwui alungli khalei lungkhur chi awui chikhur sākhavai Hitnaobingna Abrahamli metchanghaowa.
Abraham kasāngkha okthuida sarlakhaowa, kala
Kala Abrahamna awui raobingwui ngachaili rarmeithui kaje awui khalalei khayanga rao chili hānga, “Ikhaishāngli napāng hailu,
laga kazingramwui kala okathuiwui
kha iramshong ungda iwui athei-asāwui eina Isaac preiva̱ khuisangmira.”
Rao china ali hānga, “Ngalāva̱ china ili mashurungaiga jiakha nanaomayarali nana rākhavairam chili thānvārala?”
Abrahamna ali hānga, “Inaoli chili mathānvāpaimara kaji hi theilu.
Ishāvā ngarāwui eina, kala kapharā pam eina thānshokta ‘Nawui ara̱-azāli ina lam hi mira,’ da shākhi sāda kahānga kazingramwui
Kha kalikha sha̱nao china nali mashurungaiakha iwui khangashit hiwui eina nali kakhalap maleimana; kha inaomayarali makhuivāpaimara kaji himana.”
Chieina rao china akhavā Abrahamwui khaishāng singda apong chiwui vang shākhi sai.
Chiwui thili rao china akhavāwui ut tharā eina ngasoda mikhangayi khuivāmi khavai ayur peida khuiphunglaga zatuwa; kala Nahorwui keinung Mesopotamiali vai.
Kala ngazinshong sha̱naobingna tara̱ katā atamli ana utbing chili keinungwui ayar ra̱khongpamli khuktiser ngasaka.
Kala ana hānga, “O
Yanglu, ina arui ra̱khongpamli nganingli, kala keinungwui ngalānaobing tara̱ katā tarākapta lei.

Ngalāva̱ akhali ina ‘Nawui tara̱ham eina ili tara̱ khamimanglu’ da kapo tharān, ‘Manglu, kala nawui utbinglila ina shimanra’ da kahāngva̱ chi narao Isaacwui vang nana kapang kahaiva̱ chi ngasāranu. Chieina nana iwui akhavāli makhangachei leikashi chitheimihaira kaji ina theikhuira.”
Ana matuimahungda leilakha, yanglu, Abrahamwui achinā Nahorwui preiva̱ Milcahna kapharā Bethuelwui naongalāva̱ Rebekah tara̱ham yartuili tonglaga tarāsai.
Ngalāva̱ chi ngatikri eina yangngailaka, kala kachingva̱ sha̱naona. Ana ura̱pam chili ham eina tara̱ chipemkhuida shoka.
Chieina rao china ngasamvāda ngalava̱ chili ahānga, “Nawui hamli khuikaphung tara̱ chi kateokha khamimanglu.”
Ana hānga, “Amei, mangkhalailu” da totot ngareitāda ham chieina shimana.
Sha̱nao china ali mimanghailaga hānga, “Nawui utbing hilila machirranglakha eina tangda ina shimanserra.”
Chithāda tara̱hamli kazang chi totot khongsaili heisanghailaga latluida zangsokkhuiluia, chithada ut katonga mangkhavai sokmi.
Awui shongzā hi
Utbing chi mangkhuiser kahaiwui thili mi china shekel tangkhai kharit sinā unra̱, kala shekel tharā kharita sinākazao khani khuimida hānga,
“Na khipāshinaokhala? Ithum aja ngayā nashi shimli mangasāmkhuipaira?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Iva Bethuelwui nao ngalāva̱na; ishāvāli kapharāva̱ Milcah chi Nahor preiva̱na.”
Kala hithāda hānga, “Ishiwuili seizātla, lanjila kashap lei kala pikhavai kāla leisera.”
Rao china kui mashunzangda
kala hānga, “Iwui akhavāli makhangachei leikashi kala ningkatonga Abrahamwui
Chieina ngalāva̱ china yongunglaga ava̱va̱wui shimkhurli unghāngsera.
Rebekahwui apā akha Laban hoda leisai, kala Labanna ura̱pamli yongvāda mipa chili asamphanga.

Ana unra̱ kala azarva̱wui pāngtheili kasang kazao chi theilaga kala azara̱ Rebekahna, “Mipa china ili hithāda hānga,” kaji shālaga ana mipā chili ayanga, kala yanglu, ana ura̱pam chili utbingli ngasoda nganingsai.
Ana hānga, “
Chieina mipa china shimli unga; kala Labanna utbing chi khalāmihai, kala lanji eina seizāt khuimi. A kala ali khangasobinglila phei pheokhavai tara̱la khangarān sāmi.
Chiwui thili ali kashakazā khuimi, kha ana hānga, “Ili kaso kahai pao hi mahāngranglakha mazāfamara,” da ana hānga. Labanna, “Hānglu” ji.
Chieina ana hānga, “I Abrahamwui raona.
Iwui akhavāli
Iwui akhavā preiva̱ Sarahna sārkahai chitharān mayarnao akha pharāmida awui khalei saikora ali miserhaira.
Kala iwui akhavāna ili khangashit akha sāngasakta hānga, ‘Ina kapam apam Canaan hiwui ngalā inaomayarawui vang apreiva̱ sākhavai makhuimipaimara;
kha ishāvāwui shimkhurli iwui athei-asā ngarāwui eina inaomayarawui vang apreiva̱ akhuimilu.’ da hānga.
Ina iwui akhavāli ngahānkāda, ‘Sha̱nao china iwui thi mashurungngailaipa’ da hānga.
Kha ana ili hānga ‘Ili thānkazata
chieina vālaga ichinā ngarāna ngalāva̱ chi mamiakha ngashit kahai chi nana kakai maningmana’” da hānga.
“Ina aja ura̱pamli rālaga hithāda hānga, ‘Iwui akhavā, Abrahamwui
yanglu, ina ura̱pamli nganingda leilakha; tara̱ katā ngalānao akhali, nawui hamli khuikaphung tara̱ chi kateokha khamimanglu, da kapo chitharān,
mangmilu, nawui utbinglila ina shimanserra, da kahāngva̱ chi iwui akhavāwui naomayarawui vang
Hithāda iwui ningli machuk mahunglakha, yanglu, Rebekahna tara̱ham yartuili tonglaga tarāsai. Ana ura̱ chiwui tara̱ zangsokkhui. Chieina ina ‘Ili kha-mimanglu’ da poi.
Totot eina ngareitālaga ‘Mangmilu, laga nawui utlila ina shimanra’ da hānga. Chieina ina mangkhui, kala utbinglila shimana.
Chiwui thili ina ngahāna, ‘Na khipashinao ngalāva̱khala?’ Ana hānga, ‘Nahor preiva̱ Milcahna kapharā Bethuelwui naongalāva̱na.’ Chieina ina ali anātangli unra̱, kala pāngli kazao sangmi.
Chiwui thili ikui mashunzangda Abrahamwui
Chiwui vang eina nana iwui akhavāli khayāshida kala mashungda saakha, nana ninga maningmana kaji hāngmilu; chieina ina yāshonglapai, uishonglapai zatthuihaora.”
Chieina Laban eina Bethuelna ngahānkai, “
Yanglu, Rebekah hi nawui ngalemli leili,
Aniwui tui shālaga Abrahamwui raona ngakhumshām eina
Kala rao china aman kasaka sinā lupāwui ot, kashankachonla khuishokta Rebekahli mi. Apā eina ava̱va̱li aman kasasak ot kachungkha mi.
Ala kala ali khangasobingla phāshak-phazālaga chithang ngayā pisanghaowa. Ngathor kathui eina hānga, “Iwui akhavāwuili latung khavai khamayā milu.”
Awui apā eina ava̱va̱na hānga, “Tharāthang shikhawui vangmāng naongalāva̱ ithumli ngasopamfaranu; chiwui thili ungnaoranu.”
Kha ana hānga, “
Athumna hānga, “Ngalāva̱li hokhuilaga ngahānyangsa.”
Kala athumna Rebekahli hokhuida ngahāna, “Na mipa hili ngasoda zatukila?” Ana ngahānkai, “Zatuga.”
Chieina azarva̱ Rebekah eina ali sheba kasava̱, kala Abrahamwui rao kala ali khangasobing chili zatngasakhaowa.
Kala athumna Rebekahli somida hānga, “Ithumwui azara̱, na thingthingwui ava̱va̱ sāranu, kala nawui ara̱-azāna athumli yangkashebingwui ngavei ngapaikhuiranu!”
Chieina Rebekah eina awui rao sha̱nao china ngakarthuida ut tonglaga mipā chili shurthuwa. Chithāda sāda rao china Rebekahli thānunghaowa.
Chitharan Isaac Beer-lahai-roiwui eina Negebli rāpamhairasai.
Kala Isaacna ngazinshong luili seihā sākhavai vai; kala ana ngashānkhavā tharān, yanglu, ut kachungkha ungrākasā thei.
Kala Rebekahna mik yangkakā tharan Isaacli theida uttungwui eina tunga,
kala raopa chili ngahāna, “Araa chili kazata ithumwuishong rākharā chi khipākhala?” Rao china ngahānkai, “Iwui akhavāna.” Chieina mairār eina kuirunhaowa.
Kala rao china kashokshok saikora Isaacli unghāngsera.
Chieina Isaacna Rebekahli khuida kachonshimli thānunga, kala apreiva̱ sāhaowa; leikashila leishilāka. Chithāda sāda ava̱va̱ thikahaiwui thili Isaacli ning ringpha ngasaka.
Abrahamna Keturah kaho sha̱nao akhali khuiluiya.
Ana Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak kala Shuah athumli pharai.
Sheba eina Dedanwui avāva̱ Jokshanna. Kala Dedanwui naobinga Asshurim, Letushim, kala Le-ummimna.
Midianwui naomayara ngarā Ephah, Epher, Hanok, Abida, kala Eldaahna. Saikora hi Keturahwui naongarāsera.
Abrahamna awui khalei saikora Isaacli mi.
Kha angashirva̱wui naobingle thongthāngmāng mi; kala a ringlakha athum saikorali Isaacwui eina ngateida zingshoshong khalei ngaleivāk chihovāserhaowa.
Abrahamwui mirin zingkum shākha hangshinida phangāna.
Abrahamna rarlak eina thida awo-ayiwuili vāhaowa.
Anaomayara Isaac eina Ishmaelna ali Malch-pelahwui chikhurli chifaya, chiya Zahor Hitpawui naomayara Ephronwui lui Mamrewui zingshoshong khalei,
Abrahamna Hitnaowui eina lokakhui apam china. Chili apreiva̱ Sarahli ngasoda chizanhaowa.
Abraham thikahaiwui thili Varena Isaacli somi kala Isaacna Beer-lahai-roili pamhaowa.
Sarahwui rao Egyptpava̱ Hagarna kapharā Abrahamwui nao Ishmaelwui naotunbing chi hina.
Ishmaelwui naomayara ngarāwui aming hina, Nebaiotna Ishmaelwui naochizaina; kala chiwui thili Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumak, Massa,
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Naphish kala Kedemah hina.
Hibing hi shang tharāda khaniwui wungnaobing kala kachichāramwui ming athishurda Ishmaelwui naomayara ngarāsera.
(Ishmaelwui mirin kum shākha thumrāda shini ringlaga thihaowa, kala awo ayili vāhaowa).
Athumna Havilah eina thuilaga Shur vāshungda, Assyriashong Egyptli yangkhangasungli pāna; chili ana saikorawuitungli mungsai.
Hi Abrahamwui nao Isaacwui naotunbingna: Abrahamna Isaacli pharai,
Isaacna kum hangmati kākashung eina Rebekahli ngakuma; Paddan-aramwui Aramean Bethuelwui naongalāva̱ kala Aremean Labanwui azarva̱na.
Apreiva̱ Rebekah naokashumwui vang Isaacna
Wuklungli leilakha naobing chi nganur ngaroka; chieina Rebekahna hānga, “Hithara jiakha I khisāda okthuisākhala?” Chiwui vang ana
Kala
“Nawui naopamli miyur khani zangda lei,
Nana kapharā miyur khani hi ngayarkhaira.
Akhana akhapāli pangmeira,
khararana paisholi otram ngatha̱ra.”
Kapharā atam khaung chitharān, yanglu, naopamli nao khani zangsai.
Khararrali hungda pharāshoka, kala aphasā tongda ahahna rommithai; chieina awui ming Esau hoi.
Chiwui thili agato pharāshoka, kala ana Esauwui pheimaja̱li singda tai; chieina awui ming Jacob hoi. Anili kapharā tharān avāva̱ Isaacwui kum hangtharuk kāhairasai.
Nao khani china kharar tharān, Esauna sā khareng themlāka, kala khararli zata; kha Jacobva nuikon eina kachonshimli pama.
Isaacna Esauli leishilāka, kaja awui ramsā kashai samphanga; kha Rebekahna Jacobli leishimei.
Thangkha Jacobna han hangda leilakha Esau luiwui eina ungda vānhaowa.
Kala Esauna Jacobli hānga, “I thaināhaira, han kahung hangda khalei chi khamizālu!” (chieina awui ming Edom hoi).
Jacobna hānga, “Rida nawui khararpam ili yorsangfalu.”
Esauna hānga, “Kathaina thiki jiura; khararpam hina iwui vang khi kānnārakhala?”
Jacobna hānga, “Ili shākhi sārifalu.” Chieina ana shākhi sāda awui khararpam Jacobli yorsanghaowa.
Chiwui thili Jacobna khamui kala hanla mida Esauna phāshak-phazālaga thuihaowa. Chithāda sāda Esauna awui khararpam yorzāhaowa.
Abrahamwui thotli shokhairakasā chi maningla, apam chili chāmrei akha rāluishita. Kala Isaacna Philistinewui awunga Abimelechli samphang khavai Gerarli vai.
Shongfali
Ina kahāng apam chili vālu, ina nali ngasomira kala somira; nali kala nawui ara̱-azāli; navā Abrahamli ngashit kahai chi ungshung ngasakta ram saikora chi na eina nawui atheili mira.
Ina nawui ara̱-azā kazingramwui sirāyākha mataisangmira, kala ram saikora hi ina nathumli mira; nawui ara̱-azāwui eina okathuiwui miyur saikora athum khalatta sokhami ngasāra:
khikhalajila Abrahamna iwui kahāng nganāda ina kakaso, ningkhami, shiyan-chikan kala ain mayonchinga.”
Chieina Isaacna Gerarli pamhaowa.
Mina apreiva̱wui pongli ngahānakha “Izarva̱na” da hānga, kaja “Apreiva̱na” jiakha aramnaobingna Rebekahwui vang eina ali shaothathaipaishinada ngacheehaowa. Khikhalajila Rebekah ngalā mathālaka.
Chili kasāngkha pamkahaiwui thili Isaac eina Rebekah ngareokasā Philistinewui awunga Abimelechna charfawui eina yangshokta thei.
Chieina Abimelechna Isaacli hokhuida hānga, “Hi napreiva̱na, kathāda nazarva̱na jikhala?” Isaacna hānga, “Awui vang eina ili shaothathaipaishinada phaning kahaiwui vang chithā kahaina.”
Abimelechna hānga, “Na ithumli khicham kasākhala? Napreiva̱li mi akhana paisor eina ngasopimihailaga nana ithumli khayon phungsangmipai.”
Chiwui eina thuida Abimelechna aramnao saikorali mathinda hānga, “Mi hipāli kala apreiva̱li pāng kaparpāli shaothatra.”
Kala chikum Isaacna lui vāsangda heiun kachungkha khui.
kala mipā chi shānghaowa, kala mataisangkhangai mataisangda shāngshunhaowa.
Ana seila, yaola kala thongthāng kachungkha leihaoda, chiwui vang Philistinenaobingna ali yuishihaowa.
(Avāva̱ Abrahamwui thotli awui raobingna khonkahai ra̱khongbing chi Philistinenaobingna ngalei eina phinmiserhaowa).
Kala Abimelechna Isaacli hānga, “Ithumwui eina thuihaolu, kaja ithumli nana pangmeikharhaira.”
Chiwui vang Isaacna apam chiwui eina thuihaowa, kala Gerarwui tampākli apama.

Kala avāva̱ Abrahamwui atamli khonkahai ra̱khongbing chi Isaacna akhonlui; kaja Abraham thikahaiwui thili Philistinenaobingna sāphinmiserhairasai; kala avāva̱na phokkhami amingbing chi phokmiluishita.
Kha Isaacwui raobingna tampāk chili ra̱khong khonda chili ura̱ samkaphang eina,
Gerarwui sei kahombingna Isaacwui sei kahombingli kharar ngarokta hi “Ithumwui tara̱na” da hānga. Chiwui vang ana ra̱khong chiwui ming chi Esek phokmi, kaja athumna ngapaihaowa.
Chiwui thili athumna khangatei ra̱khong akha khonluishita, chilila athum kharar ngarokluihaowa; chieina ana chiwui aming Sitnah hoi.
Ana chiwui eina apam khangatei akhali vāda ra̱khong khangatei akha akhonluishita; kha hiliva marākhararthuwa; chiwui vang ana apam chili Rehoboth hoi, kaja “
Chiwui eina ana Beershebali shanga.
Chithang ngayā
Chieina ana apam chili hanphut akha sāda
Isaacna athumli hānga, “Ili ningkachaida nathumwui eina kashamhailaga khi rāsā kajikhala?”
Athumna hānga, “
chiya nali khikha mathālakla chingri eina chiho kahai thāda ithumlila sāshida masākhavai ngashitmilu. Na ara
Chieina ana athumli zātkhān sāda phāshak phazāngaruma.
Athumna ngathorthāk ngakarthuida akha eina akha shākhi sangaroka kala Isaacna athumli chithothaowa kala athumla awui eina chingri eina pākthuihaowa.
Chithang Isaacwui raobingna ra̱khong akha khonlaga “Tara̱ samphanghaira” da unghānga.
Ana chili Shibah hoi, chiwui vang aja eina tangda keinung chiwui ming Beer-sheba da hoi.
Esauna kum hangmati kākashung tharān Hitpa Be-eriwui naongalāva̱ Judith eina Elonwui naongalāva̱ Basemathli khui;
kala anina Isaac eina Rebekahwui mirin ning chotngasakhaowa.
Isaac sārreihaida mik mamāchā kahai tharan, ana anaomayara kharara Esauli hokhuida hānga, “Inaomayara,” kaji eina “Avā, I hili leili” da ngahānkai.
Ana hānga, “Yanglu, I sarhaira; katharan thinikhala matheimana.
Chieina nawui khutlai kachākthing eina malākhong khuiphungda iwui vang sā arenglu,
kala ina shaikhangai chi ngama̱ra̱ hangmilu; chi shaikhuida I mathiranglakha ina nali somira.”
Rebekahna anaomayara Jacobli hānga, “Navāna namei Esauli kahāng ina shāhaira.
‘Sā arenglaga ili ngama̱ra̱ eina hangmilu, ina shaida I mathiranglakha
Chieina inaomayara, ina nali kakaso thāda sālu.
Seishimli zangda khamathā yaonao khani khuirāmilu ina navāwui ningkachāng hamhan sālaga ngama̱ra̱ eina hangmira;
chi shaikhavai nana navāli khuivāmida a mathiranglakha nali somiranu.”
Kha Jacobna ava̱va̱ Rebekahli hānga, “Yanglu, ishāmei Esau ahā zarshun kahai mina; kha iva tāngpathai.
Ishāvāna ili khanamyangsi kaja kakapikna da theihaipai, kala sokhami maningla khonkashi ngasāhaipai.”
Ava̱va̱na ali hānga, “Nali khonkashi iwuitungli tāranu, inaomayara; iwui tui nganāmalu, vāda akhuimimalu.”
Chieina ana yaonao chi akhuida ava̱va̱li khuiungmi, kala avāva̱na ningkachāng hamhan sāda ngama̱ra̱ eina hangmi.
Chiwui thili Esauwui mathāmeikap kaji kachon chi ava̱va̱ Rebekahna haisāda anaomayara Jacobli ngavaimi,
kala mehui chi apāngli kala khanganaiya akahung pamli neimi;
kala ngama̱ra̱ kahai han eina khamui chi anaomayara Jacobwui pāngli sangmi.
Chieina ana avāva̱wuili zangda hānga, “Avā,” ana ngahānkai, “I hili leili, na khipakhala, inao?”
Jacobna avāva̱li hānga, “I nawui naochizai Esauna. Nana ili kakaso athishurda ina ngarānhaira; ara thuipamda iwui sā hi shailaga ili somilu.”
Kha Isaacna anaomayarali hānga, “Kathāda nana hiyākha thākta samphanghaokhala, inao?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Khikhalajila
Chieina Isaacna Jacobli hānga, “Rānganaimeilu, inao Esau kachangkhatkā maningmakhalada theikhavai ina mayutyangga.”
Chieina Jacobna avāva̱ Isaacli vākhanganai eina mayutyanglaga hānga, “Akhona Jacobwui khona, kha pānga Esauwui pāngna.”
Ama Esauwui pāng thāda ahā zārhaoda ali mamachukrarthuwa; chieina ali somihaowa.
“Na inaomayara Esaulākla?” da ngahāna.
“Mha, I alāka” da ngahānkai.
Chieina ana hānga, “Inaowui sā chi hili khuirālu kala ina shaida nali somira.” Chieina ali mida shai; kala drakhāra̱ khuirāmida manga.
Chiwui thili avāva̱ Isaacna ali hānga, “Ili rānganaida maya̱khuilu, inao.”
Chieina ana vānganaida ali maya̱ya; kala Esauwui chonngai nganamlaga somida hānga,
“Yanglu, inaomayarawui angai,
Varena kazingramwui ikra̱ nali tāmiranu,
kala ngaleiwui leithao mida heiun kala drakhāra̱ chungmeiranu.
kala yurbingna nali khayāshiranu.
Nachinā ngarāwuitungli akhavā sālu,
kala nashava̱wui naomayara ngarāna nali khayāshiranu.
Nali khonkashibing chili khonkashi ngasāranu,
kala nali sokhamibing sokhami ngasāranu.”
Isaacna Jacobli somicham kahai thili, kala Jacobna avāva̱ Isaacwui eina shokchamlaga, amei Esauna awui sā kharengwui eina ungrāsai.
Anala khangama̱ kashakazā ngarānlaga avāva̱li khuivāmi. Kala ana avāva̱li hānga, “Ili somi khavai ishāvāna ngakarthuida nanao mayarawui sārensā shairanu.”
Avāva̱ Isaacna ali hānga, “Na khipākhala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “I nanao mayara kharara Esauna.”
Chieina Isaacna kathirkazamda hānga, “Thakha na maungranglakha ili sārensā khuirāmida chi shaiserlaga ina somi kahaipā chi khipākhala?—mha, sokhami awui sāthuihaira.”
Esauna avāva̱wui tui chi kashā eina malungkangda panglāk eina chaplaga avāva̱li hānga, “Ilila kasomilu, O ishāva!”
Kha avāva̱na hānga, “Nagatona minamda, nawui sokhami chi rākhuithuihaira.”

Esauna hānga, “Ali Jacob da mashungrik eina maphokmimala? Kaja ana ili khani shida kateizāhaira. Ana iwui khararpam khuithuihaira; kala yanglu, aruila iwui sokhami khuithuihaira.” Chiwui thili ana hānga, “Iwui vang sokhami akhala mataimihaimala?”

Isaacna Esauli ngahānkai, “Yanglu, ina ali nawui akhavā sāngasakhaira, kala achinā ngarā saikora awui rao sākhavai mihaira, kala ali phaui khavai kashakazā eina drakhāra̱la ali miserhaira. Chithakha inao, nali ina khi sāmipairakhala?”
Esauna avāva̱li hānga, “Ishāvā, nawuili sokhami akhamāngla maleithurala? Ili kasomilu, ilila somiphalunglu, O avā.” Kala Esauna chapsasui panglāk eina chapa.
“Yanglu, na leithao khalei ngalei kala atungwui eina katā kazingramwui ikra̱wui eina lāchāda okthuira.
Nawui raighai eina nana ringra,
kala nachināli nana otram ngatha̱ra;
kha nana khanganur tharan,
awui kashai chi nakahungwui eina hortāhaora.”
Avāva̱na somi kahaiwui vang eina ara Esauna Jacobli ningkachaihaida akhalatta hānga, “Ishāvā thikida ara masāngmana, chiwui thili ina igato Jacobli sāthathaora.”
Kha anaomayara kharara Esauwui tui chi Rebekahli hānghaowa; chieina anaomayara khangano Jacobli vahokhui ngasaka, kala ana hānga, “Yanglu, namei Esau nali shaothatra da khamachukna akachang sāda lei.
Chiwui vang eina iwui kahāng nganālu, inaomayara; ngakarthuida Haranli khalei ipā Labanwuili yāmvāsālu,
kala nameiwui malungkhavāt mavānranglakha eina tangda awuili pamsālu;
nana ali khi sāhairakhala kaji malaihailaga awui malungkhavāt vānkahai tharān ina mi chihorāda nali chiwui eina houngra. Khiwui vang nani khanini thangkhali ina shimānthathuirakhala?”
Chieina Rebekahna Isaacli hānga, “Hit preiva̱bing hiwui vang eina I ning thenghaira. Jacobna ngalei hiwui hikatha Hit sha̱nao akhali ngakumsi kaja iwui mirinli kaphā khi leirakhala?”
Chiwui thili Isaacna Jacobli hokhui kala somida hānga, “Na Canaan ngalā akhalila makhuipaimara.
Ngakarthuilu, Paddan-aramli nashāva̱wui avāva̱ Bethuelwui shimkhurli vālu; kala nava̱wui apā Labanwui naongalāva̱ akhali akhuilu.
Pangshap sāshapa Varena nali somiranu kala athei matheida kachungkha mataisangmida nali miyur kahakva̱ ngasā ngasakranu.
Ana nali kala nawui ara̱-azāli Abrahamwui sokhami miranu; chithāda Abrahamli Varena mikahai nana yaokazat ram chi nawui ngasāranu.”
Chithāda sāda Isaacna Jacobli shivāthaowa; kala ana Jacob eina Esauwui ava̱ Rebekahwui apā Paddan-aramli khalei Arameanpā Bethuelwui naomayara Labanwuili vāhaowa.
Isaacna Jacobli somida “Canaan sha̱naoli mangakumpaimara” da hāngchitheilaga Paddan-aramli chihovāda chiwui sha̱nao khuikhavai Jacobli chihohaira kaji,
kala Jacobna ava̱ eina avāwui kahāng nganāda Paddan-aramli vāhaira kaji hi Esauna theihaowa.
Chieina Esauna Canaan sha̱naobingna avāva̱ Isaacli maringpha ngasakmana kaji theida,
apreiva̱ ngarā leilala Abrahamwui naomayara Ishmaelwui naongalāva̱ Mahalath, Nebaiothwui azarva̱li Esauna vākhui.
Jacobna Beer-sheba chihohailaga Haranshong vai.
Apam akhali vākashung eina zimik tunhaoda chithang ngayā chili pisanghaowa. Apam chiwui ngalung akha khuilaga awui khumkui sāda pizanga.
Kala ana mang akha shimanda ngaleiwui eina shairon akha ronkāda aton chi kazingram kāzokta shimana; kala yanglu, Varewui kazingraobingna kakākā katutung da thei!
Kala yanglu,

nawui ara̱-azā okathuiwui chifayākhara, kala nathumna zingtunshong kala zingshoshong kala atungshong eina azingshong vāpeira; kala na eina nawui ara̱-azāwui eina okathuiwui shimkhur saikorali sokhami ngasā ngasakra.
Yanglu, ina nali ngasomidalei, kala nawui khavāpam kachiva̱li thānmira, kala ngalei hili khuiungmiluishitra; kaja ina hāngkahai chi nali masāmiranglakha eina tangda mathāhaimara.”
Chiwui thili Jacobna thuimathukta hānga, “Kachangkhat eina
Kala a ngacheehaoda hānga, “Hi kayākha kachihum apamkhala! Hi khangatei apam maningla Varewui shimlaka, kala kazingramwui ngaveina.”
Jacobna ngathorthāk ngakarthuilaga ana khumkakui ngalung chi pākra̱ sāda shunlaga chiwuitungli thao heirora.
Apam chili Bethel da phokmi; kha keinung chiwui aming khareli Luz hosai.
Chieina Jacobna khangashit akha sāda hānga, “Varena ili ngasomida iwui kazazatpamli hithada thānmiakha, kala zākhavai kashakazā kala ngavai khavai kashankachon mida,
ishāvāwui shimli chingri eina hanung ngasakluiakha
kala ina pakra̱ sāda shunkahai ngalung hi Varewui shim sāra; kala nana ili khami saikorawui akhum tharā nali mira.”
Jacobna awui shongzā zatmamānda zingshoshong khalei mibingwui ngaleili vāshunga.
