Ana ngashānkhavā tharan, luili ra̱khong akha thei, kala yanglu, chiwui ngalemli yao ashangva̱ kathum khalei chi thei; kaja ra̱khong chiwui eina yaobing chili tara̱ sokmi. Ra̱khong chiwui lungsham chi kahakva̱na,
kala yao ashangva̱ saikora chili kazipkhui kahai tharan yao kahombingna ra̱khongwui lungsham chi khalangshoklaga yaobingli mimanga, kala mimang kahai thili lungsham chi shingluishita.
Jacobna athumli hānga, “Ichinā ngarā, nathum kachiwui eina kharākhala?” Athumna hānga, “Ithum Haranwui einana.”
Ana athumli, “Nathum Nahorwui naomayara Labanli matheikhala?” da khangahān eina “Theiya” da athumna hānga.
Ana athumli, “A ringphāda leila?” da ngahānlui. Athumna hānga, “Ringphāda lei; yanglu, awui naongalāva̱ Rachel yaobingli ngasoda ungrārāli!”
Ana, “Yanglu, arui ngashunlungna, seihom-un makāranga, tara̱ shimanlaga kaphāchizātfalu” da hānga.
Kha athumna, “Yao ashangva̱ saikora chi kazipkhuida ra̱khongwui lungsham hi makhalang shokakha tara̱ mashimanpaimana.” da ngahānkai.
Ana athumli ngazek mahunglakha Rachelna avāva̱wui yaobing chili homrārāsai; kaja ana chi kahomna.

Chieina ava̱va̱wui apa Labanwui naongalāva̱ Rachelli kala awova̱ Labanwui yaobingli kathei tharān, Jacobna vāda ra̱khongwui lungsham chi khalangshokmihailaga ava̱va̱wui apā Labanwui yaobingli tara̱ shimana.
Kala Jacobna Rachelli maya̱khuida panglāk eina chapa.
Kala Jacobna Rachelli a Labanwui theisāna, kala Rebekahwui naomayarana da hānga; kala ngalāva̱ china yongungda avāva̱li unghānga.
Labanna azarva̱wui nao Jacobwui pao kashā eina ali samphang khavai yongvai, kala ngavamkhuida maya̱khui, kala awui shimli thānunga. Jacobna shokkahai saikora chi Labanli hāngchithei,
kala Labanna ali hānga, “Kachangkhat eina na iwui ashee asāna!” Chithāda sāda ali kachāngkha ngasopama.
Chieina Labanna Jacobli hānga, “Na iwui theisāna kajiwui vang khalem eina otram ngatha̱pairala? Hānglu, nawui ngalāngman kayakharakhala?”
Chitharān Labanwui naongalāva̱ khani leisai; khararva̱li Leah kala khanganuiva̱li Rachel hoi.
Leahwui mik ningshāt kai, kha Rachelva asho-arep unglaka kala mathālaka.
Jacobna Rachelli leishihaoda hānga, “Nanao ngalāva̱ Rachelwui vang ina nali kum shini otram ngatha̱ra.”
Labanna hānga, “Ali mi khangateili khamiliva nali khamina phāmeikhara; ili ngasopamlu.”
Chiwui vang Jacobna kum shini Rachelwui vang eina otram ngatha̱mi, kha ali leikashiwui vang atam kasha̱nakhamāng thāhaowa.
Chiwui thili Jacobna Labanli hānga, “Iwui atam peihaira, ipreiva̱̱ sākhavai Rachel ili mihaolu.”
Chieina Labanna chiwui mibingli hokhuida zātkhān akha sāmi.
Kha ngazinshong Labanna anao ngalāva̱ Leahli Jacobwuili thānzangmida Jacobna ngasopihaowa.
(Leahwui rao sākhavai Labanna awui rao sha̱nao Zipah kahova chi mi).
Kha ngathorshong, yanglu, Leah sāsāhaowa; chiwui vang Jacobna Labanli hānga, “Nana ili khi kasākhala? Ina Rachelwui vang nali otram mangatha̱mala? Chithakha khiwui vang nana ili minamkhala?”
Labanna Jacobli hānga, “Khararva̱ mafathuiranglakha paishova̱ kathui iramwui khangachā maningmana.
Haptā hi peingasaklu, kala nana ili kum shini otram ngatha̱miluiakha akhapava̱la mira.”
Jacobna mayāda haptā chi kapei eina Rachelli preiva̱̱ sākhavai Jacobli mihaowa.
(Labanna awui rao sha̱nao Bilhah anao ngalāva̱ Rachelli mihaowa).
Chithāda sāda Jacobna Rachellila ngasopida Leahliva Rachelli leishimeihaowa, kala Labanli Rachelwui vang kum shini otram ngatha̱luishita.
Leahli maningkachāng chi theida
Leahna nao vaida naomayara akha pharai, kala aming Reuben hoi; kaja ana hānga, “Khikhalajila
Kala Leahna nao akha vailuishitta naomayara akha pharai, kala hānga, “Khikhalajila ili maleikashi hi
Latluida nao vailuishitta naomayara akha pharai, kala ana hānga, “Ara ina mayarnao kathum pharāhaira, mashoila igaharana ili yangphalungra”; chiwui vang awui ming Levi hoi.
Ana nao vailuishitta mayarnao akha pharai, kala hānga, “Ajawui hili ina
Rachelna nao mapharāthuda achonva̱li yuishihaowa; chieina Jacobli hānga, “Ili nao milu, maningakha I thihaora!”
Jacobna Rachelli malungvāthaoda hānga, “Ina Varewui pamli leida nawui naopamwui athei shungmikahaila?”
Chieina preiva̱na hānga, “Iwui rao Bilhah hili leili, ali ngasopida ana iwui vang nao pharāmiranu, chieina awui mangā eina ina nao leira.”
Chieina Rachelna rao Bilhahli apreiva̱ sākhavai mida Jacobna ngasopihaowa.
Bilhahna nao vaida mayarnao akha Jacobli pharāmi.
Chieina Rachelna hānga, “Varena mashungrik eina sāmihaira, kala iwui khon shāmida ili mayarnao akha mihaira”; chiwui vang aming Dan phokmi.
Rachelwui rao Bilhahna nao vailuishitta Jacobli mayarnao kakhane pharāmi.
Chieina Rachelna hānga, “Ishachonli panglāk eina ngaheida ina yuihaira”; chieina naowui ming Naphtali hoi.
Leahna naothei kuphaira da kathei tharān awui rao Zilpahli apreiva̱ sākhavai Jacobli mi.
Chiwui thili Leahwui rao Zilpahna Jacobli mayarnao akha pharāmi.
Kala Leahna hānga, “Ka̱lā khamahai!” Chiwui vang aming Gad phokmi.
Leahwui rao Zilpahna mayarnao kakhane pharāluishita.
Kala Leahna hānga, “I ringkaphava̱na! Kaja preinaobingna ili ringkaphava̱ hora”; chiwui vang aming Asher phokmi.
Kehu kahāt atamli Reubenna luili mandrake (ari-arai sākhavai thingnahyur) samphangda ava̱va̱ Leahli khuiungmi. Chieina Rachelna Leahli hānga, “Nanaomayarawui mandrake chi ilila khamilu” da poi.

Kha ana hānga, “Nana igahara ngapaithui kahai chi kapai otnada khuila? Inaowui mandrake hila khuiluiga kajila?” Rachelna hānga, “Chithakha nanaomayarawui mandrakewui vang aja ngayā ana nali ngasopipaira.”

Ngazinshong Jacob luiwui eina hankhaung tharān Leahna shoksamphangda hānga, “Na ili ngasopiphalungra, kaja inaomayarawui mandrake eina nali masākhuihaira.” Chiwui vang eina chithang ngayā ali ngasopi.
Varena Leahli phaningmida nao vaihaowa, kala Jacobli naomayara kaphangā pharāmi.
Leahna hānga, “Ina iwui rao igaharali khamiwui vang Varena iwui sāman mihaira”; chiwui vang aming Issachar phokmi.
Leahna nao vailuishita kala mayarnao katharuka pharāmi.
Chieina Leahna hānga, “Varena ili manho mathālak eina mihaira, ara igaharana ili khayāshihaora, kaja ali ina mayarnao tharuk pharāmihaira”; chiwui vang aming Zebulun phokmi.
Chiwui thili sha̱nao akha pharai, kala aming Dinah phokmi.
Chiwui thili Varena Rachelli phaningungda shākhamiwui vang awui naopam shomi.
Ana nao vaida mayarnao akha pharai, chieina ana hānga, “Varena iwui sui khuithuimihaira”;
kala ana aming Joseph phokmida hānga, “Varena ili mayarnao akha ngarumsangmiluiranu.”
Rachelna Josephli pharā kahaiwui thili Jacobna Labanli hānga, “Iwui shim kala iwui ngaleili ungkhavai chihomilu.
Ina otram ngatha̱kakhuiya ipreiva̱ ngarā kala naongarā ili mida zatngasakhaolu; kaja ina nali otram ngatha̱khami nana theihaira.”
Kha Labanna ali hānga, “Ina hāngkhangai akha lei, kaja nawui mangā eina
nawui pokhangai chotman chi polu, ina nali mira.”
Jacobna ali hānga, “Ina nali kathāda otram ngatha̱mihaira, kala nawui sha̱kei ina homda kayākha mataisanghaira kaji namāngna thei.
Kaja I marāranglakha kateokhamāng leisāmaya, kha ara sorngasaihaira; iwui otsak kachida Varena nali somi. Kha iwui shimkhurwui vangla katharān ngarangsangrakhala?”
Labanna hānga, “Nali khi milu jikhala?”
Jacobna hānga, “Ili khikhala mamilakmara; nana iwui vang chi sāmiakha I nawui yao homluishitra:

ili aja nawui sha̱kei ashangva̱ katonga yangvā ngasaklaga khākhanāng kala chukpom yaobing kala kazika yaonaobing kala khākhanāng mebing ngateida khaishok ngasakmilu; laga chikathabing chi iwui chotman sāra.

Chithāda sāda nana iwui chotman mikhavai rākhayang chitharān ina ning kathar eina kasā nana theihaora. Mewui ngachaili makhākhanang kala makachuk kala yaowui ngachaili makazik iwuili zangsaakha nawui leekakhuina jira.”
Labanna hānga, “Phālakhaira, nana kahāng chitharanu.”
Kha chithang Labanna khākhanang kala chukpom mevābing kala meva̱bing, kala kachar kakā kachiva̱, kazika yaonao kachiva̱ ngatei ngasakta, anaomayarali homngasaka;
kala aniwui matakli kathumthangwui shongzā tāda vahai ngasakhaowa; Labanwui khangatei ashang chi Jacobna hompama.
Chiwui thili Jacobna poplar, almond, kala khamatek thingphāng khuilaga thingkor hemhaida alungwui kachar chi theingasaka.
Hemkakhai thingbing chi sha̱keibingwui vang rungmi kahai tara̱lungli sangmihai. Sha̱keibingna tara̱ ungkhamang tharān ngalāthaokada,
thing chi katheiwui vang anao khānānglaga, kala chukpomlaga pharāhaowa.

Kala Jacobna yaonaobing chi ngatei ngasaka, kala yaobingli akhān kakhānangwuishong ngareivā ngasaka, kala kazikbing Labanwuishong ngareivā ngasakta awui ngateida homa; kala Labanwuili ngarumda masanghaimana.
Pangkhamei asā kaphābingna khangalāt tharān yaobingna theikhavai mangkhavai chili khākhanang thingbing chi Jacobna sangmihai,
kha asā makaphābing chili masangmihaimana; chithāda Labanwuina ngazanmei kala Jacobwuina pangmei.
Chithāda sāda mipā chi shānglakhaowa, kala sha̱keila chunglakhaowa; rao sha̱nao eina mayarnao, ut kala gadhā kachungkha leihaowa.
Labanwui naomayara ngarāna, “Ishavāwui khalei saikora Jacobna khuithuiserhaira; kala ishāvāwui eina kakhui china awui lan kachungkha mataisanghaira” da kahāng chi Jacobna shāhaowa.
Kala Labanna kharewui thāda ali ngahānkhangai maleithura da Jacobna thei.
Chiwui thili
Chieina Jacobna Rachel eina Leahli awui yao ashangva̱ hompam khavaipamli rākhavai ahokhui ngasakta,
anili hānga, “Navāna kharewui thāda ili ngahānkhangai chi maleithura. Kha ishāvāwui Varena ili ngasozatchingda lei.
Iwui yāng khalei saikora chigatta navāli otram ngatha̱khami nanina thei;
kha navāna ili minamda iwui chotman tharā shida ngacheimihaira, chithālala ana sākashi sākhavai Varena mamayāmana.
Ana, ‘Chukpoma saikora nawui chotman sāra’ jiakha katonga chukpomsera; kala ana ‘Khākhanang saikora nawui chotman sāra’ jiakha katonga khānāngsera.
Chithāda sāda navāwui sha̱kei katonga Varena khuithuihailaga ili mihaira.
Ngalat kachāngwui mangshongli ina ngashānkhayang chitharān mevā ngawok kazatabing chi khākhanang chukpomasera.
Chieina Varewui kazingraona mangshongli ili ‘Jacob’ da kaho eina ina, ‘I hili leili!’ da ngahānkai.
Kala ana hānga, ‘Namik kapeikāda yanglu, ashangvalungli ngawok kazata me saikora khākhanang, chukpomasera; kaja Labanna nali sāda khalei saikora ina theiserhaira.
Nana ngalung shunlaga thao neomida khangashit sākahai apam Bethelwui Varivara chi ina. Ara hiwui eina ngakarthuida nawui pharāsang khavai ramli hanungulu.’” da hānga.
Chieina Rachel eina Leahna ali ngahānkai, “Ishāvāwui shimli inina samphangkapai shimlui leila?
Ana inili yur katei thāda kakhui maningmala? Kaja ana inili yorhailaga chiwui pheisā chi yorzāpamda khaleina.
Ishāvāwui eina Varena khuithui kahai lan saikora chi iniwui kala naongarāwui ngasāhaira; ara chiwui vang eina Varena kahāng saikora chi sālu.”
Chieina Jacobna ngakarthuida anaomayara ngarā kala preiva̱ ngarāli uttungli chipama;
kala ana mathuisang kahai sha̱kei kala Paddan-aramli samkaphang sha̱kei lan saikora khuiphungda avāva̱ Isaacwui lam Canaan ngaleili latunghaowa.
Laban yaohah chichāp khavai vāhairasai, chieina Rachelna avāva̱wui shim meoma̱ liphunghaowa.
Arampā Labanli Jacobna thangmeimeihaowa kaja, ana yāmhaora kaji machishātlakmana.
Awui khalalei saikora khuiphunglaga yāmhaowa, kala Euphrates makānda Gilead phungreishong shanguwa.
Kakathumathang Labanli Jacob yāmhaira da kahāng eina,
ana awui theisābing thānphungda shinithang kharomda Gileadwui phungreili ali vānganaihaowa.
Kha Arampā Labanli Varena chithang ngayā awui mangshongli rāhānga, “Ning ngasharlu, kaphāranu kashiranu, Jacobli khituikha mahānglakalu.”
Labanna Jacobli angaphankhuiya. Chitharān Jacobna phungreipam akhali kachonshim sālaga leisai, kala Laban eina awui theisābingna Gileadwui phungreili apisanga.
Labanna Jacobli hānga, “Ina nali khi sahaoda hithāda mikhanamkhala, kala kachiwui vang inao ngarāli raituk thāda khuithui kahaikhala?
Khisāda nana pao machishātlakla ili minamda yāmhaokhala, ina nali ringkaphā khamathān laasak tingteilā eina chihomihaipaishina kajila?
Khiwui vang inaomayara ngarā kala inaongalava̱ ngarāli kapāng sāda mamaya̱khui ngasakthukhala? Hi na mangma̱lak eina sāhaira.
Nali ina sākashi sāga jilala sāshapa, kha navāwui Varena angayā ili rāhānga, ‘Ning ngasharlu, kaphāranu, kashiranu, na Jacobli khikha mahangphāphāpaimara!’ da.
Ara nana nashāvāwui shimli ungngailakhaoda nana zat kahaina, kha khiwui vang nana iwui meoma̱bing lithuihaokhala?”
Jacobna Labanli ngahānkai, “Khikhalajila nana nanaongarāli tandi eina ngapaithuihaipaishinada ngacheehaowa.
Nawui vare khuiphungkasāpā chi maringmara. Iwui theisāwui mangāli iwuili khalei nawuina kaji chi phāshoklu, kala chi khuilu.” Chitharan Rachelna liphungdalei kaji Jacob matheimana.
Chieina Labanna Jacobwui kachonshimli, Leahwui kālila, raopāva̱ khaniwui kālila zangyangserlaga khikha maleisāmana. Leahwui kachonshim eina shokta Rachelwuili zanga.
Rachelna shimwui varebing chi khuilaga utwui sāpān eina farorlaga ana kāpamshānhaowa. Labanna kachonshim saikora chili phāyanga, kha masamphangmana.
Avāva̱li Rachelna hānga, “Ina mangakarkathuiwui vang ishāmeina malung mavātmiranu, kaja sha̱naowui khangachā kazat chi ili leihaowa.” Chieina ana phālala shimwui varebing chi masamphangthuwa.
Chiwui thili Jacob malungvāthaoda Labanli khararra; Jacobna Labanli hānga, “Iwui khalāng khikhala? Khi morei leihaoda, hiyākha malungvātta kharomkharākhala?
Iwui ot katonga kapeoserhailala nawui shim ot khi samphangkhala? Nawui kala iwui theisābingwui mangāli chitheilu, athumna iniwui ngachaili bichar samiranu.
Kum maga̱ ina nali ngayurpamhaira; nawui yaova̱ kala meva̱ akha eina tangda nao tākahai maleiranga, kala nawui yaoshangwui eina yaovā akhanida ina shaikahai maleiranga.
Ramsāna shaihaisālala nawuili mashānsangla kashimān chi ina phunga; ngashunranu, ngayāranu leethuihaisālala chi iwui kashimān sai.
Chithāda sāda, ili ngashunwui kasāna kala ngayāwui kasikna pangshap shimān ngasaka, kapi eina tangda masamphangmana.
Kum maga̱ hi ina nawui shimli pamrāhaira; nanao ngalāva̱ khaniwui vang kum tharāda mati, kala sha̱keiwui vang kum tharuk nali otram ngatha̱rāhaira, kha nana iwui sāman tharāshida ngacheimihaira.

Ishāvāwui Vare, Abrahamwui Vare, kala Isaacna Khangachee Varena ili manganingmisi kaja nana makahatlakla ili khamasai eina shiunlakra. Iwui kakhanang kala ipāng eina ot kasā chi theida angayā nali Varena rākakaharna.”

Chiwui thili Labanna ngahānkāda Jacobli hānga, “Sha̱nao khani hi inao ngalāva̱ thathuiya, naoshinaobing hila inaosera, sha̱keibingla iwui sha̱keisera kala nana theida khalei saikora iwuisera. Kha inao ngalāva̱ khani kala anina pharākhui kahaibing hili ina aja khisaura?
Ralu, na eina I, ini tuingashit akha sāsa; kala khangashit hina iniwui ngachaili shākhi akha sāda leiranu.”
Chieina Jacobna ngalung akha eina pākra̱ sāda shuna.
Kala Jacobna awui theisābingli hānga, “Ngalunggui apongkhuilu,” chieina athumna ngalunggui kazipkhuida rihai akha khora; kala chiwui ngalemli phazāngaruma.
Labanna chili Jegar-sahadutha hoi: kha Jacobna Galeed hoi.
Labanna hānga, “Aja, rihai hina iniwui ngachaili shākhina.” Chiwui vang eina apam chili Galeed kahona,
kala pakra̱ hili Mizpah dala hoi, kaja ana hānga, “Inina ngateida pamngaroksālala,
“Nana inao ngalāva̱ khanili sāshida saakha, kala ani leilakha ngalā khangatei khuiakha, mi khipākha maleilala Varena na eina iwui ngachaili shākhina kaji mamalailakalu.”
Chieina Labanna Jacobli hānga, “Na eina iwui ngachaili ngalung shunkahai kala rihai khorkahai hi theilu.
Rihai eina pakra̱ hina shākhina, kaja ina nali makaphā sākhavai rihai kala pakra̱ hi mamakānmara, kala nanala ili makaphā sākhavai rihai eina pakra̱ hi mamakānpaimara.
Abrahamwui Vare, Nahorwui Vare, kala aniwui avāwui Varena iniwui ngachaili bichar sāranu.” Chieina Jacobna avāva̱ Isaacna Khangachee Vare ming eina tuingashit sai.
Kala Jacobna phungrei chili pha̱kaphayā chigatta ashi shimkhurli phazāngaruma; athumna phazāngarumda ngayā pongda phungreitung chili pama.
Labanna ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuida awui ara̱ngarā eina naongalāva̱ khanili maya̱khuida athumli kasola somi; kala chiwui thili pākngarokta shimli hanunghaowa.
Jacobna zatmamānda leilakha Varewui kazingraobingna ali samphanga;
kala Jacobna athumli kathei eina ana hānga; “Hi Varewui raimibingna!” Chiwui vang ana apam chiwui aming Mahanaim hoi.
Kala Edom ngaleili khalei Seir kaho ram, ashāmei Esau khaleipamli Jacobna rida paomebing chihovai,
kala athumli hithāda hānga, “Nathumna ishāmei Esauli hithada ahāngra: Nawui rao Jacobna hithāda hānga, ‘Ina Labanwuili aja rāshungda apam kahaina;
kala ina mukkā, gadhā, sha̱kei, rao mayarnao sha̱nao kachungkha lei; nawui mikyanli lukhamashan samphang khavai ameili hi hāngkhavai ina kachihona.’”
Paomebing china latungda Jacobli hānga, “Nashamei Esauli samphanga, ana nali samphang khavai mi shāmati ali ngasophungda rārāda lei.”
Chieina Jacob ngacheelakhaowa kala wukkhananglakhaowa; kala ali ngasokazat mibing chi ana ngayarpakhaowa, awui sha̱kei kala utbing chi akhum khani sāda ngayarkhai;
ana phaninga, “Esauna rālaga akhum akha hi shimān ngasakhailala, khangatei akhum akha hi taishokpaira.”
Chieina Jacobna hānga, “O ishāvā Abrahamwui Vare, kala ishāvā Isaacwui Vare; O
nana narao ili hiyākha leikashi, mayonkhami hi iwui matik maningmana, ina khāmshui singlaga Jordan kānhaira, ara iwui khalalei katonga khum khani sāhaira.
Ishamei Esauwui pāng eina ili huimilu da ina nali poli, kaja I ali ngacheeya, naoshinaobing kala preiva̱ ngarā ithum saikorali ana rālaga shaothathaipai.
Kha nana, ‘ina nali kaphā sāmira, kala nawui ara̱-azā mashānkharar shamadruwui situiyākha ngayāra’ da hānga.”
Chieina chithang ngayā chili pisanga, kala ana khuikaphungwui eina ameiva̱ Esauli mikhavai khangarān sāda,
me ava̱ shākhani, avā maga̱, yao ava̱ shākhani, yaovā maga̱,
ut ana̱ kasur anao eina ngasoda thumra, seiva̱ hangmati eina mukkā tharā, gadhā ava̱ maga̱ eina avā tharā khuishoka.
Hibing hi ana awui raobingwui pāngli sangmida hānga, “Iwui mangāli zatlu, kala asum asum eina mataklaga zatlu.”
Rimeikapta kahomapa chili ana hāngchithei, “Ishamei Esauna nali rāsamkaphang tharan, ‘Khipāwui mikhala? Kali vanikhala? Hi khipāwui vangkhala?’ da ngahānakha,
nana ‘Hi narao Jacobwuina; hibing hi ishāmei Esauli thada mikhavaina; kala ala ithumwui khanukli zatta lei’ da ngahānkālu.”
Ana hi tākam eina kakhanelila, kakathumalila kala chiwui thili homkazatbing saikorali tamchitheida, “Nathumna Esauli samkaphang chitharān ngaraichāda hāngserra,

kala, ‘Chili lāngda narao Jacobla khanukli zatta lei’ da hānglu.” Kaja ana phaninga, “Iwui mangāli ali miki kaji pāngrān china malung nemhaora, kala chiwui thili ali samphangnaora; hithāda ana ili mayāmira.”
Chithāda miki kajibing chi awui mangāli thuingasakhaowa; kala a chithang ngayā chili pihaowa.
Chithang ngayā ana ngakarthuida apreiva̱ khani, rao khani, kala awui nao tharāda akha khuiphungda Jabbok kong makānkai.
Ana athumli thānvāda kong makānda shivāthaowa, kala awui khalalei katongala chihokāserhaowa.
Jacobmāng pamhaowa; kala kazing kathang eina tangda mi akhana ali rāngatuka.
Mi china Jacobli mayuirarthura kaji theilaga ngatukmamānda Jacobwui shaksha̱ shimetshokmihaowa.
Chieina mi china hānga, “Kazing thangki jihaira, ili chihohaolu.”
Kha Jacobna hānga, “Ili nana masomiranglakha eina tangda nali mathui ngasakmara.”
Chieina ana Jacobli ngahāna, “Nawui aming khipā hokhala?” Ana “Jacob” hoi da hānga.
Chieina ana hānga, “Nawui ming Jacob maholuimara, kha Israel hora, kaja nana Vare eina mikumoli nganurda nana yuihaira.”
Chieina Jacobna ngahāna, “Nawui ming hāngmilu, ina kapona.” Kha ana hānga, “Khiwui vang eina nana iwui ming ngahānkhala?” Kala chili ana Jacobli somi.
Chiwui vang eina Jacobna apam chiwui aming Peniel phokmida hānga, “Kaja ina Vareli mai eina mai ngasunda kathei samphanghaira, thalala iwui mirin kanmihaira.”
Awui shaksha̱ shokhaida phei ngasongda Peniel kakān tharān zimik shokhairasai.
Chiwui vang eina aja eina tangda Israelnaobingna ashaksha̱ phonkhavai anonān chi mashaimana, kaja ana Jacobwui shaksha̱ shimet khamili chiwui anonānli singza̱haowa.
Jacobna ngashankhavā tharān yanglu, mi shāmati Esauli ngasoda rārāsai. Chieina ana naoshinaobing chi Leah eina Rachel kala raopava̱ khani da athumli ngayarmihaowa.
Ana raopava̱ khani eina athumwui naobing chi mangāli ringasaka, chiwui thili Leah eina awui naobing kala Rachel eina anaomayara Joseph naoda zatngasaka.
A khalattana athumwui mangāli zatta amali mavānganairanglakha eina tangda ngaleili shini shida ngakhumshāma.
Kha Esauna ali samphang khavai ngasamrai, kala ngavamkhui, kala kahungli hungreikhuida maya̱laga ani chapa.
Esauna yangkāda preinaobing kala naoshinaobing chi kathei eina ngahāna, “Nali khangasobing hi khipālongkhala?” Jacobna hānga, “Naraoli Varena lumashanmida khami naongarābingna.”
Chieina raopava̱ khani eina aniwui naongarābingna rānganaida ngakhumzanga;
Leah eina awui naongarābingla chi tākam eina sai; kala naolak eina Rachel eina Josephna rānganaida ngakhumsanga.
Esauna hānga, “Ili rākhangarok ashangbing china khi kakhalatkhala?” Jacobna ngahānkai, “Ishameina lumashanmi khavai kasāna.”
Kha Esauna hānga, “Igato, iwuila kashap leiya, nawuili khalei chi nawui vang haihaolu.”

Jacobna hānga, “Maningmana, ina nali kapona, nawui mangāli ili lukhamashan leiakha iwui pāng eina nali khami hi khuimilu; kaja kachangkhat eina nazak kathei hi Varewui zak kathei thāhaira, nana ili hiyākha lumashanmida rāsamphang khami hi.
Iwui kachigat hi kakhuimiphalunglu da ina nali kapona, kaja Varena ili mathālak eina yangmihaira, chiwui vang ila leishap leihaira.” Hithāda ana hānglui hānglui kaji eina Esauna khuihaowa.
Chiwui thili Esauna hānga, “Ithumwui shongzā zatphokusa, ina nawui mangāli zatka.”

Kha Jacobna ali hānga, “Ishameina thei, kaja naoshinaobing hi mazattheimana, kala seinao ana̱ khamangla zanghaoda ngasharda homzatra; kalikhada thangkha pangna zathaiakha sha̱keibing hi kathila thihaora.
Ishameina narao ili rida zatsahaolu; ina athumli ngairon eina thānda sha̱keiwui kala naoshinaobingwui shongzā athishurda ishameiwui pam Seir chili ungrāsanaoga.”
Chieina Esauna hānga, “Ili ngasokazat mibing kaikha nali haimiga.” Kha Jacobna hānga, “Khi savaiurakhala? Nana ili lumashankhami hina vaimalu.”
Chithāda sāda Esauna aram Seirli latunghaowa.
Kha Jacobna Succothli vāda, awui vangla, sha̱keiwui vangla shimnao asākhui, chiwui vang apam chiwui aming Succoth hoi.
Kala Jacobna hapkakhano maleilakla Shechemli vāshunga, apam chi Paddan-aramwui eina ungakha Canaan ngaleili lei, kala keinung mavāshungnāla apama.
Ana awui kachonshim khāngkhaningkakā apam chi Shechemwui avāva̱ Hamorli lupāsā shākha mida lokhui.
Chili ana hanphut akha sakāda chiwui aming El-Elohe-Israel hoi.
Leahna kapharā Jacobwui naongalāva̱ Dinahna ram chiwui sha̱naobingli yaothuivai;
kala Hivpa Hamorwui naomayara Shechem, ram chiwui wungnao china Dinahli kathei eina shimenkhuida ngasopimihailaga maishi ngasaka.
Jacobwui naongalāva̱ Dinahli ningchānghaowa; kala leishilakhaoda ana ngahuiri eina khararchān sai.
Chiwui vang Shechemna avāva̱ Hamorli hānga, “Sha̱naopava̱ hi ipreiva̱ sākhavai khuimilu.”
Jacobna anaongalāva̱ Dinahli sākhamāngmihaira kaji shāhaowa; kha anao mayara ngarāva seihomphungli awui sei hompamsāhaoda athum maungranglakha kasaikha pamsai.
Kala Shechemwui avāva̱ Hamorna Jacobli ngazek khavai vai.

Pao hi kashā eina Jacobwui naomayara ngarāna seihomphungwui eina unga; athum ning thurlakhaowa kala malungvātlakhaowa, kaja Jacobwui naongalāva̱li hikathā kasā hi Israelli kachipatna, hikathā otsak masārānmana.
Kha Hamorna athumli hānga, “Inaomayara Shechemwui ning nanao ngalāva̱māngli leihaira; ina seiha kasāna, ali ngakum khavai mihaolu.
Ithum ngalā ngakhotsa; nathumwui ngalānaobing ithumli milu, kala nathumla ithumwui ngalānaobing khuilu.
Chithāda nathumna hili pamda, ngalei hila nathumli chikāra; ram hili pamda leih sālaga lan mathuisangkhuilu.”
Shechemnala Dinahwui avāva̱ kala amei ngarāli hānga, “Ili nathumwui mikyanli khaleishimilu, kala nathumna kahahāng saikora ina sāmira.
Manho mikhangayi nathumna kapo chiwui athishurda ina mira; ngalāva̱ hi ipreiva̱ sākhavai vangmāng ili khamilu.”
Jacobwui naomayara ngarāna Shechem eina avāva̱li minamda ngahānkai, kaja athumwui azarva Dinahli yansaimihaowa.
Athumna anili hānga, “Ahui marimkashokbingli ithumwui azarva khami hi masākapai otna, kaja hi ithum maishi khavaina.
Apong himāngli ithumna mayāra: chiya, nathumla ithumwui thāda nathumwui mayarnao kachiva̱ ahui rimshokhaolu.
Chiwui thili ithumwui nao ngalāva̱bing nathumli mira, kala nathumwui naongalāva̱ ngarāla ithumna khuira, ithumna nathumli panrumda ithum miyur akha sāra.
Kha nathumna ithumli manganāmada ahui marimshokakha ishiwui naongalāva̱ khuiphungda thuihaora.”
Athumwui tui china Hamor eina anaomayara Shechemli ningyāng ungngasakhaowa.
Yaronpa china ahui rimkashok chi kapan maleila sāhaowa, kaja ana Jacobwui naongalāva̱li ningchangnahaowa. Chitharan nao hi ashi shimkhur saikorawui ngachaili khayākālak eina leisai.
Chiwui vang Hamor eina anaomayara Shechemna keinung chiwui ngaveili unglaga keinungli khalei mibingli hānga,
“Mibing hi ithumli ngahānngailakta lei; athumla ithumwui ramli pamda leih sāranu, kaja yanglu, ram chi athumwui vang shaptaira; ithum eina athum ngalā ngakhotsa.
Miyur akha sāda pamrum khavai apong akhamāng eina athumna mayāra jihaira: chiya, athumna ahui rimkashok thāda ithumwui mayarnao kachiva̱la ahui rimshokphalungra.
Athumwui sha̱kei, kala lan saikora ithumwui mangasāmarala? Chiwui vang eina athumna ithumli ngasopam khavai mayāhaosa.”
Ngaveili khavā mi saikorana Hamor eina anaomayara Shechemwui kahāng mayāda chili khavā mayarnao saikora ahui rimshokhaowa.
Kakathumathang athumna ningchotmahunglakha Jacobwui naomayara khani, Dinahwui amei Simeon eina Levina, aniwui raighai khuiphungda ngathumda keinungli zanglaga mayarnaobing saikora sāthatserhaowa.
Anina Hamor eina anaomayara Shechemli raighai eina sāthathailaga ashi shimwui eina Dinahli khuiphungda thuihaowa.
Kala Jacobwui naomayara ngarāna sāthat kahaitungli vāda keinung chi sakathānmiserhaowa; kaja azarva̱li yansaimihaowa;
athumwui yao, sei, gadhā kala keinungli khalei, luili khalei saikora;
athumwui lan, naoshinaola, preinaola shimli khalei saikora athumna ngaponthuihaowa.

Chiwui vang Jacobna Simeon eina Levili hānga, “Nanina iwuitungli kakhanang mida ram hili khaleibing Canaannao kala Periznaobingna ili chamalā khavai nanina retsangmihaira; iwui mi kateokhamānga, athum kazipkhuilaga ili rākaiakha, ili sāshimānhaora, I kala iwui shimkhur khanini shimānhaora.”
Kha athumna hānga, “Ana izarva̱li khayorsha̱nao thāngasakpaila?”
Chiwui vang Jacobna awui shimkhur kala ali khangasobing saikorali hānga, “Nathumwui alungli khalei ayar mibingwui varebing horserhaolu, kala nathum khalatta tharmathengda kashankachon shinhaolu;
chiwui thili ithumna Bethelli shangda ina chotchānglakha ili ngahānkākhame, kala iwui kazazatli ngasokhame Vare chili ina hanphut akha sāra.”
Chieina athumwui pāngli khalei varebing kala khanāli sinā-unra̱ ngathetkasā saikora Jacobli mihaowa kala Jacobna Shechem nganaili khalei shirimthingpheili thumhaowa.
Athumna zatmamānlakha, athumli kuimareida khalei keinungbingwuitungli Varewui eina khangachee akha tāshunghaowa, chiwui vang Jacobwui naomayara ngarāli mangahomthuwa.
Kala Jacobla ashi katonga Canaanli khalei Luzli (chiya Bethel) vāshunga,
chili ana hanphut akha sāda apam chili El-Bethel hoi, kaja ashameiwui eina ana yāmzatlakha chili Varena rāchithei.
Rebekahwui nurse Deborah apam chili thihaowa, kala Bethelwui azingshong shirimthing akhawui azingli chifahaowa; chiwui vang apam chili Allon-bacuth hoi.
Paddan-aramwui eina khaung tharān Varena Jacobli rāsamphangluishita, kala somi.
Varena ali hānga, “Nawui ming Jacobna, kha ara Jacob maholuimara, kha Israel hi nawui ming sāra” chiwui vang awui aming Israel hoi.
Kala Varena ali hānga, “I Pangshapa Varena; athei matheida mataisanglu; yur kahaka, mi ashangva̱ nawui eina shokra, kala awungabing nawui eina shokra.
Abraham eina Isaacli khami ram chi ina nali mira, kala nawui thili ram chi nawui ara̱-azāli ina mira.”
Chiwui thili ali ngazek khavai pam chiwui eina Varena kāhaowa.
Chān ngazek khavai pam chili Jacobna ngalung akha shunhaida ngalungtung chili ra̱shakla thaola heirora.
Chiwui vang Vareli chan ngazek khavai apam chiwui aming Jacobna Bethel phokmi.
Chiwui thili athumna Bethelwui eina zatmamāna; athumna Ephrathli mavāshungnāla, katāda leilakha, Rachel nao ra̱haoda chotlakhaowa.
Ana chotlak eina leilakha naosak kasingva̱ china hānga, “Mangangalu, na mayarnao akha pharāluira.”
Ana thivānanai (kaja a thihaowa) ana nao chiwui aming Ben-oni phokmi; kha avāva̱na awui ming Benjamin hoi.
Chithāda sāda Rachel thihaowa, kala ali Ephrathwui (chiya, Bethlehem) shongfali chifahaowa,
kala Jacobna awui chikhurtungli pakra̱ akha shunhai; aja eina tangda khalei ngalung shunkahai chi Rachelwui chikhurna.
Israelna zatvāmamānda Eder kānda apama.
Israelna ram chili pamlakha Reubenna avāva̱wui angashirva Bilhahli ngasopihaowa; kala chi Israelna shāhaowa.
Jacobwui nao mayarnao tharāda khanina.
Leahwui naomayarabing: Reuben (Jacobwui naochizai), Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, kala Zebulun.
Rachelwui naomayarabing: Joseph eina Benjamin.
Rachelwui raopava̱ Bihahna kapharā: Dan eina Naphtali.
Leahwui raopava̱ Zilpahna kapharā: Gad eina Asher. Hibing hi Paddan-aramli leilakha Jacobna pharākakhui naomayara ngarāna.
Hitharan Isaacwui kum shākha hangchishat kāhairasai.
Kala Isaacna khanaowa khaksui ngachanghaowa; ana rarlak eina thi, kala awui awo-ayibingwuili vāhaowa; kala anaomayara Esau eina Jacobna ali chifahaowa.
Hi Esau (chiya, Edom) wui naotunbingna.
Esauna Canaanlā khui: Hitpa Elonwui naongalāva̱ Adah, Hivpā Zibeonwui naomayara Anahwui naongalāva̱ Oholibamah,
kala Nebaiothwui azarva̱, Ishmaelwui naongalāva̱ Basemath.
Adahna Esauli Eliphaz pharāmi; Basemathna Reuelli pharai;
kala Oholibamahna Jeush, Jalam, kala Corahli pharai. Athumhi Esauna Canaanli leilakha kapharāna.

Chiwui thili Esauna apreiva̱ ngarā, naomayara ngarā, kala naongalāva̱ ngarā, awui shimkhur mibing, sei, sha̱kei, ana Canaanramli samkaphang lan saikora khuiphunglaga, agato Jacobwui eina ram khangateili vāhaowa.
Kaja aniwui sha̱kei chungnā leikahaiwui vang anina kapam apam chili mapamrumpaithuwa.
Chiwui vang Esauna Edomwui Seir phungrei ngaleili apanhaowa; Esau Edomna.
Seir phungreili Edomnaobingwui avāva̱ Esauwui naotunbing hina.
Hi Esauwui naomayara ngarāwui amingna: Esauwui preiva̱ Adahwui naomayara Eliphaz, Esauwui preiva̱ Basemathwui naomayara Reuel.
Eliphazwui naomayara ngarā chi Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam, kala Kenaz athumna.
(Timnana Esauwui naomayara Eliphazwui angashirva̱na; ana Eliphazli Amalek pharāmi). Athum hi Esauwui preiva̱ Adahna kapharā naomayara ngarāna.
Hibing hina Reuelwui naomayara ngarāna: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, kala Mizzah athumna. Hi Esau preiva̱ Basemathwui naomayara ngarāna.
Esauwui preiva̱ Zibeonwui naomayara Anahwui naongalāva̱ Oholibamahwui naomayara ngarā: ana Jeush, Jalam kala Corahli pharai.
Esauwui naomayara ngarāwui shangbing chi hina; Esauwui naomayara naochizai Eliphazwui naomayara khararbing chi Teman, Omar, Zepho, Kenaz,
Corah, Gatam kala Amalek athum hina; Edom ngaleili Eliphaz shangwui wungva̱bingna, kala athum hi Adahwui naomayarabingna.

Athum hi Esauwui naomayara Reuelwui naomayarabingna: khararabing chi Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, kala Mizzah hina; athum hi Edomwui ramli Reuelwui khararabing china; athum hi Esauwui preiva̱ Basemathwui naomayarabingna.
Athum hi Esau preiva̱ Oholibamahwui naomayarabingna: khararbing chi Jeush, Jalam, kala Corahna; athum hi Esauwui preiva̱ Anahna kapharā khararbingna.
Hibing hi Esau (chiya, Edom)wui naomayarabingna, kala athumwui khararabingna.
Dishon, Ezer, kala Dishan hina; Edom ngaleili khalei Seirwui naomayarabing Horwui khararabingna.
Lotanwui naomayarabing chi Hori eina Hemanna; kala Lotanwui azarva̱ Timnana.
Hibing hi Shobalwui naomayarabingna: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shepho, kala Onam.
Hi Zibeonwui naomayarabingna: Aiah eina Anah; avāva̱ Zibeonwui gadhābing homlakha lamhāngli ura̱-kasā phakakhui chi Anahna.
Hi Anahwui naomayarabingna: Dishon kala Oholibamah Anahwui naongalāva̱.
Hi Dishonwui naomayarabingna: Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran, kala Kheran hina.
Hi Ezerwui naomayarabingna: Bilhan, Zaavan kala Akan.
Hi Dishonwui naomayarabingna: Uz eina Aran.
Athum hi Horbingwui khararabingna: khararabing chi Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
Dishon, Ezer, kala Dishan hina; Seirwui ramli athum shangwui athishurda, athum hi Horbingwui khararabingna.
Beorwui naomayara Belana Edomli mungsai, kala awui keinungli Dinhabah hoi.
Bela thihaoda awui pamli Bozrahwui Zerahwui naomayara Jobabna munga.
Jobab thihaida Teman ngaleiwui Hushamna awui pam khui.
Husham thihaida Moab ngaleiwui Midianli khayuiya Bedadwui naomayara Hadadna munga kala awui keinung aming Avith hoi.
Hadad thihaida awui pamli Masrekahwui Samlahna munga.
Samlah thihaida awui pamli Euphratesli khalei Rehobothwui Shaulna munga.
Shaul thihaida awui pamli Achborwui naomayara Baal-hananna munga.
Achborwui naomayara Baal-hanan thihaida awui pamli Hadarna munga; kala awui keinungwui aming Pau hoi; Mezahabwui naongalāva̱ Matredwui naongalāva̱ Mehetabel chi apreiva̱wui mingna.
Shimkhurwui kala apam apam athishurda Esauwui khararabingwui aming chi hina: khararabing chiya Timna, Alvah Jetheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magtiel, kala Iram hina; athumwui pamkhavai aming athishurda hi Edom (chiya, Esau, Edomwui avāva̱) wui khararabingna.
Avāva̱ Jacobna kha̱mi thada somkasā Canaan ngaleili Jacobna apāna.
Hi Jacobshi shimkhurwui thotchānna.

Josephna kum tharāda shini kāshunguda achinā ngarāli ngasoda yao homa; avāva̱wui apreiva̱̱ Bilhah eina Zilpahwui naomayarabingli ngachona; kala Josephna achinā ngarāwui makaphā chanpao avāva̱li unghānga.
Asārlam kapharāwui vang Israelna Josephli leishimeithuiya kala phahon katum apāng kasang akha khopmi.
Kha awui amangarāli lāngda avāva̱na Josephli leishimei kaji kathei tharān ali yangkharinghaowa kala ali mathāda mangazekngaimana.
Chitharān Josephna mang akha shimana, kala ana chi achinā ngarāli kahāng eina athumna ali mataimeida yangkharinghaowa.
Ana athumli hānga, “Ina mang kashiman hi nganāmilu:
ithumna luili māmazān atansai, kashuirak eina iwui māmazān chi thuinganingshinghaowa; kala yanglu, nathumwui mamazānbing china kuimareida rākaziplaga iwui māmazān chili rākhoruma.”
Achinangarāna ali hānga, “Nana ithumli mungra kajila? Maningakha ithumli nana singyuira kajikhala?” Athumna awui mang kala tuimatui chiwui vang yangkharingmeiluihaowa.
Chiwui thili ali mang khangatei akha shimanda chi achinā ngarāli hānglui, “Yanglu, ili mang akha shimanluiya; kaja zimik, kachāng, kala sirā tharāda akhana ili khorumsai.”

Kha ana avāva̱ kala achināngarāli kahāng tharān avāva̱na khararda hānga, “Nali kashiman mang hi khimangkhala? Nashava̱ ini kala nachinābingna nawui mangāli ngaleili ngakhumshāmsangda nali khayāshiserra kajila?”
Chieina achinā ngarāna ali yuishihaowa, kha mang chi avāva̱na awui ningli haihai.
Chitharān achinā ngarā Shechem ngalemli avāva̱wui sei ahompamhaowa.
Israelna Josephli hānga, “Nachinā ngarā Shechemli sei homda khalei maningmala? Ralu, ina nali athumwuili chihovara.” Ana hānga, “I hili leili.”
Chieina avāva̱na hānga, “Vālaga nachinā ngarā kala sei ashangva̱ kathalikhala kaji ili pao unghāngluishitlu.”
Chieina ali Hebron tampākwui eina chihoda ana Shechemli vāshunga.
Ana luili ma̱zatlakha mi akhana ali samphangda ngahāna, “Na khi phāzatlikhala?”
“I ichinā ngarāli phākazatna, athum sei kali hompamlikhala, ili kahāngmilu.” da ana hānga,
Mi china hānga, “Athum thuihaira, kaja athumna ‘Dothanli vausa’ da kahāng ina shai.” Chieina achinā ngarāwui thi shurvāda Josephna athumli Dothanli samphanga.
Athumna ali katāvawui eina thei, kala athumli marānganairanglakha ali sāthat khavai mithit khalen sāhaowa.
Athum akha eina akha ngazek ngaroka, “Mang kashimanpa chi rārāli.
Rālu, ithumna ali shaothathailaga khorchop akhali horsanghaosa, laga ali ramsāna shaikahaina jihaosa, awui mang chi khi shoknikhala yangkhuisa.”
Kha Reubenna tui chi kashā chitharān ana athumwui pāng eina kankhui khavai hānga, “Ithumna awui manglā makhuiasa.”

Reubenna athumli hānga, “Ashee matā ngasaklu; lamhāng hiwui khorchop akhali horsanghaolu, kha awuitungli pāng masāza̱lu”; kaja athumwui pāng eina kankhuida ali avāva̱wuili khuiungmiluira da phaningsai.
Chieina Josephna awui achinā ngarāwuili vākashung tharān, athumna awui phahon katuma pāngkasānga chi raimihailaga
ali khorchop akhali horsanghaowa. Khorchop chi tara̱ mazangla katheng eina leisai.
Chiwui thili athumna phazā khavai pamzanga; athumna yangkhavā chitharān Gilead eina Ishmaelnaobing gum, khaneithei, myrrh phungda Egyptli phungtākida athumwui ut thānphungda rārāsai.
Chieina Judahna achināngarāli hānga, “Ithumna ithumwui achināli sāthatlaga awui ashee thumhaida khi kānkhanā leikhala?
Yanglu, ali Ishmaelnaobingli yorsanghaosa, ithumwui pāng masāza̱asa, kaja a hi ithumwui achinā kala ithumwui asālaka.” Achinā ngarāna awui tui khui.
Midiawui leihkhalonbingna athumli rākakān eina athumna khorjopwui eina Josephli khāngshokkhuilaga Ishmaelnaobingli lupāsā shekel maga̱ eina yorhaowa; kala athumna Josephli Egyptshong khuivāhaowa.
Reubenna khorchop chili ungkhayang chitharān Joseph maleikasa eina awui kachon serkhākta,
achināngarāwuili latungda hānga, “Nao chi maleithura, I kathāurakhala?”
Chiwui thili athumna Josephwui phahon chi khuilaga me sāthatlaga chiwui asheeli rura;
kala athumna phahon katuma apāng kasānga chi khuiphungda avāva̱li khuiungchitheida hānga, “Hi ithumli leisai; yanglu hi nanaowui phahonka maningmakhala?”
Avāva̱na machuthaoda hānga, “Hi inaomayarawui phahonna; ramsāna shaikahaira; Josephli serkazamlakhaira.”
Chieina Jacobna awui kachon serkhaklaga borashi shanneilaga zimiksho sha̱rākhathang Josephwui vang chapngachai.
Anaomayara kala naongalāva̱ ngarāna ali suikaphanep chi mamayāmada hānga “Maningmana, I sifada Kathewui ramli inaowuili vaura.” Chithāda avāva̱na awui vang chapa.
Lākhashong Midianaobing Josephli Egypt ngaleili Pharaohwui raimi akhavā Potiphar kaho chili yorsanghaowa.
Atam chitharān Judahna achinā ngarāwui eina thuihaida Hirah kaho Adullamwui mi akhali vai.
Chili Judahna Canaan ngalā akha Shua hoda chili asamphangda ani ngakuma,
ana nao vaida mayarnao akha pharai, kala awui aming Er hoi.
Ana nao vailuishitta mayarnao akha pharālui, kala awui aming Onan hoi.
Latluida nao mayarnao akha pharai, kala awui aming Shelah hoi. Ali kapharā tharān Chezibli pamsai.
Judahna awui nao kharara Erli ngalā khuimi, chipava̱wui aming Tamar hoi.
Kha Judahwui nao kharara Er hi
Chiwui thili Judahna Onanli hānga, “Nachināwui preiva̱li zangngasopilu, kala achināna sāmiran chi sāda nachināwui naotun leingasaklu.”
Kha Onanna nao chi awui mangasāmara kaji theida achinā preiva̱li ngasopi kachida achināwui nao malei khavai da ana pha̱ra̱ chi ngaleili tāngasakhaowa.
Ana kasā otsak china

Chiwui thili Judahna arihāva̱ Tamarli hānga, “Inaomayara Shelah mararranglakha eina tangda rameiva̱ sāda navāwui shimli pamsālu”— kaja achinā kateibing thāda ala thihaipaishina da ngacheehaowa. Chiwui vang Tamarna ungda avāva̱wui shimli pamhaowa.
Khaleilaga Judahwui preiva̱, Shuawui naongalāva̱ thihaowa; Judahna wuk-kakhanang vankahaiwui thili awui ngasotnao Adullamwui Hirahli ngasoda Timnahli awui yaohah kachichapbingwuili shanga.
Tamarli, “Nawo Timnahli awui yao ahah kachichāp shangrārādalei” da kahāng eina,
awui ra̱mei kachon khuishokhailaga kuirunkhui, laga khangatei sāri shaksālaga Timnahwui shongfali khalei, Enaim zangkhavaili vāpama; Shelah rarhaira kaji ana thei kha ali mangakum ngasakthuwa.
Judahna ali kathei tharān, kuirunlaga leisahaoda khayorva̱ sha̱naonada phaninghaowa.
Judahna shongfa ayar chili vālaga ali, “Ralu, ini ngasopisa,” da ahānga, kaja arihāva̱na kaji matheithuwa. Ana hānga, “Ili ngasokapiman nana khi mirakhala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Ina yao ashangva̱wui eina yaonao akha chihorāra.” Chieina ana hānga, “Nana yaonao chi machihorāranglakha khangashit akha sālu.”
Ana hānga, “Khi ngashitlu jikhala?” Ana ngahānkai, “Nawui mahor namkhavai khutop, shanneira̱, kala nawui khāmshui chi hamlu.” Chieina ana mihaowa kala ngasopida nao vaihaowa.
Chiwui thili arihāva̱ china ngakarthuida unghaowa, kala awui kuirun khavai chi khuishokhailaga awui rameiva̱ sāri chi ngavaikhuia.
Judahna awui hamkahai otbing chi hankhui khavai Adullampali yaonao chi chihokhavā tharān sha̱naopava̱ chili masamphangthuwa.
Chieina ana apam chiwui mibingli ngahāna, “Enaim shongfapheili pamkasā khayorva̱̱ chi kali leikhala?” Athumna hānga, “Hili khayor sha̱nao maleisāmana.”
Chieina ana Judahli unghānga, “Sha̱naopava̱ chi masamphangmana; kala chiwui mibingnala, ‘Hili khayora sha̱nao maleimana.’ jihaowa.”
Chieina Judahna ngahānkai, “Otbing chi a jihaoranu, ina nali yaonao chihovālaga nana ali masamphangmana kaji mibingna shālaga Inili mana̱shihaipaishina.”
Kachāng kathumsha̱khawui thili “Narihāva̱ Tamar khayorva̱ sāda nao vaihaira” kaji Judahli hānghaowa. Chieina Judahna, “Ali ayarli shimenshoklu, kala mei eina thotthathaolu.” da hānga.

Ali ayarli shimenkashok tharān Tamarna awova̱li pao chihovai, “Ili nao kashivaia chi otbing hiwui akhavā chinana,” Kala ana hānga, “Khutop, shānneira̱, kala khāmshui hi khipāwuikhala da machutkhuimilu.”
Chieina Judahna otbing chi awuina da mayai kala hānga, “Ana ili mashungmei, ali inaomayara Shelahli makhui khangasakwui vangna.” Chiwui thili Judahna mangasopiluimana.
Kapharā atam khaung eina naopamli nao khani ngashirsai.
Naokhara̱ chitharān akhawui pāng tāpura; naosak kasingpava̱na kazaira̱ kahung eina pāng chili masa̱mihailaga hānga, “Hipa hi shok-kharena.”
Kha ana awui pāng ngalatlui kaji tharan, yanglu, agato shokrāsai; chieina naosak kasingpava̱na hānga, “Nana kathāda nakhalatta sakhaikashokkhala?” Chiwui vang awui ming Perez hoi.
Chiwui thili pāngli kazaira̱ kahung masa̱laga achinā shokrāsai; kala awui ming Zerah hoi.
na Josephli ngasomisai, kala ana akhavāwui shimli pamda otsak kachiva̱ kaphāmāng sāmi,
Josephli
Chieina Josephna awui mangāli ngahānkhangai samphangda ali otram ngatha̱sai; kala ali awui shim kala awui khalalei ot saikorawui kashina sāngasaka.
Awui shimli awui thongthāng kala awui khalalei saikorawui kashina Josephli sāngasakthangwui eina thuida awui mangā eina Egyptpawui shimkhurli
Chithāda sāda awui khalei saikora Josephwui pāngli horsangmihaida phākashak phākazā maningla Potipharna khikha maphaningluimana.
Joseph yarkhokana kala azak mathālaka.
Atam khaleilaga awui akhavāpreiva̱na Josephli ningchanghaowa; kala, “Ngasopisa” da hānga,
Kha ana mamayāmada akhavāwui preiva̱li hānga, “Yanglu, I khaleiwui vang iwui akhavāna awui shimli khalei otbingwui vang khikha maphaningluimana, kala ot kachiva̱ ana iwui pāngli horsangmiserhaira;

shim hili ana ili mareimeimana; na maningla ot khangatei ili mahorsangkhami maleimana, kaja na awui preiva̱na; chithakha hiyākha kahaka makaphā ot sāda ina kathāda Varewui mangāli morei sapairakhala?”
Thangkachida ngasopi khavai kala ngasopam khavai hānglala ana manganāsanglakmana.
Kha thangkha, ana awui ot sākhavai shimli kazang tharān mi khangatei khipākha maleikasā eina,
preiva̱̱ china awui kachonli ngakhunkhuida “Ngasopisa” da hānga. Kha ana kachon chi horhaiphungda yāmshokhaowa.
Awui kachon preiva̱wui pāngli horhaiphungda shimwui eina yāmshok kahai chi theilaga,
preiva̱ china shim chili khalei mibingli hokhuida hānga, “Yanglu, ithumli chipat khavai igaharana Hebrewnao akha khuiunghaili! Ana ili ngasopikida kazang eina ina akhon panglāk eina vaowa;
kala ina panglāk eina khavaokhon kashā eina, ana awui kachon iwui ngalemli horhaiphungda shimlungwui eina yāmshokhaowa.”
Agahara maungranglakha eina tangda kachon chi awui pāngli hai,
kala alila tui chi tākam eina hānga, “Nana khuikhaung Hebrew rao china ili chipat khavai zanga;
kha ina akhon chuida panglāk eina khavao eina awui kachon horhaiphungda shimlungwui eina yāmshokhaowa.”
“Nawui rao china ili hithāda sai” da preiva̱na kahāng chi awui akhavāna kashā tharān a malungvāthaowa,
kala Josephwui akhavāna ali tukkhuida awungana narkahaibingli sangkhavai phātopli sanghaowa.
Kha
Phātop kashina akhavā china phātopli khaleibing saikora chi Josephwui pāngli horsangmi; chili sākharān saikora Josephna sāsera;
Josephwui pāngli sangmi kahai saikora chi phātop kashina china khikha maphaningluimana, kaja
Atam khaleilaga Egypt awungawui pong singme eina khamui kasemana aniwui akhavā Egyptwui awungali khayon ot sathathuihaowa.
Chiwui vang Pharaohna pong singme akhoka eina khamui kasema akhoka khani chili malungvāthaoda,
phātop kashina kathānawui pāngli horsangmida ana anili Josephli narhaikasa phatop chili sanghaowa.
Phātop kashina china anili Josephwui pāngli horsangmi, kala ana anili mayonpama, narkhavai pam chili athum kasha̱kha pamrumsai.
Thangngayākha ani khani—Egypt awungawui pong kasinga eina khamui kasema, phatopli khaleia khanina mang shimanripa — mang chi ngatateia, kakhalatla ngatateia.
Ngathorshong Josephna anili akhayang tharān ani wuk khanangda khalei ana thei.
Chieina ana anili ngahāna, “Kathahaoda nani aja ningngai mamathālakla khaleikhala?”
Anina ali hānga, “Inili mang shimana, kha chi khalatmi khavai khipākha maleimana.” Josephna anili hānga, “Khalatkhami hi Varewui maningmala? Ili kahāngmilu.”
Chieina pong singme china Josephli awui mang chi hānga, “Mangshong iwui mangāli drakhārong akha leisai,
kala arong chili aphāng kathum leisai; ashon shokkhaleoda awon wona kala amazānbing chi athei matheida minhaowa.
Pharaohwui tengkot ipangli singsai; kala ina drakhāthei chi khuilaga Pharaohwui tengkot chili sursangda tengkot chi Pharaohwui pāngli misai.”
Chieina Josephna ali hānga, “Chiwui kakhalat chi hina: aphāng kathum chi zimiksho kathumthangna;
kathumthangwui alungli Pharaohna nali khuishokta nawui otpamli hanmiluira; kala nana tengkot singmikasā thāda tengkot chi Pharaohwui pāngli sangmiluira.
Kha nawui ot saikora ungshung kahaiwui thili ili phaningungmilu, ina nali kapona, ili lumashanmida Pharaohli iwui maram kahāngmilu, kala shim hiwui eina ili khuishok ngasakmilu.
Kaja ili Hebrewbingwui ngalei eina ngathumda khuithui kahaina; kala hilila ina khikha khayon masālakla athumna ili phātopli masangngayimana.”
Khalatkhami chi khamui kasema akhoka china mayāngaihaoda Josephli hānga, “Ila mang akha shimana: iwui kuitungli khamui luk kathum tongzatsai,
kala atungmeikap kaji lukli Pharaohwui vang khamui ayur kachungkha zangsai, kha vānaobingna khamui chi ikuitung eina ratākshaisai.”
Chieina Josephna ngahānkai, “Chiwui kakhalat chi hina: luk kathum chi zimiksho kathumthangna;
kathumthangwui alungli nali khuishokta Pharaohna nakui rangda naphasā thingli hokthānghaora; kala vānaobingna nawui asā shaira.”
Kakathumathang, Pharaohwui kapharā zimiksho ngasāhaoda, ana awui raobingwui vang zātkhān sāmi, kala tengkot singkhamiwui akhavā eina khamui kasemawui akhavā chili khuishoka.
Tengkot singmeli awui otpamli sangluishita, kala awui pāng eina tengkot chi Pharaohwui pāngli mi;
kha Josephna athumli khalatkhami tākam eina khamui kasemali hokthāngthathaowa.
Chithālala tengkot singme china Josephli maphaningungla malaihaowa.
Kum khani peikahaiwui thili Pharaohna awui mangshong Nile kongpheili nganingsai,
Nilewui eina asākakā kala nganaipat kahai mukkā shini shoklaga khawo phāshai.
Kala athumwui thili khangatei kaothethek kala rurārsār kahai mukkā shini Nilewui eina shoka, kala mukkā kateibingwui ngalemli shoknganinga.
Kaothethek kala rurārsār kahai mukkābing china asākakā kala nganaipat kahai mukkā chili shaihaowa. Chiwui thili Pharaohna thuimathuka.
Ana pivaluishita kala kakhane mang rāshimana; kala yanglu, māmazān khamathā panglāk kahai shini mārong akhali matheisai.
Chiwui thili zingshoshongwui masina phankhalanghaida shāt-kazanga tāham kahai māmazan shini shoka.
Kala chibingna khamathā māmazan shini chili mayuisanghaowa. Chieina Pharaohna thuimathuka, kala mangshong ngasāsai.

Chiwui vang ngathor kathui eina awui ning mamathānrarthuwa; ana Egyptli khalei mitrang kathem kala thangkhamei saikorali hokhui; kala Pharaohna awui mang chi athumli hāngchithei, kha mi akhanala Pharaohli chi makhalatmirarthuwa.
Chieina tengkot singme china Pharaohli hānga, “Aja ina iwui khangui phaningunghaira.
Pharaohna nawui raobingli malungkhavātwui vang khamui kasemawui akhavā inili kashina akhavāwui narkhavai shimli sangkahai tharān,
kakhalat ngatatei kahai mang, thangngayākha inili shimana.
Chili Hebrewnao akha kashinawui rao sāda ithum ngasopamsai; inina ali kahāng tharān mi ava̱va̱na kashiman mang chiwui kakhalat khalatmi.
Kala ana inili khalatkhami chi tākam eina ungshunga, ili iwui otpamli khuisangluishita kala khamui kasemali phāshi sāhaowa.”
Chieina Pharaohna Josephli ahokhui ngasakta, phātopwui eina katotsisi khuishoka, kala ana morhā silaga kachon shinkhuihailaga Pharaohwui mangāli vai.
Pharaohna Josephli hānga, “Ili mang akha shimana, kha chi khalatmikashap mi khipākha maleithuwa; ina shai kaja nana mang akha kashā tharān chi khalatmishapa ji.”
Josephna Pharaohli ngahānkai, “Theikashapā chi iwuili maleimana; Pharaohwui ningkachāng Varena ngahānkāmira.”
Chieina Pharaohna Josephli hānga, “Yanglu, iwui mangshong I Nile kongpheili nganingsai;
asākakā kala nganaipat kahai mukkā shini Nilewui eina shokta khawo shokphāshai;
chiwui thili khangatei mukkā shini kaothethek rurārsār kahai, Egypt ngaleili ina matheilakrang kaji Nilewui eina shoka.
Kaothethek kala rurārsār kahaibing china asākakā mukkā shini chi shaihaowa;
kha athumna shaisang kahai thili khipānakha athumna shaisanghairada matheirarmara, kaja athum kharewui thāda kakao chishona. Chieina I thuimathukhaowa.
Ina mangshongli theilui; kapanga khamathā māmazan shini arong akhali matheisai;
kala zingshoshongwui masina phankhalangda shāt-kazanga yangfafa kahai māmazan shini shoklui,
kala yangfafa kahai mābing china kapangabing chili mayuitahaowa. Hi ina mitrang kathemabinglila ngahānlaga khipānakha mahāngmirarthuwa.”
Chieina Josephna Pharaohli hānga, “Pharaohwui mang chi akhamaya; Varena sāki kaji chi Pharaohli phongmihaira.”
Asākakā mukkā shini chi kum shinina, kala kapanga māmazan shini chi kum shinina; mang chi akhamaya.
Kaothethek kala rurārsār kahai mukkā shini kala zingshoshongwui masina phankhalangda shāt-kazanga yangfafa kahai māmazan shini chi zāt kasak kum shini papama.
Ina Pharaohli hāngkahai thāda, Varena sāki kaji chi Pharaohli chitheihaira.
Egyptwui ngalei saikorali mavātlak kaji kum shini rāra,
kha chiwui thili kum shini zāt kasak rāra, kala Egypt ngaleili makhavāt kum chi malaihaora; zāt kasak china ngalei saikorali vāshungra,
chiwui thili zāt kasak rāki kaji chi marnahaida khalei kashāng kaho matheilakmara.
Pharaohli mang khani ngashomda kashiman hi Varena sālakra kaji kala thaklāk eina rāngasakhaora kajina.
“Chiwui vang Pharaohna Egyptwui ngalei saikorali yangmi khavai ningkhamazing kala thangkhamei mi akha kapangkhuiranu.
Pharaohna ngalei hiwui kashinabing phāsangda makhavāt kum shini Egypt ngaleiwui alungli samkaphang akhum kaphangā chi khuiranu.
Kala rārāda khalei kaphā kum hili samkaphang saikora athumna kazipranu, kala māthei chi keinung saikorali Pharaohwui azingli kaziphairanu.
Kashakazā chi kum shini zāt kasak Egyptli rāki kajiwui vang ngarānsangki kajina, chieina ngaleiwui mibingna zāt kasakwui eina mathimara.”
Hāngkahai chi Pharaoh kala awui raobingna phālakhairada theikhui.
Kala Pharaohna awui raobingli hānga, “Varewui manglāna ngasokhami hikathā mi hili samphangrala?”
Chiwui vang Pharaohna Josephli hānga, “Varena nali saikora hi chitheihaokada, nakathā, ningkhamazing kala thangkhamei maleiluimara;
nana iwui shimwui akhavā sāra, kala iwui mi kachiva̱na nawui kakaso athishurda sāra; wungpamkhong himāngna ina nali reimeira.”
Kala Pharaohahna Josephli hānga, “Yanglu, Egypt ngalei saikorawuitungli ina nali chipamhaira.”
Chiwui thili Pharaohna apāngwui eina mahor namkhavai khutop chi khuida Josephwui pāngli sangmi, kala khamanaka khamathā kachon ngavaimida awui akahungli sināchā ngachāmi;
kala awui thichangli kazang siguigari tongngasakta, “Khuktida khayashilu” da athumna vaowa. Chithāda sāda Egyptwui ngalei saikorawuitungli ali chipama.
Chili lāngda Pharaohna Josephli hānga, “I Pharaohna, kha nawui khamayā mazangla Egyptwui ngaleili mi khipākha pāng, lah phei makhāngpaimara.”
Kala Pharaohna Josephwui ming Zaphenath-paneah phokmi; kala Josephli Onwui pāngmon Potipherawui naongalāva̱ Asenathli ngakum ngasaka.
Chiwui thili Josephna Egypt ngalei saikora yaovai.
Josephna Egypt awunga Pharaohwui otram ngatha̱kaphok tharān a kum thumra kāshunghairasai. Kala Josephna Pharaohwui eina shokta Egypt ngalei saikorali vai.
Zingkum kapha shiniwui alungli heiun sorngasaida unga,
kala ana Egypt ngaleili kum shiniwui alungli sorngasaida heiun khaung chitharān keinungli kashakazā kazipsanga; ana keinung kachiva̱wui kuimareida khalei luiramwui eina kashakazā kaziphai.
Hithāda sāda Josephna mā kachungkha kazipkhui, kongwui situiyakkha kazipkhui, chungnāhaida khaonla maonrarthuwa.
Zāt kasak marāranglakha On pāngmon Potipherawui naongalāva̱ Asenathna Josephli mayarnao khani pharāmihairasai.
Josephwui naochizai naomayarali Manasseh hoi, kaja ana hānga, “Kaja iwui sipkasā kala ishāvāwui shimkhur saikora Varena malai ngasakhaowa.”
Kakhaneli Ephraim hoi, “Kaja kakhanang ramli Varena ili athei mathei ngasaka.”
Egypt ngaleili heiun khaung kum shini chi peihaowa;
kala Josephna hāngkahai thāda zāt kasak kum shini rāshunghaowa. Apam kachiva̱li zāt sakhaowa; kha Egypt ngalei kachiva̱li kashakazā samphanga.
Egypt ngaleili kachām chitharān mibingna Pharaohli zāt rapoi; kala Pharaohna Egyptnaobingli hānga, “Josephli vālu, ana nathumli kahāng chi sālu.”
Chieina zāt kasak chi apam kachida vāshung kahai tharān, Josephna zātchum saikora sholaga Egyptnaobingli yorsanga; kaja Egyptli zāt kasak kateokhamāng maningmana.
Chili lāngda okathui saikorawui eina Egyptli Josephwuili mā lokhavai rai, kaja okathui saikorali zāt sakhaowa.
Egyptli kashakazā samphangdalei kaji kashā eina Jacobna anaomayarabingli hānga, “Khiwui vang nathum akha eina akha yangngaroklikhala?”
Kala ana hānga, “Yanglu, Egyptli kashakazā samphanga da ina shāhaira; ithum kakhum eina mathi khavai, ithumwui vang kashakazā talokhuilu.”
Chiwui vang Josephwui achinā tharā china kashakazā lokhavai Egyptli tai.
Kha Jacobna Josephwui agato Benjaminliva achināngarābingli mangasotā ngasakmana; kaja kalākashi shokpaishinada ngacheehaowa.
Chithāda sāda Israelwui naomayarabingna kashakazā tālo khavai khangateibingli ngasovai, kaja zāt kasak Canaan ngaleilila za̱haowa.
Chitharān Josephna ngalei chiwui rammunga sāsai; ngalei chiwui mibingli ana yorsangkasāna. Josephwui achinā ngarāna awui mangāli vākashung eina ngakhumshām eina khayākashi mi.

Josephna achinā ngarāli thei, kala athumli machuthaowa, kha athumli khami thāda sāda chanhān maunglakla ngahāna, “Nathum kachiwui eina kharākhala?” Athumna hānga, “Kashakazā lokhavai Canaanwui eina kharāna.”
Josephna achinā ngarāna da theishingkhuihaowa, kha athumna ali matheimana.
Kala athumwui pongli ali kashiman mang chi Josephna phaningunga; kala ana athumli hānga, “Nathum ra̱khayangbingna, apam hiwui khangazan yangkhui khavai kharāna.”
Athumna ali hānga, “Maningmana, amei, kha naraobing kashakazā lokhavai kharāna.
Ithum saikora mi akhawui naona, ithum ningkathara misera, ithum rāra̱khayanga mi maninglakmana.”
Ana athumli hānga, “Maningmana, nathumna ngalei hiwui khavāt khangazan yangkhui khavai kharāna.”
Athumna hānga, “Narao ithum Canaan ngaleili mi akhawui naosera, ishi chinao tharāda khanina; paisho ishāvāli ngasopamdalei, kha akhava maleithura.”
Kha Josephna athumli hānga, “Ina nathumli kahāng thāda, nathum ra̱khayangasera.
Hi eina nathumli theikhuipaira: Pharaohwui ming singda kahāngna, nagato paisho chi hili makhuirākha nathum hiwui eina mazatpaimara.

Nathumwui ngachaili akhana paisholi unghokhuilu, kateibingna phātopli pamsāra. Pharaohwui ming singda kahāngna, nathum ra̱khayanga mi maningmana jiakha kala nathumwui tui chi mashungakha hi eina theikhuira.”
Kala ana athum saikorali kathumthangwui vang phātopli sanghaowa.
Kakathumathang Josephna athumli hānga, “I Vareli ngacheeya; chieina hithāda saakha nathum ringpaira:
nathum ningkathar miakha, nathumwui achinā akha phātopli chipamsālu, kala kateibingna shimshong zākhavai kashakazā phungunghaolu.
Kala agato paisho chi ili rāchitheilu; chieina nathumwui tui mashunga da theipaira, kala nathum mathimara.” Athumna chithāda sai.

Chiwui thili athum eina athum hāngngaroka, “Igatowui pongli ithum nguihaira kaji hi khamashungna, ana ithumli kapo ithumna matheikhami chitharān awui malung kharing chi ithumna thei; chiwui vang malung kharing chi ithumwuitungli rātāhaira.”
Kala Reubenna athumli hānga, “Nao chili makaphā masālu da ina nathumli mahāngmala? Kha nathumna makhuisangthu. Chiwui vang ara awui asheewui athut hāngkasang atam rāhaira.”
Josephna athumwui tui shai kaji athumna matheimana, kaja athumwui ngachaili khalatme leisai.
Chiwui thili ana athumwui eina thuihaida chapa; kala athumwuishong latungda chān ungngazeka. Kala ana Simeonli khuilaga achinā ngarāwui miktāli khalaphaowa.
Chiwui thili athumwui khao chi kashakazā chipem ngasakta athum kachiva̱wui pheisā chi athumwui khaoli sangmiluihaolu da kasoi; kala athum shongfali zākhavai sangmilu kaji athishurda sangmi.
Chiwui thili athumwui kashakazā gadhābingli shaksākhuilaga zathuwa.
Kala athumwui shimzunpamli ungshungda achinā akhana gadhāli uikhavai akhao kasho eina chili awui pheisā zangkasā chi thei;

Chieina ana achināngarāli hānga, “Iwui pheisā hanmiluihaira; khaowui khamorli zangdalei!” Chi shālaga athum ngacheelakhaowa, kala akha eina akha ngarei ngasunda kathirriri eina hāngngaroka, “Ithumli Varena khi sāmi kahaikhala?”
Athumna Canaanli avāva̱ Jacobwuili ungkashung eina shokkahai saikora hithāda hānga,
“Ngalei khamunga china ithumli chānhān maunglakla ngazeka, kala ithum ngalei chili ra̱yang khavai kachihona da khuihaowa.
Kha ithumna ali hānga, ‘Ithuma ningkathar mina, ithum ra̱khayangabing maningmana;
ithum avāva̱ akhawui chinaongarā tharāda khanina; akhavā maleithura, paishova Canaanli ishāvāwui ngalemli pamda lei.’
Chieina khangama akhavā china ithumli hānga, ‘Hina nathum ningkathara mina kaji ina theipaira: nachinā akha iwuili pamngasaksālu, kateibingna shimshong zākhavai kashakazā phungungulu.
Nathumwui agato paisho chi khuirālu; chithakha nathum ra̱khayangbing maningmana, kha ningkathara mina da theira, kala nachināli nathumli hanmida nathum ngalei hili leih khayora sāpaira.’”
Athumna akhao chi pheikhayang chitharān, yanglu, mi kachiva̱wui pheisārom khaoli zangsāsera; athum kala athumwui avāva̱na pheisārom chi theilaga ning saza̱lakhaowa.

Avāva̱ Jacobna athumli hānga, “Inao ngarāwui vang nathumna ili wukkhanang ngasakhaira: Joseph maleithura, Simeonla maleithura, ara nathumna Benjaminli khuithuiluiki jihaira; saikora hi iwuitungli tāserhaira.”
Chieina Reubenna avāva̱li hānga, “Ina Benjaminli mathānungakha iwui naomayara khaninili sāthathaolu; ipāngli sangmilu, ina nawuili ali thānungmiluira.”

Kha avāva̱na hānga, “Inaomayarali mavā ngasakmara, kaja nagato thihaira amāngli notha kahaina. Nathumna vāki kaji shongzāli ali kalākashi rāza̱kha, nathumna ili asarlamshong wukkhanang ngasakta Kazeiramli vāngasakra.”
Chitharān ngalei chili zāt sakkachangkhathaowa.
Kala athumna Egyptwui eina khuikhaung kashakazā chi zāngakān kahai tharān, avāva̱na athumli hānga, “Ithumwui vang kashakazā valokhuiluilu.”
Kha Judahna ali hānga, “Mi chipana ithumli saklak eina hāngkazazakhaidalei, kaja ‘Nagato makhuiraakha nathum ili masamphangpaimara’ jihaira.
Nana ithumli agato zanglaga chihovākha ithumna vāda nawui vang kashakazā alomika;
kha nana ali machihoakha ithum mavāmara, kaja mi chipana ithumli hānga, ‘Nagato makhuiraakha nathum ili masamphangpaimara.’”
Israelna hānga, “Nathumna khisāda ili khanang khavai, nachinā akha lei da hāngkhala?”

Athumna ngahānkai, “Mi chipana ithum kala athei-asāwui ponglila munlak eina ngahānda hānga, ‘Navā aruila ringda leila? Nachinā khangatei maleilui?’ Ana khangahān chili ithumna ngahānkakāna, ana ‘Nagato khuitālu’ da hāngra da ithum theisāla?”
Judahna avāva̱ Israelli hānga, “Nao chi ili ngasoda chiholu, nala ithumla, kateobingla mathila ringkhavai ithum zatuka.
Ina awui vang nganingra, awui vang ili tānlu. Ina ali khuiungluida napāngli masangmiakha chiwui khayon chi ina phungchingra;
kaja ithumna mahuinganongsi kaja khanishida vālaga latunghairara.”

Chieina athumwui avāva̱ Israelna hānga, “Chithaphalungra jiakha hithāda sālu; ngalei hiwui mathāmeikap kaji atheiyur; balm kateokha kala khuira̱ teomeikha, gum, myrrh, kala pistachio athā kala almond, nathumwui khaoli khuiphunglaga mipa chili lemmet sāda, khuitāmilu.
Pheisāla mataida khuiphunglu; nathumwui khaoli sangmihaikasā pheisā chila khuivāluishitlu; hi yangngui kahailapai.
Nagatolila thānphunglu, ngakarthuida mi chipali valuishitlu;
pangshapa Varena nathumli mi chipawui mangāli lukhamashan chitheimida nagato akhapa eina Benjaminli shiunluiranu. Inaongarāwui vang ili wukkhananglu jilala khananghaorali.”
Chieina athumna lemmet mikhavai ot chi khuiphunga, kala athumna pheisāla chungmeida khuiphungda Benjaminli thānphunga; kala athumna Egypt tākashung eina Josephwui mangāli anganinga.
Josephna Benjamin athumli ngasokazat kathei tharān, ana awui shim kashina chili hānga, “Mibing chi shimlungli hozanglu, kala sā taithatta khangarān sālu, kaja ngashunshong mibing chi ili zāngarumra.”
Josephna sālu kaji chi mipa china sai, kala mibing chi Josephwui shimli khuizanga.

Josephwui shimli khuizanghaoda mibing chi ngacheehaowa, kala athum hāngngaroka, “Hi kharethang ithumwui khaoli pheisā sangmihaikasā chiwui vang shimlungli khuikazangna, chieina ana ithumwui khayon phākhuida awui raonao sāngasak khavai, kala ithumwui gadhābing hi khuikhavai kasāna.”
Chiwui vang eina athumna Josephwui kashina chili vāda khāmongpheili angazekta,
hānga, “Oh, amei, kashakazā lokhavai ithum kharethang hili rai;
kala ithumna pikhavaipamli ithumwui khao pheikhayang tharān ithum kachiva̱wui pheisā horzakta khaoli zangsai; chiwui vang ithumna pheisā chi khuirālui kajina,
kala kashakazā lokhavai pheisā khangateila pāngli singphungdalei. Ithumwui khaoli pheisā chi khipāna sangmikhala ithum matheimana.”
Ana ngahānkai, “Chingri ngasāmkhuilu, mangacheelu; nathum kala navāwui Varena lan chi nathumwui khaoli sangmi kahaira; nathumwui pheisā chi ina samphanghaira.” chiwui thili ana Simeonli thānshokmi.
Kala mipa china athumli Josephwui shimli thānzangda tara̱ khuimida athumna phei pheokhui, kala ana athumwui gadhābingli seizat khuimi kahai thili,
ngashunshong Josephna khaung tharan, miki kaji ot chi mikhavai khangarān sai, kaja athum chili phazāngarumra da shāhaowa.
Josephna shimli hankhaung tharān, athumna khuikaphung ot chi awui shimli khuizanga, kala ngaleili ngakhumsangda khayākashi mia.
Ana athumwui kashok-kazang ngathingda ngahāna, “Nathumna kahāng navā kasara chi ringphāda leila? A ringchingda leila?”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Narao ishāvā ringda lei kala ringphāda lei.” Chieina athumna kui mashunda ali khayākashi chithei.
Kala ana kapeikakā eina avāva̱wui nao agato Benjaminli theida hānga, “Hi nathumna ili kahāng nathumwui agato paisho chila? Varena nali lumashanmiranu inaomayara!”
Josephna samphangngailakkasā agato chili kathei eina chapngaihaoda totot thuihaowa, kala awui kāli zangda chapa.
Chiwui thili ana mai ngatāphailaga; akhalatta khalem khuilaga shokhānga, “Kashakazā khuirālu.”

Awui vang ngateida khuimi; athumwui vang ngateida khuimi, kala ali phazākharuma Egyptnaobingwui vang ngateida khuimi, kaja Egyptnaobingna Hebrewnaoli ngarumda maphazāpaimana, kaja athumwui vang jat tālaka.
Awui mangāli khararana kharar athishurda, paishona khanganui athishurda pama; kala mibing china akha eina akha matakhak eina yangngaroka.
Josephwui table eina athumli sangmi, Benjaminwuiva khangateiwuili sharuk phangā shida mataida sangmi. Chithāda athumna ali lumlaolak eina phāshak phazāngaruma.
Chiwui thili awui kashina chili kasoi, “Athumwui phungshap kachichāwui khaoli pemda sangmilu, kala kachichāwui pheisā kachichāwui khaoli sangmiserhaolu,
kala iwui tengkot, lupāsāwui tengkot chi paishowui khaoli, pheisāla, kala māngumla ngarumda sangmihaolu.” Kala ana Josephna kakaso chi tākam eina sai.
Kazing thangkhaleoda athumwui gadhābing khuiphungda zatngasakhaowa.

Athum keinungwui eina zatta mashāngnāranglakha, Josephna awui kashinapali hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, mibing chili kharomvālu; kala nana athumli akhangaphan tharān, hithāda hānglu, ‘Kaphā sākhamiwui vang nathumna khiwui vang kashi
Hi eina ishāmeina khamang maningmala, kala hi eina ana sāshap theishap kaji maningmala? Nathum yonlakhaira.’”
Akhangaphan eina ana tui chi tākam eina ahānga.
Athumna hānga, “Ameina khisāda hikathā tui hānghaokhala? Naraobingna hikathā ot sākida katāva̱li lei.
Yanglu, ithumwui khaoli zangkasa lupā chi Canaan ngaleiwui eina khuirāmiluihaira, laga kathāda ithumna nashameiwui sinā lupā leepairakhala?
Hi zangkasapa chi shaothathaoranu, ithumla ishameiwui raonao sāserra.”
Ana hānga, “Nathumna kahāng chitharanu, kala khuiphungkasāpa chi iwui raonao sāra, kha kateibing khikha khayon maleimana.”
Chieina kachichāna katotsisi khao ngareitai, kala kachichāwui khao pheiya.
Kala ana kharara eina thuilaga paisho eina tangda phāyanga. Kala tengkot chi Benjaminwui khaoli zangsai.
Chieina athumna kachon serkhākta kachichāwui gadhāli ot shaksākhuilaga keinungshong hanvai.
Judah kala achinā ngarāna Josephwui shimli vākashung tharān, a pamsai, kala athumna ngaleili ngakhumzangda khayāshiya.
Josephna athumli hānga, “Nathumna kasā hi khikhala? I kathā mina khanongkhuishapa da nathum matheimala?”

Judahna hānga, “Ameili khi hāngrakhala? Ithumna khitui hāngra? Kala ithumna maninglakmana kaji kathāda hāngakha shitsangpairakhala? Naraobingwui khayon Varena phongmihaira; yangmilu, ara khuikaphungala, ithumla nawui raonao sāra.”
Kha Josephna hānga, “Ina chitha khavai maleimana: khuiphungkasāpamāng iwui raonao sāra, kha nathum kateibinga chingri eina navāwuili ungulu.”
Chieina Judahna awuili kāda hānga, “O iwui amei, ina poli, narao ili tui akhamāng kahāng ngasakmilu; narao ithumli nawui malungkhavāt maza̱ngasakmilu; kaja na Pharaoh kathāna.
Ameina naraobingli ‘Navā leila, lah nagatola leila?’ da ngahāna.
Chieina ithumna ameili ‘Sarlak kahaiya ishāvā lei, kala asārlam kapharā igato paisho akha lei, akhapa thihaowa, ava̱va̱na kapharā himāng khaleiwui vang ishāvāna ali lumlaka’ da hānga.
Chieina naraobingli nana ‘Ali ina yangkhui khavai thānrālu’ da hānga.
Ithumna ameili ‘Nao chi ishāvāli mahorhaipaimana, kaja ana horhaiakha ishāvā thihaora’ da hānga.
Kha nana naraobingli ‘Nagatoli mathānraakha ili masamphangpaimara’ ” da hānghaowa.
“Ithumna narao ishāvāli hankhaung chitharān, ameiwui tui saikora ali hāngsera.
Kala ishāvāna ‘Zāt aloluilu’ da kahāng eina,
‘Ithum mavārarmara; kha igato paisho vaakha ithumla vāra, khikhalajila paisho mazangakha ithum awui azak matheirarmara da ngahānkai.’
Chieina narao ishāvāna ithumli hānga, ‘Ipreiva̱na iwui nao khani pharai kaji nathumna thei;
akhapāna ili nothāhaira, kala mashoila ali serkazamhairara da ina hāngthang eina thuida matheiluilakthuwa.
Akhapa hila iwui eina thānthuilaga kalākashi shokakha, asārlam nathumna iwuk khanangda Kazeiram vāngasakra.’
Chieina igato mazangla narao ina ishāvāwuili khaung tharān, awui ning ali shāptithaoda,
a mazangkasā chi theilaga a mashoila thihaora; chieina kasara chili wukkakhanang eina naraobingna Kazeiramli vāngasakhaora.
Kaja narao ina nao hiwui vang ishāvāli hānglaga nganingkhuihaidalei, chiya ‘Ina nao hi mathānungluiakha kaphen saikora chi iwui mirin peida ina phungra’ jikahaina.
Chiwui vang eina nao hiwui mahut ili pamngasakta nawui rao sāngasakmihaolu, laga ale khangatei achinābingli ngasounghaoranu da kapona.
Kaja nao hi mazangla kathāda ishāvāwui mangāli ina latungpairakhala? Ishāvāli kalākashi rāki kaji chi ina mayangrarmara.”
Ana panglāk eina kachap chi Egyptnaobing kala Pharaohshi shimkhur shāsera.
Kala Josephna achinā ngarāli hānga, “I Josephna, ishāvā aruila ringda leila?” Kha achinā ngarāna awui mangāli ngacheenahaida khikha mangahānkārarthuwa.
Chieina Josephna achinā ngarāli hānga, “Ili rānganaimeilu, ina kapona.” Athumna vānganaimei. Kala ana hānga, “Nathumna Egyptnaoli yorsang kahaiya nachinā Joseph chi ina.”
Nathumna ili yorsang kahaiwui vang malung maringalu, lah malung mavāt ngaroklu; kaja Varena manglā kanmi khavai nathumli rida ili kachihona.
Ngalei hili zāt sakta kum khanihaira; aruila lui vākasang kala mā mahātsangki kaji kum phangā leifaya.
Mi kachungkha ringngasak khavai kala okathuili nathumli shākkhavai rida ili chihokharāna.
Chiwui vang eina nathumna ili hili chihokharā maningmana, kha Varena kachihona; kala ana ili Pharaohwui avāva̱, kala ashi shimkhurwui akhavā sangasakta Egypt ngaleili mungkhangasakna.
“Ishāvāli thākta unghānglu, ‘Nanaomayara Josephna hithāda hānga, Varena ili Egypt katongawui akhavā sāngasakhaira, thākta iwuili tālu, manganongpamalu;
nathumna Goshenli somda iwui ngalemli pamra, nanaongarāla, naobingwui naobingla; nathumwui mela, seila, yaola kala nathumwui khalalei saikorala;
chili ina mizāserra, chi maningkha nathumla, nathumwui khalei saikorala kazā masamphangmara, kaja aruila zāt sakki kaji kum phangā leifaya.’
“Ikhamor eina kahāng hi nathumwui mik eina theihaira, igato Benjaminwui mik eina theihaira;
Egyptli iwui kharei khangam kala nathumna kathei saikora ishāvāli unghāngserlu; ishāvāli hili thākta khuitālu.”
Chiwui thili Benjaminli hungreikhuida chapa; Benjaminnala hungreida chapa.
Kala achinā ngarāli maya̱khuida chapa. Chiwui thili achinā ngarāna ali chān ngazekngaruma.
“Josephwui achinā ngarā rāhaira,” kaji Pharaohshi shimkhurna kashā eina, Pharaoh kala awui raobing ringphālakhaowa.
Kala Pharaohna Josephli hānga, “Nachinā ngarāli hithāda hānglu, ‘Hithāda sālu: nathumwui gadhāli shaksākhuilaga Canaanli ungulu;
laga navā eina shimkhur saikora hili hotāda Egyptwui ngalei apam khamathā chi ina mira, kala ngalei chiwui heithei athumna khuira da hānglu.’
Kala hithāda kasolu, ‘Hithalo: Egyptwui eina siguigari khuiphungda, naoshinaobing, preiva̱ ngarā kala navāli khuitāmiranu.
Kala nathumwui lanwui vang mashivāmalu, kaja Egyptwui mathāmeikap kaji lam chi athumwui sāra.’”
Israelwui naomayarabingna chithāda sai, kala Pharaohna Josephli kakaso athishurda siguigari ngarānmida shongfali zākhavaila sangmi.
Athum kachiva̱li kachon khamathā akharip mi, kha Benjaminli lupāsā shekel shākathum kala khamathā kachon phangā mi.
Avāva̱li kachiphun otbing chi: Egyptwui ot khamathāthā chi gadhā tharāna phunga kala māngum, khamui, kashakazā shongfali zākhavaila gadhā ava̱ tharāna phungda chihounga.
Chiwui thili achinā ngarāli chihoda ana hānga, “Shongfali makharar ngaroklu.”
Athumna Egyptwui eina Canaanli, avāva̱ Jacobli latunga.
Athumna ali, “Joseph aruila ringda lei, kala Egyptwui akhavā sāda lei” da unghānga. Chi shālaga ning shingakhaowa, kaja athumli mashitsangrarthuwa.
Kha Josephna athumli kahāng tui saikora chi ungkahāng eina kala Josephna kachiho siguigari chi theilaga avāva̱ Jacobwui ning ungrāsai;
kala Israelna hānga, “Shaphaira; inao Joseph ringda lei; I mathiranglakha ali vāyangkhuira.”
Chieina Israelna awui khalalei saikora khuiphungda zata, kala Beer-shebali vākashung eina avāva̱ Isaacwui Vareli pha̱phayā khavai hanphut akha sai.
Kala chithang ngayā mangshongli Varena ali rāsamphangda hānga, “Jacob, Jacob.”
Ana ngahānkai, “I hili leili.”
Chieina ana hānga, “I Varena, navāwui Varena; Egyptli tākida mangangalu; kaja apam chili ina nawui eina miyur kahaka akha sākhuira.
Ina nali Egyptli ngasotāra, kala ina nali thānshokluira; kala nana Josephwui pāngli thisangra.”
Chieina Jacobna Beer-shebawui eina zatphoka; Israelwui naomayarabingna Pharaohna kachiho siguigarili athumwui avāva̱ Jacob, athumwui anaongarā, kala athumwui preiva̱bingla khuiphunga.
Kala athumna Canaanli leilakha mathuisang kahai sha̱kei kala thongthāngla khuiphungda Egyptli, Jacob kala ali ngasoda
ara̱-azā, naomayarabing, naobingwui naongarā, awui naongalāva̱ ngarā naomayarabingwui naongalāva̱ ngarā, saikora Egyptli thāntāsera.
kala Reubenwui naomayarabing: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron kala Carmina.
Simeonwui naomayarabing: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar, kala Shaul, Canaan pava̱na kapharā naomayarana.
Leviwui naomayarabing: Gershon, Kohath, Merarina.
Judahwui naomayarabing: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez kala Zerah (kha Er eina Onan Canaanli thisanghaowa); kala Perezwui nao Hezron eina Hamulna.
Issacharwui naomayarabing: Tola, Puvah, Iob kala Shimronna.
Zebulunwui naomayarabing: Sered, Elon kala Jahleelna.
(Paddan-aramli leilakha Leahna Jacobli pharākhami naomayarabingna, naongalāva̱ Dinahla zangda; awui naomayara kala sha̱nao katonga ngarumda thumrāda kathumna).
Gadwui naomayarabing: Ziphion, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi kala Arelina.
Asherwui naomayarabing: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah kala azarva Serah. Beriahwui naomayarabing: Heber eina Malkhielna.
(Hi Labanna anao ngalāva̱ Leahli khami Zilpahna kapharā Jacobwui naongarāna; mi tharāda tharukna).
Jacob preiva̱ Rachelwui naomayarabing: Joseph eina Benjaminna.
Egyptli leilakha Josephwui nao Manasseh eina Ephraimli On pāngmon Potipherawui naongalāva̱ Asenathna pharai.
Benjaminwui naomayarabing: Bela, Becher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim kala Ardna
(athum tharāda mati hi Rachelna kapharā Jacobwui naomayarabingna).
Danwui naomayara: Hushim.
Naphtaliwui naomayarabing: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer, kala Shillem,
(athumna hi Labanna anao ngalāva̱ Rachelli khami Bilhahna kapharā Jacobwui naona; ana kapharā athum mayarnao shinina).
Jacobwui mi awui naotunbing, naomayarawui preiva̱̱ ngarā mazangla ashi hangtharukta tharuka;
kala Josephwui nao Egyptli kapharā khani; Jacobwui shimkhur Egyptli khavā katonga hangshinina.
Josephli samphang khavai ana rida Judahli chihovai, kala athumna Goshenli vāshunga.
Chieina Josephna awui siguigari khangarān sālaga avāva̱ Israelli samphang khavai Goshenli vai, kala samphangda hungreikhuilaga kasāngkha chapa.
Israelna Josephli hānga, “Nazak kathei kala na ringda khalei kathei samphanghaoda, ara I thilala mangangmana.”
Josephna achināngarā kala avāva̱wui shimkhurli hānga, “Ina Pharaohli vāda, ‘Ishi chinaongarā kala ishāvāwui shimkhur Canaanwui eina iwuili rāhaira;
athuma sha̱kei kakei mi sāthuihaoda, kharewui eina sei homsai; chieina athum sei, sha̱kei khalalei saikora homrāserhaira da hānghaoga.’
Pharaohna nathumli hokhuilaga ‘Nathum khi ot sākhala?’ jiakha,
‘Nganuilakhawui eina thuida arui eina tangda naraobing yao homa’ jilu; chithakha nathum Goshenli sompampaira; kaja sei kahomnao kachiva̱ hi Egyptnaobingwui vang ningkakachaiyana.”
Chieina Josephna Pharaohli zangda hānga, “Ishāvā, ichināngarā, athumwui sha̱kei khalalei saikora thānda Canaan ngaleiwui eina rāserhaira, kala athum ara Goshenli pamda lei.”
Kala achinā ngarāwui eina mi phangāli thānvāda Pharaohli samphang ngasaka.
Pharaohna achinā ngarāli hānga, “Nathum khi ot sākhala?”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Ishāvā ngarā thāda naraobingna yao homa.”

Athumna Pharaohli hānga, “Ithumna kasha̱khawui vang ngasāmkhui khavai ngalei hili rāhaira, kaja naraobingwui sha̱keiwui vang azāt maleithuwa, khikhalajila Canaan ngaleili zāt kasak marlakhaowa; chieina ara narao ithumna nali seihā kasāna, naraobingli Goshenli kapam ngasākmilu.”
Pharaohna Josephli hānga, “Navā eina nachinā ngarā nawuili rāhaira.
Egypt ngalei nawui pāngli lei, navā kala nachinā ngarāli mathāmeikap kaji apamli panngasaklu; athum Goshenli pamranu; kala athumwui ngachaili sākashap mi zangakha iwui sha̱keila homngasaklu.”
Chiwui thili Josephna avāva̱ Jacobli khuirāda Pharaohwui mangāli thānzanga, kala Jacobna Pharaohli somi.
Kala Pharaohna Jacobli hānga, “Na kum kayākha kāhairakhala?”
Jacobna Pharaohli hānga, “Iwui ram kazat mirin kum shākha thumra kāshunghaira, mirinla maphāmana, kumla ishāvā ngarāwui ram kazat kum yakha makāshungmana.”
Jacobna Pharaohli somilaga shokhaowa.
Kala Josephna Pharaohwui kakaso athishurda avāva̱ kala achinā ngarāli Egyptwui pam mathāmeikap kaji lam, Rameseswui lam chi athumli mihaowa.
Kala Jacobna avāva̱, achinā ngarā kala avāva̱wui shimkhur katongali athumwui mashing athishurda kashakazazā mi.
Chitharan ngalei saikorali zāt masamphangthuwa; kaja zāt kasak chi marlakhaowa; chiwui vang Egypt eina Canaan ngaleilila zāt masamkaphangwui vang chothaowa.
Kashakazā khalowui vang Egypt eina Canaan ngaleiwui pheisā katonga Josephna kazipkhuiserhaowa; kala Pharaohwui shimli khuivai.

Kala Egyptlila kala Canaanlila lupā kānser kahai eina, Egyptnaobingna Josephli rāhānga, “Ithumli zāt milu; khiwui vang ithum nawui miktāli thirakhala? Khikhalajila ithumwui pheisā yorzāngakānserhaira.”
Chieina Josephna hānga, “Nathumwui pheisā yorzāngakānhairakha nathumwui sha̱kei yorlu; nathumwui sha̱kei eina ngatha̱ khavai ina zāt mira.”

Chiwui vang athumna Josephli athumwui sha̱kei khuivāmi; kala athumwui sigui, yao, simuk kala gadhā eina ngatha̱ khavai Josephna athumli zāt mi; kala chikum ana athumli zāt mida athumwui sha̱kei saikora eina ngatha̱zāhaowa.

Kala kum chi peikahaiwui thili athumna Josephli rāda hānga, “Ameili ithumwui pheisā yorzaserhaira kaji mangathumara, sha̱keila ameiwui sāthuiserhaira; ithumwui lam eina phasā maningla ameiwui mangāli khikhala maleithura.

Khiwui vang ithum saikora kala iram ngalei nawui mangāli thikachangrakhala? Ithumlila lamla, kashakazā milaga lohaolu; laga ithum eina ithumwui lam ngasoda Pharaohwui raonao sāhaora; kala ramla marampho khavai, ithumla mathila ringkhavai ithumli māmachi milu.”

Chieina Josephna Egyptwui lam katonga Pharaohwui vang lokhui; kaja Egyptwui mibingna athumwui lui saikora yorzāserhaowa, khikhalajila zāt kasak chi athumwui vang marlakhaowa. Lam chi Pharaohwui ngasāhaowa;
kala Egyptwui achikun akha eina akha vāpeida mi saikora awui raonao sāngasakhaowa.
Ana pāngmonbingwui lammāng malomana; kaja Pharaohwui eina pāngmonbingli yarkhami lei, kala yarkhami chi zāda athumna ringa; chiwui vang athumwui lam mayorhaimana.
Kala Josephna mibing chili hānga, “Yanglu, aja zimiksho Pharaohwui vang ina nathum eina nathumwui lam lohaira. Ara nathumwui vang māmachi chi hili leili; kala nathumna lam chili māmachi hi yaolu.
Kala māhāli akhum phangāwui khumkha Pharaohli mira, kala khum phangāwui khum mati chi amachiwui vang, chili langda nathum, kala nathumwui shimkhur saikorala zākhavai sāra.”
Chieina athumna hānga, “Nana ithumwui mirin kanmihaira; ithumna Pharaohwui raonao sāra kaji hi ameiwui ningyāngkhaung ngasāranu.”
Chieina Egyptwui ngaleiwui pongli Josephna shiyan akha semkhuida aja rāshungda chi mayonda lei, chiya Pharaohna khum phangāwui akha khuira, pāngmonbingwui lammāng Pharaohwui maningmana.
Chithāda sāda Israelna Egyptwui ngalei Goshenwui lamli pama; kala chili athumna lan kachungkha mathuisangda chunglak eina mataisanga;
kala Jacobna Egyptli kum tharāda shini okthui; chithāda sāda Jacobwui kum shākha hangmatida shinina.

Israelna thiphalungki kaji atam rānganai kahai tharān anaomayara Josephli hokhuida hānga, “Nawui mikyanli mayāngaiakha napāng ikhaishāngzingli hailu, kala khamashung eina ning horsangda sāmirada khangashit sālu. Ili Egyptli machifalu,
kha ishāvā ngarāli ngasoda chifalu; ili Egyptwui eina khuishokta athumli chifa khavai pam chili chifalu.”
Chieina Josephna ngahānkai, “Nana hāngkahai thāda ina sāra.”
Kala ana hānga, “Ili khangashit sālu;” chieina ana ngashita. Chiwui thili Israelna awui khumkuili mashun zangda khoruma.
Chiwui thili Josephli, “Navā kazādalei”; da kahāng eina ana anaomayara khani, Manasseh eina Ephraimli thānda vai.
Kala Jacobli, “Nanaomayara Joseph rāhaira.” da kahāng eina Israelna zingarāda petli thuipama.
Kala Jacobna Josephli hānga, “Pangshap sāshapa Varena Canaan ngaleiwui Luzli ili rāchitheida somi,
kala ili hānga, ‘Yanglu, ina nali athei mathei ngasakta kachungkha mataisangmira, kala nawui eina miyur akha sākhuira, kala nawui thili kharā ara̱-azāli ngalei hi metchangra.’ da hānga.
“Ara nanao khani ina Egypt ngaleili marāranglakha kapharā chi iwuina; Reuben eina Simeon iwui khangasā thāda Ephraim eina Manassehla iwui ngasāra.
Aniwui thili kapharābing chi nawui sāra, kala athumwui achinā ngarāwui shimlui khararwui ming eina phokra.

Kaja ina Paddanwui eina kazat chitharān, Canaan ngaleili zatlakha, Ephrath mavāshungranglakha Rachel thihaida I wukkhananglakhaowa; kala ina ali Ephrath (chiya, Bethlehem) vākhavai shongfali chifahaowa.”
Israelna Josephwui nao khanili kathei eina, “Hi khipālongkhala?” da ngahāna,
Josephna avāva̱li hānga, “Ili Varena hili khami inaomayara khanina.”
