Chieina ana hānga, “Ina anili somi khavai iwui ngalemli khuirālu.”
Chitharān sārnahaida Israelna mikla matheirarthuwa. Chieina Josephna anili nganaida awuili thānvai; kala ana anili maya̱khuida vamkhuiya.
Kala Israelna Josephli hānga, “Ina nali theiluira da maphaningsāmana; kha yanglu, Varena ili nanao ngarālila theingasakhaira.”
Chieina Josephna anili amakāwui eina tāngasakhailaga akhalatta ngaleili ngakhumshāmzanga.
Kala Josephna anili, Ephraimli awui yāshong eina thara̱laga Israelwui uishong kala Manassehli uishong eina thara̱laga Israelwui yāshong da khuirai.
Kala Israelna awui pāng chākreita katingshok laga paisho Ephraimwui kuitungli awui yāpang para kala awui uishong kharara Manassehwui kuitungli para.
Kala ana Josephli somida hānga,
“Ishāvā Abraham eina Isaacna shitsangda ringkharā Vare,
iwui mirinli aja rāshungda thānkhame Vare;
Ili makaphā saikorawui eina ngatangkhame,
kazingrao china nao khanili somilu;
kala aniwuitungli iwui, kala ishāvā ngarā
Abraham, Isaacwui ming leichingranu;
kala okathuili mataisangda,
kachungkha ngasāranu.”
Avāva̱wui yāpang Ephraimwui kuitungli kapar chi theilaga Joseph maringphāthuwa; chieina avāva̱wui pāng chi khuilaga Ephraimwui eina Manassehwui kuitungli parkhavai sai.
Kala Josephna avāva̱li hānga, “Maningmana avā; kaja hipāna khararana, awui kuitungli nawui yāpāng parmilu.”
Kha avāva̱na mamayāmada hānga, “Ina thei, inaomayara, ina thei; ala yur akha ngasāra, kahaka akha ngasāra; chithālala agatona ali reimeira, kala awui ara̱-azāna yur kachungkha ngasāra.”
Chithāda chithang ana anili somida hānga,
“Nathumwui ming singda Israelnaobingna
somida hithāda hāngra;
‘Varena nali Ephraim eina Manasseh thāda somiranu’”;
chithāda ana Manassehwui mangāli Ephraimpāli ringasaka.
Chiwui thili Israelna Josephli hānga, “Yanglu, I thiki jiura, kha Varena nali ngasomira kala navā ngarāwui ngaleili thānshokmiluira.
Chili lāngda nachinā ngarāli mamila napāli, ina raighai eina malā singlaga Amornaobingwui eina kakhui kaphungwui amai akha mihaira.”
Chiwui thili Jacobna anaomayarabingli hokhuida hānga, “Rākazipserlu, naoda nathumli khi shokrakhala kaji ina hāngka;
“O Jacobwui naomayarabing,
rānganākhuiserlu,
kala navā Israelwui kahāng shākhuilu.
Reuben, na iwui naochizaina,
iwui pangshapna,
khayāla pangshapla khaleiya kala I yang kālakhawui matheikhare atheina.
Tara̱ thāda marungkhung makaji,
nawui akhar mavaimara,
kaja nana navāwui petli kāda;
nana pet chi sākhamānga —
nana iwui petli kai!
Simeon eina Leviva chinaonina;
ngashao khavai khutlai aniwui raighaina.
O imanglā, aniwui channgazekli mazangalu;
O iwui ning; anili mangayuralu;
kaja malungkhavāt tharan anina mi shaothata,
kala zeingarui shida seiphei shātteka.
Aniwui malungkhavātwui sākashi,
malung kathuiwui zakkashi, khonkashi ngasāranu;
ina anili Jacobwui shimkhurli ngayaryāngmihaora,
kala Israelwui shimkhurli chaiyāngmihaora.
Judah, nachinā ngarāna nali sora;
kala yangkashebingli napāng eina athumwui akahung shimetra;
navāwui naobingna nali khorumra.
sāshaiwui eina nana thuihaira.
Ana hamzanga, kazingkha̱ avā thāda pamzanga,
kazingkha̱ ava̱ thāda, ali khipāna mathotlengrakhala?
Wungnao khānthing Judahwui eina mathuimara,
lah khamungawui khāmshui apheiwui eina mathuimara,
singkhangaye chi marāranglakha;
kala mibingna ali khayāshira.
Drakhātheirongli awui siguinao hokhai,
mathāmeikap kaje drakhātheirongli gadhānao hokhai,
awui kashankachon zamli ngasa̱ra,
kala awui phahon drakhārathei ashee eina ngasa̱ra;
drakhāra̱na amik hungra,
seina̱na ahā charra.
Zebulunna shamadrupheili pānra;
jahas ngasām khavai pam ngasāra;
kala Sidon vāshungda awui thari sāra.
Issachar kapanga gadhāna,
yaoshang khaniwui ngachaili ngakhorpama;
ana ngasām khavai pam mathai da thei,
kala lam chi ringkaphāna da thei;
chieina ana yāng chishotta,
ana miwui raonao sāda thoukai phunga.
Israelwui shang akha sāda,
Danna awui mibingli bichar sāra.
Danna shongfa kachida,
apong kachida phara̱ thāda sāra,
sigui pheili makeida katongapali khanukshong pitā ngasakra.
Ina nawui ngatangkhami hondalei, O
Khangaponbingna Gadli ngaponra,
kha ana athumli kharomra.
Asherwui kashakazā mavatlakmara,
kala wungnaowui kashakazā ana vaira.
Naphtali chipen kahai chao anao khamathā pharākakhui kathāna.
Joseph, athei tarākha khamathei aphāngna,
luiradungli khamathei thingphāngna;
awui aphāng phākholi ngareikai.
Malā kasingabingna sāshilak eina ali ngararda,
ali thaiya, kala sipsālak eina chotngasaka;
thālala awui malā mangatha̱lakmana,
pāngthei thāngthaprap Jacobwui Sashap-vāshapa china
(Israelwui Lunghār, Yaokahoma ming china) sāmihaira,
nali ngachonmiki kaji navāwui Varena;
Sāshapa Vare nali ngachonmiki kaje china,
atungshongwui sokhami,
kathukalungli khaleiya sokhami tara̱ kathā,
mathik eina naopamwui sokhame china nali somira.
Katang makhavai kaphungwui sokhamile,
katang makhavai phungrābingwui makhavātali;
navāwui sokhamina mataimeikhara;
chi achinā ngarāwui eina ngateithui kahaiya Josephwui kuitungli leimichingranu.
Benjamin thailak kahaiya ramfana,
ngathorshong ashailaga,
ngazin ngayar khaunga china.”
Saikora hi Israelwui shang tharāda khani china; kala avāva̱na athumli mikharān sokhami milaga kahāng chi hina.
Chiwui thili ana athumli kasatta hānga, “Ara ishawo ishayiwuili vākhavai Hitpa Ephronwui luiwukwui ngalungkhur chili ishāvā ngarāli ngasoda chifalu,
kaja Mach-pelahli khalei Mamrewui zimikshoshong Canaan ngaleili Abrahamna lui eina ngasoda chikhur sākhavai Ephronli lokakhui akhur chili chizanlu.
Apam chili athumna Abraham eina apreiva̱ Sarahli chifaya; Isaac eina apreiva̱ Rebekah chifaya; kala chili ina Leahli chifaya—
lam eina lungkhur chi Hitnaowui eina lokakhuina.”
Jacobna naomayarabingli kasatmi kahaiwui thili ana aphei pettungli khāngkai, kala khanaowa khaksui suilaga, awui awo-ayibingli vāhaowa.
Chieina Josephna avāva̱li mai ngasunda chaplaga avāva̱wui mai maya̱ya.
Kala Josephna awui khanongbingli avāva̱wui phasāli makashui ari neomi khavai kasoi. Chieina khanongbingna Israelwui phasāli ari neomi;
chi khaneo zimiksho hangmatithang zanga, kaja chirankha zangphalunga. Kala Egyptnaobingna zimiksho hangshinithang chapngachai.
Kala awui vang chapkhangachā atam peikahai eina Josephna Pharaohshi shimkhurli hānga, “Ili nathumwui mikyanli leishimiakha, ina kapona, Pharaohli hāngmilu,

Ishāvāna ili khangashit akha sangasakta ‘I ara thiki jiura; Canaanli ina sākahai chikhur chili nana ili ungchifalu’ da hānghaili. Chiwui vang ara apam chili ishāvāli chifa khavai ili khamayā milu, ina kapona; chiwui thili ina hanungnaoga.”
Pharaohna, “Navāna ngashit ngasak kahai athishurda achifahaolu.” da ngahānkai.
Chieina Josephna avāva̱li chifa khavai vai; ali ngasoda Pharaohwui rao shimkhurwui khararabing, kala Egyptwui khararnaobing,
kala Josephwui shimkhur saikorala, achinā ngarāla, avāva̱shi shimkhurla vāsera; naoshinaobing kala sha̱keibingmāng Goshenli haisai.
Kala siguigari eina sigui katongabing khanini zangda ali ngasovai; hi mikazip kahaka akhana.
Jordan kānda Atadwui lanpumli vākashung tharān apam chili athumna wukkhananglāk eina achapngachai; kala Josephna avāva̱wui vang shinithang chapngachai.

Atadwui lanpumli malungringlak eina chapkhangachā chi Canaannaobingna theilaga athumna hānga, “Hi Egyptnaobingwui vang khananglāk kahai akhara.” da hānga. Chiwui vang apam chili Abel-mizraim hoi; hi Jordan kong kānlaga lei.
Avāva̱na kaso kahai tākam eina anaomayarabingna sāmi;

kaja anaomayarana ali Canaan ngaleili khuishangda Mamrewui zingshoshong, Mach-pelahli khalei luiwukwui ngalungkhur, Hitpa Ephronwui eina Abrahamna lokakhui chikhur sāda haiching khavai lungkhur chili chifaya.
Avāva̱li chifa kahaiwui thili Josephna achināngarā kala ali khangasobing saikorali ngasoda Egyptli hanunga.
Josephwui achinā ngarāna avāva̱ thikahai chi theilaga athum hāngngaroka, “Josephna ithumli ningkachaida ali ithumna makaphā sākahai chiwui vang athut khuipai.”
Chieina athumna Josephli pao akha chiphunvāda hānga, “Nashavā mathiranglakha hithāda hānghaili,

‘Josephli hānglu, achinā ngarāwui morei kala khayon pheomilu, kaja athumna nali makaphā sāhaida lei.’ Chieina ara navāwui Varewui rao ithumwui khayonkhamāng pheomilu.” Athumwui tui chi shālaga Josephna chapa.
Kala achinā ngarāna awui mangāli vālaga mai mashunzangda hānga, “Yanglu, ithum nawui raosera.”
Kha Josephna athumli hānga, “Mangacheelu, I Varivarawui pamli leila?
Nathumna ili makaphā saga da phaningsālapai, kha Varena kaphā sāmihaowa, kaja aja hithāda mi kachungkhali ringngasak khavai kasāna.
Chiwui vang eina mangacheelu; ina nathumli kala naoshinaobinglila mizāchingra.” Hithāda athumli ringphāda ninglum ngasaka.
Chithāda sāda Joseph kala avāva̱wui shimkhur saikora Egyptli pama; kala Josephna kum shākha tharā okthui.
Anaomayara Ephraimwui naongarā, thot kathum eina tangda thei; kala Manassehwui naomayara Machirwui naongarā Josephwui makāli pharāsanga.
Kala Josephna achināngarāli hānga, “I thiki jihaira; kha Varena nathumli ngasomida, Abrahamli, Isaacli, Jacobli ngashit kahai lam chili, apam hiwui eina thānshokra.”
Chiwui thili Josephna Israelwui naomayarabingli khangashit akha sāngasakta hānga, “Varena nathumli ngasomira, kala iwui ara̱kui hiwui eina nathumna phungthuira.”
Chithāda Josephna kum shākha tharā kākashung eina thihaowa; kala ari neolaga aphasā chi kathi okoli sangda Egyptli hai.
Reuben, Simeon, Levi, kala Judah;
Issachar, Zebulun kala Benjamin;
Dan eina Naphtali, Gad eina Asher;
Jacobwui naotun katonga hangshinina; Joseph rida Egypt ngaleili vahairasai.
Khaleilaga Josephla, achinā ngarāla, kala athumwui thot saikora thiserhaowa,
kha Israelwuiwui naotunbing, athei matheida mataisanglakhaowa; athum chungkhangai chungsangda kapanga yur sathuihaowa, chieina ngalei chi athumna pemhaowa.
Kala ana awui mibingli hānga, “Yanglu, Israelnaobing chungnāhaira, kala ithumli singyuihaira.
Rālu, ithumna athumli sāshilak eina sāsa, maningakha athum chungsang mamānda ithumli yangkashebingna rai rakatā tharan, athumna yangkashibingwui mijang zangda ithumli ngararda yāmshokhaowa.”
Chiwui vang eina athum ot chotlak eina sākhavai kashina phāsanga, kala Pharaohwui lanshim keinung khani, Pithom eina Ra-amses sākhui.
Kha mataimeida rekharek, chungmeida mataisang kala chungmeida ngayaovai. Kala Egyptnaobingna Israelnaobingli ngacheehaowa.
Chiwui vang Israelnaobingli chotlak eina otram ngatha̱ ngasaka,
kala athumwui mirin sipsālak eina sāmida chek kachanla, luiwui ot kasā saikorala, kala otpam kachida chotlak eina sāngasaka.
Chiwui thili Hebrew sha̱naobingwui nao khuitākhamiva̱ khani; Shiphra eina Puahli awungana hānga,
“Hebrew preinaona nao kapharā tharan, pharākatā chi yanglaga, mayarnaoakha sāthathaolu, kha sha̱naoakha ringngasaklu.”
Naosak kasingva̱ khani china Vareli khangacheewui vāng Egypt awungana kakaso athishurda masāmana, kha mayarnaobingla ringngasaka.
Chieina Egyptwui awungana anili hokhuida hānga, “Khisāda angangnao mayarnaobingli ringkhangasakkhala?”
Anina Pharaohli hānga, “Kachiwui vangkhala kaja, Hebrew preinaobing hiya Egypt preinao mathāmana, athuma yāng kāhaida naosak kasingbing marāranglakha pharāhairasāsā ji.”
Chithāda Varena naosak kasingbing chili ngasomi, kala mibing mataisangda panglākhaowa.
Kala naosak kasingbing china Vareli khangacheewui vāng athumwui shimkhurla mataisang ngasaka.
Chiwui thili Pharaohna awui mi saikorali kasoi, “Hebrew shimkhurli kapharā mayarnao saikora Nile kongli horsanghaolu, kha sha̱naobinga ringranu.”
Chitharan Levi shimkhurwui mayarnao akhana Levi sha̱nao akhali ngakuma.
Preiva̱ chi nao vaida mayarnao akha pharai. Ana nao chi yanglaga mathālakhaoda kachāng kathum thumhai.
Kha mathumrarchingthuda chihirthing eina luk akha sākhuida bitumen eina khe neokazazaklaga nao chi chili sanglaga kongpheili, titi ngachai vāhaihaowa.
Achonva̱na khi shoknikhala da khalāda ngashānpama.
Ana phutkhayang eina nao zangsai; kala yanglu nao chi chapsai. Ana nao chili lumashanhaowa, kala “Hi Hebrewnaowui naolakra” da hānga.
Chieina Pharaohwui naongalava̱li nao chiwui achonva̱ china hānga, “Nao hi nganaomi khavai Hebrew preinao akha ahomirala?”
Pharaohwui naongalava̱na hānga, “Ahokhuilu.” Chieina ngalava̱ china naowui ava̱va̱li unghokhui.
Kala Pharaohwui naongalava̱na hānga, “Nao hi iwui vang ungnganaomilu, ina chiwui aman mira.” Chieina preiva̱ china nao chi khuida ungnganaokhui.
Kala nao chi raruda Pharaohwui naongalāva̱li khuivāmi, kala awui nao sāhaowa; kala ana ali Moses da phokmi, kaja ana hānga, “Ali ina tara̱wui eina khuikashokna.”
Ana kapeiung kapeivāda mi maleikasā eina Egyptnaopā chili sāthatlaga situilungli yātphumhaowa.
Akhama kathā khavā tharan, Hebrewnao khani ngama̱sai. Chieina ana khayonpa chili hānga, “Khisāda nasotali shaokhala?”
Pharaohna chi kashā eina, ali sāthat khavai phai.
Kha Mosesna Pharaohwui eina yāmhaida Midian ngaleili vāpamhaowa; kala ana ra̱khongphei akhali apamzanga.
Chitharan Midian pāngmonwui naongalava̱ shini leisai, athumna avāva̱wui yaoshangli tara̱ shiman khavai reija̱ chipemkida tara̱ sokkhavai rārāsai.
Yaokahom kachikathābingna rāda athumli kashama; kha Mosesna nganingkāda athumli ngachonmi, kala athumwui yaoshangli tara̱ shimana.
Athumna avāva̱ Reuelwuili khaung eina, ana ngahāna, “Aja hiyākha thākta khaung hi kathāhaokhala?”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Egyptnao akhana yaokahomabingwui eina ngachonmida ithumli tara̱ eina tangda ana sokmi, kala yaoshanglila shimana.”
Ana anao ngalāva̱bingli hānga, “A kali leili? Khisāda ali nathumna nothāhao? Ahokhuilu, ungphazākhuiranu.”
Kala Mosesna ashiwuili pamkhavai mayāhaowa, kala ana Mosesli anaongalava̱ Zipporahli miya.
Ana mayarnao akha pharāda Gershom hoi, kaja Mosesna hānga, “I mi kateiwui ngaleili kapāna kha̱mi ngasāsai.”
Atam kasāngkhawui thili Egyptwui awunga thihaowa. Kala Israelnaobingna raopamwui lungli khanangda ringkhangā khangahui, kala ngachonmi khavai khangakao chi Varewuili shākai.
Kala Varena athumwui ringkhangā chi shāda, Abraham, Isaac, kala Jacobli tuingashit kasā chi phaningunga.
Kala Varena Israelnaobingli yanglaga athumwui kashok-kazang chi theimi.
Kala
Chieina Mosesna hānga, “Kathāda thing chi machuitāmakhala, ina lākhavāk chi vāyangkhuira.”
Ana nganaida ayang khavai khavā chi
Ana ngahānkai, “I hili lei.”
Kala ana hānga, “I navā ngarāwui Vare, Abrahamwui Vare, Isaacwui Vare, kala Jacobwui Vare china.” Kala Mosesna amai kafahaowa, kaja a Vareli yangki kaji ngacheehaowa.
Chieina

Chieina athumli Egyptnaobingwui eina kanshok khavai, kala chiwui eina thānshokta seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalonga khamathā kala khamashā apam Canaannao, Hitnao, Amornao, Periznaobing, Hivnaobing, kala Jebusnaobingwui ngaleili thānvā khavai I katāna.
Ara yanglu, Israelnaobingwui ringkhangā ina shāhaira. Kala Egyptnaobingna rekakharek chi theihaira.
Chithāda sāda rālu, Egyptwui eina iwui mibing, Israelnaobingli thānshok khavai ina nali Pharaohwuili chihovāra.”
Kha Mosesna Vareli ngahānkai, “I khipada ina Pharaohli vāda Egyptwui eina Israelnaobingli thānshokrakhala?”
Ana hānga, “Ina nali ngasomira: kala nali ina kachihona kaji hieina theikhuira: Egyptwui eina athumli thānkashok tharan, Vareli nathumna phungrei hili otram ngatha̱ra.”
Kala Varenala Mosesli hānga, “Israelnaobingli hithāda ahānglu, ‘
Zatlu, kala Israelwui khararnaobingli kazipkhuida hānglu,

kala ina khangashitna, Egypt ngaleili kakhanang kachotwui eina thānshokta Canaannaobing, Hitnaobing, Amor, Periznaobing, Hivnaobing, kala Jebusnaobingwui ngalei seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalong chili thānvāra.
“Athumna nawui tui khuira; kala Israel ararbingli ngasoda nathum Egypt awungali ahāngra, ‘
Pangshapa akhana tandi kasā maningakha Egyptwui awungana nathumli mamayāmara kaji ina thei.
Chieina ina ipāng katingda Egyptli sākhangayi matakhak kahai tandi mira, chitharan mayānaora.
Ina nathumli Egyptnaobingna khayā shingasakra chithāda sāda iwui mibingna kathui tharan, athumna pāng khamasai eina mathuimara.

Israel prei kachiva̱na awui Egypt khongnaiva̱, kala awui shimli yaothuikharāva̱, athumwui eina lupāla, kashan-kachonla pokhuida, chi nanaongarā, mayarnao sha̱naobingli chiphunhaora; Egyptnaobingwui lan khuithuihaora.
Chieina Mosesna ngahānkai, “Kha kalikhada athumna iwui tui makhuila lah mashitsangla, athumna; ‘
na ali hānga, “Napāngli kasing chi khikhala?” Ana hānga, “Lijeina.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Ngaleili hortālu,” chieina ana lijei chi ngaleili hortai kala chi phara̱ ngasāthuihaowa; kala Mosesna sa̱na̱unga.
Chieina
“Chi athumna
Chiwui thili Varena hānga, “Napāng nawui pha̱honlungli thara̱zangluilu.” Chieina ana apāng phahonlungli thara̱zanglui; kala ana khuishokta khayang eina awui phasā khangachā thāda raihairasai.
“Athumna nali mashitsangakha, lah khare khudam chili mahengsangakha, khudam kakhanepā chili shitsangra.
Athumna khudam khaninili mashitsangakha, lah nawui tuili mahengsangakha, Nile kongwui tara̱ kateokha khuilaga ngalei katheng tungli heirorlu; Nile tara̱ chi ngalei katheng tungli ashee ngasāhaora.”
Kha Mosesna
Chieina
Chieina ara vālu, ina nakhamorli ngasomira, kala khi matuirakhala kaji chi tamchitheira.”
Kha ana hānga, “O iwui
Chiwui vang
Nana ali ngazekta tui saikora ali hāngngasaklu; kala ina nakhamorlila, a khamorlila ngasomira, kala nanina khi sārakhala kajila tamchitheira.
Nawui vang ana mili hāngmira; kala a nawui khamor ngasāra, kala nana awui vang Vare kathā sāra.
Kala khudam sāchithei khavai lijei hi nana khuiphungra.”
Mosesna awova̱ Jethrowuili latungda hānga, “Egyptli khalei ichināngarā ringchingda leika kathakhala ungyang khavai ili lumashanmida khaung ngasakmilu.” Jethrona Mosesli hānga, “Chingri eina ungulu.”
Chieina Mosesna apreiva̱, kala naomayarabing gadhāli tongngasakta Egypt ngaleili hanunga; kala Mosesna apāngli Varewui lijei chi singphunga.
Kala
Chieina nana Pharaohli hāngra, ‘
Ina nali kahāngna, ‘Ili otram ngatha̱ khavai inaomayarali chihohaolu”; kalikhada nana mamayāsākha, ina nawui naochizai sāthathaora.’ ”
Athumna zatlakha, athumna ngayā ngasām khavai apam akhali
Kha Zipporahna lungkainao akha khuida anaomayarawui ahui rimshokmilaga Moseswui pheili sāza̱da hānga, “Kachangkhat eina na iwui ashee khangaruma gaharana!”
Chieina ana ali khikha mathathuwa. Hi preiva̱na, “Ahui rimkashok mangā eina ashee khangaruma gaharana” da kahāngwui vangna.”
Mosesna Aaronli
Chieina Moses eina Aaronna vāda Israelwui ararbing saikorali kazipkhui.
Kala Mosesli Varena hāngkahai saikora chi Aaronna hāngchithei kala mibingwui miktāli khudambing sāchithei.
Mibingna shitsanghaowa; kala
Chiwui thili Moses eina Aaronna Pharaohli vāda hānga, “Israelwui
Kha Pharaohna hānga, “Israelnaobingli zatngasak khavai ina kahāng nganāki kaji
Chieina anina hānga, “Hebrewnaobingwui Vare inili samphanghaira, chieina kathumthangzat lamhāngli vāda
Kha Egypt awungana anili hānga, “Moses eina Aaron, kachiwui vang eina mibingli ot masā ngasakla khuithuiki kajikhala! Nathum otpamli vaulu.”
Kala Pharaohna hānga, “Ara ngalei hiwui mili athumna chungmeikharhaira, laga athumli otpamwui eina ngasām ngasaki kajila!”
Chithang ngalāngda Pharaohna mibingli kashinabing kala khayangabingli hānga,
“Khareli athumli chek semkhavai lanji khami thāda mamiluipaimara, athum khalattana aphākhuiranu.
Kha athumna kharewui kasā thāda chek mashinga masuitāpaimana, kaja athum ngachāng makāmada chi eina athumna chapta, ‘ithumwui Vareli apha̱phayā khavai chihomilu’ kajina.
Athumli ot ritmeida milu; thakha ot sāthuihaida mikhanamtui khamatui maphaningluimara.”
Chieina kashinabing kala khayangabing china athumli hānga, “Pharaohna kahāngna, ‘Ina nathumli lanji mamiluimara.
Lanji khalaleipamli kachichāna aphākhuilu, kha nathumwui ot kasāva masuitāpaimara.’ ”
Chiwui vang athumna Egypt ngalei kachiva̱li vāda lanji pongzata.
Kashinabing china mangasāmlakla hānga, “Thakta sālu, lanji milakhawui ot kasā thāda thangthangwui ot kuphalungra.”
Kala Israelnaobingwuitungli yangkhame sangkahaibing chili akhavābingna shaomamanda hānga, “Kachiwui vang eina thang-thangwui sāki kaji chek kharewui kasā thāda makup kajikhala?”
Chieina Israelnaobingwui ngachaili yangkhamebing china Pharaohli chapta rāhānga, “Naraobingli kathāda hithāda kasākhala?
Naraobingli lanji mamimana, laga athumna ithumli ‘Chek sālu!’ ji. Yanglu nawui raobingli kathāda shaomikhala; nava nawui mibingli malumashanmana.”
Kha ana hānga, “Nathum chāngshiya; kala nathum ot masāngaimana, chiwui vang eina ‘
Ungulu, ot asaulu; kaja lanji mamiluimara, kha nathum chek mashing khangachā chi sāchingphalungra.”
“Nathum thangthangwui chek mashing masuitāpaimara” kaji shālaga, kalākashi ot rāhaira da Israelnaobingwui yangkhamebingna thei.
Pharaohwui eina kashok eina, athumli samphang khavai ngaraikasā Moses eina Aaronli samphanga.
Athumna anili hānga, “
Chieina Mosesna
Khikhalajila Pharaohli nawui ming singda ina vāhāngkhare eina thuida ana mibingli sāshida sāhaira, kala nana mibingli ngatangkhui khavai khikha masāmana.”
Kala Varena Mosesli hānga; “
Ina Abrahamli, Isaacli, Jacobli sāshapa Varena da chithei, kha athumli
Athumli ina iwui tuingashit sai, chiya athumna lam phāda kha̱mi thāda pānda khalei Cannan ngalei chi mirada.
Chili lāngda Egyptnaobingna narhaida khalei Israelnaobingna ringkhangā chi ina shāda iwui tuingashit chi phaningunga.
Chiwui vang eina Israelnaobingli hānglu, ‘
Iwui mi sākhavai ina nathumli khuira, kala I nathumwui Vare sāra, kala Egyptnaobingwui kachotkachāng eina thānkashoka
Kala Abrahamli, Isaacli, Jacobli mirada ngashit kahai lam chili ina thānungra; chi nathumwui ngasā khavai ina mira.
Mosesna athumli chi tākam eina hānga, kha athumna manganāmimana, kaja athumli sāshida narhaoda manglā yurhaowa.
Chieina
“Vālu, kala Egypt awunga Pharaohli, awui ngaleiwui eina Israelnaobing thuikhavai ahānglu.”
Kha Mosesna
Kha
Simeonwui naomayarabing: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar, kala Shaul Canaanpāva̱na kapharāna; hi Simeonwui shimkhurbingna.
Athumwui naotunbingwui athishurda Leviwui naomayarabing: Gershon, Kohath kala Merari, kala Leviwui okthot zingkum shākha thumrāda shinina.
Gershonwui naomayarabing: Libni eina Shime-i shimkhur khani.
Kohathwui naomayarabing: Amram, Izhar, Hebron kala Uzziel, kala Kohathna zingkum shakha thumrāda kathum okthuiya.
Merariwui naomayarabing: Mahli eina Mushi. Athum naotunbingwui athishurda hi Levishi shimkhurna.
Amramna avāva̱wui azara Joshebedli khui, kala ana Aaron eina Mosesli pharai, Amaramna zingkum shākha thumrāda shini okthui.
Izharwui naomayarabing: Corah Nepheg kala Zichri.
Uzzielwui naomayarabing: Maishel, Elzaphan kala Sithrina.
Aaronna Amminadabwui naongalava̱ Nashonshi azara Elishebali ngakuma; ana Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar kala Ithamar athumli pharai.
Corahwui naomayarabing: Assir, Elkanah kala Abisaph; hi Corahshina.
Eleazar Aaronwui naomayarana Puti-elshi ngalānao akhali khuida Phinehasli pharai. Hi Levi shimkurwui athishurda awo-ayi shim-shimwui akuibingna.
Hi
Egypt ngaleiwui eina Israelnaobingli khuishok khavai Pharaohli akhangazeka khani chi Moses eina Aaronna.
Egypt ngaleili
ana ali “I
Kha Mosesna
Ina nali kakaso saikora nana hāngra, kala nachinā Aaronna Pharaohli ngalei hiwui eina Israelnaobingli chiho khavai hāngra.
Kha ina Pharaohwui wuklung mararmihaora, kala ina iwui machut kala matakhak kahai khudam Egypt ngaleili mataisangra,
Pharaohna nali makhuikasang tharan; Egyptwuitungli ipāng parra kala iwui mibing Israelwui naobingli Egypt ngaleiwui eina hakkhamahā mashun bichar eina thānshokra.
Ipāng katingda Egyptwui eina Israelnaobingli thānkashok tharan athumna I Varena kaji theikhuira.”
Moses eina Aaronna chithāda sai;
Anina Pharaohli akhangazek atamli Moses zingkum hangchishat kāhairasai kala Aaron hangchishatta kathumhairasai.
“Pharaohna nanili, ‘Matakkhak kahai ot eina sachitheilu’ jiakha, nana Aaronli hānglu, ‘Nawui khāmshui chi phara̱ onkhavai Pharaohwui mangāli hortālu.’”
Chieina
Chieina Pharaohna awui kathemabing kala Egyptwui mitrang sākatheibingli hokhuida, athumnala athumwui khangathum mitrang eina chi tākam eina sai.
Kaja athum ava̱va̱na horkatā khāmshui chi phara̱ sāthuiserhaowa. Kha Aaronwui khāmshuina athumwui khāmshui saikora mayuitāserhaowa.
Chithālala Pharaohwui wuklung mararshaphai, kala
Chieina
Ngathorshong kongpheili ali vangaraisālu, Pharaohna tara̱pamli rārāsāra; kala phara̱ onkahaia khāmshui chi khuiphunglu.
Kala hithāda hānglu,
Hithāda
Nile kongwui khai thihaida nganamshira, chieina Egyptnaobingna Nile kongwui tara̱ mamangpaimara.’”
Kala
Kongwui khai thiserhaowa kala Nile kong nganamshihaowa, Egyptnaobingna Nilewui tara̱ chi mamangpaithumana, kala Egypt ngalei hupta asheemānghaowa.
Kha Egyptwui mitrang kathembing chinala, athumwui khangathum mitrang eina chithāda sai, chiwui vang eina Pharaohwui wuklung marar ngasakshona, kala
Pharaohna awui shimli latungda ningli shik majilakmana.
Kala mangkhavai tara̱wui vang Egyptnaobingna Nile kong ngalengda ra̱khong khonkhui; kaja kongwui tara̱ chi mamangpaithuwa.
Nile kongli
Chiwui thili
Kha kalikhada nana athumli machihoakha, ina awui ngalei apam saikorali khaifa shokngasakta chotngasakra;
Nile kong khaifa pemhaora nawui konungli, petkāli kala petlila, kala nawui otshinabingwui shimlila, mibingwui shimlila, kala nawui hampamla, khamui naikhavai akhongbingla,
nawuitunglila, mibingwuitunglila, kala otshinabingwuitunglila khaifabingna ngawokrorra.’ ”
Kala
Chieina Aaronna Egyptwui tara̱tungli apāng katingvai; kala khaifa kachungkha shokta Egypt ngalei pemhaowa.
Kha mitrang kathembing chinala khangathuma mitrang eina chi tākam eina satheida Egypt ngaleili khaifa shokngasaka.
Chiwui thili Pharaohna Moses eina Aaronli hokhuida hānga, “Iwui eina kala iwui mibingwui eina khaifabing khuithuimi khavai

Mosesna Pharaohli hānga, “Nawui kala nawui otsinabingwui eina kala nawui mibingwui eina khaifabing shimānmihaida na kala nawui shimli maleila Nile kongmāngli leingasaklu kaji hi katharan pomilu jikhala?”
Ana hānga, “Akhama.” Mosesna hānga, “Nawui kahāng chi shokranu, chieina
Nawui kala nawui shimwui eina kala nawui otshinabing kala mibingwui eina khaifabing hi thuiserhaida Nile kongmāngli leimara.”

Kala Mosesna kapo chi
Kala athumna akhum akhum eina kazipkhuida aram chi nganamshiruthaowa.
Kha vikasang kathei eina Pharaohwui wuklung mararluishithaowa, kala
Chiwui thili
Kala anina chithāda sai; Aaronna pāng katingda awui khāmshui eina ngaphita, chifa-chihā saikora tumit sathuiserhaida mila matei, sāla matei, aram katongali tumitmānghaowa.
Mitrang kathembingna tumit sāshok khavai athumwui khangathuma mitrang eina sālala mararthuwa.
Kala mitrang kathembing china Pharaohli hānga, “Hi Varewui pāng eina kashokna!” Kha Pharaohwui wuklungva mararshāphaoda,
Chiwui thili

Kalikhada, iwui mibingli nana machihoakha, yanglu, ina hāchāng asum-sum eina chihoda nali, nawui otshinabingli, nawui mibingli, nawui shimli, Egypt katongawui shim hāchāng eina pemngasakra; kala athumna nganing khavaipamlila pemngasakra.
Kha chithangva Goshenwui lam, ina iwui mibing pamkhavai pam chi ngatei ngasakra, kaja chili hāchāng malei ngasakmara, chieina ngalei hili I
Chithāda sāda iwui mi eina nawui mili ina ngateingasakra. Khudam hi akhama shokra.’”
na chithāda sai, hāchāng asum-sum eina rāda Pharaohwui shimli, otshinabingwui shimli, Egypt ngalei katonga hāchāngna pemtinghaoda khikha masāpaithuwa.
Chieina Pharaohna Moses eina Aaronli hokhuida hānga, “Vāda ngalei hili nathumwui Vareli apha̱phayālu.”
Kha Mosesna hānga, “Hi kasā mamashungmara, kaja ithumwui
Ithumna kathumthangzatwui vāng lamhāng akhali vāda
Chieina Pharaohna hānga, “Ina nawui
Chieina Mosesna hānga, “Yanglu, ina nawui eina shokta

Kala Mosesna kahāng thāda
Kha chieina tangda Pharaohwui wuklung mararhaida athumli machiholuithuwa.

wui pāng eina zakkashi seimao rāda luili khalei siguibing, gadhābing, utbing, seibing, yaobing kala mebing saikorawuitungli tāra.

Kala akhama kathā
Pharaohna ayang ngasakta, Israelnaobingwui sha̱kei akhala mathisāmana, kha Pharaohwui wuklung marartithaida mibingli machihothuwa.
Kala
Chieina Egypt katongali khamanaka chifa thāda ngapuivāra kala chi moksā shokngasakta Egypt ngaleili khalalei mila sha̱keila ngatorserra.”
Chieina anina meiphungwui hotla khuida Pharaohwui mangāli anganinga, kala Mosesna kazingramshong horkakā eina moksā sathuihaida mila sha̱keila ngatorserhaowa.
Mitrang kathemabing chi Moseswui mangāli manganingrarthuwa, kaja athumla, Egyptwui mi katongala moksā shokserhaowa.
Kha
Chiwui thili
Ajawui hile I kathā okathuili maleimana kaji theikhavai, nali, nawui otshinabingli kala mi saikorawuitungli kachotkachāng rāngasakra.
Kaja ina ipāng katingshokta nali kala nawui mibingli kazātkashi eina ngaphitta ara okathuiwui eina shimānhairara;
kha hiwui vang ina nathumli ringkhangasakna, iwui pangshap nathumli chitheida, okathui katongali iwui ming ngayaovāra.
Arui eina tangda nakhalatta langsoda iwui mibingli sāshida lei, kala athumli machihomana.
Yanglu, akhama hitharan Egypt leikaphok eina thuida aja rāshungda hithāda mashoklakrang kaji thei panglāk eina tāngasakra,
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui sha̱kei kala luili khalei saikora ngayin khavaipamli haiserhaolu; khikhalajila shimli makhuikhaunga mi, sha̱kei kachiva̱ theina athumli tākrorda thiserhaora.”
Chieina
wui tui makhuikasangabingna athumwui raonaobing kala sha̱keibing luili haisera.
Kala
Chieina Mosesna awui khāmshui singda kazingramli apāng katingkai; kala
thei marda katā eina ngasoda mei phikphik ngasheivā ngasakta Egyptna yur akha khangasāwui eina thuida thei chiyakha katā maleilakrangsai.
Egypt ngaleiwui luili khalei ot kachiva̱, mila, sha̱keila theina tākthatserhaowa; kala lui vāsang kahai theishirai kachiva̱, kala thingrong eina tangda tākkazammiserhaowa.
Israelnaona pamkhavai Goshen ngalei apammāngli thei matāmana.
Chieina Pharaohna Moses eina Aaronli ahokhui ngasakta hānga, “Ajawui hili ina morei sāhaira,
wui kazing khangashum thei katā shaphaira,

Kha kazing khangashumla, thei katāla, zingrotla vānkahai chi theilaga Pharaohna morei sāluishita, ala, awui raobingla wuklung mararungluishita.

Kala I
Chieina Moses eina Aaronna Pharaohli vāda hānga, “Hebrewwui
Kaja nana iwui mibingli thuikhavai mamayākha, akhama nawui ngaleili ina khaoh rāngasakra,
kala ngalei pemhaida leimai matheimara; theina matākthatkhangakān kala luili khalei thingnā-ra̱hāla athumna shaiserhaora,

kala navā ngarā lah nawo ngarāna okathui hili rāthang eina thuida aja rāshungda athumna matheilakrang kaji khaohbingna nawui shimla, nawui otshinabingwui shimla Egypt katongawui shim pemhaora.” Chiwui thili ana ngareithuida Pharaohwui eina shokhaowa.
Pharaohwui otshinabingna ali hānga, “Mi hina ithumli karankha khalen sangfarakhala? Athumwui
Chieina Moses eina Aaronli Pharaohwuili khuiraluishitta hānga, “
Mosesna hānga, “Khararnaosan mateila, naomayarabing, naongalava̱bing, kala ithumwui yaola, seila, ngasovāserra; kaja
Chieina ana anili hānga, “Ina nathumli kala nathumwui ayaonaosan eina tangda nathumli ngasovā ngasakakha
Masākapai otna, mayarnaomāng akhorumlu, chi shapa.” Kala anili Pharaohwui eina kashamshokhaowa.
Chieina
Chithāda Mosesna awui khāmshui singda Egypt ngaleili apāng khāngkakā eina
Kala khaohbing chi rāda Egypt apam saikorali ngayaohaowa, chiyākha kachunga khaoh asum eina Egypt ngalei katongali rākapam chi ridala marāshokrangsai, lah naodala mashokluimara.

Kaja apam kachiva̱ pemhaida leimai chi zikhaowa, kala thingnā-ra̱hā, athei-arai theina matakhangakān chi athumna shaimiserhaowa, khamatek anui kashon kaho akhala mataimimana, Egypt ngalei peida thingla akharla mataimilakmana.

Chiwui vang eina iwui morei akhashida pheomida, kathibing hi iwui eina khuithuimi khavai himang
Chiwui vang ana Pharaohwui eina shokta
Kala
Kha
Chiwui thili
Chieina Mosesna kazingramli pāng katingkakā eina Egypt ngalei saikorali kathumthang tangmangtinghaowa;
akha eina akha mathei ngarokrarthumana, kathumthang athumna khaleipam chiwui eina mangatha̱paithuwa; kha Israelnaobinga athumwui pamkhavai chili kahor samphanga.
Chieina Pharaohna Mosesli hokhuida hānga, “Thuiulu, nathumwui naoshinaobingla thānvāda
Kha Mosesna hānga, “
Ithumwui sha̱keila ithumli ngasovāphalungra, akha eina tangda manothapaimara, kaja ithumna ithumwui Vare
Kha
Kala Pharaohna athumli hānga, “Iwui eina thuihaolu; kala ning ngasharlu, ili marāluilakalu, izak theithang na thira.”
Mosesna hānga, “Nana kahāng thāda ina nali nazak matheiluilakmara.”
Mi saikorana shākhavai hānglu kaja mayarnao kala preinao kachiva̱na kachichāshi khongnainaoli sināwui, lupāsāwui chara̱-chasān pokhui ngasaklu.”
Kaja Egyptnaobingna athumli ngahānngai khavai
Kala Mosesna hānga, “
kala Egypt ngaleili pharākhare katonga thira, wungpamkhongli kapama Pharaohwui naochizai eina thuida mā kharungva̱ rao sha̱naowui naochizai, kala sha̱kei pharākhare eina tangda katonga thira.
Kala Egypt ngalei katongali chapkhangachā hāngkhavai maleimara; chikathā mashoklakranga, kala kashokla mashokluimara.
Israelnaobingli nilala, mibingli nilala, sāyurbingli nichilala fa akha eina tangda makhongmara. Chithāda sāda Prohona Egypt eina Israelli ngakheikhang eina sai kaji nana theira.
Kala nawui otshinabing hina ili rāda ngakhumshāmda, ‘Thuiulu, nawui thi kashurbingla thuiserulu’ da hāngra, chiwui thili I thuihaora.” Kala ana malungvātta thurshi Pharaohwui eina thuihaowa.
Chiwui thili
Moses eina Aaronna Pharaohwui mangāli matakhak kahai ot saikora hi sai, kala
Aja kachāng hina nathumwui vang kum haokaphoka kachāng khare ngasāra.
Israel katongali hānglu kaja kachāng hiwui katharāthang shimkhur kachiva̱ kala shimlak kachiva̱na yaonao akharip khuirāra.
Shimkhur akha mi teonāhaida tongda mashokrarakha ashiwui khongnaishili mi chākyanglaga shaikashap athishurda ngafara.
Yaonao nilala, me nilala, achuk kapeiya kumkhawui avānao khuira;
kala chi kachāng hiwui tharāda khamatethang eina tangda hailaga, Israel kazip ashangva̱na chithang zimik atun ngasha̱da taithatra.
Kala athumna zākhavaipamli ashee kateokha khuilaga khāmongthing khanganing khani eina khamakharli ashee kateokharip neora.
Athumna chithang ngayā asā chi ruishaira, khawok makazang khamui kala khārisi kaje thingnā han eina ngasoda shaira.
Kharing eina kala tara̱ eina hanglaga mashaialu, kha akuila, apheila akhari-akharāla meili ruishailu.
Kala ngathorshong vāshungda mataihaipaimana; ngathor eina tangda katai leisālala meili riktāhaolu.
Nathumna hithāda shaira; nathumna kashān masa̱laga, pheihop sanglaga, kala napāngli khāmshui ngazunglaga katotlak eina shaiki kajina. Hi
Kaja chithang ngayā ina Egypt ngalei makānda, Egypt ngaleili pharākhare saikora sāthatra; mila, sha̱keila; kala Egyptwui varebing saikorawuitungli ina mashun bichar sāra: I
Ashee china khudam sāda nathum khaleipam theikhuira, kala ashee chi ina theilaga nathumli makānmihaida, Egypt ngaleili sākathat tharan kazātkashi mimao nathumli maraza̱mara.

“Shinithang khawok makazang khamui shaira, kharethang khawok saikora shimwui eina horserhaora, kala kharethang eina thuilaga kashinethang eina tangda khawok kazanga khamui kashai mi chili Israelwui eina katathaora.
Kharethang nathumna kathara kazip khuira, kala kashinethang kathara kazip khuira; chiwui atamli ot masāpaimana; kha chithang zāki kaji chi nanina ngarānmira.

Kala khawok makazang khamui phanit nathumna mayonra, kaja chithang nathum katongali ina Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānkashokna: Chiwui vang eina thot kachida nathumna zimiksho hi shiyan sāda mayonchingphalungra.
Kachāng kharewui tharāda khamatethang ngazin eina thuida kachāng chiwui maga̱da kharethang ngazin eina tangda khawok makazang khamui shaira,
khikhalajila shinithangwui vang nathumwui shimli khawok maleipaimara, kala khawok kazang kashai mi chi, ngasokharā kha̱miranu, ngalei chiwui miranu, Israel ashangva̱wui eina katathaora.
Nathum khawok kazang mashaipailakmana, nathumwui shim kachiva̱li khawok makazangmāng shaiki kajina.”
Chiwui thili Mosesna Israel khararnao saikorali hokhuida hānga, “Kachichashi shimkhurwui athishurda yaonao kapangkhuida makānkhami sā taithatlu.

Maharnā sinkha khuida khongsaili kazang ashee chi rurkhuilu, kala khāmong thing khani kala khamakhāra chili khongsaiwui ashee chi neolu; kala kazing mathangranglakha eina tangda kachichāshi shimwui eina khipākha kayāng mashokpaimara.
Khikhalajila
Ots hi shiyan sāda nana kala nawui naothot naothot eina tangda mayonchingki kajina.
Kala ngashit kahai athishurda
Kala nanao ngarāna ‘Hi khiwui vangkhala?’ jiakha,
‘Hi
Chieina mibingna kui mashunzangda khoruma.
Chiwui thili Moses eina Aaronli
Pharaoh, kala awui otshinabingla, Egyptnao saikorala ngayā ngaunlop eina thuichapa, kaja shim kachiva̱li makathi maleisamana.
Chieina ngayāshong Moses eina Aaronli hokhuida hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, ithumwui eina thui-ulu; nanila kala Israelnaobing, kala nanina kahāng thāda nathumwui
Mebing kala yaobingla nanina kahāng thāda khuithuiserulu, kala ilila somilu!”
Egyptnaobingna Israelnaobingli thāklak eina thuikhavai poi, kaja athumna hānga, “Ithum thingakanki jihaira.”
Chieina athumna khamui khanailila khawok masangphāmada, naikhavai akhongli phonda romlaga phungkhuiya.
Mosesna kakaso athishurda athumna sāhairasai; kaja Egyptnaobingwui eina lupāsā kala sināwui chara̱-chāsān kala kashankachon kathā pokhuiserhairasai;
kala Egyptnaobingna athumli ngahanngai khavai
Kala Israelnaobingna Rameseswui eina zatlaga Succothli vāshunga, prei-naosan mashānla phei eina kazat mayarnaomāng mi thing shātharuk sha̱khana.
Chili lāngda miyur kachungkha manātta athumli ngasoshoka kala seila, yaobingla, kala mebingla zanga.
Kala athumna Egyptwui eina khuikaphung khawok makazang khamui chi sākhui, kaja thaklāk eina kasham kahaiwui vang mangaraiphathuda kashakazā khikha khangarān masaphāthuwa.

Khawok makazang shinithang shaira; khawok kazang khamui nathumwui ngachaili matheipaimara, khawok kazang nathum khaleipam kachida matheipaimara.
Chithang nana nanaongarāli hāngra, ‘Kaja ina Egyptwui eina kashok chitharan
Kala hi machutkhui khavai nathumwui pāngli kala phaningung khavai nathumwui khaveili leichingra, chithāda sāda
Chiwui vang eina kum kachida hi atam chāda nathumwui shiyan sāda mayonchingphalungra.
awukwui eina shokkhare chi

Gadha anao pharākhare chi nathumna yaonao akha eina ngatangkhuira; kalikha nathumna chi mangatangkhuiakha, akahung sātekhaolu. Nathumwui ngachaili pharākhare naochizai mayara chi nathumna ngatangkhuira.
Kala naoda rāki kaji atamli, nanao ngarāna ‘Hi khiwui kakhalatkhala?’ da ngahānakha, nathumna ngahānkāra ‘Pāngwui pangshap eina
Kaja Pharaohna ngakaishilak eina ithumli mathui khangasakwui vang,
Hina nawui pāngli kala nakhaveili khudam sāda chiya, pāngwui pangshap eina

Pharaohna mibingli chiho kahai tharan, shongfa naimeilala, Varena athumli Philistine ngaleivāk mathānvāmana, kaja Varena phaninga, “Kalikha mibingna rai khangarar theilaga athumwui ning ngacheihaida Egyptvāk hanungluihaipai.”
Kha Varena athumli Red Seavāk lamhāngli kuilaga thānzata. Kala Israelnaobingna raisāri peiphungda Egyptwui eina shoka.
Kala athumna Succothwui eina zatlaga lamhāngwui ayar Ethamli rāmrah vasāpama.
Ngashunshongla ngayashongla zatpai khavai,
ngashun muiyawui pākra̱, ngayā meiwui pākra̱ mibingwui eina mapākthuilakmana.
Chiwui thili
“Israelnaobingli latungda, Pi-ha-hirothwui mangāli, Migdol eina ngayiwui ngachai Baal-zephon mangāli, ngasām khavai hānglu; nathumna chili kāroda ngayipheili ungngasāmra.
Kaja Pharaohna Israelnaobingwui pongli, ‘Lamhāngli apong maphākhuimada Israelnaobing ma̱zatta lei’ da hāngra.
Kala ina Pharaohwui wuklung mararmihaida, athumli kharomvāluira, kala Pharaohli kala awui mibingli iwui tekhamatei theingasakra, kala Egyptnaobingna I
Mibing yāmhaira kaji kashā eina Egyptwui awunga Pharaohla, awui raobingla ning ngacheida hānga, “Ithumli otram khangatha̱wui eina Israelnaobingli chiho kahai hi ithumna khi kasākhala?”
Chieina ana siguigari khangarān sālaga raimi thānthuwa,
kala siguigari shātharuk kapangkhuida kala Egyptli khalei siguigari eina chiwui otva̱bingli ngasoda vāhaowa.
Kala Varena Egyptwui awunga Pharaohwui wuklung mararmihaida Israelnaobingna pinglak eina zatkahai chiwui thi kharomvai.
Pharaohwui siguibing, siguigari, sigui katongabing, raimi zangda kharomvai, kala Baal-zephon mangāli khalei Pi-ha-hiroth ngayipheili angaphankhuihaowa.
Pharaohna akhanganai tharan, Israelnaobingna ngashānungda Egyptnaobing rākharā chi thei, kala athum ngacheelakhaowa, kala Israelnaobingna
kala athumna Mosesli hānga, “Egyptli chikhur maleithuda lamhāngli thikhavai nana ithumli thānkashokla? Nana ithumli Egyptwui eina thānkashok hi khiwui kakhalatkhala?

Egyptli leilakha, ithumna nali ‘Chimathālu, ithum Egyptli rao satha̱ra’ da kahāng chi hi maningmala? Kachiwui vangkhala kaja lamhāngli thiki kajiwui vanga Egyptnaobingli otram ngatha̱khamina phāmeiki kajina.”
Kha Mosesna mibingli hānga, “Mangacheealu, nganingshinglu, laga aja
na nathumwui vang ngararmira, nathum kasaikha pammalu.”
Kha nawui khāmshui khāngkāda ngayitungli katingvālaga ngayi chi ngayarkhaihaolu, chieina Israelnaobingna ngayilungli ngalei kathengli zatvāpaira.
Kala ina Egyptnaobingwui wuklung mararmihaida athumna shurzangra, chitharan Pharaoh kala awui raimi katonga, awui siguigari, kala sigui katongbing saikorawuitungli iwui tekhamatei chitheira.
Ina Pharaoh eina awui siguigaribing kala siguigari kathaobingwuitungli tekhamatei chithei kahai tharan Egyptnaobingna
Chiwui thili Varewui kazingrao, Israelnao raimibingwui mangāli kazata china athumwui khanukshong unghaowa; kala muiyāwui pākra̱ china kaseiungda athumwui khanukli ungnganinghaowa,
china Egyptnaobingwui raimi eina Israelnaobingwui raimi ngachaili nganinghaoda lākhashong muiyāna tangmanghaowa, lākhashong horngasakta ngayā pongda akhashila akhashili mavā ngarokmana.
Chieina Mosesna ngayivāk apāng katingvai; kala ngayā pongda
Tara̱ china athumwui uishong yāshong phaklāng thāda sāmi, kala Israelwui mibingna ngayilungwui katheng chili zatvai.
Egyptnaobing, Pharaohwui siguibing, siguigaribing kala katongabing saikorana athumli shamadrulungli kharomzanga.
Ngathor kazing kathang eina muiyāwui kala meiwui pākra̱ eina
Sigui gariphei ngaphumda ritnahaida mazatthukthuwa; chieina Egyptnaobingna hānga, Israelnaobingwui eina yāmusa kaja

Tara̱ hanungda siguigarila, sigui katong mila, Pharaohwui shipai ngayilungli shurkazanga katonga ngaphumhaowa, akha eina tangda mashokmana.
Kha Israelnaobingwui vang tara̱na uishong yāshong phaklāng sāmida ngayilungli katheng eina zata.

kala a iwui huikhame ngasāhaira;

“Pharaohwui siguigaribing kala awui ashangva̱ ana ngayili horsanga;

Tara̱ khangaphaona athumli kuinamhaowa;

nawui yāpangna, O
yangkashebingli sākazamhaira.

Nana nawui masi phanda,

Kaja Pharaohwui siguibing, siguigari eina ngasoda sigui kathaobingla ngayili kazang chitharan,
Chiwui thili marānva̱ Mariam, Aaronwui azarva̱na timbrel singda, kala preinao katonga phung singlaga ali pheichak eina ngasoda shurshoka.
Kala Mariamna athumli laa sāchithei:
kaja ana tekmateilak eina yuihaira;
siguila, kala katongala ana ngayili horsangmihaira.”
Chiwui thili Mosesna Israelnaobingli Red Seawui eina thānda mangāshong Shurwui lamhāngli vai; athumna lamhāngli kathumthang zatlaga tara̱ masamphangthuwa.
Athumna Marahli vākashung tharan Marahwui tara̱ khāhaida mamangpaithuwa; chiwui vang Marah kaphokna.
Kala mibingna Mosesli kharopta hānga, “Ithum khi mangrakhala?”

hānga, “Nathumna ningasharlak eina
Chiwui thili athumna Elimli vai, chili ura̱ tharāda khani kala khaneirong hangshini leisai; kala athumna tara̱ chiwui ngalemli angasāmkhui.
Israelwui ashangva̱ katonga Elimwui eina zatphokta Sinwui lamhāngli vāshunga, chi Elim eina Sinai ngachaili lei; kala Egyptwui eina shokta kachāng khaniwui zimiksho tharāda kaphangā thangna.
Lamhāngli leilakha Israelwui ashangva̱ katongana Moses eina Aaronli kharopta hānga,

Katharukathanga athumna ngathānthang ngamui kakhuili khani shida chungmeida ngamuikhuilaga khangarān sāra.”

“Israelnaobingna kharopta khamatui chi ina shāhaira; athumli hānglu, ‘Ngazin nathumna sā shaira, kala ngathor khamui eina thotinghaora, chieina I
Ngazinshong kongkui yongrāda athumwui rāmrah pema, kala ngathor rāmrah kuimareida ikra̱ tai.
Kala ikra̱ thengkahai eina lamhāngwui ngaleitungli manaktak kahai akha phāmkok thāda tāngpat eina ngachinga.
Israelnaobingna chi theilaga, “Hi khikhala?” da athum ngahān ngaroka. Kaja athumna chi khikhalada matheimana.
Chieina Mosesna hānga, “Nathumna zākhavai
na hithāda hanghai: ‘Mi kachiva̱ kachichāwui zāshap ngamuikhuilu. Shimkhurli khalei mi mashing athishurda horsaikharip khuilu.’”
Israelnaobingna angamuikhui, kaikhana chungmeida khui, kaikhana teomeida khui.
Kha horsai eina onkhayang chitharan kachungkha kakhui mila mataimana, kateokha kakhui mila mavātmana; kachichāwui zāshap khuisera.
Kala Mosesna athumli hānga, “Khipākha ngathorshongwui vang mataipaimana.”
Kha athumna Moseswui tui makhuila kaikhana ngathorshongwui vang taikahai eina yunghaida mathan zanghairasai, kala Mosesna athumli malungvāthaowa.

Mosesna kahāng chi tākam eina athumna akhamawui vang taihaiya; chiya khayungla mayungmana, kala mathanla mazangmana.

Yanglu, Horeb lunggui pamli ina nawui mangāli nganingra; lunghār chili ngaphitlu, chiwui eina mangkhavai tara̱ shokrāsāra.” Israel ararbingwui mangāli Mosesna chithāda sai.
Ana apam chili Massah kala Meribah hoi, kaja Israelnaobingna khayon phāngarokta kala
Rephidimli leilakha Israelnaobingli Amaleknaona rai rātai.
Kala Mosesna Joshuali hānga, “Ithumwui vang mi kapangkhuida Amaleknaobingli angararlu, akhama ina Varewui khāmshui singlaga kaphungtonli kānganingra.”
Mosesna kahāng athishurda Joshuana Amaleknaobingli angarara; kala Moses, Aaron, Hur athumna kaphungtonli kai.
Mosesna apāng katinglakha eina tangda Israelnaona yui, kala apāng haizangkhaleoda Amaleknaobingna yui.
Kha Moseswui pāng chothaoda, lunggui akha khuilaga ana chili pama, Aaron eina Hurna apāng lākharipta singlaga khāngngachona; chithāda zimik matunranglakha eina tangda zungpama,
kala Joshuana Amaleknaoli kala awui mibingli raighai eina ngararda yuikhui.
Mosesna hanphut akha sākhui kala chiwui aming,
hānga, “
Midianwui pāngmon, Moseswui awova̱ Jethrona kashoshok saikora, kaja Varena Moseswui vang kala awui mi Israelnaobingli kathāda samimamei kala Egyptwui eina kathāda thānshokmi kaji chi shai.
Chitharan Mosesna apreiva̱ Zipporahli chithot kahaiwui thili awova̱ Jethrona, Zipporahli awui nao khani,
akhawui aming Gershom kaho; (kaja ana hānga, “I mi kateiwui ngaleili kapāna kha̱mi ngasāsai”),
kala akhapāli Eliezer, kaho anili (kaja ana hānga, “Ishāvāwui Vare, ili ngachonkhamena, kala Pharaohwui raighaiwui eina ili kanmi”) khuiluihaowa.
Mosesna Varewui phungreili pamda leilakha awova̱ Jethrona awui naomayara khani kala apreiva̱li thānrārāsai.
Kala mi akhana Mosesli, “Nawo Jethrona napreiva̱ eina nanaomayara khanili thānrārāda lei” da kahāng eina,
Mosesna awova̱li angarok khavai vai, ana khayākashi chitheida maya̱khui; kala ani akha eina akha khi shokmamei kaji ngazeklaga kachonshimli zanga.
Chiwui thili
na Israelli kaphā sāmi kahai saikora, Egyptnaobingwui eina ngatangkhami saikorawui vang Jethrona mathāna.
Jethrona hānga, “Egyptnaobingwui eina kala Pharaohwui eina ngatangkhame
Ara ina theihaira kaja
Kala Moseswui awova̱ Jethrona Vareli rikkatā kachigat kala pha̱kaphayā akha sai, kala Aaronna Israelwui ararbing saikorali thānrāda Varewui mangāli Moseswui awova̱li phazāruma.
Akhama kathā Mosesna mibingwui bichar sāmi khavai pama, kala athumna ngathor eina thuilaga ngazin eina tangda ali kuimareida nganingpama.

Moseswui awova̱na ana awui mibingwui vang kasāsā chi theilaga hānga, “Mibingwui vang nana sāda khalei hi khikhala? Namāng pamlaga kateibingli ngathor eina thuilaga ngazin eina tangda nganing khangasakla?”
Kala Mosesna awova̱li hānga, “Kachiwui vangkhala kaja athumna ili Varewui pongli rākhangahānna,
athumwuili tuishot leihaiakha iwuili rāda ina athum akha eina akhawui bichar sami, ina Varewui shiyan-chikan kala ana tamchithei kahai chi athumli hāngchithei.”
Moseswui awova̱na ali hānga, “Nana sāda khalei hi maphāmana.
Na kala nali khangayur mibing hi kachangkhat eina khanangnāhaora, kaja ot hi nawui vang ritnai; namāngna masārarmara.
Iwui tui nganālu, ina hangchitheiga, Varena ngasomiranu! Mibingwui vang nana Varewui mangāli nganingmida athumwui tuishot chi hāngmira,
athumli shiyan chikan tuitak kala athumna zatrān apong chi theingasaklu kala athumna khi sarānkhala kaji theingasaklu.

Kala nana mibingwui ngachaili sāshapa, Vareli khangachee mibing, shitsang kapaibing, kala pheizā kazāli ningkakachaibing, thing-thingwui, shāshāwui, hangphangā-ngāwui kala tharā-rāwui akhavā sākhavai kapangkhuilu.
Bichar saikora athumna sāranu, khamatataiya tuishot kachiva nawuili khuirāranu kha kapaipai athumna sāda nawui kharit ot athumna ngayarda phungrumakha nawui vang ngavengmeira.
Hithāda saakha Varena mayāmida, nala khāngshapra, kala mi saikora hi athumwui shimli chingri eina latungra.”
Awova̱wui tui khuida ana hāngkahai saikora Mosesna chithāda sai.
Kala Israel katongawui eina kashapa mibing kapangkhuida, thing-thingwui, shāshāwui, hangphangā-ngāwui kala tharā-rāwui kathāna sāngasaka.
Chithāda sāda atam kachida athumna mibingli bichar sāmi; kasaksakmāng Mosesli khuivai; kha kapapai athumna sāsera.
Chiwui thili Mosesna awova̱li pākhailaga aramshong ungngasakhaowa.
Israelnaobingna Egypt ngaleiwui eina shokta chāngwok kakathumawui kharethang athumna Sinai kaphungli vāshunga.
Athumna Rephidimwui eina zatta Sinai lamhāngli vākashung eina, athumna lamhāngli angasāma, phungreiwui mangāshong Israelnaobingna angasāma.
Kala Mosesna Vareli samphang khavai kai,
kala
Egyptnaobingli ina kasā, kaja khalāngwui angachāng eina ina nathumli kathāda phungzat kala kathāda iwuili khuirākhala kaji chi nathumna theihaira.
Chiwui vang eina ara iwui tui nganāda iwui tuingashit mayonakha, miyur saikorawui ngachaili nathum iwui mi sāra, kaja okathui hi iwuisera,
kala iwui vang nathum pāngmonwui wungram kala kathara yur sāra. Israelnaobingli nana hāngki kaji tui chi hina.”
Chieina Mosesna rāda ararbingli hokhuilaga,
