Kala
kala kakathumathangwui vang khangarān saserranu, kaja kakathumathang mi saikorana theikhavai
Kala nana mibingwui vang kuimareida leirin akha khānhailaga hānglu, ‘Ningngasharlu, phungreili makāpaimara, lah leiretlila masāza̱paimara; phungreili sakaza̱a mi chili chithitra;
ali pāng masāza̱paimara, kha ngalung eina horthatra lah malā eina kapthatra; miranu, sāranu, maring ngasakmara.’ Talla̱khon panglāk eina kakhong tharan mibingna phungreili kāpaira.”
Chieina Mosesna phungreiwui eina tāda mibingli tharchigata; kala athumna athumwui kashankachon ngasa̱sera.
Kala ana mibingli hānga, “Kakathumathang chi khangarān sāserlu, sha̱nao ngalemli mavālu.”
Chiwui thili Vareli samphang khavai Mosesna mibingli rāmrahwui eina thānvai, kala athumna phungreipheili anganinga.
Kala Sinai Kaphungli meikhutna ngapuiphinhaowa; kaja
Talla̱khon chi pangmamān kaji eina Mosesna matuiphoka kala Varena khangashumkhon eina ngahānkai.
na Sinai Kaphungli tai, phungreitonli tāda Mosesli phungreitonli kāluda hoi, kala Mosesna kai.
Kala
Kala
Kala Mosesna
Chieina Mosesna tālaga mibingli zanghānga.
Kala Varena tui saikora hi hānga,
athumli khayāmashipaimara lah makhorumpaimara; khikhalajila
kha ili leishida ningkhami saikora khamayonabing thingthingli makhangachei leikashi chitheikhamena.
Tharukthang nathumna yāng chishotta nathumwui ot saikora sāra;
kha kashinethang
khikhalajila
kala Mosesli hānga, “Nana ithumli hānglu, ithum nganāra; kha Varena ithumli mamatuiaranu, ithum thihaipaishina.”
Mosesna mibingli hānga, “Mangacheealu, kaja Varena nathumli chithei khavai rāhaira, chieina Vareli khangachee chi nathumwui leida chieina nathumn morei masāmara.”
Kala Varena khaleipam muiyā kashāli Mosesna vānganaiya, kha mibingna khalāda nganinga.
Ili ngasopam khavai nathumna lupāsāwui meoma̱ masākhuipaimana, lah nathum khalattana sināwui meoma̱la masākhuipaimna.

Ngalei eina hanphut akha sākhuilaga nathumna chili rikkatā hanphut kala ningyatchigat sāra, yaola, seila pha̱phayāra; kala ina iwui ming theingasakta phaningung ngasakkhangai apam kachida ina nathumli rāda somichingra.
Iwui vang nathumna ngalungwui hanphut saakha shankakhui ngalung eina masāpaimara; kaja ngalungtungli nathumwui khutlai sanghaiakha nathumna sāmakhaohaora.
Kala nathumna iwui hanphutli chonchak eina makāpaimana, nathumwui khamahong theipaishina.’”
“Mibingli nana hāngchitheiki kaji shiyanbing chi hina:
Nathumna raonao sākhavai Hebrewnao lokhuiakha, ana kum tharuk otram ngatha̱mira, kashine kum awui eina khikha makhuila khalem eina chihohaora.
Amāng raakha amāng shokra; apreiva̱ khuiraakha apreiva̱la ali ngasoshokra.
Shimva̱na ngalā khuisangmida naola pharākha, preiva̱ eina naomayara chi shimva̱wui sāra, amāng thuimara.
Kha raonao china iwui akhavāli, ipreiva̱li, inaongarāli leishiya I mathuimara jiakha,
shimva̱ china Varewui mangāli khuivāra, kala khāmongpheili, lah pākra̱pheili nganing ngasakta shimva̱na borā kapim eina khanā sa̱mira; kala mirin peida ali otram ngatha̱ra.
“Mi akhana anaongalava̱li raonao sākhavai yorakha, mayarnaoli kachiho thāda ali khalem eina machithotpaimara.
Ali kapangkakhuia awui shimva̱li apreiva̱ sāda ningyāng maung ngasakrarakha, ali ngatangkhui ngasakpai, yur khangatei mili mayorsangpaimana; kaja ana ning katong maleila sāmi kahaiwui vangna.
Anaomayarawui vang khuisangmiakha, anaongalava̱li kasā thāda sāki kajina.
Ana ngalā khangatei khuiakha kharepava̱li awui kashakazā, kashankachon kala preiva̱wui yarla mavātmipaimana.
Ana ot kathum hi awui vang masāmiakha, raopava̱ china leiman maphungla, pheisā mashānla thuipaira.
Kha ana shongrimda kasā maningla Varena shokkhangasaka otshot ngasasakha, ina nathumwui ayāmsang khavai nathumwui vang apam akha ngaranmira chili yāmvāda mathimara.
Kha kachikathāna malungvātta mi akhali sāthatphalungkida shaoakha, nathumna ale iwui hanphutwui eina khuilaga shaothatra.
“Kachikathāna avāva̱li nilala, ava̱va̱li nilala shaoakha chipāli shaothatra.
“Ngama̱ ngaroklaga akhana akhapāli ngalung eina nilala, lah pāng ngashumda shaoda mathilala kazāda petli piakha,
chiwui thili kakazāpa chi khāmshui singda yaothuishapakha kashaopali kashong malāngmara, kha awui ngalangman kala maraichangranglakha eina tangda yangmira.
“Raonaowui akhavāna awui rao mayarnao nilala, sha̱nao nilala, lijei eina ngaphitta thihaiakha mipa chili kashong lāngra.
Kha thangkha, khanithanglala ringakha, kashong malāngmara, kaja raonao chi awui lanna.

“Kalikha mi khangama̱li nao khavai sha̱naoli saza̱da nao tāhailala, kalākashi maleiakha, ali sakaza̱pa chili agaharawui ningkachāng athishurda kashong lāngra; kala bichar mashunwobingna retkhami athishurda miphalungra.
Kalikhada kalākashi shokakha, manglāwui vang manglā,
mikwui vang mik, hā wui vang hā, pāngwui vang pāng, pheiwui vang phei,
mei eina kasa̱wui vang mei eina kasa̱, khamāwui vang khamā, kashirwui vang kashir runra.
“Mi akhana awui raonao, mayarnaolapai, sha̱naolapai amikli shaoza̱da saphātmihaiakha, amik chiwui vang ningkhān ngasakhaora.
Kalikha ana, awui raonao mayarnao lah sha̱naoli ahā shirtāmihaiakha, ahāwui vang ningkhān ngasakhaora.
“Mukkāna mayarnaoli nilala, sha̱naoli nilala thothaiakha sei chi lunggui eina horthathaora, asā mashaipaimara; kha sei akhavāwui khayon maleimara,
kha ridala thotching kaje, akhavāli hānglaga ana manarhaimada mayarnaoli nilala, sha̱naoli nilala thotkahaina jiakha, sei chi lunggui eina horthatra, kala akhavālila shaothatra.
Mipa chili ngatangkhuira jiakha, amanglāwui vang hiyākha khuira kaji chi ana miphalungra.
Miwui naomayaraliranu, naongalava̱liranu, thotakha akhavāpa chi hiwui shiyan hi zatphalungra.
Mukkāna rao sha̱naoliranu, rao mayarnaoliranu thothaiakha, akhavā china rao chiwui akhavāpali lupāsā thumra mira kala mukkā chi lunggui eina horthathaora.
“Mi akhana chom kotta maphinhaimada mukkā nilala, gadhā nilala chili tazanghaiakha,
chom kachuiapa china lupā eina runra, kala kathi sā chi awui sāra.
Mi akhawui mukkāna khangateiwui mukkā thotthathaiakha, makathe sei chi yorlaga ani ngayarpakra, kala kathi sā chila ani ngalākra.
Chi maningakha rida mukkā chi thotza̱ra kaji thatheilaga akhavāna manar kahaiwui vangakha, mukkāwui vang mukkā runra, kala kathi sā chi awui sāra.

“Mi akhana mukkā nilala, yao nilala leekhuida shaothathailala, yorhailala, mukkā akhawui vang mukkā phangā, yao akhawui vang yao mati khale china runra. Runphalungra, khikha makhalei miakha ali yorhaora.
Leekakhui sei nilala, gadhā nilala, yao nilala kharing eina awui pāngli leisakha khale china aman akhashida mataida runkāra.
Khale akhana shim shaokhaizangda ali tukkhuida shaoda thihaiakha, ashee katāwui shongrān maleimana;
kha chi zimik shoknamhaikha, ashee chiwui vang shongrān leira.

“Mi akhana khangateiwui luili nilala, drakhā yāmguili nilala, sei hompamakha, lah chihohaida mi khangateiwui lui ashaimihaiakha, awui luiwui kala drakhā yāmguiwui athei mathāmeikap kaji chieina runra.
“Mei sa̱laga maithuihaida zātshim nilala, māthei nilala, lah lui nilala chuitāmihaiakha mei kasa̱pa china runserphalungra.
Kha kalikha khalepa chi matukkhuirarakha shimva̱ china khongnaipa chiwui ot chili apāng saza̱ya, masāza̱mana kaji theikhavai Varewui mangali vāra.

“Shitkasang vātngarokta, mukkā nilala, gadhā nilala, yaonilala, kashankachon nilala, maningakha ot katei shimān kahaiwui vang, akhana ‘Hi iwuina,’ jiakha khaniniwui tuishot chi Varewui mangāli khuirāra; kala Varena khayon khamipa china ali akhashida mataida runra.
“Mi akhana gadhā nilala, mukkā nilala, yao nilala lah sha̱kei khangatei nilala khongnaiwuili haisālaga kathi, lah khamā kaza̱, kala khipānakha matheila homthuimihaiakha,
ot chili pāng masāza̱mana kaji theikhavai
Kha kalikhada awui pāng eina leethuihaiakha akhavāli aman runra.
Kalikhada sāna shaimihaiakha theikhui khavai angun khuiungchitheira; kala shaimi kahai chiwui vang khikha marunmara.
“Kalikhada mi akhana khongnainaowui sha̱kei khuisālaga akhavā mazangla khamā kaza̱ kala kathi kathā shokhaiakha, ana aman peichaoda runra.
Kalikhada akhavāla ngasosākha, marunmara; kalikhada chi khamasā ngasāsākha, khamasā chiwui aman mira.
Kalikhada ngalava̱ shāvāna mamiphalungmara jihaiakha kachingva̱ ngalānao akhawui manholi ngaraikacha pheisā miphalungra.
Ra̱meinaoli lah marānaoli marekharekpaimana;
nathumna athumli chotngasakta ili athumna ngakaoakha ina athumwui khangakao chi shāmilakra;
iwui malungkhavāt mei thada chuida ina nathumli raighai eina sāthathaida napreiva̱ ngarā ra̱meihaora, kala nanao ngarā marāhaora.
Kalikhada nawui khongnainaowui kachon hamda khuilala zimik matunranglakha hanmihaolu;
Kaja nawui khongnaipa chiwui fasang khavai kachon chimāng sāsāpai; mipa china khangatei khi fapirakhala? Kala nawui khongnaipa china ili ngakaoakha, chi ina shāmira, kaja iya lumashankathana.
“Naomayara naochizai ili miphalungra.
Chi tākam eina seila, yaola: shinithang ava̱li ngasopam ngasakra; kachishata thang nathumna ili miphalungra.
Makaphā sākhavai yarui chungkhameili mashurpaimara; lah tuishotli yarui chungkhameiwui michang zangda mashun nguimi khavai shākhi masāpaimara.
lah kachāmawui tuishotli mijang masāpaimara.
Nali ningkakachaiya mipa chiwui gadhā otphunna mangakarthukmada leisākha thāda mayanghaialu, kha khāngmathotmilu.
“Nathum kachāma miwui mashun mamatuikhayeipaimara.
Mikhanamwui kaphenli mazanglakalu; kala khayon makhalei kala khamashung-khangarong mili mashaothatalu; kaja makaphā mili ina machihomara.
Pheizā makhuipaimara, kaja pheizāna akhavābingli mik ngapeo ngasaka, kala khamashungali yonngasaka.”
Kha kashine kum nathumna lamphohailaga ngasāmkhui ngasakra. Kaja kachāmnaobingna zākhavai kala athumna katai chi ramsāna shaipaira. Chi tākam eina drakhā yāmguila, olive yāmguila chithāda sāra.
“Ina hāngkahai saikora nganālu kala khangatei varebingwui ming masinglakalu, chili lāngda nathum khamorwui eina nilala mashāranu.

Ina hāngkahai thāda khawok makazang khamui phanit sāra; hāngkahai thāda Abib kachāngwui atamli shinithang khawok makazang khamui shaira, kaja chiwui atamli nathumna Egyptwui eina shoka. Khipakha iwui mangāli pāng khamasai eina marāpaimara.
“Nathumna luili khayao theishiraiwui matheikhare athei chieina ngasoda māhā phanit mayonlu.
“Kumpeili nathumna luiwui eina theishirai kazipkakhui tharan chumpha̱ phanit mayonlu.
Kumkhali kathum shida mayarnao kachiva̱na
“Nathumna yaonao awui ava̱wui na̱ra̱ eina mahangshaipaimana.
“Yanglu, ina ngarānmi kahai apam chili nathumli thānvāmi khavai kala mayonmi khavai nathumwui mangāli ina kazingrao akha chihora.
Ali nganāda awui tui khuisanglu; ali mangakaishialu; kaja ana nathumwui khayon mapheomimara kaja iwui ming ali lei.
Kha nathumna awui tui khuida ina kahāng chi saserakha, nathumwui yangkashe chi iwui yangkashena, nathumli khangasunga chili ina ngasungra.
Iwui kazingraona nathumli thānmida Amornaobing, Hitnaobing, Periznaobing, Canaannaobing, Hivnaobing kala Jebusnaobingwui apamli vāzangda, kala ina athumli shimān ngasak kahai chitharan,
athumwui varebingli makhorumpaimara, lah otramla mangatha̱paimara, athumwui kasā thadala masāpaimara, kha saikora chi sākazammiserhaida pākra̱ eina tangda akha̱ sāngasaklu.
nathumwui Vareli otram ngatha̱lu, ina nathumwui khamui eina tara̱li somira; kala ina nathumwui eina kazāt khuithuimihaora.
Nathumwui pamli khipashikha nao horkahai maleimara, nao kashumla mavaimara; nathumwui mirin ina chipemmira.
“Iwui khangachee khangachā mangāli rida chihoda nathumna ngararki kaji mibing saikorali pa̱ngapā ngasakra, kala ina yangkashebing nathumwui eina yāmngasakra.
Kala ina nathumwui mangāli rida raipao shāngasakta Hivnao, Canaannaobing kala Hitnaobing yāmngasakra.
Ina athumli kumkhawui alungliva makashammara, kaja ramchohaikha nathumwui vang ramsā chungnahaora.
Nathumna chungsang mamānda lam chi makhuingakānranglakha eina tangda teomamei eina kasham mamānra.

Kala nathumwui thari Red Sea eina thuilaga Philistinewui ngayi vāshungda, kala lamhāng eina thuilaga Euphrates eina tangda sāra; kaja lam chiwui mibing nathumwui pāngli horsangmihaida nathumna kashamshokhaora.
Nathumna athumli nilala, athumwui varebingli nilala tuingashit masāpaimara.
Athum nathumwui ngaleili mapampaimara, kaja athumna nathumli morei sāngasakpaishina; nathumna athumwui varebingli otram ngatha̱akha, kachangkhat eina chi nathumwui vang khalen ngasāra.”
Kala ana Mosesli hānga, “Na eina Aaron, Nadab eina Abihu, kala Israelwui ararnaobing hangshini
Mosesmāngna
Mosesna rāda
Kala Mosesna
Kala ana Israelwui yaronnaobingli chihoda rikkatā kachigat eina ningyatchigatwui vang mukkā kachungkha
Kala Mosesna ashee tangkhai khuilaga khongsaili sanghai, kala ashee tangkhai hanphutli horrora.
Chiwui thili ana tuingashitwui lairik chi khuida mi katongana shākhavai pai, kala athumna, “
Hiwui thili Moses eina Aaron, Nadab eina Abihu, kala Israelwui ararnaobing hangshini china kai,
kala athumna Israelwui Vareli thei; kala awui pheizingli aman kasaka sapphire ngalung eina hamkahai thāda kala kazingramwui khamathing thāda thei.
Israelwui akhokabingwuitungli ana pāng maparmana; athumna Vareli thei kala phāshak phāzai.
Chieina Mosesna awui rao Joshuali ngasoda Varewui phungreili kai.
Kala kathānabing chili ana hānga, “Ini malatungranglakha eina tangda hili ngaraisālu, kala yanglu, Aaron eina Hur leili, kachikathāna hāngkhangai apong leiakha anili hānglu.”
Chiwui thili Mosesna phungreili kai, kala phungrei chi muiyāna khaluiphinhaowa.
wui tekhamatei chi Sinai Kaphungli tāpama, kala tharukthang muiyāna khaluiphinhaowa; kala kashinethang muiyālungwui eina ana Mosesli hoi.
wui tekhamatei azak chi Israelnaobingwui miktāli phungreiton chili mei kachui thai.
Kala Mosesna muiyālungli zangda phungreili kai. Kala Moses ngashun hangmati kala ngayā hangmati da phungrei tungli kāpama.
“Iwui vang kachigat akha khuikhavai Israelnaobingli hānglu; mi kachiva̱wui wuklung eina mikhangai kachigat chi nana iwui vang khuimilu.
Kala athumwui eina kachigat samphangki kajibing chi hina: sinā, lupāsā kala pithrai,
khamayinga kala hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱wui chonsā, meha,
yaohui mathen kahai, mehui, acaciathing,
thaomeiwui vang thaora̱, tharchisin khavai thao ayur-ayā kala nganamkaphā thao,
onyx ngalung kala ephod eina thikhomli ruksang khavai ngalung.
Kala ina athumwui alungli ngasopam khavai kathara shim akha sākhui ngasaklu.
Tabernacle sākhavai kala chiwui thongthāng, hithāda saluda ina nali chithei kahai athishurda nana chithāda sāra.”
Kala nathumna chi sinā kachanga eina heirorra, alung ayār heirorthathuiki kajina, akhamong kuimareida sinā eina heiungra.
Kala sinā khui mati heikhuilaga aphei matili pānra, khani lākhavāk, khanina akhavāk da.
Nathumna acaciathing eina thingphān sākhuida sinā heimitrorra.
Kala nathumna ningkhami oko ngava̱ khavai thingphān khani chi sinākhui pānkhavai chili ruisangra.
Thingphān chi okowui eina makhuishokla thāda haira.
Kala nathumna ningkhami oko chili ina nali miki kaji tuingashit chi sanghaira.”
Kala nathumna sinā eina cherubim khani sākhuira; shaokhuilaga lukhamashan pamkhongwui arāp khaninili haira.
Cherub akhana lākhavāk, akhapāna akhavāk da, kala lukhamashan pamkhongli sānarra.
Cherubim khaniwui angachāng hārshokta lukhamashan pamkhong chi kahārphinra, kala akha eina akha ningkhami okovāk yangngasungra.
Kala nathumna lukhamashan pamkhong chi ningkhami oko tungli haira, kala oko chiwui lungli ina nali miki kaji lungphek khani chi sanghaira.
Ina nali chili samphangra, lukhamashan pamkhong tungli, kala ningkhami oko tungli khalei cherub khani chiwui ngachai eina, Israelnaobingli ningmiki kaji saikora ina nali ngazekra.”
Nathumna chi sinā kachanga eina heirorra, kala kuimareida sinā eina heiungra.
Kala kuimareida akom pāngmayā rikha sangunglaga akom chi sinā eina heiungra.
Kala nathumna sinākhui mati sākhuilaga, sinākhui mati chi achikun mati kala aphei mati chili akharip pānra.
Thingphān chi sanglaga table chi ngava̱zatpai khavai akhui chi akomli nganaida pānra.
Nathumna acaciathing eina thingphān sinā heimitrorlaga sākhuida table chieina ngava̱ra,
kala chiwui khongphei khongpāng nganamkaphā thaowui vang, kala hanphut kharektā khavai koklui, khongkam sinā kachanga eina sākhuira.
Kala nathumna Ngasokhamiwui khamui iwui mangāli tabletungli haichingphalungra.”
Kala arāp akhashong aphāng kathum lakhashong kathum da thaomeishong chili aphāng tharuk shokra,
athing eina awonwuili akhongnao ava̱va̱li almond thāda akharip akhashong kathum, lakhashong kathum da thaomeishongli tharuk sāsangra.
Kala thaomeishong chili almond thāda akhongnao mati athingbing eina awonbingli ngasoda kāra,
kala athing atang akha eina chiwui azingli thaomeishongwui eina aphāng tharuk chi khanini eina shokra.
Athingbing eina aphangbing chi asā akha sāra, kala katonga chi sinā kachanga eina shaokakhuiya asā akha sāra.
Kala nathumna thaomeishongwui vang thaomei shini sākhuilu kala kāparhaida china mangāshong horvāra.
Chiwui changjeebing kala sangkhavai akhongla sinā kachanga eina sāra.
Hiwui khorkhongbing kala ayur saikora hi kachanga sinā talent akha eina sāra.
Phungreili nali chithei kahai chi horzakta sākhavai ningngasharlu.”
Chonrān kachiva̱wui kasāng khuining maga̱da chishat, kala kapāk khuining matira; chonrān saikora asān-aret ngaraichāserra.
Chonrān phangā, akha eina akha ngashikkha sāra, kala khangatei phangā chi akha eina akha ngashikkha sāra.
Khare chonrān phangā chiwui shokkhamayar amareili kachon khamayinga angathān sāsangra, chi tākam eina khangatei phangā chiwui shokhamayāra amareibinglila sāsangra.
Chonrān akhali angathān hangphangā kāra, kala kakhane chonrān chilila angathān hangphangā kara; chonrān khaniwui angathānbing chi ngarei ngasungda sāsangra.
Kala nathumna sinākhui hangphangā sākhuilaga chonrān khani chi, sinākhui ava̱va̱ra, angathān khanini hokrumkhuida tabernacle chi akha sāngasaklu.”
“Nathumna tabernacleli fakhavai mesam eina chonrān tharāda akha sākhuilu, chithāda nathumna chonrān tharāda akha semra
Chonrān ava̱va̱wui asān khuining thumrāra, kala aret khuining matira; kala chonrān tharāda akha chi asān-aret ngaraichāserra.
Chonrān phangā chi nathumna ngashikkhuilu kala khangatei tharuk chi ngashikkhuilaga, katharuka chi tipkhani sālaga kachonshimwui mangāshong fasanglu.
Chonrān lākhavākwui shokkhamayara amareili angathān hangphangā sāsanglu, kala chonrān kakhanewui shokkhamayar amareibinglila angathān hangphangā sāsanglu.
Kala pithraiwui akhui hangphangā nathumna sākhuilaga angathānli huisangda kachonshimwui chonrānbing chi akha sangasaklu.
Kachonshimli sāsanglaga chonrān tangkhai katai chi tabernaclewui akhanukshong fakhamlu.
Kala kachonshimwui chonrān katai chi, lākhashong khuiningkha, kala lākhavāk khuiningkha da chi tabernaclewui arāpli lākharipta fakāntālu.”
“Kala nathumna kachonshim chi fakhavai yaohui eina mehui mathenlaga sākhuira.
Akom ava̱va̱wui asān khuining tharārā, kala aret kachiva̱ akom chiwui khuining akha tangkhaira.
Ngasunkhui khavai akom ava̱va̱li amachat khanini kāserra; chithāda tabernaclewui akom saikorali sāra.
Nana tabernaclewui vang akom semkhuira: azingshongwui vang maga̱;
kala akom maga̱ wui azingli lupāsāwui khaning khavai hangmati, chiwui amachat khaniwui vang akom akhali khaning khavai khani, kala chiwui amachat khaniwui vang akom akhali khaning khavai khani sāra.
Kala tabernaclewui kakhaneshong, atungshong akom maga̱ sangra,
kala athumwui lupāsāwui khaning khavai hangmati, akom akhawui azingli khaning khavai khani kala khangatei akom akhawui azingli khaning khavai khani;
kala tabernacle khanukwui zingtunshong akom tharuk sāsangra.
Kala nathumna khanukshongwui achithekli sangkhavai akom khani sākhuira;
khani chi azingli ngateira, kha atungli akhur khawut chili ngasunkhui ngasakra; china lākharipwui achithek sāra.

Kala chili akom chishat leira, athumwui khaning khavai lupāsā eina sāra chi khaning khavai tharāda tharukra; akom akhawui azingli khaning khavai khanira, kala khangatei akom akhawui azingli khani leira.”
“Kala nana acaciathing eina phākashut sākhuira, Tabernaclewui lākhashongwui akomwui vang phangāra,
kala phākashut tabernaclewui lakhashong akomwui vang phangā, kala phākashut tabernaclewui zingtunshongwui arāpwui akomwui vang phangā da sākhuira.
Alungthungli kazanga phākashut chi akomwui alungthungli ungshung-vāshungda thara̱vāra.
Akom katonga sinā eina romra, kala phākashut thara̱sang khavai sinākhui sāsangra; phākashutla sinā heirorserra.
Kala phungreitungli nali chithei kahai chiwui athishurda tabernacle chi khaningkāra.”
kala nathumna acaciathing eina kasā pākra̱ mati sinā romkahaiya, sināwui hokkhui khavai kakā kala lupāsāwui apheili kakhaning pākra̱ mati chili kangruihaira.
Mairār chi angathān eina kangruida ningkhami oko chi chiwui alungli khuizangra; kala mairār china kathar eina tharmeikap kaje pam khanili ngatei ngasakra.
Lukhamashan pamkhong chi ningkhami okotungli haida tharmeikap kaje pamli runghaira.
Kala nathumna table chi mairārwui ayārshong haira, kala tabernaclewui azingshongwui thaomeishong chi tableli kārodahaira, kala nathumna table chi atungshong haira.”
“Kala kachonshim chiwui khāmongli chonrān akha sākhuida, khamayinga, hungrisi kala hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina sākakhui kala kapim eina phorkasang kachon eina sāsanglu.
Chonrānwui vang acaciathing eina pākra̱ phangā sākhuilaga sinā heirorra; chiwui hokkhui khavaibing chila sinā eina sāra, kala khaning khavai pithraiwui aphei phangā sākhuira.”
Kala nana achithek mati chili angaji akharip thingsā eina sāshānda pithrai heirorra.
Hotla mayākhui khavai ham, belcha, khongsai, marik-kapei kala meikhong sāsangra; khorkhong saikora pithrai eina sāserra.
Kala chiwui vang nana ngayāng khavai thāda pithrai eina sākhuira; kala ngayāng khavaiwuitungli pithrai eina achikun matitili akhui akharip sāsanglu.
Kala nana chi hanphutkhongwui azingli sangda ngayāng khavai china hanphutwui ngahunshingli tāza̱ra.
Kala nathumna hanphutwui vang thingphān acaciathing eina sākhuida pithrai heirorra.
Kala thingphān chi akhui chieina thara̱sangra, chithāda thingphān chi ngava̱kazat tharan hanphutwui lākharipta pithraikhuili shongkhuipaira.
Phungreitungli nali chithei kahai chithāda hanphut chi chikhai eina akhur utlaga sākhuira.”
chiwui pākra̱ maga̱ wui aphei maga̱ pithrai eina sāra, kha pākra̱li hokkhui khavai eina masa̱khui khavai lupāsā eina sāra.

Chi tākam eina atungshongwui asānli hokthāng khavai khuining shākha kasāng, pithrai eina kasā chiwui pākra̱ maga̱, kala aphei maga̱, kha pākra̱li hokkhui khavai eina masa̱khui khavai chiya lupāsā eina sāra.
Kala zingtungshongwui yāngkhup aretwui vang hokthāng khavai khuining hangphangā, pākra̱ tharā kala aphei tharāra.
Mangāshong kaja zingshoshongwui yāngkhup aret khuining hangphangāra.
Ngavei chiwui arāp akhawui hokthāng khavai khuining tharāda phangā, pākra̱ kathum kala aphei kathumra.
Arap khangatei akhavākwui hokthāng khavai khuining tharāda phangā, pākra̱ kathum kala aphei kathumra.”

“Ngavei chiwui chonrān khuining maga̱ sāngra, chi khamayinga, hungrisi kala hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chonsā kala kapim eina yekkasang chonsā eina sāra; chiwui pākra̱ matiwui aphei mati kāra.
Yāngkhup kuimareidawui pākra̱bing, chiwui hokkhui khavaibing lupāsā eina masa̱khuiserra, kala apheibing pithraisā eina sāra.
Yāngkhup chiwui asān khuining shākha, aret hangphangā, kala kajui khuining phangā, hokthāng khavai manakta hākakhui kazaira̱wui chonsā kala pithraisāwui aphei eina sāra.
Tabernaclewui shikachin khorkhongbing saikora, shunkhavai saikora, kala yāngkhupwui shunkhavai saikora pithraisā eina sāserra.”
Ningkhami oko haikhavai mairār kānshokta kazip khavai kachonshimwui alungli Aaron eina anaomayarabingna ngazin eina thuilaga ngathor eina tangda

“Chiwui thili nachinā Aaron, kala anaomayarabing ali ngasoda Israelnaobingwui eina pāngmon sāda ili sheba sākhavai — Aaron eina Aaronwui naomayarabing, Nadab eina Abihu, kala Eleazer eina Ithamar nawui ngalemli khuirālu.
Kala nathumna nachinā Aaronwui vang tekmatei khavai kala mathā khavai kathara sāribing sākhuira.
Kala ina ningthem mihaida sākatheiabing saikorali nana hānglaga, Aaronna iwui pāngmon sākhavai tharkachigatwui ngavai khavai sāribing khopngasaklu.

Athumna sāri chi hithāda sāra: thikom akha, ephod akha, katuma phahon khānkhanānga coat akha, kuitei akha, kala shanneira̱ akha sāra; athumna nachinā Aaron kala naongarā pāngmon sāda ili otram ngatha̱mi khavai kathara sāri sākhuira.
Athumna sinā, khamayinga, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chonsā samphangra.
Athumna sinā, khamayinga, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chonsāwui eina ephod mathālak kahai sākhuira.
Chiwui amarei akatanga khanili ngasunkhuilaga yārtuipar khani kāra.
Kala themlāk eina rakkakhui apeng hokthāng khavai chila sinā, khamayinga, hungrisi, kala hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chonsā eina sāra.
Kala nana onyx ngalung khani khuilaga chiwuitungli Israelwui naomayarabingwui aming ruksangra,
ngalung akhali tharukwui ming, kala akhapāli katei tharukwui aming, kharar khangano athishurda ruksangra.
Sinā lupā kasaana khutopli mahor sākasang thāda lunggui khani chili nana Israelwui naomayarabingwui aming ruksangra; chibingli sināwui akhara̱ eina khayeka chieina katimshānra.
Kala nana ngalung khani chi ephodwui yārtuiparli sāsangda Israelwui naomayarabingli phaningung khavai sāra; kala Aaronna athumwui mingbing chi
Kala nana sināwui akhara̱ eina rukkasang sākhuira,
kala sinā kachanga peng khani, seipeng thāda shirei kahai kala shirei kahai peng chi rukkasang chili hoksangra.”
Asān aret ngaraichada khani shida ngaphora, aret pangmayākha, asān pangmayākhara.
Nana chili ngalung ngaher mati sāsangra, khare apengli sardius, topaz, carbuncle,
kakhane apengli emerald, sapphire, kala hirā;
kakathuma apengli jacinth, agate, kala amethyst;
khamate apengli beryl, onyx kala jasper; saikora hi sinā khara̱ eina ruksangserra.
Israelwui naomayarabingwui aming eina ngasoda ngalung tharāda khani leira; mahor namkhavai thāda shang tharāda khaniwui aming ruksangserra.
Kala nana thikhomwui vang sinā kachanga seipeng thāda hākakhui apeng sākhuira.
kala nana thikhomwui vang sināwui akhui khani sākhuida chi thikhomwui achikun khanili sāshānra.
Kala nana thikhomwui achikunli kakā akhui khani chili sināwui apeng khani chi ruisangra;
apeng khani chiwui amarei khani chi sinā ruksanglaga chili pānkhuira, laga ephodwui mangāshong yārtuiparli hokshānkhuira.
Kala nana sināwui akhui khani sākhuida thikhomwui akatanga amarei khaniwui alungshong ephod ngalemli haira.
Kala nana sināwui akhui khani sālaga ephodwui yārtuipar khaniwui azingpamwui mangāshong phonda themlāk eina raksang kahai apeng chili ngasun ngasaklu.

Kala nathumna thikhomwui akhui eina ephodwui akhui chi khamaying khara̱ eina khalapshānra, kaja themlāk eina raksang kahai ephodwui apeng chili ngashikta thikhom chi ephodwui eina mangachoshok khavaina.”
“Chithāda sāda Israelwui naomayarabingwui aming saikora bicharwui thikhom eina Aaronna wuklungli phungzatra, kala katharapamli kazang chitharan
Kala bicharwui thikhomli Urim eina Thummim kāsangra, kala ana
Phahon chiwui alungthungli akui zangkhavai akhur akha utra, kala chi makāk khavai akhur chi kuimareida rakkakhuiya chonsā eina katim-ungra.
Awui katuma phahonli khamaying, hungrisi kala hungshi kahai eina kabothei sāsangra, kala katuma phahon kuimareida sināwui kantā amataktakli sāsangra,
sinā kantā akha kala kabothei akha, sinā kantā akha kala kabothei akhada katuma phahon kuimareida sāsangra.
Kala otram khangatha̱ tharan Aaronna ngavaira, kala katharapamli,
Kala chi nathumna khamayinga khara̱ eina kuiteili pānshānra; chi kuiteiwui mangāli sangki kajina.
Chi Aaronwui khaveili hokthāngra, kala Israelnaobingna tharkhavai tharkachigat pha̱kaphayāwui khayonkhamāng chi Aaronna phungra; hi awui khaveili haichingra kaja
“Kala coat chi akhān khānshang khānkatā khamanaka chonsā eina nana rakkhuira, kuiteila khamanaka kazaira̱ chonsā eina sākhuira, kala shānneira̱ kapim eina aphor phorsangra.”
“Kala Aaronwui naomayarawui vang coat, shānneira̱ kala kuihon sākhuilu, chi tekmatei khavai kala mathā khavaina.
Kala nana nachinā Aaronli kala awui naomayarabingli ngavaimida, thao neomira, kala tharchisinmira kala tharchigatta ili otram ngatha̱da iwui pāngmon sāra.
Kala athumwui phasā fakham khavai khamanaka chonsā eina malao, kashān eina thuilaga khaishāng tāfakhuida sāmilu;

kala Aaron eina anaomayarabingna kazip khavai kachonshimli, lah katharapamli otram ngatha̱ khavai hanphut ngalemli kazang chitharan chi ngavaichingra; maningakha athum khalattawuitungli khayon khuirāda thipai. Hi awui vangla kala awui thiwui naothotwui vangla leichingki kaji shiyan-chikan ngasāra.”
kala khawok makazang khamui, khawok makazanga thao eina khamanāt khamui, thao eina teiror kahai khawok makazang katheng khamui, hi nana khamanaka kehuwui mathir eina sāra.
Nana chi luk akhali sanglaga khuirālu, kala mukkā eina yaovā khani chila khuirālu.”
“Nana Aaron eina awui naomayarabingli kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongli khuirālu kala tara̱ eina ra̱vaimilu.
Kala nana sāribing chi khuida Aaronli ephodwui katuma sāri chi ngavaimilu, ephodla, thikhomla shaksāmida themlāk eina rakkakhui ephodwui chonsā chieina neimilu;
kala akuili kuitei chi teimida kathara kuihon chi kuiteili sangmilu.
Kala nana neokhavai thao chi akuili heirorda ali neomilu.”
“Chiwui thili anaomayarabingli khuirāda katuma phahon ngavaimilu,
kala shānneira̱ neimida kuihonla ngahonmilu; chieina pāngmonwui ot hi athumwui shiyan ngasāchingra. Chithāda sāda nana Aaron eina anaomayarabingli tharchisinra.”
“Chiwui thili mukkā chi kazip khavai kachonshim mangāli khuirāra. Aaron kala anaomayarabingna mukkawui kuitungli pāng parra,
kala nana
kala mukkawui ashee chi ngayarda khuida hanphutwui angacheeli napāng mareng eina neolu, kala ashee katai chi hanphutpheili heirorlu.
Kala akharili khangathān athao katonga, amathinwui athao, amakei khani kala chili khangathān athao saikora chi hanphutli riktālu.
Kha mukkā chiwui asā eina ahui kala apai, rāmrah ayarli kanshokta riktālu, chi suiham chigatna.”
“Chiwui thili yaovā akha khuida Aaron eina anaomayarabingna yaovāwui akuitungli apāng parra,
kala nana yaovā chi taithatra, kala awui ashee chi khuilaga hanphutli kuimareida heirorra.
Chiwui thili nana yaovā chi malim sālaga, akhari eina akho pheokazaklaga amalimbing chili akui eina ngasoda sangrumlu,
Kala yaovā chi tongda hanphutli riktālu; hi
“Nana yaovā akhapa chi khuilaga Aaron eina anaomayarabingna yaovāwui kuitungli pāng parra,

Kala nana yaovā chi taithatra, kala ashee ngayarda khuilaga Aaronwui nākor yāshongwui atonli, kala anaomayarabingwui nākor yāshongwui atonli, kala athumwui pangyungho yāshong kala pheiyungho yāshong neomiserlu; katai chi hanphut kuimareida heirorlu.

Chiwui thili hanphutli khalei ashee chi ngayarkhuida tharchisin khavai thao eina ngasoda Aaronli kala awui sārili chairorlu; kala anaomayarabinglila, athumwui sārilila chairorlu; chieina ala, awui sārila, anaomayarabingla, athumwui sārila ali ngasoda tharmathenghaora.”
“Nana yao chiwui athao, khameithao, akharili kharoma athao, amathinli khangathāna athao, kala amakei khani eina chili khangathāna athao, kala yā khaishāng (kaja hi tharkachisinwui yaona) khuilu,
kala khamuitang akha, thao khangui khamuitang akha, thao makhangui khamuitang akha, khawok makazang
Aaronwui kala anaomayarabingwui pāngli sangmida
Chiwui thili nana athumwui pāng eina khuira, kala rikkatā pha̱kaphayā chiwuitungli hanphutli riktālu,
“Aaronwui tharchisin khavai yaowui asuk chi khuilaga

“Nana khayitchigatwui asuk chi tharchigatra, kala pāngmonwui yar khaishāng chi nana tharchigatlu, chila khayit kahaiya, kala chi tharchisinwui yaovāwui eina kachigatna, chi Aaron eina anaomayarabingwuina.
Chi Aaron kala anaomayarabingli Israelnaobingna miphalungki kaji ngasāchingra, kaja Israelnaobingwui ningyatchigatwui eina pāngmonna samphangki kaji yarna; hi athumna
“Aaron thikahaiwui thili awui sāribing chi, anaongarāli thao neomilaga tharchigathaida athumwui ngasāra.
Anaomayara awui mahut pāngmon kasāpā china kazip khavai kachonshimwui katharapamli otram ngatha̱ khavai kazang tharan shinithang ngavaira.”
“Nana tharkachisinwui yao chi khuira, kala chiwui asā chi katharapamli hangra;
kala kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili Aaron eina anaomayarabingna yaosā eina lukli kazang khamui chi shaira.
Pheokhami sā saikora chi athumna shaira, kaja tharchigatta tharchisin kahaina; kha ayarwui mina mashaipaimana, kaja hi katharana.
Kala tharkachigatwui sā nilala, khamui nilala ngathorshong taisakha chi meili riktāhaora; chi mashailuipaimana khikhala jila chi katharana.”
“Chithāda ina nali kaso kahai chiwui athishurda Aaron eina awui naomayarabingli shinithangwui alungli tharkachisin ot sāmira.
Kala nana thangkachida suiham chigatwui vang pheomi khavai mukkā akha taithatchingra. Kala hanphutwui vang nana suiham chigat akha pha̱phayāra, pheokhami ot kasā tharan thao neomida tharchigatra.
Hanphut pam chiwui vang pheokhami sāda nana shinithang tharchigatra, kala hanphut chi tharmathengmeikaphaora; chili sākaza̱ saikora kathara ngasāhaora.”
Yaonao akha nana ngathorshong chigatra, kala yao akha chi ngazinshong chigatra.
Yao khare chili ngasoda khamanaka mathir tharāwui akhali olive thao lengkhor akha kala drakhāra̱ lengkhor akha da manātra.
Kala yaonao akhapā chi khamui kala tharāzat kachigat eina ngasoda ngazinshong chigatra, ngathor kasā thāda; hi ningyāngkhaung nganamkaphā
Nathumwui mithot kachida kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili
Chili ina Israelnaobingli samphangda iwui tekhamateina chi tharngasakra.
Kazip khavai kachonshim eina hanphut chi ina tharchigatra; Aaron kala anaomayarabinglila, pāngmon sāda ili otram ngatha̱ khavai ina tharchigatmira.
Kala Israelnaobingli ngasopamda I athumwui Vare sāra.
Kala ina athumwui ngachaili ngasopam khavai thānshokkhame Vare chi ina da athumna theikhuira; I athumwui
Chiwui kasāng khuiningkha, kala khuiningkha pākta asān-aret ngaraichāra, kala awui asān khuining khani juira; chiwui angachi asā akha sāngasakra.
Kala nana chiwuitungli arāpla, kuimareida kala angachibingla sinā eina romserlu, laga sinā eina kuimareida akhamong sāsangra.
Akhamong chiwui azingli sināwui akhui lākharip ngarei ngasungda khaninili sāsanglu; phungkazat chitharan, chili thingphān thara̱sang khavaina.
Nana thingphān chi acaciathing eina sālaga sinā heimitrorra.
Kala chi mairārwui alungshong ningkhami oko ngalemli, kala chiwui atungli khalei lukhamashan pamkhong mangāli hailu, ina nali chili samphangra.
Kala Aaronna nganamkaphā chi hanphut chiwuitungli riktāra, ngathor kachida Aaronna thaomei chi sakhamathā chitharan ana riktāra,
kala ngazinshong Aaronna thaomei kashar tharan chi ana riktāra, kala
Makathara anganam nilala, rikkatā kachigat nilala, tharāzat kachigat nilala, ra̱shakshirei chiwuitungli machigatpaimana.
Aaronna hanphut hiwui angachibingli suiham chigat sāwui ashee chi neora, suiham chigat kumkhali akha shida thot kachida sāchingra; hi
“Nana Israelnaobingwui mishān kakhui tharan, athum ava̱va̱ khalatta ngatangman miphalungra, kaja kashān chitharan athumwui ngachaili sākazāt marā khavaina.
Mishān kashānli kazang kachiva̱na hithāda miphalungra: kathara shimwui shekel athishurda mi kachiva̱na shekel makhai
Mishānli kazanga kum maga̱ kāshung kahaiya kala chiwui atungbing mi kachiva̱na
Nathum khalattali pheomi khavai
Israelnaobingwui eina pheomi khavaiwui lupā chi nana khuilaga kazip khavai kachonshimwui ot sākhavai sālu, kaja nathum khalattawui vāng pheomi khavainada
“Pheokhavai pithraiwui khongsai akha kala chi rungkhavai pithraiwui aphei akha sākhuilu. Kala chi kazip khavai kachonshim eina hanphutwui ngachaili haida tara̱ sanghailu,
Chili Aaron kala awui naongarāna pheipāng pheora.
Athumna kazip khavai kachonshimli kazang chitharan, lah athumna hanphutpamli rāda
Athumna athumwui pāng kala athumwui phei pheora, masākha thira: hi katang makhavai, ali kala awui ara̱-azā mithot tāshungda athumwui shiyan sāra.”

“Mathāmeikap kaje nganamkaphā yur — nganamkaphā myrrh ara̱, shekel shāphangāman, nganamkaphā sākom, chiwui tangkhai, chiya shākhani hangphangāman, ngawokrung kahai nganamkaphā mathira̱ shākhani hangphangā man,
kala (kathara shimwui shekel athishurda) cassia shāphangāwui, kala olive thao lengkhor akha khuilaga;
kala thao kashunga mina kasā thāda saikora hi manātlaga kathara neokhavai thao semkhuira; hi kathara neokhavai thao sāra.
Kala nana hi eina kazip khavai kachonshim kala ningkhami oko chili nana neomira,
table kala chiwui khorkhongbing, kala thaomeishong kala chiwui khorkhongbing, kala nganamkaphā thao rikkhavai hanphut,
kala rikkatā kachigatwui kala chiwui khorkhongbing kala khongsaila chiwui apheila katonga ngasoda.
Tharmathengmeikap kaje ngasā khavai nana tharchigatra; chili sākaza̱ saikora chi kathara ngasāhaora.
Kala nana Aaron kala awui naomayarabingli pāngmon sāda ili otram ngatha̱mi khavai nana thao neomida tharchigatlu.
Kala nana Israelnaobingli, ‘Hi nathumwui naothot peida iwui kathara neokhavai thao ngasāra da hānglu.
Hi icham-chama miwui phasāli maheirorpaimana, kala hili ngaraichāda masemkhuipaimana; hiya katharana, kala hi nathumwui vang kathara ngasāra.
Kachikathāna hili ngaraichāda manātkhuiakha, kala kha̱mili hi neomiakha awui yurwui eina katathaora.’ ”

nganamkaphā thao kashunga mina kasā thāda machi sanglaga mathingrik tharmathenglak eina semkhuilu,

Kala hithāda manātlu da hāngkahai athishurda nana semkakhui thao chi nawui vang masāpaimana, hi
Kachikathāna nganamkaphā thao sāda hili ngaraichāda sakhuiakha awui yurwui eina katathaora,”
“Yanglu, Judah shangwui Uriwui naomayara, Hurwui ara̱ Bezalelli ina hokhuihaira:
kala ina Varewui Manglā chipemmihaira, ningla, aworkathemla, ot sākatheila —

Kala yanglu, ali ngasoda Dan shangwui Oholiab, Ahisamachwui naomayarali kapangkhuihaira; kala chili langda ina sākashapa mi kachungkhali sākathei mihaira; kaja ina nali kaso kahai thāda athumna sāra:
kazip khavai kachonshim, kala ningkhami oko, kala chiwuitungli kahai lukhamashan pamkhong, kala kachonshim chiwui shim sāri saikora,
table kala chiwui khorkhongbing, kala kathara thaomeishong eina chiwui thongthāng saikora, nganamkaphā thaowui hanphut,
kala rikkatā kachigat hanphutwui khorkhongbing, kala khongsai kala chiwui rungkhavai aphei,

kala neomi khavai thao, kala katharapamwui nganamkaphā thao; ina nali hāngkahai saikora chiwui athishurda sāki kajina.”
Israelnaobingli hānglu, “Nathumna iwui sabbathbing mayonphalungra, kaja I eina nathumwui ngachaili naothot peida hina khudam sāra, kaja nathumli
Nathumna sabbath mayonra, kaja hi nathumwui vang katharana; hi makhao khangasakapa chi sāthatra; chithang ot kasāpā chili awui mibingwui eina katathaora.
Tharukthang ot sāra, kha kashinethang chingri eina ngasāmkakhui sabbathna, kala
Chiwui vang mayonching kaji kala katang makhavai tuingashit athumwui naothot kachida mayonvāda Israelnaobingna sabbath mayonra.
Hina I eina Israelnaobingwui ngachaili,
Kala Sinai Kaphungtungli ngazekkup kahaiwui thili Varewui pāngmareng eina kapisang kahai, tuingashitwui lungphek khani chi Mosesli mihaowa.
Chieina Aaronna athumli hānga, “Napreiva̱̱ ngarā, nanaomayara ngarā kala naongalava̱ ngarāna khanāli khangathet sinā saikora khuirālu.”
Chieina athumna khanāli khangathet sinā saikora khuishokta Aaronli khuivāmi.
Kala ana athumwui pāngli khalei sinā chi khuida, khutlai eina sināwui seinao ama̱ akha sākhui.
Kala athumna, “O Israelnaobing! hibing hi nathumwui varebingna, Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānshokkhamebing china!” da hānga.
Aaronna chi theilaga chiwui mangāli hanphut akha sākhui, kala Aaronna vaoshokta hānga “Akhama
Akhama kathā athumna ngathorthāk ngakarthuida rikkatā kachigat kala ningyatchigatwui vang khuirai, kala mibingna phāshak phāzāda kala ngakarthuida lumshilao sai.

Ina kakasowui eina athumna ngalāngda apong khangateili ngareithuihaira. Pāng eina sināwui seinao ama̱ sākhuida khoruma, kapha̱la pha̱ya kala hithāda, ‘O Israelnaobing, Hi nathumwui varebingna, Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānshokkhame china!’” da hānga.

Ara chithāda sāda iningkhānra, iwui malungkhavāt mei kachui thāda ina athumli mutngasakra; kha nawui eina yur kahakva̱ akha sāngasakra.”

‘Phungreili ashaothat khavai kala okathuiwui eina shimān ngasak khavai ana makaphā khangarān leida athumli thānkashokna’ da khisāda Egyptnaobingli hāngngasakrakhala? Sakashi malungkhavāt kala nawui mibingli makaphā taki kajiwui eina ngacheimilu.

Nawui raobing Abraham, Isaac kala Israelli phaningungmilu, kala na khalattana athumli ‘Ina nawui ara̱-azā kazingramwui sirāyākha ngasa ngasakra, kala ina ngashit kahai lam saikora hi nawui ara̱-azāli ina mira, kala athumna katang mavaila pānra’ da shākhi sāda hāngkahaina.”
Kala awui mibingli sākashi sākida kaphaningwui eina
Kala Mosesna ngareikhuida tuingashitwui lungphek khaninili kapikasang chi singphungda phungreiwui eina tai; lungphek khani chi lākkhala lākkhala kapingasunga.
Lungphek khani chi Vare themsakna, kakapila lungphek chili Varena kapikasangna.
Mibingwui khangavaowui akhon-akhak chi shālaga Joshuana Mosesli hānga, “Rāmrah chili raikhon shāli.”
Kha ana hānga, “Chi rai khayuiwui akhon maningmana; lah makhayuiwui chapkhangachā akhonla maningmana; kha laa kasakhon ina shai.”
Kala rāmrahpamli ungzangkhaleoda ana seinao kala pheichak kasā chi theilaga, Moseswui malungkhavāt mei kachui thāhaowa, kala apāngli kasing lungphek chi hortāda phungrei pheili horkhaihaowa.
Kala athumna sākakhui seinao chi ana khuilaga meili riktai, kala akha̱ sāngasakta chi tara̱li manātlaga Israelwui mibingli mangngasaka.
Kala Mosesna Aaronli, “Mibing hina nali khi sāhaoda nana athumwuitungli hiyakha hakkhamahā morei phungsangmikhala?” da hānga.
Chieina Aaronna ngahānkai, “Iwui ameina malung mavatmiranu; mibing hili nana katheina, athum makaphā ningchānglaka.
Kaja athumna ili, ‘Ithumli thānzatmi khavai varebing milu, khikhalajila Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānkashoka Moses kali vāhaokhala kaji ithum matheithura’ da hānga.
Chieina ina ‘Sinā khalei mi china khuirālu’ da hānga; kala athumna khuirāda ina meili sanglaga seinao hi kashokna.”
Mibingna ningkhān kasā chi Mosesna theilaga (kaja athumwui yangkashebingwui mangāli athum khalatta khayāmalā khavai Aaronna ningkhān sāngasakhaowa).

Kha ara, taulu, kala ina hāngkahai apam chili mibingli thānvālu; yanglu, iwui kazingraona nathumwui mangāli zatra. Chithālala, I kharā chitharan, ina athumwui morei chi athumwuitungli hāngsangra.”
Kala
Kala ina nathumwui mangāli kazingrao akha chihorāda, ina Canaannaobing, Amorbing, Hitnaobing, Periznaobing, Hivnaobing kala Jebusbingli kashamshokmihaora.
Seina̱ kala khuira̱ khalong ngalei chili vālu; kha ina nathumli mangasoshangmara, maningakha nathum hāngla makakhui mi sathuihaoda ina nathumli shimān ngasakpaishina.”
Mibingna makaphā pao chi shālaga, athumna chapngachai; kala athum khipākha athumwui sāri-khongnāngbing mashaksāthuwa.

Chiwui vang eina Israelnaobingna Horeb phungreiwui eina thuida sāri-khongnāngbing khuishokserhaowa.

Chiwui vang eina ara, ina nali seihā sāli, kalikhada nawui mikyanli ili nana lumashanmiakha, ara nawui apong ili kachitheimilu, chithāda ina nali theira kala nawui maiyanli lumashankhangai samphangra. Yur hila nawui mibingna da kakhuisangmilu.”
Kala ana hānga, “Iwui ngasokhamina nali ngayurzatra, kala ina nali ngasāmkhui ngasakra.”
Kala ana ali hānga, “Kalikhada nana ili mangasomimara jiakha ithumli hiwui eina mathānshangalu.

Maningakha I kala nawui mibing nawui mangāli lumashankhami samphanghairada ina kathāda theirakhala? Nana ngasokhamiwui vang, okathuili khalei miyur saikorawui ngachaili I kala nawui mibing ngakheikhang kahai maningmala?”

Mosesna hānga, “Ina nali seihā sāda kapona, ili nawui tekhamatei chitheimilu.”
Kha,” ana hānga, “nana imai matheipaimara; kaja mina ili theilaga maringpaimana.”

kala iwui tekhamatei rākakān tharan ina nali lunghengtungli haira, kala I mathuiranglakha eina tangda ipāng eina nali kafamira.
Chiwui thili ina ipāng khuithuihaora, kala nana ikhanuk theira; kha imaiva matheimara.”
Ngathor ngarānhaisalu, kala ngathorshong Sinai Kaphungli kālu, kala phungreitonli ili kāsamphanglu.
Mi khipākha nali mangasokāpaimara, kala phungrei chili khipākha maraaranu, seila, yaola chiwui ngalemli mahompamaranu.”

Mosesna Israelwui mibing katonga kazipkhui, kala athumli hānga “Nathumna otbing hi sākhavai
Tharukthang ot sāra, kha kashinethang chi nathumna
sabbaththang nathumwui mi khaleipamli khipākha mei masa̱paimana.”
Nathum ngachaiwui eina
khamayinga, hungrisi kala hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chonsā; meha,
yaohui mathen kahai, mehuibing, acaciathing,

“Kala nathumwui ngachaili kashapa kachiva̱na rāda
kala chiwui kachonshim eina fakham khavai, hokkhui khavai kala akom, pākra̱, phākashut, kala chiwui aphei;
hanphut chi thingphānli ngasoda; lukhamashan pamkhong kala rānkhavai mairār;
table eina thingphān kala khorkhongbing saikora, kala Ngasokhamiwui khamui;

kala nganamkaphāwui hanphut kala chiwui thingphān, neokhavai thao kala nganamkaphā thao, kala khāmongwui chonrān, tabernaclewui khāmongli rānkhavai;
rikkatā kachigatwui hanphut kala chiwui pithraiwui yākrei, thingphānbing, kala khorkhongbing saikora; khongsai kala rungkhavai aphei;
yāngkhupli rānkhavai, pākra̱bing kala apheibing kala yāngkhup ngaveiwui chonrānla;
tabernacle kala yāngkhupwui thingpar eina chiwui khara̱bing;
katharapamli otram khangatha̱li sangkhavai manaklak eina sākakhui sāri, Aaron pāngmonwui kathara sāri, kala pāngmon sāda anaomayarabingna sangkhavai sāri rāsemlu.”
Chiwui thili Israel ashangva̱ Moseswui eina thuihaowa.

Kala mi kachiva̱na khamayinga lah hungrisi lah hungshi kahai lah khamanaka chonsā lah meha lah mathen kahai yaohui lah mehui athumwui khalalei khuirāsera.

Kala sak sākathei sha̱naobingna athum pāng eina rakkakhui ot khamayinga, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ chonsā khuirai;
ningli rāza̱da khangatha̱ samkaphang sha̱nao saikorana mesam raka.
Kala kathānabingna onyx ngalung kala ephod eina thikhomli sangkapai ngalung yur khuirai,
kala thaomei shārkhavai thaoyur, kala neomi khavai thao, kala nganamkaphā riktā khavaiwui thaoyur khuirai,
Israelwui mibing saikorana, mayarnaola, sha̱naola, ningli rāza̱da khangatha̱ samkaphang mi kachiva̱na, Mosesli
kala ali Varewui Manglā chipemmihaida ningla, sākashapla, awor kathemla, ot sākatheila,
sinā, lupāsā, pithrai pāngthemwui otsak,
ngalung kashanla, kala thingli chankasang them saikora mihaira.
Kala Dan shangwui eina Ahisamachwui naomayara Oholiab ani khaninina khangateili tamchithei khavai kasatmihaira.

Them kathem mina sākathei kachiva̱ anili chipemmihaira, kongti-kongnā yekkathei, kala khamaying, hungreoseo, hungshi kahai chonsā eina sākakhui kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kharak lah them kathem otsak saikora sāshap khavai sangmihaira.
“Bezalel eina Oholiab kala sākathei mi kachiva̱na kathara shim sākhavai
Kala Mosesna Bezalel eina Oholiab, kala kashapa mi, kaja
Kala kathara shimwui ot chi sākhavai Israelnaobingna mingairareo kachigat saikora athumna Moseswui eina samphanga. Athumna lemmet kachigat ngathor kachida khuirāmi,
chiwui vang eina kathara shimwui ot kasābing china kachichāwui otpamwui eina athumna rāda,
Mosesli hānga, “

Chieina Mosesna kasoi kala rāmrah huptali tui chi ngayaovai, “Kathara shimwui ot sākhavai sha̱nao nilala, mayarnao nilala sāvaiki kajili lāngda machigatluiranu.” Chieina mibingna makhuira khavai khāmhaowa;
kaja athumwuili sāvaishapli lāngmeida kachungkha leisai.
Chonrān ava̱va̱wui asān khuining maga̱da chishat, kala chonrān kachiva̱wui aretna khuining mati; chonrān saikora asān-aret ngaraichāsera.
Kala chonrān phangā asā akha sākhui, kala khangatei phangā chi asā akha sākhui.
Kala ana chonrān ngaher khare chiwui amarei kachida apheili khamayinga eina hokthang khavai sāsanga; chi tākam eina kakhanewui marei chilila sāsanga.
Ana chonrān akhali hokthāng khavai hangphangā, kala kakhane ngaherlila hokthāng khavai hangphangā da amarei chili sāsanga; kala hokthāng khavaibing chi akha eina akha mai ngasuna.
Kala ana sinā eina akhui hangphangā sākhuida, kala chonrānbing chi akha eina akha pānkhui ngarokta tabernacle saikora chi akha sākhuiya.
Kala ana tabernacletungli fakhavai meha eina chonrān tharāda akha sākhui.
Chonrān ava̱va̱wui asān khuining thumra, kala aretna mati, chonrān tharāda akha chi asān-aret saikora chi ngaraichāsera.
Ana chonrān phangā sakkha sākhui, khangatei tharuk chi sakkha sākhui.
Kala ana ngaherkha chiwui shokkhamayara chonrān amareili hokthāng khavai hangphangā sāsanga, kala chonrān ngaherkha ngashikkhui khavai chilila hangphangā sāsanga.
Kala ana pithraiwui akhui hangphangā sākhuida kachonshim tongda asā saikora chi akha sākhavai semkhuiya.
Kala ana kachonshimli fakham khavai mathen kahai yaohui kala mehui eina sākhui.
Akom kachiva̱wui asān khuining tharā, kala aretna khuining akha tangkhaina.
Akom ava̱va̱li ngasunkhui khavai amachat khanini kāngasakta tabernacle chiwui akom kachida sāsanga.
Tabernaclewui vang ana akom hithāda sāsanga: azingshongwui akom maga̱,
kala ana akom maga̱ chiwui khaning khavai aphei hangmati lupāsā eina sai, akom akhawui amachat khaniwui vang akharip, kala akom ava̱va̱wui vang amachat khanirip sāsanga.
Kala Tabernaclewui kakhanevāk, atungshongwui vang, ana akom maga̱ sema,
kala lupāsā eina kasā, akom ava̱va̱wui aphei khanirip da aphei hangmati sākhui.
Kala tabernacle khanukshongwui atungshong ana akom tharuk sema.
Kala ana tabernaclewui khanuk achithekli sangkhavai akom khani sema.
Chibing chi azingli mangashikmana kha atungli hokthāng khavaipamli ngasunkhui, chithāda chithek khaniwui vang khani sākhui.
Lupāsā aphei eina ngasoda chili akom chishat lei: akom ava̱va̱li aphei khanini da tharāda tharuka.
Kala acaciathing eina phākashut kala tabernacle chiwui arāp akhawui akomwui phākashut phangā,
kala arāp akhavākwui akom phākashut phangā, kala tabernacle khanukshongwui zingtunshong akomwui vang phākashut phangā da ana sākhui.
Ana alungthungli kasanga phākashut thing chi akomwui vākatang khanini ungshung vāshungda sāsanga.
Kala ana akombing chi sinā eina rommithai, kala phākashut thingbing chieina hokthāng khavai akhuibing chi sinā eina romsera.
Kala hiwui vang ana acaciathing eina pākra̱ mati sākhuilaga sinā eina rommithai; chiwui hokkhui khavaibing sinā eina sai, kala khaning khavai akhui mati lupāsā eina heikhui.
Ana khāmong chonrān chila khamayinga, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakui kazaira̱ eina sākakhui chonsā kala kapim eina yekkasanga eina sākhui;
kala chiwui hokkhui khavai kakā pākra̱ phangāla sākhui, kala pakra̱bing chi sinā eina rommithai, kala hokkhavai khara̱bing chi sinā eina sai, kha aphei phangā chiya pithrai eina sai.
Kala ana chiwui alung ayar sinā kachanga eina heirora kala sinā kachanga eina heikhuida kuimareida akhamong sāsanga.
Kala ana achithek matili sināwui akhui mati heikhuida, arāp akhashong khani kala lakhashong khani da sāsangkhui.
Kala ana acaciathing eina thingphān sākhuilaga sinā eina rommithai,
kala ngava̱ khavai thingphān chi ningkhami okowui arāp lakharipta akhui chili ruisanghai.
Kala ana lukhamashan pamkhong chi sinā kachanga eina sākhui; khuining khani tangkhai sānga, kala khuining akha tangkhai pāka,
kala ana sinā eina shaokhuilaga cherubim khani sākhuida lukhamashan pamkhongwui ayar lakharipli hai,
cherub akhana ayar akatangli, kala cherub akhapāna ayar lakhavākwui akatangli hai; kala lukhamashan pamkhongli asā akha sāda sāshāna, cherubimbing chi asā akha sāda sāshāna.
Cherubim khani chiwui angachāng hārkālaga lukhamashan pamkhongli kāhārkhamda mai ngareingasuna; kala lukhamashan pamkhongshong cherubimwui mai ngareivai.
kala ana chi kashenga sinā kachanga eina rommithai, kala akhamong sinā kachanga eina heikhuida sāsanga.
Kala ana kuimareida akom pangmayā rikha sāsanga, kala chi sinā eina heikhuida akomli kuimareida khuisanga.
Ana sinā eina akhui mati heikhuilaga aphei mati achithek matili sāshāna.
Thingphān ruisangda table chi ngava̱ khavai akhuibing chi akom ngalemchangli pānshana.
Ana ngava̱ khavai thingphān chi acaciathing eina sālaga sinā rommithai.
Kala ana tabletungli haiki kaji khorkhongbing nganamkaphā yur sangkhavai kala khongphei khongphāngbing, kala ra̱shakshirei heikhavai khokthi khorām ana sinā kachanga eina sākhuisera.
Kala chiwui aphāng tharuk thaomeishongwui eina lākhashong kathum, kala lākhashong kathumda shoka;

athingla, awonla kālaga almond thāda tengkot kathum aphāng akhali kai, kala athingla awonla kālaga almond thāda tengkot kathum aphāng akhali kai, chithāda thaomeishongwui eina aphāng tharuk shokngasaka.
Thaomeishong chili almond thāda tengkot mati semkhui, chiwui athingla awonla saikora kai,
aphāng tharuk chi angawor kathum sāda angawor kachiva̱wui eina athing ava̱va̱ shokngasaka.
Chiwui athingbing kala chiwui aphāngbing asā akha sāngasakta sinā kachanga eina shaokhuida sākhui.
Kala ana thaomeishong chili tengkotnao thāda thaomei shini kala khanit khavai eina akhongla sinā kachanga eina sākhui.
Ana khorkhongbing saikora sinā talent akha eina sākhui.
Ana chiwui atung, arāpbing kuimareida kala angacheebinglila sinā eina rommithai kala kuimareida sinā heiunga.
Kala sinākhui khanini heikhuida arāp khaniwui akom azingli hanphut ngava̱ khavai thingphān ruisangda mai ngareingasungda semsanga.
Kala ana thingphānla acaciathing eina sālaga chili sinā rommithai.
Ana achithek matili angachi mati sāsanga, chithāda sāda hanphut eina angachibing chi asā akha ngasai, kala pithrai eina rommithai.
Kala ana hanphut chiwui khorkhongbing saikora hamnao, meiyaikhong, khongsai, marikkapei, kala khāng saikora pithrai eina ana sākhuisera.
Kala ana hanphut chiwui komkhavai yākrei, pithrai khānta thāda sālaga chi hanphut akhamong eina thuilaga ngahunshingli tāshung ngasaka.
Komkhavai pithrai yākrei chili, thingphān sangkhavai akhui mati achithek matili sāsanga.
Thingphān chi acaciathing eina sālaga pithrai eina rommithai.
Kala ana hanphutwui arāp khaninili sākasang akhui chili thingphān thara̱sangda ngava̱ khavai sai; hanphut chi chikhai eina sāda alung masai ngasaka.
chiwui pākra̱bing maga̱, khaning khavai (aphei) maga̱ da pithrai eina sai; kha chili hokkhui khavai pākra̱wui khānghui eina masa̱ khavaibing chi lupāsā eina sai.

Kala atungshongwui chonrān khuining shākha, chiwui pākra̱ maga̱, kala khaning khavai aphei maga̱ pithrai eina sai, kha chili hokkhui khavai pākra̱wui khānghui eina masa̱ khavaibing chi lupāsā eina sai.
Kala zingtunshongwui chonrān khuining hangphangā, chiwui pākra̱ tharā kala aphei tharā da sākhui; pākra̱wui hokkhui khavai khānghui eina masa̱khui khavai chiya lupāsā eina sai.
Kala mangāwui zingshoshong chonrān khuining hangphangāna.
Ngavei arāp akhavāk rānkhavai khuining tharāda phangā kala pākra̱ kathum, kala chiwui aphei kathumna.
Chi tākam eina lākhashongla sākhui; yāngkhup ngaveiwui uishong yāshong rānkhavai khuining tharāda phangā, pākra̱ kathumrip kala aphei kathumrip lei.
Yāngkhup kuimareida rānkhavai manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ chonsā eina sāsera.

Kala pākra̱ apheibing chi pithrai eina sai, kha hokkhui khavai khānghui eina masa̱ khavaibing chi lupāsā eina sai; athingbingli romkhavai chila lupāsāna, kala yāngkhupwui pākra̱li masa̱khui khavai saikora lupāsā eina sāsera.

Kala yāngkhupwui ngaveili rānkhavai kachon chiya khamayinga, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ chonsā eina sālaga kapim eina aphor mathālak eina yeksanga; chi khuining maga̱ sānga kala khuining phangā chuiya, yāngkhupwui rānkhavaili ngarithisera.
Kala chiwui pākra̱ matina; kala aphei mati da pithrai eina sai, hokkhui khavai khānghui lupāsāna; kala athingbing lupāsāna rommithai, masa̱khui khavai khara̱ lupāsā eina sāsera.
Kala tabernaclewuila, yāngkhupwuila thingshun saikora pithrai eina sāsera.
Ithamar, pāngmon, Aaronwui naomayarana thānda Mosesna Levi shangli kasoda shākhangasak tuingashitwui tabernacle kasāli kazang otyur mashing chi hina,
Judah shangwui Uriwui naomayara Bezalel, Hurwui ara̱na, Mosesli

kala ali Dan shangwui Ahisamachwui naomayara Oholiab, khamayinga, hungrisi, kala hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chonsāli pāngthem kasinga, them kathema, kala aphor yekasangana ngasoi.
Kathara shim kasā otsak chili shikachin sināsa saikora kathara shimwui shekel aman athishurda, sinā kachigatwui eina talent maga̱da chiko kala shekel shāshini thumrāna.
Kala yarui ashangva̱wui eina samkaphang, kathara shimwui shekel aman athishurda lupāsā shākha, talent shākha kala shekel thingkha shāshini kala hangshinida phangā:

mipha̱li beka akharip (shekel tangkhai, kathara shimwui shekel aman athishurda), kum maga̱ eina thuilaga khararnao mishānli zangkahai athum shātharuk kala thing kathum, shāphangā kala hangphangāwuina.
Lupāsā talent shākha katharapamwui aphei eina mairār phei haikhavaili zanghaowa, aphei ava̱va̱li talent ava̱va̱ zangda aphei shākhawuina.
Kala shekel thingkha shāshini hangshinida phangā hi ana pākra̱wui hokkhui khavai sema, kala athing eina khalap khavaili romkhavai savai.
Kala ngashaikakhui pithrai chi talent hangshini, kala shakel thingkhani shāmatina;
pithrai chieina ana kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongphei, pithrai hanphut, yākrei kala khorkhongbing saikora sāvai.
Kala yāngkhup pheithing, ngavei pheithingla, kala tabernaclewuila, yāngkhupwui thingshun katonga romvai.
Katharapamli otram ngatha̱ khavai, khamaying, hungrisi, kala hungshi kahai eina manaktak kahaiya sāri sākhui; athumna kathara sāri chi Aaronwui vang sākhui; kala chi
Khamayinga, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chili yeksang khavai sinā aphek shaokhanārlaga kazaira̱ thāda mathālak eina sākhui.
Ephod chi yārtuili thāngkhavai khara̱ khani sākhui, kala khani chi ephodli pānkhui.

Kala chi khalapshān khavai chonsā rakkakhui chila kala chiwui kasā themsak ngaraichāda sākhui, kaja sinā eina kasā khamaying, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ eina kasā chonsāna; chi
Onyx ngalung sākhariklaga sinā eina rukshāna, kala khutopli rukkasang thāda Israelwui naomayarabingwui amingbing chili ruksangsera.
Kala ana chi ephodwui yārtuiparli hai, kaja
Chi asān-aret ngarithi, kala thikhom khanishi ngaphoda sākhui, ngaphohaiakha, asān pangmayākha, aret pangmayākha ji.
Chiwuitungli apeng mati ruksanga. Khare apengli sardius, topaz, kala carbuncle;
pengkakhaneli, emerald, sapphire, kala hirā;
kakathuma apengli, jacinth, agate, kala amethyst;
kala khamate apengli, beryl, onyx, jasper; saikora chi sinā eina rukshānsera.
Ngalung tharāda khani chili Israelwui naomayarabingwui aming athishurda yeksangsera; mahor namkhavai khutop thāda yeksangsera.
Kala thikhomwuitungli khara̱ kashirei hokkhui khamaron thāda sinā khamathinga eina sāsanga;
kala rukshān khavai sinā apeng khani, akhui khani sākhuida akhui khani chi thikhomwui akhana khanili pānshāna;
kala athumna thikhom mareiwui akhui khani chili sinā peng khani chi hokkhui.
Amarei khani china sinā rukshān kahai chili pānkhui; chithāda sāda athumna ephodwui yārtuiparli mangāshong hokthānga.
Chiwui thili athumna sinā akhui khani sākhuida thikhomwui achithek khaniwui alungshong ephod ngalemli sāshāna.
Kala athumna sinākhui khani sākhuida yārtuiparwui azing mangāshong sāshānda thāngkhavai ephodwui themlāk eina rakkakhui chonsāwui atunglila sāshāna.
Kala athumna thikhom akhui eina ephod akhui ngasun khavai khamayinga khara̱ eina khalapkhui, chithāda sāda ephodwuitungli napshānda thikhom mangacho khavai
Ana ephodwui phahonla khamayingamāng eina rakkhui;
kala chiwui sākaphut akhur chi makāk khavai phahonwui sākaphut thāda shangshung tāshungda katimsangsera.
Katuma phahon amareili khamaying, hungrisi, hungshi kahai kala manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ yurwui chonsā eina kabothei yeksanga.
Kala athumna sinā kachanga eina kantā semkhui, kala katuma phahon amarei kuimareida kabothei sāsang kahai chiwui angachai-chaili sinā kachanga eina kasā kantā ava̱va̱ hokthānga;
kantā akha, kabothei akha, kantā akha, kabothei akha da,
Athumna Aaronwui kala anaomayarabingwui vangla khamanaka chonsā eina coat sāmi,
kala kuiteila, kuihonla khamanaka chonsā eina sāmi, malaola, shanneira̱la;
manakta hākakhui kazaira̱ kala khamayinga, hungrisi, hungshi kahai chonsā kala kapim eina aphor phorsanglaga,
Kala athumna kathara kuihon sinā kachanga eina sai, kala khutopli rukkasang thāda, “
Kala
Chithāda sāda kazip khavai kachonshimwui tabernacle chi sākhuihaowa; kala
Kala athumna Mosesli tabernacle chi khuirāmi, kachonshim kala chiwui khorkhongbing, chiwui hokkhui khavaibing, chiwui akombing, chiwui khamakhara thingbing, chiwui pākra̱bingla, kala chiwui apheila,
faror khavai mathen kahai yaohui, mehui, kala mairār chonrānla,
ningkhami oko eina chiwui thingphānla, kala lukhamashan pamkhongla;
table eina chiwui khorkhongbing kala ngasokhamiwui khamuila;
sinā kachanga eina kasā thaomeishong kala chiwui thaomeibing, kala chiwui khorkhongbing saikora; kala shārkhavai thaola;
sinā eina kasā hanphut, neokhavai thao, kala nganamkaphā thao kala kachonshim khāmongli rānkhavai chonrānla;
pithrai eina kasā hanphutla, chili sākasang pithraiwui yākrei thingphān, kala khorkhongbing saikora, khongsaila, kala chiwui apheila;
yāngkhupli rānkhavai kachon, pākra̱bing kala apheibing, yāngkhup ngaveiwui chonrān, thingshunbing, kazip khavai kachonshim, kala tabernacleli shichinki kaji khorkhong saikora;
katharapamli otram ngatha̱ khavai themlāk eina sākakhui pāngmon Aaronwui kathara sāribing, kala anaomayarabingwui sāribing.
na Mosesli kakaso saikora chi, Israelnaobingna katonga sākupa.
Kala Mosesna ot saikora chi thei, kala yanglu,
“Kachāng kharewui zimiksho kharethang kazip khavai kachonshimwui tabernacle chi khaningkālu.
Kala ningkhami oko chi chili sanglu, kala chi chonrān mairār eina sākhamhaolu.
Kala table chi khuizangda apam chālak eina hailu; thaomeishong chila khuizangra, kala thaomeibingla runghailu.
Kala sināwui nganamkaphā rikkhavai hanphut chi ningkhami oko mangāli haida tabernaclewui khāmong kachon rāntālu.
Nana rikkatā kachigatwui hanphut chi kazip khavai kachonshimwui tabernacle chiwui khāmong mangāli haira;
kala khongsai chi kazip khavai kachonshim eina hanphut ngachaili haida tara̱ runghailu.
Kala nana yāngkhup kuimareida sākālaga chiwui ngaveili chonrān hokthānglu.
“Chiwui thili nana neokhavai thao chi khuilaga taberbacle chiwui alungli khalei saikorali neomida tharchigatlu. Kala tabernacle eina chiwui alungli khalei thongthāng saikora chi kathara ot ngasāra.
Nana rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutlila, kala chiwui khorkhongbing saikoralila neora, kala hanphut tharchigatlu; chieina hanphut chi tharmathenglakhaora.
Nana khongsai kala chiwui rungkhavai apheilila neomida tharchigatlu.
“Chiwui thili nana Aaron eina anaomayarabingli kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili khuirāra kala athumli tara̱ eina ra̱vaimathāmilu,
kala Aaronli kathara sāribing chi ngavaimilu, kala pāngmon sāda otram ngatha̱mi khavai ali thao neomida tharchigatmilu,
nana anaomayarabingla khuirāda athumli coat ngavaimilu,
kala athum pāngmon sāda ili otram ngatha̱mi khavai avāva̱li neokhami thāda athumlila thao neomilu, kala athumli thao neokhami china athumli khuisangda thot-thot peida mathāhaila pāngmon savāshumra.”
Chithāda Mosesna sai;
Kala zingkum kakhanewui kachāng kharewui kharethang tabernacle chi sakāhaowa.
Mosesna tabernacle chi khaningkai; ana khaning khavai apheibing chi shuna, kala akom eina kasā arāp sakai, kala pākra̱bing chi shunkāsera,
kala ana tabernacle chili kachon chi harvāya,
Kala ana ningkhami chi khuida okoli sanga, kala thingphān oko ruisanglaga lukhamashan pamkhong chi okotungli kāhai,
kala ana oko chi tabernaclewui alungli khuirai, kala mairār chi rānhai, kala
Kala ana table chi kazip khavai kachonshimwui alungli, mairārwui ayar atungshong runghai;
kala
Kala ana thaomeishong chi kazip khavai kachonshim azingshongwui tabernacle tableli mai ngareingasungda hai,
kala
Kala ana sinā eina kasā hanphut chila kazip khavai kachonshimli mairārwui mangāshong haida,
na Mosesli kakaso athishurda chiwuitungli nganamkaphā otyur riktai.
Kala ana tabernaclewui chonrān chi khāmongli rānhai.
Kala ana tabernaclewui kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongpheili rikkatā kachigatwui hanphut chi haiya; kala chiwuitungli rikkatā kachigatwui hanphut eina tharāzāt kachigat chi
Kala khongsai chi kazip khavai kachonshim eina hanphutwui ngachaili haida pheokhavai tara̱ runghai,
kala chili Moses eina Aaron, kala Aaronwui naomayarabingna phei-pāng pheowa;
na Mosesli kakaso athishurda kazip khavai kachonshimli kazang tharan kala hanphut ngalemli khavā tharan athumna chili pheokhui.
Kala ana tabernacle eina hanphutpam kuimareida yāngkhup sāsanga; kala yāngkhupwui ngavei chonrānla sāsanga. Chithāda Mosesna ot chi sākuphaowa.
Kala Moses kazip khavai kachonshimli mazangrarthuwa, kaja muiyāna ngapuirorhaida
Athumwui shongzā peida tabernaclewui eina muiyā lānkahai chitharan Israelnaobingna zatphokchinga,
kha muiyā chi malānakha, athumna muiyā chi malānranglakha eina tangda mazatmana.
Kaja shongzā peida Israel shimkhur saikorawui mikli ngashun kachida
Israelnaobingli hānglu, kachikathāna
nathumwui kachigat chi sei ashangva̱, lah yao ashangva̱wui eina khuirāranu.
Awui rikkatā kachigat chi seishangwui eina ngasāsaakha, achuk kapei avā chigatranu, kala
rikkatā kachigat chiwui kuitungli ana pāng parra, chieina ali pheomida khuisangmira.
Chiwui thili ana mukkā chi
Kala rikkatā kachigatwui sā chi ahui hemlaga amarimrim sātāra,
kala Aaronwui naomayara ngarā pāngmonbingna hanphut chiwuitungli mei sākāra kala meitungli thing khari-khanao sāda semlaga ngachamlak eina khorra.
Kala Aaronwui naomayara pāngmonbingna sāmarimla, akuila kala athaola khari-khanao sāda hanphutwui meitungli ngachamlak eina haira.
Kha chiwui akhari-akharā eina akhobing ana tara̱ eina pheofara. Kala mei eina rikkatā kachigatwui pha̱kaphayā sāda pāngmon china hanphuttungli riktāra; hi
Kalikha awui kachigat chi rikkatā kachigatwui vang yaoshangwui yao, lah meakha, achuk kapei avā chigatranu;
wui mangāli ana hanphutwui atungshong taithatra kala Aaronwui naomayara pāngmonbingna ashee chi hanphut kuimareida ikrorra.
Kala ana akuila kala chiwui athaola, asā chi amalim sālaga pāngmonna hanphut thing khorkahai chiwuitungli khari-khanao sāda ngachamlak eina haira;
kha akharibing eina akhobing chi ana tara̱ eina pheora. Chiwui thili pāngmon china katonga chi hanphutli riktāra, hi rikkatā kachigat,
Kalikhada ana
Kala chi pāngmonna hanphutli khuivāda akahung shireishatra, kala hanphutli riktāra; kala chiwui ashee chi hanphuttungwui ayarli ikrorra;
kala ana achihon eina vānaohābing chi khuilaga hanphutwui zingshoshong hotla horkhavaipamli horhaora;
ana chiwui angachāng shireishatkhuira, kha asā mangakaikhaimara. Chi hanphutthing khorkahaitungli pāngmonna riktāra. Hi mei eina rikkatā kachigatna,

kala Aaronwui naomayara pāngmonbingli khuirāmira. Kala ana khamanaka mathir homkha kala thao eina frankincense saikora khuilaga chi pāngmonna riktāra, kala phaningung khavai sāda meili rikkatā hanphutungli pha̱ra; hi
Kala tharāzat kachigatwui katai chi Aaron eina anaomayarabingwui yar sāra; hi mei eina rikkatā tharmathengmeikap kaji

Nathumna tharāzāt khamui ngānlaga chigat khavai khuikharā tharan, mathir nailaga thao makhamanāt, khawok makazang manaktak kahai mathir, lah khawok makazang katheng khamui thao eina pahangkakhui chi khuirāra.
Kalikhada nathumwui tharāzāt kachigat khamui chi khāngtungli ngānkhuiakha, khawok makazang manaktak kahai mathir chi thao eina manātra;
khamui chi akaikai eina sākhaira, kala chili thao heirorra, chi tharāzāt kachigatna.
Kala kalikhada nathumwui tharāzāt chi hamli kahanga khamuiakha, manaktak kahai mathir eina thao manātra.
Kala nana tharāzāt kachigat hikathā sākakhui otbing hi nathumna
Kala pāngmon china tharāzāt kachigat chiwui eina phaningung khavaiwui khamui sharuk chi khuihailaga chi
Kala tharāzāt kachigatwui katai saikora Aaron eina anaomayarabingwui yarna, hi
Kachigat sāda athei-arai khuishaikhare chi
Nathumna kapha̱ ot saikora chi machi sanglaga mathāphaira; nathumna Vareli tuingashit kasāwui machi chi tharāzāt kachigatli mavātpaimana; kachigat saikorali machi sangserra.
Nathumna samphangkharewui tharāzāt
Kala nathumna chiwuitungli thao sanglaga frankincense ikrorlu; hi tharāzāt kachigatna.
Chieina phaningung khavai māngatai ngayarda khuilaga chi pāngmonna thao kala frankincense saikora chi riktāra; hi mei eina rikkatā
Kala apāng seikuili parda kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli taithatra, kala Aaronwui naomayara pāngmonbingna ashee chi hanphutpam kuimareida ikrorra.
Kala
kala amakei khanili kharoma ahanthao kala amathinli khangathānbing ana amakei eina ngarumda khuithuihaora.
Chiwui thili Aaronwui naomayarabingna rikkatā kachigat hanphutwui meili, semkahai thingtung chili riktāra; hi mei eina rikkatā kachigat, kala hi
“Kalikhada awui kachigat chi ningyatshar kachigatwui pha̱kaphayākha, ana yaoshangwui eina kachigat sāyur chi, avā nilala lah alā nilala, ana achuk kapei
Kalikha ana awui kachigatwui vang yaonao chigatakha, chi ana
ana pha̱ki kajiwui kuitungli apāng parda kazip khavai kachonshimwui mangāli taithatra; kala Aaronwui naomayarabingna hanphut kuimareida ashee ikrorra.
Chieina ningyatchigat mei eina rikkatā
kala amakei khani kala chili khangathān athao, amathinli khangathān athao, amakei eina laishokrumlaga chigatra.
Kala chi kashakazā sāda, pāngmonna
“Awui kachigat chi meakha,
kala awui pāng me kuili parda kazip khavai kachonshimwui mangāli taithatra; kala Aaronwui naomayarabingna ashee chi hanphut kuimareida ikrorra.
Chiwui eina ana
kala amakei khanili kharoma ahanthao kala amathinli khangathānbing ana amakei eina ngarumda khuithuihaora.
Kala chi ningyangkhaungwui nganamkaphā mei eina rikkatā kashakazā kachigat sāda pāngmonbingna hanphutungli riktāra. Athao saikora
Nathumwui somkapam apam saikorali, nathum athao nilala ashee nilala mashaipaimana, hi nathumwui naothot kachida katang makhavai shiyan-chikan sāra.”
Kala
Israelnaobingli hānglu,
kasāpa chi thao neomi kahaia pāngmon sāsāda, ana mibingli yonngasakakha, ana morei sākahai chiwui vang suihamchigat sākhavai achuk kapei mukkā akha
Ana
Kala thao neomi kahaiya pāngmon china ashee ngayarda kazip khavai kachonshimli khuirāra;
kala ashee chili pāngmareng eina chumkhuilaga katharapam chiwui mairār mangāli
Kala kazip khavai kachonshimli khalei
Kala suihamchigat sākhavai mukkā chiwui athao saikora ana chiwui eina khuira, akharili kharom athao kala akharili kakā athao saikora,
kala amakei khanili kharoma ahanthao kala amathinli khangathānbing ana amakei eina ngarumda khuithuihaora.
(hi ningyatchigatwui mukkā eina khuikashok thāda) kala pāngmon china rikkatā kachigat hanphuttungli chibing chi riktāra.
Kha mukkāwui ahui kala chiwui asā, chiwui akui eina ngasoda, chiwui akhomareng, akharibing, kala chiwui pai,
mukkā angun katonga rāmrah ayar katharpam akhali khuishokta hotla horkhavaipamli thingwui mei eina riktāra.
athumna sākahai morei chi theikahai tharan, yarui ashangva̱na morei chiwui vang mukkānao akha suihamchigat sākhavai kachigat chi kazip khavai kachonshimli khuirāra;
kala
Chieina thao neomi kahai pāngmon china mukkā chiwui ashee teomeikha kazip khavai kachonshimli khuikāda,
kala pāngmon china
Kala ana kazip khavai kachonshimli
Kala chiwui athao saikora ana chiwui eina khuilaga, hanphuttungli riktāra.
Hithāda ana suihamchigatli kasā thāda pāngmon china mukkā chila chigatra, hithāda pāngmon china athumwui vang pheomi khavai pha̱phayāmida athumli pheomira.
Kala ana seingun chi rāmrahwui ayarli khuishokra, kala ana mukkā khare rikkatā tākam eina riktāra, hi yarui ashangva̱wui vang suihamchigat kasāna.
Ngalei khamunga akhana matheila morei sahaida, awui
ana khayon sākahai chi ali theingasak kahai tharan, ana awui suihamchigatwui vang achuk kapei mevā akha khuirāra,
kala mekuitungli awui pāng parda rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutpam chili

Chieina suihamchigat kasā chiwui ashee pāngmonna ngakaida khuida pāngmareng eina chumkhuilaga rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutwui angachibing chili neomira, kala ashee katai saikora chi rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutpheili heirorra.
Kala chiwui athao saikora ningyatchigat kapha̱ thāda hanphutli riktāserra; chithāda sāda awui moreiwui vāng pāngmon china pheomi khavai sāra, kala ali pheomihaora.
ana khayon sākahai chi ali theingasak kahai tharan, ana awui suihamchigatwui vang achuk kapei melā akha khuirāra.
Kala ana suihamchigat sākhavai chiwui kuitungli awui pāng parda rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutpamli taithatra.
Kala pāngmonna ashee ngayarda khuida pāngmareng eina chumkhuilaga rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutwui, angachibing chili neomira, kala ashee katai saikora chi hanphutpheili heirorra.
Kala chi ningyatchigatwui thāda athao saikora khuilaga,
Suiham chigatwui vang achuk kapei yaonao akha khuiraakha, ana achuk kapei avā akhala khuirāra,
kala ana suihamchigat sākhavai chiwui akuitungli awui pāng parda rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutpamli taithatra.
Kala pāngmonna ashee ngayarda khuida pāngmareng eina chumkhuilaga rikkatā kachigatwui hanphutwui, angachibing chili neomira, kala ashee katai saikora chi hanphutpheili heirorra.
Kala chiwui ningyatchigatwui thāda athao saikora khuilaga, kala pāngmonna
Kachikathā mi akhana moreikasa theilaga maningakha shālaga chi shākhi sākhavai yaruina kasolaga masāthurakha chiwui khayonkhamāng ana phungra.
Lha kachikathā akhana makathara ot, makathara ramsāwui angunranu, sha̱keiwui angunranu, ngawokazat yurwui angunranu saza̱hailaga, chi ana thumhaiakha, a matharthura, kala a yonhaira.
Lha ali makhao ngasakkapai mikumowui makathara otli saza̱hailaga chi ana thumhaiakha, ana chi kathei tharan a khayona ngasāra.

Kachikathā akhana kashilapai, kaphālapai sāra da tuingashit sāphāphahailaga, mina sāphāphā kaji tuingashit akhalala, akhalala chi awui eina thumhaiakha, naoda rākathei tharan apong hibing hili a nguihaira.
Hāngkahaibing hili mi akhana yonkahai tharan awui morei sākahai chiwui vang ana hāngphatra.
Kala
Kha ana yaonao mashokrarakha, awui suihamchigatwui
Ana pāngmonli khuikharā eina khare china suihamchigat sāra; akahung shireitekra, kha asāwui eina akui mangatei ngasakmara,
kala ashee ngayarda khuida chi hanphutwui ayarli yikrorra, katei kataibing chi hanphutpheili ngayiror ngasakra, hi suihamchigat kasāna.
Chiwui thili ana kakhanepā chi sharphahorwui athishurda rikkatā kachigat sālaga, pāngmon china awui moreiwui vang pheomi khavai sāra, kala ali pheomihaora.

Kha ana kha̱na̱nao khani, lah nāsha̱nao khani machigatrarakha awui morei sākahai chiwui vang, manaktak kahai mathir epha tharāwui akhum akha khuirāra; chili thaola frankincensela masangmara, kaja hi suihamchigatna, theishirai kachigat maningmana.
Ana pāngmonli khuivāmida, ana phaningung khavai panghomkha khuilaga
Hithāda ana morei sākahaiwui vang pāngmon china awui moreiwui vang pha̱phayāmida ali pheomira. Kala katai saikora chi tharāzāt kachigatwui thāda pāngmonwui yar sāra.
wui kathara otli kachikathāna yonda sānguihaiakha, awui suihamchigat sākhavai

Chili lāngda ana kathara ot sashimānmi kahai chi ana runphalungra, chiwuitungli sharuk phangāwui akha mataida pāngmonli mira; kala pāngmon china suihamchigat yaovā chieina ngasoda ali pheomi khavai sāra, kala ali pheomihaora.

Ana achuk kapei yaoshangwui eina yaovā akha pāngmonli khuirāra, kala suihamchigatwui thāda nana aman chākkhuilu, chieina pāngmon china awui khayon chiwui vang pheomi khavai sāra, kala ali pheomihaora.
wui mangāli mi china yonkahaiwui vang hi suihamchigat kasāna.
lah shimān kahai ot samphanglaga kapikta mikhanam shākhi saakha—hāngda khaleibing hili ana morei saakha,
kachikathā morei sāda yonkahai tharan, ngapaikakhui nilala, satkharatta kakhui nilala, ali chisin kahai minamkakhui nilala, shimān kahai samkaphang nilala ana hanmira;
maningakha ana minamda shākhi sākakhui nilala, tongtingda hanmiphalungra; chiwuitungli sharuk phangāwui akha lāngsangmiphalungra, hi suihamchigat chigatthang akhavāpali mira.
Kala ana pāngmonli suihamchigatwui vang
Hāngkahai chiwui ngachaili ana yonkahai chiwui vang

“Aaron eina awui naomayarabingli hithāda kasolu, hi rikkatā kachigatwui ainna. Rikkatā kachigat chi hanphut alungthungli ngayā pongda rikthaira, kala hanphutwui meila kazing kathang eina tangda sāthaira.
Kala pāngmonna awui khamanaka sāri eina kongkarao ngavailaga hanphuttungli meina chuitā kahai hotla chi khuilaga rikkatā kachigatwui hanphut ngalemli haira.
Chiwui thili awui sāribing raihailaga khangatei sāri shinkhuida hotla chi rāmrahwui ayar katharpamli khuishokra.
Hanphut chiwui mei chi chuishon chuithai ngasakra, ngathor kachida pāngmonna thing khuisangda rikkatā kachigat chiwui athishurda ningyatchigatwui athao chi hanphuttungli riktāra.
Hanphutungli mei chi chuishon ngasakra, mei chi mamit ngasakpaimara.
“Kala tharāzāt kachigatwui ain hithai. Aaronwui naomayarabingna
Kala akhana tharāzāt kachigatwui manaktak kahai mathir homkha kala chili ngasoda chiwui thao eina frankincense chi khuilaga phaningung khavai yar chi hanphuttungli riktāra, hi
Kala katai chi Aaron kala awui naomayarabingna shaira, hi khawok mazangla kazip khavai kachonshimwui yāngkhupli shaira.
Khamui chili khawok masangpaimana. Iwui rikkatā kachigatwui eina, ina athumwui yar sāda phaishokmi kahaina; hi tharmathengmeikap kaji suihamchigat kala khayonchigat kathar akhana.
Hāngkahai thāda Aaronwui shimkhurli mayarnao kachiva̱na thot kachida,
“Aaronli tharchisinmithang, ali ngasoda anao ngarāna hithāda
Thao sanglaga naikazakzaklaga khuirālu, khāngli nguira kala tharāzat thāda sālaga ningyāngkhaung nganamkaphā
Aaronwui naomayarabingwui eina ali thuishin khavai thao neomi kahaiya china, katang makhavaiwui vang hāngkahai athishurda
Pāngmonwui tharāzāt kachigat kasā thāda tongda riktāra, chi mashaipaimana.”
Aaron kala naomayarabingli hānglu, hi suihamchigatwui ningkhamina. Rikkatā kachigat taithat khavaipamli suihamchigat sākhavai chi
Moreiwui vang pha̱khame pāngmon china chi shaira, kazip khavai kachonshimwui yāngkhup katharapamli shaira.
Asa chili sākaza̱ kachiva̱ kathara ngasāra; kala kashan-kachonli ashee kasirrorhaiakha kachon chi kathara apamli ngasa̱ra.
Asa chi ngaleiham eina hangakha hangkahaiwui thili ham chi sakhaihaora; kha pithrai ham eina hangakha kashut kazaklaga tara̱ eina pheokhuira.
Pāngmon shimkhurwui mayarnao kachiva̱ shaipai, hi tharmathengmeikap kajena.
Kha kazip khavai kachonshimlungwui kathara apamli pheomi khavai suihamchigatwui ashee khuikazang chiwui asā chi mashaipaimana; chi meili riktāphalungra.
Khayonchigat kasāwui ain hina. Hi tharmathengmeikap kajena;
rikkatā kachigat taithat khavaipam chili khayonchigat sākhavai chila taithatra, kala ashee hanphut kuimareida chaira.
Kala chiwui athao katonga chigatra, akhamei thaola, akharili kharom thaola,
amakei khanili kharoma ahānthao kala amathinli khangathānbing ana amakei eina ngarumda khuithuihaora,
wui vang mei eina rikkatā chithāda pāngmonna hanphuttungli riktāra; hi khayonchigat kasāna.
Pāngmon shimkhur mayarnao kachiva̱ shaipai; chi katharapam akhali shaira; hi tharmathengmeikap kajena.
Khayonchigat hila suihamchigat eina ngaraichai; khani hiwui ain akhamaya; pheomi khavai sakhame pāngmon china sā chi khuira.
Kala mi akhawui vang kachikathā rikkatā kachigat sakhame pāngmon china rikkatā kachigat sā chiwui ahui khuira.
Khongpheili nailaga khāng eina khangui tharāzāt kachigat chi chigatkhame pāngmonwuina.
Kala tharāzāt kachigat kachiva̱, thao sanglala, masanglala Aaronwui naomayarabingwuisera, kala chi athum ngaraichāda ngayarra.
Kala hi mi akhana
Kalikha ana ningkashiwui vang chigatakha thao khamanat khawok makazang khamui chigatra, thao heiror kahai khawok makazang khangava khamuiyur kala manaktak kahai mathir manātkazaklaga chigatranu.
Ningkashiwui kachigat awui ningyatchigat kasāli pha̱kahai otli ngasoda khawok kazanga khamui khuirāra.
Hikatha
Kala awui ningkashi khamiwui ningyatchigat pha̱kaphayā chiwui asā chi pha̱thang shaira; ngathorshongwui vang mataipaimana.
Kha awui kachigat chi khangashit kasāwui kachigat, lah lemmet kachigatwui pha̱kaphayaakha, pha̱phayāthang shaira kala katai chi akhama kathāla shaipai.
Kha kapha̱ sā chi kakathumathang taisaakha meili riktāra.
Kala ningyatchigat kapha̱ asā chi kakathumathang shaiakha, chi makhuisangmimara, awui vang khikha kānkhanāla maleimana, makathar ot ngasāhaora, kala chi kashai mi akhalatta khayon phungra.
Makathara otli saza̱ kahai asā chi mashaipaimana, chi mei eina riktāra. Kha katai asābing chiya katharbingmāngna shaipai.
Kha makathar mi akhana
Kala kachikathā akhana makathara ot miwui makathar nilala, makathar sāyur nilala, kala ningkakachaiya makathara ot nilala akhali saza̱laga
