Israelnaobingli hānglu, nathumna seiwui nilala, yaowui nilala kala mewui nilala athao mashaipaimara.
Khalatta kathi sāwui kala khazur sāwui athao chi ot khangateili sāvaipai; kha nathumna chi mashaipaimana.
Mei eina riktāda
Chili lāngda, nathumwui kapampamli sāyur-vāyurwui ashee mazāpaimana.
Ashee kazāpa chili mibingwui eina katathaora.
Kala
“Israelnaobingli hānglu,
Mei eina riktāda kachigat,
Athao chi pāngmonna hanphuttungli riktāra, kha asuk chi Aaron kala awui naomayarabingwui sāra.
Kala nana nawui ningyatchigat kapha̱wui yashongwui akhaishāng pāngmonli mira.
Aaronwui naomayarabingwui ngachaili ningyatshar kachigatwui ashee kala athao pha̱kaphayāpa china awui yar yāshongwui khaishāng samphangra.

Ningyat chigatwui asuk khayit kahai chi kala khaishāng chigat kahai chi Israelnaowui eina ina khuikahaina, kala pāngmon Aaron kala awui naomayarabingli mikahaina, hi Israelnaobingna michingphalungki kaji mikhangayi yarna.
Rikkatā
Hi israelnaobingna mikhangayina, athumli tharchisinmithang
Hi rikkatā kachigat, tharāzāt kachigat, suihamchigat, khayonchigat, tharkachigatwui kala ningyatchigatwui ningkhamina.
Israelnaobingna Sinai lamhāngli pha̱phayā khavai, Sinai Kaphungli
“Aaron eina anaomayarabingli hokhuilu; kala sāribingla, neokhavai thaola, kala suihamchigatwui vang mukkā akhala, kala yaovā khani eina khawok makazanga khamuiwui luk chila khuilu.
Kala kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili yarui ashangva̱ katonga kazipkhuilu.”
Chieina
Kala Mosesna yarui ashangva̱li “
Kala Mosesna Aaronshi vānaongarāli khuirāda athumli tara̱ eina ra̱vaimi.
Kala Mosesna Aaronli phahon ngavaimida shanneira̱la neimi, kala katuma phahon chila sangmida ephod ngavaimi, kala themlāk eina phorrei phorkasang ephod khara̱ chieina khalapshānmi.
Kala ana thikhom sangmi, kala thikhomli Urim eina Thummim hokthāngmi.
Kala
Kala neomi khavai thao chi Mosesna khuilaga tabernacle chili neomi kala khalalei saikora chili tharchigata.
Kala ana thao chi hanphuttungli shini shida kasirrorda hanphut eina chiwui khorkhong saikora kala khongsaila, kala chiwui apheilila tharchigat khavai thao neomi.
Kala thao chi ana Aaronwui kuitungli heirorda neomilaga ali tharchigata.
Kala
Chiwui thili ana suihamchigatwui mukkā chi khuirāda suihamchigat sākhavai mukkā chiwui kuitungli Aaron kala awui naomayarabingna pāng para.

Kala chi Mosesna taithatlaga ashee chi khuida hanphutwui angachibingli pāngmareng eina kuimareida neoda hanphut chi tharmatheng ngasaka, kala ashee chi hanphutpheili heirora, kala hiwui vang tharchigatta neomiya.
Kala Mosesna akhari athao saikora, amathinli khangathān saikora, kala amakei khani eina chiwui athao chi khuilaga hanphuttungli ana riktai.
Kha mukkā chiwui ahui, asā, kala chiwui pai chi
Chiwui thili ana rikkatā kachigatwui yaovā chi khuirāda chiwui kuitungli Aaron kala awui naomayarabingwui pāng para.
Kala Mosesna taithatlaga hanphutungli kuimareida ashee heirora.
Kala asā chi amarimrim sāda Mosesna akui eina amarimbing kala athao chi riktai.
Kala
Chiwui thili ana yao khangatei akha, tharkachisinwui yaovā chi khuirai, Aaron kala awui naomayarabingna yao chiwui kuitungli pāng para.
Kala Mosesna taithatlaga ashee ngayarda khuida Aaronwui yāshongwui khanātonli, yapāngwui pangva̱li, kala yāpheiwui pheiva̱li ashee chukmi.
Kala Aaronwui naomayarabingli khuirāda athumwui yāshongwui khanātonli, yapāngwui pangva̱li, kala yāpheiwui pheiva̱li Mosesna ashee chukmisera; kala ashee chi khuida hanphutpam kuimareida heirora.
Chiwui thili ana athao kala akhameiwui athao, kala akharibingwui thao, amathinli khangathān thao, kala amakei khani eina chiwui athao, kala yāshongwui akhaishāng chi khui.
wui mangāli khalei khawok makazanga lukwui khamui akha kala thao kazanga khamui akha, kala khamanaka khangavā khamuihāng akha da ana khuilaga athao eina yāshongwui akhaishāng tungli parhai;
kala ana saikora chi Aaronshi vānao ngarāwui pāngli sangmida
Chiwui thili Mosesna athumwui pang eina khuilaga tharkachisinwui rikkatā kachigatli riktārumhaowa; hi ningyāngkhaunga nganamkaphāna, kala mei eina rikkatā
Kala Mosesna asuk chi khuilaga

Kala neomi khavai thao eina hanphutungli khalei ashee chi Mosesna khuilaga, Aaronlila awui sārilila, kala awui naomayarabinglila, athumwui sārilila kasirrorsera; chithāda Aaronlila, awui sārila, kala anaomayarabingla, athumwui sārila ana tharchigatmi.

Kala Mosesna Aaron kala awui naomayarabingli hānga, “Asā chi kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili hangshailu, kala ina kaso kahai thāda tharkachisinwui lukli kazang khamui chieina ngasoda shailu; kaja kaso kahai thāda, ‘Aaron kala awui naomayarabingna shaiki kajina;’
kala sā eina khamui katai chi nathumna mei eina riktāki kajina.
Kala shinithangwui alungli nathumna kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmong makanshokpaimara, nathum tharkachisinwui zimiksho chi makupranglakha eina tangda; kaja nathumwui tharkachisin shinithang zangra.
Aja kasā thāda, nathumwui vang pheomi khavai,
Chiwui vang eina nathumna ngashun ngayā shinithang kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli pamda, nathumna mathi khavai,
Kala
Kachishatathang Mosesna Aaron kala awui naomayarabingli kala Israelwui ararbingli hokhui;
kala ana Aaronli hānga, “Suihamchigatwui vang achuk kapei mukkā akha kala rikkatā kachigatwui yaovā akha da khuilaga
Kala Israelnaobingli hithāda hānglu, nathumna suihamchigatwui achuk kapei mevā akha kala rikkatā kachigatwui achuk kapei kumkhawui seinao akha, yaonao akha da khuilu,
kala ningyatchigatwui vang mukkā akha, yaovā akha
Kala athumna Mosesna kakaso athishurda kazip khavai kachonshim mangāli khuirai, kala yarui rānganaida
Kala Mosesna hānga, “Nathumna sāphalungki kaji
Chieina Mosesna Aaronli hānga, “Hanphutli rānganaida nawui suihamchigat kala rikkatā kachigat pha̱phayālu, na kala nawui mibingwui vang pheomi khavai sālu, kala
Chithāda Aaronna hanphutli vanganailaga akhalattawui suihamchigatwui vang seinao chi taithata.
Kala Aaronwui naomayarabingna ashee chi ali khuirāmi, chieina ana pāngmareng eina chumkhuilaga hanphutwui angachibing chili neoda ashee chi hanphutpheili heirora.
Kha
Kala asā eina ahui chi rāmrahwui ayarli mei eina riktāhaowa.
Kala rikkatā kachigatwui sā chi ana taithata, kala Aaron kala awui naomayarabingna ashee chi ali khuirāmida ana hanphut kuimareida heirora.
Kala rikkatā kachigat chi amarimrim eina sālaga, akui eina ngasoda athumna Aaronli khuirāmi, chieina ana chi hanphutli riktai.
Kala akhari-akharā eina apheibing chi pheohailaga rikkatā kachigat eina ngasoda hanphutli riktai.
Chieina mibingwui kachigat chi ana khuirai, kala mibingwui suihamchigatwui me chi ana khuilaga taithata, kala kharewui suihamchigat kachigat thāda chigathaowa.
Chiwui thili rikkatā kachigat chi khangachā athishurda ana chigata.
Kala ana tharāzāt kachigat chi homkha khuilaga ngathorshong rikkatā kachigat chili lāngda riktai.
Kala mukkā eina yaovā chiwui athao, akhameiwui athao, akharibingli khaluikaphina athao chila, amakeibing kala amathinli khangathān athao chila,
kala athumna athao chi asuktungli parda, athao chi hanphutli riktai,
Mosesna kakaso thāda asuk eina yāshongwui akhaishāng chi Aaronna
Kala Moses eina Aaronna kazip khavai kachonshimlungli zanglaga hankashok tharan mibingli somi, kala
Kala
Chiwui thili Aaronwui naomayara Nadab eina Abihuna meishārkhong akharip mei machonlaga nganamkaphā thao heisangda
Kala
Chieina Mosesna Aaronli hānga, “
Mosesna Aaronwui avāgato Uzzielwui naomayara Misha-el eina Elzaphanli hokhuida hānga, “Rāmeilu, kathara rāmrah pamwui eina nachinā khanili ayarshong khuishokhaolu.”
Mosesna kahāng athishurda anina zangda achinā khanili kachichāwui kachon ngavaimida rāmrahwui ayarli khuishokhaowa.
Kala Mosesna Aaron eina anaomayara khani Eleazar eina Ithamarli hānga, “Nathumwui kuisam makhalaalu; kachonla maserkhakalu, nathum thihaipaishina, mibingwuitungli malungkhavāt rāpaishina, kha
Nathum kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmong makānshokalu, nathum thipaishina, kaja
Kala
“Nathumna kazip khavai kachonshimli khavā tharan; naranu, nanaomayararanu, drakhāra̱ lah zamshei mamangalu, thipaishina; nawui naothot peichaoda hi makashimāna shiyan-chikanna.
Nathumna Varewui kathar eina mikumowui makathar kala kathar eina khamakhaowui khangatei theiphalungra.
Kala
Nathumna hi katharapamli shaiki kajina, kaja hi na kala nanaomayara ngarāwui yarna, mei eina riktāda

Kha pha̱phayāda chigat kahai asuk eina akhaishāng chiya katharpam akhali shaipai, nala nanaomayarala, kala sha̱naola shaipai; kaja Israelnaobingwui ningyatchigatwui eina hi nawui vang nanaomayara ngarāwui vang yar sakahaina.
Chigat kahai aphei kala khayitchigat kahai asuk chi athumna riktāda kachigat athao chieina ngasoda
Kala suihamchigat mewui pongli Mosesna ningsangda khangathing eina, yanglu, chi chuihairasai! Chieina ana Aaronwui katai naomayara khani Eleazar eina Ithamarli malungvātta hithāda hānga,
“Nathumna khisāda suihamchigat sā chi katharapamli mashaimakhala, tharmathengmeikap kaji ot hi nathumli mikahaina kaja yarui ashangva̱wui morei phungmida
Yanglu, nathumna chiwui ashee chi katharapamli makhuizangmana kala ina kahāng thāda nathumna katharapamli shaihaoki kajina.”
Chieina Aaronna Mosesli hānga, “Yanglu, aja athumna
Kala Mosesna chi shālaga, mashungada khui.
Israelnaobingli hānglu, ngaleili khaleiya sāyurbingwui ngachaili nathumna shaiki kajibing chi hina.
Sāyurbingwui ngachaili asho ngapākta khaluikazā sāyurbing chi shaipaira.
Kha sheilaga khaluizālala, asho ngapāklala mashaiki kaji sāyurbing chiya: ut, kaja khaluizālala asho makhangapāk sā chi nathumwui vang matharmana.
Kala lungkaihok hi khaluizālala asho mangapakmada nathumwui vang matharmana.
Kala theba, thebana khaluizālala asho mangapakmada nathumwui vang matharmana.
Kala hok hi asho ngapāklala sheilaga makhaluizāmada nathumwui vang matharmana.
Chibingwui asā nathumna mashaipaimana, kala athumwui kathi angunlila masāza̱paimana, athum hi nathumwui vang matharmana.
Tara̱lungli khalei saikora nathumna shaipai. Tara̱lungli khalei kachiva̱; ngayilungli, lah konglungli khalei khai angachāng eina ahor kakābing chi shaipai.
Kha angachāng eina ahor makakā ngayilungli lah konglungli khalei saikora, kala tara̱lungli kharinga yur chi nathumwui vang ningkakachai otna.
Chibing chi nathumwui vang kala athumwui kathingun chi ningkakachai ngasāra.
Tara̱lungli khaleiya angachāngla, ahorla makakā chi nathumwui vang ningkakachai ngasāra.
Vānaowui ngachaili nathumwui ningkachaikapai, nathumna mashaiphalungki kajibing chiya: khalāng, khalāng sāsha, osprey,
khalāng sāsha, langpop
ngahong hangkhāyur kachiva̱,
ostrich, pawung ngayāza, shamadruva, langtikyur
pawung, khaishumva, ibis,
rahar, utvana, sāsha,
varok, varokyur, kazeithora kala vāchap hibingna.
“Angachāng kālaga aphei mati eina kazata, sāyur saikora nathumwui vang matharmana.
Kha angachāng kakā aphei mati eina ngaleili ngawokta yongkazatawui ngachaili nathumna shaikapai lei.
Chibingwui eina nathumna shaikapaibing chiya: Khaohyur, haoriphilāvayur, chikrinyur kala khaohsomyur hi shaipaira.
Kha khangatei saikora aphei mati kakā angachāng eina khayonga saikora chi nathumwui vang matharmana.
“Kala hibingna nathumli mathar ngasakmana; kachikathā akhana kathingunli saza̱akha ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala kachikathāna kathingun khuiphungsākha awui kashankachon ngasa̱haiki kajina, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Sāyur kachiva̱ asho kālala makapāka kala sheilaga makhaluikazā sā chi nathumwui vang makatharana; chili sākaza̱ kachiva̱ chi matharmara.
Kala aphei mati kakā sāyurbing saikorawui ngachaili pheipāng amayā eina kazata chi nathumwui vang matharmana, athumwui kathingun sakaza̱pa chi ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala kathingun kaphungapa chi awui kashankachon chi ngasa̱phalungra kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra; chibing nathumwui vang matharmana.
“Ngaleili ngawokazata sāyurbingwui ngachaili nathumwui vang, khalei, shiwok, kahaka lengvāyur,
shimkanla, tarkhong, lengvāyur, situi lengvā kala chira̱ng chi makatharana.
Ngaleili ngawokazat saikorawui ngachaili nathumwui vang hibing hi matharmana, thihaisāda sakaza̱pa chi matharmana, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.

Kala ot akhawuitungli hibingwui thikahaiya asā akhana tātungrorakha ot chi matharmana; thingwui otranu, kashankachonranu, ahuiranu, chonsakhaoranu, kala khongphei khongphāngranu apong ngatateida shikachin ot chi tara̱ eina pheophalungra kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra, chiwui thili tharhaora.
Kala ngaleihamli tārorakha, hamlungli zangkasā saikora matharmara, ham chi shaokhaiphalungra.
Hikatha tara̱na sakaza̱, zākhavai kashakazā saikora chi matharmara kala hikathā ham eina mangki kaji tara̱ saikora chi matharmara.
Kala kathingunwui akai tākharor ot kachiva̱ chi matharki kajina, chiya meiphungranu, meikhongranu saikora chi sakhaiserphalungra; kaja athum chi makatharna, kala nathumwui vang matharmana,
chithālala, ura̱wok eina pukhari chiya thara, kha kathingun sakaza̱bing chi matharki kajina.
Kala amachi atha akhawuitungli kathingunwui akainao akha tārorlala chiya thara.
Kha atha chili tara̱ sanghailaga kathingunwui akai tazangakha hi nathumwui vang makatharna.
“Kala nathumna shaikapai sāyur akha thihaida kathingunli sakaza̱pa chi ngazin eina tangda ngarangki kajina,
kala kathisā kashaipa chi awui kashankachon ngasa̱ki kajina, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra, kala kathingun kaphunga a chila kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
“Ngaleili ngamenkazat kachiva̱ chi ningkakachai otna, chi mashaipaimana.
Awuk eina ngamenkazata, aphei mati eina kazata, lah ngaleili ngawokazatbing lah aphei tarakha kakābing saikora chi nathumna mashaipaimana, kaja athum hi ningkakachai otna.
Asum eina kazatbing eina nathum khalatta masāmakhao ngasaklu; nathum khalatta chieina masākhamāng ngasakmara, nathum makhaopaishina,
kaja I
Kaja nathumwui Vare ngasa khavai Egypt ngalei eina khuishokkhame
Kathar eina makathar kala shaikapai eina mashaikapai manglākapaibingwui ngachaili khangatei theikhavaina.
“Israelnaobingli hānglu, sha̱naona nao vaida, mayarnao pharaakha a shinithang matharmara; kashankharā atamwui thada ava̱ chi makatharna.
Kala kachishatathang naowui ahui rimshokmira.

Chiwui thili ana ashee tharkhangasak thumrāda kathumthang zangra, kala kathara ot akhala masāza̱paimana, katharapamli khavāla mavāpaimana, awui tharkhangasakwui zimiksho chi maungshung ranglakha eina tangda ngarangra.
“Kha ana sha̱nao pharaakha, kashankharā atamwui thāda a hapta khani matharmara; kala ashee tharkhangasakwui zimiksho hangtharuk da tharukthang zangra.

“Mayarnao nilala, sha̱nao nilala awui tharkhangasak zimiksho chi peikahai tharan rikkatā kachigatwui vang kumkhawui yaonao akha, kala suihamchigatwui vang khana̱naolala, nasha̱naolala kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli pāngmonwuili khuirāra.
Pāngmon china
Kachikathā mi akhawui phasāli khawor kathā, lah khavāt, lah chukkhara̱da awui phasāwui ahuili phārreiwui yur sathuihaiakha, Aaronwuili nilala, anaomayara pāngmonbingwuili nilala khuirālu,

kala athumna ahui kazāt chi munlak eina yangra; kala kakazāpam chiwui ahā charhairasa, kala khangachāwui ahuili thukmeihairasaakha chi phārreina; pāngmonna yangkahaiwui thili a makatharana da chishāthaora.
Kha awui phasāwui ahuili kakā apam chi charlala ahuili thukmeida matheisākha kala chiwui ahā chi macharakha, kazāt khaleipa chili pāngmonna shinithang shungnarhaora;
kala kashinethang pāngmonna yangra; kala kazāt chi awui mikyanli chichingakha, kala ahuili mamanvāsakha shinithang shungnarluira.

Kala kashinethang pāngmonna yangluishitra, kala kazāt chi thengsanghaisakha, kala ahuili mamanvāsakha, pāngmon china katharna da chishātra; hiya ahui khavātmānga, ana awui kashankachon ngasa̱da tharhaora.
Kha pāngmonna yangkahaiwui thili, ahui khavāt chi manvāhaisakha pāngmonli achitheiluishitra;
kala ana yanglaga khavāt chi ahuili manvaakha pāngmonna matharmana da chishātra; chi phārreina.
Mi akhali phārrei kazāhaiakha, ali pāngmonwui mangāli khuivāra;
kala pāngmonna ali yangra, yanglaga ahuili khawor chi charakha, kala ahā chi charhaiakha, kala khawor chi sānui shonakha,
chiya phārrei khangaphārna, kala pāngmona ali matharmana da chishātra; kala ali manarmara, kaja a matharmana.
Kala pāngmonna yanglaga phārrei phasā tumda akui eina thuilaga aphei eina tangda kazāsaakha, pāngmonna yangfara,
pāngmonna munlak eina yanglaga asā tumda charsaakha kakazāpa chi thara da chishātra; kaja charserhaiakha tharkahaina.
Kha sānui shonakha a hi matharmana.
Kala pāngmonna sānui kashon chi yanglaga, matharmana da chishātra; kaja sānui kashinon hi matharmana, chi phārreina.
Kha sānui kashinon chi char-ungluishitakha, ana pāngmonli achitheira,
kala pāngmonna munlak eina yanglaga kazāt chi thenghaida charungakha thara da chishātra; a thara.
Kachikathā akhawui phasāli moksā shoklaga raihailaga,
apam chili charda worshokakha, lah hung-charda shokakha pāngmonli achitheira.
Kala pāngmonna munlak eina yanglaga ahuili thukmeida kazaakha kala ahā charakha, moksāpamli phārrei kashokna, chieina mi chi matharmana da chishātra.
Kha munlak eina yanglaga ahā macharakha kala ahuili thukta makazāmada thenghaiakha shinithang shungnarhaora;
kha china ahuili manvāhaiakha, kazātkashina, chieina matharmana da chishātra.
Kha kakazā chi leilala mamaivaakha chiya moksāwui khangakhaina, chieina pāngmonna thara da chishātra.
Lha meina phasā chuida ahuipamli charda, lah hungda sāsan shokakha,
pāngmon china munlak eina yanglaga ahā char kala ahuili thukta kazāsaakha chi phārreina; meikachui khangakhaili phārrei kashokna; chieina pāngmon china matharmana da chishātra.
Kha munlak eina yanglaga ahāla machar, ahuilila thukmeida makazāmada thenghaiakha, shinithang shungnarhaora,
kala kashinethang pāngmonna yangluilaga ahui kateili manvāhaiakha pāngmonna matharmana da chishātra, kaja hi phārrei kazātna.
Kha ahui kateili mamaivāla thenghaida kakazā matheiakha mei kachui china khaworna, chieina thara da chishātra; kaja chi mei kachuiwui khangakhaimaya.
Sha̱nao nilala, mayarnao nilala akuili, lah morhāli kakazā leiakha,
pāngmonna kazāt chi munlak eina yangra, kala ahuili thukmeida kazā kala ahā manipta hung-zikhaiakha matharmana da chishātra; kaja chi kuiwui, lah morhāwui phārrei khamuiya yur akhana.
Khamuiya kazāt chi pāngmonna munlak eina yanglaga ahuili mathukmeiakha kala ahā kazik maphorsaakha kakazāpa chili shinithang shungnarhaora,
kala kashinethang pāngmonna munlak eina yangluilaga khamui chi mamanvaakha, mahungchar kala khamuia chi ahuili mathukmeiakha,
khamuipam chi maningla ahā simiserhaora, kala khamui khaleipa chili shinithang shungnarluira.
Kashinethang pāngmonna munda yanglaga khamui chi mamansangakha, kala ahuili mathukmeiakha, pāngmonna thara da chishātra; kala awui kachon ngasa̱ ngasakta tharra.
Kha tharkahaiwui thili khamui chi maisanghaiakha kala ahuili thukmeihaiakha,
pāngmonna ali yangluira, kala kalikhada ahuili maisangakha, ahā kahung makahung mayangluila a makatharna da chishātra.
Kha awui mikyanli khamui chi thenghaida ahā kazik phorakha, chi raikahaina, tharkahaina, chieina pāngmonna thara da chishātra.
Sha̱nao, lah mayarnaowui phasāli kachar chukkhara̱da leiakha,
pāngmonna munlak eina yangra, kala phasāwui ahuili chukkhara̱ chi morthuthaiakha chi phārtheng kakazāna; a thara.
Mi akhawui kuisam pa̱haiakha, kui ngakoklala thara.
Mi akhawui sam khaveiwui eina nilala, najeewui eina nilala pa̱haida ngakokhailala thara.
Kha khaveili nilala, kuili nilala khangakok pamli hungrisi charisida kakazāchon leiakha chi akuili kala khaveili phārrei kashokna.
Pāngmonna munlak eina yanglaga khavei kahingli nilala, kuikhangakokli nilala hungrisi charrisida kakazā chi ahuili phārrei kakazā thāda worshoksakha,
a phārrei kakazā mina, awui akuili kakazāna, pāngmonna a matharmana da chishātmiphalungra.
Phārrei kakazā mina chonshi kakāk ngavaira, kala awui kuisam masekmara, morchai ato eina tangda kuirunra kala “MakathSar, makathar!” da vaora.
Kazāt chi leilakha eina tangda mipa chi matharchingmana, a hi makatharana; kala rāmrah kanshokta amāng vasomra.
Phārrei kazāt kakā sāri leiakha, sahā lah tāwon sāri nilala,
lah kachikathā tāwon lah sahā kachon, maningakha sāhui, lah sāhui eina sākakhuiwui ot akai akhali,
kazāt chi matekrisi, lah hungrisi da theiakha, chi phārrei kazātna kala chi pāngmonli chitheiphalungra.
Pāngmonna kazāt chi munlak eina yangra kala kazāt kakā ot chi shinithang shungnarhaora,
kala ana kashinethang yangluira. Kalikhada kazāt chi zairanranu, zaiparranu, sāhui eina kasā otranu, kazāt chi maisangakha, makaphā kazātna, makatharana.
Sahā kachon nilala, tāwon kachon nilala, sāhuiranu, sāhui eina sākakhui otranu, riktāhaora, chi manpailak kahaiya phārreina, meili riktāphalungra.
Kha Pāngmonna munlak eina yanglaga, chonsā chili kala sāhui eina sākakhui kachon chili mamaisangakha,
kazāt kakā kachon chi ngasa̱ khavai pāngmonna kasora, kala shinithang shungnarhaira.

Kala kazāt kakā ot chi ngasa̱ kahaiwui thili pāngmonna munlak eina yangluira, kazāt chi mamaisanglala, kazāt chi mangacheiakha, chi matharmana; phārrei kazāt chi khanukliranu, mangāliranu, nathumna meili riktāhalungra.
Kha pāngmonna yangluishitlaga, ngasa̱ kahai thili shimān mamanhaiakha, kachon nilala, sāhui nilala kazātpam chi serkhuihaora,
kala kazāt chi zairanlala, zaipharlala kachon chili hanluida rāshokakha, chi mansangdalei; kazāt kakazāpam chi riktāhaora.
Kha zairan nilala, zaiphar nilala, kachonla, sāhui eina sākakhuila, ngasa̱ kahaiwui thili kazāt chi shimānhaiakha, kakhane sāda ngasa̱luishitra, kala tharhaora.
Hithāda sāda, sāha kachonranu, tāwon kachonranu, zairanlila, zaipharlila, sāhui eina kasā otlila kathar makathar theikhui khavai hi phārrei kakazāli ngarang khavai ainna.
“Phārrei kakazā ali tharngasakthang, ain chi hithāda sāki kajina. Ali pāngmonli khuivāra;
kala pāngmonna rāmrah ayarli shokta munlak eina yangra. Chiwui thili phārrei kakazā chi raihairasaakha,
tharki kajipa chiwui vang kathara vānao khani; cedarthing akha, hungshi kahai kazaira̱ kala maharnā khuirā khavai pāngmonna kasora;
kala vānao akha ngaleihamli sanglaga longkazat tara̱tungli sāthat ngasakra.
Kala kharing vānaoli ngasoda, cedarthing, hungshi kahai kazaira̱ kala maharnā chi, longkazat tara̱tungli sāthat kahai vānao chiwui asheeli chumkhuira;
kala ana tharki kajipawuitungli shini shida kasirrorda tharhaira da chishātra, kala kharinga vānao chi khamashā apamli chihohaora.
Kala tharkahai mipa china awui kachon ngasa̱ra, awui sam sitāra kala ra̱vaira, chieina a tharhaora. Chiwui thili ana rāmrahlungli ungpamra, kha awui kachonshim ayārli shinithang pamra.
Kala kashinethang kui sihaida morhāla, mikphunghāla, kala ahā saikorala sitāra. Chiwui thili kashankachon ngasa̱da ra̱vailaga tharhaora.
“Kachishatathang achuk kapei yaovā khani kala kumkhawui achuk kapei yaolā akha kala tharāzātchigatwui vang manaktak kahai mathir khuiluiwui sharuk tharawui kathum thao eina manātta chi ana khuirāra.
Kala tharkhame pāngmon china mipa chilila otbingla kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli
Kala pāngmonna yaovā akha khuida thaokhong chieina ngasoda khayonchigat chigatra, khayitta
suihamchigat kala rikkatā kachigatwui vang sāthat khavai katharapam chili yao chi ana taithatra; kaja suihamchigat thāda khayonchigatla pāngmonwuina, hi tharmathengmeikap kaje otna.
Khayonchigatwui ashee ngayarda khuilaga tharki kajipawui yāshongwui khanātonli neomira, yāshongwui pāngva̱, kala yāshongwui pheiva̱lila neomira.
Chiwui thili pāngmonna thaokhong chiwui eina thao ngayarda khuida uishongwui pāngmayāli heisangra,
kala yāpāng eina uishongwui thao chumkhuida
Thao kala yaoshi apāngli katai chi pāngmon china tharki kajipawui khanāton yāshong kateokha neomira, yāpāngva̱, kala yāshongwui pheiva̱lila neomira;
kala pāngmonwui pāngli katai thao saikora chi tharki kajipawui kuili neomira. Chithāda sāda
“Pāngmon china suihamchigat chigatmira, awui makathar chiwui eina tharhaoki kajipali pheomida ali tharmira. Kala chiwui thili ana rikkatā kachigat sā taithatra.
Kala pāngmon china rikkatā kachigat eina tharāzāt kachigat chi hanphuttungli chigatmira. Chithāda awui vang pāngmon china pheomira, kala a tharhaora.

“Kha a chāmhaida chiyākha mashokrarakha, ana khayonchigat sākhavai, awui vang pheomi khavai yaovā akha, kala tharāzat kachigatwui vang khamanaka mathir khuiluiwui sharuk tharāwui kathum thao manātta thaokhong akhala khuirāra;
kala kha̱na̱nao khani, lah nasha̱nao khani awui mikashap chi khuirāra; akhava suihamchigatwui vang, khangatei akhapāna rikkatā kachigatwui vang khuirāra.
Kala kachishatathang awui tharkhavai
kala pāngmonna khayonchigatwui yaovā chieina thaokhong chi khuida
Kala pāngmonna khayonchigat sā taithatlaga ashee ngayarda tharki kajipawui yāshongwui khanātonli, yāpangva̱li, kala yashongwui pheiva̱li neomira.
Kala pāngmon china thao chi ngayarda awui uishongwui pāngmayāli heisangda,
kala yāpāngmareng eina uishongli khalei thao chi khuilaga
kala pāngmonna awui yāpangli khalei thao chi tharki kajipawui yāshong khanātonli, yāshongwui pangva̱li, yashongwui pheiva̱lila khayonchigat ashee neokhavai pam chili neomira.
Kala
Kala ana khuirākashap kha̱na̱nao nilala nāsha̱nao nilala chi ana chigatra,
akhana suihamchigatwui vang, khangatei akhapāna rikkatā kachigatwui vang, tharāzāt kachigat eina ngasoda chigatra; chithāda
Phārrei kazāt khalei mi, tharmi khavai kachigat makhuirākathuka awui vang hi ningkhamina.”
“Ina nathumli mikahai Canaan ngaleili khavā chitharan, nathumna kapapam chiwui shimli ina phārrei kazā ngasakakha,
shimva̱ china rāda pāngmonli, ‘Ishi shimli kachikathā kazāt akha khalei thāli’ da rāhāngphalungra.
Chieina pāngmon china mavāyangranglakha shim chi masai khavai hāngra, chi maningakha shimlungli khalei saikora makatharana jihaora; chiwui thili pāngmonna chi yangkhavai vāra.
Kala kazāt chi ana munlak eina vāyanglaga phākholi matekrisi, lah hungrisi da amaili thukmeida theiakha,
pāngmon china shim khāmongwui eina ayar shokta shinithang khāmong shunghaora.
Kala kashinethang pāngmon china vāyangluishitlaga; kazāt chi phākholi manvāhairasaakha,
kazāt kakā ngalungbing chi khuishoklaga keinungwui ayar makatharpam akhali ahorhaolu da pāngmon china kasora.
Kala shimlung kuimareida waitei kahai chi seokhuilaga keinungwui ayār makatharpam akhali vahor ngasakra.
Chiwui thili athumna ngalung khangatei akhuida khuishok kahai ngalung chiwui mahut shinsangra, kala wai kadhar teiluishitra.
“Kha ngalungla khuishokhai; kaseola seoda wai teilui kahaiwui thili kazāluishitakha,
pāngmon china ayangluira, kala kalikhada kazāt chi shim chili manmaronhairasaakha, shim chili kalā shikapaiya phārrei leihaira; chi makatharna.
Kala ana shim chi pheilaga ngalungla thingla kala shim chiwui wai teikahaibingla katonga shaokhaitāda keinungwui ayar makatharpam akhali ahorhaora.
Chili lāngda shim shunghaida khalei chili akazanga mi chi ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala shim chili kapi mi, kala shim chili phakazā mi chi kachon ngasa̱serphalungra.
“Kha pāngmon china rāda munlak eina rāyanglaga wai teikahai shim chili mankhamaron maleisaakha shim chi thara da chishātra, kaja kazāt chi raihaira.
Kala shim tharkhamiwui vang ana kateoa vānao khani khuira, chili ngarumda cedarthing akha, hungshi kahai kazaira̱ kala maharnā khuirāra,
kala vānao akha ngaleihamli sanglaga longkazat tara̱tungli sāthatra,
kala cedarthing, maharnā kala hungshi kahai kazaira̱ chieina ngasoda kharinga vānao akha, kala longkazat tara̱tungli sāthat kahai vānao chiwui asheeli rurkhuida shim chili shini shida yikra.
Chithāda sāda vānaowui ashee, longkazat tara̱, kharinga vānao, cedarthing, maharnā kala hungshi kahai kazaira̱ chieina shim chi tharngasakra.
Kala kharinga vānao chi keinungwui ayar khamashā apamli chihohaora; chithāda ana shim chi pheomida tharra.”
Hi phārrei kazāt ayurbingwui ainna, ahui khamuiwui vang,
kachonli nilala shimli nilala, phārrei kakazāwui;
kala khawor nilala, khavāt nilala, lah kachuk nilala,
kathakha tharra, kala kathakha matharmara kaji chithei khavaina. Hi phārreiwui ainna.
“Israelnaobingli hānglu, kachikathā mi akhana phasāli zaizai khangaya̱ leiakha, awui khangaya̱ chi matharmana.
Kala hi awui zaizai khangaya̱wui makatharwui ainna: ngaya̱lala, thenghailala hi awuili makatharna.
Zaizai khangaya̱ mi china pikazanga pet kachiva̱ matharmana; kala ana pamkaza̱ kachiva̱ matharmana.
Kala awui petli sakaza̱ mi china kashankachon ngasa̱haida ra̱khavaila ra̱vaira, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala zaizai khangaya̱ mina pamkahai kachiva̱ chili kapama mibing china awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala tara̱ eina ra̱vaira, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala khangaya̱pali sākaza̱ mi china kachon ngasa̱haida ra̱vaira kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala zaizai khangaya̱pa china kathara mili mashororhaiakha awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra kala tara̱ eina ra̱vaira, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala zaizai khangaya̱pana katonga sāpān chi matharmara.

Kala awui azingli khalei ot kachiva̱li sakaza̱ mipa chi ngazin eina tangda ngarangra, kala chikathā ot phungkazat mi chi awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala tara̱ eina ra̱vaira, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Zaizai khangaya̱ mina pāng mamazikla khangatei akhali saza̱akha chipana awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra, tara̱ eina ra̱vaira, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala zaizai khangaya̱ mina ngaleihamli saza̱haiakha chi sakhaihaora; kala thingkhongbingla tara̱li pheora.
“Kala kalikha zaizai khangaya̱ a chi phāhaiakha tharkhavai akhalatta shinithang tharkhavai ngaraira, kala awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala ana aphasā longkazata tara̱li ra̱vaira, chieina tharhaora.
Kala kachishatathang ana kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli
Chieina pāngmon china suihamchigatwui vang kha̱na̱ akha, kala khangatei akhana rikkatā kachigatwui vang da chigatmira; kala
“Kala mi akhana pha̱ra̱ unghaiakha phasā katonga ra̱vaira kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala sāri nilala, ahui nilala pha̱ra̱ tāror kahai saikora chi ngasa̱da ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Mayarnao akhana sha̱naoli ngasopilaga pha̱ra̱ unghaiakha ani ra̱vai thathuira kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
“Sha̱naona shānrāt zatakha awui phasā shinithang matharmara, kala ali sākaza̱ mi chi ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kala phasā makathar atamli ana pikahai kachiva̱ matharmara; ana pamkahaibing chila matharmara.
Kala awui petli sākaza̱ mi chi awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala tara̱li ra̱vaida ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
kala sha̱nao china pamkahai kachiva̱li sākaza̱ mi chi awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala tara̱ eina ra̱vaida ngazin eina tangda ngarangra;
petliranu, khikhaliranu, sha̱nao china pamkahaibingli sakaza̱ saikora makhao kahaiwui vang ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kachikathā mi akhana sha̱nao chili ngasopida ngalāva̱wui khamakhao chi kāhaiakha, a shinithang matharmara, kala ana pikahai pet kachiva̱ matharmara.
“Sha̱nao akhana awui shānrāt atam maningla sāngda ashee ngaya̱haiakha, lah khangachawuili lāngda ngaya̱haiakha, sha̱nrāt atamli makathar thāda matharchingmara, a matharmara.
Ngaya̱da leilakha eina tangda ana pikhavai pet chi awui shānrāt atamwui makathar thāchingra; kala ana kapapam kachiva̱, awui shānrāt atam chithāda matharmara.
Kala otbing chili sakaza̱ mi kachiva̱ matharmara, kala awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala ra̱vaida ngazin eina tangda ngarangra.
Kha awui khangaya̱ chi phāhaiakha, akhalattana shinithang chāklaga chiwui thili tharhaora.
Kala kachishatathang kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili kha̱na̱ khani maningakha nāsha̱nao khani, pāngmonli khuirāmira.
Chieina pāngmon china akha suihamchigatwui vang, khangatei akhapāna rikkatā kachigatwui vang pha̱mida awui makathar khangaya̱ chi
“Chithāda sāda nathumna makatharwui eina Israelnaobing ngateida haira, chi maningakha athumwui makathar china athumwui ngachaili khalei iwui tabernacle chi makhao ngasakta athum thihaipaishina.”
Ain hi zaizai khangaya̱ kala pha̱ra̱ khaunga makhao kahai mibingwui vangna;
kala shānrāt atamli makathar sha̱nao awui vangla, chiya, sha̱naoranu, mayarnaoranu khangaya̱ mila kala makathara sha̱naoli ngasokape chibingwui vangna.
Aaronwui naomayara khanina,

“Nachinā Aaronli hānglu, kathara apam mairārlungli kānzangda, ningkhami okowui atungli khalei lukhamashan pamkhong chiwui mangāli marānganaiching ngasaklu, a thipaishina; kaja ina muiyālungli lukhamashan pamkhong chiwuitungli rāra.
Kha Aaronna katharapamli, suihamchigatwui vang mukkānao akha kala rikkatā kachigatwui vang yaovā akha eina ngasoda zangki kajina.”
Ana awui phasāli kathara khamanaka katuma phahon, kala khamanaka kongkarao, khamanaka shānneira̱, kala khamanaka kuinei neira; hi tharkhamathenga sāribingna. Ana phasā ra̱vaihailaga ngavaiki kajina.
Kala ana Israel ashangva̱wui eina suihamchigatwui vang mevā khani, rikkatā kachigatwui vang yaovā akha da khuira.
Kala Aaronna suihamchigatwui vang mukkānao chi akhalattawui vang chigatra, kala awui shimkhurwui vangla pheomira.
Chiwui thili ana mevānao khani khuilaga kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli
kala Aaronna khani chiwui ngachaili kalā yangra; akhana
Kalā yanglaga
kha Azazelwui vang kalā tākahaiya me chi
Aaronna akhalattawui vang mukkā chi suihamchigatwui vang khuirāra, kala a eina ashi shimkhurwui vangla pheomi khavai sāra; awui vang mukkā chi suihamchigat sāda ana taithatlaga chigatra.
Kala ana meisharkhongli
kala nganamkaphā chi
kala ana mukkāwui ashee ngayarda khuilaga apāng eina lukhamashan pamkhong mangāli kala lukhamashan pamkongli shini shida kasirrorra.

Chithāda sāda Israel mibingwui makathar kala athumwui khayonkhamāng, athumwui morei kasā saikorawui vang, katharapam chi ana pheomira; athumwui makathar alungli khaleiwui vang, kazip khavai kachonshimwui vangla chithāda sāra.

Awui vang, ashi shimkhurwui vāng kala Israel yaruikazip katongawui vang, katharapamli ana pheomi khavai kazang chitharan, kala ana kazip khavai kachonshim eina mashokranglakha eina tangda mi khipākha chili maleisāpaimara.
Chiwui thili ana
Kala chili apāng mareng eina ashee chumkhuilaga hanphutungli shini shida kasirrorra, Israelnaobingwui makathar chi sāmathāda tharngasakra.
Kala katharapam, kazip khavai kachonshim kala hanphutpam chi pheomi kahaiwui thili, ana kharinga me chi

kala Aaronna apāng khanini mekuili parhaida, Israelnaowui makaphā saikora, khayonkhamāng sākahai, kala moreibing saikora hāngphatra; hāngphatta saikora chi mekuili phungngasakra, kala ngaranping kahai mi akhawui pāngli horsangmida ana me chi lamhāngli vachihohaora.
Me china morei saikora, mi makhalei ngachakyang kahaipamli phungvāhaora, kala ana lamhāngli me chi thuingasakhaora.
kala aphasā katonga tara̱ eina ra̱vaihailaga awui sāribing ngavaikhuida awui vangla, yaruiwui vangla rikkatā chigatta pheomira.
Kala suihamchigat sakahaiwui athao chi hanphuttungli riktāra.
Kala me chi Azazelli vatha kahai china awui kashankachonbing ngasa̱haida tara̱ eina ra̱vailaga rāmrahlungli ungzangpaira.
Kala suihamchigatwui vang mukkā, me, chiwui ashee khuilaga katharapamli pheomi khavai khuirā kahai chi rāmrahwui ayarli khuishokra; kala ahuila, paila mei eina riktāhaora.
Kala chi riktā kahaiwui thili mi china awui kashankachonbing ngasa̱haida tara̱ eina ra̱vailaga rāmrahlungli zangnaora.
kaja chithang nathumwui vang tharkhavai nathumli pheomira;
Hi nathumwui vang chingri kahai ngasāmkakhui zimikshona; nathum khalatta ngarinda shiyan hi mayonchingra.
Kala avāva̱wui mahut neomida kala tharchigatmi kahai pāngmon china, kathara khamanaka sāribing shaksāda pheomira;
ana katharapamwui vang pheomira, kala ana kazip khavai kachonshim kala hanphutpamwui vāng pheomira, kala ana pāngmonbing kala yarui kazip kahai katongawui vang pheomira.
Kala hi nathumwui vang katang makhavai shiyan chikan sāra, kaja Israelnaobingwui moreiwui vang kum kachida pheokhami sāra kala
Kala
“Aaron eina anaomayarabing kala Israelnao saikorali, Hi
Kalikhada kachikathā Israelwui mi akhana kha̱lungli, lah ayarli sei nilala, yao nilala, me nilala taithatlaga,
kala kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongpheili
Chiwui vang eina Israelnaobingna ayarli sākathat chi
kala kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili
Chieina athumna khayorva̱wui otsak kasā khamathang-khamarangbingwui vang pha̱phayā khavai mataithatluimara. Hi athumwui thot katang mavaila mayonki kaji shiyanna.
“Kala nana athumli hāngra, Israel shimkhurwui kachikathā akhana, lah athumwui ngachaili kha̱mi ngasokharā akhana, rikkatāchigat, lah pha̱kaphayā chigatlaga,
li chigat khavai kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongpheili makhuikharā mi chi awui miyurwui eina katathaora.
Khikhalajila phasāwui ringkhavai chi asheeli lei, kala nathumwui manglā pheomi khavai ina chi hanphuttungli mikahaina, kaja kharing khaleiwui vang ashee eina morei pheomi kapaina.
Chiwui vang Israelnaobingranu, nathum khipākha ashee mazāpaimara, nathumli kha̱mi ngasokharāranu, athum khipākhanala ashee mazāpaimara da ina hāngkahaina.
“Israelnaobingranu, kha̱mi ngasokharābingranu, kachikathāna shaikapai sā nilala, vānao nilala arengkhuiakha chiwui ashee shokngasakphalungra kala chi ngalei eina yatrorhaira.

Kharinga yur kachiva̱wui manglā awuili kazang ashee china; chiwui vang eina Israelnaobingli ina hānghaira, nathum kharinga yurwui ashee mazāpaimana, kaja kharingyurwui manglā asheeli lei; chi kazā mili katathaora.

“Kala Israelnaoranu, kha̱mi ngasokharāranu, thāda kathisā, kala khazursā kashai mi china awui kashankachonbing ngasa̱ra, kala tara̱ eina ra̱vaira, kala a ngazin eina tangda ngarangra, chiwui thili tharnaora.
Kha kashankachonbing mangasa̱, ra̱khavaila mara̱vaiakha khayon chi ana phungra.”
Kala
Israelnaobingli hānglu, I
Nathumna pamkasā Egypt ngaleiwui mibingna kasā thāda masāpaimara, kala ina nathumli thānzangki kaji Canaan ngaleiwui mibingna kasā chithāda masāpaimara, nathum athumwui shiyan mashurpaimara.
Nathumna iwui kagaso eina shiyan-chikan mayonda chiwui athishurda zatra. I
Chiwui vang eina nathumna iwui shiyan-chikan kala kagaso mayonki kajina, chi khamayon mi china ringra: I
Nganailak kahai athei-asāli mangasopipaimana, I
Nashavāwui khayā malānpaimana, chi nava̱wui khayāna; a nava̱na, nana awui khayā malānpaimana.
Navā preiva̱wui khayā malānpaimana, chi navāwui khayāna.
Navāwui nilala kala nava̱wui naongalāva̱ nilala, shimli pharākasangala, ayar ngaleili kapharā nilala nazarva̱wui khayā malānpaimana.
Nanaomayarawui naongalāva̱ nilala, lah nanao ngalāva̱wui naongalāva̱ nilala nana athumwui khayā malānpaimana, kaja athumwui khayā chi nakhalattawui khayāna.
Navā preiva̱wui naongalāva̱wui khayā malānpaimana, navāna samphangkakhuia naongalāva̱ ngasāhaoda chi nazarva̱na.
Navāwui azarva̱wui khayā malānpaimana, kaja navāli nganailak kahai theisāna.
Nava̱wui agatuiva̱wui khayā malānpaimana, chi nava̱li nganailak kahai theisāna.
Nana navāwui achināwui khayā malānpaimana, nana apreiva̱li masuipaimana; a nava̱gatuina.
Nana narihāva̱wui khayā malānpaimana; a nanaomayarawui preiva̱na, awui khayā nana malānpaimara.
Nana nagato preiva̱wui khayā malānpaimana, a nagatowui khayāna.
Nana preinao akha eina anaongalāva̱wui khayā malānpaimana, kala nana awui naomayarawui naongalāva̱ nilala anaongalāva̱wui naongalāva̱li nilala khayā malānpaimana; chi makhayā otna.
Kala nana napreiva̱wui agatuiva̱li ngalengda makhuipaimana, kaja napreiva̱̱ ringlakha eina tangda awui khayā malānpaimana.
Kala nakhalatta masākhamāng khavai nakhongnai preiva̱li mangasopipaimana.
Molechli pha̱khavai nanaongarāli meilungli horsangda mamipaimana; chi nawui Varewui ming makhao ngasak khavaina, I
Sha̱naoli ngasokapi thāda mayarnaoli mangasopipaimana; hi ningkakachai otna.
Kala nathumna sāyurli ngasopida nathum khalatta masākhamāngpaimana, kala sha̱naona sāyurli mapimipaimana: hi mashokhangachei otna.
Hikatha otsak eina nathum khalatta masākhamānglu, hikathā otwui vang nathum marāranglakha rida ina yur kachungkhali kasham kahaina.
Kaja ngaleila sākhamānghaoda, khayon chiwui vang ina tandi mi, kala ngalei china chili khaleibingli maloshokhaowa.
Kha nathumna iwui shiyan-chikan eina kagaso mayonda hikathā ningkakachai otbing hi masālaklu, nathum nilala, nathumli kha̱mi ngasokharābing nilala,
(kaja nathumwui mangāli mibingna hikathā ningkakachai otbing hi kasāwui vang ngalei katonga sākhamānghaira);
nathumna sākakhamāng tharan, nathumwui mangāli maloshok kahai thāda nathumlila maloshokhaipaishina.
Kaja kachikathāna hikathā ningkakachai otbing hi saakha, kasā mibing chili athum miyur ngachaiwui eina katathaora.
“Chieina ina hāngkahai hi haichingda nathumwui mangāli sākasā thāda hikathā ningkachaikapai ot eina nathum khalatta masākhamāng ngasakluilu: I
Kala
“Israel yarui ashangva̱li nathum tharphalungra; kaja
Nathum mi kachiva̱ nava̱ navāli khayāshilu, kala nathumna iwui sabbathbing mayonlu; kaja I
“Kala nathumna ningyatchigatwui pha̱kaphayā
Hi nathumna chigatthang shaira, lah akhama kathāla shaipai; kala kakathumathang taihaisaakha chi meili riktāki kajina.
Kalikha kakathumathang shaisaakha, hi ningkakachai otna; chi makhuisangmimara,
kala kashaiya mi kachiva̱ khayon phungra, kaja
Kala drakhātheila maphākhuiserhaialu, kala tātung kahai chila mamanākhuialu; chi kachāmabing kala ramkazat kha̱mibingwui vangna: I
Kala nathumna iwui ming eina nguida khangashit masāpaimana, kala chithāda nathumwui Varewui ming mamakhao ngasaklu: I
Khanā khangakhokali makhonshipaimana, lah khangapeowui mangāli ngaphok khavai mahaimipaimana, kha nawui Vareli ngacheelu; I
Nathum eina nathumwui mibing mamashātzat ngarokpaimana. Kala nakhongnaiwui khamashung bichar chili manganingkhampaimana; I
Nathumna athut makhuipaimana, lah ram khalattawui naobingli mayuishi ngarokpaimana, kha nakhalatta leikashi chithāda nawui khongnainaoli leishilu; I

“Kalikha mi akhana khāmkahai rao sha̱naoli awui akhavāna ngasopihailala raopava̱li mangatangkhuirangsaakha, lah ali ningkhān mamirangsaakha, ngathingkhuira. Ani khanili masāthatpaimana, kaja raopava̱ ningkhān masamphangranga;
kha mipā china akhalattawui vang khayonchigat yaovā akha kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongli
Kala mi china awui morei pheomi khavai
“Nathumna ngalei chili vāshungda kala lingsang kahai atheirong ayur-ayāwui athei chi mashaipaimana; shānlaga kum kathum eina tangda athei mashaipaimara.
Kala khamate kum atheibing chi kathara ngasāda
Kha kaphangā kum nathumna chiwui athei chi shaipaira, hithakha arongna chungmeida athei mataisangmira: I
Nachee kuimareida masipaimana, lah morhā makhanitpaimana.
Kathibingwui vang na phasāli khānkazamda pha̱ mara̱paimana, I
Nathumna iwui sabbath mayonra, kala iwui kathara shimli khayāshilu. I
“Khararnao mangāli nganingkālu, kasarawui mai yangda khayāshilu, kala nathumwui Vareli ngacheelu; I
Nathumli ngasokazata a chi nathum kathāna da phaninglu, kala nakhalatta leikashi thāda alila leishilu; kaja nathumla Egypt ngaleili kha̱mi sāda leisai: I
nathumna onkhavai khānbing, ngalungbing, khuilui kala lengkhor tāzakta haiphalungra: Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānkashoka, I
Kala nathumna iwui shiyan-chikan kala sharphahor saikora mayonda chi sālu: I
“Israelnaobingli hānglu, Israelnao nilala, ngasokharā kha̱mi nilala kachikathāna awui nao Molechli mihaiakha ali shaothatra; ngalei chiwui mibingna ali ngalung eina horthatra.
Kala mipa chili ina mamayāmara, kala ali awui mibingwui eina katathaora, kaja Molechli awui nao mida iwui katharapam kala iwui katharaming makhao ngasakhaowa,
Kala mi china awui nao Molechli khami chi ngalei chiwui mibingna thatheilaga mikningda ali mashaothatakha,
ina mipa chili, kala awui shimkhurli mamayāmara, alila awui thi shurda Molechli pha̱khayorli kazangbing saikoralila athumwui miyurwui eina katathaora.
Chiwui vang eina nathum khalatta tharchigatta tharlu; kaja I
Kala iwui ningkhami mayonlu, kala chi sālu; nathumli tharkhangasaka
Avāva̱wui preiva̱li ngasokapipā china avāva̱wui khayā khalānna; khaninili shaothatra, ashee chi aniwuitungli lei.
Kachikathāna arihāva̱li ngasopiakha, khaninili shaothatra; ani shokhalāna, aniwui ashee aniwuitungli lei.
Mi akhana mayarnao akhali sha̱naoli ngasokapi thāda saakha ani ningkakachaiya ot sāhaira, anili shaothatra, aniwui ashee aniwuitungli tāra.
Mi akhana ngalā khuilaga apreiva̱wui ava̱va̱lila ngakumakha, chi makaphā makhayā otna; nathumwui alungli makaphā makhayā malei khavai, mayaralila, preiva̱, khaninili mei eina thottāra.
Mi akhana sāyurli ngalātakha ali shaothatphalungra, kala sā chila shaothatra.
Sha̱naona sāyurli pimiakha, alila, sā chila shaothatra, anili shaothatra, kala aniwui ashee aniwuitungli lei.

Mi akhana shānrāt kazat sha̱naoli ngasopiakha, kala awui khayā lānakha, ana sha̱nao chiwui ura̱ mahong ngasakhaira, kala sha̱naopa china awui asheewui ura̱ lānhaira; ani khaninili yaruiwui eina katathaora.
Mi akhana avāgato preiva̱wui khayā lānakha, avagatowui khayā khalān kathāna, khayon anina phungra, ani nao mapharāla thira.
Mi akhana achinā pareiva̱li khangakum hi makathar otna; achināli khayāmala khangasakna, nao maleimara.
“Chiwui vang eina nathumna shiyan-chikan kala kaso kahai saikora mayonda sālu; kaja nathumli thānzangki kaji ngalei china nathumli maloshokhaipaishina.
Kala nathumwui mangāli yāmshokhaoki kaji yurbingwui zatkhanābing chili mashurlu, kaja athumna hikathāmāng kasāwui vang ina athumli ningkakachaina.
Kha ina nathumli hānghaira, ‘Nathumna athumwui ngalei khuira, kala khuira̱ eina seina̱ khalong lam chi nathumwui ngasā khavai chi nathumli mira.’ Mibingwui eina ngatei khangasaka I nathumwui

Chiwui vang eina kathara sā eina makathara sā, kathara vānao eina makathara vānao ngatei ngasakphalungra; sā nilala, vānao nilala, ngaleitungli khalei ayur nilala, makatharabing ina ngatei ngasak kahai chiwui eina nathum khalatta mamakhaophalungmara.
Nathum tharphalungra; kaja
Kha ali nganaimeikap kaje shimkhurwui mi kaja, ava̱va̱wui vang, avāva̱wui vang, anaomayarawui vang, anaongalāva̱wui vang kala achināwui vang,
lah mafakathuiva̱ azarva̱wui vang (agahara makhalei, ali nganailak kaji awui vanga sākhamāngpai).
Awui mibingwui ngachaili gahara akha thada a khalatta masākhamāngpaimana kala masāmakhaopaimana
Athum athumwui Varewui mangāli tharphalungra, athum Varewui ming masāmakhaopaimana; kaja athumna, athumwui Varewui khamui kachigat chi mei eina
Athumna khayorva̱ sha̱nao lah sākhamāng kahaiva̱ sha̱naoli makhuipaimana; gaharana pāngkahai preiva̱lila mangakumpaimana; kaja pāngmon hi awui Varewuili ava katharana.
Ali nathumna tharchigatra, kaja ana nathum Varewui khamui chigatmi; a nathumwui mangāli thara; kaja nathumli tharkhame,
Kala kachikathā pāngmonwui naongalāva̱na khayorva̱wui otsak sāda makhao ngasakakha avāva̱lila makhao khangasakna, ali mei eina thottāra.

“Chinao ngarāwui ngachaili pāngmon hakmeithui kajewui kuili neomi khavai thao heirormi kahai, kala sāribing ngavai khavai tharchigat kahaipā chi akuisam phungyir mahaipaimara lah awui kachonla maserkhākpaimara;
khamāng kahon mavāpaimara, avāva̱wui vang nilala, ava̱va̱wui vang nilala akhalatta masākhamāng ngasakmara;
katharapamwui eina kathuila mathuipaimara, Varewui katharapamla mamakhao ngasakpaimara; kaja tharchigat khavai Varewui thao awui kuitungli lei: I
Ana apreiva̱ sākhavai kachingva̱ ngalānao khuira.
Ra̱meinao, lah pāngkahai sha̱nao, sākhamāng kahai sha̱nao, khayora sha̱nao hikathāthābingli mangakumpaimana; kha awui yurwui kachingva̱ sha̱nao khuiki kajina,
kaja yurwui ngachaili awui naongarā mamakhao ngasakmara, kaja I nathumli tharkhame
Kala
“Aaronli hānglu, nawui ara̱-azā thot peida, khangakhai khangarai khalei mi china awui Vareli kashakazā khamui pha̱phayā khavai marānganairanu.
Kaja khangakhai-khangarai khalei mina nganaida marāpaimara, khangapeo, lah katek, lah mai khangakhai, lah pheimareng-pāngmareng khangapheng,
lah aphei apāng khamā za̱kahai,
lah khumkakon-khumkatek, mithang, mikkashi, khamuirai kala raiji, akhā vātkahai,
kachikathā khangakhai khangarai khalei Aaron pāngmonwui ara̱-azā khipānakha
Ana tharmathengmeikap kaji kala kathara Varewui kashakazā zāpai;
kha mairārli mavānganaipaimana, lah hanphutpamli mavāpaimana, kaja a achuk makapeiana, ana iwui katharapambing masāmakhaopaimana; kaja athumli tharkhangasaka
Chieina Mosesna Aaronlila, anaomayarabinglila kala Israel mi saikorali hāngsera.
Kala
“Aaronshi vānaongarāli hānglu, Israelnaobingna ili kachigat kathara otbing chi pāng masāza̱lu, chithakha athumna iwui kathara aming masāmakhaomara; I
Athumli hānglu, nathumwui ara̱-azāwui ngachaili thot kachida, kachikathā akhana makathar laleida, Israelnaobingna

“Aaronwui ara̱-azāwui ngachaili phārrei kazāt nilala, zaizai khangaya̱ nilala matharranglakha eina tangda iwui kathara ot mashaipaimara. Kachikathāna makathar ot saza̱da kaja kathili sākaza̱, lah pha̱ra̱ khaung,
ngawokazat ot saza̱da sāmakhao kahai, lah mi khangatei akhawui makathar mankakhui,
makathar yur saikora sakaza̱ mi chi matharmara, kala ngazin eina tangda ngarangra, kala mara̱vairanglakha eina tangda kathara ot mashaipaimara.
Zimik katun eina a tharhaora, kala chiwui thili kathara ot shaipaira; kaja hikathā hi awui kashakazāna.
Akhalatta masāmakhao khavai, khalatta kathi sāla, khazur sāla mashaipaimara: I
“Chiwui vang eina athumna iwui kakaso mayonphalungra, chi maningakha athumna makathar kasā chitharan athum hiwui vang morei phungda thira; athumli tharkhangasaka
“Ayarwui mina kathara ot mashaipaimara; pāngmonwuili rākazanga kha̱mi lah khamasā raona kathara ot mashaipaimara.
Kha pāngmonna awui raonao sākhavai pheisā eina lokakhuiakha, chikathā raonao kala awuili pharākasangbingna chi shaipai.
Kalikha pāngmonwui naongalāva̱na ayarwui mili fathuihaiakha, a kathara kachigat ot chi mashaipaimana.
Kha pāngmon akhawui naongalāva̱ ra̱meipamda, lah pānghaida naola manganaola, nganuilakhawui thāda avāva̱wui shimli latungakha, avāva̱wui kashakazā zāpaira; kha ayarwui mina mazāpaimana.
“Kalikha mi akhana matheimada kathara ot shaihaiakha, ana chiwui aman akhum phangāwui akha mataida sanglaga kathara ot chi pāngmonli mira.
Israelnaobingna
chithāda athumli kathara otbing shaingasakta china athumli khayon chiphunra; kaja athumli tharkhame
Kala
Aaronshi vānaongarāli kala Israelnao saikorali hānglu, kachikathā Israel shimkhurwui mi nilala, ngasokazat kha̱mi nilala athumna kachigat chitharan, khangashit kharun nilala, thāda kachigat nilala,
khuisang khavai, seiranu, yaoranu, meranu, achuk kapei avā chigatra.
Achuk makapei ot machigatpaimana, kaja chi makhuisangmimara.
Kala kachikathāna
Sāyur amik khangapeo, pheipāng katek, zaizai khangaya̱, raiji, lah khamui kashok, lah khangaphār,
Mukka nilala lah yaonao nilala, phasā sangnā kahai, sha̱na kahai leisālala lemmet kachigatwui vang khuirāpai; kha khangashitwui vang chikathā makhuisangpaimana.
Sāyur akhā ngakhai kahai, vātkahai, katattā kahai leiakha,
Yur khangateiwui eina hikathā sā samphanglala nathumna Varewui kashakazāna da machigatpaimara. Khamā khangakhai khangarai khaleiwui vang chikathā makhuisangmimara.
Kala
“Sei nilala, yao nilala, me nilala, anao kapharā tharan, anao chi ava̱li shinithang pamrumra kala kachishatathang eina thuida
Kala chikathā sei nilala, yao nilala, ava̱ eina anao chi thangkhali mataithatpaimana.
Kala
Kala hi chithang shaingakānserphalungra, ngathorshongwui vang mataipaimana: I
“Chiwui vang nathumna iwui ningkhami mayonlu kala chi sālu; I
Kala iwui katharaming masāmakhaopaimana, kha Israelnaobingwui alungli iming tharngasakphalungra; nathumli tharkhame
kala nathumwui Vare ngasāda Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānkashokana: I
“Israel mibingli hānglu,
Tharukthang ot sāra, kha kashinethang chingri vari eina ngasāmkakhui sabbathna, kathara kazip khangarum zimikshona; chithang ot masāpaimana; hi nathumwui kapampam kachida
Kala chikachāngwui tharāda kaphangāthang
Kharethang nathum kathara kazip khuingarumra; nathum shairanra̱ kashok ot masāpaimara.
Kha nathumna
Kala
“Israelnaobingli hānglu, ina nathumli khami ram chili vāda mā hātlaga heiun khuikhaung chitharan, matheikhare hātkakhui māmazān chi pāngmonli khuiungmilu;
kala ana māmazān chi
Kala māmazān chi khayitchigatthang, nana kumkhawui yaovānao achuk kapei akha rikkatā kachigatwui vang
Kala chili ngasoda tharāzāt kachigatwui vāng, thao khamanāt manaktak kahai mathir khuilui khum tharāwui khum khani zangda

Kala nathum Vareli kachigat zimiksho marāranglakha eina tangda athei-arairanu, khamuiranu, khanganao nilala, khangui katheng nilala mashaipaimana: hi nathumwui kapampam saikorali thot kachida mashimānla ngarangki kaji ningkhamina.
akhama eina shānphokta zimiksho hangphangā, sabbath kashinewui thili nathumna māmazān kadharwui tharāzāt kachigat
Nathumna shimwui eina khuilui khum tharāwui khum khani eina kasā khamui khani khayitchigat pha̱khavai khuirāra; khamui chi khamanak mathir eina khawok zanglaga khare athei-arai sāda
Kala khamui chili ngasoda achuk kapei, kumkhawui yaonao shini, mukkānao akha, yaovā khani khuirāra; chibing chi
Kala nathumna suihamchigatwui vang mevā akha, kala ningyatchigat hanphutwui vang kumkhawui yaovānao khani da chigatra.
Kala khare athei-araiwui khamui eina ngasoda yao khani chi pāngmona khayitta
Kala chithang nathumna yaruili kachishāt sāra; kathara kazip khuirumra; nathum shairanra̱ kashok ot masāpaimara. Hi thothot vāshungda nathumna kasompam saikorali mayonki kaji shiyan-chikanna.
Kala
“Israelnaoli hānglu, kachāng kashinewui kharethang, chingri vari eina ngasamkhuida phanit chi mayonra, chi talla̱khon eina phaningkhaunga kachishāt kathara kazip khangarumna.
Nathum shairanra̱ kashok ot masāpaimara; kala nathumna
“Kachāng kashinewui katharāthang pheokhamiwui zimikshona; hi nathumwui kathara kazipkhangarum atamna, nathum khalatta ngarinda mei eina rikkatā
Kala chithang nathum ot masāpaimana; kaja chithang pheokhami zimikshona,
kachikathāna chithang mangarinakha mi chili awui miyurwui eina katathaora.
Kala kachikathāna chithang ot saakha kasapāli awui miyurwui eina ina shimān ngasakra.
Nathum ot masāpaimana: nathum kasompam saikorali, thot-thot vāshungda katang makhavaiwui shiyan-chikanna.
Hi nathumwui vang chingri vari eina ngasāmkakhui sabbathna, nathum khalatta ngarinphalungra; kachāng chiwui kachikothang ngazin, ngazin eina thuilaga ngazin vāshungda nathumna sabbath mayonra.”
“Israelnaobingli hānglu, kachāng kashinewui tharāda kaphangāthang, kala shinithangwui vang
Kharethang kathara kazip khangarum zimikshona; nathum shairanra̱ kashok ot masāpaimara.
Shinithang mei eina riktāda
“Zimiksho kachiva̱wui athishurda ra̱shakshirei, rikkatā kachigat, kala tharāzātchigat
kachigat yurbing hi
“Kachāng kashinewui tharāda kaphangāthang, ngalei chiwui kashokshok kazipkhuiserhailaga,
Kharethang atheirong khamathāwui athei, khaneirong kala pompa̱ta̱ kahai thingphāng, lah kongli khalei chihir singda
Kum kachida
Nathum shinithang rāmrahli apamra; kala Israel luinganaibing saikora rāmrah sāpamra,
kaja Egypt ngaleiwui eina ina Israelnaobingli thānkashok tharan athumna rāmrahli sompamsai kaji naothotbingna theikhui khavaina. I
Chithāda sāda Mosesna
“Thaomei shārkhavai olivewui eina shungkakhui kashenga thao khuirālu da Israelnaobingli kasolu, kaja kazip khavai shim chili kahor chi leishon ngasakra.
Ngazin kachida Aaronna kazip khavai kachonshimwui ningkhami oko haikhavai mairār ayarli thaomei sharhaida
Aaronna thaomeibing chi sinā eina kasā thaomeishong tungli ngachamlak eina haida
Kala chi sinā kachanga eina sākakhui tabletungli tharukruk eina ngaherda ngaher khani eina haira.
Kala nathumna khamui ngaherherli kashenga frankincense sanglu, kaja chi phaningung khavai yar sāda khamui eina ngasoda
Katang mavaila tuingashit sākhavai Israel mibingwui mathun eina
Kala chi Aaron eina anaomayarabingwui yarna, kala athumna katharapamli shaira; kaja hi meina rikkatā
Thangkha, Egyptnao akhawui naomayara, Israel sha̱naona kapharā akhana Israelnaowui rāmrahli vai, kala rāmrah alungli Israelnao akhali kharar ngaroka;
kala Israelpava̱na kapharā nao china Aming chili mashātta khonshi. Chieina athumna ali Moseswui mangāli khuivai. Ava̱va̱li Shelomith hoi, Dan shangwui Dibriwui naongalāva̱na.
Kala
“Khonkashi mi chili rāmrahlungwui eina ayarli khuishoklu, kala kashā mi saikorana akuili pāng rāparranu, kala mi katongana ngalung eina ali horthathaolu.
Kala Israelwui mibingli hānglu, awui Vareli khonkashe mi china morei chi phungra.
wui mingli khonkashe mi chili shaothatra; mi ashangva̱na ngalung eina ali horthatra; kha̱mila, ramnaola, Amingli khonkashe mi chili shaothatra.
Kachikathā akhana sha̱kei shaothatmihaiakha, manglāwui vang manglā runra.
Katekwui vang katek, mikwui vang mik, hāwui vang hā, ana mili sheikashi-sheikakai leikhangasak thāda alila sheikashi-sheikakai leingasakra.
Sha̱kei shaokathata mi china runra, kala mi shaokathata mi chilila shaothatra.
Kha̱minaoranu, ramnaoranu, nathumna ain akhamāng eina zatra, nathumwui
Chithada sāda Mosesna Israelnaobingli hānga, kala khamashātapa chili rāmrahwui eina khuishokta ali lunggui eina horthathaowa.
“Israelwui mibingli hānglu, ina nathumli khami ngalei chili vākashung tharan,
Kum tharuk nathumna lui vāsangra, kum tharuk yāmgui drakhārong aphāng katatmida athei kazipkhuira;
kha kashine kum ngalei chili chingri ngasāmkakhuiwui sabbath sāra,
Nathumwui luili thāda kharkashoka mā chi mahātpaimana, kala makatatkhami drakhārongwui eina kashok atheila maphāpaimana, kaja ngalei chiwui vanga chingri eina ngasāmkakhui kumna.
Ngalei chiwui sabbathna nathumli kashakazā ngarānmira, nathumwui vangla, rao sha̱nao eina mayarnaowui vangla, ngalang kapheibingwui vangla, kala nathumli ngasokharā kha̱mibingwui vangla;
nawui sha̱keiwui vangla, ngalei chiwui sāyur saikorawui vangla, ngalei chili kashokshok saikora kashakazāsera.
“Kala nathumwui langchin chi kum shinini eina shini shida shānkhuida langchin shini chiwui atam zingkum hangmatida chikora.
Chieina nathumna kachāng kashinewui katharāthang nathumna talla̱ kuimareida khongvālu; pheomithang nathumwui ngalei saikorali vāshungda talla̱khongvāra.

Kala hangkaphangā kum nathumna tharngasakta ngalei hupva̱li khaleibing chili thāda chihokhami chishātlu. Jubilee hi nathumwui vangna; nathum ava̱va̱na awui shimlui hanmira, kala nathum ava̱va̱na awui shimli latkhaung samphangra.
Hangkaphangā kum jubileena, chi nathumwui vangna; chikum luili athei-arai mayaolu kala akhalatta kashok chila mahātkhuilu, lah makatatkhami drakhārongwui eina maphāshailu.
Kaja hi jubileena; nathumwui mangāli hi katharana; luiwukli kashok chi nathumna zāra.
“Jubileewui kum hili mi kachiva̱na awui shimlui hanmingaroklu.
Kala nana khongnainaoli khayor nilala, khalo nilala, akha eina akha khalāng ot masāpaimana.
Jubileewui thili atam kasha̱-kasāng athishurda nana khongnaiwui eina lokhuira, kala atam kasha̱-kasāng athishurda māwui vang ana nali yorsangra.
Zingkum sāngakha aman chungmeida mira, kala zingkum sha̱meiakha teomeida mira, kaja yorkasang chi kumkumwui heiunli khayangna.
Nathum akha eina akha khalāng ot masāngarokalu, kha nawui Vareli ngacheelu; kaja I
“Chiwui vang eina iwui shiyan-chikan saikora sāra, kala iwui kagaso mayonlu kala chi nganālu; chieina apam chili nathum ning tāphup eina okthuira.
ngalei chiwui athei-arai matheira, nathumna zākashap chi zākhuira kala chili ningtāphup eina somra.”
Kala ithumna athei-arai mayao, lah heiun makazipsangakha kashine kum ithum khi zaura? da nathumna hāngra.
Ina katharuka kum nathumli sokhami mira, chithāda zingkum kathumwui vāng heiun ungngasakra.
Nathumna kachishata kum athā khayao chitharan mācham zāsāra; kachiko kum eina tangda heiun khaung chitharanla mācham zāsāra.
Ngalei chi yorchang masāpaimara, khikhalajila chi iwui ngaleina, kaja nathum kha̱mina, ili ngasokharāna.
Kala nathumna kakhui lam saikorawui alungli nathumna ngatangkhui khavai ngalei miphalungra.
Nachinā akhana chāmhaida awui ot ngakaida yorshokhaiakha yorkahai ot chi awui nganaimeikap kaje china ngatangkhuiphalungra.
Kachikathāna ngatangmi khavai maleiakha, kala akhalatta ringpaihaida ngatangkhuishapakha,
kum karankhahairakhala kaji shānlaga mikharān chi ot khalopa chili aman henda shānmiranu, chithada awui lui chi khalopa china hanmiluira.
Kha ngatangkhui khavai aman maleiakha, yorsang kahaipa chiwui pāngli jubilee kum marāranglakha eina tangda haisāra, jubilee zingkum thāda hanmida awui lui chi samphangluira.
Mi akhana keinungwui ngaveilungli sākahai shim yorhaiakha yorkum chiwui alungli ngatangkhuipai; kaja ngatangkhui khavai kumkha awui mashun lei.
Kumkhawui alungli mangatangkhuirarakha keinungwui ngaveilungli sākahai shim chi khalopawui sāchanghaora; thot peida awui sāra, jubilee kumlila mahanmipaimara.
Kha ngavei makhalei kha̱wui shimbing chiya lui khayor eina ngaraichada sāra; chibing chiya ngatangkhuipai, kala jubileelili hanmira.
Chithālala Levibingwui keinungli athumwui shimlui khalei chi atam kachida ngatangkhuipai.

Kala kachikathā Levinaobingwui mi akhana keinunglungli khalei awui shim yorkahai chi mangatangkhuisalala, jubileeliwui thāda hanmira, kaja Israelwui ngachaili Leviwui keinungli shim khalei saikora athumwuina.
Kha Levi keinungwui yaruiwui luiva mayorpaimana, kaja chiya athumwui ngasāchingra.
Awui eina atar nilala, henkakhui nilala makhuipaimara; kha nawui Vareli ngacheelu, kaja nachināna nali okthuirumpai khavaina.
Atarwui vang ali lupā machishutpaimana kala ali kashakazā khami chi nawui tongza khavaiwui vang eina mamipaimana.
Canaan ngalei mikida kala nathumwui Vare sākhavai Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānkashoka nathumwui
langkaphei mi thāda kala nali ngasokazat kha̱mi thāda nali ngasopamra. Jubilee kum marāranglakha eina tangda nali otram ngatha̱ra;
chiwui thili nawui eina thuihaora, ala, anaongarāla shimli latungda awui avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlui chi ungkhuira.
khikhalajila athum iwui raosera, Egypt ngaleiwui eina ina thānkashokna, athumli raonao sākhavai mayorpaimara.
Nathumna athumli zakshilāk eina mamungpaimara, kha nawui Vareli ngacheelu.
Nathumwui rao sha̱nao kala mayarnao rao sākhavai haipai; nathumwui ngalemli khalei yur khangateiwui eina rao sha̱nao kala mayarnao lokhuipai.
Nathumli ngasokharā kha̱mibing kala athum shimkhurwui eina nathum ngaleili pharākasangbing chila nathumna lopai; kala athum chi nathumwui sāchao ngasakpai.
Nathumwui thili athumli nanao mayarabingli haimi maronpai. Athumli raonao sāngasakpai, kha Israelnao nachinā ngarāwuitungli akhana akhali sāshilak eina mamungpaimana.
Nachinā akha chāmhaoda kha̱mi nilala, ngasokharā mi nilala, ngasokapama kashānga akhali nilala a khalatta yorsanghaiakha,
yorkahaiwui thili agato akhana ali ngatangkhuipai;
avāgatona nilala, achināna nilala ngatangkhuipai, lah shimkhurwui khanganai akhana ngatangkhuipai; lah a shāngluishitta ngatangshapakha akhalatta ngatangkhuipai.
Yorkasang atam eina thuilaga jubilee eina tangda shānkhuilaga khangatangman chākkhuira; akhavāwui shimli kapam atam chi langkapheiwui ngalangman eina pāra.
Zingkum kasāngkha vātsaakha chiwui athishurda ali ngatangkakhuiman mira.
Kha jubilee sākida zingkum kateokhamāng vātsaakha awui otram ngathami kahai chi hāngsanghailaga runkapai runda ngatangkhuira.
Kum kum ngalang phākasang thāda ali ngasopamra; nathumwui miktāli zakshilāk eina mamungpaimana.
Kala ali hithāda mangatangkhuirarakha ala, anaongarāla, jubileewui kumli thāda chihohaora.
Kaja Israelnaobing iwui rao sakhavaina, iwui rao sākhavai athumli Egypt ngaleiwui eina ina thānkashokna: I
Nathum iwui sabbathbing mayonlu kala iwui katharapamli khayāshilu: I nathumwui
zingkum atam kharā tharan kazing rotāmira, chithāda ngaleili khamathei mataisangra, kala luiyamwui atheirong athei matheira.
Kala nathumwui heiun, zāt nilala, athei-arai nilala zingkum angasut ungshungda zāpeira, thochingra kala ningtāphup eina nathumwui ngaleili okthuira.
“Kala ngalei chili ina chingrihai ngasakra, nathum kakhanang maleila piphup pamphuphaira; kala apam chiwui eina ramsā kashamserhaora, kala nathumwui pam chili raighai masāvaimara.
Kala yangkashebingli nathumna kashamda athum raighai eina thira.
Yangkashibing shākhali nathum phangāna kharomra, kala thingtharāli shākhana kharomra, kala nathumwui yangkashibing nathumwui mangāli raighai eina thiserra.
Kala ina nathumli yangmida athei chungmeida matheida mataisang ngasakra, kala iwui ngashit kahai chi ngazipmei ngasakra.
Kala kasāngkha haikahai mācham zāra, kala kadhar ungsang khavai kachampa sānshokra.
Kala ina nathumwui ngachaili pamda imanglāna nathumli maningkachaimara.
Kala ina nathumwui ngachaili leida nathumwui Vare ngasāra, nathum iwui mi ngasāra.
I nathumwui
kalikha iwui shiyan-chikanli ningkachaiakha, kala nathumwui ningna iwui kagaso mashurla iwui tuingashit kaihaiakha,

ina nathumli hithāda sāra: Kashuirak kahai khangachee rāngasakra, kala kharurlaga china mik mathei ngasakmara kala mirin shimān ngasakra. Nathumna athei-arai yaosanglala arema sāra, kaja nathumwui yangkashebingna zāra.
Ina nathumli yangngakheihaida nathumli yangkashibingna sāthatra; nathumli ningkakachaibingna mungra, kala khipānakha makharomlala nathumna yāmzatra.
“Kala chithālala nathumna manganāsangakha, nathumwui moreiwui vang shini shida hāngmachinra,
kala nathumwui langso khavai pangshap chi sakhaimihaida kazingla mari thāda, ngaleila pithrai thāda sāmira;
nathumwui yang aremali shimānra, kaja luili heiun machungsangmara, kala atheirongnala athei mamatheimara.
“Chieina mazatkhangayili zatta iwui tui manganaakha nathum morei kasā chiyakhawui shini shida kazāt rāngasakra.
Kala ina nathumli ramsābingli chihoda nanao ngarāli tukshai ngasakra, kala nathumwui sha̱keila shimān ngasakra, kala nathum kachunga thishumhaida nathumwui shongfa ngachakyāng ngasakra.
“Kala khamachin hi eina nathumna ili mai mangareiungla mazatkhangayili zatakha,
ila nathumwui eina kharāthuida, I khalattana nathum moreiwui vang shini shida sāshimānra.
Kala ngashit kahaiwui athut hāngsang khavai ina raighai khuirāra; kala nathumna nathumwui keinungli kazipakha, kazātkashi chihorāra, kala yangkashebingwui pāngli horsangmira.
Ina nathumwui chum masingrā khangasak chitharan, sha̱nao tharāna meiphung akhali khamui sāda onlaga mishonlala nathumna zāda katho mavaimara.
“Kala hi eina tangdala ili manganāsangla zatkhangayili mazatakha,
ila malungvātta nathumwui eina kharāda zatra, kala nathumwui morei chili shini shida hāngmachinra.
Nathumna nanao mayara kala nanao ngalāva̱ ngarāwui asā shaira.
Kala nathumwui khorum khavai kajuipam katathaida nganamkaphā hanphutla sākazamhaora, kala nathumwui kathingun meoma̱tungli ngashomda herhaira, kala imanglāna nathumli ningkachaira.
Kala nathumwui keinung sakathānhaida, kala katharapam ngachakyanghai ngasakta, nathumwui ningyāngkhaung nganamkaphā chi manganamluimara.
Kala nathumwui ngalei sākathānmihaida yangkashebingna rāpānda matakhak ngasakhaora.
Kala nathumli yur khangateiwui ngachaili chaiyāng ngasakra, iwui raighaina nathumli yunzatra; nathumwui ngalei ramchohaora, keinungla sakathānserhaora.
Chitharan nathumna yangkashiwui pāngli leida ramcholakha eina tangda, ngalei china ngasāmkhuida sabbathwui ringkaphā chi samphangra.
Nathumna ngalei hili pānlakha sabbath maleisalak kaji chi ramcholakha eina tangda ngasāmkhuira.

“Kala nathumwui ngachaili notha kahaibingli athumwui yangkashebing ramli malung kashamkhai ngasakra, thingnākao phankazatkhon shālaga yāmngasakra kala raighaili khangachee thāda yāmra, khipānakha makharomlala yāmda kongluisangra.
Khipānakha makharomlala raighaiwui eina athumna yāmkazat thāda akha eina akha ngaphok ngarokra kala yangkashibingli ngarar khavai pangshap maleimara.
Kala nathumna yangkashibingwui pāngli thisangra, kala yur khangateiwui alungli thirumra.
Kala nathumwui ngachaili notha kahaibing chi, athum moreiwui vang yangkashibingwui ngaleili chāngkharenglak eina thira, kala avāva̱ ngarāwui moreiwui vang athumwui thāda chāngkharenglak eina thira.
chiwui vang inala kharāthuida yangkashebingwui ngaleili khuivāra, kala athumwui makaphāwui eina ning ngareiungda moreiwui eina kaphā saluiakha;
ina Jacobli tuingashit kasā chi phaningungra, kala Isaacli tuingashit kasa chi phaningungra kala, Abrahamli tuingashit kasā chi phaningungra, kala ngalei chila phaningungra.
Kha lam chi athumna chihohaora, kala athum makhalei atamli ngasāmkhuisāchingra, athumna athumwui moreiwui vang hāngsangphalungra, kaja iwui shiyan-chikan mamayonla ningkachaihaowa.
Chithālala athumna yangkashibingwui ngaleili leilakha ina mahorhaimara, shimānchao khavai maningkachaimara kala iwui tuingashit makai khavai kachinla machinmara; kaja I
Kha athumwui Vare sākhavai yur khangateiwui miktāli Egypt ngaleiwui eina ina thānshok kahaiya avāva̱ ngarābingwui mangā eina athumwui tuingashit chi ina phaningungra; I nathumwui
“Israelnaobingli hānglu, mi akhana
mayarnao kum maga̱ eina thuilaga hangtharuk eina tangda, kathara shimwui shekel athishurda lupāsā hangphangāra.
Kha mipa chi sha̱naoakha nawui lupāchākli shekel thumra jira.
Kha mipa chi kum phangāwui eina maga̱ ngachaiwui mayarnaoakha shekel maga̱, kala sha̱naoli shekel tharā jira.
Kha mipa chi kachāngkha eina thuilaga kum phangāwui alungli khaleiakha, mayarnaoli shekel lupāsā phangā, kala sha̱naoli shekel lupāsā kathum jira.
Kala mipa chi kum hangtharuk kākahaiya kala lāngkahaiya mayarnaoakha, shekel lupāsā tharāda phangā, kala sha̱naoli shekel lupāsā tharāra.
“Kala mi akhana chāmnāhaida lupāchāk chi mashokthukakha, ana khangashit khuikhame pāngmonwuili khuivāda awui mikashap chi ali retmira.
“Mi kachikathāna
Khangatei mahut mashinpaimara, lah kaphāwui vang makaphā, lah makaphāwui vang kaphā mangatha̱paimana; sā akhawui eina sā akha ngatha̱akha, khanini chi tharra.
Kala
kala shilala phālala chiwui athishurda pāngmon china lupāchāk sāmira, ana lupāchāk sākhami chieina vaira.
Kha akhavāna ngatangkhuingaisaakha aman chiwui akhum phangāwui akha lāngsangmira.
“Mi akhana awui shim
Kala shim dharkat kasā a china ngatangkhuingaiakha, aman chiwuitungli sharuk phangāwui akha lupā eina sangmilaga awui sāpaira.
“Mi akhana awui shimluikhotwui eina kachikathā ngalei
Kha ana lui chi jubilee kum chigatakha, luiman chi peichaoda chākkhuira;
kha jubileewui thili ana chigatakha, pāngmon china khanao jubilee kum kayākha vatkhala kaji pākhuilaga pāngmonna chiwui aman eina katathaora.
Kala lui dharkat kasāpana ngatangkhuingaiakha ana aman chiwui sharuk phangāwui akha lāngsangmida lui chi awui sāpapamra.
Kha ana lui chi mangatangkhuingaiakha, lah ana mi katei akhali yorsanghaiakha, mangatangkhuiluipaimara.
Kha jubilee kumli thāda hankhami chitharan
“Kha ana awui shimluikat makhaninga, ana lokakhui lui
jubilee kum pālaga pāngmon china luiman ngachākmira, kala
Jubilee kum lui chi khayorapali, kaja shimluikat eina thuilaga yorkashokapa chili hanmira.
“Aman khangachāk saikora kathara shimwui shekelchākwui athishurda zatra.
“Kha sha̱kei anao pharākhare chi
Kha makathar saakha, leihchāk athishurda khalatta lolaga chiwui sharuk phangāwui akha sangnarra; lah chi mangatangkhuingaiakha nawui sākahai aman chieina yorhaora.
Shiman ngasak khavai horsang kahai mi chi khipānakha mangatangkhuipaimana; ali shaothatphalungra,
Kachikathāna awui tithe chi ngatangkhuingaiakha sharuk phangāwui akha sangminarra.
Kala seiwui titheranu, yaowui titheranu, kahomana shānlaga katharā saikora
Kashiranu, kaphāranu ana mangathingpaimana, khangatha̱la mangatha̱khuipaimana; ngatha̱saakha khanini chi tharthathuiya; kala chi mangatangkuipaimara.”
Sinai Kaphungli Israel mibingwui vang
“Israelnao ashangva̱ shang-shang eina, shimkhur eina, aming mashing athihshurda mayarnao kachiva̱wui mishān khuilu;
kum maga̱ eina thuida chiwui atung, Israelwui alungli khalei raili vākashap saikora Aaron nanina shang-shangwui athishurda shānkhuilu.
Kala nanili ngachon khavai shang ava̱va̱wui eina khararnao ava̱va̱ ngasora.
Kala nanili ngachonki kaji mibing chiwui amingbing chi hina: Reubenshiwui eina Shedeurwui naomayara Elizur;
Simeonshiwui eina Zurishaddaiwui naomayara Shelumi-el;
Judahshiwui eina Amminadabwui naomayara Nahshon;
Issacharshiwui eina Zuarwui naomayara Nethanel;
Zebulunshiwui eina Helonwui naomayara Eliab;
Josephwui naongarābing, Ephraimwui eina Ammihudwui naomayara Elishama, kala Manassehwui eina Pedahzurwui naomayara Gamaliel;
Benjaminshiwui eina Gideoniwui naomayara Abidan;
Danshiwui eina Ammishaddaiwui naomayara Ahi-ezer;
Ashershiwui eina Okhranwui naomayara Pagiel;
Gadshiwui eina Deuelwui naomayara Eliahsaph;
Naphtalishiwui eina Enanwui naomayara Ahira.”
Hi Israel shang-shangwui kathānabing khararthot shimkhur ararbing ashangva̱wui eina kapangkakhuibingna.
Aming eina hāngkahai mibing hili Moses eina Aaronna hokhui,

kala kachāng kakhanewui kharethang, kum maga̱ eina thuida chiwui atungbingwui mashing athishurda, shangbing eina shimkhurbing athishurda athum khalatta ming chankahai yarui ashangva̱li ngarumda athum kazipa.
na Mosesli kakaso athishurda, ana Sinai lamhāngli athumwui aming chankhui.

Israelwui naochizai Reubenwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Reuben shangwui mi mashing thing hangmatida tharuk shāphangāna.

Simeonwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Simeon shangwui mi mashing thing hangphangāda chiko shākathuma.

Gadwui ara̱-azā, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Gad shangwui mi mashing thing hangmatida phangā shātharuk kala hangphangāna.

Judahwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Judah shangwui mi mashing thing hangshinida mati shātharuka.

Issacharwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Issachar shangwui mi mashing thing hangphangāda mati shāmatina.

Zebulunwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Zebulun shangwui mi mashing thing hangphangāda shini shāmatina.

Josephwui mibing, Ephraimwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Ephraim shangwui mi mashing thing hangmati shāphangāna.

Manassehwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora kala chiwui atungbing:
Manasseh shangwui mi mashing thing thumrāda khani shākhanina.

Benjaminwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Benjamin shangwui mi mashing thing thumrāda phangā shāmatina.

Danwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Dan shangwui mi mashing thing hangtharukta khani shāshinina.

Asherwui mibing, athumwui naotunbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Asher shangwui mi mashing thing hangmatida akha shāphangāna.

Naphtaliwui mibing, athumwui naothotbing, athumwui shimkhur athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, miwui aming mashing athishurda, mi ava̱va̱, kum maga̱ kākahai kala chiwui atungbing raili vākashapa mayarnao saikora:
Naphtali shangwui mi mashing thing hangphangāda kathum shāmatina.
Shang kachiva̱wui mathun sāda mi tharāda khani, Israelwui kathānabingna Moses eina Aaronli ngachonda mibing chi shānkhui.
Chieina Israel saikorawui mibing, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda, athum katonga shimkhur eina, Israelwui alungli raili vākashapa kum maga̱wui eina thuida chiwui atungbing—
athumwui mi mashing saikora shātharuk kala thing katum shāphangā kala hangphangāna.
Kaja
“Levishi shangmāng machanalu, kala Israelwui mibingli ngarumda mashānrumalu;

Kha Levinaobingli ningkhami okowui tabernacle chiwui thongthāngbing kala chili khalei saikora chi yangkhavai kapangsanglu. Ashina tabernacle phungzatra kala chiwui ot saikora ashina yangpamra kala chiwui kuikhamareili ashi pamra.
Zatusa jiakha ashina pheikhuilaga phungzatra; kala vākhangasāmpamli ashina vākhaningkāra. Kala kachikathā ayarwui mina rānganaiakha chipāli shaothatra.
Khangatei Israelwui mibingna athumwui kachonshim tāngtāng eina khaningkāra kala mi kachiva̱na ichichāwui rāmrah alungli kala philān azingli leira;
kha Levibingna ningkhami okowui tabernacle kuimareida pamda athumna mayonra, chithāda sāda mi khipānakha marānganairanu kala chieina Israel yarui ashangva̱wuitungli malungkhavāt maleimara.”
Chithāda Israelwui mibingna sai;
Israelwui mibingna kachichāshi shimkhurwui theikhui khavai ichichāshiwui philān leilaga rāmrah sāpamra; athumna kazip khavai kachonshim chili mai ngareingasungda kuimareida rāmrah sāra.
Zingshoshong rāmrah sāda pamki kajibing chi Judahwui philān athishurda kachichāwui ashangva̱ eina pamra, Judah shangwui kathāna chi Amminadabwui nao Nahshonna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangshinida mati shātharukna.
Awui thichangli ngasāmki kaji chiya Issacharwui shangna, Issachar shangwui kathāna chi Zuarwui naomayara Nethanelna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangphangāda mati shamatina.
Chiwui thili Zebulunwui shang, Zebulun shangwui kathāna chi Helonwui naomayara Eliabna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangphangāda shini shamatina.
Judahwui rāmrah athumwui tangbing chiwui katonga mishān lakh akha thing hangchishatta tharuk shāmatina. Athumna rimeikapta zatphokra.
Azingshong rāmrah sāda pamki kajibing chi Reubenwui philān athishurda kachichāwui ashangva̱ eina pamra, Reuben yurwui kathāna chi Shedeurwui nao Elizurna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangmatida tharuk shāphangāna.
Kala awui thili Simeonwui shang, Simeon yurwui kathāna chi Zurishaddaiwui naomayara Shelumi-elna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangphangāda chiko shākathumna.
Chiwui thili Gadwui shang, Gad mibingwui kathāna chi Reuelwui naomayara Eliasaphna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangmatida phangā shātharuk kala hangphangāna.
Reubenwui rāmrah eina athumwui shang katonga mishān lakh akha thing hangphangā shāmati hangphangāna. Athumna kakhaneli zatra.

“Chieina kazip khavai kachonshim kaphungabing china zatta Levishiwui rāmrahna shang khangateiwui alungli zangra; athumna rāmrah vākasā chithāda athumna chi tākam eina zatra, athum ava̱va̱na kachichāwui philān athishurda ngasozatra.
“Zingtunshong rāmrah sāda pamki kajibing chi Ephraimwui philān athishurda kachichāwui ashangva̱ eina pamra, Ephraim shangwui kathāna chi Ammihudwui nao Elishamana sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangmati shāphangāna.
Kala awui thili Manassehwui shang, Manasseh shangwui kathāna chi Pedahzurwui naomayara Gamalielna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing thumrāda khani shākhanina.
Chiwui thili Benjaminwui shang, Benjamin shangwui kathāna chi Gideoniwui naomayara Abidanna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing thumrāda phangā shāmatina.
Ephraim shangwui rāmrah katonga, kānglup athishurda mishān lakh akha thingchishat shākhana. Athumna kakathumali zatra.
“Atungshong rāmrah sāda pamki kajibing chi Danwui philān athishurda kachichāwui ashangva̱ eina pamra, Dan shangwui kathāna chi Ammishaddaiwui nao Ahi-ezerna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangtharukta khani shāshinina.
Kala awui thili Asherwui shang, Asher shangwui kathāna chi Okhranwui naomayara Pagielna sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangmatida akha shāphangāna.
Kala awui thili Naphtaliwui shang, Naphtali shangwui kathāna chi Enanwui naomayara Ahirana sāda,
awui ashangva̱ mashing thing hangphangāda kathum shāmatina.
Dan shang saikora rāmrahwui mashing lakh akha thing hangphangāda shini shātharukna. Athumwui philān athishurda athumna naoda zatra.”
Hi Israelwui mibing athumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur athishurda chankahai; shang-shang eina shānlaga rāmrahli khalei mi saikora shātharuk kala thing kathum shāphangā kala hangphangāna.
Kha
Chithāda
Sinai Kaphungli
Aaronwui naomayarabingwui aming chi hina: naochizai Nadab, kala Abihu, Eleazar kala Ithamarna;
