hi Aaronwui naomayarabingwui amingna, pāngmonwui otpamli otram ngatha̱ khavai ana thao neomi kahai kala tharchisin kahaibing china.
Kha Sinai lamhāngli
“Leviwui shangnaoli rānganai ngasaklu kala pāngmon Aaronwuili haimilu, chieina athumna ali otram ngatha̱ngajira.
Athumna tabernacleli otram ngatha̱da awui vang eina samphang khavai kachonshimwui mangāli khalei yarui ashangva̱wui vang otram ngatha̱ranu.
Athumna kazip khavai kachonshimwui thongthāng saikora yangranu, kala tabernacleli otram khangatha̱ thāda Israelnaobingwui vang ngachonranu.
Kala nana Levibing chi Aaron kala naomayarabingli milu; Israel mibingwui ngachai eina athum katonga awui vang mikahaina.
Kala nana Aaron kala naomayarabingli kapangsanglu kala athumna athumwui pāngmonpam chi yangranu, kha mi khangatei rāzangakha ali shaothatra.”
“Yanglu, Israel mibingwui naopamwui pharākharebingwui mahut sāda ina Levibingli Israelwui mibing ngachaiwui eina phaishok kahaina.

Athum iwui mi sāra kaja naochizai saikora iwuisera. Egypt ngaleili naochizaibing shaothatserhaithang, Israelwui naochizai, mila, sha̱keila katonga ina ikhalattawui vang tharchigat kahaina; athum iwui ngasāra: I
Kala Sinai lamhāngli
“Leviwui naomayarabing, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak kala shimkhurwui athishurda shānlu; kachāngkha kākahaiya kala chiwui atung mayarnao kachiva̱ shānkhuilu.”
Chiwui vang
Hi Leviwui naomayarabing; Gershom, Kohath kala Merari athumwui amingna.
Kala hi Gershomwui naomayara athum shimkhurbingwui athishurda: Libni kala Shime-ina.
Kala Kohathwui naomayara athum shimkhurbingwui athishurda: Amram, Izhar, Hebron kala Uzzielna.
Kala Merariwui naomayarabing athum shimkhurwui aming: Mahli kala Mushina. Avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda athum hi Leviwui shangna.
Gershonwui eina Libnishi kala Shimeishi shimkhur khani hi shoka: shimkhur khani hi Gershon shangna.
Ashi shimkhurwui mashing kachāngkha eina thuilaga chiwui atung mayarnao saikora thingshini shāphangāna.
Gershonwui shimkhurbingna tabernaclewui khanuk zingtunshong shim sāki kajina.
Avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda Laelwui naomayara Eliasaphli ngasoda Gershonwui shangli yangra.
Kala Gershonwui naomayarabingna yangki kaji chiya, kazip khavai kachonshimwui tabernacle, khāmongwui chonrān kachonshim fakham khavai eina ngasoda,
yāngkhupwui kangruitā khavaibing, hanphut eina tabernacle kuimareida yāngkhup khāmongwui chonrān, kala chiwui khara̱bing, otram saikora otbing hiwui vangna.
Kohathwui eina kata Amramshi shang, Izharshi shang, Hebronwui shang kala Uzzielwui shang hibingna; hibing hi Kohath shangwui mibingna.
Kachangkha eina thuilaga chiwui atung, ashiwui mayarnao saikora shānkakhui athishurda thing chishat shātharukna, hina katharapamli otram ngatha̱ra.
Kohatwui naomayarabingwui shimkhurbingna tabernaclewui azingshong rāmrah sāki kajina,
avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda Uzzielwui naomayara Eli-zaphanli ngasoda Kohathwui shangli yangra.

Kala Athumwui otngarutna, tuingashit oko, table, thaomeishong, hanphutbing, pha̱phayā khavai pāngmonna kasing kathara khorkhongbing katonga, kala chili rānkhavai chonrān saikora hina; otram saikora otbing hiwui vangna.
Kala Aaron pāngmonwui naomayara Eleazarna Levishi kathāna saikorawuitungli kharei sāda katharawui otngarutbing hili yangmira.
Merariwui eina Mahlishiwui shimkhur kala Mushiwui shimkhur; hibing hi Merariwui shimkhurbingna.
Kachāngkha kākahai kala chiwui atung mayarnao saikora shānkakhui athishurda thingtharuk shākhanina.
Kala avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda Merari shimkhurwui kathāna, Abihailwui nao Zurielna; ashina tabernaclewui atungshong rāmrah sāra.

Kala Merariwui naomayarabingna sāki kaji otngarut tabernaclewui akombing, khamakharbing, pakra̱-pakrā, nganing khavai apheibing, kala chiwui ot ayur-ayā katonga zangra; otngarut saikora hi otbing hiwui vangna;
kala kayāng kuimareida khalei pakra̱, pakra̱pheibing thingshun kala khara̱ hibingla zangrumra.

Kala tabernaclewui mangā zingshoshongwui rāmrahli khaleibing, kazip khavai kachonshimwui mangāli Moses eina Aaron kala naomayarabingna, Israelnaobingwui vang athumna katharapamli otram ngatha̱mira; chili rākhanganai mi chi shaothatra.
Saikora shānkhui khavai Moses eina Aaronli
Kala
Kala nana Israel mibingwui naochizai mayarnao saikorawui mahut sāda Levinaobing iwui vang khuirālu, kaja —I
Chithāda sāda
Kala kachāngkha kākahai eina thuilaga chiwui atung naochizai mayarnao saikora amingbing eina shānkhuida thing maga̱da khani shākhani kala hangshinida kathuma.
Kala
“Israel mibingwui ngachaili naochizai saikorawui mahut sāda Levibing kala athumwui sha̱kei pharākharebingwui mahut sāda Levibingwui sha̱kei khuilu; kala Levi iwui ngasāra: I
Kala Levishi mayarnao mashingli lāngkahai Israel mibingwui naochizai shākhani kala hangshinida kathum chi ngatangkhui khavai,
nana shekel apā phangāngā khuira; katharashimwui shekel aman athishurda gerah maga̱wui shekel mi ava̱va̱wui vang khuida,
athum mashing khalāngbing chi ngatangkhui khavai Aaronshi vānaongarāli pheisā chi milu.”
Chithāda sāda Mosesna Levishili khalāng athumwui eina ngatangkhui khavai pheisā chi khuiya;
Israel mibingwui naochizaiwui pheisā shekel thingkha shākathum kala hangtharukta phangā, kathara shimwui shekel aman athishurda chi ana khui.
Kala
Levishi naomayarabingwui eina Kohath naomayarabing, athumwui shimkhur kala avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda mishān khuilu,
zingkum thumrā eina thuilaga kum hangphangā rarkahai, kazip khavai kachonshimlungli ot sākhavai otram khangatha̱li zangkashapa saikora.
Tharmathengmeikap kaje ot kazip khavai kachonshimwui alungli Kohathwui naomayarabingna sāki kaji hina.
Rāmrah honguki kaji tharan Aaron kala naomayarabingna alungli zangda chonrānwui mairār chi khuitāra, kala tuingashitwui oko chili fakhamra;
chiwui thili athumna chiwui atungli mehui eina fakhamda khamayinga kachon eina fakhamra; kala thingphānbing chi phonkhuira.

Kala ngaso khami khamui tabletungli khamayinga kachon fakhamlaga chiwuitungli khongphei-khongpang, nganamkaphā yurwui khongpheibing, koklui kala ra̱shakchigat khavai khorām haira; kala chili lāngda chiwui atungli haivaiching kaji khamui chi haira.
Chiwui thili athumna otbingwitungli hungshi kahai kachon farorlaga mehui eina fakakham kala thingphānbing chili phonra.
Kala athumna thaohmeiwui thaomeishong, thaomeibing, chiwui akhongbing, kala chiwui thao sangkhavai akhong saikora chi khamayinga kachon eina fakhamra.
Kala khorkhong saikora fakham khavai mehui akhali sangda phungkhavai akom chili sangra.
Kala athumna sināwui hanphut chi khamayinga kachon eina fakhamlaga mehui eina fakhamda thingphānbing chi phonra.
katharapamli otram khangatha̱li kasing khorkhong saikora khuilaga kachon khamayinga akhali otbing chi sangda mehui eina fakhamlu, kala phungkhavai akom chili sanghaira.
Kala athumna hanphutwui hotla chi khuilaga hungkhamaying kachon eina fakhamhaora;

kala athumna hanphut chiwuitungli shikachin thongthāng saikora chiya: meiyaikhongbing, marik-kapei, kala kapeibing, kala khongsai, hanphutwui akhongbing saikora haira; kala mehui eina fakhamhaida thingphānbing chi phonra.

Kala Aaron eina naomayarabingna katharapam eina chiwui thongthāngbing chi shaksākuphaida athum zatuki kaji tharan Kohathwui naomayarabingna chi ngava̱ra, kha athumna kathara otbing chili masāza̱paimara, kaja athum thipaishina. Kohathwui naomayarabingna khuiphungki kaji kazip khavai kachonshimwui otbing chi hina.

Kala pāngmon, Aaronwui naomayara Eleazarna thaomeiwui thao, nganamkaphā thao, chigatching kaji tharāzāt kachigat, neomi khavai thao, tabernacle eina chiwui alungli khalei ot saikora, kala katharapam eina chiwui khorkhongbing saikora yangra.
“Kohath shangwui shimkurbing Leviwui eina mashimān ngasaklu,
kha athumli hithāda sālu, kaja athumna katharapamli kazang chitharan vānganaida mathila ringra: Aaron kala naomayarabingna alungli zangda athum kachiva̱wui otsin eina otphunli kapangsangmilu,
kha athumna alungli zangda kathara otbing chili mik khayipkha eina tangda mayangpaimana, chithākha thira.”
Gershonwui naomayarabingla mashing shānkhuilu, athumwui shimkhur kala avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda;
zingkum thumrā eina thuilaga chiwui atung kum hangphangā rarkahaiwui alungli khaleibing, kazip khavai kachonshimlungli otram khangatha̱li zangkashap saikora mishān shānkhuilu.
Hi Gershon shimkhurwui otngarut, kala otram khangatha̱ kala athumwui otphunbingna:
athumna tabernaclewui chonrānbing, kala kazip khavai kachonshim eina chiwui chonrān, matungmeikapta fakham khavai mehui kala kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongwui chonrān phungra,

kala yāngkhupwui kangruitā khavaibing, tabernacle eina hanphutli kuimareida khalei yāngkhupwui zangkhavai ngaveiwui chonrān, chiwui khara̱bing kala chiwui otli shikachin saikora phungra; kala athumna chiwui sarān-varān ot saikora athumna sāra.
Gershonwui naomayarabingna otram khangatha̱ saikora Aaron eina anaomayarabingwui kakaso athishurda athumna sāki kaji otbing chi sāra; athumna sāki kaji otngarutbing chi nana mira.
Hi Gershonshi shimkhurwui naomayarabingna kazip khavai kachonshimli sāki kaji athumwui otngarutbingna, athumwuitungli pāngmon Aaronwui naomayara Ithamarna yangra.
Kha Merariwui naomayarabingwui vanga, nana athumwui shimkhurbing kala avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda shānkhuilu;
zingkum thumrā eina thuilaga kum hangphangā rarkahai, athum kachiva̱ kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram khangatha̱li zangshapabing nana ava̱va̱ eina shānkhuilu.
Kala athumna kazip khavai kachonshimli otram khangatha̱li tongda sāki kaji chiya: taberbaclewui akombing kaja chiwui khamakhar pakra̱bing eina apheibing,
kala yāngkhup kuimareida khalei pakra̱bing eina apheibing, kala thingshun eina chiwui khara̱bing kala chili shikachin ot saikora athumna phungra; kala nana athumna phungki kaji otmingbing chitheira.
Hi pāngmon Aaronwui naomayara Ithamarwui azingli Merarishi shangna kazip khavai kachonshimli sāki kaji otngarutbingna.
zingkum thumrā eina thuilaga kum hangphangāwui alungli khaleibing kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram khangatha̱li zangshapabing ava̱va̱ eina shānkhuiya.
Kala athumwui shang kala shimkhurwui mi thingkhani shāshini kala hangphangā shānkhui.
na Mosesli kaso kahai athishurda Moses eina Aaronna shānlaga Kohathnaobing shangwui eina kazip khavai kachonshimli otram khangatha̱li zangkashapabing hiyākhana.
Gershonwui naomayarabingwui mashing, athumwui shangbing, kala avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda,
zingkum thumrāwui eina thuida hangphangā rarkahaiwui alungli khaleibing, kazip khavai kachonshimli otram khangatha̱li zangkashap mi kachiva̱ ava̱va̱ eina shānkhuilaga,
ashi shang kala avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda mi thingkhani shātharuk kala thumrāna.
na kaso kahai athishurda Moses eina Aaronna shānlaga Gershonwui naomayarabing shangwui eina kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram khangatha̱li zangkashapabing hiyākhana.
Merariwui naomayarabingwui mashing, athumwui shimkhurbing kala athum avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda,
zingkum thumrā eina haophoklaga hangphangā kākahaiwui alungli khaleibing kazip khavai kachonshimli otram khangatha̱li zangkashapa mi kachiva̱ ava̱va̱ eina shānkhuilaga,
ashi shangwui mashing thing kathum shākhanina.
na Mosesli kaso kahai athishurda Moses eina Aaronna shānlaga Merari shangwui naomayarabing hiyākhana.
Moses eina Aaron kala Israelwui kathānabingna Levibingwui shimkhur kala athumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlak athishurda,
zingkum thumrāwui eina haophoklaga kum hangphangāwui alungli khaleibing, yarui otsakli zangshapa kala kazip khavai kachonshimli otram ngatha̱kashapa mi kachiva̱ ava̱va̱ eina shānkhuilaga,
ashi shangwui mashing thing chishat shāphangā kala hangchishatna.
na Mosesli kaso kahai athishurda ashi mi ava̱va̱li kachichāwui otngarut, otram lah ot phungkazat athumli kapangsanga; hithāda
“Israelwui mibingli kasolu kaja, phārrei kakazā, kala zaizai khangaya̱ mi kachiva̱, kala kathingun saza̱da sāmakhao kahai mi kachiva̱ rāmrahwui eina ayarli khuishokhaolu.
Nathumna mayarnaola kala sha̱naola khaninili rāmrahwui ayarli haira, chiya ina ngasomida khalei athumwui rāmrah masākhamāng khavaina.”
Chithāda sāda Israelwui mibingna athumli rāmrahwui ayarli kashamshokhaowa;
“Israelwui mibingli hānglu, mayarnao nilala sha̱nao nilala
ana morei sākahai chi ana hāngphatra; kala ana sāyon kahai chiwui aman peida mira, khum kaphangāla mataisangda ana sayon kahai mipa chili mira.
Kha kalikhada khayon chiwui vang runkāda samphangki kaji sāza̱ kahaipawui athei-asā maleisaakha, khayonwui vang runkakā chi
Kala kachigat ot kachiva̱, Israel mibingwui khuikharā kathara ot pāngmonli khuikharābing chi awui ngasāra;
kala mi ava̱va̱wui kathara ot khuikharā chi awui ngasāra; kachikathā mina pāngmonli khamimi chi awui ngasāra.”
Kala
Israelwui mibingli hānglu, kalikhada mi akhawui preiva̱na ngaruihaida ali ning makatong otsak sahairakha,

kalikha mi khangatei akhana sha̱nao chili mathangda ngasopihailaga gaharawui maiyanwui eina ngathumhaida, preiva̱ china akhalatta sākhamānghailala matheithurakha, kala awuitungli shākhi maleiakha, otsak atamchangli matukkhuithukada;
kala kalikha, khalatta sāmakhao kahai apreiva̱ chili gaharana ningli ningkhamaong rāpeida, lah kalikha apreiva̱ akhalattana masākhamānglala yuikashi gaharali raza̱da ningmaonghaiakha;

mipa china apreiva̱li pāngmonwuili khuivāra, kala preiva̱wui vang chigat khangayi, lang, mathir khuilui akhawui akhum katharāwui akha khuirāra, ana hiwuitungli thao maheirormara, kala frankincensela masangpaimara, kaja hiya ningkhamaongwui tharāzātchigatna, phaningkhaungwui tharāzāt kachigatna, khayonkhamāng phaningung khangasakna.
Kala pāngmon china preiva̱̱ chili rānganai ngasakta
kala pāngmon china kathara tara̱ ngaleihamwui eina sokkhuira, kala tabernacle shimlungwui chifa kateokha mitkhuilaga tara̱ chili sangra.
Kala pāngmon china preiva̱ chili

Chiwui thili pāngmon china preiva̱ chili shākhi sāngasakta hāngra: “Nagahara leilaga nana mi khangateili mangasoakha, kala nana kalikhada masāmakhaoakha, khonkashi khuikharā kakhā tara̱ hiwui eina ningkhānhaolu.
Kha nagaharawui azingli leilaga nana ngaruithuihaida nakhalatta sākhamāngakha, kala nagahara maningla khangatei mina nali ngasohaiakha,
(pāngmon china preiva̱ chili khonkashiwui shākhi sāngasakta hāngra)
khonkashi khuikharā tara̱ hina nawukli zangda naphasā worranu kala nakhaishāng shuitāhaoranu.”
Chieina sha̱nao china, “Amen, Amen” da hāngra.
“Chiwui thili pāngmon china khonkashibing hi lairik akhali kapilaga kakhā tara̱ chili pheosangra;
kala khonkashi khuirā khangasaka kakhā tara̱ chi ana sha̱nao chili mangngasakra, kala tara̱ chi awukli kazang eina wuk makeishunhaora.
Chieina pāngmon china ningkhamaongwui tharāzāt kachigat chi sha̱nao chiwui pāng eina khuida tharāzāt kachigat chi
kala pāngmon china tharāzāt kachigat chi panghomkha, phaningung khavai yar sāda khuilaga hanphuttungli riktāra, chiwui thili preiva̱ chili ana tara̱ chi mangngasakra,

kala ana tara̱ chi ali mang ngasakhailaga, chiwui thili kalikhada akhalatta sākhamānghaisāda agaharali ningmakatonga otsak sahaisaakha, khonkashi khuirā khangasak tara̱ chi awukli zangda china wuk makeihaora, kala aphasā worshokra, kala akhaishāngla shuitāhaora, kala awui mibingwui alungli preiva̱ chi ningkakachaiya ngasāra.
Kha apreiva̱ china akhalatta masākhamāngla tharda leisakha ali khikha mathāmara kala naola pharāra.
“Hi agahara leilaga ngaruithuihaida sākhamāng kahai chitharan preiva̱li ningkhamaongwui bichar sākhavai ainna,
lah mi akhali ningkhamaong leida, kala apreiva̱li ningmaonghaiakha; sha̱nao chili
Mayarali khayonkhamāng maleimara, kha sha̱naopava̱na awui khayonkhamāng phungki kajina.”
Kala
“Israelwui mibingli hānglu, kachikathā mayarnao nilala sha̱nao nilala
ana khorla kala maripkapaiya zamla khāmranu; drakhātheiwui eina surkakhui atheira̱; kala drakhāra̱ mamangpaimana, kala drakhāthei khanganao, lah akaola mashaipaimana.
Awui ngashit kahai atam peida drakhārongwui eina samkaphang saikora athā, lah akor eina tangda mashaipaimana.
“Awui ngashit kahai atam peida awui kuili kuisighai maparpaimana;
Avāva̱ ranu, ava̱va̱ ranu, agato ranu, lah azarva̱ ranu, thihailala mavāpaimara; athumwui vang eina masāmakhaopaimana, kaja ava Vareli chigatchao kahai chi awui kuitungli khaleina.
Awui chigatchao kahai atam peida ava
“Kashuirak eina awui ngalemli kachikathā mi akha thihaida awui tharchigat kahai kuisam sākhamāng ngasakhaiakha, awui tharki kaji zimikshothang kui sira; kashinethang ana kui sitāra.
Kachishatathang ana nāsha̱nao, lah kha̱na̱nao kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli pangmonli khuirāmira,

kala suiham chigatwui vang akha kala rikkatā kachigatwui vang akha da pāngmon china chigatmira, kala awui vang chamnākhami sāra, kaja kathingun chiwui vang eina a morei sākahaina, chieina chithang awui kui tharchigatra,
kala mi china
Kala ana
kala khawok makazang khamui luk akha, mathir eina thao manātlaga sākakhui khamui, kala thao neokahai katheng khamui, kala athumwui tharāzātchigat eina ra̱shakchigat chi
“Kala pāngmon china chi
kala ana
Kala Nazirite china awui tharchigat kahai kui chi kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongli sira, kala chigat kahai kuisam chi khuilaga ningyatchigat sākhavaiwui azingli khalei meili horsangra.

“Kala pāngmon china hāngkahai yaovāwui asai, kala lukwui eina khawok makazang khamui akha, thao neokahai katheng khamui akha da khuilaga tharchigatta kui sitā kahaiwui thili Naziritepawui pāngli sangmira,
kala pāngmon china
“Hi khangashit kasaa Naziritewui ainna. Nazirite akha sāda ana khangashit athishurda ana tuingashit kakhui athishurda
Aaron eina awui naomayarabingli hānglu,
nathum Israelwui mibingli hithāda somira:
athumli nathumna hāngra.
kala nathumli lumashanmiranu.
kala nathumli chingrihai ngasakranu.
“Chithāda sāda athumna iwui ming Israel mibingwuitungli haira,
kala ina athumli somira.”
Mosesna tabernacle khaningkāda chiwui thongthāngbing saikora thao neolaga tharchigatta, kala hanphut chiwui khorkhongbing saikora thao neolaga tharchikatthang,
Israel mibingwui kathānabing, athum avāva̱ ngarābingwui shimlakwui kathānabing, shangwui kathānabing, mi mashing shānkhui kahaibingwuitungli khayangabing;
athumna
Chieina
“Otbing chi khuida kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram khangatha̱li shichin khavai Levishili mi ava̱va̱wui otngarut athishurda mihaolu.”
Chieina Mosesna seigaribing kala mukkābing chi khuilaga Levishili mihaowa.
Seigari khani kala mukkā mati ana Gershonshi naomayarabingli, athumwui otngarut athishurda mihaowa;
kala seigari mati kala mukkā chishat, pāngmon Aaronwui nao Ithamarna khayanga Merariwui naomayarabingli, athumwui otngarut athishurda mihaowa.
Kha ana Kohathwui naomayarabingli khikha mamimana, kachiwui vang jilaga ashina kathara otbing singda yārtui eina khangava̱ ot sai,
kala kathānabingna hanphut chi thao neomithang dharkatwui vang kachigat miya; kala kathānabingwui kachigat chi hanphutwui mangāli khuirai.
Chieina
Kharethang chigatrikapki kaje chi Judah shangwui Amminadabwui naomayara Nahshonna;

kala ana shekel shākha kala thumrā kharit lupāsāwui khongphei akha, shekel hangshini kharit lupāsāwui khongsai akha, khanini chi kathara shimwui shekelchākwui athishurda zatra, tharāzātchigatwui vang thao khamanāt manaktak kahai mathirna khanini chi pemngasaka;
nganamkaphā otna pemting kahai shekel tharā kharit sinā khongphei akha;
rikkatā chigatwui vang mukkānao akha, yaovā akha kala kumkha kākahai yaovānao akha;
suiham chigatwui vāng mevā akha;
kala ningyatchigatwui vāng mukkā khani, yaovā phangā, mevā phangā, kala kumkha kākahai yaovānao phangā. Hi Amminadabwui naomayara Nashonwui kachigatna.

kala ningyatchigatwui vang mukkā khani, yaovā phangā, kala kumkha kākahai yaovānao phangā chigata. Hi Zuarwui naomayara Nethanelwui kachigatna.

nganamkaphāna pemting kahai shekel tharā kharit sinā khongphei akha;

suihamchigatwui vang mevā akha;

Hanphut chi dharkat sāda chi thao neomithanghon, Israelwui kathānabingna kachigatbing chi hina: lupāsāwui khongphei tharāda khani, lupāsāwui khongsai tharāda khani, sinā khongphei tharāda khani;
lupāsāwui khongphei ava̱va̱ shekel shākha kala thumrā, kala lupā khongsaina hangshini, kathara shimwui shekelchākwui athishurda lupāsāwui akhongbing saikora shekel thingkhani shāmati rita;
nganamkaphā thao pemting kahai eina sinā khongphei tharāda khani saikora chi kathara shimwui shekelchākwui athishurda shekel shākha kala maga̱ rita,
tharāzātchigat eina ngasoda rikkatā kachigat sākhavai sāyur saikora mukkā tharāda khani, yaovā tharāda khani, kumkha kākahai yaovānao tharāda khani; kala suihamchigatwui vang mevā tharāda khanina;

kala ningyatchigatwui vang sha̱kei katonga mukkā maga̱da mati, yaovā hangtharuk, mevā hangtharuk, kala zingkum akha kākahai yaovānao hangtharuk. Hibing hi thao neomihailaga dharkat sāthang hanphutli kachigatna.
Kala Mosesna
“Aaronli hānglu, nana thaomei chi shārkā kahai eina, thaomei shini china thaomeishong chiwui mangāli kahor mira.”
Chieina Aaronna chithāda sai;
Kala thaomeishong chi hithāda sai, apam eina thuilaga aphāng kashungda sinā eina shaokhui; aphei eina thuida thaomei kāshungda sinā eina shaokhui,
Kala
“Levinaobingli Israel mibingwui eina khuishokta athumli tharngasaklu.
Kala nana athumli hithāda tharngasaklu: pheomi khavaiwui tara̱ chieina athumli kasirrorlu, chiwui thili phasā katonga kuisighai eina sitālu, kala kashankachon ngasa̱da athum khalatta tharngasaklu.
Chiwui thili athumna mukkānao akha kala tharāzātchigatwui vang manaktak kahai mathir thao manātlaga khuirāranu, kala nana khangatei mukkānao akhala suiham chigatwui vang khuirāra.
Kala nana Levinaobingli Israel ashangva̱na kazipta leilakha kazip khavai kachonshimli khuirāra.
Nana Levinaobingli
kala Aaronna Levinaobingli chi Israelwui khayitchigat sāda
Chiwui thili Levinaobingna mukkā khani chiwui kuili pāng parra, kala nana akha chi suihamchigatwui vang kala akhapāna rikkatā kachigatwui vang
“Kala nana Levinaobing chi Aaron eina awui naomayarabingwui azingli leingasakta athum chi khayitchigat sāda
Hithāda sāda nana Levinaobingli Israel mibingwui eina ngatei ngasakra, kala Levinaobing iwui ngasāra.
Kala nana athumli tharmida kala khayitchigat sāda chigat kahaiwui thili Levinaobingna kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram khangatha̱li zangpaira.
Kaja athum Israel mibingwui eina ningtongda ili michao kahaina; naopam shokaphok Israelnaobingwui naochizaibing saikorawui mahut ina Levinaobingli ikhalattawui vang khuikahaina.
Kaja Israel mibingwui pharākhare saikora iwuina; mila, sha̱keila iwuisera; Egypt ngaleili pharākhare katonga sāthatthangwui eina thuida athumli ina ikhalattawui vang tharchigat kahaina,
kala ina Israel mibingwui naochizaibingwui mahut Levinaobingli kakhuina.

Kala Levinaobingli Israel mibingwui eina Aaron eina awui naomayarabingli lemmet sāda ina mikahaina, kala athumna kazip khavai kachonshimli Israelnaobingwui vang otram ngatha̱ra, kala Israelnaobingwui vang pheomi khavai, chithāda sāda Israel mibingna katharapamli rākhanganai chitharan kalākashi mashokmara.”
Chithāda Moses, Aaron kala Israel ashangva̱na Mosesli
Kala Levinaobingna athum moreiwui eina athum khalatta sāmathākhui kala athumwui kashankachonbing ngasa̱sera; chieina Aaronna athumli khayitchigat sāda
Chiwui vang Levinaobingna Aaron eina anaomayarabingwui azingli kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram angatha̱uwa. Levinaobingwui pongli
Kala
“Levinaobingna hithāda ot sāra; zingkum maga̱da phangā kāshung kahaiwui eina thuida chiwui atungbing, kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram khangatha̱li zangra;
kala zingkum hangphangā kākahai saikora otpamwui eina ngasāmhaora kala athum otram mangatha̱luimara.
Kha kazip khavai kachonshimli otram khangatha̱li achinā ngarāli ngachonpai, kala athum khalatta otphunli mazangpaimara. Hithāda nana Levinaobingli otngarutbing ngayarkhamili chithāda sāra.”
“Israelwui mibingna langchin sākahai atam chili makānkhami phanit mayonra.
Kachāng hiwui tharāda khamatethang ngazin, langchin sākahai atamli shiyan-chikan kala sharphahor mikahai athishurda nathumna mayonra.”
Chieina Mosesna Israelwui mibingli makānkhami phanit mayon khavai hāngchithei.
Chithāda athumna kachāng kharewui tharāda khamatethang ngazin Sinai lamhāngli makānkhami phanit mayona;
Chitharan kathingun saza̱haida, chithang makānkhami phanit mamayonkapai mi kaikha leisai; kala athumna chithang Moses eina Aaronwui mangāli rai;
kala mibing china ali hānga, “Ithum kathingun saza̱da sāmakhaohaira; chiwui vang eina ithum Israelwui mibing khangateili ngasoda langchin sākahai zimiksholi
Mosesna athumli hānga, “Ngarailu,
Israelwui mibingli hānglu, kalikha nathum mi akhana, lah nathumwui ara̱-azāna kathingun saza̱da sāmakhaohaiakha, lah kha̱ram katāli leisaakha ana
Kachāng kakhanewui tharāda khamatethang ngazin athumna mayonra; athumna khawok makazang khamui kala kakhā hannā eina ngasoda shaira.
Ngathor eina tangda mataipaimara, ara̱kui akhala matek ngasakmara, athumna mayonki kaji makānkhami phanitwui ningkhami athishurda athumna mayonra.
Kha mi akhana katharla thar, kha̱ramla mavālaga makānkhami phanit mamayonakha, ali awui miyurwui eina katathaora, kaja ana langchin sākahai zimiksholi
“Kala kachikathā kha̱mi akha nathumwui alungli ngasozatta, ana
Chithāda ngashun muiyāna ngapuikhama, kala ngayā mei thāda leishona.
Kala kachonshimtungwui eina muiyā chi lankā kahai tharan, Israelwui mibingna zatphoka, kala muiyāna khangasām apam chili Israelnaobingna rāmrah sāpama.
na kakaso eina Israelnaobingna zatphoka, kala
Kalikha muiyāna tabernacletungli zimiksho sangda fakhamhailala athumna
Kachikathā atamli muiyā china khani kathumthang tabernacletungli leilala

Kachikathā atamli muiyā chi ngazin eina thuilaga ngathor eina tangda lei; kala muiyā chi ngathor lānkā kahai tharan athumna zatphoka; lah thangkha kala ngayā leifakha muiyā lānkakā tharan athumna zatphoka.
Khanithangranu kachāngkharanu, sangmeiranu tabernaclewuitungli muiyā mangatha̱la leilakha eina tangda Israelwui mibingna mazatphokla ngasāma; muiyā lānkā kahai tharan zatphoka.
wui kakaso eina athumna rāmrah sāpama, kala
“Lupāsāwui talla̱ khani sākhuilu; kala chi nathumna yaruili kathongkhui khavai kala ngathān khavai sālu.
Khani chi rip sāda kakhong tharan mi katongana kazip khavai kachonshimwui zangkhavaili rākazipra.
Kha athumna talla̱ akhamāng khongakha kathānabing, Israel shangbingwui akuibing, athum khalatta nawuili rākazipra.
Nana talla̱ chi ning khangasharkhon kakhong chitharan zingshoshongli khalei rāmrahwui mibingna shokra.
Kala nana kakhane kakhong chi ning ngashar khavai kakhong tharan azingshongli khalei rāmrahwui mibingna shokra. Atam kachida zatphokura jiakha ningkhangashar khon hi khongra.
Kha yarui kazip khavai kaho tharan, nana ningkhangasharwui makhongla sāngmeida khongra.
Pāngmon Aaronwui naomayarabingna talla̱ chi khongra. Talla̱ kakhong chi mathāhaila nathumwui thot kachida ningkhami ngasāra.
Kala nathumwui ngaleili singkakharengali rai vākasā tharan talla̱khon kala ning ngasharkhavai khongra, kaja

Nathum ringphāthangla, kala nathumwui langchin sākahai phanitlila, changwok phanitlila nathumna rikkatā kachigat kala nathumwui ningyatchigat pha̱kaphayābingwui mangāli talla̱ khongra; china nathum Varewui mangāli phaningung khavai nathumli ngachonmira:
Zingkum kakhane, kachāng kakhanewui khamaga̱thang, tuingashit oko tabernacletungwui eina muiyā chi lānkāhaowa,
kala Sinai lamhāngwui eina Israelwui mibing shang-shang eina zatphokuwa; kala Paran lamhāngli muiyā china tāngasāmhaowa.
Hi
Judah rāmrahwui philān athishurda chiwui tāng chili khalei mibingna athumwui philān eina ngasoda khare sāda zatphoka; Amminadabwui naomayara Nahshonna shangnaowui kathānana.
Kala Issachar shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli Zuarwui naomayara Nethanelna kathānana.
Kala Zebulun shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli Helonwui naomayara Eliabna kathānana.
Kala tabernacle chi pheitā kahai eina Gershonwui naomayarabing eina Merariwui naomayarabingna tabernacle chi phunglaga zatuwa.
Kala Reuben rāmrahwui philān athishurda tāng chili kapam mibingna athumwui philān eina ngasoda zatuwa; Shedeurwui naomayara Elizurna athum shangnaowui kathānana.
Kala Simeon shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli Zurishaddaiwui naomayara Shelumi-elna kathānana.
Kala Gad shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli Deuelwui naomayara Eliasapahna kathānana.
Chiwui thili Kohathnaobingna kathara otbing phunglaga zatuwa, kala athum marāshungranglakha tabernacle khaningkāhairasai.
Kala Ephraim rāmrahwui philān athishurda tāng chili kapama mibingna athumwui philān eina ngasoda zatuwa; Ammihudwui naomayara Elishamana athum shangnaowui kathānana.
Kala Manasseh shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli kathāna chi Pedahzurwui naomayara Gamalielna.
Kala Benjamin shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli kathāna chi Gideoniwui naomayara Abidanna.

Chiwui thili Dan rāmrahwui philān athishurda tāng chili kapama, rāmrah saikorawui rai ngākkhame Danwui mibingna athumwui philān eina ngasoda zatphokuwa. Kala Ammishaddaiwui naomayara Ahiezerna shang chiwui kathānana.
Kala Asher shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli kathāna chi Okhranwui naomayara Pagielna.
Kala Naphtali shangwui mi ashangva̱ chiwuitungli kathāna chi Enanwui naomayara Ahirana.
Hithāda Israelwui mibingna shang-shangwui athishurda maron-maron eina zatphokuwa.
Kala Mosesna, awova̱ Midianpa, Reuelwui naomayara Hobabli hānga, “
Kha ana ngahānkai, “I mavāmara, iram ngaleili kala iwui theisābingli latunghaora.”
Kala Mosesna hānga, “Ithumwui eina mathuimialu da ina kapona; kaja ithum kathāda lamhāngli rāmrah sāpamrakhala kaji nana katheina, kala nana ithumli thānra.
Nana ithumli ngasovaakha
Chiwui thili athumna
Kala athumna rāmrahwui eina zatphok kachida
Kala oko china vangasām kajida ana hānga, “Mashānkharar Israelnao thingthingwuili hanunglu, O
Kala mibingna athumwui kachotkachāngwui vang
Chieina athumna Mosesli khangakao eina Mosesna
Chiwui vang eina apam chiwui ming Taberah phokmi, kaja
Ithumna Egyptli leilakha khalem eina khaih kashai chi phaningunga, karoptheibing, khaimaithei, shomri, pyas, janam shaisai;
kha ara ithumwui yāng pangshap thenghaira, kala manna hi maningla khangatei maleithura.”
Mibingna chi ngamuikhuilaga jakrili takka, lah shimkhurli rungkhui, kala ham eina hanglaga khamui sākhui, kala shaiakha thao eina khareikakhui khamui tākamhai.
Rāmrahli ngayāshong ikra̱ katā tharan, chili ngasoda manna tai.
Mosesna shimkhur katongawui mi kachiva̱ kachichāshiwui kachonshim khāmongli nganingda kachap chi shai, kala
Mosesna
Mi saikora hi ina vaikhuila? Athumli ina pharākhuida nana ili ‘Na̱ khamanga naoli kaphung thāda,’ nana athumwui avāva̱ ngarāli ngashit kahai ngalei chili phungvālu kajila?”
Mi saikora hili ina kachili sā akhuida mirakhala? Kaja athumna, “Ithumli sā shaikhavai milu” da iwui mangāli chapta hānghaira.
Mi saikora hili imāngna maphungrarmara, otphun hi iwui vang ritnai.
Nana ili hithāda sāra jiakha ili sāthatlakhaolu, nana ili lumashanakha iwui sitkhamahui hi I matheiluingaiga.
Chieina
Chieina ina nali chili tāngazekra; kala nawui eina ina manglā kakhuilaga athumli sangmira, chieina athumnala mibingwui kachot chi nali phungrumra, namāngna maphungluimara.
Kala mibingli hithāda hānglu, ‘Akhamawui vang nathum khalatta tharchigatlu; nathum sā shaira. Kaja
Nathumna thangkha, lah khanithang, phangāthang, tharāthang, maga̱ thangmāng shaiki kaji maningmana,
kha nganamkashina mamalongairanglakha eina tangda kachāng peida shaira, kaja nathumli khangayur
Kha Mosesna hānga, “Ina thānkazat mibing hi mashing thingshātharukna; laga nana ‘Ina athumwui shaikhavai sā mira, chieina athumna kachāngkha peida shaira!’ da hānga.
Athumli ngarin khavai seishang, yaoshang taithatmirala? Lha athumli ngarin khavai shamadruwui khai katonga kazipkhuirala?”
Chieina
Chieina Mosesna
Chieina
Athumwui ngachaili mi khani, akhana Eldad kala akhapā Meldad hoda mingchanlala kachonshimli marāla rāmrahli pamhaowa, kala manglā chi anilila rāzangda anila rāmrahli marāna.
Chieina yaronnao akhana Mosesli ngasamvāda ahānga, “Eldad eina Meldad rāmrahli marānpamdalei.”
Kala chi shāda Nunwui naomayara Mosesli otram ngathakhame, kapangkhui kahaiya Joshuana hānga, “Iwui amei Moses, anili khāmhaolu.”
Kha Mosesna ali hānga, “Iwui vang eina na mikpaishihaola?
Chieina Moses kala khararnaobing chi rāmrahli unghaowa.
Kala
Kala mibingna chithang ngashun, ngayā kala akhama kathā langpongda kongkuibing chi ngamuikhui; teomeikapta ngamuikakhuiapana homer tharā kazipkhuiya; kala athumwui rāmrah kuimareida chi ungkhorhai.
Sā chi sheida mamayuitāranglakha,
Chiwui vang eina apam chiwui aming Kibroth-hattaavah phokmi, kaja sā ningchangkhai kahaibing chili chifaya.
Kibroth-hattaavahwui eina mibingna zatphokta Hazerothli vai; kala athumna Hazerothli angasāma.
Mosesna Cush sha̱nao akha khangakum chiwui vang, Mariam eina Aaronna makhamayā tui matuiya, kaja ana Cush miyurwui sha̱naoli ngakuma.
Kala anina hānga, “
Moses malung nimlaka. Okathuiwui mi saikorali malung nimkhamei mina.
Kala kashuirak eina
Kala
Ana hānga, “Iwui tuibing nganālu: nathumwui alungli marānkhame leiakha
Iwui rao Mosesli chi maningmana, ale iwui shim katonga chisin kahaina.
Ale ina mai eina mai yangngasungda tharlak eina khangazekna, makashā tui eina khangazek maningmana; kala ana
Kala
kala muiyā chi kachonshimtungwui eina thuikhaleoda, yanglu, Mariamli phārrei pemhaowa, horam thāda charshihaowa. Aaronna Mariamli yangkhaung eina yanglu, a phārrei pemhaowa.
Kala Aaronna Mosesli hānga, “O, ishāmei, iniwui mangma̱sak kala morei sākahai chiwui vang inili tandi mamialu.
Sha̱nao hili ava̱wui wuk eina phasā tangkhai shaihailaga pharākatā mathā ngasakalu.”
Chieina Mosesna
Kha
Chiwui vang eina Mariamli shinithang rāmrahwui ayarli vanarhaowa, kala ali makhuiungranglakha eina tangda mibingna mazatmana.
Chiwui thili athumna Hazerothwui eina zatphoklaga Paranwui lamhāngli rāmrah vasāpama.
“Ina Israelwui mibingli miki kaji ngalei chi vāra̱yang khavai mi chihovālu; avāva̱ ngarāwui shang-shang eina kathāna ava̱va̱ chiholu.”
Chieina Mosesna
Kala hi athumwui amingbingna: Reuben shangwui eina Zaccurwui naomayara Shammu-a;
Simeon shangwui eina Horiwui naomayara Shaphat;
Judah shangwui eina Jephunnehwui naomayara Caleb;
Issachar shangwui eina Josephwui naomayara Igal;
Ephraim shangwui eina Nunwui naomayara Hoshea;
Benjamin shangwui eina Raphuwui naomayara Palti;
Zebulun shangwui eina Sodiwui naomayara Gaddiel;
Josephwui (chiya Manassehwui shang eina) shangwui eina Susiwui naomayara Gaddi;
Dan shangwui eina Gemalliwui naomayara Ammiel;
Asher shangwui eina Michaelwui naomayara Sethur;
Naphtali shangwui eina Vophsiwui naomayara Nahbi;
Gad shangwui eina Machiwui naomayara Geuel;
Hibing hi Mosesna ngalei chili vāra̱yang khavai chihokashoka mibingwui amingbingna: kala Mosesna Nunwui naomayara Hosheali Joshua da aming ngacheimihaowa.
Canaan ngalei ara̱yangkhui khavai Mosesna athumli chihoda hānga, “Negeb kānshanglu kala phungrei ram chili kālu,
kala ngalei chi kathakhala kaji vāyanglu, mibing chi pangda leika, ngazanda lei; chungka teo,
kala athumna somda khalei ngalei chi mathāka, zakshi, kala keinung chi rāmrahka, raipankhala,

lah ngalei chi chāmka, shāng, kala chili ngahong leika, lah ngalei tumka kathakhala kaji ayanglu. Malungpinglu, kala ngalei chiwui athei kakhuiunglu.” Chitharan atamli drakhāthei minphokkhare atam sāsai.
Athumna vāda Zinwui lamhāng eina thuilaga Hamath zangkhavai ngalemli khalei Rehob vāshungda ara̱yangkhui.
Athumna Negeb shanglaga Hebronli vai; kala Anakwui ara̱-azā kapam Ahiman, Sheshai, Talmai, chili leisai. (Hebron hiya Egyptwui Zoanli zingkum shini rida sakā kahaina).
Chiwui thili athumna Eshcolwui tampākli ungda drakhāthei aphāng akhali kakā asur akha shātkhui, kala thingphān sangda mi khanina ngava̱zata; kala kabothei eina khaorātheila khuiya.
Chiwui vang eina apam chili Eshcolwui tampāk da phokmi, kaja drakhāthei asur akha chi Israelwui mibingna chili shātkhui.
Zimiksho hangmatithang kākashung eina athumna latunga.
Kala athumna Moses, Aaron kala Kadeshli khalei Paran lamhāngli pamkasā Israelwui ashangva̱wuili ungnga. Athumna yarui ashangva̱li pao chi unghānga, kala ngalei chiwui atheila ungchithei.
Kala athumna Mosesli hānga, “Nana ithumli kachiho ngalei chili vai; ngalei chi seina̱ eina khuira̱ longa, kala hi chiwui atheina.
Chithālala ngalei chili kasombing chi panga, kala keinung chi raipan sāda hakmahālaka; chili lāngda ithumna Anakwui ara̱-azāla chili thei.
Amaleknaobingna Negebwui ngaleili somda lei; Hitnaobing, Jebusnaobing kala Amornaobing phungreiramli pama, kala Canaannaobingna shamadrushong kala Jordan ngaheivāk pamdalei.”
Kha Calebna Moseswui mangāli khalei mibingli chingrihai ngasakta hānga, “Ithum arui ngalāngda vāusa kala angapaikhuisa; kaja ithumna yuishaphalungra.”
Chieina ali ngasokhavā mi akhana hānga, “Ithum mibing chili mangasungrarmara, kaja athum ithumli pangmei.”
Chiwui vang eina athumna akhayang ngalei chiwui pao Israel mibingli kapikta unghānga, “Ithumna akhayang ngalei chiya mi mapānkapai ramna, chiwui mibingwui asho-arep kahak hāngkhavai maleimana.
Kala apam chili Nephilnao, kaja Anakwui ara̱-azā kachungkha pamda lei; athumwui mangāli ithum khaoh kathāna, kala athumnala ithumli khaoh thāda theida leira.”
Chiwui thili chithang ngayā yarui ashangva̱na akhon panglāk eina shokta chapngachai.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Moses eina Aaronwuitungli kharopa; yarui ashangva̱na anili hānga, “Ithum Egypt ngaleili lah lamhāng hili thihaisasi kaje phameira!
Kala athum akha eina akha hāngngaroka, “Ithum raikhoka akha kapangkhuilaga Egyptli latunghaosa.”
Chiwui thili Moses eina Aaronna Israel katongawui mangāli mai mashunzanga,
kala Canaan akhayangli kazanga Nunwui nao Joshua eina Jephunehwui nao Calebna kachon serkhākta Israel ashangva̱li hānga,
“Ithumna vākhayang ngalei chi mathalak kahai ngaleina.
na ithumli ningyāng ungakha, ana ithumli ngalei chili thānzangda seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalonga apam chi ithumli mira.
Kha yarui ashangva̱na anili ngalunggui eina horthat khavai hānga. Chieina
Ina athumli kazātkashi za̱ngasakra kala shimān ngasakhaora, kala athumli hakkhamei kala pangkhamei yur akha ina nawui eina sākhuira.”
kala athumna ngalei hili pānda khaleibingli hānghaora. Athumna shāhaira, kaja O
Ara nana mibing hili thitkha sāngasakhaiakha, nawui mingkhamayāng shākahai miyurbingna,
Chieina arui, ina nali seihā kasāna, nana ngashit kahai thāda

Nawui hakkhamahā makhangachei leikashi chiwui athishurda, kala mibing hili Egyptwui eina thuilaga arui rāshungda pheomichingda khalei chiwui athishurda ina poli, mibing hiwui khayonkhamāng kapheomilu.”
Chieina
kha kachangkhat eina, I leilakha eina tangda, kala okathui katonga hi
iwui tekhamatei kala khudam Egyptli kala lamhāngli ina chithei kahai chi theilala ili tharā shida chāng yangda kala iwui tui manganāsang thuda,
avāva̱ ngarāli ina ngashit kahai ngalei chi matheimara; kala ili ningkakachaibingna ngalei chi kathei masamphangmara.
Kha iwui rao Calebna ngateihang kahai ning leida ili shurchao kajiwui vang, ana ayang kahai ngalei chili ina zangngasakra, kala awui ara̱-azāna ngalei chi samphangra.
Ara tampāk chili Amaleknaobing eina Canaannaobing pamhaoda, akhama ngareikhuida Red Sea shongfa shurda lamhāngvāk vaulu.”
“Karankha makhayā yarui ashangva̱ hina iwuitungli ngurngur matuira? Israel mibingna iwuitungli ngurngur khamatui saikora ina shāhaira.
Athumli hānglu, ‘I leilakha eina tangda’ da
Nathumwui kathingun lamhāng hili pitāra; mishānli shānnar kahai nathum saikora kum maga̱ eina thuida chiwui atungbing iwuitungli kakharopbing,
Jephunnehwui naomayara Caleb eina Nunwui naomayara Joshua maningla khangatei khipākha ina nathumli pamngasakra da ngashit kahai ngalei chili mazangmara.
Kha nathumwui ara̱-azā, nathumna sāshai ngasāhaora da kahānga, naongarābing ina khuizangda nathumna horkahai ngalei chi athumna theira.
Kha nathumva, nathumwui kathingun lamhāng hili pitāra.
Kala nathum lamhāngli mathingakanranglakha eina tangda, nathumwui mashitkasangwui vang nanaongarāli kum hangmati chotchāngda lamhāngli yao kahoma sāra.
Nathumna Canaanli akhayang zimiksho hangmati thangwui athishurda, thangkhana kumkha sāda, zingkum hangmati nathumwui khayonkhamāng phungra kala iwui ningyāng makhaung chi nathumna theira.’
, ina, hānghaira; makhayā katonga, chiya ili mamayāmada kazip kakhui ashangva̱li makahatlakla ina hi sāra: lamhāng hili athum ngachangchaohaora, kala chili athum thira.”
Ngalei chili ayang khavai Mosesna kachiho kala hanunglaga ngalei chili makhamayā khangui pao ungkhamiwui vang ali ashangva̱na ngurngur matui khangasaka mibing,
kala khangui pao khuikhaunga mibing chi
Kha ram chi akhayang mibingwui ngachaili Nunwui naomayara Joshua eina Jephannehwui naomayara Caleb mathila ringa.
Kala Mosesna tui chi Israelwui mibing saikorali hānga, kala mibingna sifalak eina soso chapngachai.
Kala athumna ngathorthak ngakarthuida phungreiram chili kāda hānga, “Yanglu, ithum hili lei,
Kha Mosesna hānga, “Khisāda arui nathumna
Makālu, nathumwui yangkashibingwui mangāli nathum pitāhaora, kaja

Kha

Kala nathumna rikkatā kachigatwui vang mukkā lah khangashit kasā ungshung khavai pha̱kaphayā, lah
mi china mukkali ngasoda tharāzat kachigatwui vang mathir khamanat khuilui akha akhum tharāwui khum kathum, thao lengkhor akhawui tangkhaili manatlaga chigatra,

Hithāda mukkā, lah yaova kachiva̱, lah yaovānao, lah yaonao kachigat kachiva̱li sāra.
Nana khangarān mashing athishurda, ava̱va̱wui chi mashing athishurda sāra.
li ningyāng ungkhangasak nganamkaphā mei eina kachigat hi, Israelwui mibingna hithāda sāserra.

Yarui ashangva̱ eina kha̱miwui ningkhami ngaraichada katang mavaila thot-thot kachida leichingra;
Nathum eina nathumli ngasokazat kha̱miwui vang ain akha kala sharphahor akhara.
“Israelwui mibingli hānglu, ina thānzangki kaji ngalei chili kazang chitharan,
kala ngalei chiwui kashakazā nathumna kazā chitharan, nathumna
Nathumwui hātkhui kharewui zāt eina nathumna khamui ahang eina chigatra; hi lanpumwui eina kachigat sāda mira, hithāda nathumna chigatra.
Nawui hātkhuikhare zāt eina nathumna khamui sālaga nathumwui thot kachida
na Mosesli shichinlaga kaso kahai ningkhami mithangwui eina thuilaga nathumwui thot kachida masaakha,
kala yarui ashangva̱na chi matheimada sākahai ngasasaakha, ashangva̱ saikorana mukkānao akha rikkatā kachigat sāda chigatra,
Kala pāngmon china Israel ashangva̱wui vang pheomira, kala athumli pheomihaora; khikhalajila athumwui khangui chiwui vang athumna
Kala Israel yarui ashangva̱li kala athumli ngasokazat kha̱mibingli pheomira, khikhalajila yarui ashangva̱na khayon chili zangser kahaina.
Kala Pāngmon china, matheimada khayon sakahaipa chiwui vang
Matheimada kasā mi kachiva̱ Israelwui mibingranu, kala athumli ram zatkharum kha̱mibingranu, saikorawui vang ain akhamāng leira.
Kha mi akhana sāphalungkida kasā saakha ramnaolapai lah ramkazatalapai,
Khikhalajila
Israelwui mibingna lamhāngli leilakha, athumna sabbaththang thing phāzatkasa mi akha tukkhuiya.
Kala thing kaphā katheibing china ali Moses eina Aaron kala yarui ashangva̱wui mangāli khuirai.
Athumna ali narhaiya, khikhalajila ali khisara kaji tharlak eina matheithuwa.
Chieina
Chieina yarui ashangva̱na ali rāmrah ayarli khuishokta
“Israelwui mibingli hānglu, mi kachiva̱ kachichāwui kachon mareili thot kachida chontheira̱ sāsang khavai; kala kachon mareiwui chontheira̱ chi khamaying machuwui kazaira̱ eina sāsangranu;
kala hi yanglaga nathumna
Chieina nathumna iwui kakaso saikora phaningungra, kala nathumwui Varewui mangāli tharra.
I
yarui kazip chiwui eina hākakhui, ashangva̱wui kathāna Israelwui mibing shākhani hangphangā thānkhuida Moseswui mangāli rai;
kala athumna Moses eina Aaronli makhamayāwui kazip akha khuida hānga, “Nani hennāhaira! Kaja yarui ashangva̱, athum kachiva̱ katharasera, kala
Mosesna chi kashā eina, a mai mashunzanghaowa;
kala ana Corah eina ali khangasobing chili hānga, “Ngathorshong
Hithāda sālu: Corah eina ali ngasokazata, nathum thaokhong khuirālu;
akhama
Kala Mosesna Corahli hānga, “Nganālu, Leviwui naomayarabing:
Israelwui Varena nathumli Israel yarui ashangva̱wui eina ngateida kapangkhuida ali nganai khangasak,
Ana nali kala Leviwui naomayarabing nachinā ngarāli ngasoda awui ngalemli rāngasak kahai maningmala? Laga nathumna pāngmon otpamla phāluifarala?
Chiwui vang eina nathum kala nathumli ngasokazatabing kazip kakhui hi
Chieina Mosesna Eliabwui naomayara Dathan eina Abiramli aho ngasaka, kha anina hānga, “Ini marāmara.
Nana ithumli seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalonga ngaleiwui eina hoshoklaga lamhāngli chithit khavai kala nakhalatta ithumwui wungnao sākhavai kasā hi kapai otla?
Chili lāngda nana ithumli seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalonga ngaleili mathānzangmana, lah lui kala drakhā yāmguibingla mamirarmana. Mibing hiwui mik latshokmihaoga kajila? Ini marāmara.”
Chieina Moses malungvātlakhaowa, kala
Kala Mosesna Corahli hānga, “Akhama na kala nawui mibing
nathum ava̱va̱na
Chiwui vang athum kachichāwui thaokhong khuida mei sharkāda chiwuitungli nganamkaphā yur sangda Moses eina Aaronli ngasoda kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongpheili anganinga.
Chieina Corahna anili mamayāmada yarui ashangva̱li ngasoda kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongpheili kazipa. Kala
Kala
“Nani yarui ashangva̱ hiwui eina ngateida pamlu, kaja ina mibing hili hunkhawui alungli shimān ngasakhaora.”
Anina mai mashunzangda hānga, “O Vare, manglākapai saikorawui Vare, mi akhana morei kasāwui vang yarui ashangva̱li malungvātrala?”
Kala
“Yarui ashangva̱li hānglu, Corah, Dathan kala Abiram athumna pamkhangarumwui eina thuihaolu.”
Chieina Mosesna ngakarthuida Dathan eina Abiramwuili vai, kala Israelwui khararnaobing ali shura.
Kala ana yarui ashangva̱li hānga, “Makhayā mibingwui rāmrah hiwui eina yāmulu, kala athumwui moreiwui vang nathumla mashimānrum khavai athumwui khikhanidala masāza̱alu.”
Chiwui vang athumna Corah eina Dathan kala Abiramna pamkhavaiwui eina yāmhaowa; kala Dathan eina Abiramna athumwui preiva̱ kala naomayara ngarāli ngasoda rāmrahwui khāmongli shoknganinga.
Mosesna hānga, “Hieina nathumna theira kaja
Kalikha mibing hi mikumowui khangachā mithit eina thiakha, lah kalikha athum mikumowui kalāshāt samphangakha,
Kha
Kala ana tui saikora hi matuikup kahai eina, athumwui azingli khalei ngalei chi ngachakkhaihaowa.
Kala ngaleina khamor makāda athum shimkhurwui mibing kala Corahwui mibing kala athumwui ot saikora eina ngasoda mayuisanghaowa.
Chiwui vang athum kala athumwui thongthāng saikora kharing eina Kathewui ramli vāhaowa; kala ngalei chi ngashimluida athum yarui kazipwui eina shimānhaowa.
Kala chiwui ngalemli leikasā Israelwui mibing chaplaga yāmuwa, kaja athumna hithāda hānga, “Ithumlila ngaleina mayuisangpaishina!”
Kala
Chieina
“Aaronwui naomayara pāngmon Eleazarli hānglu, thaokhong chi chuida khalei mei chiwui eina khuiranu; chiwui thili meibing chi tālāk eina chaiyānghaolu. Kaja chibing chi katharana,
morei kasābing china manglā hamlaga kasing thaokhongbing chi tharhaira; chieina chibing chi shaokhuida hanphutsham sākhuiranu; kaja hibing hi
Chieina pāngmon Eleazarna chigat kahai athumwui pithraiwui thaokhongbing chi shaokhuiluida hanphutsham sākhui,
hina Israelnaobingwui phaningung khavai sai, chiwui vang pāngmon makhaninga kala Aaronwui ara̱-azā makhaninga china
Kha akhama kathā Israel yarui ashangva̱na Moses eina Aaronwuitungli kharopta ngurngur eina hānga, “Nanina
Kala yarui ashangva̱ china Moses eina Aaronli makhamayāwui kazip kakhui tharan, athumna kazip khavai kachonshimvāk yangvai; kala yanglu muiyāna shim chili ngapuirorda
Chieina Moses eina Aaronna kazip khavai kachonshimwui mangāli vai,
kala
“Yarui ashangva̱ hiwui eina yāmulu, hunkhawui lungli ina athumli shimān ngasakhaora.” Kala anina mai mashunzanghaowa.

Kala Mosesna Aaronli hānga, “Nawui thaokhong khuida hanphutwui eina mei shārkākhuilu, kala nganamkaphā thao sanglaga yarui ashangva̱wui alungli thāklāk eina khuivālu, kala athumwui vang pheomiranu; kaja
Chieina Mosesna kahāng thāda Aaronna chi khuilaga kazip chiwui alungli vai; kala yanglu, kazātkashi chi mibingwui alungli haophokhairasai; kala ana nganamkaphā thao sangda mibingwui vang pheomi.
Kala ana kathi eina kharingbingwui ngachaili anganinga; kala mimao chi ngasāmhaowa.
Chitharan Corahwui otshot chili thikahaibing mazangla kazātkashina thikahai mi thingtharāda mati shāshinina.
Kala kazātkashi chi ngasām kahai tharan, Aaronna kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongpheili Moseswuili latunga.

“Israelwui mibingli hānglu, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlākwui kathāna mi ava̱va̱wui eina khāmshui ava̱va̱, athum avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlāk athishurda khāmshui tharāda khani khuilu. Mi kachiva̱wui aming kachichāwui khāmshuitungli kapisanglu,
kala Aaronwui aming Leviwui khāmshuitungli kapisanglu. Kaja shang ava̱va̱wui kathānawui khāmshui ava̱va̱ leira.
Chiwui thili nana khāmshuibing chi khuida ina nali samphang khavai kazip khavai kachonshimwui ningkhami oko mangāli haira.
Kala ina kapangkakhui mipāwui khāmshui chi ashon shonra; chithāda sāda Israel mibingna nawuitungli ngurngur matuiching kaji hi ina shimān ngasakhaora.”

Mosesna Israelwui mibingli kahāng eina athumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui shimlāk athishurda kathāna kachiva̱na khāmshui ava̱va̱ khuirāda katonga tharāda khanina; kala athumwui khāmshui chiwui ngachaili Aaronwui khāmshuila zanga.
Kala Mosesna khāmshui saikora chi ningkhami oko haikhavai kachonshimli
Chieina Mosesna khāmshui saikora chi Israelwui mibingli

na Mosesli hānga, “Aaronwui khāmshui chi ili makhamayābingwui machutkhui khavai sāda ningkhami oko ngalemli zanghailuishitlu, kaja ili mamayāmada athumna kakazep chi nana tangngasakhaolu; athum thipaishina.”
Chithāda Mosesna
Kala Israelwui mibingna Mosesli hānga, “Yanglu, ithum thira, sākhavai maleithura, ithum saikora sākhavai maleithura.
wui tabernacleli vākhanganai kachiva̱ thira. Ithum thiserhaorala?”
Chieina navā ngarā Levishangwui nachinā ngarābing khuirālu, chieina na eina nanaomayarabingna ningkhami kachonshimli otram ngatha̱lakha athumna ngachonra.
Athumna nali kala kachonshimli otram khangatha̱bing saikorali ngachonmira; kha athum katharapamwui khorkhongbing, lah hanphutli manganaipaimara, nala athumla thipaishina.
Athumna nali ngasoda, kala kazip khavai kachonshimwui otram saikorali ngatha̱ngachonra; kala khipākha nali marānganaipaimara.
Kala nana katharapamwui ot kala hanphutwui ot sāra, chieina Israel mibingwuitungli Varewui malungkhavāt maleimara.
Kala yanglu, ina nachinā Levishili Israel mibingwui eina phaishokhaira; athum hi nawui vang lemmetna,

Kala na eina nanaomayarabingna nali ngasoda nawui pāngmon ot kala mairārwui alungli khalei hanphutwui ot saikora yangsangmira; kala nana otram ngatha̱ra. Ina nawui pāngmonpam lemmet eina khamina, kala chili rākhanganai mi kachiva̱li thingasakra.”
Chiwui thili
Hi nathumwui vang tharmeikap kaji meiwui eina phaishok kahai otna. Athumna ili kachigat kachiva̱, tharāzāt, suihamchigat, kala khayonchigat na eina nanaomayarabingwui vang kathara otna.
Tharmeikap kajipamli nathumna chi shaiki kajina; mayarnao kachivana chi shaipaira, kaja hi nathumwui kathara otna.

“Israel mibingwui lemmetchigat, kala athumwui khayitchigat saikora hila nawuina, na kala nawui naomayarabing, naongalāva̱bing, nali ngasokapamali ina mikharān yar metchang kahaina; nawui shimkhurli kathara mi kachiva̱na chi shaipaira.
“Thao, drakhāra̱, theishiraiwui eina mathāmeikap kaji, matheikhare athumna
Athum ngaleiwui samphangkhare athei-arai
“Manglākapai pharākhare, milapai, lah sāyurlapai,
Kala kachāngkha kāhaiakha athumwui ngatangman chiya lupāsā shekel phangā, kathara shimwui shekelchākwui athishurda gerah maga̱ nana retmira.
Kha pharākhare sei, yao, kala me hibing nana mangatangkhuimara, chibing chiya katharana; nana athumwui ashee hanphuttungli kasirrorra, kala athumwui athao meili riktālaga
Kha chiwui aphibing chi nawui sāra; khayitchigat kahai asuk kala yāvākwui akhaishāng nawui sāra,
Kala
Kala arui eina thuida Israelwui mibing kazip khavai kachonshimli marānganaipaimara, kaja athum morei phungda thira.

Kha Levinaobingna kazip khavai kachonshimli otram ngatha̱da athumwui khayon chi athumna phungra; hi katang mavaila thot-thotwui shiyan-chikan ngasāra; kala Israel mibingwuilungli athumwui shimlui mavaimara.
Kaja Israelwui mibingna
Kala
“Chili lāngda nana Levinaobingli hāngra, ‘Ina nathumwui shimlui sāda Israel mibingwui eina khami tithe chi kakhui tharan, nathumna chiwui eina
Kala athumwui kachigat chili lanpumwui theishirai thāda kala drakhāthei surkhavaipamwui heiun thāda khuimira.
Hithāda nana Israel mibingwui eina samkaphang, kala nawui tithe saikora chi
Nathumli khami saikora chiwui ngachaiwui eina nana phameikap kaji kala tharmeikap kaji yar chi

Chiwui vang eina nana athumli hāngra, nathumna mathāmeikap kajiwui eina chigat kahai thili, khangatei chiya Levinaobingli lanpumwui eina samkaphang thāda mira, kala drakhāra̱ surkhavaipamwui eina samkaphang thāda mira;
kala chi na eina nawui shimkhurna apam akhali shaipaira; kaja hi kazip khavai kachonshimli otram khangatha̱wui vāng nawui sāmanna.
Kala nana mathāmeikap kaji chigat kahai tharan apong hiwui vang nana morei maphungmara. Kala Israel mibingwui kathara otbing chili nathumna masāmakhaopaimara, nathum thipaishina.”
Chitharan
na kakaso ainwui shiyan-chikan chi hina: Israelwui mibingli hānglu, achuk kapei khānkhanang makhaleiya kala seiot maphunglakrang kaji kahunga seila akha khuirā ngasaklu.
Kala nathumna chi pāngmon Eleazarli mira, kala seilā chi rāmrah ayarli khuishokta awui mangāli sāthatra.
Chieina pāngmon Eleazarna awui pāngmareng eina ashee ngayarda khuida kazip khavai kachonshim mangāli shini shida kasirrorra.
Kala seilānao chi awui miktāli riktāra; ahui, aphi, ashee kala awui pai chi riktāra.
Kala pāngmon china cedarthing, maharnā kala hungshi kahai kazaira̱ khuida seilānao riktāda khalei chiwui alungli horsangra.
Chiwui thili pāngmon china awui kashan-kachonla ngasa̱da phasā tara̱ eina ra̱vaira, kala chiwui thili ana rāmrahli ungra; kala zimik matunranglakha eina tangda pāngmon chi matharmara.
Seilānao riktakhame china awui kashankachon ngasa̱da ra̱vaira, kala ngazin eina tangda a matharmara.

Kala kathara mi akhana seilānao riktā kahaiwui hotla chi kazipkhuilaga rāmrahwui ayarli kathar apam akhali haira; kala chi Israelnaobingwui vang kaziphailaga tara̱li sanghaida hotlāwui tara̱ china morei pheokhavaiwui vangna.

Seilānao riktāda chiwui hotla kazipkakhuipa chila awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra kala ngazin eina tangda ala matharmara. Hi Israelnaobing kala kha̱mi athumli ngasokazatabingwui vang katang makhavai ningkhamina.
Kathingunli sakaza̱ mi chi zimiksho shinithang matharmara.
Akhalattana kakathumathang kala kashinethang tara̱ eina ra̱vailaga tharngasakra, kha ana kakathumthang eina kashinethang mara̱vaiakha a matharluimara.
Kachikathāna mi kathi angunli saza̱laga akhalatta mara̱vaimathaakha
“Hi kachonshimli mi kathi chitharanwui ainna: kachonshimli mi thihaiakha rākazanga milapai, leikasā milapai shinithang matharmara.
Kala rāmrah chiwui hamkhong asham mashingla leikasā saikora matharmara.
Kachikathāna kayang khareili raighai eina sākathat angun, lah thikahaiya angun, lah mira̱kui, lah chikhurli saza̱akha, zimiksho shinithang matharmara.
“Makatharbingwui vang suihamchigat kachigatwui hotla khuilaga longkazat tara̱ eina akhong akhali manātra.

Chieina kathara mi akhana maharnā chi tara̱ chili chumkhuilaga kachonshim chili, thongthāng saikorali, kala chili khalei mibing kala mira̱kuili, lah thikahai, lah chikhurli sakaza̱ mipa chili kasirrorra.

Kala kathara mi china makatharawuitungli kakathumathang kala kashinethang kasirrorra; hithāda a kashinethang tharhaora, kala ana tara̱ eina ra̱vailaga kashan-kachonla ngasa̱ra kala zingyinlam a tharhaora.
“Kha makathara mi china akhalatta tharkhavai masaakha ali mibingwui eina katathaora; kaja
Kala hi athumwui vang katang makhavai shiyan-chikan sāchingra. Makathar pheokhavai tara̱ kasirkharora a china awui kashankachon ngasa̱ra; kala tara̱ sakaza̱pa chi ngazin eina tangda matharmara.
Kala makathara mina sakaza̱za̱ chi matharmara; kala chi sākaza̱a mi chi ngazin eina tangda matharmara.”
Kala Israelwui mibing, yarui ashangva̱, kachāng khareli Zin lamhāngli vai, kala mibingna Kadeshli angasāma; kala Mariam thihaida chili chifahaowa.
Kala athumna Mosesli ngasungda hānga, “Ithumla
Khiwui vang nana

Kala khiwui vang ithumli Egyptwui eina thānshoklaga makaphā apam hili thānkharākhala? Hi theishirai, khaorāthei, lah drakhāthei, lah kabothei khamathā apam maningmana; kala mangkhavai tara̱ maleimana.”
Chieina Moses eina Aaronna yaruiwui eina shoklaga kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongli zangda mai mashunzanga. Kala
Kala

“Khāmshui chi khuilu, kala nachinā Aaron nanina yarui ashangva̱ kazipkhuilu, kala athumwui miktāli tara̱ shokkhavai lunghār chili hānglu; hithāda nanina yarui ashangva̱wui mangkhavai tara̱ khuishokmira, chithāda sāda yarui kala athumwui sha̱keila tara̱ khamang samphangra.”
Chieina Mosesna ali kaso kahai athishurda khāmshui chi
Kala Moses eina Aaronna yaruili lunghārwui mangāli kazip ngasakta hānga, “Ara nganālu, ngakaikashe nathumwui vang lunghār hiwui eina inina tara̱ khuishokmirala?”
Kala Mosesna apāng khāngkāda lunghār chili awui khāmshui eina khanishida ngaphita; kala tara̱ kachungkha shokta ashangva̱ kala athumwui sha̱keila manga.
Kala
Hi Meribahwui tara̱na, Israelwui mibingna
Mosesna Kadeshwui eina Edomwui awungali paomebing chihovai, “Israel nachinā ngarāna hi kahāngna: Ithumwui kachotkachāng nana thei;
kathāda ishāvā ngarāna Egyptli tākhala, kala chili atam kasāngkha Egyptwui mibingna ishāvā ngarali kala ithumli kayākha sāshilak eina sākhala da nana thei;
kala ithumna

Chieina ithumli nawui ngalei hi eina kakān ngasakmilu. Ithum nawui lui, lah drakhā yāmguili makānmara, ra̱khongwui tara̱ eina tangda mamangmara; Wungnaowui Shongrei eina kānda yāvāk, lah uivāk mangareila nawui leiretlung kānthuihaora.”
Kha Edomna ali hānga, “Nathum makānpaimara, raakha ina raighai singlaga shokra.”
Chieina Israelwui mibingna ali hānga, “Ithum shongreimāng eina kānra; ithumna kala sha̱keina tara̱ mangmihaisālala ina chiwui vang aman mira, shongfamāng kānngasakmilu, chimara.”
Kha ana hānga, “Nathum makānpaimara.” Kala Edomna athumli mamayāmada awui raimi shirting eina shokrāsai.
Hithāda Edomna awui leiret kānkhavai mamayāmithuwa, chieina Israelwui mibingna awui eina ngalatthuihaowa.
Chiwui thili Israelwui mibing, yarui ashangva̱ Kadeshwui eina zatlaga Hor Kaphungli vai.
Kala
“Aaronli awui awo-ayiwuili khuiunghaora, kaja Israelwui mibingli ina ngashit kahai ngalei chili a mazangmara, khikhalajila Meribahwui tara̱pamli nanina iwui kakaso chi masāla ili ngakaishihaowa.
Aaron eina anaomayara Eleazarli hokhuilu, kala anili Hor Kaphungli thānkalu.
Chili Aaronwui sāri raikhuilaga Eleazarli sangmihaolu, kala Aaronli awui mibingwuili khuivāhaora, a chili thihaora.”
Mosesna
Chili Mosesna Aaronwui sāri raikhuilaga anaomayara Eleazarli sangmi, kala Aaron phungreiton chili thihaowa. Chiwui thili Moses eina Eleazar phungrei chiwui eina tai.
Kala Aaron kathi theilaga Israelwui shang saikorana Aaronwui vang zimiksho thumrāthang chapngachai.
Chieina Israelna
na Israelwui kapo shāmida Canaannaobing athumwui pāngli sangmi; keinung chi peichaoda sāshimānmihaowa; chiwui vang eina apam chiwui aming Hormah
Edom ngalei kuida zatkhavai athumna Horwui eina zatphokta Red Sea tākhavai shongfa shura; kha shongfali mibing makhāngtheithuwa.

Kala mibingna Varewuitungli kala Moseswuitungli mamayāmada hānga, “Khiwui vang ithumli lamhāngli chithit khavai Egyptwui eina thānkashokkhala? Kaja hili zāt kala tara̱la malei, kala makānkhanā zāt hila sānhaira.”
Chieina
Chieina mibingna Mosesli rāda hānga, “Ithumna morei sāhaira,
Kala
Chieina Mosesna pithrai eina phara̱ akha sākhuida thingtungli shaoshānhai; kala phara̱na mili makeiakha pithraiwui phara̱ chili yangkāda ringa.
Kala Israelwui mibingna zatphoklaga Obothli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Obothwui eina zatphoklaga zimikshoshong khalei Moabli kāroda Iyeabarimwui lamhāngli rāmrah vasāpama.
Chiwui eina athumna zatphokta Zered tampākli rāmrah vasāpama.
Chiwui eina zatphoklaga Amornaobingwui thari vāshungda khalei, Arnonwui lākhavāk lamhāng chili rāmrah vasāpama. Kaja Arnon hi Moab eina Amornaobingwui ngachaili khalei tharina.
Chiwui vang
“Suphahli khalei Waheb,
kala Arnonwui tampākbing,
kala Tampākwui leishāmbing,
Arwui pam vāshunga,
kala Moabwui thari ungshunga.”
Kala chiwui eina athumna Beerli zatvāmamanuwa; hi
Chieina Israelna laa hi sai:
“Okshoklu, O ra̱khong;
Chili laa sālu!—
Wungnaobingna chuikahai ra̱khong,
khangam khareibingwui khānthing,
lijei singlaga chuikahaina.”
Kala lamhāng chiwui eina thuilaga athumna Mattanahli vāshunga,
Mattanahwui eina Nahaliel, Nahalielwui eina Bamoth,
kala Bamothwui eina Moab ngaleiwui tampāk, Pisgahwui atung eina yangkazang siwuk chili vai.
“Ili nawui ngalei kakānshok ngasakmilu; ithumna lui, lah drakhā yāmguili mazatmara; ra̱khongwui tara̱la mamangmara; ithum naram leiret makānthuiranglakha eina tangda Wungnaowui Shongreili zatra.”
Kha Sihonna Israelli awui leiret makān ngasakmana. Ana awui mibing kazipkhuilaga lamhāngli vāda Jahazli Israelli ngarara.
Kala Israelna ali raighai eina sāthathaowa, kala awui ngalei Arnon eina thuilaga Jabbok kala Ammon ngalei vāshungda khuihaowa; kaja Jazerna Ammonnaowui tharina.
Kala Israelna Amorwui keinung saikora khuilaga, Heshbon alungli khalei keinung kala kha saikorali pamhaowa.
Kaja Heshbon hi Amor awunga Sihonwui keinungna. Ana khare Moabwui awungali rai sālaga Arnon vāshungda athumwui ngalei ngapai kakhuina.
Chieina lungchān laa kathemabingna hithāda hānga:
“Ralu, Heshbonli, hi sakāranu,
Sihonwui keinung chi semkāranu.
Sihonwui keinung eina meiwon shoka.
China Moabwui Ar chuitai,
Arnonwui akhokabing pitai.
Nali ringkashi ngasaranu,
O Moab!
Na kuphaira, O Chemoshwui mibing!
Anaomayarabingli yāmkazata ngasā ngasakhaira,
naongalāva̱ ngarā tuknarhaira,
Amorwui awunga Sihonwui pāngli.
Chiwui vang Heshbon eina thuilaga Dibon vāshungda,
awui lan shimānhaira,
kala ithumna Medeba vāshungda mei thottamihaira.”
Hithāda Israelna Amor ngaleili sompama.
Kala Mosesna Jazer ngalei ayang khavai chihovai, kala chiwui kha̱bing yuikhuilaga chili pamkasa Amornaobingli kashamhaowa.
Kha
Chieina athumna ali, awui naomayarabing kala awui mibingli sāthatserhaowa; khipākha maringshokmana. Chieina ngalei chi athumwui ngasāhaowa.
Chitharan Israelna Amornaobingli sākahai saikora Zipporwui nao Balakna theihairasai.
Kala mibing hiwui vang Moabna ngacheelakhaowa, kaja athum mi tarākhana; Moabna Israelwui mibingli khangacheena pemhaowa.

Chieina Moabna Midianwui ararbingli hānga, “Seina tampākwui khawo khamarop thāda mibing hina ithumli kuimareida khaleibing maropngakānki jihaira.” Atam chitharan Moabwui awunga Zipporwui naomayara Balakna sāsai,

Pethorli khalei Beorwui naomayara, Amaw ngaleiwui kongphei ngalemli kapama Balaamli ahokhavai pao chihovāda hānglu, “Yanglu, mibing hi Egyptwui eina kashokna; athumna okathui ngalei pemhaira, kala iwui ramli kāroda pamdalei.

Ralu, athum iwui vang pingnāhaokada mibing hili iwui vang khonshimilu; chithāda athumli ina yuihaida ngalei hiwui eina kashamshaplapai. Kaja nana somi kahai a chiya sokhamina, kala nana khonshi kahai a chiya kalākashina kaji ina thei.”
Chieina Moab kala Midianwui khararnaobingna khanong yangkhavai athumwui pāngli pheisā khuiphungda Balaamli vai, kala Balakwui paola hāngmi.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Aja pisanghaolu, kala
Kala Varena Balaamli rāhānga, “Nawuili khalei mibing hi khipālongkhala?”
Kala Balaamna Vareli hānga, “Zipporwui naomayara Balak, Moab awungana ili mi chihorada hānga,
‘Yanglu, Egyptwui eina miyur akha shokta okathui ngalei pemhaira; arui rāda mibing hili iwui vang rākhonshimilu; chithāda ina athumli ngararda kashamshokhaipai.’”
Varena Balaamli hānga, “Na athumli mangasovāpaimara; nana miyur chili makhonshipaimara, kaja athum somi kahaiyana.”
Chieina Balaamna ngathorshong ngakarthuilaga Balakwui wungnaobing chili hānga, “Naram hanungulu; kaja nathumli ngasovā khavai
Chieina Moabwui wungnaobing china ngakarthuilaga latungda Balakli unghānga, “Balaamna ithumli ngasoung khavai mamayāmana.”
Latluida Balakna awui wungnaobing chungmeida kala athumli khayā kāmeida chiholuishita.
Athumna Balaamli vāda ahānga, Zipporwui nao Balakna hithāda hānga: “Ili rāki kaji hili khikhana mahapkhanoranu;
kaja ina nali khayakālak eina sāmira, kala nana ili kahānghāng chi ina sāra; ralu mibing hili iwui vang khonshimilu!”
Kha Balaamna Balakwui raobingli hānga, “Balakna ili sinā lupā awui shim khatkha milala, iwui
na chungmeida ili khi hāngminikhala kaji theikhui khavai hili aja ngayā pisangluilu da seihā sali.”
Kala Varena ngayāshong rāda Balaamli hānga, “Mibing china nali rākahona jiakha ngakarthuida athumli ngasoda zatlu; kha ina kahāng chimāng nana sāki kajina.”
Chieina Balaamna ngathorshong ngakarthuida awui gadhā shaksāda tonglaga Moabwui wungnaobing chili ngayurthuwa.
Kha ana ngayurthui kahaiwui vang
Kala
Chieina kazingrao china drakhā yāmgui khaniwui matakli, arāp khaninishong phākho khalei khamashi shongfali nganingphina.
Kala gadhā china
Chieina
Gadha china
Chieina
Balaamna gadhā chili hānga, “Khikhalajila nana ili sānganao kahaiwui vangna. Iwui pāngli raighai singsasi kaja ina nali sāthathairara.”
Gadha china Balaamli hānga, “Na achāwui eina thuilaga aja rāshungda nawui mirinli nana katonga nawui gadhā chi I maningmala? Ina nali hithakasaila?” “Maningmana” da Balaamna ngahānkai.
Chieina
wui kazingrao china ali hānga, “Nawui gadhāli khiwui vang hithāda kathum shida ngaphitkhala? Yanglu, I nali nganingkham khavai kharāna, kaja iwui mangāli nawui shongfa nguihaira;
kala gadhā china ili kathei eina hithāda kathumshida khayāmna. Gadha china mayāmla ili rāsi kaja ina nali arui sāthathailaga gadhāliva ring ngasakhairara.”
Chieina Balaamna
Kala
Balaam rārāli kaji Balakna kashā eina, ana Moabwui keinungli vāmayarmeithui kaji thari apam Arnonli asamphanga.
Balakna Balaamli hānga, “Ina nali hokhavai makasorāmala? Khisāda ili marāthukhala? Ina nali khayākashi mamitheithula?”
Balaamna Balakli hānga, “Yanglu, I nawuili rāhaira! Ina I khalattawui pangshap eina matuikapai leila? Varena ikhamorli sangkhami athishurda I matuiki kajina.”
Chieina Balaamna Balakli ngasoda Kiriath-huzothli vai.
Kala Balakna sei kala yao pha̱phayālaga Balaam eina ali ngasokazata wungnaobinglila chiphunvai.
Kala akhama katha Balakna Balaamli ngasophungda Bamothbaalli shanga; kala ana apam chiwui eina chili nganaida kapam mibing chi thei.
Kala Balaamna Balakli hānga, “Hili iwui vang hanphut shini sālu, kala mukkā shini, yaovā shinida ngarānmilu.”
Balakna Balaamwui kahāng chi sai; kala Balaam eina Balakna hanphut kachiva̱li mukkā eina yaovā chigata.
Kala Balaamna Balakli hānga, “Nawui rikkatā kachigatwui ngalemli nganinglu, I thuihaoka,
Kala Varena Balaamli samphanga, kala Balaamna hānga, “Ina hanphut shini ngarānhaira, kala hanphut ava̱va̱li mukkā akha, yaovā akhada chigathaira.”
Kala
Kala Balaamna ali latunga, kala yanglu, Balak eina Moabwui wungnaobing hanphut chiwui ngalemli nganingsai.
Balaamna matuiki kaji matuiphoka.
“Moabwui awunga Balakna Aramwui eina ili khuirai,
zingsho phungreiramwui eina:
‘Ralu, Jacobli rakhonshilu iwui vang!
Kala rālu, Israelli rāmashātlu!’
Varena makhonkashi yurli ina,
kathāda khonshira!
Kaja phungreitonwui eina ina ali thei,
phungrābingwui eina ina ali yanga;
yanglu, khalatta somkapama miyurna,
yur khangateili mashānrummana!
Jacobwui chifa khipāna shānshap,
lah Israelwui mishān khipāna machukshapkhala?
Khangarong chiwui mithit ili thingasaklu,
Iwui khanaowa awui thāngasaklu.”
Kala Balakna Balaamli hānga, “Na khi kasākhala? Iwui yangkashebingli khonshi khavai ina nali hokakhuina kha yanglu, nana athumwuitungli khikha masāla somihaira.”
Ana ngahānkai, “
Chieina Balakna ali hānga, “Athumli theikapai apam khangatei akhali ili ngasovāda, athum katonga matheilala nganaida khaleibing theira. Chiwui eina nana iwui vang athumli khonshilu.”
Kala ana ali Zophim tampāk kānlaga Pisgah kaho kajuipam akhali thānkai, kala hanphut shini sālaga hanphut ava̱va̱li mukkā akha, yaovā akhada chigata.
Balaamna Balakli hānga, “Ina lākhavāk
Kala
Ana khaung eina, yanglu, Balak eina Moabwui wungnaobing rikkatā kachigatpam chili nganingsai. Kala Balakna ali hānga, “
Chieina Balaamna matuiki kaji matuiphoka,
“Ngakarthuilu, Balak, kala nganālu,
Ili nganālu, O Zipporwui nao:
Vare hi kakapika maningmana,
lah ning ngacheiki kaje miwui nao maningmana.
Ana hāngkahai ngalanrala?
Lha ana matui kahai maungshung ngasakmala?
Yanglu, somi khavai ili kasohaira;
ana somi kahai ina makhalanpaimana.
Ana Jacobli kalākashi matheimana,
lah ana Israelli pa̱khangapā matheimana.
kala awunga akhawui khavaokhon chi athumwuili lei.
Varena athumli Egyptwui eina khuishoka,
athum ramseiwui angaji thāda phona.
Kaja Jacobli suida makānāmana,
Israelli meowor sāda makānāmana.
Ara Jacob eina Israelli hithāda hāngra,
‘Varena khi sāmihaira!’
Yanglu, miyur chi! kazingkha̱ ava̱ thāda ngakarthui
kala kazingkha̱ thāda katingkai;
sāshai matukkhuiranglakha eina tangda,
kala chiwui ashee mamangranglakha eina tangda,
ana mapamzangmana.”
Kala Balakna Balaamli hānga, “Athumli khonkashila makhonshialu, kasola masomialu.”
Balaamna Balakli ngahānkai,
Balakna hānga, “Rālu, ina apam khangateili thānvāluika; chile Vareli ningyāng ungngasakta athumli iwui vang khonshi ngasaklapai.”
Chieina Balakna Balaamli tampāk yangtāpsangda khalei Peorwui kaphungtonli thānkai.
Kala Balaamna Balakli hānga, “Hili hanphut shini sālu, kala mukkā shini, yaovā shini iwui vang khangarān sāmilu.”
Kala Balaamna hāngkahai chi Balakna sai, kala hanphut ava̱va̱li mukkā akha, yaovā akha da chigata.
Balaamna ngashantāda Israel shang-shang eina rāmrah sākapam chi Balaamna thei. Kala Varewui manglā ali rāzanga,
kala ana marān tui chi hānga,
“Beorwui nao Balaamwui marān tuina,
Mik mathingmi kahaiwui marān tuina,
Varewui tui khanganāpāwui marān tuina,
Reikhamataiyana rāmahā khamina,
konglui zanglala awui mik makafamana.
O Jacob, nawui kachonshim kayākha mathāli,
O Israel, nawui rāmrahsom kayākha yangngaili!
Hamphek kahai tampāk thada,
kongpheiwui yāmgui thada,
tara̱pamwui cedarthing thada lei.
Awui khongsaiwui eina tara̱ longra,
kala awui atha tara̱pam saikorali leira.
Awui awungana Agagli juimeira,
kala awui wungramli masot mira.
Varena ali Egyptwui eina khuishoka;
awui pangshap ramsei ngajina,
ali yangkashe yurbingli ana shaihaora,
kala athumwui ara̱kui akha̱-akhā sāmira,
kala awui malā eina kapngara̱wutmihaora.
kala kazingkha̱ ava̱ thāda;
khipāna ali mathotshaprakhala?
Nali sokhamibing chili sokhami ngasāranu,
kala nali khonkashe chili khonkashi ngasāranu.”
Kala Balakna Balaamli malungvātlakhaoda apāng kaphelaga Balaamli hānga, “Iwui yangkashebingli khonshi khavai nali kahona, kha yanglu, nana hithāda kathum shida somihaira.
Chiwui vang eina ara naram ungulu; ‘Ina nali khayāshira’ da ina hānghaisai, kha khayākashi chi
Chieina Balaamna Balakli hānga, “Nana chihokharā paomebingli ina mahāngmala?
Balakna ili sinā lupā awui shim khatkha milala,
“Yanglu, ara iwui mibingli ungura; kha mibing hina naoda nawui mibingli khi sarakhala kaji ina hangchitheika, rālu.”
Chieina ana awui hāngki kaji chi hānga,
“Beorwuinao Balaamwui marān tuina,
mik mathingmi kahai awui marān tuina,
Varewui tui khanganāpawui marān tuina,
juikhamatai awui ningthem katheipawui tuina.
Reikhamataiana ramahā khamina,
konglui zanglala mik makafamana:
Ina ali thei, kha arui maningmana;
Ina ali yanga, kha manganaimana:
Jacobwui eina sirā akha shokra,
Israelwui eina khānthing akha kharshokra;
china Moabwui khavei ngaphitkhaira,
kala Shethwui naomayarabingli sākhayāngra.
Edom ramchohaora,
awui yangkashe Seirla ramchohaora,
Israelva kapinga ngasāra.
Jacobna munghaora,
kala keinungli kataibing sāshimānhaora!”
Chieina ana Amaleknaovāk ngareivāda,
ana awui hāngki kaji hānga.
“Amalek hi yurbingwui ngachaili kharena,
kha anaolamshong a shimānhaora.”
Kala ana Kenwuivāk ngareivāda,
ana awui hāngki kaji hānga,
“Chotchāngda kakhāng chi nawui apamna,
kala nawui athip lunghārli sakai;
chithālala Cain sākhayānghaora,
Asshurna nali karankha sāngda tukthuira̱khala?”
Kala ana hāngki kaji chi hānga,
“Iyavo, Varena hi shokkhangasak tharan,
khipāna ringrakhala?
Kha Kittimwui eina jahas rāra,
kala Asshur eina Eberli rekharekra,
kala alila sāshimānhaora.”
Chiwui thili Balaamna ngakarthuida awui pamli unghaowa; kala Balakla awuili unghaowa.
Israelna Shittimli leilakha mibingna Moabwui naongalāva̱ khayorabingli khangasowui otsakli zanga.
Otsakbing hina mibingli athumwui varebingli pha̱kaphayāli zang ngasaka, kala mibingna sāla shai, kala athumwui varebingli khoruma.
Hithāda sāda Israel athum khalattana Peorwui Baalli khorumthuihaowa. Kala chiwui vang
chieina
Chieina Mosesna Israelwui bichar samebingli hokhuida hānga, “Nathumwui ngachaili Peorwui Baalli khokharuma mi saikora shaothathaolu.”

Kala yanglu, Israelwui mi akhana Midianwui sha̱nao akha ashi shimli khuiunga, khuikhaung chi Moses kala Israel yarui ashangva̱ kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili athumna chapngachāda leilakha katheina.
Phinehas kaho Eleazarwui nao, pāngmon Aaronwui ara̱ china chi kathei eina, ana yarui ashangva̱wui eina shoklaga apāngli kazei singkhui,
kala Israelwui mipa chili zangkhamei kāli shurvai, kala Israelwui mipa chieina sha̱naopava̱ ani khanili pharngara̱wuthaowa. Chieina kazātkashi chi Israel mibingwui eina ngasāmhaowa.
Chithālala kazātkashi eina thikahai mi thingmaga̱da matina.

“Eleazarwui nao, pāngmon Aaronwui ara̱, Phinehasna iwui malungkhavāt Israel mibingwui eina ngalanthui ngasakhaira; iwui yuikashi thāda ana yuishikhami ot sāhaira, chiwui vang eina Israelwui mibingli iwui yuikashiwui eina mashimān khangasakna.
Chiwui vang eina yanglu, ina ali chingri kahaiwui tuingashit mihaira;
kala hi awui vang, kala awui ara̱-azāwui vāng katang makhavai pāngmonpam ngasāchingra, kaja ana awui Varewui vang zikhamari ot sai, kala Israelnaobingwui vang pheokhami ot sāmi.”
Midianwui sha̱naoli ngasoda rungthat kahai Israelwui mipa chi Simeon shimkhurwui akhavā Saluwui nao Zimrina.
Rungthat kahai Midianpava̱ chili Kozbi hoi. Ala Midian yurwui akhavāshi shimkhur Zurwui naongalāva̱na.
Kala
“Midiannaobingli rekharekta chotchāng ngasaklu,

kaja athumna nathumli singkharākta Peor varebingwui pongli, kala Peorwui vang eina kazātkashi rāthang rungthat kahaipāva̱ Midian wungnaowui naongalāva̱ Kozbi, kala athumwui azarva̱wui ponglila nguingasaka.”
Kazātkashiwui thili
“Israel ashangva̱ mi saikora shangwui athishurda kum maga̱wui eina thuilaga chiwui atung, avāva̱wui shimlāk athishurda, Israelli khalei raili vākashapa mi saikora mishān shānkhuilu.”
Chieina Moses eina Eleazarna Moabwui tampāk Jordan pheili khalei Jericho apamli athumli hānga,
na Mosesli kakaso athishurda, “Kum maga̱wui eina thuilaga chiwui atung mibingwui mishān shānkhuilu.” Egyptwui eina kashok Israelwui mibing chi hina:
Hezronwui, Hezronnaobingwui shimkhur; Carmiwui, Carminaobingwui shimkhur.
Hi Reubennaobingwui shimkhurbingna; kala athumwui mishān thing hangmatida kathum shāshini kala thumrāna.
Kala Palluna Eleabli pharai;
Eleabwui naomayarabing: Nemuel, Dathan, kala Abiramli pharai. Dathan eina Abiram. Dathan eina Abiram hi yarui ashangva̱wui eina kapangkakhui Corahli ngasoda Moses eina Aaron kala
ngaleina ngachakkhaida Corah eina ali khangayurbingli mayuisangrumhaowa, ali khangayurbing thithang kala meina mi shākhani hangphangā chuitāthang, athum chi kahaka machut ngasāhaowa.
Chithālala Corahwui naomayarabing mathimana.
Shimkhurbingwui athishurda Simeonwui naomayarabing: Nemuelwui eina, Nemuelnaobingwui shimkhur; Jaminwui eina, Jaminnaobingwui shimkhur; Jachinwui eina, Jachinnaobingwui shimkhur;
Zerahwui eina, Zerahnaobingwui shimkhur; Shaulwui eina, Shaulnaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Hibing hi Simeonwui shimkhurbingna. Athumwui mi thing maga̱da khani shākhanina.
Athum shimkhurwui athishurda Gadwui naomayarabing: Zephonwui eina, Zephonnaobingwui shimkhur; Haggiwui eina, Hagginaobingwui shimkhur; Shuniwui eina, Shuninaobingwui shimkhur;
Ozniwui eina, Ozninaobingwui shimkhur; Eriwui eina, Erinaobingwui shimkhur;
Arodwui eina, Arodnaobingwui shimkhur; Areliwui eina, Arelinaobingwui shimkhur;
Hibing hi Gadwui naomayarabingwui shimkhurbingna, athumwui mishān athishurda thing hangmati shāphangāna.
Judahwui naomayara khani Er eina Onam; kala Er eina Onan Canaan ngaleili thihaowa.
Kala athum shimkhurwui athishurda Judahwui naomayarabing: Shelahwui eina, Shelahnaobingwui shimkhur; Perezwui eina, Pereznaobingwui shimkhur; Zerahwui eina, Zerahnaobingwui shimkhur.
Kala Perezwui naomayarabing: Hezronwui eina, Hezronnaobingwui shimkhur; Hamulwui eina, Hamulnaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Hibing hi Judahwui shimkhurbingna, athumwui mishān athishurda thing hangshinida tharuk shāphangāna.
Shimkhurbingwui athishurda Issacharwui naomayarabing: Tolawui eina, Tolanaobingwui shimkhur; Puvahwui eina, Puvahnaobingwui shimkhur;
Jashubwui eina, Jashunaobingwui shimkhur; Shimronwui eina, Shimronnaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Hibing hi Issacharwui shimkhurbingna, athumwui mishān athishurda thing hangtharukta mati shākathumna.
Athum shimkhurwui athishurda Zebulunwui naomayarabing: Seredwui eina, Serednaobingwui shimkhur; Elonwui eina, Elonnaobingwui shimkhur; Jahleelwui eina, Jahleelnaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Hibing hi Zebulunwui shimkhurbingna, athumwui mishān athishurda thing hangtharuk shāphangāna.
Athum shimkhurbingwui athishurda Josephwui naomayara khani: Manasseh eina Ephraimna.
Manassehwui naomayarabing: Machirwui eina, Machirnaobingwui shimkhur; kala Machirna Gileadli pharai; Gileadwui eina, Gileadnaobingwui shimkhur.
Hibing hi Gileadwui naomayarabingna: Iezerwui eina, Iezernaobingwui shimkhur; Helekwui eina, Heleknaobingwui shimkhur;
kala Asrielwui eina, Asrielnaobingwui shimkhur; kala Shechemwui eina, Shechemnaobingwui shimkhur;
kala Shemidawui eina, Shemidanaobingwui shimkhur; kala Hepherwui eina, Hephernaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Hepherwui nao Zelophehad mayarnao mapharāmana, kha sha̱naomānga: kala anaongalāva̱bing chiya Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah kala Tirzah hibingna.
Hibing hi Manassehwui shimkhurbingna; kala athumwui mishān athishurda thing hangphangāda khani shāshinina.
Hibing hi athum shimkhurwui athishurda Ephraimwui naomayarabingna: Shuthelahwui eina, Shuthelahnaobingwui shimkhur; Becherwui eina, Bechernaobingwui shimkhur; Tahanwui eina, Tahannaobingwui shimkhur.
Kala hibing hi Shuthelahwui naomayarabingna: Eranwui eina, Erannaobingwui shimkhurbing.
Hibing hi Ephraim naomayarabingwui shimkhurwui mishān athishurda thing thumrāda khani shāphangāna. Hibing hi shimkhurbingwui athishurda Josephwui naomayarabingna.
Athum shimkhurbingwui athishurda Benjaminwui naomayarabing: Belawui eina, Belanaobingwui shimkhur; Ashbelwui eina, Ashbelnaobingwui shimkhur; Ahiramwui eina, Ahiramnaobingwui shimkhur;
Shephuphamwui eina, Shephuham naobingwui shimkhur; Huphamwui eina, Hupham naobingwui shimkhur;
kala Belawui naomayara khani Ard eina Naaman: Ardwui eina, Ardnaobingwui shimkhur; Naamanwui eina, Naamannaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Hibing hi athum shimkhurwui athishurda Benjaminwui naomayarabingna, athumwui mi thing hangmatida phangā shātharukna.
Hibing hi shimkhurbingwui athishurda Danwui naomayarabingna: Shuhamwui eina, Shuhamnaobingwui shimkhurna. Athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda hi Danwui shimkhurbingna.
Athum mashingwui athishurda Shuhamnaobingwui shimkhur saikora mi thing hangtharukta mati shāmatina.
Athum shimkhurbingwui athishurda Asherwui naomayarabing: Imnawui eina, Imnanaobingwui shimkhur; Ishviwui eina, Ishvinaobingwui shimkhur; Beriahwui eina, Beriahnaobingwui shimkhur;
Beriahwui naomayarabingwui eina: Heberwui eina, Hebernaobingwui shimkhur; Malchi-elwui eina, Malchi-elnaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Kala Asherwui naongalāva̱wui ming Serah hoi.
Hibing hi athum shimkhurbingwui mishān athishurda Asherwui naomayarabing, thing hangphangāda kathum shāmatina.
Athum shimkhurwui athishurda Naphtaliwui naomayarabing: Jahzeelwui eina, Jahzeelnaobingwui shimkhur; Guniwui eina, Guninaobingwui shimkhur;
Jezerwui eina, Jezernaobingwui shimkhur; Shillemwui eina, Shillemnaobingwui shimkhur hibingna.
Hibing hi athum shimkhurwui athishurda hi Naphtaliwui shimkhurbingna; kala athumwui mashing thing hangmatida phangā shāmatina.
Hi Israelnaobing saikora ngarumlaga shātharuk kala thingkha shāshini kala thumrāna.
“Ngaleibing hili aming mashingwui athishurda shimlui sākhavai ngakaimira.
Hakkhamei shangli nana hakkhamei shimlui milu, kala teokhamei shangli teomeida milu; shang kachiva̱li mashingwui athishurda shimlui ngarin ngasaklu.
Kha ngalei hi kalā yangda ngayarra; athum avāva̱ ngarā shangwui amingbing athishurda shimlui ngayarra.”
Athumwui shimlui kharei, kateowui ngachaili kalā yangda ngayarmira.
