Hibing hi Leviwui shimkhurbingna: Libnaobingwui shimkhur, Hebronnaobingwui shimkhur, Mahnaobingwui shimkhur, Mushnaobingwui shimkhur, Corahnaobingwui shimkhur. Kala Kohath hi Amramwui avāva̱na.
Amramwui preiva̱li Jochebed hoi, Egyptli kapharā Leviwui naongalāva̱na, ana Amramwui nao Aaron eina Moses kala aniwui azarva Mariam athumli pharai.
Kala Aaronna Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar kala Ithamar athumli pharai.
Kha anina makathar rikkatā

Kala athumwui mi mashing, mayarnao kachāngkhawui eina thuida chiwui atung saikora thing maga̱da kathumna, kaja athum Israelwui mibingwui mishānli mangarumana, khikhalajila Israel mibingwui alungli athumli shimlui mayarmana.
Hi Moses eina pāngmon Eleazarna Jerichowui Jordan ngalemli khalei Moab tampākpheili Israelwui mibing shānkakhuina.
Kha Moses eina pāngmon Aaronna Sinai lamhāngli Israelnaobing kashān tharan mibing hi akhala mashānnarmana.
Kaja
Athumna kazip khavai kachonshimwui khāmongpheili Moses, pāngmon Eleazar kala Israel ashangva̱wui kathānabingwui mangāli nganingda hānga,
“Ishāvā lamhāngli thihaira, a
Awui nao mayarnao makhaleiwui vang shangwui eina khuithuihaorala? Ishāvāwui chinaongarāwui ngachaili ithumlila shimlui yarlu.”
Athumwui tuingaphun chi Mosesna
Kala
“Zelophehadwui naongalāva̱bing mashunga; athumli avāva̱wui chinaongarāna samkaphang thāda shimlui yarphalungra, kala shimluikat chi athumwui ngasāra.
Kala Israelwui mibingli hānglu, ‘Mi akhana naomayara maleila thihaiakha awui shimlui naongalāva̱na khuira.
Kala anaongalāva̱la maleisaakha agatona khuira.
Kala awui chinaongarā maleisaakha avāva̱wui avāgatona khuira.
Kala avāva̱wui chinaongarā maleisaakha awui nganaimeithui kaje shimkhurwui mina shimlui chi khuira.
Kala nana ngashānkhui kahaiwui thili nalila Aaronwui thāda nawo nayiwui pamli khuiunghaora,
khikhalajila nana Zin lamhāngli tara̱wui vang mibingna pa̱ngapāthang, mibingwui miktāli iming mathar ngasakla nana iwui tuili ngakaishihaowa.” (Hi Zin lamhāngli khalei Kadeshli Meribahwui tara̱lina).
Mosesna
“Phasā khavai manglā saikorawui Vare
ana athumwui mangāli rizatra, athumli thanshokmira kala thānzangmira; chithāda sāda
kala ali pāngmon Eleazar kala yarui ashangva̱wui mangāli nganing ngasaklu, kala nana ali ot chi chisinlu.
Nana nawui pangshap ali mida, chieina Israelwui mi ashangva̱na awui kahāng nganāra.
Kala ana pāngmon Eleazarwui mangāli kānganingda pāngmon china awui vang
Kala Mosesna
kala
Israelwui mibingli kasoda ili kachigat, mei eina rikkatā kachigat iwui kashakazā kala ningyāngkhaunga nganamkaphā atam atamli rāchigat khavai hānglu.
Yaonao akhana ngathorshong chigatra, kala akhapā china ngazinshong chigatra;
kala tharāzātchigatwui vangla khamanaka mathir khuilui akhawui akhum kathara, kala shungkakhui thao lengkhor matiwui akha chi manātra.
Hi ningyāngkhaung nganamkaphā
Ra̱shak kachigat chi yao ava̱va̱li lengkhor akhum matiwui akha mira; katharapamli ra̱shakchigat zamshei chi
Yao akhapa chi ngazinshong chigatra; ngathorshongwui tharāzāt kachigat kala ra̱shakchigat kachigat thāda, nana chi mei eina
Sabbath zimiksholi kumkha kākahai achuk kapei yaovānao khani, kala tharāzātchigatwui vang mathir khuilui akhawui akhum katharāwui khum khani thao eina khamanāt, kala chiwui ra̱shakchigat khuirāra,
hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat eina ra̱shakchigatli lāngda sabbath kachidawui rikkatā kachigat saki kajina.
Nathumwui kachāng haokaphok kachida nathumna

kala mukkā ava̱va̱wui vang thao khamanāta tharāzātchigatwui mathir khuilui akhawui akhum tharāwui kathum; kala yaovā akhawui vang thao khamanāta tharāzātchigatwui mathir khuilui akhawui akhum tharāwui khani;
kala yaonao akhawui vang thao khamanāta tharāzātchigatwui mathir khum tharāwui akha da mei eina riktāda kachigat chi

Athumwui ra̱shakchigat chi mukkā akhawui vang lengkhor akhawui tangkhaira, yaovā akhawui vang lengkhor akhawui khum kathumwui akhara; kala yaonao akhawui vang lengkhor akhawui khum matiwui akhara. Hi kum peidawui kachāngchāngli mei eina rikkatā kachigatna.
Kala suihamchigatwui vang
Kala kachāng hiwui tharāda kaphangāthang hi phanitna; shinithang khawok makazang khamui shaira.
Kharethang kathara kazip khuira: nathum ot masāpaimara,
kha mei eina rikkatā chigatlu, rikkatā kachigat
kala athumwui tharāzāt kachigatla khamanaka mathir thao khamanāt chi mukkā akhawui vang khuilui akhawui akhum tharāwui kathumra, kala yaovā akhawui vang khum tharāwui khani chigatra,
kala nathumna yaovānao shini chi ava̱va̱wui vang akhum katharā chigatra;
kala nawui vang pheomi khavai suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra.
Hi nana ngathor kachida machatlakla rikkatāchigatli lāngda chigatki kajina.
Chi tākam eina shinithang thangkachida nathumna kashakazā mei eina kachigat chi
Kala kashinethang nathum kathara kazip khuira; chithang nathum ot masāpaimara.
Kha
kala chiwui thao khamanata tharāzatwui khamanaka mathir, mukkā ava̱va̱wui vang khuilui akhawui akhum tharāwui khum kathum, yaovā akhawui vang akhum tharāwui akhum khani,
yaonao shini chi ava̱va̱wui vang akhum katharā chigatra;
mevā akha nathumwui morei pheomi khavaiwui vang chigatra.
Machatlakla rikkatā kachigat kala tharāzātchigatli lāngda hibing nana athumwui ra̱shakchigatla chigatmira. Theilu, kaja chibing chi achuk kapei sā phalungra.
kala nathumwui
kala athumwui thao manāt kahai tharāzāt kachigatwui khamanaka mathir, mukkāwui vang khuilui akhawui akhum tharāwui kathum, yaovāwui vāng akhum tharāwui khani;
kala yaovānao shini chili ava̱va̱wui vang akhum tharāwui akha;
kala pheomi khavai suihamchigatwui vang mevā akha chigatra;
Hi changwokwui rikkatā kachigat eina chiwui tharāzāt kachigat, kala machatlakla rikkatā kachigat eina tharāzātchigat, ra̱shakchigat shiyan-chikanwui athishurda
kha nathum
kala athumwui thao khamanāt tharāzātwui khamanak mathir, mukkā akhawui vang khuilui akhawui khum tharāwui akhum kathum, yaovā akhawui vang khum tharāwui khani,
yaonao ava̱va̱wui vang khum tharāwui akhum akha;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra. Hi pheomi khavai kachigat, kala machatlakla rikkatā kachigat kala chiwui tharāzāt kachigat, kala ra̱shakchigat kachigatli lāngda chigatra.
kala nathumna mei eina riktāda
kala athumwui thao khamanāt tharāzātchigatwui khamanak mathir, mukkā akhawui vang khuilui akhawui khum tharāwui akhum kathum, yaovā khaniniwui vāng khum tharāwui akhum khani,
kala yao ava̱va̱wui vang khum tharāwui akhum akha;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra, hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, tharāzātchigat kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
Kakhanethang mukkanao tharāda khani, yaovā khani, kumkha kākahai yaovānao achuk kapei tharāda mati,
kala tharāzātchigat eina ra̱shakchigat, mukkānao, yaovā, kala yaovānaobingwui vang mashing eina khangachā shiyan-chikanwui athishurda chigatra;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra, hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, tharāzātchigat kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
Kakathumathang mukkā tharāda akha, yaovā khani, kumkha kākahai achuk kapei yaovānao tharāda mati,
tharāzātchigat eina ra̱shakchigat mukkā, yaovā, kala yaonaobingwui vang mashing eina khangachā shiyan-chikanwui athishurda chigatra;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra, hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat kala chiwui tharāzātchigat kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
Khamatethang mukkā tharā, yaovā khani, kumkha kākahai achuk kapei yaovānao tharāda mati,
muisakchigat eina ra̱shakchigat, mukkā, yaovā, kala yaonaobingwui vang mashing eina khangachā sharphahorwui athishurdawui thāda chigatra;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra, hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, kala chiwui tharāzātchigat kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
Kaphangāthang mukkā chiko, yaovā khani, kumkha kākahai achuk kapei yaovānao tharāda mati,
tharāzatchigat eina ra̱shakchigat, mukkā, yaovā, kala yaonaobingwui vang mashing eina khangachā shiyan-chikanwui athishurda chigatra;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra; hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, tharāzātchigat, kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
Katharukathang mukkā chishat, yaovā khani, kumkha kākahai achuk kapei yaovānao tharāda mati,
tharāzātchigat eina ra̱shakchigat, mukkā, yaovā, kala yaonaobingwui vang mashing eina khangachā sharphahorwui athishurda chigatra;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra; hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, tharāzātchigat kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
Kashinethang mukkā shini, yaovā khani, kumkha kākahai achuk kapei yaovānao tharāda mati,
tharāzātchigat eina ra̱shakchigat, mukkā, yaovā kala yaonaobingwui vang mashing eina khangachā shiyan-chikanwui athishurda chigatra;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra; hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, tharāzatchigat kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
kha nathumna mei eina riktāda
kala tharāzātchigat eina ra̱shakchigat, mukkā, yaova, kala yaonaobingwui vang mashing eina khangachā shiyan-chikanwui athishurda chigatra;
suihamchigatwui vang mevā akhala chigatra; hi machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, kala chiwui tharāzātchigat, kala ra̱shakchigatli lāngda chigatra.
Nathumwui langchin sākahai phanitbingli hibing hi nathumna khalattawui khangashit kachigat, lemmet kachigat, rikkatā kachigat, tharāzātchigat, ra̱shakchigat, kala ningyatchigatli lāngda
Kala
Mosesna Israel shangbingwui akhavābingli hānga, hi
Mi akhana
Lha avāva̱wui shimli khalei sha̱nao akhana nganuilakha
avāva̱na shālaga khikha mahāngakha, awui tuingashit chi leiching ngasakra, kala ana mayonshapra da shākhi hangtā kahai chili nganing ngasakra.
Kha avāva̱na chi shāthang ana mamayaakha, awui khangashit kala shākhi hangtā kahai chi manganingpaimara; kala avāva̱na makhamayāwui vang sha̱nao chili
Kalikha ana awui khangashitwui azingli leilaga lah machukmaja̱la akhamor eina matuitā kahai china khalapta leilakha fathuihaida,
agaharana chi shāthang khikha mahāngakha, ana ngashit kahai chi leipapamra, kala ana hāngkahai tuingashit lungli khalapchingfaya.
Kha agaharana chi shāthang makhamayā chitheiakha, awui khangashit lah akhamor eina machukmaja̱la matuitā kahai chi khikha makhaning ngasāhaora kala
Kha ra̱meinao akhana, chi maningakha pāngkahai sha̱nao akhana khangashit kasā chi awuili leichingra.
Sha̱nao china agaharawui shimli rākahaiwui thili khangashit saakha,
kala agaharana chi shālaga khikha mahāngla kala ali makhāmayā maleiakha, awui khangashit kala akhalattana shākhi hangtā kahai saikora leira.
Kha agaharana chi shāthang shimitmihaiakha awui khangashit kala akhamor eina shākhi hangtā kahaibing chi khikha makhaning ngasāhaora. Chi agaharana shimitmi kahaina, chieina
Tuingashit chi, maningakha shākhi hangtā kahai china akhalattali chotchāngkapai lei jiakha agaharana mashungmipai, lah agaharana shimithaipai.
Kha agaharana shāthang khikha mahāngakha apreiva̱wui tuingashit hangtā kahai chi ana mashungmi kahaina, awui tuingashitbing awuili leishona; kaja ana chi shāthang khikha mahāngmana.
Kha ana chi shālaga shimitmihaiakha, chiwui khayonkhamāng chi ana phungra.
Hi gahara eina preiva̱, avāva̱ eina mafakathui naongalāva̱, avāva̱wui shimli leilakhawui aniwui ngachaili shiyan sākhavai
“Midiannaowuitungli Israelwui mibingna athut khuingasaklu; chiwui thili nali nawo nayiwuili khuiunghaora.”
Kala Mosesna mibingli hānga, “Mibingli raisāri shaksā ngasaklu; chieina athumna
Nana shang-shangwui eina mi thingthing raili chihora.”
Chithāda Israel shang tharāda khaniwui eina raiwui vang mi thing tharāda khani shoka.
Kala athum mi thing tharāda khani chi pāngmon Eleazarwui nao Phinehasli ngasoda raili chihovai; awui pāngli katharapamwui khorkhongbing kala khongkhavai talla̱la sangmi.
Mosesli kaso kahai athishurda athumna Midiannaoli rai sāda mayarnao katonga shaothathaowa.
Midiannaowui awungabing kala khangateibingli ngasoda shaothathaowa; awungabing chiya, Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, kala Reba athum phangāna; Beorwui nao Balaamlila raighai eina sāthathaowa.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Midiannaowui sha̱nao naoshinaobing tukunga; kala athumwui sha̱kei, yaoshang, kala ot katonga ngaponkhuilaga khuiunga.
Athumna kapam keinung kala kha̱ saikora athumna mei thottamihaowa,
kala ngaponkakhui otbing, mila, sha̱keila khuiunga.
Athumna ngaponkakhui otbing kala tukkakhui mibing saikora Moses, pāngmon Eleazar kala Israel ashangva̱wui mangāli athumna khuiungmi, hi Jerichowui Jordan ngalemli khalei Moab tampākpheilina.
Moses, pāngmon Eleazar kala yarui ashangva̱wui kathāna saikora athumli samphang khavai rāmrah ayarli shokngaroka.
Kala Mosesna raiwui eina hankhaunga raimi otva̱bing thingkhali kala shākhali kathāna akhavābingli malungvāthaowa.
Mosesna athumli hānga, “Nathumna sha̱nao saikora hi ring khangasakla?
Peorwui maramli
Chiwui vang eina mayarnao naoshinao, kala mayarnaoli ngasopi kahai sha̱nao saikorala sāthathaolu.
Kha mayarnaoli mangasokapi sha̱nao saikora nathum khalattawui vang khuilu.
Rāmrahwui ayarli shinithang rāmrah vāsāpamlu; nathum kachikathāna mi sāthat kahai, kala kathingun saza̱ kahai leiakha nathum kala tukkhaungbing kakathumathang kala kashinethang tharngasakra.
Nathumna kashankachon kachiva̱, sāhuiwui ot saikora, mesamwui ot, kala thing eina sākakhuiwui ot kachiva̱ samathāra.”
Kala Pāngmon Eleazarna raili khavā mibingli hānga: “
Meina makachui ot, sinā, lupāsā, pithrai, mari, tin, kala mishi,
meili khāngkashapa kachiva̱ meilungli sangda khuishokphalungra, kala chi tharhaora. Chithālala makathara chi tara̱ eina tharngasakluipai; kala meili masangkapai kachiva̱ tara̱li sangda khuishokra.
Nathumna kashinethang kashankachon ngasa̱ra, kala nathum tharra; chiwui thili nathumna rāmrahli zangra.”
“Ngaponkakhui mila sha̱keila saikora pāngmon Eleazar eina Israel ashangva̱ avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui akhavābing nathumna shānkhuilu.
Ngaponkakhuibing chi khum khani sāda ngayarlaga khumkha rai khavābingli kala khumkha yarui ashangva̱li da ngayarmilu.
Kala rai khavābingwui yarwui eina
athumwui tangkhai chiwui eina khuilaga
Kala Israelli khami tangkhaiwui eina milapai, seilapai, gadhālapai, kala yaolapai, sha̱keibing hangphangāngāli ava̱va̱ khuira, kala
Kala Moses eina pāngmon Eleazarna
Raili khavābingna ngaponkakhui raimibingwui vang khuishoklaga katai chi hina: yao shātharuk kala thing hangshinida phangā,
sei thing hangshinida khani,
gadhā thing hangtharukta akha,
kala mayarnaoli mangasopirang kaje sha̱nao thing thumrāda khanina.
Kala raili khavābingna tangkhai samkaphang chi, yao shākathum kala thing thumrāda shini shāphangāna,
kala
Sei thing thumrāda tharukna, chili
Gadha thingthumrā shāphangā, chili
Sha̱nao thingtharāda tharukna, chili
Chieina
Mosesna Israelwui mibingli tangkhai, raili khavā mibingli tangkhai da mi—
yarui ashangva̱na tangkhai samkaphang chi, yao shākathum kala thing thumrāda shinina,
sei thingthumrāda tharuk,
kala gadhā thingthumrā shāphangāna,
kala sha̱nao thingtharāda tharukna.
Israel katongawui yar tangkhai chiwui eina mila, sha̱keila hangphangāngāli ava̱va̱ Mosesna khui, kala chi
Chiwui thili raimi thingthingwui otva̱bing, kala thingthingwui kala shāshāwui raithānabing Moseswui ngalemli rākazipa,
kala Mosesli hānga, “Narao ithumna thānda raili khavābing shānlaga ithumwui eina mi akhala mashimānmana.
Kala ithum mi kachiva̱na samkaphang
Kala Moses eina pāngmon Eleazarna khuikharā sinā kala khangatatei otbing chi khuiya.
Kala raimi thingthing, kala shāshāwui raithānabingna
(Raili khavā kachiva̱ athum khalattawui vangla khuiya).
Chieina Moses eina pāngmon Eleazarna raimi thingthingwui kala shāshāwui raithānabingwui eina samkaphang sinā chi khuilaga Israelwui mibingna phaningung khavai kazip khavai kachonshimli
Chitharan Reubenwui naomayara eina Gadwui naomayarabingwui sha̱kei sorngasaihaowa, kala Jazer eina Gilead ngalei seihomphung phālakra kaji athumna thei.
Chieina Gad eina Reubenwui naomayarabingna Moses, pāngmon Eleazar kala Israel yarui ashangva̱wui kathānabingli rāda hānga,
“Ataroth, Dibon, Jazer, Nimrah, Heshbon, Elealeh, Sebam, Nebo kala Beon,
na Israel yarui ashangva̱wui mangāli shaothat kahai ngaleibing hi sha̱kei haikhavai phālakra; kaja narao ithumwui sha̱kei kachungkha lei.
Kala athumna hānga, nathumwui mikyanli ithumli lukhamashan leiakha ngalei hi narao ithumwui shimlui sākhavai milu, ithumli Jordan makānkā ngasaklu.”
Kha Mosesna Gadshi naomayarabing eina Reubenshi naomayarabingli hānga, “Nathumna hili kasaikha pamlaga nachinā ngarāna rai asārala?
Israelwui mibingli
Navā ngarāli ina Kadesh-barneawui eina ngalei chi ayang khavai kachiho tharan athumnala hithāda sai.
Athumna Eshcol tampākli ayangda ngalei chi thei,
Kala

‘Kachangkhat eina Egyptwui eina kashoka mibing kum maga̱ eina thuida chiwui atung saikora, ina Abraham, Isaac kala Jacobli ngashit kahai ngalei chi athum matheimara, kaja athumna ili ningtongda shurchao majimana.
Jephunnehwui naomayara Caleb eina Nunwui naomayara Joshua animāng zangra, kaja anina ili ningtongchaoda shura.’
Hithāda
Kala yanglu, navā ngarāwui mahut, morei kaphungbingwui mithot nathum shokrali, hieina
Kaja nathumna
Chieina athumna ali rānganaida hānga, “Ithumna hili yaoshim kala ithumwui naongarā pamkhavai keinung sākāra,

kha ithum raisāri shaksāda Israel mibingwui rai mangāli ithum zatra kala ngalei chili athumli machipamranglakha eina tangda rai ngararra. Kala ithumwui naongarāli ngalei hiwui mina masāza̱ khavai raipan sākahai keinungli chipamhaisāra.
Israelwui mibingna ngalei chili athumwui samphangrān masamphangranglakha eina tangda ithum mahanungmara.
Khikhalajila Jordanwui lākhavāk kala kānkālaga athumli ngasoda ithum mapammara; kaja ithumwui shimlui Jordan makānkāla hivāk zingshoshong leikahaina.”
Mosesna athumli hānga, “Nathumna
kala nathumwui raimi saikora Jordan kānkāda
kala ngalei chi
Kha nathumna hithāda masaakha, yanglu, nathumna
Nathumna naongarāwui vang keinung sālu kala yaobingwui vang yaoshim sālu, kala nathumna ngashit kahai chithāda sālu.”
Kala Gadwui naomayarabing eina Reubenwui naomayarabingna Mosesli hānga, “Ameina kakaso tākam eina narao ithumna sāra.
Ithumwui prei-naosan, yaoshang kala sha̱kei saikora Gilead keinung chili haisara;
kha ishāmeina kakaso thāda narao ithum makānda vāra, raisāri shaksāda raimi kachiva̱
“Kalikha Gadwui naomayarabing kala Reubenwui naomayarabingna
Kha athumna raisāri sāda nathumli ngasoda makānrarakha, athum nathumli ngasoda Canaan ngaleili pampapamra.”
Chieina Gadwui naomayarabing kala Reubenwui naomayarabingna ngahānkai, “
Ithumna

Chieina Mosesna Gadwui naomayarabing eina Reubenwui naomayarabing kala Josephwui nao Manassehwui shang tangkhaili Amorwui awunga, Sihonwui wungram kala Bashanwui awunga, Ogwui wungram, keinungbing kala leiretbing eina ngasoda mihaowa.
Kala Gadwui naomayarabingna Dibon, Ataroth, Aroer,
Atroth-shopan, Jazer, Jogbehah,
Beth-nimrah, kala Beth-haran, hibing hili keinung sakāda raipan sākāhai, kala yaoshimla sākai.
Kala Reubenwui naomayarabingna Heshbon, Elealeh, Kiriathaim,
Nebo, Baal-meon (amingbing chi ngacheihaira) kala Sibmah hibing hili keinung sākai; kala athumna sakā kahai keinungbingwui ming ngateida phoka.
Kala Manassehwui nao Machirwui naomayarabingna Gilead akhuida chili leikasā Amornaoli kashamhaowa.
Kala Mosesna Manassehwui nao Machirli Gilead mida ana chili pamhaowa.
Kala Manassehwui nao Jairna chiwui kha̱bing ayuikhui kala chili Havvoth-jair phokmi.
Kala Nobahna Kenath eina chiwui kha̱bing ayuikhui, kala ngalei chili awui ming Nobah phokmi.
Moses eina Aaronna Israelwui mibingli Egyptwui eina thānlaga ashang eina kashok tharan, athumna maron-maron eina vākazang apambing chi hina.
na kakaso athishurda Mosesna athumwui zatkaphok apam eina thuilaga maron-maron apambing chi kapihai; kala athumna zatkaphok atamwui athishurda apambing chi hina.
Athumna Rameseswui eina kachāng kharewui tharāda kaphangāthang Israelwui mibingna makānkhami phanitwui thili akhama kathā Egyptnaobingwui miktāli maiyālak eina zatphoka.
Chitharan Egyptnaobing athumwui ngachaili
Chieina Israelnaobingna Rameseswui eina zatphoklaga Succothli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Succothwui eina zatphokta lamhāng amareili khalei Ethamli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Ethamwui eina zatphokta Baal-zephonwui zingshovāk Pi-hahirothli ngareiungda Migtolwui mangāli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Hahirothwui eina zatphokta lamhānglungli khalei shamadru kānda Etham lamhāngli kathumthangwui shongzā zata, kala athumna Marahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Marahwui eina zatphokta Elimli vai; Elimli ura̱ tharāda khani khawok kala khaneirong hangshini phora, kala chili athumna rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Elimwui eina zatphokta Red Sea pheili rāmrah vasāpama;
Kala athumna Red Seawui eina zatphokta Sin lamhāngli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Sin lamhāngwui eina zatphokta Dophkahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Dophkahwui eina zatphokta Alushli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Alushwui eina zatphokta mibingna tara̱ mangkhavai masamkaphang Rephidimli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Rephidimwui eina zatphokta Sinai lamhāngli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Sinā lamhāngwui eina zatphokta Kibroth-hattaavahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Kibroth-hattaavahwui eina zatphokta Hazerothli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Hazerothwui eina zatphokta Rithmahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Rithmahwui eina zatphokta Rimmon-perezli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Rimmon-perezwui eina zatphokta Libnahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Libnahwui eina zatphokta Rissahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Rissahwui eina zatphokta Kehelathahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Kehelathahwui eina zatphokta Shepher Kaphungli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Shepher Kaphungwui eina zatphokta Haradahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Haradahwui eina zatphokta Makhelothli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Makhelothwui eina zatphokta Tahathli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Tahathwui eina zatphokta Terahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Terahwui eina zatphokta Mithkahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Mithkahwui eina zatphokta Hashmonahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Hashmonahwui eina zatphokta Moserothli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Moserothwui eina zatphokta Bene-jaakanli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Bene-jaakanwui eina zatphokta Hor-haggidgadli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Hor-haggidgadwui eina zatphokta Jotbathahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Jotbathahwui eina zatphokta Abronahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Abronahwui eina zatphokta Ezion-geberli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Ezion-geberwui eina zatphokta Zin lamhāngli (chiya Kadesh) rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Kadeshwui eina zatphokta Edom tharili khalei Hor Kaphungli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Aaronna Hor Kaphungli kathi atam chitharan a kum shākha maga̱da kathum kāhairasai.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Hor Kaphungwui eina zatphoklaga Zalmonahli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Zalmonahwui eina zatphokta Punonli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Punonwui eina Obothli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Obothwui eina zatphokta Moabwui tharili khalei Iye-abarimli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Iyimwui eina zatphokta Dibon-gadli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Dibon-gadwui eina zatphokta Almon-diblathaimli rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala Almon-diblathaimwui eina zatphokta Nebowui mangāli khalei Abrim phungreili rāmrah vasāpama.
Kala athumna Abarim phungreiwui eina zatphokta Jerichowui Jordan ngalemli khalei Moab tampākli rāmrah vasāpama.
Athumna Jordanli rāmrah sākapam chi Beth-jeshimoth eina thuilaga Moab tampākli khalei Abelshittim shangshunga.
Kala
“Israelwui mibingli hānglu, nathumna Canaan ngaleili zangkida Jordan kakān chitharan,
nathumli rida ngalei chili pānkasā mibing saikora nathumna kashamshokserlu, kala athumwui lungshom, kala athumwui heikakhui meoma̱ kala athumwui khorum khavai kajuipam saikora sakazamserlu;
kala nathumna chili shimlui khuida pamra, kaja ngalei chi ina nathumli shimlui sākhavai mihaira.

Nathumna shangwui athishurda kalā yanglaga ngalei chi khuira; shang kateona teoda kala shang kahakana hakta samphangra; kalā yanglaga kashok chi mi chipawui sāra, navā ngarāwui shimkhur athishurda shangbing china ngalei chi khuira.

Kha nathumna ngalei chili rida pānkasa mibingli makashamshok ngakān-akha, katai athum china nathumwui vang mikli khayam kazang kala arili kashāt kazang thahaora, kala nathumwui kapampamli athumna sheikhutchingra.
Kala ina athumli sāmira da phaningkasā thāda ina nathumlila sāra.”
Israelwui mibingli kasolu kala athumli hānglu, “Nathumna Canaan ngaleili kazang tharan (nathumna shimluikat sākhavai ngalei tongda samphangki kaji Canaan ngalei china),
nathumwui azingvāk Zin lamhāng eina thuilaga Edom ngakhumtara; kala nathumwui azingshong Salt Sea vākatangli thari sākhuira;
kala Akrabbimwui ajuikakā azingshong tāda Zin makanvālaga Kadesh-barneawui azingshong vākatangli thari sākhuilu; chiwui thili Hazar-addar kantāda Azmon vāza̱ra;
kala Azmonwui eina thari chi Egypt kongrāvāk ngareiunglaga shamadruli ungtangra.
“Zingtun thariwui vanga, Great Sea eina chiwui shamadrupheibing hi nathumwui zingtun tharina; hi nathumwui zingtun thari sāra.
“Hi nathumwui atungshongwui tharina: Great Sea eina thuilaga Hor Kaphung vāshungda nathumwui thari sāvālu;
nathumna Hor Kaphung eina thuilaga Hamath vāzang khavaili thari sāvālu, kala thari chi Zedadli shangchatra.
Chiwui thili thari chi Ziphronvāk vāshungda Hazar-enanli shangtangra; hi nathumwui atungshongwui tharina.
“Nathumna zingshoshongwui thari Hazar-enan eina thuilaga Shaphamli thari sātāra;
kala thari chi Shaphamwui eina Ainwui zingshoshong khalei Riblahli tāra; kala thari chieina tālaga zingshovāk kaphung aren vāda Chinnerethwui shamadruli tāza̱ra.
Chiwui eina thuilaga Jordan tashungra, kala Salt Seali tātangra. Hi nathumwui ngaleili kuikhamarei tharibingna.”
Reuben shangwui naomayarabing eina Gad shangwui naomayarabing, kala Manasseh shangwui naongarā tangkhai shangwui alungli avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur athishurda shimlui samphanghaira.
Shang khani kala shang tangkhai chi zingshovāk Jordan ngalemli khalei Jericholi athumwui shimlui samphang kahaina.”
“Hi nathumwui shimlui sākhavai ngalei ngayarmiki kaje mibingna: pāngmon Eleazar eina Nunwui nao Joshua anina.
Nana shimluiwui vang ngalei chi ngayar khavai shang kachiva̱wui eina kathāna ava̱va̱ khuira.”
Hi athum mibingwui amingbingna: Judah shangwui eina Jephunnehwui naomayara Caleb.
Simeon shangwui eina Ammihudwui naomayara Shemuel.
Benjamin shangwui eina Chislonwui naomayara Elidad.
Dan shangwui eina Jogliwui naomayara kathāna Bukki.
Josephwui naopharāt Manasseh shangwui eina Ephodwui naomayara kathāna Hanniel.
Kala Ephraim shangwui eina Shiphtanwui naomayara kathāna Kemuel.
Zebulun shangwui eina Parnachwui naomayara kathāna Eli-zaphan.
Issachar shangwui eina Azzanwui naomayara kathāna Paltiel.
Kala Asher shangwui eina Shelomiwui naomayara kathāna Ahihud.
Naphtali shangwui eina Ammihudwui naomayara kathāna Pedahel.
Canaan ngalei chi Israelnaobingwui vang shimlui ngayarmi khavai
“Israel mibingli kasolu, kaja athumwui shimlui yarwui eina Levishi somkhavai keinung yarlu; kala nathumna athumwui seihomphung sākhavai keinungbingli kuikhamareibing chi milu.
Keinungbing chi athumwui sāda chili pānra, kala athumwui seihomphungbing chili athumwui sei, yao kala sha̱kei saikora keira.
Levishili miki kaji seihomphungbing chi keinung phākhowui eina khuining thingkha ayar kuimareida Levishili mira.

Kala keinung ayar kuimareida tamkhava chi zingshoshong khuining thingkhani, azingshong khuining thingkhani, kala atungshong khuining thingkhani, kala atungshong khuining thingkhani hailaga keinungna alungthungli leingasakra; chi athumwui keinungbingwui seihomphungbing sāra.
Levinaobingli keinung tharuk miki kaji chili mi shaokathatbingli yāmvā ngasakta ngayin khavai sāngasakra. Kala chili lāngmeida keinung hangmatida khani mira,
Levinaobingli miki kaji keinungbing kala chiwui seihomphungbing zangserda hangmatida chishatra.

Kala nathumna keinungbing yarki kaji chi Israelnaobing shang kahakwui eina hakta kala kateowui eina teoda khuishokmira, shimlui kahak kateo samkaphang kachiva̱, chiwui athishurda athumwui keinung sākhavai Levinaobingli mira.”
Kala
“Israel mibingli hānglu, nathumna Jordan kānlaga Canaan ngaleli kazang chitharan,
nathumna nathum ngayin khavai keinungwui vang apam kapangshoklu, kaja matheimada mi shaokathatabingna chili yāmngayinpaira.
Keinungbing chili athut khuiki kajibingwui eina yāmngayin khavai pamna, kaja yarui ashangva̱ mangāli bicharwui vang makānganingranglakha eina tangda mi shaokathata chi mathiaranu.
Kala nathumna miki kaji keinungbing chi nathumwui ngayin khavaiwui keinung tharukra.
Ngayin khavai keinung sāda Jordan makānkāda keinung kathum kala Canaan ngaleili kathum da nathumna mira.
Keinung tharuk hi Israelnaobing, kha̱mibing, kala ngasokazatabingna ngayin khavai keinung sāra; kala matheila mi sakathata china chili yāmngayinra.”
“Kha mi akhana zeighai ngahā eina mi shaothathaiakha, a mi khayumana; alila shaothatra.
Kala mi akhana apāngli khalei mi thikapai ngalung eina mili ngashumhaida mi chi thihaiakha, a mi khayumana; alila shaothatra.
Lha mi akhana awui pāngli khalei mi thikapai thingwui khutlai eina mili ngaphitsangda a thihaiakha, a mi khayumana; alila shaothatra.
Asheewui athut hāngsangki kajipana ali samkaphang tharan alila shaothatra.”
“Kala mi akhana rimlaga yangkashiwui vang mi akhali pharthathaiakha,
lah yangshāt eina apāng eina ali ngashumda thihaiakha, alila shaothatra; a mi khayumana; athut hāngsangki kajipana ali samkaphang tharan shaothatra.”
“Kha kachikathā yangkashi maningla matheimada kashuirak eina pharthathaiakha, lah marimla yapthathaiakha,
lah yangkashila maning, ningrin leida sāthatkhangaila maningla, matheimada thikapai ngalung eina herda thihaiakha;
mi sakathata eina asheewui athut khuiki kajipawui ngachaili yarui ashangva̱na shiyan-chikan chiwui athishurda bichar sāra;

kala yarui ashangva̱na mi sākathata chili asheewui athut hāngsangki kajipawui eina kankhuilaga ngayin khavai keinungli chipamra, kala thao neomi kahai pāngmon chi mathiranglakha eina tangda ana chili pānra.
Kha kalikha ana ngayin khavai keinungwui ayarli kānkashok theida,
asheewui athut hāngsangki kajipana ashaothathaiakha, shaokathatwui khayon maleimana.”

Kaja pāngmon kharei mathiranglakha eina tangda mipa chi ngayin khavai keinung chili pamphalungki kajina. Kha pāngmon kharei thikahaiwui thili mi sakathata chi awui shimlui khalei ramli latungki kajina.
“Kala hibing hi mithot kachida nathumwui somkhavai pam saikorali ainza kala shiyan-chikan sāki kajina.”
Chili lāngda khanguiya, mi shaokathata mirinwui ngatangman nathumna makhuipaimara, kha ali sāthatphalungra.
Kala ngayin khavai keinungli yāmsang kahai mi chili, pāngmon kharei mathirangakha shimli ungpam khavai ngatangman makhuipaimara.

Nathumna pamda khalei ngalei chili hikathāwui eina mamakhao ngasakpaimara; kaja ashee katā eina ngalei makhao khangasakna, kala chi khikhanala phungthuikapai maleimana; kaja ashee tākhangasak eina ngalei makhao ngasak kahai chi, ashee tāngasak kahaipawui ashee maningla mapheopaimana.
Nathumna pamda khalei hiwui alungli ila pamdalei, ngalei chi masākhamāngalu; kaja
Josephwui eina katung Manassehwui naomayara, Machirwui nao Gileadwui naobing, ashi shimkhurwui kathānabingna Moses kala Israelnaobing shangwui akhavābingwui mangāli rāhānga;
athumna hānga, “
Kha athumna Israel shang khangateili favāhaiakha, ithumwui awo-ayiwui shimlui phungvāhaora, kala fakhavā shangwui shimlui ngasāhaora. Chieina ishi shangwui shimlui yarwui eina khuithuihaora.
Kala Israel mibingwui jubilee kharā eina, athumwui shimlui chi fakhavā shangwui ngasāhaora; kala shimlui chi ishi shangwui eina khuithuihaora.”
Chieina
Zelophehadwui naongalāva̱ ngarāwui pongli
Israel mibingwui alungli shangwui shimlui shang akhana akhawuili maphungvāmara; kaja Israelnaobing kachiva̱na kachichāshi avāva̱ ngarāwui shangwui shimlui khuiphalungra.

Kala Israel mibingwui alungli sha̱naona shimlui kakā leiakha, avāva̱ shangwui shimkhurwui mayarnao akhali ngakumra, chithakha Israel mibingwui mi kachiva̱na kachichāshi shangwui shimlui khuimaronki kajina.
Chieina shang akhawui eina khangatei akhali shimlui maphungthuimara; kaja Israel mibingna shang kachiva̱ kachichāshi shangwui shimlui khuira.”
Mosesli
kaja Zelophehadwui naongalāva̱bing Mahlah, Tirzah, Hoglah, Milcah kala Noah athumna avāgato ngarāwui naomayarabingli ngakuma.
Athumna Josephwui eina katunga Manasseh shimkhurwui naongarāli ngakuma, kala athum shimkhurwui shimlui chi shangwui shimkhurli leipapama.
Hi Jerichowui Jordan ngalemli khalei Moab tampākli
Jordan kong kānlaga, Arabahwui lamhāngli, kaja Suphli kāroda khalei Paran kala Tophel, Laban, Hazeroth kala Dizahabwui ngachaili leilakha Mosesna Israel saikorali kahāng tuibing chi hina.
Seir Kaphung shongfa eina vaakha Horebwui eina Kadesh-barneali tharāda akhathang zata.
Kala kum hangmati, kachāng tharāda akhawui kharethang
Hi ana Amornaobingwui awunga, Heshbonli pānkasā Sihon, kala Bashanwui awunga Og, Ashtaroth kala Edre-ili pānkasābingli yuikahaiwui thilina.
Jordan kānvāda Moab ngaleili leilakha Mosesna ain hi pheichitheida hānga,
“Horebli leilakha ithumwui

ngareikhuida Amorbingwui phungreiram chili, kala Arabahli athumwui luinganai saikora phungreiramli, kala tampākli, kala Negebli, shamadrupheili, Canaannaobingwui ngaleili, kala Lebanon kongrei, Euphrates kong vāshungda nathumwui shongzā zatvālu.
Yanglu, ina ngalei chi nathumwui mangāli haimihaira; vāda navā ngarā, Abraham, Isaac, kala Jacobli, kala athumwui ara̱-azāli mirada
nathumwui Vare china nathumli kachungkha mayāsangmihaira, kala yanglu, ara nathum kazingramwui sirāli ngayāhaira.
Ana nathumli ngashit kahai athishurda aruila navā ngarāwui
Kha nathum hiyākhawui kharit otphun kala nganang khangazai imāngna kathāda phungra?
Nathum shang-shangwui eina thangkhama, theishingkhui kathei, kala kashok-khangakhang theithangkhamei mi kapangkhuilu, chiwui athishurda ina athumli nathumwui akhava sākhavai sangra.’
Kala nathumna ili ngahānkāda, ‘Ithumli nana hāngkhami otsak chi ithumwui vang phālaka’ da hānga.

Chieina ina shang-shangwui eina thangkhama kala kashok-khangakhang theithangkhameiya athumli khuilaga nathumwuitungli akhava sāda thingthingwui, shāshāwui, hangphangāngāwui kala tharārāwui raithānabing kala otva̱bing nathumwui shang vāpeida sāngasaka.
Kala chitharan nathumwui bichar samebingli ina hānga, ‘Nachinā ngarāwui ngachaili nilala, kha̱mi eina athumwui ngachaili nilala mashungrik eina bichar sāmilu.

Nathumna bichar kasā atamli mijang masālu, kharei kateo ngaraichada sāmilu; kala mimai mayangalu; kaja hi Varewui bicharna; kala tuingaphun chi nathumwui vang saknāhaiakha, nathumna ili khuirāda ina yangmira.’
kala nathumna sāki kaji ot saikora ina atam chitharan kasoser kahaina.
“Kala ithumwui Varena kagaso athishurda ithumna Horebwui eina zatphokta nathumna theikahai khamashā kala khangachee-khangachā lamhāngli zatta Amor phungreiramli vai, kala Kadesh-barneali vāshunga.
Kala ina nathumli hānga, ‘Ithumwui
Yanglu, ngalei chi

Chieina nathum saikorana ili rānganaida hānga, ‘Ithumli rimeida mi chihosa, chithāda athumna ithumwui vang ngalei chi vāyangkhuida ithumwui vākhavai kala keinungbing chili zangkhavai shongfabing kala pao khuiungmiluishitranu.’
ina chi phārada theihaoda, shang-shangwui eina mi ava̱va̱ khuilaga athum tharāda khani chihoi;
kala athumna phungreiramli vāda Eshcolwui tampākli khalalei chi ara̱yangkhui.
Kala apam chiwui athei-araila athumna khuiungda ithumli pao saikora unghānga, kala ‘ithumwui
kala nathumwui kachonshimli kharopta hānga, ‘Kaja

Ithum kali vauki kajikhala? Ichinā ngarāna ithumli ning shimān ngasakta, “Mibing chi ithumli hakmei kala juimei; keinungla haklāka kala kazing kazokta ngaveitithai; chili lāngda Anakimwui naomayarabingla chili thei.”’ da hānga.
Chieina ina nathumli hānga, ‘Athumli maningkhariklu lah mangacheealu.
nathumwui Vare china nathumwui miktāli Egyptli nathumwui vang sāmi kahai thāda nathum mangalila rizatta nathumwui vāng ngararmira;
kala nathum hili marāshungranglakha eina tangda nathumwui kazāt-kakar kachida avāvana anaomayarali phungkazat thāda,
Kha tui hi hānghailaga nathumna
ana nathumli rizatta nathumli ngayā mei eina thānmi, ngashun muiyā eina thānmida nathumwui kachonshim khaning khavaipam phākhuimi, kala nathumna kachikathā shongfa eina vāra kajila chitheimi.
“Kala nathumwui tui shālaga
‘Navā ngarāli ina mirada ngashit kahai lam khamathā chi, makaphā makhayā thot hiwui mibing akhala kathei masamphangmara;
Jephunnehwui nao Calebmāngna kathei samphangra, khikhalajila ana
Nathumwui vang eina ilila
nawui mangāli nganingda khalei Nunwui nao Joshuana zangra, ali katomlu, kaja ana Israelnaoli thānzangra.
Chili lāngda nathumna sāshai ngasāhaora da kaphaninga nathumwui naongarābing, kala aja kashi-kaphā matheirang kaje athumna chili zangra, kala ina athumli chi mida athumwui ngasāra.
Kha nathumva, ngareikhuida Red Seashong vāda lamhāngli kuizatlu.’
“Chieina nathumna ili ngahānkai, ‘
Kha
Chi eina ina nathumli hānga, kha nathumna
Chieina phungreiram chili kapama Amornaobingna khui khalor thāda Seirli nathumli ngararlaga Hormah vāshungda kharomvai.
Chieina nathumna hanungda
Chiwui vang nathumna Kadeshli chirankha pamkahaina.
“Chiwui thili
‘Nathumna phungreiram hili kuizatta sangnāhaira; ara atungshong ngareishangulu.
Kala mibingli hānglu, ara nachinā Seirli kapāna Esauwui naomayarabingna pamkhavai ngalei chi kānki jihaira, athum nathumli ngacheehaora. Chieina ning ngasharlu;
athumli mangasungalu; kaja ina athumwui ram akhala nathumli mamimara, phei naisang khavai rikkha eina tangdala mamimara; khikhalajila Seir Kaphung hi Esauna samphangrān ina ali mikahaina.
Nathum zākhavai kashakazā pheisā milaga athumwui eina lozālu, kala nathum mangkhavai tara̱la pheisā eina lomanglu.
Khikhalajila nathumwui kasāsā saikorali nathumwui
Chithāda ithumna zatvāmamānda ithumwui achinā Seirli khalei Esauwui naomayarabingwui eina kanvāmamānda, Arabah shongfa eina Elath kala Ezion-geberwui eina thuihaowa.
“Kala ithumna ngareikhuida Moabwui lamhāngshong vāhaowa.
Kala
(Rida Emimnaobing chili kachungkha pānsai; athumla Anakimnaobing thāda mi juilaka;
Anakim kaji thāda athumlila Rephaim hoi, kha Moabnaobingna athumli Emim hoi.
Hornaobingla rida Seirli pānsai, kha Esauwui naomayarabingna yuihaida kashamhailaga athum pamkahaina;
‘Ara ngakarthuilu, kala Zered kong makānlu.’ Chieina ithumna Zered kong makānkai.
Thot chiwui rai kasābing
Kaja athum mathingakānranglakha eina tangda
“Chithāda raimibing chi mibingwui ngachai eina thiser kahaiwui thili,
na ili hānga,
‘Aja zimiksho Moabwui thari Arli nathumna kānkāra;

kala nathumna Moabingwui tharili vākashung tharan athumli masingkharākalu, lah mangasungalu, kaja ina Ammonwui naomayarabingwui ngalei akhala nathumli mamimara, kaja Lotwui naomayarabingna samphangrān ina athumli mikahaina.’
(Apam chili Rephaimwui ram hosai; kaja rida Rephaimnaobingna chili pamsai, kha Amonnaobingna athumli Zamzummim hoi,
haklak kahai kala mi mayālak kahai, kala Anakimnaobing thāda mi juilaka; kha
Seirli pānkasā Horbingli
Avvimnaobingwui vanga, Caphtorli khalei, Caphtornaobingna Gaza vāshungda sākathānmihailaga athumna ngapaikakhuina).
‘Ngakarthuida zatphoklu, kala Arnon tampākshong vālu; yanglu, Heshbonwui awunga Amorpa Sihon kala awui ngalei nathumwui pāngli ina horsangmi kahaina; awui ram khuiphokuda rai saulu.
Aja okathuili khalei miyur saikorawui ningli nathumli khangachee kala ningkakashak, nathumwui pao shālaga athumna kathirda reorang khavai ina sangmihaora.’
‘Ili nawui ngalei hi eina kakān ngasakmilu; ina shongfamāngli zatmara, uishong lah yāshong makānshoklakmara.
ina zākhavai kashakazā aman mida nawui eina lozāra, ina mangkhavai tara̱la aman mida lokhuira; shongfamāng kakān ngasakmilu,
ithumwui
Kha Heshbonwui awunga Sihonna ithumli awui lam makān ngasakthuwa, kaja
Kala
Chieina Sihonna awui mi saikorali ngasoda ithumli ngarar khavai Jahazli rai.
Kala
Chitharan ithumna awui keinungbing saikora yuikhuida peichaoda sākhayāngmiserhaowa; sha̱nao, mayarnao, naoshinao akha nida mataimilakmana;
keinungli khalalei ot eina ngasoda ithumna sha̱keila ngaponkhui.
Arnonwui kaphungpheili khalei Arer eina thuilaga, kala tampākli khalei keinung chiwui eina thuilaga Gilead eina tangda ithumwui vang keinung phākho juinahaowa kaji maleilakla yuihaowa;
Varena mavālu kaji pam, kaja Jabbok kongpheili khalei Ammonwui naobingwui keinungmāngli ithumna mavākazangna.
Kha
“Chieina
Kala ithumna Bashanli Ogwui wungram, Argobwui apam saikora—keinung akhanida makakhui maleimana: keinung hangtharuk khuiya.
Keinung saikora hi raipan juilak eina ngaveitit kahai, ngaveila veiruithing sāsangkazazak kahaimānga; chili lāngda makhangavei kha̱wung kachungkhala khui.
Kala ithumna Heshbon awunga Sihonli kasā thāda keinung kachiva̱ peichaoda sākazammiserhaowa; mayarnao, sha̱nao kala naoshinaobingla sāthatserhaowa.
Kha keinungbingwui sha̱kei kala otyur saikora ithumna ngaponkhui.
Chithāda atam chitharan, Jordan makānda khalei Arnon tampāk eina thuilaga Harmon Kaphung shangshungda, Amorbingwui awunga khaniwui ngalei ithumna ngapaikhui.
(Sidonnaobingna Harmonli Sirion hosai, kala Amornaobingna Senir hoi),
kaphungli khalei keinung saikora, Gileadli khaleila, Bashanli khaleila, Salecah kala Edre-i shangshungda, Bashan awunga Ogwui wungram katonga ngapaikhui.

(Kaja Rephaimbingwui eina taikashok Bashanwui awunga Ogmang leisai; yanglu, awui pet mari eina sāda maripet chiwui asān khuining chiko, kala aret khuining matina, aruila Amonbingwui Rabbah keinungli lei).
Kala Gileadwui katai eina Bashan saikora Og awungawui wungram katonga, chiya Argobwui wungram saikora ina Manasseh shang tangkhaili mi. (Bashanwui ngalei katonga chili Rephaimwui ngalei hoi.
Manasseh shangwui Jairna Argobwui wungram saikora, chiya Bashan, Geshur kala Ma-acathwui thari vāshungda khui, kala kha̱ chili khalattawui ming phokta aja rāshungda Havvoth-jair hoi).
Machirli ina Gilead mi,
kala Reubennaobing eina Gadshangli ina Gilead leiretwui eina thuilaga Arnon tampāk vāshungda mi, tampāk alungthung thari sāda, Jabbok kong vāshungda, Ammonnaobingwui tharina.
Kala Arabahla Jordanna thari sai, Chinnereth eina thuilaga Arabahwui shamadru vāshungda; Salt Sea, kala Pisgah amai ungshungda china zingshoshongwui tharina.
Kha napreiva̱̱ ngarā, naongarā, kala sha̱kei (kachungkha lei kaji ina thei) ina nathumli mikahaiya keinungbing hili haisāra;
na nachināli mangasāmkhui ngasakranglakha eina tangda, kala athumnala
Kala atam chitharan ina Joshuali kasoi, ‘
Nathum athumli mangacheepaimana; khikhalajila nathumwui vang ngararkhame chi
‘O
Jordan kānda khalei khamathā ram, mathalāk kahai phungreiram kala Lebanon kaho chi ila athei khavai kha-vāngasakmilu.’ da ina seihā sāda poi,
Kha nathumwui vang eina
Pisgahwui phungreitonli kālaga zingtunshong, atungshong, azingshong, kala zingshoshong kuimareida namik eina yangda ngashānkhuilu; kaja na Jordan hi makānmara.
Kha Joshuali otsin chisinda ali katomlu kala pingngasaklu; kaja mibing hili ana thānvāda nana kathei apam chi ana athumli khuingasakra.’
Chiwui vang ithumna Beth-peorli kāroda tampāk chili pamkahaina.
“Chieina ara, O Israel, ina tamchithei kahai ain kala shiyan-chikanbing chi ningkachang eina mayonlu, kala chibing chi sālu; chithakha nathum ringra, kala navā ngarāwui
Ina kagaso tui chili nathumna mangarumsangalu, khuikashokla makhuishokalu; chithāda ina nathumli kagaso,
Baal-peorli
kha
“Yanglu, nathumna vāzangda samphangki kaji ram chili nathumna shurphalungki kaji ain kala shiyan-chikan,

Saikora chi mayonlu kala sāchinglu; chi nathumwui thangkhamei kala theishingkakhui awor ngasāra, kaja yur khangateina shiyan-chikan hi shālaga, ‘Thangkhameiya kala theishingkakhuiya kahaka yurlaka’ da hāngra.
“Kaja ithumna khangakao tharan,
Kala nathumli ina aja hāngchithei kahai khangaronga ain hikathā khiyurwui ain kala shiyan-chikan leikhala?
Horebli
Chiwui thili
Kala nathumna sāki kaji awui tuingashit ningkhami tharā chi ana hāngmi; kala ana lungphek khanili chi kapisangmi.
Kala atam chili
“Chiwui vang eina nathum khalatta ning ngasharlu, kaja Horebli
ning ngasharlu; kaja nathum khalatta mangui khavai, mayarnao ngamāndala, sha̱nao ngamāndala,
okathuili khalei sā ngamāndala, kachikathā khamasaili angachāng kāda yongkazat vānao ngamāndala,
okathuili kachikathā ngawokazata, kathuka tara̱lungli khalei khaih ngamāndala meoma̱ masākhuialu.

Kala ning ngasharlu, kaja kazingramli yangkāda nathumna zimik, kachāng, sirābing, kala kazingramli khalei yur saikorali theida nathumna chili khorumlaga otram ngatha̱paishina; okathuili khalei saikora chi Varena mikahai chili nathum khorumthuihaipaishina.
Kha nathumli
Chili lāngda nathumwui vang eina
Kaja I ngalei hili thisangphalunghaora, I Jordan makānmara; kha nathumna kankāda khamathā lam chi samphangra.
Nathum khalatta ningngasharlu, maningakha
Khikhalajila
“Nathumna ngalei chili pamda, naola kala ara̱-azāla kachungkha pharākhuida sāngda pānkahai tharan, azak khangatatei meoma̱ sākhuilaga sanguihaiakha, kala

nathumwui shākhi sākhavai aja ina kazing ngaleiwui mingzaida nathumli kahāngna, kaja nathumna Jordan kānda apamki kaji ngalei chili nathum masāngla shimān ngakanhaora; nathum chili sāngda maokthuimara kha shimānchaohaora.
Kala
Kala chili nathum, mipāng eina sākakhuia, mikla makathei, khanāla makashā, anganamla makhanganama thing ngalung varebing chili khorumra.
Kha chiwui eina nathumna
Nathumna kachotkachāng samkaphang tharan, kala ot saikora hi nathumli naoda rākashung atam chitharan nathumna
kaja

“Kaja arui ngahānlu, thuikahai atam kala na mapharāranglakhawui alungli Varena okathuili mi semthang eina thuida, kala kazingram akatang akhawui eina khangatei akatangli, hikathā kahaka ot mashokhaira, lah mashāhaira? da ngahānlu.
Nathumna kashā thāda yur khangatei khipāshina varewui tui meilungwui eina matuida shālaga ringda leili?

Maningakha akhalattawui vang yur akhali khangatei yur akhawui eina chāng yangda, matakhak kahai masākharar khudam eina, tekhamatei eina, kala rai eina, kapanga pāng eina pāngthei katingshokta, lah kahaka khangachee otsak eina, nathumwui miktāli Egyptli nathumwui vang
Nathumli hi chitheihaira, kaja
Kazingramwui eina ana nathumli awui khon shāngasaka; kaja ana nathumli machin khavaina; kala okathuili awui kahaka mei theingasaka, kala meilungli nathumna awui akhon shai.
Kala navā ngarāli ana leikashiwui vang athumwui thili athumwui ara̱-azāli kapangkhuida, kala a zangchaolaga awui kahaka pangshap eina nathumli Egyptwui eina thānshokmi,
nathumli thānzang khavai, nathumwui mangāli hakkhamei kala pangkhamei yurbingli kashammihai, kala athumwui ngalei nathumwui shimlui sākhavai aja nathum hili khaleina;
chiwui vang eina hi aja theilu, kala ningli shāptithailu; kaja kazing atunglila, ngaleiwui azinglila
Chiwui vang eina ina aja nathumli kagaso hiwui athishurda
kaja kachikathāna awui khongnaili rida yangkashi maleila sateihaida mi sāthathaiakha, mi shaokathatana manglā kankhavai, ana keinung hibingli ngayingkhui khavai chili ayāmsangra:
Reubenshiwui vang Bezer lamhāng, kala Gadshiwui Gileadli khalei Ramoth, kala Manassehshiwui vang Bashanli khalei Golan, keinung kathum hina.
Israel naoshinaobingwui mangāli Mosesna ain khami chi hina,
kaja Egyptwui eina kashok tharan, Mosesna Israelnaobingli hāngkachithei ain kala shiyan-chikanwui apong, kala mashun tuibing chi hina,

Beth-peorli kāroda khalei Jordan tampāk kankāda Amorwui awunga Sihonwui ngaleili leilakha kahāngna, Sihon hiya Heshbonli pamkasā Mosesna thānda Israelnaobingna Egyptwui eina kashok tharan maikashi mikahaipā china.
Awui lam kala Bashan awunga Ogwui lamla, Jordan kānda zingshoshong mungkasā Amornaowui awunga khaniniwui lam athumna khui;
chiya Arnonwui tampākpheili khalei Aroer eina thuilaga Sirion (chiya Harmon) vāshunga;
kala Jordan zingshoshong khalei Arabah Ngayi katonga vāshungda Pisgah phungrei pheili thari sākhui.
8Mosesna Israel saikorali hokhuida athumli hānga, “Nganālu, O Israel, ina aja nathumli shākhavai kagaso ain kala shiyan-chikanbing hāngkachithei hi nathumna ningkachāng eina shākhuida hi mayontitlu.
ithumwui Varena ithum Horebli leilakha tuingashit akha sai.
na ishāva ngarāli tuingashit kasā maningmana, kha aja ringda khalei ithumli kasāna.
na phungreitungli meilungwui eina nathumli mai ngareingasungda khangazekna,
kala
‘Narkahaipam Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānkashoka
“‘I maningla vare katei maleimana.
Athumli makhorumpaimana lah otram mangangatha̱paimana; khikhalajila
kha ili leishida kala ningkhami saikora khamayona thingthingli makhangachei leikashi chithei.
Tharukthang nathumna ot sāda, nathumwui ot saikora sākhuira;
kha kashinethang nathumwui
nawui Varena nathumli awui pāngthei kharei eina Egypt raopamwui eina thānshokmi kaji nana phaningungra; chiwui vang eina
“Phungrei chi meina chuida nathumna tangkhamanglungwui eina akhon chi kashā tharan, nathum kala nathumwui khararnao kala shang-shangwui kathānabingna ili rānganai,
kala nathumna hānga, ‘Yanglu, ithumwui
Chiwui vang eina ara ithum khiwui vang thisāra? Kaja ithumwui
Kaja phasā khavai saikorawui alungli kachikathā mi akhana, ithumna kashā thāda meilungwui eina kharinga Varewui akhon shākahai khipālongna ringlikhala?
Vānganailu, kala
“Kala nathumna ili kahāng chitharan
Athumwui ning hithachingda ili khangachee eina ningkhami mayonsersi kaja athumwui vangla, ara̱-azāwui vangla, kayākha phāra̱khala!
Athumli kachichāshi kachonshimli hanungserulu, da vāhanglu.
Kha nava iwui ngalemli nganingsālu, ningkhamila, shiyan-chikan kala sharphahorla, ina nali hāngserda nana athumli tamchitheiserra; chithāda sāda ina mikahai ram chili athumna vāpamda chi mayonra.’
“Chiwui vang eina
nathumwui Varena nathumli kaso kahai apong saikorali zatlu, chieina nathum okthuida ringphāmeira; kala nathumna samphangki kaji ram chili nathum okpeimeira.”
chithāda sāda nathumla, nanao mayarabingla, athumwui ara̱-azābingla ina nathumli kaso kahai awui ningkhami kala shiyan hi thangkachida mirinli mayonchingda
Chiwui vang eina nganālu O Israel, ning ngasharlak eina chibing chi sākhavai sālu; chithākha nathum mahaimeira, kala navā ngarāwui
nathumwui Vareli nathumna wuklung, manglā, yāng tongtingda leishira.
Kala aja ina kaso kahai tui hi nathumwui ningli phumtithaida;
nathumna nanao ngarāli meisā eina tamchitheilu, nathumna shimli pamlala, shongfali zatlala, kapi atamlila, kala kathui atamlila hāngchitheilu.
Kala mamalai khavai, nathumna khudam sāda nathumwui pānglila, mik khaniwui ngachai khaveilila hokthāngphunglu.
Kala nathumna shimwui khāmongpheilila, kala nathumwui ngaveilila kapisanghailu.

kala nathumna mamathuikasang khamathā thongthāngna pemting kahai shimbing, nathumna makhonkakhui ra̱khongbing kala nathumna malingkasang drakhā yāmgui eina oliverong saikora hi mida kashai kala katho chitharan,
ning ngasharlu, maningakha nathum narkahai shim, Egypt ngaleiwui eina khuikashoka

nathumna hithāda nathumwui naongarābingli hāngra, ‘Ithum Egyptli Pharaohwui raonao sāsai; kala

Ana kaso kahai thāda ithumna ningngasharlak eina
Athumli ngalā mangakhotpaimara; nanao mayarabingli athumwui nao ngalāva̱bingli makhuingasakalu, nathumwui nao ngalāva̱la athumli mafavā ngasakalu.

Kha nathumna athumli hithāda sālu, kaja, athumwui hanphutbing sākhailu, kala athumwui pakra̱bingla shaokhaimihaolu, tarungla ta̱teklu kala athumwui meoma̱ saikora meili riktāmihaolu.

Kha
Chiwui vang eina theilu, kaja
kala ali yangkakharing mile sāshimānda athut hāngsanga; kala ali yangkakharinga mile ngalāngda athut hāngsangra.
Chiwui vang eina ina kaso kahai awui ningkhami, ain eina shiyan-chikan ning mazinglak eina sāki kajina.

nathumli ana leishida somira, kala khamayāla mayāsangmira; ana nathumwui ara̱-azā, thingphun luivātlila, athei-arailila, nathumwui māngumla, drakhāra̱, thao kala sha̱kei, yaonaobingla, nathumli mirada navā ngarāli ngashit kahai ngalei chili chungsang ngasakta somira.
Yur khangateili lāngmeida nathumli somira; nathumwui alungli sha̱naola mayarnaola nao kashum maleimara, sha̱keila khamashing maleimara.

“Nathumwui ningli, ‘Yurbing hina ili hakmeida phaningda hāngakha, kathāda ina athumli kashamshokpairakhala?’
nathum athumli mangacheelu, kha Pharaohli kala Egyptnaobingli
nathumwui mik eina theikahai hakkhamahā otsak sāchithei kahai, khudambing, pāngthei kharei katingshokta
Chili lāngda mathi khangakāna yāmngathum kazatbinglila sāthat khavai
Athumli ngachee khavai maleimana; kaja nathumli ngasomida khalei
nathumwui Varena yurbing hi teomamei shimān ngasakra; nathumna athumli sakkha eina masāshimānrarmara, chi maningakha nathumli ramsāna chungnāhaida yuihaora.
Kha masāthattupranglakha eina tangda athumli
Kala ana athumwui awungabingla nathumwui pāngli horsangmida okathuli athumwui ming shimānchao ngasakra; kala nathumna athumli mashimitchaoranglakha eina tangda khipākha nathumli mangasungrarmara.
Athumna sākakhui meoma̱bingwui ama̱ nathumna meili riktāserphalungra; chili romkahai sinā lupāsā chila makahaopaiamna, lah khalattawui vang makhuipaimana, china nathumli thikhavai sapaishina; kaja hi
Kala ningkakachai ot nathumwui shimli makhuiungpaimara, kala chithāda khonkashi ngasāpaishina; nathumna ningkachaida katava̱li horhaolu, kaja hi khonkashi otna.”
“Aja ina nathumli kaso kahai ningkhami saikora hi ning ngasharlak eina mayonlu; chithakha nathumna okpeida mataisangra kala navā ngarāli
Kala malangso khavai, nathumwui ning yangkhui khavai kala Varewui ningkhami mamayonnikhalada yangkhui khavai, zingkum hangmati lamhāngli

Kala ana nathumli wuklung nemngasaka kala nathumli thaingasakta manna mizai, chiya navā ngarāna kala nathumna khikhala kaji makatheina; kaja mina kashakazāmāng eina kharing maningmana kaji ana nathumli theikhui ngasak khavaina, kha
Kum hangmati zatlaga nathum pheila khamahing maleimana, nathumwui kashankachonla kakāk mavaimana.
Avāva̱na naoli hāngkhamachin thāda Varena nathumli hāngkhamachinna da theikhuilu.
Chiwui vang, nathum ngacheemeida
Khikhalajila
Kehu, ngum, drakhārong, khaorārong, kabothei, oliverong, khuira̱ khavāt makhalei ngaleipamna,
ngalei chili nathumna kashakazā khavāt akhala maleimara; chiwui lungguibing chi marimānga, kaphungbing chiwui eina nathumna kori changkhuira.
Kala nathumna phāshak phazāda thochingra; khamathā ngalei khamiwui vang
Zālaga thoting kahai tharan, shim khamathā sāda kapam tharan;
kala nathumwui sha̱keila mataisangda kala nathumna sinā lupā kachungkha kasing tharan, nathumwui khalei saikora mataisang kahai tharan,
nathumwui ningli lāngsoda, nathumli tuknar kahai shim, Egyptwui eina thānshokkhame,
kahaka kala khangachee khangachā lamhāngli nathumli thānkhame, sākashe phara̱-pharā kala seithatpam, tara̱ makhalei ngalei kathengpamli meizailung eina tara̱ khuikhame,
nathum malangso khavai kala nathumwui ning yangkhui khavai, kaja naoda kaphā ngasā khavai, lamhāngli leilakha, nawo ngarāna matheithangkhamei manna mizai.
‘Iwui pangshap eina kala iwui yāng eina lan saikora sākakhuina’ da phaningpaishina, ning ngasharlu.
nathumwui Vareli phaningunglu, kaja nathumli shāng khavai pangshap khami chi ana; kaja aja zimiksho navā ngarāli ngashit kahai chi leiching khavaina.
Kala kalikhada nathumna
Nathumwui
“O Israel, nganālu; nathum aja Jordan kānki jiura kala nathumli hakkhamei kala pangkhamei yurbingli angapaikhuiki kajina; athumwui keinung kahakmānga, kala kazing kāzokta ngaveitit kahaimānga,
chiwui mibingva haklaka kala juilaka, Anakimwui naomayarabingna; nathumna kathei kashā, ‘Anakwui naomayarabingli khipāna ngasunglengrakhala?’ da kahāng china.
Chiwui vang eina aja hi theilu, kaja nathumwui mangāli meichot eina zatta khalei chi
Nathumwui khamashung khangarongwui vang kala ning khangatarwui vang nathumna athumwui ram chi vākhuiki kaji maningmana; kha yurbingwui makaphā makhayāwui vang
“Chiwui vang eina theilu, kaja nathumwui khamashung khangarongwui vang
Nathumna lamhānglungli
Horebli eina tangda nathumna
Kala Varena awui pāngmareng eina kapilaga lungphek khani chi

ili makhāmalu, athumli sāshimānhailaga athumwui ming okathuiwui eina katatserhaora; kala ina nawui eina athumli reikhameiya kala pangkhameiya yur nawui eina sākhuira.’
“Chieina ina ngareikhuida phungreiwui eina lattai kala phungrei chi mei chuisai; kala tuingashitwui lungphek khani chi ipāng khani eina singphungsai.
Kala ina yangkatā eina, yanglu, nathumna
Chiwui vang eina ina singkasā lungphek khani chi nathumwui miktāli horkhai kahaina.

Chiwui thili ina morei ot chi khuida, nathumna sākakhui sināwui seinao chi khuilaga thottāda shaokachupta chifa thāda sāngasaka; kala akha̱-akhā chi phungreiwui eina longkatā kongrānao chili ina horsanghaowa.

Ina nathumli theithangwui eina thuida nathumna
Kala ina
Narao Abraham, Isaac kala Jacobli phaningungmilu, mibing hiwui ngakaishitingting kahai lah athumwui makaphā, morei kasā nilala khayangkheimilu;
Chimaningakha, nana ithumli thānshok khavaipam chiwui mibingna, “Khikhalajila
Kaja nawui pangshap eina kala nawui pāng katingkhami eina thānshok kahai athum hi nawui mina kala nawui shimluina.’
“Atam chili
Kala nana sakhai kahai lungphekli kapi kahai tui chi ina kapimiluira, chi nana oko chili sanghailu.’
“Chieina ina acaciathing eina oko akha sākhui, kala kharewui thāda lungphek khani shānkhuida chi ipāng eina singphungda phungreili khuikai.
Kala yaruina kazipthang, phungreili meilungwui eina
Chiwui thili ina ngareikhuida phungreiwui eina tai kala ina sākakhui lungphek chi oko chili sanga; kala
(Israelwui mibingna Be-eroth Bene-jaakan
Chiwui eina athumna Gudgodahli vai, kala Gudgodahwui eina Jotbathah kaho tara̱ khalong ngalei chili vāshunga.
Atam chitharan
Chiwui vang Levina achinā ngarāwui thāda shimluiyar masamkaphangna;
