kala nathumwui phākhavai ina kahāng hiwui athishurda
Yanglu, kazingramla kala kazingramwui kazingramla; okathuila kala chiwui alungli khalei saikorala
Chithālala, navā ngarāli
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui wuklungwui ahui rimshoklu kala mangakaishichingalu.
Kaja
Marānaowui vang kala ra̱meinaowui vang mashun bichar sāmi, kala kha̱milila leishida kashakazā kala kashankachonla ngarānmi.
Chiwui vang nathum kha̱mili leishitheilu; khikhalajila nathumla Egypt ngaleili kha̱mi sāda leisai.
nathumwui Vareli ngacheelu; nathum ali ngavapta otram ngatha̱lu, kala awui mingli mingzailu.
A nathumwui masot mikhavaina; nathumwui mik eina theikahai hakkhamahā khangachee-khangachā ot sakhame Varena.
Navā ngarā athum hangshinimāng Egyptli tai; kha ara
“Chiwui vang eina
Kala aja zimiksho, (kaja ina mathei-mashārang kaje nanao ngarāli kahāng maningmana),
Egyptli leilakha Egyptwui awunga Pharaohli kala awui pam saikorali awui khudambing kala awui otsakbing chi phaningkhuilu;

kala ana Egyptwui raimibingli, athumwui siguili, kala athumwui siguigaribingli, khi sāmameikhala kaji; athumna nathumli kharomkharā atamli ana kathāda Red Seali ngaphumthat ngasak; kala aja eina tangda athumli kathāda
kala nathumna lamhāngli zatta, nathumna apam hili marāshungranglakha eina tangda ana nathumwui vang khi sāmimamei kajila;

Reubenwui naomayara, Eliabwui naomayarabing Dathan eina Abiramli ana khisa; kathāda ngaleina khamor makālaga, anilila, ashi shimkhur, athumwui kachonshimbing, kala aniwui thi kashura katongali manglākapai saikorali ngasoda mayuisangkhala kaji katonga hi Israelwui alungli shoka;
kaja
“Chiwui vang eina nathum aja zimiksho ina kagaso chi nganālu, chithāda sāda nathumna vāzangda akhuiki kaji lam chi kapang kaping eina akhuishapra.
Chieina nathumli mira da navā ngarāli ngashit kahai, seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalong ngalei chili nathumna sāngmeida okthuira.
Khikhalajila nathumna samphangki kaji ngalei chi, nathumna shokkhavai Egypt ngalei thāda yāmguili athā yaoda pāng eina tara̱ chailaga hanthing-hanrā lingkashai kathā maningmana;
kha nathumna vākhuiki kaji ngalei chi kazingram eina zingrot tāmida vazāki kaji kaphung eina tampākna,
nathumwui Varena yangkhami ngaleina; kum haokaphok eina thuilaga kum kapei eina tangda
ngalei chili luivāt atam chalāk eina ana khari-khanao zingrot tāmida zātla, nathumwui drakhāthei, nathumwui thao, kachungkha kazipkhuira.
Kala nathumwui seihomphungli seizātla kharngasakra; kala nathumna zāda thotinghaora.
Ningngasharlu, ningngacheihaida vare kateibingli otram ngatha̱da khorumhaipaishina,
chithāda
“Chiwui vang eina iwui tuibing hi nathumna wuklungli kala ningli phārihaira; kala chibing chi nathumwui machutkhui khavai pānglila masa̱hailu, kala khaveili naphailu.
Kala chibing chi nathumna shimli pamlala, shongfali zatlala, kapi atamli kala kathui atamli nanao ngarāli tamchitheiki kajina.
Kala nathumna shimwui khāmonglila, ngaveithinglila kapihailu,
okathui mashimānranglakha eina tangda nathumli mira da navā ngarāli
“Kaja ina kaso kahai ningkhami hi ningsanglak eina mayonda
yur kateibingli
Nathumna phei naikasang pam kachiva̱ nathumwui sāra; nathumwui leiret lamhāng eina thuida Lebanon shangshungda, Euphrates Kong eina thuida zingtun shamadru vāshungra.
Mi khipānakha nathumli mangasungrarmara; ana ngashit kahai thāda nathumna vāki kaji ngalei saikora nathumli ning chipāda ngachee khavai
“Yanglu, ina aja nathum mangāli sokhami kala khonkashi haimili:
ina kagaso,
kha
Kala nathumna akhuiki kaji lam chili
Athum chiya Jordan kānlaga shongfawui zimiktunshong, zimik tunkhavai shong Canaannaobingna pānda khalei Arabah, Gilgal ngaheili khalei Morehwui shirimthing phorkhavai chili khalei maningmala?
nathumwui Varena khami ngalei chi vākhui khavai nathumna Jordan kānvāki kajina. Kala nathumna chi samphangda chili akapān chitharan,
nathum ning ngasharlu, kaja aja zimiksho ina kagaso khami ain kala shiyan-chikan saikora chi mayonra.
Kachangkhat eina nathumna kashamshokki kaji yurbingna otram khangatha̱ athumwui varebing, kajuiya phungreili kala phungrābing, kala khamateka thingpheilila khalei apam saikora sākazamiserra;

nathumna athumwui hanphutbing pheikhaira, kala athumwui pakra̱ shaokhailaga athumwui Asherim meili riktāmira, kala athumna semkakhui meoma̱ saikora shaokhaimihailaga athumwui aming apam chiwui eina sāshimānhaolu.
Kha, aming leikhavai kala awui pamkhavai kali-kalikharano, shang katongawui eina apam chi phākhuida

kala kachikachiliranu nathumna nathumwui rikkatā kachigat kala pha̱kaphayā, nathumwui tithe kala kachigat khami, nathumwui khangashit kachigat, lemmet kachigat, seinao, yaonao pharākharela, chili khuivāmiserra;
kala chili
Aruihon nathumna kachichāwui ningli theikakhui chiwui athishurda sākhangangai kasā thāda chile masāluimara;
kaja nathumli
Kha nathumna Jordan kānlaga,
awui ming leikhavai
Chili nathum, nanaomayarabing, nanaongalāva̱bing, nathumwui rao mayarnao kala sha̱naobing kala nathumwui keinungli khalei shimlui mayarkasanga Levinaobing zangda
Nathumna kathathei apam kachida rikkatā kachigat saikora mapha̱phayāphāphā khavai ning ngasharlu;
kha nathum shangwui alungli
“Chithālala, nathumwui keinunglungli nathumna sā sāthatta
Asheemāng chi nathumna mashaipaimara, chiya tara̱ heikatha̱ thāda ngaleili heitha̱haolu.
Tithe eina kachigat zāt, drakhāthei, thao, sha̱kei pharākhare, nathumna khangashit sākahai khangashit kachigat, lemmet kachigat, nana khuikharā kachigat kachichā keinunglungli mashaipaimara;
kha
Nathumwui keinungli ngasopamlakha eina tangda Levinaobingli mahorhaipaimara kaji theilu.
“Ngashit kahai athishurda
Kalikha
Chao, lah seichuisā kashai thāda kathara mila, makathara mila shaipaisera.
Theilu, kaja nathum ashee mashaipaimana; kaja ashee hiya manglāna; chieina nathumna asāli manglā eina ngasoda mashaipaimana.
Nathum chi mashaipaimana, tara̱ heikatha̱ thāda ngaleili heitha̱haolu.
Nathum ashee mashaipaimana; nathumna
Kha kathara nathumwui eina chigatkharān otbing kala nathumwui khangashit kachigatbing,
kala nawui rikkatā kachigat chi nathumwui
Ina kagaso tui saikora hi rinsitta sākhavai ningngasharlu;

athumli shurda nathumla khalenli mamanhaialu; athumli nathumwui mangāli shimitmi kahaiwui thili, athumwui varebingwui ponglila, yurbing hina kathāda athumwui varebingli otram ngatha̱khala?— ila chithāda sāsika da mangahānalu.
nathumwui Vareli chithāda masāpaimana; kaja
“Nathumwui eina marānbing nilala, mang kathei mi nilala shokta nathumli matakhak kahai lah khudam chitheilala,
kala awui kahāng khudam chi ungshungkachangda, kala ana nathumna makatheiya chili, ‘Ithumna khangatei varebingli khorumsa kala ithum athumli otram ngatha̱sa’ da hānglala,
marānbing nilala, mang katheiapali nilala manganāsangalu; kaja nathumna
Nathum
Kha marānbing lah mang katheiya chili shaothatphalungra, kaja Egypt raopamwui eina ngatangkhuikhame kala thānshokkhame

“Ava̱ akhana kapharā nachināna nilala, nanao mayarana nilala, nanao ngalāva̱na nilala, nawui leikashi preiva̱na nilala, nawui mashitmeikap kaje ngasotnaona nilala, nali athumna ngathumda suida, nathumna, lah navā ngarāna matheikasa khangatei varebingli vākhorumsa da hāngakha,
nathumwui kuikhamareiliranu, khanaili khaleiranu, katāli khaleiranu, okathui akatang akhawui eina khangatei akhaliranu, nathumna makathei varebingli khorumsā kachipa chile,
nathum awui tui makhuisangalu lah manganāsangalu, lah chikathā mili lukhamashanla malumashanalu, nathum ali kachihola machiholu, lah ali kathumla mathumhaialu.
Kha nathumna ali shaothatki kajina; shaokathat chili nana pāng parrikapra, kala chiwui thili katei mibingna kānaora.
Egypt ngaleiwui raopamwui eina thānshokkhame
Kala chi Israel saikorana shālaga ngacheera, kala nathumwui ngachaili hikathā makhayā ot masālengluimara.”
“Nathumwui pamkhavai apam,
kachikathā makhangatun mi china nathumna makatheiya chili, ‘Ithumna vāda khangatei varebingli khorumda otram ngatha̱sa’ da mi khangatei thānthui kahai, nathumna kashā leiakha,
nathumna meisā eina ngathingkhui kazaklu; kala hikathā ningkakachai ot hi nathumwui alungli shok kachangkhathaiakha,
keinung chili khalei mi hupta, chili khalei sha̱keibingla nathumna raighai eina sakazamserphalungra.
Nathumna chiwui thongthāngbing saikora kayāng khamaseli kazipkhuida, kala chiwui ot saikora
Chiwui otyur nathum akhala pāngli mangathānpaimara; chithāda sāda
Nathumna
Kaja nathum hiya
Nathumna shaikapai sāyurbing chi hina: sei, yao, me,
seichui, chaonao, chaoyur, sirao, ibex, kala ramyao.
Asho khani khangapāka sāyur kachiva̱, kala sāyurwui ngachaili sheilaga khaluikazā sābing nathumna shaipaisera.
Sheilala lah asho khani ngapāklala mashaiki kaji sābing chiya: ut, theba kala lungkaihok; kaja sheilaga khaluizālala asho makhangapāk hiya makathar sāyurna.
Kala hok asho ngapāklala sheilaga makhaluizāthuda nathumwui vang chi matharmana. Chiwui asāla mashaipaimana, kala chiwui kathingunlila nathum masaza̱paimana.”
“Tara̱lungli khaleiwui ngachaili shaikapaibing: angachāng kakā kala ahor kakā saikora nathum shaipaisera.
Kha angachāng kala ahor makakā kachiva̱ nathum mashaipaimana; hi nathumwui vang matharmana.”
“Nathumna kathara vānaoyurbing saikora shaipaisera.
Kha nathumna mashaikapai chiya: khalāng, khalāng sāshā, khalāng-veizor,
khararkha̱, lāngpop kala khalāng yur saikora;
hangkhā kala hangkhāyur saikora,
ostrich, pawung ngayazā, shamadruvā, sā kashaiya yur;
pawung kateo, pawung kahakyur, ra̱har,
utvana̱, carrion khalāng kala khaishumva̱,
varok, varokyur, hoopoe kala konghar.”
“Kala angachāng kakā aga̱-akai saikora nathumwui vang matharmana; chi mashaipaimana.
Angachāng kakā kathar yurbing nathumna shaipaisera.”
“Yao anaowui asā ava̱wui na̱ra̱ eina nathumna mahangshaipaimana.”
Awui ming leikhavai ana hākhuiki kaji apam chili nathumwui māngumwui eina, drakhāthei, thao, seinao kala yaonao pharākharewui eina tithe chi nathumwui
Kha
chi lupā onkhuihailaga
kala lupa chi nawui ningkachāng athishurda sei nilala, lah yaonilala, drakhāthei nilala nathumna shaikhangangai chi loshaida
Kala shimlui makhaleia lah masamkaphanga, kachichā keinungli khalei Levinaobingli mahorhaialu.”
“Kakathuma kum kachigata, kumpei atamli, nathumwui tithe katonga keinunglungli rākazipserlu;
kala nathumwui keinunglungli khalei shimlui masamkaphanga Levinaobing, kha̱minao, marānao, ra̱meinaobing, athumli mizālu. Chithākha nathumwui otsak kachiva̱li
“Kum kashine kapei atam kajida, nathumna leiman saikora yangmida chihomira.
Kala hithāda chihomira: khongnainaoli chishut kahai chi kachishuta mi kachiva̱na chihomira, kaja
Yur kateile nathumna pokhuilu; kha nachinā ngarāwuili khalei saikora mapoluialu.”
“Kha nathumwui ngachaili kachāma mi maleimara, (kaja
ina aja nathumli kagaso hithāda
Kaja ngashit kahai athishurda
kha nathum mingairereo awui khavavāt chi yanglaga chishutkapapai chishutta yangmilu.

Makhamashung ningphanin wuklung mazang khavai ning ngasharlu, kaja ‘Ara kashine yangkhame kum ungshungki jiura’ da phaninglaga kachāma nachināli sākashi mikyan eina yanglaga ali khikhala mamiakha, ana nawuitungli
Nathumna athumli khami chitharan, kala nawui ningli maringkaphā maleila ali mingairereo miakha, hikathāwui vang
Kaja ngalei chili kachām-khangai mashimānlakmara, chiwui vang eina ina kagasona, nathum ngalei chiwui kachāma khangazana nachināli mingairereo eina milu.”
Kala nana ali kachiho tharan khamasai eina machihopaimana;
Kha
Nathum phaningunglu kaja Egypt ngaleili nathum raonao sāsai, kala
“Kha ana nali kala nashi shimkhurlila leikashiwui vang, ana ‘I nawui eina mathuimara’ kaja nawuili kapam ringphaakha,
nana nāhut kasui akha khuilaga khāmongli sa̱shānlu, chithakha ana nawui raonao sāchingra. Kala nawui rao sha̱naolila chithāpapamra.
Nana ali khalem eina chihohailala nawui vang kasak maleimana, kaja ngalangmanli khani shida mataida ana kum tharuk nali otram ngatha̱mi kahaina. Chiwui vang nawui kasasā kachiva̱li
Kha kum kachida na kala nashi shimkhurna,
Kha achuk makapeiya, phei katek nilala, khangapeo nilala, khangakhai-khangarai nilala leiakha
Chikathā chiya kachichā keinungli shailu; chaonao lah kahunga chaovāsā kashai thāda, kathara kala makathara minala shaipaisera.
Nathumna chiwui ashee mashaipaimana, asheeva ngaleili tara̱ heikatha̱ thāda heitha̱haolu.”
Awui ming leikhavai

Nathumna khawok kazang khamui eina ngasoda chi mashaipaimara; shinithang khawok makazang khamui kachotkachāngwui khamuimāng shaira, kaja nathumna Egypt ngaleiwui eina kashok tharan thaklak eina thuihaowa; Egyptwui ngalei eina kashok zimiksho chi nathumna mirin peida phaningungching khavaina.
Nathumwui leiretlungli, shinithangwui vang khawok kaho chi mahaipaimara; kala nathumna kharethang pha̱kaphayāwui sā chila ngayā haida kazing mathangnampaimara.”
“Nathumna makānkhamiwui pha̱kaphayā kachigat hi
kha
Kala nathumwui
Tharukthangwui vang nathumna khawok makazang khamui shaira; kala kashinethang yarui chingri kahai kazip khuilaga
Chiwui thili haptāwui phanit nathumwui
kala nathumna
Egypt ngaleili nathum raonao sāsai kaji phaningungda nathum ningkhami hi ning ngasharda mayonchinglu.”
phanit hili na kala nanaomayara kala nanao ngalāva̱, nawui rao sha̱nao eina mayarnao, Levinaobing, ngasokazat kha̱mi, marānao, kala ra̱meinao nathumwui keinungli khaleibing ringpharumra.
Shinithangwui vang
kha
Mashun nathumna mangui ngasakpaimana; nathum mijang masāpaimana, pheizā mazāpaimana, kaja pheizā kazāna thangkhameiwui mik ngapeo ngasakta khangarongli yonngasaka.
Khamashung, kala mashun chimāngli nathum shurlu, kaja
Kala nathumna
kala vare khangateibingli vāda otram angatha̱da khorumthuihaiakha, lah zimiklilapai, kachānglilapai, kala ina makhamayā kazingramli khalei khangatateililapai khorumakha,
chikathā pao chi nathumli hāngda nathumna kashā tharan meisā eina ngathingkhuilu; kala hikathā ningkakachai ot hi Israelwui alungli sāhaira kaji mashungakha,
nathumna chikathā makaphā kasapā kala kasāpava̱ chili ngaveili khuivāda nathumna lunggui eina horthathaolu.
Shākhi khani lah kathum leiakha thikhangayiya a chili shaothatra, kha shākhi khami akhamāngwui eina masāthatpaimara.
Shākhi sāmebing china ali shaothat khavai pāng parrikapra, chiwui thili katei mibingna zangnaora. Chithāda sāda nathumwui alungli makaphā otsak khalei tharngasakki kajina.
“Nathumwui keinung alungli mi akha eina akha shaothat khangarok, akha eina akha shimlui khangapai nilala, akha eina akha ngama̱-ngashao khangarok nilala, tui shokhaida nathumwui vang saknāhaiakha,
Levi pāngmonbing kala rida phungkasā bichar samebingli angasanlu; nathumna athumli ngasanda athumna nathumli tuiret chi hāngmira.
Chieina
athumna tuiret khami thāda, kala athumna sālu kaji athishurda nathumna sāki kajina; athumna hāngkahai chiwui eina kateokhala khayeiung khayeivā masāpaimana.

nathumwui Varewui mangāli otram ngatha̱da khalei pāngmonwui tui nilala bicharsamewui kahāng nilala manganāla ningkap eina kasāpa chili shaothatlu; chieina nathumna Israelwui alungli makaphā otsak samathā ngasaki kajina.
Kala mi saikorana shālaga ngacheeda mi kachiva̱na kachichāwui ningyat eina masāphaphālengluimara.
nathumwui Varena kapangkakhuipa chili awunga sāngasakra. Nathum ngachaiwui eina achinā akhali nathumwui awunga sangpaira; kha nachinā makhaninga yur kateili masangpaimana.
Awunga china awui vangmāng sigui kachungkha makeipaimara kala sigui keikhavai Egyptli mi machihopaimara kaja
Awui ning mangachei khavai preiva̱la kachungkha makhuipaimara, sinā kala lupāsā a khalattawui vang kachungkha makazippaimara.
“Ali awunga sangda ana awui wungpamkhongli kapam tharan Leviwui pāngmonbingna ain lairik kahai chi a khalattawui vang ana ainbing hi kapilaga lairikli haira;
kala chi awuili haida, awui mirin peida ana pākhavaina, chithāda sāda ana ain kala shiyan-chikan saikora hi awui
kaja achinā ngarāli a reimeiya da maphaning khavai kala ningkhamiwui eina uishong yāshong mangareithui khavaina. Chithāda sāda a kala anaongarā awui wungram Israellungli okpeimeira.”
Achinā ngarāwui ngachaili athum shimlui maleimara; ana ngashit kahai athishurda,
Seiranu, yaoranu, mibingwui pha̱khavai rākachigat chiwui eina athumna yar hithāda khuira, asai eina maisor khanini kala aphon chi khuira.
Māla, drakhātheila, kala nathumwui thaola hātkhuikhare kala nathum yaowui yaohah chichāpkhuikhare chi athumli mira.
Kaja,
“Kala Israelli leida khalei nathumwui keinung kachikathāwui eina, awui pānkhavai apamwui eina
chitharan ana awui khavāknao chili otram ngatha̱mida khalei Levinaobing thada awui
Kala chili rākachigat chiwui yar ala kateiwui eina ngaraichāda samphangra; kala chiwuitungli avāva̱ ngarāna chiphunkharā chila awui papama.
Nathumwui alungli naomayararanu, naongalāva̱ranu meili riktāda mamaseipaimara; khanong khayangranu, laivā kashonranu;
sha̱ khangasoranu, kalā khayangranu, khara̱katheiranu kala kazeikazangranu maleipaimara.
Hikathā kasā mi kachiva̱ hi
“Nathumna akashamshoki kaji yurbing hina laivā kasāli kala khanong khayangli shitsanga. Kha nathumli
nathumna Horebli yarui kazipthang,
Kala
Achinā ngarāwui eina ina na thāda marān akha shokngasakra, kala awui khamorli iwui tui sangmida ina kagaso saikora ana athumli hāngmira.
Kala iwui tui ana hānglaga kachikathāna makhuisangakha, chipale I khalattana athut hāngsangra.
Kha kachikathā marānbingna iwui ming singda ina makagaso marānkhami ana sāda, lah khangatei varebingwui tui matuiakha, marānbing chi thira.’
Kala nathumwui ningli ‘
marān akhana
nathumwui Varena mikahai ngalei chiwui alungli keinung kathum phaishokhailu.
Nathumna shongfa sāda
“Mi sākathatabingna apam chili yāmvāda awui mirin kankhui khavai apong hithai, rida yuikashi yangkashi maleila awui khongnaili makatheiwui vang sāthathaiakha, kaja—
khararli thing ata̱kida vālaga awui ngahā ngahingshokhaida angasotali saza̱da thihaiakha, awui mirin kankhui khavai hikathā keinungli yāmsangra.

Chi maningakha, malung thuimahungda leilakha asheewui athut khuiki kajipana shongfa tāhaoda angaphanrothaida, mipa chi mathingayisa-ilala, kaja ana awui khongnaili yangshāt maleisālala ali asāthatrot haipaishina.
Chiwui vang ina nathumli kagaso hina, keinung kathum phaishokhailu.
Kala navā ngarāli
kala ina aja hāngkahai ningkhami hi nathumna ning ngasharda mayontitta
Chi maningakha,
“Kha kachikathā mina yangkakharingwui vang awui khongnaili shongrimda marlak eina shaoza̱da thihaida ana hikathā keinungbing hili yāmvāhaiakha,
chitharan keinung chiwui khararnaobingna chikathā mi chi rāphākhuilaga athut hāngsangki kaje mi chiwui pāngli horsangmida sāthat ngasakra.
Nathumna ali yanglaga malumashanpaimana, kha Israelwui eina khayon makhalei mili sākathatwui khayon sāmathāda, china nathumwui vang phāmei khavaina.
Kalikhada mi akhana kachikathā mi akhali makhamashunga shākhi sāda khayon phenakha,
chitharan shongva̱ khaninina
Bichar sāmena meisā eina ngathingkhuilaga minamda phenphāphā kaji achinā chile,
shongrān miki kaji chi kaphenapali kashong lāngra; chithāda nathumwui alungli makaphā ot kasā tharngasakra.
Kala mi kateina shālaga ngacheeda hikathā makaphā ot nathumwui alungli masālengluimara.
Nathumna mik eina yanglaga malumashanpaimara; manglāwui vang manglā, mikwui vang mik, hāwui vang hā, pāngwui vang pāng kala pheiwui vang phei hāngsangra.”
“Nathumna yangkashebingli ngarar khavai khavā tharan, siguibing kala siguigaribing kala raimibing, nathumli chungkhamei theilaga nathum mangacheealu; kaja Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānshokkhame
Kala nathumna raiphungli vākhanganai tharan pāngmonna mangāshong vāda mibingli hāngra;
‘Nganālu, O Israel, aja nathumna yangkashebingli ngarar khavai rāhaira; nathumwui ning mashimānhaialu, ngacheeda makathiralu lah athumli yanglaga khangachee-khangachāla maleialu;
kaja nathumli ngasokhame chi
Chiwui thili otva̱bingna hāngra, ‘Shim sāhailaga dharkat makārang kaji khipā leikhala? Leiakha athumli hanunghaoranu, chi maningla raili thisanghaiakha mi khangateina dharkat kahaora.
Drakhārong lingsanghailaga maphāshailakrang kaji khipā leikhala? Leiakha athumli shimli hanunghaoranu, chi maningakha a raili thisanghaida mi khangateiwui sāhaora.
Ngalā khāmhailaga mashakzārang kaji khipā leikhala? Leiakha athumli shimli hanunghaoranu, chi maningakha a raili thisanghaida kateina ali khuihaora.’

Chili lāngda otva̱bingna hithāda hāngra, ‘Ngacheenahaida malung tātung kahai mi leila? Leiakha athum shimli hanunghaoranu; chi maningakha khangateibingla athumli theilaga athumwui thāda ning suitārumhaipaishina.’
Kala otva̱bingna hāngkup kahaiwui thili mibingwuitungli raimi kathānabing kapangsangra.
“Nathumna keinung akhali rai sākhavai khavā tharan, chingrihai khavai apong mida ngazekfalu.
Kala athumna nathumli chingri khavai mayaakha, chili khalei mi saikorali nathumwui vang thoukai phungngasakta nathumli otram ngatha̱mi ngasaklu.
Kha china nathumli chingrihai khavai mamayāmada, nathumli ngasungakha, nathumna keinung chi kuinamhaolu;
kala
Kha prei-naosanbing, sha̱kei kala keinung chiwui alungli khalei thongthāng saikora nathum khalattawui vang ngaponkhuipaira; kala
Hili khalei miyurbingwui keinungbing maningla nathumwui eina tāda khalei keinung saikorali nathumna chithāda sāserki kajina.
Kha nathumwui shimlui sāda
kha nathumna Hitnaobing, Amornaobing, Cannannaobing, Periznaobing, Hivnaobing kala Jebusnaobingla,
chithāda sāda nathumli athumna

“Nathumna keinung akha khuikhavai kasāngkha rai ngararda kuinam kahai tharan, ngahā eina thingbing chi masākazamhaialu, kaja nathumna athei-araibing chi phāshaira, kha arong mata̱tekalu. Chili khalei thingbing chila nawui yangkashebingli sākathat thāda thingbing chi haokazamrala?
Athei mashaipaimana da kathei thingrongbingva ta̱teklaga keinung chi mayuikhuiranglakha eina tangda nathumna ngaveithing sāpaira.”
nathumwui khararnaobing kala bichar samebingna chiwui ngalemli khalei keinung saikora, kathipamwui eina katā-khanai tamyangra;
kala nganaimeikap kaje keinung chiwui kathānabingna seilānao lāngkon masinglakrang kaji akha khuira.
Kala chiwui khararnaobing china tara̱ khalonga tampāk lamshālui akhali khuivada seilānao chiwui kahung tampāk chili sātekmihaora.
Kala Leviwui naongarā pāngmonbingna mangāli shokra, kaja
Kala mi thisang khahaiwui nganaimeikap kaji keinung chiwui khararnaobingna tampāk chili akahung shireitekta sāthat kahai seilānao chiwuitungli pāng mazikrora;
kala athumna shākhi sāda ‘Ashee tākahai hi ithumwui pāngna maningmana, ithumwui mikna katheila matheimana’ da hāngra.
Kala, ‘O
Chithāda khayon maleila sākathatwui khayon chi nathumwuitungli matā khangasak chi
“Nathumna yangkashebingli rai ngararlaga,
tukkhui kahai athumwui ngachaili ngalā khamathāva zangsāda nathumna ningchanghaida na khalattawui napreiva̱ sāda ali ngakumngaiakha,
ngalāva chi nawui shimli khuiungda awui kui simihaolu, pangringkorla chichāpmihaolu.

Kala ngalāva̱ china ali tukkakhuiwui kashankachon chi khuishokhailaga nawui shimli kachāng akhawui vang ana ava̱ avāli phaningungda chapngachāranu; chiwui thili nana ali ngasoda nani prei-gahar ngasāhaora.
Kha, nana ali maleishiluimada pānghaoga jiakha, awui thuikhangaili thuiranu; kha nana ali mayorzāpaimana, nana ali sāmashāthaoda chiwui vang ali raonao thāda masāpaimana.
“Kalikha mi akhana preiva̱ khani leilaga akhali leishi, akhali maningchāng-ilala, anina nao pharāmithathuida ana maleikashiva̱na mayarnao pharārihaikha,
ana awui naomayarabingli shimlui khayar tharan, ana maningkachānga preiva̱ chiwui pharākhare naomayara leilakha awui leishikhameiya preiva̱wui naoli khararanada masāpaimana;
kha ana maleikashe preiva̱na pharākhare nao chi yaronshaplakhawui nao sāthuda, awui khalei saikora khanishida chungmeida ali mira.”
ali avā eina ava̱va̱na kha̱wui ngavei ngalemli khararnaobingwui mangāli shimenvāmida,
anina kha̱ chiwui khararnaobing chili hāngra, ‘Iniwui nao hi ngakaishitingting kahai kala ngakaikashe, iniwui tuila makhuilakmana; morkahāk khamaripli akachang sai.’
Chithakha keinung chiwui mibing china ali ngalung eina horthathaora; kala nathumwui eina makaphā ot chi sāmathāhaida, Israel katongana theilaga ngacheera.
awui angun chi ngayā pongda mahaipipaimara, kha chithang chifa ngalāngki kajina; kaja phāshi sākahai mi hiya Varena khonshi kahaiya otna; chiwui vang eina
Kha ana katāva̱li pamhaida, maningakha ali makatheiwui vang mahomungmipaiakha, ana chi maphārāranglakha eina tangda nawui shimli haisara; chiwui thili ali hanmira.
Nachināwui gadhālapai, kachonlapai, tātunghaikasā ot saikora nathumna chithāda hanmiserphalungra; mayangkheihaipaimana.
“Nachinā akhawui gadhālapai, seilapai amaili saotahaikasā theiakha thāda mik eina mayanghaipaimana; nathumna chi khāngshokngachonki kajina.
“Mayarnaona khangavai sāri sha̱naona mangavaipaimana; kala sha̱naona khangavai sāri mayarnaona mangavaipaimana; ngavaiphāphā kaji hi
“Nathumna kalikha thingtunglilapai, ngaleililapai, vānaothip leisāda, anao zangsālala, ara̱ pumsālala, nathumna ava̱ eina ngasoda makhuiserpaimana;
nathumna ava̱ kashamhailaga anaomāng khuiki kajina; chi nathum ringphamei khavai kala okpeimei khavaina.
“Kachikathāna shim kadhar saakha, shimtungli pāngpo sāsangranu, pāngpo makāmada mi tatungthathaiakha, asheewui khayon nawui shimli rāpaishina.
“Nathumna sei eina gadhā seiot masingrumpaimana.
“Nathumna sahā eina khamanaka kazaira̱ manātta kachon rakkharum mangavaipaimara.
“Kalikha mi akhana ngalā khuida, ali ngasohailaga, ali yangkharinghaida,
kala ali khayak khavai kala aming zakshi khavai, ‘Sha̱naopava̱ hili ina ngakumkida kakhuina, kha ina kachingva̱na da theikhui khavai maleimana’ da hāngakha,
“Ngalāva̱shi avā eina ava̱va̱na bichar samebingwui mangāli kachingva̱wui shākhi mikhavai kha̱ chiwui ngaveili khuishokmiphalungra,
kala ngalāva̱ chiwui avāva̱na khararnaobing chili, ina inaongalāva̱ hi mayara hili ngakum khavai khamina, kala ana ali yangkharinghaowa;

kala yanglu, ana ali khayāmalā khavai phenda, ina nanao ngalāva̱ kachingva̱na da theikhui khavai maleimana” jihaowa. Kala kachingva̱na lah maningmana kaji theikhui khavai kachon hi eina theira, da hāngra. Kala kachon chi khararnaobingwui mangāli hārchitheira.
Chieina keinung chiwui khararnaobingna mayara chili khuida shaora;

kala athumna ali lupāsā shekel shākha eina kashong lāngra; kala anao ngalāva̱li maishi khangasakwui vang lupā chi ngalāva̱wui avāva̱li mira, kaja Israelwui kachingva̱ akhali maikashi mihaowa; kala apreiva̱ sāpapamra kala ali mirin peida ngakum ngasakpapamra.
“Kha ngalāva̱ chiwuitungli a hi kachingva̱ maningmana kaji theishingkhuihaiakha,

Israelwui alungli, ana avāva̱wui shimli khayorva̱wui otsak kasāwui vang ngalāva̱ chili avāva̱wui shim khāmongpheili shimenshokta, keinung chiwui mibingna ngalung eina horthathaora; chithāda nathumwui alungli makaphā chi sāmathāra.
“Kalikhada mākhām kahaiva̱ ngalānao akhali, keinungwui alungli mayarnao khangatei akhana samphangda ngasopimihaiakha,

nathumna ani khaninili keinungwui ngaveili shimenshoklaga lunggui eina horthatra; kaja kha̱lung chili ngalāva̱ china makhangakaowui vang anili shaothatra kala mayara china khongnai preiva̱li ain kaida phophāmi kahaiwui vang shaothatra; chithāda nathumwui alungli makaphā chi sāmathāra.
“Kha mākhām kahaiva̱ sha̱nao akha kharar khamaseli samphangda mayara china ali tukkhuida kala ali ngasopimihaiakha, ali ngasokapia mayarapā chimāng thira.
Kha ngalāva̱li nathumna khikha sākhavai maleimana; ngalāva̱ chiwuitungli kathiwui tandi khikha mikhavai maleimana, kaja hiya mi akhana awui khongnaili rai thatta shaokathat eina ngaraichai;
kachiwui vang jila ana mākhām kahaiva̱ chili khararli samphangda, kala ngalāva̱ china ngakaolala awui vang kankhuimi khavai mi maleisāmana.
mayara china ngalāva̱shi avāva̱li lupāsā shekel hangphangā mira, kala ana ngalāva̱ chili phophami kahaiwui vang ngalāva̱ chi mirin peida apreiva̱̱ sāphalungra.”
“Shangkhā vātkahai kala mayarnaowui khayā rimtā kahaia chi
Shāmnaona
khikhalajila nathum Egyptwui eina kashok atamli athumna kashakazāla tara̱la mamimana, kala Mesopotamiali khalei Pethorwui eina Beorwui nao Balaamli pheisā milaga nathumli khonshi ngasaka.
Chithālala
Athumli mashit khavai maleimana, lanla kahao khavai maleimana.
“Nathum Edomnaobingli machinpaimana, kaja athum nachināsera; nathumna Egyptnaobingli machinpaimana, kaja nathum aramli khami sāda pamsai.
Naothot kakathumli kapharā athumwui naobingna
“Nathumna yangkashebingli rai ngararda, rāmrahli leilakha makaphā ot chi masā khavai ngarangphalungra.
Nathumwui ngachaili kachikathāna ngayāshong pha̱ra̱ unghaida matharakha, ana rāmrahwui ayarli shokpamsāra, a rāmrahlungli mazangpaimana;
kha zingyinlam, a khalatta tara̱ eina ra̱vaira, kala zimik katun eina ana rāmrahlungli zangpaira.
“Nathumwui ngachir ngarang khavai apam rāmrah ayārli sāra, kala nathum ayār chili vāra;
kala nathumna thing akharip, khutlai eina ngasoda ngathānphungra kala nathumna ayār khavā tharan chieina ngalei kotlaga yātphumki kajina.
Khikhalajila
“Athumwui raonaona nathumli rayāmsangakha awui akhavāli mahanmiluipaimana;
ana nathumli pamrumra, ana ningchāngmeikapta kapangkakhuia nathumwui keinung akhali pamranu, nathum ali marekharekalu.
Nathum khayorva̱ akhawui aman, lah fa
Yur kateile atār zangda chishutpai, kha nachināli atār zangda machishutalu, chieina nathumna vākhuiki kaji ngalei chili nathumwui otsak kachiva̱li
Kha nana ngashit kahai maleiakha, nawui vang morei maleimana.
Nathumwui khamor eina hangtā kahai chi sākhavai ning ngasharlu, kaja nathumwui
“Nathumna khongnaiwui drakhā yāmguili khavā tharan nana shaikhangai eina tangda shaipai, kha nakhaoli masangungpaimana.
Nathumna khongnaiwui luili khavā tharan, māmazān napāng eina mazokkhuipai, kha nathumna khongnaiwui luili chāngkui singlaga mahātkhuipaimana.
kala preiva̱ china unghailaga mi khangateiwui preiva̱ vasāluida,
gahara khanaopa chinala ali maningchāngmada apāngli kapāngwui lairik kapisanglaga awui shimwui eina kashamshokhaiakha, lah ali apreiva̱ sara̱da kakhuia gahara kakhane chi thihaiakha,
preiva̱ chi sākhamāng kahaiwui thili; awui gahara khare china ali apreiva̱ sākhavai makhuiluipaimana, kaja chi
“Mi akhana ngalā shakzādhadharakha, a rai mavāpaimana, kasaka otlila mazang ngasaklu; ana ngakum kahai apreiva̱li ngasoda ringphāda kumkha shimli ngasāmkhuiranu.
Egyptwui eina kānshokta nathumna shongfali zatlakha Mariamli
“Nathumwui khongnaili kachikathāna kachishut khalei tharan, khangashit chi khuikhavai awui shimli mavākālu.
Nana kayāngli nganingra, kala nana chishut kahai mipa china khangashit chi nali khuishokmira.
Kala a kachāma miakha, awui hamkahai ot chi nawuili mahaipialu;
zimik katun eina, nana awui hamkahai ot chi hanmihaida ana nali somira kala a piphuphaora; kala hi nathumwui
nathum awui thangthangwui ngalangman zimik matunranglakha milu; (kaja a chāmhaoda, ana chimāngli ningshaiya); chi maningakha ana nali maringkaphā chi
Kha nathum phaningunglu kaja Egypt ngaleili nathum raonao sasai kala
Nathumna olive thingrongli athei phākhui kahaiwui thili, nathumna vāluida makhuikhangakān aphāngbing chili maphāvaluialu; chi kha̱minao, avāva̱ makhalei, kala ra̱meinaowui vang ngasāra.
Nathumna drakhā yāmguiwui drakhāthei kaphā chitharan, chiwui thili atham mavāphāluialu; chi khaminao, avāva̱ makhalei, kala ra̱meinaowui vang ngasāra.
Nathum phaningunglu kaja nathum Egypt ngaleili raonao sāsai; chiwui vang ina nathumli hi saluda kagasona.
“Kalikha mi khani tui shokta anina hanga̱ shimli kāda, bichar samebingna aniwui ngachaili khamashunga chili chihomihaida khayona chili tukkhuilaga,
khayona mi chili lijei mira jiakha, hangva̱wui mangāli ali ngakhum ngasakta awui kashong kharit khangaveng athishurda lijei eina shaora.
Ali lijei hangmati shaora; kha chili mahenpaimara; kalikha mi akhana chili lāngda shaohaiakha, nathumwui miktāli nachinā mai shinahaora.
Kala ana naomayara pharākhare chi thikahaia achināwui ming phokmira, chithāda sāda awui aming Israelwui eina mashimān ngasakmara.

Kala kalikha ana achināwui preiva̱ chili makhuimara jiakha, preiva̱ china khararnaobingwui ngaveili vāda hāngra, ‘Igaharawui achināna Israelwui alungli igaharawui ming leiching khavai mamayāmana; kala achinā preiva̱ ili mangakumara jihaowa.’
Chieina keinung chiwui khararnaobingna ali hokhuida khangazek tharan, ‘I ali mangakumphalungmara’ jihaiakha,
yarui mangāli preiva̱ china mayarapawui pheihop asutshokmihailaga maili mashorrorda hāngra, ‘Achināwui shimkhur masākakāpā chili hitharanu.’
Kala awui shimkhur chili Israelwui alungli, pheihop sutmi kahaiya shimkhur da hora.
“Mi khani khangama̱ tharan, kala preiva̱na ali pāng kāda khalei gahara chiwui ngalemli vāda, kashaopa chiwui khayāli angakhunakha,
nathumna preiva̱ chiwui pāng katattāmihaora; lumashan khavai maleimana.
Nathumwui shimli tamkhavai lukyur kharei akha kateo akha da khani mangavālu.
Onlala tāzakta onlu, tamlala tāzakta tamlu;
Kaja chikathā ot sāda kateikazā saikora, ngakaishilak eina kasā ot hi
nathumna chotchānglak eina kala khanangda zatlakha nathumli kathāda rāngarar, kala nathumli naokazatbingli kathāda shātkhamkhala; ana Vareli khangachee maleimana.
Chiwui vang eina
nathumwui Varena nathumli mikahai ngalei chiwui athei-arai matheikhare chi nathumna hātkakhui tharan,
Kala atam chitharan phungkasā pāngmon chili nathumna vāda, ‘
Chieina pāngmon china luk chi napāngwui eina khuilaga

Ithumli Egyptwui mibingna sāshilak eina sai, kala kachotkachāng kachungkha mi, kala kharita ot phungda rao sāngasaka.
Chitharan ithumna ishāvā ngarāwui
kala
kala ana apam hili thanrāmida seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalonga ngalei hi ithumli miya.

kala nali, nashi shimkhurli, Levinaobingli kala ngasokazat kha̱minaobingli

nathumwui Varewui mangāli hithāda hānglu, ‘Nana kagaso athishurda, chili lāngda iwui shimkhurwui chigatkhangayi kathara yar chi Levinaobingli, kha̱minaobingli, avāva̱ makhaleibingli kala ra̱meinaobingli ina khuimihaira! Ina nawui kagaso akhala makasā maleimana, khamalaila mamalaimana;
Ina chapkhangachā atamli tithe masāza̱mana, I makathar atamliranu kakhuila makhuimana; kathinaolila machigatlakmana; ina iwui
Nawui katharapam kazingramwui eina khayangtāmilu; Israel mibingli kala ishāvā ngarāli ngashitmi kahai athishurda ithumli mikahai, seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalong ngalei hili kasomilu.’

Moses kala Israelwui khararnaobingna yaruili kasoda hānga, “Aja ina kagaso ningkhami hi mayonserlu.

nathumwui Vare, navā ngarāwui
Kala aja ina kaso kahai athishurda nathumna Jordan kakān tharan, Eball Kaphungli lungkhor hi nathumna nāpkhavai eina nāpki kajina.
Kala nathumna apam chili
Nathumna mashānkakhui lunggui eina
kala nathumna ningyatchigatla pha̱phayāda chi shailaga
Kala nathumna lunggui chiwuitungli ainwui tui saikora hi tharlak eina kapisanghailu.”
Kala Moses eina Levi pāngmonbingna Israelnaobing saikorali hānga, “Akhon mashokla nganālu, O Israel: nathum aja zimiksho
Chiwui vang eina aja ina kagaso hi
Kala chithang ngalāngda Mosesna mibingli hāngchithei,
“Nathumna Jordan kong kānkakā tharan, Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issachar, Joseph kala Benjaminnaobing hina Gerizim Kaphungli mibingwui vang somi khavai nganingra.
Kala Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan kala Naphtali hibing hina khonshi khavai Eball Kaphungli nganingra.
Kala Israel mibing katongali Levinaobingna panglāk eina vaora:
“‘Khongnainaoli ngathumda shaokathata mi chili khonkashi ngasaranu’ da kahāng eina, mi saikorana ‘Amen’ jira.
“‘Khayon makhalei mili shaothat khavai pheizā kasā mi chili khonkashi ngasaranu’ da kahāng eina, mi saikorana ‘Amen’ jira.
Kala nathumna
“Keinungli pamlala, lui vālala sokhami chi nathum ngasāranu.
“Nathumwui phasāwui naotheila, lui vākasanglila, kala sha̱kei saikorala sokhami ngasāra kala seila, yaola somida mataisangra.
Nathumwui māchum singrāmeira, kala nathumwui hamhanla kāmeira.
Nathumna zanglala shoklala sokhami ngasāra.
“Nathumli yangshida khangararbing chili nathumna yuikhavai nathumwui mangāli
Nathumwui chumlila kala nathumna kasāsā saikoralila
nathumwui Varewui ningkhami nathumna mayonda awui thi shurchingakha, ana ngashit kahai athishurda awui kathara mi sāda nathumli theingasakra.

na awui kazingramwui lan shomida nawui ngaleili atam chāda zingrot mira kala napāngwui otsak saikorali somira; kala katei yurbingli nathumna chishutra, kha nathumna athumwui eina mashukmara.
Kala
kala ina aja hāngkahai ningkhami hiwui eina nathumna yashongranu lah uishongranu khangatei varebingli ngareithuida otram mangatha̱alu.
“Kha nathumna ning ngasharda
Nathumna keinungli pamlala, lah nathumna luili vālala khonkashi chi nathumwui ngasāra.
Khonkashi chi nathumwui ngasāda, nathumwui māchum kala nathumwui hamhanla makāmara.
Khonkashi chi nathumwui ngasāda, nathumwui naotheila, thingphun luivātla, seila, yaola mamataisangmara.
Nathumna zanglala khonkashi ngasāra, shoklala khonkashi ngasāra.
“Nathumwui makaphā kasā chiwui vang kala ili malai kahaiwui vang, nathumli sakathānda kala nathum mathingakānranglakha eina tangda nathumwuitungli
Nathumna vāzangda samphangki kaji ngalei chili ana nathumli mamutranglakha eina tangda,

na nathumli suikao kazāt, kakharur, worda khangashei, mimao, kazing kāngda meiwui kasā kathā, theishiraili majing katāk; zakkashi ot saikora hina nathum mathingakānranglakha eina tangda nathumli shurzatra.
Kala atungshong khalei kazingram pithrai thāra, kala azingshong okathuina mari thāda sāra.
Kazingramwui eina
Nathumwui kathingun khamasaili yongkazata vānaowui kala okathuili khalei ramsābingwui kashakazā ngasāra; kala athumli yāmkhame mila maleisāmara.
Nathumli maraikapai Egyptwui moksā, raiji kathā, ahui kazātkashi eina
na nathumli chotchāng ngasakta kapāla pāngasakra, mikla ngapeo ngasakra kala ning pa̱ngapā ngasakra;

kala khangapeo mina tangkhamangli kachupkazat thāda, ngashunshong nathumla kachupzatra; kala nathumwui ot saikorali nathum mataikasang masamphangmara, kha nathumwui eina ngapaikhuida rekharekchingra, kala chili nathumli ngachonmi khavai mi khipākha maleisāmara.
Nathumna ngalā khāmhailala, khangateina ngasopira; shim sākhuilala chili kapam masamphangmara kala drakhāthei lingsanghailala athei kashai masamphangmara.

Nathumwui sei taikathat theilala nathum chi kashai masamphangmara; gadhāla mina tandi eina ngapaithuihaora kala mahanmiluimara, kala yangkashibingna nathumwui yao ngapaithuihailala nathumli ngachonmi khavai mi khipākha maleisāmara.
Nanao mayarabing kala nanao ngalāva̱bing khangatei mili mikahai chi nathum mik eina theida thangkachida phaninglala; nathumwui pāngli pangshap maleithukada nathumna mangapaikhuithukmara.
Nathumna ngalang zarda lui vāsang kahai nathumwui athei-arai chi makathei yur akhana shaimihaora; kala nathumli rekakharek kala kachipat katang mavaimara.
Kala nathumwui mikna kashokshok chi theilaga nathum ning pāhaora.
na nathumli chotchāng ngasakta khuksaolila, pheilila zakkashi moksā shokngasakta marailuimara, pheimayā eina thuilaga kuitungyāng shangshungda shokngasakra.
“Nathumna kachipama nathumwui awunga kala nathum saikorali, nathumna kala navā ngarānala makathei yurwui pāngli
Kala
Nathumna mā kachungkha yaosangra, kha kateokhamang hātkhuira, kaja khaohna shaimiserhaora.
Nathumna drakhātheila lingsangda sāmathāmira, kha chiwui ara̱ khamang lah phākakhuila masamphangmara; kaja kalomna shaimihaora.
Nathumwui leiret peida oliverongla leira, kha nathum chiwui thao eina neokakhui masamphangmara; kaja olivethei ja̱taserhaora.
Nathumna nao sha̱naola mayarnaola pharākhuira, kha nathumwui mangasāmara; kaja mina tukthuiserhaora.
Nathumwui thingrong kala ngaleiwui athei-araila khaohwui sathuiserhaora.
Nathumli ngasokazata kha̱mibingna nathumli juimeikhangai juimeira; nathumna suitākhangai suitāra.
Athumna nathumli chishutra, nathumna athumli shukra; athumna akui sāhaora, kala nathumna akhamei sāra.
Khonkashi saikora hina nathumli masākazamranglakha eina tangda, nathumwuitungli tāra kala nathumli raza̱da nathum mayuirarmara; khikhalajila nathumna
Saikora hi nathumwuitungli, ara̱-azāwuitungli katang makhavai matakhak kahai machut sākachitheina.
“Khikhalajila nathum ringphāda leilakha, nathumna
Chiwui vang
Nathumna atui-arā makashā, okathui akhangalatwui eina yur akha
Azak sākashi miyur, khararnaoli khayā makashiya, lah khanganuiyali maleishikathei,

kala nathumli masāshimānranglakha eina tangda nathumwui seinao kala ngaleiwui theishirai shaimiserhaora; nathumwui māngum, drakhāra̱, lah thao, nathumwui seinao pharākasangla, maningakha yaonaola athumna mataimilakmara.
Athumna nathumwui keinung saikorali kuinamda, nathumna chihānda sākahai kajui kala ngaveitit kahai raipanbing saikora manurkhairanglakha eina tangda athumna keinung saikorali rāzangra, kala chithāda
Kala yangkashena nathumli kuinam kahai kala chotchangda sikafa atamli
Nathumwui alungli ngahuiri kala lumzailak eina nganaokakā mi chi eina tangda achināli, awui leikashe preiva̱li kala nao paisholi mamishai mamizāngaimara;

chithāda sāda ana shaida khalei anaongarāwui asā chi maningakha apāngli khikha maleiluithukada, athum khipālikha eina tangda mamishaimara, nathumwui keinung saikorali kuinam kahai chiwui sikafawui alungli nathumwui yangkashibingna nathumli chotchāngda sifa khangasak tharan.

Nathumwui alungli ngahuiri kala lumzailak eina nganaokakā, preiva̱̱ apheimayā eina tangda ngaleitungli manaisangkakasaiva̱ china awui leikashe gahara, awui naomayara kala naongalāva̱li mamishai mamizāngaimara.
Nathumwui keinung yangkashena kuinamhaida chotchāngda sifa ngasakta chāmrei kahai tharan, awui phei ngachaiwui eina kashok alam kala pharāthadhar naowui asā chi ana ngathumda shaira.
“Kalikhada nathumna awui tekhamatei kala ngacheeshun kahai
nathumwui Varena nathumwuitungli kala nathumwui ara̱-azāwuitungli hāngkhavai makhalei kachotkachāng, kazāt yur katang mavaila khuirāra.
Kala nathumna khangacheea Egyptwui kazāt saikora chi ana nathumwuitungli khuirāda nathumwui eina khavān mavaimara.
Ningkhamiwui lairikli hāngkahaili lāngda kazātyurla, kala kachotkachāng kachiva̱
Nathum kazingramwui sirā yakkhasālala, nathum mashing kateokhamāng taihaora, khikhalajila nathumna
Kala nathumli
Kala okathui achikun akhawui eina khangatei akhali
Kala yurbing hiwui ngachaili nathum ngasāmkakhui masamphangmara, phei khangasām mavaimara; kha
nathumwui mirin ning khamaongna pemtinghaida ngashun ngayā ngacheepamra; kala ringra kajiwui ningkhalum maleimara.
Ngathorshong, ‘Ngazinsi kaja phāra!’ jira kala ngazinshong, ‘Ngathorsi kaja phāra!’ jira, kaja nathumwui ningli khangachee khaleiwui vang nathumwui mikna khangachee khangachā kathei samkaphangna.

Kala Mosesna Israel saikorali hokhuida athumli hānga: “Egypt ngaleili leilakha
kachotkachāng, machut sākachithei, kala matakhak kahai ot kachungkha kasā chi nathumna thei;
kha aja eina tangda nathumwui ningli theikhui khavai, lah mik eina theikhui khavai kala khanā eina shākhui khavai
ina nathumli lamhāngli kum hangmati thānzathaira; nathumwui khangavai kashankachon makāklakmana, kala nathumna katong pheihopla makākmana;

athumwui lam chi ithumna khui, kala Reubennaobing, Gadnaobing kala Manassehbingwui shangbingli ngayarmi.
Chiwui vang eina nathumna kasāsā saikorali ringphameida okthui khavai tuingashit hi ning ngasharda mayonlu.
“Nathum aja nathumwui wungva̱bingla, khararnaobingla, kala otva̱bingla, Israelnao saikora
nathumwui naongarā, napreiva̱ ngarā, kala nathumwui rāmrahli ngasopamda khalei kha̱minaobing, thing phākhame kala tara̱ tākhamebingla zangda leili,
aja
nathum kala navā ngarā Abraham, Isaac kala Jacobli khangashit thāda ana aja

kala nathumna athumwui yangkakharinga otbing, thing-ngalung, lupāsā kala sināwui meoma̱la athumwui alungli leikasā theihaira.

Hi kazingramli khalei maningmana, chiwui vang ‘Ithumna shāda mayon khavai khipāna kazingram kāda ithumli khuitāmirakhala?’ da nathumna mahāngmara.

Kha tui chi nathumli nganailak eina lei; chi nathumwui ning kala nathumwui khamorli lei, chiwui vang nathum shurshapra.

Kha kalikha nathumwui ning ngareithuihaida nathumna manganāsangakha, kala khangatei varebingli khorumda otram ngatha̱thuihaiakha,
ina aja nathumli hāngkahai hina kaja, nathum shimānhaora, nathumna Jordan kānlaga vasomki kaji ngalei chili nathum sāngda maokthuimara.

Chieina chithang iwui malungkhavāt athumwuitungli tāshungda, I mai athumwui eina ngareithuida athumli horhaora, kala athumli mayuisanghaora; kala kalākashila makaphāla kachungkha athumwuitungli samkaphang eina, ‘Ithumwui Varena ithumli mangasokhamiwui vang kalākashi hi ithumwuitungli rākashok maningmala?’ da chithang athumna hāngra.
Kala athumna makaphā makhayā ot sāda athumna vare kateibingli ngareithui kahaiwui vang, kachangkhat eina ina iwui mai ngareithuihaora.
Ara chiwui vang eina laa hi kapihailu, kala Israelnaobingli tamchitheilu; athumli sāngasaklu, chithāda sāda laa hina Israel mibingli makhamayāwui shākhina da theikhuiranu.

Kaja avāva̱ ngarāli mikhavai ina ngashit kahai ngalei, seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalong ngaleili athumli thānkhavā chitharan kala athumna phāshak phazāda katho eina athumna khangatei varebingli ngareithuihaida otram ngatha̱ra kala ili ningkachaida iwui tuingashit sākhaira.

Kala athumli makaphā kala kachotkachāng kachungkha kharā tharan, laa hina sachitheida phaningung khavai ngasāra (Kaja laa hi athumwui thot kachida mamalailakmara); kaja ina mira da ngashit kahai ngalei chili ina athumli makhuiungranglakha eina tangda athumna sāki kaji chi ina theiping kahaina.”
Chieina Mosesna chithang laa chi kapikhuida Israelwui mibingli tamchithei.
Mosesna ainwui tuibing hi akup eina tangda kapi kahaiwui thili,
Mosesna
“Ainwui lairik hi khuilaga
Kaja nathumna kayākha ngakaishi kala ningngai zakshikhala kaji ina thei; yanglu, ina ringlakha eina tangdala nathumna Vareli ngakaishida lei; I thikahaiwui thili khi shokrakhala!
Nathumwui shang saikorawui khararnaobing, nathumwui otva̱bing, iwui mangāli rākazipserlu; ina athumli hāngchitheira kala chi kazing ngaleina shākhi sāra.
Kaja I thikahaiwui thili nathumna mashoilakla khangui otmāng sāda, ina kaso kahai chiwui athi mashurmara kaji ina thei; kala rārāda khalei zimiksholi makaphā kachungkha nathumwuitungli tāra̱, kaja
Chiwui thili Mosesna Israel katonga kakazip chili laa chi katang eina tangda hāngchithei.
“Iwui tui nganālu, O kazingram,
ina hāngra;
kala okathuina iwui tui shāranu.
Iwui tamkachithei zingrot thāda rotāranu,
iwui tuimatui sikakhuiya ikra̱ thāda,
zingrotra̱na shon kadhar khawotungli,
kala zingrotra̱na thingnā-ra̱hātungli rokatā tharanu.
Kaja ina
Reikhamatai mingpho ithumwui Vareli milu!
“Lunghār, awui otsak kāshunglaka;
kaja awui otsak saikora mashunmānga.
Ningkatonga Varena, kala khangui maleimana,
mashun kala tāzak kahai chi ana.
athum awui naongarā maningluimana
kaja athumna sāmakhao kahaiwui vang;
athum hiya makaphā makhayā thotna.
Mangkhama̱ nathum kala
ning makhalei mibing,
chithāda nathum
A nathumwui avā, nathumli kasā akhavā,
nathumli kasema kala nathumli sākākhame maningmala?
“Achālakhawui atam phaningunglu,
thotbingwui zingkum machukyanglu;
navāli ngahānlu, kala ana nali chitheimira;
khararnaoli ngasanlu,
athumna nali hāngmira.
ana miwui naomayarabing ngateikhami tharan,
ana kachichāshiwui thari,
Varewui naomayarabingwui mashing athishurda sāmira.
Kaja
Jacob awui yartā kahai shimluikatna.
“Ana athumli siwukpamli,
khamasai lamhāngli phākhui;
ana ali kuinamda kala awui vang phaningmi,
awui lumzailak kahaiana.
Khalāngna athip ngatha̱ khangasak thāda,
angachāng anaowuitungli kakathan thāda,
angachāng harda, athumli yonkhuida,
amareng eina khāngkakhui thāda,
khangatei varena ali mangasomana.
“Ana ali okathuiwui kajujui apambingli
yongkān ngasaka,
kala luiwui eina samkaphang ana zai;
kala ana lunghārwui eina khuira̱ mimanga,
lunghaila pam eina thao shokngasaka.
Seishangwui eina seina̱thur,
yaoshangwui eina yaona̱,
yaonao eina yaovābingwui athao,
Bashanwui seishang kala mebing,
mathāmeikap kaji kehula—
kala nathumna drakhātheiwui eina
drakhāra̱ manga.
“Kha Jeshurun athaona maruimithaiya,
kala ngakaishihaowa;
athaona maruimit, nathum asā kalākhaowa,
kala nganaipathaowa;
chieina ali kasaa Vareli horhaowa,
kala awui huikhame Lunghārli mana̱shi.
Athumna makathei varebingli khorumda
ali zimari ngasakhaowa;
athumna ningkakachai ot sāda
ali malungvātngasaka.
athumna pha̱phayai,
matheilak kaja, naolak eina
rākathei varebingli khoruma;
navā ngarāna mautkashita varebingli.
Nathumli sākakho
maphaningluithuwa,
nathumli pharākakhuiya,
Vareli malaihaowa.
“Naomayara kala naongalāva̱bingna
malungvātkhangasak chi theilaga,
Kala
‘ina athumli mayangsangmiluimara,
athumwui akatang kathanikhala ina yangra,
kaja athum hiya makhamashunga thotna,
shitkasang katong makhaleiya naongarābingna.
zimari ngasakhaira,
athumwui meoma̱ chiwui vang ili
malungvātngasakhaira.
Ara chiwui vang ina yur kateili mathuk
ngasakta athumli yuishi ngasakra,
ina athumli mangkhama̱ yur eina
malung thuingasakra.
Kaja iwui malungkhavāt eina mei chuihaira,
kala chi Kathewui ram zangshungda chuiya,
okathui kala chiwui thingnā-ra̱hā chuiserhaira,
kala phungreipheibing saikora mei chuihaira.
“‘Kala ina athumli makaphātungli
makaphā ngaror ngasakra;
ina iwui malāthing athumwui
tungli tāngasakra;
athum kathai eina shimān ngakānhaora,
kala kasā meina chuitahaora
kala thikapai kazātkashi rāra;
kala ina ramsā chihoda
makeikazam ngasakra;
kathiri kaphunga ngawokazata sāyur chihora.
Kayāng khareili raighai eina thi;
kala shimli kazāt eina thi,
yaron ngalāla, angāngnaola,
kasarnaobingla akhala mataimimara.
“Athumli katāva̱li miyur
khangateiwui alungli chaiyānghaida
maphaningunglui khavai sāra”
da ina hānghairara,
yangkashebingna lāngsoda,
Israelli ithumna shimān khangasakna,
da hāngpaishina kajiwui vangna.
“Kaja athum hiya ning makazanga yurna,
kala thangkhamei athumwuili maleimana.
Athumna thangmeisāsi kaja,
athumna hi bhap tāra,
anaolamshong katharakhala kaji theira!
Kathāda akhana thingkhali kashamra,
kala khanina thingtharāli kathāda shiyāmra kaji,
athumwui Lunghār china athumli
yorkahai maningkha,
mishok kahai maningakha?
Athumwui lunghār ithumwui Lunghār mathāmana,
ithumwui yangkashebingnala bichar sāda thei.
Kaja athumwui drakhārong Sodomwui
drakhārong eina rai,
kala Gomorrahwui luiyamwui eina rai;
athumwui drakhātheiva kathiriwui drakhātheina,
athumwui amazānva khai;
athumwui drakhāra̱va phara̱wui kathirina,
kala sākashi phara̱yurwui huna.
“Saikora hi ina kaziphaida
iwui kazipshimli mahor manamhaimala?
kaja athumwui phei nganaiki kaji;
athumwui kumshāt rāki kaji nganaihaira,
athumwui kashimān thākta rāra.
pangshap kānkahai chi theilaga;
khamashungla mashung ngasakra.
Chitharan ana hāngra,
‘Athumwui varebing kali leili,
athumna yāmngayin khavai lunggui chi;
athumwui kapha̱sā kashai chi,
kala athumwui ra̱shakchigat khamang chi?
Athumna nganingkāda nathumli
ngachonmiranu,
athumna nathumwui ngayin khavai sāranu!
“‘Chieina ara yanglu, I chi ina,
I maningla vare khangatei maleimana;
ina thingasaka kala ina ringngasaka;
khamā za̱khangasakla raikhangasakla ina:
kala ipāngwui eina khuishokshapa khipākha maleimana.
Kaja ina kazingramli ipāng khāngkai,
kala ngashita, I leilakha eina tangda,
ina iwui kahāna raighai kakharā tharan,
kala ipāngna bichar sāthang,
ina iwui yangkashibingli athut khuira,
kala ili ningkakachaibingli athut hāngsangra.
Iwui malāthingbingli ashee eina malip ngasakra,
kala iwui raighaina asā shaira—
iwui pāngli kākahaiya samphunga yangkashibing,
sāthat kahaia kala tukkakhuiabingwui ashee chieina.’
O yur nathum;
kaja ana awui raobingwui vang
athut hāngsangmi,
awui yangkashibingli athut khuida awui
mibingwui ngalei tharngasaka.”
Nunwui nao Joshua eina Mosesna laa hiwui tui saikora mibingna sākhavai pātāchithei.
Kala Mosesna tuibing hi Israelnao saikorali hāngchithei kahaiwui thili, ana athumli hānga:
“ina aja hāngchithei kahai tui saikora hi ningli phumtithailu, chithāda sāda nanao ngarānala ning ngasharda ainwui tui saikora hi mayon khavai nathumna kasora.
Hi kapai ot maningmana, kha nathumwui ringkhavaina, nathumna Jordan kānlaga akhuiki kaji lam chili sāngmeida okthui khavaina.”
“Abarim phungreiwui, Moab ngaleili khalei, Jericho ngaleili kāroda khalei Nebo Kaphungtonli kālu; kala Israelwui mibingli ina miki kaji ngalei chi kāngashānlu;
kaja, nachinā Aaronna Hor Kaphungli kathi thāda nala nawui mibingli vangarumhaora, nana kāngashān khavai phungrei chili thisangra.

Khikhalajila, Zinwui lamhāngli leilakha Meri-bath-kadeshwui tara̱pamli, nana Israelwui mibingwui ngachaili ili ningtongda mashitsangmana, kaja Israel mibingwui mangāli ili katharanada khayā mashimana.
Chiwui vang, nana ngalei chi nawui mangāli theira, kha ina Israelwui mibingli miki kaji ngalei chili na kazang masamphangmara.”
Varewui mi Mosesna a mathiranglakha Israelnaobingli sokhami khami chi hina.
kala Seirwui eina ithumli
Paran Kaphungwui eina kahor kāptāmi,
kathara thingtharāli ngasoda rai,
awui yāpāngli kahora mei
Mha, awui mili
ali tharchigat kahaibing awui pāngli lei;
chieina athumna nawui pheikār chi shura,
nawui chiza̱khami athishurda,
Jacobwui shimlui sāda Mosesna ain khami
chiwui kagaso chitharan.
Israel shang saikorawui,
wungva̱bing kakazip tharan,
“Reuben okpeimeiranu, kala mathiranu,
lah awui mila mateo ngasakranu.”
Kala Judahwui vang hithāda hānga:
“Shāmilu, O
kala ali awui mibingli khuiungmilu.
Awui yangkashibingli napāngna ngararmida ali ngachonmilu.”
“Levili
Vareli kaphaninga chili nawui Urim milu,
Massah apamli nana chāng khayanga,
Meribahwui tara̱pamli nana khangatuka chili;
avāva̱ kala ava̱va̱li ‘ina matheimimana’ da kahānga;
awui chinaongarāli horhaowa,
awui naobingli yangkheihaowa.
Kaja athumna nawui kagaso nganai,
kala nawui tuingashit mayona.
Athumna Jacobli nawui sharphahorbing tamchitheira;
kala Israelli nawui ain tamchitheira;
athumna nawui hanphuttungli
nganamkaphā haimira,
kala nawui hanphutli, tongtingda
rikkatā chigat pha̱phayāra.
Somilu, O
kala awui ot kasāsā khuisangmilu;
awui yangkashibingli akha̱-akhā sāmihaida,
ali ningkakachaibing mangakarthuiluilak
khavai ngapa̱sirmihaolu.”
Benjaminwui vang ana hānga,
ana awui makāli chingri eina pānra;
ana langpongda ali yangmira;
kala awui yartui khaniwuilungli ana okthuira.”
Kala Josephwui vang ana hānga,
“Awui ngalei
kazingram atungwui mathāmeikap kajinilala,
kala ngaleiwui eina kashoknilala,
zimik kāpkharora mathāmeikap kaji theishirai yur,
kala kachāng-chāngwui athishurda
sokhami ngasāranu,
achālakhawui phungreibingwui eina
katang makhangavā kaphungbingwui eina
tuikhamatai sokhami ngasaranu,
ngalei eina mathāmeikap kaji kala chiwui tuikhamatai,
thingpompa̱li meiwon eina rākahānga china ali miranu.
Saikora hi Josephwui kuitungli tāranu,
kala chinao ngarāwui ngachaili
wungkuihon kasangawui kuitungli tāshungmiranu.
Awui pharākhare mukkānao ngam phunga,
kala awui angaji ramseiwui ngajina;
chieina ana yurbingli,
okathui akatanga eina tangda athum saikorali thotra;
Ephraimwui thingthara chithai
Manassehwui thingthing chithai.”
Kala Zebulunwui vang ana hānga,
“Zebulun, nathumwui kazātpamli;
kala Issachar, nathumwui rāmrahli mathānlu.
Athumna yurbingli athumwui phungreili hokāra;
chili athumna khamashunga pha̱kaphayā sāra;
kaja shamadruwui lan athumna khuishokra,
kala situiwui ngathum kahai lan chila.”
Kala Gad wui vang ana hānga,
“Gadli reikhangasaka chili somiranu!
Gadna kazingkha̱ thāda rimpama,
pāngla makeishokmi, kuihonla sakhaimi.”
Mathāmeikap kaji ngalei chi
akhalattawui vang ana hākhui,
kaja chi kathānawui vang yar sākahaina.
Israelwui kathānabing kakazip tharan,
kala shiyan-chikan ana yangmi.
Kala Danwui vang ana hānga,
“Danna kazingkha̱nao thāda
Bashanwui eina shoka.”
Kala Naphtaliwui vang ana hānga,
“O Naphtali,
sokhamina pemtinghai,
ngayi kala azingshong nawui lamna.”
Kala Asherwui vang ana hānga,
“Chinao ngachaili Asher sokhami ngasāra;
achinā ngarāwui ngahanngaimeikap kaje ngasāranu,
kala aphei olive thao eina pheoranu.
Nawui phākashut mari kala pithraina;
kala nawui mirin peida yāngla leiranu!”
Nawui Vare thāda khipākha maleima,
“O Jesherun,
pangshap eina ngasoda nali huimi khavai
kala ngachonmi khavai ana kazing eina tai.
Makashimāna Vare chi nawui ngayin khavaina;
chiwui azingli katang
makhavai pāngthei lei.
Kala ana nawui mangāli
yangkashibingli namshoka,
kala hānga, Sashimānhaolu.
Chithāda Israelna ninglumtur okthuira,
Jacobwui atheina,
kashakazā makhavātpamli
chingri eina okthui;
mha, awui kazingramna mathālak eina ikra̱ tāmi.
Ringkapha chi nathumna,
O Israel! nathum thāda khipa lei,
Nathumli ngākmi khavai kala maikhayā mikhavai,
Nathumwui yangkashibingna
nathumli lumashanmi khavai pora;
kala nathumna athumwui kajuipam naikazamra.”
Kala Mosesna Moab tampākwui eina Jericholi kāroda khalei Nebowui Pisgah Kaphungli kai. Kala
Naphtali ngalei hupva, Ephraim eina Manassehwui lam kala zingtun shamadru vāshungda Judahwui lamna;
Negeb, kala tampāk, chi khaneirongwui keinung Jerichowui tampāk, Zoar vāshungda.
Kala
Chiwui vang
Kala
Moses kathi tharan a kum shākha maga̱ rarhairasai; amik mangazanmana, lah awui pangshapla masuitālakmana.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Moabwui tampākli Moseswui vang thumrāthang chapngachai; chiwui thili awui vang chapkhangachā chi tanghaowa.
Mosesna pāng khāngkāda somi kahaiwui vang, Nunwui naomayara Joshua thangkhameina pemhaowa; kaja Mosesna awuitungli pāng parmi, chieina Israelwui mibingna awui kahāng nganai kala
Kala Israelli
Kala
kala hakkhamahā pangshap, khangachee-khangachā saikora Israel saikorawui miktāli Mosesna kasā hithāda, ā kathā khipānakha masalākranga.
“Iwui rao Moses thihaira; chiwui vang eina ara ina Israelwui mibingli miki kaji ngalei chili zangkhavai na eina mibing saikora ngakarthuida Jordan kānulu.
ina Mosesli ngashit kahai thāda napheina chonkasang apam kachiva̱ ina nali mikahaina.
Lamhāng kala Lebanon hi eina thuida kongrei, Euphrates kong, zingtunshong Great Sea shangshungda khalei Hitnaobingwui ngalei saikora, nawui ngalei ngasāra.
Nawui mirin peida nawui mangāli khipānakha mangasungrarmara; ina Mosesli ngasokhami thāda nalila ngasomira; chieina ina nali machihomara kala mahorhaimara.
Pingmeida malung zangmeilu; kaja mibing hili mirada avāva̱ ngarāli ina ngashit kahai ngalei chi akhui khavai nana mibingli thānzangra.

Pingmeida malung zangda sāmalu, iwui rao Mosesna mikahai ain saikorawui athishurda ning ngasharlak eina mayontitlu; chiwui eina uivāk lah yāvāk mangareithuihaialu, chieina nana kazatpam kachida maikhayā samphangra.
Ainwui Lairik hi mahorhailakalu, kha ngashun ngayā machukpamlu, chithakha kapi kahai kachiva̱wui athishurda ning ngasharda sāshapra; chithāda nawui shongfa mataisangda nana maikhayā samphangra.
Pingmeida malung zangmeilu, da ina nali makasomala? Mangacheealu, kakhanangla makhanangalu, kaja nawui
Chieina Joshuana mibingwui otva̱bingli kasoi,
“Rāmrah kachiva̱li vāda mibingli kasolu, ‘Nathumwui kashakazā khangarān sālu; kaja kathumthangwui alungli

Nathumwui preiva̱ngarā, nathumwui naongarābing kala sha̱keibing Jordan kānda Mosesna nathumli mikahai ngalei chili pamsāra; kha nathumwui alungli rai kapinga saikora raisāri shaksāda nachināngarāwui mangāli Jordan kānkāra kala athumli ngachonra,
na nathumli kala nachināngarāli mangasām ngasakranglakha eina tangda kala
Chieina athumna Joshuali ngahānkai, “Nana ithumli kakaso saikora ithumna sāra, kala nana chikahoho apam chili ithum vāra.
Ithumna otsak saikorali Moseswui tui khanganā thāda, nawui tui nganāra; nawui
Nawui ningkhamili ngakaikashe, kala nana kakasosoli nawui tui makhanganā mi chili shaothatra. Pingmeida kala malung zangmeida sāmalu.”
Kala Jericho awungali hithāda hānghaowa, “Yanglu, Israelwui mi kachikathā ngalei hi yangkhui khavai aja ngayā hili rāhaira.”
Chieina Jerichowui awungana Rahabwuili mi chihovāda hānga, “Nawui shimli rākazanga mi chi khuishoklu, kaja athumna ngalei saikora hi phāshok khavai kharāna.”
Kha sha̱nao china mi khani chi thumhaida hānga, “Mashunga, mibing iwuili rai; kha athum kaji eina kharākhala da ina matheimana;
kala kazing yinguda ngavei shunguki kaji tharan mibing chi thuihaowa; mi chi kachishong thuihaokhala kaji I matheimana; thākta kharomlu, kaja nathumna athumli ngaphankhuishapra.”
Kha ana anile shimtungli khuikāhairasai, kala ana anili tāwon akung eina masankazazakhamhai.
Chieina mibing china athumli Jordanvāk kharomvāda kongphei eina tangda vāshunga; kala kakharomabing china thuikhaleoda, ngavei shunghaowa.
Ani mapiranglakha sha̱nao china shimtungli kāda hānga,
Kaja nathum Egyptwui eina kashok tharan nathumwui mangāli
Chi shākhaleoda ithum ngacheelakhaowa; kala mayarnao khipākha ningkhanganung maleithuwa; kaja
Chieina ara, ina nanili lumashanda sāmi kahai thāda naninala ishāvāwui shimkhurli khamathā sāmira kaji
kala ishāvā, ishāva̱, ipāngarā, igatuiva̱ngarā kala athumwui shimkhur saikorali ringngasakta ithumli kathiwui eina kanshokmilu.”
Chieina anina ali hānga, “Iniwui manglā nawui vāngna! Kalikha nana ithumwui khangashit hi mahatakha
Chiwui thili ana anili khara̱ eina charfali chihotāhaowa, kaja ana kapam shim chi keinung phākholi sāshānda kapam shimna.

Kala ana anili hānga, “Kaphungli kaulu maningkha kakharomabing chi samphangpaishina kala athum malatungranglakha eina tangda zimiksho kathumthang chili ngathumpamlu; chiwui thili nathumwui shong unghaolu.”
Anina ali hānga, “Nana inili khangashit sākhangasak hili iniwui khayon khikha maleimara.

Yanglu, ithumna ngalei hili kharā tharan hungping kahai khara̱ hi inili chihotā khavai charfa chili khalaphaiphalungra; kala nawui shimli nashava̱ nashāvā, napāngarā kala nashi shimkhurwui mi saikora hokhuida kazipsāphalungra;

kalikha mi akhana shimwui eina thuihaida keinungli zatsākha, akhalatta kathina; ithumwui khayon maningmana; kha nali ngasoda nawui shimli leikasā akhali pāng parakha, awui kathi chi ithumwui khayon sāra.
Kha kalikha ithumwui otsak hi nana hānghaiakha, ngashit kahai kakai hili iniwui khayon maleimana.”
Kala sha̱nao china hānga, “Naniwui hāngkahai athishurda, chitharanu.” Chiwui thili ani zathaowa; kala sha̱naopava̱ china hungping kahai khara̱ chi charfa chili hokthānghai.
Anina thuihaida kakharomabingna malatungranglakha eina tangda phungreili kathumthang apama, kaja kakharomabingna shongfa saikorali phālaga khikha masamphangmana.
Anina phungrei chiwui eina hantaluishitta chi kānlaga Nunwui naomayara Joshuawuili vai; kala anina ali kashok-kazang saikora hānga.
“Kachangkhat
Ngathorthakva Joshuana ngakarthuida Israelwui mi saikorali thānphungda Shittimwui eina zatphokuwa kala athum Jordan makānranglakha kongpheili vāngasāma.
Kakathumathang otva̱bingna rāmrahlungli zangvāda
mibingli kasoi, “Leviwui pāngmonbingna
chieina nathumna vāki kaji shongfa nathumna theira, kaja nathum hili marālakranga. Kha nathum oko chiwui eina khuining thingkhani khalāda zatphalungra; marānganaipaimana.”
Kala Joshuana mibingli hānga, “Nathum khalatta tharmatheng ngasaklu, kaja akhama
Kala Joshuana pāngmonbingli hānga, “Tuingashitwui oko chi ngava̱kāda mibingwui mangāli zatvālu.” Chieina athumna tuingashit oko chi ngava̱phungda mibingwui mangāli zata.
Kala
Kala tuingashit oko kaphunga pāngmonbingli nana hithāda hāngra, ‘Nathumna Jordan kongwui tara̱li zangkashung chitharan chili nganinglu.’”
Kala Joshuana Israelnaobingli hānga, “

Kala Joshuana hānga, “Chiwui thili, kharinga Vare nathumwui alungli lei kaji nathumna theikhuira kala makahatlakla ana Canaannaobing, Hitnaobing, Hivnaobing, Periznaobing, Girgashnaobing, Amornaobing kala Jebusnaobingli nathumwui miktāli kashamshokra.
Yanglu, okathui saikorawui
Chiwui vang eina mi tharāda khani Israel shang-shangwui eina mi ava̱va̱ kapangkhuilu.
Okathui saikorawui
Mibingna Jordan kānkhavai kachonshim eina kashok tharan athumwui mangāli tuingashit oko ngava̱kazata pangpmonbingna rida zata,
kala oko khangava̱ pāngmonbingwui pheina Jordan tara̱li naiza̱khaleoda, (māhā peida chiwui kongphei saikora tara̱ pemda longa),

atungshong eina longkatā tara̱ chi khāmhaowa kala chiwui juikakā china atungshong longshangda Zarethan ngalemli khalei Adam keinung shangshunga kala azingshong Salt Sea eina Arabah shamadrushong longkatā chi katatshathaowa; kala mibingna Jericholi yangngasungda kankāhaowa.
Kala Israelnaobingna ngalei katheng chili kānlakha,
Yur katonga chi Jordan kankāser kahai eina
“Mibingwui eina mi tharāda khani shang-shang kachiva̱wui eina mi ava̱va̱ khuilaga athumli kasolu,
Jordan alungthungli pāngmonbingna nganing kahaipam chiwui eina ngalunggui tharāda khani khuilu kala ngalungbing chi khuiphungda aja ngayā nathum ngasām khavaipamli shunhailu.”
Chieina Joshuana Israel mibingwui eina kapang kakhui mi tharāda khani shang kachiva̱wui eina mi ava̱va̱ chili hokhui.
Kala Joshuana athumli hānga, “Jordan alungthungli
kaja hina nathumwui vāng khudam ngasāda, naoda rāki kaji atamli nathumwui naongarāna ‘Ngalunggui hiwui kakhalat khikhala?’ da ngahānra,
chitharan
Chieina Israelwui mibingna Joshuawui kakaso athishurda sai kala
Kala pāngmonbingna tuingashit oko chi ngava̱laga khanganing Jordan alungthung chili Joshuana ngalung tharāda khani shoma; kala chi aja eina tangda lei.
Kaja Mosesna Joshuali kaso kahai athishurda
Mibingna katotsisi eina makānkai;
mibing saikora makānkā kahai eina pāngmonbingna
Mosesna kasohaikasā athishurda Reubenwui naomayarabing, Gadwui naomayarabing kala Manassehwui shang tangkhai, raisāri shaksāda Israelwui mibingli rithuihaowa.
Raimi thing hangmati shikha raisāri shaksāda
Chithang
Kala
“Tuingashit oko kaphunga pāngmonbingli Jordanwui eina shok khavai hānglu.”
Chieina Joshuana pāngmonbingli, “Jordanwui eina shoklu” da kasoi.

wui tuingashit oko khuikaphunga pāngmonbing chi Jordan alungthungwui eina zatphokta athumwui phei ayar kathengli shoknaikasang eina, Jordanwui tara̱ chi hanungda kharewui khalong thāda kong pemda longluihaowa.
Mibingna kachāng kharewui katharāthang Jordan kānda Jerichowui thari zingshoshong Gilgalli rāmrah asāpama.
Kala Jordanwui eina kakhui ngalung tharāda khani chi Joshuana Gilgalli shomhaowa.
Kala ana Israelwui mibingli hānga, “Naoda rāki kaji atamli nanao ngarāna avāva̱ ngarāli lungkhor hi khiwui vangkhala? da ngahānakha,
Israelna Jordan hi katheng eina khamakānwui kakhalatna da nathumna nathumwui naongarāli hāngchitheira.
Kaja
chithāda sāda okathuiwui mi saikorana
Atam chitharan
Chieina Joshuana kazana lungghai eina ghainao sākhuida Israelwui mibingli Gibeath-haaraloth apamli ahui rimshokmi.
Kala Joshuana athumli ahui rimshokhamiwui kakhalat hina: Egyptwui eina kashoka mayarnaobing saikora, raimi saikora, Egyptwui eina shok kahaiwui thili lamhāngli thihaowa.
Egyptwui eina kashoka mi saikora ahui rimshokhaisa-ilala, shok kahaiwui thili shongfa lamhānglungli kapharā mi saikora ahui marimshokrangsai.
Kaja Egyptwui eina kashoka mibing, raimi saikora mathingakanranglakha eina tangda Israelwui mibing kum hangmati lamhānglungli zata; khikhalajila athumna
Ana athumwui mahut anaongarā shokngasaka, chieina athumwui naongarābingli Joshuana ahui rimshokhamina; kaja athumna shongfali zatlakha marimshokrangkasāwui vāng marimkashokla zangkasāna.
Mi saikorawui ahui rimshok kahaiwui thili, athumwui khamā marairanglakha eina tangda athumna pamkasā rāmrah chili ngasāma.
Kala
Kala akhama kathā makānkhami phanitwui thichangli athumna ngalei chili kashok theishiraiwui khawok makazang khamui eina nguikakhui māngatai zai.
Kala ngalei chili kashoka kashakazā zākaphok eina, akhama kathā eina manna mangavāluimana, kha chikum Canaan ngaleili kashoka theishirai shai.
Joshuana Jericho ngalemli vākashung tharan, ana yangkakā eina mi akha raighai sutshokta chi singlaga nganingsai kala Joshuana ali vāda angahāna, “Na ithumwui mika, ithumwui yangkashekhala?”
Chieina ana hānga, “Maningmana; kha I
Kala
Chitharan Israelwui mibingli ngacheehaida Jericho ngavei phākho ayarshongwui eina kala alungshongwui eina shungtithaowa; khipākhala kashok-kazang maleimana.
Chieina
Nana keinung chili kuimareida nawui raimi saikorali ngasoda thangkhali kuikha khuira. Hithāda tharukthang kuira.
Kala pāngmon shinina yaovāngajiwui talla̱ shini khuiphungda oko chili rizatra, kala kashinethang nathum kala pāngmonbingna talla̱ khonglaga keinung chi shini shida kuira.

Kala athumna yaovāngajiwui talla̱ kasāngkha kakhong tharan, nathum talla̱khon chi shākhaleoda, mi saikora panglāk eina vaora; chieina keinungwui ngavei chi ja̱khuptahaora, kala mi kachiva̱na angatar eina muivāra.”
Chieina Nunwui naomayara Joshuana pāngmonbingli hokhuida hānga, “Tuingashitwui oko chi ngava̱kālu kala pāngmon shinina yaovāngajiwui talla̱ shini khuiphungda
Kala ana mibingli hānga, “Mangāshong zatvālu; keinung kuimareilu, kala raimibingli
Chieina Joshuana athumli kakaso athishurda pāngmon shini china yaovāngajiwui talla̱ shini khuiphungda
Kala raimibing china talla̱ kakhonga pāngmonbingli rizata, kala talla̱ mangasāmlakla kakhong eina khanukshong khangākabing china okowui thili zata.
Kha Joshuana mibingli hānga, “Ina nathumli vaolu da makasoranglakha eina tangda, nathum mangavaopaimara lah nathum khamorwui eina akhon akhala mashokpaimara; ina kasothang nathumna ngavaonaora.”
Chieina ana oko chi ngava̱ ngasakta keinung chi akha shida kuingasaka kala athumna rāmrahli latungda chithang ngayā rāmrahli ungpisanga.
Joshuana ngathorthak ngakarthui, kala pāngmonbing china
Kala yaovāngajiwui talla̱ shini kasinga pāngmon shini china
Kala kakhanethangla athumna keinung chi akha shida kuilaga ngasām khavai rāmrahli latunga. Chithāda athumna tharukthang sai.
Kashinethang athumna ngathorthak ngakarthuida kharethang kasā tākam eina keinung chi shini shida akuiya: athumna shini shida kakui chithang mānga.
Kala kashine kakuile, pāngmonbingna talla̱ khongkaphok eina Joshuana mibingli hānga, “Ngavaolu; kaja
Keinung kala chiwui alungli ot khalei saikora sakazam khavaiwui vang
Kha nathuma, sākashimānli zangkahai otbing chili mangamaralu, chi maningakha sashiman kahai otbing chi nathumna kakhui tharan Israelwui rāmrahli kashimān shokta rotkhamarāt rāra.
Kha lupāsā, sinā, kala pithrai eina mariwui tengkot hikathāthā

Chieina mibingna vaoshoka kala talla̱ khonga. Talla̱khon shāngasha̱da mibing china panglāk eina vaoshoka. Kala ngavei chi ja̱khup tahaida mibingna keinung chili zanga kala mi kachiva̱na angatar eina muivāda keinung chi khuihaowa.
Chiwui thili athumna keinungli khalei saikora, sha̱nao mayarnao, khararnaosan, sei, yao kala gadhā mateila saikora raighai eina sāthatserhaowa.
Chieina ra̱yang khavai kachiho mi khani chili Joshuana hānga, “Khayorva̱ chiwui shimli vālu, kala chiwui eina khayorva̱, kala awui shimkhurbing, nanina ngashit kahai athishurda akhuishoklu.”

Chieina ara̱yang khavai khavā yaronao khani china Rahab, avāva̱ eina ava̱va̱, chinaongarā kala awui shimkhurbing mi saikorali akhuishoka. Awui theisā saikorali khuishokta Israelwui rāmrah ayarli haihai.
Kala athumna keinung kala chiwui alungli khalei ot saikora mei eina thottahaowa; kha lupāsā, sinā, pithrai eina mariwui khorkhongbing khuilaga

Kha khayorva̱ Rahab, kala avāva̱wui shimkhur kala awui chinaongarā saikorawui manglā Joshuana kanmi; kala aja eina tangda ana Israelli ngasopama; kaja Joshuana Jericho keinung ra̱yang khava kachiho mi khani chili ana ngathumkhamiwui vangna.
Shimphunga sāphokthang awui
naochizai shimānra,
ngavei sakāthang awui
naopaisho shimānra.”
Hithāda

Kha sākashimānli zangkahai otbingwui apongli Israelwui mibingna shitkasang kaihaowa; kaja Judah shangnaoli Zerahwui naomayara Zabdi, Zabdiwui naomayara Carmi, Carmiwui naomayara Achan china sākathān kahai ot kakhuihaowa kala Israelwui mibingli
Joshuana Jerichowui eina Bethelwui zingshovāk Betha-ven ngalemli khalei Ai chili mibingli chihovāda hānga, “Ngalei chili vālaga ara̱yanglu.” Chieina mibing china vālaga Ai ayangkui.
Kala athumna Joshuali latungda hānga, “Mi saikora mavāranu kha thingkhani kathum sha̱kha varanu kala Aili ngararanu; mi katongali mavā ngasakalu; kaja athum kateokhamānga.”
Chieina mibing chiwui eina thing kathum sha̱kha vai; kha athum Ai mibingwui eina yāmuwa,
kala Aiwui mibingna Shebarimwui ngaveikhur eina tangda ngahomtai kala athum thumrāda tharuk sha̱khali shaothathaowa. Chi theilaga mibing malungkaping shimānhaida ngacheeranghaowa.
Chieina Joshuana awui kachon serkhaklaga Israelwui khararnaobingli ngasoda athumwui kuili hotla neolaga
Chieina Joshuana hānga, “Iyavo, O Proho VARE, khisāda mibing hili Jordan kānda khuirāsakhala? Amorbingwui pāngli misangda thikhavai kasāla? Ithum Jordan makānla lākhavāk pamsasi kaje phāmeira!
O Proho, Israelna athumwui yangkashibingwui eina yāmthui kahai tharan ina khi hāngrakhala?
Kaja Canaannaobing kala ngalei chili kapambingna hi shālaga ithumli rakuinamra, kala ithumwui ming okathuiwui eina katathaora; kala nawui hakkhamahā mingwui vāng nana khi sārakhala?”
Israelna morei sāhaira; ina athumli kaso kahai iwui tuingashit chonmakānhaira; sāshimān kahai ot athumna khuihaira kala leekhuilaga kapikta athumwui otlungli thumhaida lei.

Chiwui vang Israelwui mibing athumwui yangkashebingli mangasungkhararna. Athum yangkashebingwui eina yāmhaowa, kaja athuma shimānkapai otbing kathā ngasāhaira. Nathumwui alungwuili khalei otbing chi masākazamranglakha eina tangda, ina nathumli mangasomiluimara.
Nganingkālu! mibingli thar ngasaklu kala hānglu, akhamawui vāng nathum khalatta tharlu; kaja Israelwui
Chiwui vang akhama ngathor nathumli shangbingwui athishurda khuirāra; kala
Kala sākathān kahai ot kakhuia a chili kala otbing saikora mei eina riktāra, kaja ana
Chieina Joshuana ngathorthak thuida, shang-shang eina Israelli khuikharā eina Judah shangli khuihaowa;
kala ana Judah shangli nganaida khuirai, kala Zerahwui shimkhurbingli khuihaowa; kala ana Zerahwui shimlak eina khuirai, kala Zabdili khuihaowa;
kala ana Zabdiwui shimlak mi ava̱va̱ khuikharā eina Judah shangwui Zerahwui naomayara Zabdi, Zabdiwui naomayara Carmi, Carmiwui naomayara Achanli khuihaowa.
Chieina Joshuana Achanli hānga, “inaomayara, Israelwui
Kala Achanna Joshuali ngahānkai, “Kachangkhat eina, Israelwui

horkathānhaikasā lanbing chiwui ngachaili Shinarwui kachon khamathā akha, kala shekel shākhani kharita lupāsā kala shekel hangphangā kharita sinātang, chi kathei eina ina ngamarda ningchanghaowa, kala khuihaowa; kala yanglu, chibing chi iwui kachonshimwui leikhur akhali lupāsā eina mazinglaga phumhaida lei.”
Chieina Joshuana mi chihovai, kala athumna kachonshimli ngasamvai; kala yanglu, awui kachonshimli lupāsā eina mazinglaga ngaleili chuiphumhaisai.
Kala athumna otbing chi kachonshimwui eina khuishoklaga Joshua eina Israelwui mibing saikorali khuiungmida

Chieina Joshua eina Israel saikorana Zerahwui naomayara Achanli, awui lupāsā, kachon, sinātang, kala awui naomayarabing eina naongalāva̱bing, kala awui seivā, kala gadhā, kala yao, kala awui kachonshim, kala awui khalalei saikora eina ngasoda athumna Achor tampākli khuishanga.
Kala Joshuana hānga, “Khisāda nana ithumli chot ngasakhala? Aja
Kala athumna awuitungli ngalung khorda wonrā sākahai chi aja eina tangda lei; hithāda
Kala
kala nathumna Jericholi kala chiwui awungali kasā thāda nana Ai kala chiwui awungalila sāmira; athumwui lan eina sha̱keimang nathumna ngapaikhuira; keinung chiwui zingtunshong ngathirai sālu.”
Chieina Joshuana ngakarthuida raimi saikorali thānlaga Aili shanga kala Joshuana rai kapinga mi thingthumrā kapangkhuilaga ngayāshong chihoshanga.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Yanglu, nathum keinungwui zingtunshong ngathirai sāra; keinungwui eina tāda mathuipaimana, kha shaksālaga ngarānpinghailu;
kala I eina ili khangaso mibingna keinung chili vāra. Kala athumna ithumli kharomkashok chitharan kharewui thāda, ithum yāmhaora;
kala keinung chiwui eina athumna ithumli kharom khavai shokser ngasakra, kaja ‘Athum kharewui thāda yāmluihaira’ da athumna hāngra. Chieina ithumna athumwui eina yāmhaora;
chitharan nathumna rimkasāwui eina shokta keinung chi zangkhuira; kaja
Kala nathumna keinung chi khui kahai tharan, nathumna keinung chi mei eina thottāhaolu,
Chieina Joshuana athumli chihovāda Ai eina Bethel aniwui amatak Aiwui zingtunshong ngathirai asai; kha Joshuava chithang ngayā mibingli ngasopama.
Kala Joshuana ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuida mibingli kazipkhui, kala Israelwui ararbingli ngasoda Ai mibingwui mangāli shanga.
Kala Ali ngasokazata raimi saikora keinungwui mangāshong shangnganaida Aiwui zingtunshong kathuka apam akhana mataklaga rairum vasāpama.
Kala ana keinung chiwui zingtunshong Bethel eina Aiwui ngachaili ngathirai sākhavai mi thingphangā shikha kaziphai.
Chithāda raimibing kachungana keinungwui atungshong kala chiwui rai khangakapbingna zingtunshong kazipa, kha Joshuava chithang ngayā tampāk chili pama.

Kala Aiwui awungana chi kathei eina keinungwui mi saikorali totot hokhuilaga ngathorshong Israelli ngarar khavai Arabahvākwui atungshong shokuwa; kha keinungwui khanukvāk rairim sāda lei kaji a matheithuwa.
Kala Joshua eina Israelwui mibing saikora athumwui mangāli makhayui thāda lamhāngvāk yāmvā khaninghaowa.
Chieina keinung chili khalei mi saikorali athumli kharomvā khavai hokhui, kala athumna Joshuali kharomvāmamānda keinung chiwui eina khuithuiserhaowa.
Aili lah Bethelli Israelnaoli kakharomli makazang mi khipakha maleisamana, athumna keinung shohaiphunglaga Israelli kharomthuihaowa.
Chieina

Kala rairim sāda khaleibing china athumwui pam eina thaklāk eina shoka, kala ana apāng katingkākhaleoda, athumna keinungli ngasamzangda khuihaowa; kala athumna katotlak eina keinung chi mei sa̱tāmihaowa.

Chieina Aiwui mibingna ngareikhaung tharan, yanglu, keinung chi meikhut ngapuirut eina kazing kāshunga; kala athum hishongla chishongla yām khavai pangshap maleithuwa, kaja lamhāngvāk yāmvā kahai mibing chi athumwuishong hanungrāsai.
Kala Joshua eina Israel saikora, ngathirai kasābingna keinung chi khuihaida meikhut kazing kāshung kahai kathei eina mibingna hanungda Ai mibingli sāthat ngakānhaowa.
Kala kaikhana keinungvāk eina rai kala khangatei kaikhana chivāk rāda Israelna athumli kuinamhaowa, kala Israelna athumli mayāmshok ngasaklakla shaothatserhaowa.
Kha Aiwui awungali athumna kharing eina tukkhui, kala Joshuali khuiungmi.

Israelna Aiwui mibing chili lamhāngli kharomvāda athum saikora chili akha eina tangda mashākla raighai eina yaitupthat kahaiwui thili, Israel saikora Aili latvai kala chili leikasā saikora raighai eina sāthatserhaowa.
Kala chithang sākathat sha̱naola mayarnao Aiwui mi saikora, thingtharāda khanina.
Kaja Aiwui mi saikora masāthat ngakānranglakha eina tangda Joshuana apāng eina awui kazei katingkashok chi makhuitāmana.
na Joshuali kaso kahai athishurda Israelna sha̱kei eina horkathān kahai thongthāng chimāng ngaponkhui.
Chithāda Joshuana Ai mei sa̱tāhaowa, kala katang makhavai ramcho sāngasak kahai chi ajala chithāda lei.

Joshuana Aiwui awungali thingtungli thāngda ngazin eina tangda kāngyuihai, kala zimik katun eina athumna awui angun chi khuitāda keinung ngaveili phum khavai Joshuana kasoi, kala lungkhor kahaka khorda, lungkhor chi aja eina tangda lei.
Kala chili, Israel mibingwui mangāli, ana Moseswui ain lungphek akha kapihaikasā chi ngalungbingwuitungli kapisanga.
Kala Israel saikora, kha̱miranu, athum ramnaobingranu, athumwui khararnaobing, kala otva̱bing kala athumwui bichar samibingli ngasoda
Kala chiwui thili ainli kapi kahai athishurda sokhami tuila khonkashi tuila ain saikora ana pātai.
Mosesna kaso kahai chili Joshuana Israel katonga, sha̱nao, naoshinao kala athumwui alungli pankharuma kha̱mi saikora chiwui kazip chili, mapāshokkhangakān tui akhala maleimana.
Jordan kānda khalei kaphungram Lebanonshong Great Sea shangshungda kala khanem tampākli khalei Hit, Amor, Canaan, Periz, Hiv kala Jebuswui awungabingna shokta khalei otshot hi kashā eina,
athum akha eina akha khokkha sāda Joshua kala Israelli ngarar khavai khangashit sāhaowa.
Kha Gibeonli kapambingna, Joshuana Jericho eina Aili kathāda yuihaokhala kaji shālaga,
athumna awor sāda gadhātungli porāshi akāk, drakhāra̱ sangkhavai chiphokakhui khao,
athumwui pheili chiphokakhui pheihop, kala tanar kahai kachon ngavai kala morthut kahai khamuikao da khuiphunga.
Kala athumna Gilgal rāmrahli Joshua eina Israelwui mibingli asamphangda hānga, “Ithum katāva̱wui eina kharāna; chieina arui ithumli tuingashit akha sālu.”
Athumna Joshuali hānga, “Ithum nawui raobingna.”
Chieina Joshuana athumli hānga, “Nathum kachikathā mikhala? Kala kachiwui eina kharākhala?”
Athumna ali ngahānkai, “Naraobing katāva̱wui eina kharāna; khikhalajila nawui
chili lāngda Jordan kānda khalei Amorbingwui awunga khani Heshbonwui awunga Sihon eina Ashtarothli kapama Bashanwui awunga Ogli kathāda sākhala kaji ithum shāhaira.

Kala ithumwui khararnaobing kala ramwui mi saikorana ithumli hānga, nathumwui pāngli shongzawui vang kashakazā ngarānphungda, athumli asamphangda hānglu, ithum nathumwui raona, ara ithumli tuingashit akha rāsāmilu.
Ithumwui khamui yanglu; ithumna nathumli samphang khavai kazatli ithumwui shongzawui vang kashakazā sākhavai shimwui eina zatphokthang lumsai, kha ara yanglu, kaohaida morhaira;
