Ithumwui drakhāra̱ sangkhavai khao hi chipemthang kadhar eina leisai, kha yanglu ara wuthaira; kala ithumwui kachonbing eina pheihop yanglu, shongfa kasāngkha zathaida ara tānārhaira.”
Chieina mibingna athumwui kashakazā chi zāngaruma, kala
Chiwui vang eina Joshuana athumli masāthat khavai chingri kahai tuingashit akha sai kala yarui ashangva̱wui kathāna saikorana shākhi mi.
Athum tuingashit sāda kathumthang kākahaiwui thili, mibing chi athumwui luinganaili khalei mibingna kaji shāhaowa.
Kala Israelwui mibingna zatphokta athumwui keinungli kakathumathang vāzanga. Athumwui keinungbing chiya Gibeon, Chephirah, Be-eroth, Kiriath-jearim hibingna.
Kha Israelnaobingna athumli masāthatmana, khikhalajila yarui ashangva̱wui kathānabingna Israelwui
Kha kathānabing china yarui ashangva̱li hānga, “Ithumna
Athumli hithāda sāra, athumli ringngasakra, maningakha athumli shākhi sākahaiwui vang eina chiwui malungkhavāt ithumwuitungli tāshunghaipaishina.”
Kala kathānabing china hānga, “Athumli ringngasakra.” Chiwui vang eina akhavābingna kahāng thāda athumli yarui ashangva̱wui vāng thingkapha eina tara̱ katā sāngasaka.
Joshuana athumli hokhuida hānga, “Khiwui vang nathumna ithumli kapikta, ithumwui luinganaili leilaga, ithum katāva̱ eina rai da hāngkhala?
Ara chithāda sāda nathumli khonshihaira, chieina iwui Varewui shimkhurwui vang nathum raonao sāda kaikhana thing phāra kala kaikhana tara̱ tāmira.”
Athumna Joshuali ngahānkai, “Khikhalajila nawui
Ara ithum nawui pāngli leili: nawui mikyanli ithumwui vang kaphā khamashung chi nana sāmilu.”
Chieina ana athumli chithāda sai, kala Israel mibingwui pāng eina kanmida athumli masāthatmana.
Kha Joshuana athumli yarui ashangva̱ kala

Jerusalemwui awunga Adoni-zedekna, Joshuana Ai yuikhuilaga Jericho kala chiwui awungali kasā thāda sākazamserhaira, kala Gibeonli khalei mibingna Israelli mashitkhuilaga athum pamrumhaira kaji shālaga,
ngacheelakhaowa; khikhalajila Gibeon hi kahaka keinungna, wungnaowui keinung thāda Ailila hakkhamei akhana kala chiwui mibing rai pinglaka.
Chieina Jerusalemwui awunga Adoni-zedekna Hebronwui awunga Hoham, Jarmuthwui awunga Piram, Lachishwui awunga Japhia kala Eglonwui awunga Debir athumli pao chihovāda hānga;
“Ili kharāngachonmilu, ithumna Gibeon sashimithaosa; kaja ngalei hina Joshua eina Israelwui mibingli mashithaira.”

Chieina Amorwui awunga phangā, chiya Jerusalemwui awunga, Hebronwui awunga, Jarmuthwui awunga, Lachishwui awunga kala Eglonwui awunga, athumna athumwui raimi kazipkhuida Gibeonli ngasung khavai rairum vasāda rai sai.

Kala Joshuana Gilgalli pamlakha, Gibeonwui mi chihorāda hānga, “Naraobingli napāng mayansāngnāhaila kharāngachonmilu; kala thākta kharākankhuimilu; kaja phungreiramli kapama Amorbingwui awunga saikorana ithumli rai sākhavai kuinamhaira.”
Chieina Joshuana raimi saikora kala kapanga saikora khuiphungda Gilgalwui eina zatphokuwa.
Kala
Chieina Joshuana Gilgalwui eina ngayā pongda zatlaga kashuirak eina rai atai.
Kala
Kala athumna Israelwui eina Beth-horonwui shongshanli yāmkhavā tharan
Chiwui thili
“Zimik, na Gibeonli mangatha̱la nganinglu,
kala Kachāng, na Aijalon tampākli nganinglu.”
zimikna mangatha̱la nganinga, kala kachāngnala ngasāmmi.
Hi Jasharwui Lairikli makapihaimala? Zimikna kazing alungthungli ngasāma kala zimik matunla langpongda pama.
Hikathā zimiksho hi ridala aruihonla hithāda
Chiwui thili Joshuala kala ali khangaso Israel saikora Gilgal rāmrahli latunga.
Awunga phangā hina yāmhaida Makkedahwui lungkhurli yāmngayina.
Kala Joshuali hithāda rāhānga, “Awunga phangā chi Makkedah lungkhurli yāmngayinkasā theihaira.”
Chieina Joshuana hānga, “Lungkhur chi lunggui kahak akha eina shungkhamhaolu, kala athumli mayon khavai mi hailu.
Kha nathum chili mapamla yangkashebingli kharomthulu; kala athumli angaphankhuida athumwui keinungli mazang ngasakalu, kaja
Joshua eina Israelwui mibingna sorkhangasai sathatta mutmi kahai tharan kala shākkahaibing china athumwui raipan ngaveitit kahai keinungli ungzang kahai tharan,
mi saikora Makkedah apamli Joshuawui rāmrahli kapong eina latunga; khipānakha Israel mibingwuitungli tui akhala mamatuimana.
Chieina Joshuana hānga, “Lungkhur khamor chi sholu, kala awunga phangā chi lungkhur chiwui eina khuishokta ili khuirālu.”
Kala athumna chithāda sai, kala Hebron, Jamuth, Lachish kala Eglonwui awungabingli akhuishoka.

Kala athumna awungabing chi Joshuali khuikhaung eina, Joshuana Israelwui mibing saikorali hokhuida, ali ngasokhavā raimiwui akuibingli hānga, “Rānganaimeida awungabingwui akahungli nathumwui phei eina nailu.” Chieina athumna rānganai, kala athumna athumwui akahungli ranai.
Kala Joshuana athumli hānga, “Mangacheelu, lah ning masuitālu; pingmeida malung zangmeilu, kaja nathumna khangarar nathumwui yangkashebing saikorali
Khaleilaga Joshuana athumli ngaphitthatserhaowa, kala ana thing ava̱va̱li ngazin eina tangda athumli hokthanghai.

Kha zimik katun tharan, Joshuana kasoda athumna thingtungwui eina khuitālaga athumna ngathum khavai lungkhur chili horsanghaowa, kala lungkhur chi athumna ngalung khorphinhaowa, chi aja eina tangda lei.
Kala Joshuana Makkedah khuithang ngalei chiwui awunga kala mi saikora raighai eina sāthatserhaida khipākha machakshoklakmana. Jerichowui awungali kasā thāda Makkedahwui awungalila chithāda yuikhui.
Chiwui thili Joshuali Israel saikorana ngasoda Libnahli vai, kala Libnahli vāngarara;
kala ngalei chila awungala
Kala Joshuali Israel saikora ngasoda Libnahwui eina zatphokta Lachishli vai; kala athumna ngalei chi akuinamda ngarara:
kala
Chieina Gezerwui awunga Horamna Lachishli ngachon khavai rai, kha Joshuana awunga eina mibing saikora sāthatserhaida khipākha mataimana.
Kala Joshuana Israel saikorali ngasoda Lachishwui eina Eglonli vai; kala chili athumna akuinamda ngarara;
kala athumna chithang ngalei chi yuikhui, kala mi kachiva̱li raighai eina sāthatserhaida ana Lachishli kasā thāda sāthatserhaowa.
Chiwui thili Joshuana Israelnao saikorali ngasoda Eglonwui eina Hebronli vai; kala athumna chili vāngarara,
kala ngalei chi khuihaowa, kala chiwui awunga kala chiwui keinungbing, kala mi kachiva̱ Eglonli kasā thāda raighai eina sāthatserhaida mi akhala mataimana.
Chiwui thili Joshua eina Israel saikorana, Debirli hanungda chili ungngarara,

kala ana chiwui awungabing kala chiwui keinungbing khuiserhaida chiwui mi saikora sāthatserhaowa; kala mi akhala mataishokmana; ana Hebron eina Libnah kala awungali kasā thāda Debir eina chiwui awungalila sai.
Chieina Joshuana ngalei katonga, phungreiram, Negeb kala angako eina phungreiphei kala awungabingli yuiserhaowa; ana akhala mataimimana; kha manglā kazanga saikora
Kala Joshuana Kadesh-barnea eina thuida Gaza, kala Goshenwui ngalei saikora kala Gibeon vāshungda yuiserhaowa.
Kala Joshuana ngalei eina awungabing saikora sakkhali khotkha sai, khikhalajila
Chieina Joshuana Israel saikorali ngasoda Gilgal rāmrahli latunga.
Tui hi Hazorwui awunga Jabinna kashā eina, ana Madonwui awunga Jobab, kala Shimronwui awunga, kala Achshaphwui awunga,
kala atungshong phungreiramli kapama awungabing, kala Chinnerothwui azingshong Arabahli kapamabing, kala angakoli kapamabing, kala zingtungshongwui Naphoth-dor,
zingsho zingtunwui Canaannaobing, kala Amornaobing, Hitnaobing, Periznaobing, phungreili kapam Jebusnaobing kala Mizpah ngaleiwui Harmon azingli khalei Hivnaobing saikorali rai asuiya.
Kala athumna raimi saikora khuiphungda, athumwui raimibing, ashang shālak eina, sigui eina siguigari sorkhangasai zanglaga kongwui situi ngayāda rai.
Kala awungabing hina athumwui raimi saikorali ngarumda Israelli ngarar khavai Merom tara̱pamli rakazipa.
Kala
Chieina Joshuana awui raimibingli ngasoda kashuirak eina Meromwui tara̱pamli angarara.
Kala
Kala
Chitharan Joshuana latungda Hazor ngalei ungkhuiya, kala chiwui awungali raighai eina sāthathaowa; kaja Hazorna wungrambing chiwui akhoka sāsai.
Kala athumna chili kapambing saikora raighai eina sāthatserhaowa, kharingyur akhala mataila sāthatserhaowa, kala ana Hazor mei sa̱tāmihaowa.
Awungabing chiwui keinungbing, kala athumwui awungabing, Joshuana khuida,
Kha Joshuana mei sa̱tā kahai Hazor maningla kaphungbingli khanganing keinungbing chi Israelna masa̱tāmimana.
Kala keinung chiwui thongthāng kala sha̱kei saikora Israelwui mibingna ngaponkhui, kha mi saikora athumna raighai eina sāthatserhaowa; kala kharingyur akhala mataimimana.
na awui rao Mosesli kakaso thada, Mosesnala Joshuali chithada kasoi;
Chieina Joshuana ngalei saikora, kaphungram kala Negeb saikora kala Goshen ngalei saikora, kala angako ngalei, kala Arabah kala Israelwui kaphungram kala chiwui khangakoko ngalei saikora khuiserhaowa
Halak Kaphungwui eina thuilaga Seirshong shangda, Harmon Kaphung azingli khalei Lebanonwui tampāk Baal-gad kaho apam chieina tangda vāshunga. Kala ana chiwui awunga saikorali yuihaida sāthatserhaowa.
Joshuana awungabing chili kasāngkha rai sai.
Gibeonli kapama Hivnaobing maningla Israelwui mibingli chingri khavai keinung akhala maleisalakmana; athumna yuikhuisera.
Kaja athumwui wuklung marar khangasak hi

Kala Joshuana chitharan rāda Hebron, Debir, Anab, kala Judahwui kaphungram kala Israelwui kaphungramli khalei Anakimshi saikora manāthatserhaowa kala Joshuana athumli ngasoda athumwui keinungbing saikora shimānmihaowa.
Israel mibingwui ngaleili Anakimnao akhala matai ngasakmana; kha Gaza, Gath kala Ashdod apambing hili kateokha taisai.
Chieina

Heshbonli kapama Amorwui awunga Sihon, ana Arnon tampākwui akatangli khalei Aroer eina thuida kala chiwui tampāk, kala tampāk alungthung chieina thuilaga Jabbok kong vāshungda Ammonbingwui thari, chiya, Gilead tangkhai,
kala Arabah eina thuilaga Chinneroth Ngayi zingshovāk, kala Beth-jeshimothshong eina Arabahwui shamadru, Salt Sea vāshungda, azingshong Pisgah kaphungpheili khalei ram chi vāshungda mungsai,
kala Bashanwui awunga Og, Ashtaroth eina Edre-ili pamkasā Rephaimwui shāk kahai yur akhana

kala ana Harmon Kaphung eina Salecah kala Bashan saikora Geshurbing kala Ma-acathwui thari tāshunga, kala Gilead tangkhai eina thuilaga Heshbonwui awunga Sihonwui thari eina tangda hibingwuitungli mungsai.

Kala Joshua eina Israelwui mibingna yuikakhui ngalei chiwui awungabing, Jordan zingtunvāk khalei chi hina: Lebanon Leiwukli khalei Baal-gad eina thuida Seir vākhangasun Halak Kaphung vāshunga (kala Israel shangbingwui shimlui sākhavai Joshuana ngayarmi kahai ngaleibingna,

kaphungram, angakoram, Arabah alungli khalei, kaphungpheili khalei, lamhāngli khalei kala Negeb alungli khalei, Hitnaobing, Amornaobing, Canaannaobing, Periznaobing, Hivnaobing kala Jebusnaobingwui ngaleibing hina):
Jerichowui awunga, akha: Bethel ngalemli khalei, Ai awunga akha;
Jerusalemwui awunga, akha; Hebronwui awunga, akha,
Jarmuthwui awunga, akha; Lachishwui awunga, akha;
Eglonwui awunga, akha; Gezerwui awunga, akha;
Debirwui awunga, akha; Gederwui awunga, akha;
Hormahwui awunga, akha; Aradwui awunga, akha;
Libnahwui awunga, akha; Adullamwui awunga, akha;
Makkedahwui awunga, akha; Bethelwui awunga, akha;
Tappuahwui awunga, akha; Hepherwui awunga, akha;
Aphekwui awunga, akha; Lasharonwui awunga, akha;
Madonwui awunga, akha; Hazorwui awunga, akha;
Shimron-meronwui awunga, akha; Achshaphwui awunga, akha;
Taanachwui awunga, akha; Megiddowui awunga, akha;
Kedeshwui awunga, akha; Carmelli khalei Jokne-amwui awunga, akha;
Naphath-dorli khalei Dorwui awunga, akha; Galileeli khalei Goiimwui awunga,
Tirzahwui awunga, akha: awunga saikora, thumrāda akhana.
Chitharan Joshua sarshunhaoda;
Khuifaki kaji ngaleibing chiya; Philistinewui ngalei saikora, kala Gershurwui ngalei saikora,

(Egyptwui zingshoshong khalei, Shihor eina thuida atungshong Ekron thari shangshungda, Canaanbing da katheiyur. Ngalei chi Philistine wungnao phangā kaja Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath kala Ekron hibingwui), azingshong Avvimwui ram saikora,
azingshong Canaan mibingwui ngalei saikora, kala Sidonbingwui ngalei Mearah, kala Aphek tāshungda, Amorwui tharili vāshunga,
kala Gebalbingwui ngalei, kala Lebanon saikora, zingshoshong, Harmon Kaphungwui azingli khalei Baal-gad eina thuilaga Hamath vāzang khavai,

phungreiramli kapamabing saikora Lebanon eina thuilaga Misrephoth-maim vāshungda, kala Sidonbing saikora zanga. Ina athumli Israelnaobingwui mangāli kashamshokra; ina nali kakaso athishurda ngalei chi Israelwui shimlui sāda nana yarmimalu.
Chiwui vang eina ara ngalei hi shang chiko kala Manasseh shang tangkhaili ngayarmihaolu.”
Arnon tampāk akatangli khalei Aroer tampāk eina haophoklaga, kala alungthungli khalei keinung kala Medebawui kaphung khangani ngalei saikora khuida Dibon vāshunga;
kala Heshbonli mungkasā Amorbingwui awunga, Sihonwui keinungbing saikora Amorbingwui thari vāshunga;
kala Gilead, kala Geshurnaobing eina Ma-acathnaobingwui ngalei, kala Harmon Kaphung saikora, kala Bashan eina Salecah vākashung saikora;
Ashtaroth eina Edre-i lungli khamunga, Bashanli khalei Ogwui wungram saikora (amāng Rephaimwui ngachaili taishoka); saikora hi Mosesna yuikhuida kashamshok kahaina.
Kha Geshurbing, lah Ma-acathnaobingli Israel mibingna makashamshokla athumna aja eina tangda Israelnaobingli ngasopamdalei.
Kala Mosesna Reuben shangli athum shimkhurwui athishurda shimlui ngayarmi.
Chieina ashiwui leiret chi Arnon tampākwui akatangli khalei Aroer, kala tampāk alungthungli khalei keinung kala Medeba kaphung khangani saikora mi;
Heshbonla chiwui kaphung khanganili khalei keinung saikorala; Dibon, Bamoth-baal, kala Beth-Baal-meon,
kala Jahaz, kala Kedemoth, Mepha-ath,
kala Kiriathaim, kala Sibmah, kala kaphung khanganili khalei Zereth-shahar,
kala Beth-peor, kala Pisgahwui kaphungpheibing, kala Beth-jeshimoth,

chiya, kaphung khanganiwui keinung saikora, Mosesna yuikakhuiya Heshbonli mungkasa Amorwui awunga Shihon, kala awui wungram saikora, ali ngasoda Median, Evi, kala Rekem kala Zur, Hur, Reba, saikorawui kathānabing Sihonwui wungnaobing, ngalei chili pānkasābing.
Marān Beorwui naomayara Balaamla Israelwui mibingna raighai eina sāthat kahai chili zanga.
Kala Reuben mibingwui thari Jordan eina tanga. Reuben shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai keinungbing kala rambing hina.
Kala Mosesna Gadnaobinglila shangwui athishurda shimlui yartai.
Athumwui leiret: Jazer, kala Gileadwui keinung saikora, kala Ammonnaobingwui ngalei tangkhai eina thuida Rabbahwui zingshoshong khalei Aroer,
kala Heshbon eina thuida Ramath-mizpeh eina Betonim, kala Mahanaim eina thuida Debirwui thari,

kala tampākli khalei Beth-haram, Beth-nimrah, Succoth, kala Zaphon, Heshbonwui awunga Sihonwui wungram taida khaleibing, Jordan eina thariphungda zingshovāk Chinnereth Ngayiwui nemkhamei rākachat Jordanli zingshoshong eina tangda zanga.
Hi Gadbingli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai ram, kala keinungbing kala kha̱bing ngasoda mikahaina.
Kala Mosesna Manasseh shang tangkhailila shimlui yartai; chi athumwui shimlakwui athishurda Manasseh tangkhaili yarkatāna.
Athumwui lam chi Mahanaim eina thuida Bashanwui awunga Ogna khamunga wungram saikora, Jairwui keinung saikora zangda, Bashanli khalei keinung hangtharuka,
kala Gilead tangkhai, kala Ashtaroth, kala Edre-i, Bashanli khalei Ogwui wungram; hibing hi Manassehwui naomayara Machirwui ara̱-azā tangkhaili ngayarkhamina.
Hibing hi Jerichowui zingshoshong Jordan kānkāda Moabli leilakha Mosesna ngayarkhami shimluibingna.
Kha Mosesna Levi shangli shimlui mayarsangmana; kaja ana athumli ngashit kahai athishurda Israelwui
Kala hibing hi pāngmon Eleazar, Nunwui naomayara Joshua kala Israel shangwui avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur akhavābingna Canaan ngaleili Israelnaobingli ngayarkhami shimluina.
Kaja Mosesna shang khani laga tangkhaili Jordan lākhavāk ngayarmi; kha Levinaobingli shimlui mamimana.
Josephwui mibing Manasseh eina Ephraimda shang khani leiya, Levinaobingli shimlui mamimana; kha sompam khavai keinungli kala sha̱keiwui vang seihomphungmang mi.
na Mosesli kakaso athishurda Israelwui mibingna chithada sai; athumna ngalei chi ngayara.
wui rao Mosesna ili Kadesh-barneawui eina ngalei ara̱yang khavai kachiho atamli I zingkum hangmati kāhairasai; kala ina theikakhui pao chi ali khuiungmi.
Kha ili khangaso ichināngarāna mibingli malung tatung ngasaka. Chithalala ina
Kala Mosesna chithang khangashit sāda hānga, ‘Nana phei naisang kahai apam chi kachangkhat nawui kala nawui naongarāwui ngasāra, khikhalajila nana
Kala ara yanglu,
I aruila Mosesna kachiho atamli kapang thāda pangda lei, rai atamli yāng leikasā thāda aruila leipapama, kala zatung zatvāshapta lei.
Chieina ara
Chieina Joshuana ali somiya; kala ana Hebron ngalei chi Jephunnehwui naomayara Calebwui shimlui sākhavai mihaowa.
Chithāda sāda Hebron ngalei chi aja eina tangda Keniznaobingwui Jephunnehwui naomayara Calebwui shimlui sāda lei: khikhalajila ana Israelwui
Hebron hi khareli Kiriath-arba hosai; Arba kaho china Anakimbingwui alungli hakmeikap kaja mi sāda leisai; kala ngalei chi rai kasāwui eina khangasām samphanga.
Ka̱lā yanglaga Judah shangwui mibing athum shimkhurwui athishurda azingshong Edomwui thari, Zinwui lamhāng takhamaze azingshong tāshunga.
Kala azingshong athumwui thari Salt Sea shangkachata eina, kala shamadrupheiwui eina thuilaga azingvāk tāshunga;
Akrabbimwui kajui kakā eina thuida azingshong vāshungda tālaga Zinli vāshoka, kala Kadesh-barnea azingshong shoklaga Hezron vāshunglaga Addar vashoka, laga Karka takuikhui,
chiwui eina Azmonli vai, laga Egyptwui Kong chi eina vāshoka, kala chithāda shamadruli vātanga. Hi azingshong athumwui tharina.
Kala zingshoshongwui thari Salt Seawui eina thuida Jordan khamor tāshunga. Atungshongwui thari Jordan khamor, shamadruphei eina haophoka;
kala thari chi Beth-hoglah shanglaga Beth-arabah atungshong vāshuma; kala Reubenwui naomayara Bohanna ngalung shun kahai ngalemli shanga;

kala thari chi Achor Valleywui eina Debir shanga, laga atungshong Gilgalvāk vākuikai, hi Adummim juikakāli yangngasungda tampāk chiwui azingshong lei; kala thari chi En-shemeshwui ra̱khong vāshunglaga En-rogel vāshunga;

chieina thari chi Jebus mibingwui ngalei (chiya, Jerusalem) chiwui azingshong khalei Hinnomwui naomayarawui tampāk shanga, kala zingtunshong Hinnom tampākli yangkhangasung kaphungton kāshunga, hina atungshong vākatanga Rephaimwui tampāk akatangna;
chiwui thili thari chi kaphungton eina thuida Nephtoahwui Tara̱ ura̱pam vāshunga, kala chiwui eina Ephron Kaphungwui keinungbing vāshunga; kala Baalah (chiya Kiriath-jearim) vākuikhui;
kala thari chi Baalahwui zingtunshong vākuikakhui chiwui eina Seir Kaphung chiwui eina vāshumda Jearim Kaphung (chiya, Chesalon) atungshong, chieina Beth-shemesh talaga Timnah ngalemli tāshunga;
thari chi Ekron kaphungwui amai matungmeida shoklaga, Shikkeron vākuikhuilaga Baalah Kaphung ngalemli tai; kala Jabneelli shoka; chiwui eina thari chi shamadruli ungtanga.
Kala zingtunshong Kahaka Ngayiwui eina shamadrupheibing thari sai. Hi Judah shangwui shimkhur athishurda yarkahai kuimareikakhui tharina.
Kala Calebna Anakwui naomayara kathum Sheshai, Ahiman, Talmai, Anakwui ara̱-azāli kashamshokhaowa.
Chiwui eina Calebna Debirli kapamnaobingli shangngarara; Debir kaji hi khareli Kiriath-sepher hosai.
Kala Calebna hānga, “Kachikathāna Kiriath-sepher hi yuikhuishapakha, ali ina inao ngalāva̱ Achsahli ngakum ngasakra.”
Chieina Othni-el kaho Kenazwui naomayara, Calebwui agatona yuihaoda, ali anao ngalāva̱ Achsahli ngakum ngasakhaowa.
Sha̱nao china ali kharatharan, ana avāva̱ Calebli lui pokhavai hānga; chieina ana gadhā tungwui eina katā tharan Calebna ali hānga, “Na khi pongaikhala?”
Ana ali hānga, “Nana ili Negebli pamngasakhaoda ura̱pamla akha milu.” Chieina Calebna shangkhamato ura̱pam eina takhamaze ura̱pam chi ali mihaowa.
Hi Judah shangwui mibingli shimkhurwui athishurda shimlui chi hithāda mi.
Judah shang mibingwui keinungbing chiya, Edomwui tharishong tākhamazeli khami keinungbing Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
Kinah, Dimonah, Adadah,
Kedesh, Hazor, Ithnan,
Ziph, Telem, Be-aloth,
Hazor-hadattah, Keri-oth-hezron (chiya Hazor)
Amam, Shema, Moladah,
Hazar-gaddah, Heshmon, Beth-pelet,
Hazar-shual, Beer-sheba, Biziothiah,
Baalah, Iim, Ezem,
Eltolad, Chesil, Hormah,
Ziklag, Madmannah, Sansannah,
Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain kala Rimmon: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda saikora keinung maga̱da chikona.
Kala angakoshong, Eshta-ol, Zorah, Ashnah,
Zanoah, En-gannim, Tappuah, Enam,
Jarmuth, Adullam, Sokoh, Azekah,
Sha-araim, Adithaim, Gederah, Gederothaim: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda matina.
Zenan, Hadashah, Migtal-gad,
Dilean, Mizpeh, Joktheel,
Lachish, Bozkath, Eglon,
Cabbon, Lahmam, Chitlish,
Gederoth, Beth-dagon, Naamah kala Makkedah: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda tharukna.
Libnah, Ether, Ashan,
Iphtah, Ashnah, Nezib,
Keilah, Achzib kala Mareshah: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung chikona.
Ekron, kala chiwui keinungbing eina chiwui kha̱bing;
Ekron eina thuida shamadru vāshungda, Ashdod ngalem saikora kala chiwui kha̱bing.
Ashdod, chiwui keinungbing kala chiwui kha̱bing; Gaza, chiwui keinungbing kala chiwui kha̱bing; Egypt kong kala Great Seawui eina shamadrupheili khaleibing.
Kala kaphungramli; Shamir, Jattir, Sokoh,
Dannah, Kiriath-sannah (chiya Debir)
Anab, Eshtemoh, Anim,
Goshen, Holon kala Giloh: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda akhana.
Arab, Dumah, Eshan,
Janim, Beth-tappuah, Aphekah,
Humtah, Kiriath-arba (chiya, Hebron) kala Zior: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung chikona.
Maon, Carmel, Ziph, Juttah,
Jezreel, Jokde-am, Zanoah,
Cain, Gibeah kala Timnah: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāna.
Halhul, Beth-zur, Gedor,
Maarath, Beth-anoth kala Eltekon: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharukna.
Kiriath-baal (chiya Kiriath-jearim) kala Rabbah: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung khanina.
lamhāngli khalei, Beth-arabah, Middin, Secacah,
Nibshan, Salt City kala En-gedi: athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharukna.

Josephwui ara̱-azāli khayar shimlui chi Jericho ngalemli khalei Jordan eina haophokta Jerichowui tara̱ khalei zingshoshong lamhāng vāshunga, kala Jericho eina shanglaga Bethelwui kaphungram shangshunga;
Bethelwui eina Luz shanga, laga Ataroth vāshunglaga Archinaobingwui leiretli shangza̱ya;
chiwui eina zingtunshong tāda Japhletnaobingwui thari, chiwui eina Khamaze Beth-horon eina tangda tashungchaowa, chiwui thili Gezer tāda shamadru eina tātanga.
Josephwui mibing, Manasseh eina Ephraim shangna athumwui shimlui samphanga.
Ephraim shangli athumwui shimkhur athishurda shimlui mi: athumwui shimlui thari zingshoshong Ataroth-addar eina haophoklaga Khamato Beth-horon vāshunga,

chiwui eina thuilaga thari chi shamadru vāza̱ya; atungshong Mich-methath eina tanga; chiwui eina zingshoshongwui thari chi Taanath-shiloh vākuikhuilaga kānvāshumda zingshoshongwui eina Jan-oahli vātai,
Jan-oahwui eina tashumda Ataroth, chiwui eina Naarah vālaga Jericho aza̱khuida Jordanli tātanga.
Tappuah eina haophoklaga thari chi zingtunvāk Kanah kong kala chi shurlaga shamadru eina atanga. Hithāda Ephraimshili shimkhurwui athishurda shimlui mi.
Manasseh shili yarkahai lamwui lunglila Ephraimshiwui keinung kala kha̱ kachungkha lei.
Chithālala athumna Gezerli somkapam Canaannaobingli makashamhaimana, chieina Canaanwui mibingna aja eina tangda Ephraimshili ngasopamda lei, kha athumli thoukai sāngasakta raonao sapama.
Chiwui thili Manasseh shangli yarmi; kaja a Josephwui naochizaina. Manassehwui naochizai Machir, Gileadshāvāva̱li, Gilead eina Bashan yara, kaja ava rai kasā mina.

Kala Manasseh shangwui mi khangateili shimkhurwui eina mathang mathang Abi-ezer, Helek, Asri-el, Shechem, Hepher kala Shemidali ngayarmi. Hi Josephwui naomayara Manassehwui mayarnao ara̱-azā shimkhurwui athi chitunkatāna.

Chitharan Manassehwui naomayara Machir, Machirwui naomayara Gilead, Gileadwui naomayara Hepher, Hepherwui naomayara Zelophehad naomayara maleimana, kha sha̱naomānghaowa. Hi nao ngalāva̱bingwui amingna; Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah kala Tirzah.
Athumna pāngmon Eleazar, Nunwui naomayara Joshua kala kathānabingwui mangāli vāda hānga, “Ipā ngarāli ngasoda ithumlila shimlui mikhavai
Hithāda Jordanwui lakhavākli khalei Gilead eina Bashanli lāngda Manasseh shangna yar tharā samphanga,
khikhalajila Manasseh shimkhurli nao ngalāva̱bingla mayarnao thāda shimlui samphanga. Gilead ngalei chi Manassehwui katai shangli mihaowa.
Manassehwui leiret hi Shechemwui zingshoshong Asher eina thuida Mich-methath tāshunga; kala thari chi azingvāk tāshungda En-tappuahwui mibing pamkhavaili tātanga.
Tappuah ngalei Manassehwuina, kha Manassehwui tharili khalei Tappuahwui keinung chiya Ephraimwui naongarāwuili zanga.

Chiwui thili thari chi Kanah kong tāpeiya. Kong hiwui azingvāk khalei keinung kaikha Manassehwui lungli leilala Ephraimwuina. Chiwui eina thuilaga Manasseh thari chi kong chiwui atungvāk shanglaga shamadru eina shangtanga.
Ngalei chi azingshong Ephraimwui kala zingtunshong Manassehwui da shamadru china thari sai; atungshong Asher shangshunga kala zingshovāk Issachar vāshunga.

Issachar eina Asherlila Manassehwui lam Beth-shean eina chiwui kha̱bing zanga, kala Ibleam eina chiwui kha̱bing, kala Dorli kapambing eina kha̱bing, kala En-dorli kapanbing kala chiwui kha̱bing, kala Taanachli kapānbing kala chiwui kha̱bing, kala Megiddoli kapam mibing eina chiwui kha̱bing zanga, kala kakathumali Naphathna.
Chithālala Manassehwui naomayarabingna chiwui keinungbing chi makhuirarthuwa, kha Canaanwui mibingna ngalei chili khaningpamhaowa.
Kha khaleilaga Israelwui mibingna pangkasang tharan Canaanwui mibingli makashamshokchaolala athumli thoukai kaphunga sāngasaka.
Kala Josephwui shangna Joshuali rāhānga, “
Chieina Joshuana athumli hānga, “Nathum mi chungnahaida nathumwui vang Ephraim kaphung teonahaiakha, Perizbing kala Rephaimbingwui ngahong ngalei chi wutlaga nathum lui shangvālu.”

Josephwui shangna hānga, “Kaphung ram chi ithumwui vang mashapmana, chili lāngda tampāk hili somkapam Canaanwui mibing, kaja Beth-seanwui luinganaibing kala Jezreel tampākli kapambing mariwui siguigari ngavāda lei.”
Chieina Joshuana Josephwui shimkhur Ephraim eina Manassehli hānga, “Nathum mi kachungkhahaoda pangshapla khaleina; nathum shimlui yar akhamāng majimara,

kha kaphungram chi nathumwui ngasāra, chi ngahonglala nathumna wutvāmamānda chiwui thari vākatang eina tangda nathum jipaira; khikhalajila Canaanwui mibingna mari siguigari ngavālala, rai pinglala nathumna athumli kashamshokphalungra.”
Chiwui thili Israel yarui ashangva̱ Shilohli ungkazipta chili kazip khavai kachonshim akha sākai; ngalei chi athumna yuikakhuina.
Israel mibingwui ngachaili athum shang shinili shimlui mangayarmirangsai.
Chieina Joshuana Israelwui mibingli hānga, “Navā ngarāwui
Shang kachiva̱wui eina mi kathumrip kapangshokmilu, kala ina athumli chihovāda athumna apam saikora yangkhuida kachichāna khuikhangai apam chi kapikhuilu, laga iwuili ralu.
Athumna ngalei chi shini sāda ngayarra, Judahwui mibingna azingshong athumwui leiretli kapam chi athumwui sāpapamra, kala Josephwui mibingna atungshong tharili pamra.
Kala leiret shini sāda ngakai kahai ngalei chiwui apongli nathumna kapikhuilaga ili khuiungmilu; kala ina
Levibingna nathumwui alungli shimlui masamphangmara, kaja

Chieina mibingna athum kachichāwui shongzā zatuwa; kala ngalei chiwui pongli kapikhui khavai kazatabing chili Joshuana kasoi, “Vāda apam saikora yangkhuida ngalei chiwui apongli lairikli kapikhuida ili hanunglu; kala ina Shiloh apam hili
Chieina mibing china vālaga ngalei chi apam saikora yangkhui keinung shini zangda leiret shini chiwui apongli lairikli kapikhui, kala athumna Shilohwui rāmrahli Joshuali khuiungmi,
chieina Shilohli Joshuana athumwui vang
Ka̱lā yanglaga Benjamin shangwui vang da shimkhurwui athishurda khayar shimlui chi Judah eina Joseph shangli mikahai chiwui ngachaili ungtai.
Atungshong ashiwui thari Jordan eina haophoka; chiwui eina thuilaga Jericho kaphung arāp shangshumda zingtunvāk khalei kaphungram shanglaga, Beth-aven lamhāng atanga.
Chiwui eina azingvāk kuitālaga vāshumda Luz ngaheishong (Bethel) vatai, chiwui thili thari chi Khamaze Beth-horonwui azingshong khalei kaphungtung kala Ataroth-addar tāshunga.

Chieina thuida thari chi zingtunshong vākuikhuida azingshong Beth-horonli yangngasungda khalei kaphungram chi vāshungda Judah shangwui keinung akha Kiriath-baal (chiya Kiriath-jearim) eina tanga. Hi zingtunvākwui tharina.
Kala azingvāk Kiriath-jearim ayar eina haophoklaga thari chi Ephronli tai, kala Nephtoah Tara̱wui ura̱ pamli ungtanga;
chiwui thili thari chi Rephaim tampāk atungvāk shangkachata Hinnom naomayarawui tampākli yangkazanga kaphungphei chi tai, laga chiwui eina Jebusnaobingwui kaphung arāp Hinnom tālaga En-rogelvāk tai;
chiwui eina atungshong vāngareikhuida En-shemeshli shanga, chiwui eina Adummimwui shongshan yangkhangasung Geliloth shanga, kala chiwui eina Reubenwui naomayara Bohanwui ngalungpam tāzanga;
kala atungshong Beth-arabatwui kaphung arāp shangda Arabahli tai;
chiwui thili thari chi atungshong Beth-hoglahwui kaphung shangluida Jordan tākhamazingvāk khalei Salt Seawui shamadruphei atungshong atanga: hi azingshongwui tharina.
Zingshoshong Jordanna thari sai. Hi Benjamin shangli shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai thariwui thari kuikhamareina.
Chitharan Benjamin shangli shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai keinungbing chiya Jericho, Beth-arabah, Emek-keziz,
Beth-arabah, Zemaraim, Bethel,
Avvim, Parah, Ophrah,
Chepharammoni, Ophni, Geba— da athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda khanina:
Kala Gibeon, Ramah, Be-eroth,
Mizpeh, Chephirah, Mozah,
Rekem, Irpeel, Taralah,
Zela, Ha-eleph, Jebus (chiya Jerusalem), Gibe-ah kala Kiriath-jearim; athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda matina. Hi Benjamin shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai shimluina.
Ka̱lā kakhane chi Simeonwui vang shokta, Simeonwui shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yara, kala shimlui chi Judah shangwui ngalei alungthungli zanga.
Kala athumwui shimlui chiya, Beer-sheba, Sheba, Moladah,
Hazar-shual, Balah, Ezem,
Eltolad, Bethul, Hormah,
Ziklag, Beth-marcaboth, Hazar-susah,
Beth-lebaoth, kala Sharuhen— athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda kathumna;
En-rimmon, Ether, kala Ashan— athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung matina;
kala keinung hili kuimareida khalei kha̱bing Baalath-beer vāshungda, kala Negebwui Ramah vāshungda zangsera. Hi Simeon shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda mikahai shimluina.

Simeonshi shangwui shimlui Judah shangwui lamli ngakaida zanga; kaja Judah shangwui ngalei hi athumwui vang haknāhaida, chiwui alungthungli Simeon shangli shimlui khami hi Judah yarwui eina khuikashokna.
Ka̱lā kakathuma chi Zebulun shangwui vang shokta athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yara. Kala athumwui leiret chi Sarid eina tangda shangshunga;
chieina chiwui thari chi zingtunvāk vāda, kala Mareal vāshungda kala Dabbeshethli aza̱ya, chiwui Jokne-amwui zingshoshong khalei kong chieina tai.
Sarid eina haophoklaga lakkashong zingshovāk zimik shokkhavaishong Chisloth-taborwui thari vāshunga; chiwui eina Daberath vai, chiwui thili Japhia shangshunga;
chiwui eina vāshumda zingshovāk vashumlaga zingshoshong Gath-hepherli, kala Eth-kazin kala Rimmon vālaga Neahvāk kuitāhaowa.
Atungshong thari chi Hannathon vākuikhuiya, kala chi Iphtahelwui tampākli ungtanga;
kala Kattath, Nahalal, Shimron, Idalah kala Bethlehem—athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda khanina.
Hi Zebulun shang athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda athumwui shimluina—kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda khanina.
Ka̱lā khamate chi Issacharwui vang shokta Issachar shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yara.
Athumwui leiretli Jezreel, Chesulloth, Shunem,
Haphara-im, Shion, Anaharath,
Rabbith, Kishion, Ebez,
Remeth, En-gannim, En-haddah, Beth-pazzez hibing zanga;
Thari chi Tabor, Shahazumah, kala Beth-shemesh, hibing vāza̱da Jordan eina tanga—athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda tharukna.
Hi Issachar shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda mikahai athumwui kha̱bing zangda keinungbing china.
Ka̱lā kaphangā chi Asher shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda shoka.
Athumwui leiret Helkath, Hali, Beten, Achshaph hibing hina,
Allammelech, Amad, kala Mishal zanga; zingtunvāk Carmel kala Shihor-libnath vāza̱da,
chiwui thili zingshovāk kuivāda chi Beth-dagonli vai, kala Zebulun eina Iphtahel zingtunshongwui tampāk vāza̱da Beth-emek kala Neiel vāshunga; chiwui thili atung shangshumda Cabul shangshungda,
Ebron, Rehob, Hammon, Kanah, kala Khareiya Sidon tāshunga.
Chiwui thili thari chi Ramahvāk kuivāda raipan sākahai Tyrewui keinung chi vāshunga; chiwui thili thari chi kuikhuida Hosahli latungda shamadruli atanga; Mahalab, Achzib,
Ummah, Aphek kala Rehob zangserda athumwui kha̱bing kala keinung maga̱da khanina.
Hi Asher shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai athumwui kha̱bing kala keinungbing china.
Ka̱lā katharuka chi Naphtali shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda shoka.
Kala ashiwui thari Helephwui eina kala Za-anannimwui shirimthingrongwui eina thuilaga Adami-nekeb, Jabneelwui eina tangda Lakkum vāshunga kala Jordan eina tanga;
chiwui thili thari chi zingtunshong kuivālaga chiwui eina Aznoth-tabor, Hukkok kala azingshong Zebulun tāza̱laga zingtunvāk Asher vāshunga, kala Jordanwui zingshovāk khalei Judah ungshunga.
Raipan sākahai keinungbing chiya Ziddim, Zer, Hammath, Rakkath, Chinnereth,
Adamah, Ramah, Hazor,
Kedesh, Edre-i, En-hazor,
Yiron, Migtal-el, Horem, Beth-anath kala Beth-shemesh—athumwui kha̱bing eina ngasoda keinung tharāda chikona.
Hi Naphtali shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai athumwui kha̱bing kala keinungbing china.
Ka̱lā kashine chi Dan shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda shoka.
Kala ashi shimkhurwui leiret Zorah, Eshta-ol, Ir-shemeshbing hina,
Sha-alabbin, Aijalon, Ithlah,
Elon, Timnah, Ekron,
Eltekeh, Gibbethon, Baalath,
Jehud, Bene-berak, Gath-rimmon,
kala Me-jarkon kala Rakkon eina Joppali yangkhangasung leiretbing zanga.

Danwui mibingna ngalei shimān kahai eina Leshemli kāngarara kala chiwui mibingli raighai eina sathatta yuikakhui eina ngalei chi athumwui sāda pamhaowa kala Lashem maholuila athum avāva̱wui ming Dan hohaowa.
Hi Dan shangli athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda yarkahai keinungbing eina athumwui kha̱bing china.
Athumwui shimluiwui vang ngalei ngayarkup kahaiwui thili Israelwui mibingna Nunwui naomayara Joshuali ngalei akha mi.
na kakaso athishurda athumna awui kapo Timnath-serah kaho Ephraimwui kaphungramli khalei keinung chi mihaowa; kala ana keinung chi sakāluishitta chili pamhaowa.
Hi Pāngmon Eleazar kala Nunwui naomayara Joshua kala Israel shimkhur avāva̱ ngarāwui athishurda mibingwui kathānabingna Shilohli khalei kazip khavai kachonshim khāmongli,
Chiwui thili
Israelwui mibingli hānglu, “Ina Mosesli hāngkahai thāda ngayin khavai keinungbing kapangkhuilu,
chieina kachikathāna matheila, lah matheithangmeila mi sathathaiakha chili yāmngayinra; katheshina athut khuikhavai raakha nathumwui vang yāmngayin khavaina.

Sakathatana hikathā keinung akhali ayāmsangda zangkhavai ngaveili ranganingda, keinung chiwui khararnaobingli awui tuishot hāngchitheira; chiwui thili athumna ali keinungli khuizangda apam mira kala chili ali pamngasakra.
Kala katheshiwui mina ali kharomrāsālala, sakathatpa chili kakharompawui pāngli athumna mamisangmara, kaja ana awui khongnaili kharewui yangkashi leida lah thatheilaga sākathat maningmana.

Kala ali yarui ashangva̱ mangāli bichar sākhavai manganingranglakha eina tangda, kala sākathat atamli pāngmon kharei sākasā chi mathiranglakha eina tangda ana keinung chili pamra: chiwui thili ana yāmrā kahai keinung kala akhalattawui shimli latungpaira.”
Chieina athumna Naphtaliwui kaphungramli khalei Galileewui Kadesh, kala Ephraim kaphungramwui Shechem, kala Judah kaphungramwui Kiriath-arba (chiya Hebron) hibing kapangkhui.

Kala Jordan makānda Jerichowui zingshoshong lamhāngwui kaphung khanganili khalei Reubenshi shangwui eina Bezer, Gadshi shangwui eina Gileadli khalei Ramoth, Manassehshi shangwui Bashanwui Golonbing hi kapangkhui.

Keinungbing hi Israelwui mibing saikorawui vang, kala athumli ngasoda ram kazat saikorawui vangna, kaja kachikathāna makathei eina mi sathathaiakha, athumna keinungbing hili yāmsangra, chithāda sāda ana ali athut hāngsangki kajipāwui pāngli mathimara, kala yarui ashangva̱na ali bichar masāranglakha eina tangda, ana chili yāmngayinra.
kala athumna Canaan ngaleiwui Shilohli pamlakha athumli rāhānga, “Ithumli pamkhavai keinungbing, kala ithumwui sha̱keiwui vang seihomphung miphalungra da
Chieina
Kalā yanglaga, Kohatshi shimkhurli ungtāhaowa. Chieina pāngmon Aaronwui ara̱-azāna Judah, Simeon, kala Benjamin shangwui eina kalā eina keinung tharāda kathum samphanga.
Kala Kohathshi kaikhana kalā yanglaga Ephraim, Dan kala Manasseh shang tangkhaiwui eina keinung tharā samphanga.
Kalā yanglaga Gershonbingna Issachar, Asher, Naphtali shangbing kala Bashanli khalei Manasseh shang tangkhaiwui eina keinung tharāda kathum samphanga.
Meraribingna athumwui shimkhurwui athishurda Reuben, Gad kala Zebulun shangbingwui eina keinung tharāda khani samphanga.
Keinungbing kala seihomphungbing hi
Judah shangwui eina, kala Simeon shangwui eina athumna aming panlaga azingwui keinungbing hi mi,
chiya kalā yanglaga samphangkhare sāthuda Aaronwui naotun Levi shangwui Kohath shimkhurwui ngasāhaowa.
Athumli Kiriath-arba (Arbana Anakwui avāva̱ ngasahaoda), chiya Hebron, Judahwui kaphungramli khalei chi kuimareida seihomphungwui vang mihaowa.
Kha keinungwui tampākbing eina kha̱bing chiya Jephunnehwui naomayara Calebli awui shimlui sāda mihaowa.
Kala Aaron pāngmonwui ara̱-azāli athumna mi sākathatana yāmngayin khavai keinung Hebron, Libnah eina chiwui seihomphung ngaleibing,
Jattir eina chiwui seihomphung, Eshtemoa eina chiwui seihomphung,
Holon eina chiwui seihomphung, Debir eina chiwui seihomphung,
Ain eina chiwui seihomphung, Juttah eina chiwui seihomphung, Beth-shemesh eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung chiko hi shang khaniwui eina khuishokmi;
chiwui thili Benjamin shangwui eina, Gibeon eina chiwui seihomphung, Geba kala chiwui seihomphung,
Anathoth eina chiwui seihomphung, kala Almon eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung matina.
Pāngmon Aaronwui ara̱-azā pāngmonbingwui keinung saikora tharāda kathum kala athumwui seihomphungbing hina.
Katei Levibingwui ngachaili Kohath shimkhurbingli Ephraim shangwui eina keinung khuishokmi.
Athumli mikahaibing chi mi sakathatana yāmngayin khavai Ephraim kaphungramli khalei keinung Shechem, kala chiwui seihomphung, Gezer eina chiwui seihomphung,
Kibza-im eina chiwui seihomphung, Beth-horon eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung matina;
kala Dan shangwui eina, Elteke eina chiwui seihomphung, Gibbethon eina chiwui seihomphung,
Aijalon eina chiwui seihomphung, Gath-rimmon eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung matina;
kala Manasseh shang tangkhaiwui eina Taanach eina chiwui seihomphung kala Gath-rimmon eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung khaniya,
katai shimkhur Kohathbingwui keinung kala athumwui seihomphung saikora tharāna.

Kala Levibingwui shimkhur Gershonbingli Manasseh shang tangkhaiwui eina keinung khuishokmi, Bashanli khalei mi sakathatana yāmngayin khavai keinung Golan eina chiwui seihomphung kala Be-eshterah eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung khanina;
kala Issachar shangwui eina Kishion kala chiwui seihomphung, Daberath eina chiwui seihomphung,
Jarmuth eina chiwui seihomphung, En-gannim eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung matina;
kala Asher shangwui eina, Mishal eina chiwui seihomphung, Abdon eina chiwui seihomphung,
Helkath eina chiwui seihomphung, kala Rehob eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung matina;

kala Naphtali shangwui eina, Galileeli khalei mi sakathatana yāmngayin khavai Kadesh eina chiwui seihomphung, Hammothdor eina chiwui seihomphung, kala Kartan eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung kathumna;
Gershon shimkhur saikorawui keinung kala seihomphung tharāda kathumna.
Kala Levishi kateibing Merari shimkhurbingli Zebulun shangwui eina, Jokne-am eina chiwui seihomphung, Kartah eina chiwui seihomphung,
Dimnah eina chiwui seihomphung, Nahalal eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung mati khuishokmi;
kala Reuben shangwui eina, Bezer eina chiwui seihomphung, Jahaz eina chiwui seihomphung,
Kedemoth eina chiwui seihomphung kala Mepha-ath eina chiwui seihomphung da keinung matina;
kala Gad shangwui eina Gileadli khalei mi sakathatana yāmngayin khavai keinung Ramoth eina chiwui seihomphung, Mahanaim eina chiwui seihomphung,
Heshbon eina chiwui seihomphung, Jazer eina chiwui seihomphung da saikora keinung matina.
Merariwui shimkhurbingwui keinungwui vang, chiya, Levibingwui shimkhur taihaida khaleibing, athumli yarkahai keinung saikora tharāda khanina.
Israel mibingwui ngalei alungli Levibingna samkaphang keinungbing kala seihomphung eina ngasoda saikora keinung hangmatida chishatna.
Keinungbing kachiva̱li kachichāwui ayar kuikhamareili seihomphung leisera; keinung saikora chithāserpapama.
Hithāda sāda
Kala
na Israel shimkhurli kaphā ngashit kahai saikora maungkashung maleimana; saikora ungshungsera.
Chiwui thili Joshuana Reuben, Gad kala Manassehwui shang tangkhaili hokhuiya,
kala athumli hānga, “Nathumna
nathumna nachinā ngarāli kharewui eina thuilaga aja rāshungda mahorhaimana, kha nathumwui Varena sālu kaji athishurda ningsangda sāhaira.
Ara
wui rao Mosesna nathumli mikahai ningkhami eina ain chi mayontitlu, nathumwui
Chieina Joshuana athumli somi, kala athumli shivathaowa; kala athumna athumwui shimli unghaowa.

Atam chitharan Manasseh shang tangkhaili Mosesna shimlui Bashanli mihairasai; kha khangatei tangkhaili Jordanwui zingtunvāk athum chinao ngarāwui ngalemli Joshuana mi. Kala Joshuana athumli kachichāwui shimli kashiun chitharan ana athumli somi,

ana athumli hānga, “Nathumwui shimli, lan kachungkha, sha̱kei, sinā, lupā, kori, mari kala kashankachon kachungkha eina ngasoda ungulu; yangkashebingwui eina ngaponkakhui lan chi nachinā ngarālila ngayarmilu.”
Chieina Reubennaobing, Gadnaobing kala Manassehwui shang tangkhai athum shim hanunghaowa, Canaan ngaleiwui Shilohli khalei Israel mibingwui eina pakthuihaowa,
Kala athumna Canaan ngalemli khalei Jordanvāk katā eina, Reubennaobing, Gadnaobing kala Manasseh shang tangkhai athumna Jordan chili hanphut kahakva akha sākhui.

Israelwui mibingna chi kashā eina hānga, “Yanglu, Reuben, kala Gad kala Manasseh shang tangkhai mibingna Canaan ngaleiwui zimikshovāk Jordanli hanphut akha sakāhaira, apam chi Israelnaobingwui vākna.”
Kala Israelwui mibingna chi kashā eina, Israel ashangva̱ Shilohli kazipkhuida athumli rai sākhavai ngazeka.
Chieina Israelwui mibingna pāngmon Eleazarwui naomayara Phinehasli, Reuben, Gad kala Manasseh shang tangkhaili chihovai,
kala ali ngasoda Israel shang kachiva̱wui akhavā, saikora chi Israel shang ngachaiwui eina shimkhur ava̱va̱wui akui athum tharā vai.
Athumna Gileadwui ngaleili Reuben, Gad kala Manasseh shang tangkhaili, vāda athumna athumli ahānga,
Ithumna Peorli morei sāshap sākahai chiwui eina ithum khalatta arui eina tangdala mapheomiranga; kala chiwui vang
chieina nathum aja
Kha ara, kalikhada nathumwui ngalei chi makhaoda leiakha,
Zerahwui naomayara Achanna shitkasang kaida sākazam kahai otbing kakhuiwui vang eina malungkhavāt chi Israel katongawuitungli matāmala? Awui moreiwui vang amāng mashimānmana.’”
Chieina Reuben, Gad kala Manasseh shang tangkhaina Israel shimkhurwui wungva̱-wungvābing chili ngahānkāda hānga,
“Pangshapa,
hanphut sākakā hi
Maningmana, kha ithumna khangacheewui eina kasāna, kaja naoda nathumwui naongarāna ithumwui naongarāli ‘Nathumna
Kaja,
Chiwui vang eina ithumna kahāngna, ithum arui hili rikkatā kachigatwui vang, lah pha̱phayā khavaiwui vang maningla hanphut akha sākāsa,
kha hina nathum eina ithum, kala ithumwui thili shokrāda khalei naothot ngachaili shākhi sākhavai, kala ithumla
Kala ithumna chukmaja̱ya, kalikhada rārāda khalei atamli ithumli lah ithumwui naongarāli chithāda hāngakha ithumna, ‘Yanglu! ishava ngarāna sākahai,
Awui tabernacle mangāli khalei ithumwui Vare

Pāngmon Phinehas kala ali ngasokazata ashangva̱wui akuibing, kala Israel shimkhurbingwui wungva̱-wungvābingna, Reubennaobing, Gad kala Manassehwui kahāng tui chi shālaga, china athumli ningyāng ungngasakhaowa.
Chieina pāngmon Eleazarwui naomayara Phinehasna Reubennaobing, Gad kala Manassehli hānga, “Aja

Chiwui thili pāngmon Eleazarwui naomayara Phinehas kala akuibing, Gilead ngaleili khalei Reuben kala Gadbingwui eina hanthuihaida Canaanli khalei Israelwui mibingli latunga, kala tui saikora athumli unghānga.

Kala pao chi shālaga Israelwui mibing ningyāngunglakhaowa; kala Israelwui mibingna Vareli sochikatta athumwuitungli zakkashi mamatuiluimana kala Reubennaobing eina Gadnaobingna kapam ngalei chi masākazamluimara da hānga.
Reubennaobing eina Gadnaobingna hanphut chili shākhi hoi; “Kaja,” athumna hānga, “Ithumwui ngachaili
Atam kasangkhawui thili
Joshuana Israel saikorali, athumwui ararbing, kala akuibing, athumwui bicharsamebing kala otva̱bingli hokhuida hānga, “I ara rarhaida saryuihaira,
kala

Yanglu, ina Israel shangbingwui shimlui sākhavai, taihaida khalei ngaleibing eina ina shimit kahai miyurbingwui ngalei Jordan eina thuida zingtunshong Great Sea eina tangda zangnarlaga nathumli mihaira.
Nathumwui Vare
Chiwui vang eina Moseswui ain lairikli kapi kahai saikora mayontitta yuiung-yuivā masaalu,

chithākha nathumwui ngachaili yur khangateiwui mi leida khalei chili mamanātmara, lah athumwui varebingwui mingla masingmara, lah athumwui ming singda shākhi masāmara, lah otram mangatha̱mara, lah nathum khalatta mashunzangda athumli makhorumara,
kha nathumna aja sāda khalei thāda
Kaja
Ana nathumli ngashit kahai chithāda nathumwui mi akhana mi thingkhali ngararshapra, kaja
Chiwui vang eina
Kaja nathumna ngareithuihaida nathumwui alungli shākhaida khalei yur khangatei chili ngarumhaiakha, kala ngalā ngakhotta, nathumna athumwui kala athumna nathumwui sha̱naobingli ngakumakha,
theiphalungra kaja
“Kala ara I akhur vāki jiura, kala nathumna nathumwui wuklungli kala ningli thei, kaja
Kha
kalikhada nathumna
Chiwui thili Joshuana Israel shang saikora Shechemli kazipkhui, kala ararbing, akuibing, bicharsamebing kala Israelwui otva̱bing, saikorali hokhui kala athumna
Chieina Joshuana mi saikorali hānga, “Israelwui
Chieina ina nathumwui navā Abrahamli kong makānda athankhuida Canaan ngalei kuimareida thānvai, kala awui ara̱-azā kachungkha mi. Ina ali Isaac mi;
kala Isaacli ina Jacob eina Esau mi. Kala ina Esauli Seirwui kaphungram awui shimlui sākhavai mi, kha Jacob eina awui naongarā Egyptli tahaowa.
Chiwui thili ina Moses eina Aaronli Egyptli chihovāda ina saki kaji sālaga chiwui alungli kazātkashi kazāngasaka, kala khaleilaga ina athumli khuishoka.
Chiwui thili ina navāngarāli Egyptwui eina khuishoka, kala nathumna shamadruli rāshunga; kala Egyptnaobingna siguigari kala sigui katonga mibingna navāngarāli Red Sea eina tangda kharomrai.
Kala athumna

Chiwui thili ina nathumli Amorbing Jordan lākhavāk pamkasābingwui ngaleili khuivai; athumna nathumli ngararlala ina athumli nathumwui pāngli mi, kala athumwui ngalei chi nathumli samphang ngasaka, kala ina athumli nathumwui miktāli shimān ngasaka.
Chiwui thili Moabwui awunga, Zipporwui naomayara Balakna Israelli thuingarara; ana Beorwui naomayara Balaamli hokhuida nathumli khonshi khavai sai,
kha ina Balaamli manganāsangmimana; chiwui vang ana nathumli somihaowa; hithāda ina nathumli awui pāng eina kanshokmi.

Kala nathumna Jordan kānda Jericholi vai, kala Jerichowui mina nathumli rāngarara, kala nathumna Amornaobing, Periznaobing, Canaannaobing, Hitnaobing, Girgashnaobing, Hivnaobing kala Jebusnaobing saikoralila ngararda athumli ina nathumwui pāngli sangmi.
ina nathumwui mangāli khui chihorāda china Amorwui awunga khanili kashamshoka; hi nathumwui raighai, lah malā eina maningmana.
Nathumna lui mavākasang ngalei, nathumna masemkakā keinungbing ina mida nathumna chili sompama kala nathumna malingkasang drakhā yāmgui kala olive yāmguiwui athei nathumna shai.’
“Chiwui vang eina ara
Kala kalikha nathumna
Chieina mibingna ngahānkai, “Ithumna
kaja ithumli kala ishāvā ngarāli Egypt ngaleili narkahai raopamwui eina khuikashoka chi
kala
Kha Joshuana mibingli hānga, “Nathum
Kalikhada nathumna
Cheina mibingna Joshuali hānga, “Maningmana; kha ithum
Chiwui thili Joshuana athumli hānga, “Nathumna
Ana hānga, “Chithakha nathumwui alungli khalei ayarwui varebing chi horhaolu, kala nathumwui wuklung Israelwui
Kala mibingna Joshuali hānga, “Ithum
Chieina Joshuana chithang Shechemli athumli tuingashit akha salaga athumwui vang ain kala shiyan-chikan semmi.
Kala Joshuana tuibing chi Varewui ain lairikli kapisanghai; kala ana ngalunggui kahakva akha khuida
Kala Joshuana mi saikorali hānga, “Yanglu, ngalunggui hi ithumwui shākhina; kala
Chieina Joshuana mibingli kachichā ramli shiunhaowa.
Ots saikora hiwui thili Nunwui naomayara,
Kala athumna ali awui pamkhavai Timnath-serah, awui shimlui, Gaash kaphungwui atungshong khalei Ephraimwui kaphungram chili chifahaowa.
Kala Joshuawui atamli kala a thikahaiwui thili ringkhavā ararbing, kala
Kala Aaronwui naomayara Eleazar thihaowa; kala athumna ali, anaomayara Phinehaswui keinung, kaja Ephraimwui kaphungramwui eina khami keinung Gibe-ahli chifahaowa.
Joshua thikahaiwui thili Israelwui mibingna Vareli, “Ithumwui vang Canaannaobingli ngarar khavai khipāna vārirakhala?” da ngahāna.
na hānga, “Judahna thānra; yanglu, ngalei hi ina awui pāngli horsangmihaira.”

Kala Judahna achinā Simeonli hānga, “Ili mikahai leiret chili ili ngasokālu, chithāda Canaannaobingli ithumna vāngararra; kala chithāda sāda nali mikahai leiret akakhui tharan ila nali ngasovāra.” Chieina Simeonna ali ngasovai.
Chieina Judahna khavā eina
Athumna Bezekli vāda Adoni-bezekli ngararra, kala Canaannaobing eina Periznaobingli yuihaowa.
Adoni-bezek yāmhaowa; kha athumna ali kharomkhuilaga awui pangva̱, kala pheiva̱bing katattāmiserhaowa.

Chieina Adoni-bezekna hānga, “Awunga hangshini kala athumwui pheiva̱ pangva̱bing katattāmiserhaida iwui table zingli zaneng ngamuizāsai; ina sākahai chi tākam eina Varena athut hāngsangmihaira”. Kala athumna ali Jerusalemli khuiunga, kala a chili thisanghaowa.
Kala Judahwui mibingna Jerusalemli ngararda chi khui, kala raighai eina sāthatserhaowa, kala keinungla mei sa̱tamihaowa.
Chiwui thili Judahwui mibingna kaphungramli kapambing, Negebli kala angakoli kapam Canaannaobingli ngarar khavai tai.
Kala Judahna Hebronli (Khare kachāng Kiriath-arba hokasa apam chili); Canaannaobingli angararda Sheshai kala Ahiman eina Tamaili yuihaowa.
Chiwui eina athumna Debirwui mibingli angararra. Debir kaho aming hi, khareli Kiriath-sepher hosai.
Kala Calebna hānga, “Kiriath-sepherli ngararlaga khayuiapāli inao ngalāva̱ Achsahli apreiva̱ sāda mira.”
Kala Calebwui agato Kenazwui naomayara Othni-elna yuihaida ana ali anaongalāva̱ Achsah mihaowa,
Sha̱nao china ali fakhavā eina, ana avāva̱ Calebli lui pokhavai hānga; chieina ana gadhātungwui eina katā tharan Calebna ali hānga, “Na khi pongaikhala?”
Ana ali hānga, “Nana ili Negebli pamngasakhaoda ura̱pam akhala milu.” Chieina Calebna shangkhamato ura̱pam eina tākhamaze ura̱pam chi ali mihaowa.

Moseswui awova̱, Kennaopa chiwui naotungbingna Arad ngalemwui Negebli khalei lamhāngshong Judah lamhāngwui khaneirong keinungwui eina Judah mibingli ngasoda kai; kala athumna chili vāda chiwui mibingli okthuiruma.
Kala Judahna achinā Simeonli ngasoda vai, kala athumna Zephatli kapam Canaannaobingli angararra, kala saikora sākazammiserhaowa. Chiwui vang eina keinung chiwui aming Hormah hokahaina.
Judahna Gaza kala chiwui leiretbing khui; Ashkelon kala chiwui leiretbing, Ekron kala chiwui leiretbingla khuiserhaowa.
Kala
Kha Jerusalemli pamkasā Jebusnaobingli Benjaminwui mibingna makashamana; chiwui vang eina aja rāshungda Jerusalemli Jebusnaobing eina Benjaminwui mibing pamrumda lei.
Josephwui shimkhur mibingna Bethelli angarara, kala
Kala Josephwui shimkhurna Bethelli ara̱yang khavai (khareli apam chili Luz hosai) chihovai.
Kala ra̱khayangbingna keinungwui eina mi akha shokrākasa theida athumna, “Ithumli keinung zangkhavai shongfa kahāngmilu, chieina nali ithumna kaphā sāmira” da hānga.
Chieina ana keinung zangkhavai shongfa chi athumli chitheimi; kala athumna keinung chi zangkai, kha mi chieina awui shimkhurli chihohaowa.
Kala mipa china Hitnaobingwui ngaleili vāda keinung akha vāsākai, kala aming Luz da phoka; aja eina tangda chi hochingda lei.
Israelna pangshap reikasang eina Canaannaobingli thoukai phungngasaka, kha athumli kashamchao majimana.
Kitronwui mibing, lah Nahalalwui mibinglila Zebulunna makashamana, kha Canaannaobingna athumli pānruma, kala thoukai kaphunga sāngasaka.
Asherna Accowui mibing, lah Sidonwui mibing, lah Ahlabwui mibing, lah Achzibwui mibing, lah Helbahwui mibing, lah Aphikwui mibing, lah Rehobwui mibingli makashamana;
kha Ashernaobingna apam chili leikasā Canaannaobingli panruma; kaja athumna athumli makashamana.

Naphtalina Beth-shemesh, lah Beth-anathwui mibingli makashamana, kha ngalei chili leikasā Canaannaobingli ngasopama; chithālala Bethshemeshwui mibing, Beth-anathwui mibing chili athumwui vang thoukai kaphunga sāngasaka.
Amornaobingna Danwui mibingli kaphungramli kashamvāhaowa, kaja athumna athumli tampākshong matā ngasakmana.
Amornaobingna Har-heresli, Aijalonli, kala Sha-albimli pamshanhaowa, kha Josephshi shimkhurwui pāng ritlak eina parda athumli thoukai phungngasaka.
Kala Amorwui thari chi Akrabbim ashan Sela eina thuilaga atungshong khalei china.
kala nathum hiwui mibingli tuingashit masāpailakmana, nathumna athumwui hanphutbing shaokhaiphalungra.’ Kha nathumna iwui kahāng manganāmana. Nathum hi khi kasākhala?
Chiwui vang eina ina arui kahāng hina, ina athumli nathumwui mangāli makashamshokmara; kha athum nathumwui yangkashe ngasāra, kala athumwui varebingna nathumwui vang khalen ngasāra.”
wui kazingrao china tui saikora hi kahāng shālaga Israelwui mibingna vaoda chapngachai.
Kala apam chi athumna Bochim da phokmi, kala apam chili athumna
Kala mibingna Joshuawui thotli kala ali okpeikhamei khararnaobing, Israelwui vang

Kala athumna ali awui luiyar Gaash kaphungwui zingtun Ephraimwui kaphungram, Timnath-heres chili chifahaowa.
Kala chiwui mithot saikora chila awova̱ ngarāwuili vāserhaowa; kala athumwui thili
Kala Israelwui mibingna Baalli khorumda
Athumna

Chiwui vang
Prohona hāngmathin kahai kala ngashit kahai thada athumwui raivāt kachida
Chiwui thili athumli sākakathānabingwui pangshapwui eina kankhui khavai
Thalala athumna athumwui wungva̱-wungvāwui tui makhuimana; kaja athumna vare khangateibingli shurda khayorawui otsak sāzata kala athumli khoruma, kala avāva̱ ngarāna kazata apongli mazatla,
na wungva̱-wungvā kapangkasang tharan

Kha wungva̱-wungvābing thikahai tharan, athumna mai ngareithuihaida athumwui avāva̱ ngarābingli zakshimeida sai; katei varebingli ngareithuihaida khokharumla khoruma, kala athumwui makaphā otsak, lah ngakaishitingting kahaila mahorhailakmana.
Chiwui vang
Joshuana kathi tharan ana taikahai kachikathā yur akha eina tangda ina athumwui mangāli makashamshokmimara,
kaja avāva̱ ngarāna kasā thāda athumna sanikā masānikhala da Israelli ina chāng yangkhavai kasāna.”
Chiwui vang
Chitharan Israelli khaleibing, Canaanli rai kasāwui raisak makathei Israelnaobingli chāng yangkhavai
hi rida raili mavālakrang kaji Israelwui ara̱-azā rai sāthei khavai ana kasāna.
Yurbing chiya: Philistinewui wungnao phangā, kala Canaanaobing saikora, kala Sidonbing, kala Baal-hermon Kaphung eina thuilaga Hamath zangkhavai vāshungda Lebanon Kaphungli khalei Hivnaobing hina.
Avāva̱ ngarāli
Chiwui vang Israelwui mibingna Canaannaobing, Hitnaobing, Amornaobing, Periznaobing, Hivnaobing, kala Jebusnaobingli pamrum kajina;

kala athumna yur khangateibingwui nao ngalāva̱bing athumwui preiva̱ sākhavai vākhui, kala athumwui nao ngalāva̱bing athumwui naomayarabingli fachithota; kala athumna kateiwui varebingli otram ngatha̱ya.
Kala Israelwui mibingna
Chiwui vang
Kha Israelwui mibingna
wui Manglāna awuitungli tāshungmida ana Israelli mungsai; kala ana thānda rai vai, kala
Chiwui thili ngalei chi kum hangmati chingri eina leisai. Chiwui thili Kenazwui naomayara Othni-el thihaowa.
Kala Israelwui mibingna
Ana Ammonnaobing kala Amaleknaobing kazipkhuilaga Israelli angararda yuihaowa; kala athumna yuihaida khaneirong keinung chi vākhuiya.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Moab awunga Eglonli kum tharāda chishat otram ngatha̱ya.
Kha Israelwui mibingna
Kala Ehudna akhalattawui vang zankhangasunga, khuining akha kasānga raighai akha sākhui, kala yā-kashānli ngapilaga kachon eina farorhai.
Kala ana Moabwui awunga Eglonli shai khuivāmi. Eglon hi mi kathaovana.
Kala Ehudna shai chigat kahaiwui thili, ana shai phungkhara mibingli chihohaowa.

Kha ana Gilgal ngalemli khalei ngalunggui shānkahai apam chili vāshunglaga hanunga, kala ana hānga, “O awunga ina nawui vang khangathuma pao akha khuiphungli” da hānga. Kala awungana awui mibingli, “Thuisālu” kaji eina athum thuiserhaowa.
Kala ana makuinen kahai mathāng atoli amāng pamda leilakha Ehudna kāda hānga, “Varewui eina pao akha ina nawui vang khuiphungli,” chieina ana awui pamwui eina ngakarthui.
Kala Ehudna yāshong thāngkaphung raighai chi awui pāng uishong eina sutshokta awukli tosangmihaowa;
kala khaishāngla tophumshanhaida athaona khaila tumhaowa; ana raighai chi awui awukwui eina kasutla masutshokluimana, kha khamakhao shokrāsai.
Chiwui thili Ehudna ali khāmong taknarhailaga khanukshong eina yāmngathumshokhaowa.
Ana thuikahaiwui thili raobing karāsai, kala athumna ato khāmong tākhaikasā chi theilaga, “A khamakui kālungli ngasāmkhuida leili” da phaninga.
Kala athumna ngararailaga khisaunikhala da matheithuwa, kha ana khāmong masholak kaji eina, athumna sho chi khuilaga shoyanga; kala kākhayang eina chili athumwui awunga chonnartungli thihaisai.
Athumna ngarainganaoda leilakha Ehudva ngalunggui eina shānkakhui ama̱ chiwui eina Se-irahli yāmvāhairasai.
Ana ungshung khaleoda Ephraim kaphungramli talla̱ kākhonga; kala ana mangā thānda Israelwui mibing kaphungram chiwui eina tai.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Ithi shurlu, kaja nathumwui yangkashe Moabnaobing hi
Kala athumna Moabnaobing, kapingabing, yāng kakābing, chithang thingtharā sha̱kha, akhala machakshok ngasakla shaothatserhaowa.
Chieina chithang Israelna Moabli yuihaowa. Kala ngalei chi kum hangchishat chingri eina leisai.
Ehudwui thili Anathwui naomayara Shamgarna, ana seira̱kui eina Philistinenaobing shātharuk shaothata; kala anala Israelli kanshoka.
Kala Ehud thikahaiwui thili Israelwui mibingna
Kala
Chiwui thili Israelwui mibingna
Chitharan Lappidothwui preiva̱, Deborah, marānva̱na Israelli bichar sāmisai.
Ana Ephraimwui kaphungram Ramah eina Bethel ngachaili khalei Deborahwui khaneirong azingli pamda bichar sāmi khavai Israelwui mibingna awuili rāsera.
Ana Naphtaliwui Kedeshli khalei Abino-amwui naomayara Barakli chihaovai, kala ali hānga, “
Kala Jabinwui raimiwui raithāna Siserali, awui siguigari kala raimi thānda ina khuishokmira, kala Kishon kongli nali rāngarok ngasakra; kala nawui pāngli ina horsangmira.’ ”
Barakna ali hānga, “Na ili ngasovara jiakha ila vāra; kha nana ili mangasovaakha ila mavāmara.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Ina nali ngasovālakra; chithalala nana vāki kaji shongfa chili na mai makāmara, kaja
Barakna Naphtali eina Zebulunwui mi thingtharā hokhuida Kadeshli ali shurvai, kala Deborahla ali ngasokai.
Chitharan Moseswui awova̱ Hobabwui ara̱-azā Ken shangwui Heberna amāng ngateida Za-anannimwui alung Kadesh ngalemli khalei shimrimthing pamli awui kachonshim sāpamsai.
Abino-amwui naomayara Barakna Tabor Kaphungli kāhaira kaji Siserali rākahāng eina,
Siserana awui mari eina kasā siguigari shāchiko, kala raimi saikora hokhuilaga Harosheth-ha-goiimwui eina Kishon kongli vai.
Kala Deborahna Barakli hānga, “Vaulu, kaja, aja
Kala
Kala Barakna siguigaribing eina raimibingli Harosheth-ha-goiim eina tangda kharomvāda Siserawui raimi saikora sāthatserhaowa; mi akha eina tangda mataimimana.
Kha Siserava phei eina yāmhaowa, kala Kenpa Heber preiva̱ Jaelwui shimli ayāmsanga; kaja Hazorwui awunga Jabin eina Kenwui Heber ani chingri eina pānsai.
Kala Jaelna Siserali shokngarokta hānga, “Ngareirālu, iwui amei, iwuishong rālu, mangacheealu.” Chieina ana awui kachonshimli ayāmsanga, kala ana ali chonham eina farormihaowa.
Kala ana ali hānga, “Tara̱ khamimanglu, I ra̱changhaowa.” Chieina ana seina̱ sāhuiham shoda ali shimana, kala ali farorhaowa.
Kala Siserana ali hānga, “Kachonshimwui khāmongli nganinglu, laga kalikha kachikathā mi rāda nali, ‘Khipākha leila?’ jiakha, maleimana jihaolu.”
Kha, chothaida piphup kahai chitharan, Heber preiva̱̱ Jaelna kachonshimwui thinghun khamarik akha kala yāmkarnao khuilaga awui najeeli thāshāna, kala ngaleili ngaruiut ngasakta chieina a thihaowa.

Kala yanglu, Barakna Siserali kharomkharā eina, Jaelna ali shokngaroka, kala “Ralu, nana kapha mi chili ina chitheira” da hānga. Chieina ana awui kachonshimli zangkhayang eina, chili najeeli thingshun khamarik eina ngaphitshanlaga Sisera chili thihaisai.
Chithāda chithang, Varena Israel mibingwui mangāli Canaanwui awunga Jabinli maishi ngasaka.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Canaanwui awunga Jabinwuitungli sāshikhangai sāshida sai, kala Canaanwui awunga Jabinli mashimānranglakha eina tangda athumna chithada sai.
Chieina chithang Deborah eina Abino-amwui naomayara Barakna laa sai:
Israelwui kathānabingna thānda,
mibingna athum khalatta mathānthup eina chigata,
Nganālu, O awungabing; nāshunglu,
O wungnaobing;
Ina
Israelwui
mayori kahai laa sāra.
nana Edomshongwui eina kharā tharan okathui nganuka,
kala kazing rotai,
mah, muiyāwui eina zingrotla tai.
phungreibing nganuka,
Sinai kānvāda, Israelwui
Shamgar, Anathwui naomayarawui atamli,
Jaelwui atamli,
chānrei thingmihaida ramkazatabing shongchon shurzata.
Israelwui kha̱pān-rampān shimānhairasai,
Deborahna Israelli ava̱ thāda mathuimungranglakha.
Khangatei varebing kapangkakhui tharan,
raina ngavei pemhairasai.
Israel thing hangmatiwui alungli
chāngvei kazei khaleisāla?
Mibingwui alungli mathānthup kachigat Israelwui kathānabingli iwui ningkashi!
Hungrisi gadhā katongbingli,
khamathā chonham
phei eina kazatbingla, hāngmilu.
Laa kathemabingwuikhon
athumna
khikha makhaning Israelna khayui laa sai.
Thuilu, thuilu, Deborah!
Thuilu, thuilu, laa thuisalu!
Ngakarthuilu, O Abino-amwui naomayara,
Barak, tukkhui kahai nawui mibingli thānthuiulu.
Kapinga shākkahaibing china kaphung eina tai;
kapanga athumli ngarar khavai
Ephraimwui eina athumna tampākshong vai,
Benjamin nali kala nawui mibingwui thishurda,
Machirwui eina raithānabingna tai, kala
Zebulunwui eina otva̱bingwui khāmshui singmebing rai.
Issacharwui wungnaobing Deborahli ngasovai;
kala Issachar ningtongtingta Barakwui thi shura,
athumna tampāk eina tangda ali shurvai,
Reubenwui meiphungli ning sa̱ra̱-sa̱rāhaowa.
Na khisāda yaobingli kahokhon nganānganaolaga nganongpamhao,
yaobingli kahokhon shākhavaila?
Reubenwui meiphungli ning sa̱ra̱-sa̱rāhaira,
Gileadna Jordan makānvāda pama;
kala Danna khisāda marikhongbingli pamkahai?
Asherna shamadrupheili pamda yansāngsa̱ pāna.
Zebulun athumwui mirin kashimānli makhangachee miyurna;
Naphtalila rai khavā machihui!
Awungabing rai, athumna ngararra;
chiwui thili Canaanwui awungabingna ngararra,
Taanachwui Megiddo tara̱pamli;
athum lupāsā khikha mangaponkhuimana.
Kazingramwui eina sirāna ngararra,
athumwui shongzatwui eina Siserali ngararra.
Kishon kongwui tara̱na athumli kheithuihaowa,
kapanga Kishon tara̱.
Imanglā, pingda muivālu.
Yongtarak kazat eina siguiwui pheikhon,
awui siguiwui yongkazat pheikhon panglāk eina shoka.
“Merozli khonshilu,” kala chiwui mibingli khonshilu da,
khikhalajila athum
kapangali ngarar khavai kharā maningmana.”
Kenwui Heber preiva̱̱ Jael mahaimeikapranu,
kachonshimli kapama sha̱nao saikorawui ngachaili.
Ana ali tara̱ poi, kha ana ali seina̱ mi,
makhanla wungnao tengkot eina khuimi.
Ana pāngli kachonshimwui thingshun khamarik khui,
kala awui yāpangna yāmkarnao singda;
Siserawui kuili ngaphita,
ana akui ngaphitkhaimi,
awui najee ngarui-utmihaowa.
A pisanghaowa,
awui
Awui pheizingli pisanga, saosanghaowa;
ana pisang kahaipam chili thihaowa,
Charfanao sholaga ana yangshoka,
Sisera shāva̱na:
“Awui siguigari khisāda maunglak kajikhala?”
“Khisāda hirankha jihaokhala?”
Awui thangmeimeikap kaje sha̱naobingna ali ngahānkai;
kha a khalatta hānga,
“Athum ngaponkakhui ngayarnganao kahairala?—
Raimi kachiva̱ ngalānao ava̱va̱, khaninirip samphanglapai;
Sisera wui vang phorei phorkasang kachon,
ikahungli neikhavai aphor kazang machu
khamathā khani ngaponungki kajirala?”
O
athumna ngakarkathui eina
zimik thāda malingmeira.”
Kala ngalei chi kum hangmati chingri eina leisai.
Israelwui mibingna
Kala Midianaobingwui pāngna Israelli yuikahaiwui vang, Israelwui mibingna kaphungphungli khalei lungkhurkhur ngaveiveili shim asāpama.
Kaja Israelwui mibingna lui vāsang kajida Midianaobing kala Amaleknaobing kala zingshoshongwui mibingna athumli rai rāsai;
athumna Gaza luinganai vāshungda rairum sālaga lamwui luivāt eina samkaphang sākazamihaida kashakazāla, sha̱keila, Israelli akhanida mataimimana.
Kaja athum sorkhangasai khaohli ngayāda kachonshim phunglaga sha̱keila thānrai; mila, utla shānla makhuimana; athumna rāzang ngasha̱da lam saikora ngapha̱mihaowa.
Kala Midianaobingwui vang eina Israel mibingwui mirin ngazanlakhaowa; kala Israelwui mibingna
Midianaobingli ngacheeda Israelwui mibingna
na Israelwui mibingli marān akha chihovai, kala ana athumli hānga, “
kala ina nathumli Egyptnaobingwui eina, kala nathumli rekakhareka pāngwui eina kankhuimi, kala nathumwui mangāli athumli kashamshokmi, kala athumwui ngalei nathumli mi,
kala ina nathumli hānga, ‘I
Chitharan
Kala
Chieina Gideonna ali hānga, “Amei, malung mavātmialu, kha
Kala
Ana ngahānkai, “
Kala
Ana hānga, “Nana ili lumashanmiakha ili khamachut akha chitheimilu, chieina nana kahāngna kaji ina theikhuira.
Ina ot akha ungkhuilaga nali makhuirāmiranglakha eina tangda makathuimihaifalu.” Ana hānga, “Nana malatrāranglakha eina tangda ina ngaraisāra.”

Chieina Gideonna ashiwui shimli unglaga yaonao akha taithata, kala mathir khawok makazang khamuila sākhui. Sā chi luk akhali khuiphunga, kala hanra̱ ham akhali khuiphungda chibing chi shirimthingpheili ali khuivāmi.
Varewui kazingrao china ali hānga, “Sāla, khawok makazang khamuila ngalungtung chili hailu, kala ara̱ chi heirorlu.” Kala ana chithāda sai.
Chiwui thili
wui kazingraona kaji kathei samphanghaoda Gideonna hānga, “Iyavo, O
Kha
Apam chili Gideonna
Chithang ngayā
kala nawui Vare
Chieina Gideonna awui rao tharā hokhuilaga
Keinungwui mibing ngathorthakva̱ kathui tharan, yanglu, Baalwui hanphut sākhaihairasai, Asherah tarungla ta̱tekmihairasai; kala mukkā kakhane chi kadhara sākahai hanphutli pha̱hairasai.
Kala athum akha eina akha, “Hi khipāna kasākhala?” da ngathing ngaroka. Naoda ngathingthingda kaphā eina “Hi Joashwui naomayara Gideonna” da athumna hānga.
Chieina keinungwui mibingna Joashli hānga, “Nanaoli khuishoklu, a thira, kaja Baalwui hanphut sakhaimihailaga chiwui ngalemli khalei Asherah tarungla ta̱tekmihaira.”

Kha rāngaherda ali makhamayā saikora chili Joashna hānga, “Nathumna Baalwui vang nganingrala? Maningakha awui vang ngararmirala? Awui vang khanganingbing chili ngathorma shaothatra. A vareakha, awui hanphut sakhaimi kahaiwui vang ana ngararranu,”.
Chiwui vang chithang eina thuida Gideonli Jerubbaal hohaowa; chiya, “Baalna ali ngararranu” da kahāngna, kaja ana Baalwui hanphut ngakhuntekmihaowa.
Chiwui thili Midianaobing, Amaleknaobing kala zingshoshongwui mibing Jordan kānlaga Jezreel tampākli rairum rāsai.
Kha
Kala Manasseh hupva̱li ana paomebing chiholaga ali shurkhavai ahokhuiser ngasaka. Kala Asherli, Zebulunli, Naphtalili ana paomebing chihovāserda athumna ali kāsamphanga.
Chieina Gideonna Vareli hānga, “Nana hāngkahai thāda ipāng eina nana Israelli huikhuira jiakha,
yanglu, vatpom akha ina lanpumli haihaira; vatpom himāngli ikra̱ tarorlaga apam khangatei thengcheng haiakha, nana hāngkahai thāda ipāng eina nana Israelli kankhuishapra da theira.”
Ana ngathor kathui eina chithāda leisai; kala ana chi surkhayang eina tara̱ kokluikha khui.
Chiwui thili Gideonna Vareli hānga, “Malung mavātmialu, akhashidamāng pohaoga; vatpom hi akha shida machutkhuiluiga, khangatei saikorali ikra̱ tāserlaga vatpom himangli matā ngasaklu, da kapona.”
Kala awui kapo athishurda chithang ngayā Varena sāmi, kaja vatpom chimāng thengchenghailaga ngaleitung saikora ikra̱ tākmithaisai.

Chiwui thili Jerubbaalna (chiya, Gideon) kala ali khangasobing saikorana ngathorthakva̱ thuida Harodwui ura̱wok ngalemli rairum asai; kala Midianaobingna athumwui atungshong, Moreh kaphung ngalem, tampāk chili rairum sai.
Chieina saikorana shākhavai vaosanglu, ‘Khangacheena kakathirbing athumli shim hanunghaoranu.’” Kala Gideonna athumli chithāda tamkhayang eina thingmaga̱da khani latunghaida thingtharāmāng leisai.
Kala
Chiwui vang ana mibingli tara̱pamli thānzanga, kala
Kala pāng eina homkhuida khamang athum shākathumāng leisai; kha kateibing chiya maropkhamang mānga.
Kala

Chieina ana athumwui ham eina talla̱ chi khuilaga, shākathum chi maningla ana Israel katai katonga kachichāwui kachonshimli hanungngasakhaowa; kala Midianaobingwui rāmrah chi azingwui tampāk chili leisai.
Chithang ngayā
Kha rairum chili namāng matālengakha nawui rao Purahli ngasotālu;
kala athumna khangazek chi nana shālaga naoda nawui pangshap shokta athumwui rairumli akaishapra.” Chieina ana awui rao Purahli ngasoda rairum ayarli khalei raimi pamkhavai rairum tāyanga.
Chili Midianaobing, Amaleknaobing kala zingshoshongwui mi saikora, khaoh thāda sorkhangasai leisai, utla shamadruwui situi ngayāda shānla makhuimana.

Gideonna tākhayang eina, yanglu, mi akhana angasotali mang hāngsai; ana hithāda hānga, “Yanglu, ili mang akha shimana, kala yanglu, nāpai khamuitang akha Midianaobingwui rairumli shireotārāsai, kala kachonshimli khangatak eina shim chi phalatlaga ja̱khuphaowa.”
Chieina awui ngasotana ngahānkai, “Chi Israelpa Joashwui nao, Gideonwui raighai maningla khangatei maningmana, Midianaobing kala rai ashangva̱ saikora hi Varena awui pāngli horsangmi kahaina.”
Mang kahāng kala chiwui kakhalat kahāng shālaga Gideonna Vareli khoruma; kala Israelwui rairumli latungda hānga, “Ngakarthuilu; Midiawui rai ashangva̱
Kala raimi shākathum chi ana akhum kathum khailaga mi kachiva̱li talla̱ akharip, kala tara̱ham khamasaili meilā sanglaga akharip misera.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Ili yanglu, laga chithada sālu; ina rairumwui ayarli rākahai tharan ina kasā chi tākam eina sāserlu.
Ina kala ili khangasobing saikorana talla̱ ̱ kakhong eina, nathumla rairum chiwui eina khongserlu, kala, ‘
Chieina Gideonli ngasoda athum shākha china ngayāsailung rairum ayārli vāda hāngkahai atam ungkhaleoda talla̱ khonglaga athumwui pāngli kasing ham chi shaokazama.
Chieina khum kathum china uishong kasing ham shaokhaikazamda meilā singripta yāshong eina talla̱ khonga, kala “
Athumna kuimareida kachichāwui pamli nganingsera, kha yangkashebing chi ngaunlop eina yāmserhaowa.
Athum shākathumna talla̱ kakhong eina,
Kala Israelwui mibing, Naphtaliwui, Asherwui, Manassehwui raimi hokhuilaga athumna Midianaobingli kharomvai.

Kala Gideonna Ephraim kaphungramli khaleibing saikorali paomebing shivātta hānga, “Midianaobingli tāngararlu, kala athum mamakānshok khavai Jordan kala Beth-barah tāshungda kongrābing chi nganingphinhaolu.” Chithāda Ephraimwui raimi hokhuiserda athumna Beth-bara tāshungda kala Jordan zangda nganingphinhaowa.

Kala athumna Midianaobingli kharomvāda athumwui wungnao khani, Oreb eina Zeebli tukkhui; athumna Orebli Orebwui lunghār chili shaothathaowa, kala Zeebli athumna Zeebwui drakhāra̱ surkhavai chili shaothathaowa. Kala aniwui kui Jordan kong kānda Gideonli khuiungmi.
Kala Ephraimwui mibingna ali, “Midianaobingli nathumna ngarar khavai khavā tharan, kachiwui vang eina ithumli mahothukhala?” da Gideonli malungvātsir eina hānga.
Kha ana athumli hānga, “Nathumli ngaheolaga ina ara khi sāhaira? Abizerbingna drakhāthei pangda hātkakhuile Ephraimwui drakhāthei athamna maphāmeimala?
Varena nathumwui pāngli Midiawui wungnao Oreb eina Zeebli horsangmihaira; chili ngaheolaga ina nathumli khi phāmeida sāshapkhala?” da hānga. Ana chi kahāng eina athumwui malungkhavāt suitāhaowa.
Kala Gideonna Jordanli vāshunga, ali ngasoda mi shākathum china vānhailala kala thailala kong makāna.
Chieina ana Succothwui mili hānga, “Midiawui awunga khani Zebah eina Zalmunnali kharomkazatna, iwui thi kashurbing kathaina vānhaira, khamuishom khamilu” da poi.
Kala Succothwui otva̱bingna, “Zebah eina Zalmunna hi napāngli leihaida chieina nawui raimibingli khamizālu kajila?” da hānghaowa.
Chieina Gideonna hānga, “Chithakha phai, Zebah eina Zalmunnali
Kala ana chiwui eina Penuelli shanga, kala kharewui tākam eina ahānga; kha Succothna kahāng thāda athumnala ngahānkāhaowa.
Ana Penuelwui mibingli hānga, “Ina yuihaida chingri eina latkhaung tharan, dolan hi ina sakhaira.”
Chitharan Zebah eina Zalmunna raimibingli thānlaga Karkorli leisai, zingshoshongwui raimi thing tharāda phangā shākhamāng leisai, kaja raighai kasing raimi lakh akha thing maga̱ shaothathairasai.
Kala Gideonna, Nobah eina Jogbehahwui zingshoshong khalei ut shongfa eina vālaga raimi chili angarara; atam chili raimiwui raikān maleisāmana.
Kala Zebah eina Zalmunna yāmhaida ana vākharomkhui, kala Midiawui awunga khani, Zebah eina Zalmunnali tukkhui kahai eina ashi raimibing ngacheenahaida ning maphākhuithuwa.
Chiwui thili Joashwui nao Gideonna Hereswui shongshanshong eina latunghaowa.
Kala ana Succothwui yaronnao akha tukkhuida khangahān eina, ana Succothwui otva̱bing, ararbing, mi hangshinida shiniwui ming kapimi.

Kala ana Succothwui mibingli samphangda, “Yanglu Zebah eina Zalmunnali mayuithukmara da ili zeida, ‘Zebah eina Zalmunnali yuihaida vānkahaia nawui mibingli mizālu kajila?’ da kahāngabing, ara nathum theilu” da hānga.
Kala ana keinungwui ararbing tukkhuilaga lamhāngwui ka̱shāt kala lenghui eina tandi miya.
Kala ana Penuelwui dolanla shaokhaimihaida keinungwui mila shaothathaowa.
Kala ana Zebah eina Zalmunnali hānga, “Taborli nanina shaokathatbing chi azak kathākhala?” Anina ngahānkai, “Nathum thāsera, awunga akhawui nao thāda ngaraichasera.”
Kala ana hānga, “
Kala ana awui naochizai Jetherli, “Ngakarthuida anili shaothathaolu” da kasoi. Kha nao china nganuināhaoda ngachee haowa, kala awui raighai masutlengthuwa.

Chieina Zebah kala Zalmunnana hānga, “Ngakarthuida nakhalattana sāthatlu, kaja mayarnao akhana awui pangshap athishurda saki kajina.” Chieina Gideonna ngakarthuida Zebah eina Zalmunnali shaothathaowa, kala ana aniwui utli ngachākhami chā chi khui.
Chiwui thili Israelwui mibingna Gideonli hānga, “Midiawui pāng eina nana ithumli kankhuikhamiwui vang ara nana munglu, kala nawui thili nanao ngarāna kala nara̱ ngarāna mungchinglu.”
Gideonna athumli hānga, “Ina nathumli mamungmara, inaonala mamungmara, kha
Kala Gideonna athumli hānga, “Ina nathumwui eina akha poka, kachichāna ngaponkakhui unra̱ ili miserlu.” (kaja athum Ishmaelnaobing sāthuda athum sinā unra̱ ngathetsera).
Kala athumna mathānthathup eina, “Ithumna mingailak eina mira” da ngahānkai. Kala kachon hamhailaga athum kachichāwui unra̱ horsangmiserhaowa.

Kala ana pokakhui unra̱ saikora chi kaziplaga sinā chiwui kharit shekel thingkha shāshini shoka; chili lāngda chā, huishon, kala Midiawui wungnaona khangavai khamenga kachon, utbingli ngachākhami chā, kachungkha hi mashānarmana.
Chieina Gideonna ephod akha sākhuilaga awui keinung Ophrahli haihai; kha Israel saikorana khayorva̱wui otsak sāda Gideonli kala awui shimkhurwui vang china phei ngaphok khavai sāthuihaowa.
Chithāda sāda Israel mibingwui mangāli Midianaobing maikashi samphangda mangakarthukluithuwa. Chiwui vang Gideonwui atamli ngalei chi kum hangmati chingri eina okthuisai.
Joashwui naomayara Jerubbaalna ungda akhalattawui shimli ungpamhaowa.
Gideonna ngalā kachungkha khuida akhalattawui naothei, mayarnaomang hangshini leisai.
Kala angashirva Shechemli kapampāva̱nala naomayara akha pharāda ali Abimelech hoi.
Kala Joashwui naomayara Gideon, sarlak eina thihaowa, kala avāva̱wui chikhur, Abiezwui Ophrahli chifahaowa.
Gideon thihaikhaleoda Israelwui mibingna Baal varebingwui thili khayorva̱wui otsak sathuihaowa, kala Baal-berith hi athumwui varena da khui.
Kala apam kachiva̱li khalei yangkashibing saikorawui eina athumwui
kala athumna Jerubbaalna (chiya Gideon) Israelnaobingli kapha sāmi kahai saikora chiwui vang, athumna ningkashi khikha machitheilakthuwa.
Jerubbaalwui naomayara Abimelechna Shechemli vāda ava̱va̱wui theisā kala shimkhur katongali hānga,

“Shechemwui ruichumnao saikorawui miktāli hāngsanglu, ‘Nathumwui vang, Jerubbaalwui nao hangshini katongana khamung phameiraka, akhamāngna khamung phāmeirakhala? Iya nathumwui ashee kala asāna kaji nathumwui ningli haimilu.”
Kala ava̱va̱wui theisābingna, awui mahut eina, Shechemwui mibingli hāngkhamiwui vang, athumwui ning Abimelechli leihaoda athumna “A ithumwui achināna” da hānga.
Kala athumna Baal-berith shimwui eina lupāsā hangshini ngashaimi. Lupāsā chieina Abimelechna, awui thi kashura makānkhana kala maphākakhui mibing phāsanga.
Kala ana avāva̱wui shim Ophrahli unglaga achināngarā, kaja avāva̱ Jerubbaalwui naomayara athum hangshinili lungtung akhali shaothatserhaowa; kha apaisho Jothamna yāmngathumhaida ali matheithuwa.
Chieina Shechem kala Beth-millowui mi saikora kaziplaga, athumna vāda Shechemli shirimthing pheili Abimelechli awunga sanghaowa.
Pao chi Jothamli kahāng eina, ana Gerizim Kaphungli kānganinga, kala panglāk eina vaoda athumli hānga, “Ina kahāng hi nganālu, Shechemwui mibing nathum, chieina Varena nathumlila nganāmira.
Atam akhali thingrongbingna athumli mungkhavai awunga akhali tharchisinmi khavai kazipngaruma, athumna oliverongli, ‘Ithumwuitungli munglu’ da hānga;
kha oliverong china athumli hānga, ‘Iwui thaona varebingli kala mili khayāshi khangasak thāhailaga thingrongbingwuitungli suiung-suivā sarala?’ da hānghaowa.
Chieina thingrongbing china khaorārongli, ‘Na rālu, kala ithumwuitungli munglu’ da hānga.
Kha khaorārong china, ‘Iwui kashima kala khamathā athei thāhailaga thingrongbingwuitungli suiung-suivā sarala?’ da hānghaowa.
Thingrongbing china drakhārongli hānga, ‘Na rālu, kala ithumwuitungli munglu’
Kha drakhārong china, ‘Iwui atheina varebingli kala mibingli ningmathān khangasaka athei mamatheila ina thingrongbingwuitungli suiung-suivā sarala?’ da hānghaowa.
Chiwui thili thingrongbing china kashātrongli vāhānga, ‘Na rālu, kala ithumwuitungli rāmunglu.’

Kala kashātrong china thingrongbing chili, ‘Nathumna shitsangda nathumwui awunga sākhavai thao neomira jiakha, rālu kala iwui khaya̱li rāngayinkhuilu, maningakha kashātrongwui eina mei shoklaga Lebanonwui cedarthing eina tangda chuitāserhaoranu’ da hānga.

“Chiwui vang eina nathumna Abimelechli awunga kasang chi shitkasang kala khayakashiwui otsakna jiakha, kala Jerubbaal eina awui shimkhurli mathada yangmida leiakha kala awui otsakwui athishurda ali samikharān chi sākhamina jiakha—
kaja ishāvāna awui mirin chigatlaga nathumwui vang ngararda nathumli Midianaobingwui eina kankhui;

kala nathumna aja ishāvāwui shimkhurli mamayāmada awui naomayara hangshini lungtung akhali shaothatlaga ishāvāwui rao sha̱naona kapharā Abimelech, nathumwui theisā sāthuda ali Shechemwui awunga sāngasakhaira—
chieina nathumna Jerubbaalli kala awui shimkhurli khayāshida mashun eina kasāna jiakha, Abimelechwui vang ringphālu, kala anala nathumwui vang ringphāranu;
kha chi maningakha, Abimelechwui eina mei shoklaga Shechem eina Beth-millowui mibing chuitāserhaoranu; kala Shechem mibing kala Beth-millowui eina mei shokta Abimelech chuitāranu.”
Kala chi hāngphunglaga Jothamna Beerli yāmvāhaowa, kala achinā Abimelechli khangacheewui vang chili apamchanghaowa.
Abimelechna Israelwuitungli kum kathum munga.
Kala Varena Abimelech eina Shechemwui mibing ngachaili makathar manglā zangngasakta, athumna Abimelechli zakshilak eina sāhaowa.
Jerubbaalwui naomayara hangshinili sakashi kasā kala shaokathatwui ashee Abimelechwuitungli, kala achinā ngarāli sāthat khavai kasatkasanga Shechemnaobingwuitungli tākhavai khangarānna.
Kala ali ngathirai sākhavai Shechemnaobingna mi kaikhali phungreitonli rimpam ngasaka, kala athumna khaung-khavabingwui ot ngapaikakhui chi Abimelechli hānghaowa.
Kala Ebedwui nao Gaalna, awui theisābingli ngasoda Shechemli vai, kala Shechemwui mina ali shitsanghaowa.
