Kala athumna luili drakhāthei aphākhuida surlaga morsonga, khorumshimlila akhorumlaga phāshak-phazāda Abimelechwuitungli manganākhangai tui kachungkha matui.

Kala Ebedwui nao Gaalna hānga, “Abimelech khipāda, Shechemnaobing ithumna ali khi otram ngatha̱khavai leikhala? Jerubbaal eina awui otshina Zebulna Shechemwui avāva̱ Hamorli otram mangatha̱mala? Chithakha Abimelechli ithum otram ngatha̱ khavai khi leikhala?
Mibing hi iwui pāngli khaleina jisi kaje! Ina Abimelechli khuishokhaora. Abimelechli ina, ‘Nawui raimi mataisangkhuilaga shoklu’” da hāngra.
Keinungwui khamunga Zebulna Ebedwui nao Gaalwui tui chi kashā eina, a malungvāthaowa.
Kala ana Arumahli paome chihovāda Abimelechli ahāng ngasaka, “Yanglu, Ebedwui nao Gaalli ngasoda awui theisābing Shechemli rālaga keinung hili nali makhamayā tui kasotta lei.
Chieina ara na eina nali ngasoda khaleibing, ngayāshong luili arimhaolu.
Chieina ngathor zimik shokkhaleoda, thaklāk eina keinungli kharomzanglu, chili a eina ali khangayur athum shokkhangarok tharan otsakna khamayā athishurda nathumwui sākapai saulu.”
Abimelech eina ali khangaso mi saikora, ngayā ngakarthuida zatlaga, khum mati sāda arimpamhaowa.
Kala Ebedwui naomayara Gaalna ayar shokta keinungwui ngavei zangkhavai chili nganinga; kala Abimelech kala ali ngasoda rimpam kasābingna kharomshokrāsai.
Kala Gaalna mibing chi kathei eina Zebulli hānga, “Yanglu, phungreitonwui eina mi kachungkha tārāda lei!” kala Zebulna ali ngahānkai, “Kaphungbingwui khaya̱ chi nana mi thāda katheina.”
Gaalna hangluiya, “Yanglu, mi kaikhana ngalei chiwui alungthungwui eina tārāda lei, kala kaikhana Meoworbingwui Shirimthingwui eina tārāda lei.”
Zebulna hānga, “Ara nana matuishok kahai, Abimelech khipāda, ithumna ali otram ngatha̱miralā da kahāng na maningmala? Nana kachipat mibing chi hi maningmala? Ara shokta athumli angararulu.”
Kala Shechemwui mibingli Gaalna thānlaga Abimelechli shokngarara.
Kala Abimelechna kakharom eina yāmhaowa, kala kachungkhava ngavei zangkhavai ngalemli khamā za̱haowa.
Kala Abimelechna Arumahli pamhaowa, kala Zebulna Gaal kala awui theisābing kashamhaida athum Shechemli mapamluithuwa.
Akhama kathā mibingna luili vai; kala chi Abimelechli hānghaowa.
Ana awui raimi khuirāda khum kathum sālaga luili rimpamhaowa. Kala ana yangkhavā eina mibing keinungwui eina shokkharā chi theida ana shokngararda athumli sāthata.
Abimelech kala awui raimi khumkhali ngasoda Shechembingwui ngaveili vanganingkhamda leilakha, raimi khum khani china raiphungli vāda chili khaleibingli shaothata.
Kala Abimelechna keinung makhuiranglakha eina tangda chithang langpongda ngarara, mila kachungkha sāthata; kala ana keinung chi kailaga machi chaimihaowa.
Shechemwui Raikānphungli khaleibingna pao chi shālaga, El-berithwui raipanli ayāmsangserhaowa.
Shechem Raikānphungwui mi hupva kazipta lei kaji Abimelechli hānghaowa.

Abimelech kala awui khangasobingla Zalmon Kaphungli kai; kala Abimelechna ngahā akha singlaga maharthing tankha katatkhui, kala ayartuili ngava̱laga awui mibingli hānga, “Ina kasā nathumna kathei thāda thākta nathumla sakhuiserlu.”

Chieina mi kachiva̱ kachichāwui maharthing tankharip khuiphunglaga Abimelechli shurda ngaveili akhorhailaga mei thota, chi eina Shechem Raikānphungli khalei mibing thiserhaowa, sha̱naola, mayarnao thingkha sha̱kha thihaowa.
Chiwui thili Abimelechna Thebezli rairum asālaga khuihaowa.
Kha keinungwui alungli khangazipa dolan akha leisāda mibingna chili ayāmsangserhaowa, sha̱naola mayarnaola chili ayāmsangserhaida athum khalatta khāmong takshānhailaga dolanwui atoli kāpamhaowa.
Kala Abimelechna dolan chi mei thottā khavai akhanganai eina,
sha̱nao akhana Abimelechli chakrikui eina horda akui kaihaowa.
Ngalangda awui chāngvei phungkhameli hokhuilaga, “Thakta nawui raighai sutshokta ili tothathaolu, chi maningakha mibingna ili, ‘Sha̱naona shaokathatna’ jipaishina” da kasoi.
Kala Abimelech thihaira kaji kathei eina Israelwui mibing kachichā ramli yāmyik unghaowa.
Hithāda Abimelechna avāva̱wui naomayara hangshinili shaokathatwui makaphā kasā chi Varena hāngsangmi;
kala Varenala Shechem mibingwui makhayā otsak saikora chi athum khalattawuitungli tāngasaka kala Jerubbaalwui naomayara Jothamwui khonshāt chila athumwuitungli tai.
Abimelechwui thili Israel kanshokmi khavai Issacharwui mi Dodowui naomayara Puah, awui naomayara Tola shoka; kala a Ephraimwui kaphungram Shamir kaho kha̱ chili pamsai.
Kala ana Israelli kum maga̱da kathum mungsai. Chiwui thili a thihaowa, kala Shamirli chifahaowa.
Awui thili Gileadwui Jairna kum maga̱da khani munga.
Gadha ava̱va̱rip katonga awui naomayara thumrā leisai, kala ashiwui keinung thumrā Gilead ngaleili, Havvoth-jair hoda aja rāshungda lei.
Kala Jair thihaida ali Kamonli chifahaowa.
Kala Israelwui mibingna
Kala
kala chikum Israelnaobingli rekhareklak eina singkharenga. Jordan makānda khalei Ammor ngalei, kaja Gilead kaho chili kum tharāda chishat Israelwui mibing saikorali rekhareklak eina sai.
Kala Ammonnaobingna Jordan kankāda Judah, Benjamin, kala Ephraimwui shimkhurli ngararda Israelna khananglāk eina okthuisai.
Kala Israelwui mibingna
Kala
Sidonnaobing, Amaleknaobing, kala Maonaobingna nathumli rekhareka, kala nathumna ili khangakao chitharan athumwui pāng eina ina nathumli kankhui.
Kha nathumna ili horhailaga khangatei varebingli khorumhaowa; chiwui vang ara ina nathumli makanmiluimara.
Nathumna kapangkakhui varebing chili angakaolu; nathumwui kakhanang atamli athumna kanmiranu.”
Kala Israelwui mibingna
Kala athumna yurbingwui varebing horserhaida
Khaleilaga Ammonnaobingna rai sākhavai Gileadli rairum rāsai, kala Israelwui mibingla kazipkhuiserlaga Mizpahli rairum sāhaowa.
Chieina mibing kala Gileadwui kathānabingla akha eina akha hāngngaroka, “Ammonnaobingli khipāna ngararrikaprakhala? Chipana Gilead saikorawui atungli akhavā sāra.”
Chitharan Jeptha hoda Gileadnaobingwui rai kapinga mi akha leisai, kha a khayora akhawui naomayara sāsai. Gilead Jepthawui avāva̱na.
Kala Gilead preiva̱la mayarnao kachungkha lei, kala athum kharar eina Jepthali, “Nava ishāvāwui shimlui masamphangmara, kaja na sha̱nao khangateiwui naona” da ali kashama.
Chieina Jephthana achinā ngarāwui eina yāmda Tob ngaleili apāna, kala makānkhanā mibingna ali ngasoda ngathi rai sāzata.
Atam khaleilaga Ammonnaobingna Israelli rai ngarara.
Chiwui vang Gileadwui khararnaobingna Tobli vāda Jepthali houng khavai vai,
kala athumna Jepthali hānga, “Ammonnaobingli ngarar khavai nana ithumwui akhava ungsālu.”
Kha Jepthana Gileadwui khararnaobingli hānga, “Nathumna ili yangkharingda ishāvāwui shim eina kasham kahai maningmala? Ara kakhanang atamli khisāda ili rahokhala?”
Kala athumna Jepthali hānga, “Chiwui vang ara ithumna nali phākharāna, ithumli nana thānda Ammonnaobingli ngararda Gileadwui mi saikorawuitungli nana kathāna sālu.”
Jepthana Gileadwui khararnaobingli hānga, “Ina shimli ungluishitta nathumli ngasoda Ammonnaobingli khangarar tharan
Athumna Jepthali hānga, “
Chieina Jepthana athumli ngasoungda athum saikorawui kathāna sāhaowa; kala Jepthana hāngkhangai tui saikora Mizpahli leilakha
Chieina Jepthana Ammonnaobingwui awungali paome chihovāda hānga, “Ina khi sāhaoda iwui ngalei khuikhavai rākhangararkhala?”

Kala Ammon awungana Jepthawui paomebingli ngahānkāda hānga, “Israelwui mibingna Egyptwui eina kashok tharan iwui lam ngapaithuihaowa, Arnon eina thuilaga Jabbok, kala Jordan vāshungda khuithui kahaina; chiwui vang eina ara chingri eina hanmihaolu.”
Kala Jepthana paomebing chihoda Ammonwui awungali ahānglui ngasaka,
“Jepthana hithāda hānga: Israelwui mibing Moabwui lam lah Ammonwui lamla makhuilakmana,
kha Israelna Egyptwui eina kashok tharan, lamhāngwui eina Red Seashong vālaga Kadeshli kashokna.

Atam chili Israelna Edom awungali paomebing chihoda ‘Ithum nawui ngalei eina kānkhuihaoga,’ da hānga; kha Edom awungana mashāmithuwa. Kala Moabwui awungalila chihovai, kha anala mamayāmithuwa. Chiwui vang eina Israelna Kadeshli pama.

Chiwui thili athumna lamhāngshong eina Edom ngalei kuikhui, Moab ngaleila kuikhuida Moabwui zingshoshong ashoka; kala Arnonwui lākhavāk rāmrah sāda vāpama; kha athumna Moab ngaleili mazatvāmana, kaja Arnonna Moab ngaleiwui tharina.
Chiwui thili Israelna Shihon Amorwui awunga, kaja Heshbonwui awungali paomebing chihoda, ‘Ithumli nawui ngalei hieina ithumwui ngaleili ungkhavai kakān ngasakmilu da ithumna kapona’ da hānga.
Kha Sihonna awui thari Israelli kānngasakki kaji ningmaonghaida, awui raimi kazipkhuida Jahazli rairum sālaga Israelli rai sai.
Kha
Kala athumna Amornaobingwui ngalei saikora, Arnon eina thuilaga Jabbok eina tangda, kala lamhāng eina thuilaga Jordan vāshungda khuikahaina.
Chithāda Israelwui Vare
Nathumwui vare Chemoshna nathumli khayar shimlui chi nathum maningchāngmala? Kala ithumwui Vare
Maobwui awunga, Zipporwui naomayara Balakli nana phākhamei khi leikhala? Ana Israelli kharar khangarok kala rai kasā leila?

Israelna Heshbonli kala chiwui kha̱bingli pānlakha, kala Aroerli kala chiwui kha̱bingli pānlakha, kala Arnonwui kongpheili khalei keinung kachiva̱li kum shākathum kāshungda kapān atamli na chibing chi khisāda mayuikhuimakhala?
Chiwui vang iwui khalāng khikha maleimana, kha ili nathumna rai rakatā hi khayona;
Kha Jepthana pao kachiphun chili Ammon awungana khikha matheimithuwa.
Chiwui thili
Kala Jepthana
rai yuihaida ina shim hankhaung chitharan ishi khāmongwui eina shokngarokkhare mi chi, ina
Chieina Jepthana Ammon ngalei kānvada angarara, kala
Kala ana Aroer eina thuilaga Minnithwui luinganaili khalei, Abel-keramim vāshungda, keinung kachungkha yaikathānmihaowa. Chithāda Ammonnaobingli Israelwui mibingna yuichaohaowa.
Chiwui thili Jepthana Mizpahli awui shimli unga; kala yanglu, anao ngalāva̱na timbrel khonglaga pheichak sāda ali shok ngarokrāsai. Awui nao chimānga, ali lāngda naongalāvala, naomayarala maleimana.
Kala ana ali theilaga kachon serkhākta hānga, “Iyavo, inao ngalāva! nana ili maishi ngasakhaira, ili khanang khangasak chi na ngasāhaira; kaja ina
Anao ngalāva̱na ali ngahānkai, “Avā, nana

Kala ana avāva̱li hānga, “Iwui vang hi kasā ngasakmilu; kachāng khaniwui vang, ina phungreili vāda yaoung-yaova sāda, I kala iwui ngasotnaobingna mafathuila thihaoki kajiwui vang chapngachā khavai kachihomilu.”
Kala ana, “Vālu” da hānga. Kala ana kachāng khaniwui vang chihohaowa; a eina ngasotnaobing, mafathuila thiki kajiwui wukkakhanang sāda phungreili vāda chapngachai.
Kala kachāng khani kākapei eina avāvawuili latunga, kala awui ngashit kahai athishurda sāhaowa. A mayarnaoli matheilakrangsai.
Chiwui vang Israelwui naongalāvabingna, Gileadpa Jepthawui naongalāvawui vang kum kachida zimiksho matithang chapngachāchinga. Kala chi Israelwui alungli ngashan ngasāhaowa.

Ephraimwui mibingli rai sākhavai kazipkhuilaga athumna Zaphon kānda vai, kala Jepthali hānga, “Ammonnaobingli ngarar khavai kānkhavā tharan khisāda ithumli mahothukhala? Nathumwui shim nathum zangda mei sa̱tāra.”
Kala Jepthana athumli hānga, “Ithumna Ammonnaobingli shakchangda ngararhaira, ina nathumli kaho tharan, nathumna ithumli athumwui pangwui eina makanmimana.
Kala nathumna makanmimara kaji ina theilaga, ina imanglā ipāngli sanglaga Ammonnaobingwui lamli akhangararna, kala

Chiwui thili Jepthana Gileadwui mi saikorali kazipkhuida Ephraimli ngarara, kala Gileadwui mibingna Ephraimwui mibingli sāthathaowa; khikhalajila, “Nathum Ephraimwui kala Manassehwui alungli yāmkazata mina” da athumli hānga.

Kala Ephraimnaobing mayāmshok khavai Gileadnaobingna Jordan raipan chi ngapaikhui. Kala Ephraimwui yāmkazatabingna, “I chishong kauka” da kapo tharan, Gileadnaobingna, “Ephraimnaola?” da ngahāna. Ana “Maningmana” da ngahānkākha,

chithakha “Shibbolethnaona” da hānglu, kala ana male mangatarla “Sibbolethnaona” da hāngakha, athumna tukkhuilaga Jordan kānkhavaili shaothata. Chithāda Ephraimnaobing thing hangmatida khani chili thisanga.
Jephthana Israelli kum tharuk mungsai, Gileadwui Jeptha thihaida awui keinung Gileadli chifahaowa.
Awui thili Bethlehemwui Ibzanna Israelli mungsai.
Awui naomayara thumrā lei; kala naongalāva̱ thumrā khalei chi shang khangateili fachithotsera, kala naomayarabingli khangatei ayarwui ngalā thumrā khuisangmi. Ana Israelli kum shini mungsai.
Ibzan thihaida Bethlehemli chifahaowa.
Awui thili Zebulunwui Elonna Israelli kum tharā mungsai.
A thihaida Zebulun ngalei Aijalon kaho apam chili chifahaowa.
Awui thili Hillelwui naomayara Pirathonwui Abdonna Israelli mungsai.
Anaomayara hangmati, kala ara̱ngarā thumra, da athum hangshinina gadhā tongsai. Ana Israelli kum chishat munga.
Chieina Pirathonpa Hillelwui naomayara Abdon thihaida Amalek kaphungramli khalei Ephraimwui apam Pirithonli chifahaowa.
Kala Israelnaobingna
Kala Zorahli Dan shangwui mi akha leisai, awui ming Manoah hoi; apreiva̱ nao shumhaokada nao maleimana.
Kala
Chiwui vang eina ningngasharlu, drakhāra̱ranu, zamsheiranu, mamangalu, kala makathar mashai-mashakalu.

Kaja yanglu, nana nao vaida mayarnao akha pharāra. Kuisikhai akuitungli maparpaimara, kaja kapharāwui eina thuida nao hi Varewui mangāli Nazirite akha ngasāra; kala Philistinenaobingwui pāng eina ana Israelli kankashok ot sāphokra.”

Chieina preiva̱̱ china agaharali unghānga, “Varewui mi akha ili rāchitheiya; awui azak Varewui kazingrao thai, ngacheekhailaka. A kachiwui eina rākhala da ina mangahānmana, kala ana awui ming mahāngmana.

Kha ana ili, yanglu, na nao vaida mayarnao akha pharāra; chiwui vang drakhāra̱ranu, zamsheiranu, mamangalu, makathar mashai-mashakalu, kaja kapharā eina thuilaga thithang eina tangda naomayara chi Varewui mangāli Naziritena” da hānga.
Chieina Manoahna
Kala Varena Manoahwui tui khuisangmida, Varewui kazingrao chi apreiva̱na luili leilakha rārāsālui; kha atam chili agahara Manoah maleisāmana.
Kala preiva̱ china katotsisi yongunglaga agaharali “Yanglu, achonthang ili rākahānga mi chi rāhaira” da hānga.
Kala Manoahna ngakarthuida apreiva̱li shurvada mipa chili hānga, “Preiva̱ hili rākahānga chi nala?” Ana, “Ina” da ngahānkai.
Kala Manoahna hānga, “Nana kahāng chi ungshungakha, nao hiwui acham-aram kathārakhala, kala ana khi sāmameira̱khala?”
Kala
Drakhārong eina kashok akhala mashairanu, drakhāra̱ lah zamsheila mamangranu, makathar otla mashairanu; ina kaso kahai saikora chi ana mayontitranu.”
Manoahna
Kala
Kala Manoahna
Kala
Chieina Manoahna yaonao eina tharāzātchigat chi khuilaga lungguitungli matakhak kahai ot kasā
Kala hanphut chiwui meikhut kazingramshong kakā eina
wui rao chi Manoah eina apreiva̱li machitheiluithuwa. Chieina Manoahna a
Kala Monoahna apreiva̱li hānga, “Ini mashoila thilakra, kaja inina Vareli theihaira.”
Kha apreiva̱na ali hānga, “
Kala Zorah eina Eshta-ol ngachaili Mahaneh-dan kaho apam chili leilakha
Samsonna Timnahli tāda, apam chili Philistinewui ngalānao akha theihaowa.
Chiwui thili ana unglaga avā eina ava̱va̱li, “Timnahli Philistine ngalānao akha ina thei, ipreiva̱ sākhavai ali hāngsangmilu” da hānga.

Kha avā eina ava̱va̱na ali hānga, “Nawui theisāwui nao ngalāva̱bingwui alungli sha̱nao akhala mazangmala, maningkha ithumwui mibingwuili mazangthuda ahui marimkashoka Philistinenaoli napreiva̱ sākhavai akhuiphalungrala?” Kha Samsonna avāva̱li hānga, “Iwui vang ali khuimilu, kaja ana ili ningyāng ungngasaklaka.”
Hi
Chieina Samsonna avā eina ava̱va̱li ngasoda Timnahli tai, kala ana Timnahwui drakhā yāmguili vai. Kala yanglu, kazingkha̱nao akhana ali nirshokrāsai;
kala
Chiwui thili ana ngalāva̱ chili khararchān asai, kala ana Samsonli ningyāng ungngasakhaowa.
Kala khaleilaga ngalāva̱li hokhui khavai vai, kala kazingkha̱wui kathingun chi yangkhavai chiwui ngalemli vai, kala yanglu, kazingkha̱wui asā alungli gahā zangda khuira̱la zangsai.
Ana pāng eina kaokhuilaga shaimamānda zata, kala avā eina ava̱va̱lila khuiungmida anila shaiya. Kha kazingkha̱ kathingunwui eina kakhuina kaji anili mahāngmana.
Kala avāva̱na ngalāva̱ shiwuili tai, kala Samsonna chili zātkhān akha sai; kaja yaronnaobingna chithāda sāsā ji.
Kala chiwui mibingna ali theida zātkhān chili ngasotnao thumra horai.

Kala Samsonna athumli hānga, “Ina nathumli pakhon akha hāngga; kalikhada nathumna hiwui kakhalat ili phanitpei zimiksho shinithangwui alungli hāngmishapakha, ina nathumli khamenga kachon kala shivai kachon thumrā mira;
kha nathumna chi mahāngmirarakha, ili khamenga kachon thumrā kala shivai kachon thumrā mira.” Athumna ali “Nawui pakhon chi hānglu, ithum nganāusa” da hānga.
Kala ana athumli hānga,
“Kashaiya chiwui eina khikhakha shaikhavai shoka.
Kapangawui eina khikhakha kashima samphanga.”
Kala athumna kathumthangwui alungli pakhon chi khikhalada mahangrarthuwa.

Khamatethang athumna Samson preiva̱li hānga, “Nagaharali, pakhon chiwui kakhalat hāngmi khavai kontrenlu; chi maningakha nalila, nashāvāwui shimla ithumna mei thottāhaora. Ithumli chām sāsangmi khavai phakazā kahola?”

Kala Samson preiva̱na chapsasui hānga, “Na ili yangkharinga, kala maleishimana; iramnaoli pakhon hānglaga chiwui kakhalat ili mahāngmana.” Ana hānga, “Yanglu, ishāvālila lah ishava̱lila tui hi mahāngmana; laga ina nali hangrala?”

Ngalāva̱na awui ngalemli zimiksho shinithang phanit peida chapsasui ngahānchinga; kala kashinethang ana hāngmihaowa, kaja ana ali kontrenshon kontrenthaihaowa. Chiwui thili sha̱nao china pakhon chi aramnaoli hānghaowa.
Chieina kashinethang zimik matunranglakha keinungwui mibingna ali hānga,
“Khuira̱li shimkhamei khi lei?
Kazingkha̱li pangkhamei khi lei?”
Ana athumli hānga,
“Nathumna iwui muklanaoli tandi masāsi kaje,
nathumna kachilikha eina tangda iwui pakhon chi matheilakmara.”
Kala
Kala Samsonna preiva̱li aniwui shakazā atamli nganingkhame awui ngasotali mihaowa.
Khaleilaga, kehu hatkachāng, Samsonna yaonao akha khuiphunglaga apreiva̱li samphang khavai vai, kala ana “Ipreiva̱wui kāli zangura” da hānga. Kha apreiva̱wui avāva̱na mazang ngasakthuwa.
Awova̱na hānga, “Nana ali kachangkhat eina chinhao-aili da ina phaninghaowa; chieina ina ali nasotali mikahaina. Agatuiva̱na ali mathākhamei maningmala? Ali khuitha̱lu.”
Kala Samsonna athumli hānga, “Ajawui hile ina Philistinenaoli zakshida kasā tharan ili phen khavai maleimana.”
Chieina Samsonna ramfa shākathum atukkhuida kala zārmeila khuida ana ramfa khanini eina akhamei ngasunlaga chiwui ngachaili meila hokthangmiserhaowa.
Kala ana zārmei chili mei thothailaga ramfabing chi chihokhami eina Philistinenaowui hātphui kahai, lah mahātrang kaji mā kala olive yāmgui meina chuikhup tāmihaowa.

Chiwui thili Philistinenaobingna, hi khipānakhala da khangathing eina, “Timnapawui arihā Samsonna; apreiva̱ awova̱na awui ngasotali mikahaiwui vangna,” da athumna ngahānkai. Chiwui vang Philistinenaobingna vāda avāva̱ eina anao ngalāva̱li meili horsanghaowa.
Kala Samsonna athumli hānga, “Nathumna hithāda kasāwui vang ina kachangkhat eina nathumwuitungli athut khuira, kala I hili mapamluimara.”
Kala ana yaithathailaga kachungkha sāthatmihaowa, kala a Etamwui lungkhur akhali apamhaowa.
Chiwui thili Philistinenaobingna Judahli rairum asālaga Lehili vākai.
Kala Judahwui mibingna hānga, “Khiwui vang ishili rākakaikhala?” Athumna hānga, “Samsonna ithumli sāmi kahai thāda alila sami khavai tukkhuikida khārana.”

Chieina Judahwui mi thing kathum Etamwui lungkhur pamli tai, kala Samsonli hānga, “Ithumli Philistinenaobingna mungda lei kaji na matheimala? Nana sākahai hi khikhala?” Chieina ana athumli hānga, “Athumna ili kasā thāda inala athumli kasāna.”
Athumna ali hānga, “Ithum nali Philistinewui pāngli horsangmi khavai tukkhuikida kharāna.” Samsonna athumli hānga, “Nathumna ili masāthatmarada ili shākhi sālu.”
Athumna, “Khikha mathālakmara, kha athumwui pāngli horsangmi khavaimang khalapkhuiki kajina.” da hānga, Chieina athumna seipeng kadhar khani eina khalaplaga lunghārtungwui eina khuitai.
Ana Lehili ungkashung eina Philistinenaobingna mathānda vaoda rāngaroka; kha
Kala ana chichangli gadhā makhāra̱kui khanganao akha leisāda chi apāng eina yonkhuiya, kala chieina ana ngaphitkachupta mi thingkha shākha thihaowa.
Kala Samsonna hānga,
“Gadha makhāra̱kui eina,
khorkhorwuitungli khorkhor,
gadhā makhāra̱kui eina mi thingkha ina shaothathaira.”
Ana chi hānghailaga makhāra̱kui chi apangwui eina horhaowa; kala apam chili Ramath-lehi hohaowa.
Ali ra̱changlakhaida ana

Chieina Varena Lehili khalei angako akhawui eina tara̱ okshok ngasaka, kala ana chi mangkhui, kala ning ungrāsai kala pangshap samphangluishita. Chiwui vang apam chili En-hakkore hokahaina; arui eina tangda chi Lehili leida lei.
Kala Philistinenaobingwui atamli Samsonna Israelli kum maga munga.
Samsonna Gazali khavā eina, chili khayorva̱ sha̱nao akha leisāda ana ali ngasopiya.

“Samson hili rāhaira” da Gazawui mibingli kahāng eina, athumna apam chi kuinamhailaga ngayā pongda keinung chiwui ngaveili arimpi. Kala athumna ngayā pongda kasaikha pamda, “Ithum ngathor kazing kathang eina tangda rimpamlaga ali sāthatnaosa” da ngazeka.

Kha Samsonna ngayā sailung eina tangda pilaga sailungphup ngakarthuilaga ngaveiwui khāmongla, khāmongthingla, veiruithingla sutkhuilaga ayartuili ngava̱thuihaowa, kala Hebronwui mangāli khalei kaphungton chili ahormihaowa.
Hiwui thili Sorek tampākli khalei Delilah kaho sha̱nao akhali ana leishi.

Kala Philistinewui wungnaobingna ali rāhānga, “Kontrenda ali suikhuilu, kala awui pangshap kali lei, kala ithumna kachikathā apong eina ali yuikhuida khalapkhuira kaji ngahānkhuilu; chieina ithum kachiva̱na nali lupāsā thingkha shākharip mira.”
Chieina Delilahna Samsonli, “Nawui pangshap kali leikhala, kala kathāda sakha mi akhana nali pheipāng khalapta yuikhuipairakhala, ili kahāngmilu” da ngahāna.
Chieina Samsonna ali hānga, “Kalikha athumna ili malākhara̱, khanganao shini eina khalaphaiakha, iwui pangshap ngazanhaora, kala I icha-chama mi thāpapamhaora.”
Chieina Philistinewui wungnaobingna malā khara̱ khanganao shini khuivāmi, kala ana chi eina ali khalaphaowa.

Chitharan ana mibingli alungshongwui kā akhali yāmngathumpam ngasaka. Kala ana Samsonli hānga, “Samson, Philistinenao rāhaira!” Kha ana lengchenra̱ meina chuitā kahai thāda malākhara̱ chi shireishathaowa. Chithāda awui khangathuma pangshap kali lei kaji matheirarthuwa.
Kala Delilahna Samsonli hānga, “Yanglu, nana ili ngashan sānganaohaira, kala kapikta hānghaira; kathāda nali khalapkhuipairakhala, ili kahāngmilu.”
Kala ana ali hānga, “Seipeng kadhar mashijinlakrang kaji eina khalapakha I ngazanhaora, kala I icha-chama mi thāpapamhaora.”

Chieina Delilahna seipeng kadhar khuida ali chieina khalaphaowa, kala “Samson! Philistinenao rāhaira!” da ali hānglui. Mibingna alungshong kā khangateili rimpamsai. Kha ana seipeng chi kazaira̱nao sākashat thāda ngakhunshathaowa.

Chieina Delilahna Samsonli hānga, “Arui eina tangda nana ili ngashan sānganaoda kapikta lei; nali kathāda khalapkachangrakhala, ili kahāngmilu.” Ana hānga, “Ikuisam peng shini shida shireitālaga chi rāli raknarhailaga marikasui sa̱shantithaiakha, I ngazanhaora, kala I icha-chama mi thāpapamhaora.”

Chieina ana kapi atamli Delilahna sam kashirei peng chi rāli rakshantitmihaowa; kala marikasui eina sa̱shantithailaga, “Samson! Philistinenao rāhaira” da hānga. Kha ana ngakarthuilaga marikasui raknar kahai rā eina rā-thing shimenthuihaowa.
Sha̱naopava̱na ali hānga, “Ili nawui ning maleila nana kathāda ‘Ili leishiya’ jipaira? Nana ili kathum shida ngashan sānganaohaira kala nawui pangshap kali leikhala kaji mahāngmimana.”
Kala thangkachida saklak eina ngahānching kajiwui vang, ningkharakna thiki jihaowa.

Chieina ana awui ningli mangathumlakla hānghaowa. “Ikuili kuisighai maparlakranga,” kaja “Ishava̱wui wuklungli leilakhawui eina ili Varewui vang Nazirite akha sāda phaishok kahaina. Ikui sithang iwui pangshap iwui eina thuihaora, kala I ngazanhaora, kala I icha-chama mi thāpapamhaora.”

Awui ningli khalei saikora hānghaira da Delilahna kathei eina, Philistinewui wungnaobingli hokhuida hānga, “Akhashida rāluilu, ana ili awui khangathum saikora hānghaira.” Chieina wungnaobing china lupā athumwui pāngli khuirai.
Ana Samsonli awui khaishāngli chipetlaga mi akha hokhuida, shini shida khalap kahai sam chi sitāmi ngasakhaowa. Chiwui thili ana singkharot nganaolala a pangshap maleiluithuwa,
kala ana “Samson! Philistinenao rāhaira” da kahāng eina ngakarthuirasai. Kala “Ngathānthangwui thāda ina yāmshokshapa” da hānga. Kha ali
Chieina Philistinenaobingna tukkhuilaga amik latshokmithaowa, kala Gazali khuivālaga pithrai khānghui eina khalaphaowa; kala apam chili narhailaga mā shirei ngasaka.
Kha awui kuisam sitā kahai chi shokphokluihaowa.

Philistinewui wungnaobingna athumwui vare Dagonli haklak kahai pha̱kaphayā akha sāda ringpha ngarum khavai kazipa; kaja athumna hānga, “Ithumwui yangkashe Samsonli ithumwui varena ithumwui pāngli horsangmihaira.”

Kala ali mibingna kathei eina athumwui vareli sochikata; kaja athumna hānga, “Ithumwui yangkashe, ithumwui mi kachungkhali athut khuida shaokathat mi chili ithumwui varena ithumwui pāngli sangmihaira!”

Athumwui ning ringphāshap kaji eina, athumna hānga, “Samsonli hokhuilu, ithumli ana kumei sāchitheiranu.” Chieina athumna phātopwui eina akhuishoka kala ana athumwui mangāli kumei sai. Athumna ali pakra̱wui ngachaili nganing ngasaka,
kala apāngli thara̱da thānkazata mayara chili Samsona hānga, “Shimwui phungva̱ khani chi kachitheilu, chili kashaikhuiga” da hānga.
Chitharan shimlung chili sha̱nao mayarnao, kala Philistinewui wungnaobing pamsai, kala Samsonna kumei kasā chi khayang shimtungli sha̱nao mayarnao thing kathum sha̱kha pamsai.
Chieina Samsonna
Kala shim chiwui phungva̱ alungtho khani chili Samsonna awui pāng uishong eina akhali, yāshong eina akhali poklaga yāng eina tuka.

Kala Samsonna hānga, “Philistinenaobingli ngasoda I thihaoga.” Chiwui thili ana pamzangda awui yāng khuishokta nura; kala shim chi ja̱haida wungnaobing, kala mibing, saikorali minrorserhaowa. Chithāda awui mirinli ana sākathat saikorali chithangmāng sākathatna chungmeiya.
Chiwui thili achināngarā, kala awui shimkhurwui mina akhuilaga, avāva̱ Manoahwui chikhur, Zorah eina Eshta-olli ungchifahaowa. Ana Israelli kum maga̱ mungsai.
Ephraim kaphungramli Micah hoda mi akha leisai.

Kala ana ava̱va̱li hānga, “Nawui lupāsā thingkha shākha khuithui kahaiwui vang nana khonkashi, kala I khanāli hāngkasang chi, yanglu, lupāsā chi iwui pāngli lei, ina kakhuina.” Kala ava̱va̱na hānga, “Inaoli
Ana lupāsā thingkha shākha chi ava̱va̱li hanmi; kala ava̱va̱na hānga, “Inaomayarawui vang lupā chi ipāngwui eina
Chieina lupā chi ana ava̱va̱li hankhami eina, ava̱va̱na lupāsā shākhani chi khuilaga lupā kasaali mida rukkakhui kala langkakhui mima akha semmida Micahshi shimli haihai.
Kala Micahna khorum khavai khorumshim akha leisai, ana ephod akha eina meoma̱ akha da sākhuilaga chi mayon khavai anaomayara akhali pāngmon sāngasaka.
Atam chitharan Israelli awunga maleisā mada mi kachiva̱na kachichāwui mikyanli khamashung chi sāsai.
Atam chitharan Judah shangwui eina Bethlehemwui mi akha Judahli leisai, a Levinaona, ana chili yaorai.
Kala Judahwui Bethlehemwui eina kha̱ kateili asom khavai ana vai; ana zazatta Ephraim kaphungramli khalei Micahwui shimli vāshunga.
Kala Micahna ali hānga, “Na kachiwui eina kharākhala?” Ana ngahānkai, “Judahwui Bethlehemli kapama Levinaona, kala ina ram zatmamānda shimpam phākazatna.”
Chieina Micahna ali hānga, “Ili ngasopamlu, kala iwui avāva̱ kala pāngmon thada pammilu; kala kumkumli ina lupāsā tharārā mira, kashankachon, kashakazā mira.”
Chieina Levipa china ali ngasopam khavai mayāhaowa, kala awui naomayara thāda ngasopama.
Kala Micahna Levipa chili chipamda ana pāngmonpam chi mi, kala awui shimli pamruma.
Chiwui thili Micahna hānga, “Ara
Atam chitharan Israelli awunga maleisāmana. Kala chitharan Dannaobingna Israel yurwui shimlui khangayar chili ashi yar masamphangthuda athumwui pamkhavai phāzatsai.

Chiwui vang shang katonga Zorah kala Esta-olwui zangda kapingpinga mi phangā kapangkhuilaga ngathumda lam vāra̱yang khavai chihoi, kala athumli hithāda hānga, “Lam chi mathāda ayangkhuilu.” Kala athumna Ephraim kaphungramli vāda Micahwui shimli azanga.
Athumna Micahwui shimli leilakha Levipawui akhon chi machuthaida ali ngareivāda ngahāna, “Nali khipāna hili thānrakhala? Na apam hili khi ot sali?”
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Micahna ili hithāda khangarān samida ili talop milaga awui pāngmon phāsang kahaina.”
Kala athumna ali hānga, “Ithumna kapona, kaja ithumna sāzatta khalei hi ungshungraka maungshungra kaji Vareli khangahānmilu.”
Chieina pāngmon china hānga, “Chingri eina zatulu, nathumna kazazat pamli

Chieina athum phangā chi zatlaga Laishli vāshunga, kala chili khaleibing, va̱rihap ningkakashakla malei kala okathuiwui shong khavāt maleima, lanla kachungkha lei, kala Sidonnaobingwui eina katāvali khaleiwui vang otsakla mangarumana.
Kala athumna Zorahli kala Eshta-olli latungda achinā ngarāli samkaphang tharan, kathākhala? da ngahāna.

Athumna ngahānkai, “Ngakarthuilu, kala ithum vāda vāngararusa, kaja ithumna ngalei chi theihaira, ngalei chi tumlaka. Chieina nathum khikha masāmarala? Mahuinganaoasa, vālaga ngalei chi akhui khavai sāsa.
Nathumna khavā tharan, athuma yansāngsa̱ eina leisara. Lamla mashālaka, mha, okathuili khalei ot saikora mavatlak kaja apam chi Varena nathumwui pāngli mihaira.”
Zorah kala Eshta-olwui Dan shangna raisāri shaksālaga mi shātharuk zatphokhaowa,
kala athumna Judahwui alungli khalei Kiriath-jerimli rairum asai. Chiwui vang apam chili Mahaneh-dan hokahaina, aja rāshungda Kiriath-jerimwui zingtunshong lei.
Kala chiwui eina athumna Ephraimwui kaphungramli vāda Micahwui shimli azanga.

Chieina rida Laishli ngathumda akhayanga athum phangā china achinābingli hānga, “Nathum shim hili ephod, teraphim, chankakhui mima, heikakhui meoma̱ khalei chi theila? Chieina khi saakha phārakhala kaji machuklu?”
Chieina athumna Micahwui shimli kapama Levipa chili vāda, kathamameirakhala kaji angahānyanga.
Chitharan Danwui mibingna raisāri shaksāda athumwui zeighai-ngahā singda athum mi shātharuk china ngavei zangkhavaili nganinga;
kala pāngmon china raimi shātharukli ngasoda ngaveipamli leilakha, rida ara̱khayanga athum phangā china alungli zanglaga ephod, teraphim, chankakhui mima, heikakhui meoma̱ chi zangkhui.
Kala athumna Micahwui shimli ephod, yekkakhui mima, heikakhui meoma̱ chi zangkakhui tharan pāngmon china, “Nathum khi kasākhala?” da ngahāna.

Kala athumna ali hānga, “Nakhamorli pāng kafada kasaikha pamlu; ithum ngasothuiusa, kala ithumwui avāva̱ sāda pāngmon sāthalu. Mi akhawui shimli pāngmon kasā phameika, Israel shang kala shimkhur katongawui pāngmon kasā phameikhala?”
Chieina pāngmon chiwui ningli ringphāhaoda ana ephod, teraphim, chankakhui mima, heikakhui meoma̱ chi khuiphungda athumli shurthuihaowa.
Chieina athumna athumwui naongarā, sha̱kei, otbingli rida zatngasaklaga athumna kachuiphungda thuihaowa.
Athumna Micahwui shim eina katāva̱ thuikahai eina, awui khongnainaobingli hokhuilaga Dannaobingli kharomvai.
Kala athumna Dannaobingli akhavao eina athumna ngareiungda Micahli hānga, “Khi kachot leihaoda mi hiyākha thānkharākhala?”
Ana hānga, “Nathumna ina sākakhui varebing kala pāngmon khuithuihaira, ara iwuili khi leilikhala? Laga nathumna ili ‘Khi kachot leihaokhala’ kajila?”
Chieina Dannaobingna ali hānga, “Nakhon chi ithumwui alungli mashā ngasakalu, malungvātkazar mi zangsāda nali saza̱paishina, kala na eina nawui shimkhurwui manglāla shimānpaishina.”
Chi hāngphunglaga Dannaobing chi athumwui apongshong thuihaowa, kala Micahna athumli mayuimara kaja theida shimli latunghaowa.

Kala Micahna sākakhui otbing eina awui pāngmonli khuiphungda athumna Laishli vāshunga, chiwui mibing vari eina kala yansāngsa̱ eina pamsāda athumna raighai eina asathatserhailaga keinungla mei thottamihaowa.
Kala Sidonwui mibingla tanāhaida marākanrarthuwa, kala khangatei khipālikha khangashik maleisāthuwa. Hi Beth-rehobwui tampākli kashokna. Kala athumna keinung chi sakāluishitta chili somhaowa.
Kala Israelli kapharā athumwui awova̱ Danwui ming khuida keinung chili Dan hohaowa; kha keinung chi khareli Laish hosai.

Kala Dannaobingna semkakhui meoma̱ chi athumwui vare sāda hailaga Moseswui nao Gershomna kapharā Jonathan kala awui naomayara ngalei chili raopamli matukvāranglakha eina tangda Dan shangwui pāngmon sāngasaka.
Varewui shim Shilohli leilakha eina tangda Micahna semkakhui meoma̱ chi athumna haisachinga.
Atam chitharan, Israelli awunga mangavāranglakha, Levinao akhana Ephraim kaphungramwui apam katā akhali vāpāna. Ana Judahli khalei Bethlehemwui sha̱nao akha angashirva̱ sākhavai khui.
Kala angashirva̱ china ali malungvāthaida, ana avāva̱wui shim Judah ramwui Bethlehemli yāmungda kachāng mati apama.
Khaleilaga gahara china ali shurungda ali hanung khavai rao akha kala gadhā khani da thānphungda avāva̱wui shimli vai, kala a kharā chi theilaga ngalāva̱wui avāva̱na mathānthup eina samphanga.
Kala awova̱, apreiva̱wui avāva̱na, pamsanghaolu jihaoda, ana chili phāshak phazāngarumda kathumthang apisanga.
Kala khamatethang ana ngathorthak zatkhavai sai; kha awova̱na, “Phazākhuilaga zatnaolu” da arihāli hānga.
Chithāda ani phazālaga ngalāva̱wui avāva̱na hānga, “Aja ngayā ringphālak eina ngasāmkhuilu.”
Ana zatkhavai ngakarkathui eina awova̱na panglāk eina hānghaida pamsanghaowa.
Kala ana kaphangāthang ngathorthak zatkhavai salui; kha sha̱naopashi avāva̱na, “Phazālaga zatnaolu” da hānga. Chieina athum zimik khamakhei eina tangda ngasāmkhui, kala ani phāshak phazai.

Chieina angashirva, kala awui rao athum zatukida kasā eina, awova̱, ngalāva̱shi avāva̱na hānga, “Yanglu, ara kazing yinguki jihaira hili pisanghaolu. Zimik tāmamānda ngazinhaira, leishiri eina ngasāmkhuilu akhama ngathorthāk nathum zatta shim ungnaolu.”
Kha mipa china mapisangmara jihaoda zathaowa, kala Jebusli (chiya Jerusalem) kāroda khalei pam chili vāshunghaowa. Awui gadhā khani kala awui angashirva̱ zangda ali ngasozatsai.
Athumna Jebus ungshungnanai zimik tunki jihairasai, awui rao china, “Ithum Jebus keinung hili zangda arui ngayā chili pisanghaosa” da hānga.
Kha awui akhavāna ali, “Israelnao makhaning, yur kateiwui keinungli mapisangmara, Gibe-ahli apiusa” jihaowa.
Kala awui raoli hānga, “Ralu, Gibe-ahli maningakha Ramahli vameida akhali apisa.”
Chieina athumna zatta Gibe-ahli Benjaminwui lam vākashung eina zimik tunhaowa,
kala athumna Gibe-ahli vāshungda ngayā chili api khavai zanga. Chili zangda keinung chiwui kayāng khamashāli apama; kha athumli khipānakha shimzun sākhavai mahokhuithuwa.
Kala yanglu, ngazinshong kasarnao akha lui vālaga ungrāsai; a Benjaminshiwui mi, Ephraim kaphungramwui eina Gibe-ahli rakapāna mina.
Kala ana yangkhavā eina kha̱mibing chi keinungwui kayāngli pamkasa theida hānga, “Nathum kali vāki kaji? Kala kachiwui eina kharākhala?”

Chieina ana mipa chili ngahānkai, “Ithum Judahli khalei Bethlehemwui eina Ephraim kaphung katāva̱li khalei iramli ungushida kazatna. Ina Judahli khalei Bethlehemli vālaga shimli ungusi kajina, kha khipānakha ili shimzun mamithuwa.
Ithumna gadhāwui zātla khuiphungda lei; I kala ipreiva̱ngarā kala ili khangayur raonaobingwui vang kashakazā kala drakhāra̱, mavātlakla khuiphungserda lei.”
Chieina kasara china hānga, “Chingrihairanu; nathumwui khavavāt ina ngarānmira, kayangchangli mapialu.”
Chithāda ana awui shimli thanunglaga gadhā zātla khuimi, athumli phei pheongasakta phāshak phazā ngasaka.

Kala athumna tho-uda ringphāshap kaji eina, yanglu, keinung chiwui shuikhangarui mibingna ashi shim rākuinamlaga rākathanga; kala shimva̱ kasara chili hānga, “Nashi shimli kharāpa khuishoklu, ithum ali phasa ngarumra.”
Kala shimva̱ china shoklaga hānga, “Ivānaongarā, chikathā khayākhamalā ot masāmialu, a hi iwui shimzunna, hiyākha zakkashi ot masāmilu.
Yanglu, awui angashirva̱ eina inao ngalāva̱ leili, anili chihoshoka, nathumwui sakapai sālu, kha mipa hili makhangatun ot masāpaimara.”
Kha mibing china ali manganāsangmithuwa. Chieina awui angashirva̱li shimenshokmihaowa, ngayā langpongda athumna preiva̱ chili makhangatun ot sāda zingthanlam chihohaowa.
Preiva̱ china zingthanlam shimva̱wui khāmongpheili ungsaosanghaowa, kala kazing kahor eina tangda chithāda leisai.
Kala agaharana ngathor zatukida khāmong thuikasho eina angashirva̱ chi khāmongthingli poktitlaga leisai.
Ana, “Thuilu, zatusa” da hānglala mangahānkālakthuwa. Chieina agaharana gadhā tungli khangkālaga aramli khuiunghaowa.
Kala ana shimli ungkashung eina ghainao akha khuilaga angashirva̱wui asā chi aphei apāng ngalaklaga khum tharāda khani sākhui, kala asā chi Israelwui leiret kachiva̱li yaovā ngasaka.
Chi kathei mi saikorana, “Egyptwui eina shoklaga aja rāshungda Israelwui mibingli hikathā ot mashoklakranga, katheila matheilakmana; hiwui pongli phaninglaga machuklu” da hānga.
Chiwui thili Israelwui mi saikora, Dan eina thuilaga Beer-sheba vāshungda, Gileadwui lam zanglaga, mi ashang akha sāda
Israel shang kachiva̱wui wungnaobing Varewui mibingli ngasoda kazip chili azanga, chāngvei kazei kaphunga raimi lakh mati rai.
(Israel mibing Mizpahli kazip khavai kāhaira kaji Benjaminnaobingna shāhaowa). kala Israelwui mibingna hānga, “Ithumli hānglu, makhayā ot hi kathāda rāshokhaokhala?”
Kala Leviwui mi, shaothat kahaia preiva̱wui gahara china hānga, “Benjaminli khalei Gibe-ahli iwui angashirva̱ ini ngayā apisang khavai vai.
Kala Gibe-ahwui mibingna ngayāshong shim chi rākuinamhailaga ili shaothat khavai sai, kala iwui angashirva̱li rātukkhuilaga makhangatun ot sāda thihaowa.
Chiwui vang ina asā rimkazamlaga Israelli khalei shimkhur kachida yaokharāna; kaja Israelwui alungli athumna ningkakachai mitun makhangatun ot sāhaira.
Yanglu, Israelwui mibing, nathum saikorana, machuklaga nathumwui kaphaning hānglu.”
Chieina athum saikora ngakarthuida ningkha sāda hānga, “Ithum khipākha kachonshimli, kala shimli maungpaimana,
kha Gibe-ahli hithāda sāra: kalā yanglaga vāngararra,

kala ithum Israel shang saikorali shang akhawuili mi tharārā, thingkhawuili shākha, thingtharāwuili thingkha da khuilaga mibingwui vang kashakazā phungrā ngasakra; kala Israelwui alungli Benjaminwui Gibe-ahna ningkakachai mithit kashong kasāwui vang athut hāngsangra.”
Chithāda Israel saikora ningkha sāda keinung chili ngarar khavai kazipa.
Kala Israel shang saikorana Benjamin shangli pao chiphunvāda hānga, “Nathumwui alungli makaphā makhayā otsak leikahai hi katha kahaikhala?

Chiwui vang eina ara Gibe-ahwui shuikhangarui mibing chi khuishoklu; chithāda sāda ithumna athumli shaothathailaga Israelwui alungli makaphā saikora shimān ngasakphalungra.” Kha Benjaminnaobingna achinā ngarā Israelwui tui makhuisangmithuwa.
Kala Benjaminwui mibingna khokkha sāda shokngaroklaga Israelwui mibingli rai sākhavai Gibe-ah keinungli kazipa.
Kala chithang Benjaminnaobingna athumwui keinungbingli khalei raighai singkathei mi thing maga̱da tharuk kapangkhui, chiwuitungli Gibe-ahwui māng eina hākakhui mi shāshini kapangkhui.
Athum saikora hiwui ngachaili uithap mi hākakhui shāshini zangsai; athum chiya sampanaolila mangapatla shairong eina kapza̱kashapa mi mānga.
Kala Israelwui mi saikora Benjaminwui mi mazangla, raighai singkathei mi lakh mati kapangkhui; athum hi raimi mānga.
Israelwui mibingna Bethelli vai, kala Vareli angahāna, “Benjaminbingli ngarar khavai khipashi shang vārikaprakhala?” Kala
Chieina Israelwui mibingna ngathorshong zatphokta Gibe-ahli rairum asāpama.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Benjaminnaobingli ngarar khavai vāda Gibe-ahli angarānhaowa.
Benjaminnaobingna Gibe-ahwui eina shokta Israelwui mi chithang thing maga̱da khani pitāhaowa.
Kha Israelwui mibingna, khangachee maleilakla, kharethangwui tākam eina kakhane thangla angarānluishita.
Kala Israelwui mibingna
Chieina Israelwui mibingna, kakhanethang Benjaminnaobingli ngarar khavai valui.
Kala kakhanethangla Benjaminnaobingna Gibe-ahwui eina shokngararda Israelwui raighai singkathei mi thing tharāda chishat pitā ngasakhaowa.
Chiwui thili Israelwui mi saikora, raimi katonga Bethelli kāda chapa; athumna
Kala Israelwui mibingna
Aaronwui nao Eleazarna kapharā Phinehasna otram ngatha̱misai), ngahāna, “Ichina Benjaminnaobingli rai saluira̱ka thahaorakhala?”
Chieina Israelna Gibe-ahli kuimareida ngathirai sākhavai vāpama.
Kala kakathumathang Israelwui mibingna, ngathānthangwui thāda Benjaminnaobingli ngarar khavai raipam akhuiluishita.

Kala Benjaminshina mibingli shokngararda keinungwui eina katāva̱li kharomvāhaowa kala kharethangwui vākhavai chanreili shaothatluida, Bethel shong Gibe-ahshong vākhavai tampāklila chanreilila Israelwui mibing thumrā sha̱kha shaothata.
Kala Benjaminnaobingna, “Kharewui thāda athumli kupmihaira” da hānga. Kha Israelwui mibingna hānga, “Ithum yāmhaida athumli keinungwui eina chanreili shokserhaoranu.”
Chieina Israel mibing saikora chiwui eina thuihaida Baal-tamarli ungngarānhaowa. Kala Gebawui zingtunshong ngathirai kasā Israelwui mibingna apamwui eina muishoka.
Kala Israel katongawui eina hākakhui mi thing tharāna Gibe-ahli sakchanglak eina shokngarara; kha Benjaminnaobingna ashi maishiki kaji atam nganaihaira kaji maphaningsalakmana.
Kala
Chieina Benjaminshi maishihaira kaji ashi khalatta theihaowa.
Israelwui mibingna Benjaminshili apong chikākhamina, khikhalajila Gibe-ahli ngathirai kasābing chili athumna ning horsanghaowa.
Kala ngathirai kasābing china hengsāda Gibe-ahli muishokta keinungli khalei saikora raighai eina sāthathaowa.
Israelwui mibing eina ngathirai kasābingna theingarok khavai machut chiya, keinungli meikhut kashok tharan Israel mibingna ngararphokki kajina.
Chitharan Benjaminshina rai sāphokta mi thumra sha̱kha sāthat kahai eina athumna hānga, “Ithumwui mangāli kachangkhat kharewui khangarar thāda athum mutluihaira.”
Kha keinungwui eina khudam chi meikhut pemda kashok eina, Benjaminnaobingna khanukvāk kapeikhaung eina, yanglu, keinung katonga kazingram kāshungda meikhut pemhairasai.
Chieina Israelwui mibingna ngareiungda ngararkaphok eina Benjaminshi ning shimānhaowa, kaja kashimān chi nganaihaira da athumna theihaowa.
Chiwui vang eina athumna Israelnaobingwui eina lamhāngshong yāmvā khavai sai, kha raina mayāmpaithuda keinungwui eina shokkhangaroka Israelwui mibingna athumli alungli sāshimānhaowa.
Benjaminwui mibingli sathatta athumna Nohahwui eina thuilaga Gibe-ah ngalei kāroda khalei zingshoshong vāshungda kharomvai.
Benjaminwui rai kapinga raimimāng thing tharāda chishat pitai.
Kala athumna Rimmonwui lunghārpam lamhāngshong yāmvai; kha chanreili mi thing phangā yortāhaowa, kala Gidom vāshungda kharomvai, chili thingkhani sāthata.
Chieina Benjaminwui mi chithang kathi, raighai singkathei thing maga̱da phangāna, athum chiya rai kapinga raimimānga.
Kha athum shatharukva lamhāngshong yāmvāda Rimmonwui lunghārpamli kachāng mati apama.
Kala Israel mibingna latvāluilaga Benjaminshi mila, sha̱keila, athumna samkaphang yaitupthathaowa, kala athumna khavā keinung kachiva̱la mei thottamiserhaowa.
Chitharan Israelwui mibingna Mizpahli leilakha, “Benjaminli ithum khipākhawui naongalāva̱ mafachithotpaimara” da khangashit akha sai.
Kala mibingna Bethelli vāda, ngazin vāshungda Varewui mangāli ngavaoda chapsasui akhoruma.
Kala athumna hānga, “O
Kala athumna akhama kathā ngathorthak thuilaga hanphut akha sākhuida rikkatā kachigat kala ningyatchigat chigata.
Kala Israelwui mibingna hānga, “Israel shang saikorawui ngachaili khipā
Kala Israel mibingna achinā Benjaminli lumashanlakhaowa, kala, “Shang akha aja Israelwui eina katatshokhaira, da hānga.
Ashiwui taihaida khalei mibingli, athumwui preiva̱̱ samphang khavai khisausi? Kaja ithumwui naongalāva̱ ngarā athumli mafachithotpaimara da ithum
Kala athumna hānga, Mizpahli
Kaja mi kazipkakhui chitharan, yanglu, Jabesh-gileadwui mi akhala mazangsāthuwa.
Chieina yarui ashangva̱na, athumwui ngachaili pingmeikap kaje mi thingtharāda khanili kasoda, “Vālu, chili khalei Jabesh-gileadwui mi saikora, prei-naosan zangda sāthatserhaolu.
Hithāki kajina kaja mayarnao katonga, kala mayarnaoli ngaso kahaiya sha̱nao katonga nathumna sāthatphalungra.”
Kala athumna Jabesh-gileadli khalei saikorawui alungli mayarnaoli mangasolakrang kaje kachingva̱ shāmati samphanga; kala athumna Canaanwui ngaleili khalei Shilohli athumli khuiunga.
Chiwui thili yarui ashangva̱na Rimmonwui lunghārkhurli yāmngathumkapama Benjaminnaobingli rai masāluimara da pao chihovai.
Kala Benjaminnaobingna atam chili latunga; kala athumna Jabesh-gileadwui ngalānao khuiung kahai chi athumli mihaowa; kha chila athumwui vang mapeithuwa.
Kala mibingna Benjaminwui shangli lumashanhaowa, kaja
Chiwui thili yarui ashangva̱wui khararnaobing china hānga, “Benjaminwui taihaida khalei mibingli athum preiva̱ samphang khavai ithum khi sāusikhala? Kaja Benjaminwui sha̱naobing sāthatserhaira.
Kala athumna hānga, Israelwui eina Benjamin kaho shangnao hi mashimānchao khavai, athum kharing mibingli shimluikat leingasakra.
Chithālala ithumwui naongalāva̱bingli mafavā ngasakpaimara. Kaja, Benjaminli preiva̱ khami mi chi khonkashi ngasaranu” da athumna ngashithairasai.
Chiwui vang athumna hānga, “Yanglu, Bethelwui atungshong, Bethelwui eina Shechemli vākhavai chanreiwui zingshoshong, kala Lebanonwui azingshong, Shiloh kaho chili
Kala athumna Benjaminnaobingli kasoda hānga, “Drakhā yāmgui chili vāda arimpamsālu,
kala Shilohwui ngalānaobing pheichak kasāli shokzangakha mi kachiva̱na ngalānao akharip shoktukkhuilu, kala preiva̱̱ sāda naram Benjaminli unghaolu da kasoi.

Kala avāva̱ ngarā, lah apā ngarāna mamayāmada rāhāngakha, ithumna ‘Lumashanda athumli ngachon khavai ithumli mayāmihaolu; khikhalajila athum preiva̱ sākhavai rai ngararlaga preiva̱ khuikhami maningmana, nathumna kakhuila makhuimirarmana; nathumwui khayon maningmana’” da hānghaora.

Chiwui mashing athishurda Benjaminnaobingna chithāda sai, kala pheichak kasā sha̱naobingwui eina preiva̱ sākhavai akharip tukkhui; kala chiwui thili kachichashiwui apamli unglaga keinung ungsakāda pamhaowa.
Kala Israelwui mibingla apam chiwui eina ngapakhaida kachichāshi shang, kala kachichā ramli ungserhaowa.
Atam chitharan Israelli awunga maleisāmana; kachichāwui mashun ning athishurda pansai.
Wungva̱-wungvābingna munglakha ngalei chili chāmrei rāda, Judahli khalei Bethlehemwui mi akha, apreiva̱ kala anaomayara khani zangda Moab ngaleili yāmvai.
Awui ming Elimelech kala apreiva̱li Naomi hoi, kala awui naomayara khanili Mahlon eina Chilion hoi; athum Judahli khalei Bethlehemwui Ephrathwui mina. Athumna Moab ngaleili vāda chili pamhaowa.
Kha Naomi agahara Elimelechna, apreiva̱ kala naomayara khanili nothahailaga thihaowa.
Naomayara khanina Moab ngalā khui; akhapava̱li Orpah hoi, kala khangatei akhapava̱li Ruthh hoi. Athum chili kum tharā sha̱kha pama;
kala Mahlon eina Chilionla thihaida, preiva̱̱ chi nao khani kala gaharawui vang eina ning thenghaowa.
Chieina ana Moabwui eina arihāva̱ khanili thānphungda latung khavai sai; kaja
Chiwui vang eina Judahli latung khavai arihāva̱ khanili thānphungda apam chiwui eina zatphokuwa.
Kha Naomina arihāva̱ khanili, “Ungulu, kachichā shāva̱wui ngalemli hanungulu. Kathebinglila, kala ilila nanina mathālak eina sākhami thāda Varenala nanili mathālak eina nganaomiranu.
Kachichā gahara samphangthathuida shim pānkhavai
Kala anina ali hithāda hānga, “Ngga, inila nali ngasoda nawui mibingwuili ungra.”
Kha Naomina hānga, “Irihāva̱ khani, hanunghaolu, khiwui vang ili ngasoung kachangrakhala? Iwui naopamli mayarnao zangda naniwui gahara ngasākapai leila?
Ila ara sarhaira, gahara maleirarluimara. Khikateikhada, arui ngayā ina gahara leida nao pharālala,
nanina mafathuila chiwui vang ngaraichingrala? Maningmana, irihāva̱ khani,
Chieina anina kairarang chapluiya. Kala Orphana aniva̱li maya̱khui; kha Ruthva ali ngathāntithaowa.
Kala ana “Yanglu, namuiva awui mibingli kala awui varebingli latunghaira, nala awui thi shurungulu” da hānga.
Kha Ruthna hānga, “Nali nothāhailaga, ili ungulu kaji tui makahāngmialu; kaja nawui khavāpamli I vāra, nana akazunpamli ila vāzunra; nawui mi iwui mi sāra, kala nawui Vare iwui Vare sāra;
na kathipamli ila thira, kala ilila chili chifara. Kathina maningla ina nawui eina pākthuihaiakha
Kala ali shurphalunghaorali kaji theihaoda Naomina khituikha mahāngluithuwa.
Chithāda sāda ani Bethlehemli ngasounga. Ani Bethlehemli ungkazang chi kashā eina aniwui pongli aram ngazeklophaowa; kala preinaobingna “Hi Naomila?” da ngahāna.
Ana ngahānkai, “Ili Naomi mahola Mara holu,” kaja “Pangshap sāshapa china ili sāshilak eina sai.
Ishi peida vai, kha
Chithāda sāda Moabpava̱ arihāva̱li ngasoda Naomina Moab ngaleiwui eina latunga. Anina Bethlehemli kehu hātkaphok atamli unga.
Chitharan Naomina agahara kaja Elimelechwui shong eina athei-asā kashok Boaz hoda kashānga mi akha leisai.

Kala Moabpava̱ Ruthna Naomili, “Kachikathā akhawui mikyanli ina lukhamashan samphangkapai leiakha ina luili vālaga mātham vāngamui khavai khamayāmilu,” da hānga. Chieina ana, “Vālu irihāva̱” da hānga.
Chieina ana vāda kahātabingwui thili mātham aphai; kala ana khavā lui chi, Elimelechwui shimkhur Boazwui luipam sāsai.
Kala yanglu, Boazna Bethlehemwui eina rāda mā kahātabingli, “
Chiwui thili Boazna awui rao kahātabingwui kathāna chili “Ngalāva̱ hi khipākhala?” da ngahāna.
Chieina awui rao kahātabingwui kathāna china, “Moab ngaleiwui eina Naomina ngasokhaung Moabpava̱ china.

Sha̱naopava̱na, ‘Matham tātung kahahai ka-phākhui khavai khamayāmilu’ da kahāngwui vang phākhangasakna. Ana ngathorthakva̱wui eina phākaphok chi kasha̱khala mangasāmlakla arui eina tangda kaphā hina” da ngahānkai.
Chieina Boazna Ruthli hānga, “Inao ngalāva̱, nganālu, lui hi chihohailaga luipam khangateili mātham mavāphaluilu, kha iwui ot kasā ngalānaobingli ngayurlu.
Nana mā kahātabingwui athi shurda lui hili phākhukhui jilu. Yaronnaobingna nali masheikhaut khavai ina hānghaira. Kala ra̱changakha yaronnaobingna asokkhui kahai hamli kazang tara̱ chi manglu.”
Chieina ana khayāshida kui mashunzanga, kala “Ram khangateiwui eina kharā mi I kathāli nana kathāda hiyākha lumashanmihaokhala?” da hānga.
Kha Boazna ali ngahānkai, “Nagahara thikahaiwui thili nana nashānili sākhami saikora, kala nava̱ navā, naram nothāhailaga nana makatheiya mibingli kharāwui apong saikora ili hāngserhaira.
Nana sākahai chiwui vang
Chieina ana, “Ishamei, nana ili lumashanmikachangkhathaira, kaja naraobingwui alungli ina nawui rao akha maninglala narao ili ninglum ngasakta lumashanlak eina hāngmihaira.” da ngahānkai.

Kala phazāt atamli Boazna ali hānga, “Hili rālu, khamui rāshailu, khamui chi drakhāra̱li rurshailu.” Chieina ngalāva̱ china kahātabingwui ngalemli apamzanga, kala ana māngataila ngarānmi, kala ana thokashap eina shaikhuida kataila taikhui.
Ana mātham aphālui khavai ngakarkathui tharan, Boazna awui mibingli hāngchithei; “Ana māvāmwui alungli zangphālala ali makahararlu.
Kala awui vang māvāmwui eina ngakhunshokmida kaphāla phākhui ngasaklu, kala ali khikha makaharalu.”
Chieina ana luilungli ngazin vāshungda mātham phai; chiwui thili ana naikhuiserda shungkha samphanga.
Kala ana chi khuiphungda shimli phungunga; ana phākakhui chi aniva̱li ungchithei, kala mazārarmada ana romkaphung chila mi.
Aniva̱na, “Na aja kachishong aphākhuikhala? Nali yangsangkhami mi chi kala khamahai ngasaranu” da hānga. Chieina ana aniva̱li, “Aja ina khavā lui akhavā chili Boaz hoi” da ngahānkai.
Kala Moabpava̱ Ruthna hānga, “Laga, hili lāngda ‘Iwui mā mahātkhuiranglakha eina tangda iwui raobingli ngayurchinglu,’” dala ana ili hānga.
Chieina Naomina arihāva̱ Ruthli hānga; “Phālakhaira irihāva̱, awui ot kasā sha̱naobingli ngasoda aphālu; maningakha lui khangateili vāda nali yansaipaishina.”
Chieina ana ngum eina kehu mahātkupranglakha eina tangda Boazwui ot kasā sha̱naobingli ngayurda mātham aphāchinga; kala ana aniva̱li ngayurpama.
Chiwui thili Naomina arihāva̱li hānga, “Irihāva̱, nawui vang phāmei khavai shim pānkhavai ngarānkhami maphāmeimarala?
Nana ot sārumda khalei sha̱naobingwui akhavā Boaz chi ishi athei-asā maningmala? Yanglu, a aja ngayā lanpumli ngum sāmathāpida lei.
Chiwui vang eina ra̱mayangkhuilaga thao neolu, kala nawui mathāmeikap kaje sāri shaksākhuilaga lanpumli vālu; kha a maphazā maphashakkhuiranglakha eina tangda na chili leida lei kaji machitheialu.
Kha a kapi atamli awui pikhavai pam chi yanghailu; laga pheizingli kachon alanzangda pilu; chieina nana khi sārakhala kaji ana hāngmira.”
“Nana kahahāng saikora chi ina sāra” da ana ngahānkai.
Chieina aniva̱na ali kahāng tākam eina ana lanpumli vāda asai.
Kala Boazna phāshak-phazākhuida chirchom kahai eina lanpum chiwui ngum kazip kahai achikun akhali pihaowa. Pikahai eina kasaikha apheizingshong kachon alanzanglaga Ruthna apizanga.
Ngayā sailung mipā chi thuikashuida khayang eina, yanglu, sha̱nao akha apheizingli pisai!
“Na khipākhala?” da ana khangahān eina, “Narao sha̱nao Ruth ina, shimlui kāki kaje chi nana, chieina narao sha̱naowuitungli nawui kachon fasangmilu” da ana ngahānkai.
Chieina ana hānga, “
Chieina ara, inao ngalāva̱, mangacheelu, nana ningkachāng chi ina sāmira; kaja iramnaobingna na kākashunga sha̱naona da theiser kahaina.
I shimlui khuirāna kachi hi mashunga, kha ili nganaikhamei akha leifaya.
Aja ngayā pisanglu, kala ngathorshong, kalikha shimluikatna khangachā chi sāmira jiakha phāhaira; ana sāranu; kha ana chi mathathurakha
Chithāda kazing mathangranglakha eina tangda ana apheizingli piya; akha eina akha mamachukkhuipairanglakha ngakarthuihaowa. Kala Boazna hānga, lanpumli sha̱nao rai kaji khipālikha mathei ngasakalu.
Kala ana hānga, “Nana khangavai kachon chi mayālu.” da kahāng eina ana khangavai kachon chi mayai. Chieina kachon chi mayāda khaishon tharuk sha̱kha tamsangmi, kala chi phungda shim unghaowa.
Kala shimli khaung eina aniva̱na, “Kathāmameihaokhala irihāva̱?” da ngahāna. Chieina ana ali sāmi kahai saikora hāngsera,
Kala ana “Kathāda nanili khamasai eina ungarokrakhala da khaishon tharuk hila ana sangkhamina.”
Aniva̱na hānga, “Irihāva̱, khi saminikhala kaji matheiranglakha eina tangda ngaraisalu, kaja ana mayansāngmara, kha aja ngazekmihenra.”

Kala Boazna ngaveishong shokta chili apamzanga; kala yanglu, ana kahānga shimluikat khuirānpa chi rārāsai. Chieina Boazna, “Ngasāmkhuilu, ngasotnao, hishong rāpamlu” da hānga; kala ana chivāk vāda apama.
Kala ana konung chiwui khararnao tharāli hokhuida athumli hānga, “Hili rāpamzanglu,” kala athumna apamzanga.
Chieina ana shimluikatpa chili hānga, “Moab ngaleiwui eina latkhaungva̱ Naomina, ishi theisā Elimelechwui lam akha yorda lei.

Ina nali hi hāngrada phaningsāda kahāngna, hili pamda khaleibing kala iwui mibing ararbingwui mangāli lokhuilu. Kalikha nana makhuimara jiakha, ili hānglu, kaja nana mangatangkhuimara jiakha, nawui thili ina khuirāna kaji ina theihaora.” Chieina ana hānga, “Ina ngatangkhuira.”
Chieina Boazna hānga, “Nana Naomiwui lui lothang, Moabpava̱ rameiva̱ Ruthlila khalona, kaja kathepawui ming chi shimlui china mahut sāda leingasakki kajina.”
Chieina shimluikatpa china hānga, “Chithakha I makhuirarmara, kaja iwui shimluili saza̱paishina. Ina ngatangkhuirān chi nana khuihaolu, kaja I mangatangkhuirarmara.”
Chieina shimluikatpa china Boazli, “Na khuilu” da awui pheihop khuishokmida hānga.
Chiwui thili Boazna khararnaobing kala mibing saikorali hānga, “Aja Naomiwui pāng eina Elimelechwui khalalei, Chilionwui, Mahlonwui saikora ina khuihaira kaji hi nathumna shākhina.

Kala Mahlon preiva̱ rameiva̱ Moabpava̱ Ruthli ipreiva̱ sākhavai ina khuihaira; kaja shimlui hi kathepawui ming leiching khavai chinao ngarāwui kala kha̱wui eina makanthui khavai ina khuihaira kaji hi nathumna shākhina.”
Chieina ngaveili leikasā mi saikora, kala khararnaobing china hānga, “Ithumna shākhina. Rachel eina Leahna ngarumda Israel shimkhur sākakā thāda, nawui shimli rāki kaje preiva̱̱ chili
kala Perezwui shimkhurli Tamarna Judahli kapharā thāda
Chieina Boazna Ruthli khuida apreiva̱ sāhaowa; kala
Chieina nao chi kapharā eina preinaobingna Naomili hānga, “Athei machat khavai aja eina tangda nali mahorhai kaje
Ava nawui mirin shirinkhame kala asārlam nali ruikhame ngasāra; kaja naomayara shinili mataikhamei nali leikashiva̱ narihāna pharāmihaira.”
Chieina Naomina nao chi vamda ana khuipama.
Kala khongnai preinaobingna aming phokmida, “Naomili nao akha pharāmihaira” da hānga. Athumna ali Obed phokmi; Obed hi Davidli kapharā Jessewui avāva̱na.
Perezwui ara̱-azā hina: Perezna Hezronli pharai;
Hezronna Ramli, Ramna Amminadabli,
Amminadabna Nashonli, Nashonna Salmonli,
Salmonna Boazli, Boazna Obedli,
Obedna Jesseli, kala Jessena Davidli pharai.
Ephraimwui kaphungramli khalei Ramathaim-zophim kha̱li Elkanah kaho mi akha leisai. A Ephraim shangwui Zuphwui naomayara Tohuna kapharā Elihuwui naomayara Jerohamwui naomayarana.
Ana prei khani ngashira; akhali Hannah hoi, khangatei akhapāva̱li Peninnah hoi. Kala Peninnahva nao leisai; kha Hannah nao maleimana.
Mipa hina saikorawui
Elkanahna pha̱phayā thanga, apreiva̱̱ Peninnahlila anaomayarabing eina anao ngalāva̱binglila yar samichinga;
Kha ana Hannahli leishilaklala awui yar akhamāng mi, kaja
Kala awui pheiva̱na malung thuikhavai, ali thurngasakchinga, kaja
Chithāda kum kachida vāchinga; kala
Kala agahara Elkanahna, “Hannah, khisāda maphazāla kachapkhala? Khiwui vang hiyākha malung kharingkhala? Naomayara tharāli I machongmeimala?” da hānga.
Athumna Shilohli phāshak phazākhui kahai eina Hannah thuihaowa. Atam chili Eli pāngmon
Kala Hannahna malung ringlak eina
Kala ana khangashit akha sāda hānga, “O saikorawui
Ana
Hannahna ningli seihā sāda, morchaimāng ngatha̱da akhon mashokmana. Chiwui vang eina khamarip sha̱nao-aili da Elina phaninga.
Kala Elina ali hānga, “Nana karankha sāngda marippamra? Zam khamang horhaolu.”
Kha Hannahna ngahānkai, “Khamarip maningmana amei; kha I ningkachotva sha̱naona. Zam lah zamsheila mamangmana, kha
Narao sha̱nao ili makaphāva̱na da makhuimialu, kaja iningli malung ringda iwui ningyāng makhaung chi matuishokta khaleina.”
Chieina Elina, “Chingri eina zatulu, Israelwui Varena nawui kapo chi ungshungmiranu” da hānga.
Kala Hannahna hānga, “Narao ili nawui mangāli khalumashanmilu.” Chiwui thili ana hanungda phāshak phāzāda ningkachot maleiluithuwa.
Athumna ngathorthakva
kala atam ungkashung eina Hannah nao vaida mayarnao akha pharāhaowa, kala aming Samuel hoi, kaja Hannahna hānga, “ina
Kala Elkanah kala ashi shimkhur saikora ngasoda kum kachidawui pha̱kaphayā chigat khavai kai, kala khangashit chi
Kha Hannahva makāmana, kaja ana agaharali hānga, “Naona na̱ reikhaleoda ina ali
Agahara Elkanahna hānga, “Nana phāra kaji chi sālu, nao na̱ mareiranglakha pamsālu;
Kala nao china na̱ reikahai eina, kum kathumwui mukkā akha, mathir shungkha, drakhāra̱ sangkhavai sāhuikhongkha da khuiphunglaga
Chieina athumna mukkā chi taithatlaga nao chi Elili mi.
Kala Hannahna hānga, “O iwui amei! nana phaningungra, apam hili nawui mangāli nganingda
Nao hiwui vang eina ina seihā sai; kala ina kapo chi
Chiwui vang eina ina nao hi
Kala athumna chili
“Iwuklung
I khamorna iwui yangkashebingli mana̱shi,
kaja nawui huikhamiwui vang eina ina mathāna.
Ali langda katei maleimana;
ithumwui Vare kathā lunghār maleimana!
Langsoda tui mamatuiluilu,
yākhangai tui nakhamorli mashokranu;
kaja
kala otsak saikora ana tama.
Kapingabingwui malā tekhaira,
kha khangazanana pangshap shaneikhui.
Kashāngabingli pheizā ngasaka;
kha khumkasābingli thongasaka.
Nao kashumva̱na shini pharāhaira,
kha kachungkha kapharābingna ngachakyanghaira.
Kathewui ramli ana vāngasaka,
kala ringngasaka.
ana nemtā ngasaka, ana kajuila jui ngasaka.
Ana kachāmali chifawui eina khāngkhui,
khavātali hotlāwui eina khāngkhuida,
athumli wungnaobingli thuingaren ngasaka,
kala maikhayā pam samphang ngasaka.
Kaja okathuiwui pakra̱bing
kala chiwuitungli ana apuk-apagva̱ khaningkai.
“Ningtongda shitkasangbingli ana mayonmira;
kha makhayābingle tangkhamangli katatshokhaora;
kaja, mina pangshap eina mayuimara.
athumwuitungli mamayāmada kazingramli ana khangangra.
Okathui vāshungda
ana awui wungnaoli yangmira,
kala awui thao neomi kahaiya chili khayā kāngasakra.”
Chiwui thili Elkanahna awui shim Ramahli unghaowa. Kala nao china Elili ngasoda
Chitharan Eliwui naomayarabing makakachanga mi ngasāsai; athumna
Pāngmonbingwui khangachā athishurda, kachikathāna pha̱kaphayā rākachigat tharan, pāngmonwui raobingna pāngli akasui kathum kakā marik-kapei eina ngatarda khalei hanham,
lah khāng, lah sāham lah ketli lungli tosangda chiwui eina khaikakā chi pāngmon khalattawui yar sai. Chithāda athumna Shilohli pha̱kaphayā khuikharā tharan Israelnaobing saikorali chithāda sāchinga.

Chili lāngmeida, athao mariktāranglakha pāngmonwui raobingna rāda pha̱phayāda khalei mi chili, “Pāngmonwui vang ruishai khavai sā milu; kaja ana nawui eina sā kahup makhuimara, kha sā kharing milu” da poi.
Kala mi china, “Tharifalu, athao riktāfaranu, laga nawui ningkachāng eina tangda khuinaolu” jilala, “Ngga, arui miphalungra; mamiakha, ina tandi eina khuira” jihaowa.
Chithāda sāda
Samuelna nganuilakha eina thuida khamenga kachon eina kasā ephod ngavaida
Kala ava̱va̱na agaharali ngasoda kum kachidawui pha̱kaphayā sākhavai khavā chitharan, ava̱va̱na awui vang kateowa katuma phahon akha khoplaga khuivāmimi ji.
Chieina Elina Elkanah kala apreiva̱li somi, kala Elkanahli “Nanina
Chieina anina shimli latunghaowa.
Kala
Chitharan Eli rarshunhaowa; kala anaomayarabingna Israel saikorali kasāsā, kala athumna kazip khavai kachonshim khāmong ngalemli otram khangatha̱ sha̱naobingli ngasopikazat saikora chi ana shai.
Kala ana, “Khisāda nathumna chikathā ot sākhala? Kaja nathumna makaphā kasā saikora ina mibingwui eina shāhaira.
Maningmana, inaongarā,
Kalikhada mi akhana katei akhali morei saakha awui vang
Kala Varewui mi akhana Elili rai, kala ali hānga, “

Kala Israel shang saikorawui eina pāngmon sākhavai, iwui mangāli ephod ngachālaga, iwui hanphutli nganamkaphā riktā khavai ina ali kapangkhui; kala Israelwui mibingna ili rikkatā kachigat saikora ina navāwui shimkhurli mi.

Chithakha ina kaso kahai kachigat kala pha̱kaphayā hili khisāda ngamarkhala; kala iwui Israel mibingwui kachigat kachiva̱wui eina mathāmeikap kaji china nakhalatta mathaopamlaga ili lāngda nanaomayarabingli khayā mihaokhala?
Chiwui vang Israelwui Vare
Yanglu, navāwui shimkhur, kala nawui shimkhurlila, ina pangshap katatmihaoki kaji atam nganaihaira; chithada sāda nawui shimkhurli khararnao akha eina tangda maleisamara.
Chieina Israelwuitungli somida mataikasang chi theilaga nana wukkhanangda mikpaishira; kala atam kachida nawui shimkhurli khararnao akha eina tangda maleiluimara.
Iwui hanphutpamwui eina makatathaila pamki kaje nawui mi chila amikli chāra̱ longra kala malung ringra, kala nawui shimkurwui eina mataikasang athum miwui raighai eina thira.
Kala nanaomayara khani, Hophni eina Phinehasli, hina nali machutkhui khavai sāra; ani thangkha thitkha sāra.

Kala iwui ningli ningkachāng saki kaje ningtongda shitkasanga pāngmon akha ina shokngasakra; kala ina ali makhangachei shimkhur sakāmira, kala iwui thao eina neomi kahai chiwui mangāli ana kashok-kazang yangmichingra.
Kala nashi shimkhurli kataibing kachiva̱na ali lupāsā, lah khamuitang rāpoda, ili zāt ngahomkhamāngla samphang khavai pāngmonpamli kasangmilu” da rāpora.
Kateowa naoshinao Samuelna Eliwui azingli
Atam chitharan Eli ngazanhaida mik mathāda makathei atamna, chieina awui pamli pida leisai;
Varewui thaomei chila masashimitrangsai, kala Samuelna Varewui ningkhami oko haikhavai pam
Chieina
kala ana Eliwuili yongvāda, “I hili leili, kaja nana ili hoi” da ahānga. Kha ana “I mahomana, ungpiluihaolu” da hānga. Chieina ana ungpihaowa.
Kala
Samuel
na Samuelli kakathuma raholuishita; ana ngakarthuida Elili, “I hili leili, kaja nana ili hoi” da hānga. Chieina nao hili
Chiwui vang eina Elina Samuelli hānga, “Ungpiulu, kala kalikhada ana raholuishitakha, ‘
Kala
Chieina
Chithang ina rida hāngkahai athishurda khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda Eliwui shimkhurli ungshung ngasakra.
Kaja ana kathei khayonkhamāng chiwui vang ina awui shimkhurli katang makhavai tandi miki jihaira kaji ina ali hānga, kaja anaomayarabingna ili chipata, kala ana athumli mahāngmachinmana.
Chiwui vang eina Eli shimkhurwui khayonkhamāng hi pha̱kaphayā lah kachigat hina atam kachida mapheomirarlakmarada ina ngashit kahaina.”
Samuelna ngathor eina tangda piya; chiwui thili ana
Kha Elina Samuelli hokhuida hānga, “Inaomayara Samuel!” Kala ana, “I hili leili.” da ngahānkai.
Kala Elina hānga, “Ana nali rakahāng chi khikhala? Ili mathumhailakalu. Kalikhada ana kahahāng chi nana thumhaiakha Varenala nali chithada sāra.”
Chieina Samuelna mangathumlakla katonga chi hānga. Kala Elina hānga, “Chi
Kala Samuelna rarsangmamānda
Kala Israel saikora Dan eina thuilaga Beer-sheba vāshungda, Samuel hi
Kala Shilohli
Kala Samuelwui tui Israel saikorali vāshunga.
Chitharan Israelna Philistinenaobingli rai ngarar khavai, athumna Ebenezerli rairum vasai, kala Philistinenaobingna Aphekli rairum sai.
Philistinenaobingna Israelli ngasungda angaher eina shoknganinga, kala rai alung kazang eina, Israelli Philistinenaobingna maikashi mida mi thingmati sha̱kha thihaowa.
Kala raimibingna shimli hankhaung tharan Israel khararnaobingna, “Kachiwui vang eina
Chieina Shilohli mibing chihovai, kala cherubim tungli chipam kahai, saikorawui
Kala akhon chi kashā eina Philistinenaobingna, “Hebrewnaobingwui rāmrahli akhon hiyākha kashok khiwui vangkhala?” da hānga, kala
Philistinenaobing ngacheehaowa; kaja athumna hānga, “Vare akha rāmrahli rāhaira! Ithum khonkashi ngasahaira! Khikhalajila hikathā khareli mashoklakranga.
Ithum kalākashi! Hiyākha kapinga varebingwui eina khipāna kanshokmirarrakhala? Egyptnaobingli lamhāngli kazātkashi yur eina shimān ngasak kahaiya varebing chi hina.
Malung pinglu, mayarnao akha thāda, O Philistinenaobing, Hebrewnaobingna nathumli raonao sākasā thāda mangasā khavai, nathum khalatta mayarnao thāda sālu kala ngararlu.”
Chiwui vang Philistinenaobingna rai ngarara, kala Israelli mayuithuda athum ichichāwui shimli yāmungserhaowa; kala chili tarakha sāthathaowa, kaja Israel pheiwui raimi thingthumrā thisanghaowa.
Kala Varewui tuingashit oko chi khuithuihaowa; kala Eliwui naomayara khani, Hophni eina Phinehasli sāthathaowa.
Chithang ngalāngda Benjaminwui mi akha, kachon serkhākta, akuili ngalei neolaga, raiphungwui eina Shilohli yongunga.

Ana ungkashung tharan, Elina shongfa ngalemli awui pamkhongli pamda ngashānsai; kaja, Varewui oko khuithui kahai chiwui vang ngacheeshunhaowa. Kala mipa china pao chi ungkahāng eina keinungwui mi saikora chapngachai.
Ngurngur kahai chi shālaga Elina, “Ngaunlop kahai akhon hi khikhala?” da ngahāna. Chieina mipā china ngasamrāda Elili hānga.
Chitharan Eli kum hangchikoda chishat kashunghaoda amik ngazanhaida matheirarthuwa.
Kala mipa china Elili hānga, “Raiwui eina khaunga chi ina; aja raiwui eina yāmkhaungna.” Chieina ana, “Kathāda leilikhala inao?” da ngahāna.
Pao khuikhaunga china, “Philistinenaobingwui mangāli Israel yāmserhaowa; mila kachungkha sāthathaira; nanaomayara khani, Hophni eina Phinehasla thihaira, kala Varewui okola ngapaithuihaira.”

Ana Varewui okowui tui hangkhaleoda, ngavei ngalemli awui pamkhavaiwui eina matheida pitāhaowa; kala akahung tekhaida thihaowa; kaja sarnahaida mangayuikhuirarthuwa. Ana Israelli kum hangmati bichar sarai.
Chitharan arihāva̱, Phinehas preiva̱ nao asaklamhairasai. Varewui oko ngapaithuihaowa kaji pao, kala awova̱la, agaharala thihaira kaji shālaga nao ra̱katurhaowa.
Kala a thinanai ali yangkhame sha̱naobing china, “Mangacheealu, mayarnao akha shokhaira” da hānga. Kha ana khikha mangahānkāmana, saktala manganāsangmana.
Kha ana naoming Ichabod phokmida hānga, “Tekhamatei chi Israelwui eina pākthuihaira!” kaja Varewui okola ngapaithuihaowa kala awova̱la agaharala thihaowa.
Ana hānga, “Tekhamatei chi Israelwui eina pākthuihaira kaja Varewui oko ngapaithuira.”
Philistinenaobingna Varewui oko ngapaikhuida athumna Ebenezerwui eina Ashdodli khuivai;
chieina Philistinenaobingna Dagonwui shimli khuiungda Dagonli ngalengda unghai.
Kala akhama kathā Ashdodwui mibingna ngathorthakva̱ thuikhayang tharan, yanglu,
Kha akhama kathā ngathorthakva̱ ayanglui kaji eina, yanglu,
Chiwui vang eina Dagonwui pāngmonbing kala chiwui shimli kazangbingla aja eina tangda khāmongpheili manaikaza̱ chiwui vangna.
Kala Ashdodwui mibingna kashoshok chi theilaga, “Israel Varewui oko hi hili mahaiphalungmara; kaja awui tandi hi ithum kala ithumwui vare Dagonwuitungli saklak eina tāngasakhaira.” da athumna hānga.

Chieina athumna Philistinewui wungnaobingli hokhuiserda “Israelwui Varewui oko hili ithumna khisausi?” da hānga. Athumna, “Israelwui Varewui oko chi Gathli khuiunghaoranu.” da ngahānkai. Chieina athumna Israelwui Varewui oko chi Gathli khuivāhaowa.
Kha athumna chili khuikhavā eina keinung chilila,
Chieina athumna Varewui oko chi Ekronli chihovāhaowa. Kha Ekronli khuikhavā tharan chiwui mibingna, “Ithumwui mibingli sāthat khavai Varewui oko chi ithumli khuikharāna.” da mamayāthuwa.

Chiwui vang eina, Philistinewui wungnao saikorali hokhuilaga, “Israelwui Varewui oko chi chihounghaolu, kala awui pamli unghaoranu, chieina china ithum kala ithumwui mibingli masāthatmara.” da hānga. Kaja keinung katonga khangacheena nganukyikhaowa.
Varewui tandi saklak eina rāhaoda, mathila kharingbingna moksā shokserhaowa, kala keinung chiwui ringkhangā kazingram kāshunghaowa.
Kala athumna pāngmonbing eina khanong khayangbingli hokhuida, “

“Israelwui Varewui oko chi hanmihaoga jiakha khamasai eina mashiunalu, kha ali khayonchigat eina ngasoda shiunlu. Chithākha nathumwui kazāt raihaora; kala khiwui vang nathumwui eina awui pāng makhalankathuikhala kaji nathumna theira” da ngahānkai.

“Khayonchigat ithumna ali hanmiki kaji chiya khikhala?” da athumna ngahāna. “Philistine wungnao mashing athishurda, sinā eina sākakhui moksāzak phangā, kala sinā eina shiok azak phangā sākhuilu; kaja ngaraikachā kazātkashi chi nathumwuitunglila kala nathumwui wungnaobingwuitunglila razaserra;

kaja nathumli kakazā moksā ama̱, kala kashakazā shimān khangasaka shiok da sākhuilaga Israelwui Vareli tekmatei ngasaklu; chithākha nathumwuitungli, nathumwui varebingwuitunglila, nathumwui ngaleilila ana yangmilapai.
Khiwui vang Egyptnaobing kala Pharaohna wuklung khamarar thāda nathumla mararpamkhala? Ana athumli ngareo khanganao thāda sālaga naoda athumna mibingli kachiho matheimala?
Seigari kadhar akha sākhuilu, kala chi seiot maphunglakrang kaje seinao khangathān simukva̱ khanili shimen ngasaklu; kha nao khani chiya mashur ngasakalu.
Kala

Kala yanglu; awui shongfa Beth-shemesh ngaleili unghaikha, ithumli kahaka kalā shikhangasaka chi alaka; kha kalikhada chimathaakha, chieina ithumna theikhuira kaja awui pāng eina shokkhangasak maningmana, kha ithumli kalāshida rākashokna” da hānga.
Mibingna chithāda sai, kala anao khangathān sei khani khuilaga chiphunhaowa, kha anao khanile shimli narhaowa.
Kala athumna

Kala seiva̱ khani china khongmamānlaga shongfa ngatartei eina Beth-shemeshshong chanrei akhali vāhaowa; uishongla yāshongla mangareithuimana kala Philistinewui wungnaobingna Beth-shemeshwui thari eina tangda shurvai.
Chitharan Beth-shemeshwui mibing chi tampākli athumwui kehu hātsai; kala athumna yangvāda
Seigari chi Beth-shemeshpa Joshuawui luili angasāmhaowa. Ngalung kahakva akha leisai, athumna seigari thing chi kazerlaga simukva̱ khani chi
Kala Levinaobingna
Kala Philistinewui wungnao phangā china chi theilaga, chithang Ekronli hanunghaowa.
kala sināwui shiok chi, Philistine wungnao phangā chiwui athishurda keinungbing kala raipan sakahaiya keinung, phākho makasā kha̱ kachiva̱ akharip mashing peida sākhui.
Kala athumna
Chieina Beth-shemeshwui mibingna, “Kathara
Chieina athumna Kiriath-jearimli khaleibingli, “Philistinenaobingna
Kiriath-jearimli oko chi haithang eina, atam kasāngkha thuihairasai, kum maga̱ sha̱kha, kala Israelwui shimkhur saikorana
Chieina Samuelna Israelwui shimkhur saikorali hānga, “Kalikhada nathumna
Chiwui vang Israelnaobingna Baal kala Ashtaroth chi horhaida
Chiwui thili Samuelna, “Nathum saikora Mizpahli rākaziplu, kala nathumwui vang
Chiwui vang athumna Mizpahli akazipsera kala tara̱ asoklaga
Chitharan Israelwui mibing Mizpahli kazipta lei kaji kashā eina, Philistinewui wungnaobingna ngasung khavai kai, kala Israelwui mibingna chi kashā eina athum Philistinenaobingli ngacheehaowa.
Kala Israelwui mibingna Samuelli hānga, “Philistinenaobingwui eina kanmi khavai ithumwui Vare
Chieina Samuelna ana̱ khamanga yaonao akha khuilaga
Samuelna rikkatā kachigat pha̱da leilakha, Philistinenaobingna rai ngarar khavai ranganaimamānhaowa; kha chithanga,
Chieina Israelwui mibingna Mizpahwui eina Philistinenaobingli Beth-car eina tangda kharomvai, kala athum kachungkhali sāthata.
Chiwui thili Samuelna ngalung akha khuida Mizpah eina Jeshanahwui ngachaili shuna, kala chiwui aming Ebenezer phokmi; kaja “Hi eina tangda
Chiwui vang Philistinenaobingwuitungli munghaoda Israel leiretli marāzangluithuwa. Kala Samuel ringlakha eina tangda

Philistinenaobingna Israelwui eina ngapaikakhuiya keinungbing, Ekron eina thuilaga Gath vāshungda; Israelnaobingli hanmihaowa; kala Israelna Philistinenaobingwui eina athumwui leiret ngapaikhuiluishita. Israel eina Amornaobingla chingrihaowa.
Samuelna awui mirin peida Israelli bichar sāmi.
Ana kum kachida, Bethel, Gilead, kala Mizpah apam hibingli kuizatta Israelli bichar sāmi.
Chiwui thili ana Ramahli unghaowa, kaja awui shim chili lei; kala chilila Israelli mashun eina nganaomi. Apam chili ana
Samuel sarkahai eina, ana awui naomayarabingli Israelli bichar sāngasaka.
Naomayara pharākharewui ming Joel hoi kala kakhanewui ming Abijah hoi; Beer-shebali anina bicharsame sāsai.
Chithālala anina avāva̱wui kasā thāda masāmana, kha aniwui kānnā khavai khaleishong ngareithuihaowa; kaja anina pheisā zālaga bichar mashun ngui ngasakhaowa.
Chieina Israelwui khararnaobing saikorana kazipkhuilaga Ramahli vāda Samuelli samphanga,
kala ali hānga, “Yanglu, na sarhaira kala nanaomayara khanina nawui thi mashurmana; chiwui vang eina yur khangateiwui thāda ara ithumli mungkhavai awunga akha kapangsang milu.”
Kha, “Ithumli mungkhavai awunga akha phasang milu” kaji kashā eina, Samuel maringphāthuwa. Chieina Samuelna
Kala

Athumna ili kasāsā khavāvā saikorawui athishurda, ina athumli Egyptwui eina thānshokthang eina thuida aja rāshungda, ili horhailaga khangatei varebingli otram khangatha̱ chithāda, nalila athumna chithāda sāda lei.
Chieina ara athumwui kahāng chi nganāhaolu; kala athumli mungki kaje awungana sāki kaji apongbing chi athumli hāngchitheilu.”
Chieina Samuelna ali awunga rākapobing chili
Ana hānga, “Nathumwuitungli khamunga awunga china hithāda sāra: ana nanaomayarabingli khuira kala awui siguigari kala sigui katonga raimi sāngasakra, kala kaikhali awui siguigari mangāli zatngasakra;
akhalattawui vang thingthingwui kathāna, hangphangāngāwui kathāna kapangsangra; kala kaikhali awui lui ot sāngasakta mā hātngasakra; ngayarda raiwui zeighai-ngahā kala siguigariwui otyur semngasakra.
Ana nanao ngalāva̱bingli, thao neokhamiva̱, hamkahang, kala khamui kasā ot sākhavai khuira.
Ana nathumwui eina mathāmeikap kaji luila, yāmguila, olive yāmguila, khuida awui raobingli mira.
Ana nathumwui eina theishirai khum tharāwui akha, luivāt saikorawui einala ana khuilaga awui otva̱bingli kala araobingli mira.
Ana nathumwui rao mayarnaobing kala rao sha̱naobing, mathāmeikap kajebing khuihaora kala mathameikap kaje nawui sei, gadhā awui ot sākhavai khuihaora.
Ana nathumwui yao ashangva̱wui khum tharāwui akha khuira, kala nathum awui raonao sāra.
Kala chithang nathum khalattana kapangkakhui awungawui vang eina nathumna chapngachāra; kha chithang nathumli
Kha mibingna Samuelwui tui makhuisangngaithuwa, kala athumna hānga, “Masāpaimara! kha ithumwuitungli awunga leiphalungra,
kaja, ithumla yur kateibingwui thāda awunga leida ana ithumli mungra kala ithumwui rai kasāli ana mangāli thānda ngararra” da hānga.
Kala mibingwui tui saikora chi shālaga Samuelna
Kala
Benjaminwui mi akha aming Kish hoda leisai, Benjamin shimkhurwui Aphiahwui naomayara, Bekorathwui naomayara, Zerorwui naomayara, Abielwui naomayarana; kashānga mina.
Awui naomayara Saul hoda yarkhoka akha leisai. Israelwui alungli ali mayar mathākhamei khipākha maleisāmana; mibingli ana ayartui eina thuida juimeisera.
Chitharan Saulshāvā Kishwui gadhābing shimānhaowa. Chieina Kishna anaomayara Saulli hānga, “Rao akha thānphungda gadhābing chi phāvālu.”

Kala anina Ephraimwui kaphungram kānvai kala Shalishah ngalei kanvādala phāvāya, kha masamphangthuwa. Anina Shaalim ngalei eina tangda phāvai, kha chilila maleisāthuwa. Chiwui thili anina Benjaminwui ngaleilila phāvāsera, kha masamphangthuwa.
Anina Zuph ngaleili vākashung eina Saulna ali khangaso raopa chili hānga, “Ralu, ini hanunghaosa, maningakha gadhābingli hailaklaga iniwui vang ishāvāna wukkhananghaora.”
Kha ana ngahānkai, “Yanglu, keinung hili mibingna khayākashe Varewui mi akha lei; ana kahahāng mashungsera. Ini ali angahānyangsa, ini kachishong vaakha phārakhala kaji ana hā ngmishaplapai.”
Saulna awui rao chili hānga, “Kha inina vaakha khi khuivāmira? Iniwui khamuila kānhaira, Varewui mi chili khi vāmira? Iniwui khi leili?”
Rao china Saulli ngahānkāluishitta hānga, “Iwui pāngli lupāsā shekel akha khuiphungda lei; hi Varewui mi chili amilaga iniwui shongfa hāngmi ngasaksa.”
(Khareli Israelwui alungli mi akhana Varewui tui ngahānkhuiga jiakha, ana, “Rālu, ithum khanongli vausa” da hānga; kaja aruihon marānbing da kaho hi khareli khanong hosai).
Kala Saulna awui raoli, “Phālakhaira, khanongli vausa,” da hānga. Chieina anina Varewui mi khaleipam keinung chili vai.
Anina keinungli vākida kaphung kakā eina tara̱ katā ngalānao kachungkha samphangda, “Khanongpa chi hili leila?” da athumli ngahāna.
Athumna, “Lei; yanglu, naniwui mangāchangli kāhaira, thākmeilu; aruichang keinung hili kharāna, kaja aja mibingna hanphutli pha̱phayā khavai lei.

Ana phazā khavai kaphung kajuili makāranglakha, nanina keinung lungli zangkhaleoda ali samphanghaora; kaja pha̱kaphayā hili ana somiki jihaoda, ana masomiranglakha khipākha mazāmara; chiwui thili horākahaibing saikora zānaora. Kaulu, samphangngalanghaora” da athumna hāngmi.
Chieina anina keinung chili vai. Anina keinungli kazang eina Samuelna kaphung kajuili kākhavai aniwuishong shokkharā anina thei.
Chitharan Saul marāranglakha ayā kathā

“Akhama, atam hitharan, Benjamin ramwui eina ina mi akha chihorāra. Iwui Israel yurwui awunga sākhavai ali thao neomilu. Philistinenaobingwui pāng eina ana iwui yurbingli kanmira, kaja iwui yurbingwui kachotkachāng ina theihaira, khikhalajila athumwui khangakaokhon ili rāshunghaira.”
Samuelna Saulli kathei eina,
Chieina Saulna Samuelli ngaveipamli angarokta, “Khanongpawui shim kali leikhala hāngmilu” da ngahāna.

Samuelna Saulli ngahānkāda hānga, “Khanong chi ina; ili kajuipam chili ngasokālu; kaja aja na ili kāphazāngarumra; laga ngathorma ina nali shiunaora, kala nawui ningli kaphaning saikora chi ina hāngmira.
Nawui gadhābing shimānda kathumthang kahai chiwui vang wukmakhanangalu, kaja chibing chi samphanghaira. Israelna kahaomeikap kaji chi khipakhala? Chi na eina navāwui shimkhur maningmala?”

Saulna, “I Israelli teomeikap kaje Benjamin shangwui eina maningmala? Kala ishi shimkhur Benjamin shangwui shimkhurbingli nemmeikap kaje maningmala? Chithakha kathāda nana ili hikathā tui hāngpairakhala?” da ngahānkai.
Chieina Samuelna Saul eina awui raoli shimlungli thānzangda, athum kharā mi thumra sha̱khawui mangāshong chipama.
Kala Samuelna hamkahangali, “Ina, ‘Ngateida haisalu’ kaji yar chi khuirālu,” da kasoi.

Chieina hamkahanga china aphei eina asai chi Saulwui mangāli haimi; kala Samuelna hānga, “Yanglu, yar sākahai chi nawui mangāli rungmihaira, zālu; khikhalajila retmi kahai atam chi maungshungranglakha eina tangda nawui vang yar sakahaina yaruili zāngarumlu.”
Chithāda chithang Saulna Samuelli phazāngaruma.
Athumna kaphung kajuiwui eina keinungli katā tharan, shimtungli Saulwui vang pet sāmihaisāda ana chili pikhui.
Chiwui thili kazing kathang eina Samuelna Saulli shimtungli kāmathota, “Thuilu, ara ina nali shiunhaora.” Chieina Saulna ngakarthuida ani shongfali ngasovai.
Athumna zatmamānda keinung ayar vākashung eina Samuelna Saulli hānga, “Raopāli inili rida zathaolu da hānglu, kala a rithui kahai eina kasha̱kha hili nganinglu, ina nali Varewui tui hāngmira.”
Chiwui thili Samuelna thaokhong akha khuishoklaga Saulwui akuili chi heirora, kala ali maya̱khuida hānga, “Awui yur Israelwui wungnao sākhavai
