Aja nana iwui eina thuida Benjamin ngaleiwui Zelzahli, Rachelwui chikhur ngalemli mi khani samphangra kala anina nali hāngra, nana phākhavā gadhābing chiya samphanghaida phāhaira, kala navāna nawui vang ning kharikta ‘Inaowui vang I khisausikhala’ da hāngra.

Chiwui eina nana ungmeilaga Tabor shirimthing pheili, Vareli samphang khavai Bethelli vāki kaji mi kathum nali samphangra; athum akhana yaonao kathum phung, akhana khamuitang kathum, akhapāna drakhāra̱ sangkhavai khao phung jira.
Kala athumna nali mathānthup eina samphangda khamuitang khani mida nana athumwui pāng eina khuira.

Chiwui thili nana Gibeath-elohimli, Philistine raimi khalei pamli ungshungra; kala nana chiwui keinung chili ungkazang eina marān kachungkha kajuipamwui eina harp, tambourine, sipa, lyre singda shokki kaji tui hāngmikasā vātheira.
Chiwui thili
Chieina machutkakhui saikora hi nali samphang kahaiwui thili nana sāki kaji ot chi sālu, kaja Varena nali ngasomida lei.

Kala nana ili rida Gilgalli tāra, kala yanglu, rikkatā kachigat kala ningyatchigat pha̱phayā khavai ina nali chili tāngarokra. Kala nana saki kaji chi tāhāng khavai ina matāranglakha na shinithang ngaraisālu.”
Ana Samuelwui eina zatthuikhaleoda Varena khangatei ning akha sangmi, kala machutkhui khavai saikora chi chithang rāshokserhaowa.
Anina Gibe-ahli ungkashung tharan, ali marān kachungkha samphanga; kala awuitungli Varewui manglā zangmida ala phongkhami tui matuiya.
Kala ali theikhamasuibingna, ana marānbingli ngasoda khamarān chi theilaga akha eina akha hāngngaroka, “Kishwui nao kathākahaikhala? Saulla marān akhala?”
Kala chiwui mi akhana ngahānkai, “Avāva̱ khipākhala?” Chieina chānjam hithāda sai, “Saulla marān akhala?”
Ana marānmi kahaiwui thili, ana kajui pamli kāhaowa.
Saul eina awui raoli avāgatona hānga, “Nani kali vākhala?” Chieina ana hānga, “Gadha phākhavāna; laga masamphangthuda, inina Samuelli angahāna.”
Ana, “Ili hānglu, Samuelna nali khi hāngmikhala?” da hānga.
Kala Saulna avāgatoli hānga, “Ana Gadhābing chi samphanghaira, da shenglak eina hāngmi.” Kha ana wungramwui pongli Samuelna kahahāng akhala mahāngmana.
Chitharan Samuelna Mizpahli mi saikora
kala ana Israelwui mibingli hānga, “Israelwui

Kha, kakhanang kachotwui eina, sipkasāwui eina huikhame nathumwui Vareli ara mamayāla, ‘Ngga! ithumwuitungli awunga sangmilu’ da hānga. Chiwui vang eina ara nathum shang-shang kala thingthing eina kaziplaga
Chieina Samuelna Israel shang saikora khuirai, kala Benjamin shangli kalā yangda kapangkhui.

Ana Benjamin shangli hokhuilaga shimkhur shimkhur eina kalā yangda Matri shimkhurli kapangkhui; naolak eina Matri shim mipha̱ eina kalā yangda Kishwui naomayara Saulli kapangkhuihaowa. Kha athumna ali kaphā chitharan a maleisāthuwa.
Chieina athumna
Chieina athumna totot ali chili aphākhui; kala mibingwui alungli ungkhanganing eina mibingli ana yartui eina thuida juimeiserhaowa.
Kala Samuelna mibing saikorali hānga, “
Chiwui thili Samuelna awungawui mashun kala awunga akhawui sarān-varān chi mibingli hāngmi; kala chi ana lairikli kapikhuida
Saulla aram Gibe-ahli unghaowa, kala Varena ningli sāzamida rai kapingbingla ali ngasounga.
Kha akachang makhaninga mi kaikhana, “Mipa hina ithumli kathāda kanmishaprakhala?” Kala athumna ali ningkachaida khikhala makhuivāmimana. Chithālala Saulna sakta makhuimana.
Chiwui thili Ammonwui Nahashna Jabesh-gileadli shanglaga kuinamhaowa; chieina Jabeshwui mi saikorana Nahashli, “Mayākhangarok akha leisa, laga ithumna nali otram ngatha̱ra” da hānga.
Kha Ammonwui Nahashna, “Israel saikora maishi khavai, ina nathumwui yāmik latshokmiserhaora, nathumna chi mayaakha mayākhangarok chi sāsa” jihaowa.

Jabeshwui khararnaobingna ali, “Ithumli shinithang ngaraimilu, hiwui alungli Israelwui leiret saikorali vāshungda pao mivāga. Chiwui thili, kalikhada ithumli khipānakha makanmirarakha, ithum nathumli hamsanghaora” da hānga.
Paomebing china Saulwui kha̱ Gibe-ah vāshungda akahāng tharan aramnaobing saikora chaphaowa.
Chitharan Saulna awui seivābing chi homda lui eina ungrāsai; kala Saulna, “Mibing chili khi kachot samphanghaoda chapser kajikhala?” da ngahāna. Chieina athumna ali Jabesh mibingwui pao chi hānga.
Kala ana tuibing chi kashā eina Varewui manglā Saulwuitungli panglāk eina rāzangda a malungvātshunhaowa.

Ana seiot ngasin khavai mukkā khani chi sathatta marimrim sālaga chi Israelwui leiret saikorali paomebing eina ngasoda chihovāda, “Saul eina Samuelwui thi makashura mi chiwui sha̱keili hithāda sāmira” da hānga. Chieina
Bezekli ana kazipkakhui tharan Israelwui mi lakh kathum kala Judahwui mi thingthumrā kāshunga.

Kala athumna chili kharā paomebing chili hānga, “Jabesh-gileadwui mibingli hithāda unghānglu: ‘Akhama zingyorshun atamli nathumli rākanmira’ jilu.” Paomebingna chi ungkahāng eina Jabeshwui mibing mathānlakhaowa.
Chiwui vang Jabeshwui mibingna, “Akhama ithum hamsanghaora, kala nathumna nathumwui vang kaphā chi sālu.” da hānghaowa.

Kala akhama kathā Saulna awui raimi khum kathum sālaga ngathorshong Ammonbingwui rāmrah alungli angarara, kala chithang ngashun kasā atam eina tangda sāthata, kala makathebingla kachāyām eina yāmda akha eina akha mangasomana.
Chieina mibingna Samuelli, “Khipalongkhala, ‘Saulna ithumli mungrala?’ da kahāngbing chi. Athumli khuirālu, sāthathaora” da hānga.
Kha Saulna, “Aja zimik
Chiwui thili Samuelna mibingli hānga, “Rālu, ithum Gilgalli ungusa, kala ithumna chili wungram semkaluishitra.”
Chieina mi saikora Gilgalli vai, kala chili athumna
Kala Samuelna Israel saikorali hānga, “Yanglu, ina nathumwui kahāng saikora khuisangda nathumwuitungli awunga akha phāsangmihaira.
Ara yanglu, awungana nathumli thānda lei; Iva sarhaida kuila ngapokhaira, kala yanglu, inaomayara khanila nathumli ngasoli; kala ina nganuilakha eina thuida aja rāshungda nathumli thānrāhaira.
Arui I hili leili,
Athumna, “Nana ithumwui eina kateikazāla maleimana lah rekakharekla lah miwui pāng eina kakhuila maleimana” da ngahānkai.
Ana athumli hānga, “Iwuili khikha khayon maleilakmana da nathumna kahāng hi
Chiwui vang eina kasaikha nganinglu, chithāda nathumli kala nashāvā ngarāli kankhami otsak sami kahaia
Jacobna Egyptli khavā tharan Egyptnaobingna athumli rekhareka, chieina navāngarāna
Kha athumna athumwui Vare
Kala athumna
Chiwui vang
Kala Ammonnaobingwui awunga Nahashna nathumli rakhangarar tharan, nathumwui
Ara yanglu, nathumna pokhuida, awunga akha kapangkhuihaira, yanglu,
Nathumna
kha maningla, awui kahāng manganamada
Chiwui vang eina kasaikha nganingda nathumwui miktāli
Aruihon māhāt maningmala? Ina
Chieina Samuelna
Kala mi saikorana Samuelli hānga, “Naraobingwui vang nawui
Chieina Samuelna athumli hānga, “Mangacheealu; nathumna khayon saikora hi sāhaira, chitha-ilala
kala arema ot, nathumli katong makhalei lah kaphā makhalei otbingwui thi mashurthuihai alu, kaja athum khikha masākhavaiana.
Kaja awui hakkhamahā amingwui vang
Chili lāngda, nathumwui vang pokhami thahaida
li ngacheemalu kala ningtongda otram ngathalu; kaja phaningyanglu, nathumwui vang hiyākha kahaka ot ana sāmihaira.
Kha kalikhada nathumna makhayā ot sāchingakha, nathumla, nathumwui awungala shimānra.”
Saulna mungkaphok atamli a zingkum

Saulna Israelwui mi thingkathum kapangkhui; mi thingkhani ali ngasoda Bethel kaphungram kala Michmashli pama, kala thingkhana Jonathanli ngasoda Benjaminwui Gibe-ahli pama, kateibing chiya kachichashiwui rāmrahli chihounghaowa.
Jonathanna Gebali khalei Philistinewui raimi pamkhavai apam chi yuihaowa; kala chi Philistinenaobingna shāhaowa. Kala Saulna, “Hebrewnaobingli shāranu” da talla̱ khonga.

Kala Philistinewui shipaibingli Saulna maikashi mihaira kaji Israelnaobingna kashā tharan, kala Israelnaobingli Philistinenaobingna ningkachaihaira kaji kashā tharan, mi saikorali Gilgalli Saulli ngarum khavai ngahota.

Kala Philistinenaobingna Israelli ngarar khavai siguigari thingthumra, sigui katonga raimi thingtharuk, kala raimi shamadruwui situiyakha kazipkhui; kala Beth-avanwui zingshoshong Michmashli rairum asai.
Israelwui mibingna athumwui kasak chi theilaga (kaja mibing chili panglāk eina ngasunghaowa), mibingna akhur-akhaili, lungkhurli, lunghārpamli kala chikhurpamli, tara̱ ngarung khavaili;
lah Jordan makān khavai kānda Gilead eina Gad ngaleili yāmvāda ngathumthuihaowa. Saulva Gilgalli pamsai, kala ali khangasobing kathirririhaowa.
Samuelna retmi kahai atam athishurda Saulna shinithang ngarai; kha Samuel Gilgalli matāthuwa; kala mibingla yāmmamānhaowa.
Chieina Saulna, “Rikkatā kachigat eina ningyatchigat chi ili khuirālu” da hānga. Kala ana rikkatā kachigat chi chigata.
Ana rikkatā kachigat chi kupkhaleoda, yanglu, Samuel rārāsai; kala Saulna ali samphang khavai shokngarokta shālam sai.

“Nana khi sāhaokhala?” da Samuelna ngahāna. Kala Saulna hānga, “Mibingna iwui eina yāmmamān kahai chi ina kathei eina, kala retmi kahai zimiksho athishurda nala marāthu, kala Philistinenaobingla Michmashli rākaziphaoda,
Ina hānga, ‘Ara Philistinenaobingna Gilgalli iwuitungli rārotrali,
Chieina Samuelna Saulli hānga, “Nana mangma̱lak eina sāhaira; nali kaso kahai athishurda nawui
Kha ara nawui wungram maleiluimara;
Kala Samuelna ngakarthuida Gilgalwui eina Benjaminwui Gibe-ahli vāhaowa. Kala Saulna awui mi shānyanglaga athum shātharuk sha̱kha leisai.
Saulla naomayara Jonathanla, kala anili ngasokasābing chila Benjaminwui Gebali pamhaowa; kha Philistianaobinga Michmashli rairum sāpama.
Kala Philistinenaobingwui eina, ngarar khavai khum kathum shoka; khumkhana Shual ngaleiwui Ophrahshong,
khangatei khumna Beth-horonshong, kala khangatei khum akhapāna lamhāngshong Zeboim tampākli ngashāntap kazanga kaphungrenshong vai.
Chitharan Israel ngalei vāpeida mari kasā maleisāmana; kaja Philistinenaobingna hānga, “Hebrewnaobingna athum khalattawui vang kazei, lah raighai sākhuihaipaishina”;
kha Israelwui mi kachiva̱na kārphāng, yorpak, ngahā, kala chāngkui kathā kharākhui khavai Philistinenaobingwuili asakhui;
kala kārphāng, yorpak katha kakharāman lupāsā shekel khumkathum wuili akhum khani; kala ngahā, kala seihomthing kharākhamili lupāsā shekel khum kathumwuili akhum akha khuisai.
Chieina rai sāthang Saul eina anaomayara Jonathan maningla, anili khangasobing khipākha raighaila, kazeila masingsamana.
Kala Michmashwui makānkhavaili Philistinewui raimibingna nganingphinhaowa.
Thangkha Saulwui naomayara Jonathanna awui chāngvei phungkhame chili hānga, “Rālu, ini Philistinewui raimipam lakhashong vāsa.” Kha ana avāva̱li mahāngmana.
Saulva Migronli khalei Gibeahwui ayarshong kabotheirongwui azingli pamsai; ali ngasoda mi shātharuk sha̱kha leisai,
kala Ahitubwui naomayara Ahijah, Ichabodwui agato Phinehaswui naomayara, Eliwui naomayara,
Philistine raimipamli vazang khavai Jonathana makānki kaji shongfawui ngalemli lungkai kajui lunghār khani lei: akhavāk Bozez, kala lakhashong Seneh hoi.
Akhana atungshong Michmashwui mangāli, kala khangatei akhapāna azingshong Gebawui mangāli lei.
Kala Jonathanna awui chāngvei phungkhame yarona chili hānga, “Rālu, ini ahui marimkashoka shipaibingli ayangsa;
Chieina awui chāngvei phungkhame china, “Nawui ningna sākhangai chi sālu; yanglu, iniwui ning ngaraikacha thāda ila nali ngasozatta lei” da hānga.
Chieina Jonathana hānga, “Yanglu, athumna inili theikhavai vāmeisa.
Kalikhada athumna inili, chili ngaraisālu jiakha inina chili ngaraihaosa, inina athumwuili mavāsa.
Kha kalikhada athumna, ‘Kālu’ jiakha, inina kāra; kaja
Chieina anina Philistinewui raimipamwui eina theikhavai vai; kala Philistinenaobingna, “Yanglu, Hebrewnaobing akhurli yāmkhangayinwui eina shokrādalei” da hānga.
Kala chiwui raimibing china Jonathan eina awui chāngvei phungkhame chili vaoda “Hili kālu, ithumna ot akha hangchitheiga” da hānga. Kala Jonathanna awui chāngvei kaphungali, “Iwui thi shurlu; kaja

Chiwui thili Jonathanna apāng kala aphei zangda ngareikauwa, kala awui chāngvei phungkhame china athi shurkai. Kala athum Jonathanwui mangāli pitāhaowa kala chāngvei kaphunga china awui thishurda athumli sāthatvai;
kala Jonathan eina awui chāngvei phungkhamena sāthat khare chi, mi maga̱ sha̱khana kaja apam chi acre tangkhai ngalei kotkahaiwui alunglina.
Kala rāmrahlila, luilila, mibing saikorawui ngachailila ngacheeserhaowa; raimi pamlila kala ngararkazatabing eina tangda khangacheena kathirhaowa; neina̱ panglāk eina khanukta ngacheeshunhaowa.
Kala Benjaminwui Gibe-ahli Saulwui shantrina yangkhavā tharan, yanglu, mi sorkhangasai yongung yongkhavā thei.
Chieina Saulna ali khangasobingli, “Khipā ithumwui eina thuihaokhala, mi shānyanglu” da kasoi. Kala Athumna shānkhayang eina, yanglu, Jonathan eina awui chāngvei phungkhame maleisāthuwa.
Kala Saulna Ahijahli hānga, “Varewui oko chi hili khuirālu.” Atam chitharan Varewui oko chi Israelwui mibingli ngasozatsai.
Kala Saulna pāngmonli ngazekta leilakha, Philistinenaobingwui rāmrahli ngaunlop kahai chi pangmei khangai pangmeihaowa; kala Saulna, “Napāng khangtāhaolu” da pāngmonli hānga.
Chiwui thili Saul kala ali khangaso mibingna khokkha sāda raipamli vāhaowa; kala yanglu, maphakhuilakla raighai kasinga akha eina akha, ashi khalatta ngashātreihaida maphakhuilakthuwa.
Rida Hebrewnaobingna Philistinenaobingli ngarumkasā kala ngasoda rāmrahli khavābing chila Saul eina Jonathanli khangaso Israelbingwuili zanghaowa.
Chithāda sāda, Ephraimwui kaphungramli athum khalatta vangathum kahai Israelwui mibing chinala Philistinenaobing yāmhaira kaji kashā eina, athumla panglāk eina kharomvāda railung vāzangda angarara.
Chiwui vang chithang zimiksho

Kala Israelwui mibing chithang ningli khananglākhaowa, kaja Saulna mibingli khangashit sāda, “Ngazin marāranglakha eina tangdawui alungli iwui yangkashibingli ikhalattana athut makhuiranglakha phakazābing chi khonkashi ngasaranu” da hānghaowa. Chieina mi khipākha mamazaplakthuwa.
Kala mi saikora ngahongli unga; kala leikhurli gahā zangsai.
Mibingna ngahong chili kazang tharan, yanglu, khuira̱ chi ngaya̱sai; kha khipānakha pāng eina saza̱da khamorli masangmana; kaja mibingna khangashit chili ngacheehaowa.
Kha avāva̱na khangashit chi Jonathanna mashāthuwa; chiwui vang eina ana kasing khāmshui chieina khuihāng chi tokhuilaga shaihaowa; kala amik mathingsanghaowa.
Chieina mi akhana, “Mibingli navāna, ‘Aja phakazā mi chi khonkashi ngasaranu’ da saklak eina ngashithaida lei” da hānga. Chiwui vang mibing vānkahaina.
Chieina Jonathanna hānga, “Kakhanang saikora hi ishāvāwui einana; ina khuira̱ kateokha khamang eina imik kayākha mathingsanghairakhala?
Yangkashibingwui eina ngapaikakhui chi raimibingna zāhairasasi kaja kayākha pha̱ra; kaja arui eina tangda Philistinenaobing chungda mathimana.”
Chithang athumna Philistinenaobingli Michmash eina thuida Aijalon eina tangda sāthatvai. Kala mibing chi vānlakhaowa;
mibingna ngaponkakhui yao, seivā, seinao, shaothatlaga ashee eina ngarumda shaihaowa.
Chieina athumna Saulli vāhānga, “Yanglu, mibingna ashee eina ngarumda shaida
Kala Saulna hānga, “Mibingli ‘Kachichāwui sei, yao khuirāda hili rataithatranu, kala hili rashairanu, kala ashee eina ngarumda shaida
Kala Saulna

Chiwui thili Saulna hānga, “Aja ngayā Philistinenaobingli kharomvāda kazing mahoranglakha eina tanga ithumna mi akha eina tangda matai ngasakla tāsākazamhaosa.” Kala athumna, “Nana phāra kaji eina vairanu” da hānga. Kha pāngmon china, “Vareli ngaha̱nsa” da hānga.
Chieina Saulna Vareli, “ina Philistinenaobingwui thi kharomvārala? Kala Israelwui pāngli mahorsangmirakhala?” da ngahāna. Kha ana chithang mangahānkāmithuwa.
Kala Saulna, “Hili rāserlu, nathum mibingwui kathānabing saikora; yanglu aja morei hi kathāda shokhaokhala kaji theikhuira,” da hokhui.
“Kaja Israelli kankhame
Chieina ana Israel saikorali, “Nathum lākhavāklu, kala inaomayara Jonathan ini lākha jira” da kahāng eina, “Nana phāra kaji chieina vailu” da mibingna ngahānkai.
Chiwui vang eina Saulna hānga, “O
Chieina Saulna hānga, “inaomayara Jonathan iniwui ngachaili kalā yanglu.” Khayang eina Jonathanli tāhaowa.

Chieina Saulna Jonathanli hānga, “Ili hānglu, nana khi sāhaokhala?” Kala Jonathanna “Khuira̱ ipāngli kasinga khāmshui eina ina khuilaga kateokha shaihaowa; I hili leili, ili sāthathaolu” da ngahānkai.
Kala Saulna hānga, “Nali masāthatakha Varena ili sathatranu; Jonathan! Na thiphalungra.”
Chieina mibingna Saulli hānga, “Hakmahālak eina Israelna yuikhavai sakhame Jonathan thira kajila? Chi mathapailakmara!
Chieina Saulna Philistinenaobingli makharomvāluithuwa; kala Philistinenaobingla athum kachichāwui ramli unghaowa.

Saulna Israelwui wungpam kakhui eina, ana apam kachiva̱wui eina yangkashebingli rai sāda Moabli, Ammonnaobingli, Edomli, Zobahwui awungabingli, kala Philistinenaobingli ngarara; ana khangararpam kachida ana athumli maikashi mi.
Kala ana marāklak eina ngararda Amaleknaobingli shimitmihaida Israelli ngaponkazābingwui pāng eina kankhui.
kala Saul preiva̱wui ming Ahino-am hoi, Ahima-azwui naongalāva̱na. Kala awui raithānali Abner hoi, Saulwui avāgato Nerwui naona.
Saulwui avāva̱ Kish eina Abnershāvā Nerli Abielna pharai.
Saulna ringda leilakha eina tangda, ana Philistinenaobingli rai sakchanglak eina ngararchinga; kala Saulna kachikathā kapanga lah khamarāka mi theiakha, a zazangda ngararar jiya.
Kala Samuelna Saulli hānga, “
Ashangva̱wui
Ara vāda Amalekli vāsāthathaolu; athumwui khalei saikora, sha̱nao, mayarnao, naoshinao kala ana̱ khamangbing mateila, sei, kala yao, ut, kala gadhāla akhanida mashākla sashimānmiserhaolu.”
Chieina Saulna mibingli hokhui, kala athumli Telaimli shānkhuida pheiwui raimi lakh khani, kala Judahwui eina mi thingtharā jiya.
Kala Saulna Amalekwui keinungli vāda tampākli arimpama.

Kala Saulna Kenbingli, “Thuiulu, Amalekbingwui eina ngapākthuihaolu, maningakha nathumli ina athumli ngasoda sākazamhaipaishina; kaja Israelwui mibingna Egypt eina kashok tharan nathumna lukhamashan chitheihaida lei” da hānga. Chieina Kenbing Amalekbingwui eina yāmhaowa.
Kala Saulna Havilah eina thuilaga Egyptwui zingshoshong khalei Shur vāshungda Amaleknaobingli yuihaowa.
Kala ana Amaleknaobingwui awunga Agagli kharing eina tukkhui, kala mi saikorali raighai eina sāthatserhaowa.
Kha Saul eina mibingna makānāki kaji saikora sāthatserhailaga, awunga Agag kala yao, sei, asā kaphābing chi masāthatthuwa.
“Ina Saulli awunga sākhangasak hiwui vang I wukkhananghaira; kaja ana iwui thi mashurla ngareithuihaira, kala iwui ningkhamibing mamayonmana.” Chieina Samuel malungvāthaida ana
Kala Samuelna Saulli samphang khavai ngathorthak kathui eina, Samuelli, “Saulna Carmel keinungli awui wonrā akha kāsāhailaga Gilgalli latunghaira” da hānga.
Chieina Samuelna Saulwuili vai, ani samkaphang eina Saulna Samuelli hānga, “
Chieina Samuelna hānga, “Chithākha ina shāda khalei seila, yaola kakhong chi khikhala?”
Saulna hānga, “Athumna Amalekbingwui eina khuikhaungna; kaja seila yaola khamathāthābing chi
Chieina Samuelna Saulli hānga, “Thāhaolu! Angayā
Chieina Saulna, “Hānglu,” ji.
Kala Samuelna hānga, “Nakhalattawui mikyanli na khikha maningmana da theilala, na Israel shangbingwui akhavā maningmala?
Kala
Chithākha khisāda nana awui tui manganāthu? Kala khiwui vang sakakathān otbing chi vamkhuikhala kala
“Ina
Kha mibingna ngaponkakhuibing, sei, yao khamathāthābing chi Gilgalli nawui
Yanglu, pha̱kaphayāli kahāng khanganā phamei,
kala asā kakā yaovāle awui tui khuikasang phamei.
Kaja ngakaikashi hi khanong khayang kathāna,
kala nurkhangahar hi meoma̱li khokharum kathāna.
Khikhalajila nana
“I morei sāhaira,” da Saulna ngahānkai, “
Chiwui vang eina, ili kahuimilu, ina kapona, kala
Kha Samuelna Saulli hānga, “I nali mangasoungmara; kaja nana
Chieina Samuelna ali hānga, “
Kala Israelwui Tekkhamatei chinala makapikmara lah ning khangateila maleimara, kaja a mikumo maningmana.”
Chieina Saulna hānga, “Ina morei sāhaira; chitha-ilala kathānabingwui mangāli kala Israelwui mangāli maiyā khavai ini kha-ungphalungsa, chithāda nawui
Chieina Samuelna Saulwui thi shurunga; kala Saulna
Chiwui thili Samuelna hānga, “Amalekwui awunga Agagli khuirālu.” Kala Agagna ningmathānlak eina ali rāda, “Kachangkhat eina kathiwui kachotkachāng kānthuilakhaira” da hānga.
Kala Samuelna hānga, “Nawui raighai eina preinaobingli nao malei khangasak thāda nava̱la nao manganaoranu” da hānga. Kala Gilgalli,
Chiwui thili Samuelna Ramahli vāhaowa; kala Saulla Gibeahli khalei awui shimli unghaowa.
Kala Saulwui kathi zimiksho marāshungranglakha eina tangda Samuelna Saulli masamphangluithuwa, kha Samuelna Saulwui vang wuk khananga. Kala Saulli Israelwui awunga sāngasak kahaiwui vang
Chieina Samuelna hānga, “Ina kathāda vārakhala? Kalikhada Saulna hi shaakha, ana ili sāthathaora.” Chieina
Kala pha̱kaphayā chili Jesseli hosanglu, kala nana khisamameira kaji ina hāngchitheira; kala ina aming hāngkhamipa chili nana iwui vang thao neomira.”
na kakaso athishurda Samuelna sai, kala Bethlehemli vai. Keinungwui khararnaobing china kathirriri rāsamphangda hānga, “Na chingri eina kharāla?”
Chieina ana, “Chingri eina kharāna;
Athum kharā eina, ana Eliabli yanglaga, “Kachangkhat eina
Kha
Chiwui thili Jessena Abinadabli hokhuida Samuelwui mangāli vāngasaka. Kala ana “
Chiwui thili Jessena Shammahli vāngasaka. Kala ana “
Kala Jessena anaomayarabing chili Samuelwui mangāli vāngasaksera. Kha Samuelna, “

Kala Samuelna “Nanaomayarabing hili peiserda leila?” da Jesseli ngahāna. Chieina ana, “Paisho akha leifaya, kha ava yao kahom vāhaira” da hānga. Kala Samuelna Jesseli hānga, “Ahokhuilu; kaja a maungranglakha eina tangda ithum mapamzangmara.”
Chieina mi chihovāda ali ahokhui. Asho-arep unglaka, mai hungping eina miknaola mathingrika, kala yarshova̱na.
Chieina Samuelna thaokhong chi khuida, ali achinā ngarāwui mangāli thao neomi; kala chithang eina thuida Davidli
Chitharan
Kala Saulwui raobingna ali hānga, “Yanglu, Varewui eina makaphā manglāna nali ningrāk khangasakna.
Hili khalei naraobingli, ameina tingteilā huikathei mi akha aphākhui khavai kasoranu; kala Varewui makaphā manglāna nali ningrāk khangasak atamli ana tingteilā kahui eina, na raihaora.”
Chieina Saulna awui raobingli hānga, “Tingteilā huikathei mi akha aphākhuida ali iwuili khuirālu.”
Yaronnao akhana ngahānkai, “Yanglu, Bethlehempa Jessewui nao akha tingteilā huitheilak kahai ina thei; a kapinga, raimina, chanhān unglaka, kala otsakla mathālaka kala
Chiwui vang eina Saulna Jesseli mi chihovāda, “Nanaomayara yaokahoma Davidli hili chihorāmilu” da hānga.
Chieina Jessena khamuila zang, sāhuili kathai drakhāra̱ kala yaonao akha da khuilaga gadhā akhali shaksāmi, kala anaomayara Davidli Saulwuili chihovāhaowa.
Kala Davidna vāda Saulwui otram khangatha̱li zanga. Kala Saulna ali leishilakhaowa, kala awui chāngvei phungme sāngasaka.
Chieina Saulna Jesseli, “David iwuili pamhaoranu, ina ali ngahānngailaka” da pao hāngchiphuna.
Kala Saulli Varewui eina makaphā manglā rākachida Davidna tingteilā huida ringkaphā samphang ngasaka; chithāda Saul khamathing samphanga, kala raihaida makaphā manglā chi awui eina thuihaowa.
Chitharan Philistinenaobingna rai sākhavai raimi kazipa; kala Judahwui ngalei Socohli kazipa, kala Ephes-dammimli khalei Socoh eina Azekahwui ngachaili rairui sai.
Saul kala Israelwui mibingla kazipkhui, kala Elahwui tampākli rairui sai, kala Philistinenaobingli ngarar khavai sai.
Philistinenaobingna kaphung akhali nganinga, kala Israelnaobingna akhapali nganinga, angachaili tampāk akha lei.
Philistinewui ngachaili kapanga mi akha, Gathwui Goliath kaho, awui akho feet chiko laga pāngmayā parkha kajui mi akha zangsai.
Awui kuili pithraiwui kuihon ngahona, kala khaihor kathā pithrai phahon ngavai, kala phahon chiwui kharit kg. hangphangāda shini sha̱khana.
Pithraiwui pheimakhei sanga, kala pithraiwui zeisa̱nao akha yartuili parphunga.
Kala awui zeipa̱ kapem rikhaya, kala awui zeivar chi kg. shini sha̱kha rita; kala awui chāngvei phungmena awui mangāli zata.

Ana nganingda Israelwui raimibingli vaowa, “Raiwui ngarar khavai pareng sahailaga chili khi sāpamli? I Philistinenao maningmala, kala nathum Saulwui rao maningmala? Nathumwui ngachai eina mi akha kapangkhuilu, laga ili tāngarokranu.
Ana ili ngararshapta sathathaiakha ithum nathumwui rao sāra; kha ina yuihaida ali sathathaiakha nathum ithumwui rao sāda ithumli otram ngatha̱ra.”
Kala Philistinepa china hānga, “Aja ina Israelwui raimibingli kakasir hina; nathumwui mi akha ili chihozanglu, chithāda ini ngararra.”
Saul kala Israelnao saikorala tui chi kashā tharan ning suitāhaowa kala ngacheeshunhaowa.
Chitharan David hi Judahwui Bethlehemli khalei Ephrath shimkhurwui Jesse kaho naomayarnao chishat leikasapawui naona. Saulwui atamli ava rarlakhairasai.
Jessewui nao khararra kathumva Saulwui thi shurda rai vāhairasai; athumwui aming, naochizaili Eliab, kakhaneli Abinadab, kala kakathumali Shammah hoi.
Davidna nao paishona; khararra kathumna Saulwui thi shurthuihaowa,
kha Davidva Bethlehemli avāva̱wui yao homda Saulwuili ungkhashi vākhashi da sai.
Zimiksho hangmatithangwui vang Philistinepa china ngathor ngazin rākasirchinga.
Kala Jessena anaomayara Davidli hānga, “Nameingarāwui vang māngatai shungkha, kala khamui tang tharā hi rāmrahli thākta khuivāmihaolu;
kala seina̱ makhan atang tharā hila thingkhawui akhavāli khuivāmilu. Namei ngara kathamameida leilikhala ayanglu, kala athumwui eina machut akha khuiunglu.”
Chitharan Saulla kala Israelwui mi saikorala Elah tampākli pamda Philistinenaobingli rai ngararsai.
Davidna ngathorthak thuilaga yaobing chi yao khamayonawui pāngli haimihailaga, avāva̱na kakaso athishurda kashakazā chi khuiphungda khavā eina, raimibing rai sākhavaipamli ngavaorei vāmahungsai.
Kala Israelnaobing eina Philistinenaobing raimi eina raimi ngaherlaga rai ngarar khavai yangngasunga.
Kala Davidna awui ot chi khamayonawui pāngli haimihailaga raimiwui alungli achinā ngarāli asamphanga.
Achinā ngarāli chan ngazekta leilakha, yanglu! Gathwui kapanga Goliath kaho chi Philistinebingwui eina shoklaga kharewui thāda ana shokkasira. Davidna awui kahāng chi shai.
Israelwui mi saikorana ali theilaga, awui ngalem eina yāmhaowa, kala athum ngacheekhailakhaowa.

Kala Israelwui mibingna hānga, “Shokkhanganinga mi hili na theihairala? Ana Israelwui mibingli kasir khavai kakālaka; kala ali sākathata mi chili awungana sinā lupā kachungkha mida shāng ngasakra, kala anao ngalāva̱la mira; kala ashi shimkhurli Israelwui alungli ningkhān ngasakra jihaira.”

Awui ngalemli khanganingbing chili Davidna hānga, “Israelwui eina maikashi khuithuimiki kaji Philistinepa hili sākathata chili khi sāmira jikhala? Kaja kharinga Varewui raimili kakasira ahui marimkashoka Philistinepa hi khini jikhala?”
Kala mibingna “Ali sākathata chili hāngkahai chithāda samiranu” da ngaraikacha tui chi hāngsera.

Mibingli Davidna khangazek chi ashi khararra Eliabna shālaga malungvātlakhaida Davidli hānga, “Hili khi tāsā kajikhala? Yao kateokha khalei chi lamhāngli khipāli haimihailikhala? Nawui ning chukmaja̱phāphā kaji, kala nawui wuklung makaphā ina thei; kaja na rai khangarar yangkida katāna.”
Chieina Davidna hānga, “Ina khi saluihaokhala? Khangahān māngla mangahānpai kajila?”
Kala awui eina ngareithuihaida khangateili chi tākam eina angahānlui kaji eina athumla kharewui thāda hāngserpapama.
Davidna kahāng tui chi kashā chitharan, athumna Saulli ahānga, kala ana Davidli ahokhui ngasaka.
Kala Davidna Saulli hānga, “Awui vang eina mi khipākhawui ning masuitaaranu; naraona Philistinepa chili angararra.”
Kala Saulna Davidli hānga, “Na ali mangasungrarmara; kaja nava nganuilak eina lei, ava nganuilakha eina thuida raili kazata mina.”
Kha Davidna Saulli hānga, “Naraona avāva̱wui yao homa; kala kazingkha̱ lah singomna yaoshangwui yaonao rākatuk tharan,
ina athi shurvālaga akhamorwui eina angapaikhui; kala ili makeikida saakha ina morhāli yonkhuilaga shaothata.
Narao kazingkha̱la, singomla sāthatthathuihaira, kala kharinga Varewui raimili kakasira ahui marimkashoka Philistinepa hila chithāda thira.”
Chieina Davidna hānglui, “Kazingkha̱ kala singomwui pāngmayā eina kankhame
Chieina Saulna Davidli awui sāri shaksāmi; pithraiwui kuihon akuili ngahonmi, kala khaihor kathā kachon ngavaimi.
Kala Davidna raisāri tungli raighai ngaveikhui, kha masangkasaithuda, mazatthukthuwa. Chieina Davidna Saulli, “I hieina ngasoda mazatrarmara; kaja I hikathā masangkasaimana” da hānglaga raishokhaowa.
Chieina ana awui khāmshui apāngli singkhui, kala kongrānaowui eina lunghailānao phangā hākhuilaga awui yaohomkhaoli sanghai, awui shairong apāngli singphunglaga Philistinewui mi chili vanganaiuwa.
Kala Philistinepa china, awui chāngvei phungkhamena mangā zatta Davidli vanganaiuwa.
Philistinepa china Davidli theilaga, machāpmilakthuwa; kaja Davidva, mainao hungping eina azak mathālak kahai naoshinao akhana.
Kala Philistinepa china Davidli hānga, “I fala, chiwui vang khāmshui singlaga kharāla?” Kala awui varebingli mingzailaga Davidli khonshi.
Philistinepa china Davidli hānga, “Iwuili rālu, ina naphasā yongkazat vānaoli kala ramsāli chishaira.”
Chieina Davidna Philistinepa chili hānga, “Nana raighai kazei kala zeisa̱nao singlaga rai, kha iva nana kakasira saikorawui

na aja nali iwui pāngli horsangmida ina nali ngaphitsangra, kala nakui rangra; kala aja Philistinewui raimi ashangva̱wui angun yongkazata vānao kala ramsāli chishaida, Israellungli Vare lei kaji okathuili khalei saikorana theira,
kala hili kazipta khaleibingna,
Philistinepa china ngakarthuida Davidli nganaimamān kaji eina, Davidna totot ngarar khavaipamli angaroka.

Kala Davidna awui khaoli pāng khamāsangda chiwui eina lunghaila akha khuishokta shairong chieina kakāp eina Philistinepa chiwui khaveili atheira̱ chi ngaphumhaowa, kala a ngakhumshām eina ngaleili pisanghaowa.
Chithāda Philistinepa chili Davidna shairong kala lunghailānao akha eina yuihaowa; David raighaila makhuiphungmana.
Chieina Davidna yongvālaga Philistinepa chiwuitungli kānganingda awui raighai sutkhui; kala chieina akui rangkhui. Philistinenaobingna athumwui raikapinga thikahai chi kathei eina athum yāmserhaowa.

Kala Israel eina Judahwui mibingna athumli Gath vāshungda, kala Ekronwui ngavei vāshungda kharomvai; kala Sha-araim eina thuida Gath kala Ekron vāshungda kharomvāda Philistinenaobing kachungkha sāthathaowa.
Kala Israelnaobingna kakharomwui eina latungda Philistinenaobingwui thongthāng ungngapona.
Kala Davidna Philistinepawui kui Jerusalemli khuiunga, kha ana awui raisāri awui kachonshimli haihaowa.
Davidna Philistineli ngararkida khavā chitharan, Saulna ali theida awui raimi akhavā Abnerli hānga, “Abner, naoshinaopā hi khipāshinaokhala?” Abnerna, “Kathākhala, I matheimana” da hānga,
Kala awungana hānga, “Naoshinaopā hi khipashinaokhala da ngathingkhuilu.”
Kala Davidna Philistinepali sāthathailaga hankhaung eina, Abnerna ali hokhuida, Philistinepawui kui chi chichanglaga awungawuili thānvai.
Kala Saulna, “Yaronnao, na khipashinao mayarakhala?” da ngahāna. Kala Davidna, “Bethlehemli khalei narao Jessewui naomayarana” da ngahānkai.
Ana Saulli ngazekkup kahai eina Jonathanwui ning Davidli shāptithaowa, kala Jonathanna akhalatta leikashi thāda Davidli leishihaowa.
Kala chithang Saulna awui shimli thanunglaga avāva̱wui shimli malatung ngasakthuwa.
Chieina Jonathanna Davidli tuingashit akha sai; khikhalajila akhalatta leikashi thāda Davidli leishihaowa.
Kala Jonathanna awui sāri raikhuilaga Davidli ngavaimi, kala awui raisāri, raighai, malā, kala awui shānneira̱ Davidli miserhaowa.
Kala Saulna kachiho apam kachiva̱li Davidna yuichinga; chiwui vang Saulna ali raimiwuitungli yangkhavai haimi. Kala hi mi saikora kala Saulwui raobingwui mikyanli phālakhaowa.

Davidna Philistinenaobingli sāthathaida shimli hankhaung tharan, Israelwui keinung saikorawui eina sha̱naobingna, laa kala pheichak sāda Saul awungali vāsamphangkida timbrel singda, kala tingteilābing singda ringkaphāwui laa saphungda shoka.
Kala mathānda sha̱naobing china akha eina akha laa sāngaroka,
“Saulna awui thingkhali shaothata,
kala Davidna thingtharāli shaothata.”

Athumwui khavaokhon chi shālaga Saul malungvātlakhaowa, kala ana hānga, “Athumna Davidli thingtharā da masochikata, ile thingkha da somaya; hiya awunga ngalei eina tangda ali mikahai kathā maningmala?”
Kala chithang eina thuida Saulna Davidli yangphokhaowa.
Kala akhama kathā, Davidna thangkachida kahui thāda, ana tingteilā huida leilakha, Varewui eina makaphā manglā Saulli rāzanga, kala ana awui shimli kapumpama. Saulna awui kazei apāngli hai;
kala Saulna “Ina Davidli phākholi pharshānhaora” da machukta kazei chi phara. Kha khanishida Davidna ngarakkhuihaowa.
Davidli Varena ngasomi, kha ale mangasomithuda Saulna Davidli ngacheehaowa.
Chiwui vang eina awui ngalemli mahaila thingkhawui akhavā sāngasakta athumli thānzata.
Kala
Kala awui khayuia otsak kachiva̱ theilaga, Saulna ali matakhak eina yanga.
Kha Israel eina Judahwui mi saikorana Davidli leishi; kaja ana athumli ngasoda thanung-thanvā sai.
Saulna Davidli hānga, “Inao ngalāva̱ kharara, Merab leili; ali napreiva̱ sākhavai ina mira; iwui vang marākta kala pingda
Chieina Davidna Saulli hānga, “I khipānida, kala iwui theisā khipāda, Israelwui alungli ishāvāwui shimkhurli ina awungawui arihā sāpairakhala?”
Kha Saulwui naongalāva̱ Merab Davidli miki kaji chi, Meholathwui Adrielli apreiva̱ sākhavai mihaowa.
Chitharan Saulwui naongalāva̱ Michalna Davidli leishiya; kala athumna chi Saulli hānga, kala china ali ningyāng ungngasaka.
Saulna phaninga, “Inao ngalāva̱ hina khalen ngasā khavai Davidli mira, chithāda Philistinenaobingwui pāngna ali sāthatra.” Chiwui vang eina Saulna Davidli, “Ara na irihā sāra.” da hāngluishita
Kala Saulna awui raobingli, “Davidli ngathumda hithāda hānglu, ‘Yanglu, awungana nali ningyāng unglaka, kala awui mibingnala nali leishisera; chieina awungawui arihā sālu’ jilu.”
Chithāda Saulwui raobingna Davidli ahānga. Kha Davidna hānga, “Mishānli makazanga kachāma I kathāna, awungawui arihā saki kaji hi nathumna kateowa otna da khuila?”
Chieina Saulwui raobing china, “Davidna hithāda hangli,” da ali unghānga.

Chieina Saulna hānga, “Davidli nathumna hithāda ahānglu, awungana manho maningchāngmana, kha awui yangkashe Philistinenaobingli awungawui athut khuimida atonhui shākha akhuimilu.” Davidna Philistinenaobingwui pāngli thikhavai Saulna hi khangarānna.
Kala raobing china pao hi Davidli akahāng eina, china ali ningyāng ungngasakhaoda Davidla awungawui arihā sangaihaowa. Hāngkahai atam chi makānranglakha,

Davidna ngakarthuida, awui mi thānphunglaga Philistine mi shākhani ashaothathaowa; kala arihā sākhavai athumwui atonhui chi awungali khuiungmi. Chieina Saulna anao ngalāva̱ Michal apreiva̱ sākhavai mihaowa.
Kha Davidli
Saulna ngacheekhangai ngacheeya. Chiwui vang Saul Davidwui yangkashe ngasachinghaowa.
Chiwui thili Philistinewui wungnaobingna rai rāsai; kala rākhangarar kachiva̱li, Davidna Saulwui rao saikorali maiyāmeikapa. Chithāda awui ming khayākālakhaowa.
Kala Davidli sāthatphalungra da Saulna anaomayara Jonathan, kala awui rao saikorali hānga. Kha Saulwui naomayara Jonathanna Davidli leishilāka.
Chieina Jonathanna Davidli hānga, “Ishāvā Saulna nali sāthat khavai ngarānda lei; chiwui vang eina ngathorshong na ning ngasharda apam akhali yāmngathumhaolu;
kala nawui leikasapam ngalem chili ina ishāvāli chan shokngazekra; kala kalikhada ina theikakhui leiakha chi nali hāngnaoga.”

Kala Jonathanna avāva̱ Saulli Davidwui pongli mathālak eina hāngmi, kala hithāda hānga, “Awungana Davidwuitungli morei masāranu; khikhalajila ana nawuitungli khikha khayon masāhailakmana; kaja awui otsakna nawui vang khamathā sheba ngasāhaira;
kaja amanglā hamlaga Philistinenaopa chili ana sāthathaira, kala Israel saikorawui vang
Chieina Saulna Jonathanwui tui khuida khangashit sai, “Ali masāthatlakmara kaji hi
Kala Jonathanna Davidli hokhuida saikora chi hāngsera. Kala Jonathanna Davidli Saulwui mangāli thānungda kharewui thāda ali ungngasopama.
Kala rai shokluida Davidna thānlaga vāngarara, kala Philistinenaobing kachungkha sāthathaowa, chithāda sāda athum yāmserhaowa.
Chiwui thili Davidna lyre huida leilakha; Saulna kazei singda shimli pamsai, kala awuitungli
Kala Saulna Davidli phākholi pharshān khavai sai, kha ana Saulwui eina ngarakkhuihaida kazei phākholi nganarshanhaowa. Chieina David ngathishokta yāmchangthuihaowa.

Ngathorshong sāthat khavai chithang ngayā Saulna awui paomebingli chihoda Davidshi shimli arimpam ngasaka. Kha Davidli apreiva̱ Michalna, “Aja ngayā na mayāmhaiakha, akhama nali sāthathenhaora” da hānga.
Chiwui vang Michalna Davidli charfa eina chihotada ana yāmshokhaowa.
Michalna mimān
Kala Saulna paomebing Davidli akhui khavai mi chihokhavā tharan Michalna, “Ava kazāda lei” jihaowa.
Chieina Saulna paomebing chili Davidli ayang khavai hānga, “Pet eina ngazonrālu, chieina ina ali sāthatra.”
Kala paomebing china akhayang tharan yanglu, mimān chipethailaga chiwui kuili mesamwui khumkui haimihaisai.
Saulna Michalli, “Khisāda nana ili hithāda kapikta iwui yangkasheli yāmngasakhaokhala?” da hānga. Chieina Michalna Saulli ngahānkai, “Ana ili ‘I thuihaoga; ina khisāda nali sāthatrakhala?’ da hānga.”
Chitharan Davidna yāmda Ramahli Samuelli asamphanga, kala Saulna ali sākahai saikora ali ahāngsera. Kala Samuel ani Naiothli apamhaowa.
Kala “David Ramah ngaleiwui Naiothli pamda lei” kaji Saulli hānghaowa.
Chieina Saulna Davidli akhui khavai paomebing chihovai; kala marānbingli Samuelna thānda marān kasā chi athumna athei, kala paomebing chilila Varewui manglā zanghaida athumla marānphokuwa.
Chi Saulli kahāng eina, Saulna khangatei paomebing chiholui; kala athumla marānkhami chili azanghaowa. Kala Saulna paomebing kathum shida chihovai, kala athumla marānkhamili azanghaowa.

Chieina Saulna akhalatta Ramahli vai, kala Seculi khalei ra̱khong kahaka chili vākashung eina; “Samuel eina David kali leilikhala?” da angahāna. Chieina mi akhana hānga, “Yanglu athum Ramahwui Naiothli leidalei.”
Chieina ana chiwui eina Ramahwui Naiothli phāvai; kala alila Varewui manglā zanghaida, Ramahwui Naioth mavāshungranglakha eina tangda ala marānmamānda vai.
Kala ala awui kashankachon raiserhaida, khamahong eina Samuelwui mangāli chithang ngashun ngayā peida marānkhamili zanga. Chiwui vang eina, “Saulla marān akhala?” da chānjam sai.
Chieina Davidna Ramahli khalei Naiothwui eina yāmlaga Jonathanli ungngahāna, “Ina khi sāhaokhala? Iwui khi khayon lei? Kala navāwui mangāli khi morei sahaoda ili sāthat khavai khangarānkhala?”
Kala ana ali hānga, “Khikha maleilakmana! Na mathilakmara. Yanglu, ishāvāna ili mahāngla kateola lah khareila masāmana; kala ishāvāna khiwui vang hi ili ngathumrakhala? Chi mamashungmana.”
Kha Davidna ngahānkai, “Nana ili leikashi navāna mathālak eina thei; chiwui vang eina, ‘Na wukkhananghaipaishina’ da makahāngra. Kha
Chieina Jonathanna Davidli hānga, “Nana kahahāng chi ina sāra.”
Davidna Jonathanli hānga, “Yanglu, akhama changwokna, kala ina mashoila awungali tableli phazāngarumki kaji zimikshona; kha kakathumathang ngazin eina tangda luili ayāmngathum khavai ili khamayāmilu.
Kalikhada navāna ili phaakha ‘Davidna aram keinung Bethlehemli ungkhavai ili saklak eina pohaowa; kaja shimkhur saikorawui kumkumwui pha̱kaphayā leihaowa’ da hāngmilu.
Laga ana ‘Phai!’ jiakha narao iwui vang phāhaira, kha kalikhada ana malungvāthaiakha, theilu kaja ana makaphā ngarānhaira.

Chiwui vang naraoli lumashanda phaningmilu, kaja narao iniwui khathara tuingashit makaikapai sāhaira. Kha iwui khayon leiakha ili nakhalattana sāthathaolu, kaja khiwui vang navāwui pāngli ili nana horsangmisānikhala?”
Kha Jonathanna hānga, “Maninglakmana! Kalikhada ishāvāna nawuitungli makaphā sākhavai khangarān ina theisi kaja, ina nali mahāngmarala?”
Chieina Davidna Jonathanli hānga, “Kalikhada navāna nali thurda ngahānkākha ili khipāna hāngmira?”
Kala Jonathanna Davidli hānga, “Ralu, ini luishong vāusa.” Chieina anina luishong vai.
Kala Jonathanna Davidli hānga, “Israelwui Vare
Kala nali ishāvāna makaphā sākida leisāda ina kalikhada nali yāmkhavai marāhāngakha, Jonathan, ili
Kalikhada I mathila ringsaakha, okpei khavai
kala nawui ningkatong leikashi chi iwui shimkhurwui eina makatathaialu,
Jonathanwui ming Davidwui shimkhur eina makatatmihairanu. Kala Davidwui yangkashebingli
Kala Jonathanna akhalatta leikashi thāda Davidli leishihaoda; Davidli awui leikashi chi eina khangashit sāngasaka.
Chiwui thili Jonathanna hānga, “Akhama chāngwokna; na maraakha nawui pam masaihaora.
Kala kakathumathangla na makharā thatheihaora, chieina lungkhor ngalem lākhavāk, khare kachāng nana leikasā lungkhorpam
Kala chiwui ngalemli ina pānkatam thāda malā kāpta kathum shira.
Kala yanglu, ina yaronnao chili, ‘Malāthingbing chi aphākhuilu’ da hāngra. Kala ina ali, ‘Yanglu, malāthingbing chi nawui hishong lei, chibing chi khuilu’ jiakha shoklu, kaja
Kha ina yaronnao chili, ‘Yanglu, malāthingbing chi nali vāmeida lei’ jiakha zatulu; kaja nali
Kha inina ngazek kahai hiwui pongle yanglu, iniwui ngachaili
Chiwui vang Davidna luili yāmngathumhaowa; kala chāngwokthang awungana phazā khavai pama.
Awungana khangachā thāda awui pam phākhoshong pama; Jonathanna kāroda pama, kala Abnerna Saulwui ngalemli pama, kha Davidwui pam masaihaowa.
Chithālala chithang Saulna khikha mahānglakmana, kaja “Khikha shokhao-aili, khangarang kathā leihao-aili” da phaninga.

Kha akhama kathā, chāngwok kakhanethangla Davidwui pam masailuihaowa. Chieina Saulna anaomayara Jonathanli, “Kachiwui vang eina Jessewui naomayara David phakazāli ayāla ajala makharākhala?” da ngahāna.
Jonathanna Saulli ngahānkai, “Davidna Bethlehemli ungkhavai ili saklak eina chihomilu da poi,

ana hānga, ‘Ili kazatngasakmilu; kaja iram keinungli ishi shimkhurwui pha̱kaphayā ot kasāli ili ungzanglu da ishāmeina kasohaida lei. Chieina nana mayāmiakha ichināngarāli khaungyangga’ da hānga. Hiwui vang eina a phakazāli makharāna.”

Chieina Saulna Jonathanli malungvāthaida ali hānga, “Makhamashungva̱, ngakaikashe sha̱naowui nao na, nakhalatta maishi khavai, kala navāli khayāmalā khavai Jessewui naoli kapangkakhuina kaji ina matheimara da kaphaningla?
Jessewui nao okathuili ringlakha eina tangda, nala nawui wungramla reikasang mavaimara. Chiwui vang ali aphākhuimilu, ali sāthatphalungra.”
Chieina Jonathana avāva̱ Saulli ngahānkai, “Khiwui vang ali sāthatrakhala? Ana khi sāhaokhala?”
Kha Saulna alila sāthat khavai kazei eina phara. Chieina Jonathana chi theilaga, avāva̱na Davidli sāthatphalungra kaji theikhui.
Chieina Jonathana malungvātlak eina tablewui eina ngakarthuida kachāng chiwui kakhanethang maphazāthuwa, kaja avāva̱na Davidli maishi khangasakwui vang awui ning chotlakhaowa.
Ngathorshong Jonathanna naoshinao akha thānphunglaga David aniwui ngashit kahaipam chili vai.
Kala ana naoshinao chili hānga, “Ina kapvā kahai malāthing chi yongvāda aphākhuilu.” Nao china yongkhavā eina, khangatei akha ali kānda kapvālui.
Kala Jonathana kāpvā kahaipamli nao china vākashung eina, Jonathanna, “Malāthing chi nawui chili kānvada khalei maningmala?” da nao chili vaovai.
Kala Jonathana ali hithāda hānga, “Thakha chili mapamalu, thākta unglu.” Chieina naoshinaopā china totot khuilaga akhavāwuili unghaowa.
Kha nao china khikha matheimana; Jonathan eina David māngna katheina.
Kala Jonathana awui khutlaibing chi naoshinao chili milaga hānga, “Shimli khuiunghaolu.”
Kala nao chi unghaikhaleoda, Davidna lungkhor ngalemwui eina shoklaga ngakhumshāmda kathumshi, kala ani akha eina akha maya̱khui ngaroka, kala David mavānranglakha eina tangda chapngaruma.
Chiwui thili Jonathanna Davidli hānga, “Chingri eina thulu;

Chieina Davidna pāngmon Ahimelechli, “Awungana ili ot akhawui vang kachihona, kala ‘Ina kachihowui pongli kala khiwui vang kachihokhala kajila khipālikha matheingasaklu’ da hāngkahaina. Yaronnaobingli ngasoda apam akhali ot chi sāki kaji leili, da hānga.
Napāngli khi leimameilikhala? Ili khamuitang phangā khamilu, maningkha khalalei chi milu.”
Chieina pāngmon china Davidli ngahānkai, “Khangachā khamui iwuili maleimana, kha kathara khamui leili; kalikhada nawui yaronnaobingna sha̱naobingli phasā mangarumsaakha shaipaira.”

Kala Davidna pāngmon chili ngahānkai, “Kachangkhatta ina rai khavā tharan ithumwui eina sha̱naobing ngateithui ngasakchinga; khangachā shongzatlila yaronnaobingwui khorkhong thara, chithākha ajawui atamli kayākha tharmataimeirakhala?” da hānga.
Chieina pāngmon china kathara khamui chi ali khuimi; kaja Ngasokhamiwui khamui maningla katei maleisāthuwa, chi
(Chithang, apam chili Saulwui seikahoma akhavā; Doeg kaho Edomwui mi, tharmathengkhui khavai leisai.)
Kala Davidna Ahimelechli hānga, “Nawui pāngli kazeilala raighailala makhaleikhala? Kaja awungawui vang kathaka ot leihaoda iwui kazeila raighaila I makhuiphāthuwa.”

Chieina pāngmon china hānga, “Elahwui tampākli nana shaokathata Philistinepa Goliathwui raighai chi leili; kachon eina romlaga ephodwui akhanukshong haidalei; nana khuiga jiakha chi khuilu, khangatei maleimana.” Chieina Davidna “Chili phākhamei maleimana; khuirālu” da hānga.
Kala chithang Davidna Saulwui eina yāmlaga Gathwui awunga Achishwuili vai.
Kala Achishwui raobingna ali hānga, “Hi David, ngalei hiwui awunga chi maningmala? Laa kala pheichak sālaga,
‘Saulna thingkhali sāthata,
kala Davidna thingtharāli sāthata,
da athumna kaphok maningmala?’ ”
Chieina Davidna chi shālaga ningli shak jihaoda Gathwui awunga Achishli ngacheelakhaowa.
Chieina ana awui acham ngateihang eina sālaga athumwui mangāli pārekhaowa, kala ngaveiwui khāmonglila yekkazamsanga, amorhālila machora̱ longkharareida zata.
Chieina Achishna awui raobingli hānga, “Yanglu! mi hi kapāna, khisāda nathumna ali hili khuirākhala?
Iwuili kapā teona leihaoda nathumna ngashan sanganao khavai ali iwuili khuikharāla? Hikatha mi iwui shimli rāpairala?”
Kala kakhanang kachiva̱, leiman kazanga kachiva̱, kala ningyāng makhaunga kachiva̱, awuili rākazipserda ana athumwuitungli kathāna sāhaowa. Kala athum ali ngasoda mi shāmati sha̱khana.

Kala Davidna chiwui eina Moabwui Mizpehli vai; kala ana Moabwui awungali hānga, “Varena iwui vang khi sāngasak khangaikhala kaji ina matheikhuiranglakha eina tangda ishāvā eina ishāva̱ nawuili pamsa ngasak khavai kapona.”
Kala Davidna raipamli leilakha eina tangda, awui shimkhur Moab awungawui ngalemli pamchingsai.
Kala Gad marānna Davidli hānga, “Raipanli mapamchingalu, kha Judah ngaleili vālu.” Chieina Davidna chiwui eina Hereth ngahongli vāhaowa.
David eina awui mibing pamkhavai theihaira kaji Saulna shāhaowa. Atam chili Saulna kazei singlaga Gibe-ahwui kaphungtung tamarisk akhawui azingli pamsai, kala awui mibingna kuimareida nganingsai.

Kala Saulna ali kuimareida khanganinga awui raobingli hānga, “Benjaminnaobing, nganālu, Jessewui naona nathum kachiva̱li lui kala drakhā yāmgui mirala kala nathum saikorali thingthingwui, kala shāshāwui otva̱bing sāngasakrala?

Kaja nathum saikora ngarumda ili mithit khalen masāmala? Inaomayarana Jessewui naomayarali longnao sākakhui tharan ili khipākhana mahāngmana, lah iwui raobingli inaomayarana ning ngatha̱ ngasakta ajawui hithāda ili makaphā sākhavai rimkapam hi thatheilaga khipākha iwui vang wukmakhanangmana, kahāngla mahāngmana.”
Chieina Saulwui raobingwui ngachaili nganingkasā Edomwui mi Doegna ngahānkai, “Jessewui naomayara Nobli Ahitubwui naomayara Ahimelechwuili kharā ina thei,
kala ana,
Chieina awungana, Ahitubwui naomayara pāngmon Ahimelechli, kala Nobli pāngmon sāda khalei avāva̱wui shimkhur saikorala ahokhuilu da kasoi; kala athum saikora awungawuili rai.
Chieina Saulna, “Nganālu, Ahitubwui naomayara” da hānga. “Amei, I hili leili” da ana ngahānkai.

Kala Saulna ali hānga, “Kachiwui vang eina Jessewui naomayarali ngasoda ili mithit khalen sākhavai ngarānkhala? Kala kashakazāla, raighaila mida Varewui tui hāngmilaga, aja ili rimkazat khiwui vangkhala?”

Chieina Ahimelechna awungali ngahānkai, “Nawui rao saikorawui ngachaili narihā David thāda ningtongda shitsangkapai, nali ngākkhame, kala raithanme, kala nawui shimkhurli a thada khipa khayā kameikapkhala?

Varewui tui ina ali hāngkhami ajana kharela? Maningmana! Awungana hi narao ina shokkhangasakna majiranu, lah ishi shimkhurli ningkhamaong masāmilakalu; narao ina hiwui pongli, kateoala, kahakala khikha akhanida matheilakmana.”
Kala awungana hānga, “Ahimelech, na kala navāwui shimkhur saikora thilakra.”
Kala awungana shantri chili hānga, “

Chieina awungana Edompa Doegli hānga, “Pāngmonbingli nana sāthathaolu.” Chieina Edompa Doegna vāda pāngmonbing chili sāthathaowa, kala ana chithang, khamanaka ephod khangavai pāngmon hangchishatta phangā sāthata.
Kala pāngmonbingwui keinung Nobli khalei sha̱nao mayarnao, naoshinao mateila, seila, yaola, gadhāla katonga ana raighai eina sāthatserhaowa.
Kha Ahitubwui ara̱ kaja Ahimelechwui naomayara Abiathar kaho chi, amāng chakshokta Davidwuili yāmvāhaowa.
Kala
Chieina Davidna Abiatharli hānga, “Chithang Edompa Doeg leikasā chi theilaga, mashoila ana Saulli unghāngra da ina thei. Nashāvāwui shimkhurwui mi kathi saikora chi ina shokkhangasakna.
Mangacheelu, iwuili pamlu; kaja manglā khuiki kaji mi china namanglā khuikhavai sāda lei; ili ngasolakha na kalā mashimara.”
Chitharan mibingna, “Yanglu, Philistinenaobingna Keilahli rai ngararda athumwui zātshimla ngaponthuihaira” da Davidli rāhānga.
Chieina Davidna
Kha Davidwui mibingna ali hānga, “Yanglu, ithumna Judah ngalei hili ngacheerang leilaga kathāda Keilahli ithumna Philistinenaobingli angararrakhala?”
Chieina Davidna
Chieina David eina awui mibingna Keilahli tāngararda Philistine kachungkha sāthata kala athumwui sha̱keila kachungkha khuiunga. Chithāda Davidna Keilahwui mibing kankhui.
Keilahli leilakha Ahimelechwui naomayara Abiatharna Davidwuili yāmkhavā tharan, ana ephod akha khuivai.
David Keilahli rāhaira kaji Saulli hānghaowa. Kala Saulna hānga, “Varena ali iwui pāngli horsangmihaira; kaja mariwui ngavei khalei keinungli ayāmsangda akhalatta shungnamhaira.”
Chieina Saulna raimi saikorali Keilahli tāda Davidli kala awui mibingli tākuinam khavai hokhuisera.
Saulna ali makaphā sākhavai ngarānhaira kaji Davidna theihaoda pāngmon Abiatharli, “Ephod khuirālu” da hānga.
Chieina Davidna hānga, “O
Keilahwui mibingna ili Saulwui pāngli horsangmihaorala? Narao ina kashā thāda Saul tālakrala? O
Chiwui thili Davidna hānga, “Keilahwui mibingna ilila iwui mibinglila Saulwui pāngli horsangmirala?” Kala
Chieina Davidla awui mibingla, athum shātharuk shakha Keilah horhaida athumwui thuikapaipaili thuihaowa. David yāmhaira kaji Saulli kahāng eina ana rai sākhavai thāhaowa.
Kala Davidna Ziph lamhāngwui kaphungli raipan asālaga apamhaowa. Saulna thangkachida Davidli phāchinga, kha Varena Davidli awui pāngli mamilakmana.
Saulna awui manglā khuikhavai phākazatwui vang David ngacheehaowa. Davidva Horeshwui Ziph Lamhāngli pamsai.
Kala Saulwui nao Jonathanna Horeshli vāda Davidli asamphangda Varewui mingli ning lumngasaka.
Kala ana hithāda hānga, “Mangacheealu, kaja ishāvā Saulna nali masamphangrarmara; nana Israelwuitungli awunga sāra, kala ina nawui thi zangra kaji hi ishāvānala thei.”
Kala anina
O awunga, tālu, nawui ningkachāng athishurda ithumna ali nawui pāngli horsangmira.”
Saulna hānga, “Ili nathumna leishikhamiwui vang
Zatlu, yangkazakkhuilu; awui pamkhavai chi kachilikhala kaji yangkhuilu; kala khipāna theikhala kaji; kaja a hi shinglak kahai mi akhana da ili hānga.
Chiwui vang eina awui ngathum khavai pam saikora yangkazakkhuilaga kashenga pao rāhāngluilu. Chithakha ina nathumli ngasovālaga Judahnaobing thingthing khalei ngachaiwui eina ina aphākhuira.”
Chieina athumna Saulli rida Ziphli vāhaowa.
Chitharan David kala awui mibing Arabahli khalei Jeshimonwui azingshong Moanwui lamhāngshong leisai.

Saul kala awui mibingna ali phākhavai vai. Kala chi Davidli hānghaowa; chiwui vang eina Davidna Moan lamhāngli khalei lungkaipamli tāhaowa. Kala Saulna chi kashā eina, ana Moan lamhāngshong Davidli kharomvai.
Saulna phungrei akhashong vai, kala David eina awui mibingna lākhavāk zata. Saul eina awui mibingna tukkhui khavai ngaphananai kaji eina Davidna thaklāk eina yāmkhavai sai,
chichangli paome rālaga Saulli hānga, “Thakta unglu, kaja Philistinenaobingna rai rātāhaira.”
Chieina Saulna Davidli makharomluila Philistinenaobingli ungngararhaowa; chiwui vang eina apam chi Ngathikashokwui Lunghār hoi.
Kala Davidna chiwui eina kālaga En-gediwui raipanli apamhaowa.
Chieina Saulna Israelwui eina mi thingkathum kapangkhuilaga David kala awui mibingli phavā khavai Sirao Lunghārli vai.

Kala ana shongfa ngalemli yaoshim sākahaipamli vākashung tharan, lungkhur akha leisāda chili Saulna zangngasāmkhui. Chitharan David eina awui mibing lungkhur chiwui alung thukmeithui kaji chili pamsai.
Kala Davidwui mibingna ali hānga, “
Kala ana Saulwui kachon angakakkakhui chi phaninglaga David ning chothaowa.
Davidna awui mibingli “
Chiwui vang eina Davidna awui mibingli zakshilāk eina khararda Saulli masāthatpaimara jihaowa. Kala Saulna ngakarthuida lungkhurwui eina awui vāki kajishong thuihaowa.
Chiwui thili Davidla ngakarthuida lungkhurwui eina shoklaga Saulli, “Awunga, ishāmei” da shok hoi. Kala Saulna kapeikhaung eina Davidna ngakhumshāmda khayākashi chithei.
Kala Davidna Saulli hānga, “Khisāda nana mibingwui tui nganāda, ‘Yanglu, Davidna nali makaphā sākida lei’ da kahāng chi khuisanghaokhala?
Yanglu, aja zimiksho, namik eina theihaira, lungkhurlungli leilakha

Theilu, ishāvā, nawui kachon khara̱ hi, kaja ina nawui kachonmarei ngakakkhuilaga nali masāthatmana; hi eina nana theira, iwui khalāng lah nali sākashi khikha maleimana kaji theilu. Nana imanglā khuikhavai sālala iva nawuitungli morei masālakmana.
na iniwui ngachaili bichar sāranu,
Kharar chānjam kahāng thāda, ‘Makhayāwui eina makhayā shoka’; kha ipāng eina nali makaphā masāmara.
Israelwui awungana khipāli phāzatkhala? Kala nana khipāli kharomkazātkhala? Fa kathi phākazatla, jika kachāknao phākazat!
Chiwui vang eina
Davidna tuibing hi hāngkup kahai eina Saulna hānga, “Hi nawui khonla, inaomayara David?” da panglāk eina chapa.
Kala Davidli hānga, “Ili na ngarongmeikhara; kaja ina nali kalāshi khavai sai, kha nana ili kaphā sāmi.
Kala
Kaja mi akhana awui yangkasheli samphanglaga thāda chiho kahai khipā leikhala? Nana ili aja sākhami hiwui vang
Kala yanglu, nana Israelwui awunga sālakra kaji, kala nawui pāngli Israel wungram reisangra kaji ina theihaira.
Chiwui vang eina iwui ara̱-azāli makatatmara, kala ishi shimkhurwui eina iwui ming makatatmara da
Kala Saulwui kahāng thāda Davidna shākhi sai. Chiwui thili Saulna shimli unghaowa; kha David eina awui mibingna raipanshong vāhaowa.
Chitharan Samuel thihaida Israel saikora rakazipta awui vang chapngachai, kala athumna ali awui shim Ramahli chizanhaowa.
Chiwui thili Davidna Paranwui lamhāngshong tāhaowa.
Kala Moanli mi akha leisai, ava Carmelli leihkhalon mina. Ava shānglaka; awui yao thingkathum, me thingkha da leisai. Ana yaohah chichāpta Carmelli pamsai.
Mi chiwui ming Nabal hoi, apreiva̱li Abigail hoi. Preiva̱ chi theithangmeilaka, azakla mathālaka; kha agaharava tamot eina achamla maphāmana; a Calebwui mina.
Lamhāngli Davidna leilakha Nabal yaohah kachichapa rārāli da shai.
Chieina Davidna yaronnao tharā chihoda hānga, “Carmelli vālu, kala Naballi iwui ming singda asamphanglu.
Kala hithāda shālam asālu, ‘Nala, nashi shimkhur kala nawui khalei saikora chingri kahai ngasāranu.
Nawui yao kachungkha lei kaji ina shāhaira; nawui yao kahombing ithumli ngasopamda ithumna khikha makaphā masālakmana, atam hirankha Carmelli ngasokapam hili athumwui ot khikha kashimānla maleimana.

Nawui yaronnaobingli ngahānyanglu, kala athumna nali hāngsera. Chiwui vang eina iwui mibingli khalumashanmilu; kaja ithum phanit zimiksholi kharāna. Nawui khalalei naraobingli kala nanaomayara Davidli khamilu da kapona’ da ahānglu.”
Davidwui yaronnaobing china Naballi asamphanglaga Davidwui ming eina ahānga, kala athumna chili angaraipama.
Nabalna Davidwui raobingli ngahānkai, “David khipākhala? Jessewui nao khipākhala? Aruihon akhavābingwui eina yāmkazata rao kachungkha lei.
Iwui yaohah kachichāpbingwui vang ngarān kahai khamui, tara̱ kala sā hi, kachiwui eina kharākhala kaji makathei athumli mizā-mimanghaorala?”
Chieina Davidwui yaronnaobingna thuihaowa, kala latungda ali unghāngsera.

Kala Davidna awui mibingli hānga, “Mi kachiva̱ raighai thāngkhuiserlu!” Kala athum kachiva̱na raighai thāngkhuiserhaowa, Davidla awui raighai thāngkhui; kala athum mi shāmati sha̱khana Davidwui thi shurda thuihaowa, kha shākhanina shim mayonpama.
Kha awui rao yaronnao akhana Nabal preiva̱̱ Abigailli hānga, “Yanglu, lamhāngwui eina Davidna awui paomebing chihorāda ishameili rākhoruma; kala ana athumli zeikhamhaowa.
Chithālala athumva phālaka, ithumli athumna makaphā masāmana; athumli hirankha ngasozatta tampākli zatlakha otnaola akhanida mashimānlākmana;
ngashun ngayā mateila ithumna yao hompamlakha athumna phākho thāda mayonmi.
Chieina hi theida khikasā phāmeirakhala kaji nana chukmajayanglu; ishameiwuitungli kala shimkhurli makahatlākla makaphā leiphalunghaora; ava achei-arei makatheiwui vang khipānakha mahāngpaimana.”

Chiwui thili Abigailna katotlak eina khamuishom shākhani, drakhāra̱ sangkhavai akhao khani, yao hemkazak kahai phangā, māngatai luk mati, kala drakhāthei akao amazān shākha, khaorāthei eina kasā khamui ahāng shākhani, gadhābingli shaksāmi.
Kala ana ashi yaronnaobingli hānga, “Nathum mangāli zatsālu; yanglu, I nathumwui thili rārāsanaora.” Kha ana agahara Naballi mahāngmana.
Kala ana gadhāli tongda phungreina khayin kahaishong eina tai, yanglu, David eina awui mina awuishong tārāsai; kala ana athumli angaroka.
Davidna hithāda hānghairasai, “Mi hina khalei saikora, lamhāngli ina mayonmida akhala mashimān ngasaklak kaji hi arema ngasāhaira; kapha sākhamiwui vang ana ili makaphā hanmihaira.
Ngathorma, awui mayarnao saikorali akhanida mataimila masāthatser si kaje Varena Davidli theiranu.”
Abigailna Davidli kathei eina, ana gadhāwui eina tunglaga ana ngaleili ngakhumshām khayākashi mi.
Kala ana aphei singda hānga, “Khayon saikora chi iwuitungli tāranu, amei, narao iwui kapo hi khanganāmilu, kala naraowui tui kakhuisangmilu.
Ameina achei-arei makathei Nabalwui tui makhuimilu; kaja aming thāda ala chithai, Nabal chi awui mingna, khangui chi awuili lei. Kha ameina chihokharā mibingli narao I masamphangthuwa.
Chieina ara, amei,
Kala ara narao ina khuikharā ot hi ishameiwui thi kashur raobingli kakhuingasakmilu.
Narao iwui khalāng kapheomilu da poli; kaja ishāmeina
Kalikhada mibingna nali kharomda namanglā khuikhavai rālala, nawui
Kala ishameiwui kaphawui vang
ameiwui khanang khavai apong, lah ningkachot maleimara; kaja maram maleila nana ashee matā ngasakmana, kala nakhalattawui vang athutla makhuimana.
Chieina Davidna Abigailli hānga, “Aja ili samphang khavai nali chihokharā Israelwui
Ashee tākhangasakwui eina kala ikhalattawui vang athut hāngsangki kajiwui eina pāng khalan khangasaka nalila, kala nawui theithangkhameila sokhami ngasāranu!
Kaja nashili kakhanang mami khavai sākhame Israelwui Vare
Chiwui thili preiva̱ china khuikharā chi khuilaga Davidna hānga, “Chingri eina nawui shimli ungulu; nawui tui ina khuisangmihaira, kala nawui kapo mayāmihaira.”

Kala Abigailna Nabalwuili ungkashung eina, Nabalna awui shimli awunga thāda morsongsai. Kala mariphaoda ningmahaisor eina leisai. Chiwui vang eina ana kazing mathangranglakha ali khituikha mahāngmana.
Kala ngathorshong zamkhamarip mathing kahai eina, apreiva̱na Naballi otsak saikora kahāng eina, a ningthenghaida kathi thāhaowa.
Kala tharāthang sha̱khawui thili
Nabal thihaira kaji Davidna kashā eina, ana hānga, “Ili zeikakharuia Naballi athut hāngsangkhame, kala makaphā otsakwui eina ipāng thummi kahaia
Kala Davidwui raobing china Carmelli vāda Abigailli ahānga, “Apreiva̱ sākhavai nali akhuilu da Davidna ithumli kachihona.”
Ana ngakarthuida ngaleili ngakhumshāmzangda hānga, “Yanglu, narao iya ishameiwui raobingwui phei pheomiki kaje rao sha̱naona.”
Kala Abigailna totot shaksākhuilaga, awui sha̱nao phangā thānphunglaga gadhā tongda Davidwui paomebingli shurthuwa; kala apreiva̱ sāhaowa.
Davidna Jezreelwui Ahino-amlila khuida, khanini apreiva̱ sathathuihaowa.
Saulna anao ngalāva̱ Michal, David preiva̱ chi Gallimli khalei Laishwui naomayara Paltili mihaowa.
Chieina Saulna Israelwui mi thingkathum kapangkhuilaga Ziphwui lamhāngshong Davidli phātai.
Kala Jeshimonwui zingshovāk khalei shongfa ngalem Hachilah kaphungli rairum asai. Kha Davidna lamhāngli pamsāda Saul lamhāngli rāhaira kaji kashā eina,
Davidna ara̱yang khavai chihoda Saul rākachangkhata da theihaowa.

Chiwui thili Davidna Saulwui rairum chili vai; kala Saul eina Nerwui naomayara raimi kathāna, Abner aniwui pikhavai pam theihaowa; raimibingna awui kuikhamareili rairum sāda alungthungli Saulna pipama.
Chiwui thili Davidna Hitpa Ahimelech eina Zeruiahwui naomayara Joabwui achinā Abishaili hānga, “Saulwui rāmrahli nani ili khipa ngasotānikhala?” Abishaina, “I nali ngasotāra” da hānga.
Chieina David eina Abishaina ngayā raimi pamli vai; rāmrahlungli Saul pisai; kala pet kuishakli kazei shunhailaga Abner kala raimibingna kuimareida pisai.
Chieina Abishaina Davidli hānga, “Aja nawui yangkasheli Varena nawui pāngli horsangmihaira; iwui kazei eina ali ngashumkha eina ngaleili ngaruiwutmihaoga, ali khanishida mangashumluimara.”
Kha Davidna, “Ali masāthatpaimara; kaja
Kala Davidna hānga, “
Chieina Saulwui kuishakli shunkahai kazei eina tara̱ phungkhavai chi Davidna khuilaga thuihaowa. Khipānakha chi matheimana, lah khipākha mathuimathukmana; kaja athum piserhaowa, khikhalajila
Chiwui thili Davidna phungrei lākhashong vāhaowa, athumwui ngachaili chāngām kahakva̱na mataka, kala ana katāva̱ phungreitungli kānganinga;
kala Davidna raimibing kala Nerwui nao Abnerli hoda hānga, “Abner, na mangahānkāmarala?” Chieina Abnerna, “Awungali kaho chi khipākhala?” da ngahānkai.
Kala Davidna Abnerli hānga, “Na mi maningmala? Israelwui alungli na kathā khipā leikhala? Chithakha na khisāda awunga nameili makhamayonkhala? Kaja awunga nameili sākazam khavai mi akha rāzanga.
Nawui ot kasā hi maphāthura.
Saulna Davidwui khon machuthaoda hānga, “Inaomayara David, hi nawui akhonla?” Kala Davidna “Mha, amei, O awunga, hi iwui akhonna” da ngahānkai.
Kala ana hānga, “Ishameina naraoli kharomkazat khiwui vangkhala? Ina khi sahaoda, ipāngli khi khayon leikhala?
Chiwui vang eina amei awunga, narao iwui tui khanganāmilu. Kalikhada ili makhamayā khalei hi
Chiwui vang eina

Chieina Saulna hānga, “Ina lāngda sāhaira; inao David, latunglu, kaja ina nali makaphā masāluimara; khikhalajila aja imanglā nawui mikyanli saklak eina khui, yanglu, ina mangkhama̱ otsak sāhaira, kala nguilak eina sāhaira.”
Kala Davidna ngahānkai, “O awunga! Nawui kazei hili leili, yaronnao akhali kākhui ngasaklu.
Khangarong kala ningtongda shitkasang mi kachiva̱li
Yanglu, namanglāli ina hiyākha sakta kaphaning thāda
Chieina Saulna Davidli hānga, “Inaomayara David! na sokhami ngasaranu! Nana ot kachungkha sāra kala ungshungserra.” Kala Davidna awui apongshong thuihaowa, Saulna awui pamli latunghaowa.

Kala Davidna awui ningli, “Thangkha mathangkha I Saulwui pāngli thisangphalunghaora; Philistine ngaleili yāmkhavāna phameishukra; kaja chili vahaiakha Saulna phāsānhaida Israelwui alungli kānda makharomraluimara, kala apangwui eina ina ngathishokra,” da phaninga.
Chieina Davidna awui mi shātharuk chi thānphungda, Maochwui naomayara, Gathwui awunga Achishwuili vai.
Kala Achishwui ngalemli Davidla, awui mibingla kala kachichāshi shimkhur katonga apamhaowa; kala David preiva̱ khani, Jezreelwui Ahino-am eina Carmelwui Nabal preiva̱ Abigaila zangda apamserhaowa.
Kala David Gathli yāmvāhaira da Saulli hāngkahai eina maphaluithuwa.

Chiwui thili Davidna Achishli hānga, “Kalikhada nawui mikyanli ili leishimiakha iwui pamkhavai ngalei akhawui keinung lungli sompam khavai khamayāmilu; kaja nawui raona kathāda nawui wungnao keinung hili nali ngasopamkachangrakhala?”
Chiwui vang chithang Achishna ali Ziklagli pamkhavai mihaowa; chiwui vang aja eina tangda Ziklag hi Judah awungawui ngaleili zangkahaina.
Kala Davidna Philistine ngaleili kapam kumkha kachāng matina.
Chitharan Davidna thānda awui mibingna, Egypt ngaleili kharewui eina leikasā apam, Geshurbing, Girzibing kala Amalekbingli rai atai. Egypt ngaleiwui Shur tāshungda achālakha pamkasābingna.
Davidna yuihaida sha̱naola mayarnaola akhanida mashākla sāthatserhaowa; kha yao, sei, gadhā, ut kala kashankachon katonga khuiphungda Achishwuili unga.
Achishna, “Aja khipāshili akhangararkhala?” da ngahānakha, Davidna, “Judahwui Negeb,” kala Jerahmeelwui Negeb, lah “Kenbingwui Negebli akhangararna.” da ngahānkai.
Kala Davidna sha̱naola mayarnaola sāthatserhaowa, kaja, Davidna hithāda sai kaji chi Gathli unghānghaipaishina da akhala matai ngasakmana. Ana Philistineli leilakha chithāda sāchinga.
“Davidli Israelnaobingna mamayāngailakmana da kaphaningwui vang; ana iwui rao sāchingra” da Achishna phaninglaga Davidli ning horsanga.
Atam chitharan Philistinenaobingna Israelli ngarar khavai athumwui raimi kazipkhui. Kala Achishna Davidli hānga, “Theilu, kaja nala nawui mila iwui raimili ngasoda rai vāphalungra.”
Davidna Achishli hānga, “Phālaka, naraona khi sāmishapkhala kaji nana theinaora.” Kala Achishna Davidli hānga, “Phālaka, ina mathiranglakha eina tangda na iwui ngākkhame sāra.”
Chitharan Samuel thihaoda Israel saikorana awui vang chapngachāda awui keinung Ramahli chifahaowa. Kala Saulna kazei kazang sākatheibing kala laivā kasābingli lam chiwui eina kashamserhairasai.
Philistinenaobingna Shunemli rairum sāda akaziphaowa; kala Saulna Israel saikora kazipkhuilaga Gilboali rairum sai.
Saulna Philistinewui raimibing theilaga ngacheehaowa, kala malung mapampaithuwa.
Kala Saulna
Chieina Saulna awui raobingli, “Ina ngahānkhuipai khavai khanong sha̱nao akha phākhuilu” da hānga. Kala awui raobingna “Endorli khanong akha leili” da hānga.
Chieina Saulna azak ngacheida kachon khangatei ngavailaga mi khani thānphungda preiva̱ chili ngayā vai. Kala, “Iwui vang khanong yanglaga, ina ming singda nali kahānga chili hokhuimilu” da hānga.
Preiva̱ china, “Saulna kazei sākatheibingli kala leivā kasābingli kathāda kashamhaokhala kaji nala thei. Laga kathāda ili thikhavai nana hithāda khalen rākasangkhala?” da hānga.
Kha Saulna
Chieina preiva̱ china, “Thakha khipāli homirakhala?” da khangahān eina, “Samuelli homilu” da ana hānga.
Preiva̱ china Samuelli kathei eina, ana panglāk eina vaoda Saulli hānga, “Ili khisāda minamkhala? Na Saulna.”
Awungana ali hānga, “Mangacheealu, nana khi theikhala?” Preiva̱ china Saulli hānga, “Ina vare akha ngaleiwui eina kashok thei.”
Ana hānga, “Awui azak kathākhala?” Preiva̱ china, “Khararnao akha wungnao sāri ngavailaga shoka,” da hānga. Samuelna kaji theihaoda Saulna amai mashunzangda khayākashi mi.

Chieina Samuelna Saulli, “Ili shokluda khisāda sheikhautkhala?” da hānga. Saulna hānga, “I wukkhananglākhaowa, kaja Philistinenaobingna ili rai rāngararhaowa, kala Varena iwui eina mai ngareithuihaida mangahānkāmithuwa, manglila, marānbinglila mahāngmilakthuwa; chiwui vang eina khi kasā phāmeirakhala da nali ngahān khavai kahona.”
Chieina Samuelna hānga, “
na ili hangkhangasak athishurda kasāna; kaja nawui wungram ngakaida nawui khongnai Davidli mihaira.
Khikhalajila nana
Chili lāngda nali ngasoda Israellila Philistinenaobingwui pāngli horsangmihaora; kala akhama nashi vānaongarā ili ngasopamra;
Samuelwui tui chi shālaga Saulna ngacheenahaida matheithang eina pisanghaowa. Kala ngashun ngayā maphazālak kajiwui vang yāng kānhaowa.
Kala preiva̱ china Saulli rāyanglaga awui khangachee chi theida, “Yanglu, narao ina nawui tui khuida, imanglā hamlaga nana sālu kaji chi sāhaira.
Chiwui vang eina narao iwui tuila kakhuimilu; khamui ahangkha khuimiga, kala shongfali mavān khavai kazākhuilu” da hānga.
Ana “Mazāmara” jihaowa. Kha awui raobing eina preiva̱ china suisui kaji eina mayahaowa. Chieina ngaleitungli pikasāwui eina petli thuipama.
Preiva̱ china asākakā seinao akha keisāda, ana totot taithatkhui, kala chieina khawok makazang khamui sākhui,
kala preiva̱ china Saul kala awui raobing chili kashakazā chi khuimi, kala athumna chi zakhui. Athumna phazākhuilaga chithang ngayā thuihaowa.
Chitharan Philistinewui raimi saikora Aphekli kaziphaowa; kala Israelwui mibing Jezreelwui ura̱pamli rairum sai.
Philistine wungnaobingna thingthing, shāshā ngaherlaga zata kala Davidna awui mili thānlaga Achishli ngasolaga khanukshong zata,

Philistine raimi kathānabing china “Hebrewnaobing hi hili khi sākazatkhala?” da hānga. Kala Achishna Philistinewui raithānabingli, “Israelwui awunga Saulwui rao David hina iwuili rāpamda zingkum kasāngkhahaira; a kharā eina thuilaga aja eina tangda khikha khayon akhala masāmana” da ngahānkai.

Kha Philistinewui raimi kathānabingna ali malungvāthaida hānga, “Hanung ngasakhaolu, athumli ngasoda rai masāpaimara, nana athumli mikahai apam chili hanung ngasakhaolu; khipāna theira ithumli khalatta ngararluilapai. Ashi akhavāli ana kathāda asamphangrakhala? Mibing hiwui akui rangkakhui maningla?
Aramnaona pheichak eina ngasoda,
‘Saulna thingkhali sāthata,
kala Davidna thingtharāli sāthata’
da akha eina akha laa kaphoka David chi hipa maningmala?”
Chieina Achishna Davidli hokhuida hānga, “Nawui ning kathar
Chieina hanunghaolu, chingri eina unghaolu; kaja nana Philistine wungnaobingli maringkaphā masāranu.”
Chieina Davidna Achishli hānga, “Ina khi khayon sāhaokhala? Nawuili otram rangatha̱kaphok eina thuida aja rāshungda khi theihaoda, ishāmei awungali ngasoda rai khangarar mavāpaimara kajikhala?”
Kala Achishna ngahānkāda hānga, “Iwui miktāli na Varewui kazingrao shātmakaka thai; chithālala Philistinewui raimi kathānabingna, ‘Raikhangararli ithumna ali mangasovāmara’ jihaowa.
Chieina nawui raobingli thānlaga ngathorshong ungulu, ngathorthakva̱ zingthan ngasha̱da zatulu.”
Chieina Davidna awui mibingli thānphungda ngathorthakva Philistine ngaleili hanunghaowa. Kha Philistinenaobing Jezreelshong vāhaowa.
Chitharan kakathumathang Davidna awui mibingli ngasoda Ziklagli ungkashung tharan, Amaleknaobingna Negeblila Ziklaglila rai rātāhairasai. Athumna yuihaida Ziklag mei sa̱tāmihairasai,
kala chili leikasā sha̱naobing, khararnaosan mateila, tukchipthuihairasai, sakathatva akhala masāthatmana, kha athumli khuiphungda thuihaowa.
Kala David eina awui mibingna keinungli ungkhayang tharan, aram mei sa̱tāmihairasai, kala athum preiva̱ngarā, naomayarabing tukthuiserhairasai.
Chieina David kala ali khangasobingna soso ungchapta yang makānranglakha eina tangda chapa.
Davidwui preiva̱ khani Jezreelwui Ahino-am eina Carmelwui Nabalwui rameiva̱ Abigaillila tukthuihairasai.
Davidla wukkhananglākhaowa, kaja mibingna ali ngalung eina horthatra jihaowa. Khikhalajila naomayarabing tukthuiser kahaiwui vang mibingna ning chotnāhaowa. Kha Davidna awui
Kala Davidna
Chieina Davidna ali khangaso shātharuk chi thānphungda Besor kongli khavā eina, mazatkathukbingli chili nothahaowa.
Kha Davidna shāmati thānphunglaga kharomthuihaowa, kha mi shākhani chotnāhaida Besor kong mamakānkārarthuda haihaowa.
Egyptwui mi akha tampākli leisāda athumna Davidwuili thānunga, kala athumna ali khamui mishai kala tara̱ mimanga,

kala athumna khaorātheiwui khamuikainao akha, kala drakhāthei amazān khani da mi. Kala ana chi shaikahai thili awui ning mathingungrasai; kaja kathumthang ngashun-ngayā ana khikha mashai mamanglakmana.

Kala Davidna ali “Na khipāshikhala, kala na kachiwui eina kharākhala?” da hānga. Ana ngahānkai, “Iya Egyptwui mina kala Amalek akhawui raona; I kazā kahaiwui vang iwui akhavāna nothahaida kathumthanghaira.
Ithumna Negebwui Cherethbing, Judahwui pam, kala Calebwui Negebli rai atai, kala ithumna Ziklagla mei sa̱tāmihaira.”

Kala Davidna, “Rai akatābing chili na ili thānvāmishaprala?” da ngahāna. Ana hānga, “Ili masāthatmara, lah iwui akhavāwui pāngli mahorsangmimara da Varewui mingli shākhi sakha, ina nathumli thānvāra.”
Chieina ana thānkhavā tharan, yanglu, athum ngalei pemda morsonglaga phāshak-phazāda pheichak sāsai; kaja Philistinenaobingwui eina kala Judahwui eina athumna kachungkha angaponkhui.
Davidna yupyapsap eina thuilaga akhama ngazin eina tangda angararda, ut katonga raimi shāmati maningla akhala mataimimana; ut katonga raimi shāmati chi yāmshokhaowa.
Amaleknaobingna khuithui kahai saikora chila, apreiva̱ khanila Davidna akankhuisera.
Kateola khareila, naongalāva̱ kala naomayarabing, khuithui kahai saikora Davidna akhuiluishitsera.
Davidna athumwui seila, yaola ngapaikhuilaga mibingna chi homungda “Davidna angapon kakhuina” da awui mibingna hānga.
Chiwui thili Davidna awui mi mazatthukmada Besor kongli nothā kahai athumwuili latkhaung eina, athumna David kala ali khangasobingli angaroka. kala Davidna athumli akhanganai eina shālam sai.
Davidli ngasokhavābingwui ngachaili makhayā ning kateo mi kaikhana, hithāda hānga, “Makharabingle kachichā preiva̱ kala naongarā maningla, ithumna angaponkakhui hi mamimara.”
Kha Davidna, “Chimathāpaimara, ichināngara! yangkashebingwui eina
Khavābingna khavāman khuira, shim khamayonbingle yar masāmara kaji nali khipāna nganāsangrakhala? da hānghaowa.
Kala chithang eina thuida aja rāshungda ngaraichada yar kasā hi Israelwui shiyan-chikan kala sharphahor sāchinghaowa.
Davidna Ziklagli ungkashung eina, ana awui ngasotnaobing Judahwui khararnaobinglila ngaponkakhui chi yar savāsera, kala “Hi
Bethelli, Negebwui Ramothli, Jattirli,
Aroerli, Siphmothli, Eshtemoali,
Racalli, Jerahmeelwui keinungli, Kenwui keinungli;
Hormahli, Borashanli, Athachli,
Hebronli, Davidli ngasoda awui mibingna khavā pam kachiva̱li ngayarmisera.
Kala Philistinenaobingna Saulshi vānao ngarāli angaphankhuida; Saulwui naomayara Jonathan, Abinadab, kala Malchishualongli sāthathaowa.
Saullila sakchanglak eina kharomlaga malā kakapbingna kāpta a zakshilak eina khamā za̱haowa.

Chieina Saulna awui chāngvei phungkhameli, “Nawui raighai sutkhuilaga ili tothathaolu, chi maningakha ahui marimkashokbing hina ili rekharek nganaoda sāthatra” da hānga. Kha chāngvei kaphunga china ngacheenahaida mamayāthuwa. Chiwui vang eina Saulna awui raighai khuilaga akhalatta ngaronthathaowa.
Kala Saul thikahai chi theilaga, awui chāngvei kaphungala awui raighai khuilaga chili ngaronthathaowa.
Hithāda Saul, kala awui anaomayara kathum, kala awui chāngvei phungme, kala awui mibing saikora chithang thitkha sāhaowa.

Kala tampāk makānda khalei, kala Jordan makānda khalei Israelwui mibingna, Saulshi vānaongarā thihaira kaji kashā eina keinungbing horhaida kachāyām eina yāmhaowa. Kala Philistinenaobingna asompamhaowa.
Akhama kathā, Philistinenaobingna kathinaobingwui ot akhangapon tharan, Saulshi vānaongarā Gilboa Kaphungli thihaisai.
Kala athumna akui rangkhui kala awui raisāri raikhuilaga Philistine ngaleili mibingna athumwui varebingna theikhavai athumwui ringkaphā pao chihovasera.
Awui raisāri Ashtarothwui khorumshimli haihai; kha athumna awui phasā Beth-shanwui ngaveili hokthanghai.
Kha Philistinenaobingna Saulli kasā chi Jabesh-gileadwui mibingna kashā eina,
rai khamarākabingna ngakarthuida ngayā zatthailaga Saulshi vānaongarāwui angun chi Beth-shan ngaveiwui eina akhui, kala athumna Jabeshli ungriktāhaowa.
Kala athumna ara̱kuibing chi Jabeshwui tamarisk thingrong pam akhawui ngalemli chifahaowa, kala shinithang khuma.
Saul thikahaiwui thili, Davidna Amaleknaobingli asāthathailaga hankhaung eina, Davidna Ziklagli khanithang ungpama,
kala kakathumathang, yanglu, mi akha kachon tānār eina ngavailaga kui ngalei tottāt eina, Saulwui rāmrahwui eina rārāsai. Kala Davidli kathei eina ana ngakhumshām eina khayashiya.
Davidna, “Kachiwui eina kharākhala?” da ali ngahāna. Kala ana ngahānkai, “I Israelwui rāmrahwui eina yāmkharāna”.
Kala Davidna ali, “Kathamameilikhala? Ili hānglu” da ngahāna. Chieina ana ngahānkai, “Mibing raipamwui eina yāmserhaira, kachungkha pitāda thihaira; kala Saul eina anaomayara Jonathanla thihaira.”
Chieina Davidna, “Saul eina anaomayara Jonathan thihaira kaji nana kathāda theikhala?” da ali rākahānga yaronnao chili ngahāna.
Kala ana kapeikhaung eina ili theida hoi. Ina ‘I hili leili’ da ngahānkai.
Kala ana ili hānga, Na khipākhala? Chieina ina, I Amalekwui mina da ngahānkai.
Chieina ana ili hānga, ‘Iwui ngalemli rāda ili sāthathaolu! I chotnāhaira, kha manglāva mathuirangli.’

Chieina ina awui ngalemli nganingda ali sāthathaowa, khikhalajila a pitāhaiakha a mashokluimara kaji ina thei. Kala ana khangahon kuihon eina apāngli kasang kazao ina khuilaga ishameiwui mangāli khuikharā hina.”
Chieina Davidna awui kachon yonkhuida serkhāka; kala ali khangasobingla chithāda sai;
kala athumna Saul eina Jonathanwui vang kala
Ali rākahānga yarona chili Davidna, “Na kachiwui eina kharākhala?” da ngahāna. “Iya Amalekwui mina, ram kazata mi akhawui naona” da ana ngahānkai.
Davidna ali hānga, “
Chieina Davidna yaronnao akhali hokhuida hānga, “Zatlu, mi hili sāthathaolu,” kala ana shātta thihaowa.
Kala Davidna hānga, “Nawui ashee nakhalattali tāranu, kaja
Kala Davidna Saul eina anaomayara Jonathanwui vang sifada malungringlak eina chapa,
kala ana hi Judahwui mibingli tamchitheiphalungra da hānga, yanglu, hi Jasharwui Lairikli kapihaida lei. Ana hānga:
“Nawui tekhamatei, O Israel!
Nawui kajujui apambingli pitā ngasakhaira!
Pangshapa chi kathāda pitāhaokhala!
Gathli mahāngalu,
Ashkelonwui chanreili machishātalu;
Philistinewui naongalāva̱bing mathānpaishina,
ahui marimkashokabingwui naongalāva̱bing maireopaishina.
“Gilboawui phungrei nathum,
chili zingrot, lah ikra̱ matāranu,
akharla makharshokranu!
Kaja pangshapwui chāngvei sākhamānghaowa;
Saulwui chāngvei thao eina maneomathāluimara.
Sāthat kahaibingwui ashee,
kapingbingwui athao eina,
Jonathanwui malā mahanungluimana,
Saulwui raighai khamasai eina mahanungmana.
“Saul eina Jonathan, leikashi kala leishirihai!
Ringlala thilala ani mapāk;
ani khalānglila thākmei;
kazingkha̱lila pangmei.
“Israelwui naongalāva̱ nathum Saulwui vang chapngachālu,
nathumli kachon khamathāthā ngavai khangasakali;
nathumwui sārili sināwui sāri-khongnāng shaksākhamiwui vang.
“Kapingabing railungli kathāda pitāhao!
Jonathan nawui kajujui apambingli pisanghaira.
“Nawui vang ining sifahaira, ichina Jonathan!
Nana ili ngahānkhangai!
Nana ili leikashi matakhakhai,
preiva̱ ngarāwui leikashili langmei.
“Kapingabing kathāda pitāhao!
Raisārila kathāda shimānhao!”
Hiwui thili Davidna
Kala
Davidna, “Kachipāli vālu jikhala?” da khangahān eina,
“Hebronli vālu” da ana hānga.
Chieina Davidna preiva̱ khani Jezreelwui Ahino-am eina Carmelpa Nabalwui rameiva̱ anili ngasoda chili vai.
Kala Davidna ali ngayurkazatbing, kala athumwui shimkhur kachiva̱ khuivaserda athum Hebron keinungbingli asompama.
Kala Judahwui mibing rāda athumwuitungli awunga sākhavai, athumna Davidli thao neomi.
Jabesh-Gileadwui mibingna Saulli kachifana da Davidli kahāng eina,
Davidna paomebing chiholaga Jabesh-Gileadwui mibingli hithāda hānga, “Nathumli
Ara
Chiwui vang eina nathum pangmeiranu kala pingmeiranu; kaja ara namei Saul thihaida Judah shimkhurna ili awunga sākhavai thao neomihaira.”
Chitharan Nerwui naomayara, Saulwui raithāna Abnerna Saulwui naomayara Ish-boshethli thānphungda Mahanaimli khuivai;
kala ana Gilead, Ashur, Jezreel, Ephraim, Benjamin kala Israel saikorawui awunga sanghaowa.
Saulwui naomayara Ish-boshethna Israelli khamung atamli zingkum hangmati kāshunghairasai, kala ana kum khani munga. Kha Judahwui shimkhurna Davidwui thi shura.
Kala Davidna Hebronli awunga sāda kum shini kala kachāng tharuk munga.
Nerwui naomayara Abner, kala Saulwui nao Ish-boshethwui raona Mahanaimwui eina Gibeonli vai.
Kala Zeruiahwui naomayara Joab, kala Davidwui raobingna Gibeonwui ra̱khongpamli asamphanga; akhashina ra̱khong akhavāk kala akhapāshina ra̱khong lākhavāk da pama.
Kala Abnerna Joabli hānga, “Yaronaobing ngakarthuida iniwui miktāli ngareoyangranu.”
Joabna “Athumli sāyangranu!” da ngahānkai.
Chieina Ish-bosheth, Saulwui naowui vang Benjaminwui mi tharāda khani, kala Davidwui mi tharāda khani thuingalengriphaowa.
Kala athum kachichā ngazun akui singkhuiriplaga raighai eina tongatheida thitkha sāhaowa. Chiwui vang eina apam chili Helkath-hazzurim hoi, hi Gibeonli lei.
Kala chithangwui rai khangarar zakshilāka; kala Abner eina Israelwui mibingli Davidwui mibingna yuihaowa.
Kala chili Zeruiahwui naomayarabing, Joab, Abishai, kala Asahel, athum kathum zangsai. Asahel chaophei kathāk thāda thāka;
kala Asahelna Abnerli kharomvai, kala ana mikyan makhareilakla angatar eina kharomthuwa.
Chieina Abnerna kapeiunglaga, “Na Asahella?” da ngahāna.
“Mha, ina” da ana ngahānkai.
Abnerna ali hānga, “Uishong lah yāshong ngareivada, nawui kharomkapaili kharomvāda khangateili angaponkhuilu.” Kha Asahelna ali machiholakla kharoma.
