Abnerna Asahelli hānglui, “Ili makharomalu, ina nali khisāda ngaleili pitā ngasakrakhala? Namei Joabli ina kathāda samphangkachangrakhala?”
Kha ana mamayāthuda, Abnerna awukli zeimazo eina toda ngaruiwutmihaowa, kala saosang kahaipam chili thihaowa. Asahel saosangda thikahai rātheilaga chili anganingserhaowa.
Kha Joab eina Abishaina Abnerli kharomvai; kala zimikna tunnanai athumna Ammahli vāshunga, chiya Gibeonwui lamhāngli vākhavai Giah vāshungnanailina.
Benjaminnaobingna Abnerwui thi shurda kuimareiphinhaowa, kala kaphungton akhali kazipkha sāhaowa.
Chiwui thili Abnerna Joabli hānga, “Raikhai eina katang mavaila sāthatpamrala? Akatanga chiya khālakra kaji na matheimala? Achinā ngarāli kakharom ngasām khavai nawui mibingli hāngnaorala?”
Kala Joabna hānga, “Varena katheina,” kaja “kalikha nana mahāngsasi kaja ishi ngathorma eina tangda kharomki kajina.”
Chieina Joabna talla̱ ̱ kakhong eina saikora ngasāmhaowa, kala khipākha Israelli makharomluithuwa, khangararla mangararluithuwa.
Kala Abnerna awui mibingli ngasoda ngayā zatthailaga Arabahshong Jordan kānlaga ngashun pongda zatta Mahanaimli vāshunga.
Joabna Abnerli kakharomwui eina latunga kala ana ashi mi kazipyangser kaji eina, Davidwui raimibing, Asahel mazangla mi tharāda chiko mapeisāthuwa.
Kha Davidwui raobingna Benjaminnaobing chiya Abnerwui mi shākathum hangtharuk sāthata.
Kala athumna Asahelwui angun khuiunglaga Bethlehemli khalei avāva̱wui chikhurli ungchifahaowa. Kala Joabna awui mibingli ngasoda ngayā zatthaida Hebronli kazing ungthanga.
Saulwui shimkhur eina Davidwui shimkhur alungli kasāngkha rai sāngaroka. Kala Saulwui shimkhurna ngazankhangai ngazanda Davidna pangkhangai pangsanga.
kala kakhane, Chile-ab, Carmenli khalei Nabalwui ra̱meiva̱ Abigailna pharai; kala kakathuma Absalom, Geshur awunga Talmaiwui naongalāva̱ Maacahna pharai;
kala khamate Adonijahli Haggithna pharai, kala kaphanga Shephatiahli Abitalna pharai;
kala katharuka Ithre-amli Davidwui preiva̱ Eglahna pharai. Davidwui naobing hi Hebronli kapharāsera.
Saulwui shimkhur eina Davidwui shimkhur rai sangarokta leilakha Saulwui shimkhurli Abner pangshap leilakhaowa.
Saulna Aiahwui naongalāva̱ Rizpah kahova̱li angashirva sāda leisai; kala Ish-boshethna Abnerli, “Kachiwui vang nana ishāvāwui angashirva̱li ngasopikhala?” da hānga.

Chieina Ish-boshethwui tui chi shālaga Abner malungvātshunhaida hānga, “I Judahwui fakuila? Aja eina tangda ina navāwui shimkhurli, achināngarāli, awui ngasotnaobingli khayākashi michinga, nalila Davidwui pāngli mahorsangmimana; laga nana ili aja sha̱naowui pongli phenphāphāda leili.
Varena Davidwui vang ngashit kahai chi ungshung khavai ina masāsi kaje, Abner ili Varena theiranu,
kala Saulwui shimkhur eina wungram khuithuihailaga, Davidwui wungram Israelli kala Judahli Dan eina haophokta Beer-sheba vāshungda semkāra.”
Kala Ish-boshethna Abnerli tui khangatei mangahānkālengthuwa, khikhalajila ana Abnerli ngacheeya.

Kala Abnerna Davidli paomebing Hebronli chihovai, kala hithāda hānga, “Ngalei hi khipāwuikhala? Na ili tuingashit akha sālu, kala yanglu, chithakha Israel saikora nali horsangmi khavai ina nali ngachonmira.”

Davidna hānga, “Phālaka, ina nali tuingashit sāra, kha nawui eina ina khuiki kaji akha leili; chiya, nana ili samphang khavai kharā chitharan, Saulwui naongalāva̱ Michalli rida makhuirakha ili masamphangpaimara.”
Chiwui thili Davidna Saulwui nao Ish-boshethli paomebing chihoda hānga, “Philistinenaobingwui ahui shākha manho sāda milaga kakhui ipreiva̱ Michal ili milu.”
Chieina Ish-boshethna, agahara Laishwui naomayara Palti-elwui eina Michalli vākhui ngasaka.
Kha agaharana chapsasui Bahurim eina tangda ali shurvai, chieina Abnerna, “Zatlu, hanungulu” da hānga kala ana hanunghaowa.
Kala Abnerna Israelwui khararnaobingli ngasanda, hānga, “Atam kasāngkha nathumna Davidli awunga sākhavai phai.
Chieina ara chiwui pongli khuirālu; kaja,
Abnerna Benjamin shimkhurlila ngazeka; chiwui thili Israella Benjamin shimkhur katongala mayāhaira da Davidli hāngkhavai Abnerna Hebronli vai.
Abnerna mi maga̱ thānphunglaga Davidwuili Hebronli khavā eina, Davidna Abner kala mibing chiwui vang zātkhān akha sai.

Kala Abnerna Davidli hānga, “Ina unglaga Israel katonga ishāmei awungawui mangāli kazipkhuira, chieina athumna nali tuingashit sāda ningkachāng athishurda saikorali nana mungra.” Chieina Davidna Abnerli chihohaida ana ringphālak eina zathaowa.
Shāngsheilaga Joabna thānda Davidwui raimibingna kachungkha angaponkhuida ungrāsai. Kha atam chili Davidli ngasoda Abner Hebronli maleisāmana, kaja chingri eina chizathairasai.
Joabna awui raimi saikorali ngasoda khaung eina, ali hithāda hānga, “Nerwui naomayara Abner awungawuili rai, kala awungana ali khikha mathālakla chingri eina ungngasakhaira.”
Chieina Joabna awungali vāda ahānga, “Nana khi kasākhala? Yanglu, Abnerna nawuili rai; khiwui vang nana ali chiho kahaikhala?
Nerwui naomayara Abnerna nali minam khavai kharāna kaji na matheikhala, kaja nawui khaung khavā kala kasākhavā saikora yangkhavai kharā maningmala?”
Davidwui eina Joabna shoklaga Abnerli aho khavai paomebing chihovai; kala athumna Sirahwui ra̱khong eina ali houngluishita; kha Davidna khikha matheilakmana.
Kala Abner Hebronli latungluishita, Joabna keinungwui ngaveipheili ngathumda angazek khavai thānvai; kala ana chili awukli toda, a thihaowa, kaja agato Asahelwui raithit hāngsangkakhuina.
Naoda Davidna kashā eina, ana hithāda hānga, “Ila iwui wungramla

Hiwui kashong Joabwuitungli kala ashi avāva̱wui shimkhur tungli tāranu; kala Joabwui shimkhurli zaizai khangaya̱ nilala, phārrei kagazā nilala, khamā kaza̱ nilala, raighaina kathi nilala, kashakazā khavāt nilala, leichingranu!”
Chithāda sāda Joab eina agato Abishaina Abnerli sāthata; khikhalajila Gibeonli rai ngararlakha agato Asahelli ana sāthathaowa.
Chiwui thili Davidna Joab kala chili leikasābing saikorali hānga, “Kachichāwui kachon serkhākta bora ngavailaga Abnerwui vang chapngachālu.” Kala Awunga Davidna kathi oko chili shurzata.
Athumna Abnerli Hebronli chifahaowa, kala Davidna Abnerwui chikhurtungli panglāk eina achapa, kala mibing saikorala chapsera.
Kala awungana Abnerwui vang chapngachāda hānga,
“Abnerla mangkhama̱na kathi thāda thirala?
Napāngla makhalap,
napheila zurthing masang;
makhayāwui mangāli kongkhalui thāda na kongluihaira.”
Kala latluida mi saikorana awui vang chapa.
Kala mibingna Davidli ngashunshong phazā khavai suiya; kha ana, “Kalikha ina zimik matunranglakha zāt lah khikakha zaakha Varena ili theiranu” jihaowa.
Kala mibingna chi theilaga ringphālakhaowa, kala awungana kasāsā chi yanglaga ningyāng unglaka.
Chiwui vang mibingna kala Israel saikora, chithang Nerwui naomayara Abnerli sākathat hi awungawui ning eina maningmana da theikhui.
Kala awungana awui raobingli hānga, “Israelwui lungli wungnao akha kala kahaka mi akha aja zimiksho shimānhaira kaji nathum theila?
Thao neomihaida awunga sanglala aja I ngazanda lei. Zeruiahwui naomayarabing hi iwui vang pangnahaowa. Makaphā kasāpali awui makaphā athishurda
Hebronli Abner thihaira kaji kashā eina Saulwui nao Ish-bosheth malung kaping shimānhaowa, kala Israel saikora wukkhananghaowa.

Chitharan Saulwui naomayara Ish-boshethwui mi ngaponkazāwui kathāna khani leisai; akhali Baanah, akhapali Rechab hoi; Be-erothli khalei Benjamin shimkhur Rimmonwui naomayara thathuiya (kaja Be-erothnaobing
Gittaimli yāmvāda apamchang kahaiwui vang Be-erothli Benjamin shimkhurli shānsanga).
Chitharan Be-erothpa Rimmonwui naomayara khani, Rechab eina Baanahna ngashunung kasā atamli Ish-boshethwui shimli khavā eina, ana ngasāmkhuida pisai.
Kala yanglu, ashi khāmong khamayonva̱ chila mā sāmathāda singutta pivāhaowa; chieina Rechab eina Baanahna kasainakha azanga.
Anina shimlungli kākhayang tharan, awui petli pisai, anina shaothatta akui rangkhui, kala akui chi phungda Arabahwui shongfa eina ngayā zatthai,
kala Hebronli vāda anina Ish-boshethwui kui Davidli khuivāmi. Anina awungali hānga, “Nawui yangkashe, kala nawui manglā khuikhavai kasā Saulwui nao Ish-boshethwui kui hili leili; aja zimik
Kha Davidna, Beerothpa Rimmonwui naomayara Rechab eina agato Baanahli hānga, “Ka̱lākashi kachiva̱wui eina ili huikhame
kachikathāna khamathā paona da phaningda, ‘Saul thihaira’ da rākahāng tharan awui paowui vang ina sāman mida ali ina tukkhuida Ziklagli shaothathaowa.
Chithākha makaphā mina khamashung mili, awui shim petli pida leilakha sākathata chili ina athut khuida nanili masāthat ngayimala?”
Kala Davidna awui raimibingli kasoda athumna aphei apāng katatlaga phasā chi Hebronwui ra̱khongpheili hokthanghai. Kha Ish-boshethwui kui chi khuilaga Hebronli Abnerwui chikhurli chifahaowa.
Khare kachāng Saulna ithumli munglakha Israelli thānshokkhame chi nana; kala
Chiwui vang Israelwui khararnao saikorana awungali Hebronli rāhānga; kala Hebronli Awunga Davidna athumli
Davidna mungkaphok atamli a zingkum thumra kāshunghairasai, kala ana kum hangmati munga.
Ana Hebronli leilakha kum shini kachāng tharuk Judahli munga, kala Jerusalemli ana Israel eina Judahli kum thumrāda kathum munga.
Chithālala Zionwui raipan Davidna yuihaowa, chiya Davidwui keinungna.

Kala chithang Davidna hānga, “Kachikathāna Jebusnaobingli sāthatra jiakha, ana tara̱khur chieina katā Davidna yangkharingmeikap kaji pheikatek, mik khangapeobingli kāngararranu.” Chiwui vang eina “Khangapeobing, katekbing china shimli kazang masamphangmara” da kahāngna.
Kala Davidna raipan sākahai apam chili pānda Davidwui keinung da hoi. Millo alungshongwui eina thuilaga keinung chi kuimareida Davidna ngaveimithaowa.
Kala Davidna mataisangkhangai mataisanghaowa, kaja saikorawui
Kala ali Israelwuilungli Varena awunga sāngasakhaira, kala awui wungram Israelwui vang mai kāngasakhaira da Davidna theikhui.
Kala Hebronwui eina Jerusalemli akapam atamli Davidna preiva̱ kala ngashirva̱ chungmeida khuida naomayara kala naongalāva̱ kachungkha pharāsanghaowa.
Kala awui nao Jerusalemli kapharābing chiya; Shammu-a, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishu-a, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada, kala Eliphelet athum hina.
Chitharan Philistinenaobingna Rephaim tampāk puitinghaowa.
Kala Davidna Vareli, “Philistinenaobingli angararrala? Kala athumli iwui pāngli mahorsangmirakhala?” da ngasana, kala
Kala Davidna Baal-perazimli angararda chili yuihaowa; kala ana “Tara̱ kaphong thāda
Kala Philistinenaobingna athumwui meoma̱bing makhuiphāla yāmhaida David kala awui mibingna pongunghaowa.
Kala Davidna
Kala nathumna balsam thing tungli mi kazatkhon kashā eina, nathumna ngatha̱phoklu; kaja Philistinenaobingli
Kala
Kala Cherubimtungli chipam kahai saikorawui
Kala kaphungtungli kapama Abinadabwui shim eina Varewui ningkhami oko chi akhuida seigari kadhar akha eina phunga; kala gari kadhar chi Abinadabwui naomayara khani, Uzzah eina Ahiona thaunga,
Varewui oko chi zangda; Ahiona oko mangāli zata.
David kala Israel shimkhur saikora mathānthup eina
Kala athumna Naconwui lanpumli ungkashung eina, sei kongluihaida Uzzahna pāng katingshokta Varewui ningkhami oko chi yonkhui.
Kala Varena Uzzahli malungvāthaowa; kala Varena ali sāthathaowa, khikhalajila ana oko chili apāng eina saza̱haoda Varewui ningkhami oko ngalem chili thihaowa.
Kala
Chithang Davidna
Chiwui vang Davidna
Kala chili kachāng kathum haida, Obed-edom kala ashi shimkhur saikorali
kala athumna
Kala Davidna khamanaka ephod neilaga
Chithāda sāda Israelwui shimkhur saikorana talla̱khon kala khavaokhon eina ngasoda
Kala Davidna sākahai kachonshim alungwui apam ngarān kahai chili athumna
Kala Davidna
kala chili khalei Israel katongali, sha̱nao mayarnao mateila khamuihāng akharip, sā marimkharip da yaowa. Chiwui thili mibing kachichā shimli ungserhaowa.

Kala Davidna ashi shimkhurli somikida unga. Kha Saulwui naongalāva̱ Michalna Davidli samphang khavai shokngarokta hānga, “Achei-arei makathei mi akhana kakhayak matheilākla akhalatta mafakakham thāda awui raobingwui preiva̱ ngarāwui miktāli Israelwui awungana aja akhalatta sāda khalei hi kayākha maikashi otkhala!”
Kala Davidna Michalli hānga, “
Nana mayangkhangai otsak hili lāngda ikhalatta safara; kala nawui mikyanli ina tonmeira, kha nana kahānga preiva̱ngarā china ili masot mira,”
Kala Saulwui naongalāva̱ Michal awui athitlam eina tangda nao mapharāluithuwa.
awungana Nathan marānli hānga, “Yanglu, ina cedarthing eina kasā shimli pamda lei, kha Varewui ningkhami okova kachonshimli lei.”
Chieina Nathana awungali hānga, “Zatlu, nawui ningli kaphaning saikora sālu, kaja
Kha chithang ngayā
“Vālu, iwui rao Davidli, ahānglu, ‘
Egyptwui eina Israelwui mibingli thānshokthang eina thuida aja rāshungda ina shimlungli mapamrangli; kha ina kachonshimli pamda ngasozatching kajina.

Ina Israelwui mibingli ngasokazat pam saikorali, ina wungva̱-wungvābingli khituikha kahānghairala kala iwui mibingli homkhangasaka athumli, khisāda cedarthing eina ili shim masāmimakhala’ da ina kahāngla?
Chiwui vang iwui rao Davidli ahānglu, ‘Ashangva̱wui
kala ina nawui kazatpam kachida ngasomi, nawui yangkashibinglila ina yuimi; kala okathuili ngammeikap kajebing thāda ina nawui aming reimeikap ngasakra,
kala iwui yur Israelwui vang ina apam akha kapangkhuimira, chithāda sāda athumna kachichāwui pamli pamra kala makaphā kasābingna khareli kachotkachāng khami thāda masāluimara,
khare kachāng ina wungva̱-wungvābingli kapangsangda Israelli munglakhawui atam thāda; ina nawui yangkashebingwui eina nali ngasāmkhui ngasakra. Chili lāngmeida
Nawui atam ungshungda navāngarā thāda kathi chitharan, ina nawui naongarā, nana pharākakhuiya akhali awui wungram semkāmira.
Iwui mingwui vang ana shim akha sāra, kala awui wungramwui wungpamkhong mangacheila ina semkāmira.
Ina awui avāva̱ sāra, kala ana iwui naomayara sāra. Ana khangui kasā tharan, ina yur khangateiwui pāngli horsangmida tandi mira;
kha nawui mangāli khuishok kahai Saulwui eina khuithui kahai thāda iwui makhangachei leikashi awui eina makhuithuilakmara.
Kala nawui shimkhur kala nawui wungram iwui mangāli leiching ngasakra, nawui wungpamkhong katang mavaimara.’”
Tui hibingwui athishurda, kala mahākhami hiwui athishurda, Nathanna Davidli hāngsera.
Chiwui thili Awunga Davidna zangda
Kala O
Kala Davidna hili lāngda nali khi hāngluirakhala? Kaja O
Khikhalajila nawui ngashit kahai, kala nawui ningkachāng athishurda narao ina theikhui khavai hakkhamahā ot sāmihaira.
Chiwui vang eina, O

Nawui mibingwui mangāli miyur katei kala athumwui varebing kashamshokkhami eina nawui yurwui vang hakkhamahā kala khangachee khangachā ot samida, akhalatta aming theingasakta Varena awui mibingli Egyptwui eina ngatangkakhui, nawui Israel yur thāda okathuili khangatei yur khipā leikhala?
Kala nawui mi sāching khavai nakhalattawui vang nana nawui Israel mibing sakāmihaira; kala nana, O
Ara, O
kala naming katang mavaila reisang ngasakta ‘Ashangva̱wui
Kaja na, O saikorawui
Ara, O Proho VARE, nava Varena, nawui tui mashunga, kala nana naraoli khamathā ot ngashitmihaira;

chiwui vang eina ara naraowui shimkhur hili sokhamili ningyāng ungranu kala katang mavaila nawui mangāli leichingranu, kaja O Proho VARE nana hānghaira, kala nawui sokhami china naraowui shimkhurli katang mavaila somiranu.”

Kala ana Moab yuikhui, kala Moabwui mibingli pareng sālaga ngaleili pizang ngngasaka; pareng khani shaothat khavai, kala pareng akha chihomi khavaina. Kala Moabwui mibing Davidwui rao sahaoda shai chigata.
Zobahwui awunga Rehobwui naomayara Hadadezerna awui lam Euphrates kongli hankhui khavai khavā atamli rai sāda Davidna yuihaowa.

Kala Davidna awui eina sigui katong mi thingkha kala shāshini, kala raimi thingmaga̱ da ngapaikhui; kala Davidna siguigari shākha shimen khavai sigui taihailaga khangateibing chiya aphei sātekmiserhaowa.
Kala Damascuswui eina Syrianaobingna Hadadezerli ngachon khavai kharā eina, Davidna Syrianaobing thingmaga̱ sāthathaowa.
Chieina Davidna Damascuswui Aramli raimi chipamhaowa; kala Syrianaobingla Davidwui rao sathuihaida shai chigata. Kala Davidna khavāpam kachida
Kala Davidna Hadadezerwui raobingli sināwui chāngveibing chi Jerusalemli khuiung ngasaka.
Kala Awunga Davidna Hadadezerwui keinung, Betah kala Berothaiwui eina pithrai kachungkha khui.
Hadadezerwui raimili Davidna yuihaira da kashā eina, Hamathwui awunga Toina anaomayara Joramli,

Awunga Davidli shālam kala ringkaphā hāngkhavai chihovai, khikhalajila ana Hadadezerli ngararlaga yuihaowa. Kaja Hadadezer eina Toi rai sangarokchingsai. Kala Joramna sināwui ot, lupāsāwui ot, pithraiwui ot ali ngasoda khuivāmi;
kala Awunga Davidna otbing chi khuida
Edomwui, Moab, Amon, Philistine, Amalek, kala Rehobwui nao Zobahwui awunga Hadadezerwui eina kakhui sinā lupā saikora
Kala Edomli Davidwui raimi chipama, Edomwui apampamli raimi chipamvāserhaida Davidwui rao sāhaowa. Kala
Kala Zeruiahwui naomayara Joabna raimi saikorawui atungli yanga; kala Alihudwui naomayara Jehoshaphatna kapime sai;
kala Ahitubwui naomayara Zadok eina Abiatharwui naomayara Ahimelechna pāngmon sai; kala Seraiahna kapime sai;
kala Jehoiadawui naomayara Benaiah Cherethnaobing eina Pelethnaobingwui akhavā sai; kala Davidwui naongarābing pāngmon sāsera.
Atam chitharan Ziba hoda Saulwui rao sakasā akha leisai, kala athumna ali Davidwuili hovai kala awungana hānga, “Na Zibala?” Ana, “Amei, narao ina” da ngahānkai.
Kala awungana hānga, “Ina Varewui lukhamashan mikapai Saulshi shimkhurwui mi khipākha maleimala?” Zibana awungali ngahānkāda, “Jonathanwui nao aphei kateka akha lei.”
Awungana ali hānga, “A kali leili?” Zibana awungali ngahānkai, “A Lodebarli Ammielwui naomayara Machirwui shimli lei.”
Chieina Awunga Davidna mi chihoda Lodebar, Ammielwui naomayara Machirwui shimwui eina ahokhui ngasaka.
Kala Saulwui naomayara Jonathanwui naomayara Mephiboshethna Davidli vāda kui mashunzangda akhoruma. Kala Davidna, “Mephibosheth!” da kaho eina, “Narao I hili leili” da ana ngahānkai.
Kala Davidna hānga, “Mangacheelu; navā Jonathanwui mai eina ina nali lumashanmira; nawo Saulwui lam saikora nali hanmira, kala nana iwui tableli phazārumchingra.”
Chieina ana khorumda hānga, “Thikahai fali ina phakhamei maleimana, amei! Khiwui vang ili chiyakha sakta yangsangmikhala?”
Chiwui thili awungana Saulwui rao Zibali hokhuida hānga, “Saulwui, kala awui shimkhurwui khalalei saikora nawui akhavāwui naoli ina mikahaina.

Na kala nanaomayarabing, kala nawui raobingna awui vang lui chi vāra, kala akhavāwui naomayara zākhavai chiwui heithei khuiungmira; kha nawui akhavāwui naomayara Mephiboshethva iwui tableli phazāchingra.” Chitharan Zibawui nao tharāda phangā kala rao maga̱ da leisai.
Chieina Zibana awungali ngahānkāda hānga, “Awunga ishāmeina kakaso athishurda narao ina sāra.” Chieina Mephiboshethna awungwui naomayara akha thāda Davidwui tableli ngasoda phazāruma.
Chitharan Mephiboshethwui naomayara katenao Mica hoda akha leisai. Kala Zibawui shimli kapama mi saikora Mephiboshethwui rao saserhaowa.
Chithāda Mephiboshethna Jerusalemli pama; kala ana awungali ngasoda phazā ngarumchinga. Ava aphei khanini teka.

Kala Davidna hānga, “Avāva̱ Nahashna ili khayāshida kasā sāda, inala Hanunli khayāshida sāra.” Chiwui vang eina avāva̱ kathiwui wukkakhanang chithei khavai Davidna awui raobingli chihovai. Chithāda Davidwui raobingna Ammonnaobingwui apamli vai.

Kha Ammonwui wungnaobingna Hanunli hānga, “Davidna navāli khayākashiwui vang ninglum ngasak khavai nali mi chihokharāna da phaningla? Keinung hi phākhuida ra̱yang khavai kala ngalei khuikhavai Davidna awui raoli kachiho maningmala?”
Chieina Hanunna Davidwui raobing chili morhā lākharip simihai, phahon ngahunpat katattāmihailaga shiunhaowa.

Hi Davidli kahāng eina, ana athumli angarokkhui khavai mi chihovai, kaja athum khayaklākhaowa. Awungana angarok ngasakta hānga, “Nathumwui morhā mashokranglakha eina tangda Jericholi pamsālu, chiwui thili hanunglu.”
Ammonnaobingli Davidna maringkaphā chi theihaoda, athumna Beth-rehobli khalei kala Zobahli khalei Syriawui raimi thingmaga̱, Maacah awungali ngasoda thingkha, Tobwui thing tharāda khani amasākhui.
Kala tui chi kashā eina Davidna Joabli ngasoda rai ashangva̱ kapingbing saikora chihoserhaowa.
Kala Ammonnaobingna raisāri ngaveiriplaga zangkhavai ngaveili pareng sāda kazipa; Zobah eina Rehobwui Syrianaobing kala Tobeina Maacahwui raimibingna luiwuk khamashāli kazipa.
Joabna khanukshongla mangāshongla nganingphin kahai chi kathei eina Joabna Israelwui raimi hākhuilaga Syriawui raimibingli ngarar khavai nganingrip ngasakhaowa;
khangateibing chi agato Abishaiwui pāngli horsangmida Ammonnaobingli ngarar khavai ngahermithaowa.
Kala ana hānga, “Syriawui raimibingna yuihaiakha, nana rāngachonlu; kala Ammonwui raimibingna yuihaiakha, ina rāngachon jira.
Pingmeilu, kala ithumwui mibingwui vang kala ithum Vare keinungwui vang mayarnao akha sāda ngararsa;
Chieina Joab eina awui raimibingna vānganaida akhangarar eina, Syriawui raimibing awui mangāli yāmhaowa.
Kala Syriawui raimi yāmhaira da kathei eina, Ammonwui raimibingla agato Abishaili mangararla keinunglungli yāmungserhaowa. Chieina Joabna Ammonnaobingli mangararluila Jerusalemli latunghaowa.
Kha Syriawui raimibingli Israelna yuikahai chi kathei eina, Syriawui raimibingna kazipluishita.
Kala Euphrates makānda khalei Syrianaobingli Hadadezerna ahokhui ngasaka; kala athumna Hadadezerwui raimi kathāna Shobachli ngasoda Helemli thānrai.
Kala chi Davidli kahāng eina, ana Israel saikora kazipkhuilaga Jordan kānkāda Helemli vai. Kala Syriawui mibingna ngaherlaga Davidli ngarara.
Kha Israelwui mangāli Syriawui raimibing yāmhaowa; kala Davidna siguigari kathaobing shāshini, sigui katong thing hangmatili sāthathaowa; raimi kathāna Shobachna khamā za̱haida chili thihaowa.

Kala Hadadezerwui rao wungnaobingna athum Israelwui azingli maikashi samkaphang chi theilaga, athumna Israelli amashitkhuihaowa. Kala Israelwui rao sāhaowa. Chiwui vang eina Syriabingna Ammonnaobingli ngachonki kaji tharinghaowa.
Thangngashunkha Davidna ngasāmkakhuiwui eina ngakarthuida awunga dolantungli yaothuikakā tharan, sha̱nao akha ra̱vaikasā thei; kala sha̱nao chi azak mathāshuna.
Davidna mi chihoda sha̱naopava̱ chiwui pongli vāngathing ngasaka. Kala mi akhana hānga, “Chi Eliamwui naongalāva̱, Bathsheba kahova̱, Hitpa Uriahwui preiva̱ maningmala?”
Chieina Davidna paome chihovāda ahokhui ngasaka; kala preiva̱ chi kharā eina ani ngasopi. (Sha̱naopava̱ chi khamakhaowui eina tharkakhui atam sāsai). Chiwui thili ana ashi shim hanunghaowa.
Kala sha̱nao chi nao vaihaowa; kala Davidli, “I nao vaihaira” da pao chihoda vāhānga.
Chieina Davidna Joabli, “Hitpa Uriahli chihounglu” da pao chihovai. Chieina Joabna Uriahli shiunhaowa.
Uriah khaung eina Davidna, Joab kathāda leili, mibingla kathāmameili, rai khangarar kathāhaira, da ngahāna.
Chiwui thili Davidna, “Na shimli ungda phei pheolaga ungngasāmkhuilu” da hānga, kala Uriahna awungawui shim eina thuihaowa, kala awui thili awungawui eina lemmet chihovai.
Kha Uriahna awui shimli maungla, awungawui raobingli ngasoda khāmongpheili pihaowa.
Kala athumna Davidli “Uriah shimli maungmana” da kahāng eina Davidna, “Na kha̱ram eina khaung maningmala? Khisāda na shimli makhaungkhala?”

Uriahna Davidli ngahānkai, “Ningkhami oko kala Israel eina Judahna rāmli pamsera; kala ishāmei Joabla, raobingla khamasaili rairum sāda lei; chithākha ina kathāda phāshak phazāda preiva̱li ngasopirakhala? Nana thei kala namanglāna theira, ina hikathā ot masālakmara.”
Chieina Davidna Uriahli hānga, “Ajala pamsanghaolu, laga akhama nali zatngasaknaora.” Chieina Uriahna chithangla akhama kathāla Jerusalemli pamsanga.
Kala Davidna phakazā hoda awuili aphazā ngaruma, kala marip ngasakhaowa. Kha ngayāshong shimli maungla awungawui raobingli ngasoda piya.
Ngathorshong Davidna Joabli chithi akha kapilaga Uriahwui pāngli sangmi.
Kala chithili hithāda kapisanga, “Uriahli sakmeikap kaja rai mangāli thānngasaklu, kala yāmhailaga ali sāthat ngasakhaolu.”
Kala Joabna keinung kuinam kahai chili ali zangngasaka, ana rai khamarākabingwui apam theihaoda chili chihovai.
Kala keinung chiwui mibingna Joablongli shokngarara; Davidwui mibing kaikha thihaowa. Hitpa Uriahla thihaowa.
Chiwui thili Joabna Davidli raiwui pao hāngchiphunda,
kala ana paomeli hithāda hānga, “Raiwui pao awungali hāngser kahaiwui thili,
awungana malungvātta, kala nali hithāda hāngda, ‘Khisāda keinungli chiyākha nganaida vāngararkhala? Athumna phākhowui eina kaprāra kaji matheimala?

Khipāna Jerubbeshethwui naomayara Abimelechli sāthat? Sha̱nao akhana phākho tungwui eina chakrikui ali horrorda ali Thebezli tākthat kahai maningmala? Khisāda chiyākha nganaida phākholi vākhala?’ jiakha, nana hithāda hāngra, ‘Nawui rao Uriahla thihaira’ ” jilu.
Chieina Joabna kahāng tākam eina paomena Davidli unghānga.
Paomena Davidli hānga, “Athumna singyuihaida ithumli tampākli kharomrai, kha ithumna kharomungluishitta ngavei ungshunga.
Chieina athumna phākhowui eina naraobingli malā kaprāda awungawui raimi thihaowa; kala narao Hitpa Uriahla thihaira.”

Davidna paomeli hānga, “Joabli ahānglu, ‘Chiwui vang wukmakhanangalu’ jilu; kaja, rilala naolala raili kathi khangachāna; keinung chili pangmeida ngararlu, kala yuikhui khavai sālu, kala ali katomlu.”
Agahara Uriah thihaira kaji kashā eina apreiva̱na awui vang chapngachai.
Kala chapkhangachā atam chi peikahaiwui thili Davidna chihovāda awui shimli hounga, kala ani ngakumda naomayara akha pharākhui. Kha Davidna kasā otsak china
Kashānga chiya yaola, seila kachungkha leisai;

kha kachāma che yaolānao lokhuida akhamāng leisai. Ana chi nganaokhuida, ali kala anaongarāli ngasoda nganaokai; awui zātla ngayarzai, tengkotlila mangngaruma, kala khavamla vampamda anao ngalāva̱ thāda sai.
Chitharan kashāngawui shimli khami akha rai, kha awuili rākazanga khami chiwui vang awui seila, yaola shivamhaida, ana kachāmawui yaonao chi khuida khami chiwui vang taithatmihaowa.”
Chiwui vang eina David malungvātnahaida Nathanli hānga, “
kala ana lukhamashan maleilakla hikathā kasāwui vang, ana yaonaowuitungli sharuk matishida mataida hanmi ngayiya.”
Nathanna Davidli hānga, “Mi chi nana, Israelwui
kala ina nawui akhavāwui shimkhur, preiva̱ ngarāla nawui pāngli horsangmi; Israel kala Judahwui shimla nali miserhaira; hi teonai jilala, ina lāngmeida ngarumsangmihairara.
Kachiwui vang eina nana
Chiwui vang ara raighai china nawui shimkhurwui eina mapākthuimara, khikhalajila nana ili chipathaira, kala Hitpa Uriahwui preiva̱li nana ngakumhaira.’
Nana ngathumda sai, kha ina phonglāk eina Israel saikorawui mangāli, kala ngashun kahorli sachitheira.’”
Davidna Nathanli hānga, “
Nathanna hānga, “
Chithālala, nawui otsak hina
Chiwui thili Nathanna awui shimli unghaowa.
Kala Uriah preiva̱na kaphara Davidwui nao chi
Nao chiwui vang Davidna Vareli poi; Davidna kakhum eina pamda, ngayā pongda ngaleili ngakhorpithaida Vareli poi.
Kala ashi shimkhurwui khararnaobingna khāngmathot khavai awui ngalemli ranganinga, kha ana mamayāmana, phakazāla athumli mazāngarumana.

Kashinethang nao chi thihaowa, nao thihaira da Davidwui raobingna hāngkida ngacheehaowa; kaja athumna hānga, “Yanglu, nao hi ringlakha ithumna ali hānglala makhuisangmana; chithākha nao thihaira da kathāda hāngpaira? Akhalatta kalā shikhavai sapaishina!”
Kha raobingna ngakukta khangazek chi theilaga, nao chi thihaira da Davidna theihaowa. Kala raobingli, “Nao chi thihaola?” da khangahān eina athumna,
“Thihaira” jihaowa.
Chieina Davidna ngakarthuida ra̱vaikhui, thao neokhui kala awui kashankachon shinkhuilaga
Awui raobingna hānga, “Nana khikasākhala? Nao chi mathiranglakha nana kakhum eina pama; kha thikahai eina ngakarthuida phāshak phākazā hi!”
Ana hānga, “Nao chi ringlakha ina kakhum eina pamda chapa, kaja ina hānga, ‘Khipāna thei,
Kha ara a thida ngachanghaira, khi khumsāra? Ina ali khuiungluipairala? Ila awuili vara, kha ana iwuili maungluipaimara.”
Chiwui thili Davidna apreiva̱ Bathshebali suiphanepa, kala ngasopida mayarnao akha pharālui. Awui ming Solomon hoi. Kala ali
kala Nathan marānli ringkaphā pao khuivāmi ngasaka. Chieina ana awuiming Jedidiah hoi, khikhalajila
Kala Joabna Davidli paome chihoungda hānga, “Ina Rabbahli ngararhaira; chili lāngda keinungwui tara̱pam khuihaira.
Ara, chieina, chili khalei mibing kazipkhuida keinung chi khuikhavai rairum sālu; maningakha ina khuida iwui ming phokhaora.”
Chiwui vang Davidna mi saikora kazipkhuida Rabbahli angararda keinung chi khuihaowa.

Kala ana chiwui awungawui kuihon chi khui, kuihon chi talent akha kharita sinā eina sai, kala aman kasaka ngalung yur ruksanga; kala Davidwui kuili ngahonmi. Kala keinung chiwui eina ana ot kachungkha ngaponunga.

Kala ana chili leikasā mibingla shimenungda, tinphā-haphā, horai kathā singda ot sāngasaka; kala chekla rikngasaka. Kala Ammonbingwui keinung saikoralila chithāda sāngasaka. Chiwui thili David kala awui mibing saikora Jerusalemli latungserhaowa.
Chitharan Davidwui nao Absalomwui azarva̱, Tamar hoda ngalā khamathāva akha leisai. Khaleilaga Davidwui naomayara Amnonna ali leishihaowa.
Amnonna azarva̱ Tamarli malungchāngnahaida kazāhaowa, kaja ava kachingva̱ sha̱nao sāthuda, Amnonna ali khikha masārarthuwa.
Kha Ammonwui ngasotnao akha leisai; awui ming Jonadab hoi, a Davidwui agato Shime-ahwui naona, kala aworkathem mi akhana.
Kala ana Amnonli hānga, “O awungnao, khisāda ngathor ngazin ningkazāchir pamkhala? Ili mahāngmarala?” Amnonna ngahānkai, “Ichina Absalomwui azarva̱ Tamarli I leishiya.”

Jonadabna ali hānga, “Na petli pida kazārekhaolu, kala navāna nali rākhayang tharan, ‘Izarva̱ Tamarli zāt rupngasaklu, kala ina zāki kaji chi iwui miktāli rāhangkhui ngasaklaga apāng eina rupngasaklu’ jilu.”
Chieina Amnonna kazārekta pihaowa; kala awungana akathei eina, Amnonna awungali hānga “Izara Tamarli khamui hāng khanikha iwui miktāli rasākhuilaga ikhamorli kharup ngasakmilu.”
Chieina Davidna Tamarli, “Napā Amnonwui shimli vālaga kashakazā angarānmilu” da ahāng ngasaka.
Chieina Tamarna Amnonna pida khalei shim chili vai. Kala mathir nailaga awui miktāli kashima khamui asākhui.
Kala awui miktāli hamwui eina khuishokmi, kha ana mashaimara jihaowa. Kala Amnonna, “Hili mi khipākha mapam ngasakalu” da hānga. Chieina mi katonga awui ngalemwui eina shokserhaowa.
Chiwui thili Amnonna Tamarli hānga, “Zāt chi shimlungshong khuizangmilu, laga napāngwui eina zāga.” Kala Tamarna ana sākakhui khamui chi khuida shimlungshong apā Amnonli khuizangmi.
Kha ana awui ngalemli khuizangkhami eina, ana yonkhuilaga “Izara, ini ngasopihaosa” da hānga.
Ana ngahānkai, “Ngga, ipa! Ili namda masālu, kaja Israelwui alungli hikathā mashoklakrangli; maphākakhui mangkhama̱ otsak masālu.

Iwui khayākhamala iwui vanga kali phungzatrakhala? Nala, Israelwui alungli makaphā mangma̱meikap kaje akha ngasāhaora. Chiwui vang eina ina kapona, awungali hānglu, nana ili ngakum khavai ana mamimara majilākmara.”
Kha ana manganāsanglakla, a pangmeihaoda, namda ngasopimihaowa.
Chiwui thili Amnonna ali ningkachaishunhaowa, ana chiyākha leishikasā chili lāngmeida ningkachaihaowa. Kala Amnonna azarali, “Ngakarthuilu, ungulu,” jihaowa.
Kha ana ali ngahānkai, “Masāpaimara, ipā, ili nana sākahai hiliva ili thuikhangasak hi sakmei.” Kha awui tui khikha manganāsangmithuwa.
Kala ali otram khangatha̱ awui raoli hokhuilaga, “Sha̱nao hili iwui eina khuishoklaga, khāmong shungnamhaolu” da kasoi.
Chitharan Tamarna, achālakha awungawui naongalāva̱ kachingva̱ ngarāna khangavai, apāng kasānga katuma phahon chi sangsai. Chieina awui raopāna ali shimenshoklaga khāmong tākkhamhaowa.
Kala Tamarna kuili hotla neolaga awui katuma phahon chi serkhakhaida, kala apāng kuili khangkālaga panglāk eina chapmamānda thuihaowa.
Kala apā Absalomna ali hānga, “Napā Amnonna nali makaphā sāmihaola? Wukmakhanangalu izarva̱, ala napāna, ningli thukna maphaningalu.” Chithāda Tamarna apā Absalomwui shimli amāng ningkhasut pamhaowa.
Awunga Davidna saikora hi shālaga malungvātlakhaowa.
Kha Absalomna Amnonli kashi-kaphā mangasānluithuwa; kaja Absalomna Amnonli yangkharinglakhaowa. Khikhalajila ana azarva Tamarli chipatmihaowa.
Kum khani kāpei kahai eina, Ephraim ngalemli khalei Baal-hazorli Absalomwui yaohah kachichāp atamli Absalomna awungwui naomayara saikorali phazāt hoi.
Kala Absalomna awungalila ahoda hānga, “Narao iwui yaohah chichāpra, chieina awungala awui raobingla kharāmiserlu da kapona.”
Kha awungana Absalomli, “Masāpaimara, ishi marāserranu, na ngalang zarkhavaina, inao” da hānga. Ana hāngluishitlala ana mamayāthuwa, kha sokhamipā mihaowa.
Chieina Absalomna hānga, “Marāserlala, Amnonli kharā ngasakmilu.” Awungana, “A khi rasārakhala?” da ngahāna.
Kha Amnonla kala awunga naomayarabingla vākhavai mamayāranglakha eina tangda Absalomna hānglui hānglui jiya.

Chieina Absalomna awui raobingli hānga, “Amnon mariphaida matuisasān kahai chi yanglu, kala ina ‘Amnonli saulu’ jikhaleoda ali sāthathaolu. Mangacheealu; ina kakaso maningmala? Malung zangmeilu kala pingmeilu.”
Chiwui vang Absalomna kaso kahai athishurda awui raobingna Amnonli sāthathaowa. Chieina awungawui naomayara saikora kachichāwui gadhā tonglaga yāmserhaowa.
Athum maungshungranglakha Davidli pao unghānga, “Absalomna awungawui naomayarabing sāthatserhaira, akhanida mashākmana.”
Chieina awungana ngakarthuida, kachon serkhākta ngaleili ngakhorzanga. Awui ngalemli leikasā raobingla athumwui kachon serkhakhaowa.

Kha Davidwui achinā, Shimeahwui naomayara Jonadabna hānga, “Ameina awunga naomayarabing sāthatserhaira da makhuiranu, kaja Amnonmāng kathina; kaja azarva̱ Tamarli ana chipatmi kahaiwui vang Absalomna sāphalungra da kakaso mida ningli phumhaisaphalung kajina.
Chiwui vang eina awunga naomayarabing thiserhaira da ishāmeina makhuimilu, kaja Amnonmāng kathina.”
Kha Absalomva yāmhaowa. Kala khamayona yaron china yangkhavā eina Horonaimwui shongfa phungreipheivāk mi kachungkha ungkharā chi thei.
Kala Jonadabna awungali hānga, “Yanglu, awungawui naomayarabing ungrāli; naraona kahāng thāda ungkachanghaira.”
Kala ana hāngkup ngasha̱da, yanglu, awungawui naomayarabing ungrāsai; kala akhon shokta soso ungchapsera; kala awunga eina awui raobing malung ringlak eina chapngachai.
Absalomna Geshurli yāmvāda chili kum kathum apama.
Kala awungawui ningli Absalomwuili vangaishunhaowa, kaja Amnon thihaida ningkhalemshaphaowa.
Chitharan awungana Absalomli leishiunghaira kaji Zeruiahwui naomayara Joabna theihaowa.

Kala Joabna thangkhamei preinao akha Tekoawui eina vāphakhui ngasakta hānga, “Chapkhangachā mi akha sākhaninglu, kala chiwui kachon ngavailu, thaola maneolu, kha atam kasāngkha kathiwui vang chapngachā kahai preiva̱̱ thāda sākhaninglu;
kala awungali hithāda ahānglu.” da Joabna preiva̱ chili tui saikora hāngchithei.
Tekoawui preiva̱ china awungawui ngalemli vāda ngaleili kui mashunzangda khayāshilak eina akhoruma, kala hithāda hānga, “O awunga, khangachonmilu.”
Chieina awungana “Nawui kasak khi leihaokhala?” da ngahānkai.
“Iyavo, I ra̱meinaona,” da preiva̱ china ngahānkai, “Igahara thihaira.
Narao iwui nao mayarnao khani leisai, kala ani luili ngama̱haowa; chili anili rāmi khavai khipākha maleithuda akhana akhapali sāthathaowa.

Chiwui vang shimkhurwui mi saikorana narao ili mamayāmada, makathe nao chila, achināli sākathatwui vang athumna ali sāthatra da hānghaowa; chithākha athumna shimluikatla shimān ngasakhaora. Chithāda athumna akhamāng khalei chila shimān ngasakhaiakha igaharawui mingla kala awui atheila okathuili maleiluimara.”
Chieina awungana preiva̱̱ chili hānga, “Ungulu, nawui tuishot hili ina khak tāminaora.”
Tekoawui preiva̱ china hānga, “Khangui chi iwuitungli kala ishāvāwui shimkhurwuitungli tāranu, ishāmei, awungali kala wungpamkhongli maphenaranu.”
Awungana hānga, “Kachikathāna nali hangphāphaakha chipā chi ili khuirālu; ana nali masāza̱rarluimara.”
Preiva̱ china hānga, “Athut khuiki kajibingna ashee matāngasakranu, kala inaomayarali masāthatranu, awungana nawui
Chieina preiva̱ china, “Ishamei awunga, tui akhamāng kahāng khavai pohaoga.”
Awungana, “Hānglu” da hānga.

Preiva̱ china hānga, “Chithakha, kathāda nana Varewui mibingli mamayāla hikathā ot ngarānkhala? Kaja tuitak hi milaga awungana awui kasham kahai akhali shimli mahounglui kaji hiya, nakhalatta yonkhangasakna.
Ithum thiserra, ngalei kathengli tara̱ heitā kahai makhuilui kapai kathāna; kha raithā kahai nao chi ahokhui khavai apong kaphā mi chiwui manglā Varena makhuithuimara.
Ara hi ishāmei awungali hāngkhavai kharāna, khikhalajila mibingna ili ngachee ngasakhaira; kala narao sha̱naona phaninga kaja, ‘Ina awungali pora, awungana awui raowui kapo chi sāmishapra.
Kaja awungana khuisangmida, ilila kala Varena khami inaolila shimān ngasākki kajiwui eina kanmirada shitsanga.’
Kala narao ina Ishamei awungawui tui eina ili chingrihai ngasakmira da phaninga; kaja ishāmei awunga nava mashun-makhui kathei Varewui kazingrao kathāna. Nawui
Chieina awungana preiva̱ chili hānga, “Ina khangahān mathumlakla ngahānkālu.” Kala preiva̱ china,
“Ishamei awungana ngahānmilu” da hānga.

Awungana hānga, “Hiwui pongli Joabwui khangarān zangla?” preiva̱ china ngahānkāda hānga, “Ishamei awungana theisera, kaja ishāmei awungana hāngkahai chili khipānakha uishong yāshong machonmakānrarmana. Tui saikora hi narao Joabna ili tamchitheida hāngkhangasakna.
Ots hi mashungkhui khavai narao Joabna khangarānsera. Kha okathuili khalei ot saikora, ishāmeina Varewui kazingrao thāda theithangmeiser kajina.”
Chieina awungana Joabli hānga, “Yanglu, ina mayā kahaina, vālu, yarona Absalomli ahokhuilu.”
Kala Joabna ngaleili kui mashunzangda khoruma, kala awungali ningshida hānga, “Aja awungana iwui kapo khuisangmi kahaiwui vang ishameiwui mikyanli ili ngahānkhangai chitheihaira.”
Chieina Joabna ngakarthuida Geshurli vai, kala Absalomli ahokhuida Jerusalemli thānunga.
Kala awungana, “Awui shimli ngateida pamngasaklu, iwui ngalemli marāngasakalu” da hānghaowa. Chieina Absalomna awui shimli ngateida pamda awungawui ngalemli mavālakmana.
Chitharan Israelwui ngachaili Absalom kathā mayar khamathā maleilakmana; aphei eina thuilaga akui kāshungda khangakhai akhala makāmana.
Kala awui kuisam chichāpthang (sam sānghaiakha, kum apeilam chichāchāp jiya) khān onyangakha, awungawui shekel shākhaniwui kharit eina ngaraichai.
Absalomwui naomayara kathum, sha̱nao akha da leisai. Naongalāva̱ chiwui aming Tamar hoi; ngalā mathāshuna.
Chithāda Absalomna awungawui ngalemli mavālakla Jerusalemli kum khani peida pama.
Chieina awungali ahāng ngasak khavai Absalomna Joabli hoi; kha Joabna marāthuwa. Kakhane ana aho ngasaklui, kha Joab marāluithuwa.
Chieina awui raobingli hānga, “Yanglu, iwui luiwui thili Joabwui napai lui lei; mei asa̱tāmihaolu.” Chieina Absalomwui raobingna asa̱tāmihaowa.
Chieina Joabna Absalomwui shimli vāda ahānga, “Kachiwui vang eina nawui raobingna iwui lui sa̱tāmihaokhala?”

Absalomna Joabli ngahānkai, “Yanglu, ina nali pao chihorai, hili rālu, kaja awungali angahān khavai nali chihovāda, ‘Khiwui vang ina Geshurwui eina hili ungkhala? Chili pamching kajina iwui vang phākhameina.’ ” Kala Absalomna hāngluiya, “Chiwui vang ara ili awungawui ngalemli vāngasaklu; kala iwuili khayon leiakha ili ana sāthathaoranu.”
Chieina Joabna awungali hānga, kala awungana ali horai. Chiwui vang awungawui ngalemli Absalomna zangda kui ngaleili mashunzang khayākashi mi, kala awungana Absalomli maya̱khui.
Chiwui thili Absalomna akhalattawui siguigari akha kala siguibingla khuida awui mangāli raimi hangphangāli thānzat ngasaka.

Kala Absalomna ngathorthākva̱ thuilaga ngaveipheili anganingning jiya; kala kachikathāna bicharwui vang awungali rākida kazat tharan, Absalomna hokhuilaga, “Na khi keinungwui eina khala?” da ngahānkhui. Mi china, “Narao Israelwui chipāshi shangna” da hāngakha,
Absalomna, “Iya, ngalei hiwui bichar kasaa I ngasāsasi kaja chong! Tui kashok saikorana ili rāda ina mashungrik eina bichar sāmira.”
Chili lāngda Absalomna hānga, “Iyavo, I ngalei hiwui bicharsame sasi kaje chong! Tui kashok kala bichar saikorali ina mashungrik eina bichar sāmira,” da hānga.
Kala kachikathāna ali rākhorumakha, apāng khuishokta vamkhuilaga maya̱khaninga.
Hithāda awungali bichar sākhavai kharā saikorali ana chithāda kasāwui vang mi kachiva̱na ali mayāngaiserhaowa.
Kum khamate apeilam Absalomna awungali hānga, “Hebronli
Kaja, Geshurwui Aramli leilakha narao ina,
Awungana, “Chingri eina vaulu” da hānga. Chieina Absalomna ngakarthuida Hebronli vai.
Kha Absalomna ngathumda paome chiholaga Israel katongali, “Talla̱ kakhong shākhaleoda, ‘Hebronwui awunga Absalomna sāhaira’ da vaoserlu” da ahāng ngasaka.
Jerusalemwui eina Absalomna hokhuida ngaso khava mi athum shākhanina; kha athumna khikha matheila khavāna.

Kala Absalomna pha̱kaphayā chi chigatta leilakha, Davidwui machinme Gilonwui Ahithophelli Giloh keinungwui eina ahokhui ngasaka. Kala khangathum otsak chi pangmamānda Absalomwui mi chungsang khangai chungsanghaowa.
Kala paome akhana Davidli unghānga, “Israelnaobing Absalomli ning horsangserhaira.”

Chieina Jerusalemli leikasā awui raobingli Davidna hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, ithum yāmusa; maningkha Absalomwui eina yāmkashok masamphangpaishina; thākta zatlu, chi maningakha ithumli thaklāk eina ngaphankhuida kalākashi tāhaora, keinungli khalei saikora raighaina sāthatser kachanghaora.”
Chieina awui raobingna, “Yanglu, ishāmei awungana phāra kaji sākhavai ngaraidalei” da ngahānkai.
Chiwui vang awunga kala awui shimkhur saikora thuiserhaowa. Kala shim mayon khavai angashirva tharā haihaowa.
Awunga kala mi saikora awui thi shurda zatthuihaowa, kala khanaowa shimli angasāmkhui.
Kha awui raobing, Cherethnaobing, Pelethnaobing, Gitnaobing shātharuk, Gathwui eina ali shurkazatbing chi mangasāmla ali kanthuiserhaowa.
Chieina Gitpa Ittaili awungana hānga, “Na khisāda ithumli shurrakhala? Nathum yur khangateina, awungali ungngasopamulu.
Nathum ayāmāng kharāna, laga ina makatheipamli kathāda thānzatkachangrakhala? Nachinā ngarāli thānphungda ungulu,
Kha Ittaina ngahānkāda hānga, “
Chieina Davidna hānga, “Thakha vaulu.” Chieina Gitpa Ittaina, awui mibing, naongarāla zangda vāhaowa.
Kala mibing thuikahai theilaga aram katonga chapngachai. Kala awungana Kidron kong kānhaida mi saikora lamhāngshong vāserhaowa.
Kala Abiatharla rāda, yanglu, Zadokla Levi saikora ngasoda Varewui tuingashitwui oko chi phungrāda, mi kachiva̱ keinung makānranglakha eina tangda Varewui ningkhami oko chi haizangda ngaraikhui.
Chiwui thili Davidna Zadokli hānga, “Varewui ningkhami oko chi keinungli khuiunghaolu.
kha kalikha ana ‘Nali ina ningyāngkhaung maleimana’ jiakha yanglu, I hili leili, ana phāra kaji chieina vairanu.”
Awungana pāngmon Zadokli hānga, “Yanglu, nanaomayara khani, naomayara Ahima-az kala Abiatharwui naomayara Jonathan nathum chingri eina keinungli ungulu.
Yanglu, kaja naniwui pao masamphangranglakha eina tangda ina lamhāngwui kathuka chili ngaraisāra.”
Chieina Zadok eina Abitharna Varewui ningkhami oko chi Jerusalemli khuiunglaga chili ungpamhaowa.
Kha Davidna pheihop matongla, kachon kuirunlaga chapsasui Olive Kaphungshong kahaowa; kala ali khangaso mibingla kuirunriplaga chapsasui kāhaowa.
“Ahithophel Absalomwui rairuili zanghaira” da Davidli ahānga. Davidna seihā sāda hānga, “O
Vareli khorum khavai kaphungtonli Davidna kākashung tharan, yanglu, Architwui Hushaina phahon serkhākta kuili ngalei neolaga rārāsai.
Davidna hānga, “Kalikha nala ili ngasovāshumakha, iwui vang sakkhanā ngasāhaora.

Kha kalikhada nana keinungli hanunglaga, Absalomli nana, ‘Thuikahai atamli I navāwui rao sākasā thāda, aruila nawui rao sāpapamra, O awunga’ da ahānglu; chithākha nana iwui vang Ahithophelwui tuili yuimira.
Pāngmon khani Abiathar eina Zadokla nathumli chili ngasokapam maningmala? Chiwui vang eina awungawui shimli nana kashāshā chi Zadok eina Abiatharli hānglu,
Yanglu, Zadokwui naomayara Ahima-az, kala Abiatharwui naomayara Jonathanla chili leiserli; nana kashāshā chi anina ili rāhāngpaira.”
Chiwui vang eina Davidwui ngasota Hushaina keinungli khaung eina, Absalomla Jerusalemli ungchamda leisai.

Kala awungana Zibali, “Khisāda khuikharākhala?” da hānga, Zibana ngahānkai, “Gadha hi awungawui shimkhur tongkhavaina, kala khamui kala atheibing hi raimibingwui vang zākhavaina, kala drakhāra̱ hi lamhāng hili ra̱changnā kahaibingna mangkhavaina.”
Chieina Awungana hānga, “Nawui akhavāwui naomayara kali leili?” Zibana awungali hānga, “A Jerusalemli lei kaja ana hānga, ‘Aja Israelwui shimkhurna ishāvāwui wungram ili hanmiluira.’”
Chieina awungana, “Yanglu, Mephiboshethwui lan saikora chi ara nawui sāra.” Zibana hānga, “Ina khorumli; ishāmei awungana, nawui mikyanli ili ngahānkhangai samphang ngasakmichinglu.”
Awunga Davidna Bahurimli khavā tharan, Gerawui naomayara Shime-i kaho Saulwui shimkhurwui mi akha samphanga; ana rāda Davidli khonshi kazama.
Ana Davidli, kala David Awungawui mibingli ngalung eina thama; kathāna kala kapangabingna awunga Davidli uishong yāshong kuinama.
Kala Shime-ina khonshida “Makānkhana mi asheewui mi, thuihaolu, thuihaolu” da hānga.
Kala, “Saulwui pamli nana mungda, Saulwui shimkhurwui ashee tākahai saikora chiwui athut
Zeruiahwui nao Abishaina, “Thikahaiya fa kathā mi hina ishāmei awungali khi sāda khonshi khavai leikhala? Ina vāda akui arangtāmihaoga” da awungali hānga.
Kha awungana, “Zeruiahwui naomayarabing iwui pongli khi hāngsang khavai leikhala?
Abishai kala awui rao saikorali Davidna hānga, “Yanglu, iwui naomayarana ili sāthat khavai phaakha, Benjaminwui mina kayākha sakmeida sāra! Aningkhānranu, ana khonshiranu; kaja
Iwui kachotkachāng hi
Davidli ngasoda awui mibingna shongfali zata, kha Shime-ina kaphungpei kāroda zatlaga ali khonshi mamānda ngalung einala leipā einala horkazama.
Kala awunga eina awui mi saikorana chotlak eina zatta Jordanli vāshunga; kala ana chili angasāmkhui.
Chitharan Absalom eina awui mi saikora, Israelwui mibing Jerusalemli ungzanga, chili Ahithophella ali ngasounga.
Kala Davidwui ngasotnao, Architpa Hushaina Absalomli asamphangda, “Awunga okpeimeiranu! Awunga okpeimeiranu!” da ahānga.
Kala Absalomna Hushaili hānga, “Ngasotnaoli khamashit hithāla? Khisāda nawui ngasotali mangasozatmakhala?”
Chieina Hushaina Absalomli hānga, “Maningmana; kaja
Chili lāngda, ina khipāli otram ngatha̱ra? Awui naomayarali maningmarala? Navāli otram khangatha̱ thāda nalila ngatha̱mira.”
Chiwui thili Absalomna Ahithophelli, “Ithum khi sausi? Nawui theikhavā chi hānglu” da hānga.
Chieina Ahithophelna Absalomli hānga, “Shim mayon khavai haikahai navāwui angashirva̱bingli zangngasopilu; kala Israel saikorana shālaga navāli chinkāra, kala nali khangasobing pangsang ngasakra.”
Chieina athumna shimtungli Absalomwui vang kachonshim akha sākhuimi; kala Absalomna avāva̱wui ngashirva̱ ngarāli Israel saikorawui miktāli zangngasopi.
Atam chitharan Ahithophelwui tui, mi akhana Vareli ngasanlaga khamatui thāda David eina Absalomnala saklak eina khuisai.
Chili lāngda Ahithophelna Absalomli hānga, “Mi thingtharāda khani kapangkhuilaga arui ngayā ina Davidli kharomvāga.
Ana khananglāk eina ning maphākhuila leilakha ina kashuirak eina vaakha ali khangasobingla yāmserhaora, ina awungamāngli sathatmara,
kala kateibingle ngalā kathar thānkhaung thāda nawuili thānungmiserra. Nana mi akhamāngwui manglā kaphāna, kala mi saikora ning tāphuphaora.”
Kala Absalomla Israelwui khararnao saikorala Ahithophelwui tui chi mayāngaisera.
Absalomna hānga, “Architpa Hushailila hokhuilu, ana khi hāngnikhala, awui tuila nganāyangsa.”
Kala Hushai kharā tharan Absalomna, “Ahithophelna hithāda hānghaira, awui kahāng thāda sāsila? Chi maningakha nawui kaphaning hānglu.” da hānga.
Chieina Hushaina Absalomli hānga, “Hiwui pongli aja Ahithophelna hāngkahai chi maphanāmara.”

Kala Hushaina hāngluishita, “Navāla, awui mibingla raikapinga mānga, kala athum luili singom anao tukkhui kahai thāda sāshilak eina zatta lei. Hili lāngda navāva rai khangararwui pongli themlāk kahai mina, ngayā milila mangasopimara.
Yanglu, aruila akhurli, lah apam akhali ngathumda leilapai. Ngararkaphok atamli nawui mi khani akha thihaiakha, kachikathāna shāda ‘Absalomli kashurbingli sāthatserhaira’ da hāngpai.

Chieina chi shālaga, kazingkha̱ malung kathā nawui rai khamarākbingla ngacheehaora; kaja navā hiya kapanga mina da Israel saikorana thei, kala ali khangasobing chiya rai khamarākabing mānga kaji athumna thei.
Kha ina hithāda phaninga kaja, Dan eina thuilaga Beer-sheba vāshungda khalei Israel saikora nali rākaziplaga, ngayiwui situiyakha nana thānkhava phāmeira.
Chieina ithumna awui khaleipam chi phākhuida ngaleili ikra̱ katā thāda awuitungli rai atāra; kala amāng maningla ali khangaso saikora akhala mataimimara.
Kalikha ana keinung akhali azanghaisālala Israel saikorana chili seipeng eina khalaplaga lamhāngli shimenvāda, akha̱-akhā mangasāranglakha eina tangda mathāhaimara.”
Chieina Absalom kala Israelwui mi saikorana, “Ahithophelwui tuili Architwui Hushaiwui hāngkachithei china phāmeira” jiserhaowa. Kaja Ahithophelwui khamathā hāngkachithei chili yuikhavai
Chiwui thili Hushaina pāngmon khani, Zadok eina Abiatharli hānga, “Absalomli kala Israelwui khararnaobingli Ahithophelna hithāda hāngchitheiya kala ina hithāda hānghaira.
Chieina thākta Davidli ahāng ngasaklu, kaja arui ngayā lamhāng makān khavai chili mapisangpaimara, khikhalala, khikhalala, makānthuiphalungra; maningakha awungala awui mibingla shimānserhaora.”
Chitharan Jonathan eina Ahima-azna En-rogelli ngaraisai; kaja ani keinungli kazang theipaishinada chili pamlaga rao sha̱nao akhana pao khuirāmi kala chi awungali anina chithāda ahāngmarona.
Kha yaronnao akhana theihaida Absalomli hānghaowa. Anina totot yāmlaga Bahurimli mi akhawui shimli angathumhaowa; kala ashi yāngkhupli ra̱khong akha leisāda chili azanghaowa.
Kala preiva̱ china asham shingphinhailaga chiwuitungli mā phuikhaninghaida khipānakha matheithuwa.
Absalomwui raobing china shimli kharā tharan preiva̱ chili, “Ahima-az eina Jonathan kachili lei?” da ngahāna. Kala preiva̱ china,
“Kong kānhaira” jihaowa.
Athumna ngahānlaga maphākhuirarthuda Jerusalemli latunghaowa.

Athumna thuikahai eina, anina ayarli shoklaga Awunga Davidli ahānghaowa. Athumna Davidli hithāda hānga, “Ngakarthuida thaklāk eina kong kānkāhaolu, kaja Ahithophelna nali mamayāla hithāda hāngchitheihaira.”
Chieina David kala ali khangasobing ngakarthuida Jordan kānhaowa; kazing kathang tharan akhanida mataila kankāserhairasai.
Ahithophelna, awui tui makakhuiwui vang gadhā tonglaga keinungshong ashi shimli unghaowa. Kala ashi shimkhurli sāki kaji saikora sāhailaga ngakhākthihaowa. Kala avāva̱wui chikhurli chifahaowa.
Chiwui thili Davidna Mahanaimli vāshunghaowa. Kala Absalomna Israelwui mi saikorali ngasoda Jordankong kānkai.
Kala Joabwui mahut Absalomna Amasali raimiwuitungli yangngasaka. Amasa hi Ishmaelwui Ithrawui naomayarana. Ithrana Zeruiahwui azara, kaja Joabshavāna Nahashwui naongalāva̱ Abigalli khui.
Kala Israel eina Absalomna Gileadli rairum vasai.
Davidna Mahanaimli khavā tharan, ali Ammonnaobingwui Rabbah kha̱li khalei Nahashwui naomayara Shobi kala Lodebar kha̱wui Ammielwui naomayara Machir kala Rogelim kha̱wui Gileadpa Barzillai, athumna,
pet, khongsai, ngaleiham, kehu, napai, zāt, māngatai, theirāthei kala theireitheiyur,
khuira̱, seina̱ makhan, yaola, zangda, khuiphunglaga David eina awui mibingwui vang khuirāmi; kala athumna “Lamhāngli zatta chumchāmlakhairara.” da hānga.
Davidna awui mi saikorali kazipkhuida thingthingwui kala shāshāwui kathāna phāsanga.

Kala Davidna raimi akhum kathum sālaga, akha Joabli thānngasaka, akha Zeruiahwui nao Abishai Joabwui achinā, akha Gitpa Ittaili thānngasaka. Kala awungana raimibingli hānga, “Ila nathumli ngasoda vāra.”

Kha mibing china hānga, “Na marāpaimara; kaja ithum yāmhailala athumna khikhanada makhuimara. Ithum ngayarpak thihailala athumna khikhakhanada makhuimara. Kha nava ithum thingtharāli ngaraikachāna. Chiwui vang eina keinungwui eina ngachon khavai chihorākhamina phāmeira” da hānghaowa.
Awungana hānga, “Nathumna phāra kaji chi ina sāra.” Chieina raimibing thingthing, shāshā eina ngaherher eina shoklakha awungana ngavei ngalemli nganingpama.
Kala awungana Joab, Abishai kala Ittaili hānga, “Iwui mangā eina yarona Absalomli zakshida masāmialu.” Ana kahāng chi mi saikora shāsera.
Chieina raimibing china Israelli rai vāda Ephraimwui ngahongli angarara.
Kala Israel mibingli Davidwui mibingna yuihaida kachungkha sāthata, kala chithang mi thingmaga̱ thiya.
Rai chi aram ngalei vāpeida ngarara, kala raighai eina kathile ngahongli mankathatna chungmei.

Absalomna Davidwui raimili sampakhaowa. Chitharan Absalom awui siguili tongzatsai; kala shirimthing kahaka aphāng shālak kahai azingli siguina yongvāda akui shirimthingphangli huishipsanghaowa, awui siguiva yongchangthuihaida khamasaili a kangyuipamhaowa.
Kachikathā mi akhana atheida Joabli unghānga, “Yanglu, ina Absalom shirimthingli kangyuikapam thei.”
Joabna mi chili hānga, “Kathāyi, nana ali theilakla! Theiakha khisāda ali masāthatthu? Nana sāthatsi kaje ina ringphālak eina nali lupāsā tharā kala shanneira̱ akha da mira.”

Kha ana Joabli ngahānkai, “Lupāsā thingkhawui kharit miga jilala awungawui naomayarali kalikha eina tangda ipāng maparmara; kaja Abishai, Ittai nathumli awungana, ‘Iwui mangā eina inao Absalomli makārmilu’ da kahāng shāser kajina.
Khi kateikhada ina zakshilāk eina sathatkachanghaosi kaje (Awungana makathei maleimana) nava khikha matheimiluimara.”
Joabna hānga, “Nali ngazekta atam shimān khavaina.” Kala ana zeisa̱nao kathum yonkhuida Absalom shirimthingli hokthāngda mathiranglakha mathikli pharsangmiserhaowa.
Kala Joabwui chāngvei phungkhame athum tharāna Absalomli kuimareiphinda ali ngaphitsanghaowa, kala ali sāthathaowa.
Chiwui thili Joabna talla̱ kakhong eina awui raimibing Israelli makharomluila hanungserhaowa; kaja Joabna athumli khāmhaowa;
kala athumna Absalomli khuilaga ngahongwui akhur kahakva akhali horsanghaowa, laga lungkhor juilak eina khorphinhaowa; kala Israelnaobing kachichāwui shimli hanunghaowa.

Chitharan Absalomna ringlakha Awungawui Tampākli awui aming eina lungkhor akha khorhaisai; kaja ana “Inaomayara maleithuda iming phaningung khavaina” da hānga; ana lungkhor chili akhalattawui ming phokmi, kala aja eina tangda Absalomwui wonrā hochingda lei.
Chiwui thili Zadokwui nao Ahima-azna, “Yangkashebingwui pangshap eina
Kha Joabna hānga, “Na aja pao hi maunghāngalu, kateithang unghāngnaolu, kha ajava na mahāngpaimara, kaja awungawui nao thihaira.”
Chieina Cushpa chili Joabna hānga, “Zatlu, nana kathathei chi awungali unghānglu.” Cushwui mi china Joabli kui mashunzangda yongunghaowa.

Chieina Zadokwui naomayara Ahima-azna hānglui, “Khikharanu, ili Cushpawui thili khaung ngasakmilu.” Joabna hānga, “Inaomayara, nana pao unghānglala sāman samphangki kajila maning, na khi ungsānikhala?”
“Khikha-kha shokranu, iya ungura” da ana ngahānkāluiya.
Chieina Joabna “Thākha ungulu” da kasoi. Chieina Ahima-azna tampākshong eina yongungda Cushpali rithuihaowa.
Davidna ngavei khaniwui ngachaili pamda leisai; khamayona china phākhowui eina ngaveiwui shimtungli kālaga kākhangashān eina, mi akhamāng yongungrākasā thei.
Kala khamayona china awungali vaozangda hānga. Kala awungana hānga, “Kalikhada amāngakha, ana pao khuiphungda leira.”
Kala khamayona china khangatei akhala yongungrākasā theiluida khamayona china ngaveili vaozangda hānga, “Yanglu, khangatei akhala yongungrārāda lei.” Awungana hānga, “Ala pao khuikaphungra.”
Kala khamayona china hānglui, “Yongzat kharepā hi Zadokwui naomayara Ahima-az thāli.” Awungana hānga, “A kaphā mina, paola khamathāmāng phungzata.”
Chieina Ahima-azna awungali ungngavaoda hānga, “Phāshunhaira.” Kala awungali kui mashungzangda hānga, “Ishamei awungali khangararabingwui pāng eina kankhame nawui
Kala awungana “Yarona Absalomli khikha mathāmala?” da ngahāna. Ahima-azna hānga, “Joabna narao ili kachiho tharan ngaunlop eina leiphunga, kha ina khikhala kaji matheithuwa.”
Kala Awungana, “Chishong anganingsālu” kaji eina ana kasaikha anganinga.
Chieina yanglu, Cushpa chi ungrāsai, kala ana hānga, “Ishamei awungawui vang ringkaphā paona! Kaja nali makhamayābing saikorawui pangshap eina aja
Awungana Cushpa chili hānga, “Yarona Absalomli khikha mathāmala?” Ana ngahānkai, “Ishamei awungali yangshida makaphā sāki kajibing saikora yaronnao chikathā ngasāseranu.”
Kala awunga ning chotnāhaida ngaveiwui pamkhavai chili kāda chaphaowa, kala ana zatmamānda “O inao Absalom, inao, inao Absalom! Nawui vang I mathikapai, O Absalom, inao, inao” da ana chapa.
“Yanglu, Awungana Absalomwui vang sifada chapngachāda lei” kaji Joabli hānga.
Chiwui vang chithang khayui chi mi saikorawui vang chapkhangachā ngasāhaowa; kaja “Awungana awui naowui vang wukkhanangda lei” da mina chithang shāhaowa.
Kala rai mayuimada mibingna yāmngayin kazatwui kakhayak thāda chithang mibingna keinungli va̱rihaphaowa.
Awungana kachon kuirunlaga, “O inao Absalom, O Absalom, inao, inao!” da panglāk eina chapa.

Chieina Joabna awungawui shimli vāda hānga, “Aja zimik namanglā, nanaongarā, napreiva̱̱ ngarā, angashirvabingwui manglā kankhami nawui raimibingli kakhayakna mai kuirunmida nana athumli aja maishingasakhaira,

khikhalajila nana nali yangkashebingli leishi, kala nali leikashibingli nana yangkharinga. Kaja nana nawui raimi kathānabing kala raimibing aja tharlak eina khikha maningmana da nana sāchitheihaira; kaja aja ithum saikora thihaida Absalom mathisāsi kaje na mathānshunra kaji ina theikhuihaira.
Chiwui vang eina ara ngakarthuida shoklu kala nawui raimibingli mathālak eina hānglu; kaja chi mathaakha,
Chieina awungana ngakarthuida ngaveili shokpama, kala “Yanglu, awunga ngaveili pamda lei” da mi saikorali chishāta; kala mibing saikorana awungali asamphanga.
Chitharan Israelnaobing
Kala Israelwui shang saikorali nganang ngarokta hānga, “Awungana ithumli yangkashebingwui eina kanshokmi; kala Philistinewui pāng eina kankhuimi; ara ana Absalomwui pāng eina yāmshokhaira.
Kha ithumna thao neomi kahaiya Absalomla raili thihaira. Chiwui vang awungali ahokhui khavai nathumna khiwui vang mahānglak kajikhala?”

Kala Judah shimkhurli hāngkhavai Awunga Davidna pāngmon khani Zadok eina Abiatharli pao miungda hānga, “Judahwui khararnaobingli hānglu, ‘Awungali khuiung khavai Israelnaobing rāngasanserhaira; kachiwui vang eina Judahna khanaowa sārakhala?
Na iwui khanganaiyana, na iwui asheena, asāna, laga kathāda nana naomeithuirakhala?’
Kala Amasali hānglu kaja, ‘Na iwui ashee asā maningmala? Ina Joabwui mahut nali raithanme masangakha Varena theira.’”
Kala awui tui china Judah saikorali ningkhokkha sāngasakhaoda awungali, “Nala, nawui raimibingla latungserlu.” da hāngchiphunvai.
Chiwui vang awungana Jordanli latunga; kala Jordan kongli phungkāmi khavai Gilgalli Judahna angaroka.
kala ali Benjaminnaobing thingkha ngasosai. Kala Saulwui rao sākasā Zibana awui naomayara tharāda phangā kala rao maga̱ thānlaga awungali Jordanli asamphanga,

kala athumna awungashi shimkhurli phungkāmi khavai kala awungawui ningkachāng sāmi khavai makān khavaishong eina kānkai. Awungana Jordan makānranglakha Gerawui nao Shime-ina ngakhumshāmzanglaga hānga,
“Ishameina Jerusalemwui eina thuithang narao ina sākahai chiwui vang khayon mamiranu, lah chithang naraowui khayon chi maphaningungmiranu; kala mahaimiaranu,
kaja ina morei sāhaira kaji naraona theikhuihaira; chiwui vang eina, yanglu Josephshi shimkhurwui ngachaili ina rimeithuida ishāmei awungali rāsamphang khavai rākhangarokna.”
Zeruiahwui nao Abishaina, “

Kha awungana hānga, “Zeruiahwui naomayarabing, iwui pongli khi hāngsang khavai leikhala? Kaja aja nathum iwui yangkashi sāhaorala? Aja Israel akhali shaothatkapai atamla? Kaja aja I Israelwui awungana kaji ina matheithula?”
Kala awungana Shime-ili hānga, “Na mathimara” da awungana ali awui khangashit mihaowa.
Jerusalemwui eina ana akhangarok tharan awungana hānga, “Mephibosheth, na khisāda ili mangasovāthukhala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Ishamei, O awunga, iwui raona ili kapikhaowa: kaja narao sheisha̱haoda, ‘Iwui vang gadhā akha shaksāmilu, chi tonglaga ila awungali ngasothura’ da hānga.
Ana awungawui mangāli naraoli thikhavai matuihaowa. Chithālala ishāmei awunga, nava Varewui kazingrao kathāna; chiwui vang nawui kapha chi sāmilu.

Kaja ishāvāwui shimkhur, mi saikora ishamei awungawui mangāli shimānchaohaoki kajina; kha nana naraoli nawui tableli phazākhangarumbingwui ngachaili chipama. Chili lāngda ina awungali pokhavai khi leiluikhala?”
Kala awungana ali hānga, “Khisāda nawui pongli chiyākha matuikhala? Ina tuitak khuihaira: ngalei chi Ziba nani ngayarpakra.”
Chieina Mephiboshethna hānga, “O, saikora chi ali khuikhalairanu, Ishamei awunga, shimli chingri eina unghaida phāshunhaira.”
Chitharan Gileadpa Barzillaila Rogelimwui eina rārāsai; kala ana awungali Jordanli thankā khavai ngasovāshuma.
Barzillai hiya kasarnao kum hangchishat kashung kahai mina, kashānga mi sāthuda, awungana Mahanaimli leilakha ana kashakazā ngarānmi.
Kala awungana Barzillaili hānga, “Ili ngasounglu, ina nali Jerusalemli nawui vang pam mida ini chili ngasopamra.”
Kha Barzillaina hānga, “Ara I karankha okthuirada awungali ngasoda Jerusalemli vārakhala?

Ara kum hangchishat kāhaira; narao ina kashi-kaphāla khi theira, zākaphā mangkaphāla khi theira? Kala mayar-ngalawui laa kasā chila nganākhuishapluirala? Khisāda awungali naraona chotchān sāsangmirakhala?
Narao ina awungali Jordan kānda kasha̱kha ngasovāmara. Awungana khisāda hikathā sāman mikhavai phaninghaokhala?

Narao ili iwui keinungli hanung khavai kala ishava̱ ishāvāwui chikhur ngalemli chifapai khavai khamayāmilu. Kha narao Chimham hili leili awungali ngasoungranu, kala awungana sāmikhangai chi samiranu.”
Awungana hānga, “Chimhamna ili ngasoungra kala nana sami ngasak khangai chi ina sāmira, kala nana ningkachāng athishurda ina nawui vang ali sāmira.”
Chiwui thili mi saikora Jordan kānhaowa, kala awungala kānhaowa, kala awungana Barzillaili maya̱khuida sokhami mida ala ashishim hanunghaowa.
Awungana Gilgalli ungshunga, kala Chimhamna ali ngasounga. Judahwui mi saikora kala Israel ngayarpakna awungali thānunga.

Chieina Israelwui mi saikorana rāda awungali ahānga, “Kachiwui vang eina ichināngarā Judahwui mibingna nali ngathumda khuithuihaida awunga kala awui shimkhur kala awui mibingli Jordanli thānunghaokhala?”
Judahwui mi saikorana Israelwui mibingli hānga, “Awungala ishi theisāna, chiwui vang kathāda hiwui pongli malungvātkhala? Ishili awungana phauihaola, chikā ana ishili khikhakha mihaola?”
Israelnaobingna Judahwui mibingli ngahānkai, “Awungali ishiwui sharuk tharā zangda lei kala Davidli ishi ngavapmei. Kathāda mikpaishipaira? Awungali ahokhuisa kaji ishina mahāngrimala?”
Kha tuimatuile Israelnaobingle Judahpāshina marmei.
Chitharan Benjaminshangli, Bichriwui naomayara Sheba hoda khikha masākhavai mi akha leisai; kala ana talla̱ khongda hānga, “Davidwuili ishiwui yar maleimana,
ithum Jessewui naomayarwui eina shimlui
samphang khavai maleimana;
kachichāshili ungserulu, O Israel!”
Chiwui vang Israelwui mibing saikorana Davidli horhaida Bichriwui naomayara Shebali shurthuiserhaowa; kha Judahwui mibingna awungali mahorhailakla Jordanwui eina Jerusalemli shurunga.
Chiwui thili awungana Amasali hānga, “Kathumthangwui alungli Judahwui mibingli hokhuida kazipkhuilu kala nala chili leisalu.”
Chieina Amasana Judahli ahokhui khavai vai, kha ali langchin sākahai atam chili ana makazipkhuirarthuwa.
Davidna Abishaili hānga, “Bichriwui nao Shebana Absalomli zakshimeida sāra; ana keinungbingli raipan sākhuilaga ithumli hapkhanopaishina, nawui raimi thānlaga ali kharomkhuilu.”
Abishaiwui thili Joab, Cherethnao, Pelethnao kala kapingabing saikora zangda vai; Bichriwui nao Shebali kharomvā khavai athumna Jerusalemwui eina zatuwa.

Athumna Gibeonli vākashung eina ngalung kahakva khaleipam chili Amasa ungngarokrāsai. Joabna raisāri shaksālaga chiwuitungli raighai ahonli sanglaga akashānli shanneira̱ eina ngaveiphunga, kala ana mangāshong zatvāmamānda chi ahonwui eina tātunghaowa.
Kala Joabna Amasali, “Ichina kathamameili?” da hānga. Joabna yāshong eina Amasawui morhāli yonkhuida maya̱ khavai sai.

Kha Joabwui pāngli raighai kasing chi Amasa matheithuwa; chieina Joabna awukli tovātsangmihaida akhari ngaleili tātungda tokhanishi majila thihaowa. Kala Joab eina achinā Abishaina Bichriwui nao Shebali kharomthuihaowa.
Kala Joabwui mi akha Amasawui ngalemli nganingda, “Joabli ngahānkhangaibing khipālong, kala Davidwui vang khipālong, Joabli shurthuranu” da hānga.

Kala Amasana asheemāng eina chanreili ngaleopama. Kala rākakān saikorana, ali kathei eina rānganingsera; mi saikorana rākhayang chi theida Amasali khamasaipam akhali khuivāhaowa, kala kachon akha farormihai.
Ali shongfawui eina khuithui kahaiwui thili, saikorana Bichriwui naomayara Shebali kharomthui khavai Joabli shurthuiserhaowa.
Kala Shebana Israelwui shang saikora peida Beth-maacahwui Abelli vāshunga; kala Bichrinaobing saikora kazipkhuida awui thi shurhaowa.
Kala Joabli khangasobingna Beth-maacahwui Abel kaho apam chil akuinamhaowa; athumna pan ngalemli ngalei thongkai, chiwui eina keinungwui raipan phaklāng chi shirkhaitā khavai sai.
Chieina thangkhamei preiva̱ akhana keinungwui eina vaoshokta hānga, “Nganālu! nganālu! Joabli hānglu, ‘Nali chān ngazek khavai hili rālu jilu.’”
Kala ana awui ngalemli khavā eina sha̱nao china, “Na Joabla?” da ngahāna.
“Ina” da ngahānkai. Chieina preiva̱ china hānga,
“Narao iwui tui khanganāmilu.”
kala “Ina nganāda lei” da hānga.
Chiwui thili preiva̱ china hānga, “Achalakha nganang-ngazaiakha, ‘Abel keinungli achamnākhuilu’ — kaji chānjam akha lei, kala chithāda chamnākhuiya.
Ila Israelwui alungli chingri eina khamathā sākhangai ning katongva̱ akhana, nathumna Israelli ava̱ kasā keinung hi sāshimān khavai sādalei, khisāda
Joabna ngahānkai, “Chikathā maningmana, ina masāshimānmimara, lah masākhayangmara!

Chi mamashungmana. Kha Ephraim kaphungramli khalei Bichriwui naomayara Sheba kaho china awunga Davidli ngakaikashiwui vang; amangli khuishokmiakha ina keinung hiwui eina hanthuihaora.” Preiva̱ china Joabli hānga, “Yanglu, awui kui phākho tungwui eina hortamira.”

Chiwui thili preiva̱ china thangmeilak eina hānglaga, athumna Bichriwui nao Shebawui kui rangkhuida Joabli hortāmihaowa. Joabna talla̱ kakhong eina athum ngathānse haida kachichāshi shimli ungserhaowa. Kala Joabla Jerusalemli awungawuili unghaowa.
kala Adoramna thoukai kaphungwui yangsangkhame; Ahiludwui naomayara Jehoshaphatna kapimena,
kala Shevana thuilinga kala Zadok eina Abiatharna pāngmon sai;
kala Jairpa Irana Davidwui pāngmon sai.
Chitharan Davidwui atamli kum kathum ngaronda chāmrei rāhaowa; Davidna

Chieina awungana Gibeonnaobingli hokhui. Gibeonnaobing hi Israelwui mibing maningmana, kha Ammonnaobingwui shāk kahaina; Israelwui mibingna athumli masāthatmara da ngashithaisai, kha Saulna Israel eina Judahwui vang malungchāngda shaothat kahaina.
Kala Davidna Gibeonnaobingli hānga, “
Athumna ali hānga, “Saulshi shimkhur eina ithumwui ngachaili sinā lupāwui tuila maleimana; kala Israel khipālikha sākathatwui tuila maleimana.”
Ana ngahānkālui, “Chithakha nathumwui vang ina khi sāmilu jikhala?”
Athumna awungali hānga, “Ithumli Israel ngaleili akhanida maokthui khavaiwui vang sāshimān khavai khangarān kasaa,
mi chiwui naomayarabing,

Kha Saul preiva̱ Aiahwui naongalāva̱ Rizpahna kapharā naomayara khani Armoni eina Mephibosheth; kala Meholathpa Barzillaiwui naomayara Adri-el preiva̱ Merab, kaja Saulwui naongalāva̱na kapharā naomayara phangā da athum shini,
awungana Gibeonbingwui pāngli horsangmi. Kala

Chiwui thili Aiahwui naongalāva̱ Rizpahna lunghār tungli bora akha phayairorhai; kala mā hātkaphok eina thuilaga kazing kumda zingrotra̱ matāranglakha eina tangda ngashun ngayā vānaola, sāla marāngasaklakmana.
Saulwui angashirva Aiahwui naongalāva̱ Rizpahna kasā chi Davidna shālaga,

Davidna Saul kala anaomayara Jonathanwui ara̱kui, athumli Gilboali sathatthang Philistinenaobingna Beth-shanwui yarui leihngapha̱li hokthanghaisāda Jabesh-gileadwui mibingna ngathumda khuithui kahai chi akhui;
kala Davidna Saul eina anaomayara Jonathan kala kāngyuithat kahaiya athumwui ara̱kui akhuisera.
Kala awungana kakaso athishurda, Saul eina Jonathanwui ara̱kui, Benjaminli khalei Zela kaho apamli, avāva̱ Kishwui chikhurli chifahaowa. Chiwui thili ngalei chiwui kapo chi Varena khuisangmihaowa.
Philistinenaobingna Israelli rai rāngararluishita, kala Davidna awui raimi thānlaga Philistinenaobingli angarara; kala David khananglākhaowa.
Chieina Ishbi-benob, mireitheiwui naotunna, pithrai kg. kathum tangkhai kharit eina sākakhui awui kazei akha sing, kala raighai kadhar akha thāngphunglaga Davidli sāthat khavai hotnai.
Kha Zeruiahwui nao Abishaina rāfahaida Philistinepa chili sāthathaowa. Chiwui thile Davidwui mibingna, “Na rai khangarar mavāluilakalu, chi maningakha Israelwui kahor shimānhaora” da hānghaowa.
Kala Gobli Philistinenaobingli ngararlui; kala kazei kapem rikha kasinga Gitpa Goliathli Bethlehemwui Jaare-oregimwui naomayara Elhananna sāthathaowa.

Kala hiwui thili Gathli ngararlui, chiwui raili mi kahakva akha awui pāng kala phei khaninili pāngmareng kala pheimareng tharuruk kakā; pheimareng pāngmareng mashing maga̱da mati kakā mi zangsai; ala mireithei naotunwui eina kharā mina.
Ana Israelli kachipat eina, Davidwui achinā Shime-iwui naomayara Jonathanna sāthathaowa.
Athum mati hi Gathli khalei mireitheiwui naotun shimkhurli kapharā misera; athum Davidwui pāngli kala awui raimibingwui pāngli thisangserhaowa.
Yangkashibingwui eina kala Saulwui pāngwui eina
Ana hithāda hānga;
kala kankhamena.
Iwui Vare, iwui lunghārli ina ngayinkhui;
iwui chāngvei kala huimi khavaiwui pangshapna,
iwui ngayin khavai raipanna kala kankhamena,
yangkashewui eina ili huimi.
Ina masot mikhangaye
yangkashebingwui eina huimi.
Kaja kathiwui tara̱na ili kuinama,
kazeipongwui tara̱na ili kuinama;
Kathewui ramwui khara̱na ili neikhuiya,
kathiwui khalenna ili ngasunga.
Ining kachot tamli,
iwui
iwui Vareli ina ngakaowa.
Awui khorumshimwui eina iwui akhon shāmi,
kala iwui kachap ana khuisangmi.
Chieina okathuina nganukta nganinga;
kazingramwui shimphunga nganuka,
awui malungkhavātna nganuk khangasakna.
Anātangkhurli meikhut shoka,
kala akhamorli mei mermer chui,
thingjangmeithā thāda malingtinghai.
Ana kazingram nemzang ngasakta;
tangmangting kahai apheizingli lei.
Ana cherub tongda yongzata;
ali masiwui angachāngli thei.
Ali tangkhamangna kuimareiphin ngasaka,
tara̱na kazipkakhui muiyā kashā awui khaya̱larna.
Awui mangāli kahor chiwui eina meithā malingting eina shokngasaka.
Kazingramwui eina
kala Reikhamataiyana vaotai.
Kala ana rikhānwui malā kāpkhayangda,
yaggashebingli yui.
Chiwui thili
shamadruwui ra̱shongla thei,
apuk-apagwui zangkatangla ngahāhanghaowa.
Kazingwui eina ana ili khāngshokmi,
ngayiwui tara̱ kachungkhawui eina;
Ili yangkakharing kapangabingwui eina ana ili kanshokmi;
kaja athum iwui vang pangnahaowa.
Ina khananglakha athumna ili rāngarara;
kha
Ana ili khamashā pamli khuishokmi;
ngahānkhangaiwui vang ili kanshokmi.
Iwui khangarong athishurda
ipāng kathar athishurda ana samphang ngasaka.
Kaja
Varewui eina yāmhaida makaphā masāmana.
Kaja awui shiyan-chikana ili thānmi,
kala awui ainwui eina I mangareithuimana.
Awui mangāli I shāt makāmana,
kala ina khalāng ot masāmana.
Chiwui vang eina iwui khangarong athishurda,
awui mikyanli mashun otsak athishurda,
Khangavapali nana ngavapmi,
shāt makakā mili nanala shāt machigatmana.
Katharali nanala tharda chitheimi,
phaning khanguiyali khangui nana sāchithei.
Ngahuiri kahai mili nana kanshokmi,
kha hiksor kahai mili nana yangkharingda ngakhuntai.
Mha, na iwui thaomei na, O
kala iwui Varena tangkhamangli hormi.
Mha, nawui mangā eina ina raimibingli yuishapa;
kala iwui Varewui mangā eina ina raipan yongkānshapa.
Varewui apong mangapeilakmana,
ali yāmkhangayin saikorali ana chāngvei sāmi.
Vare hi
Vare maningla lunghār khipa lei?
Vare hi iwui khamakanga yāmngayin khavaina;
kala iwui shongfa kalā mashingasakmana.
kala kaphungli yansāngsa̱ eina chipama.
Ana ipangli ngarar khavai tamchitheida;
chiwui vang ipāngna pithraiwui malāthing hunshapa.
Nana ili nawui huikhamiwui chāngvei mi,
nana ngachonmida ili reingasaka.
Nana ili khamashāpamli zatngasaka,
kala makonglui ngasakmana.
Ina yangkashebingli kharoma kala sākazama,
kala athum makānranglakha eina tangda mangareiungmana.
Ina athumli kupmihaoda;
Ina pharsei pharseisanghaida ipheizingli pitai;
kala athum mangakarthukluithuwa.
Kaja nana raiwui pangshap ili sangmi,
ili khangararbingli iwui mangāli pitā ngasaka.
Nana iwui yangkashebing iwui eina yāmngasaka,
ili yangkakharingbingli ina sākazamhaowa.
Athumna phālala kanmi khavai khipākha maleisā;
athumna
Ina athumli ngaleiwui chifa-chihā thāda ngaphitkachupa;
Ina naikachupta shongfa khangapetwui leikhon thāda sāmihai.
Mibingwui rotkhamarātwui eina nana ili kanshokmi;
yur akhawui akhavā sāngasaka.
Ina makathei yurna ili otram ngatha̱mi.
Yur kateina ili yāmsanga,
iwui tui shākhaleoda athumna kahāng nganai.
Yur kateibingna malung tātungda ngacheerarang ili thākta yāmrai.
kala iwui huikhame lunghār,
Vare chili maiyāranu,
athut hāngsangmida mibingli iwui azingli haikhame Vare,
yangkashebingwui eina ili kanshokmi;
kala yangkashebingwui mangāli ili maiya khangasaka,
nganang-khangazāibingwui eina kankhame Vare chili sochikatranu.
yurbingwui alungli; nali sochingra,
namingli laa sāchingra.
Awui awungali yuikhamataiya sangasakmi;
Ana thao neomi kahaiya chili makhangachei leikashi chitheimi,
Davidli kala awui naotunli,
katang mavaila.”
Hi Davidwui khanaowa tuina:
Jessewui naomayara David,
khangama sāngasak kahaiawui,
Jacobwui Varena thao neomi kahaiya,
Israelwui laa kathemawui marāntuina:
awui tui imaleli sangkhamina.
Israelwui Varena hānghaira,
Israelwui Lunghārna ili kahāngna:
Vareli ngacheeda mashun eina mungakha,
ngathorwui kahor thāda ana athumwuitungli hormi,
muiyā maleilakla kazing kahām kathāna,
ngaleili akhar kharkhavai kazing rokhami kathāna.
Mha, chi tākam eina iwui shim Vareli masākāmala?
Kaja ana katang makhavai tuingashit ili sāhaira,
saikora tāzak kala tāphuphai.
Reisang khavai ana ili mangachonmimarala?
Kha Vareli makatheibingva horkahai ka̱shat kathāna;
kaja athumle pāng eina masingpaimana;
Kha athumli sāza̱ga jiakha mari maningakha zeipa̱ eina chikarra,
kala athum chi ngalāngda meili chuitāhaora.

Kala kapinga kathumwui ngachaili, awui thili kazanga chi Ahohiwui naomayara, Dodowui naomayara Eleazarna. Philistinenaobingna rai sākhavai kakazip tharan Israelwui mibingna ngararlaga yāmkahai atamli ala Davidli ngasozatsai.
Ana Philistinenaobingli ngararda apāng makhanangranglakha eina tangda, sāthata kala asheena raighaila apāngli manuishanhaowa. Chithang
Kala awui thili, Harapa Ageewui naomayara Shammah zanga. Lehiwui luipam, marongthei tarākha khalei chili, Philistinenaobingna rākaziphaowa; kala Israelwui mibing yāmhaowa.
Kha ana luilung chili nganingda machikālakmana, kala Philistinenaobing kachungkhali sāthata; chithāda
Kala khareiya thumrāwui thumrā china māhāt kachāng Philistianaobingna Rephaimwui tampākli rairum rākasa chitharan athumna Adullamwui lungkhurli Davidwuili vai.
Atam chichangli Davidna raipanlungli pamsai; kala Philistinewui raimipam Bethlehemli leisai.
Kala Davidna, “Iyavo, hithalakha kachikathāna Bethlehem ngavei ngalemli khalei ra̱khongwui tara̱ chi ili mimangsi kaja jo!” da mangngailak eina hānga.
Chieina kathāna kapinga kathum china Philistinewui pamkhavai chi kānzangda Bethlehemwui ngavei ngalemli khalei tara̱ chi asokkhuilaga Davidli khuiungmi. Kha ana mamangla
“Chithashara, O
Chitharan Zeruiahwui naomayara, Joabwui achinā Abishaina thumrā chiwui khareiana. Athum kathumwui ngachaili ana mi shākathumli ngararda rungthata, kala maikhayā mingla samphanga.
Athum kathumwui yākha makashunglala thumrāwui ngachaili aming zatmeithuida ana athumwui raithānme sai.

Kabzeelpa Jehoiadawui naomayara Benaiah rai khamarāka mi akhana, hakmahālak kahai otsak kasā mina; kala Moabwui raikhamarāka khani ana sāthata, kala horam thakthang ana kazingkha̱ akha akhurli shaothata.
Kala ana Egyptwui mi yarkhoka akha sāthata. Egyptpa china kazei singa, kha Benaiahna khāmshui singlaga Egyptpawui kazei angapaikhuilaga chieina rungthata.
Kapinga mi kathumwui ngachaili Jehoiadawui naomayara Benaiahna hikathāthā sāda mai khayā mingla samphanga.
Khareiya kathumwui yākha makashunglala thumrāwui alungli aming zata. Kala Davidna ali ngakkhamebingwui kathāna sāngasaka.
Joabwui achinā Asahella thumrāwui alungli akhana; khangateibing chiya: Bethlehemwui Dodowui nao Elhanan,
Harodwui Shammah eina Elika,
Paltwui Helez, Tekoapa Ikkeshwui naomayara Ira,
Anathotwui Abiezer, Hushpa Mebunnai,
Ahohipa Zalmon, Netophahpa Maharai,
Baanahwui naomayara, Heleb, Benjaminshang Gibe-ahpa Ribaiwui naomayara Ittai,
Pirathonpa Benaiah, Gaash kongwui Hiddai,
Arbathpa Abi-albon, Bahurimpa Azmaveth,
Sha-albonpa Eliahba, Jashenwui naomayara, Jonathan,
Hararipa Shammahwui naomayara, kala Hararipa Shararwui naomayara Ahiam;
Maacahpa Ahashaiwui naomayara Eliphelet, Gilopa Ahithophelwui naomayara Eliam;
Carmelpa Hezro, Arbitwui Paarai;
Zobahpa Nathanwui naomayara Igal, Gadwui Bani,
Ammonwui Zelek, Be-erothwui Naharai, Zuriahwui naomayara Joabwui chāngvei phungme;
Ithriwui Ira, Ithriwui Gareb,
Hitwui Uriah, athum saikora thumrāda shiniya.
Chieina Davidna ali khangaso Joab eina raithānabingli hānga, “Mi kayākha leikhala kaji theikhuipai khavai Dan eina thuilaga Beer-sheba vāshungda Israel shang saikora shānkhuilu.”
Kha Joabna awungali hānga, “Leida khalei hiwuitungli shākha shida nawui
Kha Joab eina raithānawui tuili awungawui tuina yuihaoda, Joab kala raithānabingla Israelwui mibing shānkhui khavai thuihaowa.
Athumna Jordan kānlaga Aroerwui eina kala chiwui tampākli khalei keinungbingwui eina shānlaga Gad kānvāda Jazerli vāshunga.
Chiwui thili athumna Gileadli vālaga Hit ngalei Kadeshli vamamānda Danli vāshunga, kala Danwui eina Sidon kuikhui,
chiwui eina Tyrewui raipanshong vālaga Hivnaobing Canaannaobingwui keinung shānkhuiserlaga Beer-shebali khalei Judahwui Negebli vai.
Athumna lam saikora vapeihaida Jerusalemli kachāng kachiko zimiksho khamaga̱ thanghon hanunga.
Kala Joabna mi mashing saikora ngarumkhuilaga awungali unghānga: Israelwui alungli raighai singda rai khamarāka mi lakh chishāta, kala Judahwui mi lakh phangāna.
Kha mi mashing shānkhui kahaiwui thili David ning sāza̱haowa. Kala ana
Kala ngathor Davidna kathui tharan, awui marān Gadli
“Vāda, Davidli ahānglu,

Chieina Gadna Davidli ahānga, “Nawui ngaleili kum kathum zāt sakngasakrakā, maningakha, yangkashebingna nali kharomda kachāng kathum yāmzattha̱ra, jika, kathumthangwui vang kazātkashi nawui ngaleili rāngasakngaikhala? Ili kachiho mi chili khi unghāngrakhala kaji chukmaja kazaklaga hānglu”
Chieina Davidna Gadli hānga, “Ining chotnāhaira; ithum
Chiwui vang
Kala Jerusalem shimān khavai kazingraona pāng katingkhavā eina,
Chiwui thili kazātkashi rākhangasaka kazingrao chili kathei eina Davidna
Chithang Gadna Davidli ahānga, “Vada, Jebuswui Araunahwui lanpumli
wui kakaso thāda Gadna kahāng athishurda Davidna vai.
Araunahna yangkhavā eina, awungala awui mibingla zangda awuishong rākhara theida angaroka, kala kui mashunzangda akhoruma.
Kala Araunahna hānga, “Ishamei awungana narao iwui shimli kharā hi khiwui vangkhala?” Davidna hānga, “Kazātkashi hi makazālui khavai nawui lanpum lokhuilaga
Chieina Araunahna hānga, “Ishamei awungana phāra kaji chi khuida ali chigatlu, rikkatā kachigatwui vang mukkābing leili, thingwui vang okkai, mukkāwui langkon leiserda lei.
O awunga, saikora hi Araunah ina nali mikahaina.” Kala Araunahna awungali, “Nawui
Kha awungana Araunahli, “Machithālu, ina aman milaga loki kajina; ina pheisā mazanglakla
Kala Davidna apam chili hanphut akha sakālaga rikkatā kachigat eina ningyatchigat chigata. Chieina ngalei chiwui vang athumwui kapo
Awunga David ara sarhaowa; kala athumna ali kachon fasangmilala malumthukthuwa.

Chiwui vang eina awui raobingna, “Ishamei awungawui vang ngalānao akha phāsangmiranu, kala awungali ngalāva̱ china otram ngatha̱mida nali ngayurpiranu, chithāda ishāmei awungana lumturhaora” da hānga.
Chieina athumna Israel ngaleili khalei apam kachida ngalā khamathāva̱ phavālaga Shunamnao Abishagli samphangda awungali khuiungmi.
Ngalāva̱ chi azak mathālaka; kala ana awungali otram ngatha̱mi; kha awungana ali mangasomimana.
“Khisāda nana hikathā sākhala?” da avāva̱na atam akhalinida khangahān eina maringphā khangasak maleilakmana. Yarkhokalaka kala Absalomwui thichangli kapharāna.
Zeruiahwui naomayara Joab eina pāngmon Abiatharli ana mashitkhuihaida anina awui thi shurda ali ngachona.
Kha pāngmon Zadok, Jehoiadawui naomayara Benaiah, marān, Nathan, Shime-i, Rei, chili lāngda Davidwui kapingabing Adonijahwuili mazangmana.
