Yao, sei, asa khamathāthā sha̱kei khuida, En-rogel ngalemli khalei Phara̱ Lungguipamli Adonijahna pha̱phayai; kala ana achināngarā, awungawui naomayarabing, kala Judah wungnao akhava saikorali hoi,
kha achinā Solomon, marān Nathan, Benaiah kala kapingabing chile mahomana.
Chiwui vang nawui manglā kala nanao Solomonwui manglā kankhui khavai ina nali hāngchitheiga.

Arui ngalāngda Awunga Davidli zangda hānglu, ‘Nanaomayara Solomonna iwui thili mungra, iwui wungpamkhongli ana pamra da “Ishamei awungana narao ili ngashit kahai maningmala?” Laga khiwui vang Adonijahna awunga sāhaokhala’?
Nana awungali hāngda leilakha ila nawui thili rārāsara, kala nawui tui chi mashunga da hāngsangra.”
Chieina Bathshebana awungawui petkāli zanga (chitharan awunga sarna kahaiwui vang Shunampava̱ Abishagna ali otram ngatha̱mida leisai).
Bathshebana khayāshilak eina awungali akhoruma, kala awungana, “Na khi pokhangai leikhala?” da ngahāna.
Ana awungali hānga, “Amei, nawui
Laga ara yanglu, Adonijahna awunga sāhaira kaji ameinala matheimana.
Ana seila, asākakā sha̱kei, yaola kachungkha pha̱phayāda, awungawui naomayara saikorali, pāngmon Abiathar, raithāna Joablongli hosangsera; kha narao Solomonli mahomana.
Ishamei awungawui thili khipāna wungpamkhongli pamnikhala da Israel saikorana awungawui tui ngaraiserda lei.
Hāngshing machimihaiakha, atam rāda awunga mikpivā kahai tharan inao Solomon ini va̱naonili ngakaikashibingna jihaora.”
Chithāda awungali hāngmahungda leilakha Nathan marānla zangrāsai.
Marān Nathanla hili leili da athumna awungali hānga. Ana rākazang tharan awungali ngakhumshām eina khayashiya.
Kala Nathanna hānga, “Ishamei awunga, nana Adonijahna iwui thili mungda wungpamkhong pamra, da kahānghairala?

Kaja aja ana vāda seila, asākakā sha̱kei, yaola kachungkha pha̱phayāda awungawui naomayarabinglila, raithāna Joab kala pāngmon Abiatharlila hokhuiserlaga phāshak phazāngarumda, ‘Awunga Adonijah okpeimeiranu’ da vaoda lei.
Kha narao ili, pāngmon Zadok, Jehoiadawui nao Benaiah kala nanaomayara Solomonli mahosangmana.
Narao ithumli mahāngla nawui thili wungpamkhongli khipāna pamki kajikhala kaji hi awungana sākahaila?”
Chieina awunga Davidna ngahānkai, “Bathshebali horālu.” Bathshebahna rāda awungawui ngalemli rānganinga.
Kala awungana khangashit sāda hānga, “Kachot atam kachiva̱wui eina huikhame
kaja, Israelwui
Chieina Bathshebahna ngaleili mai ngakhumshām eina khayākashi mida hānga, “Ishamei Awunga David okpeimeiranu.”
Awunga Davidna hānga, “Pāngmon Zadok, marān Nathan, kala Jehoiadahwui nao Benaiah athumli iwuili horālu.” Chieina athumna awungawui mangāli anganingsera.
Kala awungana athumli hānga, “Nashameiwui raobing khuilu kala inaomayara Solomonli ina katong gadhā chi tongngasaklaga ali Gihonli thāntālu;
chili pāngmon Zadok eina marān Nathanna Solomonli Israelwui awunga sākhavai thao neomiranu; kala talla̱ khongda, ‘Awunga Solomon okpeimeiranu!’ da vaolu.
Chiwui thili awui thi shurungda iwui wungpamkhongli ana pamra, kaja Israel eina Judahwui awunga sākhavai ina sangkahai athi shurda ana iwui mahut awunga sāra.”
Jehoiadawui nao Benaiahna awungali ngahānkai, “Amen! Ishamei awungawui
Ishamei awungali
Chieina pāngmon Zadok, marān Nathan, Jehoiadahwui nao Benaiah kala Cherethnaobing, Pelethnaobingna Solomonli Awunga Davidna katong gadhāli tongngasaklaga Gihonli thānvai.
Chili kachonshimwui eina thaokhong chi pāngmon Zadokna khuida Solomonli neomi. Chiwui thili athumna talla̱ kakhong eina mi saikorana, “Awunga Solomon okpeimeiranu!” da vaosera.
Kala mi saikora athi shurda mathānthup eina sipa̱la khongda athumwui ringkaphā akhonna ngalei ngarungninghaowa.
Adonijah kala khavābingla phazākakhui eina akhon chi shai. Kala Joabna talla̱khon chi kashā chitharan hānga, “Keinungli ngaunlop kahai chi khiwui vangkhala?”
Ana hāngmahungda leilakha, yanglu, pāngmon Abiatharwui naomayara Jonathan rārāsai; kala Adonijahna, “Zanglu, na shitsangkapai mina kala kaphā pao khuiphungda leira.” da hānga.
Jonathanna Adonijahli ngahānkai, “Kaphā pao maningmana,” kaja, “ithumwui Awunga Davidna Solomonli awunga sanghaira;

kala ali ngasoda pāngmon Zadok, marān Nathan kala Jehoiadahwui nao Benaiah kala Cherethnaobing eina Pelethnaobingli chihovāhaira; kala awungana athumli kasoda awungana katong gadhā chili ali tongngasakhaira.
Laga ali awunga sāngasak khavai pāngmon Zadok eina marān Nathanna Gihonli ali tharchisinmihaira; kala mathānthup eina keinungli latkhaungwui ngaunlop kahai khon chi nathumna kashāna.
Solomonna wungpamkhongli pama.
Chili lāngmeida awungawui raobingna ithumwui
Kala awungana hithādala hānga, ‘Iwui nao akhali iwui wungpamkhongli pamkhangasak, imik eina kathei samphanghaowa da, Israelwui
Chieina Adonijahwui phākachizatli rākazang kachiva̱ kathirhaowa, kala kachāyām eina yāmserhaowa.
Adonijahna Solomonli ngacheehaida ngakarthuida hanphutwui angaji chili asingkhui.

Kala Solomonli hithāda rāhānga, “Yanglu, Adonijah Solomon awungali ngacheehaira; kaja ana hanphutwui angaji chili singda, ‘Awunga Solomonna awui raoli raighai eina masāthatmara da ili rida khangashit sāngasaklu’ da hānga.”
Solomonna hānga, “Ana shitsangkapai mi ngasaakha awui sampā akhanidala ngaleili matātung ngasakmara, kha makaphā makhayā ningphum ningngai leisaakha, a thiphalungra.”
Chieina Solomon awungana kasoda athumna hanphutpamwui eina ali ahokhui ngasaka. Ana Awunga Solomonli khayākashi vāmiya; kala Solomonna ali “Nawui shimli ungulu” da hānghaowa.
Davidwui athitlam rākhanganai eina anaomayara Solomonli hānga,
“I ara okathui saikorana khavā shongfa chili vāki jihaira. Pingmeilu kala mayarnao shoklak eina zatlu,
nawui
chieina
Chiwui vang eina nawui thangkhamei athishurda sālu, kha asārlam Kazeiramli chingri eina ali mavā ngasakalu.
Chiwui vang eina a khayon maleimana majilu, kaja na thangkhamei mi akhana, ali khi sara̱khala kajila nana thei; asārlam ashee tāda Kazeiramli vāngasaklu.”
Chiwui thili David thihaowa kala Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa.
Davidna Israelli khamung kum hangmatina; ana Hebronli kum shini, kala Jerusalemli kum thumrāda kathum munga.
Chithāda sāda Solomonna avāva̱ Davidwui wungpamkhongli pamda awui wungram ngaziplak eina sakai.
Haggithwui naomayara Adonijahna Solomonshava̱ Bathshebali khavā eina, “Na chingri eina kharāla?” da ngahāna.
Ana “Mha” da hānga.
Kala ana “Nali khichānkha hāngkhavai leili” da kahāng eina, “Hānglu,” da hānga.
“Nana thei, wungram hi ina khuirāna, kala ina mungra kaji Israel saikorana phaningsai; kha
Ara iwui pokhangai akha lei, hi nana makhamayā masāmilu,” da ana poi.
Ana “Hānglu.” kaji eina,
“Phālakhaira” da Bathshebana ngahānkai, “Ina nawui vang awungali hāngmira.”

Chieina Adonijahwui vang hāngmi khavai Bathshebana Awunga Solomonwuili vai. Awungana ali samphang khavai ngakarthuida khayākashi mi; chieina wungpamkhongli pamzanglaga ava̱va̱wui pamkhavai khuira ngasakta awui yāshong pamngasaka.
Kala ava̱va̱na hānga, “Ina ot kateonao akha pokhangai leili, hi khamayāmilu.” Awungana “Ava̱, nana pokhangai chi polu, kaja ina nali makhamayā masāmara” da hānga.
Ana hānga, “Shunampava̱ Abishagli nachinā Adonijahli ngakum ngasakhaolu.”

Awunga Solomonna ava̱va̱li ngahānkai, “Khisāda Adonijahwui vang Shunampava̱ Abishagli nana pomikhala? Awui vang wungram eina tangdala polu; a ili rarkhamei ichināna. Awui vangmang maningla pāngmon Abiathar eina Zeruiahwui nao Joabwui vangla polu.”
Chiwui thili Awunga Solomonna
Ili sakhamiya, kala ishāvā Davidwui wungpamkhongli ili chipamkhame, ngashitmi kahai athishurda ili shimkhur akha semka khangasaka
Chithāda awunga Solomonna Jehoiadawui naomayara Benaiahli chihoda ali asāthathaowa.
Chiwui vang Solomonna Abiatharli
Joabna pao chi kashā tharan, ana Absalomli mamayāsalala Adonijahwui thikashurwui vang,
“Joab
Chieina Benaiahna
Kha ana, “Mashokmara I hili thisangra,” jihaowa.
Chieina Benaiahna, Joabna mashokmara jihaowa da awungali unghānga.
Awungana hānga, “Ana kahāng thāda chili sathatta chifahaolu; kala ngalang maleila Joabna ashee tākhangasakwui morei chi, iwui kala ishāvāwui shimkhurwui eina khuithuihaoranu.
Ishāvā Davidli mangasanlakla ana ashee tākhangasakwui vang
Chiwui vang tākahai ashee chi Joabwuitungli kala ashi shimkhurwuitungli katang mavaila tāra; kha David, awui naongarā, awui shimkhur, kala awui wungpamkhongli
Chieina Jehoiadahwui nao Benaiahna vāsāthathaida lamhāngli khalei ashi shimli chifahaowa.
Joabwui mahut Jehoiadawui nao Benaiahli raimi kathāna sāngasakhaowa, kala Abiatharwui mahut awungana Zadokli pāngmon sanghaowa.
Chiwui thili awungana Shime-ili vahokhui ngasakta hānga, “Jerusalemli nawui vang shim akha sākhuida chili pamlu; chiwui eina apam khangateili mavāpailakmara.
Nana zatphāphāda Kidron kong kānthang thira da theilu; kaja nawui ashee katā chi nakhalattawui khayon ngasāra.”
Shime-ina ngahānkai, “Nana hangkhami chi phālaka; ishāmei awungana kahāng chi narao ina makaimara.” Chithāda Shime-ina Jerusalemli kasāngkha apama.
Kha kum kathum kapeiwui thili Shime-iwui raonao khani Gathwui awunga Maacahwui nao Achishwuili yāmvāhaowa. “Nawui raonao khani Gathli leili” da kahāng eina,
Shime-ina gadhā tonglaga Gathli Achishwuili vai, kala Shime-ina awui raonao khani chi Achishwui eina ahokhui.
Shime-ina Gathli vālaga Jerusalemli hanungluihaira kaji Solomonli kahāng tharan,
awungana Shime-ili ahokhuida hānga, “Nana zatphāphāda apam khangateili vaakha chithang thira da ina nali hāngkazazak kahai maningmala? Kala nanala
Chithākha khiwui vang
Kala awungana Shime-ili hānglui, Ishāvā Davidli nana makaphā kasā saikora chi nakhalattana nawui ningli theida lei; chiwui vang
Kha Awunga Solomonliva somira, kala Davidwui wungram
Chieina awungana Jehoiadahwui nao Benaiahli kasoda ali shoksāthathaowa.
Chithāda wungram chi Solomonna sākai.
Solomonna Egyptwui awunga Pharaohshili ngalā ngakhotta Pharaohwui naongalāva̱li khui. Kala awui shimla,
Chitharan
Solomonna
Gibeonli leilakha ngayāshong, mangshongli

Solomonna hānga, “Nana narao ishāvā Davidli hakkhamahā kala makhangachei leikashi chitheimihaira, kaja ana nali shitkasang mangacheilakla, khamashung khangarong eina kala ning ngatarda zata; kala nana hakkhamahā kala makhangachei leikashi haimiya, kala nana awui wungpamkhongli aja pamkhavai anaomayara akha mihaira.
Ara, O
Kala nana kapangkhui kahaiya miyur, shānla makakhui, mashankharar nawui mibingwui alungli haimihaira.
Chiwui vang eina nawui mibingli nganaothei khavai narao ili thangkhamei ning sangmilu, chieina ina kashi-kaphā theikhuipaira; kaja aja nawui miyur hiyakhali khipāna nganaorarrakhala?”
Solomonna hi kapo theilaga
Kala Varena ali hānga, “Khikhalajila nana ili kashāngla, okapeila, kala yangkashebingli athut khuikhavaila mapola, kha kashi-kaphā theishap khavai kapo hiwui vang,

yanglu, nawui kapo chiwui thishurda ina sāmira. Yanglu, kashi-kaphā theishap khavai theithangkhamei ning ina nali mihaira; nawui thangkhamei thāda khipākha mashoklakranga, kashokla khipākha nawui thili na thāda mashokluimara.
Nana makapo, lan kala khayākakāla ina mihaira, chithāda nali ngaheo khavai awunga khangatei na ringlakha maleiluimara.
Kala navā Davidwui thāda iwui kakaso nganāda, iwui shiyan-chikan mayonchingakha nawui mirinla sāngsangmira.”
Solomonna thuikhamathuk eina, yanglu, chi mangshong ngasāsai. Chieina ana Jerusalemli ungda
Chiwui thili khayorva̱ sha̱nao khani awungawuili rānganinga.
Sha̱nao akhapāva̱na hānga, “O ishāmei, sha̱nao akhapāva̱ ini shim akhali pamruma; kala shim chili pamlakha ina nao akha pharākhui.
I pharāhailaga kathumthangwui thili sha̱naopāva̱ hila nao akha pharai; kala mi khangatei mazanglakla inimang shim chili pama.
Kala ngayāshong kapi eina sha̱naopava̱ hina anaomayarali shirenthathaowa.
Ngayā sailung ana ngakarthuida narao I pida leilakha ana iwui naomayara khuilaga awuili chipethaowa, kala awui nao kathi chi iwuili chipetmihaisai.
Ngathor inaoli na̱ thuishimanki kaji eina, yanglu, nao chi thihairasai; kha ningkachāng eina ngathorshong thuiyang kaja ina pharākakhui nao maningsathuwa.”

Kha akhapāva̱na hānga, “Maningmana, kharinga nao hi iwuina, kathe chi nanaona.” Khare sha̱naopāva̱na, “Maningmana, kathe nao chi nawuina, kharinga nao chi iwuina.” da ani awungawui mangāli hāngngaroka.
Chieina awungana hānga, “Akhana hānga, ‘Kharinga chi inaona, kathe chi nanaona.’ Kharepāva̱na, ‘Maningmana, kharinga chi inaona, kathe chi nanaona.’ da hānga.”
Chieina awungana, “Ili raighai akha khuirāmilu” da kasoi. Chieina athumna awungali raighai akha khuivāmi.
Awungana hānga, “Kharinga nao chi kaikhani sālaga kaikha sha̱nao akhali, kala kaikha akhapāva̱li mihaolu.”

Chieina kharinga naomayarawui ava̱ china awui naoli lumashannahaoda awungali hānga, “Iyavo, ishāmei, nao chi makasāthatmihaialu. Ali miga jilala mihaolu.” Kha akhapāva̱na hānga, “Nawuila, iwuila masāpaimara; ngakaihaolu.”
Chieina awungana hānga, “Kharinga nao chi masāthatla sha̱nao kharepāva̱li mihaolu, chi ava̱ kachangva̱na.”
Awungana bichar sākhami chi Israelnao saikorana shālaga matakhak eina nganingsera; kala mashun bichar sāmi khavai Varewui thangkhamei awungali sangmihaira da theikhui.
Solomonna Israel saikorawui awunga sai,
kala hibing hina awui kathānabingna: Zadokwui nao Azariahna pāngmon sai;
Shishawui naomayara Elihoreph eina Ahijahna kapime; Ahiludwui nao Jehoshaphatna kazipsingme sai;
Jehoiadawui nao Benaiahna raimi kathāna; Zadok eina Abiatharna pāngmon;
Nathanwui nao Azariahna otva̱bingwui akhavā sai; Nathanwui nao Zabudna pāngmon sāda awungawui ngasotnaona;
Ahisharna konungwui yangkhamena, kala Abdawui nao Adoniramna thoukainao saikorawui kashinana.
Israel saikorawuitungli Solomonwui otva̱ tharāda khani leisai; athumna awunga kala shimkhurwui kashakazā khangarān sāmi; athum ava̱va̱na kumkhali kachāng ava̱va̱wui vang ngarānmi.
Athumwui mingbing chiya: Ephraimwui kaphungramli khalei Benhur;
Makazwui Ben-deker, Sha-albim, Bethshemesh eina Elonbeth-hanan;
Arubbothwui (Sokohla Hepherla zangserlaga) Ben-hesed;
Naphath-dorwui Ben-abinadab (Solomonwui naongalāva̱ Taphathli ana khuiya);
Taanach, Megiddo kala Jezreelwui azingshong khalei, Zarethan ngalemwui Beth-shean katonga, kaja Beth-shean eina thuilaga Abel-meholah eina Jokmeam lākhashong shangshungda Ahiludwui nao Baana;

Ramoth-gileadwui (Manassehwui nao Jairwui kha̱ Gileadli khaleibing kala chiwui ngalemli khalei Argob, pithrai eina veiruihai khangavei kala phākho sākahai Bashanwui keinung hangtharuk zangda) kathāna Ben-geber;
Mahanaimli Iddowui nao Ahinadab;
Naphtaliwui (Solomonwui naongalāva̱ Basemathli khangakuma) Ahima-az;
Asher eina Bealothli Hushaiwui nao Baana;
Issacharli Paruahwui nao Jehoshaphat;
Benjaminli Elawui nao Shime-i;
Gilead ngaleili, chiya Amonnaowui awunga Sihonwui ram, kala Bashanwui awunga Ogwui ram, Uriwui nao Geber. Kala Judah ngaleili otva̱ akha lei.
Judah eina Israelwui mi shamadruwui situi yākhana; athumna phāshak phazāda ringphāda leisai.
Euphrates eina thuilaga Philistine vāshungda kala Egyptwui thari tāshungda wungram saikora Solomonna mungsai; kala athumna Solomonli shai mida awui mirin peida ali otram ngatha̱sai.
Solomonwui thangkhawui kashakazā: mathir khamanak kg. thingphāngā, sam kg. thingtharā,
asā kakā mukkā tharā, wonui eina keimathao kahai sei maga̱, yao shākha, chili lāngda chao, sangai, seichui kala har kachungkha zanga.
Kaja Tiphsah eina thuilaga Gaza vāshungda Euphrateswui zingtungshong khalei wungnao saikorali ana mungsai, kala awui kuikhamarei apam kachiva̱li mashitri eina leisai.
Solomonwui thot peida Dan eina thuilaga Beersheba vāshungda Judah eina Israel kachichāwui drakhā yāmgui kala khaorātheilui vazāda mashitri eina okthuisai.
Otvabing china kachāngchāngli Awunga Solomonwui kashakazā ngarānmi kala awuili rāphakazābing saikorawui vang mavātlakla ngarānmi.
Kala kachichāli kaso kahai athishurda nāpaila, lanjila sigui kala raisiguiwui vang apampamli khuirāmi.
Varena Solomonli thangkhamei, theikhuikathei awor hāngkhavai maleila mi, kala ningkahak shamadruwui situiyākha sangmida,
Solomonwui thangkhamei zingshoshong kala Egyptshongwui mi saikorawui thangkhameili henmeikhara.
Kaja ana Ezrawui Ethanlila kala Maholwui naomayara Heman, Calcol, kala Darda athum saikoralila ana thangmameikhara; kala awui aming kazat yur saikorali ngayaovai.
Awui chānjam thingkathumla lei; kala awui laa thingkha apā phangā leisai.
Lebanonli khalei Cedarthing eina thuilaga ngaveipheili khalei hara̱nā eina tangdali laa phoka; sāyur, vāyur, phara̱-pharā yur kala khai yurlila phoksera.
Awui thangkhamei kashā mibing kala awungabingna okathui saikorawui eina Solomonwui thangkhamei anganai.
Avāva̱wui pamli Solomonli awunga sanghaira kaji kashā eina Tyrewui awunga Hiramna awui rao chihovai; kaja Hiramna Davidli leishilāka.
Kala Solomonna Hiramli pao hāngchiphunda hānga,
“Ishāvā Davidna awui
Kha ara iwui
Chiwui vang eina

Chiwui vang eina Lebanonwui cedarthing ta̱khavai khamayāmilu; kaja nana thei Sidonwui mi thāda iwui mibingna thing ta̱kathei maleimana, iwui mibing nawui mibingli ngaso ngasakra, kala nawui raobingli nana mikharān ngalangman ina mira”
Hiramna Solomonwui tui kashā tharan ringphālakhaida hānga, “Hiyakha kahaka miyur nganaomi khavai Davidli thangkhamei nao khame
Kala Hiramna Solomonli pao chihovāda, “Nana ili pao hangkachiphun chi samphanghaira; cedarthingla, cypressthingla nana ningkachāng athishurda saikora ngarānmira.

Thingbing chi Lebanonwui eina ngayili iwui mibingna khuitāmira; kaja pong sālaga khalapta huitāmira kala nana ningkachāng apam chili ina pheimi ngasakta chili nana samphangra; kala iwui shimkhurwui kashakazāmāng nana ngarānmimalu.”
Chieina Solomonna ningkachāng eina tangda cedarthingla, cypressthingla Hiramna ngarānmisera,
chieina Hiramwui mibingna zākhavai kehu chumranao thingmaga̱, kala thao liter lakh mati kum kachida Solomonna mi.
na ngashit kahai athishurda Solomonli thangkhamei mi, kala Hiram eina Solomon mashitrihai ngarokta ani tuingashitla sai.
Israel saikorawui eina Awunga Solomonna thoukai thaoda mi thingthumrā kāshunga.
Kala ana athumli thingtharārā eina kachāngchāng ngatak ngasakta Lebanonli chihovai; kachāngkha Lebanonli kala kachāng khanini shimli pamngasaka, kala Adoniramna khajanā chiwui otpam phunga.
Solomonwui ngalung kashana mi thinghangchishat kala lamwui eina ngava̱ungkhami mi thinghangshini leisai,
chili lāngda ot kasābingli yangmi khavai otva̱ thingkathum kala shākathum leisai.
Awungawui kakaso athishurda shimphunga athumna aman kasasaka ngalung kahahakva̱ phokkhui.
Chieina Solomon eina Hiramwui shim kasābing kala Gebalwui mibingna shim sākhavai ngalung shanmi kala thing sāmi.
Awunga Solomonna shim kasā chi asān khuining hangtharuk, aret khuining maga̱ kala kajui khuining thumrā jiya.
Shimreiwui mangāli khalei yāngkhup chi ungshung vāshungda shim chiwui asān-aretli ngaraichāda khuining maga̱ kala shim pharonkashok chila khuining tharā jiya.
Kala shim kuimareida akom kakā charfa sasanga.
Ana shim phākho kuimareida shimsak akhala, alung zangkhamayar katharapam kala chiwui shimlung, khaninili kuimareida sāshoka, kala arāp kuimareida kā sāsanga.

Khamaze mathāng chi khuining phangā pāka, alunglaina khuining tharuk, kala kakathumna khuining shini pāka; kaja shimrāp kuimareida shim phākho chi khangen akhawuitungli akha mangashom ngasak khavai phākho pharonshoka.
Ngalungbing chi harkhui khavaipamli shānkazakta shim sālakha yāmkar, ngahā kala mari eina sākakhui khutlaiwui khon nilala akhala mashālakmana.
Mathāng azewui zangkhavai shimwui azingshong sai; chiwui eina mathāng alunglila kākhavai thāk sakai; kala chiwui eina kakhane thāk sakāshumda mathāng atoli kāshunga.
Chieina ana shim chi sakāda kuphaowa; kala chiwui ceiling cedarthing kala chikhaimāng eina sai.
Tapkasang shimnaobing chi cedarthing eina shimreili zungkhuisera kala khuining phangāngā juiya.
Chitharan
“Shim kasā hiwui pongli, nana iwui ain alungli zatta, shiyan-chikan mayonda iwui ningkhami athi shurchingakha, navā Davidli ina hāngkahai chithāda ina samilakra.
Kala ina Israelnaobingli ngasopamra, kala iwui mi Israelli mahorhaimara.”
Solomonna shim chi sāda kuphaowa.
Ana shim chiwui phākho alungshong cedar chikhai eina napmithai; chonnar eina thuilaga ceiling khanji kashungda alungshong thing eina hamserhai; kala ana chonnar chi cypress chikhai eina hamsera.

Ana shim khanukshong khuining maga̱ sasanglaga, chonnar eina thuilaga ceiling kazokta cedar chikhai eina napmithai; kala hiwui alungli tharmathengmeikap kaji pam chi alung zangkhamayar katharapamli ana sāsanga.
Alung zangkhamayar katharapamwui mangāshong khalei kā chi khuining hangmatiya.
Shimlungshong khanāp cedarthingbing chili shon kala awon khangatām thāda yeksanga; cedar eina napmithaida ngalungzak matheilakmana.
wui tuingashit oko chi haikhavai zangkhamayar kathara kā chi ana shim chiwui zangmayarmeikap kaji pamli sai.
Alungwui kathara kā chi khuining maga̱ sanga, maga̱ pāka kala maga̱ juiya; kala chi sinā kachanga eina heirormithai. Kala ana cedarthingwui hanphut akhala sākhui.
Kala Solomonna shimlung hupta sinā kachanga heimitsanga, kala alung zangkhamayar katharapam chiwui mangāli sināwui huishon ungshung vāshungda thāngda chila sināmang eina heirormithai.
Kala shim katonga sinā heirormithai. Kala alungkhamayar apam chili kahai hanphut chila sinā eina rommithai.
Cherubwui angachāng akhana khuining phangāngā sānga; cherub akhawui angachāng atonwui eina khangatei aton vāshungda khuining tharārā sanga.
Cherub akhapa chila angachāng atonwui eina khangatei aton vāshungda khuining tharārā sanga, cherubim khanini chi kahak kateo kala azakla ngaraichai.
Cherub akhawui kajui khuining tharāna, akhapa chila chiyākha juiya.

Cherubim chi shim chiwui alung zangmayarmeikap kaji katharapam chili haihai; cherubimwui angachangbing chi harshokta akhawui angachangtonna phākho akhali za̱ya, akhapāwui angachangtonna phākho lākhavāk vaza̱da angachangton lakharip shim alungshong ngasun ngasaka.
Kala Cherubim chila ana sinā heirormita.
Shimwui alung ayar mateila phākho peida cherubim, khaneirong, awon khangatām yeksangsera.
Shimwui alung kala ayār kāwui chonnar katonga sinā eina heirormita.
Zangkhamayar katharapam zangkhavai khāmong chi ana olivething eina sai; kala chaokatla akhuithingla achikun phangā shokngasaka.
Ana khāmong khani chi olivething eina sāda cherubimbing, khaneirong kala awon khangatām yeksanga, kala sinā eina roma; kala cherubim eina khaneirongli sinā heirorlui.
Shimreiwui zangkhavai khāmong chi asān-aret ngaraichada olive thing eina sai,
cypressthing eina khāmong khani sāsanga; khāmong khanini chi tipthathuipaiya.
Khamong khani chili ana cherubim, khaneirong kala awon khangatām yeksangsera; kala yekkasang kachiva̱ ngaraichāda sinā heirormita.
Shim alung zangkhamayarwui yāngkhup chi shānkazak kahai lungpho kathum kala cedarthingphor akha eina kasā khangen ngaherkha eina sakai.
Khamate kum Tatharaha kachāngli,
Kala kum tharāda akha kākashung eina, Bul kachāng, kaja kachishata kachāng, shim katonga, sāsangkhangai thishurda kuphaowa. Ana shim chi kasāli kum shini zanga.
Solomonna awui shim kasā kakup eina tangda kum tharāda kathum zanga.
Ana Lebanon Ngahong Shim chi khuining shākha sāng, hangphangā pāk, thumrā jui kala cedarthingwui pakra̱ ngaher kathum shuna; chiwuitungli cedarthing khangen para.
Pakra̱ tharāda phangā khangahera pakra̱ hangmatida phangā khalei kā chiwuitungli cedarthing eina romshāna.
Ngaher kathuthumli charfa akom ava̱va̱ lei; kala charfa mathāng kathum kāroda uta.
Khamongla charfala asān-aret ngaraikachā akom sāsangsera; kala charfa mathāng kathumthum eina karo ngaroka.
Pākra̱ Shim kā chi ana khuining hangphangā sāng, thumrā pāk; kala chiwui mangāshong pakra̱ shunlaga rāmrah kaharshokta sai.
Kala ana bichar sākhavai Wungpamkhong Shim chi, Bicharwui Shimlar chila; chonnar eina thuilaga kasho kāshungda katonga cedarthing eina sai.
Saikora hi aman kasaka ngalung eina amai, akhanuk nāp tamlaga horai eina hātkhui; shimphunga eina thuilaga yāngkhup kāshungda, shimlung kayāng eina thuilaga
Shimphunga chi aphei khuining chishat, tharā kapāka aman kasaka ngalungmāng eina sai.
Chiwuitungli aman kasak ngalungbing cedarthing chila nāp onkazaklaga hātkakhuimānga.
Khareiya shimlung kayāng thāda hātkakhui ngalung ngaphor kathum kala cedar khāngen ngaherkha eina sākai; alung zangkhamayar kayāng khamasai eina yāngkhupla chithāpapama.
Awunga Solomonna Hiramli Tyrewui eina ahokhui ngasaka.

Ava Naphtali shangwui ra̱meinao akhawui naona. Avāva̱ Tyrewui mina, kala kori, pithrai kasema mi sāsai; a hi thangkhameila thangmei, kathemla themlaka; kala koriwui ot satheisera. Ana Awunga Solomonwui sākhangai saikora sāmi.
Pākra̱ khani chiwui atungli kashong khavai kori eina heikakhui agui khanila sākhui; khani chi khuining phangāngā sangthathui.
Pākra̱ tungli shongkahai agui khani chili sināchā thāda khāntarānlaga agui akhawui vang akha kala agui khangatei akhawui vang akha sāsanga.
Chi tākam eina ana kabothei thāda sākhui; kala pākra̱ tungli khalei agui chi faror khavai ngaherkhani sāda kabothei chi khānkatarān chili sāsanga; kala khangatei agui chila chi takam eina sāsanga.
Yangkhupli shunkahai pākra̱ khaniwuitungli shongkahai agui khani chi timrāwon thāda sākhui, kala khuining matiti juiya.

Agui khani chi pākra̱ khaniwuitungli kala khānkatarānwui ngalemli ngumda ngakhārkashok chiwui atungli shonghai. Chili ngaherkhani eina kabothei shākhani sāsanga; chi honkam eina khangatei aguilila yeksanga.
Ana pākra̱ khani chi Khorumshimwui yāngkhupli shuna; azingshong shunkahai chili Jachin phokmi, kala atungshong shunkahai chili Boaz phokmi.
Pākra̱ atonli timrāwon thāda sāsanga. Hithāda pākra̱wui ot kuphaowa.
Chiwui akhamong khuining thumrā chi peida azingli shon pareng khani eina ruksangsera; ra̱khonnao kahei atamli heishān kahaina.
Seima̱ tharāda khani, atungshong kathum, zingtunshong kathum, azingshong kathum kala zingshoshong kathum da ngareilaga khanuk ngasunripta ra̱khon chi athumwuitungli parhai.
Chiwui kashā pāngmayā parkhaya; kala akhamong tengkotwui thāda timrāwon khangatām thāda sākhui; kala tara̱ liter thinghangmati hi zangshapa.
Ana Kori eina khaning khavai aphei tharā sākhui; khaning khavai aphei ava̱va̱na khuining mati sānga, mati pāka, kala kathuthum juiya.
Khaning khavai aphei chi hithāda sākhui: aphei ava̱va̱wui akongnā ngavai, akongnābing chi akombingli sanga
kala akomli kasang akongnā ava̱va̱li kazingkha̱, mukkā, cherubim sāsangsera. Kala kazingkha̱ eina mukvāwui atunglila azinglila khareiung khareivada awon chā thāda sāsanga.
Chili lāngda aphei ava̱va̱li koriwui kāngphei matiti kala chiwui phungva̱ kāsera; kala achikun matili khongsai chi parkhavai kāsera. Parkhavaibing chi awon chā thāda arāp kachida heishān kahaina.
Aphei chiwui akhamor khuining akha ngakhārkashoka akhamor hamphei thāda ngumrikhai kala khuining akha tangkhai thuka; kha akongnābing che mangumla ngaraikachā achikun ngasai.
Kāngphei mati chi akongnāwui azingli phona kala chiwui phungva̱bing chi apheithingli sāshāna. Kāngphei akhawui kajui khuining akha tangkhaina.
Kāngpheibing chi siguigariwui thāda sākhui, chiwui phungva̱bing, kakui thingla, kasuila, ashamla heikakhuisera.
Aphei ava̱va̱wui achikun matili zungkhavai mati kāsera, zungkhavai chi apheili sāshana.
Kala aphei chiwui atungvāk khuining makhai juida neiunga; kala apheiwui atonli zungkhavai eina akongnā chi asā akha sāngasaka.
Zungkhavai eina akongnāli cherubimla, kazingkha̱la, khaneirongla zangkapai eina tangda, awon chā thāda yeksanga.
Chithāda, aphei tharā chi asān-aretla, azakla ngaraichāda heikhuisera.
Kala ana aphei phangā shim chiwui azingshong haihai, phangāna atungshong kala ra̱khonnao chi azingshongwui zingsho achithekli haihai.
Hiramnala, kapei, khongsai, ham sākhuisera. Kala
Pākra̱ khani kala chiwui atungli shongkhavai agui khani, aguiwui akhongli faror khavai khānkatarān khani;
kala khānkatarān khanili kāngyui khavai kabothei shāmati khānkatarān kachiva̱wui kabothei ngaher khaninina pākra̱ tungwui aguitungli khalei akhong chi fakham khavaina;
aphei tharā chi khongsai tharā eina ngasoda nganinga;
ra̱khonnao akha, kala ra̱khon rungkhavai mukkā tharāda khani da sākhui.
wui shimli haikhavai Awunga Solomonwui vang Hiramna sākhami ham, kapei kala khongsaibing chi kahinga pithrai eina kasāsera.
Kala hibing hi Jordanwui tampākli Succoth eina Zarethanwui ngachaili awungana leikhon eina heikhui ngasaka.
Thongthāngbing chi chungnā kahaiwui vang Solomonna khān maonthuwa, pithrai kayākhakhala kaji matheithuwa.
sināmāng eina kasā meishong: alung zangkhamayar katharapam mangāli azingshong phangā, phangāna atungshong; sināwui awon, thaomei, changjeebingla sinā eina sai;

tengkot, samchichap, khongsai, khongphei kala nganamkaphā rikkhavai, khāng sinā eina sāsera; kala tharmathengmeikap kaje pamwui khāmong alung zangkhamayar katharapamwui khāmong kala shimlungwui khāmongli pānkhui khavai kapichā sināsera.
Kashine kachāng, kaja Ethanim (Pi) kachāngwui phanit atamli Israelnao katonga Awunga Solomonwuili akazipa.
Israelwui ararbing rāserda pāngmonbingna oko chi akhui.
wui oko, kazip khavai kachonshim kala chili haikahai kathara khorkhongbing saikora akhuida Levinaobing eina pāngmonbing saikorana khuiunga.
Awunga Solomonli ngasoda awui mangāli kazip kahai Israelwui ashangva̱ china oko mangāli kazipa; yaola, seila sorngasaida mashing mashānkharar pha̱phayai.
Chiwui thili
Kaja cherubim chi angachāng hārlaga haikahaiwui vang okolila kala chi ngava̱ khavai thingphān chilila rānkhammi.
Thingphān khani chi sangnāhaoda amareibing chi tharkhamatheng zangkhamayārwui eina theizangshapa, kha ayārwui einava matheimana; kala chi aja eina tangda lei.
Oko chili athumna Egyptwui eina kashok tharan,
kala muiyā pemhaoda pāngmonbingna nganingda otramla mangatha̱paithuwa; kaja
“Kazingli
kha tangmangting kahaipamli pamtha̱ra ji.
Juikhamataiya shim ina sāmihaira,
mashimānda nawui pamkhavai.”
Chiwui thili awungana mai ngareivāda Israel yaruina kaziplakha athum katongali somi.
Kala ana hānga, “Ishāvā Davidli awui khamor eina ngashit kahai chi apāng eina ungshungkhame Israelwui

ana hithāda hānghaisai, ‘Egyptwui eina Israel mibingli ina khuishokthangwui eina thuida, shim akha sāda iwui ming leikhavai Israel shang saikorawui alungli keinung akhala kapangkakhui maleimana, kha iwui mibingli nganaomi khavai ina Davidli kapangkhui.’”
kha
chithālala nana masāmara, kha nana pharākhuiki kaji nanao mayara china imingwui vang shim chi sanaora.’
“Ara
Kala Egyptwui eina athumli thānkashok tharan
Chiwui thili Israelwui kazip saikora khalei
“O
narao David ishāvāli nana ngashit kahai chi makailakmana. Kachangkhat eina nakhamorna hāngkahai chi aja napāng eina ungshungmi.
Chiwui vang eina ara, O
Ara chiwui vang eina, O Israelwui Vare, narao ishāvā Davidli hāngkahai tui chi ungshung ngasakmilu.
“Kha Varena okathuili pamkachangrala? Yanglu, kazingram eina juikhamataiya kazingram chilila mapamphayoakha ina sākakhui shim hina khi jirakhala!
Chithālala narao ina seihā sāda kapo hi, O
chieina apam hiwui eina naraona kachigat kasā chili nana shāmida, ‘Iwui ming leichingra’ da nana hāngkahai shim hili ngashun ngayā mateila khayangsangmilu.
Narao kala nawui Israel mibingna apam hishong ngareirālaga kapo chitharan kashāmilu; nawui somkhavai pam kazingramli kashāmilu; kala nana kashā tharan kapheomilu.
“Mi akhana awui khongnainaoli khayon ot sāhaida shim hili kālaga hanphutwui mangāli tuingashit khuiakha,
nana kazingramli shākāmida narao khayonali khayon athishurda, khamashungali khamashung athishurda bichar sāda sāman milu.
“Nawui mi Israelna nali morei kasāwui vang yangkashibingna maishi kahai tharan nali mai ngareiungluishitta namingli hāngphatlaga shim hili rāpoda seihā saakha,
nana kazingramli shāmida, nawui mi Israelwui morei kapheomilu, kala ishāvā ngarāli nana mikahai ngalei chili kathānungmiluilu.
“Athumna nali morei kasāwui vang kazingram shunghaoda kazing marokhami tharan, nana athumli kachot mida athumna apam hili ngareirāda seihā saakha, namingli poda moreiwui eina nali ngareiungakha,

kazingramli nana shāmilu, kala athumna zatkhangayi shongfa, athumli tamchitheimida narao kala nawui mibingwui morei kapheomilu; nawui mibingli nana shimlui sāda mikahai ngalei chili kazing kharotāmilu.

“Ram chili zāt kasak atamlila, sākazāt nilala, kumshāt, majing katāk, khaohsom kala aga̱-akaina shimān khangasak nilala; yangkashebingna keinungli kuinam kahai nilala; mimao kazanglala, kazātyur khangatatei kakazā atamlila;
kashoshokwui vang seihā kasā kala kapo, mi akha kala Israel saikorana nilala ichichāwui ningkachot chitheida, shim hili ngareiunglaga pāng khāngkāda nali kapo chi;
nawui pamkhavai kazingramli shākāmida, kapheomilu; kala nana mi kachiva̱li kachichāwui kaphaning athishurda sāmilu; (kaja mi kachiva̱wui ning namāngna theisera);
chithāda ishāvā ngarāli mikahai lam hili okthuiching khavai athumna nali ngacheeranu.
“Chi tākam eina nawui mi Israel makhaning, yur katei akhana nawui mingwui vang ram katāva̱wui eina rāda,
(kaja athumna nawui reikhamatai ming, nawui pāngthei kharei, kala nawui pāngthei katingkhami shāda), athumnala shim hili rāda seihā saakha,

nawui pamkhavai kazingramli shākāmilu, kala athumwui kapo athishurda kasāmilu; chieina nawui Israel mibingwui thāda okathuiwui yurbing huptana nawui ming theida nali ngacheera; kala ina sākahai shim hi nawui ming eina hora da athumna theikhuira.
“Nana vālu kaji pamli nawui mibingna athumwui yangkashebingli rai akhangarar tharan, kala nana kapangkhuida namingwui vang ina sākahai shim khalei keinungshongli athumna ngareiungda
athumwui seihā kasā kala kapo chi kazingli nana shākāmida apong chiwui vang khangachonmilu.

“Nawui mangāli athumna morei sākahai chitharan— kaja mi khipākha morei makasā maleimana— nana malungvāthaida yangkashibingwui pāngli horsangmihaiakha, kala athumli yangkashiwui ramli, nailala tālala, tukvāhaiakha,
athumna narkahaipamli ning ngateida poda, ‘Ithumna makaphā kala masākhangayi ot sāda morei sāhaira’ jiakha;

apam chili leilakha athumna ningyāng tongtingda hāngphatakha, kala nana athumwui avāva̱ ngarāli mikahai ramli nana kapangkhui kahai keinung ina namingwui vang sakā kahai shim hili ngareiungda nali seihā saakha;
nawui pamkhavai kazingramli athumwui seihā kala kapo shākāmida athumwui apong chiwui vang khanganingmilu
kala nali morei, khayonkhamāng sākahai nawui mibingli pheomilu; kala athumli tukkakhuibingwui mikyanli lumashanmi khavai, tukkakhuiabing chili lukhamashan ning sangmilu,
(kaja Egyptwui rekakharekwui eina nawui mi, kala nawui shimluikat sākhavai nana thānshokmi kahaina).
“Naraona kapo kala nawui mi Israelna kapo atam kachiva̱li nana kathei-kashāmilu.
Kaja O
Solomonna
kala nganingda Israelwui kakazip katonga chili somida panglāk eina vaoda hānga,
“Ana ngashit kahai athishurda awui mi Israelli chingrihai khangasaka
Ishāvā ngarāli ngasokhami thāda ithumwui
chithāda ishāvā ngarāli kakaso thāda awui thi shurda zatkhavai, awui ningkhami, awui ain, kala awui shiyan-chikan kala awui kakaso mayonngai khavai ithumwui ningli sangmiranu.
Ina
chieina okathuiwui miyur saikorana
Aja kasā thāda nathumna ningtonglak eina
Ningyatchigatwui vang Solomonna
Chithang,
Chithāda Hamathwui zangkhavaiwui eina thuilaga Egyptwui Kongrā vāshungda Israel kachungkha kazipta Solomonna shinithang zātkhān sai.
Kachishatathang ana mibing chi kachichāramli shiunhaowa; kala awui rao David eina Israelnaobingli
Gibeonli kachithei thāda
na ali hānga, “Nana seihā sāda iwui mangāli kapo chi ina shāhaira; kala nana sakā kahai shim chi ina tharchigatmihaira, hili iwui ming leichingra; ina ningkachang eina yangmichingra.
Navā Davidna kazat thāda, nana ningsā ngazipta kala khangarong eina iwui ningkhami, iwui ain kala shiyan-chikan mayonda imangāli zatakha,
ina navā Davidli ‘Israelwui wungpamkhongli chipam khavai ina nali mi mavatmilakmara’ da ngashit kahai thāda ina Israelwuitungli nawui wungpamkhong katang mavaila sakāmira.
Kha nala, nanaongarāla, iwui ningkhami manganāmada, kala shiyan nawui mangāli haikhami mamayonla vare khangateili otram ngatha̱da khorumthuihaiakha,

ina athumli mikahai lam chiwui eina Israelli katatshokhaora; kala imingwui vang ngasāra da tharchigat kahai shim chila iwui mikyanwui eina horhaida Israel hi miyur saikorawui chānjam, kala meisumtui ngasāhaora.
Kala shim hi sakhayānghaida horyāng kahai sahaora; hi rākanda kathei mi kachiva̱ matakhakhaira, kala mana̱rorda ‘Kathāda
Chieina athumna ‘Khikhalajila avāva̱ ngarāli Egyptwui eina thānshokkhame
Solomonli cedarla, cypressla kala sināla, ana ningkachāng eina tangda mikahai thili, Tyrewui awunga Hiramli Awunga Solomnna Galilee ngaleili khalei keinungbing maga̱ mi.
Kha Solomonna khami keinungbing chi Hiramna Tyrewui eina vāyang khavai khavā chitharan, maringphararthuwa.
Chiwui vang “Ichinā, nana khami keinungbing hi khi keinungkhala?” da hānga. Chiwui vang ngalei chili aja eina tangda Cabul hochingda lei.
Hiramna Solomonli sinā kg. thingmati chihovai.
(Egyptwui awunga Pharaohna Gezerli shanglaga keinung chi khuida mei sa̱tāmihaida keinung chili kapāna Canaannaobingli sāthatserhaowa; chi anao ngalāva̱li kakhuiwui vang manho sāda Solomonli mi;
chiwui vang Solomonna Gezer chi sakāluishita) kala khamaze Beth-horon,
Judahwui lamhāngli khalei Baalath eina Tamar,
Solomonwui zātshim haikhavai keinungbing, siguigari haikhavai keinungbing, Jerusalemli, Lebanonlila kala awui wungramli khalei ana sakhangangai apam kachiva̱lila sākhuisera.
Israelwui mibing maningla, Amornaobing, Hitnaobing, Periznaobing, Hivnaobing, Jebusnaobing, mathikhangakānbing—
kaja Israelnaobingna mashaothatkhangakānbing chili Solomonna thoukai phungngasakta, raonao sāngasaka; aja eina tangda chithāchingda lei.
Kha Israelnaole Solomonna raonao masāngasakmana; athumna awui shipaibing, otva̱bing, raimi kathānabing, raimi akhavābing, siguigari kathaobing, kala chiwui kathānbing sāngasaka.
Solomonwui ot kasā yangkhame khamatai otva̱bing chi hina: otkasāli yangmi khavai shāphangā hangphangāna:
Kha Pharaohwui naongalāva̱na Davidwui keinungli mapamluila Solomonna awui vang sāmi kahai shimli apam kahai eina athumna Millo keinung sakālui.
Awunga Solomonna Ezion-geber, Edom ngaleiwui Red Sea phei Eloth ngalemli jahas ngashingkha sākhui.
Solomonwui mibingli ngasoda Hiramna awui mi, shamadruwui khangachā theikhamasuibing jahas ngashingkhali ngasovā ngasaka;
kala athumna Ophirli vai, kala chiwui eina sinā akhuida Awunga Solomonli sinā kg. thingtharāda mati lāngda khuiungmi.
Nganamkaphā thao, sinā, kasaka ngalung, ut kachungkhana phunglaga ali khangaso mi kachungkha thānphungda ana Jerusalemli vai; kala awui kaphaning saikora Solomonli ahānga,
Awui khangahān saikora Solomonna khangathum maleilakla ngahānkāmisera; khangahān saikora awungawui vang kasak khikha maleisāmana.
Shebawui awungva̱na Solomonwui thangkhamei, awui shim sākahai,
awui kashakazā, akhavābingwui pamkhavai, raobingna otram khangatha̱, athumwui sāri, awui khorkhong singmebing kala
Ana awungali hānga, “Nawui otsak kala thangkhamei pao iramli leilakha kashā chi mashunga,
kha ikhalattawui imik eina marātheiranglakha mashitsangsāmana; kala yanglu, ara rātheilaga, athumna kahāng chiya tangkhaila makāshungmana; nawui thangkhamei reikasang hi kashāli langmei.
Nawui ngalemli pamda nawui thangkhamei tui kashā samphangching kaje napreiva̱̱ ngarā, nawui raobing kalā khamahai!
Nali ngahānngailak eina Israelwui awunga sākhangasaka nawui Vare

Chiwui thili ana awungali sinā kg. thingmati, nganamkaphā thao kachungkha, kala aman kasaka ngalung yur kachungkha chigata; Sheba awungva̱na awui chiyākha Awunga Solomonli rākachigat thāda marāluilakmana.
Chili lāngda, Ophirwui eina sinā khuikharā Hiramwui jahasbing china almug thing, aman kasaka ngalung yur Ophirwui eina kachungkha khuiungmi.
Almug thing chi
Awunga Solomonna Sheba awungva̱na kapoli lāngmeida awui ningkachāng saikora misera. Chiwui eina awui raobingli thānlaga aramli latunghaowa.
Kumkhali Solomonna sinā samkaphangwui kharit kg. thingmaga̱da kathumna,
chili lāngda leihkhalonbingwui eina, jahaswui eina, Arabia awunga saikorawui eina, kala lammungabingwui einala sinā samphanga.
Awunga Solomonna sinā eina shaokakhui chāngvei kahaka shākhani sākhui; chāngvei ava̱va̱li sinā kg. shini sha̱kha zanga.
Kala sināwui eina shaokakhui chāngvei shākathum sākhui, kala ava̱va̱li sinā kg. kathum zanga. Saikora chi Lebanon Ngahong Shim chili haisera.
Awungana mafahāwui wungpamkhong kahakva akha sākhuilaga mathāmeikap kaji sinā heirormita.
Wungpamkhong chiwui phei chonkhavai tharuk lei, kala akhanukshong seikui sāsanga; uishong yāshong pangpo kāthathui, kala kazingkha̱ khani khaninga,
kazingkha̱ tharāda khani, pheichon chiwui ayar ayarli akharip khaninghai. Hikathā ot wungram khangateili masālakranga.

Awunga Solomonwui mangkhavai tengkot saikora sināmāng eina sai, kala Lebanon Ngahong Shimli mangkhavai tengkot sinā kachangamāng eina sai; lupāsā eina kasem mazanglakmana, kaja Solomonwui thotli lupāsā hi kasaka otna da makhuimana.

Kaja awungawui jahas ngashingkha Tarshishli Hiramwui jahas ngashingkhali ngasoda leisai. Kum kathumthumwui alungli akha shida Tarshishwui jahas ngashingbing china sināla, lupāsāla, mafahala, nāyongla, yongyingguila khuiungung ji.
Chithāda sāda okathuili khalei awunga saikorali aworla, lanla Awunga Solomonna mataimeisersai.
Kala Varivarana yarkahai Solomonwui thangkhamei chi okathui apam kachiva̱wui eina nganā khavai phārai.
Khara mibing kachiva̱na kachichāwui mikhangai sinā kala lupāsāwui ot, kashankachon, myrrh, nganamkaphā otyur, sigui, gadhā, kum kachida kachungkha khuirāmi.
Solomonna siguigari kala sigui raimi kazipkhuida siguigari thingkha shāmati, sigui raimi thingtharāda khani khalei chi, siguigari keinungbingli, kala awungali ngasoda Jerusalemli haihai.
Jerusalemwui alungli lupāsā ngalung thāda singa, kala cedarthingla Shephelahwui sycamore thāda ngayaonap eina singsai.
Solomonwui sigui Egypt eina Kueli alokhuisera, kala awungawui leihkhalonbingna athum chi aman milaga akakhuina.

Egyptwui eina siguigari ava̱va̱li lupāsā eina shekel shātharuruk kala sigui akhali lupāsā eina shekel hangphangā mida losanga; kala awungawui leihkhalonbingna Hitwui awungabing, Syriawui awungabing saikorali leih sāmarona.
Chitharan Awunga Solomonna ngalei khangateiwui sha̱nao kachungkhali leishi. Pharaohwui naongalāva̱, kala Moab, Ammon, Edom, Sidon, kala Hitla,
yurbing hiwui pongli
Ana apreiva̱, wungnaolā shāshini, kala angashirva̱ shākathum leisai; kala apreiva̱ ngarāna awui ning ngachei ngasakhaowa.
Kaja Solomonna sārkahai tharan apreiva̱ ngarāna awui ning ngachei ngasakta vare khangateiwui thi shurngasaka; kala avāva̱ Davidwui ning thāda awui
Kaja Solomonna Sidonnaobingwui kameo philava̱ Ashtorethli, kala Ammonbingwui ningkakachaiya Milcomlila shurthuihaowa.
Chithāda avāva̱ Davidna sākahai thāda ningtonglak eina
Kala Solomonna Jerusalemwui zingshoshong khalei kaphungtungli Moabwui ningkakachaiya Chemoshli khorum khavai shim sakai.
Yur katei kakhui apreiva̱ ngarāwui vang ana hithāda sāmihaoda athumna chili nganamkaphā rikkatā kala athumwui vareli pha̱kaphayā ot sai.
Solomonna
Vare khangateili mashuralu kajiwui pongli ali kakaso mihaisai; kha
Chiwui vang
Kha navā Davidwui vang eina nawui thotli mashokmara, kha nanaowui thotli ngakaimihaora.
Chithālala ina wungram saikora mangakaishokmara, kha iwui rao Davidwui vang kala ina kapangkhui kahai Jerusalemwui vang shang akha nanaoli mira.”
Edom awungashi shangli kapharā Hadadli
Kaja Davidna Edomli leilakha, raithāna Joabna raili thikahaibingli akaphum chitharan Edomwui mayarnao katonga sāthathairasai
(kaja Joabna thānda Israel saikorana Edomwui mayarnao katonga mashaothatranglakha eina tangda kachāng tharuk apama);
kha Hadadna nganuisāhaoda avāva̱wui rao Edomwui mi kaikhali ngasoda Egyptli yāmvāhaowa.
Athumna Mideanwui eina zatlaga Paranli vāshunga, kala Paranwui eina athumli ngaso khavai mi khuiphunglaga Egyptli Pharaohwuili vai; Egyptwui awunga Pharaohna lamla, shimla, kashakazāla mi.
Pharaohna Hadadli lumlak kahaiwui vang apreiva̱ Tahpeneswui agatuiva̱li ngakum ngasaka.
Kala Tahpeneswui agatuiva̱na Genubath kaho mayarnao akha pharākhuida Tahpenesna Pharaohwui keinungli nganaokai; Pharaohwui naomayarali ngasoda Genubathna awungawui shimli pama.
Kha Hadadna Egyptli leilakha, David thihaira kala raimi kathāna Joabla thihaira da kashā eina, Hadadna Pharaohli hānga, “Iramli latung khavai khamayāmilu.”
Kha Pharaohna ali hānga, “Nali ina khi vātmihaoda naram unguga kajikhala?” Kha ana hānga, “Ili ungngasakmilu.”
Zobahwui awunga Hadad-ezerwui eina yāmkahaiya, Eliadawui naomayara Rezonlila Varena Solomonli yangshi ngasaka.
Davidna aram yaithat kahaiwui thili ana mi kazipkhuilaga Damascusli apama, kala ali chili awunga sanghaowa.
Hadadna sheikakhaut thāda, Solomonwui atamli anala Israelli yangshilaka, kala ningkachailaka. Ana Syriali mungsai.
Zeredahli khalei Ephraimpa, Solomonwui rao rākasa, ra̱meiva̱ Zeruahwui nao Jeroboamla awungali thuingakaishihaowa.
Ana awungali makhamayāwui pong chi hithai. Solomonna Millo semkakā tharan, avāva̱ Davidwui keinung chi saphinhaowa.
Jeroboam kaho hi sāshapa mi akhana, awui khamarek chi theilaga, Josephshiwui thoukainao katongali ali yangngasaka.
Atam chili Jeroboamna Jerusalemwui eina kashok chitharan Shilohwui marān Ahijahna ali shongfali samphanga. Chitharan Ahijahna kachon kadhar ngavaisai; kala ram chili animang samphanga.
Chieina Ahijahna awui kachon khangavai chi khuilaga akai tharāda khani sāda serkhāka.
Kala ana Jeroboamli hānga, “Nawui vang akai tharā khuilu; kaja
(kha iwui rao Davidwui vang kala Israel shang saikorawui eina ina kapangkhui kahai Jerusalem keinungwui vang shang akha ana samphangra),

khikhalajila ana ili horhaida, Sidonwui varebing Ashtorethli, Moabwui vare Chemoshli, kala Ammonwui kameo Milcomli khorumhaowa, kala iwui kahāng manganāmana; kala avāva̱ Davidna kasā thāda iwui shiyan-chikan kala ain mamayonla, iwui mikyanli khamashung chi masāmana kala iwui ningkhami mamayonmana.
Chithālala, wungram katonga awui pāng eina makhuithuimara; kha ina kapangkakhui iwui rao Davidna iwui shiyan-chikan kala ningkhami khamayonwui vang, awui thotli awunga sāngasakpapamra;
kha anaomayarawui pāng eina ina shang tharā khuimihaida nawui pāngli horsangmira.
Chithālala awui naoli shang akha mira, kaja iwui ming leiching khavai ina kapangkhui kahai Jerusalemwui keinungli Davidwui thaomei akha sharhaiching khavaina.
Nali ina singmida nana ningkachāng eina tangda mungra, kala nana Israelwuitungli awunga sāra.

Ina nali kakaso saikora chi nana mayonakha, kala iwui kahāng nganāda iwui rao David thāda iwui shiyan-chikan, ningkhami mayonda khangarong ot saakha, ina ngasomichingra, kala Davidwui shimkhur sākhami thāda nawui shimkhurli ina sakāmikachangkhatra, kala ina Israel hi nali mira.
Kala chiwui vang Davidwui ara̱-azāli khanang ngasakra, kha chi mathā ngasakchingmara’” jihaira da hānga.
Chiwui vang eina Solomonna Jeroboamli sāthat khavai ngarāna; kha Jeroboamna Egyptwui awunga Shishakwuili yāmvāhaowa, kala Solomon mathiranglakha eina tangda Egyptli pama.
Solomonwui otsak, ana kasāsā kala awui thangkhamei Solomonwui otsak lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Jerusalemwui eina Israelli Solomonna khamung zingkum hangmatiya.
Solomon thikahai eina avāva̱ Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Rehoboamna awui mahut thuimunga.
Nebatwui naomayara Jeroboamna pao chi kashā eina (kaja a atam chili Egyptli leisai, kaja awunga Solomonwui eina chili ayāmngayin kahaina), chieina Jeroboamna Egyptwui eina latunga.
Athumna mi chihoda alila ahokhui; Jeroboam kala Israelwui kazip saikora Rehoboamli asamphanga.
“Navāna ithumli kharita ot chiphuna; chiwui vang ara navāwui kharita otphun kala kashai chi ngaveng ngasakakha ithum nali otram ngatha̱mipapamra” da athumna hānga.
Ana hānga, “Kathumthangwui vang ungsālu, kala rāluinaolu.” Chieina athum thuihaowa.
Chiwui thili Awunga Rehoboamna avāva̱ Solomon ringlakha leikasā khararnaobingli ngasanda “Mibing hili ngahānkā khavai nathumna ili khi sāngasakngaikhala?” da ngahāna.
Athumna hānga, “Nana aja mibing hili rao akha sāda athumli otram ngatha̱akha, kala athumli ngahankakā chitharan khamathā tui eina hāngakha athumna nawui rao sāchingra.”
Kha khararnaobingwui tui horhaida awui rarkākharum awui ngasotnaobingli ngasanlui.
Kala hithāda hānga, “'Ithumli nashāvāwui kharita otphun chi khangaveng ngasakmilu’ da ili rākahāngbing chili, ngahānkā khavai nathumna ili khi hāngrakhala?”

Ali rarkākharuma awui ngasotnaobing china hānga: “‘Navāna ithumli kharita ot chiphuna, kha ara nana ithumwui vang ngaveng ngasak milu’ da kahāngbing chili hithāda hānglu, ‘Ishāvāwui kashānli iwui ngangpairi reimei!
Ishāvāna nathumli kharita ot chiphuna, ara ina ritmeida chiphunra. Ishāvāna lijei eina ngaphita, kha ina seithat eina hāngmachinra’ da hānglu.”
Chieina “Kakathumathang iwuili rāluinaolu” da awungana hanghaokada Jeroboam kala mi saikora kakathumathang Rehoboamwuili vai.
Kala khararnaobingna rakkachithei makhuisangla, awungana
ngasotnaobingwui tui khuida sāshilak eina ngahānkāda hānga, “Ishāvāna nathumli kharit ot chiphuna, ina ritkhamei chiphunra; ishāvāna lijei eina hāngmachina, ina seithat eina hāngmachinra.”
Chithāda awungana mibingli manganāsangmithuwa; kaja
“Davidshiwuili ithumwui yar khi leikhala?
Jessewui naomayarawuili ithumna shimlui samphangkharān maleimana.
Kachichashiwui shimli ungulu, O Israel!
David, nala nasasakulu.”
Chieina Israelnaobing kachichā shimli ungserhaowa.
Kha Judahwui keinungli kapama Israelnaobingwuitungli Rehoboamna munga.

Chiwui thili thoukai ot kasāli kashina Adoramli Awunga Rehoboamna chihokhavā eina ali Israel saikorana lunggui eina horthathaowa. Kala Awunga Rehoboamna ngalāngda siguigari tonglaga Jerusalemli yāmunghaowa.
Chiwui vang aja eina tangda David shimkhurli Israelnaona ngakaikashina.
Jeroboam latunghaira kaji Israelnao saikorana kashā eina, ali hokhuida Israelwui awunga sāngasaka. Judah shang maningla Davidwui shimkhur khipākha mashurlakthuwa.

Rehoboamna Jerusalemli khaung eina, Judah shimkhur saikora kala Benjaminshi shangnao zangda Israel shimkhurli ngararlaga Solomonwui nao Rehoboamwui wungram hankhui khavai rai kapingbing lakhkha thinghangchishat kazipkhui.
Kha Varewui mi Shemaiahli Varena rāhānga:
“Solomonwui nao Rehoboam, Judahwui awunga kala Judah eina Benjamin, kala khangateibinglila ahānglu.
Chiwui thili Ephraim kaphungramli khalei Shechemli Jeroboamna raipan sākhuida chili pama; chiwui eina Penuel vāsākai.
Kala Jeroboamna awui ningli, “Wungram hi Davidshi shimkhurli hanunghaipai;
mibingna Jerusalemli vāda
Kala ana Bethelli meoma̱ akha, kala meoma̱ akhapāna Danli haimihai.
Mibingna Bethelli khorumkhashi, Dan eina tangdali vāda akhorumkhashi kajiwui vang hi moreiwui ot sāthuihaowa.
Ana kaphung kajujuili kameoshimla sākhui, kala khangatei Levi makhaningbinglila pāngmon kachungkha kapangsanga.

Bethelli ana hanphut sakā kahai chili akhalattawui ningli machukping kahaiya kachāng kachishatawui zimiksho tharāda kaphangāthang kai; kala Israel mibingwui vang phanit akha chili samida ana nganamkaphā rikkhavai hanphutpamli kai.
Kala yanglu,
Kala mipā china hanphut chili
Kala chithang ngalāngda machut khavaila mida hānga, “

Bethelwui hanphutli makhamayā vaokashok Varewui mina kahāng chi awungana kashā chitharan, Jeroboamna hanphutpamwui eina pāng katingvāda hānga, “Mipa chi tukkhuilu.” Kala katingkhava apāng chi thihaida makhuiungluipaithuwa.
wui tui Varewui mi china machutkhui khavai khami athishurda hanphutla minkhaihaowa, kala hotla yaoyānghaowa.
Kala awungana Varewui mi chili hānga, “Nawui
Kala awungana Varewui mi chili hānga, “Ili ngasoungda ungphazāsa, ina samanla mira.”
Varewui mi china awungali hānga, “Nawui shimlui tangkhai miga jilala maungmara. Apam hili ina zātla mazāmara, tara̱la mamangmara;
kaja
Kala ana Bethelli vākhavaishong maningla apong khangateivāk eina unghaowa.
Chitharan Bethelli kasara marān akha okthuisai. Bethelli chithang kashoshok, kala Varewui mipa china awungali kahāng tui chi avāva̱li anaomayarana unghāngsera.
Avāva̱na athumli hānga, “Shongfa kachishong eina vāhaokhala?” Judahwui eina kharā Varewui mina latung khavai apong chi anaomayarana chithei.
Anaomayarali hānga, “Gadha chi iwui vang shaksāmilu.” Chieina athumna gadhā chi shaksāmida ana chili tonga.
Ana Varewui mi chili shurvai, kala shirimthingphei akhali pamsāda angahāna, “Judahwui eina kharā Varewui mi chi nala?” Ana “Ina” da hānga.
Chieina ana hānga, “Ili ngasoungda shimli ungphazākhuisa.”
Ana hānga, “Nali mangasoungpaimara, shimlila maungzangpaimara, kala apam hili nali ngasoda zātla mazāmara, tara̱la mamangmara;
kaja
Ana hānga, “Ila na thāda marān akhana, kala ili kazingraona
Chieina ani ngasoungda ashi shimli phāzai kala tara̱la manga.
Ani tableli phazāda leilakha, ahokakhuiya marān chili
kala Judahwui eina kharā marān chili vaoshokta hānga, “
kha latungda, “Mazālu, mamanglu” kachipamli kazā kala khamangwui vang nawui phasā navā ngarāwui chikhurli machifamara.’”
Phāshak-phazākhui kahaiwui thili, ana ahokakhui marānwui vang gadhā shaksāmi.

Ana ungmamān kaji eina shongfali kazingkha̱ akha samphangda ali makeithathaowa. Kala awui phasā shongfa khamaseli hortahaida gadhāna chiwui ngalemli nganingpama; kazingkha̱la mingun ngalemli nganingpama.
Kala yanglu, shongfa chi khamakānbingna khamaseli mingun hortā kahai kala kazingkha̱na mingun ngalemli nganingkapam chi thei. Athumna kasara marān china pamkhavai keinung chili ungda chi unghānga.
Ahokakhuiya marān china tui chi kashā chitharan ana hānga, “
Kala anaomayarali hānga, “Gadha chi iwui vang shaksāmilu.” Chieina athumna gadhā chi shaksāmi.
Ana akhayang eina angun chi shongfali hailaga gadhā eina kazingkha̱ chi angun ngalemli nganingsai. Kazingkha̱ china kathingun mashaimana, lah gadhā chila mamakeithatmana.
Marān china Varewui mi chiwui angun chi gadhātungli khāngkāda chapngachā khavai kala ungchifa khavai keinungli khuiunghaowa.
Kala, awui chikhurli chifada, “Iyavo, ichina” da chapsasui eina awui vang chapngachai.
Ali chifa kahaiwui thili anaomayarali hānga, “I thithang Varewui mi chifa khavai chikhur hili ilila chifalu, awui ara̱kui ngalemli iwui ara̱kuila hailu.
Kaja Bethelwui hanphutli kala Samaria keinungli khalei kajujuipamwui shimli

Hiwui thili Jeroboamna makaphā shongfawui eina mangareiungmana, kha kajujuipamwui vang khangatei mibing ngachaiwui eina pāngmon kapangsanglui, kala sakhangangaibing chili tharchigatmida kajujuipamwui vang pāngmon sāngasaka.
Hikathā otsak hina Jeroboamwui shimkhurli morei sāngasakta katathailaga okathuiwui eina shimānchao khavai sathuihaowa.
Hithāda leilakha Jeroboamwui naomayara Abijahli kazāhaowa.
Kala Jeroboamna apreiva̱li hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, Jeroboam preiva̱na da mathei khavai azak ngacheikhuida Shilohli vālu; kaja, ina awunga sāda mibingli mungra da hāngkhami marān Ahijah chili leida lei.
Khamuitang tharā, ngankakhui khamui kateokha kala khuira̱ hamnaokha da khuivāmilu; nao hili khishokrakhala kaji ana hāngmira.”
Jeroboam preiva̱na chithāda sāda Shilohli vai; kala Ahijahwui shimli azanga. Chitharan Ahijah sarhaida mik māmāchā eina khikha matheilakmana.
Ahijahli
Ana vākashung chitharan khangatei preinao sākhaningda vai.
Kha Ahijana awui pheikhon shāda, ana khāmongli rākashung eina ana hānga, “Zanglu, Jeroboamwui preiva̱, khisāda mi katei sakhaning kajikhala? Kaja nali hāngmi khavai kachungkha lei.
Jeroboamli unghānglu,
kala Davidwui wungram eina ngakaikhuida nali mihaira; chithālala iwui rao Davidwui thāda nana iwui ningkhami mamayonmana, kala ningtongda iwui thi mashurmana, kala mashun chi masāmana,
kha nawui mangāli leikasābingli zakshimeida sai, na khalattawui vang kameo khangatei sākhui, meoma̱la sākhuida ili malungvātngasaka, kala ili na khanukli haihaowa;

chiwui vang eina yanglu, ina Jeroboamwui shimkhurli makaphā khuiramida, ningkhān eina okathuibing kala rao, khaniniwui mayarnao kachiva̱ katathaora; kala seipai machuitakupranglakha eina tangda rikkatā thāda Jeroboamwui shimkhur mutchaohaora.
Jeroboamshiwui mi keinungli katheli fana shaira; kala lamli katheli khamasaili yongkazata vānaona shaira: kaja hi
“Chieina ngakarthuida shimli ungulu. Naphei keinungli ungnaisangkhaleoda nao chi thihaora.
Israelna awui vang chapngachāda ali chifara, kaja Jeroboamwui eina amāngli chikhurli chifara; kaja Jeroboam shimkhurli Israelwui
Chili lāngda, awui mahut Israelwui awunga akha
tara̱lungli titi khanganuk thāda
Kala Jeroboamna morei sālaga ana Israelli morei sākhangasakwui vang, Israelli horhaora.”
Chiwui thili Jeroboam preiva̱na ngakarthuida Tirzahli latunga. Kala ana khāmongli ungkākhaleoda nao chi thihaowa.
Kala
Jeroboamna kathāda rai sā, kathāda mungsā kaji saikora Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Jeroboamna khamung kum maga̱da khanina; a thihaowa kala anaomayara Nadabna awui thili munga.
Chitharan Solomonwui nao Rehoboamna Judahli mungsai. Rehoboam zingkum hangmati da akha kākashung eina mungphoka, kala Israel shang saikorawui eina,
Avāva̱ ngarāna morei kasāli mataimeida Judahna
Kaja, athumna kajujuipamli shim sakai, ngalung shoma, kala kaphung kajui kachiva̱li kala khamatek thingphei kachida Asherim sakai.
Kala ngalei chili kameoshimwui khayora mayarnaobing eina tangda leisai. Israelnaobingwui mangāli
wui shimli kahai lan, awungawui shimli kahai lan, khalalei kachiva̱ pongkhuida khuithuihaowa. Kala Solomonna sākakhui sinā chāngvei chila khuithuiserhaowa;
chiwui mahut pithrai eina sākhuilaga awunga Rehoboamwui kakaso thishurda awunga shim khāmong khamayona otvabingwui pāngli horsangmi.
Kala awungana Varewui shimli kazang kachida khamayonbingna chi phungzanga, kala mayon khavai shimli khuiunghahai ji.
Rehoboamwui kasāsā saikora Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Rehoboam eina Jeroboamna rai ngarar ngarokchinga.
Rehoboam thihaida avāva̱ ngarāwui thāda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa. Ava̱va̱li Naamah hoi, Ammonlāna. Awui pamli anaomayara Abijamna thuimunga.
Ana Jerusalemli kum kathum munga. Ava̱va̱li Maacah hoi, Abishalomwui naongalāva̱na.
Avāva̱na awui mangāli sākasā thāda ala moreiwui otmāngli zata; kala avāva̱ Davidwui ning thāda awui
Chithālala, Davidwui vang awui
Khikhalajila Davidna awui mirin peida
Chitharan Rehoboam eina Jeroboamwui thotli rai sangarokchinga.
Abijamwui kasāsā saikora Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Abijam thihaida Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa, kala anaomayara Asana awui pamli thuimunga.
Jeroboamna mungda khamaga̱ kum Israelwui awunga Asana Judahli thuimunga,
kala ana Jerusalemli kum hangmatida akha munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Maacah hoi, Abishalomwui nao ngalāva̱na.
Avāva̱ Davidna kasā thāda Asana
Ngalei chili khayora mayarnao saikora kashamserhaowa kala avāva̱ ngarāna sākahai meoma̱ saikora khuishokserhaowa.
Ava̱va̱lila awungva̱ kasāwui eina khuishokhaowa, khikhalajila ana Asherahwui vang ningkakachai meoma̱ sākhui; kala Asana awui meoma̱la sakazamlaga Kidron kongli ariktahaowa.
Kha, kajujuiwui kameopam sākahai chi haipapama. Chithālala mirin peida Asana
Avāva̱na khangashit mikahai, kala ana khangashit sākahai kachigat saikora sināla, lupāsāla, khorkhongla Khorumshimli khuikāsera.
Israelwui awunga Baasha eina Asawui thotli rai ngararchinga.
Israelwui awunga Baashana Judahli ngararlaga, Judahwui awunga Asawuili khipākha maung-mavāpai khavai Ramahli sākhamhaowa.
Chieina
“Navā eina ishāvā khangashik thāda inila ngarumkha sākhavai: yanglu, ina lupāsā eina sinā hi khamina; Israelwui awunga Baashana iwui eina yāmpai khavai nani ngarumkha kasā tanghaolu.”
Ben-hadadna Asawui tui khuida raimi kathānabingli Israelwui keinung akai ngasaka; kala Ijon, Dan, Abel-beth-maacah, kala Naphtali ngalei zanglaga Chinneroth katonga yuikhuihaowa.
Chi kashā eina Baashana Ramah masākāluila Tirzahli pamhaowa.

Chiwui thili Awunga Asana Judah katongali, akhala mashāklakla, hukhum khami athishurda Baashana Ramah sakākhavai thing kala ngalung kahai saikora chi khuilaga Benjaminwui Geba eina Mizpah sakāvaihaowa.
Asawui kasāsā awui pangshap, kala ana sākakhui keinungwui khararchān saikora Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapisermala? Asārlam apheili kazāhaowa.
Asa thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Jehoshaphatna awui pamli thuimunga.
Judahwui awunga Asana khamung kum kakhaneli Jeroboamwui naomayara Nadadna Israelli thuimunga; kala ana kum khani munga.
Ana

Issacharwui shang eina, Ahijahwui nao Baashana mijang khomlaga Philistineli khalei Gibbethon apamli mithit khalen sāda Nadabli sāthathaowa; kaja Nadabla zangda Israel saikorana Gibbethonli kuinampamsai.
Chithāda Judahwui awunga Asana mungda kakathum kum Baashana Nadabli sathathailaga awui pamli thuimunga.
Ana awunga sakhaleoda Jeroboamshi shimkhur saikora sāthatserhaowa;
Jeroboamna morei sāda Israelli morei sākhangasakwui vang Israelwui
Nadabwui kasāsā kala khangatateila Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Asa eina Israel awunga Baashawui thotli rai sangarokchingsai.
Judahwui awunga Asana mungda kakathuma kum Ahijahwui nao Baashana Tirzahli pamda Israel saikorali kum maga̱da mati munga.
Ana
“Iwui yur Israelli kathāna sākhavai, chifawui eina ina nali khangama sāngasakhaira, kha nana Jeroboamwui thi shurda iwui yur Israelli morei sāngasakhaira,
yanglu, Baasha kala awui shimkhurli ina shimān ngasakchaohaora, kala nawui shimkhur Nebatwui nao Jeroboamwui shimkhur thāngasakhaora.
Baashashiwui mi keinungli fana shaira, lamli katheli khamasaili yongkazata vānaona shaira.”
Baashawui kasāsā, khangatateila, kala awui kaping Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Baasha thikahai eina avāva̱li ngasoda Tirzahli chifahaowa, kala anaomayara Elahna awui pamli thuimunga.
Chili lāngda Baasha kala ashi shimkhurli makhamayawui tui,
Judahwui awunga Asana mungda maga̱da katharuk kum, Baashawui nao Elahna Tirzahwui eina Israelli mungphoka, kala kum khani munga.
Kha awui rao Zimri, siguigari ngayarpakwui raimi kathānapa china ali thikhavai sāhaowa. Ana Tirzahli shimwui kashina Arzawui zam mangda marip kahai eina,
Zimrina zangda ngaphitsangda sāthathaowa; hi Judahwui awunga Asana mungda maga̱da kashine kumna, kala Zimrina Baashawui pamli thuimunghaowa.
Ana wungpamkhongli pamda mungkaphok tharan ana Baashashi shimkhur saikora sāthathaowa; athei-asā kala ngasotnaobingla mayarnao kaho akhala mataimimana.
wui tui Jehu marānna hāngkahai athishurda Zimrina Baashawui shimkhur saikora shimān ngasaka,
kaja Baashawui morei saikora kala anaomayara Elahwui morei saikora, kala china Israelli morei sākhangasakwui vang, athumwui meoma̱ china Israelwui
Elahwui kasākhavā, kasāsā saikora, kala katateila Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Judahwui awunga Asawui maga̱da kashine kum Zimrina Tirzahli shinithang munga. Chitharan raimibingna Philistinewui Gibbethonli rairum sāsai;
kala “Zimrina thikhavai sālaga awungali sāthathaowa” kaji rairum kasā raimibingna shāhaowa; chiwui vang rairumli raithanme Omrili Israelwui awunga chithang sanghaowa.
Chieina Omrina Israel saikorali ngasoda Gibbethonwui eina vāda athumna Tirzahli akuinamhaowa.
Keinung khuithuihaira kaji kathei eina Zimrina awungawui konunglungli sākahai raipam chili zangda mei sa̱tāda, ala chili thihaowa,
kaja awui morei kasā, Jeroboamwui athishurda
Zimriwui kasākhavā, kasāsā, kala ngathumda khangarān saikora Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Chiwui thili Israel kaikhani sāhaowa; ngakaipakna Ginathwui nao Tibnili awunga sangra jihaowa, ngakaipak akhana Omriwui thi shurthuihaowa.
Kha Ginathwui nao Tibniwui athi kashurbingli Omriwui thi kashurbingna yuihaowa. Chiwui vang Tibni thihaida Omrina awunga sāhaowa.
Judahwui awunga Asana mungda thumrāda kharekum, Omrina Israelli mungphoka, kala kum tharāda khani munga, kum tharuk Tirzahli mungsai.
Samaria kaphung hi ana Shemerwui eina lupāsā thingtharuk mida lokhui; kala kaphung chi raipan sākhuilaga kaphung akhavā Shemerwui ming khuida Samaria hoi.
Kaja ana Nebatwui naomayara Jeroboamwui shongfali zata, kala Israelli morei sākhangasaka morei, athumwui meoma̱bing china Israelwui
Omriwui kasā khavā, kasāsā, awui kaping kachithei Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Omri thikahai eina Samariali chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Ahabna awui pamli thuimunga.
Judahwui awunga Asana mungda thumrāda kachishata kum Omriwui nao Ahabna Israelli mungphoka, kala Omriwui nao Ahabna Samariali kum maga̱da khani munga.
Omriwui nao Ahabna
Nebatwui nao Jeroboamwui morei kasā chi khikha maningmana kaji thāda, ana Sidonwui awunga Ethboalwui naongalāva̱ Jezebelli khui, kala Baalli shurda khoruma.
Samariali khalei Baal kameoshimli ana Baal wui vang hanphut akha sākhui.
Ahabna Asherah akha sākhui. Israelwui
Awui atamli Bethelwui Hielna Jericho sakai; Nunwui naomayara Joshuana
Kala
“Hiwui eina thuida zingshoshong vaulu, kala Jordanwui zingshoshong khalei Cherethkongli ayāmngathumhaolu.
Nana chiwui tara̱ mangra, kala zākhavai ina ngahong-hangkhāli kasohaira.”
Ngathor ngazin mateila ngahong-hangkhāna khamui eina sā khuirāmichinga; kala kongrānaowui tara̱ manga.
Khaleilaga, kazing marolakthuda kongrā chi thenghaowa.
“Ngakarthuida Sidonli khalei Zerephathli apamlu. Yanglu, nali mizā khavai ina ra̱meinao akhali kasohaira.”
Chieina ana ngakarthuida Zarephathli vai; kala keinungwui ngaveili vākashung eina ra̱meinao akha thing phākasā vāthei. Kala ana hokhuida hānga, “Ili mangkhavai tara̱ khokthikha kha-ungkhuimilu.”
Ana ungkhui khavai zatuki kaji eina, ana vaoda hānga, “Zātla ngahomkha kakhuirāmilu.”
Ra̱meiva̱ china hānga, “Khamui masāhailakmana kaji
Elijahna hānga, “Mangangalu, nali kahāng thāda sālu, kha ili khamui hāngkha mifalu, chiwui thili nanaomayara naniwui vang sākhuinaolu.
Kaja Israelwui
Elijahna kahāng tākam eina preiva̱ china ungsai, kala ala pareiva̱la, anaomayarala atam kasāngkha kazā samphanga.
na Elijahli kahāng thāda sāmham kakān mavaithuwa, thaokhongla katheng mavaithuwa.
Chiwui thili preiva̱ chiwui naomayara kazāhaowa; kala kakazā chi marshunhaida khaksui shimānhaowa.
Chieina ana Elijahli hānga, “O Varewui mi, iwuitungli khi makhamayā leihaokhala? Iwui morei phaningung khavai, kala iwui nao thikhavai kharāla!”
Ana hānga, “Nanao ili milu.” Kala ana nao chi khuilaga, awui pikhavai mathang atoli khuikāda awui petli chipeta.
Kala
Chiwui thili ana naowuitungli kathumshida kāngapumrorlaga
Elijahwui tui
Elijahna nao chi mathāng atowui eina khuizangda ava̱va̱li mida hānga, “Yanglu, nanao ringhaira.”
Preiva̱ china Elijahli hānga, “Na Varewui mina kaji ara ina theikhuihaira, kala nana Prohowui tui kahāng saikora khamashungna.”
Atam kasāngkha shānglaga,
Chieina Elijahna Ahabli asamphang khavai vai. Chitharan Samariali zāt kasak kateokha maningmana.
Kala Ahabna awui shimkhur kashina Obadiahli hokhui. (Obadiah hiya
Jezebelna
Ahabna Obadiahli hānga, “Vālu, ura̱pam kala seizat khalei apam kachiva̱li vāyanglu, apam kaikhali seizat leisālapai chithāda sigui, gadhā ringngasakta sha̱kei keikhava mashimānmara.”
Anina vāki kaji lam ngayarlaga Ahabna akhashong vai kala Obadiahna khangatei akhashong vāhaowa.
Obadiahna zatta leilakha yanglu, Elijah ali rāsamphanga; kala ali azak machutta, Obadiahna ngakhumsangda hānga: “Na amei Elijahla?”
Ana ngahānkai, “I Elijahna, ‘Elijah hili leili’ da nawui akhavāli ahānglu.”
Ana hānga, “Ina khi khayon sahaoda chiwui vang narao ili shaothat khavai Ahabwui pāngli horsangmiga kajikhala?
Nawui
Laga nana kathāda ‘Nameili “Yanglu, Elijah hili leili” da unghānglu kajikhala.’
I unghai khaleoda
Jezebelna
Laga ara nana vāda nameili, Elijah hili leilida awungali unghānglu kachi hiya; ana ili sāthathenhaora.”
Elijahna hānga, “Ashangva̱wui
Chieina Obadiahna Ahabli ungsamphangda hānga; kala Ahabna Elijahli samphang khavai vai.
Ahabna Elijahli kathei eina “Israelli khanang khangasaka, chi nala?” da ali hānga.
Ana ngahānkai, “Ina Israelli makhanang ngasakmana; kha na kala nashi shimkhurnana, kaja nashina
Chiwui vang eina, Israel saikora iwui vang Carmel Kaphungli kazipkhuimilu, kala Jezebelwui tableli phazākhangarum Baal marān shāmati hangphangā kala Asherwui marān shāmati chila kazipkhuimilu.”
Chiwui vang Ahabna Israelnaobing kala marān saikora ngarumda Carmel Kaphungli kazipkhuisera.
Elijahna mibing saikorawui ngalemli vāda hānga, “Tuipong khaniwui ngachaili, kachipa khamashungakhala da nathum karankha ngayeifarakhala?
Chieina Elijahna mibingli hānga, “

Mukkā khani ithumli khuirāmiranu, athumna athumwui vang akha kapang khuiranu, sāmalim sālaga thingtungli semhairanu, kha mei mathotpaimara. Mukkā akhapa chi ina sālaga thing semkahai chili haira, kala mei mathotmara.
Laga nathumla nathumwui vareli ngakaolu, ila iwui
Mi saikorana, “Mashunglak eina hānghaira” da ngahānkai.
Chieina Baalwui marānbingli Elijahna hānga, “Nathum mukkā akha kapangkhuilaga rida khangarān sālu kaja nathum chungmei; kala nathumwui varewui mingli polu, kha mei mathotpaimara.”

Athumli khami mukkā chi khuida khangarān sai, kala ngathor eina thuilaga ngashunlung eina tangda Baalwui mingli mingzaida, “O Baal, ithumli ngahānkāmilu!” da ngakaowa. Kha akhon mashāthuwa, kala khipānakha mangahānkāthuwa. Athumna hanphutpamli ngalongkachupama.

Kazing khangashun eina Elijahna mana̱shida hānga, “Pangda vaolu, kaja a vare akhana, ringphāpam kahailapai, chi maningakha kalikha vākahailapai, maningakha kha̱ram vākahailapai, kapila pihaiphāphālapai, mathotkhui phalungki kajili tai.”
Athumna panglāk eina ngakaowa, raighai eina, kazei einala, athumwui khangachā athishurda athum khalatta asā reokazamda asheela ngayaringring shoka.
Kazing makheiuda, pha̱kaphayā atam eina tangda athumna vaotaraiya, kha akhonla mashāmana, khipānakha mangahānkāmana, khipānakha mahengsangmithuwa.
Chieina Elijahna mi saikorali, “Iwui ngalemli rāserlu” da hānga; mi saikorana awui ngalemli vai. Kala sākathān kahai
kala ngalungbing chieina
Chiwui thili ana thing chi ngachamda hailaga sā chi marimrim eina thingtungli parhai. Kala, “Tara̱ham mati chipuikhuilaga rikkatā kachigat kala thing chili heirorlu” da ana hānga.
Ana hāngluishita, “Kakhane sāda heirorluilu,” chieina athumna kakhanela salui. “Kakathumala heirorluilu” da hānga, kala athumna kakathumala sai.
Hanphut kuimareida tara̱ chi longtha̱da akhur chuikahai chila pemhaowa.
Ngazin pha̱kaphayā atam ungkashung eina marān Elijahna hanphut ngalemli vanganingda hānga, “O
Ili ngahānkāmilu, O
Chiwui thili
Chi theilaga mibingna ngakhumshāmhaida “
Elijahna athumli hānga, “Baalwui marānbing chi tukkhuiserlu, athum akha eina tangda mayāmshokpaimara.” Chieina athumna tukkhuisera; kala Elijahna athumli Kishonkongli khuitāda ashaothatserhaowa.
Elijahna Ahabli hānga, “Ungda ungphazā ungphāshakulu, kaja kazing kharokhon shāhaira.”
Chieina Ahabna phāshak phazā khavai unghaowa. Kala Elijahna Carmel Kaphungtonli kālaga amai ngaleili ngakhumzangda amai khuksao khaniwui ngachaili haipama.
Awui raoli, “Ngayivāk thuingashānyanglu” da hānga. Rao china shokngashānyanglaga hānga, “Khikha matheimana.” Kha ana hangluiya, “Shini shida shokngashānluilu.”
Kashineli ana hānga, “Yanglu, muiyānao pangmayā rikkha shamadrutungwui eina kārārāli.” Elijahna hānga, “Ahabli, ‘Nawui siguigari khangarān sāda ungulu, zingrotna maungpaipaishina’ da ahānglu.”
Kasha̱khawui alungli kazingram chi muiyā eina masina zikhaowa, kala kazing marlak eina rohaowa. Ahabna sigui tongphungda Jezreelli unghaowa,
wui pāngna Elijahli ngasomida, awui shānneira̱ neikhuilaga Jezreel ungshungnanai Ahabli ungngaphankhui.
Elijahna kasāsā, kala marānbingli ana kathāda raighai eina shaothatserhaokhala kaji pao saikora Ahabna Jezebelli unghānga.
Chieina Jezebelna Elijahli pao chihovāda hānga, “Athum akhali nana shaokathat thāda inala nali akhama hitharan masamisi kaja varebingna theira.”
Chieina ana ngacheehaida mathi khavai Judahli khalei Beer-shebali yāmvai. Kala awui raoli chili ahaihaowa.
Amāng eina thangzatkha lamhāngli yāmvai, kala thingpompa̱ akhawui azingli apama; kala thingasak khavai ana hānga, “O
Kala ana thingpompa̱ akhawui azingli ngayaisangda pikhavā eina, yanglu, kazingrao akhana ali sāza̱da hānga, “Thuiphazālu.”
Ana thuikhayang eina yanglu, akuishakli khamuikasā ngalungtungli parhaisai, kala tara̱ hamkha haisai. Ana chi thuizā-thuimanglaga pizangluishita.
wui kazingrao china kakhane rāluishitta ali sāza̱da hānga, “Thuiphazālu, shongfa hirankha mazatthukpaishina.”
Ana ngakarthuida phāshak phazāda Varewui kaphung Horebli ngashun hangmati ngayā hangmatithang zangda vai.
Ana chili lungkhur akhali angasāmkhui, kala yanglu,

Ana hānga, “Proho Ashangva̱wui Varewui vang ina sangaireoreo sai, kha Israelwui mibingna nawui tuingashit kaihaida hanphut sakathānhaowa, kala nawui marānbingla raighai eina shaothatserhaowa, ara imāng taikahaina; kala ilila athumna imanglā khuithui khavai ngarānda lei.”
Ana hānga, “Mangāli vālu,
neina̱wui thili mei chui, kha meilila
Akhon chi Elijahna kashā eina ana mai awui kachon eina fakhamlaga lungkhur chiwui zangkhavaipamli shoknganinga. Kala yanglu, ali akhon akha vaorāda hānga, “Elijah, na hili khi salikhala?”
Ana hānga, “Ashangva̱wui
kala Israelwui awunga sākhavai Nimshiwui naomayara Jehuli tharchisinmira; kala Abel-meholahli khalei Shaphatwui naomayara Elishali nawui mahut marān sākhavai tharchisinmira.
Kala Hezaelwui raighaiwui eina yāmkashokbingli Jehuna shaothatra; kala Jehuwui raighaiwui eina yāmkashokbingli Elishana shaothatra.
Chithālala Israelwui alungli, Baalli khuktida makhorumlak kaje, kala khamor mangasunlak kaje mi thingshini haisara.”
Ana khaung eina Shaphatwui naomayara Elishana mukkā tharāda khani shimenlaga seiot khuisai. Elijahna ngalemli vālaga Elishawuitungli awui kachon afarora.
Chieina awui sei horhaida Elijahli shurvāda hānga, “Ishāvā eina ishāva̱li mai ungngasunkhuiga, laga nali shurnaoga.” Ana hānga, “Ungkhalailu, ina nali khi sāhaokhala?”
Chieina ana latunglaga sei chi taithata kala okkaithing eina mei sālaga asā chi hangkhuida mi saikorali mishai. Chiwui thili Elijahli shurzatta sheba sāmi.
Syriawui awunga Ben-hadadna awui raimi saikora kazipkhuiserda wungnao thumrāda khani, kala ali ngasoda sigui kala siguigari zangda Samariali akuinamlaga ngarara.
Kala ana keinungli paomebing chihoda Israelwui awunga Ahabli ahānga, “Ben-hadadna kahāngna:
‘Nawui sinā lupā iwuina, napreiva̱, nanaongarā khamathāthā khalei chila iwuisera.’”
Israelwui awungana ngahānkai, “Nana kahāng thāda, amei, ila nawuina, iwui khalei saikora nawuisera.”
Paomebing china rāhānglui, “Ben-hadadna hānga: ‘Ina chihoda kahāngna, “Nawui sinā lupā, preiva̱, naongarā milu da kachihona”;
chithālala akhama hitharan iwui raobing chihorāra, athumna nawui shimla, raobingwui shimla rākapeoda athumna ningkachachāng chi rākhuira.’”

Chieina Israelwui awungana ngalei chiwui ararnaobingli hokhuiserlaga hānga, “Hi machutkhuilu, kaja ana kharar khavai phāda lei. Kaja ana preiva̱la, naongarāla, lupāsāla, sinala, ana poda ina ngga majimana.”
Ararnaobingla kala mibing saikoranala hānga, “Awui kahāng chili matheimilu kala khamayāla mamayālu.”
Chieina Ben-hadadwui paomebingli hānga, “Awunga ishameili hānglu, ‘Naraoli hāngkhare chi ina mayara; kha hiya mamayararmara.’” Paomebing china ngalatthuida tui chi unghānga.
Ben-hadadna khangatei pao chihoda hānga, “Samariawui chifa chi iwui thikashurbing saikorawui vang pangparkhaship makāmara, ina mangararakha varebingna theiranu.”
Israelwui awungana ngahānkai, “Ali hānglu, ‘Rai sāri shaksā kahai china raishok kahai a thāda malangsoranu.’”
Pao hi ungkahāng atamli Ben-hadadna wungnaobingli ngasoda zam mangsai kala ana awui mibingli “Khangarān sālu” da hānga. Chieina athumna keinung kaikhavai khangarān sai.
Kala yanglu, Israelwui awunga Ahabwui ngalemli marān akhana rāhānga, “
Ahabna, “Khipāna ngararmirakhala?” da khangahān eina, “
Chieina ana ngalei chiwui lammungabingwui raimibing kazipkhuiserda shākhani thumrāda khani, kala Israelnao thingshini kāshunga.
Athumna ngashunung vai, atam chitharan Ben-hadad kala ali khangachon wungnao thumrāda khani zam mangda maliprei leisai.
Lammungabingwui raobingna rimeida zata. Kala Ben-hadadna rairui chihovai, kala athumna unghānga, “Samariawui eina mibing shokrārāda lei.”
Ana hānga, “Athumna mashit khavai kharāna jilala, ngarar khavai kharāna jilala kharing eina tukkhuilu.”
Chithāda sāda lammungabingwui mibingna thānda raimibingna keinungwui eina shokuwa.
Kachichā ngazun asāthata; Syrianaobing yāmhaida Israelnaobingna kharomvai, kha Syriawui awunga Ben-hadadva sigui tongphungda sigui katong raimibingli ngasoda yāmhaowa.
Israelwui awungana thānda siguila siguigarila kachungkha tukkhuida, Syrianao kachungkha shaothata.
Chiwui thili marān china Israel awungawui ngalemli vāda hānglui, “Mathālak eina khangarān sākhuilu kala chukmaja̱kazaklu, kaja Syriawui awungana luira̱dung atamli rāngararluishitra.”
Syriawui awungali awui raimibingna hānga, “Athumwui varebing hiya, kaphungwui vare sāthuda ithumli pangmei kahaina; tampākli ngararsa, chithākha mashoila ithum pangmeira.
Kala hithāda sālu: wungnaobing khuishokhaolu, kala athumwui pamli raimi thānmebing phāsangsa;
kala shimān kahai raimi, sigui, siguigari chiyākha kazipkhuiluisa; chiwui thili tampākli ngararakha kachangkhat eina athumli ishi pangmeira.” Ana athumwui tui khuida chi tākam eina sai.
Luira̱dung atamli Ben-hadadna Syriawui mibing kazipkhuida Israelli ngarar khavai Aphekli vai.
Israelwui mibingla kaziplaga otpam ngayarserhaida ngarar khavai vai; Israel mibingna athumwui mangāli me ashangva̱ khani thāda rairum sai; kha Syrianaobingna ram chi pemhaowa.
Varewui mi akhana Israelwui awungali rāhānga, “
Athumna kāroda shinithang rairum sāpama. Kashinethang rai sāphokuwa; kala Israelnaobingna Syrianao, chithangmāng, pheiwui raimi lakh akha sāthata.
Kataibing china Aphek keinungli yāmvai; kala taikahaibing chi thingmaga̱ da shini phākhona minrorhaowa.
Ben-hadadla yāmhaowa, kala keinungwui shimlung akhali azanghaowa.

Kala awui raimibingna hānga, “Israel shimkhurwui awungabing hiya lumashantheilaka da shai; ithumna bora eina shānneira̱ sāda kuili khara̱ neilaga Israel awungawuili vāsa, chithakha nawui mirin huimilapai.”
Chieina athumna bora shanneira̱ sai, khara̱ kuili neilaga Israelwui awungali ahānga, “Narao Ben-hadadna hangli, ‘Masāthatmialu da seihā sāli.’” Ana hānga, “A mathirangla? A ichināna.”

Chitharan mibingna machutkhui khavai yangsāda, athumna tatot eina phaningkhuida hānga, “Mha, nachinā Ben-hadad mathiranga.” Chieina ana, “Ahokhuilu” da kasoi. Chiwui thili ana kharā eina ali siguigarili kapam ngasaka.

Ben-hadadna ali hānga, “Navāwui eina ishāvāna khuikahai keinungbing ina hanmira; kala ishāvāna Samariali leihngapha̱ sakakā thāda nanala Damascusli sakāpaira.” Ahabna hānga, “Chithasa jiakha nali apong hiwui vang chihomira.” Chieina tuingashit akha sālaga chihohaowa.
Chieina ana hānga, “Nana
Chiwui thili mi khangatei akha samphangda, “Ili shaolu.” da poi. Mipa china shaoda khamā za̱haowa.
Chieina marān china awungawui rākhavaili angaraipamhaowa, kala azak mathei khavai chonshi eina amik neiphinhai.

Awunga rākakān eina ana panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Narao I raipamli vai, kala yanglu, raimi akhana yangkashe akha tukungda ili hānga, ‘Mipa hili mayonsālu, yāmhaiakha awui mahut nali sāthatra, maningakha lupāsā thingkathum kashong lāngra.’
Kha narao ina ot khangateiwui vang ngalang zarlakha mipa chi yāmhaowa.” Israelwui awungana hānga, “Nawui bichar chithāpapamra; nana tuikup khuikahaina.”
Chieina ana katotsisi mikli neikahai kachon chi khalatāhaowa, kala Israelwui awungana marān akhanada theihaowa.
Marān china hānga, “
Israelwui awunga ning khājir wukkhananglak eina awui shim Samariali unghaowa.
Chitharan Samariawui awunga Ahabwui keinung nganaili Jezreelpa Nabothna drakhā yāmgui akha leisai.

Thangkha Ahabna Nabothli, “Nawui yāmgui hi han lingshai khavai milu, kaja hi iwui shimli nganailaka, hili phākhamei drakhā yāmgui akha ina mira; maningakha nana ningkachāng athishurda hiwui aman lupā einala mipaira.”
Kha Nabothna Ahabli hānga, “Ishāvā ngarāwui shimlui nali mikida
Nabothna ali kahāng chiwui vang Ahabna malungvātta shilaga shimli unghaowa, kaja “Ishāvā ngarāwui shimlui nali mamimara” jihaowa. Ana petli ngayaisangda mai ngareifazanglaga zātla mazāmara jihaowa.
Kha apreiva̱̱ Jezebelna, “Khiwui vang naning chotlakhaoda maphazāmara jihaokhala?” da ngahāna.
Ana ngahānkai, “Ina Jezreelpa Nabothli, ‘Nawui yāmgui chi I lohaoga, chi maningakha ningkachāng drakhāthei yāmgui khangatei akha eina ngatha̱sa’ da kahāng eina ana, ‘Iwui yāmgui mamimara’ jihaowa.”
Apreiva̱ Jezebelna ali hānga, “Israelli nana khamung maningmala? Ngakarthuida phāshak phāzalu; ning mathānlu. Jezreelpa Nabothwui yāmgui chi ina khuimira.”
Apreiva̱na Ahabwui ming eina kala awui mahor namlaga Nabothna kapam keinungli khalei ararnao, wungnao chili chithi kapida chihovai.
