Kala ana chithi chili hithāda hānga, “Kakhum eina seihā sākhavai chishātlu, mi zaikorawui mangāli Nabothli pam khamathāli chipamlu;
kala makhangatun mi khani ali kāroda pamngasaklaga ali makhamayā phenda ‘Nana Vare eina awungali khonshiya.’ da hāngngasaklu. Chiwui thili ali ayarli khuishokta lunggui eina horthathaolu.”
Awui keinungli khalei ararnaobing kala wungnaobing china Jezebelwui kapi kahai tui thāda sai. Awui chithili kapi kahai thāda,
athumna kakhum eina seihā kasā khui, kala Nabothli pam khamathā akhali chipama.

Makhangatuna mi khani china ali kāroda pama, kala Nabothli makhayā kaphen khuirāda yaruili hānga, “Nabothna Vare eina awungali khonshiya.” Chieina athumna keinungwui ayarli khuishoklaga lunggui eina horthathaowa.
Chiwui thili athumna, “Nabothli lunggui eina horthathaira” da Jezebelli pao mi.

Nabothli lunggui eina horthathaira kaji pao shākhaleoda Jezebelna Ahabli hānga, “Ngakarthuida lupā eina loga jilala mayorsangmara kaje Jezreelpa Nabothwui drakhā yāmgui chi akhuilu; kaja Naboth maringluimana, thihaira.”
Naboth thihaira kaji shākhaleoda Ahabna ngakarthuida drakhā yāmgui chi khuikhavai vai.
Chiwui thili Tishbewui Elijahli
“Thuilu, Samariali khalei Israelwui awunga Ahabli asamphanglu; yanglu, ana Nabothwui drakhā yāmgui khuikhavai chili leidalei.
Kala nana ali hānglu,
Ahabna Elijahli, “Nana ili rāsamphanghailuira jo, O iwui yangkashe?” da hānga.
Ana ngahānkai, “Ina nali samphanghaira,” khikhalajila “
Yanglu, nawuitungli ina makaphā khuirāra; ‘Ina nali khuithuichaohaora, kala Ahabwui eina ningkakhānbingla, raobingla, Israelli khalei mayarnao saikora akhala mashokmara;
kala ina nawui shim Nebatwui naomayara Jeroboamli kasā thāda, kala Ahijahwui naomayara Baashali kasā thāda sāmira; khikhalajila nana ili malungvāt ngasaka, kala nana Israelli morei sāngasakhaowa.’
Kala Jezebelwui pongli
Ahabshi mi keinungli kathebing fana shaira; kala ashiwui mi khararli kathebing kazingramli yongkazata vānaona shaira.”
(Jezebelna hāngkasothaoda,
Israelwui eina kasham kahai Amonnaobingna kasā thāda, Ahabna meoma̱li phaningda ningkakachai ot sai).
Ahabna tuibing hi kashā tharan awui kachon serkhaklaga aphasāli bora ngavai, kala khumda bora māngli pi, kala ning mashoklakla zata.
Kala Tishbewui Elijahli
“Ahabna iwui mangāli khayāshida ngahuiri kahai chi theila? Ili khayākashiwui vang, kalākashi hi awui thotli mashok ngasakmara; kha naothotli shokngasaknaora.”
Kha kakathuma kum Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatna Israelwui awungali tāsamphanga.
Israelwui awungana awui raobingli, “Ramoth-gilead hi ishiwuina, kha yansāngsa̱ eina pamda Syriawui awungawui pāngli khaleina kaji nathum matheimala?” da hānga.
Kala Jehoshaphatli, “Ramoth-gileadli rai tāsa khavai ili mangasovarakhala?” da hānga.
Jehoshaphatna Israelwui awungali hānga, “Ini akhana, iwui mi chi nawui mina, iwui siguila nawuina.”
Kala Jehoshaphatna Israelwui awungali hānga, “
Chieina Israelwui awungana marān shāmati sha̱kha hokhuida athumli hānga, “Ili Ramoth-gileadli rai sālu jikā, khānghaolu jikhala?” Athumna, “Sālu,
Kha Jehoshaphatna hānga, “Ngasankapai
Israelwui awungana Jehoshaphatli hānga, “
Jehoshaphatna hānga, “Awungana chithāda mahāngmialu!”
Chieina Israelwui awungana kathāna akha hokhuida hānga, “Imlahwui naomayara Micaiahli thākta ahokhuilu.”
Chitharan Israel awunga eina Judah awunga Jehoshaphatna wungsāri ngavailaga Samariawui ngaveili zangkhavai lanpum khalei wungpamkhongli pama, kala marānbingna shokki kaji tui marānsai.
Kala Chenaanahwui naomayara Zedekiahna mari eina angaji sākhuilaga hānga, “
Marān saikorana marānda hānga, “Ramoth-gileadli angararda khayui ngasalu.
Micaiahli akaho paome china hithāda hānga, “Yanglu, marānbing tui akha sāda awungawui vang hangmiserhaira, nawui tuila athumwui thāda awungali khamayā tui hānglu.”
Kha Micaiahna, “
Ana awungawuili khavā tharan awungana hānga, “Micaiah, Ramoth-gileadli rai angarar khavai varakā, ngaraifalu jikhala?” Ana ngahānkai, “Vada khayuiya ngasalu,
Kha awungana hānga, “
Israelwui awungana Jehoshaphatli hānga, “Iwui vang makaphā maningla phākhavai akhala ana maphongmimara da ina nali mahāngmala?”
Micaiahna hānga, “Chiwui vang
kala
Chiwui thili manglā akhana
na ali hānga, ‘Kathāda asuira?’ Ana ngahānkai, ‘Ina vāda marān saikorawui khamorli kakapik matui khavai manglā asangmira.’ Ana hānga, ‘Nana asuira kala ot shokphalungra, vāda asaulu.’”
“Chiwui vang eina yanglu, nawui marān saikorawui khamorli
Chieina Chenaanahwui naomayara Zedekiahna rānganailaga Micaiahwui maisorli akapheya, kala, “
Micaiahna hānga, “Yanglu, nana shimlungli zangngathum thanghon chitharan theinaora.”
Israelwui awungana hānga, “Micaiahli tukkhuilu, kala keinungwui lammunga Amon eina awungawui naomayara Joashwuili khuivāda hānglu,
awungana hithāda hānga, I maungranglakha eina tangda mipa hili phātopli sanghailu, kala zātla, tara̱la kateteo māng mimalu.”
“Na chingri eina latungluisi kaje” Micaiahna hānga, “
Israelwui awunga eina Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatna Ramoth-gileadli vai.
Israelwui awungana Jehoshaphatli hānga, “Ili mathei khavai sāri ngacheikhuilaga ina raipamli vāra, nava wungsāri shaksāpapamlu.” Kala Israel awunga sāri onkhuilaga raipamli vāhaowa,
Syria awungana awui siguigari kathāna thumrāda khani chili, “Israelwui awungali maningla kharei kateo khipālikha mangararlakalu” da kasohaisai.
Siguigari kathānabing china Jehoshaphatli kathei eina athumna, “Israelwui awunga chi hilaka” da hānga. Chieina athumna ali ngarar khavai ngareivai; kala Jehoshaphatna vāoshoka.
Kathānabing china Israelwui awunga maningmana da kathei chitharan ali kakharomwui eina ngalanhaowa.

Kha mi akhana malāthing kapphāphā kaji eina Israel awungawui chāngvei eina thikom ngachaili zanghaowa; chieina awui siguigari kathaowa chili, “Ili za̱haira, ngareikhuilaga raipamwui eina ili phungunghaolu.” da kasoi.
Chithangwui rai marhaoda awungana awui siguigari tungli zungpamda Syria raimibingli yangngasungda pama, kha zingyinlam thihaowa; kala awui ashee akhamā eina shokta siguigari pemhaowa.
Zimik tunnanaili raimibingli hithāda vaorai, “Kachicha keinungli kala kachichā ramli ungserulu!”
Chieina awunga thihaoda Samariali khuiunga; kala chili ungchifahaowa.
Kala athumna siguigari chi Samariawui ra̱khongli ungpheokhui;
Ahabwui kasākhavā, kasāsā, mafahā eina shim sākakhui, kala ana sākakā keinung saikorawui apong Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Ahab thikahai eina anaomayara Ahaziahna awui pamli thuimunga.
Israelwui awunga Ahabna mungda khamate kum, Asawui nao Jehoshaphatna Judahli mungphoka.
Jehoshaphatna mungkaphok tharan awui kum thumrāda phangā kāshunghairasai; ana Jerusalemli kum maga̱da phangā munga. Ava̱va̱li Azubah hoi, Shilhiwui naongalāva̱na.
Ana avāva̱ Asawui otsak thāda sai;
Jehoshaphatna Israel awungali mashitkhui.
Jehoshaphatwui kasākhavā, ana kachithei awui pangshap, kala rai kathāda ngarar kajiwui pongli Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Avāva̱ Asawui thotli taikasa khayora mayarnaobing ana yaithupthathaowa.
Edomli awunga maleimada mahut kashina akhana awunga phungmisai.
Ophirli sinā akhui khavai Jehoshaphatna Tarshishwui jahas sākhui, kha mavāshungranglakha Ezion-Geber kaho apam chili kaihaowa.
Chiwui thili Ahabwui nao Ahaziahna Jehoshaphatli hānga, “Iwui raobingna nawui raobingli jahasli ngasovā ngasaksa.” Kha Jehoshaphana mamayāngaithuwa.
Jehoshaphat thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda avāva̱ Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa, kala anaomayara Jehoramna awui pamli thuimunga.
Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatna mungda tharāda kashine kum Ahabwui nao Ahaziahna Samariali khalei Israelli thuimunga; kala kum khani munga.
wui mikyanli ana makaphā otmāng sai; avāva̱wui thāda, kala Nebatwui naomayara Jeroboamna Israelli morei sākhangasak thāda anala chi tākam eina sai.
Avāva̱na kasā tākam eina Baalli khorumda Israelwui
Ahab thikahaiwui thili Moabna Israelli thuingarara.
Chitharan Samariali Ahaziahna awui mathāng atowui eina saotāda kazāhaowa; chiwui vang paome chihovāda hānga, “Vālu, kakazā hiwui eina I marainikhala Ekronwui vare Baal-zebubli angahānlu.”
Kha
Chiwui vang
Paomebing china awungali latkhaung eina ana ngahāna, “Khisāda nathum latunghaokhala?”
Athumna ali hānga, “Mi akha ithumli rāngarokta ana hānga, ‘Nathumli chihokharā awunga chili latungda hānglu; kaja
Ana hānga, “Nathumli samphangda rākahānga chi kachikathā mikhala?”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Sahā kachon ngavai, sāhui shānneira̱ neiya.” Ana hānga, “Hi Tishbewui Elijahna.”
Chiwui thili awungana hangphangāwui raithāna akha awui hangphangāli ngasoda chihovai. Ana kaphungtonli pamsāda Elijahli ahānga, “O Varewui mi, awungana, ‘Zanglu.’ da hānga.”

Kha Elijahna hangphangāwui raithāna chili ngahānkāda hānga, “I Varewui mi akhana jiakha, kazingwui eina mei tāda na kala nawui mi hangphangā chilila chuithathaoranu.” Chieina kazingwui eina mei tāda alila awui hangphangā chilila chuithatserhaowa.
Awungana khangatei hangphangāwui kathāna kala awui hangphangāli ngasoda chihovāluishita. Ana awuili kāda, “O Varewui mi, hi awungawui kakasona, thākta zanglu” da hānga.

Kha Elijahna ngahānkai, “I Varewui mi akhana jiakha, kazingwui eina mei tāda na kala nawui hangphangā chilila chuithathaoranu.” Chieina kazingwui eina mei tāda alila awui hangphangā chilila chuithatserhaowa.

Awungana kakathuma sāda hangphangāwui raithāna kala awui hangphangā eina ngasoda chihokāluishita, kala kālaga Elijahwui mangāli khuktilaga poi, “O Varewui mi, iwui manglā kala nawui rao hangphangāwui manglā hi nawui mikyanli sakta kaphaningmilu.
Yanglu, kharewui hangphangāngā kala kathāna khani chi aniwui hangphangāngā eina ngasoda kazingwui eina mei tāda chuithathaira; kha iwui manglā hi nawui mikyanli sakta kakhuimilu.”
Chieina
kala ana hānga, “
Chiwui vang Elijahna
Ahaziahwui kasāsā saikora Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Elijahli
Elijahna Elishali hānga, “Na hili pamsālu; kaja
Bethelli khalei marānbingwui naomayarabingna Elishali rāsamphangda hānga, “Nawui akhavāli aja
Elijahna ali hānga, “Elisha, na hili pamsālu; kaja ili
Jericholi khalei marānbingwui naomayarabingna Elishawui ngalemli vāda hānga, “Nawui akhavāli aja
Chiwui thili Elijahna ali hānga, “Hili pamsālu; kaja
Marānbingwui naomayarabing hangphangāla anili ngasovai kala anina Jordan pheili khanganing eina, athum katāmeihamsamda anganinga.
Chiwui thili Elijahna awui kachon khaluikhuilaga tara̱ chili khangaphit eina atung azing ngayarhaida, ngalei kathengtungli zatlaga kong makānkāhaowa.

Anina makankā kahai thili Elijahna Elishali hānga, “Ili makhuithuiranglakha, ina nawui vang khi samirakhala polu.” Elishana hānga, “Nawui manglā kathā khani shida ili kha-mataisang ngasakmilu da poli.”
Ana hānga, “Kasaka ot nana pohaira; chithālala, ili khuikathui chi nana theiakha chi nawui vang ungshungra; kha nana matheiakha chi masamphangmara.”
Anina chān ngazekmamānda zatlakha, yanglu, meiwui siguigari akha eina meiwui siguibing tālaga anili pākngasakhaowa. Kala Elijahli sur eina kazingram khuikāhaowa.
Elishana chi theilaga, “Ishāvā, ishāvā, siguigari kala raimibing thada Israelli kankhame!” da chapa. Kala ali matheiluithuwa.
Kala awui kachon khuilaga akai khani sāda serkhākhaowa.
Elijahwui kachon tātung kahai chi khuilaga ana latungda Jordan kongpheili anganinga.
Kala Elijahwui eina tātung kahai kachon chieina tara̱li ngaphitta hānga, “Elijahwui
Chitharan Jericholi khalei marānbingwui naomayarabingna ali khalāda kathei eina hānga, “Elijahwui manglā Elishali zanghaira.” Kala athumna ali angaroklaga awui mangāli ngakhumsanga.
Athumna hānga, “Yanglu, ara naraobingli ngasoda kapanga mi hangphangā leili; athumna vāda nawui akhavāli aphāyangranu; kaja
Kha athumna hānglui hānglui kaji eina, vaishihaida, “Vāngasaklu” da hānghaowa. Chieina athumna mi hangphangā chihovāda, kathumthang aphālaga masamphangthuwa.
Ana Jericholi pamda leilakha athum hanungrāsai, chieina ana, “Mavālu da ina nathumli mahāngmala?” da hānga.
Chitharan keinung chiwui mibingna Elishali hānga, “Yanglu, ishāmeina kathei thāda keinung hi ringphālaka, kha tara̱ mamathāmana, ngaleila matumana.”
Ana hānga, “Koklui kadhar akha machi sanglaga ili khuirāmilu.” Chieina athumna khuivāmi.
Chiwui thili ana ura̱pamli vāda machi chi heisangda hānga, “
Chiwui vang Elishana kahāng athishurda aja eina tangda chiwui tara̱ tharchingda lei.
Ana chiwui eina Bethelli kai, kala shongfali zatlakha keinung chiwui naonshinao katenaobingna zeida hānga, “Kuikoka, thuiulu! kuikoka, thuiulu!”
Ana ngareiunglaga athumli kathei tharan
Chiwui eina ana Carmel Kaphungli vālaga Samariali latunga.
Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatna mungda tharāda kachishata kum, Ahabwui nao Jehoramna Samariali Israelwui awunga sāphoka kala ana kum tharāda khani munga.
Avāva̱ eina ava̱va̱wui yākha mazakshimana jilala ana
Chithālala Nebatwui nao Jeroboamna morei sāda Israelli morei sākhangasak chithāda anala chiwui eina mapākthuihaila sāchinga.
Chitharan Moabwui awunga Mesha yao khayoka mi sāsai; kala Israelwui awungali kumshirinda yaonao lakhkha kala yaovā lakhkhawui yaohah chigatchinga.
Kha Ahab thikahai eina, Moab awungana Israelwui awungali ngakaishihaowa.
Chiwui vang Awunga Jeroboamna Samariawui eina shokta Israelnaobing kazipkhui.

Kala Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatli pao chihovāda “Moabwui awungana ili ngakaishihaowa; ini Moabli rai matāsikhala?” da hānga. Ana, “Vāra, ini khi khangatei leikhala, iwui mila nawui mina, iwui siguila nawui siguina” da ngahānkai.
Chieina ana, “Kachishong eina vāsikhala?” da hānga. Jehoramna, “Edomwui lamhāngshong eina vāsa.” da ngahānkai.

Chiwui thili Israelwui awungana Judahwui awunga eina Edomwui awungali ngasoda vai. Athumna zimiksho shinithang kuizat kahai tharan, shurkazata raimibingwui vangla, sha̱keibingwui vangla tara̱ masamphangthuwa.
Chieina Israelwui awungana hānga, “Iyavo! Wungnao kathum Moabwui pāngli horsangmi khavai
Jehoshaphatna hānga, “
Jehoshaphatna hānga, “Ali
Israelwui awungali Elishana hānga, “Navā eina nava̱wui marānbingli vālu. Iwuili khi rāsākhala?” Kha Israel awungana hānga, “Maningmana, wungnao kathum hili Moabwui pāngli horsangmi khavai
Elishana hānga, “Ina otram ngatha̱khami, saikorawui
Ili laa kathem mi akha khuirāmilu.” Laasame china laa kasā tharan
Kala ana hānga, “
Kaja
Hiya

raipan sakā kahai keinung kachiva̱, khamathā keinung kachiva̱, nathumna yuikhuira; kala thing khamathāthābing ta̱tekra; ura̱pam saikora sāphinra; kala ngalei katumpam kachiva̱ lunggui chipemda sākathānhaora.”
Akhama kathā ngathor, pha̱phayāda chigatki kaji atamli, yanglu, apam kachiva̱ tara̱ mapemranglakha eina tangda Edomwuishong eina tara̱ longrai.

Awungabing rai ngarar khavai rāhaira kaji Moabwui mibingna kashā tharan chāngvei phungkatheiya, nganuimeikap kaje eina thuilaga rarmeikap kaje eina tangda hokhuiserlaga aram tharishong pareng asāhaowa.
Athumna ngathor kathui tharan zimikna tara̱tungli kaprorda Moabwui mibingna tara̱ saikora ashee thāda hungping eina thei.
Kala athumna hānga, “Asheelaka, awungabing chi athum eina athum ngashātthat ngarok kahailakra. Ara jo, Moabnaobing, angaponkhuisa.”
Kha Israelwui rairumli khavā tharan Israelwui mibingna thuingararda Moabnaobing mayāmranglakha eina tangda ngarara kala athumna mangāshong vāmamānda kachungkha sāthata.

Athumna keinungbing chi khuihaida ngalei katumpapamli mi kachiva̱ ngalung mapemranglakha eina tangda horsanga; ura̱pam kachiva̱la saphinmihaowa, kala thing khamathāthāla ta̱tekmiserhaida Kir-haresethli chiwui lungguibingmāng taimihai, kala shairong kasingbingna kuinamda keinung chi yuikhui.
Athum mayuithukthura kaji kathei eina Moabwui awungana raighai kasing mi shāshini khuilaga Edom awungawuishong namkhaishok khavai sai, kha mararthuwa.

Chieina awui mahut shinki kaje awui naochizaili khuilaga phākhotungli rikkatā kachigat sāda pha̱haowa. Kala Israelwuitungli malungkhavāt kahakva tāhaoda athumna mangararluila kachichā ramli latunghaowa.
Chitharan marānbingwui naomayara akhawui preiva̱na Elishali vaoda hānga, “Narao igahara thihaowa; narao
Elishana hānga, “Nawui vang ina khi sāmipaira? Nashi shimli khi leimameikhala ili hānglu?” Ana hānga, “Thao hamnaoli sangkahai chi maningla narao iwuili ot khangatei maleiluimana.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Vāda khongnainaobingwui eina ham khamasai apokhuilu, shapmeikha majialu.
Chiwui thili nala nanao khanila, khāmong shungnarhailaga, thao chi heisanglu; kala pemkahaibing chi ngateida haimamānlu.”
Chieina ana unglaga ashi va̱naongarā khāmong shunghaowa, kala ana thao chi heisangmamān anina ava̱va̱li ham chi khuivāmimamāna.
Ham pemser kahai tharan, nao chili “Ili ham khangateila khuirāmiluilu” da poi. Ana, “Khangatei maleiluithura” da hānga. Chieina thao longkatāla ngasāmhaowa.
Ana Varewui mi chili akahāng eina, ana hānga, “Ungulu, thao chi ungyorlaga leiman runhaolu, kala katai china nashi va̱naongarā yorzālu.”
Thangkha Elishana Shunemli vāda chili kashanga preinao akha okthuisāda ali phakazā hoi. Chieina ana chishong vākān kachida phazā khavai chili vāzanga.
Preiva̱ china agaharali hānga, “Ishiwuishong rākānching kajipa hi Varewui kathara mina da ina theikhuihaira.
Ishi shimtungli phākhonao ngaveikhuilaga shimnao akha sākhuida chili awui pet, table, chaoki hailaga, a kharā atamli ana chili pikhuikhui jiranu.”
Thangkha ana rālaga shim chili zangda ngasāmkhui.
Kala awui rao Gehazili hānga, “Shunempava̱li hokhuilu.” Akaho eina ana awui mangāli anganinga.

Kala Gehazili hānga, “Preiva̱ hili hānglu, kaja, yanglu, iniwui vang nana ngalang kachungkha zarmihaira, nawui vang khi sāmi ngasakngaikhala? Awungali kala raimi kathānali nawui vang hāngmikapai khaleila?” da hānglu.
Ana ngahānkai, “Iya iwui mibingli ngayurpamda lei.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Thakha nawui vang khi sāmirakhala?”
Gehazina ngahānkai “Ava mayarnao maleimana, agaharala sārhaira.”
Ana, “Ali hokhuilu” da hānga. Ali akaho eina ana khāmongpheili rānganinga.
Kala ana hānga, “Zingkuma hitharan, na naomayarnao akha nganaosara.” Ana hānga, “O Varewui mi, narao ili kakapik tui mahāngalu.”
Kha preiva̱ chi nao vaihaoda, Elishana kahāng tākam eina atam ungkashung tharan, luira̱dungli mayarnao akha pharākhui.
Nao chi kharar tharan, thangkha, avāva̱li ngasoda mā kahāt vai.
Ana avāva̱li, “Iya, ikui, ikui!” da hānga. Awui raoli, “Ava̱va̱li khuiungmihaolu” da kasoi.
Ana vamkhuilaga khuiungkhami tharan ava̱va̱na ngashun pongda vampama, chiwui thili thihaowa.
Chieina apreiva̱ china Varewui mina pikhavai kāli khuikāda petli chipethaiphunglaga khāmong shunghailaga shokhaowa.
Kala agaharali ahokhuida hānga, “Rao akha eina ngasoda gadhā akha chihomilu, kaja Varewui mi chili ina thaklāk eina vālaga latungluira.”
Ana hānga, “Khiwui vang aja nana ali vārakhala? Aja changwokla maningmana, Sabbathla maningmana.” Ana hānga, “Khikhala mathāmara,”
Chieina ana gadhā shaksākhuida raopali hānga, “Gadha chi thākta thaolu kala ina mahāngakha shongzā masuitā ngasaklu.”
Chithāda ana zatta Varewui mi khaleipam Carmel Kaphungli vai.
Varewui mi china preiva̱ chili kathei tharan awui rao Gehazili hānga, “Yanglu — Shunempava̱ rārāda lei!
ngasamvāda angaroklu laga, ‘Na ringphāda leila? Nagaharala ringphāda leila? Nanaomayarala ringphāda leila?’ da angahānlu.”
Preiva̱ china ngahānkai, “Khikha mathāmana.”
Kaphung kākashung tharan Varewui mipāwui phei asingkhui. Chieina Gehazina shimenshok khavai sai. Kha Varewui mi china, “Aningkhānranu; wukkhananglāk eina leidalei kala
Preiva̱ china hānga, “Ishameili ina nao khamilu da pokhuila? Ili makapikalu da mahāngmala?”
Ana Gehazili hānga, “Shānneira̱ neilu, kala iwui khāmshui singlaga zatulu. Mi samphanglala mangahānalu, mina ngahānlala mangahānkālu. Kala iwui khāmshui hi nao chiwui maitungli parlu.”
Nao chiwui ava̱va̱na hānga, “
Gehazina rida vālaga khāmshui chi nao chiwui maitungli parhaiya, kha akhak mashokmana, ringdalei kajiwui machut khavaila matheimana. Chieina ana angarokta hānga, “Nao chi mathuiranga.”
Elishana shimli kākhayang tharan nao chi kathi eina awui petli chipethaikasā chi thei.
Chieina ana zanglaga animang khāmong tākhailaga
Kala ana nao chiwuitungli kāngapumlaga, awui khamor eina naowui khamor, awui mik eina naowui mik, ngasunlaga, naowui pāng khanili awui pāng parkharor eina phasā lumunghaowa.
Chiwui thili ngakarthuilaga shimlungli akhashida zatung zatvā sai kala nao chiwuitungli kāngapumlui; chieina nao chi shini shida hākthishoka; kala mik rakhaowa.
Ana Gehazili hokhuilaga hānga, “Shunempava̱li hokhuilu.” Kala ana hokhui. Preiva̱ china khavā tharan ana hānga, “Nanaoli vamkhuilu.”
Preiva̱ china vāda apheizingli ngakhumshāmzanga; kala nao chi vamkhuiphungda shokhaowa.
Zāt kasak kashok atam tharan Elishana Gilgalli vālui. Marānbingwui naomayarabingna awui ngalemli pamda leilakha awui raoli, “Ham kahaka chi phumkālaga marānbingwui vang han hangmilu.” da hānga.
Athumwui ngachaili akhana hanthothāp aphākhui khavai luili vai kala lamwui pha̱shim leisāda ngapheokha aphākhui. Kala khihankhala kaji matheila hanhamli lepsangserhaowa.
Kala athumna shaikhavai yāmsangmi. Han chi shailaga athumna, “O Varewui mi, hiya khamui hanna!” da hānga. Kala mashaipaithuwa.
Ana hānga, “Kashakazā chi khuirālu.” Kala ana zāt chi khuilaga ham chili horsangda hānga, “Mibing zākhavai yāmsangmilu.” Chiwui thili khikha mathāluithuwa.
Baal-shalishahwui mi akhana Varewui mi chili, matheikhare kashakazā, nāpai khamuitang maga̱, mā khanganao borākha khuirāmi. Elishana hānga, “Mibingli shaikhavai chi mihaolu.”
Kha awui raona hānga, “Mi shākha khalei hili kathāda mimameirakhala?”
Ana hānglui, “Athumli shaikhavai mihaolu; kaja
Chieina ana athumli yaowa. Kala
Syria awungawui raimi kathāna Naaman kaho chili awui akhavāna lumlaka, khikhalajila awui mangā eina
Atam akhali Syrianaobingna rai sālaga Israelwui ngalānao akha tukungda, ngalāva̱ china Naaman preiva̱li otram ngatha̱misai.
Ana achonva̱li hānga, “Ishameina Samariali khalei marānli samphangsi kaje chong! Awui phārrei kazat hi ana raimishapra.”
Chieina Naamanna awui akhavāli, “Israelwui ngalāva̱ china hithāda hānga.” da saikora ahānga.
Syriawui awungana hānga, “Arui vaulu, kala Israelwui awungali ina chithi akha kapisangmira.”
Chieina ana, lupāsā thing thumra, sinātang thing tharuk kala phanit kachon tharā da khuiphunglaga vai.
Ana Israel awungali kakapi chithi khuikaphung chili hithāda kapihaisai: “Chithi hi nali rākashung tharan, theimilu kaja, iwui rao Naamanli awui phārrei kazat hi raimi khavai nali ina kachihona.”

Chithi chi Israelwui awungana pālaga kachon serkhakta hānga, “I Varela? Thikhangasak kala ringkhangasak ina sāshapa jihaida mi akhawui phārrei kazat hi raimi khavai ili pao hi kachiphunla? Yangla, ili kathāda khararkhuisikhala kajiwui shongfa kaphāna.”

Kha Israelwui awungana kachon serkhāka da kashā tharan, Varewui mi Elishana mi chihovāda awungali ahāng ngasaka, “Nana khisāda kachon serkakhakkhala? Ali iwuili chihorālu, kala Israelli marān akha lei kaji theikhuiranu.”
Chieina Naamanna awui sigui, siguigari tongphungda Elishawui khāmongli anganinga.
Elishana paome akhali, “Jordanli shini shida apheohaolu, chithākha naphasāli kazāt makāluimara, tharchaohaora” da ali shokhāng ngasaka.
Kha Naaman malungvāthaida “Yanglu, ana iwuili shoknganingda, awui
Damascusli khalei kongbing, Abana eina Pharparwui tara̱na Israelwui tara̱li maphāmeimala? Ina chili pheolaga matharrarmarala?” Hi hānglaga ana ngareikhuida malungvātsir eina thuihaowa.

Kha awui raobingna ali anganaida hānga, “Avā, marān akhana kahaka ot akha sālu da hāngakha, nana chi masāngaimarala? Chithakha, ‘Pheohailaga tharhaolu’ da kahāng tharan chi sāyangakha kayākha phāmeira?”
Chieina ana Jordanli tāda, Varewui mi china kahāng thāda ngaphum shini shiya, kala awui kazāt tharchaohaida phasā angangnaowui thāda unghaowa.

Chiwui thili ala, ali khangasobingla, Varewui mi chili latungda awui mangāli nganingda hānga, “Israelli maningla okathuili Vare khangatei maleimana da ina theihaira; chieina ara narao iwui khami hi kakhuimilu.”
Kha ana hānga, “Ina otram ngatha̱khami
Chieina Naamanna hānga, “Makhuimara jiakha ina kapona, narao ili gadhā khaniphun ngalei khamilu; kaja, aja eina thuida narao ina
na narao ili himāng khayangmiranu kaja: iwui akhavāna Rimmonwui shimli zangda, ipāngtheili zunglaga khokharum tharan, ila Rimmonwui shimli kui mashunkazang tharan otsak chili
Ana, “Chingri eina ungulu.” da hānga.
Kha Naaman thuida shangshei kahai tharan,
Varewui mi Elishawui rao Gehazina hānga, “Yanglu, Syriawui Naamanna khuikharā ot iwui akhavāna akhala makhuila chihomihaira.
Chithāda Gehazina Naamanli kharomvai. Mi akha kharomkharā chi Naamanna kathei eina, siguigaritungwui eina tunglaga angarokta hānga, “Khikha leihaola?”

Ana ngahānkai, “Khikha maleimana,” iwui akhavāna nali, “Ephraim kaphungramwui eina marānwui naomayara khani iwuili aruicham rāda lei; nali kapona aniwui vang lupāsa thing kathum kala phanit kachon khani mikhavai ahānglu da chiwui vang ili kachihona.”
Naamanna hānga, “Lupāsā thingtharuk kakhuimilu.” Kala ali lupāsā thingtharuk khaoli shaksālaga, phanit kachon khani eina ngasoda awui rao khanili chiphuna; kala anina Gehaziwui mangāli phungungmi.
Kala ana kaphung kākashung eina khuilaga shimli haihaowa, kala anili chizathaowa.
Awui akhavāwui mangāli zangda zangnganinga kala Elishana hānga, “Gehazi, na kali khavākhala?”
Ana hānga, “Narao I kalikha mavāmana.”

Kha ana hānga, “Mi china siguitungwui eina tunglaga nali rākhangarok atamli I manglā eina nali mangasosāmala? Pheisā kashankachon, olive eina drakhā yāmgui, yao eina sei, raomayarnao eina sha̱nao, khuikapai atamla?
Chiwui vang eina Naamanwui phārrei chi nali kāra kala nashi shimkhur ara̱-azā thot kachida kazāchingra.” Pham thāda charshi eina phārrei kazāda awui eina shokhaowa.
Marānbingwui naomayarabingna Elishali hānga, “Yanglu, nawui azingli ot sāda khalei apam hi masha̱nāhaira.
Jordan ngalemli ithumna thing akharip ata̱khuilaga chiwuili pamkhavai shim akha asākhuiga.”
Ana, “Vālu.” da hānga.
Chieina athum akhana hānga, “Naraobingli khangasovāmilu.” Ana, “Ila vara.” da ngahānkai.
Chieina athumli ngasovai. Athumna Jordanli khavā tharan thing ata̱ya.
Mi akhana thing ta̱ kaja, awui ngahā tara̱lungli ngahingzanghaida, “Iyavo, Amei! Miwui masākasingna.” da hānga.
Varewui mi china hānga, “Kali tāzanghaokhala?” Apam chi kachithei eina ana thing akha shātkhuilaga chili horsanga; chieina mari chi ngaphongshokrasai.
Ana, “Chi khuilu.” da hānga. Chieina ana apāng eina zangngarānkhui.
Atam akhali Syriawui awungana Israelli rai khangarar tharan, ana awui raobingli, “Apam hibingli iwui rāmrah sāra” da ngasanda hānga.
Kha Varewui mi china Israelwui awungali pao chishātta hānga, “Ning ngasharlu hishong marāpaimara, kaja Syrianaobing hishong tāra.”
Varewui mina kahāng apam chili Israelwui awungana chihovai. Chithāda ana hāngmathinkhamiwui vang akha khanishili lāngda kanmiya.
Syriawui awunga wukkhananglakhaoda awui raimibingli hokhuida hānga, “Ithum khipāna Israel awungawui mijang zanglikhala kaji nathum mahāngmarala?”
Awui rao akhana hānga, “Khipānakha maningmana, ishāmei; O awunga; kha Israelli khalei Elisha marān chinana, nana petkāli khamatui chi, ana Israelwui awungali hangmimi kajina.”
Ana hānga, “A kali leikhala, ayanglu, ina mi chihovāda atukkhuira.” “Yanglu, a Dothanli lei.” da hānga.
Chieina ana siguila, siguigarila, raimi kachungkha chihovāda keinung chi ngayāshong akuinamhaowa.
Varewui mi chiwui raona ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuida ayar kashok tharan, yanglu, siguila, siguigarila, shipaila keinungli kuimareida leisai. Kala rao china, “Iyavo, akhava! kathausikhala?” da hānga.
Ana hānga, “Mangacheealu, athumwuile inili ngasomida khaleina chungmeiya.”
Chieina Elishana seihā sāda hānga, “O
Kala Syriawui mibingna awuishong rākatā tharan, Elishana
Elishana athumli hānga, “Shongfa chi hishong maningmana kala keinung chi hi maningmana, iwui thi shurlu kala nathumna kaphā mi chiwui pamkhavaili ina thanvāga.” Chieina ana athumli Samariali thānvai.
Athumna Samaria vāshungkhaleoda Elishana hānga, “O
Israelwui awungana athumli kathei tharan Elishali hānga, “Avā, ina athumli sāthathaorala? Athumli sāthathaorala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Nana athumli masāthatpaimara. Tukkhui kahai mili kathāda raighai eina kala malā eina sāthatpairakhala? Kashakazā ngaranmilu, chi zālaga athumwui akhavāli unguranu.”
Chieina ana zātkhān kahaka akha sālaga athumli phāchizata kala athumna phāshak phaza kahaiwui thili akhavāwuili shiunhaowa. Chiwui thili Syriawui mibingna Israelli rai sākhavai marāluithuwa.
Khaleilaga Syriawui awunga Ben-hadadna awui raimi kazipkhuilaga Samariali vāda akuinamhaowa.
Athumna kuinam kahaiwui vang Samariali zāt saklakhaowa, gadhā akhali lupāsā hangchishat kala theirāthei gram shākhanili lupāsā phangā eina yora.
Chitharan Israelwui awungana phākhoshong makānkhavā eina preinao akhana vaovai, “O awunga, ishāmei! ili khangachonmilu!”
Ana hānga, “
Khi maringkaphā leihaokhala?” Preiva̱ china ngahānkai, “Preiva̱ hina, ‘Nanaomayara hi aja shaihaosa kala akhama inao shainaosa.’ da hānga.
Chieina iwui nao hangshaihaira. Akhama kathā ina ali hānga, ‘Ini shaikhavai nawui nao milu’ ji; kha awui naova thumhaowa.”
Preiva̱wui tui chi kashā eina awungana awui kachon serkhāka—chitharan ana phākho chi makānzatsai kala mibingna yangva kaja aphasāli bora ngavaisai—
kala ana hānga, “Shaphatwui naomayara Elishawui kui aja ayartuitungli leisāra jiakha Varena chili lāngmeida ili sāranu.”

Elishana awui shimli pamsai, kala khararnaobingla ali ngasopamsai. Chitharan awungana mi akha chihovai; kha mipā chi marāshungranglakha Elishana khararnaobing chili hānga, “Miyuma hina ikui rangkhavai kathāda mi chihokhala da nathum theila? Yanglu, paome chi kharā tharan khāmong shungnamhaolu. Awui akhavāwui pheikhon awui thili shurkazat maningmala?”
Ana athumli hāngmahungda leilakha awungana rāhānga, “Kachotkachāng hi
Kha Elishana hānga, “
Awungana pāngli shaikapama raimi kathāna china Varewui mi chili hānga, “
Chitharan phārrei kakazā mi mati ngavei zangkhavaili leisai; kala athum akha eina akha, “Khisāda mathiranglakha eina tangda hili pamrakhala? da hāngngaroka.

Ithumna keinungli zangsa jilala chili zāt kasak lei; kala chili ithum thipapamra; kala ithum hili pamlala thipapamra. Chiwui vanga Syriabingwui rāmrahshong vausa, athumna mizaakha kharing samphangra, sāthatakha thihaira.”
Chieina athumna zingyinlam Syria mibingwui rāmrahli vākhavai zatuwa; kha yanglu, athumna rāmrah vākashung tharan khipākha maleisāthuwa.
Kaja siguigarikhon, sigui kazatkhon, raimi kachungkha kharāwui akhon thāda
Chieina athumna kachonshimla, siguila, gadhāla, rāmrahli khalei saikora nothāhailaga mathikhangai eina zingyinlam yāmserhaowa.

Phārrei kakazā athum china rāmrah ngalemli vākazang tharan athumna rāmrah akhali azangda azākhui kala amangkhui; kala lupāsā, sinā kala kashankachonla angaponkhuilaga ungthumhaowa. Chiwui thili latvāluilaga rāmrah khangatei akhali apongkhuilaga chila ungthumluihaowa.

Chiwui thili athum akha eina akha hāngngaroka, “Ithumna kasā hi mamashungthura. Aja hi ringkaphā chānpao samkaphangwui zimikshona; ithumna kasaikha pamda kazing kathang eina tangda ngaraipamakha ithumwuitungli tandi tāhaora; chiwui vang eina ralu ithumna awungashiwui shimkhurli ahānghaosa.”

Chieina athumna vāda keinungwui ngavei khamayonabingli ahānga, “Ithumna Syrianaobingwui rāmrahli vai, kala yanglu, chili khikha mathei mashāmana, sigui kala gadhā hokserhaida lei, kala kachonshimbingla changlangkha leidalei.”
Chieina ngavei khamayonbing china awungawui shimkhurli hokhuida ahānga.

Kala awungana ngayā ngakarthuida awui raobingli hānga, “Syrianaobingna ithumli makaphā ngarān kahai chi ina hāngga. Ithum thaidalei kaji athumna theihaoda rāmrahwui eina ayarli ayāmngathumda, ‘Athumna keinungwui eina shokkhangapon tharan, kharing eina tukkhuida keinungli zangnaora’ da phaning kahaina.”
Chieina awui raimi akhana hānga, “Ishiwuili taikahai sigui phangā khuiphunglaga ayang khavai mi chihoyangsa; ashimānhailala khikha maleimana, hili pamlala saikora thitkha sāphalungra.”
Chieina athumna sigui katonga khani khuida, “Ayangkhuilu” da awungana anili Syriawui shipaibingli shurvā ngasaka.

Chieina athumna Jordan eina tangda shurvai, kala yanglu, Syrianaobingna katotsisi yāmkazatli makhuiphāmada horkahai kashankachonla khutlaila apam kachida tātunghaisakapa. Kala paomebing china latungda awungali unghānga.
Chieina mibingna Syria mibingwui rāmrah angapona. Chiwui vang
Awungana pāngli shaikapama raikhoka chili ngavei mayon khavai kasohairasai; kala awungana ali vākhayang tharan Varewui mi china hāngkahai thāda, ngaveili leilakha yaruina ali naithathairasai.
Kaja, “Akhama hitharan, Samariawui ngaveili nāpai kg. tharukli lupā akha kala mā khamathā kg. khanili lupā akha eina yorra.” da awungali Varewui mi china kahāng tharan,
raithāna china, “
Hāngkahai tākam eina ngavei pamli mina naikazamda thihaowa.
Chitharan Elishana nao ringung ngasak kahai ava̱va̱ chili hānghaisai, “Thuilu, nashi shimkhurna vākapai apam akhali thuihaolu, kaja apam hili kum shini chāmrei rākhavai
Chieina Varewui mi china kahāng athishurda preiva̱ china ashi shimkhurli ngasoda Philistinewui ramli kum shini apama.
Kum shiniwui thili Philistinewui eina latkhaung tharan, preiva̱ china, awui shimlui chi hanmilui khavai awungali vāpoi.
Atam chili awungana Varewui mipāwui rao Gehazili chan ngazekta, “Elishana sākahai kahaka ot saikora ili hānglu.” da ngahānsai.

Elishana kathili ringkhangasakwui tui ana awungali hāngmahungda leilakha, yanglu, anaomayara ringung ngasak kahai preiva̱ china awui shim hanmi khavai awungali pokida rāchamrāsai. Kala Gehazina hānga, “Amei, O awunga, Elishana ringung khangasaka naomayara, kala ava̱va̱ chi hina.”

Awungana khangahān tharan preiva̱ china hāngsera. Chieina awungana otva̱ akhali kasoda hānga, “Preiva̱ hiwui shim kala ngalei saikora, kala ashi thuikahaiwui eina thuilaga arui rāshungda ngalei chiwui eina samkaphang heiun hanmiserhaolu.”
Elishana Damascusli khavā atamli, Syriawui awunga Ben-hadadli kazāsai; kala “Varewui mi chi rāhaira.” da kahāng eina,
awungana Hazaelli hānga, “Mikhavai ot akha khuiphunglaga Varewui mi chili, kakazā hiwui eina ina kharai masamphangrakhala? da Varewui mipā chiwui eina

Chieina Hazaelna ali asamphang khavai Damascusli samkaphang otyur saikora ut hangmatiphun khuivai. Kala ana vāda awui mangāli anganingda hānga, “Nanaomayara, Syriawui awunga Ben-hadadna, ‘Kakazā hiwui eina I kharai masamphangrakhala?’ da angahān khavai ili nawuili kashirātna.”
Elishana ali hānga, “Ungulu kala ali hānglu, ‘Na railakra’; kha a thiphalungra da
Kala ana mavaishiranglakha eina tangda ali mik yanggaziya. Kala Varewui mi china chapa.
Hazaelna hānga, “Ishameina khisāda kachapkhala?”

Ana ngahānkai, “Khikhalajila nana Israel mibingli makaphā ot sāki kaji chi ina thei: nana athumwui raipan sa̱tāmihaora, yaronnaobing raighai eina yaitupthathaora, angangnaosanlila ngapothatra kala nao khavaibinglila awuk rāmphutmira.”
Chieina Hazaelna hānga, “Narao iya fa kathāna, chiyākha hakkhamahā ot ina kathāda sāshaprakhala?”
Elishana ngahānkai, “Na Syriawui awunga sāra da
Chieina ana Elishawui eina thuihaowa, kala akhavāna, “Elishana khi hāngkhala?” da ngahāna. Ana hānga, “Na makahatlakla raira da hānga.”
Kha akhama kathā ana fakham khavai kachon akha tara̱li rurkhuilaga, a mathiranglakha eina tangda amaili farormi. Kala Hazaelna awunga sāhaowa.
Ahabwui nao, Israelwui awunga Joramna mungda kaphangā kum, Jehoshaphatwui nao, awunga Jehoramna Judahli mungphoka.
Ana mungkaphok atamli a kum thumrāda khani kāshunghairasai kala Jerusalemli ana kum chishat munga.
Israelwui awungabingna kasā thāda, kala Ahabwui shimkhurna kasā thāda anala sai; kaja Ahabwui naongalāva̱ chi apreiva̱na. Kala
Chithālala, awui rao Davidwui mangā eina Judah shimānchao khavai masāmana, kaja a eina awui naomayarabingli thaomei akha katang mavaila mira da ngashithaisai.
Awui thotli Edomna Judahli rai sai, kala athum khalattawui vang awunga akha phāsanghaowa.

Chieina Joramna awui siguigari khuiphungserlaga Zairli vai kala ngayāshong a eina awui siguigari kathānbingli ngasoda, athumli kuinamda leikasā Edomnaobingli angarara; kha awui raimibing shimli yāmungserhaowa.
Chiwui vang eina Edomna Judahli aja eina tangda ngararching kajina. Libnahnala atam chichangli rai sai.
Joramwui kasā khavā kala ana kasāsā Judah awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Joram thihaida avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Ahaziahna awui mahut thuishina.
Ahabwui nao, Israelwui awunga, Joramna mungda tharāda kakhane kum, Jehoramwui nao Ahaziahna Judahli mungphoka,
Ahaziahna mungkaphok atamli kum maga̱da khani kāshunghairasai kala Jerusalemli kumkha munga. Ava̱va̱li Athaliah hoi; Israelwui awunga Omriwui ara̱na.
Ala Ahabwui shimkhurna kazat thāda
Ana Ahabwui nao Joramli ngasoda Syriawui awunga Hazaelli rai ngarar khavai Ramoth-gileadli vai, kala Joramli khamā za̱haowa.

Ramahli Syriawui awunga Hazaelli ngararlaga khamā za̱mihaoda khamā ngafa khavai Awunga Joramna Jezreelli latunga. Kala Judahwui awunga Jehoramwui nao Ahaziahna Ahabwui nao Joramli kakazā ayang khavai Jezreelli tai.
Kala nana vākashung eina, Nimshiwui ara̱, kaja Jehoshaphatwui naomayara Jehuli phākhuilu, ngasotnaobingwui eina hokhuilaga shimlungli thānzanglu.
Kala thaokhong chi khuida akuili heirorda hānglu, ‘
Chieina marān yaronnao china Ramoth-gileadli vai.
Vākashung tharan yanglu, rai kathānabing chan ngazeksai; kala ana, “O raimi kathāna, ina nali hāngkhavai akha leili” da hānga. Jehuna, “Kachipālikhala?” da ngahāna.
Ana, “O raimi kathāna nalina.” da hānga.
Chieina ana ngakarthuida shimlungli zanga; kala yaronnao china akuitungli thao heirorda ali hānga, “Israelwui
Nawui akhavā Ahab shimkhurli nana yaitāra, kaja iwui rao marānbingli kala
Kaja Ahabwui shimkhur tongda mutngasakra; Israelli khalei Ahabwui mayarnaobing, raobingla, khān khaleibingla mataila muthaora.
Kala Ahabwui shimkhur, Nebatwui nao Jeroboamwui shimkhur thāda kala Ahijahwui nao Baashawui shimkhurli kasā thāda sāmira.
Kala Jezreel ngaleili Jezebelli fana shaira kala ali khipānakha machifamara.’” Chiwui thili ana khāmong shoshoklaga yāmhaowa.
Jehuna awui akhavāwui raimibingwuili kashok eina athumna, “Khikha mathamala? Kapā chi hili khi rākasākhala?” da ngahāna. Ana hānga, “Nathumna ali thei, kala awui tuila shāhaira.”
Athumna, “Matheimana, ithumlila hānglu.” da ngahāna. Ana hānga, “Ana ili hithāda hānga, ‘
Chieina athumna katotsisi kachichāwui kachon raikhuilaga chonkhavai tungli hammi kala talla̱ khonglaga, “Jehu awungana” da vaosera.
Chithāda sāda Jehoshaphatwui nao, kaja Nimshiwui ara̱ Jehuna Joramli mithit khalen sai. (Chitharan Joramna Israel saikorali thānda Syriawui awunga Hazaelli ngarar khavai Ramoth-gileadli leisai;

kha Syriawui awunga Hazaelli khangarar tharan khamā za̱kahaiwui vang awunga Joramna khamā ngafa khavai Jezreelli hanunghairasai). Chieina Jehuna hānga, “Nathumna iwui thāda phaninga jiakha keinung hiwui eina Jezreelli khipākha pao vāhāng khavai mathuiaranu.”
Chiwui thili Jehuna awui siguigari tonglaga Jezreelli vai, kaja Joram chili pisai. Judahwui awunga Ahaziahla Joramli samphang khavai chili tāhairasai.

Chitharan Jezreelwui raikānshim tungli shantri nganingkasāpa china Jehulong rākharā chi kathei eina, “Ina raimi rārāda khalei thei.” da hānga. Joramna hānga, “Sigui katonga raimi akha angarok ngasaklaga ‘Pao khamathāla?’ da angahānkhui ngasaklu.”

Chieina sigui tonglaga mi akhana, “Awungana kahāngna, ‘Pao khamathāla?’” Jehuna, “Chingri kahai pao chi na khisarakhala? Ngareikhuida iwui thi shurlu.” da hānga. Kala shantripa china hānga, “Paome chi athumli asamphanghaira, kha malatungmana.”
Chieina ana kakhane sigui katonga mi akha chiholuida, “Awungana, ‘Chingri kahai paola?’ da ngahāna”. Jehuna, “Chingri kahai pao chi na khi savairakhala? Ngareikhuida iwui thili shurlu” da hānga.
Shantri china hānglui, “Ala athumli asamphanghaira, kha a malatungluimana. Sigui kathao chi Nimshiwui nao Jehuwui kathao thāli; kaja a yāng eina thaozatta lei.”

Joramna, “Khangarān sālu” da hānga. Athumna awui siguigari khangarān sāmi. Chieina Israelwui awunga Joram eina Judahwui awunga Ahaziahna kachichāwui siguigari tongriplaga Jehuli angaroka, kala Jezreelpa Nabothwui luipamli anina Jehuli asamphanga.
Joramna Jehuli kathei eina, “Jehu, pao khamathāla?” da hānga. Ana ngahānkai, “Nava̱ Jezebelwui mangāli khayor otsak eina laivākashon hiyākha ngayaoda leilakha khi chingri kahai leirakhala?”
Chieina Joramna sigui ngareikhuilaga, “Khayomna, O Ahaziah!” da hānglaga yāmhaowa.
Jehuna awui malā yāng eina hunlaga kakāp eina Joramwui yartui khani ngachaili kāpsanghaida malāthing chi amalungli zanghaowa, kala awui siguigari lungli yuisanghaowa.
Jehuna awui ngachonme Bidkarli hānga, “Ali khuilaga Jezreelwui Nabothshi luili ahorhaolu, kaja avāva̱ Ahabli ngasoda inina uishong yāshong tongzatlakha
‘Aya ina Naboth kala anaomayarawui ashee kathei chiwui vang— da

Judahwui awunga Ahaziahna chi kathei tharan Beth-hagganshong yāmvāhaowa. Kala Jehuna ali kharomvāda “Alila kāplu,” da hānga; chieina Ibleam ngalemli khalei Gurwui shongshan akakā chili athumna kāphaowa. Kala ana Megiddoli yāmvālaga chili athihaowa.
Awui raobingna siguigari eina Jerusalemli khuiunglaga avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa.
Ahabwui nao Joramna mungda kum tharāda akha kākashung eina Ahaziahna Judahli mungphoka.
Jehuna Jezreelli khavā tharan Jezebelna shāhaoda mikphungli kajal neokhui, kui sekkazaklaga charfawui eina yangshoka.
Jehuna ngaveili akazang tharan sha̱naopava̱na hānga, “Nawui akhavāli shaokathata Zimri, hi chingri kahaila?”
Ana charfali yangkāda hānga, “Iwui mijang khipālongkhala? Khipa leili?” Ahonga khani kathum yangshokra sai.
“Ali hortāhaolu” da Jehuna hānga. Chieina athumna ali hortāhaowa; kala awui ashee phākholila, siguilila chakrorserhaowa, kala awuitungli kānaikazama.
Chiwui thili ana alungli zangda phazākhuilaga hānga, “Ara khonshi kahai preiva̱ hili chifahaolu, kaja ala awungawui naongalāva̱na.”
Kha athumna achifahaokida kashok tharan akuira̱, phei kala pāngmayā maningla aphasā akhala maleisāthuwa.
Athumna hanungda ungkahāng tharan ana hānga, “Hi
kala Jezebelwui angun chi Jezreelwui ngaleili pai thāhaida hi Jezebelna da khipānakha mahāngrarmara.’”
Ahabwui naomayara hangshini Samariali leisai. Chieina Samariawui khamungabing, ararbing kala Ahabwui naomayarabingli khamayonabingli Jehuna chithi chiphunda hānga,
“Iwui chithi hi nathumli rāshungkhaleoda, yanglu, nathumwui akhavāwui naomayarabing nathumli ngasopamda lei kala chili siguila, siguigarila, khutlaila kala raipan sakā kahai keinungla leiserda lei,
akhavāwui anaomayarawui ngachaili phāmeikap kaje kala kāshungmeikap kaje hākhuida avāva̱wui wungpamkhong tungli chipamlu, kala nathumwui akhavāwui shimkhurwui vang rai ngararlu.”
Kha athum ngacheekhailakhaoda hānga, “Yanglu, awunga khanina ali mayuithukakha kathāda ithumna khi sāthukrakhala?”

Chiwui vang eina konung akhavāla, keinung kashinala, ararbingla kala khamayonabingla khokkha sāda Jehuli pao chihovāda hānga, “Ithum nawui raosera, nana sālu kaji saikora ithumna sāra. Ithum khipālikha awunga khangatei maphāsangmara, nawui phāra kaji chi sālu.”

Chieina ana chithi kakhane chihoda hithāda hānga, “Nathum iwui mijang zangra jiakha kala iwui kahāng nganāga jiakha, nashi akhavāwui naomayarabingwui kui akhama hitharan hili khuirāserlu.” Awungawui naomayara, athum hangshini chi keinungwui khangam-khareibingna nganaosai.
Chieina athumli chithi chi rākashung tharan awungawui naomayara, athum hangshini chili kui rangkhuilaga sopkai eina Jezreelli chiphunvai.
Paomena, “Awungawui naomayarabingwui akui khuirāhaira,” da ali kahāng tharan, ana “Kazing mathangranglakha eina tangda ngavei zangkhavaili athum chi akhum khani eina haisalu.” da kasoi.
Ngathorshong ana shoklaga mibingli hānga, “Nathumwui khayon maleimana. Iwui akhavāli mamayāmada ngathumda mithit khalen sāda shaokathata chi ina; kha hibingli khipāna sākathat?
na Ahabshi shimkhurwui pongli hāngkahai tuikhurkha eina tangda mangacheilakmara kaji hi theilu; kaja awui rao Elijahli hāng khangasak chi ungshung khangasakna.”
Jezreelli Ahabwui shimkhur awui khangam-khareibing, awui ngasotnaobing, pāngmonbing, akha eina tangda mataila saikora sāthatserhaowa.
Chiwui thili ana Samariali vai. Shongfali zatlakha, Beth-eked Seihomphungli vākashung tharan,
Judah awunga Ahaziahwui athei-asābingli samphangda ana hānga, “Nathum khipālongkhala?” Athumna ngahānkai, “Ahaziahwui theisāna, wungnaobingli kala awungva̱wui naomayarabingli asamphangsida kazatna.”
Ana hānga, “Athumli kharing eina tukkhuilu.” Chieina athumna kharing eina tukkhuilaga Beth-ekedwui leikhur akhawui alungli mi hangmati chi akhala matailakla sāthatserhaowa.

Ana apam chiwui eina kānkathui tharan Rechabwui nao Jehonadab ali rangarokrārāsai, kala shālam kasā eina, ali hānga, “Ina nali shitkasang thāda nanala ili shitsangla?” Jehonadabna, “Mha.” da ngahānkai. Jehuna hānga, “Chithakha, napāng ngarānkālu.” Ana pāng ngarānkakā eina Jehuna yonkhuilaga awui siguigarili kātong ngasaka.
Kala ana hānga, “Ili ngasovālu, kala
Ana Samariali vākashung chitharan
Chiwui thili Jehuna mi saikora kazipkhuida hānga, “Ahabna Baalli khokharum khikha maningmana; kha Jehu ina thukmeikhārda khorumra.

Chiwui vang eina ara Baalwui marānbing, ali khokharumbing kala pāngmonbing saikora iwuili horāserlu; khipākha machakshokla, kaja Baalli ina hakkhamahā pha̱kaphayā sāra; makharāpa chi thira.” Kha Jehuna Baalli khokharumabingli shaothat khavai awor kasāna.
Kala Jehuna kasoda hānga, “Baalwui vang phanee khavai vaohaolu.” Chieina athumna vaohaowa.
Kala Jehuna Israel apam apeichaoda saikorali chihovai; kala Baalli khokharuma mi saikora rāsera, makharā akhala maleimana. Athumna Baalwui shimli zangda mangāshongla, khanukshongla pemhaowa.
Kashankachon kasinga chili hānga, “Baalli khokharumabingwui sāri athumli ngavaimiserlu.” Chieina ana athumwui vang sāri chi khuishokmi.
Chiwui thili Jehuna Rechabwui naomayara Jehonadabli ngasoda Baalwui shimli zanga, kala Jehuna khokharumabingli hānga, “Hiwui alungli Baalli khokharuma mi maningla

Rikkatā kachigat kala pha̱phayā khavai zanga. Ayarli Jehuna mi hangchishat khangarān sāhailaga hānga, “Nathumwui pāngli ina horsangmi kahai athumwui ngachaili nathum kachikathāna yāmshok ngasakhaiakha chipāwui manglā shimānra.”

Jehuna rikkatā hanphut kala pha̱kaphayā kachigat kupkhaleoda raimibing kala otva̱bingli hānga, “Zangsāthatserhaolu, akha eina tangda machakshokaranu.” Athumna sāthatser kahaiwui thili raimibing kala otva̱bing china Baalshimwui shim zangkhameiya kāli zanga,
kala Baalwui lungshom chi khuishokta riktāmihaowa.
Lungshomla, shimla pheimiserhaida aja eina tangda paishim sādalei.
Chithāda Jehuna Israelwui eina Baal sāshimitmihaowa.
Kha Jehuna Nebadwui nao Jeroboamna Bethel eina Danli sināwui seinaoli khokharum kala Israelnaobingli khorum khangasak chiwui moreiwui eina mai mangareiungmana.
na Jehuli hānga, “Iwui mikyanli nana khamashung ot kasāwui vang kala iwui kaphaning athishurda nana Ahabwui shimkhurli sākhamiwui vang, nanaomayarabing thot mati eina tangda Israelwui awunga sāra.”
Kha Israelwui
Atam chitharan
Jordan eina thuilaga zingshoshong, Gileadwui ngalei katonga Gad, Reuben, Manasseh, Aroer eina Arnon tampāk ngalemli khalei, chiya Gilead eina Bashan katongana.
Jehuwui otsak khangatatei kala ana sākahai saikora kala awui pangshap saikora Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Jehu thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Samariali chifahaowa. Kala anaomayara Jehoahazna awui mahut thuishina.
Samaria ngaleili Jehuna Israelli khamung chi kum maga̱da chishatna.

Kha awunga Joramwui naongalāva̱, Ahaziahwui azara Jehoshebana, Ahaziahwui naomayara Joashli, shaothathaoki kaji awungawui naomayarabingwui eina ngathumda khuilaga awui naokakhuiva̱ ani khanili petkā akhawui alungli thumhaowa. Hithāda Athaliahwui eina thumhaida ali masāthatthuwa;
kala Athaliahna ngalei chili munglakha nao china
Kha kashine kum pāngmon Jehoiadana Cariwui raithānabing kala khamayon raimibingli hokhuida
Kala athumli kasoda hānga, “Nathumna sāki kaji ot chi hina: khum kathumwui khumkha sabbaththang otram khangatha̱li zangda awungawui shim mayonki kajibing
(sharuk kathumwui akhana Surwui ngaveili, akhapāna ngavei khamayonabingwui khanukli khalei ngaveili) da konung chi mayonra;
kala sabbathwui vang otram ngatha̱ khavai, awungali shantri sākhavai kharābing chiwui kānglup khanina,
kachichāwui khutlai singlaga awungali kuinamra kala nathumna chili kharā kharei-kateo mayangla sāthat phalungra. Awungana unglala ungriplu, vālala variplu.”
Pāngmon Jehoiadana kakaso athishurda raithānabing china sai; Sabbathwui otram ngatha̱khui kahaibingli shinki kajibinglila athumna pāngmon Jehoiadawuili thanvāsera.
Kala
kala azingshong eina thuilaga atungshong eina tangda, shimla, hanphutpamla kuimareida raimibingna khutlai singriplaga nganingphina.
Chiwui thili ana awungawui nao chi khuishoklaga wungnao kuihon ngahonmida nao chiwui pongli hāngmi. Chieina athumna thao neomida awunga sanghaowa; kala pāng kapheda, “Awunga okpeimeiranu!” da hānga.
Raimibingwui kala mibingwui akhon akhak chi Athaliahna kashā tharan, khi kasākhala da ana

ana akhayang tharan, khangachā athishurda awungana pākra̱ ngalemli nganingda, raithānabing kala talla̱ kakhongbing china awunga ngalemli leisāsera; kala ngalei chiwui mibingna mathānda talla̱ khongsai. Athaliahna awui kachon serkhakta, “Yomhaira, yomhaira!” da vaoshoka.
Chieina raimibingli yangmi khavai raithānabingli pāngmon Jehoiadana kasoda hānga, “Ali raimibingwui ngachai eina khuishoklu, kala kachikathāna ali shurakha raighai eina sāthatlu.” Kaja, “
Chieina athumna ali tukkhuilaga siguishim zangkhavai eina awungashim ngarui khavai chili asāthathaowa.
Chiwui thili Jehoiadana, athum
Kala mi saikora vālaga Baalwui shim ashaokhaitai; hanphutpamla, meoma̱la shaokathānkhaimiserhaowa kala Baalwui pāngmon Mattanlila hanphut mangāli shaothathaowa. Kala pāngmonna
Chiwui thili raithānabing, Carinaobing, shantribing kala ngalei chiwui mi saikora hokhuida awungali
Chithāda sāda mi saikorana mathāna; kala Athalilahli awungawui shimli sāthat kahaiwui thili keinung chi chingrihaowa.
Jehuna mungda kashine kum Jehoashna mungphoka kala Jerusalemli kum hangmati munga. Ava̱va̱li Zibiah hoi, Beer-shebawui einana.
Jehoashna awui mirin peida
Chithalala kajujuipambing chi makhuithuimihaimana; chiwui vang mibingna pha̱kaphayā nganamkaphā thao rikkatā ot sāchinga.
pāngmon kachiva̱na kachichāwui theikhamasuibingwui eina khuirāda shim chipho kapaibing athumli chiphoranu.”
Kha awunga Jehoashna mungda maga̱da kakathuma kum eina tangda pāngmonbingna shim chi machipholakthuwa.

Chiwui vang awunga Jehoashna pāngmon Jehoiadalila kala pāngmon khangateibinglila hokhuida hānga, “Khisāda nathum shim chi machiphothukhala? Chiwui vang eina ara theikhamasuibingwui eina pheisā makhuiluialu, kha shim chipho khavai mihaolu.”
Pāngmonbingna miwui eina pheisā makhuimara, shimla machiphomara da mayāhaowa.
Jehoiada pāngmonna oko akha khuilaga ashamli akhurnao saphuthai; kala
Kala okolungli pheisā chunghairada kathei tharan awungawui kapime eina pāngmon kharei china kāshānkhuida
Ngarak kahai lupā chi
ngalung kashaobing, ngalung kaharbing kala
Kha
kaja
Kala ot kasābingli mikhavai pheisā kasingbingli pheisā kachisinwui pongli khipānakha makazikazāmana, kaja athum ning tharlak eina sai.
Khayonchigatwui pheisā eina suihamchigatwui pheisā
Judahwui awunga Jehoashna, avāva̱ ngarā Judahwui awungabing, Jehoshaphat, Joram kala Ahaziah athumna sāmiman sāda tharchigat kahai lemmet kala akhalattawui sāmiman kachigat, chili lāngda
Joashwui kasā khavā ana kasāsā saikora, Judah awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Awui raobingna ngathumda ngasankhuilaga, Sillashong tākhavai shongfali khalei Millowui shimli Joashli sāthathaowa.
Ali sākathatbing chi, awui rao Shimeathwui nao Jozacar eina Shomerwui nao Jehozabadna. Alila avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Amaziahna awui mahut thuishina.
Ahaziahwui naomayara, Judahwui awunga Joashna mungda maga̱da kakathuma kum, Samariali Jehuwui nao Jehoahazna kum tharāda shini Israelli thuimunga.
Ana
Chiwui vang
Chiwui thili Jehoahazna
(Chiwui vang Israelli huikhame akha mida Syria mibingwui eina yāmshokta, khare kachāngwui thāda Israelnaobingna chingri eina okthuilui.
Chithalala athumna Jeroboamwui morei kasā thāda kala Israelli morei sākhangasak chiwui eina athumna mangareithuimana, kha chiwui apongli zata; kala Samariali Asherah chila leingasakpapama.)
Kaja Jehoahazwuili sigui katong raimi hangphangā, siguigari tharā kala phei raimi thingtharāli lāngda maleisāmana; kaja Syriawui awungana sākazammiserhaida lanpumli khalei chifa thāda sāmihaowa.
Jehoahazwui kasā khavā ana kasāsā saikora kala awui pangshap saikora chi Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Jehoahaz thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Samariali chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Jehoashna awui mahut thuishina.
Judahwui awunga Joashna mungda thumrāda kashine kum Samariali Jehoashna Israelli mungphoka; kala kum tharāda tharuk munga.
Ala
Jehoashwui kasā khavā ana kasāsā khangatatei, awui pangshap eina Judahwui awunga Amaziahli khangarar saikora chi Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchānli makapiserhaimala?
Jehoash thikahai eina anaomayara Jeroboamna awui mahut wungpamkhongli pama; kala Israel awungabingli ngasoda Joash Samariali chifahaowa.
Elishana, “Malā kala malāthing khuilu” da kakaso eina ana malā kala malāthing khuisinga.
Kala Israelwui awungali, “Malā hunlu” da kahāng eina ana malā chi huna. Kala Elishana awui pāng awungawui pāngli para.
Ana hānga, zingshoshongwui charfa chi sholu: ana chi shoi. Chieina Elishana, “Kāplu!” da kasoi; kala ana kāpa. Ana hānga, “
Kala ana hānga, “Malāthingbing chi khuilu”; ana chi khui. Israel awungali, “Ngaleili chieina kāpsanglu”; da hānga; ana kāpkathumshilaga thāhaowa.
Chieina Varewui mi china malungvāthaoda hānga, “Kāpta phangā tharuk shisi kaje nana Syrianaobing mayumranglakha eina tangda samiki kajina, kha ara nana kathumshidamāng yuimara.”
Chithāda Elisha thihaowa kala athumna chifahaowa. Chitharan luira̱dung atamli Moabnaobingna rai rakaikai jisai.

Thangkha mi akha chifakida leilakha, yanglu, ngaponkazatbingli theida kathi angun chi Elishawui chikhurli horsanghaowa; kala angun chi Elishawui ara̱kuili zangsāza̱khaleoda ringunglaga thuinganinghaowa.
Chitharan Jehoahazwui thotli Syriawui awunga Hazaelna atam kachida Israelnaobingli rekhareklak eina sāsai.
Kha
Syriawui awunga Hazael thikahai eina anaomayara Ben-hadadna awui mahut thuishina.

Ana thuikaphung eina, avāva̱ Hazaelna rai ngararlaga Jehoash shavāva̱ Jehoahazwui eina ngapaithui kahai keinung saikora chi Jehoashna akhuiluishita. Jehoashna Ben-hadadli yui kathum shida Israel keinung saikora chi khuilui kajina.
Israelwui awunga, Joahazwui nao Joashna mungda kakhane kum, Judahwui awunga, Joashwui nao Amaziahna mungphoka.
Ana mungkaphok atamli kum maga̱da phangā kāshunghairasai. Kala ana Jerusalemli kum maga̱da chiko munga. Ava̱va̱ Jerusalemwui einana, aming Jeho-addin hoi.
Ana
Kha kajujuiwui apambing chi masākhaimihaithuda mibingna pha̱kaphayā ot kala nganamkaphā otyur riktāchinga.
Awui wungram ngazipshap kaji eina ana avāva̱, awungali sākathata raobingli sāthathaowa.
Kha shaokathatabingwui anaongarāli masāthatmana:

Chieina Israelwui awunga Jehoashna Judahwui awunga Amaziahli pao chihovai, “Lebanonli khalei ka̱shātrongna Lebanonli khalei cedarthingli ‘Nanao ngalāva̱ inaomayarawui preiva̱ sākhavai milu’ da hānga; kala Lebanonwui ramsā akha rākānda ka̱shāt chi naikachupmihaowa.
Nana Edomli yuihaowa da langso khaningli. Nawui tekhamatei chi shapa da phaninglaga kasaikha shimli pamlu; nala Judahla shimān khavai mili malungmavāt ngasakalu.”
Kha Amaziahna manganāsangmana. Chiwui vang Israelwui awunga Jehoashna vāsamphanga; kala Judahwui Beth-shemesh kaho apam chili ani khani ngasunga.
Israelna Judahli yuihaoda kachāyām eina shimli yāmungserhaowa.

Kala Israelwui awunga Jehoashna Judahwui awunga Jehoashwui nao Amaziahli tukkhuihaida Beth-shemeshwui eina Jerusalemli khuiunga; kala Ephraim ngavei eina thuilaga Achithek Ngavei vāshungda phākho khuining shāmati shaokhaimihaowa.
Kala
Jehoashwui kasākhavā, ana sāhaikasā, awui pangshap, kala Judah awunga Amaziahli khangararwui apong saikora Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Jehoash thikahai eina Israel wungnaobingwui ngachailli Samariali chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Jeroboamna awui mahut thuishina.
Amaziahwui otsak sākahai kateibing Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Athumna Jerusalemli ali sāthat khavai ngathumda kasāwui vang Lachishli yāmvāhaowa. Kha athumna ali kharomvālaga chili asāthathaowa.
Athumna awui angun chi sigui eina khuiunglaga Davidwui keinung Jerusalemli avāva̱ ngarāwui ngalemli chifahaowa.
Kala Judahwui mibingna avāva̱ Amaziahwui mahut kum tharāda tharuk khararra anaomayara Azariahli awunga sanga.
Avāva̱ thikahai eina ana Elath sakāluishitlaga Judahli hanmi.
Joashwui naomayara Judahwui awunga Amaziahna mungda tharāda kaphangā kum, Israelwui awunga Joashwui nao Jeroboamna Samariali mungphoka, kala kum hangmatida akha munga.
wui mikyanli makaphā ot chi sāda, Israelli morei sākhangasak, ana Nebatwui naomayara Jeroboamwui morei kasā saikora chiwui eina mangareithuimana.
Israelwui
Kaja Israelwui sipkasa marlak kahai chi
Kha Israel kaho hi okathuiwui eina shimān ngasakphalungra da

Jeroboamwui kasākhavā, ana kasāsā saikora, awui pangshap kala ana kathāda rai ngarar, kala Judahli leikasā Damascus eina Hamathli kathāda hankhuiluishit kaji saikora hi Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Jeroboam thikahai eina anaomayara Zechariahna awui mahut thuishina.
Israelwui awunga Jeroboamna mungda, maga̱da kaphangā kum, Amaziahwui nao Azariahna Judahwui awunga sāphoka.
Ana mungkaphok atamli kum tharāda tharuk kāshunghairasai, kala ana Jerusalemli kum hangphangāda khani munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Jecoliah hoi.
Avāva̱ Amaziahna kasāsāwui athishurda ana Varewui miktāli khamashung chi sai.
Chithalala kajujui apambing chi makhuithuimihaithuda mibingna pha̱kaphayā otla nganamkaphā thao rikkatāla kajujui apambing chili sāchinghaowa.
Ali
Azariahwui kasākhavā, kala ana kasā saikora Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Azariah thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāwui ngalem, Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Jothamna awui mahut thuishina.
Judahwui awunga Azariahna mungda thumrāda kachishata kum, Jeroboamwui nao Zechariahna Samariali Israelwui awunga sai, kala kachāng tharuk munga.
Avāva̱ ngarāna kasā thāda anala
Ibleamli leilakha Jabeshwui nao Shallumna makhamayāwui vang ngathumda mithit khalen sāda sāthathaowa, kala awui mahut ana awunga thuishina.
Zechariahwui kasā otsakbing chi, yanglu, Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
(Hi
Jabeshwui nao Shallumna mungkaphok atamli, Judahwui awunga Uzziahna Judahli mungda kum thumrāda chiko kāhairasai. Samariali Shallumna kachāng akha munga.
Chiwui thili Gadiwui naomayara Menahemna Tirzahwui eina Samariali vālaga Jabeshwui naomayara Shallumli sāthathaowa, kala ana mahut thuishinhaowa.
Shallumwui kasāsā otsakbing kala ana ngathumda yuishāt ot kasā chi, yanglu, Israelwui Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Atam chili Tirzah eina thuilaga Tappuah katonga, Menahemna yuiserhaowa, khikhalajila athumna ali mahamsangmara jihaoda ana athumli yuikhuilaga nao khavai sha̱nao saikora kaikhanini sāmihaowa.
Judahwui awunga Azariahna mungda thumrāda kachiko kum, Gadiwui nao Menahemna Israelli mungphoka, kala Samariali kum tharā mungsai.
wui mikyanli ana makaphā chi sai; Nebatwui nao, Israelli morei sākhangasaka Jeroboamwui morei saikorawui eina awui mirin peida mangareithuimana.
Assyriawui awunga Pulna ngalei chili rākaida; Menahemna awui wungpangshap kasing mayāmi khavai lupāsā kg. thing thumrāda mati kharit khuimi.
Kala Assryriawui awungali mikhavai pheisā chi Israelwui kashāngbing mi kachiva̱wui eina lupā hangphangārip ngashaikhui. Chiwui vang Assyriawui awunga chili mapamluila aramli unghaowa.
Menahemwui otsakbing kala ana kasā saikora Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Menahem thihaoda anaomayara Pekahiahna awui mahut thuishina.
Judahwui awunga Azariahna kum hangphangā kākashung atamli Menahemwui nao Pekahiahna Israelwui awunga sāda Samariali mungphoka; kala kum khani munga.
wui mikyanli ana makaphā ot sāda, Israelli morei sākhangasaka, Nebatwui nao Jeroboamna kasā chiwui eina mangareithuimana.
Awui raithāna Remaliahwui nao Pekahna Gileadwui mi hangphangāli ngasoda ngathumda mithit khalen sāda ali sāthathaowa, kala ana awui mahut thuishina.
Pekahiahwui otsakbing kala ana kasāsā saikora, yanglu, Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Judahwui awunga Azariahwui hangphangāda kakhane kum, Remaliahwui nao Pekahna Samariali Israelwui awunga sai, kala kum maga̱ munga.
wui mikyanli ana makaphā chi sai; kala Israelli morei sākhangasaka, Nebatwui nao Jeroboamna morei kasā chiwui eina mangareithuimana.

Israelli Pekahna munglakha Assyriawui awunga Tiglath-pileserna rāda Ijon, Abel-beth-maacah, Jan-oah, Kadesh, Hazor, Gilead kala Galilee, Naphtaliwui ngalei katonga yuikhuihaowa; kala mibingla Assyriali tukvāhaowa.
Chiwui thili Uzziahwui nao Jothamwui khamaga̱ kum Elahwui nao Hosheana Remaliahwui nao Pekahli ngathumda ngasankhuida sāthathaowa, kala awui mahut thuishina.
Pekahwui otsakbing kala ana kasāsā saikora yanglu, Israel Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Remaliahwui nao, Israelwui awunga Pekahna mungda kakhane kum, Judahwui awunga, Uzziahwui nao Jothamna mungphoka.
Awui zingkum maga̱da phangā kākashung tharan ana mungphoka kala kum tharāda tharuk Jerusalemli munga. Ava̱va̱li Jerusha hoi, Zadokwui naongalāva̱na.
Avāva̱ Uzziahna kasā athishurda anala
Chithālala kajujui apambing makhuishokmihaithuda, mibingna chili pha̱phayai kala nganamkaphā thao riktai.
Jothamwui otsakbing kala ana kasāsā saikora Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Chiwui atamli Judahli makhamayāwui vang Syriawui awunga Rezin eina Remaliahwui nao Pekahli
Jotham thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Ahazna awui mahut thuishina.
Remaliahwui nao Pekahna mungda tharāda kashine kum, Jothamwui nao Ahazna Judahli thuimunga.
Ana thuikhamung tharan kum maga̱ kāshunghairasai, kala kum tharāda tharuk Jerusalemli munga. Avāva̱ Davidna kasā thāda masāla,
Israelwui awunga khangateibingwui thishura. Israel mibingwui vang kasham kahaiya yurbingwui ningkakachai otsak chi anala sāda anaomayara eina tangda pha̱phayāda meili riktai.
Kajujui apambingli, kaphungtonli, kala khamatek thingrongwui azingzingli ana pha̱phayāda nganamkaphā thaola riktai.
Atam chitharan Edomwui awungana Elath hankhuihaida Judahwui mibing saikora Elathwui eina kashamserhaowa. Kashamhaida Edomwui mibingna Elathli rāsomda aja eina tangda khalei hina.

Chiwui vang Ahazna Assyriawui awunga Tiglath-pileserli pao chiphunda hānga, “Iya nawui raona kala nanaona. Ili ngararda khalei Syriawui awunga eina Israelwui awungawui pāng eina ili kharākankhuimilu.”
Ahazna
Assyriawui awungana mayāmida Damascusli akai, kala mi kachungkha Kirli tukvāhaowa, Rezinlila shaothathaowa.

Ahaz awungana Assyriawui awunga Tiglath-pileserli samphang khavai Damascusli khavā tharan chili leikasā hanphut chi thei. Uriah pāngmonli, hanphut chi tākam eina sākakhui ama̱nao akha Ahaz Awungana chihovai.
Kala Damascuswui eina awunga Ahazna kachiphun ama̱nao chi tākam eina Uriahna hanphut akha sākhui, kala awunga Ahaz malatungranglakha sākuphairasai.
Awungana Damascuswui eina latkhaung tharan ana hanphut chi ungyanga. Kala hanphut chiwui ngalemli vāda chili kai,
kala rikkatā kachigat, tharāzat kachigatla sai, ra̱shakchigatla sāda ningyatchigatwui ashee chi hanphutli yikrora,
Rida

Awunga Ahazna Uriah pāngmonli hithāda kasoi, “Kahaka hanphut hiwuitungli ngathorwui rikkatā kachigat, kala ngazin tharāzatchigat, kala awungawui rikkatāchigat, awui tharāzat kachigat, ngalei chiwui mibing saikorawui rikkatā kachigat, athumwui tharāzat kachigat, ra̱shakchigat; kala rikkatā kachigatwui ashee kala pha̱kaphayā saikorawui ashee chi hili yikrorserlu; kha pithraiwui hanphut hiya awungawui ngahānkhui khavai sāra.”
Awunga Ahazna kakaso chi makailakla Uriah pāngmonna sai.
Kala Assyriawui awungawui vang eina, sabbaththang awungana zangkhavai dolanlungli sākahai kala khāmong shokshungda sākahai shongfanao chila khuishokhaowa.
Ahazwui otsakbing saikora Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Ahaz thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Hezekiahna awui mahut thuishinhaowa.
Judahwui awunga Ahazna mungda khamaga̱ kum, Elahwui nao Hosheana Israelwui awunga sāda Samariali mungphoka, kala kum chiko munga.
wui mikyanli makaphā chi ana sai, chithālala awui mangāli leikasā Israel awungabing mathāmana.
Assyriawui awunga Shalmaneserna ali rai rātāda shai zanga kala ali shai michinga.

Kha Hosheana yankasai chi Assyriawui awungana theihaowa, kaja Egyptwui awunga Soli khangathum paome chihovāda Assyriawui awungali kumkachidawui shai mamithuwa. Chiwui vang Assyriawui awungana ali tukkhuida phātop sanghaowa.
Chiwui thili Assyriawui awungana ngalei saikorali rai rātāda Samariali kum kathum kuinampama.
Hosheana mungda kachiko kum, Assyriawui awungana Samaria khuihaowa, kala Israelwui mibingli tukungserhaida athumli Halahli, Gozanwui kongphei Haborli, Medenaobingwui keinung keinungli chipamvāhaowa.

kaphungtonli, matekchim kahai thingphei kachiva̱li lungshomla kala Asherimla sakai;
kala athumwui mangāli
na meoma̱li, “Nathumna chili makhorumpaimana” da hāngkahai chili athumna khoruma.
Chithālala, “Iwui rao marānbingli chihoda navā ngarāli ina kaso kahai iwui ain saikora chiwui athishurda makaphāwui eina mai ngareiunglaga iwui ningkhami kala shiyan-chikan mayonlu” da
Kha athumwui
Awui shiyan-chikan, kala avāva̱ ngarāli tuingashit kasā kala athumli hāngkhamathin chili ningkachaihaowa. Makhamashunga meoma̱wui thi shurda athum mamashungthuwa, athumwui thāda sāshara da
Athumna
Chigat khavai athumna naongarā, sha̱naola mayarnaola riktai; khanongla sai, laivāla sai, kala
Chiwui vang
Judahnala athumwui
Chieina
Ana Davidwui shimkhur eina Israelli khuithui kahai chitharan athumna Nebatwui nao Jerobaomli awunga sāngasaka. Kala
Jeroboamna morei kasā saikora chili Israelwui mibingnala sai.
Awui rao marānbingli hāngmi khangasak athishurda

Assyriawui awungana Israel naobingwui mahutli Babylon, Cuthah, Avva, Hamath kala Sepharvaimwui eina mi khuirālaga Samariawui keinungbingli chipama; Samaria chi athumwui ngasāthuihaoda keinung keinungbingli pānngasaka.
Athumna chili pānphokkhareli
“Nana Samariali mi khuiphungda kachipambingna apam chiwui varewui ain matheimana; chiwui vang ana kazingkha̱bing chihorāda, yanglu, athumli makeithathaira” kaji pao Assyriawui awungali hānga.
Chieina Assyriawui awungana, “Apam chiwui eina khuithui kahai pāngmon akha chili chihovālu, kala ana chili pamda ngalei chiwui varewui ain chi tamchithei ngasaklu.” da kasoi.
Chiwui vang Samariawui eina khuithui kahai pāngmon akha vāda Bethelli achipama, kala
Kha chithālala yur kachiva̱na kachichā shiwui kameo sākhuilaga kachichā yurna pamkhavaipamli Samariawui mibingna sāhaikasā kajujui apamwui kameoshimbingli haihai;
Babylonwui mibingna Succoth-benoth sākhui, Cuthwui mibingna Nergal, Hamathwui mibingna Ashima,
Avviwui mibingna Nibhaz eina Tartak sākhui; kala Sepharnaobingna naongarāli Sepharvaimwui vare Adrammelech eina Anammelechli meili riktai.

Chithālala athumna manganāsangla kharewui kasā khavā tākam eina sai.

Ana mungkaphok tharan kum maga̱da phangā kashunghairasai, kala Jerusalemli kum maga̱da chiko munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Abi hoi, Zechariahwui naongalāva̱na.
Avāva̱ Davidwui kasā thāda anala

Ana kajujui apambingli sākahai kameopam sākazammihailaga lungkhorla pheimihaowa, tarungla sātekmiserhaowa. Mosesna sākakhui pithraiwui phara̱ chila akha̱ sāmihaowa, kaja atam chitharan eina tangda Israelnaobingna chili nganamkaphā thao riktāsai; chili Nehushtan da hoi.
Israelwui
Kaja ana
na ali ngasomida khavā apam kachiva̱li mataisangchinga. Ana Assyriawui awungalila mashurmara da rai sai.
Philistinewui mibingli raikān kapambingwui dolan eina thuida raipan sākahai keinung vāshungda yuihaida Gaza kala chiwui leiret vāshunga.
Awunga Hezekiahwui khamate kum kaja Elahwui nao, Israelwui awunga Hosheawui kashine kum chi Assyriawui awunga Shalmaneserna rāda Samariali kuinamhaida
kakathuma kumwui akuplamshong khuichanghaowa. Hezekiahwui katharuka kum kaja Israel awunga Hosheawui kachiko kum chi Samaria khuithui kahaina.
Assyriawui awungana Israelnaobing Assyriali tukunghaida Halahli, Gozan kongphei Haborli, kala Medebingwui keinungli chipama,
kaja athumwui

Judahwui awunga Hezekiahna Assyriawui awungana Lachishli leilakha pao chiphunda hānga, “Ina yonhaira, hiwui eina kathuimihaolu kala nana kapopo chi mira.” Assyriawui awungana lupāsā kg. thingthara kala sinā kg. thingkha milu jihaowa.
Hezekiahna
Chitharan

Kala Assyriawui awungana Tartan, Rabsaris kala Rabshakeh kaji akhavā kathum hili ngasoda raimi kachungkha Lachishwui eina Jerusalemli awunga Hezekiahwuili chihovai. Athumna Jerusalemli vākashung tharan ato ra̱khongwui ra̱shong kajui shongfa Fullerwui Luipam chili vāngasāma.
Athumna awungali akhavao eina, dolanwui zanglui, Hilkiahwui nao Eliakim, kapime Shebnah kala kazipme Asaphwui nao Joah athum shokrāsai.
Rabshakehna athumli hānga, Hezekiahli hānglu, khangama Assyriawui awunga china kahāngna: Nathumna ningnganungkhung eina khalei hi khipāli kachihānkhala?
“Tuimāng china raiwui angarit kathem kala pangshapna da phaningla? Khipāli ningshaida ili ngakaishikhala?
Yanglu, nathumna tekkahaiya titi khāmshui, chili kashaiali rungki kaje Egyptli ningshaipamli. Ali ningshai kapambing saikorali Egyptwui awunga Pharaohahna chithai.”
Kha nathumna ili, “Ithumwui
Shoklu, Assyriawui awunga ishameili ngasanyanglu: Nathumwuili sigui tongkathei leiakha ina sigui thingkhani mira.
Siguigari kala sigui raimiwui vang nathumna Egyptli ningshaipamlaga kathāda ishameiwui teomeikap kaje raithānali kashamshapra da phaningla?
Chili lāngda ina apam hi sāshimān khavai kharā hi

Chieina Hilkiahwui nao Eliakim, Shebnah, kala Joah athumna Rabshakehli hānga, “Narao ithumli Aramwui tui eina matuimilu, ithumla shai, Judahwui tui eina mamatuimialu, phākholi nganāpamda khaleibingna shākhuihaipaishina.”

Kha Rabshakehna athumli hānga, “Phākholi pamda khalei athum khalattawui chir-pai mangzālaga nathumli shimānrumki kaji athumli tui hi mahāngla, nashāmei kala nathummāngli hāngkhavai ishāmeina ili kachihola?”
Chieina Rabshakehna thui nganingda Judahwui tui eina juilak eina vaoda hānga, “Assyriawui awunga khangama awungawui tui nganālu!
Awungana kahāngna: nathumli Hezekiahna mathānngui ngasakalu, kaja ipangwui eina ana makanshokmirarmara;
na ithumli makahatlakla ngatangshokmira kala keinung hi Assyriawui awungwui pāngli mahorsangmimara da Hezekiahna nathumli kahānga
Hezekiahwui tui makhuilu; kaja Assyriawui awungana hithāda hānga: Nathumna ili shokchamnākha, kachichāwui drakhāthei kala khaorātheilui vazāra, kachichā ra̱khongwui tara̱ mangpamra —
nathum lamli ngaraikachā apam, zātla, theishiraila, kashakazā yur drakhā yāmgui, olive eina khuira̱ khavāt makhalei apamli okthui khavai makhuivāranglakha eina tangda nathum chingri eina leipapamra.
Kachikathā yurwui varebingna Assyria awungawui pāng eina awui ngalei ngatangshokmi kahai leihairala?
Hamath eina Arpadwui vare kali leili? Sepharvaim, Hena, kala Ivvahwui vare kali leili? Athumna ipangwui eina Samaria kakankhuihairala?
Ngaleibingwui varebing khipāna athumwui lam ipangwui eina kankakhui khaleida,
Kha mibingna khikha mangahānkāla kasaikha pamhaowa, kaja awungana, “Ali mangahānkālaklu.” da kasohairasai.
Chieina dolanwui zanglui Hilkiahwui nao Eliakim, kapime Shebna, kala kapikakhuiya Asaphwui nao Joah, athumna kachon serkhākta awungali Rabshakehwui kahahāng tui chi ahāngsera.
Awunga Hezekiahna chi kashā tharan, kachon serkhaklaga bora ngavaida
Kala dolanwui zangluiwo Eliakim, kapime Shebna, kala pāngmon khararbing bora ngavailaga Amozwui nao marān Isaiahli asamphang ngasaka.
Athumna hānga, Hezekiahna hithāda hānga: “Aja hi wukkakhananga, kakahar kala maikashi zimikshona; nao ra̱laga pangshap maleimada mapharākharar thāhaira.
Assyriawui awungana Rabshakehli chihorāda kharinga Vareli mana̱shikida tui kachungkha kahāng hi nawui
Awunga Hezekiahwui raobingna Isaiahli khavā tharan,
Isaiahna athumli hānga, “Nashāmeili unghānglu, ‘
Yanglu, ina ali ning akha sangmida, pao makhamathā akha shāngasakta awui ngaleili latunghaora; kala shimli ungkashung eina ali akhalattawui raighai eina thingasakra.’”
Rabshakehna latkhaung tharan Assyriawui awungana Libnahli rai ngararsai; kaja awunga chi Lachish chihohailaga thuihaira da shai.
Awungana Ethiopiawui awunga Tirhakahwui pongli “Yanglu, nali ngarar khavai ana rāhaira,” da kashā tharan ana Hezekiahli pao chihoda hānga,
“Judahwui awunga Hezekiahli ahānglu: ‘Assyriawui awungawui pāngli Jerusalem mahorsangmimara da ngashitsang kakhaninga, nana kachihāna Varewui tui makhuialu.
Yanglu, ngalei kachiva̱ Assyriawui awungana sākazammiserhaira kaji nala shāhaira. Nali ngatangmimaraola?
Ishāvāna sākazami kahai ngalei, Gozan, Haran, Rezeph kala Telassarli khalei Eden yurbingwui varebingna ngatangshokhami leihairala?
Hamathwui, Arpadwui, Sepharvaim keinungwui, Henawui kala Ivvahwui awungabing kachili leilikhala?’”

O
athumwui varebingla meili horsangmiserhaira; kaja chibing chiya varebing maningmana, kha mipāngna thing ngalung eina sākakhuina; chiwui vang shimān ngasak kahaina.
Chieina ara O ithumwui
Chieina Amozwui nao Isaiahna Hezekiahli pao hāngchiphuna,
Awui pongli
“Zionwui kachinga naongalāva̱ nali ningkachaida mana̱shiya;
Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱na nakhanukli kuikhayita.
Nana khipāli mana̱shida zeida leili?
Khipāwuitungli nawuikhon juihaira
kala langkaso mikyan eina yanghaira?
Israelwui Kathara Alina!
‘Juikhamatai kaphung hupta iwui siguigari kachungkhana vāhaira;
Lebanonwui akatanga eina tangda;
chiwui kajujuiya cedarthingbing,
cypressthing mathāmeikap kaji ina ta̱teka,
tāmeikap shāmataimeikap kaji ngahong vāshungda.
Ina ra̱khong khonda mi ngaleiwui tara̱ manga,
kala ina ipheimayā eina Egyptwui kongrā hupta theng ngasaka.’”
“Na mashāsamala ina rilak eina chukmaja kahai chi?
Ina achālakhawui eina machuk kahai arui rāshok khangasakna,
kaja ngaziplak eina ngavei kahai keinungbing ngayāng ngasakra da,
chili khaleiyabing, pangshap maleithuda ningchothaira kala pa̱ngapai,
luili khalei thingnā ra̱hā kala wonnuibing,
shimtungli kakhar khawobing thāda;
makharanglakha ngahui kahai mathāmala?
“Kha nana pamkazang,
kala nawui kashok-kazang ina theisera;
kala nana ili malungkhavāt theisera.
Khikhalajila nana ili makhamayā malungkhavāt,
kala nawui langkaso ikhanāli rāshunghaida;
Ina nali nārenkhuira,
kala nakhamor khalaplaga nana rākhavai shongfa chieina latunglui ngasakra.”

“Kala hina nawui vang machut ngasāra: ajakum khalatta kakharwui eina zāra, kakhane kum chiwui eina shonkashok chi zāra; chiwui thili kakathuma kum, yaora kala hātra kala drakhārong lingsangda chiwui athei nathumna shaira.
Kala shākkahaiya Judahwui shimkhurna latluida angayung sa̱khuida athei matheira;
kaja Jerusalemwui eina taishokra, kala Zion kaphungwui eina ringkasā khumkha shokra.
“Chiwui vang eina Assyriawui awungawui pongli
Awui rākhavai apong chieina horzakta ana hanungluira, kala keinung hili marāzangmara da
Kaja I khalattawui vang kala iwui rao Davidwui vang ina keinung hi kankhuiki kajina.”
Chithang ngayā
Chieina Assyriawui awunga Sennacheribna latunglaga Ninevehli ungpānhaowa.
Ana awui vare Nisrochwui shimli khorumda leilakha, anaomayara khani, Adrammelech eina Sharezerna sāthathailaga Ararat ngaleili yāmvāhaowa. Kala awui nao Esarhaddonna awui mahut thuishinhaowa.
Chieina Hezekiahna phākhoshong mai ngareizanglaga
“O
Isaiahna kayāng makānshokranglakha
“Ngareiungda iwui mibingwui wungnao Hezekiahli hānglu, ‘Navā Davidwui
Kala ina nawui mirin kum tharāda phangā ngarumsangmira. Ina nali kala keinung hi Assyria awungawui pāng eina kanshokmira; kala I khalattawui vang, iwui rao Davidwui vang keinung hi kankhuira.’”
Isaiahna, “Khaorātheiwui khamui ahāng akha khuirālu, kala chi moksātungli parlu, chieina ana kharai samphangra.” da hānga.

Isaiahna hānga, “
Hezekiahna hānga, “Akalāna pheikār tharā kaseikhavā kasak maleimana, chiwui vang kaseiung ngasaktha̱lu.”
Chieina Isaiah, marānna
Atam chitharan Babylonwui awunga Baladanwui nao Merodach-baladanna chithi eina ngasoda ot awui pao phungmeli chihovai; kaja Hezekiah kazāhaowa da ana shai.

Hezekiahna mathānthup eina athumli samphangda, awui lanshimli khalalei lan lupāsā, sinā, nganamkaphā otyur, aman kasaka thao, raisāri haikhavai pam, kala awui shimli khalalei saikora, chitheisera; awui shimli kala awui wungramli khalalei chitheisera.
Chiwui thili Isaiah marānna awunga Hezekiahli vāda hānga, “Mibing hina khi rāhāngkhala? Kala kachiwui eina kharākhala?” Hezekiahna ngahānkai, “Ngalei katāva, Babylonwui eina kharāna.”
Isaiahna, “Athumna nawui shimli khimamei theihairakhala?” da ngahāna. Hezekiahna hānga, “Iwui shimli khalei saikora chitheihaira; iwui lanshimli khalalei ina makachithei maleimana.”
Chieina Isaiahna Hezekiahli hānga, “
Yanglu, nawui shimli khalalei, kala navā ngarāna aja rāshungda kazip kahai lan saikora Babylonli khuivāserhaoki kaji atam rārāli; akha eina tangda mataimara da
Nana pharākakhui nanao mayarabing eina tangda, kaikhali tukvāhaora; kala athum Babylon awungawui konungli ahongabing sāda apamra.”
Chieina Hezekiahna Isaiahli hānga, “Nana kahāng
Hezekiahwui otsakbing, awui pangshap saikora kala ra̱khongla, ra̱shongla, ana sākhuida keinungli tara̱ hokasang chi Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Hezekiah thihaoda anaomayara Manassehna awui mahut thuishina.
Israel mibingwui vang

Kaja avāva̱ Hezekiahna sakhai kahai kajujui apambing sakāluishita, kala Baalwui vang hanphutbing sakai; kala Israelwui awunga Ahabna sākahai thāda Asherahla sākhuilaga zimik, kachāng, sirā ashangva̱li khoruma.
kala

Anaomayaralila pha̱phayā khavai meili riktai, khanong khayang eina khamarān sāngasaka kala kazeikazang eina laivā kasā hi sāngasaka.
Asherahwui meoma̱ ana sākakhui chi

kala ina kaso kahai ningkhami saikora chiwui athishurda ning ngasharda mayonakha, kala iwui rao Mosesli kaso kahai ain saikora chiwui athishurda mayontitakha, ina athumwui avāva̱ ngarāli mikahai ngalei chiwui eina Israelli mathui ngasaklakmara.”
Kha athumna makhuisangmana, kala Israel mibingwui vang
Kala

“Khikhalajila Manasseh, Judahwui awungana ningkakachai otbing chi sāhaoda, kala athumli rida leikasā Amorwui mibingli zakshimeikhārda sahaoda; kala awui meoma̱li kaphaningwui vang Judahli morei sākhangasakwui vang;
Israelwui
Samariali tandi khami thāda Jerusalemli ina tandi mira, Ahabwui shimkhurli kasā thāda sāmira; Jerusalemli ina khongphei pheoda mithailaga ngakhum kahai thāda ina khumphalatra.
Iwui shimluiwui shākkahai chi yangkashebingwui pāngli horsangmira, kala athumwui yangkashebingwui kashakazā kala ngaponzā khavai ngasāra,
khikhalajila Egyptwui eina avāva̱ ngarāli thānshokthang eina thuilaga aja rāshungda athumna iwui mikyanli makaphā ot chi sāda ili malungvāt ngasaka.”
Manassehwui otsakbing ana kasā saikora, kala awui morei sākahai chi Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Manasseh thihaida ashi shimwui yāmgui kaja Uzzawui yāmguili chifahaowa kala anaomayara Amonna awui mahut thuishina.
Avāva̱ Manassehna kasā thāda anala
Avāva̱na kazat chili zata, kala avāva̱na khokharum kameobing chili khoruma.
Avāva̱ ngarāwui
Amonwui raobingna ngathumda mithit khalen sāda ali shaothathaowa.
Kha awungali mithit khalen kasābingli mibingna shaothatpapamhaowa, kala awungawui nao Josiahli awungawui mahut shinngasakhaowa.
Amonwui otsakbing Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Alila awui chikhur Uzza yāmguili chifaya; kala anaomayara Josiahna awui mahut thuishinna.

kala chi
kaja, mistribing, shim kasābing, ngalung kasingbing, kala thing lokhavai eina ngalung kasingwui aman mihaoranu.
Kha athumli misang kahai pheisā chiwui pongli mangathingranu, kaja athumna ning tharlak eina sāda lei.”
Kala Pāngmon kharei Hilkiahna kapime Shaphanli hānga, “
Shaphan kapimena awungali, “Naraobingna
Kapime Shaphanna, “Pāngmon Hilkiahna ili lairik akha mihaida lei.” da awungali hānga. Kala ana awungawui mangāli pāchithei.
Awungana ainwui lairikli kapihaikasā chi kashā tharan, awui kachon serkhākta,
