awungana pāngmon Hilkiah, Shaphanwui nao Ahikam, Micaiahwui nao Achbor, kapime Shaphan kala awungawui rao Asaiah athumli kasoda hānga,
“Iwui vang, mibingwui vang, Judahwui vang samkaphang lairik chiwui tui chi

Chiwui athishurda pāngmon Hilkiah, Ahikam, Achbor, Shaphan kala Asaiah, athumna marānva̱ Huldah, ava Harhasna kapharā Tikvahwui nao, kachonkakhopwui yangkhame Shallumwui apreiva̱na (atam chili ana Jerusalemwui shim kakhane chili pamsai); athumna ali ngasanngaruma.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “
na hithāda hānga, Yanglu, ngalei hili kala hili kapambingwuitungli Judah awungana lairik hi pālaga theikakhui kalākashi saikora chi ina khuirāra.

Khikhalajila athumna ili malaihaida vare khangateili nganamkaphā thao riktālaga athum pāng eina sākakhui saikora china ili malungvāt ngasakhaira; chiwui vang apam hili iwui malung kakang masuitāluimara.
Kha
khikhalajila nawui ning ngateida
Chiwui vang eina yanglu, ina nali chingri eina thingasakta kalākashi shokki kaji saikora hi nawui thotli mashok ngasakmada namik eina matheimara.’” Athumna tui chi awungali unghānga.
Chiwui thili awungana Judah eina Jerusalemwui khararnao katongali kazipkhui.
Kala awungana
Kala awungana pakra̱pheili nganingda
Kala pāngmon kharei Hilkiah, awui thi kazangbing, kala shim khāmong khamayonbingli awungana, Baalwui vang, Asherahwui vang kala kazingramli khalei ashangva̱wui vang sāsang kahai khorkhong saikora

Kala ana Judahwui awungana Judah kala Jerusalem kuikhamareili khalei kajujui apambingli nganamkaphā thao riktā khavai tharchisin kahai meoma̱li khokharuma pāngmonbing; kala Baal, zimik, kachāng, sirābing kala kazingli khalei ashangva̱ khangatateiwui vang thao rikkatā saikora chila khuishokhaida kashamserhaowa.
Ana Asherah chi
wui shimli haikahai Asherahwui chonrān sākasang sha̱naobingna pamkhavai chili khayora mayarnaobingwui shim chila sakhaimihaowa.

Pāngmonbingla Judah keinungwui eina kashamhaida, Geba eina thuilaga Beersheba vāshungda khalei kajujui apambingli pāngmonbingna nganamkaphā thao riktā khavai chi sākhamāngmiserhaowa; kala keinung ngavei uishong, lammunga Joshua ngavei zangkhavaili khalei kajujui apambing chila sākhaimiserhaowa.
Jerusalemle kajujui apamwui pāngmonbingna
Hinnomwui naomayara ngarāwui tampākli khalei Tophethla sākhamāngmihaida Molechli khipānakha naomayara kala ngalāva̱li kachigat sāda mariktā khavai sai.

wui shim zangkhavaili shim khamayona akhavā Nathan-melechwui shim ngalemli Judah awungabingna zimikli dharchigat sākahai sigui eina siguigariwui ama saikorala khuishokmiserhaowa, kala siguigari chi meili riktāmihaowa.
Ahazwui shim mathāng atoli Judah wungnaobingna sākahai hanphutbing, kala

Chiwui thili Jerusalemwui zingshoshong, sāmakhao kahai kaphungwui azingshong khalei kajujui apambing saikora Israel awunga Solomonna sākakā, Sidon mibingwui ningkakachaiya Ashtoreth, Moab mibingwui ningkakachaiya Chemosh, Ammon mibingwui Milcom, chi Josiahna sākhamāngmiserhaowa.
Ana lungshomla shaokhaimihai, Asherimla ta̱tekmihaida, apam chili kathinaowui ara̱kui eina chipemihai.

Josiahna ngarei khaung eina kaphungli chikhur kachungkha thei, kala mi chihoda chiwui ara̱kui akhuishok ngasaklaga meoma̱shim hanphutungli riktāda sākhamāng ngasaka; hi Varewui mi china hithāda shokra da
Kala ana, “Arā chili ina kathei chikhur chi khipāwuikhala?” da khangahān eina keinungwui mibingna,
“Bethelli nana hanphut sākathānmi kahai chi shokra da kahānga, Judahwui eina kashoka Varewui mi chiwui chikhurna.” da ngahānkai.
Ana hānga, “Ale ningkhānranu, khipānakha awui ara̱kui makhuiranu.” Chieina awui ara̱kui makhuishokthuda Samariawui eina kashoka marānbingwui ngachaili leipapama.
Kala kameoshim saikora, kala
Kala chili leikasā pāngmonbingli hanphutungli shaothatta athumwuitungli mira̱kui riktārora. Chiwui thili ana Jerusalemli latunga.
Awungana “Tuingashit lairik hili kapi kahai athishurda nathumwui
Kaja Israelli wungva̱-wungvābingna mungkaphok eina thuida kala Israelwui awungabingna munglakha lah Judahwui awungabingna munglakha makānkhami phanit hi mamayonsalakmana.
Kha Awunga Josiahna mungda tharāda kachishata kum
Chili lāngda
Moseswui ain athishurda, ningla, yāngla, pangshapla tongda
Chithālala, Manassehna
na hānga, “Israelli ina horphui kahai thāda, Judahlila iwui mikyanwui eina horhaora, kala iming chili leira da shim kapangkhui kahai Jerusalem chi ina horhaora.”
Josiahwui otsak kala ana kasāsā saikora chi Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Awui atamli Assyriawui awungali samphang khavai Egyptwui awunga Pharaoh Necona Euphrates kongli vai. Ali samphang khavai Josiahla vai. Megiddo apamli kathei tharan Pharaoh Necona shaothathaowa.

Awui raobingna siguigarili sanglaga Megiddowui eina Jerusalemli kathi eina khuiunga, kala awui chikhurli chifahaowa. Ngalei chiwui mibingna anaomayara Jehoahazli tharchisinmida avāva̱wui mahut awunga sanga.
Jehoahazna mungkaphok atam tharan kum maga̱da kathum kāshunghairasai, kala ana Jerusalemli kachāng kathum munga. Ava̱va̱li Hamutal hoi, kala Libnahli khalei Jeremiahwui naongalāva̱na.
Avāva̱ ngarāwui kasā athishurda ana
Kala Hamath ngaleiwui Riblahli Pharaoh Necona ali narhaida Jerusalemli maung ngasakthuwa. Kala aramli kum kachida shai khuida lupāsā kg. thing kathum shāmati, sinā kg. thumrada mati da michinga.
Pharaoh Necona Josiahwui nao Eliakimli avāva̱wui pamli awunga sanglaga aming Jehoiakim da ngacheimihaowa. Kha Jehoahazli Egyptli tukvāhaida chili athisanghaowa.

Jehoiakimna Pharaohli lupāsā eina sinā shai chi mi, kha Pharaohna kakaso athishurda shai chi mikhavai Jehoiakimna ngalei chiwui mibingli pheisā ngashaikhui. Pharaoh Necoli mikhavai lupāsā kala sinā chi, mi kachiva̱na samkaphang athishurda ngalei chili khalei mibingwui eina kazipkhui.
Avāva̱ ngarāna kasā tākam eina makaphā ot chi anala
wui tui awui rao marānbingli hāngmi ngasak kahai chiwui athishurda ungshung khavai Chaldeanaobing, Syrianaobing, Moabnaobing kala Ammonnaobingna khum khum eina Judahli sākhayang khavai
Manassehna morei sākahai saikorawui vang
kala khayon makhalei mili ana ashee tākhangasak chiwui vangla zanga; kaja ana khayon makhalei mibingwui ashee eina Jerusalem pemngasakhaoda chiwui vang
Jehoiakimwui kasā khavā kala kasāsā saikora Judah Awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Jehoiakim thikahai eina anaomayara Jehoiachinna awui mahut thuishina.
Egypt awungana awui ngaleiwui eina maraluithuwa; kaja Egypt awungawui ngasa kasā Egyptkong eina thuida Euphrateskong vākashung lam saikora Babylon awungana khuithuiserhaowa.
Jehoiachinna awunga sākaphok tharan awui kum tharāda chishat kāhairasai, kala Jerusalemli kachāng kathum munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Nehushta hoi, Jerusalemli khalei Elnathanwui naongalāva̱na.
Avāva̱na kasā thāda
Atam chitharan Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarwui raobingna Jerusalemli akuinamhaowa.
Awui raobingna kuinamda leilakha Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna keinung chili rai;

Judahwui awunga Jehoiachinna Babylon awungali a kala ava̱va̱, awui raobing, awui wungnaobing kala awui konungwui otva̱bingla hamsangserhaowa. Ana mungda kachishata kum Babylonwui awungana ali phātop sanghaowa,
wui shimli khalei lanbing, awungawui shimli khalei lan saikora pongthuihaowa; kala
Jerusalemwui mi saikora, kachām-khangaibing maningla, wungnao saikora, rai kapingbingla, athum thingtharā tukkhui, kachām-khangaibing maningla, pāngthem kathembing, mari kasābing chi tukthui kahaina.
Ana Babylonli Jehoiachinli tukvāhaowa; awungawui ava̱va̱, awungawui apreiva̱ ngarā, keinungwui akhavābing kala ngalei chiwui kharei mibing saikora Jerusalemwui eina Babylonli khuivāserhaowa;
Babylon awungana tukkhaung raikaping saikora thingshini, pāngthem kathem, mari sākatheimāng thingkha, athum saikora raili vāshap kapangpang mimānga.
Kala Babylon awungana Jehoiachinwui avāgato Mattaniahli awunga sangasaklaga awui ming Zedekiah phokmi.
Jehoiakimna kasā tākam eina anala
Kaja athumna
Zedekiahna Babylonwui awungali thuingarara.
Awunga Zedekiahwui khamung zingkum tharāda akha eina tangda kuinama.
Kachāng khamatewui kachikothang keinung chili kashakazā kasak marnāhaoda mibingna zākhavai akhala masamphangthuwa.

Chieina apongnao akha sākhuilaga awungala awui raimibingla, ngayā sailung, awungawui yāmgui ngavei kahai phākho khaniwui ngachaili yāmshokhaowa. Atam chili Chaldeanaobingna kuinamhaoda Arabahshong yāmvai.
Kha Chaldeawui raimibingna awungali kharomvālaga Jericho tampākli angaphankhuida awui raimibing ngapha̱yanghaowa.
Athumna awungali tukkhuida Babylon awungawuili Riblahli khuiungmi, kala awuitungli tuitak khuihaowa.
Zedekiahwui miktāli anaomayarabingli sāthata, kala awui mikla latshokmithathuihaowa; kala pheipāng khalaplaga Babylonli khuivai.
Kachāng kaphangāwui zimiksho kashinethang— Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarwui tharāda kachiko kum—awungawui raimi kathānawui ngākkhame Nebuzaradanna Jerusalemli vai.
Kala
Kala raikānwui kathānali ngasozat kasā Chaldeanwui raimibingna Jerusalemwui phākho kuikhamarei chi shaokhaimiserhaowa.
Taihaikasā mibing, yāmhaida Babylon awungali yāmkasangbing, kala khangatateibingla raituk sāda raikānmewui kathāna Nebuzaradanna shimenthuiserhaowa.
Kha kachām-khangaibing khani kathumli lui vākhavai yāmgui sākhavai taimi.
Hamla, berchala, meikhanitla, thao riktā khavai akhongla, kala Khorumshimli savai khavai khorkhong, pithrai eina kasā,
meiyaikhong, koklui, saikora khuithuiserhaowa. Raikānwui kathāna china, sinā eina kasā, lupā eina kasā khuithuiserhaowa.
Solomonna sasang kahai pakra̱ khani, shamadrunao kala aphei, kala pithrai eina kasā khorkhong saikora chi chungnahaida maonrarmana.

Pakra̱ akhawui kajui khuining tharāda chishata, chiwui atungli pithraiwui agui akha sāsanga, agui chiwui kasang khuining kathumna; kala pithrai eina kabothei kuimareida yeksanga. Pakra̱ kakhane chila tākamhaipapama.
Raikānwui kathāna china pāngmon kharei Seraiah kala pāngmon kakhane Zephaniah, kala khāmong khamayona athum kathumli tukkhui;

kala raiwui atamli thānkhamewui otva̱ akha, kala keinung chili awungawui hangva̱ phangā leikasā chi tukkhui; kala ngaleiwui mibingli kazipkhuida raithānwui kapimeli ngasoda ngalei chiwui mi keinungli leikasā hangtharukla tukkhui.
Raikanmewui kathāna Nebuzaradanna athumli tukphungda Riblahli Babylon awungawui pāngli khuiungmi.
Kala Babylon awungana athum katongali, Hamath ngaleiwui Riblah chili sāthatserhaowa. Chithāda sāda Judahli awui ngaleiwui eina ayarli tukthuiserhaowa.

Babylon awungana Gedaliahli lammunga sanghaira kaji mibingna kashā tharan, ram chili khalei raimi kathānabing kala khangatateibingla Gedaliahli samphang khavai Mizpahli vāsera; amingbing chiya; Nethaniahwui nao Ishmael, Kareahwui nao Johanan, Netophathli khalei Tanhumethwui nao Seraiah, kala Maacathpa Ja-azaniahna.
Gedaliahna mingzaida athumli kala athumwui mibingli hānga, “Chaldeawui otva̱bingli mangacheelu, apam hili pamda Babylon awungawui otram ngatha̱lu, chithakha khikha mathālakmara.”

Kha kachāng kashineli, Elishamana kapharā Nethaniahwui nao wungva̱pa Ishmaelna, mi tharā thānphunglaga Gedaliahli kala ali ngasokasā Jehudiwui mibing, Chaldeawui mibing saikorali Mizpahli shaothatserhaowa.
Chi theilaga Chaldeawui mibingli ngacheehaida khararnaosan mateila raithānabingla Egyptli yāmvāserhaowa.
kala ali mathālak eina ngahānmida Babylonli khalei wungnaobingwuitungli chipama.
Chithāda Jehoiachinna phātop kachon mangaveiluithuwa. Kala thangkachida awungali phazāngarumchinga;
kala ringlakha eina tangda awui sāvai khavai pheisāla thangthangwui vang awungana michinga.
Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared;
Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech;
Noah, Shem, Ham, kala Japheth.
Japhethwui naomayarabing: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech kala Tiras.
Gomerwui naomayarabing: Ashkenaz, Diphath, kala Togarmah.
Javan naomayarabing: Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, kala Rodanim.
Hamwui naomayarabing: Cush, Egypt, Put, kala Canaan.
Cushwui naomayarabing: Seba, Havilah, Sabta, Raama, kala Sabteca. Raamahwui naobing: Sheba eina Dedan.
Cushwui naomayara Nimrod; a hi okathuili kapinga mi akha ngasasai.
Egyptna kapharā naobing: Ludim, Anamim, Lehabim, Naph-tuhim,
Pathrusim, Casluhim (Philistine awui atheina), kala Caphtorim.
Canaanwui naochizai Sidonna, chiwui thili Heth,
kala Jebusnao, Amornao, Girgashnao,
Hivnao, Arknao, Sinnao,
Arvadnao; Zemarnao, kala Hamathnaobingwui awova̱na.
Shemwui naomayarabing: Elam, Asshur, Arpachshad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, Meshech,
Arpachshadna Shelahli pharai; kala Shelahna Eberli pharai.
Eberwui naomayara khani pharai: akhawui ming Pelegna (kaja awui thotli okathui hi ngakaihaowa), kala agatowui ming Joktan hoi,
Joktanna Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Ebal, Abima-el, Sheba,
Ophir, Havilah, kala Jobabwui avāva̱na; athum hi Joktanwui naomayarasera.
Shemwui naobing: Arpachshad, Shelah,
Eber, Pelag, Reu;
Serug, Nahor, Terah,
Abram, chiya Abraham.
Abrahamwui naomayarabing: Isaac eina Ishmael.
Hibing hi aniwui naomayarabingna: Ishmaelwui naochizai Nebaiothna, kala Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa, Hadad, Tema,
Jetur, Naphish kala Kedemahna.
Abrahamwui angashirva Keturahwui naomayarabing: Zimrah, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, kala Shuahli pharai. Jokshanwui naobing: Sheba eina Dedan.
Midianwui naomayarabing: Ephah, Epher, Hanok, Abida kala Eldaah. Saikora hi Keturahwui ara̱-azāna.
Abrahamna Isaacwui avāva̱na. Isaacwui naomayarabing: Esau eina Israel.
Esauwui naomayarabing: Eliphaz, Reuel, Jeush, Jalam kala Corah.
Eliphazwui naomayarabing: Teman, Omar, Zephi, Gatam, Kenaz, Timna kala Amalek.
Reuelwui naomayarabing: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, kala Mizzah.
Seirwui naobing: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah, Dishon, Ezer kala Dishan.
Lotanwui naomayarabing: Hori eina Homam; kala Lotanwui azarva̱ Timnana.
Shobalwui naomayarabing: Alian, Manahath, Ebal, Shephi kala Onam. Zibeonwui naobing: Aiah eina Anah.
Anahwui naomayarabing: Dishon kala Dishonwui naobing: Hamran, Eshban, Ithran kala Kheran.
Ezerwui naomayarabing: Bilhan, Zaavan kala Jaakan. Dishanwui naomayarabing: Uz eina Aran.
Israelwuitungli awunga khipānakha mamungranglakha Edom ngaleili mungkasā awungabing chi hibingna: Beorwui nao Bela, awui keinungwui ming Dinhabah hoi.
Bela thikahai tharan, Bozrahli khalei Zerahwui nao Jobabna awui mahut thuishina.
Jobab thikahai eina, Teman ngaleiwui Hushamna awui mahut thuishina.
Husham thikahai eina, Moab ngaleili Midiannaobingli khayuiya Bedadwui nao Hadadna awui mahut thuishina; kala awui keinungwui aming chi Avithna.
Hadad thikahai eina, Masrekahli khalei Samlahna awui mahut thuishina.
Samlah thikahai eina, Euphrateswui atungshong khalei Rehobothli khalei Shaulna awui mahut thuishina.
Shaul thikahai eina, Achborwui nao Baal-hananna awui mahut thuishina,
Baal-hanan thikahai eina, Hadadna awui mahut thuishina, kala awui keinungwui aming Pai hoi. Apreiva̱wui aming Mehetabel hoi, Matredwui naongalāva̱, kala Mezahabwui ara̱va̱na.
Hadad thihaowa.
Edomwui wungnaobing: Timna, Aliah, Jetheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magtiel, kala Iram; athum hina Edomwui khareibingna.
Dan, Joseph, Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, kala Asher.
Awui arihāva̱ Tamarnala ali Peres eina Zerahli pharāmi. Judahwui naomayara saikora phangāna.
Zerahwui naomayarabing: Zimri, Ethan, Heman, Calcol kala Dara; ashi phangāna.
Carmiwui naomayarabing: Chonkhamakanwui vang Israelli khanang khangasaka, Achan;
kala Ethanwui nao Azariahna.
Hezronwui naomayarabing: Jerahmeel, Ram kala Chelubai.
Ramna Amminadabwui avāva̱na, kala Amminadabna Judahnaobingwui wungnao Nahshonwui avāva̱na.
Nahshonna Salmawui avāva̱na, Salmana Boazwui,
Boazna Obedwui, Obedna Jessewui avāva̱na.
Jessena naochizai Eliabwui avāva̱na, kakhane Abinadad, kakathuma Shime-ana,
khamate Nethanel, kaphangā Raddai,
katharuka Ozem, kashine David;
athumwui azarva̱ chi Zeruiah eina Abigailna.
Zeruiahwui naomayarabing: Abishai, Joab kala Asahel, ashi kathumna.
Abigailna Amasali pharai, avāva̱li Jether hoi, Ishmaelwui mina.
Hezronwui naomayara Calebwui preiva̱̱ Azubah, kala Jeriothna kapharā naobing: Jesher, Shobab kala Ardon.
Azubah thikahai eina Calebna Ephrathli ngakumda Hurli pharai.
Hurna Uriwui avāva̱na kala Urina Bezalelwui avāva̱na.
Khaleilaga Hezronna kum hangtharuk kakā eina Gileadwui avāva̱ Machirwui naongalāva̱li ngakumda Segubli pharākhui;
kala Segubna Jair, Gilead ngaleili keinung maga̱da kathum khangavāwui avāva̱na.
Kha Geshur eina Aramna, Havvoth-jair, Kenath kala chiwui kha̱bing zangda hangtharuk athumwui eina ngapaithuihaowa. Athum saikora hi Gileadwui avāva̱ Machirwui ara̱-azāna.
Hezron thikahaiwui thili avāva̱wui apreiva̱̱ Ephrathali Calebna ngasoda Tekoawui avāva̱ Ashhurli pharai.
Hezronwui naochizai Jerameelwui naomayarabing: Ram, awui naochizai Bunah, Oren, Ozem kala Ahijah.
Jerahmeelwui khangatei preiva̱, aming Atarah hoda lei; ana Onamwui ava̱na,
Jerameelwui naochizai Ramwui naomayarabing: Maaz, Jamin, kala Eker,
Onamwui naomayarabing: Shammai eina Jada. Shammaiwui naomayarabing: Nadab eina Abishur.
Abishur preiva̱wui aming Abihailna, ana Ahban eina Molidli pharai.
Nadabwui naomayarabing: Seled eina Appa-im; Seled nao maleila thihaowa.
Appa-imwui naomayarabing: Ishi, Ishiwui nao Sheshan; Sheshanwui naomayara Ahlaina.
Shammaiwui achinā Jadawui naomayarabing: Jether eina Jonathan; kala Jether naomayara maleila thihaowa.
Jonathanwui naomayarabing: Peleth eina Zaza. Hibing hi Jerahmeelwui ara̱-azāna.
Chitharan Sheshanna mayarnao mapharāla nao ngalāva̱bingmāng pharai; kha Sheshanna Egyptwui rao mayarnao aming Jarha hoda leisai.
Chieina Sheshanna anaongalāva̱li awui raonao Jarhali ngakum khavai mihaowa; kala Attaili pharākhui.
Attaina Nathanwui avāva̱na, Nathanna Zabadwui avāva̱na.
Zabadna Ephlalwui avāva̱na, Ephlalna Obedwui avāva̱na.
Obedna Jehuwui avāva̱na, Jehuna Azariahwui avāva̱na.
Azariahna Helezwui avāva̱na, kala Helezna Ele-asahwui avāva̱na.
Ele-asahna Sismaiwui avāva̱na, Sismaina Shallumwui avāva̱na.
Shallumna Jekamiahwui avāva̱na, kala Jekamiahna Elishamawui avāva̱na.
Jerahmeelwui achinā Calebwui naomayarabing: Mareshahna naochizaina, kala ana Ziphwui avāva̱na. Mareshahwui nao: Hebronna.
Hebronwui naomayarabing: Corah, Tappuah, Rekem, kala Shema.
Shemana Rahamwui avāva̱na, Rahamna Jorke-amwui avāva̱na kala Rekemna Shammaiwui avāva̱na.
Shammaiwui naobing: Maonli pharai, kala Maonna Beth-zurwui avāva̱na.
Calebwui angashirva̱ Ephahna Haran, Moza, kala Gazez; Haranna Gazezwui avāva̱na.
Jahdaiwui naomayarabing: Regem, Jotham, Geshan, Pelet, Ephah kala Shaaph.
Calebwui ngashirva̱ Maacahna Sheber eina Tirhanahli pharai.
Kala ana Madmannahwui avāva̱ Shaaphli pharai, Shevana Machbenah eina Gibe-ali pharai. Achsah Calebwui naongalāva̱na.
Hibing hi Calebwui ara̱-azāna.
Epharathahwui naochizai Hurwui naobing: Shobalna Kiriath-jearimwui avāva̱na,
Salmana Bethlehemwui avāva̱na; kala Harephna Beth-gaderwui avāva̱na.
Kiriath-jearimwui avāva̱ Shobalna, awui naomayara khangateila lei: Haroeh, kala Menuhothwui shang ngayarpak awui naosera.
Kala Kiriath-jearimshi shimkhurbing: Ithritnaobing, Puthnaobing, Shumathnaobing, kala Mishraibing; athumwui eina Zorathnaobing kala Eshtaobing rākhamaronna.
Salmawui naomayarabing: Bethlehem, Netophath, Atroth-beth-joab, kala Manahathnaobing ngayarpak, kala Zorpashi.
Jabezli kapam kala kapimela kasā shimkhurbing: Tirathshi, Shime-athshi, kala Sucatshi. Athum hi Rechabwui shimkhurwui avāva̱ Hammathwui eina kharā Kennaobing china.
kakathuma Absalomli Geshurwui awunga Talmaiwui naongalāva̱ Maacahna pharai; khamate Adonijahli Haggithna pharai;
kaphangā Shephatiahli Abitalna pharai; katharuka Ithre-amli apreiva̱ Eglahna pharai.
Ana Hebronli kum shini kachāng tharuk khamung atamli naomayara tharuk hi kapharāna.
Kala Jerusalemli kum tharāda kathum munga.
Jerusalemli kapharābing: Shime-a, Shobab, Nathan, kala Solomon, athum matili Ammielwui naongalāva̱ Bath-shuana kapharāna.
Chiwui thili mayar chiko pharālui: Ibhar, Elishama, Eliphelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Eliada kala Eliphelet hina.
Hibing hi angashirva ngarāwui naomayarabing mazangla, Davidwui naosera; kala Tamar hi athumwui azarva̱na.
Solomonwui ara̱-azā: Rehoboam, awui nao Abijah, awui nao Asa, awui nao Jehoshaphat,
awui nao Joram, awui nao Ahaziah, awui nao Joash,
awui nao Amaziah, awui nao Azariah, awui nao Jotham,
awui nao Ahaz, awui nao Hezekiah, awui nao Manasseh,
awui nao Amon, awui nao Josiah,
Josiahwui naomayarabing: Johanan naochizaina, kakhane Jehoiakim, kakathuma Zedekiah, khamate Shallum.
Jehoiakimwui ara̱-azā: awui nao Jeconiah, awui nao Zedekiah;
kala raili tukthui kahaiya Jeconiahwui naomayarabing: awui nao Shealti-el,
awui nao Malchiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama kala Nedabiah;
Pedaiahwui naomayarabing: Zerubbabel eina Shime-i, Zerubbabelwui naomayarabing: Meshullam eina Hananiah, kala Shelomith athumwui azarva̱na.
Mayarnao khangatei, Hashubah, Ohel, Berechiah, Hasadiah kala Jushab-heseh athum phangā.
Hananiahwui naomayarabing: Pelatiah eina Jeshaiah; Jeshaiahwui naomayara Rephaiah, awui naomayara Arnan, awui naomayara Obadiah, awui naomayara Shecaniah.
Shecaniahwui naomayarabing: Shemaiah. Kala Shemaiahwui naomayarabing: Hattush; Igal, Bariah, Ne-ariah kala Shaphat, athum tharuk.
Ne-ariahwui naomayarabing: Eli-o-enai, Hizkiah, kala Azrikam, athum kathum.
Eli-o-enaiwui naomayarabing: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah, kala Anani, athum shinina.
Judahwui naomayarabing: Perez, Hezron, Carmi, Hur, Shobal.
Shobalwui nao Re-aiahna Jahathwui avāva̱na, kala Jahathna Ahumai eina Lahadwui avāva̱na. Hi Zorathwui shimkhurna.
Etamwui naomayarabing: Jezreel, Ishma, kala Idbash; kala athumwui azarva̱wui aming Hazzelelponi hoi.
Penuelna Gedorwui avāva̱na, kala Ezerna Hushahwui avāva̱na. Hibing Hurwui naomayarabingna: Ephrathahwui naochizai kala Bethlehemwui avāva̱na.
Tekoashāvā Ashhur ngalā khani ngashira, Helah eina Naarahna.
Naarahna Ahuzzam, Hepher, Temeni, kala Ha-ahashtarili pharai. Hibing hi Naarahwui naomayarabingna:
Helahna kapharā naomayarabing: Zereth, Izhar, kala Ethnan.
Kozna Anub, Zobebah kala Harumwui naomayara Aharhel shimkhurwui avāva̱na.
Chinaongarā kateile Jobezna khayā kāmei; kala ava̱va̱na, “Chotlak eina pharākhui” jida awui ming Jabez phokmi.

Israelwui Vareli Jabezna “Iyavo nana ili somida iwui lam thari haksangmisi kaje, kala nana ili ngasomisi kaje, kala kakhanangli matāzang khavai kasakwui eina nana kanmisi kaje” da poi. Ana kapo chi Varena khuisangmi.
Shuhahwui achinā Chelubna Mehirwui avāva̱na; kala Mehirna Eshtonwui avāva̱na.
Eshtonna Bethrapha, Paseah, kala Irnahashna Tehinnahwui avāva̱na. Hi Rekahwui mibingna.
Kenazwui naomayarabing: Othni-el eina Seraiah; kala Othni-elwui naomayarabing: Hathath eina Meonothaina.
Meonothaina Ophrahwui avāva̱na; kala Seraiahna Joabwui avāva̱na, Joabna Ge-harashimwui avāva̱na, them-kathemwui vang aming hithāda kaphokna.
Jephunnehwui nao Calebwui naomayarabing: Iru, Elah; kala Naam; Elahwui naomayarabing: Kenaz.
Jehallelelwui naomayarabing: Ziph, Ziphah, Tiri-a, kala Asarel.
Ezrahwui naomayarabing: Jether, Mered, Epher, kala Jalon, Meredna khangakum Pharaohwui naongalāva̱ Bithi-ahna athum hi kapharāna: Mariam, Shammai, kala Eshtemoawui avāva̱ Ishbahlila ana pharāsera.
Jehudipāva̱na kapharā Jeredna Gedorli pharai, Socoli kapharā Heberlila, kala Zanoahwui avāva̱ Jekuthiellila ana pharāthathui.
Nahamwui azarva̱ Hodiahwui apreiva̱wui naomayarabing: Garmipashiwui avāva̱ Keilah eina Ma-acathbingwui avāva̱ Eshtemoana.
Shimonwui naomayarabing: Amnon, Rinnah, Ben-hanan, kala Tilon. Ishiwui naomayarabing: Zoheth eina Ben-zoheth.
Judahwui naomayara Shelahwui naobing: Lecahwui avāva̱ Er, Mareshahwui avāva̱ Laadah, kala Beth-ashbeali tāwon kachon kasāshi shimkhurbing;
kala Jokim, Cozebawui mibing kala Joash, eina Sorap Moabli munglaga Lehemli latunghaowa (hi achālakhawui khararchāna).
Hibing hi Netaim eina Gederahli okthuida ham kasābingna; athumwui awungali ngasoda awui ot sāsai.
kala awui nao Shallum, awui nao Mibsam, awui nao Mishma.
Mishmawui naomayarabing: Hamm-uel, awui nao Zaccur, awui nao Shime-i.
Shime-ina naomayara tharāda tharuk kala naongalāva̱ tharuk leisai; kha achināwui naomayarabing machungmana, Judahwui shimkhur thāda mamataisangthuwa.
Athumna kapampam: Beer-sheba, Moladah, Hazar-shual,
Bilhah, Ezem, Tolad,
Bethuel, Hormah, Ziklag,
Beth-marcaboth, Hazar-susim, Beth-biri, kala Sha-araim. Davidna mamungranglakha eina tangda hi athumwui keinungbing sāsai.
Kala athumwui kha̱bing chiya, Etam, Ain, Rimmon, Tochen kala Ashan keinung phangā,
hieina ngasoda athumwui kha̱bing eina keinung kuikhamareibing chi Baal tāshungda lei. Hibing hi athumwui kha̱pan sāsai kaji mithotwui lairikli kapihaida lei.
Meshobab, Jamlech, Joshah, Amaziahwui nao,
Joel, Jehu, chiya Joshibiahwui nao, Seraiahwui nao, Asi-elwui nao;
Eli-o-enai, Ja-akobah, Jeshohaiah, Asaiah, Adi-el, Jesimiel, Benaiah,
Shiphiwui nao Ziza, Allonwui nao Jedaiahwui nao, Shimriwui nao, Shemaiahwui nao—
aming hāngkahaibing hi shimkhurwui wungnaobingna, athumwui shimkhur reisanglaka.
Athumna Gedorwui zingsho ngavei vāshungda seihomphung phāvai,
ngalei katuma, seizat kaphā, mashālak kahai chingri va̱ri kahai ngalei samphanga; kaja chiwui khare mibing chi Hamwui mibing sāsai.

Aming eina kapi kahai hi Judahwui awunga Hezekiahna khamung atamli kharābingna, chili leikasā Me-unimbing eina athumwui kachonshimla sakhayāngmihaida kashamshokhailaga athumwui pam chili seizat phālak kahaiwui vang aja eina tangda athumna pamda lei.
Athumwui ngachaili Simeonwui mi shāphangā, athumwui kathānabing sāda Pelatiah, Ne-ariah, Rephaiah, kala Uzziel, athum Ishiwui naomayarabingna thānda Seir kaphungli vai;
kala Amaleknaobing, kaikha yāmshok kahaibing chi sāthatserhailaga aja eina tangda athum apam chili pamda lei.
Judahna malinglaksālala, kala wungpam chi awui eina shoklala khararyar Josephwui ngasāhaowa).
Israelwui naochizai Reubenwui naomayarabing: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron, kala Carmi.
Joelwui naomayarabing: Shemaiah, awui naomayara Gog, awui naomayara Shime-i,
awui nao Micah, awui nao Re-aiah, awui nao Baal,
awui nao Be-erah, Assyriawui awunga Tilgath-pilneserna phātopli tukvā kahai china, Reubenshi wungva̱ akhana.
Awui athei shimkhurbing thot-thot eina kashān tharan: wungva̱ Je-iel, eina Zechariahna,
kala Azazwui nao Bela, Shemawui nao, Nebo eina Baal-meon vāshungda Aroerli kasom Joelwui nao athumna.
Ana zingshoshong Euphrateswui lamhāng zangkhavai vāshungdala soma, kaja athumwui sha̱kei Gilead ngaleili kachungkha mataisanghaowa.
Saulwui atamli athumna Hagpashili athumna rai sāda yuikahaiwui vang Gileadwui zingsho kuimareida athumwui kachonshimli apama.
Gadwui naomayarabingna athumwui lākhavāk Bashan ngaleili Salecah tāshungda pama:
Joel ashiwui wungva̱na, Shapham wungphemna, Janai eina Shaphatna Bashanli pāna.
Avāva̱wui shimkhurwui theisābing: Michael, Meshullam, Sheba, Jorai, Jacan, Zia, kala Eber, athum shinina.
Hibing hi Huriwui naomayara Abihailwui naobingna: Abihailwui nao Jaroah, awui nao Gilead, awui nao Michael, awui naomayara Jeshishai, awui naomayara Jahdo, awui naomayara Buz;
Abdi-elwui nao Ahi, awui nao Gunina avāva̱wui shimkhurwui alungli khareiyana;
athumna Gilead eina Bashanli khalei kha̱, Sharonwui seihomphung khaleiram saikorali vākatang eina tangda athumna chili soma.
Ashiwui thotchan hi, Judahwui awunga Jothamwui, kala Israel awunga Jeroboamwui atamli kapisangser kahaina.

Reubenshi, Gadshi, kala Manasseh shang ngayarpakwui alungli rai khamarāka mi zangsai, kazei chāngvei phungkathei kala malā singkathei, rai vatheiran kathethema thinghangmatida mati shāshini hangtharuk ngalāng ngalāngda ngachon kashapa leisai.
Athumna Hagrinao, Jeturnao, kala Nodabnaoli rai atai;

athumli ngararda khangachon samkaphang tharan, Hagrinao kala athumli khangasobing saikora athumwui pāngli horsangmi; kaja athumna rai ngararmahunglakha Vareli ngakaowa, kala athumwui kapo chi ana mayāmi, khikhalajila ali athumna shitsanga.
Athumwui sha̱kei ngapaikhuida khuiung kahai chiya: Ut thinghangphangā, yao lakh khani thing hangphangā, gadhā thingkhani, kala mi lakh akha kharing eina tukkhui.
Varena ngararmihaoda mi kachungkha sāthata. Kala athumna raithā kahai atam eina tangda chili apama.
Manassehwui shang ngakaipak ngalei chili pama; athumwui mi kachungkhahaoda, Bashan eina thuilaga Baal-hermon, Senir, kala Harmon Kaphung tāshunga.
Athum shangwui wungva̱bing chiya: Epher, Ishi, Eliel, Azri-el, Jeremiah, Hodaviah, kala Jahdi-el, athum hiya rai kapingpinga, aming kazata shimkhurwui wungva̱bingna.
Kha athumna avāva̱ ngarāwui Vareli ngakaishida, athumwui mangāli Varena shimān ngasak kahai apam chiwui kameoli kaphaning mibingwui thāda khayorva̱wui otsakli zathaowa.

Chiwui vang eina Varena Assyriawui awunga Pulli kaja Tilgath-pilneserli ningli kasatsangda, ana tukthuihaowa, tukthui kahaibing: Reubennao, Gadnao, kala Manasseh shang ngakaipakta tukphunglaga, Halah, Habor, Hara, kala Gozan kongli chipamda arui eina tangda lei.
Kohathwui naomayarabing: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, kala Uzziel.
Amramwui naomayara: Aaron, Moses kala azara̱ Mariam. Aaronwui naobing: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazer, kala Ithamar.
Eleazarna Phinehaswui avāva̱na, Phinehasna Abishuawuina,
Abishuana Bukkiwui, Bukkina Uzziwui,
Uzzina Zerahiahwui, Zerahiahna Meraiothwui,
Meraiothna Amariahwui, Amariahna Ahitubwui avāva̱na.
Ahitubna Zadokwui, Zadokna Ahima-azwui,
Ahima-azna Azariahwui, Azariahna Johananwui,
kala Johananna Azariahwui avāva̱na, (Solomonna Jerusalemli sakakā shim chili pāngmon sāda otram khangatha̱ chi ana).
Azariahna Amariahwui avāva̱na, Amariahna Ahitubwui,
Ahitubna Zadokwui, Zadokna Shallumwui,
Shallumna Hilkiahwui, Hilkiahna Azariahwui,
Azariahna Seraiahwui, Seraiahna Jehozadakwui avāva̱na;
kala
Hibing hi Gershomwui naomayarabingwui amingna: Libni eina Shime-i.
Kohathwui naomayarabing: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, kala Uzziel.
Merariwui naomayarabing: Mahli eina Mushi. Hibing hi athum avāva̱ ngarāwui athishurda Levibingwui shimkhurna.
Gershomwui naobing: Libni, awui nao Jahath, awui nao Zimmah,
awui nao Joah, awui nao Iddo, awui nao Zerah, awui nao Je-atheraina.
Kohathwui naobing: awui naomayara Amminadab, awui naomayara Corah, awui naomayara Assir,
awui nao Elkanah, awui nao Ebiasaph, awui nao Assir,
awui nao Tahath, awui nao Uriel, awui nao Uzziah, kala awui nao Shaulna.
Elkanahwui naomayarabing: Amasai eina Ahimoth,
awui naomayara Elkanah, awui naomayara Zophai, awui naomayara Nahath,
awui nao Eliab, awui nao Jerobam, awui naoli Elkanah hoi.
Samuelwui naomayarabing: Joel hi awui naochizaina, kakhaneli Abijah hoi.
Merariwui naomayarabing: Mahli, awui naomayara Libni, awui naomayara Shime-i, awui naomayara Uzzah,
awui nao Shime-a, awui nao Haggiah, kala awui naoli Asaiah hoi.
Mibing hi
Solomonna Jerusalemli
Mibing kala athumwui naomayara otram khangathabing chi hina: Kohathbingwui naomayarabing: Joelwui naomayara laa kathema Heman, Joelli Samuelna pharai,
ali Elkanahnana, ali Jerohamna, ali Elielna, ali Toahna,
ali Zuphna, ali Elkanahna, ali Mahathna, ali Amasaina,
ali Elkanahna, ali Joelna, ali Azariahna, ali Zephaniahna,
ali Tahathna, ali Assirna, ali Ebiasaphna, ali Corahna,
ali Izharna, ali Kohathna, ali Levina, ali Israelna pharai;
kala awui yāshong khanganinga achinā Asaphli Berechiahna, ali Shime-ina,
ali Michaelna, ali Baaseiahna, ali Malchijahna,
ali Ethnina, ali Zerahna, ali Adaiahna,
ali Ethanna, ali Zimmahna, ali Shime-ina,
ali Jahathna, ali Gershomna, ali Levina pharai.
Uishong khanganinga achināngarā Merariwui naomayarabing: Ethanli Kishina pharai, ali Abdina, ali Malluchna,
ali Hashabiahna, ali Amaziahna, ali Hilkiahna,
ali Amzina, ali Bani alina, ali Shemerna,
ali Mahlina, ali Mushna, ali Merarina, ali Levina pharai;
kala athumwui achinā Levishi chinaongarāli Varewui shim tabernacleli otram ngatha̱ khavai kapangsanga.

Kha Aaron kala awui naomayarabingli tharmathengmeikap kaje pamwui rikkatāchigat kala nganamkaphā thao riktā khavai hanphutungli chigat ngasaka, kala Varewui rao Mosesna kaso kahai athishurda Israelwui vang pheomi khavai kachigat ot sai.
Hibing hi Aaronwui naomayarabingna: Aaronwui naomayara Eleazar, awui naomayara Phinehas, awui naomayara Abishua,
awui naomayara Bukki, awui naomayara Uzzi, awui naomayara Zerahiah,
awui naomayara Meraioth, awui naomayara Amariah, awui naomayara Abitub,
awui naomayara Zadok, kala awui naomayara Ahima-azna.
Judah ngaleiwui Hebron eina chiwui seihomphung chili athumli miya;
ram chiwui keinung eina kha̱bing kala luibing chiya Jephunnehwui nao Calebli mihaowa.
Aaronwui naomayarabingli yāmngayin khavaiwui keinungbing hi miya: chiya, Hebron, Libnah, kala chiwui seihomphung, Jattir, Esthtemoa kala chiwui seihomphung;
Hilen kala chiwui seihomphung, Debir kala chiwui seihomphung,
Ashan kala chiwui seihomphung, Beth-shemesh kala chiwui seihomphung;
kala Benjamin shangwui Geba kala chiwui seihomphung, Alemeth kala chiwui seihomphung, Anathoth kala chiwui seihomphung. Athumwui keinung saikora athumwui shimkhur vāpeida tharāda kathuma.
Kohath shimkhurbing makhangarinbingli, shang-shangwui kalā yanglaga Manasseh shang ngakaipakwui eina keinung tharā mi.
Issachar, Asher, Naphtali, kala Bashanli khalei Manassehwui eina Gershom shimkhurbingwui athishurda yartākhami keinung tharāda kathumna.
Reuben, Gad, kala Zebulunwui eina Merari shimkhurbingwui athishurda yartākhami keinung tharāda khanina.
Chithāda Israelwui mibingna Levi shangli keinungbing eina seihomphung ngasoda mi.
Athumna kalā yanglaga, Judah, Simeon kala Benjamin shangbingwui eina aming eina hāngkahai keinungbing hila mi.
Kohath shimkhur kaikhava Ephraim shangwui ayarli athumwui keinung thari lei.
Athumli yāmngayin khavaiwui vang khami keinungbing chiya: Ephraim kaphungramli khalei Shechem kala chiwui seihomphung, Gezer eina chiwui seihomphung,
Jokme-am kala chiwui seihomphung, Beth-horon kala chiwui seihomphung,
Aijalon kala chiwui seihomphung, Gath-rimmon kala chiwui seihomphung,
kala Manasseh shang ngakaipakwui eina samkaphang, Aner kala chiwui seihomphung, Bile-am kala chiwui seihomphung hibing hina Kohath shimkhurbing ram mikharānbingwui vangna.
Manassehshi ngakaipakwui eina Gershom mibingli khami: Bashanli khalei Golan kala chiwui seihomphung, Ashtaroth kala chiwui seihomphung;
Issachar shangwui eina khami: Kedesh kala chiwui seihomphung, Daberath kala chiwui seihomphung,
Ramoth kala chiwui seihomphung, Anem kala chiwui seihomphung;
Asher shangwui eina khami: Mashal kala chiwui seihomphung, Abdon kala chiwui seihomphung,
Hukok kala chiwui seihomphung, Rehob kala chiwui seihomphung;
Naphtali shangwui eina khami: Galileeli khalei Kedesh kala chiwui seihomphung; Hammon kala chiwui seihomphung, kala Kiriathaim kala chiwui seihomphung.
Merari shangwui makhangarinbingli yartākhami: Zebulun shangwui eina Rimmono kala chiwui seihomphung, Tabor kala chiwui seihomphung,
kala Jordan makānda Jerichowui zingshoshong khalei Reubenshangwui eina: khangaili khalei Bezer kala chiwui seihomphung, Jahzah kala chiwui seihomphung,
Kedemoth kala chiwui seihomphung, Mepha-ath kala chiwui seihomphung;
Gad shangwui eina: Gileadli khalei Ramoth kala chiwui seihomphung, Mahanaim eina chiwui seihomphung,
Heshbon kala chiwui seihomphung, kala Jazer eina chiwui seihomphungbing.
Issacharwui naomayarabing: Tola, Puah, Jashub, kala Shimron, athum mati.

Tolawui naomayarabing: Uzzi, Raphaiah, Jeri-el, Jahmai, Ibsam, kala Shemuel, athum hi avāva̱ Tola shimkhurwui wungva̱bingna, athumwui thotli rai kapingabingna; Davidna munglakha, athumwui mashing thingmaga̱da khani shātharuk leisai.
Uzziwui naomayara Izrahiah. Kala Izrahiahwui naomayarabing: Michael, Obadiah, Joel, kala Isshiah, athum phangā hi wungva̱sera;
athumli ngasoda, athumwui thot athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhurbing, khum khum eina raikathata thingthumrāda tharuk leisai; kaja athumwui preiva̱̱ naongarā kachungkha leisai.
Mithotwui lairikli kapi kahai athishurda ashiwui athei-asā Issacharwui shangli, rai kapingpingabing thinghangchishatta shini leisai.
Benjaminwui naomayarabing: Bela, Becher, kala Jedia-el, athum kathumna.
Belawui naomayarabing: Ezbon, Uzzi, Uzziel, Jerimoth, kala Iri, athum phangā avāva̱ shimkhurbingwui wungva̱, kapinga mimānga; kala mithot lairikli kapi kahai thingmaga̱da khani thumrāda matina.
Becherwui naomayarabing: Zemirah, Joash, Eliezer, Eli-o-enai. Omri, Jeremoth, Abijah, Anathoth, kala Alemethna. Athum hi Becherwui naosera;
kala mithotwui lairikli kapi kahai thot-thotwui avāva̱ shimkhurbingwui wungva̱bing ngasāda rai kapingabing thingmaga̱ shākhanina.
Jadia-elwui naomayarabing: Bilhan, Bilhanwui naobing: Jeush, Benjamin, Ehud, Chenaanah, Zethan, Tarshish kala Ahishahar,
Saikora hi Jedia-elwui naomayarabing avāva̱ shimkhurwui wungva̱bingwui athishurda rai kapingabing, raili vākashapbing, thingztharāda shini shākhanina.
Shuppim eina Huppim Irwui naomayarana; kala Hushim Aherwui naomayarana.
Naphtaliwui naomayarabing: Jahzi-el, Guni, Jezer, kala Shallum athum Bilhahwui naotheina.
Manassehwui naomayarabing: Asri-elli Arameanpava̱ angashirva̱na kapharāna: preiva̱̱ hina Gileadwui avāva̱ Machirli pharai.
Machirna Huppimwui eina Shuppimwui vang preiva̱̱ phami. Azarva̱wui ming Maacah hoi. Kala kakhanewui ming Zelophehad hoi, awui naongalāva̱mang kachungkha lei.
Machirwui preiva̱̱ Maacahna kapharā naomayara chili ava̱va̱na Peresh phokmi; agatoli Sheresh hoi, awui naomayarabing chi Ulam eina Rakemna.
Ulamwui naomayarabing: Bedan. Hibing hi Manassehwui naomayara Machirwui naomayara Gileadwui naomayarabingna.
Azarva̱ Hammolechethna Ishhod, Abi-ezer, kala Mahlah athumli pharai.
Shemidawui naomayarabing, Ahian, Shechem, Likhi, kala Aniamna.
Ephraimwui naomayarabing: Shuthelah kala awui nao Bered, awui naomayara Tahath, awui naomayara El-eadah, awui naomayara Tahath,
awui naomayara Zabad, awui naomayara Shuthelah, kala Ezer, eina Ele-ad, anili Gadwui ngalei chili kapharābingna sāthathaowa, kaja anina athumwui sha̱kei tāngapona.
Chiwui vang avāva̱ Ephraimna kasāngkha chapngachai kala achinā ngarāna ali ning mathān khavai rāhangphanepmi.
Kala Ephraimna apreiva̱li ngasoda mayarnao akha pharālui; awui ming Beriah phokmi, kaja shimkhurli kalāshāt rātāhaowa.
Anaongalāva̱li Sheerah hoi, Beth-horonwui kala Uzzen-sheerahwui Atung eina Azing ana sākāthathui.
Rephah hi anaomayarana, Rephahwui nao Resheph, awui nao Telah, awui nao Tahan,
awui nao Ladan, awui nao Ammihud, awui nao Elishama,
awui nao Nun, awui nao Joshuana.
Athumwui shimlui kala rampānna Bethel kala chiwui keinungbing, zingshoshongwui Naaran, zingtunshongwui Gezer kala chiwui keinungbing, Shechem kala chiwui keinungbing, Ayyah kala chiwui keinungbing;

chili lāngda Manassbingwui leiret, Beth-shean kala chiwui keinungbing, Taanach kala chiwui keinungbing, Megiddo kala chiwui keinungbing, Dor kala chiwui keinungbing. Hili Israelwui naomayara Josephwui naomayarabing pāna.
Asherwui naomayarabing: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah, kala azarva Serah.
Beriahwui naomayarabing: Heber, kala Birzaithwui avāva̱ Malchi-el.
Heberna Japhlet, Shomer, Hotham, kala athumwui azarva̱ Shuawui avāva̱na.
Japhletwui naomayarabing: Pasach, Bimhal, kala Ashvath. Hi Japhletwui naobingna.
Achinā Shemerwui naomayarabing: Rohgah, Jehubbah, kala Aram.
Achinā Helemwui naomayarabing: Zophah, Imna, Shelesh kala Amal.
Zophahwui naomayarabing: Suah, Harnepher, Shual, Beri, Imrah,
Bezer, Hod, Shamma, Shilshah, Ithran kala Be-era.
Jetherwui naomayarabing: Jephunneh, Pispa, kala Ara.
Ullawui naomayarabing: Arah, Hanniel, kala Rizia.

Athum saikora Asherwui mibingna, avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱, wungnaobingwui khareiyabingna. Athumwui mashing mithot lairikli kapikakhui athishurda ming chankahai raili vākashap mi thingmaga̱da tharukna.
Benjaminwui naochizaili Bela, kakhaneli Ashbel, kakathumali Aharah,
khamateli Nohah, kala kaphangāli Rapha hoi.
Belawui naomayarabing: Addar, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan kala Huram.
Hibing hi Ehudwui naomayarabingna (athum hi Gebali kapān, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhurbingwui kathānabing, Manahathli tukvā kahaibingna):
Naaman, Ahijah kala Gera, chiya Heglam, Uzza eina Ahihudwui avāva̱.
Hushim eina Baarali pāngkahaiwui thili, Moab ngaleili Shaharaimwui naomayarabing leisai;
Apreiva̱̱ Hodeshna kapharā naomayarabing: Jobab, Zibi-a, Mesha, Malcam,
Jeuz, Sachia, kala Mirmah. Naomayarabing hi shang-shangwui kathānabingna.
Hushimna kapharābing: Abitub eina Elpaal.
Elpaalwui naomayarabing: Eber, Misham, kala Shemed, ana Ono eina Lod kala chiwui keinungbing sakai.
Biriah eina Shema (Gathbingli kasham kahaiya Aijalonli kapama shangwui kathāna khanina);
kala Ahio, Shashak, kala Jeremoth.
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Michael, Ishpah kala Joha athum hi Beriahwui naomayarabingna.
Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Izliah kala Jobab, athum hi Elpaalwui naomayarabingna.
Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
Eli-enai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, kala Shimrath, athum hi Shime-iwui naomayarabingna.
Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Anthothijah,
Iphdeiah, kala Penuel, athum hi Shashakwui naobingna.
Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Ja-areshiah, Elijah kala Zichri, athum hi Jerohamwui naomayarabingna.
Hibing hi thot-thotwui athishurda shang-shangwui kathānabingna. Athumna Jerusalemli pamsai.
Gibeonshāvā Je-ielna Gibeonli pānsai, apreiva̱wui ming Maacahna.
Awui naochizai Abdonna, chiwui thili Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zekher,
kala Mikloth (ana Shime-ahwui avāva̱na). Athumla atam chitharan, athei-asābingli ngasoda athei-asābingli kāroda Jerusalemli pānsai.
Nerna Kishwui avāva̱na, Kishna Saulwui, Saulna Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab kala Eshbaalwui avāva̱na.
Jonathanwui nao Merib-baalna; kala Merib-baalna Micahwui avāva̱na.
Micahwui naomayarabing: Pithon, Melech, Tarea kala Ahaz.
Ahazna Jehoaddahwui avāva̱na; kala Jehoaddahna Alemeth, Azmaveth kala Zimri longwui avāva̱na. Kala Zimrina Mozawui avāva̱na.
Mozana Bine-awui avāva̱na, awui nao Raphahna, Ele-asahna awui naona, ana Azelwui avāva̱na.
Azelwui naomayara tharuk lei, athumwui ming: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, She-ariah, Obadiah, kala Hananna. Hi Azelwui naomayarasera.
Achinā Eshekwui naobing: Naochizai Ulam, kakhane Jeush, kakathuma Eliphelet.
Ulamwui naobing: rai kapingpinga, malā singkathei, naongarā kala ara̱-azā shākha hangphangā kāshunga. Athum hi Benjaminwui mibingna.
Athumwui ram keinungli ungpamluikharebing chiya, Israelnaobing, pāngmonbing, Levibing, kala Khorumshim khamayonbing china.
Kala Judah, Benjamin, Ephraim, Manassehwui mi kaikhana ngayarda Jerusalemli pāna.
Ammihudwui naomayara Uthai, Omriwui naomayara, Imriwui naomayara, Baniwui naomayara, Judahwui naomayara, Perezwui naomayarabingwui eina kharāna.
Shilopashi: Naochizai Asaiah kala awui naomayarabing.
Zerahwui naomayarabing: Jeuel kala athumwui theisābing, shātharuk hangchiko.
Benjaminshi: Meshullamwui nao Sallu, chiya Hodaviahwui nao, Hassenuahwui nao;
Jerohamwui nao Ibneiah, Uzziwui nao Elah, Michriwui nao kala Shephatiahwui nao Meshullam, Reuelwui nao, chiya Ibnijahwui nao;
athumwui athei-asā thot-thotwui athishurda shāchiko hangphangāda tharukna. Athum saikora hi avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui athishurda kathānabingna.
Pāngmonbing: Jedaiah, Jehoiarib, Jachin,
Hilkiahwui nao Azariah, Meshullamwui nao, Zadokwui nao, Meraiothwui nao, Varewui shimli otvabingwui kathāna kasā Ahitubwui nao;
kala Jerohamwui nao Adaiah, Pashhurwui nao, Malchijahwui nao, Maasaiwui nao, Adi-elwui nao Jahzerahwui nao, Meshullamwui nao, Meshillemithwui nao, Immerwui nao,
athumwui theisāli lāngda, avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui kathānabing zangda thingkha shāshini hangtharukna, kala Varewui shimli otram ngatha̱mi kashapmānga.
Levipashi: Hasshubwui naomayara Shemaiah, Azrikamwui naomayara, Hashabiahwui naomayara, Merariwui naomayarabing:
Bakbakkar, Heresh, Galal, Mathaniah; Micawui nao, Zichriwui nao, Asaphwui naona;
Shemaiahwui nao Obadiah, Galalwui nao, Jeduthunwui nao, kala Asawui nao Berechiah, Netophathshiwui kha̱li kasoma Elkanahwui nao.
Ngavei khamayonbing: Shallum, Akkub, Talmon, Ahiman, kala ashi theisābing (Shallumna kathānana),
athumna awungawui zingsho ngaveishong pama, Levibingwui shim khamayonabing chi hibingna.
Corewui nao Shallum, Ebiasaphwui nao, Corahwui nao, kala avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui theisābing, kaja Corahpashina otram khangatha̱wui ot sai, kala avāva̱ ngarāna
Thuikahai atamli Eleazarwui nao Phinehasna athumwui khamunga sāsai, kala
Meshelemiahwui nao Zechariahna khorum khavai kachonshimwui zangkhavai khamayona sāsai.

Ngavei zangkhavai khamayona kapangkakhui athum shākhani tharāda khaniya. Athum thothotwui athishurda kachichā ramwui lairikli kapiserhaida lei. David eina marān Samuelna athumli sākharān otphun hi sāngasaka.
Chiwui vang eina athumna kala athumwui naomayarabingna
Ngavei khamayonabing china achikun mati, zingsho, zingtun, atung, azingli mayona;
kala athumwui theisābingna atam atam athishurda kashinethang ichichā ramwui eina rā-rā jiya;
kaja, khamayonabingwui kathāna Levibing chi Khorumshimwui kābing kala lanshimla athumna mayona.
Athumna Khorumshim khanganaili pi; kaja mayon khavai kala ngathor kachida chi shomi khavai otpam hila athumli chisina.
Athumwui ngachaili kaikhana khorkhong singa, kaja khuikashok khuikazang tharan shānkhuiserser ji.
Khangateibing china, pamkhong kathā, kathara khorkhong saikora, kala khamanaka mathir, drakhāra̱, thao, nganamkaphāphā otyur, hibing hi yangkhavai kapangkhui.
Khangateibing, pāngmonwui naomayarabing kaikhana nganamkaphā otyur khamanāta sai.
Corahpa Shallumwui naochizai Mattithiah kaho Levi china khamui ahang kasema sai.
Kohathbingwui theisā kaikhana sabbath kachida tableli haikhavai maiyan khamui sai.
Levibingwui avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurbingwui kathānabing khangatei ot masālakla Khorumshim lungli laa kasābing chi hina, kaja ngashun ngayā athumna otpamli lei.
Hi Jerusalemli kapama, thot-thotwui athishurda kathānabing, avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui Leviwui wungva̱bing china.
Gibeonshavā Je-iel kaho chi Gibeonli pamsai. Apreiva̱wui ming Maacah hoi;
kala awui naochizaili Abdon hoi, chiwui thili Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zechariah, kala Mikloth;
Miklothna Shime-amwui avāva̱na; athum theisāli ngasoda athum hi Jerusalemli khalei athumwui theisābingli yangngasunda pama.
Nerna Kishwui avāva̱na, Kishna Saulwui, Saulna Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab kala Eshbaalwui avāva̱na.
Jonathanwui naomayara Merib-baalna, kala Merib-baalna Micahwui avāva̱na.
Micahwui naobing: Pithon, Melech, Tahre-a, kala Ahaz.
Ahazna Jarahwui avāva̱na, Jarahna Alemethwui, Azmaveth kala Zimriwui avāva̱na. Zimrina Mozawui avāva̱na.
Mozana Bine-awui avāva̱na, kala Rephaiah awui naona, awui nao Ele-asah, kala Azelna awui naona.
Azelwui naomayara tharuk leisai athumwui aming chiya: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, She-ariah, Obadiah, kala Hanan, athum hi Azelwui naomayarabingna.
Philistinenaobingna Saul eina anaomayarabinglila ngaphankhuida awui naomayara Jonathan, Abinadab, kala Malchishualila sāthatse haowa.
Rai pangkhangai panghaida Saulli malā eina kapza̱haowa.

Chieina Saulna awui raisāri phungkhame chili, “Nawui raighai sutshokta ili tothathaolu, chi maningakha ahui marimkashokbing hina ili zeingaruishilak eina sahenra.” da hānga. Kha raisāri phungkhami china ngacheenahaida mamayāthuwa. Chiwui vang eina Saulna awui raighai khuilaga khalatta ngaronthathaowa.
Awui raisāri phungme china Saul thikahai chi kathei eina ala akhalatta raighai eina ngaronthathaowa.
Chithāda, Saulla anaomayara kathum, ashi shimkhur thitkha sāhaowa.
Leiwukli kapam Israelnaobingna, Saulla, anaomayarabingla thiser kahaiwui vang ashi raimi yāmkahai chi theilaga, athumwui keinung chihohaida yāmserhaowa; kala Philistinenaobingna chili apamhaowa.
Akhama kathā Philistinenaobingna ot akhangapon atamli Saulla, anaomayarabingla Gilboa kaphungli thiserhaisai.
Athumna Saulwui raisāri raikhui, kala akui rangkhui; laga mibingna kala athumwui meoma̱na shākhavai pao mida apam kachiva̱li paome shivata.
Awui raisāri athumwui khorumshimli haihai, kala akui Dagonwui shimli hokthanghai.
Kha Saulli kasā chi Jabesh-gileadwui mibingna kashā eina,
rai khamarākabingna vāda Saulwui angun kala anaomayarabingwui angun akhui; kala aram Jabeshli khalei shirimthingpheili ara̱kui chifahaida zimiksho shinithang kakhum eina pama.
kala
Achālakha Saulna awunga salakhala, Israel mibingli thānshokkhame chi nana; kala nawui
Chiwui vang Israelwui kathāna saikorana Hebronli awungawuili vai; kala
Jebusnaobingna Davidli, “Na hili marāpaimara” da hānghaowa. Chithālala Davidna Zion, chiya Davidwui keinung chi ngapaikhui.
Davidna, “Jebusnaobingli shaothatkharepā china raimi kathāna sāra.” da hānga. Kala Zeruiahwui nao Joabna sāthatrithui kajiwui vang ana kathāna sāhaowa.
Davidna raipan khamakang chili kapamwui vang Davidwui keinung da kahona.
Keinung chiwui kuikhamarei Millo eina thuilaga kuimareimitta ngaveiphinhaowa; kala mavākapei keinung chiwui pambing chi Joabna chiphokhui.
Ashangva̱wui
Hi Davidwui kapinga raimibingwui otsakna: Hachmonwui Jashobe-am chi kapinga mi kathumwui
Kapinga kathumwui kakhane chi Ahohli khalei Dodowui nao Eleazarna.
Philistinenaobingna rai saukida kakazip tharan ana Davidli ngasoda Pas-dammimli pamsai. Luipam akhali nāpai kachungkha matheisai, kala athumna Philistinenaobingwui eina yāmhaowa.
Kha ana
Raithana thumrāwui ngachaili athum kathumna, Davidna pamkhavai Adullamwui lungkhurli vai; chitharan Philistinepashi Rephaim tampākli rairum sāpamsai.
Atam chili Davidna raipanlungli pamsai; kala Philistinewui raimi Bethlehemli leisai.
Davidna mangngaireoreo eina, “Iyavo, Bethlehemwui ngavei ngalemli khalei ra̱khong chiwui tara̱ mimangsi kaja chāng!” da hānga.
Chieina kapinga kathum china Philistinenaobingwui rairumphung muivālaga Bethlehemwui ngaveipheili khalei ra̱khong chiwui tara̱ asokkhuilaga Davidli khuiungmi. Kha Davidna chi mamangmana; ana

“Vare mangāli ina hithāda masālakmara. Mirin hamlaga khavabingwui ashee ina mangrala? Kaja athumwui mirin hamlaga hi khuikhaungna.” Chiwui vang eina ana mamangthuwa. Kapinga kathum china hikathā otsakbing sāshapa.
Chitharan Joabwui achinā Abishaina thumrāwui kathāna sai. Ana mi shākathumli kazei eina rungthathaida, athum kathumwui thāda masot samphanga.
Thumrā chiwui ngachaili a aming zatmeithuida ana kathāna sai; kha athum kathumwui kaping makashungmana.
Jehoiadawui naomayara Benaiah, Kabzeelli khalei rai khamarāka mina

Kala khuining phangā kajui Egyptwui mi akhoka akhali shaothata. Egyptpa chiwui pāngli kazei rā-kapemrikha akha singsai; kha Benaiahna khāmshui singlaga awui kazei chi angapaikhui, kala mipa chili akhalattawui kazei chieina rungthata.
Jehoiadawui nao Benaiahna hikathā ot sāda, kapinga kathumwui thāda masot samphanga.
Thumrāwui ngachaili aming zatlaka, kha kathumwui chithāda makashungmana. Davidna awui ngakkhame sāngasaka.
Raimibingwui ngachaili kapingabing chiya, Joabwui achinā Asahel, Dodowui naomayara Bethlehempa Elhanan,
Harodwui Shammoth, Pelonwui Helez,
Ikkeshwui naomayara Tekoali khalei Ira, Anathotwui Abi-ezer,
Hushathpa Sibbecai, Ahohpa Ilai,
Netophahwui Maharai, Baanahwui naomayara Netophahpa Heled,
Benjamin shang Gileadli khalei Ribaiwui naomayara Ithai, Pirathonwui Benaiah,
Gaash kongpheili khaleiya Hurai, Arbathpa Abiel;
Baharumwui Azmaveth, Sha-albonwui Eliahba,
Gizonpa Hashem, Hararpa Shageewui naomayara Jonathan,
Hararpa Sacharwui naomayara Ahiam, Urwui naomayara Eliphal,
Mecherathpa Hepher, Pelonpa Ahijah,
Carmelwui Hezro, Ezbaiwui naomayara Naarai,
Nathanwui achinā Joel, Hagriwui naomayara Mibhar,
Ammonpa Zelek, Be-erothwui Naharai, Zeruiahwui nao Joabwui raisāri phungme,
Ithriwui Ira eina Gereb,
Hitpa Uriah, Ahlaiwui naomayara Zabad,
Reubenpa Shizawui naomayara Adina, Reuben shangwui kathāna kala thumrāna ali ngasozata;
Maacahwui naomayara Hanan, kala Mithnawui Joshaphat,
Ashteratpa Uzzia, Aroer shangwui Hothamwui naomayara khani Shama eina Je-iel,
Shimriwui naomayara Jedia-el, kala agato Tizipa Joha,
Mahavipa Eliel, kala Elna-amwui naomayara khani Jeribai eina Joshaviah, Moabpa Ithmah,
Eliel, Obed, Ja-asiel, athum Mezoba-itenaosera.
Davidna Ziklagli leilakha Kishwui naomayara Saulwui vang eina phongshar eina mazatkhaleng atamli, kharā mibing chi hina; athum hi kapingabingwui ngachaili zangda athumna ali raili ngachonmi.
Athum malā kasing mimānga, kala malāthingla, kachakla, ui-ui yā-yā kāpthei; Benjaminshi shang Saulwui theisāsera.
Kathāna chi Ahi-ezerna, awui thi Joash, Gibeahli khalei Shemaahwui naomayara tha̱thuiya; kala Azmavethwui naomayara khani Jezi-el eina Pelet; Beracah, Anothotpa Jehu,
Gibeonwui Ishmaiah, a hi kapinga thumrāwui ngachaili akhana kala thumrāwui kathānana; Jeremiah, Jahaziel, Johanan, Gederahpa Jozabad,
Eluzai, Jerimoth, Bealiah, Shemariah, Haruphpa Shephatiah;
Elkanah, Isshiah, Azarel, Jo-ezer, Corah shangwui Jashobe-am;
Gedorli khalei Jerohamwui naomayara Joelah eina Zebadiah.
Davidna lamhāngli khamakang raipanlungli leilakha Gadpashi; chiya rai kapinga, raisak kathema, kazei kala chāngvei kasing khamanāngabingmānga, azakla kazingkha̱ kathā, khayongla ngahong chao kathā:
Kathāna Ezer, kakhane Obadiah, kakathuma Eliab,
khamate Mishmannah, kaphangā Jeremiah,
katharuka Attai, kashine Eliel,
kachishata Johanan, kachiko Elzabad,
kathara Jeremiah, tharāda akhapāna Machbannai athumna Davidwuili vai.
Gad shangwui mi hi raimi kathāna mānga, teokhameibingna shāshāwui, hakkhameibingna thingthingwuina.
Athumna, kachāng khare atamli, kong phongshilongda leilakha Jordan kankāda tampākli leikasābingli zingsho zingtun kashamvāserhaowa.
Benjamin eina Judahwui mi kaikhana Davidwuili vai.

Davidna shokngarokta hānga, “Nathumna ili khamashit eina ngachonmi khavai kharaakha iwui ning nathumli horsangchaora; kha iwui khayon maleilala yansaida yangkashibingwui pāngli horsangmi khavai kharaakha ishāvā ngarāwui Varena theiranu, kala ana hāngmachinranu.”
Chiwui thili Amasai, thumrāwui kathāna chiwuitungli Manglāna zangmida, ana hānga:
“Ithum nawuina, O David;
nawui sāchingra, O Jessewui nao!
Chingrihairanu,
nali khangachonbinglila chingrihairanu!
Kaja nawui Varena nali ngachonmi.”
Chieina Davidna athumli khuisangda otva̱ sangasaksera.

Davidna Philistinenaobingli ngasoda Saulli rai sākhavai khavā atamli Manassehwui mi kaikha rāyāmsanga. (Chithālala Davidna mangachonmana, kaja Philistinewui khamungabingna ngasanlaga, “Ithumli thikhavai, awui akhavā Saulwui mijang asāhaora” jihaowa).
Ana Ziklagli khavā eina Manassehwui mibingna Davidli rākazangbing: Adnah, Jozabad, Jedia-el, Michael, Jozabad, Elihu, kala Zillethai athum hi Manasseh shangwui raimi thingkhawui khareiyana.
Ngaponzā kazatbingli Davidna khangarar tharan athumna ngachonmi, kaja, athum raikapinga kala raimi kathānabing mānga.
Thangkachida Davidli ngachonkhavai kharā mi machatlakmana; kala Varewui raimibing thāda shānla makhuithuwa.
Judahwui chāngvei kazei kaphungbing thingtharuk shāchishat.
Simeonshi raikapingbing, thingshini shākha.
Leviwui thingmati shātharuk.
Aaron shimkhurwui wungnao Jehoiadali ngasoda ashi thingkathum shāshini.
Kapinga yaronnao Zadokli ngasoda avāva̱ shimkhurwui raithanmebing maga̱da khani.
Benjaminshi, kaja Saulshi theisā, thingkathum, kha chiwui ngachaili athum kachungkhana Saulshi shimkhurli ngavapta leisai.
Ephraimpāshi shimkhurwui aming kazat, raili kaping-kapanga mi thingmaga̱ shāchishat.
Davidli awunga sangkhavai mingsinlaga hokakhui Manasseh shang ngayarpakwui eina thingtharāda chishat.
Atamwui athishurda Israelna sāphalungki kaji theithangkhamei Issacharwui kathānbing shākhanili ngasoda ashi theisā katonga.
Raili vākhamasuiya kala kazei chāngvei kaphunga, Davidli ning akha sāda ngachonkhame Zebulunwui mi thinghangphangā;
Naphtalishi kazei chāngvei kaphunga mi thingthumrāda shinili ngasoda raithān thingkha.
Raisāri ngavaiser kaje Danwui mi thingmaga̱da chishat shātharuk.
Raili vākhamasuiya Asherwui mi thinghangmati.
Jordan makānda khalei Reubenwui, Gadwui, kala Manassehwui ngayarpakwui eina, raisāri peida khalei mi lakh akha thingmaga̱na.

Rai kasābing athum saikorana raisāri shaksāriplaga Davidli Israel saikorawuitungli awunga sangasakchao khavai athumna Hebronli vai; chi tākam eina Israel khangateibingnala ning akha sāda Davidli awunga sangkhavai sai.
Athumna Davidli kathumthang ngasopamda phāshak phazā ngaruma, kaja achinā ngarāna athumwui vang khangarān saikora sāmi.

Kala luinganaili khaleibing, Issachar, Zebulun, kala Naphtaliwui eina kashakazā, sam, kashima khamui, drakhātheikao, drakhāra̱, thao, sei, yao, hikathāthā kachungkha, gadhā, ut, sigui, kala seivā eina phungrāmi, kaja Israelnaobingwui ringkaphā atamna.
Kala Israel yarui saikorali hānga, “Nathumna hi phāra jiakha, kala
Laga Saulwui atamli horhaikasā, Varewui ningkhami oko chi akhuiluisa.”
Yarui kazip saikorana chi phāra jihaoda mayāserhaowa.
Varewui ningkhami oko
Kala athumna Varewui ningkhami oko chi Abinadabwui shim eina akhuida seigari kadhar akhawuitungli khuiphunga. Uzzah eina Ahiona
David kala Israel saikora mathānthup eina Varewui mangāli, athumwui yang eina, sipa̱, tingteilā, phung, kortar kala talla̱ khongda laa sai.
Athumna Chidonwui lanpumli ungkashung eina Uzzahna pāng eina ningkhami oko chi yonkhui, kaja seiphei ngaphokta kongluiki jihaowa.
Kha Uzzahna ningkhami okoli kasingwui vang
Uzzahli sāthat kahaiwui vang David malungvāthaowa; kala aja eina tangda apam chili Perez-uzza da hoda lei.
Kala chithang, Davidna Vareli ngacheehaida hānga, “Kathāda ina Varewui ningkhami oko hi shimli khuiungpairakhala?”
Chieina ningkhami oko chi awui shim Davidwui keinungli makhuiungmana, kha Gittpa Obed-edomwui shimli khuizanghaowa.
Varewui ningkhami oko chi Obed-edomwui shimli kachāng kathum haihaisai; kala Obed-edomwui shimkhurlila ashiwui khalalei saikorali Varena somi.
Tyrewui awunga Hiramna Davidli paomebing chihovai; kala shim sākhavai cedarthingla, ngalung mistrila, thing mistrila chihovai.
Chi theilaga,
Jerusalemli leilakha pharākakhui naobingwui aming hina: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishu-a, Elpelet,
Nogah, Nepheg, Japhia,
Elishama, Beeliada, kala Eliphelet.
Chitharan Philistinenaobingna Rephaimwui tampākli ngaponzatsai.
Kala Davidna Vareli ngasana, “Philistinenaobingli mavāngararrakhala? Nana athumli iwui pāngli horsangmirala?” da khangahān eina,
Chieina ana Baal-perazimli vāda athumli yuihaowa, kala Davidna, “Kong kashok thāda yangkashibingli Varena ipāng eina yuingasakhaira” da hānga. Chiwui vang eina apam chili Baal-perazim da hoi.
Yangkashebingna athumwui vare nothaserhaida, Davidna riktā ngasakhaowa.
Davidna Vareli ngasankhalui tharan, Varena hānga. “Athumwui thili mavālu, kha kuikhuilaga balsam thing khalei chili kāroda athumli ungngararlu.
Kala balsam thingrong tungli mi kazatkhon kashā tharan nathumna shokngararlu; kaja, Philistinenaobingli sāthat khavai Varena rida vahaira.”
Varena kakaso athishurda Davidna sai, kala Gibeon eina thuida Gezer vāshungda Philistinenaobingli sāthata.
Davidwui mingkhamayāng ngalei saikorali vāshunga, kala
Kala Davidna hānga, “Levinaobing maningla Varewui ningkhami oko khipānakha maphungpaimana, kaja
Kala
Kala Davidna Aaronwui naomayara eina Levinaobingli kazipkhui:
Kohathshi shimkhurwui wungva̱ Urielna thānda achinābing shākha maga̱,
Merarishiwui wungva̱ Asaiahna thānda shākhani maga̱,
Gershomshiwui wungva̱ Joelna thānda shākha thumrā.
Eli-zaphanshiwui wungva̱ Shemaiahna thānda shākhani;
Hebronshiwui wungva̱ Elielna thānda hangchishat;
Uzzielshiwui wungva̱ Amminadabna thānda shākha tharāda khanina.
Chiwui thili Davidna pāngmonbing Zadok eina Abiathar, kala Levipa Uriel, Asaiah, Joel, Shemaiah, Eliel, kala Amminadabli vāhokhui ngasakta,
athumli hānga, “Nathum hi Levi shangwui avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui kathānasera, nathumla, nachinā ngarāla tharmathengserlaga Israelwui
Kharethang nathumna makaphungwui vang, ithumwui
Chiwui vang eina Israelwui
Kala

Levinaobingwui chinaongarā laa kasābingna ringkaphāwui laa kajuikhon eina laawui akap-akai tingteilā, lyre kala kortar ngasoda sakhangayibing kapangrālu da Davidna Levinaobingwui khareiabinglila kasoi.
Chiwui vang eina Levinaobingna: Joelwui naomayara Heman; awui achinā Berechiahwui naomayara Asaph; Merariwui naomayarabing kala achināngarā, Kushaiahwui naomayara Ethan athum hili phāsanga;

athumli ngasoda kakhane athi kazangbing: Zechariah, Ja-aziel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Benaiah, Ma-aseiah, Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, kala Mikneiah; kala, ngavei khamayona Obed-edom eina Je-ielna.
Laa kasābing, Heman, Asaph kala Ethan athumna pithrai kortar singa;
Zechariah, Azi-el, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Unni, Eliab, Ma-aseiah, kala Benaiah athumna tingteilā huida Alamothwui laakhano athishurda sai;
kha Mattithiah, Eliphelehu, Mikneiah, Obed-edom, Je-iel, kala Azaziah athumna thānda lyre singlaga Sheminithwui laakhano eina sai.
Leviwui laa kathān Chenaniahna laa chi thānra, kaja chi ana sathei.
Berechiah eina Elkanahna ningkhami oko chi khamayona sāra.

Shebaniah, Joshaphat, Nethanel, Amasai, Zechariah, Benaiah, kala Eliezer, pāngmonbing china Varewui ningkhami oko mangā chili talla̱ ̱ khongra. Obed-edom eina Jehiahnala ningkhami oko wui vang khamayona sai.
Chithāda sāda Davidla, Israelwui ararnaobingla, thingthingwui raimi kathānabingla zangda Obed-edomwui shim eina
wui tuingashit oko khangava̱ Levinaobingli Varena ngachonkhamiwui vang athumna mukvā shini kala yaovā shini da pha̱phayai.
Davidna khamayinga phahon katuma sāri khamathā ngavai; ningkhami oko khangava̱ Levinaobingla, laa kasābingla, kala laa thanme Chenaniahla chithāda ngavaisera; kala Davidna ephod ngachai.
Chithāda sāda Israel saikorana
Davidna ngarān kahai kachonshimlungli athumna Varewui ningkhami oko chi zanghaihaowa; kala rikkatāchigat eina ningyatchigatla Vareli pha̱phayai.
Davidna rikkatāchigat eina ningyatchigat kupkahai tharan Davidna
kala sha̱nao mayarnao mateila Israel saikorali khamui hāngkharip, sāmarim akharip, kala drakhātheikao hāngkharip da yaowa.
Chili lāngda
Asaphna kathāna sai, awui thili Zechariah, Je-iel, Shemiramoth, Jehiel, Mattithiah, Eliab, Benaiah, Obed-edom, kala Je-iel; athumna tingteilā eina lyre singa, kala Asaphna kortar katinga,
Benaiah eina Jahaziel pāngmonna Varewui tuingashit oko ngalemli talla̱ atam makaila khongpama.
Chiwui thili, Davidna
awui otsak mibingli theingasaklu!
Amingli masotlaa sālu,
awui matakhak kahai otsak hāngmilu.
Kathara amingli tekmateiranu,
ana ngasokhami phāchinglu!
Ana matakhak kahai ot sākahai phaningunglu,
maphaningkharar otsak,
ana hangtā kahai mashun bichar saikora!
O awui rao Abrahamwui naothei,
kapangkhui kahai, Jacobwui naomayarabing!
A ithumwui
okathui hupta ana bichar sākhamena.
Awui tuingashit khamalai mavaimana;
ana kaso kahai tuila thot thingthing phaningchinga,
Isaacli ngashitsang kahai,
khangachei maleila Isaacli ngashit kahai,
“Canaan ngalei nali mira,
hi nawui shimlui sāra.” da hanghai.
Athum kateokhalakha,
mina matheikhami atamli,
chili ram kazata sāda,
yur akhawui eina yur akhali,
wungram akhawui eina wungram akhali zatlakha,
athumwui vang eina awungabingli khararda,
hānga, “Ina tharchisinmi kahaiali masāphāphālu,
iwui marānbingli sākashi masālu!” da hānga.
Thangkachida awui huikhami tui hāngmilu.
Awui tekhamatei miyur saikorali chishātlu,
awui matakhak kahai otsak yur saikorali hānglu!
Kaja
khayāshilak eina khorumphalungra;
vare saikorawuitungli Ali ngacheerang phaningra.
Kaja miwui varebing meoma̱ mānga;
kha kazingram
Khangamla, khayākakāla awui mangāli lei;
yāng kala khamathānla awuili leisera.
Amingli mikharān O miyurwui shimkhur saikora,
tekhamatei, pangshap
Amingli tekhamatei mikharān khuirāda amingli milu kathara sāri shaksāda;
okathui hupta ali ngacheelu;
apuk-apaga mangachei khavai ana rungshingmihaira.
Kazingramna mathānranu,
okathuina ringphāranu!
kala saikorana, “
Ngayi kala chiwui lungli khaleibingna ngaphaoranu,
luiwukna kala chiwui lungli khalei huptana mathānranu.
Chieina ngahong thingna
kaja ana okathuili bichar sākhavai rai.
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana!
“Ithumli ngatangmilu, O ithumwui huikhame Vare,
ithumli kahuimilu yur khangateiwui eina kazipkhuida kahuimilu;
kathara nawui mingli ningshichingra,
tekhamatei chiwui vang masot chigatra!
Israelwui
Chieina mi saikorana “Amen” da hāngda
Thangthangwui sakhangayi ot chi,
Obed-edomlila ngasoda awui mi hangtharukta chishat chili haihaowa, kaja Jeduthunwui naomayara Obed-edom eina Hosahna khāmong khamayona sai.
Kala pāngmon Zadokli ngasoda achināngarā pāngmonbinglila
Israelli
Athumli ngasoda Heman eina Jeduthunla
Kathara laa sākhavai Heman eina Jeduthunna talla̱ eina kortar singa. Jeduthunwui naomayarabingli khāmong mayon ngasaka.
Davidna awui shimli pamlakha marān Nathanli hānga, “Yanglu, ina cedarthing eina kasā shimli pamda lei; kha
Chieina Nathanna, “Nawui kaphaning athishurda sālu kaja Varena nali ngasomida lei.” da Davidli hānga.
Kha chithang ngayā
“Vāda iwui rao Davidli ahānglu, kaja ‘
Kaja Israelli thānkashok eina thuida aja eina tangda ina shimli mapamlakrangli; kha kachonshim akhawui eina kachonshim akhali, kasompam akhawui eina akhali zatrāhaira.

Ina Israel saikorali ngasoda apam saikorali kazat hili Israelwui wungva̱-wungvābing, iwui mibingli homluda kaso kahaibingli; “Khiwui vang nathumna ili cedarthingwui shim masāmimakhala” da ngathinghairala?’
“Chiwui vang eina iwui rao Davidli nana hithāda hāngra, ‘Ashangva̱wui
nawui kazazatpamli ina ngasomi; kala nawui yangkashebingli nawui eina shimān ngasaka; kala okathuili khangamabingwui ming thāda nalila aming kazat akha sāngasakra.
Iwui mibing Israelwui vang apam akha phākhuida athumli chili pamngasakra, athumna chili chipamda masheikhautluimara; kala khare kachāngwui thāda sakashi mibingna athumli masāshimānluimara,
iwui Israel mibingli mungkhavai wungva̱-wungvābing phākasangwui eina thuida; ina nawui yangkashibingli shimithaora. Chili lāngda
Nawui mirin peihaida navā ngarāwuili vauki kaji tharan, nawui naothei reisang ngasakta, nanao akhali awui wungram sākāmira.
Ana iwui vang shim akha sākāmira, kala awui wungram ina sākāmida katang mavaimara.
A iwui nao sāra, I awui avāva̱ sāra; rida leikasābingwui eina iwui makhangachei leikashi khuithui kahai thāda ina awui eina makhuithuimara,
kha katang mavaila iwui shimli kala iwui wungramli leingasakra kala awui wungpamkhong katang mavaimara kaji ungshungra.’”
Tuibing hiwui athishurda kala rākachithei hiwui athishurda Nathanna Davidli ahānga.
Chieina Awunga Davidna
O Varivara, hiya nawui miktāli kateo otsak ngasāsai, hili lāngmeida, naoda rāki kaji naraowui shimkhurla, kala naoda rāki kaji thotbingla chitheimihaira, O
Naraoli khayā kākhangasakwui vang David ina khi hāngluirakhala? Kaja naraoli nana katheina.
Narao iwui vang, O
Ithumna kashā athishurda, O

Varewui mi ngasā khavai ana vāngatangda, hakkhamahā khangachee otsak eina nakhalatta naming leingasakta, Egyptwui eina ngatangkhui khavai athumwui mangāli khalei yurbingli kashamshokkhame nawui Israel mibing thāda okathuili yur khangatei kali leilikhala?
Israel mibing nawui mi sāching khavai nana sākhuihaira; kala, O
Ara, O
kala naming katang mavaila mingmayangmeiranu, kala ‘Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Kaja, iwui Vare nana, naraowui shim sākāmira da nana ali rachitheimihaira; chiwui vang narao ina nawui mangāli seihā sākashapna.
, nava Varena; kaphā ot hi narao ili ngashitsangmihaira;
ara chiwui vang eina, narao iwui shimkhurli sokhami china nali ringkaphā ngasā ngasakranu, chithāda nawui mangāli leichingranu; kaja, O
Ana Moablila yuihaida, athumla Davidwui rao sāsera, kala shai khuirāmi.
Euphrates kongli awui onrā sākā khavai Hamathshong khavā atamli Zobahwui awunga Hadadezerlila yuihaowa.
Awui eina Davidna siguigari thingkha, sigui raimi thingshini kala phei raimi thingmaga̱ khuiya; kha gari kaphunga siguibingwui phei sātekmiserhaida gari shākhawui vangmang taimi.
Zobahwui awunga Hadadezerli ngachon kavai Damascusli khalei Syrianaobing rāda athum thingmaga̱da khanili Davidna shaothathaowa.
Chiwui thili Davidna Damascuswui Syriali raimi pamkhavai akha haihaowa, kala Syriawui mibingla Davidwui rao sathuihaoda shai chigata. Davidwui kazatpam kachiva̱li
Hadadezerwui eina chāngvei awui raimibingna khuikaphung chi Davidna khuilaga Jerusalemli khuiunghaowa.
Kala Hadadezerwui keinungbing Tibhath kala Cunwui eina pithraisā Davidna kachungkha khui; chieina Solomonna pithraiwui shamadrunao, pithraiwui pakra̱ kala khorkhong sākhui.
Hamathwui awunga Touna, Zobahwui awunga Hadadezerwui raimi katongali Davidna yuihaira da kashā tharan,

anaomayara Hadoramli Davidwuili chihovada ringkaphawui salamtui ahāng ngasaka kaja Hadadezerli rai salaga ana yuihaowa; Hadadezar hi Touli rai sachinga. Kala ana Awunga Davidli sināwui, lupāsāwui, kala pithraiwui ot ayur ngateiteida khuivāmi ngasaka;
otbing chieina ngasoda, Awunga Davidna, yur khangateiwui eina kaja, Edomwui eina, Moabwui eina, Ammonwui eina, Philistinewui eina kala Amalekwui eina akakhui sinā lupāsā chi
Ana Edomli raimi haikhavai sākai; kala Edomwui mibing Davidwui rao sathuiserhaowa. Davidna kazatzatpam kachida
Kala Zeruiahwui nao Joabna raimibingli yanga; Ahiludwui naomayara Jahoshaphatna kapime sai;
Ahitubwui nao Zadok eina Abiatharwui nao Ahimelechna pāngmon sai, kala Shavshana kapime sai;
kala Jehoiadawui naomayara Benaiahna Chereth eina Pelethnaobingwui raimitungli yanga; kala Davidwui naongarābingna awungawui otpamli otva̱ sāsera.
Khaleilaga Ammonwui awunga Nahash thihaoda anaomayarana awui mahut thuishina.
Chieina Davidna, “Nahashwui nao Hanunli ina lumtir eina sāra, kaja avāva̱na ili ngavaplak eina leisai.” da hānga. Chiwui vang avāva̱ kathiwui vang kakhanang chithei khavai paomebing chihovai.
Kha Ammonwui wungnaobingna Hanunli hānga, “Hāngphanep khavai Davidna mi chihokharā hi navāli khayākashina da phaningla? Nawui ngalei ngapaikhui khavai rairui chihokharā maningmala?”
Chiwui vang eina Hanunna Davidwui raobing chi tukkhuilaga kui simiserhaowa, kala kachonla ngahunpat tāmihaida, shaksha̱ eina tangda ngavailaga shiunserhaowa;
Pao chi kashā eina Davidna mi chihovāda angarok ngasaka, kaja, athum khayakshunhaowa. “Nathumwui morhā maphoranglakha eina tangda Jericholi pamsālu, laga ungnaolu.” da awungana hānga.

Ammonnaobingna Davidli yangkharing khavai ot sāhaira da athum khalatta theikahaiwui vang, Mesopotamiawui eina, Aram-maacahwui eina, kala Zobahwui eina, siguigarila kala sigui kasing mila masā khavai, Hanun eina Ammonbingna lupāsā kg. thingthumrāda mati chiphunvai.
Athumna siguigari thingthumrāda khani masākhui kala Maacahwui awungana awui raimi thānlaga Medebali rairum asai. Ammonnaobingna kha̱ kha̱wui eina mi kazipserlaga rai sākhavai vai.
Chi kashā eina Davidna Joabli ngasoda kapingpinga raimibing chihoi.
Ammonnaobingna raisāri shaksāriplaga keinungli zangkhavai ngaveishong ngaher eina vānganinga, kala ngasokharā awungabingna khamashā pamli pama.
Mangāshongla, khanukshongla rai rāhaira kaji Joabna kathei tharan, Israelwui eina khamathāthā mi kapangkhuilaga Syrianaobingli ngarar khavai sai;
awui mi kateibing chi achinā Abishaili horsangmida Ammonnaobingli ngarar khavai sāhaowa.
Kala ana hānga, “Syrianaobingna ili singyuihaiakha nana rāngachonmilu; kala Ammonnaobingna nali singyuihaiakha ina nali rāngachonra.
Mangacheelakalu, ishi yurwui vang kala ithum Varewui keinungwui vang mayara sāda ngararsa; kala
Chieina Joab kala ali khangaso awui mibingna Syrianaobingli ngarar khavai ngaher eina anganingda awui mangāli athum yāmhaowa.
Syrianaobing yāmhaira kaji chi Ammonnaobingna theilaga athumla Joabwui achinā Abishaiwui eina keinungli yāmzanghaowa. Kala Joabna Jerusalemli unga.
Syrianaobingli Israelnaobingna yuihaira kaji chi theilaga Euphrates makānda khalei Syrianaobingli ahokhui khavai paomebing chihovai, kala Hadadezerwui raimi kathāna Shophachna thana.
Chi Davidli kahāng chitharan, Israel saikorali kazipphungda Jordan makānlaga athumli angarar khavai awui raimi ngarānpinghaowa. Davidna Syrianaobingli ngarar khavai awui raimibing ngaherda angarara.
Israelnaobingwui mangāli Syrianaobing yāmhaowa; kala Davidna Syriawui siguigari kathao mi thingshini, phei raimi thinghangmati sāthata; kala raimi kathāna, Shophachlila sāthathaowa.
Israelnaobingna yuihaira da Hadadezerwui raimibingna kathei eina athumna Davidli hamsangda awui mi sāhaowa. Chiwui eina thuida Syrianaobingna Ammonnaobingli mangachonluingaithuwa.
Davidna aram awungawui

Kala apam chili leikasā mibingla khuiungda, horai, kenti kala ngahā singda ot sāngasaka; Ammonnaobingwui keinung kachida Davidna hithāda sāngasaka. Chiwui thili Davidla awui mibingla Jerusalemli latunghaowa.
Philistinenaobingli rai saluishita; kala Goliathwui achinā Gitpa Lahmili Jairwui naomayarana sāthathaowa. Lahmiwui zeipa̱ rā-kharakbingwui raphunthing rikkhaya.

Gathli rai sāluishitta, chili akho-arek kajui mi akha zangsai. Apang ngaworda pāngmareng tharuruk kai, pheila pheimareng tharuruk kāda, apheimareng pāngmareng katonga maga̱da mati kai; ala mireitheiwui naotunwui theisāna.
Ana Israelli mana̱kashi chitharan Davidwui achinā Shime-awui naomayara Jonathanna sāthathaowa.
Gath ngaleiwui mireitheiwui naotunbing hi David eina awui raimibingwui pāngli thisangserhaowa.
Satanna Israelli yangshihaida, mi mashing shānkhavai Davidli rāsui.
Chieina Davidna Joab kala raimi kathānabingli hānga, “Beer-sheba eina thuida Dan eina tangda mi mashing shānkhuilaga kayākha leikhala kaji ili unghānglu.”
Kha Joabna hānga, “Arui leida khalei hili
Kha Joabwui tuili awungawui tuina yuihaowa. Chieina Joabna Israelwui apam saikorali vālaga Jerusalemli latunga.

Kala mibing shānkakhui mashing chi Joabna Davidli khuiungmi. Israel saikorawui alungli raighai singkathei mi thingnamkha kala lakhkha leisai; kala Judahwui alungli raighai singkathei lakh mati thinghangshini leisai.
Kha chili Levibing eina Benjaminbing mashānsangmana, kaja awungawui tui chi Joabna mamayāngaithuwa.
Kha otsak hili Varena maringphāmada Israelli tandi mi.
Davidna Vareli hānga, “Ina sākahai hili morei haklak eina sāhaira. Kha ara ina nali seihā sali, naraowui khayonkhamāng hi kakhuithuimihaolu; kaja ina mangma̱lak eina sāhaira.”
Chieina Davidwui marān Gadli
“Vāda Davidli hānglu, ‘
Chieina Gadna Davidli ahānga, “
Kum kathum chāmrei khuirakā; yangkashiwui raighaina nali yuida kachāng kathum sākashimān khuinika; maningkha
Chieina Davidna Gadli hānga, “I wuk-khananglākhaira; I
Chiwui vang Israelwui alungli
Kala Varena kazingrao chili Jerusalem shimān ngasak khavai chihovai; kha ana shimān ngasakura kaji tharan
Davidna yangkakā eina
Kala Davidna Vareli hānga, “Mi mashing shānkhui khavai kakaso chi ina maningmala? Makaphā-makhayā morei kasaa chi ina. Kha yaonaobing hina khi sāhaokhala? O
Chieina
wui ming singda Gadwui tui kahāng thāda Davidna vai.
Chitharan Ornanna kehu zaisai; ana kapeivāda kazingrao chili thei, chieina ali ngasokasā anaomayara mati zangda athum khalatta ngathumhaowa.
Davidna Ornanwuili khavā eina Ornanna Davidli thei, kala awui lanpumwui eina angaroklaga khayāshilak eina akhoruma.
Davidna Ornanli hānga, “

Chieina Ornanna Davidli hānga, “Khuimilu; kala ishāmei awungana phāra kaji chi sāmilu; yanglu, rikkatāchigatwui vang iwui mukvā lei, thingwui vang okkaithing lei, kala muisakchigatwui vang kehula lei, ina saikora hi mikahaina.”
Kha awunga Davidna Ornanli hānga, “Kha ina aman chi peida mira; nawui chi
Chieina apam chiwui aman sinā onlaga shātharuk Davidna Ornanli mi.
Kala Davidna apam chiwuitungli hanphut akha sākhuida
Chiwui thili
Jebuspa Ornanwui lanpumli
Kaja Mosesna lamhāngli leilakha sākakhui
kha Davidna Vareli ngasan khavai apam chili mavārarthuwa, kaja
Chieina Davidna hānga, “Hili
Israelwui alungli khalei kha̱mibingli kazipkhuida hokhuiser khavai Davidna kakaso mi, kala Varewui shim sākhavai ngalung kashānbingli lunggui shānngasaka.
Kala Davidna mari kachungkha kazipkhuida ngavei khāmongwui vang yotpi phashān khavaiwui vang mari kala pithraila maonkharar mashing kaziphai,
cedarthing mashānkharar haimi, kaja Sidon kala Tyrewui mibingna cedarthing kachungkha Davidli khuirāmi.
Kaja Davidna hānga, “Inaomayara Solomon hi nganuida lei kala ning makāshungranga kala
Chiwui thili anao Solomonli hokhuida Israelwui
Davidna Solomonli hānga, “Inaomayara, iwui
Kha

Yanglu, nali naomayara akha pharāra; ava chingri kahai mi ngasāra. Kuimareida khalei yangkashibingwui eina ina ali chingri kahai mira; kaja awui ming Solomon hora, kala awui thotli ina Israelli chingri vari kahai mira.
Imingwui vang ana shim akha sakāra. Ana inao ngasāra kala ina avāva̱ ngasāda, awui wungpamkhong Israelwui alungli mashimānda sakāmira.’
Ara, inao, nana sāra da hāngkahai athishurda, nawui
Israelwuitungli mung khangasak tharan
Chieina Israelwui vang

wui shim sākhavaiwui vang chotlak eina ina, sinā matric ton thingkathum shāmati, lupāsā matric ton thingthumrāda mati, pithrai kala mari shānla makakhui kapeisanghaira; tarākha leili; thingla, ngalungla tarākha ngarānhaira. Chiwuitungli nanala phasangki kajina.
Nawuili ot kasā mi kachungkha lei: ngalung kashao mila, ngalung mistrila, thing mistrila, kala khangatatei pāngthem kathema shānla makakhui leili;
sinā, lupāsā, pithrai, kala mariwui ot sākathathei, kathethembing lei. Ngakarthuida sālu
Israelwui kathānbing saikoralila anaomayara Solomonli ngachonmi khavai Davidna kasoda hānga,
“Nathumwui
Ara, nathumwui ningla, wuklungla zangda nathumwui
Davidna sarrei kahai tharan anaomayara Solomonli Israelwui awunga sāngasakhaowa.
Israelwui kathānabing, pāngmonbing kala Levinaobing saikorali Davidna kazipkhuisera.
Levinaobing kum thumrāwui atungbing shānkhuida mi thingthumrāda chishat kāshunga.
Kala Davidna hānga, “Chiwui alungli mi thingmaga̱da matina
thingmatina shantri sāra, kala thingmatina masotlaa sākhavai ina sākakhui akap-akai chibing eina ngasoda
Kala Levishi shang-shangwui athishurda Davidna angayar mathālak eina ngayeimi: Gershomshi, Kohathshi kala Merarishi da.
Gershomwui naomayara chi Ladan eina Shime-ina,
Ladanwui naomayarabing: Jehielna wungva̱na, kala Zetham eina Joel zangda athum kathumna.
Shime-iwui naomayarabing: Shelomoth, Hazi-el, kala Haran, athum kathumna. Hi Ladanshi avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui khararrabingna.
Shime-iwui naomayarabing: Jahath, Zina, Jeush kala Beriah. Athum mati hi Shime-iwui naomayarabingna.
Jahathna wungva̱na, kala Zizahna kakhanena; kha Jeush eina Beriahwui nao mayarnao tarākha maleithuda, chieina shānkakhui akhawui alungli avāva̱wui shimkhur ngasāhaowa.
Kohathwui naomayarabing: Amram, Izhar, Hebron kala Uzziel, athum matina.
Amramwui naomayarabing: Aaron eina Moses. Tharmathengmeikap kaje ot tharchigat khavai, kala anaomayara eina tangda katang mavaila nganamkaphā thao riktaching khavai,
Kha Varewui mi Moseswui naomayarabingli Leviwui shangli zangngasaka.
Moseswui naomayarabing: Gershom eina Eliezer.
Gershomwui naomayarabing: Shebuelna wungva̱na.
Eliezerwui naomayarabing: Rehabiahna wungva̱na; Eliezerwui naomayara khangatei maleiluimana, kha Rehabiahwui nao mayarnao kachungkhaya.
Izharwui naomayarabing: Shelomithna wungva̱na.
Hebronwui naomayarabing: Jeriahna wungva̱na, Amariahna kakhanena, Jahazielna kakathumana kala Jekameamna khamatena.
Uzzielwui naomayarabing: Micahna wungva̱na, kala Isshiahna kakhanena.
Merariwui naomayarabing: Mahli eina Mushi. Mahliwui naomayarabing: Eleazar eina Kish.
Eleazarna mayarnao mapharāla thihaowa, sha̱naomānga, ashiwui theisā, Kishwui nao mayarbingna athumli ngakuma.
Mushiwui naomayarabing: Mahli, Eder kala Jeremoth, athum kathumna.
Athum hi Leviwui naomayarabing avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur, avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bingna athum avāva̱wui aming athishurda kum maga̱ rarkahai kala chiwui atung
Kaja Davidna hānga, “
Chiwui vang eina Levinaobingna tabernaclela, kala otram ngatha̱ khavaila phungung phungvā sākhavai maleiluimana.”—
kaja hi Davidna kasoda mishān shannaothui kaje, kum maga̱ kākashung kala chiwui atungli khalei Levinaobingna—
“kha athumwui otna
maiyan khamui kasā, tharāzatchigatwui mathir, kala khawok makazang khamui, thao khamanāt ot, kala saikorawui chungkhamei hakkhamei chi onkhami hikathāthāli ngachonmira.
Athumna ngathor kachida,
kala sabbaththang, changwokthang, phanitthang,
Chithāda sāda Levinaobingna kazipshimla, kathara shimla athumna yangra; kala Aaronwui naomayarabing, achinā ngarāna
Aaronwui naomayarabing ngayarkakhai athishurda hibing hina. Aaronwui naomayarabing: Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar, kala Ithamar.
Kha Nadab eina Abihuna avāva̱ mathiranglakha thihaowa, naola maleithuthuimana, chiwui vang eina Eleazar eina Ithamarna pāngmon sai.
Eleazarwui naomayarabingwui eina Zadok, kala Ithamarwui naomayarabingwui eina Ahimelech, anina ngachonmida Davidna athum kachichāwui sāki kajiwui otsin chi ngayeimi.
Ithamarwui naomayarabingwui alungle Eleazarwui naobingna wungva̱ chungmeihaoda, Eleazarwui shimkhurwui eina wungva̱ tharāda tharuk kala Ithamarwui eina chishat da khui.
