Kathara shim kala Varivarawui otva̱bing, Eleazarwui einala Ithamarshiwui einala ngaraichāda kalā yanglaga sanga.

Nethanelwui nao Levipa Shemaiah kapimena, awunga, wungnaobing, Zadok pāngmon, kala Abiatharwui naomayara Ahimelech, kala pāngmonbing shimkhur avāva̱ ngarāwui wungva̱bing athum saikorawui mangāli kapikhuisera; avāva̱wui shimkhurwui eina Eleazarwui vang akha kala Ithamarwui vang akha da kapangkhui.
Ka̱lā yanglaga khare chi Jehoiaribwuili tāhaowa; kakhane Jedaiahli,
kakathuma Harimli, khamate Se-orimli,
kaphangā Malchijahli, katharuka Mijaminli,
kashine Hakkozli, kachishata Abijahli,
kachiko Jeshuali, katharā Shecaniahli,
katharāda akha Eliashibli, tharāda kakhane Jakimli,
tharāda kakathuma Huppahli, tharāda khamate Jeshebe-abli,
tharāda kaphangā Bilgahli, tharāda katharuka Immerli,
tharāda kashine Hezirli, tharāda kachishata Happizzezli,
tharāda kachiko Pethahiahli, khamaga̱ Jehezkelli,
maga̱da khareli Jachinli, maga̱da kakhane Gamulli,
maga̱da kakathuma Delaiahli, maga̱da khamate Ma-aziahli.
Israelwui
Leviwui naomayara khangateibing: Amramwui naobingwui eina Shuba-el; Shuba-elwui naomayarabingwui eina Jehdeiah.
Rehabiahwui: Rehabiahwui naomayarabingwui eina Isshiahna wungva̱na,
Izharbingwui Shelomoth, Shelomothwui naomayarabingwui eina Jahath,
Hebronwui naomayarabing: Jeriahna wungva̱na; Amariahna kakhane, Jahazielna kakathuma kala Jekameamna khamate,
Uzzielwui naomayarabing: Micah; Micahwui naomayarabingwui eina Shamir.
Micahwui achinā Isshiahna; awui naomayarabingwui eina Zechariah.
Merariwui naomayarabing: Mahli eina Mushi. Ja-aziahwui naomayarabing: Beno,
Merariwui naomayarabing: Ja-aziahwui naomayarabingli, Beno, Shoham, Zaccur kala Ibri.
Mahliwui: Eleazar, mayarnao maleimana.
Kishwui naomayarabing: Jerahmeel.
Mushiwui naomayarabing: Mahli, Eder kala Jerimoth. Athum hi avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui athishurda Levibingwui naomayarabingna.

Hibing hila avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhurwui wungva̱bingna, agato ngarāla ngaraichāda, kalā yanglaga athumwui achināngarā Aaronwui naomayarabingna kasā thāda Awunga Davidwui mangāli, Zadokwui, Ahimelechwui kala pāngmon eina Levinaobing avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui mangāli kapangkhui.

David kala otngarutwui wungva̱bingna lyre, tingteilā kala kortar eina ngasoda hāngmarān khavai Asaph, Heman, kala Jedathunwui naomayarabing kaikhali ngateida phaishokhaiya. Athumwui ot sākharān kala otngarutbing chiya:
Asaphwui naomayarabing: Zaccur, Joseph, Nethaniah, kala Asharelah, athum hina awungawui ningkachāng otsakli marān khavai athumli Asaphna yanga.
Jeduthunwui naomayarabingwui eina: Gedaliah, Zeri, Jeshaiah, Shime-i, Hashabiah, kala Mattithiah, athum tharukli avāva̱ Jeduthunna yangmida,
Hemanwui naomayarabing: Bukkiah, Mattaniah, Uzziel, Shebuel, Jerimoth, Hananiah, Hanani, Eliathah, Giddalti eina Romamti-ezer, Joshbekashah, Mallothi, Hothir, Mahazi-oth;
Athum hi awungawui marān Hemanwui naomayarasera, kala Varena ngashit kahai athishurda ali sokhamiwui vang sochikatki kajina, kaja, Varena Hemanli naomayara tharāda mati kala sha̱nao kathum da mi.
Athumna
Ashi chinaongarā
Khanganola, khararrala, ojāla, katamnaola, athumna sākharān ot chi kalā yanglaga ngayarkhui.
Ka̱lā yanglaga, khare chi Asaphwui vang Josephli tāhaowa; kakhane Gedaliah eina awui chinaongarā, kala awui naomayarabing, tharāda khani;
kakathuma Zaccurshi vānaongarā kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
khamate, Izrishi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā, tharāda khanili,
kaphangāli, Nethaniahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili,
katharukali, Bukkiahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
kashine, Jasharelahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili,
kachishata, Jeshaiahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili,
kachiko, Mattaniahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili,
katharā, Shime-ishi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda khare, Azarelshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda kakhane, Hashabiahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda kakathuma, Shuba-elshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda khamate, Mattithiahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda kaphangā, Jeremothshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda katharuka, Hananiahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda kashine, Joshbekashahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda kachishata, Hananishi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
tharāda kachiko, Mallothishi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
khamaga̱, Eliathahshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
maga̱da khare, Hothirshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
maga̱da kakhane, Giddaltishi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
maga̱da kakathuma, Mahazi-othshi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili;
maga̱da khamate, Romamti-ezershi vānaongarā, kala chinaongarā tharāda khanili.
Ngavei khamayonabingwui ngayarkakhai chiya: Corahshiwuili, Corewui naomayara Meshelemiah, Asaphwui naomayarawui eina.
Meshelemiahwui naomayarabing: Zechariahna naochizaina, Jedia-elna kakhane, Zebadiahna kakathuma, Jathni-elna khamate,
Elamna kaphangā, Jehohananna katharuka, Eli-e-ho-enaina kashine.
Obed-edomwui naomayarabing: Shemaiahna naochizaina, Jehozabadna kakhane, Joahna kakathuma, Sacharna khamate, Nethanelna kaphangā,
Ammielna katharuka, Issacharna kashine, Pe-ullethaina kachishata; kaja Varena ali somi.
Anaomayara Shemaiahlila mayarnao pharāmida athumna avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurbingwui khamunga sāsera, kaja athum kashapa mimānga.
Shemaiahwui naomayarabing: Othni, Repha-el, Obed, kala Elzabad, achināngarā sāshapa mimānga, Elihu eina Semachiah.
Saikora hi Obed-edomwui naomayarabingwui einana, athumwui naobing kala chinaongarā, otram ngatha̱kashapa misera, Obed-edomwui eina mi hangtharukta khanina.
Meshelemiahla naomayara kala chinaongarā kapingpinga tharāda chishat lei.
Merariwui naomayara Hosahla naomayara lei: Shimrina wungva̱ sai (naochizai maninglala avāva̱na ali khararra sāngasakhaowa),
Hilkiahna kakhane, Tebaliahna kakathuma, Zechariahna khamate; Hosahwui naomayarabing kala chinaongarā ashi tharāda kathumna.
Ngavei khamayonbingwui ngayarkakhai chi, athumwui wungva̱bingwui athishurda, achinā ngarāwui thāda
ngaveiwui vang kharei kateo ngaraichada avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur eina kalā yanga.
Zingsho ngavei Shelemiahshili tāhaowa. Shinglak kahaiya anaomayara Zechariahwui kalā khayang eina atungshong tāhaowa.
Azingshong Obededomshiwuili tai, kala anaomayarabingli pongshim singngasaka.
Zingtunshongwui ngavei eina atung shangkhavaili khalei Shallecheth ngavei Shuppim eina Hosahli tai. Kala atam ngaraichāchā eina mayon ngaroka.
Thangkachida zingshoshong mi tharuk, atungshong mati, azingshong mati kala pongshimli khanirip;
kala parbarwui vang zingtunshongwui shongfali mati kala parbarli khani da sai.
Athum hi Corah eina Merariwui mibing ngachaili ngavei khamayon otpam khangayarna.
Levishiwui eina, Ahijahna Khorumshimwui lanshim kala dharkatkhami lan kasinga sai.
Ladanwui naomayarabing Gershonbingwui eina rākhamaronbing Ladan shimkhurwuinada, avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bing, Gershonwui eina kharā Ladanwui naomayarabing chi:
Jehieliwui naomayarabing, Zetham eina achinā Joelna
Amramnaobing, Izharnaobing, Hebronnaobing, kala Uzzielnaobing—
athumwui lankasing pamli, Moseswui nao Gershomwui Shebuelna khareia otva̱ sai.
Awui achinā ngarā: Eliezerwui eina awui naomayara Rehabiah, awui nao Jeshaiah, awui nao Joram, kala awui nao Zichri, awui nao Shelomoth.
Shelomoth eina achinā ngarāna, David awunga, kala avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bing, thing-thing kala shāshāwui otva̱bing, kala raimi kathānabingna tharchigat kahai lanbing chi singa.
Rai yuida ngaponkakhuiwui otbing chi
Chili lāngda, marān Samuelna, Kishwui nao Saulna, Nerwui nao Abnerna, Zeruiahwui nao Joabna tharchigat kahai lemmet saikora chi Shelomothli ngasoda achinā ngarāna yangmisera.
Izharshiwui eina Chenaniahshi vānaongarāli Israelwui vang otva̱ sami khavai kala bichar kasaa sākhavai phāsanga.
Hebronpashiwui eina Hashabiahshi chinaongarā kashapa mibing thingkha shashinili, Jordan zingtunshongli khalei
Hebronpashi shimkhur saikorawui alungli Jerijahna wungva̱ sai. (Davidna mungda hangkhamate kum phākhayang tharan Gileadwui Jazerli shaplak kahai mi kachungkha leisai).

Awunga Davidna ali ngasoda achināngarā thingkhani laga shāshini, kashapa, Reubenpashi, Gadpashi kala Manasseh ngayarpakwuitungli otsak kachiva̱ Varewui otram khangatha̱li awungawui otsakli yangmi khavai khuisanga.

Hi Israel mibingwui shānkakhui avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui akhavābing, thing-thing kala shāshāwui kathānabing, kumshirinda, kachāngchāng, ngatak-ngatāda, awungali otram khangatha̱bingwui aming chi hina; meiphung ava̱va̱li mi thingmaga̱da-matiti lei.
Zabdi-elwui nao Jashobe-amna kachāng khareli khum kharewui kathānana; awui khumkaili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
A hi Perezwui atheina kala kachāng kharewui raithānabingwui kathānana.
Ahohpa Dodaina kachāng kala khumkai kakhanewui kathānana, awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Kachāng kakathumawui kakathuma kathāna chi pāngmon Jehoiadawui nao Benaiahna, awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Aming kazata thumrāwui ngachaili kathāna Benaiah china; awui nao Ammizabadna awui khumkaiwui yangkhamena.
Joabwui achinā Asahelna kachāng khamatewui kathāna khamatena; awui azingli anaomayara Zebadiah zanga; awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Kachāng kaphangāwui kaphangā kathāna chi Izrahipa Shamhuthna, awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Katharuka kachāngwui katharuka kathāna Tekoipa Ikkeshwui nao Irana, awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Kashine kachāngwui, kathāna kashine chi Pelonpa Ephraimwui naomayara Helez; awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Kachishata kachāngwui kachishata kathāna chi Zerahipa Hushathiwui Sibbecaina, awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Kachiko kachāngwui kachikopachi, Benjaminpa Anathothwui Abi-ezer; awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Katharā kachāngwui katharāpāchi Zerahipa Netophahwui Maharaina; awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Tharāda kharewui kachāng tharāda kharewuipachi, Ephraimbingwui eina Pirathonwui Benaiah; awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Tharāda kakhane kachāngwui, tharāda kakhanewui kathāna chi Othni-elwui Netophathpa Heldaina; awuili mi thingmaga̱da matina.
Israel shangbingwuitungli: Reuben mibingwui vang Zichriwui nao Eliezerna otva̱wui kathāna sai; Simeon mibingwuili Maacahwui nao Shephatiahna otva̱na;
Levishiwuili Kemuelwui nao Hashabiah; Aaronshiwuili Zadok;
Judahshiwuili Davidwui achinā Elihu; Issacharshiwuili Michaelwui nao Omri;
Zebulunshiwuili Obadiahwui nao Ishamaiah; Naphtalishiwuili Azri-elwui nao Jeremoth;
Ephraimshiwuili Azaziahwui nao Hoshea; Manasseh ngayarpakshiwuili Pedaiahwui nao Joel;
Gileadli khalei Manassehshi ngayarpakwuili Zechariahwui nao Iddo; Benjaminshiwuili Abnerwui nao Ja-asiel;
Danshiwuili Jerohamwui nao Azarel. Athum hi Israel shangbingwui kathānabingna.
Davidna kum maga̱wui azingli khaleibing chi mashānmana, kaja
Zeruiahwui nao Joabna mishān shanphoka; kha mashānkupmana; chithālala hiwui vang Israelwuitungli malungkhavāt tāhaowa, chieina mashing chi David awungawui thotrinchānli machanthuwa.
Adi-elwui nao Azmavethna awungawui lanshimbing yanga, kala keinungwuila, ram chiwui kha̱ kha̱wuila kala mayon khavai dolan saikorawui lanshim chi Uzziahwui nao Jonathanna yanga;
luikhavabingwuitungli Chelubwui nao Ezrina yangmi;
drakhā yāmgui khavābingli Ramathpa Shime-ina yanga; kala drakhāra̱ haikhavai saikora chili Shiphmipa Zabdina yanga.
Shephelahli khalei olive eina sycamorerong Gederpa Baal-hananna yanga; kala thao kazip khavai shimli Joashna yanga.
Sharon seihomphungli khalei sei Sharonpa Shitraina yanga; kala tampākli khalei sha̱kei saikorali Adlaiwui nao Shaphatna yanga.
Utbingli Ishmaelpa Obilna yanga; kala gadhā alābingli Meronothpa Jehdeiahna yanga. Yao eina me Hagripa Jazizna yanga.
Athum hina Awunga Davidwui lan singmebingna.
Davidwui avāgato Jonathanna, lairik kathema mi sāthuihaoda kala theishingkakhuia mi akha sākasāwui vang ana ngakuime sai; Hachmoniwui naomayara Jehiel anina awungawui nao mayarnaobingli tamchithei.
Ahithophelna awungawui ngakuime sai, kala Archiwui Hushai hi awungawui ngasotnaona.
Ahithophelwui thili Benaiahwui nao Jehoiada eina Abiatharna thuishina. Kala Joabna awungawui raimi katongawui kathāna akhavā sai.

Israelwui otva̱bing, shang-shangwui otva̱bing, awungali otram khangatha̱ khum-khumbingwui otva̱bing, thing-thing, shāshāwui raimi kathānbing, lansingmebing awungawui kala naongarāwui lan, sha̱kei khamayonwui kathānbing, kala awungawui konungwui otva̱bing eina ngasoda kapinga mibing, rai kapingabing, athum saikorali Davidna hokhuida Jerusalemli kazipa.
Kha Varena ili, ‘Imingwui vang nana shim masāpaimara, kaja na raikathata mina, kala ashee tangasakhaira.’ jihaowa.
Chitha-ilala, Israelwui awunga sāching khavai,
Kala iwui nao mayarnao saikorawui ngachaiwui eina (kaja
Aruihonwui thāda ana iwui ningkhami kala shiyan-chikanbing mayontitakha awui wungram mashimānda sakāmira.’
“Chiwui vang eina Israel saikorawui mikyanli kala
“Inaomayara Solomon, navāwui Vare chili theilu, kala ningtongda kala sangairereo ningtongda otram ngatha̱lu, kaja
wui kathara shim sākhavai nali kapangkhuihaira, ning ngasharlu; kala pingmeida sālu.”
Chiwui thili Davidna anaomayara Solomonli, ana ngarān kahai shimzak, Khorumshim chiwui shimbing, lanshimbing, atowui kābing, zangkhamayar kā, lukhamashan pamkhong haikhavai kā saikora hāngchithei;
kala
pāngmonbing eina Levibingwui otpam ngayarkakhai,
kala otngarut kachiva̱li singkhavai sināwui khorkhongbingwui, lupā khorkhongbingwui vang lupāsā zangki kaji,
sināwui thaomeishongbing eina chiwui thaomeibingwui kharit, thaomeishong kala thaomei ava̱va̱wui kharit, lupāsāwui thaomeishong kala chiwui thaomeibing, otngarut ava̱va̱li singkhavai athishurda onmi,
maiyan khamui haikhavai table ava̱va̱wui vang sinā, lupāsāwui tablebingwui kharit,
sinā kachanga eina kasā marik-kapei, khongsaibing, khorām, sinā koklui ava̱va̱wui vang kharit, lupāsā koklui ava̱va̱wui kharit;
langkazazak kahai sinā eina sākakhui, nganamkaphā thao riktā khavai hanphut kala chiwui kharit; chili lāngda ana cherubimwui sinā eina sākakhui siguigari athumwui angachāng harda
Saikora hiwui pongli
Chiwui thili Davidna anaomayara Solomonli hānga, “Lungsanmeilu kala pingmeida sālu. Mangacheealu, makhanangalu; kaja

Yanglu, pāngmonbingla, Levibingla, Varewui shimwui otram ngatha̱ khavai saikorawui vang kala ot saikorali ngachonngairereo kahai kala sātheiser kaji mi kachiva̱ nali ngasoda lei; kala otva̱bingla kala mibing saikorala nawui kahāng nganāra.”

Chiwui vang iwui kashap eina tangda ngarānsang kahaina; sinā otwui vang sinā, lupāsā otwui vang lupāsā, pithrai otwui vang pithraisā, mari otwui vang marisā, thing otwui vang thing, chili lāngda onyx eina ngalung aman kasaka kachungkha kala yeksang khavai antimony machu khalei aman kasaka ngalungyur kachungkha kala marbleyur ngarānsanghaida lei.

Chiwuitungli, kathara shim hiwui vang, khalei chili ngasoda ikhalattawui sinā, lupāsāwui lan ngateida kaziphaili; iwui Varewui shim hili ina mikhangaiwui vang Varewui shim sākhavai ningtongda chigat kahaina;
chiya: Ophirwui sinā matric ton shākha, langkazazak kahai lupāsā matric ton shākhani; hieina phākholi napki kajina,
kala them kathembingna sāki kaji ot saikorawui vang sināwui ot, lupāsāwui ot sāvaira. Chieina aja khipāna

Chiwui thili avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhurwui wungva̱bingna lemmet chigata, shang-shangwui kathānabing, thing-thingwui kala shāshāwui kathānabing, kala awungawui otva̱ saikoranala kachichā chigat eina chigat ngaroka.

Varewui shim sākhavai athumna kachigat chi sinā matric ton shākha hangshini, lupāsā matric ton shākathum hangmati, pithrai matric ton shātharuk maga̱, kala marisā matric ton thingkathum shāmati kāshunga.
Aman kasaka ngalung khaleibingnala chigatserda
Chiwui thili mibingna mingairereo eina
Chiwui vang yarui saikorawui mangāli Davidna
O
Kashāngla, khayāla nawui eina shoksera, saikorali nana khamungna. Sāshap vāshap nawui pāngli lei; reikhangasakla pingkhangasakla napangli leisera.
Ara ithumwui Vare, ithumna nali ningshi, kala tekhamatei namingli sochikatli.
“Kha I, kala iwui mibingna nawui mangāli khinida hithāda chigatngairereo chigatshaprakhala? Kaja ot saikora nawui eina kashokna, nawui chi ithumna nali milui kajina.
Kaja nawui mangāli ishāvāngarā thāda ithumla kha̱ram kazat kathāna; okathuili ithum mirin hiya amahā kathāna, rungshing kahai khipākha maleimana.
O

Nana wuklung tamyangda mashungrik kahaili ningyangkhaung lei kaji ina thei, iwui Vare, ot saikora hi ina ningtongda kachigatna, kala hili khalei nawui mibing saikorana nawui vang mathanthathup eina kachigatna kaji ara ina theihaira.
O
Ningtongda nawui ningkhami, shiyan-chikan, tuingashit, kakaso saikora mayonshap khavai inaomayara Solomonli khamayāmilu, kala ina ngarān kahai dolan hi ali sākup ngasakmilu.”
Chiwui thili Davidna saikora kazip chili hānga, “Nathumwui
Kala athumna
kala chithang
Athumna Davidwui nao Solomonli kakhane sāda awunga sangda thao neomi, kala Zadokli pāngmon sanga.
Chieina avāva̱ Davidwui mahut shinda Solomonna
Kathāna saikora, kapingabingla, kala Awunga Davidwui naomayarabingla Solomonli Awungana da mayāserhaowa.
Israel saikorawui mikyanli
Chithāda Jessewui nao Davidna Israel saikorawuitungli munga.
Ana Israelli khamung kum hangmatina; ana Hebronli kum shini, kala Jerusalemli thumrāda kathum munga.
Shānglak kala khayakālak eina okthuida atam shirākha ringda sarlak eina thihaowa; kala awui nao Solomonna awui mahut shina.
Awunga Davidwui otsak, khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda, marān Samuelwui Thotrinchānli, Nathan marānwui Thotrinchānli, kala Gad marānwui Thotrinchānli kapiserhaida lei,
kala chieina ngasoda ana khamungwui tuila, awui sākashap ot saikora, kala awuitungli, Israelwuitungli, kala wungram kachiva̱wuitungli kashoshok saikora hāngserhaida lei.
Davidwui naomayara Solomonna awui wungram akhalattana ngaziplak eina sakai, kala
Awunga Solomonna, raimi thing-thing kala shāshā kathānbing, shorkarwui otva̱bing, shang-shangwui wungva̱bing, kala mi saikorali,
ali ngasoda Gibeonwui khorum khavaipamli kākhavai kasoi. Athumna chili khavā chi
(Kha
Chili lāngmeida Hurwui ara̱, kaja Uriwui naomayara Bezalelna semkakhui pithraiwui hanphut chila
Kachonshimwui khorum khavai
Chithang ngayā Varena Solomonli rāchitheida hānga, “Ina nali khi mirakhala polu.”
Solomonna ngahānkai, “Ishāvā Davidli nana hakkhamahā makhangachei leikashi chitheihaira, kala awui mahut ili awunga sāngasakhaira.
O
Mibing hiwui mangāli khangashok khangakhang theishapa ili thangkhamei kala kathem milu, kaja hiyākha hakkhamahā nawui mibingli khipāna mungrarrakhala?”

Varena Solomonli hānga, “Nawui ningli hithāda phaningda, nana lanla, sinā lupāla khangamkhareila mapomana, yangkashibingli athut khuikhavaila maphaningmana, okpeimei khavaila mapomana, kha iwui mi hiyākha khalei hili mungshap khavai theithangkhamei kala kathem kapowui vang,

nali thangkhamei eina kathem mihaira. Chili lāngda ina nali kashāngla, lanla, khangamkhareila ina ngarumsangmira; nawui mangāli leikasā awungabing hithāda khipākha maleiranga, kala nawui thilila hithāda akhala maleimara.”
Chieina Solomonna Gibeonwui kajuipam, khorum khavai kachonshimwui eina Jerusalemli latunga, kala Israelwuitungli munga.

Solomonna siguigarila, siguiraimila kazipkhui; awui siguigari thingkha shāmati kala sigui raimi thingtharāda khani leisai, athum chi siguigari keinungli ngayarda kala kateibinga awungali ngasoda Jerusalemli hai.
Awui atamli Jerusalemli sinā eina lupāsā ngalung singkhanganao thai, kala cedarthingla Shephelahwui sycamorething thāda sorngasaida singngasaka.
Egypt kala Kuewui eina Solomonna sigui alokhui, awui leih kasābingna aman mida Kuewui eina siguibing chi samphanga.

Athumna Egyptwui eina siguigari akhali lupāsā shātharuk mi, kala sigui akhali lupāsā shākha hangphangā mida khuiunga. Chi tākam eina athumna Hitnaobingwui awunga kala Syriawui awungabinglila yorsanga.
Kala Solomonna ot phung khavai mi thinghangshini, ngalung phuk khavai mi thinghangchishat, kala chili kashina athum thingkathum shātharuk phāsanga.
Kala Solomonna Tyrewui awunga Huramli pao shivatta hānga: “Ishāvā Davidli awui shim sākhavai nana cedarthing khami thāda ilila khamilu.
Yanglu, ithumwui
Ina sāki kaji hi shimkhokna, kaja vare saikorali ithumwui Varena reimeithuiya.
Kha kazingram, juimeikap kaja kazingramla ana mapamchangakha awui vang khipāna shim samithukrakhala? Awui mangāli anganam riktā khavai apam maningla, I khipāda awui vang shim sakāmirarrakhala?

Chiwui vang eina sināwui, lupāsāwui, pithraiwui, mariwui, kala kahunga, hungrisi, khamateka kashankachon sākatheiya, kala ruksang katheiya mi akha kachihoramilu; ana ishāvā Davidna ngarānsang kahai Judah eina Jerusalemli khalei ili ngasokapam kathemabing eina ngasoda ot sāngarum khavaina.
Cedar, cypress kala algum thingla Lebanonwui eina kachihorāmilu, kaja nawui mibing thing kata̱ themlaka kaji ina thei. Iwui mibing nawui mibingli ngaren khavai
kaja thing mavātlakla ngarānsang khavai chihorāka, ina sāki kaji shim chi hakkhamahā tekhamatei shim akhara.
Ina nawui mi thing kata̱ kala thing kasābingwui vang kehu rungkahai ton thingkhani mira, nāpai ton thingkhani mira, drakhāra̱ liter lakh mati mira, kala olive thao liter lakh mati da mira.”
Chieina Tyrewui awunga Huramna Solomonli chithi eina ngahānkāda hānga, “Khikhalajila
Huramna hithādala hānga, “Kazing eina okathui sākhuida Awunga Davidli thangkhamei naomayara mida; ali phaningkhui kathei kala theithangkhamei ngarumsangmida
Chiwui vang Huramabi kaho them-kathemapa hili ina chihokharāna,

avāva̱ Tyrewui mina kala ava̱va̱ Danwui sha̱naona. Sinā, lupāsā, pithrai, ngalung, thing, kala hungreoseo, khamayinga, hungping kahai khamanaka tāwon kachon, hikathāthā sātheiser kaja mina. Navā ishāmei Davidwui themkathembingli ngasoda, ama yekkasang nilala, aphor phorkasang nilala kakasoso saikora sākhavai kachihona.
Chiwui vang ishāmeina hāngkahai thāda kehula, nāpaila, thaola, drakhārala naraobingli kachihorāmilu;
nawui sāvaiki kaji chiwui athishurda ithumna Lebanonwui eina thing renmira kala Joppali marikhong eina khuitāmira, chithāda nana Jerusalemli khuiungpaira.”
Avāva̱ Davidna mishān shānkahaiwui thili, Solomonna Israelwui lamli khalei kha̱mibing saikora mishān shānngasaka, kala chili lakh-akha thinghangphangāda kathum shātharuk leisai.
Thinghangshinili ana ot phung ngasaka, thinghangchishatli kaphungli ngalung phukngasaka, kala thingkathum-shātharukli yangkhame sāngasaka.
Ana mungda kum khamatewui kachāng kakhaneli sāphoka.
Varewui shim sakā khavai Solomonna asān-aret onkakhui chi hina: achālakha zatnākasa tamkhavai eina, asān khuining hangtharuk, aret khuining maga̱na.
Shimrei chiwui mangāshong zangkhavaili shimpho sākashok chi, aret ungshung vāshungda khuining maga̱, kala kajuila khuning maga̱na. Alung peida ana sinā eina heimitsanga.
Shimrei chi cypressthing eina ngaveida sinā akachanga eina romlui, kala khaneinā eina sinā huishon ruksanga.
Aman kasaka ngalungla sāsangda shim chi mathā ngasaka. Sinā chi Parvaimwui sināsera.
Shim peida khāngenla, sāzerla, phākhola, khāmongla, sinā ruksanga, kala phākholi cherubim yeksanga.
Tharmathengmeikap kaje apam chi asān-aret ungshung vāshungda khuining maga̱ jiya. Chila sinā heimitsanghaida sinā ton maga̱ zanga.
Sināwui yotpi kharit gram shāphangā-hangshini kāshunga. Ato kābingla sinā heimitsanga.
Tharmathengmeikap kaje kāli thing eina cherubim khani sākhuida sinā eina heirora.

Cherubim khani chiwui angachāng pharonlaga khuining maga̱ kai: akhawui angachāng khuining phangā kasāng china phākholi za̱ya, angachāng akhapa khuining phangā kasāng china cherubim akhapāwui angachāng akhali ngasunkhui;
kala cherub hipawui angachāng, khuining phangā sāngda shim chiwui phākholi aza̱ya, kala angachāng akhapala khuining phangā sāngda cherub kharepā chiwui angachāngli ngasunkhui.
Cherubim khaniwui angachāng pharonlaga khuining maga̱ya; anina phei eina nganingda mangāshong mai ngareishoka.
Ana chonrānla sākhuida khamayinga, hungrisi mayingrisi, khamanaka chonsā eina sākhuida chiwuitungli cherubim phorsanga.
Mangāshong khuining thumrāda phangā kasānga pākra̱ khani ana shuna, kala khanini chiwui atungli khuining phangā kasānga agui sāsanga.
Ana chā khangachā thāda pākra̱ tungli huishon khanongmi, kala kabothei shākha sākhuilaga huishon tungli thāngtā ngasaka.
Pākra̱ khani chi khorumshimwui mangāli azingshong akha kala zingtunshong akha da shuna. Azingshong shunkahai chili Jachin hoi, kala atungshong shunkahai chili Boaz hoi.
Solomonna pithraiwui hanphut akha sākhui, kala asān-aret ngaraichāda khuining maga̱, kala kajui khuining tharāna.
Chiwui thili ana khanguma shamadrunao akha sākhui, makhārshing eina tamakha khuining tharā pāka, khuining phangā juiya, kuimareida tamakha khuining thumrā jiya.
Kala khuining thumrā eina kakhuiya arāp kuimareida ngaher khani shon thāda heishana.
Kala chi mukvā tharāda khaniwuitungli shonghai, kathumna atungshong, kathumna zingtunshong ngareivai, kathumna azingshong ngareitai kala kathumna zingshoshong ngareishoka kala akhamei ngasunripa.
Akhamong koklui kala timrāwonwui thai, kala pangmayā rikha shai; kala hina liter thinghangtharuk sha̱kha zanga.
Ana pheokhavai khongsai tharā sākhui; kala azingshong phangā, zingtunshong phangā da haihai. Hi rikkatāwui ot pheokhavaina, kala ra̱khong chi pāngmonbing ra̱vai khavaina.
Ana hāngkahai chiwui athishurda sināwui thaomeishong tharā sālaga khorumshim alungli azingshong phangā, zingtunshong phangā da khaninghai.
Tablela tharā sākhuida khorumshim lungli azingshong phangā, atungshong phangā, zintunshong phangā da khaninghai. Kala khongsai shākha sinā eina sākhui.
Pāngmonbingwui yāngkhup eina kahaka yāngkhupla sākhui kala chiwui khāmongbingla pithrai heirorsera;
kala ra̱khong chi azingshongwui zingsho achikunli haihai.
Huramna hamla, sākapeila, khongsaila sākhuisera. Chithāda Varewui shimli haikhavai Awunga Solomonwui vang sākhami Huramna sakakup;
pākra̱ khani, koklui khani, kala pākra̱ khanitungli sākasang agui khani chili faror khavai rakkakhui chila;
rakkakhui khani chiwui kabothei shāmati, rakkakhui ava̱va̱wui vang kabothei ngaher khani, china pākra̱ khaniwuitungli sākasang koklui katha agui khaninili romkhavaina.
Khongsaila, kala khongsai khaning khavai apheila,
ra̱khongla, kala chi rungkhavai mukkābing chila ana sākhui.
Ham, belja, marik-kapei, kala khorkhong saikora
Hibing hi Jordan tampākli khalei Succoth eina Zeredah ngachaiwui leikhon ngaleili heikhuisera.
Solomonna sākakhui otbing chi kachungkhahaoda pithrai kayākha zangkhala kaji mashānkhuirarmana.
Chithāda Varewui shimli kahai Solomonna sākakhui otbing chiya; sināwui hanphut, Ngasokhamiwui khamui haikhavai table,
hāngmi kahai thāda alungshongwui kāli shārkhavai thaomeila, thaomeishongla;
kala awonla, thaohmeila, changjeela sinā kachanga eina sāsera;

meikhanitla, khongsaila, khongpheila, nganamkaphā thaowui meikhongla sinā eina sāsera. Kala khorumshimwui khāmong, tharmathengmeikap kaje alunga kāwui khāmong kala kā khareiwui khāmongla sinā eina sāsera.
Hithāda Solomonna
Chiwui thili Solomonna Israelwui ararbing, shang-shangwui wungva̱bing, kala Israel yurwui avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui khararabing saikorali Jerusalemli kazipkhuilaga, Davidwui keinung Zionwui eina
Chiwui athishurda Israelwui mi saikora awungawui mangāli kachāng kashinewui phanit atamli akazipsera.
Israelwui ararnao zangserlaga Levipashina oko chi akhui.
Athumna okola, kachonshimla, kala chiwui alungli khalei kathara khorkhong saikora pāngmonbing eina Levipāshina khuiphunga.
Kala Awunga Solomonli ngasoda Israel yarui saikorana okowui mangāli kazipta yaola, seila kachungkha mashānkharar pha̱phayai.
Chithāda pāngmonbingna
Kaja cherubimwui angachāngna okowuitungli hārkahaiwui vang okolila, thingphānbinglila farora.
Kha thingphān khani chi sangnāhaida katharapamwui eina theizanga, kha ayarwui eina matheimana; kala aja eina tangda chithāda leichingda lei.
Israelnaobingli Egyptwui eina thānkashok atamli
Pāngmonbingna katharapamwui eina kashok atamli (kaja, pāngmon saikora kachichāshi meiphung makhaila athum khalatta tharmatheng kahaisera;

laa kasā Levinaobing saikora Asaph, Heman, Jeduthun kala athumwui naomayarabing kala chinaongarā, khamanaka kachon ngavairipta, kortar, tingteilā, lyre singlaga, talla̱ kakhong pāngmon shākha maga̱li ngasoda hanphutwui zingshoshong nganinga;
“Kaja a phālaka,
kaja awui leikashi mangacheila leichinga,”
da laa chi juikakā chitharan,
muiyā khalei chiwui vang, pāngmonbing china otram mangatha̱paithuwa; kaja Varewui shim chi
Chiwui thili Solomonna hānga,
mashimānda pamkhavai ina nawui vang
tekhamatei shim akha sākāhaira.”
Chiwui thili Israelwui yaruina nganinglakha awungana mai ngareivāda Israel yarui kazip chili somi.
Kala ana hānga, “Ishāvā Davidli akhamor eina ngashitmi kahai chi ungshung khangasaka

‘Iwui mibingli ina Egyptwui eina thānshokthang eina thuida Israel shang saikorawui alungli shim akha sākāda iwui ming leikhavai keinung akhala makapangkhuimana; kala iwui yur Israelwuitungli mungkhavai wungnao sākhavai mi akhala maphāsangmana;
kha iwui ming leikhavai Jerusalemli ina kapangkhui, kala iwui yur Israelwuitungli mungkhavai Davidli hākhui kahaina.’”
“Ishāvā Davidna, Israelwui
Kha
chithālala nana shim chi masākāmara, kha nana pharākakhui nanaona imingwui vang shim chi sānaora.’
“Ara
Kala Israelnaobingli ngasoda kasā
Chiwui thili Solomonna hanphutwui ngalemli nganingda kazipta khalei Israel saikorawuitungli pāng khāngkai.

Ana pithrai eina sākakhui tārong, khuining phangā kasāng, khuining phangā kapāk kala khuining kathum kajui, kayāng alungli haikahai chiwuitungli nganinga. Kala Israelwui kazip saikorawui miktāli khuktizanga, kala apāng khani kazingramshong khāngkāda hānga,
“O
ishāvā narao Davidli hāngmi kahai chi mayontita; mha, nakhamor eina hāngkahai chi aja otsak eina ungshunghaira.
Chiwui vang eina O
Chiwui vang eina ara, O
“Kha okathuili Varena mili ngasopamkachangrala? Yanglu, kajuia kala juikhamataia kazingram hi nawui vang teonai; chithākha ina sākahai shim hi kayākha teomei!
Chithālala narao ina seihā sāda kapo hi, O
naming leingasakra da nana ngashit kahaipam, shim hishong ngashun ngayā yangrāmida, shim hishong naraona seihā sāda kapo chi kashāmilu.
Narao kala nawui yur Israelnaobingna shim hishong ngareiungda kapo tharan khashāmilu; mha, nawui pam kazingli shakāmida kapheomilu.”
“Mi akhana awui khongnainaoli khayon ot sāhaida tuingashit khuikhavai, shim hili kālaga hanphutwui ngalemli tuingashit kākhuiakha,
kazingramli nana shakāmida khayonali khayonwui athishurda, khamashungali khamashungwui athishurda bichar sāmilu.”
“Nali morei kasāwui vang nawui mi Israelli yangkashebingna maikashi mikahai tharan, athumna mai ngareiungda namingli seihā sāda shim hili rāpoakha,
nana kazingramli shakāmida nawui mi Israelli kapheomilu, kala athumwui avāva̱ ngarāli kala athumli mikahai ngalei chili kathānungmiluilu.”
“Athumna nawui mangāli morei sāhaida kazing maromila kāngmarānghaida, nana rekakharek tharan, athumna shim hishong ngareiungda namingli seihā sāda athum moreiwui eina ngareiungakha,
nana kazingramli shakāmida, narao Israel mibingwui morei kapheomilu; kala nana sāngasak khangai chi tamchitheimida, nawui mibingli shimlui sāda mikahai ngalei chili kazing kharotāmilu.”

“Ram chili zāt kasak atamlila, sākazat nilala, zingkumshāt, majing katāk, khaohsom kala aga̱-akaina shimān khangasak nilala; yangkashebingna keinung keinungli kuinam kahai nilala; mimaokaza̱ nilala, kazātyur khangatatei kakazā atamlila;
khalattawui kakhanang, kachotkachāng theida, mi akhana nilala, Israel mi saikorana nilala, shim hishong ngareiungda pāng katingda nali kapo chi;
nawui pam kazingramli shākāmida, kapheomilu; kala mi kachiva̱li kachichāwui kaphaning athishurda sāmilu; (kaja namāngna naongarā kachiva̱wui ning katheina);
chithāda sāda avāva̱ ngarāli mikahai lam chili athumna nali ngacheeda nathi shurda okthuichingra.
“Chi tākam eina, nawui mi Israel makhaninga yur katei akhana nawui reikhamatai ming, nawui pangshap, kala pāngthei kharei theida ngalei katāva̱wui eina rāda shim hili seihā kasā tharan,

nawui pam kazingramli kashākāmilu, kala yur kateina khangakao chiwui athishurda sāmilu; chithāda okathuiwui miyur saikorana, nawui mi Israelnaobingwui thāda naming theida ngacheera, kala ina sakakā shim hi nawuina kaji athumna theira.”
“Nana vālu kajipamli nawui mibingna rai akhangarar tharan, nana kapangkhui kahai keinung kala ina sakā kahai shim hili ngareiungda nali seihā sā-akha,
athumwui seihā kasā kala kapo chi nana kazingli shākāmida athumli khangachonmilu.”
“Nawui mangāli morei sākahai tharan—kaja khipākha morei makasā maleimana— kala nana athumli malungvāthaida yangkashebingwui pāngli horsangmihaida, chiwui vang athumli tālala nailala tukthuihaiakha;
athumli narkahaipamli athumna ning ngateida, ‘Ithumna makaphā kala khangui khalāng ot sāhaira’ da hāngda;

kala athumli tukvā kahai apam chili leilakha ningyāng tongda hāngphatakha kala nana avāva̱ ngarāli mikahai nana hākhui kahai keinungli kala chili namingwui vang ina sākahai shim hili ngareiungda seihā saakha,
nawui kazingramli shākāmida athumwui seihā kala kapo shāmilu, kala athumli ngachonmilu; kala nawui mangāli morei kasābing chili pheomilu.”
O iwui Vare, “Ara, apam hili seihā kasā saikora theimida kakhuisangmilu.
Ara, O
na kala nawui pangshapwui oko
ngasāmkhui khavaipamli ngasāmkhuimilu.
Nawui pāngmonbing, O
huikhamina chonvai sāranu,
kala nawui shitkasangabingna nawui kaphā kasālungli mathānranu.
O
chiwui mai mangareithui ngasakmilu!
Narao Davidli mangacheila leishikhami chi kaphaningungmilu.”
Solomonna awui seihā sākup kahai thili kazingramwui eina mei tālaga rikkatāchigat kala pha̱kaphayā chi chuitāhaowa, kala
Kala pāngmonbingna
Israelnaobing saikorana mei chi kala
“Kaja a phālaka,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi leichinga.”
Awunga Solomonna kachigat sāda mukvā thingmaga̱da khani kala yao lakh akha thingmaga̱ chigata. Chithāda awunga kala mi saikorana Varewui shim chi tharchigata.
Pāngmonbingna athumwui otpamli nganingripa; kala Levinaobingnala Awunga Davidna ngarān kahai
Atam chili Solomonna phanit shinithang sai, kala Israel saikora awungali ngasoda, haklak kahai kazip, Hamath zangkhavai eina thuilaga Egypt Kong vāshungda khalei mi kazipa.
Athumna hanphutwui dharkat eina phanit shinithang kasāwui vang kachishatathang athumna chingri kahai kazip khui.
Kachāng kashinewui maga̱da kakathumathang athum kachiva̱wui ramli shiunserhaowa; kaja Davidli, Solomonli kala awui Israel mibingli
Chithāda Solomonna
Chiwui thili chithang ngayā
Ina kazing khāmong shunghaida kazing marokatā tharan, lah ngalei hili khalei shaikhavai khaohli kagaso tharan, lah iwui mibingwui alungli kazātkashi kashirāt tharan,

iwui ming eina hokhui kahaiya iwui mibingna athum khalatta hamsangakha, kala seihā sāda ili phaakha kala athumwui makhayā apongwui eina ili latungakha, ina kazingramwui eina shāmira, kala athumwui morei pheomida athumwui ngaleiwui kazāt raimira.
Apam hili seihā kasā saikora ina theimira kala kashāla shāmira.
Kaja ara iwui ming hili leiching khavai ina apam hi hākhuida shim hi tharchigathaira; imikyan kala ining atam saikorali hili leichingra.
Nawui vanga, navā Davidna kazat thāda iwui mangāli zatakha, ina nali sālu kaji kaso kahahai saikora athishurda iwui ain kala shiyan-chikan mayonakha,
navā Davidli ngashitta hāngkahai, ‘Israelli mungkhavai mi mavāt ngasakmara’ da kahāng thāda ina nawui wungpamkhong sakāmira.
Kha ina nali mikahai iwui shiyan kala ningkhami mamayonla thuihaida vare khangateili khorumhaiakha,
ina nali mikahai ngalei hiwui eina kashamhaora; kala imingwui vang tharchigat kahai shim hila iwui mikyanwui eina katāva̱li horhaida mibingwui chānjam kala tantaktui ngasāhaora.
“Kala hiyākha khayākakā shim hi rākhamakān kachiva̱na kashuirakhaida hāngra, ‘Khiwui 8vang
Chieina mibingna, ‘Khikhalajila Egyptwui eina athumwui avāva̱ ngarāli thānshok-khame
Huramna khami keinung saikora chi Solomonna sakāluishitta Israelnaobingli chipama.
Solomonna Hamath-zodahli vāda chi akhuiya.
Ana lamhāngli Tadmor sakai kala Hamathli khalei lankazip keinung saikora hi ana sākhuisera.
Ato Beth-horon eina Aze Beth-horonla, pan, ngavei, phākashut sanglaga ngaveikhui.

Baalathla, kala Solomonna sākakhui lankazip khavai keinung, kala siguigari haikhavai, siguiraimiwui pamkhavai, kala ana sākhangai Jerusalemlila, Lebanonlila kala awui wungram ngaleili kachungkha sākhui.
Miyur saikora, Hitnao, Amornao, Periznao, Hivnao, Jebusnao, notha kahaibing Israel makhaninga,
Israel mibingna masāthatngakanla taimi kahaibingwui ara̱-azā athum hili Solomonna thoukai phungngasaka, kala aja eina tangda phungda lei.
Kha Solomonna Israelnaobingle thoukai maphung ngasakmana: athumva raimi, awui otva̱a, kala awui siguigariwui kala siguiraimiwui kathāna sāngasaka.
Mibing hi Awunga Solomonwui khareiya otva̱bing sāda, athum shākhani hangphangāna mibingwuitungli pangshap singda yangkhame sai.
Apreiva̱ Pharaohwui naongalāva̱li Davidwui keinungli mahailuila awui vang sākhami shimli khuiunga; kaja “
Shimphowui mangāli sākahai hanphut chili Solomonna rikkatā hanphut chigata;

thang-thangwui sāki kaji Mosesna kaso kahai athishurda, sabbaththang, changwokthang, kala kumkhali kathum shida phanit, khawok makazang khamui phanit, haptābingwui phanit, kala tabernaclewui phanit chili chigata.

Avāva̱ Davidwui shiyan-chikan athishurda ana pāngmonbing khumkhum eina athumwui otpamwui vang phāsanga, kala Levinaobingna, thangthangwui otsinwui vang pāngmonbingwui mangāli otram khangatha̱ kala masot mikhavai, kala ngavei kachungkha chili mayon khavai khumkhum eina kapangsanga; kaja hi Varewui mi Davidna kaso kahaina.
Pāngmonbing, Levibingli awungana kaso kahai ot saikora, lansinwui pongli nilala akhanida makailakmana.
Chithāda sāda Solomonna
Chiwui thili Solomonna Edom ngaleiwui ngayipheili khalei Ezion-geber eina Elothli vai.
Kala Huramna awui marikhong huikatheibingli chihoda marikhong khuivāmi ngasaka. Athumna Solomonwui raobingli ngasoda Ophirwui eina sinā kg. thingtharāda phangā awunga Solomonli khuiungmi.

Solomonwui mingkhamayāng chi Shebawui awungva̱na shālaga, Solomonli kasasaka ngahān khavai, rao kachungkhali thānphunglaga utbingna nganamkaphā otyur, sinā kala aman kasaka ngalung kachungkha khuiphungda Jerusalemli vai. Ana Solomonli samkaphang tharan awui ningli khalalei saikora angahāna.
Awui khangahān saikora Solomonna ngahānkāmisera; Solomonwui eina ali mangahānkākharar thumkahai khikhala maleisāmana.
Shebawui awungva̱na Solomonwui thangmei, ana sākahai shim,
awui kashakazā, kathānabingwui otpam, raobingna otram khangatha̱, athumwui sāri, awui khorkhong singmebing kala
Awungva̱na hānga, “Nawui otsak kala thangmei, iramli leilakha ina kashā rākahāng saikora mashunglaka,
kha imik eina marātheiranglakha eina tangda kahāng kashā chi mashitsangsāmana; yanglu, nawui thangmeiwui hakkhamahā tangkhai ili mahangrangsai; ina shākasapāli nana henmei.
Napreiva̱ ngarāwui khamahai! Kala nawui mangāli nganingda thangmei tui kashā samphangda khalei nawui raobingwui ringkaphā!
Nawui
Chiwui thili ana awungali sinā kg. thinghangmati nganamkaphā otyur kala aman kasak ngalungla kachungkha mi; Shebawui awungva̱na, Awunga Solomonli khami nganamkaphā otyur chikathā maleilakranga.
Chili lāngda Ophirwui sinā khuikhaung Huram eina Solomonwui raobingna algumthing kala aman kasaka ngalungla khuiunga.
Kala awungana algumthing eina
Kala Shebawui awungva̱na ningkachāng saikora awunga Solomonna mi, ana khuikharāli lāngda awungva̱ china ningkachāng saikora mi. Kala awui raobingli ngasoda aramli latunghaowa.
Chitharan kumkhali Solomonna samkaphang sinā kg. thingmaga̱da kathumna,
chili lāngda leih kasābingna kala Arabiawui awungabingna, kala ngalei khamungabingna sinala, lupāla Solomonli khuirāmisera.
Awunga Solomonna sinā eina shaokakhui chāngvei kahahakva̱ shākhani sākhui; chāngvei ava̱va̱ kasāli sinā kg. shini sha̱kha zanga.
Kala sinā kg. kathum sha̱kha kazanga chāngvei shākathumla sākhuilaga saikora chi Lebanon Ngahong shimli haihai.
Awungana mafahāwui wungpamkhong kahakva akhala sākhuilaga sinā heirormithai.
Wungpamkhong chiwui chonchak tharuk kala pheinai akha, sinā eina saserda wungpamkhongli sāshana. Wungpamkhongwui uishong yāshong pāngpo kai, kala pāngpowui ngalemli kazingkha̱ khani runghai,
chonchak tharuk chiwui lākharip kazingkha̱ akharip runghaida chonchak tharukwui kazingkha̱ tharāda khaniya. Hikatha ot wungram kachilikha masālakmana.
Awunga Solomonwui mangkhavai khorkhong saikora sināmang eina sai, kala Lebanon Ngahong Shimwui khorkhong saikora sinā kachangamāng eina sai; Solomonwui atamli lupāsā hi khikhakhana da makhuimana.
Kaja awungawui jahas Huramwui raobingli ngasoda Tarshishli chihovāda kakathuma kum kachida Tarshishwui jahasna sinala, lupāsāla, mafahāla, nāyongla, yongyingkuila khuiungchinga.
Chithāda sāda lanwui ponglila, thangkhameiwui ponglila okathui awunga saikorali Awunga Solomon kathā maleisāmana.
Varena Solomonwui ningli sangmi kahai thangmei chi nganā khavai okathuiwui awunga saikorana awui ngalemli vāngai.
Kala khavā kachiva̱na, sinā, lupāsā, kashankachon, myrrh, nganamkaphā thao yur ayāyāva̱, sigui, gadhā, kachungkha kum kumli khuirāmi.
Solomonwui sigui kala siguigari haikhavai shim thingmati, kala siguiraimi thingtharāda khani lei: athumli siguigariwui keinungli kala awungali ngasoda Jerusalemli pamngasaka.
Kala Euphrates eina thuilaga Philistia ngalei, Egyptwui thari tāshungda awunga saikorawuitungli ana munga.
Kala awungana Jerusalemli, lupāsā lunggui thāda singnganaowa, kala cedarthingla Shephelahwui sycamore thāda sorngasaida singngasaka.
Kala Solomonwui vang Egypt kala apam kachiva̱wui eina sigui alokhui.

Ara Solomonwui otsak khangatatei, khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda, marān Nathanwui khararchānli, Shilonpa Ahijahwui khamarān tuili, kala Nebatwui naomayara Jeroboamwui pongli marān Iddowui khamahāli makapiserhaimala?
Israel saikorawuitungli Solomonna Jerusalemli kum hangmati munga.
Solomon thihaoda avāva̱ Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa, kala anaomayara Rehoboamna awui mahut thuishina.
Nebatwui naomayara Jeroboamna pao chi kashā tharan (kaja atam chili Egyptli leisai, kaja Awunga Solomonwui eina chili ayāmngayin kahaina), Egyptwui eina latunga.
Athumna mi chihoda alila ahokhui; Jeroboam kala Israelnao saikorana Rehoboamli ahānga,
“Navāna ithumli kharita kashai chiphuna. Ara chiwui vang navāwui kharita otphun kala kashai chi ngaveng ngasakakha ithum nali otram ngatha̱mipapamra.” da athumna hānga.
Ana hānga, “Kathumthangwui thili rāluinaolu.” Chieina mibing chi thuihaowa.
Chiwui thili awunga Rehoboamna avāva̱ Solomon ringlakha leikasā khararnaobingli ngasanda, “Mibing hili ngahānkā khavai nathumna ili kathāda hangchitheirakhala?” da ngahāna.
Athumna hānga, “Nana aja athumli lumashanda ningyāng ungngasakakha, kala leikashitui eina hāngakha athumna nawui rao sāchingra.”
Kha khararnaobingwui tui horhaida ali rarkākharuma awui ngasotnaobing kala awui khamashitabingli ngasana.
“Kala ana athumli hithāda hānga,” “Ithumwuitungli navāwui kharita kashai chiphun kahai chi ngaveng ngasakmilu da ili rakahāngbing chili ithumna ngahānkā khavai nathumna ili khi hānglu jikhala?”

Ali rarkākharum awui ngasotnaobing china hānga, “Nali kahāng ‘Navāna ithumli kharita kashai chiphuna, kha ara nana ithumli ngaveng ngasakmilu’ da kahāngbing chili hithāda hānglu, ‘Ishāvāwui kashānli iwui ngāngpairi reimei.
Ishāvāna nathumli kharita kashai kachiphun chili, ara ina ritmeida chiphunra. Ishāvāna lijei eina hāngkhamachin chili ina seithat eina hāngmachinra’ da hānglu.”
Chieina “Kakathumathang iwuili raluishitlu” da awungana kahāng athishurda Jeroboam kala mi saikorana kakathumathang Rehoboamwuili vai.
Kala khararnaobingna kahāng chi makhuila awungana athumli tui khālāk eina,

“Ishāvāna nathumli kharit kashai chiphuna, kha ina chili ritmei ngasakra; ishāvāna nathumli leijei eina hāngmachina, kha ina nathumli seithat eina hāngmachinra” da naoshinaobingna kahāng athishurda hānga.
Chithāda awungana mibingwui kahāng makhuisangmithuwa; kaja Nebatwui nao Jeroboamwui pongli
Athumwui kapo chi makhuisangkhami theilaga Israel saikorana awungali ngahānkai,
“Davidshili ithumwui yar khi leikhala?
Jessewui naomayarawui eina
ithumna shimlui samphangkharān maleimana.
Nathum kachichāshi shimli ungulu, O Israel!
Nashi shimkhur aningkhānranu, David.”
Chieina Israel saikora athum shimli ungserhaowa.
Kha Judahwui keinungli kapam Israelnaobingle Rehoboamna munga.
Thoukainaoli kashina Hadoramli Awunga Rehoboamna chiho khavā eina ali Israelwui mibingna lunggui eina horthathaowa. Kala Awunga Rehoboamna ngalāngda siguigari tonglaga Jerusalemli yāmung haowa.
Chiwui vang eina aja eina tangda Davidwui shimkhurli Israelna ngakaikashina.
Rehoboamna Jerusalemli khaung tharan, Judah eina Benjaminshili kazipkhuisera; kala Israelli ngararlaga Rehoboamwui wungram hankhui khavai rai kapingbing lakh akha thinghangchishat kapangkhui.
Kha Varewui mi Shemaiahli Varewui tuina rāhānga:
Solomonwui nao Rehoboam, Judahwui awunga kala Judah eina Benjaminli khalei Israel saikorali ahānglu:
Rehoboamna Jerusalemli pamda rairim sākhavai Judah ngaleili keinung kachungkha sakai.
Chiya: Bethlehem, Etam, Tekoa,
Beth-zur, Soco, Adullam,
Gath, Mareshah, Ziph,
Adoraim, Lachish, Azekah
Zorah, Aijalon, kala Hebron, keinungbing hi Judah eina Benjaminwui ngaleili sākakāna.
Raipanbing hi ngaziplak eina ana sākālaga raithānbingli shinngasaka, kala apam chili kashakazā, thao, drakhātheira̱ hikathāthā kaziphai.
Kala keinung saikora chili changveila kazeila haihaida mangatha̱ khavai sai. Chithāda ana Judah eina Benjaminli munga.
Israelwui ngachaili leikasā pāngmonpashila Levipashila apam saikorawui eina awuili rāzangsera.
Kaja Levibingna athumwui ngalei, athumwui leikasā chihohaida Judah eina Jerusalemli rāhaowa, khikhalajila Jeroboamshi vānao ngarāna Levibingli
kala kajujui apambingli ana sākakhui, satyrwui vang, kala seinaowui vang akhalatta pāngmon phāsangphaphai.
Israelwui

Athumna Judahwui wungram ngazipmei ngasaka, kala Solomonwui naomayara Rehoboamli kum kathumwui vang yansāngsa̱ pānngasaka, kaja athumna kum kathumwui vang David eina Solomonwui kasākhavā thāda okthuisai.
Rehoboamna Davidwui naomayara Jerimothwui naongalāva̱, Jessewui naomayara Eliah preiva̱ Abihailna kapharā naongalāva̱ Mahalathli preiva̱ sāda khui;
ana Jeush, Shemariah, kala Zaham athumli pharai.
Awui thili Absalomwui naongalāva̱ Maacahli khuida ana Abijah, Attai, Ziza, kala Shelomith, athumli pharai.

Apreiva̱ kala angashirva saikorawui ngachaili Rehoboamna Absalomwui naongalāva̱ Maacahli leishimeithuiya (apreiva̱ tharāda chishat kala angashirva hangtharuk da khui, kala mayarnao maga̱da chishat, naongalāva̱ hangtharuk da pharai);
Maacahwui nao Abijahli achinā ngarāwui eina Rehoboamna wungva̱ kapangsanga; kaja ali awunga sāngasak khavai phaninga.

Kala ana themlāk eina naomayara kaikhali raipan sākahai Judah eina Benjamin ngaleili khalei keinung apam saikorali yartāda pamngasaka; athumli kashakazā mavātlakla ngarānmi, kala athumwui vang preiva̱ ngarā phāsangmi.
Rehoboamwui wungram semkāda ngaziplak kahai tharan
Athumna ningtongda
siguigari thingkha shākhani, siguiraimi thinghangtharuk eina ngasoda rai. Kala Egyptwui eina ngasokhara mi Libyawui, Sukki-imwui, Ethiopiawui mi shānda makhuila rai.
Ana Judahwui raipan sākahai keinungbing khuimamānda Jerusalem shangshunga.
Chiwui thili marān Shemaiahna Rehoboam kala Judahwui wungnaobing Shishakwui vang eina Jerusalemli kazip kasāli asamphangda hānga, “
Awungala kala Israelwui awungabingla athum khalatta ningngacheida hānga, “
Athum khalatta ning ngacheihaira da
Chithālala awui rao sāngasakra, kaja ili otram ngatha̱khami, kala ngaleibingwui wungrambingli otram ngatha̱khami katheikhuivairanu.”
Chiwui vang Egyptwui awunga Shishakna Jerusalemli rāngararda,
chiwui mahut Awunga Rehoboamna pithraiwui chāngvei sākhuilaga awungawui shim khāmong khamayonbingwui otvabingwui pāngli horsangmi.
Kala awungana
Kala ana ningkhangatei tharan Varewui malungkhavāt awui eina khuithuihaoda shimānchao maji ngasakthuwa; chili lāngda Judahwui mirin phalak eina leisai.
Chithāda Awunga Rehoboamna Jerusalem sākāda munga. Ana mungkaphok tharan zingkum hangmatida akha kahairasai, kala Israel shang saikorawui eina
Ana
Rehoboamwui kasākhavā, khare eina thuilaga akatang eina tangda marān Shemaiahwui kala marān Iddowui Thotchan lairikli makapiserhaimala? Rehoboam eina Jeroboam rai thingarokchingsai.
Rehoboam thihaida avāva̱ Davidwui keinungli chifaya; kala anaomayara Abijahna awui mahut thuishina.
Awunga Jeroboamna mungda tharāda kachishat kum Abijahna Judahli mungphoka.
Ana Jerusalemli kum kathum munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Micaiah hoi, Gibeahli khalei Uzielwui naongalāva̱na.
Chitharan Abijah eina Jeroboam rai ngararsai.
Abijahna rai khamarāka mi lakh matili ngasoda raipamli vai; kala Jeroboamna ali ngasung khavai, kapingpinga raimi lakh chishatli kapangkhuida ngasung ngasaka.
Chieina Abijahna, Ephraim Kaphungramli khalei Zemaraim kaphungtungli nganingda hānga, “Ili nganālu!” O Jeroboam kala Israel saikora!
“Israelwui
Chithālala Nebatwui nao Jeroboam, Davidwui nao Solomonwui raona ngakarthuida awui akhavāli ngakaishi;
kala Solomonwui naomayara Rehoboam nganuihaoda maphaningkhuikathei kala mangasungkharar atamli khikha masakhavai makhangatun mi kaikhana Rehoboamli kasira.
Nathum mi chungmeihaowa da kala Jeroboamna nathumwui vang varebing sākakhui sināwui seinao khaleiwui vang, Varewui wungram Davidwui naongarāwui pāng eina nganurkhuishapra da phaningla?
Nathumna
“Kha ithumwui vanga

Ngathor ngazin kachida athumna rikkatā kachigat eina nganamkaphā otyur chigatchingda sinā khamathing eina sākakhui tabletungli maiyankhamui runghaichinga, kala sināwui thaomeishongli shārkhavai thaomei ngazin kachida ngarānmi; kaja ithumwui
Yanglu, Varena ithumwui mangāli thānmida lei, kala awui pāngmonbingna nathumli rai sākhavai athumwui talla̱ khongkhavai ngarānhaira. O Israelwui naobing; navā ngarāwui
Jeroboamna khanukshong kuimareida ngathirai sākhavai chihohaowa; chithāda Judahwui mangāshongla awui raimi kala khanukshongla awui raimina kuiphinhaowa,
Judahna yangkhavā tharan mangāshongla khanukshongla yanggashemānghaowa, kala athumna
Chiwui thili Judahwui mibingna raivao vaoshoka. Judahwui mibingna vaokashok tharan Varena Abijah eina Judahwui mangāli Jeroboamli maikashi mihaowa.
Israelpashi yāmhaida Varena Judahpashiwui pāngli horsangmi.
Abijahna thānda ashina kachungkha shaothata; chithāda sāda chithang Israelwui kapangkakhui raimi lakh phangā thisanghaowa.
Chithāda sāda atam chili Judahna yuihaoda Israelli maikashi mihaowa; khikhalajila athumna avāva̱ ngarāwui Vareli chihama.
Abijahna Jeroboamli kharomvāda keinung kachungkha, Bethel kala chiwui kha̱bing, Jeshanah kala chiwui kha̱bing, Ephron kala chiwui kha̱bing khuihaowa.
Abijahwui thotli Jeroboamna mangakarthukluithuwa; kala
Kha Abijah malinglak eina okthuisai. Ana ngalā tharāda mati khui, kala naomayara maga̱da khani naongalāva̱ tharāda tharuk leisai.
Abijahwui kasākhavā khangatatei, awui kasāsā kala ana hāngkahai tui marān Iddowui thotchan lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Awui
Ana yur khangateiwui hanphutbing kala kajujui apambing khuithuimiserhaowa, kala lungshom, Asherimla shaokhaitāmiserhaida,
Judahwui mibingli athumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui
Judahwui keinungli khalei kajujuipam kala nganamkaphā riktā khavai hanphut saikorala khuithuimiserhaowa. Kala wungram chi awui atamli chingri kahai samphanga.
Ngalei chi chingrihaoda Judah wungramli raipan sākasang keinung kachungkha sakai. Kaja
Kala ana Judahli hānga, “Ithumna keinungbing hi sakāluida pan, dolan, ngavei, kala veiruithing eina ngaveitithaosa; kaja ithumwui
Asawui raimi, talla̱ singda kazei kasing, Judahwui eina lakh kathum kala chāngvei kaphunga, malā kahuna Benjaminwui eina lakh khani thinghangchishat leisai; athum hiya kapingpinga raimimānga.
Ethiopiawui Zerahna raimi thingnamkha, kala siguigari shākathum thānlaga rai ngarar khavai Mareshah eina tangda rai.
Asanala ali ngasung khavai Mareshahwui Zaphathahli angarānhaowa.
Kala Asana awui
Chiwui vang eina Ethiopianaobingli Asa eina Judahwui mangāli
Asa eina awui mibingna Gerar eina tangda kharomvai; kala Ethiopianaobing akha eina tangda machakshokmana; kaja
Kala
Shakei kakeibingwui kachonshim sakhaimida yao, ut kachungkha ngaponkhui. Chiwui thili athumna Jerusalemli latunga.
Odedwui naomayara Azariahli Varewui Manglā zangmida,
ana Asali angaroklaga hānga, “Ili nganālu, Asa, kala Judah eina Benjaminshila: Nathumna
Atam kasāngkhawui vang Israelna khamashunga Vare mavaila leisai, tamchitheimi khavai pāngmonla, ainla maleisāmana;
kha athumna sipkasa tharan Israelwui
Atam chitharan, khaung khavāla chingri kahai maleisāmana, kaja athumwui ngaleili hapkakhano kalākashi pemtinghai.
Yur eina yur, ngalei eina ngalei ngarar ngarokta akha̱ sathuihairasai; kaja Varena kachotkachāng yur kachungkha eina chotngasaka.
Kha nathum pingmeilu! nathumwui otsak mangazan ngasakhailu, kaja nathumwui ot kasāwui sāman samphangra.”

Odedwui naomayara Azriahwui phongkhami tui chi shālaga Asana ninglumturhaowa, kala ana ningkakachaiya meoma̱bing, Judah eina Benjaminli, kala Ephraim kaphung ngaleili ana akhuida keinungli khalaleila hormiserhaowa; kala

Kala ana Judah eina Benjaminshi saikora, kala athumli ngasokazatbing, kaja Asali Varena ngasomiya da kathei chitharan Israel kachungkha athumwui pam chihohailaga athumwuili rāyāmkasang Ephraimnaobing, Manassehnaobing kala Simeonnaobing saikorali kazipkhuisera.
Asana mungda tharāda kaphangā kum, kachāng kakathumali athumna Jerusalemli kazipa.
Chithang athumna ngapon kakhui mukvā shāshini, kala yao thingshini chieina
Kala athum avāva̱ ngarāwui
kala sha̱naola, mayarnaola, khararnaosan mateila Israelwui
Athumna
Judah saikorana khangashit chiwui vang mathāna; kaja athumna ningtongda ngashita kala
Kha Israelwui eina kajujui apambing chi mapheimihaithuwa. Chithālala, Asawui mirin peida awui wuklung kathar eina okthui.
Sināla lupāsā khorkhong saikora, avāva̱wuila, awuila khangashit sāda lemmet ot ana
Kala awui khamung zingkum thumrāda phangā kākashung eina tangda rai mangararlakmana.
Asana mungda thumrāda katharuka kum, Israelwui awunga Baashana Judahli rai ngarara. Kala Judahwui awunga Asali mi khipākha mavāpai kala maungpai khavai, Ramahli ngaveiphinhaowa.
Chieina Asana
“Navā eina ishāvā khamashit thāda inila mashit khavai lupāsāla, sinala chiphunkharāna; yanglu, Israelwui awunga Baashana ili rai masā khavai, nani mamashitluialu.”
Ben-hadadna awunga Asawui tui nganāda awui raithānbingli chihoi, kala athumna Israelwui keinung Ijon, Dan, Abel-maim, kala Naphtaliwui lan kazip khavai keinungbing yuikhui.
Tui chi kashā eina Baashana Ramah masākāluila ot ngasām ngasakhaowa.
Chieina Awunga Asana Judahwui mibingli hokhuiserlaga Baashana Ramah sakā khavai ngalung, thing, haikasā saikora apongkhuilaga chieina Geba eina Mizpah sakāvai.
Atam chili marān Hananina Judahwui awunga Asali rāhānga, “Khikhalajila nawui
Ethiopiashi eina Libyashi siguigarila siguiraimila sorkhangasai marāmala? Kha nana
Kaja
Asana malungvātnahaida marān chili zurthing sanglaga narhai. Chili lāngda mi khangateilila Asana kachotkachāng mi.
Asawui kasāsā, khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda Judahwui kala Israelwui Awungabingwui Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Ana mungda thumrāda kachiko kum Asawui apheili kazāda marlakhaowa; kazālala
Mungda zingkum hangmatida akha kāshungkum thihaowa.
Ana Davidwui keinungli sākahai awui chikhur chili chifahaowa. Nganamkaphā thao kala otyur kachungkha manatlaga sākazak kahai kathipetli chipethaida athumna khayākashiwui meifa shātrunga.
Judahwui raipan sākahai keinung kachiva̱li raimi haisera, kala Judahwui apam kachiva̱li raimi pamkhavai sāda raimi haivāsera.
Rida avāva̱na zatkasa athishurda kazatwui vang Jehoshaphatli
Israelwui thāda athumwui thi mashurla kha avāva̱wui Vareli phāda awui ningkhami athishurda zata.
Chiwui vang
li chihanchaoda malung pinglak eina ana kajujuipambing kala Asherim chi Judah ngaleiwui eina khuithuimiserhaowa.
Ana mungda kakathuma kum, awui wungnaobing, Ben-hail, Obadiah, Zechariah, Nethanel, kala Micaiah athumli, Judahwui keinung keinungli tamchithei khavai chihoi;

athumli ngasoda Levinaobing, Shemaiah, Nethaniah, Zebadiah, Asahel, Shemiramoth, Jehonathan, Adonijah, Tobijah kala Tobadonijahli chihovai; chili lāngda Levinaobingli ngasoda pāngmon Elishama eina Jehoramla chihovai.
Athumna
Judahli kuimareida khalei wungram kachida
Philistinenaobing kaikhana Jehoshaphatli otla, lupāsāla shai chigata; kala Arabwui mibingna yaovā thingshini shāshini kala mevā thingshini khuirāmi.
Kala Jehoshaphat mataimeida reisanga. Ana Judah ngaleili raipan kala lan kazipshim kachungkha sāsanga,
kala Jerusalemli awui raimi kala kapingpinga raimi kachungkha lei.
Avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhurwui eina shānkakhui chi hina: Judahwui thingthingwui raithānbing: Adnahna kapingpinga mi lakh-kathumwui raithāna sai,
awui thili Jehohananna lakh-khani thinghangchishatwui raithāna sai;
awui thi kazanga Zichriwui naomayara Amasiah,
Benjaminwuili kapinga Eliadana chāngvei kaphung malā kasinga lakh-khanili thāna,
awui thili Jehozabadna zei-khai kasing lakh akha thinghangchishatli thāna.
Awungana Judah ngaleili raipan sākā kahai keinung apamli chipam kahai chili lāngda hibing hina awungawui otram ngatha̱ khavaina.
Chitharan Jehoshaphat kashāngla shānghao, khayāla kalākhaoda Ahabshili ngalā ngakhota.
Kum kashāng kahaiwui thili ana Ahabli samphang khavai Samariali tai. Ahabna awui vang kala ali khangayurbingwui vang mukvāla yaola kachungkha taithatmi, kala Ramoth-gileadli rai sākhavai sui.
Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatli Israelwui awunga Ahabna, “Ramoth-gileadli na ili mangasovarakhala?” da ngahāna.
Jehoshaphatna, “Ini khani akhana, iwui mibing nawui mibingpapama, rai khangararli ithumla nali ngasora” da hānga.
Jehoshaphatna Israelwui awungali, “
Chieina Israelwui awungana marān shāmati hokhuilaga hānga, “Ramoth-gileadli rai vāsāsikā makasā phāmeirakhala?”
“Vangararlu, Varena awungawui pāngli horsangmira.” da athumna ngahānkai.
Kha Jehoshaphatna, “Hili lāngda ngasankapai
Israelwui awungana Jehoshaphatli hānga, “
Kha Jehoshaphatna, “Awungana chithāda mahāngmialu” da hānga.
Chieina Israelwui awungana awui otva̱ akhali hokhuida, “Thaklak eina Imlahwui nao Micaiahli ahokhuilu” da kasoi.
Israelwui awunga eina Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatna aniwui wungnao sāri shaksāda wungpamkhongli pamda; anina Samariawui ngavei zangkhavai ranpumli leilakha marānbingna aniwui mangāli marānsai.
Kala Chenaanahwui nao Zedekiahna mariwui seingaji akha sākhuilaga “
Marān saikoranala, chi tākam eina “Ramoth-Gileadli vāda maikhayā ngasalu; kaja
Micaiahli akahopa china ali hānga, “Yanglu, marānbingna khokkha sāda kahāng tui chili awungana mayāngai; nala athumwui thāda awungali ningyang ungkhavai hānglu.”
Kha Micaiahna ngahānkai, “

Awungawuili khavā chitharan awungana, “Micaiah, ithumna Ramoth-Gileadli rai kasā phameirakā makasā phāmeirakhala?” da ngahāna. Ana ngahānkai, “Vada maikhayā ngasalu; athumli nawui pāngli horsangmimāngra.”
Kha awungana hānga, “Nana
Ana hānga, “Yaokahoma makhalei thāda Israel saikorali kaphungli chaiyāng kahai chi ina thei, kala
Israelwui awungana Jehoshaphatli hānga, “Zakkashi maningla khamathā akhanida ana mamarānmimara da ina nali mahāngmala?”
Micaiahna hānga, “Chiwui vang eina
kala
Chiwui thili manglā akhana mangāshong rāda
Ana hānga, ‘Ina kakapika manglā akha sāda vālaga marānbingli kakapik tui matui ngasakra.’ Ana hānga, ‘Nana ali vasuida ungshungra vālu, chithāda vāsālu.’
Chiwui vang eina ara yanglu, nawui marānbingwui khamorli kakapika manglā
Chieina Chenaanahwui naomayara Zedekiahna Micaiahwui ngalemli vālaga amaisorli akapheda hānga, “
Micaiahna hānga, “Yanglu, nana alunga kāli zangyāmngathumthang theinaora.”
Israelwui awungana hānga, “Micaiahli tukkhuilaga keinungwui rammunga Amon eina awungawui naomayara Joashwui pāngli khuivāmihaolu;
kala hānglu, awungana hithāda hānga, ‘I chingri eina malatungranglakha eina tangda mi hi phātop sanghaisālu, kala kashakazā kateteo mizā mimangmalu.”
Micaiahna hānga, “Nana chingri eina latungsi kaje ili
Israelwui awunga eina Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatna Ramoth-gileadli vai.
Kala Israelwui awungana Jehoshaphatli hānga, “Ili mathei khavai sāri ngacheikhuilaga ina raipamli vāra, nava wungsāri shaksāpapamlu.” Kala Israelwui awungana sāri onkhuilaga raipamli vāhaowa.
Chitharan Syriawui awungana awui siguigari kathānabingli, Israelwui awunga maningla, kharei kateo khipālikha mangararalu da kasohaisai.
Siguigariwui raikhokabing china Jehoshaphatli kathei eina “Israelwui awunga leili” da hānga. Kala athumna ali ngarar khavai ngareiunga; chieina Jehoshaphatna ali ngachonmi khavai ngakaowa; kala
kaja siguigariwui kathānabingna Israelwui awunga maningmana da kathei eina ali makharomluila latunghaowa.

Kha mi akhana malā eina kāpta Israelwui awungawui chāngvei eina thikom ngachaili thaiphutsangmihaowa. Chieina awui siguigari kasingali “Ili khamā za̱haira, chieina ngareikhuida ili raipamwui eina khuithuihaolu” da hānga.
Chithang rai khangarar pangshunhaida Israelwui awungana siguigarili shailaga Syriawui raimili ngazin eina tangda ngasungyanga; chiwui thili zimik tunngasha̱da thihaowa.
Jehoshaphatna hapkakhano maleilakla aram Jerusalemli latunga.
Kha Hananiwui nao marān Jehuna asamphangda Jehoshaphatli hānga, “Makaphā-makhayā mili nana ngachonda
Chithālala nawuili kaphā leidalei, kaja nana Asherahbing chi sākhayāngmiserhaida nawui wuklungna Vareli phai.”
Jehoshaphatna Jerusalemli pama; kala Beersheba eina thuida Ephraimwui kaphungrambing chi vāshungda athumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui
Judahwui raipan sākahai keinung saikorali bichar sākhamebing phasangmiserda athumli hānga:
“Nathum khisarakhala da phaningkazaklu, kaja nathumna miwui vang bichar kasā maningmana, kha
Chiwui vang Vareli khangachee nathumwuitungli leiranu; nathumna khi sālikhala kaji ningngasharlu; kaja ithumwui
Chili lāngda, Jerusalemwui alungli tui kashoshok
Ana athumli kasoda hānga, “Hithāda nathumna ningtonglak eina shitsangchaoda
Keinungli khalei nachinā ngarāwui eina, ashee katāwui vang nilala, ningkhami nilala, ain nilala, ningkhami kala ain lah shiyan-chikanbingwui pongli nathumli khuikharā tharan nathumna
Kala yanglu,
Hiwui thili Moabnaobing eina Amonnaobingna, kala Meunbing kaikhali ngasoda Jehoshaphatli rai sākhavai rai.
Mi kaikhana Jehoshaphatli ahānga, “Nali rai sākhavai shamadru makānda, Edomwui eina mi kachungkha rārāli; kala yanglu, athum Hazazon-tamar (chiya, Engedi)li leida lei.”
Chieina Jehoshaphatna ngacheehaida akhalatta
wui eina khangachon samphang khavai Judahna kazipa; Judahwui keinung saikorawui eina
wui shimli, yāngkhup kadhar sākahai chili Judah eina Jerusalemwui kazip chili Jehoshaphatna nganingda hānga,
“O
O ithumwui Vare, nawui mi Israelnaobingwui mangāli apam hili leikasābingli nana kashammihaida nawui ngasotnao Abrahamwui ara̱-azāli katang makhavaiwui vang khami maningmala?
Athumna chili pamda namingwui vang kathara shimla hili sakāhaira, kala,

‘Ithumwuitungli kalākashi raakha, rai nilala, kazāt nilala, bichar kasā nilala, chāmrei nilala, namingwui vang sākahai shim hili nawui mangāli nganingda, ithumwui kakhanang kachot nali hāngphatta ngakaoakha nana shāmida huimira da hānghaira.’
“Ara yanglu, Israelnaobing Egyptwui eina kashok tharan nana rai masā khangasaka Amonnao, Moabnao, kala Seir Kaphungwui mibingna,
yanglu, nana mikahai shimlui hi athumna sāman khami thāda ithumli kashamhailaga khuilui khavai rārāli.

O Ithumwui Vare, athumwuitungli mashun bichar masāmimarala? Kaja ithumli ngarar khavai rarāda khalei mi chungnāhaoda ithum khikha masāthukthura. Ithumna khisarakhala da matheithura, kha ithumna nali yangdalei.”
Judahwui mi saikorana athumwui naoshinaobing, naongarā, preiva̱ ngarāli ngasoda
Levipa Asaphwui ara̱, Mattaniahwui naomayara Je-ielwui naomayara, Benaiahwui naomayara, Zechariahwui nao Jahazielna yarui kazipwui alungli nganinglakha
Kala ana hānga, “Nganālu, Judah eina Jerusalemwui mi saikora, kala Awunga Jehoshaphat:
Akhama athumli ngarar khavai tālu; yanglu, athumna Zizwui ashan chili rārā, Jeruel lamhāngwui zingshoshong akatang tampākli nathumna athumli samphangra.
Nathumna rai hili ngarar khavai maleimana; nathumwui pam khuida nganingpamlaga nathumwui vang
Chieina Jehoshaphatna amai ngaleili mashunzanga, kala Judah eina Jerusalemwui mibingla
Kala Levinaobing, chiya Kohath eina Corahshina thuinganingda Israelwui
Athumna ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuida Tekoawui lamhāngli vai; athumna khavā tharan Jehoshaphatna nganingda hānga, “Judah eina Jerusalemwui mibing ili nganālu! Nathumwui
Mibingli ana hāngchithei kahai thili, kathar sāri ngavaida laasak eina
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana!”
Athumna laa sāda masot mikaphok tharan, Judahli ngararkida kharā Ammonnao, Moabnao, kala Seir Kaphungwui mibingli
Kaja, Ammonnaobing eina Moabnaobingna Seir kaphungwui mibingli ngararda zāikhayāngthatserhaowa, kala Seirwui mibingli sāthatser kahaiwui thili athum akha eina akha sāthat ngaroka.
Judahnaobingna lamhāng chiwui raikānphung dolan eina kāngashānkhayang tharan, yanglu, kathi angunmāng leisai; akhala mayāmshokmana.

Jehoshaphat eina awui mibingna ot akhangapon chitharan seila, thāngthāngla, kashankachon kala aman kasaka ot kachungkha leisāda athum khalattawui vang maphungkharar sāda apongkhui. Kathumthang langpongda phunglala ot chi chunglākhaoda makānmana.
Khamatethang athumna Beracahwui Leiwukli kazipa, kaja chili athumna
Chiwui thili Judah eina Jerusalemwui mi kachiva̱ Jehoshaphatna thānda mathānthup eina Jerusalemli latunga kaja athumwui yangkashebingli
Jerusalemli tingteilāla, lyre kala talla̱la singda
Israelwui vang yangkashebingli
Chithāda Jehoshaphatwui wungram chingrihaowa, kaja Varena awui kuikhamareili chingrihai ngasakhaowa.

Jehoshaphatna chithāda Judahli munga. Ana Jerusalemli mungkaphok tharan kum thumrāda phangā kāshunghairasai, kala Jerusalemli kum maga̱da phangā munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Azubah hoi, Shilhiwui naongalāva̱na.
Ana avāva̱ Asawui shongzat tākam eina makailakla zatsai; kala
Kha mibingna, awova̱ ngarāwui Vareli ning horsangchao makajiwui vang, kajujuiwui kameopam masākhayāngmihaithuwa.
Jehoshaphatwui kasāsā, khare eina thuilaga katang eina tangda Hananiwui naomayara Jehuwui Thotrinchān lairik, kaja Israel Awungabingwui Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Ali ngashiklaga Tarshishli vākhavai, Ezion-geberli jahas sākhui.
Kha Mareshahli khalei Dodavahuwui naomayara Eliezerna Jehoshaphatli, “Ahaziahli khangasowui vang nana sākahai
Avāva̱ Jehoshaphatna kapharā achinā ngarā chiya: Azariah, Jehiel, Zechariah, Azariah, Michael kala Shephatiah; athum hi Judahwui awunga Jehoshaphatwui naomayarasera.
Avāva̱na athumli lan kaja lupāsā, sinā, kala aman kasak shimlui, Judahli khalei raipan sākahai keinung eina ngasoda yarsera; kha wungrama naochizai Jehoramli yara.
Jehoramna wungpamkhongli pamda nganingkhui kahai eina achinā ngarā katongali raighai eina sāthatserhaowa, kala Israelwui wungnao kaikhalila sāthathaowa.
Ahabwui naongalāva̱li khangakumwui vang, Israelwui awunga Ahabna kala ashi shimkhurna kasā thāda ala chili zata.
Kha Davidli kala awui naomayarabingli kahor akha mirada Davidli ngashit kahaiwui vang
Awui thotli Judahli mamayāmada Edompashina thuingarara, kala athum khalattawui awunga phākhuihaowa.
Chieina Jehoramna awui raimi kathānabing kala siguigari saikorali ngasoda ngayāting vālaga a eina awui raimi kathānabingli kuikhanama Edompashili sāthatserhaowa.
Chiwui vang aja eina tangda Edombingna Judahli ngararching kajina. Atam chitharan avāva̱ ngarāwui
Chili lāngda Judahwui kaphungpambingli kajujui apambing sakālaga Jerusalemwui mibingli mashitkasang pongli thānzatta Judahli apong nguingasaka.
Kala marān Elijahwui eina chithi akha chihorāda hānga, “Navā Davidwui

kha Israelwui awungabingwui apongli shurzatta Judah eina Jerusalemwui mibingli, Ahabna Israelnaobingli mashitkasangwui pongli thānkazat thāda kasāwui vang, nali phākhamei nachinā ngarā, navāwui shimkhur mibinglila, nana shaothathaira,
yanglu,
kala nali paiphonli kazātkashi kazāra, kala thangthangwui kakazā china napaiphon ngawokphāthaora.’”
Jehoramwuitungli malungvātkhavai, Ethiopiawui ngalemli khalei Philistianaobinglila, Arabnaobinglila

kala athumna Judahli rai rākaida, awungawui shimli khalei athumna samkaphang lan saikora kala anaomayarabing, apreiva̱ ngarāla, saikora pongkorthuihaida, paisho Ahaziah maningla nao mayarnao akhanidala mataimimana.
Saikora hiwui thili
Khaleilaga, kum khaniwui thili, kazāt china paiphon ngawokphathaida chotchanglak eina thihaowa. Avāva̱ ngarāli khayākashiwui meifa shatkharung kasā thāda ali khayākashiwui meifa mashatrungmimana.

Ana mungkaphok tharan kum thumrāda khani kāshunghairasai, kala Jerusalemli kum chishat munga. A kathi atamli khipākha wukmakhanangmana. Davidwui keinungli chifaya, kha awungabingwui chikhurli machifamana.
Ahaziahna mungkaphok tharan a kum hangmati da khani kāhairasai, kala Jerusalemli kumkha munga. Ava̱va̱li Athaliah hoi, Omriwui ara̱va̱na.
Ava̱va̱na makaphā makhayā kasāwui pongli hāngchitheihaoda anala Ahabwui shimkhurwui apongli zata.
Ahabwui shimkhurna kasā thāda anala
Athumwui tamkachithei athishurda Israel awunga Ahabwui naomayara Joramli ngasoda Syriawui awunga Hazaelli rai sākhavai Ramoth-gileadli vai. Kala Syriapāshina Joramli khamā zamihaowa;

Syriawui awunga Hazaelli khangarar tharan Ramothli sākaza̱ khamā chi ngahā khavai Jezreelli latunga. Ahabwui nao Joram kazā kahaiwui vang Judahwui awunga Jehoramwui naomayara Ahaziahna angahān khavai Jezreelli tai.
Jehuna Ahabwui shimkurli bichar sāda leilakha, Judahwui wungnaobing kala Ahaziahli ngasokazat achinā ngarāwui naomayarabingli samphangda ana athumli shaothatserhaowa.
Ahaziahlila phākhavā eina Samariali yāmngathumsāda tukkhuilaga Jehuwuili tukungda sāthathaowa. Athumna ali chifami, kaja, “

Kha awungawui naongalāva̱ Jeho-shabe-athna Ahaziahwui naomayara Joashli sāthathaoki kaji awungawui naomayarabingwui eina ngathumda khuilaga ali khayangva̱li ngasoda petkā akhali thumhaowa. Hithāda sāda awunga Jehoramwui naongalāva̱, pāngmon Jehoiadawui preiva̱, kaja Jeho-shabe-athna Ahaziahwui azarva̱na, ana awui naoli thumhaida chiwui vang Athaliahna masāthatthuwa;
kala Athaliahna ngalei chili munglakha eina tangda Joashna kum tharuk Vareshimli yāmngathumpamda athumli ngasopama.

Kashine kum Jehoiadana malung khanamkhuihaoda shāshāwui raimi kathānabingli khangashit akha sai, athum chiya: Jerohamwui naomayara Azariah, Jehohananwui naomayara Ishmael, Obedwui naomayara Azariah, Adaiahwui naomayara Ma-aseiah, kala Zichriwui naomayara Elishaphatna.
Athumna Judahwui keinung kuimareida vālaga Levipashi kala Israel avāva̱ ngarāwui wungva̱bing saikorali kazipkhuida Jerusalemli rāsera.
Kala kazip kahai saikorana awungali ngasoda Khorumshimli tuingashit akha sai. Kala Jehoiadana hānga, “Yanglu, awungawui naomayara!
Nathumna sāki kaji ot chi hina: pāngmonbingla, Levibingla sabbaththang ot makasā atamli, khum kathumwui akhana ngavei mayonra,
khumkhana awungawui shimli pamra, kala khumkhana Shimphunga Ngaveili pamra; kala mi saikorana
Pāngmonbing, Levinaobing, kaja otram ngatha̱ khavai kathara athum maningla khipākha
Levipashina kachichāwui zeighai singlaga awungali kuinamda pamra; kala shimli kazazang mi chili sāthatra. Zanglala shoklala awungali ngasoshon ngasothaiki kajina.”

Pāngmon Jehoiadana kahāng athishurda Levinaobing eina Judah saikorana chithāda sai. Sabbathwui ot saukida kharābingla, thuiuki kajibingla kachichāwui mingayar athishurda makailakla sai; kaja pāngmon Jehoiadana khipālikha shimli maung ngasakmana.
Kala pāngmon Jehoiadana kathānabingli David awungawui kazei, chāngvei kahakla kateola, Khorumshimli haikasā saikora chi khuimi;
mi saikora awungawui mayon khavai kachichāwui zeighai singlaga, shim chiwui azing zingtun kala hanphutpam eina shim chi kuimareida nganing ngasaka.

Chiwui thili ana awunganao chi khuishoklaga kuihon ngahonmi, ngashit kahai lairik chisina; kala Jehoiadashi vānao ngarāna tharchisin khavai thao neomida chi awungana da vāoshoka, kala athumna, “Awungali okpeiranu” da hānga.
Mibingna awungali masot mida ngaunlop kahai chi Athaliahna kashā tharan, ana mibingli

kala ana khayang tharan, zangkhavaili awungana awui pākra̱ ngalemli nganingsai, kala kathānabing eina talla̱ kakhongbingna awungawui ngalemli nganingda ngalei chiwui mi saikora mathānthup eina, talla̱ khongda laakasā, laawui akap akai eina ngasolaga athumna mathānda sochigatsai. Athaliahna kachon serkhākta, “Khayomna! Khayomna!” da hānga.
Chieina pāngmon Jehoiadana raimi kathānabing chili kasoda hānga, “Ali raimiwui ngachaili ayarli khuishoklu; kala awui thi kashura chili raighai eina sāthatra.” Kaja pāngmon china, “Ali
Chieina athumna ali tukkhuilaga awungawui shimwui sigui ngavei zangkhavaili vāda chili athumna sāthathaowa.
Kala Jehoiadana, ala, mibingla, kala awungala, athum
Chiwui thili mibing china Baalwui shim apheimihailaga hanphutla, meoma̱la, akha̱ sāda shaokhaimiserhaowa, kala Baalwui pāngmon Mattanlila hanphut ngalemli shaothathaowa.
Kala Jehoiadana
Makatharabing
Kala ana kathānabing, khangamkhareibing, mibingwui rammungabing, kala ngalei chiwui mi saikorali hokhuilaga, awungali,
Chiwui vang ngalei chiwui mi saikora mathānhaowa; kala Athaliahli raighai eina sāthat kahai thili keinung chi chingrihaowa.
Jehoiada pangmona ringlakha eina tangda Joashna
Jehoiadana awui vang apreiva̱ khani khuisangmida sha̱naola mayarnaola pharai.
Hiwui thili Joashna

Kala ana pāngmon eina Levinaobingli kazipkhuida hānga, “Judahwui keinungbingli vāda Israel saikorawui eina nathum Varewui shim chiphokhui khavai kum kum eina pheisā ngashaikhuilu.” Kha Levinaobingna yansānghaowa.
Chiwui vang awungana Jehoiada pāngmon khareili hokhuida hānga, “
Kaja makaphā preiva̱, Athaliahwui naongarāna Varewui shimli sakhaizangda;
Chiwui vang awungana kasoda athumna lupā sangkhavai oko akha sākhui kala
Kala lamhāngli leilakha
Wungnaobingla, mibing saikorala mathānthathup eina oko chi mapemranglakha eina tangda rāchigata.

Okobing chili pheisā chunghaira da kathei tharan kala Levinaobingna awungawui otva̱bingli khuivākhami tharan, awungawui kapimeli ngasoda pāngmon khareiwui otva̱na pheisā heikhuilaga apam chili ahailuilui ji. Chithāda athumna thongthāng pheisā kachungkha ngashaikhui.
Awunga eina Jehoiadana pheisā chi
Chieina otkasābing china ot sāda shim kachiphowui ot chi mangā vāda athumna Khorumshim chi khangachāwui tākam eina sākhuilaga shim chi ngazipmei ngasaka.
Shim chi sākup kahai tharan, athumna pheisā katai chi awunga eina Jehoiadali khuirāmi, kala pheisā chieina
Kala Jehoiada ringlakha eina tangda athumna
Kha Jehoiada kasāngkha okthuida sarlak eina thiya; awui kathi atamli kum shākha thumrā kāshunghairasai.
Athumna ali Davidwui keinungli awungabingli ngasoda chifahaowa, kaja ana Israelwui vang, Varewui vang kala awui shimkhurwui vang kapha sāmihaisai.
Jehoiada thikahaiwui thili Judahwui wungnaobingna awungali khayākashi vāmi; kala ana athumwui kapo khuisangmi.
Kala athumna avāva̱ ngarāwui Vare
Chithālala
Chieina Varewui manglāna Jehoiadawui naomayara Zechariahli singda, ana mibingwui mangāli nganingda hānga, “Varena hithāda hānga, ‘Kachiwui vang eina nathumna
Kha athumna ngathumda ali mithit khalen sangda awungawui kakaso athishurda
Hithāda Zechariahwui avāva̱ Jehoiadana Joash awungali lukhamashan chithei kahai chi ana maphaningungla anaomayarali sāthathaowa. Ana hithāda hāngthi, “
Syria raimi kateokhamang rālala

Khamā marlak eina za̱mihailaga Syrianaobing thuikahai eina, Joashwui raobingna ngathumda mithit khalen sālaga Jehoiadawui naomayarali ashee tākhangasakwui vang, alila pettungli shaothathaowa. A thikahai eina Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa, kha awungabingwui chikhurli machifamana.
Ali ngathumda mithit khalen kasangbing chi: Ammonpava̱ Shime-athna kapharā Zabad eina Moabpava̱ Shimrithna kapharā Jehozabadna.
Joashwui naomayarabingwui pongli kala awuitungli kaphong, kala Varewui shim sākākhalui saikora hi Awungabingwui Lairikli kapiserhaida lei. Anaomayara Amaziahna awui mahut thuishina.
wui miktāli ana khamashung ot chi sai, kha ning tharchao majimana.
Kala wungpam rungshing kahaiwui thili avāva̱li sākathata awui raobing chili ana sāthathaowa.
Kha

Chiwui thili Amaziahna Judahwui mibingli kazipkhuida avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhurbingwui athishurda thingthing kala shāshāwui kathānabingwui azingli Judah eina Benjamin saikorawui vang ngarānmihai. Kum maga̱ kala chiwui atung saikorali shānkhayang eina, zeighai singkathei, chāngvei phungkathei, raili vākapai mi lakh kathum leisai.
Kala Israelwui eina kapingpinga mi lakh akhali lupāsā kg. thingkathum shāmati mida masākhui.
Kha Varewui mi akhana ali rāhānga, “O awunga, Israelwui raimi nali mangasoranu, kaja Israel kala Ephraimnaobingli Varena mangasomimana.
Kha athumli ngasolaga nana rai yuira da phaningakha nali yangkashebingwui pāngli horsangmihaora; kaja Varena ngachonmikashap kala horhaikashap pangshap lei.”
Amaziahna Varewui mi chili hānga, “Thākha Israel raimi khamasāwui vang lupāsā kg. thingkathum shāmati ina mikahai chi kathāura?” Varewui mi china hānga, “Chili chungmeikharda
Chieina Amaziahna Ephraimwui eina kharā raimibing chili shimli shiunluihaowa. Kala athumna Judahli malungvātsir shim hanunghaowa.
Kha Amaziahna malung khanamkhuida awui mibingli thānda Machi Tampākli vai kala Seirli mi thingtharā sāthata.
Judahwui mibingna khangatei thingtharā tukkhuilaga lunghārtungli khuikāda chiwui eina hortāda zangshirthatserhaowa.
Kha raili Amaziahna mathanvāla shiun kahai raimibing china Judahwui keinungli Samariawui eina thuilaga Beth-haron shangshungda chili khalei mi thingkathum sāthatlaga otla kachungkha ngaponthuihaowa.
Edomnaoli sākathatwui eina hankhaung thili Amaziahna Seirnaobingwui varebing khuiungda awui vare ngasāda chili khoruma, kala kachigatla chigata.
Chiwui vang

Kha ana hāngmahunglakha awungana hānga, “Awungawui machinme sākhavai nali ithumna phāsangla? Thahaolu! Nali khiwui vang sāthat sarakhala?” Chieina marān china thāhaowa, kha hithāda hānga, “Nana hikathā ot kasāwui vang kala iwui hāngkachithei makakhuiwui vang Varena nali shimān khavai sāhaira kaji ina thei.”

Awunga Joashna Judahwui awunga Amaziahli pao chihovāda hānga, “Lebanonwui ka̱shatrongna Lebanonli khalei cedarthingli ‘Nanao ngalāva̱li inaomayarawui preiva̱̱ sākhavai milu’ ji; kala Lebanonwui ramsāna rākānda ka̱shātrong chi naithathaowa.
Nana hānga, ‘Yanglu, ina Edomli yuihaira,’ da nawui ningna nali langso ngasaklakhaira. Kha ara shimli kasaikha pamlu; na kala nali ngasoda Judahla kongluirum khavai khisāda reokhuirakhala?”
Kha Amaziahna manganāsangmana; kaja athumna Edomwui vareli kaphaningwui vang yangkashebingwui pāngli horsangmi khavai hi Varewui khangarānna.
Chieina Israelwui awunga Joash eina Judahwui awunga Amaziahna Judahwui Beth-shemesh raiphungli mik mai ngaphanlak eina ngarara.
Kala Israelna Judahli yuihaida kachāyām eina shimli yāmunghaowa.

Ahaziahwui naomayara, Joashwui naomayara, Amaziah Judahwui awungali Israelwui awunga Joashna Beth-shemeshli tukkhuilaga Jerusalemli khuiunga; kala Jerusalemwui phākho, Ephraim ngavei eina thuilaga Achithek Ngavei khuining shāmati shaokhaitāmihaowa.
Kala ana sinā kala lupāsā saikora kala Varewui shimli leikasā khorkhong saikora, kala Obed-edomla zangda khuithui haowa; chili lāngda awungawui lanla, mila, khuida Samariali khuiunghaowa.
Amaziahwui kasāsā saikora khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda Judahwui kala Israelwui Awungabingwui Lairikli makapiserhaimala?
Ana
Athumna sigui eina phungunglaga avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli ungchifahaowa.
Kum tharāda tharuk rarkahaiya Uzziahli Judahwui mibing saikorana avāva̱wui mahut awunga sanghaowa.
Awunga thikahaiwui thili ana Eloth sakākhuilaga Judahli hanmi.
Uzziahna mungkaphok tharan a kum tharāda tharuk kāshunghairasai, kala Jerusalemli kum hangphangada khani munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Jecoliah hoi, Jerusalemlāna.
Avāva̱ Amaziahna kasā thāda ana
Vareli khangachee tamkachitheia Zechariahwui atamli ana Vareli phai; kala ana
Ana Philistinenaobingli angarara, kala Gathwui, Jabnehwui, Ashdodwui phākhobing sākhaimiserhaowa; kala Ashdodwui apamli kala Philistinewui apam khangatateilila keinung sakai.
Philistineli, kala Gurbaalli khalei Arabnaobingli, kala Meunbingli khangarar tharan Varena ali ngachonmi.
Ammonnaobingna Uzziahli shai misai, kala awui mingkhamayāng Egyptwui thari tāshunga, kaja a pangshap leilakhaowa.
Chili lāngda Achithek Ngaveilila, Leiwuk Ngaveilila, Anglelila Uzziahna dolan sākāda ngaveitithai.
