lamhānglila dolan sākālaga ra̱khong kachungkha khonkhui; kaja Shephelahlila, tampāklila awui sha̱kei kachungkha leisai, kala kaphungramli lui khavā eina drakhā yāmgui kasā mi kachungkha phāsanga, kaja kaphungram chi tumhaoda ana ningchānglaka.
Chimāng maningla, raili vākapai shipai kachungkha, kapime Je-iel eina otva̱ Ma-aseiahna awungawui raimi kathāna Hananiahwui hāngkachithei athishurda, raimi khum khum eina leisai.
Avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur eina rai kapingabing kaziplaga thingkhani shātharukna.
Athumwui azingli, lungsanlak eina rai ngararshapa, yangkasheli ngararda awungali ngachonmi khavai raimi lakh-kathum thingshini shāphangā lei.
Kala raimi saikorawui vang Uzziahna chāngvei, kazei, kuihon, raikachon, malā kala thailungthei ngarānmisera.

Kala dolan kala achithekwui eina malāthing kala ngalung kāpkhavai, kathethembingna Jerusalemli akap sāshoka. Ana mapangranglakha eina tangda ali matakhak eina ngachonmihaoda, awui mingkhamayāng katāva̱lila ngayaovai.
Kha ana kapang chitharan langsohaowa, china awui shimān khavai ngasāhaowa. Kaja awui
Kha pāngmon Azariahna kapingpinga
athumna awunga Uzziahli hānga, “
Uzziahna pāngli nganamkaphā rikkhavai meikhong singsāda malungvāthaowa. Ana
Pāngmon kharei Azariah kala pāngmon saikora ali khayang tharan akhaveili phārrei kakazā thei! Chieina athumna totot eina namshokhaowa.
Awunga Uzziah kathi eina tangda phārrei kazai, kala phārrei kakazāwui vang
Khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda Uzziahna kasāsā Amozwui naomayara marān Isaiahna kapiserhaida lei.
Uzziah thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarā awungabingli chifa khavaipamli chizanhaowa, kala athumna, “A phārrei kakazā mina” da hānga. Kala anaomayara Jothamna awui mahut thuishina.
Jothamna mungkaphok tharan a kum maga̱da phangā kāshunghairasai, ana Jerusalemli kum tharāda tharuk munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Jerush hoi, Zadokwui naongalāva̱na.
Avāva̱ Uzziahna kasā thāda anala
wui shim atowui ngavei ana sakai, kala Ophelwui phākho kachungkha sāsanga.
Chili lāngda, Judahwui kaphungramli keinung kachungkha sakai, ngahongli raipanla, mayon khavai dolanla sākhui.

Ammonnaobingwui awungalila ngararlaga ana yuikahai eina Ammonnaobingna chikum lupāsā kg. thingkathum shāmati, kehu, ton thingkha kala nāpai ton thingkha da mi. Kakhane kala kakathuma kumla, Ammonnaobingna chi tākam eina milui.
Jothamna awui
Jothamwui kasā khavā, ana rai khangarar, kala awui acham aram, saikora Israel eina Judahwui Awungabingwui Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Ana mungkaphok tharan kum maga̱da phangā kāshunghairasai, kala Jerusalemli kum tharāda tharuk munga.
Jotham thikahai eina avāva̱ ngarāli ngasoda Davidwui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Ahazna awui mahut thuishina.
Ahazna mungkaphok tharan a kum maga̱ kāshunghairasai, kala ana Jerusalemli kum tharāda tharuk munga. Avāva̱ Davidna kasā thāda ana
kha Israelwui awungabingwui apongli zata. Baalwui meoma̱ eina tangdala sākhui;
kala
Kajujuipam, kaphunglila, kala khamateka thingphei kachiva̱li pha̱phayāda nganamkaphā thaola riktai.
Chiwui vang awui
Kaja, Remaliahwui naomayara Pekahna thangkhali Judahwui mi lakh akha thingmaga̱ sāthata. Athum chi rai kapinga mimānglala avāva̱ ngarāwui
Kala awungawui naomayara Ma-aseiah, raimi kathāna Azrikam, kala awungawui thi kazanga Elkanah athum kathumli Ephraimwui kapinga Zichrina shaothathaowa.
Israelwui mibingna achināngarā, athumwui preiva̱ngarā, naongarā, sha̱naola, mayarnaola lakh-khani tukthui haowa, kala otla kachungkha athumwui eina ngaponkhuida Samariali khuiunga.
Kha Oded kaho
Chiwuitungli Judahwui kala Jerusalemwui sha̱nao mayarnaoli nathumna mungkhavai kala raonao sāngasak khavai ngaranda lei. Nathumwui
Ara iwui tui nganālu, nathumna tukphungda khalei nachinā ngarāli shiunserhaolu; kaja

Ephraimwui wungnao kaikha, Johananwui naomayara Azariah, Meshilemothwui naomayara Berechiah, Shallumwui naomayara Jehizkiah, kala Hadlaiwui naomayara Amasa, athumnala nganingkāda raiwui eina khaungbingli mamayāmada hānga,
“Nathumna tukkaphungbing chi hili makhuirāpaimara, kaja ithumwui morei kala khayon khamāng hili ngaror khavai
Chiwui vang eina khutlai kasing raimibing china wungnaobingwui kala kazip chiwui mangāli tukkaphungbing kala ngaponkaphung chi haimihaowa.

Chieina aming eina hāngkahaibing china nganingkāda tukkaphungbing chili khuilaga ngapon kaphung kashankachon chi khamasai eina kazatbingli ngavaimi, pheihop sangmi, kala kashakazāla mizā mimanga; khamāla ngahāmi. Kala mazat kathukbingli gadhā tongngasaklaga, khaneirong pemting eina khalei Jericho keinungli achinā ngarāwuili thanvāmi. Chiwui thili athumna Samariali latunghaowa.
Atam chitharan awunga Ahazna Asyriawui awungali ngachonmi khavai mi chihovai.
Kaja Edomnaobingna Judahli rāngararluishitlaga yuihaida tukthuiluihaowa.

Philistinenaobingna Shephelahwui keinung kala Judahwui Negebli rāngapona, kala Beth-shemesh, Aijalon, Gederoth, Soco, Timnah, Gimzo kala athum chiwui kha̱bing saikora ngapaikhuilaga athumna chili somhaowa.
Kaja Israelwui awunga Ahazna shuikhangarui ot sāda
Chiwui vang eina Asyriawui awunga Tilgath-pilneserna ngachonki kajishong maningla rāngararda khanang ngasakhaowa.
Kaja
Awunga Ahaz kaho china, chotchāngda sipkasa atamli

Kaja ali khayuiya Damascuswui varebingli pha̱phayāda hānga, “Asyriawui awungali awui varena ngachonmihaoda ilila ngachonmi khavai pha̱phayāra.” Kha chi awui vangla Israelwui vangla shimān khavai ngasāhaowa.
Varewui shimli khalei khorkhong saikora khuilaga Ahazna shaokhaiserhaowa, kala
Judahwui keinung kachida vare khangateili nganamkaphā riktā khavai kajujui apambing sākhui, chithāda avāva̱ ngarāwui
Yanglu, awui otsak khangatatei, kasā khavā khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda, Judah kala Israel Awungabingwui Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Ahaz thihaida Jerusalem keinungli chifahaowa, kaja athumna Israel awungabingwui chikhurli makhuiungthuwa. Kala anaomayara Hezekiahna awui mahut thuishina.
Hezekiahna mungkaphok tharan a kum maga̱da phangā kāshunghairasai. Kala ana Jerusalemli kum maga̱da chiko munga. Ava̱va̱wui ming Abijah hoi, Zechariahwui naongalāva̱na.
Avāva̱ Davidna kasā saikorawui athishurda anala
Ana mungphok kum kachāng khareli
Ana pāngmon eina Levinaobingli hokhuilaga zingshoshongwui kayāngli kazipta hānga,
“Levinaobing, nganālu! Nathum khalatta tharmathenglu, navā ngarāwui
Kaja ishāvā ngarāna mashitsangmada ithumwui
Khorumshimwui zangkhavai khāmongla shungnamhaida thaomeila masharmana; Israel Varewui katharapamlila nganamkaphā ot mariktāmana, chili lāngda rikkatāchigatla machigatmana.
Chiwui vang Judah eina Jerusalemli
Kaja yanglu, ishāvā ngarā raili thiserhaira, naongalāva̱ ngarā, naomayara ngarā, kala preiva̱ ngarāla tukthuiser kahai chi hiwui vangna.
“Israelwui
Inao mayarabing, paida maphaningalu; kaja

Chieina Levinaobingna ngakarthuiuwa; Amasaiwui naomayara Mahath, Azariahwui naomayara Joel, athum hi Kohath shimkhurwui naomayarabingna; kala Merari shimkhurwui eina Abdiwui naomayara Kish eina Jehallelelwui naomayara Azariah; Gershom shimkhurwui eina Zimmahwui naomayara Joah, kala Joahwui naomayara Eden;
Eli-zaphan shimkhurwui eina, Shimri eina Jeuel; Asaph shimkhurwui eina, Zechariah eina Mattaniah;
Heman shimkhurwui eina Jehuel eina Shime-i; kala Jeduthun shimkhurwui eina Shemaiah eina Uzziel.
Athumna achinā ngarāli kazipkhuida tharmathengkhui kala
Pāngmonbingna sāmathā khavai
Athumna kachāng kharewui kharethang ot sāphoka, kala kachishatathang
Kuphaida athumna awunga Hezekiahli ahānga, “
Awunga Ahazna munglakha, mashitsangmada horkahai saikora ithumna tharmathengkhuiserhaira; kala yanglu, chibing chi
Chieina awunga Hezekiahna ngathorthakva̱, keinungwui otva̱bingli kazipkhuiserda
Athumna mukvā shini, yaovā shini, yaonao shini kala mevā shini wungramwui vang, kathara shim kala Judahwui vang suihamshar sākhavai khuirai. Kala

Chieina athumna mukkābing chi taithatta pāngmonbingna ashee chi khuida hanphutli yikrora; athumna yaovābingla taithatta ashee hanphutli yikrora; kala yaonaobing chila taithatta athumwui ashee hanphutli yikrora.
Chiwui thili suihamsharwui vang mevābing chi awunga kala kazipta khaleibingwui mangāli khuirāda athumna chiwuitungli pāng parsera,
kala Israel saikorali pheomi khavai pāngmonbingna shaothatlaga ashee chieina hanphutungli suihamchigat sai. Kaja rikkatāchigatla, suihamchigatla Israel katongawui vang sālu da awungana kaso kahaina.
Kala ana Levinaobingli, kortar, tingteilā, lyre singda
Levinaobingna Davidwui tingteilā chi sing kala pāngmonbingna talla̱ singriplaga nganinga.
Chiwui thili Hezekiahna hanphutungli rikkatāchigat chigat khavai kasoi. Rikkatāchigat rikkaphok tharan
Rakakazip katongana khokharum tharan laa kasābingna laa sai, talla̱ kakhongbingna talla̱ khonga; rikkatā chigat makupranglakha eina tangda chithāda sai.
Kachigat ot kupkahai eina awungala, leikasā mi saikorala ngakhumshāmhaida khorumsera.
Awunga Hezekiah eina wungnaobingna, Levinaobingli David eina marān Asaphwui laa chieina ngasoda
Chieina Hezekiahna hānga, “Ara nathum khalatta
Rakakazipbingna rikkatāchigatwui vang khuikharā mukkā hangshini, yaovā shākha, yaonao shākhanina; saikora hi
Pha̱kaphayāwui vang tharchigat kahai mukvā shātharuk kala yao thingkathum kāshunga.

Kha pāngmonbingna teona kahaiwui vang rikkatāchigatwui sā saikora ahui mahemrarthuda, pāngmon kateibing matharmathengranglakha, achinā ngarā Levinaobingna ot chi makupranglakha eina tangda ngachonmi, kaja katharwui otsakli Levinaobingna pāngmonbingli ning ngatarmei.
Mahāngkharar rikkatā kachigatli lāngda, ningyatchigatwui athao, rikkatāchigatwui vang kharektā khavaila leisai.
Chithāda sāda
Varena mibingwui vang sākhami, mataimeikapta thaklāk eina samathākakhuiwui vang Hezekiahla, awui mi katongala ringphāshunhaowa.
Israel eina Judah saikorali kala Ephraim eina Manassehlila Hezekiahna chithi kapida, Israelwui
Kaja awungala, wungnaobingla kala Jerusalemli khalei kazip saikorana kachāng kakhaneli phanit chi mayon khavai ngazek kahaina—
kaja pāngmonbingna atam chāda mangarangrarthu, yaruinala Jerusalemli makazipphāthuda athumwui khangachā atamli mamayonrarthuwa—
chieina awungala kala yaruinala atam chipapamra jikahaina.
Chiwui vang eina Israel saikora vāpeida, Beersheba eina thuilaga Dan eina tangda, Israelwui
Awungana kala awui wungnaobingna kakapi chithi paophungabingna Israel eina Judah apam saikorali vāpeida phungvai. Kala chithi chili awungana hithāda hānga;
“O Israelwui mibing, Abrahamwui, Isaacwui kala Israelwui
Navā ngarā, nachinā ngarāna
Navā ngarāwui thāda ara hāngla makakhui masaalu, kha
Kaja nathumna
Chiwui vang paophungabingna Ephraim, Manasseh, kala Zebulun vāshungda keinung kachiva̱li hāngvai; kha chiwui mibingna athumli mana̱shida zeinganaowa.
Asher, Manasseh, kala Zebulunwui mi kateokhamāngna Jerusalemli rāmaya.
wui tui awungana kala wungva̱bingna kaso kahai chili Judahli ningkha sākhavai Varena ngasomi.
Kachāng kakhaneli, khawok makazang phanitli zangkhavai Jerusalemli mi kachungkha rāda kahaka kazip khui.
Athumna ot sāphokta, Jerusalemli khalei hanphut, kala nganamkaphā ot riktā khavai hanphut saikora chi khuishoklaga Kidron tampākli ahorserhaowa.
Kachāng kakhanewui zimiksho tharāda khamatethang athumna makānkhami phanit chiwui yao taithata. Kala pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingli vaishi ngasakhaowa, chiwui vang athum khalatta tharmathengkhuida
Varewui mi Moseswui ainli hāngkahai athishurda kachichāwui otpamli nganingripa; kala Levinaobingwui eina ashee khuilaga pāngmonbingna yikrora.
Kaja kazip chili matharkhamatheng mi kachungkha leisahaowa; chiwui vang,
Kaja Ephraim, Manasseh, Issachar kala Zebulunwui mi kachungkha hāngkahai thāda masāla mangaranglala phanitsā shai. Kaja Hezekiahna athumwui vang hithāda seihā sāmi: “Kapha
kathara shimwui ain athishurda mangaranglala avāva̱ ngarāwui
na Hezekiahwui kapo khuisangmida athumli pheomi.
Israelnaobing Jerusalemli khavā saikorana khawok makazang phanit chi mathānthup eina shinithang mayona; kala Levinaobing eina pāngmonbingna
Kala Levinaobingna
Chiwui thili kazipta khalei mi katongana phanit chi shinithang pamvā khavai mayā ngaroka; chiwui vang khamathān eina ngasoda shinithang pamvāluishita.

Kaja chigat khavai Judahwui awunga Hezekiahna mukkā thingkha, yao thingshini yaruili mi, kala wungnaobingnala mukkā thingkha kala yao thingtharā kazip chili mi. Chiwui vang pāngmonbing kachungkha tharmathengluishita.
Judahwui kazip katonga, pāngmonbing eina Levinaobing, kala Israelwui eina kharā kazip katonga, Israel ngaleiwui eina kharā ramkazatabing, kala Judah ngaleili ramkazatabing katongana ringphangaruma.
Chiwui vang Jerusalemli ringpha matailakhaowa, kaja Israelwui awunga, Davidwui nao Solomonwui eina thuida hikathā Jerusalemli maleilakrangsai.
Chiwui thili pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingna ngakarthuida mi saikorali somi, kala athumwui khon, seihā sākhami chi awui katharapam kazingramli shākāmi.

Saikora hi kupkahaiwui thili, chili khalei Israel saikorana Judahwui keinungbingli vālaga pakra̱bing kala Asherim shaokhaitāda Judah eina Benjamin, kala Ephraim eina Manassehli khalei kajujuipam eina hanphut saikora makupranglakha eina tangda shaokhaivai. Chiwui thili Israelwui mi saikorana kachichāramwui ichichā shimli latungserhaowa.
Kala Hezekiahna pāngmonbing eina Levinaobing khum khum athishurda pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingwui otpam athishurda rikkatā kachigatwui vang, ningyatchigatwui vang,
Awungana awui khaleiwui eina rikkatā kachigatwui vang mikashoka: ngathor ngazin rikkatā kachigat, sabbaththangwui vang rikkatā kachigat, changwokthangwui vang, kala retmi kahai phanit phanaowui vang
Kala
Kakaso chi ngayaokhaleoda Israelnaobingna, samphangkhare theishirai; drakhāthei, thao, khuira̱, kala luiwui eina samkaphang saikorawui eina ot kachiva̱ tithe kachungkha chigata.
Judahwui keinungli khalei Israelnaola, Judahpashila seiwui tithe, yaowui tithe, kala athumwui kala Israelnaobing Judah keinungli khaleibingna athumwui sei, yao, kala athumwui
Kachāng kakathumali athumna kaziphokta kashine kachāngli kuphaowa.
Hezekiah eina awui wungnaobingna kachungkha kazip kahai chi atheilaga
Kala Hezekiahna pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingli kazip kahai chiwui pongli ngahāna.
Pāngmon kharei, Zadok shimkhurwui Azariahna ngahānkai, “
Chieina Hezekiahna
Kala tithela, thāda kachigatla, tharchigat kahai otla athumna khuirāsera. Kala Conaniah Levipana chiwui otsinli kathāna sai; agato Shime-i kakhanena;

kala awunga Hezekiah eina Varewui shimwui akhoka Azariahna phāsang kahaibing, kaja Jehiel, Azaziah, Nahath, Asahel, Jerimoth, Jozabad, Eliel, Ismachiah, Mahath kala Benaiah athumna Conaniah eina agato Shime-ili ngachonmi.
Imnah Levipawui naomayara Core, zingshoshongwui ngavei khamayona chili, Vareli lemmet kachigat, kala

Ali ngachonkhamebing chiya: Eden, Miniamin, Jeshua, Shemaiah, Amariah kala Shecaniah athumna, pāngmonwui keinungbingli, khararnaosan mateila, khum-khumwui athishurda achinā ngarāli athumna ningtonglak eina ngayarmi,
kha
Pāngmonbingna avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui eina aming chana, kala Levinaobingna khumkhum eina otsakwui athishurda kum maga̱ kākashung kala atungbingmāngli aming chana.
Pāngmonbingna naoshinaobing, preiva̱̱ ngarā, naomayara ngarā, athumwui naongalāva̱ ngarā, kala yarui katonga ming chana; kaja athumna ningtonglak eina tharmathengda pama.

Aaronwui naongarā pāngmonbing, athumwui ngaleiwui keinungbingli khaleibingwui vanga, pāngmon ngachaili mayarnao kachiva̱ kala Levibingwui ngachaili aming chankahai kachiva̱li yarbing chi yaomi khavai mibingwui aming eina hāngmihaida lei.
Judah saikorali vāpeida Hezekiahna chithāda sāmi, kala awui
Varewui shimli otram khangatha̱ ain eina ningkhami athishurda khamayon, Vareli kaphā, saikora hi ana wuklung tongda kasāwui vang mataisanga.
Sennacheribna Jerusalemli rai sākhavai rāhaira kaji Hezekiahna kathei tharan,
awui otva̱bing kala kapingbing athumli ngachamlaga keinungwui ayarli khalei ura̱ saikora phinmi khavai ngarāna; kala athumna ali ngachonmi.
Kala mi kachungkhana rākaziplaga “Assyriawui awungana rālaga khiwui vang tara̱ kachungkha samphang khavai leikhala?” da hānglaga ram chili khalong ura̱ kala kongwui tara̱ athumna phintitmihaowa.

Ana ningyāng tongtingda ot sāphokta phākho kakai chila chiphokhuiserda chiwuitungli mayon khavai tārongla sakai, kala ayarshong phākho khangatei sāsanga; kala David keinungwui Millola makangmei khavai sāsanga. Zeighai ngahāla changveila chungmeida sāsanga.
Kala raimi kathānabing phāsanglaga keinungwui ngavei ashat chili mi kachungkha kazip ngasakta ana yaruili kasatsangda hānga,
“Pingmeida sālu, lungsanmeilu. Assyriawui awunga kala awui raimi kachungkhaya da mangacheelu kala manganglu; kaja ali ngasokazatali ithumli ngasokhamena reimei.
Awui raimibinga asā khavai raimimānga; kha ithumli ngasokhame chiya ithumwui
“Assyriawui awunga Sennacheribna hithāda hānga, Jerusalem kuinamhaira, laga nathumna khipāli chihānkapamkhala?
‘Assyriawui awungawui pāng eina ithumwui
Kajujuipambing kala hanphutbing sākazamhaida, ‘Nathum hanphut akhamāngli khorumra kala chiwuitungli pha̱phayāki kajina’ da Judah kala Jerusalemwui mibingli kakaso mi chi Hezekiah hi maningmala?
Ishāvā ngarānala, inala ngalei khangateiwui mibingli khi samihairakhala kaji nathum matheimala? Ngalei chibingli varebingna ipāngwui eina athumli kanmishaplakla?
Ishāvā ngarāna athumli sāshimānhaida khiyurbingwui varebingwui eina kanmihaida, nathumwui Varena nathumli iwui eina kanmirada kaphaningkhala?

Chiwui vang eina Hezekiahna nathumli kapikta hithāda mathānngui ngasakalu, kala ali mashitsangalu kaja yurwui kala wungramwui vare khipānakha ipāngwui eina kala ishāvā ngarāwui eina athumwui mibing kankhami maleilakmana. Chithākha nathumwui Varena kayākha samithukrakhala!”
Chili lāngda awui raobingna
Israelwui
Kala Jerusalemnaobing ngaveitungli kapambingna shāser khavai Judahwui tui eina panglāk eina vaokai; hāngmachitlaga keinung khuikhavai kasāna.
Kala pāng eina sākakhui okathuiwui miyurbingwui varebingwui pongli khamatui thāda Jerusalemwui Varelila hāngkatāpa.
Chieina awunga Hezekiah eina Amoswui nao Isaiah marānna Vareli hiwui vang eina seihā sāda kazingramli vaokai.
Kala
Chithāda sāda Hezekiahli, kala Jerusalemwui mibingli, Assyriawui awunga Sennacheribwui eina kala awui yangkashebingwui eina
Kala mi kachungkhana
Chitharan Hezekiah kazāda thiki jihaowa, kala ana
Kha Hezekiahna ali sākhami chiwui vang awui ningkashi maleithuwa kaja awui ningli langsohaowa. Chiwui vang, Jerusalem, Judah kala awuitungli malungvāthaowa.
Kha Hezekiahla kala Jerusalemli kapam mibingla athumwui langsot ningwui eina hamsangluishit kajiwui vang
Hezekiah shāngshun kala khayāla kāshunhaowa; lan kazipshim kachungkha sākhui; luāpāsā, sinā, aman kasak ngalung, nganamkaphā otyur, chāngvei, kala aman kasasak khorkhong haikhavaila;
zātshim, drakhāra̱ eina thao; kala seishim, yaoshimla kachungkha sha̱keiwui vang sākhui.
Chithāda sāda akhalattawui vang keinungla sākhui; kala yao ashangva̱, sha̱kei mavātla leisai kaja Varena ali kachungkha ngavā ngasaka.
Gihonwui atungshong longkashoka tara̱ phinhailaga David keinungwui zingtunshong longvā khangasaka chi Hezekiah hipāna. Hezekiahna awui kasāsā saikora mataikasang samphanga.

Kala ngalei chili chitheikhami sākahai chiwui pongli ngahānkhui khavai Babylonwui eina mi chihokharā chile, awui kaphaning saikora theikhavai kala ali tamyang khavai Varena awunga akhalattali phaningkhui ngasakhaowa.
Hezekiahwui kaphā kasā otsak, kala awui kasāsā saikora, yanglu, Amozwui nao Isaiah marānwui phongkhami lairikli, kala Judah eina Israelwui Awungabingwui Lairikli kapiserhaida lei.

Hezekiah thihaida Davidwui naomayarabingwui chikhurpamwui ashanli chifahaowa. A kathi atamli Judah saikora kala Jerusalemli kapam mibingna khayāshilak eina sāmi. Kala anaomayara Manassehna awui mahut thuishina.
Israel mibingwui mangāli

Kaja avāva̱ Hezekiahna pheitāmi kahai kajujuipam ana sakāluishita, kala Baalli khorum khavai hanphut sakai; ana Asherahbingla sākhui, kala kazingramli khalei zimik kachāng sirāli khorumda otram ngatha̱ya.
“Jerusalemli iwui ming mashimānda leira” da
shimwui yāngkhup khanili zimik kachāng sirāwui vang hanphut sakai.
Kala Hinnomwui naomayarawui tampākli anaomayarali chigata; kala khanong khayang, hāngkhamarān, leivā kashon, kazei kazang eina manglāli khangasan hikathāthāla sai.

Khorumshimli ana sākakhui meoma̱ chi haihai. Shim hiwui pongli Varena Davidli kala anaomayara Solomonli hānghaisai: “Israel shang saikorawui eina ina kapangkhui kahai shim hili kala Jerusalemli iwui ming mashimānda leichingra;

kala athumna iwui kakaso nganāda Mosesli hāngkahai; kakaso ain, shiyan chikan kala sharphahorbing saikora ning ngasharda mayontitakha, ina navā ngarāwui vang mikahai ngalei chiwui eina Israelwui phei maphatthuimiluimara.”
Manassehna Judah kala Jerusalemli kapam mibingli thānda; Israel mibingwui mangāli
Chiwui vang eina
Chotchanglak kahai tharan awui
Ana Vareli seihā sai, kala ana shāmida awui kapo khuisangmi; kala awui wungram Jerusalemli khuiungmiluishita. Chiwui thili

Chiwui thili ana David keinungwui ayārli ngavei akha sākai, Gihonwui zingtunshong tampāk eina thuilaga Khaih Ngavei zangkhavai eina Ophel kuikhuida savai, kala juilak eina ngaveikai; ana Judahwui raipan ngazipta sākahai keinung saikorali raimi kathānabing kahaila haivāsera.
Yur khangateibingwui varebing kala meoma̱ saikora
Ana
Chithālala mibingna athumwui
Manassehwui kasā khavā kala awui Vareli ana seihā kasā, kala Israelwui

Awui seihā kasā, Varena kathāda awui kapo khuisangmi, kala awui morei, mashitkasangwui pong, kala ana ning mangateiranglakha kajujuipam sakakā, Asherahli khokharum, meoma̱ sākakhui, saikora chi marānbingwui Thotrinchānli kapiserhaida lei.
Chithāda Manasseh thihaoda awui keinungli chifahaowa; kala anaomayara Amonna awui mahut thuishina.
Avāva̱ Manassehna kasā thāda anala
Avāva̱ Manassehna
Awui raobingna ali makhamayāwui vang ngathumda mithit khalen sangda awui shimli leilakha sāthathaowa.
Kha awunga Amonli mithit khalen kasangbing chili yarui saikorana sāthathaowa; kala ngalei chiwui mibingna anaomayara Josiahli awui mahut awunga sanghaowa.
Ana

Awui mangāli athumna Baalwui hanphut shaokhai; kala chiwuitungli khalei nganamkaphā riktā khavai hanphutbing chi ana shaokhaitai; kala Asherim eina rukkakhui kala heikakhui meoma̱la akha̱ sāmihaida, chili pha̱kaphayābingwui chikhurtungli chairora.
Ana pāngmonbingwui ara̱kuila athumwui hanphuttungli riktāda Judah eina Jerusalemli kapambingli samathakhui.
Manassehwui, Ephraimwui, Simeonwui kala Naphtali vāshungda Israelwui keinungli khalalei,
hanphutpam, Asherim kala meoma̱ saikora akha̱ sāmihaowa, kala Israelli khalei nganamkaphā riktā khavai hanphutbing sātekmiserhaowa. Chiwui thili ana Jerusalemli latunga.

Athumna Jerusalemli kapambing, Judah eina Benjamin saikora kala Manasseh eina Ephraim saikorawui eina rākachigat pheisā khāmong khamayona Levinaobingna kazip kakhui chi pāngmon khareiya Hilkiahli khuirāmi.
Athumna pheisā chi
Judahwui awungabingna chipār kahai shim chiwui thing, khangen lokhavaiwui vang ngalung kashānbing kala thing mistribingli mi.

Athumna ningtongda ot sai. Kala athumli yangmi khavai Levipa Merariwui naomayara Jahath eina Obadiah, kala Kohathpashi Zechariah eina Meshullamli phāsanga. Levinaobingwui alungli sipa talla̱ khongkatheibing china,
khangava̱bingli yangmi, kala sāki kaji ot saikora athumna tamchithei. Leviwui mi kaikhava kakapi ot sai; kala kaikhana otva̱a, kala khangatei kaikhana shantri-kasā zanga.
Chieina Hilkiahna kapime Shaphanli “Ain Lairik chi
Shaphanna lairik chi awungali khuiungmi; kala hithāda unghānga, “Nawui raobingli mikahai saikora saserda lei.
wui shimli leikasā pheisā saikora khuilaga ot kasanao kala yangkhamebingli miserhaira.”
Chiwui thili kapime Shaphanna awungali hānga, “Pāngmon kharei Hilkiahna ili lairik akha mi.” Kala ana chi awungawui mangāli pāchithei.
Awungana ainwui tui chi kashā tharan ana awui kachon serkhāka.
Kala Hilkiah, Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikam, Micahwui naomayara Abdon, kapime Shaphan, kala awungawui rao Asaiah, athumli kasoda hānga,

“Vada, iwui vang kala Judah eina Israelli leida khalei saikorawui vang samkaphang lairik hiwui hāngkahaiwui pongli angahānkhuilu; kaja lairik hili kapi kahai athishurda, ishāvā ngarāna makhamayonwui vang ithumwuitungli

Chieina awungana kachihobingli ngasoda Hilkiahna Shallum preiva̱, marānpava̱ Huldahwuili vai. Hasrahwui nao Tokhathwui nao Shallumna khāmong-khamayona kasāwui vang (preiva̱̱ chi Jerusalemwui Second Quarterli pamsai) tui saikora ahāngsera.
Marānva̱ china hānga, “Israelwui
na hithāda hānga, Yanglu, Judah awungawui mangāli pāchithei kahai lairikli kapi kahahai khonkashi saikora chi apam hiwuitungli kala mibingwuitungli ina khuirāra.
Kaja athumna ili horhaida yur khangateiwui vareli nganamkaphā riktai; athumwui otsak saikora china ili malungvāt khangasak chiwui vang iwui malungkhavāt apam hili heitāda chi khavān mavaimara.
Kha

khikhalajila nathumwui ningkhangateiwui vang kala ngalei hili kala hiwui mibingli makhamayā kashā eina Varewui mangāli nathumna hamkasang, kala iwui mangāli nathumna hamsangda kachon serkhaklaga kachapwui vang, inala shāmihaira da
Yanglu, navā ngarāli ngasoda nana chingri eina chikhurli zangra, kala apam hili kala mibingwuitungli kalākashi kharā chi namik eina matheimara.’” Athumna tui chi awungali unghānga.
Chiwui thili awungana Judah eina Jerusalemwui khararnao saikorali ahokhuilaga kazip ngasaka.
Kala khararnaosan mateila Judahwui mi eina Jerusalemli kapam mibing saikora pāngmonbing, Levinaobing, zangda
Kala awungana
Chieina Jerusalem eina Benjaminwui mi chili leikasā saikorali chithāda sākhavai nganing ngasaka. Kala avāva̱ ngarāwui Varewui tuingashit athishurda Jerusalemwui mi saikorana sai.
Kala Israelwui apam saikorali khalei ningkakachai ot saikora Josiahna chiwui eina khuithuimiserhaowa. Israelli khalei athum saikora athumwui
Ana pāngmonbingli athumwui apamli kapangsangda
Kala Israel saikorali tamkachitheia
Nathumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur khumkhum eina ngayar kakhui athishurda kala Israelwui awunga David eina awui naomayara Solomonna chitheikhami athishurda nathum khalatta ngayeikhuilu.
Kala avāva̱wui shimkhurwui akhumbing chiwui athishurda katharapam chili nganinglu, kala Levi ava̱va̱wui shimkhur kachiva̱wui vang yar leiranu.
Kala makānkhami yao chi taithatta nathum khalatta tharkhuilu, kala
Chieina Josiahna chili kharābingwui vang makānkhamiwui kachigat sāda yaonao eina menao thingthumrā, kala mukkā thing kathum, ana misera.

Kala awui wungnaobingnala mathānthup eina yaruiwui vangla, pāngmonbingwui vangla, kala Levinaobingwui vangla chigata. Hilkiah, Zechariah, Jehiel, Khorumshimwui otva̱ akhokabingna makānkhami phanitwui vang pāngmonbingli yaonao eina menao thingkhani shātharuk, kala mukkā shākathum mi.

Kala Levishiwui wungva̱bing, chiya, Conaniah, Shemaiah kala achinā Nethanel, Hashabiah, Je-iel, kala Jozabad, athumna phanit chiwui vang Levinaobingli yaonao, menao thingphāngā, kala mukkā shāphangā mi.
Khangarān kupser kahai eina, pāngmonbingna kachichāwui pamli nganinga, kala Levinaobingnala awungawui kakaso thāda athumwui khum athishurda nganingsera.
Kala athumna yao taithatlaga pāngmonbingna ashee khuida yikrorlakha, Levinaobingna taikathat chi ahui hema.
Moseswui lairikli kapi kahai athishurda, avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur athishurda kharābingna
Khangachā shiyan athishurda makānkhami yaosā chi meili ruiya, kathara kachigat chi ham, hampai kala khāng eina hanglaga yaruili totot yaomi.

Chiwui thili athumwui vangla, kala pāngmonbingwui vang athum khalattana ngarānkhui; kaja Aaronwui naomayara pāngmonbingna rikkatā kachigat kala athao kachigat ot ngayā eina tangda sai, chiwui vang Levinaobingna athum khalattawui kala Aaronwui naomayarabingwui vang hangkhamina.

Awunga Davidna kaso kahai athishurda laa kasābing, Asaphwui naomayarana ichichāwui pamli pamripa, kala Asaph, Heman, awungawui marān Jeduthun, kala ngavei khamayonbing ngavei kachida nganinga; athumna kachichāwui otpamli pamriphaoda Levinaobingna hangkhamina.
Awunga Josiahwui kakaso athishurda chithang makānkhami phanitwui vang,
Kala chili khalei Israelnaobingna makānkhami phanit chi sāda, khawok makazang zātkhān shinithang mayona.

Marān Samuelwui eina thuilaga hikathā makānkhami phanit Israelli mibingna mamayonlakrangsai. Josiahna thānda pāngmonbing, Levinaobing, kala chili kazang Judah saikora, Israel, kala Jerusalemli kapambingna khamayon thāda Israelwui awunga khipānakha makānkhami phanit masāsalakmana.
Josiahna mungda tharāda kachishata kum khamayonna.
Josiahna Khorumshim sākupser kahaiwui thili, Egyptwui awunga Necona Euphratesli khalei Carchemishli rai ngarar khavai vai. Chieina Josiahnala ali ngararkida angaroka.

Kha ana paophungme chihovāda hānga, “Judahwui awunga, ini akha eina akha khi rai sākhavai leikhala? Ina aja zimik nali ngararkida kharā maningmana, kha Varena iwui yangkasheli thaklāk eina angararlu kajiwui vang ali ngararkida kazatna. Ili ngasokhame Vareli khangasung thahaolu, ana nali shimān ngasakpaishina.”
Chithālala Josiahna awui eina mangareiungluila azak ngacheikhuilaga ngarar khavai vai. Varena Necowui manga eina hāngkhami tui ana manganāsangla Megiddowui tampākli rai khangarar pamli azanga.
Kala malā kasingbingna Awunga Josiahli kapza̱haida ana awui raimibingli, “Ili khuithuihaolu kaja ili marlak eina khamā za̱haira” da hānga.
Chieina raimibingna awui siguigari kakhanepāli sanglaga Jerusalemli khuiunghaowa. Kala ungthihaida avāva̱ ngarāwui chikhurli chifahaowa. Judah eina Jerusalem saikorana Josiahwui vang chapngachai.

Jeremiahnala Josiahwui vang chapkhangachāli zanga; kala sha̱naobing, mayarnaobing kala laa kasābingna Josiahwui vang chapchāt laa kasā chi aja eina tangda lei. Athumwui laa chi Israelwui shiyan sāngasaka, kala yanglu, chapchāt laa lairikli kapiserhaida lei.
Josiahwui otsak khangatatei, kala
kala awui kasāsā khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda, yanglu, saikora hi Israelwui kala Judahwui awungabingwui Lairikli kapiser haidalei.
Josiahwui mahut anaomayara Jehoahazli ngalei chiwui mibingna Jerusalemli awunga sanghaowa.
Jehoahazna mungkaphok tharan a kum maga̱da kathum kāshunghairasai, kala kachāng kathum Jerusalemli munga.
Egyptwui awungana ali Jerusalemli tuknarhaowa; kala lupāsā kg. thingkathum shāmati hangchikoda chiko kala sinā kg. thumrāda mati da shai khui.
Kala Egyptwui awungana achinā Eliakimli Judah eina Jerusalemwui awunga sāngasaka, kala awui mingla Jehoiakim phokmi; kha Necona Jehoahazliva Egyptli khuivāhaowa.
Jehoiakimna mungkaphok tharan a kum maga̱da phangā kāshunghairasai, kala ana Jerusalemli kum tharāda akha munga. Ana awui
Kala Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna rai sāda mari khanghui eina khalapta Babylonli tuktāhaowa.
wui shimli kahai khorkhong ngayarda Nebuchadnezzarna khuilaga Babylonli khalei awui konungli tāhaihaowa.
Jehoiakimwui otsakbing, ana kasā ningkakachai otsak, kala ali mamayākhangai saikora, Israel eina Judah Awungabingwui Lairikli kapiserhaida lei. Kala anaomayara Jehoiachinna awui mahut thuishina.
Jehoiachinna mungkaphok tharan a kum chishathairasai, kala ana Jerusalemli kachāng kathum zimiksho tharāthangmāng munga. Ana
Chikumwui kanrei atamli awunga Nebuchadnezzarna mi chihovāda ali kala
Ana awui
Vare ming singda ali mingzai khangasaka awunga Nebuchadnezzarlila ngakaishi; ning mararkhuihaida Israelwui
Yarui kala pāngmon kathānabingla, yurbingwui ningkakachai saikora chili shurda mashitsang phaphuthuwa, kala Jerusalemli khalei tharchigat kahai
Avāva̱ ngarāwui
kha awui tuili ningkachaida
Chiwui vang eina Chaldeawui awungali Varena chihoda, kathara shimli mayarnao kachungkha sāthathaowa; kala lukhamashan maleilakla, mayar-ngalā matei, kasar-kafa mateila awui pāngli horsangmiserhaowa.
Kala
Kala athumna Varewui shimla mei sa̱tāmihaowa, Jerusalemwui phākhola shaokhaimiserhaowa; kala konungla mei sa̱tāmihaida aman kasasaka khorkhong chuitāserhaowa.
Mashaothat khangakanbing chi Babylonli tukunglaga, Persiawui wungram masākāranglakha eina tangda awui kala anao mayarawui raonao sāngasakchinga,
hi mibingna kum hangshini sabbath makhamayon chi hāngsang khavai ngalei hi macho ngasakra da
“Persiawui awunga Cyrusna hithāda hānga, ‘Kazingramwui
Persiawui awunga Cyrusna pānkhare kum, Jeremiahwui khamor eina hāngkhangasak
“Persiawui awunga Cyrusna kahāngna: Kazingramwui Vare
Awui mibing nathum saikorali Varena ngasomiranu. Jerusalemli khorumda khalei Vare, Israelwui Vare

Raithā kahaipamli leida khalei awui mibingna latung khavaiwui vang khangachon ningchāngakha, athumwui khongnainaobingna ngachonmiranu. Athumli sinā lupā eina, kala ot, sha̱kei einala ngachonranu, chili lāngda Jerusalemli khalei Varewui shim chiwui vang kachichāwui mikhangai chi chigatranu.”
Chiwui thili Judah eina Benjaminwui shangwui akhavābing, pāngmonbing eina Levinaobing kala Varena ningli kasatmida saza̱khami kachiva̱na Jerusalemli khalei Varewui shim chi sākālui khavai zata.
Athumwui khongnai saikorana, kachichāwui kachigat chili lāngda lupāsāwui khorkhong, sinā, otyur eina sha̱kei, kala aman kasasak ot, lemmet eina khamiwuitungli sangkhamina.
Lan kazipme Mithredathwui pāngwui eina Persiawui awunga Cyrusna otbing chi khuishokta Judahwui wungnao Shesh-bazzarwui pāngli shānsangmi.
Otbingwui mashing chiya: Sināwui khongsai thingkha, lupāsāwui khongsai thingkha, meikhong maga̱da chiko,
sināwui koklui thumrā, lupāsāwui koklui thingkhani shāmatida tharā; khangatatei khorkhong thingkha;
kala sināwui, lupāsāwui khorkhong saikora kaziplaga thing phangā shāmati hangtharukta chikona. Raithā kahaibingli Babylonwui eina Jerusalemli khuikhaung tharan, Shesh-bazzarna otbing chi khuiunga.
Athumna Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Seraiah, Reel-aiah, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum kala Baanahlongli ngasounga.
Israelnaobingwui mashing:
Paroshshi thingkhani shākha hangshinida khani.
Shephatiahwui naomayarabing, shākathum hangshinida khani.
Arahwui naomayarabing, shāshini hangshinida phangā.
Pahath-moahwui naomayarabing, kaja Jeshua kala Joabwui naomayarabing thingkhani shāchishat tharāda khani.
Elamwui naomayarabing, thingkha shākhani hangphangāda mati.
Zattuwui naomayarabing, shāchiko hangmatida phangā.
Zaccaiwui naomayarabing, shāshini hangtharuk.
Baniwui naomayarabing, shātharuk hangmatida khani.
Bebaiwui naomayarabing, shātharuk maga̱da kathum.
Azgadwui naomayarabing, thingkha shākhani maga̱da khani.
Adonikamwui naomayarabing, shātharuk hangtharukta tharuk.
Bigvaiwui naomayarabing, thingkhani hangphangāda tharuk.
Adinwui naomayarabing, shāmati hangphangāda mati.
Aterwui naomayarabing, kaja Hezekiahwui naomayarabing, hangchikoda chishat.
Bezaiwui naomayarabing, shākathum maga̱da kathum.
Jorahwui naomayarabing, shākha tharāda khani.
Hashumwui naomayarabing, shakhani maga̱da kathum.
Gibbarwui naomayarabing, hangchikota phangā.
Bethlehemwui naomayarabing, shākha maga̱da kathum.
Netophahwui mibing, hangphangāda tharuk.
Anathothwui naotunbing, shākha maga̱da chishat.
Azmavethwui naotunbing, hangmatida khani.
Kiriatharim, Chephirah kala Be-erothwui naotunbing, shāshini hangmatida kathum.
Ramah eina Gebawui naotunbing, shātharuk maga̱da akha.
Michmaswui naotunbing, shākha maga̱da khani.
Bethal eina Aiwui naotunbing, shākhani maga̱da kathum.
Nebowui naotunbing, hangphangāda khani.
Magbishwui naotunbing, shākha hangphangāda tharuk.
Elam akhapāwui naotunbing, thingkha shākhani hangphangāda mati.
Harimwui naotunbing, shākathum maga̱.
Lod, Hadid kala Onowui naotunbing, shāshini maga̱da phangā.
Jerichowui naotunbing, shākathum hangmatida phangā.
Senaahwui naotunbing, thingkathum shātharuk thumrā.
Pāngmonbing: Jeshuawui shimkhur Jedaiahwui naotunbing, shāchiko hangshinida kathum.
Immerwui naotunbing, thingkha hangphangāda khani.
Pashhurwui naotunbing, thingkha shākhani hangmatida shini.
Harimwui naotunbing, thingkha tharāda shini.
Levinaobing: Hodaviahwui naomayara Jeshua eina Kadmielwui naotunbing, hangshinida mati.
Laa kasābing: Asaphwui naotunbing, shākha maga̱da chishat.
Ngavei khamayonbing: Shallum, Ater, Talmon, Akkub, Hatita, kala Shobai athumwui naotunbing kaziplaga shākha thumrāda chiko.
Khorumshimli otram khangathabing: Zihawui naotunbing, Hasuphawui naotunbing, Tabbaothwui naotunbing,
Keroswui naotunbing, Siahawui naotunbing, Padonwui naotunbing,
Lebanahwui naotunbing, Hagabahwui naotunbing, Akkubwui naotunbing,
Hagabwui naotunbing, Shamlai, Hanan,
Giddelwui naotunbing, Gaharwui naotunbing, Re-aiahwui naotunbing,
Rezinwui naotunbing, Necodawui naotunbing, Gazzamwui naotunbing,
Uzzawui naotunbing, Paseahwui naotunbing, Besaiwui naotunbing,
Asnahwui naotunbing, Me-unimwui naotunbing, Nephisimwui naotunbing,
Bakbukwui naotunbing, Hakuphawui naotunbing, Harhurwui naotunbing,
Bazluthwui naotunbing, Mehidawui naotunbing, Harshawui naotunbing,
Barkoswui naotunbing, Siserawui naotunbing, Temahwui naotunbing,
Neziahwui naotunbing, kala Hatiphawui naotunbing.
Solomonwui raobingwui naotunbing: Sotaiwui naotunbing, Hassopherethwui naotunbing, Perudawui naotunbing,
Jaalahwui naotunbing, Darkonwui naotunbing, Giddelwui naotunbing,
Shephatiahwui naotunbing, Hattilwui naotunbing, Pochereth-hazzebaimwui naotunbing kala Amiwui naotunbing.
Khorumshimwui otram khangatha̱bing kala Solomonwui raobingwui naotunbing saikora shākathum hangchikoda khani.
Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, Addan kala Immerwui eina kharābing awo-ayi kala shimkhur kachangkhat hina kaji makathei, Israelnaoka maningmakhala kaji mahangkharar athum chi hina.
Delaiahwui naotuning, Tobiahwui naobing, Necodawui naotunbing: shātharuk hangphangāda khani.
Kala pāngmonbingwui naotunbing: Habaiahwui naobing, Hakkozwui naotunbing kala Barzillaiwui naobing (Gileadli khalei Barzillaiwui nao ngalāva̱bingli ngakhothaoda athumwui mingpho eina hoi).
Athumna shimkhur akhawui eina kharāna da athumwui aming ayanga, kha lairikli masamphangthuda mamayāthuwa, chieina athumli makathara yurnada pāngmonwui eina khuishokhaowa;
kala lammungana athumli hānga kaja Urim eina Thummim yangmi khavai pāngmon akha maleiranglakha athumna tharmathengmeikap kaji ot chi mashaipaimana.
Kazip katonga ngarumlaga thinghangmatida khani shākathum hangtharukna,
chili lāngda athumwui rao sha̱naola mayarnaola thingshini shākathum thumrāda shini leisai; kala athumna laa kasābing sha̱nao mayarnao shākhani leisai.
Athumwui sigui shāshini thumrāda tharukna, kala gadhā shākhani hangmatida phangā,
athumwui ut shāmati thumrāda phangā kala gadhā thingtharuk shāshini maga̱na.
Shimkhurwui wungva̱ kaikhana Jerusalemli khalei
kachichāwui sakashap athishurda ot chiwui lan kazipli sinā tolla thinghangtharukta akha, mina lupāsā thingphangā, kala pāngmon shākhawui kachon chigata.

Pāngmonbing, Levinaobing, kala mi kaikhana Jerusalemli kala chiwui ngalemli pama; laa kasābing, ngavei khamayonbing, khorumshimli otram khangatha̱bingna athumwui keinungli, kala Israel saikorana athumwui keinungli pamhaowa.
Kachāng kashine kharā tharan, Israelwui naomayarabing keinungli khaleibing china khokkha sāda atang akha eina Jerusalemli kazipa.

Chiwui thili Jozadakwui naomayara Jeshuali ngasoda avānao pāngmonbing, kala Shealti-el wui naomayara Zerubbabelli ngasoda ashibing hanphut akha sakai, Varewui mi Moseswui ningkhamili hāngkahai athishurda rikkatā hanphut akha sakai.
Apam chiwui mibingli khangacheewui vang athumna hanphut chi khangachāwui apamli sakāmi, kala hanphut chili ngathor ngazinwui rikkatā kachigat chi chigata.
Kapi kahai athishurda, athumna Tabernaclewui zātkhān chila mayona, kala thangthang sāphalungki kaji chi sharphahorwui athishurda sāching kaji mashing eina chigatchinga,
kala chiwui thili khamatak maleila rikkatā kachigat, changwokli kachigat, kala
Kachāng kashinewui kharethang eina thuida

Chieina athumna ngalung mistri eina thing mistribingli pheisā mi, kala Persiawui awunga Cyrusna athumli mayākhami athishurda, Sidon eina Tyrewui mibingli Lebanonwui eina Joppali cedarthing shamadrutungli khuiung khavai ra̱shakshirei kala thao mi.

Athumna Jerusalemli Varewui shimli ungda kum kakhanewui kachāng kakhaneli, She-alti-elwui naomayara Zerubbabel eina Jozadakwui naomayara Jeshua, achinā ngarā, pāngmonbing kala Levi kala raithā kahaiwui eina Jerusalemli hankhaung saikorali ngasoda ot sāphoka. Kala Levinaobingwui ngachaili kum maga̱wui eina atungbing saikora Varewui shim kasā chili yangmi khavai kapangsanghaowa.

Jeshuana naomayarabing kala theisābing, Kadmi-el eina anaomayarabing, Judahwui naomayarabingli ngasoda Varewui shim kasā mibing chili yangmi; chili Henadadwui kala Leviwui naomayarabing kala athumwui naomayarabing eina theisābing zangda yangngaruma.
kala athumna
“Khikhalajila a kaphāna,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi
Israelli mahorhailakmana.”
Kala athumna

Kha khare shim chi theikahai pāngmonbing, Levinaobing, kala avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui khararnaobingna shimphunga sākup kahai chi kathei tharan, kachungana khamathānwui vang panglāk eina vaoshoklala athumna panglāk eina vaoda chapa;
chiwui vang eina mibingna kachap khonwui eina khamathān khon khangatei matheirarthuwa, kaja mibingna panglāk eina vaokshokta akhon chi katāva̱lila shāvai.
Chitharan Judah eina Benjaminli yangkashebingna raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbingna Israelwui Vare

Zerubbabel kala avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui akuibingli athumna asamphanga, kala “Ithum sakrumsa, kachiwui vangkhala jilaga Assyriawui awunga Esar-haddonna ithumli hili khuikharā eina thuida nathumna khokharum thāda ithumla nathumwui Vareli khorumsai” da ahānga.

Kha Zerubbabel, Jeshua, kala Israelwui shimkhurwui avāva̱ ngarāwui akuibingna athumli hānga, “Ithum Varewui vang shim kasāli nathum khikha zangkhavai maleilakmana; kha Persiawui awunga Cyrusna kaso kahai thāda Israelwui Vare
Chieina ngalei chiwui mibingna Judahwui mibingli ning suitā khavai sālaga shim chi masāleng khavai hāngmachita,
kala Persiawui awunga Cyrusna munglakha eina thuilaga Persiawui awunga Dariuswui khamung eina tangda athumwui kharin chi maungshung khavai thangkhamei mi phāsanglaga hapkhano ngasaka.
Ahasu-erusna mungkaphok atamli, athumna Judah eina Jerusalemli kapāna mibingli phenda ali lairik kapiya.
Kala Ar-ta-xerxeswui atamli Bishlam, Mithredath, Tabeel kala athumwui ngasotnao kateibing zangda Persiawui awunga Ar-ta-xerxesli kapiya; kala chithi chi Aramaic tui eina kapilaga khalatshoka.
Raithāna Rehum eina kapime Shimshaina Jerusalemwui mibingli makhamayā chithi akha awunga Ar-ta-xerxesli hithāda kapi—
raithāna Rehum eina kapime Shimshai kala athumwui ngasotnao khaleibing, bichar akhavābing, lammungabing, otva̱bing, Persianaobing, Erechwui mibing, Babylonnaobing, Susawui mibing chiya, Elamnaobing,

kala yur khangateibingli, khangama Osnapparna kashamhaida Samaria keinungbingli vākapam yurbingli, kala Kong makānda khalei ngaleiwui mibing saikorana kakapi chithi kachiphun chiwui namkakhui chi hina—
“Awunga Ar-ta-xerxesli: narao Kong Makānda khalei ngaleiwui mibingna shālam hāngchiphunli.
Nawui eina ithumwuili kharā Jehudibing Jerusalemli vāhaira kaji awungana katheimilu. Athumna makaphā kala ngakaikashi keinung chi sakāluida lei. Shimphunga sakhuiluida phākho kupki jihaira.
Awungana hi theimilu, kaja keinung hi sakāluida phākhobing chi kuphaikha athumna shai, khajana, shongfa kanung-kanvā kasāwui pheisā mamiluimara, chieina wungnaowui shaibing shimān ngasakhaora.
Awungawui eina ithumna machi kasathei kashai samphanglaga, awungawui maishi khavai khalei chili ithumna mayangpampaimara, chiwui vang awungali pao hi kachishātna,

navā ngarāwui kapi kahai athishurda lairik nana kaphākhuimilu. Lairik hili yangakha nana samphangra kala theikhuira, kaja khare kachāng eina thuida keinung hi rai sakazara, awungabingli kala athumwui ngaleili khanang khangasaka, kala achālakhawui eina khonzār khangasaka akhana. Chiwui vang keinung hi shimān ngasak kahaina.
Hi awungali kachitheina kaja keinung hi sakāluida phākhobing hi sākhuihaiakha, Kong makāndawui ngalei hi nawui awunga ngalei mangavāluimara.”
Awungana ngahānkai: “Raithāna Rehum eina kapime Shimshai, kala Samariali khaleibing kala Kong Makānda khalei athumli shālam hāngli,
“Nathumna ithumli chithi kachiphun chi iwui mangāli tharlak eina pāhaira.
Ina kakaso athishurda phāyanghaira kala hithāda samphanga kaja khare kachāng eina thuida keinung hiwui mina awungabingli makhamayā ngakaikashi kala khonkazar kachungkha shokhaira.
Kala kapanga awunga kachungkha Jerusalemli mungda Kong makānda khalei ngaleilila khamungwui vang shaila, khajanāla, shongfawui shaila misai.
Chiwui vang eina iwui kakaso masamphangranglakha eina tangda keinung hi masāpaimara da hānghaolu.
Atam mashimān ngasakalu, awungali saza̱ khavai khisāda hitha ngasakrakhala?”

Awunga Ar-ta-xerxeswui chithi chi Rehum eina kapime Shimshai kala athumwui ngasotnao saikorawui mangāli pālaga thaklāk eina vāda Jerusalemli khalei Jehudinaobingli pangshap eina ot chi ngasām ngasakhaowa.
Chieina She-alti-elwui naomayara Zerubbabel eina Jozadakwui naomayara Jeshuana Jerusalemli khalei Varewui shim chi sāphoklui, kala Varewui marānbingna ngachonmi.

Atam chitharan Kong makānda khalei ngaleiwui lammunga, Tattenai eina Shethar-bozenai kala athumwui ngasotnaobingna rāda athumli hithāda hānga, “Khipāna nathumli shim hi sākhavai kala phākho hi khaningkā khavai kakaso mikhala?”
Kala “Shim kasābingli aming khi homameikhala?” da athumli ngahāna.
Kha Jehudi ararbingwuitungli Varena ngasomi, kala Dariusli pao vāshungda hiwui pongli awui chithi eina ngahankakā mahanungranglakha eina tangda ot kasā athumli makhāmana.
Kong makānda khalei ngaleiwui lammunga Tattenai kala Shethar-bozenai eina Kong makānda khalei awui ngasotnao lammungabingna awunga Dariusli chithi chiphunvai;
kala chithi chili hithāda kapi: “Awunga Dariusli chingrihairanu.

“Reikhamatai Varewui shim kasapam Judah ngaleili ithumna ayanghaira da awungali chitheikhangaina. Ngalung kahahak khorlaga sāda lei, phākhola thing eina ngaveida lei; athumna makhunlak eina sāda mangā vālak eina lei.
“Chieina ithumna ararnaobingli, ‘Shim hi sākhavai kala kupkhavai khipāna kakaso mikhala?’ da angahāna.
Kala athum kathānbingwui mingla kapikhuilaga nali unghang khavai ngahānkhui.
“Kala athumna hithāda ngahānkai, ‘Ithum kazing eina okathuiwui Varewui raosera, achālakha Israelwui kahaka awunga akhana sākup kahai shim chi ithumna sākālui kajina.
Kha ishāvā ngarāna kazingwui Vareli malungvāt khangasakwui vang Babylon awunga Nebuchadnezzarwui pāngli horsangmihaoda Chaldeanaobingna sakazamserhailaga mibing chi Babylonli tukvāser kahaina.
Chithālala Babylonwui awunga Cyrusna mungkhare kum, Varewui shim hi sakāluiphalungra da awunga Cyrusna kakaso mihaira.

Kala Nebuchadnezzarna Jerusalemli khalei Khorumshimwui eina Babylon kameo shimli khuivā kahai, sinā, lupāsāwui khorkhong saikora awunga Cyrusna Babylon kameo shimwui eina khuishokta Shesh-bazzar kaho ana lammunga sākhangasakawui pāngli sangmi,
kala ali hithāda hānga; “Khorkhongbing hi khuilu, Varewui shim Jerusalemli khalei apam chili vahailu, kala Varewui shim chi chiwui apamli sakāluilu.”
Chithāda Shesh-bazzarna unglaga Jerusalemli khalei Khorumshim chi shimphunga sakai; kala chiwui eina thuida aja eina tangda sāda khalei hina, kakupla makupranga.’

“Chiwui vang eina, awungana mayāmiakha Varewui shim Jerusalemli khalei chi sākālui khavai awunga Cyrusna kakaso mika mamimakhala kaji theikhavai awungawui dolanli khalei lairikbing chi phāyang ngasaklu. Laga hiwui pongli awungawui ningkachāng chi ithumli kahāngmiranu.”
Chieina awunga Dariusna hukhum akha mida, Babylonli khalei shim, apong saikora kapi kahai lairikbing kazip khavaipam chili phāyang ngasaksera.
Mediawui keinung Ecbatana kaho chili lairik akhalui akha samphanga, chili hithāda kapihaisai: “Record akha.

Cyrus awungawui khare kum, awunga Cyrusna kakaso akha mishoka: Jerusalemli khalei Khorumshimwui pongli, pha̱kaphayā kachigat, rikkatā kachigat khuirā khavai shim chi apam chili sākāluiranu; kajui khuining hangtharuk, kapāk khuining hangtharuk,
kahahak lungphek ngaher kathum kala thing ngaherkha da ngaphora, kala chiwui aman awungawui lanshim eina mira.

Kala sinā, lupāwui khorkhong Jerusalemli Khorumshimwui eina Nebuchadnezzarna Babylonli khuiung kahai chi hanmiluida Jerusalemli khalei Khorumshimli ichichāpamli hailuilu; nathumna chibing chi Khorumshimli haira.”
“Chiwui vang eina Kong Makāndawui lammunga Tattenai, Shethar-bozenai, kala nathum ngasoda Kong makāndawui ngaleili lammunga kasābing, nathum masheikhautlu;
Varewui shimli sāda khalei ot chi thāda sāranu; Jehudiwui lammunga kala ararnaobingli Varewui shim chi awui khangachā apamli sāranu.

Chili lāngda Varewui shim sakākhaluiwui vang Jehudiwui ararnaobingli athumna kathāda sara̱khala kaji ina kakaso khamina, kaja mibing hili ngalangman ngalāngda peilaga miphalungra. Hi awungawui shai Kong Makanda khalei ngaleiwui samkaphang chieina mira.

Chili lāngda sākhavai khalei mukkāla, yaovāla, kazingramwui Vareli rikkatā chigat sākhavai, kehula, machila, drakhārala, thaola Jerusalemli khalei pāngmonbingna sākhavai saikora, thangthangwui chi mashoila miphalungra,
chithāda sāda athumna kazingramwui Varewui mangāli ningyāngkhaung pha̱kaphayā chigatta awunga eina anaomayarabingwui mirin ringphākhavai pomiranu.
Kala iwui kakaso hila khamina kaja kachikathāna kakaso mikahai hi ngachei ngasakakha, awui shim eina khangen sutkhuida ali shaoshānra, kala awui shim thuikhanam horsang khavai pam ngasāra.

Kala Jerusalemli khalei Varewui shim chi shimān khavai kasā, maningakha kakaso hi ngachei khavai pāng thara̱kasang awungabing, maningakha mibingli apam chili awui ming somkhangasaka Varena shimān ngasakranu. Darius ina kakaso hi kasāna; hi makhunglak eina sāranu.”
Chieina Kong Makandawui lammunga Tattenai eina Shethar-bozenai kala athumwui ngasotnaobingna awunga Dariusna chiphunkharā chiwui athishurda ningsanglak eina sai.

Kala marān Haggai eina Iddowui naomayara Zechariahwui khamarān athishurda Jehudi ararnaobingna shim chi sākāda mangāvalakhaowa. Kala Israelwui Varena kakaso athishurda kala Persiawui awungabing Cyrus, Darius kala Ar-ta-xerxeswui kakaso athishurda shim chi sākuphaowa;
kala awunga Dariusna khamung zingkum katharukawui marun kachāng kakathumathang shim chi kuphaowa.
Kala Israelwui mibing, pāngmonbing, Levinaobing, kala raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbing saikora Varewui shim sākakupwui dharkat phanit mathānthup mayona.
Kala Varewui shim dharkat phanitli mukkā shākha, yaovā shākhani, yaonao shāmati, kala Israel saikorawui vang suihamshar sākhavai Israelwui shang mashing athishurda me tharāda khani chigata.
Kala Moseswui lairikli kapi kahai thāda Jerusalemli Varewui otram ngatha̱ khavai athum pāngmonbingli kala Levinaobingli kachichāwui otpamli ngateida pamngasaka.

Kaja pāngmonbing eina Levinaobing ngarumda athum khalatta tharmatheng ngasaka, athum tharserhaowa. Chieina raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbingwui vang, athum ngasotnao pāngmonbingwui vang, athum khalattawui vang makānkhami phanitwui yaonao taithata,
raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbing kala yur khangateibingwui khamakhaowui eina pākthuida Israelwui Vare
Kala athumna khawok makazang khamui zātkhān chi ringkaphā eina ngasoda shinithang mayona; kaja
Chiwui thili Persiawui awunga Ar-ta-xerxesna khamung atamli Ezra, Seraiahwui naomayara, avāva̱ ngarā (shānkakā eina) Azariahwui naomayara, Hilkiahwui naomayara,
Shallumwui naomayara, Zadokwui naomayara, Ahitubwui naomayara,
Amariahwui naomayara, Azariahwui naomayara, Meraiothwui naomayara,
Zerahiahwui naomayara, Uzziwui naomayara, Bukkiwui naomayara,
Abishuawui naomayara, Phinehaswui naomayara, Eleazarwui naomayara, pāngmon kharei Aaronwui naomayara—
Ezr china Babylonwui eina unga. Ava Israelwui Vare
Awunga Ar-ta-xerxeswui kashine kum Israelwui mi kaikha, pāngmon kala Levi kaikha, laa kasābing eina ngavei khamayonbing kala Khorumshimli otram khangatha̱bing kaikhala Jerusalemli unga.
Kala ana awunga sāda kashine kumwui kachāng kaphangāli Jerusalemli unga;
kachāng kaphangāwui kharethang ana Babylonwui eina zatphokta Jerusalemli ungshunga, kaja awuitungli Varewui mayonkhami leisai.
Kaja Ezrana
Israelna sāki kaji ot, kala
“Awungabingwui awunga, Ar-ta-xerxesna, kazingramwui Varewui ain kathema pāngmon Ezralina,
iwui wungramli khalei Israel kachikathā mibing, maningakha athumwui pāngmonbing, Levinaobingna Jerusalemli ungngairereo ungga jiakha nali ngasoungpaira kaji hi iwui kakasona.
Nawui pāngli chisin kahai nathum Varewui ain athishurda Judah eina Jerusalemwui pongli ngathing khavai awunga kala awui machinme shinina nali kachihona,
chili lāngda Jerusalemli khalei Israelwui Vare
kala chieina ngasoda Jerusalemli khalei Khorumshimwui vang mibingna kala pāngmonbingna lemmet kachigat sinā eina lupāsā Babylon ngaleili khalei saikora zangda nana khuiungra.
Pheisā hi eina mukkā, yaovā, yaonao hi eina ngasoda athumwui tharāzāt kachigat eina ra̱shakshirei lokhuida Jerusalemli khalei nathum Varewui shimli khalei hanphutpamli chigatlu.
Sinā eina lupāsa katai chi nathumwui Varena sāngasakkhangai athishurda nathumna phāra kaji chi sālu.
Khorumshimli otram ngatha̱ khavai khorkhong nali mikahai chi Jerusalemwui Varewui mangāli khuiunglu.
Kala nathum Varewui shimli sākhavai khalei chiwui vang awungawui lanshimwui eina mihaora.

“Kala awunga Ar-ta-xerxes, ina Kong Makanda ngalei alungli khalei chumsinga saikorali kakaso khamina: Kazingwui Varewui ain kathema Ezr pāngmonna nathumwui eina khikakha khuikapai leiakha mathālak eina sāmilu,
lupāsā kg. thingkathum shāmati, kehu kg. thingtharā, drakhāra̱ liter thingkhani, olive thao liter thingkhani eina tangda, kala machi ningkachāng eina tangda mipaira.
Khorumshimwui vang kazingramwui Varena khikakharanu kakaso chi peida sāphalungra, maningakha awunga ngaleili kala anao ngarāwuitungli malungkhavāt tāpaishina.

Hila ithumna kachitheina kaja pāngmonbingli, Levinaobingli, laa kasābingli, khāmong khamayonbingli, Khorumshimli otram khangatha̱bingli, kala Khorumshimli khangatei ot kasābingli, shaila, khajana kala khangatatei shai makhuipaimana.

“Kala Ezra, nathum Varewui thangkhamei nali chisin kahai athishurda, Kong Makāndawui ngaleili khalei mibingwuitungli bichar sāmi khavai nathum Varewui ain katheibingli bichar same phāsanglu; kala matheithangkhameibingli nana tamchitheilu.
Nathumna Varewui ain, kala awungawui ain makhamayon mili phāshi kasā nilala, loi thākahai nilala, kashong khalāng nilala, phātop kasang nilala shongrān saklak eina milu.”
Jerusalemli khalei
chili lāngda awungawui machinmebing, awungawui kathethem otva̱bingwui mangāli awui makhangachei leikashi ili tāshungkhamiwui vang Vareli sochikatranu. Ina pingmeihaowa kaja iwui Vare
Awunga Ar-ta-xerxesna pānlakha Babylonwui eina ili ngasokhaung avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui akuibing kala miunbing chi hina:
Phinehaswui naomayarabing eina Gershom; Ithamarwui naomayarabing eina Daniel. Davidwui naomayarabingwui eina Hattush,
Shecaniahwui naomayarabing, Paroshwui naomayarabingwui eina Zechariahli ngasoda mingkachan mayarnao shākha hangphangā.
Pahath-moab naomayarabingwui eina Zechariahwui naomayara Eli-e-ho-enaili ngasoda mayarnao shākhani.
Zattuwui naobingwui eina Jahazielwui naomayara Shecaniahli ngasoda mayarnao shākathum.
Adinwui naomayarabingwui eina Jonathanwui naomayara Ebedli ngasoda mayarnao hangphangā.
Elamwui naomayarabingwui eina Athaliahwui naomayara Jeshaiahli ngasoda mayarnao hangshini.
Shephatiahwui naomayarabingwui eina Michaelwui nao Zebadiahli ngasoda mayarnao hangchishat.
Joabwui naotunbingwui eina Jehielwui naomayara Obadiahli ngasoda mayarnao shākhani tharāda chishat.
Baniwui naotunbingwui eina Josiphiahwui naomayara Shelomithli ngasoda mayarnao shākha hangtharuk.
Bebaiwui naotunbingwui eina Bebaiwui nao Zechariahli ngasoda mayarnao maga̱da chishat.
Azgadwui naotunbingwui eina Hakkatanwui nao Johananli ngasoda mayarnao shākha thara.
Adonikamwui naotunbingwui eina, naoda khaung Eliphelet, Jeuel kala Shemaiah athumli ngasoda mayarnao hangtharuk.
Bigvaiwui naomayara eina Uthai kala Zaccurli ngasoda mayarnao hangshinina.
Ina athumli Ahavali longkhava kongpheili kazipkhui, kala chili ithumna kathumthang apisanga. Mibing eina pāngmonbing vāshānkhayang eina Leviwui naongarā mazangsathuwa.
Chieina kathāna Eliezer, Ariel, Shemaiah, Elnathan, Jarib, Elnathan, Nathan, Zechariah, Meshullam kala ningkhamazinga Joiarib eina Elnathanli ahokhui khavai Iddoli chihovai,
ana Kasiphiali khalei apamwui kathānali Iddoli kala chili khalei Khorumshim khamayon achinābingli ithumwui Varewui shimli otram ngatha̱mebing chihorāmi khavai ahāng ngasaka.
Kala Varena ithumli ngasomida Israelwui naomayarawui nao Leviwui nao Mahliwui nao, mingsinda Sherebiahli ngasoda awui naomayarabing, athei-asābing zangda athum tharāda chishat thānunga;
athumli ngasoda Hashabiah kala Merariwui naomayarabingwui eina Jeshaiahli ngasoda athei-asā eina naomayarabing maga̱na;
chili lāngda Khorumshimli otram khangatha̱li Levinaobingli ngachon khavai David eina awui otva̱bingna sangkahai shākhani maga̱na. Athum hi avāva̱ ngarāwui ming eina hāngserhaida lei.

Chieina kongpamli ithum khalatta Varewui mangāli hamsang khavai, awui eina ithum khalattawui, ithumwui naoshinaobingwui, ithumwui khorkhong saikorawui khangarong shongfa phākhui khavai ina chili khumkhavai kasoi.

Kaja yangkashebingwui eina ithumli ngakuimi khavai awungali shipai, kala sigui katonga raimi milu da kapo vaishihaowa. Kaja “Ali kapha mili Varena kaphā sāmi kala ali makhangavapa mili awui malung kakangwui pangshap chi lei” da awungali hanghaira̱sai.
Chiwui vang ithumna Vareli kakhum eina seihā sai, kala ana ithumwui kapo khuisangmi.
Chiwui thili ina kathāna pāngmon tharāda khani: Sherebiah, Hashabiah, kala anili ngasoda aniwui theisā tharā ngateida haihaowa.
Kala ithum Khorumshimwui vang awunga kala machinmebingna, wungnaobing, kala chili khalei Israel saikorana kachigat lupāsā, sinā kala khorkhong saikora chi ina athumli tamshokmi.
Ina athumwui pāngli lupāsā talent shātharuk hangphangā, lupāsāwui khorkhong talent shākha, kala sinā talent shākha,
sinā daric thingkhaman tengkot maga̱, kala sinā thāda kasaka hingpit kahai pithraisāwui khongsai khani tamshokmi.
Kala ina athumli, “Nathum

wui shimlungli pāngmon khareibing, Levinaobing kala Jerusalemli khalei Israelwui navāngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bingwui mangāli nathumna matammiranglakha eina tangda nathum mathālak eina haida khamayonla mayonsālu” da hānga.
Chiwui vang pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingna Jerusalemli, Varewui shimli khuivā khavai sinā, lupā kala khorkhong saikora chi khuisanghaowa.

Chiwui thili kachāng kharewui zimiksho tharāda kakhanethang ithumna Ahava kongwui eina Jerusalemli ungkhavai zatphoka; kala Varewui pāngna ithumli thara̱zatta yangkashibingna shongfali ngathiraiwui eina thānshokmi.
Ithumna Jerusalemli ungshungda chili kathumthang ungpamsanga.

Khamatethang ithumna Varewui shimlungli sinā, lupā, khorkhong, Uriahwui naomayara pāngmon Meremothwui pāngli tamsangmi; kala ali ngasoda Phenihaswui naomayara Eleazarlong kala athumli ngasoda Levinaobing, Jeshuawui naomayara Jozabadlong, Binnuiwui naomayara No-adiah leisai.
Katonga chi shānlaga tama, kala khān tamkhui kahai saikora kapisangserhai.

Atam chitharan raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaung, athumna Israelwui Vareli rikkatā kachigat chigata Israel katongawui vang mukkā tharāda khani, yaovā hangchikoda tharuk, yaonao hangshinida shini, kala suihamsharwui vang mevā tharāda khani, saikora hi
Kala awungawui Kong Makanda khalei ngaleiwui satrapbing eina lammungabing chili awungawui pao chi khuivāmida Khorumshimwui vang kala mibinglila athumna ngachonmi.

Ot sakupser kahaiwui thili otva̱bingna ili hithāda rāhānga, “Israelnaobingla, pāngmonbingla, Levinaobingla ngalei hiwui Canaannaobing, Periznaobing, Jebusnaobing, Ammonnaobing, Moabnaobing, Egyptnaobing kala Amornaobingna kasā ningkakachai otwui eina athum khalatta mapākrarthuwa.

Kaja athum kaikhana, athum kala naomayarabingwui vang preiva̱ngarā sākhavai hiwui ngalā ngakhothaira; chiwui vang kathara yur hi ngalei hiwui yurbingli manātkharomserhaira. Kala shitkasang makhalei ot hikathā hi otva̱bing eina khareibingna mataimeikapta sāhaira.”
Tui chi kashā tharan, I wukkhanangnāhaida iwui kachonla, pha̱honla serkhāklaga ikuisamla, morhāla maokazampama.
Chieina raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbingna shitkasang makhalei ot kasā chiwui vang Varewui tui kashābingna malungringda ngazinwui pha̱kaphayā masāranglakha eina tangda iwui ngalemli rākazipa.
Kala ngazinwui pha̱kaphayā atamli kakhum eina iwui kachon phahon kakāk chi ngavaida pāng tarāmda iwui Vare
“O iwui Varivara, nawui mangāli imai ngareikākida khayakhaowa, kala vaishihaowa, iwui Varivara, kaja ithumwui khayonkhamāng ithumwui kui kānkāhaira, kala morei kazingram kāzokhaira.

Awo-ayi thot eina thuida aja eina tangda khayon hakmahālaka; kala ithumwui khayonkhamangwui vang, ithumla, awungabingla, ithumwui pāngmonbingla, ngalei khangateiwui awungabingwui pāngli horsangmihaida raighai eina sākathat, phātopli tukkhavā, sākakhayāng, kala maishi khangasak aja eina tangda leili.
Kha kasha̱nakhawui vang

Kaja ithum narkahaiya mina, chithālala Varena ithumli mahorhailakmana, kha awui makhangachei leikashi ithumli tāshungmida Persia awungawui mangāli ithum Varewui shim sākhavai, ja̱tā kahai chi sākālui khavai mathuk ngasakmi, kala Judea eina Jerusalemli ithumli nganingkhammi.
“Ara, O ithumwui Vare, hiwui thili ithumna khi hāngrakhala? Kaja ithumna nawui ningkhami mamayonthura,

narao marānbingli nana, nathumna vāda akhuiki kaji lam chi apam chiwui mibingwui khamakhao china ngalei chi mathar ngasakthura; athumwui makathar ningkakachai china haokaphokwui eina akatangli chipemhaira.

Chiwui vang eina nanao ngalāva̱ ngarā, athumwui naomayarabingli mavālei ngasakalu, athumwui naongalāva̱bing nilala nanao mayarabingwui vang makhuipaimara, kala chingri kahai mayākasang, nathum pangshap shokmei khavai, ngalei chiwui heithei zākhavai, kala nanaomayarali katang makhavai shimlui haimi khavai maphālakalu” da hāngngasaka.
Ithumwui makaphā otsakwui vang, kala khangui khalāngwui vang ithumli rāshok kahai saikorawui thili, ithumwui Vare, nana ithumli kashong ngavengmida mimazum sāda shākmi,
chithālaga ithumna nawui ningkhami kailuida ningkakachai kasā miyur hili ngalā ngakhotrala? Nana ithumli malungvātta mimazum akhala mashākla mamutchao ngasakmarala?
O
Ezrana Khorumshimli ngaleokazamlaga chapsasui ning ngateida leilakha Israelwui mibing khararnaosan kachungkha awui ngalemli rākazipa; kaja mibingna panglāk eina chapngachāhaowa.

Kala Elamnaobingwui eina Jehielwui naomayara Shecaniahna Ezrali rāhānga, “Ithumna Vareli ningtongda shitkasang kaihaira, kala hiwui yur khangateiwui sha̱naoli ngakumhaira, kha chithasalala aruila Israelwui vang kachihān lei.

Chiwui vang ithum Varewui ningkhamili khangacheebing kala ameiwui hāngkachithei athishurda pareiva̱bing eina athumwui naongarāli horhaora da ithumwui Varewui mangāli tuingashit akha sasa; kala ainwui athishurda chi sāranu.
Ngakarthuilu, kaja hi nawui otna, kala ithumla nali ngasoda lei, pingmeilu kala chi sālu.”
Chieina Ezrana ngakarthuida pāngmon eina Levi kathānabing kala Israel saikorali hāngkahai chithāda khangashit sāngasaka. Chiwui vang athumna khangashit sai.

Chieina Ezrana Khorumshim eina shokta Eliashibwui naomayara Jehohananwui kāli vāda chithang ngayā zātla mazā kala tara̱la mamangla apisanga, kaja raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbingwui mashitkasangwui vang chapngachai.
Kala Judah eina Jerusalemli khalei raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbing saikora Jerusalemli kazipserphalungra da chishāta,

kala kachikathāna kathumthangwui alungli maraakha, ararnaobing eina otva̱bingwui kakaso athishurda chikathā miwui shimlui ngaponra, kala ali raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbingwui kazip eina khāmhaora.

Chieina Judah eina Benjaminwui mi saikorana kathumthangwui alungli Jerusalemli rākazipsera; hi kachāng kachikowui khamaga̱ thangna. Kala mi saikorana Khorumshimwui kayāngli apamsera, kaja apong hiwui vang kala kazing marlak eina kharowui vang ngacheeyikhaowa.
Kala pāngmon Ezrana thuinganingda hānga, “Nathum ningkhami kaida yur khangatei ngalā kakhuiwui vang Israelwui khangui mataisang ngasakhaira.
Chieina nashāvā ngarāwui Vare
Chieina kakazip saikora china panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Chitharanu; nana kahāng thāda ithumna sāra.
Kha mi kachungkhahaoda, kala kazing marlak eina rohaoda ithum kayāngli manganingpaithuwa. Chili lāngda otsak hi thangkha khanithangwui ot maningmana; kaja hiwui pongli ithumna khangui kahaka sāhaira.

Ithumwui otva̱bingna yarui katongawui vang nganingmiranu; kala ithumwui keinung saikorali khalei kha̱milā kakhui saikorali atam akha langchinhaida chili raserranu; kala Varewui malungkhavāt chi ithumwui eina mangareithuiranglakha eina tangda keinung kachiva̱ ararnaobing eina bichar kasābingna athumli ngasopamranu.”
Athumwui ngachaili Asahelwui nao Jonathan eina Tikvahwui nao Jahzeiah animāngna mamayāmana, kala anili Leviwui Meshullam eina Shabbethaina mijang zanga.

Chieina raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbing china chithāda sai. Avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui athishurda aming milaga pāngmon Ezrana wungva̱bing kapangkhui. Kachāng katharāwui kharethang athumna maram chi phākhui khavai pamphoka;
kala kachāng kharewui kharethang kha̱milā kakhui saikora ngathingkhuiserhaowa.
Pāngmonbingwui naomayarabing kha̱milā kakhui chi Ma-aseiah, Eliezer, Jarib kala Gedaliah; Jeshua naongarābingwui eina shimkhurli Jozadakwui naomayara kala achinā ngarāna.
Athumna preiva̱ngarāli pānghaora da ngashita, kala chiwui khayonchigatwui vang yao ashangva̱wui eina yaovā akha chigata.
Immerwui naomayarabingwui eina, Hanani eina Zebadiah.
Harimwui naomayarabingwui eina Ma-aseiah, Elijah, Shemaiah, Jehiel kala Uzziah.
Pashhurwui naomayarabingwui eina Eli-o-enai, Ma-aseiah, Ishmael, Nethanel, Jozabad kala Elasah.
Levinaobingwui eina Jozabad, Shime-i, Kelaiah (chiya Kelita), Petha-hiah, Judah eina Eliezer,
Laa kasāshi shangli, Eliashib, Ngavei khamayonbingwui eina Shallum, Telem kala Uri.
Israelwui eina Paroshwui naomayarabing athumwui eina Ramiah, Izziah, Malchijah, Mijamin, Eleazer, Hashabiah kala Benaiah.
Elamwui naomayarabingwui eina Mattaniah, Zechariah, Jehiel, Abdi, Jeremoth kala Elijah.
Zattuwui naomayarabingwui eina Eli-o-enai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, Jeremoth, Zabad kala Aziza.
Bebaiwui naomayarabingwui eina Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai kala Athlai.
Baniwui naomayarabingwui eina Meshullam, Malluch, Adaiah, Jashub, Sheal kala Jeremoth.
Pahath-moabwui naomayarabingwui eina Adna, Khelal, Benaiah, Ma-aseiah, Mattaniah, Bezalel. Binnui kala Manasseh.
Harimwui naomayarabingwui eina Eliezer, Isshijah, Malchijah, Shemaiah, Shime-on,
Benjamin, Malluch, kala Shemariah.
Hashumwui naomayarabingwui eina Mattenai, Mattattah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, kala Shime-i.
Baniwui naomayarabingwui eina Ma-adai, Amram, Uel,
Benaiah, Bedeiah, Kheluhi,
Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
Mattaniah, Mattenai, Jaasu.
Binnuiwui naomayarabingwui eina Shime-i,
Shelemiah, Nathan, Adaiah,
Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
Azarel, Shelemiah, Shemariah,
Shallum, Amariah kala Joseph.
Nebowui naomayarabingwui eina Je-iel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jaddai, Joel kala Benaiah.
Athum hi kha̱milā khuiserhairasai, kala naongarā zangda chihoserhaowa.
Hacaliahwui nao Nehemiahwui tuina.
Zingkum khamaga̱ kum, Ngaphei kachāng; ina Susa keinungli pamlakha;
ichina Hananina Judahwui mi kaikhali ngasoda rārāsai; kala ina raithā kahaiwui eina ngathishok kahai ringda khaleibingwui pongli, kala Jerusalemwui pongli athumli ngahāna.

Kala athumna hānga, “Raithā kahaiwui eina ngathikashok ngalei chili ringda khaleibing ringshilāk eina kala simasailak eina okthuida lei; Jerusalemwui phākhola shaokhaitāmiserhaira, kala ngaveila mei sa̱tāmiserhaira” da hānga.
Tui chi kashā eina ina pamzangda chapa, kala zimiksho kasāngkhawui vang sifapama; ina kazingramwui Vareli kakhum eina seihā sapama.
Kala ina hānga, “O

nawui rao Israel mibingwui vang nawui mangāli naraowui seihā, arui ina seihā sāda khalei hi nakhanāna shāmiranu, kala namikna theimiranu, nali mamayāmada ithumna morei sākahai nawui rao Israel mibingwui morei ina hāngphatta ngashun ngayā mateila seihā kasā hi. Mha, I kala ishāvāwui shimkhurna morei sāhaira.
Nali ithumna maphālakla sāhaira, kala narao Mosesli kaso kahai nawui ningkhami, ain kala shiyan-chikan mamayonthuwa.
Kaphaningungmilu, narao Mosesli kasoda hāngmi khangasak, ‘Nathumna ning tongda mashitsangakha, ina mibingwui ngachaili yaoyāngmihaora;

kha nathumna ili latungda iwui ningkhamibing chi mayonda ithi shurakha, tāmeikap kaji kazingramli kashamvā haisālala, chiwui eina iwui ming chili leikhavai ina kapangkakhuipam chili kazipkhuida khuiungluira.’
“Athum nawui raobingna, nawui reikhamatai pangshap kala kapanga pāng eina ngatangkakhuia nawui misera.
O
Chitharan ina awungawui khorām singme sāsai.
Awunga Ar-ta-xerxesna mungda khamaga̱ kum Mayo kachāng, awungana phāshaklakha ina drakhāra̱ heisangmi. Rida awungawui mangali wukkakhanang maleilakrangsai.
Kala awungana ili ngahāna, “Khisāda khanangzanhailikhala, kakhanang kakazāva matheimana? Hi ningkazāt maningla katei khikha maningmana.” Chieina I ngacheeshunhaowa.
Ina awungali hānga, “Awungali okpeimeiranu! Keinungla, ishāvā ngarāwui chikhurla sākathānmihai kala ngaveibingla mei sa̱tāmihailaga kathāda makhanangmarakhala?”
Chieina awungana ili hānga, “Nawui pokhangai khi leili?” Chieina ina kazingramwui Vareli seihā sai.
Kala awungali ina hānga, “Awungali ningyāng ungngasakta nawui mikyanli naraoli ngahanngaimiakha ishāvā ngarāwui chikhur ungsākālui khavai ili Judahli chihoungmilu.”
Chieina awungana ili hānga (Awungva̱ awui ngalemli pamsai), “Na karankha sāngda thuihaora, kala katharān latungrakhala?” Chieina awungana mayāmihaoda ina atam akha kakkhui.
Kala awungali ina hānga, “Awungana mayāmipaiakha Kong Makandawui ngalei lammungabingli, Judah maungshungranglakha eina tangda athumna ili kānngasak khavai pāngli chithi kapisangmilu;

kala khorum khavai shimwui kala raipanwuiwui vang ngavei khavai khāngen, keinungwui phākho ngavei khavai, iwui pamkhavai shim sākhui khavai, awungawui ngahongwui eina thing khuipai khavai, khamayona Asaphlila chithi akha kapisangmilu.” Chieina awungana iwui kapo mayāmi, kaja Varewui ngasokhami pāng chi iwuitungli leisai.
Chiwui thili Kong Makanda khalei lammungabingli ina vāda awungawui chithi chi mi. Kala awungana raimiwui akhavābing kala siguiraimibingli ili ngasoda chihovai.
Kha Horonwui Sanballat eina awui rao Ammonnaopa Tobiahna, Israelnaobingwui kaphā sāmi khavai rāhaira kaji shālaga maringphālakthuwa.
Chieina ina Jerusalemli ungshungda kathumthang ungpama.

Chiwui thili ina ngayāshong ngakarthui, I kala iwui mibing kaikhala zanga; kala Jerusalemwui vang iwui ningli Varena khi sāngasak khavai sangmihailikhala kaji khipālikha mahāngmana. Ina tongkhavā gadhā chi maningla khangatei sāyur mangasomana.
Ina ngayāshong Tampāk Ngavei eina Ramfa Rakhong kala Thothap
Chiwui thili Ura̱ Ngavei eina Awungawui Ra̱khongla ayanga; kha ina katonga gadhā chi mavāpaithuwa.
Chieina ngayāshong tampākshong eina ngavei chi ayangkhui; kala Tampāk Ngavei eina ungzangda latunghaowa.
I kali khavākhala, khi akasākhala kajila otva̱bingna matheimana; kala Jehudinaobing, pāngmonbing, wungnaobing, otva̱bing, kala khangatatei ot sāki kajibing khipālikha mahangrangsai.

Chiwui thili ina athumli hānga, “Ithum kakhanangwui alungli khalei nathumna thei, Jerusalem sākhaihaida ngaveila meina chuitāhaira. Ralu, ithum Jerusalemwui phākho sakāluishitsa, chithākha ithum mai mashiluimara.”

Kala kaphā sākhavai Varewui pāngna ili ngasokhami chi athumli hānga, kala awungana ili kahāng saikora chila athumli hāngsera. Chieina athumna, “Ithum ngakarthuida sakāluisa” da hānga. Chiwui vang athumna yāng chishotta ot sāphoka.
Kha Horonwui Sanballat eina Ammonwui rao Tobiah kala Arabwui Geshemna chi shālaga athumna yangshāt eina zeida hānga, “Nathumna sāda khalei hi khikhala? Nathum awungali ngakaikashila?”

Chieina ina athumli ngahānkai, “Kazingramli khalei Varena ithumli mataisang ngasakra, kala awui rao ithumna ngakarthuida sakāluira; kha hiwui pongli nathumwui yar, mashun kala Jerusalemli phaningungkharān khikha maleimana.”

Eliaship pāngmon kharei china thānda athum chinaongarā pāngmonbingna Yao Ngavei sakai. Chi athumna tharchigata kala khāmongla sāsanga; athumna Shākhawui Raikānphung, Hananelwui Raikānphung vāshungda tharchigata.
Chiwui eina vameida Jerichowui mina sakai. Chiwui eina vameida Imriwui naomayara Zaccurna sakai.
Hassenaahwui naomayarabingna Khai Ngavei sakai, athumna khāngenla makharsangda khāmongla, veiruithingla, lonkhavaila sāsangsera.

Athumwui thili Hakkozwui naomayara Uriahna kapharā Meremothna chiphoi. Athumwui thili Meshezabelwui nao Berechiahna kapharā Meshullamwui naomayarabingna kachiphona. Athumwui thili Baanawui nao Zadokna chiphoi.
Athumwui thili Tekoinaobingna chiphoi, kha athumwui wungnaobingna
Paseahwui nao Joiada eina Besodeiahwui nao Meshullamna Kachama Ngavei sai; athumna khāngenla makharsangda khāmong lonkhavai, kala veiruithing sāsangsera.
Kala athumwui thili Gibeonwui Melatiah eina Meronothwui Jadon, kala Kong Makanda khalei rammungawui azingli khalei Gibeon eina Mizpahwui mibingna chiphoi.
Athumwui thili Harhaiahwui nao sinā kasema Uzzielna chiphoi. Chiwui thili thao kashunga Hananiah zanga; kala Khamashā Phākho vāshungda athumna sākhui.
Athumwui thili Hurwui nao Rephaiah, Jerusalem ngalei ngakaipak khamungana chiphokhui.
Athumwui thili Harumaphwui nao Jedaiahna awui shim yangkhangasungli chiphoi; kala awui thili Hashabneiahwui nao Hattushna chiphokhuiya.
Harimwui nao Malchijah eina Pahath-moabwui nao Hasshubna akai akha kala Sha̱rkha̱wui Raikānphung chiphoi.
Athumwui thili Halloheshwui nao Shallum, Jerusalem luiramwui ngakaipak khamunga eina anao ngalāva̱ ngarāna chiphokhui.

Hanub eina Zanoahwui mibingna Tampāk Ngavei chiphoi; athumna chi chiphoda khāmong, lonkhavai, veiruihaila sasangserda sakālui, kala ashina kachipho Thothap Ngavei vāshungda khuining thingkha kāshunga.
Rechabwui nao Malchijah, Beth-haccherem leiretli khamunga china Thothap Ngavei chiphomi; kala ana khāmong, lonkhavai, veiruithing sāsangsera.

Colhozehwui nao Shallum, Mizpah luiramli khamunga china Ura̱ Ngavei chiphoi; ana sakāluida ngaveimithai kala khāmongla sāsanglaga lonkhavaila, veiruihaila sāsangsera; kala ana awungawui yāmguili khalei Shelah Ra̱khongwui phākhola ana sāda, Davidwui Keinung eina tākhavai chonchak vāshunga.
Awui thili Azbukwui nao Nehemiah, Beth-zur luiram ngakaipak khamunga china Davidwui chikhur mai khangasung apam akha, khonkakhui ra̱khongpam kala kapingabingwui shim vāshungda ana chiphoi.
Awui thi Levinaobingna chiphoi: Baniwui nao Rehum; awui thili Keilah luiram ngakaipak khamunga Hashabiahna awui leiretwui vang chiphoi.
Awui thili achinā ngarāna chiphoi: Keilahwui luiram ngakaipak khamunga, Henadawui nao Bavvai;
awui thili Jeshuawui nao Ezer, Mizpahli khamunga china apam akha khutlaipamli yangngasungda kakā Achikun
Awui thili, Zabbaiwui nao Baruchna, Achikun chiwui eina thuilaga Eliashib pāngmon khareiwui shim khāmong ashungda chiwui ngachaili khalei chi chiphokhui.
Awui thili, Hakkozwui nao, Uriahwui nao Meremothna akai akha Eliashwui khāmong eina thuilaga shim vākatang chiwui ngachaili khalei chi chiphokhui.
Awui thili Tampākwui pāngmonbingna chiphoi.
Chiwui thili Benjamin eina Hasshubna ashiwui shimli kāroda khalei chi chiphokhui. Athumwui thili Ananiahwui nao, Ma-aseiahwui nao Azariahna awui shim ngalemli chiphoi.
Awui thili Henadadwui nao Binuina Azariahwui shim eina thuilaga Achikun ashungda chiwui ngachaili khalei chi chiphoi.
Uzaiwui nao Palalna, Achikunli kāroda khalei kala mayonkhavaiwui kayāngli awungawui atung shimwui eina sākashok chi chiphoi. Awui thili Paroshwui nao Pedaiah eina,
Ophelli kapam raobing china zingshoshongwui Tara̱ Ngavei eina sākashokawui ngazun vāshungda sai.
Chiwui thili Tekoa mibingna, wui
Sigui Ngaveiwui atungvāk, pāngmonbing kachichana kachichāwui shimli kāroda khalei phākhobing chiphokhuisera.
Athumwui thili Immerwui nao Zadokna awui shimli kāroda khalei chi sai. Awui thili Shecaniahwui nao, Zingsho Ngavei khamayona Shemaiahna chiphoi.
Awui thili Shelemiahwui nao Hananiah eina Zalaphwui katharuka nao Hanunna akai akha chiphokhui. Chiwui thili, Berechiahwui nao Meshullamna awui shimli kāroda khalei chi chiphoi.
Awui thili sinā kasāpa Malchijahna Muster
Chithekwui ato kā eina Yao Ngavei ngachai chi sinā kasābing eina leihkhalonbingna chiphokhuiya.
Ithumna phākho chi sakāda lei kaji Sanballatna kashā tharan, a malung thuilakhaowa, kala ana Jehudinaobingli zeikakharui tui kachungkha hānga.

Kala achinā ngarāwui mangāli kala Samaria raimibingwui mangāli hithāda hānga, “Khangazana Jehudibing hi khisālikhala? Athumna otbing hi sākhuiluirala? Athumna pha̱phayārala? Athumna thangkhawui alungli sākupshaprala? Mei chuikahai kala khorkasāk kahai ngalungbing hieina ngamuikhuilaga sākāluishitrala?”
Ammonwui rao Tobiahla awui ngalemli nganingsāda hānga, “Mha, athumna sakāda khalei hi ramfana kānaisi kaje ja̱shapra!”
Nganāmilu, O ithumwui Varivara, kaja ithumli ningkachaihaira; athumwui zeikakharui chi athum khalattawuitungli tāranu, kala athumli tukvā khavaipamli ngaponthui khavai mihaolu.
Athumwui khayon mafakhammialu, kala athumwui morei namikyanwui eina mapheomialu, kaja shim kasābingwui mangāli athumna nali malungvātngasakhaira.
Chithāda ithumna phākho chi sākai; kala kuimareida ngavei chi ngahunshing kāhaowa. Kaja mibingna ningli ot sālakra kaji hi leihaowa.
Kha Sanballat, Tobiah, Arabwui mibing, Ammonnaobing, kala Ashdodnaobingna Jerusalemwui phākho kachipho mangā vāda apam saikora ngasunki jihaira kaji kashā tharan malungvātlakhaowa;
chieina athumna Jerusalemli rāngararlaga pa̱ngapā khavai ngathumda ngakuka.
Chieina ithumwui Vareli ithumna seihā sai, kala athumwui eina kanmi khavai ngashun ngayā mateila mayonkhami raikān phāsanga.
Kha Judahna hānga, “Ot kasābingwui pangshap ngazanhaira, kala thothap kachungkha leili; ithumna phākho hi masārarthura.”
Kala ithumwui yangkashibingna hānga, “Athumwui alungli ithumna vāda shaothatlaga ot mangasām ngasakranglakha athum matheimara.”
Athumwui ngalemli kapam Jehudinaobingna ithumli tharā shida, “Khalalei apam kachiva̱wui eina athumna ithumli rāngararra” da hānga.
Chiwui vang eina, shang-shangwui athishurda, raighai, kazei, malā chisinlaga, phākhowui khanuk khanema khamasai pambingli ina raikān phāsanga.
Kala ina yanglaga ngakarthuida, wungnaobing, otva̱bing, kala yarui saikorali hānga, “Athumli mangacheealu. Phaningunglu, reikhamatai, khangachee-khangachā
Varena athumwui khangarān maungshung ngasakthura kala ithumna theihaira da yangkashebingna theikahai tharan, ithum saikora phākho chili latunga, kala ichichāwui ot chi sai.
Chithang eina thuida iwui mi ngayarpakna ot sai, ngayarpakna kazei, chāngvei, malā singa; kala Judahwui mibing ot sāda khalei saikorawui shim khanuk kachida kathānabingna raikān nganingripa,
Thing, ngalung khangava̱bingna pāngreikha eina ot sai, pāngreikha eina khutlai sing jiya.
Kala shim kasābingna raighai thāngriplaga ot sai. Talla̱ khongme china iwui ngalemli nganinga.
Kala ina wungnaobing, otva̱bing kala mi kateibingli hānga, “Ot hi haklaka, apamla mashālaka, kala ithumli phākhona khayinhaida ithum akha eina akha katāva̱li matak ngarokhaira.
Talla̱khon kashāpam chili rāda ithum khaleipam chili rangalengserlu. Ithumli Varena ngararmira.”
Chithāda ithumna ot sai, kala ngayarpakna, kazing kathang eina thuida sirā mashokranglakha eina tangda kazei singpama.
Atam chilila ina mibingli hānga, “Mi kachiva̱na kachichāwui raobingli ngasoda Jerusalemwui alungli pilu, chithāda ngayā raikān sāra, ngashun ot sāra.”
Chithāda sāda ila, ichinā ngarā nilala, iwui raobing nilala, ili shurda raikān kapambing nilala, khipānakha kashankachon makhuishokla kachichāwui khutlai singriplaga pama.
Khaleilaga mibingla, preiva̱ ngarāla Jehudinaobingli mamayāmada khonzārhaowa.
Athumwui ngachaili kaikhana hānga, “Ithumwui naomayara ngarā kala naongalāva̱ ngarā zangda ithum chungnāhaira; ithum ringkhavai māngum milu.”
Kaikhana, “Kashakazā makhaleiwui vang māngum samphang khavai luila, yāmguila, shimla, hamserhaira;” da hānga.
Khangatei kaikhana hānga, “Awungali lui kala drakhā yāmguiwui shai mikhavai pheisā shuksanghaira.

Ithum ara chinaongarā ngasāserhaoda, inao naongarābingla athumwui naongarā kathāna; chithālala ithumna naomayara kala naongalāva̱ ngarāli miwui raonao tandi eina sāngasakta lei, kala ithumwui naongalāva̱ kaikhava raonao ngasāthuihaira; kha hili ngachon khavai ithumwuili pangshap maleithura, kaja khangatei mina ithumwui lui kala drakhā yāmgui khuihaira.”
Athumwui ringkhangā kala tuibing chi kashā tharan I malungvātlakhaowa.
