I khalatta chukmajalaga, wungnaobing eina otva̱bingli ina khayon phenda hānga, “Nathum khalatta nachinā ngarāli atar khuizādalei.” Kala ina athumwuitungli makhamayawui kazip kahakva̱ akha sai,

kala athumli hānga, “Ithumna kashap eina tangda, yur khangateibingli yorsang kahai Jehudi achinā ngarā lokhuiluishithaira, kha nathumwui nachinā ngarā eina tangdali yorhaida ithumna lokhuiluishit khavai sādalei!” Athumna khituikha ngahānkā khavai maleithuda kasaikha pamhaowa.
Chieina ina hānga, “Nathumna sāda khalei ot hi maphāthura. Ithumli yangkashebingwui zeikakharui malei khavai, ithumwui Vareli ngacheeda maokthui ngayimala?
Chili lāngda I kala ichinā ngarāna kala iwui raobingnala pheisā kala māngum athumli chishutpamda lei. Ithum atar kakhui hi thāhaosa.
Athumwui lui, drakhā yāmgui, olive yāmgui, kala shimla, aja zimik hanshokmiserhaolu; kala shāshāwui eina tārkakhui pheisā, kashakazā, drakhāra̱, kala thao nathumna khuikahai chila hanmiserhaolu.”

Chieina athumna hānga, “Ithumna hanmiserhaora, kala athumwui eina khikha makhuiluimara. Nana kahāng thāda ithumna sāra.” Kala ina pāngmonbingli hokhuida athumna ngashit kahai thāda khangashit sāngasaka.

Ila iwui kashānli neikahai kachon chi kathantāda hānga, “Ngashit kahai hithāda makasā mi chili Varena ashi shimkhurwui eina kala awui kasāsā ot saikorawui eina kathantāranu. Kathantāhaida khamasai eina pamranu.” Mi kazip saikorana, “Amen” da hānglaga

Chili lāngda, ili Judah ngaleili rammunga sangkaphok eina thuida, Ar-ta-xerxes awungawui khamaga̱ kum eina thuilaga thumrāda khani eina tangda, kum tharāda khani, I eina ichinā ngarā rammungawui zākhavai talop mazālakmana.

Iwui mangāli leikasā khare rammunga sākasābingna mibingli ot chotlak eina sāngasaksai, zātla, drakhāra̱la ngashaikhui; chili lāngda shekel hangmatitila khui. Athumwui raobingnala mibingwuitungli akhavā sai. Kha iva Vareli khangacheewui vang chithāda masāmana.
Ila phākho kasā chili zanga, lamla makhuimana; iwui raobing saikorala ot kasā chili zanga.
Chili lāngda ili phazākhangarum mi shākha hangphangāna, Jehudinaobing kala otva̱bing, chili lāngda ithumwui kuikhamareili khalei yurbingwui eina kharābing zanga.

Chitharan thangthangwui zākhavai khangarān chili mukkā akha, asā kakā yao tharukna; iwui vang harnaobingla taithatmi, kala zimiksho katharāthang drakhāra̱la mavātla ngarānmi; chithālala ina rammungawui talop chi mapomana, khikhalajila mibingwui otphun chi ritlaksai.
Mibingwui vang ina kapha ot kasā hiwui vang, ili kaphaningungmilu, O iwui Varivara.
Phākho chi ina sakāluihaira kala kakai-khaut maleithura (atam chichangle ngaveibingwui khāmong masāsangrangsai) da Sanballat, Tobiah, Arabpa Geshem kala ithumwui yangkashebingli vākahāng tharan,
Sanballat eina Geshemna ili pao chihorāda hānga, “Ono tampākwui ruinganai kha̱ akhali ithum samphangsa.” Kha athumna ili makaphā sākida khangarāna.
Kala ina paome chihovāda hānga, “I ot saklak kahai sāda lei, I marārarmara. Ina nathumli tāsamphangra da khisāda ot kasā ngasāmrakhala?”
Hithāda athumna ili mati shida mi chihorai kala inala kharewui tākam eina ngahānkai.
Kaphangāli Sanballatna kharewui thāda chithikhao manapla awui rao akha chihoralui.

Chili hithāda kapihaisai, “Yurbingna hithāda hānga, kala Geshemnala hānga, na kala Jehudinaobingna rai sākhavai ngarānda lei; chiwui vang phākho chi sakāda khaleina; kala nana athumwui awunga sangaida lei da pao china hānga.

Kala ‘Judahli awunga akha lei’ da nawui pongli hangmarānmi khavai marānbingla Jerusalemli phāsanghaira da hānga. Tui hiwui athishurda ara ithumna awungali hāngra. Chiwui vang eina ralu, ithum ngazekhuisa.”
Chieina ina mi chihovāda ali hānga, “Nana kahāng chithāda masālakmana; kaja tuibing chi nakhalattawui kaphaning eina sākakhuina.”
Kaja athumna ithumli ngachee ngasak khavai, “Ot masālengluila, thāhaihenura” da kaphaningna. Kha O Vare, nana ipāng pangngasakmilu.

Mehetabelwui nao Delaiahna kapharā awui shimwui eina ayar makashoka, Shemaiahwui shimli ina khavā tharan, ana hānga, “Varewui shimli ithum samphangsa, kala Khorumshimwui khāmong tāknartitlaga pamhaosa; kaja athumna sāthat khavai rārāda lei, ashama ngayā athumna nali shaothat khavai rāra.”
Kha ina hānga, “I kathā mina yāmrala? Kala I kathā mina khorum khavai shimli yāmngayinrala? I mazangmara.”
Varena ali kachiho maningmana kaji ina thei, kha ana iwuitungli khamarān chi Tobiah eina Sanballatna ali phākasangna da theikhui.
Ili ngachee ngasaklaga morei sākhavai kala iwui ming zakshi ngasakta zeingasak khavai ali phākasangna.
O iwui Vare, Tobiah eina Sanballat kala marānva̱ No-adiah, kala ili ngachee khavai kasā marān khangatateibinglila athumna sākahai otsakbing hiwui athishurda phaningungmilu.
Chieina phākho chi zimiksho hangphangāda kakhanethang, Phei kachāngwui zimiksho maga̱da kaphangāthang kuphaowa.

Kala ithumwui yangkashe saikorana kashā tharan, ithumli kuimareida khalei yur saikora ngacheeyikhaowa, kaja ithum Varewui khangachon eina ot hi kupkapaina da athumna theihaoda athum khalatta ningkhanganung maleithuwa.
Chili lāngda, atam chitharan Judahwui wungnaobingna Tobiahli chithi kachungkha chiphuna, kala Tobiahwui chithila athumna samphanga.
Kaja Judahwui mi kachungkhana ali khangashit sahaisai; khikhalajila Arahwui nao Shecaniahwui arihā chi ana; kala anaomayara Jehohananna Berechiahwui naomayara Meshullamwui naongalāva̱li ngakuma.
Kala athumna iwui mangalila awui kapha kasā pongli matuichithei, kala iwui tuila ali ahāngsera. Chieina ngachee khavai Tobiahna ili chithi kachungkha chiphunrai.
Phākho sākuphaida ina khāmongla sāsangserhai, khāmong khamayonabingla, laa kasābingla, Levinaobingla kapangsangser kahai tharan,
Jerusalem mungkhavai ina ichina Hanani eina Hananiahli rammunga sāngasaka, kaja Hananiah hi mi saikorawui ngachaili ningkatonga kala Vareli ngacheemeikap kaji mi akhana.

Ina athumli, “Ngashun makāranglakha eina tangda Jerusalemwui ngavei mashopaimara, kala chili nganingda leilakha eina tangda ngavei tāktithailu. Jerusalemwui mibingwui eina shantri phāsanglu, athumna kachichāshiwui shimli kāroda raikān phāsanglu” da hānga.
Keinung chi hakshuna, kha chiwui alungli miva kateokhamāng lei, kala shimla masākārangsai.

Chiwui thili Varena, iwui ningli wungnaobing, otva̱bing, kala mibing kazipkhuida athumwui naotun athishurda lairikli aming channgasak khavai kasatmi. Kala ungkharebingwui naotunwui lairik chi ina samphangda hithāda kapihaisai.
Athum Zerubbabel, Jeshua, Nehemiah, Azariah, Raamiah, Nahamani, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispereth, Bigvai, Nehum, Baanah, athumli ngasounga.
Israel mibingwui mashing:
Paroshwui naomayarabing, thingkhani shākha hangshinida khani.
Shephatiahwui naomayarabing, shākathum hangshinida khani.
Arahwui naomayarabing, shātharuk hangphangāda khani.
Pahath-moabwui naomayarabing, matailak eina Jeshua eina Joabwui naomayarabing, thingkhani shāchishat tharāda chishat.
Elamwui naomayarabing, thingkha shākhani hangphangāda mati.
Zattuwui naomayarabing, shāchishat hangmatida phangā.
Zaccaiwui naomayarabing, shāshini hangtharuk.
Binnuiwui naomayarabing, shātharuk hangmatida chishat.
Bebaiwui naomayarabing, shātharuk maga̱da chishat.
Azgadwui naomayarabing, thingkhani shākathum maga̱da khani.
Adonikamwui naomayarabing, shātharuk hang tharukta shini.
Bigvaiwui naomayarabing, thingkhani hangtharukta shini.
Adinwui naomayarabing, shātharuk hangphangāda phangā.
Aterwui naomayarabing, kaja Hezekiahshi, hangchikoda chishat.
Hashumwui naomayarabing, shākathum maga̱da chishat.
Bezaiwui naomayarabing, shākathum maga̱da mati.
Hariphwui naomayarabing, shākha tharāda khani.
Gebeonwui naomayarabing, hangchikoda phangā.
Bethlehem eina Netophahwui mi, shākha hangchishatta chishat.
Anathotwui mibing, shākha maga̱da chishat.
Beth-azmavethwui mibing, hangmatida khani
Kiriath-jearim, Chephirah, kala Beerothwui mibing, shāshini hangmatida kathum.
Ramah eina Gebawui mibing, shātharuk maga̱da akha.
Michmaswui mibing, shākha maga̱da khani.
Bethel eina Aiwui mibing, shākha maga̱da kathum.
Nebo khangateiwui mibing, hangphangāda khani.
Khangatei Elamwui naomayarabing, thingkha shākha hangmatida mati.
Harimwui naomayarabing, shākathum maga̱.
Jerichowui naomayarabing, shākathum hangmatida phangā.
Lod, Hadid, kala Onowui naomayarabing, shākha maga̱da akha.
Senaahwui naomayarabing, thingkathum shāchiko thumra.
Pāngmonbing: Jedaiahwui naomayarabing, aming eina Jeshuawui, shimkhur shāchiko hangshinida kathum.
Immerwui naomayarabing, thingkha hangphangāda khani.
Pashhurwui naomayarabing, thingkha shākhani hangmatida chishat.
Harimwui naomayarabing, thingkha tharāda shini.
Levishi: Jeshuawui naomayarabing aming eina Hodevahwui naomayarabing eina Kadmi-elwui naomayarabing hangshinida mati.
Laa kasābing: Asaphwui naomayarabing, shākha hangmatida chishat.

Khamong khamayonabing: Shallumwui naomayarabing, Aterwui naomayarabing, Talmonwui naomayarabing, Akkubwui naomayarabing, Hatitawui naomayarabing, Shobaiwui naomayarabing, athum shākha thumrāda chishat.
Khorum khavai shimwui otram khangatha̱bing: Zihawui naomayarabing, Hasuphawui naomayarabing, Tabbaothwui naomayarabing,
Keroswui naomayarabing, Siawui naomayarabing, Padonwui naomayarabing,
Lebanawui naomayarabing, Hagabawui naomayarabing, Shalmaiwui naomayarabing,
Hananwui naomayarabing, Giddelwui naomayarabing, Gaharwui naomayarabing,
Re-aiahwui naomayarabing, Rezinwui naomayarabing, Necodawui naomayarabing,
Gazzamwui naomayarabing, Uzzawui naomayarabing, Paseahwui naomayarabing,
Besaiwui naomayarabing, Me-unimwui naomayarabing, Nephushesimwui naomayarabing,
Bakbukwui naomayarabing, Hakuphawui naomayarabing, Harhurwui naomayarabing,
Bazlithwui naomayarabing, Mehidawui naomayarabing, Harshawui naomayarabing,
Barkoswui naomayarabing, Siserawui naomayarabing, Temahwui naomayarabing,
Neziahwui naomayarabing, Hatiphawui naomayarabing.
Solomonwui raobingwui naomayarabing: Sotaiwui naomayarabing, Sopherethwui naomayarabing, Peridawui naomayarabing,
Jaalawui naomayarabing, Darkonwui naomayarabing, Giddelwui naomayarabing,
Shephatiahwui naomayarabing, Hattilwui naomayarabing, Pochereth-hazzebaimwui naomayarabing, Amonwui naomayarabing.
Khorum khavai shimwui otram khangatha̱bing kala Solomonwui raobingwui naomayarabing saikora shākathum hangchikoda khanina.

Azingwuibing hina Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, Addon, kala Immer eina khaungbingna; kha athum avāva̱ ngarāwui shimkhur kala khipāwui naotunkhala kaji shākhi mamararthuda Israelnaok maningmakhala kaji mahāngrarthuwa.
Delaiahwui naomayarabing, Tobiahwui naomayarabing, Necodawui naomayarabing, shātharuk hangmatida khanina.
Kala pāngmonbingwuila: Hobaiahwui naomayarabing, Hakkozwui naomayarabing, Barzillaiwui naomayarabing, (Gileadna Barzillaiwui naongalāva̱li ngakumlaga chiwui ming khuikahaina).
Hibingna naotun lairiklung chili ming chanmi khavai poi, kha chili masamphangmada pāngmonrinwui eina makatharana da khuishokhaowa.
Urim eina Thummimwui pāngmon mashokranglakha eina tangda tharmeikap kaji kashakazā chili athum mazangpaimara da rammunga china athumli hānghaowa.
Katonga kakazip chi mi thing hangmatida khani shākathum hangtharukna,
chili lāngda athumwui rao, sha̱naola mayarnaola thingshini shākathum thumrāda shini kala laa kasā sha̱nao mayarnao shākhani hangmatida phangāna.
Athumwui sigui shāshini thumrāda tharuk, athumwui gadhā shākhani hangmatida phangā
kala athumwui ut shā̱mati thumrāda phangā, kala gadhā kateo yur thingtharuk shāshini maga̱na.
Chitharan ot sākhavai avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bingna pheisā mi. Rammungana lanshimli sinā eina kg. chishat, khongsai hangphangā, pāngmonwui sāri shāphangā thumrā mi.
Kala avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱ kaikhana ot chiwui vang lanshimli sinā kg. shākha hangtharukta chishat, lupāsā kg. thingkha shākhani hangphangā mi.
Kala mi katateibingna khami sinā kg. shākha hangtharukta chishat, lupāsā kg. shākha hangmati, kala pāngmonbingwui kachon hangtharukta shini samphanga.
Kala kachāng kashine kākapei eina, Israelwui naomayarabingna athumwui keinungli pamhairasai.
Kala mi saikora akha sāda Tara̱ Ngaveiwui yāngreili kazipa; kala athumna ain kathema Ezrali
Kachāng kashinewui kharethang, pāngmon Ezrana yarui kazipli ain chi, sha̱naola mayarnaola, shākhuitheishap saikorawui mangāli khuirai.

Tara̱ Ngaveiwui yāngreivāk ngareivāda, ngathor eina thuilaga ngashun eina tangda, sha̱naola, mayarnaola theikhuishap saikorawui mangāli pāchithei; kala mi saikora ningsanglak eina ain lairik chi nganākhui.

Kazip chiwui vang nganing khavai, thing eina sāmi kahai tārongnao chiwuitungli ain kathema Ezrana kānganinga; kala awui ngalemli, Mattithiah, Shema, Anaiah, Uriah, Hilkiah, kala Ma-aseiah longna awui yāshong nganinga, kala Pedaiah, Misha-el, Malchijah, Hashum, Hash-baddanah, Zechariah, kala Meshullam athumna awui uishong nganinga.
Kala Ezrana mi saikorawui mikyanli lairik chi hārshoka, kaja ana mi saikorali juimeida nganinga; ana hārkashok tharan mi saikorana nganingkai.
Reikhamateiya Vare

Kala mibingna kachichāwui pamli pamda, Jeshua, Bani, Sherebiah, Jamin, Akkub, Shabbethai, Hodiah, Ma-aseiah, Kelita, Azariah, Jozabad, Hanan, Pelaiah, kala Levinaobingna ain chi theikhui khavai mibingli ngachonmi.
Kala athumna Varewui ain chi lairik chiwui eina tharzā eina pāchitheida mi saikorana theishingkhui.
Rammunga sākasa Nehemiah, Ezr pāngmon kala ain kathema, kala mibingli tamkachitheia Levibingna mi saikorali hānga, “Aja hi nathumwui Vare
Chiwui thili ana athumli hānga, “Kachichashi shimli ungda athao ungshailu kala kashima drakhāra̱ ungmanglu kala kazā khamang khangarān makasābingli yar sālu; kaja aja hi
Chieina Levinaobingna mi saikorali chingrihai ngasakta, “Kasaikha pamlu, kaja aja kathara zimikshona; wukmakhanangalu” da hānga.
Chieina mi saikorana phāshak phazā khavai kala makhaleibinglila yar chihovāda lumlao khavai ungserhaowa, kaja athumli kahāng tui chi athumna theishingkhui.
Kakhane thang, mi saikorawui avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bing, pāngmonbing kala Levinaobingli ngasoda ain tuibing chi mathameida tamkhui khavai Ezra, ain kathemawui ngalemli akazipa.
Kala

kala athumwui keinung kachiva̱li kala Jerusalemli vaomalānda chishatra chiya, “Ainli kapi kahai thada kaphungli vālaga, rāmnao sākhavai ramthingwui olivephāng, ramwui olivephāng, myrtlephāng, khaneinā kala khangatatei thingphāng khuiunglu.”
Chieina mibingna areokhuilaga khalattawui rāmnao sākhui, kayānglila, Varewui shim kayānglila, Tara̱ Ngaveiwui yāngreili, Ephraim Ngaveiwui yāngreilila sākhui.

Kala raithā kahaiwui eina latkhaungbing athum saikorana rāmnao sākhuida chili pamsera; kaja Nunwui nao Jeshuawui thot eina thuilaga chithang rāshungda Israelnaobingna hithāda masālaksāmana. Kala atam chili athum mathānlakhaowa.

Kala kharethang eina thuilaga khanaowathang eina tangda, ana thang-thang Varewui ain lairikwui eina pāchitheichinga. Athumna phanit shinithang mayona; kala kachishatathang, shiyan athishurda ningzaori kahai kazip kazipa.
Kachāng chiwui maga̱da khamatethang, Israelwui mibingna kakhum eina pamda, bora ngavailaga kuili ngaleila neoda kazipa.
Kala Israelnaobingna khangatei kha̱mibingwui eina ngateishokkhuilaga athumwui moreiwui vang, kala avāva̱ ngarāwui khayonkhamāng sākahai chiwui vang ningngateida hāngphata.
Kachichāwui pamli nganingda athumwui Vare
Levinaobingwui nganing khavaili Jeshua, Bani, Kadmi-el, Shebaniah, Bunni, Sherebiah, Bani, kala Chenanina nganinga; kala athumwui
Chiwui thili Levinaobing, Jeshua, Kadmiel, Bani, Hashabneiah, Sherebiah, Hodiah, Shebaniah, kala Pethahiah, athumna hānga, “Katang makhavaiwui eina katang makhavai
Kala Ezrana hānga, “
Na

kala nawui miktāli awui ningkatong chi thei, kala Canaanwui, Hitwui, Amorwui, Perizwui, Jebuswui kala Girgashwui ngalei, awui ara̱-azāli mira da nana tuingashit sai; kala nawui ngashit kahai nana ungshung ngasaka, kaja na khamashung khangarongana.”

kala Pharaohli, awui raobingli, aramwui mi saikorali matakhak kahai otsak kala khamachut kachungkha sāchithei; kaja athumna ishāvā ngarāli sāshilak eina sai kaji nana thei; kala aja rāshungda nawui vang sākakhui naming khalei hina.
Kala athumwui mangāli nana shamadru ngakaimihaida shamadrulungli ngalei kathengtungli athumna zatvai; kala shamadruva̱ tara̱lungli lungguinao horkasang thāda kakharomabingli kathukali horsanga.
Muiyāwui pākra̱ eina nana athumli ngashun thānzata, kala ngayā hormi khavai meiwui pākra̱ eina athumna vāki kaji apamli thānzata.
Nana Sinai Kaphungli tāda kazingramwui eina chan ngazeka, kala mashun shiyan eina khamashunga ain, kala kaphā chikān eina ningkhami mi;
kala nawui kathara sabbath athumli theikhui ngasaka kala ainla, shiyanla nawui rao Mosesli hāngmi ngasaka.”

kahāngla manganāmana, kala nana athumli matakhak kahai ot sākachithei saikora chi athumna maphaningungmana; kha athumna ngakaishida Egyptli rao asalui khavai athum khalattawui kathāna phāsanga. Kha nava huimikhangaiya, lumashanmikhangai, malung mathuikazāra kala leikashi makhangacheina kapema Varena.
Athumna seiwui meoma̱ heikhuilaga, ‘Egyptwui eina thānshokkhame nathumwui Vare chi hina’ da hakkhamahā kachipat ot kachungkha sai,

nawui hakkhamahā lukhamashan chiwui alungli nana athumli lamhāngli leilakha mahorhailakmana; shongfa thānkazata muiyāwui pākra̱ chi ngashun athumwui eina mapākthuihaimana, athumwui vāki kaji shongli hormi khavai meiwui pākra̱la mapākthuimana.
Athumli tamchithei khavai nawui kaphā Manglā chi mi, kala nawui mannala athumwui khamorwui eina makhuithuihaimana; kala athumwui ra̱kachangwui vang tara̱la mi.
Kum hangmati nana athumli nganaomi, kala athumna khikhanida mavatmana; athumwui kashankachonla makākmana, pheila khawor mavaimana.”
Athumwui ara̱-azā kazingramwui sirāyākha nana mayāsangmi, kala avāva̱ ngarāli zangda zangkhuilu kaji ngalei chili thānvāmi.
Chieina ara̱-azāna apam chili vāda akhui kala athumwui mangāli leikasā Canaannaobingli nana yuingasaka, kala athum sākhangai chi sākhavai athumwui pāngli awungabingla, mibingla horsangmi.

Kala athumna raipan ngaveiphin kahai keinungbing kala ngalei katuma lam yuikhui, kala athumna shimli leikasā khamathā ot kachungkha, khonkhui kahai ra̱khong, drakhā yāmgui, olive yāmgui, kala atheirong ayur kachungkha samphanga; chieina kathokachir samphangda thaoaowa, kala nawui khamathā otsak chili athum ningyāngkhaung samphanga.”

Chiwui vang athumli nana khanang khangasaka athumwui yangkashebingwui pāngli horsangmi; athumwui kakhanang atamli athumna nali ngakaoda nana athumli kazingram eina shāmi; kala nawui hakkhamahā lukhamashan athishurda athumwui yangkashebingwui eina huimi khavai huikhami chihorami.

Kha chiwui thili athumna ngasāmkhui kahai thili nawui mangāli makaphā saluishithaowa, kala nana yangkashebingwui pāngli horsangmilui; chiwui vang yangkashebingna athumli munga; kha athumna hanungda nali khangakao tharan kazingram eina nana shāmi; kala nawui lukhamashan athishurda kachungkha shida nana athumli ngatangmi.

Kala nawui ainli hanung khavai nana athumli hāngmathinmi. Chithālala athumna sākhangai sāda ngakaishitingting nawui ningkhami mamayonmana; kha mi akhana mayonda ringkhavai nawui sharphahorbing chili morei sai, kala ngakaishilak eina manganāsangmana.
Kum kasāngkha nana athumli yangmi, kala nawui Manglānala marānbingli hāngmathin ngasaka, kha athumna manganāsangmana. Chiwui vang ngalei chiwui mibingwui pāngli nana horsangmi.
Chithālala nawui reikhamatai lukhamashan alung chili nana athumli mashimān ngasakmana horkahaila mahorhailakmana; kaja nava lukhamashan leikashi Varena.

Chiwui vang ara, “Ithumwui Vare, sāshap pangshapa, kala khangachee-khangachā Vare, tuingashit eina leikashi makhangachei mayonkhame, Assyria awungawui thot eina thuida aja rāshungda ithumli, awungabing, wungnaobing, pāngmonbing, ishāvā ngarā, kala nawui mi saikorawuitungli kachotkachāng katā saikora hi teolak eina makhuimiaranu.
Kha ithumwuitungli kharā saikora hi mashun eina sāmi, kaja nana ningtonglak eina kasāna kha ithumpāna maphālakla kasāna;
ithumwui awungabing, wungnaobing, pāngmonbing, kala ishāvā ngarāna nawui ain mamayonthuwa, nawui ningkhami hāngkhamathinla makhuisangthuwa.
Nana khami ngalei katum, athumwui wungramli pamda leilakha eina tangda athumna nali otram mangatha̱mimana kala makaphā otsakwui eina mai mangareiungthuwa.”
Yanglu, aja ithum raonao sāda lei; athei-arai, kala khamathā, ringphā khavai ishāvā ngarāli nana mikahai lam chili, yanglu, ithumna mirao sāda lei.

Ithumna morei kasāwui vang, lam chiwui athei-arai kachungkha samkaphang chi, nana ithumwuitungli mungkhangasaka awungabingwuili thuingasakhaowa; ithumwui phasā kala sha̱keiwuitunglila athumwui sakhangaingai sākhavai pangshap lei, ithum chotnākachanghaira.
Saikora hiwui vang eina ithumna tuingashit saklak eina sāda lairikli kapihai, kala ithumwui wungnaobing, Levinaobing, kala pāngmonbingna chiwuitungli mahor nama.
Mahor khanambing chiya, Hacaliahwui nao, rummunga Nehemiah, Zedekiah,
Seraiah, Azariah, Jeremiah,
Pashhur, Amariah, Malchijah,
Hattush, Shebaniah, Malluch,
Harim, Meremoth, Obadiah,
Daniel, Ginnethon, Baruch,
Meshullam, Abijah, Mijamin,
Ma-aziah, Bilgai, Shemaiah, athum hi pāngmonbingna.
Kala Levibing: Azaniahwui nao Jeshua, Hanadadwui naobing Binnui, Kadmi-el,
kala achinā ngarā, Shebaniah, Hodiah, Kelita, Pelaiah, Hanan,
Mica, Rehob, Hashabiah,
Zaccur, Sherebiah, Shebaniah,
Hodiah, Bani, Beninu,
Mibingwui akhokabing: Parosh, Pahath-moab, Elam, Zattu, Bani,
Bunni, Azgad, Bebai,
Adonijah, Bigvai, Adin,
Ater, Hezekiah, Azzur,
Hodiah, Hashum, Bezai,
Hariph, Anathoth, Nebai,
Magpiash, Meshullam, Hezir,
Meshezabel, Zadok, Juddu-a,
Pelatiah, Hanan, Anaiah,
Hoshea, Hananiah, Hasshub,
Hallohesh, Pilha, Shobek,
Rehum, Hashabnah, Ma-aseiah,
Ahiah, Hanan, Anan,
Malluch, Harim, Baanah.

Khangatei mibing, pāngmonbing, Levinaobing, ngavei khamayonabing, laa kasābing, khorum khavai shimwui raobing kala Varewui ainwui vang lam chiwui mibingwui eina athum khalatta ngateithui kahai mi saikora, apreiva̱̱ ngarā, naomayara ngarā, naongalāva̱ ngarā, theikhuikathei athum saikora,
athumwui achinā ngarāli kala athumwui khangamabingli ngasoda, Varewui rao Mosesna mikahai Varewui ain athishurda zatkhavai khonkashi eina khangashit kakhui chili zanga; kala
Ithumwui naongalāva̱ ngarā ngalei chiwui mili mafavā ngasakmara, inaomayara ngarālila athumwui ngalā makhuingasakmara;

kala ngalei hiwui yur khangateina thongthāng nilala, māngum nilala, sabbaththang rāyorlala, ithumna sabbaththang lah kathara zimiksholi malomara; kala kashinekumwui luivāt chihohaora, leiman kachiva̱wui atārla makhuizāmara.

maiyan khamuiwui vang, kachat maleila muisakchigat sākhavai, machatlakla rikkatā kachigat, sabbathwui, changwokwui, retmi kahai phanit, kathara otwui, kala Israelwui morei maseimi khavai suihamchigat sākhavai, kala ithum Varewui shimli sāvai khavai ot saikorawui vangna.
Chi tākam eina ainli kapi kahai thāda ithumwui Vare
Ithumna kumkumwui heithei hātkhuikhare, atheirongli khamathei atheiyur minkhare saikora,

dharreowui mathir, ithumwui vāk, ithumwui atheirongli khamathei atheiyur, drakhāra̱ kala thao, pāngmonbingwuili kala ithum Varewui shimli khalei kābing chili khuirā ngaroksa da mayā ngaroka; kala ithum ngaleiwui eina samkaphang tithe Levinaobingli khuivāmira, kaja ithumwui kha̱ saikorawui eina Levinaobingna tithe kazipkhuimi.
Levinaobingna tithe samkaphang tharan, Aaronwui nao pāngmonna tithebingwui tithe chi Varewui shimli, kazip khavai shimli khuikāra.

Kaja Israelwui mibing, kala Levinaobingna khami māngum, drakhāra̱, kala thao saikora chi kathara shim, pāngmonbingna otram ngatha̱ khavaipam kala khāmong khamayonbingna khamayonpam, laa kasābingna pamkhavai kā chili khuirāra. Varewui shimli ithum mamalaipaimana.

Chitharan mibingwui kathānabing china Jerusalemli somsai; kala yaruina tharārāwuili ava̱va̱ khuilaga kathara keinung Jerusalemli pamkhavai kalā yanga, khangatei tharāwui khum chiko chiya keinung khangateili pama.
Kala Jerusalemli pamngairereo pamki kajibingli yaruina somi.

Jerusalemli Judahwui kachikathā naomayarabing kaikha, kala Benjaminwui kachikathā naomayarabing kaikha pama. Judahwui naomayarabing eina: Perezwui eina pharā khamaron Mahalalelwui nao, Shephatiahwui nao, Amariahwui nao, Zechariahwui nao, Uzzielwui naomayara Athaiah;
Shilonpawui eina pharā khamaron Zechariahwui nao, Joiarebwui nao, Adaiahwui nao, Hazaiahwuinao, Kol-hozehwui nao, Baruchwui naomayara Ma-aseiah.
Jerusalemli kapam Perezwui naomayara raili khamarāka shāmati hangtharukta chishatna.
Hibing hi Benjaminwui naomayarabingna: Jeshaiahwui eina pharā khamaron Ithi-elwui nao, Ma-aseiahwui nao, Kolaiahwui nao, Pedaiahwui nao, Joedwui nao, Meshullamwui naomayara Salluna.
Awui thili Gabbai, Sallai, ashi shāchishat maga̱da chishatna.
Zichriwui nao Joelna yangkhame sai; kala keinung chiwui yangkhame kakhaneva̱ Hassenuahwui nao Judahna.
Pāngmonbingwui eina: Jachinwui eina Joiaribwui nao Jedaiah,
Ahitubwui eina pharā khamaron Meraioth, Jadokwui nao, Meshullamwui nao, Hilkiahwui naomayara Seraiahna Varewui shimli khayangabingwui khamungana;

kala shim chiwui otram khangatha̱ athumwui achinā ngarā shāchishat maga̱da khanina. Kala Malchijahwui eina pharā khamaron Pashhurwui nao, Zechariahwui nao, Amziwui nao, Pelaliahwui nao, Jerohamwui naomayara Adaiahna,
kala achinā ngarā shimkhurwui akui shākhani hangmatida khanina; kala Immerwui eina pharā khamaron Meshillemothwui nao, Ahazaiwui nao, Azarelwui naomayara Amashsai,
kala athumwui achinā ngarā rai kapingbing shākha maga̱da chishatna; athumwuitungli yangkhame chi Haggedolimwui nao Zabdielna.
Levipashi: Bunniwui eina pharā khamaron Hashabiahwui nao, Azrikam, Hasshubwui naomayara Shemaiahna;
kala Varewui shim ayarshong ot kasāwuitungli khalei Shabbethai eina Jozabad Leviwui khareiya khanina;

Asaphwui eina pharā khamaron Zabdiwui nao, Micahwui naomayara Mattaniahna ningkashi khami seihāwui haophokkhami kathāna sai; kala Bakbukiahna achinā ngarāwui alungli kakhanena; kala Jeduthunna pharā khamaron nao Galal, Shammuawui nao Abdana.
Kathara keinungli khalei Levibing saikora shākhani hangchishatta matina.
Ngavei khamayonbing: Akkub, Talmon kala ngavei khamayona athumwui achināngarā shākha hangshinida khanina.
Khangatei Israelnaobing, pāngmonbing, Levinaobingna kachichā shimlui khalei Judah keinungbingli pama.
Kha khorum khavai shimwui otram khangatha̱bingna Ophelli pama, kala Ziha eina Gishpana athumwuitungli yangkhame sai.
Jerusalemli khalei Levibingli yangkhame chi Asaphwui eina pharā khamaron Micawui nao, Mattaniahwui nao, Hashabiahwui nao, kala Baniwui naomayara Uzzina; Varewui shimli laa kasābing chi athumna.
Kaja athumwui pongli awungawui eina kakaso lei, thangthangwui mikhangayi chi laa kasābingwui vang mi.
Judahwui naomayara Zerahwui eina naobingwui eina kharā Meshezabelwui nao Pethahiahna mibingwui mathun sāda awungawuili pama.
Kha kha̱li athumwui lui vāzāda pamda khalei, Judahwui mibing kaikhana Kiriath-arba eina chiwui kha̱bingli pama, Dihon eina chiwui kha̱nganaili, Jekabzeel eina chiwui kha̱nganaili,
Jeshua, Moladah, Beth-peletli,
Hazar-shual, Beer-shebali, kala chiwui kha̱ nganaibing,
Ziklagli, Meconahli kala chiwui kha̱nganaili,
En-rimmon, Zorahli, Jarmuthli,
Zanoah, Adullam kala chiwui kha̱nganai, Lachish kala chiwui luipambingli, Azekah kala chiwui kha̱nganaili pama. Chiwui vang Beer-sheba eina thuilaga Hinnomwui tampāk peida rāmrah sāpama.
Benjaminwui mibingna Geba eina thuilaga Michmash, Aija, Bethel kala chiwui khanganai,
Anathoth, Nob, Ananiah,
Hazor, Ramah, Gittaim,
Hadid, Zeboim, Neballat,
Lod kala Onoli them kathemwui tampākli soma.
Kala Judahli khalei Levibing kaikha Benjaminshili azanghaowa.
Hi She-alti-elwui nao Zerubbabel eina Jeshuali ngasokhaunga pāngmonbing kala Levinaobingna: Seraiah, Jeremiah, Ezra,
Amariah, Malluch, Hattush,
Shecaniah, Rehum, Meremoth,
Iddo, Ginnethoi, Abijah,
Mijamin, Ma-adiah, Bilgah,
Shemaiah, Joiarib, Jedaiah,
Sallu, Amok, Hilkiah, Jedaiah. Hibing hi Jeshuawui atamli leikasā pāngmonbing kala athumwui achinā ngarāwui akhokabingna.
Kala Levibing: Jeshua, Binnui, Kadmi-el, Sherebiah, Judah, kala Mattaniah, achinā ngarāli ngasoda ningkashi khamiwui laa kasāli thānmi.
Kala Bakbukiah eina Unno athumwui achinā ngarāna kāroda nganinga.
Jeshuana Joiakimwui avāva̱na, Joiakimna Eliashibwui avāva̱na, Eliashibna Joiadawui avāva̱na.
Joiadana Jonathanwui avāva̱na, kala Jonathanna Jaddu-awui avāva̱na.
Kala Joiakimwui atamli pāngmonbingwui avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bingna: Seraiahshiwui Meraiah; Jeremiahshiwui Hananiah,
Ezrashiwui Meshullam; Amariahshiwui Jehohanan;
Malluchishiwui Jonathan; Shebaniahshiwui Joseph;
Harimshiwui Adna; Meraiothshiwui Helkai;
Iddoshiwui Zechariah; Ginnethonshiwui Meshullam,
Abijahshiwui Zichri; Miniaminshiwui, Moadiahwui Piltai;
Bilgahshiwui Shammua; Shemaiahshiwui Jehonathan;
Joiaribshiwui Mattenai; Jedaiahshiwui, Uzzi;
Sallaishiwui Kallai; Amokshiwui, Eber;
Hilkiahshiwui Hashabiah; Jedaiahshiwui Nethanel.

Levipashiwuina, Eliashib, Joiada, Johanan, kala Jaddu-awui atamli avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui kharara amingbing hi kapihaida lei; kala Persiawui Dariusna munglakha eina tangda pāngmonbingwui chila kapihaidalei.
Leviwui naomayarabing, avāva̱ ngarā shimkhurwui wungva̱bing Eliashibwui nao Johananwui eina tangda Thotrinchānwui Lairikli kapihaisai.

Levinaobingwui akhokabing: Hashabiah, Sherebiah, kala Kadmielwui nao Jeshua athumwui chinao ngarāli ngasoda Varewui mi Davidna kaso kahai athishurda mai yangngasungda nganinglaga ningkashi eina seihā kasā atamli tanglenda hāngngaroka.
Mattaniah, Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon, kala Akkub athumna ngavei khamayona sāda ngaveiwui zātshimli raikān sāmi.
Hibing hi Jozadakwui nao Jeshuana kapharā Joiakimwui thotli, kala Nehemiah rammungawui atamli, kala Ezr pāngmon kapimewui thotli kashokna.

Jerusalemwui phākho dharkatli kortar, tingteilā, kala lyre singda khamathān, sokachikat kala laa kasā eina ngasoda dharkat mayon khavai athumna Levinaobingli apam saikorawui eina hokhuida Jerusalemli khuirā ngasaka.
Kala laa kasābingwui naomayarabing Jerusalem kuikhamarei pamwui eina, kala Netophathwui kha̱ kha̱ eina rākazipa;
kala Beth-gilgalwui eina kala Gebawui eina Azmavethwui eina rai, kaja laa kasābingna Jerusalemwui kuikhamareili athum khalattawui vang kha̱ tāsai.
Pāngmonbing kala Levinaobingna athum khalatta tharkhuiya; kala athumna mibing kala ngavei kala phākho tharngasaka.
Chiwui thili ina Judahwui wungnaobingli phākhotungli thānkai, kala kānglup khani sāda ningkashi mida kuizata. Kala akhashina yāshong Thothap Ngavei vāk;
kala athumwui thili Hoshaiah eina Judahwui wungnaobing ngakaipak,
kala Azariah, Ezra, Meshullam,
Judah, Benjamin, Shemaiah, kala Jeremiah,
kala pāngmonwui naobing kaikha talla̱ khongda ngasozata: Asaphwui nao Zaccurna pharā khamaron Micaiah, Mathaniah, Shemaiah, Jonathanwui nao Zechariah;
kala achinā ngarā, Shemaiah, Azarel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Judah, kala Hanani athumna Varewui mi Davidwui laawui akap-akai zangda, kala kathema Ezrana athumwui mangāshong zata.
Ura̱ Ngaveili David keinungwui chonchak eina athumna angatar eina ngaveili ngareikai kala zingshoshong Davidwui shim atungli Tara̱ Ngavei eina tangda vai.
Ningkashi laa kasā khum khangatei akha china uishong vai, kala mi ngayarpak ina ngasoda, phaklāngwuitungli, Sharkha̱wui Raikānphung tungli vāda Khamashā phakoli vai;

kala chiwui eina Ephraimwui Ngaveitungli kala Kachama Ngavei eina Khai Ngavei kala Hananelwui Raikānphung, Shākhawui Raikānphungwui eina Yao Ngavei chili shurvai; kala athumna Raikānwui Ngaveili ungnganinga.
Chithāda ningkashi khamiwui kānglup khanini chi Varewui shimli nganinga, kala otshinme ngakaipakna ili ngasoi.
Kala pāngmon Eliakim, Ma-aseiah, Miniamin, Micaiah, Eli-o-enai, Zechariah, kala Hananiah athumna talla̱ eina ngasozata;
kala Ma-aseiah, Shemaiah, Eleazar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malchijah, Elam kala Ezer athumla zanga. Kala Jezrahiahna kathāna sāda laa kasābing china laa sai.

Kala chithang athumna hakmahālak eina pha̱kaphayā sāda mathāna, kaja Varena athumli mathān ngasaka; sha̱naobingla, naoshinaobingla mathānshunhaowa. Kala Jerusalemwui khamathān chi apam katāva̱ eina tangda shāvai.

Chithang zātshim yangmi khavai, vākshot, matheikhare athei, tithe saikora kazipmi khavai, ainwui athishurda pāngmonbing eina Levibingwui sharuk ngayarmi khavai keinungli khalei lam athishurda mi phāsanga; kaja otram khangatha̱ pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingli Judahna ningyāng unglakhaowa.
Kala David eina anaomayara Solomonna kaso kahai athishurda laa kasābing eina ngavei khamayonabingna tharkakhui thāda athumna tharkhuida athum Varewui otram khangatha̱ sapapama.
Kaja Davidwui thotli kala achālakha Asaphwui thotli laa kasābingwui kathān akhoka leisai, kala masotlaa kala Vareli ningkashi eina ngasoda masochikata.

Chiwui vang Zerubbabel eina Nehemiahwui thotli Israel saikorana laa kasābing eina ngavei khamayonabingwui vang thangthangwui yar misai; kala Levinaobingwui yar athumna ngateida mi; kala Levinaobingna Aaronwui naomayarabing wui vang ngayarshokmi.
kaja athumna Israelnaobingli samkaphang tharan kashakazāla tara̱la mamimana; kha athumli khonshi khavai Balaamli phāsanga, chithālala ithumwui Varena khonkashi chi sokhami ngachei ngasaka.
Mibingna ain chi kashā tharan, athumna yur kateiwui ara̱-azā saikora Israelwui eina ngatei ngasakhaowa.
Hi mashokranglakha, ithum Khorumshimwui zātshimli kapangsang kahai pāngmon Eliashibna Tobiahli khamashit wui vang,

zātshim kahakva akha Tobiah wui vang sāmathāda ngarānhaisai; khare kachāng rākachigata zāt, nganamkaphā thao, thongthāng, māngumwui tithe, drakhāthei, thao, hikathāthā, kaso kahai athishurda Levi shili, laa kasābingli, khāmong khamayonabingli khami, kala pāngmonbingli rākachigat ot saikora shim chili haihaisai.
Hithāmahunglakha I Jerusalemli mapamsāmana, kaja Babylonwui awunga Ar-ta-xerxeswui thumrāda kakhane kum I awungawuili vahairasai. Atam khaleilaga awungali khamayā pokhuilaga,
Jerusalemli hanunga, kala Varewui shim kayanglungli Eliashibna Tobiahwui vang kā akha ngarānkhami makaphā chi ina ungtheihaowa.
Kala I malungvātnahaida Tobiahwui thongthāng saikora ayarli horshokmiserhaowa.
Kala ina kakaso athishurda athumna shim chi samathākhui; kala chili Varewui khorkhongli ngasoda muisakchigat eina nganamkaphā thao chi khuiungluishita.
Kala Levinaobingwui yarla athumli mamimana kajila ina theihaowa, chiwui vang eina, chili ot sākasā Levinaobing eina laa kasābing athum ichichāwui luili yāmvāserhairasai.
Chieina ina otva̱bingli kaharda, “Khiwui vang Varewui shim chi horkahai khala?” da hānga. Kala ina athumli kazipkhuiserlaga kachichāwui pamli chipamsera.
Chiwui thili zātshimli Judah saikorana māngumwui tithe, drakhāra̱ kala thaola khuirai.

Chiwui thili Shelemiah pāngmon, kapime Zadok kala Leviwui eina Pedaiah athumli zātshim chiwui lansingmebing sākhavai kapangsanga, kala athumwui ngachonme sākhavai Mattaniahwui nao Zaccurna kapharā Hananli phāsanga; kaja athum shitsangkapaibingna, kala athumwui achinā ngarāli ngayarmi maronki kaji athumwui otna.
O iwui Vare, hiwui pongli ili kaphaningungmilu, kala iwui Varewui shimwui vang kala ali otram khangatha̱wui vang ina khamathā ot sākahai chi mayangkheimihaialu.
Tyrewui mibing, keinung chili kapambingnala sabbaththang khaila, otyur khangatateila khuirāda Judahwui mibing kala Jerusalemli khaleibingli yorsanga,
Chiwui vang, ina Judahwui wungnaobingli kaharda hānga, “Makaphā ot sāda nathumna sabbath makhao khangasak hi khiwui vangkhala?

Navā ngarānala hithāda masāmala, kala ithumwuitungli, kala keinung hili ithumwui Varena makaphā saikora hi khuikharā maningmala? Laga sabbath sākhamakhao eina Israelwuitungli lungvat chungmeida rāngasakluili.”

Sabbath marāranglakha Jerusalemwui ngaveili tangmangkaphok tharan khāmongbing shungserphalungra, kala sabbathwui thimāngli shophalungra da ina kasoi. Kala sabbaththang kharitphun makhuirāpaimara da ina ngaveili iwui mi kaikha haihaowa.
Chiwui thili leihkhalonbing, kala ot khayorbing Jerusalemwui ayarli akha khanishida rāpisanga.
Kha athumli hāngmathinda ina hānga, “Khisāda nathumna ngavei mangāli pikhala? Hithaluishitakha nathumwuitungli ipang parra.” Chiwui eina thuilaga sabbaththang athum marāluilakthuwa.

Kala Levinaobingli, athum khalatta tharkhuilaga ngavei mayon khavai, kala sabbaththang kathar eina mayon khavai ina kasoi. Hila ili kaphaningungmilu, O iwui Varivara, kala nawui makhangachei leikashi china ili kahuimilu.
kala anaomayara ngayarpakna Ashdod tui matui, Judah tui mamatuitheila yur khagateiwui tui matuiya.

Chiwui vang ina khararda khonkashila khonshi, kashaola shaoda samla maokaphotmi; kala Varewui ming singngasakta, “Nathumna nathumwui naongalāva̱ ngarā athumwui naomayara ngarāli mangakum ngasakpaimara; athumwui naongalāva̱ ngarā nathum naomayara ngarāwui vang nilala, nathum khalatta wui vang nilala makhuipaimara.”

“Israelwui awunga Solomonla hikathā sha̱naowui vang morei kasā maningmala? Yur saikorawui alungli awunga Solomon kathā maleimana, kala ali Varena leishi, kala Israel saikorawuitungli Varena ali awunga sāngasaka; chithālala, yur kateiwui sha̱naona alila morei sāngasaka.
Chieina ithumla nathumli nganāda yur kateiwui preinao kakhui eina makaphā chungmeida sāda ithumwui Vareli ithum mashitsangkapaiya ngasarala?”
Athumli katheimilu, O iwui Vare, khikhalajila athumna pāngmonpam kala pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingwui tuingashitla sākhamangmihaira.
Chithāda sāda yur kateiwui otsak kachiva̱wui eina ina tharkhuida pāngmonbing eina Levinaobingli kachichāwui otpam chi sakāmiluishita;
kala retkahai atamli matheikhare athei pha̱khavaiwui vang thing ina ngarānmi. O iwui Vare, ili phaningungmi chinglu.
awunga sāda Susa keinungwui wungpamkhongli pamlakha,
ana mungda kakathuma kum wungnaobing, raobing, Persia kala Mediawui raimi kathānabing
wungnaowui tekhamatei kashāng-kharei, kala awui ngam sākachithei zimiksho shākha hangchishatthangwui vang chithei.
Zimikshobing chi kākapei tharan, ngalei chiwui keinung Susali awungawui konung yāmgui kayāngli, zimiksho shinithangwui vang zātkhān sāda, kharā mi kachivali kharei kateo mateila lemmet misera.

Yāmgui alungli vat eina kasā kachara chonrān, kala khamanaka tāwon kazaira̱ eina kasā khamaying eina hungreoseowui hokthāng khavai lupāsāwui huishon sāsangda marblewui pakra̱bingli hokhai; kala sinā eina lupāsāwui pamkhongla porphyry, marble, mathāmeikap kaje pearl kala aman kasaka ngalung manātlaga hamkahaiwuitungli haihai.
Mangkhavai sināwui khorāmli kala ngatatei kaji khorām ayur eina mangngasaka, kala awungawui khalei athishurda wungnaona khamang drakhāra̱la mavātla mimanga.
Kala ainwui athishurda mangngasakta khipālikha tandi eina mashimānmana; kaja mi kachiva ningkachāng athishurda sāngasaklu da awungana awui konungwui otva̱bingli kakaso mihairasai.
Awungva̱ Vastinala, awunga Ahasu-eruswui konungli, sha̱naobingli zātkhān akha miya.
Kashinethang, zam mangmangda awungawui ning mahaiuda, Awunga Ahasu-eruswui shimli otram ngathakhame ahonga, Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha eina Abagtha, Zethar eina Carkas, athum shinili,
yurbing kala wungnaobingli Awungva̱ Vastiwui azak chithei khavai awungva̱wui kuihon ngahonlaga awungawui mangāli khuirālu da kasoi; kaja ava ngatikri eina yangngailaka.
Kha awungva̱ Vastili rālu da ahongabingli awungana kasokhavā chi marāmara jihaowa. Chieina awunga malungvāthaowa, kala awui malungkhavāt chi ningli meikachui thāhaowa.
Chieina atam katheia thangkhameibingli awungana ngasana— kaja ain kasing kala mashun khaleibingli khangasan hi awungawui khangachāna,
Carshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena kala Memucan athum Persia kala Mediawui wungnao shini hina wungramwui kharebing sāthuda ali ngalempama—:
“Awunga Ahasu-eruswui kakaso athishurda ahongabingna vākahāng chili Awungva̱ Vastina masāthugada ainwui athishurda ali khi sārakhala?”
Chieina awungawui kala wungnaobingwui mangāli Memucanna hānga, “Awungva̱ Vastina awungamāngli maningla, kha wungnao saikoralila kala Awunga Ahasu-eruswui ngaleili khalei mi saikorali khangui sāhaira.
Kaja awungawui otsak hi preiva̱̱ saikorana theihaoda athum gahara ngarāli khayāmashiluimara, kala ‘Awunga Ahasu-erusna awui mangāli awungva̱ Vastili khuirā khavai kasolaga mavāmana’ da hāngra.
Aja Persia eina Mediawui philava̱bing awungva̱wui otsak hi shālaga awungawui wungnao saikorali hāngserda leira, kala chili khayāmakashi eina malungkhavāt kachungkha shokhaora.

Awungana phāra jiakha, Persia eina Mediawui ain akha sāda mangacheilakla leikhavai kakaso akha kapimihaoranu; chiya, Vasti Awunga Ahasu-eruswui mangāli marāluiaranu; kala awungana ali phākhamei sha̱nao khangatei akhali awungva̱ pam mihaoranu.
Chithāda awungawui kakaso chi wungram saikorali ngayaovā kahai tharan wungram chirikhawui preinaobingna athum gahara ngarā kharei kateolila khayāshiserra.”
Memucanna kahāng chi awungala, wungnao kateibingla mayāngaiserhaoda;

awungana wungram saikorawui rammung kachida kachichā ramtui kala kachicharam mayek eina kapilaga, mayarana ichichā shimkhurwui akhavā sāphalungra kala aramtui matuiphalungra da chithi chihovāserhaowa.
Otshotbing hiwui thili, Awunga Ahasu-eruswui malungkhavāt vankahai tharan, Vastina sākahai kala awuitungli hukum mikahai chi awungana phaningunga.
Chieina awungali otram khangatha̱ raobingna ali hānga, “Awungawui vang azak khamathā kachingva̱ ngalānaobing vāphākhuiranu.

Kala awungana wungramwui leikhai kachivali otva̱bing phāsanglaga, azak khamathā kachingva̱ ngalānao saikora kazipkhuida sha̱nao haikhavai wungramwui hiwui keinung Susali khuirāranu, kala shanaobingli yangkhame awungawui ahonga Hegaiwui pāngli hairanu; kala azak mathā khavaila samiranu.
Kala awungali ningyāng ungkhangasaka ngalāva̱ china Vastiwui mahut awungva̱ sāranu.” Tui china awungali ningyāng ungngasakhaoda ana chithāda sai.
Atam chitharan Susa keinungli Jehudi akha, aming Mordecai hoda Benjaminshi Kishna kapharā Shime-iwui naomayara Jairna kapharā nao akha leisai,
Judahwui awunga Jeconiahli Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna Jerusalemwui eina tukkhava atamli alila tukvānar kahaina.

Ana Hadassah kaja Esther kahova̱, awova̱wui naongalāva̱li nganaokai, kaja a ava̱la avāla maleimana; sha̱naopāva̱ hi ngatikri mathāshuna; kala awui ava̱ avā thikahai tharan, Mordecaina awuinao tākam eina nganaokhui.

Chieina awungawui hukhum kala kakaso chi chishāt kahai tharan, kala Susa keinungli ngalānao kachungkha khuirāda Hegaiwui pāngli sangkhami tharan, Estherlila awungawui konungli khuivāda sha̱naoli yangkhame Hegaiwui pāngli horsangmihaowa.

Ngalāva̱ china ali ningyāng ungngasakhaowa; kala ana awui azak mathākhavai thao, kashakazā ngaranmida awunga keinungwui eina otram khangatha̱ ngalānao shinili ngalāngda khangarān sāmi kala athumli phameikap kaje sha̱naobing pamkhavai chili haihai.
Estherna awui miyur kala theisā khipalongkhala kaji machitheimana, kaja Mordecaina chi mahānglaklu da ali hanghairasai.
Kala Esther kathāda lei, kathāda sāli kaji theikhavai Mordecaina thangkachida sha̱nao haikhavaiwui mangāli ayangchinga.

Awunga Ahasu-erusli samphang khavai, sha̱naobingwui ra̱khamayang atam athishurda, kachāng tharuk myrrhwui thaoh, kala kachāng tharuk sha̱naobingwui vang neokhavai thaohyur eina nganamkaphā otyur neolaga, ngalānao ava̱va̱wui atam ungkashung tharan—
ngalānao china awungawuili kazang tharan ana ningkachāng athishurda sha̱nao haikhavaiwui eina awungawui konungli khuizang khavai misera.

Ngazin zanglaga ngathorshong kakhane sha̱nao haikhavai Sha-ashgaz awungawui ahonga, awungawui angashirva̱bingli khayangawui pamli latunga; awungana ngalāva̱ chili ningchāngda aming eina kaho maningla awungawuili mazangluipaimana.

Awungawuili zangkhavai Abihailwui naongalāva̱, Mordecaiwui awova̱wui naongalāva̱ Estherwui atam khaung tharan, sha̱nao haikhavaiwui khamayona, awungawui ahonga Hegaina hāngkachithei maningla ana khangatei khikha mapomana. Chitharan Estherli kathei mi saikorana ali ngahānngaisera.
Awunga Ahasu-erusna mungda kashine kumwui kachāng kathara Tharao kachāng Estherli awui awunga konungli khuikazang tharan,

awungana sha̱nao khangateili lāngda Estherli leishimeikaphaowa, kala kachingva̱ katei saikorali lāngda awungawui mikyanli lukhamashan kala ngahānkhangai leihaowa, chiwui vang awungva̱wui kuihon ngahonmida Vastiwui pamli awungva̱ sāngasakhaowa.
Chieina wungnao saikoralila kala rao saikorali awungana Estherwui vang zātkhān kahaka miya. Chili lāngda wungrambing chili shai kokmi kala awungawui mikhangai lemmet yaowa.
Kachingva̱bing chi kazip kakhane kakhui tharan, Mordecaina awungawui ngaveili pamsai.
Mordecaina kakaso athishurda, Estherna awui athei-asā kala yur nilala machitheilakmana; kaja nganuilakha Estherna Mordecaiwui kahāng khanganā thāda aruila chithada nganai.
Atam chitharan, Mordecaina awungawui ngaveili pamlakha, awungawui ahonga khāmongphei khamayona, Bigthan eina Tereshna malungvātta awunga Ahasu-erusli sāthat khavai khangarān sai.
Tui chi Mordecaina theihaoda ana Awungva̱ Estherli hānga, kala Estherna pao chi Mordecaina hānga da awungali hānghaowa.
Tui chi khangathing tharan mashungsāhaoda anili thingtungli phāshi sāhaowa. Kala hi awungawui miktāli Thotrinchānwui Lairikli kapisanga.
Saikora hi shokkahai thili Awunga Ahasu-erusna Agagwui Hammedathawui naomayara Hamanli awui pam khāngkāmida ali khangaso wungnao saikorawuitungli pamngasaka.
Kala awungawui rao ngaveili khaleibing saikorana ali kui mashunzangda khayāshisera; kaja awungana chithada sālu da kaso kahaina. Kha Mordecaina chithada masamana.
Chieina awungawui ngaveili khalei awungawui raobingna Mordecaili, “Kachiwui vang nana awungawui kakaso kaihaokhala?” da ngahāna.
Kala athumna ali thangkachida hānglala ana manganāsangthuda, ana kayākha sashapnikhala yangkhuirada Hamanli hānghaowa; kaja Mordecaina a Jehudina da athumli hanghairasai.
Kala Mordecaina kuila mamashunzangma kala khayāla mashi, kaji theilaga Haman malungkhavātna pemhaowa.
Kha ana Mordecaimāngli pāng maparngaimana. Mordecai hi khiyurkhala da athumna Hamanli hanghairasahaoda, Ahasu-eruswui wungram tongdali khalei Mordecaiwui yur Jehudi saikorali shimān khavai sai.

Awunga Ahasu-eruswui tharāda kakhane kum, Mayo kachāngwui kachāng khare eina thuilaga athumna Pur, chiya kalā khayang, Hamanwui mangāli thangkachida; kala kachāng kachida kachāng tharāda kakhane, Marun kachāng eina tangda athumna yangchinga.

Chiwui thili Hamanna Awunga Ahasu-erusli hānga, “Nawui wungram saikorali kachikathā miyur akha yaoyāng eina yurbingwui alungli pamdalei; athumwui ain yur khangatateiwui eina ngateihanghai, athumna awungawui ain mamayonmana; chieina athumli khāngkapam hi awungawui vang khikha kānkhana maleilakmana.
Awungana phāra jiakha, athum saikora shimān ngasak khavai hukhum akha milu; kala ina awungawui ot kasābingwui pāngli lupāsā talent thingthara sangmida awungawui lanshimli haimira.”
Chieina awungana mahor namkhavai khutop apāngwui eina khuishoklaga Agagwui Hammedathawui nao, Jehudili yangkashe Hamanli mi.
Kala awungana Hamanli hānga, “Pheisāla, mila nana phāra kaji chi sākhavai nawui pāngli horsang kahaina.”

Kachāng kharewui zimiksho tharāda kakathumathang awungawui kapimebingli hokhuilaga Hamanna kahāng athishurda hukhum akha kapingasaka; kala awungawui satrapbing kala ngalei saikorali khalei rammungabing, yurbingwui wungnaobing, ngalei kachiva̱wui mayek, kala ramramwui tui eina kapi ngasaklaga ngayao ngasaka; kala lairik chi Awunga Ahasu-eruswui ming eina kapilaga awungawui khutop eina mahor namsangsera.

Chithi chi phungmebingna awungawui leikhaibingli phungvai; kala kachāng kakhanewui zimiksho tharāda kakathumathang, thangkhawui alungli, Jehudi saikora, khararnaosan, sha̱nao kala naoshinao mateila shimit khavai, sāthat khavai, saikora yaitupthat khavai kala ngapon khavai chihovai.
Chithang sāki kaji chi ngalei kachiva̱li hangchitheida khangarān sākhavai lairik chi ngalei kachiva̱li chihovai.
Awungawui kakaso athishurda phungmebingna
Mordecaina shokkahai saikora chi theilaga, awui kachon serkhākta bora ngavailaga hotla neoda malung ringda panglāk eina chaplaga keinungli vai;
ana awungawui ngavei zangkhavaili vāshunga; kaja awungawui ngaveilungli bora kachon ngavailaga khipākha mazangpaimana.
Kala awungawui hukhum samkaphang ngalei kachiva̱li Jehudibingna malung ringlak eina chapngachāda khumpama kala sifada chapngakāna, kala athum kachungana hotla neoda bora ngavai.
Estherwui rao sha̱naobingna kala ahongabingna ali rākahāng tharan, awungva̱ chi malung ringlakhaowa, chieina ana Mordecaili awui bora kachon shinkhavai kashankachon chihovai; kha ana makhuithuwa.
Chieina ali otram ngatha̱mi khavai kahaiya, awungawui ahonga Hathakhli hokhuilaga, hi khi kasakhala, khiwui vang hitha kahaikhala da Mordecaili angahānkhui khavai kasoi.
Awungawui ngavei mangāli khalei kayang khamashā chili Mordecaili samphang khavai Hathakhna vai,
kala Mordecaina awuitungli shokkahai saikora ali hāngsera, kala Jehudibingli shimān khavai Hamanna awungali pheisā mirada ngashit kahai chila tāzak eina hānga.
Kala Estherli ungchitheida mathālak eina unghāngpai khavai, kala awungali vahānglaga awui mibingli mashimān ngasak khavai saklāk eina vāpolu da Susali ngayaokazat hukhum lairik chi akha mi.
Kala Hathakhna Mordecaiwui tui saikora Estherli unghāngsera.
Chieina Estherna Mordecaili pao mikhavai Hathakhli hithāda hānga,
“Kachikathā mayarnao nilala sha̱nao nilala awungana kaho maningla awungawui yāngkhuplungli zangakha ain akhamāng lei, saikorali sāthatserra, awungana sināwui khānthing
Chieina athumna Mordecaili Estherna hāngkahai saikora ahānga.
Chieina Mordecaina Estherli unghāng khavai athumli hānga, “Jehudibing thiserhailaga, awungawui konungli pamda namāng yāmshokpaira da maphaningalu.

Kaja hikathā atamli nana kasaikha pamhaiakha, Jehudinaobingli ngachonmi khavai kala huimi khavai apam khangateiwui eina leisalapai, kha na kala navāwui shimkhurla shimānserhaora. Hikatha atamwui vang nali awungva̱ sākhangasakla honthei, khipāna theira?”
Chieina Estherna Mordecaili ngahānkā khavai athumli hāngchithei,

“Zatlu, Susali khalei Jehudi saikora phākhuida iwui vang kakhum eina pamlu; ngashun ngayā kathumthang khikha mazā mamangalu. I eina iwui rao sha̱naobingla nathumwui thāda khumra. Chiwui thili, ain maninglala ina awungawuili vāra; kala chili I thikha thihaira.”
Mordecaina unglaga Estherna kakaso kachiva̱ sāsera.

Kakathumathang Estherna awungva̱wui sāri shaksālaga awungawui konungli zangda, awungawui kahaka kāli karoda khalei awungawui pamkhavai alungwui yangkhupli zangnganinga. Konungli zangkhavai shong ngareishokta awungana konungwui alungli wungpamkhongli pamsai;

kala awungva̱ Estherna ayarli khanganing chi awungana kathei tharan, ali awungawui mikyanli ngahānkhangai leihaoda awungana awui sinā khānthing tāngvai. Chieina Estherna vāda khanthingwui atonli asāza̱ya.
Kala awungana ali, “Khisathukhala, Awungva̱ Esther? Nawui pokhangai khikhala? Iwui wungram tangkhai eina tangda mira” da hānga.
Kala Estherna hānga, “Awungana ningyang ungakha, awunga eina Hamanna ina awungawui vang ngarān kahai ngazin phazat chili kharāmilu.”
Chieina awungana, “Estherna ningkachāng athishurda awuili aphazā khavai Hamanli thākta ahokhuilu” da hānga. Chithāda awunga eina Hamanna Estherna ngarān kahai ngazin phazātli vai.
Athumna drakhāra̱ mangmamānda leilakha, awungana Estherli, “Nana khi pokhangai leikhala? Ina mira, nawui ningkachāng khi leikhala? Iwui wungram tangkhai eina tangdala ungshung ngasakra” da hānga.
Kha Estherna hānga, “Iwui pokhangai kala ningkachāng chiya:

Awungana ili leishimida, kala awungali ningyāng ungngasakta iwui ningkachāng ungshungmira jikha, awunga eina Haman akhama aniwui vang ina ngarān kahai ngazin phazāt chili rāzangmilu; kala akhama awungana kahāng thāda chili ina ponaora.”

Chithang Hamanna ning mathānthup ringphālak eina thuihaowa. Kha awungawui ngaveili Mordecaili kathei tharan, ana awui mangāli ngakarkathuila mangakarthui, khangacheela maleilak kaji chi theilaga Mordecaiwuitungli malungkhavātna pemtinghaowa.
Chithālala, Haman akhalatta malungkhavāt khānglaga shimli unghaowa; kala mi chihoda ngasotnaobing eina apreiva̱̱ Zereshli ahokhui ngasaka.
Kala Hamanna awui kashang-kharei saikora athumli hāngchithei, anaomayara ngarāwui mashing, awungana ali pam kāngasakta awui wungnaobing kala raobingwuitungli kachipam saikora hāngchitheisera.
Kala Hamanna hithāda hānglui, “Awungva̱ Esther eina tangda, awungali ngasoda khipālikha ana khangarān zātkhānli maholakmana, imāngli hoi. Akhamala awungali ngasoda ili phakazā holuida lei.
Chithālala, awungawui ngaveili kapama Jehudiwui Mordecaili theilakha eina tangda saikora china khikha ringkaphā maleilakmana.”

Chieina apreiva̱̱ Zereshna kala ngasotnao saikorana ali hānga, “Khuining hangphangā kajuiya tārong akha sālaga, Mordecaili phāshi sākhavai ngathorshong awungali ahānglu; laga ningmathānlak eina awungali ngasoda ngazin phazāt aphazālu.” Hāngda khalei china Hamanli ningyāng ungngasakhaowa, kala ana tārong chi sākhui ngasaka.
Chithang ngayā awunga mapivāpaithuwa; chieina phaningung khangayi kashoshok otshot, thotchan kapisang khavai lairik chi akhui khavai kasoi, kala awungali chibing chi pashok chitheiya.
Kala awungawui ahonga khāmong mayonkasā Bigthana eina Tereshna Awunga Ahasu-erusli sāthat khavai kasāwui pongli Mordecaina kathāda hāngkhala kaji chi kapisanghaikasā samphanga.
Chieina awungana hānga, “Hiwui vang Mordecaili khi maikhayā maningakha khi khayākashi ot sāmihairakhala?” Awungawui otram khangatha̱bing china, “Awui vang khikhala masāmilakmana” da hānga.

“Yangkhupli khalei chi khipākhala?” da awungana ngahāna. Atam chichangli, awungawui keinung kayāngli Haman rāchamda leisai; kaja ana ngarān kahai tārongli Mordecaili phashi sākhavai awungali hangkida kharāna.
Chieina awungawui raobingna, “Kayangli Haman nganingda lei” da hānga. “Ali zangngasaklu” da awungana kasoi.
Hamanna zanga, kala awungana hānga, “Awungana ningyāng ungda mai kāngasak khangaiya mi chili khi samingayikhala?” Hamanna, “Ili lāngda awungana khipāli ningyāng ungrakhala?” da akhalatta chukmajaya.
Kala Hamanna awungali hānga, “Awungana ningyāng ungda mai kāngasak khangai mi chili,
awungana khangavai wungsāri, kala awungana katonga sigui kala awungawui kuihon khuirāranu;

kala awungawui ngammeikap kaje wungnao chili milaga, awungana mai kāngasak khangai mi chili ana shaksāmiranu; kala ngammeikap kaji mi china sigui shimenlaga awungawui konung khamashā kuimareida: ‘Awungana ningyāng ungda mai kāngasak khangai mili hithāda sāki kajina’ da vaozatra.”
Chieina awungana Hamanli hānga, “Thāklu, nana kahāng thāda wungsārila, siguila, khuilu kala awungawui ngaveili kapama Jehudi Mordecaili chithāda sāmilu; nana hāngtā kahai chi akhala machithathaialu.”
Chieina Hamanna wungsārila, siguila khuilaga Mordecaili shaksāmi, kala keinungwui khamashā kuimareidali, “Awungana ningyāng ungda mai kāngasak khangai mili hithāda sāmiki kajina” da vaozata.
Chiwui thili Mordecaina awungawui ngaveili ungpamhaowa. Kha Hamanna shimli totot unglaga wukkhanangnāhaida kuili kachon ungkuirunpama.

Kala Hamanna apreiva̱̱ Zeresh, kala ngasotnao saikorali awuitungli shokkahai saikora hāngchithei. Chieina thangkhamabing kala apreiva̱̱ Zereshna hānga, “Nana mangāli kongluiphok kahai Mordecai chi Jehudinaona jiakha, na ali mangasungrarmara, kha awui pāngli thisangra.”
Athum ngazek mahungda leilakha awungawui ahongabingna rālaga, Estherna ngarān kahai zātkhān chili Hamanli totot eina thānthuihaowa.
Chieina awunga eina Hamanna awungva̱ Estherli ngasoda phazākhavai zanga.

Kala kakhanethang, athumna drakhāra̱ mangmamānlakha awungana Estherli hāngluishita, “Khi pokhangai leikhala, Awungva̱ Esther? Chi nali mira. Kala nawui ningkachāng khi leikhala? Iwui wungram tangkhai eina tangda mira.”

Chieina Awungva̱ Estherna ngahānkai, “Awungawui mikyanli ili ngahanngaimiakha, O Awunga, kala awungali ningyāng ungngasakakha ina kapo hieina imanglā kahuimilu, kala iwui yur saikorawui manglā huimilu.

Kaja ithumli yorsanghaira, I kala iwui yurli, shimān ngasak khavai, sāthat khavai, kala yaitupthat khavai ngarānhaira. Ithumli rao mayarnao, sha̱nao, sākhavai yorsangsi kaje, ina chingri mahaimara; kaja ithumwui kachotkachāng chi awungawui kashimānli chāng matampaimana.”
Chieina Awunga Ahasu-erusna Awungva̱ Estherli, “Hikathā sākida kaphaning mi chi khipākhala, kala kali leilikhala?” da ngahāna.
Estherna hānga, “Yangkashe! Makaphā-makhayā Haman hina!” Chieina awunga eina awungva̱wui mangāli Haman ngacheeshunhaowa.

Kala awungana malungvātnāhaida phazātwui eina ngakarthungthuilaga konungwui yāmguishong vāhaowa; kha Hamanna, ali awungana zakkashi sahenra kaji theihaoda, Awungva̱ Estherli amanglā kakanmi khavai popamhaowa.

Kala awungana konung yāmgui chiwui eina athumna drakhāra̱ mangkhavaipamli hankhaung eina, Estherwui pamkhavaipamli Hamanna ngakhumsanghailaga leisai; chieina awungana, “Iwui shimli I leilagala awungva̱li eina tangda ana makaphā saga kajila?” da hānga. Awungana chi hangkhaleoda, athumna Hamanli mai rommihaowa.

Kala awungawui otram khangatha̱li kazang ahonga Harbonana, “Chili lāngda awungali mathi khavai hāngkhame Mordecaiwui vang, Hamanna ngarān kahai khuining hangphangā kajui tārong chi Hamanshiwui shimli sāhaili,” da hānga.
“Ali chili phāshi sahaolu” da awungana hānga. Chiwui vang Mordecaiwui vang sākahai tārong chili Hamanli phāshi sāhaowa. Chiwui thili awungawui malungkhavāt nemhaowa.
Chithang zimik, Awunga Ahasu-erusna Jehudili yangkashe Hamanwui shimlui Awungva̱ Estherli mihaowa. Kala Mordecaina awungawui mangāli vai, kaja Mordecai ani khishokkhala kaji Estherna hānghaowa;
kala Hamanwui eina khuikahai mahor namkhavai khutop chi awungana khuishokta Mordecaili mi. Kala Estherna Mordecaili Hamanwui shimlui akhavā sāngasakhaowa.
Chiwui thili Estherna awungali hāngluishita; kala Agagwui Hamanna Jehudibingli zakshilāk eina sākhavai khangarān chi ngacheimi khavai, apheili singda chapsasui poi.
Kala Awungana awui sinā khānthing Estherli tāngkhami eina,

Estherna ngakarthuida awungawui mangāli nganinga. Kala “Kalikha hina awungali ningyāng ungngasakta, kala awungawui mikyanli ili ngahanngaimiakha, kala otsak hi awungawui mangāli mashungakha, kala ina awui mikyanli ningyāng ungngasakakha, awungawui ngalei saikorali khalei Jehudibingli sāthat khavai Hammedathawui nao Agagwui Hamanna kapi kahai chi khuishokmi khavai kakaso akha kapimilu.
Kaja iwui mibingli kalāshāt rāki kaji chi ina kararan eina khāngpamrakhala? Maningakha iwui mibing sākashimān chi ina kathāda yangrarrakhala?” da ana hānga.
Chieina awunga Ahasu-erusna, Awungva̱ Esther eina Jehudipa Mordecaili hānga, “Yanglu, Hamanwui shimlui ina Estherli mihaira, kala Hamanna Jehudibingli pāng parra jihaoda, ali athumna phāshi sāhaira.

Ara nanina Jehudibingwui vang kapi khangai chi awungawui ming eina kapilaga shoi khutop eina mahor nampaira; kaja awungawui ming eina kapi kahai kala awungawui khutop eina mahor namkahai chi mangacheiluipaimana.”

Atam chili kachāng kakathuma, Kharam kachāng, zimiksho maga̱da kakathumathang, awungawui kapimebingli hokhui; kala Jehudiwui pongli Mordecaina kakaso athishurda lairik akha kapida satrapbing, rammungabing, kala India eina thuilaga Ethiopia vāshungda khalei ngalei apamwui wungnaobing, ngalei shākha maga̱da shinili kachichāramtui kala mayek eina, kala Jehudibinglila athumwui tui kala mayek eina kapilaga chiphunvāsera.
Lairik chi Ahasu-erus awungawui ming eina kapida awungawui khutop eina mahor namlaga, wungnao siguili shaksāda kala awungawui otsakli katonga kathathāka sigui tonglaga kaphungabingli chihovāserhaowa.

Chili, keinung kachiva̱li khalei Jehudinaobingna kazipkhuida athumwui mirin kankhavai, kachikathā yurwui maningakha ngaleiwui raimina athumli kala athumwui preinaosanli rāngararda thongthāng ngapon khavai kharā tharān ngarar khavai, sāshimān khavai, sāthat khavai awungana khamayā mi,
hibing hi Awunga Ahasu-eruswui ngaleili thangkhawui vang kachāng tharāda kakhane, Marun kachāngli sākhavaina.
Kapi kahai hukhum hi ngalei kachiva̱li ava̱va̱ miki kajina, kala yur saikorali chishāta, kala Jehudibingna athumwui yangkashebingli athut khuikhavai chithang khangarān sāki kajina.
Chiwui vang eina pao phungmebingna awungawui otsakli katonga kathathāka sigui tonglaga awungawui hukhum athishurda thāklak eina apam kachida ngayaovai, kala Susa keinunglila hukhum mihaowa.

Chiwui thili Susa keinung ringphāda mathānda ngavaoda leilakha, Mordecaina wungnao sāri khamayinga kala kachara sāri ngavaida, sinā kuihon kahakva̱ ngahonlaga tāwon kachon khamanaka hungreoseo sāri shaksāda awungawui eina shoka.
Jehudibingna ringphāda mathanlakhaowa kala maiyāronghaowa.

Kala ngalei kachida, keinung kachida, awungawui tui kala kakaso vākashung pamli Jehudibingna ringkaphā khamathān eina ngasoda zāt khānglaga lumlaopama. Kala ngalei chiwui yur kachungkhana athumla Jehudina da vaoshoka; kaja athumna Jehudinaobingli khangachee leihaowa.

Chitharan kachāng tharāda kakhane, Marun kachāngwui zimiksho tharāda kakathumathang, awungawui kakaso athishurda sāki kaji Jehudibingli sāmira da leikasā chi, ngacheilaga yangkashebingli Jehudibingna khayuiya zimiksho ngasāhaowa,

Awunga Ahasu-eruswui ngalei saikorali vāpeida khalei Jehudibingna athumwui keinung kachida kazipkhuilaga, athumli saza̱kida kasābingli sāmi khavai ngarānhaowa. Khipānakha Jehudibingli mangasunglengthuwa, kaja athumli khangachee chi yur saikorali raza̱haowa.
Ngalei chiwui wungnaobing, rammungabing, satrapbing kala wungnao otshinmebing saikorana Jehudibingli ngachonmi, kaja athumwuitungli Mordecaili khangachee rāshungserhaowa.
Kaja awungawui shimkhurli Mordecai hakmahālak kahai sathuihaowa, kala ngalei saikora vāpeida awui mingkhamayāng ngayaovāhaowa; kaja Mordecai kaho mipawui pangshap reikhangai reisanghaowa.
Chithāda sāda Jehudibingna, athumwui yangkashe saikorali raighai eina sāthatta athumli shimān ngasaka, kala athumli yangkashebingli athumwui ningyāngkhaung sākhui.
Susawui keinungmānglila Jehudinaobingna mi shāphangā shaothata,
kala sākathat chili Parshan-datha, Dalphon kala Aspatha,
kala Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha,
Parmashta, Arisai, Aridai kala Vaizatha,
Hammedathawui naomayara Jehudili yangkashe Hamanwui anaomayara ashi tharā; kha athumwui ot mangaponkhuimana.
Chithang ngalāngda ngalei chiwui keinung Susali sāthat kahai mashing chi awungali ahānga.

Kala awungana Awungva̱ Estherli hānga, “Ngaleiwui keinung Susali Jehudibingna, mi shāphangā kala Hamanwui naomayarabing athum tharā zangda sāthathaira. Khangatei apam awungawui ngalei katongali khi sāhairakhala? Ara nawui pokhangai khi leili? Kala khi ningchāngluifakhala? Ina ungshungmira.”

Chieina Estherna hānga, “Awungana ningyāng ungakha, aja kasā thāda akhama Susa keinungli leida khalei Jehudibingna salui khavai khamayā milu. Kala Hamanwui naomayarabing tharā chili tārongli hokthang ngasaklu.”
Chieina chila sākhavai awungana khamayā mi; Susali kakaso akha sai, kala Hamanwui nao tharā chi tārongli hokthanghaowa.
Susali khalei Jehudibingna, Marun kachāngwui tharāda khamatethang kaziplaga Susali mi shākathum sāthata, kha athumwui ot mangaponkhuimana.

Awungawui ngaleibing khangateiwui Jehudibingnala athum khalatta kankhavai kaziplaga yangkashibingwui eina khangachee suikatā samphanga, kala athumli yangkakharinga yangkashebing thing hangshinida phangā sāthata; kha athumwui ot mangaponkhuimana.
Chi Marun kachāngwui zimiksho tharāda kakathuma thangna; kala tharāda khamatethang chi ngasāmkhuida zātkhān kasā kala khamathān zimiksho akha sāngasaka.
Kha Susali kapam Jehudibingna tharāda kakathuma thangla, tharāda khamate thangla kazipta tharāda kaphangāthang chi ringkaphā eina ngasāmkhuida zātkhān kasā kala khamathān zimiksho akha ngasā ngasaka.

Chiwui vang eina kha̱-kha̱li kapam Jehudibingna, Marun kachāngwui tharāda khamatethang chi khamathānwui zātkhān kasā kala khamathāna zimiksho akha sāngasaka, kala akha eina akha ot khamathāthā mingaroka.
Kala Mordecaina kashok hi lairikli kapihaida, Awunga Ahasu-eruswui ngaleili khalei Jehudibingli apam, khanailila katālila chithi chihovāsera,
kala kum kachida Marun kachāngli tharāda khamatethang eina tharāda kaphangāthang hi,

yangkashebingwui eina Jehudibingna khangasām samphanghaowa da, wukkakhanangwui eina ringkaphā samkaphang, sikafawui eina ngasāmkakhui samkaphangwui vang, kum kachida, khamathānwui phanit, akha eina akha khamathāthā ot mingarok khavai, kachāmabingli ngachonkhami hi sachinglu da hānga.
Chieina athumna sāphok kahai thāda, kala Mordecaina kapikhava thāda Jehudibingna sāchinga.
Kaja Agagwui Hammedathawui naomayara, Jehudi saikorawui yangkashe Hamanna Jehudibingli shimān ngasakta mutchao khavai Pur, chiya kalā yanga;
kha Estherna awungali khavā eina, Jehudibingli makaphā sākhavai khangarān chi awuitungli tāranu da kakaso kapihaoda, a kala naomayarabinglila tārongli phāshi saserhaowa.
Chiwui vang eina athumna phanit atam hili Purwui eina Purimda hoi. Kala chithi chili kapi kahahai, athumna chili ngasung kahai, kala athumwuitungli rakashoshok saikorawui vang,
Jehudibingna tharchigatta athum khalatta, ara̱-azā kala athumli rākazang saikora zangda, kapi kahai athishurda, kum kachida zimiksho khanithang hi makailakla mayonchingra,
kala zimiksho hi mayonchingra, shimkhur kachiva̱, ngalei kachiva̱, keinung kachiva̱, Jehudibingna Purimli horkahai masāmara, lah ara̱-azāwui thotlila hi phaningungchingphalungra.
Chiwui thili Awungva̱ Esther, Abihailwui naongalāva̱ eina Jehudipa Mordecaina Purim zātkhān hi mangachei khavai kasaka kakaso eina ngasoda kakhane chithi kapiluishita.
Ahasu-eruswui wungram ngalei shākha maga̱da shinili khalei Jehudi saikorali chingri kahai khamashungwui tui eina chithi kapida hānga;
chiya, Jehudipa Mordecai eina Awungva̱ Estherna kasoda Jehudibing kala athumwui ara̱-azāna athumwui khumkapam, kala chapkhangachā, Purimwui khanithang hi hāngkahai atam chili mayonphalungra.
Purimwui zatkhanābing hi Awungva̱ Estherwui kakaso eina kasāna, kala hi kapisanghaida lei.
Awunga Ahasu-erusna lam kachida kala shamadrupheili khalei athumwuitungli shai khui.
Kala awui pangshap khamaling eina kasāsā, chi eina ngasoda awungana Mordecaili khangamkhareipamli khuikakā pong saikora hi Media eina Persiawui awungabingwui Thotrinchān Lairikli makapiserhaimala?

Kaja Jehudipa Mordecai hi Awunga Ahasu-eruswui thi kazangana, kala Jehudiwui ngachaili ngamshun eina leisai, kala achinā ngarā katongawui mangāli ngachānlak eina leisai; kaja ana awui yurwui vang phākhavai mang hotnai, kala athumli chingri kahai tuimāng eina hānga.
Uz ngaleili Job hoda mi akha leisai, ava shāt makālak kaja mashungrik kahai, kala Vareli ngacheeda makaphāli makazanga mi akhana.
Awui nao mayarnao shini kala sha̱nao kathum da leisai.

Awui yao thingshini, ut thing kathum, langon kaphunga mukkā shāphangā, kala gadhā ava̱ shāphangā leisai; kala raola kachungkha leisai; chithāda sāda zimikshoshong khalei saikorawui ngachaili a hakmeikapta leisai.
Anaomayara ngarāna kachichāshi shimli hounglaga ngatak ngatāda zāt khāngngatheichinga; kala azara̱ kathumli phāshak phazā ngarum khavai ahokhuikhui ji.

Kala athumna morkasong kupkahaiwui thili, Jobna athumli hokhuida tharngasakmichinga, kala ana ngathorthakva̱ ngakarthuilaga athumwui mashing athishurda rikkatāchigat pha̱kaphayā chigatmimi ji; kaja Jobna “Inaomayara ngarāna morei sāhailaga athumwui ningli Vareli khonshi kahaila leipai” da hānga. Jobna chithāda sāchinga.
Chieina
Satanna
Chieina
Chieina Satanna
Nana ali, awui shimkhurli, kala awui khalalei saikorali kuimareida arāp kachida masākhamhaimala? Nana awui otsakli somi, kala ram hili awui lan mataisangkhangai mataisangmi.
Kha arui nawui pāng khāngkāda awui khalalei saikorali saza̱lu, chieina ana nali maingātlak eina khonshira.”
Chieina
Thang zimikshokha, ama khararawui shimli anaomayara eina anao ngalāva̱ ngarā phāshak phāzāsai;
kala paome akhana Jobli rāhānga, “Mukvābingna luili seiot sāsai kala chiwui ngalemli gadhābing phāshaipamsai;
chitharan Sabeanaobingna rākaida khuithuiserhaira, kala raobinglila raighai eina sāthatserhaira, pao ungmi khavai imāng ngathikashokna.”
Ana hāngmahungda leilakha khangatei akhala ungrāsai, kala ana hānga, “Varewui mei kazing eina tāda yao saikora kala rao saikora chuithatserhaira; kala pao hi ungmi khavai imāng ngathikashokna.”

Anala hāngmahungda leilakha khangatei akhala ungrasai, kala ana hānga, Chaldeanaobingna ashang kathum sālaga utbingli rākuinamlaga homthuiserhaira, kala raobinglila raighai eina sāthatserhaira; pao hi mikhavai imāng ngathikashokna.
Ana matui mahungda leilakha khangatei akhala ungrāsai, kala ana hānga, “Nanaomayara ngarā kala nanaongalāva̱ ngarā amawui shimli phazā phāshakta leilakha;
yanglu, lamhāngwui eina siphan panglāk eina phanungda shim chiwui achithek matili ungngaphita china naongarābingli tākrorda athum thiserhaira; kala pao hi mikhavai imāng ngathikashokna.”
Chieina Jobna ngakarthuida awui khangavai kachon serkhāklaga kui sihaida, ngaleili ngakhumshām zanglaga khoruma.
Kala ana hānga, “Khamasai eina I ishāva̱wui naopam eina shoka, kala khamasai eina ina hanungra;
Saikora hili Jobna morei masāmana, lah Vareli khanguila maphenmana.
Latluida thang zimikshokha Varewui naomayarabingna
Kala
Kala
Chieina Satanna
Kha ara nawui pāng khāngda awui ara̱-arā kala aphili sāza̱lu, chieina ana nali maingātlak eina khonshira.”
Kala
Chieina Satanna
Kala ana hamkai akha khuilaga asasak eina hotkazamda hotlāli ngaleopama.
Chieina apreiva̱na ali hānga, “Arui eina tangda ningsāngaziplak eina nganingtitfala? Vareli khonshilaga thihaolu.”
Kha ana apreiva̱li hānga, “Nala mangkhama̱ sha̱nao akha thāda matuili. Ithumna Varewui eina khamathāva samphanglaga makaphāva masamphangsila?” Saikora hilila Jobna amorchai eina morei masāmana.

Chitharan Jobwuitungli makaphā kachotkachāng kharā saikora hi shālaga awui ngasotnao kathum rai, athumna kachichāpamwui eina rai, Temanwui Eliphaz, Shuhiwui Bildad kala Naamahwui Zophar. Athumna awui kachot phungngarumda ning ringpha khavai ngasopamsa da atam akha kakkhui.

Kala athumna katāva̱ eina ali kathei tharan; ali mamachutrarthuwa; kala athumna akhon panglāk eina shokta chapsasuihai; kala athumna khangavai kachon serkhākta chifa kazingramshong horkāda athumwui kuitungli chairora.
Kala athumna ngashun shini, ngayā shini da ngaleili pamlaga ali ngasopama, kala khipānakha ali tuikhurkha mahāngmana; kaja athumna awui kachot chi hakmahālak theikhui.
Kala Jobna hānga:
kala ‘naomayara akha vaihaira’ da
kahāng ngayā shimanhaoranu.
Zimiksho chi tangkhamang ngasaranu!
atungshongwui Varenala chi maphāzataranu,
kahornala mahormiaranu.
Kazingkashi kala tangkhamangna khuihaoranu,
Muiyāna chiwuitungli ngapānphinranu;
ngashunwui tangkhamangna ngachee ngasakranu.
Chithang ngayā chi tangmangting kahaina tangmangphinhaida,
zingkumwui khamathan zimikshobing chili mangarumaranu,
kachāngwui chāngshānlila mazangaranu.
Mha, chithang ngayā kashuma ngayā ngasāranu;
khamathānkhon mashāranu.
Leviathanli kasingabing laivā kathembingna
zimiksho chili khonshiranu.
Chithang zingthanlamwui sirābingla tangkhamang ngasāranu;
kahor phālala akhanida maleisāranu,
chithang zingthanlamwui kahor kashokla matheiranu;
khikhalajila chithang ishāva̱wui naopam khāmong mashungmihaithuwa,
imikwui einala malungkharing mathummihaithuwa.
Pharākhaleoda khisāda I mathithu,
naopamwui eina shokta khisāda makānthuihaisāthu?
Khisāda ili pharātā ngasakhaokhala?
Lha khisāda I na̱ mangsākhala?
Chithahairasāsi kaja I pisanghaida kasaikha pamhairara;
I pihaira̱ra,
kala I ngasāmkhuida leira,
okathuiwui awungabing kala machinmebing,
ja̱ta kahai keinungbing sakāluishit kajibingli ngasoda,
lah sinā vaida athumwui shim lupāsā pemda
kahai wungnaobingli ngasolaga ngasāmkhuida leira.
Lha kahor matheilak kaje kachāng mapeila tākahai,
kapharā makathei angangnaobing thāda ili khisāda masāmihaithukhala?
Chiliva makaphā makhayābingna masheikhautmana,
kala chiliva kakhanangbing ngasāmkhui.
Chiliva narkahaibingla leiyāsorhai;
khamayonawui kakathang akhonla mashāmana.
Chili kateola khareila leisera,
kala raonaola akhavāwui eina ningkhān samphanga.
“Khiwui vang eina chotchānglak eina khalei mili kahor mikhala,
kala ningkachota mili okthui ngasak khala,
ngathum kahai lanli thukmeida chuikazanga;
chikhur vāshungthang khamathān kala ringkaphaali?
Shongfa thummi kahaiya,
kala Varena ngaveikham kahaia mi chili khisāda kahor misākhala?
Kaja iwui ningrei khāsut kahaina kashakazā sai,
kala iwui khangahui tara̱ thāda heishoka.
Kaja ina ngangmeikap kaji ot chi ili rāshung haira,
kala ina khangachee chi ili rāza̱haira.
I pamphup mahaimana, va̱ri kahaila maning;
I ngasāmkakhui maleimana; kha kakhanang kaho chi rai.”
Chieina Temanwui Eliphazna ngahānkai:
Hāngphat hāngraiakha nana malungvātrala?
Mahāngsa jilala khipāna kasaikha pampaira?
Yanglu, nana kachungkha tamchitheihaira;
kala khangazanabingli pang ngasakhaira.
Phei ngaphok kahaiali nawui tuina khāngkhaningmi,
kala khuksao khanganukabingli nana ngatar ngasakmi.
Kha ara nali rāshunghaoda na makhāngrarthura;
nali raza̱haoda nala malung ringhaira.
Vareli khangachee hi nawui ningkhanganung,
kala ningtongda ot kasā nawui kachihān maningmala?
Ara machukyanglu, khayon makhalei mi kashimānhairala?
maningakha mashungrik kahai mili kachili katathaira?
Inala theikhuihaira, morei ot kasā,
kala makaphā khayao athumna chi tākam eina hātkhui.
Varewui khakkhā eina athum shimāna,
kala awui malungkhavātwui kakhangang eina athum shimāna.
Kazingkha̱wui kakhangang,
sakashe kazingkha̱wui akhon,
kala kazingkha̱naobingwui ahāla tekhaira.
Kapanga kazingkha̱ sāshai vāthaida shimānura,
kala kazingkha̱ ava̱wui anaobing chaiyānghaira.
Arui tui akha ili ngathum sāda khuirāmi
ikhanāna yinyinyāyā shai.
ngayāshongwui rākhamahā machuklakha,
khangachee khangachā ili rāda kathirra,
kala china iwui ara̱kui saikora nganuk ngasaka.
Manglā akhana imangāchangli yup sāda phanrai,
kuihā ngakarrikhaowa.
Rānganingshinghai,
kha khizakkhala kaji ina mahāngrarmana.
Maong akha imangāchangli runghai;
vari eina leilakha, akhon akha hithāda shai,
“Thikapai mina Varewui mangāli mashungshaprala?
Kasā akhavāwui mangāli mina tharshaprala?
Ana awui raobingli eina tangda mashitsangrarmana,
kala awui kazingraobinglila khangui phena;
chithākha leikhontungli shim sāda,
makung akhali paimeida khaningkachupkashapa
shimphunga chifatungli kasoma athum kayākha ngazanmeirali?
Ngathor eina ngazinwui alungli athumli sākazamhaowa,
kala shimānhailala khikha theikhami maleimana.
Athumwui kachonshim khara̱ sāshatmihaiakha;
athum thangkhamei maleila mathimala?”
Arui vaolu, nali ngahānkāki kaji mi leila?
Kathara kachipali nana ngakaora?
Mangkhama̱ali malungkhavātna kachangkat sāthata,
kala yuikashina samkasongali shaothata.
Mangkhama̱na angayung sa̱kakhui I theihaira,
kha kashuirak eina ina awui pamkhavaili khonshiya.
Anao ngarābing ningtāphup
kahaiwui eina katāvali lei,
athum ngaveili sākazamhaowa,
kala athumli kanshokmi khavai khipākha maleisamana.
Awui heiun kathaiana zai,
chila ka̱shātlungwui eina akakhuina,
kala ra̱kachangana awui lanli honpama.
Kaja sipkasā chifawui eina mashokmana,
kala kakhanang ngaleiwui eina makharmana;
kha meipāna jakkakā thāda mi hi khanang khavai pharai.
Iwui vanga, I Vareli phātha̱ra,
kala Vareli ina iwui kasak chitheithara;
hakkhamahā kala phaningla makakhui ot,
matakhak kahai ot mashānkharara kasāpā chili:
okathuili ana kazing romi,
kala luili tara̱ ngarung ngasaka,
khangazanabingli ana reingasaka;
kala chapkhangachā athumli tāphup kahaipamli khāngkai.
chithāda athumwui pāngna ungkashung khikha maleimara.
Ana thangkhamabingli athumwui awor chili manngasaka,
kala phākakhaningbingwui khangarān chi ngalāngda shimān ngasaka.
Athumna ngashunshong tangkhamang samphanga
kala ngashunung atamli ngayā thāda kajupzata.
Kha ana avāva̱ makhaleibingli makaphā athumwui khamor eina huimi,
kala pangshap khaleiyawui pāng eina khangazanabingli kanmi.
Chithāda, makhamashungwui khamor kafamihaida khavātabingna kachihān samphanga.
chiwui vang eina Sāshap-pangshapana hangkhamachinli machinalu.
ana shaoza̱lala apāng eina raingasaka.
Kachot kachāng tharukwui eina ana nali huimira,
kashineli makaphāna masāza̱mara.
Chām kharā tharan ana kathiwui eina;
kala raili raighai pangshapwui eina ana kanmira.
Malena khamashātwui eina nali thummihaira,
kala shimān ngasak khavai kharā tharānlila nana mangacheemara.
Shiman khavai kala chāmrei atamli nana mana̱ra,
kala okathuiwui sāyurlila mangacheemara.
Khikhalajila nana luili khalei lunggui saikorali longnao sāra,
kala khararwui ramsābingna nali chingri eina ngayurra.
Nawui kachonshimli chingri eina kapam samphangra,
kala nana nawui sha̱kei shānyangda kashimān maleimana kaji theira.
Kala nawui ara̱-azā kachungkhara kajila,
kala nawui naothei okathuiwui khawoli ngayāra kajila nana theira.
Nana okpeishap okpeida,
mātheina khamin eina lanpumli khuiunglaga
ungngapokasang thāda chikhurli vāra.
Yanglu, ithumna phāyanghaira; hi khamashungna.
Nganālu, kala nawui vang phākhavaina da theilu.”
Chieina Jobna ngahānkai:
O iwui malung kharing khān tamsi kaja,
kala iwui unshimui saikora khānli heisangyangsi kaja chong!
Chithasi kaje shamadruwui situili ritmeira;
chiwui vang eina ina matuitā kahai matheimana.
Kaja Pangshapawui malāthingbing ili ngathānda lei,
chibingwui kathiri imanglāna manga;
Varewui sāshat china ili rānmithaira.
Khawo leilakha ram gadhāna khongla,
lah seizāt leilakha mukvāna khongkasaila?
Khalama otli machi masangla shaipaila?
lah harra̱wui ahor khangayam khaleila?
Ikhamor mathuimada chi masāza̱ngaimana,
chibing chi ningkakachai kashakazā thāhaowa.
Oh, iwui pokhangai popaisi kaja,
kala iwui ningkachāng chi Varena mayāmisi kaja;
Varena ili sākazamhaingaiakha,
apāng ngarānrāda ili katatmihaosi kaja chong!
Hi iwui ningkhalem khavaina,
kachotkachāng hailaklaga masot chigatra,
kaja Kathara A chiwui tui ina makhamayā maleimana.
Ngarai khavai iwui pangshap kali lei?
Kala iwui angarit kali leida, ina khāngpamrakhala?
Iwui yāng lungguiwui pangshap kathāla?
maningakha iwui aphi pithrai kathāla?
I khalatta ngachon khavai khikha maleikachangkhatmana,
kala iwui khalalei saikora khuithuiserhaira.
Ngasotnaowui lukhamashan thatkahaia mi chi Pangshapali khangachee makhaleina.
Pālongkhur thāda kala pālongra̱ khalong thāda ichināngarā sāshilaka,
phāmna tākrorda kashining,
kala horāmna khalatta ngayinkakhui thai.
Athumna lumkhaung tharan shimānhaowa;
kasā atamli apam chiwui eina shimānhaowa.
Ut ashang china vāki kaji shongfawui eina ngareithuihaida;
athumna makhaning apamli athihaowa.
Temawui utshang china kapeiya,
Shebawui ramkazatbingna chihāna.
Athum ngachāngchathaowa,
khikhalajila athum ningnganungsai;
athumna chili vāda pa̱ngapāhaowa.
Nathum iwui vang chikathā ngasāhaira;
nathumna iwui kachotkachāng theilaga ngachee.
Ili lemmet milu chi maningakha nathumwui
lan eina iwui vang pheizā sāmilu da ina hānghairala?
Chimaningakha, yangkashewui pāng eina ili ngatangshokmilu,
lah singkakharengbingwui pāng eina ili ngatangmilu da hāngla?
Tamchitheilu, chieina I kasaikha pamra;
ina kathāda nguihaokhala kaji ili theikhui ngasaklu.
Mashuntui kayākha pangshap leikhala!
Kha nawui kakharar china khi chithei?
Ningchotnā kahaia miwui tui masi kathānada nana
hāngmachinpairada phaningla?
Avāva̱ makhalei naoli eina tangda kalā yanga,
kala ngasotnaoli eina tangda leih ngalatngai,
kha ara ili khayangrāmilu;
kaja ina nathumwui mangāli makapikmara.
Ngareirālu, khangui mashokaranu, ina kapona.
Ngareirālu, ara iwui khayon makhalei chitheiki jihaira.
Imaleli khayon khaleihaola?
Iwui khamazapna unshimui matheirarmarala?
Okathuili mina ot chotlak eina masāmala,
kala awui mirin ngalang kaphei kathā maningmala?
Raonaona khaya̱ ningkachāng thāda,
kala ngalangkaphei mina awui ngalangman khangarai thāda,
ili aremawui atam kachāng kachungkha mihaira,
kala sipkasāwui ngayā kachungkha ili yartāmihaira.
Ina pikazang tharan,
I katharan ngakarthuinikhala da ina hānga.
Kha ngayā sānglaka,
kala kazing kathang eina tangda
I ngareishok ngareizang sāpama.
Iphasā ka̱lom eina chifana pemhaira;
iwui ahui mararkokhaida ngarenkhai kala sānui shona.
Iwui okthot rahwui kapemli thākmei,
kala kachihān maleila kuphaowa.
Phaningyanglu, iwui mirin khaksuikha kathāna;
imikna khamathā matheiluimara.
Ili katheiya mik china ili matheiluimara;
namikna ili yangda leilakha I thuihaora.
Muiyā vānmamānda shimān kahai chi tākam eina,
Kathewui ramli zangkahaia a china mashokluimana;
awui shimli malatungluimana,
kala awui apamna ali matheiluimana.
“Chiwui vang eina ina ikhamorli makhāmmara;
imanglāwui lungvāt eina ina matuiphalungra;
ining kakhālungli maringkaphā phongshokra.
I shamadrula, maningakha shamadruwui sārei da,
nana iwuitungli khamayona phākasangla?
Iwui petna ili ringphā ngasakra,
iwui ngasām khavaina iwui maringkaphā vānngasakra,
da ina kahāng tharan;
nana ili mangchān eina sāmachita,
