kala khamahā eina ngachee ngasaka,
chithāda ina ira̱kuimāng eina okthuiki kajile
kahungli shimetmida kathi phāmei.
Imirin sānhaira; okthuichingki kajila maning.
Iningkhānhaoga, kaja iwui okthot khaksuikhana.
kala nana ali hiyākha ningsangda,
ngathor kachida akhayang,
kala mikkhayip kachida ali chāng khayang?
Iwui eina na karankha mangareithuifamarakhala,
ina machora̱ mayuikatā eina tangda imangli horhairakhala?
Ina morei sāda china nali khi sāhao?
mibingli ra̱khayanga!
Ili khisāda nawui rinkhavai ngasā ngasakhao?
I khisāda nawui vang otrei ngasāhaokhala?
Khisāda nana iwui khangui mapheomithu,
kala iwui khayon makhuithuimithu?
Kaja ara I ngaleili pihaora,
nana phāra, kha I maleisāmara.
Chiwui thili Shuhwui Bildadna ngahānkai:
Hikatha tui nana karankha hāngfara,
kala nakhamorwui tui kapanga masi thāda phanra?
Varena mashun masho ngasakla?
Maningakha Reikhamataia china mashunli makhui ngasakla?
Nanao ngarāna awui mangāli morei sāhaiakha,
ana athumwui khayonwui pangshapli horsangmihaira.
Nana Vareli phāda kala Reikhamataiali poakha,
nana thar-akha kala mashungakha,
mashoila nawui vang ana ngakarthuida
nali mashungrik kahai mirinwui sāman mira.
Kala nawui haokaphok teosālala,
naodava kachungkha ngasāhaora.
Kaja, ngathingyanglu,
thuikahai thotwui pongli, ina kapona;
mirin kaphaningungyanglu,
kala avāva̱ ngarāna phākashok chili chukmajalu;
kaja ithuma ayāmang okathui kathāna,
kala khikha matheithangmeimana,
kaja ithumwui okthot hiya khaya̱ kathāna.
Athumna nali matamchitheimarala,
kala mahāngmarala,
kala athumwui theikakhui tuibing chi mahāngmarala?
“Konana rapur makhaleili phorpaila?
Titina tara̱ makhaleili kharpaila?
Awon wonmahungda leilakha mata̱tteklala,
tara̱ thengakha khawo khangateibingli china ngahuirihaowa.
Vareli malai kahai saikorawui shongfa chithai;
kala Vare makathei miwui kachihān shimānhaora.
Awui ningkhalum ngakaithāmhaowa,
kala awui ning horkasang kārkaopan kathāna.
Ana awui shimli shaipama,
kha china manganingrarmana;
ana chi singtita,
kha china makhāngrarmana.”
Ana kazing masāranglakha mateka
kala aphāngna yāmguili ngapānvai.
Angayungna lungkhorli neikazamda ngapana,
kala lunghārpamli phora.
Awui apamwui eina shimān ngasakhaiakha,
akhavāna mamayāmada hāngra,
Ina nali matheilakmana.
Yanglu, hi awui khamathān apongna,
kala ngalei chiwui eina khangatei phorra.
“Yanglu, shāt makakā mili Varena makhalanhaimara,
makaphā kasābingwui pāngla masingkhuimara.
Ana nakhamorli khamana̱ chipemmira,
namorchaili khamathānmira.
Nali ningkakachaibing chili kakhayakna chonvai sāngasakra,
kala makaphābingwui kachonshim chi maleiluimara.”
Kachangkhata chithai kaji ina thei:
Kha Varewui mangāli mi khipa mashungshaprakhala?
Kachikathāna Vareli ngayātngailala,
thingkhawui alungli akhashidala mangahānkārarmara.
Awui thangkhamei thuklaka,
kala pangshapla reilaka,
—khipā ning mararshāp eina
ali ngakaishilaga ungkashung leihairakhala?—
ana kaphungbing khangthui,
kala athumna matheimana,
awui malungkhavāt eina mashongachei khangasak tharan;
okathuili awui apamwui eina ana khanukshoka,
kala chiwui pākra̱bing chi nganuka;
ana zimikli kasoi, kala mashok kachangmana;
kala sirābing sāphinhai;
amāngna kazingram hārshoka,
kala shamadru khangaphaotungli naishāna;
kala azingshongwui masaikong kahai ana sai;
phaningla makakhui kahaka ot ana sai,
kala matakhak kahai ot mashānrarmana.
Yanglu, ana ili rāmakānlala,
ina ali matheimana;
ana zatvāmamāna, kha ina mayangkhuimana.
Yanglu, ana ngapaithuihaira; ali khipāna khāmshapra?
Nana khi kasākhala da khipāna ali hāngra?
Varena awui malungkhavāt mangalanmara;
Rahabli ngachonkhamebingla apheizingli khoruma.
Chithākha ina kathāda ali ngahānkāra,
kala khitui hākhuilaga hāngra?
Ina kayākha tharlala ali khikha mangahānkārarmara,
ili lumashan khavai kaphena chili poshukmara.
Ina ali hokhuida ana ili ngahānkāmilala,
iwui akhon ana shāmida leilida ina mashitsangrarmara.
Kaja ana ili siphan zingrot eina khaningkachupa,
kala angalang maleila iwui khamā chungsang ngasaka;
ana ili khak masuikhui ngasakmana,
kha kakhāmāng eina chipema.
Yāngwui khanganurna jiakha ali yangmalu!
kala mashunwui ponglina jiakha,
ali khipāna kasirlengra?
Ina mashunglala, ikhalattawui khamorna ili yona jira;
I shāt makālala, awui mangāle kāsara.
I shāt makāmana, I khalatta machāpmimana;
iwui mirinla sānhaira.
Saikora akhasera, chiwui vang eina ina kahāngna,
shāt makakā, kala makaphā khaninili ana shimān ngasaka.
Ka̱lāshātna kashuirak eina kathi khuikharā tharan,
khayon makhalei miwui unshimui chili ana mana̱rora.
Okathui hi makhayābingwui pāngli mihaira,
ana chiwui bichar kasābingwui mai farormihaira;
hi ana maningakha khipānakhala?
Iwui mirin shongzā khangakhuili thākmei,
khamathā kaho matheila athum yongthuihaira.
Titiwui marikhong thāda huithui,
khalāngna sāshaitungli hutsāda yongkhavā thai.
Iwui mamayākhangai chi malaihaora,
iwui sikafa ningngai chihohaida ning mathānthuphaora,
da hāngakha,
iwui kachotkachāng hiwui vang ngacheelaka,
kaja ina thei ili khayon makhalei mina da nana makhuimara.
Ili yonngasakra;
chithākha khisāda aremali hithāda khanangrakhala?
Ina horam eina ra̱vailala,
ipāng lye eina maziklala,
nana ili khorchopli horsanghaora,
kala I khalattawui kashankachonala ili ningkachaira.
Kaja, a hi I thāda ngahānkākapai mi maningmana,
kala bichar sārumkapaila maningmana.
Ini khanili pāng parda,
iniwui ngachaili yangkhame maleimana.
Awui lijei iwui eina khuithuihaoranu,
kala ali khangachee china ili machipā ngasakluiaranu.
Chieina ina ali khangachee maleila matuira;
kaja I khalatta chi mathālengthuwa.
Iwui mirin sānshunhaira;
iwui mamayākhangai phonglāk eina hāngra;
iwui ningkakhā eina ina hāngra.
Ili khayon mamialu, da Vareli hāngra;
ili nana khiwui vang khangarukkhala chitheimilu.
Napāngna sākahai ot chili rekakharek,
ningkakachai hi phāya jilā
kala makaphā makhayāwui arah kasāli ningyāng ungla?
Na phasā kakā miwui mik phonla?
Mina kathei thāda nana theila?
Nawui okthot mikumowui thālā,
maningakha nawui zingkum mikumowui zingkum thāhaoda,
iwui khayonkhamāng kala morei phāshang-phākatālā,
I mayonmana kaji nana theilala napāngwui eina
ngatangmikashap khipākha malei kajila?
Napāngna ili sema kala sākhui,
laga ara nana ili shimān khavai sāluihaira.
Nana ili leikhon eina sākhui kaji phaningungmilu;
laga ili chifa ngasā ngasakluiki kajila?
Nana seina̱ thāda ili maheishokmalā,
kala makhan thāda mashungkhuimala?
Nana ili ahui kala aphi eina farormi,
kala ili ara̱kui eina anonānli ngasun ngasaka.
Nana ili manglā eina makhangachei leishāt mihaira,
kala nawui yangkhamina imanglā mayonmi.
Chithālala hibing hi nawui ningli ngathumhai,
hi nawui sākhangaina da ina thei.
Ina morei saakha, nana machuttithai,
kala iwui khayon chi mapheomimana.
Ina maphaakha ili ringkashi ngasāranu!
Ina mashungda leisālala, ikui makhāngkārarmana;
kaja I maikashina pemhaoda kachotkachāngmāngli yanghaowa.
Kala I khalatta masochikatakha,
kazingkha̱ thāda nana ili kharoma,
kala iwuitungli matakhak kahai sākashi sālui;
nana iwuitungli shākhi kadhadhar phāsanga,
kala iwuitungli nawui malungkhavāt mataisang ngasaka;
kala nana iwuitungli ngarar khavai raimi kadhar phāsanga.
Khisāda nana ili naopamwui eina shokngasaksākhala?
Khipānakha matheiranglakha mathihaisākapai.
I maleisālak kaji thāda;
naopamwui eina chikhurli khuivāhaisāsi kaja phālakra.
I hunkhamāng okthuiki kaji maningmala?
I kateokha ringphākhui khavai iningkhānhaoga,
ina maungluiki kaji pam chili,
tangkhamanga ram, kathiwui khaya̱li ina mavāranglakha,
ringphakhuiga,
tangkhamanga pa̱khangapā apam,
kahorla tangkhamang kathā ram chili.
Chiwui thili Naamathwui Zopharna ngahānkai;
Tui hiyakha hi mangahānkāphalungmarala?
Kala tui kachungkha kahāng mili mashun mirala?
Nawui matuiphāphā kaji china mili kasaikha pamngasakralā,
kala nana mana̱kashi tharan,
khipānakha nali mai mashi ngasakmarala?
Kaja iwui tamkachithei mashunga,
kala Varewui miktāli I katharana da nana hānga.
Kha iyavo, Varena akhamor makāda nali hāngkapaini kaje,
kala thumkahai thangkhamei chi nali hāngchitheisi kaje!
Kaja ava mataimeikhārda theithangmei.
Chieina theilu kaja nawui khayonwui vang
samphangrānli Varena suitāda yangmi.
Varewui kathuka otbing chi nana phākhuishapla?
Pangshapawui akatanga nana phākhuishaprala?
Chiya kazingramli juimei—nana khi sārarra?
Kathewui ramli thukmei— nana khi theirarra?
Chiwui asān-aret okathuili sāngmei,
kala shamadruli mashāmei.
Ana rāda narhaiakha, kala bichar
sākhavai hoakha,
ali khipāna khāmshapra?
Kaja makānkhanā mili ana thei,
ana khayonkhamāng kathei tharan,
ana mamachukmarala?
Kha ram gadhāna mi ngasāda pharāthang,
mangkhama̱ china theithangmeihaora.
“Nawui wuklung tharakha,
napāng awuishong katingvāra.
Napāngli khayonkhamāng leiakha, katāva̱li horhaida,
makaphā nawui shimli malei ngasakalu.
Chithāda sāda chukkhara̱ maleila namai ngareikāpaira;
naning tāphuphaida mangacheemara.
Nawui ringshāt malaihaora,
longthui kahai tara̱ thāda nana phaningungnaora.
Kala nawui mirin ngashunungli mathingmeihaora,
kala chiwui tangkhamang ngathorshong thāhaora.
Kachihān leihaoda naning nganungra,
nali yangmihaida tāphup eina ngasāmkhuira.
Nana pizangda khipānakha mangachee ngasakmara,
kachungkhana nali ngahānngaira.
Kha makaphābingwui mik kalikha matangmara,
athumwui yāmshok khavai apong shimānserhaora,
kala athumwui kachihān chi athumwui khanaowa khaksuina.”
Chieina Jobna ngahānkai:
Ningkhamaong khikha maleimana,
mibing chi nathumlaka,
thangkhamei nathumli ngasoda thirumra.
Kha nathumwui thāda ila theikhuikathei lei;
I nathumli mangazanmeimana.
Hikathā hi makathei khipā lei?
I ngasotnaowui ngashimshi khavai sāthuihaira,
Vareli ngakaoda ana ngahānkhami,
khangaronga, shāt makakā I mana̱shi khavai ngasāhaira.
Leiyasor kahai miwui ningli khangateiwui kalākashi chi
aphei nganaikakhuibingwui vang ngaraipama.
Khalebingwui pamkhavai chingrihai,
kala athumwui vareli pangli hailaga
Vareli malungvātkhangasakbing kalā mashimana.
Kha ramsābingli ngahānyanglu,
chieina athumna tamchitheira;
kala khamasaili khalei vānaobingli ngahānyanglu,
athumna hāngmira.
Chi maningkha okathuiwui thingnā-ra̱hāli ngahānlu,
athumna tamchitheira; kala shamadruwui khaihna nathumli hāngchitheira.
Ot saikora
Kharinga kachiva̱wui manglā kala mikumo saikorawui khaksuila awui pāngli leisera.
Malena kashakazā khamazap thāda,
khanāna tui mashāmala?
Thangkhamei hi khararnaobingwuili lei;
kala rarmamānakha theikhuimamāna.
Vareli thangkhamei eina pangshap lei,
awuili hāngkachithei eina theishingkakhui lei.
Ana sakhaihaiakha khipānakha masākārarluimana;
ana akhali shungnamhaiakha khipānakha mashomirarmana.
Ana tara̱ khāmhaiakha, thenghaowa;
ana chihoakha ngaleitungli phongshilonga.
Yāng eina thangkhamei ali lei;
khanguila, nguikhangasakla awuisera.
Ana machinmebingli mahonghat eina thānthui,
kala bichar kasābingli mangma̱ ngasaka.
Awungabingwui kakhalap chi ana khalāmi,
kala athumwui kashānli shānneira̱ neimi.
Ana pāngmonbingli mahonghat eina thānthuihaowa,
kala kapingabingli konglui ngasaka.
Shitsangkapai miwui tuimatui ana khuithuimihai,
kala ararnaobingwui theishingkakhui pa̱ngapāmihaowa.
Wungnaobingwuitungli ningkakachai heirormi,
kala kapangabingwui shānneira̱ khalāmi.
Tangkhamangwui eina ana kathuka phāshoka,
kala tangmangting kahai chi horngasaka.
Ana miyurbing hakngasaka, kala shimān ngasaka,
ana miyur reisang ngasaka,
kala ngahap ngasaka.
Okathui mikumowui akhavābingwui eina
theishingkakhui ana khuithuihaida,
apong makhalei lamhāngli ma̱zat ngasaka.
Kahor makhalei tangkhamangli athumna kajupzata,
kala khamarip shongzā thāda jakchāngchāng zatngasaka.
Yanglu, imikna saikora hi theiserhaira,
ikhanānā shāda theishingkhuihaira.
Nathumna kathei tākam eina ila thei;
I nathumli mangazanmeimana.
Kha ina Pangshapali ngazekra,
kala ina iwui tuingaphun hi Vareli ngaphatngai.
Nathuma, kakapik tui eina teimachara,
nathum aremawui khanongmānga.
Iyavo, nathum kasaikha pamsersi kaja,
chi nathumwui thangmei ngasāra!
Ara iwui theikakhui nganālu,
kala ikhamorna kapo hi nganāmilu.
Nathumna Varewui vang nguida matuirala?
kala awui vang kapikta hāngrala?
Nathum awui mijang zangda
tuingaphun hi awui vang phayatmirala?
Nathumli ana phāshokhaiakha phārala?
Lha mi akhana akhali mikhanam thāda nathumnala ali minamshaprala?
Nathumna ngathumda mijang saakha,
ana mashoila nathumli kaharra.
Awui khangamkharei china nathumli mangachee ngasakmarala,
kala awui khangachee khangachā nathumwuitungli matāmarala?
Nathumwui chānjam hotlāwui chānjam kathāna;
nathumwui pheisin leikhonwui pheisin kathāna.
Kasaikha pamda ili matuingasaklu,
kala ili rāki kaji chi rāranu.
I khalatta iphasāli ihāna makeira,
kala imanglā ipāngli haira.
Yanglu, ana ili sāthathaora;
I kachihān maleithura;
chithālala awui mangāli iwui mashun hāngphatra.
Vareli makathei mina awui mangāli mavāmara,
kaji hi iwui huikhamina.
Iwui tui hi ningsanglak eina nganālu,
kala iwui hāngkashok hi nathumwui khanāli zangranu.
Yanglu, iwui tuingaphun ina ngarānhaira;
Ili mashung ngasakra da ina thei.
Ili ngayātki kaji mi khipa leili?
Chithākha I kasaikha pamda kathi phamei.
Ili ot khanimang mayāmilu;
chithākha ina nawui eina mayāmngathumara:
napāng iwui eina katāvali makhuithuimihaialu;
kala nali khangang china ili mangachee ngasakmialu.
Chiwui thili ili holu,
chieina ina ngahānkāra;
maningakha ili matuingasaklu laga nana ngahānkāmilu.
Iwui khayonkhamāng kala morei kayākha leihaokhala?
Iwui salāng kahai kala morei kachitheimilu.
Khisāda namai ngathumhaida,
ili nawui yangkashena da shānkhuikhala?
Phankazata thingnāli nana machitrala,
kala thengkahai māfali shurzatrala?
Kaja nana iwuitungli kakhā otmāng kapimihaira,
kala I yaronlakhawui khayonkhamāng chi iwui ngasā ngasakta lei.
kala iwui shongfa kachida nana yangkaziya:
ipheimajali akhān akha khānsangmi.
Mikumo kashuiya ot thāda, kashankachon makungna shaikahai thāda shimānhaowa.
Sha̱naona kapharā mi hi hunkhawui vang mānga,
kala kakhanangna pemtinghai.
Ana awon thāda rai kala ngahuihaowa;
ana akalā thāda yongzata kala maleiluithuwa.
Hikatha akhali yanggazida,
nawuili bichar sākhavai khuikharāla?
Makatharwui eina khipāna kathara ot khuishokshapra?
Akhala maleimana.
Awui atam retmihaoda,
chāngshān nawui pāngli lei,
ana makānshokpai khavai nana sāphinmihaira,
awui eina ngareithuihaolu, makhamalu
ngalang kaphei mi thāda,
awui atam chi ringphakhuiranu.
Thingrongwui vānga chihān khavai lei,
kalikhada katatshathailala shonshoklui shitra,
kala anao china mathiluimara.
Angayungna ngaleilungli rarhaisālapai,
kala angunrumna ngaleilungli thilapai;
kha tara̱wui nganamna shonluira,
kala akhar thingrong thāda kharshokra.
Kha mina thida chizanhaowa;
awui khanao khaksui suilaga a kali leilui?
Ngayiwui tara̱ katheng thāda,
kala kongrāna ngahaphaida thengkahai thāda,
mikumonala thihaiakha mangakarthuiluimana;
kazingram mashimānranglakha eina tangda ana mathuimara,
a kapiwui eina mamathotkhuiluipai mara.
Iyavo, nana ili Kathewui ramli thummihaisasi kaje chāng,
nawui malungkhavāt mavānranglakha eina tangda thumihaisi kaje chāng,
nana iwui vang atam akha retmihailaga ili phaningungmisi kaje chāng!
Mi akhana thihailaga a ringluirala?
Iwui atam maungranglakha eina tangda,
iwui otram ngatha̱ki kaji atam peida ngaraiphalungrali.
Nana hora, kala ina nali ngahānkāra;
napāngna sākahaibing chiwui vang nana honpamra.
Chithasi kaje nana iwui pheikār shānkhuira,
iwui moreili nana mayangchingmara;
iwui makaphā kasāsā khaolungli mahor namshānhaora,
kala iwui khayonkhamāng nana farormihaora.
“Kha kaphungna mintāda kaithuiya,
kala lunghārla leikasāpamwui eina khuithuihaowa;
tara̱na lungguili malekthuihaowa,
ngaleiwui leithao palongra̱na kheithuiya,
chithāda miwui kachihān nana sākhaimi.
Nana ali yuichinga, kala ana kānthuihaowa;
nana awui ningngai ngacheimida chishothaowa.
Naomayara ngarāna khayākashi chithei khavai rai,
kha ava chi matheimana;
athumli maishi ngasaka,
kha chi ana matheimana.
Khalattawui kachotmāng thei,
kala akhalattawui vangmāng sifaya.”
Chieina Temanwui Eliphazna ngahānkai:
Thangkhama mina aremawui awor tui matuiralā,
kala zingshoshongwui masi eina awuk chipemrala?
Khikha makānkhana tui eina,
chi maningakha phākhavai makhalei chanhān eina ngaphatrala?
Kha nana Vareli khangachee chihohaira,
kala Varewui mangāli seihā kasā hapkhanoda lei.
Kaja nawui moreina nakhamorli tamchithei,
kala phākakhaningwui male nana kapangkhui.
Nakhalattawui khamorna nali yonngasaka,
ina maningmana;
nakhalattawui morchaina nali makhamayā hāngkashokna.
Pharārimeikap kaje mi chi nala?
Lha phungrābingli nali sārila?
Varewui kazipli na anganāhairala?
Kala theithangkhamei chi nakhalatta shaphaira jila?
Ithumna makathei nana kathei khi lei?
Ithumna matheishingkakhui chili nana khi theikakhui lei?
Sam charshi kahai kala khararnaobing,
navāli rarkhameibing ithumwui ngachaili zangdalei.
Varena ningkhalem khavai kasā kala nali ngahuiri eina kahāng chi,
nawui vang teonāhaola?
Nawui wuklungna nali khisāda khuithuihaokhala?
kala khisāda namik kataring,
namanglāna Vareli mamayāmada,
chikathā tui nakhamorwui eina shokngasakhao?
Maningakha sha̱naona kapharā khangaronga khipā lei?
Yanglu, Varena awui katharabingli ning manganungmana,
kala kazingram awui mangāli matharmana;
chithākha khayonkhamāng tara̱ thāda khamanga ningkakachaiya
kala khamakhaowa mi chi kayākha suitāmeira!
Ina hāngchitheiga, nganāmilu;
kala ina theikahai chi hāngmiga.
(thangkhamabingna hāngmi kahai,
kala athumwui avāva̱ ngarānala makhangathum,
athummāngli mikahai lam chi kha̱mi khipānakha athumwui ngachaili marāmakānmana).
Makaphā mina awui mirin peida kachot lungli ngaleopama,
lukhamashan makatha miwui vang
zingkum peichaoda kazipmi kahai alungli.
Khanākhurli khangacheekhonmāng shai,
kashāng tharan awuitungli shimān khangasaka rāra.
Tangkhamangwui eina latshokluira da ana mashitsangmana,
ali raighaina ngaraida khaleina.
Kashakazā kachili leikhala? da ana phāshang phātai,
tangkhamanga zimiksho awui pāngli leihaira da thei,
kakhanang kala ringkashina ali khangachee pemngasaka,
awungana raiwui vang ngarān kahai thāda athumna ali singyuiya.
Kaja Vareli ana ngakaishida apāng katinga,
kala Pangshapali kasira,
chāngvei kashā phunglaga,
ngakaishilāk eina yongrora;
khikhalajila ava kathaona mai workhamda,
kala aphurthao akashānli ngananda,
ngachakyāng kahai keinungbingli arema ngasāhaoki kaji mi akhala mapamki kaji shimbingli pama;
a mashāngmara, awui lanla maleichingmara,
chili lāngda okathuili awui angayung maleiluimara;
ana tangkhamangwui eina mayāmshokrarmara;
meiwonna awui aphāng thengngasakra,
kala awui awon masina phanthuihaora.
khalatta minam khavai ana khamasaili mashitsangaranu;
kaja khamasai kaho chi awui sāman ngasāra.
Awui atam maungranglakha hi shokhaora,
kala aphāngbing chi mamatekluimara.
Drakhārongwui eina athei makhamin khanuk katā thāda,
ali khanuktāhaora,
kala oliverong thāda awui awon chi pa̱tāhaora.
Kaja shitkasang makhaleibingli khavāk kasā naokashumna,
kala pheizāwui eina sākahai shimbing chi meina shimān ngasakra.
Athumna zakkashi otmāng machuka,
kala makaphā ot pharāshok ngasaka,
kala athumwui ning mikhanam sākhavai ngarāna.
Chieina Jobna ngahānkai:
Ina hikathā kachungkha shāhaira;
nathum hiya khikha masā khavai hāngkaphanepa misera.
Arema tuina katang ngavārala?
Chi maningakha nali khina malung thuingasakta ngahankakākhala?
Na iwui pamli leisāsi kaja,
ila nana khamatui thāda matuishapra;
ina kui khayitta nawuitungli tui kachungkha hangtāhairara.
Ikhamor eina nali pang ngasakshapa,
kala imorchaiwui hāngkaphanep china nawui sikafa vānngasakra.
Ina matuilala iwui sikafa mavānlakmana,
kala ina chi khānglala khi ngavengsangra?
Kachangkhatta Varena ili chotchāng ngasakhaira,
iwui ngasotnao shimān ngasakserhaira.
Ana iphasā nganir ngasakser kahai hina ili shākhi mida lei;
kala kaokhangai kakao hina ili shākhi mida lei,
imai hinala chitheida lei.
Ana ili awui malungkhavāt eina serkazamda ili ningkachai;
ana ahāla tarichithei,
yangkashena ili mik taringda yanga.
Mibingna ili khamor makārora;
athumna khayāmashilakla amaili kapheya,
ili mamayāmada athum saikora akha sāhaira.
Varena shitkasang makhalei athumwui pāngli ili horsangmihaira,
kala makaphābingwui pāngli horsangmi haira.
I tāphup eina leisai, kha ana ili serthamkhaimihaowa;
ikahungli yonkhuilaga ili akha̱-akhā sāmihaira,
kala ana ili rinnganao khavai sai,
awui malā kakāpbingna ili kuimareiya.
Ana iwui amakei tophātmihaida mathāhaimana,
kala ana iwui athi ngaleitungli heitha̱ya.
Ana latluida ili sākazama,
raikhoka thāda ili yongrora.
Ina iwui ahuitungli bora khoprora,
kala iwui yāng chifali heitai.
Kachapna imai hunghaira,
kala imikkor hungping eina worhaira;
ipāngli khayon maleilala kala iwui seihā kasāla tharlala.
O ngalei, iwui ashee mafarormialu,
kala iwui kachapkhon khangasām mavaiaranu.
shākhi kazingli lei,
kala iwui nganingkhame a chi atungshong lei.
Iwui ngasotnaona ili ngashimshi;
kala imikna Varewui mangāli chāra̱ tai,
kaja mi akhana khongnainaowui vang phayatkhami thāda mi akhana
awui khamashung chi Varewui mangāli phayatmira.
Atam kasha̱khawui thili ina malatungluiki kaji apong chili vāura.
Imanglā yurhaira, iwui atam shimānhaira,
iwui vang chikhur ngarānhaira.
Kachangkhatta mana̱kashebing ili kuimareida lei,
kala iwui mikna athumna malung thuikhangasak chili shāptithai.
Iwui vang nawui khangashit akha nakhalattawuili haimilu;
iwui vang nganingkhame khipā leikhala?
Nana athumwui theishingkakhui ning shungmihaoda,
chiwui vang nana athumli mayui ngasakmara.
Athumwui lan ngayarkhui khavai ngasotnaobingwuitungli kaphenbing,
naongara mik ngapeora.
Ili mibingna chānjam sākhavai ngasā ngasakhaira,
kala mina machora̱ mashoror khavai ngasāhaira.
Wukkakhanangna imikla mamachāhaira;
kala iphasā katonga aka̱la thāhaira.
Hi theida mashungrik kahai mibingna matakhakhaira,
kala khayon makhalei mi china mashitkasangabingli malungvāthaira.
Kha khangarongana awui shongfali zata,
kala pāng katharabing china pangkhangai panga.
Kha athuma katonga rāda imangali ranganinglala,
ina athumwui ngachaili thangkhamei mi akhala masamphangmara.
Iwui atam kānthuihaira, iwui khangarān kala iningwui ningkachāng kuphaira.
Athumna ngayā ngashun onngasaka;
kala kahor chi tangkhamangli nganaihaira da athumna hānga.
Kathewui ram chi iwui shim thāda yangakha,
tangkhamang lungli iwui pamkhong runghaiakha,
chomli ina na ishāvāna jiakha,
kala kachaili ishāva̱ maningakha ishachona jiakha,
iwui kachihān kali lei?
Iwui kachihān khipāna theira?
China Kathewui ram khāmongli tungrala?
Ithum ngarumda chifali tungrala?
Chieina Shuhwui Bildadna ngahānkai:
Karankha hāngkhavai tui phāzatra?
Phaningkachunglu, chiwui thili ithumna hāngra.
Kachiwui vang ithumli sha̱kei thāda shānkhuihaokhala?
Khisāda nawui mikyanli mangkhama̱ ngasāhao?
Nakhalatta malungvāt eina serkakazamna,
nawui lungvātwui vang eina okathui hi horhaosila?
lah lunghārla leikasā pamwui eina khuithuihaorala?
awui meiwonna mahormana.
Awui shimlungli kahor chi tangmangtinghai,
kala awuitungli khalei thaomei sāshimithaira.
Awui kapanga pheikār sha̱sang ngasaka,
kala akhalattawui khangarāna konglui ngasaka.
Kaja akhalattawui pheina ali khailanli hersanga,
kala ana sāchomwuitungli zatvāda,
khalenna pheimaja̱la yonkhuida,
khalenna ali mantithaira.
Ngaleilungli awui vang khara̱ akha thumhai;
shongfalila awui vang khalen sanghai.
Ngachee khangasakbing china apam kachida ali ngachee ngasaka,
kala awui thi kharomzata.
Awui yāng vānhaira
kala aphei ngaphok khavai unshimui ngarānhaira.
Awui ahui aka̱na shaingakanhaira,
kathiwui naochizai chinala pheipāng shaimi.
Ana shitsangkasā shim chiwui eina serkazamda,
khangacheewui awungali thānvai.
Awui shimli awui ot makhaningbing lei,
awui pamkhavaipamli khamaling meithā chaiserhaira.
Azingshong awui angayung thengphoka,
kala atungshong aphāng ja̱phoka.
Awui ningphun ngaleitungwui eina shimānphoka,
kala shongfali awui ming maleiluimara.
Kahorwui eina tangkhamangli hersangda,
ali apuk-apagwui eina kashamhaowa.
Yur ngachaili awui naothei, maningakha ara̱-azā mavaimana,
ana pamkhavai chili awui shimkhur kharing akhala maleimana.
Awui atam chili zingtunshongwui mina matakhakhai,
zingshoshongwui mila khangachee-khangachāna nganglakhaowa.
Kachangkhat eina makaphabingwui shimpān chi hithai,
kala Vareli makatheiya a chiwui apam chi hithālaka.
Chieina Jobna ngahānkai:
Karankha nathumna ili rekharekra,
kala tui eina hāngkharotra?
Tharāshida nathumna ili hāngmachinhaira;
ili lāngkhangasak nathum makhayakmala?
Khikateikhada ina langhaisālala,
khalāng chi iwuili leira.
Kalikhada iwuitungli nathumna maiyā khangaiwui vang,
kala iwui sitkhamahuiwui vang ili khayon phenda khangaphatakha,
hi theilu kaja Varena ili yonkhangasakna,
kala ili awui khalen sangphin kahaina.
Yanglu, ina ‘khangashao!’ da vaoshoka kha ili mangahānkāmimana;
ina pangda vaowa,
kha chili mashun bichar sākhami maleimimana.
Ana iwui shongpong ngaveikhamhaida makanpaithuwa,
kala iwui apong tangmang ngasakhaowa.
Ana iwui tekhamatei iwui eina raimihaira,
kala ikuiwui eina kuihon khuithuihaira.
Ili uiui yāyā ana sākazamhaida I kuphaira;
kala iwui kachihān thingrong thāda ana phurthathaira.
Awui malungkhavāt iwuitungli tāshungda awui yangkashe akha thāda shānkhui.
Awui raimi khokkha sāda rai;
kala shongfa ngarānphina,
kala iwui kachonshim kuimareida rairum rāsai.
Ichina ngarā iwui eina ana katāvali haimihai,
kala iwui zakmai theikhamasui chi midhar thāngasakhaowa.
Iwui athei-asābingna kala ngahānkhangai ngasotnaobingna ili nothāhaira;
Iwui shimli shimzun sākasābingna ili malaihaira;
rao sha̱naobingla ili kha̱mi akha thada khui;
athumwui miktāli iya ram khangateinao thāhaowa.
Ina iwui raoli holala mangahuimana;
ikhamorna ngakaolala mangachonmana.
Ipreiva̱na ili chinhao,
ishāva̱wui naomayarabingnala ningkachaihaowa.
Naoshinaobingnala ili ningkachaiya,
Ina ngakarkathui tharan athumna ili makhamayā tui matui.
Iwui khangavapa ngasotnaobingna ili yangkharingserhaira;
kala ina leikashibing china mamayāthura.
Iwui ara̱-arā aphi eina ahuili ngasunhaira,
ahāwui ahuim ang leimaya.
Ili khalumashanmilu, ili khalumashan milu,
O iwui ngasotnaobing,
kaja Varewui pāngna iwuitungli rasāza̱haira!
Varena kasā thāda nathumna khisāda ili kakharomkhala?
Iphasāli nathumna ningyāng maungkharar khiwui vang khala?
Iyavo, iwui tui kapikhuisi kaja!
Iyavo, lairik akhali makapisangkapai!
Iyavo, lunghārtungli mariwui kala mishiwui kolom eina mashimānla manamsangkapai!
Kaja ina thei, ili ngatangkhame ringdalei,
kala naomeithuida ana okathuili nganingra;
iwui ahui chithada kazātna shaikahaiwui thili,
iwui asā eina ina Vareli theira.
Ali ina iwui ngalemli theilakra,
khangateina maningla imikna theilakra.
Iwui yāng kānhaira!
Kalikhada nathumna ‘Ali ithumna kathāda kharomra!’
kala, ‘Otshot hiwui angayung awuili lei’ jiakha;
raighai chili ngacheelu;
kaja malungkakangna raighai chiwui shongrān khuirai,
chieina nathumna mashun bichar leili da theikhuira.
Chieina Naamathwui Zopharna ngahānkai:
Chiwui vang iwui chukamajana ngahānkāmida lei,
iwui malungkakatungwui vang
Iwui hāngkhamachinli khamashat ina shāhaira,
kala iwui theishingkakhuiwui eina ili manglāna ngahānkāmi.
Okathuili mikumo kasāwui eina thuida,
achālakhawui eina nana hi matheirangla,
kaja makhayā miwui khāngkachikat kasha̱khawui vangna,
kala mashitkasangawui khamathān hunkhawui vang mānga kaji?
Awui kachui kazingram kāshunglala,
awui kui muiyā kāzoklala;
a khalattawui pai thāda ala katang mavaila shimānhaora;
ali theikasābingna a kali leili? da hāngra.
Ana mang thāda yongthuihaora,
kala masamphangluimara;
mha, ngayāshong mahākhami thada ali kashamhaora.
Ali katheia chinala ali matheiluimara;
awui pamkhavainala ali mayangluimara.
Anaongarāna kachāmabingwui lumkakā phāra,
kala akhalattawui pāngna awui lan hanmiluira.
Awui ara̱kui saikora yaronlakhawui pangshapna pemtinghai,
kha ali ngasoda chifalungli thihaora.
Makhayā ot chi akhamorli shimlala,
ana chi awui malezingli thumhailala;
kala ana chi sānhaida horhaingailala;
kala akhamorlungli ngahomlala,
awui zāt wukli mayui katā eina chi awui alungli
khalei phara̱wui kakhā hu ngasāhaowa.
Ana kashāng-kharei mayuisanglala, maloshokluiya;
awui wukwui eina Varena khuishokmihaowa.
Ana phara̱wui hu zimmangra;
hu kaphunga phara̱ malena ali mara̱thatra.
Khuira̱ eina makhan khalong,
kongrei kongrā khalong chi ana matheimara.
Ana vāsang kahai heiun chi hanmiluira kala chi mamayuisangmara,
kala ana leihkhalonwui tongkakhui eina ana ringkaphā masamphangmara.
Kaja ana kachāmabingli rekharekta horhaowa;
ana masākakā shim ana ngapaikhui.
“Khikhalajila awui kākharām chi katang mavaithuda,
ana ningkachāng ot akhala makazipkhuimara.
Ana zāsang kahaiwui thili khikha mataimana,
chiwui vang eina awui kashāng chi masangleimara.
Ana mavātlakthura kaji atamli kalāshāt rāra;
kachotkachāng saikorawui pangshap awuitungli rāra.
Ana thoting eina wuk chipemkhui khavai Varewui sākashi malungkathui awui kashakazā sāda awuitungli rotāra.
Ana mari zeighai ngahāwui eina yāmzatra,
kala pithraiwui malāna ali kāpngarui utra.
Ngakhunkhuida aphasāwui eina khuishokra,
kahānna malāton athiwui eina sutshoka;
awuitungli khangacheena pemhaowa.
Tangmangting kahai chi awui lanwui vang kaziphaira;
makhamita meina ali chuitāra,
awui shimli taikahai chila chuitā ngasakhaora.
Kazingramna awui khayonkhamāng phongmira;
kala okathuina ali mamayāmara.
Awui shimkhurli kazipsang kahai chi khuithuihaora,
Varewui malungkakang zimiksholi awui lan saikora longthuihaora.
Hi makhayā miwui yar Varewui eina kharāna,
awui vang Varena yartā kahai shimluina.
Chieina Jobna ngahānkai:
Iwui tui ningsangda nganālu,
kala hina nawui ningkhalem khavai sālu.
Ina hānglakha kasaikha pammilu,
kala ina hāngkhui kahaiwui thili mana̱shinaolu.
Ina maringkaphā phongkashok mili rinhaol?
Khisāda I makhāngsānmarakhala?
Ili yanglaga matakhakhailu,
kala nakhamor napāng eina kafalu.
Ina hi khamajuk tharan, I malungringa;
kala iphasā katonga kathira.
Kachiwui vang makaphābingna asārlam eina tangda okthui,
kala pangshap leilakhao?
Athumwui naongarā athum leilakha sakāserhaowa,
kala athumwui ara̱-azā,
rarkakā eina tangda thei.
Athumwui shimkhur ning tāphuphai,
kala Varewui lijei athumwuitungli maparmana.
Athumwui mukvāna khangalāt chi mashoingayaomana,
athumwui seiva̱na anao pharāda anaoli mahorhailakmana.
Athumna athumwui angangnaobingli yao ashangva̱ thāda chihoi,
kala athumwui naongarāna pheichak sai.
Athumna tambourine kala tingteilā singda laa sai,
kala sipa̱khon nganāda ringphai.
Athumna shāngshun eina okthui,
kala chingri eina Kathewui ramli vāhaowa.
Athumna Vareli hānga, ithumwui eina thuihaolu!
Ithumna nawui theithangkhameiwui shongfa chi maningchāngmana.
Sāshapvāshapa chi khida ithumna ali otram ngatha̱rakhala?
Kala ithumna ali seihā sāda khi kānkhanā samphangra?
Yanglu, athumwui mataikasang chi athumwui pāngli maleimala?
Makhayāwui hāngkachithei chi iwui eina katāvali lei.
Makhayāwui thaomei kayākhashida sāshimitkhala?
Athumli unshimui kayākha shida rākhala?
Varena awui malungkhavāt eina kachot mangayarmiserhaira?
Athum chi masiwui mangāli lanji kathā,
kala ahik siphanna phanthui kahai kathāla?
Awui khayonkhamāng anaongarāwui vang Varena kaziphaida lei da nathumna hānga.
Sāman chi akhalatta samphangranu,
chieina athumna theikhuira.
Kashimān chi athumwui mik eina theiranu,
kala pangshapawui malung kakang mangsangranu.
Athumwui okthot mapeila alungli katat kahai tharan,
athumwui shimkhurwui vang phaningmi khavai khi leikhala?
Juimeikap kajibinglila Varena bichar sai kaji theilaga ali khipāna awor tamchitheirakhala?
Kaikhana ringphālak eina kala tāphup eina okthuida reisanglak eina thi,
awui phasā thaotunhai,
kala ara̱kuiwui angatingla ya̱shohai.
Khangatei kaikhana ningwui kakhālungli shaikaphā kaho mamazaplakla thi.
Athum ngaraichāda ngaleili chifaya,
kala kachaina athumli rommithai.
Yanglu, nawui kaphaning kala ili nguingasakida kasā nawui khangarān ina thei.
Kaja “Wungnaowui shim kali lei?
Makhayā miwui apam kachili lei?” da nana ngahāna.
Shongfali kazatabingli na mangahānyangrangla,
kala athumna hāngkaphat chi na makhamayā maningmalā
kaja makhayābingli unshimui atamli huikhui,
kala malungkathui atamli kankhui kaji?
Khipāna khalattawui acham awui mangāli phongmishapra,
kala ana sākahai chi khipāna runshapra?
Ali chikhurli khuikhavā tharan mibingna awui chikhur mayonpama.
Tampākwui leitangbing chi awui vang shima;
mi saikorana athi shurvai,
awui mangāli khavābing chi mashānrarmana.
Chithākha nathumna ili khikha makhaninga
khamasai eina khi ningnganung ngasakra?
Nawui ngahankakā chi makhamashung maningla khikha maleimana.
Chiwui thili Temanwui Eliphazna ngahānkai:
Kachangkhatta thangkhama mi chi akhalattawui vang kānnā khavaina.
Nana khangarongana kajiwui vang Sāshap-pangshapali ningyāng ungkhavai leilā,
maningakha nana shāt makāthuwada awui vang tongkazā leila?
Nana ali khangacheewui vang,
ana nali hāngmachinda nali ana bichar kasāla?
Nawui makaphā makhayā mahakmahāmala?
Nawui khayonkhamāng katang mavaimana.
Kaja khikha makhaningwui vang nachināwui eina mikhavai khangashit nana khuihaira,
kala makhangavaibingwui kashankachon raithuimihaira.
Kachot kachāngbingli nana tara̱ mangkhavai mamimana,
kala kathaibingli zākhavai mamimana.
Pangshap khalei mi chiwui lam ngavai,
kala ngahānkhangaibingna chili okthui.
Ra̱meinaoli nana khamasai eina chihoi,
kala avāva̱ makhalei naobingwui pāngthei sātekmi.
Chiwui vang nali kuimareida khalen lei,
kala kashuirak eina nali khangacheena yuihaira;
namik mathei khavai kahor chi tangmang ngasakhaira,
kala tara̱ kaphongna nali kuinamhaira.
Vare kajuia kazingramli maleimala?
Juimeikap kaji sirā chili yanglu,
athum kayākha juikhala?
Chiwui vang nana hānga, “Varena khi theida?
Ana tangmangting eina bichar sāshaprala?”
Muiya kashā ali khaluiphinhaida chiwui vang ana matheimana,
ana kazing eina ngalei ngasun khavaipamli zata.
Makhayā mibingna zatkhavai shongfa kachama chili nana zatchingrala?
Athumle athumwui atam maungshungranglakha khuithuihaowa,
athumwui shimphunga pheothuihaira.
Athumna Vareli ithumwui eina thuihaolu,
Sashap-pangshapana ithumli khi sāshaprakhala? da hānga.
Chithālala ana athumwui shim khamathā otmāng eina chipemmi—
kha makhayāwui hāngkachithei chi iwui eina katāvali lei.
Khamashungbingna chi theida ringphai;
kala khayon makhaleibingna zeilaga mana̱shida,
ithumwui yangkashebing katathaira,
kala athumna nothā kahaibing chi meina chuitāhaira da hānga.
“Vareli mashitkhuida chingri eina pamlu;
chithākha nali kaphā chi rāra.
Akhamorwui eina tamkachithei chi khuilu,
kala awui tui naningli thumhailu.
Sāshap-pangshapali nana latungda nakhalattana hamsangakha,
khayonkhamāng saikora nashi shimwui eina katāvali khuithuihaiakha,
nana sinā chi chifali phumhaiakha,
kala Ophirwui sinā chi kongwui lunggui lungli phumhaiakha,
kala Sashap-pangshapali nawui aman kasaka sinā lupāna da phaningakha,
chitharan nana Sashap-pangshapali nakhalatta ringkaphā samphangra,
kala Vareli namai yangkānaora.
Nana ali seihā sāda, ana nali shāmira,
kala nana khangashit mira.
Nana sākida khangarān ot chi,
nawui vang ana sākāmira,
kala kahor china nawui shongfali hormira.
Kaja Varena langkaso chili nemtā ngasaka,
kha khangazana mi chili ana huimi.
Khayon makhaleibingli ana kanmira;
kala napāng katharwui vang nalila kanmira.”
Chieina Jobna ngahānkai;
Ajala iwui makhamayā khāshihai,
iwui ringkhangātungli awui kharita pāng parza̱da lei.
Iyavo, ali samphang khavai pam ina theisi kaje,
awui pamkhavaili vāpaisi kaje!
Iwui tuingaphun awui mangāli khuivāra,
kala iwui hāngkapapai ikhamor eina hāngserra.
Ana ngahānkāki kaji tui chi ina tamkhuira,
kala ana ili hāngki kaji chi theishingkhuira.
Awui hakkhamahā pangshap chi eina ili ngaphatrala?
Maningmana; ana ili nganāmira.
Chili mashungrik kahai mina ali ngasoda ngazek ngarokra,
kala iwui bichar sāmena mashimānda ili mashun mida chihora.
Yanglu, ina mangāshong vālala, a maleisāmana;
khanukshong unglala ali matheikhuirarmana;
Uishong ina ali phai, kha kathei masamphangmana;
yāshong ngareiunga, kha ali matheirarmana.
Kha ina kazat shongfa chi ana thei,
ana ili chāng yanghaiakha I sinā thāda shokra.
Ipheina awui pheichon yuntita;
ina awui thishurda mangareithuimana.
Amorchaiwui ningkhami chiwui eina ina mapākthuiranga;
akhamor eina kashok tui chi ina iwui kathuka ningli phārihaida lei.
Kha ava mangacheikapaiana,
khipāna ali ngachei ngasakshapra?
Awui ningkachāng chi ana sai.
Kaja iwui vang ngarānmi kahai chi ana kupsangmira,
kala chikathā kachungkha awui ningli lei.
Chiwui vang eina awui mangāli I
ngacheeshuna;
Ina khamachuk tharan, I ali ngacheelaka.
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja Varena ili
malung tātungngasaka;
Sāshap-pangshapana ili ngachee ngasaka;
kaja ili tangkhamang china khaluirorhai,
kala imaili tangmangting kahai china farormihai.
Sāshap-pangshapana khisāda bichar kasāwui atam makahaikhala,
kala ali katheibingna awui zimiksho khisāda matheithukhala?
Mibingna thari phura;
athumna yao ashangva̱ ngapaikhui kala chi hompama.
Marānaobingwui gadhā athumna kashammihai,
ra̱meinaowui mukkā tuingashit sākhavai khuimihai.
Kachāmabingli shongfawui eina heishoka;
okathuiwui kachāma saikorana athum khalatta yāmngathuma.
Yanglu, ram gadhāna siwukli kazat thāda athumna ot sāzata,
athumwui naongarāwui kashakazā sākhavai lamhāngli phāzata.
Athumna luili seizāt phāzata,
kala makaphābingwui drakhā yāmguili atham phāzata.
Athumna kachon mafasangla khamasai eina ngayā pongda piya,
kasik atamlila kachon mangavaimana.
Kaphungwui zingrotra̱na athum ya̱sophai,
kala ngayin khavai maleithuda lunghārli ngayinkhui.
(Avāva̱ makhalei nao chili mathikwui eina ngapaikhui,
kala leiman chiwui vang kachāmawui nao chi khuithuimihai.)
Athumna kachon mangavaila mahonghat eina zata;
kala kathai eina māvām vamzata;
Makhayābingwui olive yāmguili athumna thao shireiya;
athumna atheira̱ shunglala ra̱changa.
Keinung ayarli thikida khaleibingna ringngai,
kala khamā kaza̱bingwui manglāna khangachon poi;
chithālala Varena athumwui seihā kasā mashāmimana.
Kahorli ngakaikashi mi kaikha lei,
athum chiwui shongpong matheimana,
kala chiwui shongfali mazatmana.
Shaokathata china tangkhamangli ngakarthuiya,
kachāma khavātabingli sāthat khavai;
ngayāshong khale akha ngasāhaowa.
Phokaphā miwui mik chinala māmāchā kahai atam ngaraida hānga,
mik akhanala ili matheimara;
kala azak mathei khavai maili kachon kuiruna.
Tangkhamangli athumna miwui shimli leiutkai;
ngashunshonga shimli pamda athumna kahor matheimana.
Kaja athum saikorawui vang tangmangting kahai hi ngathorna,
kaja tangmangting kahaiwui khangachee hi athumwui khavāknaona.
Nathumna hānga, athumli thaklāk eina tara̱tungli khuivāhaowa;
athumwui yar lam chili khonshihaowa;
athumwui drakhā yāmguili surkhami khipākha mavāmana.
Kazing kakāng eina kasāna phāmra̱ thengngasaka;
chithāda Kathewui ramna morei kasābingli khuithuihaowa.
Keinungwui kayāngkhareina athumli malaihaowa;
athumwui ming maphaningungluimana;
chithāda makaphā makhayā chi thingkatek thāda tekngasaka.
“Athumna nao kashum kala nao makhalei sha̱naobingli uipamda,
ra̱meinaoli kapha khikha masāmimana.
Kha kapanga athumli Varewui pangshap eina okpeingasaka;
mirinwui ningkachot atamli athumna ngakarthui.
Ana athumli ningtāphuphai ngasaka, kala ana athumli katommiya;
kala awui mikna athumwui kazazatpamli yangmi.
Athumli kasha̱kha maiyā ngasaka,
hunkhawui thili shimānhaowa;
thingnā-ra̱hā thāda ngahuiya kala thenghaowa;
māmazan thāda athumli hātkhuihaowa.
Chimathasi kaje, I kapikhaira da khipāna hāngshapra;
kala ina kahāng hili khikha maningmana da chitheishaprala?”
Chieina Shuhwui Bildadna ngahānkai:
“Pangshap eina khangachee Varewuili lei;
atungshong awui kazingli ana chingrihai ngasaka.
Awui raimi mashing shānshapla?
Khipāwuitungli awui kahor mashokmimakhala?
Chithākha Varewui mangāli mina kathāda mashungpaira?
Sha̱naona kapharā mi chi kathāda tharpaira?
Yanglu, kachāng eina tangda mahormana,
kala awui mangāli sirāla matharmana;
chithākha mathan kathā mina,
kala miwui naomayara,
kachai kathāna kayākha suitāmeira!”
Chieina Jobna ngahānkai:
Pangshap makhaleiya chili nana kathāda ngachonmihaira!
yāng makhalei pāngthei chili kathāda huimihaira!
Thangkhamei makhalei mi chili nana kathāda hāngchitheihaira,
kala khavāt maleilakla theikhui ngasakhaira!
Khipāwui khangachon eina nana khamatui,
kala khipāwui manglā nawui eina shok?
Azingshong khalei khaya̱,
tara̱ kala chili khalei saikora chila nganuka.
Varewui mangāli Kathewui ram mahonghathaiya,
kala Abaddon faror khavai maleimana.
Ana atungshong khamasaili katingshanga,
kala okathui hi khamasaitungli hokthanghai,
Ana muiyā kashāli tara̱bing romhai,
kala muiyā chi makāklakmana.
Ana kachāngwui mai fakhamhaida,
awui muiyā eina khayinmi.
Ana tara̱tungli leiret akha sāmihai,
kahor eina tangkhamang ngachaili.
Kazingramwui pākra̱bing nganuka,
kala awui kakhararli ngacheeranghai.
Awui pangshap eina ana shamadru va̱rihai ngasaka;
awui theikakhui eina Rahabli ngaphita.
Awui khaksui eina kazingram malimathai;
awui pāngna yāmkazata phara̱li rungthata.
Yanglu, hibing hi awui themsakwui ayarnao kathāna,
kala awui khon kayākha teoda ithumna shāli!
Kha awui pangshapwui kazing khangashum chi khipāna theishingkhuirarrakhala?
Kala ngazek khangarokwui pong chili Jobna hānglui:
“Varena katheina, ana iwui mashun khuithuimihaowa.
kala Sāshap-pangshapna imanglāli khanang ngasaklala;
ina khaksui kateokha leilakha eina tangda,
kala Varewui manglāna ili khak suingasaklakha eina tangda;
imorchaina kakapik tui mamatuimara,
kala imalena mikhanam tui mahāngmara.
Na mashunga da ina kachilikha mahānglakmara;
I mathiranglakha eina tangda iwui ningsākhangazip machiholakmara.
Ina iwui khamashung khangarongli singtita, kala machihomara;
imanglāna thangkhanidawui vang mahāngmachinlakmana.
Iwui yangkashe chi makhayā mi kathā ngasāranu,
kala ili mamayāmada khangasunga chi makhamashunga ngasāranu.
Kaja Varena ali katat kahai tharan,
awui manglā Varena khuithui kahai tharan,
vare makhaleiyawui kachihān khikhala?
Kasak kharā tharan,
awui khangakao Varena shāmirala?
Sāshap-pangshapali ana mathānrala?
Ana Vareli ngakaochingrala?
Ina Varewui otsak apongli nathumli tamchitheira;
Sāshap-pangshapawuili khalalei ina mathumlakmara.
Yanglu, nathum saikora khalattana hi theihaira;
chithākha khisāda nathum arema ngasāserhao?
Varewuili hi makaphā miwui yarna,
kala rekakharekabingna Sāshap-pangshapawui eina shimluikat samkaphangna.
Awui naongarā mataisanglala,
chiya raighaiwui vangna;
kala awui naotunbingna zāvaishap maleisāmana.
Ali thili kathibingli mimaona chithita,
kala athumwui ra̱meiva̱bingna machapngachāmana.
Ana lupāsā chifa thāda kaziphailala,
kala kashankachon leikhon thāda khorhailala;
ana kaziphaisālapai, kha
khamashungabingna ngavaira,
kala khayon makhaleibingna lupāsā chi ngayarhaora.
Ana sākakā shim chi karkaopān kathāna,
raikānwui rāmnao kathāna,
Ana kashānga ngasāda petli pilapai,
kha chi mathāchingmara;
amik thuikharak eina awui lan katonga maleisāthuwa.
Khangachee khangachana tara̱ kaphong thāda ali yuihaowa;
ngayāshong surna ali khuithuihaowa.
Zingshoshongwui masina ali khuithuihaida shimānhaowa;
awui apamwui eina phanthuihaowa.
Lukhamashan maleila ali kahaitāhaowa;
pangshap chiwui eina ana kui khāngda yāma.
China ali pāng kapherora kala apam chiwui eina ali kasirora.
Kachangkhat eina lupāsā shokkhavai pam lei,
kala sinā langkhavai pam lei.
Mari hi ngaleiwui eina samphanga,
kala pithrai maringalungwui eina mengkhui.
Tangkhamang kathukli khalei mariyur,
achikun matili phākhuida tangkhamang chi mina tangngasakhaowa.
Mi pamda khaleiwui eina lāchāda athumna tampākli leikhur phuta;
athumli ram kazatbingna malaihaowa,
miwui eina katāva̱li hokthanghaida ngayitung ngayitva sai.
Ngaleitungwui eina kashakazā shoka;
kha ngaleizingshong mei thāda chuiya.
Chiwui lungguibing chi sapphirewui apamna,
kala sināwui akha̱la lei.
Apong chi sā kashaiya vānaona matheimana;
kala khalāngwui mikna matheiranga.
Sakashe sāyurna chili mazatlakranga;
kazingkha̱la chili makānlakranga.
Mina meizailungli sāza̱da,
kaphung aphei zangshungda phuta.
Lunghārli ana shongfa sākhui,
kala amankasaka ot amikna theisera.
Kongbing ana phinhaida mangayishokmana,
kala ngathum kahai ot chi ana kahorli khuishoka.
Kha thangkhamei kali samphangra?
Kala theishingkakhuiwui apam kali leili?
Mina chiwui apong matheimana,
kala chi kharingbingwui lamli masamphangmana.
Kathukana hānga, chi iwuili maleimana,
kala shamadruna hānga, chi iwuili mazangmana,
Sinā eina malopaimana,
lupāsā eina aman sāda mangatampaimana.
Ophirwui sinā eina mangachākpaimana;
aman kasaka onyx kala sapphire einala.
Sinā eina mingshennala mangaraichārarmana;
chili lāngda kasaka sināwui chara̱-chasān einala mangatha̱paimana.
Kahana coral lah mathingri kahai einala mapāntampaimana;
thangkhameiwui aman pearlli mataimei.
Ethiopiawui topaz eina chāng tamkapai maleimana,
chili lāngda sinā kashenga einala aman mangachākpaimana.
Chithakha thangkhamei kachi eina rākhala?
Kala theishingkakhuiwui pam kali leikhala?
Chi kharinga saikorawui mik eina thummihaira,
kala yongkazata vānaobingwui eina thumhaida lei.
Abaddon eina Kathina hānga,
hiwui pongli kakharop ithumwui khanā eina shāhaira.
Hiwui apong Varena thei;
kala chiwui apamla ana thei.
Kaja ana okathuiwui katanga eina tangda theivai;
kala kazingli khalei saikora theisera.
Masili ana kharitkhami kala tara̱li ngarakkhami tharan;
ana kazing rokhavai kala kazing ngashumda rikhān ngashei khavai kakaso tharan;
ana chi theida hānga; ana sākakhuina,
kala ana phākashokna.
“Yanglu,
kala makaphā horkahai hi theishingkakhuina.”
Jobna latluida hānglui.
Iyavo, khare kachāng,
Varena ili yangkhami chithāda leisasi kaje chāng;
awui thaomei na ikuili hormida;
tangkhamang lungli awui kahorli zatvākapai thāda;
Varena ili ngasotnao sāmida iwui shimli yangmilakha;
iwui mirin maholak eina leilakha;
Sāshap-pangshapana ili ngasomida inao ngarā ili ngayurpamlakha;
iwui pheichonbing seina̱ eina pheoda,
kala ngalungna iwui vang thao woklakha chi!
Ina keinungwui ngavei kanvāda,
yāngreili pamkhavai ngarānda leilakha;
yaronnaobingna ili theida hanthuihaowa,
kala kasarnaobingla nganingkai;
wungnaobingna mamatuilengmada,
apāng eina khamor kafahai;
khangambingwui khonla vihaowa,
kala athumwui male khamorlungli katimsanga.
Khanā eina kashābingna, ili kalākhamahai hoi,
mikna kathei tharan mayai;
khikhalajila kachāmana khangakao tharan ina kanshokmi,
kala avāva̱ makhaleiali ngachon khavai makhalei tharan,
Ina ngachonmi.
Thihaoki kaji miwui sokhami ili tāshungmi,
kala ra̱meiva̱wui ningli khamathānwui vang ina laa sāngasaka.
Ina khamashung khangarong chi sangda china kashankachon thāda ngavaimi;
iwui mashun wungnao kachon eina kuitei thai.
Ina mik khangapeobingwui mik sāmi,
phei katekbingwui phei sāmi.
Kachāmabingwui vang ina avāva̱ ngasāmi,
kala ina makatheiya a chiwui vang maram phākhuimi.
Makhamashung miwui hu khalei ahā chi,
ina sātekmida ana sheikaphung sāshai chi akhamor eina hortā ngasaka.
Chieina ina hithāda, iwui mirinwui zimiksho situiyākha mataisangda,
iwui athipli thisangra;
iwui angayung tara̱ khaleipam ngayao vāda,
aphāng kachiva̱ ngayā pongda ikra̱ zimda,
iwui malā dharlak eina ipangli leichingra,
kala iwui tekhamatei khayā nganaozaohaichingra da phaningsai.
Mibingna ili nganāsanga,
iwui hāngkachitheili chingri eina nganākhui.
Ina hāngkahaiwui thili athumna mamatuiluimana,
kaja iwui tui athumna khuisanga.
Zingrot honkapam thāda athumna iwui tui honpama;
kala mayo kachāng tara̱ ningkachāng thāda,
athum khamor makāpama:
Athumna mashitsangkharar tharan,
ina mana̱rimhaida;
iwui ningngai khamathā chi athumna horkahai masāmana.
Athumwui shongfa ina phāmi,
kala akhavā thāda pama,
kala ina awunga akhana awui raimiwui lungli somkapam thāda,
kala chapkhangachā mili ning lumkhangasak thāda sai.
Kha ara athumna ili ngareo nganaohaira;
ili nganuikhameibing,
athumwui avāva̱ ngarāli iwui yaoshangli
ngakuikazata fa eina tangdalila mazatrum ngasak khangaibing chi.
Yāng makakā athumwui pāng eina khi kānkhanā samphangrakhala?
Thaichāmhaoda athumna ngaleikatheng manirkachupa;
athumna thingnā-ra̱hā rāmshaiya,
shimphut thingwui angayung eina athumna lumkhavai sai.
Mibingwui eina athumli kashamhaowa;
kala khaleli khavao thāda athumwuili vaowa.
Athum palongkhur, ngaleikhur,
lungkhurli somphalungrali.
Athumna khararlungli ngavaowa,
ka̱shāt zingli ngahei kaziruma.
Ning makhalei, khayā makhangarin nao thāda,
ngalei chiwui eina athumli kashamhaowa.
Ara I athumwui laaphor sānganaohaira,
athumwui chānjam sānganaohaira.
Ili ningkachaida athumna iwui eina tāthuihaira;
ili kathei eina machora̱ mashororkida katharin maleithura.
Khikhalajila Varena ili hamsang khavai iwui khara̱ sāchatmihaoda,
athum ili theilaga malungkhavāt makhāmrarthuwa.
Iwui yāshong yarui ashangva̱na ili kashama,
kala ili shimān khavai shongfa phai.
Iwui shongfa sāphinhaida kachotkachāng mataisang ngasaka;
khipānakha athumli makhāmmimana.
Kakai akhurwui eina longkhaung thāda athumna rai;
khaningkachupta longthuihaowa.
Khangacheena ili pemhaowa;
iwui khayākakāli masikaphan thāda kharoma,
kala ina mathuikakhui muiyā thāda kānthuiserhaira.
Ara iwui ningli khalei imanglā yurhaira;
kakhanang atamna ili singtithaira.
Ngayāna ira̱kui chāngkharenga;
kala ili khamakei kathā khangashei china mangasāmkhuimana.
China iwui phahon yonkhuida;
phahon thāda ikahungli hokthanga.
Varena ili rāhuklungli horsanghaira,
kala I chifa hotlākathā ngasāhaira.
Ina nali ngakaowa kha nana mangahānkāmimana;
ina nganingkālala matheimimana.
Na ili sāshilak kahai ngasāthuihaira;
napāngwui pangshap china ili rekhareka.
Nana ili masitungli khāngkai,
kala nana ili chili tongngasaka;
kala siphan zingrot khangashumlungli ili phanung phanvā ngasaka.
Mha, nana ili chithitra,
kala kharing saikorawui vang haikhami shim chili khuivāra.
Kha ngayānglaga khum kahaipamli khalei
ana kalāshāt atamli ngachonmi khavai pāng maphayaishokmala?
Saklak eina okthuikasā awui vang ina machapmala?
Kachāmawui vang ining machotmala?
Kha ina kaphā phākazat tharan makaphā rai;
kala ina kahor honakha tangkhamang rai.
Ining ningrākhaowa, va̱ri mahailakthura;
kakhanang kachot atamna ili rāngarokhaira.
Ina yumsi eina zata, kha zinghāmna maningmana,
yarui kazipli ina thuinganingda ngachonmi khavai vaowa.
I ramfawui achinā ngasāthuihaira,
kala ostrichbingwui khavāknao sāhaira;
Iwui ahui kānghaida ngahokshokhaira;
ira̱kuina mei thāda chui.
Iwui lyre sikafa sāthuihaira;
iwui sipa̱khon kachapa athumwui khon sāthuihaira.
Imikli ina khangashit sāhaira, laga,
ina kachingva̱ akhali kathāda yangpaira?
Atungshong Varewui eina iwui yar,
kala kajuili kapama Sāshap-pangshapawui eina iwui shimluikat khi leira?
Makhangarongawuitungli kalāshāt matāmala;
kala kalākashi khayonkhamāng kasābingwui maningmala?
Ana iwui shongfa theida pheikār saikora mashānhaimala?
Ina khangui otsakli zatta,
ipheina mikhanamli shurakha;
(Chiwui vang ili chālak kahai tamkhavai eina onranu,
kala Varena iwui ningsākhangazip theiranu!)
Iwui pheikārna shongfa chiwui eina thuihaiakha,
kala iningna imikwui thi shurakha,
ipangli achuk akha eina tangda kāsākha;
ina yaora, kateina zāranu;
kala iwui vang kakhar theishirai phurthathaoranu.
Iwui ningna sha̱nao akhali ningchānghaida,
khongnainaowui khāmongli ina rimsākha;
ipreiva̱na kateiwui mā rungmiranu,
kala kateina ali ngasopiranu.
Kaja chi masākapai yomna;
hikathā morei kasāli bichar kasābingna tandi mira;
kaja chi Abaddonwui mei kathāna,
kala china iwui mataikasang angayung vāshungda chuitāra.
Iwui rao sha̱nao,
lah rao mayarnaona maringkaphā phongkashok tui
khuirāda ina makhuisangmiakha;
Varena thuikhanganing tharan ina khi sāra,
kala khi ngahānkāra?
Ili naopamli kasema china alila kasā maningmala?
Kala ithumli naopamli ngaraichāda
ana sāser kaji maningmala?
Kachāmana ningkachāng ina singshānhaiakha,
lah rameiva̱wui mik ngapeo ngasakakha,
lah imang mortong salaga,
avāva̱ makhaleibingli mamizaakha,
(kaja a nganuilakhawui eina ina avāva̱ sāda ali nganaokhui,
kala ava̱va̱wui naopamwui eina thuida ina ali thānmi);
kachon mangavaimada thikahai,
lah fapi khavai makhalei kachāma mi theiakha,
aphasāna ili masomiakha,
kaja iwui yaohah kachon eina a khalum masamphangakha,
ngaveipheili ili khangachona leili kajiwui vang
avāva̱ makhaleiali ipāng kākha;
chikathāwui vang iyartuiwui ara̱kui chakshokhaoranu;
kala ipāngthei chakshokhaoranu.
Kaja I Varewui eina unshimui rāki kajili ngacheeya,
kala awui ngam chili mai mangasungrarmara.
Sināli ina ningshai khavai,
lah sinā kachangli iwui kachihān ngasāhaiakha,
iwui lan kachungkha khaleiwui vang,
lah ipāngna kachungkha samphanghaowada ina mathānsākha;
zimik kahor chi theilaga kachāngna mathingrik kazat chi yanglaga,
ngathumda iningna malungchāngda,
kala khalatta pāngli maya̱khuiakha,
hila moreina da bichar kasābingna tandi mipai,
kaja atungshongwui Vareli ina makhamayā ngasāhaora.
Ili yangkakharing miwui kashimānli ina mathānakha,
lah ali kalākashi kharā tharan ringphaakha
(Awui mirin khonshimihaoluda poda ina ikhamorli morei masa ngasakmana);
iwui kachonshimi kaleia china “awui sā shaida mathorang kaji mi khipā leikhala? da
mahāngrangsaakha,
(kha̱mi khipākha ayarli mangasāmmana,
ramkazatawui vang ina iwui khāmong shomihai);
iwui khayonkhamāng miwui eina thumhaida iwui morei imakāli thumhaiakha,
khikhalajila yaruili ngacheenā haoda,
kala shimkhurwui kakaharli ngacheehaoda,
chiwui vang ina kayāng mashoklengla
shimlungli kasaikha pamhaiakha—
Iyavo, ili nganāmi khavai akha leisāsi kaja chong!
(Hi iwui shoina!
Sāshap-pangshapa china ili ngahānkāra!)
Iyavo, iwui yangkashena ili kaphen akha leisi kaja chāng!
Kachangkhat ina chi iyartuili ngava̱ra;
kuihon thāda ikuili ngahonra;
iwui kasā saikora apong ali hāngserra;
wungnao akha thāda ali asamphangra.
“Kalikhada iwui luina ili mamayāmada,
kala tinkhurbing china chaprumakha,
aman mamila ina chiwui heithei khuishaida
akhavāli chithit haiakha,
māwui mahut ka̱shat kharranu,
nāpaiwui mahut khawo kharranu.”
Jobwui tui ngachang haira.
Chithāda ashi kathum china Jobli ngahankakā ngasāmhaowa, khikhalajila akhalattawui miktāli a khangarongana.
Chieina Ramwui shimkhur, Buzli khalei Barachelwui naomayara Elihuna malungvāthaowa. Ana Jobli malungvāta kaja Varena mashunga majila awui mashunli nganinghaowa;
ana Jobwui ngasotnao kathumlila malungvāta kaja Job yonhaira da phongshokhailaga ali ngahānkā khavaiva maleithuwa.
Elihuna Jobli ngazek khavai ngarai, kaja athumna ali rarmei.
Kala athum kathumna ngahānkā khavai makhalei chi kathei tharan Elihu malungvāthaowa.
Barachelwui nao Elihuna ngahānkai:
“I zingkum einava nganuifaya, nathum khararnaomanga;
chiwui vang eina iwui kaphaning
nathumwui mangāli mahāngkhalengna.
Ina kahangva, ‘Atamna matuimiranu,
zingkumna thangkhamei tamchitheiranu.’
Kha Sashap-pangshapawui khaksui mi akhawuili kazang manglā china ali theishingkhui khangasakna.
Khararnaomang thangkhamei maningmana,
kasarnaomang mashun chi kathei maningmana.
Chieina ina kahāngna, ‘Ili nganāmilu;
ilila iwui kaphaning kahāngshok ngasakmilu.’
“Yanglu, nathumna khi hāngnikhala da ngaraiya,
nathumna khi hangra̱khala da apong phālaga,
nathumwui thangmei tui chi ina nganāpama.
Ina nathumwui tui nāshumda nganai, kala yanglu,
Jobli khipānakha mangaphatrarmana;
lah awui tuili nathum mangahānkārarmana.
Ning ngasharlu,
‘Ithum thangkhamei samphanghaira;
mina maningla Varena ali ngahānkara’
da hāngpaishina.
Ana awui tui ili marinmana,
kala ina nathumwui tuimatui eina ali mangahānkāmara.
“Athum khakshingakhaira, mangahānkāthura;
tuikhurkhala hāngkhavai maleithura.
Athumna makhamatuiwui vang,
ina ngaraifarala,
kaja athumna chili nganinglaga mangahānkamana?
Ila iwui ngahānkāra;
iwui kaphaningla phongshokra.
Ila hāngkhavai pemda lei,
Kaja iwuili khalei manglana ili kasatmida lei.
Yanglu, iwui ning hi asham makhavai drakhāra̱ kathāna;
kadhara drakhāra̱ sangkhavai khao thāda ngawokkhaiki jihaira.
Ning taphik haikhavai hāngphalungrali;
ikhamor makāda ngahānkāra̱li.
Khipālikha mijang masāmara,
lah khipālikha masot mamimara.
Kaja iya kathāda sotmasaorakhala da matheimana,
ina chi saakha iwui Kasā Akhavāna ili thaklak eina khuithuihaora.
Kha ara, iwui tui nganaulu, O Job,
kala iwui tui saikora nganākhuilu.
Yanglu, ikhamor makāda,
imale eina khamatuina.
Iwui tuina iwuklungwui mashungrik kahai kachitheina;
kala imorchaina kathei chi ningkathar tui khamatuina.
Varewui manglāna ili sai,
Sāshap-pangshapawui khaksuina ili ringngasaka.
Nana shapakha ili ngahānkālu;
iwui mangāli tui chi khare khanao sāda haikhuilu;
machukkhuilu;
Yanglu, ila nawui thāda Vareli yangda lei;
ilila leikhonnao eina sākakhuina.
Yanglu, ili khangacheena nali machipaaranu;
iwui otsak hina nawuivang kharita mangasāranu.
Mhah, imiktāli nana hānghaira,
kala nawui khamatuikhon ina shāhaira.
Nana, ‘I thara, morei maleimana,
I tharzāhai, khayonkhamāng iwuili maleimana.
Yanglu, ana ili phenkhavai apong phai,
ili awui yangkashena da shānkhui;
kala iwui kazazatli ana yanga’ da hānga.
Yanglu, hili na mamashungmana,
nali ina ngahānkāra.
Varena mili reimei.
Ana iwui tui akhala mangahānkāmara da
nana kathāda ali phaningpaira?
Kaja Varena apong akha eina hāngriya,
laga apong khangatei akha einala hānga,
chithālala mina mamachukmana.
kala rākhamahāli,
ana mibingwui khanā mathing ngasakta,
hāngmachinda ngachee ngasaka,
mina awui otsakwui eina ngateithui khavai,
kala miwui eina langkaso khuithuihai khavai;
Chomwui eina amanglā thummi,
raighaina amanglā mashimān khavaina.
Mili hāngmachinda pettungli pingasaka,
ara̱kui ngasheishon ngasheithai ngasaka;
chiwui vang mirinli zāt mazāngaimana,
zākaphāla khamor mashimmana.
Asā thenghaida matheirarmana,
matheikasā ara̱-arā theisera.
Awui manglāna Chomli
kala awui mirin kathi khuikharabingli vānganaiya.
Thingkhawui ngachaili tuisak sāme,
miwui mashun hina da chitheikhame,
kazingrao akha awui vang leisasi kaje;
kala ana ali lumashanmida hānga,
Kathichom lungli zanghaoki kajiwui eina ali kankhuilu,
Ina ngatangman akha samphanghaira;
awui aphi yaronlakhawui thāda ungranu;
kala yaronlakhawui pangshap thāda ungluiranu da hāngsi kaje,
chieina mina Vareli seihā sāda ali khuisangmi,
awui khaleipamli mathānthup eina ana rai.
Awui huikhami tui mili hāngchitheiluiya,
kala miwui mangāli laa sāda ana hānga,
khamashungli yonngasakta ina morei sāhaira,
kala chiwui eina ili yangmihaowa.
Chomli zangki kajiwui eina ana imanglā ngatangkhui,
kala iwui rinna kahor chi theira.
Yanglu, saikora hi Varena kasāsera,
mi akhali khanishi, kathumshi shokhaira,
kharingawui kahor chi theikhavai,
Chomwui eina awui manglā chi khuiungmiluiya,
O Job, nganātitkhuimilu, ili nganālu,
kasaikha pamlu, ina hāngga.
Nana hāngkhavai leiakha ili ngahānkālu,
hānglu, kaja ina nali mashungmingai.
Maningakha, nganālu, kasaikha pamlu,
ina nali thangmei tamchitheira.
Chieina Elihuna hānga:
Thangkhamabing, iwui tui nganālu,
katheiabing nathum, ili nganāmilu;
khanāna tui tamyanga.
Khamashung chi ithum kapangkhuisa;
kaphā chi khikhala da ithum khalatta theikhuisa.
Kaja Jobna hānga, ‘I khayon maleimana,
laga Varena iwui mashun khuithuihaira;
iwui mashun leileilaga ili kakapikli shānsanga;
iwui sākhalāng maleilaga iwui khamā maraikapai ngasāda lei,
Job kathā mi,
zeikakharuili tara̱ thāda khamanga,
makaphā kasā mibingli khangayur,
kala makhayābingli yaothuikharuma khipā leikhala?
Kaja ana hānga,
Vareli ringphā khangasakli mina tongkazā maleimana.
Chiwui vang eina nganālu, theithangkhamabing!
Varena makaphā masāmana,
Sāshap-pangshapana khangui masāmana.
kala awui apong athishurda hi awuitungli tāra.
Kachangkhat eina Varena zakkashi ot masālakmana,
kala Sāshap-pangshapana mashunli mangui ngasakmara.
Khipāna okathui hi ali chisin,
kala apuk-apagva̱̱
katonga hi awui pāngli haimikhala?
Awui manglā a khalattana khuiluihaosi kaje,
khaksui hanthuihaosi kaje,
asā khavai saikora shimānrumserhaora,
mikumo chifa sāthuiluihaora.
Nana theikhui kathei leiakha, hi shākhuilu,
Ina kahāng nāshunglu.
Mashunli ningkakachaiya china mungrala?
Khamashunga kala sāshapa,
awunga akhali ‘Makānkhanā’ kala khangamali
‘Makaphā mi’ da kahānga,
wungnaoli mijang makazanga;
kachāmali lāngda kashāngali khayākashe, chili nana yonngasakrala, kaja saikora hi
awui pāng eina kasā maningmala?
Mik khayipkhawui alungli athum thihaowa;
ngayāsailung sheikhanukta athum thuiserhaipai,
kala pangshapabingli mipang makhaning eina khuithuihaowa.
Kaja miwui kazatpam chi amikna thei,
kala awui pheikār saikora ana theisera.
Makaphākasā mina athum khalatta ngathum khavai khangami kala tangmangting kahai maleimana.
Kaja Varewui bicharli vākhavai
ana mi akhawui vang atam mangachākhaimana.
Pangshap khaleiali mangathinglakla katangtai,
kala athumwui pam khangateili mi.
Hithāda athumwui ot kasā theiserda thangngayākhali
athumli mashongacheimihaida athum akha̱ sāngasakhaowa.
Athumwui makaphāwui vang miwui mangāli tandi mi,
khikhalajila awui thi mashurthuda,
kala awui kakaso manganāthuda;
kachāmawui kachap ali shavāngasaka;
kala ringkashibingwui ringkhangā ana shai—
Ana kasaikha khalei tharan,
khipāna ali khayon phenra?
Amai ngathum kahai tharan,
mi akharanu, yurranu,
khipāna theirarrakhala?—
kaja vare makathei mina mamungpaimara,
mibingli khalen masangphalung mara.
“Kaja kachikathāna Vareli, ‘Ili hāngmachin kahaina,
khayon masāluimara;
ina makathei chi tamchitheimilu;
ina morei sāhaiakha masāluilakmara,
da hānghairala?
Laga nana chi makhamayāwui vang,
nali bichar sākhavai ana poluirala?
Na khalatta kapangkhuilu; ina masāmimara;
chieina nawui kathei chi hānglu.
Theithangkhamabingna ili hāngra, kala
ili nganāda khalei thangkhama mina hāngra:
‘Jobna theikakhui maleila hānga,
awui tuili kathuk tui mazanglakmana.’
Makaphā miwui thāda khamatuiwui vang,
Jobli katang eina tangda chotngasaksi kaja chong!
Kaja ana morei tungli ngakaikashi ngarora:
ithumwui alungli ana pāng kapheya,
kala Vareli makhamayā tui mataisang ngasaka.”
Kala Elihuna hānga:
“Hi mashunga da na phaningla?
‘Varewui mangāli hi iwui mashunna’
kajilamā,
kaja nana ngahāna, ‘Iwui katong khi lei?
Ina morei sāhairakha phākhamei khi lei?’
Nali kala nali ngasopamda khalei
ngasotnaobingli ina ngahānkāga:
Kazingli ngashānkāda yanglu;
kala nathumli juikhamei muiyā chili yanglu.
Kala nana chonmakānchingakha, nana ali khi sākhala?
Nana ngarongakha, ali khi mi;
lah napāngwui eina ana khi samphangkhala?
Nawui zakkashina kateili khanang ngasaka,
kala nana kaphā kasā china athumli ngachonmi.
“Khikhalajila rekakharek chungnā kahaiwui vang mina chapa;
sāshapabing chili mayuithuda ngachonkhami poi.
Kha khipanakha ‘Ili Kasaa,
ngayā laa sākhangasaka,
okathuiwui sāyurli lāngda ithumli tamchitheikhame,
kazingramwui vānaoli mataimeida ithumli thangmei khangasaka,
Vare chi kali leikhala’ da mangahānmana?
Athumna ringngai,
kha makaphā miwui langkasowui vang eina
ana mangahānkāmimana.
Kachangkhat eina pophāphā kajili
Varena manganāsangmana,
Sāshap-pangshapa china mahengsangmana.
Chithākha, nana ali namik eina matheimana da hāngda leilaga
nali kayakha suitāda nganāmira,
kaja tuingaphun chi awui pāngli lei, kala na ali ngaraida lei!
Arui awui malungkhavātna tandi mamithuda,
kala morei kasāli tarākha manganāsangmithuda,
Jobna khamor makāda hangphāphai,
kala ana thangkhamei maleila tui mataisang ngasaka.
Elihuna hānglui:
“Khānglaga ili kasha̱kha nganāmilu,
Ina hāngmiga,
kaja Varewui mathun eina khikakha
hāngkhavai khaleifaya.
Iwui aworkathem katonga katāwui eina phākhuira,
kala ili Kasaali khamashung khangarong mira.
Kaja iwui tui hi khangui maninglakmana,
awor themlāk kahaiya akha nali ngayurpamda lei.
“Yanglu, Vare hi sāshap-pangshapana,
ana khipālikha machinmana;
theishingkakhuiwui pangshap leilaka.
Makhayāli ana maring ngasakmana,
kha kakhanang athumli mashun mi.
Khamashungwui eina awui mik mangareithuimana,
kha awungabingli ngasoda wungpamkhongli
katang mavaila athumli chipamlaga khayā kāngasaka.
Kala athumli mari khanghuili khalapta,
kakhanangwui khara̱li manhaikha,
athumna lāngsolak eina kasā, athumwui sākhalāng,
kala athumwui otsak chi ana phongchitheimi.
Hāngkhamachin shākhui ngasaka,
kala moreiwui eina mai ngareiung khavai ningmi.
Athumna kahāng nganāda ali otram ngatha̱akha,
athumna mirin peida khavāt maleilakla peida okthuiya.
Kha athumna manganāsangakha,
raighai eina shimāna,
kala theithangkhamei maleila thiya.
“Vare makathei mina malungkhavātli akachang sai,
athumli ana kakhalap tharan,
ngachonmi khavai mangakaomana.
Athum yaronshap eina thi,
kala athumwui mirin
khayākhamalā eina ngachanghaowa.
Kakhanangbingli kachotwui eina kankhui,
kala chotchān eina khanā mathing ngasaka,
Kakhanang ringkashiwui eina
khamashā apamli ana nali khuishoka,
kala nawui tableli kashakazā rungkhami chi
khamathāmāngna pemtinghai.
“Kha nava makhayaali bichar pemtinghai;
bichar eina mashunna nali singhaira.
Ning ngasharlu,
maningakha malung khavatna nali mana̱kashili ngakhunsangra;
kala ngatangmanna kachung china nali mangareithuihai ngasakaranu.
Nawui kachapna kachotkachāngwui eina,
lah nawui yāng pangshap saikorana
nali ngachonmishaprala?
Yurbingli athumwui pam eina katathaoki kaji ngayā chili mangaraipamalu.
Ningngasharlu, moreili mazangalu,
hiwui vang kachotkachāngli langkhamei nana kapangkhuihaira.
Yanglu, Vareli awui pangshapli khāngchikata,
a kathā chishutme khipā leida?
Awui vang awui apong khipāna phāmi,
lah na yonhaira da khipāna hāngshap?
Awui otsakli masot mikhavai phaningunglu,
chiwui vang mina laa sāhaira.
Mi saikorana chili yangsera;
katāva̱wui einala yangrai.
Yanglu, Vare hi reimatai kachangkhata,
ithumna ali matheimana;
awui zingkum maphākhuirarmana.
Kaja tara̱ zingpā ana kazipkhui,
kala leichui zingrotlungli sikhui
chi kazingna rotāmi,
miwuitungli mavātla tāmi.
Muiyā ngapān khangasak kala
awui pamli kazing khangashum khipāna theikhuishapta?
Yanglu, awui kuikhamareili rikhān ngashei ngasaka,
kala shamadru kathuk zangshung ngasaka.
Kaja hibing hi eina ana yurbingli bichar sai;
ana kashakazā mavātla mi.
Awui pāng eina rikhānli farorhai,
kala kharinpam chili za̱ngasaka,
Chiwui katāk china awui apong phongchithei,
ana malungvātta moreili mamayāmana.
“Hiwui vang einala ining kathirda malungtātunghaowa.
Awui khangashumkhon kala akhamorwui eina kakhangang chi nganālu.
Kazingram peida vāshung ngasaka,
kala okathui achikun mati peida awui rikhān ngasheingasaka.
Chiwui thili awui khon nirvai;
awui khangamkhon eina kakhanganga awui khon kashā tharan,
rikhān khangashei ana makhāmmana.
Varena tekmateilak eina ngashum ngasaka;
ithumna matheikhuikharar hakkhamahā kachungkha sai.
Kaja horamli ana ngaleitungli tālu da hānga;
kazing khamar eina zingrotlila pangmeilu da hānga.
Awui otsak mi saikorana theikhavai
mi kachiva̱wui pāng ngasām ngasaka.
Chieina sāyurna athumwui ngayin
khavai apamli ungda,
akhurli ungpama.
Sikhurwui eina sur khaningshoka,
kala masi kaphanwui eina khamakui shoka.
Varewui khakkhā eina phāmkok shoka.
Kala tara̱ sorkhangasai chi thākta ngachinghaowa.
Ana muiyā kashā chili nimngasaka;
awui rikhān muiyāna chaivai.
Okthuikapai apuk-apagwuitungli athumli ana
kaso kahai saikora chi ungshungpai khavai,
awui thankhami eina athumli kuizat ngasaka.
Mashungkhui khavai nilala, lah awui
ngaleiwui vang, lah leikashiwui vang ana hithāda shokkhangasakna.
O Job, hi nganālu; ngasāmkhuida Varewui
matakhak kahai ot hi machukkhuilu.
Varena athumli kathāda kasoda,
kala muiyāwui rikhān khangashei kathāda
horngasakhala kaji na theila?
Theikakhui kākashungawui matakhak kahai otsak,
muiyāna kathāda ngaraichāda ngashingzatkhala kaji theila,
azingshongwui masina okathui hi va̱rihap kahai tharan,
nawui kashankachonbing kasāna thengkhangasak nana theila?
Khamakanga sākharik kahai mingshen kathā kazingram hi nana awui thāda phayaishokshaprala?
Ali ithumna khi hāngrakhala da ithumli tamchitheilu;
tangkhamangwui vang ithumwui tuingaphun makhuishokrarmana.
Ina matuira kaji ali hāngrala?
Mi akhana ali mayuisang khavai kahaokasaila?
“Masina phanthuihaida kazingram tharzā kahai tharan,
kazingram chi horchāmrihaiakha mina kahorli mayangkārarmana.
Atungshongwui eina sināwui tekhamatei shoka;
Varena mahāngkharar tekhamatei eina sāri shaksai.
Pangshapa chili ithumna maphākhuirarmana;
a pangshap eina mashun hakmahālaka,
makhavāta khamashung khangarong ana masāshimānmara.
Chiwui vang eina ali mina ngachee,
thangmeikharek konkathembingli ana machāpmimana.”
Chiwui thili
Awor kathem maleila hāngmachinphāphā kaji hi khipākhala?
Mayarnao thāda shānneira̱ neilu,
ina nali ngahānra, nana ili ngahānkālu.
“Ina okathuiwui shimphunga kasā tharan na kali leisā?
Ili hānglu, nana theikakhui leiakha.
Khipāna chiwui asān-aret onkhala—
nana theida leira!
Lha khara̱ chi khipāna chiwuitungli ngakhunvā?
Khiwuitungli chiwui pākra̱bing khaningkhui,
lah lungkhoka chi khipāna shun,
ngathor sirābingna laa sākhangarum,
kala Varewui naomayarbingna mathānda khavao katharankhala?
“Naopamwui eina ngawokhaikashok tharan khipāna shamadru khāmong shung;
ina muiyā chi chiwui sāri sāmi,
kala tangmangting kahai china naokhalui sāmi,
kala khāmong kala phākashut sāsangda,
‘Hirankha vālu, chili malāngvāpaimara,
nawui kapanga khangaphao hieina tangra”
da mahāngmala?
Nawui atam haokaphok eina thuida ngathorli nana kakasoyanghairala,
kala zingthanlamli awui pam kachitheihairalā,
chithāda okathuiwui amareili singkhuida,
makhayābingli kathantārala?
Leikhonli mahor namda kala kachon machu teihaida ngachei khangasaka kathāna.
Makhayābingwui eina kahor khuithuihaowa,
kala athumwui pangshap yāng katathai.
Yireiwui ura̱bing chi nana zangtheihairalā,
maningkha kathuka chiwui alungli kazathairala?
Kathiwui ngaveibing nali chithei hairalā,
lah kathuka tangmangting kahaiwui ngaveibing nana theihairala?
Okathuiwui khamashā machukhuihairala?
Hāngchitheilu, nana saikora hi theiakha.
Kahor pamkhavaili vākhavai shongfa kachishong lei,
tangkhamangwui apam kali lei,
chiwui ramli nana thanvāda, shim chiwui shongfa chi nana chitheishaprala?
Nana thei, kaja nali chitharan pharāhaira̱sai,
na rarshunhaira!
Horam kazipshimbingli na zanghairalā,
kala theih kazipshimbing na theihairalā,
chibing chi khonkazar atamwui vang kala rai kasā atamwui vang ina kazip kahai maningmala?
Kahor ngayar khavaipamwui shongfa kachi,
lah okathuili zingshoshongwui masi kachi eina phanshok?
Zingrot rotā khavai khipāna akhur sāphut,
kala lāngpar tākkhavai khipāna apong sem,
mi makhaleipamli kazing rokhavai,
mi makhalei siwuktungli;
ngalei khamasai eina mina ramphoda horkahai ngaleili chirchom khavai kala thingnā-ra̱hā phorkhavai maningmala?
Zingrotwui avāva̱ leila,
lah iknguira̱li khipāna pharā?
Phāmkok hi khipāwui naopam eina shok,
kala kazing eina katā phāmli khipāna pharā?
Tara̱na ngalung thāda mararhaowa,
kala kathukawui amai ngachinghaowa.
lah Orionwui khara̱bing nana khalāshaprala?
Mazzarothli athumwui atam athishurda thānvāshapralā,
lah Bear eina anaoli nana thānzatshaprala?
Kazingramwui shiyan-chikan na theila?
Athumwui zatkhanā chi okathuilila nana zatnāshap ngasakshaprala?
Nali tara̱na phongror khavai muiyāli nana vaokāshapla?
Nana rikhān chihoshokta china vālaga
‘Ithum hili leili’ da hāngngasakshaprala?
Muiyālungli thangkhamei ning,
lah leichuili theithangkhamei khipāna sangmikhala?
Thangkhamei eina khipāna muiyābing shānkhuishapkhala?
Lha khipāna kazingramwui tara̱ham heitha̱shaprakhala,
chifana ngaching kahai tharan kala leitang sākahai tharan khipāna shānkhuishapra?
Kazingkha̱wui sāshai nana rengmishaplā,
lah kazingkha̱naobingli nana phauishapla?
athum akhurli pamlakha,
maningakha athumwui ngathum khavaili leilakha?
Kashakazā khavātwui vang kuiung kuivāda hangkhā anaobingna Vareli ngakaokakā tharan,
hangkhāli khipāna zākhavai mikhala?
Kaphungwui mebing katharan pharākhala kaji na theila?
Chaolāna nao kapharā na yanghairala?
Athumna karankha vaikhala,
kala katharan pharārakhala kaji theila,
ngaleili ngakhumsangda athumwui nao kapharā chi theila?
Anaobing china pangsangda ramreili rarsanga;
athumna thuihailaga ava̱ngarāli malatungluimana.
Khararwui gadhāli khipāna chipenhaokhala?
Kathaka gadhāli kakhalap khipāna khalāhao,
khangaipam awui shim ngasā khavai kala machipamli awui ngasām khavai ina ali khami maningmala?
Keinungwui khonkazar chili ana mana̱shi;
thaokazatawui khavaokhon mashāmimana.
Awui seihomphung sāda kaphung kuimareida phāshaizata,
kala khamateka thingnā-ra̱hā kachiva̱ chi phāzata.
Khararwui mukvāna nali otram ngathangaila?
Nawui seishimli thangngayākha pisangngairala?
Ngarā kachangli ali seipeng eina hokhaishapralā,
maningkha tampāk chi nawuivang ana khuimirala?
A panglākhaowada nana ali chihamlā,
nawui ngalang chi ali haimirala?
A latungluira kala nawui ranpumli māthei phungungmira da shitsangla?
Ostrich vānaona langsosor angachāng kathana kha chi leikashiwui angachāng kala ahahla?
Ana ara̱ phara̱hailaga ngaleili nothāhaida khalatta lumngasaka,
pheina naiza̱ra kala ramsāna naikazamra kajila malaihaowa.
Awui nao makhaning thāda anaongarāli sāshida sai;
awui ngalang aremana jilala khikha mangangmana,
khikhalajila Varena ali thangkhamei malai ngasakhaowa,
kala theikhuikathei ali mayarmana.
Ana yāmthui khavai ngakarkathui tharan,
sigui eina katongali ana mana̱rora.
Siguili awui pangshap nana mila?
akahungli nana yāng sangmila?
Nana ali khaoh thāda ngawok ngasakla?
Awui kakhahek khangachee khonna.
Ana tampākli kathanga, awui pangshapli langsoi;
zeighai ngahāli ngasung khavai angaroka.
Khangachee chili ana mana̱rora,
malungla maringmana;
raighaiwui eina mangalanmana.
Awuitungli malākhong khalongkazama,
kahāna zeipa̱ kala kazei pharkachupvai.
Sākashi kala malungkhavāt eina ngalei mayuisanga,
talla̱khonli ana kasaikha manganingrarmana.
Talla̱ kakhong tharan, ‘Aha!’ ji.
Katāva̱wui eina rai khangarar chi ana theishapa,
kathānabingwui khavaokhon raikhon raikhak.
“Khalāngna kajuiva̱li yongkakā kala azingshong angachāng hārlaga
khayong nawui thangkhamei einala?
Khalāngna yongkāda kajuiva̱li athip kākasā nana kakasola?
Khamakanga kajuiya lungkaitungli awui shim sāda soma.
Chiwui eina awui sāshai ra̱yanga;
amikna chi katāvali theivāshapa.
kala kathi khaleipam chili a lei.”
Kala
“Khayon phākazata mina Sashap-pangshapali ngasungrala?
Vareli khangayāta china hi ngaha̱nkāranu.”
Chieina Jobna
“Yanglu, iya khikhala maningmana,
ina nali khi ngahānkāra?
Ipang eina khamor kafaya.
Akhashida hānghaira, mangahānkāluimara;
khani shida ina mahangluimara.”
Chieina
“Mayarnao akha thāda shaneira̱ neikhuilu;
ina nali ngahānra, nana phongmilu.
Nana ili khayon eina tangda yonngasakrala?
Na mashung khavai ili phenrala?
Napāngthei Varewui thālā,
na awui khon thāda ngashumshapla?
Chieina ngam kala khayākakā eina ngasoda na khalatta shaksāhailu,
tekhamatei eina ngasoda na khalatta chonvai sālu.
Nawui malungkhavātna pemkahai chi heitha̱haolu,
kala langkaso kachiva̱li yangvālu,
ali khayāmalā ngasaklu.
Langkaso mi kachiva̱li yangda, ali nemta ngasaklu;
kala makhayā mibingli nganingson eina naitālu.
Chifalungli athum saikora thumserhaolu,
athumli kathiramli khalaphaihaolu.
Chithākha na khalattawui yāpāngna nali khayui mishapada ina shānkhuira.
Yanglu, Behemothli, nali kasa thāda alila ina sākhui;
ana mukkā thāda khawo shai.
Yanglu, awui kashanli awui yang;
kala awukwui aphili awui pangshap lei.
Akhamei chi cedarthing thāda marar ngasaka;
akhaishāngwui anonanbing sākkhamānga.
Ara̱kui pithraiwui utongna,
arapthingra̱ maringum thai.
Varena sākhare chi ana,
ali kasaa china awui raighai ngalemli khuirāranu!
Kaja ramsā saikorana ngareo khavai kaphungbing
chili awui zākhavai shokmi.
Thambalrong kathui azingli
titi hurning kahai apamli ana ngaleopama.
Kaja thambalrongna fakham khavai khaya̱ sāmi;
kongpheili kaphor faborthingna ali kuimarei.
Yanglu, kong thuilala ana mangacheemana;
Jordanna khamorli longsanglala ning lumturhai.
Ali khipāna khaisui eina suikhuishapra,
lah khipāna khalen eina nārenmishapra?
lah amale khara̱ eina hokkhuishaprala?
Nana narenmishapralā,
lah amakhāli mari eina ruisangshaprala?
Ana nali chihomi khavai porala?
Ana nali khanim tui eina hāngrala?
Katang maleila nawui rao sākhavai ana nali tuingashit sārala?
Vanaoli ngareokhanganao thāda alila ngareopairalā,
lah narao sha̱naobingwui vang ali narhaipairala?
Leihkhalonbingna longairala?
Athumna ali leihkhalonbingli ngayarmirala?
Awui ahuili zeisa̱nao eina lah akuili zeimajo eina ngashumda zangrala?
Ali napāng parlaga rai khangarar phaningyanglu,
na masārarluilakmara.
Yanglu, miwui kachihān maungshungrarthura;
awui mikyanli a teolakhaira.
Khipākha sāshilakhaowada ali mangakarthui ngasaklengmana.
Chithākha iwui mangāli nganingshapki kaji a chi khipākhala?
Kazingram azingli khalalei katonga iwuisera.
“Awui pheipāng lah yāng kapang
phasā mathālak kahaiwui pongli ina kasaikha mapammara.
Awui kachon khamato khipāna raimishaprakhala?
Awui phahon khangapho chili khipāna ngataiphupsangshapkhala?
Awui mai khāmong khipāna shoshaprakhala?
Awui kuikhamarei ahā chi khangacheena.
Akhumkhor chāngvei pareng eina sāsangda mahor namshāntit kahai thāda sakahaina.
Akha eina akha ngavapnāhaida angachaili masi mazangrarmana.
Akha eina akha napshān ngarokhaida makhalākhaipaimana;
Ana hākthiakha kahor kāpshoka,
amik zingthanlamwui kahor thai.
Akhamorwui eina meirāwui meiwon shokta meiwui meipā pha̱pha̱ shoka.
Phinam kachui kala ham khangatarwui eina meikhut kashok thāda awui nātangkhurwui eina meikhut shoka.
Awui khakkhāna mahaila mei sākai,
kala akhamorwui eina meiwon shoka.
Akahungli yāng lei,
awui mangāli khangachee leishon leithai.
Awui aphi katonga napshānserda mangatha̱ ngasakrarmana.
Amalung ngalunggui khamarar thai,
mā rungkhavai lunggui thāda marara.
Ana ngakarkathui tharan kapangabingna ngachee;
kakathang eina athum khalatta yāma.
Raikhai eina ali shātlala mazangmana,
kazeila shilenkhara̱la zeimajola chisera.
Awui vang marila lanji,
pithraila thingpār kathāna.
Malā eina ali makashamrarmana;
awui vanga thailungtheila lanji kathāna.
Thinghunla lanjikung kathāna;
zeimajo kapharkhonli mana̱rora.
Awukshong kazana hamkai kathāna;
kala manuisa̱ kahai leipātungli mā shaokhavai karhui thāda ana ngayaipi.
Kathuka chi ana ham thāda ngatar ngasaka;
shamadrula neokhavai thaokhong ngasā ngasaka.
Akhanukli kahān shokngasaka,
kathuka chi charshihaira da mina phaningra.
Khangachee makhavai a kathā okathuili maleimana.
Ana kajujui kachiva̱li yanga;
ana langkaso naomayara saikorawui awungana.”
Chieina Jobna
“Nana ot saikora shapsera kaji ina thei,
kala nawui sākhangai akha eina tangda mahorhaipaimana.
Chiwui vang eina ina matheikhuila hāngphāphāhaira,
ina makathei matakhak kahai otbing chi.
ina nali ngahānka,
kala nana ili hāngchitheilu!
Nawui pongli ikhanā eina shāhairasai,
kha ara imik eina nali theihaira;
chiwui vang I khalatta ningkachaiya,
kala chifa eina hotlālungli ining ngateili.”

kala

O
Iwui chapkhangachā, nana pheichak onngasaka;

ina nali ningshichingra.
O
ili mamaishi ngasakmilakalu;

Ili kha-nāshungmilu,
thākta kahuimilu.
Na iwui vang ngayin khavai lunghār kasāmilu,

Mha, na iwui lunghār kala raipanna;

O
shitkasang makhangacheia Varivara.
Khikha masā khavai meoma̱li kaphaning athumli nana yangkharinga;
kha iya
Nawui makhangachei leikashiwui vang ina ringphāda mathānra,

iwui yangkashebingli nana theikhuihaira,
kala yangkashewui pāngli ili mahorsangmimana;
nana iphei khamashā pamli haimiya.
O
kaja I ringkashilungli leili;
chapkhangachāwui vang imik,
imanglā kala iphasāla kānhaira.
Kaja iwui mirin kakhananglungli kānthuihaira,
iwui zingkum sifafada peihaira.
I ringshātwui vang yāngla kānhaira,
ira̱kuila tāchiphaira.
Iwui yangkashebingna mana̱shi khavai,
khongnainaona ngachee khavai sāthuihaira,

Kathinao thāda ili malaihaira;
I ngayāng kahai hamkai ngasāthuihaira.
yā, yā khangachee ina shai!

Kha, O
“Na iwui Varena” da ina hānga.
Iwui atam napāngli lei,
ili yangkashe, rekakharekbingwui pāng eina kakankhuimilu!
Namai narao iwuitungli hormida,
nawui makhangachei leikashiwui alungli ili kahuimilu!
Ili makhayak ngasakmialu,
kaja O
athum khakshumda Kathewui ramli vāranu.
Langsoda kala temshida mashunli mamayāmada,

O nali khangacheebingwui vanga,

Nawui mangāli nana athumli makaphā kasā mibingwui eina thumihai;
athumli nawui ngayin khavai azingli malewui khamashātwui eina chingri haimiya.
ana matakhak eina makhangachei leikashi chi ili chitheimi.
Malung tātunghaida “Ili nawui eina katāva̱li kashamvāhaira”
da hānga.

Awui katharabing,
Ningkatongabingli
kha ngamchoto eina kasābingli ana athut hāngsanga.
Panglu, kala nathumwui malung pingngasaklu,

kala amanglāli mikhanam makhalei mi chi sokhamina.
Ina morei mahāngphathang,
langpongda khangahuina iphasā shimāna.
Kaja ngashun ngayā iwuitungli
napāng ritlak eina parhai;
lumkachāngwui kasāwui vang thāda,
iwui yāng thenghaira.
Nawui mangāli iwui morei sākahai I mayai,
kala iwui khayonkhamāng mathumhaimana;
da ina hānga;
