Chiwui vang shitkasanga mi
kachiva̱na nali seihā sāranu;
kakhanang atamli, tara̱ kaphong
atamli athumna ali marāza̱rarmara.
Na iwui ngathum khavai pamna,
kakhanangwui eina nana ili thummi;
nana ili huikhami eina ili kuinammi.
Nana zatki kaji shongfa chi ina
hāngchitheira kala tamchitheira;
imikna yangmidai ina nali hāngchitheira.
Theithangkhamei makhalei sigui kala
gadhā kathā mangasālu;
athumle nārenra khalapmiphalungra
maningkha nali mangayurzatmara.
Makaphā-makhayā miwui khangashei kachungkhaya;
kha
O khamashungbing,
kala ningli mashungrik kahaibing,
khamathānwui vang vaolu.
O khangaronga nathum,
Mashungrik kahaile masot mingayia,
kala khara̱ tharā kakā tingteilā eina nimshimri laa sālu.
Ali laa kadhar sālu, panglāk eina vaoda tingteilā khara̱ huikazaklu.
Kaja
kala awui ot saikora ningtongda sākhui.
Ana khamashung khangarong eina mashunli leishi;
okathui hili
kala awui khaksui eina chili khalei ashangva̱ sākhui.
Liklili thaikahai thāda shamadru tara̱ katonga ana kazipkhui;
ana kathukthuk chi kazipshimli kaziphai.
Okathui saikorana
apuk-apagali khalei huptana awui mangāli ngacheerang eina nganingranu!
Kaja ana kahāng eina chithāda ngasāthuihaowa;
ana kasoi, chieina nganingshinghaowa.
Miyurbingwui theithangkhamei,
yurbingwui khangarān masāvai ngasakmana.
awui ningwui kaphaning, mithot saikora vāpeichaowa.
awui shimluikat sākhavai,
kapangkhui kahai mibing sokhami ngasaranu.
ana mibingwui naomayara ngarā saikorali thei;
ali chipam kahai wungpamkhong eina,
okathuili kapam saikorali yanga,
mibingwui ning sangkhame ana,
kala saikorawui otsak theisera.
Awungali awui shipai kachungna kankakhui maningmana,
raikapingala awui yāng eina khayui maningmana.
Rai yuikhavaiwui vang rai siguili kachihān aremana;
awui pangshap kharei chi eina mayuirarlakmana.
Yanglu,
kala awui makhangachei leikashili kachihānabingli ana yangmi,
kaja athumwui manglā kathiwui eina ana kanshokmira,
kala chāmrei atamli mathingasakmana.
Ithumwui manglāna
ana ithumwui ngachonkhame kala changveina.
Mha, ithumwui ning awui lungli mathāna,
kaja awui katharaming chili ithum shitsanga.
Nawui makhangachei leikashi,
O
ithumna nali kachihān thāda ithumli tāshungmilu.
Atam kachida ina
ikhamorli awui masot kachigat leichingra.
kakhanangabingna shālaga mathānranu.
O
kala ithum ngarumda awui mingli masot misa.
Ina
kala khangachee saikorawui eina ili kanshokmi.
Ali yangda horngasaklu,
chithāda na mamaishimara.
Khangazana mi hina ngakaowa, kala
kala kakhanang saikora eina huimi.
kala athumli kanshokmi.
Ali khangayina mi chi ringphai!
O, katharabing,
kaja ali khangacheebing khavāt maleimana.
Kazingkha̱ anaola vāthaida thai;
kha
Ralu, O naomayara ngarā, ili nganālu,
Makaphā kala mikhanam tui namale,

Makaphāwui eina pākhaida kaphā sālu,

Khangarongabingli
kala awui khanāna athumwui khavao chi shāmi,
Makaphā kasābingli

Malung sipkasābingli
ningkathengbingli huimi.
Khamashungabingwui sipkasā kachungkhana,
kha
Makaphāna makhayāli shaothatra;
khangarongabingli yangkakharingabing athumli kashong lāngra.
ali ngayinkakhui khipālikha kashong malāngmara.
O
ili khangararbing chili ngararmilu!
Chāngvei ra̱pheng phungda ili thuingachonmilu!
Ili kakharombingli kazei kala zeivār eina pharmilu!
kala “I nawui huikhamena” da imanglāli hāngmilu!
Imanglā khuikhavai kasābingli maishida khayak ngasaklu!
Ili mamayāmada makaphā khangarānbing pa̱ngapāda latung ngasakmilu!
Māhik masili phankathui thāda
athumwui apong tangmating eina khanganaila nganairanu!
Kaja maram maleila athumna ili khalen sanga;
maram maleila imanglā khuikida chom chuiya.
Matheisālakla athumli kashimān shokranu,
khalen kasang chili athum khalatta manranu,
shimān khavai athum chili tāzangranu!
Chieina
awui huikhamili sochikatra.
Ira̱kui saikorana hāngra, “O
khangazanali nana huimi,
pangmeikhar kajiwui eina khangazan khavātabingli shimān khavai kasā chiwui eina kankhame,
na kathā khipa leili!”
Minama shākhibing thuinganinga;
ina makathei otwui pongli athumna ngahāna.
Kaphāwui vang athumna ili zakkashi hanmi;
imanglā chānghaira.
Kha athum kakazā tharan, ina borashi ngavai,
ikhalatta khumda khananga.
Ikui mathiktungli ngasunda seihā sai,
ngasotnaowui, maningkha ichināwui vang kakhanang thāda;

Kha iphei khangaphok tharan athumna mathānda kazipta ringphai,
ina makatheiya makaphā kasābingna khamashāt mathāhaimana.
Athumna ahā tarilaga ili marmei khangai marmeida mana̱shipama.
O
Athumwui sakakathānwui eina,
kazingkha̱wui eina imanglā ngatangkhuimilu.
Chieina ina kahaka yarui kazipli ningkashi mira;
hakkhamahā kazipli ina masot chigatra.
iwuitungli mamathān ngasaklu,

O
ili mashun hāngsangmilu,

“Awui raowui phākhavaili ningyāngkhaunga,
Chieina nawui khamashung khangarong pongli imalena hāngra,

wuklungli ngazeka;

nawui ningkatong muiyā kāshunga.

O
O Vare nawui makhangachei leikashi aman kayākha sakkhala!
Miwui naomayarana nawui angachāng khaya̱li ngayinkhui.
Khavāt makhalei nawui shimli athumna phāshak-phāzai,
kala nawui ningyāngkhaung kongwui tara̱ nana athumli mimanga.
Kaja nawuili kharinga ura̱ lei;
nawui kahorlungli ithumna kahor thei.
O makhangachei leikashi chi nali
katheibingli leichingranu,
kala ning khangarongabingli nawui huikhami leichingranu!
Kala lāngkasowui phei iwuitungli manairanu,
makaphāwui pāngnala ili makashamhairanu.
Makaphā kasābing ngakhumshām eina pizanga,
athumli nursanghaida mangakarthuithukthura.
Makaphaawui vang wukmakhanangalu,
khalāng kasā mili mayuishialu!
Kaja athum thingnā thāda thākta shimānhaora,
kala khawo thāda ngahuihaora.
chieina nana ram chili sompamra,
kala ning tāphuphaira.
chithākha ana nawui ningkachāng mira.
Nawui apong chi
ali shitsanglu, chithākha ana sāmira.
Nawui athut hāngkasang kahor thāda,
kala nawui mashun ngashun thāda ana athut khuirāmira.
kala ali ning nganungkhun ngaraipamlu;
mina awui apongli reikasang eina,
makaphā arah kasābingwui vang makhanangalu!
Malung mavātalu, malungkathui chihohaolu!
nakhalatta makhanangalu; china makaphāmāngli thānvai.
Kaja makaphā makhayāli katathaora;
kha
Kasha̱kha leilaga, makaphā chi maleiluimara;
awui pamli nana mathāda yanglala,
ava chili maleisāmara.
kala nganantāp okthuida ningyāng unglakra.
Khangarongali makaphaana shimān khavai sai,
kala awui ahā ali tarichithei;
kha
kaja awui atam rārādalei da ana thei.
Makaphaana raighai sutkhui kala malā huna,
kachāmkhangaibingli khuitā khavai,
ngarongrik eina kazatbingli sāthat khavai;
athumwui raighai athum khalattawui malungli zangra,
kala athumwui malāthing tekhaora.
Makaphaa kachungkhana mavātlakla khaleiliva,
khangarongana kateokha khaleina phāmei.
Kaja makaphaawui pāng sātekmihaora,
kha khangarongali
Shāt makakābingwui zimiksho
kala athumwui shimlui mashimānda leira.
Makaphā atamli athumli makhayak ngasakmana,
chāmrei atamli athumna mavātla leira.
Kha makaphā chi shimānhaora;
athum shimānra—meikhut thāda athum shimānhaora.
Makaphaana shukkhui, kala marunrarmana,
kha khangarongava sailāmlaka kala mishoka;
kha ana khonshi kahaibing chile katathaora.
Miwui pheikār
kala awui ningyāngkhaung apongli kazata chili ana sakāmi;
ana kongluilala, mashoda mahortāmara,
kaja
I nganuisai, ara rarhaira;
chithālala khangarongali horkahai ina matheilakmana,
lah awui naongarā zāt pozākazatla matheimana.
Ava mingairereo mi, kala chishuta;
kala awui naongarābing sokhami ngasai.
Makaphā horhaida kaphā sālu,
chithākha na leichingra.
Kaja
Khamashung-khangarongbingli mashimān ngasaklakmara,
kha makaphaawui naongarāli katathaora.
Khangarongana ram chi samphangra,
kala chili mashimānda pānra.
Khangarongawui khamor eina thangkhamei tui matui;
amale eina mashun tui hānga.
Varewui ain awui ningli hai,
awui pheikār manganaithuimana.
Makaphaana khangarongali yangpama,
kala ali sāthat khavai phāzata.
lah ali bichar atamli khayon mamimara.
chithākha ana ram chi samphang khavai nali sochikatra;
nana makaphaawui kashimān chi theira.
Makaphaa mina hennā kahai ina theihaira,
kala Lebanonwui cedarthing mashonshei kahai thai,
ina chi kānvaluishita, kala yanglu,
a maleisāthuwa,
ina phālala masamphangmana.
Shāt makakā mili machutkhuilu,
kala mashungrik kahai chili yanglu,
kaja chingri kahai miwui mataikasang lei.
Kha chonkhamakānbingli shimānchao ngasakra,
makaphā miwui athei katathaora.
Khangarongawui huikhami
kakhanang atamli ana athumwui ngayin khavaina.
makaphā makhayābingwui eina athumli ana kanshokta huimi;
kaja athumna ali ngayinkhui.
O
malungkangda ili mamachinmialu!
Kaja nawui malāthing ili ngaphumhaira,
kala nawui pāng iwuitungli tāshunghaira.
Nawui malungkhavāt chiwui vang,
iphasāli kaching maleimana;
iwui moreiwui vang ira̱kuili pangshap mazangthura.
Kaja iwui khayonkhamāng ikui kankāhaira;
china otphun thāda iwui vang ritnāhaowa.
Iwui mangkhama̱wui vang iwui khamā torngataida nganamshihaira,
ikui mashunzangda ngakhumsangchaohaira;
langpongda ina sifazata.
Kaja ikashan mei kachui thāda pemhaira,
iphasāli kaching maleilakmana.
Iphasā ngazanhaida tāyānghaira, iningkachotwui vang ina ringngādalei.
iwui sitkhamahui nawui eina mathumhaimana.
Imalung tuktukhai, iwui yāng kānhaowa;
imikwui kahor— chila iwui eina thuihaira.
Iwui kazātwui vang eina ngasotnaobing,
ngayurkazatabing katāva̱li thuihaowa;
kala athei-asāla katāva̱li nganinga.
Imanglā khuikhavai ili kaphābingna khalen sanga;
ili chotkhavai phākazatbingna shimān khavai matui,
kala yansai khavai langpongda machuka.
Kha iva khanā khangakhok thāda mashālakmana,
khak khama̱ khamor makhamakā mi thai.
Mha, iva khangakhoka mi thai,
khangasha̱ thada khamor mamakāmana.
Kha O
O
ngahānkāmiki kaji chi nana.
“Iphei khanganai chitharan langkaso athumna iwuitungli mamathān ngasakmilu!”
da ina seihā sali.
Kaja I kongluisangki jihaira,
iwui khangashei ili leichingda lei.
Iwui khayonkhamāng hāngphatli,
Iwui moreiwui vang I wukkhananga.
Maram maleila ili yangkashe athum panglaka,
apong maleila ili yangkakharing athum kachungkhaya.
Iwui kaphāwui vang makaphā kasābing chi iwui yangkashebingna,
khikhalajila ina kaphā chili shurhaowa.
O
O iwui Vare, iwui eina matāthuimihaialu!
O
ili thākta khangachonmilu.
“Yangkashebing leilakha eina tangda,
iwui shongfa ngasharlak eina zatra,
iwui malena morei masā khavai ikhamor kafara”
da ina hānga.
I khak ngasha̱da kasaikha pama,
ina chingri eina kapam aremana;
iwui kachot mataimei,
iwuklung mei thāda sai.
Ina phaningnganaopamda,
mei yumhaowa;
chieina ina imale eina matuida hānga:
kala iwui mirin karankha leifakhala;
imirin kayākha sha̱khala ili theingasakmilu!”
Yanglu, iwui atam nana pāngmayārankhamāng sāmi,
kala nawui mikyanli iwui mirin atam khikha makhaning kathāna.
Kachangkhatta, mi kachiva̱ khaksuikha kathāna.
Mi hiya kachangkhat eina akalā thāda zatung-zatva sai!
Kachangkhat eina khikha makhaningwui vang athumna khananga;
mina sorngasaida hai,
kha khipāna chi kazipkhuirada matheimana.
Ara
Iwui kachihān nawuili lei.
Iwui khayonkhamāng saikorawui eina kanshokmilu.
Ili mangkhama̱bingwui mana̱shi khavai masā ngasakmilu!
I khak ngasha̱ya, ikhamor mamakāmana;
kaja hi nana sāmi kahaina.
Ili kashao hi thahaimihaolu,
napāng eina kashaona I kānhaira.
Moreiwui vang nana mili hāngmachinda kakahar tharan,
awui sakmeikap kaji lan makungna kazā thāda nana shimān ngasaka;
kachangkhatta, mi kachiva̱ khaksuikhamaya!
“O
kala iwui khavao khanganāmilu;
iwui chāra̱ katā mayangkheimihailu.
Kaja ila ishāvā ngarā thāda nawui kha̱mi,
ram kazata kathāna.
I kānthuida shimānchao majiranglakha,
ringkaphā samphang khavai,
ili khayangkheimilu!”
Ina
ana ili nganāmida iwui khavao shāmi.
Ngachakyāng kahai chom,
khangavāt rāpurwui eina ili ana khāngshokmi,
kala iphei lunghārtungli haimi
iwui pheinai ngatar ngasaka.
Ikhamorli ana laa kadhar sangmi,
ithumwui Vareli masot khamiwui laa.
Kachungkhana theida ngacheera,
kala
lāngkasoli mangareikathuiya,
makhamashung varebingli thi makashura athum chi sokhami ngasaranu.
O
nawui matakhak kahai otsak,
ithumli phaningkhami, mataisangmihaira;
nali khipānakha mangatamrarmara!
Saikora hi ina chishātta hāngra jilala shānla makhuimara.
kha shākhavai nana ili khanā mathing ngasaka;
rikkatā kachigat kala suiham chigat nana maningchāngmana.
Chieina ina hānga, “Yanglu, I rārāli;
khalui kahai lairiklungli iwui pongli kapihaida lei;
O iwui Vare, nawui kaphaning chi ina sāmingailaka;
nawui ain iwuklungli lei.”
Kanshokkhamiwui ringkaphā chānpao hakkhamahā yarui kazipli ina hānghaira.
Yanglu, O
Iningli nawui khangachon huikhami chi mathumhaimana;
nawui huikhamila, ningtongda shitsang kapaiwui ponglila ina matuihaira;
nawui makhangachei leikashi kala ningtongda shitkasangla ina mathumhailakla hakkhamahā yarui kazipli hāngsanga.
O
nawui makhangachei leikashi kala ningtongda shitkasang china ili ngākmichinglu.
Kaja mashānkharar makaphāna ili kuinamhaowa;
iwui khayonkhamāngna ili khuithuihaira,
ina matheikharar eina tangda;
athum chiya ikuisamli chungmei;
I malung tātunghaira.
O
Imanglā khuikida kasā athumli pa̱ngapāda maishi ngasaklu.
Ili chotngasak kajibingli khalatta pa̱ngapāda maishi ngasakmilu.
Ili, “Ahay, Ahay” kajibing,
athum maishida ngacheeranu.
Kha nali kaphā saikora ringphāda mathānranu;
nawui huikhamili leikashibingna “Hakkhamahā chi
da hāngranu.
Iya, kachāma kala khavātana;
kha
Na iwui huikhame, kala ngachonkhamena;
O iwui Vare, mahui nganongalu!
Kachāmbingli phaningkhamibingli sokhami ngasāranu!
Kakhanang atamli
kala ram chili athumli sokhami da hoi,
nana athumli yangkashewui ningkachāng chili mahorsangmihaimana.
Athumwui kakazā petli
kala athumwui kakazā chili nana athumwui kakhanang saikora raimi.
Iwui vanga ina hānga, “O
ili raimilu, kaja ina nali mamayāla morei sāhaira!”
Iwui yangkashebingna ningkhāda “A katharan thida aming shimānrakhala?” da hānga.
Mina ili samphang khavai kharā tharan awui ningli zakkashi kazipsanghailaga ana makakachang tuimang matui;
ana ayarli kashok tharan, chi kayāng khamashāli hāngzata.
Ili yangkakharingbingna iwui pongli suisāda kasup ngaruma;
athumna iwui vang zakshimeikap kaji chi phaninga.
Athumna, “Thikapai otna ali katanshānhaira,
a pida khalei chiwui eina mangakarthuiluimara”
da hānga.
iwui zāt kazā ā eina tangda,
ili mamayāla aphei khānghaira.
Kha, O
ili khāngmathotmilu, athumli athut khuiga!
Nana ili ningyangunga kaji hieina ina thei,
kaja yangkashena iwuitungli mayuimana.
Kha iwui ningsā khangazipwui vang ili nana khāngkhaningmi kala nawui ngalemli ili haimichinga.
katang makhavaiwui eina katang mavaila sochingranu!
Amen! Amen!
Chaona longkazata kongrāra̱ ningkachāng thāda,
imanglānala nali ningchanga, O Varivara!
Kharinga Varewui vang imanglāna Varewui vang ra̱changa,
Varewui mai ina katharan atheirakhala?
Ngashun ngayā iwui chara̱na kashakazā sai,
mibingna ili ngahānchinga, “Nawui Vare kali leikhala?”
Ina iwui ning kakhalā tharan,
hibing hi phaningunga:
yarui ashangvana phanit salakha
ringkaphawui khavao
kala ningkashiwui laasak eina ngasoda
ina yaruili kathada ngayurzatsā,
athumli kathada khorumshimli thānvāsā khala kaji.
Khisāda sifakhala imanglā!
Khisāda iningli chingri mahaimakhala?
Vareli chihānlu; kaja ina ali latluida masot chikatluira;
iwui ngachonkhame kala iwui Vare.
Iwui wuklungli manglāna sifaya,
chiwui vang eina Jordan kala Harmon ngaleiwui eina,
Mizar Kaphungwui eina ina nali phaningunga.
Nawui tara̱ kaherkatāwui khangashumkhonli
kathukna kathukli hoi;
nawui tara̱ khangaphao kala khamalaona ili tumhaira.
Awui makhangachei leikashi chili
ngayā peida awui laana ili ngasomi,
iwui ringkhavai Vareli seihā kasā eina ngasoda.
Ina Vare, iwui lunghārli hānga,
“Khisāda ili nana malaihaokhala?
Yangkashebingna rekakharekwui vang khisāda ina chapngachāzatrakhala?”
Thikhavai khamā iphasāli leihaoda yankakasaibingna ili zeilaga “Nawui Vare kali leikhala?” da hānga.
Khisāda sifakhala, O imanglā,
khisāda iningli chingri makahaikhala?
Vareli chihānlu, kaja ina ali masot chigatluishitra,
iwui ngachonme, kala iwui Vareli.
O Vare, ili mashun hāngsangmilu,
shitkasang makhalei yurwui eina,
ili nganingmilu;
mikhanama kala makhamashunga mibingwui eina ili kakhāngshokmilu.
Kaja iwui ngayin khavai Vare chi, nalaka,
khisāda ili horhaokhala?
Yangkashebingna rekakharekwui vang khisāda I chapngachāzatrakhala?
Iyavo, nawui kahor kala khamashung chihomida,
athumna ili thānmiranu.
nawui kathara kaphungli kala nawui somkhavai chili athumna ili kathānung ngasakmilu.
Chieina ina Varewui hanphutli kāra,
iwui mathānkhamatai Vareli;
kala ina tingteilā khongda nali masochikatra,
O Vare, iwui Vare.
O imanglā, khisāda sifakhala,
khisāda iningli chingri makahaikhala?
Vareli chihānlu;
kaja ina ali masot chikatluishitra,
iwui ngachonkhame kala iwui Vare.
Ithumwui khanā eina shāhaira, O Vare,
Ithumwui avā ngarāna ithumli hanghaira,
achalakha athumwui atamli nana sākahai nawui otsak:
nana yurbingli nawui pāng eina kashamshoka,
kha nana nawui mibingli lingsanga;
yurbingli nana khanang ngasaka,
kha nawui mibingli ningkhān ngasaka;
kaja athum khalattawui raighai eina ram chi yuikakhui maningmana;
athum khalattawui pāngthei einala yuikakhui maningmana;
kha nawui yāpang pāngthei eina,
kala namaiwui kahor chinana;
kaja nana athumli ningyāngunga.
Na iwui Awunga kala Varena,
Jacobwui vang rai khayui nana tharchisina.
Nawui mangā eina yangkashebingli ithumna namtai;
namingwui mangā eina ithumna khangararbingli naitai.
Kaja iwui malāli shitkasang maningmana,
iwui raighainala huimirarki kaji maningmana.
Kha yangkashebingwui eina nana ithumli huimi,
kala ithumli yangkakharingbingli nana pa̱khangapā sangmi.
Varewuilungli ithum lāngsorāchinghaira,
kala namingli ithumna mashimānda ningkashi mira.
Kha, nana ithumli horhaida chamalā ngasaka,
kala ithumwui raimili ngasoda mavāmana.
Yangkashebingwui eina nana ithumli yāmngasakta;
yangkashebingna rāngaponkhui.
Taithatki kaja yao thāda nana ithumli sai,
kala yurbingwui alungli ithumli yaoyānghaowa.
Khikha makhaning aman eina nana nawui mibingli yorhaowa,
athumwui vang aman chungdala mapomana.
Khongnainaona mana̱shi khavai;
ithumli kuimareida khaleibingwui zeikhavai kala mana̱kashi samphang khavai nana sāmi.
Yurbingna meisum chān sākhavai,
mibingna ngashan sānganao khavai ithumli sāmihaowa.
Langpongda iwui maikashi iwui mangāli lei,
kala maikashina imai fakhamhaira,
khamashātbing kala zeikakharuibing,
athutkakhui kala yangkashebingwui tui china.
Ithumna nali mamalailala,
lah nawui tuingashit mayonlala saikora hi ithumwuitungli tāhaira.
Ithumwui ning mangacheimana,
nawui pongwui eina ithumwui pheikār masa̱na̱ungmana;
chithālala ramfawui pamli ithumli nana sākachupta,
kathuka tangkhamang eina ithumli farorhaira.
Ithumna Varewui ming malaihaida makathei vareli pāng tāngthuihaiakha,
Varena chi maphāshokmarala?
Kaja khangathum ningla ana thei.
kala taithat khavai yao thāda shānkhuihaira.
O
Nakhalatta ngakarthuilu!
Thuimilu! ithumli mahorchaomi hailu!
Khisāda nana namai thumhaikhala?
Khisāthuda ithumwui kachotkachāng kala ithumli rekakharek malaihaokhala?
Kaja ithumwui manglā chifali ngakhorda;
ithumwui phasā ngaleili nganarshānhaira.
Ngakarthuida ithumli ngachonmi khavai ralu!
Nawui makhangachei leikashi mangā eina ithumli kakhāngshokmilu.
Tuipong khamathā akha iningli malaotha̱ya;
ina awungali laa phoka;
imale kapikakhuiawui kolom thai.
Mibingwui nao ngachaili na mathāmeithuiya,
namorchaili lukhamashan heirora,
chiwui vang Varena nali mashimānda somi.
O pangshapa, nawui tekhamatei,
khangamkharei eina ngasoda nawui raighai kashānli hokthānglu.
Nawui khangamkharei eina khamashungwui vang,
kala mashun ngākmi khavai khayuia sāda mangāshong vālu;
nawui yāpāngna nali khangachee otsak tamchitheiranu!
Awungawui yangkashebingwui malungli nawui malāthing zanlaka;
miyurbingna nawui mangāli pitai.
nawui khānthing
khamashungli nana leishi kala makaphāli yangkharinga.
Chiwui vang eina Vare,
nawui Varena nali khamathānwui thao chi
ngasotnaobingli lāngmeida nali neomihaira,
nawui wungsārila nganamkaphā myrrh,
aloe kala cassia thungthunghai.
Mafahā eina sākahai konungwui eina tingteilā huida nali mathān ngasaka;
awungawui naongalāva̱ ngarā,
nawui khayākakā achon ngarāwui ngachaili zanga,
awungva̱ chi Ophirwui sinā eina shaksāda nawui yāshong nganinga.
Nganālu, O naongalāva̱, chukmajalu kala nakhanā nāshunglu;
nawui mibing kala navāwui shimkhur malaihaolu;
kala awungana nawui khamathā chi ningchāngra.
A nawui akhava ngasāhaoda, ali khorumlu.
Tyrewui mina nali lemmetyur eina suira,
shāngmeikap kaji mibingna lan ayuryur singlaga.
Wungnao ngalāva̱ sinā rukkasang sāri ngavaida awui kāli ngavaipama;
machu kachungkha sākasanga kachon ngavaida awungawui mangāli thānvai;
kachingva̱ awui ngasotnaobingna ali ngasoda thānlaga.
Awungawui konungli athumna kazang tharan,
ringkaphā khamathān eina athumli thānkhuiya.
Navā ngarāwui mahut nathumwui naongarāna shinra;
nana athumli okathui saikorali wungnaobing sāngasakra.
Ina mithot saikorali nawui ming phaningung ngasakra,
chithāda mibingna mashimānda mashimānla nali masot chigatra.
Vare ithumwui ngayin khavai kala pangshapna,
kakhanang atamchangli ngachonkhamena.
Chiwui vang eina okathuina ngacheilala ithum mangacheemara,
shamadrulungli kaphungna ngaphaokazamlala;
chiwui tara̱na ngaphaoda malaokazamlala,
chiwui pa̱khangapāna kaphung nganukkazamlala;
mangacheemara.
Varewui keinungli mathān khangasak kong akha lei,
Juikhamataiawui kathara pamkhavaina.
Chiwui alungli Vare lei, a mangacheimara;
Varena ngalāngda ali ngachonmira.
Miyurbingna malungvāta,
wungrambing nganuka;
ana awui akhon vaowa, okathui menga.
Ashangva̱wui
Jacobwui Vare ithumwui ngayin khavaina.
Ralu,
okathuili ana kathāda ngachakyāng ngasakhaikhala?
Ana okathui peida rai kasā tangngasaka;
malā chi huntekmi, kala kazei sātekmi,
ana siguigari mei eina thottami!
“Chingrihailu, kala I Varena da theilu.
Miyurbingwui alungli I maikhayāna,
okathuili I mai kakāna!”
Ashangva̱wui
Jacobwui Vare chi ithum ngayin khavaina.
Miyur saikora, nathum pāng kaphelu,
khamathānwui laakhon Vare mangāli pangda vaolu!
Kaja Juimataimeikap kaje
okathui saikorawuitungli kahaka awungana.
Ana mibingli ithumwui azingli hamsang ngasaka,
kala ithumwui pheizingli yurbing hamsang ngasaka.
Ithumwui shimlui ana kapangkhuimi,
ana leikashe Jacobwui maikhayāna.
Khamathānkhon alungli Vare kāhaira,
talla̱khon eina ngasoda
Vareli masotlaa sālu, masotlaa sālu!
Ithumwui awungali masotlaa sālu,
masotlaa sālu.
Kaja Vare hi, okathui saikorawui awungana;
laa eina masot chikatlu.
Yur saikorawuitungli Varena munga,
Varena awui kathara wungpamkhongli pama.
Abrahamwui Varewui mibing thāda,
yurwui awungabing kazipa.
Kaja okathuiwui chāngvei Varewuina;
khayākakā malangluimana!
Reikhamatai
sochikatrali ithum Varewui keinungli,
okathui saikorawui mathān khavaina,
atungshong katāva̱li khalei,
khareia Awungawui keinung Zion kaphung.
Chiwui raipanbingwui alungli
Vare akhalattana makhangapat nganingme sāda chitheimihaira.
Kaja yanglu, awungabing kaziphaira,
athum rāngarumhaira.
Athumna chi rātheikhaleoda khakshingaka,
athum pa̱ngapāhaowa, athum yāmhaowa;
sha̱naona naokhara̱ kachot thāda,
athum chili kathirkapophaowa,
Tarshishwui jahasbing chi nana zingshoshongwui masi eina sākakhui chithāda.
Ithumna shākahai thāda, ithumnala theihaira ashangva̱wui
ithum Varewui keinungli,
chi Varena katang mavaila sakā kahaina.
O Vare, nawui makhangachei leikashi chi
nawui khorumshimli ithumna phaningkhui.
Nawui ming mara̱sa̱da, O Vare,
nawui masot okathui vākatanglila vāshunga.
Nawui yāpangli khayuina pemtinghai;
Zion Kaphung mathānranu!
Judah naongalāva̱ nawui bicharwui vang mathānranu!
Zionli kuiung-kuivālu, ali kuimareizatlu,
awui dolanbing mashing shānkhuilu.
Chiwui raipan yangkhui kazaklu,
awui khamashonpambing yangvapeilu;
chithāda nana khanuithotli hāngchitheipaira.
Kaja mashimānda makashimān Vare hi ithumwui Varena.
Mashimānda ana ithumwui thānkhame sāra.
Hi nganālu, yur saikora!
Nashunglu, apuk-apagali khalei mi saikora,
khareila kateola, kachāmala kashāngala!
Ikhamorna thangkhamei tui matuira,
iningli khamachuk chi theishingkakhuina.
Chānjamwui tuili ikhanā nāshungra;
iwui pakhon lyre eina ngasoda hāngchitheira.
Kakhanang atamli,
ili rekakharekbingwui makaphāna kuinam kahai tharan,
ina khiwui vang ngacheerakhala,
khalattawui lanli kachihānbing kala lan makhavātwui langkasobing chiwui vang khisāda ngacheera?
Kachangkhata, khipānakhala khalatta mangatangkhuirarmara;
maningkha amanglāwui vang Vareli aman mamirarmara,
kaja amanglāwui ngatangman saklaka,
kalikha mashaplakmara,
kaja ana ringchingda chom chi matheilakmara majirarmana.
Mha, thangkhamala thi kaji ana theira,
mangkhama̱ eina makhanganingala khanini shimānra;
kala athumwui lan kateili haimira.
Lam athum khalattawui aming phoklala,
athumwui somkhavai pam thothotwui vāngna,
athumwui chikhur athumwui shim sāchingra.
Mina awui kashang-kharei eina maokthuirarchingmara,
ava shimānhaoki kaji sāyur kathāna.
Hi mangma̱sak eina shitkasangbingwui kalāna,
kachichāwui yarli ringkaphābingwui akatangana.
Yao thāda athum Kathewui ramwui vang ngarān kahaina;
Kathe china athumwui kahoma sāra;
chikhurli ngatarda athum tāzangra,
kala athumwui phasā shimānhaora;
Kathewui ram chi athumwui shim ngasāra.
Kha Kathewui ramwui pangshapwui eina Varena imanglā ngatangkhuimira,
kaja ana ili khuisangmira.
Mi akha kashāng tharan, ashi shimkhurwui tekhamatei
mataikasang tharan, mangacheelu.
Kaja a kathi tharan ana khikha maphungvāmara,
awui tekhamateina awui thili mashurvamara.
A ringlakha ringphai da akhalatta shānkhuilala,
a khalattawui vang khamathā kasā tharan mina solala,
kahora matheiluilaki kaji
avāva̱ ngarāwui ngalemli ana vāra,
Mina awui hekhamahei chieina okthuiching majirarmara,
ava shimānhaoki kaji sāyur kathāna.
Pangshapa, Vare
zimik kashokwui eina thuida katun eina tangda matuida okathuili hokhui.
Khamathā kākashunga Zionwui eina,
Varena horshoka.
Ithumwui Varena rāda kasaikha mapamana,
awui mangāli chuikakachupa mei lei,
ali kuimareida siphan zingrot lei.
Awui yurli bichar sākhavai atungshong kazingramli,
kala okathuili ana hoi.
“Pha̱kaphayā eina ngasoda ili tuingashit kasā,
ningtongda shitsangbing iwui ngalemli kaziplu!”
Kazingramna awui khamashung khangarong phongmi,
kaja Vare a khalatta bichar kasaana.
“Nganālu, O iwui yurbing, chieina ina hāngra,
O Israel, ina nawuitungli hāngphatra.
I Vare, nawui Varena.
Nathumna pha̱kaphayāwui vang ina nathumli khamachin maningmana;
nathumwui rikkatā kachigat thangkachida iwui ngalemli lei.
Nathumwui shim eina ina mukkā makhuimara,
nathumwui yaoshangwui eina mevāla makhuimara.
Kaja ngahongwui sā kachiva̱,
kaphung thingthingli khalei sha̱keila iwuina.
Yongkazata vānao saikora ina thei,
kala ngaleili kazat saikorala iwuina.
“I thaisāsi kaje, ina nathumli mahāngmara;
kaja apuk-apaga kala chili khalei saikora iwuina.
Ina seiwui asā shaila, lah meshee mangla?
Ningkashiwui pha̱kaphayā Vareli chigatlu,
Juimeikap kachipāli nana khangashit sākahai chi milu;
kala kakhanang atamli ili ngakaolu;
Ina nathumli kanshokmira, nathumna ili tekmatei ngasakra.”
Kha makaphā makhayābingli Varena hānga,
“Iwui shiyan nathumna hangtā khavai khimashun leikhala?
Maningkha iwui tuingashit nathum morchaili parhai khavai khi mashun leikhala?
Kaja nathum kharākli yangkharinga,
iwui tui nathumna khanukshong horhai.
Nathumna khale mi theiakha awui ngasotnao sai,
kala phokaphābingli nathum ngasozata.
“Makaphā otli nathumwui khamor makhāmmana,
kala nathumwui male eina mikhanam ot sai;
Nathumna pamda nachināli makaphā tui hāngpama;
nava̱wui naoli nana mashāta.
Hikatha hi nathumna sāhaira, kala ina kasaikha pama,
ila nathum kathā akhanada nathumna phaninga.
Kha ara nathumwui mangāli kaphen khuishokta ina kakaharna.
“Hi machutkhuilu, Vareli malaikahai nathum;
maningakha ina serkazamda khipākhana kanshokmi khavai maleisāmara!
Ningkashi pha̱kaphayā sāda khuikharābing ili khayākashina;
apong mashungrik kahai chili ina Varewui huikhami chitheira!”
O
ili lumashanmilu;
nawui makhavāta lukhamashan athishurda iwui sāyon kahai sāshimitmihaolu.
Iwui makaphā makhayā saikorawui eina pheomilu,
kala iwui moreiwui eina tharmilu!
Kaja iwui khayonkhamāng ina thei,
kala iwui morei iwui mangāli leichingda lei.
kala nawui mikyanli makaphā chi sāhaira,
chieina nana tuitak tākhami chi mashunga
kala nawui bicharli shāt maleimana.
Yanglu, moreilungli ili ishava̱na vaikhui,
ili khayonlungli pharai.
Yanglu, nana alungli khamashung chi ningchānga;
Chiwui vang eina khangathuma wuklungli ili awor tamchitheimilu.
Maharnā eina pheomilu,
chieina I tharhaora;
ili pheomilu, chieina I horāmli charmeihaora.
Ili ringkaphā khamathān eina chipemilu;
nana sātekmi kahai ara̱kui chi mathānranu.
Iwui khayonkhamāng pheomiserhaida,
iwui morei saikora kha-yangkheimilu.
O Vare, ili wuklung kathar semsangmilu,
kala kadhara kala khamashunga manglā sangmilu.
Nawui pamwui eina ili makhuithuimihaialu,
kala nawui kathara Manglā iwui eina makhuimihaialu.
Nawui huikhamiwui ringkaphā chi ili sangmilu,
kala ili kahāng nganāngairareo kahai ning sangmilu.
Chieina nawui apong khayon kasābingli ina tamchitheira,
chieina morei kaphungbingna nali latungra.
O Vare, ashee eina khangui kasāwui eina ili kanshokmilu,
ili huikhame Vare,
kala imalena nawui ngatangkhamiwui laa pangda vaora.
O
chieina ikhamorna nawui masot chi chitheira.
Kaja pha̱kaphayāli nana mamathānmana;
Ina rikkatā kachigat chigatra jilala nana ningyāng maungmara.
Varena khuisangkapai pha̱kaphayā chiya,
yurkahaiya kala kakhanang manglā chili O Vare,
nana maningkachaimara.
Nawui ningyat atamli, Zionli kaphā sāmilu,
Jerusalemwui phākho sakāmiluishitlu,
chieina khamashung pha̱kaphayāli nana ningyāng ungra;
rikkatā kachigat, kala katonga rikkatā kachigat kasali;
chieina nawui hanphutli mukkābing chigatra.
O pangshapa, khisāda varekathei
mili zakkashi kasāwui vang langsokhala?
Langpongda nana
shimān khavai sai.
Namale kazana kuisighai thai,
yankasai ot kasaa na.
Kaphāli lāngmeida nana makaphāli leishi,
khamashung khamatuile kakapik chungmei.
Zakshi khavai tui kachiva̱ nana leishi,
O mikhanama male!
Kha Varena nali katang mavaila sakhaichanghaora,
nawui kachon shimwui eina ana shimenkhuida nali serkazamhaora,
kharingabing okthui khavai pamwui eina ana nali phurshokhaora.
Khamashungabingna theira, kala ngacheera,
kala ali mana̱rorda hāngra,
“Yanglu, Vareli awui ngayin khavai masākhangaia,
kha awui makhavāta lanli shitkasanga,
kala awui lanli ngayin khavai phāthui kahaia chi!”
Kha iva Varewui shimli khamateka oliverong kathāna.
Varewui makhangachei leikashi chili ina katang mavaila shitsanga.
Ina nali ningshichingra,
nana sāmi kahai chiwui vang.
Naming ina vaora,
kaja hi kaphā otna.
“Vare maleimana” da hānga.
Athum chiya kateikazā,
ningkakachai khayonkhamāng ot sai,
kaphā kasā akhala maleimana.
Varena kazingramwui eina yangtai
mi saikorawuitungli;
Vareli khangachee thangkhama mazanglikhala da.
Athum kongluiserhaira;
athum saikora ngaraichāda mamashungsermana;
kaphā kasā khipākha maleimana,
akhala maleimana.
Vareli khangakao makhalei,
iwui mibingli khamui thāda kashaibing,
makaphā ot kasā athum,
theishingkakhui maleimala?
Athum chili ngacheeshun eina lei,
chikathā khangachee mashoklakrangli!
Kaja makaphā athumwui ara̱kui,
Varena chaikathān ngasakhaora;
athumli khayak ngasakra,
kaja Varena athumli mamayāmana.
Iyavo, Israelwui vang ngatangkhami Zionwui eina rāsi kaja!
Varena awui mibingwui lan hankhami tharan,
Jacobna ringphāra, Israelna mathānra.
O Vare naming mangā eina ili kahuimilu,
kala nawui pangshap eina ili mashun hāngsangmilu.
O Vare, iwui seihā kasā shāmilu;
ikhamor eina kapo kashāmilu.
Kaja achei makathei mibingna ili mamayāmada ngakarthuihaira,
sakashebingna imanglā khuikhavai phai;
Vareli athumna matheimimana.
Yanglu, Vare iwui ngachonkhamena,
Iwui yangkashebingwui zakkashi eina ana athut khuimira;
nawui ningkatong chieina athumli shimānchao ngasakhaolu.
Mingairareo kachigat eina ina nali pha̱phayāra;
namingli ningkashi ina mira, O
kaja hi kaphaana.
Kaja kakhanang kachiva̱wui eina nana ili khāngshokmi,
kala iwui yangkashebingli khayui chi imik eina theihaira.
O Vare, iwui seihā kasā nāshungmilu;
Ina kapowui eina nakhalatta mangathummihailu!
Ili yangmilu, kala ngahānkāmilu;
ili kakhanangna yuihaira.
I khanangnāhaira
yangkashebingwui akhonna;
makaphābingna singkharenghaoda.
Kaja athumna iwuitungli kakhanang khuirai,
kala malungkhavāta athumna ili yangshilāka.
Ining chotnāhaira,
kathiwui khangachee iwuitungli rāshunghaira.
Khangachee kakathir ili rāhaida khangachee khangachāna pemhaira.
“Iyavo, ila nāsha̱ thāda angachāng kasi kaje!
Ina yongthuihaida chingri angasāmhaora.
Mha, ina katāva̱li thuihaida,
lamhāngli vāpamhaora.
Siphan zingrot khangasha̱wui eina ngayin khavai thākta akha vāphākhuihaora” da ina hānga.
Athumwui khangarān sakhaimihaolu,
O
kaja keinungli khangama̱ khangashao ina thei.
Ngashun ngayā athumna phākho kuimareida zata,
chiwui alungli zakkashi khonkazarmāng lei,
ja̱tā kahai chiwui alungli lei,
rekakharek eina namkazā leihngapha̱ chiwui eina mapakthuimana.
Yangkashemāngna ili ngashimkashisi kaja—
ina khāngshapra;
yuikashemāngna sālākrada zakshida kasāsi kaje ina awui eina yāmngathumshapra.
Kha ili ngaraikachā, iwui khavāknao,
theikakasaiya ngasotnao chi nana.
Ini leishiri eina chān ngazekrumrum jiya;
Varewui shimli ngarumda yaothuirumsai.
Athumli kathi rāshungranu;
kharing eina Kathewui ramli vāranu;
khangachee khangachā eina chikhurli zangranu.
Kha ina Vareli ngakaowa;
kala
Ngazin eina ngathor kala ngashun mateila ina maringkaphā hāngphatta ngahuipama,
kala ana iwui khon shāmira.
Ina rai ngararda khaleiwui eina imanglā ana chingri haimira,
kaja kachungkhana ili mamayāmada kaziphaira.
Achālakhawui eina wungpamkhongli chipam kahai ana shāmida athumli hamsang ngasakra;
khikhalajila athumna ain mamayonmana,
kala Vareli mangacheemana.
Iwui ngasotana awui ngasotnaobingli mamayāmada pāng khāngda awui tuingashit sākhai.
Awui tui seina̱khanli lāngda nganaimei,
kha wuklungli raiwui ning mānga;
awui tui thaoli lāngda mayomei,
kha athum chiya raighai kasing kathāna.
ana yangmira;
khangarongali ana mangatha̱ ngasaklakmara.
Kha, O Vare, nana athumli thukmeikap kaji chomli horsanghaora;
ashee ningkachāngbing kala kachipatabing,
athumwui mirin tangkhaila maokthuimara.
Kha iva nali shitsangtha̱ra.
O Varivara, ili khalumashanmilu,
kaja mibingna ili naikazamda lei;
langpongda yangkashebingna ili rekhareka;
langpongda ili yangkashebingna naikazampama;
kaja kachungkhana langsolak eina ili ngararpama.
Ina khangachee tharan nali ining horsanga.
Awui tuili ina masot kachikata Vare,
khangachee maleila Vareli ina shitsanga.
Phasā khavaiana ili khi sāthukra?
Langpongda athumna ili khanang khavai sai;
athumwui ning ili zakkashiwui vang māng phaninga.
Athum khalatta kharupkhuilaga ngarumda rimpama,
iwui pheikār athumna ra̱yangpama.
Athumna imanglā khuikida khangaraiwui vang,
athumwui khayon chiwui vang athumli athut hāngsangmilu;
O Vare, lungvāt eina mibingli maikashi milu!
Ina ngareishok ngareizang kasā nana shānkhuihaira;
iwui chāra̱ nawui liklili thaimihailu!
Chi nawui lairikli mazangmala?
Chieina ina kaho atam tharan iwui yangkashebing ngareiungra,
Vare iwui vangna kaji hi ina thei.
Awui tuili ina masot khamia Vare,
awui tuili ina masot khamia
Vareli ina khangachee maleila shitsanga,
mina ili khi sāthukrakhala?
O Vare, ina nali ngashit kahai chi sālakra,
Ina nali ningkashiwui kachigat mira.
Kaja nana kathiwui eina imanglā khāngshokmi,
ina Varewui mangāli kharinga kahorli zatkhavai, mha, iphei
makonglui ngasakmana.
Ili khalumashanmilu, O Varivara,
ili khalumashanmilu,
kaja imanglāna nali ngayina;
nawui angachangwui khaya̱li,
sākashimāna siphan zingrot mavānranglakha eina tangda,
ina ngayinra.
Juikhamataia Vare,
awui khangarān ili ungshungkhame Vare chili ina ngakaowa.
Ana kazingram eina chihorāda chieina ili huimira,
ili naikakazambingli ana maishi ngasakra.
Varena awui makhangachei leikashi kala ningtongda shitkasang chitheira!
Miwui naomayarabingli kārāmda kashaia kazingkha̱bingwui alungli,
ina ngayaipama;
athumwui ahā kazei kala malāthing thai,
athumwui male kazana raighai thai.
O Varivara, kazing atungshong sochikatranu!
Nawui tekhamatei okathui peiranu.
Iwui chonsang khavai athumna khalen sangda;
ining suitāhaowa,
iwui shongfali athumna chom chuiya,
kha athum khalatta chili tāzanga.
ining mangacheimana!
Ina laa sāda nimshimri ngasakra!
Thuilu, imanglā!
Thuilu, O sipa, tingteilā!
Ina kazing kathangli mathotra!
Nali mibingwui alungli ina ningkashi mira,
O
nali yurbingwui alungli ina masotlaa sāra.
Kaja nawui makhangachei leikashi kazingramli reilaka,
nawui ningkatong muiyā kāshunga.
Kazingram atungshong sochikatranu, O Vare!
Nawui tekhamatei okathui saikora peiranu!
Khamungabing, nathumna khamashung eina hukhum sāla?
Saikorali mashungrik eina bichar sāla?
Maningmana, nathumwui ningli makhamashungmāng ngarāna;
okathuili, nathumwui pāngna sākashi ot sai.
Makaphābingna naopamwui eina apong ngateida zata,
athumna kapharā eina thuida khayon sai,
kakapiktui matuiya.
Athumna phara̱wui hu thāda hu phunga,
leijanākhok thāda mashāmimana,
chithāda suikatheibingwui akhonla I mashāmana lah kathembingwui kahola mashāmana.
O Vare, athumwui khamorli hā sātekmihaolu;
O
Longthui kahai tara̱ thāda athum shimānhaoranu;
khawo thāda athumli naikharothaoranu kala ngahuihaoranu.
Khripaili khorpungla kathi thāda,
kachāng makapei nao zimik kahor matheilak kaji thāda athumlila chitharanu.
Athumna chi matheiranglakha,
athumli khawo thāda katattāhaowa;
athumna ringda leilakhala,
Varewui malungkhavāt alungli,
athumli phanthuihaoranu.
Athut kakhui chi kathei tharan,
khamashung-khangarongana mathānra;
makaphaawui asheelungli aphei pheora.
Mibingna, “Khamashung-khangaronga miwui vang sāman leikachangkhata;
okathuili bichar sakhame Vare leikachangkhata,”
da hāngra.
O iwui Varivara,
iwui yangkashebingwui eina ili kakhāngshokmilu,
ili mamayāla ngakarkathuibingwui eina ngākmilu,
makaphā ot kasābingwui eina ili kanmilu,
kala ashee ra̱kachanga mibingwui eina ili huimilu.
Kaja yanglu, athumna imanglā khuikida rimda lei;
sākashe mibing athum khalatta ngarumda ili ngasunga.
O
iwui khangui maleila athumna ili sākida yunzatli.
Na ngakarthuida rāngachonmilu, kala khayangmilu.
Na, ashangva̱wui Vare
Miyur saikorali tandi mikhavai thuimilu;
makaphā sāki kajebing akhala mataihaialu.
Ngazin kachida athumna hanunglaga keinung
kuimareida fa thāda khongzata.
Athumna khamor eina khongzatta morchai eina nira,
kaja “Khipāna ithumli shārakhala?”
da athumna phaninga.
Kha, O
yur saikorali nana mana̱rora.
O iwui Pangshapa, ina nali masotlaa sāra;
kaja O Vare, na iwui raipanna.
Makhangachei leikashewui alungli iwui Varena ili ngachonmira;
yangkashebingwui maikashi chi ili iwui Varena ngashān ngasakra.
Athumli masāthathaialu,
iwui mibingna malaihaipaishina;
nawui pangshap eina athumli yuichachang zatngasakta nemphak tāngasaklu.
O
Kaja athum khamorwui morei, athum morchaiwui tui,
athumwui langsotli manranu.
Kaja athumna kapikta khonkashiwui vang,
lungvāt eina athumli shimān ngasaklu,
athum makupranglakha eina tangda shimān ngasaklu,
chieina Jacobwuitungli okathui peida Varena munga kaji mina theikhuira.
Ngazin kachida athumna hanunglaga keinung kuimareida fa thāda khongzata.
Athumna kashakazā kuimareida phāzatlaga masamphangakha nira.
Kha ina nawui pangshapwui vang laa sāra;
makhangachei leikashiwui vang ina ngathorshong laa sāra.
Kaja nana iwui kakhanang atamli iwui ngayin khavai raipan sāmi.
O iwui Pangshapa, ina nali masotlaa sāra.
kaja, O Vare, na iwui raipanna,
ili makhangachei leikashi chitheikhame Varena.
O Vare, nana ithumli horhaida ithumwui raipanbing sātekmihaira.
Na malungvāthaowa;
iyavo, ithumli kahuimiluilu.
Ngalei nana nganuk ngasaka,
sākakhaila nana sakhaihaira;
kaikahai chi chiphomilu, kaja chi nganukhaira.
Nana nawui mili kasaka ot kachungkha phungngasakhaira;
nana ithumli mangkhavai zam mida china ithumli nganing ngasaka.
Nali khangacheebingwui vang nana philān shunmihaira,
malāwui eina chili kuimarei khavai.
nawui yāpang eina khayuiya mida ithumli ngahānkāmilu.
Varena awui katharapamwui eina hānghaira:
“Mathānthup eina ina Shechem ngayarkhaira
kala Succothwui tampāk ngayarshokra.
Gilead iwuina, Manasseh iwuina;
Ephraim iwui kuihona;
Judah iwui khānthingna.
Moab iwui pāng mazik khavai khongsaina,
Edomli iwui pheihop haivai;
Philistiali ina raiyotlaa vaowa.”
Raipan sākahai keinungli khipāna ili khuiungrakhala?
Edomli ili khipāna thānvārakhala?
O Vare, nana ithumli horkahai maningmala?
O Vare, nana ithumwui raimili mangasomimana.
Iyavo, yangkasheli yuikhavai ngachonmilu,
kaja miwui khangachon aremana.
Vareli ngasoda ithum pinglak eina sāra;
yangkashebingli pheinai sāki kaje chi ana.
O Varivara, iwui khavao shāmilu,
iwui seihā kasā nganāmilu;
okathui akatangwui eina ina nali vaowa,
iwui ning ngazan kahai tharan.
Ili juikhamei lunghār chili nana kathānvamilu;
Kaja na iwui ngayin khavaina,
yangkashebingwui eina ngākmi khavai kapanga dolanna.
Nawui kachonshimli katang mavaila I okthuiga!
Iyavo, nawui angachāng khaya̱li ning nganungkhunghaisi kaje chāng!
Kaja O Vare, nana iwui khangashitbing shāhaira,
namingli khangachee athumwui shimlui nana ili mihaira.
Awungawui mirin okpei ngasakmilu;
thot saikorali aming leichingranu!
Varewui mangāli awunga sāchingranu;
makhangachei leikashi kala ningkatongna yangmichingranu!
Chithāda thangkachida ina namingli masotlaa sāchingra,
Ina thang-thang khangashit kasā eina ngasoda.
Varewui vang māng imanglāna chingri eina ngaraili;
awui eina iwui huikhami rai.
Amāngna iwui lunghārna kala huikhamena,
iwui raipanna;
I mangatha̱lakmara.
Kongluinanai khalei raipam, pithuinanai
khalei hokhaithing kathā mi chili,
nathumna ali karankha shaopamfarakhala?
Awui khangampamwui eina ngakhuntā khavaimāng athumna ngarāna.
Khangui otsakli athumna ringphai.
Athumna khamor eina somi kha alungshong athumna khonshiya.
Varewui vang māng imanglāna chingri eina ngaraili;
kaja iwui kachihān awuili lei.
Amāngna iwui lunghār kala iwui huikhamena,
iwui raipanna; I mangatha̱lakmara.
Iwui khayā kala huikhami Varewuili lei;
iwui pangshapa lunghār,
ngayin khavai Varena.
O mibing, ali atam kachida shitsangchinglu;
nathumwui ning ali milu;
Vare hi ithum ngayin khavaina.
Khangazana mibing khaksuikha kathāna,
kashang-khareibing thankhanguiana;
khān
athum ngarumserlaga khaksuikhali ngavengmei.
Minamda kakhuili akachanga masaalu,
likazāli machihānphāphaalu;
lan mataikasang tharan,
naning chili mahaialu.
Varena hāngkhashiya;
Ina shākhani shiya:
kaja pangshap Varewuina;
Kaja miwui otsak athishurda nana hanmiya.
O Varivara, na iwui Varena,
ina nali phai;
imanglāna nali ra̱changda;
katheng lamhāngli tara̱ makhalei thāda imanglā vānhaida nali phai.
Chiwui vang nawui kathar shimli ina yangda nawui tekhamatei kala pangshap ina thei.
khikhalajila nawui makhangachei leikashi mirinli phāmei;
imorchaina nali masot mira.
Chiwui vang ina ringlakha eina tangda nali sora;
ina ipāng khāngkāda namingli ngakaora.
Imanglāna athao eina angating kashai thai,
kala khamathāna imorchai eina ikhamorna nali masot chigata;
Ina iwui pettungli nali phaningkhaung,
kala ngayāshongwui atamli nali khamachuk tharan;
kaja nana ili ngachonkhamena,
kala angachāng khaya̱li khamathānwui vang ina laa sai.
Imanglāna nali shaitita;
nawui yāpangna ili singmi.
Kha imanglā shimān khavai kasā athum okathuiwui kathuka chili zangra;
athumli raighaiwui pangshapli horsangmira,
athum ramfawui shaikhavai ngasāra.
Kha awungana Vareli mathānra,
awui ming kasinga saikora tekmateira;
kaja kakapika miwui khamor khāmmihaora.
O Varivara, iwui maringkaphā kahāng hi kashāmilu;
yangkashebingli khangacheewui eina imanglā yangmilu,
makaphā makhayāwui ngathumsak chiwui eina ili kathummilu;
makaphā awor kasābingwui einala,
athumwui male raighai thāda kakharā,
kakhā tui eina malātheira̱ thāda kharina,
shāt makakāli khangathumpam eina kāpa;
athumna kashuirak khangachee maleila kāpa.
Athumwui makaphā kasāli singtita;
athumna ngathumda khalen kasangwui pongli ngazeka,
“Ithumli khipāna theirakhala?
Ithumwui khayon khipāna phāshokrarra?
Ithumna themlāk eina sākakhui apong phāshokhaira.”
da hānga.
Kaja miwui ning kala wuklung thuklaka!
Kha Varena athumli malā thairāra;
kashuirak eina athum khamā za̱ra.
Athumwui malewui vang eina ana shimān ngasakra;
athumli katheibingna kui khayitra.
Chieina mi saikorana ngacheera;
Varena khi sāmi kahaikhala kaji athumna hāngra,
kala ana khi samihairakhala da chukmaja̱ra.
Khamashungana
kala ali ngayinkhuiranu!
Wuklung mashungrik kahaibingna ali masot mira.
Zionli khalei, O Varivara;
masot nali mingayiya,
kala nali khangashit sāserra.
O seihā kasā shākhame na!
Phasā khavaia saikorana nali rāsera.
Ithumwui khayonkhamangna ithumli yuikahai tharan,
chi nana pheomi.
Nana kapangkhuida nganai khangasak,
nawui shimli kapama a chi sokhamina!
Nawui kathara shim,
nawui shimwui kaphā kasā china ithum ningyāng unghaora!
Matakkhak kahai otsak eina nana ithumli ngatangkhami eina ngahānkāmi,
O ithumwui huikhame Vare;
okathui achikun saikorali khalei,
kala vākhamayar shamadru saikorawui kachihāna chi nalaka;
nawui pangshap eina phungrei sākhuida,
nawui pangshap chithei;
shamadruwui khangaphao,
tara̱wui khangaphao,
miwui khonkazar nana chingngasaka;
chieina okathuiwui akatangli khalei a china nawui otsak theida ngachee;
ngathor ngazinwui kashok kazang nana samida,
khamathānwui vang vaongasaka.
Nana okathuili yaorāda chili tara̱ chaimi,
chili nana ngalei tumngasaka.
Varewui kong tara̱ pemtinghai;
nana athumwui athāyur ngarānmi,
chithāda nana ngarān kahaina.
Chāngkahaiya luili nana mavātla tara̱ chaimi, kajujui chi khayammihaida,
zingrotna ngalei chorngasaka,
kala somilaga reisang ngasaka.
Nawui makhavāt zingkum peida sāmi,
nawui siguigari shongfa kachida thao ngayiya.
Lamhāngwui seizātpam wonnui timda pemtaiya,
kaphungbingna mathānthuphai,
seihomphung yaoshangna pemtinghai,
luiwuk hupta māthei hammithai,
khamathānwui vang athumna laa sāngarumda vaoshoka.
Okathui hupta Vareli
khamathānkhon vaolu;
amingwui tekhamatei laa sālu,
ali tekhamatei masot milu!
Vareli hānglu, “Nawui otsak kayākha ngacheekhala!
Nawui pangshap hakmahālakhaoda nawui yangkashebing namangāli
khangacheena ngayumhaowa.
Okathui huptana nali khoruma,
athumna nali masotlaa sai,
namingli sochikatta laa sai.”
Rāyanglu, Varena khi sahairakhala:
miwui alungli ana sākahai otsak ngacheekapaiana.
mina kong chili phei eina makānkai,
chili ithumna ali ringphai,
awui pangshap eina mashimānda munga,
awui mik miyurbingwuitungli yangmi—
ngakaikashibing athum khalattana makhāngchikataranu.
Ithumwui Vareli solu, O mibing;
ali kasokhon shāranu,
kharingabingwui alungli ithumli haikhame,
ithumwui phei manganaithui ngasakmana.
Kaja, O Vare, nana ithumli tamyanghaira;
lupāsāli ruikhayang thāda nana ithumli tamyanghaira.
Nana ithumli khalenli manngasaka;
kala ithumwui kashānli kharita otphun chiphuna;
ithumwui kui nana mili naiza̱ ngasaka;
meilunglila tara̱lunglila ithum zata;
kha nana ithumli khamashāpamli thānshokmi.
Nawui shimli ina rikkatā kachigat eina ngasoda zangra;
iwui khangashit ina nali mira,
ina khananglakha imorchaina matuitā kahai
kala ikhamorna ngashit kahai chi.
Asa kakā rikkatā kachigat nali chigatra,
yaovā pha̱kaphayāwui meikhut eina ngasoda;
ina mukkā kala mevāwui kachigat sāra.
Ralu, kala nganālu, Vareli khangacheebing,
chieina iwui vang ana khi sāmihaira̱ khala kaji ina hāngchitheira.
Ina ali panglāk eina vaowa,
kala imale eina ali masot chikata.
Iningli makaphā makhayā kasā ning zangsi kaja
Kha kachāngkhat Varena shāmihaira;
iwui seihā kasākhon ana shāmihaira.
Vareli sochikatranu,
khikhalajila ana iwui seihā makhalanmimana;
lah awui makhangachei leikashila iwui eina makhuithuimihaimana.
Varena ithumli lumashanmiranu, kala somiranu,
kala awui mai ithumwuitungli hormiranu,
chithāda nawui apong okathuili theikhuipaira,
nawui huikhami pangshap miyur saikorawui alungli theikhuipaira.
O Varivara, mibingna nali masot miranu,
mi saikorana nali masot miranu!
Miyurbingna mathānranu kala ringkaphāwui vang laa sāranu,
kaja nana miyurbingli ngaraichāda bichar sāmi,
kala miyurbingli okathui hili thānmi.
O Vare, yurbingna nali masochikatranu;
yur saikora nali masochikatranu!
Ngaleina theishirai shokngasaka;
Vare, ithumwui Varena ithumli somihaira.
Varena ithumli latluida somiranu;
okathui hupta ali ngacheeranu.
Varena ngakarhuiranu, awui yangkashebing chaiyānghaoranu;
ali yangkakharingbing awui mangāli yāmhaoranu.
Meikhut phanthui kahai thāda athumli kashamhaoranu;
meili khuira̱ khameng thāda,
Varewui mangāli makaphā makhayā chi shimānhaoranu!
Kha khangaronga mi mathānranu,
athumna Varewui mangāli maiyāranu;
athum mathānda ringpharanu!
Vareli laa sālu, amingli sochikatta laa sālu,
muiyātungli katonga chili laa vaolu;
awui ming
Avāva̱ makhaleibingwui avāva̱,
ra̱meinaobingli yangkhame sāda,
Varena awui katharapamli lei.
Ngachakyāng kahaiali pamkhavai Varena shim mi,
narkahaibingli ana mataikasang pamli thānshokmi,
kha ngakaikashena tākok kahai ngaleili pama.
O Vare, nana nawui mibingwui mangāli kazat tharan,
nana lamhāngli kazat tharan,
Vare mangāli;
Sinai kānda nganuka, Vare Israelwui Varewui miktāli.
O Vare, nana apam hupta makhavāta kazing rotā ngasaka;
nawui shimluina kakhanangwui eina nana hanmilui.
Nawui yao ashangva̱na sompam khavai samphanga,
O Vare, nawui kaphā kasāwui alungli khavātabingli mizāi.
paokaphā phungkhami ashangva̱ chi hakmahālaka:
“Raimibingwui awungabing, athum yāma,
athumna yāma!”
Sha̱naobingna ngaponkakhui shimli ngayara,
athumna yaoshangli ngasopamlala—
lupāsā eina romphin kahai nasha̱wui angachāng,
pheimareng khamateka sinā eina kasā chi.
Pangshapana awungabingli kashamyāng kahai tharan Zalmonli horām thaka.
O hakkhamahā phungrei, Bashanwui phungrei;
O kaphungton kachunga phungrei, Bashanwui phungrei!
Khisāthuda yuishāt eina yangkhala,
O kaphungton kachunga phungrei,
Varena ningkachāng awui pamkhangai kaphung chili,
mha,
Pangshapa siguigarili ngasoda,
thingtharā khanishida thingthingwuitungli thingthing,
mibing kala ngakaikashebingwui einala kachigat khuiya;
kaja apam chi
Thangkachida ithumli khāngkhui khame
chili soranu, Vare ithumwui huikhamena.
Ithumwui Vare hiya huikhame Varena;
kala kathiwui eina ngatangkashok chi VARE,
Prohowuili lei.
Kha awui yangkashebingwui kui,
khayon apongli kazata ahākazara awui wungkuihon chi Varena shaokhaira.
ina kathuka shamadruwui eina khuishokra,
chieina nathum ashee eina phei pheora,
kala nathumwui fawui malena yangkashebingwui eina yar samphangra.”
O Vare, nawui mi ngaher eina kazat thei,
kathara shimlungli iwui Awunga, iwui Varewui mi longzanga.
Laa kasābingna mangāli,
laawui akap-akai kasingbingna naowa,
angachaili ngalānaobingna timbrel shaozata:
“Hakkhamahā yarui kazipli
O Israelwui ura̱ nathum.”
Athumwui ngachaili teomeikap kaje Benjaminna thāna,
chili Judahwui wungnaobing,
Zebulunwui wungnaobing,
Naphtaliwui wungnaobing zanga.
O Vare, nawui pangshap kazipkhuilu,
nawui yang chitheilu, O Vare,
ithumwui vang sākhame.
Nawui Khorumshim Jerusalemli leihaoda awungabingna nali lemmet phungrāmi.
Kaharlu Egypt, khararli khalei ramsāli,
yurbingli kaharlu, seinaobingli khangayur seishang chili.
Shai khangamarbing chili phei eina naikazamlu;
raili khamathānabing chili kashamyānghaolu.
Egyptna pithrai rāchigatranu,
Ethiopiana Vareli pāng khāngkhavai thākta rāranu.
O okathuiwui wungrambing, Vareli masotlaa sālu;
kazingram, achālakhawui kazingramli tongkazatali,
yanglu, awui pangshapakhon,
awui khon vaotāda lei.
Israelwuitungli ngam khalei Vare chiwui pangshap chitheilu,
awui pangshap kazingli lei.
Awui kathara shimlui Vare hi khangachee khangachāna,
Israelwui Vare,
ana yāng pangshap awui mibingli mi.
Varivarali soranu!
Ili huimilu, O Varivara!
Kaja tara̱na akahung kāshunghaira.
I pheinganin makhalei rāhukli tāzanga;
I kathuka tara̱li zanghaoda,
tara̱ khangaphaona ili kheirora.
I chapsānhaira, iwui kharokla thenghaira;
Vareli khangaraiwui vang imikla tangmanghaira.
kapikta ili khangashaobing,
ili shimān ngasakki kaji athum panglaka.
Ina maleekakhui ara ina runphalungrala?
O Varivara, iwui mangkhama̱ nana thei,
Ina salāng kahai nawui eina thumkahai maleimana.
Nali kachihānabingli iwui mangā eina makhayak ngasakalu,
O saikorawui Proho VARE;
nali kaphābingli iwui mangā eina mamaishi ngasakalu,
O Israelwui Vare.
Kaja ina misui kaphung hi nawui vangna,
chiwui vang eina khayā khamalāna mai pemhaira.
Ichinā ngarāli kha̱mi thāhaira,
pharākhangarum ishava̱wui ichina ngarāli zakmai makathei thāhaowa.
kala nali kazeibingwui kazei chi iwuitungli tāhaira.
Khumda imanglā hamsang khangasak tharan,
chi iwui khayon phākhavai ngasāhaowa.
Ina ngavai khavai porākachon kasā tharan,
athumwui vang I chansā khavai ngasāhaowa.
I hi ngaveili kapambing ngazeknganao khavai sāthuihaowa;
kala khamaripabingna ili laa phoksanga.
Kha O
Nana mayākapai atamli,
khavāt makhalei makhangachei leikashi eina ngahānkāmilu.
Nawui makhangachei ngachonkhami eina
rāhukli tākazangwui eina ili kanmilu;
yangkashebingwui eina kala kathuka tara̱wui eina ili kanmilu.
Ra̱phongna ili mangaphaoror ngasakalu,
lah kathukanala mamayuisang ngasakalu,
lah chomnala iwuitungli khamor mashungkhamhairanu.
Ngahankāmilu, O
leikashi chi phālaka;
nawui makhavāta lukhamashan athishurda,
ili ngareira milu.
Naraowui eina mai mangareithuimi haialu;
kaja I chotchāngdalei, ili thākta ngahānkāmilu.
Ili rānganaimilu, ili kahuimilu,
ili yangkashebingwui eina ningkhān ngasakmilu!
Iwui khayonkhamāng,
iwui khayākhamala kala iwui maikashila nana thei;
iwui yangkashebing nana theisera.
Zeikakharuina ining ngayānghaira,
chiwui vang eina I chihān khavai maleithura.
Ili lumashanmi khavai vang phai,
kha akhanida maleimana;
kala ninglum khavai phai,
kha ili akhala masamphangmana.
kala iwui ra̱chanwui vang mangkhavai kathurra̱ mimanga.
pha̱kaphayā zātkhānala khalen ngasāranu.
Athumwui mik tangmangmihaida matheiranu,
athum kashān nganukkapopchingranu.
Nawui malungkhavāt athumwuitungli heirorlu,
nawui malungkathuina athumli ngaphankhuiranu.
athumwui kachonshimli mi khipākha mapamranu.
Kaja nana tandi mikahaiya chili athumna rekhareka;
kala nana khamā za̱mi kahaia chili athumna mataida khanang ngasaka.
Athumli tandiwuitungli tandi ngarormilu;
nawui eina athum chihokhami masamphangranu.
athum khamashungabingwui alungli aming machanaranu.
Kha iva saza̱haida ngasheida lei;
O Vare, nawui huikhami china ili kajuitungli haimiranu!
Varewui mingli laa eina na masotmira;
ningkashi eina ali ina reingasakra.
Hina mukkāli lāngda
angachee kala asho kakā chilila lāngmeida.
Rekkakharek samkaphanga china theida mathānranu;
Vareli kaphā nathum,
nathumwui wuklung china ning mathukranu.
Kaja khavātali
kala narhaida khalei akhalattawui mili machinmahaimana.
Kazing eina ngaleina ali soranu,
ngayi kala chiwui alungli ringda khalei saikorala.
Kaja Varena Zionli huimira,
kala Judahwui keinung sakāluishitra;
kala awui raobingna chili pānda chi khuira;
awui raobingwui naomayarana shimlui khuira,
kala amingli leikashebingna chili pānra.
O Varivara, ili kanmilu!
Ili sāthat khavai phākazatbingli pa̱ngapāda khayak ngasaklu!
Iwui kalākashiwui vang khamathānabing chi latung ngasakta maishiranu.
Ili, mana̱kashebing chi athumwui maikashiwui vang khanangranu.
Nali kharā hupva̱li mathānda ringphāranu.
Nawui huikhamili ningkashi saikorana “Vare kayākha reimataikhala”
da hāngchingranu.
Iva ngazana kala khavātana;
ili thākta ngachonmilu, O Varivara.
Na iwui huikhamena,
O
O
ili mai mashi ngasaklakalu!
Nawui khamashung khangarong chili ili huimida kanmilu;
ili nāshungmilu, kala kahuimilu!
Na iwui ngayin khavai lunghār,
kapanga raipanna, ili huimi khavai kasāmilu,
kaja na iwui lunghār kala iwui raipanna.
O iwui Vare, makaphāwui sākashi pāng,
mashun makhalei kala sākashewui pāng yonkakhuiwui eina ili kakanmilu.
Kaja, O
O
I nganuilakha eina thuida na ina shitkasangana.
Kapharā eina thuida ina nali shaipama;
ishāva̱wui naopam eina ili khuikhami chi nana.
Ina masot mishon kaji chi nawui ponglina.
I athum kachungkhawui mangāli sākachithei kathā thāhaowa,
kha na iwui kapanga ngayin khavaina.
Langpongda ikhamor nawui tekhamatei kala masotna pemtinghai.
Ili asārlam machihomihaialu;
iyang kānkahai tharan mahormihaialu.
Kaja imanglā khuikida khangarānbingna ngasan ngarokta hānga,
“Varena ali horhaira;
kharomda ali tukkhuilu,
kaja ali kankhame maleiluimana” ji.
O Varivara, iwui eina matāthuimialu;
O iwui Vare, ili thākta khangachonmilu!
Ili kaphenabingli maikashi mida shimānhaoranu;
ili saza̱ khavai phākazatbingli yangkakharing kala maikashina romhaoranu.
Kha ina katang mavaila chihānchingra,
kala nali chungmeikhangai chungmeida sochikatra.
Ikhamorna nawui khamashung otsak,
nawui huikhamiwui otsak langpongda hāngra,
kaja athumwui mashingna iwui aworli mataimeihaowa.
Proho VAREwui pangshap otsak eina ngasoda ina rāra,
ina nawui khamashung khangarongmāng chili sochikatra,
O Varivara, nganuilakhawui eina thuida nana ili tamchitheimihaira,
kala ina arui eina tangda nawui matakhak kahai otsak vaochingda lei.
Chieina sarhaida kasārsam kashok atamlila,
O Varivara, ili horkahai masāmialu,
rāki kaji thot saikorali nawui pangshap ina mahāngseranglakha eina tangda.
O Varivara, nawui pangshap kala khamashung khangarong kazingram kāshunga.
Hakkhamahā ot sāmi kahaia,
O Varivara, na kathā khipā lei?
Ili nana kakhanang chungmeikharda theingasaka,
kala mathuk ngasakluira;
okathuiwui kathukawui eina nana ili khangshokluira.
Iwui khayākakā nana mataisangmira kala ili ning lum ngasakluira.
O iwui Vare, nawui ningkatongwui vang,
ina tingteilā einala nali masotlaa chikatra;
ina nali mazui einala masotlaa sāra,
O Israelwui Kathara!
Ina nali masotlaa kasā tharan,
imorchaina khamathānwui vang ngatangkhuimi kahai imanglānala vaora.
Langpongda imalena nawui khamashung ngachonkhami tui hāngra,
kaja ili sāza̱ khavai kasā athumli nana maishi ngasakhaira.
O Varivara, nawui mashun awungali milu,
kala nawui khangarong chi wungnao mayarali milu!
Khamashung eina nawui mibingli,
mashun eina nawui kachāmabingli bichar samiranu.
Phungreibingna mibingwui vang mataikasang phungrāmiranu,
kaphungbingna khamashung phungrāmiranu.
Kachāmabingwui vang ana nganingmiranu,
khavātabingli kanshokmiranu,
kala rekakharekabingli sākachupranu.
Zimik kachāng leilakha eina tangda,
thot saikorali vāpeida ali okpeiranu.
Katatmicham kaje khawotungli kazing rokatā thāda,
zingrotna okathuili tara̱ chaikharor thāda,
ala chikathā ngasāranu.
Awui atamli khangarongna shokpemranu,
kala kachāng makhalei eina tangda chingri kahai leichingranu.
Kong chiwui eina thuilaga okathui akatang eina tangda ana mungranu.
Awui yangkashebingna ali khorumranu,
kala athumna chifa malekranu.
Tarshish kala shamadru ngaleiwui awungabing ali shai miranu.
Sheba eina Sebawui awungabingna lemmet khuirāranu.
Awungabing saikora ali khorumranu,
miyur saikorana ali otram ngatha̱ranu.
Kaja khavātana khangakao tharan ana ali kanshokmi,
khangachon makhalei kachāmabinglila kanshokmi.
Khangazana, khavātabingli ana lumashana,
kala khavātabingwui manglā huimi.
Rekkakharek kala khangashaobingwui eina
athumwui manglā ana ngatangmi;
awui miktāli athumwui ashee aman saklaka.
Ali okpeimeiranu, Shebawui sinā ali miranu!
Awui vang seihā sachingranu,
kala awui vang sokhami langpongda pomirānu!
Ngalei chili makhavāta mā samphangranu,
kaphungtonbing theishiraina pemranu;
chiwui athei Lebanonwui tharanu;
Luiwui khawo thāda keinungwui eina mibingla mayāsangranu.
Aming leichingranu, zimik leilakha eina tangda awui ming zatchingranu!
Awui ming eina mibing athum khalatta soranu,
yur saikorana ali somi kahaia horanu.
Israelwui Vare
amāngna matakhak kahai ot sai.
Awui tekmateilak kahai mingli sochingranu,
awui tekhamatei okathui hupta pemranu,
Amen, Amen!
Jessewui naomayara Davidwui seihā kasā kuphaira.
Kachangkhat eina ningkhangatar kala
ningkathar athumli Vare phālaka.
Kha iva phei ngaphoknaikhaya,
iwui pheikār nganaithuinaikhaya.
Kaja makaphābingwui mataikasang chi theilaga,
ina athumwui langkaso chili mikpaishiya,
kaja athum kakhanang kachot maleimana;
athumwui phasā tāngpat nganaiyokhai.
Kateiwui thāda athum kakhanang mavaimana;
mi katei thāda athum kakhanang kakazā maleimana.
Chiwui vang eina lāngkasona athumwui chā sai
khangashaona kachon thāda fakhama.
Thaonāhaida athumwui mikla mazoshoka,
athumwui ning mangkhama̱na puitinghai.
Athumna mana̱shiya kala sāshida matuiya,
lāngsosor eina rekakharek tui hāngmachitzata.
Athumna kazingramli makhamayā matuiya,
okathui vāpeida male sosor hāngzata.
Chiwui vang mibingna ngareiungda athumli sochikata;
kala athumwui khayon matheimana.
Kala athumna “Varena kathāda theira,
Juikhamataiya chili theikashap leila?” da hānga.
Yanglu, hi makhayābingna;
atam kachida leiyāsorhai, athum shāngsanga.
Ining tharzā kahai,
ipāng khalāng ot makasā saikora aremana.
Kaja langpongda ining chotchānga,
ngathor kachida ili hāngmachina.
“Chithāda Ina matuira” da ina hānghaisaakha
nawui naomayarawui thotli ina kahatna.
Kha ina hi kathāda theikhuirakhala da kaphaning tharan hi khananglāk kahai otna,
Varewui kathara shimli mazangranglakha eina tangda
athumwui akatanga matheimara.
Kachangkhat eina nana athumli khanganai pamli haimi,
athumli konglui ngasakta shimān ngasaka.
Hunkhawui alungli khangachee khangachā eina,
athumli kathāda shimān ngasakchaohaokhala!
Athum chiya khamathuk tharan mangshong thai,
khamathuk tharan athumwui amāhā chili nana ningkachai.
Iningli khajir kahai tharan,
iningli kashātna kharung thākahai tharan,
I mangma̱tot eina matheithangkhamei,
nawui mangāli I sāyur thāhaowa.
Chithālala ina nali shurzatchingda lei,
iwui yāpang nana singmi.
Nana hāngkachithei eina ngasoda ili thānmi,
kala naoda nana tekhamatei eina ili samphangra.
Na maningla kazingramli iwui vang khipā leikhala?
Okathuili na maningla ina kakahao khangatei maleimana.
Iphasā eina imanglā ngazanlapai,
kha Vare iningwui yāng kala katang makhavai iwui yarna.
Kaja yanglu, nawui eina tāda khaleibing shimānserra;
nali kachipatbingli nana tangngasakhaora.
Kha iwui vanga Vareli khanganai phāshuna,
Proho VAREli iwui ngayin khavai sāhaira,
chiya ina nawui otsak saikorawui pongli hāngra.
O Varivara, ithumli khisāda nana chihochaohaokhala?
Nawui seihomphungwui yaobingli khisāda malung khākhala?
Achālakhawui eina nana nganaokhui kahai nawui miyurbingli phaningungmilu,
nawui shimluikat sāda ngatangkhui kahaibingli phaningungmilu!
Nana sompam khavai Zion Kaphungli phaningungmilu.
Ngayānglaga leiching kaje keinungli yaorāmilu;
katharashimli khalei kachiva̱ yangkashena sākazammiserhaira!
Nawui yangkashebingna nawui katharapamli khangangpama;
athumna athum khalattawui machut khavai philān khāngkai.
Atowui zangkhavaili thing sakakā pheinai chi athumna ngahā eina mara̱tekhaira.
Kala thing eina yekkakhui saikora athumna yāmkarnao kala ngahānao eina ngaphitkhaitāmiserhaira.
Nawui kathara shim athumna mei sa̱tai,
naming sompam khavai sāmakhaomida.
“Athumli ithumna yuikhuichaora”
da athum khalatta hāngngaroka;
athumna ngalei chili khalei Vareli khorum khavaipam saikora sa̱tāserhaowa.
Ithumwui machut khavai ithumna matheimana,
marān maleiluimana,
atam karankharakhala da kathei ithumwui alungli akhala maleithura.
O Vare, yangkashebingna karankha mana̱shira?
yangkashena namingli mashātchingrala?
Khisāda napāng kasaikha haihaokhala?
khisāthuda nawui yāpang namathik tungli haipamkhala?
Chithālala Vare, iwui Awunga,
achālakhawui eina okathuili huikhamiwui ot kasāna.
tara̱tungli dragonbingwui kui napāng eina shaokhai.
kala lamhāngwui sāwui vang kashakazā sāda chishai.
Ura̱la, kongrāla nana urngasaka;
longshon longthai kaji kongrā thengngasaka.
Ngashun nawuina, ngayāla nawuina;
zimikla, kahora saikorala nana sākhui.
Okathui kuimareida angarit nana sāmihaira;
zur-kān nana sāmihaira.
O
yangkashena kathāda mana̱shili,
mashitkasanga mina namingli mashāta.
Nawui nāsha̱wui manglā ramsābingli mamihaialu,
nawui khangazanawui mirin mamalaimichaohaialu.
Nawui tuingashit phaningungmilu;
kaja ram hiwui tangkhamangpam kachiva̱ khangashao miyurna pemtinghaira.
Khangazanali mai mashi ngasakalu;
kachāma kala khavātabing namingli masot chigatranu.
O Varivara, thuilu, nawui angalang phayatmilu;
phaningungmilu, mashitkasangana langpongda nali kathāda mana̱shilikhala?
Yangkashebingwui maikhareo chi,
kala nawui yuikashe bingwui khonzarshon kaji chi mamalaimihaialu.
O Vare, ithumna nali ningkashi mili,
ithumna nali ningkashi mili;
namingli ithumna ngakaowa kala nawui matakhak kahai otsak shānkhuiluishita.
Ina kapangsang kahai atam chili mashun eina ina bichar sāra.
Okathuila, chili khalaleila khanganuk tharan,
pākra̱ mangatha̱ khangasak chi ina.
Langkasobingli ina hānga, “Malangsolu”
kala makhayābingli hānga,
“Nawui talla̱ makhāngkālu;
nawui talla̱ kajuili makhāngkālu,
lah kahungla kharekta mamatuilu.”
Kaja zingtun einala, zingsho einala,
lamhāng einala masot kharā maningmana;
kha Vare china bichar sāda akhali nemngasaka,
akhali juingasaka.
Kaja
ana chiwui eina heikatā tharan,
okathuili khalei makhayābing saikorana akhan eina tangda mangra.
Kha Ina mathānchingra,
ina Jacobwui Vareli masotlaa sāra.
Makhayābingwui pangshap ana katathaora,
kha khangarongabingwui pangshap khāngchikatra.
Judahwui eina Vareli theisera;
Israelli aming haklaka.
Awui ngasām khavai Salemli sakā kahaina,
awui pamkhavai Zionlina.
Chili hingpik kahai malāthing, chāngvei, raighai,
kala raiwui khutlai ana sāteka.
Na tekmateilaka, makashimān phungreibingli nana khayā kāmei.
Kapingabingwui khalei ngaponkhuida athum mik pivāhaowa,
raimibing saikora pāng makhāngthukthuwa.
O Jacobwui Vare, nana kakharar eina mila,
siguila nganingung eina pisanghaowa.
Kha nava sāshikachangkhata!
nawui malung thuikahai tharan,
namangāli khipāna nganinglengra?
Kazingramwui eina bichar tuitak nana hāngmi;
okathuina ngacheeda va̱rihai,
okathuiwui rekharek kahai saikorali huikhami bichar tuitak khuikhavai Varena ngakarkathui tharan.
Kachangkhatta, mibingwui malung kakangna nali sochikatra;
malung kakangwui taikashokbing nali shaksāmira.
Nawui
ngachee khangayia a chili kuimareida khalei saikorana ali lemmet khuirāmiserlu,
Wungnaobingwui manglā katat mikahaia,
okathuiwui awungabingli ngachee khangasaka chili.
Ina Vareli panglāk eina ngakaowa,
ana ili shāmi khavai Vareli pangda ngakaowa.
Iwui kakhanang atamli ina
kachot maleila ngayā ipāng katingthai;
imanglāli ningnganung khavai hānglala mamayāmana.
Ina Vareli phaninga, kala ina ngahuiya;
Ina machuka, kala imanglā vānhaowa.
Imik mamikpi khavai nana rakngasaka;
I khanangnāhaida tuila mamatuithukmana.
Ina achālakhawui atam chi phaningkachunga,
Ina kasāngkha thuikahai kumbing chi phaningunga.
Ngayā iningkhalat eina chan ngazeka;
Ina machuka kala imanglā kapeoyanga:
kala mangahānngailui arala?
Awui makhangachei leikashi ngasāmchang kahaila?
Awui tuingashitbing tangchang tangkahaila?
Varena lukhamashan malaihaola?
Malung vavāt eina awui lukhamashan shungkham kahaila?”
Chieina ina hānga,
“Juikhamataiawui yāpang ngachei kahai hi iwui vanga kakhanangna.”
Ina
mha, acha nawui matakhak kahaibing chi ina phaningungra.
Ina nawui ot kasā saikora;
kala nawui hakkhamahā otsak phaningra.
O Varivara, nawui apong katharana.
Ithumwui Vare thāda reikhamatai vare khipā lei?
Matakkhak kahai ot kasā yurbingwui alungli nawui pangshap hakmahā khangasaka Vare chi nana.
Napāng eina nawui mi, Jacob eina Josephwui naomayarabingli ngatangmi.
O Varivara, tara̱na nali kathei tharan,
tara̱na nali kathei tharan, athum ngacheehaowa,
mha, kathuka china kathira.
Muiyābingna zingrot heitai, kazingna ngashuma;
nawui malā apam kachida thaivai.
Nawui kazing khangashumwui langpar surwui alungli lei;
nawui rikhānna apuk-apagali horvada okathui kathirda nganuka.
Nawui shongfa shamadru kānvai,
nawui apong tara̱tungli kānvai;
chithālala nawui pheichon matheimana.
Nawui mili yao ashangva̱ thāda thānzat,
Moses eina Aaronwui pāng eina.
O iwui mibing, iwui tamkachithei nganākhuilu,
ikhamorwui tuili nathumwui khanā nāshunglu.
Ina achālakhawui thumkahai tui chi matuira;
Ithumna shākahai kala theikahai,
ithumwui avāva̱ ngarāna hānghaikasā chi.
Athumwui naongarāwui eina chi ithumna mathumhaimara,
kha shokrārāda khalei thotli hāngchitheira,
kala ana sākahai matakhak kahai saikora chi.
Ana Jacobli khangashit sāda Israelli awui ain mi;
chi athumwui naongarāli tamchithei khavai ishāvā ngarāli kasoi.
Chithāda chi shokrāda khalei thotna theikhavai,
mapharārang kaja naongarāna thuishālaga anao ngarāli hāngmaronda,
chiwui vang athumna Vareli kachihān leikhavai,
kala Varewui otsakbing khamalai masāla,
awui ningkhami mayon khavaina;
kala athumna avāva̱ ngarāwui thāda,
ning khamakanga kala ngakaikashi mithot,
wuklung makhangatara mithot,
Vareli maningkatonga mashitkasanga thāda masā khavaina.
Ephraimnaobingna malā shaksālaga,
rai sāthanghon yāmhaowa,
Varewui tuingashit athumna mamayonmana,
awui ain athishurda mazatmana.
Ana khi sāmihailikhala kaji malaihaowa,
kala ana athumli tekhamatei sāchithei kahaila.
avāva̱ ngarāwui miktāli matakhak kahaibing sāchithei.
athumli chirchomlak eina shamadruwui tara̱ thāda shimāna.
Ana lunghārwui eina kongrānaobing shokngasakta tara̱ kong thāda longtā ngasaka.
Chithālala athumna ali mataimeida morei sai,
lamhāngli leilakha Juimataimeikap kajeli ngakaishi.
athumwui ningli Vareli tamyanga.
Athumna Vareli mamayāmada hānga,
“Lamhāngli Varena zāt rungmihaishaprala?
Ana lunghārli ngaphitta chieina tara̱ wokshokta kongrābing phongshilonga.
Zātla mishapta, awui mibingwui vang sāla ngaranmishaprala?”
Chiwui vang
a malungkhavātna pemtinghaowa;
Jacobwuitungli mei kāhaowa,
Israelwuitungli awui malungkhavāt mataisanghaowa;
khikhalajila athumna Vareli shitkasang maleithuwa,
kala awui huikhami pangshapli mashitsangthuwa.
Chithālala ana atungshong khalei kazingramli kasoi,
kala kazingramwui khāmongbing shomi;
kala kazingramwui kashakazā mizai.
Mina kazingraobingwui kashakazā zai,
ana kashakazā mavātlakla athumli chihotāmi.
Ana kazingramli zingshoshongwui masi phanngasaka,
kala awui pangshap eina ana azingshongwui masi phanshok ngasaka;
chifa thāda ana athumwuitungli sā rotāmi,
shamadruwui situi ngayāda angachāng kakā vānao rotāmi;
athumwui rāmrah alungli ana chihotāmi,
athumna pamkhavai kuikhamareili.
Kala athumna zāda thotinghaowa,
kaja athumna ningkachāng chi ana mihaowa.
Kha athumna ningkachāng chi mapenranglakha,
zāt athumwui khamorli zāmahunglakha,
Varewui malungkhavāt athumli tahaowa,
kala ana athumwui kapangabing chili shaothata,
kala Israelwui khamataiabingli nemngasaka.
Chithālala athumna morei sāchinga,
matakhak kahai theilala athumna mashitsangmana.
Chieina athumwui atam khaksuikha thāda ana shimān ngasaka,
kala athumwui mirinla ngachee ngachālak eina okthui ngasaka.
Ana athumli shaokathat tharan, ali athumna phai;
athumna ningngateida thuklak eina Vareli phai.
Vare athumwui lunghārna da athumna phaningunga,
Juikhamatai Vare athumwui ngatangkhamena da.
Kha athumna khamor eina ali sotmasaowa;
athumna ali athumwui male eina kapika.
awui tuingashitli athum mashungda masārarthuwa.
Chithālala ava lumashanhaoda athumwui khayon pheomi,
kala athumli masāshimānmana;
kasangkharei malungkathui khāmhaiya,
kala awui malungkhavāt saikora mamathuk ngasakmana.
Athum phasā khavaiana da ana phaningunga;
masi phanthuihaida malatkhaunga kathāna.
Lamhāngli kayākhashida athumna ali ngakaishikhala,
kala siwukli ali ning saza̱ ngasakkhala!
Latlui latluida athumna ali tamyanga,
kala Israelwui kathara chili malung thuingasaka.
Awui pangshap athumwui ningli maleimana,
lah yangkashewui eina athumli ngatangkhami zimiksho chila athumwui ningli maleimana,
Egypt ngaleili ana awui khamachut sākachithei,
kala Zoanli matakhak kahai ot kasā saikora.
chiwui vang kongrāra̱ mamangpai khavai sai.
kala khaifa eina athumli shimānngasaka.
kala athumwui shairanra̱ tākahai athei-arai khaoyurli shaingasaka.
kala athumwui sycamorebing pham eina tākthata.
Ana athumwui seishangli theih eina,
kala athumwui yaoshangli langpār eina chithita.
Ana athumwuitungli malung sākashi,
lungvat, malungkakang, kakhanang,
shimān khangasakwui kazingraobing chishota.
Awui malungkhavātwui vang apong akha sākhui;
athumli ana kathiwui eina mayāmshok ngasakmana,
kha mimao eina thingasaka.
Hamwui kachonshimli athumwui yaronshapwui naopharat kharebing chi.
lamhāngli yao ashangva̱ thāda ngakuizata.
chieina athum mangacheemana;
kha shamadruna athumwui yangkashebingli ngaphum ngasaka.
kala awui yāpangna yuikakhui phungrei chili.
ana athumwui shimlui ngayarmi,
kala Israelwui shangbingli athumwui kachonshimli chipama.
kala awui ningkhami mamayonthuwa,
kha avāva̱ ngarāwui thāda ngareithuihaida yansailak eina sai;
malā hunkashi thāda shireiung shireivai.
Kha athumwui kajuipambing sakāda china ali malung thuingasaka;
athumna athumwui sākakhui meoma̱bing eina ali yuikashi mathuk ngasaka.
Varena kashā tharan, a malungvātlakhaowa,
kala ana Israelli khalanchaohaowa.
kachonshim pam chihohaowa,
kala awui tekhamatei yangkashebingwui pāngli sangmihaowa.
Awui mibing raighaili misanghaowa,
kala awui lungvāt awui shimluikatwuitungli tāngasaka.
Meina athumwui yaronnaobing chuitai,
kala naongalāva̱ ngarāna shakkazā laa masāthuwa.
Athumwui pāngmonbing raighai eina pitai,
kala athumwui ra̱meiva̱ ngarāna chapkhangachā maleimana.
Chieina kapiwui eina khamathuk thāda
yarkhoka mangthung kahai thāda vaowa.
Kala yangkashebingli yuichaohaida ana athumli katang maleila maishi ngasaka.
Ana Josephwui shimkhurli khalanhaowa,
ana Ephraimwui shangli makapangkhuimana;
kha ana leikashe Judahwui shang,
Zion Kaphungli kapangkhui.
Ana kazingram thāda awui kathara shim sākhui,
ana katang mavaila sakā kahai okathui thāda.
kala ali yaoshangwui eina khui;
anao khangathān yaova̱ homkasāwui eina ali hokhui,
awui mi Jacobli, awui shimlui Israelli homkhavai.
Ningkhangatar eina ana athumli homa,
kala themlāk eina ngakuizatmi.
athumna nawui kathara khorumshim sākhamānghaira,
athumna Jerusalem sākathānhaira.
Athumna naraobingwui phasā khamasaili khayonga vānaobingli chishaihaira,
nawui katharabingwui asā okathuiwui ramsābingli chishaihaira.
Athumwui ashee athumna tara̱ thāda Jerusalem kuimareida heishokhaira,
kala athumli chizan khavai akhala maleisāmana.
Ithum khongnainaowui zeikhavai ngasāhaira,
ithumli kuimareida khaleibingna zeikharuida mana̱shiya.
O
Nawui yuikashiwui lungvat mei thāda chuirala?
Nali makathei miyurbingwuitungli nawui malungkhavāt heirorlu,
kala namingli makhangakao wungrambingli!
Kaja athumna Jacobli shaihaira,
kala awui pamkhavaila sākathānmihaira.
Ishāvā ngarāwui khayonkhamāng chi ithumwuitungli maphaningshānmialu;
nawui lukhamashan ithumli thākta tāshung ngasakmilu,
kaja ithum kachihān shimānchaohaira.
Ithumli khangachon milu,
O ithumwui huikhame Varivara,
namingwui tekhamateiwui vang;
ithumli kanmilu, kala ithumwui morei pheomilu,
nawui mingwui vang.
“Athumwui Vare kali leikhala”
da miyurbingna khisāda hangrakhala?
Naraobingwui ashee tākhangasakwui vang athut kakhui chi miyurbingli theikhangasak chi ithumwui mikna theiranu.
Narkahaibingwui ringkhangā chi nawui mangāli rāshungranu;
thihaokida khalei athumli nawui pangshap kharei eina phārimilu!
O
Chieina seihomphungli khalei nawui mibing ithumna nali mashimānda ningkashi mira;
thot kachida ithumna nawui masot shānkhuira.
Josephli yao thāda homkhame!
Cherubimtungli kapama na, horshoklu
Ephraim kala Benjamin kala Manassehwui mangāli!
Nawui pangshap khuishoklu, kala ithumli rākanmilu!
O Varivara, ithumli kakhuisangmiluishitlu;
ithumli huimi khavai namai kahormilu!
O
nawui mibingwui seihā kasāli karankha malungvātfarakhala?
Chāra̱wui khamui eina athumli nana phauihaira,
Athumli chāra̱ mangkhavai pemtha̱da mihaira.
Ithumli nana khongnainaowui mana̱shi khavai sāmihaira,
ithumwui yangkashebingna athum khalattawui alungli mana̱shipama.
O ashangva̱wui Varivara, ithumli khuisangmiluishitlu!
ithumli huikhui khavai namai kahormilu.
Egyptwui eina nana drakhārong akha khuishokmi,
kala miyurbingli kashamhaida nana chi lingsanga,
Nana chiwui vang ngalei sāmathai,
china ngalei pemda angayung sa̱vai.
Phungreibing chiwui khaya̱na fakhama,
kahaka cedarthingwui aphāngbing china;
aphāngbingna shamadru vāshunga,
atonbingna Kongrei vāshunga.
Chithākha khisāthuda nana chiwui phākho sakhaimihao,
apong chi rākakānbingna athei chi phākhui khavaila?
Ngahongli khalei sivāna sākazama,
kala luili kazata saikorana chi phāshai.
O ashangva̱wui Varivara, khangareiungmilu!
Kazingram eina yangtāmilu, kala theimilu;
drakhārong hili khayangsangmilu;
nawui yāpang eina lingsang kahai arong hi.
Athumna chi mei eina thota, athumna chi yortekhaira;
nana malungkhavāt eina yangda athum shimānranu.
Kha napāng nawui yāpangli khaleipā chili tāshungranu,
nakhalattawui vang kapanga sākakhuipa chi.
Chithada sāda ithumna nawui eina mangareithuiluilakmara;
ithumli mathi ngasakalu, chieina ithumna namingli ngakaora;
O ashangva̱wui Varivara,
ithumli kakhuisangmiluishitlu!
ithumli huikhui khavai namai kahormilu.
Ithumli ngākkhame Vareli khamathānwui vang vaolu,
Jacobwui Vareli masotlaa sālu.
Laa sāda timbrel shaolu;
leishiri lyre eina ngasoda tingteilā khonglu.
kachāngna khawok kala khangani tharan.
Kaja hi Israelwui vang ainna,
Jacobwui Varewui shiyana.
Ana Josephli hukhum sārum kahaina,
ana Egypt ngalei makānkhavā tharan.
Ina makathei akhon akha shai:
“Nayartuiwui kharitphun na ngavātāmihaira;
sopkaiwui eina napāng masaimihaira.
kala ina nali khāngkhuimi;
khangathuma langpar katāk atamli ina nali ngahānkāmi;
Meribahwui tara̱li ina nali tamyanga.
Ina nathumli hāngmachinlakha nganālu,
O iwui mibing!
O Israel, nathumna ili nganāsi kaje chāng!
yur kateiwui vareli makhorummara.
I nathumwui Vare
Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānshokkhame china.
Nathum khamor mashāda makālu,
chieina ina chipemmira.
“Kha iwui mibingna iwui khon manganāmana;
Israelna ili akhala makhuisangmana.
Chiwui vang ina athumwui ngakaishitingting kahai ning eina vaingasaka,
athum khalattawui hāngkachithei shurkhavai.
Iyavo, iwui mibingna iwui kahāng nganāsasi kaje,
Israelna iwui apongli zatsāsi kaje!
Athumwui yangkashebingli ina ngalāngda hamsang ngasakra,
kala ipāng athumwui yangkashebingwuitungli parra.
kala athum chithāda leichinghaora.
Ina nathumli mathāmeikap kaja zāt mizāra,
kala lunghārwui khuira̱ eina nathumli ningyāng ungngasakra.”
Varena awui hanga̱pamli pamhaira;
varebingwui alungli ana bichar sai:
“Nathumna karankha mamashungla bichar sara̱kala makaphābingli mijang sarakhala?
Khangazan kala avāva̱ makhaleibingli mashun milu;
kakhananga kala khangazana athumwui mashun chi singmilu.
Khangazana eina khavātabingli makhayābingwui pāng eina kanmilu.”
“Athum awor kala theikakhuila maleimana,
athum tangkhamangli kuiung-kuivā sāzata;
okathuiwui shimphunga saikora nganukhaira.
‘Nathum saikora Juikhamataiwui naomayarasera;’
chithālala nathum mikumo thāda thira,
wungnao kathā thāda pitāserra.”
Thuilu, O Vare, okathuili bichar sāmilu,
kaja yur saikora nawuisera.
O Varivara, kasaikha mapammihaialu;
chingri va̱ri eina mathāmihaialu,
O Vare!
Kaja yanglu, nawui yangkashebing ngurngurhaira,
nali yangkakharingbing athumwui kui khāngphokhaira.
Athumna nawui mibingli khangathum arek sai;
nana ngākkhammi kahaibingli mamayāmada athum ngasanngaruma.
Athumna, “Rālu, yur akha khangasā hi shimit khavai sāsa;
Israel kaho ming maphaningungluiranu” da hānga.
Mha, athum mijang khoma;
nawuitungli mamayāla tuingashit sai—
Edom kala Ishmaelnaobing, Moab eina Hagrinaobing.
Gebal eina Ammon kala Amalek
Philistia kala Tyreli khalei saikorala zanga;
Assyriala athumli zanghaira;
athum chiya Lotwui naongarāwui ngachaili kapanga chi ashina.
Kishon kongli Sisera eina Jabinli sākhami thāda sāmilu,
Endorli shaothatta ngaleipar sathui kahai thāda
athumlila sāmihaolu.
kala athumwui wungnaobing saikora Zeban eina Zalmunna thāda,
“Varewui seihomphung ithumna khalattawui vang khuisa”
da kahāngabingli sākhami thāda sāmilu.
O iwui Vare, athumli sur kakhaning chifa thāda,
masiwui mangāli māhik thāda sāmilu.
Ngahong meina chuikatā thāda phungrei meiwonna kachui thāda,
nawui siphan zingrot eina kharomilu,
kala nawui sur kakhaning eina athumli sāmachitmilu!
Athumwui mai kakhayakna chipemmilu,
chithāda athumna, O
Athumli khayak ngasakta ning chotchingranu,
athum maishida shimānranu.
kaji chi athumli theiranu.
Nawui pamkhavai kayākha leishikhala,
O saikorawui
imanglāna malungchāngda vānhaira;
imanglā eina iphasāna kharinga Vareli mathānda laa sai.
Konghinao eina tangdala athip samphanga,
kala yāngyaola khalattawui athip lei,
chili anaobing sha̱khui, nawui hanphutpamli,
O saikorawui
iwui Awunga kala iwui Vare.
Nawui shimli pamda nawui masotlaa sāching kajebing sokhamina.
Nawuili yang khalei athum chi sokhamina,
athumwui wuklungli Zionwui
Athumna Bacawui tampākli zatvāmamānda athumna chi ura̱wok pam sāngasaka;
zingrot rokharenala tara̱ puingasaka.
Athum pangshaptungli pangshap eina muivai;
Zionli varebingwui Vareli theira.
O
iwui seihā kashāmilu;
khanganāmilu, O Jacobwui Vare!
O Varivara; yanglu, ithumwui chāngvei;
nawui thao neomi kahaia awui mai khayangmilu!
Kaja khangatei apamli zimiksho thingkhale nawui shimli thangkha phamei.
