Makhayāwui shimli pamki kajile Varewui khāmong khamayona sāngaimei.
Kaja
ngahānkhangai eina khayākakā ana mi.
Mashungrik eina kazatbingwui vang kapha otli ana makhāmhailakmana.
O saikorawui
nali shitkasanga mi chi sokhamina.
Jacobwui lan nana hanmiluishita.
Nawui mibingwui khayonkhamāng nana pheomi;
nana athumwui morei saikora pheomi.
Nana nawui malungkhavāt saikora khuithuimihaowa;
nawui malung kasāwui eina ngareithuimihai.
O ithumwui huikhame Vare, ithumli khuisangmiluilu,
kala ithumwui eina nawui malungkhavāt khuithuimihaolu!
Ithumli malungvātchinghaorala?
Nawui malungvāt thot-thot vāfarala?
Nawui mibing nawuili mathān khavai
Ithumli mamathuk ngasakluimarala?
O
kala ithumli nawui huikhami milu.
Vare
kaja awui mibingli ana chingri kahai tui hāngra,
awui katharabingli, ning ngateida latkhaungbing chili.
Kachangkhatta, ali khangacheebingwui vanga
huikhami nganailakhaira,
kaja tekhamatei chi ithumwui ngaleili leira.
Makhangachei leikashi eina ningkatong leirumra,
khangarong eina chingri kahai akha eina akha pāngkhumra.
Ngaleiwui eina ningkatong shokra,
kala khangarongana kazing eina yangtāra.
Mha,
ithumwui ngalei mataisangra.
Khamashung khangarongna ali rida zatra,
kala awui pheikārna apong sāmira.
Nāshungmida khangahānkāmilu, O
kaja iva khangazana khavāta mina.
Iva varekathei mina, imanglā phārimihailu,
nali shitkasanga naraoli kahuimilu.
Na iwui Varena;
ili khalumashanmilu, O
kaja ina nali langpongda ngakaowa.
Naraowui manglā mathān ngasakmilu,
kaja imanglāna nali yangkai, O
Kaja nava, O
nali khangakaobingli makhangachei leikashi pemting eina mi.
O
iwui kapowui khavaokhon kakhuisangmilu.
Iwui kakhanang tharan nali ngakaowa,
kaja nana ili ngahānkāmi.
Nakathā Vare varebingwui alungli maleimana O
nawui otsak kathāla maleimana.
kala naming sochikatra.
Kaja nava reimatailaka kala matakhak kahai ot sai,
Vare chi namānga.
Nawui apong tamchitheimilu, O
chithāda ina nawui khamashung chili zatra;
namingli ngacheethei khavai iningli ngarum ngasakmilu.
Ining tongtingda nali ina ningshi,
O
kala ina namingli katang maleila sochikatra.
Kaja nawui makhangachei leikashi iwui vang hakmahālaka;
Kathewui ramwui kathuk eina nana imanglā ngatangkhuimihaira.
O
sākashebingna imanglā khuikida sai,
nalila athumna matheimimana.
Kha O
malung mavatkazāra kala makhangachei leishikatha ningkatong Varena.
Ngareiungda ili khalumashanmilu,
naraoli nawui yāng sangmilu,
kala narao sha̱naowui naomayarali kahuimilu.
Nawui ngahānkhangai khamachut ili chitheimilu,
chieina ili ningkakachaibingna chi theilaga khayakranu
khikhalajila
Ana sakakā keinung kathara kaphungtungli lei.
Jacobwui pamkhavai saikorawui alungli lāngda Zionwui ngaveili leishimei.
O Varewui keinung, nawui pongli tekhamatei kachungkha matuiya.
Ili katheibingwui alungli ina Rahab eina Babylonli shānsangra;
Yanglu, Philistia, Tyre, Ethiopiala zangda athumna “Hipā hi hili pharai” da hānga.
Zionwui pongli hithāda hāngra,
“Hila chila preiva̱ china pharai.”
Kaja Juikhamataiya china ali sākāmira.
da aming kapikhui.
Laa kasābingla, pheichak kasābingla “Iwui ura̱wok saikora nawuili lei”
da hāngsera.
O
ngachonmi khavai ngashunshong ina ngakaowa,
nawui mangāli ina ngayāla ngakaowa.
Iwui seihā kasā nawui mangāli kāshungranu,
iwui khavao nāshungda nganāmilu!
Kaja iwui ning kakhanangna pema,
kala imanglā Kathewui ramli vānganaimamānhaira.
Chomli khavābingwui alungli ilila shānsanga;
Iva yāng makhalei mina,
kathiwui ngachaili horkahaiya kathāna,
shaothatta chikhurli chizan kahai kathāna,
nana maphaningungluilak kaji kathāna,
kaja athum napāngwui eina katatchao kahaina.
Nana ili Chomwui kathukali sanghaira,
tangkhamang kathuka apamli.
Iwuitungli nawui malungkhavāt ritlak eina lei,
kala nana nawui ra̱phongbing china ili ngaphaoror ngasaka.
Iwui ngasotnaobingna ili nothahai khavai nana sāmihaira;
I hi athumwui vang ngachee-ngachā khavai sāmihaira.
Ina mayāmshok khavai ili tuknarhaira;
kakhanangna imikla māmāchahaira.
O
Nali ina ipāng khangkāda seiha sai.
Kathebingwui vang nana matakhak kahai ot kasāla?
Khaya̱na ngakarthuida nali masot mila?
Nawui makhangachei leikashi chikhurli phongmila,
maningakha nawui ningkatong Abaddonli chitheila?
Nawui matakhak kahai tangkhamang lungli theila,
lah nawui huikhamiwui ngachonkhami malaikazarpamli phaningungla?
Kha, O
ngathorshong iwui seihā nawui mangāli sai.
O
Khisāda namai iwui eina thumhaokhala?
Yaronlakha eina thuida kachotna thinanaichinga,
Ina nawui khangachee khānga;
I khikha masāthukthura.
Nawui malungkhavāt iwuitungli phanrāhaira;
nawui khangachee hukkachihāna ili yuihaira.
Tara̱ kaphong thāda ili langpongda kuimareiya;
athumna ngarumda ili kuinamhaowa.
Ngasotnaola, leikashibingla ili mangayur khavai nana khāmmihaowa;
iwui ngasotabing tangkhamanglungli lei.
Nawui makhangachei leikashi
pongli ina laa sāchingra, O
nawui ningkatong thot kachida ikhamor eina vaora.
Kaja nawui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaila sakāhaira,
nawui ningkatong kazingram thāda ngazipa.
Iwui rao Davidli ina ngashit kahaina:
kala nawui wungpamkhong mithot peida sakāmira.’”
O
nawui ningkatong katharabingwui kaziplila.
Kaja kazingli
kazingli khaleibing
katharabingwui hanga̱pamli,
ali kuikhamarei ngachaili awui thāda khayākakā
khangamkharei khipā lei?
O
nawui thāda sāshapa,
ningkatonga khipā leikhala?
Tara̱wui sākashili nana munga,
khangaphao tharan nana chingrihai ngasaka.
Kathingun thāda nana Rahabli sākachupa,
nawui kapanga pangtheina yangkashebingli kashamkhayānghai.
Kazingram nawuina, okathuila,
apuk-apaga kala chiwui lungli khalei saikora chila nana sākhuiser kajina.
Atungshongla, azingshongla, nana sākhuisera,
Tabor eina Harmonna mathānlak eina namingli sochikatli.
Nawui pāngthei reimataiya,
nawui kajuiya yapāng panglaka.
Khamashung khangarong kala mashun
nawui wungpamkhongwui shimphungana;
makhangachei leikashi eina ningkatongna na mangāli rizata.
Zātkhānwui vang khavao katheibing, O
nawui zakmai kahorli kazatabing sokhamina,
langpongda namingli mathāna
kala nawui khamashung chiwui vang masot chikata.
Kaja na athumwui yangwui tekhamateina,
nawui ngahānkhangai eina ithum khayā kai.
Kaja ithumwui chāngvei
ithumwui awunga Israelwui Kathara chili.
Shitkasangbingli achālakha nana khamahā eina hāngmida
“Pangshap khalei akhali ina kuihon sangmihaira,
mibingwui eina kapangkakhuia chili ina reingasaka.
iwui kathara thao eina ina ali neomihaira;
chieina ipāngna ali ngasozatmichingra,
ipāngtheinala ali pangngasakra.
Yangkashebingna ali mayuirarmara,
makhayābingna ali mamaishi ngasakrarmara.
Awui yangkasheli ina awui miktāli sākachupra
kala ali yangkakharingabingli shaothatra.
Iwui ningkatong kala iwui makhangachei leikashi ali ngasomira;
kala imingli awui pangshap wui vang ali khayā kāngasakra.
Awui pāng ina shamadrulungli haimira,
kala awui yāpang kongtungli haimira.
Ana ili, ‘Na ishāvāna, iwui Varivara,
iwui huikhamewui lunghārna’ da vaoshokra.
okathuiwui awungabingwui juimeikap kaje ngasāra.
Iwui makhangachei leikashi ina awui vang haimichingra,
kala iwui tuingashit awui vang makailakmara.
Ina awui shimkhur sakāmida leichingra,
kala awui wungpamkhong kazingramwui atam thāngasakra.
“Anao ngarāna iwui ain horhaikha,
kala iwui ain athishurda mazatakha,
kalikhada athumna iwui shiyan-chikan sakhaida iwui ningkhami mamayonakha,
athumwui khayonkhamāngwui vang lijei eina shongrān sāra,
khangui khalāngwui vang lijei eina shaora;
kha iwui makhangachei leikashi awui eina makhuithuimara,
iwui ningkatong mangacheimara.
Iwui tuingashit ina masākhaimara,
lah imorchai eina shokkahai tui chila mangacheimara.
“Iwui tharkhamatheng eina ina akhashida ngashithaira;
ina Davidli makapikmara.
Awui wungpam leichingra,
zimik leilakha eina tangda awui wungpamkhong imangāli leichingra.
kazing leilakha eina tangda,
mangatha̱mara.”
Kha ara nana mamayāmada horshokhaira,
thao neomi kahaiali nawui malungkhavātna pemhaira.
Naraoli tuingashit kasā chi nana makhuimithura;
nana awui wungkuihon chifali sākhamāng ngasaka.
Nana awui phākho sakhaimihaira,
nana awui raipan ja̱ta ngasakhaira.
Khaung khavā saikorana ali sākazama,
awui khongnaiwui mana̱shi khavai ngasāhaira.
Nana awui yangkashewui yāpang reingasaka,
nana awui yangkashe saikorali mathān ngasaka.
Mha, awui raighaiton nana ngareiung ngasaka,
kala nana ali raiphungli manganingrar ngasakmana.
Khānthing awui pāng eina nana khuithuihaira;
kala awui wungpamkhong ngaleitungli hortāmihaira.
Mirin malingshap nana katatmihaowa;
nana ali maikashina pemngasaka.
O
Nakhalatta ngathumchinghaorala?
Nawui malungkhavāt mei thāda karankha chuifara?
Phaningmilu, O
kaja khi makankhanawui vang nana mibingwui naomayara saikora sākahaikhala!
Mi khipāna ringda kathi matheilakmakhala?
Kathewui ramwui pangshap eina khipāna amanglā huikhuishaprakhala?
ningtongda shitsangkapai chieina ngasoda Davidli khangashit chi kali vahao?
O
mibingwui zeikakharui iningli kayākha chotta phung,
khieina nawui yangkashena manashi, O
khieina nawui yangkashebingna thao neomikahaia awui pheikarli mana̱shikhala.
Amen, Amen.
Phungreibing masāshokranglakha,
okathui kala apuk-apaga eina tangda masāranglakha,
katang makhavaiwui eina katang
makhavai vāpeida na Varena.
Nana mili chifali latung ngasakta “O mibingwui naongarabing,
chifali latvālu” da hānga.
athum chiya ayā thāda, thuihaira,
lah ngayāwui pung akha kathā thai.
Mili nana khuithuihaowa;
athum chiya mangshong thai;
ngathor nganaoungkhalui khawo kathāna:
Ngathor nganaozao hailuishita;
ngazin ngahuida thenghaowa.
Kaja ithumli nawui malungkhavātna yuihaowa,
nawui malung kakangna yuithuihaowa.
Ithumwui khayonkhamāng namangāli nana haiya,
thumkahai ithumwui moreila nawui kahorli thei.
Kaja ithumwui mirin saikora nawui malungkakang alungli kānthuiya,
ithum zingkum khaksuikha thāda kuphaowa.
Ithum mirin kum hangshiniya,
lah phasā phāhaoda hangchishat ringpai;
chithālala chila chotchānga kala ringshiya;
athum thākta thuihaowa, ithumla yongthuihaowa.
Nali khangacheewui pangshap chili nawui malungkakangwui khangachee athishurda khipāna machukvākhala?
Chieina ithumwui mirin shankhuithei khavai tamchitheimilu,
chieina ithumna aworwui ning samphangra.
O
Karankharakhala?
Naraobingli khalumashanmilu!
Makhangachei leikashi chieina ithumli ngathor ningyāng ungngasakmilu,
chieina mirin peida ithumna ringphāda mathānra.
Nana khanang ngasak kahai chirankha,
kala makaphā theingasak kahai zingkum chiyākha ringphā ngasakmilu.
Nawui otsak naraobingwuitungli,
kala nawui tekhamatei pangshap nanao ngarāwui lungli
reisang ngasakranu.
Ithumwui Vare
kala ithumwui pāng eina sākahai ithumwuitungli sakāmilu,
mha, ithumwui pāngna sākahai ot nana ungshungmiranu.
Juikhamataiawui ngayin khavaili kapama,
Pangshapwui khaya̱li khangasāma china,
ina shitkasanga iwui Vare” da hāngra.
Kaja khalen kasangawui eina kala kazātkashi kharāwui eina ana nali kanshokmira.
Pheimareng eina ana nali farormira,
kala angachāng zingli nana ngayin khavai samphangra;
awui ningkatong hi chāngvei kala shānneira̱na.
Nana ngayāwui khangachee khangachāli kala ngashun malā thaikharā chili mangacheemara,
tangkhamangli kazātkashi yunkazat kala ngashunshong kashimān shoklala mangacheemara.
Thingkha nawui ngalemli rāpitalapai,
thing tharāna nawui yāvāk;
kha china nangalemli marāza̱rarmara.
Nana namik eina yangmara,
kala makhayāli athut kakhui chi theira.
Khikhalajila
Juikhamataia nawui pam sahaoda,
nawuitungli makaphā marātāmara,
shimkhurli kalāshāt maramara.
Ngalungli naphei ngaphokpaishina da athumwui pāng eina nali khāngkāmira.
kazingkha̱naoli, phara̱li nana napheizingli naikazamra.
Khikhalajila ana ili leishida ngavaphaoda,
ina ali kanshokmira,
imingli shitkasangwui vang ali ina mayonmira.
Ana ili kaho tharan, ina ngahānkāra;
ali kakhanang tharan ina ngasomira,
ina ali ngatangkhuida maiyā ngasakra.
Kasangkha okpeida ina ali ningyāng ungngasakra,
kala iwui huikhami ali chitheira.
namingli masotlaa kasā, O Juikhamataia;
ngathorshong nawui makhangachei leikashi,
kala ngayā nawui ningkatong phongkashok,
sipa̱ tingteilāwui laa kasā ningkhamayung laa eina ngasoda.
Kaja O
ili mathān ngasaka,
napāngna sāmi kahaiwui vang mathānda ina laa sai.
O
Nawui ning thuklaka!
Mangkhama̱na matheirarmara,
mathangkhama̱ mina hi matheikhuirarmana:
kaja, makhayā mina wonnui thāda shonlala,
kala makaphā kasā mina shāngsanglala,
athumva shimānchaohaoki kajina,
kha nava, O
Kaja yanglu, O
kaja yanglu, nawui yangkashebing shimānhaora,
makaphā kasā saikora chaiyānghaora.
Kha nana ramsei ngaji thāda ili pangngasaka,
ikuili kadhara thao nana heirormi.
Imikna yangkashebingwui kongkhalui theihaira;
ikhanāna makaphābingwui kashimān chi shāhaira.
Khangarongana khaneirong thāda mataisanga,
kala Lebanonwui cedarthing thāda phora.
Athumli
Varewui kayāngli reisanga.
Athumna rarhailala athei matheichinga,
thingra̱ zatta matekchinga,
Vare hi khangarongana da theikhavaina;
a iwui lunghārna,
kala awuili makhangarong maleilakmana.
Mha, apuk-apaga sakāhaira; mangatha̱luilakmara;
nawui wungpamkhong achālakhawui eina sakā kahaina,
nava katang makhavaiwui einana.
O
tara̱ kaphongna athumwui akhon juikai,
kala ngashum-kakanghai.
Tara̱ kachungkhawui khangashumli lāngda pangmei,
shamadruwui khangaphaoli lāngda pangmei,
atungli khalei
Nawui hāngkahai mangapatmana,
tharkhamathengna nawui shim pema,
O
O
athut kakhuia Vare, horlu!
Ngakarthuilu, O okathuiwui bicharwo;
langkasobingli athumwui samphangkhangayi chi hāngsangmilu.
O
makhayā athumna karankha mathānfarakhala?
Athumna langsolak kahai tuimatui,
makaphā kasā saikorana langsoi.
Athumna nawui mibingli ngataikachupa, O
kala nawui shimluikatli chotchāng ngasaka.
Athumna ra̱meinao eina ramkazatali shaothata,
avāva̱ makhaleiyali sāthata;
kala athumna, “
Jacobwui Varena matheirarmana” da hānga.
Theikhuilu, mangma̱meikap kajebing!
mangkhama̱bing,
nathum katharan thangmeinaorakhala?
Khanā shomkhame china mashāmala?
Mik wutkhame china matheimala?
Mili theithangkhamei tamkachitha,
chiya athum khaksuikha kathāna.
O
kala nawui ainwui eina tamkachitheia mi chi sokhamina
kaja makaphābingwui vang chom machuikhuiranglakha,
ali kakhanang atamwui eina ngasāmkhui ngasaka.
Kaja
ana awui shimluikatli machihohaimara;
kaja mashun china khangarongabingli hanungra,
kala ning khangatarbingna chili shurra.
Makhayāwui eina iwui vang khipāna nganingmi?
Makaphā kasaali iwui vang khipāna nganingmi?
“Iphei nganaithuihaira”
da ina kaphaning tharan O
nawui makhangachei leikashina khāngkhuimi.
Iningli kakhanang kachungkha khalei tharan,
nawui ninglumkhamina imanglā ringphāngasaka.
Makaphā khamungabingna makhamashung
ain sākakhui chili nana sakrumpairala?
Khangarongawui mirinli mamayāmada athumna ngarumda khuma,
khalāng makhalei mili thikhavai khayon mi.
Kha
kala iwui Varena iwui ngayin khavai lunghārna.
Ana athumwui khangui khalāng athumli hanmiluira,
makaphā kasāwui vang yaituphaora;
ithumwui
Ralu, ithum
ithumwui huikhame lunghār chili mathānda vaosa.
A khaleipamli ithumna ningkashi eina ngasoda zangsa;
ithumna ali masotlaa eina ngasoda khamathānkhon vaosa!
Kaja
kala varebing saikorawuitungli reikhamatai Awungana.
Okathuiwui kathuka awui pāngli lei,
phungreiwui kajui chila awuina.
Yireila awuina, kaja ana chi sākakhuina,
kaja ngalei katheng apāng eina sākhui.
O ralu, ithum ali ngakhumshamhaida khorumsa,
ithumli kasā
awui seihomphungwui mibingna,
kala awui pāngwui yaonaona;
O aja nathumna awui akhon nganāsi kaje chāng!
Massah lamhāngli leilakha kasā thāda nathum ning mamararlu,
iwui otsak thatheilaga nashāvā ngarāna ili tamyangda chithei khavai sākhangasak thāda.
Kaja zingkum hangmatiwui vang ina thot chili ningkachai,
“Athum ning makathara, iwui pongli matheikhame mibingna”
da ina hānga.
okathui hupta
awui huikhami thangkachida hānglu.
Awui tekhamatei miyur saikorawui alungli hāngmilu,

Kaja
kala hakmahālak eina masot mikhangayiana,
vare kateibingli lāngda ali khayāshiki kajina.
Kaja mibingwui vare saikora meoma̱sera;
kha
Ngam kala khayākakā awui mangāli lei;

tekhamatei kala pangshap
Amingli masot mikhangayi tekhamatei chi

okathui saikora, awui mangāli ngacheelu.
Yurbingwui alungli,
mangacheiluilakmara; ana yurbingli mashun eina bichar sāmira”
da hānglu.
Kazingramna mathānranu,
kala okathuina ringpharanu,
shamadruna ngaphaoranu,
kala chili khalei saikorala;
luila, chili khalalei huptala mathānranu!
Chieina ngahongli khalei thing saikora
kaja ana okathuili bichar sākhavai rai.
Ana khamashung khangarong eina ngasoda apuk-apagali kala mibinglila khamashung eina bichar sāra.
ngayipheili khalei ngalei kachungkhana ringpharanu.
Muiyāla kala tangmangting kahai chila awui kuikhamareili lei;
khamashung khangarong kala mashunna awui wungpamkhong rungkhavaina.
Awui mangāli mei shoka,
kala awui ngalemli khalei yangkashebingli chuitāserhaowa.
Awui rikhān apuk-apagali horvai;
okathuina chi thei kala kathira.
okathui saikorawui
Kazingramna awui khamashung khangarong phongmi;
kala yurbing saikorana awui tekhamatei thei.
makānkhana meoma̱wui vang langkasobing chili;
vare saikorana
Zionna shāda ringphai,
kala Judahwui nao ngalāva̱bing mathāna,
O Vare, nawui mashun bicharwui vang.
Kaja na, O

athumwui ning athao thāda sānlaka,
kha iya nawui ainli ringphālaka.
Ina nawui shiyan tamkhui khavai khanang khangasak chi phālaka.
Sinā kala lupāsā thingthingle,
nakhamor eina khami ainna iwui vang phāmei.
Napāng eina ili sākhuida semihaira,
nawui ningkhami chi tamkhui khavai theishingkakhui ning ili milu.
Nali khangacheebingna ili kathei eina mathānra,
khikhalajila ina nawui tuili chihāna.
O
kala nawui ningkatong alungli ili nana chotkhangasakna.
Nawui makhangachei leikashi china naraoli ninglum khavai ngaranmilu;
naraoli nawui ngashit kahai athishurda.
Ina ringkhavai nawui lukhamashan kharāza̱milu;
kaja nawui ain iwui khamathānna.
Mashitkasangbingli maishi ngasaklu,
khikhalajila athumna ili nguingasaka;
iwui vanga, nawui chitheikhamili ina machukpamra.
Nali khangacheebingna ili rāranu,
chithāda athumna nawui hāngkahai theikhuira,
Ina maikashi masamphang khavai,
nawui shiyanwui pongli,
iningli shāt makāngasakalu.
Nawui huikhami kahonna imanglā vānhaira,
nawui tuili ina chihantitli.
Nawui ngashit kahai chili yangda imik ngazanhaira;
“Nana katharan ili ninglum ngasakrakhala”
da ina ngahāna.
Kaja I chāngpongli sharkahai drakhāra̱ sangkhavai khao thāhaira,
chitha-ilala nawui shiyan ina mamalailakmana.
Naraona karankha khāngfarakhala?
Ili rekakharekbingli katharan nana bichar sārakhala?
Mashitkasang mibingna iwui vang chom chuihaira,
nawui ain makashurbingna.
Nawui ningkhami saikora makahatlakmana;
minamda athumna ili rekhareka;
ili khangachonmilu!
Okathuili athumna ili thitchang khavai sai;
kha ina nawui chitheikhami mamalailakmana.
Nawui makhangachei leikashi alungli imanglā kahuimilu,
chieina nakhamorwui ningkhami ina mayonpaira.
O
Thot saikorali nawui ningkatong mangacheimana;
okathui nana sākahaina, kala chi leichinga.
Nana sākahai athishurda,
aja eina tangda lei,
kaja ot saikora nawui raosera.
Nawui ainli ina mamathānsi kaja,
ina kakhananglungli thihaira̱ra.
Nawui tamkachithei ina mamalailakmara,
kaja chieina nana ili ringkhangasakna.
I nawuina, kahuimilu;
kaja ina nawui tamkachithei phai.
Makhayāna ili shimān khavai rimpama,
kha iva nawui mashun tui phaningchinga.
Kākashung kaho hi angaret leiserada ina theikhui,
kha nawui ningkhami mashālāka.
Iyavo, nawui ainli leikashi!
Langpongda ina chiwui pongli machuka.
Nawui ningkhamina ngasomichingda
iwui yangkashebingli I thangmeimei.
Nawui tamkachitheili ina machukpamhaoda,
ili chishutkhamebing saikorali ina theimei.
Nawui ningkhami khamayonwui vang,
khararnaobinglila I theimei.
Nawui tui mayon khavai,
makaphā shongfali iphei makārsangmana.
Nawui shiyanbingwui eina ina mangareithuimana,
kaja nana ili tamchithei.
Ina mazapkhayangli nawui tui kayākha shim,
khuira̱li lāngda shimmei!
Nawui ningkhami mangā eina,
ina theithangkhamei samphanga;
chieina makhamashung apong saikorali ina yangkharinga.
Nawui tui ipheiwui thaomei na,
iwui shongfawui kahorna.
Nawui khamashung shiyanbing mayon khavai,
ina khangashit sāda chi mayāhaira.
I khanangnāhaira; O
nawui tuiwui athishurda ili ringngasakmilu!
O
kala nawui shiyanbing tamchitheimilu.
Iwui mirin ipāngli haichinga,
kha ina nawui ain mamalailakmana.
Makaphā-makhayāna ili khalen sanga,
kha nawui kakasowui eina ina mayāmlakmana.
Nawui ningkhami mashimānda iwui shimluina;
mha, chi ining mathān khavaina.
Nawui shiyan khanao eina tangda mayon khavai iningli haimilu.
Ning khani kasā mibingli ina yangkharinga,
kha nawui ainli ina leishi.
Na iwui ngayin khavaina kala chāngveina,
ina nawui tuili chihāna.
Makaphā kasābing, iwui eina thuihaolu,
chithākha Varewui ningkhami ina mayonpaira,
Ina ringkhavai nawui ngashit kahai athishurda singmilu,
kala iwui kachihān chiwui vang makhayak ngasakmialu.
Ili hapkakhano malei khavai mayonmilu,
kala katang mavaila nawui shiyanli yangmilu!
Nawui shiyanwui eina ma̱thui kahai athum saikorali nana khalanhai;
mha, athumwui theithangkhamei aremana.
Okathuiwui makaphā saikorali nana maripai thāda khui;
chiwui vang ina nawui tamkachitheili leishiya.
Nali khangacheena iphasā kathira,
kala nawui bicharli ina ngacheeya.
Ina mashun kala khangarong khikhala kaji sai,
ili rekakharekbingwui pāngli mahorsangmihaialu.
Kaphā sāmirada naraoli ngashitmilu;
mashitkasangabingna ili marekharek ngasakalu.
Nawui huikhamiwui vang ngashānkapam imik ngazanhaira,

Nawui makhangachei leikashi athishurda naraoli khayangmilu,
kala ili nawui shiyan tamchitheimilu.
I nawui raona; theishingkakhui ili milu;
chieina ina nawui tamkachithei theikhuipaira.
kaja nawui ain sākhaihaira.
Chiwui vang sināli,

Chiwui vang iwui pheikār kachida nawui tamkachithei athishurda zata;
makhamashung apong saikora ina yangkharinga.
Nawui tamkachithei matakhakhai;
chiwui vang eina imanglāna chi mayona.
Nawui tui khalākashokna kahor mi;

Ikhamor makāda honpama,

Yangmida ili khalumashanmilu,

Nawui ngashit kahai athishurda iwui pheikār mayonmilu;

Nawui tamkachithei mayonpai khavai,
rekakharekwui eina ili kanmilu.
Naraowuitungli nawui kahor tāshungmilu,

Imikna chāra̱ kong thāda longa,

O
kala nawui bichar khamashungana.
Khamashung khangarong kala ningkatongwui lungli nana
nawui ningkhami haimihaira.
Iningli iwui malungkhavāt mei thāda chuihaira,

Nawui tuingashit kayākha mashungkhala;

Chinkhamahaiya kateowa mina jilala,

Nawui khamashung khangarong chichinga,
kala nawui ain khamashungana.
Kakhanang ningkachot ili rāza̱haira,

Nawui tamkachithei mashungchingra,
I ringkhavai theishingkakhui milu.
Wuklung tongtingda ina ngakaoli;
khangahānkāmilu! O
Nawui shiyan ina mayonra.
Ina nali vaoli; ili kahuimilu;
chieina ina nawui tamkachithei mayonra.
Kazing mathangranglakha ina ngakarthuida
ngachonmi khavai ngakaowa;
ina nawui tuili chihāna.
Nawui ngashitmi kahai chili machuk khavai

Nawui makhangachei leikashi alungli
iwui khon kashāmilu;
O
imanglā haimilu.
Makaphā ningngai eina rekakharekbingna ili rānganaiya;

Kha O
kala nawui ningkhami saikora mashunga.
Nawui tamkachithei eina ina acha theihairasai

Iwui kakhanang hi yangmida kakanshokmilu,

iwui vang nganingmida huimilu;

Makhayābingwui vang huikhami katāvali lei;

O
nawui mashun athishurda ili ringngasakmilu.
Ili rekakharek kala yangkashe kachungkhana;
kha ina nawui tamkachithei eina mangacheilakmana.
Shitkasang makhaleibingli ina ningkachailak eina yanga,

Ina nawui tamkachitheili kayākha leishikhala phaningmilu!
Nawui makhangachei leikashi thishurda ili okthui ngasakmilu.
Nawui tui khamashungna,

Maram maleila wungnaobingna ili rekhareka;

Kahaka ngaponkakhui samkaphang thāda,
ina nawui tuili mathānlaka.
Mikhanamli ina yangkharinga kala ningkachaiya,

Nawui khamashung shiyanbingwui vang,

Nawui ainli leikashibing hakkhamahā chingri kahai lei;

kala ina nawui ningkhami chi sai.
Imanglāna nawui ningkhami mayona,
ina leishi kachangkhata.
Nawui tamkachithei kala ningkhami ina mayona;

nawui tuiwui athishurda ili theishingkakhui milu.

kala nawui ain iwui ringkaphāna.

Israelna hithāda hāngranu—

Israel chingrihairanu!
ithum mang kashiman thāda leisai.

ithumwui lan hanmiluishitlu!

kala chiwui alungli Israelli kānkā khangasaka chili,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
kha Red Seali Pharaoh kala awui ashangva̱li yuikhame chili,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
awui mili lamhāngli peichaoda thānkhame chili,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
kahaka awungabingli sākathata chili,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
kala aming kazata awungabingli sākathata chili,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
kala athumwui ngalei shimlui sāda kākhangasaka,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
awui rao Israelli shimlui kākhangasaka chili,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana.
Ithum ngazanlakha phaningungkhame chi a laka,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
ithumwui yangkashebingwui eina ngatangkhame,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana;
asā khavai saikorali kashakazā mikazaa chili,
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana.
O kazingramwui Vareli ningkashi milu!
kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana.
Babylon kong ngalemli ithumna pamzanga,
chili Zion phaningkhaung tharan ithumna chapa.
Chiwui shumthingtungli ithumwui tingteila hokthānghai.
Chili ithumli tukkakhuabingna,
thumli laa sālu ji,
kala ithumli rekakharekabingna ngashan sānganao khavai;
“Zionwui laa akha ithumli sāchitheilu”
da hānga.
O Jerusalem, ina nali malaihaiakha,
iwui yāpang thihaoranu!
Imale akārakli ngavepshanhaoranu,
Ina nali maphaningakha,
Jerusalem iwui vang ringphāmeikap kajena da makhuiakha!
O
mathāhaila phaningungmilu;
Jerusalem khuithang athumna,
“Chi shaokhaitālu, chi shaokhaitālu!
apam tāshungngasaklu!” da kahāng chi.
Nali athut kakhui a chi ringphāra, ithumli sākahai chiwui vang!
Nawui kateoabingli khuilaga lungguili
ngaphitkashānbing chi ringphāra!
O
varebingwui mangāli ina nawui masotlaa sai;
Nawui makhangachei leikashi kala ningkatong chiwui vang,
nawui kathara shimshong khorumda namingli ningkashi mi;
kaja nana saikorawuitungli naming kala nawui tui china khayākai.
Ina ngakaothang, nana ili ngahānkāmi,
imanglāwui yāng nana mataisangmi.
O
kaja athumna nakhamorwui tui shāhaira;
kala
kaja
Kaja
khangazanabingli ana phaningmi;
kha lāngkasobingli ana katāva̱ eina yanga.
Ina kakhanangwui alungli zatlala,
imanglā nana phārimihai;
iwui yangkashebingwui malungkhavātli napāng katingshoka kala nawui yāpāngna ili kanshokmi.
O
Napāng eina sākhui kahai chi mahormihaialu.
O
Ina pamlala kala nganinglala nana thei;
katāva̱wui eina iwui ning nana thei.
Iwui shongfa kala pikhavaila nana phāshokhuiya,
kala iwui otsak saikora theisera.
Imaleli tui akha eina tangda mahangranglakha, yanglu,
O
Khanuklila shingālila na lei,
kala napāng iwuitungli haimi.
Hikatha thangkhamei hi iwui vang tekmateinai;
hi juināhaida I makāshungrarmana.
Nawui Manglāwui eina I kali thuirakhala?
lah na ngalemwui eina I kali yāmvārakhala?
Ina kazing kālala na chili lei!
Ina Kathewui ramli pet semlala na chili lei!
Ina ngathor yāmda shamadruwui akatangli pamlala,
chilila napāngna ili thānmira,
kala nawui yāpangna ili singmira.
Kalikha ina, “Tangkhamangmāngna ili farorhaida,
ili kuikhamarei kahorla ngayāhaoranu,” da hānglala,
tangkhamang chieina tangda nale matangmangmana,
ngayāla ngashun thāda hora;
kaja tangkhamangla nawui vanga kahorna.
Kaja iwui alungshongla nana sai,
ishava̱wui naopamli nana ili ngarumda sākazakzak kahaina.
Ina nali masochikatli,
kaja nava khangachee kala matakhak kahaiana.
Nana sākahai matakhakhai!
Nana ili theitithaiya;
ngathumda ili kasā tharan,
iphasā nana theisera;
okathui kathukawui alungli,
ningmanolak eina sākakhuina.
Izak mashokranglakha namikna theiserhairasai;
otsak kachiva̱ nawui lairikli kapihairasai;
iwui vang semmi kahai atambing saikora chi masemranglakhala.
O Vare, nawui ninglan iwui vanga kayākha aman sakkhala!
Saikora chi kaziplaga kayākha khamashā!
Ina shānsi kaja chi situili chungmeira.
Ina thuikhamathuk tharan,
nana ngayurmisai.
O Vare, makhayā mili nana sāthathaosi kaja,
kala asheewui mi chi iwui eina pākthuihaosi kaje jong,
nali zakkashi sāngailak eina ngakaikashibing,
makaphā sākhavaiwui vang athum khalatta nali ngakaikashi mibing!
O
Ina athumli kachangkhat ningkachai,
Ina athumli yangkashena da shānkhui.
Kapeoyanglu O Vare, iwui wuklung theimilu!
Chāng yangda iwui ninglan theimilu!
Kala iwui alungli makaphāwui apong maleikhala yangmilu
kala katang makhavai apongli kathānmilu.
O
kala sākashebingwui eina phārimilu,
makaphā ningmāng phaningda,
rai sāshon sāthai kajibingwui eina.
kala athumwui morchaizingli phara̱wui hu lei.
O
sākashi miwui eina ili phārimilu,
iphei phatkhavai kasābingwui eina.
Hiksor kahaibingna ili khalen sanga,
khara̱ rānlaga athumna mankhavai sai;
shongfapheili iwui vang khalen sanghai.
Ina
iwui kapokhon hi khanganāsangmilu, O
O
iwui pangshapa kankhame,
rai atamli nana ikui rommihai.
O
awui makaphā otsak mazatva ngasakalu!
Ili kuinam kahaibingna kui mangeikai,
athumwui morchaiwui makaphā china athumli yuihaoranu!
Ngānda khalei meitha athumwuitungli tāranu!
Athumli chomli horsangda mashokluiaranu.
Mashātkazarbing ngalei chili maokthuiluiaranu;
sākashi mili makaphāna thākmei rengthathaoranu!
Ina thei kaja
kala khavātabingwui vang mashun mi.
Khangarongabingna kachāngkhat eina namingli ningkashi mira;
mashungrik kahaiana nawui mangāli okthuira.
O
ili thākta rāmilu!
Ina nali khangakao tharan nāshungmilu!
thāda namangāli shānkhuimilu,
kala ngazinshongwui pha̱kaphayā thāda ipāng khāngkakā!
O
imorchai khāmongli khamayonmilu!
Makaphā akhalinidala ining mayuithui ngasakmialu,
morei otsak kasābingli ngarumda,
makaphā otsakli I khalatta ngalangmazar ngasakmialu;
kala athumwui zākapha mangkaphā chi mazā-mamang ngasakmialu!
Kaphā mina lukhamashan eina ili shaoranu lah machinranu,
kha makaphā miwui thao ikuili maneomiranu;
kaja athumwui makaphā chili mamayāmada ina seihā sāchinga.
Athumli yonngasaki kajibingwui pāngli
horsangkhami tharan,
Ngaleitungli lunggui shaokhaida ngapha̱ kahai thāda,
athumwui ara̱kuila Kathewui ram khamorli yaoyānghaora.
Kha O
ina nali ngayinkhui khavai phai,
ili kankhami makhalei thāda mahormihaialu.
Athumna iwui vang khalen sangkahai chiwui eina mayonmilu,
kala makaphā kasābingwui khalenwui eina!
Ina yāmshokhaida,
makaphā makhayā athum katonga khalattawui khalenli tāzangranu.
Ina
iwui akhon eina ngasoda ina
Iwui maringkaphā awui mangāli phongshoka,
Iwui kakhanang ali hānga.
Imanglā vānkahai tharan,
iwui apong nana thei!
Ina kazata shongfali athumna iwui vang khalen ngathumda sanga.
Ina yāshong kapeivāda yanga,
kha ili theikhami khipākha maleimana;
iwui ngayin khavai maleiluimana,
khipākhana ili maphaningmimana.
O
ina hānga, na iwui ngayin khavaina kharingabingwui ramli iwui yarna.
Iwui khangakao kashāmilu;
kaja I kakhananglungli ngaphumhaira;
Ili rekakharekbingwui eina kakanshokmilu,
kaja athum iwui vang pangnāhaowa.
Phātopwui eina ili khuishokmilu,
chieina namingli ina ningkashi mira!
Khamashungabingna ili kuinamra;
kaja nana ili mavātlakla sāmira.
O
iwui kapo khuisangmilu!
Ningtongda nawui khangaronglungli ili khangahānkāmilu.
kaja nawui mangāli khamashung eina kharing mi maleimana.
Kaja yangkashena ili kharomhaira;
imirin ana ngaleili sākachupmihaira;
achā thikahai thāda ana ili tangkhamangli pamngasaka.
Chiwui vang imanglā vānhaira,
iwuklungli ngacheekhaihaowa.
Achālakhawui atam ina phaningunga,
nana sāmi kahai saikora ina machuka;
Napāngna sāmi kahai ina phaningkachunga.
Ipāng katingda poli;
imanglāna ngalei katheng thāda nali ra̱changa.
Kathakta ili khangahānkāmilu O
Imanglā vānhaira!
Iwui eina namai mathummihaialu,
maningakha ila chomli khavābing thāhaipaishina.
Nawui makhangachei leikashi ngathorshong ili shāngasakmilu,
kaja ina nali shitsanga.
Ina zatki kaji apong chi ili tamchitheimilu;
kaja nali imanglāna yangkakāna.
O
Ngayinkhui khavai ina nali yāmkharāna.
Nawui ningkachāng sākhavai tamchitheimilu;
kaja na iwui Varena!
Nawui kaphā manglā china,
shongfali ashātli thānzatmilu.
Namingwui vang, O
imanglā phārimilu!
Nawui khamashung khangarong alungli ili kakhanangwui eina khuishokmilu!
Kala nawui makhangachei leikashilungli iwui yangkashebingli katattāmihaolu,
kala iwui yangkashebing saikora sāshimānmihaolu;
kaja I nawui raona.
Sochikatlu,
raiwui vang ipāng,
ngarar khavaiwui ipāngmareng tamkachitheia;
Iwui ngayin khavai lunghār kala iwui raipan,
kankhame iwui chāngvei, ali ina ngayinkhui,
mibingwui pangshap awui azingli kahaiali.
lah miwui naomayara khinida awui vang phaningkhami?
Mi hi khaksuikha kathāna,
awui atamva kanthuimamān kaji khaya̱ kathāna.
O
Phungreili saza̱mida meikhut shokranu!
Rikhān ngasheikazamda athumli chaiyāngmihaolu,
nawui malātheira̱ thaivāda athumli kupmichaohaolu!
Atungshongwui eina napāng katingshokmilu,
kathuka tara̱wui eina kanmida ili kahuimilu,
makatheia mibingwui pāng eina,
kakapik tui khamor eina khamatuia,
athumwui yāpang che makhamashunga yāpangna.
O Varivara, namingli ina laa kadhar akha sāra;
khara̱ tharā kakā tingteilā ina huida,
awungabingli khayui khame,
narao Davidli ngatangkhuikhame!
Sākashi raighaiwui eina ili kanmilu,
kala makatheia mibingwui eina ili kanshokmilu.
athumwui khamorna kakapik tui matui,
kala athumwui yāpangva thānkhangui yāpangna.
Ithumwui naomayara ngarā athum yaronlakha rarkahai thingrong tharanu,
ithumwui naongalāva̱ ngarā keinung sākhavai chithekwui pākra̱ sākhui kahaibing tharanu;
Ithumwui zātshim pemranu,
kashakazā ayur saikora eina;
ithumwui luili yaola thingthing ngarumsangranu;
sha̱keibingna anao kachungkha mataisangranu,
anao vaida kalāshāt maleiaranu;
lah mapharākharar maleiranu;
ithumwui chanreili kachotwui ringkhangākhon mashālakaranu!
Hikatha sokhami samkaphang mibing khamahaina!
Iwui Vare kala Awunga,
Ina nali masot chikatra,
kala namingli katang mavaila sochingra.
Thangkachida ina nali sora,
kala namingli katang mavaila sochikatchingra.
awui kharei chi mavāshungrarmana.
Thot akhawui eina khangatei akhali nawui otsak masot mimaronra,
kala nawui pangshapa otsakbing phongmira.
Nawui khayākakā yāngla makakhui tekhamatei,
kala nawui matakhak kahai otsak chili ina phaningchingra.
Nawui khangachee-khangachā otsak mibingna vaomalānra;
kala nawui hakkhamahā ina hāngchitheira.
Nawui makhavāta kaphā mingkazat athumna vaoshokra,
kala nawui khamashung khangarongwui laa panglāk eina sāra.
malung mavātzarmana kala makhangachei leikashi mavātmana.
O
kala nawui katharabing saikorana nali sora!
Nawui wungramwui tekhamatei athumna matuira,
kala nawui pangshapwui pongli hāngra;
nawui hakkhamahā otsak mibingwui naomayara ngarāli chithei khavai;
kala nawui wungramwui hāngkhavai makhalei tekhamatei chila.
Nawui wungram katang makhavai wungramna,
kala nawui khamung thot kachida leichingra.
kala awui kasāsā saikora lukhamashanmānga.
Kongluida khalei saikorali
ngakhumsang kahai saikorali khāngmathotmi.
Nali saikorawui mikna yanga, kala nana athumwui kashakazā atam atamli mi.
Nana athumli kashap chi mi kala saikorawui kaphaning ungshungmi.
kala awui kasāsā saikora lukhamashanmānga.
Ali khangakao saikorali
ningkathar eina khangakao saikorali.
Ali khangachee saikorawui ningkachāng ana ngarānmi,
ana athumwui khavao shāmi kala athumli huimi.
Ali leikashe saikorali ana ngākmi;
kha makaphā makhayāli ana shimān ngasakra.
asā khavai saikorana awui katharamingli mashimānda sochingranu.
I ringlakha eina tangda
I manglā leilakha iwui Vareli masotlaa sāchingra.
Nawui ninglum wungnaobing, miwui naomayara ngarā,
khangachon mamikhararra athumli mahaialu.
Awui khaksui pākthui kahai tharan a ngalei ngasāthuiluihaora;
chithang awui khangarān shimānhaora.
Jacobwui Varivarali ngachonme sākhangasaka,
shamadru, kala chili khalei saikora;
shitkasang leiching kaje;
rekakharek kahaibingwui vang mashun sākhame;
kathaiali kashakazā mikazaa,
awui
khangarongali
ana ra̱meinao kala avāva̱ makhalei naobingli nganaomi;
kha makaphā makhayābingwui apong ana shimān ngasaka.
O Zion, nawui
Kaja ithumwui Vareli masotlaa kasā hi kaphāna;
kaja a lumashantheilaka, chieina masot mingayilaka.
Israelwui raithā kahaibingli kazipkhui.
Ana ning kathengbingli raimi,
kala athumwui khamā ngahāmi,
Ana sirāwui mashing shānkhui,
athum saikorawui aming ana phokmi.
Ithumwui
pangshapla mavātmana;
awui theishingkakhui ngashānla machaomana.
Khangazanabingli
makaphā makhayābingli ana ngaleili hortai.
Ningkashi eina ngasoda
ithumwui Vareli nimshimri eina tingteilā huilu!
Ana kazingram muiyā eina fakhami,
okathuiwui vang zingrot ngarānmi,
kala kaphungli khawo kharngasaka,
sāyurbingli ana kashakazā mizai,
kala kakhonga hangkhānaolila mizai.
Awui ningyāngkhaung siguiwui pangshapli maleimana;
miwui pheilila ana khamathān maleimana,
kha ali khangachee athumli awui ringkaphā lei,
awui makhangachei leikashili kachihānbing.
Nawui Vareli solu, O Zion!
Kaja ana nawui ngaveithing makang ngasakmi,
nanaongarāli ana somi.
Ana nawui tharilungli chingrihaimi,
ana phameikap kaje zāt mizai.
Ana okathuili awui ningkhami chihoshoka,
awui tui thaklāk eina ngayaovai,
sāhā thāda ana horam tāmi;
ana hotlā thāda pamkok yaomi.
Ana atangtang eina phāmkok shokngasaka;
khamakui chiwui mangali khipāna nganingshapkhala?
Ana awui tui chihoda, athum chi mengngasaka;
ana awui masi phanngasaka, kala tara̱ longngasaka.
Ana Jacobli awui tui phongmi,
Israelli awui ainbing kala shiyan-chikan hāngmi.
Yur khangateili chithāda ana masālakmana,
athumna awui ainbing matheimana,
Kazingramwui eina
kajuiwui eina ali solu!
Awui kazingrao saikora ali solu,
ali solu, awui ashangva̱ saikora!
Zimikla, kachāngla, ali solu;
kahora sirā saikora ali solu!
Juimeikap kaja kazingramla solu,
kazingramwuitungli khalei tara̱la!
Athumna
Kaja ana kasoda athumli sākhuiya.
Kala ana athumli katang makhavaiwui vang sākhui;
athumwui leiret ana sāmi kahai chili makānshokrarmana.
Okathuiwui eina
ngayiwui sāyur kala kathuka nathum,
mei eina theih, horām kala phām, siphan-zingrot,
awui ningkhami ungshung ngasaka!
Phungrei kala phungrā saikora,
atheirong kala cedar saikora!
Sāyur kala sha̱kei saikora, ngawokazata yurbing,
kala kapaia vānaobing!
Awungabing kala okathuiwui mi saikora,
wungnaobing kala okathuili khamunga saikora!
Yaronnao ngalānao ngarumda,
kasarnaola naoshinaola!
Athumna
kaja amingmāngli khayā kakāna;
awui tekhamatei okathui kala kazingli juimei.
Awui mibingwui vang ana angaji akha shokngasakhaira;
awui katharabingwui vang solu,
awui ngalemli khalei Israelnaowui vang.
Shitkasangabing kazipli masotlaa sālu!
Israelna ali kasaali mathānranu!
Zionwui mibingna athumwui Awungali mathānranu!
Pheijak eina ngasoda amingli athumna sochikatranu,
timbrel kala mazui khongda nimshimri kahai laa sālu!
Kaja
malungkhanimbingli maiyāda yuingasaka.
Shitkasang ningkatongbingna tekhamatei eina soranu!
khamathānwui vang athumwuipamli laa sāranu!
Vareli athumna masot kachikat panglāk eina vaoranu,
zankhangasung raighai pāngli singda,
miyurbingli athut khuikhavai,
mibingli hāngmachin khavai,
athumwui wungnaobingli mari khānghui eina khalap khavai,
kala athumwui wungnaobingli mari eina narkhavai,
kapi kahai bichar chi sākhavai!
Shitkasang saikorawui vang hi tekhamateina.
Awui kathara shimli Vareli solu;
awui reikhamatai siraramli ali solu!
Hakkhamahā ot sākahaiwui vang ali solu;
awui reimataikhailak kahai thishurda ali solu.
Talla̱khon eina ngasoda ali solu;
sipa tingteilā singda ali solu!
Timbrel eina pheijak ngasha̱da ali solu;
tingteilā kala sipa̱ singlaga ali solu!
Akhon kashok kortar singda ali solu;
panglāk eina kortar shaoda ali solu!
Khaksuida khalei kachiva̱na
Solomonwui chānsam:
Kaja mibingna awor kala hāngkachithei,
kathuka tuibing theikhui khavai,
thangkhamei eina ot kasāwui pongli hāngkachithei,
khamashung khangarong, mashun-makhui,
kala ngaraikachā mashun samphang khavai;
kaja ningkashambingli thangkhamei mikhavai;
theishingkakhui kala khalatta machukathei khanuithotli mikhavai—
thangkhameibingnala shālaga tamkakhui mataisang khavai,
kala theishingkakhuibingna kathem samphang khavai,
chānsamla, akachangla theikhui khavaina.
Mangkhama̱bingna thangkhamei kala hāngkachitheili yangkharinga.
Nganālu, inaomayara, navāwui hāngkachithei,
kala nava̱wui tamkachithei manganākasang masaalu;
hi nakuili mayong pāsi khangakham,
kala nakahungli chā khangachā kathāna.
Inaomayara, morei kaphungbingna nali suiakha mamayaalu.
Athumna, “Ithumli shurlu,
ithum ngathumda phama̱ ashaosa,
khayon makhalei mili ngathirai asāsa;
Kathewui ram thāda ithumna athumli
kharing eina tongtingda mayuisanghaosa,
Akhurli tāzang kahaiabing thāda:
ithumna aman kasaka ot kachungkha samphangra,
ithumwui shim ngaponkakhui ot eina chipemra;
nathumwui yar hili horsangngarumda ithum saikora
lupākhao akha ngarumra” jilala,
inaomayara athumwui apongli mangayurzatalu,
athumwui shongpong eina naphei ngalanhaolu;
kaja athumwui pheina makaphāli vai,
kala athuma ashee shokkhangasak thāklaka.
Kaja vānao akhawui miktheili khalen kasang aremana;
kha mibing hina khalatta thikhavai athumna honpama,
kala khalattawui manglā khuikhavai rimpama.
Sāshāt eina katong samkaphang mi saikorawui apong hithai;
akhavāpāwui mirin khuithuimihaowa.
leihngapha̱lungli ana awui akhon chuimei ngasaka;
phākho matungmeikap kachiwui eina ana vaowa,
kala keinung ngaveili ana matuiya:
“O ningkashambing, nathum karankha ningshamfarakhala?
Mashātkatheibingna karankha khamashātli mathanra̱ kala mangkhama̱bingna aworli ningkachaira?
Iwui hāngkhamachinli nganālu,
yanglu, ina iwui kaphaning nali hāngsera;
iwui tui ina nali chitheira.
Kaja ina nali hoi, chithālala nana makhuisangmana,
ipāng katingshoka kala khipākha makhuisangmana,
kala iwui hāngkachithei saikora nathumna matheimithuwa,
hāngkhamachin akhala makhuisangmana,
nawui unshimuili inala mana̱ra;
khangachee kharā atamli ina ngashan sanganaora,
khangacheena siphan zingrot thāda,
kala nathumwui unshimui sur kakhaning thāda kharā tharan,
kachotkachāng nathumli kharā tharan ina mana̱shira.
Chieina athumna ili ngakaora,
kha ina mangahānkāmara;
athumna ili phāshang phātālala masamphangmara.
Khikhalajila athumna aworli yangkharinga
kala
Iwui hāngkachithei akhala makhuimana,
kala iwui hāngkhamachin saikorali chinhaowa,
chiwui vang eina athumna athumwui apongli kazatwui athei shaira,
kala khalattawui khangarān eina sānra.
Kaja ning kashambing ning khangachei eina thi,
kala ichachamabingna theithangkhamei khavāt eina khalatta shimāna;
kha ili nganākasanga china ning nganungkhung eina okthuira,
kala makaphāli mangacheela leiyāsa eina pānra.”
Inaomayara, iwui tui nana khuida iwui ningkhami mayonakha,
thangmeiwui pongli nganāsangda,
theishingkakhuili ningsangakha;
mha, nana kalikhada kathuka theikhavai ngakaoakha,
kala theishingkakhuiwui vang poakha,
nana lupāsā kaphā thāda phaakha,
kala ngathum kahai lan kaphā thāda phaakha;
Kaja
akhamorwui eina awor kala theishingkakhui shoka;
mashungrik kahaibingwui vang kaphā thangkhamei kazipmihai;
ningsā yinglak eina okathuia miwui vang chāngvei sāmi,
mashun shongpong mayonmi,
kala awui katharabingwui apong phārimi.
Chieina khamashung mashun-makhui kaphā apong saikora nana theikhuira;
kaja thangkhamei kaho chi naningli zangra,
awor china namanglāli ningyāng ungngasakra;
mashun ningna nali yangmira;
theishingkakhuina nali ngākmira;
makaphā apongwui eina nali kanmira,
matuiphāphā kaji mi,
khamashung khangarong apong horhaida,
tangkhamang shongfali kazata,
makaphā kasāli khamathāna
kala makaphā otsakli ningyāngkhaunga;
kha̱khamakhei shongfali kazata athum,
athumwui apongla mangatarmana.
Shuikhangareo sha̱naowui eina nali huimira,
makhangatunva̱wui chānhān khamathāwui eina;
ngalālakhawui khavāknaoli nothā kahaiva̱ kala awui Varewui tuingashit malai kahaiva̱;
awui shim kathilungli ngaphuma,
kala awui shongfa kathi khaya̱pam vāhaowa;
ali khavā khipākha malatungmana,
lah athumna kharing shongfala masamphangluimana.
Chiwui vang nana kaphā miwui apongli zatki kajina,
kala khangarongawui shongfali mayonrali.
Kaja khangarong mina ram chili okthuira,
kala ningsā khangazipa mina chili pānra;
kha makaphā makhayābingli ngalei chiwui eina katathaora,
kala khayomabingli chiwui eina phurshokhaora.
Inaomayara, iwui tamkachithei mamalaihaialu;
kha iwui ningkhami hi nawui wuklungli hailu;
kaja nali china nawui mirin okkapei kala leikhayā mirin mira.
Khayākashi kala ningkatongna nali mahorhairanu;
chibing chi nakahungli neihailu,
athum chi naningli kapisanghailu.
ngahānkhangai kala khamasho samphangra.
Naning tongda
na khalattawui theikhavā chili machihānalu.
Nawui apong saikora ali theingasaklu,
chieina ana nawui shongfa ngarong ngasakra.
kala makaphāwui eina ngareithuihaolu.
China nawui asā kharai kala nara̱kui khangaveng ngasāra.
Nawui khalalei kala matheikhare theishirai eina ngasoda
chithākha nawui zatchum kachungkha mataisangra,
kala nawui vaichumla pemtha̱-pemtai ngasakra.
kaja
avāva̱na khaluma naoli kasā thāda.
Thangkhamei samkaphanga mi,
kala theishingkakhui khalei mi chi ringphai,
kaja chiwui tongkakhui china lupāsāwui eina tongkakhui kala,
kala chiwui mataisangkakhuina sināwui eina mataisangkahuili phāmei.
Ana muktāli lāngda aman sakmei,
kala nana ningkachāng ot akhala chili ngaheokapai maleimana.
Okkapei awui yāpāngli lei,
kala awui uishong kashāng eina khayākakā lei.
Awui apong ningyāngkhaung mānga,
kala awui shongfa saikora chingri kahai mānga,
ali khuikasangbing chi kharingwui thingrong kathāna;
ali singtit kajibingli ringkaphā hoi.
Thangkhamei eina
theishingkakhui eina ana kazingram sākai;
awui aworna kathuka chi ngachakkhaishok ngasaka,
kala muiyāna ikra̱ tāmi.
Inaomayara, kaphā thangkhamei eina ngasoda mashunning singtitlu;
namikyanwui eina athumli mayām ngasakalu,
china namanglāwui kharing ngasāra,
nakahungwui sāri ngasāra.
Chieina nawui apongli nana ningnganungda zatra;
kala naphei mangaphokmara.
Nana pamzanglala
nana ngayaikasang tharan nawui pikakhui shimlakra.
Kashuirak kahai khangachee,
lah makaphaali shimān khangasak rālala mangacheealu;
kaja
kala ana naphei maphatthui khavai mayonmira.
Kaphā sāmikharānbingli masānhaialu,
nana sāmikashap chi leilakha.
Nawui pāngli laleilaga, nawui khongnaiali,
“Ungsalu, rāluinaolu,
akhama ina minaora”
da mahāngalu.
Nali ning horsangda khongnaikapama athumli,
makaphā sākhavai khangarān masaalu.
Nali khikha khayon masālaga,
maram maleila makhararalu.
Sākashe mili mayuishilu, kala
awui apong akhanidala masha̱alu,
kaja thānkhangui mi chi
kha khangatara mi chili ana shitsangchaowa.
kha khamashungwui pamkhavaili ana somi.
kha khanimbingli ana ngahanngai.
Thangkhamana khayākakā samphangra,
kha mangkhama̱na maikashi samphanga.
O, inaomayara, avāva̱ akhana tamkachithei nganālu,
machuktheishap khavai nganākhui kazaklu;
kaja ina kaphā ningkhami khamina,
iwui tamkachithei hi mahorhailakalu.
Ishāvāwui mangāli naomayara sāda nganuizon eina leilakha,
akhamāng kaje sāda ishāva̱wui miktāli leilakha,
ana ili tamchitheida hānga,
“Iwui tui naningli shāptithailu;
iwui ningkhami nganāda okthuilu;
chi mamalaihaialu,
kala ikhamorwui tui hiwui eina mangareithuihaialu.
Thangkhamei khuilu; theikakhui khuilu.
Ali mahorhailakalu, ana mayonmira;
ali leishilu ana nali ngākmira.
Thangkhamei haophok khavai chi hina:
Thangkhamei phākhuilu,
kala samkaphaphang chili, ningli shāphailu.
Aman saklakada phaninglu,
chieina ana nali mai kāngasakra;
ali ngavapakha, nali khayā kāngasakra.
Nakuili ana khamathā pāsi ngakhāmmira;
ana khamathā kuihon ngahonmira.”
Nganālu, inaomayara iwui tui khuisanglu,
chieina na okpeimeira.
Thangkhameiwui apongli ina nali tamchitheihaira;
ina mashungrik kahai shongfali nali thānzathaira.
Nana kazat tharan, nawui pheikār mahapkhanomara;
kala nana yonglala mangaphokmara.
Tamkachithei singtitta machihohailakalu;
ali mayonkhuilu, kaja a nawui mirinna.
Makaphābingwui apongli mazangalu,
kala makaphā kasābingwui shongfali mazatalu.
Chili mazangalu, chili mavaalu;
chiwui eina ngareithuida kānthulu.
Kaja athumna khalāng ot masāranglakha eina tangda mapimana,
mili phei mangaphok ngasakranglakha eina tangda mik sip majimana.
Kaja athumna makaphāwui kashakazā zai,
kala khangashaowui ra̱shak manga.
Kha khangarongbingwui shongfava zingthanlamwui kahor thāda,
mangashunranglakha eina tangda horkhangai hora.
Makaphāwui aponga kathuka tangkhamang thai;
athumna khili phei ngaphokkhala da matheimana.
Inaomayara, iwui tui nganātitkhuilu,
kahāng saikora nganākhuikazaklu.
Chibing chi nawui mikyan eina mayāmthuihailakaranu;
naningli haichinglu.
Kaja chi samkaphang a chiwui vanga manglā ringkhavaina,
phasā kakazā saikora raikhavaina.
Nawui wuklung ningmazingda hailu;
kaja chiwui eina kharing ura̱ woka,
kha̱khamakhei tui mamatuialu,
kala mikhanam tui khamatui katāva̱li horhaolu.
Namik mangāshong ngatartei hailu,
kala ngarongri namangāli ngashānlu,
chithākha nawui kazat kachiva̱ mangapatmara.
Yāshongla uishongla makārsangphaphālu,
naphei makaphāwui eina ngareithuihaolu.
Inaomayara, iwui thangkhamei hi nganākhuilu,
iwui theishingkakhuili nāshunglu;
chi eina nana mashunmakhui theikhuishapra,
kala namorchaina theithangkhamei mayonra.
Kaja kapākhayong sha̱naowui morchaili khuira̱ ngaya̱tai;
kala awui tuimatui thaoli nganaimei;
kha naoda ava thingkhā thāda khai;
zankhangasunga raighai thāda zana.
Apheina kathi pamli zata;
awui pheikārna Kathewui ramwui shongpongli shurvai;
ana kharingawui apongli mazatmana,
apong ma̱zatphaphada kali zatlikhala kaji ana matheimana.
Chieina ara, O naomayarabing, ili nganālu,
kala ikhamorna kahāng tui hi eina mapākthuihaialu.
Shanao chiwui eina nawui apong katāvali hailu,
kala awui shim khāmong ngalemli mavaalu;
maningakha nana nawui khayā kateili mihaipai kala nawui mirin atam lukhamashan makathei mili mihaipai;
makathei mina nawui yāng eina chipemkhuihaida,
nawui chotchān yangkashebingwui vang ngasāhaipaishina;
naoda naphasā, aphila kānhaida athitlam nana ringāda hāngra,
“Kharākli ina kayākha ningkachaisākhala,
kala hāngkhamachinli iningna kayākha yangkharingsakhala!
Chishutmebingwui tamkachithei ina makhuisangmana,
lah ili hāngkachitheiabinglila manganāsangmana.
Yarui ashangva̱wui kakazip alungli I shimānchaoki jihairasai.”
Nawui tara̱hamwui eina manglu,
nawui ra̱khongwui eina longkashoka tara̱ manglu.
Nawui ura̱ longphaphāda chanreili tara̱ longngasakrala?
Chi nawui vangmāng sāranu,
kha̱mibingwui vang mangasaaranu.
Nawui ura̱ sokhami ngasāranu,
na yāronlakhawui preiva̱li ningyang unglu;
seichuinao thāda leishiri kahai,
chaonao thāda yangkhangai.
Awui leikashina atam kachida nali ningyāng ungngasakchingranu,
awui leikashili malungchāngchingranu.
Inaomayara, khisāda nana kapākhayong sha̱naoli malungchāngra,
kala makhangatunva̱li hungrei khuirakhala?
Kaja miwui shongpong chi
kala ana awui shongfa saikora yangda lei.
Makaphā miwui khayonkhamāngna ali khalen sanga,
kala awui morei kasālungli ali mana.
Hāngkachithei khavātwui vang a thi,
kala awui mangkhama̱wui vang a shimānhaowa.
Inaomayara, nakhongnaiwui vang nana nganingmiakha,
kha̱miwui vang khangashit samiakha;
namorchaiwui tuimatuili manhaiakha,
makhamorwui tuiwui eina tukkhuihaiakha,
hithāda sālaga nakhalatta huikhuilu, inaoamayara;
kaja na nawui khongnaiwui pāngli tāzanghaira;
thaklāk eina nawui khongnaili achamnākhuilu.
Mapilakalu, sikhangutla masingutalu;
sā kharengawui eina chaonaona,
khalen kasanga pāngwui eina vānaona khayām thāda na khalatta yāmshokhaolu.
Zālingli ayanglu, O chāngshe!
awui otsak yangkhuilu, kala thangmeilu.
Akhokala, otshinmela, khamungala maleila,
ana lumkachāng kashakazā ngarānsanga,
kala māhāli zākhavai kazipkhui.
O chāngshe, na chili karankha pifarakhala?
kapiwui eina na katharan thuira?
kasha̱kha pāng masa̱da ngasāmkakhui eina,
kachām kaho china zaikazā mi thāda nali rāra,
rai khavā mi thāda khavāt rāra.
Makānkhanā makaphā mina kha̱khamakhei tui matuizata,
mik kashiya, phei khayita,
pāngmareng eina chiza̱zata,
makhamashung ning eina makaphā ngarānkhuiya,
kakai katek yaoshon-yaothai;
chiwui vang eina unshimui awuitungli kashuirak eina rāra;
hunkhawui alungli ngayānghaida masākhuiluipaimara.
kashine hi awui yangkakharing otna:
ngamsor kahai mikyan, kakapika male,
khayon makhaleili ashee tākhangasak pāng,
makaphā makhayā khangarān ning,
makaphā otwui vang yongkazata phei,
kakapik matuishokta khangui shākhi kasā,
kala chinaongarāwui alungli kakai katek yaokasang.
Inaomayara, navāwui ningkhami mayonlu,
kala nava̱wui tamkachithei mahorhaialu.
Naningli atam kachida shāptithailu,
nakahungli khalaptithailu.
Nana kazatli athumna nali thānmira,
nana pikazang tharan athumna nali mayonmira;
kala nana ngakarkathui tharan athumna nali ngazekngarumra.
Kaja ningkhami hi thaomei na, kala tamkachitheina kahorna;
kala kharākwui hāngkhamachin mirinwui apongna,
makaphā sha̱naowui eina nali phārimi khavai,
makhangatunva̱wui nganaipat kahai malewui eina kanmi khavaina.
Naningli awui azak khamathā chili maningchāngalu,
kala awui mikhā china nali matuknarhaiaranu;
kaja khayorva̱̱li zāt ngahomkha eina masākhuipai;
kha phokaphāva̱na
Mi akhana makāli mei romphungda awui kachon machuimarala?
Chi maningakha mi akhana kasā meithātungli zatta aphei machuimarala?
Chithāda khongnai preiva̱li ngasokapi mi chi chikathāna;
ali sākaza̱ mi saikorali tandi mamila mathuimana.
Thaihaoda thokhavai khale chili mina maningkachaimala?
Kala ali tukkhuihaiakha, ana khum shini shida runra;
awui shimli khalalei saikora mishokra.
Phokaphaa che ning mazangmana;
chithāda kasā a che khalatta sākashimānna.
Khamāla za̱ra, maikashila samphangra,
kala awui maishāt mapheothuipaimara.
Kaja yuikashina mi akhali malung thuingasaka,
kala athut kakhui tharan mataimilakmara.
Shimān kahai runkakā chila ana makhuimara,
nana mataida milala mamayāmara.
Inaomayara, iwui tui mayonlu,
kala iwui ningkhami naningli kaziphailu.
Iwui ningkhami mayonda okthuilu,
iwui tamkachithei namikli khamathā ot thāda hailu;
napāngmarengli khalapshānhailu,
naningli kapisanghailu.
Thangmeili “Na izarva̱na” da hānglu;
kala theishingkakhuili nawui khamashita ngasotnao da holu;
kapā-khayong sha̱naowui eina nali phārimi khavai,
makhangatunva̱wui chanhān khamathā chiwui eina.
Kaja iwui shimwui charfakhur eina ina yangshoka,
kala ina ningkashambingwui alungli theihaira,
ina khanuithotbingwui alungli theihaira,
ning makhalei yaronnao akha,
ngalāva̱shi shimwui achikun ngalemli shongpong makānvāda shim chili vākhavai zata
ngazinshong, meirong ngamānshap atamli.
Kala yanglu, sha̱nao akhana ali rāngaroka,
khayorva̱̱wui kachon ngavailaga,
tengkuilak eina samphanga.
Ava mai shālak eina zatphāphā kaje,
shimli phei mashongkaza̱ sha̱naona;
chānreili, leihngapha̱li,
achithek kachida ana ngaraipama.
Ana mayara chili yonkhuilaga maya̱ya,
kala maishālak eina hānga:
“Ina pha̱kaphayā chigatkida lei,
ina aja khangashit sāhaira;
chieina nali samphang khavai kharāna, nali
phākhuiphalungra da, samphangkachanghaira.
Iwui pet masankazazakhaira,
Egyptwui machu kashoka chonsā khamathā hamlaga;
iwui pet ina myrrh, aloe kala sākom eina heirorhaira.
Rālu, ngathor marāranglakha eina tangda leikashi chipemkhuisa,
leikashi eina ini khalatta ningyāng ungrumsa.
Kaja igahara shimli maleimana,
a kharam katāvali vāhaira;
ana pheisā khaokhatkha khuiphungda thuihaira,
kachāng nganikhawui thili ungnaora.”
Chikathā suikaphanep tui eina ali suikhui,
tāngpat kahai tui eina tandi sākhui.
Sā khayorpamli mukkā shimen khavā thāda,
lah seichui tukkhui kahai thāda,
ali konkon shurthuwa
akharili malāthing makāpza̱ranglakha;
vānaona khalenli yongkasang thāda,
awui manglā shimānra kaji mayara china matheimana.
Ara O inao ngarā, ili nganālu,
ikhamorwui tui nganātitkhuilu.
Nawui ning ngalāva̱wui pongli mazangaranu,
awui shongfali mazataranu;
kaja kachungkhali ana shimān ngasakhaira;
mha, ana chithit kahai shānla makhuimana
Awui shim Kathewui ramwui apongna,
kathi ram vākhavai apongna.
Theishingkakhuina mangavaomala?
Shongfaphei kajujuili,
shongjan shongjanli ana nganinga;
keinungwui ngavei ngalemli,
zangkhavaipamlila ana pangda vaowa;
“O mibing ina nathumli kahona,
kala iwui khavao hi mi saikoralina.
O ningkashambing, thangkhamei tamlu;
O mangkhama̱bing, nganātitkhuilu.
Nganālu, kaja ina kaphātui hāngra,
kala imorchaiwui eina khamashung chi shokra;
kaja ikhamorna mashuntui matuira;
imorchaili makhayā chiya ningkachai.
Ikhamorwui tui saikora khamashung khangarongsera;
chili kapikung kapikkhavā lah kha̱khamakhei maleimana.
Theishingkakhuibingwuivanga saikora khangatarmānga,
kala awor samkaphangbingwui vanga khamashungna.
Lupāsāwui mahutle iwui tui khuitha̱lu,
kasaka sinale awor khuitha̱lu.
“Kaja chara̱-chasānli thangkhamei phāmei,
nana ningkachāng saikora ali pāntam khavai maleimana.
Thangmei, iva, thangkhameipamli pama,
kala ina awor eina mashun phākhui.
Lāngkaso kala khayāning khanganinga
kala makaphāwui apong kala kapik kakhayang tuimatui ina yangkharinga.
Hāngkachithei kala akachanga thangkhamei ili lei,
theishingkakhui kala yāng ili lei.
Iwui mangā eina awungabingna munga,
ngalei khangākabingna tāzak tārak kahai mashun mi;
iwui mangā eina wungnaobingna munga,
kala khangambingna okathui munga.
Ili leikashibing chili ina leishi,
kala ili ningsanglak eina kaphābingna ili samphanga.
Kashāng kala khayākakāla iwuili lei,
makashimān lan kala mataikasangla.
Iwui athei sināli phāmei, phākhamatai sinālila,
iwui eina kashok kaphā ot lupāsālila phamei.
Khamashung khangarongwui apongli ina zata,
mashun shongpongli,
ili leikashibingli lan eina ngasoda somi,
kala athumwui kazipshimbing pemngasaka.
achālakhawui sākharena.
Achalakha ili sākahaina,
okathui masāranglakha ili sāri.
Kathuka chi maleiranglakha,
makhavāt ura̱bing malongranglakha ili sāhairasai.
Phungreibing masāranglakha,
phungrānao maleiranglakha ili sāhairasai;
okathui kala lui
apuk-apagawui khare chifa-chihā maleiranglakha.
Ana kazingram sākakā tharan I chili leihairasai,
ana kathuka chiwui atung kuimareida kakhan tharan,
ana atungshongwui kazingram ngaziplak eina kasā tharan,
kathuka chiwui ura̱ sākashok tharan,
shamadruwui angarit sākhami tharan,
awui kakaso kaida tara̱na malongzatphāphāpai khavai ana okathuiwui apam ngayeikhami tharan,
I awui ngalemli leisai,
ot sākatheia akha thāda;
kala ina awui
awui mangāli atam kachida mathānsai,
awui apuk-apaga chili ringphāda
kala mikumo naomayarabingli ningyāngunga.
“Ara inaomayarabing, ili nganālu:
iwui apong khamayonbing chi ringkaphāna.
Hangkachithei nganākhuida thangmeilu,
kala chi mapairekhaialu.
Iwui ngaveili thangkachida mayonpamda,
iwui khāmongpheili nganingpamda,
ili khanganā mi chi ringkaphā ngasāra.
Kaja ili samkaphang china kharing samphanga,
kala
kha ili phāyon kahaibing khalatta khamā za̱khui;
ili yangkakharingbing saikora kathili leishi.”
Thangmeina awui shim sākhui,
ana awui pākra̱ shini shunhaira.
Awui sā taithathaira,
awui ra̱shak-shirei ana manāthaira,
awui tablela ngarānhaira.
Keinung apam juikhamataibingwui eina ahokhui khavai,
rao sha̱naobingli chihohaira,
“Ningkashambing saikora, hili rāranu!”
Ningmakhaleibingli ana hānga,
“Rālu, iwui kashakazā zalu,
kala ina manāt kahai ra̱shak-shirei rāmanglu.
Ningkasham chihohaida okthuilu,
kala theishingkakhuiwui apongli zatlu.”
Mana̱shikatha̱ali hāngkhamachin akhalatta tui pokhui,
kala makaphā makhayā mili khamachina a chi khamā za̱khui.
Mana̱shikatha̱ali machinakha nali ningkachaira,
thangkhamali hāngmachinakha ana nali leishira.
Thangkhamei mili hāngchitheilu,
chieina a thangmeimeiluira;
khangaronga mili tamchitheilu ana chungmeida tamkhuira.
kala Katharapawui awor chi theishingkakhuina.
Kaja iwui mangā eina nawui atam mataisangra,
kala nawui mirinli zingkum ngarumsangra.
Na thangmeiakha, nakhalattawui vang thangkhameina;
nana mana̱shiakha, chi nakhalatta phungra.
Mangkhama̱ sha̱nao khonzāra,
maphākakhuiana, kala kakhayakla matheimana.
Ana awui khāmongpheili pama,
kala keinungwui apam kajujuili pamda,
rākakānbingli hoi,
shongfa ngarongri eina kazatbingli,
“Ningkapai saikora hili rālu!”
Kala ning makhaleiya mayara chili sha̱nao china hithāda hānga,
“Likhamang tara̱ shima,
kala ngathumda kazā zāt ngayama.”
Kha kathebing chili lei kaji ana matheimana,
kaja sha̱naopava̱wui mibing kathuka Kathewui ramli lei.
Thangkhama naobingna avāva̱li ringphāngasaka,
kha mangkhama̱ naona ava̱va̱wui malung kharingna.
Makaphā-makhayā eina tongkhuida kazipkasang tongkazā maleimana,
kha khamashung khangarongna kathiwui eina kankhuimi.
Khangaronga mili
kha ana makhayābingwui khangarān pa̱ngapā ngasaka.
Pāng makhangarapna chāmngasaka,
kha khamakhunawui pāngna shāngngasaka.
Lumkachāng kazipkasang naomayara chi thangkhamana,
kha māhāli kapi naomayara chi kakhayak samphanga.
Sokhami hi khangarongbingwui kuili lei,
kha makhayāwui khamorli sākashimāng thumhai.
Khangaronga mili sokhaminada phaningunga,
kha makhayā miwui aming shuitāra.
Thangkhamawui ningna ningkhamili khuisanga,
kha morsaptap kahai mangkhama̱ mi kashimānli zangra.
Ningsāngazipta kazata china tāphup eina zatra,
otsak makhamashunga chi phongshokhaora.
Mik kakashina khonzār ngasaka,
kha pinglak eina hāngkhamachin china chingrihai ngasaka.
Khangarongawui khamor kharinga ura̱na,
kha makhayāwui khamorli sākathat ngathumhai.
kha leikashina khayon saikora fakhammi.
Theishingkakhuia awui morchaili thangkhamei samphanga,
kha lijei hi ningmakhalei mangkhama̱wui khumkhorwui vangna.
Thangkhama mina theikakhui kaziphai,
kha mangkhama̱wui matuiphāphā kajina kashimān rānganai ngasaka.
Kashāngawui lan awui khangazipa keinungna,
kachāmawui chāmna athumwui kashimānna.
Khangarongawui sāmanna kharingli thanvāmi,
makhayāwui katong moreina.
Hāngkachithei khuikasang mi kharing pongli kazatna,
kha hāngkhamachin makhamayā mina ma̱thuihaowa.
Yangkakharing kathumawui morchaili kakapik lei,
kala khamashāt tui khamatui chi mangkhama̱na.
Kachungkha matui kahai tharan, khalāngla mavātmana,
kha mamatuiphāphā kaje mi thangkhamana.
Khangarongawui male khamathā lupāsāna,
makhayāwui ning aman teomeikhameina.
Khangarongawui morchaina kachungkhali mizai,
kha mangkhama̱na ning khavātwui vang thi.
chili ana wukkakhanang mangarumsangmimana.
Mangkhama̱wui vang khayon ot kasā hi ngareokhanganao kathāna;
kha thangkhamawui achamna theishingkakhui miwui ningyangkhaungna.
Makhayāna khangachee chi awuitungli tāra,
kha khangarongawui ningkachāng chi ungshungmira.
Siphan zingrot kharā eina makhayā chi maleiluithuwa,
kha khangarong mi mangatha̱la leichingra.
Ngachāngmakakā mili kachiho athumwui vanga ahāli kathura drakhāra̱
kala mikli meikhut khangami kathāna.
kha makhayā miwui mirin sha̱ra.
Khangarongawui kachihān ringkaphā eina atanga,
kha makhayā miwui ningkashai arema ngasāra.
Mashun eina kazata miwui vanga
kha makaphā kasāwui vang shimān khavaina.
Khangaronga mi mangacheilakmara,
kha makhayā mina ram chili mapānmara.
Khangarongawui khamorna thangkhamei shoka,
kha masho-khangacheiya miwui male katathaora.
Khangarongawui morchaina khuisangkapai tui thei,
kha makhayāwui khamorliva, mashokhangachei tuimānga.
Makhamashunga khāntam
mangāli ningkakachai otna,
kha khamashunga khāntam awui ringkaphāna.
Lāngkaso zangkahai tharan,
maikashi shoka;
kha malungkhanimali thangkhamei ngasoi.
Mashungrik kahaiwui ningsā khangazipna athumli thānmi,
kha makhangatunwui kha̱khamakhei china athumli sākazama.
Malungkhavat atamli lanwui kānkhanā maleimana;
kha khamashung khangarongna kathiwui eina kanmi.
Shāt makakāwui khangarong china awui apong ngarongngasaka,
kha makhayā ana awui makaphā makhayā eina thi.
Mashungrik kahaiwui khangarong china athumli kanshokmi,
kha mikhanamli athumwui khamathangna tuknarhai.
Makhayaana kathi tharan, awui kachihān shimāna,
kala shitkasang makhalei miwui ningkashai arema sāthuihaowa.
Khangarongali kakhanangwui eina kanshokmi,
kha makhayaana chiwui alungli zangtha̱ya.
Shitkasang makhalei miwui khamor eina awui khongnaili shimān ngasaka,
kha awor eina khangarongali kanshoka.
Khangarongbingna ringkaphā tharan,
keinung chi mathāna;
kala makhayā kashimān tharan khamathān akhon vaowa.
Mashungrik kahaiwui sokhamina keinung khayā kāngasaka,
kha makhayāwui khamor eina kongkhalui samphang ngasaka.
Khongnainaoli makachāpa chi ning makazangna,
kha theishingkakhui mina kasaikha pama.
Chānpao phungkazata thāda kuimareikazata china khangathum tui phongsera,
kha shitsangkapai mi china thumhai.
Chiza̱khame maleiakha mibing konglui;
kha machinkhame makhavāt tharan ning taphuphai.
Makathei miwui vang nganingkhame a china chiwui vang ningkharik phalungra;
kha nganingkhami maningkachānga a chi ning tāphuphai.
Lumashankatha sha̱nao masot samphanga,
kala sākashe mibingna kashāng samphanga.
Lumashankatha mi akhalatta kānkhanā samphanga;
kha sakashe mi akhalatta saza̱khui.
Makhayaa mina kakapika ngalangman pheikhui,
kha khamashung khangaronga khayao mi china makahatlak kaji sāman samphanga.
Khamashung khangarongli nganingtit kaje china ringra,
kha makaphāli kakharoma chi thira.
Ningkhamakhui mi
kha shāt makakā athum awui ningyangkhaungna.
Theishingkhuilu, makaphā mili kashong marāngla mathui ngasakmara,
kha khangaronga athumli kanshokmira.
Kashi-kaphā makatheiya ngalā khamathāva chiya,
hok morsoli sinā unra̱ sangkahai kathāna.
Khangarongawui ningkachāng chi khamathāmāng eina tanga,
makhayāwui ningkashai chi malungkhavāt eina vai.
Thada khame china shāngsanga;
miphalungki kaji makhame a chiya khavāt samphanga.
Pāng katonga mili shāngngasakra,
tara̱ chaikhame a chili chaimira.
Zāt makachishota mili mibingna khonshi,
kha yorkhame chiwuitungli sokhami lei.
Ningsanglak eina kaphā phākazata a china ngahānkhangai phāzata,
kha makaphāli kaphā mi china makaphā samphangpapama.
Khalattawui kashāngli shitkasanga a chi ngahuihaora,
kha khangarongana khamateka thingnā thāda timpamra.
Shimkhurli rotmarāt khangasaka china khamasai samphangra,
kala mangkhama̱ china thangkhamawui rao sāra.
Khangarongawui atheiva mirinwui thingrongna,
kha ain makhangākana manglā khui.
makhayā kala morei kaphungali kayākha mataida khuira?
Hāngkhamachinli leikashe chi aworli leikashina,
kha hāngkhamachinli ningkakachaia chi mangkhama̱na.
Kaphā mina
kha makaphā khangarān mili ana khayon mi.
Mi hi makhayāna masomkāmana,
kha khangarongawui angayung mangatha̱lakmara.
Kaphā preiva̱̱ hiya gaharawui kuihonna,
kha maikashi phungsangkhamiva̱ chiya gaharawui ara̱kui shuikhangasak kathāna.
Khangarongawui kaphaning tāzak hai;
makhayā miwui hāngkachithei mikhanamānga.
Makhayāwui tuina ashee shokkhavai rimpama,
kha mashungrik kahaiwui khamorna mibingli kanshokmi.
Makhayābingli ngakhuntāhaida maleiluimana,
kha khangarongawui shim nganingchingra.
Mi akhali ningkakāwui athishurda sochikata,
kha ningkhamakhui mili yangkharinga.
Khangam-kharei sāreklaga zākhavai makhaleiliva,
ngazanlala khalatta nganingkazā chongmei.
Khangaronga mina awui sha̱keiwui manglāwui vang phaningmi,
kha makhayāwui lukhamashan sāshilaka.
Kachichāwui lui khavā mina makhavāta
kashakazā samphangra,
kha makānkhanāli kharomkazata mi chiya ning makhaleina.
Makhayāwui khamakanga dolan arema sāthuihaowa,
kha khangarongawui angayung nganingshinghai.
Makaphā mi amorchaiwui khayon chili manna,
kha khangaronga china kakhanangwui eina yāmshoka.
Mi akhali awui tuiwui athei china kaphā eina ningyāng ungngasaka,
kala mi akhawui pāng eina kasā ot chi ali latunga.
Mangkhama̱wui otsak khalattawui miktāli mashungrikhai,
kha thangkhama mina hāngkachithei nganākhui.
Mangkhama̱wui malungkhavāt theipailaka,
kha shingā katheia thangkhama mina kazeili matheimimana.
Khamashung tui khamatui ana mashun shākhi mi,
kha makhamashung shākhina kachipat tui matui.
Chānhān makhaungawui tui zeisa̱nao eina kasa̱ thai,
kha thangkhamawui malena khamā raimi.
Mashuntui nganingchinga,
kha kakapika male hunkhawui vangmānga.
Mikhanam hi makaphā khangarānbingwui ningli lei,
kha kaphā khangarān athumwuili khamathān lei.
Khangarongali kalāshāt marāza̱mana,
kha makaphāle kakhanangna pema.
Kakapik hi
kha ningtongda kasābing awui ningyāngkhaungna.
Thangkhamei mina awui awor thumhai,
kha mangkhama̱bingna athumwui mangkhama̱ vaozata.
Khamakhuna miwui pāngna mungra,
chāngsheli tandi ot sāngasakra.
Ningkachot hina mili ngazan ngasaka,
kha khamathā tuina ali mathān ngasaka.
Khangarong mina makaphāwui eina ngareithuihaowa,
kha makhayāwui apongna athumli ma̱zat ngasaka.
Chāngshe mi zākhavai masamphangmara,
kha khamakhuna mina kasaka lan samphangra.
Khangarong shongfali kharing lei,
kha khanguiwui apongna kathili thānvai.
Thangkhama naomayarana
avāva̱wui tamkachithei nganai,
kha mana̱shikazārna hāngkhamachinli manganāsangmana.
Akhamorwui atheiwui eina kaphā mina kaphā shai,
kha mikhanamawui ningkachāng khangashaomāngna.
Khamorli khangarin mina awui mirin phārihai,
morsham makhavai mi chi kashimānli zanga.
Chāngshewui ningna ningchāngphāphai kha khikha masamphangmana;
chitharab khamakhunawui manglāli kachungkha ngarumsangmi.
Khangaronga mina makhamashung otli yangkharinga,
kha makhayā mina khayaklak eina kala maishilak eina otsai.
Khangatara mili awui khangarongna kanmi,
kha makhayāli moreina yui.
Mi akhana shāngreka, kha khikha mangavāmana;
khangatei akhana chāmreka, kha lan kachungkha lei.
Mi akhawui mirin ngatangman awui lanna,
kha kachāma chiya ngatangmi khavai maleimana.
Khangarongawui kahorna mathāna,
kha makhayāwui thaomei sāshimithaora.
Mahengkasangana achei matheila khanganang shoka,
kha hāngkachithei khuikasangbing chi thangkhameina.
Hunkhali samkaphang lan shimān ngalāngra,
kha teomamei kazipkakhui china mataisang mamānra.
Kachihān kaikahaina ning kazā ngasaka,
kha ningkachāng ungkashung chi mirinwui thingrongna.
Tui makhuikasanga chi khalatta kashimān khuirāra;
kha ningkhamili khayākashi mili sāman mira.
Thangkhamawui tamkachithei mirinwui ura̱na,
china kathi khalenwui eina yāmshokshapa.
Kaphā ningna ngahānkhangai samphanga,
kha mashitkasangawui shongfa athumwui kashimāna.
Ots kachiva̱li thangkhamana awor eina sai,
kha mangkhama̱na awui mangkhama̱ hāngchitheizata.
Makaphā pao kaphungana mili khanang ngasaka,
kha ningkatonga paophungmena kharai khuirāmi.
Hāngkachitheili matheikhami chile kachāmkhangai kala maishāt rāshunga,
kha hāngkhamachin khuikasanga chili khayāshi.
Ningkachāng ungkashung hi wuklungli shima;
kha makaphā apongwui eina ngareithuiki kaji mangkhama̱wui vang ningkakachai otna.
Thangkhamei mibingli ngayurkazata a chi thangmei,
kha mangkhama̱bingwui ngasotnao kakhanang samphangra.
Morei kaphungbingli kalākashina shurzata,
kha khangarong mili khamathā ot eina sāman mi.
Kaphā mina naomayarawui ara̱-azāli shimlui haimi,
kha morei kaphungbingwui lan khangarongbingwui vang kaziphai.
Kachāmawui lamshālui heiun unglaka,
kha makhamashung eina khuithui ngakānhaowa.
Lijei makasinga mi chi anaoli yangkakharingna,
kha naoli leikashi china themlāk eina rāka.
Khangaronga mina awui thokhavai kachungkha lei,
kha makhayāwui wuk masaichinga.
Thangmeiva̱na
kha mangkhama̱va̱na khalattawui pāng eina pheitai.
Mashungrik eina kazata china
kha khangui mina awui apongli ningkachaiya.
Mangkhama̱wui chānmatui akhumkorwui lijeina,
kha thangkhamawui morchaina athumli phārimira.
Mukkā makhalei pamli, zātla maleimana;
kha makhavāta theishirai mukkāwui pangshap einana.
Ningkatonga shākhina makapikmana,
kha kakapika shākhina kakapik matuishoka.
Mana̱shikathana aremali thangkhamei phai,
kha thangkhamei miwui vanga awor hi kapaina.
Mangkhama̱ mi khaleipamli mapamalu,
kaja chili awor masamphangmara.
Thangkhama miwui thangkhamei chi awui apong theikhui khavaina,
kha mangkhama̱ miwui maphākakhuina thānngui.
Makhayāli Varena mana̱shi,
kha mashungrik kahaina awui ngahānkhangai samphanga.
Ningna akhalattawui kakhā chi thei,

Makhayāwui shim sāshimānhaora,

kha chiwui akatang chi kathiwui apongna.
Khamana̱ atamlila ningva khananga,
kala khamathānwui akuplam ningkachotna.
Ningkhamakhui mi awui apong athishurda awui atheina pemra,

Ningkashambingna saikora shitsanga,
kha shingā kathei mina kachishong vāra̱khala kaji yanga.
Thangkhama mina ngashara kala makaphāwui eina ngareithuihaowa,
kha mangkhama̱na khangashar horhaida paireka.
Malungvatkazārana mangma̱sak eina sai,
kha kashi kaphā kathei mina ngarina.
Ningkashamana mangkhama̱ phākhui,
kha shingā katheia chili theishingkakhui ngahonmi.
Makaphāna kaphāli khoruma,
makhayāna khangarongawui ngaveili khoruma.
Kachāmali awui khongnai eina tangdala maningchāngmana,
kha kashāngava ngasotnao kachungkha lei.
Khongnainaoli ningkakachaia chi morei kaphungana,
kha kachāmabingli lumashankhame chi ringkaphāna.
Makaphā khangarānbing chi mayonmala?
Kapha khangarānbingna khayākashi kala ningkatong samphanga.
Khanangda ot kasā saikorali tongkazā lei,
kha tuimāngakha vātshona.
Thangkhamawui kuihon aworna,
kha mangkhama̱wui otsak chi mangkhama̱bingwui pāsina.
Mashun shākhina mirin kachungkha huikhui,
kha kakapik khamatui chi yorkazāna.
kala anaongarāna ngayin khavai samphangra.
kathi khalenwui eina yāmshok khavaina.
Awungawui tekhamatei ayaonao kachungkhawuili lei,
kha ayaonao maleila wungnao khikha masāvaimana.
Malung mavātkazāra mi chi theishingkakhui kahakva lei,
kha malungvātkazārana maphākakhuili masot mi.
Chingri kahai ningna phasāli ringngasaka,
kha yuikashina ara̱kui shuingasaka.
Kachāmali kachipata mi china awui Kasā akhavāli zeikakharuina,
kha mili lukhamashan chi ali khayākashina.
Makhayā mili awui makaphāna chithita,
kha khangarong mina awui ningsākhangazipwui mangā eina ngayin khavai samphanga.
Thangkhamei hi theishingkhuikathei miwui ningli lei,
kha hi mangkhama̱bingwui ningli mazangmana.
Khamashung khangarongna yurli mai kāngasaka,

Thangmeilak eina kasā rao china awungawui ngahānkhangai samphanga,

Khanima chānhāna malungkhavāt vān ngasaka,

mibingwui wuklung kayākha mataida leirakhala!

Khamathāna wuklungna ningngai mathai,

Yangkharing ngaroklaga kathao mukkā taithatshaiki kajiwui vanga,
leikashi eina hanthing-hanrā kashai phāmei.
Malung vātkazar mina nganang ngasaka,
kha malung khanimna tuikashokli chingrihai ngasaka.

kha khamashungawui apong shongfa ashatva̱na.
Thangkhama naomayarana avāva̱li mathān ngasaka,
kha mangkhama̱ mina ava̱va̱li ningkachai.
Ning makhalei awui vanga mangkhama̱ otsak hi khamathānna,
kha theishingkakhui mina mashungrik eina zata.
Hāngkachithei mazangakha khangarān nguithuihaowa,
kha tarākha hāngkachithei eina ot ungshunga.
Tāzakta ngahānkakāna mili mathān ngasaka,
kala machuk kazak kahai tui kayākha kaphā otkhala!
Thangkhamei miwui shongfana juikhamei mirinli thānkāmi,
chithāda Kathewui ramwui azingli mavāmara.
Langkaso miwui shim
kha ra̱meiva̱wui thari phārimi.
Makhayāwui kaphaning
katharawui tuina ali ningyāng unga.
Makhamashung eina tongkazā khavaiwui vang khangamar mi chi awui shimkhurli khanang ngasaka,
kha pheizā kazāli ningkakachai mina ringra.
Khangaronga mina khi ngahānkārakaji chukmaja̱ya,
kha makhayāwui khamorli kashi
Makhayāwui eina
kha ana khangarongawui seihā kasā shāmi.
Mikwui kahorna ningli mathān ngasaka,
kala kadhar chānpaona ara̱kui nganaoung ngasaka.
Akachang hāngkachitheili nganākasang mi thangkhameiwui alungli okthuira.
Tamkachitheili makhuikasanga mi chi akhalatta kachipatna,
kha hāngkhamachin khuikasang mi theishingkakhui samphanga.
kala khangahuina khayākakā samphangngasaka.
Ning eina khangaran kasā hi miwuina,
kha male eina ngahānkakā
Mi akhawui apong saikora awui mikyanli tharda thei,
kha
Nawui otsak
chieina nawui khangarān sakāmira.
Ot kachiva̱ kharin leilaga
makhayā chila kakhanang zimiksho chiwui vangna.
Yākhangai hi
ali tandi mamila machihomara kaji theilu.
Khayākashi kala ningkatong eina morei pheomi,
kala
Mi akhawui apongna
awui yangkashe eina tangda ana chingrihai ngasaka.
Makhamashung eina kachungkha samphangki kajiwui vanga mashun eina kateokha khalei phāmei.
Miwui ningna awui apong ngarāna,
kha
Kasatkhami tuitakbing awungawui morchaili lei;
bichar kasāli awui khamorna morei masāmana.
Khamashung khān kala khāndam
khaoli onsang kahai saikora awui otsakna.
Khalāng kasā hi awungabingwui vang ningkakachaina,
kaja wungpamkhong hi khangarong eina sākai.
Khamashung morchai awungawui ningyāngkhaungna,
kala khamashung tui khamatuili ana leishi.
Awungawui malungkhavāt kathiwui paomena,
kala thangkhamana ngachammira.
Awungawui mai kahorli kharing lei,
kala awui ngahānkhangai mayokachāng muiyāna zingrot khuirākhami kathāna.
Sināle thangkhamei samkaphang phāmei,
lupāsāle theishingkakhui kapangkhuitha̱ra.
Khangarongawui apong kashiwui eina ngareithuihaowa;
imawui shongfa khamayon china khalattawui mirin phāriya.
Kashimān marāranglakha langkasona ri,
kala makongluiranglakha khayāning khanganingna ri.
Langkasoali ngasoda ngaponkakhui ngayarki kajiwui vanga,
kachāmali ngasoda ngahuiri kahai ningngai khalei phāmei.
Tamkachitheili nganākasang china reisangra,
kala
Ningwui thangkhamei chili mashun-makhui kathei hoi;
kala chānhan khamathāna ngahānngaimwi ngasaka.
Thangkhamei khaleia a chiwui vanga thangmei chi kharingwui ura̱na,
kha mangkhama̱ otsak hi mangkhama̱bingwui machin khavaina.
Thangkhameiwui ningna mashuntui matui,
morchaili seihā ngarumsanga.
Kashima tui khuira̱ thai,
manglāli shimngasaka kala phasā phāngasaka.
kha chiwui akatang chi kathiwui apongna.
Kathaia mina zākhavai ot sai,
akhamorna ali ot sāngasaka.
Makānkhanā mina kashi
kala awui chānhan mei kachui thai.
Ning khamakhui mina khanganang ngayao ngasaka,
kala kasupkazat mina ngasotnao kachachang kaingasaka.
Ngashaokazar mina khongnainaoli suikhui
kala ali makaphā shongfali thānvai.
Mik kakashi mina makhamashung otsak ngarāna,
morchai kakatim mina makaphā shokngasaka.
Kuingapoktham kahai hi khayākakāwui kuihonna;
hi khangarongawui mirinli samkaphangna.
Malung mathuikazar mi china pangshap khaleiali phāmei,
khalatta ngarinkashapa china keinung khuikashapali kachangmei.
Mikumona kalā yanga,
kha
Shim pemting eina khanganang zātkhānliva
katheng eina chingri phākazāna phāmei.
Thangmeilak eina kasā raonao china makhangatun naomayarawuitungli mungra,
kala chinaongarā akha thāda shimlui samphangra.
Khāng lupāsāwui vāngna, sharkha̱ sināwui vāngna,
kala
Makaphā kasā mina makhayā morchaiwui tui khui;
kala kakapika mina sākashewui maleli shitsanga.
Kachāmali mana̱kashe mi chi awui Kasā Akhavāli zeikakharuina,
miwui kalākashili ringkaphā mi chili kashong malāngla mathāhaimara.
Ara̱ ngarāna awova̱wui kuihonna,
kala anao ngarāwui khayā avāva̱ ngarāna.
Chānhan khamathā mangkhama̱awui vanga makhangayi tuina,
khangui tuimatui wungnaowui vang mangayimeikharmana.
Pheizā kasā hi khamewui mikyanle lunghaila kathāna;
ana ngareikhavāvāli reikasang samphanga.
Khayon pheokhamena leikashi phai,
kha otsak akha chi latlui latluida kasā tharān ngasotnao pākngasaka.
Mangkhama̱a akhali shākha shida kashirle,
theishingkakhui mi akhali hāngmachinkha kashina thukmeida theikhui.
Makaphā mina khangashaomāng phai,
kala awuitungli sākashi paome akha chihovāra.
Mangkhama̱a akhali awui mangma̱sakwui alungli samphangki kajile,
anao tukthui kahaiya singom ava̱li samphangtha̱ranu.
Kaphā sākhamiwui vang makaphā hanmiakha,
makaphā chi awui shimkhurwui eina mathuimara.
Khanganang haokaphok hi tara̱ longshok khangasak kathāna,
chieina makhararphokranglakha thāhaolu.
Makhayaali mashun khami, khamashungli yonkhangasaka chi
Ning makhalei mangkhama̱ana thangkhamei lokhavai awui pāngli pheisā leida khi sāvaira?
Ngasotnaona atam kachida leishi ngaroka,
kala achinā hi kalāshāt atamwui vang kapharāna.
Ning makhalei mina khangashit sai,
kala awui khongnainaowui mangāli shākhi nganingmi.
Khayon-khamāng ningkachāng mina nganangngailaka,
khāmong kajui sakakāna kashimān phākazatna.
Zakkashi ning kaphaning mina mareisangngayaomana,
kala matuiphāphā kaji malena kalākashili tāzanga.
Mangkhama̱ nao avāva̱wui vang wukhanang khavaina,
kala mangkhama̱awui avāva̱na khamathān masamphangmana.
Mareojao kahai hiya kaphā arina,
kha shipur kahai ningngaina ara̱kui thengngasaka.
Mashunli masho ngachei ngasak khavai makhayaana ngathumda pheizā zai.
Theishingkakhuia mina thangkhameili yanga,
kha mangkhama̱awui mikna okathui vākatangshong lei.
Mangkhama̱a naomayara chi avāva̱wui vang wukhanang khavaina kala ali pharākakhuiva̱ ning chotkhavaina.
Khamashung mili kashong khalāng maphāmana;
khayākakā mili kashao mamashungmana.
Tui kathuma chi theithangkhamei lei,
malungkhanima chi theishingkakhui mina.
Mangkhama̱ana kasaikha pamkahai tharan thangkhameina da khui;
amorchai katim kahai tharan,
a thangmeiyada shānkhui.
Ngakhei kahai mina khamashunglila nguikhavai
phayatshang phayattai.
Mangkhama̱ana theishingkakhuili khamathān maleimana;
kha awui kaphaning kahāng chimāngli ringphai.
Makaphā makhayā kharā tharan, khayā makashila rai,
maikashiwui eina khayāmakakā rai.
Mi khamorwui tui hiya kathuka tara̱na,
thangkhamawui ura̱ chi longkazata kongna.
Makhayā miwui mijang kazang kala,
khangarongawui mashun shimān khangasak makaphāna.
Mangkhama̱wui morchaina nganang ngasaka,
kala akhamorna kashao reokhuiya.
Mangkhama̱wui khamor awui shimān khavaina,
kala amorchaina khalattawui khalen kasangna.
Kasupkazata miwui tui han shaikaphā thai,
phasāli vāshunga.
