Khalattawui ot kasāli ngachāngkachata mi chi sākashimān miwui achināna.
khangarong mina chili yāmzangda chingri kahai samphanga.
Kashānga miwui lan chiya awui khamakanga keinungna,
kala kajuiya pan thāda ali ngākmi.
Kashimān marāranglakha miwui ning ngamreka,
kha ngahuiri kahaina maikhayā mangāli zata.
Mi akhana manganākhuiranglakha ngahankaakha,
chi awui mangkhama̱ otsak kala khayā khamalāna.
Miwui manglāna kakazā khāngshapa;
kha manglā yurkahai chi khipāna phungrarrakhala?
Ning kazanga china theithangkhamei samphanga,
kala thangkhamawui khanāna theithang khamei phāya.
Lemmet khamina miwui apong sāmida khangamkharei miwui ngalemli zangpai.
Khangatei akhapana rāda mamanāranglakha hangkharepā chiwui tui khamashung thai.
Lungsanlāk eina ngapai khangarok chili,
kalā khayangna tui kupngasaka.
Achināli khangachon hi khangazipa keinung thai,
kha kharar khangarok hiya shimreiwui ngaveithing thai.
Akhamorwui atheina katho samphanga,
amorchaiwui eina khamathei china katho samphanga.
Kathi kala kharingla malewui pangshapli lei,
chili leikashibingna chiwui athei kashai samphangra.
Preiva̱ samkaphanga chi kaphā ot samphanga,
kala
Kachāma mina khamayo seihā tui shichina,
kha kashāngana hāngngeingeihai.
Ngasotnao sārek kaji ngasotnao lei,
kha chinaongarāli nganaimeida khangavapa ngasotnaola lei.
Tui masho ngacheida khamatuia mangkhama̱a chile,
ningsā ngazipta kazata kachāmana phāmei.
Theikakhui makhalei hi miwui vang maphāmana,
kala aphei thakkhanāla awui apong shimāna.
Mi akhawui mangkhama̱ otsakna awui apong kashimān khuikharā tharan,
Lanna ngasotnao kadhar kachungkha hokhui,
kha kachāmale ngasotnaona nothāhaowa.
Minama shākhi kasā mili kashong marāngla machihomara,
kala kakapik tui khamatui mi chi mayāmshokmara.
Pāngkatong miwui ngahānkhangai kachungkhana phai,
kala mi kachiva̱ lemmet khamewui ngasotnaosera.
Kachāmali chinao ngarāna yangkharingsera;
ngasotnaobingna kayākha mataimeirakhala?
Ana athumli tui eina suiya,
kha chinala kānkhanā maleimana.
Thangkhamei mina khalatta leishi,
theishingkakhui khaleina reisangra.
Minama shākhi kasā mili kashong malāngla machihomara,
kala kakapik tui khamatui mi shimānra.
Mangkhama̱ mina ngatorngakoklak eina okathui mangayimana,
raona wungnaowuitungli khamung mangayimeimana.
Ning khamathāna mina malung mavātzarmana,
kala miwui sākhangui yangkhumkhami chi awui khayākakāna.
Awungawui malung kathui kazingkha̱ kakhangang thai,
kha awui ngahānkhangai thingnā-ra̱hātungli ikra̱ katā thai.
Mangkhama̱ naomayara avāva̱wui shimān khavaina,
kala preiva̱wui kakharar zingrotra̱ ngayishon kaji thai.
Shimlui kala lan avāva̱ ngarāwui eina samphanga,
kha thangkhamei preiva̱̱
Ngachāng makakāna piphuphai ngasaka,
kala chāngshena kathai samphangra.
Ningkhami khamayon mina kharing samphanga;
tuili ningkakachaia chi thira.
Kachāmali lumashankhami chi
kala awui kaphā sākahai chiwui sāman
Kachihān leilakha nanaomayarali rāklu;
awui shimān khavai maphaningalu.
Malung thuikazara mina chiwui kashong runra;
nana ali kanshokmiakha nana sāluipapamra.
Hāngkachithei khuisanglu kala tamkachithei nganākhuilu,
naodawui vang thangmeimei khavaina.
Miwui ningli khangarān kachungkha lei,
kha sākashok chi
Mi akhawui eina ningkachāng chi khangavapna,
kala kakapikale kachāma phamei.
chi khalei mina ningyāng ungda chingrihai;
ali kalākashi marāmara.
Chāngshena khongpheili zangparlala khamorli makāshungmara.
Mashātkazarali shaolu,
ningkapaina thangkhamei tamkhuira;
theishingkhui kathei mili hāngmachinlu,
chieina ana theikakhui mataisangra.
Avāva̱li khangashaowa, ava̱va̱li kakashama naomayara china mai shingasaka kala tui kapo shokngasaka.
Inaomayara nana tamkakhui ngasāmhaiakha,
tamkhui kahai saikora yanglāhaora.
Makānkhana shākhi kasā mina mashunli mana̱shi,
kala makhayāwui khamorna khangui khalāng shaisanga.
Mashātkazar mili shongrān tāra,
kala mangkhama̱bingwui khumkhorli lijei parra.
Zam hi mana̱kashena, zamshei hi khonkazār khangashaona,
kala china thānthui kahai mi mathangmeimana.
Awungawui meichot malungkhavāt chiya kazingkha̱ kakhangang kathāna;
ali malungvātkhangasaka chi manglā shimāna.
Khanganangwui eina tākathuia mi chi khayākakāna;
kha mangkhama̱ kachiva̱na kaharpamra.
Chāngshena luisao atamli masaosangmana,
ana māhātli phāda khikha masamphangmara.
Miwui ningli kharin hi kathuka tara̱ kathāna,
kha theithangkhama mina chi khuishokshapa.
Mi kachungkhana khalattawui khamatha vaozata;
kha ningkatonga mi khipāna samphangshapra!
Khangarong mina ningsāngazipta zatakha—
naoda naongarā mahai!
Bichar wungpamkhongli kapama awungana awui mik eina zakkashi
“Ining tharngasakhaira; I moreiwui eina tharzāhaira”
da khipāna hāngshapra?
Makhamashung khāntam, makhamashung napon,
khanini ngaraichada
Naoshinao akha eina tangda akhalattawui otsak eina chithei,
ana sāda khalei chi khamashungna katharna kajila.
Shākhavai khanā, theikhavai
mik khanini
Kapili malungmachāngalu, chām rāpaishina;
namik raklu, chieina na kashakazā kachungkha samphangra.
Khaloapana, “Hi maphāmana, hi maphāmana” da hānga,
kha ana thuikahai tharan, ana lāngsoi.
Sinā kala makhavāta aman kasaka ngalungla lei;
kha theithangkhameiwui morchai aman kasaka chāra̱-chāsānna.
Makatheiawui vang nganingkhami tharan awui kachon akha khuilu,
kala lamkatā miwui vang nganingkhami tharan awui eina khangashit khuihailu.
Kapikkazā kashakazā shimlāka,
kha naoda akhamor lunghaila pemra.
Ngarān kahai chi ngasan khangarok eina sakai;
thangkhamei thānkhami eina rai vai.
Misui sākazat mina khangathum phongshoka,
chiwui vang mangma̱lak eina kahāngbingli mangayuralu.
Avāli nilala, ava̱li nilala khonshiakha,
awui thaomei shimitmihaida tangmangtinghai ngasakra.
Haokaphokli thāklāk eina mathuikakhui lan mazāpong ngayaomana.
“Ina kashi
Makhamashung khāntam
mangāli ningkakachaina,
makhamashung sheron maphāmana.
Miwui pheikār
chithākha mina awui apong kathāda theira?
“Hi katharna” da hāngphāphā kaji,
kala tuingashit khuikahaiwui thili chukmajanao kaji hi awui vang khalenna.
Thangkhamei awungana makaphābingli hamshoka,
kala akāng athumwuitungli taka.
Miwui manglā
awui thukmeikap kaja alung saikora phai.
Khangavap kala ningkatongna awungali phārimiya,
kala khamashung khangarongna awui wungpamkhong lungkhangasakna.
Yaronnaobingwui tekhamatei hi athumwui yāngna,
kha kasarsam hi khararnaowui khamathāna.
Khamā za̱da shirkhamina kashi thuingasaka,
kashaona kathuka alung tharngasaka.
awui vāngasak khangangaili ana ngareivā ngasaka.
Mina awui kasāsā chi awui miktāli mashunga da phaninga,
kha
Pha̱kaphayāle khamashung khangarong eina mashun kasā
Khanganing mikyan eina lāngkaso ning,
makhayāwui thaomei moreina.
Ningkazanawui khangarāna makahatlākla makhavātli thānvai,
kha teikakatā kachiva̱na chām samphanga.
Kakapika male eina kazipkasang lan phankazata akahur kala kathiwui khalen kathāna.
Makhayāwui khangashaona athumli khuithuihaora,
khikhalajila athumna kaphā ot masāngaimana.
Khayonawui apong makhuikazama,
kha katharawui acham khamashungana.
Khamarāk sha̱naoli pamrumki kajiwui vanga,
shimtung achithek akhali ngateikapam phāmei.
Makhayāwui manglāna kashi
awui khongnaina awui mikyanli lukhamashan masamphangmana.
Mashātkazarali kashong khalāng tharan
ningkapaina thangmeihaowa;
thangkhamali tamkachithei tharan,
ana theithangkhamei ngarumsanga.
Khangarongana makhayāwui shimpānrin ngashānpama,
makhayā chili shimān ngasaka.
Kachāmabingwui ringkhangāli manganākasang mi chile ana ringkhangā tharan alila mashāmimara.
Ngathumda ngachonkhamina malungkhavāt suitā ngasaka,
kala maingātta khami pheisāna malung thuingasaka.
Mashun bicharli khangarong mina mathāna,
kha makaphā kasābingwui vanga ningchota.
Theishingkakhui apongwui eina thuikahai mina kathewui kazip khavai lungli ngasāmra.
Ringkaphā lumlao ningkachānga chi kachāma mi ngasāra;
zamkhor kala thao ningkachāng mi mashāng ngayaomana.
Makhayā hi khangarongawui kala mashitkasang hi khamashungawui ngatang khavaina.
Khamarāk kala khonkazāra sha̱naoli ngasokapamle siwukli okkathuina phāmei.
Kasaka lan thangkhamawui shimli lei,
kha mangkhama̱ mina sāshimana.
Khamashung khangarong eina lukhamashan kaphā mina khayākakā kala kharing samphangra.
Kapingana khikha mathamara da kachihan keinung chi thangkhama tamkazaklaga sākhai.
Maleli kala akhamorli khāmshapa china khalatta kakhanang masamphangmara.
“Mashātkazar” kaho hi langkasobing,
khayāning khanganing, kachorkashi ot kasā miwui amingna.
Ot kasāli pāngmareng masāza̱ngaithuda ngachāng makakāle awui ningkachāng china sāthata.
Langpongda makhayaana ngamarpama,
kha khangarong mina khamila mi kashivāmla maleimana.
Makhayaawui pha̱kaphayā ningkakachai otna,
kashi ningngai eina khuikharā tharan kayākha marmeirakhala!
Minama shākhi shimānra,
kha mi akhana shākahuia tui chiya mashimānmara.
Makhayā mi mai shālaka,
kha khamashung mina awui otsak chukmaja̱kazaka.
Thangkhamei, theishingkakhui, hāngkachithei,
Raikasā zimikshowui vang siguili shaksāmi,
kha khayui chi
Kashāng-khareile kaphā aming kapangkhuitha̱ra,
kala sinā lupāle mina ngahānkhangai phāmei.
Kashānga eina kachāma samphanga;
Thangkhama mina kalākashi theida akhalatta yāmngathuma,
kha ningkapaibingna vāmamānda chiwui kakhanang samphanga.
khayākakā kala kharingna.
Ningkhamakhuibingwui apongli ka̱shāt khalen pemtinghai;
khalatta khangarin china chiwui eina katāva̱li lei.
Naona zatvārān apong chi tamchitheilu,
ana kharar tharan chiwui eina mapākthuimara.
Kachāmali kashāngana munga,
kala kashuka chi kachishutawui raona.
kala awui lungthot lijei khikha masāvaimara.
Mili yangmikathale somira,
kaja kachāmali awui kashakazā ngayarzai.
Mashātkatha̱li kashamhaolu, khanganangla yāmhaora;
kala nganang khangazai vānhaora.
Ningkatharli leikashe,
kala tuimatui leishiri kahaia,
awungana awui ngasotnao sāra.
kha shitkasang makhaleiawui tui ana horhaowa.
Chāngshena “Ayarli kazingkha̱ lei!
Ili chanreilli sāthathaora” da hānga.
Morkasāp sha̱naowui khamor kathuka chomna;
Mangkhama̱ hi naoshinaowui ningli lei;
kha kharākwui lijei china katāva̱li kashamvāhaora.
Khalattawui lan chungsang khavai kachāmali rekakhareka,
lah kashānga mili khame chi khavāt leichingra.
Nakhanā nāshunglu, kala thangkhameiwui tui nganākhuilu;
kala nawui ningli iwui theithangkhamei sha̱khuilu;
kaja nawui ningli chi thumhaiakha china nali ringphā ngasakra,
saikora hi nakhamorli ngarānhaiakha.
Nawui ningkatong chi
ina aja hāngkachitheina, nalina.
Hāngkhamachin eina theithangkhameiwui pongli chānsam thumra ina nawui vang makapimimala,
khamashung khangarong chi nali chitheikhavai,
rākhangahānbingli mashun tui nana ngahānkāshap khavai maningmala?
Kachāmali a chāmhaowada matakzaalu;
lah kakhananga mili ngaveili marekharekalu;
kaja
Malung thuikazarali ngasotnao masaalu,
thurkazar mili mangayuralu,
nala awui sha̱khuida nakhalatta khalenli manpaishina.
Kashukawui vang nganingmida leimanwui vang hamkahaia mi mangasaalu.
Nana khikha runkā khavai maleiakha khisāda nawui pet khuithuirakhala?
Achālakha navā ngarāna shunkahai thari maphuralu.
Them kathemawui ot kasa makatheihaira?
ana awungawui mangāli nganingra,
ana matheithangkhameia mibingwui ngalemli manganingmara.
Khamunga akhali phazā ngarum khavai pamkazang tharan,
namangāli khi leikhala da yangkazaklu;
na morkahāka mina jiakha nakharokli khainao tosanghailu.
Awui shaikaphā zākaphā chi maningchāngalu,
kaja chibing chiya phākakhaning kashakazāmānga.
Lan chungda samphang khavai ngalang mazarlu,
aya tungda sālu.
Namikna chi theikhaleoda chi thuihaora;
kashuirak angachāng kālaga khalāngwui thāda kazingram yongkāhaora.
Urkashe miwui zāt mazaalu;
awui zākaphā makahaoalu;
kaja ava ningli aman shānkapama kathāna.
“Zālu, manglu” da ana hānga,
kha awui ningva nawuili maleimana.
Nana zāsang kahaibing chi maloshokra,
kala nawui ningkashi tui arema sāra.
Mangkhama̱ana kashāpamli mamatuialu,
kaja nawui thangkhamei tui chili ana ningkachaira.
Achālakhawui thari maphuralu,
lah avāva̱ makhaleiawui luili mazangalu,
kaja athumwui Ngatangkhame panglaka;
ana athumwui vang nganingmira.
Tamkachitheili ningsanglu,
theithangkhamei tui nganākhuilu.
Naoshinaoli kharāk machihohaialu,
nana ali lijei eina kashao eina a mathimara.
Nana ali lijei eina shaoakha,
nana awui mirin Kathewui ramwui eina huikhuira.
Inaomayara, naning thangmeiakha,
iwui ningla mathānlakra.
Nakhamorna mashuntui khamatui tharan imanglā ringphāra.
Naning morei kaphungbingli mayuishiaranu,
kha thangkachida
Shingā leichaowa kala nawui kachihān makaimara.
Inaomayara, nganālu, kala thangmeilu,
kala nawui ning khamashung apongvāk zatngasaklu.
Zamkhor khamaripbingwui alungli mazangalu,
sā morhāklāk eina kashaibinglila mashuralu;
kaja khamaripa kala morkahākbing chāmphalungra,
pikhangaina mili karopkui thāda ngavaimira.
Nali pharākakhuia navāwui tui nganālu, kala
sārkahai tharan nava̱li maningkachaialu.
Khamashung lokhuilu, kala chi mayorhaialu;
thangkhamei, tamkachithei, kala
theishingkakhui lokhuilu.
Khangarongawui avāva̱ mathānkhailakra,
thangkhamei naomayara pharākakhui a chi ringphāshunra.
Nava̱ eina navāli ringpha ngasaklu,
nali vaikakhuiva̱li mathān ngasaklu.
Inaomayara, nawui ning ili milu,
kala iwui apong namikna yangkhuiranu.
Kaja khayorva̱̱ chi kathuka chomna,
makhangatunva̱ khamashā ra̱khongna.
Pha̱ma̱ kashao thāda ana shongrimda mashitkasang mi mataisang ngasaka.
Khipā ningchot? Khipā wukkhanang?
Khipāna nganang? Khipāna phen?
Angalang maleila khipāna khamā za̱li?
Khipāwui mik hungda lei?
Zamli honkapambing,
khamanata zamkhor khamangbingna.
Zamna hungda leilakha, khoramlungli khamalao tharan,
kala nganaipat eina mangkasang chili mayangalu.
Naolak eina phara̱ thāda makeira,
chaoshai thāda mara̱ya.
Namikna makhanining theira,
naningna masho ngacheida tui matuira.
Nala shamadrulungli kape mi thāhaora,
jahas kachon chiphan khavailungli kapi akha thāda.
“Athumna ili shaowa, khamāva maza̱mana,
ili shaowa, kha I kachot matheimana.
Ina katharan ngakarthuira?
I mangkhavai phaluishitra.”
da nana hāngra.
Makaphā mili mayuishialu,
athumli ngayurga dala malungmachāngalu;
kaja athumwui ningna khangashao ngarāna,
kala athumwui morchaina zakkashimāng matui.
Thangkhamei eina shim sākai,
theishingkakhui eina shim pāna;
awor kathem eina kābing aman kasaka kala khamathā lan eina chipema.
Kapinga miliva thangkhamei mina pangmei,
yāng khaleia mili theithangkhameina pangmei;
kaja thangkhameiwui thānkhami eina nana rai sāshapa,
kala hāngkachithei makhavātwui mangā eina rai yui.
Mangkhama̱wui vang thangkhamei juilaka;
ngaveili ana akhamor mamakāmana.
Kashi
Mangkhama̱wui khangarān hi moreina,
kala mashātkathei hi mina ningkachai khavaina.
Kasak kharā tharan, na vānhaiakha,
nawui yāng ngazanlaka.
Thikhavai thanvāhaoki kajebingli ngatangkhuilu;
shaothat khavaipam khangaphokbingli ngakhunkhuilu.
Nathumna “Yanglu, ithum hi matheisamana”
da hāngakha,
ningla theiser kaje china matheimarala?
Namanglā mayonkhame china matheimarala?
Kala ana kachichāwui kasā athishurda athut makhuimimarala?
Inaomayara, khuira̱ manglu, hi phālaka;
khuihāngwui eina ngaya̱kata chi nakhamorli shimlaka.
Theilu thangkhamei kaho hi manglāli chikathāna;
nana chi samphangakha, naoda phākhavai lei,
kala nawui kachihān makaimara.
Khangarongawui pamkhavaili makhayā mina kasā thāda marimzatalu,
ashi shimkhurli sāshida masaalu;
kaja khangarong mina shini shida kongluiya,
kala ngakarthuiluishita;
kha makhayābingli unshimuina yuihaora.
Nawui yangkashe kongkhalui tharan mamathānalu,
kala aphei khangaphok tharan naningli mamathānalu;
kala awui malungkhavāt awui eina ngareithuipaishina.
Kashi
kala makhayāli mayuishialu,
kaja makaphā miwui vang naoda chihān khavai maleimana,
makhayāwui thaomei shimitmihaora.
Inaomayara,
khaninili kahāng makhanganā masaalu;
kaja aniwui eina kashuirak kalāshāt rāpaishina,
kala shimān khangasak aniwui eina rāra kaji khipāna theira?
Hila thangkhamabingwui chānsamna.
Bichar kasāli mijang kasā maphāmana.
Makhayāli “Nawui khalāng maleimana” jiakha,
mina khonshira, yurna yangkharingra;
kha makhayā mili hāngkhamachin mi chi ningyāngkhaung samphangra,
kala athumwuitungli kaphā sokhami tārorra.
Khamashung tui ngahānkakā mina morchaili khamaya̱ samphanga.
Ayārli nawui ot ngaranfalu,
luili nawui ot kachiva̱ khangarān sahaifalu;
kala chiwui thili nawui shim sānaolu.
Angalang maleila nakhongnaiwuitungli shākhi masāphāphaalu,
kala na morchai eina maminamalu.
“Ana ili kasā thāda inala ali sāmira;
ana sākahai chiwui vang ina ali hanmira” da mahāngalu.
Chāngshewui lui, ning makhaleiwui drakhā yāmgui ina kanvai;
kala yanglu, saikora chi ka̱shatna pukrorserhairasai;
ngaleila kuivāna pemhairasai,
kala chiwui lungkhomla kaitaserhairasai.
Chi theilaga ina machuka;
ina yanga kala tamkakhui samphanga.
Kasha̱kha pikakhui, hunnakha ngasāmkakhui,
kasha̱kha pāngmasa̱da khangasām eina,
chām kaho chi nali phama̱ kashao thāda,
kala khavāt kaho chi zeighai kasing mi thāda rāra.
Hibing hila Judahwui awunga Hezekiahwui mibingna namkakhuia Solomonwui chānsambingna.
Khangathum hi Varewui tekhamateina,
kha awungabingwui tekhamateiva chi phāshok khavaina.
Kazingramwui kajuiyākha, kala okathuiwui kathukrankha thāda awungabingwui ning maphākhuirarmana
Lupāsāwui eina maripai khuishokhaiakha,
mari kasaana ham sākhavai asa samphanga;
makhayā chi awunga khalei chiwui eina khuithuihaolu,
chieina awui wungpamkhong khamashung khangarong eina sākāra.
khangamawui ngalemlila manganinglu;
kaja wungnaowui mangāli maishiki kajiwui vanga,
“Hili rālu,” da hokakhuina phāmei.
Namikna theikahai chi,
bichar shimli totot eina makhuirālu,
kaja nawui khongnaina nali maishi khangasak tharan na naoda khi sārakhala?
Nawui tuingaphun nakhongnaili na khalatta ngayātkhuilu,
kala mi kateiwui khangathum tui maphongmiphāphālu;
maningakha kashā mina nawuitungli kakhayak khuirāpaishina,
kala nawui aming zakkashi katang mavaimara.
Tuiyar chālak eina khamatui,
lupāsāli sināwui theithukthei yeksang kahai kathāna.
Nganākasangali thangkhamei tui hāngkachithei,
sināwui khutop lah sināwui ngachān sāri kathāna.
Ningtongda shitsangkapai paome hiya kachihopa chiwui vang,
mahā kachāngwui khamakui horam kathāna,
akhavāwui manglā ringphā ngasaka.
Khikha mamilaga lemmet khami tākam eina langkaso mi chi zingrot makazang muiyā eina masi kathāna.
Ningzinghāringda khamungalila suikhuipai,
kala kashima malena ara̱ sātekra.
Nana khuira̱ samphangakha,
nawui kashap chimāng manglu,
sānhaida malopaishina.
Nawui khongnaiwui shimli naphei
mavākārsangchingalu,
ana nali sānhaida yangkharingpaishina.
Khongnaiwuitungli makhamashung shākhi kasā mi chi raizaithing lah,
raighai lah kazana malāthing kathāna.
Rotkhamarāt atamli shitkasang makhalei mili kachihān,
ahā kashui lah phei nganaikathui kathāna.
Wukkakhanangali laa sākasanga mi chi,
sikachāng kachon raimi kahai kathāna,
khamāli drakhāra̱ kathur kasang kathāna.
ali zāt mizālu;
kala ana ra̱changakha,
ali mangkhavai tara̱ milu;
kaja athumwui kuitungli nana meithā parkahaina,
kala
Atungshongwui masina zingrot khuirai;
kala mashātkathei malena thurshi eina yanga.
Tui shokkazar sha̱naoli ngasokapamle,
shimtung chithek akhali ngateikapam phāmei.
Ngalei katāva̱wui eina khamathā pao samkaphang hi,
ra̱kachanga mina khamakui tara̱ khamang kathāna.
Khangarong mina makhayāli mayākhami hiya,
makhuipit kahai ura̱ maningkha sāmakhao kahai tara̱ kathāna.
Khuira̱ tarākha kazā maphāmana,
chieina sotkhamasao tui machungnālu.
khalatta mangarinkathei mi hiya,
keinungli sākhaizanglaga phākho maleila haikahai kathāna.
Lumkachāng horam kathak lah māhāli kazingkharo thāda,
khayākakā hi mangkhama̱wui vang matik machāmana.
Konghi ngashingkazat thāda,
yāngyao yongkazat thāda,
kashong maleila khonkashi matāmana.
Sajei siguiwui vang, nārenra̱ gadhāwui vang,
kala lijei mangkhama̱ khumkhorwui vāngna.
Mangkhama̱li awui mangkhama̱ thāda mangahānkālu,
na khalattala a thāhaipaishina.
Mangkhama̱ali awui mangkhama̱ thāda ngahānkaakha,
a khalatta thangmeiya da phaningra.
Mangkhama̱a akhali pao kachiphun khalatta phei katathaida khangashao samphang khavaina.
Mangkhama̱ miwui chānsam tui phei katekawui phei kānkhanā maleila hokkathāng kathāna.
Mangkhama̱ mili khayākashi khami hiya kachākli thailungthei khalapshān kahai kathāna.
Mangkhama̱bingwui khamor chānsamva khamarip miwui pāngli ka̱shāt kazang kathāna.
Mangkhama̱a kala maripkazāra mili ngalang phākasang hiya,
malā kakāpana mi kachiva̱li kapphāphā kaji kathāna.
mangkhama̱a china mangkhama̱ otsak latlui latluida sai.
khalattawui thangkhama mina da kaphaning mi nana katheila?
Chikathā miwui vanga mangkhama̱awui kachihān kachangmei.
Chāngshena, “Shongfali kazingkha̱ lei,
chānreili kazingkha̱ lei” da hānga.
Khāmongna chiwui kābijā eina khanganing thāda,
chāngshela awui pettungli chithāda nganinga.
Chāngshena khongpheili zangpara;
khamorli kāsang khavai chāngnāya.
Horzakta ngahānkākathei mi shinili,
chāngshena a khalattawui ningli a thangmeimeiya da phaninga.
Miwui kakhararli awui thāda zangphāphā kaje mi chiya,
shongfali zatkasā fa khanāli yonkakhui kathāna.
Kapā mina meira̱hun, malā kala thikapai ot eina
herkhanganao kathā,
mi chi awui khongnaili kapiklaga,
“Ina ngashānkasāna”
da kahāng chikathāna.
Thing yumhaiakha mei mitkahai thāda,
kasupta khamatui mi makhalei chile kahar khangarok vānhaowa.
Meithāna mahaili, meiwonna thingli kachui thāda,
khararkazara mina chithāda nganang khavai thotsanga.
Kasupta khamatui tuihan zākapha zāt thai,
chibing chi phasā alung zangshunga.
Makaphā ningwui tāngpat kahai morchai ngaleiham ashamli ari neokahai thai.
Mili yangkakharingna amorchaili hāngphaneplaga awui ningli kakapik phaningzata.
Ana leishilak eina kahāng tharan ali mashitsangalu,
kaja awui ningli ningkakachai shini lei;
phākhaningda yangkakharing thumhailala,
awui makhayā otsak yarui mangāli phongshokra.
Chom kachuiana chili tāzangra,
ngalung kashireoawui khumkhorli lungguina ungshireororra.
Kakapika malena awui shaili yangkharinga,
kala sotmasaokathei khamorna shimānkhavai sai.
kaja zimiksho china khi khuirārakhala da na matheimana.
Kateina nali soranu, nakhalattawui khamor eina mahāngalu;
makathei mina hāngranu, namorchai eina mahāngalu.
Ngalung ritlaka, situi khāngla makāmana;
kha mangkhama̱ana khareo khanini hili ritmei.
Malungkathui sāshilaka, malungkhavāt hakmahālaka;
kha yuikashili khipāna nganingshaprakhala?
Ngathumda leikashilia phongda khamachin phāmei.
Ngasotnaowui eina khamā za̱lala leikashina;
yangkashewui maya̱kakhui mithitkha̱na.
Sānkahai mina khuira̱ ningkachai,
kha thaida khalei mile kakhā ot saikora shimserhaowa.
Shimwui eina thuikahai mi che,
athipwui eina māngthui kahai vānao kathāna.
Thao eina nganamkaphā otna ning mathān ngasaka,
kha rotkhamarātna manglā sākhai.
Nawui ngasota, kala navāwui ngasotali mahorhailakalu;
kala nawui kalāshāt atamli nachināwui shimli mazangalu.
Tāda khalei achināli nganaida khalei khongnai phāmei.
Inaomayara, thangmeimeilu, kala ining mathān ngasaklu,
ili kakharar mili ina ngahānkāpai khavai.
Thangkhama mina kalākashi theida akhalatta yāmngathuma;
kha ningkapaina ningpai eina chota.
Kha̱miwui vang nganingkhami
tharan awui kachon akha khuilu,
kala makatheia miwui vang nganingkhami tharan awui eina khangashit khuihailu.
Ngathorthakva ngakarthuida khongnainaoli panglāk eina vaoda sokhami chi khonkashina da shānkhuira.
Kazing rothang tara̱ ngayishon kaje eina nganangshon kaje sha̱nao ngaraichai,
sha̱nao chili kakhām chi masili kakhāmna,
lah awui yapāng eina thao yonkakhui kathana.
Marili marina zanngasaka,
kala mi akhali khangatei mi akhana zanngasaka.
Khaorārong khamayon china chiwui athei kashai samphanga,
akhavāli mayonkapama china maikhayā samphanga.
Tara̱lungli khalatta mai kathei thāda,
mi chiwui ningna mi chi theikhuipai.
Kathewui ram eina Abaddonna ningyāng khaung masamphanglakmana,
kala miwui mikna ningyāngkhaung mavailakmana.
Khāng lupāsāwui vāngna, sharkha̱ sināwui vāngna,
mili awui kaso eina theikhui.
Mangkhama̱ali mā kharung thāda runglala awui mangkhama̱ otsak awui eina mathuilakmara.
Nawui seihom theikazazakta nawui yao ashangva̱li yangpamlu;
kaja kashāng chi chithāching majimana;
kala kuihon thot saikorali rungchingla?
Khawo thihaida kadhar kashon tharan,
kala phungrei thingnā timfa kahai tharan,
yaonaobingna nawui ngavai khavai kashankachon mira,
mewui eina luiman samphangra;
zāshap mewui ana̱ eina samphangra,
nashi shimkhur zākhavai,
kala napreiva̱ ngarāli uikhavai.
Khipānakha makharomlala makhayā mina yāmzata,
kha khangarongbingva kazingkha̱ thāda malung pinga.
Ngalei akha rotmarāt kahai tharan khamunga kachungkha shoka;
kha theishingkakhui eina theithangkhamei miva chingri eina okthuivāshumra.
Kachāmana kachāmali rekakharek hi kazingna theishirai tāktāmiser kahai kathāna.
Ain horkahai mina makhayā mili masot mi,
kha ain khamayonbingna athumli mamayāmana.
Makaphā mina mashun matheithangmeimana,
kha
Shānglaga apong masho ngacheida kazatle ningsāngazipta kazata kachāma phāmei.
Ain khamayona chi thangkhama naomayarana,
kha morkahākli khangaso china avāva̱li maishi ngasaka.
Awui lan atar eina chungsang khangasaka kala mataisang khangasaka chipāwui lan kachāmali lukhamashan katheia awui vang kazipmi kahaina.
Mi akhana ain manganāsangla ngareithuihaikha,
awui seihā kasā eina tangdala ningkakachai otna.
Khangaronga mili makapha
kha shāt makakā mina khamathā shimlui khuira.
Kashānga mina a khalatta thangmeiya da phaninga,
kha theishingkakhui kachāma china ali phāshokra.
Khangarong mina khayui tharan,
mi saikorana lumlao sai;
kha makhayā mina reikasang tharan,
mibingna athum khalatta yāmngathuma.
Khalattawui morei ngathum kahai mina mamataisangngayaomana,
kha hāngphatta chiho kahaibingna lukhamashan samphanga.
kha wuklung khamakang mina kakhanangli tāzangra.
Kazingkha̱ kakhangang thāda, singomna kakharom thāda,
makhayā awungana kachāmabingli chithāda sai.
Theishingkakhui makhavai khamunga chi sākashe rekakharekana;
kha makhamashung eina tongkazāli ningkakachai mina sāngmeida okpeira.
Mi akhana khangateili ashee tāngasakakha,
mathiranglakha eina tangda yāmkazata ngasāranu;
ali khipānakhala mangachonmiaranu.
Ningsāngazipta kazata mili kanmira,
kha masho ngachei khangasaka mi chomli tāzangra.
Luikhavā mina kashakazā kachungkha samphangra,
kha masā khavai phākazata mi chiya chāmkhamatai samphangra.
Ningtongda shitkasang mili sokhamina pemtinghaora,
kha thākta shāngkhangai mi chili kashong malāngla machihomara.
Michang kasā maphāmana;
kha zāt ngahomkhawui vang mina khalāng ot sai.
Wokhari mina lanli kharoma,
kala khavāt kaho awuitungli rāra kaji matheimana.
Sotkhamasaoli lāngda hāngkhamachinna naoda lumkāmei.
Ava̱ maningakha avāva̱wui eina leekhuilaga
“Hi chonkhamakān maningmana”
kaji mi chi shimān khangasaka miwui khavākna.
Kākharam mina nganang ngasaka,
kha
Khalattawui ningli shitkasang mi chi mangkhama̱na,
kha thangkhamei eina kazat mili kanshokmira.
Kachāmali khamibing chi mavātmara,
mikning kahaibing khonkashi kachungkha samphangra.
Makhayā mina reikasang tharan mibingna athum khalatta yāmngathuma;
kha athum shimān kahai tharan,
khangarongana mataisanga.
Hāngmachinchinglala manganākasang mi chi,
kashuirak eina ngapokhaida masākhuiluipaimara.
Khangarong mina pangshap kasing tharan mibing mathāna,
kha makhayā mina khamung tharan mibing ringngai.
Thangkhameili leikashi naomayarana avāva̱li mathān ngasaka,
kha khayorva̱li khangayur mina awui lan sāshimāna.
Mashun eina awungana ngalei chingrihai ngasaka;
kha pheizā khuikazā mina chi shimān ngasaka.
Khongnainaoli sotkhamasaoa che apheili khalen kasangna.
Makaphā mina awui chonkhamakān khalenli manna,
kha khangarong mina laa sāda mathāna.
Khangarong mina kachāmawui mashun thei;
makhayā mina chikathā theithangkhamei maleimana.
Mashātkazar mina keinung sa̱tai,
kha thangkhamana malungkhavāt ngalanthui ngasaka.
Thangkhamei mina mangkhama̱ali tui ngaphatakha,
mangkhama̱ana thurda mana̱ya,
kala va̱ri kahai maleimana.
Ashee ra̱kachanga mina shāt makakā mili yangkharinga,
kala makhayā mina awui manglā khuikhavai sai.
Mangkhama̱ana awui malungkhavāt kashokahok tai,
kha thangkhamei mina kasaikha thumhai.
Khamungana khangui tui khuisangakha,
awui otva̱bingla makhayā sāthura.
Kachāma eina rekakhareka samphangruma;
khaninili
Kachāmali awungana mashun bichar sāmiakha,
awui wungpamkhong mashimānla leichingra.
Lijei eina khamachina thangmei ngasaka;
kha makhamachin naona ava̱va̱li khayak ngasaka.
Makhayaana pangshap kasing tharan,
chonkhamakān mataisanga;
kha khangarongna athumwui kashimān yangra.
Nanaoli rāklu, nali ana ngasāmkhui ngasakra;
ana naningli mathān ngasakra.
Marānkhami makhaleipamli mibingna khangarin maleimana,
kha ain khamayon mi chi sokhamina.
Tuina da chimāng eina raoli mamachinpaimana,
kaja ana theikhuihailala, mahensangmara.
Machukmajala totot matuikashoka mi katheila?
Aliva mangkhama̱li kachihāna kachangmei.
Nganuilakhawui eina lumkā kahai rao china naoda awui shimlui khuihairasāra.
Malungvātkazar mina nganang ngasaka,
malungthuikazar mina khangui khalāng shok ngasaka.
Langkasona ali maishi ngasakra,
kha ningngai ngahuiri kahai mina maikhayā samphangra.
Khalewui angasotana akhalattawui rinli yangkharinga,
khonkashi chi ana shai, kha mahāngphatmana.
Miwui khangacheena khalen sanga,
kha
Kachungkhana khamungawui ngahānkhangai phai,
kha
Makhamashung mi hi khangarongawui vang ningkakachai otna,
kha mashun apongli kazat mi hi makhayāwui yangkakharing otna.
Massali khalei Jakehwui naomayara Agurwui tuina.
Mi china Ithi-elli hānga,
Ithi-el eina Ucalli:
Mi akha khangasā kachangkhat eina I mangma̱nāhaira.
Mi akhawui theishingkakhui iwuili maleimana.
Thangkhamei ina matamkhuimana,
Katharapāwui ponglila I matheithangmeimana.
Khipāna kazingramli kālaga tunghaira?
Khipāna masi apāng eina ngashumkhuihaira?
Khipāna kachon eina tara̱ romkhuihaira?
Khipāna okathui achikun peida sākhui?
Awui ming khipa ho, anao mayarawui ming khi ho? Nana theilaka!
Varewui tui kachiva̱ khamashungnada theikhui;
ana ali khangayinbingwui chāngvei sami.
Awui tuili malāngsangalu, ana nali kaharpaishina
kala nali kakapikna chipaishina.
Ina nali ot khani poli;
I mathiranglakha ngga majimialu:
Khangui eina kakapik iwui eina katāva̱li khuithuimihaolu;
ili kachām nilala kashāng nilala mamialu;
iwui vang zāvaishap kashakazā ili mizālu,
chi maningakha I thohaida nali malaihaipaishina,
kala “
maningkha I chāmhaida lihaipai,
kala iwui Varewui ming makhao ngasakpai.
Raoli akhavāwui mangāli mamashātalu,
ana nali khonshida khayon mipaishina.
Avāva̱ ngarāli khonkashe mi kala ava̱va̱ ngarāli makaso mi lei.
Khalattava tharzārihaiya da khuihailaga,
athumwui thuikhanāmva masākhamathā mi lei.
Mi kaikhava mikyan lāngsolaka,
mikkor kayākha juida yangkākhala!
Kachāmabingli okathuiwui eina,
khavātabingli miwui alungwui eina
shaikhavai raighai katha ahā, ghainao katha ahā kakā mi lei.
Mahutwui naongalāva̱ khani lei,
“Milu, milu” da anina poi.
Ningyang maungphut kaji kathum lei;
matina “Shaphaira” da mahānglakmana.
Kazeiram, nao kashumva̱,
ra̱changching kaja okathui,
kala “Shaphaira” da mahānglak kaje mei.
Avāva̱li mana̱kashe,
ava̱va̱li khayā makashiawui mik chi tampākwui hangkhāna mara̱shokmihaida lāngjāna shaihaora.
Iwui vang otyur kathum hi matakhakhainai,
mati ina matheirarmana:
kazingli yongkazat khalāngwui apong,
lungkaili khalei phara̱wui apong,
hakkhamahā shamadruli huikazat marikhongwui apong,
kala mayarnao akha eina sha̱nao akha khangasowui apong.
Hi shāmkasā sha̱naowui apongna:
ana zālaga, khamor mithailaga “I khayon masāhaimana”
da hānga.
Ot kathumwui azingli okathui nganuka;
matiwui azingli hi maphungrarmana:
raonaona awunga khangasā tharan,
kala mangkhama̱na kashakazā katho-kachir tharan;
chinkhamahai sha̱naona gahara samkaphang tharan;
kala raopāva̱na akhavaiva̱ khangasā tharan.
Okathuili kateo ot mati lei,
kha athum thangmeishuna;
zāling hi kapanga yur maningmana,
kha athumna lumkachāng athumwui kashakazā ngarānsanga;
sākharei kapinga yur maningmana,
kha lungkaili athip sai;
khaohwui awunga mangavāmana,
kha asur eina ngawokzata;
chirang nathumna pāng eina tukkhuishapa,
kha awungawui dolanli pama.
Otyur kathumwui kazat yangngailaka,
matina ngamlak eina kārzata:
sāwui ngachaili pangmeikap kaje kazingkha̱ khipālikha makapeikhaunga;
yokyaksak kahai harvā, mevā,
kala awungana awui mibingwui mangāli kazat.
Mangma̱da nakhalatta sosaakha,
lah makaphā ning phaningsaakha khamorli napāng matamlu.
Seina̱ shireilaga makhan shoka,
nātang shireilaga ashee shoka,
kala malungkhavāt eina khanganang shoka.
Ava̱va̱na tamkachithei, Massawui
awunga Lemuelwui tui:
Khikhala, inaomayara?
Khikhala, iwui naopamwui inaomayara?
Khikhala, iwui tuingashit inaomayara?
Nawui yāng sha̱naobingli mamihaialu,
awungabingli shimān khangasakbingwui apongli mazatalu.
Awungabingwui vang maningmana, O Lemuel,
zam khamang hi awungabingwui ot maningmana,
lah zamshei ningkachāng hi khamungabingwui ot maningmana;
manglaga hukhum tāmikahai tui chi malaihailaga,
kakhanangbingwui mashun masho-ngacheimihaipaishina.
Thiuki kajibingli zamshei shimanlu,
kala ningchotlak kahaibingli drakhāra̱ shimanlu;
manglaga athumwui kachām-khangai malaihaoranu,
kala athumwui sipkasā maphaningluiranu.
Khak khangasha̱bingwui vang matuimilu,
mikyan mayangsangmila horkahaibing chiwui mashunwui vang.
Nakhamor makāda khamashung eina bichar sālu,
khavāta kachāmabingwui mashun yangmilu.
Kaphā preiva̱ khipāna phākhuishapra?
Aman kasaka chāra̱-chāsānlila ana aman sakmei.
Agaharana ali ning tongchaowa,
kala ana mavātlakla katong samphanga.
Awui mirin peida gaharali kaphā samichinga,
makaphā masālakmana.
Ana sahā kala khamanaka tāwon kachon phākhuida sāngairereo kahai pāng eina ot sai.
Ava leihkhalonawui jahas thāda,
apam katāva̱wui eina kashakazā khuiunga.
Ana kazing mathangranglakha ngakarthuida,
awui shimkhurwui kashakazā ngarānmi,
kala rao sha̱naobingna sākhavai athumwui ot ngayarmi.
Ana shimlui machuklaga lokhui;
apāngwui eina samkaphang athei chieina drakhā yāmgui vāsanga.
Kashānli yang eina shānneira̱ neiya kala pāngtheili yāng kāngasaka.
Awui leihkhayor ot kānkhanā thei.
Awui thaomei ngayā mamitmana.
Apāng eina tareng singa, kala
shirei khavai chi apāng eina singa.
Kachāmabingli pāng tonga,
kala khavātabingli awui pāng vāshunga.
Ashi shimkhurwui vang phāmli mangacheemana,
kaja awui shimkhur saikora hungping kahai kachon ngavaiya.
Akhalattawui ngavai khavai kachon sākhui;
awui kachonva hungrisi khamanakana.
Kha̱wui khararnaobingli ngasoda ngaveili kapam tharan,
agaharali mina theimi.
Ana khamanaka kachon raklaga yora;
leihkhayornaoli shānneira̱ yorsanga.
Pangshap kala khayākakā chi awui sārina,
kala naodawui vang ana ringphai.
Akhamorwui eina thangkhamei tui matui,
kala amaleli lumashankatheiwui tuimānga.
Shimkhurwui pongli khamathāmāng ngarāna,
ngachāng makakāwui zāt mazāmana.
Naongarāna sokhamiva̱ hoi;
agaharanala ali masot mida hānga:
“Sha̱nao kachungkhana mathālak kahai ot sai,
kha nawuina athum saikorawuili mataimeiya.”
Yangkhangai hi kapiklaka, khamathā aremana,
kha
Awui pāng eina kashok athei ali milu;
kala ngaveili awui otsakna ali soranu.
Davidwui naomayara, Jerusalemwui awunga hashokmewui tuina.
Aremawui arema, da hashokmena hānga,
aremawui arema! saikora aremana.
Zinghamli mikumona ngalangkazār saikora hiwui eina khi tongkakhui leikhala?
Thotkha thui, thotkha rai,
kha okathui chichinga.
Zimikna shoka kala zimikna tuna,
kala ana shokkhavaipamli unglui.
Masina azingshong phantai,
kala atungshong kuishanga;
kuimareida masi china kuizata,
kala awui shongfali hanunglui.
Kong saikora shamadruli longsanga,
kha shamadru kapem mavaimana;
kongna longrā khavai shong chili thada longpapamluia.
Ot saikora kakhanangna pema,
mina mahangrarmana,
kathei chi eina mikna mapenmana,
lah kashā chin khanā mapemrarmana.
Shokkahai chi shokluira; sākahai chi saluiki kaji chipapama;
kala okathuili kadhar maleimana.
“Yanglu, hi kadharana” da hāngkahai ot khaleila?
Chiya achālakhawui eina ithumli rida leihairakasana.
Rida shokkahai chi maphaningluimana;
naoda rākashok chila maphaningluimara
Hāshokmena Jerusalemli Israelwui awunga sāsai.
Kala okathuili sāda khalei saikora thangmei eina phākhui khavai kala phashok khavai ina iwui ning horsanga; mikumowui naomayarabingwui ningli Varena ngalang zarkhavai mikahai hi maringkaphā otna.
Okathuili kasāsā ot kachiva̱ ina theiserhaira; kala yanglu, saikora aremana, masili khangahom kathāsera.
Khamakhei chi mangatar ngasakluipaimana,
kala khavāt chi mashānkhuirarmana.
Ina I khalatta hānga, “Ili rida Jerusalemli leikasābingli langmeikharda ina thangkhamei haklak eina tamkhuihaira; kala iwui ningna awor kala thangkhameiwui theikakhui kachungkha samphanghaira.”
Kala mangma̱sak, kapā kala thangkhamei theikhavai iwui ning horsangchaowa. Ina theikhuiya kaja hila khangatei maningmana kha masili khangahom kathāna.
Kaja thangmeimei, kakhanang mataimei, kala theimataikhamei mi chi chotmataimei.
I khalatta hānga, “Ara rālu, ningyāngkhaung ina mazap ngasakra; nakhalatta ringphākhuilu.” Kha yanglu, hila arema ngasasai.
Khamana̱li “Hi kapāna” kala ningyangkhaungli “Hi khi kānāda?” da ina hānga.

Mikumona kazingramwui azingli athumwui mirin kasha̱khawui alungli ringlakha sāphalungki kaji kaphā ot chi ina theipai khavai, kathāda mangkhama̱li singtitra̱khala kala kathāda iwui phasā, zam eina mathān ngasakrakhala da, iwui thangkhamei ning eina ngasoda phāzata.
Ina ot kahahak sai, ina shim sai, kala ikhalattawui vang drakhā yāmguila vāsanga;
I khalattana yāmgui eina ngasāmphung sālaga chili atheirong yur saikora lingsanghai.
Thingrong phorrāda khalei ngahong chi tara̱ chaimi khavai I khalattana ra̱khong khonkhui.
Ina rao sha̱naola mayarnaola losanga, kala iwui shimli pharākasang raola lei; Jerusalemli ili rida leikasābingli lāngda ina seishang yaoshang kachungkha ngavai.
Awungabing kala rammungabingwui sinā-lupala, lanla I khalattawui vang ina kazipkhui; laa kasā sha̱nao, mayarnao, kala mayarnaowui ningyang ungkhavai angashirva̱ kachungkhala ina hai.
Hithāda sāda I hakmahālaka, kala ili rida Jerusalemli leikasābingli ina lāngmeisera; kala iwui thangkhameila ili ngasoda leichinga.
Kala iwui mikna ningkachāng saikorawui eina I matāthuimana; kala iwui ningna malungkachāng mathāhaimana; kaja ina kasāsā ot saikora chili ina ningyangunga; kala chi iwui ot kasā saikorawui sāmanna.

Chiwui thili ina ipāng eina sākahai saikora kala chi kasāli ngalang zangkahai saikora ina chukmaja̱yanga, kala yanglu, saikora aremana, masili khangahomna, kala okathuili tongzākapai khikha maleilakmana.
Chieina ina thangkhamei, kapā kala mangkhama̱ hibingwui apongli chukmaja̱luishita; kaja awungawui pam kakā mi china khi sāshapkhala? Ana rida sākahai chimānga.
Chieina kahorna tangkhamangli mataikhamei thāda thangkhameina mangkhama̱li mataimeida ina theikhui.
Thangkhamawui kuili mik shoma; kha mangkhama̱na tangkhamangli zata; chithālala athum saikorawui angasut ngaraichāsera da theikhui.
Chieina ina I khalattali hānga, “Mangkhama̱ali kashok chi ilila rāshokra; chithākha khisāda I hiyākha thangmeisakhala?” Ina hila aremana da I khalattali hānga.
Kaja thangkhama alila, mangkhama̱ alila maphaningungchingmara, kaja khanao atamliva saikora hi malaikhokhaora. Mangkhama̱a thāda thangkhama ala kathāda thikhala!
Chiwui vang eina ina mirinli yangkharinga, khikhalajila okathuili kasāsā chi ili khanang ngasaka; kaja saikora aremana kala masili khangahomna.
Okathuili ina ngalangkazār iwui thili rāki kaje mi chili haimihaora kaji phaninglaga iwui ngalangkazār saikora yangkharinga;
kala khipāna theira, a chi thangmeinika, mangmanikhala? Chithālala okathuili iwui thangkhamei shichinda ngalangzār kahai saikorawui akhavā ana thuisāhaora. Hila aremana.
Chieina ina ngareiung ngareivai, okathuili ina ngalangzār kahai saikora chiwui vang ngachāng chatlakhaowa;

khikhalajila marakkhale mi akhana thangkhamei, theikakhui kala kathem eina ot sāsang kahai hi khikha ngalang makazar mi akhali ringphā khavai haimiser kahaila lei. Hila aremana, kala maphālak kaji akhana.
Mina okathuili ngalangzarlak eina chotchāngda ot kasā saikora chiwui eina khi samphangkhala?
Kaja awui mirin peida kachotna pema, kala awui otva ning kakhanangna; ngayāshongla awui ning mangasāmkhuimana. Hila aremana.
kaja awui eina maningla khipāna phazā, phāshak kala ringphāshapkhala?

Kaja ali ningyāng ungkhangasak mi chili Varena thangkhamei, awor kala khamathān mi; kha morei kaphungbingli kazipkhui khavai khami hiya, Vareli ningyāng ungkhangasaka chili mikhavaina. Hila aremana, kala khamasaili kasāna.
Ot kachiva̱wui vang zur-kān ngavai,
okathuili khalei ot kachiva̱wui vang atam lei:
kapharā atam lei, kala kathi atam lei;
lingkasang atam lei, kala
lingsang kahai chi phurkashok atam lei;
shaokathat atam lei, kala raikhami atam lei;
sakakhayāng atam lei, kala sakakā atam lei;
sikafa atam lei, kala khamana̱ atam lei;
chapkhangachā atam lei, kala
pheichak kasā atam lei;
ngalung horkahai atam lei,
kala ngalung ngamuikakhui atam lei;
ngavamkakhui atam lei, kala khamahei atam lei;
kaphā atam lei, kala kashimān atam lei;
phākhari atam lei, kala horkahai atam lei;
serkakhāk atam lei, kala khopkakhui atam lei;
kasaikha kapam atam lei,
kala khamatui atam lei;
leikashi atam lei,
kala yangkakharing atam lei;
raikasa atam lei, kala chingri kahai atam lei.
Ot kasaa china awui ngalangkazārwui eina
khi tongzākhala?
Varena miwui naomayara ngarāli ngalang zārkhavai mikahai ot chi ina theihaira.

Ana ot kachiva̱ kachichāwui atamli mathāsek eina sāhai; kala mikumowui ninglila ana katang makhavai sangmi; kha chithālala Varena haokaphok eina thuilaga katang eina tangda khi sahaikhala kaji maphāshokrar khavai sāmihai.
Athum ringda leilakha ringphākakhui, kala mathānkakhui chili lāngda athumwui vang phākhamei khikha maleimana da ina thei;
kala mi kachiva̱ phāshak phazālaga ringkaphā, ot sālaga ningyāngkhaung hi Varewui lemmetna da thei.
Varena kasāsā ayāyāva̱ leichinga kaji ina thei; chili khikhala mangarumsangpaimana, kakhuila makhuishokpaimana; mikumona ali ngachee khavai Varena hithāda sākahaina.
Khalei chi rida leihairakasāna, shokki kaji chi rida shokkahaina, kala thuikahai chi Varena phādalei.
Chili lāngda okathuili ina thei kaja mashun bichar pamlila makaphā makhayā lei, kala khamashung khangarongwui pamlila makaphā makhayā lei.
Ina ningli phaninga, Varena khamashungalila, makhayaalila bichar sāra; kaja ana ot kachiva̱ kala otsak kachiva̱wui vang atam akha rethaira.
Mikumowui naomayarabingwui pongli ina iningli phaninga, kaja Varena athum hila sāyurna da theikhavai chāng khayangna.
Kaja mikumowui angasut eina sābingwui asut ngaraichai; akhana kathi thāda akhapāla thipapama. Athum saikora khaksui ngaraichai, kala mina sābingli mataikhamei maleimana; kaja saikora aremana.
Saikora apam akhali vai; saikora chifawui einana, kala saikora chifali latungluira.
Miwui manglāna atungshong kai, kala sāwui manglāna ngalei zingshong zanga kaji khipāna theikhala?
Chiwui vang eina mina awui ot sāda ringkaphāli lāngda khikha maleimana kaji ina thei, kaja chi awui yarna; awui thili sāshokki kaji chi khipāna ali chitheishapkhala?

Okathuili rekakharek ot kasā saikora chila ina theiluishita. Kala yanglu, rekharek kahaibingwui chāra̱, athumli ringphā khangasaka khipākha maleimana! Athumli rekakharekbingna pangshap lei, kala athumli ringphā khangasaka khipākha maleimana.
Kala ringda khaleibingli lāngda thihaira̱kasābingna mahaimeida ina phaninga;
kha khanini chili phakhamei chiya, mapharārang kaje, okathuili makaphā sāda khalei
Ngalangkazar hila, kathem hila khongnainaoli mikpaikashi eina kashokna da ina thei. Hila aremana, kala masili khangahomna.
Mangkhama̱na pāngmasa̱da akhalattawui asā shaipama.
Va̱ri kahai pāng ngashumkhana ngalangkazār kala khamasaili sākazat panghom khanili phāmei.
Latluida ina okathuili arema ot theiluiya:

khipākha makhangavā mi akha, anaomayarala, achināla makhalei, kha ngalang zārshon zārthaida ngasāmkakhui makhavai, kala kashāng chi amikna yanglaga shaphaira kaji makhangavā china “Ina khipāwui vang ngalang zārzatta I khalatta maringphakhui kajikhala?” da akhalatta mangahānlakmana. Hila aremana, kala maringkaphā otsak akhana.
Akhale khani phamei, khikhalajila aniwui ngalangkazārwui sāman khamathā akha lei.
Kaja akhana kongluiakha akhapāna khangmathotra; kha amānghaida konglui kahai tharan khāngmathot khavai khangatei makhalei mi chiya kalākashina.
Chili lāngda mi khani petrumakha luma; kha akhamāngna kathāda lumra?
Mi akhana akhamāng kaje mi akhali yuishaplapai, mi khaniva nganurshapra. Akhara̱ kathum eina kashirei seipeng thākta machatmara.
Sarkahaia mangkhama̱a, hāngkachithei makhuikasanga awungale kachāma thangkhamei yarona phamei,
phātopwui eina wungpamkhongli rākakā misālala, lah awui wungramli chāmda pharākasang ngasāsālala.
Okathuili zatta khalei manglākapai saikora, awui pamli nganingki kaje yarona chila ina theihaira;
mibing saikora chi katang mavaimana, athum saikorawuitungli ana munga. Chithālala naoda rākazangabing chiya awuili ringkaphā masamphangmara. Kachangkhat hila aremana, masili khangahomna.
Nana Varewui shimli khavā tharan nawui pheikār yangkazaklu; mangkhama̱bingwui pha̱kaphayā kachigatle nganaida anganākakhuina phamei; kaja athumna makaphā
Nakhamor mathāknālu, kala Varewui mangāli tui hāngkida malung makatungnālu, kaja Vareva kazingramli lei, nava okathuili khaleina; chieina nawui tui teomeikhamaranu.
Kaja kachungkha machukakha mangsa̱ya, kha mangkhama̱na tui kachungkha matuiya.
Nana Vareli tuingashit kasā tharan, chi khamili mahuinganongalu; kaja ana mangkhama̱bingli ningyāngkhaung maleimana. Nana ngashit kahai chi milu.
Khangashit sāhailaga makhamile khangashit makasāna phamei.
Nakhamorna nali morei masā ngasakalu; kala paomewui
Kaja mang chungmei tuipai chungmei: kha nava Varivarali ngacheelu.

Ngalei akhali kachāmali rekharekta mashun bichar kala khamashung chipatta khuithui kahai theiakha, chikathā otsakli matakhak kahai masaalu; kaja kajui otvali juikhameiya akhana yangdalei, kala athumwuitungli juikhamei leiluishita.
Ngaleiwui kānkhanā chiya mi katongawui vāngna; awungala vāsang kahai ngalei chiwui eina katong samphanga.
Pheisāli leikashe mi che pheisā eina ningyang maungrarmara; lanli leikashe mi chila chipapama, hila aremana.
Kashakazā mataikasang tharan kazā mila mataisanga; chieina akhavāwui vanga mik eina theikakhuili lāngda khi kānkhana leikhala?
Teoda zālala, chungda zālala ot kasā mi che piphuphai; kha kashānga chiya awui sorkhangasai lan china mapivāpaimana.
Okathuili zakshilak kahai makaphā akha ina thei; chiya lan khangavā china a khalatta kalāshi khavai kaziphai,
kala lanbing chi makaphā leihsak akhali ashimanserhaowa; nao mayarnao akha pharālala awui pāngli khikha maleithuwa.
Ava̱va̱wui naopam eina kashok takam eina ana thuiluihaora, asāmsai eina kharā thāda, ana mathuisang kahai akhala apāngli singthui khavai maleimana.
Hila zakshikhailak kahai makaphā akhana: ana kharā tākam eina zatthuipapamra; khamasaiwui vang ngalang zarda khi kannara,
awui mirin peida wukakhanang eina tangkhamanglungli okthuida, ningyāng maunglakla, kazāt khāngda, malungvātchir eina pamrala?
Yanglu, okathuili Varena mikahai athishurda mirinli shukshuk sāda kachichāna mathuisang kahai chi phāshak phazālaga ringphākakhui chi kaphā kala sākhangayi ot akhana da ina thei, kaja chi awui yarna.
Mi kachiva̱li Varena khami khalalei lan saikora kala chi shichin khavai kala kachichāwui yar mayākhuida awui mathuisang kahai chieina ringphākhui khavai kashap mihaira— hi Varewui lemmetna.
Kaja awui mirinwui zimikshobing chi chiyākha maphaningungmara, kaja Varena awui wuklungli khamathānna pemngasakhaira. 8
Okathuili ina theikahai makapha

chiya mi akhali lan, sha̱kei kala khayākakā mida, chieina ana ningkachāng saikora mavātlakmana, kha Varena ali chi singlaga ringphākhui khavai pangshap mamimana; kha makathei mi akhana chi shichinthuihaowa; hi aremana kala kakhanang kahaka akhana.

Mi akhana nao shākha pharākhuida kasāngkha okthuida okpeilaklapai, kha mirinwui ringkaphā masamphangakha, kala chizankhamila maleiakha, ina kahāngna, kachāng mapeila pharātāda thikahaia china ali phāmei.
Kaja chi aremali rālaga tangkhamangli vāhaowa, kala aming tangkhamangna farorhai;
chili lāngda nao china zimik matheimana, khikhala matheimana; kha okkapei mi chili lāngda ana ngasāmkhui.
Mipa china zingkum thingkha thingkha da khani shida okthuilala kaphā ot masamphangakha — athum saikora apam akhali mavāmala?
Mikumowui ngalangkazār saikora awui khamorwui vangna, kha awui zākhangai kapen mavailakmana.
Thangkhameia china mangkhama̱ali mataikhamei khi leikhala? Kala kachāma mi akhana mirin hi kathada ngasungrakhala da kathei china khi phākhamei leikhala?
Ning eina kakahaole mik eina katheina phāmei; hila aremana, kala masili khangahomna.
Leikahai ot saikora rida aming phokping kahaina, kala mi hi khikhala da theikahaina, ali pangkhamei mili mangararrarmana.
Tui chungmei, makānkhanā chungmei, mina phākhamei khi lei?
Kaja khaya̱ thāda, kanthui kahai aremawui mirin ringlakha miwui vang kaphā chi khikhala kaji khipāna theikhala? Kaja awui thili okathuili khi shokrakhala kaji khipāna hāngshapra?
kala kathi zimikshona kapharā zimiksholi phāmei.
Zātkhān kasā shimli akazangle chapkhangachāwui shimli akazangna phamei;
kaja hi mi saikorawui akatangana,
kala ringda khaleiana chi ningli haira.
Wukkakhanangna khamana̱li phamei,
kaja wukkakhanang maina ning mathān ngasaka.
Thangkhamawui ning chapkhangachā shimkhurwui alungli lei,
kha mangkhama̱wui ninga lumlao kasāwui shimli lei.
Mangkhama̱wui laa khanganāle thangkhamawui khamachin khanganāna phamei.
Ham azingli ka̱shātthingna khangawok thāda,
mangkhama̱wui khamana̱la chithai;
hila aremana.
Kachangkhat eina rekakharekna thangkhamei mili mangma̱ ngasaka,
kala pheizāna ning makhao ngasaka.
Ot kakupana haokaphokli phāmei,
kala khāngkathei ningna lāngkaso ningli phāmei.
kaja malungkhavāt hi mangkhama̱bingwui makāli kazuna.
“Khisāda khare atamna hili phameihaokhala?”
da mahānglu.
Kaja nana hi khangahān hi thangkhameiwui eina khangahān maningmana.
Thangkhamei hi shimluikakā thāda phai,
kharingbingwui vang kānnālaka.
Kaja thangkhameiwui ngākkhami chi pheisāwui ngākkhami thai;
kala theithangkhameiwui kānkhanāva
aworna awui mirin phārimi.
Varewui otsak machukyanglu;
ana makhuida sākahai chi khipāna ngatar ngasakshaprakhala?
Reikasang atamli mathānlu kala kalākashi atamli chukmaja̱lu; Varena akhala akhala kasāna, mikumona awui thili rāshoki kaji maphākhuipai khavaina.
Iwui arema mirinli ina ot saikora theihaira; khangaronga mina awui khamashung khangarongli shimān kahai lei, kala makaphā sālaga okapeia makhayā mila lei.
Mamashunghenalu, kala na khalatta mathangmeihenalu; khisāda nakhalatta sashimānrakhala?
Mazakshinālu kala mangkhama̱la mangasālu; nawui atam maungshungranglakha khi thisānikhala?
Hi singtit kahai phai, kala napāng machiholakalu; kaja chiwui eina Vareli khangachee mi shokra.
Thangkhameina thangkhamei mili keinung akhawui khamunga tharāli pangkhamei yāng mi.
Kachangkhat okathuili morei masālak kaji kaphāmang kasā khangaronga mi akhala maleimana.
Mina kahahāng saikora makhuisangalu, nawui raona nali khonkashi nana shāpaishina.
Nawuklungna thei kaja na khalattanala kateili tarākha shida khonshihaira.
Saikora hi ina thangkhamei eina tamyanghaira; ina hānga “I thangmeira”; kha chi iwui eina tālakhaowa.
Khalei chila, tālak eina lei, kathukla thukmatailak eina lei; khipāna phāshokrarrakhala?
Chieina ina thangkhamei phāshok khavai kala ot saikorawui apong phākhavai, kala mangkhama̱wui makaphā makhayā kala kapāwui mangkhama̱ chi theikhui khavai kapeiung kapeivai.

Kala pāngli mari khānghui, wuklungli khalen eina khailan khalei kathili lāngda khākhamei sha̱nao chi ina samphanga; Vareli ningyāng ungkhangasaka china awui eina yāmshoka, kha morei kaphunga chili ana khuithuihaowa.
Yanglu, akachanga chi phāshok khavai ot akhali akha ngarumsangda ina samphang kahai chi hina da Hāshokmena hānga,
iwui ningna latlui latluida phai, kha masamphangmana. Mi thingkhawui alungli mayarnao akha samphanga, kha saikora hiwui alungli sha̱nao akhanidala masamphangmana.
Yanglu, ina himang samphanga, kaja Varena mikumoli mashunglak eina sāmihai, kha athumna mareimarā kachungkha phashokkhuihaowa.
Khipana thangkhamei mi thākhala?
Kala khipāna ot akhawui tuikhalat theikhala?
Mi akhawui thangkhameina awui mai horngasaka,
kala awui ningngaila ngachei ngasaka.
Awungawui kakaso nganālu, kala nawui kathara tuingashitwui vang wukmakhanangalu;
awui maiyan eina zathaolu, ringkaphā khavāt tharan mahuinganongalu, kaja ana sākhangai chi sai.
Kaja awungawui tuina mataimeikapa, kala ali khipāna “Na khi kasākhala” da hangshaprakhala?
Kakaso khanganā mi chi kalākashi masamphangmara, kala thangkhamei miwui ningna atam kala apong theira.
Kaja ot saikorawui atamla apongla leisera, kasak china mili ritlak eina shirenhailala.
Kaja ana khi rāshoknikhala da matheimana, kaja hithalakra kaji ali khipāna hangmishaprakhala?
Khipākha manglā ngakhamsingkashap lah kathi zimikshowui akhavā sakashap pangshap maleimana; rai sāmahunglakha ngasāmkhuikapaila maleimana, kala makaphā sākhavai mikahaibinglila china makanmirarmana.
Okathuili sāda khalei saikora, mi akhana akhali chipatta khamā zakhami, saikora hi ina iwui ning horsanglaga munlak eina yanga.
Chieina makaphā makhayābingli chifa kahai ina thei; athumna kathara apamli shokzang sāsai, kala athumna keinungli kaphākasāwui vang masot samphanga. Hila aremana.
Khikhalajila makhayā
Morei kaphungana makaphā shākhashida sālaga okpeilaklala, Vareli khangacheebingli kaphā sāmira da ina thei, khikhalajila athumna Vareli ngachee;
kha makaphā makhayaale chi mathāmara, awui mirinla akalā thāda masāngsangmara, khikhalajila ava Vareli mangacheemana.

Okathuili ngarokho kahai akha lei, khangarongbingna makhayābingna awui otsak athishurda samkaphang thāda samphanga, kala makhayābingnala khangarongbingna awui otsak athishurda samkaphang thāda samphanga. Hila aremana da ina kahāngna.

Kala iya ringphākakhui hi phameikapa jira, kaja okathuili mikumowui vang phākashak phākazā kala khalatta ringphākakhui maningla kaphā ot katei maleimana; kaja Varena ali khami hi mirin peida awui ngalangkazārli ngasovāshumra.
Thangkhamei chi theikhavai, okathuili kashokshokla yangkhui khavai ina iningli machuklaga ngashun ngayā mina makapi hila thei;

chieina okathuili shokta khalei Varewui otsak mina maphākhuirarmana kaji ina theikhuihaira. Mina kayākha ngalangzārda phālala ana maphashokrarmara; thangkhama mina theikhuihaira da hānglala, ana chi masamphangrarmara.

Khangarongala, thangkhamala kala athumwui otsak saikora Varewui pāngli kathāda leikhala da iningli khaluizālaga thei, kaja leikashila, yangkakharingla mina matheirarmana. Athumwui mangāli khalei saikora aremana.

Khamashungali ranu, katharali ranu, makatharali ranu, ali pha̱kaphayāli ranu, ali mapha̱kaphayāli ranu, makaphāli ranu, kaphā mila morei kaphungawui thāda kala khangashit kasā mila makasaawui thāda saikorawui angasut akhamanga.
Miwui ningli makaphāna pemtinghailala, kala athumna ringlakha kapā kaho chi athumwui wuklungli leisālala, atam khaung tharān thisera kaji hi okathuili kalākashi akhana.
Kha kharinga saikorali khangashika chiya kachihān lei, kaja thikahaia kazingkha̱li kharinga fana phamei.
Kaja kharingbingna athum thira da thei, kha kathena khikha matheimana, kala athumwui sāman maleiluimana; athumli phaningkhaungla maleiluimana.
Athumwui leikashi, athumwui yangkakharing kala athumwui yuikashi saikora shimānhaira, kala okathuili sāda khalei chili athumwui yar maleiluimana.
Vāda, ningyangunglak eina aphāshak aphāzālu; kaja nana kasāsā chi Varena mayāmi kahaina.
Nawui kashankachon charching ngasaklu; nakuili kuithao mavāt ngasakalu.
Okathuili mikahai nawui makankhanā mirin hili nana leikashi napreiva̱li ngasoda mirin ringphākhuilu, khikhalajila okathuili ngalangzārda ringkhavai nali yarkahaina.
Nawui pāngna sākhavai khalei kachiva̱ nawui yāng eina sālu; kaja nana vāki kajipam Kathewui ram chili ot kasāla, chukhamajala, theithangkhameila, aworla maleimana.

Kala ina theiluiya kaja okathuili shongzā khangakhuili kathaknala maningmana, railila kapangnala maningmana, thangkhameimāngnala mazāmana, ningkazanmāngnala mashāngmana, kathemāngli lumkakā maningmana; kha saikorali atam athishurda kashoksera.
Kaja mina awui atam matheimana. Khailenli khai mankahai thāda, kala khalenli vānao mankahai thāda, kalākashi atam kashuirak eina mibingli kharā tharan khalenli manhaowa.
Okathuili thangkhameiwui machutkhui khavaila ina kathei samphanghaira, kala hi iwui vang hakmahālaka.
Mi kateokhamāng okkathui keinungnao akha leisai; kala kahaka awunga akhana rangapaikhuilaga raipan sakchangda ngaveiya.
Kha chili kachāma thangkhameia mi akha leisai; kala ana awui thangkhamei eina keinung chi kankhui. Chithālala mi khipānakha kachāma mi chili maphaningungmana.
Kha ina kahāng hina kaja, kachāma chiwui thangkhameili chipatsālala kala awui tuili mahengsangsālala thangkhameina pangshapli phāmei.
Mangkhama̱bingwui alungli khamungana khavaopale thangkhamawui khon kasainakha kahāng nganākakhuina phamei.
Thangkhamei hi raiwui khutlailila phāmei, kha morei kaphunga akhana kaphā kachungkha sashimānshapa.
Hachāng kathina nganamkaphā thao nganamshi ngasaka;
chithāda sāda mangma̱sak kateokhana thangkhamei kala khayākakāli ritmeiya.
Thangkhamei miwui ningna ali yāshong yuivā ngasaka,
kha mangkhama̱wui ningna uishong yuivā ngasaka.
Mangkhama̱na shongfali zatlala ning maleimana,
kala ana mi kachiva̱li a mangkhama̱na da hāngzata.
Khamungana nawuitungli malungvātlala nawui pam machihohaialu,
kaja pāmkasangna hakkhamahā kashong ngachei ngasaka.
Okathuili khamungawui eina kashok khayon khalei chi ina theihaira:
mangkhama̱li kajuipam kachungkhali chipama, kala kashāngana khanempamli pama.
Raonaona sigui katong, kala wungnaobingna raonao thāda phei eina kazat ina thei.
kala phākho kapheiyali phara̱na mara̱ra.
Ngalung kaharali ngalungna tāka;
kala thingkakazarali china kalā shingasaka.
Ngahā ngama̱haoda zankhavai makharakha awui yāng chungmeida zangra;
kha thangmeina ot kasā ungshung ngasaka.
Phara̱na manuiranglakha makeihaiakha,
nuikhangasaka chiwui kankhanā maleimana.
Thangkhama khamorwui tuimatui eina ali lum kai;
kha mangkhama̱ morchaina a khalatta shimān ngasaka.
Mangkhama̱ana mangma̱t tui eina haophoklaga,
makhayā kapā tui eina kupa.
Mangkhama̱ana matuishonlala khi sāsānikhala da khapanakha matheimana,
kala awui thili khirakhala kaji khipana ali hāngshapra?
Mangkhama̱ awui ngalangkazārna ali khanang ngasakhaoda ana keinungli zangkhavai apong matheithuwa.
O ngalei, nawui awunga nganuilakha nawui wungnaobingna ngathorshong morkasong chi kalākashina!
O ngalei, nawui awungana ningkakhānwui naomayara,
kala wungnaobingna malip khavai maningla,
yāng shokkhavai atam chāda morkasong chi na ringkaphāna.
Ngachangmakakā eina shimtung ja̱tai,
kala ot masākhangai eina shim ngaya̱na.
Zāt hi mathān khavaina,
drakhāra̱na mirin mareo khavaina,
kala pheisāna saikora sāpai.
Naninglila awungali makhonshialu;
ngayaipilakhala kashāngali makhonshialu,
kaja vānaona ahānghaora,
angachāng kaphon yurnala ashihaora.
Nawui kashaikashak tara̱li horsanglu,
kaja chi sha̱rākhawui thili samphangra.
Shinili khumkha milu, lah chishatli eina tangda milu;
kaja okathuili khi kalākashi shoknikhala kaji na matheimana.
Muiyā zingrotna pemtinghaiakha,
athum chi okathuili heitamihaowa,
kala thingrongna azingshong nilala atungshong nilala pitaakha pikatāvāk chi leisara.
Masi khayanga che athā mayaosangmara,
kala muiyā khamachuta che mahātkhuimara.
Naokhavaiva̱ sha̱naowui naopamli kazang ara̱kui chili manglā kathāda rāzangkhala da nana makathei thāda, otsak saikora kasā Varewui ot nana matheirarmana.
Ngathorshong nawui athā yaolu, ngazinshongla napāng mangasāmhaialu, kaja hinagā, chinagā maningakha khanini ngaraichāda phānikhala da na matheimana.
Kahor hiya leishirihai, kala zimik kathei hi mikwui vang ringphālaka.
Kachikathā mi akhana kum kasāngkha okthuiakha, chi chupta mathānranu; kha tangkhamang zimiksho kachungkha lei kajila mamalaiaranu. Kashoshok saikora aremasera.
Mathānlu, O Yaronnao, na yaronshaplakha, yaronshaplakha ningngasa̱ta eina, nawui ningwui kala nawui mikwui apongli zatlu; kha ot saikora hiwui vang Varena nali bicharpamli khuirāra kaji theilu.
Malung vātkhangasak nawuklungwui eina khuishokhaolu, kala naphasāwui eina kachot horhaolu; kaja yaronshap atam kala mirin haokaphok hila aremana.
Makapha atam rāhaida kala atam angasut nganaihaida “Chikathali iwui ringkapha maleimana” da kahāng atam mararanglakha yaronshaplakha nawui Kasā akhavali phaningunglu;
zimik, kachāng, sirābing matangmangranglakha kala zingrot muiyā makhaluiranglakha;
shim khamayona manganukkachokranglakha, kala kapangana akhum matekranglakha, kala mā kharungana teohaowada ngasām kahai, kala charfa eina yangshoklala ngamiting kahai;
kala chanreipheiwui khāmong mashungranglakha; mā kharungkhon nemtā kahai tharan, vānaokhon nganāda ngakarkathui, laa kasa naongalāva̱bingli nem ngasakhaida,

athumna kajuiyalila nganga, kala shongzāli khangachee lei, almond arong awon khawon, khaohna ngamen kazat kala pangshap kashimān; mina awui katang makhavai shimli khaung, chapkhangachabingna chanrei kuikazat;
lupāsāwui khara̱ masāshatranglakha, sinā tengkotla masākhairanglakha, ra̱khongli tara̱hamla masākhairanglakha, ham semlakha kāngpheila matekranglakha;
kala chifana ngaleili horzakta mahanungranglakha, kala manglānala Varewuili latkhaung atam marāranglakha phaningunglu.
Aremawui aremana da Hāshokmena hānga; saikora hi aremana.
Awui thangkhameili lāngda, Hashokmena mibingli awor kala kharit khangaveng ngaraklaga, chānjam kachāchā phākhuilaga tamchithei.
Hāshokmena tuiyar khamathāthā phākhuilaga mashun tui chi ngaronglak eina kapiya.
Thangkhamawui hāngkahai tui hi yaokahomana hāngkahai, karhui kala yotpi shaoshantit kahaiwui chānsam chithai.
Inaomayara, hili lāngkahaibing chili ningngasharlu. Lairik kachungkha kapi khavaiwui vanga katang mavaimana, kala kachungkha kapāla phasā chotkhavaina.
Naomeikapta; saikora shāhaira. Vareli ngacheelu, kala awui ningkhami mayonlu; kaja hi mi akhana sāphalungki kaji otna.
Kaja kaphāla kashila, ngathum kahai saikora bichar sāthang Varena khuishokserra.
Laabingwui Laa hi Solomonwuina.
O nakhamor eina nana ili maya̱khuisi kaja!
Kaja nawui leikashi drakhāra̱lila phāmei,
nawui thao khaneo nganamphāshuna,
naming thao heikashoklaka;
chiwui vang ngalānaobingna nali leishi!
Nali nganai ngasakmilu, ini thakusa.
Awungana ili awui kāli thānzanga,
ithumna mathānda nali ringphārumra;
drakhāra̱li lāngda nawui leikashili ithumna sora;
athumna nali leishikachangkhata.
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱ ngarā!
Iya ziklaka, kha ningshāt kai;
Kedarwui kachonshim kala Solomonwui chonrān thai.
Kazikwui vang ili mayangkazilu,
zinghāmna zikkhangasakna.
Ishāva̱wui naomayara ngarāna ili malungvāta,
athumna ili drakhā yāmgui khamayona sāngasaka;
kha, I khalattawui drakhā yāmgui mamayonmana!
Hāngmilu, imanglāna leikashe,
nawui yao kali phāchizātkhala,
ngashun kali chipamkhala,
kaja kachiwui vang eina ina yaokazatabing thāda nawui ngasotabingwui yaoshang ngalemli pamzatrakhala?
O ngalānaobingwui ngachaili mathāmeikap kachiva̱,
nana matheiakha yaoshangwui pheichon kazunda,
nawui yaonaoli phāshai ngasaklu,
yao kahomnaobingwui kachonshim ngalemli.
Iwui leikashiva̱, ina nali Pharaohwui siguigariwui siguili pāntama.
Namaisor ngachān sāri ngayishun,
nakahungla chāra̱-chāsān pengpeng kangayishun.
Sināwui ngachān sāri, lupāsā rukkasang,
ithumna nawui vang sāmira.
Awungana awui petli leilakha,
iwui nardwui anganam kha̱shoka.
Iwui leikashe, nava iwui vanga iwui sungthei marakli kahai nganamkaphā myrrh arom thai.
Iwui leikashe, nava iwui vanga En-gedi yāmguiwui henna asur eina khawon thai.
Yanglu, nawui khamathā, iwui leikashiva̱;
yanglu, na mathākachangkhata;
namik nāsha̱nao thai.
Yanglu, nawui khamathā iwui leikashia,
mathākachangkhata, iniwui pet matekchimhai;
ishi shimwui khangen cedar thingna,
matang eina khanji sai.
Iva Sharonwui awona,
tampākwui timrāwona.
Ka̱shātlungli timrāwon kaphor thāda,
iwui leikashiva̱ ngalānao ngachaili lei.
Ngahongthing alungli theithukrong thāda,
iwui leikashela yaronnaobingwui alungli chithai.
Mathānlak eina awui khaya̱zingli ina pamkhui,
kala awui athei ina khamazap tharan shima.
Ana ili morkasong pamli thānvai,
kala iwuitungli awui leikashina philān sai.
Ili drakhātheikao eina phauimilu,
theithukthei eina ning mathing ngasakmilu;
kaja ili leishāt kazāt za̱haira.
Iyavo, awui uipāngna ikuizingli,
yāpāngna ili vamsi kaje chong!
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱bing,
seichui kala ramwui chaonao mingsinda ina kahāngna,
leikashi ningyāng maungranglakha,
makharakmialu, khamathotla mamathotmialu.
Iwui leikashewui akhon!
Yanglu, a rārāli,
phungreili ngawokkai kaphungnaoli ngalongshang ngalongtā da.
Iwui leikashe seichuinao thai,
kala chaonao thai.
Yanglu, ishi phākho khanukshong nganingda lei,
charfa eina yangzangda lei,
phākhokhurli ra̱yangda lei.
Iwui leikashena ili hānga,
“Thuilu, iwui leikashiva̱, iwui khamathāva̱, rālu;
kaja yanglu, si kānhaira,
zingrot kupta thuihaira.
Ngaleili awon wonphokhaira,
laa kasā atam rāhaira;
nāsha̱wui kakhong iramli shāhaira.
Khaorārongna athei matheiphokhaira,
kala drakhārongna awon wonuda;
anganam shokphokura.
Ngakarthuilu, iwui leikashiva̱,
iwui khamathāva̱, rālu.
Lunghārtungli khaleiva̱ O iwui nāsha̱,
lungkai tungli khangathumva̱,
nazak ili kachitheilu,
nakhon ili kashā ngasaklu,
kaja nakhon leishirihai,
kala nazak ningshāt kai!
Ramfabing chi tukkhuimilu,
yāmgui sākazamkhame ramfabing chi,
kaja ishiwui drakhārong wonmahungda lei.”
Iwui leikashe iwuina, I awuina,
ana awui yao timrāwon ngachaili phāshai ngasaka.
Kazing mayingranglakha,
khaya̱ mayongthuiranglakha,
seichuinao thāda kala kaphungtungli kazata chaonao thāda latunglu, iwui leikashe.
Ngayā iwui pettungli imanglāna leikashe ali phāzata;
ina ali phai, kha ali masamphang;
ina hoi, kha ana mangahuimana.
“I ara ngakarthuiura kala keinungli,
chanreili kala shongrāli imanglāna leikashe ali phāvāra.”
Ina ali phai, kha ali masamphangmana.
Khamayonabingna ili samphanga,
athum keinungli yaozatlakha.
“Imanglāna leikasheli nathum katheila?”
Athumli ina kanthuichamlaga,
imanglāna leikasheli samphanga,
ina ali yonkhuida ishava̱wui shimli,
ili vaikhui khavai kāli mathanungranglakha eina tangda machihomana.
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱bing,
seichui kala ramwui chaonaowui mingsinda kahāngna,
leikashi ningyāng maungranglakha,
makharakmilu, khamathotla mamathotmialu.
lamhāngwui eina rākharā, meikhut khangapān kathā,
nganamkaphā myrrh eina frankincense eina ngasoda,
leihkhalonbingwui nganamkaphā katonga chi khikhala?
Yanglu, hi Solomonwui dolaina!
Israelwui kapangabingwui ngachaili pangmeikap kaje mi hangtharuk zatta lei,
saikora raighai thāngripa, rai kapingbing,
mi kachiva̱ raighai ghaishāng tāshungda ngayā rairim pama.
Awunga Solomonna Lebanonwui thing eina awui vang dolai sākhui.
Chiwui aphei lupāsā eina, akhum sinā eina,
pamkhavai mayingrisi hungrisi eina;
alungshong leishilak eina Jerusalem naongalāva̱bingna sāsanga.
O Zionwui naongalāva̱bing, vaulu,
kala Awunga Solomonli ayanglu,
awui ngalā shakzāthang awui ning ringkaphā zimikli,
ava̱va̱na ali ngahonkhami kuihon khangahon chi.
Yanglu, nali yangngaishuna, iwui leikashiva̱,
yanglu, nali yangngaishuna!
Namik nāsha̱nao thāda mairārli theizanga.
Nakuisam Gilead kaphungli me ashangva̱ kazat thai.
Nahāna, yaohah chichāp kahaia anao makashumva̱,
khanini ngathānkazata ra̱vailaga kashok thai.
Namorchai kazaira̱ hungping kahai thai,
kala nakhamor yangngailaka.
Namaisor kabothei ngakaipak kahai thai nawui mairār alungli.
Nakahung Davidwui tārong thai,
kapingbingwui chāngvei,
talla̱ thingkha kāngyui khavai pam thai.
Nasungthei chaonao khani thai,
seichuinaowui ngashirkatā timrāwon pamli phākashai thai.
Kazing mayingranglakha,
khaya̱ makānthuiranglakha,
myrrhwui phungreili frankincensewui kaphungli ina totot vāhaora.
Nava yikransanhai, iwui leikashiva̱;
nawuili khavāt maleimana.
Lebanonwui eina ili ngasothuiusa, iwui khām kahaiva̱,
Lebanonwui eina ili ngasothuiusa.
Amanawui kaphungton eina,
Senir kala Harmonwui kaphungton eina,
kazingkha̱khurwui eina,
kuirāng kaphung eina,
thuiusa.
Ining nana sākazamhaira,
izarva̱, iwui khām kahaiva̱,
nawui miktheknao akha eina,
ining nana sākazamhaira,
nawui chāra̱-chāsān akha eina.
Nawui leikashi teokha shimle!
izarva̱, iwui khām kahaiva̱,
drakhāra̱lila nawui leikashina shimmeikhāra,
nawui thao nganamkaphā khangateili henmeikhāra!
Iwui khām kahaiva̱, namorchai khuira̱ thāda shima;
namaleli khuira̱ eina seina lei;
nawui kachonnganam Lebanon nganam thai.
Izarva̱, iwui khām kahaiva̱,
yāmgui ngavei kahai,
ngaveitit kahai yāmgui, saphintit kahai ura̱na.
Nawui ashon kabothei yāmgui mathameikap kaje
athei, henna eina nardna pema.
Nard, saffron, calamus, sākom khamatataiya
frankincense thingyur pema,
myrrh kala aloe khamataiya nganamkaphā ayur eina ngasoda—
yāmguiwui ura̱, kharinga tara̱wui ra̱khong,
kala Lebanon eina longkatā kong!
O atungwui masi, thuilu,
O azingwui masi, phanrālu!
Iwui yāmguili phanda,
anganam ngayaoranu.
Athei mathāmeikap kaji chi iwui leikashena rāphāshairanu.
Ina iwui yāmguili rai,
izarva̱, iwui khām kahaiva̱,
iwui nganamkaphāphā ot eina ngasoda ina myrrh kazipkhui,
ina iwui khuihāng eina ngasoda khuira̱ shai,
ina drakhāra̱ eina ngasoda seina̱ manga.
Zālu O ngasotnaobing, kala manglu:
kachungkha manglu, O leikashebing!
Ina pilala iningva mapivāmana.
Nganālu! iwui leikashena khāmong shaoda lei.
“Izarva̱, iwui khām kahaiva̱, iwui nāsha̱nao,
iwui kākashungva̱ ili shomilu;
kaja, ikui ikra̱na ya̱haira,
samsa̱la ngayāwui muiyāra̱na ya̱haira.”
I kashankachon raihaira,
I kathāda ngavaikhuiluira?
Ipheila pheohaira, kathāda makhaoluira?
Iwui leikashena khāmong rarkhavaili apāng rapokta imalung malaokai.
Ipāngli myrrh ngaya̱mamānda, ipāngmarengli
myrrh thao ara̱mang eina iwui leikasheli shomi khavai,
khāmong rarkahai chi ina thuisinga.
Iwui leikasheli ina shomi,
kha ava thuihairasai.
Ana khamatui tharan ining shimānkida sai.
Ina ali phai, kha masamphangmana;
Ina ali hoi, kha ana mangahānkāmana.
Khamayonabingna keinungli yaozatlakha,
athumna ili samphanga;
athumna ili shaoda khamā za̱mi,
iwui kachonla ngapaithuihao,
phākho khamayonabing china.
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱bing, ina kahāngna,
iwui leikasheli theiakha;
ali kahāngmilu,
kaja I leishināhaira.
Nawui leikahena khangateiwui leikasheli khi mathākhamei lei,
O mathāmeikap kachiva̱?
Nawui leikashena khangateiwui leikasheli khi mathākhamei leida,
ithumli kachihamkhala?
Iwui leikashe chiya horchamrihai kala maiwon shokshuna,
thingtharāwui ngachaili ngateihanghai.
Akui mathāmeikap kaje sinā thai;
awui samnaola nganirlaga,
hangkhā thāda zika.
Amik ura̱pam ngalemli khalei nāsha̱nao thai,
seina̱ eina ra̱vaida charshuna,
Amaisor nganamkaphā thao lingkhavaipam thai.
Amorchaina myrrh ara̱ sikakhui timrāwonna.
Awui pāngthei hirā rukkasang sinā angumna.
Aphasā sapphire heikashān mafahāwui themsak thai.
Apheina sinātungli alabaster pākra̱ khaning kahai thai.
Awui azakna Lebanon thāda khamathā cedarthing kathāna.
Awui akhon shimmeithuiya,
kala tongda ningchang kapaimānga.
Hi iwui leikashena, iwui khavāknaona,
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱bing!
Sha̱naobingwui ngachaili mathāmeikap kajiva̱,
nawui leikashe kali vāhaokhala?
Nali ngasoda ithumna ali phākhavai,
nawui leikashe kachishong vāhaokhala ithumli hānglu.
Iwui leikashe awui yāmguili vāhaira,
balsamthing thuikhavai yāmguili.
Ana awui yaoshangli yāmguilungli phāshai ngasakta lei,
kala timrāwon ahekhaira.
I hi iwui leikashiawuina, kala a iwuina;
a awui yao timrāwon pamli hompama.
Iwui leikashiva̱, nava Tirzah thāda mathai,
Jerusalemwui ningshāt thai,
philān kasing raimi thāda khangachee azakna.
Iwui eina namik ngareithuihaolu,
kaja ili china vaishi ngasaka—
Nakuisam Gilead kaphungli me ashangva̱ kazat thai.
Nahāna, yaova̱bing anao makashuma,
khanini ngathānkazata ra̱vailaga kashok thai.
Namaisor kabothei ngakaipak kahai thai,
namai mairār alungli.
Awungva̱ hangtharuk, angashirva̱ hangchishat,
kala mashankharar ngalānao lei.
Iwui nāsha̱nao, iwui kākashungva̱,
ava̱va̱wui khalumva̱ akhamānga;
khangakhai makhaleiva̱na pharākhui.
Ngalānaobingna theilaga ali ringkaphāva̱ hoi;
awungva̱bing kala angashirva̱ ngarānala ali sosera.
“Ngathor kazingkathang kathāva̱,
kachāng thāda yangkhangaiva̱ zimik thāda kahorva̱,
raimi thāda sākashe philān kasinga kathāva̱ chi khipākhala?”
Ina theiga̱thei yāmguili vai,
tampākwui wonshivar yangkhavai,
drakhāthei ashon mashokphokhairakhala da,
kabothei mawonphokhairakhala da yangkhavai.
Ina khikha matheiranglakha,
wungnao akhali ngasoda,
siguigarili pamkharum iwui ningli machuka.
Latunglu; latunglu, O Shulamnao, latunglu, latunglu,
ithumna nali khayangkhuiga.
Raimi khani ngachaili pheichak kachak thāda,
khisāda Shulamnao chili yangrakhala?
Naphei pheihop teokha tongngayili O awungva̱ kathava̱!
khanguma nakhaishāng khanganee kathemana sākakhui chāra̱-chāsān thai.
Nahaitong drakhāra̱ mavatlak kaje khoramnaona,
nawukva timrāwonna kuinam kahai kehu mathun kahaina.
Nasungthei khanini chaonao khani,
ngashirkatā thai.
Nakahung mafahāwui dolan thai,
namikna Bath-rabbim ngaveiwui Heshbon ra̱khong thai.
Nanātāng Damascus ngashāntāp kaje Lebanonwui dolan thai.
Nakuina nali Carmel kaphung thāda ngahonmi,
nawui mengjin kahai kuisamna khanganaiya kachon thai;
Nawui sam theilaga awungala mayāmrarmana.
Na teokha ngatikrihaikhala,
O leikashiva̱, yangkhangaiva̱!
Asho-alep khaneirong mangatei!
Nasungthei khaneithei mazān mangapei!
Khaneirongli yakkāda ina aphāng kāyonkhuira da ina hānga.
Iyāvo, nasungthei che drakhāthei mazān mathāphalung!
kala nakhakkhā theithukthei khut mathāphalung,
nawui maya̱kakhui ahā eina morchaili nganaiyok eina mathāmeikap kaji drakhāra̱ longkatā thai.
I iwui leikashewuina,
kala awui malungkachāng ilina.
Rālu, iwui leikashe,
ini luili yaothuisa kala kha̱kha̱li zunvāsa;
ngathorthakva̱ drakhā yāmguili vāda ashon mashonhairakhala ayangsa;
drakhārong awon mangachakkhaihaira kala kabotheila mawonhairakhala?
Chili iwui leikashi nali chitheira.
Mandrake nganamphokhaira,
athei kadharla, kachamla athei shaikaphā saikora khāmongpheili iniwui vang ina kaziphaira,
O iwui leikashe.
Iyāvo na ipā thasalala,
ishava̱wui na̱ eina nganaokhuisālala!
Ina nali ayarli samphangsi kaje, ina nali maya̱khuira,
kala khipānakha ili mayangkharingmara.
Ina nali ishāva̱wui shimli,
kala ili vaikhui khavai kāli thanungra.
Ina nali nganamkaphā khamanata drakhāra̱ mangkhavai mira,
kabotheira̱la mimangra.
Iyavo, awui uipāngna ikuitungli yāpāngna ili vamsi kaja!
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱bing, ina kapona,
leikashi ningyāng maungranglakha makharākalu,
khamathotla mamathotalu.
lamhāngwui eina ungkharā awui leikasheli shaikazatvā chi khipākhala?
Theithuktheipamli ina nali mathotkhui.
Chili nava̱na naora̱sai,
nali pharākakhuiva̱ naora̱sai.
Napāngtheili mahor khanam thāda ili naningli namshanmilu;
kaja leikashi hi kathi thāda panga;
yuikashi chikhurwui sākashi thai.
Chi mei thāda chuishoka, sakashe meiwon thāda ngasheiya.
Tara̱ kachungkhana leikashiwui ra̱kachang mavānmirarmana,
tara̱ kaphongnala makheithuirarmana.
Mi akhana leikashiwui vang awui shimwui lan saikora ngatha̱sa jilala machāpmimara.
Izarva̱ kateona akha lei, ana̱ maokranga.
Izara̱li rākhangahān tharan ithum kathausikhala?
A phākho sāsāsi kaje,
lupāsāwui raipan sākhuira;
kha a khāmong sāsāsi kaje,
ithumna ali cedar chikhai eina romphinhaora.
I phākho sāsai, isungthei dolan thai;
chieina I awui mikyanli chingri kahai khuikharāva̱ thai.
Baal-hamonli Solomonwui drakhā yāmgui akha lei;
kala drakhā yāmgui khamasaali mihaowa;
athum ava̱va̱na atheiman lupāsā thingthing khuirāmiki kajina.
Iwui drakhā yāmgui, iwui chi,
I khalattawui vangna;
O Solomon, nana thingkha leilapai,
kala athei khamasābingna shākhani leilapai.
O yāmguili kapamana,
iwui ngasotnaobingna nakhon nganāli;
ili kashāngasakmilu.
Thaklu, iwui leikashiva̱,
seichuinao, chaovānao thāda nganamkaphā kaphungtungli.
Nganālu, O kazingram; nashunglu, O okathui;
kaja
“Ina nganaokhuida naomayarabing rarhaira,
kha athumna ili ngakaishiya.
Mukkāna awui akhavāli thei,
gadhāna akhavāwui khon shai;
kha Israelna matheimana,
iwui mibingna matheishingkhuimana.”
Iyavo, morei kaphunga yur,
khayonkhamāngna shiren kahai mibing,
makaphā kasābingwui naotun,
khamakhao otsak kasā naomayarabing!
Athumna
athumna Israelwui Katharapā chili ningkachaihaowa,
athum ma̱thuichaohaowa.
Nathumna ngakaishichinghaoda shaochingrala?
Kui kazānahaira,
kala ning thengchaohaira.
Pheimayā eina thuilaga kui kāshungda,
chili tāphi kahai maleilakmana;
kha khangahak kala khangator,
ashee kashok khamāmānga;
kasurla masurshok, kharomla marom,
arila maneomana.
Nathumwui ngalei ngachakyānghaira,
nathumwui keinungbingla meina chuitāmihaira;
nathumwui miktāli yangkashebingna nathumwui ngalei ngaponmihaira,
yangkashebingna yuihaida chi ngachakyānghaira.
Kala Zionwui naongalāva̱li drakhālui rāmrah thāda nothāhaira,
karoptheiwui luirām thāda,
kala ngaponthui kahai keinung thāda.
Sodom kathā kala Gomorrah kathā ngasāhairara.
Sodom ngalei khamunga nathum!
Ithumwui Varewui hāngkachithei nganālu,
Gomorrahwui mibing nathum!
da
Yaovābingwui rikkatā kachigat sānhaira kala keimathao kahai sha̱kei ina penhaira;
seiwui, yaowui, mevāwui ashee ina maningchāngmana.
“Nathumna khorum khavai iwui mangāli kharā tharan,
khipāna nathumli hikatha hi khuiphungda iwui yāngkhupli rākārsanglu jikhala?
Makānkhana kachigat makhuirāluilu;
nganamkaphā ot ile ningkachai.
Chāngwok phanit, sabbath khamayon, yarui kakazip,
makaphā makhayāwui phanitphanao chili ina maja̱mirarmana.
Nathumwui changwok kala nathumwui retkahai phanit phanaobing iningna yangkharinga;
chibing chi iwui kharita otphun ngasāhaira,
I phungsānhaira.
“Nathumna pāng phayaikashok tharan,
imik nathumwui eina thumhaora;
nathumna seihā kachungkha sālala,
ina manganāsangmara;
nathumwui pāng asheemānga.
Nathum khalatta pheohaolu; nathum khalatta samathākhuilu;
nathumna sāda khalei makaphā otsak chi imikwui eina khuithuihaolu;
makaphā kasā thāhaolu.
Kaphā kasā tamkhuilu,
mashun phālu,
rekakharek mashungkhuilu,
avāva̱ makhaleibingli ngākmilu,
ra̱meinaowui vang phayatmilu.”
“Ralu, ithum bhab tāda ngazekrumkhuisa,
da
nathumwui morei hungpinghailala,
horam thāda charshihaora;
ashee thāda hungshihailala,
sāhāh kachar thāhaora.
Nathumna mayāngaida kahāng nganaakha,
ngalei chiwui kaphā athei shaira;
Kha nathumna mamayāmada ngakaishiakha,
raighai shaira;
kaja
Ningtongda shitkasanga keinung chi kathāda khayorva̱̱ sha̱nao ngasāhaokhala,
mashuna kapemva̱ chi!
Khamashung khangarong ali ngasāmkhuisai,
kha ara khayumabingmānghaira.
Nathumwui lupāsa maripai sāthuiserhaira,
drakhāra̱la tara̱ manāthaira.
Nathumwui wungnaobing ngakaikashe
kala khalebingwui ngasotnaona.
Mi kachiva̱na pheizā ningchānga,
kala khalem eina khamili kharomzata.
Avāva̱ makhaleibingli manganingmimana,
kala ra̱meiva̱wui kasakli mayangsangmimana.
Chiwui vang eina
Israelwui Pangshapa china hānga,
“Ah, iwui malungkhavāt iwui yangkashibingwuitungli tāraphalung,
kala iwui pheiva̱bingli I khalattana athut ha̱ngsangra.
Ipāng nathumwui shong khareiungra
kala reti eina maripai kashutkor kahai thāda,
nathumli khamanāt chi sāmathākhuira.
Kharewui thāda nathumwui bicharwobing hanmiluira,
hāngkachitheibingla haokaphokwui thāda mira.
Naoda nathumli khamashung khangarongwui keinung hora,
ningtongda shitkasang keinung jira.”
Zionli mashun eina ngatangkhuira,
kala chili khaleibingna khangarong eina ningngateiakha ngatangkhuira.
Kha ngakaikashebing eina morei kaphungbing ngarumda shimān ngasakra,
kala
Kaja nathumna ningmachānkasā shirimthing chiwui vang kakhayak samphangra,
nathumna kapangkhui kahai yāmgui chiwui vang khayāmalāra.
Kaja nathum thingnah ngahui kahai shirimthing thāra,
kala tara̱ makhalei yāmgui thāra.
Kala kapanga chi khara̱rong ngasāhaora,
awui otsak meipā thāra;
kala khanini chuirumda sāshimitmi khavai khipakha maleisamara.
Amozwui naomayara Isaiahna Judah eina Jerusalemwui pongli kathei tuina.
phungreibingwui ngachaili juimeikap kaje phungrei sāda sākāra;
kala phungrābingwuitungli juimeira;
kala yur saikora chili longsangra,
kala yur kachungkhana rāda hāngra:
“Ralu, ithum
Jacobwui Varewui shimli kāsa;
chieina ana ithumli awui apong tamchitheida ithumna awui shongfali zatra.”
Kaja Zionwui eina ain chi shokra,
kala
kala miyur kachungkhawui vang tuikup khuirāmira;
kala athumwui raighai tin sākhuihaora,
kazei chi khainao sākhuihaora;
miyur akhana yur khangatei akhali rai masāmara,
rai khavā kaho matamluimara.
O Jacobwui shimkhur,
rālu,
Kaja nawui mibing, Jacobwui shimkhurli nana makhuisangthuwa,
khikhalajila athum zingshoshongwui meowor khamachutabingna pema,
Philistinenaobing thāda khanongbingmānga;
kala athumna yur kateili ngashikta ot sai.
Athumwui ngaleili sina eina lupāsana pemtinghai,
kala athumwui lan chi kakān mavaimana;
athumwui ngalei siguina pema,
kala awui siguigari shānla makhuimana.
Athumwui ngalei meoma̱na pemtinghai;
