athumwui pāng eina sākakhui,
pāngmareng eina sākhui kahai ot chili athumna ngakhumsangda khoruma.
Chithāda mili maishi ngasaka,
kala ngazan ngasaka athumli mapheomialu!
kala awui shingam chiwui tekhamatei eina lungharlungli yāmsangda,
chifali ngathumhaolu.
Mibingwui ngamsor kahai mikyanli nemngasakra,
mibingwui langkasoli maishi ngasakra;
chithanghon
Kaja lāngkaso kala masosei kahai,
mina lumkakā kala khāngkachikata athumli saikorawui
masosei kaphora Lebanonwui cedarthing saikorali makhamayā;
Bashanwui shirimthing saikorali makhamayā;
kajuia phungrei saikora;
masosei kahai phungrā saikorali;
dolan kajui kachiva̱li,
khangazipa raipan kachiva̱li;
Tarshishwui marikhong saikora,
kala khamathā pāngthem saikoralila.
Hiksor kahai mili maishi ngasakra,
miwui langkaso ning nemta ngasakra;
chithang
Meoma̱ saikora shimānserhaora.
Kala okathuina ngachee khavai
awui khangachee-khangachā chiwui eina,
awui shingam tekhamatei chiwui eina,
mibingna lunghārwui akhurli yāmsangra,
ngaleikhurli yāmngathumra.
Chithanghon athumna khorum khavai athum khalattana sākakhui lupāsāwui meoma̱,
sināwui meoma̱bing chi,
kafabing kala kongharbingli hormihaora;
okathuina ngachee khavai
awui khangachee-khangachā chiwui eina,
awui shingamwui tekhamatei chiwui eina,
lungharbingwui akhurli,
kala amaitarenwui akhur-akhaili yāmngathumra.
Nātangkhurli khaksui khalei mi chiwui eina yāmlu,
kaja awuili kānkhanā khi leikhala?
Kaja yanglu,
Judah eina Jerusalemwui nganing khavai,
ngazung khavai, kashakazā samphang khavai,
tara̱ samphang khavai;
kapinga mi eina raimila,
bichar kasaa eina marānla,
kazei kazanga eina khararnaola,
hangphangāwui raithāna eina khangamala,
machinme eina laivā kathemala,
kala mitrang kathemabingla khuithuihaora.
Kala ina mayarnao naoshinaobingli wungnao sāngasakra,
kala angangnaobingna athumwuitungli mungra.
Mibing akha eina akha rekharek ngarokra,
ngasotnao eina ngasotnaola,
khongnainao eina khongnainaola;
khanuinaona khararnaoli,
khangazanala khangamali machāpmimara.
Avāva̱wui shimkhurli mi akhana,
achināli singkhuida, “Na nawui ngavai lei,
nana ithumwui kathāna sāra,
kala tek-kaida shiman kahai saikora hi nawui azingli leira”
da hānga;
chithanghon ana matuishokta, hāngra:
“I raikhame masāmara;
iwui shimli kashakazāla;
kashan-kachonla maleimana;
nathumna ili mibingwui kathāna masā ngasakpaimara.”
Kaja Jerusalem phei ngaphokhaira,
kala Judah kongluihaira;
khikhalajila athumwui tuimatui,
kala otsak
ana tekmateida khaleipam chili athumna ngaruka.
Athumwui mimai khayang china chitheida lei;
athumwui morei Sodomwui thada vaomalānzata,
athumna chi thumkahai maleimana.
Athumli kakhanang ngasaranu!
Kaja athum khalattana athumwuitungli kashi
Khangarongabingwui vanga,
kaphā ngasāra da hānglu
kaja athumwui otsak athishurda athumna kazā samphangra.
Makhayāli kakhanang ngasāranu!
Awui vang kakhanang ngasāra,
kaja apāng eina sākahai thāda alila sāmira.
Iwui mibingwui - naoshinaobingna athumwui rekakharekana,
kala sha̱naobingna athumli munga.
O iwui mibing, nathumwui kathānabingna nathumli thannguiya,
kala nathumwui shongfawui apong masho ngacheimiya.
Kharar khavai
awui mili bichar sākhavai nganingdalei.
Khararnaobing eina wungnaobingli ngasoda
“Drakhā yāmgui sākakathāna chi nathumna,
kachāmbingwui ngaponkakhui chi nathumwui shimli lei.
Iwui yurbingli kashiren khi kakhalatkhala?
Kachāmbingwui mai nurkakazam hi khi kakhalatkhala?”
da saikorawui
Khikhalajila Zionwui naongalava
ngarāna hiksorsor, kui khalekta yaothuizata,
kakhayak maleila mik thekzata,
pheikār kashut kaseoda zata;
kala
Chithanghon
unra̱, kazao, khungnei kachon;
pāsi, hār, sihup, thao oko, ahaikhong,
shoikhutop, nātang-ngathet,
phanit kachon, katuma phahon, pāngkhao,
kala kalāra̱ngayot, khamanaka sāribing, kuihon kala kachonbing ngapaithuiserhaora.
Nganamkaphāwui mahutli kashuikhanām;
shānneira̱wui mahutli khara̱;
sam sekkazak kahaiwui mahutli kui khangai;
khamathā kashan-kachonwui mahutli bora;
khamathawui mahutli kakhayak ngasāra.
Nathumwui yaronnaobing raighai eina thira,
nathumwui kapingabing raili yumra.
Awui ngaveina sifada chapngachāra kala ngachakyānghaora;
ana ngaleitungli pamra.

Chithang sha̱nao shinina mayarnao akha ngakhunkhuida hāngra, “Ithumna ithumwui kashakazā zāra, ithumwui kashankachon ngavaira; ithumwui khayākhamala khuithui khavaiwui vangmāng naming eina theikhuingasakmilu.”
Kala Zionli nothāhaida Jerusalemli pamkahaibing, Jerusalemli mirin peidawui ming chankahaibing;
Zionwui naongalava̱ ngarāwui khamakhao
Chiwui thili Zion kaphung kuimareida kala chiwui ngalemli khalei saikora chiwuitungli ngashunshong muiyā akha kala ngayāshong meikhut kala kahora meiwon akha
China ngashun kasāwui eina khayinmi khavai, kala siphan zingrotwui eina ngayinkhui khavaina.
Iwui leikashena ngalei katum kaphungtungli drakhā yāmgui akha leisai.
Ana chi changa kala chiwui lungguibing hāshokserhailaga,
drakhāthei khamathā yur lingsanga;
chiwui alungli ana tārong akha sai;
kala chili vaichum akhala khonhai;
kala ana athei khamathei honpama,
kha ramwui samkāngra̱thei matheihaowa.
Chieina ara, O Jerusalemwui ramnaobing,
kala Judahwui mibing;
athei yāmgui iniwui ngachaili bichar sāmilu.
Iwui yāmgui hili ina sāphalungki kaji khi makasā leikhala?
Ina drakhāthei matheira da yangpamlaga,
khi sāthuda ramwui samkāngra̱thei khamatheikhala?
Ara iwui yāmguili ina khi sarakhala kaji ina nathumli hangga.
Chiwui ngaveithing ina pheihaora,
kala chi sākathānhaora;
chiwui phākho ina sākhailaga chi naikazamhaora.
Ina chi rampho ngasakra;
aphāng makatatmimara,
kachangla machangmimara,
kala phānāng eina ka̱shāt kharshokra;
muiyālila chiwuitungli kazing marotaalu da ina kasora.
Kaja saikorawui
kala Judahwui mibing yangkhangai akharna;
ana mashun phai,
kha yanglu, ashee katāmāng;
khangarong phai,
kha yanglu, chapkhangachā samphang!
Apam mangaziranglakha eina tangda,
shim pharonsangmamān kaje,
lui ngarumsangmamān kaje,
lam chili nathummāng pamra da kasā athumli kakhanang ngasāranu!
Saikorawui
“Kachangkhat eina shim kachungkha ngachakyānghaora,
kahaka kala khamathāthā shimbing mi mapānmara.
Drakhā yāmgui acre tharāwui eina liter chishatmāng khuira,
kala theimaji shungkhana khuilukhamāng khuira.”
Ngathorthakva̱ zamshei thuikaphābing,
zingyinlam eina tangda kakharombing zamna phasā maminranglakha eina tangda kakhanang ngasāranu!
Athumna morkasongli lyre, tingteilā,
kortar, kala sipa̱la zam eina ngasoda singa,
kha athumna
awui pāngna sākahai otbing mayangsangmana.
Chiwui vang eina iwui mibingna theikakhui khavātwui vang raithā kahaina;
athumwui khayākakābing kakhum eina thiki jihaira,
kala athumwui mibing ra̱kachangna kaorenghaira.
Chiwui vang Kathewui ramwui kathai mataisanghaira;
kala khamorla mangatamkharar sāda makātaranga,
kala Jerusalemwui khangamkhareibing,
kala awui yarui katonga,
awui mibing kala ali kasobing chili tāzangaa.
Mikumoli mashunzangda, mai shingasaka,
kala hiksor kahaibingli khayak ngasaka.
Kha saikorawui
kala Kathara Varena khangarong lungli tharchithei.
Chiwui thili athumwui seihomphungli yaobingna phākashai thāda chili phāshaira,
keikhamathao kala yaonaobingna ngayāng kahai chiwui alungli phāshaira.
Mikhanamwui khara̱ eina khayonkhamāng ngakhun kakhuibing,
morei seipeng eina hokkakhuibing kakhanang ngasāranu,
athumna hānga, “Ali thākngasaklu,
ithumna theikhavai awui ot kasā chi thākngasaklu;
Israelwui Katharapa chiwui kharin chi rānganairanu,
kala chi rāranu ithumna theikhavai”
Kashili kaphā ho, kaphāli kashi
kahorli tangkhamang sā, tangkhamangli kahor sā,
kashimwui vang kakhā sangkhame,
kakhāwui vang kashim sangkhamebing kakhanang ngasaranu!
Khalatta thangmeiada kaphaningbing,
ngakaishitingting kahaibing,
kakhanang ngasāranu!
Zam khamang kapangbing,
zamshei manātkhamangli malung kapingbing,
khayonali pheizā khuilaga chiho kahai,
kala khayon makhalei mili athumwui samphangrān masamphang khangasak athum chi
kakhanang ngasāranu.
Meiwonna mafakung chuikatā thāda,
kala khawo katheng meili kashimān thāda,
athumwui angayung shuihaora,
athumwui awon chifa sāthuihaora,
kaja athumna saikorawui
kala Israelwui Katharapawui tuili ningkachaihaowa.
Chiwui vang eina
kala ana awui pāng katingvāda athumli shaowa;
kala phungreibingna nganuka;
kala athumwui kathinguna shongfa kachida thothap horkahai thai.
Saikora hiwui vang awui malungkhavāt chi masuitāranga,
kala awui pāng arui eina tangda katingdalei.
Katāva̱li khalei yur akhali ana machut chitheira,
kala okathui akatangawui eina masikhon eina hokhuira;
kala yanglu, ngalāngda thaklāk eina rai!
Khipākha makhanangmana,
khipākha phei mangaphokmana,
khipākha masingutmana,
kapila mapivāmana,
shānneira̱la mangachomana,
pheihop khara̱la machatmana,
athumwui malāthing zanlaka,
malāthing saikora hunhaira,
athumwui siguisho lunghaila thai,
kala athumwui kāngpheina sur kakhaning thai.
Athumwui khon kazingkha̱ kakhangang thai,
kazingkha̱nao thāda khanganga;
athumna nirda sāshai tukshai,
tukthuihaida khipānakha mangapaikhuirarmana.
Yirei khangaphaokhon thāda chithanghon athumna chiwuitungli nirrāra.
Kala kachikathāna ngalei kathengli yangakha tangkhamang eina kakhanang theira;
kala kahor chi chiwui muiyāna tangmangphinhaora.
Awunga Uzziah thikum, juilak eina khāngchikat kahai wungpamkhong akhali
Awui atungli seraphimbing chi nganinga; ava̱va̱na angachāng tharukrip kai; khani eina amai fakhama, khani eina aphei fakhama kala khani eina ana yonga.
Akhana akhali hongarokta hānga:
“Kathara, kathara, kathara chi
saikorawui
okathui tongda awui tekhamateina pema.”
Chieina ina hānga, “Iyavo I kalākashi! I shimānchaohaira; kaja iva morchai makathar mina, kala morchai makathar miwui ngachaili okthuida lei; kala imikna saikorawui Awunga
Chiwui thili seraphim akhana apāngli changjee eina hanphutwui meithā akha singlaga pairai.
Kala ana ikhamorli sāza̱da hānga: “Yanglu, hina namorchaili saza̱haira; kala nawui khayon khuithuimihaira, kala nawui morei pheomihaira.”
Kala
Kala ana hānga, “Vada mibing hili hānglu:
‘Shāshāhaira, kha makhuisangmana;
theitheihaira, kha mamachukhuimana.’
Mibing hiwui wuklung thaongasaklu,
kala athumwui khanā ritngasaklu,
mik khamimihaolu;
athumwui mik eina theihaipaishina,
kala athumwui khanā eina shāhaipaishina,
kala athum wuklung eina theikhuida ning ngateida kharai samphanghaipaishina.”
Chieina ina “O
da ngahāna.
Chieina ana hānga,
“Keinungbing mi maleila maramphoranglakha,
kala shimli mi mangavāla kala lam chi ngachakyāng majichaoranglakha eina tangda,
kala
kala apam chili horkahai lam kachungkha maleiraranglakha eina tangda.
Kala akhum tharāwui akha chi leisalala chila chuitaluihaora,
terebinth lah shirimthing thāda,
ta̱tek kahai tharan angunrummang nganingda khalei thara.”
Kathara atha chi angunrum china.
Davidwui shimkhurli, “Syria eina Ephraim ngashikhaira,” da kahāng eina awunga eina awui mibing masili thingrongbing khanganuk thāda kathirhaowa.
Kala
kala ali hānglu, kahāng nganālu, kasaikha pamlu, mangacheealu, kala Rezinwui, Syriawui kala Remaliah naomayarawui malungkhavāt, meira̱hun kachui khani chiwui vang ning mashimānhaialu.
Khikhalajila Syriana Ephraim eina Remaliahwui naomayarali ngasoda nali makaphā sākhavai ngaranda hānga,
“Ithum Judahli shangsa kala ali sāmachitsa, ithumna yuikhui khavai sāsa, kala Tabe-elwui naomayarali awunga sāngasaksa.”
Proho VAREna hānga,
chithāda mashokmara,
ungkashungla maungshung mara.”
Kaja Syriawui akui Damascusna,
kala Damascuswui akui Rezinna.
(Zingkum hangtharukta phangāwui alungli Ephraim ngayānghaora chieina miyur akha mangasāluimara).
Ephraimwui akui Samariana,
kala Samariawui akui Remaliahwui naomayarana.
“Nana mashitsangakha, kachangkhat na manganingrarmara.”
“Nawui
Kha Ahazna, “Ina machutkakhui mapomara, kala ina
Chieina Isaiahna hānga, “Chieina nganālu, O Davidwui shimkhur! Mibingli khanang khangasak chi mashapmada iwui Varelila khanang ngasakki kajila?
Chiwui vang eina
Ana kashi-kaphā kapangkhuikathei tharan, seina̱ akhan eina khuira̱ zāra.
Kaja nao china makaphāli makhamayā, kala kaphā makapangkhuitheiranglakha eina tangda nathumna ngacheeda khalei awunga khaniwui ngalei chi ramchohaora.
Assyriawui awunga Ephraimna Judahwui eina pākthui kahaiwui eina thuilaga mashoklakrang kaji atam akha nathumwuitungli, nathumwui mibingwuitungli, kala nashāvāwui shimkhurwuitungli khuirāra.”
“Chitharan Egyptwui kong khamorli khalei hāchāng kala Assyria ngaleili khalei khui
Kala athum saikora, kongrā kathuthukli, lunghārwui amaitarenli, ka̱shāt kashoshok pamli kala seihomphungli rāpamserra.
“Chitharan kong makānda khalei Assyria awungawui eina kuisighainao masākhuilaga kuila, pheihāla, morhāla sikoktāmihaora.
“Chitharan mi akhana simuknao akha kala yao khani kharing eina keisāra;
kala chiwui eina seina̱ mavātla samkaphangwui vang ana seina̱khan zāra; kaja lam chili nothā kahai mi kachiva̱na seina̱khan eina khuira̱ zāra.
“Chitharan lupāsā thingthingwui man drakhārong thingthing leikasā yāmgui kachiva̱ phānāng eina ka̱shātna pemhaora.
Mibingna malāthing eina kachākthing singlaga sā rengra; kaja, ngalei saikora phānāng eina ka̱shātna pemhaora.
Kala tin eina lui vāsangkasā kaphung saikora chi phānāng eina ka̱shatli khangacheewui vang nathum marāmara, kha sha̱kei chihosang khavai kala yao hompam khavai apam ngasāhaora.”
Kala iwui vang nganingmi khavai shitsangkapai shākhi khani, pāngmon Uriah eina Jeberechiahwui naomayara Zechariah samphanga.
Kala ina marānva̱li angasoi, kala ana nao vaida mayarnao akha pharai. Chiwui thili
kaja nao china ‘Ava̱’ lah ‘Avā’ da mahotheiranglakha Damascuswui lan kala Samariawui ngaponkakhui chi Assyriawui awungawui mangāli khuivāhaora.”
“Khikhalajila chingri eina khalonga Shiloahwui tara̱ mibing hina khalanhaowa, kala Rezin eina Remaliahwui naomayarawui mangāli khangacheena menga;
chiwui vang eina yanglu,
kala china Judahli phongshilongvāra, phongshilongvāda akahung eina tangda kāshungra; kala chiwui angachāng hārkashok china nawui ngalei aret pemra, O Immanu-el.”
Ngayānghaolu, mibing nathum, kala ning suitāhaolu;
nganālu, katāva̱li khalei ngalei nathum;
raisāri shaksākhuilaga maishihaolu;
raisāri shaksākhuilada maishihaolu.
Ngasanngarumlu, kha china khikha mashokmara;
tui akha matuilu, kha kakhalat maleimara;
kaja
Kaja
“Mibingna mithit khalentui khamatui da kaho chili mithit khalentui khamatui da maholu, kala athumna khangachee chili ning chipāda khangacheela mangacheelu.
Kha saikorawui
Kala ana katharapam ngasāda, nganingkakham lunggui, Israelwui shimkhur khaninili phei ngaphok khavai lunghar, kala Jerusalemwui mibingli mankhavai khalen ngasāra.
Kachungkhana chili ngaphokra; kongluida kaikazamhaora; athumli khalen sangda khuithuihaora.”
Pao hi kazipkhuilu, iwui sākhangatha̱bingwui alungli tamkachithei hi mahor namhaolu.
Jacob shimkhurwui eina mai thumhaida khalei
Yanglu, ila kala
Kala athumna, “Kapumkakaseowa kazei kazangbingli kala khanongbingli ngasanlu” jiakha, miyur akhana athumwui Vareli mangasan ngayimala? Kharingbingli maningla kathebingli ngasanrala?
Tamkachithei kala shākhili yanglu! Athumna matuida khalei tui chili zingthan maleimana.

Athumna chotlak eina kala thailak eina ngalei chi kānvara; kala athumna thaikahai tharan, athumna malungvātshunhaora kala athumwui awunga eina Vareli khonshira, kala athumwui mai atungshong ngareikāra;
kala athumna okathuili yangra, kha yanglu, kachotmāng, tangkhamangmāng, sipkasāwui khangamimāng theira; kala athumli ngamiting kahai chili horsang haora.
tangmangting kahai ramli okthuikasabing, athumwuitungli kahor hormihaira.
Nana miyur chili mayāsang ngasakhaira,
athumwui ringkaphā nana mataisangmihaira.
Mā kahātli ringkaphā thāda,
ngaponkakhui ot khangayar tharan mibingna ringkaphā thāda,
athumna nawui mangāli mathāna.
Kaja, awui otphun kashai,
awui yārtuili parkahai khāmshui,
ali rekakharekawui lijei,
Medenaowui atamwui thāda nana sātekmihaira.
Kaja raiwui khonkazarli naikazamzat khavai
raikapingawui pheihop kachiva̱,
kala ashee neokahai kashankachon kachiva̱,
meiwui vang thing kharik thāda riktāhaora.
Kaja, ithumli nao akha pharāmihaira,
ithumli naomayara akha mihaira;
kala shorkar ana phungra,
kala awui ming,
“Matakkhakkahai Machinme,
Pangshapa Vare,
Katangmakhavai Avāva̱,
Chingrikahai Wungnao” da hora.
kala chingri kahai katang maleimara,
Davidwui wungpamkhongtungli kala awui wungramtungli, chi semkā khavai,
kala chi mashun eina ngasoda kala khangarong eina ngasoda arui atam eina thuida katang mavaila leichingra.
Saikorawui
kala china Israelwuitungli horngasakra;
kala mi saikorana theira,
Ephraim kala Samariali kapambing,
lāngkaso kala khayāning khanganing tui khamatui athumna hithāda hānga:
“Chekbing minkhaihaira,
kha ithumna shānkakhui lungguibing eina sākāra;
sycamorethingbing ta̱tekmihaira;
kha chibingwui mahut cedarthing sangra.”
Chiwui vang
kala athumwui yangkashebingli malung thuingasaka.
Zingshoshong Syrianaobingna,
zingtunshong Philistinenaobingna khamor makāda Israelli mayuisanghaowa.
Saikora hiwui vang awui malungkhavāt mavānranga,
kala awui pāng katingchingda lei.
Mibingna athumli kashaowa chili malatungmana;
kala saikorawui
Chiwui vang
khaneirong eina titi thangkhali katatshata—
arara kala khayākakāpā chi akuina,
kala kakapik tamkachitheia marān chi akhameina;
Kaja mibing hili kathānbingna athumli thānnguihaowa,
kala thānthui kahai athumli mayuisanghaira.
Chiwui vang athumwui yaronnaobingwuitungli
ningyāngkhaung maleimana;
kala avāva̱ makhalei eina ra̱meinaobingwuitungli lukhamashan maleimana;
kaja mi kachiva̱ dharma maleimana;
makaphā kasā misera;
khamor kachiva̱na mangkhama̱ tui matui.
Saikora hiwui vang awui malungkhavāt mavānranga;
kala apāng katingchingda lei.
Kaja makaphā makhayā mei thāda chui,
phānāng eina ka̱shāt chuitai;
ngahong kashāshā thottai;
kala meikhut atang eina khaluikai.
Ashangva̱wui
kala mibing meiwui vang thing thai;
khipānakha achināli mashākhaimana.
Athumna yāshong takkhui, kha thaichinga;
uishong mayuisang kha kapen masamphangmana;
athum kachiva̱ khongnainaowui asā yonshaiya.
Manasseh Ephraim, kala Ephraim Manasseh ngarumda Judahli mamayāmana.
Saikora hiwui vang awui malungkhavāt mavānranga;
kala awui pāng katingching dalei.
Khayona tui yonda bichar sakhamebing,
rekharek khavai kapida khalei kakapebing,
khavātabingli mashunwui eina ngareithui khangasakbing,
kachāma iwui mibingli athum mashunwui eina namkazābing,
ra̱meinao athumwui ngaponzā khavai kasābing,
kala avāva̱ makhaleibingwui eina takzā khavai kasābing,
kakhanang khonkashi ngasaranu!
Katāva̱wui eina siphan zingrotwui alungli tandi mikhavai,
rāki kaji zimikshothang nathum khi sāra?
Ngachonmi khavai khipāli yāmvāra,
kala nathumwui lan kali nothāhaora?
Phātop kazangnaobingli ngarumda khangayum maningla,
sāthat kahaibingwui ngachaili pitākharum maningla khikha sākhavai maleimana.
Saikora hiwui vang awui malungkhavāt mavānranga;
kala awui pāng katingchingda lei.
I malung thuikhavaiwui khāmshui!
vare makathei yur akhali ina ali chihovai,
kala ina malungkhavāta mibingwuitungli ina ali kasoi,
ngaponkhui khavai, kuinamkhui khavai,
kala chānreiwui leipā thāda naikazam khavai.
Kha ana chithāda mangarānmana;
awui ningna chithāda maphaningmana;
kha awui ningli sāshimān khavai lei,
kateokha maningla yur saikorali katat khavai.
Kaja ana hānga:
“Iwui kathānabing awunga maningsermala?
Calno hi Carchemish mathāmala?
Hamathla Arpad mathāmala?
Samariala Damascus mathāmala?
Jerusalem eina Samariawuili hakkhamei meoma̱wui wungrambing chili ipāngna vākashung thāda,
Samaria eina awui meoma̱binglila kasā thāda,
Jerusalem eina chiwui meoma̱bingli ina masāmarala?”
Kaja ana hānga:
“Ipangwui yāng eina kala iwui thangkhamei eina ina chi sākāhaisera;
kaja ina theishingkakhui lei;
Ina yurbingwui thari phurshokmihaira,
kala athumwui lanbingla sākathānmihaira;
wungpamkhongli kapambingli ina mukkā khuikatā thada khuitāhaira.
Vanaothip thāda ipāngna yurbingwui lan samphanghaira;
kala horhaikasā ara̱bing mina ngamuikakhui thāda ina okathui saikora kazipkhuihaira;
angachāng khangatha̱ khipākha mazangmana,
khamorla mamakā; kakhongla makhongmana.”
Ngahāna thing kata̱pali langsoda matuipairala
kala horaina ali kasingapali reimeipairala?
Khāmshuina singkazatpali singtha̱ga kaji thāda;
kala mipali khāmshuina khāngkāra kaji kathāna.
Chiwui vang saikorawui
kala awui tekhamatei lungli mei chuira.
Israelwui kahor chi mei ngasāhaora,
kala awui Katharapā chi meiwon ngasāhaora,
kala china ka̱shātla, phānāngla,
thangkha chuitup tāhaora.
Awui ngahongwui tekhamatei kala ngalei katum
phasā manglā khanini,
kakazā mina kaokhangai kakao thāhaora.
Awui ngahongthing kateokhamāng shākhaida,
naoshinao akhana shānkhuishapra.
Chitharan Israelwui shākkahai kala Jacob shimkhurwuili ringkasa china athumli kashaopa chili mashailuimara; kha Israelwui Kathara
Jacobwui shākkahai, shākkahaia chi pangshapa Vareli latungra.
Kaja nawui Israel mibing shamadruwui situi yākhalala, shākkahai kateokhamāng latungra. Shimān ngasakra kaji hāngtāhaira, khamashung khangarong eina pemtha̱ra.
Kaja kaso kahai athishurda
Chiwui vang eina
Kaja atam kasha̱kha leilaga iwui malungkhavāt vānhaora, kala iwui malungkhavāt chi athumwui shimān khavai ngasāra.
Kala saikorawui
Chitharan awui otphun kharit chi nathum yartuiwui eina ngavātāhaora, kala awui kashai nathumwui akahungwui eina sāshathaora.”
A Aiathli rāshunghaira;
a Migron kānvāhaira,
Michmashli awui otrom kaziphai.
Athumna makān khavai chi kānhaira,
Gebali thang ngayākhawui vang ngasāma;
Ramahna nganuka,
Saulwui Gibeah yāmhaira.
Pangmeida vaolu,
O Gallimwui naongalāva̱!
Nganālu, O Laishah!
Ali ngahānkālu, O Anathoth!
Madmenah yāmzatta lei,
Gebimli kapambing kalā mashi khavai yāmura.
Aja hi ana Nobli ngasāmra,
Ana apāng ngashumda khanukra Zion naongalāva̱wui kaphung Jerusalemwui kaphungli.
Yanglu,
Juimatailak kahaibing chi ta̱tāhaora,
kala khamashona chi nemtā ngasakra.
Ngahong kashāshā chi ana ngahā eina tangtāhaora,
kala Lebanonwui khayā kakā thingbingla pithui haora.
kala angayungbingwui eina aphāng akha shokra.
thangkhamei eina theishingkakhuiwui manglāna;
machinkhami eina pangshapwui manglāna,
awor eina
Kala awui ringkaphā chi
Awui mik eina kathei chieina bichar masāmara,
kala khanā eina kashā chieina tuilep makhuimara.
kala okathuiwui malung khanimbingli mashun eina tāzakta machukmira,
kala okathuili awui khamorwui lijei eina ngaphitra,
kala amorchaiwui khaksui eina makaphā makhayābing chili sāthatra.
ningkatongna awui kashān khalap khavai sāra.
kala kuirāngna menaoli ngasoda pira;
seinao, kazingkha̱, kala keikhamathao sha̱kei homrumra,
kala kateowa naoshinao akhana athumli thānra.
Simuk eina singom phazārumra;
athumwui naobing pirumra; kala
kazingkha̱na mukkā thāda lanji shaira.
Na̱ mangda khalei angangnaona phara̱khur ngalemli ngareora,
kala na̱ reikahai naona phara̱khurli pāng thara̱sangra.
kaja shamadru tara̱na kachipem thāda,
Chitharan Assyriali, Egyptli, Pathrosli, Ethiopiali, Elamli, Shinarli, Hamathli kala shamadrupheiwui ngalemli shākkahaibingli kazipkhuiluishit khavai
Miyurbingwui vang machut khavai ana akha shokngasakra;
Israelwui ngakhei kahaibing chili kazipkhuira,
Judahwui ngapha̱yāng kahaibing chili kazipkhuira,
okathui achikun matiwui eina.
Ephraimwui mikpaikashi chi pākthuihaora,
kala Judahli rekakharekbing chi katathaora,
Ephraimna Judahli mamikpaishimara,
kala Judahna Ephraimli marekharekmara.
Kha anina zingtunshong Philistinenaobingwui yārtui tungli yongrorra;
kala anina ngarumda zingshoshongwui mibingli ngaponra.
Anina Edom eina Moabli makhamayā pāng parra;
kala Ammonnaobingna aniwui kahāng nganāra.
Kala Egypt shamadruwui male
kala Kong chiwuitungli apāng khayitra awui sākhamatai masi eina ra̱shong shini shokngasakta chieina mibingna kathengli kānpaira.
Nothā kahai awui mi shākkahaibing chiwui vang,
Egyptwui eina kashok tharan Israel wui vang chanrei sākhami thāda,
Assyriawui eina chanrei akha sāmira.
Chithang nana hāngra:
“O
kaja ili nana malungvātsālala nawui malungkhavāt ngalanthuihaowa,
kala nana ili ninglum ngasaka.
ina shitsangda mangacheemara;
kaja
kala ana iwui huikhame ngasāhaira.
Khamathān eina ngasoda nana huikhami ra̱khongwui eina tara̱ sokkhuira.”
Kala chithanghon nana hāngra:
awui otsak yurbingli chitheilu,
awui mingkhamayāng vaomalānlu.
kaja ana tekmateilak eina sāhaira;
okathui saikorali hi theingasaklu;
Vaolu kala khamathānwui vang laa sālu,
O Zionli kapambing,
kaja nathumwui alungli Israelwui Kathara chi hakmahālaka.”
Ngaiphui kahai kaphung akhali machut khavai akha sālu,
athumli panglāk eina vaolu;
khangambingwui ngaveili zangkhavai athumli pāng yaplu.
Iwui tharchigat kahaibingli I khalattana kasohaira;
iwui malungkhavāt chithei khavai iwui kapangabingli hohaira;
iwui maikhayāli khamathānabing.
Nganālu, mi kachungkhawui khon thāda phungreitungli ngurngur kahai chi!
Nganālu, wungrambingwui khonkazar chi;
miyurbingwui kazip khangarum chi!
Saikorawui
Athum ngalei katāva̱wui eina rai,
kazingram akatangwui eina,
okathui tongda shimān ngasak khavai.
Chapngachālu, kaja
Sāshap-pangshapawui eina sākashimān rāra!
Chiwui vang saikorawui pāng tāta̱haora;
mi kachiva̱wui ning shimānhaora,
athum malung ringhaora.
Khangashei eina kachotna athumli yuira;
sha̱nao naokhara̱ thāda chotra.
Athum akha eina akha chipāda yang ngarokra,
athumwui mai hungpinghaora.
Yanglu,
sākashi, malungkhavāt eina malung thuilak kahai eina ngasoda,
okathui ngachakyāng ngasakhaida,
chiwui alungli khalei morei kaphungbing shimān ngasak khavai.
athumwui kahor mamimara;
zimikna kashok tharan tangmangra,
kala kachāngna awui kahor machishotmara.
Apuk-apagana makaphāwui vang ina tandi mira,
kala makhayābingli khayonkhamāngwui vang;
khayāning khanganing langkaso ngalatmihaora,
sākashewui hiksor kahai nemtā ngasakra.
Tānglāk kahai khamathā sinali tāngkhamei mi ina sākhuira,
kala Ophirwui sināli sakkhamei mikumo sākhuira.
Chiwui vang eina ina kazingram nganuk ngasakra,
okathui awui pam eina khanukshokhaora;
saikorawui
Rengkazat chao thāda,
ngakuikhame makhalei yao thāda,
mi kachiva̱ kachichā mibingwuili latungra,
kala mi kachiva̱ kachichāwui ramli yāmungra.
Samkaphaphang mili topursangmira,
kala tukkakhuibingli raighai eina yortāra.
Athumwui miktāli naongarāli shirkazamra;
athumwui shim ngaponmihaora,
kala preiva̱̱ ngarāli sākhamāngmihaora.
Yanglu, lupāli maningkachānga,
sinali makakahao Medenaobingli ina ngatha̱ ngasakta lei.
Athumwui malāthing eina yaronnaobingli kapthatra;
athumna naopamwui athei chili malumashanmara;
athumwui mikna naoshinaobingli malumashanmara.
Chaldeanaobingwui maiyā khavai Babylon chi,
Sodom eina Gomorrah thāhaora Varena khayui tharan.
Chili mi mapānluilakmara,
thot kachida kasomla masomluimara,
Arab khipākhana chili kachonshim makhaningkāluimara,
Yaokahom khipānakha athumwui yao ashangva̱ chili machipammara.
chiwui shimbing chi kakhonga sāyurna pemra;
ostrich vānaobingna chili pamra,
kala chili satyrna pheichak sāra.
Chiwui dolanli hyenana khongra,
khamathā keinungbingli ramfana khongra;
chiwui atam nganaihaira;
zimiksho chi masāngluimara.
Kala miyur kateina Israelnaobingli athumwui pamli ngasoungra, kala athumli rao mayarnao, rao sha̱nao sāda
Otram ngatha̱ khangasak eina ngasoda nathumwui kachot, kakhanang kala kharita otram khangatha̱ chiwui eina
nathumna Babylonwui awungali zeikakharui tui hi hāngra:
“Kathāda rekakharek chi ngasāmhao,
achei makathei sākashi kathāda atanghao!
khamungabingwui khānthing,
yurbingli malungvātta chieina mangasāmla ngaphita,
lukhamashan maleilakla rekharekta munga.
Okathui hupta chingri-va̱rihaira;
athumna laa sāphoka.
Matangrongbingna nali mathāna,
Lebanonwui cedar thingrongbingna mathānda hānga,
‘Nali maishi ngasakhaoda ta̱kateka khipākha ithumli marāthura.’
“Na rāthang nali samphang khavai azingshong Kathewui ramli kasatsanghaira;
okathuiwui kathāna sākasā saikora nathumli samphang khavai kathi khaya̱li mathuk ngasakhaira;
yurbingwui awunga sākasā saikorali wungpamkhongwui eina mathotkhui.
Athum saikorana matuida nali hāngra:
‘Nala ithum thāda khangazana ngasāhaira,
ithum thāhaira!
Nawui ringkaphā lumkhalao kazeiramli khuizanghaira,
nawui tingteilākhon eina ngasoda;
nawui pet mathanmānga,
kala nawui fakasangna ka̱chaimānga.’
O Ngashunwui sirā,
Ngathorwui naomayara!
Nali kathāda ngaleili hortāhao,
yurbingli nemkhangasaka na!
Varewui sirātungli juimeida ina kazing kāra;
iwui wungpam juilak eina sākāra;
tālāk kahai atungshong yarui kazip kaphungli ina pamra;
muiyāwui kajui tungli ina kānra,
I khalatta Juimeikap kaje chi sākhuira.
Kha nali kazeiramli khuitāhaira,
chomwui kathuka chili.
“Nali katheibingna pakpak yangda
nawui pongli phaningkachungra;
‘Okathui nganuk khangasaka,
wungrambing khanuk kakathāna mi chi hila?
Apuk-apaga siwuk thākhangasaka,
chiwui keinung kachungkhali yuikashapa,
awui phātop kazangnaobingli shim mahanung khangasaka mi chi hipāla?’
Yurbingwui awunga saikora tekhamateilak eina pihaira,
kachichā khalattawui chikhurli.
Kha nale nawui chikhurwui eina katāva̱li horshok kahaina,
naopharāt makhaunga thāda;
kala raighai eina ngashumkathatbingwui angun eina ngasoda romkahai;
chomwui lungpha̱li tākazang thāda,
pheizingli naikazam kahai kathingun kathāna.
Athumli ngasoda nali machifarumara,
khikhalajila nana nawui ngalei sākazamhaira,
nawui mibingli nana sāthathaira.
Makaphā kasābingwui naotunbingwui aming masingluilakranu!
Avāva̱ ngarāwui khayonwui vang nao mayarābingli sāthat khavai ngarānlu;
athumna ngakarthuilaga okathui hi khuida keinungbing eina ngasoda apuk-apaga pemngasakpaishina.”
Saikorawui
Kala ina kazinghokli pamkhavai sāngasakra, ra̱khong sāngasakhaora; kala chi kashimānwui shimphut eina pha̱mathāra, da saikorawui
“Ina khangarān sākahai chithāda shokra,
kala ina rinkahai chithāda leipapamra.
Kaja iwui ngaleili ina Assyria sakhaira,
iwui phungreitungli ipheizingli naikazamra;
kala awui kashai chi athumwui eina khalātahaora,
kala awui kharita otphun chi athum yārtuiwui eina ngavātāhaora.
Hi okathui katongawui vang sākahai kharin china,
kala miyur saikorawuitungli katingshok kahai pāng chi hina.”
Khikhalajila saikorawui
Apāng katingshokhaira,
kala chi khipāna ngakhunzangluishapra?
Ahaz Awunga thikum khamarān hi shoka:
nathumli ngaphit khavai lijei tekhaowa da mamathānlu;
kaja phara̱wui angayung eina chaoshai shoka
chiwui athei chiya khayonga phara̱ ngasāra.
Kala kachāmawui naochizaina zāra,
kala khangazanabingna tāphup eina pikhuira.
Kha nawui angayung chām eina ina chithitra,
kala nawui shākkahai ina shaothatra.
Chapngachālu, O ngavei; chaplu O keinung;
khangachee eina menglu, O Philistia,
nathum saikora!
Kaja meikhut atungshong eina shoka,
kala awui raimiwui ngachaili ngacheekazār maleimana.
Yurwui paomebingli khipāna khi ngahānkārakhala?
kala kakhanang samphang kahai awui mibingna chili ngayin khavai samphanga.
Khikhalajila Arli thangngayākha akha̱ sāmihaoda Moab kuphaira;
khikhalajila Kirli thangngayākha akha̱ sāmihaoda Moab kuphaira.
Dibonwui naongalava̱ chapngachā khavai apam kajuijuili kāhaira.
Nebo eina Medebawui vang Moabna chapngachai.
Kui kachiva̱ ngakokserhaira,
morhā kachiva̱ sitāserhaira;
chānreili athumna bora ngavaizata;
kayāngli, shimtungli mi kachiva̱na chapta chāra̱ longtai.
Heshbon eina Ele-alehna chapa,
aniwui akhon Jahaz eina tangda shāvai;
chiwui vang eina Moabwui khutlai kasingbingna panglāk eina chapa;
awui manglā kathira.
Iningli Moabwui vang chapa;
awui yāmkazatbing Zoarli kala Eglath-shelishiyahli yāmvai.
Kaja Luhithwui ashanli athumna chapmamānda kai;
Horonaimwui shongfali athumna sākashimānwui akhon akha vaowa.
Nimrimwui tara̱ ngachakyānghaira;
khawo kaohaira, ashon kathar mashokrarthura;
matekchim kahaila maleithura.
Chiwui vang athumna sorkhangasai tongkakhui kala athumna kazipsang kahai chi,
athumna Shumthing
Kaja Moabwui lam kuimareida kachapkhon akha ngayaovāhaira,
chapkhangachā chi Eglaim vāshunga,
chapkhangachā chi Beer-elim vāshunga.
Kaja Dibonwui tara̱ asheena pemhaira;
thālala Dibonli ina chili lāngmeida khuirāra,
Moabnao yāmshok kahaibingwui vang,
aramli shākkahaibingwui vang,
ina kazingkha̱ akha khuirāra.
Ngalei khamungali athumna yaonaobing chihovai;
Selawui eina siwuk apong kānda,
Zion naongalavawui kaphung vāshungda.
Athip sākathānmi kahai yongkazat vānao thāda,
Moabwui naongalava̱ ngarā Arnonwui kongpheili ngapha̱ra.
“Kahāngchitheimilu, mashun khamilu;
ngashunung ngayā thāda,
nawui khaya̱ khayinkhamilu;
horkahaibingli thumilu, yāmkazatbingli mayansaimialu.
Moabwui ngareng kahaibing nathumli zatrumranu,
sakashimānawui eina,
athum ngayinkhui khavai akha ngasāmilu.
Rekakhareka maleilui kaji tharan,
kala sakakazam vānkahai tharan,
phei eina naikagazama ngalei hiwui eina thuikahai tharan,
makhangachei leikashilungli wungpamkhong akha sakāra,
Davidwui kachonshimlungli ningkatong eina sakāra,
bichar sakhame kala mashun ningkachānga,
khamashung khangarong kasa kathāka.”
Moabwui lāngkaso ithumna shāhaira,
kayākha langsosākhala;
awui ngamkacho, lāngkaso,
kala awui maikhareo aremawui langsotsera.
Chiwui vang eina Moab chapngachāranu;
mi kachiva̱na Moabwui vang chapngachāranu.
Wukkhananglak eina chapngachālu;
Kir-haresethwui drakhāthei khamuiwui vang.
Kaja Heshbonwui luibing ngahuiya,
Sibmahwui drakhā theirongla;
yurbingwui khamungbingna awui aphāngbing katatāmihaira,
aphāngbing chi Jazer kala siwukli ngachuivai;
ashon ayarli ngachuivāda shamadrutung makānvai.
Chili Jazerwui chapkhangachā eina ngasoda ina chapa,
Sibmahwui drakhārongwui vang;
iwui chara̱na nanili tāsopmihaira,
O Heshbon eina Ele-aleh;
kaja naniwui theishirai eina mahā atamli raikhon rāshunghaira.
Luiwui theishiraiwui eina ringkaphā khamathān khuithuihaira,
kala drakhā yāmguili laala masāluithura,
akhonla mavaothura;
drakhāra̱ kasurla maleithura,
drakhāthei kaphāwui akhonla va̱rihaphaira.
Chiwui vang imanglāna Moabwui vang lyre thāda ngahuiya,
kala Kir-heres wui vang ining sifaya.
Kala Moabna seihā sākhavai apam kajuiva̱li,
chotlak eina kalāla khikha kānkhana maleimara.
Hi thuikahai atamli Moabwui pongli
Kha ara
Yanglu, Damascus hi keinung mangasāluimara,
kashimān khorkahai ngasāhaora.
Awui keinungbing katang mavaila ramphohaora;
yaoshangbingwui vang ngasāhaora,
athum chili pira,
kala athumli khipānakha mangachee ngasakmara.
Raipan chi Ephraimwui eina,
wungram chi Damascuswui eina shimānhaora,
kala Syriawui shākkahaibing chi Israelwui naongarāwui tekhamatei thāhaora da saikorawui
Kala chithanghon Jacobwui tekhamatei nemtā ngasakhaora;
kala awui asāwui kathao suitāhaora.
Kala chi, mā kahātana nganingda khalei mārong kahāt thāda kala apāngna mā vamkasang thāda,
kala Rephaimwui luili mātham kaphā thara.
Oliverong athei phālaga atham akha khani,
kajuiya aphāngtungli,
aphāngli mati phangā taikahai thāda taira da Israelwui Proho VAREna hānga.
Chithanghon mibingna athumli Kasema chili khayāshira; kala athumwui mikna Israelwui Kathara chili yangra;
athumwui pāng eina sākakhui hanphut chili khayā mashimara; kala athumwui pāngmareng eina sākahai chili mayangluimara; Asherimranu lah nganamkaphāwui hanphutbingranu.
Chithanghon Hivnaobing kala Amornaobingna aram ngalei Israelnaobingwui vang eina chiho kahai thada, athumwui khangazipa keinungbingla ramchoserhaora.
Kaja nathumna nathumwui Vare huikhameli malaihaowa,
nathum ngayin khavai Lunghar chili maphaningungthuwa;
thingrong khamathāthā linglala,
vare khangateiwui vang thingphāng shunlala;
nathumna lingthang kharshok ngasaklala yaosangthang ngathor nathumna awon won ngasaklala;
sikafa kala maraikapai khangashei zimikshothang heithei saikora yāmhaora.
Ah, mi kachungkhawui khangashum,
athumna shamadruwui khangashum thada ngashumkakanga,
Ah, yurbingwui kakhanang,
kongra̱ kathuiwui thāda ngashum kakanga!
Yurbingna tara̱ khangaphaowui kakhanang thāda ngashuma,
kha ana athumli khararra, kala athumna yāmserhaora,
masina phungreitungli lanji phankathui thāda,
kala siphanna chifa-chihā khaningkathui thāda ana athumli kashama.
Ngazinshong yanglu, khangachee!
Ngathor marāranglakha athum maleisāthuwa!
Ithumli ngapon kazābing,
kala ithumli sākakathānbingwui yar chi hina.
Ethiopia kong kānda khalei ngalei!
Nile kong tara̱tungli konā marikhong tonglaga wungva̱ kachiho!
Vālu, kathāka paomebing,
asho-alep khaunga yurli,
khanganailila katālila khangacheea yur,
kapanga kala rai khayuia yur,
kongbingna khangakai ngaleili.
Apuk-apagali khalei nathum saikora,
okathuili kapama nathum hupta,
kaphungli khamachut akha kashok tharan, yanglu!
talla̱ kakhong tharan, nganālu!
Kaja
“Zinghām malingting kahai thāda,
mahā kachāngwui ikra̱ kaphunga muiyā thāda,
iwui pamkhavaiwui eina ngathumda yangtāra”.
Kaja mahā marāranglakha, awon wonkup kahai thili,
kala awonbingna khamina drakhāthei ngasākahai tharan,
ana aphāngbing chi khainao eina katatmihaora,
kala ashonbingla ana yortāmihaora.
Athumwui asā phungreibingwui sā kashaia vānaobingli,
kala okathuiwui sāyurbingli chishaihaora.
Sā kashai vānaobingna lum ngaheivaira,
okathuiwui sāyurbingna si zangvaira.
Atam chitharan saikorawui
asho-alep khaunga miyur akhana lemmet rāchikatra;
khanganailila katālila khangacheea yur,
kapanga kala rai khayuia yur,
kongbingna khangakaia ngaleiwui eina saikorawui
Zion Kaphungli khuirāra.
Yanglu,
kala Egyptwui meoma̱bing awui mangāli kathirra;
kala Egyptnaobingwui wuklung khalatta menghaora.
Kala ina Egyptnaobingna Egyptnaobingli mamayā khavai kasatra,
kala mi kachivana achinangarāli, mi kachivana awui khongnaiali, keinung eina keinung,
wungram eina wungram ngashao ngarokra;
kala Egyptnaobingwui ning thenghaora,
kala ina athumwui khangarān chi pa̱ngapā ngasakra;
kala athumna meoma̱li kala kazeikasing khanong sākatheibingli ngasanra;
kala ina athumli, sākashe akhavā akhawui pāngli horsangmira;
kala sakashe awunga akhana athumwuitungli mungra,
da
Kala Nilewui tara̱bingla thenghaora,
kala kongla thenghaida ngachakkhaira;
kala chiwui ra̱shongla nganamshihaora,
kala Egyptwui kong Nilewui aphāngbingla suitāmamānda thenghaora,
titi kala khawo kateila shuiserhaora.
Nile kongpheili kala kong ngalemli,
masaikok kahai apam kachungkha leira;
kha Nile ngalemli yaokahai saikora kaothiserhaora.
kashamhaida maleiluimara.
Khai kaphābing sifada chapra,
Nile kongli khaisui kasui hupta;
kala tara̱lungli khailan kahorbing ning thengchaohaora.
Seipeng kashireibingla,
vatwui kachon kharakbingla ningngaimāserra.
Ngalei chiwui pākra̱ kasābingla akha̱ sāhaora,
kala ngalang kapheia saikora khananghaora.
Zoanwui wungnaobing mangmashuna;
Pharaohwui kathema machinmebingna makānkhanā tui hāngmi.
Pharaohli, “I thangkhamawui nao akhana,
achālakha awunga sākasāwui nao akhana”
da nana kathāda hāngpaira?
Chithakha nawui thangkhamabing kali leili?
Egyptwuitungli saikorawui
Zoanwui wungnaobing mangma̱haira,
kala Memphiswui wungnaobingli kapikhaira;
shang-shangwui phungva̱bingna Egyptli thannguihaira.
kala khamaripa mina yuichāchāng malokazat thāda;
otsak saikorali athumna Egyptli ngayit ngasakhaira.
Kala akuinala, akhameinala, khaneirong aphāngnala, titinala Egyptwui vang khikha sākashap maleimara.
Chitharan Egyptnaobing sha̱nao thāhaora, kala athumwuitungli saikorawui
Judahwui ngalei chi Egyptnaobingwui vang khangachee azak ngasāhaora. Saikorawui
Chitharan Egypt ngaleili Canaantui khamatui, kala saikorawui
Chithanghon Egypt ngaleiwui alungthungli
China Egypt ngaleili saikorawui
Kala
na Egyptli hāngmachinra, kashaola shaora, kharaila raimida athumna
Chitharan Egypt eina thuilaga Assyria vāshungda chānrei akha leira; Assyriawui mibingna Egyptli rāra, Egyptnaobingna Assyriali vāra kala Egyptwui mibingna Assyriawui mibingli ngasoda khorumra.
Chithang okathuiwui alungli sokhami chi Israelna Egypt eina Assyriali ngasoda kakathuma sāda samphangra,
saikorawui
Assyriawui awunga Sargonna raimi katongawui akhavāli chihokum Ashdodli vai kala aramli rai angararda khuihaowa.
Atam chitharan
na hānga, “Iwui rao Isaiahna, Egypt eina Ethiopiawui machutkhui khavai kum kathum mahonghat eina zatkahai thāda, Egyptli khayak ngasak khavai
Assyriawui awungana yuikhui kahai Egyptnaobing eina Ethiopianaobing raithā kahai khararnaosan mateila mahonghat eina arangphāng thatheida thānzatra.
Chitharan athumwui kachihāna Ethiopia eina athumna langkaso Egyptwui vang eina athum ning suitāhaora.

Kala shamadrupheili kapama mibingna chitharan hāngra, ‘Yanglu ithumna kachihāna kala Assyriawui awungawui eina kankhui khavai yāmkasanga chili hithāda shokhaira! Thakha ithum kathāda nganaishokrakhala?’”
Yirei lamhāngwui pongli khamarān tui:
Negebli sur khaningkazat thāda,
chi lamhāng eina rai,
sākashe ngaleiwui eina.
Sāshilak kahai khamahā akha ili rāhānghaira;
khangapona china ngapona,
sākakazama china sākazama.
Kaulu, O Elam,
kuinamkhuilu, O Media;
athumna ningreikhāsuthai khangasak saikora ina tang ngasakhaira.
Chithāda sāda iwui kashān kachotna pemhaira,
khangasheina ili kuinamhaira,
sha̱naona naokhara̱wui kachot thāda;
ili hamzang ngasakhaida mashārarthuwa,
I kaphaning suitāhaoda imik matheirarthuwa.
Ining nganingunghaira,
khangacheena khakshingakhaira;
Ina yupyup kahor ningkachāng chila iwui vanga kakathir ngasāhaira.
Athumna table runghaida kachonla hamhailaga phāshak phazai.
Ngakarthuilu, O wungnaobing,
changveili thao neolu!
Kaja
“Vālu, raikān akha hailu,
ana katheithei chi hāngmiranu.
Sigui katongnao, gadhā katongnao,
ut katongnao khanini ngalengkazat chi theiakha ana munlak eina nganā kazakkhuiranu”.
Chieina katheia china vaowa:
“O
kala ngayā kachida iwui otpam machihohailakmana.
Kala yanglu, katongabing rārāli,
sigui katongbing khanini eina!”
Kala ana ngahānkai,
“Kongluihaira, Babylon kongluihaira;
kala awui meoma̱bing katongala ana ngaleili sākazamihaira!”
O iwui hātkhui kahaia kala hamkharikkhui kahaibing,
Israelwui Varivara, saikorawui
Dumahwui pongli khamarān tui:
Mi akhana ili Seirwui eina hodalei,
“Shantri ngayā kayākha sāngfara?
Shantri ngayā kayākha sāngfara?”
Shantrina hānga:
“Ngathor rārādalei, kha ngayāla rāluira.
Nana kalikha ngahānluingaiakha rāngahanluinaolu”.
Arabiawui pongli khamarān tui.
Arabiawui khararpapamli nathum pamra,
O Dedanwui ut ashangva̱ tongkazatbing.
Ra̱kachangbingli tara̱ khuirāmilu!
Yāmkazatbingli khamui eina angaroklu O Temawui ramnaobing.
Kaja athum raighaiwui eina yāmhaira,
sutshok kahai raighaiwui eina,
hunkahai malāwui eina, kala rai khangasungwui eina.
Kaja
kala Kedarwui nao ngarāwui kapinga malā singkathei kateokhamāng taimara; kaja
Khamahā tampākwui pongli khamarān tui.
Nathum saikora shimtung kajujuili kaser kahai hi khi kakhalatkhala,
khonkazār, ngaunlop kahai maikakā keinung nathumna jila?
Nathumna sāthat kahaibing chi raighai eina mathimana kala raipamli mathimana.
Nathumwui khamungabingla yāmrumserhaira;
athumli malā masingla tukkhuihaira.
Nathum kathathei saikoralila tukkhuiserhaira,
athumna katāva̱li yāmvāhaisalala.
Chiwui vang eina ina hānga:
“Ili mayangrālu, ina kakhanangwui vang chapngachāga;
iwui mibingwui naongalāva̱bingli sāshimān kahaiwui vang ili masuiphanepalu.”
Kaja saikorawui
ngashumkakang, yāmung yāmvāda,
pa̱khangapāwui phākho shaokakhai,
kala phungreibingli khangavao,
zimiksho akha ngarānhaira;
khamahāwui tampākli.
Kala Elamna siguigari kala katongbingli ngasoda malākhor khuiphunga,
Kirna chāngvei phunga.
Nathumna ningchāngmeikap kaji tampākbing chi siguigarina pemhaira;
kala sigui katongabingna ngavaveili rairim sai.
Ana Judahwui faror khavai khuithuimihaira.
Chithang nathumna Ngahongwui Shimwui raisāribing chili yanga,
kala Davidwui keinungpam kakai kachungkha khalei chi nathumna thei; khanema ra̱khongwui eina nathumna tara̱ tāsoka,
kala nathumna Jerusalemwui shim shānkhui, kala shimbing chi sākhailaga pan savai.
Kachama Ra̱khongwui tara̱ kazipkhui khavai nathumna pan khaniwui ngachaili ra̱shak sākhui. Kha chi achā eina sakharikhaikasāpali nathumna mapha̱mana, khayālamashimana.
Chithanghon saikorawui
Varena sikafa kala chapkhangachā,
kui sikatā, bora khangavai atam khuirāra,
mukkā kala yao taikathat,
sā kashai eina zam khamang:
“Zāsa, mangsa, kaja akhama ithum thihaora”
da kasā atam rāra.
Saikorawui
“Kachangkhat eina khayonkhamāng hi nathum mathiranglakha eina tangda
mapheomirarmara” da saikorawui Proho VAREna hānga.
Saikorawui Proho VAREna hithāda hānga, shimkhurli yangkhame kala lanse Shebnali vāda ali ahānglu:
“Na hili khi sarakhala kala hili nana khipāli haida chikhur kashophutkhala, lungzipamli chikhur kaokakhui, lunghārpamli shim sākakhui khi sāvairakhala?
O kapanga yaronnao,
kala khayiyitlaga thingphāng kahor thāda ngalei khamashā akhali horvāhaora, chili na thira, kala nawui tekmatei khavai siguigaribing chi nawui akhavāshi shimkhur maishi khavai ngasāhaora.
Ina nawui otpam eina katatshokhaora, kala nali nawui pam eina kathangshokhaora.”
“Chithanghon Hilkiahwui naomayara iwui rao Eliakimli hokhuira,
kala nawui katuma phahon chi ali ngavaimira, nawui shānneira̱ ali neimira, kala nawui pangshap chi ali sangmihaora. Kala ana Jerusalemli kapambingwui, Judah shimkhurwui avāva̱ ngasāra.
Kala ina Davidwui shimkhurwui sho awui yartuili haira; ana shora, khipānakha mashungmara, kala ana shungra, khipānakha mashomara.
Makhangatha̱pamli thing shunkasang thāda ina ali shuntitsangra; kala ana avāva̱wui shimkhurwui khayākakā wungpamkhong akha ngasāra.
“Shimkhurwui kasak-kapai katonga, ara̱-azāla, khorkhongla tengkot eina thuilaga kahaka ot eina tangda awui pāngli leira.
Chithang, makhangatha̱pamli, rida shunsanghaikasā thing chi ngachohaora kala katattāhaida chili parhaikasā kharit ot tātunghaora” da saikorawui
Chapngachālu, O Tarshishwui marikhongbing,
kaja Tyre ramchohaira, zunkhui khavai shimla maleilui!
Cyprus ngaleiwui eina hi
athumli phongkhamina.
Chingrihailu, O ngayipheili kapambing,
O Sidonwui leihkhalonbing; nathumwui paophungmebing shamadru kānda
tara̱ kachungkhawuitungli zatta lei;
nathumwui shai kakhui chi Shihorwui theishiraina,
Nilewui heiunna;
nathum yurbingwui leihkhalona sāsai.
Vaishilu, O Sidon, kaja shamadruna hānghaira,
kathuka shamadru china hānga,
“I nao khara̱la, kapharāla maleilakmana,
I nao mayarnaola kala kachingva̱ sha̱naobingla manganaokāmana”
Pao chi Egyptli rākashung eina athumna Tyrewui vang ning chotra.
Tarshishli kānkalu,
chaplu, O shamadrupheili kapambing!
Achālakhawui eina leikasā,
ngalei katāva̱li apam khavai khuivā kahaia,
ringkaphā nawui keinung chi hila?
Pāsi khangakhama, wungnaobingna leihkhalon,
okathuina khayākashiya leihkhalonbing Tyrewuitungli hikathā khipāna shok ngasakhala?
Tekkhamateiwui langsot sākhamāng khavai,
okathuiwui maikhayā saikora maishi khavai,
saikorawui
Nile kong thāda nawui ngalei pemtha̱ ngasaklu,
O Tarshishwui naongalava̱,
ara pānkhavai maleiluilakmana.
Ana shamadru tungli apāng katingvāhaira,
ana wungnaobingli khanukhaira,
raipan sakhai khavai.
Kala ana hānga:
“Na khayuiwui ringkaphā maleiluimara,
O singkhareng kahaia,
Sidonwui kachingva̱ naongalava̱; ngakarthuilu,
Cyprus kānvalu,
chieina tangdalila tāphup kahai masamphangmara.”

Yanglu Chaldeanaobingwui ngalei chi! Mibing chi hina Tyre maningmana. Athumna Tyre ramsābingwui vang sāngasaka. Athumna raiyot tārong sakai, keinung ngapaikhuida mei thotta athumna ali yumchao ngasaka.
Chaplu, O Tarshishwui marikhongbing,
kaja nawui raimipam acho ngasāhaira.
Chithanghon, awunga akhawui okthot thāda, Tyreli zingkum hangshiniwui vang malaihaora. Zingkum hangshini apeilam khayorva̱̱wui laali kasā thāda Tyreli rāshokra.
Tingteilā akha khuilu,
keinung kuimareida vālu,
O malai kahaiya khayorva̱̱!
Ningkhamayunglaa sālu,
laa kachungkha sālu,
nali phaningung khavai.
Zingkum hangshini apeilam,
Awui leihsak kala awui leihsakman chi
Yanglu, okathui hi
ramcho ngasakhaora,
kala chamjoro ngasakra,
leimai masho ngacheimihaida okthuikasābing ngapha̱yānghaora.
Ayaonaosanli kasā thāda pāngmonbinglila sāpapamra;
raonaobingli kasā thāda akhavābinglila chithāpapamra;
rao sha̱naoli kasā thāda akhavaiva̱lila chithāpapamra;
khalopāli kasā thāda khayorapālila sāpapamra;
kachishutali kasā thāda kashukalila chithara.
Okathui hi ramchochao ngasakra,
kala sakhayāngserhaora;
kaja
Okathuina chapngachāda thenghaowa,
apuk-apagana ngazanhaida thenghaowa;
kazingramla okathuili ngazanruma.
Okathui hi mikumona sāmakhaohaowa;
kaja athumna ain mangākmana,
shiyan sākhaihaowa;
katang makhavai tuingashit mamayonthuwa.
Chiwui vang eina khonshātna okathuili shaisanghaira;
kala chili okkathui saikora athumwui khayonkhamāngwui vang chotchānga;
chiwui vang okathuili okthuida khalei saikora kāngthathaida mi kateokhamang taimaya.
Zamna chapngachai,
drakhārongna thenghaowa,
ringkaphā ning saikora khāsuthaira.
khamathānwui akhon vihaira;
ringkaphāwui tingteilāla chingrihaira.
Athumna laasak ngasha̱da drakhāra̱ mamangluimana;
zamshei khamanga athumwui vang khāshihaowa.
Pa̱khangapāwui keinung sāshimānhaira,
shim kachiva̱ mi mazang khavai shunghaira.
Chānreili zam makhaleiwui vang ngawunkharopa;
ringkaphā saikora ngalathaira;
okathuiwui khamathān shimānhaira.
Keinung ramcho ngasāhaira,
ngaveila shaokhaida ngayāngserhaira.
Kala okathuiwui lungli,
yurbingwui ngachaili hithāda shokra,
oliverong ngaphitkachup kahai thāda,
mahāpei mārem khanai thāda.
Athumna khamathānwui laa vaowa,
Chiwui vang eina zingshoshong
shamadru pheibingli,
Israelwui Vare
Okathuiwui akatanga eina Khangarongapali tekhamatei sokachikat laakhon ithum shai;
kha ina hānga, I chānghaira,
I chānghaira. I kalākashi!
Kaja sākashena sāshilak eina sai.
Khangachee, chom,
kala khalen nathumwui vang ngasāhaira,
O okathuiwui mibing!
Khangacheekhon shālaga khayāma chi chomli tāzangra;
kala chomwui eina yāmkashoka chi khalenli manra.
Kaja kazing khāmong shohaida okathui katonga nganuka.
Okathui ngayāngchaohaira,
okathui ngakhumpakhaira,
okathui khanuk khayāngserhaira.
Khamaripa mi thāda okathuina khayitzata,
rām thāda nganuka;
khayonkhamāngna shirenhaida kongluithang mangakarthukluimara.
Chithanghon kazingramli,
kazingwui mibingli tandi mira,
okathuiwui awungabinglila okathuili
Phātopnao thāda ngaleikhurli athumli tuksanghaora;
athumli phātopli shungnamhaora;
kala atam kasangkhawui thili tandi minaora.
Chitharan kachāngna pa̱ngapāra,
zimikna khayakhaora;
kaja saikorawui
Jerusalemli kala awui ararbingwui mangāli khamung tharan
awui tekhamatei chitheira.
O
ina nali sora, namingli sora;
kaja nana matakhak kahai otbing sāhaira,
achālakha ngaranping kahai makhangachei otmānga.
Kaja nana keinung chifa sāngasakhaira,
raipan ngaruimit kahai konung macho ngasaka;
yangkashewui keinung, keinung masāluimara,
masākārarluimara.
Chiwui vang kapanga yurbingna nali tekmatei ngasakra;
lukhamashan makathei yurbingwui keinungna nali ngacheera.
Kaja na kachāmbingwui raipana, khavāta kakhanangbingwui raipana,
siphan-zingrot atamwui ngayin khavai kala zinghām atamwui khaya̱na;
kaja sākashebingwui sāshāt, masina
shimrāpli ungkakathang kathāna;
katheng apamli zinghām khamaling kathāna.
Zinghāmli muiyā shingkahai thāda yangkashebingli nana akhon mashok ngasakmana,
chiwui vang eina sākashebingwui laa ngasāmhaira.
Phungrei hili saikorawui
Kala miyurbing eina yurbingli fakhamhaida khalei chonrān katha chi ana phungrei hili khuithuimihaora.
Kathi kaho chi katang mavaila ana mayuitāhaora; kala Proho VAREna mi saikorawui chāra̱ mitmira. Kala awui miyurwui kakhayak chi okathuiwui eina khuithuimihaora da
Chithanghon hithāda hāngra, “Yanglu, hi ithumwui Varena; ana ithumli kanmirada ithumna ali ngarai. Hi ithumna khangarai
Ra̱khayāk mina pāng kakating thāda, chitharan ana pāng katingshokra; kala awui langkaso kala pāngthem chi
Kala awui kajuiya phaklāng ana sakhaimihaida ngaleili akha̱ sāngasakra.
Atam chitharan Judah ngaleili laa hi sāra:
“Ithumwui khangazipa keinung akha lei;
huikhami eina ana phākho eina raipan sāmi.
Ngavei chi sholu,

Nali ning horkasanga kala nali shitkasanga a chili nana chingri eina nganaomi.
Proho VAREna katang makhavai lunghārna.
Kaja kajuipamli,

naikazama.
Khangarongbingwui shongfa ngachamthamhai;
khangarongbingwui shongfa nana tāngpat eina sāmi.
Nawui bichar athishurda,
O
Ithumna nali ngarai;
nawui mingli phaningkhaung ithumwui manglāna kakahaona.

Makaphā makhayā mili ngahānkhangai chitheiakha,

Khangarongwui ngaleili ana mashongachei ngasaka
kala

ithumwui ot saikora nana sāmihaira.
O
namāng maningla ithumli akhavā khangateinala munghaira,

Athumva thihaira, maringmara;

Kha nana yur hi mataisangmihaira,
O
nana yur hi mataisangmihaira;

O

Atam ungkashung tharan, sha̱naona
naokhara̱wui ringkhangā thāda,
Ithumna naokhara̱ thāda ringngai,
kha kānkhanā khikha mashokmana.
Okathuiwui vang ithumna huikhami ot masāmihaimana
kala apuk-apagali pānda khaleibingla mapitāmana.
O chifali okkathuibing, ngakarthuida khamathānwui laa sālu!
Kaja ikra̱na apuk-apagva̱̱li ning mathing khangasak thāda,
Ralu, iwui mibing malungkhavāt mavānranglakha,
nathumwui kāli zangda,
kala khāmong shungnamhailaga kasha̱kha yāmngathumsalu.
Kaja yanglu,
mikumoli athumwui moreiwui vang danti mikhavai,
kala okathuina awuitungli ashee tākahai chi lānchitheida,
sāthat kahaibing chi mathumiluimara.
Chingthanghon:
Leishiri kahai drakhā yāmgui,
hiwui laa sālu!
atam kachida ina tara̱ chaimi;
khipanakha masāmashāt khavai,
ngashun ngayā ina mayona;
I malung mavātluimana.
Ka̱shāt-karengli rai sāki kajisi kaja!
I athumli ngasungra,
ina athumli meili riktāhaora.
Lha athumna hamsangda,
iwui huikhami samphang khavai chingri kahai phāranu.”
Anaolamshong Jacobna angayung sa̱ra,
Israelna awon wonda ashon shonra,
atheina apuk-apaga pemra.
Shaomi kahaibingli ana shaokhami thāda athumli ana shaohairala?
Kala sakathatabingli sākathat thāda athumli sāthathairala?
Kateteo eina nana athumli loi thai;
zingshoshongwui masi thāda,
awui khangachee khaksui eina kathangthui ngasaka.
Chiwui vang eina china Jacobwui khayonkhamāng shimitmihaora;
kala china awui morei khuithuikhamiwui kākashung athei ngasāra.
Hanphutwui ngalung saikora akha̱ sāngasak kahai tharan,
Asherimwui lah nganamkaphā riktākhavai hanphutla maleisāluimara.
Kaja ngavei eina kuinam kahai keinung ngachakyānghaira,
mi makapāna, lamhāng thāda ramphohaira,
chili seinaona azāt phāzai,
chili ana ngayaipida thingphāngla sākazama.
Thingphāng thengkahai eina tektāserhaowa;
sha̱naobingna rāda chieina mei sai.
Kaja hi mashun-makhui makathei miyurna,
chiwui vang eina athumli kasāpānala athumli malumashanmara,
athumli semkakhuiana athumli ngahankhangaila maleimara.
Chithanghon, Euprates kong eina thuilaga Egyptwui kong tāshungda
Kala chithanghon talla̱khon panglāk kahai akha khongra; kala Assyria ngalei shimān kahaibing kala Egyptwui eina kasham kahaibingna rāda Jerusalemwui kathara kaphungli
Ephraimwui khamaripbingwui lāngsot kuihon,
khamathā tekhamatei pa̱tāki kaji awon,
ngaleikatumli pamda mariprei kahaibingna khangahon chi,
kakhanang ngasāranu!
Yanglu,
theihkatā thongyāng thāda,
shimān khangasaka unshimui thāda,
hakkhamahā tara̱ kaphong thāda,
ana okathuili zakshilāk eina hortāhaora.
Ephraimwui khamaripbing lāngso khavai kuihon chi,
phei eina naikazamhaora.
Khamathā tekhamatei,
ngaleikatum tampākli khalei,
lumkachāng marāranglakha minkhare khaorāthei thāda,
mina kathei eina, apāngli singkhui khaleoda shaihaowa.
Chithang saikorawui
kala awui shāk kahaiwui vang khamathāwui kuihon ngasāhaora.
Mashunwui manglā chi wungpamkhongli kapama chiwui ngasāhaora.
Kala pangshap chi ngaveili rai marā khangasaka chibingwui ngasāra.
Hibingla drakhāra̱na marip ngasaka,
zamsheina ngayit ngasaka,
Pāngmonla, marānla zamsheina ngayit ngasaka,
drakhāra̱na pa̱ngapā ngasaka;
zamshei mangmangda khamaripa eina mahākhami theingui ngasaka,
bichar kasāli konglui ngasaka.
Kaja table katonga puida malosanga,
makhamakhao apam maleimana.
“Khipāna ali tamchitheira?
Kala khipāli pao chi hāngchitheira,
na̱ khamangnaolika, na̱ khareinaolirakhala?
Kaja hi arahnaowuitungli arahnao,
arahnaowuitungli arahnao,
tuipengwuitungli tuipeng,
tuipengwuitungli tuipeng
hili kateokha, chili kateokha” na.
kala makashā miwui male eina
ana athumli hithāda hānghaisai;
“Hi ngasāmkakhuina, kachotbingli ngasāmkhui ngasaklu;
hi chingri kahaina”;
chithālala athumna makhuisangmara.
Chieina
arahnaowuitungli arahnao,
tuipengwuitungli tuipeng,
tuipengwuitungli tuipeng
hili kateokha, chili kateokha;
shupkhuida tamchithei;
chieina athumna pheingaphokta kongluira,
khalenli manda tukkhuihaora.
Chiwui vang eina mashātkatheibing,
Jerusalemwui mili khamungbing!
Kaja nathumna hithāda hānghaira;
Ithumna katheli tuingashit sāhaira,
kazeiramli mayākhangarok leihaira;
hāngkhavai makhalei rekakharek rālala ithumli marāza̱mara.
Kaja kakapikli ithum ngayin khavai sai.
Kala mikhanamli, ithumna ngasāmkhuihaira.
“Yanglu, Zionwui shimphungali akhoka sākhavai mayarkazak kahai,
khamakanga kala makhangatha̱a lunggui shunhaira.
‘Shitkasang khangatarbing ningnganungkhunghai.’
Kala ina mashun eina feeta sāra;
kala khangarong eina urum sāra.”
Kakapikabingwui ngayin khavai chi theihna pha̱thuihaora;
ngasām khavai chi tara̱na ngaphumhaora.
Chitharan katheli tuingashit sākahai chi makānāmara;
kazeiramli ngasoda mayā khangarok chi manganingrarmara;
hāngkhavai makhalei rekakharek kharā tharan nali ngaphittāhaora.
Kala chi kharā kachida nali za̱chingra;
kaja chi ngathor kachida rāra,
ngashunla ngayāla rāra;
pao chi bhab katā tharan ngacheenāhaora.
Mashongshak eina pikhavai akhawui vanga pet chi sha̱nai;
kachonla teonāhaida makhaluipaimana.
Gibeonwui tampākli kasā thāda
Awui sāki kaji ot chi—ngakheikhang kahai otna.
Chiwui vang eina ara mamana̱shialu;
nali khalap kahai chi makangmeihaipaishina;
kaja ngalei katonga sākazam khavai hukhum chi saikorawui
Nāshunglu, kala iwui tui khuilu;
Nganālu, iwui kahāng khuisanglu.
Athā yaokhavai luikhavā china khangasām maleila lui vāchingla?
Awui lui katang mavaila changchingla?
Ana ngalei chi khayām kahai eina kayanghanthā,
hanshi kathā mayaomala?
Kala kehu pareng eina yaolaga ngum apam chālak eina malingsangmala?
Tharāthei angatātāli mamashirsangmala?
Kaja ali tamchitheitit kahaina;
awui Varena tamchithei kahaina.
Kayanghanthāli mazaithing eina mazaikhuimana;
hanshila gari kāngkhong eina matakmana;
kha kayanghanthāli lenguinao eina zaikhui,
hanshili thingnao eina ngaphitkhui.
Mina mā amathir thāda ngataila?
Ana mangaposhonmana;
sigui eina siguigari kātaklala akha̱ masāngasakmana.
Saikora hi saikorawui
pangshap khaleiya china ayuk-ayān unglak eina ngarānkharik kahaina.
Ho Ariel, Ariel,
Davidna rairum sāvaikasā keinung!
Kumshok kumzang, kum kachida zātkhān sāshon sāthai.
Chithālala Arielli ina khanang ngasakra,
sikafa chapngachā lei ngasakra;
chieina a iwui vang Ariel thāra.
Ina nali kuimareida pamphinra,
dolan eina kuiphinda,
raipan sāphinhaora.
Kathuka ngaleizingshongwui eina nana matuira,
kapaia chifawui eina nawui tui shokra;
nawui akhon ngaleizingshong eina sha̱na khamatuiwui akhon tākamra,
kala nawui tuimatui chifawui eina kasupshokra.
Kha nawui yangkashe shānla makakhui chi,
khikha makhaning chifa thāhaora.
Lukhamashan makatha̱a kachungkha chi phankazat lanji kathā ngasāhaora.
Kala mik khayipkhali kashuirak eina,
saikorawui
kazing-khangashum, neina̱ kakhanuk akhon panglāk eina,
surkakhaning, siphan-zingrot ngasha̱da,
meiwon eina ngasoda rāra.
Arielli khangarar mahāngkharar yur saikora,
awui raimibingli khangararbing,
ali khanang khangasakbing,
mangshong thāhaora,
ngayāshong khamahā thāhaora.
Kathai mina mangshong phazālala khamathuk tharan mathokasa thāda,
ra̱kachanga mina mangshong tara̱ manglaga khamathuk tharan ra̱kao za̱laga leikasā thāda;
Zion Kaphungli rākhangarar yur hupta chithāpapamra.
Nathum khalatta mangma̱khuida nganingunghailu;
khalatta ngapeokhuida mik ngapeolu!
drakhāra̱ mamangla maripreihairanu;
zamshei mamangla yuichachānghairanu.
kala marānbing, nathumwui mik fakhammihaira,
kala kui fakhammihaira.
Saikora khamahā hi nathumwui vang mahor namkahaiwui lairik kathā ngasāhaowa. Khikateikhada pākatheibingli, “Hi palu”, da kasoakha athumna, “Mapārarmara, hi mahor namkahaina” da hānga.
Kala lairik chi mapākathei akhali “Hi pālu” da kahāng eina, “Mapātheimana.” jihaowa.
“Miyur hina khamor eina nganailaka,
morchai eina ili khayāshiya;
kha wuklunga iwui eina katāva̱li lei;
athumna ili khangachee chiya mibingwui ningkhami eina tamkhui khamaronna.
matakhak kahai ot ina athumli saluishitra,
hakkhamahā kala matakhak kahai ot;
thangkhamabingwui thangmei shimānhaora;
theithangkhamabingwui theithangkhamei chi ngathumihaora”.
“Ithumli khipāna theira,
khipāna machutra?”
da
kakhanang ngasāranu!
hamkasaali ngaleina jirala?
Sākakhui ot china kasāpali “Ili ana masāmana”
da hangrala?
Kala sākakhui ot china sākakholi,
“A khikha matheimana” jirala?
Athei kachungkha matheiki kaji luili ngahongna da kaphaning,
Lebanon, athei kachungkha khamathei luipam ngasāki kaji masāngmana da matheimala?
Chitharan lairikwui tuibing hi khanā khangakhokana shāra,
athumwui khangami kala tangkhamangwui eina mik khangapeoana theira.
Malungkhanima china
kala miwui ngachaili kachāmabingna Israelwui Kathara Ali mathānra.
Kaja lukhamashan makatha chi khikha masā khavai ngasāhaora,
kala mana̱shikazar mi chi ngalathaora,
kala makaphā sākida khangaraia saikorali katathaora.
Chānhān eina mibingli ning saza̱ khangasaka,
machinkhameli ngaveili khalen kasanga;
mashun khaleia ali kapikta nguikhangasaka athumli katathaora.
Abrahamli ngatangkhame
“Jacob makhayakluimara, amai tarātahaora.
Kaja iwui pāng eina semkahai awui naongarā ana theilaga athumna iming tharngasakra;
athumna Jacobwui Tharkhamathenga chili tharngasakra,
kala athumna Israel Varewui mangāli khayāshida nganingra.
Manglāli khayon sākahaibing china theikakhui samphangra;
kakhalopbing china tamkachithei khuisangra.”
“Ngakaikashe naobing chi kalākashi ngasāranu!
Athumna khangarān akha sai,
kha iwui maningmana;
athumna long akha sai, kha imanglāwui maningmana
athumna moreitungli morei ngarumsang khavai sai.
Athumna iwui khak makhuila Egyptli tākhavai zata;
Pharaohwui makārkhami chili ngayin khavai,
kala Egyptwui khaya̱li ngayinkhui khavai!
Chithāda sāda Pharaohwui makārkhami chi nathumwui kakhayak onra;
Egyptwui khaya̱li khangayin chi khayā khamalā onra.
Awui phungva̱bingna Zoanli leilala,
awui mathunna Hanesli vāshunglala;
athumli masāmikharar yur chiwui vang mi kachiva̱ kakhayak samphangra,
china khangachon kala tongkazā maningla kakhayak eina maikashi mi.”
Negebwui sāyurbingwui pongli hāngkhamarān:
pa̱khangapā, ringkhangā ngalei akhawui eina,
kazingkha̱ ava̱ eina kazingkha̱ avā,
chaoshai eina khayonga phara̱ rai;
athumna athumwui lan gadhā eina phunga,
athumwui lupāchum utwui angatongli phungzata.
Kala athumwui vang matongzāki kaje yur akhali phungvāmi.
Kaja Egyptwui khangachon che aman makhavai khamasaina;
chiwui vang ina ali “Makhangatha̱va̱ Rahab” hoi.
Ara athumwui mangāli lungphek akhali kapisanglu;
kala lairikli kapihailu,
naodawui vang china katang makhavai shākhi sāpaira.
Kaja athum ngakaikashe miyurna,
kakapika naobingna;
Athumna khanongli “Mayanglu”,
da hānga,
marānbingli, “Ithumli khamashung
khikhala kaji mamarānalu,
ithumna shākhangai tuimāng hānglu,
makakachang tui marānlu,
apong chi horhaida ngateithulu,
Israelwui Katharawui tui manganāluiasa.”
kajibingna.
Chiwui vang Israelwui Tharkhamathengpana hithāda hānga,
“Kaja nathumna tui hili ningkakachaiwui vang,
rekakharek kala kakapik kakhayāngli shitsangda kachihamwui vang,
khayonkhamāng hi nathumwui vangna,
phākho kajuiva̱ akha ngachakkhaida worshokta kongluinanai khalei chi kashuirak mikkhayip akhawui alungli tākatung kathāna.
Chiwui kakai chiya hamkasāwui ham ngapothamkhai kahai thāda;
kala akai chiwui eina meiyaikhong sākhavai khāngmei,
kala tara̱ sokkhavai kokthikai makhuikapai kathāna.”
Kaja Israelwui Katharapa,
Proho VAREna hithāda hānga,
“Latungda khangasāma nathumli huimira;
va̱ri kahai kala shitkasang chi nathumwui yāng ngasāra”.
Kha nathumna hānga,
“Ngga! Ithuma sigui tongtha̱ra”
chiwui vang nathum yongthuihaora;
kala, “Kathaka sigui tongtha̱ra” jira;
chiwui vang nathumli kakharombingla thākshunra.
Akhana khamachitli thingthing yāmra;
kachungkhana machitta nathum yāmserhaora,
kaphungtonli philānthing shun kahai thāda,
kaphungli machut khavai sākahai
thāda mashokranglakha eina tangda.
Chiwui vang eina
chiwui vang eina lukhamashan chithei khavai akhalatta khāngchikata.
Kaja Vare hiya mashunwui Varena;
ali khangaraibing kalā mahai.
Mah Jerusalemli kapam, O Zionli khalei mibing; nathum machapluimara, nathumwui ringkhangā akhon chili ana lumashanmilakra; shākhaleoda ana ngahānkāmira.
na nathumli yangkashiwui zāt kala rekakharekwui tara̱ milala, nawui Chishutme akhalatta mangathumluimara; kha nathumwui mikna Chishutmeli theira.
Khanukshong khamatui nathumwui khanāna shāra, “Hi khamashunga shongfa china, uivāk vālala, yāvāk vālala, chili zatlu.”
Chiwui thili lupāsa eina sākakhui meoma̱, kala sina eina sākakhui meoma̱bing chi sākhamānghaora, kala makathara ot thāda horyānghaora kala “Thuiulu!” da hāngra.

Kala nathumna luili khayao athā, kala ngaleiwui eina hātkakhui kashakazā chiwui vang ana kazing rotāmira; chiya hāngkhavai makhalei kala sorkhangasai ngasāra. Chitharan nathumwui sha̱keina kahaka seihomphungli phazāra;
luikhavā sei kala gadhābingna, kārphang eina samathākharik kahai, machi kazanga zāt zara.
Kala kachungkhali shaothatthang tārong pitāser kahai tharan, phungrei kajujuili, kala phungrā kachiva̱li kongrāra̱ longra.
Chili lāngda, ana khamā za̱mi kahai saikora ngahāmida raikhami eina, kachāngwui kahor chi zimikwui kahor thāra, kala zimikwui kahor, shini shida, kaja shinithangwui kahor khangarum thāda horra.
Yanglu,
ngapuirut kahai meikhut kashok thāda lungvāt eina;
awui morchaili sākashina pemda amale khamaringa mei thai;
awui khaksui phongkashilonga kahung kākashunga kongra̱ thai, miyurbingli kashimānwui ngayāng eina ngayāng khavai,
kala shongfa thānkhanguibingli nāren sangkhavai rāra.
Kathara zātkhān khamayonwui ngayā thāda nathumna laa sāra; kala mi akhana sipa̱ khongda, Israelwui lunghar

na awui lijei eina khangaphit tharan awui akhon chi Assyriabingwui vang khangachee-khangachā ngasāra.
na athumwuitungli tandi khamiwui khāmshui eina khangaphit kachiva̱ kortarkhon kala thingteilakhon eina ngasoda nganukra.
Kaja riktā khavai apam akha ngarānhaidalei; mha, awungawui vang kathuka kala khamashā meifa akha, meilā thingla sorngasaida ngarānhaidalei;

athumwui siguili kachihānbing,
kakhanang ngasāranu,

mayangmana,
Kha chithālala ana thangmeihaida

kha makaphā kasā shimkhur kala
khayonkhamāng kasāli khangachonbing,

Egyptnaobing mikumona, Vare maningmana;

ngachonmi kahaia chi kongluira,
athum saikora shimānrumhaora.
Kaja
khangazana, kazingkha̱naona sā shailakha,
yaokahoma kachungkhana kharomrālala, kaholala,
ngur-ngurhailala makhangachee thāda;
saikorawui
Vanaobingna khayip thāda,
saikorawui
ana makārmida kanshokmira;
shākmida khāngkhuimira.
Nathumna ngakaishitingting kahaiali ngareiunglu, O Israelnaobing!
Kaja chithanghon nathumwui pāng morei pemting eina nathumna sākakhuia lupāsāwui meoma̱, kala sina eina sākakhui meoma̱ saikora nathumna horhaora.
“Assyriali raighai eina pitā ngasakra,
mikumowui raighai makhaning;
raighai china ali shaitāhaora;
ana raighai chiwui eina yāmra,
yaronnaobingli thoukai phung ngasakra.
Awui lunghārla ngacheerarang thuihaora,
awui akhavābing kathiriri yāmserhaora”
da Zionli mei khaleiya,
Jerusalemli sharkha̱ khavaiya
Yanglu, awunga akhana khamashung khangarong eina mungra;
kala wungnaobingna mashun eina khayaira.
Mi kachiva̱ masiwui eina ngayinkhui khavaipam,
siphan-zingrotwui eina thummi kahai thahaora,
kongra̱na katheng apamli khalong thara,
kachotpamli lunghar-lungkaina khaya̱ sākhami thara.
Chitharan mik katheibingwui mik mamikpiluimara;
khanā kashābingna nganākhuira.
Malung vātkazarbingna mashuning phaningkhuira;
male khangapaobingla ngatarlak eina kala mathinglak eina matuira.
Mangkhama̱ali khangam maholuimara,
kakapik-kakhayāng mili khayākakā maholuimara.
Kaja mangkhama̱ana kapātui matuira,
awui ningna khalāng otmāng phaningra:
Makathara otsak sākhavai,
kathai mili mathokhavai,
kala ra̱kachang mili mamimang khavai.
Kakapikawui makaphā zakshilāka;
ana makaphā awormang sai,
kapikta kachāmbingli shimānkhavai sai;
khangazana miwui shongrun mashunglala.
Khayākakā mina khayākakā ot sai,
kala khayākakā otsak eina ana nganingchinga.
Ngakarthuilu, paikhareka sha̱naobing, iwui akhon nganālu;
yansāngsa̱ kahai naongalava̱bing!
iwui tui khuisanglu.
Kumkhawui thili nathum nganukra,
yansāngsa̱ kahai sha̱naobing nathum;
kaja drakhāthei mamatheimara,
theishirai heithei maungmara.
Kathirlu, paikhareka sha̱naobing nathum,
nganuklu, yansangsa̱ kahaibing,
kashankachon raihaida,
mahonghathailu,
kala bora eina shānneilu.
Lui khamathāthābingwui vang,
athei khamatheiya drakhārongwui vang
malung kaphelu,
kaja iwui mibingwui ngalei,
ka̱shāt ka̱reng phorda lei;
mha, khamathana keinungli khalei ringphāda leikasā shimkhurbingwui vang.
Kaja wungnao konung chihohaora, khanganot keinung ramchohaora;
kaphungla, ngashān khavai tārongla ramsāpam sāchanghaora,
ram gadhābingwui ngareophung ngasāra,
seishangwui seihomphung ngasāhaora;
atungshongwui eina manglā ithumli maheirormiranglakha,
lamhāng chi athei khamathei tampāk mangasāranglakha,
kala athei khamatheiya tampāk chi ngahong kathā mangasāranglakha eina tangda.
Chitharan mashunwui otsakna lamhāngli pānra,
athei khamathei tampāk chili khangarongna mayonmira.
Kala khamashung khangarongwui atheina chingri kahai ngasāra,
khamashung khangarong athei chiya katang makhavai va̱ri kahai kala shitkasangna.
Iwui mibingna chingri kahaipamli pamra;
va̱ri eina ngasām khavai,
khangachee makhaleipamli pamra.
Kala ngahongna ngaikhokhaora,
kala keinung nemphak ngasakhaora.
Tara̱pambingli lui vākaza nathum,
mukkāli kala gadhāli ningkhān eina zat khangasakbing nathum ringkaphā ngasāranu.
Mina nathumli shimān khavai masāla kateili shimān khangasakbing;
mina masāshila kateili sākashibing!
Nathumna sākashimānwui thili nathumli shimān ngasakra;
nathumna sāshikhui kahaiwui thili nathumli sāshida sāra.
O
ithumna nali ngaraili.
Ngathor kachida ithumwui pāngthei ngasāmilu,
kakhanang atamli ithumwui huikhame sāmilu.
Nana ithumwui vang ngararmida ngashumkangkang kahai khon shālaga yurbingna yāma,
konghārna theishirai ngapāmkashai thāda,
khaohna khangawok thāda,
chiwuitungli mina ngawokrora.
kaja ana atungshong pama;
ana Zion mashun kala khamashung khangarong eina chipemira.
Kala ana nawui thotwui,
khavāt makhalei huikhamiwui,
thangkhamei, kala theishingkakhuiwui rungshinga ngasāra;
Yanglu, kapingabingna
chingri kahai khuirā khavai kasābingna soso chapli.
Chanreila sākazammihaira,
khaung khavā mi maleiluimana.
Tuingashit kaihaira, shākhibinglila chinhaira,
mili theikhami maleiluimana.
Ngaleina sifada khāsuthaira,
Lebanon pa̱ngapāda thengchenghaira;
Sharon lamhāng thāhaira,
Bashan eina Carmelna thingnā khanuktai.
“Ara I ngakarthui-ura I khalattawui pangshap sāshap chitheira.
Nathumna lanjimāng phaninga,
kala māfakungmāng shok ngasaka;
nathum khalattawui khakna meithāda shimān ngasakra.
Kala mibingla shunu kharik thāhaora,
kashāt katatshatlaga meili thottā kahai thāra.
Katāva̱li khaleibing,
ina khi sāhairakhala kaji nganāmilu;
kala nathum nganaida khaleibing iwui pangshap theimilu.”
Zionli khalei morei kaphungbing ngacheehaira;
Vare makatheibing nganukhaira:
“Ithumwui ngachaili khipāna chuida khalei meili okthuirumshapra?
Ithumwui ngachaili khipāna khamit makhavai meili okthuirumshapra?”
Kateikazāli yangkakharingbing,
Pheizā-kazāli pāng mathara̱kasangbing,
ashee kashok otli manganākasangbing,
makaphā otli mayang kasangbing china khamashung eina zata,
khangarong tui matui,
athumna kajujuili pānra,
awui ngayinkhui khavaipam lunghārwui raipan ngasāra;
awui kashakazā ali mizāra,
tara̱la mavātmara.
Nawui mik eina awungali awui khamathā alungli theira;
lam khamashā chi namikna theira.
Naningna khangachee phaningungda:
shai khangashaipa,
rākachigat khān katampa chi kali lei?
Dolan mashing kashānpa kali vahao?
da machukra.
Matuikatāpta mashākhuikapai,
malekhangapao thāda hāngkakatota tuitorabing chi nathumna matheiluimara.
Ithumwui phanitphanao sākhavai keinung Zionli yanglu!
Chingri kahai, makhangatha̱ Jerusalem nathumna theira;
chiwui karhui masuthuirarmara,
khara̱la masāshatrarmara.

jahas marākapaipam hakkhamahā kong kathā ngasāra.

ana ithumli huimira.
Nathumwui khānghuira̱ jathaira;
phungva̱li makhalappaithura marikhong kachon mahārpaithura.
Chitharan otla, kashai-kashakla tuimataida ngayar ngarokra;
sheikasha̱bing eina tangdala ngaponkhuira.
Kala chili okkathuibingli khayonkhamāng pheomiserhaida,
khipākha “I kazāli” majiluimara.
Rānganailu, O yurbing;
nganākhui khavai kala shākhui khavai O mibing,
apuk-apagala, chiwui alungli khalei saikora shāserranu.
Kaja miyur saikorali
kala katongali malungthuihaida shimān khavai sāhaira,
shaothat khavai ngarānhaira.
Athumwui shaothat kahaibingli horshokhaora,

athumwui ashee phungreibingli longra.
kala kazingram lairik kakhalui thāda khaluihaora.
Drakhārongna anah kaja̱ thāda,
khaorārongna anah kaja̱ thāda atungshong khalei saikora tātungserhaora.
yanglu, Edomli bichar sākhavai tāhaira,
ina shimān ngasak kahaibingwuitungli.

Edomli hakkhamahā taithatra.
Ramseila, shimseila, mukkāli ngasoda thitrumra.
Aram ngalei ashee eina rurra,
athaona ngalei tumngasakra.
Kaja Zionwui vang athut kakhui zimiksho,
ngalei mei sāthuihaora;
aram katonga thao eina kathot thāra.
meikhut kha̱shon-kha̱thaira.
Thot kachida khikha masāvaimara;
khipākhana khanao eina tangda chili marākānmara.
Kha khalāng eina rikra̱na chili pamra,
pawung eina hangkhāna chili pānra.
Ana chiwuitungli pa̱khangapāwui khara̱ khānmira,
wungnaobingli maphākakhui ning sangmira.
Athumna apam chili Wungram Makhalei Ram hora,
chiwui wungnaobing khikha makhaning ngasāhaora.
Ngaveili ka̱shāt phormithaora,

Ostrichwui pam sāra.

Pawungna athip rāsāda kapumla pumkhuira,

angawor-angawor eina.

kala awui manglāna athumli kazipkhuihaira.
Ana kalā yangmida kachichāwui pam ngayarmihaira,

athumna thot kachida chili pamchingra kala chi katang mavaila athumwui sāra.

khangakhokbingla shāhaora.

Ramfawui pamkhavai chi rāpur ngasāhaora;
khawona titi kala thingrong ngasāra.

mangkhama̱bingna machonmakānpaimara.

akhala maleimara;

Kala
ningli katang makhavai ringkaphā eina ngasoda,

Awunga Hezekiahna pānda zingkum tharāda mati kakā eina Assyriawui awunga Sennacheribna, mathālak eina raipan sākahai Judahwui keinung saikorali rai ratāda khuithuiserhaowa.

Kala Assyriawui awungana Rabshakehli raimi kachungkha khuiphunglaga Lachishwui eina Jerusalemli khalei awunga Hezekiahwuili vāngasaka. Ana chānrei ngalemli khalei kachon ngasa̱ khavai pam ra̱khong atowui ra̱sho-khamorli ngaraipama.
Kala Hilkiahwui naomayara Eliakim mantri, awungawui thuilinga Shebna, kala Asaphwui naomayara kapime Joah athumna shok ngaroka.
Rabshakehna athumli hānga, Hezekiahli hithāda hānglu: Khareia awunga, Assyriawui awungana hānga; nana khili chihānda hiyākha ningnganungkhala?
“Thada tuina da khamatuina rairah kala raiwui pangshapna da phaningla? Khipāli chihānda ili khanganurkhala?
Yanglu, khāmshui azer, ali kashaibingwui pāngli kharunga Egyptli nana chihanli! Ali kachihambingli chithada kasa chi Egyptwui awunga Pharaohna.?
Kha nathumna ili, “Ithuma ithumwui
Ralu, iwui akhavā Assyriawui awungali khangashit akha sālu: Ina sigui thingkhani mira, nana chi tongkhavai mi phākhuishapakha.
Nana sigui-gari kala katongbingwui vang Egyptli chihānhaoda, iwui akhavā raobing ngachaili teomeikap kaje raimi kathāna akhawui tui makhuisangmara kajila?
Chili lāngda ngalei hi sākazam khavai I kharā hi

Chieina Eliakim, Shebna kala Joah athumna Rabshakehli hānga, “Naraobingli Aramaic tui eina kahāngmilu, ithumla Aramaic tui shāsera; kaja Judahwui tui eina hāngakha pantungli khaileibingna shāhaipaishina.”
Kha Rabshakehna hānglui, “Khalatta nathum pai zārumki kaje, ngachira mangrumki kaje pantungli khalei athumli tui hi hāng khavai kharā maningla, nathum māngli hāng khavai iwui akhavāna ili kachihola?”
Chiwui thili Rabshakehna nganinglaga panglāk eina Judah tui eina vaoda hānga; “Kahaka Assyria awungawui tui nganālu;
Awungana hithāda hānga ‘Hezekiahna nathumli machipat ngasakalu; kaja ana nathumli mangatangkhuirarlakmara.
na ithumli ngatangmira, keinung hi Assyriawui pāngli mazang ngasakmara’ da Hezekiahna

Hezekiahwui tui manganālu; kaja Assyriawui awungana hithāda hānga: Ili mashitlu kala iwuili zanglu; chithākha nathum mi kachiva kachichāwui drakhārong, khaorārong eina kashai samphangra kala reicha̱wui eina khamang samphangra —
Ina rāda, theishirai kala drakhāthei khalei, kashakazā, drakhā yāmgui khalei nathumwui ngalei kathā apam akhali makhuivāranglakha chithāsāra.
na ithumli ngatangmira da Hezekiahna nathumli thānnguipaishina. Kachikatha yurwui varebingna awui yur Assyria awungawui pāng eina kankakhui leihairala?
Hamath eina Arpadwui varebing kali leili? Sepharvaimwui varebing kali lei? Athumna iwui eina Samaria khuithuihairala?
Ngalei saikorawui ngachaili vare khipālongna athumwui ngalei iwui pāng eina ngatangshapta,
Kha athumna khituikha mangahānkāla kasaikha pama; kaja awungana mangahānkālu jihaowa.

Chiwui thili Hilkiahwui naomayara mantri Eliakim, awungawui thuilinga Shebna kala Asaphwui nao kapime Joah athumna kashankachon serkhāklaga Hezekiahwuili vai kala Rabshakehwui tui saikora hāngchithei.
Awunga Hezekiahna chi kashā eina ana kashankachon serkhāklaga bora ngavaida
Kala shimwui kashok-kazang yangkhame Eliakim, thuilinga Shebna kala pāngmon ararbingli bora ngavai ngasakta Amozwui naomayara Isaiahwuili chihovai.
Athumna ali ahānga, “Hezekiahna hithāda hānga, ‘Aja zimik hi ringkashi, kakahar kala maikashi zimikshona; nao pharāki jihaira kha mapharāthukthuwa.

Assyriawui awungana Rabshakehli kharinga Vareli mana̱shi khavai chihokharā chiwui tui nawui Proho VAREna shāhaira̱ra kala nawui Proho VAREna shākahai tui chili mamayāmada kahara; chiwui vang eina shākhaida khalei kharingbing hiwui vang nana seihā kasāmilu.’”
Awunga Hezekiahwui raobingna Isaiahwuili khavā eina,
Isaiahna athumli hānga, “Nathumwui akhavāli hānglu, ‘
Yanglu, ina ali manglā akha sangmira, kala chānkharop akha shāda awui ngalemli latungra; kala ina aramli khalattawui raighai eina thingasakra.’”
Rabshakehna latunghaowa, kala Assyriawui awungana Libnahli ngararkasā chi ungthei. Kachiwui vangkhala kaja awungana Lachishwui eina thuihaira kaji shai.
Chitharan awunga china Ethiopiawui awunga Tirhakahwui pao shai kaja, “Nali ngarar khavai thuihaira” da. Kala ana chi kashā eina Hezekiahli paophungmebing chihovāda hānga,
“Nathumna Judahwui awunga Hezekiahli hithāda hānglu: ‘Nana chihānda khalei nawui Varena Jerusalem hi Assyria awungawui pāngli mamimara da kahāng hi nakhalattali kachipatna.
Yanglu, Assyriawui awungana zakshilāk eina sakathānda ngalei saikorawuitungli khi sāhairakhala kaji nana shāhaira laga nali kanmirala?
Ishāvā ngarāna yur khangateibing Gozan, Haran, Razeph kala Telassarli khalei Edenwui mibingli sakakazam chili yur khangateibingwui varebingna kanmila?
Hamathwui awunga Arpadwui awunga, Sepharvaim keinungwui awunga, Henawui awunga kala Ivvahwui awunga kali lei?’”
Hezekiahna paophungmewui pāng eina chithi chi samphangda pāyanga; kala Hezekiahna
