Kala athumwui varebing meili horsangmiserhaira; kaja chibing chiya varebing kachangkhat maningmana, kha mina sākakhui thing ngalungna, hiwui vang saikora chi sākazam kahaina.
Chiwui vang eina O
Chiwui thili Amozwui nao Isaiahna Hezekiahli pao chiphunvāda hānga, “Israelwui
awui pongli
“'Ana nali chipata kala mana̱shiya—
Zionwui kachingva̱ naongalava̱;
ana nakhanukli kui khayita—
Jerusalemwui naongalava̱.
“'Na khipāli mana̱shihaira, kala khipāli temshihaira?
Khipāwuitungli akhon chuihaira kala khipāwuitungli miktingda khayang?
Israelwui Tharkhamathengpālilamā!
Nawui rao shichinlaga
Iwui siguigari kachungkha khuiphungda kaphung kajujuili kāhaira,
Lebanon akatanga ngahong vāshunghaira;
chiwui juimeikap kaji cedarthing ina ta̱teka,
mathāmeikap kaja cypress ta̱teka;
kala vāmeikap kaja kajui chili,
ngahong shāmeikap kaje chili vāshunga da hānga.
Ina ra̱khong khonmanga,
kala Egypt kong saikora ipheimayā eina thengngasaka.
“Ina rilak eina machuk kahaina kaji na mashārangla?
Arui ina sāda khalei hi
ina rida ngarān kahaina,
chiya ngaziplak eina sākahai keinung chi sakhaikachuptāda akha̱ samihaora.
Chitharan ram chiwui mibingwui yāng shimānhaida kaphaning suitāda pa̱ngapai;
kala tampākwui akhar thāda,
nganaozao kahai khawo thāda,
shimtungli kaphora khawo maphorkhuiranglakha
ngahuithat kahai thai.
“Nawui kapi-kapam, khaung-khavā,
kala ili nana malungkhavāt ina thei.
Kaja nana ili malungvāta,
nawui langkaso ikhanāli rāshunghaoda,
iwui narenra̱ nanātangli sangmira,
iwui yāchan nakhamorli sangmira;
kala nana rākhavai apong chi tākam eina hanungra.”

“Kala hina nawui machutkhui khavai sāra: ajakum mā aningsasak eina kashok chi zālu, kakhane kum chiwui rongrar zālu; kakathuma kum yaosangda kahātla hātkhuilu, kala drakhā yāmgui sāda chiwui atheila shailu.
Kala shāk kahai ringda khalei Judah shimkhurwui mibingna latluida ngaleilungli angayung sa̱zangra, atungshong aphāngna athei matheira.
Kaja Jerusalemwui eina shāk kahai akha shokra, kala Zion Kaphungwui eina ringkashoka ashangva̱ akha shokra.
“Chiwui vang eina Assyria awungawui pongli
Ana rākhavai apong chi tāzakta, chi eina latungra, kala ana keinung hili marāzangmara, da
Kaja keinung hi I khalattawui vang kala iwui rao Davidwui vang ina ngākmira.’”
Kala
Chiwui thili Assyriawui awunga Sennacherib thuihaowa, kala shimli latungda Ninevehli apamhaowa.

Kala ana awui vare Nisrochwui shimli khorumpamda leilakha, awui naomayara Adrammelech eina Sharezerna raighai eina sāthathaowa, kala Ararat ngaleili angathumhaowa. Kala anaomayara Esar-haddonna awui pamli munghaowa.
Atam chitharan Hezekiahli kazāda thinanaihaowa. Amozwui naomayara marān Isaiahna awuili rai, kala ali hānga, “
Chieina Hezekiahna phākhoshong ngareizangda
“Phaningung milu, O
Chiwui thili
“Vāda Hezekiahli ahānglu, nashāvā Davidwui
Nala, nawui keinungla Assyria awungawui pāng eina ina kanmira, kala ngākmira.”
“Hi nawui vang
Yanglu, Ahazna zimikwui aka̱la eina atam yangkhavai sākahai chi pheikār tharā hanung ngasakra.” Hithāda sāda zimik tunnanai leikasā chi pheikār tharā hanung ngasaka.
Judahwui awunga Hezekiahna kazālaga raikahai thili kakapi:
Ina kahāngna,
Iwui mirin nganingshaplakha,
I thuiphalunghaorali;
Kathewui ramwui ngaveili ili chizathaira,
mangashong khalei iwui mirin.
Ina kahāngna,
kharingabingwui ngaleili ina
mikumoli matheiluimara,
apuk-apagali kapama athumli.
Iwui pamkhavai sāshimitmihaida khuithuimihaira;
yaokahomawui kachonshim thāda,
kachon kharaka thāda iwui mirin khaluimihaira,
kachon rak khavaiwui eina katathaira.
Ngathor eina thuilaga ngayā eina tangda nana ili katanga chi khuirāmihaira.
Kazing mathangranglakha eina tangda ina ngachonmi khavai chapa;
kazingkha̱ thāda ana iwui ara̱kui sātekmiserhaira;
ngathor eina thuilaga ngayā eina tangda nana ili katanga chili khuirāmihaira.
Yāngyao lah vārok thāda ina khonga,
nāsha̱ thāda ina chapa.
Yangkakā eina imik khanangzanhaira;
O
na iwui ningkhanganunga ngasāmilu!
Kha ina khi hāngrakhala?
Kaja ana ili hānghaira,
kala akhalattana sākahaina.
Iwui pikhangai saikora yāmhaira
ining khānā kahaiwui vang.
O
kala saikora hili imanglāwui kharing khaleina.
Iyavo, ili raimida kharing ngasakfalu!
Yanglu, iwui phākhavaiwui vang kahaka kakhanang samkaphangna;
kha sāshimānki kaji khorchopwui eina nana ili kanmihaira;
kaja iwui morei saikora nakhanukli haimihai.
Kaja Kathewui ramna nali maningshimara,
kathena nali masot mamimara;
leikhurli tāzang kahaibingna nawui mashun otsakli machihānrarmana.
Kharinga china, kharinga china,
nali ningshi;
Ina aja kasā thāda;
avāva̱na anao ngarāli theikhui ngasaka nawui mashun otsak chi.
ithumna sipa̱, tingteilā singda laa sāra;
mirin peichaoda
Kaja Isaiahna hānghaisai, “Athumli khaorāthei akai akha akhui ngasaklu, kala chi moksā kakazā chili neo ngasaklu; chieina awui kakazā chi raihaora.
Hezekiahnala hānghaisai,

Hezekiahna athumli ngarokkhui; ana athumli awui lan kazipshim, lupāsa, sina, nganamkaphāphābing, aman kasaka thao, awui raisāri saikora, kala awui kazip khavai shimbingli khalalei saikora chitheisera. Hezekiahna awui shimli khalei kala awui ngaleili khalei saikora makachithei maleimana.
Chiwui thili marān Isaiahna awunga Hezekiahli rāda hānga, “Mibing hina nali khi hāngkhala? Athum kachishong eina nawuili kharākhala?” Hezekiahna ngahānkai,
“Athumna ngalei katāva Babylonwui eina iwuili kharāna.”
Ana hānga, “Athumna nawui shimli khi theimameihairakhala?” Hezekiahna ngahānkai,
“Athumna iwui shimli khalalei saikora theiserhaira; iwui lan kazip khavai shimbingli khalalei ina makachithei maleimana.”
Chieina Isaiahna Hezekiahli hānga, “Saikorawui
Yanglu, nawui shimli khalalei saikora kala nashāvāwui ot aja eina tangda kaziphaida khalei, Babylonli phungunghaoki kaji atam rārāli; khikha mataimilakmara, da
Nana pharākakhui naomayarabing ngayarda khuithuihaora; Babylon awungawui konungli ahonga ngasāhaora.”
Chieina Hezekaihna Isaiahli hānga, “Nana
Ringpha ngasaklu, iwui mibingli
ringpha ngasaklu, da nathumwui Varena hānga.
Jerusalemli khanim eina hāngmilu kaja awui rai kasā ngachanghaira,
awui kashong pheomihaira;
awui morei sākahaikha mataida
“Lamhāngli
siwukli Varewui chānrei ngatar ngasaklu.
phungrei phungrā kachiva̱ nemngasakra,
kajui khanem ngacham ngasakra,
kokataro khayam ngasakra.
Kala
kala chi mi saikorana theirumsera,
kaja
Kala ina, “Khi vaorakhala?”
da hānga.
Asā khavai saikora khawona,
kala chiwui khamathā saikora luiwui awon kathana.
Thingnāna thenga, awonla ngahui,
mi hi khawolaka.
Thingnāna thenga, awonla ngahui,
kha ithum Varewui tui mashimānda leichingra.
O Zion, ringkaphā pao phungme;
nawui akhon juingasaklu,
O Jerusalem, ringkaphā pao phungme,
juingasaklu, mangacheealu;
Judahwui keinungbingli hānglu,
“Nathumwui Vareli yanglu!”
awui pāngtheina awui vang mungra;
yanglu, awui sāman awuili lei, runkhami awui mangāli lei.
yaonaobing apāngli kazipkhuira;
awui makāli vamzatra;
kala anao khangathāna ava̱bingli ngaironda homzatra.
Tara̱ khipāna pānghom eina tamyanghaira kala kazingram khipāna khāp eina tamyanghaira,
okathuiwui chifa khipāna luk eina tamyanghaira, phungrei phungrābing khipāna khān tamyanghaira?
Ali khipāna machinme sāda tamchithei?
Ana sāki kajili khipāli ngasan?
Mashun shongfa ali khipāna chithei?
Kala ali awor eina theithangkhamei khipāna tamchitheikhala?
Yurbing eina tangdala khongsaiwui tara̱ ngaya̱tkha kathāna,
khān tamkhavaili kapaka akha̱nao kathāna;
yanglu, yikuirambing chili khamanaka chifa kakhāng thāda khāngra.
Lebanonna thing rikkhavai mangaranmirarmara,
kala pha̱phayā khavai sāyurla mangachangmara.
Yur saikora awui mangāli khikha maningmana;
saikora chi ana khikha makhaning khamasaili teomeida shānkhui.
lah khi ngaraikachā chānsam eina ngaheopaira?
Meoma̱va mina semkakhuina,
sina kasaana sina heiror kahaina kala lupāsāwui chā sākashānna.
Kachāma mina pha̱phayā khavai mapārki kaji thing kapangkhui;
kala them kathema phākhuida makhangatha̱ meoma̱ sākhui.
Nathum matheirangla? Nathum mashārangla?
Haokaphok atamwui eina nathumli mahāngchitheimala?
Okathuiwui shimphungawui eina na theishingkakhui maleirangla?
Okathui kuikhamarei atungli kapama chi ana,
kala chili okkathuibing khaoh kathāna;
kazingramli chonlān thāda meivai,
kala ngayinkhui khavai kachonshim thāda rānvai;
wungnaobingli ana khikha makhaning ngasā ngasaka,
kala okathuiwui khamungabingli khikha makhaninga ngasā ngasaka.
Athumli malingsangphāranglakha,
athumli mayaosangphāranglakha,
athumwui angayungna ngaleili masa̱khuichaoranglakha,
ana athumli malikharor tharan athum thenghaowa,
kala thongyāngna mafakung thāda phanthuihaora.
Chithākha nathumna ili khipāli ngaheora,
lah iwui ngaraikachā khipa? da
Katharapa china hānga.
Namik kajuiva̱ yangkālu kala yangkhuilu:
Hibing hi khipāna sākhuikhala?
Saikora sākashoka kala chukkhui kahai,
athum saikorali ichichāwui aming eina hoi;
kaja ava yāng kālaka kala pangshapana,
akha eina tangda manothāmana.
Khisāda hāngkhala, O Jacob,
kala matuikhala, O Israel,
kala iwui mashun iwui Varena matheimithura kajila?”
Nathum matheirangla?
Nathum mashārangla?
okathui ungkashung vākashungwui Kasā akhavāna.
ava kakhanang kala khavān mavaimana;
awui theikakhui maphākhuirarmana.
Ana vānkahaibingli pangshap mi,
kala yāng makhaleibingli pangshap mi.
Mayar ngalā eina tangda khanangra kala vānra;
kala khanganuiyabingna yāng kānhaida kongluira;
Kha
pangshap samphangluira;
athumna khalang thāda angachāng eina yongkāra,
athumna yonglala makhanangmara,
athumna zatlala mavānlak mara.
O shamadrupheili khaleibing,
chingri eina ili nganālu;
mibingna athumwui pangshap samphangluishitranu;
athumna rānganaida hāngranu;
ithum khokkha sāda bicharwui vang anganaisa.
Zingshoshongwui eina khayuia mi akhali khipāna ngatha̱ ngasakta,
awui vang sheba sākhavai ali hokhui?
Awui pāngli ana yurbing horsangmi;
kala awungabingli aphei eina nai,
awui raighai eina athumli ana chifa thāda,
kala phankazat mafakung thāda awui malā eina sāmi.
Ana athumli kharomvāda paisor eina ngaphankhui;
aphei ngaleili mashongkaza̱ thai.
Hi haokaphok eina thuida tho-thotli khipāna kasā,
khipāna shokkhangasak,
kharela, khanaola,
Yireipheiwui mibingna theida ngachee,
okathui kuimareida nganuka;
athum nganaida rākazipserhaira.
Akhana akhali ngachona,
kala, “Maningkharikalu!” da hāngra
them kasaana sina kasaali,
mari khanamana mari kasaali,
kasatkasang tui hāngngarokra;
kala mari khangasun chili “Phālakhaira”,
da hānga;
kala mangatha̱ khavai athumna yotpi shaoshana.
ina kapangshok kahaia Jacob,
iwui ngasotnao Abrahamwui ara̱-azāna;
okathui akatangawui eina ina khuikashoka na
kala tāmeikap kaji achikun matiwui eina hithāda nali hānga;
“Na iwui raona, ina nali kapangkhuida horkahai masāmara”,
mangacheealu, ina ngasomida lei,
kaphaning masuitālu, kaja I nawui Varena;
ina nali yāng ngarumsangmira,
ina nali ngachonmira,
ina nali iwui khayuia yāpang eina kanmira.
Mha, nali malungkhavātbingli pa̱ngapāda maishi ngasakra;
nali khangahanbing chi khikha makhaning ngasāhaora kala shimānhaora.
Nali khangahatbing chili nana phālala masamphangluimara;
nali rai kasābing chi khikha makhaning sāthuihaora.
Khikhalajila nawui Vare, ina nawui yāpang singmida lei;
“Mangacheelu, ina ngachonmira.”
da kahānga chi ina.
Mangacheealu, kalomnao Jacob;
Israelwui mibing nathum!
Ina nathumli ngachonmira, da
nathumwui Ngatangkhame chi Israelwui Kathara china.
Yanglu, ina nali mazaithing,
ahā kakā kazana, kadhar akha sākhuira,
nana phungreibing ngaphit kazamda akha̱ sāngasakra,
kala nana phungrābingli lanji thāda sāmira;
nana mā thāda athumli hamra kala masina athumli phungthuihaora,
kala siphan zingrotna athumli ngapha̱yāng ngasakhaora;
kala nathumna
Israelwui Kathara chili nathumna sochikatra.
Kachāma kala khavātabingna tara̱ phāda;
masamphangmana,
kala ra̱kachangna athumwui male thengkahai tharan,
Israelwui Vare ina athumli mahorhaimara.
Ina ngaikhok kahai kajuili kong long ngasakra;
tampākwui lungli ura̱ shokngasakra;
lamhāngla ina ra̱khong ngasā ngasakra,
kala ngalei kathengpamli ura̱ okngasakra.
Ina lamhāngli cedar, acacia, myrtle kala olive haimira;
Ina ramcholi cypress,
thingsanthing kala matangthing phorrum ngasakra;
chieina mibingna theida,
machukkhuira kala bhap tāngarumra,
kaja hi
Israelwui Kathara china kasemna kaji.
Nathumwui tuingaphun khuirālu da
chonchukla khuirālu da Jacobwui Awungana hānga.
Athumwui meoma̱bing chi khuirāranu,
naoda khi shoknikhala kaji ithumli hāngranu.
Shokkahaibing chi khimameikhala hāngmilu,
shokki kachibing khimameikhala ithumli hāngmilu,
ithum machukvaiga.
Hiwui thili khi shokra̱khala kaji ithumli hāngmilu,
chithāda nathum varebingna kaji ithumna theira;
kaphāla sālu lah kashila sālu,
chithāda ithumna kaphaning suitāra kala ngacheera.
Yanglu, nathum khikha maningmana,
kala nathumwui otla khikha maningmana;
nathumli kapangkakhuia mi chi ningkakachaiyana.
Ina atungshong eina akhali mathuk ngasakta ana rāhaira,
zimik shokkhavaishong eina,
ana iwui mingli ngakaora;
ham kasaana ngalei khanai thāda,
khamungabingli ana phei eina naira.
Ithumna theikhavai rilak eina khipāna hānghaisākhala?
kala “Ana mashunga”
jikhavai khipāna achā hāngkhala?
Khipānakha maphonglakmana,
khipānakha mavaosanglakmana,
khipākha nawui tui mashāsālakmana.
Rimeikapta ina Zionli hānga,
kala ina Jerusalemli khamathā pao mi.
Kha ina akhayang tharan khipākha maleisā;
athumwui ngachaili machinme mazangsāmana,
ngahānkāmi khavai, khipākha maleisāmana.
Yanglu, athum amahāmānga,
athumwui otsak khikha maning;
semkakhui meoma̱ chi khamasai masi kathā mānga.
ina kapangkakhua, iningna kapena;
ina iwui Manglā ali sangmihaira;
yurbingli ana mashun khuirāmira
Ana mavaomara lah akhonla majuimara.
lah shongfali shākhavai masāmara;
naikazam kahai khawo ana masāthatmara,
mitnanai khalei thaomei ana masāshimitmara;
ana ningtongda mashun khuirāmira.
Ana yāng mashimānmara lah ngachāngla machatmara,
okathuili ana mashun eina mamungranglakha,
shamadrupheili khaleibingna awui ain ngaraili.
okathui hārshokkhame kala chiwui eina samphang khangasaka,
chiwuitungli okkathuibingli khak suisangkhame,
kala chiwui lungli yaokathuibingli mangla sangkhame
Vare,
khamashung khangarong eina hokakhuina,
ina nathumli ipāng eina thara̱zatta mayonmi,
ina nathumli mibingwui vang tuingashit akha sāda,
yurbingwui vang kahor sangasakta,
mik khangapeobingli mik rakngasak khavai,
narkahaibingli zurshimwui eina khuishokmi khavai,
tangkhamangli kapambingli phātopshimwui eina khuishokmi khavai hokakhuina.
“I
Iwui tekhamatei katei khipākhali mamimana,
iwui masot rukkakhui ama̱bingli mamimana.
Yanglu, kharebing chi shokhaira,
kala kadharabing ina lānkhamina;
chibing chi mashokranglakha ina nathumli kahāngna.”
awui masot okathui akatangwui eina!
Ngayila ngaphaoranu kala chiwui alungli khalei saikora,
shamadrupheili khalei ngalei eina chiwui mibing saikorala soranu.
Ramchola kala chiwui keinungbingla vaoserranu,
Kedarwui mi kapama kha̱bingla;
Selali kapānbing mathānda laa sāranu,
athumna kaphungton eina vaoranu.
Athumna
shamadrupheili awui masot hāngmiranu.
raimi thāda malung thuihaira;
ana panglāk eina kaiya kala vaowa,
awui yangkashebingli awui pangshap chithei.
Kasangkhawui vang ina kasaikha pamhaira,
I khalatta kasaikha khāngpamhaira;
ara naokhara̱ sha̱nao thāda ina vaoshokra,
ikhamor makāda ngahuira.
Ina phungrei phungrā sākazamhaora,
kala athumwui thingnā-ra̱hā theng ngasakra;
Ina kongrābing yikuiram onngasakra,
kala ra̱khongbing thengngasakra.
Kala ina mik khangapeoali athumna makathei apong eina,
athumna matheilak kaja shongfali thānzatra.
Ina athumwui mangāli tangkhamang chi horngasakra,
kokataropam ashāt sāngasakra,
saikora hi ina sāserra,
ina athumli mahorhailakmara.
Sākakhui varebingli shitkasangbing
meoma̱li “Na ithumbingwui varebingna.”
kajibingli kashamhaida maishi ngasakra.
Khanā khangakhokbing nganālu;
kala mik khangapeobing yanglu,
chithāda nathumna theipai.
Mik khangapeoa lah khanā khangakhoka chi,
ina pao phungkhangasaka chi maningmala?
Iwui chigat kahaiapa thada khangapeo kala
Ana kachungkha theihaira,
kha maphaningkhuilakmana;
khanāva shai kha ana manganākhuilakmana.
Awui khamashung khangarong mangā eina
awui ain reisangda tekmatei khavai.
Kha mibing hiya khalebingna ngaponkahaibingna;
athum saikora akhurli manhaida phātoplungli thumserhaisai;
athumli kanmi khavai makhalei ngaponkhui kahaia sāthuihaira.
Nathumwui ngachaili khipāna nganāsangrakhala?
Rāki kaji chiwui vang khipāna majukvārakhala?
Khipāna Jacobli ngaponkazā mibingwui pāngli sangmihao,
Ithumna
Awui pongli makazatwui vang;
kala ain makashurwui vang maningmala?
Chiwui vang eina awui malungkasā kala raiwui pangshap chi awuitungli heirora.
China ali kuimareida mei chuingasaka,
kha ana matheikhuimana;
ali chuilala ningli maza̱mana.
Kha ara O Jacob, O Israel!
Nali kasaa
“Mangacheealu, kaja ina nali ngatangkhuihaira;
mingsinda hokhuihaira, ara na iwuina.
Nana tara̱lungli zatlala ina ngasomira,
kongli kānlala makheithuimara;
meitungli zatlala machuimara,
meiwonna machuitārarmara.
Kaja Israelwui Katharapa,
Huikhame
Nali ngatangman Egypt mihaira,
ngatangkhui khavai Ethiopia eina Seba mihaira.”
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja iwui vang na aman kasaka khayākakā sāthuda ina leishilaka.
Nali mi eina ngatha̱khui,
namanglā miyur eina lokhui.
“Nawui ara̱-azā zingsho zingtun eina kazipkhuira.
Inaomayara ngarā, inaongalāva̱ ngarā,
okathui achikun matiwui eina khuirāser khavai,
atoli Chihohaolu,
azeli Makhāmalu da hāngra.
Iwui ming eina hokhui kahai saikora,
iwui tekmatei khavai ina sakahaibing,
ina semda sākhui kahaibing.”
Mik kālaga khangapeobing,
khanā kālaga khangakhokbing khuishokserlu.
Yur kachiva̱, kala mi kachiva̱ kazip ngasaklu.
Athumwui ngachaili khipāna phongmishapra̱ kala rida shokkahai chi khipāna chitheishapra?
Athumwui shākhi khamashung khuirāda nganākazaklaga hāngshing ngasaklu.
“Nathum iwui shākhina,
kala I
nathum iwui kapangkakhui raona da
Ili rida kala ili naomeida vare katei maleimana.
huikhame khangatei maleiluimana.
Nathumwui ngachaili makatheia vare maleiranglakha,
ina hāngchitheiya, huimiya kala vaomalānmiya;
chieina nathum iwui shākhina da
I Varelaka, kala aruiwui eina thuida I A chilaka;
ipāngwui eina ngapaikhuishapa khipākha maleimana;
ina ot sai kala khipāna ili hapshaprakhala?”
Nathumli ngatangkhame, Israelwui
Katharapa
“Nathumwui vang ina Babylon asakhai ngasakra,
kala Chaldeanaobingwui khavao chi chapchāt onngasakra.
Nathumwui Kathara
Israelli Kasaa nathumwui Awunga chilaka.”
Ngayilungli apong phākhame,
tara̱lungli shongfa sākhame,
khipāna sigui, siguigari,
kapingpinga raimi khuishokkhala;
athumna pisanghaida mangakarthuiluirarmana,
athum khuira̱ thaomei thāda sāshimithaira da
“Thuikahai chi malaihaolu,
kachama chi machukmaja̱luialu.
Yanglu, ina kadhara ot sādalei;
shokmamāndalei kaji matheimala?
Ina lamhāngli chānrei akha sāra,
siwukli kong longngasakra.
Ramsābing, ramfa kala ostrichbingna ili khayā shira,
kaja ina lamhāngli tara̱ mi,
siwukli kong longngasaka;
Iwui kapangkhui khahai mibingli tara̱ mimang khavai,
I khalattawui vang sākhui kahai mibing hi chithāda sāda athumna iwui masot phongra.”
“Kha O Jacob, nana ili mangakaomana;
O Israel, nana ili sānhaira!
Nana rikkatāchigatwui vang ili yaonao makhuirāmimana,
lah pha̱kaphayā eina ili khayākashi ot masāmana.
Pha̱kaphayā eina ina nali masān ngasakmana;
lah frankincense eina nali masān ngasakmana.
Nathumna ili kashima ja̱hei pheisā eina malomimana,
lah nathumna kachigatwui athao eina ili ningyāng maung ngasakmana.
kha nathumwui moreibing china ili khanang ngasaka,
nathumwui khayonkhamāng china ili sān ngasakhaira.
Iwui mingwui vang eina nathumwui morei pheokhame chi Ilaka,
kala ina nathumwui morei maphaningungluimara.
“Ili phaningung ngasaklu,
Ithum ngayatngaroksa;
nathumwui tuingaphun khuirālu,
chieina mashungada theikhuipai.
Navā khare china morei sai,
kala nawui tuisak samebingna khayonkhamāng sai.
Chiwui vang eina kathara shimwui wungnaobingli ina ningkachaiya,
chiwui vang Jacobli ina sipsā ngasakra kala Israelli chotchāng ngasakra.”
“Kha ara nganālu, O iwui rao Jacob,
ina kapangkhui kahai Israel!
Nali kasaa
nava̱wui wukli nali kasema kala ngachonmiki kaje china hānga:
Mangacheealu, O iwui rao Jacob,
ina kapangkhui kahaia Jeshurun.
“Khikhalajila ra̱kachangpamli ina tara̱ heirorra,
ngalei kathengli kong longmira;
nawui atheili iwui Manglā heirorra,
nawui ara̱-azāli iwui sokhami tāshungmira.
Athumna tara̱pamli khawo thāda phorra,
kongpheili titi kaphor thāda shokra.
“Hipa hina hāngra, ‘I
khangatei akhana khalatta Jacobwui aming eina hora,
khangatei akhana apāngli, ‘
da kapisangra,
kala akhalatta Israelshi shimkhur da aming phokra.”
kala awui Ngatangme, saikorawui
“Ina kharena kala ina khanaoana;
ili lāngda vare katei maleimana.
I kathā khipā lei? Ali vaomalān ngasaklu,
ali lānchithei ngasaklu kala iwui mangāli khuirāranu.
Shokki kaji khipāna rilak eina hānghaisa?
Shokluiki kajila athumna hāngmiranu.
Mangangalu, khangacheela mangacheealu;
rilak eina ina hāngda lānchithei kahai maningmala?
Nathum iwui shākhina!
Ili lāngda Vare katei leila?
Lunghar katei maleimana; I khangatei matheimana.”
Meoma̱ kasābing khikha maningmana, otbing chili ning ringkapha tongkaza maleimana; athumwui shākhibing athum kakhayak samphangra kaji mik einala kala mning einala matheimana.
Khikha makānkhanāwui vang khipāna varebing sākhui kala meoma̱ shungkhui?
Yanglu, awui ngasotabing chili khayak ngasakra, them kathembingla mikumomaya; athum saikora rākazipranu, rānganingranu, ngacheera, khayakrumra.
Mari kasā mina meithātungli sai; yāmkār singda pāngthei katinglaga shaowa, ana thaida yāng maleithuwa, tara̱ mamangthuda vānhaowa.
Mistryna khara̱ ngakhunlaga pencil eina khāna; aramtang eina nānlaga matam eina tamkhuida shimli haikhavai miwui azak khuida miwui khamatha thada sākhui.
Ana cedarthing ta̱khui; lah holmthing, lah shirimthing hākhuilaga khamakanga thing sāda ngahongwui thingrongbingli phorrum ngasaka; ana cedar lingda chi zingrotna hakngasaka.
Chiwui thili chi miwui vang meithing sāngasaka, ana chi ngayarda mei sālaga lumkhuida khamui sai; ana varebingla sākhuida chili khoruma; meoma̱la sākhuida ngakhumshām eina khoruma.
Tangkhai mei sāpamvai kala tangkhai tungli ana sā ruishaida thokahai eina akhalatta lumkhuida hānga, “Aha I lumhaira, mei chi ina theihaira!”
Katai chieina awui varebing, meoma̱ sākhui kala chili ngakhumshāmsangda khoruma; chili seihā sāda hānga, “Ili kahuimilu, kaja na iwui varena!”
Athumna matheimana, theikhavai kaphāla maphāmana; kaja mathei khavai ana athumwui mik sāphinmihaowa, kala bhap tākhui khavai ning shungmihaowa.

Khipākhala machukmaja̱mana, aworla maleimana, theikhavaila maphala, “Tangkhai ina meili riklaga chiwui meithātungli khamuila, sāla ruishaihaira, kala chiwui ajui-arui china ningkakachaiya sāvaisila? Thingum akhali ina ngakhumsangda khorumrala?” da kahāngla maleimana.
Ana hotla zai, kakapik ningna ali thannguithuihaira, kala akhalatta kahuila mahuirar lah “Iwui yāpāngli kakapik maleimala?” da kahāngla mahāngrarmana.
Otbing hi phaningunglu, O Jacob eina Israel,
kaja na iwui raona;
nali ina sākhui, na iwui raona;
O Israel, ina nali mamalaihaimara.
Muiya thāda nawui sakhalāng,
leichui thāda nawui morei ina phanthuimihaira;
ili latunglu, kaja ina nali ngatangmihaira.
vaolu, O okathuiwui kathukbing;
laa sāphokulu, O phungreibing,
O ngahongbing, kala chili khalei thingrongbing!
Kaja
Israelli tekmatei ngasakra.
Nali naopamwui eina sākakhuia nawui Ngatangkhame,
“Ot saikora kasaa
Imāngna kazingram meishoka,
kala okathui phayaishoka,
Ili khipā ngasosākhala?
varebingwui tui khamatuibingli, mangma̱ khangasaka,
thangkhamabingli sa̱na̱ung khangasaka,
kala athumwui theithangkhameili mangma̱ khangasakana;
awui raowui tui ungshung khangasaka,
awui paomebingwui hāngkachithei tui ungshung khangasaka,
Jerusalemwui pongli ‘Chili mi panluira’
da hāngkhame,
Judahwui keinungbingwui apongli ‘Athum sakāluira, kala
ngayāng kahai ina semkāluira’
da kahāngana.
Kathukali, ‘Thenghaolu, nawui kong ina theng ngasakra’
da kahānga,
‘A iwui yaokahomana,
kala ana iwui kharin ungshungmisera’
da hānga;
Jerusalemwui pongli,
‘Ali sakāluira’ kala Khorumshimwui pongli
‘Nawui shimphunga sakāluira’
da kahānga
Ana thao neomi kahaia,
awui mangāli khalei yurbingli yuikhavai kala awungabingwui shānneira̱ raimi khavai,
ngavei mashung khavai awui mangāli khalei
khamongbing shomi khavai,
awui yāpāng ina singkakhuia Cyrusli
“Ina nali rizatra,
kala phungreibing saikora ngacham ngasakra,
ina pithrai khāmongbing akha̱ sāda shaokhaira,
kala mariwui angumbing yortekhaora.
Ina nali tangkhamangwui lanbing mira,
kala thumkahaipamwui pongrun kahaibing,
chieina nana I
Iwui rao Jacob kala kapangkhui kahai Israelwui vang eina ina nali mingsinda kahona,
mingpho khamina, nana ili matheilala.
“I
ili lāngda Vare katei maleimana;
ina shaksāmi, nana matheilala,
zingshowui eina thuida
zingtunshong vāshungda,
ili lāngda katei maleimana kaji mina theikhavai.
I
Kahorla tangkhamangla ina sai,
kaphāla kashila ina sai,
saikora hi kasā
O kazingram, atungwui eina kazing rotā ngasaklu,
kala kazing eina khamashung khangarong rotā ngasaklu;
okathuina chi mayākhuida,
huikhami kharshokranu,
kala china khamashung khangarongla shokngasak khavai ngasāranu;
ham kasaali hamna ngararakha chitharanu!
Ham kasaali leikhona, na khi semlikhala da hangla?
lah nawui kasā hi angathan makāmana jila?
Avāva̱li “Nana khi pharālikhala?”
lah ava̱va̱li khi eina na naora̱likhala?
da kahāng mi chili kakhanang ngasāranu.
Israelwui Kathara,
kala ali kasaa
“Inao ngarāwui apongli nana khi ngahān khavai lei,
lah ipāngwui otsakwui pongli ili khi kaso khavai leikhala?
Okathui ina sākhui, chiwuitungli mi sai;
kazingrambing phayaikashok chi ipāngna,
kala chili khalei saikora chili ina kasoda kashokna.
Ali ina khamashung khangaronglungli mathotkhuihaira,
kala ina awui apong saikora ngatar ngasakra;
ana iwui keinung sakāra,
kala iwui tukthui kahaibingli ningkhān mira,
amanla, lah sāmanwui vangla maningmana,”
da saikorawui
“Egyptwui lan, Ethiopiawui ot,
Sabeanwui mi asho alep khaungbing,
nathumwuili rāda nathumwui ngasāra,
athum nathumwui thishurra;
athumna marikhara̱ ngathānlaga rāra,
kala nathumli ngakhumsangda rākhorumra.
Athumna nathumli poda hāngra:
‘Varena nathumāngli ngasomi, khangateina maningmana,
A maningla vare katei maleiluimana’”.
Kachangkhat, nava khalatta khangathuma Varelaka,
O Huikhame, Israelwui Vare.
Athum saikorali khayak ngasakta pa̱ngapāmihaira,
meoma̱ sākakhuibing manātkaphotserhaira.
katang mavaila nathumli kakhayakla kala pa̱khangapāla malei ngasakmara.”
Kaja kazingram kasaa,
(A Varena!),
okathuiwui maong semkhuilaga chi sākakhuia
(ana chi sakai;
ngapa̱khangapā kasā maningla,
somkhavai semkakhuia!)
“I
Tangkhamangramli,
ina ngathumda mamatuimana;
‘Maphākakhuilungli ili phālu’ da
Jacobwui ara̱-azāli mahāngmana.
khamashung chi ina lānmiya.”
“Nathum khalatta kazipkhuilaga rālu,
rānganaingarumlu, miyurbingwui thinengbing!
Athum theikhuikathei maleimana,
thing meoma̱ phungkazatabing athum,
kala mahuimikharara meoma̱ chili khorumpama.
athum ngasankhuingarumranu!
Achālakha hi khipāna hāngkhala?
Achālakhawui chi khipāna lānmi?
Chi
Kala I maningla vare katei maleiluimana,
khamashung Vare kala Huikhame,
I maningla katei maleiluimana.”
“Ili ngareiungda huikhuilu,
okathui akatang saikora!
Kaja I Varena, katei maleiluimana.
khamashung khangaronglungli ikhamorwui eina shokhaira,
malatungluiki kaji tuina:
Yur kachiva̱na khuktida ili khorumserra,
tui kachiva̱na shākhi sāserra.”
mibingna iwui pongli hāngra;
ali ngakaikashebing awui mangāli rāda kakhayak samphangra.
Israelwui ara̱-azā saikora
mangāli khayui kala tekhamatei ngasāra.
“Belna ngakhumzanga, Nebona ngahamzanga,
athumwui meoma̱ sāyur kala sha̱kei akhumli lei;
nathumna phungkazat hikatha ot hi kachota sayurbingli kharita otphun sāda chiphuna.
Meomabing chi kurzang ngakhumsanga,
athum kharitphun chiwui eina mahuikhuirarmana;
kha athum khalatta mingaleili narkahaiya sāda vāhaowa.
“O Jacobshi shimkhur,
Israel shimkhurwui shāk kahai saikora ili nganālu.
Naopamwui eina thuida kapharā eina tangda nathumwui vang ina phungmi;
nathum kasar eina tangda I chi Ana,
kasārsam kashok eina tangda ina nathumli phungra.
Ina sākakhuina, Ina phungra,
ina phungda huimira.
“Nathumna ili khipāli pāndamra,
kala ili khipāli ngaraicha ngasakra,
kala ngaraichaia da khipāli ngaheora?
Lupākhaowui eina sina pāngtongda khuikashokbing,
kala lupāsa tamkhavaili onkashok bingna;
sina kasā mili masākhui kala ana vare akha sākhui;
chiwui thili athumna ngakhumshāmhaida khoruma!
Chi athumna yartuili khāngkāda ngava̱zata,
athumna chi awuipamli khāngkhaninghai, kala china chili nganinga;
chiwui eina ana mangatha̱luipaimana.
Akhana ngakaolala, mangahānkāmana kala awui kakhanangwui einala mahuimirarmana.
“Hi phaningkhuida majuklu,
khalāng ot kasābing, hi ningli phaningkhuilu.
achālakhawui kachama otbing chi phaningunglu;
kaja I Varena, kala katei maleimana;
I Varena, kala ikatha khipakha maleimana,
haokaphokwui eina akatang,
kala achālakha atamwui eina thuida mashokrang kaji otbing lānmida hānga,
‘Iwui hāngkachithei leichingra,
kala iwui kharin saikora ungshung ngasakra,’
zingshoshong eina sāshaiwui vānao,
iwui kahāng athishurda kasā mi akha katāva̱wui eina hokhuira,
ina hānghaira, kala chi ina ungshung ngasakra;
ina ngarānhaira, kala ina chi sālakra.
“Ili nganalu, ning khamakangbing,
na ngatangkhamiwui eina katāva̱li lei:
Iwui ngatangkhami ina nganaimeida khuirāda lei,
chi katāva̱li maleiluimana,
iwui huikhami mahuinganongmara;
ina Zionli huimihaora,
iwui tekhamatei Israelwui vang.”
O Babylonwui kachingva̱ naongalava̱;
wungpamkhong makhalei ngaleili pamlu!
O Chaldeanaobingwui naongalava̱,
kaja nali anuiya kala khamathava̱ maholuimara.
Shingkhur khuida mā runglu,
mairār khuitāhaolu,
katuma phahon raitāhaolu, naphei suthaolu,
kala kong makānzatlu.
Nawui khamahong mafakhamara,
nawui khayā khamalā theira;
ina athut khuida mi khipākhalila mathāhaimara.
Ithumwui Ngatangkhame,
aming saikorawui
Israelwui Kathara china.
Va̱ri eina pamlu, kala tangkhamangli zanglu,
O Chaldeanaobingwui naongalāva̱;
kaja nali wungrambingwui akhavaiva̱ maholuimara.
Iwui miyurli I malungvāthaowa,
iwui shimluikatli ina mathar ngasakthuda horhaowa,
athumli ina nawui pāngli horsangmi,
nana athumli lukhamashan machitheimana;
kasarnaoli nana nawui kharit otphun chiphuna.
“Ina akhavaiva̱ sāchingra”
da nana hānga,
chithahaoda nana nawui ningli hikathā hi maleithu,
rāki kajila maphaningthuwa.
tāphup eina kapamva̱,
“Ina, ili lāngda khipākha maleiluimana;
I ra̱meinao akha sāda mapamara, naongarā
kashimānla matheiluimara” da
naningli hithāda phaninga.
nawui khanong kayākha leisālala,
kala nana laivā kathembingwui pangshap kayākha leilala
naongarā kashimān eina ra̱mei kapam nali hakmahalāk eina rāshungchaora.
Nawui makaphāwui alungli na tāphuphaida,
“Ili khipānakha matheimana” da nana hānga;
nawui thangkhamei eina aworna thānnguihaira,
kala naningli hithāda hānga,
“Ilaka, kala I maningla khipākha maleiluimana.”
Kha makaphā nawuitungli rāra,
chi nana marunrarmara;
kalāshāt nawuitungli rātāra,
chiwui shāt nana mangatangrarmara;
nana makathei kashimān kaho kashuirak eina nali rāra.
Nawui leivā kathem kala khanong kayākha kasāli nganingtitlu,
nganuilakha eina thuida sākahai chi,
ungkashungla leilapai;
khamachitla machitshapsālapai.
Hāngkhamebingli ngasankazatna na sānhaira,
kazingram sirāli yangda, khayeiung khayeivāda,
changwokwui athishurda,
nali khi shokra kaji hāngkhamebing athum china thuinganingda nali huikhuiranu.
Yanglu, athum mafakung kathāna,
meina chuitāhaora;
meiwonwui kasā pangshap chiwui eina athum
khalatta makanshokrarmara akhalatta lumpam kapai meithā,
mina mangāli pamkapai mei maningmana!
Nana sākhangarum athum chi chikathābingna,
nali nganuilakhawui eina yorzākahaina;
athum kachichāwui shongpongli kuizata;
nali huimi khavai khipākha maleimana.
Hi nganālu, O Jacobwui shimkhur,
Israelwui ming eina hokhui kahaibing,
Judahwui eina kharā naothei,
kala Israelwui Vareli hāngkaphatlala,
mashun kala angatar makhaningbing.
Kaja athum khalatta tharkhamathenga
keinungwui ming khuiya;
kala athum khalatta Israelwui Vareli chihama;
saikorawui
“Khare otbing ina achālakha phongshokhaira,
ikhamorwui eina shokta chibing chi theingasakhaira;
chiwui thili ina hengsāda kasā eina chibing chi rāshoka.
Khikhalajila nathum ningmarara kaji ina thei,
kala nathumwui akahung mari thāda marara,
kala khavei pithrai thai.
Ina nathumli achā hānghairasai,
athum marāshokranglakha ina nathumli vaosanghairasai,
kaja iwui meoma̱na kasāna,
yekkakhui kala heikakhui kemeona kakasona
chihaipaishina da.
Nathumna shāhaira, ara saikora hi yangkhuilu,
laga hi maphongshokmarala?
Aja eina thuilaga nathumli kadhadhar ot shāngasakra,
nathumna matheilakasā ngathum kahai otbing.
Athumli arui sākakhuina, atam masāngranga,
ayā achāhon rida nathumna chikathā mashālakranga,
yanglu, ina chibing theikahaina da nathumna hānghaipaishina da.
Nathum mashālakranga, nathum matheilakranga,
achālakhawui thotwui eina nathumwui khanā mawutranga.
Kaja nathumna yansailak eina sāra kaji ina thei,
kala pharāthang eina thuida nathumli ngakaikashe hoi.
Imingwui vang eina ina malungkhavāt thāhaikasāna,
iwui masotwui vang eina ina nathumli ngarin kahaina,
ina nathumli makatathai khavai.
Yanglu, ina nathumli langhaira,
kha lupāsā mathāmana;
Ina nathumli kakhanangwui sharkha̱li chāng yanghaira.
Iwui mingwui vang, Iwui mingwui vang, chi ina kasāna,
kaja kathāda iwui ming sāmakhaopaira?
Iwui tekhamatei ina khangateili mamimara.
ili nāshunglu.
A chi ina, ina kharena kala ina khanaoana.
Ipāngna okathuiwui shimphunga sākhui,
kala iwui yāpang eina kazingrambing phayaishoka;
ina athumli kaho tharan,
athumna shoknganingngaruma.
“Nathum saikora kazipta rānganālu!
athumwui alungli kachipāna otbing hi phongshokmihairakhala?
Ali
ngarān kahai athishurda Babylonli ana sāki kaji sāra,
kala awui pāngna Chaldeanaobingli mamayāmara.
I, I eina tangda ikhamor eina ali hokhui,
ali ina khuiunga, kala ana awui otsakli reisangra.
li rānganaida hi nganālu,
haokaphok eina thuida ina ngathumda mamatuiranga,
chi rākashok atamwui eina thuida I chili leihairasai.”
Ara Proho VAREna awui manglā ili chihorāhaira.
Nathumwui Ngatangkhame, Israelwui Katharapa,
“I
kannā khavai nathumli tamkachitheiana,
nathumna vāki kaji apongli thānkazatana.
Iyavo, nathumna iwui ningkhamibing chi nganākhuihaisāsi kaja!
Nathumwui chingri kahai chi kong thāhairara.
kala nathumwui khamashung shamadru khangaphao thahairara;
nathumwui naothei situiyākhahairara,
nathumwui ara̱-azā chiwui athāyakhahairara;
athumwui ming makatatlakmara,
iwui mangāwui eina kashimānla mashimān ngasaksamara.”
Babylonwui eina shokulu,
Chaldeanaowui eina yāmulu,
hi khamathānwui khon eina vaolu,
chi chishātlu;
okathui akatang vāshungda chihovālaga hānglu,
“Awui rao Jacobli
Siwukli khamakān tharan athum mara̱changmana;
ana athumwui vang lunghār chiwui eina tara̱ longshok ngasaka;
lunghār chili ana kashao eina tara̱ kapha̱kshoka.
kala katāva̱li khalei nathum, ili nāshunglu.
Naopamwui eina
Ishāva̱wui naopamli leilakha ana ili ming phokmihairasai.
apāngwui khaya̱li ana ili thummi;
yutkazak kahai malāthing thāda ana ili sākhui,
kala awui malākhongli ili thummihai.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Na iwui raona, Israel;
nali iming tekmatei ngasakra.”
khikha makhaning aremawui vang iwui yāng chishothaira;
chithālala iwui mashun
Ili hankhamila Varewuili lei.”
Ara ili awui rao sākhavai naopamli semkakhuia,
Jacobli awuili khuiung khavai,
kala Israel awuili kazip khavai vang,
kaja
kala Varena iwui yāng ngasāhaira—
Israelwui phāri kahaili khāngmathot khavai,
nana iwui rao sāki kaji hi ngavenglak kahai otna;
ina nali kahor akha sākhavai yurbingli mira,
chieina iwui huikhami okathui akatang eina tangda vāshungra.”
Israelwui ngatangkhame, kala awui Katharapa,
chinkākhailak kahaia,
miyurbingna ningkachai kahaia,
khamungabingwui rao chili,
“Awungabingna theida ngakarthuira,
wungnaobing athum khalatta ngakhumshāmsangra.”
Khikhalajila ningkatonga,
Israelwui Katharapa
nali kapangkakhuia
“Ngahankhangai atamli ina nali ngahānkāhaira,
huikhami atamli nali ngachonmihaira;
ina nali phārimi kala mibingli nali tuingashit sāda mihaira,
ngalei sakā khavai,
ngayāng kahai shimlui, yartālui khavai;
phātopnaobingli, ‘Ralu’ tangkhamangli khaleibingli,
‘Shoklu’ da hānga.
Athumwui kazatpamli phauira,
kaphung khangai saikorali athumwui wonui samphangra.
Masi kala zimikwui kasā chinala athumli masāza̱mara,
kaja athumli lukhamashana china thānmira kala ura̱pamli athumli ngakuimira.
“Iwui phungrei saikorali shongfa akha sāra,
kala iwui mibing zatngatā khavai chānrei ngarānmira.
Yanglu, iwui mibing katāva̱wui eina rāra,
atung kala zingtunshongwui eina,
kala hibing Syenne lamwui eina rāra.”
sochikatlu, O okathui;
mathānda laa sālu, O phungreibing.
Kaja
kaja awui mibingli ninglum ngasakhaira,
kala awui kakhanangbingli lumashanmira.
Kha “
iwui
“Na̱ mangda khalei naoli ava̱va̱na malaishapla, awui naopamwui eina kashoka awui naomayarali malumashanmarala?”
Athumna malaihaisālala, iva nali mamalaimara.
Yanglu, nali iwui pāngmayāli yeksanghaira;
nawui phākhobing iwui mangāli leichinga.
“Nawui sākakābingna nawui sākakazambingli thākmeiya,
kala nali shimān khangasaka athum chi nawui eina thuihaora.
Namik kuimareida kapeiyanglu,
athumna nawuili rākazipta lei.
I ringlakha saikora hi nana sāri sāda ngavaira,
nana chi khāmkahaiva̱wui thāda ngavaira.
“Kachangkhat eina nawui sākazam kahai,
kala nawui chokahaipambing,
kala nawui sākhayāng kahai lam —
kachangkhat eina ara na nawui mibingwui vang teonahaora,
kala nali mayuisang kahaibing katāva̱ thuihaira̱sāra.
Nawui chapkhangachā atamli pharākasang naongarā china,
‘Apam hi iwui vang teonahaira;
iwui vang sompam khavai mashā ngasakmilu’
da hāngfara.
Chitharan nawui ningli nana hāngra:
Khipāna hibing ili pharāmikhala?
I, kakhanangva̱ kala kashumva̱na,
katāva̱li ili athā kahaina;
laga khipāna ruikāser kajikhala?
Yanglu, imang nothāhaisai;
thakha katharan rāserluihao?”
Hithāda Proho VAREna hānga,
“Yanglu, yurbingwuitungli ipāng khāngkāra,
kala mibingli iwui khamachut chitheira;
athumna naomayara ngarāli vamrāra,
kala naomayarabingli athumwui khumkhorli phungungra,
kala nanao ngalāva̱bingli yartuili tongungra.
Awungabingna nathumli nganaokakhuiya avāva̱ ngasāra,
awungva̱bingna nathumwui khanganaova̱ ngasāra.
Athumwui mai ngaleili mashunzangda nathumli khorumra,
kala nathum pheiwui chifa athumna malekra.
Chieina I
Ili khangaraibing chi mai mashimara.”
Kapangawui eina awui sāshai khipāna ngapaikhuishap,
lah sakashe khamungana nar kahai khipāna ngatangkhuishap?
Kachangkhat,
“Kapangawui narkahaibinglila khuishokra,
rekakharekawui sāshai ngapaikhuira,
kaja nali khangahātbing chili inala ngahātra,
kala nanao ngarāli ina huikhuira.
Nali rekakhareka athumli ina khalattawui asā chishaira,
kala zam thāda athum khalattawui ashee eina marip ngasakra,
chieina asā khavai saikorana,
I nathumwui huikhame
Jacobwui Pangshapa china da theira.”
Hithāda
“Nava̱li ina chiho khavai kapāngwui lairik kali lei?
Lha, iwui kachishuta khipāwui pangli nali ina yorsanghao?
Yanglu, nawui khayonkhamāngwui vang nali yorkahaina,
kala nawui khalāngwui vang nava̱li ina chiho kahaina.
“I kharā tharan chili khisāda mi maleisāthu?
Kaho tharan chili ngahānkā khavai khipākha maleithu?
Ipāng sha̱nāhaida mahuimirarmara jihaola?
Maningakha huimi khavai I pangshap maleithula?
Yanglu, ina kakahar eina shamadru thengshapa,
kongbingla siwuk sāngasaka;
tara̱ khavātwui vang athumwui khaih nganamshishuna,
kala ra̱kachang eina thiya.
Kazingrambingli ina tangkhamang ngavaimi,
kala bora athumwui faror khavai sāngasaka.”
Tamkachitheiwui male Proho VAREna ili mi,
chieina ningkachotali kathāda tui eina ngasoda hāngphaneprakhala kaji ina theikhavaina.
Ngathor kachida ana mathota,
kala tamkakhuibing athum thāda shākhavai ikhanā ana mathing ngasaka.
Proho VAREna ikhanā mathing ngasakhaira,
kala ina mangakaishimana,
ina khanuk masa̱naungmana.
morhā kachichaibingli iwui maisor ngareimi;
mashora mashokharor kala kakhayakwui eina imai mathumhaimana.
Kaja Proho VAREna ili ngachonmi,
chiwui vang I mapa̱ngapāmana;
chiwui vang imai meizailung thāda khāngpamda,
I mamaishilakmara da ina thei.
ili khipāna ngahātshapra?
Ithum nganingkāngarumsa.
Iwui yangkashe khipākhala?
Iwui ngalemli ralu jilu.
Yanglu, Proho VAREna ili ngachonmi,
I yona da khipāna phongshapra?
Yanglu, athum kashankachon thāda tāngurhaora;
makungna shaiserhaora.
Nathumwui alungli
kala awui raowui khon khipana nganāli,
tangkhamangli zatta kahor makathei,
chithālala
Yanglu, thing khuisangda mei kasābing!
Nathumna thing riksangda mei kasāwui kahorlungli zatlu!
Nathumna hi ipāngwui eina samphangra;
nathum kakhanang ringkashili pisangra.
“Ili nganālu, Huikhami kharomkazatbing,
nathumli shānshok-khavai lunghar,
kala nathumli harkhui khavai lungkotpam chili yanglu.
Nashāvā Abrahamli, kala nathumli kapharāva̱ Sarahli yanglu;
kaja amāng khalei tharan ina hokakhuina,
kala ina ali somida kachungkha sāngasaka.
Kaja
Chiwui ramchopam saikorali ana ning lumngasakra,
chiwui lamhāng Eden thāngasakra,
chiwui siwukla
chili ringkaphā, khamathān, ningkashi khami,
kala laakhon kashā samphangra.
“Ili nganālu, iwui mibing;
iwui yur, ili nāshunglu;
kaja iwui eina ain akha shokra,
iwui mashun mibingwui vang kahor akha sāda rara.
Iwui ngatangkhami rānganaishunhaira,
Iwui huikhami rāhaira,
mibingli iwui pāngthei eina mungra;
shamadrupheibingna ili ngaraidalei,
kala iwui pāngli chihānpamda lei.
kala azingshong okathuili yangtālu;
kaja kazingram meikhut thāda shimānhaora,
okathuina chonshi thāda tāngurhaora,
kala chili kapambing hāmi thāda thihaora.
Kha iwui huikhami leichingra,
kala iwui ngatangkhami katang mavaimara.
“Khangarong kathei nathum, ili nganālu,
wuklungli iwui ain khalei mibing,
miwui kakhararli mangacheealu,
kala athumwui khamashātli ning masuitaalu.
Kaja kachon thāda makungna athumli shaihaora,
kala kalomna athumli sahā thāda shaihaora;
kha iwui kanshokkhami leichingra,
iwui huikhami thot kachida vāshungra.”
Thuilu, thuilu, yāng shokngasaklu,
O
thuikahai atamwui thāda thuilu.
Rahabli akha̱ sāmi kahai kala dragonli rungkathat chi na maningmala?
Hakkhamahā kathukawui tara̱ kala shamadru chi theng khangasak chi na maningmala;
kathuka shamadruwui shongfa sāmida ngatangkhui kahaibing kān khangasak chi na maningmala?
Kala
katang makhavai khamathān athumwui kuitungli leira;
khamathān ringkaphā athumna samphangra,
kakhanang ringkashi athumwui eina yāmthuihaora.
“Nathumli ringpha khangasaka chi ina;
thikapai mibingli khangachee,
kala khawo thāda sākhui kahai miwui naomayarabingli khangachee,
nawui
kazingrambing phayaishokkhame,
okathuiwui shimphungabing kasema,
rekakharekawui malungkhavāt china,
nali shiman khavai kasawui vang,
langpongda ngacheekapama na khipakhala?
Rekakharekawui malungkhavāt kali leikhala?
Ngakhumshām ngasak kahaia chili thāklāk eina chihomira;
a mathimara kala chomli mazangmara,
kashakazāla mavātmara.
“Kaja shamadruli mathotkhuida khangaphao ngarungninghai khangask,
saikorawui
Kala iwui tui nakhamorli sangmihaira,
ipāngwui khaya̱li thumihaira,
kazingram phayaishokta,
okathuiwui shimphunga rungkhuida,
‘Nathum iwui miyurna’”
da Zionli hānga.
nganingkālu, O Jerusalem,
awui malungkhavātwui tengkot,
akhan tāshungda mangsanghaira,
yuichāchāng kahaiwui khorāmna.
Ana pharākakhui naomayara saikorawui alungli ali thānmi khavai akhala malei;
ana nganaokakhui naongarā saikorawui alungli apāng thara̱zat khavai akhala malei.
Khanini hi nawuitungli tārorhaira—
khipāna nali hāngphanepra?—
sākakhayāng eina sākakathān, chām eina raighai;
khipāna nali ninglumngasakra?
Nawui mibing vānhaira,
seichui khalenli khaman thāda athum shongfa ngapāk kajida pisanga;
athum
nathumwui Varewui kakharar china pemtinghaira.
Chieina nganālu, nathum kachotabing,
khamaripabing, kha zam eina makhamaripbing;
awui mibingwui vang phayetkhame china hithāda hānga:
“Yanglu, nathum pāngwui eina yuichachang kahaiwui khorām;
iwui malungkhavātwui khoklui ina khuithuimihaira;
nathum mamangluimara;
kala nathumli rekakharekawui pāngli ina sangmira,
‘Ngakhumsanglu, nathumwuitungli ithum naikāra’
da kahāngbingli;
kala nathumwui khumkhor ngalei thāda kala athumwui vang shongfa thāda sākhamibingli mihaora.”
nawui yāng shirinkhuilu O Zion;
nawui khamathā sāri ngavaikhuilu,
O Jerusalem, kathara keinung;
kaja ahui marim kashoka kala makathar mi nathumwuili marāluimara.
Na khalatta chifa thuikathantāhaolu, ngakarthuilu,
O narkahaiya Jerusalem,
nakahungli khalap kahai chiwui eina,
O narkahai Zionwui naongalava̱.
Kaja
Kaja Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Khareli iwui mibingna Egyptli kharam vākhavai tai, kala ngalang maleila Assyrianaobingna rekhareka.
Ara iwui mibingli khikha makhaningwui vang khuithuihaira, ara ina khi sārakhala? da
Chiwui vang iwui mibingna iwui ming theira, chieina chitharan, I hili leili, da ina kahāng chi athumna theikhuira.”
chingri kahai vaomalānkhame,
khamathāwui paokaphā khuikaphunga,
huikhami vaomalānkhame,
Zionli “Nawui Varena munga”
da kahānga awui phei kayakha mathado.
Nganālu, nawui khamayonabingna vaoda lei,
athum khamathānwui laa sarumda lei;
kaja Zionli
Sākathān kahai Jerusalemwui apambing,

kaja
ana Jerusalem ngatangkhuihaira.
miyur saikorawui miktāli chitheimihaira;

makathar ot masāza̱alu, awui eina shokta,
nakhalatta tharngasaklu,
Kaja nathum katotsisi eina mashokmara,
kala mayāmzatmara.
Kaja
kala Israelwui Varena nathumwui khanukshongwui kankhamena.
Yanglu, iwui raona mataisangra,
ali mai kāda masot mira,
kala juilāk kahai ngasāra.
Ali kachungkhana matakhakhai—
amai ngapa̱-kahokhaida, mizak mathāmana;
kala awui phasā miwui naomayarawui mathāmana—
awungabingna awui vang khamor katimhaora;
kaja athumli mahānghaikasā chi athumna theira,
kala mashālakrangkasā chi athumna theikhuira.
Kala khipāli
Kaja awui mangāli ana akharnao thāda khārshoka,
kala ngalei kathengwui eina angayung sa̱kashok thāda;
ali yangngai khavai asho-alepla maleimana;
ningchāng khavai khamathā akhala maleimana.
Mibingna ali yangkharinga kala mamayāmana;
wukkakhananga mi, sikafa thathei kahaia;
mibingna mayangngaimada mai ngareithui kahai thāda,
ali yangkharinga, kala ithumna ali machāpmimana.
kala ithumwui sikafa phungthuimihaira;
kha ithumnava ali Varena khanang khangasakna,
shaomi kahaina, kala chotngasak kahaina da phaninga.
Ali ithumwui khayonkhamāngwui vang phasa shiningmi,
ali hāngkhamachin chieina ithumli kharai samphanga;
kala awui khamāchon china ithumli raimi.
kachichā khalattawui apongli thuihaira;
chieina ithum saikorawui morei awuitungli
kha ana khikhakkha mashokmana;
shaothat khavaipamli thānkhava yaonao thāda kala yaohah kachichāpwui mangāli akhak makashoka yao thāda,
ana akhamor mamakālakmana.
Rekharekta bichar sālaga ali khuithuihaowa;
kaja kharingbingwui eina ali katatthuihaira kaji,
iwui mibingwui khalāngwui vang kashaona da awui mibing khipāna chukmajakhala?
Kha ali khamā za̱khangasak kala ali sifa khangasak chi,
kala
kala awui pāngli
Amanglāna kachotwui heithei chi theida ningyāng ungra;
iwui khangaronga raona awui awor eina,
kachungkhali khamashungli shānsangra;
kala athumwui khayonkhamāng ana phungmira.
kala ana kapingabingli ngasoda khangapon chi ngayarra,
kaja ana kathi eina tangda manglā chihomi,
kala khayonbingwui mishānli shānruma;
chithālala ana kachungkhawui morei phungmi,
kala khayonkhamāngbingwui vang pomi.
laa sāda panglāk eina vaolu;

Kaja horkahaiva̱wui naongarāna,
fakathuiva̱wui naongarāli chungmeira da
Nathumwui kachonshim mashāsang ngasaklu,

matiphaialu, khara̱ sāngsang ngasaklu kala pākra̱ makang ngasaklu.
Kaja nathumna uishong yāshong hakmeida phayaishokra,
nawui ara̱-azāna miyurbing khuira,
ngachakyāng kahai keinungbing mi pamluishit ngasakra.
Mangacheealu, na mai mashimara;
mapa̱ngapālu, nathumli mamaishi ngasakmara;
kaja yaronlakhawui maikashi chi na malaihaora;
kala ra̱khameiwui khamashāt chi maphaningungluimara.
Khikhalajila nawui Kasā Akhavā chi nagaharana,
saikorawui
Israelwui Kathara chi nawui Ngatangkhamena,

Kaja chiho kahaia wukkakhananga preiva̱li,
yāronshapawui kasham kahai preiva̱li hokakhui thāda
Kasha̱khawui vang ina nali horhaowa,
kha lumashanlāk eina ina ngakuikhuira.
Malungkhavātna pemhaida kasha̱khawui vang imai nawui eina ngareithui kahaina,
kha katang makhavai leikashi eina ngasoda nali lumashanmira da nathumwui Ngatangkhame,
Noahwui tara̱ chi okathuili maphongluimara da ina ngashit kahai thāda,
nathumlila I malungmavātluimara kala makhararluimara da ina ngashithaira.
Kaja phungreibing pākthuihaipai kala phungrābing khuithuihaipai,
kha iwui makhangachei leikashi nathumwui eina mapākthuimara;
kala iwui chingri kahaiwui tuingashit chi makhuithuilakmara,”
da nathumwuitungli lumashankhame
yanglu, nali aman kasak lungguibing eina sākāmira,

Nawui khamato aton agate ngalung eina sāmira,

naomayarabingwui mataikasang hakmahāra.
Khamashung khangarongwui alungli nathumli sākāra;
nathum rekakharekwui eina tāthuihaora,
kaja nathumna mangacheemara;
kala kachipā chi nathumli marānganaimara.
Kachikathāna khanganang shokngasaklala chi iwui eina maningmana;
nathumli nganang khangasaka chi nathumwui vang eina kongluira.
“Yanglu, sharkha̱ hurlaga ot ava̱va̱wui sāvai khavai khutlai sākashoka mari kasa mi ina sākhuihaira,
shimān khavai sākakazama chila ina sai;
nathumli ngazai khavai khutlai kasema chi mamataisangmara,
kala bichar kasāli nathumli mamayāmada ngakarkathui yur chi nguiya da nathumna ngahānkāra.
Hi
kala iwui eina athumwui mashun phākhamina,”
kala pheisā makhalei a chi,
rālu, lokhuida zālu!
Rālu, pheisa kala aman mazangla drakhāra̱ kala seina̱ rālokhuilu.
Kashakazā makhaninga chiwui vang khisāda nana pheisā shimān ngasakkhala,
kala mathokapai chiwui vang khisāda ngalang zārkhala?
Ningmazinglak eina ili nganākhuida khamathā chi zālu,
kala nakhalatta phasā phākhavai chili kahaolu.
manglā ringkhavai nganākhuilu;
kala iwui makhangachei Davidli leikashiwui vang,
nathumli iwui katang makhavai tuingashit akha sāra.
Yanglu, ali ina mibingbingwui vang shākhi akha ngasā ngasaka,
mibingwui vang kathāna kala akhoka akha sāngasaka.
Yanglu, nana makathei yurbingli nana hokhuira,
kala nali makathei yurbingna nawuili yāmrāra;
kaja
kaja ana nali tekmatei ngasakhaira.”
Samphangpailakha
nganailakha ali ngakaolu;
makhayā mina awui shongfa horhaida,
kala makhamashunga mina awui kaphaning horhailaga;
ana lumashanmipai khavai ithumwui
kaja ana mavātlakla pheomira.
Kaja “Iwui kaphaning nathumwui kaphaning mathāmana,
iwui shongfala nathumwui shongfa mathāmana da
Kaja kazingrambingna okathuili juikhamei thāda,
iwui apongnala nathumwui apongli,

malatkāluila okathuili tara̱ chaimida,
akhar kharda reisang khangasak,
khayaowa chili athā khami kala mili kashakazā khami thada
Iwui khamorwui eina kashok iwui tuila chithāra;
khamasai eina ili malatungmara,
kha ina khangarān chi ungshung ngasakra,
ina kachiho chiwui athishurda reisang ngasakra.
“Kaja nathumna mathānda shokra,
kala chingri kahailungli thānzatra;
nathumwui mangāli khalei phungrei phungrābingna laa sāshokra,
luiwui thingrong saikorana athumwui pāng kaphera.
Ka̱shātwui mahut cyprus thingrong phorra,
kashātrongwui mahutli myrtle thingrong phorshokra;
kala hi
makatathailakla leichingki kaji khamachut akhawui vangna.”
“Mashun mayonlu, kala khangarong ot sālu,
kaja iwui huikhami thākta rāra,
kala iwui ngatangkhami phongshokra.
Sabbath mamakhao ngasakla khamayona,
makaphā kasāli pāng makhame,
hithada kasaa mi kala chi singtit kaje miwui naomayara chi sokhamina.”
kala ahongana, “Yanglu, I kathenga thingrongna”
da mahāngranu.
Kaja
“Iwui Sabbathbing khamayon ahongabing,
iwui ningyāngkhaungli phāda iwui tuingashit singtit kajili,
Iwui shimli kala phākholungli,
naomayara kala naongalava ngarāli phākhamei
phaningung khavai kala aming mira;
makatat kapaiya,
katang makhavai ming ina athumli mira.”
“Yur khangatei athum khalatta
ali otram ngatha khavai,
sabbath masāmakhaola khamayon kachiva̱ kala iwui tuingashit mayontit kajibing—
iwui hanphuttungli athumwui rikkatā kachigat kala pha̱kaphayā chi khuisangmira;
kaja iwui shim hi yur saikorawui vang seihā sākhavai shim hora.”
Israelwui eina kasham kahaiabingli hokakhuia,
Proho VAREna, hithāda hānga,
phākhuikahaibing chili lāngmeida kateila phākhuifara.
Luili khalei, ngahongli khalei
sāyur nathum saikora, tukshai khavai rālu.
“Awui shantribing mik matheimana,
athum theithangkhamei maleilakmana;
khak khangasha̱ famānga,
athum makhongtheimana;
mang shimanda ngaleopi,
kapili leikashibingna.
Fabing chi morhāklaka, kashap mavaimana.
Yaokahombingla theishingkakhui malei,
athum saikora khalattawui apongli ngareithuihao,
kachichāwui kānkhanāli phāda akhala akhala chisera.
Athumna hānga,
‘Ralu, drakhāra̱ mangsa,
ithum zamshei mangsangsa;
akhamala aja thāda tangkhavai maleimara.’”
Khangaronga mi shimāna,
laga khipānakha ningli sakta makhuimana;
wuklung kathar mi khuithuihaowa,
khipānakha matheishingkakhui atamli.
Kaja unshimuiwui eina khangarong mili khuithuihaoda,
ana chingri kahaili zanga;
mashungrik eina kazatbingli ngasoda athumwui petli pihaowa.
Kha, laivā kathemawui naobing,
nathum hili rānganailu,
shāmkasā kala khayorva̱̱wui ara̱-azābing.
Nathum khipāli ngareonganaoli,
khipāli mamayāmada khamor makāda,
male ngasatshokli?
Nathum khalāng ot kasāwui naongarā,
mikhanamwui ara̱-azā maningmala?
Shirimthing phapheili kala thing khaya̱ya̱li khamathang-khamarang kasābing;
lunghar kajujuiwui azingli,
kala tampākli nanaongarāli khipāna shaothatkhala?
Leiwukli nganaipat eina khalei ngalunggui chili nathumwui yar lei.
Chi, chibing chi, nathumwui kalāna;
athumwuitungli nathumna ra̱shakchigat kharekrora,
kala nathumna muisakchigat khuirai.
Hikathawui vang ina ningyāng ungrala?
Phungrei kajui khamashonli nathumna pet sāhai,
kala pha̱phayā khavai chili kai.
Khamongwui khanukshong, khāmongthingli nathumwui machut khavai sāhai;
kaja, ili horhailaga nathumwui pet lānlaga chili kāpiya,
nathumna mashāmeida sai,
kala nathum khalattawui vang athumli ngasoda leih sāzai;
nathumna athumwui petli leishihaira,
khamahong chili nathumna yanghaira.
Nathumna Molechli thao khuivāda nathumwui anganam mataisang ngasaka;

ithumli phanthuiserhaira.
Namingli khangakao mila akhala malei,
nali ngavap khavai khalatta ning khangatha̱ mi akhala mazang;
kaja ithumwui eina namai thumhaowa,
kala ithumwui khayonkhamāngwui pāngli ithumli horsangmihaowa.
Chithālala, O
ithum leikhonna, na ithumwui ham kasaana;
ithum nawui pāngsaksera.
O
kala khayonkhamāng phaningching majimialu.
Yanglu, machukmilu, ithum nawui misera.
Nawui kathara keinungbing lamhāng sāthuiserhaira,
Zion lamhāng sāthuihaira,
Jerusalem ramcho sāhaira.
Iwui kathara kala khamathā shim,
ishāvā ngarāna nali masotkhami apam chi meina chuitāserhaira;
ithumwui yirkhamayei apam saikora ngayāng kahai ngasāserhaira.
O
Nava kasaikha pamda ithumli chotchānglaklu kajila?
Ili makaphābingna ili samphangranu da ina ngarāna.
“I hili leili, I hili leili” da ili
makhangakao yurli ina hānga.
makaphā apongli athum khalattawui khangarānli shura.
Iwui miktāli thangkachida ili malung thuingasakchingda yāmguili pha̱kaphayā,
chektungli nganamkaphā thao rikkatā miyurna;
chikhurtungbingli kapambing,
khangathumpamli ngayā pikazat,
hokva̱sā kashaibing,
kala ningkakachai otyurwui ara̱ athumwui hambingli pemtinghai;
‘Nakhalatta ngateida pamlu,
iwui ngalemli marālu,
kaja I nawui eina ngateida haikahaina’ da hānga.
Hikatha hi iwui nātangkhurli langpongda kachuiwui meikhutna.”
Yanglu, iwui mangāli kapihaili,
“I kasaikha mapamara, kha ina runra,
mha, nathumwui morei,
avāva̱ ngarāwui moreiwui vangla ngarumlaga peichaoda runmira.
Khikhalajila athumna phungreitungli nganamkaphā riktai,
kala chili ili khonkashitui hānga;
athumna rida sākahai chiwui vang,
ina peichaoda runkāmira.”
“Drakhāra̱ chi amazān eina samkaphang thāda, athumna hānga,
‘Chi masākazamhailu, kaja chiwui alungli sokhami lei,’
iwui raobingwui mingwui vang ina masākazamsermara.
Jacobwui eina ina ara-azā shokngasakra,
Judahwui eina iwui phungrei shimlui kāngasakra;
ina kapangkakhuiya china shimlui chi khuira,
kala iwui raobingna chili sompamra,
kala Achor Leiwuk sha̱keibing ngayai khavaipam sāra,
ili kapha iwui mibingwui vang.”
“Kha
iwui kathara phungrei malaikahaibing,
kala Gadwuivang table khangarānbing,
Meni
ina nathumli raighaili chithitra,
kala nathum saikora shaokathatli zangserra;
khikhalajila, ina kaho tharan nathumna mangahānkāmana,
ina khamatui tharan nathum manganāmana,
kha iwui mikyanli makaphā chi nathumna sai,
kala ina maningkachāng chi nathumna kapangkhui.”
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hithāda hānga:
“Yanglu, iwui raobingna zāra,
kha nathum thaira;
yanglu, iwui raobingna mangra,
kha nathum ra̱changra;
yanglu, iwui raobingna mathānra,
kha nathumli maishi ngasakra;
yanglu, iwui raobingna ning
khamathānwui vang laa sāra,
kha nathum ningkachotwui vang chapra,
kala manglāli khangahuiwui vang sifara.
Nathumwui ming khonshātwui vang iwui kapangkakhuiali haimira,
kala Proho VAREna nathumli shaothatra;
kha awui raobingli ana aming khangatei phokmira.
Chithāda sāda ram chili khalatta kaso chili khamashunga Varenala somira,
kala ram chili khangashit kasaa chipāli,
khamashunga Varewui ming eina khangashit sāra;
khikhalajila kharewui kakhanang saikora malaimihaowa,
kala imikwui eina chibing chi ngathummihaowa.”
kala achālakhawui ot maphaningungluimara,
kala ninglila marāza̱luimara.
Kha ina sākahai chiwui alungli ringphāda mathānchinglu;
kaja yanglu, Jerusalem mathān khavai ina sāmi,
kala awui mibing ringkaphāna.
iwui yurbingwui lungli ina mathānlakra;
apam chili kachapkhon mashāluimara,
kala ringkhangākhonla mashāluimara.
Chiwui alungli angangnao kasha̱khamang okthuiya
kaji maleiluimara,
lah kasarnao maokkapeila mavaimara,
kaja angangnaona kum shākharar eina thira,
kala kum shākha makakā chi morei kaphunga khonshi kahaina jira.
Athumna shim sakāda chili pānra;
athumna drakhārongrong lingsangda chiwui athei shaira.
Khangatei pamkhavai athumna shim masākāmara,
khangateina zākhavai athumna malingsangmara;
kaja thingrong akhawui okkapei thāda iwui mibingla okpeira,
kala iwui kapangkhui kahaibingna athumwui pāng eina khanangda sākahai chi kasāngkha khuishaira.
Athum aremali ot masāmara,
unshimuiwui vang naola mapharāmara;
kaja athum
athum eina ngasoda naongarābingla chithara.
Athumna mangakaoranglakha ina ngahānkāra,
athumna matuimamānlakha ina shāhairasāra.
kazingkha̱na mukkā thāda lanji shaira;
kala chifana phara̱wui kashakazā sāra,
iwui kathara phungreili sakazala kashimānla maleimara” da
“Kazingram iwui wungpamkhongna,
okathui iphei naikhavaina;
iwui vang nathumna khishim sāmikida,
kala iwui ngasām khavaipam kali leida?
Ot saikora chi ipāng eina sākhui,
chieina ot saikora hi iwuina da
Kha ina yangki kaji mi chiya,
malungkhanim kala ningkhangatei,
kala iwui tuili ngacheeda kakathira china.
“Mukkā taikathat mi chila mi shaokathat kathāna;
yaonao shar kasaa chi fawui akahung sātekmi kahai kathāna,
muisakchigat kasā mi chila hokshee kachigat kathāna;
phaningkhaungwui frankincense kachigat mi chila meoma̱li kaso kathāna.
Hibing hi athum khalattawui shongfa kaphā mina,
kala athumwui manglāna ningkakachai chili ningkachāngbingna.
Inala athumwui vang khanang khavai phākhuira,
kala athumwui khangachee athumwuitungli rāngasakra;
khikhalajila ina kaho tharan,
khipākha mangahuimana,
ina khamatui tharan, athumna manganāsangmana;
kha iwui maiyanli makhayā
kala ina maningkachāng ot chi athumna kapangkhui,”
awui tuili kakathira nathum;
“Imingwui vang ningkachaida nathumli horshok kahai nachinā ngarāna hānga,
chieina ithumnala nathumwui ringkaphā chi theira;
kha maishi ngasakki kaji chi athumlina’.
Khorumshimwui eina akhon akha!
Yangkashibingli athut hāngsangkhami,
awui kachot marāranglakha mayarnao akha pharātai.
Hikatha otsak khipāna shāhaira?
Hikatha otsak khipāna theihaira?
Ngalei akha thangkha eina pharākhuila?
Yur akha mikkhayipkhawui alungli khuishokpaila?
Kaja Zionna nao ra̱khaleoda ana nao kachungkha pharai.
Nao kapharā atam rāshunglaga ina mapharāshok ngasakmarala?”
da
Pharā khavai kasaa ina naopam shungmihaorala?
da nathumwui Varena hānga.
Jerusalemli mathānngarumlu,
awui vang ringphālu,
ali leikashebing nathum saikora;
khamathānlungli ali ringphāngarumlu,
awuitungli chapkhangachā nathum saikora;
chithāda awui ningkhalum na̱ chi nathum mangda ningyāng ungpaira;
awui tekhamateiwui khavāt makhaleiwui eina nathumna ningyāngunglak eina kala chirchomri eina mangkhuipaira.
“Yanglu, kong thāda ina ali mataisang ngasakra,
kala miyurbingwui lan kong pemkatha̱ thā ngasakra.
Nathumna awui na̱ mangra,
nathumli khumkhorli phungra,
kala awui khuksaotungli khāngkhalongpamra.
Ava̱na ning lum khangasak thāda,
inala nathumli ning lumngasakra.
Nali Jerusalemli ning lumngasakhaora.
Nathumna theilaga ningli mathānra;
nathumwui ara̱kui khawo thuikaphā thāra,
kala
kala awui malungkhavāt awui yangkashebingli lei.”
Kaja yanglu,
awui siguigari sur kakhaning thāra,
awui malungkhavāt chitheira,
awui kakahar meiwui meiwon eina ngasora.
Kaja
kala asā khavai saikorali raighai eina bichar sāra,
kala
Yāmgui lungli zangkhavai khalatta tharngasakta kala sākhariklaga, chiwui alungli akhali shurda, hokwui asā shaida kala makathara kashaia, shiok kashaia athum shimānrumserra da
Kaja ina athumwui ot kasā kala kaphaning theisera, kala miyur saikora, tuiyur saikora kazipkhui khavai ina rārāli, kala athumna iwui tekhamatei rātheira.

Kala ina athumwui alungli khamachut akha haira. Kala athumwui eina ringda khaleibing kaikha chi miyurbingli chihovāra: Tarshishli, Putli, kala Ludli; malā kahuna, Tubal eina Javan, ngayiphei katāva̱li khalei, iwui mingkhamayāng mashārang kaji lah iwui tekhamateila matheirang kajebingli; athumna yur saikorali iwui tekhamatei phongmira.
Israelanaobingna tharzāri kahai khongsai eina athumwui muisakchigat
Athum kaikhali pāngmon kala Levibing sākhavai ina kapangkhuira da
okathui kadhar na sākhuiki kaji chi,
iwui mangāli leichingra da
chithāda nawui ara̱-azā kala nawui ming leira.
Chāngwok eina thuilaga changwok;
sabbath eina thuilaga sabbath eina tangda,
asā khavai saikora iwui mangāli rākhorumra
da
Benjaminwui ngalei Anathothli khalei pāngmon shimkhur Hilkiahwui naomayara Jeremiahwui tui,
Judahwui awunga Amonwui naomayara Josiahna mungda tharāda kakathuma kum

Kala Judahwui awunga Josiahwui naomayara Jehoiakimna khamung atam eina thuida Judahwui awunga Josiahwui naomayara Zedekiahna mungda tharādakhare kum makupranglakha, kala kachāng kaphangāli Jerusalem matukkhuiranglakha rāhānga.
kala na mapharāranglakha ina nali tharchikathairasai;
yurbingwui marān akha ngasā khavai ina nali kapangsanghairasai.”
Chieina ina hānga, “Iyavo, Proho VARE! Yanglu, kathāda matuirakhala da I matheimana, kaja iva naoshinaomaya.”
Kha
“Iva naoshinaomaya da mahānglu;
kaja ina kachihoho apam saikorali na vāra,
kala ina kakaso saikora chi nana matuira.
kaja nali kanmi khavai ina nali ngasomida lei da
Chiwui thili
“Yanglu, ina iwui tui nakhamorli sangmihaira.
reoteklaga sākhai khavainilala,
sākazamlaga ngakhuntā khavainilala,
sākālaga lingsang khavainilala,
nali kapanghaira da theilu.”
Kala
Kala ina hānga, “Ina almond lijei akha thei.”
Chieina
Ina hānga, “Atungshongwui eina ngareithui kahai ngaherda khalei ham akha thei.”
Chieina
Kaja yanglu, atungshong khalei wungram saikorawui shangbingli ina hoda lei, da
Kala athumna ili horkahaiwui makhayā saikorawui vang ina athumwuitungli iwui bichar hāngmira; athumna khangatei varebingli nganamkaphā ot riktai, kala khalattawui pāng eina sākakhui otli khoruma.
Kha na, shānneira̱ neikhuilu; ngakarthuilu, kala ina kakaso kachiva̱ hi athumli hānglu. Athumna nali ning masuitā ngasakaranu, maningakha inala nali athumwui mangāli ning suitā ngasakpaishina.

Ngalei hupva, Judahwui awungabing, hiwui wungnaobing, hiwui pangmonbing, kala ngalei hiwui mibingli ngasung khavai, yanglu, ina aja nali khangazipa keinung, mari pākra̱, pithrai phākho ngasa ngasakhaira.
Athumna nali ngararra; kha nali mayuimara, kaja ina nali ngasomida lei da
“Vāda Jerusalem katongana shākhavai vaomalānlu da
ina phaningunga, mayar-ngalā sālakha nawui ningkasang,
mākkhām kahaiva kathawui leikashi,
khikha mayaokasang ngalei, lamhāngli nathumna ili kathāda shurzatsakhala kaji chi.
Matheikhare heithei Israel hi
chi kashaia saikora yomphungda kalākashi athumwuitungli tai
da
kala Israelshi shimkhur saikora.
“Nashāvā ngarāna ili khi khayon samphanghaoda iwui eina katāva̱li thui kahaikhala,
kala makānkhanāli shurzatta makankhanā sathuihaokhala?
Athumna, ‘Egypt ngaleiwui eina khuikashoka,
lamhāngli thankazata,
siwukwui lamli, khorchopli,
kazing kakāng lamli,
kala tangmangting kahaipamli,
mi makakān khipākha makasompamli thankazatapa
da maphāmana.
Athei-arai kala khamathā otyurbing eina ringphā khavai,
khavāt makhalei lamli ina nathumli thānsangmi.
Kha nathumna chili vākashung tharan iwui ram sākhamānghaowa,
kala iwui shimlui ningkakachai ot ngasa ngasakhaowa.
Pāngmonbingna, ‘
da mangathingmana.
ain kasingbingna ili matheimana;
khamungbingna ili ngakaishi,
marānbingna Baalwui ming eina hāngmarāna,
kala makānkhanā ot chi phāzata.”
“Chiwui vang eina ina nathumli ngahātchingda lei,
da
nanao ngarāwui naongarālila ina ngahātra.
Kaja Cypruswui kongphei kānkāda ayanglu,
maningakha Kedarlila chihovāda munlak eina ayangkhui ngasaklu;
hikathāthā ot maleihairakhala da.
Yur akhana athumwui varebing akachang maninglala,
athumwui varebing khangachei leihairala?
Kha iwui mibingna khikha makankhanāwui vang athumwui tekhamatei ngacheihaira.
Chili ngacheelu, O kazingram,
matakhakhaida kashuilu,
da
Kaja iwui mibingna makaphā khani sāhaira:
longkazata tara̱ khame ura̱ ili malaihaowa,
kala mangarungki kaji ra̱khong athumna khonkhui.”
“Israel raonaola?
Raonaona kapharā naola?
Maningakha kathāda miwui sāshai sāthuihao?
Kazingkha̱na ali nirhaira,
athumna panglak eina nihaira.
Athumna awui lam ramphomihaira,
awui keinungla sākathānmihaida mi akhala maleithura.
Chili lāngda Memphis eina Tahpanheswui mina nawui wungkuihon shaokhaimihaira.
Ana nali apong chili thānkazat tharan,
nawui Vare
Nathum Egyptli khavāwui tongkazā khi lei,
Nilewui tara̱ amang khavaila?
Assyriali khavāwui tongkazā khi lei,
Euphrateswui tara̱ amang khavaila?
Nathumwui makhayāna nali machinra;
kala nawui shitkasang kahat china nali machinra.
Nawui Vare
ili khangachee nathumwui alungli maleimana,”
da saikorawui
“Kaja nathumna nathumwui langkon sāshatta,
nar kahaiwui eina shok kahai atam kasāngkhahaira;
kala nathumna, ‘I otram mangatha̱luimara’ da hānga.
Mha, kaphung kajuitung kachiva̱li,
khamatek thingrongphei kachiva̱li khayorva̱ thāda khoruma.
Chithālala ina nathumli mathāmeikap kaje arongwui vang kashenga athāmāng hākhuilaga lingsanga.
Chithākha kathāda hiyākha makākashunga kharar-ngahongwui drakhārong sāthuihaokhala?
Nathum khalatta lye eina ra̱vailala kala sāpon tarākha singlala,
nathumwui khayonwui chukkhara̱ iwui mangali mavānranga da Proho VAREna hānga.
Nana kathada ‘I mamakhaomana, Baalwui thi I mashurmana’
da hāngpairakhala?
tampākli kathada zatsākhala kaji phaningunglu,
nana khi sāhailikhala theilu—
utlāva̱na mathangkazat thāda,
kharar-ngahongwui gadha alāna ngalātkachāng lamhāngli masi kasimkazat thāda!
Awui khamathang khipāna khamrarra?
Ali phākazat athum khanang khavai maleimana,
awui atamli athumna ali samphangra,
pheihop masangla naphei zatung zatvā masālu,
nakharokla matheng ngasakalu.
Kha nana, ‘Aremana,
kaja azak makathei kha̱mibingli ina leishihaira,
kala athumli I shurzatra’” da hānga.
“Khaleli tukkhuihaiakha maishi khangasak thāda,
Israelwui shimkhurla maishira:
athum, athumwui awungabingla, wungnaobingla,
pāngmonbingla, marānbingla,
thingrongli, ‘Na ishāvāna’ kajibing,
ngalungli ‘Nana ili pharai’
kajibingna.
Kaja athumna ili khanuk eina ngareimi, amai eina mayangmana.
Kha athumwui kakhanang atamli,
‘Ngakarthuida rāhuimilu!’ da hānga.
“Kha nathum khalattana sākakhui varebing chi kali leili?
Nathumwui kakhanang atamli, athumna shapakha,
athum ngakarthuiranu;
O Judah, nathumwui keinung chiyākha khalei thāda nathumwui varebingla ngayāda lei.
Nathumna khisāda iwuitungli khamatuikhala?
Nathum saikora ili ngakaishiya da
Nanao ngarāli aremali ina shaowa,
athumna mashungkakhui malei;
kazingkha̱ sākashi thāda,
nathum khalattawui raighaina nathumwui marnbingli mayuisanga.
O mithot, nathum
I Israelwui vang lamhāng lah tangmangting kahai ngalei ngasāhaola?
Maningakha kathāda iwui mibingna,
‘Ithum ningkhānhaira, ithum nali maungluilakmara’
da hāngkhala?
Ngalānaona awui sāri lah ngalā khām kahaiva̱na awui sāri khongnāng malaihaipaila?
Kha iwui mibingna mashānkharar zimiksho ili malaihaowa.
Leikashinao phākhavai nathumna kayākha mathāda apong pha!
Chiwui vang makhayā sha̱naobingli eina tangda nathumwui apong chi tamchithei.
Kala nathumwui kachonlila, khayon makhalei,
kachāmabingwui ashee kāda lei;
athumna shaokhai kazang nathumna matheimana.
Kha saikora hi sāhailaga nathumna,
‘I khayon makhaleiana;
kachangkhat eina awui malungvāt iwui eina ngareithuichaohaira’
da hānga.
Yanglu, ‘I morei masāmana’
da kahāngwui vang,
ina nali bichar pamli khuivāra.
Nawui apong ngacheilaga nana kayākha paida zatnganaoli!
Assyriana nali maishi khangasak thāda,
nali Egyptna maishi ngasakra.
Hiwui einala nathum pāng kuitungli parda nathum zatthuihaora,
kaja, nathumna ning horkasangabing chili,
kala athumwui eina nathum mamataisangmara.”
“Mi akhana apreiva̱li pānghaida awui eina thuihailaga
mi khangatei akhali aleihaiakha khare gaharana preiva̱ chili khuiluirala?
Chikathā ram chi hakmahālak eina mamakhaomarala?
Nana khayorva̱wui ot sāda kachungkhali ngasohaira;
laga nana ili ungluipairala? da
Namik khangangaili kapeivāserlu, kala yanglu,
nana mapimirang kaji kali leikhala?
Lamhāngli Arabnao kapam thāda,
shongfaphapheili nana mayarnaoli ngaraipama.
Nawui makaphā shām kasāna ngalei hi sāmakhao ngasakhaira.
Chiwui vang zingrot ngasām ngasakhaira,
kala mayo kachāng zingrotla marothura;
nava khayorva̱wui azakla thahaoda kakhayakla marāpeithumana.
Nana aruicham, ‘Ishāvā, na I nganuilakhawui khavāknaona—
ana malungvātchingrala?’
ana katang eina tangda mapenmarala?
da nana mangakaomala?
Yanglu, nana hānghaira,
kha nana makaphā ot
nawui sākhangai eina tangda sai.”
Ina phaningsai, ‘Ana saikora hi sākahaiwui thili ana ili latungra’ kha malatungmana, kala makhamashungva̱ achināva̱ Judahna thei.
Shitkasang makhaleiva̱, Israelwui phokaphā saikorawui vang ina kapāngwui lairik kapimida chiho kahai chi makhamashungva̱ achināva̱ Judahna thatheilaga mangacheela ala vālaga khayorva̱wui ot sāzata.
Khikhalajila khayorwui otsak hi awui vang kapai ot sāthuihaoda, thing ngalungli ngashāmzatta ngalei hi ana sāmakhao kahaina.
Saikora hi thatheilaga makhamashungva̱ achināva̱ Judahna ili ningtongda malatungmana, kha sākhaninga, da
Kala
Vālu, atungshong shangda tui hi vaomalānmilu, kala hānglu,
shitkasang makhaleiva̱ Israel,
latunglu, da
Ina nali malungvātta mayangmara,
kaja I lumashantheilaka, da
I malung mavātchingmara.
Na nawui Vare
nawui ningkachāng khamateka thingphei kachida kha̱mibingli chaizathaira,
kala na iwui akhon manganāthuwa,
kaji himang mayālu, da
Latunglu, O shitkasang makhalei nao ngarābing, da
kaja I nathumwui akhavāna; keinung akhawui eina akha, shimkhur akhawui eina khani khuida nathumli ina Zionli khuiungmira.
“‘Kala iwui kaphaningli ngaraikachā yaokahomabing ina mira, athumna nathumli theithangkhamei kala theikhuikathei eina ngasoda phauira,
Ngalei chili nathumna chungsangda mataisang kahai tharan, “
Chiwui atamli, Jerusalem hi
Chitharan Judahna Israelli ungngashikluira kala ani ngarumda atunshongwui ngalei eina, ina navāngarāli shimluikat sāda mikahai ngalei chili apamra.
“‘Inaomayarabingwui alungli nali kathāda khamathā lam akha milaga chipamsikhala kala,
miyur saikorawuili mathāmeikap kaji shimlui nali kathāda haimirakhala da ina machuka.
Kala nathumna ili iwui Ava hora;
kala ili kashurwui eina mangareithuimara da phaningsai.
Kachangkhatta, shitkasang makhaleiva̱ preiva̱na gaharali horkahai thāda,
nanala ili shitkasang maleimana,
O Israelwui shimkhur, da
Kaphung khangaili akhon akha shai,
Israelwui mibingwui khavao kala kachapkhon;
khikhalajila athumna khangui pongli zathaida,
athumwui Vare
“Latunglu, shitkasang makhalei naomayara ngarā,
nathumwui mashitkasang chi ina raimira.”
“Yanglu, ithumna nali rāli, kaja na ithumwui
Kachangkhatta kaphungtungli ithumna meoma̱li khorumkazat china ithumli mangachonmana.
Kachangkhatta Israelwui huikhami hiya ithumwui
“Kha ithumna mayarngalālakhawui eina thuida khayā khamalā otna ishāvā ngarāna mathuisang kahai, ngarānsang kahai athumwui yaola, seila, naomayara, naongalāva̱ ngarāla saikora kānmihaira.
Ithumwui maikashili ngayaisangsa, kala ithumwui khayā khamalāna ithumli farorranu; kaja ithumwui
“Nana latungakha, O Israel,
da
na ili latungphalungra.
Nawui ningkakachai otsak hupta iwui mangāwui eina horserhaida ning mayaoyaakha
kala ‘
akachang eina, mashun eina,
kala angatar eina ngashitshapakha,
yurbing awui lungli sokhami samphangra,
kala awuili athumna tekmateira.”
“Nathumwui rampho kahai lui rākkhuilu;
kala ka̱shātlungli athā mayaosangalu.
kala nathum wuklungwui ahuila rimshoklu,
O Judahwui mibing kala Jerusalemnaobing;
Iwui malungkathui mei thāda shokpaishina,
kala chuida khipānakha mashimitrarpaishina,
nathumwui makaphā kasāwui vang.”
Judahli hānglu, kala Jerusalemli vaomalānlu,
“Ngalei saikora vāshungda talla̱ khonglu,
panglāk eina vaoda hānglu,
‘Kazipkhuilu, ithum khangazipa keinungbing chili ungusa!’
Zionshong philān khāngkālu,
kalāmashi khavai yāmlu, mapamnganaolu,
kaja ina hakkhamahā sākashimān atungshongwui eina khuirāra.
Kazingkha̱ akha akhur eina shokhaira;
yurbingli sākakhayanga akha shokhaira,
awui pamwui eina zathaira,
nathumwui ngalei sāshimān khavai;
nathumwui keinungbing sākhayanghaida mila mapamara.
Hiwui vang bora ngavaida pangda chapngachālu,
kaja ithumwui eina
malungkhavāt mangareithuiranga.”
“Chithanghon awunga eina wungnaobing khanini mapingrarmara, da
Chieina ina hānga, “Iyāvo, Proho VARE, mibing kala Jerusalemli nana minamchaohaira; nathumli khikha mathāmara da nana hānghailaga ara athumwuitungli raighai rāparhaira.”
Atam chitharan, mibing eina Jerusalemli hithāda hāngra, siwukwui kajuia khangaiwui eina kasā masi iwui mibingwui nao ngalāva̱wuishong phanrāhaira; hamkhavai lah sāmathā khavai riri kaphan maningmana,
pangkhanā masi iwui vang eina phankharāna.
Ara athumwuitungli bicharli khamatuia chi ina.
Yanglu, ana muiyā khangakhui thāda rārāli,
awui siguigāri surkakhaning thai;
awui siguibingna khalāngli thākmei;
ithum kalākashi,
kaja ithum kuphaira!
O Jerusalem, nali huimi khavai makhayāwui eina wuklung pheomathālu.
Karankha makaphā ning nawui wuklungli leifarakhala?
Kaja Danwui eina akhon akha phongshoka,
kala Ephraim Kaphungwui eina makaphā phongchithei.
A rārāli da miyurbingli hāngmathinlu;
Jerusalemli chishātmihaolu,
“Kuikhanamabing katāva̱wui eina rāhaira;
Judahwui keinungbingli athumna horairora.
Lui kahon thāda ali kuimareikhamhaira,
khikhalajila ana ili ngakaishihaowa,
da
Nathumwui apongna kala kasākhavāna nathumwuitungli hikathā rākhangasakna.
Hi nathumwui ngachang khavaina, kala hi khāshuna;
hina nathumwui wuklung vāshunglakhaira.”
Iwui kachot, iwui kachot!
I kachotlungli ngaleokazama!
Iyavo, imalungwui phākho!
I malung panglāk eina katuka;
I kasaikha mapampaithura;
kaja ina talla̱khon shai,
raiwui akhon chi.
Kalāshātwuitungli kalāshāt,
ngalei katonga shimānhaira.
Kashuirak iwui kachonshim sāshimānhaira,
chonrānla mik khayipkhali sākazamihaira.
Karankha philān chi ina yangpamra,
raiwui talla̱khon karankha shāpamra?
“Kaja iwui mibing mangma̱haoda athumna ili matheithuwa;
athum mangkhama̱ naomayarana,
athum theishingkakhui maleimana.
Makaphā kasāli athum themlaka,
kha kathāda kaphā sara̱khala da matheimana”
Ina okathuili yanga, kala yanglu,
amei amā maleimana;
kazingramla kahor maleimana.
Ina phungreitungli yanga, kala yanglu,
athum nganukyik eina leisai,
kala phungrābingla yuishang yuitāsai.
Ina yanga, kala yanglu mi akhala maleisāmana,
kala khamasaili yongkazata vānaola yāmserhairasai.
Ina yanga, kala yanglu,
ngalei katuma lam saikora siwuk ngasāsai;
kala chiwui keinung saikorala
Kaja
“Ngalei katonga ngachakyānghaora,
chithālala ina chi matangchao ngasakmara.
Hiwui vang okathuina sifara,
kazingram atungna zikra;
kaja ina hāngkahaina, ina ngarān kahaina;
ining mangacheiranga, chili lāngda I mangalanluimara.”
Siguiraimi kala malā kasingbingwui akhon shālaga,
keinung kachiva̱wui mi yāma;
athumna khararli zanga; athumna lunghārbingli yākkai;
keinung saikora horserhaira,
kala chili mi khipākha mapānluimana.
Kala, O ngachakyang kahaiva̱,
hungping kahai sāri ngavaida,
sinā eina sāri nakhalatta sāsangda,
namik hakmei khavai khaneo hiwui kakhalat khikhala?
Aremali nakhalatta sakhamathāna.
Nawui leikashebingna nali yangkharinga;
athumna nali sāthat khavai phai.
Kaja naokhara̱va̱na khangahui thāda ina ringkhangā shai,
naochizai kapharāva̱wui ringkhangā thāda,
Zionwui naongalāva̱na khaksui khavai katinga,
pāng tarāmlaga ngahuida lei;
“I kalākashi!
mi khayumbingwui mangāli ning shimānhaira!”
Jerusalem chānreili yongshang yongtāda yanglu, laga chukkhuilu!
Kayāngkharei hupvali phāyanglaga,
mashun eina kasā mi,
khamashung phākazat mi akha leisākha,
ina pheomira.
Athumna, “
da hānglala,
athumna mingzaiphaphai.
O
Nana athumli ngaphitmihaira,
kha athumna kachot matheimana;
nana athumli yummihaira,
kha mashungkhui khavai masāmana.
Athumna athumwui mai lunghārli makangmei ngasakta,
ning mangateingaithuwa.
Chieina ina hānga,
“Athum hiya kachāmabingna,
athum ning makhaleibingmānga;
kaja athumna
Khangamabingli ina vālaga ahāngra,
kaja, athumna
Kha athum saikora ngaraichāda langkon chi sāteka,
kala khara̱ chi sāshathaowa.
Chiwui vang, khararwui kazingkha̱ akhana athumli sāthatra;

Kuirāngna keinungli rimpamda lei,
kashoshoka mili akha̱ sāda serkazamhaora;
khikhalajila athumwui sākhalāng kachungkhaya,
Vareli khalan kahai hakmahālaka.
“Ina kathāda pheomira?
Nanao ngarāna ili malaihaowa,
kala vare makhaningbingwui ming eina mingzaihaowa.
Athumli thoting eina mizaakha phokaphā ot sāhao,
athumna khayorva̱wui shimli ngaheireida apamhaowa.
Keimathao kahai khamathanga sigui thāda,
athum ava̱va̱na khongnai preiva̱li ngasha̱zata.
Otsakbing hiwui vang athumli ina tandi mamimarala?

Kaja Israel eina Judahwui shimkhurna
