Athumna
kala athumna, “Ana khikha masālakmara,
ithumwuitungli makaphāla matāmara,
chāmreila, raila marālakmara da hānga.
Marānbingla masi ngasāhaora,
tui chi athumwui lungli maleimana;
Athumli chithāda sāra!”
Chiwui vang, saikorawui
“Khikhalajila athumna hithāda kahāngwui vang,
yanglu, nakhamorli iwui tui mei ngasā ngasakra,
mibing hina thing sāda,
mei china chuitāhaora.
Yanglu, O Israelwui shimkhur,
yur akha katāva̱wui eina ina khuirāra da
Hi makhangacheia yurna,
achālakhawui yurna,
aram tui nathum mashāmana,
athumna kahāngla nathum bhab matāmara.
Athumwui malākhor chikhur phut kahai thai,
kapingpinga mimānga.
Athumna nathumwui heiun rāzā-rāshaimihaora;
nathumwui naongalāva̱ kala naomayarabing,
seila, yaola, drakhātheila, khaorātheila,
kānmihaora.
Nathumwui ning horsangda ngaziplak eina sakā kahai keinungbing chi athumwui raighai eina sākazammihaora.”
“Chithālala, chitharan ina nathumli mashimānchao ngasakmara, da
Kala nathumwui ngachaili ‘Khiwui vang
Jacobwui shimkhurli hi phongshoklu,
Judahlila hi vaosanglu:
hi nganākhuilu,
mik kālala makatheibing,
khanā kālala makashābing.
iwui mangāli nathum makathirmala?
Ina shamadruwui vang da situi eina makhangacheiya thari sāmi,
tara̱na kapheshoklala athumna mayuirarmara;
tara̱na ngaphaolala, china makānshokrarmara.
Kha mibing hiya ningnganāda ningli ngakaishitheilaka;
athumna ngareithuihaida thuihaowa.
‘Atam athishurda mayo kachāng, māthei kachāng zingrot rokhame,
kala mahātwui vang haptātā haimida ithumli yangkhame,
da athumwui wuklungli mahāngmana.
Nathumwui khayonkhamāng china ngareithui khangasakna,
kaphā kaho chi nathumwui moreina mathei khangasakna.
“Iwui mibingwui alungli makhayā mi zanga;
athumna khalen kasangbing thāda rimpama.
Athumna vanao khalen sangda mibingli tukkhui.
Sopkai vānaona pemting kahai thāda,
athumwui shim kachipatna pemtinghai.
Chiwui vang athum khangamna kala kashāngna.
Athum pangsiriri nganaiyokhaira.
Makhayā ot kasāli katang mavaimana;
mataisang khavai marānaowui mashun maphaningmimana,
khavātabingwui khamashung matheimimana.
“Hiwui vang athumli ina tandi mamimarala?
Hikatha miyur hili ina athut makhuingayimala?
da
Apam hili khangachee khangachā ot shokhaira:
marānbingna yonda marānmi,
kala pāngmonbingna athum ningsasak eina munga;
laga iwui mibingna chi ningchangmeihao!
Kha khanaowa kharā tharan nathum khisara̱?”
O Benjaminwui mibing,
kalāmashi khavai
Jerusalemwui eina yāmulu!
Tekoali talla̱ khonglu,
Beth-haccheremli khamachut akha khāngkālu;
kaja atungshongwui eina makaphā shimān khangasak akha rapurhaira.
Sophayolak eina kala ngahuiri eina nganaokakhui Zionwui naongalāva̱li,
ina sāshimānhaora.
Yaokahomabing kala athumwui ashangva̱na ali kuimareida kachonshim rāsākāra,
ichichāwui pamli rāhompamra.
“Ali rai sākhavai ngarānlu;
thuilu, ngashun angararsa!”
“Ithum kalākashi,
kaja kazing yinghaira, ngazin khaya̱la sāngsang mamānhaira!”
“Thuilu, ithumna ngayā angararsa kala awungawui dolanbing sāshimānmiserhaosa!”
Kaja, saikorawui
“Awui thingrongbing ta̱tekmiserhaolu;
Jerusalem kuinam khavai pan sakālu.
Tandi miki kaji keinung chi hina;
awui alungli rekakharek maningla khangatei maleimana.
Ura̱na tara̱ tharda kahai thāda awui makhayāla nganaozao eina haipama,
khangashao kala sākashimānla awuili shāshon shāthai;
kakazā, khamākaza̱ imangāli theichinga.
O Jerusalem, ningngasharlu,
I nawui eina latthuihaipaishina,
maningakha ina nathumli masaimihaida
ngalei hi ramcho ngasakhaipaishina”.
Saikorawui
“Israelwui shāk kahai drakhāthei atham kaphā
thāda manākazakkhuilu;
drakhāthei kaphā mi thāda napāng aphāngbingli latluida phāvālu.”
“Athumna shākhavai ina khipāli ngazekta hāngmathinrakhala?
Yanglu, athum khanā kafahaida khipākha manganākhuirarmana;
yanglu,
chili ringkaphā khikhala maleimana.
Chiwui vang
ina chi singpamda chothaira.”
“Chānreilungli chi naoshinaobingwuitungli,
kala kazipkapama yaronnaobingwuitungli,
kala gahara eina preiva̱ khaninili khuithuihaora,
kasarnaobing kala rarlak kahaibingla.
Athumwui shimla, luila,
preiva̱ ngarāla ngarumda khangateili mihaora.
Kaja ngalei hiwui mibingli ina makhamayāwui vang ipāng katingshokra da
Kaja teomeithui kaje eina thuida reimeithui kaje eina tangda athumna makhamashunga tongzā khavai kāramsera;
marān eina thuida pāngmon kāshungda,
mamashungla sai.
Athumna iwui mibingwui khamā raimida,
chingri kahai makhalei tharan,
‘Chingrihailu, chingrihailu’ da
pailatsor eina hānga.
Ningkakachai ot kasā tharan athum khayakla?
Maningmana, athumna makhayakphaphutmana;
kathāda mai hungra̱khala dala matheimana.
Chiwui vang konglui kasangbingwui alungli athumla kongluisangra;
ina athumli tandi khami atamli athumlila mai shingasakra”
da
“Shongfa ngalemli nganinglu, kala yanglu,
kala achālakhawui shongfa khamathā ngahānkhuilu;
kala chili zatlu kala namangla khangasām samphang khavai sālu.”
Kha athumna, “Ithum chiwui alungli mazatlakmara!”
da hānga.
Ina nawuitungli mayon khavai haimira,
talla̱khon chi shālaga ning ngasharlu! da hānga.
Kha athumna, “Manganāsangmara” da hānga.
Chiwui vang, “Nganālu, O yurbing,
kala theilu O kazip kahaibing,
athumli khi shokrakhala da.
Nganālu, O okathui;
yanglu, mibing hiwuitungli ina makaphā khuirāra,
athumna makaphā khangarān athei,
khikhalajila athumna iwui tui makhuimana;
kala iwui ain athumna khalanhaira.
Shebawui eina frankincense, lah
katāramwui eina kashima ja̱hei ili khuikharā khi ningrinwui vang khala?
Nathumwui rikkatā kachigat makhuisangpaimana,
kala nathumwui pha̱kaphayāla ili ningyāng maungngasakmana.
Chiwui vang
yanglu, mibing hiwui vang pheingaphok khavai haimida,
athumna chili ngaphokra; vānaongarā ngarumda,
khongnainaola, ngasotnaola thitkha sāra.”
“Yanglu, atungshongwui ngaleiwui eina miyur akha rārāli,
kahaka yur akha okathuiwui tameikap kaje pam eina ngatha̱phokhaira.
Athumna kazeila malāla singkhuihaira;
athum sakashe, lukhamashan makatha yurna,
athumwui khon shamadru kakhangang thai,
athumna sigui tonga,
mayarnao akhana raiwui vang shakkasā thāda,
nali ngasung khavai vang, O Zionwui naongalāva̱.”
“Ithumna chiwui pao shāhaira,”
da Jerusalemwui mibingna hānga,
“kala ithum pāng mangatha̱thukmana;
kakhanangna ithumli yuihaira,
sha̱naona naokhara̱wui khangashei thāda.
kaja yangkashewuili raighai akha lei,
khangachee achikun kachida lei.”
“O iwui yurwui naongalāva̱, bora ngavaida,
hotlātungli ngaleolu;
naomayara akhamāngwui vang chapkhangachā thāda,
ningchotlak eina chapngachālu;
kaja sākashimāna chi kashuirak eina ithumwuitungli rara.
Iwui mibingwui alungli athumwui apongbing tamyang khavai ina nali tamkhayanga sangkahaina.
Athum saikora ngakaishitingtinghai,
kuimareida mashāt kazatabingna,
athum pithrai kala marina;
athum saikora khamakhao otsakmāng sai.
Sharkha̱ panglāk eina hurda mari chi meina kānmihaowa;
aremali tharkhavai kasāmana,
kaja makhayābing chi makhuishokkhuimana.
Athum chi khalan kahaiya lupasā da hoi,
kaja
Nathumwui shongpong kala otsak mashungkhuilu, chithākha ina nathumli apam hili somngasakra da saikorawui
‘Hi
“Kaja nathumwui apong kala otsak kachangkhatta nathumna mashungkhuihaiakha, kachangkhatta akha eina akha mashun eina sangarokchaoakha,

kha̱minaoli, avāva̱ makhaleibingli kala ra̱meinaoli marekharekakha; lah apam hili khayon makhaleibingwui ashee matā ngasakakha, nathum khalattali masāza̱ khavai kala nathum khalatta machot khavai vare khangateili mashurakha,
achālakha nashāvā ngarāli ina metchang kahai ngalei, apam hili nathumli sompam ngasakra.
“Yanglu, nathumna aremali kakapik tuili shitsanga.
Nathumna leeda, mi sathatta, phophāda, mingzaiphāphāda, Baalli nganamkaphā riktāda kala nathumna makathei vare khangatateili shuralaga,
kala chiwui thili iwui mangāli iwui ming eina kahoa shim hili ungnganingda, ‘Ithumli huimihaira’ da hānglaga, ningkakachai ot saikora hi sachingfarala?
Iwui ming eina kahoa shim hi nathumwui mikyanli khalebingwui shim sathuihaola? Yanglu, hi I khalattana theikahaina da
Iwui mingli rida sompam khangasak Shilohli arui ayanglu, Israel iwui mibingna makhayā ot kasāwui vang ina chili khisākhala?
Ara nathumna saikora hi sāhaokada, da
chiwui vang iming eina kahoa shim, nathumna shitkasanga, kala nathumli kala nashāvā ngarāli mikahai apam chili, Shilohli kasā thāda sāmira.
Ina nathumwui nachinā Ephraimwui naothei saikorali horser kahai thada nathumlila iwui mikyanwui eina horshokserhaora.
“Kha nava, mibing hiwui vang seihā masālakalu, kala chaptala seihā masālakalu, ili kapola mapoalu, kaja ina nathumli mashāmimana.
Judahwui keinungli kala Jerusalemwui chānreili athumna khi sālikhala kaji nathum matheimala?
Naongarāna thing phākhui, avāva̱ ngarāna mei sai, preiva̱bingna kazing philāva̱wui vang khamui nai; kala ili malung thuida malungvāt khavai athumna vare khangateili ra̱kharek kharektai.
Athumna malungthui khangasak hi ilila? da

Chiwui vang eina Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Yanglu, iwui malungkhavāt kala malungkathui apam hiwuitungli milila, sālila, luiwui thinglila, ngaleiwui theishirailila heirorra, china chuida khamit mavaimara.”
Saikorawui
Kaja Egyptwui eina thānkashok chitharan, navā ngarāli hikathā sākhavai ina mahānglakmana, rikkatā kachigat eina pha̱kaphayā ponglila kakasola makasomana.
Kha, ‘Iwui khon nganālu, chieina I nathumwui Vare sāra, kala nathum iwui mibing sāra; kala ina kakaso apong saikorali zatta nathum kalā mahaimeira’ da ina kasoi.
Kha athumna iwui kahāng manganāmana, khanāla manāshungmana, kha athum khalattawui theikakhuili zata, kala athumwui zakkashi wuklung eina ngakaishitingtingda, mangāshong mavāla sa̱na̱unga.
Nashāvā ngarāna Egypt ngaleiwui eina shokthang eina thuilaga aja eina tangda, iwui rao marānbingli machatlakla thangkachida chihovai;
chithālala athumna ali manganāsangmana, khanāla manāshung mana, ngakaikashili akachang sāhaowa. Avāva̱ ngarāli athumna zakshimeida sai.”

kala athumna leishida otram khangatha̱, athishurda khorumkasā zimik, kachāng, kala kazingramli khalei saikorawui mangāli phayaira; athumli makazipkhuiluimara, kaphumla maphumluimara; kha leimaiwui paih thāhaora.

Chiwui vang, saikorawui
“Yanglu, athumli ina samathakhuilaga chāng tamyangra,

Athumwui male hu kazanga malāthingna,

da

“Yanglu, ahui rimkashoka, kha ningli marimkashoka athum chili ina tandi khami atam rārāli da

Chibing chiya, Egypt, Judah, Edom, Ammonwui naomayarabing, Moab kala siwukpheili khalei kui sikatābing saikorana. Kaja miyur saikora hi ahui marimkashokbingna, Israelwui shimkhurla wuklungli ahui marimshokmana.”
O Israelwui shimkhur,
kahāng tui chi nganālu.
“Yur kateiwui acham masha̱khuialu,
kala kazingramwui machut chili ningmasuitaalu,
khikhalajila yurbingna chi theida ningsuitai,
kaja mibingwui ngashan chi khanguina.
Ngahongwui thing akha ta̱tekhuilaga pāngthem kathemana ngahā eina sākhui.
Mibingna chili lupasā kala sinā eina heirora;
mangatha̱ khavai athumna chi yāmkarnao eina yotpi shaoshāntithai.
Athumwui meoma̱bing chiya karopthei yāmguili
hangkhāli samachit khavai thai,
athuma mamatuirarmana;
mazatrarmada mina phungzata.
Athumli mangacheealu,
kaja makaphā sākashap athumwuili maleimana,
kaphā sakashapla athumwuili maleimana.”
O
nava hakkhamahāna,
kala namingva pangshap leilaka.
O yurbingwui awunga?
Kaja hi nawui ngamna;
kaja yur saikorawui thangkhamaingwui alunglila
kala athumwui wungram saikorawui alunglila,
nakathā maleilakmana.
Athumva mangkhama̱, kala wurkazomānga;
meoma̱bingwui tamkachithei chiya khikha makhaning thingna!
Shaokhanankakhui lupasā chi Tarshishwui eina,
kala Uphazwui eina sinā khuiunga.
Athum chi pāngthem kathema kala sinā sākatheibingwui themsakna,
athumwui sāri hungrisi mayingrisi kahaina;
saikora chi them kathembingwui otsakna.
Kha
a kharinga Varena kala makashimāna Awungana.
A malungkathui tharan okathui nganuka,

Chieina nana athumli hithāda hāngra: “Kazingram eina ngalei makasā varebing chi okathuiwui eina kala kazingwui azingwui eina shimānhaora.”
Pangshap eina okathui sākakhuia,

hārkashoka chi Ana.
Ana tui matuikashok tharan kazingramli tara̱ ngaphaokazama;

Ana zingrot rotā khavaiwui vang rikhān ngashei ngasaka,

Mi kachiva̱ mangma̱haida theikhuikathei maleimana;

kaja, awui ama̱bing chi makhamashungana,

Athum chi kānkhanā makhalei mangshong eina sākakhuina.
athumli tandi khami atamli athum shimānhaora.

Kala
Kaja Egypt ngaleiwui eina nashāvā ngarāli ina thānkashok tharan athumli ina hāngkharik kahaina; iwui tui nganālu da aja eina tangda hāngmathinching kaji hina.

Kha athumna kahāng manganāmana, kala manāshungmana, kha ichichāwui makhayā ningmāngli ngakaishitingting zathaowa. Kahāng makhanganāwui vang tuingashitli hāngsang kahai saikora chi ina athumwuitungli tāngasaka.”
Latluida

Iwui tui makhuisangngaimada avāva̱ ngarāwui khayonkhamāng kasā chili hanungluishithaida khangatei varebingli khoruma; Israelshi shimkhur kala Judahshi shimkhurna avāva̱ ngarāli ina tuingashit sākahai chi kaihaowa.
Chiwui vang,
Chitharan Judahwui keinungbing kala Jerusalemli khaleibing athumna nganamkaphā rikkatā varebing chili ngakaora, kha athumwui kakhanang atamli athumna mahuimirarmara.
Kaja nathumwui varebing keinung ngayāhaira, O Judah; kala homahā khavai, kaja Baalli thao riktā khavai hanphut, Jerusalemwui shongfa chārinda peihaira.
Chiwui vang eina yurbing hiwui vang seihā mapomialu, athumwui vang mavaomialu, seihāla masāmialu, kaja athumwui kakhanang atamli athumna khangakao tharan ina makhuisangmiluimara.”

“Iwui ngahānkhangaiva̱na jilala, ana sokhamasāp ot sālaga, iwui shimli awui mashun khi lei? Kapha̱ sā eina khangashit kasā china nawui shimānhaoki kaji ngalanthui ngasakpairala? Chithakha na mathān khavai leila?
na atam akhali, khamateka olive thingrong, khamathā athei-kapanga da hosai; kha kapanga siphan-zingrot khangathung eina ngasoda ana mei eina sa̱tāra, kala aphāngbing chuitup tāhaora.”

da kahāng chi.

Ina nali iwui makapen kahāng chitharanla,

Khiwui vang eina makhayābingna shāng-leihao?
Khiwui vang eina ning makatharbingna reisanghao?
Athumli nana lingsangda angayung sa̱khui;
athumna reisang mamānda atheila mathei;
nana athumli nganailak eina ngazeka,
chithālala athumwui ninga katāva̱li lei.
Kha, nana ili katheina, O
nana ili thei, kala nawui apongli ining tamyanga.
Taithat khavai yaonao thāda athumli ngakhunshoklu,
kala taithat khavai zimikshowui vang athumli ngateida hailu.
Ngalei hina karankha sifafara,
kala luiwui khawona thengfara?
Chili okthuida khaleibingwui makhayāwui vang sābing kala vānaobingla yāmserhaira;
khikhalajila mibingna,
“Ithumna kasā hi Varena matheimara” da hānga.
“Nana mili shongzā ngakhuilaga athumna nali tāpop ngasakhaikha,

Kaja nachinā ngarā kala nashāvāwui shimkhurwui mi eina tangda,

athumna nali mamayāmada makaphā panglāk eina sāda lei,
athumna nali khamathā tui hānglala makhuisanglu.”
“Iwui mibingli ina horhaira,
iwui shimlui ina chihochaohaira;
Iwui ningna leishikhamataiabingli yangkashibingwui pāngli horsangmihaira.

Iwui vang iwui shimluikat chukpoma sāshai vanao katha ngasahaola?
Tukshaiki kaje vānao khangateibingna ali kuinamlaga leila?
Vālu, ramsā saikora vākazipkhuilu;
shaikhavai rāngasaklu.
Yaokahoma kachungkhana iwui drakhā yāmgui sākazammiserhaira,
athumna iwui yar naithatmiserhaira;
iwui khamathā yar chi athumna ramcho lamhāng ngasāmihaira.
Athumna chi ramcho sāngasakhaowa;
ramchohaoda ili ngakaoda lei.
Ngalei katonga ramcho sāngasakhaira,
kha khipānakha ningli sakta makhuimana.

Kaja mi akhawui kashānli malao ngavaikashān thāda Judahshi shimkhur eina Israelshi shimkhur ili ngavapshān ngasaka, da
Nana tui hi athumli vāhāngra: Israelwui
Chieina nana athumli hāngra,
Kala ina athum akha eina akha ngashao ngasakra, avāva̱ ngarā eina anaomayarabing ngashao ngasakra da
Nganālu, nganākhuilu; malāngsoalu,
kaja
Nathumwui
ana tangkhamang makhuirāranglakha,
māmāchākahai phungreibingli phei mangaphokranglakha;
nathumna kahor phāzatlakha ana chi tangmang ngasakra kala tangmangting ngasakhaora.
Kha nathumna manganāsangakha,
nathumwui lāngsotwui vang imanglāna ngathumda chapra;
imikna chapchapta chara̱ pemda longtāra.
Khikhalajila
Awunga kala awungva̱li hānglu:
“Khanempamli pamlu,
kaja nathumwui khamathā kuihon nathum kuiwui eina tātunghaira.
Negebwui keinungbing shungnamhaira,
shomi khavai mi khipākha malei;
Judah saikora raithāhaira,
katonga raithāserhaira.”
Namik ngareikālu kala yanglu,
atungshongwui eina kharābing chili.
Nali mikahai nawui khamathā yaoshang kali vāhao?
Nathumwui ngasotnaona da nathumna tamkachithei athumna,
nathumwuitungli mungakha nathum khi hāngra?
Sha̱nao akhana naokhara̱ thāda kachotna nathumli makhanangmarala?
Khiwui vang ili hikathā ot rāshokhao?
da nathumwui ningli phaningakha,
nathumwui morei chungnā sākahaiwui vang,
nathumwui kashan lānmi kahaina,
kala kachotkachāng samkaphangna.
Ethiopiawui mina awui ahui ngacheishapralā
lah kuirāngna awui achuk ngacheishaprala?
Chithākha nathum makaphā sākakasaibingnala kaphā sāshapra.
Siwukwui masina lanji phankathui thāda ina
nathumli
Hi nathumwui vang tamshokmi kahai yar china,
da
khikhalajila nathumna ili malaihaowa kala kakapikli shitsanga.
I khalattana nathumwui kashan nathumwui mai eina tangda lānkāmira kala nawui khayā theingasakra.
Nathumwui ningkakachai otsak ina theiserhaira,
phokaphāla, khayor otsak,
luili ngahongli khamathang kasāsā saikora!
O Jerusalem, nali kakhanang ngasāranu!
Na karankhawui thili tharnaonikhala?
Kazing kakāngwui pongli
“Judahna chapngachāda awui ngaveili ngahuipama;
awui mibingna chapngachāda ngaleili mashunzanga,
kala Jerusalemwui khavaokhon shavāsera.
Awui khangambingna raobingli tara̱ sokkhavai chihovai,
athumna ra̱khongli vai,
tara̱ masamphangmada tara̱ham khamasai eina hanunga.
Athum vaishida ningrākhaida kuirunhaowa.
Ngalei chili kazing marotāmithuda ngalei ngachakkhaiserhaowa,
lui khavābing khayakhaoda kuirunhaowa.
Khawo mashokthuda ramwui seichui eina tangda pharādhadhar naoli nothahaowa.
Ramwui gadhāna khangaili nganingda
masiwui vang ramfa thāda kha̱shan-shanpama;
athumwui mik matheirarthumana,
khikhalajila chili thingnā-ra̱hā maleithuwa.
“Ithumwui khayonkhamāngna jisālala,
O
Kaja ithumna sa̱na̱thui kahai chungnāhaira,
ithumna nali morei sāhaira.
O, Israelwui kachihana,
kachot atamli huikhuikhame;
na khisāda ngalei hili ramkazata kha̱mi katha,
thangngayākha ngasāmkhui khavai phakazata kathā ngasāpairakhala?
Khisāthuda na pa̱khangapā,
makanmikharara kapanga mi thāpairakhala?
Chithālala O
kala ithumli nawui ming eina hoi,
ithumli horkahai masāmialu.”
Mibing hiwui apongli
“Athumna hithāda ngaruikazatli leishihaoda,
athumna athumwui phei mangasāmana;
chiwui vang
ara ana athumwui khayonkhamāng phaningungra kala athumwui moreili tandi mira.”
Athumna kakhum eina pamlala ina athumwui khavao mashāmimara, rikkatā kachigat, theishirai chigatlala ina makhuisangmimara; kha ina raighai eina, chāmrei eina, kazāt eina chithitra.”
Chieina ina hānga, “Iyavo, Proho VARE, yangmilu, marānbingna athumli, ‘Nathumna raighai matheimara, chāmreila matheimara, kha apam hili ngashit kahai chingri kahai ngasāra da hānga.’ ”
Chieina
“Chiwui vang eina ina machiholala, iwui ming singlaga, raighai eina chāmrei ngalei hili marāmara da khamarānbing chi, raighai eina kala chāmrei eina thira da

Kala athumna kahāng tui chi kashābingli Jerusalemwui eina kashamshokhaora, raighai eina kala chāmrei eina thira, athumli chifa khavai mi maleisāmara—athumla, apreiva̱̱ ngarāla, naomayara kala ngalāva̱ ngarā saikorali chifa khavai mi maleisāmara. Kaja athumwui makhayā otsak chi athumwuitungli ina heirorra.”
“Athumli tui hi nana ahāngra:
‘Ngashun ngayā mateila imikli chāra̱ tāshon tāthairanu;
kala athum mangasāmaranu,
kaja iwui mibingwui kachingva̱ naongalāva̱li marlak eina shaomida khamā haklak eina za̱haira.
Luili ayang, raighai eina kathibingwui angun thei!
Keinungli zang chāmrei kazāt eina kathi pemting!
Kaja marān eina pāngmonbingna theithangkhamei maleila ngalei chili athumwui ot sāzata.’”
Nana Judahli khalanchao kahaila?
Zionli namanglāna sānchaohaola?
Khisāthuda nana ithumli khanang ngasakta ithumwui vang kharai maleithu?
Ithumna chingri kahai phai, kha kaphā mashokmana;
raikhavai atamwui vang phai,
kha yanglu, khangachee khangachāmang.
O
kala ishāvā ngarāna khayonkhamāng;
ithumna nawui mangāli morei sāhaira kaji ithum mayai.
Naming wui vang ithumli machinkāmialu.
Nawui tekhamatei wungpamkhong mamaishi ngasakalu;
ithumli nawui tuingashit makaimila kaphaningungmilu.
Yurbingwui makhamashunga varebingwui ngachaili kazing romishapa khipā lei?
Lha kazingramna zingrot romishapla?
A chi na maningmalā, O
Ithumna nali chihāna,
kaja ot saikora hi nana sai.
Kala athumna ‘Ithum kali vaurakhala?’ da khangahān tharan, nana athumli hithāda hānglu,
Kazātwui vang kazātli,
kala raighaiwui vang raighaili,
chāmreiwui vang chāmreili,
narhaoki kajibingna narkahaili
vāra.’”
Athumli sāshimān khavai ina apong mati ngarānra, da
Kala Hezekiahwui naomayara, Judahwui awunga Manassehna Jerusalemli kasāsā chiwui vang, okathuiwui wungram saikorali khangachee sāmira.”
“O Jerusalem, nali khipāna lumashanmirakhala,
lah khipāna nali chapngachāmirakhala?
Kkhipana kathāhaokhala da rāngahānmirakhala?
Nathumna ili makhuisangmana,
yāmkhangai yāma da
chiwui vang nali mamayāmada ipāng katingshokta nali shimān khangasakna;—
Ina yangmisānhaira.
Hamkhavai yāmkok eina ina ngalei chiwui ngaveilungli hamserhaira;
iwui mibingli shimān ngasakta sifa khangasakna;
athumna athumwui apongwui eina mahanungmana.
Yireiwui situile;
ina athumwui ra̱meiva̱bing chungmei ngasakhaira;
yaronnaobing yaronshaplakha chithitra,
ava̱va̱ ngarāli khanang ngasakra.
Khangachee-khangachā kashuirak eina ina athumwuitungli tāngasakra.
Nao shini kapharāva̱ ning thengchanghaida vānhaira;
ngashunung awui zimik tunhaowa;
ali maishida khayak ngasakhaira.
Kataibing chili yangkashibingwui mangāli raighai eina chithitra da
Ngalei katongali khangahei kala khanganura ili kapharava̱ ishāva̱, kalākashi! Ina khipālikha mashukmana, kachishutla maleimana, chithālala saikorana ili khonshiya.
Chithakhalairanu; O
Atungshongwui mari, pithrai khamanāta mari chi sā̱tekashapa mi leirala?
“Nathumwui moreiwui vang eina, nathumwui ramkhai ungpei vāpeida nathumwui lan kala kazip kahai saikora yangkashibingli aman makhuila ngaponkhui khavai mihaora.
Nathumna makathei ngaleili ina nathumli yangkashibingwui otram ngatha̱ ngasakra; kaja, iwui malungkathui mamitlakki kaji mei thada chuikāhaira.”
“O
kala ili rekakharekbingli iwui vang athut khuimilu.
Nana khāngkatheiwui alungli ili makhuithuimilu;
namingwui vang ina miwui malungkhavāt samkaphangna kaji katheimilu.
Nawui tui chi samphangda ina chibing chi zai,
kala nawui tui chi iwui vang khamathān kala wuklungwui ringkaphā ngasahaowa;
kaja naming eina ili hoi,
O
Ina lumlao kasābingli mangayurpamana,
khamathānla ina mamathānmana;
nawui kahāng nganāda imāng pama,
kaja nana ili malungkathuina chipemmi.
Iwui kachot khisāda mangasāmthu,
iwui maraikapai khamā khisāda maraimithu?
Na ili thengkahai kongrā thārala?”
Chiwui vang
“Nana latungakha ina nali khuisangmira,
kala iwui mangāli nana nganingra.
Makānkhanā tui horhaida kasaka tui matuiakha,
nana iwui khamor ngasāra.
Athumna nali ngareiungra,
kha nana athumli mangareivāmara.
Mibing hili khangazip pithraiwui phākho ngasā khavai ina nali sākhuira;
athumna nali ngasungra,
kha athumna nali mayuirarmara,
kaja nali kanshokta huimi khavai ina nali ngasomida lei,
da
Makhayābingwui pāng eina ina nali kanmira,
sakashebingwui eina nali ngatangkhuimira.”
“Apam hili na ngalā makhuipaimara, naola mapharāpaimara.
Kaja apam hili kapharā naobing, athumli pharākakhui ava̱va̱ kala avāva̱ ngarāwui pongli

Athum zakkashi kazāt eina thira. Athumwui vang chapkhangachāla machapngachāmara, kachifala machifamara; athum paih thāhaora. Athum raighai kala chāmrei eina thira, athumwui angun khamasaili yongkazat vānaobingwui kala ramsāwui kashakazā ngasāhaora.
“Kaja
Apam hiwui kharei kateo mateila thiserra; athumli machifamara, kala athumwui vang sam chichāpta lah sitāda chapngachā khavai khipākhala maleisāmara.
Kathiwui vang sifada khalei athumli ning ringphā khavai khipānakha khong makhaisangmimara; kala ava̱ avā kathiwui vang ning lumkhavai mamimanglakmara.
“Nana morkasong shimli vāda phāshak phazā khavai athumli mapam ngarumpaimara.
Kaja Israelwui Vare saikorawui
“Nana tui saikora hi mibingli kahāng tharan, kala athumna, ‘Khiwui vang
chitharan nana athumli hithāda ngahānkāra:
kala nashāvā ngarāli nathumpāna zakshimeida sākahaiwui vang, kaja yanglu, nathum kachichāwui makaphā kaphaning chili shurthuihaida ili manganāsangthuwa.

Chiwui vang ngalei hiwui eina ina nathumli katāva̱li, nathumnalapai lah nashāvā ngarānalapai matheikasapamli kahaivāhaora, kala chili nathumna vare khangateili ngashun ngayā otram ngatha̱ra; kaja nathumli ina lukhamashan machitheiluimara.’”
“Chiwui vang eina yanglu, zimiksho chi rārāli, da
kha Israelwui mibingli atungshongwui ngalei eina kala ana kashamvā kahaipampamwui eina thānshokkhame
“Yanglu, ina khai kaphā mi kachungkha hohaira, da
Kaja, imikna athumwui kasāsā apong saikora thei; athum iwui eina mathumhaimana, athumwui khayonkhamāng kasāla imikwui eina kathumla mathumhaimana.

Kala ina athumli khanishida athumwui khayonkhamāng eina moreiwui vang angathut hāngsangra; khikhalajila athumna iwui ngalei ningkakachai meoma̱bing eina sāmakhaomihaira, kala ningkakachai otsakna iwui shimlui chipemmihaira.”
O
kakhanang atamli iwui ngayin khavaipam,
okathui vākatangwui eina yur kachiva̱na nali rāhāngra:
“Ishāvā ngarāna kakapik maningla khangatei akhala mamathuisanghaimana,
makankhanā tongkazā makhalei otmānga.
Mina akhalattawui vang varebing sākhuipaila?
Chikathā chiya varebing maningmana!”
“Chiwui vang eina yanglu, ina athumli iwui pangshap eina yāng akha shida theingasakra, kala iwui ming
“Judahwui morei mari kolom eina kapihaida lei, hirāwui aton eina athumwui wuklungwui lungphekli kala athumwui hanphutwui angachili ruksanghaira,
anao ngarāna khamatek thingpam kachida kala phungrāton kajujui apambingli lāngmeida athumwui hanphut kala Asherimli khorumchinga.
Nathumwui lan kala nathumwui sinā lupa saikora nathum moreiwui aman sāda ina nathumwui ramkhai ungshung vāshungda ngaponthui ngasakra.

Ina mikahai nathumwui shimlui chi nathumwui pangwui eina ngapaithuihaora; kala nathumna makathei ngaleili nathumwui yangkashebingli otram ngatha̱ ngasakra. Kaja iwui malungkhavātlungli mei sākāhaira; chiya mathāhaila chuichingra.”
“Mili chihanlaga awui asā eina zeighai sākhangasaka,
Mi che siwukwui arongnao kathāna,
khamathā kaho kashok matheimara.
lamhāngwui thengcheng kahaipambingli,
maokthuikapai chirumli okthui ngasakra.
angayungbing kongrāra̱li zimkakhui samkaphang,
kasā kharā tharan mangacheema,
kaja anā timshon timthaiya,
kala kazingkakāng atamlila ning makashakmana,
kaja chiya athei khamatheila khangasām makhavai thingrong kathāna.
“Ot saikorawuitungli wuklung zakshimeikapa,
kala makhaomeikapa,
khipāna chi bhab tāshapkhala?
kala wuklungli tamyanga;
mi kachiva̱li awui apongwui thishurda,
awui kasāsāwui athei athishurda mikhavaina.”
Tiktarenna mapumkakhui nao nganaokakhui chithāda,
mashun mazangla shāngkakhui a chikathāna;
mirin ngahunpatli athumna ali nothāhaora
kala awui athitlam mangkhama̱ ngasai.
Haokaphok eina thuida kajuipamli tekmateilak kahai wungpamkhong chi ithumwui katharapamna.
O
nali horkahaibing maishi ngasakra;
nawui
kaja kharing tara̱wui ura̱,
O
Ili huimilu, chieina I kahui samphangra;
kaja na iwui masotna.
Athumna ili hānga, yanglu,
Chi rāranu!”
Makaphā chihorā khavai ina nali marengmana,
kalāshāt rākhavai atam ina ningkachāngla maningmana, nana katheina,
ikhamorwui eina kashok namangāli leihairasai.
Ili mangachee ngasakmialu;
kalākashi atamli na iwui ngayin khavaipamna.
Ili rekakharekbingli maishi ngasaklu,
kha ili mamaishi ngasakalu;
athumli ning khanang ngasaklu,
kha ili ning makhanang ngasakalu,
kalāshāt atam chi athumli khuirāmilu;
athumli khani shida chotchāngranu!
kala hānglu: ‘
na hithāda hānga: Nathumwui mirinwui vang nganākazakkhuilu, kala sabbaththang kharita ot maphunglu, lah Jerusalemwui ngaveibing einala maphungzangalu.
Shimwui eina sabbaththang ot kharit maphungshokalu, ot akhala masaalu; kha nashāvā ngarāli kaso kahai thāda sabbath hi tharda mayonlu.
Chithālala athum manganāsangmana, lah manāshungmana, kha mashā khavai kala tamkachithei makhuisang khavai ngakaishitingtinghaowa.
“‘Kha nathumna iwui tui nganaakha, da

Davidwui wungpamkhongli kapam awungabing, siguigarilungli kala siguitungli katonga wungnaobingli, kala Judahwui mibing eina Jerusalemwui mibingli ngasoda ngaveili zangra; kala keinung hili okthuichingra.

Kala Judah keinungwui eina mibing, Jerusalem kuimareida khalei apambing, Benjamin ngaleiwui eina, Shephelahwui eina, kaphungramwui eina, Negebwui eina, rikkatā kachigat eina pha̱kaphayāyur tharāzat kachigat, frankincense, kala ningyatchigat

Kha nathumna sabbath tharda mayon khavai iwui tui manganaakha, kala Jerusalemwui ngaveili sabbaththang ot kharit phungzangakha, ina ngaveili mei thotlaga Jerusalemwui konung saikora chuitā ngasakra kala sāshimitlala makhuimara.’”
“Ham kasemawui shimli tālu; chili ina nali iwui tui hāngra.”
Chieina ina ham kasemawui shimli katā thara a ham semsai.
Semkakhui ham chi mathāda mashok kachida ana leikhon chi khuida khangatei ham sāluishita.
Chiwui thili
Ham kasaana leikhon eina kasem thāda nathum Israel yurli ina sāki kajiwui mashun maleimala? Ham kasemana awui pāngli leikhon kasing thāda nala iwui pāngli leida lei.
Kachikathāthā atamli ina kachikathā yur akhalilapai, wungram akhalilapai, sākazamhaorada vaoshokhailala,
yur china makaphā kasāwui eina ngareiungakha, ina sāra da hānghaikasā chi ina masāmara.
Lākhashong, yurlapai, wungramlapai ina sakāmira kala lingkāmira da hanghailaga,
yur china iwui kahāng manganāmada makaphā saakha, ina sārada hanghaikasā chi ina masāmara.
Chiwui vang eina, ara, Judahwui mili kala Jerusalemwui mibingli hānglu: Yanglu,
“Kha athumna ngahānkāi, ‘Aremana! kachichāwui sākhangai sāra; kala makaphā sākhangai athishurda zatra.’”
“Chiwui vang
Miyurbingli ngathingyanglu,
khipāna hikathā kashāhairala?
Kachingva̱ Israelna zakshilāk kahai ot sāhaira.
Lebanonwui horam kathak Sirionwui lungkai eina thuila?
Phungreiwui eina longkatā khamakui tara̱ thengpairala?
Kha iwui mibingna ili malaihaira;
athumna makhaninga varebingli nganamkaphā riktai;
achālakhawui shongfabing chili athum phei ngaphokhaowa,
chānrei horhaida shongchonli thuihaowa.
Athumwui ngalei khangacheena pem ngasaka,
katang mavaila kasiror khavai ngasāhaowa.
Chili khamakāna kachiva̱na ngacheenāhaida kui khayita.
Yangkashebingwui mangāli zingshoshongwui masi thāda ina athumli phankhayāngmihaora.
Athumwui ringkashi atamli,
athumli mai mangareivāla khana̱rorhaora.”

Chiwui thili athumna hānga, “Rālu, Jeremiahli sāmihaosa; ithumli ngachonmi khavai pāngmonla, hāngchitheimi khavai thangkhamabingla, shokki kaji tui hāngmi khavai marānla leichingra. Mamatuilak khavai khangarān akha sāsa, awui tui kakhuila makhuiluiasa.”
O
iwui kapo khuisangmilu.
Kaphāwui sāman makaphā ngasāpairala?
Kha imanglā khuikhavaiwui vang athumna chom chuihaira.
Phaningungmilu, ina kathāda athumwui vang kaphā hāngmikhavai,
athumwui eina nawui malungkhavāt khuithuimi khavai
nawui mangāli nganingkhala kaji.
Chiwui vang eina athumwui naomayarabing chāmreili horsangmihaolu;
raighaiwui pangshapli mihaolu,
apreiva̱̱ ngarā nao maleila ra̱meipamranu.
Athumwui mayarnaobing kazātkashishi eina thiranu,
athumwui yaronnaobing raili raighai eina maseiranu.
Nana kashuirak athumwuitungli
sakathatabing khuikharā tharan athumwui shimli ringkhangākhon ngaunlophaoranu!
Kaja athumna ili khuikhavai chom akha chuihaira,
kala ipheiwui vang khalen sanghaira.
Chithālala, O
Athumwui khayon mapheomialu,
nawui maiyan eina athumwui morei pheokhamila mapheomialu,
nawui mangāli athum pitāranu,
nawui malungkhavāt atamli sāmihaolu.
Hinnomwui naomayarawui tampākli vāda Hamkāi Ngavei zangkhavai chili ina kahāng tui chi vaomalānlu.
Nana hāngra: “

Khikhalajila mibingna ili horhaowa, avāva̱ ngarāna makathei, Judahwui awungabingna makathei kala athum eina tangda makathei varebingli nganamkaphā ot riktāda apam hi sāmakhaohaira; khiwui vangkhala kaja khayon makhalei miwui asheena apam hi pemhaira.
Athumna Baalli khorum khavai kajujuipamli hanphut sākhui, kala ina makakaso lah iwui ningli maleisālak kaji ot sāda athumwui naomayarabingli Baalli pha̱khavai hanphutli riktai.
Chiwui vang eina yanglu, da

Apam hili Judah eina Jerusalemwui khangarān saikora khikha makhaning ngasā ngasakra; kala athumwui mibingla yangkashibingwui mangāli raighai eina thingasakra, kala manglā khuikida khangarān athumwui pāngli thisang ngasakra. Athumwui angun khamasaili yongkazat vānaoli kala ramsāli shaingasakra.
Kala ina keinung hi khangachee ngasā ngasakra, kasirorki kaji ot, rākakān kachiva̱na ngacheera kala kasirorra khikalajila kalāshāt shokkahai saikora chiwui vāngna.

Kala athumwui naomayara eina ngalāva̱ ngarāwui asā ina athumli shaingasakra, kala athumwui manglā khuikida kasā athumwui yangkashibingna kuinam kahaiwui kakhanang atamli khongnainao eina khongnainao shaingarokra.”
Chiwui thili nali ngasokazatbingwui mangāli ngaleiham chi sakhailaga,
athumli nana hāngra, saikorawui
Apam hi kala chiwui mibingli ina hithāda sāmira, kala keinungla Topheth thāda sāmira.

Jerusalemwui shimbing kala Judah awungabingwui shim, shimtung saikorali, kazingramli khalei saikorali nganamkaphā ot rikkatā kala varebing khangateili ra̱khalekkasā shim saikora chi Topheth thāda sākhamānghaora,” da hānga.
Saikorawui
Chitharan Immerwui naomayara pāngmon Pashhur,
Chieina Pashhurna marān Jeremiahli shaolaga
Akhama kathā narshimwui eina kachiho chitharan Jeremiahna Pashhurli hānga, “Nali
Kaja

Chili lāngda keinungwui lan, tongkakhui saikora, aman kasasak ot, kala Judah awungabingwui lan saikora yangkashibingwui pāngli horsangmida athumna shimān ngasakra, ngaponkhuihaora, kala Babylonli khuitāserhaora.
Pashhur nala, nashi shimli khalei saikora tukthuihaora, Babylonli khuivāserhaora, chili nathum thisangra; nala, kala nana minamda marānkhame ngasotabinglila chili chifaserra.”
O
ili kapikhaira;
na ili pangmeiya, chieina nana yuihaira.
Mina langpongda mana̱shinganao khavai sathuihaowa,
mi kachiva̱na ili mana̱shidalei.
Kaja ina matuikachida, ina vaoya,
“Khangashao kala sākashimān!” da ina vaoshoka.
Kaja
“Awui ming ina masingmara,
lah awui ming singda mahangluimara,” jiakha,
iningli mei kachui thāda ara̱-arā vāshunga,
kala chi singkapam I makhāngrarmana,
I mararmana.
Kaja ngathumda tarākha khangazek ina shai.
Kuimareida khangachee lei!
“Ali mashātalu! Ithum ali mashātsa!”
da iwui theikhamasui ngasotnaobingna hānga,
I kongkhalui ngashānpama.
“Ali minampailapai, chithākha ithumna ali yuishapra,
chithākha ithumna ali athut khuipaira.”
Kha
chiwui vang ili rekakharekbing athum phei ngaphokta ili mayuirarmara.
Athum maishilākhaora;
kaja athum mayuithukmara.
Athumwui katang makhavai khayā khamalā chi mamalairarlakmara.
O saikorawui
khamashungli tamkhayanga,
wuklung kala ningla katheiya,
athumwuitungli nawui athut kakhui ili theingasakmilu,
kaja nali iwui ngalang chi ina horsangchao kahaina.
Kaja makaphā kasābingwui pāng eina khavātabingwui mirin kanshokmihaira.
Ishāva̱na ili pharāthang chi sokhami mangasaaranu!
Ishāvāli “Nali naomayara akha pharāmihaira”
da chānpao hangkhamepa chi kalākashi ngasaranu,
Mipa chi,
Ngathor kakhanangkhon shāranu,
kala ngashun raikhon shāranu,
khikhalajila ili naopamli ana masāthathaithuwa;
achāva ishāva̱ iwui chikhur ngasāda awui naopam reikhamatai ngasāchingra.
Kakhanang malung kharing theida kakhayak lungli
pamkhavai naopamwui eina I khisāda rāhaokhala?
Malchiahwui naomayara Pashhur eina Ma-aseiahwui naomayara pāngmon Zephaniahli Zedekiah awungana Jeremiahwuili chihokhava chitharan
“Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna ithumli rai sākida ngarāndalei;
Chieina Jeremiahna athumli hānga:
“Israelwui
I khalatta pāng katingda pāngthei kharei eina, malungvāt eina, kala sāshāt eina nathumli ngararra.
Kala ina keinung hili khaleibing, mila sha̱keila shaothatra; athum hakkhamahā kazāt eina thira.

Chiwui thili Judahwui awunga Zedekiah, kala awui raobing, kala keinung hiwui mibing kazāt, chāmrei, kala raighai eina mathikhangakān athumli Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadrezzarwui pāngli, kala athumwui yangkashebing, manglā khuikida kasā athumwui pāngli horsangmiserhaora. Ana athumli raighai eina sāthatra, athumli malumashanmara, kashākla mashākhaimara, huikhamila mahuimimara.”
“Kala mibing hili nana hithāda hāngra: ‘
Keinung hili kapamabing raighai eina, chāmrei eina kala kazāt eina thira; kha nathumli kuinam kahaia Chaldeanaobingli ayāmsangda hamkasangbing mathimara, athumwui manglā raiman sāda kahai samphangra.
Kaja keinung hili ina mamayākhangai, kaphāwui vang maningla makaphāwui vang ngarānkuphaira da
Kala Judah awungashi shimkhurli hānglu,
O Davidwui shimkhur!
Ngathor mashun bichar sāmilu,
kala phama̱shaomi kahaipali kashaopāwui pāng eina kankhuimilu,
maningkha iwui malungkhavāt mei thāda tāra kala chuida khipānakha masāshimitrarmara,
nathumwui makaphā kasāwui vangna’”.
“Yanglu, O tampākli kapambing, ina nathumli mamayāmana,
O tampākwui lunghār da
nathumna hānga, khipāna ithumli tāngasungshaprakhala?
Khipāna ithumwui shimli rāzangshapkhala?
Nathumwui kasā athei athishurda,
ina nathumli tandi mira da
awui ngahongli ina mei thotra,
kala china kuikhamareili khalalei saikora chuitāserhaora.”
Davidwui wungpamkhongli kapama O Judahwui awunga, raobing kala ngavei eina kazanga saikora

na hithāda hānga: “Mashun kala khangarong eina bichar sāmilu, kala phama̱shaomi kahaipali kashaopāwui pāngwui eina kankhuimilu. Kha̱mili, marānaoli, kala ra̱meinaoli khayon sākashila masālu, kala apam hili khayon makhalei miwui ashee matā ngasaklu.
Kaja nathumna tui hi khuisang kachangkhatakha, keinung hili Davidwui wungpamkhongli kapama awungabing sigui kala siguigari tonglaga zangra, athumla, athumwui raobingla, mibingla kazang samphangserra.
Kha nathumna tui hi manganākha, I khalattana shākhi sāda kahāng hina, kaja shim hi machohaora da
“Judah awungawui shimkhurwui pongli
Iwui vang na Gilead kathāna,
Lebanonwui kaphungton kathāna;
chithālala mi maokkathui keinung,
siwuk akha sāngasakra.
Ina nali sāshimān khavai ngarānra, athum ava̱va̱li zeighai chisinra;
kala athumna nathumwui mathāmeithui kaje cedarthing ta̱tekra,
kala chibing chi meili horsanghaora.”
“Kala miyur kachungkhana keinung hi rāmakānra, kala mi kachiva̱na awui khongnaili khiwui vang
Kala athumna ngahānkāra, khikhalajila athumna athumwui Vare
Kathe chiwui vang machapalu,
kala awui vang sikafala masifalu;
kha tukthui kahaipa chiwui vang soso chapngachālu,
kaja ava awui ramli ungyang khavai maungluimara.
kha ali tukvā kahai apam chili athisangra, kala a ngalei hi maungtheiluilakmara.”
Makhangarong eina awui shim kala makhamashung eina khamato kābing sakakāpā chi kakhanang ngasāranu;
awui khongnainaoli khikhala mamila ot sākhangasaka,
awui ngalangmanla makhame;
“shim kahakva̱ akha ina sākhuira,
khamato kā mashāchā eina sākhuira,”
charfala cedarthing eina sāsangra,
ari kahunga neomithaora, da kahānga chi.
Cedarthing kachungkha khaleiwui vang na awunga akhana da phaningla?
Nashāvāna mangzālala mashun eina khangarong masāmala?
Chieina awui vang kaphā ngasasai.
Ana kachāma kala khavātabingli mashungrik eina sāmi,
china awui phākhavai ngasāsai.
Hi ili katheiwui vang maningmala?
da
Kha namik kala naning khalei hiya,
nawui ning makatharwui tongzā khavai,
khayon makhaleili ashee tākhavai, rekharek khavai,
ngashaokhavaiwui vangmānga.
Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimwui pongli
“Khipānakha, ‘Iyavo, ichinā!’ lah ‘Iyavo izarva̱!’
da ali machapsangmimara.
Khipānakha ‘Iyavo
lah ‘Iyavo nawui reikhamatai!’
da ali machapsangmimara.
Gadhā akha kaphum thāda alila phumra, Jerusalem ngavei kānda shimenshoklaga horhaora.”
Lebanonli kālu, kala vaolu,
Bashanli angavaolu;
Abarimwui eina ngakaolu,
kaja nali leikashebing sāshimānserhaira.
Na nganantāp eina leilakha ina hānga,
kha I manganāsangmara, da nana hānga.
Iwui kahāng makhanganā hi na nganuilakhawui einana.
Nawui yao kahomabingli masina homra;
nawui leikashebing tukthui haora;
chiwui thili nawui makhayāwui vang na maishira kala pa̱ngapāra.
O Lebanonli kapānabing, cedarthinglungli vānaothip thāda kapamabing,
nawuitungli kachot kharā tharan nathum kathāda ngahuira̱khala,
sha̱naona naokhara̱ kachot thāda!
kala nathumwui manglā khuikida kaphā, nathumna khangachee, Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzar, kala Chaldean mibingwui pāngli horsangmira.
Nali, kala nali kapharāva̱ nashāva̱li, nali mapharākasang ram khangatei akhali ina kahaivāhaora; kala chili na athisangra.
Kha athumna kahaoda hanungkhangai ngalei chili athum malatungluimara.”
“Coniah kaho mi hi yangkakharinga, hamkai,
mi khipākhana mayangsangkhami ham kathāla?
Ali, kala awui naomayarali kahaithuihaida athumna makathei ramli khisāda raithāhao?”
O ngalei, ngalei, ngalei,
“Hipa hi nao makhaleia mina, da kapisanglu;
awui thotli maikhayā masamphangki kaji mina;
kaja, awui naotun khipanakha Davidwui wungpamkhongli pamlaga,
Judahli mamungluimara.”
“Iwui yaohomphungwui yaonaobingli kashamkakhayāng kala sakakhayānga yaokahomabing kakhanang ngasāranu!” da

Chiwui vang eina iwui mibingli yangkhame yaokahomabingwui pongli Israelwui Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “Iwui yao mahomla nathumna chipenserhaira kala kashamserhaira. Yanglu, nathumwui makhayā otsak chiwui vang ina nathumli mahaimara da

Chiwui thili ngalei khangatateili ina kashamvā kahaibing saikorawui eina shāk kahai athum saikora kazipkhuiluira, kala athumwui yaoshimli khuiungmiluishitra, kala athei kachungkha matheida mayāsangra.
Ina athumli yangmi khavai yaokahomabing phāsangmira, kala athumna mangacheeluimara, kaphaning masuitāluimara, kashimānla mashimānmara, da
Awui thotli Judahli kanmira, kala Israel chingri eina okthuira. Kala ali hoki kaji aming chi hina: ‘
“Chiwui vang eina yanglu, zimiksho chi rārāli; da
kha ‘Israel shimkhurwui ara̱-azābingli atungshongwui ngalei eina kala ana kashamvā kahai ngalei saikorawui eina thānkashoka
Marānbingwui pongli:
Imalung ngawokkhaihaira,
ara̱-arā tachokhaira.
I khamaripa mi thāhaira,
zamkhorna minkahaia thāda,
Kaja ngalei hi phokaphāna pema;
khonkashiwui vang ngaleina sifay,
lamhāngwui seihomphungla ngaikhokhaira.
Athumwui otsak makaphāna,
kala athumwui pangshap mamashungmana.
“Marānla, pāngmonla Vareli kathei malei;
iwui shimli eina tangda athumwui makhayā otsak sai,
da
Chiwui vang athumwui shongfa khanganaili ngayāshong kazat thāhaora,
chili kashamvāda kongluira;
kaja athumli tandi mikum ina athumwuitungli zakkashi khuirāra, da
Samariawui marānbingli ina mamayākhangai otsak thei;
athumna Baalwui ming eina marāna,
kala iwui yur Israelli thānnguiya.
athumna shām sai kala kakapiklungli zata;
makaphā kasā mibingli kasatsangda khipākha makhayāwui eina malatungmana,
iwui mangāli athum saikora Sodom thāserhaira,
kala chiwui mibing Gomorrah thai.
“Chiwui vang marānbingwui pongli saikorawui
yanglu, athumli ina thingkhā akha chishaira,
kala mangkhavai kathiri kasanga tara̱ mira;
kaja Jerusalemwui marānbingwui eina makathara saikorali shivāthaira.”
Saikorawui

wui tuili chinkakā athumli ‘Nathum khikha mathālakmara’ da athumna hangchinga; kala kachichā khalattawui ningli ngakaishitingtingda kazatabingli athumna, ‘Nathumwuitungli kalākashi marāza̱lakmara’” da hānga.
“Kaja athumwui ngachaili khipāna
kaziplungli awui tui shākhui khavai kala theikhui khavai vānganinghairakhala?
lah khipāna awui tui khuisangda nganāhairakhala?
Yanglu,
Malung kathui sur kakhaning thāda;
makhayāwui kuili chi ngawokkhaira.
Awui ningli sāki kaji sāda makupranglakha eina tangda
Naoda nathum chi theishingkhuinaora.”
“Marānbingli ina machihomana,
athum khalatta kazatna;
athumli ina mangazekmana,
chithālala athumna marāna.
Kha athumna iwui tui khuisāsi kaje,
athumna iwui mibingli iwui tui vaomalānhairara,
kala athumna athumwui makaphā apongwui eina,
kala athumwui makaphā otsakwui einala ngareiunghairara.
“Vare I, himāngli leimala, apam khangatateili makhaleia Varela? da
Makathei apamli mi akhana ngathumhaowa da ina matheirarmarala? da
Marānbingna iming singlaga kapikta, ili mangli mahāmihaira, ili mangli mahāmihaira! da khamatui ina shāhaira.
Athum khalattawui wuklungli mikhanam khamarān kala kakapik khamarāna marānbingna karankha kapikpamrakhala?
Avāva̱ ngarāna Baalli khokharumwui vang iming malai kahai thāda, iwui mibinglila athumwui mang hangkhangarok eina ili malai ngasakshapra da athumna phaninga.
Mang kashimana marān china mang chi hāngranu, kha iwui tui kashāpa china iwui tui peichaoda hāngmiranu. Mā eina lanji ngaraikachā khi leikhala? da
Iwui tui mei mathāmala? Kala ngalung shaokhai khavai rishaolung mathāmala? da
Chiwui vang eina, yanglu, iwui tuina da athum eina athum leekhui khangaroka, marānbing chili ina mamayāmana da
Yanglu, athumwui male eina,
Yanglu, kakapika mang khamarānbingli ina mamayāmana da
“Kachikathā mi akhana nilala, marān nilala, pāngmon nilala, ‘
Kala marān nilala, pāngmon nilala, maningkha kachikathā mi akhana ‘
Chithāda sāda, mi kachiva̱na khongnaili kala achināli ngahān ngaroklu kaja, ‘
Kha ‘
Chithāda sāda nana pāngmonli hāngra, ‘
Kha nana kalikhada, ‘
chiwui vang eina yanglu, nathumli, navā ngarāli ina mikahai keinung hiwui eina kachangkhatta ina nathumli khāngkhuilaga iwui ngalemwui eina katāva̱li horhaora.
Kala ina nathumwuitungli mamalailaki kaji katang makhavai makhamayā kala katang makhavai maikashi chi khuirāra.”
Luk akhali kazang khaorāthei chiya khamathāmānga, minkhare khaorathei thai, kha akhapali kazanga chiya zakkashi mashaikapaimānga.
Kala
Ina ngahānkai, “Khaorāthei thei; khamathā khaorathei chiya mathālaka, kala makhamathā khaorathei chiya zakshishuna, zakshināhaida chibing chiya mashaipaimana.”
Chiwui thili
“Israelwui Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Judahwui eina raitha kahaibing, Chaldea ngaleili chihovā kahaibing chi khaorāthei khamathābing katha thāda ina shānkhuira.
Athumwui phākhavai imikna yangmida lam hili ina khuiungluishitra. Athumli ina semkāra kala masākhaitāmara; athumli ina lingsangra, kala maphurshokmara.
I
“Kha
Athumli ina kashamkhavāpam kachida, okathuiwui wungram saikorali, ngachee-ngacha khavai, yangkharing khavai, tantakli ngazek khavai, mana̱shi khavai kala khonshi khavai sāngasakra.
Kala ina athumli kala avāva̱ ngarāli mikahai ngalei hiwui eina shimānchao majiranglakha eina tangda, raighai, chāmrei, kazātkashi chihorāra.”
Tui hi Judahwui mi saikora kala Jerusalemli khalei saikorali marān Jeremiahna hānga:
“Kum maga̱da kathumwui vang Amonwui naomayara Judahwui awunga Josiahna mungda tharāda kakathum kum eina thuilaga aja rāshungda
na awui rao marānbing kachungkha chihorāchinglala nathumna manganāsangmana, kala manāshungmana.
Athumna hānga, nathum kachichāwui makhayā apongwui eina kala khangui otsakwui eina latunglu, kala nathumli kala navā ngarāli khare eina katang mavaila mikahai ngalei chili ungpamlu;
khangatei varebingli otram ngatha̱ khavai kala khorum khavai mashuralu, kala nathumwui pāngthem einala I malungvāt khavai masālu. Chithakha ina sākashi masāmara.
Chitha-ilala nathumna ili manganāsangmana, da
“Chiwui vang saikorawui

yanglu, ‘Ina ngalei kala hili kapamabing, kala hili kuimareida khalei yurbing hili makhamayāwui vang atungshongwui yur saikora, kala Babylonwui awunga iwui rao Nebuchadrezzarli ina chihorālaga athumli zakshilāk eina shimān ngasakra, khangachee-khangachā, kasiror khavai, kala katang makhavai maikashi ngasā ngasakra.
Chili lāngda, athumwui eina ringkaphā khamathānkhon, shakazā mayara eina ngalāva̱wui akhon, mā kashireiwui kakhaningkhon, kahora thaomei katāva̱li khuithuihaora.
Ngalei katonga sakazamserhaora, khikha masāvailuimara; kala yurbing hina Babylonwui awungali kum hangshini otram ngatha̱ra.
Kum hangshini kāpei kahaiwui thili, Babylonwui awungali kala yur chili, Chaldea ngaleili athumwui moreiwui vang tandi mida athumwui ngalei shimānchang ngasakra da
Jeremiahna yur saikorawuitungli marān kahai, ina hāngkahai tui saikora, kala lairik hili kapisang kahai kachiva chi ina ngalei chiwuitungli khuirāra.
Kaja miyur kachungkhana kala kahaka awungabingna athumli raonao sāngasakra; kaja athumwui otsak kala pāngot athishurda ina sāman mira.’”
Athumna chi mangda athumwui alungli chihorāki kaji raighai china athum yuichachanghaida pāhaora.”
Chithāda ina tengkot chi
Jerusalem eina Judahwui keinung saikorali, chiwui awungabing eina wungnaobingli, aja thāda ngachakyāng kala horyāng kahai, khonkashi ngasākhavai;
Egyptwui awunga Pharaoh, awui raobing, awui wungnaobing, kala awui mi saikora,
kala aramli rākapama kha̱mi katonga; kala Uz ngalei saikorawui awungabing eina Philistine ngalei saikorawui awungabing (Ashkelon, Gaza, Ekron kala Ashdodwui shākkahaibing);
Edom, Moab kala Ammonwui naomayarabing;
Tyrewui awungabing, Sidonwui awungabing kala shamadru makānda ngayipheiwui awungabing;
Dedan, Tema, Buz, kala athumwui sam kachichāpabing;
Arabiawui awungabing eina yur kachungkha manātromda siwukli khalei yurbingwui awunga saikora;
Zimriwui awunga saikora, Elamwui awunga saikora, kala Mediawui awunga saikora;
katālila khanailila khalei atungshongwui awunga saikora, akhawui thili khangatei akha, kala apuk-apagali khalei wungram saikora, kala athumwui thili Babylonwui awungana mangra.
“Chieina nana athumli hāngra, ‘Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Athumna tengkot chi nawui pāng eina mamangmara jiakha, nana athumli hithāda hānglu, ‘Saikorawui

Kaja yanglu, iwui ming eina phok kahaiya keinung hili ina makaphā ot sāphokhaira, laga nathum tandi maphungla kathāda yāmshokpairakhala? Kaja okthuili okthuida khalei saikorali ngasung khavai raighai akha ina kasohaira, da saikorawui
“Chiwui vang, tui saikora hi athumli nana marānlu, kala athumli hithāda hānglu:
kala awui katharapam eina matuira;
awui mili ana mamayāmada khangangra,
kala drakhāra̱ kasurbingna khavao thāda,
okathuili okathuiya saikorali makhamayāwui vang vāoshokra.
Okathui akatang vāshungda khavaokhon chi shāvāra;
kaja,
kala ana phasā khavaia saikorali bichar sākhavai sāda lei,
kala makhayā saikorali ana raighai eina shaothatra,’”
da
Saikorawui
Yanglu, makaphā ot china miyur akhawui eina akhali zatta lei,
kala okathui akatangwui eina hakkhamahā siphan zingrot ngatha̱phokhaira!
Kala chithang
Chapngachālu, nathum yaokahomabing,
kala vaolu, hotlātungli ngaleolu,
yaoshangwui akhavābing,
kaja nathumli shaokathat kala chaiyāng kahai atam rāhaira;
mathāmeikap kaje yaovā pikatā thāda pitāra.
Yaokahombing ngathum khavai maleisāmara;
yao akhavābingwui vangla yāmshok khavai masamphangmara.
Nganālu, yaokahombingwui khavao,
yao akhavābingwui chapkhangachā chi nganālu!
Kaja athumwui seihomphung
kala chingri kahai yaobing sashimānmi haira,
Kazingkha̱ thāda awui akhur chihoda shokhaira,
kaja athumli rekakharekawui raighai kala awui sāshilak kahai malungkhavāt chiwui vang athumwui ngalei arema sāhaira.
Athumna tui hi khuisangda makaphā kasāwui eina ning ngateilapai, chieina athumna makaphā kasā chiwui vang ina makaphā sākida khangarān kasā chi yangmihaora.”
Nana athumli hānglu,
kala thaklāk eina iwui rao marān chihokharā hiwui tui makhuimara jiakha, nathumna makhuipapamana,
chieina shimkhur hi Shilohli kasā thāda sāmira, kala okathuili khalei saikorawui mangāli keinung hi khonkashi sāngasakra.”
Kala mibingli hānglu da
Khisāda, ‘Shimkhur hi Shilohli kasā thāda sāmira, keinung hili mi mapamla ngachakyāng ngasakhaora’ da
Judahwui wungnaobingna hi kashā eina, awungawui shim eina
Chieina pāngmonbing kala marānbingna wungnaobing kala mi saikorali hānga, “Mi hina kathi tuitak samphangngayi, khikhalajila keinung hili makhamayā khamarān nathumwui khanā einala shāser kahaina.”
Chieina Jeremiahna wungnaobing kala mi saikorali hānga, “Shimkhur hili kala keinung hiwuitungli nathumna shākahai tuibing chi marānmi khavai
Chiwui vang eina ara nathumwui apong kala otsakbing mashungkhuilu, kala nathum Vare
Kha iwui vang, yanglu, I nathumwui pāngli khaleina. Nathumna kaphā kala khamashung chi sālu.

Kha hi theishingkhuilu, kaja, ili nathumna shaothatakha, khayon makhalei ashee chi nathum khalattawuitungli, keinung hiwuitungli, kala hili kapambingwuitungli tāra, kaja khamashung eina nathumwui khanāli hāngkahai tui saikora hi hāngmi khavai ili
Chiwui thili wungnaobing kala mi saikora china pāngmonbing kala marānbingli hānga, “Mi hi kathi danti masamphang ngayimana, kaja ana ithumli ithumwui Vare
Athumwui ngachaili ram chiwui kachikathā khararnao kāikhana nganingkāda yarui kazip chili hāngsanga,
“Moreshethwui Micahna Judahwui awunga Hezekiahwui atamli Judah mi saikorali marānmi: ‘Saikorawui
Zionli seiot kakhui thāda khuira,
Jerusalem ngayānghaida khorkazam kahai ngasāra,
Khorumshim sāhaida khalei phungrei hi ngahong ngasāhaora.’
Judahwui awunga Hezekiahna kala Judahwui mi saikorana ali shaothathaola? Ana
Chieina awunga Jehoiakimna, kala awui raimibing eina wungnao saikorana shālaga awungana shaothat khavai phai. Kha Uriahna kashā chitharan ngacheehaoda Egyptli yāmvāhaowa.
Chieina awunga Jehoiakimna, Achborwui naomayara, Elnathanli ngasoda mi khani kathum Egyptli chihovai,
kala athumna Uriahli Egyptwui eina atukkhuilaga khuiungda Awunga Jehoiakimna raighai eina yorthathaowa kala awui asa yaruiwui chikhurpamli chifahaowa.
Kha Jeremiahli, Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikamna nganingmihaida shaothat khavai yaruiwui pāngli masangmithuwa.
na ili hithāda hānga: lāngkon akha kala ra̱phek akha da nakhalatta sākhuilaga akahungli ngachālu.

Kala Jerusalemli Judah awunga Zedekiahli rāsamkaphang wungnaobingwui paophungmebingwui pāngli sangmida Edomwui awunga, Moabwui awunga, Ammonwui naomayarabingwui awunga, Tyrewui awunga kala Sidonwui awunga, athumli pao chiholu.
Athumwui akhavābingwui vang kakaso hi unghāngranu: Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
“Okathuili khalei mila, sāyurla, iwui pangshap eina kala ipāng eina sākakhuina, kala hina mashunga kajiwui athishurda ina mikhangai chili mi.
Ara ngalei saikora hi iwui rao Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadrezzarli mihaira, kala ramsāla ali otram ngatha̱mi khavai ina mihaira.
Miyur saikorana ali, anaomayarali, ara̱li, awui ngaleiwui atam maungranglakha eina tangda otram ngatha̱mira; chiwui thili miyur kachungkhana kala kahaka awungabingna ali athumwui raonao sāngasakra.

“Kachikathā yurna maningkha wungramna Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarli otram mangatha̱akha, kala Babylon awungawui kharitphunwui azingli akahung mahaisaakha, chikathā yur chili raighai eina, chāmrei eina, kala kazātkashi eina awui pāng eina ina mashimān ngasakranglakha eina tangda ina tandi mira da
Chiwui vang eina, nathumwui marānbing, khanongbing, mang hangkhamebing, khara̱katheibing, kala laivā kathembingna nathumli ‘Babylon awungali otram mangatha̱lu,’ da kahāngbingli makhuisanglaklu.
Kaja nathumli athumna marānda khalei hi kakapikna, hiwui athei nathumli katāva̱li khuithuihaora, kala ina nathumli kashamshokra, kala nathum chili shimānhaora.
Kha kachikathā yurna Babylon awungawui kharitphun azingli akahung haida kala ali otram ngatha̱akha, ina chibingli kachichāramli lui vazāda okthui ngasakra, da
Judahwui awunga Zedekiahli ina hithāda hānga: “Babylon awungawui kharitphun azingli nakahung hailu, ali kala awui mibingli otram ngatha̱laga okthuilu.
Babylon awungali otram makhangatha̱ miyurwui pongli
‘Babylon awungali nana otram mangatha̱paimara’ da marānbingna kahāng tui manganāsangalu. Kaja athumna nali marānmida khalei chi kakapik tuina.
Athumli ina kachiho maningmana da
Chiwui thili pāngmonbingli kala mi saikorali ina hānga, “
Athumli manganālu; Babylonwui awungali otram ngatha̱laga okthuilu. Khiwui vang keinung hi ngachakyāng ngasakrakhala?
Athum marānbingakha, kala athumli
Kaja saikorawui

Jehoiakimwui naomayara, awunga Jeconiahli ngasoda Judah eina Jerusalemwui khangamabingli Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna Jerusalemwui eina raithā kahai tharan, makhuithuikhanar otbing chiwui pongli—
Chibing chi Babylonli khuivāhaora, kala ina mayangmiranglakha eina tangda chili haisāra da
“Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
wui shimli leikasā khorkhong saikora, Nebuchadnezzarna Babylonli khuivā kahai chi, kum khaniwui alungli apam hili ina khuiungmiluishitra.
Jehoiakimwui naomayara, Judahwui awunga Jeconiahli ngasoda Judahwui eina Babylonli tukvā kahai saikorala apam hili khuiungmiluira, kaja Babylon awungawui kharitphun ina sātekmi haora da
Chieina
kala marān Jeremiahna hānga “Amen!
Kha Ina nawui kala mi saikorawui mangāli kahāng tuihi khanganā milu.
Achālakhawui atamli iniwui mangāli, marānbingna, ngalei kachungkhali kala kahahak wungrambingli, rai kasā, chāmrei, kala kazātkashi marānmi.
Chingrikahai marānkhami marānle, marānpā chiwui tui ungkashung chitharan,
Chieina Hananiah marānna Jeremiah marānwui akahungwui eina lengkot chi khuilaga sātekmihaowa.
Kala mi saikorawui mangāli Hananiahna hānga, “
Marān Jeremiahwui lengkot marān Hananiahna sātekmi kahaiwui thili, Jeremiahli
“Vālu, Hananiahli hānglu, ‘
Kaja Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Chieina marān Jeremiahna marān Hananiahli hānga, “Nganālu, Hananiah, nali
Chiwui vang eina
Chikum, kachāng kashineli marān Hananiah thihaowa.
Hi, awunga Jeconiah, ava̱va̱ awungva̱, ahongabing, Judah eina Jerusalemwui wungnaobing, pāngthem kathemabing, mari kasābing Jerusalemwui eina thuikahaiwui thilina.
Chithi chi, Shaphanwui nao Elasah eina Hilkiahwui nao Gemariahwui pāngli Judahwui awunga Zedekiahna Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarli amikhavai kachiphunna. Kala hithāda kapi:
“Jerusalemwui eina Babylonli Ina raithā ngasakkahaiya mi saikorali, Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Chili shim sāpamserlu; yāmgui sāsangda chiwui kashok chi shailu.
Ngalāla khuilu, naola pharākhuilu; naomayarali ngalā khuimilu, kala fakathuila fathui ngasakta naomayara kachungkha mataisangranu, masuitāaranu.
Kha nathumli ina raithā ngasak kahai keinung chiwui reisang khavai sālu, chiwui mathun eina seihāla sāmilu; kaja chiwui ringkaphā alungli nathumla ringkaphā samphangra.
Kaja Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
kaja, iwui ming singlaga athumna khamarān chi kakapikna; athumli ina kachiho maningmana da
Kaja nathumwui vang ina ngarān kahai chi ina thei, da
Chitharan nathumna ili ngakaora kala ili seihā sāra, kala ina khuisangmira.
Nathumna ningtonglak eina kaphā chitharan, ili samphangra,
samphangda nathumwui shimlui hanmiluira, kala ina kashamvā kahai apam saikorawui eina, kala yur saikorawui eina nathumli ina kazipkhuida apam hili khuiungmiluishitra’ da
“Khikhalajila nathumna, ‘Ithumwui vang
Davidwui wungpamkhongli kapama awungawui pongli, kala keinungli somkapam saikorawui pongli kala raithā kahaili makazanga nachinā ngarāwui pongli
‘Saikorawui
Ina raighai, chāmrei, kazātkashi eina kharom ngasakra, kala okathuiwui wungram saikorali kasham khavāvā papamli athum hi ngacheekapaia, khonkashi, ngashimkashi kala ningkakachaiya ngasā ngasakra,
khikhalajila athumna iwui tui manganāsangmana, da
wui tui nganālu, Jerusalemwui eina Babylonli ina raikathāli chihovā kahaia nathum.’”
“Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Aniwui vang eina Judah eina Babylonli raithā kahai saikorana kalākashi kharā tharan, anili chānjam sāda, ‘Zedekiah eina Ahabli Babylon awungana meifali horkasang thāda samiranu’ da hāngra,

kaja anina Israelwui alungli mangkhama̱ otsak sāhaira; anina khongnainaowui preiva̱̱ ngarāli ngashāma; kala ina makakasola iwui ming singlaga anina kakapik tui matui. Katheiya chi ina, kala shākhi chi ina da
Nehelamwui Shemaiahli nana hithāda hāngra:
Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
“Jehoiada pāngmonwui mahut
Laga Anathotwui Jeremiahna nawuitungli marānkhami chili khisāda ali mahāngmachinmakhala?
Kaja ana, nathumwui raithā kahai kasāngkhara, shimla sāpamlu, yāmgui sāsangda chiwui kashok chi shailu da Babylonli kapama ithumli pao chiphuntai.”
Zephaniah pāngmonna Jeremiahwui miktāli chithi chi pāchithei.
Chitharan
“Tukthui kahai saikorali chiphunvāda hānglu, Nehelamwui Shemaiahwui pongli
na hithāda hānga: Nehelamwui Shemaiahli kala awui ara̱-azābingli ina tandi mira; iwui mibingli kapha sāmiki kaji chi awui mi akhanala kathei masamphangmara, da
“Ashangva̱wui
Kaja yanglu, iwui mibing Israel eina Judahli shimlui hanmiki kaji zimiksho chi rārāli, da
Israel eina Judahwui pongli
Malung tākatung khangachee,
chingri makahai khavaokhon ithumna shāhaira.
Arui ngahānlu, kala theikhuilu,
mayarnaona nao pharāpaila?
Chithākha khiwui vang mayarnao kachiva̱na kashān tuklaga naokhara̱ thāda kapamkhala?
Kachiwui vang mai kachiva̱ mayirhaokhala?
Iyavo! zimiksho chi hakkhamahā,
chithāda maleilakranga;
Jacobwui vang kakhanangwui atamna;
chithalala ali chiwui eina kanshokra.”
“Kala chithang hithāda rāshokra, da saikorawui
Kha athumna athumwui
wukla makhananglu, O Israel,
da
Kaja yanglu, nathumli katāva̱wui eina kanmira,
tuknar kahaipamwui eina nathumwui naongarāli ina huimira.
Jacobna latungda chingri va̱ri eina ungpamra,
kala khipānakha mangachee ngasakluimara.
Kaja nathumli huimi khavai ina ngasomida lei;
da
Nathumli ina yaovā kahai yur saikora chili shimānchao ngasakhaora,
kha nathumli mashimānchao ngasakmara.
Ina nathumli ngarakzak kahai mashun eina machinra;
mikhangayi tandi mira.”
“Kaja
Nathumwui khamā chi marai kapaina,
kala nathumwui khamā chi marlaka.
Nathumli singkhāng khavai khipākha maleimana,
nathumwui khamārila mangavāmana,
nathumwui vang raikhavai maleimana.
Nathumli leikashebingna nali malaiserhaira,
nathumli yangsangkhami maleilui;
morei hakna kahaiwui vang,
kashong chungnā kahaiwui vang;
yangkashena kashao thāda ina nali tandi khamina.
Nawui sākaza̱wui vang khisāda ringkhangā?
nawui khangashei maraipaimana.
Khikhalajila nawui khayon hakmahālaka,
khikhalajila nawui morei chungnāhaira.
Ina nali hithā khangasakna.
Chiwui vang nali sākakazamali sāshimānra,
nawui yuikashi saikora,
athum kachiva̱li narkahaipamli khuithuihaora;
nathumli yangkashebingli raonao sāngasakra;
nathumli ngaponkathuibingli ngaponzāra,
nathumli sāshai thāda kasābingli sāshai sāmira.
Kaja ina nathumli phasā kaphā mira, ina nathumwui khamā raimira da
khikhalajila nathumli athumna khamānga hohaira:
‘Khipākhana mayangsangkhami chi Zionna!’”
“Yanglu, Jacobwui kachonshimwui shimlui ina hanmiluira,
kala awui somkhavaipamli lumashanmira;
kajuipamli keinung sakāluira,
konung leisa khavai apam chili khaningkāluira.
Chiwui eina ningkashi laa sāra,
lumlao kasābingwui akhonla.
Ina athumli kachungkha mataisangmida athum hinaoyākha majimara;
ina athumli khayā kāngasakra,
kala athum teomeikha majiluimara.
Athumwui naomayarabing achālakhawui thāhaora,
kala athumwui yarui kazipla iwui mangāli sākāra;
kala athumli rekakharekbingli ina tandi mira.
Athumwui wungnaola athum khalattawui eina shokra,
athumwui khamungala athum ngachaiwui eina rāra.
Ina ali rānganai ngasakra,
chieina ana ili rānganaira.
Kaja khalatta khipāna ili rānganailengrakhala?
da
Nathum iwui mi sāra,
I nathumwui Vare sāra.”
Yanglu,
Malungkakang siphan zingrot thāda ngathunghaira,
makhayābingwui kuitungli tāra.
awui ningli ngarān kahai chi
makupchaoranglakha eina tangda.
Khanā zimiksholi hi nathumna theishingkhuinaora.
“Atam chitharan, da
“Raighaiwui eina ringkashoka mibingna lamhāngli lukhamashan samphanga;
Israelna khangasām samphang khavai kaphā chitharan.
Ina nali makhangachei leikashi eina leishihaira;
chiwui vang eina Ina nali ningtongching kajina.
Latluida ina nali sākāra, kala nali semkāluishitra,
O kachingva̱ Israel!
Latluida na khalatta phungkhon ngasoda;
khamathānbingwui pheichak kasālungli na azangra.
Latluida Samariawui kaphungtungli drakhāthei yāmgui vāsangluishitra;
khalingbingna arong lingsangda chiwui athei kashai samphangra.
Kaja raikānbingna Ephraimwui kaphung ngaleili,
‘Thuilo, ithum Zionli
kaji atam rārāsāra”
Kaja
“Jacobwui vang mathānda panglāk eina laa sālu,
kala miyurbingwui kathānawui vang vaoshoklu;
vaomalānlu, masotmilu,
da hānglu.
Yanglu, atung ngaleiwui eina,
tāmeikap kaji okathuiwui apamwui eina,
athumli ina kazipkhuira;
athumwui alungli khangapeola katekla,
nao khavai kala ra̱da khalei zangserda kachungkha khangaruma athumna hili latungra.
Athumna chapsasui eina ungra,
ningkhalem khangasak eina ngasoda ina thānungra;
ina tara̱ khalei kongrāpamli zatung ngasakra,
athumna phei mangaphokki kaji apong khangatarli;
kaja I Israelwui avāva̱na,
kala Ephraim iwui naochizaina.”
“O yurbing
kala chi katātāva̱ ngayiphei vāshungda vaochitheilu;
‘Israelli chaiyāngmi kahaia china kazipkhuiluira;
kala yaokahoma thāda ana awui yaobingli hommira’
da hānglu.
Kaja
ali pangmeikhar kaji khayuia chiwui eina ana ngatangkhuihaira.
Athumna ungda Zionwui kajuitungli laa sāra;
kala
athei-arai, drakhāra̱, thao hiwui vang,
yaonao kala seinaowui vang;
athumwui mirin tara̱ chaikhami yāmgui thāra,
kala athumna makhanangluimara.
Ngalanaobingna mathānda pheichak sāra;
khararnao kala yaronnaobingna mathānra.
Ina athumwui chapkhangachā chi khamathān onmira,
ina athumli ning lum ngasakra,
kala wukakhanangwui vang athumli ning ringphā ngasakra.
Ina pāngmonbingwui manglāli makhavāta kashakazā mizāra,
kala iwui kaphākasāwui vang iwui mibing ningyangungra, da
“Ramahli malungringlak eina chapkhangachākhon akha shai,
Rachelna awui naongarābingwui vang chapta lei;
naongarābingwui vang ning nganung khavai hānglala makhuisangmana,
khikhalajila athum maleithuwa.”
Kachapkhon chi ngasāmhaolu,
kala namikli chāra̱ matā ngasakluialu;
kaja nali sāman mira, da
athumna yangkashebingwui ngaleiwui eina latungluishitra.
Naodawui vang nawui kachihān lei, da
kala nanao ngarāna athum kachichāramli latungluira.
Ephraimna khangahui ina shai,
makharāk seinao thāda, nana ili machinmihaira;
ili khuisangmilui khavai kathānungmilu,
kaja na iwui Vare
Kaja ina ngareithui kahai thili ina ning ngateiya;
ili tamchithei kahaiwui thili iwui khaishangli ngaphita;
I khayakhaowa, kala I maphākhuithuwa,
khikhalajila ina yaronlakhawui khayākhamalā phungzata.
Ephraim iwui leikashia naomayarala?
A iwui khaluma naola?
Kaja ina ali makhamayā tui hangchinglala ali ina phaningungchinga.
Chiwui vang iningna ali honchinga,
kachangkhatta ina ali lumashanmira da
“Kazazatpamli nakhalattawui vang machut khavai sāhailu,
kazatpong theikhavai sāsanghailu;
nana vākhavai chanrei apong yangkazakhailu.
O kachingva̱ Israel, latunglu;
nawui keinungbingli latunglu.
O shitkasang makhaleiva̱,
karankha ningchungpamfarakhala?
Kaja
sha̱nao akhana mayarnao akhali kanmi.”
Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Kala Judah eina chiwui keinungbing, lui khavābing, kala sha̱kei homphungda kazatbing saikora chili somrumra.
Kaja ina ningkachotbingli mathān ngasakluira, kala leolangda khalei manglā saikorali ina chipemiluishitra.”
Chiwui thili ina thuimathukhaowa, kala pikakhui china ili ringphā ngasaklākhaowa.
“Yanglu, Israelwui shimkhur eina Judahwui shimkhurli ina mi kala sha̱keiwui athā eina ngasoda yaokasang zimiksho chi rārāda lei, da
Kala ina hekkakhui eina sākatek konglui khavai, sākhayāng khavai, kala makaphā khuikharā khayang thāda, athumwui sakā khavai eina lingsang khavai chila ina yangmira da
Chitharan athumna,
‘Avāva̱ ngarāna drakathei kathur shaihaira,
kala nao ngarāwui ahā shei ngasaka,
da mahangluimara.’
Kha mi kachiva̱ kachichāwui moreiwui vang thira; drakhāthei kathur kashai mi kachiva̱ ahā sheira.
chiya ina gahara sāda athumli Egyptwui eina pāng eina tharakashok tharan, athumwui avāva ngarāli tuingashit sāda athumna sakhai kahai chikatha tuingashit mathāmara da
Kha chiwui thili Israelwui shimkhurli ina tuingashit sāki kaji chiya hithāra da
Mi kachiva̱na khongnainaoli kala achināli, ‘
Ngashun zimikli horkhangasaka, ngayā kahor mikhavai kachāng sira semkharikrikmi kahaia, shamadru ngaphao khangasaka saikorawui
“Ina semkharikrik kahaibing hi iwui eina thuihaiakha,
Israelwui ara̱-azāla iwui mangāli yur akha khangasā katang mavaila shimānhaora.”
“Atungshong kazingramwui kahak onkhuishapakha,
kala okathuiwui kathukla phākhuishapakha,
athumna sākahahai chiwui vang Israelwui arā-aza̱
saikorali ina katāva̱li horhaora, da
“Yanglu,
Kala onkhavai feetā chi Gareb kaphung kanvālaga angatar eina Goahli vāngaheikhuira.
Kathingunpam, hotlāpamwui tampāk katonga, Kidron kongrānaowuili khalei luipam, zingshoshong khalei Sigui Ngavei ungshungda apam saikora hi
Judahwui awunga Zedekiahna mungda katharā kum, kaja Nebuchadrezzarwui khamung tharāda kachishata kum,
Atam chitharan Babylon awungawui raimibingna Jerusalemli kuinamhaida leisai, kala Jeremiah marānli Judah awungawui konungli khalei mayon khavaipamli phātop sānghaisai.
Kaja Judahwui awunga Zedekiahna ali hithāda hāngda phātopli sanga, “Khiwui vang nana marānda ‘
Judahwui awunga Zedekiahna Chaldeabingwui pāng eina mayāmshokmara, kha Babylon awungawui pāngli sangmikachanghaora, kala mai eina mai, mik eina mik yangngasungda ali ngazekra;
kala ana Zedekiahli Babylonli khuivāhaora, kala chili ina ali mavāsamphangranglakha eina tangda chili leisara da
Jeremiahna hānga,
Yanglu, navāgato Shallumwui naomayara Hanamelna nali rāda hāngra, ‘Iwui lui Anathothli khalei chi lokhuilu, kaja hi nana lokhuirāna.’
Chieina ichinā Hanamelna mayon khavaipamli,
Chieina lui chi ina ichina Henamelwui eina lokhui, kala aman lupa tharāda shini shānmihaowa.
Mayā khangarok lairik chili ina shoi sāda nāshātbingwui mangāli mahor namshānhailaga pheisa chi onmihaowa.
Chiwui thili ina luilot, tuingashit lairik, mahor namkahaiya chila makhanampala khuithathuilaga —

Mahseiahwui naomayara Neriahna kapharā naomayara Baruchli mihaowa, chi ichinā Hanamel, mayākhangarok lairikli shoi kasā nāshātbing, kala phatop khamayonawui karotli leikasa Jihudibingwui mangāli khamina.
Athumwui mangāli ina Baruchli kasoda hānga,
“Saikorawui
Kaja Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Khalowui mayā khangarok lairik chi ina Neriahwui naomayara Baruchli mikahaiwui thili
“Iyavo, Vare
nava thingthingli nawui makhangachei leikashi chitheimi, kha avāva̱ ngarāwui khayonla naothot eina tangda phāvai, O sāshap-pangshapa Vare, naming saikorawui
thangkhamei ngalat kahai sāshap-pangshapana; mibingwui apong saikora theishapser kaje, kala mi kachiva̱li awui apong kala otsakwui athei athishurda nana sāman mi;
Egyptli leilakha machut khavai kala matakhak kahai kachungkha sāchithei, aja rāshungda Israelwui kala miyur saikorawui alungli chitharanwui thāda naming ngayao khangasakna.
Machut kala matakhak kahai, nawui pāngthei kharei chi katingshokta, khangachee khangachā eina ngasoda nawui Israel mibingli Egyptwui eina khuishokmi;
avāva̱ ngarāli ngashitta seina̱ eina khuira̱ khalong ngalei hi athumli mi;

kala athumna zangda ngalei chi samphanga. Kha athumna nawui tui manganāmana kala nawui ainwui athishurdala mazatmana; nana athumli sālu kaji akhala masāmana. Chiwui vang eina, kalākashi saikora hi nana athumwuitungli tā khangasakna.

“Yanglu, keinung khui khavai shairon rānganai mamānhaira; raighai, chāmrei kala kazātkashiwui vang, keinung hi, ngararda khalei Chaldeabingwui pāngli horsangmihaira. Nana hāng kahai chi ungshunghaira, kala yanglu, namik eina chi theihaira.
Chithālala, O
“Yanglu, I
Chiwui vang eina

Ngararda khalei Chaldeanaobingna keinung hili rāda ili malungvāt khavai, Baalwui vang athumwui shimtungli nganamkaphā otyur rikkatā, vare khangateili ra̱shakchigat heishokta kapha̱ shim saikora mei sa̱da chui ngasakhaora.
Kaja Israel eina Judahwui naobingna, nganuilakha eina thuida, iwui miktāli zakkashi maningla masālakmana; Israelwui naomayarabingna athumwui pāng eina kasāsā china iwui malungvāt khavai ngasāhaowa da
Keinung hi sākaphok eina thuida aja rāshungda ili malungvāt khavai kala malungkang khavaimāng kasāwui vang iwui eina khuithuiphalungra.
Athumwui awungabing, wungnaobing, pāngmonbing, marānbing, Judah eina Jerusalemwui mi zangda, Israel eina Judahwui naobingwui makaphā chiwui vang eina ili malungvāt khangasakwui vangna.
Athumna ili mai mangareirāla khana̱thuihaowa; kala ina tamchitheichinglala hāngkachithei makhuisanglakthuwa.
Iwui ming eina kahoa shim chi sākhamāng khavai athumna athumwui ningkakachai ot khaningkai.

Baalwui vang Hinnomwui naomayarawui tampākli athumwui naomayara kala naongalāva̱bing Molechli chigat khavai kajujuipambing sākai, Judahli morei sākhavai ina hikathā ot makasolākmana, iwui ninglila hirikkha eina tangda maleisāmana.
“Chiwui vang eina
Yanglu, ina malungkhavāt, malungkakang kala ningkatheng eina kashamvā kahaipam kachiva̱wui eina ina athumli kazipkhuira; ina athumli apam hili khuiungluira, kala athumli chingri eina pānngasakra.
Kala athum iwui mi ngasāra, I athumwui Vare ngasāra.
Athumna ili ngacheeching khavai wuklung kala apong akha athumli sangmira, athumwui vangla, naoda shokki kaji anaongarāwui vāngla phākhavaina.
Athumli ina kaphā sāmi khavaiwui eina mangareithui khavai, athumli makhangachei tuingashit akha sāmira; kala athum iwui eina mangareithui khavai ili khangacheewui ning ina athumli sangmira.
Athumwui vang kaphā sākhamili ina mathānra, kala iwui ningla yāngla tongda ina athumli ngalei hili okthui ngasakra.
“Kaja
Kala athumna, ‘Chaldeanaobingwui pāngli horsangmi kahai sāla, mila maokkathui ramchona’ da kahāng apam hili pheisā eina lui longarokluira.

Benjaminwui ngaleili, Jerusalemwui kuikhamareili, Judahwui keinungli, kaphungli khalei keinungbingli, Shephelahwui keinungli, Negebwui keinung kachiva̱li aman mida lui longarokra, kala tuingashit lairikli mahor namshāda nāshāt phāsangra; kaja athumwui shimlui ina hanmiluira da
Jeremiahli khamayonawui karotli shungnamhaichingda leilakha
Okathui kasema
“Ili ngakaolu ina ngahānkāra, nathumna makathei thum kahai kachungkha hāngmira.
Kuinam kahai keinung kala raighai chi ngākkhui khavai keinungwui shimbing kala Judah awungabingwui shimbing pheikaziplaga raipan sāvai kahaiwui pongli Israelwui

Chaldeanaobingna ngarar khavai rārāda lei, iwui malungkhavāt kala malungkathui eina sāthat kahai athumwui kathingun china keinung chipem khavai; kaja athumwui makaphā makhayāwui vang keinung hiwui eina ina iwui mai thumhaira.
Chithālala ina phasākaphā kala raikhami khuirāmira, kala ina raimida makhavāta leikhayā kala ningkhanung phongshokchitheira.
Judah eina Israelwui shimluila hanmiluida kharewui tākam eina sakāluira.
Athumna iwuitungli sāyon kahai saikora tharngasakra, kala ili ngakaishida morei sākahai saikora chi pheomira.

Ina athumli kaphā sākhami chi kathei kashā okathuiwui miyur saikorawui mangāli, keinung hi iwui mingwui khamathān, masot kala tekhamatei ngasāra, ina khamathā sākhami kala mataisang khangasak saikora hiwui vang athumna ngacheeda kathirra.”
ringkaphākhon, khamathānkhon, shakazā mayara kala ngalāva̱, laa kasābingwui khon,
‘Ashangva̱wui
kaja ava kaphā
Kaja awui makhangachei leikashi katang mavaimana!’
Kaja kharewui tākam eina ina ngalei chiwui shimlui hanmiluira.”
“Saikorawui

Kaphungramli khalalei keinungbing, Shephelah eina Negebwui keinungbing, Benjaminwui lamli, Jerusalemli kuimareida khalei ngaleibing, kala Judahwui keinungbingli, yaokahomabingna yao latluida shānda athumwui pāngli makānkā ngasakluira” da
Chikachāng kala atam chili, Davidwui vang khangaronga Aphang akha shokngasakra; kala ana ngalei chili mashun kala khangarong eina bichar sāmira.
Chitharan Judahli kanmira kala Jerusalem tāphup eina sompamra. Kala ‘
Kaja
kala ili rikkatā kachigat, tharāzāt kachigat kala pha̱phayāching khavai Leviwui pāngmonbing shimkhurwui mi akhala mavātlakmara.”

iwui rao Davidli tuingashit kasā chila kaira, chithāda sāda awui wungpamkhongli mungkhavai awui naomayara akhala maleimara, kala ili otram ngatha̱mi khavai Leviwui pāngmonbingli iwui tuingashit chila kaihaora.
Kazingramli khalei chi mashānkhuikharar thāda, kala shamadruwui situi mangatamkhuikharar thāda, iwui rao Davidwui kala ili otram khangatha̱ Leviwui arā-aza̱bing mataisangmira.”
“Mibingna, ‘
na hithāda hānga: Ngashun eina ngayāli ina tuingashit masāhaisāsi kaja, kala okathui eina kazingramli iwui shiya-chikan chi mamihaisāsi kaja,

Jacobwui kala iwui rao Davidwui arā-aza̱bingli kapangkhuida, Abraham, Isaac, kala Jacobwui atheili mungkhavai makapangkhuimara. Kaja ina athumwui shimlui hanmiluira, kala athumwuitungli lumashanmira.”
“Israelwui
Nawui pāngwui eina mayāmshokrarmara, kha tukkhuilākra kala apāngli mihaora; Babylonwui awungali mai eina mai, mik eina mik yangngasungda chān ngazekra; kala na Babylonli vāhaora,’
Chithālala

Na chingri eina thira. Kala navāngarā nawui mangāli leikasā awunga kharebingwui vang nganamkaphā ot rikkatā thāda nawui vangla nganamkaphā ot riktāda, ‘Iyavo, Amei!’ da nawui vang chapngachāra. Kaja tui hi ina hāngkahaina da
Chieina tui saikora hi Jeremiah marānna Judahwui awunga Zedekiahli Jerusalemli leilakha hāngsera,

chitharan Babylon awungawui raimina Jerusalemli, kala chiwui ngalemli taikahai keinung khani kaja Lachish eina Azekahli rai ngararmahungsai; kaja Judahwui leikasā keinung ngachaili raipan sākahai keinung khani himāng taimihaisai.
Awunga Zedekiahna Jerusalemwui mi saikorali ningkhān phongkashok tuingashit akha sākhangasakwui thili
chiya, mi kachiva̱, sha̱naoranu, mayarnaoranu, awui Hebrew raonaobingli ningkhān mida chihoserphalungra, chithāda sāda khipānakhala achinā Jehudi akhali raonao sāda manarpaimara.
Wungnao saikorana, ayaonao saikorana, raonaobingli sha̱nao, mayarnaola manarhaila ningkhān mida chihoserra da khamayā tuingashitli zangda kahāng nganai, kala chi nganāda chihoserhaowa.
Kha khaleilaga athumwui ning ngacheiluihaida chiho kahai sha̱nao mayarnao, raonaobing chili raopamli khuiungluishithaowa.
wui eina
“Israelwui
‘Kum tharuk

Aya-achonthang nathumna ningngateida iwui miktāli khamashung chi sāda nathum ava̱va̱na khongnainaoli ningkhān khami vaomalānmi, kala iming eina kahoa shimlungli nathumna iwui mangāli tuingashit khuihaira,

kha nathumna ning ngacheiluihaida nathum kachiva̱na sha̱nao, mayarnao raonaobingli athumwui ningkachāng athishurda nathumna ningkakhān mihailaga tukkhuiluishitta nathumwui azingli raonao sālui ngasakta iming sāmakhaohaowa.
Chiwui vang eina
Iwui tuingashit kala athumnala mayāda chiwui alungli hāngkahai tui chi nathumna makhamayonwui vang, seinao ngalākshaklaga chiwui ngachaili kazat thāda,
Judahwui wungnaobing, Jerusalemwui wungnaobing, ahongabing, pāngmonbing, kala ngalei hiwui mi saikora seinao ngalākshak kahai angachaili khamakānbing,
yangkashebing athumwui manglā khuikida phākazatabingwui pāngli ina horsangmihaora. Athumwui angun yongkazat vānao, kala ramsāwui kashakazā sāra.

Judahwui awunga Zedekiah, kala awui wungnaobingli, ina yangkashebing kala athumwui manglā khuikida kasā athumwui pāngli, kaja nathumwui eina hanthui kahaiya Babylon awungawui raimibingwui pāngli horsangmira.
Yanglu, ina kasoda keinung hili athumli khuiungluira; athumna keinung hili rāngararda khuira, mei eina thottāmihaora. Judahwui keinungbing mi makapān ngachakyang kahai ngasā ngasakra da
“Rechabbingwui shimli vāda ahānglu, kala
Chieina ina, Habazziniahwui naomayara Jeremiahna kapharā naomayara Ja-azaniahli ngasoda achināngarā, anaomayarabing, kala Rechabwui shimkhur katongali thānunga.
Ina athumli
Chiwui thili Rechabbingwui mangāli ina zamshamla kala khorāmla mathunlaga, “Zam manglu” da ina hānga.
Kha athumna ngahānkai, “Ithuma zam mamangmana, kaja ithumwui avā, Rechabwui naomayara Jonadabna, ‘Nathum kala nathumwui naomayarabing zam mamangpailakmara,
nathum shim masāpaimara, nathum lui mavāmara, nathum drakhāthei yāmgui kala luila mavaimara; kha nathumwui kazat lam chili mirin peida okpeimei khavai kachonshimli pamzatlu.’ da hānghaida lei.

Ithumwui avāva̱ Jonadab, Rechabwui naomayarawui tui ithumna nganai, ana ithumli kakaso saikora ithum khalatta, preiva̱ngarā, naomayara kala ithumwui naongalāva̱ ngarāla ithumwui mirin peida drakhāra̱ mamangmana;
kala sompam khavai khipākha shim masāmana. Ithuma lui maleimana, yāmguila, athei-araila mangavāmana.
Kha ithumwui avāva̱ Jonadabna kaso kahai saikora nganāda kachonshimli okthuirāshuma.

Kha Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna ngalei hili rai rākatā tharan, ithumna, ‘Ralu, Chaldea kala Syrianaobingwui raimiwui eina ithum Jerusalemli yāmvausa’ da hānga. Chiwui vang ithum Jerusalemli pānda khaleina.”
Chiwui thili
“Israelwui Vare, saikorawui

Rechabwui nao Jonadabna drakhāra̱ mamangpaimara kaji mayona, aja eina tangda athumna drakhāra̱ mamangmana, kaja athumna avāva̱wui kahāng nganāchaowa. Ina nathumli hāngchinga, kha nathumna makhuisanglakmana.

Iwui rao marānbing kachungkha chihoda athumna, ‘Makhamashung apongwui eina nathum kachiva̱ latungda nathumwui apong mashung ngasaklu, kala khangatei vareli otram ngatha khavai mashurzatalu, chithakha nathumli kala navāngarāli ina mikahai ngalei chili somra’ da hāng ngasakchinga. Kha nathumna ili manganāsangmana, kakhuila makhuisangmana.
Rechabwui naomayara Jonadabwui naomayarabingna avāva̱na kahāng khuisangda mayona, kha mibing hina iwui kahāng manganāmana.
Chiwui vang eina, Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Kha Rechabshi shimkhurli Jeremiahna hānga, “Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
chiwui vang Rechabwui naomayara Jonadabwui mina, iwui mangāli nganing khavai mi mavātlakmara da Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Josiahwui naomayara Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimna mungda khamate kum
