“Lairik akhalui akha khuilaga, Israel, Judah kala miyur saikorawui pongli ina hāngkahahai saikora chi, Josiahwui atam eina thuida aja rāshungda ina hāngkahai saikora chi kapikhuilu.
Ka̱lākashi rākhavai ina ngarān kahai hi Judahwui shimkhurna shālaga ning ngateida makaphāwui eina latunglapai; chithakha athum ava̱va̱na latungda inala athumwui khayon kala morei pheomi paira.”
Chieina Neriahwui naomayara Baruchli Jeremiahna hokhui, kala ali
Jeremiahna Baruchli kasoda hānga, “
chiwui vang eina nana vālaga, kakhum eina pamthang, ina hāngtālaga nana kapikhui kahai lairik akhalui hiwui eina
Mi kachiva̱na awui makaphā apongwui eina latungda athumna kapo
wui shimlungli lairik akhaluiwui eina
Josiahwui naomayara Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimna mungda kaphangā kum, kachāng kachikoli, Jerusalemwui mi saikora kala Judahwui keinungwui eina Jerusalemli khavābing saikorana
Kala mi saikorana shākhavai, Jeremiahwui tui, lairik akhaluili kapi kahaibing chi Baruchna
Shaphanwui nao Gemariahna kapharā Micaiahna

ana awungawui shimli, kapimewui kāli kazang eina wungnao saikora chiya: Elishama kapime, Shemaiahwui naomayara Delaiah, Achborwui naomayara Elnathan, Shaphanwui naomayara Gemariah, Hananiahwui naomayara Zedekiah kala wungnao saikora pamsai.
Kala Baruchna mibingwui mangāli pākachithei lairik akhaluili kapi kahai tui ana shākhui kahai saikora chi Micaiahna athumli ahāngsera.

Chieina wungnao saikorana Cushwui naomayara Shelemiahna kapharā Nethaniahwui naomayara Jehudili chihovāda Baruchli hithāda ahāng ngasaka, “Mibingwui miktāli nana pākachithei lairik akhalui chi khuilaga hili rālu.” Chieina Neriahwui naomayara Baruchna lairik akhalui chi apāngli khuiphungda athumwuili vai.
Athumna, “Pamlaga pāyanglu” da kasoi. Chieina Baruchna chi pāchithei.
Athumna tui chi shālaga khangachee eina akha eina akha yangngarokta Baruchli hānga, “Awungali tui saikora hi chishātphalungrali.”
Kala Baruchli, “Hānglu, nana kathāda kapikhui kajikhala? Jeremiahna hangtāmilaga kapikakhuila?” da ngahāna.
Ana ngahānkai, “Ana hāngtāmamānlaga ina muk eina lairik akhalui hili kapisang kajina.”
Wungnaobingna Baruchli hānga, “Nala, Jeremiahla ngathumthathuihaolu, nani kali leilikhala da khipālikha mathei ngasaklu.”
Chieina athumna awungawui konungli vai kala Elishama kapimewui kāli akhalui chi haihailaga awungali tui saikora chi achishāta.
Chieina awungana Jehudili chiholaga Elishama kapimewui kāli kahai lairik akhalui chi akhui ngasaka, kala Jehudina awungawui mangāli nganingda khalei wungnao saikorawui mangāli awungali pāchithei.
Hi kachāng kachiko atamlina, kala awungana sikachāng shimli pamda awui mangāli meiphu sāpamsai.
Jehudina tuikhum kathum mati pākatā eina awungana akhalui chi ghainao eina kakshokmamān meiphuli horsangmamānda meina lairik akhalui chi chuitup tāhaowa.
Chithālala awungala, awui raobingla, tui chi shāshālaga khipākha mangacheemana, wukhanangda kachonla maserkhākmana.
Elnathan, Delaiah kala Gemariahna lairik akhalui chi mariktā khavai awungali hānglala manganāsangthuwa.
Kala awungana awui naomayara Jerahmeel, Azri-elwui naomayara Seraiah kala Abdeelwui naomayara Shelemiah athumli kapime Baruch eina Jeremiahli atukkhui khavai kasoi; kha
Jeremiahna hāngtāmamānlaga Baruchna kapikakhui lairik akhalui chi riktā kahaiwui thili,
“Lairik akhalui khangatei akha khuiluilaga Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimna riktā kahai lairik akhalui kharepali kapihaikasā tui chi tākam eina kapikhuiluilu.
Kala Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimwui pongli nana hithāda hānglu, ‘
Chiwui vang eina Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimwui pongli

Ali, awui naotunbingli, kala raobingli, athumwui khayonwui vang tandi mira; Jerusalemli kapambinglila, Judah mibinglila, athumwuitungli makhamayā ina hāngtā kahai kalākashi saikora chi tāngasakra, chithālala athumna manganāsangmana.”

Chieina Jeremiahna lairik akhalui khangatei akha khuilaga Neriahwui naomayara Baruch kapimeli kharewui Judah awunga Jehoiakimna meili riktā kahai tākam eina hāngtāmimamānlaga tui saikora chi kapikhui ngasaka; kala ngaraichānanai kaji tui kachungkhala ngarumsanga.
Kha ala, raobingla, kala awui mibingla Jeremiah marānna hāngkhami
Awunga Zedekiahna Shelemiahwui naomayara Jehucal eina Ma-aseiahwui naomayara Zephaniah pāngmonli Jeremiah marānwui ngalemli chihovāda hāngngasaka, “Ithumwui vang ithumwui Vare
Chitharan Jeremiahli phātop masangrangsāda yarui ngachaili zatung zatvāpaida leisai.
Jerusalemli kuinamkasā Chaldeanaobingna Pharaohwui raimi Egyptwui eina rāhaira da pao kashā tharan athum Jerusalemwui eina hanthuihaowa.
Chiwui thili
Israelwui
Kala Chaldeanaobingna keinung hili latrāluida rāngararluira, athumna yuihaida mei eina thottāmihaora.
na hithāda hānga, Chaldeanaobing ithumwui eina thuilakhaora, da nathum khalatta mangui ngasaklu; kaja athum rāluishitra.

Kaja nathumli ngararda khalei Chaldeawui raimi saikorali nathumna yuihailala athumwui ngachaili khamā kaza̱ athumwui kachonshimli khaleibing athummāngnala thuingararkhuilaga keinung hi mei eina thottāra.”
Pharaohwui raimi rārāli kajiwui vang Chaldeawui raimibingna Jerusalemwui eina thuikahai eina,
Jeremiahna awui yar akhui khavai Jerusalemwui eina Benjamin ngaleili vai.
Ana Benjamin Ngavei vākashung tharan, Hananiahna kaphara Shelemiahwui naomayara raikān kapama Irijahna marān Jeremiahli tukkhuihaowa, kala “Na Chaldeanaobingwuili ayāmsangki kajina” da hānga.
Jeremiahna, “Maninglakmana, Chaldeanaobingli mavāzanglakmara” da ngahānkai. Kha Irijahna awui tui makhuisangla tukkhuida wungnaobingwui mangāli khuivāmihaowa.
Wungnaobingna Jeremiahli malungvātlākhaida kashaola shaowa, kala kapime Jonathanwui shimli narhaowa, kaja awui shim chi phātopshim sāsai.
Jeremiahna tuknar khavaipamli zimiksho kasāngkha pamkahai thili,
Awunga Zedekiahna ahokhui ngasakta ali samphanga. Awungana awui shimli ngathumda ngahānda hānga, “
Jeremiahna “Lei” da ngahānkai. Kala ana hānga, “Nali, Babylonwui awungawui pāngli horsangmihaora.”
Jeremiahna awunga Zedekiahli hithāda hānglui, “Nali, nawui raobinglila, kala mibinglila ina khi khayon sāhaoda ili phātop sangkahaikhala?
‘Babylon awungana rai marāngararlakmara’ da phongkhame nawui marānbing kali vāhaokhala?
Ara nganāmilu, O ishāmei awunga, iwui kapo hi khanganāmilu, Jonathan kapimewui shimli ili machihoungmiluilu, I chili thikachanghaipaishina.”

Awunga Zedekiahna hukhum mida Jeremiahli khamayonwui yāngkhupli haihaowa; kala keinung chiwui kashakazā makānranglakha eina tangda thangkachida khamuitang ava̱va̱ khamui kasaa chānreiwui eina mizāchinga. Chithāda Jeremiahna khamayonawui yāngkhupli pamsai.
Jeremiahna mi saikorali kahāng chi Mattanwui naomayara Shephatiah, Pashhurwui naomayara Gedaliah, Shelemiahwui naomayara Jucal kala Malchiahwui naomayara Pashhur, athumna shāsera,
chiya, “

Chieina wungnaobingna awungali hānga, “Mipa hili shaothathaolu; kaja ana hikathā tui matuida keinung hili khalei raimibing, kala mi saikorali ningteo ngasakta lei. Kaja mipā hina mibingwui phākhavai maningla kalā shikhavai sāda lei.”
Awunga Zedekiahna hānga, “Yanglu, a nathumwui pāngli khaleina kaja awungana nathumli makhamayā khikha masārarmana.”

Chieina athumna Jeremiahli khuilaga awungawui naomayara Malchiahwui paibung mayon khavai yāngkhupli khalei chili horsanghaowa, paibung chili Jeremiahli seipeng eina hoklaga chihosanghaowa. Paibungli tara̱ mazangsāmana, kha leivatmāng leisai, kala Jeremiah leivatlungli ngaphumhaowa.
Awungawui shimli leikasā Ebed-melech kaho Ethiopiawui ahonga china, Jeremiahli paibungli horsanghaira da kashā tharan awunga Benjamin Ngaveili pamsai.
Ebed-melechna awungawui shim eina shokta awungali ahānga,
“Ishamei awunga, mibingna Jeremiah marānli paibungli horsang kahai hi maphāmeikap kaji ot akhana; a chili kathai eina thihaora, kaja keinungli kashakazāla maleilakthura.”
Chieina Ethiopiawui Ebed-melechli awungana kasoda hānga, “Hiwui eina mi kathum khuilaga Jeremiah marān mathiranglakha paibungwui eina khāngshokmihaolu.”
Chieina Ebed-melechna mi kathum thānphunglaga awungawui shimli kashankachon haikhavaipamli chonshi-chonkāk zangkhui, kala seipeng eina hoklaga Jeremiahli chizana.
Ethiopiawui Ebed-melechna Jeremiahli hānga, “Chonshi-chonkāk chi nawui rikhāli taplaga seipeng chi hoksanglu.” Jeremiahna chithāda sai.
Chieina athumna Jeremiahli seipeng chieina paibungwui eina ngakhunshokhaowa. Kala Jeremiahna raikānwui yāngkhupli pamhaowa.
Awunga Zedekiahna Jeremiah marānli ahokhui ngasakta
Jeremiahna Zedekiahli hānga, “Ina nali hāngakha ili masāthatmarala? Ina nali hāngchitheilala nana manganāsangmara.”
Chieina awunga Zedekiahna ngathumda shākhi sāda hānga, “Ithumwui manglā sangkhame
Chiwui thili Jeremiahna Zedekiahli hānga, “Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Kha nana Babylonwui awungawui wungnaobingli mahamsangakha, keinung hi Chaldeanaobingwui pāngli horsangmida mei thottāmihaora, kala na athumwui pāng eina mayāmshokrarmara.”
Awunga Zedekiahna Jeremiahli hānga, “Chaldeanaobingwuili ayāmsang kahai Jehudibingli I nganglaka, kaja athumwui pāngli horsangmihaiakha athumna ili singkharakpaishina kajina.”
Jeremiahna hānga, “Athumwui pāngli nali mahorsangmilakmara,
Kha nana mahamsangakha, shokki kaji mahākhami
Yanglu, Judah awungawui shimli khalei sha̱nao saikora Babylon wungnaobingwui mangāli thanvāda hithāda hānga,
‘Nana shitkasang ngasotnaobingna minamhaira,
nali athumna yuihaira;
ara naphei leikhonli ngaphumhaoda nawui eina athum yāmserhaira.’”
“Napreiva̱̱ ngarā, nanaomayarabing Chaldeanaobingli thanvāserhaora, kala nakhalatta athum pāngwui eina mayāmshokrarmara, kha Babylon awungana tukkhuihaora, kala keinung hila mei chuitāhaora.”
Zedekiahna Jeremiahli hānga, “Tui hi khipālikha matheingasakalu chithakha na mathimara.
Iniwui khangazek hi wungnaobingna shāhaida rāngahānakha, kala ‘Awungana nali khi hāngkhala, nana ali khi hāngkhala kaji tui saikora ithumli mathumhailakla hāngakha nali masāthatmara’ da ngahānakha,
nana athumli hithāda ngahānkalu: ‘Jonathanwui shimli mathisang khavai ili makachihovāmiphalunglu’ da ina awungali hamsangda kapona da athumli hānglu.”
Chiwui thili wungnao saikorana Jeremiahli rāngahāna, kala awungana ali hāngkachithei thāda ana ngahānkai. Chiwui vang ali ngazeklaga athumna hanthuihaowa, kaja aniwui khangazek athumna mashāmana.
Jerusalem makhuiranglakha eina tangda Jeremiahna mayon khavai yāngkhupli pamsai.
Judahwui awunga Zedekiahna mungda kachiko kum, kachāng katharāli, Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna awui raimi saikora thānlaga Jerusalemli rākuinamhaowa.
Zedekiahna khamung zingkum tharāda akhawui kachāng khamatewui zimiksho kachikothang, keinungwui alungli sākhaizanghaowa.
Jerusalem khuikahai tharan Babylon awungawui wungnao saikora alungthung ngaveili rāpamsera: Nergal-sharezer, Samgar-nebo, Rabsariswui Sarsechim, Rabmagwui Nergal-sharezer, kala otva̱bingla zangsera.
Judahwui awunga Zedekiah eina raimi saikora athumli kathei tharan, athum yāmhaowa, kala awungawui yāmgui phākho khaniwui ngachaili khalei ngavei chieina ngayāshong shoklaga Arabahshong yāmvai.

Kha Chaldeawui raimibingna athumli kharomvāda Jerichowui tampākli Zedekiahli angaphankhui; kala athumna ali tukkhui kahai thili, Hamathli khalei Riblahli Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadrezzarwui mangāli khuiungmi; kala awuitungli tui tāhaowa.
Riblahli leilakha Babylonwui awungana Zedekiahwui naomayarabingli awui miktāli shaothat ngasaka, Judahwui khangam khareibinglila shaothatserhaowa.
Ana Zedekiahwui mik latshokmihaowa, kala Babylonli shimenvā khavai mari khanghui eina pheipāng khalaphaowa.
Chaldeanaobingna awungawui shim kala mibingwui shim mei thottāmiserhaowa, Jerusalemwui phākhola pheimiserhaowa.
Chiwui thili khamayonbingwui kathāna Nebuzaradanna, keinung lungli mathikhangakanbing, awui eina khayāmbing eina leikasābing chi Babylonli tukvāserhaowa.
Nebuzaradan, raikānbingwui kathāna china Judah ngaleili khangazana khikha makhaleibingli drakhā yāmgui kala lui vāzā khavai mi.
Jeremiahwui pongli Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna khamayonawui akhavā Nebuzaradanli kasoda hānga,
“Ali khuilaga mathālak eina yangmilu, zakkashi masālu, kha awui kahāng athishurda sāmilu.”
Chieina raikānwui akhavā Nebuzaradan, Rabsariswui Nebushazban, Rabmagwui Nergal-sharezer kala Babylonwui khamataiya otva̱bingna chihovāda,

Jeremiahli khamayonawui yāngkhupwui eina ahokhui ngasaka. Kala Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikamna kaphara Gedaliahwui pāngli horsangmida awui shimli khuiung ngasakhaowa. Chithāda mibingwui alungli somkapam samphanga.
Khamayonawui yāngkhupli leilakha
“Vada, Ethiopiawui Ebed-melechli ahānglu, ‘Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
Kha ina nali chithang kanmira, nana khangacheea athumwui pāngli mahorsangmimara da hānga.
Kaja ina nali huimilākra, kala na raighai eina mathimara, kha nana ili chikahamwui vang, raimazum sāda na kharing samphangra’ da

Jerusalem eina Judahwui eina tukkhuilaga Babylonli raithā kahai narkahaibingli ngasoda mari khānghui eina khalaplaga thānphungda khamayonawui kathāna Nebuzaradanna, Jeremiahli Ramahwui eina chiho kahaiwui thili
Shantriwui kathāna china Jeremiahli hokhuida hānga, “Ka̱lākashi chi nawui
na hi shokngasakhaira, kala hāngkahai athishurda shokhaira. Khikhalajila nathumna

Ara yanglu, napāng mari khānghui eina khalap kahai hi ina aja khalāmi kahaina. Babylonli ili ngasokhava phāmeira jiakha rālu, ina nali mathālak eina yangmira; kha ili ngasoda Babylonli khavā nawui vang maphāmara jiakha marālu. Yanglu, ngalei hupta nawui mangāli leili, nana hili khavā phāmeira, mashungmeira kaji apamli vālu.”

Nana pamka jiakha, “Babylon awungana Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikamna kaphara Gedaliahli Judah keinungbingwui ngalei mungkhavai sanghaira, ali ngasoda mibingli somngarumlu; maningkha nawui vākhangaili vāpaira.” Kala raikānwui kathāna china ali kashakazā kala otnao milaga chihohaowa.
Chiwui thili Jeremiahna Mizpahli Ahikamwui naomayara Gedaliahwuili vai, kala ali ngasoda chili nothā kahai athumwui mibingli pānrumhaowa.

athumna Mizpahli Gedaliahwui pamli asamphanga—Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmael, Kareahwui naomayara Johanan, Tanhumethwui naomayara Seraiah, Netophahwui Ephaiwui naomayarabing, Ma-acahwui naomayara Jezaniah, athum kala athumwui mibingli ngasoda,
Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikamna kapharā Gedaliahna shākhi sāda hānga, “Chaldeanaobingli otram ngatha̱rada mangacheelu. Ngalei chili pamlaga Babylonwui awungali otram ngatha̱lu, nathum ringphāhaora.

Iva Mizpahli pamra, ithumli kharā Chaldeanaobingli nathumwui vang ina nganingmira. Kha nathumna drakhāra̱, lumkachāngwui athei-arai kala thao kazipkhuida nathumwui hamli kazipsanglu, kala nathumna khuikahai keinungli okthuilu.”

Chi tākam eina Moabli leikasābing, Ammonnaobingli ngasopamkasābing, Edomli kala apam khangatateili leikasā Jehudibing chila, Judahnaobingli shākkahai nothā kahaibingwui vang Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikamna kapharā Gedaliahli Babylon awungana lammunga sanghaira kaji kashā tharan,

athumna leikasā apam athumli kashamkhavāwui eina Jehudinaobingna Judah ngalei, Gedaliahwui Mizpahli latungsera, kala athumna drakhāra̱ eina lumkachāngwui athei-arai khavāt maleila kachungkha kazipkhui.
Chitharan Kareahwui naomayara Johanan kala raimiwui kathānabing kaphungli zatkasā saikora Mizpahli leilakha Gedaliahli vāda asamphanglaga hānga,
“Namanglā khuikhavai Ammonwui awunga Baalisna Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelli chiho kahai chi theila?” Kha Ahikamwui naomayara Gedaliahna athumli mashitsangmana.

Chieina Kareahwui naomayara Johananna Mizpah apamli Gedaliahli ngathumsāda hānga, “Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelli ina ngathumda ashaothathaoga, khipānakha matheimara. Khiwui vang namanglā ana khuihaida nali kuinamda leida khalei Jehudibing ngapha̱paira kala Judahwui shākkahai shimānpairakhala?”
Kha Ahikamwui naomayara Gedaliahna Kareahwui naomayara Johananli hānga, “Na hikathā ot masāpaimara, kaja nana Ishmaelwuitungli makhamashung matuida lei.”

Kachāng kashineli, Elishamawui naomayara Nethaniahna kapharā Ishmael, wungnaowui shimkhurli kapharā kala awungawui otva̱ khamataiya akha sākasā china mi tharā thānlaga Mizpahli Ahikamwui naomayara Gedaliahwuili vai. Athumna Mizpahli phazāngarumda leilakha,
Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna thānda athum tharā china Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikamna kapharā Gedaliah, Babylon awungana ngaleiwui lammunga sangkahaia chili raighai eina shātthathaowa.
Gedaliahli ngasoda Mizpahli pamkasā Jehudi saikora kala Chaldea raimibingla Ishmaelna shaothatserhaowa.
Gedaliahli shaothatthang, khipākha matheilakranglakha,
Shechem, Shiloh kala Samariawui eina mi hangchishat, kachonkakāk ngavai, phasā huikazazamhai, morhā siriplaga,
Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna chapmamānda Mizpahwui eina athumli shokngaroka. Ana athumli samkaphang eina hānga, “Ahikamwui naomayara Gedaliahli zangyanglu.”
Athumna keinungli kazang eina Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmael eina ali khangaso awui mibing china athumli shaothatserhaowa, kala paibung akhali horsanghaowa.
Kha athumwui ngachaili mi tharāna, “Ithumli masāthathaialu, kaja ithumna mā, napai, thao, kala khuira̱ luili thumhaidalei” da hānga. Chieina ana athum eina athumli ngayurzatkasābingli masāthatthuwa.

Ishmaelna kathingun horsang khavai paibung chi kahakva̱na; hi Israelwui awunga Baashana rai rākatā atamli ngararkham khavai Awunga Asana chuikakhui paibungna; Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna paibung chi kathingun eina chipema.

Chiwui thili Mizpahli leikasā mi saikora, awungawui naongalāva̱bing, kala Ahikamwui nao Gedaliahwui pāngli raikānwui kathāna Nebuzaradanna horsangmi kahai mi saikora chi Ishmaelna tukkhuiserhaowa. Kala Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna athumli tukphungda Ammonbingwui shong vāhaowa.
Kha Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna makaphā kasā ot chi Kareahwui naomayara Johanan kala ali khangayur raimiwui kathānabing china kashā eina,
Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelli ngarar khavai athumwui mi saikora thānphungda vai. Kala Gibeonli khalei ra̱khong kahakawui apam chili angaphankhui.
Ishmaelna khuiphungkasā mibing china Kareahwui naomayara Johanan kala ali khangaso raimi kathānabing chili kathei eina athumna mathāna.
Chieina Ishmaelna Mizpahwui eina tukphungkasā mibing china Kareahwui naomayara Johananwuili latungsera.
Kha Johananwui eina Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna mi chishatli ngasoda yāmshokta Ammonnaobingwuili vāhaowa.

Mizpahli Ahikamwui naomayara Gedaliahli shaothat kahaiwui thili Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna tukkhui kahai—raimibing, sha̱naobing, naoshinaobing, ahongabing Gibeonwui eina khuikhaungbing chi Kareahwui naomayara Johananna thānda raimi kathānabingna saikorali thānungluishita.
Kala athumna Egyptli vākhavai ngaranda Bethlehem ngalemli khalei Geruth Chimhamli angasāmkhui;
kaja Ahikamwui naomayara Gedaliahli Babylon awungana ngalei chiwui khamunga sanghailaga Nethaniahwui naomayara Ishmaelna shaothat kahaiwui vang Chaldeanaobingli ngacheehaowa.
Chiwui thili raithānabing, Kareahwui naomayara Johanan, kala Hoshaiahwui naomayara, kala kharei kateo mateila mi saikora vāda,
marān Jeremiahli ahānga, “Nawui mangāli ithumwui kapo kakhuisangmida nawui Vare
kaja, ithumna vāki kaji apong kala sāki kaji ot chi nawui Varena kachitheimiranu.”
Marān Jeremiahna athumli hānga, “Nathumwui tui ina shāhaira, yanglu, nathumwui kapo athishurda nathumwui Vare
Chieina athumna Jeremiahli hānga, “Nawui
Phālala shilala nali ithumna chihokharā ithumwui
Zimiksho katharāthang khangachang atamli
Chieina ana Kareahwui naomayara Johanan, ali khangaso shipai kathānabing, chili lāngda kharei kateo mateila mi saikorali hokhuida,
athumli hānga, “Nathumna kapo chiwui vang seihā sāmi khavai ili chihokhavā Israelwui
‘Nathumna apam hili pamakha ina nathumli sākāmira, masāshimānmimara; ina nathumli lingsangra, maphākthuihaimara; kaja ina nathumli kalā shikhangasak chiwui eina ining ngacheihaira.
Nathumna khangachee Babylonwui awungawui vang mangangalu; ali mangacheealu, da
Nathumli ana lumashanmida nathumwui ngalei hili pamngasak khavai, ina nathumli lumashanmira.’
“Kha nathumna nathumwui Vare
kala, ‘Ngga, ithumna rai khangarar matheiki kaji, lah raiwui talla̱khon makashāpam, lah kashakazā makhavātpam Egyptli apamura’ jiakha,
wui tui chi nganālu, O Judahwui shākkahaibing. Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
nathumna khangachee raighai china nathumli Egypt ngaleili rāngaphankhuira; kala nathumna khanganga chāmrei china Egypt eina tangda kharomrāra, chili nathum thira.
Egyptli apam khavai mai ngareikathuibing chi raighai, chāmrei, kala kazātkashi eina thira; ina khuirāki kaji kalākashi chiwui eina taikashok kala ringkashok masamphangmara.’
“Kaja Israelwui Vare, saikorawui
kaja nathumwui manglā mashivāmlakla shongfa ma̱thuihaira. Kaja nathumwui Vare
Kala ina aja nathumli phongshokmihaira, kha
Chiwui vang eina hi theishingkhuilu kaja nathumna asompamkhangai lam chili raighai eina, chāmrei eina, kala kazātkashi eina nathum athisangserra.”
Athumwui
Hoshaiahwui naomayara Azariah, Kareahwui naomayara Johanan, kala achei-arei makatheibing china Jeremiahli, “Nana kakapik tui khamatuina, ithumwui
Chaldeanaobingwui pāngli horsangmida shaothat khavai kala Babylonli tukvā khavai Neriahwui naomayara Baruchna ithumli mamayāmada nali hāngkhangasakna” da hānga.
Chithāda sāda Kareahwui naomayara Johanan, raimi kathānabing kala mi saikorana Judah ngaleili pamlu da
Kha Kareahwui naomayara Johananna thānda raimi kathānabing china, miyurbingwui alungli kashamvā kahaibingwui eina Judah ngaleili ungpam khavai houngluishit kaje Judahwui shākkahaibing—

mayarnaobing, sha̱naobing, naoshinaobing philava̱ ngarā, kala Shaphanwui naomayara Ahikamna kapharā Gedaliahwui pāngli khamayonawui kathāna Nebuzaradanna haikhami mi kachiva̱, Jeremiah marān eina Neriahwui naomayara Baruchlila khuithuiserhaowa.
Athumna Egypt ngaleili vai, kaja athumna
Tahpanhesli Jeremiahli
“Judah mibingwui miktāli, Tahpanhesli khalei Pharaohwui konungli napāngli ngalung kahakabing khuida zangkhavai shongfapheili leikhonlungli yatphumhailu;
kala athumli hānglu, saikorawui
Ana Egypt ngalei rāsākhayāngmihaida, kazātkashili thiki kajibingna kazātkashi eina, tukkakhuili zangki kajibingna tukkakhuili, raighai eina thiki kajibingna raighai eina thiserra.
Egypt khorumshimli ana mei shārkhuida mei thottālaga narkahaibing phungthuihaora; kala yaokahomana awui pha̱honli rik, kashā kaphā thāda Egypt ngalei manākhuihailaga yansāngsa̱ eina thuihaora.
Egyptli khalei Helio-poliswui chikhurbing chila sātekmihaora, Egyptwui varebingwui shimla mei sa̱tāmihaora.”
Egypt ngaleiwui Migtolli, Tahpanhesli, Memphis kala Pathros lamli khalei Jehudibingwui pongli Jeremiahli rakahāng tuina,
“Saikorawui
khikhalajila athumnala, nathumnala, nashāvā ngarānala makathei, athumna varebingli shitsangda nganamkaphā otyur riktāda makhayā ot sālaga ili malungvāt khangasakwui vangna.
Chithālala iwui rao marānbingli chihorāda, ‘Iyavo, ina ningkakachai ot hi masaalu’ da rāhang ngasakchinga.
Kha athumnna makhamashung apongwui kala vare khangateibingli nganamkaphā otyur mariktālu kaji iwui tui makhuisangmana, khanganāla manganāsangmana.
Chiwui vang eina iwui malungkathui kala lungvāt chi Judah keinungbing kala Jerusalemwui chānreitungli heitāda hithāda aja ramcho kala ngachakyāng ngasak kahaina.
“Saikorawui

Khiwui vang nathumna pāng eina sākakhui ot china ili malung thuikhavai, nathumna vāpam khavai Egypt ngaleiwui alungli vare khangateibingli nganamkaphā otyur riktākhala, kashamhaida okathuiwui miyurbingwui alungli khonkashi kala mana̱shi ngasak khavai kasāla?

Judah ngaleili, Jerusalemwui chānreili, nashāvā ngarāwui makhayā otsak, Judah awungabingwui makhayā otsak, apreiva̱ ngarāwui, nathum khalattawui makhayā, napreiva̱ ngarāwui makhayā otsak chi malaihairala?
Athumna aja eina tangda athum khalatta mahamsangmana, khangacheela mangachee, kala nashāvāngarā kala nathumli mikahai iwui ain kala shiyan chikan mamayonlākmana.
“Chiwui vang eina saikorawui

Judahwui shākkahaibing, Egyptli vāpān khavai mai ngareithui kahaibing chili ina khuira, kala athumli yummihaora; Egypt ngaleili athum kongluida raighai eina kala chāmrei eina thira; kharei kateo mateila raighai kala chāmrei eina thiserra; athum thuikhanam, khangachee, khonkashi, zeinganao khavai ngasāra.
Jerusalemli ina raighai, chāmrei kala kazātkashi eina tandi khami thāda Egyptli kapamabingli ina tandi mira,
chithāda sāda Egypt ngaleili somkida khavā Judahwui shākkahai akhala maringmara, Judahli unglui khavai akhala mangathishokmara; yāmkazat khani akha maningla khipākha maungrarluimara.”

Chiwui thili mi saikora athumwui preiva̱̱ ngarāna vare kateili nganamkaphā otyur chigathairada katheibing, kala chiwui ngalemli leikasā sha̱naobing, yarui kachungkha kakazip, kala Egyptwui Pathros ngaleili kapam saikorana Jeremiahli ngahānkai:

Kha ithumna khangashit sākahai chiwui athishurda sāra, kazing philava̱li awui vang nganamkaphā otyur riktāra, rashakchigat pha̱ra, ishāvā ngarāna kala ithumna, ithumwui awungabing eina wungnaobingna Judahwui keinungli, Jerusalemwui chānreili sākasā chithāda kasawui vang kashakazāla kachungkha leida mataisanga, kalākashila khikha matheimana.
Kha kazing philāva̱li awui vang nganamkaphā otyur rikkatā, ra̱shakchigat kapha̱ chiho kahai eina ithum ot kachiva̱ vātserhaira, ithum raighai kala chāmrei eina thingakanhaira.”

Sha̱naobing china hānga, “Ithumna kazing philāvawui vang nganamkaphā otyur rikkatā, ra̱shakchigat kapha̱, kala awui meoma phungkazatwui vang khamui kasā hi igahara ngarāwui khamayā makhuila kasāna da phaningla?”
Chieina mi saikora, sha̱naobing, mayarnaobing, ali rākahāngbing saikorali Jeremiahna hānga,
“Nathumna, nashāvā ngarāna, nathumwui awungabing, wungnaobingna kala ngalei chiwui mi saikorana Judahwui keinungli, Jerusalemwui chānreili nganamkaphā ot rikkatā chi
Nathumwui makhayā otsak kala ningkakachai otsak chi
Hi nathumwui nganamkaphā otyur rikkatāwui vang,
Mi saikorali kala sha̱nao saikorali Jeremiahna hānga, “Egyptli khalei Judahwui mi saikora
Saikorawui
Chiwui vang Egyptli kapama Judahnaobing saikora,
Yanglu, kaphāwui vang maningla makaphāwui vang ina athumwuitungli yangda lei; Egypt ngaleili khalei Judahwui mi saikora raighai eina, kala chāmreina chithitra.

Raikhai eina makathi Egyptwui eina Judah ngaleili hankhaungbing kateokha china; kala Judahwui shākkahai Egyptli pamkida kharābing china, athumwui tui mashungmeikā, iwui tui mashungmeikhala kaji theira.
Hi eina nathumna machutkhuipaira kaja, apam hili ina tandi mira, chieina nathumli makhamayā kalākashi khuirāra da ina hāngkahai chi kachangkhata da nathumna theikhuipaira:
“Israelwui
Nana hānga, ‘Iyavo I kalākashi! kaja iwui kachotli
Nana ali hithāda hāngra,
Nakhalatta kahaka phākazatla? Maphāzatalu! kaja yanglu, asā khavai saikorawuitungli ina kalākashi khuirāra da

Egyptwui pongli: Judahwui awunga Josiahwui naomayara Jehoiakimwui khamate kum Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna Euphrates kongwui Carchemishli Egyptwui awunga Pharaoh Necowui raimili rai khayuiwui apongli;
“Changvei eina talla̱ ngarānlu,
raiwui vang muivālu!
Siguibingli yāchan sanglu,
kātonglu, O sigui raimibing!
Mari kuihon ngahonda nathumwui pam khuilu,
kazei kharākhariklu;
raisāri shaksālu!
“Athumna ngacheehaida latunghaira.
Athumwu rai kapingabingli ngawuttāhaida athumna khanuk makapeila katotsisi yāmhaira;
uishong yāshong khangachee khangachāna pemhaira da
Kathākala mayāmthukmara,
kapingala mayāmshokrarmara;
atungshong Euphrates kong ngalemli athumwui phei ngaphokta konglui.
Nile thāda kathui chi khipākhala?
Egyptna Nile thāda thuiya,
tara̱ kathui kong thāda.
Ana hānga, ina thuida okathui peida,
athumwui keinungbing eina mibing sāshimānmihaora.
Muivālu, O siguibing,
ngaheirorlu, O siguigaribing!
Rai kapingbing mangāli vāngasaklu:
Ethiopia eina Putwui chāngvei kaphungbing;
malā singkathei Ludwui mibing.”
Zimiksho chi ashangva̱wui Vare
angathut hāngkasang zimikshona,
akhalatta yangkashebingli athut khuikhavaina.
Raighaina shaisangra kala ningyāng ungra kala athumwui ashee kapen eina mangkhuira.
Kaja Euphrates kong ngalemwui atungshongwui ngaleili saikorawui Proho VAREna pha̱kaphayā sai,
Gileadli teikhavai ari akhuilu,
O Egyptwui kachinga naongalāva̱!
aremali nana ari kachungkha singhaira,
nawui vang raikhavai maleimana!
Nawui maikashi yurbingna shāserhaira;
kala nawui kachapkhon okathui pemhaira;
kaja raikapingbing akha eina akha ngahui ngarokta
khanini pitāngarumhaira.
“Egyptli chishātlu, Migtolli vaomalānlu;
Memphis eina Tahpanhesli vaomalānlu;
Hānglu, ‘Khangarān sāda ningkharikta nganinglu,
kaja raighaina nathumli kuimareida shāttāra.’
Khiwui vang Apisna yāmhao?
Khisāthuda nathumwui mukkāna manganingthu?
khikhalajila
Nathumwui mi kachungkha ngaphokta pitai,
kala athum akha eina akha hāngngaroka,
‘Ngakarthuilu, ithum kachichā khalattawui mibingli,
kala ithumli pharāsang khavai ramli latungusa,
rekakharekawui raighaiwui vang eina.’
“Egyptwui awunga Pharaohli ngakaolu,
‘Atam shimān khangasaka, khonzara’
Ina katheina, da saikorawui
phungreitungli Tabor kathā,
shamadrupheili Carmel kathā, akha rāra.
Raithāhaoki kajiwui vang shaksākhuilu,
O Egyptli kapamabing!
Kaja Memphis ramcho ngasakhaora,
ngayānghaora, khipākha maokthuimara.
Egypt khamathā seilānaona,
kha atungshongwui eina ali hāpa̱ akha apa̱haira.
Ana masākakhui raimibing eina tangdala,
keimathao kahai seinaobing thāhaira,
mha, athum ngareithuida yāmrumserhaira,
athum manganingrarthuwa,
kaja athumwui unshimui atam athumwuitungli rāhaira,
athumwui tandi atam rāshunghaira.
Ra̱rei ngamenthui kahaiwui khon thāda ana khonga;
kaja awui yangkashebingna pangshap eina,
thing ta̱katekbing thāda ngahā ngava̱riplaga kharomrai.
Mazangpailala awui ngahongli yangkashibingna yaiphekmihaora da
khikhalajila athum khaohbingli chungmei,
athum mashānrarmana.
Egyptwui naongalāva̱li maishi ngasakra,
ali atungshongwui miyur akhawui pāngli horsangmihaora.”
Ashangva̱wui
Athumwui manglā khuikida khangarānabing, Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadrezzar kala awui otva̱bingwui pāngli ina athumli horsangmira. Naoda, khare kachāngwui thāda Egyptli mi somluinaora, da
kakhanangla makhanangalu, O Israel;
kaja yanglu, katāva̱wui eina nali kala nawui arā-aza̱ raithā kahaipamwui eina ina kanmira,
Jacobna latungda chingri-vari eina okthuiluira;
kala khipānakha ali mangachee ngasakmara.
Mangacheealu, O iwui rao Jacob,
kaja ina nali ngasomida lei da
Ina nali kashamvā kahai apam saikora shimānchao khavai ina sāra,
kha nale mashimānchao ngasakmara.
Ina nali ngarakzak eina machinra kala ina nali tandi mamila machihomara.”
Yanglu, atungshongwui eina kongra̱ reishokhaira,
kala panglak eina phongshilongra;
china ngalei chili pānda khaleibing,
keinung kala chili kapambinglila phonghaora.
Mibingna chapra,
kala ram chili pānda khalei saikorana chapngachāra.
Awui siguibingwui ashona kakathangkhon shāda,
awui siguigariwui kangkhonna ngarungning kahai chi shālaga,
avāva̱ ngarāna anaomayarali makapeiungmana, athumwui pāng ngazanlakhaowa,
khikhalajila Philistine saikora sāshimān khavai,
ngachonkhamebingli Tyre kala Sidonwui eina katat khavai kasā zimiksho chi ungshungki kajiwui vangna.
Kaja, shamadrupheili khalei Caphtorwui shākkahai Philistineli
Ngaikhok kahai Gazawuitungli rāhaira,
Ashkelonla shimānhaira.
O Anakimwui shākkahaibing nathum khalatta karankha shātkazampamfarakhala?
Iyavo,
Karankhafara va̱rihapkida?
Khalatta ahonli sanghaida kasaikha ngasāmkhuilu!
Ashkelonli kala shamadrupheili khalei athumli ngasung khavai ana ngaran kahaina.”
“Neboli kakhanang ngasāranu,
kaja chi ramcho ngasā ngasakhaira!
Kiriathaimli maishi ngasakta khuithuihaira;
raipanli maishi ngasakta sākhayāngmihaira;
Moabwui mingkazat maleithura.
Ali makaphā sākhavai Heshbonli athumna machukta:
Ralu, ali yur akha khangasāwui eina katathaosa!
O kapā, nalila kasaikha pamngasakhaora;
raighaina nali yunzatra.
Nganālu! ‘Ngachakyānghaira kala hakmahālak eina sāshimānhaira!’
da Horonaimwui eina khavao!
“Moab sākhayanghaira;
ringkhangā Zoar eina tangdali shāvai.
Kaja, Luhithwui shongshanli athumna chapmamānda kai;
kaja sākashimān kachapkhon Hororaimwui shongtunli athumna shai.
‘Yāmulu! Nathum khalatta kankhuilu!’
‘Siwukwui ram gadha thāda sālu!’
“Kaja, nana nawui khangazipa raipanli kala lanli shitkasangwui vang nalila khuithuihaora;
Chemoshla awui pāngmonbing, wungnaobingli ngasoda raikathāli vāhaora,
Sākakathāna china keinung kachiva̱li zangra,
kala keinung akhala mayāmshokmara;
tampākla shimānra kala leiwukla sākathānhaora,
Moabli angachāng phonmilu,
kaja a yongthuihaora;
awui keinungbing ngachakyāng kahai ngasāhaora,
chibingwui alungli mi maokthuimara.”
Nganuilakhawui eina thuida Moabna yansāngkhok eina okthui,
kala zampā thāda ngachingpama;
ali ham akhawui eina ham akhali mamasaisangmana,
ava raithā kahailila mavāranga;
chiwui vang awui khangama̱ awuili leichinga,
awui anganamla mangacheimana.
“Chiwui vang eina, yanglu, atam chi rārāli da
Chieina Israelna shitkasanga Bethelwui vang kakhayak samkaphang thāda Moabla Chemoshwui vang kakhayak samphangra.
“Nathumna, ‘Ithumna raikapinga pangshap khalei raiwui mimānga’ da kathāda hāngkhala?
Moab kala awui keinungbing sākakhaiya chi rāhaira,
kala awui pangmeikap kaje yaronnaobingli sāthatngakanhaira da Awunga,
saikorawui
Moabwui unshimui rānganaihaira,
kala awui chotkachāng atam nganaimeihaira.
“Ali kuimarānda khalei nathum saikora,
kala aming katheia nathum saikora;
‘Sāshapa khānthing, tekhamatei khāmshui chi,
kathāda tekhaokhala?’ da hānglu.
Nawui tekhamateipamwui eina,
kathenga ngaleili zangpamlu,
O Dibonwui mibing!
Kaja Moabli sākakhayānga chi nali ngasungkida rāhaira;
ana nawui khangazip raipan sākhaimiserhaira.
O Aroerwui mibing!
Shongfapheili nganingda yanglu.
Yāmkazata sha̱nao mayarnaoli khisāthukhala?
da athumli ngahānyanglu.
‘Moabli sākazamhaida maishi ngasakhaira;’
‘khanangda chapngachālu!’
Moab ramcho sāngasakhaira da Arnon vāshungda hānglu.
“Kaphung khanganili khaleibingwuitungli bichar sāhaira, Holon, Jahzah, Mepha-athwuitungli,
Dibon, Nebo, Beth-diblathaim,
kala Kiriathaim, Beth-gamul, Bethmeon,
kala Kerioth, Bozrah, kala khanailila katālila Moab ngaleili khalei saikorawuitungli bichar sāhaira.
Moabwui angaji katatmihaira, pāngthei sātekmihaira da
“Ali malip ngasaklu, khikhalajila ana
Israelli na maningkachaimala? Ali khaleebingwui alungli samphangda awui pongli khangazek tharan nakui kakhayit maningmala?
“Keinung chihohaida lungkaili apamlu,
O Moabli kasombing!
Kongrā chāngāmli nāsha̱na athip sākapam thāda.
Moabwui langkaso ithumna shāhaira—
a langsolaka—
awui lekkhangasai, langkaso,
awui kahik, kala aningli ngamkachola.
Awui achei makathei ina thei,
awui langkaso kakapikna,
awui otsak kakapikna,
da
Chiwui vang eina Moabwui vang ina sifaya;
ina Moab saikorawui vang chapa;
Kir-hereswui mibingwui vang ina wukkhananga.
Jazerwui vang mataimeida ina nawui vang chapa,
O Shibmathwui drakhārong!
na aphāng shamadru makānvai, Jazer vāshunga;
nawui lumkachāngwui athei kala drakhāthei yangkashebingna sākathānhaira.
Ngalei kathuma Moabwui eina ringkaphā kala khamathān khuithuihaira;
atheira̱ surkhavaiwui eina ina thengngasakhaira,
khipānakha mathānda ngaunlop eina drakhāra̱ masurmana;
kha vaoda khalei chi khamathānwui akhon maningmana!
“Heshbon eina Ele-alehna chapa, Jahaz vāshungda, Zoar vāshungda, Zoar eina thuilaga Horonaim kala Eglath-Shelishiyan vāshungda Nimrimwui tara̱la thenghaowa.
Kajujuipamli pha̱phayāda kala awui vareli nganamkaphā rik-katā ali Moabli ina shummihaora da
“Chiwui vang Moabwui vang kala Kir-heres mibingwui vang iningli sipa̱khon thāda ngahuiya; chiwui vang athumna kazipsang kahai lan shimānhaira.
Kaja kui kala morhā kachiva̱ sihaira; pāng saikorali khamā za̱laga kashānli bora ngavaisera.
Moabwui shimtung kala kayāng saikorali, chapkhangachā maningla khikha maleimana; kaja mina matheikhame ham thāda ina Moabli sakhaimihaira da
Kathāda sakhaimihao! Athumna kathāda chapngachāli! Khayaknāhaida Moabna kathāda mai ngareithuihao! Chiwui vang eina Moabna awui khongnainaowui zeinganao khavai kala mana̱shi khavai ngasāthuihaira.”
Yanglu, Moabwuitungli makhamayā,
khalāngna angachāng kaphayai thāda akhana yongzatra.
keinungbing khuihaora,
khangazip raipanla khuithuihaora.
Chithanghon Moabwui raikapingabingwui ning sha̱nao naokhara̱va̱wui ning thāhaora.
Moabli sākhayānghaida yur akha mangasāluimara.
Khangachee, chom, khalen nathumwui mangāli lei,
O Moabwui mibing! da
Ngachee khangachāwui eina khayāmbing chomli tāzangra,
chomwui eina ngareikashokbing khalenli manra.
Kaja, tandi khami atamli ina hibing hi khuirāra da
Heshbonwui khaya̱li yāmkazatabing china mazat-thukla nganingkhui;
kaja Heshbonwui eina mei akha shokhaira,
Shihon shimkhurwui eina meiwon shoka;
khonkazārwui naongarāwui wungkuihon,
Moabwui khavei sākhaimihaira.
O Moab, nali kakhanang ngasāranu!
Chemoshwui mibing kānhaira;
kaja, naomayara ngarāli tukkhuihaira,
naongalāva̱ ngarā tukthuihaira.
Kha naoda Moabwui shimlui ina hanmiluira da
Hibing hi Moabwuitungli bichar sākahaina.
“Israel naomayarabing maleimala?
A shimluikat mavaimala?
Chithākha khiwui vang eina Milcomna Gad hi khuithuihailaga awui mibing keinungbingli rāpam kahaikhala?
Chiwui vang eina yanglu, zimiksho chi rārali,
chitharan ina Ammonnaobingwui Rabbahli ngasung khavai raivao shāngasakra da
Apam hi ngachakyāng kahai kaphung ngasāthuihaora,
kala kha̱wung saikora mei thottāmihaora;
chitharan Israel ngapaikakhuia athumwui eina ngapaikhuiluira da
Chapngachālu, O Heshbon!
kaja Ai ramcho sāmihaira.
Chaplu, O Rabbahwui naongalāva̱bing!
Nathum khalatta bora ngavailaga kuikhamarei ngavei ungshung vāshungda chapngachāzatlu!
Kaja Malcomli ngasoda awui pāngmonbing,
wungnaobing, raikathāli khuithuihaora.
Khiwui vang nawui tampākwui vang langsokhala?
O shitkasang makhalei naongalāva̱,
nawui lanli ning horsangda ‘Ili khipāna rānganairakhala’ da hānga.
Yanglu, nawuitungli khangachee khangachā ina khuirāra,
da rai saikorawui
nali kuimareida khaleibingwui eina,
nali kashamshokhaora,
mi kachiva̱wui mangāli yāmkazatbing chili kazipkhui khavai khipākha maleisāmara.
Kha naoda Ammonbingwui shimlui ina hanmiluishitra da
“Temanli thangkhamei maleithula?
Ningkazanwui eina machinkathei shimānhaola?
Athumwui thangmei shimān kahaila?
Yāmlu, latunglu, kathukli sompamlu,
O Dedanli kapambing!
Kaja ali tandi khami tharān ina awuitungli Esauwui unshimui chi khuirāra.
Drakhāthei kaphābing nali raakha,
athumna atham mataimimarala?
Khalebingna ngayā raakha, athumwui khuishapmāng makhuimarala?
Kha Esauli ina mahongmihaira,
awui ngathum khavai apambingla phākhuiserhaida ngazing khavai maleithura.
Anaongarā, achināngarā, khongnaibing sākhayānghaoda ala maleithura.
Nathumwui avāva̱ makhalei naongarābing haihaolu,
ina nganaomira,
kala nathumwui ra̱meinaobing ili chihamranu.”
Kaja
Kaja Bozrah hi khangachee khangachā, zeikhanganao, chokahai; khonkashi ngasāra; kala awui keinung saikora shimānchao khavai ina ikhalatta ngashithaira da
kala miyurbingwui alungli paome akha chihovāhaira:
“Nathum khalatta kazipkhuingarumda ali rāngasunglu
kala rai sākhavai ngakarthuilu.
Kaja yanglu, yurbingwui ngachaili ina nali teongasakra,
kala yangkakharinga yur akha ngasā ngasakra.
Nana ngachee khangasak china,
kala nawui langkaso ningna nali minamhaira,
lunghārkhurli kala phungrei kajuili khamunga nali.
Nana khalāngwui thāda kajuiyali athip sālala,
nali ina chiwui eina ngakhuntāra da
“Edom hi khangachee ngasāhaora; khikhalajila chili rākhamakān kachiva̱na awui kalāshāt saikora theilaga hiwui vang kasirora.
Sodom eina Gomorrah kala chiwui luinganai keinungbingli shimān khangasak chithāda, chili mi maokthuiluimara, khipākha mayaorāluimara da

Yanglu, khangazipa yaoshimli Jordan ngahongwui eina kazingkha̱ kashok thāda, ina athumli awui eina kashuirak eina yāmngasakhaora, kala ali mungkhavai ina khuikhangai mi akha kapangsangra. Kaja I kathā khipā leikhala? Ili yaokahoma khipāna ngasungshaprakhala?
Chiwui vang eina
Athumwui kongkhaluikhon chi shālaga okathuina kathirra, athumwui kachapkhon Red Sea shāvara.
Yanglu, akhana khalāng thāda thaklāk eina yongkāra, kala Bozrahwuitungli angachāng farorra, kala Moabwui rai kapingabing chi sha̱nao naokhara̱va̱wui ning thāhaora.”
“Hamath eina Arpad pa̱ngapāhaira,
kaja anina makaphā chānpao shāhaowa.
Vari machikharar shamadru khangaphao thāda,
athum khangacheelungli menghaira.
Damascus mathukthura,
ngareithuida yāmkhavai sai,
ali khangacheena pemhaowa;
sha̱nao akhawui naokhara̱wui kachot thāda kakhanang kachotna pemhaowa.
Amingkazata khamathāna keinung chi kathāda horhao?
Chiwui vang eina chithang awui yaronaobing kayāngli thira,
kala awui raimi saikora chithang sāshimānhaora da saikorawui
Kala Damascuswui phākholi ina mei thotra,
kala china Benhadadwui konung saikora chuitāhaora.”
Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna Kedar eina Hazor wungrambing sākathānhaoki kajiwui pongli,
Ngakarthuida Kedarli ngasung khavai muivālu!
Zingshoshongwui mi sāshimānhaolu!
kala thongthāng saikora khuithuihaora;
athumwui utla athumwui eina tongthui ngakānra,
kala mibingna kuimareida khangachee! da hāngra.
“O Hazorwui mibing! Yāmlu,
katāva̱li yāmvāhaolu, kathukali ngayinkhuilu, da
Kaja Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna nali ngasung khavai,
khangarān akha sāhaira.
‘Ngakarthuilu, yansāngsa̱ eina khalei
yur akhali ngasung khavai muivālu;
raipanla, ngaveila makhangavā athumāng somda
kapam chili angararlu’ da
“Athumwui ut ngapaikhui khavai ngasāhaora
athumwui sha̱keila ngaponkakhui ngasāhaora.
Kuisam kuimareida kasebingli ina chaiyāngmihaora,
Kala apam kachiva̱wui eina athumwui unshimui khuirāmira da
Hazor hi ramfapam sāthuira,
ramchochaohaida khipākha maokthuiluimara;
khipākha mayaorāluimara.”
Judahwui awunga Zedekiahna mungkhare kachāng, Elamwui pongli Jeremiahli rākahāng
Saikorawui
kala kazingram achikun matiwui masi Elamli khuirāda athumli masi saikora chi phanvāra, kala athumli miyur akhawui alunglila maphankhavā apam maleimara.
Yangkashibingwui mangāli, athumwui manglā khuikida kasābingwui mangāli ina Elamli khangacheea sāngasakra; kala iwui malungkhavāt athishurda kalākashi athumwuitungli tāngasakra da
kala ina iwui wungpamkhong Elamli haihaida athumwui awunga, wungnaobing shimān ngasakra da
Kha naoda Elamwui shimlui ina hanmiluira da
“Okathui yurbingwui alungli chishātta vaomalānlu,
philān khāngkāda vaomalānlu:
mathumhaila hānglu:
‘Babylon khuihaira,
Belli maishi ngasakhaira,
Merodachli wukkhanang ngasakhaira.
Awui meoma̱bingli maishi ngasakhaira,
awui meomabing wukkhananghaira.’”
“Atungshongwui eina ali ngasung khavai yur akha shokhaira, china awui ngalei chi ngachakyāng ngasakhaora, kala chili khipākha maokthuiluimara, mila sāla yāmserhaora.”
“Chitharan, atam chili, Israel eina Judahwui mibingna rāngarumda chapsasui hanungra, kala athumwui Vare
Athumna Zionshong mai ngareivāda shongfa ngathingda hāngra, rālu, mamalaiki kaji
“Iwui mibing shimān kahaia yaobing ngasāsai; athumwui yaokahomabingna thannguihaida athumli phungreibingli kashamvāhaowa; phungrānaowui eina phungreili thuihaoda athumwui yaoshangli malaihaowa.
Athumli samkaphangbingna tukshaiya, kala athumwui yangkashebingna hānga, ‘Ithum mayonmana, kha athumna athumwui akachangaram

Kaja yanglu, ina atungshong khalei kahaka yur akhali ngatha̱ ngasakta athumna Babylonli rāngararra, kala ali khuimarānda ngasungra, kala chili ali tukkhuihaora. Athumwui malāva rai kathembingna rai vālaga khamasai eina makhaunga kapinga athum kathāna.
Chaldea ngaponthuihaora, khangaponbing saikora penlakhaora da
“O iwui shimluikatli ngapon kazābing nathumna ringphālala kala mathānlala,
seilānao khawo karāmsisi phākashai thālala,
sigui avā thāda kaheklala,
nava̱ khayaklakhaora,
kala nali pharākakhuiva̱ chi maishihaora.
Yanglu, yurwui ngachaili naomeikap kaje siwuk,
kala lamhāng chi ana.
Khikhalajila
awuili mi maokthuiluimara,
kha ramcho ngasakchaohaora.
Babylonli kānkhava kachiva̱na ngacheera,
kala awui khamāwui vang kasirorra.
“Babylonli nathum khalatta kuimarānlu,
nathum malā kahunbing saikora;
ali kāplu, malāthing akhala mataihaialu,
kaja
Ali kuimareida makhamayā vaolu,
a hamsanghaira;
awui raipan kongluihaira,
awui phākhola minhaira.
Kaja hi
ali athut khuilu, ana sākahai thāda alila sāmilu.
Athā khayaoa kala māhāli chāngkui kasinga chili Babylonwui eina tang ngasakhaolu;
kaja rekakharekawui raighaiwui vang mi kachiva̱ awui mibingli hanungra,
kala mi saikorana awui ramli yāmungra.”
“Israel hiya kazingkha̱na kharomkazat yaonaona. Khareli Assyriawui awungana shai, ara naomeikapta Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna ara̱kui maziya.
Chiwui vang, saikorawui
Israelli ina awui seihomphungli latluida hanung ngasakra, kala ana Carmelli kala Bashanli phāshak-phazāpamra, kala awui ningkachāng chi Ephraim eina Gileadwui phungrābingli ungshungra.

Chitharan, atam chili, Israelwui alungli khayon phāra, kala khikhala masamphangmara; Judahwui alungli morei phāra kala akhala masamphangmara; kaja shāk kahai sāda ina haikahaibing chili pheomiserra da
“Merathaim ngaleili,
kala Pekodwui mibingli angararlu.
Shaothattuphaolu,
kala ina kaso kahai saikora sālu da
Raikhon kala hakkhamahā sākashimān ngalei chili lei!
Okathui hupva̱wui yāmkār kathāda kaktāhao kala sātekhao!
Kathāda Babylon hi yurbingna ngachee-ngachā khavai ngasāhao!
O Babylon, ina nali khalen sangda nali khuihaira,
kha nana chi matheimana;
nali samphangda tukkhuihaira,
khikhalajila
kala awui malungkhavātwui khutlai khuishokhaira;
kaja Chaldea ngaleili saikorawui
Apam kachiva̱wui eina rālu,
awui zātshim rāsholu;
mangum khorkachupkālu, kala ali zakshilak eina sāmilu;
akhala mataimihaialu.
Awui seivā saikora sāthatserhaolu,
athumli sā sāthat khavaipamli khuitālu.
Athumli kakhanang ngasāranu, kaja athumwui zimiksho rāhaira, tandi khami atam.”
Nganālu! ithumwui

“Babylonli ngasung khavai malā singkathei, malā kahun saikorali hokhuilu. Kuimareida ali rairui sālu, akhala machakshokaranu. Ana sākahai athishurda athut hāngsanglu, ana kasā thāda alila sāmilu; kaja ana Israelwui Kathara
Chiwui vang eina awui yaronnaobing kayāngli pitāra, kala chithang awui raimi katonga sāshimānhaora da
“Yanglu, O khayaning khanganinga!
Ina nali mamayāmana da rai saikorawui
kaja nali ina tandi khami zimiksho,
atam chi ungshunghaira.
Langkaso china ngaphokta kongluira,
khipākhana makhāngmathotmara;
kala awui keinung ina mei thotra,
kala china ali kuimareida saikora chuitāserhaora.”
“Saikorawui
Athumli Ngatangkhame pangshap khaleia, saikorawui
“Chaldeanaobingwuitungli,
Babylonli okkathuibingwuitungli
kala awui wungnaobing kala thangkhamabingwuitungli raighai parra da
Khanongbing mangkhama̱ ngasā khavai athumwuitungli raighai parra! Awui raikapingbingwuitungli sāshimān khavai raighai parra!
Awui sigui kala siguigariwuitungli,
kala awui alungli khalei yur kateiwui raimibing sha̱nao thāser khavai raighai parra!
Awui lanshimli raighai parda ngapaithuiserhaora.
Awui tara̱tungli kazing kāng ngasakta tara̱ thenghaora!
Kaja hi meoma̱wui ngaleina,
khangacheena pemhaoki kaji meoma̱bingna.”
Sodom eina Gomorrahli kala chiwui khongnaiwui keinungbing Varena shimān khangasak thāda, apam chili mi akhanida maokthuiluimara, miwui naomayara akhanala mayaorāluimara da
“Yanglu, atungshongwui eina yur akha rārāli;
kapanga yur kala awunga kachungkhana okathui akatangawui eina ngatha̱phokhaira.
Athumna malā, kazei singkhui,
athum sāshiya, kala lukhamashan matheimana.
Athumwui raivātkhon shamadru kakhangāng thai,
athum sigui tongda nali raili ngasung khavai raisāri shakkasā mi thai,
O Babylonwui naongalāva̱!
Babylon awungana pao chi shai,
kala apāng khikha masāthukthuwa;
ali kachotna yuihaowa,
sha̱nao akhana naokhara̱wui kachot thāda.

“Yanglu, khangazipa yaoshimli rāzangkida Jordan ngahongwui eina kazingkha̱ kashok thāda, ina athumli kashuirak eina yām ngasakra; kala awuitungli ina ningkachānga mi akha kapangsangra. Kaja I kathā khipā leikhala? Ili khipāna horānkhala? Yaokahoma khipāna iwui mangāli nganingshaprakhala?
Chiwui vang eina Babylonli mamayā khavai
Babylonli tukkakhuikhon shālaga okathui nganukra, kala awui kachapkhon yurbingwui alungli shāvāra.”
“Yanglu, Babylon kala Chaldeawui mibingli mamayākhangaiwui vang sākashimāna manglā akha mathuk ngasakra.
Kakhanang atamli ari-arāp kachiva̱wui eina athumna ali mamayāngaimada kharā tharan,
Ina Babylonli mā kahambing chihovāra,
kala athumna ali hamra,
kala athumna awui ram masaimihaora.
Malā kasingana awui malā mahunaranu,
raisāri shaksādala manganingaranu.
Awui yaronaobing akhala mashākhailu;
saikora kupmihaolu.
Athumna Chaldea ngaleili pitāra,
chānreili khamā za̱ra.
Kaja Israel eina Judahli aniwui Vare saikorawui
kha Chaldeawui ngalei,
Israelwui Katharawui mangāli makhayāna pemtinghaira.
mi kachiva̱ ichichāwui manglā huikhuiranu!
Ali tandi khamilungli mazangrumalu,
kaja
ali mikhangayi tandi khami tharan.
okathui saikorali marip ngasaka;
yurbingna awui zam manga,
chiwui vang eina yurbingna pāhaowa.
Kashuirak eina Babylon kongluida kaihaira,
awui vang chapngachālu!
Awui khangasheiwui vang teikhavai ari khuilu,
ali china railapai.
kha a marairarthuwa;
ali nothāhaolu, ithum zatusa
ichichā ramwui vang;
kaja awui bichar kazing kāshunghaira;
khamasai eina tangdala kāpeihaira.’”
ithumwui
Malā kharākhariklu!
Chāngvei phungkhuilu!
khikhalajila Babylonli sāshimānmi khavai khangarān pongli Medeswui awungabingwui ningli
Kaja,
athut kakhui chi
Babylonwui phākholi philān khāngkālu!
Khamayon ngazip ngasaklu;
raikān kapambing phāsanglu;
ngathirai ngarānlu;
Babylonli khaleibingwui pongli,
ngarānhaira kala sāhaira.
nathumwui khangachang atam ungshunghaira,
nathumwui mirin khara̱ chathaira.
Ashangva̱wui
Kachangkhat ina nali mi, khaohli ngayāda chipemra,
kala athumna nawuitungli raiyot laa sāra.
Pangshap eina apuk-apaga kasaa chi ana;
thangmei eina okathui sākakāpā chi;
awui theishingkakhui eina kazingram phayaishoka.
Ana matuikashok tharan kazingramli tara̱ ngarungninghai,
kala ana okathui akatangwui eina leijui ngapānkā ngasaka.
kazing rokhavai rikhān ngashei ngasaka,
kala ana sikhurwui eina masi phanngasaka.
Mi kachiva̱ mangkhama̱mānga, thangkhamei maleimana;
sinā kasaa ali awui meoma̱bingna maishi ngasaka,
kaja awui meoma̱ makhamashungna,
athumwui alungli khaksui maleimana.
Athum chi makankhanāna, thānkhangui otsakna;
athumli tandi khami atamli shimānserra.
Kha Jacobwui yarwui vanga hikathā maningmana;
kaja saikora hi kasaa chi ana,
Israel awui shimluikatwui shangna;
saikorawui
“Na iwui yāmkārna kala raiwui zeighaina,
nathumli ngasoda miyurbingli ina yurbing kala wungrambingli akha̱-akhā sāmi;
nathumli ngasoda ina sigui katongabing akha̱-akhā sāmi;
nathumli ngasoda ina siguigari kala siguigari katongbing akha̱-akhā sāmi;
nathumli ngasoda ina khararnaosanli akha̱-akhā sāmi;
nathumli ngasoda ina yaronnao ngalānaobingli akha̱-akhā sāmi;
nathumli ngasoda ina yaokahoma kala awui yaoshangli akha̱-akhā sāmi;
nathumli ngasoda ina luikhavānao kala awui yarkongli akha̱-akhā sāmi;
nathumli ngasoda ina ngalei khamungabing kala kathānabingli akha̱-akhā sāmi.”
“Babylon kala Chaldeanaobing, athumna Zionli makaphā ot kasāsā saikora chiwui vang nathumwui miktāli ina athut khuimira da
“Yanglu, okathui saikora shimān khangasaka, O phungrei!
Ipāng eina nali lungkaiwui eina shireotā ngasakta,
mei kachuiya phungrei ngasā ngasakra da
Achitheknaowui vang nawui eina ngalung akhala makhuimara,
shimphungawui vangla makhuimara;
kha katang eina tangda masāvaiki kaje sāthuichaohaora da
“Ngaleitungli philān shunlu,
miyurbingwui ngachaili talla̱ khonglu;
ali rai ngarar khavai yurbingli khangarān sālu,
ali ngasung khavai wungrambing hovālu,
Ararat, Minni, Ashkenazli;
ali ngasung khavai raithāna akha phāsanglu,
mariktik kahai khaohli ngayāda siguibing khuirālu.
Ali ngarar khavai yurbing ngarānlu,
Medeswui awungabing athumwui ngalei
khamungbing kala athi kazangbing,
kala athumna mungda khalei ngalei kachiva̱.
Ngaleina nganuka kala ngasheida leolanga,
kaja Babylonwuitungli
ngarān kahai chi mangacheimana;
Babylonli ramcho ngasakta mi maokthuilui khavai vang.
Babylonwui kapingabing rai khangarar ngasāmhaira,
athumna raipanlungli pamhaira;
athumwui yāng kānhaira,
pangshap makathuk sha̱nao thāhaira,
athumwui pamkhavai mei chuihaira,
veiruithingbingla tekserhaira.
Awungawui keinung apam kachiva̱li khuithuihaira da hāngkhavai mi akhana khangatei akhali paome akhana khangatei paomeli hāngzata.
Tara̱ eina maruiphin kahai chila khuihaira,
raipanla mei thottāmihaira,
kala raimibing ngacheeshunhaira.
Kaja Israelwui Vare saikorawui
Babylonwui naongalāva̱ mā naikakhui atamwui lanpum kathāna;
kasha̱kha leilaga awui mākahāt atam rāura.”
Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna ili mayuisanghaira,
ana ili sākazammihaira;
ana ili khamasai ham sāngasakhaira,
khangayei thāda ana ili mayuisanghaira,
iwui zākaphā, mangkaphā eina ana wuk chipemhaira,
ana ili pheoshokhaira.
“Ili kala ichināngarāli sākashi kasā thāda Babylonwuitungli tāranu,”
Zionwui mibingna hāngranu.
“Iwui ashee Chaldeawui mibingli tāranu”
da Jerusalemna hāngranu.
Chiwui vang
“Yanglu, ina nawui vang phayatmira kala athut hāngsangmira.
Awui shamadru ina chithenmira kala ura̱la chithenhaora.
Babylon sākathānmihaida ja̱tāda khorkazam kahaipam sāra, ramfapam,
khipākha maokthuimada khangachee kala kakasipam ngasāra.
Kazingkha̱ thāda athumna khangangrumra,
kazingkha̱nao thāda nirra.
Athum meiwon thāda sālakha ina athumli phāchizātra ning mashimānranglakha eina tangda marip ngasakra pivāchanghaida mathuiluilakmara
da
Sā taikathatpamli yaola mela shimen khavā thāda sāmira.”
“Babylon kathāda khuithuihao,
okathui katongana masot khami tanghaira!
Babylon yurbingwui ngachaili kathada ngachee-ngachā khavai ngasāhao!
Yireina Babylonli shokkhuihaira;
ali tara̱ khangaphaona ngaphumhaira.
Awui keinungbing khangachee-khangachā ngasāthuihaira,
kazing kakāng siwuk,
mi khipākha maokathuiya ngalei,
kala khipākhawui naona mamakānkhavā ngalei ngasāhaira.
Belli ina Babylonli tandi mira,
kala akhamorna mayuisang kahai malatshok ngasakra.
Yurbingna awuili malongvalui mara,
Babylonwui phākho kongluihaira.
Iwui mibing, awui eina shokulu!
Ngalei hili raipao kashā atamli nathumwui ning mashimān ngasakalu kala mangacheealu;
kumkhawui alungli pao akha kashā tharan,
kha-leilaga khangatei kumli kashā tharan, lamli khangashao kashok chitharan,
khamunga akhana akhali ngahei khangarok chānpao kashā chitharan.
Chiwui vang eina yanglu, atam chi rārāli,
Babylonwui meoma̱li ina tandi khami tharan;
awui ngalei katonga maishi ngasakra,
kala sāthat kahai awui mi saikora awui chānreili pitāra.
Babylonwuitungli mathānda laa sāra;
kaja, sakakathāna chi atungshongwui eina rārā da
Israelwui mi pitā kahaibingwui vang Babylonla pitāra,
kaja okathuili pitā kahai saikora Babylonwui vang einana.”
“Raikhaiwui eina yāmshok kahai nathum,
zatlu, manganingpamalu.
Katāvawui eina
kala nathumwui ningli Jerusalem rāzangranu.
‘Ithumli khayak ngasakhaira,
kaja khamachin chi ithumna shai;
maikashina ithumwui mai farorhaira,
kaja yur khangateibingna
Chiwui vang eina yanglu,
atam chi rārādalei da
apam saikora, kala meoma̱bingwuitungli ina bichar kasā tharan khamā sākaza̱bingna ngahuira.
Babylonna kazingli yongkālala,
ngavei kajuiya ana ngaveilala,
iwui eina sākakhayānga chi awuili rāra da
“Nganālu, Babylonwui kachapkhon!
Kachungkha kashimānwuikhon,
Chaldea ngaleiwui eina shai!
Kaja
kala kapingakhon va̱rihai ngasakta lei.
Athumwui khangaphaowuikhon kong kachungkhawui thāda shai.
Kaja sākashimāna china Babylonwuitungli rāhaira;
awui rai kapingabingli khuithuihaira,
awui malāthing akha̱ sāda sātekmiserhaira;
kaja,
ana kachangkhatta hanmiluira.
Awui wungnaobing, thangkhamabingli,
khamungabingli, raithānabingli, kala
rai kapingabingli marip ngasakra;
athumna pida petchanghaora,
mathuimathukluimara da Awunga, awui ming
saikorawui
Saikorawui
Babylonwui shātho kahai phākho chi ngaleili ngachammira,
awui kajujuiya ngavei mei thottāmihaora.
Mibingna aremawui vang ngalang zarra,
kala yurbingna athum khalatta meiwui vangmāng chotchānga.”

Judahwui awunga Zedekiahna mungda khamate kum, Jeremiah marān eina awunga Babylonli ngasokhava tharan, Mahseiahwui nao Neriahna kapharā Seraiahli Jeremiahna kakaso tui china. Seraiahna lan kasinga sāsai.
Babylonli kalākashi shokki kaji tui saikora chi Jeremiahna lairik akhali kapikhui.
Kala Jeremiahna Seraiahli hānga: “Babylonli khavā tharan nana tui saikora hi apāchitheira,
kala ‘O
Lairik hi nana pākup kahai thili ngalung akha hili hokshānlaga Euphrateswui alungthungli horsanghaolu,
kala, ‘Ina kalākashi khuirāki kajiwui vang, Babylon hithāda ngaphumchanghaida mangaphongshokluilakmara’ da hānglu.”
Hieina tangda hi Jeremiahwui tuibingna.
Zedekiahna awunga kasā tharan kum maga̱da akha kāshunghairasai; kala ana Jerusalemli kum tharāda akha munga. Ava̱va̱li Hamutal hoi, Libnahwui Jeremiahwui naongalāva̱na.
Jehoiakimna sākahai saikora chithāda anala
Kachangkhatta
Kala Zedekiahna Babylonwui awungali ngakaishihaowa.

Ana mungda kachiko kum, kachāng katharāwui zimiksho katharāthang, Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna awui raimi saikora thānphungda Jerusalemli shanga, kala athumna kuinamhaida kuimareilaga rairui sai.
Chithāda Awunga Zedekiahna khamung kum tharāda akha kākashung eina tangda kuinama.
Kachāng khamatewui zimiksho kachikothang, zāt saknāhaida, ram chiwui mibingwui vang zāt zākhavai maleithuwa.

Chieina athumna keinung alungli akhur akha sakhaikhuida; raimi saikora ngayāshong keinung chiwui phākho khaniwui ngachaili khalei awungawui yāmguivāk khalei ngavei eina, Chaldeanaobingna keinung kuimareilakha yāmshokhaowa. Kala Arabahshong yāmvāhaowa.
Kha Chaldeawui raimibingna awungali kharomvai, kala Zedekiahli Jerichowui tampākli angaphankhui; kala awui raimi saikorala kachāyām eina yāmhaowa.
Athumna awungali tukkhuida ali Hamath ngaleiwui Riblahli Babylonwui awungawui pāngli khuiungmi; kala awuitungli tuitak tāmi.
Babylonwui awungana Zedekiahwui naomayarabingli awui miktāli shaothathaowa, kala Judahwui wungnao saikorala Riblahli shaothatserhaowa.
Ana Zedekiahwui mik latshokmihaowa, kala mari khānghui eina khalaphaowa, kala Babylonwui awungana Babylonli khuiungda awui kathi zimiksho eina tangda phātopli sanghai.
Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarna mungda tharāda kachiko kum, kaphangā kachāng zimiksho katharāthang, Babylon awungawui otram khangatha̱a shantriwui kathāna Nebuzaradanna Jerusalemli vāzanga.
Ana
Kala shantri kathānali ngasokhavā Chaldeawui raimibingna Jerusalemwui kuikhamarei ngavei sākhaiserhaowa.
Kala shantriwui kathāna Nebuzaradanna chāmmeikap kajibing, keinungli notha kahaibing, kala Babylon awungali ayāmkasangbing kala pāngthem kathembingli tukthuihaowa.
Kha Nebuzaradan shantriwui kathānana chāmkhamataia kaikhali drakhā yāmgui kala lui vākhavai haihaowa.

Kala athumna hambing, belja, mei yaikhavaibing, chichāp khavaibing, khongsaibing, nganamkaphā otyurwui vang akhongbing, kala Khorumshimwui otram khangatha̱li kasinga pithrai eina kasā ot saikora khuithuihaowa.

Kala kokluinaobing, meiyaikhongbing, khongsaibing, hamnaobing, thaomei shonbing, nganamkaphā otyur riktā khavai khongpheibing, kala ra̱shakchigatwui vang ra̱kharek kharek khavai kokluibing pongthuiserhaowa. Shantriwui kathāna china sinawui ot sinā eina, lupasāwui ot lupasā eina khuithuiserhaowa.
Solomon awungana
Pakra̱ chi akhana khuining tharāda chishata, kuikhamarei khuining tharāda khani, kala kashā pāngmayapar matina, kala alung choroya.
Atungli pithraiwui akui sāsanga, akui akhawui kasāng khuining phangāya, kala chili kuimareida sākasang kabothei chila pithrai eina sāsera. Pakra̱ akhapa chila chi tākam eina kabothei sāsangpapama.
Arapli kabothei hangchikoda tharuk kai, kuimareida sākasang shākhaya.
Shantriwui kathāna china pāngmon kharei Seriah, kala pāngmon kharei kakhaneli kazanga Zephaniah, kala khāmong khamayona shantri kathum, athumli khuithuihaowa;

kala raili kathāna akha sākasā otva̱ akhalila khui, kala keinungli leikasā awungawui hangva̱ shini, kala ram chiwui mibingli hokakhuiya raithānawui kapime, kala keinung alungli leikasā mi hangtharuklila khuithuiserhaowa.
Shantriwui kathāna Nebuzaradanna athumli khuiphungda Riblahli Babylonwui awungli khuivāmi.
Kala Babylonwui awungana Hamathwui ngaleili khalei Riblahli athumli shaothatserhaowa. Chithāda Judahli aramwui eina tukthuiserhaowa.
Nebuchadnezzarna tukthui kahai mibing chiwui mashing hina: Kashine kum, Jehudi thing kathum maga̱da kathum;
Nebuchadrezzarwui tharāda kachishata kum ana Jerusalemwui eina shāchishat thumrāda khani;
Nebuchadrezzarwui maga̱da kakathuma kum shantriwui kathāna Nebuzaradanna Jehudi mi shāshini hangmatida phangā; saikora ngarumda mi thingmati shātharukna.

Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimli tukthuida thumrāda kashine kum, kachāng tharāda kakhaneli, kachāng chiwui zimiksho maga̱da kaphangāthang, Babylonwui awunga Evil-merodakhna Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimli chihomihaida phātopwui eina khuishokmi haowa;
kala ali ngahānngailak eina sāda, Babylonwui wungnaobingwuitungli pam khuingasaka.
Chithāda Jehoiakimna awui phātopwui kashankachon raihaowa. Kala awui mirin chupta thangkachida awungali ngasoda phazāngarumchinga;
kala chili lāngda a mathila ringlakha eina tangda, awui thangthangwui sākhavai athishurda talop makaila michinga.
Kathāda ngachakyāng eina pamli!
Mi chiyākha nganotkasā keinung chi!
Kathāda ra̱meiva̱ kathā ngasāhao,
yurbingwui ngachaili hakmahālak eina leikasāpāva̱ chi!
Keinungbingwui alungli philava̱ sākasāva̱ chi shainao sāthuihaira.
Ana ngayā pongda soso chapa,
maisor chāra̱na pemda;
awui leishikasābing ngachaiwui eina ali ninglum khavai khipākha maleimana;
awui ngasotnao saikorana ali yomshināmhaira,
athum awui yangkashe sāthuiserhaira.
Kachotkachāngwui vang eina Judahli raithāhaira,
kala kakhananga raonao sāthuihaira;
ara ana yurbingwui alungli pamzata,
kha ngasām khavai masamphangmana;
awui kakhanangwui alungli ali kakharomabingna ngaphankhuiserhaira.
Zionli vākhavai shongfa sifaya,
kaja langchin sākahai phanitli khipākha marāmana;
awui ngavei saikora ngachakyānghaira,
awui pāngmonbingna sifaya;
anao ngalāva̱bingli shimenthuihaira
akhalattala khanang kachangkhathaira.
Awui yangkashebingna akhavā sāhaira,
awui yanggshebingna mataisanga,
khikhalajila
awui khayonkhamāng chungnā kahaiwui vang;
anaongarā thuihaira,
yangkashebingwui mangāli narkahaiabing sāthuihaira.
Zionwui naongalāva̱wui eina awui khayākakā thuiserhaira.
Awui wungnaobing seizāt makhalei khangaichao thāhaira;
sākharengnaowui eina pangshap maleila yāma.
Kakhanang ringkashi atamli achālakha awui aman kasak otyur chi Jerusalemna phaningunga.
Awui mibingna yangkashebingwui pāngli tākazang tharan,
kala ali ngachonmi khavai khipākha maleikasā tharan,
yangkashebingna zeikharuida awui kongkhaluili mana̱rora.
Jerusalemna zakshilāk eina morei sai,
chiwui vang a khamakhao ngasā kahaina;
ali khayāshikasā saikorana ali ningkachaiya,
kaja awui khamahong athumna theihaira;
mha, akhalattana ngahuiya kala amai ngareithuihaowa.
Awui makathar chi awui kashanli kāsai,
awui kathi ana maphaningmana;
chiwui vang eina awui kongkhalui zakshilāka,
ali ninglum khavai khipākha maleimana.
O
kaja yangkashebingna yuihaira!
Awui aman kasaka otyur saikora,
yangkashena ngapaithuihaira;
Mha, yurbingna awui kathara shimli kaikazang ana theihaira,
nana nawui kakazipli mazangpāimara kaji athum chi.
Awui mibingna kashakazā ngahuilaga phāzata;
athumwui yāng samphanglui khavai athumwui lan kashakazāwui vang yorzai.
“Yanglu, O
kaja ili ningkachaihaira.”
“Rākhamakān nathum saikora,
nathumwui vang chi khikha maningthula?
ana iwuitungli kakhanang khuirākhami thāda kakhanang katheihairala?
“Atungshongwui eina ira̱kuili mei chihotai;
ipheiwui vang ana khalen sanga;
kala ili konglui ngasaka;
ana ili nganingung haimihaira,
langpongda vānngasaka.
“Iwui khayonkhamāng hupta kaziplaga iwui kashaili khalapshānmi,
apāng eina saikora chi khalapshānmi;
chibing chi ikahungli parmihai;
ana iwui yāng shimān ngasaka;
ina mangasungkharar athumwui pāngli
“Iwui kapinga saikorali
iwui yaronnaobing sākazammi khavai ili makhamayāwui kazip akha hokhui;
drakhāra̱ kasurli naikakazam thāda Judahwui kachinga naongalāva̱li
“Hibingwui vang ina chapta imikli chāra̱ longtai;
kaja yangdhar chishotmi khavai,
ninglumi khavai iwui eina katāva̱ thuihaowa,
iwui naomayarabing ngachakyānghaira,
kaja yangkashena yuihaowa.
“Zionna apāng katingshoka;
kha ali ninglum khavai khipākha maleimana;
Jacobli yangshi khavai
athumwui alungli Jerusalem khamakhao ngasāthuihaira.
kaja ina awui tuili ngakaishihaowa,
kha nathum saikora, nganālu,
kala yanglu iwui kachotkachāng yanglu;
iwui ngalānaobing eina iwui yaronnaobing tukthuiserhaira.
“Iwui leikashebingli ina ngakaowa,
kha athumna ili minamhaowa,
iwui pāngmonbing kala khararnaobingla pangshap samphang khavai kashakazā phāzatlakha,
keinunglungli shimānhaowa.
“Yanglu, O
imanglā kakhananglungli lei,
iwuklungli ining shireikazamhaira,
kaja ina ngakaishishunhaowa,
chānreilungli raighai eina thingasaka,
shimlungli kathi kathāna.
“Nganālu, ina kathāda ngahuili;
ili ninglum khangasak khipākha maleimana.
Iwui yangkashe saikorana iwui kakhanang shāhaira;
hi nana kasāna da athumna ringphai.
Nana chishāt kahai zimiksho chi khuirālu athumla iwui hitharanu.
“Iwui khayonkhamāngwui vang ili kasā thāda
athumwui makaphā kasā theimida tandi milu,
kaja iwui khangahui mahāngrarmana kala iwui ning vānhaira.”
Malungkhavātwui alungli
muiyāzingli kathāda haihaokhala!
Ana Kazingramwui eina okathuili Israelwui tekhamatei hortāhaira;
awui malungkhavāt atamli awui pheinai eina tangda maphaningungmana.
awui malungkhavātwui alungli ana Judahwui naongalāva̱wui raipanla sha̱shiruimiserhaira;
wungram eina khamungabingli maishi ngasakta,
ngaleizingli khuitāmihaira.
Malungvātsir eina Israelwui pangshap saikora sātekmihaira;
yangkashebingwui miktāli awui yāpang khuithuihaowa;
meiwon thāda Jacobwui kuikhamareili khalei saikora ana thottāhaowa.
Yangkashe thāda malā ana hunhaira,
yangkashe thāda yapāng khānga;
kala Zion naongalāva̱wui kachonshimlungli ana ithumwui mikna yangkhangai saikora sāthatserhaira;
awui malungkhavāt chi mei thāda heitāhaira.
Yangkashe thāda
Israelli sākazamhaira.
Ana konung saikora sākazammihaira,
raipanbing sākathānmihaira.
Judah naongalāva̱wui sikafa,
chapchāt mataisang ngasaka.
Awui langchin sākahai phanitshim;
yāmguiwui rām thāda pheimihaira,
Zionli
kala lungvāt eina awunga kala pāngmonbingli chinserhaira.
kala katharapam nothāhaira;
awui konungwui phākhobing yangkashibingli horsangmihaira;
Zionwui naongalāva̱wui phākho shimān ngasak khavai
ana chiwui leirin khānhaira;
shimān khangasakwui eina apāng makhāmmana;
ana raipan eina phākholi chapngachā ngasakta athum khanang ngaruma.
Awui ngaveila ngaleili ngaphumhaira;
marila akha̱ sāthuiserhaira;
awui awunga kala wungnaobing miyurbingwui alungli lei;
ainla maleiluimana,
kala awui marānbingla
Zionwui naongalāva̱wui ararbingna akhon akhak mashokla ngaleili pama;
athumna bora ngavaida kuili hotla neowa;
Jerusalemwui ngalānaobingna kui mashunda ngaleili yangzanga.
Imik chāra̱ tāsānhaira;
imanglā kakhananglungli lei;
Iwui mibingwui naongalāva̱wui kashimānwui vang,
khikhalajila naoshinaobing angangnaobing kathaina keinungwui chānreili vānserhaowa.
Athumna ava̱va̱ ngarāli,
“Zāt kala drakhāra̱ kali leili?”
da keinungwui chānreili khamā kaza̱ mi thāda athumna vānda pikatā tharan,
kala ava̱ ngarāna avam eina thihaowa.
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱!
Ina nawui vang khi hāngra? Nali khi eina chānsamsido?
O Zionwui kachinga naongalāva̱,
ina nali ninglum khavai khi eina suira?
Kaja nawui kashimān shamadru khamashā thai;
nali khipāna khāngmathotra?
Kaja nawui marānbingna nawui vang khangui,
kala kakapik mahāmi;
nawui shimlui hanshok khavai athumna nawui khayonkhamāng machitheimana,
kha nawui vang khamarān tui chi kachipat kala thānkhanguina.
Shongfa rākhamakān saikorana nali athumwui pāng kapherora;
athumna kasida kala kui khayitta,
Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱li,
“Okathuiwui khamathā kākashungva saikorawui mathān khavai keinung chi hila?” da athumna zei.
Nawui yangkashebingna ngashānyangda mana̱shi,
athumna kasiya, ahā kachat-kachipa,
athumna, “Ithumna ali sākhayāngmihaira!
Iya, zimiksho hi ithumna honkasāna;
ara ithumna hi samphangda; theihaira!”
da athumna vaowa.
ana ngarān kahai chi sāhaira,
mangapatma achā hāngkahai thāda,
ana lukhamashan maleila sakhayāngmihaira;
ana yangkashibingli nawuitungli mathān ngasaka,
kala nawui yangkashewui pangshapli masot mingasaka.
O Zionwui naongalāva̱!
Nawui chāra̱ kong khalong thāda ngathor ngazin longshon longthairanu!
Na khalatta mangasāmkhui ngasakalu namikla mangasāmkhuiaranu!
Ngakarthuilu, ngayāshong ngakaolu,
ngayā khamayon haokaphok tharan;
chānrei haokaphokpam kachida kathaiwui eina vānda khalei nanao ngarāwui mirinwui vang napāng katingshoklu.
Yanglu, O
Khipāli nana hithāda sāyanghaira?
Ava̱ ngarāna athumwui khaluma naongarāli shairala?
Pāngmon kala marānli kathara shimli shaothatrala?
Khararnaosan mateila chānrei chifatungli pitai;
iwui yāron ngalā raighai eina pitāhaira;
nana malungvātshunhaithang athumli lukhamashan maleila sāthatserhaira.
Langchin sākahai phanitli hokakhui thāda,
apam kachiva̱wui eina nana ina khangacheebingli hokhui;
kala
Ina pharākakhui kala lumtir eina nganaokakhuibing chili,
yangkashebingna sākazamhaowa.
Awui malungkhavātwui sājeili
kachotkachāng theikahai mi chi ina;
kahor makhaleipam, tangkhamangli kashamvāda ili chizata.
Kachangkhatta, iwuitungli apāngna langpongda latlui latluida shaopama.
Iphasā kala ahui ana shimān ngasakta,
ara̱kuila yapkachupmiserhaira;
kakhanang kachot sipkasāwui alungli ili tuknarhaowa.
Achā thikahai mi thāda ana ili tangkhamangli pamngasaka.
Ana ili mayāmshokpai khavai phākho ngaveikhama;
ana ili kharita mari khānghui eina khalaphai.
Ngachonmi khavai ina ngakaolala,
iwui seihā kasā ana makhuisangmimana;
Iwui apong ana shānkakhui ngalung eina phinmihaowa,
iwui shongfa khayeikazammihaowa.
Iwui vanga a rimkapama singom thai,
rimkapama kazingkha̱ thai;
shongfa kānda ili thānthuihaida ili serkazama,
ana ili ngachakyāng ngasakhao;
awui malā hunda malāthingna ili pāntamnganaowa.
Awui malākhongwui malāthing imalungli kāpsangmihaowa;
I mi saikorawui mana̱shi khavai ngasāhaira,
langpongda mibingwui laa eina mana̱shida khanang ngasaka.
Ana ili kakhā ara̱ eina chipemmi,
ana thingkhā eina sānngasaka.
Ana iwui ahāla lunghailātungli nurngasaka,
kala ili hotlāwui alungli ngakhor ngasaka.
Imanglā chingri kahai maleimana,
ringkaphā kaho chi I malaihaira;
Chieina ina hānga, “Iwui tekhamatei thuihaira,
kala
Iwui kachot, iwui mirin-kashi,
thingkhā eina athi kathā phaningungmilu.
Imanglāna chi phaningungchinga kala ining kurhaowa.
Kha hi ina phaningunga,
kala chiwui vang ina kachihān lei:
awui lukhamashan katang mavaimana;
ngathor kachida athum chi dharchinga,
nawui ning katong chi hakmahālaka.
“Iwui vang
“Chiwui vang ina ali chihānra.”
Nganuilakha mi akhana kharit otphun kaphung awui vang phālaka.
Ali kachiphun tharan,
kasaikha ja̱pamranu;
chifali akhamor chizunlaga pamranu kachihān leisāpai;
kashaowabingli amai ja̱miranu,
kala zeikakharui eina chipemranu.
Kaja
kha, ana khanang ngasaklala,
awui makhavāta makhangachei leikashi chiwui athishurda ana lumashanmira;
kaja mayāngairareo makhanang ngasakmana lah miwui naomayarabingli machot ngasakngaimana.
Okathuiwui phātop saikora pheizingli naikazam khavai;
juikhamataiawui miktāli mi akhawui mashun khayeithuimihai khavai,
mi akhawui ngalang masho-ngacheimi khavai
Kashila kaphāla Reikhamataiawui eina kashok maningmala?
Khisāda kharinga mi akhana, awui moreiwui vang tandi khami tharan mamayāngaimana chipairakhala?
Ithumwui apong ithum khalatta machukyangsa,
kala tamyangda
Kazingramli khalei Vareli wuklung kala pāng khāngkāda seihā sāsa:
“Ithumna ngakaishida morei sāhaira,
kala nana mapheomiranga.
“Nana malungkhavāt eina shaksāda,
ithumli kharomkhuida lukhamashan maleila shaothata;
nana muiyā eina shaksāda ithumwui seihā kasā makāshung khavai sai.
Ithumli mibingwui alungli thothāp thāda horhaida masā khavai sāngasakhaowa.
“Ithumwui yangkashe saikorana mana̱shida zei,
kashimān kala sākakhayāng,
khangachee kala tātungkapaina ithumli yuihaira.
Iwui mibingwui naongalāva̱li sākashimānwui vang imikli chāra̱ kongra̱ thāda longa.
“Iwui chāra̱ khangasām mavaila longshon longthaira;
keinungwui naongalāva̱ saikorawui kalākashi hi theilaga,
imikna ili wukhanang ngasaka.
“Angalang maleila ili yangkashebingna vānao thāda ngatānzata;
chomli kharing eina horsangda iwuitungli lunggui horsanga;
tara̱na ili tumhaida, I ashimān hina da ina hānga.
“Kathuka chomwui eina, O
namingli ina ngakaoli;
nana iwui khangakao shāmilu, ‘Ili ngachonmi khavai khavao nakhanā makafakhamihailu!’
Ina khangakao tharan nana rānganaimida ‘Mangacheealu!’ da nana hānga.
“O
nana imirin ngatangmihaira.
O
iwui mashun bichar sāmilu.
Athumna ili athut kakhui saikora,
ili thikhavai kasā saikora nana theihaira.
“O
ili thikhavai kasā saikora nana theihaira.
Langpongda iwuitungli machukta sui sai.
Yanglu, athumna ngathor eina thuida ngazin eina tangda,
ili mana̱shinganaowa.
“O
Athumli khonshida ngachāngchatsui kahai ning milu;
Nana malungkhavāt eina athumli kharomra kala nawui kazingramzingli athumli sāshimānra O
Sināna kathāda yumsihao,
sinā kachanga kathāda ngacheihao!
Kathara ngalungbing chānrei haophok khavai kachida horkathānserhaira.
Zionwui naomayarabing akachanga sinā thāda aman kasakabing,
kathāda ngaleiham kasaawui them thada khuihao!
Kharāng eina tangda anaobingli na̱ shimanda nganaokhui,
kha iwui mibingwui naongalāva̱ lamhāngwui ostrich thāda sāshilaka.
Na̱ mangda khalei naobingla ra̱kachangna akārakli male napshānhaira;
naoshinaobingna zāt poi,
kha khipākhana mamizāmana.
Morchātlak eina zākasābing ara shongfali thingakanda lei;
sophayori eina khamathāthā sāri kasābing hotlāli ngaleopida lei.
Sodomli kashong kharāng pāng masāza̱la mikkhayipkhalungli kashimānli lāngmeida iwui mibingwui naongalāva̱li khamachinna hakmei.
Awui wungnaobing horamli tharmeisai, seina̱li charmei;
athumwui phasā shamadruwui kachar lunghārli
athumwui maipan hānshi kahai sapphire thai.
Ara athumwui mai hamakli zikmeihaira,
shongfali athumwui azak mamachutkhuirarmana;
athumwui ahuila ara̱kuili nganarshānhaida thing katheng thāhaira.
Chāmthit eina kathibingle raighai eina kathibing ringphāmei,
luiwui athei-arai ningchāngchāngda khanangda ngairon eina khumthathaira.
ava̱ ngarāna kachichāwui khalumanao khalatta hangshai.
Zionli mei sa̱katā china shimphungabingla chuitup tāhaowa.
Okathuiwui awungabingna mashitsangmana,
lah apuk-apagawui mibingnala mashitsangmana,
kaja yangkashena Jerusalemwui ngaveili zangshaprada.
Awui alungli khangarongwui ashee tākhangasaka marānbingwui morei,
pāngmonbingwui khayonkhamāngwui vangna.
Athumna ngapeoda, chānreili yaozata;
ashee eina sākhamānghaida khipānakha athumwui kashankachon masāza̱ngaimana.
“Thulu! Makathara!” da mibingna athumli kashama.
“Thulu! Thulu! Masāza̱alu!”
Chieina athum yāmkazata, yaokazata sāthuihaowa.
yurbingwui alungli mibingna, “Athum ithumli mangayurpamluimara” da hāng ngaroka.
ana khipālikha matheimiluimara;
pāngmonbingli khayākashi maleiluimana;
khararnaoli malumluimara.
Aremali ngachonmi khavai yangpamshonda ithumwui mik ngazanhaira;
ithumna yangkapamli mangachonmikharar yur akhali yangpama.
Yangkashebingna ithumwui shongfalila mazatpai khavai ithumwui pheikār shurzata;
ithumwui khangachang nganaihaira;
ithumwui atamla shānphokhaira ithumwui khangachang rāhaira.
Kazingramli yongkazata khalāng sāshaili ithumli kakharombingna thākmei;
athumna ithumli phungreili kharomkai,
athumna lamhānglila ithumli rimpama.
ithumwui nātangkhurwui eina kashok khaksui athumwui chomli sangmihaowa,
“Awui khaya̱li yurbingwui alungli ithum okthuira” da ithumna kahānga chi.
Mathānlu, kala ringphalu, O Edomwui naongalāva̱,
Uz ngaleili somkapama;
kha nalila tengkot chi kānrāra;
maripreihaida nakhalatta raihailaga mahonghat eina zatra.
O Zionwui naongalāva̱, nawui khayonkhamāngwui vang kashong khalāng kuphaira,
ana nali maraithāluimara;
kha O Edomwui naongalāva̱, nawui khayonkhamāngwui vang kashong lāngra,
nawui morei ana phongshokmira.
O
yanglu, ithumwui maikashi hi katheimilu.
Ithumwui shimluikat kha̱minaoli mikāhaira,
ithumwui shimla zakmai makathei mili mihaira.
Ithum marānao, avāva̱ makhalei ngasāhaira;
Ishāva̱ ngarā ra̱meinaobing thāhaira.
Ithumna mangda khalei tara̱wui vang aman miphalungra,
ithumna samkaphang thingla lokhuiphalungra.
Ithumwui kahungli kashai parda panglāk eina kashama;
ithum chothaira, ithumli khangasāmla mangasāmkhui ngasakmana.
Zāshap samphang khavai Egyptli kala Assyriali ithumwui pāngli mihaira.
Ishāvā ngarāna morei sai, athum maleiluimana;
kala ithumna athumwui khayonkhamāng phunga.
Raonaobingna ithumwuitungli munga;
athumwui pāng eina ithumli kanshok khavai khipākha maleimana.
Ithumwui manglā hamlaga kashakazā samphanga,
lamhāngli raighai khaleiwui vang.
Chāmwui kachui kasā china,
ithumwui ahui leirang kasā thāda sai.
Zionli preiva̱̱ ngarāli;
Judah keinungli kachingva̱ ngalānaobingli sākhamāngmihaowa.
Wungnaobingli athumwui pāng eina kangyuihai,
khararnaobingli khayākashila machitheimana.
Yaronnaobingli tandi eina mā rungngasaka;
kala naoshinaobingna chakchāngchāng thing phungzata.
Kasarnaobing keinungwui ngavei eina thuihaira,
yaronnaobingna laa masāluimana.
Ithumwui ningwui khamathānla ngasāmhaira;
ithumwui pheichak kasā sikafa onhaira.
Kuihon ithumwui kuiwui eina tātunghaira;
kakhanang ithumwui ngasāranu,
kaja ithumna morei sāhaira!
Hiwui vang ithum ning kazāhaowa,
hiwui vang ithumwui mikla māmāchahaira,
kaja Zion Kaphung ngachakting eina khaleiwui vang,
ramfana chiwuitungli yaozata.
Kha O
nawui wungpamkhong thot saikora vāshunga.
Khisāthuda nana ithumli malaichaohaokhala?
Khisāthuda nana ithumli hirankha horhaokhala?
Ithumli nakhalattali khuisangmiluilu, O
chithāda ithumli khuisangluipaira!
Achālakhawui thāda ithumwui atamla chitha ngasaklu.
Maningkha nana ithumli horchao kahaila?
Nana ithumli malungvātlākhaola?
Kachāng chiwui kaphangāthang (Awunga Jehoiachinli raithā kahai kaphangā kumna,)
Chaldea ngaleiwui Chebar kongpheili
Ina yangda leilakha, yanglu, atungshongwui eina siphan zingrot ngasha̱da, muiyā kashāva̱, kuimareida horchāmri eina mei horshon-horthaida, meilung chi pithrai ruimaling kahai kathā akha shoka.
Kala chiwui alungwui eina kharinga sāyur tākam eina mati shoka. Athumwui azak chi hithai: miwui angum thai,
kha athum kachiva̱ amai matiti kai, kala angachāng matiti kai.
Athumwui phei ngatarteihai, kala athumwui pheimayā seinaopheithai, kala pithrai kashutkharik kahai thāda hinga.
Angachāngwui azing ayar matili mipāng kai. Athum matiwui zakmai kala angachāngbing chi hithai:
angachāng akha eina akha ngasuna, athumna kazat tharan mangareiungla kachichāwui mangāshong angatar eina zata.
Athumwui mai chi chithai. Athumwui angachāngbing chi atungli harkai; sāyur kachiva̱ angachāng khanini kai, akhawuina khangateiwuili angasuna, kala khangatei khani china athum phasāli farorripa.
Kala athum kachiva̱ angatar eina mangāshong zata; manglāna kazazat chili mangareiunglakla zata.
Kala kharinga sāyurbing china rikhān khangashei thāda yongung yongvā sai.
Kāngphei chiwui azak kala sākakhui asak chi hithai: athumwui azak kahāna chrysolite thai, matiti chi ngaraichāsera, athumli sākakhui chi kāngphei akhawui alungli khangatei akha khangashom thai.
Athumna zatakha, mangareiunglakla, kachichāwui mangā angatar eina zata.
Kāngphei mati chi akhuithing leisera, kala kasuila kāsera, kala akhuithing kuikhamareili amik pemda kai.
Kala kharinga sāyurbing china zatakha kangpheibing chila athumwui ngalemli zata, kala ngaleiwui eina kaakha athumla kai.
Manglāna khavāvāpam kachida athumla shura; kaja kharinga sāyurbing chiwui manglā kāngphei chili lei.
Athumna zatakha zatra, nganingakha nganinga; kala athumna ngaleiwui eina kaakha, kāngbing chila ngasokai; kaja kharinga sāyurbing chiwui manglā kāngpheibing chili lei.
Sirāram chiwui azingli athumwui angachāng ngatartei eina hārshokta akhawuina akhali ngasunkhui; kala sāyur ava̱va̱wui angachāng khanina phasāli farorripa.

Athumna kazat tharan angachāngwui khon kongrā kachungkha kathuikhon thāda ina shai, Sāshap pangshapawui kazing khangashum thai, kala rai ashangva̱wui ngawunrop kahai akhon thai; athumna kasaikha nganinghaiakha athumwui angachāngbingla haizanghaowa.
Athumna angachangbing haizanghaida kasaikha khanganing tharan, athumwui kuishakli khalei sirāram chiwui eina akhon akha vaotai.

Awui kashān katha chiwui eina thuilaga atungshong meili ruimaling kahai kahinga pithrai thai; kala awui kashān kathā chiwui eina thuilaga azingshong chiya meiwon thai, kala ali kuimareida horchamri hai.
Kazing rothang changjeengawut kashok thāda, kuimareida kahor chila chithai.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, ngakarthuilu, ina nali ngazekra.”
Kala ana ili kahāng tharan Manglā china ili zangmida thuinganing ngasaka; kala ana kahāng chi ina shai.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, ina nali ili ngakaikashia miyur Israel mibingli chihovāra, athum kala avāva̱ ngarāna aja eina tangda ngakaishida lei.
