Mibing hi achei makathei kala ngakaikashebingmānga: nali athumwuili chihovāda nana hithāda ahāngra, ‘Proho VAREna hithāda hānga.’
Athumna nganāsanglala manganāsanglala, (kaja athum ngakaikashe shimkhurna) marān akha athumwui alungli leihairasai kaji hi athumli theikhuiranu.

“Kala miwui naomayara na, athumli mangacheealu, chili lāngda athumwui tuili mangacheealu; nana ka̱shāt-ka̱renglungli zatlala kala nana seithattungli pamlala; athumwui tuili mangacheealu, kala athumwui azak yanglaga mangacheealu, kaja athum hiya ngakaikashi shimkhurna.
Kala nana athumli iwui tui ahāngra, athumna nganāsanglala manganāsanglala; kaja athuma ngakaikashi shimkhurna.
Kala ina khayang tharan, yanglu, mipāng akha ili katingrai, kala yanglu, lairik akhalui akha singsai;
kala ana iwui mangāli chi hārchithei; kala chiwui mangāli kala khanukli kapisang kahai thei, kala chili chapkhangachā, sikafa kala kakhanangwui tui kapisanghaisai.
Chieina ina khamor makai, kala ana akhalui chi shaikhavai ili mi.
Kala ana ili hithāda hānga, “Miwui naomayara, ina khami akhalui hi shailaga nawuk chieina chipemlu.” Chieina ina chi shaihaowa, kala chi ikhamorli khuira̱wui kashim thai.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, Israelwui shimkhurli vāda iwui tui eina athumli ahānglu.
Kaja ana ili atui-arā makashā kala mashākhararra miwui ngaleili kachiho maningmana, kha Israelwui shimkhurlina—
nana makashā tuiyur khangatei kala bhap matākhararra tui khamatui miyur kachungkhawui mangāli maningmana. Kachangkhat eina chikathāpamli nali chihosi kaja athumna nawui tui nganāsangra.
Kha Israelwui shimkhurna nali manganāsangmara, kaja athumna iwui tui manganāngaimana. Khikhalajila Israelwui shimkhur saikora mai kashāmāng kala wuklung khamakangmānga.
Yanglu, athumwui mai kashā, khayā makhangarin thāda ina nalila maishā ngasakhaira.
Nakhavei khamarar marili mararmeida sāmihaira; athumli mangacheealu, kala athumwui azakli mangacheealu, kaja athum hiya ngakaikashe shimkhurna.”
Chili lāngda ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, ina kahāng saikora hi nganātitkhuida nawuklungli hailu.
Kala vāda, nawui raithā kahai mibingli, ‘Proho VAREna hithāda hānga’; da athumna khuisanglala makhuisanglala ahānglu.”
Chiwui thili Manglā china ili khāngkāhaowa, kala
chi sāyurbing chiwui angachāng eina angachāng saza̱ khangarok, kala chili lāngda kāngphei chiwui akhon china neina̱ kakhanuk kathāwui akhon kashokna.
Manglā china ili khāngkāda khuithuihaowa, kala iwuitungli
kala Chebar kong ngalemli raithā kahaibingna pamkhavai Tel-abibli ina vai. Chili chotnahaoda athumwui alungli shinithang apama.
“Miwui naomayara, Israel shimkhurwui vang ina nali khamayona akha sāngasakhaira; ikhamorwui eina kahahāng tui chi nana kashā tharan athumli iwui miktāli hāngmathinmiki kajina.”

Makhayā mili ina, na thiphalungra da hānglaga nana ali mahāngmathinakha, kala kahui samphang khavai awui makhayāwui eina ungkhavai kahāngla ali mahangchitheiakha, makhayā mi chi awui moreiwui vang thiphalungra, kha awui ashee nawuitungli tāra.
Kha nana makhayā mili hāngmathinlaga ana awui makhayā otwui eina, lah makaphā apongwui eina malatungakha, awui khayonkhamāng alungli thiphalungra; kha nali huimihaora.

Latluida, “Kalikha khamashunga mina awui khamashung khangarongwui eina ngareithuihaiakha, kala ina ali phei ngaphok khavai saakha, a thiphalungra; khikhalajila nana ali mahāngmathinmana, awui moreiwui vang a thiphalungra, kala ana khangarong otsak kasa saikora maphaningungmara; kha awui ashee nawuitungli tāphalungra.
Kalikhada nana khangaronga mi chili morei masā khavai hāngmathinakha, kala ana morei masaakha, ā ringlakra, khikhalajila ana hāngkhamathinli khuisanga; kala nalila namanglā huimira.”
Kala
Chieina ina ngakarthuida tampākshong vai, kala yanglu, Chebar kongpheili ina tekhamatei kathei chi tākam eina
Kha Manglā china ili zangda khangmathota, kala ili matuida hithāda hānga, “Zatlu, nawui shimli na khalatta khāmong ungtākphinhaolu.
Kala, O miwui naomayara, yanglu, seipeng nawuitungli parda nali chieina khalaphaora, chieina nana mibingwui ngachaili zatung zatvā masāpaimara;
kala ina namale akārakli nganarshanmihaora, chieina na khak ma̱haoda athumli mahāngmachinpaimara; kaja athum ngakaikashe shimkhurna.

Kha ina nali khangazek tharan ina nakhamor shomida nana matuipaida athumli, ‘Proho VARE china hithāda hānga’ da hāngra; nganāki kaje china nganākhuiranu, manganāki kaje china manganaaranu; kaja athum ngakaikashe shimkhurna.”
“Kala O miwui naomayara, chek akha khuida nawui mangāli runghailu, kala chiwuitungli Jerusalem keinungwui ama̱ sāsanglu.
Kala kuimareida rākuikhanamwui raipan, raingavei sāsanglu, chili lāngda rāmla, shaironla kuimareida sāsanglu.
Kala mariphek akha khuilaga keinung eina nawui ngachaili mari ngavei sāda runghailu; kala chili yangvālaga rai kuikhanam thāda sākhuilu. Hi Israel shimkhurwui vang khamachut sākachitheina.
“Chiwui thili nawui uishong ngashunglaga pilu, kala Israel shimkhurli ina tandi miki kaji chi nali mira; kaja nana zimiksho chiyākha pilakha eina tangda athumwui tandi chi phungpamra.
Kaja ina nali zimiksho sha̱rakha phungngasakra, kum shākathum hangchiko, athumli tandi miki kajiwui zingkumli ngaraichāda phungra; kala nana chirankha khāngpamki kajina.
Kala nana chi peikahaiwui thili, pikakhane chi yāshong ngashunglaga pida Judah shimkhurwui tandi phungra; hangmatithang ina nali phungngasakra, thangkha hina kumkha kachitheina.
Nawui mai Jerusalemli kuinamkahai shong ngareivāda pāng khamasai eina keinung chili makhamayāwui tui marānra.
Kala yanglu, ina nali khara̱ eina khalaphaida nali tukkhanarwui atam mapeiranglakha eina tangda ngareishok ngareizang masāpaimara.
“Kala nana, kehu, nāpai, linglonthei, marongthei, lang kala ngum khuilaga ham akhali sangda khamui sākhuilu. Zimiksho shākathum hangchikothang nana lākhavāk ngashungda kapi atamli hi zāki kajina.
Kala zāki kaji onlaga ngarakzāra, thangthang shekel maga̱ zāra, thangkhali nana akhashida zāra.
Kala tara̱la onlaga nana mangra, lengkhor akhawui khum tharuk; thangkhali mangkha shira.
Nana shaiki kaji khamui chi athumwui miktāli miwui paihtungli sākhuiki kajina.”
Kala
Chieina ina hānga, “Iyavo Proho VARE! yanglu, I khalatta chithada masākhamānglakranga; I nganuilakha eina thuida aja rāshungda, thāda kathisā, kha̱zursā, kala kashuisā ikhamorli masanglakranga.”
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Yanglu, nawui khamui sākhavai ina nali mipaihtungli maningla seipaihtungli sāngasakra.”
Chili lāngda ana ili hithāda hānga, “Miwui naomayara, yanglu, Jerusalemwui kashakazā ina ngarakmihaora; ngacheerang eina zāt onzāra, kala tara̱la shivamri eina tammangra.
Khamang kazā vātngasakta athum akha eina akha ningkazāchir eina yangngarokta kachotkachāng phungkhavai ina hithāda shokngasaki kajina.

“Kala na, O miwui naomayara, raighai kazana akha khuilu; sam kachichāpana kasing kuisighainao thāda nakuisam eina morhā sitāhaolu, laga khān onkhavai khuida onyanglu, kala sam chi akhum eina ngayarlu.

Kakathuma khum chi khuilaga, keinung kuikhanam chi peikahai atam tharan, keinung lungli meili riktālu, khumkha chi keinung kuikhamareili raighai eina shātkazamlu; kala khumkha chi masili chiphanhaolu, chiwui thili ina raighai ahongwui eina sutshokra.
Saikora hiwui eina kateteo khuilaga nawui kachon mareili masa̱hailu.
Chiwui einala kateokha khuilaga meili horsangda riktāhaolu; chiwui eina Israel saikorawui shimkhurli mei shokra.”
Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Hi Jerusalemna; ina ali yur saikorawui alungthungli haikahaina kala keinung kachungkhana kuinam ngasaka.

Kala ana yur kateili lāngda zakshilāk eina iwui sharphahorbingli ngakaishi, kala awui kuikhamareiwui ngalei kateili lāngda iwui shiyan chikanli mamayāmana, iwui sharphahorbing khalanhaida iwui shiyan chikan mamayonlakmana.
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: Khikhalajila nali kuikhamarei yurbingli na zakshimeida iwui shiyan chikan kala sharphahorbing mamayonla, kha nali kuikhamarei yurbingna kasāsā thishurhaoda;
chiwui vang Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Yanglu, I, I eina tangda nathumli mamayāmana; yur saikorawui miktāli ina nathumli bichar sāra.
Kala nathumwui ningkakachai otsak saikorawui vang, ina masālakrang kaji kala naodala masāluilaki kaje ot chi sāra.

Chiwui vang eina nathumwui alungli avāva̱ ngarāna naongarābingli shaira; kala naongarābingna avāva̱ ngarāli shaira; kala nathumli ina bichar sāra, kala nathum kachikathāna kanshokakha ina kharingbing chi masili chiphanhaora.

Chiwui vang eina Proho VARE ina kachangkhat eina kahāng hina, khikhalajila nathumwui masākhangayi ot, ningkakachai ot saikora chi eina iwui kathara shim sākhamāng ngasakhaoda, chiwui vang nathumli ina katathaora, imikna mayangkheilakmara, kala ina malumashanmimara.

Nathum khum kathumwui akha kazātkashi eina thira kala nathumwui alungli chāmreiwui kakhum eina yumra. Khumkhana kuikhamareiwui raighaili thira, kala khum kakathumana ina masili chiphanhaida athumwui thili raighai chihovāra.
“Chithāda sāda iwui malungkhavāt chishotra, kala athumwuitungli iwui malungkhavāt hāngsangda I khalatta ningyāng ungkhuira; kala athumwuitungli iwui malungkhavāt katā tharan
Chili lāngda ina nathumli ramchomihaida chiwui kuikhamareili khalei miyurbing kala yaokharābing chiwui ngashimshi nganao khavai sāmira.
nathum shimān khavai chāmreiwui malā ina kachiho tharan, ina nathumli chāmrei chungmeikhangai chungmei ngasakra, kashakazā akhala mangaphangzāmara.
Ina chāmrei kala ramsāla nathumwuitungli chihorāra, athumna nathumwui naongarābing shimān ngasakra; kazātkashi eina ashee nathumli rāshungra; kala ina nathumwuitungli raighai chihorāra.
“Miwui naomayara, namai Israelwui phungreishong ngareivāda makhamayā tui marānlu,

kala hithāda hānglu, Israelwui phungreibing nathum, Proho VAREwui tui nganālu! Proho VAREna phungreibing kala phungrābing, kongrābing kala tampākbingli hithāda kahāngna: Yanglu, I, I eina tangdanala nathumwuitungli raighai khuirāra, kala ina nathumwui kajujuipambing sākhaimiserhaora.
Nathumwui hanphutbing ngachakyānghaora, kala nathumwui nganamkaphā riktā khavai hanphutbingla sakhaimihaora, kala nathumwui kathebing ina nathumwui meoma̱wui azingli hortāmira.
Kala ina Israel mibingwui kathingunbing chi athumwui meoma̱bingwui azingli haimira; kala ina nathumwui ara̱kui nathumwui hanphut kuimareita chaimira.

Nathumwui kapampam kachida keinung ramchohaora, kajujuipam shimānhaora, hanphutpamla chithaserra, meoma̱la sākazamhaida maphākhuithura, nathumwui nganamkaphā riktā khavai sātekmihaida nathumwui otsak saikora shimitmihaora.
Kala nathumwui alungli kathingun horphuihaira, chieina I
“Chithālala nathum ngayardale ina ringngasakra. Raighaiwui eina yāmkashokbing khangatei yurwuili yāmkhavā tharan, kala ngalei khangateili yaoyāngmi kahai tharan,

chieina mi ngaleili yāmkhavā nathum raithā kahaili khuivā kahai chitharan ili phaningungra, kaja iwui eina pākthui kahai athumwui maphākakhui ning chi ina sakhaikhami tharan, kala maphākhuilakla meoma̱li shurkazatwui mik chi ngapeo ngasakhaora; kala athum khalattawui mikyanli athum khalatta, athumna makhangayi sākahai saikora chiwui vang ningkachaira.
Chieina I

Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “Israel shimkhurna makhayā ningkakachai kasāwui vang nathumwui pāng kaphelu, kala nathumwui phei kathanglu, kala, Iyavo! da hānglu; kaja athumna raighai eina, chāmrei eina, kala kazātkashi eina thira.

Katāli khaleia a china kazātkashi eina thira, kala nganaida kapama a china raighai eina thira; kala mathila taihaikasābing china chāmrei eina thira. Chithāda ina iwui malungkhavāt athumwuitungli chishotta kupra.

Athumwui meoma̱bing, kuikhamareili khalei phungrābing kachiva̱li, phungreiton saikoratungli, khamatek thingphapheili, timfa kahai shirimthingpheili, kala athumna ningyāngkhaung nganamkaphā chigat khavai kachiva̱li athumwui kathingun pikatā chitharan I
Kala lamhāng eina thuilaga Riblah vāshungda athumwui pamkhavai pam kachiva̱li ipāng katingshoklaga shimān ngasakta ramchoserhaora. Chieina I
Kala “O miwui naomayara,” da ana hānga, “Israelwui ngaleili Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Khangachang! Ngalei hiwui achikun mati vāshungda khangachang rāhaira.
“Ara khangachang nathumwuitungli rāhaira, kala iwui malungkhavāt nathumwuitungli chihorāra, kala nathumwui ningkakachai otsak chiwui vang ina tandi mira.
Ina mayangkheimilakmara, malumashanmiluimara; kha nathumwui alungli ningkakachai ot sālakha eina tangda ina nathumli tandi mira. Chieina I
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Ka̱lāshatwuitungli kalāshāt! Yanglu, chi rārāli.
Akatanga rāhaira, akatang chi rāhaira; nathumli mamayāmada chi ngakarthuihaira. Yanglu, chi rāhaira.
O ngalei hili khaleibing, nathumwui athit unghaira; atam chi rāhaira, zimiksho chi nganaihaira; ngaunlop kahaiwui zimiksho, phungreili khamathān kasākhon maningmana.
“Ara iwui malungkhavāt nathumwuitungli tāra, lungthot eina ngasoda nathumwui otsak athishurda bichar sāra; kala ningkakachai ot saikorawui vang tandi mira.
Ina mayangkheimilakmara, lukhamashanla maleimara; ningkakachai ot sālakha eina tangda nathumwui kasākhavā athishurda tandi mira. Chieina tandi khame chi
Yanglu, zimiksho chi! Yanglu, chi rāhaira. Nathumwui athit rāhaira, makhamashung wonphokhaira, langkaso shonshokhaira.
Khangazai chi makapha-makhayāwui lijei ngasāthuihaira; athumwui makhavātla, athumwui lanla; chili lāngmeida tekhamateila maleiluimara.
Atam chi rāhaira, zimiksho chi nganaihaira. Khalona mamathānaranu, lah khayorna wukmakhanangaranu; kaja malungkhavāt hi saikorawuitungli tāki kajina.

Kaja leihkhalon china, athum mathiranglakha yorkahai chiwui eina khikha tongkazā masamphangmara. Kaja malungkhavāt hi saikorawuitungli tākahaina, chi mahanungluimara, khikhalajila akhalattawui khayonkhamāngwui vang, khipākha mashokrarmara.
Athumna talla̱ khongda ngaranriphaira, kha khipākha rai mavāmana, kaja iwui malungkhavāt saikorawuitungli tāhaira.
Ayarli raighai, alungli kazātkashi kala chāmrei, luili khalei mina raighai eina thi; keinungli khalei china chāmrei kala kazātkashi eina thira.
Kachikathā ringkasābingna yāmshokakha, tampākwui nāsha̱ thāda kaphungli pamra kala khalattawui moreiwui vang sifara.
Pāng saikorala mathukthu, khuksaola tara̱ thāda tāchokhao.
Athum khalattana bora ngavaipama, kala khangacheena athumli farora, mi saikora maishiri; kala kui saikorala ngakokserra.
Lupāsāla chānreili horkathānra, kala athumwui sināla makathar ot thāhaora;
Arema tekhamateiwui vang athumna khamathā sinā singa, kala athumwui ningkakachai meoma̱bing kala ot saikora chi eina sākhui; chiwui vang eina ina athumwui vang makathara ot sāngasak kahaina.
Kala ina yur khangateiwui mili ngapaikhui khavai mihaora, kala okathuiwui makhayābingwui vang ngaponkhui khavai sāngasakra; kala chi athumna makhao ngasakra.
Iwui aman kasaka apam hi sāmakhao khavai ina athumwui eina mai ngareithuihaora, khalebingna zangda makhao ngasakra,
kala ngachakyāng ngasakhaora. “Khikhalajila keinung hi ashee kashokwui khayonkhamāng, khangama̱ khangashaona pemtinghaowa.
Yurbingwui ngachaili zakshimeikap kaje yurbingli athumwui shim khuikhavai ina khuirāra; athumwui langkaso pangshap chi ina ngachang ngasakhaora kala katharapam chi sāmakhaomi ngasakra.
Sipkasā tharan chingrihai khavai phāra, kha masamphangmara.

Ka̱lāshātwuitungli kalāshāt rāra, chankharopwui thili chankharop pemra; marānbingwui eina khamahā angahānra, kha ain chi pāngmonbingwui eina shimānhaora kala hāngkachithei chi ararnaobingwui eina shimānhaora.

Awungana sifara, wungnaona ning thenghaora; kala ngalei chiwui mibingwui pāng khangacheena sheisha̱haora. Athumwui shongpong athishurda inala athumli sāmira, athumwui bichar athishurda athumlila bichar sāra; chieina I
Katharuka kum, kachang katharukawui kaphangāthang, ishi shimli Judahwui khararnaobingnali ngasopamda leilakha, Proho VAREwui pangshap iwuitungli tāshunga.
Kala ina khayang eina yanglu, mizak thāda akha thei; theida khalei chiwui akashān eina thuida apheishong mei thai, akashān atungshong pithrai ruimaling kahai thāda hānshuna.

Ana mipāng thāda katingrālaga ikui samsa̱li singkhui; kala Manglā china ili okathui eina kazingwui ngachaili khangkāhaowa kala Varewui mahākhami chili ili Jerusalemli, atungshong ngarei kashanga ngavei zangkhavai; kaja, mikpaishi khangasakawui mikpaikashe mima̱wui pamkhong khaleipam chili khuivāmi.
Kala yanglu, ina tampākli mathāsek kahai mahākhami kathei chi tākam eina, Israelwui Varewui tekhamatei chi chili leisai.
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, atungshong namik kapeishanglu.” Chieina ina yangkashang eina, yanglu, hanphutwui ngaveiwui atungshong, zangkhavai chili, mikpaikashewui mima̱ leisai.

Kala ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, athumna sāda khalei hi theilā, Israel shimkhurna hiyākha ningkakachai ot sāda, iwui katharapamwui eina ili katāva̱li kashamvā khavai kasāla? Kha hili ningkachaikhamei ot nana theiluifara.”
Chieina ana ili khāmong ngalemli khuivai, kala ina yangkhavā tharan, yanglu phākholi akhur akha thei.
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, phākho chi chuiphutlu.” Ina phākho chi chuikazang tharan, yanglu, khāmong akha leisai.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Chiwui alungli zanglu, kala mahāngkapai ningkakachai ot athumna kasāsā chi zangyanglu.”
Chieina ina zangyangda thei, kala chili phākho kuimareida ngawokazata yurbing, kala ningkakachai sābingla, kala Israelwui meoma̱ saikorala napmithaisai.

Chiwui mangāli Israel shimkhurwui ararnaobing athum hangshini nganingsai, chili Shaphanwui naomayara Ja-azaniah athumwui alungli zangsai. Kachichāwui meishārkhong singsera kala nganamkaphā otwui meikhut chi muiyā thāda ngapānkai.
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, Israel shimkhurwui ararnaobing kachiva̱ ama̱bing haikhavai kāwui tangkhamangli sāda khalei chi nana theihairala? Kaja athumna, ‘
Kala ana hithāda hānglui, “Athumna kasā hili ningkachaikhamei otla nana theiluifara.”
Chiwui thili ana ili
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Na hi theihairalā, O miwui naomayara? Nana hili ningkachaikhamei ot theiluifara”.
Chiwui thili ana ili

Chieina ana ili hānga, “O, miwui naomayara, nana hi theihairala? Judahwui shimkhurna hili sāda khalei, sākashi ot, ningkakachai ot sāda ili malungvāt khangasak hi pailak kahai otna da phaningla? Yanglu, athum khalatta nāren kajina.
Chiwui vang ina malungkhavāt eina sāra, imikna mayangkheimara, ina lukhamashanla malumashanmiluimara; athumna ikhanāli panglāk eina rāchapsanglala manganāsangluimara.”
Chiwui thili ana ikhanāli panglāk eina vaosangda hānga, “Keinungwui shaokathatabing, kachichāwui sāshimān khavai khutlai singripta rānganailu.”

Kala yanglu, mi tharuk, atungshong ngareikashanga ato ngaveishongwui eina, kachichāwui sāshimān khavai khutlai singlaga rai kala chili mi akha, khamenga kachon ngavai, lairik kapi khavai akha singda athumli ngasoda rai. Athumna zangda pithrai hanphut ngalemli nganinga.
Chitharan Israelwui Varewui tekhamatei cherubimwuitungli leikasā chi atungshong kāhaowa; kala kachon khamenga khangavaia, lairik kapi khavai kasingapā chili ana hoi.
Kala
Kala khangateibingli kahāng chi ina shai, “Awui thili keinung kuimareida vālaga ashaothatlu; khipālikha mayangkheipaimara, kala nathumna lukhamashanla machitheipaimara;

kasarnao, yaronnao, sha̱nao, angangnao, kala preinaobingli ngalāngda sāthatserhaolu; kha leishai kachukbing khipālikha masāza̱paimara. Kala hi iwui kathara shim eina sāphoklu.” Chieina athumna shimli khalei khararnaobing chili shaothatphoka.
Chiwui thili ana athumli hānga, “Shim hi sākhamānghaolu, kala kayāngla mingun eina pemngasaklu. Ot sāphokulu!” Chieina athumna keinungli khaleibingli shaothatvai.
Athumna sāthat mahunglakha imāngli chipamhaowa, ngakhumshāmhaida ina vaoda hānga, “Iya, Proho VARE! Jerusalemli nawui malungkhavāt heishokta Israelwui katai saikora sāthatserhaorala?”
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Israel eina Judahwui shimkhurna yonkahai hakmahākachangkhata; ngalei ashee eina pemhaira, kala keinung mashun makhaning otsakna pemhaira, kaja athumna, ‘
Iwui vanga, imikna mayangkheiluilakmara, lukhamashanla maleiluimara, kha athumwui otsak athishurda sāman mira.”
Kala yanglu, kachon khamenga khangavaipā kala lairik kapi khavai singkazatapā china pao khuirāda hānga, “Nana ili kakaso thāda ina sāhaira.”

Kala ana khamenga kachon khangavaipā chili hānga, “Cherubimwui azingli kāngphei khanganing chiwui ngachaili vālu, kala cherubimwui eina chuida khalei meithā napāng pemda homkhuilaga keinung peida yaoyāngmihaolu.”
Ana iwui miktāli khavā chi thei.
Mi china khavā tharan cherubimbing chi shimwui azingshong nganingsai; kala alung kayāng chi muiyāna pemhaowa.
Kala Varewui tekhamatei chi cherubimwui eina zangkhavai khāmongphei atungshong kāhaowa, kala shim chi muiyāna pemhaowa, kala kayāng katonga
Kala cherubimwui angachāngkhon chi, pangshapa Varena khamatui thāda, ayar kayāng eina tangdala shāshoka.
Kala ana khamenga kachon khangavaipā chili, “Cherubimwui ngachaili nganingda khalei kāngpheibingwui eina mei chi khuilu” da kakaso tharan ana kāngphei akhawui ngalemli anganinga.
Kala cherub akhana cherubim ngachaiwui eina pāng katingshokta cherubimwui ngachaili khalei mei chi kakhuilaga khamenga kachon khangavaipāli khami eina, ana chi khuilaga thuihaowa.
Cherubbingwui angachāng zingli mipāng thāda kai.
Ina khayang eina yanglu, cherubbingwui ngalemli kāngphei mati thei, Cherub ava̱va̱wuili ava̱va̱ lei; kala kāngphei chiwui azak phikphik khangashei chrysolite thai.
Kala athumwui matiwui azak chi ngaraichāsera, kāngphei akhawui alungli kāngphei akha khalei thai.
Athumna kazat tharan, mangareikhuila, kachichāwui mangāshong angatar eina zata; kha mangāshong khalei kāngphei china khavāvāli kateibingna mangareiungla shurzata.
Kala kāngpheibingwui akhuibing, akasui, kāngphei katonga kuikhamareili amik kāsera, kāngphei matiti chi leisera.
Kāngpheibing chili, iwui miktāli khanganinga kāngphei da hoi.
Cherubim china yongkāhaowa. Chebar kongli ina kathei kharingyurbing china.
Cherubbingna kazat tharan akāngbingla athumwui ngalemli zata; kala cherubbingna athumwui angachāng hārlaga yongkakā tharan, kāngpheibing china athumwui eina mayāmana.
Athumna kasaikha khanganing tharan athumla kasaikha nganingra, kala athumna yongkakā tharan yongkāra; kaja kharingyur chiwui manglā athumwuili lei.
Chiwui thili
Kala cherubbing china iwui miktāli angachāng hārlaga okathuiwui eina yongkakā tharan kāngpheibing chila ngasoda yongkai kala athum
Chebar kongli Israelwui Varewui azingli leilakha ina kathei kharingyurbing chi hibingna kala athum chi cherubsera da ina thei.
Ava̱va̱wui amai matiti lei, angachāngla matiti phona, kala angachāng zingli mipang thāda kai.
Athumwui ngaraikachā mai chi Chebar kongli kathei chiwui azak chilaka. Athum kachiva̱na angatar eina mangāshong zatsera.
Manglā china ili khangkālaga
Kala ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, keinung hili makaphā awor sāda morei sākhangasaka kala makhayā ot hāngkachitheia mibing chi hina.
Athum chi ‘Shimbing sakhuiki kaji atam vātfaya; keinung hiya sā hampai kathāna, ithumna sā kathāna’ da kahāngabingna.
Chiwui vang eina, O miwui naomayara, athumli makhamayā tui marānmilu.”
Iwuitungli
Kala keinung hiwui alungli nathumna shaokathat mataisang ngasaka, kala chiwui chānreili minguna chipema.
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Nathumna shaothat kahaibing chi sāna, keinungna sā hampaina; kha nathumle chiwui eina khuishokra.
Nathumna raighaili ngacheeya; kha ina nathumwuitungli raighai khuirāra da Proho VAREna hānga.
Kala ina chiwui eina nathumli khuishokta makathei yurbingwui pāngli horsangmira, kala nathumwuitungli bichar sāra.
Nathum raighai eina thira; ina nathumli Israelwui tharili bichar sāra; kala chieina nathumna I
Keinung hi nathumwui sā hampai masāmara, lah nathumla hiwui sā maningmara; Israelwui tharili ina bichar sānaora;
chieina nathumna I

Ina marānmida leilakha hithāda shoka kaja, Benaiahwui naomayara Pelatiah thihaowa. Chieina ina mashunzangda akhon panglāk eina shokta chaplaga hānga, “Iyavo Proho VARE! Israelwui shākkahai hi kānmikachangkhathaorala?”
Kala
“Miwui naomayara, nachināngarā, nali khangaso, nali raithākharumbing, Israelwui shimkhur saikora, athum katonga, Jerusalem hili khaleibingna, ‘Athumna

Chiwui vang eina hānglu, ‘Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Miyurbingwui alungli kala lam katātāva̱li ina kashamkhayangvāhailala, athumna kapapam chili ina kasha̱khawui vang athumwui kathara shim ngasāmira.’
Chiwui vang eina hānglu, ‘Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Mibingwui eina ina nathumli hokhuiluira, kala nathumli chaiyāngvā kahai ngaleibingwui eina kazipkhuilaga Israelwui ngalei nathumli mira.’
“Kala athumna chili khaung tharan, mayangkhangai ot, ningkakachai ot saikora khuishokserhaora.
Kala athumli ina ning khokkha kasā mida manglā kadhar sangmira; kala athumwui ngalung kathā ning khamarar chi khuishokmihaida phasāwui malung sangmira,
chithāda athumna iwui shiyan-chikan kala sharphahorbing mayonda iwui kahāng nganāra; kala athum iwui mi ngasāra, kala I athumwui Vare ngasāra.
Kha mayangkhangai kala ningkakachai otli kashurabing chili, athumwui otsak athishurda athut khuira da Proho VAREna hānga.”
wui tekhamatei china keinungwui eina kāmamānda zingshoshong khalei kaphung chiwuitungli kānganinghaowa.
Kala Varewui Manglāna mahākhamiwui eina Manglā china ili raithā kahaibingwui kapampam Chaldea ngaleili khuivāmi. Kala ina kathei khamahā chi iwui eina atungshong kāhaowa.
Chieina ina raithā kahaibingli
“Miwui naomayara,” ana hānga, “Na ngakaikashe shimkhur, theikhavai mik kālala makatheibing, shākhavai khanā kālala makashābingwui alungli pamdalei

kaja athumna ngakaikashe shimkhurna. Chiwui vang eina, miwui naomayara, raikathānaowui ot shaksālaga athumwui miktāli ngashunshong, raithā kahai thāda nana nawui pamkhavaiwui eina apam khangateili vaulu. Ngakaikashe shimkhurna jilala athumna theikhuilapai.
Raithā kahai mina kasā thāda otrom chi ngashunshong athumwui miktāli khuirāda nana athumwui miktāli ngazin zatphoklu.
Athumwui miktāli phaklāng kashophutlaga chieina ngara̱shoklu.
Athumwui miktāli otrom chi yārtuili phungkhuida, ngayāshong zatlu; na ngalei chi mathei khavai nawui mai romra, kaja Israel shimkhurwui vang machut khavai nali sāchithei khangasakna.”
Kakaso chi tākam eina ina sai. Raikathāwui otrom kathā iwui otrom ngashunshong khuishoka, kala ngazinshong ipāng eina phākho kashophuta; kala athumwui miktāli otrom yārtuili phungda ngayāshong zata.
Ngathorshong
“Miwui naomayara, ngakaikashe shimkhur, Israelwui shimkhurna nali, na khi kasākhala? da mahāngmala?
Athumli hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Khamarān tui hi Jerusalemwui wungnaobing kala chiwui alungli khalei saikorawui pongli kahāngna.
Hānglu, ina kasā hi nathumwui vang sākachitheina: Ina kasā thāda athumli sāra; athumna raikathāli vāra, tukthuiserhaora.

Kala athumwui ngachaili khalei wungnao china awui otrom yartuili phunglaga tangkhamangli zatra, apāng eina phākho kashophutlaga, chieina ngara̱shokra; kala ngalei chi amik eina mathei khavai mai romlaga zatra.
Kala ina iwui khalen eina ali horkhuira, kala a iwui khalenli manhaora; kala Chaldeanaobingwui lam Babylonli khuivāra, chithālala ana matheimara, kala a chili thira.
Kala ali kuimareikapambing, ali khangachonbing, awui raimi saikora ina masili chiphanhaora, kala athumwui thili ina raighai chihora.”
“Miyurbingwui alungli kala ngalei kachiva̱li ina chaiyāngva kahai tharan I

Kha athumwui ngachaili teomeikha, raighai, chāmrei kala kazātkashiwui eina yāmshok ngasakra; chithāda athumna khavāvā miyurbingwui alungli athumwui ningkakachai otsak chi phaninglaga ning ngateiungda I
Chili lāngda
“Miwui naomayara, nawui zāt ngarakri eina zālu, kala tara̱la chihuiran eina manglu;

kala ngalei chiwui mibingwui pongli hānglu, Israelwui ngaleili khalei Jerusalemwui mibingli Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Athumna kashakazā ngarakri eina zāra, tara̱la chihuiran mangra; khikhalajila hili somkapambingna sākashi otmāng kasāwui vang athumwui ramli khalei saikora khuithuihaora.
Kala mina pamda khalei keinungbing sākathānmihaora, kala ngalei chi ramcho ngasāhaora, chieina I
“Miwui naomayara, Israel ngaleiwui pongli nathumna chānsam sāda, ‘Atam kasāngkhahaira, kala mahākhami akhala akachang mazanglakmana’ da kahāng chi khikhala?

Chiwui vang eina athumli hānglu, ‘Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Chānsam kasā hi ina ngalatmihaora, kala chi athumna Israelwui alungli chānsam masāluilakmara.’ Kha athumli hānglu, mahākhami kachiva̱ ungshungki kaji atam nganaihaira.
“Kaja Israelwui alungli makhamashunga khamahā kala sotkhamasaowa khanong tui maleiluimara.
Kha
Latluida
“Miwui naomayara, yanglu, Israelwui shimkhur athumna, ‘Ana kathei khamahā chi kasāngkhahaira, kala khamarān hi anaolamshongwui vangna’ da hānga.
Chiwui vang eina athumli hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga: Iwui tui akha eina tangda mayansāngmara, kha ina hāngkahai tui chi ungshoklakra da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Miwui naomayara, Israelwui marānbingli makhamayā tui marānlu, kala athumwui ning eina marānphāphā kaje marānbingli hānglu: ‘
na hithāda hānga, khikha matheila kachichāwui ning eina sākazata, mangkhama̱ marānbing chili khonkashi ngasāranu!
O Israel, nawui marānbing chi ja̱tā kahai keinungli khalei ramfa kathāna.
Nathumna mintā kahai phākholi mavāyangranga, lah
Athumna mikhanam tui matui kala kakapika khanong sai; athumna
Nathumna mikhanama khamahā, kala kakapika mang hāngda ina mahānghailala, ‘
Chiwui vang eina Proho VAREna hithāda hānga, “Khikhalajila nathumna mang sāda kashiman chi hangphāphā kajiwui vang yanglu, ina nathumli makhamayāna da Proho VAREna hānga.

Minamda khamahā kala kakapik khanong kasā marānbing chili ipāngna mamayāmara, athum iwui hangva̱ masāpaimara, kala Israelwui mishānlila mazangpaimara, chili lāngda Israelwui ngaleilila mazangpaimara, kala nathumna I Proho VAREna da theira.
Phako chi leishi-leishai neokatotmihaida tekkhavai kasābingli hānglu. Tara̱ phongra hakkhamahā theihla tāra, siphan zingrot ngasoda phanra;
kala phākho chi ja̱katā tharan nali, ‘Ari khaneo chi kali vāhao?’ da mahāngmarala?”
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Iwui malungkhavāt alungli siphan zingrot ngathung ngasakra; kala iwui malungkhavāt alungli tara̱ phongra, kala hakkhamahā theihla sāshimān khavai tāra.

Nathumna leishi-leishai teikatot kahai phākho chi ina sākhaira, kala chi ngaleili ngachamda sakhaimihaida shimphungala amei-amā matheimara; chi kongkhalui tharan, nathumla chiwui alungli thisangra, kala nathumna I
“Chithāda iwui malungkhavāt phākhowuitungli kala chili leishi-leishai neokatot kahaibingwuitungli tāra; kala ina nali, phako chi kala leishi-leishi eina neokatot kahaibing chila maleithura,
Jerusalemwui pongli khamarān marānbing, chingri makahai tharan, chingri kahaiwui khamahā katheibing saikora chila kuphaira da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Miwui naomayara, kachichā aningsasak eina marānkazat nawui mibingwui naongalāva̱ ngarāli makhamayā marānda hānglu,
kala hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga:

“Laivā sālaga pāngtamra̱ hāsangkhami kala kashāng-kharei mateila saikorawui vang mairār kasemabing manglā shimān khavai kasā sha̱naobing chi kakhanang ngasāranu! Nathumna iwui mibingwui manglā shimān khavai sālaga nawui tongzā khavai khangateibingwui manglā ringkhavai kasāla?
Lang pāngmayākhawui vang kala khamuitang akhawui vang, iwui mibingwui ngachaili, nana ili makhao ngasaka; kala iwui mibingli kapikta mathiki kajibingli thingasaka, thiki kajibingli mathingasakmana.”

“Chiwui vang eina Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Yanglu, manglā shimān khavai nawui laivāwui pāngtamra̱ chili ina mamayalakmana, saikora chi napāngtheiwui eina sāshatmihaida, nana manglā shimān khavai kasā athumli vānao thāda yongthui ngasakhaora.
Nawui mairār chila ina sākazamihaida iwui mibingli napāngwui eina kanmira, kala sāshai thāda nawui pāngli maleiluimara, chieina I

“Khikhalajila ina ali ning masuitā ngasaklala, nana khangarongbingli ning suitā ngasakta kala makhayā mili athumwui makhayā apong eina ngareiungda athumwui manglā mangatangkhui khavai kakatomwui vang,
ara nathumna mikhanam khamahā matheiluimara, khanongla masāluimara; ina nathumwui pāng eina iwui mibingli kanshokra. Chitharan I
Chiwui thili Israelwui khararnao kaikha iwuili rai, kala iwui ngalemli rāpama.
Kala
“Miwui naomayara, mibing hina meoma̱ athumwui ningli phumhaida athumwui ngaphok khavai morei otsakmāngli yanga; iwui pongli athumna ngahān khavai mayāra da phaningla?

“Chiwui vang eina athumli hithāda hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Israelwui shimkhur mi akhana meoma̱ ningli phumhaida awui phei ngaphok khavai morei otsakmāngli yanglaga, marānli rāngahānakha; awui meoma̱ kachungkha chiwui vang
chiya iwui eina mai ngareithui kahai meoma̱li kaphaninga Israelwui shimkhurli tandi mikhavaina.
“Chiwui vang Israelwui shimkhurli hānglu,

“Kaja Israel shimkhurwui eina, lah athumli ngasokazatbingwui eina, kachikathāna ili horhaida meoma̱li ningli phumhailaga awui phei ngaphok khavai morei otsakmāngli yanglaga marānli iwui kachithei rākhangahān mi chili
kala chikathā mi chili ina mamayāmara, kala iwui mibingwui eina katatmihaida miwui mangāli khamachut sākhavai kala tantak tākhavai chānjam sāmira; chieina I
“Marānnala kapikta matuiphāphaakha, chipālila
Kala athumna athumwui tandi phungphalungra— marānwui tandila kala rakhangahānabingwui tandila ngaraichāra—

chiya Israel shimkhur iwui eina mayāmlui khavai, lah athumwui khayonkhamāng ot saikora chieina athum khalatta masākhamāng ngasakluila; kha athumna iwui mi sāra kala ina athumwui Vare sāra,” da Proho VAREna hānga.
Kala
“Miwui naomayara, ngalei akhana shitkasang maleilakla iwuitungli morei saakha, kala ipāng katingshoklaga mamayāla chāmrei rāngasakakha, kala chiwui eina mila sāla shimān ngasakhaiakha,
Noah, Daniel, Job ashi kathum zangsālala, athum kathumla athumwui khamashung khangarong mangā eina athumāng shokra,” da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Ina apam hili sāyurbing chihorāda athumna sākazammiserhaida sābingwui vang mi marāpailala;
athumwui alungli ashi kathum hi leisālala, ina kahāngna, athumna naomayara kala naongalāva̱bingla makanmirarmara; athum khalattamāng kankhuira, kha lamva ramchohaora da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Lha kalikha ina apam chili raighai chihorāda, kala apam kachiva̱li raighai akha chihovālu da kasolaga; ina mila sāla apam chiwui eina sathatakha;
ashi kathum chiwui alungli leisālala, kachangkhat ina kahāngna, athumna naomayarabing kala naongalāva̱bingla makanrarmara, kha athum khalattamāng kanshokra.
“Lha kalikhada apam chili ina mimao shivātta; kala iwui malungkhavāt chiwuitungli ashee eina heirorda, mila sāla chithitakha;
Noah, Daniel kala Job eina tangda leisālala, athumna naomayarabing kala naongalāva̱bingla makanmirarmara; kha athumwui khamashung khangarong mangā eina athum khalattawui manglāmāng kankhuira.”

Athumwui ngachaili mathila yāmkashok zangda naomayarabing kala naongalāva̱bingli thānshok khavai nathumwuili kharā tharan, kala athumwui kasākhavā theilaga Jerusalemli ina kalāshāt khuikharā hi ngayilaka da nathumna ningkhalum samphangra.
Athumwui kasā khavā kathei tharan, china nathumli ningnganung ngasakra; kala athumli kasā saikora hi angalang maleilakla masāhaimana da nathumna theira,” da Proho VAREna hānga.
Kala
“Miwui naomayara, khararli kathuia paisara̱na thingli kayakha phameikhala?
Khara̱ hiwui eina khiotkha thing thāda savaipaila? Kala hiwui eina ahunnao akha khuilaga khorkhong hokthang khavai sākakhuila leila?
Yanglu, meili riktā khavai sanga; meina angahun khaninishong chuitāda; alungthung chuihun kahai katai chi sākhavai khi leikhala?
Yanglu, pongda leilakhala khikha masāvaimana; chithakha meina chuihunhaida zikrik kahai china khi sāvailuira?
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: Ngahongthingwui alungli kaphora paisara̱ ina meili riktā khavai kasang thāda Jerusalemwui mibinglila ina chithāda sāra.
Kala ina athumli mamayāmada mai ngarei khangasung itharan, meiwui eina yāmshoklala mei eina thipapamra; ina athumli mamayāmada mai ngarei khangasung chitharan, I
Kala athumna mashitsanglakla kasāwui vang ngalei hi ramcho sāmihaora da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Miwui naomayara, Jerusalemli awui ningkakachai ot chi chitheimida hānglu,
kala, Proho VAREna Jerusalemli hithāda hānga da hānglu:
“Nathumli Canaan ngaleili pharai. Nashavā Amornaona, kala nashava̱ Hitnaona.
Nali pharāthang nahaitongkhara̱ khipanakha mareoshatmana, lah mara̱vaimimana, machi einala manurmimana, naokhalui einala makhaluimimana.
Hikatha hi sami khavai nali khipanakha malumashanmimana; nali pharāthang, khipanakha nali maleishimana. Kayāng khareili horhaiya.”
“Chieina ina nali rākakān tharan nawui ashee tottāt eina ngaleopikasā chi theida, ‘Mathiaranu,
arongwui akhar thāda okthuiranu’ da ina hānga. Chieina nana ngatarlak eina rarmamānda akhok kajuiva̱ ngalanao akha ngasāhaowa; ana̱la oka, kala nawui samla sāngsanga, chithālala na mahonghathai.

“Ina nali rakānluishit kaji tharan, yanglu, na leikashi khalei atamli leisai; kala ina iwui kachon fasangmida nawui khayā ngarinmi: mha, nali khuira da ina tuingashit sai, kala na iwui ngasāhaowa da Proho VAREna hānga.
Chiwui thili ina nali tara̱ eina ra̱vaimi, nawui ashee pheotāmida nali thao neomi.
Ina nali aphor sākasang kachon ngavaimi, kala sāhuiwui pheihop sangmi; khamanaka kachon eina khaluimi kala silk kachon eina farormi.
Kala nali ina sāri shaksāmida pangtheili kazao sangmi, kala nakahungli chā ngachāmi.
Kala ina nawui nātāngli nārenra̱ sangmi, kala nakhanāli unra̱ ngathetmi, kala nakuili khamathā kuihon akhala ngahonmi.

Chithāda nali sinā lupā eina sāri sāmi; kala nawui kashankachon khamanak kala silk kachon, aphor phorkasanga kachonmānga; nana khamanaka mathir kala khuira̱ eina thaomāng zai. Na ngalā mathākachangkhata rarkai kala awungawui shimlui samphanga.
Kala nawui azak khamathāwui vang naming yurbingwui alungli ngachāna, kaja nali mathā khangasaka chi ina. Hi Khamunga
“Kha naming zathaoda nawui khamathāmāngli ning horsangda makachingva̱wui ot sāzata, kala rākakān saikorali mavātlakla yora.
Nana nawui kashankachon ngayarda khuilaga khorum khavaipam sākhui, kala chili mashoklakrang kaji kala mashokluiki kaji khayorva̱ thada mi kachivali mayāmi.
Kala iwui sināla lupāla nali khami chi nana mayarnaobingwui ama̱ sākhuilaga chili phophāpama;
kala nana nawui aphor phorkasang kachon khuida chieina farora, kala iwui thaola, nganamkaphā otyurbing chiwui mangāli haihai.
Kala ina nali kashakazā mi— mathāmeikap kaje mathir, olive thao, kala khuira̱— chila meoma̱bing ningyangung khavai pha̱kaphayā sāda chigathaowa. Hi Khamunga
“Kala iwui vang nana pharākhami inaongalāva̱ naomayarabing pha̱phayā khavai riktai. Nawui khayorwui otsak hi teonāhaida
inaongarāli shaothatta meili horsangda nana pha̱kaphayā ot kasāla?
Kala nawui ningkakachai ot kala khayorva̱̱wui otsak kasā hili na nganuilakhawui atam, khamahong eina ashee khaneokatotlaga leikasā chi maphaningungmana.
“Nawui makaphā makhayāwui vang (kakhanang, nali kakhanang ngasaranu da Proho VAREna hānga)
na khalattawui vang khamong rartit kahai kā akha sākhui, kala shongfa kachida khamasopam sakhui;
shongfaphei kachida khamasopam sakhuilaga chili nawui khamathā chi yorpama, rākakān kachivali mayāmida khayorva̱wui otsak mataisanga.
Ili malungshivāt khavai nana khamathang khamarang nawui khongnai Egyptnaobingli naphasā yorsangda khayorva̱wui otsak mataisanga.

“Yanglu, chiwui vang eina, ina nali mamayāmada ipāng katingshokra, kala nawui yar suitā ngasakra, kala nawui kākharām yangkashe, nawui makhayā otsakwui vang khayāmalākhamiva̱ Philistinewui naongalāva̱li nali horsangmihaora.
“Nana Assyrianaobinglila naphasā yorsanga kala na penhaira kaji mavaithuda; mha, nana athumli yora, chithālala na aruila ningyang maungranga.
Leihkhalon Chaldeanaobinglila khayorwui otsak mataisanga; chieina tangda nawui vang ningyang maungthuwa.
“Nawui leishāt wuklung kayākha kazāhaokhala, hiyākha maishāda khayorwui otsak kasa saikora hi; da Proho VAREna hānga;
shongfaphei kachida shungtit kahai kā sākhuilaga, kayāng kharei kachida kajuipam saikhuiya. Laga nava khayorva̱̱ mathāmana, kaja nava pheisā eina khamasāli malungvāta.
Phokaphava̱ preiva̱, gaharawui mahutli kha̱mili khangasova̱̱!
Mibinga khayorva̱̱ kachiva̱li aman mi, kha nava nali leikashebingli mi, apam kachiva̱wui eina nawui khayorli rāzang khavai pheizā sai.
Chiwui vang eina nawui khayor hiya sha̱nao khangateiwui eina ngateihanghhai; yormi khavai nali khipanakha masuimana: kha nava nana pheisā mikhavai athumli phāzata, chiwui vang eina na ngateiphalunga.
“Chiwui vang eina O khayorva̱̱!

Proho VAREna hithāda hānga; Kaja nawui khayākhamalā chi mahonghat kala nawui khayā leikashebingli lānchitheihaogada, kala nawui meoma̱bingwui vang, kala nana nanao ngarāwui ashee athumli khamiwui vang;

yanglu, nali ningyāng ungda khangarumbing saikora ina kazipkhuira, nana leikashibing kala nana ningkakachaibing saikora; apam kachiva̱wui eina ina kazipkhuilaga athumwui miktāli nawui khamahong chi theikhavai ina nawui khayā lānmira.
Kala shakazā otli makhao khangasak kala mi shaokathata sha̱naoli bichar kasā thāda nalila sāra, kala nawuitungli malungkhavātwui kala yuikashiwui ashee tāngasakra.

Kala ina nali nawui leikashebingwui pāngli horsangmira, kala athumna nawui shungtit kahai kā kala khamasopambingli sākahai apam saikora athumna sākazamihaora, athumna nawui kashankachon eina sāri khamathāthā ngapaikhuida nali khamahong eina haira.
“Athumna nawuitungli mi sorkhangasai thānrāda nali ngalung eina horthatra kala nali athumwui raighai eina shātkazamra.
Kala athumna nawui shim thotāmihaora kala sha̱naobingwui mangāli nawuitungli bichar sāra; ina nali khayorva̱̱ masā ngasakluimara, kala nanala mamasāluimara.
Chithāda sāda nawuitungli iwui malungkhavāt kapenva̱ sākhuira, kala iwui mikpaikashi nawui eina thuihaora; I chingrihaora kala malungmavātluimara.
Khikhalajila nawui nganuilakhawui atam chi nana maphaningla, kha ot saikora hina ili malung thuikhangasakwui vang; yanglu, nawui otsakwui angathut nali mashoila hāngsangra da Proho VAREna hānga.”
Ningkakachai ot saikorawuitungli nana khāngkaser ot masāmala?
“Yanglu, mi kachiva̱na chānjam kasā thāda, nalila ‘Ava̱va̱ thāda naongalāva̱la chipapama’ da chānsmra.
Nava gaharali kala naongarāli kachinva̱wui naongalāva̱na; kala nava gahara eina naongarāli kachinva̱bingwui achinaova̱na. Nava̱ Hitlāna kala navāva Amornaona.
“Kala nachonva, anao ngalāva̱li ngasoda nawui atungshong khalei Samaria china; kala anao ngalāva̱li ngasoda azingshong khaleiva̱ Sodom nagatuiva̱na.
Chithālala nava athumwui thāda kazatli, kala athumwui ningkakachai otsakli mapenmada atam kasha̱khawui thili athumna kasā apongli nana zakshimeikharhaowa.”
“Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, na eina nanao ngalāva̱ ngarāna kasā thāda nagatuiva̱ Sodom eina anao ngalāva̱bingna masāmana da Proho VAREna hānga.
Yanglu, hi nagatuiva̱ Sodomwui moreina: a eina anao ngalāva̱bingna langsoi, mazākharar eina tangda zai, lekngasaisor eina okthui, kha khangazanbing kala khavātabingli mangachonmimana.
Athum hiklaka kala iwui mangāli ningkakachai ot sai; chiwui vang eina ina kathei chitharan athumli shimān ngasak kahaina.”
“Samariana nawui morei kasā yākhawui tangkhai makāshungmana; nana athumli ningkakachai ot chungmeikharda sai, nana ningkakachai ot sākahai saikora china nachinaova̱bing khamashung kasā thāhaowa.

Nawui maikashi khānglu, kaja nachon ngarāli nana bichar mashung ngasakpaihaowa; khikhalajila nawui morei, ningkakachai ot chungmeikhar kahaiwui vang athum mashungmei haowa. Chiwui vang eina khayaklu, kala nawui maikashi phunglu, kaja nachon ngarāli nana mashung ngasaklak kahai thāhaowa.”
“Sodomshi vānaongarāwui shimlui ina hanmiluira, Samariashi vānao ngarāwui shimluila hanmira, kala nawui shimluila athumwui alungli hanmipapamra,
chithāda nawui maikashi kala nana sākahai saikorawui khayākhamalā athumwui vang ninglum khavai ngasāra.

Nagatuiva̱ Sodom eina anao ngalāva̱ ngarāna kharewui shimlui chili hanungra, kala nachon Samaria eina anao ngalāva̱ ngarāna ashiwui shimpam chili hanungra, kala na eina nanao ngalāva̱bingla nashiwui chili hanungpapamra.
Na malingshaplakha nachon Sodomli nana mangacha̱nsā nganaosāmala,

nawui makhayā kasā malanchitheiranglakha? Ara nala, Edomwui nao ngalāva̱bingwui kala awui khongnainaobingwui, kala Philistinewui nao ngalāva̱bingwui, kala nali yangkakharingbingwui mashāt khavai sāthuihaowa.
Nawui khāngkaser kala ningkakachai otsakwui vang tandi phungdalei, da
“Mha, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Nana tuingashitli ningkachaida sākakhaiwui vang inala nali sāmira,
chithālala na nganuilakha nali iwui tuingashit sākahai chi ina phaningungra, kala ina nali makhangachei tuingashit akha sāluishitra.
Nachinaova̱ khanini Sodom eina Samariali, naongalāva̱ sāda ina nali khami tharan, khare kachāng nawui kasākhavā chi phaningunglaga na khayāmalāra; kha nali tuingashit kasā chiwui vang maningmana.
Ina nali iwui tuingashit sakāluishitra kala nana I
kala nawui kasāsā saikora ina pheomi kahai tharan, nana phaningungda matakhak khayāmalāthak eina khituikha mamatuimara” da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Miwui naomayara, Israelwui shimkhurli chāntam akha hānglu, kala tamkhuikapai khararchān eina hāngchitheilu;
Proho VAREna hithāda kahāngna da hānglu: Hakkhamahā angachāng eina ngasoda amareng kasanga, vānaohā machu kachungkha khamanāta khalāng akha Lebanonwui cedarthingtonli rāpa̱ya;
ana chiwui aton reokhuilaga leih sākhavaipam akhali khuivai, kala leihkhalonbingwui keinungli vāhaiya.
Chieina ana ngalei chiwui atha khuilaga tara̱ makhavāta ngalei katumpamli yaosanga. Kala willowphāng thāda lingsanga,

ashon shonshokta nemlak eina khangachuiya drakhārong ngasahaowa, kala aphāngna awuishong ngareivai, angayungna apamli phora. Chithāda drakhārong ngasāhaowa, kala aphāng kachungkha shokta anāla timfahai.

“Kha angachāng kahakva̱ kakā, ahāla chungmeikhar kaji khangatei khalāng akhala leisai; kala yanglu, drakhārong hina tara̱ yikmi khavai arong chiwui angayungla, aphāngla awuishong ngareivāhaowa. Lingsang khavai apam chiwui eina
ana mathāmeida phor khavai, aphāng chungmeida shok khavai, kala athei chungmeida mathei khavai, ngaleikatum, tara̱ makhavāt apam akhali ashomhaowa.
“Proho VAREna hithāda kahāngna da hānglu: Chi kharrala? Ana chi angayung phurda ashon kashonbing chi chathaida mangahuimarala? Angayung eina phurkhuisida kapanga lah mi kachungkha darkar masāmana.
Yanglu, chi shomsangluishit kaji eina mathāda phorrala? Zingshoshongwui masi phankharā tharan china lingsang khavaipam chili mangahuithatmarala?”
Chiwui thili

“Ara ngakaikashe shimkhur chili hānglu, nathum chāntam hiwui kakhalat khikhala kaji matheikhala? Athumli hānglu, yanglu, Babylon awungana Jerusalemli rāda awungali, wungnaobingli Babylonli tukvāserhaira.
Kala ana wungnao akhali khuida tuingashit sālaga shākhi sāngasaka. (Ana ngalei chiwui akhoka mibingli tukthuihaowa,
kaja wungram hi maishiri eina mangakarthuklui khavai kala awui tuingashit mayonda nganingshap khavaina).

Kha ana ali ngakaishida Egyptli wungmathun chihovālaga siguila kala raimila kachungkha samphang khavai sai. Ana ungshungshaprala? Hikathā kasā mina yāmshokshaprala? Tuingashit chi ana kailaga yāmshokshaprala?

“Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, da Proho VAREna hānga, kachangkhat eina awunga sākhangasaka awunga awuipamli kapama, awui khangashitli ningkakachaia, ali ngarumda sākahai tuingashit sakakhaia chi, a Babylonli thira.
Kuimareida raipan rāsaphin kahai kala shairon ronkahai chi theilaga Pharaohna awui raimi thānlaga kachilikha marāngachonlakmara.
Khikhalajila, ana shākhi sākahai kala tuingashit kaikahaiwui vang, apāng katatsanghailaga hikathāthā kasāwui vang, a mayāmshokpaimara.”
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, ana ningkakachai iwui shākhi, kala iwui tuingashitla ana sākhaihaoda, ina awuitungli angathut hāngsangphalungra.
Ina awuitungli khalen rānra, a iwui khalenli manra, kala ana iwuitungli kakapikwui vang ina ali Babylonli khuivāda chili bichar sāra.
Kala awui kapangkakhui raimibing raighai eina thira, kala taikahaibing chi masili chiphanyānghaora; kala nathumna,
Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “I khalattana khamatona cedarthingwui aton reokhuira; atonli kashok ashon chi khuilaga I khalattana kaphung khamaso akhali lingsangra;

Ina Israelwui kaphung kajuili lingsangra, chieina aphāng shokta, atheila matheira, kala khamaho cedarrong ngasāra; kala chiwui azingli sāyur ayāyāva̱ ngasāmra; kala aphāng chiwui khaya̱li vānaoyur kachiva̱ athip sāra.
Chieina luili khalei thingrong saikorana,
“Israel ngaleiwui pongli nathumna,
‘Avāva̱ ngarāna drakhāthei kathur shai,
naomayarabing hā sheihaira’ da chānjam hānglui hānglui kajiwui kakhalat khikhala?”
“Ina kachangkhat kahāngna, chānjam hi Israelwui alungli nathumna masāluilakmara da
Yanglu, manglā saikora iwuina; avāva̱ ngarāwuila anao ngarāwui manglāla iwuisera: morei kasā manglā chi thira.
“Kachikathā khamashunga mina ainwui athishurda mashun eina saakha—
ana phungreitungli mashaiakha lah Israel shimkhurwui meoma̱li mik mangareikaakha, awui khongnaiwui preiva̱li masākhamāngakha lah shanaoli makathar kazat atamli mangasoakha,
khipālikha marekharekla, kha kashuka mili awui hamkahai chi tāchamda hankhame, miwui ot makhale, kathai kacham mili mikazā, khamasai eina kazat mili kashankachon ngavaikhame,
chishutlala atār makakhuia, morei kasāli makakahaowa, mi kachiva̱li ngaraichāda bichar sakhame,
iwui shiyan-chikan kala ain khamayona, a chi khamashungana, a kachangkhat eina ringra da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Kalikhada ana khale nao pharākhuiakha, ashee shok khangasaka,
hāngkahai sārānbing hi masāla, kha phungreili kapha̱sā shaiakha, awui khongnai preiva̱li sākhamāngakha,
khikha makhalei khangazana kala khavata mili rekharekakha, khalee ot saakha, hamkahai mahanmiakha, meoma̱li mik ngareivaakha, ningkakachai ot saakha,
atar eina shināmda, kala henda khuizaakha; mi chi ringrala? A maringmara. Ningkakachai ot saikora hi ana sāhaira; a thiphalungra; awui ashee chi akhalattawuitungli tāphalungra.
“Kha kachikathā mi akhawui naomayarana avāva̱wui morei kasāsā chi theilaga ngacheeda masaakha,
phungreitungli kaphasā mashaiakha lah Israelwui meoma̱li mik mangareikaakha, awui khongnai preiva̱li masākhamāngakha,
mili khayon ot masaakha, shimlui maham ngasakakha, khali ot masaakha, kha kathai kachām mili mizaakha, kala khamahongali farormiakha,
morei kasāwui eina pāng ngaranhaiakha, atarla makakhuiya, iwui shiyan-chikan khamayona kala ain alungli kazata mi chi avāva̱wui moreiwui vang mathimara; a kachangkhat ringra.
Kha avāva̱na mili namkazāwui vang, achināwui ot khaleewui vang, kala awui mibingwui alungli makaphā kasāwui vang, yanglu, awui moreiwui vang a thira.

“Laga nathumna, ‘Kachiwui vang eina avāva̱wui morei naomayarana maphungmara̱khala?’ da hānga. Naomayara china sākhangayi athishurda mashun eina kasā kala iwui kakaso eina shiyan-chikan khamayon tharan, anaomayara chi kachangkhat ringra.

Morei kasā manglā chi thira. Avāva̱wui moreiwui vang naomayarana makhanangpaimana, lah naomayarana morei kasāwui vang avāva̱ makhanangpaimana; khamashungawuitungli khamashung khangarong tāra, kala makhayā mi chiwuitungli makhayā tāra.
“Kha kachikathā makhayā mina awui morei kasāwui eina ngalatthuihaida iwui shiyan-chikan mayonakha kala sākhangayi chiwui athishurda saakha, chikathā mi chi ringkachangkhatra, a mathimara.
Ana khayonkhamāng sākahai chi malaimihaora; kaja ana khamashung khangarong kasā chiwui vang a kharing samphangra.
Makhayā mi kathi chiwui vang ina ringkaphā khi leikhala? da Proho VAREna hānga; ana awui zatta khaleiwui eina latungda ringtharanu majimarala?

“Kha khamashung khangarong mina awui khamashung khangarongwui eina thuihaida, makhayā mina kasā thāda ningkakachai ot saakha, chikathā mi ringpairala? Ana khangarong ot sākahahai akhala maphaningungmara; awui yonsak eina kasāwui khangui kala morei kasā chiwui vang a thiphalungra.
“Laga nathumna, ‘
Khamashung khangarong mina khamashung shongpongwui eina ngareithuida morei kasā tharan, ana morei sākahai chiwui vang thiphalungra.
Latluida makhayā mina awui makhayā kasā shongpongwui eina ngareiungda khangayi mashun chi saakha ana awui mirin huikhuira.
Khikhalajila ana chukmaja̱laga ana morei sākahai saikorawui eina latkhaungwui vang, a kachangkhat eina ringra, a mathimara.
Chithālala Israelwui shimkhurna, ‘

“Chiwui vang eina, O Israel! nathum ava̱va̱li kachichāwui shongpong athishurda bichar sāra da Proho VAREna hānga. Ning ngateida nathum morei saikorawui eina latunglu, chi maningakha khayon chi eina shimānra.
Ili makhamayā kasā nathumna khayonkhamāng sākahahai saikora chi chihoserhaolu; kala nathum ning kala manglā kadhar sangkhuilu. Khiwui vang nathum thikida, O Israelwui shimkhur!
Kaja kachikathā mi akha kathiwui vang ili ringkaphā maleimana, da Proho VAREna hānga; chiwui vang ringkhavai latunglu.”
Kala na, Israel wungnaobingwui vang chapngachāda hānglu:
Kazingkha̱ ngachaili nava̱ chi kachikathā kazingkha̱ ava̱ ngasāsā!
Anao ngalemli piya, anao nganaoda.
Kala ana awui nao akhali nganaokhui;
a kazingkha̱nao ngasahaowa
kala ana sāshai katuk tamphoka,
ana mila shai.
Ali tukkhui khavai yurbingna ngazeka,
athumwui chomli tāzanghaowa,
kala athumna khānghui eina hokkhuilaga Egypt ngaleili khuiunga.
Shokkhavai kachihān maleimana da phaninglaga anao khangatei nganaokhuida rarngasaklui.
Kazingkha̱wui ngachaili ana zata;
kala kahakva̱ sathuihaowa,
kala ana sāshai katuk tamphoka;
ana mila shai.
Kala ana athumwui raipan sakhaimi,
kala keinungla sākathānmihaowa;
kala ngalei chili leikasābing maphakhuithu,
awui kakhangangkhon shālaga.
Chieina yurbingna kuimareida ali khalen sanga,
athumwui chomli tāzanga.
Khanghui eina khalaplaga keishimli sanghaowa,
kala ali Babylonwui awungali khuiungmi;
khuiungda ungnarhai.
Israel phungreili awui khon mashāluilak khavai.
Nava̱va yāmguiwui drakhārong thai,
tara̱na lingsangda aphāng kachungkha shokta athei kachungkha mathei,
tara̱ kachungkha samkaphangwui vang.
Chiwui makangmeikap kaji akung china khamungawui
khānthing
thingphāng saikorawui ngachaili a juimeikapsai;
awui aphāngla juishun eina thei.
Kha malungvavāt eina arong phurshokta ngaleili horsanghaowa;
zingshoshongwui masina thengmihaida atheila pa̱tāserhao.
khamakanga akungla ngahuihaida meina chuitāhaowa.
Ara chi tara̱ makhalei tākok kahai lamhāngli phurshomhaira.
Apam eina mei chuishokta aphāngla atheila chuitāserhaira,
chithāda khamakanga akungla maleilui,
khamungawui khānthing maleiluimana.
Hi malung kharing otna, chapngachā khavaina.
Kashine kum, kachāng kaphangāwui zimiksho katharāthang, Israelwui khararnao kaikhana
Kala
“Miwui naomayara, Israelwui ararnaobingli hithāda hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga, iwui tui rāngahānkida kharāla? Ina kachangkhat eina kahāngna, nathum ili mangahānpailakmara da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Athumli nana bichar saralā, miwui naomayara, athumli nana bichar sarala? Chithākha athumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui ningkakachai otsak chi theiranu,

kala athumli hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Israelli ina kapangkhuithang, Jacobwui atheili ina khangashit sāda, I khipākhala kaji Egypt ngaleili leilakha I khalattana chitheihaira, kala I Proho nathumwui VAREna da khangashit sai.
Ina athumli tuingashit sāthang, Egypt ngaleiwui eina thānshokmida athumwui vang ina phāshok kahai, khuira̱ eina seina̱ khalong ngalei saikorali tekmateimeikap kaja lam mira da ina ngashit kahaina.
Kala athumli, nathumwui mikna ngayamlak eina khayang ningkakachai ot nathum kachiva̱na horhaolu, kala nathum Egyptwui meoma̱ eina masākhamāng ngasaklu da hānga; I

Kha athumna ili ngakaishida iwui tui makhuimana; athum saikorana ningkakachai ot lah athumwui mikna ngayamlak eina khayanga Egyptwui meoma̱bingla mahorhaithuwa. Chieina ina iwui malungkhavāt heirorda Egyptli leilakha athumli sāmihaora da phaninga.
Kha imingwui vang phaninglaga, Egypt ngaleili I khipākhala da chithei kahaiwui vang, athum miktāli masāchitheimara da khikha makathāna.
“Chiwui vang eina ina athumli Egypt ngaleiwui eina lamhāngli thānshokmi.
Athumli ina iwui shiyan-chikan mihaira kala ain chitheihaira, kala chi khamayon mina kharing samphangra da hāngchithei.
Chili lāngda ina athumli tharngasak kahaina kaji theikhavai athum eina iwui ngachaili sabbath lei kajila hāngmihaira.

Kha lamhāngli leilakha Israelshi shimkhurna ili ngakaishi; athumna iwui shiyan-chikan mamayonmana kha athumna chi khamayon eina mibingna ringra kaji iwui shiyan-chikan khalanhaowa; kala iwui sabbathbing athumna hakmahālak eina sāmakhaohaowa.
Kha iwui mingwui vang phaninglaga, athumli ina thānshokkhamina kaji yur saikorana thatheilaga masāthatchitheikhangaina.
Chili lāngdai ina athumli lamhāngli tuingashit sai kaja ina athumli mikahai khuira̱ eina seina̱ khalong tekmateimeikap kaji ngaleili mathānsangmara da ina ngashita,
kaja athumna iwui shiyan-chikan khalanhaowa, kala iwui ain mamayonmana; kaja athumwui ningna meoma̱li phaninghaida iwui sabbathla makhao ngasakhaowa.
“Chithālalai ina imik yangkheimihaida lamhāngli leilakha makachithitna kala mayumkhamina.
Kala anaomayarali ina lamhāngli leilakha, navā ngarāwui ain mashuralu, kala shiyanbing mamayonalu, lah nathum khalatta athumwui meoma̱ eina masākhamāngalu da hānga.
I, nathumwui Varena, iwui shiyan kala ainbing mathālak eina mayonlu,
kala I
“Kha naongarāna ili ngakaishi; athumna iwui ain mamayonmana, kala chikan mangarangmana; khangarang eina mina ringki kajina; athumna iwui sabbathbingla sāmakhaowa.
Kha ina iwui mingwui vang, kala yur kateiwui miktāli hikathā masāchitheiphalungmara da ipāng ngalan kahaina.
Chili lāngda lamhāngli leilakha, yurbingwui ngachaili ina yaoyānghaira, kala athumli lam khangateili chaiyānghaira da hangtāhairasai;
kha athumna iwui shiyanbing mamayonla, kala iwui ain khalanhailaga iwui sabbathla makhao ngasaka, kala avāva̱ ngarāwui meoma̱li shitsanga.
“Chili lāngda athumli makankhanā shiyan-chikan kala ringkhavaiwui apong makhaning ainbing ina athumli mi;
kaja ina athumli sākhamāng ngasakta athumwui naochizai saikora meili riktāda chigat ngasaka, chithāda ina athumli ngachee ngasak khavai sai; ina chithāda kasā chi I
“Chiwui vang, miwui naomayara, Israelwui shimkhurli hithāda hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Hilila navā ngarāna ili yomlak eina chipatta sai.

Kaja ina ngashit kahai lam chili thānkhaung tharan, kaphung kajujui kala thingpompa̱ theikachida athumna pha̱kaphayā ot sāda machigat khangayili chigata, chili athumna nganamkaphā otyur riktāda ra̱shakchigat chigata.
(Kaphung kajuili nathumna khavā khiwui vangkhala? da ina hānga. Chiwui vang aja eina tangda apam chili Bamah kahona).
Chiwui vang Israel shimkhurli hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga: Navā ngarāwui sākakhamāng thāda sachingralā kala yangkakharing otsak chili shurchingrala?

Aja eina tangda nathumna lemmet kachigat kala nanao mayara ngarāli meili rikkatā hi nathumwui meoma̱ saikora chi eina nathum khalatta sākakhamāngna. Laga nathumna ili ngathingpairalā, O Israel shimkhur? Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, ili nathumna mangasanpailakmara, da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Nathumna phaningda khalei, ‘Ithumla yurbingwui thāda sāsa, kha̱li khalei yurbingwui thāda thingli ngalungli khorumsa’ kaji chi maungshunglakmara.
“Ina kachangkhat eina kahāngna, da Proho VAREna hānga; kaja lungvāt eina ngasoda pangshapa ipāng katingshokta athumwuitungli awunga sāra.
Ina nathumli mibingwui eina khuishokra kala nathumli chaiyāng kahai kha̱bingwui eina shupkhuira, malungkhavāt eina ngasoda pangshapa ipāng katingshokra;
kala ina lamhāngli thānvāda chili mai eina mai yangngasungda bichar sāra.
Egypt ngaleili navā ngarāli ina bichar kasā thāda nathumlila ina bichar sāra,” da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Ina nathumli khāmshui azingli makānkā ngasakra, kala ina kateokhamāngli zangngasakra.
Ngakaikashebing, kala ili khayon ot kasābing chilila ina athumna leikasā apamwui eina thānshokra, kha athumna Israelwui ngaleili kazang masamphangmara. Chitharan I

“Nathumwui vanga, O Israelwui shimkhur, da Proho VAREna hānga: Nathumna ili manganāsangmara jiakha; thuiulu, arui kala hiwui eina thuida ichichāwui meoma̱li akhorumulu, kha nathumwui lemmet kala meoma̱ china iwui katharaming mamakhao ngasakpailuimara.”

“Kaja Proho VAREna hānga, Iwui kathara kaphung, Israelwui kajuiya kaphungtungli, iwui mi Israel shimkhur saikora, athum saikora, ngalei chili ili otram ngatha̱ra, chili athumli ina khuisangmira, kala chili nathumwui khami kala phameikap kaje kachigat kala kathara pha̱kaphayā chi khuisangmira.

Mibingwui eina nathumli shupkhuira, yāmkazatpam kaphungphungwui eina kazipkhuira kala ningyāngkhaung nganamkaphā thāda ina khuisangra; kala yurbingwui mangāli iwui tharkhamathengrin chi nathumwui alungli chitheira.
Navā ngarāli mira da ngashit kahai Israelwui lamli thanungkhami tharan, nathumna I
Chitharan rida zatkasā kala nathumwui otsakna makhao khangasak saikora chi phaningunglaga, makaphā ot sakahahai chiwui vang nathum khalatta ningkachaira.
Kala O Israelwui shimkhur, nathumwui makaphā apong, minamkazā ot chiwui vang maningla, kha imingwui vang sākhami chi kathei tharan, I
“Miwui naomayara, azingshong namai ngareitāda chishong tamchitheilu kala Negebli makhamayā tui marānlu;
Negebwui ngahongli hānglu,
Mei hi
Chieina ina hānga, “Iyavo Proho VARE! Athumna ili chāncham hangkhanganao maningmala, jihaowa.”
“Miwui naomayara, namai Jerusalemshong ngareivāda kathara shimli makhamayā tui hāshoklu; kala Israel ngaleili makhamayā tui marānmida hānglu,
kala Israelwui ngaleili hānglu,
Khikhalajila ina nawui eina khamashunga eina makhayā khanini khuithuihaida, azingshong eina thuilaga atungshongwui asā khavai kachiva̱li raighai eina chithitra;
chieina mi kachiva̱na,
“Chiwui vang eina sifalu, miwui naomayara, athumwui miktāli wukkhanangda sifalu kala khanangchitheilu.

Kala athumna nali, ‘Khiwui vang sikafa?’ da hāngakha nana, ‘Pao chiwui vangna. Chi ungkashung tharan, mi kachiva̱wui ning thenghaora, kala apāng saikora pangshap maleimara, manglā saikora vānhaora kala khuksao saikora tara̱ thāda ngazanhaora. Yanglu, chi rārāli, kala chi mashoila shoklakra’ da Proho VAREna hānga.” da hāngra.
Kala
“Miwui naomayara, marānmida hānglu,
Raighai, raighai kharāhaira,
kala kashutkharikhaira;
shaothat khavai kakharāna,
rikhān thāda hingkhavai kakashutna!
Maningkha nathum lumlaofarala? Inao nana thing eina kasā lijei saikorali ningkachai.
Chiwui vang eina singpai khavai raighai hi kharā kahaina; shaokathatapāli mikhavai kashutkharik kahaina.
Sifada chapngachālu, miwui naomayara, iwui mibingli sākikajina; Israelwui wungnaobingli sāki kajina; athumli iwui mi saikorali ngasoda horsang kahaina. Chiwui vang nakhaishāngli shātlu.
Kaja chi tamyangki kaji maningmana—nana lijeili ningkachaiakha china khi sarakhala?” da Proho VAREna hānga.

“Chiwui vang eina miwui naomayara, marānmilu, napāng kaphelu kala raighai chi khanishida, mha, kathumshida shātthatki kajibingwui vang ngawutlu; hakkhamahā shaokathatwui raighaina, athumli kuikhanama,
athumwui malung tātung khavai, kala athumwui ngavei kachida kachungkha pitai. Ina kahinga raighai chi mihaira; iyah! chiya rikhān khangashei thāda sai, chi sāthat khavai kashutkharika.
Uishongla yāshongla nawui raighaitonna kachiza̱li shātlu.
Ila ipāng kaphera, kala iwui malungkhavāt ningyāngkhaung sākhuira;

“Miwui naomayara, Babylon awungawui raighai rākhavai apong khani yeksanglu, apong khani chi ngalei akhawui eina rāthathuiki kajina. Kala keinungli vāzang khavaiwui shongfa chili machut-pakra̱ akha shunlu;
raighai chi Ammonwui Rabbahli vākhavai kala ngaziplak eina sākahai Judahwui Jerusalemli rākhavai apong akha yeksanglu.

Kaja Babylon awungana shongfa ngapakli nganinga, shongfa khani ngapak khavai haokaphokpamli khanongli kachishongrakhala da ngasan khavai, ana malāthing khanuka, teraphimli ngasana, ana amathinli yanga.
Khamor makāda vaokhavai, raikhotkhon vaokhavai, ngavei mashir khavai, ngalei thonglaga raipan yakkā khavai, awui yāpangli ungkatā kalā chi Jerusalemwui ngasāhaowa.
Kha athumwui vanga hi makhamashunga leivā khayang thāhaowa; athumna tuingashit sāngarum kahaina; kha ana athumwui khangui phaningungra, chiya athumli tukkhui khavai vangna.
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: Nathumwui khayon phaningung khangasakwui vang kala sākhamakhao saikora phongmi kahaiwui vang nathumwui morei kasāsā theiserhaoda nathum chieina thira.
O makathara, makhayā Israelwui wunganao, nawui atam, tandi miki kajiwui khanaowa atam rāhaira,
Proho VAREna hānga: Nawui kuitei kala wungkuihon khuihaolu; khalei chi maleichingmara; khangazanali sochikatra, khangamali nemngasakra.
Ja̱katā, ja̱katā, ina ja̱tā ngasakra; samphangrānpā chi marāranglakha eina tangda amei amā maphākhuimara; kala chi ina ali mira.
athumna nathumwui vang makhamashung phongmilala, athumna kapikta marānlala—makathara makhayāwui kahungli athumwui khanaowa tandi ngachāmi khavai atam chi rāhaira.
Raighai ahonli sanghaolu. Nathumli pharā khavaipam, kachichāramli ina bichar sāra.
Kala ina iwui malungkhavāt nathumwuitungli chihotāra; Iwui malungkhavātwui mei nathumwuitungli malirorra; kala sākashimān kathema, sakashebingwui pāngli ina nathumli horsangmira.
Nathumwui phasā rikkhavai thing sāra, nathumwui ashee ngalei ngayāda longra; nathumli khipākha maphaningungluimara; kaja
Chili lāngda
“Miwui naomayara, mi shaokathata keinungli na bichar masarakhala, na bichar masārakhala? Chithakha awui ningkakachai otsak saikora ali lānmilu.
Nana hithāda hāngra, Proho VAREna kahāngna: Keinung alungli ashee tākhangasaka kala meoma̱ sākhuida khalatta sākhamāng khangasaka keinung nawui atam rārāsara;

Nana ashee tākhangasakwui vang yonhaira, kala nana sākakhui meoma̱na sākhamānghaida; nawui zimiksho na khalattana nganaisang ngasaka, nawui vang ngarān kahai zingkum rāhaira. Chiwui vang ina nali yurbingna zeikhavai kala ngalei saikorana mana̱shi khavai sāmi kahaina.
Nganaida khalei kala tāda khaleinala rotkhamarāt pemting kahai khikha makankhanā nali mana̱shira.
Yanglu, nawuili khalei Israelwui wungnaobingna kachichāwui pangshap athishurda ashee katā ot sai.
Nathumwui alungli ava̱ avāli ningkachaida sai, nathumwui alungli kha̱ramkazat milila takzai, marānaobing kala ra̱meinaobingli mashun mayangmimana.
Iwui kathara otli nana yangkharinghaira, kala iwui sabbathla makhao ngasakhaira.
Nathumwui ngachaili shaothat khavai thara̱kasang mi lei, kala phungreili kashakazā kazā mila zanga, nathumwui alungli phokaphā mila leikapa.
Nathumwui ngachaili avāva̱wui khayāla lāna; kala nawuili kashankharā sha̱naoli ngasokape mila lei.
Akhana khongnai preiva̱li ngashāma, khangatei kaikhana arihāva̱li ngasopi; kaikhana avāva̱wui naongalāva̱ azarva̱li sākhamāngmi.
Nathumwui ngachaili kaikhana shaothat khavai pheisā zai; khongnainaolila lupāranu, otranu, atār kachungkha khuida tongzai; laga ile malaikhokhaowa, da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Yanglu, chiwui vang eina, nathumna makhamashung eina tongkazā kala nathumwui ngachaili ashee tākahai chiwui vang ina pāng kakaphena.
Ina nali kharāk chitharan nathum khāngshapralā, lah nganingshapra̱la?
Ina nathumli yurbingwui ngachaili kashamvāserhaora, kala okathui peida chaivāhaora, kaja nathumwui khamakhao saikora ina shimān ngasakra.
Nathumwui vang yurbingwui mikyanli I shāt kāra; chitharan I
“Miwui naomayara, Israelwui shimkhur iwui vang maripaih sāthuihaira; athum katonga, lupāsāla, pithraila, tinsāla, marila, hārsāla sharkha̱li sangda maripaih sāthuiserhaira.
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna kahāngna: Khikhalajila nathum maripaih sathuiser kahaiwui vang ina nathumli Jerusalemli kazipkhuira.
Mina lupāsāla, pithraila, marila, hārsāla, tinsāla sharkha̱li mengkhavai mei eina kahur thāda, iwui malungkhavāt eina ina nathumli kazipkhuira, kala ina nathumli sangda mengngasakra.
Ina nathumli kazipkhuilaga iwui malungkhavātwui mei eina malirorra, kala nathumli chiwui alungli mengtā ngasakra.
Lupāsā sharkha̱li mengkhangasak thāda; nathumlila chili mengngasakra; chieina
Kala
“Miwui naomayara, ali hānglu, na malungkhavāt atamli masākhamathā lah kazing marokharora ngaleina da ali hānglu.
Awui wungnaobinga, kazingkha̱na nirmamānda sā kashai thāda, athumwui mibingwui manglā shaimihaira; athumna aman kasasaka otla lanla ngapaikhuihaira; athumna kachungkhali ra̱mei ngasakhaira.

Awui pāngmonbingna iwui ain kailaga iwui kathara ot sāmakhaomiserhaira; athum kathar eina khangachā chi mangatei ngasakmana, kala athumna iwui sabbathla matheimimana, chithāhaoda ili athumwui alungli makhao ngasaka.
Awui alungli khalei wungnaobing, khara̱ngna sā makeikakhanār thāda, ashee tāngasaka, makhamashung apong eina tongkhavai manglā sāshimāna.
Kala pāngmonbingna ayarli shunu kachar teikhaningda mang machutkhaninga kala khanong sākhaninglaga
Mibingnala takkazā phama̱kashao otsakla sai; athumna khangazana kala khavātabingli rekhareka, kala kha̱ram kazata mibingwui eina takzāda mayangmimana.
Athumli masāshimānmi khavai athum eina iwui ngachaili nganingkhame mi akha ina phai, kha ina akhanida masamphangmana.
Chiwui vang ina iwui malungkhavāt athumwuitungli heirorhaira. Iwui malungkhavātwui mei eina ina athumli yumngasakhaira, athumwui otsak athumwuitungli tāra da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Miwui naomayara, ava̱ akhawui naongalāva̱ khani leisai;
anina Egyptli khayorwui ot sai; ani nganuilakhawui eina thuida khayorwui ot sai; sungthei singnganao ngasaka, kala mongkhuila mayutnganao ngasaka.
Khararva̱li Oholah hoi, agatuiva̱li Oholibah hoi. Ani iwui ngasāhaowa, kala anina mayarnaola sha̱naola pharākhui. Oholah kaho hiya Samaria kajina, kala Oholibah hiya Jerusalem kajina.
Iwui ngasāsālala Oholahna khayorva̱̱wui acham sāzata; kala ana awui leikashe Assyriabing,
hungrisi kachon khangavai rai kapingbing, ngalei khamungbing, raimi kathānabing, mayar khamathāthābing, kala sigui raimibinglila ngahānngailaka.
Assyriawui yārkhokhoka khamathāthābingli ngasopi, kala ana ngahānkhangai saikorawui meoma̱ chieina akhalatta sākhamangkhui.
Egyptli leilakha khayorva̱̱wui acham kasā chi mathāhailakmana; kaja a nganuilakha yaronnaobingna ali ngasopida awui sungthei singnganaoda ngasopichinga.
Chiwui vang eina ina awui leikashe Assyrianaobingwui pāngli horsangmi kahaina.
Athumna awui khayā lāna; athumna awui naobing sha̱naola mayarnaola tukkhui; kala athumli raighai eina shaothata; kala awuitungli bichar kasā tharan sha̱naowui ngachaili tantakchān ngasāvaihaowa.
“Achināva̱ Oholibahna hi thei, chithālala khamathanglungli achināva̱li ana zakshimeida khayorva̱̱wui ot sai, achinaova̱wuili zakshimeikhara.
Ana Assyriawui khamungbing, raimi kathānabing kala rai sāri peida shakkasābing, sigui raimibing, kala mayar khamathāthābingli ngahānngailaka.
A sākhamānghaira kaji ina thei; kala ani khanini apong ngaraichāda zata.
“Kha ana awui khayor otsak zakshimeida savai; Chaldeanaobingwui ama̱ machu shoklak eina yeklaga phākholi hokthāng kahai chili leishi,
athumwui kashānli khanjat neida, kuili kakhanonga kuitei teilaga otva̱wui kathāna Chaldeawui eina kharā Babylonwui mi thai.
Chi theilaga ana athumli ngahānngailakhaowa, kala Chaldeali paome chihovai.
Kala Babylonnaobingna rāngasopiya, kala athumna athumwui khamathang chieina ali sākhamanghaowa; athumna ali sāmakhaomi kahai thili, ana athumwui eina ningkachaida thuihaowa.
Ana phonglāk eina khayorwui acham sāzata kala khamahong chitheikazat chi theilaga achinava̱wui eina ina thuikahai thāda, ina awui einala ningkachaida thuihaowa.
Chithālala nganuilakha Egyptli khayorwui acham sākasā chi machihohailakmana, kala mataikhangai mataida sai,
kala ana gadhāwui thāda khayā kahaka, kala siguiwui thāda pha̱ra̱ khaunga athumli ngahānngailaka.
Chithāda sāda Egyptnaobingna nakhaishāng mayutlaga sungthei singnganaoda sopkhamasāp chili nana kahaosai.”
Chiwui vang eina, O Oholibah, Proho VAREna kahāngna: “Yanglu, nana ningkachaida horkahai nawui leikashiabing chili ina ningmathuk ngasakta apam kachiva̱wui eina nali mamayāmara:
Babylonnaobing, kala Chaldeanaobing, Pekod, Shoa, kala Koa; Assyrianaobing, mayar khamathābing, lammungabing, raimi kathānabing, otva̱bing, kapingabing, sigui raimibing, athum saikora,
atungshong eina, talla̱, chāngvei, kuirop sangda nali rāngararra; kala ina athumli bichar sāngasakra, athumwui ningkachāng athishurda athumna nali bichar sāra.

Kala athumna sāshilak eina sāngasak khavai iwui malungkhavāt nawuitungli tāra. Athumna nathumwui nātangla, khanāla rimtāmira, kala kataibingna raighai eina thira. Athumna nanaomayara kala naongalāva̱bing tukkhuira, kala katai khangateibing chi mei eina chuithatra.
Athumna nawui kashankachon raimathāmihaida, chara̱-chāsān khamathāthā ngapaithuihaora.
Chithāda ina Egyptwui eina phungkharā nawui sokhamasap, khayorawui acham chi tangngasakra; chieina nana Egyptnaobingli mayangkāluimara lah akhala maphaningungluimara.”
“Kaja Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, nana ningkakachaiya kala yangkakharinga athumwui pāngli ina nali horsangmira;

kala athumnala nali yangkharingda sāra, kala nana khanangda sākahaiwui heithei saikora ngapaikhuiserhaora, kala nali mahonghat haimira, kala nawui khangashāmwui khamahong chitheimira. Nawui khamathang kala khangashāmna
nawuitungli hi khuikharāna, khikhalajila nana yurbingli khayorwui acham sāzata kala athumwui meoma̱ eina nakhalatta sāmakhaowa.
Na nachinava̱wui athi shurthuihaira; chiwui vang eina awui tengkot napāngli ina mira.”
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga:
“Nachinava̱wui khorām nana mangra,
chi haklaka, kapemla pemtinghai;
nali mibingna theida mana̱shira, kazeila zeira,
kaja chili kachungkha zanga;
nali khamarip kala wukkakhanang chipemira.
Khangachee khangachā eina ngachakyāng kahaiwui khorām,
nachinava̱ Samariawui khorāmna;
nana chi mangkupmihaora kala nawui kuisam sheishokra kala namathik serkazamra;
kaja ina hānghaira da Proho VAREna hānga.”
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: “Ili nana malaihaida kala nawui khanukshong haikahaiwui vang, ara nawui khamathang kala khayorva̱̱wui acham sākazatwui sāman phunglu.”
Kaja anina phophāhaoda, chiwui ashee aniwuitungli lei; athumwui meoma̱lila anina phokaphā ot sai, athumli kashakazā sākhavai ili pharākhami naomayarabing eina tangda pha̱phayai.
Chili lāngda ili hithāda sai: chithang iwui kathara shim makhao ngasaka kala iwui sabbath sākhamānghaowa.
Kaja anina anaomayarali aniwui meoma̱li pha̱phayā khavai shaothatthang, chithang ngalāngda anina iwui shim sāmakhao khavai zanga. Yanglu, hina anina iwui shimli kasa chi.
“Anina apam katāva̱li khalei athum eina tangdalila ahokhui khavai mi chihovāda athumna rai. Athumwui vang nana ra̱vai mathai, mikli neowa, kala na khalatta sāri-khongnāng hiyāyā ngathet ngachai.
Pamkhong khamathā mashonshei kahaili pama, mangāli table runghaida chiwuitungli iwui nganamkaphā ot kala thao ayuryur haihai.
Zaikazā ashangva̱wui akhonna ali kuinama, kala khikha masā khavai khamaripnao lamhāngwui eina ahokhuida athumna anili kazao sangmi kala kuihonla khamathāthāva̱ ngahonmi.
Chieina ina hānga, Ali khangashāmbing hila phokaphā maningmala?
Kaja khayorva̱̱ sha̱naoli khangaso thāda athumnala ali ngasoi. Chithāda Oholahli kala Oholibahlila somasap khavai athumna phārai.
Kha khangarongbingna athumwuitungli phokaphāwui shongrān lāngra, sha̱naona ashee tākhangasakwui shongrān eina; kaja ani phokaphā sha̱naona, kala aniwuitungli ashee lei.”
Kaja Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “Rasākazammihaida mina yanglaga khangachee-khangachā sākhavai mi kachungkha khuirālu.
Khara ashangva̱ china ngalung eina anili horthatra, kala raighai eina shātthatra; sha̱nao mayarnao athumwui naomayarabing shaothatserra kala athumwui shim meili riktāra.
Chithāda sāda ngalei hili sokhamasāp ot masā ngasakluimara, kala anina kasā thāda sha̱nao khangateina masāleng khavai sāchitheira.
Kala nana sokhamasāpwui vang kashong sāphalungra, kala meoma̱li phaningda morei kasāwui kashong runphalungra; chieina, I Proho VAREna da nathumna theira.”
Kachiko kum, kachāng katharāwui zimiksho katharāthang,
“Miwui naomayara, zimiksho hiwuichao aming kapikhuilu. Aja zimik Babylonwui awungana Jerusalem khuikhavai rākuinamhaira.
kala ngakaikashe shimkhur hili tamkhuikapai khararchān eina hithāda hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga:
Ham pāngkālu,
tara̱la sanglu;
kala sāmarim aphibing chi chili sanglu,
khamathā amarimbing, apheisā kala apāngsā;
shaikaphā ara̱kui eina chipemlu.
Asā phāmeikap kaji yaonao khuilu,
thing phāsanglaga sā chi hānglu, ara̱kuila sāsanglu.”
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Ashee katā keinung, maripaih kashutla makatā ham chi kalākashi ngasāranu! Chiwui eina sā malim chi makapangla amalim ava̱va̱ khuishoklu.
Kaja ana tākhangasak ashee chi aruila awuili leichingda lei; ana ngaleili heitāda zithui khavai masāla tāngpat kahai lunghārtungli heirora.
Malung thuida athut khuikhavai ana ashee heiror kahai chi mathumpai khavai ina lunghār chiwuitungli pama.”
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: Ashee tākhangasaka keinung chi kalākashi ngasāranu! Inala rikkhavai thing kachungkha phāsangra.
Thing kachungkha pongsanglu, mei sākalu, sā chi mathālak eina hānglu, kala ara̱ chi heishoklu, kala ara̱kuibing chuitā ngasaklu.
Chiwui thili ham chi khamasai eina sākhavai meithātungli phumkālu, chiwui pithraila chuira, chiwui khamakhaobing chi chili mengsangra, chiwui maripaihla chuitāra.
Aremali ina chotkachāngna; maripaih shātok kahai chi meinala marontārarthuwa.

Chiwui maripaih kapai chi nawui sokhamasapna. Nawui khamakhao chi ina sāmathākhui khavai sai, kha nawui khamakhao matharkhuipaithuwa; iwui malungkhavāt nawuitungli manemranglakha eina tangda na masāmathākhuipaimara.
ina hangkahaina, hi ungshunglakra, ina chi sālakra, ina mangalanlakmara, ina mahailakmara, ining mangacheilakmara, nawui kasākhavā otsak athishurda bichar sāra, da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Miwui naomayara, yanglu, nawui mikli khangayam chi ina kashuirak eina khuithuimihaora, chithālala nana masifamara kachapla machapmara, nawui chāra̱la malongtāmara.
Sifalala, akhon mashokmara; kathiwui vang makhanangmara. Nawui kuitei teilu kala pheihopla sanglu, nakhamor makatimlu, lah sikafabingwui zāt mazālu.”
Chiwui vang eina ina mibingli ngathorshong tui hi hāngchithei, kala ngazinshong ipreiva̱̱ thihaowa. Kala akhama kathā ngathorshong ili kakaso chiwui athishurda ina sai.
Kala mibingna ili hānga, “Nana hithāda ithumli kasā hi ithumwui vang kakhalat khi leikhala?”
Chieina ina athumli ngahānkai, “

Israel shimkhurli ahānglu: Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Yanglu, nathumwui lāngso khavai pangshap, mikwui khangayam kala nathumwui manglāna kakahao iwui kathara shim chi ina makhao ngasakta, nanao ngarā sha̱naola mayarnaola nothā kahaibing chi raighai eina chithitra.
Kala ina sākahai thāda nathumna sāra; nathumwui morchai makatimara, lah sikafabingwui zātla mazāpaimara.
Nathumna kuiteila teira, pheihopla sangra; nathumna masifa lah kachapla machapngachāmara, kha nathum khayonkhamāngwui alungli akha eina akha ngahui ngarokra.
Chiwui vang eina Ezekiel hi nathumwui vang machut akha ngasāra; ana kasāsā saikora nathumla sāra. Hi ungkashung tharan I Proho VAREna da nathumna theira.”
“Kha na, miwui naomayara, athumwui raipan, athumwui khamathān khamareo, mikwui khangayam, athumwui ningwui kakahao, anaongarā sha̱nao mayarnao, ina khuikathui tharan,
chithanghon yāmkazat mi akhana chānpao chi nali hāngkhavai rāra.
Chithang zimik nakhamor makāda yāmkazata chili chān ngazekra, khak mangasha̱luimara. Chithāda nana athumli machutkhui khavai ngasāra; kala I
“Miwui naomayara, Ammonnaowuishong ngareivāda athumli makhamayā tui marānmilu.

Ammonnaobingli hānglu, Proho VAREwui tui nganālu: Proho VAREna hānga, Khikhalajila nathumna iwui kathara shim sakhamakhao tharan, Israelwui ngalei ramcho kahai tharan, kala Judahwui shimkhur raithā kahai tharan ‘Aha!’ da kahāngwui vang;
ina zingshoshongwui mibingwui pāngli nathumli horsangkhamina; kala athumna nathumwui ngachaili shim rāsāpamda nathumwui athei athumna shaimihaora, kala nathumwui seina̱la mangmihaora.
Ina Rabbah ut homphung sāngasakra, kala Ammonnaobingwui keinung yaohomphung sāngasakra. Chieina I
“Kaja Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Khikhalajila Israelwui ngaleili mamayāmada nathumna pāng kakaphewui vang kala phei kakathangwui vang,

yanglu, iwui pāng ina nawuitungli katingshokhaira, nali yurbingna ngaponkakhui ngasā khavai horsangmira; kala ina nathumli mibingwui eina katatmihaida ngaleiwui eina shimān ngasakra; Ina nathumli sākazamhaora. Chieina I
chiwui vang Moabwui zingshoshong khalei khamathā keinung Beth-jeshimoth, Baal-meon kala Kiriathaim hibing hiwui khāmong shomihaora.
Ammonnaobingli ngasoda hibing hi zingshoshongwui mibingli ina khuikhavai mira, chithāda yurbingwui alungli athumli maphaningungluimara,
kala Moabwuitungli ina bichar sāra. Chitharan I
Proho VAREna hānga, Edomwuitungli ipāng katingshokra, kala chiwui eina mila sha̱keila katatmihaora, kala ina chi ramcho sāngasakra; Temanwui eina thuilaga Dedan vāpeida athum raighai eina thira.

Kala Edomnaobingli iwui mi Israelnaobingwui pāng eina iwui athut hāngsangra, kala Edomli athumna iwui malungkhavāt kala iwui malungkakang athishurda Edomli sāmira; chieina athumna iwui athut kakhui theira, da Proho VAREna hānga.”
