Proho VAREna hānga, Yanglu, Philistinenaoli ipāng katingshokra, kala ina Cherethbingli katathaora, kala ngayipheili khalei kateibing sākazamserhaora.
Malungkanglak kahai hāngkhamachin eina ngasoda athumli kasaka athut khuira. Ina athut kakhui tharan I
“Miwui naomayara, khikhalajila Jerusalemwui pongli Tyrena, ‘Aha, mibingwui ngavei kaihaira, iwui vang shomihaira, ā ara sāshimānhaoda I mathun khavai sāra,’ da kahāngwui vang,
Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, ina mamayāmana, O Tyre! ngayi khangaphao thāda nali ngarar khavai ina yur kachungkha khuirāra.
Athumna Tyrewui ngaveila, raikānphungla sakhaimihaida nawui leithaola seoshokmihaora, lunghār thāda haimira.
Ngayilungli khaih kaphābingna khailan hārkhavai apam ngasāhaora; kaja ina hānghaira da Proho VAREna hānga; kala ali yurbingna ngaponnganao khavai sāra;
kala anao ngalāva̱bing kha̱lungli raighai eina thira. Chitharan I
“Kaja
Kayāngkhareili nanao ngalāva̱bingli ana raighai eina shātthatra, mayāmshok khavai kuimareida ngalei thongkāda ngaveiphinhaora.
Nawui raipan phākho sākazam khavai kala ngahā eina nawui raikānphung sātekmi khavai chihorāra.

Awui sigui chungnāhaida keinung chifana mikmai matheimara; ana nawui ngaveili rākazang tharan, ngayāng kahaiya keinungli kazang thāda, ana nawui ngaveili rākazang tharan, sigui raimiwui, siguigariwui akhon china ngavei nganukyikhaora.
Nawui chānrei kachiva̱ awui siguina pemtaihaora, ana nawui mibingli raighai eina shātthatra; kala nawui khamakanga pakra̱la pitāserhaora.
Nawui lan kala nawui leihkhalon ot saikora ngaponkhuira, athumna nawui ngaveila sakhaimihaida nawui khamathā shimbing sakhaimihaora; thingla, ngalungla, ngaleila tara̱lungli horsangmihaora.
Kala ina nawui nganākhangai laa ngasām ngasakhaora, kala mazuila makhong ngasakluimara.
Ina nali lungzilunghārmāng sāmihaida khaih kaphābingna khailan phuikhavai sāra; nawui keinung masākāluilakmara kaja
“Proho VAREna Tyreli hithāda hānga: Nana mayuithuda, khamā kaza̱bingna ringkhangā, kathibingwui akhon shālaga ngayipheili khaleibing manganukmarala?

Chieina ngayi ngalemli khalei wungnaobing wungpamkhongwui eina tungda wungnaosāri raihaida kala aphor phorkasang kachon raihaida kathirri eina pamra; athumna ngaleitungli pamda mikkhayip kachida kathirra, kala nali theilaga ngacheeyikhaora.
Kha nawui vang malung ringda chapngachāra: kala nali hāngra,
‘Yireiwui eina kathāda shimānhao,
O aming kazata keinung,
pangshapa shamadru sākasā, na kala nawui mibing,
ramrei kachida ngachee khangasaka sākasā na.
Ara nawui kashimān zimiksholi yikuirambingna kathira;
mha, na kashimānwui vang yikuiram saikora matakhakhaiya.’
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Ina nawui keinung sākathānmi kahai tharan, mi maokkathui keinung thāda nali shimān ngasakthang, ina nawuitungli kathuka kala hakkhamahā tara̱na tumkhangasak tharan,

ina nali Chomli zangki kajebingli achālakhawui mibingli ngasoda horsangra, kala Chomli tāzang kahai athumli ngasoda, achālakha ngayang kahai apam, kazeiramli okthui ngasakra, chithāda kharingabingwui ngachaili maokthuiluipaimara.
Hukchihaklak eina khangachang ina khuirāra, na kaho maleiluimara; nali phālala masamphangluimara da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Ara miwui naomayara, Tyrewuitungli chapngachālu,
kala, shamadrupheili kapambing, ngayiphei kachungkhali leihkhalona Tyreli hānglu, da Proho VAREna hānga:
O Tyre, nana I khamathā kākashungana da hānga.
Nawui thariva shamadrulungli khaleina;
nali sakakābingna mathā khangasakna.
Nawui matang chikhai, Senirwui eina sākhuisera;
athumna Lebanonwui eina cedarthing akha khui, nawui marikhongwui akhoka pakra̱ sākhavai.
Bashanwui shirimthing eina marikhong huikhavai sākhui;
Cyprus ngayipheiwui matangthing eina chonnar sai,
mafahā sāsanga.
Egyptwui phorrei phorkasang kachon eina sihur sai,
nawui philān sāvai.
Elishah ngayipheiwui khamenga kazing machu kala hungreoseo kahai kachon nawui kachonshimna.
Sidonnaobing eina Arvadnaobingna nawui marikhong hui;
Zemerwui kathethembing marikhong kashireibingna.
Gebalwui khararnaobing,
kathemthembing nawuili lei,
marikhong kakakai athumna saphinmi,
ngayili khalei marikhong ot kasābingla nawuili leisera,
nawui otbing ngatha̱mi khavai.”
“Persia, Lud kala Putwui mi kachungkha nawui raimi sai; athumna chāngvei phunga, kuiropla ropa, athumna nali mai kāngasaka,
Arvad eina Helechwui mina kuimareida nawui phākholi pama, kala Gamadwui mina raikān pama, nawui phākholi athumna chāngvei hokthānghailaga nawui tekhamatei kāshung ngasaka.”
“Nawui lan, lupāsā, mari, tinsā, hārsā kachungkha khaleiwui vang ot eina ngatha̱ khavai Tarshishwui eina leih khalon rai.
Javan, Tubal, kala Meshech athumna nali leih sāruma; nawui otwui vang athumna mi eina kala pithraiwui khorkhong eina ngatha̱ya.
Beth-togarmahna sigui, raisigui, kala gadhā kathā eina nawui ot rāngatha̱ya.
Rhodewui mibingla nali leih sāruma; ngayiphei kachungkha nawui leihngapha̱laka, nawui ot ngatha̱khui khavai athumna mafahā kala ebony thing khuirai.
Nawui ot kachungkha khaleiwui vang Edomnala leih rākasāna; nawui aman kasaka ngalung, khamenga kachon, phorrei phorkasang ot, khamanaka kachon, changjeekor, agate eina ngatha̱khui.
Judah eina Israelwui ngaleina nali leih sai; athumna nawui kehu, olivebing, khaorāthei, khuira̱, thao, kala balm rāngatha̱ya.
Nawui lan kala otyur kachungkha khaleiwui vang Damascusnala Helbonwui atheira̱, sahā kachara,
Uzalwui drakhāra̱ eina nawui ot rāngatha̱khui; mari, cassia, kala camulus eina nawui ot rāngatha̱ya.
Dedanna sigui sāpān sākhavai kachon rāyorsanga.
Arabia kala Kedarwui wungnaobing nawui khamataiya yao, yaonao, me yorkasangabingna.
Sheba eina Raamahwui mibingna otyur khamathāthā, aman kasaka ngalung, sinā hikathā eina nawui ot rāngatha̱da leih khalon ot sai,
Haran, Canneh, Eden, Asshur, kala Chilmad athumla nawuili leih khalon rai.
Athumna kashankachon khamathāthā, kazing machu aphor phorkasanga, awon yekkasanga, kala maruikazazak kahai chonnarham hikathāwui leih khalon sai, kala nawuili rāyorsangsera.
Tarshishwui marikhongna nawui ot yorkhavai phungmi.
Nawui shamadru ngalei otna pemtinghaira.
Nawui marikhong kahuibingna tara̱ khangaphaoli huivāda
zingshoshongwui masina marikhong ngayilungli ngaphumhaira.
marikhong kasingbing kala kashireibing,
kasemabing, ot yorkhamebing,
kala nawui raimi nali khangaso saikora,
nawui ngalemli khalei nali khangasobing
na shimānthang shamadrulungli ngaphumserhaira.
Nawui marikhong kashireibingwui ringkhangā shālaga ngalemli khalei ngaleibing nganuka.”
“Kala huikazat athum hupta marikhongwui eina yāmtāsera.
Kasingbing kala kashireibing ngayipheili nganinga
nawui vang sifaya kala kachapla chapa.
Athumna kuili hotlā neoda chifali ngakhora;
athumna nawui vang kui sitai,
kala bora ngavai,
kala malungringlak eina nawui vang chapngachai.
Malungringlak eina nawui vang athumna chapngachāda hānga:
Tyre kathā shamadrulungli khipāli shimān ngasakhairakhala?
Nawui thongthāng shamadruwui eina khuikharā tharan mi kachungkhali ringphā ngasaka;
nawui sorkhangasai ot kala lan china okathuiwui awungabingli shāngngasaka.
Kha ara shamadrulungli ngaphumda kathukali zanghaira;
nawui otyur saikora, marikhong kahuibingla nali ngaphumrumserhaira.”
“Yireipheili khaleibingna nali theilaga ning saza̱laka;
kala athumwui awungabingnala ngacheenahaida mai ngareithuihaowa.
Mibingwui ngachaili leih khalonbingna nali kasirora;
na hukchihālak eina ngachanghaira kala mangakarluimara.”
“Miwui naomayara, Tyrewui wunganaoli hānglu, Proho VAREna kahāngna:
Nawui ningna langsohaoda,
nana ‘I vare akhana, shamadrulungli varebingwui pamli pama’ da hānga;
kha na mikumona, vare maningmana nana nakhalatta vare thāda thangmeiya da phaninglala.
Mha, Danielli na thangmeimei;
nawui eina ngathum kahai khikha maleimana,
nawui thangmei kala theikakhui eina nana lan kazipkhui,
kazipshimli nana sinā kala lupāsā kazipsanga;
leih khalonwui pongli thangmeihaoda
lan kachungkha kazipkhui;
kala chiwui vang nawui ningna langsoi—
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga:
Nala vare akha thāda thangmeiyada kaphaningwui vang,
yanglu, yurwui ngachaili sāshimeikap kaje makatheiya kha̱mibing ina khuirāra;
kala athumna nawui thangkhameiwui khamathā chili raighai singda ngararra,
kala nawui khayā sākhamāngra.
Athumna Chomli horsangra,
na chili zangthisangra,
shamadrulungli.
Nali shaokathatbingwui mangāli,
nali pāng kakā khamā za̱khami athumwui miktāli,
vare maningla mikumosālala ‘I varena’
da hāngfarala?
Ahui marimkashokawui kathi thāda na,
yur kateibingwui pāngli thira;
kaja ina hānghaira, da Proho VAREna hānga.”
Chili lāngda
“Miwui naomayara, Tyre awungawui vang chapngachālu kala hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga da hānglu:
Nava thangkhameiwui kala kākashungwui pongli shoi khutop akha sāsai.
Varewui yāmgui Edenli pamsai;
aman kasaka ngalungyur saikora nawui sāri ngasāsai,
carnelian, topaz, kala jasper,
chrysolite kala onyx, sapphire, carbuncle,
kala emerald saikora nana sināli ruksangnganaowa.
Nali sāthang chibing chi nawui vang sākahaina.
Tharchisinmi kahai yangkhame cherub akhali nali mayon ngasaka;
na Varewui kathara phungreili leisai
meiwui ngalungtungli nana zātsai.
Nali sākhuithang eina thuida shāt makāsalakmana,
khayonkhamāng ot masāranglakha eina tangda.
Leih sālaga kashāng eina nana sākashi ot sai,
kala nana moreila sai;
chiwui vang eina Varewui phungrei eina,
makathara ot thāda nali khuishok kahaina,
mayonkhame cherubna nali ngalung meipamwui eina kashamhaowa.
Nawui khamathāwui vang nana langsoi,
nawui tekhamateiwui vang nawui thangkhamei shimān ngasaka.
Awungabingna nali theikhavai ina athumwui mangāli nali konglui khangasakna.
Mikhanama leih sāda morei kachungkha kasāwui vang,
nawui kathara shim nana makhao ngasaka;
chiwui vang ina nathumwui alungli mei shokngasak kaji china nali chuiya,
kala ina nali katheibingwui mangāli hotlā sākhangasakna.
Nali kathei athumna ning khananglaka;
na hukchihālak eina ngachanghaira,
mathuirarluilakmara.”
“Miwui naomayara, Sidonshong ngareivāda makhamayā tui marānlu,
kala hithāda hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga:
Yanglu, O Sidon, ina nali mamayāmana;
iwui tekhamatei nathumwui alungli chitheira.
Ina ali bichar kasā tharan;
iwui tharkhamatheng awui lungli theikhangasak tharan;
I
kaja ina chāmrei shirātrāra,
awui chānrei kachida ashee tāra;
kala apam kuimareida raighai eina thiserra.
Chieina I
“Kala Israel shimkhurwui vanga athumli zakshilāk eina kasā kala khamashātabingwui mangāli, lenghuina mapharikluimara, ka̱shātna marungluimara. Chitharan I Proho VAREna da athumna theikhuira.”

“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Ina Israel shimkhurli, athumna yāmkazatpam kachiva̱wui eina kazipkakhui tharan, kala athumli iwui kathar chikathei tharan, iwui rao Jacobli mikahai athumwui lam chili somluira.

Kala athumna ning nganungkhung eina panda shim sāra, lui vāsangra. Athumli zakshilāk eina sāda mana̱kashi khongnainaobingli ina bichar kasā tharan athumva ningnganungkhung eina pamra. Chitharan I athumwui Proho VAREna da athumna theikhuira.”
“Miwui naomayara, Pharaohwuivāk mai ngareivāda ali kala Egyptwuitungli marānmilu;
kala hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga:
Yanglu, Egyptwui awunga Pharaoh,
ina nali mamayāmana.
Awui kongli khalei, ‘Nile kong ina sakhuiya,
chi iwuina’ da kahānga pangshap khalei dragon.
Nali ina khānghui eina namakhāli huikhuira,
kala khaihbingna nawui ahorli hokthāngra;
kala hokkathāng khai saikora chili ngasoda nali tara̱wui eina khāngshokra.
Nalila, kongkhaihbing chilila lamhāngli horhaida ngalei kathengli ina shireohaira,
kachifala machifamara.
Ramsā kala yongkazat vānaobingna nali shaikhavai ina mikahaina.
athum singakha tekhaida athumwui yartui saikora shirkhai; kala athumna nali zungakha tekhaida kashan zangngapoi;
chiwui vang Proho VAREna kahāngna: Yanglu, ina rai ngarar ngasakta mila, sha̱keila chithithaora;
kala Egypt ngalei hi khikha masā khavai ramcho sāngasakra. Chitharan athumna I
“Kachiwui vangkhala kaja, ‘Nile kong ina sākhui, iwuina’ da nathumna hānga.
Chiwui vang, yanglu, ina nathumli, nathumwui kongli mamayāmana; kala Egypt ngalei hi, Migdol eina thuilaga Syene vāshung, Ethiopia vāshungda, khikha masā khavaia ramcho sāngasakra.
Mikumo khipākha phei marāchonsangmara, kala sā eina tangda marāchonmara; kum hangmati khikha maokthuimara.

Ngalei saikorali ramcho kahai lam saikorawui ngachaili Egypt ngalei ramcho ngasakra; kala sākathān kahai keinung saikorali ngasoda kum hangmati ramchora. Ina Egyptnaobing yur kateibingli chaiyāngmihaira.”
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Kum hangmatiwui thili, yur kateiwui ngachaili chaiyāng kahaia Egyptnao saikorali ina kazipkhuiluira;
kala athumna rida pamkhavai Pathros ngalei chili khuiungmida Egyptwui shimlui ina hanmiluira; kala khangazana wungram akha sāda okthuira.
Ngazanmeikap kaje wungram ngasāda yurbingwui ngachaili khayā makāmilakmara, kala ina yurbingwuitungli mamungluilak khavai athumli teongasakhaora.
Kala Israelwui shimkhurna, rida athumli ngasoda morei kasāsā chi phaningunglaga athumli machihānluimara. Chieina I
Zingkum maga̱da kashine kum, kachang kharewui kharethang,

“Miwui naomayara, Tyreli ngarar khavai Babylon awunga Nebuchadnezzarna raimi kachungkhali chotchānglak eina ot sāngasaka; kui saikora simihai kala yartui saikora ngahaka, chithālala a kala awui shipaibing chotman Tyrewui eina khikhala masamphangmana.
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadnezzarli Egypt ngalei ina mihaora, kala athumna lan, ot ngaponkhuida raimibingwui talop sāvaira.
Ina Egypt hi ali mikahaina kaja, ana iwui vang ot samida awui chotman khamina da
“Chithang zimiksho ina Israelwui shimkhur eina angaji akha shokngasakra, kala ina athumwui alungli nathumwui morchai shomira. Chitharan I
“Miwui naomayara, marānlu, kala hānglu; Proho VAREna hithāda hānga:
Iyavo, ungshungkachanghaira da sifalu!
Atam ungshungrāli,
tangkhamanga zimik ngasāra,
yurbingwui kashimān atamna.
Egyptli rai rātara, Ethiopia sipsāra;
Egyptli mibing thikasang, lan ngaponkakhui;
shimphunga nganukyik kahai tharan,
“Ethiopia, Put, Lud, Arabia katonga, Libya kala mijang kasā athum saikora, athumli ngasoda thirumra.”
“Egyptli kahuibing thira,
awui lāngsot pangshap kongluitāra;
Migdol eina haophoklaga Syene eina tangda raighai eina thiserra,
da Proho VAREna hānga.
Okathuiwui ramkachobing thāda Egyptla ramchohaora,
kala sākathānmi kahai keinung thāda,
awui keinungbingla sākathānmihaora.
Egyptli mei thotkatā tharan,
ngachonkhamebingli chithit kahai tharan,
I
“Chithanghon yansāngsa̱ eina khalei Ethiopianaoli iwui eina kathaka paome akha ngachee ngasak khavai chihora; Egypt shimānthang khangachee-khangachā athumwuitungli rāra; kaja, yanglu, chi rāhaira!”
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga:
Babylonwui awunga Nebuchadrezzarwui pāng eina;
Egyptwui lan ina kānmi ngasakra.
Miyurbingwui sāshimeikap kajipāli awui mibingli ngasoda,
ngalei sāshimānmi khavai chihorāra;
kala athumna Egyptli raighai ngawutra kala kathinguna ngalei pemra.
Kala Nile kong ina theng ngasakhaora,
kala ngaleila sākashe mili yorsanghaora;
ina yur khangateiwui mi chihosangda ngalei machomiserhaora;
“Proho VAREna hānga:
meoma̱bing ina sākathānra,
Memphiswui meoma̱ ina shimān ngasakra,
Egypt ngaleili wungnao maleiluimara;
chithāda ina Egypt ngaleili khangachee sangmira.
Pathros ina ramcho ngasakra, Zoan mei sa̱tāra,
kala Thebeswuitungli bichar sāra.
Egyptwui khangazipa raipan Pelusiumwuitungli ina iwui malungkhavāt chihotāra,
kala Thebeswui mibingli katathaora.
Ina Egypt mei sa̱tāra,
Pelusium chotchirhaora;
Thebes vākkhamhaida ngaveila sākhaimiserhaora.
On eina Pibesethwui yaronnaobing raighai eina thira,
sha̱naobing tukthuiserhaora.
Tehaphnehesli ngashun tangmanghaora,
Egypt wungram ina sakakhai tharan;
awui langkaso pangshap ngalathaora,
ali muiyāna ngachuiphinhaora;
kala awui naongalāva̱bing tukthuiserhaora.
Chithāda ina Egyptwuitungli bichar sāra.
Chieina I
Zingkum tharāda kharewui kachāng kharewui zimiksho kashinethang,
“Miwui naomayara, Egypt awunga Pharaohwui pāng ina sātekmihaira; kala yanglu, raighai masingthuklui khavai chonshi eina neilaga khamā raikhavai masāmimana.
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, Egyptwui awunga Pharaohli ina mamayāmana, awui pāng kakanga kala khamākaza̱ khanini chi sātekmihaida raighai apāng eina tātung ngasakra.
Ina Egyptli yurbingwui ngachaili kala ngalei apam kachiva̱li chaiyangvā ngasakra.
Kala ina Babylon awungawui pāng pangsang ngasakra kala iwui raighai apāngli sangmira; kha ina Pharaohwui pāng sātekmira, kala ana khamā maphungkhararra miwui ringkhangā thāda ringāra.
Ina Babylon awungawui pāng pangsang ngasakra, kha Pharaohwui yang kanhaora, chieina athumna I
kala ina Egyptnaobingli yurbingwui ngachaili kala ngalei apam kachiva̱li chaiyāngva ngasakra. Chitharan athumna I
Zingkum tharāda kharewui, kachang kakathumawui zimiksho kharethang,
“Miwui naomayara, Egyptwui awunga Pharaohli kala awui mi saikorali hānglu:
Nawui khangam thāda khipā leikhala?
Yanglu, ina Lebanonwui cedarthingli nali chānsam sāra;
khamathā thingphāng,
juimatailaka, aton kazing kāzoka,
ngahong thāda khaya̱ sāmi.
Tara̱na nganaoda juilak eina phora,
phorkhavai apamli ura̱ shokta kong longngasaka,
ngahongthing saikorali aza̱sera.
Chithāda tara̱ kachungkha samkaphangwui vang,
aphāngla kahahak asānla sānglaka;
ngahongwui thing saikorali juimeithui kaje thing ngasai;
thingpheili sāna anao rāpharāsanga;
kala awui khaya̱li yur kahakbingna okthui.
Angayungna kathukva̱li zangda tara̱ kachungkha samphanga,
kala aphāng kasangsangva̱ kāda,
chiwui hakkhamahā chi mathālaka.
firnala
sycamore thingla khikha mangatampai;
Varewui yāmguili khalei thing chiwui khamathā thāda mazanglakmana.
Chiwui aphāng katonga ina mathālak eina sāmi,
kala Varewui yāmgui Edenli khalei thing saikorana kahaowa.
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: juishun eina phorda muiyā kākazokwui vang, awui ningli langsohaoda,
ina miyurbingwui ngachaili pangshap khaleiya chiwui pāngli horsangmira; kala awui makaphā makhayā athishurda ana sāmira. Ina horsangmi kahaina.

Sāshimeikap kaje miyur khangateina ta̱teklaga horhaora. Kaphunglila tampāklila aphāngnaobing horkathānvāhaora, kala aphāng kahahak chila kongpamli teksangra, kala okathuiwui mikumona chiwui khaya̱pam eina thuiserhaora.
Ngayāng kahai chiwui aphāng ngachachaili sāyurna rāpira, vānaona rāngayinra.

Hiwui eina thuida tara̱pamwui thingrong kajuiya muiyā makāzokluimara; kaja tara̱ zimkhamanga thing khangachā chiyākha majuiluimara, athumli chithit kahaina, kazeikhurli zangkahai kathinaoli ngasoda tangmangting kahai apam chili pamrumra.”

Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “Kathewui ramli khavā tharan kathuka china sifara, kala kong thenghaida tara̱ kachungkha malongmara. Lebanonli ina tangkhamang eina shaksāmira, kala luili khalei thingrong saikora chiwui vang eina ngahuihaora.

Ina Chomli khavā athumli ngasoda Kathewui ramli horkasangwui akhon shālaga miyurbing nganukra; tara̱na khanganaowa Edenwui thingrongbing, mathāmeikap kaji kala phāmeikap kaji Lebanonwui thingrong saikora kazeiramli ringphāra.
Raikhai eina thikahai athumla Kathewui ramli zangra; mha, yurbingli ngasoda chiwui khaya̱li okathuibing shimānserra.

“Edenwui thingrong ngachaili hakkhamahāliranu, tekhamateiliranu, na khipali ngaruikhala? Edenwui thingrongbingli ngasoda nalila kazeiramli vāngasakra; ahui marimkashokbing kala raighai eina kathibingli nana ngasoda pamra.” Hi Pharaoh kala awui mi katongana da Proho VAREna hānga.
Zingkum tharāda kakhanewui, kachang tharāda kakhanewui zimiksho kharethang,
“Miwui naomayara, Egyptwui awunga Pharaohwui vang chapngachāda ali hānglu:
Na khalatta yurbingwui ngachaili kazingkha̱ thāda phaninga,
kha nava shamadruwui dragon kathāna;
nawui kongli shokzatta,
tara̱ naphei eina makhui ngasaka,
kala athumwui kong nganamshi ngasaka.
Proho VAREna hithāda hānga:
Mi kachungkhali ngasoda ina khailan horsangra,
kala nali ina iwui khailan eina horkhuira.
Kala ina nali ngalei kathengli shireohaida,
lamhāng khamasaili horhaora,
kala yongkazat vānaoyur nali rāpa̱ ngasakra,
kala ina okathuili khalei sāyurli rāshai ngasakra.
Ina nawui asā kaphunglila yaovāserra,
tampākbinglila nawui kathingunna pemra.
Ina ngalei kala phungreibing eina tangdalila nawui longkazat ashee eina yingasakra;
tara̱papamlila chipemvā ngasakra.
athumwui sirāla mahor ngasakmara;
ina zimikli muiyā eina fakhamhaora, kachāngna awui kahor mamimara.
Kazingramwui kahor saikora nawuitungli ina tangmang ngasakra,
kala tangkhamang nawui ngaleili sangmira, da
Proho VAREna hānga.
“Nana makathei ngalei, kala miyurbingwui ngachaili tukkhavā tharan mi kachungkhawui ning ina ngatha̱ ngasakra.
Iwui raighai eina sākachithei tharan mi kachungkhana nali theida ngacheera, awungabingnala ningrei-shingakra; nawui kashimān chi theilaga saikora ngacheeyikhaora.”
Kaja Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “Babylon awungawui raighai nawuitungli tāra.
Ina miyurbingwui ngachaili pangshap khaleiya, yurbingwui ngachaili sāshimeikap kaje athumwui raighai eina nawui mi katonga thingasakra.”
“Athumna Egyptwui langkaso arema sāngasakra,
kala chiwui mi katonga shimānserra.
Tara̱pamli homkapam sha̱kei saikora ina yummira;
kala chili mipheina kalā mashi ngasakluimara,
lah sha̱keiwui pheichonna athumli kalā mashi ngasakluimara.
Chiwui thili tara̱ chi ina mathing ngasakra,
kala kong kachiva̱ thao khalong thāda longngasakra, da
Proho VAREna hānga.
Egypt ngalei ina ramchomi khangasak tharan,
ngalei chipemda khalei saikora ina khuithuiser kahai tharan,
chili pānkasā mibingli sāthat kahai tharan,
I
Chapchāt hi laa thāda sāra; Egyptwui vang kala awui mi atongawui vang, yurbingwui naongalāva̱bingna hithāda chapchāt laa sāra da Proho VAREna hānga.”
Zingkum tharāda kakhanewui, kachāng khare, zimiksho tharāda kaphangāthang,
“Miwui naomayara, Egypt katongawui vang sifalu; awui kala khangama yurwui naongalāva̱bing, kazeiramli khaleibing chiwui Chomli horsangserhaolu:
“Khamathā nana khipāli mataikhala?
Taulu, kala ahui marimkashokbingli ngasopilu.”
“Raikhai eina kathibingli ngasoda athumla thira, kala ali ngasoda mi saikora thirumra.
Athumna ningkakachaiya kala raighai eina thikahaibingli ngasoda pamkhavai kazeiramli khavā tharan, kapinga athumna, ‘Athumla rāhaira’ da hāngra.
“Assyria kala ali khangayur saikora, athum raighai eina kathibingwui chikhurna kuinamda chili piserdalei,
athumwui chikhur chomkhurwui kathukali lei, kala awui chikhurli ngasotnaobingwuina kuinama; mi kachiva̱li ngachee khangasakabing chi, raighai eina pitāserhaira.

“Elam kala awui mibing raighai eina pitā kahaibingli ngasoda chili piserda lei, kharingabingwui okathuili ngachee-ngacham ngasaka, athumna ahui marimshokla kazeiramli zanga, kala akhurli tākazanga athumli ngasoda maikashi phungruma.

Athumna awui pet, pitā kahai awui mibingwui ngachaili sāmi, raighai eina sāthat kahaibing, ahui marimkashokabingwui chikhurna ali kuimareiya; athumna okthuilakha yurbingli ngachee-ngachām ngasaka, kala akhurli tākazanga athumli ngasoda maikashi phungruma; athumla pitā kahaibingwui ngachaili chipeta.
“Meshech eina Tuballa aniwui shipaibingwui chikhurna kuimarānda lei. Athum saikora ahui marimshokla raili sāthatserhaira. Kha atam akhali athumna mibingwui malung kashamkhaimisai.

Athumli achālakhawui kaping kapangabingwui thāda khayākalāk eina machifamana, raighai khumkuili masangmimana, changveila machiphunmana. Kaping kapangabing hi atam akhali kharingabingli malung kashamkhaimishapsai.
“Hithāda Egyptnaobingla ahui marimkashoka raili sāthat kahaibingli ngasoda chithitra.
“Edomna awui awunga kala ngalei khamungabing chili ngasopamdalei. Athum pangshap khaleiya raimibing sāsai, kha ara kathebingwui ramli ahui marimkashoka raili thikahaibingli ngasoda pida lei.

“Atungshongwui wungnaobing kala Sidonnaobing saikora leiser dalei. Atam akhali athumwui pangshapna malung kashamkhaimisai, kha ara ahui marimshokla, raili kathebingli ngarumda maishiri athum zanghaira, kala kathinaobingwui ramli tākazanga athumli ngasoda maikashi phungruma.
“Raili sāthat kahai saikora chi theida awunga Pharaoh kala awui shipaibingwui vang ninglum khavai ngasāra,” da Proho VAREna hānga.

“Kaja ana kharingabingwui ngaleili leilakha malung kashamkhaimi; chiwui vang eina ahui marimkashoka, Pharaoh kala awui mibing raighai eina sāthat kahaibingwui ngachaili maishiri eina chizanra,” da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Miwui naomayara, nawui mibingli hithāda hānglu, ina ngalei akhali raighai chi khuiraakha, kala ngalei chiwui mibingna athum ngachaiwui eina mi akha khuida, ali athumwui shantri sāngasakta;
mipā china raighai chi kharā theida, talla̱ khongda mibingli hāngmathinlaga;
kachikathā mi akhana hāngkhamathin talla̱khon chi shālaga mashitsangakha, kala raighai china rāda ali khuithuiakha, awui ashee chi akhalattawuitungli tāra.
Ana talla̱khon chi shāda, kala ning mangasharakha; awui ashee chi akhalattawuitungli tāra. Kha ana hāngkhamathin chi khuisangakha, ana awui manglā kahui samphangra.

Shantripāna raighai kharā chi theilaga talla̱ makhongmimada mibingna raighai kharā chi makatheiwui vang kachikathāli rāsāthathaiakha, mipa chi awui khayon eina kathina jilala awui kashong chi shantripā chiwuitungli ina tāngasakra.”
“Chiwui vang, miwui naomayara, Israelwui shimkhurwui vang ina nali shantri sākhavai sangkahaina; iwui tui kahahāng nana athumli hāngmathinmiki kajina.

Makhayā mili ina, O makhayā mi, na thiphalungra da hānglaga, nana makhayā mi chili ning ngatei khavai mahāngmathinmiakha, makhayā mi china awui khayonwui vang thira, kha chiwui kashong chi ina nawuitungli tāngasakra.
Kha nana ning ngatei khavai makhayābingli hāngmathinlaga ana manganāmada mai mangareiungakha, awui khayonwui vang a thiphalungra, kha nana nawui mirin kankhuira.”
“Miwui naomayara, Israelwui shimkhurli hānglu, nathumna, ithumwui morei kala khayonkhamāngwui vang hiyākha ngazan kahaina, ara kathāda ringluipairakhala? da nathumna hānga.
Athumli hānglu: Vare

“Miwui naomayara, nawui mibingli hānglu, khangaronga mi china khalāng ot sahaisakha awui khangarong china mahuimimara; kala makhayā mi china awui makhayā otsakwui eina ningngateida latungakha kharing samphangra; khangaronga mina awui khangarong chieina maringrarmara.
Khangaronga mili ina ringngasakra da hānglala, khalattawui khangarongli shitsangda morei sāhaisakha, awui khangarong ot akhala maphaningungmimara, kha ana morei kasā chiwui vang thira.
Latluida makhayā mili, ‘Na thiphalungra’ da hānghailala, awui makhayā otwui eina mai ngareiungda khamashung eina sākhangayi saakha,
makhayā mi china hamkahai chi hanmiluida, likakhui otla hanmiserhaiakha, kala okathuiwui shiyan mayonda morei masāluiakha, ana ringlakra, a mathilakmara.
Ana morei sākahai malaimiserhaida awuitungli maphaningluimara, ana khamashung ain zatkhangayi sāhaira, a ringlakra.
“Kha nawui mibingna, athumwui khayonpa hailaklaga, ‘
Khangaronga mina awui mai ngareithuihaida morei saakha, chiwui vang a thira.
Kala makhayā mina awui makhayā apong eina ningngateida khamashung zatkhangayi zatakha, chieina ana kharing samphangra.
Kha nathumna, ‘
Yāmkashoka mipā chi marāranglakha ayā kathā
“Miwui naomayara, sāshimānmi kahaia Israelwui ngaleili khaleibingna, ‘Abrahamva amānga, kala ana lam hi samphanga; ithumva kachungkhaya, kachangkhat eina ithumli metchang kahaina’ da hāngda lei.

“Chiwui vang eina athumli hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga: Nathumna asā ashee eina ngarumda shai, kala nathumwui mik meoma̱li yanga, kala ashee shokngasaka; chithakha lam hi nathumna samphangpaira da phaningla?
Nathumna raighai ngasina, nathumna ningkakachai ot sai kala khongnai preiva̱li sākhamānga; chithākha nathumna ngalei chi khuirala?

“Athumli hibing hi hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga: Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna kaja, sakathān kahaipamli khaleibing raighai eina thiserra; kala lamli khaleibingli ina sāli chishaira; keinungli khalei kala lungkhurli khaleibing kazātkashi eina chithitra.
Kala ina ngalei hi ramchomihaora; kala awui khangamkharei pangshap maleiluimara; kala Israelwui kaphung eina tangda ramchomihaida khipākha marāchonsangluimara.
Ningkakachai ot athumna sākahai saikora hiwui vang apam hi ramchomi kahai chitharan, I
“Miwui naomayara, nawui vanga, nawui apongli ngazekta khalei nawui mibing shim phako kachida kala khāmongphei kachida, ‘Rālu,
Mibingwui thāda athumnala rai kala nana kahāng chi nganākhui, kha kasāva masāmana; khamorle leikashi tui kachungkha hānga, kha alungshonga khalatta tongzā khavaimāng sai.
Yanglu, athumwui vanga na hi, leikashiva̱li rokshot unglak eina laa sākachiphun thāda kala tingteila leishiri eina huikachithei thāda, nawui tui nganākhui, kha athumna kasāva masāmara.
Hi ungkashung tharan—kala mashoilakla ungshungra—chitharan athumwuili marān akha leisai kaji theikhuinaora.”

“Miwui naomayara, Israelwui yaokahomabingwuitungli marānmilu, marānlu, kala athumli hānglu, yaokahomabing eina tangdalila, Proho VAREna kahāngna: O Israelwui yaokahomabing, khalatta phākachizātbing! Yaokahomabingna yaobingli phāchizātki kaji maningmala?
Asā nathumna shai, athumwui ahah kachon sākhuida ngavai, asā kakākā taithatshai, kha nathumna yaobingli maphāchizatmana.

Khangazanabingli nathumna pangkhavai masāmimana, kakazāli maraimimana, pheipāng katekali mangahāmimana, pākthui kahaibingli mangakuikhuimana, shimān kahaibingli maphavāmana; kha tandi milaga sāshilak eina athumli nganaowa.
Chithāda athumli homkhame mi makhaleiwui vang kachichāpāk eina thuihaida athum ramsāwui sāshai ngasāhaowa.
Iwui yaobing pākyanghaida phungrei kachida kala phungrā kachida ma̱zata; okathui peida vāshunga, kha khipānakha maphāvāmana.”
“Chiwui vang eina yaokahomabing!

Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, da Proho VAREna hānga, khikhalajila yaokahoma makhaleiwui vang, iwui yao saikora sāshai ngasāhao, kala iwui yao saikora sāyurbingwui kashakazā ngasāhaowa; kala iwui yaokahomabingna iwui yaobingli maphāla kala maphāchizatla athum khalatta phāshakhaokada;
chiwui vang eina yaokahoma nathum,

Proho VAREna hithāda hānga, Yanglu, athumli ina mamayāmara; iwui yaobingwui kashong nathumwuitungli tāra, kala yaobingwui asāla mashai ngasakluimara. Athumna mashailui khavai iwui yaobingli ina athumwui khamor eina ngatangkhuira.”
“Kaja Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, I khalattana iwui yaobingli aphākhuira.
Yao kachichā eina kazat tharan yaokahomabingna aphākakhui thāda inala iwui yaobingli aphākhuira; kala kakhanang kachot atamli kachichāpāk eina kazat apam kachiva̱wui eina ina ngatangkhuiserra.
Kala ina mibingwui eina khuishokta, ngalei apam kachiva̱wui eina kazipkhuiserra, kala athumwui ngaleili khuiungmira; kala ina Israelwui kaphung tara̱ khaleipam kala mina okkathui apam kachida mizāra.
Ina athumli wonui katimpamli phazā ngasakra, kala Israelwui phungrei kajuipam athumwui azāt phazā khavai sāra; athumna wonnui katimpamli ngaleosangra, kala seizāt khamathā Israel kaphungli zāpamra.
Iwui yaobingwui kahoma ina sāra, kala ina athumli ngayaipi ngasakra, da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Iwui yaonao nathumwui vanga, da Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, yaonao eina yaonao, yaovā eina mevā ina ngatei ngasakra.
Wonui khamathāli nathumna phākazā chi mashapthuda seizat kateibing chi phei eina naikazamra, kala khamathinga tara̱ mangrada katei chi nathumwui phei eina naimakhuira kajila?
Laga nathumwui pheina naikazam kahai chi zāra kala nathumwui phei eina naimakhui kahai chi mangrala?”
“Chiwui vang eina Proho VAREna athumli hānga: Yanglu, I khalattana asā kaphā yao eina asā makaphā yaowui ngachaili bichar sāmira.
Khikhalajila nathumna khangazanbingli ngaheilaga, angaji eina thotta katātāva̱li kashamvāser kahaiwui vang,
ina iwui yaobingli kankhuira, athum sāshai masāluimara; kala ina yao eina yaoli bichar sāmira.
Kala ina athumli yaokahoma akha, iwui rao Davidli phāsangra, kala ana athumli phāchizātra: ana athumli phāchizatta athumwui kahoma sāra.
Kala
Athumli ina chingri eina okthui khavaiwui tuingashit akha sāra, kala ramsā kashammiserhaida yansāngsa̱ eina lamhāngli okthuira kala khangang maleila ngahongli pira.”
Athum kala iwui kaphungli kuimareida khalei apam saikorali ina somira; kala atam kharā tharan ina zingrot rotāmira; sokhamiwui zingrot ngasāra.

Kala luili khalei thingrongna athumwui athei matheira, kala ngaleina heiun mataimeida shokra; kala athumna yansāngsa̱ eina okthuira; ina athumwui langkonthing sātekmihaida narkahai athumwui pāng eina ina thānkashok tharan, I
Athum yurbingwui sāshai mangasāluimara, lah ngaleiwui ramsāna matukshailuimara; kha athumna yansāngsa̱ eina okthuida khipālikha mangangluimara.
Kala ina athumwui luivāt heiun kachungkha mataisang ngasakta ngalei hili kathai-kachām matheimara; yurbingnala mamana̱shiluimara.
Kala athumna I
“Nathum iwui yaobing, iwui wonuipamwui yaobingna, kala I nathumwui Varena,” da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Miwui naomayara, Seir Kaphungli ngareivāda chiwuitungli marānlu,
kala hithāda hānglu, Proho VAREna kahāngna: Yanglu, O Seir Kaphung! Ina nali mamayāmana, iwui makhamayāpāng nali tāngrāra, kala ina nali ramcho sāngasakra.
Ina nawui keinung saikora sākazammihaida ramcho sāngasakra, chieina nana I
“Khikhalajila nana katang makhavai yangshāt ningchānghaoda; kala Israelwui khanaowa tandi atamli kala athumwui unshimui atamli nathumna athumli raighaili horsangmihaowa;

chiwui vang eina, Proho VARE, ina kachangkhat eina kahāngna kaja, nali ashee shokngasakra, kala nali asheena shurzatra; khiwui vangkhala kaje nana ashee shokkhangasakwui vang yonhaira, chiwui vang eina nali asheena shurzatra.
Ina Seir Kaphung hi sākazamhaida ramcho ngasakra, kala chili khaung khavā saikorali ina katatmihaora.
Kala ina nawui phungreibing kathingun eina pemngasakra; kala nawui phungrā, tampāk kala kongrā saikorali raighai eina sāthat kahai kathinguna pemserra.
Ina nali katang makhavai ramcho sāngasakra, kala nawui keinungbingli khipākha maokthuiluimara. Chieina I
“Khikhalajila nathumna, yur khani hi kala ngalei khani hi iwui sāra, ithumna chibing chi khuira, da hānga—

chiwui vang, kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna da Proho VAREna hānga, nana athumli malungvātta kala yuishida kasā chi tākam eina inala nali sāpapamra; kala ina bichar kasā tharan, I khipākhala da chitheira.
Nathumna Israelwui kaphungli ‘Ramchomihaira, ithumwui shai sāmihaira’ da khamashāt saikora chi
Nathum khamor eina ili mashātlaga nathum khalatta mai kākhangasak chila ina theiserra.”
Chiwui vang eina Proho VAREna hānga: “Okathui katongana ningyāng ungkhavai nali ina ramcho ngasakra.
Israel ramchohaida nathumna shimlui kakhuiwui ringkaphā thāda nathumlila chithāda sāmira, O Seir Kaphung kala Edom, nathum saikorali. Chitharan I
“Kala miwui naomayara, Israelwui phungreibingli marānmida hānglu, O Israelwui kaphungbing,
Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Khikhalajila yangkashibingna nathumli mana̱shida, ‘Aha, achālakhawui khamathā kaphung ithumwui sāthuihaira’ da hānga.”

“Chiwui vang marānlu, kala hānglu, Proho VAREna kahāngna: Mha, apam kachiva̱wui eina nathumli rasākazammihaida nathum hi yur saikorana ngapaithui kahaia ngasā kahaiwui vang, kala miyurbingna meisumshimli zakshilāk eina chān sākhanganaowui vang,
eina Israelwui kaphungbing,

Chiwui vang eina Proho VAREna hānga: “Iwui ngalei khalattawui vang mathānthup eina kala ningkachailak eina khuira kala ngaponra da kasā Edom kala khangatei yur saikorawuitungli iwui malungvātshun kahai alungli kahāngna.”

“Chiwui vang eina Israelwui pongli phungrei, phungrā, kongrābing kala tampākbingli hithāda marānlu, Proho VAREna kahāngna: Yanglu, nathumna yurbingwui misui morei kaphungwui vang I malungvātlakhaida kahāngna;
chiwui vang eina Proho VAREna hānga: Ina khangashit kasāna kaja, nathumwui ngalemli khalei miyur saikora athum khalatta hāngkhamachin phungphalungra.
Kha O Israelwui kaphungbing, nathumva aphāng kachungkha shokta iwui mi Israelnaobingwui vang atheila matheira, kaja athum thākta shim hanungra.
Kaja yanglu ina nali mikyan yangmira; luila vāsangda athei-araila lingsangra;
mila ina mataisang ngasakra, Israelpam kachiva̱li, ramcho kahai chi keinung sakāluida mi kachungkha okthuira.
kala ina mila sha̱keila mataisangmira, kala kachungkha pharāsangra; kala ina kharewui tākam eina okthui ngasakra kala khare kachangwuili lāngda phāmeida sāmira. Chitharan I
Mha, ina nawuitungli mi pānlui ngasakra, iwui mi Israelnaobing eina tangdala, kala na athumwui shimluikat ngasāra, kala nana athumli nao mavātmiluimara.
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Khikhalajila yurbingna nali, ‘Na mi kashaiana, kala nawui yurli nana nao shumngasaka’ da hānga,
chiwui vang eina na mi mashaipailuimara kala yurli nao mashum ngasakluimara da Proho VAREna kahāngna.
Kala nali ina yurbingwui mana̱kashe masā ngasakluimara, kala mibingwui maikashi nana maphungluimara kala nawui yurli phei mangaphoklui ngasakmara da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Miwui naomayara, Israelnaobingna athumwui ngaleili pamlakha, athumwui otsakna kala kasākhavāna sākhamāng ngasaka; iwui mangāli athumwui acham, ngarang mahungda khalei khamakhaova̱ sha̱nao thai.
Chiwui vang eina athumna ngaleili ashee tākhangasakwui vang kala athum khalatta sākhamāng khavai kasā meoma̱wui vang ina iwui malungkhavāt tāror ngasaka.
Ina athumli yurbingwui ngachaili, ngalei apam kachiva̱li kashamvāser kahaina; athumwui acham aram kala kasākhavāwui athishurda ina bichar sai.
Kha athumna yurbingwui ngachaili vāda, khavāvāpamli athumna iwui katharaming makhao khangasakwui vang mibingna athumli, ‘Athum hi
Israelnaobingna khavāvāpamli makhao khangasaka iwui katharamingwui vang ina saklak eina phaninga.

“Chiwui vang eina Israelwui shimkhurli hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Ina arui saki kaji hi nathumwui vang maningmana, O Israelwui shimkhur! Kha nathumna khavāvā pamli makhao khangasaka kathara iwui mingwui vāngna.
Miyurbingwui ngachaili nathumna sāmakhao kahaiya, khareia kathara iwui mingwui vang athut khuiki kajina; nathumwui miktāli athut kakhui tharan miyurbingna I,
Kaja ina miyurbingwui eina, kala okathui apam kachiva̱wui eina kazipkhuida nathumwui ngaleili khuiungmira.
Ina tara̱ khamathing nali kasirrorda nathumwui makhaokasā chi tharserhaora, meoma̱ phaningkasāwui eina ina tharmihaora.
Ina ning kadhar sangmira, kala ina manglā kadhar sangmira; kala ina ngalungwui malung chi khuishokhaida asāwui malung phonmira.
Kala ina iwui manglā nali sangmida iwui shiyan-chikanwui alungli zatkhavai kala ngasharlak eina ain mayon ngasakra.
Navā ngarāli ina mikahai ngalei chili nathum okthuira; kala nathum iwui mi sāra, kala I nathumwui Vare ngasāra.
Kala ina nathumwui khamakhao saikorawui eina kanmira; kala ina kashakazā kachungkha shokngasakra kala nathumwuitungli chāmrei marālui ngasakmara.
Ina thingrong kala yāmguiwui heiun kachungkha ungngasakta, miyurbingwui mangāli kachām-khangaiwui maikashi chi matheiluimara.
Chitharan nathumna makhayā ot kasāsā kala ningkakachai morei sākasā saikora chi phaningungra; kala nathum khalatta nathumwui khayonkhamāng kala khangui ot sākahai saikorawui vang ningkachaira.
Ina sāki kaji hi nathumwui vang maningmana, kaji hi theilu da Proho VAREna hānga. Nathumwui otsak chi phaningunglaga vaishilu, O Israelwui shimkhur.”
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Ina nathumwui morei pheomihaithang, ina keinungbingli mi okthuiluishitser ngasakra, kala sākazam kahai apam hupta sākāluira.
Ramcho kahai chi lui vāsangluira, rākatheibingna ramchona da phaningkasā chi mathaluimara.
Kha, ‘Ramcho lam hi Edenwui yāmgui thāhaira, kala sākazam kahai keinungla mi pānluida ngaziplak eina sākāluiserhaira,’ da athumna hāngra.
Kuimareida khalei miyurbingna, sākazamhaida shimān kahaipam saikora
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Athumwui vang sāmi khavai Israelwui shimkhurli hila pongasakngai: Ashiwui mi yaoshang thāda mataisang khavai.
Athumna poakha, pha̱kaphayāwui yaoshang thāda, retsangmi kahai phanit atamli Jerusalemli yao kachipem thāda athumwui mi keinung kachida chipem ngasakra. Chitharan I
Kala ana ili kuimareida thānvai kala yanglu, tampāk chili pemting eina, kala yanglu, saikora chi thengthuthairasai.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, ara̱kuibing hi ringluipairala?” da khangahān eina ina,
“O
Latluida ana ili hānglui, “Ara̱kuibing hili marānlu, kala athumli hānglu, O thengthut kahai ara̱kuibing,
Proho VAREna ara̱kuibingli hithāda hānga: Yanglu, ina nathumli khaksui zangngasakra kala nathum ringra.
Ina nathumwuitungli anonān phonmida nathumwuitungli asāla kāngasakra, kala ahui eina rommihaida khak suisangmilaga nathum ringunghaora; kala nathumna I
Chieina ili kakaso athishurda ina marānmi; kala ina marānmida leilakha akhon akha shai kala yanglu, ara̱kuina ara̱kuili pharon khangarokwui akhon ngasāsai.
Ina yangkhavā eina, athumwuitungli anonān kāserlaga aphila kāda ahui eina romphinhaowa. Kha athum khakva masuimana.

Chieina ana ili hānga, “Khaksuili marānlu, marānlu, miwui naomayara, khaksuili hānglu, Proho VAREna kahāngna: O khaksui, achikun matiwui eina rālu, kala shaothat kahaibing hiwuitungli ringkhavai khak suisangmilu.”

Chiwui thili ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, ara̱kuibing hi Israelwui shimkhur katongana. Yanglu, athumna, ‘Ithumwui ara̱kui thengthuthaira, kala ithumwui kachihān shimānhaira, ithum maringluimara’ da hānga.

Chiwui vang athumli marānmida hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Yanglu, ina nathumwui chikhur shomira, kala nathumli chikhurwui eina ngakarthui ngasakra, O iwui mibing; kala ina nathumwui shim Israel ngaleili khuiungmira.
O iwui mibing! Ina nathumwui chikhur shoda nathumli chikhurwui eina shok khangasak tharan, nathumna I
Kala ina iwui Manglā nathumli sangmira, kala nathum ringra, kala ina nathumli nathum khalattawui ngaleili chipamra. Chitharan

“Miwui naomayara, khāmshui akha khuilaga, ‘Hi Judah kala ali khangayur Israelwui naomayarawui vangna’ kala khangatei khāmshui akhala khuilaga, ‘Hi Joseph (Ephraimwui khāmshui) kala ali khangayur Israel shimkhur saikorawui na’ da kapilu;
kala khani chi ngasunkhuilu, chieina napāngli lijei akhamāng ngasāhaora.
Kala nawui mibingna, ‘Hiwui kakhalat ithumli mahāngmarala?’ da ngahānakha,

athumli hithāda hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Yanglu, Josephwui (Ephraimwui pāngli khalei chi) kala ali khangayur Israel saikora chi ina khuira; kala ina Judahwui thingli ngasun ngasakta ipāngli akha sāngasakra.
“Nana kapi khavai thing khani chi athumwui mangāli kasing tharan,
athumli hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Yanglu, Israelnaobingna miyurbingwui ngachaili zatkasa kachiva̱wui eina ina kazipkhuida athumwui ngaleili khuiungmira,
kala ina yur akhamāng sāngasakta aram ngalei, Israel kaphungli okthui ngasakra, kala awunga akhana athum saikorali mungda yur khani masāluimara, wungram khani sāda mangakailuimara.

Athumna meoma̱li phaningda yangkakharing ot eina masāmakhaoluimara, kala athumwui khalāng ot sāda masākhamāng ngasakluimara, kha hikathā makaphā otsakwui eina ina huimida tharngasakra; kala athumna iwui mi sāra, I athumwui Vare sāra.
Iwui rao Davidna athumwuitungli mungra; kala saikorawui yaokahoma akhamāng leira. Athumna iwui ain mayonra kala iwui shiyan-chikan ngarangra.
Kala iwui rao Jacobli ina mikahai navā ngarāna pamkasā ngalei chili athumna pamluira; athumla anao ngarāla, naobingwui naobingla chili leichingda iwui rao Davidna athumwui wungnao sāda mungra.

Ina athumli chingri kahaiwui tuingashit akha sāra; chi athumli katang makhavai tuingashit kasana; kala ina athumli somira kala mataisang ngasakra; kala iwui kathara shim athumwui alungli haimichingra.
Ina athumli ngasopamra, kala I athumwui Vare sāra, kala athum iwui mi sāra.
Iwui kathara shim athumwui alungli haimiching kaji chi theilaga, Israelli ina tharkhangasakna kaji miyurbingna theikhuira.”
“Miwui naomayara, Meshechwui, Tubalwui wungnaobingwui akhavā, Magog ngaleili khalei Gogli yangvāda marānmilu,
kala hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, ina nali mamayāmana, O Meshech eina Tubal wungnaowui akhava Gog.

Ina nali shireikarkhuilaga khānghui eina namakhāli hokkhuira; kala ina nawui raimi, sigui, sigui raimi, raisāri khangavai athum saikora, talla̱ kasingbing, chāngvei kaphungbing, raighai kasingbing shimenshoksera;
Persia, Cush, kala Put athum saikora, chāngvei kala kuihon eina ngasoda.
Gomer eina awui raimi katonga, atungshong tāmeikapta khalei Beth-togarmahli awui raimi katonga—nali mi kachungkha ngasoda lei.
Ngarānlu kala ngarānkazaklu, na kala nali kuimarānda kazip kahai ashangva̱, kala athumwui vang raikān sāmilu.

Atam kasāngkhawui thili nali mathotkhuira; kala zingkum kasāngkhawui thili chingri eina khalei, mashikachina Israelwui phungreibingli yur ngatateidawui eina rakapāna kala chiwui mibing saikorali nana rai sāda kashamshokra, kala chingri eina pānra.
Nana siphan zingrot thāda mangāshong, ngaleili muiyā khangapui thāra, na eina nawui mina, kala rākhangachonbing zangda sorkhangasai raimi thānlaga muivāra.”
“Proho VAREna hānga: Chithanghon nawui ningli raza̱da makaphā ot sākhavai chukmaja̱ra,
kala, ngavei makhavaiya, ngaveila makashunga, chingri eina okthuida khalei kha̱bingli akaira, da hāngra;
kala yurbingwui eina latungda sākazam kahaipamli ungkapama okathuiwui alungthungli kapambing chiwui eina angaponkhui khavai ngarānra.
Sheba eina Dedan kala Tarshishwui leih khalonbing eina chiwui kha̱bingna, ‘Ngaponkida kharāla? Sinā, lupāsā, sha̱kei, lan ngapaikhuiser khavai mi hiyākha thānkazatla?’” da hāngra.
Chiwui vang, miwui naomayara, Gogli marānmida hānglu, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “Iwui mi Israelnaobing chingri eina okthuithang na khalatta phaningkhuira,
kala atungshongwui tāmeikap kajepam eina mi kachungkha thānlaga, sigui tongda, sorkhangasai raimi eina ngasoda,

iwui raimi Israelnaobingli, ngaleili muiyā khangapui thāda tāngararra. Khanaowa atamli ina nali khuirāda, iwui tharkhamathengwui vang zakshilāk eina athut khuingasakra, O Gog. Chieina yur saikorana I Varena kaji theikhuira.
Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Achalakha iwui mibingli ngarar khavai khuirāra da Israelwui marānbingna hāngkahai chi nala?”
“Kha Gogna Israelli ngararthanghon iwui malungkhavāt ngathunghaora da Proho VAREna hānga.
Kaja iwui yuishāt eina lungthot ngasha̱da kahāng hina kaja, chithanghon Israel ngaleili panglāk eina nganukra;

ngayiwui khaih, khamasaili kapaiya vānao, ngaleiwui ramsābing, ngaleili khangawo akha̱-akhao, kala okathuili khalei mi saikora, ili theilaga nganukyikhaora; phungreibingla minhaora, lungzilunghār kaihaora kala phākho kachiva̱ ngaleili ja̱tāserhaora.
Chinaongarā sāthat ngarokra, khangachee-khangachā ayur kachiva̱ Gogli makhamayā rāshung ngasakra da Proho VAREna hānga.

Kazātkashi kala ashee kashok eina ngasoda ina bichar sāra; alila awui mibinglila kala athumli khangasobing saikorawuitungli theih eina ngasoda zingrot machatla rotā ngasakra, meiwui zingrot rotā ngasakra.
Chithāda iwui khangam-kharei kala tharkhamatheng miyur kachungkhali theikhui ngasakra. Chieina I
Kala na, “Miwui naomayara, Gogli makhamayā marānmilu, kala hānglu, Proho VAREna hānga: Yanglu, ina nali mamayāmana, O Meshech eina Tubal wungnaowui kathāna Gog!
Ina nali kuimareida atungshongwui tāmeikap kajepamwui eina Israel kaphungli thānvāra;
chiwui thili nawui uishong eina nawui malā ngaphittāmihaora kala nawui yāshong eina malāthing chihotā ngasakra.
Na Israelwui kaphungli thisangra, na kala nawui ashangva̱ kala nali khangasobing saikora; ina nathumli vānaoyur saikora, sāyur saikorali chishaira.
Nathum khamasai lamhāngli thisangra; kaja ina hānghaira da Proho VAREna hānga.
Ina Magogli kala shamadrupheili tāphup eina okathui athumli mei chihovāra; chieina I
Iwui katharaming chi iwui mi, Israelnaobingli theingasakra; kala iwui katharaming hi ina masāmakhao ngasakluilakmara; chieina miyurbingna I Israelli
“Yanglu, atam rārāli, makahatlakla shokra da Proho VAREna hānga. Ina hāngkahai zimiksho chi china.
Chitharan Israelwui keinungli kapambingna khutlai, chāngvei, talla̱, kachākthing kala malāthing, kazei kala zeipa̱ angamuikhuilaga thing sāda rikra, kum shini peida rikra;

chithāda athumna luili kala ngahongli thing mavāphaluimara, kaja athumna khutlaibing chi rikshapra; athumli khangaponbing chili athumnala ngaponkhuira, athumli sākakathānabing chili athumnala sākathānmihaora,” da Proho VAREna hānga.

“Chiwui atamli Gogli chifa khavai Israelwui apam akha mira, shamadruwui zingshoshong khalei Ramkazatawui Leiwuk kaho chili; kaja Gogli kala awui mibing saikorali apam chili chifara; kala kharam khavābing mazatpaimara; kala apam chiwui ming Hamon-gog Leiwuk da phokra.
Apam chi sāmathākhui khavai Israelnaobingna mingun chuikaphum kachāng shini zangra.
Apam chiwui mi saikorana chifara; kaja ina iwui tekhamatei chitheithang hi athumwui vang maikakā otna da chitheira da Proho VAREna hānga.
Kachāng shini kākapei eina athumna mi phāsanglaga ara̱-arā taikahai chi phumngasakta samathākhuira.
Kala chiwui thili kachikathāna mira̱kui atheiakha, Hamom-gog Leiwukli maphumranglakha eina tangda, theikhui khavai machut sāra.
(Apam chiwuili Hamonah kaho keinung akhala lei.) Chithāda athumna ngalei chi sāmathākhuira.”
Nathumna kapingabingwui asā shaira, kala okathuiwui wungnaobingwui ashee mangra—yaowui, yaonaowui, mewui, seiwui kala Bashanwui keimathao kahai saikorawui.
Ina ngarānmi kahai pha̱kaphayā zātkhān chili nathumna katho eina tangda athao shaira, ashee eina maripra.
Kala iwui tableli sigui kala katongbing, raikapingbing, khangamabingli ngasoda nathumna shaira da Proho VAREna hānga.”
“Kala ina yurbingli iwui tekhamatei chitheira, kala yur saikorana ina sākahai iwui bichar, kala ina ipāng eina athumli parkahai chi theira.
I athumwui Proho VAREna da Israelwui shimkhurna chithang eina theiphokra.

Kala Israelwui shimkhurna khare kachāng tukthui kahai chi athumwui moreiwui vangna da theira, khikhalajila athumna ili matheimilakla kasāwui vang ina mayangkhamina kala yangkashibingwui pāngli horsangmihaida shaothat kahaina da miyurbingna theikhuira.
Athumwui makathar athishurda kala morei kasāwui athishurda inala chithāda kasāna, kala mayangkhamina.”
Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: “Ara ina Jacobwui shimlui hanmiluira, kala Israelwui shimkhur katongali lumashanmiluira; kala iwui katharamingli machipat ngasakluimara.
Athumna ngalei chili chingri eina pamda khipākhana athumli mangang khangasak tharan, ili matheimilakla sākahai saikora, kala athumwui kakhayak saikora malaihaora,
athumli ina yangkashibingwui ngaleiwui eina shimli thanungkhami tharan, kala athumwui vang eina miyur saikorawui mangāli iwui tharkhamatheng theikhangasak tharan.
Athumli raithāhailaga thanungluishit kajiwui vang I, athumwui Proho VAREna da theikhuira. Khipālikha ina miyurbingwui ngachaili mataimihailakmara;
kala iwui Manglā Israelwui shimkhurtungli sangkhami tharan athumli mayangkheiluimara, da Proho VAREna hānga.”
kala ili Varewui mahākhamili Israel ngaleili khuivāda kaphung kajuiva̱ akhali achipama, chili keinung kathā akha ili kāroda thei.
Ana ili chili khuikhavā tharan, yanglu, pithraiwui mi thāda akha leisai, kala awui pāngli nāp tamkhavai khara̱ akha kala thingtam akha singlaga ngavei ngalemli nganingsai.

Kala mi china ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, namik eina yanglu, kala nakhanā eina nganālu, kala ina kachithathei saikora naningli shāphailu, kaja nali chithei khavai ina hili khuikharāna; theida khalei saikora Israelwui shimkhurli hānglu.”
Chiwui thili ana zingshoshongwui ngaveishong vai, kala chonkhavaitungli kānganinglaga katam eina ngaveithing kapāk chila thingtam akhaya;
shantriwui kābing chi thingtam ava̱va̱ sānga, kala thingtam ava̱va̱ pāka; athumwui angachaili khuining phangā mataka; kala alung zangkatangawui shimpho khāmong chi thingtam akhaya.
Chiwui thili ana ngavei ngalemwui shimpho chi khuining chishat tamkhuiya;
pakra̱la khuining khaniya; ngaveiwui shimpho chi alungshong zangkatangawuili lei.
Zingshoshongwui khāmong uishong yāshong shantripam kathuthum lei; kathuthum chi kahak kateo ngarithisera; pakra̱bing chila ngarithisera.
Khamong shokkhavaiwui apong chi tamkhayang eina, aret khuining tharā, lākhashong khuining tharāda kathumna.
Shantripamwui mangāli khayin khavai akha lei, uishong yāshong khuining ava̱va̱ya; kala shantripambing chi kasāngla kapākla khuining tharuruka.
Shantripam akhawui eina khangatei akhapāwui ngachai chi ana tamyanga: Khamong eina thuilaga khāmong eina tangda khuining maga̱da phangāya.
Shimpho chilila tamkhayang eina khuining maga̱ sāsai, ngavei shimpho kuimareida kayāng akha lei.
Zangkhavai ngaveiwui eina alungpā shimpho chi khuining hangphangā mataka.
Kala kuimareida charfa leisera, charfabing chi ayarshong hakmeilaga shimlungshong masha̱zanga; shimphola chithāda charfa leisera, kala pakra̱li khaneitheirong ruksangsera.
Chiwui thili yāngreishong thānshoka kala yanglu, kayāng kuimareida kala yāngkhupla leisai; yāngkhupshong ngareishokserda kā thumrā leisai.
Yāngkhup chi shimwui eina thuilaga ngavei shokshungda ngalung hammithai; chili khamazewui ngalung kahamna.
Chiwui thili ana khamaze khāmong eina thuilaga kayāng khāmong eina tangda tamkhayang eina khuining shākha kāshunga.
Chiwui thili ana ili atungshong thanshanga kala yanglu, atungshong khalei kayāngvāk ngavei akha leisai. Ana chiwui asān-aret tamyanga.
Chiwui shantripam kathutum chila, pakra̱la, shimphola khare ngaveiwui asān-aret eina ngaraichai; asān khuining hangphangā, aret maga̱da phangāpapama.
Charfala, shimphola, khaneirongla zingshoshongwui ngaveiwui chiririsera kala chonkhavai shini lei, shimphona alungshong lei.
Zingshoshongwui tākam eina zingtungshongla alung kayāngli zangkhavai apong akha lei; ana chi tamyangda khuining shākhaya.
Azingshong thānkatā eina yanglu, chila ngavei akha leisai, kala tamkhayang eina khare khaniwuili ngaraichāpapama.
Chili kuimareida sākasang charfa kala shimpho chiwuila kharewui tākam eina sāsanga. Chiwui asān khuining hangphangā, aret maga̱da phangā;
kala chonjak shini pheikār shinina; shimpho alungshong lei, kala pakra̱ uishong yāshong khalei chili khaneirong ruksangpapama.
Azingshongwui kayāngli apong akha lei, aton eina thuilaga azingshong tāshungda ana tamyangda khuining shākhaya.
Azingshongwui apong chi ana alung kayāngli thānzanga kala apong chi tamkhayang eina kharebingwui takamhaipapama.
Shantripamla, pakra̱la, shimphola ngaraichāserpapama; kuimareida charfa sāsangsera, shimpholila sāsanga. Asan khuining hangphangā kala aret maga̱da phangāya.
Kala kuimareida shimpho asān khuining hangphangā aret maga̱da phangāna kuinama.
Shimpho chi ayar kayangshong ngareishoka, pakra̱li khaneirong ruksanga, kala chonkhavai chishat kai.
Chiwui thili zingshoshongwui alungli ili thānvai, kala ana apong chi tamyangda kateibingwuili ngaraichāpapama.
Shantripamla, pakra̱la, shimphola kharei kateo ngarithisera. Kuimareida charfa sāsangsera, shimpholila; asān khuining hangphangā, aret maga̱da phangāna.
Shimpho chi yāngreishong ngareishoka, uishong, yāshong khalei pakra̱ khani chilila khaneirong ruksanga; kala chonkhavai pheikār chishat kai.
Chiwui thili ana ili atungshong thānshanga, kala chila tamkhayang eina kateiwui thāserpapama.
Shantripamla, pakra̱la, shimphola kharebingwuili ngarithisera; charfala kuimareida lei, asān khuining hangphangā, aret maga̱da phangāya.
Chiwui shimpho ayār kayāngvāk ngareishoka, uishong, yāshong khalei pakra̱ chilila khaneirong ruksang thathuiya, chonkhavai pheikār chishat kai.
Shimpho chiwui kaali khāmong akha lei, chi rikkatā sharwui pheokhavaina.
Chiwui uishong, table khani runghai, chi rikkatā kachigat, suihamchigat sā taithat khavaina.
Atungshong rāzang khavai shimphowui ayarvāk table khani runghai kala shimpho lākhashong zangkhavai chilila table khani runghai.
Apong chiwui alungshong table mati, ayarli mati, da table chishata, chi pha̱kaphayā sākhavaina.

Rikkatā kachigatwui vang ngalung eina shānkakhui table mati lei, asān-aret khuining akha laga tangkhai khaiya, kajui khuining akhana; chi rikkatā kachigat kala pha̱kaphayā sā sākhavai khutlai haikhavaina.
Chili kuimareida khānghui pāngmayāparraran hokthanghai. Table chi pha̱kaphayā kasāli sā haikhavaina.

Chiwui thili ayarwui eina alungli ana thānzanga, kala yanglu, alungshong kā khani leisai, akhana atungshongwui ngaveiwui eina azingshong ngareitai, akhapā china azingshongwui eina atungshong ngareishanga.
Kala ana hānga, azingshong ngareikatā kā hi, khorumshim khamayona pāngmonbingwui vangna,
kala ngareikashangpa hina hanphutpamli otram khangatha̱bingwuina; Levi shimkhur ngachaili Zadokwui naomayarabing māngna hili zangda
Ana kayāng chi tamkhayang eina, khuining shākha sānga kala khuining shākha pākta, asān-aret ngarithiya; kala chi khorumshimwui alungthungli leiya.
Chiwui thili khorumshimwui shimpholi thānzanglaga chiwui pakra̱ tamyanga, hishongla chishongla khuining hangphangāya kala ngavei chiwui phākho hishongla khuining kathuthuma.
Shimpho chiwui asān khuining maga̱ aret tharāda khani; kala chonkhavai tharā kai; pakra̱ kahaka khani chiwui ngalemli khangatei pakra̱la leikapa.
Chiwui thili ana ili shimreili thanvāda pakra̱ chi atamyanga; pakra̱ chiwui lākhala lākhala khuining tharuruka.
Kala zangkhavai chi khuining tharāna; kala zangkhavaiwui wui
Kala ana alungshong zanglaga pakra̱ chi tamyangda khuining khaniya; kala zangkhavai chi khuining tharuk kala arāp khuining shininina.
Kala ana kā chiwui asān tamyangda, asān khuining maga̱, aret maga̱ da shimreiwui eina kānshoka. Kala ana ili, “Hi tharmathengmeikap kaje kāna,” da hānga.
Chiwui thili ana khorumshimwui phākho tamyanga: kashā khuining tharuka; kala kuimareida khalei kāwui phākhobing khuining matiya.

Kā hi mathāng kathum lei, akhali akhana matunga, mathāng ava̱va̱li kā thumrārā lei. khorumshim chiwui kuikhamareili chikhun ngakhārshoksera kala chiwuitungli shim sakāmaronda phākho khangatei maleiluimana.
Ngakhārkashok chiwui athishurda sakākhamaronwui vang shim chi hakkāmamāna. Khorumshim chiwui arāp lākhali chonkhavai lei, khamazewui eina sakāmamānda ato kāli kāshunga.
Kala ina khorumshimwui kuikhamareili tārong akha sākahai chila thei. Shim chiwui shimphunga asān khuining tharuka.
Ayar phākho khuining phangāya; kala angachaili khalei nganing khavai chi khuining phangā pāka.
Khorumshim kuimareida pāngmonbingwui kā khuining maga̱ga̱ mataka.
Ayar kābingwui khāmong shokhailaga taikahai chiwui eina khani shoshoka, akhana atungshong ngareishanga, akhapāna azingshong ngareitai; kala nganing khavai chi ungshung vāshungda khuining phangāya.
Khorumshimwui zingtunvāk ngareikhavā shim chi khuining hangshini pāka; kala shim chiwui kashāna kuimareida khuining phangā, asānna hangchikona.
Chiwui thili ana khorumshim chi tamyangda khuining shākha sānga; kala yāngkhup kala shim eina chiwui phākho zangda khuining shākhaya;
aretla, zingshoshongwui yāngkhup zangda shākhapapama.
Chiwiui thili zingtunshongwui yāngkhupli ngareivāda khalei shim chiwui asān kala phākho chi khaninishong tamlaga khuning shākhapapama.
Khorumshimli Zangkhavai Kā, Tharkhamatheng Apam, kala Tharmathengmeikap kaje Apam chi thing
zaimitsanga, kala chonnar eina charfa kāshungda shopai shungpai kaji chikhai eina khoma,
tharmathengmeikap kaje kāli zangkhavai khāmong ato chila chikhai eina rommit hai. Tharmathengmeikap kaje kāla, shimreila, Cherubim khaneirong ruksanga;
Cherubim khaniwui ngachaili khaneirong ava̱va̱ sāsanga. Kala Cherub ava̱va̱wui amai khanini kai;
mimaipāna khaneirongvāk yangvai kala kazingkha̱maina khaneirong akhapāli yangvai; Khorumshim kuimareida chithāda leisera;
Cherub eina khaneirong chi khorumshimwui khāmongpheili ngalei eina thuilaga shimtung kāzokta shimtung katongali yeksanghai.
Shimreiwui khāmongthing kapāk eina kashā ngaraichai; kala kathara apamwui mangāli thing eina kasā hanphut thāda akha lei.
Chiwui kajui khuining kathum, asān khani, aret khanina; aphei eina arāp thing eina sāsera. Kala ana ili, “Hi
Shimreila, kathara kā chila khāmong khanini uta;
kala khāmong akhali aphek khanini kai, shungung shungvā sākapai aphek akharipa.
Shimrei khāmongli phākhowui thāda Cherubim kala khaneirong ruksangsera. Shimphowui mangāshong thingwui tārong akha lei.
Shimphowui phākho khaninili khaneirong ruksanga kala charfala alungshong rāngasunzanga.
Chiwui thili ana ili atungshongwui zangkhameiya kayāngli thānshoka kala khorumshim kayāngli kāroda khalei, atungshong ngareikashang shimli yangkhangasun shim chili thānzanga,
atungshong khalei shim chiwui asān khuining shākha kala aret hangphangāna.
Alung kayāng khuining maga̱ eina thuilaga ayar kayāngwui ngalung kaham eina tangda tārong mathāng kathum lei,
shim chiwui zangkhavai apong chi khuining tharā pāklaga shākha sānga; kala khāmong atungshong ngareishangsera.
Ato kā chi teomeiya, kaja ato eina azewui mathāngla tarongna apam hakmeida khuihaowa.
Mathāng kathum sai kala ayar kayāngwuili pakra̱ khalei thāda chiliva pakra̱ mavaimana; chiwui vang ato kā chi ato eina aze mathāngla teosang kahaina.
Shimli ngalengda phākho akha kayāngshong sāshoka, chiwui asān khuining hangphangāya.
Kaja shim chi kayāng ayarshong khuining hangphangā shoka, kha khorumshimli yangkhangasung chiya khuining shāshā sānga.
Shim chiwui azingli, zingshoshong zangkhavai akha lei, mibingna ayarshongwui eina zangga jiakha chieina zanga, kaja ayar shongwui
phākho chiwui eina haophoka. Azingshongla, kayāngli kala shim chili kāroda kā kachungkha lei,
chiwui mangāli apong akha lei; chiya atungshong khalei kābing chi tākamhaipapama, asānla aretla ngaraichai kala shokkhavaila, khāmongphutla ngaraichai.
Aze kāwui azingli zangkhavai zingshoshong akha lei, mina chiwui eina zangpai; kāroda phākho akhana mataka.
Chiwui thili ana ili hānga, “Atungshongwui kā eina azingshongwui kā kayāngli yangngasungda khalei hi kathara kāsera;
Katharapamli pāngmonbingna kazang tharan kashankachon maraila mashokpaimara, kaja hi athumna otram ngatha̱ khavai kathara otna; yaruiwui ngachaili kashok tharan khangatei ngavaishokki kajina.”
Ana khorumshimwui alung tamkhui kahaiwui thili zingshoshongwui ngaveivāk ana ili thānshoklui kala chiwui kuikhamarei tamyanga.
Ana onkhavai thing chieina zingshoshong tamyangda khuining shāphangāya.
Ana ngareikhuilaga kuikhamarei chi tamung tamvā sai. Ana atungshong thing eina tama, kala khuining shāphangā shoka.
Chiwui thili ana ngareikhuilaga tamung tamvā sai. Ana azingshong chi tamyang khavai thing chieina khuining shāphangā tamkhuiya.
Chiwui thili ana zingtunshong ngareivāda tamkhavai thing chieina shāphangā tamkhuiya.
Achikun mati peida tamkhui. Kuimareida phākho, kasāngla khuining shāphangā, kapākla shāphangā khalei chieina katharapam eina yarui pamli matakmi.
Chiwui thili ana ili zingshoshongwui ngaveili thānvai.
Kala yanglu, Israelwui Varewui tekhamatei zingshoshong eina rārāsai; kala a kharāwui akhon tara̱ kachungkhawui akhon thai; kala awui tekhamateina okathui horra.
Kala ina kathei khamahā chi, ana keinung sāshimān khavaiwui atamli kathei khamahā chithāda thei, kala Chebar kongli kathei khamahā chithai; kala ina ngaleili mashunzanga.
Varewui tekhamatei china khorumshimwui zingshoshong khalei ngavei chieina rākazang tharan,
Manglā china ili khāngkhuida alungwui kayāngli khuivai; kala yanglu,
Mipā china iwui ngalemli nganingda leilakha Khorumshimwui eina mi akhana ili kahāng chi shai;

kala ana hithāda hānga, “Miwui naomayara, apam hi iwui wungpamkhong haikhavaipamna, kala iphei naikhavaipamna, Israelnaobingli ngasoda ina katang mavaila hili okthuichingra. Kala Israelwui shimkhurna iwui katharamingli masāmakhaoluimara; athum saikora, wungnaobingla, phokaphā otsak eina, kala athumwui awungabingwui kathingun eina masākhamāng ngasakmara.

Iwui zangkhavaipamli athumwui zangkhavaipam kala iwui khāmongpheili athumwui khāmongphei sakāda, phākho akhamāng eina mataka. Athumna ningkakachai ot sāda iwui katharaming sākakhamāngwui vang malungvāthaida ina athumli yumkhangasakna.
Ara varebingli kaphaning ot kala awungabingwui kathingun chi iwui eina katāva̱li haihaoranu, chieina ina athumli ngayurpamchingra.”
“Kala miwui naomayara, athumwui khayonkhamāng chi phaningkhuida khayak khavai Israelwui shimkhurbingli khorumshim azak, angarān mathāsek eina hāngchitheilu.

Kala athumna sakā kahai chiwui vang khayāmalaakha, khorumshim chiwui zangkhavai, shokkhavai, ngarānkharirik kahai chi meisā eina hāngchitheilu; kala chili sāki kaji kakaso kala ain saikora kapichitheida kakaso hi mathālak eina mayon khavai sālu.
Khorumshim chiwui ain chi hithai: kaphung hiwui ari-arāp kuimareida kaphungton kāpeida tharmathengmeikapki kaji apamna. Yanglu, khorumshimwui ain chi china.”
Hanphutwui asān-aret (khuiningkha kala pāngmayāpar eina katama khuining:) Aphei nganing khavai chi khuining akha juira, khuining akha pākra kala kuimareida akhamong pāngmayāparkhara.

Hanphut chiwui kajui: ngaleili rungkahai apam chieina thuilaga nemkhameiya akongnā kāshungda, khuining khani kala khuiningkha pāk jira; kala teokhamei akongnāwui eina thuilaga hakkhamei akongnā eina tangda, khuining matira, kala khuining akha pākra;
hanphutwui mei sākhavai chi khuining matira; kala meiphung chiwui eina, khuining ava̱va̱ kasānga angaji mati nganingra.
Hanphutwui meiphung chi khuining tharāda khanini asān-aret ngaraichāra.
Akongnā chila asān-aret ngarida khuining tharāda matitira kuimareida tangkhaira, apheina khuiningkha jira. Hanphutwui chonkhavai zingshoshong ngareira.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Miwui naomayara, Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Hanphutwui ainbing hithāda sāra: Rikkatā kachigat pha̱khavai kala chili ashee kasirror khavai hanphut chi sākāthang,
nathumna iwui ngalemli otram ngatha̱miki kaje Levishiwui pāngmonbing, Zadokshi shimkhurli suihamchigatwui vang mukkā akha khuimilu.

Kala nathumna chiwui ashee kateokha khuilaga hanphutwui angaji mati chili achikun matiwui akongnāli kala akhamong kuimareida neomira; chithāda hanphut chi samathākhuida chiwui vang pheomi khavai sāra.
Nathumna suihamchigatwui mukkā chi khuida, kathara apam kānshokta, ngarān kahaipam chili riktāra.
Akhama kathā khangakhai makhalei mevā akha suiham chigatwui vang pha̱phayāra, kala mukkā eina tharkhangasak thāda chila sāpapamra.
Nathumna chi sāmathākup kahaiwui thili achuk kapei mukkā akha kala khangakhai makhalei yaovā akha da pha̱ra.
Nathumna chi
Suihamchigatwui vang nathumna shinithang me ava̱va̱ chigatlu; kala achuk kapei mukkā akha, khangakhai makhalei yaovā akha da mi jilu.
Shinithangwui vang athumna hanphut sākhamathā ot sāda maseikhuiki kajina kala tharngasaki kajina.
Kala athumna zimikshobing hi kupkahaiwui thili, kachishatathang eina thuida pāngmonbingna nathumwui rikkatā kachigat, ningyatchigat pha̱kaphayā ot sāda ina khuisangmira da Proho VAREna hānga.”
Chiwui thili ana ili zingshoshong ngareikashoka kathara shimwui ngaveili thānshoka; kala chi shunghaisai.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Ngavei hi shunghaichingra, mashohaipaimara, kala mi khipākha mazangpaimara; kaja
Wunganaomāngna hiwui alungli pamda
Kala
“Kala ngakaikashe shimkhur, Israelwui shimkhur chili hānglu, Proho VAREna kahāngna: O Israelwui shimkhur nathumwui ningkakachai otsak chi chihohaolu;

yur khangateiwui mi, wuklung ahui marimkashok mina iwui kathara shimli kazang tharan nathumna pha̱kaphayā ot, iwui kashakazā athao kala ashee makhao ngasaka. Nathumna sākhamāngda iwui tuingashit kaingasakhaira.
Kala iwui kathara otla mamayonmana; kha yur khangateiwui mili iwui kathara shim mayon ngasaka.
“Chiwui vang Proho VAREna hānga: Yur khangateiwui mi, ningla phasāla ahui marimkashok mi khipākha iwui kathara shimli mazangpaimana.”
“Kha Israelna ma̱thui kahai tharan iwui eina yāmhaida meoma̱li kaphaning Levinaobingna chiwui tandi phungra.
Athumna iwui kathara shimli otram ngatha̱ra, khāmong khamayon ot sāda otram ngatha̱ki kajina; athumna mibingwui rikkatā kachigat kala pha̱kaphayā sāla athumna taithatta mibingli ngachonmira.

Khikhalajila athumna mibing chiwui meoma̱bingli otram ngatha̱mida Israelwui shimkhurli pheingaphok khavai morei sāngasaka, chiwui vang eina, ina athumwui pongli ngashitta athumna athumwui tandi phungra da Proho VAREna hānga.

Athum iwui ngalemli pāngmon akha sāda otram ngatha̱ khavai marāpaimara, lah iwui tharkhamatheng ot kala tharmathangmeikap kaje otbingli marānganaipaimara; kha athumna sākahai ningkakachai ot chiwui vang khayakphalungra.
Chithālala ina athumli iwui shim mayonda chiwui ot yangmi khangayi kala sāmi khangayi sākhavai kapangsang kahaina.”

“Kha Levi pāngmonwui ngachaili Zadokshi shimkhur, Israelnaobing ma̱thui kahai atamli iwui kathara shim khamayon athumle iwui ngalemli zangda otram ngatha̱ ngasakra; athumna ili otram ngatha̱mida athao kala ashee pha̱phayāra, da Proho VAREna hānga.
Athumna iwui kathara shimli zangra, kala athumna iwui tabletungli rānganaida ili otram ngatha̱ra kala iwui ot sāra.
Athumna alunga kayāngli kazang tharan khamenga kachon ngavaikhuira, alunga kayānglila shimlunglila otram khangatha̱ tharan sahā kachon mangavaipaimana.
Athumna khamenga kuitei teira, khamenga shānneira̱ neira, shairanra̱ shokkapai khaluma kachon mangavaipaimana.

Kala ayarshong yaruili kashok tharan otram khangatha̱ atamli khangavai kashankachon chi railaga kathara kāli haihaiki kajina, kala athumna kachon khangatei ngavaikhuira, maningakha tharkhamatheng chi athumwui kachon chieina kateili sāza̱haipaishina.
“Athumna kui masilakla phungki kajina lah samtan masangpaimara; athumna aton-tonmāng ngachammara.
Alungkayāngli kazang atamli pāngmon khipākha drakhāra̱ mamangpaimara.
Athumna ra̱meinaoli mangakumpaimara, lah sha̱naoli mapāngpaimara, kha Israel shimkhurwui mafakathui kachingva̱ sha̱nao, lah pāngmon akhawui rameiva̱li khuipai.

Khonzar khangarok atamli athumna mashun bichar sāmira kala athumna iwui ain athishurda bichar sāmira. Retmi kahai phanitli athumna iwui ain kala shiyan mayonphalungra; kala athumna iwui sabbath mayonra.
Sākhamāng kahai thili, zimiksho shinithang ngaranglaga tharkhuira.
Kala ana alungkayāng, kathara kāli zangthang, katharapamli otram khangatha̱ chitharan suiham chigat pha̱phalungra da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Athum shimlui mavaipaimara, I athumwui shimluina; Israelwui alungli nathumna athumli shimlui mayarpaimana.
Tharāzat, suihamchigat kala khayonchigat athumna shaira; kala Israelli ningshida rākachigat saikora athumwuisera.
Atheiyur saikorawui matheikhare kala rāchigatkhare ot saikora chi athumwui sāra; kala nathum mahaimei khavai nathumwui hātkhuikhare chi athumli milu.
Vanao nilala, sā nilala, kathisā kala khazursā pāngmonbingna mashaipaimana.”
Nathumna ngalei khangayar tharan
Hiwui alungli asān-aret ngarithida khuining shāphangāngā eina tharkhamatheng apam sāra, kala chili kuimareida khuining hangphangā khamasai eina haihaira.
Kathara luiyam chiwui alungthung khailaga akhali tharkhamatheng shim chi leiki kajina; chi tharmathengmeikap kaje apamna.
Hi kathara apam sāra,
Akhum khangatei, khuining thingmaga̱da phangā kasang kala thingtharā kapāk Khorumshimli otram khangatha̱ Levibingwui sāra; keinungli chi athumwui shimluina.
Kathara luiyamwui vang nathumna ngakheikhang haikahai chi khuining thingmaga̱da phangā kala apāk thingphangā eina thari sāra; hi Israel katongawui keinung sākhavaina.
Kathara luiyamwui uishong yāshong, Israelnaobingwui lam vāshungda kala athumwui aretli ngarida tamkhuilaga chi wungnaowui lam sāra.
Hi Israelli awui shimlui sāra. Kala iwui mi Israelnaobingli wungnaobingna marekharekluimara; kha ichichāshiwui shang athishurda Israelwui shimkhurli ngalei chi khuingasakra.

“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Shaphaira, O Israelwui wungnaobing! Sāshida marekharekluialu, mashun kala khangarong eina bichar sāmilu, iwui mibingli kashamshang kashamtā masāluilu, da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Kathenga otyur tamkhavai khuilui eina ara̱yur tamkhavai tin ngarithiphalungra, khuilui nilala, tin nilala, tharāna chumrānao akha sāra; kaja chumrānao hina kachangkhat theikapai khāntamna.
“Shekel akhali gerah maga̱ leira; shekel phangāna shekel phangā sāra, shekel tharāna shekel tharā sāra; kala nathumwui minā akhana shekel hangphangā sāra.
“Nathumna pha̱kaphayā sāki kaji chi hina: Kehu homer akhawui eina khuilui akhum tharukwui akha, napai homer akhawui eina khuilui akhum tharukwui akha,
kala thao tāzak khavai (homer akhali bath tharā khalei thāda) cor akha bath tharāwui akhum akhara;
kala shākhani khalei yaoshangwui eina yao akha da Israel shimkhurbingwui eina khuilu. Hi athumli pheomi khavai, tharāzat kachigat, rikkatā kachigat, ningyatchigat sākhavaina, da Proho VAREna hānga.
“Mi saikora pha̱kaphayā ot hi Israel awungali miki kajina.

Kala wungnaona Israelnao saikorawui vang, phanit atamli, sabbaththang, changwokthang, kala phanitthang, rikkatā kachigat, tharāzat kachigat, ra̱shak kachigat saikora hi khangarān samiki kajina. Kala suiham kachigat, tharāzat kachigat, rikkatā kachigat, ningyat kachigat, saikora hi Israel shimkhurli pheomi khavai ana ngarānmiserki kajina.”
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Kachāng kharewui zimiksho kharethang nathumna achuk kapei mukkānao akha khuilaga tharkhamatheng shim chi sāmathākhuilu.
Pāngmonna suihamchigatwui ashee khuilaga khorumshimwui khāmongthingli hanphutwui akongnā achikun matili, kala alung kayāngwui pakra̱li neomira.
Kachikathāna matheimada sayonhaiakha, kachāng chiwui zimiksho kashinethang chi tākam eina sāpapamra; chithāda khorumshim chi sāmathākhuira.”
Chithanga wungnaona, awui vang kala Israel katongawui vang suihamchigat sākhavai mukkānao akha chigatra.
Kala phanitwui shinithang chili,
Kala ana tharāzat kachigat sāda, sei; me kala thao lengkhor ava̱va̱ hiwui vang khuilui ava̱va̱rip chigatra.
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Alungkayāngwui khāmong azingshoshong khangareipa chi zimiksho tharukthang shunghaichingra, kha sabbaththang eina changwokthang shohaira.

Wungnaona shimpho khāmongvāk eina zangra, kala khāmongpheili nganingra. Pāngmonbingna awui vang rikkatā kachigat kala ningyatchigat pha̱mida ana khāmongpheili khorumra. Chiwui thili ana shokhaora, kha ngazin eina tangda khāmong chi shohaira.
Sabbath eina changwokthang mibingna zangkhavai khāmong ngalemli
“Sabbaththang wungnaona
kala tharāzat kachigat sākhavai yao akhawui vang khuilui akha mira, kala ana kashap eina tangda tharāzat kachigatwui vang yaonao akha mira, kala khuilui akhawui vang thao lengkhorkha sangra.
Chāngwokwui katharukathang, ana achukkapei mukkānao akha, khangakhai makhalei yaonao tharuk kala me akha mi jira;

tharāzat kachigat tharan ana mukkā akha eina ngasoda khuilui akha, yao akha eina ngasoda khuilui akha; kala yaonaobing eina ngasoda ana kashap eina tangda mira, khuilui ava̱va̱wui vang thao lengkhor akharip sangra.
Wungnaona kazang tharan, ana shimphowui khāmongvāk eina zangra, kala chieina shokpapamra.
“Retmi kahai phanitli mibingna
Athum kazang tharan, wungnaola athumli ngasozangra, kashok tharan ala ngasoshokra.

Phanitli kala ngashit kahai tamli, tharāzat kachigat sākhavai mukkānaoli khuilui akha, mevā akhali khuilui akha, kala yaonaowui vang mikashap eina tangda mira, khuilui akhali thao lengkhor akha ngaso jira.
“Rikkatā kachigatwui vang nilala ningyatchigatwui vang nilala wungnao akhana ningyat eina thāda
“Ngathor kachida
Ngathor kachida tharāzat kachigat sākhavai eina ngasoda, khuilui akhawui sharuk tharukwui akha, kala mathir naikhavai thao lengkhor akhawui akhum kathumwui akha,
Chithāda, ngathor kachida, yaonao, kashakazā kachigat kala thao machatlakla rikkatāchigat sākhavai ngarānmiphalungra.
“Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: Wungnaona anaongarāli shimlui ngayarmiakha chi athumwui sāra, chi shimluikat athishurda kakhuina.
Kha ana awui raobingwui ngachai eina akhali awui shimlui yarakha, chihokhami kum eina tangda khuimara; awui naomayarabingmāngna khuichangki kajina.

Wungnaona mibingwui shimlui makhuipaimara; athumwui apam eina makashamshokpaimara, awui naomayarali khayar chi awui shimlui khalei chiwui eina miki kajina, chithāda iwui mibing khipākhawui eina mangapaikhuipaimara.”
Chiwui thili ana ili pāngmonbingwui kathara khāmong atungshong eina thānvāda zingtun vāmeimeikap kaje chili apam akha thei.
Ana ili hānga, “Suihamchigat, khayonchigat pāngmonbingna han hangkhavai pam chi hina; athumna khuilaga hili naira, kaja kayāng ayārshong mibingna kathara ot chi masāmakhao khavaiwui vangna.”
Chiwui thili ana ili yāngreishong shokta, ana ili achithek matili thānvai, kala achithek matili thanvāda chili kayāng ava̱va̱ leisai.
Kayāngkharei chiwui achithek matitili kayāng katenao ava̱va̱ khalei chi khuining hangmati sānga, kala thumrā pāka, matiti chi ngarithisera.
Kayāngnaowui arapli lungkhor akharip leisera, kala chiwui khanema chili meithalung shomhai.
Chiwui thili ana ili hānga, “Khorumshimwui otram khangatha̱bingna pha̱kaphayā hangkhavai chakshang chi hina.”
Chiwui thili ana ili atungshongwui khāmongvāk eina thānshoka, kala zingshoshong khalei ayar ngaveivāk thānvai, kala tara̱ chi azingshong shoksai.
Tamkhavai khara̱ akha singlaga zingshoshong mipā china khuining thingkha shikha tamkhui; kala ili tara̱lungli thānzangda pheikhumrankha kai.
Chiwui thili ana khuining thingkha tamvālui, kala ili tara̱ chili thānvai; kala khuksaorankha thuka. Latluida ana khuining thingkha tamkhuilaga ili thānvalui, chile kashanrankha thuka,
Latluida ana thingkha tamkhuilui; kala chili kong leisāhaoda I makānrarthuwa; kaja tara̱ kathuk chi mara̱yākakha makānkapai kong sāthuihaowa.
Chieina ana ili, “Miwui naomayara, hi theihairala?” da hānga.
Chiwui thili kongpheili thānvālui.
Ina vālui kaji eina kongphei khaninili thingrong kachungkha phorkasā thei.
Kala ana ili hānga, “Kong hi zingshoshong longvālaga Arabahli azanga; kala tara̱ khangarungpamli hi akazang eina mathingserhaowa.

Kala tara̱ hina vākashung pam kachiva̱li manglākapaiyur mathimara, khaihla kachungkha zangra; kaja tara̱ hi akazang eina shamadruwui tara̱ mathing khavaina; chithāda chili khalei saikora kharing samphangra.
Khaikaphānaona shamadrupheili nganingra; En-gediwui eina thuilaga En-eglaim eina tangda khailan khangkhavai pam ngasāra, Great Sea thāda khaihyurla kachungkha zangra.
Kha rāpurpam khangavātpamwui tara̱ mamathingmara; athum chiva machi khuikhavaipam sāra.

Kala kongphei khaninili shaikapai atheirong kachungkha phorra. Athumwui anahla mangahuilakmara, atheila matheichingra, kachāng kachida athei kathar matheira, kaja chili khalonga tara̱ chi tharkhamathengpamwui eina katāna. Athei chi kashakazā sāra, anahna ari sāvaira.”
Proho VAREna hithāda hānga: “Israel shang tharāda khaniwui shimlui ngayarkhami chiwui thari hithāda sāra. Josephna akhum khani khuira.
Kala nana ngaraichā eina ngayarmilu; Ina navā ngarāli mira da ngashit kahai hi nathumwui shimlui sāki kajina;
“Lam chiwui thari hithara: Atungshong, Great Sea eina thuilaga, Hethlonshong Hamath vāzang khavaivāk, Zedad,
Berothah, Sibraim vāshungda (Damascus eina Hamathwui ngachaili), Hauranli khalei Hazer-hatticon atharikhuira.
Chithāda shamadru eina thuilaga atungshong Damascus eina Hamathwui ngachaili khalei Hazar-enon vāshungra. Hi azingshongwui tharina.
“Zingshoshong, Hauran eina Damascus ngachaili khalei Hazar-enon eina thuilaga, Gilead eina Israelwui ngachai Jordan pharonda zingshoshongwui shamadruvāk Tamar vāshungra. Hi zingshoshongwui tharina.
“Azingshong, Tamar eina thuilaga Meribath-kadeshwui tara̱ vāshungda, chiwui eina thuilaga Egyptwui Kong pharonda Great Sea vāshungra. Hi azingshongwuina.
“Zingtunshong, Great Seana Hamathwui zangkhavai shong kāroda thari sāra. Hi zingtunshongwuina.
“Nana hithāda nathumwui alungli Israel shang-shangwui athishurda ngayarmira.

Nathum saikora kala nathumli ngasopamda nao pharāsang kahai athum saikoralila ngayarmiserki kajina. Athumla Israelshang thāda luichumnaosera; chiwui vang athumlila Israel shangli khayar thāda yarphalungra.
Khipāshikha shangli zanglala athumwui shimlui nana yarki kajina da Proho VAREna hānga.”

Shang-shangwui aming chi hina: Atungshongwui thari eina thuida, Hethlon vākhavai shamadru eina haophoklaga Hamath zangkhavai Hazar-enon vāshungda (Atungshong Damascus eina Hamathwui thari), kala zingsho eina thuilaga zingtun vāshunga, chi Danshiwui yarna.
Danshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina thuilaga zingtun vāshungda Ashershiwuina.
Ashershiwui eina thariphunglaga zingsho eina thuilaga zingtun vāshungda, chi Naphtalishiwuina.
Naphtalishiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina thuida zingtun vāshungda, chi Manassehshiwuina.
Manassehshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina zingtun vāpeida, chi Ephraimshiwuina.
Ephraimshimwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina zingtun vāpeida Reubenshiwuina.
Reubenshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga zingshowui eina zingtun vāshungda Judahshiwui sāra.

“Judahshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina zingtun vāpeida, tharkhamathengpam sāki kaji, aret khuining thingmaga̱da phangā kahaka, kala zingshowui eina zingtun vāshungda shang-shangli khami chili ngaranthan kaji apam chi hina.
Hi katharapamwui lamna: pāngmonbingna, atungshong, asān khuining thingmaga̱da phangā, zingtunshong khuining thingtharā, zingshoshong thingtharā da khui, kala
Hi tharchigat kahai Zadokwui naomayarawui vangna; kaja Israelnaona kala Levinaona mama̱kathui thāda athumna mama̱thuimana.
Hi athumwui vang eina phaishok kahai lamna, Levinaowuili tharikhuida tharmathengmeikap kaje apamna.
