Pāngmongbingwuili ngasunkhuilaga Levinaowui lam, asān khuining thingmaga̱da phangā, aret thingtharā jira. Katonga asān khuining thingmaga̱da phangā, aret thingmaga̱na.
Hi athumna khayorla mayorpaimana, khangatha̱la mangatha̱paimana; mi khangateili mamipailakmana kaja, hi
“Katei aret khuining thingphangā, asān thingmaga̱da phangā hi keinungwui ot khangatatei sākhavaina. Shimla sāpai, kayāng sādala haipai. Alungli keinung akha leira;
kala chiwui asān-aret; atungshong khuining thingmati shāphangā, azingshong thingmati shāphangā, zingtunshong thingmati shāphangā, kala zingshoshong thingmati shāphangā jira.
Keinung chiwui kuikhamareili kayāng leira: Atungshong khuining shākhani hangphangā, azingshong shākhani hangphangā, zingtunshong shākhani hangphangā, kala zingshoshong shākhani hangphangāna.
Katharapamli ngaran khavai, taida khalei chi zingshoshong khuining thingtharā, zingtunshong thingtharā lei. Hili kashok kashakazā chi keinungli ot kasābingwui vang sāra.
Kala keinungli ot kasābing, chiya Israelwui shangnao saikorawui eina, athumna vāsangra.
Katharapam, keinung katonga zangda, nathumna phaishokki kaji chi, asān-aret khuining thingmaga̱da phangā eina kuira.

“Katharapamwui kala keinungwui shimlui ngalem uishong yāshong khalei chi wungnaowui shimlui sāra. Tharkhamatheng pam chili ngarānda zingshoshong zingtunshong, khuining thingmaga̱da phangā kala shang-shangli khami chili ngalengda khalei lam hi wungnaobingwui sāra. katharapam chiwui alungli tharkhamatheng shim chi leira.
Kala keinungwui kala Levipāshiwui lan chi awungawui shimlui lungli leira. Awungawui shimlui chi Judah eina Benjaminwui ngachaili leira.
“Mangarinrang kaje shang kateibingwui vang: Zingshowui eina thuilaga zingtun vāshungda Benjaminwuina.
Benjaminshiwuili ngasunlaga zingshowui eina zingtun peida Simeonshiwuina.
Simeonshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina zingtun peida Issacharshiwuina,
Issacharshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina zingtun peida, Zebulunshiwuina.
Zebulunshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, zingshowui eina zingtun peida Gadshiwuina.
Kala Gadshiwuili ngasunkhuilaga, azingshong Tamarli thariphunglaga Meribath-kadesh tāshunga, chiwui eina Egyptwui Kong pharonvāda Great Sea tāshungra.
Hi Israel shang kachiva̱li ngayarmiki kaji lamna, kala ava̱va̱ shili hithāda ngayarmiki kajina, da Proho VAREna hānga.
ngavei kathum leira, Reubenshiwui ngavei, Judahshiwui ngavei, kala Levishiwui ngavei; keinungwui ngavei kachiva̱ Israel shang shangwui aming phokra.
Zingshoshong, khuining thingmati shāphangā kasang chiwuili ngavei kathum; Josephshi ngavei, Benjaminshi ngavei kala Danshi ngavei.
Azingshongwui khuining thingmati shāphangā kasānga chiwui ngavei kathum; Simeonshi ngavei, Issacharshi ngavei, kala Zebulunshi ngavei.
Zingtunshong, khuining thingmati shāphangā kasāng chiwui ngavei kathum; Gadshiwui ngavei, Asheshiwui ngavei kala Naphtalishiwui ngavei.
Keinung chiwui kuikhamarei khuining thingtharāda chishatna. Kala ara keinung chiwui aming,
Kala Judahwui awunga Jehoiakimli
Chiwui thili awungana awui akhoka ahonga Ashpenazli, Israelwui mibing, chiya wungnao shimkhur eina khayākakā shimkhur khaniniwui eina mi kaikha khuirālu da kasoi,

athumwui ngachaili, kanghāngri kahai, mayar khamathā otsak saikorali thangkhamei, awor kathema, mashunmakhui theithangkhama, kala awungawui keinungli otram ngatha̱kashapa mibingli Chaldeanaowui tui kala mayek tamchithei khavai kasoi.

Awungana athumli mathāmeithui kaji kashakazā kala ana khamang drakhāra̱ thangkachida mishak-mizā khavai ngarānmi. Athumli kum kathumwui vang lairik chishutra, kala atam ungkashung eina awungawui mangāli khuirāki kajina.
Athum chi Judah shangnaowui eina Daniel, Hananiah, Misha-el, kala Azariah hibingna.
Kala akhoka ahonga china athumli aming phokmida Danielli Belteshazzar, Hananiahli Shadrach, Michaelli Meshach, kala Azariahli Abednego hoi.
Kha Danielna awungawui shaikaphā mangkaphā kashakazā kala drakhāra̱ chi manglaga masākhamāngmara da nganingtithaowa; chiwui vang eina akhoka ahonga chili ali masākhamāngmi khavai poi.
Kala Varena akhoka ahongawui mikyanli Danielli lumngasaka;
kala akhoka ahonga china Danielli hānga, “Awungana milu kaji kashakazā chi mazāmada nawui tholā yaron khangateibingli nawui phasā ngazanmeihaipaishinada ngacheeya. Awungana ikui rangmihaipai.”
Chieina, Danielna athumli kaja Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, kala Azariahli yangmi khavai akhoka ahongana phāsangkahaia otram ngatha̱khame chili ahānga,
“Narao ithumli tharāthangwui vang hanthing-hanrā eina tara̱māng milaga khayangkhuimilu.
Chiwui thili awungawui kashakazā kazābing eina ithumwui azak kala phasā yanglaga theikakhui athishurda sāmilu.”
Chieina ana athumwui tui khuida tharāthang sāyanga.
Tharāthangwui thili khayang eina awungawui kashakazā kazā saikorali, azakla, phasāla athum mati phāmeikharhaowa.
Chieina otram ngatha̱khame china awungawui kashakazā kala athumna mangki kaji drakhāra̱ chi khuithuimihailaga hanthing-hanrāmāng mi.
Athum mayar mati chili Varena lairik kathemla aworla kachungkha ngarumsangmi; kala Danielna mang kala khamahā saikora theishingkhuikashap lei.
Atam ungkashung eina awungana kakaso athishurda akhoka ahonga china athumli Nebuchadnezzarwui mangāli khuivai.
Athum saikorali awungana ngazekyangserlaga, awungawui mangali khanganingbingwui ngachaili athum mati kaja Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, kala Azariah, athum kathā khipākha mazangmana.
Awor ayāyāva̱ ngahānlaga wungramli khalei mahei kathembing, laivā kathembing, khanong sākatheibingli athumna tharā shida themmeihaowa.
Kala chithāda Danielna awunga Cyruswui mungkhare kum eina tangda pamsai.
Nebuchadnezzarna mungda kakhane kum, mang akha shimana, kala ningrākhaida mapivāpaithuwa.
Chieina awungana mahei kathembing, laivā kathembing, khanong sākatheibing kala awor kathem Chaldeanaobingli mang chi hāngmi khavai saikorali hokhui ngasaka. Athum katonga awungawui mangāli anganinga.
Chieina awungana athumli hānga, “Ili mang akha shimana, kala chiwui kakhalat theikhangaiwui vang I wukkhanangshunhaira.”
Chieina Chaldeanaobingna hānga, “O awunga, okpeimeiranu! Nawui mang chi naraobingli kahāngmilu, chithākha ithumna kakhalat hāngmira.”
Awungana Chaldeanaobingli hānga, “Iwui tui hi makahatlakmana; nathumna iwui mang chi kala chiwui kakhalat mahāngmiakha nathumwui phasā rimkazamserhaora, kala shim katonga sākhaimiserhaora.
Kha nathumna mang chi hāngmishapakha kala khalatmishapakha, nathum iwui eina sāman kachungkha samphangra kala khayā kāngasakra. Chiwui vang eina mang kala chiwui kakhalat chi hāngmilu.”
Athumna kakhane sāda ngahānkāluishita, “Mang chi awungana kahāngmilu, chithākha chiwui kakhalat ithumna hāngmira.”
Awungana ngahānkai, “Nathumna atam shimān khavai kasā ina thei, khikhalajila iwui eina kashok tui chi makhangapatana kaji nathumna thei,

kalikha mang chi ili mahāngmiakha, nathumwui vang hukhum akha lei. Atamna khangachei makhuirāmiranglakha eina tangda kapiklaga minam khavai nathum ngasan kahaina. Chiwui vang eina iwui mang chi hānglu, chithākha nathumna chiwui kakhalat hāngmishapa da ina theira.”

Chaldeanaobingna awungali ngahānkai, “Awungawui kakaso hi sāmishapa okathuili mi akhala maleimana; kaja okathuili khangama, kapanga awunga kachikathāna laivā kathembingli, mahei kathembingli, lah Chaldeanaobingli hikathā tui mahānglakranga.
Awungana khangahān tui hiya kasaka otna, kala hikathā hi phasā makhavaiya kameobing maningla khipākha matheimara.”
Hiwui vang awunga malungvātnāhaida Babylonli khalei thangkhamabing saikora shaothatserhaolu da kasohaowa.
Chieina thangkhamabing saikorali shaothatserhaolu kaji athishurda Daniellonglila sāthat khavai khangarān sai.
Chieina Babylonli khalei thangkhamabingli shaothat khavai kazata awungawui shipai kathāna Ari-ochli, Danielna thangmeilak eina kala pinglak eina hānga;
“Khisāda awungana hiyākha sāshida hukhum tāhaokhala?” da Ari-ochli ngahāna, chieina ana maram chi Danielli hāngchithei.
Danielna awungawui ngalemli vāda, mang chi hāngmishap khavai atam kasha̱kha khamilu da apoi.
Danielna shimli ungda Hananiah, Mishael kala Azariah athumli shokta khalei saikora chi hānga,
kala Babylonli khalei thangkhamabingli ngasoda athumlila mashaothat khavai kazingramwui Varewui lukhamashan poda khangathuma tui chi phongmi khavai seihā sālu da hānga.
Kala Danielli māngli rāmahāmida khangathuma tui chi chitheimi. Chieina Danielna atungshongwui Vareli ningkashi mi.
Danielna hānga:
“Mashimānda Varewui mingli sochingranu,
awor kala pangshapla awuisera.
Atam, zur-kan ana ngachei ngasaka,
ana wungnaobingli khuishok khuizang sai;
thangkhamabingli awor mi,
kala theishingkakhuibingli kathem mi.
Kasaka kathuka tui ana phongmi,
tangkhamangli khalei chila ana thei;
kala awuili kahor lei.
O Ishāvā ngarāwui Vare!
Ina ningshida masot chigatli;
kaja awor kala yāng nana ili mi,
kala ithumna nali kapo chi nana ili theingasakhaira,
kaja awungana ningkachāng chi nana ithumli chitheimihaira.”

Chieina Babylonli khalei thangkhamabingli shaothat khavai kaso kahaia Ariochwuili Danielna vai, ana vāda hānga, “Babylonwui thangkhamabingli masāthatalu; ili awungawui mangāli thānvamilu, mangwui kakhalat chi ina awungali hāngmira.”
Ari-ochna Danielli katotlak eina awungawui mangāli thānvai, kala hithāda hānga, “Judahwui eina raithā kahai athumwui ngachaiwui eina, awungawui mang khalatmikashapa ākha samphanghaira.”
Awungana Belteshazzar kaho Danielli hānga, “Ili kashimān mang kala chiwui kakhalat nana hāngmishaprala?”
Danielna awungali ngahānkai, “Awungana khangahān matheikharar chi hāngmikashap thangkhama, khanong, laivā kathem mi maleimana,
kha ngathum kahai hāngmikashap Varivara akha kazingramli lei, kala ana Awunga Nebuchadnezzarli naoda rāshokki kaji chitheimihaira. Nana pida leilakha nawui kala mahākhami chi hina:
“Awunga nana petli pida leilakha naoda khi shoknikhala kaji chi ningli rāza̱mi; kala ngathum kahai chitheikhame china nali khirāra̱ kaji rāphongmi.
Kha iwui vanga, mi khangateili ina thangmeikhameiwui vang kathuka tui hi ili phongkhami maningmana, kha nawui mangwui kakhalat chi theikhavai kala nawui ningli kaphaning chi chitheimi khavaina.
“O awunga, nana mima̱ kahakva̱ akha thei. Mima̱ chi hingpit eina hakmahā kachangkhata, kala khangacheewui azak khuida nawui mangāli nganingsai.
Mima̱ chiwui akui sinā akachang eina sai, angun eina apāng lupāsāna, awuk eina khaishāng pithraina,
aphei marina, kala pheikhum mari eina ngalei manāta.
Nana yangda leilakha, mipāng mazangla sākhaikashoka lunggui akhana mari eina ngalei khamanāt pheikhum chili rāchakza̱da chi akha̱ sāthuihaowa;

kaja, marila, ngaleila, pithraila, lupāsāla, kala sinā chila tāpha̱haida akha̱ sāthuiserhaowa, kala lumkachāng lanpumwui māhik thāda masina phanthuihaida amei-amā akhala matheiluithuwa. Kha mima̱li rāchakkaza̱ lungguinao chi hakkhamahā phungrei sāthuihaida okathui katonga pemhaowa.
“Nawui mang chi china; ara awungali chiwui kakhalat ithumna hāngmira.
O awunga, awungabingwui awunga, nali atungshongwui Varena wungram, pangshap kala tekhamatei mihaira,
chili lāngda apam kachida khalei mila, ramsāla, yongkazat vānaola, saikorali khamunga sākhangasaka, na sināwui akui china.
Nawui thili teokhamei awunga akha rāra; kala chiwui thili kakathuma pithraiwui wungram akhana okathui katongali mungra.
Chiwui thili khamate wungram, mariwui pangshap kathā rāra, kaja marina ot saikorali sākhai kashap thāda saikora sākhaiserra.

Kala ngayarda mari, ngayarda hamkasāwui ngalei kathā khamanāt pheikhum eina pheimareng chithāda, wungram ngakai ngaroklaga mungra; kha nana marili leikhon manāt kahai kathei chi tākam eina kaikhava mariwui kapang thāda pangra.
Kala pheimareng mari eina ngalei khamanāt thāda wungram kaikha panglakra, kaikha ngazanlakra.
Mari eina leikhon khamanāt thāda athum eina athum ngalā ngakhotta manātromhaora, kha mari eina ngalei makhamanui thāda athumla machāngarokmara.
Chitharan atungshongwui Varena khangazipa wungram akha sākara, kala chiwui sākashap vākashap pangshap chi yur khangateili mahorsangmimara. China wungram saikora sākathānhaora, kala chiya leichingra;

mipāng eina masākakhai lungguinaona marila, pithraila, lupāsāla, sinala sākazamser kahai nana kathei chithāda shokra. Hiwui thili khi rāra̱khala kaji reikhamatai Varena awungali chitheimihaira. Mang chi mangapatlakmara, kala kakhalat hi khamashungana.”
Chieina awunga Nebuchadnezzarna Danielli kui mashunzangda khayākashi mi kala nganamkaphā otyur riktāda ali kachigat sākhavai kasoi.
Awungana Danielli hānga, “Kachangkhat eina nawui Vare hiya varebingwui Varena kala awungabingwui
Chiwui thili awungana juilak kahai masot mida hakkhamahā sāmanla mi; kala Babylon ngaleiwui khamunga sāngasaka, kathembing saikorawui kathānala sāngasaka.
Danielna kapo athishurda Shadrach, Mishach, kala Abednego athumli Babylon leikhaiwui yangkhame sāngasaka, kha Danielna awungawui hanga̱ shimli pama.
Awunga Nebuchadnezzarna sinā eina mima̱ kahakva̱ akha sākhui: mima̱ chi khuining hangtharuk juiya, kala kahak khuining tharuka. Kala Babylon leikhai Dura kaho tampākli hai.

Chiwui thili Awunga Nebuchadnezzarna satrapbing, kathānabing, khangam-khareibing, machinmebing, lansebing, bicharwobing kala leikhai chiwui otvabing saikorali meoma̱ chiwui dharkatli rākhavai hokazemkhuilu da awungana kasoi.

Chieina awungana sākahai ama̱wui dharkat chili zangkhavai satrapbing, kathānabing, khangam-khareibing, machinmebing, lansebing, bicharwobing kala leikhai chiwui otva̱bing saikora Nebuchadnezzarna sākahai mima̱ chiwui dharkatwui vang rakazipsera; kala awunga Nebuchadnezzarna sākahai mima̱ chiwui mangāli anganinga.
Kala vaomena hithāda panglāk eina vaomalāna, “Nathumli kasoda lei, O mibing, yurbing kala tuiyur khangatatei saikora,
nathumna talla̱, sipa̱, lyre, trigon, tingteilā, bagpipe, kala khangatatei eina kasā laakhon shākhaleoda, Awunga Nebuchadnezzarna sakā kahai sināwui ama̱ hili ngakhumshām eina khorumki kajina;
kala kachikathā ngakhumshāmsangda makhokharumpale meifa shātrung kahai chili ngalāngda horsanghaora.”

Chiwui thili talla̱, pipe, lyre, trigon, tingteilā, bagpipe, kala khangatatei eina kasa laakhon shākhaleoda, yur kachiva̱, tuiyur khangatatei hupta, mi kachiva̱ awunga Nebuchadnezzarna sakā kahai sinā ama̱ chili ngakhumshām eina khorumsera.
Atam chitharan Chaldeanao kaikhana Jehudibingwuitungli zakshilāk eina ahāngkasota.
Athumna awunga Nebuchadnezzarli hānga, “O awunga, okpeimeiranu!
Talla̱, sipa̱, lyre, trigon, tingteilā, bagpipe, kala khangatatei eina kasa laakhon shākhaleoda sināwui mima̱ hili ngakhumshām eina khorumlu;
makhokharumpa chili meifali horsangra da awungana hukhum mihaira.

Babylonli yangmi khavai nana Jehudinao khani kathumli kapangsanghaira: athum chiya Shadrach, Meshach, kala Abednego, athumna nali matheimimana. Hibing hina nawui varebingli otram mangatha̱mana, kala nana sākakhui sinā mima̱li makhorummana.”
Chieina Nebuchadnezzarna malungvātlākhaida, Shadrach, Meshach kala Abednego athumli khuirālu da kasoi. Kakaso athishurda athumli khuivai.
Nebuchadnezzarna athumli, “O Shadrach, Meshach kala Abednego, iwui vareli otram mangatha̱mana kala ina sakā kahai sinā mima̱li makhorummana kaji hi mashungla? da ngahāna.

Ara, talla̱, sipa̱, lyre, trigon, tingteilā, bagpipe, kala khangatei akhon shākhaleoda ina sākahai mima̱li ngakhumshām eina khorumra jiakha phai; maningakha arui ngalāngda meifali horsanghaora, nathumli iwui pāng eina huimiki kaji vare chi khipākhala?”
Shadrach, Meshach kala Abednego, athumna ngahānkai, “O Nebuchadnezzar, hiwui pongli ithumna khikha hāngkhavai maleimana.
Chithasalala, ithumna otram khangatha̱a Varena khamalinga meifawui eina ithumli kanmishapa, O awunga, napāngwui eina ana ithumli kanmira.
Chimathāsalala, O awunga! nana sākakhui sināwui mima̱ hili ithum otram mangatha̱mara kala makhorumara da theilu.”
Chi shālaga Nebuchadnezzar malungvātlakhaowa kala awui ningngaila Shadrach, Meshach kala Abednego athumwuitungli ngateihaowa. Ana meifa chi khangachāwui kasāli shini shida sāmei khavai kasoi.
Kala ana Shadrach, Meshach, Abednego, athumli pheipāng khalaplaga meifa shātrung kahai chili horsang khavai kapanga raimi kaikhali kasoi.
Chieina athumwui kashankachonla, kuihonla, zangserda khalaplaga meifa shātrung kahai chili horsanghaowa.
Awungawui hukhum chi chetlakhao, meifa shātrung kahai china sālakhaoda Shadrach, Meshach, Abednego athumli horkasangbingli meifa chiwui meiwona chuitahaowa.
Shadrach, Meshach kala Abednego athumli pheipāng khalaplaga meifalungli tāzanghaowa.
Khaleilaga Nebuchadnezzar awungana matakhakhaida ngakarthung thui, kala machinmebingli hānga, “Mi kathum meifali horkasang maningmala?” Athumna, “Mha, awunga!” da ngahānkai.
Ana hānga, “Kha mi mati meilungli yaothuikazat theili, athumli sākaza̱ maleimana, kala khamatepa chi yangakha varebingwui naomayara thai.”

Chieina Nebuchadnezzarna meifa chiwui khāmongshong vānganaida hānga, “Shadrach, Meshach, Abednego, Reimataimeikap kaje Varewui raobing! shoklu, kala hili ralu!” Chieina Shadrach, Meshach, kala Abednego athumna meiwui eina shokrāsai.

Kala satrapbing, kathanabing, lammungabing, kala awungawui machinmebing, kaziplaga khayang tharan, athumwui phasāli meina machuihaisālak mana, sam eina tangda mangaluimana, kashankachonla machuimana kala meihi eina tangda manganamana.

Nebuchadnezzarna hānga, “Shadrach, Meshach kala Abednegowui Vareli tekmateiranu! Athumwui Vare maningla vare khangateili khorumki kajiwui vang phasā chigat kahai mibingli kazingrao chihotāda, awui raobingli huikhame Vare chi tekmateiranu!

“Chiwui vang ina hukhum khamina: Shadrach, Meshachwui kala Abednegowui Vareli makhamayā kala kachipata miyur, jat kachiva̱li asā rimkazamira, athumwui shimluila sākhayāngmiserhaora. Kaja, hithāda huimishapa vare khangatei maleimana.”
Kala awungana Shadrach, Meshach, Abednego athumli Babylon ngaleili athumwui otpam reisang ngasaka.
Nebuchadnezzarna okathuili khalei miyur saikora, tuiyur khangatatei saikorali kahāng: Chingri kahai nathumli mataisangranu!
Reimeikap kaje Varena ili chitheikhami khudam kala matakhak kahai chi nathumlila kachithei khamathā ot akhana da phaninga.
Awui sākachithei hakkhamahā!
Awui pangshap matakhak kahai!
Awui wungram katang mavaimana,
kala awui ngalei thot kachiva̱ vāpei.
Nebuchadnezzar, imāng keinungli ringphālak eina okthuida yansāngsa̱ eina leisai.
Ina pilakha mang akha shimana, kala mang china ili ngachee ngasaka; kala khamahā chi theilaga malung tātung ngasaka.
Chiwui vang eina Babylonli khalei thangkhama saikora hokhuida mang chiwui kakhalat hāngmi khavai hukhum akha miya.
Chieina laivā kathembing, ningyo kathembing, Chaldeanaobing kala kachāng sirāli machukkatheibingli kahāng eina athumna chiwui kakhalat mahāngmirarthuwa.
Naolak eina iwui varewui ming kaphoka Belteshazzar kaho, manglā katharana ngasokhame Daniel rai; kala ina ali,

O Belteshazzar, maheikathem saikorawui akhavā, kathara varebingwui manglāna nali ngasomi, kala kathuka tui nawui vang sakkhanā maleimana da ina thei. Ili kashiman mang chi hina, mang chiwui kakhalat hāngmilu.
“Ina pida leilakha ili mahākhami chi hina: Ina thei, yanglu, okathuiwui alungthungli thingrong kajuiva̱ akha phorsai.
Kala thingrong chi haksangda kahakva̱ sāthuihaowa, kala aton kazing kāzokta okathui apam kachiva̱li thei.

Thing chiwui anahla mathāshuna, atheila kachungkha matheida saikorana kashai samphanga. Sāyurbingna chiwui khaya̱li ngasāmkhui, kala paikazata vānaobingna thingphāngli ngayinkhui; kala manglākapai kachiva̱na zākhavai samphanga.”
“Ina pida leilakha mangshongli, khamayona, kathara mi akha kazing eina katā thei.
Ana panglāk eina vaoda hānga, ‘Thingrong chi ta̱teklaga aphāng thapserhaolu,’ anahla thaplaga athei katonga herkathānhaolu; sāyurbing khaya̱li mapamluiaranu, vānaobingla aphāngwui eina yāmhaoranu.
Kha thingngun chiya mariphek kala pithraiphek eina khalaplaga luili khalei nganaozao kahai khawolungli haipapamlu.”
“Chi ikra̱ matak ngasaklu; ngaleiwui sāyurli ngasopamranu;
awui ning ngacheihaida sāyurwui ning zangranu; chithāda awuitungli shini shida peingasakranu.

Kakaso hi ra̱khayangpā chiwuina, kala kathara chiwui kakasona, kaja kharingabingna theikhuira chiya Reikhamataiya china miwui wungram munga kala awui mikhangai chili miya, kala ngazanmeikap kaje chili mungngasaka.”

“Mang hi Nebuchadnezzar awunga ina katheina.” “Chieina O Belteshazzar, hiwui kakhalat hāngmilu; khikhalajila iwui wungramli khalei thangkhama khipānakha chiwui kakhalat mahāngmirarthura, kha kathara manglāna ngasokhamiwui vang nana hāngmishapra.”
Belteshazzar kaho Daniel chi khananghaida kasha̱khawui vang khituikha mamatuipaithuwa. Chieina awungana hānga, “Belteshazzar, mang kala chiwui kakhalatna nali mangachee ngasakalu.”
Belteshazzarna ngahānkai, “Iwui amei, mang chi nali yangkakharingbingwui vang ngasaranu kala chiwui kakhalat chi nawui yangkashebingwui vang ngasāranu!
Nana mangshong kathei thing akha phorlaga kahakva ngasāthui kahai, aton kazing kāzokta okathui katongana kathei,
kala thingnah timfa eina athei kachungkha matheida saikorana kashai kala chiwui khaya̱zingli sāyurna ngasāmkakhui, vānaobingna thingphāngli athip rāsākakhui chi—
O awunga, chi nana. Nawui reikhamatai kazing kāzokta okathui kuimareida vāpeihaira.

Kala awungana yangda leilakha, ra̱khayanga, kazingram eina katā kathara china, ‘Thingrong chi ta̱tek haolu, kha angun che mariphek kala pithraiphek eina khalaplaga phorngasaksālu, luiwui timfa kahai khawoli ngasoda ikra̱ matakpi ngasaklu; kala ramsāli ngasopamranu; chithāda shini shida ali peingasakranu’;
kaji chiwui kakhalat chi hina, O Awunga: Reikhamataiya chiwui bichar iwui amei awunga nawuitungli katāna,

kaja miwui eina nali kashamhaida khararwui sāyurli ngasopamra; nali mukkā thāda khawo phāshai ngasakra, kala nali kazingramwui ikra̱na ya̱ngasakra, kala Reikhamataiya china mikumowui wungramli mungra kala ana mikhangai mi chili mira kaji nana matheikhuiranglakha eina tangda shini shida peingasakra.
Kala thingngayung chiwui angun chi haisalu da kakaso athishurda, Kazingramna munga kaji nana theikhui kahaiwui thili nawui wungram samphangnaora.
Chiwui vang eina O awunga, iwui kahāng hi khuisangmilu; morei ot horhaida kathar pongli zanglu, khalāng ot chihohaida khangazanbingli lumashanmilu, chingri eina sāngmeida okthui khavaina.”
Saikora chi awunga Nebuchadnezzarli shoksera.
Kachāng tharāda khani kākapei eina, ana Babylonwui keinung shimtungli yaothuizatta leilakha,
awungana hānga, “Iwui khangamkharei tekmatei khavai, iwui keinung hirikha kahaka Babylon hi iwui pangshap eina sākakhui maningmala?”
Awungana tui chi hāngmahunglakha kazingramwui eina akhon akha shai, “O awunga Nebuchadnezzar! Hi nali kahāngna: Awunga ngalei nawui eina kānthuihaira,

nali mibingwui pamkhavai eina kashamhaora, kala nava khararwui ramsābingli ngasopamhaora; kala mukkā thāda kum shini khawo phāshai ngasakra; chieina mikumowui wungpam hi Reikhamataia ana mungda mikhangayili miya da matheiranglakha eina tangda shini shida vāfara.”

Chili ngalāngda hāngkahai tui chi Nebuchadnezzarwuitungli shokhaowa. Miwui eina kashamhaida mukkā thāda khawo phāshai, kala ahah khalāngwui thāda sānghaowa, kala awui panglingkor vānaowui angasat thāhaowa.
“Zingkum peihaida atam ungkashung tharan, Nebuchadnezzar ina kazingramli yangkai, kala ning ungrāsai, chieina ina mashimānda makashimān Reikhamataia kharinga chili khayāshida masot chigata:
“Kaja awui wungram mashimānda makashimānna,
kala awui awungram thot kachida leichinga;
okathuiwui mi awui mangāli khikha maningmana;
kazinglila okathuilila awui kaphaning athishurda sai;
khipānakha mangakaishirarmana,
Khi kasākhala? da khipākha mangahānrarmana.

“Iwui ning ungluishit kaji atamli; iwui wungram, iwui khayākakā tekhamatei saikora hanmiluishita. Iwui wungva̱-wungvābing, wungphembing ili phaungluishita, iwui wungram sakāluishita, kala kharewuili lāngda mataisangmi.
“Ara, kazingramwui awunga chili Nebuchadnezzar ina khayāshida masot miya; ava khamashung otmāng sai, khangarong pongli zata, kala lāngkaso athumli maishi ngasakshapa.”
Belshazzar awungana zātkhān kahakva akha sāda wungnao thingthingli ngasoda phāshak phāzai.

Belshazzarna drakhāra̱ mazapkhayang tharan, awui wungnaobing, apreiva̱ ngarā, angashirva ngarā, athum saikorana, avāva̱ Nebuchadnezzarna Jerusalemwui khorumshimwui eina khuikhaung sinā kala lupāsā eina kasā tengkotbing chili sangda mangkhavai khuirālu da kasoi.

Jerusalemli khalei khorumshimwui eina khuikhaung sinā kala lupāsā eina kasā, tengkotbing chi khuirāmida awunga, awui wungnaobing, apreiva̱ ngarā kala awui angashirva ngarā saikorana chiwui eina drakhāra̱ manga.
Athumna mangda sinā, lupā, pithrai, mari, thing, kala ngalungwui varebingli masot chigata.
Kashuirak eina mipāng akha rāchithei kala awungawui dolan phākholi rākapi, thaomei shārkhavaili kāroda kakapi chi awungana thei.
Chi theilaga awungawui maipān ngacheihaowa, kala ning chipāhaida kathirriri khuksao eina khuksao ngatākkapopa.

Awungana laivā kathembing, Chaldeanaobing kala kachāng sirāli machukkatheibing thākta ahokhuilu da vaowa. Kala awungana Babylonwui thangkhamabingli, “Kapi kahai hi pākatheia kala chiwui kakhalat hāngmishapa chili hungrisi kaji khamenga kachon ngavaimira, akahungli sināchā ngachāmira, kala wungramli kakathuma khamunga akhavā sāngasakra.” da hānga.
Chieina awungawui thangkhama mi saikora rai, kha khipānakha kapi kahai tui kala chiwui kakhalat matheirarthuwa.
Chieina awunga Belshazzar chipālakhaowa kala maipānla ngacheihaowa; awui wungnaobingla matakhakhaowa.
Awungawui kala wungnaobingwui tui chi shālaga awungva̱ chi morsong khavaipam chili rārāsai; kala awungva̱na hānga, “O awunga, okpeimeiranu! Nawui ning machipaaranu lah maipānla mangacheiaranu.

Nawui wungramli manglā kathara khangaso mi akha lei. Navā Nebuchadnezzarwui thotli, kathemla thangkhameila varenao thāda paisor eina katheiwui vang, navāna ali laivā kathembing, mitrang kathembing, Chaldeanaobing kala sirā machukkatheibingwui kathāna sāngasaka,

khikhalajila mathameikap kaje manglā, kathem kala theithangkhamei, mang kakhalatwui theishingkakhui, chānjam hāngmikashap, kala kasak otla phāshok kashap Belteshazzar, awungana Daniel kaho chi lei. Ali ahokhui ngasaklu, ana hiwui kakhalat hāngmira.”
Chieina Danielli awungawui mangāli khuirai. Kala awungana Danielli hānga, “Judahwui eina ishāvā awungana raikatha atamli Judahwui eina khuikhaung Daniel kaho chi nala?
Kathara chiwui manglā nali ngasomi, kala theikashap, theishingkakhui, kala hakmahālak kahai awor nawuili lei da ina shāhaira.
Yanglu, thangkhamabing, laivā kathembing iwui mangāli khuirāda kapi kahai tui chi pālaga ili chiwui kakhalat hāngmi khavai khuirai; kha chiwui kakhalat khipākha mahāngmirarthuwa.

Kha nana kakhalat hāngmishapa kala kasak kapai chi nana phākhuimishapa da ina shai. Chieina ara nana ili kapikahai hiwui kakhalat hāngmishapakha, nali hungrisi kahai khamenga kachon ngavaimida sināchā nawui kahungli ngachāmira, kala iwui wungramli nana akhavā kakathuma sāra.”

Chieina Danielna awungawui mangāli ngahānkai, “Nawui lemmet na khalattawui vang ngasāranu, kala nawui sāman khangateiwui sāhaoranu; chithālala rākapi kahai chi ina pāmira, kala chiwui kakhalat awungali chitheimira.
“O awunga, Reikhamataiya Vare china navā Nebuchadnezzarli wungpam eina hakkhamahā kala tekhamatei eina khangamkharei mi;

ali chiyākha reikhangasakwui vang mibing, yur saikora, tuiyur kachiva̱ awui mangāli kathira kala ngachee; ana shaothatkhangaili shaothata, huimikhangaili huimi, juingasakhangai chili juingasaka, kala nemngasakhangai chili nemngasaka.
Kha ana ngam-uda hiksor eina kala lāngsosor eina kasā tharan wungpamwui eina khuishokhaida awui tekhamatei shimān ngasaka;

mishangwui eina kashamhailaga ningla sāyur thāda sāmihaida ramgadhāli ngasopam ngasaka, mukkā thāda ali khawo shaingasaka, kala Reikhamataiya Varena mibingwui wungramlila munga, kala awui mikhangai chili mi kaji matheikhuiranglakha eina tangda ikra̱ matakpi ngasaka.
“Kha awui naomayara Belshazzar, nanala hi thatheilaga naning mahamsangmana;
kha kazingramwui
“Chieina awui pamkhavaiwui eina arui pāng chihorāda rākagapina.
“Kala kapi kahai tui chi hina: ‘MENE, MENE, TEKEL kala PARSIN.’
Chiwui kakhalat hithai: MENE, Varena nawui wungram atam shānhaira kala khangachang khuirāhaira;
TEKEL, nali khān tamyanglaga makāpeithuwa;
PERES, nawui wungram ngayarkhailaga Medes eina Persianaobingli mihaira.”
Chieina Belshazzarna kasoda Danielli hungrisi khamenga kachon ngavaimi, kala sināchā akha akahungli ngachāmi; kala awui pongli Babylon ngaleiwui khamunga kakathumana da chishāta.
Chithang ngayā ngalāngda Chaldeawui awunga Belshazzarli shaothathaowa.
Kala zingkum hangtharukta khani sha̱kha kāshung kahaia Darius kaho Medepa china wungram chi khuihaowa.
Wungram katonga chi yangkhavai Dariusna satrap shākha maga̱ kapangsanga;
kala chiwuitungli yangmi khavai khayaiwo kathum phāsanga, chiwui ngachaili Daniel akhana; athumli satrapbingna kashi-kaphā ngasanchinga.
Satrapbing kala khayaiwobingwui ngachaili Daniel mahomeithuihaowa, khikhalajila awuili hakmahālak kahai manglā lei; chiwui vang eina wungram saikorawuitungli ali chipam khavai awungana khangarān sai.
Chiwui vang khayaiwobing kala satrapbingna wungram Danielwuitungli khayon mikhavai phai; khamashunga, ningtongda shitkasang mi sāthuihaoda khayon khikha masamphangmana.
Chieina athum ngazek ngarokta, “Awui Varewui ningkhami pongli maningla Danielli khayon khangatei masamphangrarmara” da hānga.
Chieina khayaiwo kala satrapbing china khangashit akha sālaga awungali ahānga, “O awunga Darius! okpeimeiranu!

Zimiksho thumrāthang, awunga nali maningla kachikathana vare khangateibing lah mi khangateili ngakaoakha kazingkha̱khurli horsangra kaji hukum akha sāmiranu da khayaiwobing, satrapbing, machinmebing, kala lammungabing ithum saikorana mayāngarokhaira.
Chiwui vang eina O awunga, Medes eina Persiawui khangachā athishurda hukum akha sālaga, chi makai khavai shoi kasāmilu.”
Chiwui athishurda awunga Dariusna shoi sālaga hukum mihaowa.

Kakaso shoi sāhaira kaji theilaga Danielna awui shim mathāng atoli kāda, Jerusalemshong khalei charfa ngalemli khuktida Vareli ningkashi eina thangkhali kathumshida khangachā makailakla seihā sāchinga.
Khangashit sākahai athum china, Danielna Vareli khokharum seihā kasā chi atheihaowa.

Chieina athumna awungawuili vāda hiwui apongli ahānga, “O awunga! Kachikathā mina nali maningla, varebingli, lah mi akhali khorumakha chikathā mili kazingkha̱khurli horsanglu da nana shoi sākahai maningmala?” Awungana ngahānkai, “Medeswui kala Persiawui ain athishurda hāngkahai chi makailakmana, sakakhaila masākhaipaimara.”

Athumna awungawui mangāli ngahānkai, “Judahwui eina raikathā atamili khuikharā Daniel kaho china nali mashitsangmana O awunga, kala nana shoi sākahai chili matheimila thangkhali kathum shida awui Vareli seihā sāchingda lei.”
Tui chi kashā tharan awunga wukkhanangnāhaowa, kala Danielli kanshok khavai awungana kazing khaying eina tangda khangarān sai.
Chiwui thili khangashit sāngarok kahaibing china awungali ahānga, “Theimilu, O awunga, kaja Medes kala Persiawui ain athishurda awungana hukum lah khak tākahai chi mangacheipaimana kaji nana thei.”
Chiwui thili awungana kasoda Danielli kazingkha̱khurli horsanghaowa. Awungana Danielli hānga, “Nana thangkachida kaphaninga nawui Varena kanmiranu.”
Chiwui thili akhur chi lungriham akha eina shungphinhaida awungana shoi khutop eina mahor namphina, khikha mangachei khavai wungnaobingwui shoi khutop eina mahor namshānsera.
Awungana awui dolanli latungda kakhum eina ungpiya; wukkakhanangwui ningkharākna ngayā mapivālakmana.
Kazing thangkhaleoda, awungana ngakarthui kala kazingkha̱khurpamli hengsāda vāhaowa.

Danielli horsang khavai kazingkha̱khurli vāshung khaleoda malungringlak eina Danielli avaowa, “O Daniel, kharinga Varewui rao, nana thangkachida kaphaninga nawui Varena kazingkha̱ khamorwui eina mahuimikhala?”
Chieina Danielna awungali ngahānkai, “Awunga, okpeimeiranu!

Iwui Varena awui kazingrao chihotāda kazingkha̱ khamor sāphinmihaida ili khikha mathāmana; khikhalajila, Varewui mangāli iwui khalāng khikha maleisāmana, kala O awunga, nawui mangālila ina khikha khalāng masāhailakmana.”

Chieina awungana ringphāshunhaida Danielli kazingkha̱khur eina khuishok khavai kasoi. Chieina Danielli kazingkha̱khur eina khuishoka, kala ali khikha akhala masāza̱haisalakmana, kaja ana awui Vareli shitsangtita.

Kala awungana kasoda, Danielli kaphenbing chili, athumwui naongarā, apreiva̱̱ ngarā saikora zangda zingkha̱khurli horsangserhaowa, athum mazangshungranglakha kazingkha̱bing china kāyonkhuida ngasheikasākserhaowa.
Chiwui thili awunga Dariusna, okathuili khalei mibing, yurbing, kala tuiyur saikorali lairik kapilaga chihovāserda hānga, “Nathumli chingri kahai mataisangranu.
Iwui wungramli khalei saikorali ina kakaso khamina, kaja mibingna Danielwui Vareli ngacheeda khayāshiranu,
kaja ava makashimān kharinga Varena;
awui wungram masāshimānlakmara,
kala awui khamung katongali vāshungra.
Ana kanmi kala ngatangkhuimi,
ana machut kala matakhak kahai sai,
kazinglila, okathuilila,
kazingkha̱ khamorwui eina Danielli kankhame china.”
Chithāda sāda Dariusna munglakha kala Persiawui awunga Cyrusna munglakha Daniel reisanglak eina okthuisai.
Babylonwui awunga Belshazzarna mungkhare kum, Danielna pilakha mang akha shimana. Mang chi ana kapikhui, kala chiwui kasha̱a ara̱tui ana hāngmi.
Ngayāshong mangshongli ina khamahā akha athei, kala yanglu, kazingram achikun matiwui masina kahaka shamadruli phankazama.

Khare chi kazingkha̱ thai kala khalāngwui angachāng kai. Kala ina yangda leilakha angachāng hekmihaowa kala khāngkhaninglaga mi thāda aphei khani eina ngaleili nganing ngasaka, kala miwui ningla ali sangmi.
Kala yanglu, kakhane sā chiya singom thai. Sā chi khanukphei eina nganinga, kala akhamorli, ahā ngachaili arapthingra̱ kathum ngatama; kala hithāda hānga, “Ngakarthuida sā kachungkha shailu.”
Chiwui thili ina yanga, kala yanglu, kuirāng thāda, vānaowui angachāng khumkhorli mati kai; kala sā chi akui mati kai; kala ali mungkhavai pangshap mi.

Angaji chi ina machukta leilakha, yanglu, khangatei angaji kateo akha shonshokrāsai, chi kashok eina rida kākasa angachee kathum angayung eina sutshokhaowa; kala yanglu, angaji chili miwui amik thāda kai, kala khamorla kāda tui kachungkha matui.
wungpamkhongbing haikhami thei,
kala ringching kaje mi akhana awui pam rākhui;
awui kashankachon horam thāda chara,
awui kuisam sahah tharzā kahai thai;
awui wungpam khamalinga meiwonna,
chiwui kāngphei kachuiya meina.
thing-thingna ali otram ngatha̱mi,
thingtharā shidawui thingtharāna awui mangāli nganinga:
chiwui thili bichar sāphoka,
kala lairikla hārserhai.
Angaji china panglāk eina khamatui chi shāda ina yangvai. Ina yangkhavā eina, sā chili shaothatlaga sākazamkhuilaga mei eina riktā khavai mihaowa.
Sā kateibing chi athumwui pangshap khuithuihaowa, kha atam kasha̱khawui vang mathi khavai mayāmi.
kala yanglu, kazingramwui muiyāli ngasoda,
miwui naomayara thāda akha kharā thei,
kala ana Ringching kaje chiwuili rai,
kala awui mangāli anganinga.
kaja miyur saikora, yur saikora kala,
tuiyur saikora ali otram ngatha̱ khavai;
awui pangshap katang makhavai pangshapna;
chi kashimān kaho maleimara;
kala awui wungram chiya sākashimān maleimara.
Daniel iwui vanga, mang chi theilaga ning chipālakhaowa, kala khi shoknikhala da ningkhariklaka.
Ina chiwui ngalemli nganingkasā akhali, saikora hiwui kachangkhat khikhala kaji theikhui khavai ngahānyanga. Ana chiwui pongli kakhalat mathālak eina hāngmi.
“Kahaka sāyur mati chi okathuili rāmungki kaji awunga matina.
Kha wungram chi mashimānda mashimānla, katang mavaila athumwui sāra.”

Chiwui thili, khangateiwui eina ngateimeikap kaje khamate sā, khangachee hāngkhavai makhalei, marihā kakā pithraiwui pāngmareng kashoka, serkazamlaga kashaia, kala katatai chi naikakazama sā chiwui akachanga tui chi ina theingaihaowa;

kala akuili angaji tharā kakā, naoda akha kashok eina leikasā kathum tātung kahai, kala angajili amik kala akhamor kālaga tui kachungkha matuida khangateibingli hakmeikap kaji chiwui pongli ina theingailakhaowa.
Ringching kajepa china rāda Chuimeikap kajewui katharabingwui vang bichar masamiranglakha kala katharabingna wungram chi masamphangranglakha eina tangda athumna yui.
Ana hithāda hānga: “Khamate sā chiya,
okathuili khamate awunga akha rāra,
ava khangatei wungram saikorawui eina ngateihangra,
china okathui katonga shaihaora,
aphei eina naikazamtāda akha̱-akhā sāda sakhaimihaora.
wungram hiwui eina awunga tharā shokra,
athumwui thili akha shokra,
ava kateibingwui eina ngateihangra,
kala awunga kathum shimān ngasakra.
kala Chuikhamataiawui katharabingli chotchāng ngasakra,
kala atamla, ainla ngachei khavai ngarānra;
kala atam akhashi, khanishi, kala tangkhaishi,
athum awui pāngli horsangmira.
Kha kārot kāda bichar sāthang
awui pangshap khuithuihaora,
mutchaohaora kala kakup eina tangda sāshimānhaora.
Chuikhamataiawui katharabingli mihaora;
athumwui wungram katang mavaimara,
kala pangshap saikorana athumwui otram ngatha̱ra kala kahāng nganāra.”
Apong chiwui katanga chi hina. Daniel iwui vanga, ining chipālakhaoda maipanla ngacheihaowa; kha ina tui chi iningli phumhai.
Belshazzar awungana mungda kakathuma kum, Daniel ili, kharewui mang thāda rāmahāluishita.
Ina khamahā chi kathei tharan I Elamwui keinung Susali pamsai, kala I Ulai kongli leisai.
Ina yangkakā tharan yaovā akha kongpheili nganingsai. Angaji khani shoka, khanini sāngthathuiya, kha akhana kasāngmei, kala sāngkhameipā chi shoknaowa.

Yao china zingtunshong, atungshong kala azingshong kharom kazat ina thei; sā khangatei ali mangasungrarmana, kala awui pangshapwui eina khipānakha makankhuirarmana; awui ningkachāng athishurda sākhangai sai kala akhalattawui yāng chithei khavai sai.
Ina chukmajada leilakha, yanglu, mevā akha ngalei machongza̱la zingtunshong eina okathui hupva makānrai; kala mevā chiwui amik khaniwui ngachaili angachee akha mashonshei shoka.
Kala ina kathei angaji khani kashoka, kongpheili nganing kasā yaovā chiwui ngalemli malungvātlāk eina ngasamvai.

Ana yaovā chili vākhanganai, kala ana malungvātlak eina akathot eina awui angaji khani thottekhaowa, kala yao chi awui mangāli manganingrarthuwa, kha ana ngaleili thotkārsanghailaga naikazama, kala awui pangshapwui eina yaovā chili kanmikashap khipākha maleithuwa.
Chiwui thili mevā china awui pangshap kachungkha chithei; kha a pangda leilakha, kahaka angaji chi tekhaowa, kala chiwui mahut kazingram achikun matili chiza̱laga angaji mati mashonsei eina shoka.
Athum ngachaili akhawui eina angaji kateona akha shoklaga haksang khangai haksangda azingshong, zingshoshong kala tekhamatei ram vāshunga.
Chiwui kahak chi kazingramwui sirāli kāshunga, kala sirā kaikha ngaleili thottāda chibingli naikazama.
Akhalatta pangshap chithei, ashangva̱wui Wungnao eina tangdalila kāshunga, kala machatlakla rikkatā kachigat chila awui eina khuithuihaowa, kala katharapam chila ana sāshimānmihaowa.
Saikora chi ali horsangmihaida, mashun maleilala machatlakla rikkatā kachigat chila mihaowa; khamashung kaho chi pheinai sāhaowa, kala angachee china sākhangai sāda ngamkhangai ngama.
Chieina ana ali ngahānkai, “Ngathor ngazin thingkhani shākathum; chiwui thili kathara shim hi khangachāwui pamli khuisangluira.”
Daniel ina khamahā chi kathei tharan, khiwui kakhalatkhala da theishingkhui khavai sai; kala yanglu, mi tākam eina iwui mangāli akha nganingsai.
Kala Ulai kongphei ngachaiwui eina mikhon akha khavao ina shai, “Gabriel, mipa hili khamahā hiwui kakhalat hāngmilu.”
Chieina ana iwui nganing khavaipamli rānganai, a kharā tharan I ngacheenāhaida ngakhumshām zanghaowa. Kha ana ili hānga, “O miwui naomayara, theilu, khamahā chi khangachang atamwui vangna.”
Ana hāngmamanda leilakha, I ngakhumshām eina piphupvāhaowa; kha ana khāngkhuida thuinganing ngasaka.
Ana hānga, “Yanglu, malungkhavātwui akuplam khi shokrakhala kaji ina hāngmiga; kaja hi retmi kahai khanaowa atamwui aponglina.
“Angaji khani kashoka yaovā nana kathei chi, Media eina Persiawui awunga khanina.
Mevā chi Greecewui awungana, kala amik khani ngachaili mashonshei eina kashok angachee chi khare awungana.
Angachee tekhailaga mati kashok chi, awui yurwuili wungram mati shokra, kha awui pangshap eina rāki kaji maningmana.
“Kala athumna munglaga ngachangnanai, khayonkhamāng ot kasāna ngalat kahai tharan, ngamcholak kahai, chānsam kathema awunga akha rāra.
Awui pangshap reilakra, ana sākashi otmāng sāra, kala ana kasāsā ungshungra, kala khangamkharei, kathara mibingli sāshimān ngasakra.

Awui thangkhamei awor china mikhanam mataisangra, a khalattawui ningli haklakada phaningra. Kashuirak eina kachungkhali shaothatra; kala wungnaobingwui Wungnao eina tangdalila mamayāmara; kha ali mipāng makhaningna sāshimānra.
Hāngkahai ngathor eina ngazinwui khamahā hi khamashungna; kha khamahā hi phārihaisalu, kaja hi naolak eina shokki kajina.”
Kala Daniel I atam kasha̱khawui vang kazāhaowa; chiwui thili ina ngakarthuida awungawuili otram ungngatha̱luiya; kha ili khamahā china ngachee ngasaklakhaowa kala bhab matārarthuwa.
Mede yurwui Ahasu-eruswui naomayara Dariusna Chaldeanaowui awunga sāda khare kum—
ana mungkhare kum, kathara lairikli
Chiwui thili kakhum eina, bora ngavaida kala hotlā teilaga seihā kasā eina ngasoda ina Vare
Iwui
ithumna nawui eina mai ngareithuihailaga nawui ningkhami kala shiyan-chikan mamayonla morei sāda makaphā otsak sāda ngakaishihaira;
ithumna nawui rao marānbing, ithumwui awungabing kala, wungnaobing, ishāvā ngarā kala ngalei hiwui mibingli nawui ming eina khamatuiabingwui tui makhuisangthuwa.
O
O
Lukhamashan kala pheokhami ithumwui
kala narao marānbingli hāngmi khangasak nawui ningkhami,

Israel saikorana nawui ain chonmakānhaira kala mai ngareithuihaira, nawui akhonla makhuisangmana. Varewui rao Moseswui ningkhami lairikli kapi kahai chiwui khonkashi kala mingkazai chi ithumwuitungli heirorhaira khikhalajila ithumna morei sāhaowa.
Ithumli kala ithumli khamungbingwuitungli makhamayā hāngkahai hakkhamahā kalāshāt chi ungshung ngasakhaira; kaja okathuili mashoklakrang kaje Jerusalemwuitungli shokhaira.
Moseswui ainli kapi kahai thāda unshimui saikora hi ithumwuitungli tākahaina, chithālala ithumna
Chiwui vang
“Ara, O
O
Chiwui vang O ithumwui Vare, namingwui vang naraowui seihā kala kapo hi kakhuisangmilu, O

O iwui Vare, nāshungda shāmilu; namik rakta ithumwui khamasai hi katheimilu; kala nawui ming eina hokahai keinung hili kha-yangtāmilu; kaja ithumwui khamashung khangarong leida namangāli kapo maningmana, kha nawui hakkhamahā lukhamashan mangā eina seihā sāda kapona.
O
Seihā sāda, iwui morei, iwui mibing Israelwui morei hāngphata, awui kathara kaphungwui vang ina Vareli poda;
seihā sāmahunglakha, khare khamahāli ina theikahai mi Gabriel chi, ngazinshongwui pha̱kaphayā atamli thaklāk eina yongrārāsai.
Ana rāda ili hānga, “O Daniel, nali awor eina theithangkhamei mikida I kharāna.
Nana seihā sākaphok tharan tui akha shoka, kala nali chi hāngkida kharāna, kaja nali leishilaka; chiwui vang eina tui hi chukmajakazakta mang chi theishingkhuilu.

“Nawui mibing kala nathumwui kathara keinungwui pongli khalāng ot kasāwui eina ngalat khavai, morei kasā tangkhavai, kala pheomi khavai, katang mavaila khamashung khangarong samphang khavai, khamahātui eina marāntui khanini mahor namkhavai, kala tharmathengmeikap kajepam chi thao neomi khavai atam, zingkumwui haptā hangshini kakmihaira.

Chieina theilu kala bhab takhuilu kaja, Jerusalem hanmida sakālui khavai kakaso mithang eina thuilaga, thao neomi kahai, wungnao akha kharā eina tangda haptā shinira. Chiwui thili haptā hangtharukta khaniwui vang shongfa eina kuikhamarei raipanra̱shong sākhuira, kha hi kakhanang atamli shokra.

Haptā hangtharukta khaniwui thili thao neomi kahai akhali katathaida khikha maleimara; kala rāki kaje wungnaowui mibingna keinungla, kathara shimla sākazamhaora, khangachang atam chi tara̱ kaphong eina ngasorāra, kala khangachangli rai shokra; ramkachola khak tāhaira.

Ana haptā akhawui vang kachungkhali mangacheikapai tuingashit khuira, kala haptā chiwui ngahunshing khavā eina athumwui pha̱kaphayā kala kachigat saikora khāmmihaora; chiwui mahutli Khorumshimwui chuimeikap kajeli khalei katharapam chili ningkakachai yangkakharing meoma̱ haihaora kala Varena mipa chiwui vang ngarān kahai athit chi marāranglakha eina tangda leiki jihaoda mi khipanakha makhorumpaithuda katharapam chi ramcho kahai thahaora.

Persiawui awunga Cyrusna mungda kakathuma kum, Belteshazzar kaho Danielli tui akha rāphong chithei. Kala tui chi mashunga, chi haklāk kahai raireiwui ponglina. Kala ana tui chi theishingkhui kala khamahā chi theikhuichaowa.
Chikachāng haptā kathum peichaoda Daniel ina sifapama.
Shaikaphā, zākaphā, sā kala drakhāra̱ ikhamorli akhala masangmana, kala ikhalatta kuilila haptā kathum peichaoda thao maneomana.
Kachāng kharewui zimiksho maga̱da khamatethang, ina kahaka Tigriswui kongpheili nganingda leilakha,
ina imik yangkakā eina, yanglu, khamenga kachon ngavaida Uphazwui sinā eina kasā shānneira̱ neilaga mi akha thei.
Aphasā beryl thai, amai rikhān khangashei thai, amik meiwon thai, pāngthei eina pheithei ruimaling kahai pithrai thai, kala awui akhon mi tarākhawui akhon thai.
Khamahā chi Daniel imāngna thei, ili khangasobing chiya matheimana; athumli khangacheena pemhaida athum khalatta ngathum khavai yāmhaowa.
Chieina imāngli nothahaida hakkhamahā khamahā chi yangpama, kala I yāng kānhaowa; iwui kahora maipān onching onhaowa, kala I pangshap maleithuwa.
Chiwui thili awui tuikhon ina shai; kala awui akhon chi kashā eina I ngaleili ngakhumshām eina pivāhaowa.
Kha yanglu, pāng akhana ili rāsāza̱da ipāng eina khuksao kathirthirda thuingawokhui ngasaka.
Kala ana ili hānga, “O Daniel, leishikhai kahaia mi! Ina nali kahāng tui hi khuisanglu, ngatarda thuinganinglu, kaja ili nawuili chihokharāna.” Ana tui chi hāngmamānlakha ina kathirriri thuinganinga.
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Mangacheealu Daniel! Theishingkhui khavai nana khayāshida Vareli ning horsang kharethang eina thuida, nawui tui shāmihaira, nawui tuiwui vang kharāna.
Persia wungramwui wungnaona ili maga̱da akhathangwui vang nganingphinmihaowa, kha wungnaobingwui khareia Michaelna ili rāngachonmida, Persia wungramwui wungnaoli ngasoda chili nothāhaida kharāna.
Kala naoda nawui mibingli khi shokra̱khala kaji nali hāngchithei khavai kharāna. Kaja khamahā hi rārāda khalei atamwui vāngna.”
Tui chiwui athishurda ana ili hāngkahai chitharan, ina mai ngaleizingshong mashunzanga kala khak mashokthuwa.

Kha yanglu, miwui naomayara kathā akhana imorchaili rāsāza̱ya; chieina ikhamor makāda matuipaihaowa. Iwui mangāli khanganingpa chili ina hānga, “O iwui amei, khamahā hiwui vang eina ili phasā kachot samphangda I yāng maleithura.
Ameiwui raona ameili kathāda ngazekrarrakhala? Kaja ara ili yāngla maleithura, kala khaksuila maleithura.”
Latluida mizak thāda kathei akhana ili sāza̱da pangngasaklui.

Kala ana hānga, “O leishikhailak kahaia mi, mangacheealu, nali chingrihairanu, pingmeida malung zangmeilu.” Kala ana ili kahāng eina I pangsanghaida chieina hānga, “Ishameina hāngmilu; kaja nana ili pangngasakhaira.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Ina nawuili khiwui vang kharākhala da na theila? Ara ina Persia wungramwui wungnaoli ungngararra; kala ina ali sāshimān kahai eina Greece wungramwui wungnao rāra.
Kha khamashunga lairikli khi kapisanghailikhala kaji ina nali hāngra: nawui wungnao Michael maningla, ili khangashika wungnaobing khipākha maleimana.”
Medewui Dariusna mungkhare kum ina ali pangshap sangmi.
Ara ina nali mashun tui chi chitheira. Yanglu, “Persiali awunga kathum shokluira, kala khamate chi athumli shāngmeikharra; ana shānghaoda pangshap leikahai tharan Greece wungram sheikhayāngra.
“Chiwui thili pangshap khaleia awunga akhana mungda awui sākhangangai sāra.

A nganingshap kaji eina awui wungram ngayānghaida mati sāda zingsho, zingtun, atung kala azingda ngayaryānghaora, awui theisāna makhuimara, kala ana khamung thāda maleiluimara; kaja awui wungram ngapaikhuida khangateili mihaora.
“Chiwui thili azingwui awunga pangshunhaora, kha awui wungnao akha ali pangmeida shokra kala awui wungram hakshunra.

Zingkum kasha̱khawui thili athum mashit ngarokta azingwui awungawui naongalāva̱na atungshongwui awungali chingrihai khavai favāra, kha athumwui khamashit mapongmara. Ala, gaharala, awui naola, kala ali ngasokhavā raobing saikorala sāthatserhaora.
Chiwui thichangli ngalāva̱shi shimkhurwui theisā akhana awunga phungra. Ana atungshongwui awungawui raimili rai tāra, raipan shangkaida ana yuira.
Kala ana athumwui varebing, pāng eina sākakhui, sinā lupāwui meoma̱bing kala khorkhong Egyptli phungkortāhaora; kala atam kasha̱kha atungwui awungali rai masāmara.
Chiwui thili atungshongwui awungana azingwui awungali rai atāra kha awui ngaleili latungluihaora.
“Awui naomayarana raimi kachungkha kazipkhuida rai sāra, athum pemtha̱-pemtaida rāra, kala latluida awui raipan eina tangda ngarar-ungluira.
Chieina azingwui awungana malungvātta atungshongwui awungali ngararra, ana mi sorkhangasai kazipkhuida ngararra, kha mayuimara.
Kala mi sorkhangasai khuikahaiwui thili awui ning mathānra, kala ana mi thingthing chihorāra, kha mayuimara.
“Kaja atungshongwui awungana kharewuili chungmeida sorkhangasai kazipkhuira, kala kum kasha̱khawui thili, ana raimi kala kashakazā khutlai peilāk eina ngararra.
Atam chitharan azingwui awungali kachungkhana mamayāmara; kala nathumwui ngachaili sākashe mibingla athum khalatta khamahā hi ungshung khavai thuingararra; kha athum mararmara.

Chieina atungshongwui awungana rākuinamda, raipan sākharik kahai keinung khuithuihaora. Kala azingshongwui raimi manganingthukluimara, ana hākakhui raimibingla nganingkham khavai pangshap maleiluimara.
Kha ali rākhangarara china awui sākhangai rāsāra, kala ali khipākha mangasungrarmara; kala ana tekhamatei lam awui sāda pangshap saikora awui pāngli leira.
“Ana awui raimi saikora thānrāda chingri eina pānrum khavai anao ngalāva̱ akha mira, kha china awui vang manganingrarmara lah khikha masāvaimara.
Naoda ana shamadrupheili khalei apamshong mai ngareivāra, kala athum kachungkhali khuira; kha raimi kathāna akhana awui lāngkaso tangngasakhaora kala ana awuitungli lāngsoshānra.
Chiwui thili awui lamli latungra; latungda awui raipanli kashimān shokra kala kali vāhaokhala da matheiluimara.

“Chiwui thili awui mahut akha shokra kala ana wungram tekmatei khavaiwui vang shaih ngashai khavai khangashaia chihora; kha zimiksho kasha̱khawui thili a thihaora, hi malungkhavāt kala rai eina maningmara.”
“Awui thili wungnao makhaning shāt kakā awunga akha rāra; yansāngsa̱ eina khalei atamli kashuirak phāreksek eina rāra.
A kharā tharan yangkashi saikorali zakshilāk eina yuira, ngashit kahai wungnao chilila yuira.
Kala ali ngashikphokkhaleowui eina minamlak eina ana sāra; kala ana mi kateokhamang eina pangshapa ngasāhaora.

Hāngkhamathin maleilakla ana ngalei tummeikap kaji pamli vāda, avāva̱ ngarāna, kala avā ngarāwui avāva̱ ngarāna makasā ot chi ana sāda ngaponkakhui thongthāng awui thi kashurbingli ngayarmiserra. Ana raipanbing sākhai khavai ngarānra, kha kasha̱khawui vangmara.

“Kala ana raimi kachungkha thānda awui pangshap chishotta azingshongwui awungali rai tāra, kala azingshongwui awungana sorkhangasai raimi thānda ngararra, kha a mangasungrarmara kaja awuitungli makaphā apong ngarānhaora.
Ali phazākhangarumbing eina tangda awui vang makachangthura; awui raimibing yaikachuptāhaora, kala kachungkha thira.
Awunga khani chi phazāngarumlala, ningphum otsak ngatei ngarokra kala ani eina ani kapik ngarokra. Anina ningkachāng chi masamphangmara, khikhalajila chiwui atam marāranga.
Kala ana ot kachungkha khuida aramli latungra, kha awui ningva kathara tuingashit chili mamayāchingmara. Awui sākhangai sāda awui ngaleili latungra.
“Atam ungkashung eina ana azingshong tāluira; kha kharewui mathāmara.

Kaja Kittimwui jahas ali ngasung khavai shangngarokra, chieina ana ngacheeda hanthuihaora, kala malungvavāt eina kathara tuingashit chi sāshimān khavai sāra. Kala kathara tuingashitwui eina ngareithui kahaibingwui kahāng khuisangtha̱ra.
Awui eina raimibingna rāda khorum khavaishim, kala raipan sāmakhaora, kala rikkatāchigat chikatching kaje hanphut chila khuithuihaora. Kala chili shimān khavaiwui ningkakachai ot chi athumna sakāra.
Tuingashit chi kaida ot kasābingli ana sotkhamasao tui eina suikhuira; kha Vareli katheia athumna nganingtitta ngararra.
Atam kasha̱khawui vang raighai, meilung, tukkathui kala sākashimānli tāzangsālala, athumwui alungli thangkhamei kathānabingna yaruili theikhui ngasakra.
Athumna tākazang tharan, athum khangachon teomeikha samphangra. Kala kachungana athum khalatta sotmasaoda chibingli zangrumra;
kala athumwui ngachaili kachikathā thangkhamabing kongluira, athumli sāmathāda tharkhui khavai, kala atam maungranglakha eina tangda charkhavai, kaja retsang kahai atam chi leifaya.
Ana avāva̱ ngarāwui varebingli lah sha̱naobingna leikashelila mahengsangmara; ana vare khipākhalila mahengsangmimara; kaja ana hakmeithuiya da khalatta sora.
Hibingwui mahutle ana raipanwui varebingli khayāshira, kala avāvā ngarāna makathei vareli sinā, lupāsā, aman kasaka lunggui kala aman kasaka ot ana chigatra.
Ana pangmeikap kaje raipan chi makatheia khangateiwui varebingwui pangshap eina ngararra; ali khamayābingli ana khayā kāngasakra. Ana athumli khamunga sāngasakra kala lamla aman milaga ngayarmira.

“Khangachanga atamli azingwui awungana ali rai tāluira; kha atungshongwui awungana siguigari, sigui raimi, kala jahas kachungkha eina siphan thāda rāra, kongra̱ kathui thāda ana ngalei kachungkhali rai tāra.
Ana tekhamatei ngaleili rāra. Kala mi thingthing pitāra, kha hibing hili awui pāng eina kanmira: Edom eina Moab kala Ammon ngayarda makhuimara.
Ana kha̱wungbingli apāng katingvāra, kala Egyptwui ngalei mayāmshokmara.
Ana sinā kala lupāsā kazip khavaiwui khamunga ngasāra, Egyptwui aman kasaka otbingla; kala Libya eina Ethiopiala awuili maron maron shurvāra.
Kha zingshoshong eina atungshongwui pao shālaga a ngacheehaora, kala malungvavāt eina kachungkha shimān khavai sākathāna.
Kala ana awui kachonshim shamadru eina kathara kaphungwui ngachaili sākāra; kha chithālala awui khangachang atam rāra, ngachonmi khavai khipākha maleisāmara.”
Thida ngaleilungli chizan kahaibing ngakarthuiluira, kaikhana mashimānda okthui khavai, kaikhana maikashi kala katang mavaila ningkachai khavai.
Thangkhamabing chiya sirāramwui thāda horra, khamashung khangarongli thānzangkhamebingna mashimānda sirā thāda horshon horthaira.
Kha na, Daniel, lairik hi mahor namhailaga, tui hi, atam maungshungranglakha thumhaisalu. Kachungkhana theishingkhui khavai phāshang phātāra, kala awor mataisangra.”
Daniel, ina yanga, kala yanglu, khangatei khani nganingkasā thei, akhana kongphei hili kala akhapāna khongpei akhashong da.
Kala kongwui tara̱tungli khanganing, khameng kachon khangavaipā chili ina, “Matakkhak kahai ot hi karankha leifarakhala?” da ngahāna.
Ina shai, kha I bhab matārarthuwa. Chieina ina hānga, “O iwui
Ana hānga, “Daniel, ungulu, atam maungranglakha eina tangda saikora hi mahor namlaga haikahaina.
Kachungkhana khalatta tharmathengkhuida, charshi eina kahānla hānra; kha makhayā athum chiya makhayā sāpapamra; makhayā mina theishingkakhui maleilakmara; kha thangkhama athumna theishingkhuira.
Zimiksho thingkha shākathum kala thumrāda phangāthang ngaraikhuida okthuikasā athum chi sokhami ngasāranu!
“Kha atam maungranglakha ungngasāmkhuisālu, khangachanga atam ungkashung tharan nawui vang ngarān kahaipam chili thuinganingnaora.”
Chieina ana Gomer kahova̱ Diblaimwui naongalāva̱li akhui, kala ana nao vaida mayarnao akha pharai.
Kala
Kala chithanghon Israelwui malā Jezreelwui tampākli ina sātekra.”
Kha ina Judahwui shimkhurli lumashanra kala athumwui Vare
Lo-ruhamahna na̱ reikahaiwui thili nao vaida mayarnao akha pharai.
Kala
Kala Judahwui mibing eina Israelwui mibing kaziprumhaora kala athum khalattawui kathāna akha kapangra; kala athumna ngalei chili mungra, kaja Jezreelwui thot malinglakra.
Hānglu, nava̱li hānglu,
kaja a ipreiva̱̱ maningmana,
kala I agahara maningmana — awui khayor otsak chi horhaoranu,
kala awui phokaphā chi chihohaoranu;
maningakha pharathang mahonghak eina pharākatā thāda ina ali raikormihaora,
kala lamhāng thāda ngasakra,
ngalei ngachakkakhai thāda,
ra̱chan eina thingasakra.
Anaomayara eina tangdali malumashanmimara,
kaja athum shāmnaosera.
Athumwui ava̱va̱ khayorva̱̱wui otsak sai;
athumli vaikakhuiva̱ chi khayākhamalā otmāng sai.
Kaja ana hānga, “Ili kashakazā kala tara̱ khame,
sāhah kala khamanak kashankachon khame, iwui thao, kala mangkhavai khamebing,
iwui leikashebingli shurthura.”
Chiwui vang awui shongfa ina ka̱shat eina sāphinmihaora,
kala ina ali phākho ngaveiphinmihaida awui shongfa maphākhuirarmara.
Awui leikashebingli ana khoromzatra,
kha mangaphanmara;
kala ana athumli phāra,
kha masamphangmara.
Chiwui thili ana, “Igahara kharepāli latungura —
kaja iwui vang aruiwuile kharepāna phamei.”
da hāngra.
Ali zāt, mangkhavai drakhāra̱, kala thao khame,
kala athumna mavātlakla Baalli khami
sina lupa khame chi ina,
kaji a matheimana.
Chiwui vang eina mahā atamli ina iwui tharāzāt
kala drakhāthei kaphā atamli drakhāra̱ khuithuihaora;
kala awui khamahong faror khavai iwui sahā,
kala khamenga kachon khuithuihaora.
Ara ina awui leikashebingwui miktāli awui shuikhangarui chi theingasakra,
Kala awui lumshilao saikora, awui zātkhān,
awui changwok, sabbath;
kala retkahai phanit saikora tangngasakhaora.
Drakhārong kala khaorārong hi leikashebingna,
iwui ngalangman khamina da ana kahāng chi ina shimān ngasakra.
Saikora chi ina kharar onngasakta sāyurbingna shaira.
Kala Baalwui zātkhān sāda nganamkaphā athumli riktāda,
ana sinā khutop eina mukta sangda leikashebingwui thi shurzatta,
ili malai kahaiwui vang ina ali tandi mira da
Chiwui vang eina yanglu, ina ali suira,
kala lamhāngli ali thānvāra kala nimshimri eina ngazekra.
kala Achorwui Leiwuk chi kachihānwui khāmong sāngasakra.
Kala chili a ngalālakhawui thāda,
kala Egypt ngaleiwui eina kashok atamwui thāda ngahānkāra.
Kala chithanghon nana ili rāda ‘Igahara’ hora; kala ‘Iwui Baal’ da maholuimara da
Kaja Baalwui aming chi ina awui khamor eina khuithuimihaida mingsinda mahangluimara.
Kala nawui vang chithang tampākwui sāyurbing, kazingramwui vānaobing kala ngarikazata yurbing, ngalei hiwui eina shimānhaida nali ina ningtāphup ngayaisang ngasakra.
Kala katang makhavaiwui vang ina nali khāmra, ina nali khamashung khangarong eina mashunlungli, makhangachei leikashi eina lukhamashan alungli ina nali khāmra.
Ina nali ningtongtingda khāmra, kala nana
Kala chithanghon ina kazingramli ngahānkāra;
kala athumna okathuili ngahānkāra,
da
kala okathuina māli, zamli kala thaoli ngahānkāra,
kala athumna Jezreelli ngahānkāra;
malumashankasāpali ina lumashanra,
“Iwui mi maningmana” kachipāli ina, “Na iwui mina” jira;
chieina athumna, “Na iwui Varena.” da hāngra.
Kala
Chieina ina ali lupāsā shekel tharāda phangā, napai homer akha kala zam vaichumkha eina lokhui.
Kala ina ali hānga; “Na iwui sāda atam kasāngkha pamphalungra; nana khayorwui ot masāpaimara, lah khangatei mayarnaowui mangasāpaimara; chithāda sāda ila nawui sāra.”
Kaja Israelnaobingna awunga, lah wungnao mavaila, pha̱kaphayāla, tarung, ephod kala teraphimla maleila atam kasāngkha sompamra.
Naoda Israelnaobingna latungra kala athumwui Vare
O, Israelnaobing!
kaja
Shitkasang katong kala lumashankathei maleimana,
kala ngalei chiwui alungli Vareli kathei maleimana;
shākhi kasā, kakapik, shaokathat,
khalee ot kasā kala phokaphāmāng lei;
masaalu kaji saikora athumna sai,
kala shaokathatwuitungli shaokathat ngarora.
Chiwui vang eina ngaleina chapngachai,
kala chili kapam saikora ning thengchenghai;
kala ngaleiwui sāyurbingla,
khamasaili yongkazata vānaobingla chota;
kala ngayiwui khaihbing eina tangda khuithuihaira.
Khipānakha nali khayon maphaaranu,
kaphenla maphenaranu;
kaja phenki kaje, phāki kaje chi imānga,
O pāngmon.
Na ngashunshong kongluira,
marānla nali ngasoda ngayāshong kongluira;
kala nashāva̱li ina shimān ngasakhaora.
Theikakhui khavātwui vang iwui miyur shimān ngasakhaira;
kaja theikakhui chi nana makhuingaithuwa,
iwui pāngmon khangasāwui eina nali khalanhaira.
Kala nana nawui Varewui ningkhami malai kahaiwui vang,
inala nawui naongarāli malaira.
Athum chungsangkhangai chungsang,
iwuitungli morei chungkhangai chungda sai;
athumwui tekhamatei chi ina kakhayak onngasakra.
Iwui mibingwui moreitungli athumna ngaleozai;
athumwui khayonkhamāngwui vang ngamara.
Kala mibinglila, pāngmonbinglila ina athumli ngaraichāda tandi mira,
kala athumwui otsak athishurda kachichāwui sāman mira.
Athumna zālala, mathomara;
athumna khayorva̱̱wui otsak sāra,
kha mamayāsangmara;
kaja athumna khayor otli leishihaoda
Zamna, zamsheina theishingkakhui shimān ngasaka.
Iwui mibingna thingwui otli ngahāna,
kala athumwui khāmshuina ngahānkāmi.
Kaja khayor otsakwui manglāna athumli thānnguihaowa,
kala khayorwui otsak sākhavai athumwui Vareli chihohaowa.
Athumna phungreibingwuitungli pha̱phayai,
kala phungrārātungli shirimthing,
thinglengthing, mathangthing pheili kachigat ot sai,
kaja athumwui khaya̱ chi mathai.
Chiwui vang nanao ngalāva̱bingna khayorva̱wui otsak sai,
kala mākkhām kahaiva̱bingna phokaphā ot sai.
Nanao ngalāva̱bingna khayorwui otsak kasā tharan,
kala mākhām kahaiva̱bingna phokaphā tharan athumli tandi mamimara;
kaja mayarnao athum khalatta khayorva̱bingli ngasozatta lei,
kala khayorbingli ngasoda pha̱kaphayā ot sai,
kala theishingkakhui makhalei mibing shimānhaora.
Nana khayorwui ot sālala, O Israel,
Judahli mayon ngasakalu.
Gilgalli mazangalu, Beth-avenlila mavaalu,
“Kharinga
Kapeowa simuk thāda Israel hi ngakaishitingtinga;
khamashā seihomphungli yao homkapam thāda
Ephraim meoma̱li ngarumhaira,
aningkhānranu.
Khamaripa kānglup, athum khalattana khayor sha̱naoli ngasopi;
athumwui tekhamateipāle kakhayak otsakli leishimei.
Masina athumwui angachāngli romhaira,
kala athumwui hanphutwui vang khayakhaora.
Hi nganālu, O pāngmonbing!
Khuisanglu, O Israelwui shimkhur!
Nganāsanglu, O awungawui shimkhur!
kaja bichar chi nathumwuina;
kaja na Mizpahwui vang khalen ngasāhaira,
kala Taborli khailan horror kahaina.
Kala athumna Shittimwui chom chi thuklak eina chuihaira;
kha athum saikorali ina rākra.
Ina Ephraimli thei,
kala Israel iwui eina mangathumpaimara;
kaja O Ephraim, nana khayorwui ot sai,
Israelli sākhamāng ngasakhaira.
Athumwui otsakna Varewuili malatung ngasakmana.
kaja athumwuili khayorva̱̱wui ning lei,
kala athumna
Israelwui lāngkaso awui maiyanli lei;
Ephraimna awui khayon chili phei ngaphokra;
Judahnala athumli ngasoda phei ngaphokra.
Athumna
kala sha̱keibingli ngasoda phāra;
kha masamphangmara;
ana athumwui eina ngalanthuihaira.
Athumna
kaja athumna shāmnao pharai.
Ara kachāng khawok eina, athumla,
athumwui luila shimānserhaora.
Talla̱ khonglu, Gibeahli,
Ramahli khonglu.
Ngashar khavaikhon Bethavenli khonglu;
kathirlu, O Benjamin!
Ephraim ramcho ngasakhaora,
tandi khami zimiksho chili;
Israel shangbingwui ngachaili kachangkhatta,
chi ina phongmira.
Judahwui wungnaobing ngaleiwui thari kaphura athum thāserhaira;
athumwuitungli iwui malungkhavāt tara̱ thāda heirora.
Mashun bichar athishurda Ephraimli rekharekhaira;
kaja arema otli shurra jihaowa.
Chiwui vang eina iya Ephraimwui vang makung kathāna,
kala Judah shimkhurwui vang apar kathāna.
Ephraimna awui kazāt kathei tharan,
kala Judahna awui khamā kathei tharan,
Ephraimna Assyriali vai,
kala kahaka awungali chihovai.
Kha ana nali maraimirarmana kala nawui khamā maphāmirarmana.
Kaja iya Ephraimwui vang kazingkha̱ kathā,
kaja Judah shimkhurwui vang kazingkha̱nao kathā ngasāra.
I khalattana sākazamlaga thuihaora,
ina phungthuihaora, khipānakha makānluirarmara.
Athum khalattana khayon theikhuida ili maphākhuiranglakha eina tangda,
kala athumwui kachot tharan ili maphaningungranglakha eina tangda,
iwui shimli latunghaora.
Athumna hithāda hānga,
“Ithumli sākazamhailala ana ngahākhuimi khavai,
shaokazazamhailala ana ngafakhuimi khavai,
ithum
Khanithangwui thili ana ithumli mathuk ngasakra;
kakathumathang ana ithumli ngakarthui ngasakra,
chieina ithumna awui mangāli ringpaira.
Ithum theisa kaja,
ana sāki kaji chi kazing kathang thāda makahatlakmana;
ana ithumli zngrot thāda rāra,
ngaleili ikkhami zingrot thāda.”
Ina nali khi sara̱khala, O Ephraim?
Nali khi sarakhala, O Judah?
Nawui leikashi ngathorshongwui muiyā kathāna,
thengngalang kahai ikra̱ kathāna.
Chiwui vang eina marānbingli ina hānglaga athumli ta̱tek ngasakhaira;
ikhamorwui tui eina ina athumli sāthathaira,
kala iwui bichar chi kahor thāda shoka.
pha̱kaphayā maningmana,
rikkatā kachigatpāle Vareli theikakhui ningchāngmei.
Kha Adamwui atamli athumna tuingashit kaihaowa;
athumna ili shitkasang maleilakla sai.
Gilead hi makaphā kasābingwui keinungna,
ashee tākahaiwui achonmānga.
Phama̱kashaobingna mi akhali rimkapam thāda,
pāngmonbingna sakrumda lei,
athumna Shechemwui shongfali mi shaothata,
mha, athumna khangashao ot sāhaira.
Israelwui shimkhurli khangachee ot akha ina theihaira;
Ephraimwui khayor otsak lei,
Israelli sākhamāng ngasakhaira.
Nawui vangla, O Judah,
hātkakhui atam akha ngarānhaira.
Ina iwui yurbingwui lan hankhami tharan.
Ina Israelli raikhami tharan,
Ephraimwui khamakhao,
kala Samariawui makhayā otsak phongshoka;
kaja athumna nguida ot sai,
khale china shimkaiya,
kala ngaponkazābingna ayarshong ngapona.
Kha ina athumwui makaphā otsak saikora phaningunga
kaji athumna maphaningmana.
Ara athumwui otsakna athumli tumhaira,
saikora ina theisera.
Athumwui makhayā china athumwui awungali mathān ngasaka,
kala athumwui sākahai china wungnaobingli mathān ngasaka.
Athum saikora shām kasā misera;
athum sālak kahaiya meiphung kathāna,
khamui naihailaga makapchungranglakha eina tangda,
khamui kasaana mei masākashimit thāda.
Ithumwui awungawui zimiksholi wungnaobing zamwui kasāna kazāhaowa;
ana mana̱kashebingli ngasoda pāng katinga.
Kaja athumwui makaphā khangarān wuklung meiphung thāda chui;
ngayā pongzongrida athumwui malungkhavāt chi ngāntai;
ngathorshong meiwon thāda chuishoka.
Athum saikora meiphung thāda sai,
kala athumna athumwui ngalei khamungabingli tukshaiya.
Athumwui awunga saikora kongluihaira;
kala athum khipākha ili mangakaomana.
Ephraimna yurbingli manātpama;
Ephraim hiya makhamina khamuina.
Khangatei yurna awui yāng kānmihaira,
kha ana chi matheimana;
kuila ngapoktokhaira,
chila ana matheimana.
Israelwui lāngkaso china ali khalatta mamayāmana,
chithālala athumna athumwui Vare
thatheilaga kaphāla maphāmana.
Ephraim hiya mangkhama̱,
ning makhalei nāsha̱ kathāna,
ana Egyptli hoi, Assyrialila vai.
Athumna vāmamān, ina iwui khailan athumli herrorra;
ina athumli yongkazata vānaobing thāda ngakhuntāra;
athumwui makaphā makhayā otsakwui vang ina rākra.
Athumli kakhanang ngasāranu,
kaja athumna iwui eina yāmthuihaira!
Athumli sākakathān ngasāranu,
kaja athumna ili ngarara!
Ina athumli ngatangkhuingai,
kha ili kakapik tui hānga.
Athumna ili wuklung eina mangakaomana,
kha athumwui pettungli chapama;
kashakazā eina zamwui vang athum khalatta rimkazama,
athumna ili ngakaishi.
Ina athumli tamchitheilala,
athumwui pāngthei makang ngasaklala,
athumna iwuitungli makaphā awor sai.
Athumna Baalli ngareivai;
athum sākashe malā thai,
athumwui wungnaobing raighai eina pitāra,
athumwui lāngkaso malewui vang.
Hina Egypt ngaleili athumwui zeikakharui ngasāra.
Talla̱ chi namorchaili khāngkālu,
kaja khalāngsāsha akha
kaja athumna iwui tuingashit sākhaihaira,
kala iwui ain kaihaira.
Athumna ili ngakaoda, iwui Vare,
Israelnao ithumbingna nali thei, da hānga.
Kaphā kaho Israelna khalanhaira;
yangkashena ali kharomra.
Athumna awungabing kapangsanga,
kha iwui eina maningmana.
Wungnaobing kapangshoka,
kha iwui kaphaning makhuimana.
Athum khalatta shimān khavai lupāsā kala sinā eina meoma̱ sākhui,
Ina nawui seinao khalanhaira, O Samaria.
Athumli iwui malungkhavāt chuida lei.
Athum tharki kaji karankha leirakhala
Israelli? Them kathema akhana sākakhuina,
chi Varivara maningmana,
Samariawui seinao chi akha̱ sāmihaora.
Kaja athumna masi yaosanga,
kala athumna sur hātkhuira.
Nganingda khalei mārongbing athei makāmana,
zāt mashokmara;
shoklala khangateibingna ngapaizāhaora.
Israelli mayuisanghaira;
ara yur khangateiwui ngachaili khikha masā khavai ham kathā ngasāhaira.
Kaja athum Assyriali vāhaira,

Chitharan Vare
Zionli talla̱ khonglu; kathar eina khumlu;

yaruili kazipkhuilu.

“Damascuswui chonkhamakān kathumwui vang,

“Gazawui chonkhamakān kathumwui vang,

Chiwui vang Gazawui ngavei kuimareida ina mei chihotāra,

“Edomwui chonkhamakān kathumwui vang,

“Ammonnaowui chonkhamakān kathumwui vang,

kala tangmangting kahai chi ngathor onkhangasaka,
