nakhalattala makathar lamli thisangra;
kala Israelli, apam hiwui eina raithā kachangkhathaora.’”
Hithāda Vare
Kala ana hānga, “Amos, nana khi theikhala?” Chieina Ina ngahānkai, “Lumkachāngwui athei lukkhatkha thei.” Chieina
“Iwui miyur Israelwuitungli
khangachang atam rāhaira;
Ina athumli chi mangacheimilui mara.
Chitharan Khorumshimwui laakhon chi chapkhangachā khon ngasāhaora,”
“kathingun kachungkhara,
kapam kachungkhali athumli akhon mashokla horkazam haora” da
Vare
Hi nganālu, khavātabingli naikakazapabing,
kala lam hiwui kachāmabingli shimān khangasakabing,
nathumna, “Mā yorpai khavai,
chāngthar katharān kuphaoni khala?
Kehu yorkhavai sabbath katharān kannikhala,
chithāda ithumna khuilui kathāda teongasakmei paira̱ kala shekel chungngasakmei paira,
kala makhamashung khāntam eina minam khuipaira,
chithāda ithumna kachāmabingli lupāsā eina lokhavai,
kala khavātabingli pheihop akha eina ngatha̱khui khavai;
kala hangkha̱māng eina yorsang khavai ngarāna.”
Jacobwui lāngsot chiwui vang
“Kachangkhat eina Ina athumwui otsak akhanidala mamalai mara.
Hiwuivang mi kachiva̱ masifa ngayimalā,
kala chili okathui saikora sifaya,
kala athum saikora Nile kong kathui thāda,
kala Egyptwui Nile thāda ngaphumkashi shokkashi majimarala?”
“Kala chithangchi,” da Proho VAREna hānga,
Ina ngashunung zimik tunngasakra,
kala ngashunung okathui tangmang ngasakra.
Nathumwui lumlao phanit Ina sikafa onngasakra,
kala nathumwui laa saikora chapchātlaa sāngasakra;
Ina mi kachiva̱ bora ngavaingasakra,
kala kui sitāngasakra;
naoho-naotongwui vang chapkhangachā thāda,
malungkharing katanga ngasāngasakra.
Proho VAREna hānga,
“Yanglu, zimiksho chi rārāli,
lam hili Ina kumshāt chihorāki kaji,
zātwui kumshāt, tara̱wuila maning mana,
kha
Athumna shamadru akhawui eina shamadru akhali,
kala atungshong eina zingsho vāpeida yaozatra;
kha athumna chi masamphang mara.
Chithanghon lāshiyoyo kala yarshoshova̱,
ra̱kachangwui vang vānra.
Samariawui Ashimahli mingzaida shākhi sāda,
‘O Dan, nawui varena theiya’
kala, ‘Beer-shebawui mirin thāda kharingbing’ da hāngra,
athumna pitāra, mangakarthuklui mara.”
Hanphut ngalemli
kala ana hānga:
“Keinung pakra̱bing chi ngavei manganukranglakha eina tangda ngaphitlu,
kala akha̱ sāngasakta mibingwui kuili tākngasaklu;
kala kataibing chi ina raighai eina shātthatra,
akhanida mayāmshokmara,
akhanida machakshokmara.
Athumna Kathewui ramli chuizanglala,
chili ipāngna zangyonkhuira;
athumna kazing yāmkālala,
chiwui eina ina ngakhuntāra.
Carmel Kaphungli athumna yāmngathumlala,
chiwui eina ina phāshokra kala athumli tukkhuira;
iwui mikyan eina athumna shamadrulungli zang yāmngathumlala,
chili ina phara̱li kasora kala china athumli mara̱ra.
Kala athumwui yangkashibingna tukthuihailala,
chili ina raighaili kasora kala chieina shātthat ngasakra;
kala kaphāwui vang maningla makaphāwui vang ina imik yangtitra.”
Saikorawui Vare
ngaleili saza̱da menga,
kala chili pānda khalei saikora sifaya,
kala saikora chi Nile kong kathui thāda juikai,
kala Egyptwui Nile kong thāda ngasun ngasaka;
kazingramli awui khamato kā sākaka,
ngaleitungli fakakham leikhangasaka;
shamadruwui tara̱li hokhuida ngalei kathengli rotākhame,
“O Israelwui mibing! iwui vang nathum,
Ethiopiawui mi mathāmala?”
da
“Israelli ina Egypt ngaleiwui eina mathānshokmala?
Philistianaobingli Caphtorwui eina,
kala Syriabingli Kirwui eina mathānshokmala?
Yanglu, morei kasā wungramtungli Proho VAREna yangdalei;
kala chi ina okathuiwui eina shimān ngasakra,
Jacobwui shimkhurmāngli mamutchao ngasakmara.”
“Kaja yanglu, ina kasora,
kala yur saikorawui alungli Israelwui shimkhurli khanukra,
sikhavai khavai eina khanuklala,
lungguinao akha eina tangda ngaleili matātungmara.
Morei kasā iwui mibing saikora,
‘Ka̱lākashina ithumli marālakmara’ da kahāngbing,
raighai eina thira.
phākho kakai chi chipholuira,
kala ngayāng kahai chi sākhuiluira,
kala achālakhawui thāda sākāluira,
Kaja Edomwui shākkahaibing,
kala iming eina theikasābing saikora;
athumna samphangpai khavaina,”
da hi ngarān kahaia
“chitharan luikasaona kahātapāli ngaphankhuira,
kala drakhāthei khamazokana athā khayaopāli ngaphankhuira;
phungreibingna kashima drakhāra̱ ngayira kala phungrānao kachida longra.
Iwui Israel mibingli ina kalākhamahai ngasā ngasakluira,
ngayāng kahai keinungbing sakāluida athumna pānra;
athumna drakhā yāmgui vāsangra kala chiwui ara̱ mangra,
yāmguila vāsangda chiwui athei shaira.
Athumwui ngaleili ina athumli chipamra,
kala athumli ina mikahai lam chiwui eina maphurshokluimara,”
da
Ithumna
“Ngakarthuilu, ithum Edomli vāda rai atausa!”
Yanglu, yurbingwui ngachaili ina nali teongasakra,
nali yangkateolakhaora.
Nawui ning lāngkasona na khalattali chipathaira,
lungkai kajui ngachaili pamda,
“Ili khipāna ngakhuntāshaprakhala?”
da nakhalatta phaninga.
Nana khalāng thāda kajuiva̱li leilala,
athip sirā ngachaili sāhailala,
ina nali chiwui eina sheitāra, da
Ngayāshong nawuili khalebing raakha kathāda nawui ot ngaponkhala?
Athumwui khuishapmāng makhuimarala?
Drakhāthei rāleeakha athumna atham makataimila phāthuiserhaorala?
Esauli kathāda ngaponhao,
awui lan kathāda phāshokhao!
Nawui sakkharumabingna nali chipathaira,
athumna nali thari akatang vāshungda kashamvāhaira;
nawui khamashitabingna nali yuihaira;
nana shitkasangabingna nali khalen sanghaira—
chi theikakhuila maleilakthura.
Chithang ina Edomwui thangkhamabing,
Esau Kaphungwui theishingkhuikatheibing,
mashimān ngasakmarala?
da
Nawui kapingabing khananghaora, O Teman,
chieina Esau Kaphungli kapambing kachiva̱ yaithattuphaora.
Nagato Jacobli shaokathatwui vang,
na maishiphalungra kala katatchaohaora.
Na khalāthak eina nganingda,
makathei kha̱mina awui lan phungthuithang,
yur kateina awui ngaveili rāzangda Jerusalem kalā yangvaithang,
nala athumwui ngachaili kazang akha thāhaowa.
Kha nachinā kalāshithang na maringphā ngayimana,
Judah shimānthang mamathān ngayimana;
khanangthang na malangso ngayimana.
Iwui miyur chotchangthang na awui ngavei makānzang ngayimana;
awui kalāshāt zimiksholi na mamathān ngayimana;
a sipsāthang na awui ot mazangngaponkhui ngayimana.
Shongpākli nganingda yāmkashokbingli masāthat ngayimana;
khanangthang kharingabingli yangkashebingwui pāngli mahorsangmi ngayimana.
“Khikhalajila yur saikorali
Nana sākahai tākam eina nalila sāmira,
nawui otsak chi nali latungra.
Kaja nana iwui kathara kaphungli khamang thāda,
kuimareida khalei yurbingnala mangra;
athumna mangra,
yuichāngchāng zatra kala shimānhaora.
Kha yāmkashokbing Zion kaphungli kazipra,
kala hi kathara ngasāra;
kala Jacobshi shimkhurna ashiwui shimlui khuipapamra.
Jacobshi shimkhur mei thāra,
kala Josephshi shimkhurna meiwon thāra;
Esaushi shimkhurna lanji thāda; athumli thottāra kala chuitup tāhaora,
kala Esaushi shimkhur khipākha maringshokmara;
kaja
“Negebnaona Esau kaphung khuira,
kala Shephelah naona Philistine ngalei khuira,
kala athumna Ephraim eina Samaria ngalei khuira,
kala Benjaminshina Gilead khuira.
Halahli raithā kahai Israelnaobingna,
Phoenicia eina thuida Zarephath vāshungda khuira;
Sepharadli raithā kahai Jerusalemnaobingna Nageb keinungbing khuira.
Kharingabingna Zion kaphung kāda Esau kaphungli mungra;
kala wungram chi
“Ngakarthuida kahaka keinung Ninevehli vālu, kala chili makhamayā tui avaolu; kaja athumwui makaphā makhayā chi ili shākāhaira.”
Kha Jonahna
Kha
Jahas kahuibing chi ngacheenāhaida kachichāwui vareli ngakaowa; kala ngavengmei khavai ot khuikaphungbing chi shamadruli horsanga. Kha Jonahva jahaswui alungshong zangpamda piphuphaowa.
Chieina jahaswui captain china zanglaga, “O kape, na khisāli? Ngakarthuida nawui Vareli seihā sālu. Chithākha varena phaningmida ithumli mashimān ngasakpai” da hānga.
Kala athum akha eina akha, “Khipāwui vang kalākashi hi kharākhala da theikhavai kalā yangsa” da ngazek ngaroka. Chieina kalā yangda, kalā chi Jonahwuitungli tāhaowa.
Chieina athumna ali ngahāna “Khiwui vang eina hikathā kalākashi hi ithumwuitungli katākhala? Na khiot kasā mi? Kachiwui eina kharā? Na khi ngaleiwui mi kala khiyurkhala?” da ngahāna.
Chieina ana athumli ngahānkai, “I Hebrewnaona; kala ina kazingramwui Varivara kala ngaleila ngayila kasaa
Chieina mibing chi ngacheekhailakhaowa, kala ali hānga, “Nana khi sāhaoda hithā kahaikhala!” Kaja a
Chiwui thili athumna ali hānga, “Ithumwui vang shamadru va̱rihai khavai nali khi sārakhala?” Kaja shamadruwui siphan zingrot markhangai marhaowa.
Ana athumli hānga, “Ili khāngkhuida shamadruli horsanghaolu; chithākha shamadru nathumwui vang varihaora; kaja hakkhamahā siphan zingrot hi iwui vang eina nathumwuitungli kharāna da theihaira.”
Chithālala mibing china jahas chi ngalei kathengli khuishok khavai panglāk eina hotnai, kha mararthuwa; kaja siphan zingrot chi athumwuitungli markhangai marmeihaowa.
Chiwui vang athumna
Chieina athumna Jonahli khāngkhuilaga shamadruli horsanghaowa; kala shamadru chi mangaphaoluithuwa.
Chiwui vang mibing china
Chieina Jonahna awui
“Iwui kakhanang eina ina
kala ana ili ngahānkai:
Kathewui ramwui wuklung eina ina vaowa,
kala nana iwui khavaokhon shāmi.
Kaja nana ili kathuka shamadrulungli horsanga,
kala khangaphaowa tara̱ chi ili kuimarāna,
nawui tara̱ khangaphao kala ngarungning kahai china iwuitungli ngaphaorai.
Chieina ina hānga,
‘Nawui ngalemwui eina ili horshokhaira,
ara kathāda nawui kathara shim chi ina theiluipairakhala?’
Tara̱na ili hikhaowa,
kathuka china ili kuimareiphinhaowa;
khawo-thothāpna ikui pukrora
phungreiwui angayungli.
Katang mavaila pharnam kahai
ngaleili ina zangshunga;
thalala Chom chiwui eina imanglā nana khuishokmi,
O
Ining shimān kahai tharan,
ina
kala iwui seihā kasā nali kāshungda,
nawui kathara shim chili khuisangmi.
Makānkhanā meoma̱li khayākashibingna athumli machihānluimana.
Kha ina nali ningkashi khami eina ngasoda pha̱phayāra;
Ina ngashit kahai chi ina mira.
Huikhami
Chieina
Chiwui thili kakhane sāda
“Ngakarthuida kahaka keinung Ninevehli vāda ina kahāng tui chi atamchitheilu.”
Chieina Jonahna ngakarthuida
Jonahna keinung chili vākhavai zatphokta thangkhawui shongza zata. Kala ana vaoda, “Zimiksho hangmatithang leilaga Nineveh shimānhaora!” da hānga.
Chieina Ninevehwui mibingna Vareli shitsanga; kala khareia eina thuida khangazana tāshungda bora ngavailaga kakhum eina pama.
Pao chi Ninevehwui awungali vāshunga, chieina ana awui pamkhong horhai kala sāri raihaida bora ngavailaga hotlāli ngakhorpama.
Kala Nineveh katongali pao chishatta hānga, “Awunga kala wungva̱-wungvābingwui kakasona kaja miranu, sāranu, sha̱keiranu, khikha mamazapailakmara, maphauipaimara, mashimanpaimara;
kha mila, sāla bora ngavaida Vareli thuklak eina poranu, kala mi kachiva̱ kachichāwui makaphā makhayāwui eina ning ngateiranu.
Khipāna theira, Varena malungkhavāt ngacheihaida ithumli mashimān ngasaklapai?”
Athumwui makaphā chihohaida ningkhangatei chi theilaga, Varena athumwuitungli makaphā sāra da hanghaikasā chi ngachei ngasakta ana athumli masāthuwa.
Kha china Jonahli ningyāng maung ngasaklakthuwa, kala a malungvātlakhaowa.
Kala ana
Chiwui vang eina, ara, O
na hānga, “Na malungvāt khavai mashun leila?”
Chieina Jonahna keinungwui eina shokta zimikshoshong akhalattawui vang rāmrahnao akha sākhuida apama. Kala chiwui khaya̱li pamda keinung chili khi shoknikhala kaji ana kathei eina tangda yangpama.
Kala
Kha akhama ngathor kathā kazing kathang eina, Varena kalom akhali arong chi shaingasakta ngahuihaowa.

Zimik kashok eina zingshoshongwui kasā masi Varena phanrā ngasaka kala Jonahwui kuili zinghām za̱haoda ning shimānhaowa; kala ana ali thingasakhaolu da poi, kala hānga, “Iwui vanga kharingli kathina phāmei.”
Kha Varena Jonahli hānga, “Nana arong chiwui vang malungvāt khavai mashun leila?” Ana ngahānkai, “Ina vātngayilaka, vātnahaida kathila thingai.”
Chieina
Chithākha uishong yāshong matheithangkhamei kahaka keinung mi lakh akha thing maga̱ lāngda khalei, kala sha̱keila kachungkha khalei Ninevehli I malumashan ngayimala?”
nganālu, O okathui, kala chiwui alungli khalei saikora;
Kaja yanglu,
kala ana tāda okathuiwui kajuipambing tānaikazamra.
Kala phungreibingna awui azingli menghaora,
tampākbing amaitaren ngasāhaora,
khuira̱ mei ngalemli kahai thāda,
tara̱ arapli heikatā thāhaora.
Saikora hi Jacobwui khayonwui vang Israel shimkhurwui moreiwui vangna.
Jacobwui khayonkhamāng chi khi?
Chi Samaria maningmala?
Kala Judah shimkhurwui morei khi?
Chi Jerusalem maningmala?
Chiwui vang eina ina Samariali shimān ngasakhailaga,
khamasaili thingkhor lungkhor khor kahai thāngasakra,
drakhāthei lingsang khavai ngasā ngasakra;
kala awui lungguibing ina tampākli shireotāhaora,
kala awui shimphungabing masai ngasakhaora.
Awui meoma̱ saikora akha̱-akhā sāmihaora,
khayorva̱̱bingwui eina samkaphang saikora mei eina thottāmihaora,
kala awui meoma̱ saikora ina khikha masāvai ngasakmara;
kaja khayorva̱̱ sāda khamasāwui eina meoma̱bing chi kazipkhui,
kala chibing chi khayorva̱̱ khamasāli hanvāpapamra.
Hiwui vang ina khananglāk eina chapngachāra;
Ina raihokhailaga mahonghat eina zatra;
ramfawui kakhong thāda chapngachāra;
kala ostrichbing kakhong thāda chapra.
Kaja awui khamā maraikapaiyana,
kala chi Judahli rāshunghaira,
chi iwui miyurwui ngaveili rāpeihaira,
Jerusalemli raza̱haira.
Chi Gathli mahāngalu,
machaplakalu;
Beth-le-aphrahli nathum chifali ngaleolu.
Nathumwui shongfali zatlu,
Saphirli kapamabing,
mahonghat eina, maishiri eina;
Zaananli kapamabing mashokalu;
Bethezelwui khanangda kachap china nganing khavaipam chi nathumwui eina khuithuihaora.
Kaja Marothli kapambingna kaphā chili honchingching hondalei,
kaja makaphā chi
Siguigari siguibing khalapshanhaolu,
Lachishli kapamabing;
Zionwui naongalāva̱li morei kasā haokaphok chi nathumna,
kaja nathumwui alungli Israelwui khayonkhamāng chi samphanga.
Chiwui vang eina nathumna Moresheth-gathli kapangwui lemmet mira;
Achzibwui shimkhurbing Israel awungabingli mikhanam ngasāra.
Ina nathumwuitungli khayuiya akha rāngasakra,
Mareshahli kapama mibing;
Israelwui tekhamatei chi Adullamli rāra.
Nathum khalatta kui sikokhaolu,
nathumwui leikashiya naomayarabingwui vang;
khalāng sāsha thāda kui sikokhailu,
kaja athum nathumwui eina raithāhaora.
Makaphā-makhayā phākashoka kala mapivāla makaphā makhayā khangarān kasaa kala pettungli makaphā kaphaning athum kalākashi ngasāranu!
Ngathor kharā eina athumna ot chi sai,
kaja chi sākashap pangshap athumwuili lei.
Athumna lui ngamara, kala ngapaikhui;
shimla ngamarda khuithui haowa;
athumna milila shimlila singkharenga,
khalaleilila singkharenga.
Chiwui vang
Yanglu, shimkhur hiwuitungli Ina makaphā shokkhavai khangarān sādaleiya,
chiwui eina nathumwui akahung mangatha̱thukmara,
kala nathum langsosor mazatmara,
kaja chi makaphā atam ngasāra.
Chithanghon athumna nathumli mana̱kashi laa sāra,
kala wukkhananglak eina chapngachāra,
kala hithāda hāngra, “Ithum shimānchao haira;
ana iyurwui yar chi ngacheimi haira;
kathāda ana iwui eina khuithuimihao khala!
Ithumwui lui ithumli raikathābingli ngayarmihaira.”
Chiwui vang eina
“Pao mahāshokalu” — da athumna tamchithei—
“Khipānakha hikathā hi mahāshokpai mara;
maikashi chi ithumli marāshung mara.”
Hi hāngngayila, O Jacobwui shimkhur?
Hibing hi awui otsakla?
Mashun eina kazata a chili iwui tuina khamathā masāmimala?
Kha nathumna iwui miyurli yangkashe thāda ngasunga;
chingrikahaibing, raiwui kaphaning maleila chihansa̱ zatta khaleibingwui kachon raitāmi hai.
Iyur sha̱naobingli athumwui ringkaphā shim eina kashamshokhai,
athumwui naoshinaobingwui eina iwui tekhamatei nathumna khuithuichao haira.
Ngakarthuida zatlu,
kaja hi ngasām khavai pam maningmana;
makatharwui vang zakshilāk eina shimān khangasakwui vang.
Mi akhana masitui kala kakapik tui matuida,
“Ina nathumli drakhāra̱ eina zamwui pao hashokra”
da hāngshang hangtāakha,
a miyur hiwui pao hākashokana.
O Jacob, Ina kachangkhat nathum saikorali kazipkhuira.
Ina Israelwui shākkahai chi manākhuira;
yaoshangwui yaonao thāda;
yaohomphungli khalei yao thāda,
ngarungningkahai Ina mi saikora kazipkhuira.
Raipan shokhame china mangāli zatra;
athumna sakhailaga ngavei kānzangra,
chieina shokluira.
Athumwui awunga
Kala ina hānga;
Nganālu, Jacobwui akhavābing kala Israelwui shimkhur khamungabing!
Mashun kathei hi nathumwui vang maningmala?
Kaphāli ningkachailaga makaphāli leikashe nathum,
iwui mibingwui ahui laishokkhamebing;
kala athumwui aphi ara̱kuiwui eina hemkakhuibing;
Iwui mibingwui aphi kashaibing,
kala athumwui ahui khalaibing,
kala athumwui ara̱kui sākakazambing,
sā thada sāhamli katatkasangbing,
kala sā thāda hampaili kahangbing.
Chiwui thili athumna
kha ana athumli mangahānkāmara;
chitharan ana athumwui eina mai ngareithuihaora,
kaja athumna athumwui otsak zakshi ngasakhaowa.
Iwui mibingli thanngui kahaia marānbingwui pongli
athumna zākhavai kateokha leiakha,
“Mashithaosa” ji,
kha athumwui khamorli khikha masangkhamebingli rai sāra jihaowa.
Chithāda nathumwui vang khamahā makhalei ngayā ngasāra,
maphongkhami khangami ngasāra.
Zimikna marānbingwui vang tunhaora,
kala ngashunla athumwuitungli tangmangra;
marānbing maishihaora, khanongbing khayakhaora;
athum saikora khamor kafahaora,
kaja Varewui ngahānkākhami maleithuwa.
Kha ichanga pangshapna pemtinghai,
kala mashun eina kala yāng eina,
Jacobli awui khayonkhamāng kala Israelli awui morei phongmi khavai.
Hi nganālu, Jacobwui shimkhurwui akhavābing,
kala Israel shimkhurwui khamungabing,
mashunli ningkakachaibing,
khamashungli masho khangasakbing,
ashee eina Zion kala khayon eina Jerusalem sākakābing.

kala kazikakazāwui khao eina ngasoda pheomirala?
Nawui kashanga mibing khangashaona pemtinghai;

Chieina ina nali pāng parhaira,

Nana yaora kha mahātkhuimara;
nana olive surra,

chieina ana ringphāda mathāna.
Chiwui vang ana khailanli pha̱kaphayā sai,
kala awui khailan kahakali nganamkaphā riktai;
kaja ana chiwui mangā eina ringphāda okathuina;
kala awui kashakazā khamathāthāmānga.
Chieina ana awui khailan masaingasaklaga
lukhamashan maleila yurbingli sāthatchingrala?
kala tārongli pamra, laga ana ili khi hāngra kala iwui makhamayāwui pongli khi ngahānkārakhala kaji yangkhuira.
Kala
“Mahākhami chi kapikhuilu;
lungphekli tharzā eina kapilu,
chieina kapābingna tharzā eina pākhuipaira.
atam chi thākta rāra—makapikmara.
makahatlakla rāra, mahuinganong mara.
kha khangaronga mina awui shitkasang eina ringra.
Chili lāngda zam hiya kakapikana;
langkaso mi chi maringmara.
Awui kākharām chi Kathewui ram rikha mashai;
kathe thāda ana kashap mavaimana.
Ana yur saikora awui vang kazipkhui, kala
mi saikora awui thāda rutkhui.”
Saikora hina ali zeida mana̱kashi eina ngasoda mahāngmaralā,
“Khalattawui makhaninga ot khorhaida khaleia a chi ringkashi ngasāranu—
karankhawui vang? —
khalatta ngashaikakhuiwui eina shāngkakhui chi!”
Nawui leiman kazangbingna kashuirak thuida,
kala mathukta khaleibingna nali makathir ngasakmarala?
Chitharan na athumna ngaponkhui kahaia ngasāhaora.
Kaja nana yur kachungkhali ngapon kahaiwui vang,
shākkahaibingna hupvana nali ngaponra,
mibingwui asheewui vang kala apuk-apagali,
keinungbingli kala chiwui alungli khalei saikorali khangashaowui vang.
Awui shimkhurwui vang makaphā eina tongkakhuia,
kalākashi marāshung khavai awui athip kajuiva̱li kasaa,
a chili ringkashi ngasāranu!
Nana miyur kachungkhali katathaida,
nawui shimkhurwui vang khayākhamalā sākhuihaira,
namanglā hamhaira.
Kaja lungguina shimrāpwui eina vaoshokra, kala
khāngena shimtungwui eina ngahānkāra.
Ashee eina keinung sākakā,
khayonkhamāng eina keinung sākakā a chili kakhanang ngasāranu!
Yanglu, mibingna meiwui vang ngalangkazār,
kala yurbingna khikha makhaningwui vang kachot;
hi saikorawui
shamadru tara̱na kapem thāda.
Khongnainaoli awui malungkhavātwui tengkot mangngasakta marip khangasaka,
kala athumwui kakhayak chili yangkhavai kasā a chi kakhanang ngasāranu!
Nali tekhamateiwui mahutli maikashina pemhaora,
manglu, manglaga ngayitzatlu,
kala kakhayak chi nawui tekhamatei tungli tāra.
Lebanonli sākashi kasā china nali longrorra;
sāyurbingli shimān khangasak china nali ngachee ngasakra;
kaja mibingwui ashee kala apuk-apagali, keinungbingli,
kala chiwui alungli kapambingli khangashaowui vang.
Kasemana sākakhuia, mariwui kakapika meoma̱ chi khi kannākhala?
Kaja themkathema ana sākakhui khak makashoka awui pāngotli chihāna.
Thingwui otli, Mathuklu;
khak makashok ngalungli, Ngakarthuilu!
kaji mi chi kalākashi ngasāranu!
Hina phongmishaprala?
Yanglu, chi sinā kala lupāsā eina heirora,
kala chili khaksui maleimana.
okathui hupta awui mangāli chingrihairanu.
Shigionothwui athishurda, Habakkuk Marānwui seihā kasā.
O
nawui otsakli ngachee.
Zingkumbingwui alungli shokngasakmiluishitlu;
zingkumbingwui alungli chitheimiluishitlu,
malungkhavāt tharan khalumashanmilu.
Varena Temanwui eina rai,
kala Kathara china Paran Phungreiwui eina rai.
Awui tekhamateina kazingram pei kala okathui awui masotna pema.
Awui kahān chiya kahor tākamhai,
apāngwui eina zingrān shoka;
kala chili awui pangshap thumhai.
Awui mangāli kazātkashi rai,
kala mimaona yunronda shurzata.
Ana nganingda okathui hi ngatama;
kala yurbingli yanglaga khanuka;
chieina makhangachei kaphung khareirei ngapha̱yānghaowa,
katang makhavai kaphungnanao ngasunzanghaowa.
Awui pangshap achālakhawui chichinga.
Cushan shimkhurwui sipkasā ina thei;
Midian ngaleiwui chonrān nganuka.
Nawui malungkathui kongbinglilā O
Nawui malungkhavāt chi kongbinglilā,
chikā shamadruli malungkakangkhala,
nana nawui sigui, khayuiyawui siguigari katong tharan?
Nana nawui malākhorwui eina malā khuishokta malāthing khara̱li parhaira.
Nana okathui ngachakkhaida kong longngasaka.
Kaphungbingna nali theida reoranga;
tara̱na kungkung longa;
kathuka ngayina ngaphaokāda,
akhon ngarungninghai.
Nawui malā kāpkharāwui kahān,
nawui kazei pharkharāwui khangashei theilaga,
zimik eina kachāngna kachichāwui apamli ngasāmhaowa.
Nana malungvātta okathuili makānvai,
nana malungvavāt eina yurbingli naikazama.
Nawui miyurli huikhui khavai rai,
nana neomi kahaiali huikhui khavai.
Nana makaphā makhayāwui kui naikhaiya,
khaishāng eina thuilaga akahung eina tangda khamasai eina haimi.
Ili sakathān khavai surkakhaning thāda kharā,
kala kachāmbingli ngathumda tukshaiki kajiwui ringkaphā thāda kharā
raikhokabingwui kuili nawui zeipa̱ eina phara.
Nana shamadrutungli nawui sigui eina naikazamda,
hakkhamahā tara̱ malaokai.
Ina shālaga iphasā kathira,
akhon chi shāda imorchai kathira ara̱kui makazang thāda, pheila makārthukthuwa.
Ithumli rai rākatā athumwuitungli kachotkachāng kharā atam chi ina kasaikha honsāra.
Khaorārongna awon mawonlala,
drakhārongna mamatheilala olive heiun maunglala,
luili zāt mashoklala,
yaoshimli yao mazanglala,
seishimli sei maleilala;
Huikhame Varewui mangāli I ringphāchingra.
ana iphei chaowui kathāk thāda sāmi,
ana ili kajujuipamli zatngasaka.
“Okathuili khalei ot saikora ina sāshimitserhaora”
da
Ina mila sāyurla sāthatserhaora;
Ina yongkazata vānaobingla shamadruwui khaihla mashākmilakmara.
Ina makaphā makhayā chi sākazamhaora;
ina mikumoli okathuiwui eina katathaora,
da
“Ina Judah kala Jerusalemli khalei saikorali pāng parra;
kala ina Baal varebingli khokharuma shākkahaibing eina meoma̱li khokharuma pāngmonbingwui amingla;
shimtungli kānganinglaga zimik kachāng sirāli khokharumbing;
kaja
kala awui mibingli tharchikathaira.
Kala
“Ina otva̱bing kala wungnaobingli,
kala miyur khangateiwui kashankachon khangavaibinglila tandi mira.
Chithanghon khāmongpheili ngawokkakābing,
kala akhavāwui shimli khangashao kala kateikazā eina kachipembing athumli ina tandi mira.”
Chithanghon Khaih Ngaveiwui eina akhon akha shāra,
kakhane shimwui eina ringkhangā,
panglāk kahai akhon phungrāwui eina shāra.
Chaplu, O keinungwui thukkhameishong kapamabing!
Kaja leihkhalon mi akhala maleiluimana;
lupāsā khān katama mi saikorali katathaira.
“Chitharan ina thaomei singlaga Jerusalemli phāra,
khalatta ningyāngkhaung kala ningnganungda
da kaphaninga athumli tandi mira.
Athumwui otbing ngaponkhuihaora,
kala athumwui shimla khikha masā khavai ngasāhaora.
Athumna shim sālala chili athumna mapamara;
athumna drakhā yāmgui vālala drakhāra̱ khamang masamphangmara.”
nganaihaira, thaklāk eina rārāli;
pangshapa mi chi chili ngavao tarangra.
Malungkathurwui zimiksho chi chithangna,
sipkasā eina reokharangwui zimikshona,
sākakazam eina sākashimān zimikshona;
muiyā eina tangmangting kahaiwui zimikshona,
raipan ngaveiphin kahai keinung kala hakkhamahā ngararphungli
talla̱ kakhong eina raikhon khangavao zimikshona.
Ina mibingwuitungli sipkasā khuirāra,
chithāda athumna mik khangapeo thāda zatra,
khikhalajila athumna
athumwui ashee chifa thāda heitha̱ra,
kala asā seipaih thāra.
athumwui lupāsānala,
sinānala mangatangkhuirarmara,
awui yuishātwui malungkhavāt alungli okathui saikora shimān ngasakra.
Okathuili khalei saikora kashuirak hunkhawui alungli shimān ngasakra.
Rālu, rākazipserlu,
O kakhayak makathei yur,
phanthui kahai māhik thāda nathumli makashamranglakha,
awui kahāng khanganābing;
khamashung khangarong phālu,
kala ngahuiri kahai phākhuilu;
Ashdodwui mibingli ngashunshong kashamshokhaora,
kala Ekronli angayung eina phurhaora.
Yireipheili kapama, Chereth yur nathum kakhanang ngasāranu!
O Canaan, Philistinenaowui ngalei;
nathum akhala mashāklakla shimān ngasakra.
Kala O shamadrupheiwui ngalei, na yaohomphung ngasāhaora,
yaokahombingwui seizat katimpam ngasāhaora,
kala yaoshangwui shim ngasāhaora.
Shamadrupheiwui ngalei chi Judahshi shāk kahaibingwui shimlui ngasāhaora,
chili athumna yao hompamra,
kala Ashkelonwui shimli athumna ngazinshong ungngasāmkhuira.
Kaja Vare
athumna iwui mibingli kathāda mana̱shi kala athumwui ngaleili matheikhamiwui pongli ina shāhaira.
akhar mashokkapai ka̱shātmāng kaji kala machi kotkhavai,
makānkhanā lam ngasāchanghaora,
iwui shāk kahai mibingna athumli ngaponra,
kala iwui yurwui thishāk kahaibingna chili pānra,”
da saikorawui
Hi athumwui langkasowui atheina,
khikhalajila athumna saikorawui
mha, okathuili khalei varebing saikorali ana khumngasakra;
kala yur kachiva̱na kachichāpamwui eina ali khoruma.
kala Assyria sākazamhaora;
kala ana Nineveh ramcho sāngasakra,
siwuk thāda thengchenghaora.
Seishang eina luiwukwui sāyur saikorana
chiwui alungthungli ngaleovaira,
chiwui keinungli ngaleihok eina khalāng sāsha pemra;
pawungna charfali khongra,
hangkhāna lamzanli khongra;
kaja awui cedarthing eina kasā ot saikora masaikonghaora.
Hi nganongrei kahai leikhayā keinung akhana,
akhalatta, “Ilaka, ili lāngda khangatei maleiluimana”
da kahānga china.
Ramcho kathāda ngasāhao,
sāyurbingwui pikhavai ngasāhaira!
Ali rākhamakāna mi kachiva̱na kasirora,
kala pangkhum heimachita.
Ngakaikashe, makhao kahaiya, kala singkakharenga keinung chi kalākashi ngasāranu!
Ana khipākhawui akhon manganāmana,
mashungkhami makhuisangmana;
Ana
awui Vareli manganaimana.
Awui otva̱bing kakhanganga kazingkha̱na;
awui bicharwobing ngathorshongwui vang
khikha mataikakhuia ngazinshongwui ramfana.
Awui marānbinga ningkhān sāngailaka,
shitkasang makhaleiamānga;
awui pāngmonbingna kathara ot sāmakhaowa,
athumna ainla sakhai.
Awui alungli khalei
ana khangui ot masāmana;
ngathor kachida awui mashun chithei,
zingthanlam kachida khavāt maleimana;
kha makathara china kakhayak matheimana.
“Ina yurbing katathaira;
athumwui raipan sākazamserhaira;
ina athumwui shongfa sākathānmihaida khipākha chili mazatluimana;
athumwui keinung ramcho sāngasakhaira,
mi akhala maleimana,
ramnao akhala mapānluimana.
Ina hānga, makahatlakla ana ili ngacheera,
mashungkhami ana khuisangra;
kala ina kahahāng chi ana theishingkhuira.
Kha athumna khamakhao ot kasāli ningsangmeihaowa.”
“Chiwui vang eina ili ngarailu,
ina shākhi akha sāda nganingkāthang zimiksho chi” da
Kaja iwui tuitakva yurbing kazipkhuiki kajina,
wungrambing kharupkhuiki kajina,
iwui ningyāng makhaungwui mei thāda kasā,
iwui malungkhavāt katonga athumwuitungli heiror khavaina;
kaja iwui yuikashe malungvāt alungli okathui hupta shimānra.
“Mha, chitharan mibingwui tuimatui mashun tui onmihaida,
athum saikorana
kala ali ning akha sāda otram ngatha̱ra.
Ethiopiawui kong makānda ngapha̱yāng thuikahaibingwui naongalāva̱ ngarāna ili rāchigatra.
Chithanghon nali makhayak ngasakluimara,
ili ngakaishida sākahai otsak chiwui vang;
kaja ina nathumwui alungwui eina lāngkasobing chi khuishokhaora,
kala iwui kathara phungreili nathum malāngsoluimara.
Kaja ina nathumwui alungli malungkhanim kala ngahuirikahai miyur akha haimihaora.
Athumna
kakapik tui mamatuimara,
lah athumwui khamorli kachipat tui akhala masamphangmara.
Kaja athumna phāshak phashailaga ngayaipi ngayaipamra
kala athumli khipānakha mangachee ngasakmara.”
Pangda laa sālu, O Zionwui naongalāva̱;
horailu, O Israel!
Mathānlu kala naning tongda ringphālu,
O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱.
Nawuitungli bichar khalei chi
ana nawui yangkashebingli kashamhaira Israelwui Awunga
nathumna makaphā chili mangacheeluimara.
Chithanghon Jerusalemli hāngra:
“Mangacheelu, O Zion;
nawui pāng mangazan ngasakalu.
Nawui Vare
raikhoka rai yuikhame chi;
ana nawui vang ringphāda mathānra,
nali awui leikashi alungli mirin kadhar miluishitra;
nawuitungli ana ringkaphāwui laa pangda vaora,
phanit phanaoli kasā thāda.
Ka̱lākashi chi ina nawui eina khuishokhaora.”
chiwui vang mamaishiluimara.
“Yanglu, chitharan nali singkakharengbing chili ina singra,
Ina phei katekbingli huikhuira kala horkahaibingli kazipkhuira,
kala ina athumwui kakhayak chi maikhayā onngasakta okathuili mingmayāng ngasakra.
Ina nathumli manākakhui tharan,
ina nathumli shimli thanungmira;
kala nathumwui lan hanmilui kahai tharan,
okathuiwui miyur saikorana nathumwui mingkhamayāng shālaga masochikatra,” da

“Khorumshim kaikhayāngda khalei theitheilaga nathum khalatta sākharirik kahai shimli kapam atamla?
Chieina saikorawui

Nathumna kachungkha yaosanga kha kateokhamang hātkhui; nathumna zālala kapen mavaimana, nathumna manglala machirlakmana; ngavailala khipākha khalum masamphangmana; ngalang pheikhuilala akhur khawutta khaoli pheisānga.
Ashangva̱wui
Kaphungli kāda thing akhuilaga shim chi sakālu, chieina ina chiwui vang ringphāpaira kala iwui tekhamatei eina rāchitheipaira da
“Nathumna kachungkha samphang khavai phai, kha yanglu, kateokhamang ngasāhaowa; kala nathumna chi shimli khuikhaung tharan, ina malitāmihaowa. Khiwui vangkhala? da saikorawui
Chiwui vang eina atungshong khalei kazingna ikra̱ matāmimana, kala ngaleina athei mamatheimimana.

Kala ina ngaleitungli, kaphungtungli, theishiraiwuitungli, drakhāra̱ kadhartungli thaowuitungli, thingnā-ra̱hāwuitungli, miwui kala sha̱keiwuitungli, kala athumwui ot kasā saikorawuitungli ina kazing kāngkhavai kasohaira.”
Chithāda She-alti-elwui naomayara Zerubbabel, kala Jehozadakwui naomayara pāngmon kharei Joshuana, miyur chiwui shākkahai saikorali ngasoda athumwui Vare

Kala
chi kachāng katharukawui zimiksho maga̱da khamate thangna.
Darius awungana mungda zingkum kakhane, kachāng kashinewui zimiksho maga̱da kharethang
Ara tui hi She-alti-elwui naomayara Judahwui khamunga Zerubbabel, Jehozadakwui naomayara Joshua kala nganingshing kahaiya saikorali hānglu, kaja,
“Nathumwui ngachaili shim hiwui kharewui tekhamatei kathei khipā tailikhala? Ara nathumna kathāda theili? Nathumwui mikyanli khikha makhaninga mathāmala?
Chithālala ara malung pinglu, O Zerubbabel, da
kaja nathumna Egyptwui eina kashok tharan ina tuingashit sākahai athishurda nathumli ngasomida lei. Iwui manglā nathumwui ngachaili pamda lei; mangacheealu.
kala yur saikora ina khanukra, chithāda sāda yur saikorawui lan chi rāzangra, kala ina shimhi tekhamatei eina chipemra, da saikorawui

“Ashangva̱wui

Kalikhada mi akhana chigat kahai kathara sā kachonmareili romkhuilaga awui kachon china khamuili nilala, hanli nilala, zamli nilala, thaoli nilala kashakazā kali-kalikhali nilala sākaza̱ chi tharmathenghaorala?” Pāngmonbing china ngahānkai “Maningmana.”
Chiwui thili Haggaina hānga, “Chithāda sāda mibing hila chithai, kala iwui mangāli khalei yur hila hithai, da
“Seihā sālu kala aja eina thuilaga naoda khi shoknikhala kaji phaningyanglu.
nathum kathāda sāsākhala? Mi akhana shung maga̱ kazipkhuingai, kha shung tharāmāng samphanga; akhana drakhāra̱ surkhavaipamli khokthi hangphangā sokkhui khavai rai, kha maga̱māng samphanga.
Ina nathumli kala nathumwui theishiraili sākazāt rāngasaka, theihla kachungkha tāngasaka; kha nathumna ili malatungmana da saikorawui
Aja kachāng kachikowui zimiksho maga̱da khamatethang hi eina thuida yangphoklu.
Athā chi arui eina tangda zātshimli leila? Drakhārong, khaorārong, kabotheirong kala oliverong arui eina tangda athei mamatheirangla? Aja eina thuida ina nathumli somira.”
Kachāng chiwui zimiksho maga̱da khamatethang
“Judahwui khamunga Zerubbabelli hānglu kaja ina kazingram kala okathui khanukki jihaira,

kala wungrambingwui wungpamkhong khuishoki jihaira, yurbingwui wungram yāng pangshap shimān ngasaki jihaira, kala siguigari eina sigui katongbingli sākazamki jihaira kala siguila, katongbingla mi kachiva̱ kachichāwui ngasotawui raighaili pitāra.
Chithanghon ina nali khāngkhuira, O Shealtielwui naomayara, iwui rao Zerubbabel, da saikorawui
Chiwui vang eina athumli hānglu, saikorawui
Marān kharebingna, ‘saikorawui
Navā ngarā, athum kali leili? Kala marānbing, athum ringchingda leila?
Kha iwui rao marānbingli ina kakaso iwui tui kala iwui shiyan china navāngarāli mayuimala? Chieina athumna ningngateida hānga, ithumwui shongfa kala ithumwui saki kaji chiwui vang saikorawui
Dariusna mungda kum kakhanewui Tharao (Shebat) kachāng tharāda kharewui zimiksho maga̱da khamatethang
Ina ngayāshong, mi akhana sigui kahunga akha tongkazat thei! A tampāk akhali myrtle thingwui ngachaili nganingsai; kala akhanukli kahunga, hungreoseo kala kachara siguibing leisai.
Chieina ina hānga, “Hibing hi khikhala,
Chieina myrtle thing ngachaili khanganinga mi china ngahānkai, hibing hi okathuili kuimareida yangzat khavai
Kala myrtlething ngachaili nganingda khalei
Chieina
Kala ili khangazeka kazingrao chili
Chieina ili khangazeka kazingrao china ili hānga; vaolu, Hithāda saikorawui
Kala lekngasaisor eina pamda khalei yurbingli malungvāthaira; khikhalajila ina iwui yurli malungmavātngaiga jiakha athumna kalākashi chi mataisang ngasaka.
Chiwui vang eina
Yaruili vaoluishitlu, da saikorawui
Kala ina mik yangkakā eina, yanglu mukvāngaji mati thei!
Kala ili khangazeka kazingrao chili, “Mibing hi khikhala?” da khangahān eina ana hānga, “Hibing hi Judah, Israel kala Jerusalemli ngapha̱yānghai khangasaka angaji china.”
Chiwui thili

Kala ina hānga, “Athum khi rākasākhala?” Ana ngahānkai, “Hibing hina Judah sākathānmihaida, mi khipākhana kui machongkākapai, angajibing china; athumli ngachee khavai hili kharāna, Judahwui ngalei sākathānmihailaga hiwui mibingli ngapha̱yāng khangasaka yurbingwui angajibing sātek khavai rākahaina.”
Kala ina mik yangkakā eina, yanglu, mi akha awui pāngli tamkhavai khara̱ singkasā thei!
Chieina ina hānga, “Na kali vanikhala?” Kala ana ili hānga, “Jerusalem hi asān-aret kayākhakhala kaji tamkhui khavaina.”
Kala yanglu, ili khangazeka kazingrao chi mangāli rānganaiya, kala khangatei kazingrao akhala ali samphang khavai rai
kala ali hānga, “Yaronnaopā chili yongvāda ahānglu, ‘Jerusalemli mila, sha̱keila chungnā kahaiwui vang phākho makhalei kha̱nao thāda pānra.
Khikhalajila ina kuimareida meiwui phākho ngasāmira, kala ina awui alungli tekhamatei ngasāra’ da
Ah! ha! Atungshongwui ngalei eina yāmthulu, da
Ho! Babylonwui naongalāva̱li ngasoda kapambing, nathum Zionli yāmvaulu.
Kaja saikorawui
“Yanglu, ina athumwuitungli ipāng khāngkāra kala athum athumwui rao sākasābingwui vang ngapon khavai ngasāra.”
Chieina saikorawui
“Laa sāda mathānlu, O Zionwui naongalāva̱; khikhalajila yanglu, ina nathumli ngasopamra,” da

Kala
Chitharan Joshuana makhaotot kahai kashankachon ngavailaga kazingrao chiwui mangāli nganingsai.

Kala kazingrao china awui mangāli khanganingbing chili hānga, “Makhaotot kahai kashankachon chi awui eina khuimihaolu.” Kala ali hānga, “Yanglu, ina nawui khayonkhamāng khuithuimihaora kala nali aman kasaka kashankachon ngavaimira.”
Kala ina hānga, “Awui kuili tharzā kahai kuitei akha teimi ngasaklu.” Chieina athumna awui kuili tharzā kahai kuitei akha teimi; kala
Kala
Saikorawui
Ara nganālu, O pāngmon kharei Joshua, nala kala nali ngasokapama nawui ngasotnaobingla, kaja athum khamathā machutkakhuiwui misera: yanglu, iwui rao Aphāng chi ina khuirāra.
Kaja yanglu, ina Joshuawui mangāli shunmi kahai lungguitungli, lunggui akhawui lungmai shini khalei chili, tui chi kapisanghaora da saikorawui
Chithang nathum kachiva̱na kachichāwui khongnainaoli ngahotta drakhārong kala khaorārongpheili pamngarumra,” da saikorawui
Kala ili khangazeka kazingrao china rāluishitta ili, mi akhana pida leilakha mathotkakhui thāda rāmathota.
Kala ana “Nana khi theikhala?” da ili ngahāna.
Ina hānga, “Ina thaomeishong sinā kachanga eina kasā akha thei, chiwui atungli khongsai akha lei, kala chiwui atungli akhamor shini kakā thaomei shini khalei chi thei.
Kala chiwui ngalemli oliverong khani lei, akhana khongsai chiwui yāvāk, akhana uivāk lei.”
Kala ili khangazeka kazingrao chili ina hānga, “Iwui amei, hibing hi khikhala?”
Chieina ili khangazeka kazingrao china ngahānkai, “Hibing hi khikhala na theila?” Ina hānga, “Matheimana, iwui amei.”
O kahaka phungrei na khikhala? Zerubbabelwui mangāli na tampāk sāhaora; kala juimeikap kaje lunggui chi ana ‘Lukhamashan, lukhamashan’ da vaolaga khuirāra.”
Chili lāngda
“Zerubbabelwui pāng eina shim hiwui shimphunga sakāhaira; awui pāng eina shim hi kakupla sākupra. Chieina saikorawui
Khikhalajila kachikathāna kateowa otwui vang ngalang shivāmakha ringphāra, kala Zerubbabelwui pāngli tamkhavai ngalung kasing theira. Shini hi okathui hupta yangkhavai
Kala kakhane sāda ina ngahānlui, “Thaora̱ heishok khavai sinā lengkhor khaniwui ngalemli khalei oliverongwui aphāng khani chi khikhala?”
Ana ili hānga, “Hi khikhala kaji na matheimala?” Ina hānga “Matheimana, iwui amei.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Hi okathui saikorawui
Ina yangkāluishit kaji eina, yanglu, yongkazata lairik akhalui akha thei;
Kala ana ili hānga, “Na khi theikhala?” Ina ngahānkai, “Ina yongkazata lairik khalui akha thei; chiwui asān khuining maga̱ya kala aret khuining tharāya.”

Chiwui thili ana ili hānga, “Hi ngalei katongawuitungli khavā khonkashi china; hiwui thili khalei mi kachiva̱li hiwui athishurda katathaora, kala minamda shākhi kasā mi kachiva̱li hiwui athishurda katathaora.
Ina hi chihovāra, da saikorawui
Chiwui thili ili khangazeka kazingrao chi rālaga ili hānga, “Namik kapeikālu, kala kashok chi khikhala da yanglu.”
Kala ina “Chi khikhala?” da ngahāna; chieina ana hānga, “Hi zatta khalei tamkhavai khuiluina.” Kala ana hānga, “Hi apam kachiva̱li khalei athumwui khayonkhamāng china.”
Kala yanglu, mishiwui asham chi kaphut eina sha̱nao akha khuilui chiwui alungli pamsai.
Kala ana hānga, “Hi Makaphā makhayā kaho china.” Kala sha̱nao chi khuilui chili tuksangluilaga mishiwui asham chieina shingkhamhaowa.

Chiwui thili ina yangkakā eina yanglu, sha̱nao khani rākharā chi thei! Aniwui angachāngli masi zanga; aniwui angachāng chi varokwui angachāng thai, kala anina khuilui chi kazingram eina okathuiwui angachaili khāngkai.
Chieina ili khangazeka kazingrao chili, “Ani khuilui chi kali khuivāki kajikhala?” da ina ngahāna.
Ana ili hānga, “Shinar ngaleili khuivāda hiwui vang shim akha sāra; kala chi ngarānkup kahai eina anina khuilui chi apam chili runghaora.”
Khare gari chiwui siguibing chi hunga, kakhanewui siguibing chi zika,
kakathuma siguibing chara, kala khamate siguibing hotla machu chukpoma.
Chieina ili khangazeka kazingrao chili “Hibing hi khikhala, iwui amei?” da ina ngahāna.
Sigui kazikbingna kashimena gari chi atungshong shangra, sigui kacharbingna kashimena china zingtunshong vāra, kala hotla machu kachuka siguibing china azingshong tāra.
Siguibing china kashok eina, athumna okathui kuivākhangaina kasaikha mapampaithuwa. Kala ana, “Zatlu, okathuili kuivālu” da kahāng eina athumna okathuili kuivai.
Chiwui thili ana ili panglāk eina hānga, “Yanglu, atungshong shangkahaibing china apam chili iwui Manglā chingrihai ngasakhaira.”
Kala
“Babylonwui eina rākahaiya raithā kahaibingwui eina Heldai, Tobijah kala Jedaiah athumli khuilu; kala chithang Zephaniahwui naomayara Josiahwui shimli vālu.
Athumwui eina lupāsā kala sinā khuilaga kuihon akha sākhuida Jehozadakwui naomayara pāngmon kharei Joshuali ngahonmilu;
kala ali hānglu, saikorawui
wui khorumshim sakāki kaji chi ana, a khayākālakra, kala awui pamkhongli pamda khamungla mungra. Kala awui wungpamkhong ngalemli pāngmon akha leira, kala ani chingri tāchamhai ngarokra.’
Kala kuihon chi Heldai, Tobijah, Jedaiah kala Zephaniahwui naomayara Josiahli phaningung khavai
Kala apam katāva̱li khaleibingna
Awunga Dariusna mungda zingkum khamate, kachāng kachiko kaja Chislev kachāng, zimiksho khamatethang,
Kaja Bethelwui mibingna Sharezer eina Regem-melechli ngasoda mi kachungkha
kala saikorawui
Chieina saikorawui
“Ngalei chiwui mi saikora kala pāngmon saikorali hānglu, Nathumna kachāng kaphangā eina kashineli zingkum hangshini khumda kachap chi, iwui vangla?
Kala nathumna kazā tharan kala khamang tharan, nathum khalattawui vang kazā kala khamang maningmala?”
Jerusalemli kala kuimareida khalei keinung kachiva̱ kashakazā mavātlakla okthuikasā azingshongla, tampāklila pānkasa chi
Kala
“Saikorawui
ra̱meinaoli, avāva̱ makhaleibingli, kha̱mili, lah kachāmali marekhareklu; kala nathumwui alungli mi khipākhana achināwuitungli makaphā ning maphumhaialu.
“Kha athumna manganāsanglakla hiksor nātengseng eina thuihaowa.
Saikorawui
Ina vaolaga athumna makashā thāda, athumna vaolala ina mashāmimana, da saikorawui

Kala sur kakhaning eina athumna matheikasā yur saikorawui ngachaili chaiyāngmi kahaina. Hithāda sāda athumna chiho kahai ngalei chi ramchohaoda khipākha zatung zatvā masāmana, kala ringkaphā apam chi ngaleikhamor sāngasak kahaina.”

na hithāda hānga: Ina Zionli latungra, kala Jerusalemwui alungli pamra, kala Jerusalemli ningkatong keinung kala saikorawui
Ashangva̱wui
Kala keinung chiwui chānrei kachida naoshinao mayarnaola sha̱naola ngareokhanganao pemtinghaora.”
Saikorawui
Saikorawui
kala Jerusalemwui alungli ina athumli ungsom ngasakra; kala ningtongda khamashung khangarong eina athum iwui mi sāra, ina athumwui Vare sāra.”
Saikorawui

kaja khare kachāng miwuila, sha̱keiwuila ngalangman maleisāmana, khaung khavāli yangkashibingwui eina ningtāphup kahai maleisāmana. Khikhalajila ina mi kachiva̱li akha eina akha yangshi ngarok ngasaka.
Kha ara, shākkahai mibing hili ridawui thāda masāluimara da saikorawui
Kaja chingri eina yaosangra; drakhārongna athei matheira, ngaleina kashakazā chungmei mira, kazingna ikra̱ tāmira, kala ina saikora hi shākkahai mibingli khuingasakra.
Kala nathum yurbingwui khonshi khavai sākasā chi, O Judah eina Israel shimkhur, ina nathumli huikhuira kala nathum somi kahaia ngasāra. Mangacheealu kha nathumwui pāng pangngasaklu.”
Kaja saikorawui
latluida ina Jerusalem eina Judahli kaphā sami khavai khangarān sāhaira; mangacheealu.
Nathumna saki kaji otbing chi hina; Nathum akha eina akha khamashung tui matui ngaroklu, nathumwui ngaveibingli khamashunga bichar samida chingrihai khavai sālu,
nathumwui wuklungli akha eina akha makaphā sākhavai mamachukphāphaalu; minama shākhi kasā malung machāngalu, khikhalajila hikathā saikora hi ina ningkachai,” da
Kala saikorawui
“Ashangva̱wui
“Saikorawui
keinung akhawui mina keinung akhali vāda hāngra, ‘Ithumna thākta
Miyur kachungkha kala kapanga yur kachungkhana saikorawui
Ashangva̱wui
Damascuswuitungli ngasāmra.
Kaja Aramwui keinung saikora,
Israel shang saikorala,
Chili thari sāda khalei Hamathla thangmeilala Tyre eina Sidonla zanga.
Tyrena raikānphung akha sakāhaira,
kala lupāsā chifa thāda,
sināla shongfawui chifa-chihā ngayāda kazipkhui.
Kha yanglu,
kala awui lan shamadruli horsanghaora,
kala ali mei eina shimān ngasakra.
Gazala chotta reorangra;
Ekronla kachihān maungshungmada chithāra.
Awungana Gazawui eina shimānhaora.
Ashkelonli mi masomluimara.
Khamānga yurna Ashdodli pānra;
kala Philistiawui lāngkaso chi ina ngalat ngasakra.
Mashaikhangayi kashakazā kala ashee kazanga asā athumna mashailuimara,
shākkahai mi saikora Varewui ngasāra,
Judahwui shang kathā ngasāra,
kala Ekronna Jebusnao kathā thāra.
Chiwui thili iwui shimli ina kashina sāda pamra,
chithāda khipānakha mashok mazangpaimara;
singkakharengana athumli khikha masāthukmara,
kaja ina imik eina theihaira.
Pangda vaolu, O Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱!
Yanglu, nawui awunga gadhā alānao akhali tongda nawuili rārāli;
maikhayā kala khayuiya chi alaka,
kala Jerusalemwui eina raisigui ina katathaora.
Kala ngararphungwui malā chi katathaida,
ana yurbingli chingrihai khavai kasora;
Shamadruwui eina thuilaga shamadru vāshungda,
Kong chiwui eina thuilaga okathui akatanga
eina tangda ana mungra.
tara̱ makhalei chomwui eina nawui tuknar kahaibingli ina chihomira.
Nawui raipanli latunglu, O kachihān khalei phātopnaobing;
khanishida mataida hanmira da aja ina hāngtā kahaina.
Kaja Judahli ina malā thāda hunhaira;
Ephraimli chiwui malāthing sāngasakhaira.
Ina nawui naomayarabingli khayitra, O Zion,
nanao mayarabingwuitungli O Greece,
kala nali raimi akhawui khutlai thāda singtitra.
Chiwui thili
kala awui malāthing rikhān thāda vāra;
Proho VAREna talla̱ khongra,
kala azingshongwui sur kakhaningwui ngachaili muivāra.
Saikorawui
kala athumna lunggui eina kahorbingli tukkhuilaga naitāhaora;
kala athumwui ashee drakhāra̱ khamang thāda mangra,
tengkot kapem thāda pemtinghaora,
hanphutwui achikunbing thāda ya̱sophaora.
Chithang
kaja athum awui yaoshangwui mibing kathāna;
kala kuihonwui muktā thāda awui ngaleili horngasakra.
Mha, chi kayākha phā, kayākha mathāra!
Mayar ngalābingli theishirai kala kadhara drakhātheina pangsang ngasakra,
kala mayā ngasakra.
Kazing romi khavai
mayo kachāngwui zingrot atamli,
zingrot muiyā ngakhuikhame
miwui vang kazing rokhame,
mi saikorali luiwui theishirai khameli.
Kaja Teraphimna makakachanga tui matui,
kameo khangasobing kapika,
mang katheibingna kakapikmāng hānga,
ninglum khavai hangphāphai.
Chiwui vang eina mibingna yao thāda ma̱zata,
yaokahoma maleithuda athumna khananga.
“Yaokahomabingli I malungvātshunhaira,
kathānabingli ina tandi mira;
kaja saikorawui
Judahwui shimkhurli saklāk eina yangmi,
kala athumli maikhayā raiphungwui sigui kathā sāngasakra.
Athumwui eina pakra̱ akhoka,
athumwui eina kachonshimwui karhui,
athumwui eina raiwui malā,
athumwui eina awunga shokra.
Athum ngarumlaga raili kapingabing thāda;
yangkashebingli chānrei khangavāttungli nairorra;
kala athumna sigui katongbingli pa̱ngapā ngasakra.”
“Kala Ina Judahwui shimkhur pang ngasakra,
kala ina Josephwui shimkhurli huimira.
Athumli ina khuiungluishitra kaja ina athumli lumashana,
kala athum ina mahorhailakrang kajebing thāra;
kaja I athumwui
kala ina athumli ngahānkāmira.
Chieina Ephraim raikhoka kathā ngasāra,
kala drakhāra̱ khamang thāda ringphāra.
Anaongarāna thuitheida mathānra,
athumwui wuklungna
“Ina athumli machut eina hokhuilaga kazipkhuira,
aja ina athumli ngatangkhui kahaina,
kala achālakhawui kachung chiyākha kāshungra.
Athumli yurbingwui ngachaili chaivāhailala,
ngalei katātāva̱wui eina athumna ili phaningungra,
athumwui naongarāli ngasoda ringra kala latungra.
Ina Egypt ngaleiwui eina athumli shimli thānungra,
kala athumli Assyriawui eina kazipkhuira;
kala athumli ina Gilead kala Lebanonli khuiungra,
apam mangaziranglakha eina tangda.
Athumna Egyptwui shamadru kānkāra,
shamadru mangaphao ngasakmara;
Nilewui kathuthuk thenghaora.
Kala Assyriawui lāngkaso chi nemngasakra;
Egyptwui khānthing shimānhaora.
kala athumna awui mingli tekmatei ngasakra”
da
Nawui khāmong sholu, O Lebanon,
nawui cedarthing mei chuikhavai!
Sifalu, O cypress, kaja cedarthing tekhaira;
kaja tekhamatei thingrong arema sāserhaira.
Sifalu, Bashanwui shirimthing,
kaja ngahong kashāshā wuthaira.
Nganālu, yaokahomabingwui kachapkhon,
kaja athumwui seihomphung chuikhup tāhaira,
kazingkha̱wui kakhangang nganālu;
kaja Jordanwui ngahong sāshimānhaira.
Iwui Vare
Athumli khalobing china taithāta khikha tandi mamimana; kala athumli khayorbingna ‘
“Kaja ngalei hili okathuibingli ina malumashanluimara, da
Chieina I leihkhalon athumwui vang sāthatki kaje yaobingli kahoma ngasāhaira. Kala ina khāmshui khani khuiya; akhale aming Lukhamashan hoi kala akhapale Khokkha hoi. Kala ina yaobingli homa.
Kachāngkhawui alungli ina yaokahoma kathum shimān ngasaka. Kha ina athumli maja̱mirarthuwa, kala athumnala ili yangkharinghaowa.
Chiwui vang eina “I nathumwui yaokahoma masāmara. Thiki kaje chi thihaoranu; shimānhaoki kaje chi shimānhaoranu; kala kataibing china akha eina akha shaingarokhaoranu,” da ina hānga.
Kala Lukhamashan kaho iwui khāmshui chi ina khui kala chi ina sātekhaowa, ina saikorali tuingashit sākahai chi arema sāngasaka.
Chithang eina thuida arema sāhaowa, kala yao leihkhalonbingna ili yanglaga hi
Chieina ina athumli hānga, “Nathumnala mashunga da phaningakha iwui ngalangman milu; maningakha thāhaolu.” Kala athumna iwui ngalangman lupāsā shekel thumra shānmi.
Chieina
Chiwui thili iwui khāmshui kakhane “Khokkha”, chi sāteka, Judah eina Israelwui ngachaili chinaongarāwui khamashit chi sāshimitmihaowa.
Chieina

Kaja yanglu, kashimānbingwui vang ning makakharika, ma̱kazatbingli maphākhuikhame, sheikasha̱abingli mayangkhame, kazāt makhaleibingli mangakuikhame, kha asā kakā kapangshaida akhomareng eina tangda serkakazama yaokahoma akha ina shokngasakra.”
“Makānkhanā iwui yaokahoma,
yao chipen kahai, nali kakhanang ngasāranu!
Awui pāngthei kala yāmikla raighai eina shātranu!
Apang tongda thihaoranu, awui yāmik ngapeochanghaoranu.”
Israelwui pongli
“Yanglu, ina Jerusalem hi kuikhamareili khalei miyurbingwui vang khamalipa tengkot ngasā ngasakra; athumna Jerusalem khuida kuikhanam tharan Judahlila khuihaora.
Chithanghon Jerusalem miyur saikorawui vang ina kharita lunggui sāngasakra; chi kakhānga saikora zakshilāk eina khalatta khamā sāza̱khuira. Kala okathuiwui miyur saikorana rāda ali ngararra.
na hānga, chithang ina sigui kachiva̱li khangachee ning zangngasakra, kala katongbingli pāngasakra. Kha ina miyurbingwui siguimik ngapeo khangasak tharan Judahwuitungli iwui mik rakta yangmira.
Chiwui thili Judahwui shangnaobingna athum khalatta hāngra, ‘Athumwui Vare, saikorawui

“Chithang Judahwui shangnaoli ina ngahongkashā kachuiwui meiwon thāda, māvāmbingwui ngachaili meilā kashār kathā sāngasakra; kala athumna uivāk yāvāk kuimareida khalei miyurbingli mutngasakra; kha Jerusalemli Jerusalemnaobing leipapamra.
“Kala
Chithanghon
Kala chithanghon Jerusalemli khangarara yur saikorali ina shimān khavai phāra.
Chithanghon Jerusalemli chapkhangachā chi Megiddo tampākli Hadad-rimmonli chapngachārei kahai thāra.

Apam chili chapngachāra, shimkhur kachiva̱ kachichāshi chapngachāra; Davidwui shimkhurna ashi khalatta chapngachāra; kala apreiva̱̱ ngarāna athum khalatta chapngachāra; Nathanwui shimkhurna ashi khalatta chapngachāra; kala athum preiva̱̱ ngarāna khalatta chapngachāra,

Levi shimkhurna ashi khalatta chapngachāra kala athum preiva̱̱ ngarāna athum khalatta chapngachāra; Shime-ishi shimkhurna ashi khalatta chapngachāra, kala athum preiva̱̱ ngarāna athum khalatta chapngachāra;
kala shimkhur khangatateila kachichāshi khalatta chapngachāra, kala athum preiva̱̱ ngarāna athum khalatta chapngachāra.
“Morei kala makathar otwui eina samathā khavai, chithanghon David shimkhurwui vang kala Jerusalemnaobingwui vang ura̱ akha shokmira.
“Kala chithanghon ngalei hiwui eina meoma̱bingwui aming ina katathaida athumli maphaningungluimara; kala ngalei hiwui eina marānbing kala makathara manglāla kashamhaora da saikorawui
Kala kachikathāna marān sāda rāluishitakha ali pharākakhuiya ava̱ eina avāva̱na hāngra, ‘Na maringmara, kaja nana
Chithanghon khamahā khamarān chitharan marānbingna chiwui vang khayakra; ana kapik khavai sāhahwui katuma phahon chi masangmara,
kha ana hāngra, ‘I marān maningmana, kha luikhavā mina; kaja ngalei hi nganuilakhawui eina thuida iwui ngasārā kahaina.’
Kala mi kachikathāna, ‘Nawui khumkhorli khamā kakā chi khikhala?’ da ngahānakha ana, ‘Iwui ngasotnaobingwui shimli leilakha sākaza̱na’” jira.
O raighai, iwui yaokahomali thuingasunglu,
ili khangalengpa chili ngasunglu
da saikorawui
“Yaobing chaiyanghai khavai yaokahomapā chili ngaphitlu;
kateonaobingli ina pāng parra.
Ngalei katongawui khum kathumwui khani katathaida shimānhaora,
kakathuma khum chimāng ringra, da
Kala akhum kakathuma hi ina meili sangra,
lupāsā heikakhui thāda heikhuira kala sinā khayāng thāda yāngkhuira.
Athumna iming ngakaora,
kala ina athumli ngahānkāra.
kala ina ‘Athum iwui miyurna’ jira;
kala athumna
Yanglu, nawui eina ngaponkakhui ot chi nawui miktāli ngayarki kaji

Kaja Jerusalemli rai sākhavai yur saikorali ina kazipkhuira, kala keinung chi khuithuihaida, shimla ngaponkhuira, sha̱naobingla sākhamāngmihaora; keinung tangkhai raikathāli vāhaora, kha taikahaibing chili keinungwui eina makatatmara.
Chiwui thili rai sāthang khangarar thāda

Chithanghon awui phei Jerusalemwui mangāli zingshoshong khalei Olive Kaphungli nganingra; kala Olive Kaphung chi khani sāda zingsho eina zingtun ngachaili tampāk kahakva akhana ngakaipakhaora; chieina Phungrei chiwui tangkhai atungshong ngakhunshanghaora, kala tangkhai azingshong ngakhuntāhaora.
Nathumna phungrei khani sāda ngakai khavai tampāk eina yāmshokra; nathumna navā ngarāna Judahwui awunga Uzziahwui thotli neina̱ kakhanukli khayām thāda yāmra. Chiwui thili
Chithang kasik maleimara, phāmla matāmara.
Khangayā mavaimara (chi
Kala

Jerusalemwui azevāk khalei Geba eina thuilaga Rimmon eina tangda ngalei katonga chi tampāk akha onhaora. Kha Jerusalema, Benjaminwui Ngavei eina thuilaga kharewui ngavei vāshung, Achithek Ngavei vāpeida, kala Hananelwui Raikānphung eina thuilaga awungawui drakhāra̱ surkhavaipam vāshungda, awui apamli ngakheikhang eina leipapamra.
Kala chili mi pānra, kaja chili khonkashi maleiluimara; Jerusalem mirai-sārai mavailuimara.
Jerusalemli rai rākatā yurbing saikorali
Kala chithang hakkhamahā khangachee akha
Judah eina tangda Jerusalemli ngararra. Kala kuimareida khalei yur saikorawui lan, sinā, lupāsāla kala kashankachon yāng eina kazipkhuira.
Kala hikathā mimao hi sigui kahaka yur, kateowa yur, ut, gadhā, kala apam chili khalei sāyur saikorawuitungli tāra.
Kala okathuiwui shimkhur kachikathāna saikorawui
Egyptwui shimkhurna athum khalatta marākaakha, chumpha̱ phanit makhamayon yurbingli rekakhareka mimao chi athumwuitungli tāra.
Chumpha̱ phanit mayon khavai makharā Egypt kala yur saikorawui tandi chi hina.
Kala chithanghon siguiwui mareochungtheili “
Kala Jerusalem eina Judahwui ham kachiva̱ saikorawui
Malachina Israelli
kha ina Esauli ningkachai; ina awui shimlui chi khikha masākhavai kaphung sāngasakmi kala awui shimlui chi lamhāngli kazata ramfali mihaowa.”
Kalikha Edomna, “Ithumli sākhayānghaira, kha sākhayāng kahai chi ithumna sakāluishitra” da hāngakha, saikorawui
Nathum khalattawui mikna hi theira, kala nathumna, “Israelwui thari kanvāda
“Naomayarana avāva̱li khayāshi, kala raona akhavāli khayāshi. Chithākha, I avāva̱ akhana jilaga ili khayākashi kali leili? Kala I akhavā akhana jiakha ili khangachee kali leikhala? da saikorawui
Khamakhao kashakazā eina iwui hanphutli pha̱ya. Laga nathumna ithumna chi kathāda makhao ngasakhala? da hānga. Chi kaphaning eina

Nathumna pha̱kaphayāli khangapeo sāyur kachigat chi makaphā maningmala? Kala pheikatek, kakazā kachigat chi makaphā maningmala? Chi nathumwui lammungali miyanglu; ana nathumli penrala, kala lumashanmingairala?” da saikorawui
Ara Varewui lukhamashan polu, chieina ana ithumli lumashanmipaira. Nathumwui hikathā kachigat hieina ana nathumli lumashanmipairala? da saikorawui

Iwui hanphutpamli aremawui vang mei mathot khavai nathumwui ngachaili khāmong shungmi khavai mi akhamangla leisasi kaja chong! Ina nathumli ringkaphā maleimana, kala nathumwui pāng eina kachigat akhala makhuisangmara da saikorawui

Khikhalajila zimik kashok eina thuilaga katun eina tangda yurbingwui ngachaili iwui ming hakkhamahāna, kala apam kachida nganamkaphā thao chi iwui mingli chigata, kala kathara kachigat mi; khikhalajila yurbingwui ngachaili iwui ming hakkhamahāna da saikorawui
Kha nathumna
“Hi kayākha kachot ot khala” da nathumna hānga, kala ili khamor chipita da saikorawui
Kakapika, awui yaoshangli yaovā akha khalei chi thumhailaga achukmakapei chi
Ara, O pāngmonbing, ningkhami hi nathumwui vangna:

Nathumna manganāsangakha, iwui mingli tekhamatei mikhavai wuklungli mahaiakha, khonkashi chi ina nathumwuitungli chihorāra kala nathumli somi kahai chili ina khonshira; kachangkhat hangga jiakha ina athumli khonshihaira, kachiwui vangkhala kaja chi nathumna wuklungli mahaimana da saikorawui
Yanglu, nathumwui ara̱-azāli ina maishi ngasakra, kala nathumwui maili nathumna kachigat sāyurwui paih neomira, kala ina nathumli iwui eina khuishokhaora.
Chieina ningkhami hi ina nathumli chihokharāna kaji theira, kaja ina Levili tuingashit sākahai chi nganingchingra da saikorawui

Khamashung tui hāngkachithei chi awui khamorli lei, kala awui morchaili khangui khikha masamphangmana. Chingri kahai eina mashunli ana ili ngasozata, kala khayonkhamāngwui eina kachungkhali latung ngasaka.
Khikhalajila pāngmon akhawui morchai eina theikakhui chi mayonphalungra, kala mibingna awui khamorwui eina hāngkachithei chi phāphalungra, kaja a saikorawui
“Kha nathumna apong chiwui vang eina mai ngareithuihaira; nathumna hāngkachithei china mi kachungkhali konglui ngasakhaira; kala Leviwui tuingashit chi makhao ngasakhaira, da saikorawui
Iwui tui makhamayon chiyākha kala mijang sāda tamkachithei chiwui athishurda inala nathumli miwui mangāli yangkharingda maishi ngasakra.”
Ithum saikora avāva̱ akhawui maningmala? Vare akhamāngna ithumli kasā maningmala? Chithākha ithumwui avāngarāwui tuingashit chi horhailaga khiwui vang ithum akha eina akha mashitsang ngarokthukhala?
Judahna mashitsangthura, kala khamakhao ot chi Israel eina Jerusalemwui lungli sāhaira; kaja
Hikatha kasā mi chili
Kala nathumna hila sai, nathumna
Khisāda mayangsangmithukhala? da nathumna ngahāna. Khikhalajila nana yāronlakha tuingashit sālaga napreiva̱̱ kala nawui ngasokapamva̱ sāra da khuikahaiva̱ napreiva̱li ningtongda maleikashiwui vang

Akhamang kaje Vare china Ithumli semhailaga kharing manglā china ithumli ringkhangasak maningmala? Kala ana khi ningchangkhala? Vareli kaphaninga ara̱-azā china. Chieina nathum khalatta ngasharlu, kala khipānakha awui yaronlakhawui preiva̱̱ chili khayāmakashi masaaranu.
“Khikhalajila ngalā kapāng hi ina ningkachaiya” da Israelwui
Nathumwui tuina
Kha ana kharā zimiksho chili khipāna khāngshaprakhala, kala a kharā tharan khipāna nganingshapra?
Kaja a hiya sharkha̱wui mei kathāna, kala kachon khangasa̱wui sāpon kathāna;
ana marisā kala lupāsā khalanga thāda pamra, kala ana Leviwui naomayarali samathākhuira, kala athumna
Chiwui thili Judah eina Jerusalemwui kachigat chi achālakhawui kala kharekumwui thāda

“Chiwui thili nathumli bichar sākhavai ina rānganaira; ina sha̱ khangasobing, shām kasābing, kapikta shākhi kasābing, ngalangman mamila singkakharengbing, marānao, ra̱meinaoli malukhamashanbing, kha̱ram kazatabingli kakashambing kala ili makhangacheebingwuitungli mashun shākhi mira da saikorawui
“Kaja iya makhangachei
Nawo ngarāwui eina thuilaga nathumna iwui ningkhami mamayonla shiyan chikanwui eina mai ngareithuihaira, ili latunglu, chieina ina nathumli latungra, da saikorawui
Mikumona Vareli ngaponpaila? Kha nathumna ili ngaponkhuida lei. Laga nathumna ithumna nawui eina kathāda ngaponkhuikhala? ji. Nathumwui tithe kala kachigat khamilina.
Nathumli khonshāt akha khonshihaira, kachiwui vangkhala kaja nashi yur katongana ili ngaponda lei,
kazip khavai shimli tithe peida khuirālu, chieina iwui shimli zākhavai kashakazā leisāra; kala chili ili chāng yanglu, da saikorawui
Nathumwui heiun shimān khangasaka chili ina machinda nathumwui luiwui theishirai masākazamara, kala luiwui drakhārongna athei makhamathei mavaimara da saikorawui
Chieina yur saikorana nathumli somi kahaia yurna da hora, kaja nathum ringkaphā ngalei ngasāra, da saikorawui
“Nathum iwuitungli zakkashi tui matuihaira,” da saikorawui
Nathumna hānga, ‘Vareli otram khangatha̱ makānāmana. Awui kakaso khamayon kala saikorawui
Arui eina thuilaga ithumna langkasoli sokhame jira; makaphākasaana ringkaphāmang maningla Vareli chāng yanglala kalākashi maleimana da khuira.’”
Chiwui thili
“Athum iwui ngasāra, kala ina ot kasā tharan iwui shimlui ngasāra, kala mi akhana ali otram ngatha̱khame anaomayarali yangkhami thāda inala athumli yangmira, da saikorawui
Chiwui thili akhashida nathumna khamashung khangarong eina makaphā makhayā, Vareli otram khangatha̱ eina makhangatha̱ mibingwui khangatei nathumna theikhuira.

“Kaja yanglu, sharkha̱ thāda kachuiya zimiksho akha rāra; chithang lāngkaso kala makaphā kasābing lanji thāhaora; rārāda khalei zimiksho china chibing chuikhuphaida angayungla, aphāngla mashākmimara da saikorawui
Kha iwui mingli khangacheea nathumwui vanga kazāt raikhavai angachāng kakā khamashung khangarongwui zimik akha shokra. Seinaona seishimwui eina ngalongkashok thāda nathumna ngalongkāra.
Nathumna makaphā makhayābingli naishānra, kaja ina thuingatha̱thang athum nathumwui pheimayāzingli khalei hotla ngasāhaora da saikorawui
“Iwui rao Moseswui ain, Israel ashangva̱ wui vang Horebli ali ningmi kahai, shiyan chikan kala ainbing chi phaningunglu.
Kala ana avāva̱ ngarāwui ning chi anao ngarāwuili ngareivā ngasakra, kala anaongarāwui ning avāva̱ ngarāwuili ngareiung ngasakra, maningakha ina rāda ngalei chili khonkashi eina sāshimānhaipaishina.”
Abrahamna Isaacli, Isaacna Jacobli, Jacobna Judah kala achinā ngarāli pharai.
Judah preiva̱ Tamarna Perez eina Zerahli, Perezna Hezronli, Hezronna Ramli pharai.
Ramna Amminadabli, Amminadabna Nashonli, Nahshonna Salmonli pharai.
Salmon preiva̱ Rahabna Boazli, Boaz preiva̱ Rutna Obedli, Obedna Jesseli pharai.
Jessena David awungali, Davidwui nao Solomonli Uriahwui preiva̱ sākasāva̱na pharai.
Solomonna Rehobomli, Rehobomna Abijahli, Abijahna Asali pharai.
Asana Jehoshaphatli, Jehoshaphatna Joramli, Joramna Uzziahli pharai.
Uzziahna Jothamli, Jothamna Ahazli, Ahazna Hezekiahli pharai.
Hezekiahna Manassehli, Manassehna Amonli, Amonna Josiahli pharai.
Babylonli khuikhavā atamli Josiahna Jechoniah eina achinā ngarāli pharai.
Babylonli khuivā kahaiwui thili Jechoniahna Shealtielli, Shealtielna Zerubbabelli pharai.
Zerubbabelna Abiudli, Abiudna Eliakimli, Eliakimna Azorli pharai.
Azorna Zodokli, Zodokna Achimli, Achimna Eliudli pharai.
Eliudna Eleazarli, Eleazarna Matthanli, Mathanna Jacobli pharai.
Kala Jacobna Messiah kaho Jishuwui ava̱ Maryli kakhuiya Josepli pharai.

Hithada sāda Abrahamwui eina thuilaga David tāshungda saikora chi mithot tharāda matina, kala Davidwui eina haophoklaga Babylonli khuikhavā tāshungda mithot tharāda matina kala Babylonli khuikhavā eina haophoklaga Messiah kapharā tāshungda mithot tharāda matina.
Agahara Joseph mashun mi ngasāhaoda Maryli makhayak ngasakngaithuda ngathumsāda ali pānghaorada khangarān sai.

Kha ana hiwui pongli machukta leilakha, yanglu, Prohowui kazingrao akhana awui mangshongli rāhānga, “Davidwui naomayara, Joseph, napreiva̱ Maryli khuikida mangacheealu, kaja ana vaida khalei chi Manglā Katharawui pangshap einana.
Ana naomayara akha pharāra, nana awui ming Jishu phokra, kaja ana awui mibingli athumwui moreiwui eina huikhuira.”
Prohona marānwui khamor eina matui kahai chi ungshung khavai saikora hi rākashokna.
“Yanglu, mafakathui sha̱nao akhana nao vaida mayarnao akha pharāra, kala awui ming Emmanuel phokra” (hiwui kakhalata Varena ithumli ngasomi) kajina.
Chiwui thili Josephna kapiwui eina ngakarthuilaga Prohowui kazingrao china ali sāluda hāngkhami athishurda Maryli ngakumhaowa.
Kha apreiva̱na nao chi mapharāranglakha eina tangda ali phasā mangasomana kala nao chiwui aming Jishu phokmi.
“Pharā kahaia Jihudibingwui awunga chi kali leikhala? Kaja ithumna awui sirā zingshoshong theihaida ali khorum khavai kharāna.”
Herod awungana tui chi shālaga ningkashaklakhaowa kala Jerusalemli khalei mibing saikoranala chithāhaowa.
Ana pāngmon akhokabing eina yaruiwui ain kathembingli hokhuiserlaga, “Khrista chi kali pharāki kajikhala?” da ngathinga.
‘Judah ngaleili khaleiya O, Bethlehem,
nava Judahwui keinungbingwui ngachaili teomeikap kaje khamunga maningmana;
kaja khamunga akhavā akha nawui eina shokta iwui miyur Israelli mungra.’”
Chiwui thili Herodna maheikathembingli ngathumda hokhuilaga sirā chi katharān shokkhala da ngahānshingkhuiya;
laga ana athumli Bethlehemli chihovāda hānga, “Vālu kala angangnao chili ningkachang eina phākhuilu kala nathumna ali phākhui kahai tharān ilila pao unghānglu, chieina inala ali akhorumpaira.”
Awungana kahāng chi athumna nganākhui kahaiwui thili zathaowa, kala yanglu, athumna zingshoshong theikahai sirā china angangnaona khalei apam chili mavāngasāmranglakha eina tangda athumli rizata.
Sirā chi kathei tharan athum khamathānna pemtinghaowa.

Athumna shimli kazang eina angangnao chi ava̱ Maryli ngasoda thei, chieina athumna khuktizangda akhoruma. Chiwui thili athumna athumwui otrom pheilaga ali sinā kala nganamkaphā thao frankincense eina myrrh chigata.

Athum zatkahaiwui thili yanglu, Prohowui kazingrao akhana mangshong Josephli ramahāda hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, angāngnao eina ava̱li khuiphungda Egyptli yāmvaulu, kala ina pao mashirātranglakha eina tangda chili pamsālu; kaja Herodna angangnao chili sāthat khavai phāki jiura.”
Chieina Josephna ngakarthuida angangnao eina ava̱va̱li thānphungda Egyptli vākhavai ngayāshong zatthuwa.
Herod mathiranglakha eina tangda chili pama. Hi Prohona marānwui khamor eina matuishok kahai, “Inaomayarali Egyptwui eina ina hoshoka” kaji ungshung khavaiwui vangna.

Chiwui thili maheikathembingna ali awor sākahaina da kathei eina Herod malungvātlakhaowa. Chieina Bethlehemli kala chiwui ruinganaili khalei naomayara kum khani kākahai kala chiwui azingli khalei saikorali shaothat khavai hukhum mida shaothatserhaowa; kashok otshot hi ana maheikathembingwui eina ngahānshingkakhui atam chiwui eina shānkhuilaga kasāna.
Hithada Jeremiah marānna hānghaikasā chi ungshunghaowa:
lungrin chapkhangachākhon.
Rachelna awui naongarābingwui vang chapta hāngkaphanepla makhuisang,
khikhalajila athum thishumhaowa.”
“Ngakarthuilu, angangnao eina ava̱va̱li thānphungda Israelwui ngaleili ungulu. Angangnao chili sāthat khavai kaphā athum thihaira.”
Chieina ana ngakarthuilaga angangnao eina ava̱va̱li thānphungda Israel ngaleili unghaowa.
Kha Archelausna avāva̱ Herodwui mahut shinda Judeali mungda lei kaji Josephna kashā tharan apam chili ungzangkida ngacheehaowa, kala ali mangshong rāhāngchitheimihaoda Galilee ngaleivāk unghaowa.
Ana Nazareth kaho keinung akhali vāpāna, chi marānbingna “Ali Nazarene hora” da hāngmarānhaikasā chi ungshung khavaina.
“Ningngateilu, kaja kazing wungram nganaishunhaira.”
John hi Isaiah marānna hānghaikasā;
“Kachikathāna lamhāngli vaozata,
‘Prohowui shongfa ngarānlu,
awui apong ngatar ngasaklu’” kaji china.
Chitharan Jerusalemli, Judea katongali kala Jordan kongwui kuikhamareili khalei kha̱ saikorawui eina mi tarākha awui ngalemli rai.
Athumna athumwui morei hāngphatta ana athumli Jordan kongli ra̱hikmi.
Nathum khalatta ningngateichaohaira kaji otsak eina chitheilu,
kala nathum khalatta ‘Ithumwui avāva̱ Abraham lei’ da maphaninghaialu; ina nathumli kahāngna kaja ngalungbing hiwui eina Varena Abrahamli nao kachungkha semmishapa.
Aruila thingrongbingwui angayungli ngahā parhaida lei. Chieina athei khamathā makhamathei thingrong kachiva̱ ta̱teklaga meilungli horsanghaora.

Ning khangateiwui vang ina nathumli tara̱ eina ra̱hikmi, kha iwui thili rārāda khalei A chiya ili reimei, I awui pheihop phungkida matik machāmana. Ana nathumli Manglā Kathara kala mei eina ra̱hikmira.”
Awui pāngli yāmkok lei kala lanpumli khalei mā hurmathākhuida kapanga mā chi chumli kazipkhuira, kha ahikbing chi mashimitkapai meilungli riktāhaora.
Kha Johnna awui ning suitā ngasakida, “Ili nana ra̱hikmitha̱ki kajina, laga nali ra̱hikmi khavai ili rāli?” da hānga.
Kha Jishuna ali ngahānkai, “Hithāsāhaoranu! kaja Varena ngarān kahai chi ungshung khavai hi sāngayilaka.” Chieina Johnna mayāhaowa.
Jishuli ra̱hikmihailaga tara̱wui eina shokkhaleoda yanglu, kazingram shoda Varewui Manglā chi nasha̱ thada awuitungli tākapa̱ chi ana thei.
Kala yanglu kazingramwui eina akhon akha vaorai, “Hi Iwui khaluma Naomayarana, Ina ali ningyāng unglaka.”
Kala ana ngashun ngayā hangmatithang khumpama, chiwui thili A thaihaowa.
Chieina chipeena ali rāsuida hānga, “Na Varewui Naomayarana jiakha ngalunggui hi khamui onkhavai kasolu.”
kala ali hānga, “Na Varewui Naomayarana jiakha nakhalatta ngawoktālu; kaja hithada kapihaida lei;
‘Nali yangmi khavai Varena awui kazingraobingli kasora,
athumwui pāng eina nali khāngkhuira.
Chithada napheila lungguili masāza̱khuimara.’”
Chipee china ali kaphung kajuiva̱ akhali khuikāluishita kala okathuili khalei wungram saikora chitheida chiwui tekhamatei ngashānyang ngasaka;
kala ali hānga, “Nana ili ngakhumshāmda khorumhaiakha nali ina saikora hi mira.”
Ana Nazarethli mapamluila Zebulun eina Nephtaliwui leiretlungli kazanga shamadrupheili khalei Capernaumli vāpama.
Hi Isaiah marānna hāngkahai chi ungshung khavaina:
Jordan kankāda shamadru vākhavai shong,
Gentilewui Galilee—
Tangkhamanglungli pamda khaleibingna
kahor kahaka akha thei.
kala leiret chili kapambing eina kathi khaya̱li khaleibingwuitungli
kahor china hormihaira.”
“Ningngateilu, kaja kazing wungram nganaishunhaira.”
Ana anili “Ithi shurlu, ina nanili mi kaphā mi sāngasakra” da hānga.
Chieina ngalāngda aniwui khaihlan hortāhailaga ali shurthuwa.
Chiwui eina zatmamānlaga khangatei chinaoni Zebedeewui naomayara James eina agato Johnla avāva̱ Zeebedeeli ngasoda athumwui marikhonglungli athumwui khaihlan khopkasā theida anilila hoi.
Hengsāda avāva̱ eina marikhong chi nothāhailaga shurthuwa.

Chithada sāda Syria ngalei saikorali awui mingzat chi ngayaovāserhaowa. Chieina athumna kazātyur ayāyāva̱ eina kakazā kala kazāda chotchāng kahai mibing, kameo kazangbing, zingmeirai kakazābing kala sheikasha̱bing awuili khuirai kala ana raimisera.
Galilee, Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea kala Jordan kānkāda kapāna mi kachungkha china ali shurzata.
Ana tui yirphokta athumli tamchitheida hānga:
khikhalajila kazing wungram chi athumwuina!
khikhalajila athumli Varena ringphā ngasakra!
khikhalajila athumna okathui chi mathunkhuira!
khikhalajila athumli ningyang ungngasakra!
Lumashankatha̱bing chi sokhamina,
khikhalajila athumna lukhamashan samphangra!
khikhalajila athumna Vareli theira!
Chingrihai khavai kasābing chi sokhamina,
khikhalajila athumli Varewui naongarā hora!
khikhalajila kazing wungram chi athumwui ngasāra!
“Iwui vang eina mibingna minamda khamashāt, rekakharek kala phenphāphāda morei chiphunkahaibing nathum sokhamina.
Mathānlu kala ringphālu, khikhalajila kazingramli nathumwui sāman haklaka, kaja hikathāwui vang eina nathumli rida leikasā marānbinglila rekhareksai.
Lha mibingna thaomei sharlaga luk eina makhumhaimana. Kha thaomei sharkhavai meishongli haida shimlungli khalei saikorana kahor samphanga.
Nathumwui kahor chi mibingwui mangāli horngasaklu, chithākha athumna nathumwui kaphā otsak chi theilaga kazingramli khalei nathumwui Avāli masochikatra.
“Ain eina marān tui chi shimān ngasakida I kharāna da maphaningalu. Chi shimān ngasakida kharā maningla kha chi ungshung ngasak khavai I kharāna.
Ina nathumli kachangkhat eina kahāng hina, kazingram eina okathui mashimānranglakha eina tangda kala sāki kaji ot saikora masākupranglakha eina tangda ainwui mayekkainao akhala mashimānlakmara.

Kachikathāna ningkhami paimeikap kajili mahengsanglaga ana kateibingli chi tākam eina sālu da tamchitheiakha mi chi kazing wungramli teomeikap kaja ngasāra. Kha saikora khamayona kala tamkachithei mi chili kazing wungramli khareia ngasā ngasakra.
Kaja ina nathumli kahāngna, kaja ain kathema eina Phariseebingli nathumna mamashungmeirarakha kachilikha nathum kazing wungramli mazangrarmara.

Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, kachikathāna khi ngalangkha maleila achināli malungvātakha ali bichar sāphalungra. Kachikathāna achināli yomtui matuiakha ali hanga̱shimli khuikāra kala kachikathāna ‘Makānkhana mangkhama̱ mi!’ da phorakha meifali horsangra.
Chiwui vang eina nana hanphutpamli nawui kachigat chigatkida leilakha nachināna nali makhamayā leili da phaningungakha,
nawui chigat khavai chi hanphut mangāli haisālu, hanunglaga rimeithuida nachināli ngashimkhuifalu. Chiwui thili rālaga rāchigatnaolu.
Ina nali kachangkhat eina kahāngna, nana leiman chi marunkupranglakha eina tangda nali kachilikhala phātopwui eina machishotlakmara.
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, sha̱naoli phasāwui khamathang mikyan eina khayang mi kachiva̱ sha̱nao chili awui wuklungli rida phophāhaira.
Nawui yāmikna nali morei sāngasakta leiakha chi latshoklaga horhaolu. Nawui phasā tongtingda meifali horsanghaoki kajile naphasākai akha kashimāna phāmei.
Nawui yāpangna nali morei sāngasakakha chi katatlaga horhaolu. Naphasā tongtingda meifali horsangki kajile naphasākai akha kashimāna phāmei.
Kha ina nathumli kahāng hina, kachikathāna phokaphāwui vang maningla apreiva̱li pānghaiakha ana preiva̱li phokaphāva̱ sāngasaka; kala pāngkahai preiva̱li khangakuma mipā chi phophāhaira.
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, tuingashit kasā tharan shākhi masālakalu, kazingwui ming singdala shākhi masālakalu, khikhalajila chiya Varewui pamkhavaina;
ngaleiwui ming singdala shākhi masālakalu, khikhalajila chiya awui phei naikhavaina. Jerusalemwui mingla masingalu, khikhalajila hi kahaka Awungawui keinungna,
kala nakui singdala shākhi masāalu, kaja nana sampā akha eina tangda zikkhangasakla, charkhangasakla masārarmana.
‘Ya’ jikha jilu, ‘Ngga’ jiakha jilu; chili lāngda khamatui chi makaphāwui eina kashokna.
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna: Nali khalāng ot sākahaia chili athut makhuialu, kha namaisor yāshong kapheakha lākhavākla ngareimilu.
Kachikathāna nawui phahonwui vang nali kārotli khuivaakha nawui coatla minarhaolu.
Kachikathāna nali awui ot kilometer akha phungvāmi khavai tandi saakha kilometer khani phungvāmilu.
Nali kapo mi chili milu kala nawui eina shukka kaje chili chishutlu.”
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumwui yangkasheli leishilu kala rekakharekabingwui vang seihā sāmilu.
Chithākha nathum kazingramli khaleiya nathumwui Avāwui naongarā ngasāpaira; kaja ana kaphālila makaphālila zimik shokmi kala khamashungalila, makhamashungalila kazing rotāmi.
Nathumwui leikashemāngli nathumna leishiakha khi sāman samphangrakhala? Khājanā khalokabingnala chithada masāmalā?
Nathumna nachi nāngarāmāngli ngahānngaiakha kateibingli nathumna mataimeida kasā khi leikhala? Vareli makatheibingnala chithada masāmalā?
Chiwui vang eina kazingli khaleia nathumwui Avāna kākashung chithada nathumla kāshungphalungra.”
“Chiwui vang eina nana kachikathā khavāta mi akhali khangachon khami tharan phākakhaningabingna synagogueli kala chānreili mibingna sovairanu da kasā thada yaruili masāchitheizatalu.
Kha nana lemmet khami tharan, nawui yāshongna kasā chi nawui uishongli mathei ngasakalu,
chithākha nawui lemmet khami chi khangathumli lei kala ngathumda katheia nathumwui Avāna nali sāman mira.
Kha nana seihā kasā tharan nawui kāli zangda khamong shunghailaga mik eina makathei nathumwui Avāli seihā sālu, kala ngathum kahai saikora katheia nathumwui Avā china nali sāman mira.
Athum mathālu kaja nathumna maporanglakha nathumwui khavāt chi nathumwui Avāna thei.
Chieina hithada seihā sālu:
‘Kazingramli khaleia ithumwui Avā, Naming tharmathengmeiranu,
Nawui wungram rāshungmilu;
Kazingramli khavai thada,
Okathuilila nawui ning eina vaimilu.
Aja ithumli thangthangwui kashakazā chi khamilu;
Ithumli khayonkhamāng kasābingli ithumna pheomi kahai thada,
Ithumwui khayonkhamāngla kapheomilu;
kha makaphāwui eina kanmilu.’
Kha nathumna mibingwui khayonkhamāng mapheomiakha, nathumwui Avānala nathumwui khayonkhamāng mapheomimara.
Kha nathumna kakhum tharan akuili thaola neolu kala maila ngatāpkhariklu.
Chieina nathumwui kakhum chi mina maningla kha ngathumda khaleia nathumwui Avāna theira; kala ngathumda katheia nathumwui Avāna nathumli sāman mira.
Kha nathum khalattawui vang kazingramli lan kaziphailu, chili aga̱-akainala mashaimara, maripaihla mapaimara kala khalebingnala shaokhaida maleekhuimara.
Kaja nathumwui lan khaleipamli nathumwui ningla leira.
kha namik mamathingakha naphasā katonga tangmangtinghaora. Chieina nawuili khalei kahor chi tangmanghaiakha, tangkhamang chi kayākha hakmahākhala!
Kazingramli yongkazat vānaobingli yanglu, athumna khayaola, kahātla, chumli kazip kahaila maleimana. Chithālala kazingramli khalei nathumwui Avāna athumli mizai. Nathumna athumli aman masakmeimalā?
Nathumwui ngachaili khipāna malungringhaoda awui mirin angaritli khuiningkha mataisangshapkhala?
“Khiwui vang eina nathumna kashankachonwui vang malungringkhala? Luiwui timrāwonbing kathada haksangkhala da machukyanglu, athum otla masāmana, sakla masāmana.
Chithālala ina nathumli kahāngna, Solomon eina tangda chiyākha tekmateida okthuisālala, awon akhawui khamathā thada mangavairarmana.
Luili aja wonlaga akhama meilungli horsanghaokikaje awonrongbingli Varena chiyākha mathada sāmiakha, nathumli ana sakmataimeikharda masāmimaralā? O, shitkasang kateoabing!
“Chiwui vang eina ‘Ithum khi zāra?’ lah ‘Khi mangra?’ lah ‘Khi ngavairakhala?’ da malungmaringalu.
Kaja Gentilebingna katonga hi phāzata; kala nathumna saikora hi darkar sai kaji nathumwui kazingramwui Avāna thei.
Kha rimeikapta, nathumna Varewui wungram kala awui khamashung khangarong chi phārifalu, chithākha saikora hi nathumli ngarumsangmira.
Chiwui vang eina akhamawui vang malungmaringalu, akhamana akhamawui vang malungringhaora. Thangthangwui kakhanang chi thathangwui vang shapranu.
Kaja nathumna bichar kasā tākam eina nathumlila bichar sāra, kala nathumna kateili khān katamyākha nathumlila tamra.
Khisāda nachināwui mikli khayim kazang chi theilaga namikli thingngumrikha kazang chi matheithukhala?
Lha namikli thingngumrikkha zanglaga kathada nachināli, namikli khayim kazang chi ina kheimiga da hāngpairakhala?
He, phākakhaninga! Rimeikapta namikli thingngumrikha kazang khayim chi kheishokhaifalu, chiwui thili nachināwui mikli kazang khayim chi kheishokmi khavai mathingrik eina theira.
“Kathara ot chi fali mamialu, athumna hanungda makeipaishina; kala khayingmukta chi hokwui mangāli mahorsangalu, athumna naikazazamlaga naiphumhaipaishina.
Kaja kapo mi kachiva̱na samphangra kala kaphā mi china samphangra kala kashaoalila shomira.
Lha nathumwui ngachaili avāva̱ khipāna anaomayarana khamui poakha ngalunggui mikhala?
Kala ana khaih poakha ali phara̱ mida?
Nathum maphāsālala nathumwui naongarāli khamathā ot mitheiakha, kazingramli khaleia nathumwui Avāna ali kapobingli kayākha mataimeida mirakhala?
Kharing mirinli thanvā khavai ngavei chiya masha̱laka, kala shongfa chi saklaka kala chi mi kateokhamāngna phākhuiya.
Nathumna athumwui kasākhavā eina theikhuira. Ka̱shātrongli drakhāthei kala kuivārongli khaorāthei mamatheingayaomana.
Chithada sāda khamathā thingrong kachiva̱na kaphā athei mathei, kha makaphā thingrongna zakkashi athei mathei.
Khamathā thingrongna zakkashi athei mamatheipaimana, lah zakkashi thingrongna khamathā athei mamatheipaimana.
Khamathā athei makhamathei thingrong kachiva̱ ta̱teklaga meilungli horsanghaora.
Chithada sāda athumli nathumna athumwui athei chieina theira.

Chithanghon mi kachungkhana ili ‘Proho, Proho, ithumna nawui sāshap-pangshap chieina mamarānmala? Kala nawui pangshap eina kameo makashamshokmala? Nawui sāshap-pangshap chiwui alungli ithumna matakhak kahai tarākha masāmala?’ da hāngra.
Chieina ina athumli, ‘Nathumli I matheisālakmana, iwui eina thulu, makaphā kasābing’ da hāngra.
kazing roda tara̱ phonga kala masinala shim chili panglāk eina ungphanza̱ya, kha shim chi maja̱mana khiwui vangkhala jilaga shim chi lunghārtungli sakā kahaina.
Kha iwui tuibing hi shākhuilaga chi makasā mi kachiva̱ chiya awui shim situitungli sākā kahaia mangkhama̱a mi kathāna.
Kazing roda tara̱ phonga kala masina shim chili ungphankaza̱ eina shim chi ja̱tāhaowa.”
Kaja ain kathembingna tamkachithei mathāla ana sāshap-pangshap eina tamchithei.
Jishuna phungreiwui eina katā tharan mi kachungkhana awui thi shura.
Chieina Jishuna awui pāng katingvāda ali saza̱da hānga, “Ina sāmilakra, tharchaohaolu.” Ngalāngda awui khangaphār chi tharhaowa.
Jishuna ali hānga, “Khipālikha mahāngalu, kha vālu, nawui phasā chi pāngmonli achitheilu, kala mibingna theikhui khavai Mosesna kaso kahai chigatki kaji chi achigatlu.”
