“Amei, iwui rao akha phasā ngakaida thihailaga marlak eina kazāda shimli pida lei.”
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Ina rāda raimira.”
Kha shipai shākhawui akhavā china ali ngahānkai, “Amei, nali iwui shimli chizunki kaji iwui matik maningmana; kha thada tui chimāng hāngmimalu, china iwui rao raihaora,

kaja ila iwui azingli shipai ngavālaga akhavābingwui azingli ot kasā mina, kala iwui azinglila raimi tarākha lei; kala ina akhali ‘Vālu’ jiakha ana vai, kala khangatei akhali ‘Rālu’ jiakha ana rai kala iwui raoli ‘Hi sālu’ jiakha ana chi sai.”
Jishuna chi kashā eina matakhakhaida athi kashurabingli hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, Israelnaobingwui alungli ina hikathā shitkasang masamphanglakmana.
Ina nathumli kahāngna, mi kachungkha zingsho zingtunwui eina rāda kazing wungramli Abraham, Isaac kala Jacobli phazārumra,
kha wungramwui naomayarabingli khamayara tangkhamang horshokhaora, apam chili athum kachapla chapra kala ahāla tarira.”
Jishuna shipai akhavā chili hānga, “Ungulu, kala nawui shitkasang athishurda shokranu.” Kala rao chi pung chichang chili raichaohaowa.
Jishuna awui pāngli sākaza̱ eina kakharur chi raihaowa. Chieina ana ngakarthuida otram ngatha̱mi.
Chithang ngazin kameo kazanga mi kachungkha awuili khuirai kala ana tuikhurnao akha eina kameobing chi kashamshokserhaowa, kala kakazā saikora raimisera.
Hi Isaiah marānna “Ana ithumwui kakazā saikora khuithuimiya kala ithumwui kazāt saikora phungmiya” da hāngkahai ungshung khavaina.
Kala ain kathema akhana ali rāhānga, “Ojā, nana kazazatpam kachida I nathi shurga.”
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Ramfawui akhurla lei, khamasaili yongkazata vānaobingwui athipla lei, kha miwui Naomyarawui ngayaizangda ngasāmkhui khavai apam akhala maleimana.”
Khangatei sākhangatha̱ akhana ali hānga, “Amei, rida ishāvāli ungchifahaifaga.”
Kala yanglu, shamadruli siphan zingrot panglāk eina ngasha̱ungda marikhong chi tara̱ khangaphaona ngaphumki jihaowa, kha Jishuva piphuphaira̱sai.
Chieina athumna ali amathotkhuida hānga, “Amei, ithumli kanmilu, ithum shimānki jiura.”
Mi kachiva̱ matakhakhaida hāngngaroka, “Hi kachikathā mikhala? Masi kala shamdru eina tangda awui kahāng nganāli.”
Jishuli samphangkhaleoda anina vaoda hānga, “He Varewui Naomayara, inili nana khi sāki kajikhala? Atam maungshungranglakha nana inili rekharek khavai apam hili kharālā?”
Atam chitharan athumwui eina katāda hok ashangva̱ akha phāzāzatta leisai.
Chieina ali kameobing china, “Nana ithumli kashamshokra jiakha hok ashangva̱ chili khavāzang ngasakmilu” da poi.
“Thulu” da Jishuna athumli hānga, chieina athumna shoklaga hokshang chili vāzanghaowa. Kala yanglu, hokshangva̱ chi shamadruphei amaitarenli yongkachuptāda tara̱li hikthatserhaowa.
Hok kahombing china keinungli ngasamunglaga kashok otshot saikora kala kameo kazanga khani chili khi shokhaokhala kaji unghāngchithei.
Yanglu, keinung chiwui mi katonga Jishuli ngarok khavai shoka; kala athumna ali kathei eina aramwui eina thuimihaolu da athumna rāpoi.
Yanglu, athumna awuili sheikasha̱ mi akha pet eina phonda ngazonrai. Jishuna athumwui shitkasang chi theilaga sheikasha̱pā chili hānga, “Pingmeilu, inaomayara! Nawui morei pheomihaira.”
Kala yanglu, ain kathembing kaikhana athum khalatta hāngngaroka, “Mipā hi kachipat tui matuida lei.”
Chieina Jishuna athumwui kaphaning chi theida hānga, “Nathumwui wuklungli khisāda makaphā ning phaningphāphākhala?
‘Nawui morei pheomihaira’ da kahāng phāmeikā, ‘Ngakarthuida zatulu’ da kahāng phāmeirakhala?
Kha hi okathuili miwui Naomayarana morei pheomikashap pangshap leiya da nathumna theikhui khavaina.” Chiwui thili ana sheikasha̱ chili hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, nawui pet ngava̱khuida shimli ungulu.”
Chieina ana ngakarthuida shimli unghaowa.
Yaruina chi kathei tharan athum ngacheehaowa kala mikumoli hikathā sāshap-pangshap khame Vareli athumna masochikata.
Jishuna Matthewwui shimli phazāda leilakha khāshinā khalokabing kala morei kaphungbing kachungkha rāda Jishu eina awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda phazāruma.
Phariseebingna hi kathei eina awui sākhangatha̱bingli hānga, “Khiwui vang nathumwui ojāna khāshinā khalokabing eina morei kaphungabingli phazārumkhala?”
Kha Jishuna athumwui kahāng chi shālaga ngahānkai, “Makakazābingna khanong darkar masamana, kha kakazābingna kasana.

Vālu laga ‘Ina kachigat maningchāngmana kha lukhamashan ningkachāngna’ da kahāngwui kakhalat khikhala kaji angahānkhuilu. Kaja ina khamashung khangarongbingli hokhui khavai kharā maningmana kha morei kaphungbingli hokhui khavai kharāna.”

Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Shakazā mayarana athumli ngasopamda leilakha shakzātli kharā mibingli chikhumpairalā? Shakazā mayara chili athumwui eina khuikathui atam rārāsara: chithang athum khumnaora.
“Khipānakha kachama kachonli chonshi kadhar matāksangngayaomana, kaja tākkasang chi kachon chiwui eina kākshokhaoda zakshimeikhār kākhaowa.

Chi tākam eina khipānakha kadhara drakhāra̱ chi kachama drakhā sāhuishonli mathaisangmana; thaisangakha sāhuishon chi ngawokhaida atheira̱ chi heitha̱serhaowa kala shonla shimānhaowa. Kha kadhara drakhāra̱ chi kadhara sāhuishonli thaikasang khangachāna, chithākha khanini mashimānmana.”
Chieina Jishuna ngakarthuida awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda athi shurvai.
kaja sha̱naopāva̱ a khalattana hithada chukmaja̱ya, “Ina awui sārili sākaza̱mangnala iwui kazat hi raihaora.”
Chiwui thili Jishuna khamunga akhavāwui shimli vai. Ana kathilaa sāda khaleibing, sipa kakhongbing kala yarui ngaunkakharop kathei eina,
“Mi kachiva̱ ayarli shokhaolu! Kateoa ngalāva̱ hi thikahai maningmana, kha pida khaleina” da hānga. Chieina athumna ali mana̱shiya.
Kha yaruili ayar shokngasakhaikhaleoda ana shimlungli zangda apāngli singkhui kala ngalāva̱ chi ngakarthuiya.
Pao hi ngalei chiwui apam hupta ngayaovai.
Jishuna shimlungli zangkahai tharan khangapeo khani chi awuili rai, kala Jishuna anili ngahāna, “Ina nanili raimishapra da nani shitsanglā?”
“Mha, amei!” da anina ngahānkai.
Chieina ana aniwui mikli sāza̱da hānga, “Naniwui shitkasang athishurda shokranu.”
Kala anina kathei samphanga, Jishuna anili saklak eina “Khipālikha mathei ngasaklu” da ningmi.
Kha anina chiwui eina zatthuihailaga awui maramli ngalei chiwui apam hupta ngayaovā ngasaka.
Kameo kashamshokmikhaleoda khak khangasha̱pā chi matuipaihaowa kala yarui saikora matakhakhaoda “Israelli hikathā hi matheilakranga” da hāngngaroka.
Kha Phariseebingna hānga, “Kameobingwui akhavā chiwui pangshap eina ana kameo kashamshokashapna.”
Ana yarui ashangva̱li kathei tharan athumli lumashanlakhaowa, khiwui vangkhala kaja athum chi yaokahoma makhalei yaonaobing thada athumli singkharenglaga ngachonkhamela maleithuwa.
Chiwui thili ana awui sākhangatha̱bingli hānga, “Hatkhavai mā kachungkha lei, kha kahāta mi machungmana.
Chiwui vang eina kahātwui akhavā Proholi kahāta mi chungmeida shirāt khavai seihā sālu.”
Paokazat tharāda khaniwui amingbing chi hina, kharena, Peterla kaho Simon, kala agato Andrew; Zebedeewui naomayara James eina agato John;
Philip eina Bartholomew; Thomas eina khāshinā khaloka Matthew; Alphaeuswui naomayara James kala Thaddaeus;
yurli leikashe Simon kala Jishuli yankasaia Judas Iscariot.
kha shimān kahai Israel shimkhurwui yaonaobing chili vātha̱lu.
Kala nathumna khavāvāli pao hāshokta ‘Kazing wungram chi nganaihaira’ da hānglu.
Kakazābingli raimilu, kathebingli ringngasaklu, phārrei kakazābingli tharmilu, kameobing kashamshokmilu. Nathumna aman mamila samkaphangna, chithada aman makhuila milu.
Nathumwui lupākhaoli sināla, lupāla, pheisāla makhuiphungalu.
Nathumwui kha̱ram khavāli paidula, phahon khanila, pheihopla, khāmshuila makhuiphungalu; kaja ot kasā mi china awui kashakazā samphang ngayia.
“Nathumna keinungli nilala, kha̱li nilala akazang apam chili khipāli zunngayikhala kaji phākhuilu kala chiwui eina mazatranglakha eina tangda nathum ashiwuili pamlu.
Nathumna shim chili vāzangkhaleoda sālamtui ahānglu.
Shimkhur china mareojeohaiakha nathumwui sokhami chi ashiwui vang ngasāranu. Kha chi mathaakha nathumwui sokhami chi nathumli latungranu.
Kala nathumli khipānakha marāzang ngasakngaiakha kala nathumwui tui manganāsangmiakha, shim lah keinung chiwui eina zatkathui tharan nathumwui pheiwui chifa chi kathangtāhailu.
Ina nathumli kachangkhat kahāngna, bichar sāthanghon Sodom eina Gomarrahwui mibingli bichar kasāliva chikathā keinungwui mibingli bichar kasāna sakmeira.
Mibingli ngasharlak eina yanglu, kaja nathumli athumna hanga̱shimli hokāra kala athumwui synagogueli sājei eina ngaphitra,
khamungabing, awungabing kala Gentilebingwui mangāli iwui mingli shākhi sākhavai nathumli khamungabing kala awungabingwui mangāli shimenvāra.
Nathumli tukkhavā tharan kathada matuira lah khi hangra kajiwui vang malungmaringalu; kaja nathumna khi matuirakhala kaji chi pung chichang chili nathumli hāngmira.
Kaja matuiki kaji chi na maningmana, kha nathumwui Avāwui Manglāna nali matui ngasakki kajina.
I wui vang eina nathumli mi saikorana yangkharingra. Kha khanao eina tangda khāngkashapa china kahui samphangra.

Athumna nathumli keinung akhali rekakharek chitharan khangatei akhali yāmvālu; kaja Ina nathumli kachangkhat eina kahāngna, miwui Naomayarana marāranglakha eina tangda nathumna Israel keinung saikorali sākikaji ot masākuprangsāra.
Sākhangatha̱ china awui ojāwui thada kala araona awui akhavāwui thada ningli kapen chi shapa. Athumna shimva̱ chili Beelzebul hoakha shimkhurwui mi kateibingli kayākha zakshimeikharda horakhala?
Ina nathumli tangkhamangli kahāng chi phongshar eina kahorli hānglu kala nathumna shākhui kahai chi shimtung eina vaomalāntālu.
Phasāli sāthatshaplaga manglāli masāthatkharar athumli mangacheealu. Kha kazeiramli phasā eina manglā khanini sāshimānmikashapa Vareli ngacheelu.
Konghi khanili pheisā akha eina mayormalā? Chithālala nathumwui Avāwui kaphaning mazangla konghi akhala ngaleili matātungmana.
Kha nathumliva nathumwui kuisam eina tangda shānhaida khaleina.
Chiwui vang eina mangacheealu, konghi kachungkhali nathum aman sakmeikhara.
kha ili mibingwui mangāli kahata chili inala kazingramli khalei iwui Avāwui mangāli ali hatra.
Kaja anaomayarana avāva̱li kala anaongalāva̱na ava̱va̱li, arihāva̱na aniva̱li mamayā ngarok khavai kharāna;
kala mi akhawui yangshimeikap kaje chi shimkhurwui mi ngasāra.
kachikathāna awui krush makhuiphungla iwui thishurakha a iwui vang makanāmana.
Kachikathāna awui mirin mashimān khavai saakha shimānra; kha mashivāmla iwui vang eina mirin mikashapa china ringra.
Marān akhali a marānna kajiwui vang zangkhangasaka a china marānwui sāman chi samphangra; khangaronga chili khangaronga mina kajiwui vang zangkhangasaka a china khangarongwui sāman samphangrumra.

Kachikathāna iwui sākhangatha̱bingwui ngachaili teomeikap kaje akhali iwui sākhangatha̱na kajiwui vang tara̱ khamakui kapkhamāngla mimangakha, ina nathumli kachangkhat kahāngna, kachilikha awui sāman chi mashimānlakmara.”
athumna ali hānga, “Rāki kajipā chi nala jika ithumna khangatei akhali ngaraifarakhala?”
Chieina Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Ungulu, kala nathumna shākahai kala theikahai chi Johnli unghānglu:

mik khangapeobingna kathei samphanga, phei katekbing zatpaihaira, phārrei kakazābing tharhaira, khangakhokbing shāpaihaira, kathebingli ringngasakhaira kala kathai kachāmbingli paokaphā hāshokmihaira.
Ili ningkhamaong makhalei a chi sokhamina.”
Johnwui sākhangatha̱bing zatcham kahai eina Jishuna yarui chili Johnwui maramli matui, “Nathumna lamhāngli khavā chi khi yangkhuikida khavākhala? Titina phanung phankhavā chilā?
Chi maningakha khi yangkhui khavai khavākhala? Khamanaka kachon khangavaia mili yangkhavailā? Chikathā khangavaia athum chi awungawui shimli pama.
Chithākha khiwui vang khavākhala? Marānli yangkhui khavailā? Mha, marānlina, kha ina hāngga, marānli mataikhameiana.
Hithada kapihaikasa chi awui ponglina: ‘Yanglu, ina iwui paome nali rimeida chihora, ana nawui shongfa rida ngarānmira.
Ina nathumli kachangkhat kahāngna, sha̱naona kapharāwui ngachaili John Ra̱hikmeli reikhamei khipākha mashoklakrangli; chithālala kazing wungramli teomeikap kaje china ali reimei.
John Ra̱hikmewui thot eina thuida aja rāshungda kazing wungram hi rotmarātlak eina rāshuma kala rotkhamarātwui mibingna pangshap eina yuikhui khavai sai.
Kaja Johnwui atam eina tangda marānbing saikora kala ainna wungramwui pongli marānhairasai.
Nathumna chi khuisangngaiakha a hi rāra da phongmi kahai Elijah china.
Shākhui khavai khanā kakā a china shākhuiranu!”
‘Ithumna nathumwui vang sipa̱ khongmilala; nathumna pheichak machakmana, ithumna thishamlaa sālala; nathumna machapmana.’
Kaja Johnna maphāshak maphazāmana, kala athumna ‘Ali kameo zanga’ ji;

miwui Naomayarana phāshak-phazai, kala athumna, ‘Yanglu, a morkahaka, khamalipa kala khāshinā khalokabing eina morei kaphungbingwui ngasotnaona’ da matui. Chithālala thangmei chi chiwui otsak eina theikhuiya.”

“Chorazin, nali ringkashi ngasāranu! Bethsaida, nali ringkashi ngasāranu! Nathumwui lungli hakkhamahā ot sākahai chi Tyre eina Sidonli sāsāsi kaje athumna borāshi ngavailaga hotla teida achā ningngateihairara.
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, bichar sāthanghon Varena Tyre eina Sidonli kasāliva nathumli sakmeida bichar sāra.
Kala He Capernaum, nali kazing kāzokta masot mimaraola? Naliva kazeiram tāshungda ngakhuntāra. Kaja nali hakkhamahā ot sāmi kahai chi Sodomli sāsāsi kaje keinung chi aja rāshungda leisāra.
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, Sodomli bichar kasāliva nathumli sakmeida bichar sāra.”
mha, Avā, chikatha chi nawui lukhamashanwui kaphaningna.
“Iwuili rālu, kachota kala otphun kharit kaphungbing saikora; ina nathumli ngasāmkhui ngasakra.
Iwui kashai hieina phunglu kala iwui eina tamkhuilu; kaja iya malungkhanima, wuklung tākui kahaiana, kala nathumna ngasāmkakhui samphangra.
Kaja iwui kashaiva phungpailaka kala iwui otphun ngavenglaka.”
Phariseebingna chi theihaoda Jishuli hānga, “Yanglu, nawui sākhangatha̱bingna Sabbaththang masakhangayi ot sāda lei.”
ana kathada Varewui shimli zanglaga Ngasokhamiwui khamui pāngmon maningla mashaipaiki kaji chi, a eina ali ngasokazatbingna shaihao?
Lha Sabbath kachida Varewui shimli khalei pāngmonbingna sabbathwui ain sākhaichinglala athum mayonmana da Moseswui ainli hāngkahai chi nathum mapāyangmalā?
Ina nathumli kahāngna, Varewui shimli reikhameiya kachikatha akha hili leili.
Kaja ‘Ina pha̱kaphayāle lukhamashan ningchangmei’ kaji hiwui kakhalat nathumna khikhala da theihairasāsi kaje nathumna khayon makhalei mili khayon mamisāmara.
Khikhalajila miwui Naomayarana Sabbathwui Prohona.”
Kala yanglu, apam chili apāng sheikasha̱ mi akha leisai. Jishuli khayon phenkhangai mi kaikhala chili leisai. Chieina athumna ali ngahāna, “Sabbaththang kazāt raikhami hi ainna mayālā?”
Mina yaoli kayakha aman sakmeikhala! Chiwui vang eina Sabbaththang kaphā ot kasā hi ainna mayai.”
Chieina Jishuna mipā chili hānga, “Napāng katingshoklu.” Chieina ana apāng katingshoka kala apāng lākhavāk thada phāchaohaowa.
Kha Phariseebingna chiwui eina shokta kathada Jishuli sāshimānhaosikhala da ngasana.
kala awui pongli mi kateibingli mahānglakalu da athumli ningmi.
Hi Isaiah marānna hānghaikasā chi ungshung khavaina:
iwui khaluma kala ina ningyāngkhaunga.
Ina ali iwui Manglā sangmira,
kala ana Gentilebingli
mashun bichar vaomalānmira.
Ana mangayātzatmara lah mavaozatmara,
kala chānreili awui akhon khipānakha mashāmara;
teknanai kahai titila ana masātekmara,
mitnanai kahai meiwonla masāshimitmara,
mashun china mayuiranglakha eina tangda;
kala Gentilebingna awui mingli miyur saikorana chihānra.”
Kala mi saikora china matakhakhaoda “Hi Davidwui naomayara chilā?” da ngazek ngaroka.
Jishuna athumwui kaphaning chi theihaoda athumli hānga, “Khalatta ngayarkazam kahai ngalei kachiva̱ shimānhaora kala keinung nilala, shimkhur nilala khalatta ngayarkazamhaiakha manganingrarmara.
Satanna Satanli kashamshokakha akhalatta ngayar kahaina. Chithākha kathada awui wungram chi leisārakhala?
Ina Beelzebulwui pangshap eina kameobing kashamkashokna jiakha nathumnwui mibingna khipāwui pangshap eina kashamshokkhala? Chithākha athumna nathumwui bichar kasaa ngasāhaora.
Kha Varewui Manglā eina ina kameobingli kashamkashokna jiakha Varewui wungram chi nathumwuitungli rāhaira.
“Maningakha kathada mi akhana kapanga mi akhawui shimli azanglaga pheipāng makhalaphaila awui thongthāng ngaponpairakhala? Khalap kahaiwui thili ngaponpaiya.
Chiwui vang eina ina nathumli kahāngna, morei kala kachipat tui khamatui kachiva̱wui vang mikumoli pheomira; kha Manglāli kachipata chili mapheomimara.
Kala iwui Naomayarali makhamayā tui khamatuia chilila pheomira; kha Manglāli Katharali makhamayā tui khamatuia chili thot hilila kala rākharā thotlila mapheomimara.
He phara̱wui naongarābing! nathum maphālaga kathada khamathā tui matuipairakhala? Kaja wuklungli kaphaning chi khamorna matuikashokna.
Kaphā mina awui khamathā kazip kahai chi eina khamathā shoka kala zakkashi mina awui kazip kahai chi eina zakkashi sāshoka.
“Ina nathumli kahāngna, bichar sāthanghon mi kachiva̱na ana matuishokphāphā kahai chiwui maram misera;
kaja nawui matuishok kahai tui chieina nali mashung ngasakra kala china nali yonngasakra.”
Kha ana athumli ngahānkai, “Makaphā kala phokaphā thotna machut phai; kha chi marān Jonahwui machut maningla khangatei machut mamimara.
Kaja Jonahna ngashun ngayā kathumthang khaihwui wuklungli kapam chithada miwui Naomayarala ngashun ngayā kathumthang ngaleilungli pamra.

Bichar sāthanghon Ninevehwui mibingna mithot hili ngasoda ngakarthuira kala nathumli athumna khayon phenra. Khiwui vangkhala kaja Jonahn pao hākashok eina athumna ning ngateihaowa kala yanglu, Jonahli reikhameia kachikatha akha hili leili.

Bichar sāthanghon Azingvākwui awungva̱na mithot hili ngasoda ngakarthuira kala chili yonshinamra kaja ana Solomonwui thangkhamei chi nganā khavai okathui akatangwui eina rai, kala yanglu, Solomonli reikhameia kachikatha akha hili leili.
Chieina ana ‘Ina pamkasā shim chili latungura’ da hānga. Ana latkhaung tharan shim chili khipākha maleisāmana kala pha̱mathā kharikhailaga mathāsek eina leisai.
Chi theilaga ali zakshi khamei manglā makathar shini ahokhuida athum shim chili ungpama. Chieina mipā chiwui mirin kharepāle khanaowa hina zakshimeikharhaowa. Makaphā mithot hilila chithada shokra.”
Chieina mi akhana ali hānga, “Yanglu, nava̱ eina nachināngara nali chān hāngkida ayarli ngaraili.”
Kha ana ali ngahānkai. “Khipāna ishava̱ kala khipālongna ichināngarākhala?”
Kala ana awui sākhangatha̱vāk pāng chiza̱vāda hānga, “Hili ishava̱ eina ichināngarā leili.
Kaja kazingramli khalei iwui Avāwui kaphaning kasaa chi igatona, izarva̱na kala ishava̱na.”
Kala mi kachungkhana ali puiruikhama, chieina ana marikong akhali kātonga kala yaruiva ngayipheili nganinga.
Ana apong tarākha chānjam eina tamchitheida hānga: “Athā khayaoa akhana athā yakhavai vai.
Kala ana khayao eina athā kaikhana shongfapheili tātunga, chi vānaobingna rāngamuizāhaowa.
Athā kaikhana ngalei tarākha makhalei lungguipamli tāzangda thaklāk eina kharshoka kaja ngalei chi mathukmana,
kha zimik kashok eina zinghām kaprorda alungbing chi angayung thukta makhalei wui vang ngahuihaowa.
Kaikhana ka̱shātbingwui ngachaili tāzangda ka̱shātrongbing hakkasang eina shangthathaowa.
Kaikhana ngalei katumpamli tāzangda athei mathei, thingrong kaikhali athei shāshā kala khangateili hangtharuruk thumrārā mathei.
Shākhavai khanā kakā a china shākhuiranu.”
Chieina ana athumli ngahānkai. “Nathumli kazing wungramwui ngathum kahai chi thei khavai mihaira, kha athumli chi mamimana.
Kaja khalei a chili mataimeida mirorra, chieina ana chungmeikhar leihaora. Kha makhaleia a chiwui eina kateokha khalei chila khuishokhaora.
Chiwui vang eina ina nathumli chānjam eina tamkachitheina, khiwui vangkhala kaja athumna yanglala matheimana, nganālala mashāmana kala theishingkakhuila maleimana.
Marān Isaiahna hāngmarān kahai chi athumli ungshunga, chi hithada hānghai:
‘Nathumna shākachangra kha bhap matāmara,
kala nathumna theikachangra kha mamachukmara.
Kaja mibing hiwui ning tangmanghaira,
khanāla mashāpaithura,
athumwui mikla mikpihaira,
chi mathāsāsi kaje athumwui mik eina theira,
kala khanā eina shāra,
athumwui ning eina bhap tāshapra,
kala athumli raimi khavai ili ngareirāra.’
Ina nathumli kachangkhat kahāngna, marān kala khangaronga mi kachungkhana nathumna kathei thada theingailaksai; kha matheirarthuwa, kala nathumna kashā chi shāngaisai, kha chi mashāthuwa.
Kachikathā akhana wungramwui tui shālaga bhap makatā tharan nawui wuklungli yaosang kahai athā chi chipee china rāyonthuiya; chi shongfapheili yaosang kahai kathāna.
Ngalei makhalei lunggui tungli yaokahai athā chiya shākhaleoda heng sāda khamathān eina khuikasangpā chikathāna;
thalala awuili angayung maleithuwa, kha kasha̱nakhawui vang khānglaga tui chiwui vang kakhanang kachot nilala, rekakharek nilala kharā eina ngalāngda sana̱unghaowa.
Ka̱shātronglungli yaosang kahai athā chiya tui chi shālala mirinwui vang malungkharing kala lanli leikashina tui chi shangthathaowa kala atheila mamatheithuwa.
Ngalei katumpamli yaokahai kathā chiya tui chi shālaga bhap tākhuida atheila mathei, kaikhana shāshā, hangthararuk kala kaikhana thumrārā mathei.”
kha mibingna piphup eina leilakha awui yangkashena mā ngachaili rāman rāyaosangmihailaga thuihaowa.
Mārongbing chi haksangda māmazan shokkaphok tharan rāmanbing chila thuiuwa.
Chieina shimva̱ chiwui raobingna ali unghānga, ‘Amei, nana nawui luili athā khamathā mayaosangmalā? Chithākha kathada rāman zanghaokhala?’
Ana ngahānkai. ‘Yangkashe akhana sākāhaira.’ Raobing china ali ngahāna, ‘Thakha rāmanbing chi ithumli aphurshokhaolu kajila?’
Kha ana ngahānkai, ‘Maningmana, nathumna rāmanbing chi phurkashokli mārongla phurshoknarhaipaishina.

Māhā marāranglakha eina tangda khanini chi phorrumsāranu; māhā atamli kahātbingli rāmanbing chi meili riktā khavai rida hātlaga vamvam eina tankhuilu kha mā chiya iwui chumli hailu’ da ina hāngnaora.”
Athābingwui ngachaili hi teomeikapa, kha hi hakkasang eina khawobingwui ngachaili hakmeikap kaje thingrong akha ngasāda khamasaili yongkazata vānaobingna chiwui aphangbingli athip rāsai.”
Hi marānna hāngkahai chi ungshung khavaiwui vangna:
“Ina chānjam shichinda hāngchitheira,
okathui haokaphokwui eina thumhaikasā chi ina hāngra.”
Jishuna yarui chili nothāhailaga shimlung kazang eina awui sākhangatha̱bingna ali ngahāna, “Luili kaphor rāmanbingwui chānjam kakhalat chi ithumli hāngchitheilu.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Athā khamathā khayaoa chi miwui Naomayarana.
Lui chi okathui hina kala athā makhamathā chi chipeewui naongarāna.
Rāman khayaoa yangkashe chi chipee china. Māhā atam chi okathui khangachang atam china, kala kahātbing chi kazingraobingna.
Rāmanbing kazipkhuilaga meili thottā kahai thada thot akatanglila chithāpapamra.
Mibingli morei kala makaphā makhayā sakhangasaka athumli wungramwui ayarli kazipkhui khavai miwui Naomayarana awui kazingraobing shivātra,
kala athumli meifalungli horsanghaora. Chili athum kachapla chapra kala ahāla tarira.
Chiwui thili khamashung khangarongbingna athumwui Avāwui wungramli zimik thada horra. Shākhavai khanā kakā a china shākhuiranu!
“Kazing wungram chiya lui akhali lan thumhaida khalei mi akhana samphangda yātphum kahai kathana; ana ringphākhaihaoda awui khalalei hupta ungyorserhailaga, lui chi alokhui.
“Latluida, kazing wungram chiya leihkasā mi akhana aman kasaka pearl ngalung phākazat kathāna,
ana aman kasaka pearl ngalung akha leikasā theida awui khalalei hupta ungyorserhailaga pearl chi alokhui.
Khailan chi pemkahai eina athumna ngayipheili ngakhunshokta pamzanglaga khaih khamathāthā chi khongsaili sangkhui, kha makhamathābing chi horhaowa.
Okthot akatangli chithada shokra. Kazingraobingna shokta makaphābing chi khamashung khangarongbingwui eina ngatei ngasakra,
Kala athumli meifalungli horsanghaora; chili mibingna kachapla chapra kala ahāla tarira.”
“Nathumna saikora hi bhap tāhairalā?” Athumna “Mha” da ali ngahānkai.

Chieina ana athumli hānga, “Chiwui vang eina kazing wungramwui vang tamchithei kahaia ain kathema kachiva̱ chiya shimva̱ akha kathāna, ana awui lan kazip kahai kāwui eina kadhara kala kachama lan khuikashok kathāna.”

kala aramli hanungda ana athumli synagogueli tamchithei, chi kashā mibing china matakhakhaoda athum akha eina akha ngazek ngaroka, “Mipā hina hikathā awor kala hakkhamahā otsak hi kachiwui eina samphangkhala?
A mistriwui naomayara chi maningmalā? Ava̱li Mary mahomalā? Kala James, Joseph, Simon kala Judah awui achināngarā maningmalā?
Azarva̱ngarā ithumli mangasopamalā? Ana saikora hi kachiwui eina tamkakhuikhala?”
Chieina athumna ali makhuisangthuwa. Kha Jishuna athumli hānga, “Marānliva aramli kala ashi shimkhurli maningla apam khangatei khayāmakashi maleimana.”
Kala athumna mashitkasangwui vang ana apam chili matakhak kahai ot kachungkha masāmana.
kala ana awui raobingli hānga, “Hipā hi Ra̱hikme Johnna, kathiwui eina ringshok kahaina; chiwui vang eina ana matakhak kahai ot sākashap pangshap khaleina.”
khikhalajila Johnna, “Nana Herodiasli khangakum hi ain maningmana” da hānghaowa.
Herodna ali shaothatngaisālala yaruili ngacheehaowa, kaja Johnli marānna da yaruina khui.
Kha Herodwui kapharā ungshungthang Herodiaswui naongalāva̱na yarui mangāli pheichak sai kala Herod penlakhaowa;
chieina ana sha̱nao chili ana kapopo chi milākra da tuingashit sai.
Ava̱va̱wui tui khuilaga, “Ra̱hikme Johnwui kui khongphei akhali sanglaga milu” da ana poi.
Awunga wukhananglak haowa, kha awui tuingashit kala ngasotnaobingwui vang eina kapo chi mihaolu da kasoi.
Ana mi shivātvāda phātopli Johnwui kui arangkhuingasaka;
kala akui chi khongpheili sanglaga khuiungda sha̱naopāva̱ chili mi, kala ana chi ava̱va̱li khuiungmihaowa.
Kala awui sākhangatha̱bingna awui angun chi akhuilaga chizanhaowa kala athumna Jishuli ahānga.
Jishuna ngayipheili kashok eina mi kachungkha chili theilaga lumashanlakhaoda athumwui kazātla raimi.
Zingyinlam awui sākhangatha̱bingna ali rāhānga, “Kazing yinghaira kala apam hi ngachakyāng kahai apamna. Ruinganai kha̱bingli vālaga athum khalattawui kashakazā alozā khavai yarui hi chihohaolu.”
Jishuna hānga, “Athum mathuilala phai, nathumna athumli zākhavai khamilu.”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Ithumwuili khalei hiya khamui phangā kala khaih khanimānga.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Chibing chi iwuili khuirālu.”

Chiwui thili Jishuna yarui saikorali khawotungli pamzang khavai kasoi, kala khamui phangā eina khaih khani chi khuilaga kazingramli yangkāda somi, kala serkhaida khamui chi sākhangatha̱bingli mi, sākhangatha̱bingna yaruili yaowa.
Athum saikorana ningyāngunglak eina zākhui kala katai chi sākhangatha̱bingna luk tharāda khani kazipkhui.
Athum kazābing chi sha̱nao eina naoshinao mazangla mi thingphangā sha̱khaya.
Ana yaruili shiunkup kahaiwui thili seihā sākhavai kaphungli amāng kāhaowa. Kazing khaying eina tangda chili pama.
Kha atam chitharan marikhong hi ngayilungli ngaphongzatta ngalei kathengwui eina tālakhaowa kaja masina phanvāhairasai.
Ngayawui pung matimaikhali Jishuna shamadrutungli zatta athumwuivāk rārāsai.
Kha ana ngayitungli zatkharā chi sākhangatha̱bingna kathei eina ngacheenahaida, “Hi mika̱lāna” da panglāk eina vaowa.
Jishuna heng sāda hānga, “Pingmeilu, ina; mangacheealu.”
Chieina Peterna ngahānkai, “Amei, nana jiakha ilila tara̱tungli zatta nawuili rāngasakmilu.”
kha ana masi kaphan chi theida ngacheehaowa kala tara̱li ngaphumamān kaji eina “Amei, ili kakanmilu” da vaowa.
Ani khani marikhongli kākatong eina masila maphanthuwa.
Kala marikhongli tongkasa mibingna ali khorumda hānga, “Kachangkhat na Varewui Naomayaralaka.”
Kala apam chiwui mibingna ali Jishuna da kathei eina kuikhamareili khalei kha̱bingwui eina kakazā mi kachungkha khuirai,
kala athumna kakazānaobingli awui chontheira̱mānglila sāza̱khui khavai poi kala chili sāza̱kakhui saikora kharai samphanga.
“Khisāda nawui sākhangatha̱bingna awo-ayibingwui khangachā chonmakānhaokhala? Kaja athumna phakazā atamli pāng mamazikmana.”
Ana athumli ngahānkai, “Thākha khiwui vang eina nathumna nathumwui khangachā sākasā chiwui vang eina Varewui ningkhami sākhaihaokhala?
Kaja Varena kasohai, ‘Nava̱ navāli khayāshilu’ kala ‘Avāva̱li lah ava̱va̱li sui kasa a chili thingasak phalungra.’
Kha nathumna kahāng, kachikathāna avāva̱ lah ava̱va̱li ngachon khavai leisālala ‘Hi Varewuina’ da hāngakha avāva̱li khayāmashilala phai.
Chieina nathumwui khangachā sākasā chiwui vang eina Varewui tui chi nathumna makakachanga sāngasakhaowa.
Phākakhaningbing! Isaiahna nathumwui maramli phongkhamarān chi kayākha mashunghao, ana hānga:
kha athumwui wuklung iwui eina katāva̱li lei;
arema eina athumna ili khoruma,
mikumona semkakhui ain chi iwui ainna da tamchithei.’”
Chiwui thili Jishuna yarui chili hokhuida hānga, “Nganākazakhuilu kala theishingkhuilu:
khamorli kazang china mili makhao khangasak maningmana, kha khamorwui eina kashok china mili makhao khangasakna.”
Chiwui thili sākhangatha̱bingna ali rāhānga, “Nawui kahāng chi Phariseebing ning sāza̱haowa da na matheikhala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Kazingramli khaleia iwui Avāna malingkasang thingrong kachiva̱ phurshokhaora.”
“Athum chithasaranu; athuma mik khangapeo kathānana; khangapeo akhali khangapeo akhana thānakha khanini khorchopli tāzangra.”
Kha Peterna hānga, “Chānjam chi ithumli meichitheilu.”
Chieina Jishuna hānga, “Aruila nathumla matheishingkhuiranglā?
Khamorli kasangsang chi paiphonli tāzanglaga phasāwui eina shokhaowa kaji matheimala?
Kha khamorwui eina kashok chi wuklungwui eina kashokna, china mili makhao ngasaka.
Kaja wuklungwui eina makaphā kaphaning: shaokathat, phokaphā, shāmkasā, khaleekasa̱, makhamashung shākhi khami kala khamashāt shoka.
Mili makhao khangasak chi hibing hina kha apāng mamazikla phākazā china mili mamakhao ngasakmana.”
Kala yanglu, ngalei chili kapāna Canaanwui sha̱nao akha awuili rāda, “He Amei, Davidwui Naomayara, ili khalumashanmilu; inao ngalāva̱li kameo zanghaida marlak eina kazāda leili.”
Kha Jishuna ali khituikhala mangahānkāmana. Chieina awui sākhangatha̱bingna ali rāhānga, “Sha̱nao hili thuingasakhaolu, ana ithumli ngakaochingda lei.”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “Naoshinaobingwui zāt khuilaga fali hormi kahai mangachāmana.”
Sha̱naopāva̱ china ngahānkai, “Mha, Proho, chithalala fabing eina tangda akhavāwui eina tākatung zatpā chi ngamuizai.”
Mi kachungkhana phei katek, mik khangapeo, khak khangasha̱ kala khangatatei kachungkha khuirāda Jishuwui mangāli rāhai kala Jishuna athumli raimi,
chieina khangasha̱na matuikapai, pāng katekali raikhami, phei katekana kazat kala mik khangapeoana kathei chi mibing china theilaga matakhakhaowa; kala athumna Israelwui Vareli masochikata.
Chieina sākhangatha̱bingna ngahānkai, “Yarui hiyākha hili mizā khavai lamhāng hili kashakazā ithumna kali vākhuirakhala?”
Chieina Jishuna athumli ngahāna, “Nathumwuili khamui kayākha leilikhala?” Athumna ngahānkai, “Khamui shini kala khai kateokha leili.”
Chieina Jishuna yarui chili pamzang khavai kasoi,
ana khamui shini kala khai chi khuilaga ningkashi seihā sai kala serkhailaga sākhangatha̱bingli mi, chieina athumna yaruili yaowa.
Athum saikorana penlak eina zākhui kala katai chi luk shini kazipkhuiya.
Chi kazāli kazang mi mashing chi sha̱nao kala naoshinao mazangla mi thing matina.
Chiwui thili Jishuna yarui chili shiunhailaga marikhong akhali tongphungda Magadan ngaleivāk vāhaowa.
Ana athumli ngahānkai, “Zingyinlam zingko shokhaiakha, ‘Zingyat mathāhaora, zingko shokhaira’ da nathumna hānga.

Kala ngathorshong kazing kahungla hung, tangkhamangla tangmangakha ‘Aja siphan zingrot ngasha̱ra’ da nathumna hānga. Nathumna kazingwui maong yanglaga marānshapa, kha nathum atamwui machutbing chi makhalatrarmana.
Makaphā makhayā kala phophāt thot hina machutmāng phāzata. Kha Johnawui machut chi maningla machut khangatei nathumli mamimara.” Chieina ana athumli chihohailaga zatthuihaowa.
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Phariseebing eina Sadduceebingwui khawok chili ningngasharlu.”
Kala athum khalatta hi ngazekta hāng ngaroka, “Ithumna khamui makhuikaphungthura.”
Nathum aruila bhap matāranglā? Ina khamui phangā serkhailaga mi thingphangāli mizālaga nathumna luk kayākha kazipkhuikhala kaji maphaningungmala?
Lha khamui shini eina mi thingmatili yaoshaihailaga luk kayākha kazipkhuikhala kajila malaihairalā?
Ina khamuiwui vang khamatui maningmana kaji hi nathumna kathada matheikhuirarthukhala? Phariseebing eina Sadduceebingwui khawok chili ningngasharlu.”
Chieina Jishuna khamuiwui khawokli kahāng maningla Phariseebing eina Sadduceebingwui tamkachitheili ningngasharlu da kahāngna kaji sākhangatha̱bingna bhap katā samphanga.
Ana athumli hānga, “Kha nathumna I khipāna da hāngkhala?”
Kala ina nali kahāngna, na Peterna kala lunghār hiwuitungli ina iwui church sākara, kala kathiwui pangshapna chili mayuirarmara.
Ina nali kazing wungramwui sho chi mira, kala nana okathuili khalap kahai chi kazingramlila khalaphaira, kala nana okathuili khalākhami chi kazingramlila khalāmira.”
Kala Peterna ali hokhuilaga kaharphokta hānga, “Varena mamayāmana, Proho! Nali chithada mashoklakmara.”
Khikhalajila, awui mirin ngatangkhuira kaje a chi shimānra; kala kachikathāna iwui vang eina awui mirin shimānmiakha ana chi samphangra.
Kaja mi akhana okathui tongda samphanglaga awui mirin shimānhaiakha awui tongkaza khi leikhala? Lha mi akhana awui mirin eina ngatha̱khuikapai khi leikhala?
Khikhalajila miwui Naomayarana awui kazingraobingli ngasoda Avāwui tekhamatei eina rāki kajina, kala chiwui thili mi kachiva̱li kachichāna sākahai chiwui athishurda ana runmira.
Ina nathumli kachangkhat kahāngna, miwui Naomayarana awui wungramli kharā matheiranglakha kathi mamazapki kaji mi kaikha hili nganingda lei.”
Kala athumwui miktāli Jishu azak onhaowa: amai zimik thada horra kala awui kashankachonla kahor thada charshihai.
Kala yanglu, Moses eina Elijahna Jishuli chān khangazek chi athumna thei.
Kala Peterna Jishuli hānga, “Proho, ithum hili leikasā hi phālakhaira. Nana mayāmiakha nawui vang akha, Moseswui vang akha kala Elijahwui vang akha da ina rāmnao kathum sāmiga.”
Sākhangatha̱bingna chi kashā eina ngacheenāhaida ngakhumzangsera kala khakshingakhaowa.
Kha Jishuna athumli rāsaza̱da hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, mangacheealu.”
Chieina athumna yangkakā tharan Jishu maningla khipākha maleisāthuwa.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Elijahna rālaga ot saikora ngarānpinghaisāra.
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, Elijah rāhaira, kha mibingna ali mamachuthuwa kala ali athumna sākhangangai sai. Chi tākam eina miwui Naomayarala athumwui pāngli kachotkachāng samphangra.”
Chiwui thili Jishuna Ra̱hikme Johnwui pongli khamatuina kaji hi sākhangatha̱bingna bhap tāhaowa.
“Ojā, inaomayarali khalumashanmilu, kaja a zingmeirai kakazā mina kala zakshilak eina kazāda meilila, tara̱lila tāzangzang jichinghaowa.
Ina ali nawui sākhangatha̱bingwuili khuirai kha athum maraimirarthuwa.”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “He shitkasang makhaleia ngakaikashe thot, ina nathumli karankha ngasopamfara? Ina nathumli karankha ja̱mifarakhala? Ali iwuili khuirālu.”
Jishuna kameo chili kakaso eina kameo chi shokhaowa kala naoshinaopā chi ngalāngda raihaowa.
“Kha hikathā hiya seihā kasā kala kakhum eina maningla kalikha mashokrarmana.
athumna ali shaothatra; kha kathumthangwui thili ringshokluishitra.”
Chieina sākhangatha̱bing wukhananglakhaowa.
Kala ana, “Khangateibingwui einana” da kahāng eina Jishuna ali hānga, “Chithākha naomayara ngarāva khalemna.

Chithālala athum malungmavāt khavai shamadruli vālaga khaisui akha ahorsanglu, nana samphangkhare khai chi khuilaga khamor phākkhayang tharan shekel akha samphangra; chi khuilaga iwui eina nawui chi shānmihaolu.”
Chieina ana naoshinao kateowa akhali hokhuida athumwui ngachaili nganing ngasakta
hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna ningngateida naoshinao thada mathaakha kazing wungramli mazangrarlakmara.
Kachikathā khalatta naoshinao thada malungkhanima a china kazing wungramli hakmeikap kajena.
Hikathā naoshinao akhali iwui mingwui vang khuikasanga a chi ili khuikasangna.
Morei sākhavai kasuiwui vang okathuili kakhanang ngasaranu! Kaja kasui hi rāphalungra, kha kasui rākhangasaka mi chi kakhanang ngasaranu!
Kala nawui mikna nali morei sangasakakha, chi latshokkhuilaga horhaolu; mik khani kālaga makhamita meifali zangki kajile mik akhamāng kālaga katang makhavai kharingli kazang phāmei.
Kala ana chi samphanghaiakha, kachangkhat ina kahāngna, mapākthuilak kaje hangchikoda chiko chili mataimeikharda ana pākthui kahaia yao akha chiwui vang ringphameikharra.
Chieina kateowa hibingwui ngachaili akha shiman ngasaki kaji hi kazingramli khaleia iwui Avāwui ningkachāng maningmana.
Kha ana nali mahengsangakha, mi akha lah khani ngasophungda vālu. Chithākha tui kachiva̱ hilaka mi khani lah kathumwui shākhi chieina khuipaira.
Ana athumlila mahengsangakha churchli hāngchitheilu; kala ana churchlila mahengsangakha nathumwui vanga a hi Gentile kala khāshinā kakhuia kathāna da khuilu.”
Khikhalajila iwui mingli khani lah kathum kazipakha, athumwui chili I zangda lei.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Ina nali shini shira da mahāngmana, kha hangshini shini shida kajina.
Chiwui vang eina kazing wungram hiya awunga akhana awui raobingwui hishap tharkhuikhangai chili ngaheopai.
Ana hishap sāphokcham kaji tharan lupā thingthara kashuka mi chili awuili khuirai;
kala ana chi marunrarthuda, chi runkhavai apreiva̱la, anaongarāla kala awui khalalei ot saikorala yorserhaolu da akhava china hukhum mi.
Chieina rao china khuktizangda ‘Amei, ili khangaraimilu, ina runsera’ da poi.
Kala ali lukhamashanwui vang eina rao chiwui akhavā china ali chihomihaowa kala leimanla kokmihaowa.
Kha raopā chi kayāng kashok eina awui lupā shākha shuk kahaiya rao sakharuma akha samphanga, kala ali kharokli singkhuida hānga, ‘Iwui leiman chi milu.’
Chieina awui ngasota raopā china ngakhumzangda, ‘Ili khangaraimilu, Ina runmira’ da poi.
Ana mamayāthuda mipā chili leiman chi marunranglakha eina tangda phātopli sanghaowa.
Awui rao ngasotnao kateibingna chi kathei eina wukkhananglakhaowa, kala athumna athumwui akhavāli shokkahai saikora chi ahānga.
Chieina awui akhavā china raopā chili hokhuilaga hānga, ‘Makaphā rao, nana ili kapowui vang ina nawui leiman saikora kokmihaira;
ina nali lumashankhami chithada nanala nawui ngasota raopā chili malumashanmipaimala?’
Akhavā china malungvāt eina awui leiman saikora marunranglakha eina tangda phātopli sangkhavai kashinabingwui pāngli horsangmihaowa.
Chithada sāda nathumna nachinā ngarāwui khayon khamāng chi wuklung eina mapheomiakha kazingramli khaleia iwui Avā chinala nathum kachiva̱li chithada sāra.”
kala mi kachungkhana awui thi shurrai kala ana athumli apam chili kazāt raimi.
Phariseebingna rālaga chāng yangkida, “Mi akhana maram akhawui vang eina apreiva̱li pāngkahai hi ainlā?” da ali ngahāna.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Anili kasema china haokaphokwui eina sha̱nao eina mayarnao sai da kapi kahai nathum mapārangla,
kala Varena hānga, ‘Hiwui vang eina mayara china ava̱ eina avāli chihohailaga preiva̱li ngarumhaora, kala ani khani akha ngasāhaora.’
Chiwui vang eina ani khani asā khani maningluimana, kha asā akhamānga. Chithākha Varena ngakummi kahai chili mi khipānakha masākhaiaranu.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Mosesna nathumwui ning khamararwui vang napreiva̱ ngarāli pāngpaira da mayākhamina, kha haokaphokwui eina chi mathāmana.
Kha ina nathumli kahāngna, phokaphāwui vang maningla kachikathāna apreiva̱li pānghailaga sha̱nao khangateili khuiakha ana phokaphāna.”
Sākhangatha̱bingna ali hānga, “Preigaharni ngachaili hikathā shokra jiakha ra̱sa makaphā phāmei.”

Kaja mi kaikhava ahonga sāda kapharā lei kala mi kaikhali mina ahonga sāngasaka kala mi kaikhava kazing wungramwui vang athum khalatta ahonga sākakhui lei. Tamkachithei hi khuisangshapa a china chi sāranu.”
Kha Jishuna hānga, “Naoshinaobingli iwuili rāngasaklu, athumli mahaphaialu, khikhalajila wungram hiya athum kathāwuina.”
Chieina ana athumli somilaga thuihaowa.
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “Khiwui vang eina nana ili kaphāwui apongli ngahankhala?” “Kaphā kaho akhamāng lei. Nana kharingli zangngaiakha ningkhamibing chi mayonlu.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Mi mashaothatpaimana, maphophāpaimana, maleepaimana, mikhanam shākhi masāpaimana;
nava̱ navāli khayāshilu, kala nawui khongnainaoli na khalatta leikashi thada leishiphalungra.”
“Saikora hi ina mayonserhaira” da yarona china ngahānkai, “Khi khavāt leifakhala?”
Yarona china tui chi kashā eina wukkhananglak eina thuihaowa, khikhalajila a shānglaka.
Kala ina nathumli hāngluishitli, kashānga mi akhana Varewui wungramli zangki kajile utna kapimkhurli ngara̱kashokna paimei.”
Sākhangatha̱bingna chi shālaga matakhakhaida hānga, “Chithākha khipāli huimipairakhala?”
Kala iwui mingwui vang shim lah chinao ngarā, azarva̱ ngarā, ava̱-avā, naongarā kala ram horkahai mi kachiva̱ shākha mataida samphangra kala makashimān kharing mirin mathunkhuira.
Kha arui khare kasābing kachunga naothuihaora kala khanaobingna rihaora.
Ot kasābing chili thangthangwui ngalangman lupā ava̱va̱ mira da mayā ngarok kahaiwui thili awui drakhā yāmguili chihovai.
Khaleilaga pung chiko katā eina, keitheilungli khiotkhala masātheimada nganingung eina nganingzatkasā mi kaikhali theida
athumli hānga, ‘Nathumla drakhā yāmguili ot asālu, laga mikhangayi chi ina minaora.’ Chieina athumna vāhaowa.
Pung tharāda khani katā atamlila, kathum katā atamlila chithada vāluishita.
Kala pung phangā maikhali khavā eina mi kaikha nganingzatkasā chi theida hānga, ‘Chāngnārem eina khisāda nganingpamshonlikhala?’
Athumna ngahānkai, ‘Khipānakha mahothuwa.’ Ana athumli, ‘nathumla drakhā yāmguili ot vāsālu’ da hānga.
Chieina pung phangā maikhali ot sākaphokbing china lupā akharip samphanga.
Rākharebingli khami tharan, athum chungmeida samphangra da phaningsai kha athumla lupā akharip samphanga.
Athumna pheisā chi samkaphang eina shimva̱wuitungli matuikazamda
hānga, ‘Rākhanaowa chi pung akhamang ot sai, laga langpongda zinghām sāririli ot kasā ithumli ngaraichā ngasakhaira.’
Nawui chi khuilaga ungulu; nali khami thada rākhanaobinglila mira da ina hāngkahaina.
Iwui khalei chi ina sākhangaingai masāpaimara kaji leilā? Lha ina hānkaphāwui vang mikpaikashikhala?’”
“Yanglu, ithum Jerusalemli vaura, kala miwui Naomayarali pāngmon akhokabing eina ain kathembingwui pāngli horsanghaora, kala athumna ali yonshinamda chithithaora.
Kala ali mana̱shi khavai, ngaphit khavai kala krushtungli shaoshān khavai Gentilebingwui pāngli horsangmira; kala kakathumathang ali ngakarthuilui ngasakhaora.”
Chieina ana sha̱naopāva̱ chili hānga, “Nana khi ningchangkhala?”
Sha̱nao china ali ngahānkai, “Nawui wungramli iwui naomayara khani hi akhana nawui yāshong kala akhana nawui uishong pamkhavai kasamilu.”
“Ithum shapa” da athumna ngahānkai.
Sākhangatha̱ tharā china chi kashā eina ani chinaonili malungvāthaowa.
Kha Jishuna athumli hokhuida hānga, “Gentilebingwui khamungabingna athumwuitungli khayaiya kala athumwui khangam khareibingnala athumwuitungli pangshap lei kaji nathumna thei.
Nathumwui ngachailiva chi mathamara; kha nathumwui ngachaili hakki kaje china nathumwui otram ngatha̱me sāphalungra,
kala nathumwui ngachaili khare sāki kaje china nathum saikorawui raonao sāphalungra,
kaja miwui Naomayara eina tangda ali otram ngatha̱mi ngasak khavai kharā maningla ana otram ngatha̱mi khavai kala kachungkhawui vang ngatangman sāda amanglā chigatmi khavai kharāna.”
Kala yanglu, mik khangapeo mi khani shongfapheili pamsāda Jishu rārāli kaji kashā eina, “Davidwui naomayara, inili khalumashanmilu” da vaowa.
Chieina yarui china anili kasainakha pamlu da kharara; kha anina pangmeida “Davidwui naomayara, Proho inili khalumashanmilu,” da vaowa.
Jishuna kasha̱nakha nganingda anili hokhuida hānga, “Ili naniwui vang khi samilu jikhala?”
Anina ngahānkai, “Amei, iniwui mik rak ngasakmilu.”
Chieina Jishuna lukhamashan eina aniwui mikli sāza̱ya kala ngalāngda mik kathei samphangda anina athi shurthuihaowa.
hānga, “Naniwui mangāshong khalei kha̱ chili vālu, kala hengsāda chili gadhā akha anao eina ngasoda hokkahai nanina theira. Chi khalākhuilaga iwuili khuiunglu.
Kachikathāna nanili ngahanakha, ‘Prohona ot sāvaiki kaji leili’ da hānglu. Chieina ana nanili gadhā va̱rāni chi ngalāngda chihomira.”
Marānna hithada hānghaikasā chi ungshungvairanu da hi shok khangasakna:
Yanglu, nawui awunga nawuili rārāli!
ngahuiri eina, gadhātungli,
gadhā chiwui avānaoli tongda.”
Sākhangatha̱ khani china Jishuna sālu da hāngkahai chi sai;
anina gadhā eina chiwui anao chi khuiunga kala khani chiwuitungli athumwui kachon hammida Jishuna chili tonga.
Mi kachungkhana athumwui kachon shongfali hammi kala kaikhana thingphāng reokhuida shongfali hammi.
Jishuwui mangāli kala khanukli kazata mibingna “Davidwui naomayarali Hosanna! Prohowui mingli kharā a chi ka̱lā mahai! Chuimeikap kajeli Hosanna!” da panglāk eina vaowa.
Kala ana Jerusalemli kazang tharan mi saikora ning ngatha̱haoda “Hi khipākhala?” da hānga.
Ana athumli hānga, “Hithada kapihaida lei, ‘Iwui shim hi seihā sākhavai shim hora’; kha nathumna khangaponabingwui akhur sāngasakhaira.”
Khorumshimlungli mik khangapeo kala phei katekabing Jishuwui ngalemli rāda, ana athumli raimisera.
Kha pāngmon akhokabing eina ain kathembingna matakhak kahai otsakbing chi kathei eina kala “Davidwui Naomayarali Hosanna” da naoshinaobingna khorumshimli khavao chi kashā eina athum malungvāthaowa;
chieina athumna ali hānga, “Athumna hāngda khalei hi na shālā?”
“Mha, naoshinaobing eina angangnaobingwui khamor eina kākashunga masot kachikat nathumna khuirāhaira’ da kapi kahai chi nathum mapākhuihaira?”
Ngathorshong, keinungli latkhaung tharan Jishu thaihaowa.

Kala ana shongfapheili khaorārong theida apam chili vai, kha chili anah maningla khikha masamphangthuwa. Chieina ana arong chili hānga, “Athei mamatheiluilakranu!” Chieina khaorārong chi ngalāngda ngahuihaowa.
Nathumna shitsangakha seihā sāda kapopo saikora samphangsera.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Inala nathumli khangahān akha saga, nathumna ili chiwui ngahankakā mishapakha, inala khiwui pangshap eina kasā khala kaji nathumli hāngmira.

Johnwui ra̱hikkhami chi kachiwui eina rākhala? Kazingramwui einaka mikumowui einakhala?” Athum akha eina akha nganangrei eina “Ithumna ‘Kazingramwui einana’ jiakha, ana ‘Chithākha khisāthuda nathumna Johnli mashitsangthukhala’ da hāngra.
Kha ‘Mikumowui einana’ da hāngakha ithum yaruili ngacheehao; kaja mi saikorana John hi kachangkhat marānna da khuiya.”
Chieina athumna Jishuli “Ithum matheimana” da ngahānkai. Chieina ana athumli hānga, “Inala khiwui pangshap eina otbing hi kasākhala kaji nathumli mahāngmara.”
Chieina ana ngahānkai, ‘I mavāmara’; kha khaleilaga ningateihaida vāhaowa.
Chiwui thili anaomayara kakhaneli ngaraikachā chi ahāngluishita; ana ‘I vāra, avā’ da ngahānkai, kha mavāthuwa.
Khani hiwui ngachaili kachipāna avāva̱wui ningkachāng sākhala?”
“Khararrapana sai” da athumna ngahānkai.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Ina nathumli kachangkhat kahāngna, khāshinā khalokabing eina khayorva̱ sha̱naobing china nathumli rida Varewui Wungramli zangra.

Khikhalajila Johnna khamashung-khangarong apong chithei khavai rai kala nathumna ali mashitsangmana, kha khāshinā khalokabing eina khayora sha̱naobingna ali shitsanga. Nathumna chi thatheilala naoda ning ngateilaga ali shitsangga kajila masāmana.
Drakhāthei kaphā atam kharā tharān, raobingli yāmgui khamasābingwui eina awui sharuk athei akhui khavai chihovai.
Kha khamasābing china awui raobing chili tukkhuilaga akhali shao, khangatei akhali sāthathao kala khangatei akhapāli ngalunggui eina horthathaowa.
Ana kharewuili chungmeida khangatei raobing chihovāluishita; kala athumna raobing chilila khareli kasā tākam eina sāluishita.
Naomeikapta ‘Athumna inaomayaralia khayāshira’ da hānglaga anao mayarali chihovai.
Kha khamasābing china anaomayarali kathei eina athum khalatta hāngngaroka, ‘Hiya shimlui kāki kaje china; rālu, ali shaothathailaga awui shimluikat chi ithum khuihaosa.’
Chieina athumna ali tukkhuida athei yāmguiwui eina shimenshoklaga shaothathaowa.
Akhavā chi kharā tharan khamasābing chili ana khi sārakhala?
Athumna ngahānkai, “Ana makaphābing chili sāthatserhaora kala yāmgui chi athei khamathei atamli tāzak eina awui sharuk miki kajebingli masāvā ngasakra.”
‘Shim kasābingna horkahai ngalunggui chi
achithekwui khamakhoka ngasāhaira;
Hi Prohowui otsakna.
Ithumwui mikyanli hi matakhakhai?’
Chiwui vang eina ina nathumli kahāngna, Varewui wungram chi nathumwui eina khuithuihailaga athei mathei khangasaka yur akhali mihaora.”
“Ngalunggui hiwuitungli tākatunga a chi kaikazamra, kha ngalunggui china tākkaza̱ a chi akha̱-akhā ngasāhaora.”
Chieina pāngmon akhokabing eina Phariseebingna awui chānjam tui chi shālaga athumwui maramli khamatuina da theikhuihaowa.
Kha athumna ali tukkhui khavai sālala mi kachungkha chili ngacheehaowa, kaja athumna ali marān akhana da khui.
hānga, “Kazing wungram chi awunga akhana anaomayarawui shakzāt zātkhān akha khamili chānjam sapai,
ana awui raobingli shakazāwui zātkhānli rākhavai ngahot kahaibingli hokhavai shivātvai, kha athumna marāngaiki jihaowa.

Ana khangatei raobingli shivātluishitta hānga, ‘Ngahot kahaibing chili hānglu, Yanglu, ina ngazin phazātwui vang ngarānkuphaira, mukvāla asā kakā seinaola taithathaira, kala ot saikora ngarānkuphaira, ngalā shakzātwui zātkhānli rāserlu jilu.’
Kha athumna akaho chili khikha maningmana da akhana awui luili vāhao, khangatei akhana awui otli thuihaowa,
khangatei raobing kaikhali athumna tukkhuilaga zakshilāk eina shaomi kala sāthathaowa.
Awunga china malungvātnahaida awui raimi chihovāda mi shaokathatbing chili sāthathaowa, kala athumwui keinung chi mei eina thottāmihaowa.
Chiwui thili ana awui raobingli hānga, ‘Shakazāwui khangarān kuphaira, kha hokahaibing chi teonāhaira.
Chiwui vang eina nathumna shongfa kachida vālaga samkaphaphang mi kachiva̱li shakazāwui zātkhānli rākhavai aholu.’
Chieina raobing china shongfa kachida vālaga kaphāla kashila samkaphaphang saikorali kazipkhuilaga thānunga, kala ngalā shakazāli kharābing china shim chi puihaowa.
“Kha awunga china kharābingli vākhayang tharan ngalā shakazāwui sāri makasā mi akha zangsai,
chieina ana ali hānga, ‘Itao, nana shakazāwui sāri masāla kathada hili rāzanghaokhala?’ Kha mipā chi akhon mashokthuwa.
Chieina awunga china raobingli hānga, ‘Ali pheipāng khalaplaga tangkhamang ayarli horshokhaolu, apam chili mibingna kachapla chapra, ahāla tarira.’
Khikhalajila hokakhui kachungkhaya, kha kapang kakhui kateokhamanga.”

Chiwui thili athumwui sākhangatha̱bing eina Herodwui mibing kaikhali shivātlaga ahāng ngasaka, “Ojā, ithumna thei kaja na khamashungana, kala Varewui shongfa mashunglak eina tamchithei, kala kateina nali khinada khuilikhala kajiwui vang kakhanang maleilakmana, maramva miwui kharei kateoli nana khikha mayangmana.
Ithumli nawui kaphaning hāngmilu. Caesarli khāshinā khami hi ainla, lah maningmakhala?
Jishuna athumwui makaphā ningphanin chi theihaoda, “Phākakhaningbing, nathumna khisāda ili chāng yangnganao kajikhala?
Khājanā kashānwui lupāsā akha ili chitheilu.” Athumna lupā akha khuirāmi.
Chieina ana athumli ngahāna, “Hili kazang ama̱ kala kapi kahai hi khipāwuikhala?”
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Chithākha Caesarwui chi Caesarli milu, kala Varewui chi Vareli milu.”
Athumna hi kashā eina matakhakhaoda awui eina thuihaowa.
“Ojā, Mosesna hānga, ‘Mi akhana naongarā maleila thihaiakha agatona rameiva̱ chili ngakumlaga ashameiwui vang nao nganaomiphalungki kajina.’
Ara ithumwuili chinaongarā shini leida hili okthuida leisai. Khararra china ngalā khuilaga thihaowa, kala nao mapharāthuda apreiva̱ chi agatoli haimihaowa.
Chithada sāda kakhanela, kakathumala kala kashine tāshungda nao mapharāla thiserhaowa.
Athum saikorawui thili sha̱naopāva̱ chila thihaowa.
Chithākha ringkhalui tharan sha̱naopāva̱ chi athum shiniwui ngachaili khipāwui preiva̱ ngasārakhala? Kaja athum saikorana ali ngakumsera.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathum yonhaira, khikhalajila nathumna Kathara Lairikwui tuila kala Varewui pangshapla matheimana.
Kaja ringkhalui tharan athum ngalāla makhuimara, fakathuila mafathuiluimara, kha athum kazingramli kazingraobing thāhaora.
Thikahaibingwui ringkhaluiwui pongli Varena khi hānghaikhala kaji nathum mapāmalā?
‘Iva Abrahamwui, Isaacwui kala Jacobwui Varena,’ Ishamei ava kathewui Vare maningmana, kha kharingawui Varena.”
Kala athumwui ngachaili ain kathema akhana ali chāng yangkida khangahān akha sai,
“Ojā, ningkhamiwui ngachaili kachipā hakmeikapkhala?”
Hina mataimeikap kaje khare ningkhamina.
Kakhane khamataiya ningkhamiva, “Nawui khongnainaobingli na khalatta leikashi thada leishiphalungra.
Ain tui kala marān tui saikora ningkhami khani hiwui lungli leisera.”
“Nathumna Khrista chi khipāna da phaningkhala? A khipāwui naomaryarakhala?”
“A Davidwui naomayarana” da athumna ngahānkai.
Ana athumli hānga, “Chithākha, khiwui vang Davidli Manglāna kasatmida ali ‘Proho’ hoda
‘Prohona iwui Proholi hānga:
iwui yāshong pamlu;
yangkashebingli nawui pheinai
masā ngasakranglakha eina tangda’ da hānghaokhala?
Davidna ali ‘Proho’, hoakha, kathada Davidwui naomayara ngasāpairakhala?”
Chiwui thili Jishuna yarui eina awui sākhangatha̱bingli hānga,
“Ain kathembing eina Phariseebingna Moseswui pamli pama,
chieina athumna kahahāng hupta otsak eina sālu kala ngalanglu, kha athumna kasā thada masālu, khikhalajila athumna hāshoka kha otsak eina masāmana.
Athumna ritlak kahai maphungkharar otphun mibingwui yārtuili parmida ngava̱ ngasaka, kha athum khalatta otbing chili athumwui pāngmareng einala masingza̱mana.
Athumna athumwui kasāsā ot chi mina theikhavai sai; athumwui pāsi eina hār pākta sākhui kala chontheira̱ sānglak eina khanonga,
Zātkhānli athumna khangamkhareiwui pam kala synagogueli mathāmeikap kaje pam ningchānga,
kala athumna leihngaphāpamli athumli khayāshilak eina shalam kasā kala ojā da kaho ningchānglaka.
Kha nathumli ojā mahomara, khikhalajila nathumwui oja akha lei, kala nathum chinaongarāna.
Kala okathuili mi khipālikha avā mahoalu, khikhalajila nathumwui Avā akhamanga, ava kazingramli lei.
Nathumli akhavā dala maho ngasakalu, khikhalajila nathumwui akhamāng kaje akhavā che Khristana.
Nathumwui lungli reimeikap kaje china nathum saikorawui rao sāphalungra;
kachikathā reikhangaiya mi chili teongasakra, kala khalatta kateowana kaje chili reingasakra.

Ain kathembing eina Phariseebing, phākakhaningabing! nathumli kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu, khikhalajila nathumna ra̱meinaowui shim ngaponkhui kala mānkhavai seihā sānglak eina sai, chiwui vang eina nathumna shongrān sakmeida samphangra.
Nathum khangapeoa mangkhama̱bing! Sināna mataimeikā, sināli tharkhangasaka khorumshim mataimeikhala?
Kala nathumna hānga, ‘Kachikathāna hanphutwui ming eina mingzaiakha chi khikha maningmana, kha hanphuttungli khalei ot chiwui ming singda mingzaiakha ali china khalapa.’
Mik khangapeoa mibing! Kachigat ot mataimeikā chili tharkhangasaka hanphut mataimeikhala?
Chiwui vang eina hanphutwui ming singda shākhi kasaa china chili kala chiwuitungli khalei otbing saikora chili mingzailaga shākhi kasāna;
kala khorumshimwui ming singda shākhi kasaa china chili kala chiwui alungli khalei Varewui mingli mingzaida shākhi kasāna.
Kala kachikathāna kazingramwui ming singlaga shākhi kasā chi Varewui wungpamkhong kala chiwuitungli kapama ali mingzailaga shākhi kasāna.
Mik khangapeo thānmebing! Nathumna hāchangnaoliva sishokhailaga utva mayuitai!
Mik khangapeo Phariseebing! Rida tengkot eina khongpheiwui alung chi pheomathāhaifalu. Chithākha ayarla tharpaira.
Hi tākam eina ayarli nathumna mibingli mashunglak kahai thada theingasaka, kha alungliva phākakhaning eina moreina pemtinghai.
kala nathumna, ‘Ithum awo-ayibingwui thotli okthuisasi kaja athumna kasā thada masāsāmara kala marānbingli shaokathatli mazangsāmara’ da hānga.
Chithada sāda nathum marānbingli sākathata mibingwui naongarāna kaji hi nathum khalatta kahāng china shākhi khamina.
Chieina navā ngarāna haophok kahai chi sākuphaolu.
Phara̱bing, phara̱wui naongarābing, nathumna kazeiram vāki kajiwui eina kathada yāmshokpaira?

okathuili khayon makhaleibingwui ashee tākahai saikora; chiya khayon makhalei Abelwui ashee eina thuilaga Barachiahwui naomayara Zechariah eina tangda nathumna kathara khorumshim eina hanphutpamwui ngachaili shaokathat saikora nathumwuitungli tāra.
Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāng hina, saikora hi thot hiwuitungli tāra.
Yanglu, nawui shim horhaida ngachakyānghaira.
Ina nathumli kahāngna, arui hiwui eina thuida nathumna, ‘Prohowui mingli kharā mi chi sokhamina’ da mahāngranglakha eina tangda ili matheiluimara.”
Kha Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Nathumna saikora hi katheina, maningmala? Ina kachangkhat nathumli kahāngna, mahorkathānhaila ngalung akhawuitungli ngalung akha leiki kaji akhala maleimara.”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathumli mathānngui khavai ning ngasharlu.
Kaja mi kachungkhana iwui ming singda rālaga ‘Khrista chi ina’ da hāngra kala mi kachungkhali thannguira.
Nathumna katā khanaiwui raipao kashā tharan malung matātunghaialu, hikathā hi shokphalungra kha china khangachang atam maningmana.
Yur akhana yur akhawuitungli, wungram akhana wungram akhawuitungli rai sāra. Apam ngatateidali chāmrei kala neina̱ kakhanuk shokra.
Ot saikora hi nao pharātwui naokhara̱ haokaphok kathāna.
Kala chiwui thili kachungkhana yāmhaora, kala akha eina akha yansai ngarokra kala yangkharing ngarokra.
Kala minama marān tarākha shokta mi kachungkhali thānnguira.
kala makaphā-makhayā mataisanghaoda mi kachungkhawui leikashi suitāngasakra.
Kha khanao eina tangda khāngkashap mi chili huikhuira.
Kala wungramwui paokaphā hi miyur hupta shākhi mikhavai okathui peida hāshokra, kala chiwui thili khangachang chi rāra.
Judeali leikasābingna phungreibingli yāmvāranu;
shimtungli leikasaa china tunglaga shimlungli khalei thongthāng mazangkhuiluiaranu,
luili leikasāpā china kachon ungkhui khavai malatungaranu.
Iyāvo, atam chitharan nao vaikasābing eina na̱ shimankasābing!
Nathumwui khayām chi sikachāng lah Sabbaththang mashok khavai seihā sālu.
Kaja chitharan shokki kaji kakhanang kachot chi haokaphokwui eina thuilaga aja rāshungda mashoklakranga, kala mashokluilakmara.
Kala zimikshobing chi masha̱sang ngasakakha, mikumo akhala mahuikhuimara; kha kapangkhui kahai mibingwui vang eina zimikshobing chi sha̱sang ngasakra.
Chiwui thili kachikathāna nali, ‘Yanglu, Khrista chi hili lei!’ lah ‘Chili leili’ da hānglala mashitsangalu.
Kaja minama Khrista kala minama marānbing shokta, shapakha kapangkhui kahaibingli eina tangda thānngui khavai khudamla kala matakhak kahai otsakla kachungkha chitheira.
Yanglu, ina nathumli sāngngarānda hāngkahaina.
Kaja rikhāna zingshoshong eina shoklaga zingtun ngasheikhavā thada, miwui Naomayarana kharāla chi tākamra.
Kathingun khaleipam kachida khalāngbing kazipa.
chiwui thili kazingramli miwui Naomayarawui machut chi theira; kala okathuili khalei miyur saikorana chapra, kala miwui Naomayarana pangshap kala tekmateilak eina muiyātungli tongda kharā theira;

kala kapanga talla̱khon eina ngasoda ana awui kazingraobingli chihoshokra kala athumna awui kapangkakhui mibingli achikun matiwui eina, kazingram akatang akhawui eina akatang akhali vāshungda khaleibingli kazipkhuira.
“Khaorārongwui eina tamkhuilu: aphāngna nuiuda anah shokura̱akha mayo kachāng rāura da nathumna thei.
Chi tākam eina nathumna saikora hi kathei tharan, A nganaihaira, ngaveichingli leihaira da nathumna thei.
Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, ot saikora hi mashokranglakha thot hi makānthuimara.
Kazingram kala okathuila shimānhaora, kha iwui tui mashimānlakmara.
Noahwui atamli kashok thada miwui Naomayarana kharāla chithāpapamra.
Chitharan tara̱ maphongranglakha, Noahna marikhongli kākazang atam eina tangda athumna phakashak-phakazā, khamang-kazā, ngalākakhui kala fakathui ot sāsai;
tara̱ phongda athumli makheithuiranglakha eina tangda khi shokhaokhala kaji athum matheimana, miwui Naomayarana kharāla chithāpapamra.
Atam chitharan luili mi khani leisāra, akhali khuithuihaora kala akhali haihaora.
Preinao khanina mā rungsāra, akhali khuithuihaora, akhali haihaora.
Chiwui vang eina nathumla ngaranpinghaisāphalungra, khikhalajila nathumna maphaningsālak kaji pung chili miwui Naomayara china rāra.

“Chithākha kahāng khanganā kala thangkhama, shimva̱ china shimkhurwui kashok kazang saikora yangmi khavai kala atam chālak eina khangatei raobingli kashakazā khuimi khavai otsin horsangkhami rao chi khipakhala?
Akhavāna kharā tharan chithada sāsāda rātheikakhuia rao chi sokhamina.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, akhavāna rao chili awui khalalei lan saikorawuitungli chipamra.
Kha makaphā rao china a khalatta ‘Iwui akhavā marāfamara’ da phaningda,
awui rao ngasotnaobingli shaophokurakha kala khamaripbingli zārum mangrumakha,
rao chiwui akhavā china raona machihānkasa zimiksho kala makathei pung chili hanungda,
ali tandi mira kala phākakhaningbingli ngasoda hairumhaora; chili mibingna kachapla chapra, ahāla tarira.
Phangāva mangma̱ya kala phangāna thangmei.
Kaja mangkhama̱bing china thaomei khuiphunga, kha thaora̱ makhuiphungmana,
kha thangkhameibing china athumwui thaomeiwui vang thaokhong pemda thaora̱ khuiphunga.
Mākakhāma china kharā huihaoda athum chi singutphokuwa kala piphuphaowa.
Kha ngayā sailungphup atamli ‘Yanglu, mākakhāmali! Ali samphang khavai rālu!’ da vaowa.
Chieina ngalā tharā china ngakarthuida athumwui thaomei shara.
Kala mangkhama̱bing china thangkhameibing chili hānga, ‘Ithumli nathumwui thaora̱ khangayarmilu, ithumwui thaomei mitki jihaira.’
Kha thangkhameibing china ngahānkai, ‘Ithumwui vangla nathumwui vangla mangachangmaraomana. Thaora̱ khayorpamli vālaga nathum khalatta alokhuitha̱lu.’
Athumna thaora̱ lokhavai thuikahai tharan ma̱kakha̱ma chi rāhaowa kala ngarānping kahai ngalāva̱bing china ali ngasoda shakazāwui zātkhāngli azanguwa, kala khamong shunghaowa.
“Khaleilaga khangatei ngalāva̱bing chila rāda, ‘Amei, Amei, ithumlila kashomilu’ da hānga.
Kha ana hānga, ‘Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumli I matheimana.’
akhali ana talent phangā mi, khangatei akhali khani mi kala khangatei akhali akha mi, ava̱va̱li awui sākashap athishurda mi. Chiwui thili zatthuihaowa.
Talent phangā samkaphanga china ngalāngda leih vāsālaga talent phangā tongkhui.
Hithada sāda talent khani samkaphanga mi chinala talent khani tongkhui.
Kha talent akha samkaphanga china ngaleikhur achuilaga ana samkaphang chi chili chuiphumhaowa.
Chieina talent phangā samkaphangpā china khangatei phangā mataida khuirāda hānga, ‘Amei, nana ili talent phangā mi, hili ina khangatei talent phangā tongkhuihaira.’

Awui akhavā china ali hānga, ‘Phālakhaira, kaphā kala shitsangkapaiya rao, nana ot kateowa hi ningtonglak eina shikachinwui vang ina nali ot tarākhawuitungli akhavā sāngasakra; nawui akhavāwui khamathānli zanglu.’
“Talent khani samkaphangpā chinala khangatei khani mataida khuirāda hānga, ‘Amei, nana ili talent khani mi, ina khangatei talent khani tongkhuihaira.’
Awui akhavā china hānga, ‘Phālakhaira, kaphā kala shitsang kapaiya rao! Nana kateowa ot hi ningtongda kasawui vang nali chungkhameiwuitungli akhavā sāngasakra. Nawui akhavāwui khamathānli zanglu.’
“Talent akha samkaphangpā chinala rāhānga, ‘Amei, na ngasakkashe mina da ina thei; nava mayaola hātkakhuiya kala mahamla kazipkakhuia mina;
chiwui vang eina I ngacheehaoda nawui talent chi ngaleilungli achuiphumhaowa. Nawui chi na jihaolu.’
Kha awui akhavā china ali ngahānkai, ‘Makaphā, ngachāngmakakā rao! Ina mayaola hātkhui kala mahamla kazipkhui kaji nana theilamā?
Iwui pheisā hi na pheisā kazipshimli sanghaisa ngayia, chithāsi kaja I hankhaungli atār eina ngasoda ina samphangra.
Chieina talent chi awui eina khuilaga talent tharā samkaphanga mipā chili mihaolu,
Khikhalajila khaleia mi kachiva̱li chungmeida mirorra, kala ana sorngasaida leira; kha makhaleia mi chiwui eina awui kateokha khalei chila khuithuihaora.
Kala makānkhanā rao chili tangkhamang ayar chili horshokhaora; chili mibingna kachapla chapra, ahāla tarira.’
Awui mangāli miyur saikora kazipkhuira, kala yaokahomana mebingwui eina yaobing chi ngatei phākkakhui thada ana athumli ngatei ngasakhaora,
yaobingli awui yāshong kala mebingli awui uishong haira.
Chiwui thili Awungana awui yāshong khaleibing chili hāngra, ‘Rālu, ishāvāna sokhamebing, okathui sākaphokwui eina nathumwui vang ngarān kahai wungram chi mathunkhuilu;
khikhalajila I thaisai kala nathumna mizai, I ra̱changsai kala nathumna mimanga; I kha̱mi sasai kala nathuna chizuna,
I asāmsai eina leilakha nathumna ngavaimi; I kazālakha nathumna ngahāmi, I phātopli leilakha nathumna rāyangmi.’
Chieina khangarongabing china ali ngahānkāra, ‘Proho, na kathai kala ra̱kachang ithumna katharān theida nali mizā lah mimangkhala?
Na kha̱mi akha sāda ithumna katharan hosangkhala lah na asāmsai eina leida katharan ngavaimikhala?
Na kagazā kala phātopli kazang ithumna katharan theida rāyangmikhala?’
Chieina Awunga china ngahānkāra, ‘Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, ichinābingwui ngachaili teomeikap kaje akhali nathumna sāmi kahai chi nathumna ili sākhamina.’
“Chiwui thili awui uishong khaleibing chili ana hāngra, ‘Khonshi kahaibing, nathum iwui eina thuihaolu kala chipee eina awui kazingraobingwui vang ngarān kahai katang makhavai meifa chili vāulu;
kaja I thaisai kala nathumna mamizāmana, I ra̱changsai kala nathumna mamimangmana,
Ina kha̱mi sasai kala nathumna ili mahosangmimana; mahongsai, mangavaimimana; kazāsai kala phātopli leisai, mayangmimana.’
“Chieina athumnala ngahānkāra, ‘Proho, na kathai lah ra̱kachang lah kha̱mi lah khamahong lah kakazā lah phātop kazang ithumna katharan theida nali sheba masāmithukhala?’
Chieina ana athumli ngahānkāra, ‘Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna teomeikap kaje akhali masākhami chi ili masākhamina.’
Kala athum katang makhavai tandipamli vāra, kha khamashungbingna katang makhavai kharingpamli vāra.”
“Khanithangwui thili Makānkhami Phanit sāra kaji nathumna thei, kala miwui Naomayarali krushtungli shaothat khavai horsanghaora.”
Chiwui thili pāngmon akhokabing eina ararbing, Caiaphas kaho pāngmon kharewui dolānli kazipngaruma,
kala Jishuli ngathum sāda tukkhuilaga shaothat khavai khangarān sai.
Kha athumna hānga, “Phanitlungli majisa, kaja mibingwui alungli khonkazār shokhaora.”
Jishuna phazāda khalei tableli sha̱nao akhana aman kasaka thao ngalunghamnao akhali sanglaga Jishuwuili rāda awui kuitungli heirora.
Kha sākhangatha̱bing china chi kathei eina malungvāthaida hānga, “Khisāda aremali shimān khangasakkhala?”
“Thao hi aman kachungkha eina yorkhuilaga kachāmabingli mihaipai!”
Kha athumna kahāng chi Jishuna theida athumli hānga, “Khisāda nathumna sha̱naopāva̱ hili sheikhautkhala? Ana ili khamathā ot sāmihaira.
Kachāmabingli nathum ngasopamchingfara kha nathum ili mangasopamchingmara.
Ana iwui phasāli thao neokhami hi ili chizanpai khavaiwui khangarān sākhamina.
Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, okathui apam hupvali paokaphā hi hāshok kachida, ana khi samikhala kaji hi ali phaningkhaung sāda hāngchitheira.”
hānga, “Ina ali nathumwui pāngli miakha, nathumna ili khi mirakhala?” Athumna lupā thumrā shānshoklaga ali mihaowa.
Chithang eina thuilaga ana yansai khavai atam kachā phāhaowa.
Ana hānga, “Keinungli vāda kachikathā mi akhali ahānglu, ‘Ojā china hānga, iwui atam nganailakhaira; nawui shimli iwui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda Makānkhami Phanit chi mayonra.’”
Chieina sākhangatha̱bingna Jishuna athumli hāngkahai chi tāzak eina sai kala Makānkhamiwui zātkhān chi ngarānhaowa.
athumna phazāmahunglakha Jishuna hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumwui ngachaili mi akhana ili yansaira.”
Kala athum wukkhananglakhaoda athum kachiva̱na, “Chi ila, Proho” da ngahāna.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Khongphei akhali awui khamui ili rurshaikhangaruma china ili yansaira.
Awui pongli kapihaikasā thada miwui Naomayarava jimara kha miwui Naomayarali yankasaia chiva kalākashi ngasaranu! Mi chiwui vanga marāpharākasāna phāmeikharra.”
Yorkazā Judasnala “Proho, chi ilā?” da ngahāna.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Chi nana hānghaira.”
Chiwui thili ana tengkot akha khuida Vareli ningkashi mihailaga athumli mida hānga, “Nathum saikora hiwui eina manglu;
khikhalajila hi tuingashitwui iwui asheena, morei pheomi khavai kachungkhawui vang heishokkhamina.
Ina nathumli kahāngna, iwui Avāwui wungramli nathumli ngasoda kadhara drakhāra̱ mangrumki kaji zimiksho marāranglakha eina tangda ina drākhārong hiwui mamangluimara.”
Kha I ringshok kahaiwui thili nathumli ina Galileeli rida vāra.”
Peterna Jishuli hānga, “Athum yāmserhailala I mayāmlakmara.”
Jishuna Peterli hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nali kahāngna, arui ngayā harvāna makhongranglakha nana ili matheimana da kathum shida hatra.”
Peterna ngahānkai, “Nali ngasoda shaothatrumra jilala ina chi mahatlakmara.”
Kala sākhangatha̱ saikoranala chithada hāngsera.
Ana Peter kala Zebedeewui naomayara khanili thānkhui. A kakhanang sikafana pemhaowa.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “I wukakhanangna thiki jiura, hili nathum ningkharikta yangpamsālu.”

Ana khavāmeilaga ngaleili ngakhumshām zangda seihā sai, “iwui Avā, sāpaisi kaja kakhanangwui tengkot hi iwui eina khuithuimihaolu! Chithālala iwui kaphaning maningmana kha nawui kaphaning eina vailu.”
Chiwui thili awui sākhangatha̱ kathum chili hanunga kala athum piphup eina leisai. Chieina ana Peterli hānga, “Nathumna ili ngasoda pungkhamāngla mahonpamrarmala?
Ngasharlu, mapihailu, kala nathum kasuili matāzang khavai seihā sālu; manglāva sāngaikachangkhata, kha asāna ngazanhaowa.”
Latluida, kakhanelila Jishuna seiha vāsālui’ “Avā, ina hi makhamang masāpaimara jilala, nawui kaphaning eina vaimilu.”
Ana hanungluishit kaji tharan sākhangatha̱bing pida leisai, athum mikla marakrarthuwa.
Jishuna athumli haiphunglaga vāluishita kala kakathumalila ngaraikachā tui chi hānglaga seihā sālui.
Chiwui thili ana sākhangatha̱bingli hanunglaga athumli hānga, “Nathum aruila pida ngasāmda leifala? Yanglu, miwui Naomayarali morei kaphungbingwui pāngli horsangmiki kaji atam chi rāhaira.
Ngakarthuilu, zatusa, yanglu, ili yansaiki kaji hili rāhaira.”
Yansaiki kaje china athumli ingkit akha milaga hānga, “Ina amaya̱ki kaje chi a kho; ali tukkhuilu!”
Judas hengsāda Jishuwuili vai kala, “Ojā, nali chingrihairanu” da hānglaga amaya̱ya.
Jishuna ali hānga, “Ngasotnao, na khisāda hili leili?” Chieina athumna rāda Jishuli pāng parra kala tukkhuihaowa.
Kala yanglu, Jishuli ngasokasā mi akhana awui pāng katingshokta raighai sutkhuilaga pāngmon akhokawui rao akhawui khanā yortāmihaowa.
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Raighai chi raighaihonli sanghaolu; kaja raighai kasing katonga raighai eina shimānra.
Ina iwui Avāli poakha ana kazingrao ashang tharāda khanili lāngda hengsāda chihorāshapra da nathum matheimalā?
Kha chithāhaosi kaja kathada Kathara Lairikli kapi kahai hithada shokphalungra kaji chi ungshungpairakhala?”

Pung chichangli Jishuna yarui chili hānga, “Ili nathumna khaleli tukkakhui thada raighai kala thinghun singda kharālā? Thangkachida khorumshimli ina nathumli ngasopamlaga tamchithei, kha nathumna ili matukkhuimana.
Kha kashok saikora hi marānbingwui Kathara Lairik chi ungshung khavaiwui vangna.” Chiwui thili sākhangatha̱bingna ali chihohaida yāmserhaowa.
Peterna pāngmon khareiwui kayāng vāshungda lachāham eina shurvai, ana alungli zanglaga akatang chi yangkhui khavai shantribingli ngasopama.
Pāngmon akhokabing eina hangva̱naobingna Jishuli shaothat khavai makhamashunga shākhi phai,
kha mi tarākhana awuitungli kakapika shākhi kachungkha rāmilala, khuikapai akhala mazangthuwa. Naomeikapta mi khanina nganingkāda
hānga, “Mipā hina hānga, ‘Ina khorumshim chi sākhaishapa kala kathumthanglungli sakāluishitshapa.’”
Kala pāngmon kharei china ngakarthuida Jishuli hānga, “Nali kaphen hili ngahānkā khavai maleimalā? Mibing hina nawuitungli shākhi khami hi khida?”

Kha Jishuna khikha mangahānkāla kasainakha pamhaowa. Chieina pāngmon kharei china ali hāngluishita, “Ina kharinga Vareli mingzaida kahāngna: na Varewui Naomayara, Khrista china jiakha ithumli hānglu.”
Nathumwui kaphaning khikhala?” Athumna ngahānkai, “A thingayia.”
Chiwui thili athumna amaili machora̱ mashorrorda kashaola shaowa, kala kaikhana kakaphela kapheda
hānga, “Ithumli phongmilu, Khrista! Khipāna nali shaolikhala?”
Peter kayāng chiwui ayarli pamsai. Kala rao sha̱nao akha awuili rāda ali hānga, “Nala Galileepā Jishuli ngasosai?”
Kha Peterna athum saikorawui mangāli mamayāmada hānga, “Na khi kahāngkhala I matheimana.”
Kala ana kayāng shokkhavai varandashong khavā tharan raosha̱nao khangatei akhana ali theida chili pamkasā mibing chili hānga, “Ala Nazarethwui Jishuli ngasosai.”
Latluida Peterna mamayāmada mingzaida “I mipā chili matheimana” da ngahānkai.
Khaleilaga chili nganingkasābing china Peterli rāda hānga, “Kachangkhat eina nala athumli ngasokasā akhana, nawui tuimatui eina thei.”

Chiwui thili Peterna a khalatta khonshāt pokhuida shākhi sāda hānga, “Ina khamashung tui matui kala mingkazaina! Ina khamashung tui mamatuimana jiakha Varena ili tandi miranu, I mipā chili matheimana.” Chichang chili harvā khonguwa,
kala Jishuna ali hāngkahai, “Harvāna makhongranglakha nana ili kathumshida hatra” kaji Peterna phaningunga. Chieina ana kayāngli shokta soso chapa.
Athumna ali khalaplaga shimenthuihaowa kala Romewui governor Pilateli khuivāmihaowa.
hānga, “Khayon makhalei mili shaothat khavai yankasai hi I morei sāhaira.” Athumna ngahānkai, “China ithumli khi sākida? Chiya nawui otna.”
Ana lupā chi khorumshim chiwui lungli hortāhailaga thuihaowa kala chiwui eina zathailaga angakhākthihaowa.
Chieina athum ngazeklaga lupā chieina kha̱mibingwui chikhurpam sākhavai hamkasaawui lui chi lokhui.
Chiwui vang eina lui chi aja rāshungda “Asheewui Lui” da hoi.
kala Prohona ili kaso kahai thada, athumna ham kasāpawui lui chi lokhavai shichinhaowa.”
Kha pāngmon akhokabing eina ararnaobingna ali kaphen chili ana khikha mangahānkāmana.
Chieina Pilatena ali hānga, “Athumna nawuitungli kayākha phenda leikhala kaji na mashāmalā?”
Kha Jishuna khikhala mangahānkālakmana, chieina governor chi matakhakhaowa.
Chitharan phanit kachida yaruina kapo athishurda phātopli narkahai mi akhali Romewui governorna chihokhami khangachāna.
Atam chitharan khangarik-khangarā phātopli zangkasā Barabbas kaho mi akha leisai.
Yarui kakazip tharan Pilatena athumli hānga, “Ili nathumwui vang khipāli chihomilu jikhala? Barabbaslika, Khrista kaho Jishuli khala?”
Kaja Jishuli yuikashiwui vang awui pāngli mikakāna kaji ana thei.

Chili lāngda Pilatena bichar sākhavaipamli leilakha apreiva̱na ali tui akha shirāta, “Khayon makhalei mi chili khikha sākhavai maleimana, khikhalajila arui ngayā iwui mangshong ina awui vang tarākha khananghaira.”
Pāngmon akhokabing eina ararnaobingna Barabbasli chihomi khavai kala Jishuli shaothat khavai Pilateli polu da yaruili suiya.
Governorna yaruili ngahānluishita, “Khani hiwui ngachaili khipāli nathumwui vang chihomilu jikhala?” “Barabbasli” da athumna ngahānkai.
“Chithākha Khrista kaho Jishuli ina khi sarakhala?” da Pilatena ngahāna.
“Ali krushli shaoshānhaolu” da athum saikorana ngahānkai.
Chieina ana hānga, “Khiwui vang, ana khi khayon sāhaokhala?” Kha athumna pangmeikhar vaoda hānga, “Ali krushli shaoshānhaolu.”
Chieina yarui saikora china ngahānkai, “Awui ashee chi ithum eina ithumwui naongarāwuitungli tāranu.”
Chiwui thili Pilatena Barabbasli athumwui vang chihomihaowa, kala Jishuli lijei eina ngaphitlaga krushli shaoshān khavai athumli mikāhaowa.
Kala athumna awui kashankachon raimihailaga hungshi kahai phahon katuma akha ngavaimi,
kala ka̱shātwui kuihon akha sākhuilaga athumna ali chi ngahonmi kala khāmshui akha singngasaka. Chiwui thili awui mangāli khuktizangda athumna mana̱shida hānga, “Jihudiwui awungali okpeimeiranu!”
Athumna ali machora̱ mashorrora kala khāmshui chila khuimihailaga akuili shaowa.
Athumna ali mana̱shi kahaiwui thili awui hungshi kahai phahon katuma chi raishokmihailaga awui khangachā phahon chi sangmi, laga ali krushli shaothat khavai khuithuihaowa.
Kala athumna Golgotha, (chiwui kakhalata mikuira̱pam) kaho chi vākashung tharan,
athumna kakhā athi khamanāta atheira̱ Jishuli mimanga; kha ana chi mazapyanglaga mamangthuwa.
Kala ali krushli shaoshānhailaga athumna ka̱lā yanglaga awui kashankachon chi ngayara,
chiwui thili athumna chili pamda ali mayonpama.
Kala awui kuitungli athumna ali kaphen tui chi hithada kapihai, “Hi Jihudibingwui awunga Jishu china.”
Jishuli ngasoda phama̱kashao yaronnao khani, akhana yāvāk kala akhana uivāk da krushtungli shaothata.
Chiwui ngalemli kānung kānkhavābing china kuikhayitta Jishuli zeida hānga:
“khorumshim shimān ngasakhailaga kathumthangwui alungli sakāluishitra da kahāngapā, nakhalatta huikhuilu! Varewui Naomayarana jiakha krushwui eina tunglu.”
Hithada sāda pāngmon akhokabing, ain kathemabing kala ararnaobingla ali zeida hānga,
“Ana mi khangateili huimilaga akhalatta mahuikhuirarmana. A Israelwui Awungana; ara ana krushtungwui eina tungranu, chithākha ithumna ali shitsangra.
Ana Vareli chihāna, ana ningchāngakha Varena arui ali rākankhuihaoranu, kaja ana ‘I Varewui Naomayarana’ da hānga.
Kala ali shaothatkharuma phamakashao yaronnao khani chinala chi tākam eina zeiya.
kala pung kachikomaikhali Jishuna panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani” kaja “Iwui Vare, iwui Vare, nana ili khisāda horhaokhala?”
Chiwui ngalemli nganingkasā kaikhana chi shāda, “Mipā hiya Elijahli holi” da hānga.
Athumwui ngachaili akhana hengsāda ngasamvālaga drakhāra̱ kathurli wothop rurkhuilaga thing akhali khalapshānlaga ali mangkhavai mi.
Kha khangatei kaikhana hānga, “Ngarailu, Elijahna ali huikhavai marānikhala, ithum yangsa.”
Jishuna panglāk eina ringāluishitta amanglā chihohaowa.
chikhurla shohaowa kala thihaira̱kasā Vareli shitkasangabing kachungkhala ringshok ngasaka.
Jishuna ringshok kahaiwui thili athumna chikhurwui eina shoklaga kathara keinungli zanga, chi mi kachungkhana theiya.
Apam chili tālak eina yangpamkasā sha̱nao tarākhala leisai, athum Jishuli Galileewui eina shurkharāna kala ali athumna ngachonmi.
Athumwui ngachaili Magdalawui Mary, James eina Josephwui ava̱ Mary kala Zebedee preiva̱la leisai.
Ana Pilatewuili vāda Jishuwui angun apoi, chieina Pilatena angun chi Josephli mikhavai kasoi.
Chieina Josephna angun chi khuilaga khamanaka tharzā kahai kachon akha eina khaluihai,

kala ana akhalattawui vang lunghārli kashophutlaga ngarān kahai kadhara chikhur chili Jishuwui angun chi chizanhaowa. Chiwui thili ana chikhurwui khamongli lungriham kahaka akha eina shingkhamhailaga zathaowa.
Atam chili Magdalawui Mary kala khangatei Mary chila chikhur chiwui yangkhangasungchangli leisai.
Akhama kathā, chiya Khangarān kasāwui zimikshowui thili pāngmon akhokabing eina Phariseebingna Pilateli vāsamphangda
hānga, “Amei, kakapika mayara china ringda leilakha, ‘Zimiksho kathumthangwui alungli ina ringshokra’ da hāngkahai chi ithumna phaningunga.

Chiwui vang eina zimiksho kakathumathang eina tangda chikhur hili mayon khavai mayāmilu, maningakha awui sākhangatha̱bingna rālithuihailaga mibingli, a kathiwui eina ringshokhaira da hānghaipaishina, kala kharewui kakapikli khanaopāna zakshimeikhārhaora.”
Pilatena athumli hānga, “Shipai khuida zatulu kala chikhur chi kashap eina tangda chetlak eina mayonlu.”
Chieina athumna vāda chikhur chiwui lungguitungli mahor namda shantrila hai.
Kala yanglu, kashuirak eina neina̱ panglāk eina khanukuwa; kala Prohowui kazingrao akhana kazingramwui eina tālaga lungsham chi khalanghailaga chiwui atungli pama.
Awui zakmai chi rikhān khangashei thai kala awui kashankachon chi horām kachar thai.
Chieina khamayonbing chi ngacheenāhaida kathiririhaowa kala kathi thāhaowa.
Kha kazingrao china sha̱nao khani chili hānga. “Mangacheealu, khikhalajila nathumna krushtungli shaothat kahaiya Jishuli kaphāna kaji ina thei.
A hili maleimana, khikhalajila ana hāngkahai athishurda ava ringshokhaira. Ali chipet kahai pam hi rāyanglu.
Chieina thaklāk eina vāda awui sākhangathabingli ahānglu, ‘A kathiwui eina ringshokhaira, kala ana nathumli rida Galileeli vāura, nathumna ali chili theira!’ Ina nathumli hāngkahai chi phaningunglu.”
Chieina anina khangcheela thā, khamathānla thā da chikhurpamwui eina katotsisi thuihaowa kala sākhangatha̱bingli ngasamvāhaowa.
Kashuirak eina Jishuna anili samngarokta, “Nanili chingrihairanu” da hānga. Anina vālaga awui pheili singda ali khoruma.
Jishuna anili hānga, “Mangacheealu, vālaga ichināngarāli Galileeli tākhavai hānglu kala apam chili athumna ili theira.”
Pāngmon akhokabingna ararnaobingli ngasoda kaziplaga ngasanrum kahaiwui thili, athumna shipaibingli lupā tarākha mida
hānga, “Hithada hānglu, ‘Ithum piphup eina leilakha awui sākhangatha̱bingna rālaga awui angun rālithuihaowa,’
