kala Governorna shaakha, nathum mayonmana da ithumna nathumwui vang phayetmihaora kala chiwui vang nathumna malung ringkhavai khikha maleimana.”
Chieina athumna lupā chi khuilaga athumli hāngchithei kahai chithada sai. Chiwui vang eina aja rāshungda Jihudibingwui ngachaili khararchān hi ngachānda lei.
Athumna ali kathei tharan athumna ali khoruma; kha kaikhana ningmaonga.
Kala Jishuna athumli vānganaimeida hānga, “Kazingram eina okathuili khalei pangshap saikora ili mihaira.
Chiwui vang eina nathumna vāda miyur saikorali iwui sākhangatha̱ sāngasaklu; athumli Avā kala Anaomayara kala Manglā Katharawui ming singda ra̱hikmilu,
kala ina nathumli kaso kahai saikora chi mayon khavai athumli tamchitheilu, kala mithot khangachang eina tangda ina nathumli ngasomichingra.”
Varewui Naomayara Jishu Khristawui paokaphā haokaphok.
“Yanglu, nawui shongfa sākhavai,
nali rida iwui paophungme chihora.
Prohowui shongfa ngarānlu;
awui apong ngatar ngasaklu.”
Judea ngaleili kala Jerusalem keinungli khalei mi kachungkha rāda athumwui morei hangphata. Chieina athumli Jordan kongli ra̱hikmi.
Johnna ut-hah eina kasā kachon ngavai, sāhui eina shanneira̱ sai kala khaoh eina khuira̱ awui kashakazāna.
Ana hithada hashoka, “Ili hakkhameiya mi akha iwui thili rāra, ina hamzangda awui pheihop khara̱ khalāmi khavai I matik machāmana.
Ina nathumli tara̱ eina ra̱hikmi, ana nathumli Manglā Kathara eina ra̱hikmira.”
Ana tara̱wui eina kashok tharan hengsāda kazingram shokahai kala Manglāna nāsha̱ thada awuitungli tākapa̱ thei,
kala kazingramwui eina akhon akha vaorai, “Na iwui khaluma Naomayarana, Ina nali ningyāng unglaka.”
Ana chili zimiksho hangmatithang pamda Satanna ali sui. Ana ramsāli ngasopama kala kazingraobingna ali otram ngatha̱mi.
“Retkahai atam chi rāhaira, kala Varewui wungram nganaishunhaira. Ningngateilu kala paokaphā chili shitsanglu.”
Jishuna anili, “Ithi shurlu, nanili ina mi kaphā sāngasakra” da hānga.
Chieina anina ngalāngda khaihlan hortahaiphungda athi shurthuwa.
Khavāmeinakta Zabedeewui naomayara James eina John marikhong lungli khaihlan khopkasā thei.
Chieina ana hengsāda anili kaho eina avāva̱ Zebedee eina langphatbingli marikhongli nothāhailaga awui thi shurthuwa.
Awui tamkachithei shālaga athum matakhakhai, kaja ain kathembing thada matamchitheila, sāshap pangshap akhavā akha thada tamchithei.
Ana “Nazarethwui Jishu, nana ithumli khi sāki kajikhala? Ithumli shimān ngasak khavai kharāla? Na khipākhala da ina thei, na Varewui tharkhamathengana” da vaowa.
Jishuna ali khararda hānga, “Kasainakha pamlu, kala awui eina shokhaolu.”
Chieina raih china mipā chili nganurkazamlaga panglāk eina vaoda yāmshokhaowa.
Mibing chi matakhakhaida akha eina akha ngazek ngaroka. “Hi khikhala? Kadhara tamkachithei tuila? Sashap pangshap eina ngasoda makathar manglālila kasoli kala athumnala awui kahāng nganāli!”
Chieina awui sākashap chānpao chi Galileeli khalei apam kachiva̱li ngalāngda ngayaohaowa.
Chitharan Simonwui aniva̱ kharurda pisai kala hengsāda athumna awui pongli Jishuli hānga.
Chieina ana apāng rāsingkhuida akhāngmathota; chieina awui kakharur phāhaoda athumli ana otram ngatha̱mi.
Kala keinung chiwui mi kachungkha kayāngli rākazipa.
Kazātyur khangatatei kakazā mi kachungkhali raimi, kala raih kachungkha kashamshokmi; kala ana raihbingli mamatui ngasakmana, kachiwui vangkhala kaja athumna a khipākhala da thei.
Simon eina awui ngasotnaobingna ali shurvai,
kala aphākhuida hānga, “Mi saikorana nali phāda lei.”
Kha Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Ithum ruinganai keinungbingli vāusa, chili paokaphā hāshok khavai lei, khikhalajila I chiwui vang kharāna.”
Jishuna lumashanhaida apāng katingvai kala saza̱da, “Ina phaningmilakra, tharchaohaolu.” da hānga.
Chi kahāng eina khangaphār chi phāhaowa kala tharchaohaowa.

Jishuna ali, “Hi khipālikha mahāngalu, kha pāngmonli vāda chitheilu kala Mosesna kaso kahai thada nali tharmihaira kaji mibingna machutkhui khavai achigatlu” da saklak eina ningmi kala heng sāda shiunhaowa.

Kha mipā hina a kazazatli phongshar eina hāngkazatwui vang pao chi ngayaovāserhaowa. Chiwui vang Jishuna keinungli phongshar eina mazangpaithuda mi makapāna apamli apamhaowa. Chithālala apam kachiva̱wui eina ali phārai.
Zimiksho khani kathumthangwui thili Jishuna Capernaumli hanunga kala a unghaira kaji pao ngayaohaowa.
Chieina mi kachungkha rākazipta khamongphei eina tangda pamkhavai maleithuwa; kala Jishuna athumli pao hāshokpama.
Kala sheikasha̱ mi akhali mi matina ngava̱rai.
Mi chungnāhaida awui ngalemli mazangpaithuda, athumna shimtung lānphutlaga akhur chiwui eina kakazā mipa chili pet eina phonda chihotai.
Jishuna athumwui shitkasang chi theilaga sheikasha̱pali, “Inaomayara, nawui morei pheomihaira.” da hānga.
Chitharan pamkasa ain kathemabingna athumwui ningli machuka,
“Kathada hipāna hithada matuihaokhala? Hi Vareli kachipat tuina. Vare maningla morei pheomishapa khipā leikhala?”
Athumwui ningli khamachuk chi heng sāda theihaoda Jishuna hānga, “Khisāda nathumwui ningli machukphāphākhala?
Sheikasha̱pali ‘Nawui morei pheomihaira’ kaji paimeika ‘Ngakarthuida nawui pet khuiphungda zatulu’ kaji paimeikhala?
Kha miwui Naomayarana okathuili morei pheomikashapwui sāshap pangshap lei kaji nathumli ina shākhi mira.” Chieina ana sheikasha̱pali ngareivāda hānga;
“Ngakarthuilu, nawui pet khuiphungda shimli ungulu.”
Ana ngakarthuilaga hengsāda awui pet khuiphungda athumwui mangāli phongshar eina zatshokhaowa. Chi kathei eina athum matakhakhaida Vareli sochikatta hānga, “Hikatha hi rida ithum matheilakranga.”
Jishuna shamadrupheishong hanvāluishithaowa kala mi kachungkha rākazipta ana tamchithei.
Ana zatvāmamān kaji eina Alphaeuswui naomayara Levi khāshinā khalokpamli pamkasa theida ali hānga, “Ithi shurlu.” Chieina ana ngakarthuida athi shurthuwa.
Jishuna Leviwui shimli phāshakta leilakha khāshinā khaloka kala morei kaphunga mi kachungkha athi shurrāda awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda phazāruma.

Kala Jishuna morei kaphungbing eina khāshinā khalokabingli ngasoda phazākhangarum kathei eina ain kathemabing eina Phariseebingna awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngahāna, “Khi sāda ana khāshinā khalokabing eina morei kaphungbingli phazākharumkhala?”
Jishuna chi kashā eina athumli hānga, “Kazāt makhaleibingna khānong mahomana, kha kakazābingna kahona. Ina khamashungbingli hokhuikida kharā maningla, kha morei kaphungbingli hokhuikida kharāna.”
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Khām kahaipa china shakzātli kharābingli ngasopamda leilakha athum khumpairala? Khām kahaia china athumli ngasopamda leilakha eina tangda makhumpaimana.
Kha mākhām kahaia chili athumwui eina khuikathui atam rārāsāra, chithang athum khumnaora.
Mi khipānakha kachama kachonli kadhara chonsā mataksangmana, tāksangakha kadhara chonsā chi kākshokhaoda zakshimeikhar kākhaowa.

Kala khipānakha drakhāra̱ sangkhavai sāhuikhao kachamli drakhāra̱ kadhar mathaisangmana, thaisangakha drakhāra̱ china khao chi ngawokkhaida drākhāra̱la, khaola shimanhaowa, kha drakhāra̱ kadhar chiya kadhara sāhuikhaowui vangna.”
Chieina Phariseebingna ali, “Yanglu, khisāda athumna Sabbaththang ain kakai ot sākhala?”
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Davidna darkar kasā kala thaikahai tharan ali ngasokazatbingli ngasoda:

Abiatharna pāngmon kharei sāda leilakha ana kathada Varewui shimli zanglaga pāngmonbing maningla khangateibingna shaikashar Ngasokhamiwui khamui chi shaihao kala ali ngasokazatbinglila mishaihao kaji mapākhuihaira?”
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Sabbath hi miwui vangna, mi hi Sabbathwui vang sākahai maningmana;
chiwui vang eina miwui Naomayarana Sabbathwui akhavāna.”
Kala Jishuli khayon phenkhavai Sabbaththang kazāt maraiminikhala da mi kaikhana ra̱yanga.
Chieina Jishuna pāng sheikasha̱a chili, “Hili rālu” da hoi:
Kala ana athumli, “Sabbaththang kaphā kasā lah zakkashi kasā; mirin kankakhui lah shaokathat, ainna kachipā mayākhala?” da hānga. Kha athum vari eina pamhaowa.
Athumwui ning khamakang chi theilaga wukkakhanang eina malungkhavāt ngasoda ana athumli yanglaga kakazā mipa chili “Napāng katinglu” da kasoi, ana katingkashok eina khangachā apāng thāhaowa.
Chieina Phariseebingna synagoguewui eina shoklaga hengsāda Herodwui mijangbingli asamphanga kala kathada ali shaothatsikhala da ngasan ngaroka.
kala Jerusalem eina Idumea kala Jordan vāklaida khalei kala Tyre eina Sidonwui ruinganaili khalei mi kachungkhala, ana kasā saikora shāda athi shurrai.
Chieina mibingna ali masāza̱ khavai awui vang marikhong akha ngarānmilu da sākhangatha̱bingli kasoi;
kaja ana mi kachungkhali kazāt raimi kahaiwui vang kakazānao katongana ali sāza̱khui khavai ngaheirai.
Kala makathar manglā kazangbingna ali kathathei apam kachida apheizingli ngakhumzangda “Na Varewui Naomayarana” da vaowa.
Chieina Jishuna athumli a khipākhala da khipālikha mahāng khavai kasoi.
Ana tharāda khani kapangkhui, chiya ali ngayurzat khavai kala paokaphā hāshok khavai chiho khavai
kala kameoli kashamshok khavaiwui pangshap leikhavai:
Zebedeewui naomayara James eina Jameswui agato John, Jishuna Boanerges, kaja kazing khangashumwui naomayarabing da phokkhame;
Andrew, eina Philip, kala Bartholomew, kala Matthew, kala Thomas, kala Alphaeuswui naomayara James, kala Thaddaeus, kala yurli leikashe Simon,
kala Jishuli yankasaia Judas Iscariot.
Ashi shimkhurna pao chi kashā eina ahokhui khavai vai, kachiwui vangkhala kaja mibingna “A pāhaira” da ngazekhaowa.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hokhuida chānjam tui eina hānga, “Kathada Satanna satanli kashamshokpaira?
Wungram chi ngakai ngarokta mijang leingarokhaiakha chikathā wungram chi mapānpaimara.
Shimkhur hi ngakaikazamhaiakha manganingpaimara.
Satanna a khalatta yangshi ngarokta ngakaikazamhaiakha masangleila shimānhaora.
Kapanga shimva̱ chili aphei apāng makhalapranglakha mi khipānakhala awui shimli zangda awui ot mangaponkhuirarmana; kha khalaphaiakha ngapaikhuipai.
kha Manglā Katharali kachipat mi chi pheokhami masamphanglakmara; kha chi katang makhavai morei khayona”—
kaja athumna “Awuili makathar mangla zanga” da hānghairasai.
Ali mi kachungkhana kuinam pamda leilakha athumna ali, “Nava̱ eina nagato ngarāna nali phāda ayarli nganingda lei da” hānga.
Kala ana ngahānkai, “Khipāna ishava̱ kala igato ngarākhala?”
Ana ali kuimareida pamda khaleibingli yangvāda, “Yanglu, hili ishava̱ kala igato ngarā leili!
Varewui kaphaning kasā mi kachiva̱ igato, izarvā, kala ishava̱na.”
Ana chānjam tui eina apong tarākha athumli tamchithei kala awui tamkachitheili hithada hānga:
“Nganālu, athā khayaoa mi akhana athā yaokhavai vai.
Ana khayao tharan athā kaikha shongfali tatunghaida vānaona ngamuizāhaowa.
Kaikha ngalei tarākha makhalei, lungguina pemting kahai apamli tāzangda thaklāk eina kharshoka, kachiwui vangkhala kaja ngalei chi mathukmana;
kala zimik kashok eina alungbing chi angayung thukta makhaleiwui vang phuithathaowa.
Athā kaikha ka̱shatbingwui ngachaili tāzangda kashatrongbing hakkasang eina shangthathaowa, kala atheila mamatheimana.
Athā kaikha ngalei katumli tāzanga, kala ashon shonshokta hakkasangla haksanga kala atheila matheiya. Arong kaikhali thumrara, kaikhali hangthararuk kala shāshā matheiya.”
Kala ana hānga, “Shākhavai khanā kakā a china nganākhuiranu!”
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Nathumli Vare wungramwui khangathuma tui chi mikahaina, kha chili makazangbingli chānjam tui eina shākhui khangasakna.
‘Kaja, Athumna theikachanglala mamachukmara, athumna shākachanglala bhap matāmara; chithasāsi kaja athum Vareli latunghairara, kala ana athumli pheomihairara.”
Khayaoa china tui yaosanga,
Tui chi yaoda shongfali tātung kahai athābing chi hibingna; athumna tui chi shāngasha̱da Satanna rālaga athumwui wuklungli yaosang kahai tui chi khuithuihaowa.
Kala chi tākam eina lunggui khaleipamli tātung kahaibing chi hibingna, athumna tui chi shālaga mathānthathup eina khuisanga;
kala khalattawui lungli angayung maleimana, kha kasha̱nakha ringa; kha tui chiwui vang kachotkachāng, rekakharek kharā tharan heng sāda yāmhaowa.
Khangateibing chi ka̱shatlungli yaosang kahaibingna; athumna tui chi shai,
kha okathuiwui malungkharing, kashāng ningkachang, kala khangatatei otli kakahaona yuihaida tui chi shangthathaowa kala atheila mamathei ngasakmana.
Kha ngalei katumli tākatungbing chi tui chi shālaga khuikasangbing, atheila thumrāra, hangthararuk, shāshā khamatheibing china.
Phongsharki kaji maningla thumkahai khikha maleimana, lah kahorli makhuishokmara da ngathum kahaila khikha maleimana.
Shākhavai khanā kakā a china nganākhuiranu.”
Kaja khaleipali chungmei mirorra, kha makhaleipali awui leikasā eina tangda khuithuihaora.”
ngayā pi, ngathor thui kala langpongda chithāpamlala athā chi ngachakkhailaga kathada khar kala reisangkhala da ana matheimana.
Ngalei khalattana kharngasakta rimeikapta akung shok, chiwui thili amazān kala naoda māthei pemda mathei.
Kha minkahai tharan chāngkui eina hātkhui kaja māhā atam rauwa.”
Hiya ngaleili yaokasang tharanva okathuili teomeithui kaje kayānghanthā kathāna.
thālala lingsang kahai eina haksangda hanthothāp saikorawui ngachaili hakmeikap kaje ngasahaowa; aphāng kahakhakva̱ kachungkha shokta vānaobingna aphāng chiwui khaya̱li athip rāsai.”
Athumna nganākhuikashap eina tangda paokaphā chi Jishuna chānjam tarākha eina hāshoka;
chānjam mashichinla ana athumli matamchitheimana, kha sākhangatha̱bingli athumāng khaleili meisā eina saikora meikhaichithei.
Chieina athumna yaruibingli nothāhailaga ali khuiphungda marikhong chili kātongda kankāhaowa. Kala khangatei marikhongbingla ali ngasoda kānruma.
Chitharan siphan zingrot kashuirak ngasha̱ungda tara̱ ungngaphaosangda marikhong chi pemki jihaowa.
Kha Jishuva khanukvāk khamkui sanglaga pisai kala athumna mathotkhuida hānga. “Ojā, ithum thihaoki kaji maningkharikmala?”
Chieina Jishuna thuida masi chili khararra, kala shamadruli, “Chingrihaolu! Vihaolu!” da hānga. Masila maphanthuwa, chingri-vārihaowa.
Ana athumli hānga; “Khisāda nathum ngacheehaokhala? Nathum shitkasang maleimala?”
Athum matakhaknahaida akha eina akha, “Thākha mipa hi khipākhala? Masi kala shamadru eina tangdala awui kahāng nganāli!” da hāngngaroka.
Jishuna marikhong eina shokkhaleoda makathar mangla kazanga mayarnao akha chikhurshongwui eina rāngaroka,
a chikhurli pama kala mi khipānakha ali makhalaphairarmana;
kaja ali zurthing einala kala marikhānghui einala kachungkha shida narhairasai, kha marikhānghuila sāshathao, zurthingla sākazamserhaida ali tuknarshapa mi khipākha maleisāmana.
Ngashun ngayā chikhurpamli kala phungreitungli vaoshang vaotāda a khalatta ngaluggui eina aphasali reokazama.
Ana Jishuli khālada kathei eina yongvāda akhoruma;
kala panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Reikhamataiya Varewui Naomayara Jishu, nana ili khi sāki kajikhala? Varewui mingli kapona kaja ili marekharekmialu.”
Kaja “Makathar manglā, mipa hiwui eina shokulu” da Jishuna hanghairasai.
Jishuna ali ngahāna, “Nali khipa hokhala?” Ana ngahānkai, “Ili Legion hoi kaja ithum kachungkhaya!”
Mipa china athumli ngalei chiwui eina makashamihaialu da poi.
Atam chitharan chiwui ngalem kaphungpheili hok ashangva̱ akha leisai,
kala athumna Jishuli “Ithumli hokbing chili chihovāda azang ngasakmilu” da poi.
Chieina ana mayāmihao. Kala makathar manglabing china shoklaga hokbing chili azanga. Hok thingkhani sha̱kha leikasā chi amaitarenli yongtāda shamadrulungli tāzangda hikthatserhaowa.
Hok kahombing china kha̱li kala keinungli yongungda pao chi unghānga. Chieina mibingna khi shokhaokhala da ayanga.
Athumna Jishuwuili kharā tharan legion kazanga mipa chi ning mathingungda kashankachon mathāsek eina ngavailaga pamkasa chi theilaga athum ngacheelakhaowa.
Makathar manglā kazangapā eina hokbing chili khi shokmameihaokhala kaji chi katheibingna mi khangateili hāngchithei.
Chieina athumna Jishuli aramwui eina zatthuimihai khavai poi.
Ana marikhongli kākatong eina makathar manglā zangkasapa china “I nali shurraga” da poi.
Kha Jishuna mamayathuwa, kala ali “Nashi shimli ungulu kala Prohona nawui vang kayākha sāmihaira kala kayākha lumashanmikhala kaji athumli unghāngchitheilu” da hānga.
Chieina ana Decapolisli hanungda Jishuna awui vang kayākha samikhala kaji pheichithei kala kashā mi saikora matakhakhaowa.
Chitharan Synagoguewui akhava Jairusna apam chili rai kala Jishuli kathei eina awui pheizingli ngakhumzangta
ana “Inao ngalāva̱ kathi mayuk eina pida lei. Nana awuitungli napāng kharāsazāmilu. Chithākha a mathimara” da panglāk eina poi.
Chieina Jishuna ali ngasovai kala mi kachungkhala shurvada ali puiruizata.
Apam chili zingkum tharāda khani ashee ngayā kahai sha̱nao akha leisai.
Khanong kachungkhali yangngasakhailala marsangmeihaowa.
Ana Jishuwui maramli mi khangateibingna khangazek shāhairasai. Chieina ana yarui kakazip khanukshong vālaga,
“Ina awui kachonli thada saza̱khuisi kaja railakra” da a khalatta machuka.
Ana awui kachonli saza̱ya kala ashee khangaya̱ chi ngalāngda thenghaowa, kala awui kakazā chila raichaohaowa.
Hengsāda Jishuna awui eina pangshap shokhaira kaji theida yarui ashangva̱ chili kapeiunglaga hānga, “Iwui kachonli khipāna saza̱khala?”
Awui sākhangatha̱bingna ngahānkai; “Nali mi hiyākhana kuinamda leilaga kathada ili khipāna saza̱khala da hangli?”
Kha khipāna saza̱khala da yangkhui khavai ana kuimareida yanga.
Kha sha̱naopava̱ china ali shokkahai chi theilaga ngacheerarang, kathirriri eina rāda ngakhumshām shokkahai otshot saikora rahānga.
Kala ana ali hānga, “Inao ngalāva̱, nawui shitkasang china nali phāngasakhaira, chingri eina ungulu, kala nawui kazāt raihaoranu.”
Ana matuimahungda leilakha Jairuswui shim eina kachikathā mi akhana rāda ali rahānga, “Nanao ngalāva̱ aruicham thihaira. Khisāda ojāli sheikhautluisara?”
Kha Jishuna manganāsangmila synagoguewui akhavā chili hānga, “Mangacheealu, thada shitsangmalu.”
Chiwui thili ana Peter, James kala agato John maningla mi khipālikha mashurra ngasakmana.
Athumna synagogue akhavāwui shimli vākashung tharan ngaunlop mibingna akhon panglāk eina chapngachāda leikasā chi Jishuna athei.
Ana shimlungli zanglaga athumli hānga; “Khisāda ngaunlop chapkhangachākhala? Nao hi kathi maningmana kha kapina!”
Athumna ali mana̱shiya, chi eina ana athum saikorali kayāngli kashamshokserhailaga nao chiwui ava̱ avā kala awui sākhangatha̱ kathum chili hokhuiphungda nao chili chipethaida khaleishong zanga.
Jishuna apāng singkhuida, “Talitha, cumi,” chiwui kakhalata “Kateowa sha̱nao, Ina nali kahāngna, ngakarthuilu” kajina.
Chieina ana ngalāngda ngakarthuilaga zatphokuwa (A zingkum tharāda khani kāhairasai). Hi kashok eina athum matakhakhaowa.
Kala Jishuna athumli mi khipālikha mahāngpailakmara da kasoi kala “Ali shaikhavai khuimilu” da hānga.

Kala Sabbaththang ana synagogueli tamchitheiphokuwa; kala awui tui nganākakhui mi kachungkhana matakhakhaida hāngngaroka, “Ana saikora hi kachili atamkhui khala? Ali mikahai hi khi thangmeikhala? Apāngna kayakha hakhamahā ot sashapkhala!
Hi Marywui naomayara, kala James, Joseph, Judas kala Simonwui achinā mistrypa chi maningmala? Azarva̱ngara ithumli mangasopammala?” Chieina athumna ali mamayāngaithuwa.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Marānliva kachichāramli shangnao ramnao kala shimkhurna kajimada apam kachiva̱li khayāmakashi maleimana.”
Kala ana athumwui mashitkasang chi theilaga matakhakhai.
Chiwui vang ana kha̱kha̱li vāda tamchithei.
Ana athumli, khāmshui maningla khangatei kaja kashakazā, paidu, kala shāneirali lupā akhala makhuiphung khavai;
kha pheihopva tonglaga, phahonva khani masangkhavai ningmi.
Ana hānga, “Nathumna vāzang kahai shim chili nathum mazatranglakha eina tangda pamlu.
Kala kachikatha apamli nathumli mazun ngasakakha kala manganāsangakha, nathum kazat tharan athumli makhamayawui shākhi kachithei sāda pheili kakā chifa chi kathangtāhailu.”
Kala athumna kameo kachungkha kashamshoka kala kakazānao kachungkhali thao neomida raimi.
Kha kaikhana “Elijahna” da hānga kala khangatei kaikhana “Achālakhawui maran kathā akhana” da hānga.
Kha Herod awungana chi kashā eina “Ina akui rangtāmi kahai John chi ringlui kahaina” da hānga.
Kaja Herodna agato Philip preiva̱ Herodiasli ngakum kahaiwui vang Johnli tukkhui khavai a khalattana kasoi kala khalaplaga phātopli sanghai.
Kaja Johnna Herodli, “Nana nagato preiva̱li khangakum hi ain maningmana” da hānga.
Chiwui vang eina Herodiasna awuitungli malungvātlakhaoda shaothatngai. Kha a chi mararsamana;
kaja Herodna John hi khamashunga kala kathara mina da katheiwui vang ali ngacheelaka, chiwui vang eina ana ngākmi. Awui tui shākachida ning pa̱ngapālaklala ana awui tui nganāngailaka.
Kha Herodna awui kapharā zimiksho ungshungthang khangam-kharei, akhavā kasābing kala Galileewui kathānabing saikorali zātkhān kasā chitharan khamahai atam samphanga.
Herodiaswui nao ngalāva̱na chakoi rasāda Herod eina awui ngasotnaobingli penngasaka; chieina Herodna ngalāva̱ chili hānga, “Nana ningkachāngchāng polu, ina nali mira.”
Ana “Nana kapopo ina mira, iwui wungram tangkhai eina tangdala mira” da ngashithaisai.
Ana ava̱va̱li, “Ili khi polu jikhala?” da ungngahāna. Ava̱va̱na “Ra̱hikme Johnwui kui” da ngahānkai.
Ngalāva̱ china awungawuili totot vālaga “Ra̱hikme Johnwui kui arui khongphei hili sangmilu” da apoi.
Kala awunga wukhananglakhaowa, chithālala awui tuingahit kala ngasotnaobingwui vang eina ali ngashitsang kahai tui chhi mahatngathuwa.
Kala awungana hengsāda shipai akha hokhuilaga Johnwui kui khuirā khavai kasoi. Ana phātopli Johnwui kui arangkhui,
laga kui chi khongpheili sanglaga ngalāva̱ chili khuiungmi kala naongalāva̱na ava̱va̱li mihaowa.
Johnwui sākhangatha̱bingna pao hi kashā eina athumna awui angun chi akhuilaga chifahaowa.
Jishuna athumli, “Ngachakyang kahai apam akhali vāhaosa, laga nathum chili angasāmkhuilu” da hānga. Kaja mi chungnā kashok-kazang sāhaoda athum leiyālak eina phākashak-phakazā atamla masamphangmana.
Chieina athumna marikhong tonglaga ngachakyang kahai apam akhali vai.
Athum zatkahai chi mi kachungkhana theihaoda keinung saikorawui eina athumli kharomrai kala Jishu eina awui sākhangatha̱bingli athumna vāshungrihaowa.
Jishuna marikhongwui eina kārkashok tharan mi kachungkha chili theida lumashanlakhaowa, kaja athum yaokahoma makhalei yaobing thai. Chieina ana athumli apong kachungkha tamchitheiphoka.
Kazing khaying eina sākhangatha̱bingna Jishuli vahānga, “Hiya mi makapāna apamna kala kazingla yingura;
kachichāwui kashakazā alozā khavai kuikhamareili khalei kha̱ kala keinungbingli athumli chihovāhaosa.”
Kha Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathumna athumli zākhavai khamilu.” Athumna ngahāna, “Athumli mizā khavai denari shākhani sha̱khawui khamui alokhuilu kajila?”
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Nathumwuili khamui kayākha leikhala? Angathingyanglu.” Kala athumna ngathingkakhui eina “Khamui phangā, khaih khani leili” da ngahānkai.
Chieina yarui ashang chi khum-khum sālaga wonuitung chili pamngasaklu da Jishuna sākhangatha̱bingli hānga.
Chieina mibing china shāshā, hangphangānga eina ashang sālaga pama.

Jishuna khamui phangā kala khaih khani chi singkhuilaga kazingramli yangkāda sokhami pomi kala khamui chi serkhaida yaruili yaovā khavai sākhangatha̱bingli mi kala khaih khani chila chithada ngayarmisera.
Athum saikorana shai kala ningyāng unglakhaowa.
Athumna khamui eina khaih shaitai chi luk tharāda khani kazipkhui.
Khamui chi kazā mi mashing chi thing phangāna.
Athumli ngapak kahaiwui thili ana phungreili seihā sākhavai vai.
Kazing khaying tharan marikhong chi ngayi alungthungli leisai, kha ava ngayipheili leisai.
Masi chi athumli ngasunglaga phanhaokada athumna marikhong chi khananglāk eina huikazat ana thei. Kala ngaya pung khamate kathali ana ngayitungli zatta athumwuili rai. Athumli rikhui khavai khavāna,
kha ana tara̱tungli kazat chi athumna theilaga kameona da phaninga kala vaotaraiya,
kaja athumna ali kathei eina ngacheeshunhaowa. Kha Jishuna hengsāda athumli hānga, “Pingmeilu, ilaka, mangacheealu.”
Ana athumwuili vālaga marikhonglungli kākatong eina masi chi va̱rihaowa. Sakhangatha̱bing chi matakhakhaowa,
kaja athumna mi thingphangāli mikazāwui kakhalatla bhap matāthuwa; athumwui ning makanghaowa.
Athumna marikhongwui eina kashok tharan mibingna hengsāda Jishuli theihaowa,
chieina athumna apam saikorawui eina kakazānaobingli pet eina phonda Jishu leiyi ji da kashapam kajida khuirai.

Ana kha̱lila, keinunglila kala ayarlila khavāvāpam kachida mibingna leihngapha̱li kakazānaobing rachipetta awui chontheirali eina tangda saza̱khui ngasak khavai poi, kala saza̱kakhui mi saikora kharai samphanga.
awui sākhangatha̱bingna khamakhao pāng, chiya pāng mamazikla phakazā chi thei.
(Kaja awo-ayibingwui khangachā mayonda Phariseebing kala Jihudi saikorana pāng mamazikla maphazāmana;
athumna leihngapha̱wui eina hankhaung tharan mara̱vairanglakha maphazāmana. Chili lāngmeida tengkot, khongphei kala mariham kathā kapheowui khangachāyan athumna khamayon tarākha lei.)
‘Mibing hina ili morchai eina khayāshiya,
kha athumwui ning iwui eina katava̱li lei;
aremali athumna ili khoruma,
athumna miwui khangachāyan chi Varewui tuina da tamchithei.’
Nathumna Varewui ningkhami horhailaga, miwui khangachāyanli sakmeikhar mayonhaowa.”
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Nathumwui khangachāyan mayon khavaiwui vang Varewui ningkhami horhai khavai nathum apong khamathā akha lei!
Kaja Mosesna ningmihai, ‘Nava̱ navāli khayashilu kala avāva̱li lah ava̱va̱li khonkashe mi chi thira’;
kha nathumna hānga, mi akhana avāva̱ lah ava̱va̱li, iwui eina nana kānkhanā samphangkapai chi ‘Hi Corbanna’ (kaja Vareli mikahaina) da hānghaiakha,
chiwui thili nana ava̱ avāwui vang khikha masa ngasakluimana,
chithada sāda nathumna zatkhana hāngkhamaron chiwui vang eina Varewui ningkhami chi khamasai ngasa ngasaka. Nathumna hithada kasā khangatei kachungkha lei.
Chieina Jishuna mibingli hokhuiluishitlaga athumli, “Nathum saikora nganālu kala theishingkhuilu.
Ayarwui eina kazang china mi chili khikha makhao ngasakrarki kaji maleimana, kha alungwui eina kashok china makhao khangasakna.
Shākhui khavai khanā kakā a china shākhuiranu.”
Ana hānga, “Nathumla theishingkakhui maleirangla? Ayarwui eina kazang china mi chili khikha mamakhao ngasakrarmana kaji nathum bhap matāthula?
Khikhalajila chi wuklungli kazang maningla paiphonli kazangna kala chi ayarli shokpapamhaowa.” (hiya kashakazā katonga thara da phongkhamina.)
Kaja miwui wuklungwui eina makaphā ningphanin, shāmkasa, khaleekasa̱, shaokathat, phokaphā,
kākharām, mikhanam, makhangatun, yuikashi, ngashimkashi, langkaso, mangkhama̱ hikathāthā shoka.
Saikora hi mi chiwui alung eina kashokna kala makhao khangasakna.”
Anao ngalāva̱li makathar mangla kazanga preinao akhana Jishu rāhaira da kashā eina hengsāda vālaga awui pheizingli ngakhumshama.
Preiva̱ chi Syrophonicianaona. Ana awui naongalāva̱wui eina raih chi kakashamshokmilu da poi.
Kala ana sha̱nao chili hānga, “Naoshinaobing rida thofaranu, kaja naoshinaobingwui zāt khuilaga fali hormi kahai mangachāmana.”
Kha sha̱nao china ngahānkai, “Mashunga amei, chithālala naoshinaobingwui zātpā tākatung chi tablezingli kapama fala ngamuizai!”
Chieina ana ali hānga, “Nana chi kahāngwui vang shimli ungulu. Nanao ngalāva̱wui eina raih chi shokhaira.”
Ana shim hankhaung eina nao chi petli pisai kala raih chi awui eina shokkachanghairasai.
Kala athumna khanā makashā kala khakla makashok akha khuirāda Jishuli awui pāng parzāmi khavai rāpoi.
Chieina Jishuna amāngli thānkhuilaga yaruiwui eina thuihaowa kala akhanāli apāng thara̱sanga kala apāngli machora̱ mashorrorlaga kakazāpawui maleli sāza̱ya;
kala ngahuida kazingram yangkāda hānga, “Ephphatha” kaja “Shohaolu” kajina.
Kala ngalāngda mipa chiwui khanā shohaowa, amalela khalāmihaoda matuihaowa.
Kala ana mi khipālikha mahangalu da athumli ningmi; kha athumna mataimeida vaomalāna.
Kala athum matakhaknāhaida, “Ot saikora ana phālak eina sāmihaira; ana khangakhoka kala khangasha̱ali eina tangda shāngasak, kala matui ngasakhaira” da hānga.
“Mibing hili lumashanlaka, kaja athumna ili ngasokapam hi zimiksho kathumthang kaura kala athum ara zākhavaila maleithura;
ina athumli kakhum eina shimli shiunhaiakha, athum shongfali vānhaora kaja kaikhava katava̱wui eina kharāna.”
Kala awui sākhangatha̱bingna ngahānkai, “Siwuk hili kachiwui khamui vākhuida mi hiyakhali phāchizatpaira?”
Jishuna athumli ngahāna, “Nathumwuili khamui kayākha leikhala?” Athumna ngahānkai, “Shini lei.”
Chieina Jishuna mi saikora chili pamzanglu da kasoi, kala khamui shini chi khuida Vareli ningkashi mi kala serkhailaga yaruili yaokhavai awui sākhangatha̱bingli mi; athumna yaruili yaowa.
Athumwuili khaihla kateokha leisai; Jishuna chiwui vang Vareli ningkashi milaga yaruili yaokhavai mi.
Athumna chi shailaga tholakhaowa kala athumwui shaitai luk shini pemda kazipkhui.
Kala chili mi thingmati sha̱kha leisai.
Kala Jishuna mibing chili shiunhaowa; kala ana hengsāda marikhong kātonglaga awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda Dalmanutha ngaleivāk vāhaowa.
Kha ana khananglak eina ngahuida hānga, “Mithot hina khisāda machut kaphākhala? Ina nathumli kachangkhat eina kahāngna, mithot hili machut khikhala machitheimara.”
Ana athumli nothāhailaga marikhong tongda lākhavāk kānkāhaowa.
Sakhangatha̱bingna athumwui khamui malaihaida makhuiphungthuwa; marikhong chili athum khamuihāng akhamāng leisai.
Jishuna athumli “Ning ngasharda khuiphunglu, Pharisee eina Herodwui khawok chili ngasharlu kala mangarumhaialu.” da hānga.
Athum akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta “Ithum khamui maleimana” da hānga.
Chi theihaoda, Jishuna athumli hānga, “Khamui makhuikaphungwui vang khisāda nathum ngazek ngarokhala? Nathum aruila mamachukrang kala bhap matārangla? Nathumwui ning makanghaola?
Mik kālaga matheirarmala, khanā kalaga mashārarmala? Kala nathum maphaningungmala?
Ina mi thingphangāwui vang khamui phangā serkhailaga mizāthang nathumna shaitai luk kayākha kaziphuikhala?” Athumna “Tharada khanina” da ngahānkai.
“Kala mi thingmatiwui vang ina khamui shini serkhaida mishaithang shaitai luk kayākha nathumna kazipkhuikhala?” da Jishuna ngahānna. Athumna “Shinina” da hānga.
Ana athumli “Arui eina tangda bhap matārangla?” ji.
Jishuna khangapeoa chili thara̱khuilaga kha̱wui ayarvāk thānshoka; ana mipa chiwui mikli machora̱ mashorrorhailaga awuitungli pāng parrorda, “Khikhikha matheilikhala?” da ngahāna.
Ana yangkāda, “Mi theili, kha thingrong kazat thai.”
Jishuna mipa chiwui mikli apāng saza̱luishita; ana panglāk eina kharak tharan saikora mathingrik eina theihaowa.
Jishuna ali, “Kha̱lunglila mazangluialu” da kasolaga shimli shiunhaowa.
Chieina athumna, “Mi kaikhana Ra̱hikme Johnna ji, kaikhana Elijahna ji, khangatei kaikhana marānbingwui ngachaili akhara ji” da ngahānkai.
“Kha nathumna ili khipāna da phaningkhala?” da ngahāna. Peterna “Na Khrista china” da ngahānkai.
Kala Jishuna athumli awui maramli khipālikha mahāngalu da ningmi.
Kala ana chi shenglak eina hāngmi. Kala Peterna ali hokhuilaga kaharphoka.
Kha Jishuna ngareiungda sākhangatha̱bingli yanglaga Peterli kaharda hānga, “Ikhanukshong unghaolu, Satan! Na Varewuishong maningla mikumowuishong lei.”
Kaja khalatta awui mirin huikhuiki kaje a chi awui mirin shimānra; kala iwui vang kala paokaphāwui vang mirin shimankhame a china ringra.
Mi akhana okathui katonga samphanglala awui mirin shimānhaiakha awui tongkazā khi leikhala?
Mi akhana awui mirin chi khi eina ngatha̱khuishapkhala?
Vareli makathei makaphā thot hili kachikathāna iwui kala iwui tuiwui vang khayakakha, miwui Naomayarana Avāwui tekhamatei eina kazingraobingli ngasoda kharā tharan awui vangla khayakhaora.”
kala awui kachon hānshi eina charshihai kala okathuili kachon khangasa̱ minala chithada ngasa̱khuikapai maningmana.
Elijah eina Moses apam chili rāda Jishuli chan tākhangazek athumna thei.
Chieina Peterna Jishuli hānga, “Ojā, ithum hili leikasā phālakhaira, ithumna nawui vang akha, Moseswui vang akha kala Elijahwui vang akha da rāmnao kathum sakhuisa.”
Kaja athum ngacheenahaida a khi hāngsikhala da matheithuya.
Chiwui thili muiyā ngapuiungda athumli rommithaowa kala muiyālungwui eina akhon akha vaorai, “Hi iwui khaluma Naomayarana, awui tui nganālu.”
Athumna kashuirak eina hengsāda kapeikhayang tharan Jishu maningla athumli khipākha ngasopamkasa matheimana.
Chieina athumna “Kathiwui eina ringshokra kajiwui kakhalat khikhala,” da ngazek ngarokphokuwa, kha shokkahai otshot chiya athum khalattawui ningli thumhai.
Chieina athumna Jishuli ngahānna, “Khiwui vang eina ain kathemabingna Elijahna rārira da hānghaokhala?”
Jishuna, “Elijahna ot saikora hankhuiluishit khavai rida rai; kala miwui Naomayarawui pongli kakhanang kala mana̱kashi kachungkha samphangrada Kathara Lairikli kathada kapihailikhala?
Kha ina nathumli kachangkhat eina kahāngna, Elijah rāhaira kala awui pongli kapi kahai thada ali athumwui ningyāng khaung sakhuihaira.”
Hengsāda athum katongana Jishuli theida matakhakhai kala athumna ngasamvāda ali vāngarokkhui.
Chieina ana athumli ngahāna, “Nathum athumli khi khangayatkhala?”
Yarui ngachaiwui eina mi akhana ngahānkai, “Ojā, inaomayarali khak khangasha̱wui kameo zanghaida nali khuikharāna;

kameo china nganurhaiakha nao chi ngaleili saosangda aporhop tarārā shoklaga ahāla kajetta phasāla mararshaphaowa; chiwui vang nawui sākhangatha̱bingli kashamshokmi khavai kahāng tharan athum masāmirarthuwa.”
Chieina ana athumli ngahānkai, “O shitkasang makhalei thot, ina nathumli karankha ngasopamfarakhala kala samifarakhala? Iwuili khuirālu.”
Athumna nao chi awuili khuirai; kala kameo china Jishuli theikhaleoda naoshinaopā chili nganurkazama kala ngaleili saosangda ngaleokazamlaga khamorli aporhop hiyaya shoka.
“Hithada kakazā hi karankhahaira?” da Jishuna avāva̱ chili ngahānna. “Nganuilakhawui eina kazāphalunga.
Kameo china ali shimān khavai kala thikhavai meilunglila, tara̱lunglila tarākhashida horsanghaira, khikhikha sāmipaiakha lumashanmida ishili khangachonmilu.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Samipaiakha kajila? Shitkasanga awui vanga ot saikora sapaisera.”
Avāva̱ china hengsāda chapta hānga, “Ina shitsanga, iwui mashitsangkasangwui vang ngachonmilu.”

Jishuna yarui ashangva̱ chi athumwuili yongkharā chi theida, ana makathar mangla chili khararda hānga, “Khangasha̱a kala khangakhoka manglā, ina kakasona, awui eina shokulu kala ali marāzangluilakalu.”
Kala panglak eina chapta ali khanukazamhailaga shokhaowa, kala nao chi kathi angun thāhaowa; chieina athum kachungana, “A thihaira” da hānga.
Kha Jishuna awui pāng singkhuida khāngkhamathot eina thuinganingrāsai.
Jishuna shimlung zangkahaiwui thili sākhangatha̱bingna ngathumsāda ali ngahāna, “Khiwui vang ithumna makashamshokrarthu kajikhala?”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “Hikatha hiya seihā kasā eina maningla makashamshokrarmana.”
kachiwui vangkhala jilaga chitharan awui sākhangatha̱bingli tamchitheida leisai: “Miwui Naomayarali mibingwui pāngli horsangmida athumna ali shaothathaora kha kathumthangwui thili ringshokluishitra.”
Kha athumna awui tamkachithei chi khikhala da bhap matāthuwa kala khangahānla mangahānlengthuwa.
Kha athumna mangahānkāthuwa, khiwui vangkhala jilaga athumna shongfali khipa reimeikapkhala kaji ngazeka.
Jishuna pamzangda tharāda khani chili hokhuida hānga, “Khare sāga jiakha saikorali naomeithuira kala saikorawui rao sāra.”
Kala ana naoshinao akhali thara̱khuida athumwui alungthungli vamkhuilaga athumli hānga,
“Kachikathāna imingwui vang hikathā naoshinaoli khuikasang chi ili khuikasangna; ili khuikasang chi imāngli maningla ili kashirāta alila khuikasangna.”
Kha Jishuna hānga, “Ali makhāmhaialu, khikhalajila iwui ming singda matakhak kahai ot kasā mi khipākha ili mamashātmara.
Kaja ithumli mangakaikashe a chi ithumwui mina.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna iwui mi kasingwui vang kachikathāna tara̱ tengkotkha mikhamangwui sāman kachilikha mashimānlakmara.”
Chiwui vang eina nawui pāngna nali morei sangasakakha, katattāhaolu; nawui vanga pāng khani kālaga kazeiram vāki kajile, pāng makāla katang makhavai kharingli kazang phamei.
Chile athumwui mathan kathi mavaimana kala meila khamit mavaimana.
Napheina nali morei sangasakakha, katattāhaolu; nawui vanga phei khani kālaga kazeiram horsangki kajile phei mareida katang makhavai kharingli kazang phamei.
Namikna nali morei sangasakakha, latshokhaolu; nawui vanga mik khani kālaga kazeiramli horsangki kajile mik lākhavākmāng kālaga Varewui wungramli kazangna phamei,
chili athumli kashaia mathan chi kathi mavaimana kala meila khamit mavaimana.
Kaja mi kachivali mei eina tharngasakra.
“Machi hi kānālaka, kha machi chi chiwui katum shimānhaiakha khi eina tum ngasakrakhala?
“Nathum khalattawui alungli machi leingasaklu kala akha eina akha chingri eina pānrumlu.”
Pharisee kaikhana ali chāng yangkida rangahāna, “Preiva̱li kapāng hi ainna mayāla?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Mosesna nathumli kathada kasokhala?”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Mipa china kapāngwui lairik akha kapilaga pānghaipai da Mosesna mayai.”
Kha Jishuna hānga, “Nathumwui ning khamakangwui vang Mosesna ain hi kagapina.
Kha otsem haokaphokwui ‘Varena athumli mayarnao eina sha̱nao sāmi’ da kathara lairikli kapihai.
Chiwui vang eina mayara china ava̱ avā horhailaga preiva̱li ngarumhaowa,
kala khani chi akha ngasāhaowa. Khani maningluimana kha asa akha ngasahaowa.
Chiwui vang eina Varena ngarummi kahai chili mi khipānakha masākhaiaranu.”
Athumna shimlung kazang eina sākhangatha̱bingna hiwui pongli Jishuli ngahānlui.
Ana athumli hānga, “Kachikathāna preiva̱li pānghailaga khangatei akhali ngakumhaiakha ana phokaphana.
Chi tākam eina preiva̱na gaharali pānghailaga fathuihaiakha ana phokaphana.”
Jishuna chi kathei tharan malungvāthaowa kala athumli hānga, “Naoshinaobingli iwuili rāngasaklu; mahaphailu; kaja Varewui wungram chi chikathābingwuina.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, Varewui wungram chi naoshinao akhana khuikasang thada makhuisangakha kachilikha chili mazangmara.”
Chieina ana athumli vamkhuida athumwuitungli pāng parrorda somi.
Jishuna ali hānga, “Khisāda ili kaphā hokhala? Vare maningla kaphā khipākha maleimana.
Ningkhamibing chi nana thei: ‘Mashaothatpaimana, maphophāpaimana, maleepaimana, makapikpaimana, maminampaimana, kala nava̱ navāli khayashilu.’”
Kala ana ngahānkai, “Ojā, ina saikora hi nganuilakhawui eina mayonrā kahaina.”

Jishuna ali yangtitlaga leishida hānga, “Nawui khavāt akha lei; ungulu kala nawui khalalei saikora ungyorhailaga kachāmabingli mihaolu, chithākha kazingramli nawui lan kaziphaira; kala rāda ithi shurlu.”
Ana chi kahāng eina awui mai ngayumtir eina khanangzangda hanunghaowa kaja awui shimlui kachungkha leisai.
Chieina Jishuna sākhangatha̱bingli yanglaga, “Varewui wungramli zangkida kashāngbingwui vang kayākha sakrakhala?” da hānga.
Sakhangatha̱bingna awui tui chi shālaga matakhakhaowa. Kha Jishuna athumli latluida hānga, “Naongarā, Varewui wungramli zangki kaji kayākha sakkhala!
Kashānga mina Varewui wungramli zangki kajile utna kapimkhurli ngara̱kashok paimei.”
Chieina sākhangatha̱bing chi matakhaknahaida ali hānga, “Chithākha khipa kahui samphangpaira?”
Jishuna athumli yangda hānga, “Miwui vang masākapaina, kha Varewui vang chi maningmana, kaja Vareva saikora sāpaisera.”
Chieina Peterna yirphokta hānga, “Yanglu, ithum ot saikora horhaida nathi shurhaira.”
Jishuna hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, shimluila, achinā ngarāla, azara̱ngarāla, ava̱-avā kala naongarāla iwui vang kala paokaphāwui vang horhaishapakha
mi chi shimluila, achināngarāla, azarva̱ngarala, ava̱ngarala, naongarāla, chili lāngda rekakharekla thot hili shāshā mataida samphangra; kala rakharā thotli makashimān kharing samphangra.
Kha aja khare kasā kachungkha khanaowa sāra kala khanaobingna khare sahaora.”

hānga, “Yanglu, ithum Jerusalem shangkida zatli, chili miwui Naomayarali pāngmon akhokabing eina ain kathemabingwui pāngli horsangmida athumna shaothat khavai khayon mira kala Gentilebingwui pāngli horsangmira;
athumna ali mana̱shira, machora̱la mashorrora, lijei einala ngaphitra kala sakathatla sāthatra, kha kathumthangwui thili a ringshokluira.”
Ana “Naniwui vang ili khi sāmi ngasakngaikhala?” da ngahānna.
Kala anina ali hānga, “Nawui tekhamateili, ini akhali yāshong, akhali uishong kachipammilu.”
Kha Jishuna anili hānga, “Nanina kapo chi khikhala da nani matheimana. Ina khamang tengkot chi nani mangshaprala kala ili ra̱kahik chi ra̱hikshaprala?”
“Ini shapra” da anina ngahānkai. Jishuna anili hānga, “Ina khamang tengkot chi nanina mangra, kala ili ra̱kahik ra̱hit chi eina nanilila ra̱hikra;
kha iwui yāshong kala uishong khipāli pamngasakra̱khala da kakapang hi iwui maningmana, kha Varena ngaranping kahai athumwui vangna.”
Athum tharā china chi kashā tharan James eina Johnli malungvāthaowa.
Chieina Jishuna athum saikorali hokhuida hānga, “Nathumna thei, kaja Gentilebingli mungrānbingna athumwuitungli munga, kala athumwui khangaramabingna athumwuitungli pangshap singa.
Kha nathumwui alungliva chi maleimana kaja nathumwui alungli reikhangaiapa china saikorawui rao sāphalungra,
kala nathumwui ngachaili khare sakhangaipa china saikorawui raonao sāra.
Kaja miwui Naomayara eina tangda ali otram ngatha̱mi ngasak khavai kharā maningla ana otram ngatha̱mi khavai kala kachungkhawui vang ngatangman sāda amanglā chigatmi khavai kharāna”
Ana Nazarethwui Jishu apam chili leiya da kashā eina panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Davidwui naomayara Jishu, ili khalumashanmilu!”
Chieina mi kachungkhana ali khararda kasainakha pamlu da hānga; kha ana pangmeida vaowa, “Davidwui Naomayara, ili khalumashanmilu!”
Jishuna ngasāmlaga, “Ali hokhuilu” da kasoi. Chieina athumna mik khangapeoa chili hokhuida hānga; “Ringphālu; ngakarthuilu, ameina nali hoda lei.”
Ana awui kachon raitāhailaga ngakarthuida Jishuli rai.
Jishuna “Nana ili khi sāmi ngasakngaikhala?” da ngahāna.
Khangapeoa china ngahānkai, “Ojā, imik theingasakmilu.”
Chieina Jishuna hānga, “Ungulu; nawui shitkasangna nali phāngasakhaira.” Chili ngalāngda kathei samphanga kala Jishuwui thi shurthuwa.
kala anili hānga, “Mangāshong khalei kha̱ chili vālu kala chili vazangkhaleoda mina matonglakrang kaji gadhānao akha hokhaisara. Chi akhalākhuilaga khuiunglu.
Kachikathā mina ‘Khi kasakhala’ da ngahānakha ‘Prohona savai khavai leili, kala thaklāk eina chihoungra’ da hānglu.”
Chieina anina vai kala chānreipheichangli gadhānao akha khamongli hokhaisai. Anina chi khalāmahunglakha,
chili nganingkasābingna “Khisāda gadhānao chi kakhalākhala?” da ngahāna.
Chieina anina Jishuna hāngkhami tākam eina ngahānkai, kala anili zatngasakhaowa.
Anina gadhānao chi Jishuli khuiungmi, kala athumna athumwui kachon gadhā chiwuitungli hammida Jishuna kātonga.
Mi kachungkhana shongfali athumwui kachon hammi; kaikhana khararwui eina timfa kahai thingphāng reokhuilaga hammi.
Mangāshong kazatbingla kala khanukshong kazatbingla “Hosanna! Proho mingli kharā a chili ka̱lā mahaimeiranu!”
“Rakharā ishava Davidwui wungram ka̱lā mahaimeiranu! Juikhamataiali hosanna” da panglāk eina vaowa.
Khalāda khaorārong anah phungyir eina theida athei matheilapai da ayanga. Ana chili khavā eina anah maningla khikhala masamphangthuwa, kaja athei khamathei atam maningsāmana.
Chieina ana hānga, “Nawui eina athei mi khipānakha mashailakranu!”
Chi awui sākhangatha̱bingna shai.
kala ana mi khipālikha khorumshimwui kayāng kānzangda otnao akhala makhuizang ngasakmana.
Chiwui thili mibingli ana tamchithei: “Hithada makapihaimala, ‘Iwui shim hi yur saikorawui seihā sākhavai shim hora’ kha nathumna khalebingwui shim sāngasakhaira.”
Pāngmon akhokabing eina ain kathemabingna chi shālaga ali shaothat khavai apong phai; kala mi kachungkha china awui tamkachithei matakhak kahaiwui vang athumla ali ngacheehaowa.
Peterna phaningungda Jishuli hānga, “Ojā, yanglu! nana khonshi kahai khaorārong chi thengchenghaira.”
Chieina Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Vareli shitsanglu.

Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, kachikathāna phungrei hili ‘Phurkhuilaga shamadruli ahorsanghaolu’ da ning khamaong maleilakla kha ana kahāng chi ungshungra da shitsangakha, makahatlakla ungshungra.
Chiwui vang eina ina nathumli kahāngna seihā kasāli nathumna kapopo chi samphanghaira da shitsanglu, kala chi nathumwui ngasāra.
Kala nathumna nganingda seihā kasā tharan, nana makhamayā mi leisaakha pheomihaifalu; chithākha kazingramli khalei nathumwui Avānala nawui khayon pheomira.
(Kha nathumna mapheomiakha kazingramli khalei nathumwui Avānala nathumwui khayon mapheomimara.”)
“Nana otbing hi khipāwui pangshap eina kasakhala lah khipāna hi sākhavai pangshap mikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathumli ina khangahān akha sāra; chi ili ngahānkāmilu, kala ina hi khiwui pangshap eina kasakhala da hāngmira.
Johnwui ra̱kahik hi kazingramwui einaka mikumowui einakhala? Ngahankāmilu.”
Athum akha eina akha ngayat ngaroka, “Ithumna ‘kazingramwui einana’ da hāngakha ‘Khisāda ali mashitsangthu’ jira,
‘Mikumowui einana’ jisa, athum mibing chili ngacheehaowa kaja mi saikorana John hi kachangkhat marānna da khui.
Chieina athumna Jishuli ‘Ithum matheimana’” da ngahānkai.
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Chithākha hibing hi khiwui pangshap eina kasākhala da inala mahāngmara.”
Atam ungkashung tharan khamasābingwui eina amasātman athei akhui khavai rao akha chihovai.
Athumna ali tukkhuilaga shaoshaomihailaga khamasai eina shiunhaowa.
Ana khangatei rao akhali chihovaluishita, kala athumna alila akuili khamā za̱mida khayaklak eina samilaga shiunhaowa.
Akhavā china rao khangatei akha chiholui, kha athumna ali shaothathaowa; chithada sāda khangatei kachungkhali chihovālaga kaikhali shaomi, kaikhali shaothathaowa.
Khangatei akha leisafaya, chi awui khaluma naomayarana; naomeikapta, ana ‘Inaomayarali athumna khayāshira’ da phaninglaga ali chihovai.
Kha khamasābing chi akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta hānga, ‘Shimluikatpa chi hina, ali shaothathaosa, chithākha awui shimlui ithumwui sahaora!’
Chieina athumna ali tukkhuilaga shaothathaowa kala yāmguiwui ayarli horshokhaowa.
Drakhā yāmguiwui akhavā china khi sangayikhala? Ana unglaga khamasābing chili shaothatserhaora kala yāmgui chi kateibingli mihaora.
Kathara tui hi nathum mapārangla:
‘Shim kasābingna horkahai ngalung chi
achithekwui khamakhoka ngasāhaira.
Hi Prohowui otsakna,
kala hi ithumwui mikyanli matakhakhai’?”

Athumna ali rangahāna, “Ojā, na khamashunga kala mimai makhayanga mina da thei, kaja nava miwui shingamli mayangmana, kha mikumowui vang Varewui kaphaningwui mashun chi tamchithei. Caesarli khāshina khami hi ainka, maningmakhala?”
Miraka, mamimara? Kha athumwui phakharek chi theida, ana athumli hānga, “Ili khisāda chāng yangkhala? Lupāsā akha khuirālu, ina yangga.”
Chieina athumna lupāsā akha khuivāmi kala ana ngahānna, “Hi khipāwui azak kala khipāwui aming kapihailikhala?”
Athumna “Caesarwuina” da ngahānkai.
Chieina Jishuna hānga, “Caesarwui chi Caesarli milu; kala Varewui chi Vareli milu.”
Athumna awui tui chi shālaga matakhakhaowa.
“Ojā, mi akhana ra̱sa̱ phālaga anao mapharāla apreiva̱ horhaida thihaiakha agato china preiva̱ chili ngakumphalungra kala amawui vang nao pharākhuiphalungra da Mosesna ithumwui vang kapimihai.
Chinaongarā shini leisai; kharara china ngalā phai, kala nao maleila thihaowa;
kakhane china preiva̱ chili ngakuma, kala nao maleila thihaowa, kakathuma chila chithāhaowa;
chithada sāda shini china ngakumlaga nao maleilakla thihaowa. Naomeikapta preiva̱ chila thihaowa.
Ringkhalui atamli a khipāwui preiva̱ sara̱khala? Kaja shini china ali ngakumsera.”
Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Chiwui vang eina nathum khangui maningmala, kaja nathum katharatuila kala Varewui pangshapla matheimana?
Kaja athumna kathiwui eina ringkhalui tharan athum ngalāla makhuimara, fakathuila mafathuimara kha kazingramli khalei kazingrao thāserhaora.
Kathebingli ringlui khangasak pongli jiakha, thing khangapom chuida Varena Mosesli, ‘I Abrahamwui, Isaacwui kala Jacobwui Varena’ da kahāng Moseswui lairikli nathum mapākhuimala?
A kathewui Vare maningmana, kha kharingawui Varena; nathum nguichaohaira.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Khare chiva, ‘Nganālu, O Israel: ithumwui Vare Proho, Proho chi akhamānga;
kala Proho nawui Vareli nawuklung, namanglā, naning kala nayāng tongtingda leishiphalungra.’
Kakhane chi hina, ‘Nawui khongnainaobingli nana na khalattali leikashi thada leishira.’ Khani hili hakkhamei khangatei ningkhami maleiluimana.”
Chieina ain kathema china hānga, “Mashunglaka, Ojā; nana mashungrik eina amānga da hānghaira, kala khangatei maleiluimana kha amānga;
kala ali wuklung, theishingkakhui, kala yāng tongtingda leikashi kala khongnainaobingli khalattali leikashi thada leikashi hina rikkatā kachigat kala pha̱kaphayāli mataimeikhara.”
Ana themlāk eina ngahānkaka chi Jishuna kathei eina ali hānga, “Na Varewui wungramwui eina matāmana.” Chiwui thili khipānakha ali khangahān masālengthuwa.
Manglā Katharana kasatmida David khalattana hithada hānga;
‘Prohona iwui Proholi hānga,
nawui yangkashebingli nawui pheinai
masā ngasakranglakha eina tangda,
iwui yāshong pamlu.’
Ali David khalattanala Proho hoi; hithaakha Khrista hi kathada Davidwui naomayarana jipaira?” Kala yarui ashangva china ringphalak eina nganakhui.
Synagogueli mathāmeikap kaji pam ningkachāngbing, zātkhān kasāli khayākakā pam kaphābing,
ra̱meinaobingwui lan sashimānkhamebing kala seihā kasāngsāng kasābing, sakakhaninga ain kathembing chili ning ngasharlu. Athum sakkhamei khonshāt samphangra.”
Kala kachāma ra̱meiva akha rai, ana penny akhawui chāng pheisā khani rāsanga.
Kala Jishuna awui sākhangatha̱bingli hokhuida hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, rākachigat mi saikorawui ngachaili ra̱meiva̱ hina chungmeikapta rāchigata.
Kaja athum saikorana athumwui kachungkha khaleiwui eina kachigatna; kha ra̱meiva̱ chiya awui makhaleitungli awui ringkhavai khalei saikora chi mihaira.”
“Hi katharan shokra kala ot saikora hi ungshungura kajiwui khudam chi kathara, ithumli kahāngmilu.”
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Ngasharlu, kala nathumli mi khipānakha mathanngui ngasakhaialu.
Mi kachungkhana iwui ming singda rālaga ‘I ana’ da hāngra, kala athumna mi kachungkhali thannguira.
Kala nathumna katā khanaiwui raipao kashā tharan, malung matātunghaialu; hi shokphalungra, kha china khangachanga atam maningmana.
Kaja yur akhana yur akhawuitungli, wungram akhana wungram akhawuitungli rai sāra; apam kachungkhali neina̱ khanukra, chāmrei rāra, kha hi nao ra̱kaphokna.
Yur saikorali paokaphā hi rida hāshokphalungra.

Nathumli bichar sākhavai athumna khuikhavā kala mikasang tharan nathumna khi hāngra da rida makhanangalu; kha atam chichangli khami chi hānglu, kaja nana khamatui maningmana kha Manglā Katharana khamatuina.
Achinā ngarāna achināngarāli, avāva̱ ngarana naongarāli, naongarāna ava̱ avāli thikhavai sāra;
iwui mingwui vang mi saikorana nathumli yangkharingra. Kha khanao eina tangda kakhānga chili huimira.
Shimtungli leikasāpana mataluiaranu, kala awui shimlungli zangda thongthāng mazangkhuiluiaranu;
Luili leikasapa china kachon maungkhuiluiaranu.
Iyavo, atam chili nao vaikasābing kala na̱ shimanda leikasābingwui ka̱lāshāt!
Sikachāng atamli mashok khavai seihā sālu.
Kaja chitharan atamli Varena okathui kasāwui eina thuilaga aja rāshungda mashoklakrang kaji kala mashokluilaki kaji kakhanang kachot shokra.
Kala zimiksho chi Prohona masha̱sang ngasakakha mi khipālikha mahuikhuimara; kha kapangkhui kahai athumwui vang eina ana atam chi sha̱sang ngasakhaira.
Chiwui thili kachikathāna nali, ‘Yanglu, Khrista hili lei,’ lah ‘Yanglu, a chili lei!’ — da hānglala mashitsangalu.
Minama Khrista kala minama marānbing shokra kala shapakha Varena kapangkhui kahaibingli thanngui khavai khudamla kala matakhak kahai kachungkhala athumna chitheira.
Kha ngasharlu; ina nathumli sānngarānda ot saikora hāngchitheihaira.
“Kha chitharan, kachotkachāng chiwui thili zimikla tangmanghaora, kachāngla mahorluimara,
sirābingla kazingramwui eina tātungra kala atungshongwui pangshapbingla nganukhaora.
Chiwui thili miwui Naomayarana hakkhamahā pangshap kala tekhamatei eina ngasoda muiyālungli kharā nathumna theira.
Ana kazingraobingli achikun matili chihovāda awui kapangkhui kahaibingli okathuiwui akatang eina thuilaga kazingram akatang eina tangda kazipkhui ngasakra.
“Khaorarongwui eina tamkhuilu; aphāngli shondhar shokta thingnah matekchim kahai eina yāngyir kachāng raura da nathumna thei.
Chi tākam eina nathumna hi shokura da kathei tharan a kharā nganaihaira, khamongpheili rāshunghaira da theira.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, ot saikora hi mashokranglakha thot hi makānthuimara.
Kazingram kala okathuila shimānhaora, kha iwui tui mashimānlakmara.
Ningngasharda rimpamlu; kaja otshot chi katharan rānikhala da nathumna matheimana.

Hiya mi akhana shimwui eina zatkaphok tharan awui raobingli shim chi mayon khavai horsangmihailaga kala mi ava̱va̱li kachichāwui otphun mihailaga kala khamong khamayonali mayonkazakzaklu da kasohailaga kharam vākahai kathāna.
Chiwui vang eina mayonkhariklu, kala shimva̱ china ngazinnika, ngayasailunglinikā, harvā kakhonglinika, ngathorshongnika, katharan ungnikhala kaji nathumna matheimana.
Ana kashuirak hankhaung tharan nathum pisāpaishina.
Ina nathumli kahāng hi mi kachiva̱li kahāngna: Rimpamlu!”
kaja athumna hānga, “Phanitlungli masāpaimara, mibing ngama̱-ngashaopaishina.”
Kha chili leikasā athum kaikhana malungvātlak eina hānga, “Khisāda aremali thao hi shimān khangasakkhala?
Kaja hi lupā shākathum lang eina yorkhuilaga kachamabingli mihaipai.” Chieina athumna ali khararra.
Kha Jishuna hānga, “Ali aningkhānranu. Khisāda ali sheikhautkhala? Ana ili khamathā ot sāmihaira.
Kaja kachāmbingva nathumli ngasopamchingra kala nathumna samikhangai tharan athumli kaphā samipai; kha iva nathumli mangasopamluimara.
Ana samikashap chi sāhaira; chifa khavai ana sānngarānda iwui phasā thao neomi kahaina.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, ali phaningkhaung sāda ana sāmi kahai chi paokaphā hākashokpam kachida hāngmira.”
Athumna chi kashā eina ringphālakhaowa kala lupā mira da khangashit sai. Chieina Judasna Jishuli yansai khavai atam kachā yangphokuwa.
Chieina Jishuna awui sākhangatha̱ khanili chihoda hānga, “Keinungli vālu, mi akha tara̱ham phunglaga nanili ngarokra; ali shurvālu,
kala ana akakā shimva̱ chili, ‘Ojāna kahāng awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda makānkhami phazat zārumki kaji kā kali leikhala’ da angahānlu.
Chieina ana mathāng atoli kā kahaka ngarankhariklaga haikasā chitheira. Chili nanina angarānlu.”
Chieina sākhangatha̱ khani china zatphokta keinung chili vai kala anili hāngmi kahai tākam eina samphanga; kala anina makānkhamiwui phazat chi angarāna.
Athumna tableli phazāmahunglakha Jishuna hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, phazārumda khalei nathumwui ngachaili mi akhana ili yansaira.”
Sakhangatha̱bing chi wukhananghaoda athum kachiva̱na “Chi ila” da ngahāna.
Ana athumli hānga, “Tharāda khaniwui ngachaili khongphei akhali ili khamui rurshairumda khalei mipa china.
Kaja kathara lairikli kapi kahai thada miwui Naomayara chi thira; kha miwui Naomayarali yankasaia a chiwui kalāshāt! Awui vanga marāpharākasāna phāmei.”
Kala ana tengkot khuida Vareli ningkashi mihailaga athumli mi, kala athum saikorana chiwui eina manga.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Hi kachungkhawui vang heishokmi kahai iwui tuingashitwui asheena.
Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, Vare wungramli kadhara drakhāra̱ mangki kaji zimiksho chi marāranglakha eina tangda ina drakhāra̱ hi mamangluimara.”
Kha I ringshok kahaiwui thili nathumli ina Galileeli rida vāra.”
Peterna ngahānkai, “Athum yāmserhailala I mayāmmara!”
Chieina Jishuna Peterli hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, arui ngayā harvāna khanishida makhongranglakha nana ili matheimana da kathumshida hatra.”
Kha Peterna pinglak eina, “Nali ngasoda shaothatrumra jilala ina nali mahatlakmara” da ngahānkai. Khangatei sākhangatha̱bing saikoranala chithada hāngsera.
Ana Peter, James, John athumli thankhui, kala kakhanang sikafana pemtinghaowa.
Chieina ana athumli hānga, “I wukkakhanangna thiki jiura, hili nathum ningkharikta yangpamsalu.”
Ana khavāmeilaga ngaleili ngakhumshamzangda sapaisi kaja atam chi awui eina kānthuimihaoranu da seihā sai.
Kala ana hānga, “Abba, Avā, nawui vanga saikora sāpaisera, tengkot hi iwui eina kakhuithuimihaolu, thālala iwui kaphaning maningmana kha nawui kaphaningna.”
Ana hankhaung tharan athum pida leisāda ana Peterli hānga, “Simon, na pihaola? Pung akhamāngla mapamrarthulā?”
Kasuili mazang khavai nathum ningngasharda seihā sālu; manglava sāngaikachangkhata kha asāna ngazanhaowa.”
Chiwui thili valuishitlaga kharewui tākam eina seihā vāsālui.
Ana hankhaung tharan athum piphup eina ungtheilui; kaja athum pingaishun haowa; kala khi ngahānkāsikhala da matheithuwa.
Ana hanung kakathumali hithada unghānga, “Aruila pichingda ngasāmda leifala? Shaphaira; morei kaphungbingwui pāngli miwui Naomayarali yorkasang atam chi rāshungura.
Ngakarthuilu, zatusa, yanglu, ili yorzaki kaje hili rāhaira.”
Yorkazapa china ingkit akha athumli milaga hānga, “Ina amaya̱ki kaje chi a kho; ali tukkhuilu kala shantri sakazazakta thanthulu.”
Judasna rākhaleoda Jishuwuili vai kala “Ojā!” da hānglaga amaya̱ya.
Chieina athumna ali yonsa̱khuida tukkhuihaowa.
Kha chiwui ngalemli nganingkasā mi akhana awui raighai sutkhuilaga pāngmon kharei rao akhawui khanā yortāmihaowa.
Kala Jishuna athumli hānga, “Ili nathumna khaleli tukkhuiki kaji thada raighai kala thinghun singda kharāla?
Thangkachida khorumshimli tamchitheida nathumli ngasopama, kha nathumna ili matukkhuimana. Kha kathara lairikli kapi kahai chi ungshungranu.”
Kala athum katongana ali horhailaga yāmserhaowa.
Yaronnao akhana khamenga kachon kateonao akhamāng ngavailaga Jishuli shurvai; kala athumna ali tukkhui;
Kha ana kachon chila raitāhailaga asāmsai eina yongthuihaowa.
Peterna athi shurvāda pāngmon khareiwui kayāngli lachāham eina shantribingli ngasoda meili tikpama.
Pāngmon akhokabing eina hangva̱nao katongana Jishuli shaothat khavai shākhi phai, kha akhala masamphangmana.
Mi kachungkhana kakapik shākhi awuitungli rāmi, kha athumwui shākhi khami akhala mangarummana.
Kaikhana nganingkada awuitungli kakapik shākhi mida hānga,
“‘Miwui pāng eina sākakhui khorumshim hi sakhaihailaga ina kathumthangwui thili miwui pangna masākakhui khangatei akha sakhuira’ da ana kahāng ithumna shai.”
Chithālala athumwui shākhi khami akhala mangarummana.
Chieina pāngmon kharei china alungthungli nganingkāda Jishuli ngahāna, “Nali athumna kaphen hili khikha ngahānkā khavai maleithula?”
Kha Jishuna khikha mangahānkāla kasainakha pamhaowa. Chieina pāngmon kharei china ali ngahānlui, “Sokhame Varewui Naomayara Khrista chi nala?”
Kala Jishuna hānga, “Ilaka, kala miwui Naomayarana Pangshapwui yāshong kapam kala muiyā tongda kharā nathum saikorana theira.”
Kala pāngmon kharei china awui kachon serkhaida, “Hili lāngkhamei shākhi khangatei khi darkar sākhala?
Nathumna awui kachipat tui shāhaira, nathumwui tuikup khikhala?” Athum saikorana ali shaothatngayiphalunga da khayon misera.
Kaikhana Jishuli machora̱ mashorrorphoka, amaila rommi, kashaola shaoda, “Marānlu!” da hānga. Kala shantribingna ali kapheya.
Peter mei tikkapam theilaga ali yangkāda “Nala Nazarethpa Jishuli ngasosai” da hānga.
Kha chi ana mamayāmada hānga, “I katheila matheimana, nana kahāng chila bhap matāmana.” Kala khanukvāk shokhaowa. (Chichangli harvā khonghaowa).
Rao sha̱nao china ali theiluishitta chiwui ngalemli khanganingbing chili, “Mipa hi athumwui mina” da hānglui.
Kha Peterna chi mamayaluimana.
Khaleilaga chili khanganingbing china Peterli phenda hānga, “Mashoila na athumwui ngachaili akhana, kaja na Galileenaona.”
Chieina Peterna khonshāt tui eina shākhi sāda hānga, “Nathumna hāngda khalei mipa hi I matheimana.”
Chichang chili harvā khongkakhane khonguwa. Jishuna ali hānghaikasa, “Harvāna khanishida makhongranglakha nana ili kathumshida hatra” kaji chi phaningunga. A wukhanangnāhaida chapa.
Kala Pilatena ali ngahāna, “Na Jihudiwui awunga chila?” Chieina Jishuna “Chi nana hānghaira” da ngahānkai.
Pāngmon akhokabingna Jishuli apong kachungkha eina phena.
Chieina Pilatena ali ngahānlui, “Na ngahānkā khavai maleithula? Yanglu, athumna nawuitungli kaphen kayākha khuirāda leikhala!”
Kha Jishuna chili lāngda mangahānkāmana, kala Pilate matakhakhaowa.
Chitharan phanit kachida yaruina kapo athishurda phātopli narkahai mi akhali Pilatena chihomichinga.
Ngakukshaoli mi shaokathatli zangda phatopli narkahaibingwui ngachaili Barabbas kaho mi akha leisai.
Yaruibingna Pilateli rālaga rida ana samikasa chi sāmi khavai pophoka.
Chieina Pilatena athumli ngahāna, “Jihudiwui Awungali nathumwui vang chihomi ngasakngaila?”
Kaja yuishāt eina pāngmon akhokabingna Jishuli awui pāngli horsangkhamina kaji ana thei.
Kha pāngmon akhokabingna yaruibingli Barabbasli chihomi khavai kasata.
Chieina Pilatena yaruili hānga, “Chithākha nathumna Jihudiwui Awunga kahopā hili ili khi sālu jikhala?”
Athumna, “Krushli shaoshānhaolu” da vaowa.
Pilatena athumli ngahāna, “Kha khiwui vang kala khi khayon ot ana sahaokhala?” Kha “Ali krushli shaoshānhaolu” da pangmeida vaorai.
Pilatena yarui penkhavai athumwui vang Barabbasli chihomi; kala Jishuli lijei eina ngaphitlaga krushli shaothat khavai mihaowa.
Kala athumna hungkhamaying kachon akha ali ngavaimi kala ka̱shat eina sākakhui kuihon ngahonmi.
Athumna, “Okpeimeiranu, Jihudiwui Awunga” da shālam sai.
Athumna akuilila lijei eina ngaphita, machora̱la mashorrora kala khayākashi kachithei sāda khuktizangda khorumkhaninga.
Athumna ali ngashimshikhui kahaiwui thili hungkhamayinga kachon raimihailaga awui kashankachon ngavaimi kala ali krushli shaoshān khavai athumna shimenthuihaowa.
Kala Golgotha (kaja mikuira̱pam) kaho apam chili Jishuli khuivai.
Athumna drakhāra̱li myrrh manātlaga ali shimanna, kha ana chi mamangmana.
Athumna ali krushli shaoshāna, kala awui kashankachon chi ka̱lā yanglaga ngayar ngaroka.
Ali krushli shaokashān pung kakathumawui atamlina.
Ali khayon kaphen tui kapi kahai chiva “Jihudiwui Awunga” kaji china.
Ali ngasoda khale khani, akhana yāshong kala akhana uishong da shaoshāna.
(Hithada kathara tuili “Yom kasābingna samphang khangayi chi ala samphangruma.” da kapi kahai chi ungshunghaowa.)
na khalatta huikhuilaga krushwui eina tunglu” da zeiya.
Israelwui awunga, Khrista krushwui eina katung yangsa, chieina ithumna ali shitsangpaira” da athum akhana akhali hānga. Ali shaothatrum kahaibingnala zeiya.
Pung kachiko katā eina Jishuna panglāk eina, “Elo-i, Elo-i, lama sabach-thani?” da vaoya, chiwui kakhalata “Iwui Vare, iwui Vare, khisāda ili nana horhaokhala?” kajina.
Chili nganingkasa kaikhana shāda hānga, “Yanglu, ana Elijahli hoda lei.”
Chieina akhana ngasamvāda shon pemting eina kathura atheira̱ thaikhuida thingli khalapshānlaga ali mimangda hānga, “Ngarailu, ali khuitā khavai Elijah marānikhala ithum ngaraiyangsa.”
Jishuna akhon panglāk eina vaoda thivāhaowa.
Kala khorumshimwui chonrān chi atung eina aze tāshungda akai khani sāda kakhaowa.
Kala Jishuli yangda nganingkasa shipai shakhawui akhavāna a thihaira kaji kathei eina “Kachangkhat mi hi Varewui Naomayaralaka” da hānga.
Athum hi Jishuna Galileeli leilakha athi shurda ali otram ngatha̱khamebingna, kala Jerusalemwui eina ali ngasokhavā sha̱nao kateibingla leisai.
Arimatheawui Joseph kaho khayākaka hanga̱wui minganin kala Varewui wungram kapha mi china malung pinglak eina Pilateli vāda Jishuwui phasā chi apoi.
Pilatena Jishu thikachanghairala da matakhakhaowa; kala ana shipai shākhawui akhavali hokhuida Jishu thichaohairala da ngahāna.
Shipai akhavāwui eina a thihaira da kashā eina Josephli phasā chi mihaowa.
Chieina Josephna kachon kachara akha lokhuilaga Jishuli khuitāda chi eina romhai, kala lungkaili kashophutkakhui chikhur akhali chizanhailaga akhur chi lungsham eina shirenshānhaowa.
Mary Magdalene eina Joseswui ava̱ Maryna Jishuli chizan kahai apam chi thei.
Haptāwui kharethang ngathorthakva zimik kashok eina chikhurpam chili athum vai.
Athum akha eina akha, “Chikhurwui lungsham chi ithumli khipāna khalangshokmira?” da ngazek ngaroka.
Chieina athumna yangkai kala lungsham chi khalangshokhairakasā athumna thei—lungsham chi kahaka lungguina.
Athumna chikhurli kazang eina yaronnao akha charshi kahai kachon ngavaida yāshong pamkasa chi theida athum matakhakhaowa.
Kala ana athumli hānga, “Mamatakhakhaialu, nathum shaoshān kahaia Nazarethwui Jishuli kaphāna. A ringshokhaira, hili maleimana, ali kachipetpam hi yanglu.
Ara nathumna awui sākhangatha̱bing eina Peterli pao hi unghānglu, kaja ‘Ana nathumli rida Galileeli vara’, da ana nathumli hāngkahai thada nathumna ali chili samphangra.”
Chieina athumna chikhurwui eina shokta yongthuihaowa, kaja kakathir kala kagashui athumli rāshunghaowa; athum ngacheenahaida khipālikha khikhala mahānglakmana.
Haptāwui kharethang ngathorthakva̱ Jishuna ringshok kahaiwui thili Mary Magdalene, kaja ana kameo shini kashamshokmi kahaipāva̱li rimeikapta rāchithei.
Ana Jishuli ngasokasābingli unghānga, chitharan athum chapngachāda leisai.
Kha Jishu ringshokhaira kala ana ali theihaira da kahāng tharan athumna chi mashitsangmana.
Chiwui thili Jishuna azak khangatei eina sākhangatha̱ khanili anina kharam vākida zatta leilakha rāchithei.
Anina latungda kateibingli unghānga, kha athumna chi mashitsangthuwa.

Naomeikapta athum tharāda akha chi phazā mahunglakha Jishu rai; ana athumwui mashitkasang kala ning khamakangwui vang, kaja a ringshok kahaiwui thili ali katheibingwui tuili mashitkasangwui vang khararra.
Ana hānga, “Okathui apam katongali vālu kala miyur saikorali paokaphā hi hāshoklu.
Shitsangda ra̱hik kahai mi chili huimira; kha mashitkasanga mi chili khayon mira.
Kala shitkasangbingli machut hi ngasora, iwui mingli athumna kameo kashamshokra; athumna tuiyur kadharla matuira.
athumna phara̱ singkhuilala, kathiri manglala china athumli khikha masāza̱mara. athumna kakazānaobingwuitungli pāng parmiakha, kharai samphangra.”
Proho Jishuna athumli hangchitheikup kahaiwui thili ali kazingramli khuikāhaowa kala Varewui yāshong chipama.
Chieina athumna apam kachiva̱li vāda pao hāshoka kala Prohona athumli ngasoda ot sai kala athumwui paokapha chi mashunga kaji chi matakhak kahai ot kasā machut china phongshoka.
Leikashiya Theophilus, ithumwui ngachaili ungshung kahai otshotbingwui khararchān kapishok khavai mi kachungkhana athumwui kashap sāhaira.
Haokaphok eina thuida mik eina kathei samphang kahaibing kala tui chi hākashokbingna ithumli hāngmi kahai thada athumna kapishok kahaina.

Chiwui vang eina khayāshikapaiya amei Theophilus! Shokkahai otshotbing saikora haokaphok eina thuida ina munlak eina kazunyanglaga otshotbing chi nawui vang maron-maron eina kapikhami hi phārada phaninga.
Chithākha nali tamchithei kahaibingwui khamashung chi nana pongda theikhuipaira.
Ani khanini Varewui mangāli khamashung-khangarong mi sāda Prohowui ningkhami kala shiyan saikora mayonda shāt makālakla okthuisai.
Kha ani nao maleimana, kachiwui vangkhala kaja Elizabethva nao kashumva̱na kala ani kasarla sarhairasai.
Thang zimikshokha khorumshimli otram khangatha̱ chi Zechariah ashangva̱wui yar sāhaida ana pāngmonwui ot sāda leisai.
Pāngmonbingwui khangachāyan athishurda Prohowui khorumshimli zangda nganamkaphā riktā khavai ka̱lā yanglaga awuili tāhaowa.
Nganamkaphā riktāda leilakha yarui saikora kayāngli seihā sāpama.
Prohowui kazingrao akha nganamkaphā riktā khavai hanphut chiwui yāvāk rānganinga.
Zechariahna ali kathei eina kashuihaowa kala khangacheela ngacheehaowa.
Kha kazingrao china ali hānga, “Zechariah, mangacheealu, Varena nawui seihā kasā shāmihaira, chieina napreiva̱ Elizabethna mayarnao akha pharāra. Nana awui ming John phokra.
Nana ringphāda mathānra
kala mi kachungkhana awui kapharāli mathānrumra;
kala zamkhorla, khamaripa otla masāza̱mara,
Ava̱wui naopamli leilakhawui eina,
ali Manglā Kathara pemtinghaora.
Israelnao kachungkhali ana athumwui Proho Vareli latung ngasakra.
ana avāva̱ eina naongarābingwui ning ngarum ngasakra,
kala kahāng makhanganābingli mashun thangmei chili latung ngasakra
kala Prohowui mibingli awuivang ngaranpinghaisā ngasakra.”
Kazingrao china ali ngahānkai, “I Varewui mangāli khanganinga Gabrielna, nali ngazek khavai kala khamathā chānpao hi khuirāmi khavai ili chihokharāna.
Yanglu, na khak mashokmara kala shokki kaji mashokranglakha eina tangda khak ngasha̱ra; khiwui vangkhala kaja ngashitmi kahai atamli ungshungki kaji iwui tuili nana mashitsangthuwa.”
Mibingna Zechariahli ngaraipama. Ana khorumshimli sha̱rākha pamkahaiwui vang eina athum ningkashakhaowa.

Kala ana ayarli kashok tharan athumli khichānkhala mangazekrarthuwa. Chieina ali khorumshimli khamahā akha samphang kahaina da athumna phaninga kala ana tui mamatuipaithuda athumli khudam eina sāchithei.
Zechariahna awui otram khangatha̱ atam peiuda shimli hanunghaowa.
Khaleilaga apreiva̱ Elizabeth nao vaihaowa kala kachāng phangā sha̱kha shimli ngathumpama.
Ana hānga, “Ara ili Prohona ngachonmida mibingwui mangāli iwui maikashi khuithuimihaira.”
Elizabethna nao vaida kachāng katharuka kakā tharan Varena kazingrao Gabrielli Galileewui keinung Nazarethli shivāta.
Ana Davidwui naotun Joseph kaho mayara chili khāmhaikasa kachingva̱ sha̱nao chili pao khuirai, kachingva̱ chili Mary hoi.
Kazingrao china ali rāhānga, “Ringphālu, he ngahānkhangaiva̱, Prohona nali ngasomida lei.”
Kha tui chi shālaga a ning kazāhaowa kala hāngda khalei tui chi khi ngasānikhala da ningli machuka.
Chieina kazingrao china ali hānga, “Mangacheealu, Mary, kaja na Varewui lukhamashan samphanghaira.
Yanglu, nana nao vaida mayarnao akha pharāra kala nana awui ming Jishu phokra.
A kahaka ngasāra, kala juikhamataia Varewui Naomayara hora;
Proho Varena avāva̱ Davidwui wungram chi ali mira,
ana mungra kala awui wungpam katang mavaimara.”
Kala kazingrao china ali hānga,
“Manglā Katharana nawuitungli tāra,
kala juikhamataiawui pangshap china nali rakhayinmira;
chiwui vang eina pharāki kaje nao chili
kathara Varewui Naomayara hora.
Yanglu, nawui athei-asā kashokva̱ Elizabethla asarlam mayarnao akha vaihaira. Kashumva̱ hokasā ana nao vaida hina katharuka kachāngna.
Kaja Varewui vang saknā kahai khikha maleimana.”
Chieina Maryna ngahānkai, “Yanglu, iya Prohowui rao sha̱naona, nawui kahāng athishurda shokranu.” Chiwui thili kazingrao chi awui eina thuihaowa.
Chiwui thili Maryna ngakarthuida kaphungli khalei Judeawui keinung akhali hengsāda vai.
Ana Zechariahwui shimli azunda Elizabethli samphang khangarokwui shālam sai.
Elizabethna Marywui shālam tui shāngasha̱da awui naopamli khalei nao chi ngasonkai kala Elizabeth Manglā Katharana pemtinghaowa.
Chieina ana panglāk eina “Sha̱naowui ngachaili na hi somi kahaiva̱ ngasaranu; kala nawui naopamwui eina shokki kaje athei chi sokhami kala khamahai ngasāranu! da hānga.
Khiwui vang eina ili hiyākha ka̱lā mahai ngasakta iwui Prohowui ava̱va̱ iwuili kharākhala?
Yanglu, nawui shālam tui shākhaleoda iwui naopamli khalei nao hina khamathānwui vang ngasonkai.
Prohona ali hāngkahai chi ungshunglakra da shitkasanga sha̱nao chi sokhami ngasāranu.”
Chieina Maryna hānga,
“Iwui wuklungna Proholi sochikata.
Iwui Huikhame Varewui mangāli imanglā mathāna.
Kaja ana awui khangazanva̱ rao sha̱naoli phaningmihaira.
Khikhalajila yanglu, aja eina thuida thot kachiva̱na,
ili somi kahaiva̱ da hora.
Khikhalajila Reikhamataia Varena iwui vang hakkhamahā ot sāmihaira,
kala Kathara kaho hi awui mingna.
Ali khangacheebingwuitungli awui lukhamashan thot-thot kachida lei.
Awui pāngthei katingshokta sāshap pangshap chithei,
kala langkasobingli athumwui wuklungwui khangarān chi sākhayangmi.
Ana Pangshapa khamungabingli wungpamkhong eina khuishoka,
kala khangazanbingli khāngkāmi;
Ana kathaibingli kaphā ot eina thongasaka,
kala kashāngbingli khamasai eina chihohai.
Ana awui lukhamashan phaningungda
awui rao Israelli ngachonmi,
Maryna Elizabethli kachāng kathum sha̱kha angasopamlaga shimli hanunghaowa.
Ara Elizabethwui naosak atam ungshunguda ana mayarnao akha pharai.
Prohona ali hakkhamahā lukhamashan miya kaji awui khongnainaobing kala athei-asābingna shai kala ali ringphārumma.
Kachishatathang nao chili athumna ahui rimshokmi khavai rai kala avāva̱wui ming khuida ali Zechariah phokki jihairasai.
Kha ava̱va̱na “Chi maningmana, ali John hora” jihaowa.
Chieina athumna ali hānga, “Nashi theisā khipālikha hikathā aming maphoklakranga.”
Chiwui thili athumna avāva̱li awui ming khi phokrakhala da ingkit eina ngahāna.
Chieina ana kapi khavai slate akha poi kala chili “Awui ming John” da kapimi. Chieina athum saikora matakhakhaowa.
Kala ngalāngda a tui matuipaihaoda ana Vareli masochikata.
Chieina khongnainaobing saikora ngacheeshunhaowa kala shokkahai otshot saikora hi Judea kaphungwui kha̱wung kachida ngazeklophaowa.
Kashā mi saikorana shākakhui tui chi athumwui ningli tipsanghailaga “Nao hi kachikathā ngasāsānikhala” da matakhakhai, kaja Prohowui pāng chi ali ngasomi.
Avāva̱ Zechariahli Manglā Katharana pemtinghaoda ana marānda hānga;
“Israelwui Proho Vareli sosersa,
kaja ana awui mibingli rāngachonmida athumli ngatangkhuihaira.
Awui rao David shimkhurwui eina ana ithumwui vang pangshap khaleia
Huikhame akha shokngasakhaira;
ana achālakhawui eina awui kathara marānbingwui khamor eina hāngmarānmi kahai thada,
ithumli yangkashebing kala ithumli
yangkakharinga saikorawui einala kanmira;
ishāvā ngarāli lukhamashan chithei khavai,
kala awui kathara tuingashit phaningung khavai.
ithumwui avāva̱ Abrahamli ngashitmi kahai tuingashit,
ithumli samphang ngasaki kaji chiya;
yangkashe pāngwui eina kanmi kahai mibing ngasāda,
khangachee maleila ali otram ngatha̱paira.
kala awui mangāli ithum mirin peichaoda kathar kala khamashung-khangarong eina otram ngatha̱paira.
kaja awui shongfa ngarānmi khavai nana Proholi rida zatra,
morei pheokhami lungli huimira da.
ithumwuitungli ana huikhamiwui kahor shokkhangasak chitharan,
kala chingri kahai pongli zatkhavai thānmira.”
Hi mishān kharena; kala chitharan Quiriniusna Syriawui governor sāsai.
Mi saikora mishānli zangkhavai kachichāramli ungsera.
Josephla Galileeli khalei Nazareth keinungwui eina Judeali khalei Bethlehem kaho Davidwui keinung chili vai, kachiwui vangkhala kaja Joseph hi Davidwui naotunna.
Awui khām kahaiva̱ Maryli ngasoda ming chankhavai khavā tharan Mary nao vaisai.
Ani apam chili leilakha Marywui naosak atam ungshunghaowa.
Kala awui naochizai mayarnao akha pharai kala ali naokhalui eina khaluilaga sigui khongsaili chipethai, khiwui vangkhala kaja kha̱ chili ani shimzun mangarinthuwa.
Ngalei chili yaokahomabingna luili athumwui yao ashangva̱ ngayāshong mayonpisai.
Athumwui ngalemli Prohowui kazingrao akha rāda Prohowui tekhamatei hingpik kahai china athumli kuimareida hora kala athum ngacheelakhaowa.
Chieina athumli kazingrao china hānga, “Mangacheealu, kaja yanglu, mi saikorawui vang ringphākhailak kahai paokhamathā ina nathumli khuirākhamina.
Aja Davidwui keinungli nathumwui vang Huikhame akha pharāhaira, ava Proho Khristana.
Hina nathumwui vang machut akha ngasāra kaja nathumna angangnao akha naokhalui eina khaluilaga sigui khongsaili chipet kahai samphangra.”
Kashuirak eina kazingrao chili ngasoda kazingramwui rao tarākha rāda Vareli masochikatta hānga;
kala okathuili ana ningyāngkhaunga mibingwui alungli chingrihairanu.”

Kazingraobing china athumwui eina thuihaida kazingli latung kahai tharan, yaokahomabing chi akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta hānga, “Ithum Bethlehemli vāusa, kala Prohona ithumli chitheikhami shokkahai otshot chi vāyangsa.”
Chieina athumna thaklāk eina vāda Mary eina Joseph kala sigui khongsaili chipet kahai angangnao chili vāsamphanga.
Athumna nao chi kathei eina kazingraona angangnao chiwui maramli hāngmi kahai chi hāngchithei.
Yaokahombingwui tui chi kashā saikora matakhakhai.
Kha Maryna ot saikora chi machuklaga awui wuklungli tipsanghai.
Yaokahombing china athumwui theikakhui shākakhui saikora chiwui vang Vareli tekmatei khangasak eina ngasoda masochikatta latunghaowa. Kaja chi athumli hānghairasai.
Kaja Prohowui ainli hithada kapihai, “Naochizai mayarnao kachiva̱ Proholi tharchigatphalungra.”
Kala Prohowui ainli kaso kahai pha̱phayā khavai nasha̱ khani lah khana̱ khanila khuiphunga.
Chitharan Simeon kaho mayarnao akha Jerusalemli leisai, a khamashung-khangarong, shitkasang khangazipa Israelli makarkhami honkapama kala Manglā Katharana ngasokhame mina.
Prohowui Khrista chi matheiranglakha eina tangda a mathimara da Manglā Katharana phongmihairasai.
Manglāna thānkhami mangā eina ana khorumshimli rai, kala angangnao Jishuli ainwui khangachā athishurda sāmi khavai ava̱ eina avāva̱na khorumshimli khuikakā tharan,
Simeonna ali vamkhuida Vareli sochikatta hānga,
“Proho, ara naraoli chingri eina thuingasakmihaolu,
Nawui tuingashit athishurda;
Hi nana ngarān kahaina, miyur saikorawui mangāli,
kala nawui miyur Israel tekmatei khavaina.”
Angangnao chiwui pongli kahāng chi shālaga ava̱ eina avāva̱ matakhakhaowa;
kala Simeonna somida ava̱va̱ Maryli hānga,
“Yanglu, angangnao hi Israel kachungkha konglui khavai kala ngakarthui khavai,
kala hānghaikasawui khudam sāda kapangkhui kahaina
(raighai akhana namanglālila tophutshokra)
Chieina kachungkhawui ngathum kahai kaphaning phongmira.”
kala kum hangchishata mati kakā eina tangda ra̱meipama. Ana ngashun ngayā mateila kakhumla khum, seihāla sāda Vareli khorumlaga khorumshimwui eina mathuilakmana.
Ana atam chichangli khorumshimli kāda Vareli ningkashi mi kala Jerusalemli ngatangkhami honda khalei saikorali nao chiwui pongli hāngchithei.
Prohowui ain athishurda athumna ot saikora sākup kahai eina Galileeli khalei athumwui keinung Nazarethli latunghaowa.
Nao chi rarsangmamānda kapangla pangsanga, aworla pemtinghaowa kala Varewui khalum chi awuitungli lei.
Jishuna kum tharāda khani kākashung eina khangachā athishurda phanitli azanga.
Phanitpei athumna latkhaung tharan nao Jishuva Jerusalemli pamsanghaowa. Chi ava̱ eina avā matheisāthuwa.
Kha yaruili ngasozatta leira da phaninghaoda thangkhawui shongzā zatkahaiwui thili athei-asābing eina ngasotnaobingwuili ngathingvai;
masamkaphang eina anina ali phākhavai Jerusalemli latvai.
Zimiksho kakathumathang Jishuna khorumshimli ojābingwui ngachaili pamda athumwui tuila nganā kala khangahānla sāda leikasā chi athei.
Awui theishingkakhui kala ngahānkakā kashā mi saikorana matakhakhai.
Anina ali kathei eina matakhakhaida ava̱va̱na ali hānga, “Inao nava khi kasāniji? Yanglu, navā iniva malung tātungnanai nali phāhaira.”
Chieina ana ngahānkai, “Nanina ili phākazat kathakahaini ji? I iwui Avāwui shimli pamra kaji nani matheithulā?”
Ana kahāng tui chi anina bhap matārarthuwa.
Chiwui thili anili ngasophungda Nazarethli latungda ana aniwui kahāng nganai kala ot saikora hi ava̱va̱na wuklungli tipsanghai.
Annas eina Caiaphasna pāngmon kharei kasā atamli Zechariahwui naomayara Johnna lamhāngli leilakha Varewui tui chi rāphongmiya.
Chieina Jordanwui kuikhamareili khalei apam saikorali vāda morei pheomi khavai ningngateida ra̱hiklu da pao hāshoka.
Kaja Isaiah marānwui lairikli hithada kapihai;
“Akhon akhana lamhāngli vaozatta lei:
Prohowui shongfa ngarānlu,
awui apongbing ngatar ngasaklu.
Tampāk kachiva̱ chipemkāra,
kala phungrei phungrā kachiva̱ nemngasakra.
kala khamakhui ngatar ngasakra,
kala kokatro apongbing khayammira;

Ning khangateiwui ngarakzak kahai athei mathei ngasaklu kala nathum khalatta ‘Ithumwui avāva̱ Abraham lei’ da mahāngalu, kaja ina nathumli kahāngna, ngalungbing hiwui eina Varena Abrahamli nao kachungkha semmishapa.
Arui eina tangda thingngayungli ngahā parhaida lei, chiwui vang eina athei khamathā makhamathei thingrong kachiva̱ ta̱teklaga meilungli horsanghaora.”
Chieina mi kachungkha china ali ngahāna, “Chithākha ithumna khi sarakhala?”
Ana athumli ngahānkai, “Phahon khani khaleia mi china akhala makhaleia mipā chili ngayarmilu; kala kashakazā khaleia chinala makhaleia chili chithada miranu.”
Khashinā khalokabingla ra̱hikmi khavai rāda ali hānga, “Ojā, ithumna khi sarakhala?”
Chieina ana athumli ngahānkai, “Nathumna ngashaiki kaji chili lāngda mangashaialu.”
Shipaibingnala ali ngahāna, “Thākha ithumna khi sara̱khala?” Chieina ana athumli hānga, “Khipālikha tandi sāda mangaponalu, kaphenla maphenphāphaalu, nathumwui tolop chi shapa da phaninglu.”

Johnna athum saikorali hānga, “Ina nathumli tara̱ eina ra̱hikmi kha ili reikhamei a chi rārāli, I awui pheihop khara̱ eina tangda khalāmikida matik machāmana. Ana nathumli Manglā Kathara kala Mei eina ra̱hikmira.
Lanpumwui mā chi heikhui khavai kala kapanga mā chi kazipkhuida chumli haikhavai yāmkok chi awui pāngli lei, kha ana ahikbing chi masāshimitkapai meilungli chithothaora.”
Hithada sāda apong kachungkha eina ana kasatkasang eina ngasoda mibingli paokaphā hāshoka.
Kha Johnna Herod Governorli agato preiva̱ Herodiasli ngakum kahaiwui vang kala ana makaphā ot kachungkha sāhaida hāngkhamachinwui vang,
Herodna makaphātungli makaphā ngarorda Johnli phātop sanghaowa.
