kala Manglā Katharana nasha̱wui azak khuida awuitungli tapa̱ya kala kazingramwui eina akhon akha vaorai, “Na iwui khaluma Naomayarana, Ina nali ningyāng unglaka.”
Heli Mathatwui nao, Mathat Leviwui nao, Levi Melchiwui nao, Melchi Janna-iwui nao, Janna-i Josephwui nao,
Joseph Mattathiaswui nao, Mattathias Amoswui nao, Amos Nahumwui nao, Nahum Esliwui nao, Esli Nagga-iwui nao,
Nagga-i Maathwui nao, Maath Mattathiaswui nao, Mattathias Seme-inwui nao, Seme-in Josechwui nao, Josech Jodawui nao,
Joda Joananwui nao, Joanan Rhesawui nao, Rhesa Zerubbabelwui nao, Zerubbabel Shealtielwui nao, Shealtiel Neriwui nao,
Neri Melchiwui nao, Melchi Addiwui nao, Addi Kosamwui nao, Kosam Elmadamwui nao, Elmadam Erwui nao,
Er Joshuawui nao, Joshua Eliezarwui nao, Eliezar Jorimwui nao, Jorim Matthatwui nao, Matthat Leviwui nao,
Levi Simeonwui nao, Simeon Judahwui nao, Judah Josephwui nao, Joseph Johnamwui nao, Johnam Eliakimwui nao,
Eliakim Meleawui nao, Melea Mennawui nao, Menna Mattathawui nao, Mattatha Nathanwui nao, Nathan Davidwui nao,
David Jessewui nao, Jesse Obedwui nao, Obed Boazwui nao, Boaz Salmonwui nao, Salmon Nahshonwui nao, Nahshon Amminadabwui nao,
Amminadab Adminwui nao, Admin Arniwui nao, Arni Hezronwui nao, Hezron Perezwui nao, Perez Judahwui nao,
Judah Jacobwui nao, Jacob Isaacwui nao, Isaac Abrahamwui nao, Abraham Terahwui nao, Terah Nahorwui nao,
Nahor Serugwui nao, Serug Reuwui nao, Reu Pelegwui nao, Peleg Eberwui nao, Eber Shelahwui nao,
Shelah Cainanwui nao, Cainan Arphaxadwui nao, Arphaxad Shemwui nao, Shem Noahwui nao, Noah Lemechwui nao,
Lamek Methuselahwui nao, Methuselah Enochwui nao, Enoch Jaredwui nao, Jared Mahalaleelwui nao, Mahalaleel Cainanwui nao, Cainan Enoswui nao,
Enos Sethwui nao, Seth Adamwui naona kala Adam Varewui naona.
Chili zimiksho hangmatithang ali chipeena suipama. Ana zimiksho chirankha khikha mazā-mamang kajiwui vang akuplamva thailakhaowa
Chipeena ali hānga, “Na Varewui naomayarana jiakha lunggui hi khamui onkhavai kasolu.”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “Hithada kapihaida lei; ‘Mina khamuimāng eina maringmana.’”
Chiwui thili chipeena apam kajui akhali thānkai, kala okathui wungram saikora mikkhayip akhawui alungli chithei.
Kala ana hānga, “Ina nali pangshap kala tekhamatei saikora hi mira. Hi ili mikahaina. Chieina ina mikhangaiali mishapa,
nana ili khorumakha saikora hi nawui sāserra.”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “Hithada kapihaida lei,
‘Nana Proho nawui Varemāngli khorumra,
kala amāngli otram ngatha̱ra.’”
Chiwui thili chipee china ali Jerusalemli thanvāda juimeikap kaje khorumshim atonli kānganing ngasaklaga hānga, “Na Varewui naomayarana jiakha hiwui eina ngawoktālu,
kaja hithada kapihaida lei, ‘Nali yangmi khavai Varena awui kazingrao chihorāra;
kala naphei lungguili mangaphokza̱ khavai,
athumwui pāng eina nali ngayuikhuira.’”
Kala chipee china suiki kaji suikuphailaga atam kachā masamphangranglakha eina tangdawui vang awui eina thuihaowa.
Ana athumwui Synagogueli tamchithei kala mi saikorana ali soi.
Kala Isaiah marānwui lairik chi ali mi. Ana lairik chi harkhayang eina hithada kapi kahai tuipam chi samphanga;
Khikhalajila kachāmabingli paokaphā hashok khavai,
ana ili thao neomihaira.
Narkahaibingli chihomi khavai,
khangapeobing theiluishit khavai,
chāngkhareng kahaibing ningkhān khavai.
Prohowui mayākhami zingkum rāhaira da,
vaomalānmi khavai ili kashirātna.”
Ana lairik chi khaluikhuida rao chili mihailaga pamkazang eina, chili leikasā mi saikorana ali yangvāsera.
Chieina ana athumli hāngphokuwa, “Varewui tui chi aja nathumna kashā eina ungshunghaira.”
Mi saikorana sosera kala awui khamor eina lukhamashan tui kashok chi shālaga matakhakhaida hānga, “Hi Josephwui naomayara chi maningmalā?”
Chieina ana hānga, “Makahatlakla chānjam tui hi nathumna ili hāngra, ‘Khanong, na khalatta raikhuilu, nana Capernaumli sākahahai ithumna shākahai chi naram ngaleilila sālu’ jira.”
Chieina ana hānglui, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, marān khipālikha khalattaramli khamayā maleimana.”
Kha ina nathumli mashuntui hi kahāngna, “Elijahwui atamli zingkum kathum, kachāng tharuk Varena kazing maro ngasakthuda apam hupva̱li chāmrei kharā tharan Israelli ra̱meinao kachungkha leisai,
thālala Elijahli, Sidon ngaleiwui Zarephatli khalei rameiva̱wuili maningla khangateiwuili mashivātmana.
Kala Elisha marānwui atamli Israelli phārrei kakazā mi kachungkha leisai; thālala Syriawui Naaman maningla khangatei khipālikha matharmimana.”
Tui chi kashā eina Synagogueli leikasā mi saikorana malungvātlakhaowa.
Chieina athumna ngakarthuida ali keinungwui eina shimenshoka kala athumwui keinung sakā kahai kaphungton chiwui eina sha̱tā khavai ali thānvai.
Kha ana yaruiwui ngachaili ngara̱thuihaowa.
Athumna awui tamkachithei chili matakhakhaowa, kaja ana sāshap pangshap eina matui.
Chitharan Syngogueli raih kazanga mi akha leisai, ana panglāk eina vāoshoka,
“He Nazarethwui Jishu! nana ithumli khi sāki kajikhala? Ithumli shimān ngasak khavai kharāla? Na khipākhala da ithumna thei; na Varewui Tharkhamathengpā china.”
Kha Jishuna makathar manglā chili kaharda hānga, “Akhon mashoklu, awui eina shokhaolu.” Makaphā manglā china ali horkarsanghailaga zakkashi khikha masāla awui eina shokhaowa.
Mibing chi matakhakhaida akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta, “Hi khitui khala? Ana sāshap pangshap eina makathara manglā chili kakaso eina athumnala yāmshokli” da matuiya.
Chieina ngalei chiwui kuikhamareili khalei apam saikorali awui pao hi ngayaonaphaowa.
Ana preiva̱ chiwui ngalemli anganingda kakharur raikhavai kakaso eina raihaowa kala ana hengsāda ngakarthuilaga athumli otram ngatha̱mi.
Zimik tunkahaiwui thili kazātyur khangatateiwui eina kakazānaobing awuili khuirai. Ana mi kachiva̱wuitungli pāng parrorda athumwui kakazā raimi.

Mi kachungkhawui eina chipeebing china “Na Varewui naomayarana” da panglāk eina vaolaga yāmshoka. Kha ana athumli khararda tuila mamatui ngasakmana, khiwui vangkhala kaja athumna a Khrista china da theihaowa.
Kha ana athumli hānga, “Ina khangatei keinungbinglila Vare wungramwui paokaphā hi hashokphalungra; kaja hi sākhavai ili kashirātna.”
Chieina ana Judeali khalei Synagoguebinglila pao hāshoka.
Ana ngayipheili marikhong khani thei; kha khaih kaphābinga marikhongwui eina thuihaida khaihlan apheohairasai.
Chieina Jishuna marikhong khaniwui ngachaili Simonwui marikhongli kātonglaga ngayipheiwui eina kateokha huivā khavai poi. Kala ana marikhongli pamda mibing chili tamchithei.
Ana tamchitheikup kahai eina Simonli hānga, “Kathukvāk huivāda khaih phākhui khavai nawui khaihlan horsanglu.”
Chieina Simonna ngahānkai, “Amei, ithumna ngayā pongda phāhaira, kha khikhala masamphangmana. Chithālala nawui kakaso athishurda ina horsangluiga.”
Athumna khaihlan horkasang tharan khaih sorkhangasai horkhuiya kala khaihlanla kākki jihaoda,
athumna marikhong khangateili katonga ngasotnaobingli rāngachonmi khavai apāng yapvai. Chieina athumna rāda marikhong khanini chi khaihna pemhaida ritnā kahaiwui vang marikhong chi ngaphumki jihaowa.
Kha Simon Peterna chi kathei eina Jishuwui pheizingli ngakhumzangda hānga, “He Proho, iwui eina kathuimihaolu; kaja I morei kaphunga mina.”
Athum khaih sorkhangasai horkakhui chi theilaga ala kala ali khangaso saikorala matakhakhaowa.
Chithada sāda Simonwui ngasotnaobing, Zebedeewui naomayara James eina Johnla matakhakhaowa. Chieina Jishuna Simonli hānga, “Mangacheealu, hiwui eina thuida ara na mi kapha ngasāhaora.”
Athumna marikhong khani chi ngayipheili khuishokhailaga athumwui khalalei saikora horhaiphungda athi shurthuwa.
Chieina Jishuna awui pāng katingvāda saza̱da hānga, “Ina sāmilakra, tharchaohaolu.” Ngalangda phārrei kakazā chi raichaohaowa.

Ana “Mi khipālikha mahānglakalu, kha vālu, na khalattana naphasā pāngmonli achitheilu kala Mosesna kaso kahai athishurda nali tharmihaira kaji mibingna machutkhui khavai pha̱kaphayā achigatlu.” da hānga.
Jishuwui pongli mataimeikharda pao ngayaovāhaoda awui tui nganā khavai kala athumwui kakazā raikhui khavai mi kachungkha rākazipa.
Kha ana lamhāngli vāda seihā vāsāthuihaowa.
Kala yanglu, kachikathā kaikhana sheikasha̱ mi akhali pet eina ngava̱rai kala ali shimlungli khuizangda Jishuwui mangāli haikhavai hotnai;
kha mi chungnahaida khuizang khavai apong maleithuda athumna shimtungli kai, kala chi rānphutta ali pet eina ngasoda yarui pamda khalei alungthungli Jishuwui mangāli chihotai.
Jishuna athumwui shitkasang chi theida hānga, “He mayara, nawui morei pheomihaira.”
Chieina ain kathembing eina Phariseebingna athum khalatta kapupta hāngngaroka, “Vareli kachipat tui khamatui hi khipākhala? Vare maningla khipāna morei pheomishapkhala?”
Jishuna athumwui ngahān khangarok chi theida athumli hānga, “Khisāda nathumwui wuklungli machukphāphākhala?
‘Nawui morei pheomihaira’ kaji eina ‘Ngakarthuida zatulu’ da kahāng kachipā paimeikhala?
Kha okathuili miwui Naomayarana morei pheomi khavai pangshap lei da nathumna theikhavaina.” Chieina ana sheikasha̱ chili hānga, “Ina nali kahāngna, ngakarthuilu, nawui pet khuiphungda shimli ungulu.”
Ana athumwui miktāli ngalāngda ngakarthui kala ana pikhavai pet chi ngava̱khuiphungda masot chikatmamānda shimli unghaowa.
Chieina athum saikora matakhakhaoda Vareli masochikata; kala khangacheena pemtinghaida “Ithumna matheisālak kaji ot aja theihaira.” da hāngngaroka.
Chieina Levina ot saikora nothāhaiphunglaga ngakarthuida athi shurthuwa.
Chiwui thili Levina ashi shimli Jishuwui vang zātkhān kahaka akha sai; phazāt chili khāshinā khalokabing kala khangatateibingla zangda mi kachungkha kazipa.
Chieina Pharisee eina ain kathembingna awui sākhangatha̱bingli mamayāngaimada, “Khiwui vang eina nathumna khāshinā khalokabing kala morei kaphungbingli phāshak phazārumkhala?” da hānga.
Chieina Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Kazāt makhaleibingna khanong mahomana, kha kakazābingna kahona;
Iva khamashung-khangarongbingli hokhui khavai kharā maningmana, kha morei kaphungbingli ning ngateikhui khavai hokhuikida kharāna.”
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Khām kahaia china athumli ngasopamlakha shakzātli kharābingli chikhumpairalā?
Khām kahaia chili athumwui eina khuikathui atam rārāsāra, chithanghon athum khumnaora.”

Ana athumli chānjam akhala hāngchithei; “Mi khipānakha kadhara chonsāwui eina akainao akha serkhuilaga kachama chonsāli mataksangmana; taksangakha kadhara chonsā chila kakhaowa kala kadhara chonsā chi kachama chili machāluimana.
Khipānakha drakhāra̱ sangkhavai sāhuikhao kachamli drakhāra̱ kadhar mathaisangmana; thaisangakha kadhara drakhāra̱ china khao chi ngawokkhaida heitha̱haora, khaola shimānhaora.
Kha drakhāra̱ kadhar chi sāhuikhao kadharli sangphalungra.
Kala khipānakha drakhāra̱ arar mangkahaiwui thili anui mamangngailui mana kaja ‘Arar phāmeiya’ da ana hānga.”
Kha Pharisee kaikhana hānga, “Khisāda sabbaththang ain kakai ot sākhala?”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “David eina ali khangasobingna thaikahai tharan khisakhala kaji nathum mapākhuimala?
Kathada ana khorumshimli zanglaga pāngmon maningla khangatei khipānakha mashaikapai Ngasokhamiwui khamui shaihao kala ali khangasobinglila mishaihao!”
Ana athumli hānglui, “Miwui Naomayarana sabbathwui akhavāna.”
Khangatei sabbath zimiksho akhali ana synagogueli zangda tamkachithei tharan yāpang sheisha̱ kahai mi akha leisai.
Ain kathembing eina Phariseebingna awuitungli khayon phenpai khavai sabbaththang ana kazat maraiminikhala da yangpama.
Kha ana athumwui kaphaning chi theihaoda pāng sheikasha̱pā chili hānga, “Hili rānganinglu.” Chieina ana ngakarthuida chili anganinga.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Ina nathumli khangahāna; Sabbath zimiksholi kaphā ot kasā mashungmeikā zakkashi ot kasā mashungmei, manglā huikhuirakā sashimānrakhala?”
Jishuna athum saikorali yangserlaga sheikasha̱pali hānga, “Napāng katingshoklu.” Ana pāng chi katingkashok eina khangachā thada unghaowa.
Kha athumna Jishuli malungvātnāhaida khi sāsikhala da akha eina akha ngazek ngaroka.
Kazing kathang eina awui sākhangatha̱bingli hokhui kala athumwui eina mi tharāda khani kapangkhuida athumli paokazatbing da phokmi;
chiya, Peterla kaho Simon kala agato Andrew; James eina John, Philip kala Bartholomew,
Mathew, Thomas kala Alphaeuswui naomayara James, Zealotla kaho Simon kala
Jameswui naomayara Judas kala yorkazā ngasā kahaiya Judas Iscariot.
athum awui tui nganā khavai kala kakazā raikhui khavai rai kala makathar manglāna singkakharengbing chila raikakhui samphanga.
Chieina mi saikorana ali saza̱khui khavai sai kaja awui eina pangshap shokta athum saikorali raimi.
“Kachāmbing sokhami ngasāranu, kaja Vare wungram chi nathumwuina.
Arui kathaibing nathum sokhami ngasāranu, kaja nathumli thongasakra.
Arui kachapbing nathum sokhami ngasāranu, kaja nathumna mana̱ra.
Chithang ringphālu kala mathānda ngalongkālu, khikhalajila yanglu, kazingramli nathumwui sāman haklaka, kaja athumwui avāva̱ ngarānala marānbingli chithada sai.
Arui kathobing, nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu, kaja nathum thaira.
“Arui mana̱da khaleibing, nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu. kaja nathum chapra!
“Mina nathumli sotkhamasao tharan nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu, kaja athumwui avāva̱ ngarābingnala minama marānbingli chi tākam eina sāsai.
Nathumli khonkashe athumli somilu, nathumli sāshida kasā athumwui vang seihā sāmilu,
Nawui maisorli kakaphe a chili lākhavākla ngareimilu; coat ngapaikakhuia a chili phahonla minarhaolu.
Nathumli kapo mi kachiva̱li milu. Nathumwui ot khuithui kahai chi mapokhuiluialu.
Nali sami ngasakkhangai chi tākam eina kateibinglila sāmilu.
Nathumli kaphā sākhamebingmāngli kaphā sāmiakha china nathumli khi tongkazā leikhala? Kaja morei kaphungbingnala chithada sai.
Nathumna samphangra da kachihānbing māngli chishutakha china nathumli khi tongkazā leikhala? Morei kaphungbingnala morei kaphungbingli athumna chishut kahai chiyākha samphang khavai chishuta.

Kha nathumwui yangkashebingli leishilu, kapha sāmilu, kala khikhala samphangluira da machihānlakla chishutlu. Chithākha nathumwui sāman haklakra kala Juikhamataiya Varewui naongarā ngasāra. Kaja maningshikatheia kala makaphā athumlila ana lumashanmi.
Nathumwui Avāva̱na lumashankathei thada nathumla lumashantheilu.
milu, chithākha nathumlila mira; sailamlak eina katukla tukta, kakhanukla khanukta pemtha̱da nathumwui sa̱sāli chipemmira. Kaja nathumna tamsangkhami tākam eina nathumlila tamsangmira.”
Katamnaona Ojāli mareimeimana, kha kāshunglak eina tamchithei kahaiwui thili mi kachiva̱ awui ojā eina ngaraichāpapamhaora.
“Khisāda nawui mikli thingngumrikha kazang chi matheilaga nachināwui mikli khayim kazang chi thei jikhala?

Namikli thingngumrikha kazang chi matheirarlaga kathada nachināli, ‘Itao, namikli khayim kazang chi ina kheimiga’ da hāngpairakhala? He phākakhaninga, namikli thingngumrikha kazang chi rida kheishokhaifalu, chiwui thili nachināwui mikli khayim kazang chi kheishokmi khavai mathingrik eina theira.
Kaja thingrong kachiva̱ hi athei eina thei. Kashātrongwui eina khaorāthei maphākhuimana, kala kara̱theirongwui eina drakhāthei maphākhuimana.

Kaphā mina wuklungli kaphā phari kahai chiwui eina kaphā sāshoka, kala makaphā mina wuklungli makaphā phari kahai chiwui eina makaphā sāshoka. Kaja wuklungli pemting eina khalei chi khamorna matuishoka.
Iwuili kharā kala iwui tui shālaga chiwui athishurda kasā mi kachiva̱ chi kachikathā mikhala da ina nathumli chitheira.

Chikathā mi chiya thuklak eina chuizanglaga lunghārtungli shimphunga heihailaga shim sākakā kathāna. Tara̱ kaphong tharan shim chili ungpharza̱lala mangatha̱ ngasakrarmana; khiwui vangkhala kaja chi ngaziplak eina sakā kahaina.

Kha shālaga makasā mi chiya ngalei machuizangla ngaleitungli shimphunga heihailaga sākakā kathāna. Tara̱ phongda ungpharkaza̱ tharan ngalāngda ja̱phup tāhaowa kala shim chiwui kashimān chi hakmahālaka.”
Chitharan raimi shākhawui akhavā akhana lumlak kahai rao akha kazāda thinanai leisai.
Ana Jishuwui maramli kashā eina awui raoli raimi khavai Jihudiwui khararnao kaikhali ali aho khavai chihovai.
Athumna Jishuli rāda saklak eina poda hānga, “A nawui khangachon samphang khangayi milaka.
Kaja ana ithumwui yurli leishi kala ithumwui vang synagoguela sāmi.”

Chieina Jishuna athumli ngasovai kala shim vāshungnanai tharan akhavā china awui ngasotnaobingli chihovāda Jishuli vāhānga, “Proho, marāluialu, chotvai, nali iwui shimli rāzang ngasaki kaji hi vaishiya.
Chiwui vang eina I mashā eina marākhalengna. Kha thada kasomimalu, china iwui rao chi raishapra.

Kaja ila akhavāwui azingli khalei mi akhana kala iwui azinglila raimi tarākha lei. Kachikathā akhali ina ‘Vālu’ jiakha vai, kala khangatei akhali ‘Rālu’ jiakha rai, kala iwui raoli ‘Hi sālu’ jiakha ana chi sai.”
Jishuna tui chi kashā eina matakhakhaowa kala shurkazat mi kachungkha chili ngareiungda hānga, “Ina nathumli kahāngna, Israelwui alungli ina hikathā shitkasang matheilakranga.”
Chihokhavā paophungmebing china shimli latkhanung tharan rao chi raihairasai.
Ana keinung chiwui ngavei vākashung tharan, yanglu, yaronnao akha thihaida ngazonshokrāsai. A ra̱meiva̱ akhawui akhamāng kaje naomayarana, chili keinung chiwui mi kachungkha ngasozatsai.
Prohona ali kathei eina lumashanhaida “Machapalu” da hānga.
Kala ana vāda kathi okoli sākaza̱ eina ngava̱kazatbing china nganingmihaowa. Chieina Jishuna hānga, “He mayara, ina nali kahāngna, ngakarthuilu.”
Kathipā chi thuipama kala tui matuiphokuwa, kala Jishuna ava̱va̱wui pāngli mihaowa.
Kashok chi theilaga athum ngacheelakhaowa kala Vareli masot chikatta hānga, “Ithumwui ngachaili marān kahaka akha shokhaira! kala Varena awui miyurli huimi khavai phaningmihaira!”
Awui pao chi Judea ngalei eina chiwui kuikhamareili khalei apam saikorali ngayaovāserhaowa.
Chieina Johnna awui sākhangatha̱ khani hokhuilaga Proholi chihovāda “Raki kaje chi nakā, khangatei akhali honfarakhala?” da angahān ngasaka.
Anina ali vākashung eina “Inili Ra̱hikme Johnna nali tui hi ngahānkhui khavai chihokharāna, chiya, ‘Raki kaje chi nakā, khangatei akhali honfarakhala?’” da ngahāna.
Atam chichang chili ana kazāt ayur kachungkha kala raih kazangbinglila raimi kala khangapeo kachungkhalila theingasaka.

Ana anili ngahānkai, “Ungulu kala nanina theikahai shākahai chi Johnli unghānglu, chiya, khangapeobing kathei samphanghaira, phei katekbing zatpaihaira, phārrei kakazābing kathar samphanghaira, khangakhokbing shāhaira, kathebingli ringngasakhaira, kachāmbingnala paokaphā kashā samphanghaira.
Chieina ili maningkhamaong a chi sokhami ngasāranu!”
Johnwui paophunga khani chi zatkahaiwui thili ana yaruili Johnwui maramli tamchitheiphokta hānga, “Nathumna khi yangkhuikida lamhāngli khavākhala? Masina phanung phankhavā titililā?
Khi yangkhuikida khavākhala? Kachon khamanaka khangavai mililā? Yanglu, kachon khamathāthā khangavaibing kala kāshunglak eina okthuida khalei athum chiya awungawui dolanli khaleina.
Nathumna khi yangkhuikida khavākhala? Marānlila? Mha, ina nathumli kahāngna, marānlila mataikhamei nathumna thei.
Awui pongli hithada kapihaidalei; ‘Yanglu, iwui paophungmeli nali rida chihoi, ana nawui shongfa rida ngarānmira.’
Ina nathumli kahāngna, sha̱naona kapharāwui ngachaili Johnli reikhamei khipākha maleimana. Chithālala Vare wungramli teomeikap kaje mi china ali reimei.”
Tui hi kashā eina Johnwui ra̱kahik samphang kahai mi saikorana kala khāshinā khalokbingna Varewui tui chi mashunglaka jihaowa.
Kha Phariseebing eina ain kathembingna Varena athumwui vang ngarānmi kahai chila khalanhaowa kala Johnwui ra̱hikkhamila makhuimana.
Jishuna hānglui, “Chithākha ina mithot hili khi eina ngaheosikhala? Athum khili ngaraichākhala?

Athum hiya naoshinaobingna leihngapha̱li pamlaga, ‘Ithumna nathumwui vang sipa̱ khongmilala nathumna pheijak majakmana; ithumna kathi laa sālala nathumna machapmana’ da akha eina akha hangkhangarok kathāna.
Kaja Ra̱hikme Johnna kharā tharan a khamuila mashai kala drakhāra̱la mamangmana, laga nathumna ‘A raih kaphungana’ da hānga.
Miwui Naomayarana rāphāshak rāphāzai, laga nathumna ‘Yanglu, a morkahaka, khamaripa kala khāshinā khalokabing eina morei kaphungabingwui ngasotnaona’ da phena.
Chitha-ilala thangkhamei chili Varewui naongarābingna mashunga da mayai.”
Kala yanglu, keinung chiwui morei kaphungva̱ sha̱nao akhana Jishu phazāli kaji kashā eina nganamkaphā alabaster thaokhong akha khuirai.
Ana Jishuwui phei khanukvāk nganingda chapsasui awui chara̱ eina phei ya̱ngasakhailaga kuisam eina mitmihai kala apheili maya̱da nganamkaphā thao chi neomi.

Chi kathei eina phazāt kaho Phariseepā china akhalatta phaninga, “Mipā hi marānsi kaje ali sakaza̱ sha̱nao hi khipākhala kala kachikathā mikhala kaji theida leira, kaja ava morei kaphungva̱ sha̱naona.”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkāda hānga, “Simon ina nali hāngkhangai akha lei.” Ana “Khikhala Ojā, hāngmilu” da ngahānkai.
“Lupā kachishuta mi akhawuili kashuka mi khani leisai, akhana lupā shāphangā kala akhapāna hangphangā shukhaisai.
Anina marunkharar eina ana yangmithathuihaowa. Chithākha aniwui ngachaili kachipana ali leishimeirakhala?”
Simonna ngahānkai, “Ina kaphaninga, chungmeida yangmi kahaipa china ali leishimeira.” Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Nawui kaphaning chi mashunglaka.”

Chiwui thili sha̱naovāk ngareivāda Simonli hānga, “Na sha̱naopava̱ hili theilā? Ina nashi shimli rāzanglaga nana iphei pheokhavai tara̱la mamimana kha sha̱naopava̱ hina awui chara̱ eina iphei ya̱ngasaklaga akuisam eina mitmi.
Nana ili samkaphang shālamla masāmana, kha rākhaleodawui eina thuilaga ana ipheili khamaya̱ mathāhairangli.
Nana ikuilila thao maneomimana, kha ana ipheili nganamkaphā thao neomi.
Chiwui vang eina ina nali kahāngna, awui morei kachungkha khalei chi pheomihaira, kaja ana leishilak eina sāmi; kha teoda pheokhami mi china teomeida leishi.”
Sha̱naopava̱ chili hānga, “Nawui morei saikora pheomihaira.”
Chieina ali phazā khangarumbingna athum khalatta, “Morei eina tangda pheomikashap hi khipākhala?” da ngazek ngaroka.
Chieina ana sha̱naopava̱li hānga, “Nawui shitkasangna nali huimihaira, chingri eina ungulu.”
Chipee zangkasā kala kazāt leikasāwui eina raimi kahai sha̱nao kaikhala ngayura. Kameo shini kashamshokmi kahaiva̱ Mary Magdalene,
Herodwui lanse Chuzawui preiva̱ Joanna kala Susanna kala athum khalattawui lan khuishokta ngachonkhame sha̱nao kachungkhala ngayurzatsai.
“Atha khayao mi akhana athā yaokhavai vai, kala ana yaozatlakha atha kaikha shongfali tātungda phei eina naikazama kala yongkazata vānaobingna ngamuizāhaowa.
Kaikhana lungguitungli tāzanga; akhar kharshoklaga khanim maleithuda ngahuihaowa.
Khangatei kaikha ka̱shāt ngachaili tāzangda ka̱shātli phorrumhaida shangthathaowa.
Kala athā kaikha ngalei katumli tāzanga; kala kharshokta shāshā mathei.” Ana hi hānglaga, “Shākhui khavai khanā kakaa china shākhuiranu” da panglāk eina vaowa.

ana hānga, “Nathumli Vare wungramwui khangathuma tui chi theikhui khavai pangshap mihaira; kha khangateibingwui vanga chānjam thada lei. Chiwui vang eina athumna yanglala matheimara kala shālala bhap matāmara.”
Shongfali tākazangbing chi shākhui kahaibingna; kha athum tui chili mashitsang khavai kala kahui masamphang khavai chipee china rālaga athumwui eina tui chi khuithuihaowa.

Ngalei tarākha makhalei lungguina pemting kahai apamli tākazang athābing chi tui chi kashā eina mathānthathup khuisanga; kha angayung maleithuda athumna kasha̱nakhawui vang shitsanglala kasui kharā tharan yāmhaowa.

Ka̱shātwui ngachaili tākazangbing chiya shākhui kahaibingna kha athumna okthuivāmamān kaji eina okathuiwui lumlao, kashāngkharei kala hunkhawui vang ringkaphā mirin china shangthathaowa, kala atheila minkakhui mangavāmana.
Ngalei katumpamli tākazangbing chiya tui chi shākhuilaga ningkathar kala kahāng khanganā wuklung eina singtitta khānglaga athei kachungkha khamatheibing chi kathāna.
“Kaja maphongshokla thumhaoki kaji khikha maleimana, lah matheiki kaji kala kahorli makhuishokla kafakhamhaoki kaji khikha maleimana.
“Chiwui vang eina nathum nganākhuikazaklu, khikhalajila khaleia chili chungmeida mira kala makhaleia chiwui eina ana lei da kaphaning chila khuithuihaora.”
Chieina kachikathāna ali ahānga, “Nashāva̱ eina nachinā ngarā nali samphangngai da kayāngli ngaraili.”
Chieina ana athumli ngahānkāda hānga, “Varewui tui nganāda chi kasā athum chi ishava̱ kala ichināngarāna.”
kala athumna zatmamānlakha Jishu pivāhaowa. Chitharan ngayi chili siphan zingrot panglāk eina ungrāsai kala athumwui marikhongli tara̱ ngaphaosangda athum ka̱lā shiki jihaowa.
Chieina athumna ali vāmathotkhuilaga hānga, “Amei, Amei, ithum shimānki jiura.” Chieina ana ngakarthuida masi kala khangaphao chili ngasām khavai kakaso eina va̱rihaowa.

Chiwui thili ana athumli hānga, “Nathumwui shitkasang kachili leikhala?” Chieina athumna matakhaknāhaida khangacheela ngacheenāhaida akha eina akha “Hi kachikathā mida, ana kakaso eina masinala, tara̱nala awui kahāng khanganākhala?” da ngazek ngaroka.
Ana ngalei kathengli karkashok tharan raih kazanga mi akha keinung chiwui eina rāngaroka; atam kasāngkha kashankachon mangavaila kala shimlila mapamla chikhurpamli pamhairasai.
Ana Jishuli kathei eina vaolaga awui mangāchangli ngakhumshām eina panglāk eina hānga, “Reikhamataia Varewui Naomayara Jishu, nana ili khi sāki kajikhala? Ili marekharekmialu.”

Kaja ana makathar manglā chili mipa chiwui eina shokhaolu da kasohairasai. (Kaja china tarākhashida ali singhaoda ali khamayon mila phāsanga, marikhānghui einala khalapa kala zurthing einala narhai, kha khalap kahai saikora nganurshatlaga kameo china ali lamhāngli kashamvāhaowa.)
Jishuna ali, “Nawui ming khipā hokhala” da ngahāna. Chieina ana, “Ili Legion hoi” da ngahānkai; kaja kameo kachungkha ali zanghaowa.
Kala kameobing china athumli kazeiramshong makashamvāmialu da poi.
Chitharan kaphungpheili hok ashangva̱ akha phazāzatsai; chieina athumli hok ashangva̱ chili zang ngasakmi khavai poi. Kapo chi mayāmihaowa.
Chiwui vang kameobing china mipāwui eina shoklaga hok ashangva̱ chili vāzanghaoda hokbing china amai tarenli yongkachup tāda ngayili hikthatserhaowa.
Hok kahombing china shokkahai chi theilaga ngasamungda keinunglila, kha̱lila unghāngchithei.

Chieina mibing china khi shokhaokhala da ayang khavai vai kala athumna Jishuwuili vākashung eina kameo shokkahai mipa chi kashankachon ngavailaga ning mathingrik eina awui ngalemli pamkasa theida athum ngacheelakhaowa.
Otshot chi kathei mibingna chili kharā athumli kathada kameo kazangpā chili raimihaokhala da hāngchithei.
Chieina Gerasa ngaleiwui kuikhamareili kapāna mibing saikorana ali athumwui eina thuimihaolu da poi; kaja athum ngacheenāhaowa. Chieina ana marikhong tongkhuiphungda latunghaowa.
Kameo zangkasa mipa china ali shurkhavai poi.

Kha Jishuna ali “Nashi shimli latungulu kala Varena nali kayākha samihaira̱khala kaji unghāngchitheilu.” da hānglaga chihohaowa. Chieina mipa china Jishuna awui vang kayākha sāmihairakhala kaji keinung katonga chili unghānga.
Chitharan Jairus kaho Synagoguewui akhavā akha apam chili rai, kala Jishuwui pheizingli ngakhumzangda ashi shimli kharāmi khavai poi.
Kaja awui naongalāva̱ akhamāng kaje kum tharāda khani sha̱kha rarkahaiva̱ chi kazāda thinanai leisai.
Ana zatmamānlakha mi kachungkhana ali puiruida ngaheizanga.
Chitharan zingkum tharāda khani ashee ngaya̱haida khipānakha maraimikharar sha̱nao akha,
khanukli rāda awui chontheira̱li rāsaza̱ya; kala ngalāngda awui ashee khangaya̱ chi raihaowa.
Chieina Jishuna ngahāna, “Ili rāsākaza̱ chi khipākhala?” Saikorana I maningmana jiser kahai eina Peterna hānga, “Amei, nali mi kachungkhana puiruikhamda ngaheikazamda leili!”
Kha Jishuna hānga, “Kachikathāna ili saza̱haira, kaja ina iwui pangshap shokkahai thei.”

Chieina sha̱nao china mangathumpaimara da kathei tharan kathirriri rāda amangāli ngakhumzangda yarui saikorawui mangāli ana khiwui vang eina saza̱haokhala kala kathada ngalāngda raihaokhala kaji phongshar eina hāngphata.
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Inao ngalāva̱, nawui shitkasang china nali raingasakhaira. Chingri eina ungulu.”
Ana matuimahungda leilakha, khamungawui shim eina kharā mi akhana rāhānga, “Nanao ngalāva̱ thihaira, Ojālila masheikhautluialu”.
Kha Jishuna chi kashā eina ali hānga, “Mangacheealu. Thada shitsangmalu, chithākha a ringra.”
Ana shim chili vākashung eina Peter, John, James kala nao chiwui ava̱ avā maningla mi khipālikha shimlungli ali ngasoda mazang ngasakmana.
Mi saikorana kathiwui vang khanangda chapngachālaga leisai; chieina Jishuna hānga, “Machapalu, kaja a thikahai maningmana kha pida khaleina.”
Athumna ngalāva̱ chi thihaira kaji theihaoda ali mana̱shi.
Kha ana awui pāng singkhuida hānga, “Inao ngalāva̱, ngakarthuilu.”
Chieina ringuda heng sāda ngakarthui kala ali kashakazā mizā khavai kasoi.
Ava̱ eina avāva̱la matakhakhaowa kha Jishuna shokkahai chi khipālikha mahanglakalu da kasoi.
Ana athumli Vare wungramwui pao hāshok khavai kala kazāt raimi khavai shivāta.
Chieina athumli hānga, “Nathumwui shongzāli khāmshuila, paidula, zātromla, lupāla makhuiphunglakalu; kala phahonla khani makhuiphungalu.
Nathumna vākazang shim chili thada pamlu, kala chiwui eina zatphoklu.
Kha nathumli marāzang ngasak khangaiya ram kachiva̱ chiwui eina zatphokuki kaji tharan athumli makhamayāwui shākhi kachithei sāda nathumwui pheili kakā chifa chi kathangtāhaolu.”
Chieina athumna zatuwa kala khavāvā kha̱ kachiva̱li paokaphāla hāshoka kala kakazāla raimi.
kaikhana Elijah rāluihaira, kala khangatei kaikhana achālakhawui marānbing ngachaiwui eina akha ringluihaira.
Herodna hānga, “Johnli ina kui ranghaira kha ina hithada shāda khalei mipā hi khipākhala?” Chieina Herodna Jishuli samphang khavai phai.
Kala chi shālaga mi kachungkha athi shurrai; kala ana athumli mathānthathup samphangda Vare wungramwui pongli tamchithei kala kazāt raimi ngasak khangaibingli raimi.

Chitharan kazingla yinguki jihaoda tharāda khani china ali rāhānga, “Yarui hili chihohaolu; chithākha athumna kha̱kha̱li kala chiwui luinganaili vāda athumwui kashakazā, kapi-kapam angarānpaira, kaja hili khikha maleimana.”
Kha Jishuna athumli hānga, “Athumli zākhavai milu.”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Ithumwui pāngli khamui phangā kala khaih khani hi leili. Mi hiyakhawui zākhavai ithumli vālokhuilu kajila?”
Chili mayarnao thingphangā sha̱kha leisai. Chieina ana awui sākhangatha̱bingli hānga, “Athumli hangphangānga ngaher eina pamngasaklu.”
Chieina kahāng chi tākam eina athumli pamngasaka,
kala khamui phangā khaih khani chi ana singkhuilaga kazingramli yangkāda sokhami pomi kala khamui chi serkhaida yaovā khavai sākhangatha̱bingli mi.
Chieina mi saikorana shailaga penlakhaowa kala athumna shaineng luk tharāda khani kazipkhui.
Chieina athumna. “Mi kaikhana John Ra̱hikmena ji, kha kaikhana Elijahna ji kala khangatei kaikhana achālakhawui marānbingwui ngachaiwui eina akha ringkashokna ji” da ngahānkai.
Ana athumli ngahānluishita, “Kha ili nathumna khipāna da phaningkhala?” Chieina Peterna, “Varewui Khrista china” da ngahānkai.
Kha Jishuna athumli tui hi mi khipālikha mahāng khavai kasoi.
Ana hānga, “Miwui Naomayarana apong kachungkhali kakhanang kachot samphangra kala ararbing, pāngmon akhokabing, kala ain kathembingna mamayāmada shaothatra kala kakathuma thang ringshokluira.”
Kaja kachikathana awui mirin kankhuiga jiakha chi shimānra; kala kachikathā iwui vang awui mirin shimānkhame china kankhuira.
Kaja mi akhana okathui tongda samphanglala khalattawui mirin shimānhaiakha awui tongkazā khi leikhala?
Kachikathā mina iwui vang kala iwui tuiwui vang khayakakha miwui Naomayarana awui tekhamatei kala Avā eina kazingraobingwui tekhamatei eina rāthanghon awui vangla khayakhaora.
Kha ina nathumli kachangkhat eina kahāngna, Vare wungram chi matheiranglakha mathifaki kaji mi kaikha hili nganingda lei.”
Ana seihā sāmahunglakha awui zakmai onhaowa, kala awui kachonla charshi eina horchamrihai.
Kala yanglu, mi khani ali ngasoda chān ngazeka, ani Moses eina Elijahna.
Anina tekmateilak eina rāda Jishuna Jerusalemli thimihailaga zatthuihaoki kajiwui pongli rāhānga.
Chitharan Peter eina ali khangasobingla piphuphairasai kala athumna thuikhamathuk eina Jishuwui tekhamatei kala ali ngasoda nganingkharuma mi khani chila thei.

Mi khani china Jishuwui eina thuikahai eina, Peterna ali hānga, “Amei, ithum hili leikasā phālakhaira; ithumna rāmnao kathum sākhuisa, nawui vang akha, Moseswui vang akha kala Elijahwui vang akha”— Ana khi kahāngkhala kaji matheimana.
Ana chi hāngmahunglakha athumli muiyāna rangapuirora; kala muiyā china ngapuiror kahai eina athum ngacheeshunhaowa.
Kala muiyālungwui eina akhon akha vaorāda hānga, “Hi iwui Naomayara, iwui Kapangkakhuiana; awui tui nganālu:”
Tui chi hāngkup kahaiwui thili Jishumāng nganingsai. Chieina athumna theikahai chi kasaikha thumhaida khipālikha mahānglakmana.
Kala yanglu, mibing chiwui eina mi akhana vaorai, “Ojā, inaoli khayangmilu, kaja a iwui akhamāng kaje naona;
kala yanglu, makathar manglāna ali singhaida kashuirak eina vaoshokphaphai; akhamorli aporhop mashokranglakha eina tangda sheikharota kala shireikharotta machihomingaiki ji.
Kala kashamshokmi khavai nawui sākhangatha̱bingli ina poi, kha athumna masāmirarthuwa.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “He shitkasang makhaleia kala mashongachei kahai mithot, ina nathumli karankha ngasopamfara kala ja̱mifarakhala? Nawui nao chi hili khuirālu.”
Naoshinaopā china zatrāmahunglakha kameo china ali ngaleili horkarsanghaowa. Kha Jishuna raih chili shokthui khavai kasoi, chieina naoshinaopā chi raihaoda avāva̱li mihaowa.
Varewui tekhamatei sāshap pangshap chi theida mi saikora matakhakhaowa.
Kha ana sākahai saikora chi matakhak eina machuklakha Jishuna awui sākhangatha̱bingli hānga,
“Nathumna tui hi nganātitkhuilu, kaja miwui Naomayarali mibingwui pāngli horsangmihaora.”
Kha sākhangatha̱bingna chiwui kakhalat matheimana. Chi athumwui eina ngathummihaoda athumna bhapla matāthuwa kala khangahānla mangahānlengthuwa.
Kha Jishuna athumwui wuklungli kaphaning chi theihaoda naoshinao akha thara̱khuilaga awui ngalemli nganing ngasaka,

kala athumli hānga, “Hikathā naoshinaoli iwui mingwui vang khuikasanga china ili khuikasangna kala ili khuikasanga china ili kashirata ali khuikasangna; kaja nathum saikorawui ngachaili teomeikap kaje china reimeikapa.”
Kha Jishuna ali hānga, “Ali makhāmhaialu; kaja nathumli mangakaikashebing chi nathumwui mina.”
Chieina ana rida awui paophungmebingli shivātvai, athumna awui vang khangarān sāsā khavai Samariawui kha̱ akhali azanga,
kha mibingna ali mazang ngasakngaithuwa, kaja a Jerusalemvāk vāra kaji leipinghairasai.
Chieina Awui sākhangatha̱ James eina Johnna chi kathei eina anina hānga, “Proho, kazingramwui eina mei tāngasaklaga athumli shimān ngasak khavai kaso ngasakngailā?”
Kha ana ngareiungda anili kahara.
Chiwui thili athumna kha̱ khangatei akhali vāluishithaowa.
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Ramfala akhur lei, khamasaili yongkazata vānaobingla athip lei, kha miwui Naomayarava ngayaizangda ngasāmkhui khavaipam akhala maleimana.”
Khangatei akhali ana hānga, “Ithi shurlu.” Kha ana ngahānkai, “Proho, rida ishāvāli ungchifahaifaga.”
Kha ana ali hānga, “Kathina athum khalattawui kathili chifaranu; kha nawui vanga, vāda Vare wungram chi vaomalānlu.”
Khangatei akhana hānga, “Proho, I nathi shurlakra, kha shimli kapambingli kapāng tui rida unghānghaifaga.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Seiot khuiphokhailaga khanukvāk yangkhaunga mi chi Vare wungramli zangkhavai matik machāmana.”
Kala hithada hānga “Hātkhavai mā kachungkhaya, kha kahāta mi kateokhamānga; chiwui vang eina awui mā kahātli kahāta mi chungmeida shirāt khavai seihā sālu.
Nathumna vāki kaji chili vaulu; yanglu, ina nathumli kharangwui alungli yaonao chihokhavā thada kachihona.
Lupākhaola, paidula, pheihopla makhuiphungalu; kala shongfali khipālikha chānjam masānganaohaialu.
Nathumna vākazangzang shim chili ‘Shim hili chingrihairanu’ da hāngrikaplu.
Chili chingri kahai mi leisaakha, nathumwui chingri kahai awuitungli leira, maningakha chi nathumwuili latungra.
Nathum shim chili thada pamalu, athumna khamimi chi khuishak khuizālu, kaja ot kasā mi china awui ngalangman samkaphang khangachāna. Shim shimli mazangzatalu.
Nathumna keinung akhali akazang tharan athumna nathumli zang ngasakakha, athumna khamimi chi zālu;
chili kakazā khaleibingli raimilaga, athumli ‘Vare wungram chi nathumli ranganailakhaira’ da hānglu.
Kha nathumna keinung akhali vākazang tharan athumna mazang ngasakngaiakha chānreili shokta hānglu,
‘Nathumwui makhamayāwui vang ithumwui pheili kakā nathumwui keinungwui chifa eina tangda kathangkatāna. Kha hi theilu kaja Vare wungram chi nganailakhaira.’
Ina nathumli kahāngna, chithanghon, keinung chiliva Sodomna khāngpaimeira.
Kha Bichar sāthanghon nathumliva Tyre eina Sidonli bichar kasāna paimeira.
Kala Capernaum, naliva kazing kāzokta masot mimaraolā? Nali kazeiram tāshungda khuitāra.
Hangshini china mathānthathup hanungda hānga, “Proho, nawui ming singda kakaso tharan kameo eina tangda ithumwui kahāng nganai!”
Chieina athumli hānga, “Ina kazingramwui eina rikhān khangashei thada Satan tākatung thei.
Yanglu, nathumli phara̱ eina seithattungli naizatshap khavai kala yangkashewui pangshapli yuishap khavai ina sāshap pangshap mihaira; khinakhala nathumli khamā mazararmara.
Chitha-ilala nathumna kameobingli yuihaowa kajiwui vang mamathānhailu, kha nathumwui ming kazingramli kapihaili kajiwui vang mathānlu.”

“Ot saikora iwui Avāna ili horsangmihaira, kala Anaomayara hi khipākhala da Avā maningla khipānakha matheimana; kala Avāva̱ hi khipākhala da Anaomayara maningla khipānakha matheimana, kala Anaomayarana kachikathāli kapangkhuida chitheikhami maningla khipānakha matheimana.”
Ina nathumli kahāngna, marān kala awunga kachungkhana nathumna theida khalei hi theingailaksai, kha matheimana; kala nathumna shāda khalei hi shāngailaksai, kha mashākhuimana.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Ain lairikli khi kapihaida leikhala? Nana chi kathada pākhuikhala?”

Chieina ana ngahānkai, “Nawui Proho Vareli nawuklung tongda, manglā tongda, napangshap tongda kala naning tongda leishiphalungra; kala nawui khongnainaoli na khalattali leikashi thada leishiphalungra.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Nana mashunglak eina ngahānkāhaira; chi sālu, na ringra.”
Kha khalatta mashungkhuikhangaiwui vang Jishuli ngahānluishita, “Chithākha iwui khongnainao chi khipākhala?”

Jishuna ngahānkai, “Mi akha Jerusalemwui eina Jericholi tākida zatlakha phama̱kashaobingwui pāngli zanghaoda athumna awui kashankachon ngaponkhui kala kashaola shaomida kathi mayuk eina haimihailaga zatthuihaowa.
Khaleilaga shongfa chili pāngmon akha rāchamrāsai. Ana ali kathei eina shongfa lākhavāk theithuihaowa.
Chi tākam eina Levi akhala chili vāshungda ali ayanga kala shongfa lākhavāk eina thuihaowa.
Kha Samarianao akha kha̱ram vākida zatta leilakha mipā china khalei apam chili vāshunga, kala ali kathei eina lumashanlakhaowa.
Ana awui ngalemli vālaga thao eina drakhāra̱ neomi kala khamā saikora rommihai. Chiwui thili gadhātungli ali chipamhailaga shimzun akhali khuivai kala ali mathālak eina ngahāmi.
Akhama kathā ana denarii khani khuishoklaga shimva̱a chili mida hānga, ‘Ali mathālak eina ngahāmilu, hili lāngda zangkahai saikora I hankhaungli minaora.’”
Athum kathumwui ngachaili pha̱ma̱ shaomikahaipāwui khongnainao chi kachipāna da nana phaningkhala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Lukhamashan kachitheipā china.” Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Ungulu kala chithada sālu.”
Kala agatuiva̱ Mary kaho akhala leisai, ana Jishuwui pheizingli pamda awui tamkachithei chi nganāpama.
Kha Marthana sheba kasāwui vang khananghaoda awui ngalemli vālaga hānga, “Proho, igatuiva̱na imangli otram ngatha̱ khangasak hili nana khikha maphaningmimaralā? Ili ngachon khavai ali kahāngmilu.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Martha, Martha, nana tarākhawui vang khanangda malungringhaira,
kha khavāt akha lei, Maryna awui eina makhuithuiki kaji chi kapangkhuihaira.”
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Nathumna seihā kasā tharan hithada sālu:
“Avā, naming tharmathengmeiranu. Nawui wungram shokmilu,
Ithumli thangthangwui kashakazā thangkachida khamilu;
kala ithumli ithumwui morei pheomilu; khikhalajila ithumli khayon kasā mi kachiva̱li ithumna pheomi; kala ithumli kasuili mathānzangmialu.’”
kharam kazata iwui ngasotnao akha ishili rāzangda ali mizā khavai khikhala maleithuwa da apolaga
ana ‘Ili masheikhautalu; ara khamongla tākhailaga inao ngarāli thānpili, I mangakarthuirarmara kala nali khikhala mamirarmara’ da shimlungwui eina ngahānkāralā?
Ina kahāngna, ana ali awui ngasotana kajiwui vang ngakarthuida khikhala mamirarmara jilala ngasotana poshonhaora kajiwui vang ngakarthuilaga awui kapo chi thuikapeomira.
Kaja kapo mi kachiva̱li mira, kaphā mi kachiva̱na samphangra kala kashao mi chili shomira.
Nathumwui ngachaili avāva̱ khipāna anaomayarana khaih polaga phara̱ mikhala?
Lha harra̱ polaga seithat mikhala?
Maphasālala nana naongarāli khamathā ot mitheiakha, kazingramli khalei Avāva̱na ali kapobingli kayākha mataida Manglā Kathara mirakhala?”
Kha athum kaikhana hānga, “Ana kameobingwui akhavā Belzebulwui mangā eina kameo kashamshoka.”
Khangatei kaikhana ali chāng yangkida “Kazingramwui eina machut akha chitheilu” da poi.
Kha athumwui kaphaning theihaoda Jishuna athumli hānga, “Wungram chi khalatta ngakaikazamhaiakha shimānhaora, kala shimkhurwui alungli ning mangarumakha kaiphalungra.
Chithada sāda Satan akhalattala ngakaikazamakha, awui wungram leisarala? Kaja ina Beelzebulwui mangā eina chipee kashamkashokna da nathumna hāngli.
Ina Beelzebulwui mangā eina chipee kashamkashokna jisi kaja nathumwui thikashurabingna khipāwui mangā eina chipee kashamshokrakhala? Chithākha athumna nathumwui bicharsame ngasāhaora.
Kha Ina Varewui pangshap eina chipee kashamshokakha Varewui wungram chi nathumwuili rāshunghaira.
“Kapanga mi akhana khutlai peida shaksālaga awui konung khamayon tharan awui lan mashimānmana,
kha ali pangkhameia akhana shim rākaida yuihaiakha ana chihānkasa khutlai saikorala ngapaikhuihaora kala ngaponkakhui otla athum ngayarhaora.
“Ili makazanga mi chi ili makhamayāna, kala ili ngasoda homkakazipli makazanga mi chi kasham kahaiana.
Ana latkhaung tharan shim chi pha̱mathāhaida mathasek eina leisai.
Chiwui thili ana shokluishitta ali maphākhamei manglā shini thanungda shim chili ungpamma. Chieina mipā chiwui khare mirinli khanaowa mirin china zakshimeikharhaowa.”
Kha Jishuna ngahānkai, “Varewui tui nganākhuida chi khamayonbing sokhami ngasāranu.”
Kaja Jonahna Nineveh mibingwui machut akha khangasā thada miwui Naomayarana thot hiwui machut sāra.

Bichar sathanghon Azingshongwui Philava̱na thot hiwui mibingli ngasoda anganingrumda athumli khayon mira; kaja sha̱nao china Solomonwui thangkhamei nganā khavai okathui akatangawui eina rai. Kha yanglu, Solomonli reikhameia akha hili lei.

Ninevehwui mibingna thot hili ngasoda bichar sāthanghon anganingrumda athumli khayon mira; kaja athumna Jonahna paokhamathā hākashok chi khuisangda ningkhangatei samphanga, kala yanglu, Jonahli reikhameia akha hili leili.
Namikna naphasāwui thaomei na, namik makhamathing tharan naphasāla tangmangting haowa.
Chiwui vang eina nawuili khalei kahor chi matangmanghai khavai ningngasharlu.
Naphasā tongtingda tangkhamang maleilakla kahorna pemtinghaiakha thaohmeiwui kahorna horrorkhami thada horchamrihaora.”
Jishuna phazā khavai rida pāng makhamazik chi Phariseepā china theilaga matakhakhai.
Mangkhama̱bing! ayar kasaa china alungla kasā maningmalā?
Kha alungli khalei chi kachāmabingli milu, chithākha nathumwui vang ot saikora thara.

Kha Phariseebing, nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu, kaja nathumna suirihan, sāchikom kala hanthothāpwui tithe milaga mashunkasā eina Varewui leikashiliva mahengsangmana; kha khangatateibingla mayansānghaila hibing hi nathum sāphalungki kajina.
“Phariseebing! nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu! kaja nathumna synagogueli khayākakāpam kala leihngapha̱li khayākashiwui shālam ningchanga.
Nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu! Kaja nathum hiya mibingna matheimada naiung-naivā kaje makatheia chikhur kathāna.”
Ain kathemabingwui ngachaili akhana ali ngahānkai, “Ojā, hi kahāng hiya nana ithumli khayak khangasakna.”

Kha Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ain kathemabing, nathumla kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu! kaja nathumna mibingli maphungkhararra ot chiphuna, kha nathum khalattana kharita ot chili pāngmarengnao einala masāza̱mana.
Nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu! kaja nathumna marānbingwui chikhur sakāmi, kha athumli navā ngarāna shaokathatna.
Chieina nathum hiya navā ngarāwui otsak chili khamayābing kala shākhi khamibingna. Kaja athumna shaothata kala nathumna chikhur sāmi.
Chiya, okathui haokaphokwui eina thuilaga marān saikorawui ashee tākahai chiwui vang mithot hili kashong rāngra.

Abelwui eina thuilaga Zechariah tāshungda hanphutpam eina tharkhamathengpamwui ngachaili shaothat kahaiwui vang mithot hili kashong rāngra. Mha, ina nathumli kahāngna, athumwui vang mithot hili tandi mira.
“Ain kathembing, nathum kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu! kaja nathumna theishingkakhui aworwui sho khuithuihaida, nathum khalattala kazangla mazang kala zangkida khaleibinglila haphaowa.”
kala ana khayon tui khamatui rimkhuilaga tukkhui khavai khalenla sanga.
Maphongshoki kaji faror kahai khikha maleimana lah matheiki kaji ngathum kahaila maleimana.
Nathumna ngayā tangkhamangli khangazek chi ngashun kahor atamli shāsera kala ngathumda shimlung kāli saisaida hāngkasang chila shimtungwui eina vaomalānra.”
Kha khipāli ngacheerakhala kaji ina chitheira; chiya, shaothathailaga meifali horsangkashapwui pangshap khalei a chili ngacheelu, mha, ina nathumli kahāngna, ali ngacheelu.
“Konghi phangāli pheisā khani eina mayormalā? Chithālala Varewui miktāli athum akhalila yangkhei kahai mavaimana.
Nathumwui kuisam eina tangda shānkahaina, mangacheealu; konghi kachungkhali nathum aman sakmeikhara.
“Ina nathumli kahāngna, kachikathāna ili mibingwui mangāli phongshar eina hāngphatakha, miwui Naomayaranala ali Varewui kazingraobingwui mangāli phongshar eina hāngphatra,
kha mibingwui mangāli ili kākhalan mi chili Varewui kazingraobingwui mangāli inala khalanra.
“Miwui Naomayarawuitungli makhamayā tui khamatui saikora pheomira, kha Manglā Katharali kachipata chili mapheomimara.
“Athumna nathumli synagogueli, khamungabing kala khangam khareibingwui mangāli shimen khavā tharan nathumna kathada khi ngahānkārakhala lah khi hāngrakhala da malungmaringalu;
kaja Manglā Katharana nathumli atam chichangli nathumna hāngkhangayi chi tamchitheimira.”
Yarui ngachaiwui eina mi akhana ali hānga, “Ojā, ishāvāna haimi kahai shimlui chi ilila ngayarmi khavai ishameili kahāngmilu.”
Kha Jishuna ali hānga, “Mayara, nani khaniwuitungli bicharwo kala ngayarme sākhavai ili khipāna kapangsanghaikhala?”
Chieina ana athumli hānglui. “Ningkhariklu kala khangamarli ningngasharlu; kaja mikumo akhawui mirin hi awui lan tarākha khalei chili khalei maningmana.”
Ana chānjam akha hānga, “Kashānga akhawui luili heiun tarākha unga;
kala akhalatta chukmaja̱ya, ‘Iwui heiun hi kazip khavai apam maleithura, kathāusikhala?’
Chieina akhalatta phaninga, ‘Ina hithada sāra; ina iwui chum pheihailaga hakkhamei akha sākhuira; kala chili iwui mā kala thongthāngbing kazipra.
Chiwui thili ina imanglāli hāngra, Manglā, nana zingkum shirakha shichin khavai khamathā ot kachungkha chi kazipsanghaira, leiyālak eina okthuilu, zālu, manglu kala ringphākhuilu.’
Kha Varena ali hānga, ‘Mangkhama̱a! Arui ngayā nawui manglā khuithuihaora’ chithākha ana kazip kahai lan saikora chi khipāwui ngasārakhala?”
Chi tākam eina akhalattawui vang lan tarākha kazipsanghailaga Varewui miktāli makashāng mi chi chithai” da Jishuna hānga.
Kaja mirinna kashakazāli mataimei kala phasāna kashankachonli mataimei.

Vānaobingli machukyanglu, athum khayaola mayaomana, kahātla mahātkhuimana, athumna kazip khavai shimla, chumla maleimana, chithālala Varena athumli mizai. Nathumna vānaobingli kayākha sakmataimeikhala?
Kala nathumwui ngachaili khipāna malungringhaowada awui mirin okthot khuiningkha mataisangkhuishapkhala?
Nathumna chikathā kateowa ot chi masārarlaga khiwui vang eina khangatei otbingwui vang malungringkhala?

Timrāwonbingna kathada rarsangkhala da machukyanglu; athum otla masāmana, sakla masāmana, vatla mashireimana, chithālala ina nathumli kahāngna, Solomonna hekmaheilak eina okthuilala awon akhawui khamathayakkha mangavaimana.
Kha aja luili wonlaga akhama meili horsanghaoki kaje awonrongbingli Varena chiyākha mathada samiakha nali ana kayākha mataimeida samirakhala? Oh, shitkasang khangazanbing!
Chieina nathumna khi zāra, khi mangrakhala da maphaalu lah malung maringalu.
Kaja okathuiwui yur saikorana hikathā otbing hi phai; kha nathumna otbing hi leingayiphalunga da nathumwui Avāna theisera.
Kha awui wungram pharifalu, chithākha ot saikora nathumli ngarumsangmira.

Nathumwui khalalei lan yorhaolu kala kathai-kachāmbingli milu; nathum khalatta kakān makhavai pheisākhao sākhuilu kala nathumwui lan chi kakānla mavailuiki kaji kazingramli phārihailu. Chili khalenala maleethuirarmara kala magungnala mazāmara,
kaja nathumwui lan khaleipamli nathumwui ningla leira.
Akhavāna ngalā shakazāwui eina shimli hankhaung ngaraikapam raobing thada sālu, chithākha ana ungda khamongli kakakung chitharan athumna heng sāda shomira.
Akhavāna latkhaung tharan ningkharikta honpamkasā raobing ka̱lā mahai; kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, ana shāneira̱ neikhuilaga athumli tableli pamngasakra, kala rāda sheba samira.
Ana rākakhanelila, rākakathumalila ningkharikta rimpamkasā raobing ka̱lā mahai.
Kha hi theikazaklu kaja shimva̱ china khale china katharān rāra̱khala da theisāsi kaja ana mipā chili rimpamda khale chili awui shim makaizang ngasakmara.
Chieina nathumla ngarānpinghailu; kaja nathumna maphaningkasā pung chili miwui Naomayara rāra.”
Peterna hānga, “Proho, chānjam hi ithumli kahāngkā mi saikorawui vangkhala?”
Shimva̱ china shimli hankhaung tharan ngarakzak eina sākasā rao chi ka̱lā mahai.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, shimva̱ china rao chili awui khalalei lan saikorawui kashina sāngasakra.
Kha rao china khalatta ‘Iwui akhavā maungfamara’ da phaninglaga rao mayarnaolila, rao sha̱naolila, kashaola shaoda amāng phāshak phazāpamda marippamakha
rao china maphaningkasa zimiksho kala makathei pungli akhavā china hanungda ali tandi mida mashitkasangbingna kapam apamli haihaora.
“Akhavāwui ningkachāng chi thatheilaga chi sākhavai makhangarāna kala akhavāwui ningkachāng athishurda makasā rao chi lijei shaira.

Kha akhavāwui ningkachāng makatheiwui vang khalāng ot sākahai a china tandi samphanglala teomeira, kachungkha mikahai mi kachiva̱wui eina kachungkha khuishokpapamra kala chungmeida chisin kahaipawui eina chungmeida pora.
Kha ina ra̱hikphalungki kaji akha lei kala chi makupkhuiranglakha ining chotlakli!
Ina kharā hi okathuili chingri kahai mikhavai kharāna, da nathumna phaninglā? Maningmana, chingri kahai mikhavai kharā maningmana, kha ngakaikhai khavai kharāna,
kaja hiwui eina thuida shimkhur akhali mi phangā khalei chi kaira, kathumna khanili kala khanina kathumli mamayāngarokmara.
Shimkhur chi kaingarokta avāva̱na anaomayarali, anaomayarana avāva̱li, ava̱va̱na anaongalāva̱li, anaongalāva̱na ava̱va̱li, aniva̱na arihāva̱li, arihāva̱na aniva̱li mamayā ngarokmara.”
kala azingshong masi kaphan tharan nathumna ‘kazing kāngmaranglakra’ da hānga, kala chithada shokpapama.
Phākakhaningbing! nathumna okathuili kala khamasaili kashok chi yanglaga zingyatwui pongli hāngshapa; kha khiwui vang eina aruihon atamwui kakhalat mahāngmirarthukhala?

Nathumli kaphenapāli ngasoda kārotli vākida zatlakha ali chamnā khavai shongfali hotnālu. Chi maningakha ana nali bicharwoli shimenvāra kala bicharwona nali kārotwui kashina akhavā akhawui pāngli horsangmida ana nali phātopli sangra.
Ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna shongrān chi marunngakanranglakha eina tangda nathumli mashok ngasakmara.”
Chitharan Galileewui mi kaikhawui ashee Pilatena pha̱kaphayāli manatmi kahaiwui pongli mi kaikhana Jishuli rāhānga.
Chieina athumli hānga, “Shaothat kahai Galileenaobing hina khangatei Galileenaobingli morei phungmei kahaiwui vang chithada kachotkachang samkaphangna da nathum phaninglā?
Maningphutmana! Ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumla ning mangateiakha chithada shimānra.
Lha Siloamli dolanshim tektāda tākthat kahai mi tharāda chishat chi aja Jerusalemli panda khalei mibingli yonmeikhara da nathum phaninglā?
Maningphutmana! Ina kahāngna kaja nathumla ning mangateiakha chithada shimānra.”

Chieina ana yāmgui khamayonapā chili hānga, ‘Yanglu, kum kathum ina khaorārong hiwui athei phākhui khavai rāchinga, kha akhala maphākhuilakranga. Hi ta̱tekhaolu! Khi kannāda hina ngalei hiyākha sāshimān ngasakrakhala?’
Kha yāmgui khamayonana ngahānkai, ‘Amei ajakumāng haisāsa, ina arong hili kuimareida chuilaga hār sangmira.
Chiwui thili zingkuma athei matheiakha phālakhaira, kha kalikha mamatheisaakha ta̱tekhainaolu.’”
Jishuna sabbaththang synagogue akhali tamchitheida leisai.
Apam chili zingkum tharāda chishat kameoraih kazā kahai sha̱nao akha leisai; Ava khum tekhaida ngatartei eina manganingrarmana.
Jishuna ali kathei tharan ali hokhuida hānga, “He sha̱nao, nali nawui kazātwui eina chihomihaira.”
Ana awuitungli pāng parza̱ya, chieina ngalāngda ngatartei nganingkāda Vareli masot chikata.

Kha Synagoguewui akhavā china sabbaththang Jishuna raikhamiwui vang malungvāthaoda mibingli hānga, “Ot sākhavai zimiksho tharukthang lei, chiwui alungli rālu kala rāraikhuilu kha sabbaththang marālu.”
Chieina Prohona ngahānkai, “Phākakhaningbing! Nathumna sabbaththang nathumwui sei lah gadhā seishimwui eina chihomilaga tara̱ shimān khavai mahomvāmala?
Chithākha Abrahamwui naongalāva̱ kashokva̱li Satanna kum tharāda chishat narkahaiwui eina sabbaththang machihomingayimala?”
Ana hi kahāng eina awui yangkashebing saikora khayaklakhaowa; kala mi saikorana ana matakhak kahai ot sākahai chiwui vang mathāna.
Hiya mi akhana kayānghanthā apā akha khuida awui yāmguili yaohailaga chi haksangda arong khangasā eina yongkazata vānaobingna aphāngbingli athip rākasā kathāna.”
Hiya sha̱nao akhana khawok ari khuilaga phazāt kathumwui angarakli manāthailaga katonga chi makapchungranglakha eina tangda haikahai kathāna.”
Chitharan kachikathā mi akhana ali rāngahāna, “Ojā mi kateokhamāng kahui samphangrala?” Jishuna ngahānkai,
“Nathumna khamasha̱ khamong eina zangkhavai hotnālu, khiwui vangkhala kaja mi kachungkhana chili zangkhavai hotnāra kha mazangrarmara.

Shimva̱na ngakarthuilaga akhashida khamong ta̱kkahai tharan nathumna kayāngli nganingda khamong kakunglaga, ‘Amei, ithumli shomilu’ da hāngra. Chieina ana nathumli ‘Nathum kachiwui eina kharākhala, I matheimana’ da ngahānkāra.
Chitharan nathumna ngahānkāra, ‘Ithum nali ngasoda phāshak phazāruma; ithumwui keinunglila nana rātamchithei.’
Kha ana, ‘Ina kahāngna, nathum kachiwui eina kharākhala da I matheimana; iwui eina thulu, He makaphā makhayā ot kasābing’ da hāngra.
Nathumna Vare wungramli Abraham, Isaac, Jacob kala marān saikora kathei tharan, kha nathumliva horshok kahai tharan nathumna kachapla chapta ahāla tarira.
Kala mibingna zingsho, zingtun, ato, azewui eina rāda Vare wungramwui nitreili rāzangra.
Chieina yanglu, riki kaje kaikhana naora, naoki kaje kaikhana rira.”
Atam chichangli Pharisee kaikhana ali rāhānga, “Na apam hiwui eina zatthuimihaolu kaja Herodna nali shaothatngailak eina leili.”
Chieina Jishuna ngahānkai, “Vālu kala ramfa chili ahānglu; ‘Yanglu, ina ajala, akhamala, chipeeli kashamshokra kala kakazāla raimira kala kakathumthang ina sāki kaji ot sākupra.
Chithālala ina vāphalungki kaji chili ajala, akhamala kala khanaothangla vāphalungra kaja marān akhala Jerusalemli maningla apam khangateili mashimānpaimana.

“Iyavo, Jerusalem! Jerusalem! Marānbingli shaokathata keinung, kala nali chihokharābingli lunggui eina horkathata! Ina nawui naongarabingli harva̱na anaobingli angachangzingli kazipkakhui thada kayākhashira, laga chi nana mamayāmana!
Yanglu, nathumwui shim choda haimihaira kala ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna ‘Prohowui mingli kharā mi chi sokhami ngasāranu’ da mahāngranglakha eina tangda nathumna ili matheiluimara.”
Yanglu, suichung kakazā mayarnao akha awui mangāli leisai.
Chieina Jishuna ain kathembing eina Phariseebingli ngahāna, “Sabbaththang kakazā raikhami hi ainwui athishurda sāpaikā, masāpaimakhala?”
Kha athumna khikha mangahānkāmana. Chieina Jishuna ali singkhuida raimihaowa kala shiunhaowa.
Ana athumli hānga, “Nathumwui ngachaili kachikathāna naomayara lah mukvā leilaga khorjopli tāzanghaiakha sabbaththang ngalāngda makhuishokmarala?”
Kha hiwui pongli athumna mangahānkārarthuwa.
Khaleilaga phakazāli kharā mi kaikhana mathāmeikap kaji pam kakapang Jishuna thei. Chiwui vang chānjam hi athum saikorali hānga,
“Nali kachikathā mi akhana shakazāwui phanitli kaho tharan khangam khareipamli mapamalu, kaja nali ngamkhamei mili ana hohaisāpai;
kala nani khaninili kahopā china nali, ‘Mipa hili pam chikāmihaolu’ da rākahāng eina nala zakshikhamei apamli apamkida khayakhaora.

Kha nali kaho tharan zakkashi apamli apamlu, chithākha kaho akhavā china kharā tharan nali ‘Itao, mathākhamei pamvāk apamsa’ da rāhāngpai. Chitharan nali ngasoda phazākharumbingwui mangāli nali maiyā ngasaka.
Kaja khalatta hakkakhuiya mi chili teongasakra kala khalatta teoda kaphaninga mi chili khayā kāngasakra.”
Kha nana phākachizāt tharan kathai kachāmbing, khangazanbing, pheikatekbing, khangapeobingli holu.
Chithākha nali somira; khiwui vangkhala kaja athumna nali marunrarmara. Kha mashunkasā mibingna ringshokthanghon nali Varena runmira.”
Kha Jishuna ali hānga, “Atam akhali mi akhana zātkhān kahaka akha sāda mi kachungkhali hoi.
Phazāranhaira kaji eina ana hokahaibing chili ‘Rālu, saikora ngarānkupserhaira’ da aho khavai awui raoli chihovai.
Kha athum akhala, akhala marā khavai apong phāhaowa. Kharepana ali hānga, ‘I lui akha lohaida lei, chieina chi mavākhayang masāpaimarali, kashi masāmilu’ da poi.
Khangatei akhana hānga, ‘Ina mukvā churā phangā lohaida lei, chi arāk khavai kazatna, chieina kashi masāmilu!’
Khangatei akhanala hānga, ‘I ngalā shakzākhuichamda lei, chiwui vang eina I marārarmarali.’

“Chieina rao china latungda ali kahāng saikora chi awui akhavāli unghāngsera. Pao kashā eina shimva̱ malungvātlakhaowa. Chieina araoli hānga, ‘Thakta keinungwui shongrei-shongrāli vāda kachāmbing, khangazanbing, khangapeobing kala katekabingli ahokhuilu.’
Rao china hānga, ‘Amei, nana kaso kahai chi sāserhaira, kha aruila mi kachungkha zangpaifarali.’
Chieina akhavā china raopā chili hānglui, ‘Shongkhar kala khoreipam kachiva̱li vālu kala chili leikasāsā mibingli tandi eina rāngasaklu, chithākha iwui shim hi chipempaira.
Ina kahāngna kaja hokahaibingwui ngachaili mi khipānakha iwui zātkhān hili khamazap masamphangluimara.’”
Atam akhali Jishuli mi kachungkha shurkazat tharan ana ngareiungda athumli hānga,
“Ili kharā mi kachiva̱na ava̱ avā, preiva̱, naongarā, achināngarā, azarva̱ ngara kala khalattawui mirinli mahorhairarakha, a iwui sākhangatha̱ masāpaimana.
Kachikathāna akhalattawui krush maphungla ithi shurraakha a iwui sākhangatha̱ masāpaimana.
“Nathumwui ngachaili kachikathā akhana shim khamathā akha sākhuira da phaningakha rimeikapta aman kayākha sha̱kha zangra kala shim chi sākhuishap lupā kayākha leili da mangachākmarala?
Chi maningakha shim chi shimphungmāng sāhunhailaga makupkhuikharar tharan mibingna chi theida ali mana̱shida hāngra,
‘Mipa hiya shim sāphokkhaninghailaga makupkhuitheithura.’
Lha awunga khipana raimi thingtharā thānlaga raimi thingmaga̱ kathāna awungali kathada ngasungsikhala da pamzangda mamachukmarakhala?
Mararmara jiakha akhapā chi katāva̱li leilakha ana paophunga chihovāda mashit khavai ahāng ngasakra.
Chithada sāda kachikathāna awui khalalei saikora mahorhairarakha iwui sākhangatha̱ masāpaimana.
Chikathā machi chi ngaleiwui vangla hār sādala shikachin makannāthuda thada horhaowa. Khanā kakaa mi china shākhuiranu!”
Phariseebing eina ain kathembingna kapupkaseoda hānga, “Mipā hina morei kaphungbingli samphanglaga phakazāla phazārumli.”
Chiwui vang ana athumli chānjam hi hāngchithei:
Ana chi samkaphang tharan mathanthathup awui yartuili khāngkākhui.
Ana shimli khaung eina awui ngasotnaobing kala khongnainaobingli hokhuilaga hānga, ‘Ithum ringphārumsa kaja iwui shimān kahai yaonao chi samphanghaira.’

Chithada sāda ina nathumli kahāngna, ning ngatei khavai makhalei khamashung khangaronga mi hangchikoda chikoli ngasokapamliva morei kaphunga mi akhana ning khangatei china kazingramli mathānmeikharra.
“Lha sha̱nao khipana lupāsā tharā leilaga akha shimānhaiakha ana thaomei sharkāda shim pha̱da masamphangranglakha eina tangda ningkachāng eina maphamarakhala?
Ana chi samkaphang eina khongnainaobingli hokhuilaga hānga, ‘Ithum ringphārumsa kaja shimān kahai lupā chi samphanghaira.’
Chithada sāda ina nathumli kahāngna, morei kaphunga akhana ning khangatei chitharan Varewui kazingraobingna ringphā mathāna.”
Agato china avāva̱li hānga, ‘Ava, iwui shimluiyar milu.’ Chieina avāva̱na awui khalalei lan saikora ani chinaonili ngayarmi.

Zimiksho khani kathumthangwui thili ana awui shimluiyar yorkhuiserhailaga pheisā chi khuiphungda ngalei katāva̱ akhali thuihaowa. Apam chili sopmasaplak eina okthuilaga awui lan saikora sākasakserhaowa.
Ana awui khalalei saikora sākasakser kahaiwui thili apam chili chāmrei rāda zākhavaila maleithuwa.
Chieina ngalei chiwui ruichumnao akhawuili ot asai kala ali awui hok homkhavai luili chihovai.
Ana thainā kahai eina hokzāt chila zāngai, chithālala khipānakha ali mamizāmana.
Ning mathingkhaung eina ana hānga, ‘Iwui Avāna masākakhui rao saikora athumwui zāshapli lāngmeida samphanga, kha ina apam hili kathaina thiki jiura!
Ina ngakarthuida ishāvāwuili latungura kala ina ali, Avā, ina Varewui mangalila, nawui mangalila khayon ot sāhaira.
I nawui nao akhana da mahophayoluimana; nawui masākakhui rao akha thada kakhuimilu’ da hāngra.
Chieina ana ngakarthuida avāva̱li unga.
“Kha ana katāva̱li zatta khalei chi avāva̱na kathei tharan awui wuklungli lukhamashana pemtinghaoda ngasamvālaga angavamkhuida ali maya̱ya.
Chieina anaomayarana ali ‘Avā, ina Varewui mangālila, nawui mangālila khayon ot sāhaira, I nawui nao akhanada mahophayoluimana’ da hānga.
Kha avāva̱na awui raobingli kasoi, ‘Thakta mathāmeikap kaje kachon khuirāda ali rāngavaimilu. Apāngli khutop rāsangmilu kala pheihop ngahopmilu;
kala asakakā seinao akha ashimenkhuilaga taithatlu, ithum phāshak phazāda ringphārumsa;
kaja inaomayara hi thihairasai, kha ringluihaira; shimānhairasai, kha ara samphangluihaira.’ Chi eina athumna shaohāhā mana̱da ringkaphā eina phāshak phazāruma.
“Chithada leilakha naomayara khararra chi luili leisai. Ana ungmamānda shim ungkhanganai eina laa kasā kala pheichak kasākhon shai.
Chieina ana rao akhali hokhuida, ‘Khi kasākhala’ da ngahāna.
Rao china hānga, ‘Nagato unghaira kala ka̱lākashi maleila samphangluishit kajiwui vang navāna asākakā seinao taithatmi.’
Chi kashā eina ama chi malungvātnāhaida shimlungli makāngaiga jihaowa. Chieina avāva̱na shoksuiya.

Kha ana avāva̱li hānga, ‘Yanglu, ina nali kum hirankha otram ngatha̱mihaira kala nawui kahāng makailakranga; chithālala nana ili iwui ngasotnaobingli ngasoda ringphārum khavai menao akhala mataithatmilakranga.
Kha nawui naomayarapā hina sopkhamasap sha̱naobingli ngasoda nawui lan sāmakanmihailaga hankhaung tharan nana awui vang asākakā seinao taithatmilamā!’
Chieina avāva̱na ali hānga, ‘Inao, nava ili ngasopamching kajina kala iwui khalalei saikora hi nawuisera.
Kha hiya mathānda ringphārum ngayilak kahaina, kaja nagato hi thihairasai, ringluihaira; shimānhairasai, kha samphangluishithaira.’”
Anala awui sākhangatha̱bingli hānga, “Atam akhali kashānga mi akhawui lan kasinga mi akha leisai. Ana akhavāwui lan leimamāngli sāshimānmihaoda awuitungli kaphen leihaowa.
Chieina ana lansina chili hokhuida ngahāna, ‘Nawuitungli kaphen hi khikhala? Nawui lansin saikorawui hishap khuirālu, kaja na aja eina thuilaga lansina masāluipaimara.’
Chieina lansina china akhalatta hānga, ‘Kathāusido? Iwui akhavāna ili lansinpam eina khuishokhaora jihaira! Pangshap maleithuda tin singda otla masārarmarali, kala pokazāla khayakrali.
Ili lansinpam hiwui eina khuishok kahai tharan mibingna ili athumwuili shimzun sākhavai kathada sāsikhala kaji theihaira.’
Chieina akhavāwui leiman kazangbing ava̱va̱li hokhuida khare chili ngahāna, ‘Nana iwui akhavāli kayākha shukhaili?’
Ana ngahānkai ‘Thao tin shākha shukhaida lei.’ Chieina ana ali hānga, ‘Lairik kapi kahai chi khuilu kala thākta pamzanglaga hangphangāna da kapilu.’
Chiwui thili khangatei akhali ngahāna, ‘Nana kayākha shukhaida lei?’ Ana ‘Kehu tin shākha shukhaili’ da ngahānkai. Chieina ali hānga, ‘Lairik kapi kahai chi khuilu kala hangchishatna da kapilu.’
“Akhavā china ningmakathar lansinawui arah kathem chiwui vang soi kaja okathui hiwui mibingna athumwui thotliva kahorwui naobingli thangmeimeikhara.”
Kala ina nathumli kahāngna, “Nathum khalatta makathar okathuiwui lan eina ngasotnao phākhui, chithākha lan chi shimān kahai tharan athumna nathumli makashimānpamli zangngasakra.
Kateowa otli ningkhamazing mi china kahaka otlila ningmazinga, kala kateowa otli ningmakathar mi chi kahaka otlila ning matharmana.
Chieina nathumna okathuiwui lanli ningtharda masārarakha nathumli khipāna khamashunga lan chi horsangmingairakhala?
Kala nathumna kateiwui otli ningmazingda masingmirarakha nathum khalattawui lan chi khipāna nathumli mirakhala?

“Rao akhana akhavā khanili otram mangatha̱paimana; kaja ana akhali yangkharinglaga akhapali leishira, maningakha akhali mashitlaga akhapāli ningkachaira. Nathumna Vare eina okathuiwui lanli otram mangatha̱rumpaimana.”
Lupāli khangamara Phariseebingna tui hi shālaga Jishuli mana̱shiya.

Kha ana athumli hānga, “Mibingwui miktāli nathum khalatta mashungkhui khavai sāzata, kha Varena nathumwui wuklung theisera, kaja mibingwui miktāli khamathāna da kakhui hiya Varewui miktāli ningkakachaiya otna.
Kha Ainwui tui sampārikkha sākakhailiva kazing eina okathui shimān kahaina paimei.
“Atam akhali kashānga mengchin kahai kashankachon khangavai kala thangkachida hekmaheilak eina phāshak phazākapam mi akha leisai.
Awui ngaveili Lazarus kaho chāmlak kahai kala ngapharhok kahai mi akha leisai.
Ana kashāngpawui zāneng tātung kahai chi ngamuizāngaiya; chili lāngda fanala awui khangaphār chi rāmaleklek ji.
“Khaleilaga kachāma chi thihaowa kala kazingraobingna ali Abrahamwui makāli khuikai. Kashānga chila thihaida chifahaowa;
kala kazeiramli chotlakhaoda ana yangkai kala Lazarusna Abrahamwui makāli kapam chi tālāk eina ngashānthei.
Chieina ana hānga, ‘Avā Abraham, ili khalumashanmilu kala Lazarusli awui pāngmarengnao chi tara̱ simkhuilaga imale hili kharāmakuimi ngasak khavai chihotāmilu kaja I meilung hili chotnāhaira.’

“Kha Abrahamna hānga, ‘Inaomayara, phaningunglu, kaja na ringda leilakha khamathāthāmāng samphanga kala Lazarusva zakkashimāng samphanga; kha ara nana kachot samkaphang tharan ana hili ringkaphā samphangda lei.
Chili langmeikharda nathum eina ithumwui marakli chāngam akha lei, hiwui eina nathumli vākhangaibingna mavāpaimana kala nathumwui eina hili kāka kajebingnala makāpaimana.’
Chieina ana hānga, ‘Avā, chithākha ali ishāvāwui shimli kashiunmilu;
kaja ichināngara phangā lei, athumnala kachotkachāngpam hili marā khavai unghāngmachinmi ngasaklu.’
“Kha Abrahamna hānga, ‘Athumli hāngmachinmi khavai Moses eina marānbing leida lei: athumna athumwui tui nganāranu.’
Chieina ana ngahānkai. ‘Maningmana avā Abraham, kachikathā akhana kathiwui eina unglaga athumli unghāngakha ning ngateira.’
Abrahamna ali hānga, ‘Athumna Moses eina marānbingwui tui manganaakha kachikathā kathiwui eina ringshokta unghānglala makhuisangmara.’”
Khangazanbingli morei sāngasaki kachiliva akahungli lungriham hokthāngmihailaga ngayilungli horsang kahaina awui vang phāmei.
Nathumwui ot kasāli ningngasharlu! “Nachināna yonhaiakha ali hāngmachinlu kala ana ning ngateiakha pheomilu:
kala ana nawuitungli khayon ot thangkhali shini shida sāhaiakha, kala shini shida ‘I yonhaira’ da ning ngateiakha nana ali pheomiphalungra.”

Chieina Prohona hānga, “Nathumwui shitkasang kayānghanthārikha leisi kaja hikathā khaorārong hili ‘Angayung eina phurkhuilaga ngayilungli aphorlu’ da nathumna hāngshapra kala chinala nathumwui kahāng nganāra.
“Nathumwui ngachaili khipāna rao akha ngavālaga ana luili vālaga lah yao ahomlaga shimli hankhaung eina ‘thākta ungphāzaulu’ da hangra?
Chiwui mahutle nana ‘Iwui zākhavai ngarānlu kala sāri shaksākharikkhuida ina maphāshak maphazākhuiranglakha eina tangda otram ngatha̱lu kala chiwui thili nana phāshak phazāpaira’ da mahangmarala?
Rao china awui kakaso sāhaowa da ali ningkashi mimaraola?
Chi tākam eina nathumli kaso kahai saikora sākup kahai tharan ‘Ithum khikha masā khavai raobingna; ithumna ithumwui angalang chimāng sākahaina’” da hānglu.
Ana kha̱lung akhali zanguki kaji eina phārrei kakazā mayarnao tharā ngarokta athumna lachāhamsam nganingda,
panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Amei Jishu, ithumli khalumashanmilu.”
Athumna zatmamānlakha athumli tharmihaowa.
Athumwui ngachaili akhana ali tharmihaira kaji kathei eina panglāk eina vaoda Vareli masot chikatlaga latunga.
Kala Jishuwui pheizingli ngakhumshāmzangda ningkashi tarākha miya. Mipā hi Samarianaona.
Chieina Jishuna ngahāna, “Mi tharāli tharkhami maningmalā? Athum chiko chi kali vāhao?
Miyur khangateipa hi maningla khangatei akhala Vareli masot chikat khavai malatungthulā?”
Chieina ali hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, kala nashi shimli ungulu, nawui shitkasang china nali tharchao ngasakhaira.”
Khipānakha ‘Yanglu, hili leili, chili leili’ da mahāngmara; kaja yanglu, Vare wungram chi nathumwui alungli lei.”
Chitharan nathumli, ‘Hivāk, chivāk’ da hāngra kha mayāmhaialu, chikathāli kashurla mashuralu.
Kaja rikhān khangashei tharan achikun akhawui eina achikun akhali horkhavā thada miwui Naomayarana awui zimiksholi chithada rāra.
Kha rimeikapta ana kachot kachāng kachungkha phungphalungra kala thot hina ali makhuisangmara.
Noahwui atamli kashok thada miwui Naomayarawui atamlila shokra.
Noahna marikhong kātongkhuida tara̱ phongshilongda ot saikora mashimānranglakha eina tangda athumna phāshak phazāpama, ngalā khuipama, fathuipama.
Lotwui atamlila chi tākam eina sāsai—athumna phāshak phāzai, khalola loi, khayorla yora, luila vai, shimla sai,
Kha Lotna Sodomwui eina shokthanghon kazingramwui eina meiwon eina raichiri rotāda athum saikorali shimān ngasaka.
miwui Naomayarali phongmithanghon chi tākam eina shokra.
“Chithanghon shimtungli leikasā china shimlungli haikahai awui thongthāng chi mazangkhuiaranu, chi tākam eina luili leikasā chinala mahanungaranu.
Lotwui preiva̱li phaningunglu!
Kharing samphang khavai kaphā mi chi shimānra, kha chi kashimāna chili ringngasakra.
Ina nathumli kahāngna, chithanghon ngayā pet akhali mi khani pisāra, akhali khuithuihaora, akhapāli nothāhaora;
sha̱nao khani mā rungsāra, akhali khuithuihaora, akhapāva̱li nothāhaora;
luili mayarnao khani ot sārumsāra, akhali khuithuihaora, akhapāli nothāhaora.
Chieina sākhangatha̱bingna ali ngahāna, “Proho, kalikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Kathingun khaleipamli khalāng sāshaiala rākazipra.”
Ana hānga, “Kachikathā keinung akhali Vareli makhangacheea kala milila mautkashita bicharwo akha leisai.
Keinung chili ‘Mashun bichar sāmida khamashunga tuitak tāmilu’ da ali rāhāngching kaje rameinao akhala leisai.
Atam kasāngkhawui vang ana mamayāmana, kha naolak eina akhalatta chukmaja̱laga hānga, ‘Ina Vareli mangacheesālala kala mikumoli mautshitsālala
rameiva̱ hina sheikhautlakli, chiwui vang eina mashun bichar chi ina sāmihaora. Chi maningakha thangkachida ana rākahāng hina ning koktarāklakhaora.’”
Chieina Prohona hānglui, “Makhangaronga bichawona khi hāngkhala kaji nganālu.
Chithākha ngashun ngayā mateila ngachonmi khavai chapta kapo awui kapangkhui kahai miyurli Varena mashun bichar masāmimaralā; ana ngarainganaoralā?
Ina nathumli kahāngna, ana thaklāk eina mashun bichar sāmira. Chithāmāngmada miwui Naomayarana rāthanghon shitkasanga mi okathui hili leisaralā?”
Khalatta khamashungana da kaphaninga kala mi saikorali machāpkhame athumlila Jishuna chānjam hi hāngchithei:
“Atam akhali mi khani khorumshimli seihā sākhavai vai, akhana Phariseena kala akhapāna khāshinā khalokana.

“Phariseepā china kha-lāchāda anganinglaga hithada seihā sai, ‘O Varivara, ina nali ningshilaka kaja iva mi khangatei thada ngaponkazā, ning makathar, phokaphā lah khāshinā khalokapā kathā maningmana.
Ina haptākhali khanishida khuma, kala samkaphang saikorawui tithebing michinga.’
“Kha khāshinā khaloka china achithek akhali nganinglaga kazingramshongla mayangkalengla amathikli kapheda, ‘He Varivara, morei kaphunga ili khalumashanmilu’ da poi.”

Ina nathumli kahāngna, “Phariseepā maningla khāshinā khalokapāna pheokhami samphangda shimli hanunghaowa; kaja khalatta hakkakhui mi kachiva̱li teongasakra kala khalatta kateowana da kaphaninga mi chili hakngasakra.”
Kha Jishuna athumli hokhuida hānga, “Naoshinaobingli iwui ngalemli rāngasaklu, athumli mahaphaialu; kaja Vare wungram chi athum kathāwuina.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, naoshinao thada Vare wungram hi makhuikasanga mi china kachilikha chili mazangrarlakmara.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ili khisāda kaphā hokhala? Vare maningla kaphā khipākha maleimana.
Ningkhami chi nana thei: ‘maphophāpaimana, mashaothatpaimana, maleepaimana, minama shākhi mamipaimana, nava̱ navāli khayāshilu.’”
Chieina ana ngahānkai, “Ina saikora hi nganuilakhawui eina thuida mayonrā kahaina.”
Jishuna chi kashā eina ali hānga, “Nawui khavāt akha leifaya. Nawui khalalei saikora yorhailaga kachāmnaoli yaohaolu, chithākha kazingramli nawui lan leira, laga rālu, ithi shurlu.”
Ana hi kashā tharan wukhananglakhaowa, kaja a kashānga mi akhana.
Jishuna ali yangkālaga hānga, “Lan kachungkha khaleinaobingwui vang Vare wungramli zangkida kayākha sakrakhala?
Kaja, kashānga mina Vare wungramli zangki kachiliva utna kapimkhurli ngara̱kashokna paimei.”
Hi kashā mibingna ngahānna, “Chithākha khipā kahui samphangrakhala?”
Kha ana ngahānkai, “Mibingwui vang masākapai chi Varewui vanga sāpaisera.”
Chieina Peterna hānga, “Yanglu, ithumwui shim horhailaga ithum nathi shurhaira.”
Jishuna hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, Vare wungramwui vang shimlui nilala, preiva̱ nilala, achinā ngarā nilala, ava̱ avā nilala, naongarā nilala horhaida zatthui kahai mi china
aruihonwui thotli mataimeikharda rārāda khalei thotli makashimān kharing masamphangki kaji khipākha maleimana.”
Kaja ali miyur khangateibingwui pāngli horsangmihaida athumna ali mana̱kashila mana̱shira, kakhayakla khayak ngasakra kala machora̱la mashorrorra.
Athumna khangaphitla ngaphitta shaothatra, kha kakathumathang ana ringshokra.”
Hāngda khalei tui chi sākhangatha̱bingna akhala bhap matāmana; tui chiwui kakhalat chi athumwui eina ngathummihaoda Jishuna khi kahāngkhala da matheikhuirarthuwa.
Ana mi kachungkha rakakānwui akhon kashā tharan, “Khi kasākhala?” da ngahānna.
Athumna ali ngahānkai, “Nazarethwui Jishu rārāda lei.”
Chieina ana, “Davidwui naomayara Jishu, ili khalumashanmilu.” da vaowa.
Awui ngalemli khanganinga mi kaikhana kasainakha pamlu da kahara, kha ana juimei pangmeida “Davidwui Naomayara, ili khalumashanmilu” da vaolui.
Chieina Jishuna ngasāmda khangapeowa chi awuili khuirā khavai kasoi, kala ana rākhanganai tharan ali ngahānna,
“Nawui vang ili khi sāmilu jikhala?”
“Proho, imik theingasakmilu” da ngahānkai.
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Theihaoranu! Nawui shitkasang china nali theingasakhaira.”
Chieina ana ngalāngda kathei samphangda Vareli masot chikatta athi shurthuwa; kala mi saikorana chi kathei tharan Vareli masochikata.
Keinung chili Zacchaeus kaho mi akha leisai. A khāshinā khaloka akhavāna kala shānglaka.
Ana Jishu chi kachipākhala da theikhavai ngarāna. Kha akho kasha̱ mi sāhaoda yaruilungli anganinglala Jishuli matheirarthuwa.
Chieina Jishuna rāki kaji shongfali rida ana ngasamvai kala ali yangkhuipai khavai sycamorerong akhali vākai.
Jishuna apam chili rākashung eina yangkāda hānga, “Zacchaeus, thākta tunglu, aja nawui shimli ngasāmkhuiphalungra.”
Chieina ana totot tunglaga Jishuli mathanthathup samphangkhui.
Mi saikorana chi kathei tharan athumna, “Ana morei kaphunga mi akhawui shimli azangra jihaira” da kapumkaseoda matuisera.
Zacchaeusna nganingkāda Proholi hānga, “Nganāmilu, Ojā! Iwui khalalei lan ngakaipakta kachāmabingli mira, kala ina kachikathā akhali kateizāhaisaakha akhum mati mataida ali hanmira.”
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Mipā hila Abrahamwui ara̱-azā ngasahaoda aja shimkhur hili huikhami rāshunghaira.
Kaja miwui Naomayarana shimān kahaibingli phākhuida huimi khavai kharāna.”
Ana mazatphokranglakha awui rao tharāli hokhui kala athum avāva̱li lupā akharip milaga, ‘I mahanungranglakha hi eina leih sāsālu’ da hānga.
Kha aramnaobingna ali yangkharinghaoda a zatthui kahaiwui thili, ‘Ithumwuitungli mipā hina khamung maningchāngmana’ da ahāng khavai minganin chihovai.
Mipā china awungawui pangshap samphangda hankhaung tharan heng sāda ana lupā mikahai raobing chili athumna kayākha tongkhuikhala da theikhui khavai rāserlu da kasoi.
Khare china awuili rāda, ‘Amei, nawui lupā chieina tharā tongkhui’ da hānga.
Chieina ali hānga, ‘Phālakhaira! kaphā rao! Nana kateowa otli ningmazinglak eina kasāwui vang nana keinung tharāwui akhava sāra’
Kakhane chinala, ‘Amei, nawui lupā chi eina lupā phangā tongkhui’ da rāhānga.
Chieina ali hānga, ‘Nana keinung phangāwui akhavā sāra.’
“Chiwui thili khangatei akhanala rāhānga, ‘Amei, hi ina chonsakainao akhali romtitlaga haikahai nawui lupā china;
kaja nali ngacheelaka, khiwui vangkhala kaja na sākashe mina; nawui makhaning chila nana khui, nana makhayao chila nana hātkhuiya.’
Ana ali hānga, ‘He makaphā rao! Ina nali nawui chanhān tākam eina bichar sāra. Nana I sākashena, iwui makhaning chi kakhuia kala makhayao chi hātkakhuiana da thei jihaira!
Chithākha khi sāda hankhaungli iwui lupā chi atar zangda samphang khavai lupā kazip khavaili masanghaithukhala?’
“Ana chiwui ngalemli khanganingbingli hānga, ‘Lupā chi awui eina khuida lupā tharā kasingapāli mihaolu.’
Kha athumna hānga, ‘Amei, awui lupā thara leilagavā?’
Ina nathumli kahāngna, khaleia mi kachiva̱li chungmeida mirorra, kha makhaleia mi chiwui eina awui kateokha khalei chila khuithuihaora.
Athumwuitungli ili mamung ngasak khangaia yangkashebing chiva hili khuirāda iwui miktāli shaothathaolu.’”
Ana Olive kaphungli khalei Bethphage eina Bethanyli vāshungnanai tharan awui sākhangatha̱ khanili chihovāda hānga,
“Mangāshong khalei kha̱ chili vālu kala nanina chili kazang eina mina matonglakrang kaji gadhānao akha hokhaisāra; chi akhalākhuilaga hili khuiunglu.
Nanili kachikathāna ‘Khiwuivang khala?’ da ngahānakha ‘Prohona sāvai khavai lei’ da ngahānkālu.”
Chieina kachihopā khani china vāhaowa kala ana hāngkahai tākam eina samphanga.
Anina gadhānao chi khalāmahunglakha akhavā china ngahāna, “Khiwuivang eina kakhalākhala?”
Chieina anina, “Prohona ot sākhavai lei” da ngahānkai.
Anina chi Jishuli khuiungmi kala gadhānao chiwuitungli athumwui kachon hamihailaga Jishuli kātong ngasaka.
Ana tongzatmamānlakha mibingna athumwui kachon shongfali hamizata.

Ana Jerusalem vāshungnanai Olive kaphungwui atun katā vākashung chitharan athi shurkazata mi saikorana ringphākhaihaowa kala athumli hakkhamahā ot kachungkha theikhangasakwui vang panglāk eina vaoda Vareli masot chikatta hānga,
“Proho mingli kharā awungali ka̱lā mahairanu! Kazingramli chingrihairanu kala juikhamataiyali tekmateirānu.”
Chieina yaruili zatrumkasā Pharisee kaikhana Jishuli hānga, “Ojā, nawui sākhangatha̱bingli hāngmachinlu!”
Ana ngahānkai, “Ina nathumli kahāngna, athum chingri eina pamhailala lungguibingna vaoshokra.”
“Chingri kahai hi kachiwui eina kharākhala da nathumna aja theisāsi kaja jong! Kha ara chila nathumwui eina thumihaira,
kaja nathumwuitungli ka̱lākashi atam chi rārāsāra, chitharan nathumwui yangkashebingna raipan sālaga rākuinamhaora kala achithek kachiva̱wui eina muirāra.

Athumna nathumli kala ngaveilungli leikasā naongarā saikora shimān ngasakra; lunggui akhawuitungli lunggui akhala maleiluimara, kachiwui vangkhala kaja Varena nali huikida kharā atam nana matheimana.”
“Hithada kapihaida lei: ‘Iwui shim hi seihā sākhavai shim hora’ kha nathumna hi pha̱ma̱kashaobingwui shim sāngasakhaira.”
Thālala apong akhala masamphangthuwa kaja mi saikorana awui tamkachithei chi ningsanglak eina nganāngaichinghaowa.
kala ali hānga, “Hāngmilu, nana khipāwui pangshap eina hi kasākhala, lah nali khipāna pangshap hi mikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina nathumli khangahān akha sāga, hāngmilu,
Johnwui ra̱hikkhamiwui pangshap hi kazingramwui einakā, miwui einakhala?”
