Chieina athum akha eina akha kasupta ngazek ngaroka, “Ithumna ‘Kazingramwui einana’ jiakha, ana khisāda ali mashitsangthukhala? jira;
‘Miwui einana’ jisa, mibingna ithumli ngalung eina horthathaora; kaja John hi marān akhana kaji athum saikorana mayāchao kahaina.”
Chieina athumna kachiwui eina kharākhala matheimana da ngahānkai.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Chithākha inala khiwui pangshap eina ot saikora hi kasākhala da mahangmara.”
Atam ungkashung tharan khamasābingli amasātman akhui khavai awui rao akha chihovai. Kha khamasābing china ali shaomihailaga khamasai eina shiunhaowa.
Ana khangatei rao akhala shivātlui, kha alila athumna shaoda khayaklak eina sāmihailaga khamasai eina shiunluihaowa.
Chithālala kakathuma rao akha chihovāluishita, alila khama za̱mihailaga ayarli horshokhaowa.
Chiwui thili drakhā yāmguiwui akhavā china hānga, ‘Khi kasāna phameinikhala! Iwui khaluma naomayarali chihovāra; kachangkhat athumna aliva khayāshira.’
Kha drakhā yāmgui khavābingna ali kathei tharan athum akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta hānga, ‘Shimluikatpa chi hina, ali shaothathaosa; chithākha shimlui chi ithumwui ngasāpaira.’
Chieina athumna ali drakhā yāmguiwui ayarli shimenshoklaga shaothathaowa. Chithākha yāmgui chiwui akhavāna athumli khi sāmaraokhala?
“Ana rālaga khamasābing saikora chili sāthatserhaora kala yāmgui chi mi kateibingli masā ngasakhaora.” Mibingna chi kashā eina “Chi Varena mamayāmana” da hānga.
Kha Jishuna athumli yanglaga hānga, “Chithākha kapi kahai hi khikhala? ‘Shim kasānaobingna horkahai lunggui china achithekwui khamakhoka ngalung ngasāhaira.’
Lunggui chiwuitungli kongluikazang kachiva̱ akha̱-akhā ngasāra, lunggui china kachikathāli takkharor tharan chifa ngasāda chaiyānghaora.”

Chieina athumna atam kachā chi rimpama kala kachikathā kaikhali pheizā mida khamashung-khangarong sārek ngasaklaga Jishuna khayontui matuiakha tukkhuilaga khamunga pangshap khaleiya Governorwui pāngli horsangmi khavai mi chihovai.
Chieina athumna ali ngahānna, “Ojā, na khamashung-khangarong tui matuida tamchithei kaji ithumna thei, kala khipālikha mijang masāla Varewui apongli mashungrik eina tamchithei.
Caesarli khāshinā khami hi mingayikā mamingayimakhala?”
Kha athumwui mareimarā chi theilaga athumli hānga,
“Ili lupāsā akha chitheilu; chili khipāwui azak kala khipāwui aming kapihailikhala?” Athumna “Caesarwuina” da ngahānkai.
Ana athumli hānga, “Chithākha Caesarwui chi Caesarli milu, kala Varewui chi Vareli milu.”
Chieina athumna mibingwui mangāli ana kahāng tui chiwui lungli khayon matukkhuirarthuwa. Kha awui ngahānkakā chili matakhakhaida kasainakha pamhaowa.

kala ali rāngahāna, “Ojā, ‘Achinā akhana ngalā khuilaga nao mapharāla apreiva̱ horhaida thihaiakha agatona preiva̱ chi ngakumphalungra kala awui vang nao pharākhuiphalungra da Mosesna ithumwui vang kapimihai.’
Atam akhali chinaongarā shini leisai, khararra china ngalā khuilaga nao maleila thihaowa.
Kakhanenala chithai,
kakathumana preiva̱ chili ngakumlui, chithada sāda athum shini chi nao maleilakla thiserhaowa.
Chiwui thili preiva̱ chila thihaowa.
Chithākha, ringkhalui atamli sha̱naopava̱ chi khipāwui preiva̱ sārakhala? Kaja shini china ali ngakumsera.”
Chieina Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Mithot hiwui naobingna ngalāla khui kala fakathuila fathui,
kha ringkhaluili kala rāki kaji okthotli zangkhangayibing chiva ngalā makhuiluimana, fakathuila mafathuiluimana.
Athum mathiluimara, khikhalajila athum ringkhaluiwui naobing ngasāhaoda kazingraobingli ngaraichai kala Varewui naobing ngasāhaowa.
Kha Mosesna kathebing ringluishithaora kaji hi khangapoma thingrongli mei kachui chili ana Proholi Abrahamwui, Jacobwui kala Isaacwui Varena da kaho china chitheimihaira.
Chithākha a kathewui Vare maningmana kha kharingawui Varena; kaja saikora awuili kharingna.”
Chieina ain kathembing kaikhana, “Ojā nana mathālak eina ngahānkāmihaira” da hānga.
Kaja athumna khangatei mangahānlengluithuwa.
Kaja David khalattana Laa lairikli hānga:
‘Prohona iwui Proholi hānga,
Iwui yāshong pamlu,
nawui yangkashebingli Ina nawui pheinai masāngasakranglakha eina tangda.’
Chithada sāda Davidna ali ‘Proho’ hoi; chithākha kathada awui naomayara ngasāpaira̱khala?”
“Katuma phahon ngavailaga yaothuizatkhangaiya kala leihngapha̱lungli khayāshilak eina shālam sāngasakkhangaibing kala synagogueli mathāmeikap kaji pam kala zātkhān kasāli khayākakāpam kaphābing,
rāmeinaobingwui lan khangaponbing kala sāchithei khavai seihā kasangsang sākharekabingli ningngasharlu. Athum hakkhamei khonshāt samphangra.”
Kala kachāma ra̱meinao akhana pheisā khani kasang chila thei.
Chieina ana hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, kachāma rameiva̱ hina athum saikorali chungmeida sanghaira.
Kaja athumna athumwui kachungkha khalei chiwui eina chigata, kha rameiva̱na awui makhalei tungli awui ringkhavai khalei katonga chi mikahaina.”
“Nathumna theida khalei, ngalung akhawuitungli ngalung akha maleiluiki kaji atam rārāli; ngalung kachiva̱ phukshoklaga horkathānserhaora.”
Chieina ana hānga, “Nathumli mathānngui khavai ning ngasharlu; kaja mi kachungkhana iwui ming singda rālaga ‘I ana’ kala ‘Atam chi nganailakhaira’ da hāngra. Chithālala athumwui thi mashurlakalu.
Nathumna raipao kashā tharan machipāhaialu; kaja chi shokriphalungra, kha khangachang atam chi hengsāda marāfamara.”
chitharan neina̱ panglāk eina khanukra kala apam kachungkhali chāmrei eina mao rāra; matakhak kahai kala khangachee machut kachungkha kazingramwui eina shokra.
Hi shākhi mikhavai nathumwui vang kachā atamna.
Chiwui vang eina nawui ningli ina kathada ngahānkārakhala da rida machukmaja̱mara da phaninglu;
kaja ina nathumli matuikatheila, thangkhameila mida nathumwui yangkashe khipānakha nathumna kahāng chili ngateida makhalatkhuirarmara kala mamashungmana dala mahāngrarmara.
Nathumli nava̱ navā ngarānala, nachinā ngarānala, athei-asānala yansaira kala nathum kaikhali sākathatla sāthathaora.
Nathumli imingwui vang mi saikorana ningkachaira.
Kha nathumwui sampānao akha eina tangda mashimān ngasakmara.
Nathumwui khāngkathei china nathumwui manglā kharing samphangra.
chitharan Judeali leikasābingna kaphungli yāmvāranu; keinunglungli leikasābingna yāmshokranu, kala luili vākahaibingna keinungli mahanungluiaranu.
Kaja kathara lairikli kapi kahai tui chi ungshung khavai athut kakhui atamna.
Iyavo! chitharan nao vaikasābing kala na̱ shimanda leikasāva̱bingli lumashan! Kaja okathuili chotchanglak kahai rāra kala Varewui tandi mibing hiwuitungli tāshungra.
Athum kaikhali raighai eina shātthatra, khangateibingli narkahai rao sāda yur saikorali khuivāra; kala yur khangateibingna Jerusalemwuitungli naikazamra.”
Okathuili rāshoki kaji chi phaningpamda mibingna khangachee eina ning shimānra; kaja, kazingramwui pangshapbing nganuk ngasakra.
Chiwui thili athumna miwui Naomayarana hakkhamahā pangshap kala tekhamatei eina ngasoda muiyā tongda kharā theira.
Chieina otshotbing hi shokkaphok tharan nathumwui kui khāngkāda yanglu, khikhalajila nathumwui ngatangkhami atam chi nganailakhaira.”
thingnā shonkhaleoda mayo kachāng nganaiura da nathum khalattana thei.
Chithada sāda nathumna otshotbing shokkaphok tharan Vare wungram nganaiura da theira.
“Kachangkhat eina nathumli kahāngna, ot saikora hi mashokserranglakha thot hi mashimānmara.
Kazingram eina okathuila shimānhaora kha iwui tuiva kachilikha mashimānmara.
Kaja hi okathuili khalei saikorawuitungli rāra.
Kha atam kachida ningngasharlu kaja rashokki kaji ot saikora hiwui eina yāmshokshap khavai kala miwui Naomayarawui mangāli nganingshap khavai seihā sāchinglu.”
Kala ngathorthak mi saikorana awui tui nganā khavai khorumshimli rā-rā ji.
Chieina pāngmon akhokabing eina ain kathembingna ali kathada sāthatsikhala da apong phai, kaja athumna mibingli ngacheehaowa.
Satanna tharāda khaniwui ngachaili Iscariotla kaho Judaswuili rāzanghaowa.
Chieina Judasna zatthuihailaga pāngmon akhokabing eina shipai akhavābingli kathada Jishuli yorsangmipairakhala kajiwui apongli angazeka.
Athum ringphāhaoda lupāla mira da mayāngaroka.
Ana mayāhaoda mibingli mathei ngasakla athumwui pāngli horsangmi khavai atam kachā phai.
Jishuna Peter eina Johnli chihovāda hānga, “Vaulu, laga ithum zākhavai Makānkhamiwui zātkhān angarānlu.”
“Apam kachili nana inili angarānlu kajikhala” da anina ngahānna.
Ana ngahānkai, “Yanglu, nanina keinungli akazang tharan mayarnao akhana tara̱ham phunglaga nanili ngarokra, ana akazang shim chili shurvālu,
kala shimva̱ chili, ‘Ojāna nali awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda Makānkhamiwui zātkhān zākhavai kā chi kali leikhala ji’ da hānglu.
Ana nanili mathāng khamatoli sāmathakharik kahai kahaka kā chi chitheira, chili ngarānlu.”
Ani vāhaowa kala ana hāngkahai tākam eina samphangda Makānkhami zātkhān chi apam chili angarānhai.
Ana athumli hānga, “Ina kachotkachāng maphungranglakha nathumli ngasoda Makānkhamiwui zātkhān hi phazārumngailaka.
Ina nathumli kahāngna, kaja hi Vare wungramli maungshungranglakha eina tangda ina hi mazāluimara.”
Chiwui thili ana tengkot khuida ningkashi mihailaga athumli hānga, “Hi khuida nathum ngayarmanglu;
kaja ina nathumli kahāngna, chiya aruiwui eina thuida Vare wungram marāranglakha eina tangda ina drakhāra̱ mamangluimara.”
Chiwui thili ana khamui khuida ningkashi mijang kahai eina serkhailaga athumli mida hānga, “Hi iwui asāna, nathumwui vang mikahaina. Ili phaningungda hi sāchinglu.”
Kharewui tākam eina shaikup kahai tharan tengkot chi athumli mida hānga, “Nathumwui vang heishokmi kahai tengkot iwui ashee eina sākahai kadhara tuingashitna.
“Kha yanglu, ili yorzaki kaje mipa chi ili ngasoda phazārumda lei.
Kaja miwui Naomayarana Varena ngarān kahai chiwui athishurda thira kha ali yorkazāpa chili kakhanang ringkashi ngasāranu.”
Chieina athum khalatta athumwui ngachaili khipāna yorzāki kajikhala da ngahān ngaroka.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Gentilewui awungabingna athumwuitungli akhavā sai kala athumwuitungli pangshap kasingbingli kaphā sākhamebing hoi.
Kha nathumliva chi maningmana, nathumwui ngachaili reimeithui kajena nganuimeikap kaje kala kathāna china otram ngatha̱khame sathalu.

Kaja phazatpamli kapampā eina ngatha̱khame khani chiwui ngachaili kachipana hakmeikhala? Phazatpamli kapamapā china reikhamei maningmala? Kha ina nathumwui ngachaili otram ngatha̱khame chi ngasāda lei.
iwui Avāna ili mungkhavai mashun khami chithada ina nathumlila chi khamina.
Chiya nathumna iwui wungramli phāshak-phazāpamra kala wungpamkhongli pamlaga Israelwui shang tharāda khaniwuitungli nathumna mungra.”
Kha Simon, ina nawui shitkasang mangachei khavai seihā sāmihaira, kala nana ili hanungluishit kaji tharan navānaobingli ngatar ngasaklu.”
Chieina Peterna ngahānkai, “Proho, ina nali ngasoda phātopli vākhavai kala thirum khavai ngarānpinghaira.”
Ana hānga, “Peter ina nali kahāngna, aja ngayā nana ili matheimana da kathumshida mahangranglakha eina tangda harvāna makhongmara.”
“Khikha khavāt maleimana” da athumna ngahānkai.
Ana hānga, “Kha ara, lupākhao khaleianala khuiphungranu kala paidu khaleia chinala chitharanu, kala raighai makhaleia a chinala awui kachon yorkhuilaga raighai lokhuiranu.
Kaja ina nathumli kahāngna, ‘Ali khayon kasābing mishānli shānsanga’ da kathara lairikli hāngkahai chi iwuili ungshungphalungra, kaja iwui pongli kapi kahai chi ungshungmamānhaira.”
Athumna hānga, “Yanglu, Proho, hili raighai khani lei.”
“Chi shapa” da ana ngahānkai.
Ana athumwui eina khavameinakta khuktizanglaga seihā sai.
“Avā, nana mayāmiakha, tengkot hi iwui eina kakhuithuimihaolu, chithālala iwui kaphaning maningmala kha nawui kaphaning eina vaimilu.”
Apam chili kazingramwui eina kazingrao tāda ali pangsang ngasaka.
Khanangnāhaoda a thukmeida seihā sai kala awui shairanra̱ chi ngaleitungli ashee atangtangnao thada ngaya̱tai.
Awui seihā kasāwui eina ngakarthuilaga sākhangatha̱bingli ungyanga, kala athum kakhanangwui vang pida leisai.
Chieina ana athumli hānga, “Khisāda nathum pihaokhala? Ngakarthuilu kala kasuili matāzang khavai seihā sālu.”
Kha Jishuna ali hānga, “Judas, nana miwui Naomayarali maya̱tkha eina yansaira̱lā?”
Kuimareida nganingkasā awui sākhangatha̱bingna shokki kaji chi theilaga hānga, “Proho, ithumna raighai eina shatusilā?”
Athumwui ngachaili akhana pāngmon khareiwui rao akhali shātta yāshongwui akhanā yortāmihaowa.
Kha Jishuna, “Thāhaolu, masāluipaimara,” da hānga kala akhanāli singza̱da raimihaowa.
Chiwui thili ali tukkhuikida kharā pāngmon akhokabing, khorumshimwui akhavābing kala hangva̱naobingli Jishuna hānga, “Khaleli tukkhuiki kaji thada raighai eina thinghun singda kharālā?
Ina thangkachida nathumli khorumshimli ngasokapam tharan nathumna ili pāng maparmana. Kha tangkhamangwui pangshapna munghaokida aja hi nathumwuina.”
Athumna kayāng alungthungli mei shātrunglaga athum saikora pamsera. Chili Peterla athumli ngasopama.
Peterna mei tikkapam chi rao sha̱nao akhana kathei eina ali yangkazazaklaga hānga, “Mipā hila Jishuli ngasosai.”
Kha ana mamayāmada hānga, “Sha̱nao, I ali matheimana.”
Khaleilaga mi khangatei akhana theilaga, “Nala athumwui ngachaili akhana?” da Peterli hānga.
Kha Peterna, “Maningmana” da ngahānkai.
Kala pung akha sha̱kha shānglaga khangatei akhana, “Kachangkhat mipā hila ali ngasosai; kaja ala Galileenaona,” da hānga.
Kha Peterna, “Mayara, nana khi kahāngkhala kaji I matheimana” da ngahānkai. Ana matui mahunglakha heng sāda harvāna khonghaowa.
Prohona kapeiungda Peterli munlak eina yanga. Kala “Aja, harvāna makhongranglakha nana ili kathum shida hatra” da Prohona hāngkahai tui chi Peterna phaningunga.
Chieina ana kayāngli soso shokchapa.
Athumna mikla rommihailaga “Nali kashao chi khipākhala?” da ngahānnganaowa.
Kala athumna ali kachipat tuila kachungkha matui.
“Na Khrista china jiakha ithumli hānglu.” Kha ana ngahānkai, “Ina nathumli hānglala nathum mashitsangmara;
kala ina nathumli ngahānlala nathum mangahānkāmara.
Kha aruiwui eina thuilaga miwui Naomayarali Varewui pangshapwui yāshong chipamhaora.”
Chieina athum saikorana hānga, “Chithākha na Varewui Naomayaralā?” Ana athumli hānga, “Chi nathumna hānghaira.”
Chieina athumna hānga, “Ithumna hili lāngda shākhi khangatei khi phāluira! Ithum khalattana awui khamor eina kahāng chi shāhaira.”
khuivālaga hithada kasotsanga, “Mipā hina ithumwui yurli mashongachei ngasakta Caesarlila shai mami khavai khāma kala akhalatta Khrista Awunga akhana ji.”
Pilatena ali ngahāna, “Na Jihudiwui awungalā?” Ana ali ngahānkāda hānga, “Chi nana hānghaira”
Chieina Pilatena pāngmon akhokabing eina yarui ashangva̱ chili hānga, “Mipā hiwui khayon khikha masamphangmana.”
Kha athumna pangmeida hānga, “Awui tamkachithei china Judea ngalei katongali pa̱ngapā ngasakhaira. Hi ana Galileewui eina haophoklaga ara hilila rāshunghaira.”
Pilatena chi kashā eina, “A Galileewui milā” da ngahānna.
Jishu hi Herodna khamunga ngaleiwui eina kharāna da Pilatena kathei eina ali Herodwuili chihovai, atam chitharan Herodla Jerusalemli leisai.
Herodna Jishuli kathei eina ringphālakhaowa, kaja awui otsakwui pongli tarākha shahairasāda atam kasāngkhawui vang theingailak eina leisai kala matakhak kahai machut samphangra da chihānsai.
Chieina ana Jishuli khangahān kachungkha sai, kha ana khikha mangahānkāmana.
Chili nganingkasā pāngmon akhokabing eina ain kathemabingna Jishuwuitungli zakshilāk eina phena.
Herod eina awui shipaibingnala zeida mana̱shiya. Chiwui thili wungnao sāri ngavaimilaga Pilatewuili chihovāluishithaowa.
Chithang eina thuida Herod eina Pilate mashithaowa, kaja rida ani khani yangshi ngaroksai.
Pilatena pāngmon akhokabing kathānabing kala yaruibingli hokhuiserda hānga,
“Nathumna mipā hili mashongachei khangasaka mina da khuirai, ina nathumwui miktāli khari-kharāda ngahānyanghaira, kha awuitungli kaphen saikora chi khikha khamashung masamphangmana.
Herodnala masamphangmada ithumwuili chihoraluishit kajina. Ana thikhangayi khalāng otsak khikha masāhaimana.
Chiwui vang eina ali hāngmachinlaga chihohaora.”
Makānkhami phanit kachida phātop kazang akhali athumwui vang chihomichinga.
keinungli tui shokkhangasakwui vang kala mi shaokathatwui vang Barabbasli phātop sanghaisai.
Pilatena Jishuli chihongaihaoda athumli hāngluishita;
kha athumna, “Krushli shaothathaolu, Krushli shaothathaolu!” da panglāk eina vaowa.
Kakathumali ana hānga, “Ana khi khayon sāhaokhala? Ana thikhangayi apong khikha masamphangmana. Chiwui vang eina ina ali hāngmachinlaga chihohaora.”
Kha athumna marmeikharda ali shaothatphalungra da vaohaowa kala athumwui tuina yuihaowa.
Chieina athumwui kapo athishurda Pilatena khamayā mihaowa.
Chieina mi shaokathata phātopli sanghaikasā Barabbasli chihomihailaga Jishuli athumwui ningkachāng chi sākhavai Pilatena horsangmihaowa.
Kala mi kachungkhala shurvai. Chiwui ngachaili Jishuwui vang malungringda chapkhangachā, sikafa sha̱naobingla zanga.
Kha Jishuna athumli ngareiungda hānga, “Jerusalemwui naongalāva̱bing, iwui vang machapalu, kha nathum khalattawui vang kala nanaongarāwui vang chaplu.
Khikhalajila ‘Yanglu, naokashumva̱, nao makapharāva̱, kala na̱ makashimanva̱, athum sokhami ngasāranu’ da hangki kaji atam rārāli.
Chitharan athumna kaphungli ‘Ithumli khaminrorlu’ kala ‘Leisumsumli ithumli kakhayinlu’ da hāngra.
Kala thingna matekta leilakha chithākha thengkahai tharan khi shokrakhala?”
Kala Jishuli ngasoda yomnao khanilila shaothat khavai thānvai.
Athumna Mikuira̱ kaho apam chili vākashung eina Jishuli krushli kala yomnao khani chili, akhana yāshong, akhana uishong da shaothata.
Jishuna hānga, “Avā, athumli pheomilu, athumna khi kasākhala da matheimana.” Kala awui kashankachon ngayar khavai athumna ka̱lā yanga.
Mibing china chiwui ngalemli nganingda ngashānyangda leilakha, Jihudiwui kathānabingna zeida hānga. “Ana mi kateiliva huishapa, A hi Varewui kapangkakhui Khristana jiakha akhalatta huikhuiranu”
Shipaibingnala mana̱shida atheira̱ kathur rāmikhaningda
hānga, “Na Jihudiwui awungana jiakha nakhalatta huikhuilu.”
Kala awui kuishakli. “Hi Jihudiwui Awungana” da kapihai.
Yomnao khani chiwui ngachaili akhana, “Na Khristana kaji maningmalā? Nakhalattala kala inilila huikhuilu” da zeida hānga.
Kha akhapā china hānga, “Nala ngaraikachā shongrān samphangda leilaga Vareli mangacheemalā?
Iniva inina sākahai chiwui athei samkaphangna, kha ava khikha khalāng makhalei mina.”
Kala ana hānga, “Jishu, nana nawui wungramli kazang tharan ili kaphaningungmilu.”
Chieina Jishuna hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nali kahāngna, na aja ili ngasoda Paradiseli pamra.”
zimikla mahorthu kala khorumshimwui kachon rānkahai chila khani sāda kākhaowa.
Chiwui thili Jishuna panglāk eina vaoda, “Avā, nawui pāngli imanglā horsangli!” da hānglaga thihaowa.
Kashokshok chi theilaga raimi shākhawui akhavā china Vareli sochikatta hānga, “Makahatlakla, mipā hi khamashunga mina.”
Kashokshok saikora yangkhavai kazipkasā mi saikorana otshot chi theida malungkaphelaga shim hanungserhaowa.
Awui theikhamasuia saikora kala Galileewui eina athi shurkharā sha̱naobing chila khalāda nganinglaga otsak saikora ngashānyanga.
Athumwui otsak chili a mazangmana kha Vare wungram kharā ngaraikapama mina.
Mipā hina Pilateli Jishuwui angun apoi.
Ana angun chi khuitālaga kachon khamanaka akha eina romhai, kala mi khipālikha machizanlakrang kaji kashokakhui lungkhur chili chizana.
Chithang khangarān kasā zimiksho ngasāsai kala sabbath haophokki jiurasai.
Galileewui eina ngasokharā sha̱naobing chi Josephli shurvālaga chikhurla kala kachizanla athei,
Chiwui thili athumna shimli latunglaga nganamkaphā thao ayur-ayā khangarān sakhui.
Sabbaththang ningkhami athishurda athumna ngasāmkhui.
Athumna chikhurwui lungsham khalangshokhairakasā chi thei.
Kha chikhurli zangkhayang eina angun maleisāmana.
Ningreikhasut eina leilakha hānshi kahai kachon khangavai mi khani athumwui ngalemli nganingsai.
Athumna ngacheenāhaida ngaleili mashunkazang eina anina hānga, “Khisāda kathewui ngachaili kharingali phākhala?
A hili maleimana kha ringshokhaira. Galileeli leilakha ana nathumli kathada hāngmihaikhala kaji chi phaningunglu:
‘Miwui Naomayarali morei kaphungbingwui pāngli horsangmida krushtungli shaothatra kala kakathumathang ringluira.’”
Chieina sha̱naobing china hāngkahai tui chi phaningunga,
kala chikhurwui eina hanungda tui saikora chi tharāda akha eina chili leikasābing saikorali unghānga.
Paokazatbingli ungkahāngbing chiya Mary Magdalene, Joanna, Jameswui ava̱ Mary kala athumli ngayurkasā sha̱nao khangateila zanga.
Kha tui chi hangphāphā kajina da sākhangatha̱bingna makhuisangmana.
Kha Peterna ngakarthuida chikhurli ngasamvāda khayang chitharan khamanaka kachon chimāng leisai, kala kathāhaokhala da matakhak eina shimli latunghaowa.
Chithang Jishuli kashura mi khani, Jerusalemwui eina Kilometre tharā sha̱kha katā Emmaus kaho kha̱ akhali vākida zatlakha,
shokkahai maram saikora anina ngazekzatsai.
Anina ngazekzatmamānda leilakha Jishuna rānganaida anili ngasozata.
Kha anina ali mamachutrarthuwa.
Chieina ana, “Nani khi ngazekazatkhala?” da ngahāna. Wukkhananglak eina ani khani nganingshakhaowa.
Aniwui ngachaili Cleopas kaho china ngahānkai, “Aruihon Jerusalemli khi shokmameikhala kaji makathei namānga, na kachiwui eina kharākhala?”
“Khi sāthukhala?” da ana ngahāna. “Nazarethwui Jishuli shokkahai maramna. Mipā hi Varewui mangalila, miwui mangalila kala otsak, tuimatui saikorali pangshap khaleia marān akhana” da anina ngahānkai.
“Ithumwui pāngmon akhokabing, kala kathānabingna ali kathiwui tandi mikhavai horsangmida krushtungli shaothathaowa.
Israelli ngatangmiki kaje chi alaka da ithumna chihānsai. Chili lāngda otshot hi shokta ajana kathumthanghaira.
Matakhak kahaipāva, ithumwui ngachaili sha̱nao kaikhana unghānga, kaja athumna ngathorthakva̱ chikhurpamli vai,
laga awui angun maleisathu-iji, kazingrao khani leisāda Jishu ringhaira da anina hānga ji.
Ithumwui ngasotnao kaikhana chikhurli ayanga kala sha̱naobingna kahāng chi tākam eina leisai, kha aliva matheithuwa.”
Chieina Jishuna anili hānga, “O mangkhama̱ khani! Marānbingna hāngkahai saikora chili mashitkasang!
Awui tekhamateili zangkhavai Khristana kachotkachāng phungphalungki kaji maningmalā?”
Moseswui eina thuilaga marān saikorana awui maramli kapihaikasā katonga chi Jishuna anili khalatmisera.
anina khāmda hānga, “Ara, kazing yingda taiura, nala hili pisanghaosa” kaji eina ala mayāda pamsanghaowa.
Phazāuki kaji eina ana khamui khuida seihā sālaga serkhaida ngayarmi,
kala aniwui mik mathingmida a khipākhala kaji theingasakhaowa. Kha aniwui eina shimānhaowa.
“Shongfali zatmamānda ana chān khangazek kala Varewui tui pheikachithei tharan ningli meikachui mathāmalā?” da ani akha eina akha ngazek ngaroka.
Anina ngalāngda ngakarthuida Jerusalemli latunga; chitharan tharāda akha kala athumli khangasobing chi kazipkha sāda leikasā chi ungthei,
kala hithada hānga, “Proho kachangkhat ringluihaira, Simonli rāchitheihaira!”
Chiwui thili anina shongfali khi shokmameikhala kaji kala khamui serkakhaili anina kathada theikhuikhala kaji saikora meisā eina hāngchithei.
Kashuirakhaida athumna kathi manglākā da phaninglaga ngacheelakhaowa.
Kha ana hānga, “Khisāda ngacheeda ningli chukmaja̱phāphākhala?
Hi ilaka kaji theikhavai iphei, ipāng rāyanglu ili singyanglu, khikhalajila nathumna ili kathei thada kathi manglāva asā eina ara̱kui mangavāmana.”
Hi hānglaga apāng eina aphei athumli chithei.
Athumna ringphanāhaida mashitsangrarmada matakhak eina leilakha ana hānglui, “Nathumwuili khikhakha shaikhavai leilā?”
Chieina athumna hangkahai khaih akha khuimi,
ana chi khuida athumwui miktāli shai.
Chiwui thili Katharatui chi theishingkhui khavai athumwui ning mathing ngasakta hānga,
“Hithada kapihaili, kaja Messiahna kachotkachāng phungphalungra kala kakathumathang kathiwui eina ringluira.
Kala awui ming singda nathumna Jerusalem eina thuida miyur saikorali ningngateida morei pheokhavai pao hāshokra.
Nathumna ot saikora hiwui shākhina.
Kala yanglu, ina iwui Avāwui ngashit kahai chi nathumli shirātra, kha atungshongwui eina nathumli pangshap chi mamiranglakha keinung hili honpamsālu.”
Chiwui thili keinung eina thānshoklaga athumli Bethany eina tangda thānvai kala apāng khangkāda athumli somi.
Ana somimamānda leilakha athumwui eina pakthuida kazingramli khuikāhaowa.
Athumna mathānthup eina Jerusalemli latunghaowa,
kala thangkachida khorumshimli kāda athumna Vareli sochikatchinga.
Kharewui eina Tui chi Vareli ngasosai.
Ot saikora awui mangā eina kasāna kala sākahai saikora hi a mazangla kasā maleilakmana.
Awuili kharing leisai, kala kharing chi mikumowui kahorna.
Kahor china tangkhamangli horngasaka kala tangkhamangna chili mayuirarmana.
Saikorana awui manga eina shitsang khavai kahor chiwui shākhi samikida a kharāna.
Kahor chi a maningmana, kha chiwui shākhi mikhavai kharāna.
Mi kachiva̱li horkhangasaka khamashunga kahor chi okathuili rākhamina.
Tui chi okathuili leisai kala awui mangā eina okathui hi sakhuilala okathuina ali matheithuwa.
Ana awui ramli rai, kha awui mibingna ali makhuisangthuwa.
Kha awui mingli shitsangda ali khuikasanga, asheewui lah asāwui kaphaning lah mikumowui kaphaning eina maningla
Varewui kaphaning eina kapharā saikorali ana Varewui naongarā ngasā khavai pangshap mi.
Awuili pemting kahaiwui vang ithumna lukhamashanwuitungli lukhamashan ngarorda samphanga.
Ain hi Moseswui mangā eina mi, lukhamashan eina khamashung-khangarong hi Jishuwui eina rai.
Khipānakha Vareli matheilakranga; Avāva̱wui makāli khalei Naoho-naotongmāngna ali theingasaka.
Johnna khikha mangalarlakla mashungrik eina hānga, “I Khrista chi maningmana” da ngahānkai.
Chieina athumna “Chithākha na khipākhala? Elijahla?” da ngahāna.
“Maningmana” da Johnna ngahānkai.
“Na marānla?” da athumna ngahāna.
“Maningmana” da ana ngahānkai.
Chieina athumna hānga,
“Ithumli kashirātabingli unghāng khavai
‘Na khipākhala’ kaji hāngmilu.
Na khalattana na khipāna jikhala?”
“Prohowui shongfa ngatar ngasaklu da lamhāngli vaokazat akhon chi ina”
Phariseebingna kachiho athumna Johnli rāhānga,
“Na Khristala maning, Elijahla maning, marān chila maningakha, khiwui vang eina ra̱hikhamikhala?”
Johnna ngahānkai, “Ina tara̱ eina ra̱hikmi, kha nathumwui ngachaili akha nganingda khalei chi nathumna matheimana.
Iwui thili kharā chi ana, I awui pheihop khara̱ eina tangda makhalāmiphayomana.”
Saikora hi Johnna ra̱hikmi khavai apam Jordankong vāklaida khalei Bethanyli kashokna.
‘Iwui thili akha rārāli, ava ili reimei, khikhalajila ava ili rida leihaira kasāna’ da ina kahānga chi hipāna.
Ila ali matheisāmana, kha Israelnaobingli a khipākhala da chithei khavai ina tara̱ eina ra̱hikkhamina.”
Johnna shākhi mida hānga; “Manglāna kazingramwui eina nāsha̱ thada tai kala awuitungli tākapa̱ ina thei.
I ali matheisāmana, kha tara̱ eina ra̱hikmi khavai ili kashirāta china ili hānga, ‘Manglāna tāda tākhangasāma, nana katheipa chi Manglā Kathara eina ra̱hikkhame china.
Ina chi theihaira kala ina nathumli kahāngna, a Varewui Naomayara chilaka.’”
kala Jishu zatkasā theida hānga, “Yanglu, Varewui yaonao!”
Sākhangatha̱ khani china awui kahāng chi shāda Jishuwui thi shurthuwa.
Jishuna ngareiunga kala ani shurzatkasā chi theida hānga, “Khi phākazatkhala?”
Anina ngahānkai, “Ojā, na kali pamkhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Rāyanglu” (Chitharan ngazinwui pung mati shākha tāhairasai). Chieina anina ali ngasovāda awui pamkhavai athei kala chithang ali ngasopamhaowa.
Johnwui tui shāda athi shurkhavā khani chiwui ngachaili akhava Simon Peterwui agato Andrewna.
Ana hengsāda ama Simonli samphangda hānga, “Ithum Messiahli samphanghaira.” (Tui hiwui kakhalatva Khrista kajina).
Chieina Simonli Jishuwuili thānvai.
Jishuna ali yanglaga hānga, “Na Johnwui naomayara Simon kaho china, kha nawui aming Cephas hora.” (Hiwui kakhalata Peter kajina).
(Philip hi Andrew eina Peterwui keinung Beth-saida kaho chiwui mina).
Philipna Nathana-elli samphangda hānga. “Moseswui ainli kapi kahai kala marānbingnala kapi kahai mipa, Josephwui naomayara, Nazarethwui Jishu chili ithum samphanghaira.”
Nathana-elna hānga, “Nazarethwui eina khamathā ot shokpairala?” “Rāyanglu” da Philipna ngahānkai.
Jishuna awui ngalemli Nathana-el rākharā kathei tharan, ana awui pongli hānga, “Yanglu, chukkhara̱ khikha makhalei Israelna; khayon khikhala maleimana.”
Nathana-elna ali ngahāna, “Nana ili kathada theikhala?” Jishuna ngahānkai, “Philipna mahokhuiranglakha na khaorārongwui azingli pamkasā ina thei.”
Nathana-elna Jishuli ngahānkai, “Ojā, na Varewui Naomayarana! Na Israelwui awungana!”
Jishuna hānga, “Ina nali khaorārongwui azingli thei da kahāngwui vang shitkasangla? Nana hili hakkhamei kachungkha theifara.”
Kala Jishuna athumli hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna kazingram shokahai theira, kala Varewui kazingraobingna miwui Naomayarawuitungli kakā katung theira.”
Ngala shakazā chili Jishulila, awui sākhangatha̱binglila hoi.
Drakhāra̱ yaongakān kahai eina ava̱va̱na Jishuli hānga, “Ashi drakhāra̱ maleithura.”
Chieina Jishuna hānga, “Ina khi sangayikhala kaji nana mahangphalungki kajina, iwui atam marāranga.”
Chieina ava̱va̱na raobing chili hānga, “Ana kahahāng chi sālu.”
Apam chili Jihudiwui khangachā athishurda pheokhamatharli shichin khavai tara̱ liter shāshā kazanga ngankhā tharuk haisai.
Jishuna raobing chili hānga. “Hambing hi tara̱ chipemhaolu.” Athumna ham chiwui akhamong kāshungda chipemserhaowa,
kala Jishuna hānglui, “Ara sokkhuida zātkhān kashina chili khuivāmilu.” Chieina athumna ali khuivāmi.
Zātkhān kashina china mazapkhayang eina drakhāra̱ onhairasai. Drakhāra̱ hi kachiwui eina kharākhala da ana matheimana (kha tara̱ sokkakhuiana chi thei). Chieina mākhām kahaia chili hokhuida hānga,
“Mi kachiva̱na mangkaphā rida khami khangachāna, kala mibingna penlak eina mangkahaiwui thili mamangphākhamei khamina. Kha nashe aruila mangkaphā haifada lei.”
Jishuna matakhak kahai sakhare chi Galileeli khalei Canali sai, apam chili awui tekhamatei ana phongshoka kala awui sākhangatha̱bingna ali shitsanga.
Khorumshimlungli sei, yao, kha̱na̱ yorkasā kala lupā kakaibingna leih sākasā thei.
Chieina ana khara̱wui lijei sākhuilaga yao kala sei saikora khorumshimwui eina kashamshokmihaowa, kala lupā kakaibingwui tablela phalatmida lupākha̱bing chi heitha̱miserhaowa.
Kala kha̱na̱ khayorbing chili ana kasoi, “Ot saikora hi hiwui eina khuishokhaolu! iwui Avāwui shim hi leihngapha̱ masā ngasakpaimana.”
Awui sākhangatha̱bingna kathara lairikli hāngkahai, “Nawui shimwui vang iwui ningkatong hi mei thada chuida lei” kaji phaningunga.
Jihudiwui kathānabingna hānga, “Nana hi kasāwui mashun leiya da chithei khavai khi machut leikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Khorumshim hi sākhaihaolu, laga ina kathumthangwui alungli sakāluira.”
Chieina Jihudibingna hānga, “Khorumshim hi sakakāli zingkum hangmatida tharuk zanga, laga nana kathumthangwui alungli sākāra kajila?”
Kha Jishuna khorumshim da khamatui chiya awui phasāli kahāngna.
Chieina ana kathiwui eina ringshoklui kahai tharan, hiwui pongli ana hāngkahai chi sākhangatha̱bingna phaningungda kathara tui kala Jishuna hāngkahai chili shitsanga.
Makānkhami phanitwui atamli Jishuna Jerusalemli leilakha, mi kachungkhana ana kasā matakhak kahai ot chi theilaga awui mingli shitsanghaowa;
kha Jishuna athumli mashitsangmana, kaja athum saikorali ana theisera,
mi khipānakha athumwui pongli ali hāngmi khavai darkar masāmana kaja a khalattana athumwui ningli khi leikhala kaji thei.
Thangngayākha ana Jishuli rahānga. “Ojā, nava Varena chihokharā ojā akhana da ithumna thei. Sakahai machutbing hi Varena ngasokhami maningla khipānakha masārarmana.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Kachangkhat eina ina nali kahāngna, mapharāluishitakha khipānakha Vare wungram matheirarmara.”
Nicodemusna, “Mi akhana sārhailaga kathada pharāluishitpairakhala? Ana ava̱wui wuklungli zangluishitlaga kakhane sāda pharāluipairala?” da ngahāna.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Kachangkhat eina ina nali kahāngna, kachikathāna tara̱ eina kala Manglā eina kapharā maningakha Vare wungramli mazangrarmara.
Phasāna kapharā chi phasāna kala Manglāna kapharā chi manglāna.
Ina nali kahāng hi mamatakhakhaialu, ‘nathum pharāluishitphalungra.
Masina awui phankhangaili phana, kala chiwui akhon nathumna shālaga kachiwui eina phankharā kala kachivāk phanvāhaokhala kaji nathum matheimana. Manglāna kapharā mi kachiva̱ chithāpapama.
“Kathada hi sapairakhala?” da Nicodemusna ngahāna.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Na Israelwui ojā akhalaga chi matheimala?
Kachangkhat eina ina kahāngna, ithuma ithumna kathei chi matui kala mik eina theikahai chi shākhi mi, kha nathumna ithumwui shākhi hi makhuisangmana.
Ina okathuiwui ot hānglaga nana ili mashitsangakha kazingramwui ot hāngda nana kathada ili shitsangrakhala?
Kazingramwui eina katā miwui Naomayara chi maningla khipākha kazingram kākahai maleimana.”
Mosesna lamhāngli phara̱li khāngkakā chithada miwui Naomayaralila khāngkāphalungra.
Kala ali shitkasanga mi kachiva̱ katang makhavai kharing samphangra.
Khikhalajila Varena apuk-apagva̱li leishinā kahaiwui vang awui Naohonaotong chi mi, chieina ali shitkasanga mi kachiva̱ mashimānphalungmara kha katang makhavai kharing samphangra.
Okathuili bichar sākhavai Varena Anaomayarali chihokharā maningmana, kha awui mangā eina apuk-apaga hi huikhui khavaina.
Ali shitkasanga chili bichar masāmana, kha mashitkasanga chili bichar sāpinghaira, kaja ana Varewui Naohonaotong chiwui mingli mashitsangthuwa.
Kala bichar chi hithai: kahor chi okathuili rāhaira, kha mikumona tangkhamangli leishitha̱haowa kaja athumwui otsak maphāmana.
Makaphā kasā mina kahorli ningkachai kala athumna kahorli marāngaimana, kaja awui otsak mathei ngasakngaimana.
Kha khamashung khangarong kasaa china awui otsak chi Varewui ningkachāngna da mathingrik eina theikhavai kahorli rai.
Johnnala Salimwui ngalemli khalei Aenonli ra̱hikmisai. Kaja apam chili tara̱ tarākha leisai. Mi kachungkha rāda ana ra̱hikmi.
Kaja John phātopli mazangrangsai.
Chitharan Johnwui sākhangatha̱bing eina Jihudi akha dharmawui pheokhamatharwui pongli ngayāt khangarok shokka.
Chieina athumna Johnli ahānga, “Ojā, Jordan kongwui zimikshovāk nali ngasokasā, nana awui maramli shākhi khamipā china hili ra̱hikmida leili, kala mi sorkhangasai awuili vāda lei.”
Johnna ngahānkai, “Kazingramwui eina khami maningakha khipānakha khikha masamphangrarmana.
‘I Khrista maningmana kha ali rimeida ili chihokharāna’ da ina hāngkahai chiwui shākhi chi nathumna.

Khām kahaiva̱ leikahaia chi khām kahaiana. Khām kahaiawui khamashita, awui ngalemli nāshungda khalei china khām kahaiva̱wui akhon kashā eina mathāna. Chithada sāda iwui ringkaphā chi ara kāshunghaira.
A mataisangphalungra, kha iya teosangphalungra.”
Jishuna awui kathei kashā chi hānga, kha khipānakha makhuisangmana.
Awui shākhi khuikasanga china Vare hi khamashungalaka kaji hāngshapa.
Varena kashivāta a china Varewui tui matui kaja Varena Manglā chi khavāt maleila ali mi.
Avāva̱na Anaomayarali leishiya kala ot saikora awui pāngli horsangmi kahaina.
Naomayara chili shitkasanga mi chi katang makhavai kharing lei; kahāng makhanganaa chi kharing kaho matheimara, kha Varewui malungkhavāt awuitungli lei.
(Kachangkhat Jishu a khalattana ra̱hikkhami maningla awui sākhangatha̱bingna kasāna)
ana Judeawui eina Galileeli latunga.
Shongfa chi Samariawui eina ngaruivāki kajina.
Chieina Jacobna anaomayara Josephli khami tampāk chiwui ngalemli khalei Sychar kaho Samariawui keinungli ana vai.
Jacobwui ra̱khong chi chili lei, kala Jishuna ram zatta chothaoda ra̱khong chiwui ayarli apamkhui, chi pung katharuka maikhawui atamlina.
Apam chili Samariawui sha̱nao akha tara̱ rātārasai. Jishuna ali hānga, “Ili tara̱ khamimanglu.”
Chitharan awui sākhangatha̱bing keinungli kashakazā alothuihairasai.
Samariawui sha̱nao china hānga, “Nava Jihudinaona kala iya Samarianaona, kathada Samariawui sha̱nao ili tara̱ pokhala?” Kaja Jihudibingna Samarianaoli ot mangaronmana.
Jishuna ali ngahānkai, “Nana Varewui lemmet chi theisāsi kaja kala ‘Ili tara̱ khamimanglu’ da kapopa hi khipākhala da theisi kaja nana ali poda ana nali kharinga tara̱ chi mihaira̱ra.”
Sha̱naopava̱ china hānga, “Amei, nava tara̱ sokkhui khavaila makhuiphung, kala ra̱khongna hiyākha thuklaga nana kachiwui eina kharinga tara̱ chi khuimirakhala?
Ishawo Jacobli na reimeila? Ana ithumli ra̱khong hi khamina, kala ala awui naongarābingla kala sha̱keibingla hi mangkasāna.”
Jishuna hānga, “Tara̱ hi khamanga mi kachiva̱ ra̱changluishitra,
kha ina miki kaji tara̱ chi khamanga a chi mara̱changluimara. Ina miki kaji tara̱ chiva awuili katang makhavai kharing wurkashoka ura ngasāhaora.”
Sha̱naopava̱ china hānga, “Amei, ina mara̱changlui khavai kala apam hili tara̱ marātālui khavai tara̱ chi ili khamilu.”
Jishuna hānga, “Nagaharali unghokhuilaga hili rālu.”
Sha̱naopava̱ china ngahānkai, “I igahara maleimana.” Jishuna ali hānga, “Nana nagahara maleimana da kahāng chi mashunga.
Kaja na mayar phangāli ngakumhaira, kala arui pamrumda khaleipa hila nagahara maningmana. Na mashungda hāngda lei.”
Sha̱nao china hānga, “Amei, na marān akhana da ina thei.”
“Ishawo ngarāna phungrei hili khoruma, kha nathum Jihudibingna khorum khangayi apam chi Jerusalemna da hānga.”
Jishuna hānga, “He sha̱nao, ili shitsanglu. Avāva̱ chili mibingna kaphung hilila, Jerusalemlila makhorumluiki kaji atam chi rārāli.
Nathum Samarianaona khipāli khokharumkhala da matheimana, kha Jihudi ithumna khipāli khokharumkhala da thei, kaja huikhame hi Jihudiwui eina rai.
Khamashung eina khokharumabingna Avāva̱li manglā kala khamashung eina khorumki kaji atam chi rārāli, chi arui hina, kaja Avāva̱na ali chithada khorum ngasakngai.
Vare hiya Manglāna, chieina ali khokharumbingna manglā kala khamashung eina khorumphalungra.”
Sha̱nao china hānga, “Messiah (Khristala kaho) chi rāra da ina thei. Ana kharā tharan ot saikora ithumli ana hāngchitheira.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Nali ngazekta khalei I hi a laka.”
Chichangli sākhangatha̱bing rārāsai. Ana sha̱naoli khangazek chi athum matakhakhaowa, kha khipānakha “Na khi ningkachangkhala?” lah “Khisāda sha̱nao chili khangazekkhala?” da mahāngmana.
Chieina sha̱nao china awui tara̱ham haihailaga keinungli latungda mibingli hānga,
“Rāyanglu, ina sākahai saikora hāngmishapa mi akha lei, hi Khrista chiralā?”
Athumna keinungwui eina rāda Jishuli samphanga.
Athum rāmahungda leilakha sākhangatha̱bingna Jishuli, “Ojā, phazākhuifalu” da hānga,
kha Jishuna athumli hānga, “Nathumna makathei kashakazā ina zāki kaji lei.”
Chieina athum akha eina akha, “Kachikathāna ali kashakazā khuiungmihairala?” da ngazek ngaroka.
Kha Jishuna hānga, “Ili kashirātawui ningkachāng ot kasā kala chi ungshung khangasak chi iwui kashakazāna.
Nathumna, ‘Kachāng mati vātfaya, chiwui thili māhā rāra’ da mahāngmala? Ina nathumli kahāngna, namik kapeikāda ngashānyanglu, mā chi hātkhavai minhaira.
Kahāta china langhai samphanga kala katang makhavai mirinwui heiun kazipkhui, chieina khayaoa eina kahāta ringpharumra.
Chānjam hi mashunglaka, ‘Akhana yaowa, akhana hātkhui.’
Nathumna mavākasang lui chi nathum hātkhui khavai ina nathumli kashivātna, khangateina vāsangmihaira, nathuma thada hātki kajimaya.”
Kala sha̱naopava̱ china “Ina sākahai saikora chi ana hāngmihaira” da shākhi khamiwui vang Samarianao kachungkha Jishuli shitsanghaowa.
Kala athumna Jishuwuili rāda ngasāmsangmi khavai poi, chieina ana khanithang pamsanga.
Awui tui shālaga apam chiwui mi kachungkha ali shitsanghaowa.
Athumna sha̱naopava̱ chili hānga, “Nana kahāng chiwui vangmāng ithumna shitkasang maningmana, kha ithum khalattana awui tui shāhaira kala a hi okathuiwui Huikhamelaka da ithumna theihaira.”
Khanithangwui thili Jishuna Galileeli vāhaowa.
Jishu a khalattana, marān kaho hili awui ramli khayākashi mangachāmana da hāngphata.
Jishuna Galileeli kharā tharan chiwui mibingna mathānthathup eina rāsamphanga kaja athumna phanitli Jerusalem kakā tharan Jishuna kasāsā saikora theihairasai.
Mipā china Jishu Judeawui eina Galileeli rāhaira kaji kashā eina thinanai khalei awui naomayarali raimi khavai apoi.
Chieina Jishuna ali hānga, “Nathum hiya machut kala matakhak kahai otsak matheiranglakha eina tangda mashitsangmana.”
Akhavāpa china hānga, “Inao mathiranglakha kharāmilu”
Jishuna hānga, “Ungulu, nanao ringra.” Mipa china Jishuna kahāng shitsangda latunghaowa.
Ana shim maungshungranglakha awui raobingna pao khuirada hānga, “Nanao kakazā phāhaira.”
Chieina ana atam katharān phāhaokhala da khangahān eina athumna ngahānkai, “Ayā ngashun pung akha katā tharan kakharur vānhaowa.”
Chieina a khalattala kala ashi shimkhur katongala shitsanghaowa.
Jishuna Judeawui eina Galileeli kharā tharan machut kachithei hina kakhanena.
Chiwui thili Jihudiwui phanit akha leisai kala Jishuna Jerusalemli vai.
Jerusalemwui Yao-Ngavei ngalemli yāngkhup phangā khalei ra̱khong akha lei, Hebrew tuili Beth-zatha hoi.
Hili kakazābing kaja mik khangapeo, phei katek kala sheikasha̱bing sorngasaida pamsai— (athumna tara̱ khangatha̱ ngaraipama.
Kaja mararakli Prohowui kazingrao tāda ra̱khong chiwui tara̱ chi ngatha̱ ngasaka. Tara̱ chi ngatha̱ kahaiwui thili zangkharena kazāt khikhikharanu kharai samphanga).
Apam chili zingkum thumrāda chishat kazākahai mi akhala leisai.
Atam chirankha ngaraikapam chi Jishuna theida “Na raingaila?” da ngahāna.
Kakazāpa china ngahānkai, “Amei, tara̱ ngatha̱khaleoda ra̱khongli ili khuizangmi khavai khipākha maleimana; ina zangkida sālala kateina rikhuichinghaowa.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, nawui khomphānao chi khuiphungda zatulu”
Chili ngalāngda mipa chi raihaowa kala awui khomphānao khuiphungda zatuwa.
Hi shokthang zimiksho chi Sabbathna.
Chieina Jihudibingna raikahaia mi chili hānga, “Aja Sabbathna, nana nawui khomphānao khuikaphung hi masāpaimana.”
Ana ngahānkai, “Ili raikhamepana, nawui khomphānao khuiphungda zatulu” da hānga.
Athumna “Nali nawui khomphānao khuiphungda zatlu kachipa chi khipākhala?” da ngahāna.
Kha na ali raikhame mipa chi khipākhala da matheithuwa, kaja apam chili mi ngazināhaida Jishu thuihairasai.
Khaleilaga Jishuna ali khorumshimli samphangda hānga, “Yanglu, ara na phāhaira. Morei masāluialu, chithākha nawuitungli khikha zakshikhamei mashokluimara.”
Chieina mipa chi zatthuihaowa kala ana ali raikhami chi Jishuna da Jihudiwui akhavābingli ahānga.
Hiwui vang eina Jihudibingna Jishuli rekharekphoka kaja ana sabbath zimiksholi kazāt raimihaowa.
Kha Jishuna ngahānkai, “Iwui Avā ot sāchingda lei, ila sāphalungra.”

Hi kashā eina Jihudiwui akhavābingna ali shaothat khavai lungsanmeihaowa kaja ana Sabbathwui ain sakakhaimāng maningla Vareli a khalattawui Avāva̱na jihaowa, kala a khalatta Vareli ngaraichā ngasakhaowa.
Avāva̱na Anaomayarali leishihaoda awui kasāsā saikora chitheisera. Ana hili hakkhamei ot eina tangda ali chitheira, chieina nathum matakhakhaora.
Avāva̱na kathebingli ringkhangasak thada Anaomayaranala ana ringngasakkhangaibingli kharing kaho chi mira.
Avāva̱na khipālikha bichar masāmara, kha bichar saikora Anaomayarali mihaira.
Chieina mi saikorana Avāva̱li khayākashi tākam eina Anaomayaralila khayāshira. Kachikathāna Anaomayarali khayāmashiakha ali kashirāta Avāva̱li khayāmakashina.
“Kachangkhat eina nathumli kahāngna, iwui tui shāda ili kashirātali shitkasanga a chi katang makhavai kharing lei. Ali bichar masāmara, kha kathiwui eina kharingli kanshok kahaina.
Avāva̱ khalattawuili kharing khalei thada Anaomayaralila kharing chi mihaira,
kala bichar sākhavai ali pangshap mihaira, kachiwui vangkhala kaja a miwui Naomayarana.
Hili matakhak kahai masaalu, kaja kathebingna chikhurwui eina awui akhon shāda,
kaphā sākahaibingna kharingwui ringkhalui kala makaphā sākahaibingna bicharwui ringkhaluiwui vang shokki kaji atam rārāli.
“Ina I khalattawui vang shākhi saakha ina kahāng hi akachang maningmana da hāngpai.
Kha khangatei akhana iwui vang shākhi mida khaleina, kala chipāna iwui pongli shākhi mida khalei hi khamashungana da ina thei.
Nathumna Johnwuili mi chihovāda theihaira kaja ana khamashung chili shākhi mi.
Ina mikumowui shākhi samphangkhangai maningmana kha nathumli huikhui khavaiwui vangna.
John hiya sharkahai kahora thaomei kathāna, kala nathumna kasha̱khawui vang kahor chili pamngai.
Kha iwui vang ina khami shākhi china Johnna khami shākhili hakmei, kaja iwui Avāna sālu da mikahai ina sāda khalei ot hina ili iwui Avāna kashirātna kajiwui shākhina.
Ili kashirāta iwui Avāna iwui shākhina. Nathumna awui khon mashālakranga, azakla matheilakranga.
Nathumli awui tui marāzangranga, kaja ana chihokharāpa chi nathumna mashitsangmana.
Nathumna kathara lairikli phai, kaja katang makhavai kharing chi chili samphangra da phaninga; kala iwui vang shakhi sakhami chi chibing china,
kha kharing samphang khavai nathumna iwuili marāngaimana.
Ina mikumowui masot maphāmana.
Kha nathumwui wuklungli Varewui leikashi maleimana kaji ina thei.
Ina iwui Avāwui ming eina rai, kha nathumna ili makhuisangmana. Khangatei akhana a khalattawui ming eina raakha nathumna ali khuisangra.
Nathum akha eina akha sochikat khangarok ningchānga, kha Varewui kaso chi samphang khavai maphāmana. Chithākha nathumna kathada shitsangpairakhala?
Ina iwui Avāwui mangāli nathumli khayon mira da maphaningalu. Kha nathumna kachihāna Mosesna nathumli khayon mira.
Nathumna Mosesli shitsangsi kaja ilila shitsangra, khikhalajila ana iwui pongli kagapina.
Kha nathumna awui kapi kahai chili mashitsanglaga ina hāngkahai chili kathada shitsangrakhala?”
Kakazānaobingli matakhak kahai otsak eina raimi kahai chi theida mi kachungkhana ali shurrai.
Jishuna kaphung akhali kāda awui sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda apama.
Chitharan Jihudiwui Makānkhami phanit chi nganaihairasai.
Jishuna kapeiungda mi kachungkha rakharā chi kathei eina ana Philipli hānga, “Mi hiyākhali mizā khavai kashakazā kali alorakhala?”
Hi Philipli chāng yangkida kasāna, kachangkhat khi sarakhala kaji ana thei.
Philipna ngahānkai, “Mi hiyakhali kateteo mizā khavai lupā shakhani eina lolala kalikha matangmara.”
Khangatei sākhangatha̱ akha, Simon Peterwui agato Andrewna hānga,
“Naoshinao akhana khamui phangā, khai khani da khuiphungda lei, kha mi hiyākhali china kali tangra?”
“Mi katongali pamzang ngasaklu,” da Jishuna hānga. Kaja chili khawo kachungkha phorsai. Chieina mi katonga pamzanga, saikora chi mayarnao thingphangā shākhana.
Jishuna khamui chi khuida seihā samihailaga kapambing chili yaowa. Khaih chila khuida chi tākam eina sai, kala mi saikora thoserhaowa.
Athum thoting kahai eina Jishuna sākhangatha̱bingli hānga, “Shaineng chi ngamuikhuilu, kateokhala mashimān ngasakalu.”
Chieina khamui phangā chi mibingna shailaga shaineng luk tharāda khani pemda ngamuikhui.
Matakkhak kahai ot kasā chi theilaga mibingna, “Kachangkhat okathuili rāki kaje marān chi alaka” da hānga.
kala marikong tonglaga shamadru kānda Caperna-umvāk latunga. Ngayāhailala Jishuna athumwuili maunglakthuwa.
Chitharan siphan zingrot ungda tara̱ ngaphaokazamhaowa.
Athumna kilometer phangā tharuk huivā kahaiwui thili Jishuna tara̱tungli zatta marikhongvāk rākharā chi athumna theida ngacheelakhaowa.
Kha Jishuna athumli, “Mangacheealu, ina” da hānga.
Jishuna marikhongli kākatong eina athum ringphālakhaowa, kala ngalāngda athumna vāki kaji apam ngalei kathengli vāshunghaowa.
Akhama kathā shamadru vāklaida leikasābingna marikhong akhamāng leikasā chi thei, kala Jishuna sākhangatha̱bingli mangasola athummāng marikhong tonglaga thuikahai chila thei.
Chitharan Tiberiaswui eina kharā marikhongbing chi, Prohona seihā sālaga mi kachungkhali khamui mikashai apam chiwui ngalemli rāngasāma.
Mibingna Jishula, sākhangatha̱bingla chili mazangmana kaji theida marikhong chili kātonglaga Capernaumli Jishuli phāvai.
Mibingna shamadruwui lākhavāk Jishuli kāsamphangda hānga, “Ojā, na katharan hili rāshung kajikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna ili kaphā hi machut kathei chiwui vang maningmana, kha khamui shaida katho samkaphangwui vangna.

Shimānki kaji kashakazāwui vang ngalang mazāralu, kha miwui Naomayarana nathumli miki kaji katang makhavai kharinga kashakazāwui vang ngalangzarlu, kachiwui vangkhala kaja Varena awui mayākhamiwui mahor ali nammihaira.”
Chieina athumna ngahāna, “Varewui ot sākhavai ithumna khi sāngayikhala?”
Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Ana shirātkharāpa chili shitkasang hi Varena sāngasakkhangai chilaka.”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Ithumna theilaga nali shitsang khavai nana khi machut leikhala? Nana khi sahairakhala?
Ishawo ishayi ngarāna lamhāngli manna zai kaji kathara lairikli hithada hānghaida lei; chiya, ‘Ana athumwui zākhavai kazingramwui eina khamui mi.’”
Jishuna hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumli kazingramwui khamui khame chi Moses maningmana, kha iwui Avāna kazingramwui eina khamina.
Kaja kazingramwui eina tālaga apuk-apagali kharing manglā khami chi Varewui khamuina.”
Athumna Jishuli hānga, “Amei, ithumli khamui chi michinglu.”
Jishuna hānga, “I kharingawui kashakazāna, ili kharā mi chi mathaimara, kala ili shitkasanga mi chi mara̱changlakmara.
Kha ina kahāng hina kaja nathumna ili theihailala mashitsangmana.
Avāna ili khamibing saikora china ili rāra, kala ili kharā mi chili ina mahorhaimara.
Kaja ina kazingramwui eina katā hi I khalattawui ningkachāng maningmana, kha ili kashirātawui ningkachāng sākhavaina.
Ili kashirātana ili sāngasakkhangai chi hina; chiya, ana ili mikahai saikora chi akhala mashimān ngasakla khanao zimiksholi ina athumli ringshok ngasakserphalungra.
Hi iwui Avāwui ningkachāngna kaja Anaomayarali theilaga ali shitkasangbingli katang makhavai kharing samphang ngasakra. Kala khanaowa zimiksholi ina ali ringshok ngasakra.”
“I kazingramwui eina katā kashakazāna” da Jishuna kahāngwui vang Jihudibingna kapupta matui.
Chieina athumna hānga, “Mipa hi Josephwui naomayara maningmala? Ashi ava̱ eina avāva̱li ithum thei. Chithākha ana kathada kazingram eina katāna jikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathum kapupta mamatuialu.
Ili kashirāta iwui Avāna rākhangasak maningla khipākha ili marārarmara, raakha ina ali khanaowa zimiksholi ringshok ngasakra.
Marānbingna hithada kapihaida lei: ‘Athum saikorali Varena tamchitheira.’ Avāva̱li nganāsangda awui eina tamkakhuia mi kachiva̱ iwuili rai.
Varewui eina kharā chi maningla khipākha Avāva̱li matheiranga; Varewui eina kharā amāngna thei.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, shitkasanga mi chi katang makhavai kharing samphanga.
I kharingawui kashakazāna.
Nathumwui avāngarana lamhāngli manna zai, kha thihaowa.
Kazingramwui eina katā kashakazā chiya zālaga makathi china.
I kazingramwui eina katā kharinga kashakazāna. Kachikathāna hi zaakha a katang mavaila ringra kala apuk-apaga ringkhavai ina miki kaji kashakazā chiya iwui asāna.”
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, miwui Naomayarawui asā mashaiakha kala ashee mamangakha nathumwuili kharing kaho maleimana.
Iwui asā kashai kala iwui ashee khamang a china katang makhavai kharing samphangra, kala ali khanaowa zimiksholi ringshok ngasakra.
Kaja iwui asā hi shaikhavailaka kala iwui ashee hi mangkhavailaka.
Iwui asā kashaia kala ashee khamanga chi ili lei kala I ali lei.
Ili kharinga Avāva̱na kashirātna kala awui vang I kharingna. Chithada sāda iwui asā kashaia chi iwui vang eina ringa.
Hi kazingramwui eina katā khamui china, navā ngarāna shailaga thikahai khamui kathā maningmana. Kashakazā hi kazā mi chi katang mavaila ringra.”
Hi ana Capernaumwui synagogueli tamchitheida kahāng tuina.
Jishuwui athi kashura kachungkhana hi shāda hānga, “Tamkachithei tui hi saknāli, khipāna nganākhuipairakhala?”
Sākhangatha̱bingna kapumkakaseo chi theida Jishuna hānga, “Nathumla mamayāngaimala?
Nathumna miwui Naomayarana rida ana pamkasā awui apamli kāluishit kaji theisi kaja khi phaningra?
Manglā china kharing chi khamina, asā hiya aremana; ina nathumli hāngkahai tui chi manglā kala kharingana.
Kha nathum kaikhana mashitsangmana.” Kaja haokaphokwui eina athum mashitsangmana kala khipāna ali hatrakhala kaji Jishuna thei.
Chieina Jishuna hānga, “Hiwui vang eina nathumli hānghaira kaja Avāva̱na khamayāpā chi maningla khipākha iwuili marārarmara.”
Chiwui thili athi kashura mi kachungkha mashurluithuwa.
Jishuna tharāda khani chili hānga, “Nathumla ngalanthuingaila?”
Simon Peterna ngahānkai, “Proho, ithum khipāwuili varakhala? Namāngli makashimān kharing tui chi lei.
Ara ithum shitsanghaira, kala ithumna theihaira, Varewui Tharkhamathengapa chi nalaka.”
Hi ana Simon Iscariotwui naomayara Judas, tharāda khaniwui ngachaili ali hatki kajipawui pongli kahāngna.
Hiwui thili Jishuna Galileeli yaovai. A Judeali mavāngaithuwa, kaja chili khalei Jihudibingna ali shaothat khavai rimhaowa.
Chitharan Jihudiwui Tabernacle phanit nganailakhairasai.
Chieina Jishuwui agato ngarāna ali hānga, “Nawui sākhangatha̱bingna nana sāda khalei theikhavai hili mapamluila Judeali ungulu,
kaja khamaho ningkachāngbingna awui otsak ngathumda kasā khangachā maningmana, hikathā hi saga jiakha na khalatta apuk-apagva̱li chitheilu.”
Achinā ngarā eina tangda ali mashitsangmana.
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Iwui atam marāranga, kha nathumwui vanga sāpaichinga.
Okathuina nathumli maningkachairarmana, kha ili ningkachai, kaja chiwui otsakbing chi makaphāna da ina hāngching kajiwui vangna.
Nathum Phanit chili azanglu, iya mavāfamara kaja iwui atam marāranga.”
Ana hi hānghailaga ava Galileeli pamsanghaowa.
Agato ngarā vākahaiwui thili Jishuna vai, kha phonglāk eina mazatla ngayinzata.
Jihudiwui akhavābingna, “Jishu kali leikhala” da ngathinglaga phāzata.
Mibingna Jishuwui pongli ngazek ngaroka; kaikhana “A kaphā mina” ji, kala kaikhana “Mibingli ana thannguihaira” da hānga.
Chithālala Jihudiwui akhavābingli ngacheehaoda khipākha awui pongli phonglāk eina mamatuilengmana.
Phanit chi alung zangkahai eina Jishuna khorumshimli zangda tamchithei.
Jihudiwui akhavābingna matakhakhaida hānga, “Mipa hi lairik matamlakla kathada hiyākha theihaokhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina tamkachithei hi iwui eina kashok maningla, ili kashirāta Varewui eina kharāna.
Kachikathāna Varewui ningkachāng chi sāngaida leiakha, ina tamkachithei hi Varewui eina kharākā, I khalattawui sāshap eina khamatuikhala kaji theira.
Khalatawui sāshap eina khamatuia china khalattawui maikhayā phai, kha ali kashirātawui maikhayā kaphā a chi khamashungana kala awuili sākakhaning maleimana,
Mosesna ain khami maningmala? Kha nathum khipākha ain chi mamayonmana. Khiwui vang eina nathumna ili shaothat khavai hotkhanākhala?”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Chipee zanghaira, nali khipāna shaothatra jikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina matakhak kahai ot akha sai, kala nathum saikora matakhakhai.
Mosesna nathumwui naongarāli ahui rimshok khavai kasoi, (kachangkhatpāva Mosesna maningla nawo ngarāna haokaphokna) kala nathumna nanaongarali Sabbath zimiksholi ahui rimshoka.
Moseswui ain makai khavai Sabbath zimiksholi ahui rimshokmiakha ina Sabbaththang kakazā mi akhali raikhamiwui vang khisāda malungvātkhala?
Zakmai eina bichar masaalu; kha khamashung eina bichar sālu.”
Jerusalemwui mi kaikhana hānga, “Akhavābingna shaothatra kaji mipa chi hi maningmala?
Yanglu, ana phonglāk eina matuilala khipānakha awuitungli mahāngmana. Kathānabingla a hi Khrista china da theihaola?
Messiah kharā tharan a kachiwui eina rākhala da khipākha matheimara. Kha mipa hi kachiwui eina kharākhala kaji ithum thei.”

Jishuna khorumshimli tamchitheida panglāk eina hānga, “Nathum ili theila kala I kachiwui eina kharākhala kaji thei kachangkhatla? Iningsasak eina kharā maningmana, kha ili kashirāta a chi khamashungana. Nathum ali matheiranga.
Kha iya ali thei, kaja I awui eina kharāna kala ana ili kashirātna.”
Chieina athumna ali tukkhui khavai sai, kha khipānakha ali pāng maparmana, kaja awui atam marārangsai.
Thālala yaruiwui ngachaili mi kachungkhana ali shitsanga kala athumna hānga, “Messiah kharā tharan mipā hina kasāli lāngmeida sāshaprala?”
Mibingna Jishuwui maramli kakhalop chi Phariseebingna shai, chieina pāngmon akhokabing eina Phariseebingna Jishuli tukkhui khavai akhavābing chihovai.
Chieina Jishuna hānga, “Ina nathumli kasha̱nakhawui vang ngasopamra, chiwui thili ili kashirātawui ngalemli vahaora.
Nathumna ili phālala masamphangluimara; I khaleipamli nathum marārarmara.”
Jihudi akhavābing athum eina athum ngazek ngaroka, “A kali vaukida ali maphākhuirarmara kajikhala? Ithumwui mibing chaida khalei Greeknaowui keinungbingli vāda Greeknaobingli atamchitheira kajila?
Ana ‘Nathumna phālala ili masamphangluimara kala ina vāki kaji apamli nathum marārarmara’ da kahāng hi khisa-uyi kajikhala?”
Kathara Lairikli hāngkahai thada ‘Kachikathāna ili shitsangakha awui wuklung eina kharing tara̱wui kongra̱ longshokra.’”
Hi ali shitkasangbingna samphangki kaji Manglāwui tui kahāngna. Kaja Jishuna tekhamatei eina maringshokrangsāthuda Manglā chi mamirangsai.
Kaikhana hānga, “A Khrista china.” Kha kaikhana “Khrista hi Galileewui eina rāmaraola?
Kathara lairikli hāngkahai Messiah chi Davidwui shangnaora kala Davidna pamkasa keinung Bethlehemli pharāra” da hanghaili ji.
Hithada sāda athumwui ngachaili Jishuwui maramli ning ngakai khangarok shokhaowa.
Kaikhana Jishuli tukkhuingai, kha khipānakha pāng maparmana.
Pāngmon akhokabing eina Phariseebingna kachiho akhavābing chi latkhaung tharan, “Khisāda ali matukkhuithukhala?” da ngahāna.
Mibing china ngahānkai, “Mipā hina khamatui thada khipānakha mamatuilakmana!”
Chieina Phariseebingna “Nathumlila ana pāngasakhaola?
Kathāna maningakha Phariseewui ngachaili kachikathā ali shitkasang khaleihairala?
Kha ain makathei ashangva̱ hili khonshihaira.”
Jishuli rida asamphang kahaia Nicodemusla chili leisai. Ana athumli hānga,
“Ithumwui ain athishurda mi akhali bichar sālaga khayon matheiranglakha khayon mamipaimana.”
Chieina athumna ngahānkai, “Nala Galileewui eina kharāla? Kathara Lairik pāyanglu, kachilikha Galileewui eina marān mashoklakmana kaji theira.”
Athum ichāchāwui shimli ungserhaowa,
Kha Jishuva Olive phungreili kāhaowa.
Akhama kathā ngathorthakva Jishuna khorumshimli latunga. Chili yarui katongana ali rākuinampama kala pamzangda athumli tamchitheiphoka.
Chitharan phophākasā sha̱nao akha ain kathembing eina Phariseebingna tukrāda saikorawui mangāli nganing ngasaka.
Athumna Jishuli hānga, “Ojā, sha̱nao hi phophā mahunglakha tukkakhuina.
Hikatha sha̱naoli lunggui eina horthatphalungra da ithumwui ainli Mosesna kasohaida lei. Nana khi phaningkhala?”
Jishuwui khayon tukkhui khavai athumna kahāng kasāna. Kha Jishuna kui mashunzangda pāngmareng eina ngaleili kapi.
Athumna ngahānshon kaji eina Jishuna nganingkāda hānga, “Morei masālak kaje mi china sha̱naopava̱ hili lunggui eina thamrithuiranu.”
Chieina ana hamzangluishitta ngaleili kapiluishita.
Athumna tui chi shālaga athum ava̱va̱ ngamenthui mamānhaowa; khararra eina thuida khangano tāshungda thuiserhaida sha̱naopava̱ chimāng Jishuwui mangāli nganingda leisai.
Chieina Jishuna yangkāda sha̱nao chili hānga, “He sha̱nao, athum kali vāserhaokhala? Nali khayon mikhavai khipākha maleithula?”
“Khipakha maleilakmana, Amei” da ana ngahānkai. “Phai, chithākha inala nali khayon mamimana. Zatulu, laga morei masāluialu.”
Phariseebingna hānga, “Na khalattawui vang shākhi khamina, nana kahāng chi khamashung maleimana.”

Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina khalattawui shākhi milala iwui shākhi hi khamashungana, kachiwui vangkhala kaja I kachi eina rākhala kala kachili vāra̱khala kaji ina thei. Kha nathum I rākhavaila, vākhavaila matheimana.
Nathumna okathuiwui apong eina bichar sai, iya khipālikha bichar masāmana.
Ina bichar sāsālala chi khamashungana, kaja imāng maningla ili kashirāta iwui Avā inina kasāna.
Nathumwui ainli shākhi khani ngaraichā eina miakha aniwui kahāng chi khamashungana da kapihai.
Ina iwui vang shākhi mi kala ili kashirāta Avāva̱nala iwui vang shākhi mi.”
Chieina athumna, “Nashavā kachili leikhala?” da ngahāna.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathumna ilila iwui Avālila matheimana, ili nathumna theisi kaja iwui Avālila theihairasaki kajina.”
Jishuna saikora hi khorumshimwui lan haikhavai kāli tamchitheida kahāngna. Kha khipānakha ali matukkhuimana, kachiwui vangkhala kaja awui atam marārangsai.
Chieina Jihudiwui akhavābingna hānga, “Mipa hina ‘Ina vāki kaji chili nathum marārarmara’ jili. A khalatta ngaronthihaora kajila?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathuma azingwui einana, iva atungwui einana; nathumva okathui hiwuina, iva okathui hiwui maningmana.
Nathum nathumwui moreili thira da ina hānghaira, kaja ‘I chi ilaka’ kaji mashitsangakha nathum nathumwui moreili thira.
“Na khipākhala?” da athumna ngahāna. Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina haokaphokwui eina nathumli hāngkahaina.
Nathumli hāngkhavai kala bichar sākhavai kachungkha lei; ili kashirāta chi khamashungna, kala ina awui eina shākakhui chi okathuili kahāngna.”
Jishuna Avāva̱wui pongli kahāngna kaji athumna matheimana.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Nathumna miwui Naomayarali khāngkakā chitharan ‘I chi ilaka’ kaji theinaora, kala iwui sāshap eina maningla, Avāva̱na tamchithei kahai chi kahāngna kaji theikhuira.
Ili kashirāta chi ili ngasodalei; imāngli ana mahorhaimana, kaja ina awui ningyāngkhaung chi sāchinga.”
Jishuna hi kahāng kashā mi kachungana ali shitsanga.
Nathumna khamashung chi theikhuira kala khamashung china nathumli ningkhān ngasakra.”
Rao akhana shimkhur chiwui mi mangasāchingmana, kha naomayara chi shimkhur chiwui ngasāchinga.
Chieina Anaomayarana nathumli ningkhān ngasakakha, nathum ningkhān kachangkhathaira,
nathum Abrahamwui naotunna kaji ina thei, laga nathumna iwui tamkachithei mamayāmada ili shaothat khavai sai.
Ina iwui Avāli ngasoda theirum kahai chi nathumli kahāngna, kala nathumna navā ngarāwui eina shākakhui chi kasāna.”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Abraham chi ithumwui avāva̱na.”
Jishuna hānga, “Nathum Abrahamwui nao kachangkhatsi kaja ana kasā thada nathumla sāra.
Kha Varewui eina shākhuilaga nathumli khamashung tui chi khamatui ili nathumna shaothat khavai ngarānda lei. Abrahamna hithada masālakmana.
“Nathumna navā ngarāwui thada sāda lei.”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Ithum shāmnao maningmana. Ithumwui Avāva̱ Vare akha lei.”
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Vare hi nathumwui Avāva̱na jisi kaja ili leishiki kajina, kaja I Varewui eina kharāna, kala I hili leili. I khalatta marāmana. Varena chihokharāna.
Kathada ina kahāng nathum bhap matāthukhala? Chiya nathum iwui tui khanganā makhāngkhararwui vangna.

Nathum nathumwui avāva̱ chipee chiwuina, chieina nawui sākhangaiva nathumwui avāwui ningkachāng kasā china. Haokaphokwui eina a mi khayumana, kala khamashung ot masālakmana, kaja awuili khamashung maleimana. Kakapik hi awui khangachāna, kaja a kakapikana kala kakapik saikorawui avāva̱na.
Kha ina khamashung tui khamatuiwui vang nathumna ili mashitsangmana.
I morei sāhaira kaji nathum khipāna hāngshaprakhala? Ina khamashung tui hāngakha, nathum khisāda mashitsangmakhala?
Varewui mi china Varewui tui nganai; nathum Varewui mi maningthuda awui tui makhanganāna.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ili chipee mazangmana, iya iwui Avāli khayāshi, kha nathumna ili khayāmashimana.
Chitha-ilala I khalattawui khayākakā maphāmana; chi kaphā Akha lei, kala ana bicharwo sāra.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, iwui tui khanganāpa chi mathilakmara.”
Jihudibingna ali hānga, “Ara ithumna theikachangkhathaira kaja nali chipee ngasoda lei. Abraham thihaira, marānbingla thihaira, kha kachikathāna nawui tui nganaakha mathilakmara da nana hāngda lei.
Thikahaia ithumwui avāva̱ Abrahamli kala thikahaia marānbingli na hakmeilā? Na khipāna kajikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina khalattali tekmatei ngasakta leiakha, iwui tekhamatei chi khikha maningmana; ili tekmatei khangasak chi nathumna nathumwui Varelaka da kahānga a chilaka.
Nathum ali matheilakranga, iya theihaira. Ina theihailaga matheimana jisi kaja ila nathum thada kakapikana. Kha iya ali thei kala awui kahāng nganai.
Nathumwui avāva̱ Abrahamna iwui kharā zimiksho theira da ringphai; kala ana chi theida ringphakhaihaowa.”
Jihudibingna hānga, “Na zingkum hangphangā makāranga, laga na Abrahamli thei kajila?”
Jishuna hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, Abraham mapharāranglakha I leisai.”
Chieina athumna lunggui ngamuikhuilaga Jishuli horkida sai; kha Jishuna khorumshimwui eina ngathum sāda shokhaowa.
Jishuna rākhamakān tharan kapharāwui eina mik khangapeo akha thei.
Sākhangatha̱bingna ngahāna, “Ojā, mik ngapeoda kapharā chi khipāwui moreikhala, awuika ava̱ avāwui moreikhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Awui mik khangapeo chi awui moreiwui vang maningmana, ava̱ avāwui moreiwui vangla maningmana. Kha Varewui pangshap awui eina theingasak khavaina.
Ngashun horda leilakha ili kashirātawui ot chi ithum sāphalungra. Ngayā kharā tharan khipānakha masārarmara.
I okathuili leilakha eina tangda ina okathuiwui kahorna.”
Chi hānghailaga, Jishuna ngaleili machora̱ mashosangda ngalei chi manātkhuilaga mipā chiwui mikli neomi,
kala hānga, “Siloam (hiwui kakhalata chihokhava kajina) ra̱khongli apheohaolu.” Chieina ana apheotāhailaga amik theida ungrārāsai.
Awui theisābing kala ali rida theikasabingna ngahāna, “Mipa hi kayāngli pokapampa chi maningmala?”
Kaikhana “Chipana” da hānga, kha kaikhana “Maningmana, azak khangaruina” da hānga, Chieina ana hānga, “I chipā chilaka.”
“Kathada namik kathei samphanghaokhala?” da athumna ngahāna.
Ana ngahānkai, “Jishu kaho china imikli leipā kateokha neomilaga Siloam ra̱khongli apheotāhaolu, da hānga. Chieina ina vālaga apheotākhaleoda theihaowa.”
“A kali leikhala?” da athumna ngahāna. Kha ana matheimana jihaowa.
Chieina mik ngapeokasāpa chili Phariseebingwuili khuivai.
Jishuna leipā neomilaga mik theikhangasak chi Sabbath zimikshona.
Chieina mipa chili kathada kathei samphanghaokhala kaji Phariseebingna ngahānluishita. Ana ngahānkai, “Ana imikli leipā kateokha neomilaga ina pheotākhaleoda kathei samphanga.”

Pharisee kaikhana hānga, “Hi kasā mipa hi Varewui eina kharā maningmana, kaja ana Sabbath mamayonmana.” Khangatei kaikhana hānga, “Morei kaphunga mina kathada hiyākha hakkhamahā ot sāshaprakhala?” Hithada athumwui ngachaili ning kaikhangarok shokhaowa.
Chiwui thili Phariseebingna mipā chili ngahānluishita, “Nali ana mik theingasaka jihaira. Phai thākha a hi khipākhala?” Chieina ana, “A marān akhana” da ngahānkai.
Chithālala Jihudibingna mipa chiwui ava̱-avāli mangahānranglakha mik ngapeosālaga ara theihaira kaji mashitsangngaithuwa,
kala anili hokhuida hānga, “Hi naniwui naola? Ali mik ngapeoda pharāla? Kathada ana kathei samphanghaokhala?”
Ava̱ eina avāva̱ china ngahānkai, “A iniwui naolaka, kala mik ngapeoda pharālāka.
kha ana kathada theihaokhala kaji ini matheimana, kala khipāna rakngasakhala kajila matheimana. Ali ngahānlu, a khararnaona, ana ngahānkāmishapra.”
Ava̱ eina avāva̱na Jihudibingli khangacheewui vang chithada hāngkahaina, kaja Jishuli Khristana da hāngkaphata chili synagoguewui eina aming katathaora da Jihudibingna mayā khangarok sahairasai.
Chiwui vang anina “A khararnaona, ali ngahānlu!” da hāngkahaina.
Athumna mik ngapeoda kapharā mi chili kakhane holuishitta hānga, “Vareli masot milu. Mipa chi morei kaphunga mina da ithumna thei.”
Ana hānga, “Mipa chi morei phunga, maphungmana kaji I matheimana; ina kathei akhava, I mik ngapeosai, ara theihaira.”
Athumna ngahāna, “Ana nali khi samikhala? Namik kathada rakngasakkhala?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Ina nathumli hānghaira, kha nathumna manganāsangmana. Chi khisāda nganāngaishonhaokhala? Nathumla awui sākhangatha̱ sangaila?”
Athumna ali zeida hānga, “Na awui sākhangatha̱na; ithuma Moseswui sākhangatha̱bingna.
Mosesli Varena ngazeka kaji ithumna thei, kha mipā hi kaji eina rākhala kaji ithum matheimana.”
Ana hānga, “Hi matakhak kahai otna! A kachiwui eina rākhala kaji nathum matheimana, kha ana imik rakngasakhaira.
Varena morei kaphungbingli mashāmimana, kaji ithumna thei, kha ali khokharuma kala awui ningkachāng kasā athumli Varena shāmi.
Okathui haokaphok eina thuida mik ngapeoda kapharā mili mi akhana theingasaka kaji mashālakranga.
Mipā hi Varewui eina kharā maningsi kaje ana khiotkha masārarmara”
Athumna ngashimshida hānga, “Nava moreilungli pharāsang kahai mina, laga ithumli tamchitheiki kajila?” Chieina athumna ali synagoguewui eina aming katathaowa.
Mipa chili synagoguewui eina aming katathaira kaji Jishuna shai; kala thangkha samkaphang eina ali hānga, “Na miwui Naomayarali shitsangla?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Amei, a khipākhala? Ili kahāngmilu, chieina ina ali shitsangpaira.”
Jishuna hānga, “Na ali theihaira, kala arui nali ngazekta khaleipa hi alaka.”
Mipa china “Proho, I shitsanga” da hānga kala ali khoruma.
Jishuna hānga, “Ina okathuili bichar sākhavai kharāna. Chieina mik khangapeobingna kathei samphangra kala katheibingna ngapeohaora.”
Chili leikasā Pharisee kaikhana chi shāda ngahāna, “Ithumla mik ngapeowa kajila?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Nathum mik ngapeosi kaja khayon maleimara, kha nathumna ‘Ithuma thei’ jihaokada yonda lei.”
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, kaja yaoshangli khamong eina marāzangla apong khangatei eina yakkālaga kharā mipa chi khalena kala khangaponana.
Kha khamong eina kazanga mi chi yaokahomana.
Ngavei khamayonana ali shomi; yaobingna awui akhon shai, kala yaobingli kachichāwui aming eina hoda thānshoka.
Ana homshokserhailaga athumwui mangali thānzata kala yaobingna awui thi shurra, kaja athumna awui akhon machuta.
Athumna makatheiali mashurphāphāmana, kha athumwui eina yāma, kaja athumna awui akhon mamachutmana.”
Jishuna chānjam hi athumli hānga, kha khi kahāngkhala kaji athumna matheirarmana.
Chieina Jishuna hāngluishita, “Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna; ina yaobingwui khamongna.
Ili rida kharā khangateibing saikora khale kala khangaponabingna, yaobingnala athumwui akhon manganāmana.
I khamongna; kachikathāna iwui eina zangakha ali huimira, kala shok-zangda wonnui samphangra.
Khale china leekhavai, sāthat khavai kala sāshimān khavai rai, ina rākhami hiya athum kharing samphang khavai, kala chi pemtha̱da samphang khavaina.
Yaokahoma makhaninga kaja masākakhuia mi china kharang rārāli da kathei eina yaobingli chihohailaga yāmhaowa, kala kharang china yaobingli tukkhayāngda kashamyānghaowa.
Masākakhuia mi china yaobingli mashivamada yāma.
I kaphā yaokahomana; ina iwui yaobingli thei kala iwui yaobingnala ili thei,
Avāna ili kathei thada inala iwui Avāli thei; kala ina yaobingwui vang imanglā chihomi.
Yaoshang hili makazang yao khangateila lei. Ina athumlila houngphalungra, kala athumna iwui akhon shāra. Chieina yaoshang akhamāngra, yaokahomala akhamāngra.
“Hiwui vang eina Avāna ili leishi kaja ina iwui manglā samphanglui khavai imirin chigata.
Khipānakha iwui eina makhuithuimana kha iningsasak eina kachigatna. Ina manglā chigatkashap kala khuiluikashapwui pangshap lei. Hi iwui Avāwui eina samkaphangna.”
Athumwui ngachaili kachungkhana hānga, “Ali chipee zanghaida pāhaira. Khisāda awui tui nganākhala?”
Kha kaikhana hānga, “Chipee kazanga mi akhana hithada mamatuimara, chipeena mik khangapeopawui mik rakngasakpairala?”
Hi Jerusalemli Dharkat Phanit kasā atamna,
chi sikachāngna. Jishuna khorumshimli khalei Solomonwui yāngkhupli zatsai.
Chieina Jihudibingna ali rākuinamda hānga, “Nana ithumli karankha ningmaong ngasakrakhala? Na Khrista china jiakha tharlak eina hānglu.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina nathumli hānghaira, kha nathumna mashitsangmana. Ina iwui Avāwui ming eina kasāsā china iwui vang shākhina.
Kha nathumna mashitsangmana, khiwui vangkhala kaja nathum iwui yaonao maningmana.
Iwui yaobingna iwui akhon shai; ina athumli thei, kala athumna ili shura.
Ina athumli makashimān kharing mi, chieina athum mathilākmara, kala athumli khipānakha iwui eina mangapaithuimara.
Ili khame iwui Avāna saikorali reimei, kala athumli khipānakha iwui Avāwui pāng eina mangapaikhuirarmara.
Iwui Avā eina I akhana.”
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Ina nathumwui mangāli iwui Avāwui eina kaphā ot kachungkha chitheimi kahaiwui vang ili lunggui eina horki kajila?”
Jihudibingna ngahānkai, “Nana kaphākasāwui vang lunggui eina horki kaji maningmana, kha Vareli kachipatwui vangna. Na mikumona, laga nakhalatta Vare sākhui.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Varena hāngkahai nathumwui ain lairikli kapi kahai lei; ‘Nathum kameonaobingna.’
Kathara lairikli kapi kahai hi mashimānda mashunga kaji ithumna thei, kala Varena chikathābingli kameonao hoi, chikathābingli ana awui chānpao miya.
Ili Varena kapangkhuilaga chihokharāna. Chithākha I Varewui Naomayarana da kahāng hili Vareli kachipat khi leikhala?
Ina iwui Avāwui ot masaakha ilila mashitsangalu.
Kha ina iwui Avāwui ot sāda leilakha ili mashitsanglala iwui otsak chili shitsanglu. Chithākha iwui Avāna ili lei kala ina iwui Avāwuili lei kaji nathumna theishingkhuipaira.”
Chili mi kachungkha awuili rāda ali hānga, “Johnna machut masāmana, kha ana mipa hiwui maramli kahāng saikora mashungsera.”
Apam chili mi kachungkhana Jishuli shitsanghaowa.
Mary hi Prohowui pheili nganamkaphā thao neomilaga awui kuisam eina mitkhamiva̱ china. Kazākasā Lazarus hi apāna.
Chonnaoni hina Jishuli pao chihovāda hānga, “Proho, nawui leikashe ngasota kazāhaira.”
Jishuna pao chi kashā eina hānga, “He thitchangki kajiwui kazāt maningmana, kha Vareli tekmatei khavaiwui vangna, chieina Varewui Naomayarana tekhamatei samphang khavaiwui apongna.”
Jishuna Martha eina agatuiva̱ kala apā Lazarusli leishilāka.
Kha Lazarus kazāda lei kaji shālala Jishuna apam chili khanithang pamsangluihaowa.
Chiwui thili Jishuna sākhangatha̱bingli “Judeali latungusa” da hānga.
Chieina sākhangatha̱bingna ngahānkai, “Ojā, achonthangcham nali Jihudibingna lunggui eina horkida sai, laga chili latungusa kajila?”
Jishuna hānga, “Thangkhali pung tharāda khani maleimala? Mina ngashunshong zatakha phei mangaphokmana, kaja ana apuk-apagawui kahor chi thei.
Kha ngayāshong zatakha phei ngaphoka, kaja kahor chi awuili maleimana.”
Jishuna hithada hānglui, “Ithumwui ngasota Lazarus pivāhaira, kha ina ali kapiwui eina amathotkhuira.”
Sākhangatha̱bingna ngahānkai, “Proho, a pivā kahai ngasāsaakha raihaora.”
Kha Jishuva Lazarus thihaira kaji kahāngna. Athuma khangachā kapi-eili da phaningkasāna.
Chieina Jishuna meisā eina hānga, “Lazarus thihaira.
Kha chili I maleikasā chi nathumwui vang phālakhaira, kaja nathum shitsangpai khavaina. Ithum awuili vāusa.”
Thomas, Ngashira kaho china awui ngasotnao sākhangatha̱bingli hānga, “Ali ngasoda thirum khavai ithumla ngasovausa.”
Jishuna vākashung tharan Lazarusli chifada matithang kāhairasai.
Bethany hi Jerusalemwui eina kilometer kathum shakha tai.
Chieina Judeanao kachungkhana Martha eina Maryli apā thikahaiwui vang ringphā ngasak khavai rai.
Marthana Jishu rārāli kaji kashā eina angarokkhui, kha Maryva shimli pamhaowa.
Marthana Jishuli hānga, “Proho, na hili leisāsi kaja ipā mathilakmara.
Kha chithālala arui eina tangda Varena nawui kapopo chi sāmira da ina thei.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Napā ringluira.”
Marthana “Khanaowa zimiksholi a ringluira kaji ina thei” da ngahānkai.
Jishuna ali hānga, “Iya ringkhaluia kala kharingana. Kachikathāna ili shitsangakha thihaisālala ringra;
kala kachikathāna ringda ili shitsangakha mathilakmara. Hi na shitsangla?”
Ana “Mha, Proho, apuk-apagva̱li rāki kaje Varewui Naomayara Khrista chi nalaka” da ngahānkai.
Marthana hi hāngkahaiwui thili agatuiva̱ Maryli ngathumda hokhuilaga hānga, “Ojā hili leili, kala ana nali phāda lei.”
Maryna chi shakhaleoda shoksamphanga.
Jishu kha̱lungli marāshungla Marthana asamkaphangpam chili leikasāna.
Maryli suiphanepta ngasopamkasā Jihudibing china Mary shokkahai theida shurshoka. Athumwui ningli Mary chikhurpamli achapki kajina da phaningsai.
Jishuna Mary eina ali shurkazangbingwui kachap chi theida awui ning saza̱nahaowa.
Kala athumli hānga “Kali chifahailikhala?” “Rāyanglu, Proho,” da athumna hānga.
Jishuna chapa.
Chieina Jihudibingna hānga, “Yanglu, ana kayākha ali leishihaokhala?”
Kha athum kaikhana hānga, “Mik khangapeoli rak-khangasaka ana Lazarus mathi khavai khikha masārarmarala?”
“Lungphek chi khalangshoklu” da Jishuna kasoi. Thikahaipawui achonva̱ Marthana ngahānkai, “Proho, nganamshihairara, kaja chifada matithanghaira.”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Nana shitsangakha Varewui tekhamatei theira da ina mahāngmala?”
Athumna lungphek chi khalangshok kahai eina Jishuna kazingram yangkāda hānga, “Iwui Avā, nana ili shākhamiwui vang nali ningshi.
Nana ili shāmichinga da thei, kha hili khaleibingna nana ili kashirātna kaji shitsang khavai kahāngna.”
Hi hāngchanghailaga ana panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Lazarus, shoklu.”
Kathe china aphei, apāng kala amai kachon eina neiphinserhailaga shokrāsai, Jishuna athumli hānga, “Khalāmihailaga ali zatngasaklu.”
Marywuili kharā Jihudi kachungkhana Jishuna kasā chi theida ali shitsanghaowa.
Kha athumwui ngachaili kaikhana Jishuna sākahai chi Phariseebingli unghāngchithei.
Chieina Phariseebing eina pāngmon akhokabingna hangva̱naoli ngasoda kaziplaga hānga, “Kathausikhala? Mipa hina machut kachungkha sāda lei.
Ithumna ali hithada chihohaiakha mi kachiva̱ ali shitsanghaora, kala Rome shorkarna rāda ithumwui khorumshim kala yur hi shimān ngasakhaora!”
Athumwui ngachaili Caiaphas kaho chikum Pāngmon Kharei sākasapā china hānga, “Nathum kayākha mangma̱haokhala?
Yur katonga shimānki kajile mibingwui vang mi akha thikhangasak phamei kaji nathum matheimala?”
Kachangkhat hi awui ning eina kahāng maningmana, kha chikum ana Pāngmon Kharei sāsāhaoda Jihudi yurwui vang Jishuna thimira kaji hāngkhamarānna.
Kala athumwui vangmāng maningla, Varewui mibing chaiyāng eina leikasābingli akha sāda ungkazip ngasakra kajina.
Chithang eina thuida Jihudi akhavābingna Jishuli shaothat khavai khangarān sāphoka.
Chiwui vang eina Jishuna Judeali phonglāk eina mazatla, lamhāng ngalemli khalei Ephraim kaho keinung chili sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda apama.
Athumna Jishuli phāda, khorumshimli kaziprumlaga akha eina akha ngahān ngaroka, “Khi phaningkhala? A zātkhānli marāzangmarala?”
Jishuli tukkhui khavai kachikathāna a khaleipam theiakha hāngmilu da pāngmon kharei kala akhavābingna hukhum sahairasai.
Chili athumna Jishuwui ngazin phāzat ngarānhaisai, kala Marthana otram ngatha̱mida Lazarusna Jishuli ngasoda tableli pama.
Maryna aman kasaka nganamkaphā thao likli akha khuirāda Jishuwui pheili neomi, kala awui kuisam eina mitmi kala thao chiwui anganamna shim chi pemhaowa.
Sakhangatha̱bingwui ngachaili ali yorzāki kaje Judasna hānga,
“Khisāda thao hi lupā shākathum eina yorhailaga kachāmbingli mamithukhala?”
Ana kahāng hi lukhamashanwui vang maningmana, kha a khalena, ana lupākhao kasinga sāda awuili ungkazang chi ngathumda khuichinga.
Kha Jishuna hānga, “Aningkhānranu, ili kachizan zimikshowui vang ana haisaranu.
Nathumna kachāmabingli ngasopamchingra, kha iya nathumli mangasopamluimara.”
Jishu Bethanyli leiyada kashā eina Jihudi kachungkha chili vai. Athumna chili khavā chi Jishuwui vangmāng maningla kha kathiwui eina ringlui kahaiya Lazaruslila yangkida khavāna.
Chieina pāngmon akhokabingna Lazaruslila shaothat khavai khangarān sai;
kaja awui vang eina Jihudi kachungkha akhavābingli horhaida Jishuli shitsanghaowa.
Chieina athumna khaneinā singlaga Jishuli samphang khavai vai, kala “Hosanna! Prohowui mingli kharā Israelwui Awungali ka̱lā mahairanu” da vaowa.
Jishuna gadhānao akha khuida tonga, hi kathara lairikli hānghaisai:
yanglu, nawui awunga rārāli,
gadhānao akhali tongda!”
Jishuna Lazarusli kathiwui eina ringngasakta chikhurwui eina hokashok tharan chiwui ngalemli leikasābing china khi shokhairakhala kaji kateibingli shākhi sai.
Jishuna matakhak kahai machut sāhaira kaji kashāwui vang mibingna ali samphangkida vai.
Phariseebingna ngazek ngarokta, “Yanglu, ithum ot masāpaithura, okathui katonga ali shurthuihaira.” da hānga.
Athumna Galileeli khalei Bethsaidawui mi Philipli ahānga, “Ojā, ithum Jishuli theingai.”
Philipna Andrewli ahānga, kala ani khanina Jishuli ahānga,
kala Jishuna anili ngahānkai, “Miwui Naomayarana tekhamatei samphangki kaji atam ara rāhaira.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, māngumna ngaleilungli tāzangda mathiakha chithada leichinga, kha thihaiakha māngum kachungkha mathei ngasaka.
Kachikathāna awui mirinli leishiakha chi shimānra, kha okathui hili awui mirinli mashivāmakha chi katang mavaila leisāra.
Kachikathāna ili otram ngatha̱miakha, a ili shurphalungra kala I khalei chili iwui raola sāda leira, ili otram ngatha̱khame mi chili iwui Avāna maiyā ngasakra.
Avā naming tekmateimeiranu.” Chieina kazingramwui eina akhon akha vaorai, “Ina tekmatei ngasakhaira, kala tekmatei ngasakluishitra.”
Chili nganingkasā yaruina akhon chi shāda kaikhana hānga, “Kazingraona ali chān khangazekna.”
Kha Jishuna athumli hānga, “Kahāng hi iwui vang maningmana, nathumwui vangna.
Ara apuk-apagva̱li bichar sāki kaji atamna; kala apuk-apagva̱wui akhavāli khuishokhaora;
ili okathuiwui eina khangkakā tharan, mi saikorali iwui ngalemli ngakhunrāra.”
Ana hi kahāng hi a khithit eina thirakhala kaji kahāngna.
