Yaruina ngahānluishita, “Ithumwui ainli Khrista mathilakmara da hanghai. Kathada miwui Naomayarali khangkāra da hāngpaira? Miwui Naomayara hi khipākhala?”

Jishuna athumli hānga, “Kahor chi nathumwuili kashakha leifara. Kahor chi leilakha zatlu, chithākha tangkhamangna nali mangaphankhuimara, tangkhamangli kazata china kachishong varakhala kaji matheimana.
Kahor chi leilakha chili shitsanglu, chieina nathum kahorwui naongarā ngasāpaira.”
Jishuna hi hānghailaga athumwui eina ngathumthuihaowa.
Jishuna machut kachungkha athumwui miktāli sahailala athumna ali mashitsangmana.
Hi Isaiah maranna hāngkahai ungkashungna:
“Proho, ithumwui pao khipāna shitsangkhala?
Prohona khipāli awui pangshap chitheikhala?”
Chiwui vang eina athumna mashitsangkhararna, kaja Isaiahna hithada hānglui:
kala athummwui ning makang ngasakhaira,
chieina athumwui mikna matheimara,
kala athumwui ningna mamajukmara, kala athumli raimi
khavai ili mangareiungngaimara.”
Chithālala Jihudiwui kathāna kachungkhana Jishuli shitsanga, kha Phariseebingna khorumshimwui eina khuishokhaipaishina da phonglāk eina athum mamatuilengmana.
Athumna Varewui kasopale mikumowui kaso ningchāngmeihaowa.
Kachikathāna ili theiakha ili kashirāta chilila katheina.
Ina apuk-apagva̱li kharā hi kahor thada kharāna, chi eina ili shitkasanga mi kachiva̱ tangkhamangli maleimara.
Kachikathāna iwui tui shālaga makhuisangsālala, ina ali bichar masāmana; kachiwui vangkhala kaja ina apuk-apagali bichar sākhavai maningla huikhui khavai kharāna.
Ili mamayāmada iwui tui makhuisangakha ali bichar sākhavai akha lei; ina hāngkahai tui china khanaowa zimiksholi awui bicharwo ngasāra.
Kaja ina I khalattawui sāshap eina khamatui maningmana; ili kachihoa Avā khalattana khi hāngra kala khi matuira kaji kaso kahaina.
Kala awui ningkhami china katang makhavai kharing khuirai kaji ina thei. Chieina ina kahāng hi Avāna kakasowui athishurda kasāna.”
Jishuna, Avāva̱na ot saikora awui pāngli horsangmihaira, kala a Varewui eina kharāna kala Varewuili vāluihaora kaji theida,
ana phazātwui eina ngakarthuida, awui kachon raitāhailaga towel akha kashānli neikhui.
Kala khongsaili tara̱ heisangda sākhangatha̱bingwui phei pheophokuwa kala awui kashānli neikahai towel chieina mitmi.
Jishuna Simon Peterwuili kharā eina Simonna hānga, “Proho, nana iwui phei pheomirala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina khi sākhala kaji na arui bhap matāmara kha naoda bhap tānaora.”
Peterna hānga, “Nana iphei mapheopailakmara.” Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina naphei mapheomiakha na ili khangarum maleimana.”
Simon Peterna ngahānkai, “Chithākha Proho, ipheimāng maningla ipāng eina ikuila pheomilu!”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ra̱vai kahai mina aphei maningla khangatei pheokhavai maleimana, a tharsera, kala na tharda lei, kha nathum kachiva tharser majimana.”
Kaja Jishuna ali khipāna hatrakhala kaji theida “Nathum katonga tharser majimana” da kahāngna.
Jishuna athumwui phei pheomihailaga awui kachon ngavaikhuida pamluishita, kala “Ina arui nathumli sākhami hiwui kakhalat theila?” da ngahāna.
“Nathumna ili Ojā kala Proho da hoi, chi mashunga, kaja I chilaka.
Nathumwui Proho kala ojana phei pheokhami chithada nathumla akha eina akha pheomi ngarokphalungra.
Nathumnala chithada sākhavai tamkachitheina.
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, raona akhavāli mahakmeimana, paophungmena kashivātali mahakmeimana.
Ara khamashung hi nathum theihaira; nathumna hiwui athishurda saakha kayākha ringkaphā ngasārakhala!
“Ina nathum saikorawui pongli kahāng maningmana, ina kapangkhui kahaibing chili ina thei; kathara tuili hāngkahai, ‘Ili phazākhangaruma a china ili mamayāmana’ kaji hi ungshung khavaina.
Hi mashokranglakha nathumli ina kahāngna, chieina kashok tharan nathumna A chi ina da shitsangra.
Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, kala ili khamayā chi ili kashirāta chili khamayāna.”
Chieina sākhangatha̱bing akha eina akha ningmaongtong eina khipākhala da yangkāngaroka.
Jishuna leikashia sākhangatha̱ akha awui ngalemli pamsai.
Simon Peterna ali “Khipākhala” da ngahān ngasaka.
Chieina ana Jishuwuivāk shaivāda hānga, “Proho, chi khipākhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina khamui tengkotli rurkhuilaga miki kajipa china;” chieina ana khamuitang akha rurkhuilaga Simon Iscariotwui naomayara Judasli mihaowa.
Judasna khamui chi khuikhaleoda awuili satan zanghaowa. Jishuna ali hānga, “Nana sāki kaji chi thākta saulu.”
Table kuimareida kapama mi khipānakha Jishuna ali kahāng chi bhap matārarmana.
Judasna lupākhao singhaoda zātkhānwui vang ali kahāng-eili, kachāmabingli kateokha mikhavai kahāng-eili da sākhangatha̱bingna phaninga.
Judasna khamui chi khuilaga hengsāda shokhaowa. Chi ngayāhairasai.
Varewui tekhamatei chi awui eina phongmiakha; Varena a khalattawui alungli miwui Naomayaralila makahatlakla tekkmatei ngasakra.
Inao ngarā, ina nathumli kasāngkha mangasopamluimara. Khaleilaga nathumna ili phāra, kha ina Jihudiwui akhavābingli kahāng chi nathumlila kahāngna kaja ina vāki kaji chile nathum marārarmara.
Chieina ina nathumli ningkhami kadhar khamina kaja nathum akha eina akha leishi ngaroklu, ina nathumli leikashi thada nathum akha eina akha leishi ngarokphalungra.
Nathum akhana akhali leikashi leiakha nathum iwui sākhangatha̱bingna kaji saikorana theira.”
Peterna ngahāna, “Proho, khisāda I mashurthukmarakhala? I nawui vang thishapra.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Na kachangkhat iwui vang thishapralā? Kachangkhat eina ina nali kahāngna, harvā makhongranglakha nana ili matheimana da kathum shida hatra.”
Jishuna hānga, “Wuk makhanangalu; Vareli shitsangmalu, kala ilila shitsanglu.
Iwui Avāwui shimli pamkhavai kā kachungkha lei; chi maningsi kaja ina nathumwui vang pam angaranura da hāngrala?
Kala nathumwui vang pam angarānhailaga nathumli rāhokhuiluira, chieina I khaleipamli nathumla leira.
Kala ina vāki kaji shongfa nathum thei.”
Thomasna hānga, “Proho nana vāki kaji shongfa ithum matheimana, chili vākhavai shongfa chi kathada ithumna theirakhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “I shongfana, khamashungana, kala kharingana; iwui eina maningla Avāva̱wuili khipākha marāpaimana.
Nathumna ili theisāsi kaje iwui Avālila theihairara, arui hiwui eina thuida nathumna awui apongli theihaira, mik einala theihaira.”
Philipna hānga, “Proho, Avā chi ithumli chitheimilu, ithum ningyangunglakhaora.”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Hirankha nathumli ngasopamhaira, laga ili matheirangla, Philip? Kachikathāna ili theihaiakha Avāli theikahaina. Chithākha khisāda Avāli chitheilu da hāngkhala?
I Avāwuili lei kala Avā iwuili lei kaji hi mashitsangmala? Ina khamatui hi iwui eina kashok maningmana, kha ili khalei Avāna kasā otsakna.
I Avāwuili lei kala Avā iwuili lei kaji hi shitsanglu. Chi maningkha ina sākahai otbing chiwui vang shitsanglu.
Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, kachikathāna ili shitsangakha ina kasā ot chi ala sāshapra, hakkhamei ot eina tangda sāra, kaja I Avāwuili vāhaora.
Kala nathumna iwui ming eina kapopo chi ina sāmira, chieina Avāva̱wui tekhamatei chi Anaomayarawui mangā eina theikhuipaira.
Nathumna iwui ming eina kapopo chi ina mira.
Ina Avāli pora kala ana nathumli katang mavaila ngasopamki kaje Machinme akha mira, khamashungwui Manglā china nathumli ngasopamchingra.

Chi apuk-apagva̱na masamphangkhararra khamashungwui Manglāna. Kachiwui vangkhala kaja apuk-apagva̱̱na ali mik einala matheimana, ning einala theikakhuila maleimana. Nathumna ali thei, kaja ana nathumli ngasopamda lei kala nathumwui lungli leira.
“Ina zatkahai tharan ina nathumli ngachakyāng eina mahorhaimara; I rāluira.
Hunkhawui thili apuk-apagva̱̱na ili matheiluimara, kha nathumna theira; kala ina kharingwui vang nathumla ringra.
Chithang I Avāwuili lei, nathum iwuili lei kala I nathumwuili lei kaji nathumna theira.
“Kachikathāna iwui ningkhami khuisangda mayonakha a ili leikashena. Ili leikashe chili iwui Avānala leishira; inala ali leishida I khalatta ali phongmira.”
Judas (Iscariot makhaninga)na ali hānga, “Proho, na khalatta apuk-apagva̱li maphongmila ithumli phongmira kaji hi kathada sāpairakhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ili leikashe mi china iwui tui khuisangra kala iwui Avāna ali leishira, kala iwui Avā inina awuili rāda ali ringrumra.
Kachikathāna ili maleishiakha iwui tui makhuisangmara. Kala nathumna shākahai tamkachithei chi iwui eina kharā maningmana, kha ili kashirāta Avāwui eina kharāna.
“Hibing hi ina nathumli ngasopamlakha hānghaira.
Iwui ming eina Avāna shirātki kaje Manglā Kathara, Machinme china ot saikora nathumli tamchitheira, kala ina hāngkahai saikora phaningung ngasakra.
“Ina nathumli chingri kahai haikhamina; I khalattawui chingri kahai nathumli khamina. Okathuina khami thada nathumli khami maningmana. Wukmakhananglakalu; khangacheela mangacheealu.
‘Ina thuihailala rāluishitra’ da ina kahāng chi nathumna shāhaira. Nathumna ili leishiakha, ina Avāwuili vaura kaji hili ringphāngayilaka, kachiwui vangkhala kaja ana ili reikhameina.
Hi mashokranglakha nathumli ina kahāngna, chieina chi kashok tharan nathumna shitsangra.
Ina nathumli kasāngkha mangazekrarluimara, kachiwui vangkhala kaja okathui hiwui khamunga rārāda lei. Ana iwuitungli khikha masārarmara,
kha iwui Avāna kakaso athishurda kasāna, chieina ina iwui Avāli leishiya kaji okathuina theira. “Ngakarthuilu, ithum zatusa.
Athei makhamathei iwui aphāng kachiva̱ ana yortāhai, kala athei khamathei aphāng kachiva̱li chungmei mathei khavai sāmathāmi.
Ina nathumli tamchithei kahai tui chieina nathumli tharngasakhaira.
Ili zanglu, chieina ina nathumli zangra. Aphāngna arongli maleiakha athei mamatheipaimana, chi tākam eina nathumna ili maleiakha athei mamatheipaimana.
“Ina drakhārongna, kala nathumna aphāngbingna. Iwuili khaleia kala ina awuili khalei, a chi athei tarakha khamatheia china, kaja I mazangla nathumna khikha masararmana.
Kachikathāna ili mazangakha aphāng katheng thada katatkhui, kala kazipkhuilaga meili horsangda chuitā ngasaka.
Nathumna ili zangda iwui tuila nathumli leiakha, nathumna ningkachāng kapopo chi samphangra.
Hithada nathumwui athei tarākha khamathei china iwui Avāwui tekhamatei phongshoka, kala china nathum iwui sākhangatha̱bingna da chithei.
Avāna ili leikashi thada ina nathumli leishilāka, iwui leikashili zanglu.
Nathumna iwui ningkhami mayonakha, ina iwui Avāwui ningkhami mayonda awui leikashili khalei thada nathumla iwui leikashili leira.
“Ina nathumli kahāng hi iwui ringkaphā chi nathumli leikhavai kala nathumwui ringkaphā chi kāshungchao khavai kasāna.
Ngasotnaobingwui vang manglā chihokhami hili lāngda hakkhamei leikashi maleimana.
Ina kakaso chi nathumna saakha, nathum iwui ngasotnaona.

Ina nathumli rao maholuimana, kachiwui vangkhala kaja akhavāna khi salikhala kaji raona matheimana. Ina nathumli ngasotnao hoi, kachiwui vangkhala kaja ina iwui Avāwui eina shākakhui saikora nathumli hāngserhaira.
Nathumna ili kapangkakhui maningmana, kha vāda athei mathei khavai kala athei chi mashimān khavai ina nathumli kapangkakhuina kala kachipamna; chieina nathumna iming singda kapo saikora Avāna mira.
Hi iwui ningkhamina; akha eina akha leishi ngaroklu.

Nathumna apug-apagvawui ngasakha, apuk-apagva̱na awui chili leishira; kha ina nathumli apuk-apagva̱wui eina kapangkhuihaoda nathum apuk-apagva̱wui maningmana, chiwui vang eina apuk-apagva̱na nathumli ningkachai.
Ina hāngkahai chi phaningunglu, ‘Raona akhavāli mahakmeimana.’ Athumna ili rekharekakha nathumlila rekharekphalungra; iwui tui khuisangakha nathumwuila khuisangphalungra.
Kha iwui vang eina athumna nathumli saikora hi sāra, kachiwui vangkhala kaja athumna ili kashirāta chili matheimana.
Ina athumli marātamchitheisāsi kaja athum morei kasā matheisāmara, kha ara athum moreiwui eina mayāmshokrarmara.
Ili ningkakachaiya china iwui Avālila ningkachai.
Khangateina masālakrang kaja ot chi athumwui mangāli masāchitheisāsi kaja athum moreili tātunghaira kaji matheisāmara; kha ara athumna iwui otsak theilaga ilila iwui Avālila ningkachaihaira.
Chithālala hi shokphalungra, kaja ainli kapi kahai ‘Khi ngalangkha maleila athumna ili ningkachaihaira’ kaji hi ungshung khavaina.
Kha Avāwui eina kashoka khamashungwui Manglā, Avāva̱wui eina ina nathumli chihorāki kaji Machinme kharā tharan, ana iwui vang shākhi mira;
kala nathumla shākhina, kachiwui vangkhala kaja haokaphokwui eina nathum ili ngasora kahaina.
“Nathum makonglui khavai saikora hi ina hānghaira.
Athumna nathumli synagoguewui eina kashamshokra; makahatla nathumli shaokathata china awui otsak chi Vareli otram khangatha̱na da kaphaning atam rāra.
Athumna Avālila ilila makatheiwui vang chikathā ot sāra.
Kha ina nathumli hibing hi hāngkahaina kaja athumwui atam chi kharā tharan, athumwui pongli ina nathumli hānga kaji phaningungra.
“Ina haokaphokli saikora hi nathumli mahangmana, kaja I nathumli ngasosai,
kha ara I ili kashirāta chili ungura, kha nathum khipākhana ‘Kali vāra̱khala?’ da mangahānmana.
Kha ara ina hikathāthā kahāngwui vang nathum wukkakhanangna pemhaira.
Kha khamashung tui ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumwui vanga I kathuina phāmei, kaja I mathuiakha Machinme chi nathumwuili marāmara, kha ina thuihaiakha ali chihorāra.
Ana kharā tharan apuk-apagawui mibingna moreiwui, khamashung khangarongwui kala bicharsakwui pongli theinguida khalei chi ana chitheimira;
moreiwui pongli jiakha, athum ili mashitsangthuwa;
khamashung khangarongwui pongli jiakha athum theiyonhaira, kaja ina Avāwuili vāda nathumna ili matheiluimara;
bicharsakwui pongli jiakha, apug-apaga hiwui khamungali bichar sāhaira.
“Ina nathumli kachungkha hāngkhavai lei, kha nathum arui nganākhuikida saknāhaora.
Khamashungwui Manglā chi kharā tharan, ana nathumli khamashung katonga chitheira. Ana a khalattawui sāshap eina mamatuimara kha ana shākakhui chi matuira kala rāki kaji chi ana nathumli chitheira.
Ana ili tekmatei ngasakra kaja ina kahāng chi ana khuilaga nathumli hāngchitheira.
Avāwui khalei katonga iwuina, chiwui vang eina ina kahāngna kaja ana iwui eina khuilaga nathumli hāngchitheira kajina.

Chieina sākhangatha̱bingna ngazek ngaroka. “Kasha̱kha leilaga nathumna ili matheiluimara, kala kasha̱khawui thili nathumna ili theiluira” da kahāng hi khisawi kajikhala? Kala “I Avāwuili ungura” dala hānga.
Athumna hānga, “'Kasha̱kha’ kajiwui kakhalat khikhala? Ana khi kahāngkhala da ithum matheimana.”

Athumna Jishuli ngahānkhuikhangai chi Jishuna theida hānga, “Kasha̱nakha leilaga nathumna ili matheiluimara; kala kasha̱khawui thili nathumna ili theiluira” da ina kahāng hiwui pongli ngazek khangarokla?
Kachangkhat eina ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna chapta sifaakha apuk-apagana mana̱ra; nathum wukhanangra, kha wukakhanang chi khamathān onhaora.
Sha̱naona naokhara̱ tharan wukhananga kaja awui kachot atam rāhaowa, kha nao pharā kahai tharan kachot saikora malaiserhaowa, kachiwui vangkhala kaja okathuili nao akha pharāhaida ringphāhaowa.
Chi tākam eina aruihon nathum chotta lei, kha ina nathumli samphangluira, kala nathumwui ning khamathānna pemhaora. Chi kathā khamathān chi nathumwui eina khipānakha mangapaithuimara.
Chitharan nathumna ili khikha mapomara. Kachangkhat ina nathumli kahāngna, nathumna iwui ming singda iwui Avāli kapo saikora ana mira.
Aja eina tangda nathumna iwui ming singda mapolakranga; polu, samphangra, chi eina nathumwui ringkaphā kāshungra.
Chitharan nathumna iming singda Ali pora; ina nathumwui vang pomira kaji maningmana,
kaja Avā ā khalattana nathumli leishilāka, kachiwui vangkhala kaja nathumna ili leishi kala I iwui Avāwui eina kharāna kaji nathumna shitsanga.
I iwui Avāwui eina okathui hili kharāna; kala ara okathui hiwui eina iwui Avāwuili ungluihaora.”
Awui sākhangatha̱bingna hānga, “Yanglu, chānjamtui eina maningla ara nana phonglāk eina hānghaira.
Nana theisera kaji ara ithumna theihaira, kala ngahānlui khavai maleiluimana. Hi eina na Varewui eina rai kaji ithum shitsanghaira.”
Jishuna athumli ngahānkai, “Nathum ara shitsanghairala?
Nathum chaiyāng eina kachichāwui shimli unghaida, ili ngachakyāng eina nothāhaoki kaji atam chi rārāli kala kharāla rāhaira. Tha-ilala imāng majimana, kaja iwui Avāna ili ngasoda lei.
Ina nathumli hi hānghaira, iwuili nathumna chingri kahai samphangra. Okathuili nathumna kachotkachāng samphangra, kha ningai mathānlu, ina okathuili yuihaira!”
khikhalajila nana mikahai mikumo saikorali katang makhavai kharing mikhavai nana ali pangshap mihaira.
Katang makhavai kharing kaji hi akhamāng kaje khamashunga Vareli kala nana kashirāta Jishu Khristali mikumona kathei hina.
Nana ili sālu da mikahai ot chi sakuphaida okathui hili ina nali tekmatei ngasakhaira.
Chieina ara Avā, apuk-apagva̱̱ masāranglakha nali ngasoda ina tekhamatei eina leikasā chieina nawui mangāli ili tekmatei ngasakmilu.
“Apuk-apagvawui eina kapangkhuida nana ili khami mibing chili ina naming theingasakhaira, athum nawuina, kala athum chi nana ili mida athumna nawui tui nganai.
Ara nana ili mikahai saikora hi nawui eina kharālaka da athumna theihaira;
khikhalajila nana ili khami paokaphā chi ina athumli mida athumna samphanghaira. Chieina I nawui eina rai kaji hi mashunga da athumna theihaira, kala nana ili kashirātna kaji athumna shitsanghaira.
“Ina athumwui vang seihā sali; ina apuk-apagawui vang seihā masāmana, kha nana ili mikahaia athumwui vang kasāna, kaja athum nawuina.
Iwui khalei saikora nawuina, kala nawui saikora iwuina kala iwui tekhamatei athumwui eina theingasakhaira.

Ara I apuk-apagva̱li maleiluimana, kha athuma apuk-apagva̱li lei, kala I nawuili rārāli. Tharkhamathenga Avā, nana ili mikahai athumli nawui mingwui pangshap china mayonmilu. Chieina na eina I akha kasā thada, athum akha ngasāpaira.

Nana ili mikahai athumli ina ngasoda leilakha namingwui pangshap eina ina athumli mayonmi, ina athumli mayonmida leilakha, kathara tui chi ungshung khavai shimānphalungki kajepa maningla khipākha mashimānmana.
Ara I nawuili rārāli, kala ina okathuili hi kahāng hiya, iwui ringkaphā chi athumna ningli pemting eina samphang khavaina.
Ina nawui pao chi athumli mi, chieina okathuina athumli ningkachaihaowa kaja ina okathui hiwui makhaning thada athumla okathui hiwui maningmana.
Athumli okathuiwui eina khuithui khavai kapo maningmana, kha athumli makaphāwui eina mayonmi khavai kapona.
Ina okathui hiwui makhaning thada athumla okathui hiwui maningmana.
Khamashung chieina athumli namingli dharchikatmilu, kaja nawui tui chiya khamashungana.
Nana okathui hili ili kashirāt thada, athumli ina okathuili kashivātna.
Kala athumna khamashung eina chigatshap khavai I khalatta nali kachigatna.
“Ina hibingwui vāngmāng seihā kasā maningmana, kha athumwui tui shāda ili shitkasanga athumwui vangla seihā kasāna,
chiya athum akha sāpaira; Avā, nana iwuili, kala ina nawuili khalei thada, athum iniwuili leiranu, chithākha apuk-apagva̱na nana ili kashirātna kaji shitsangra.
Nana ili khami tekhamatei chi ina athumli mihaira, chieina na eina I akha kasa thada, athum akha sapaira,
ina athumli kala nana ili leida athum tongtingda akha sapaira, chieina nana ili kashirātna kala nana ili leikashi thada athumlila leishiya kaji apuk-apagva̱na theira.
“Avā, nana ili mikahaia athum, apuk-apagva̱ masāranglakha nana ili leishida mikahai tekhamatei chi yangkhui khavai, I khalaleipamli athumlila leingasakngai.
He, khamashung khangaronga Avā, apuk-apagana nali matheiranga, kha ina nali theihaira, kala china, nana ili kashirātna kaji thei.
Ina athumli naming theingasakhaira, kala chithada theingasakchingra. Chieina nana ili leikashi chi athumwuilila leira, kala inala athumwuili leira.”
Apam chi Jishuli yorkazāpa Judasnala thei, kaja Jishuna awui sākhangatha̱bingli kachungkha shida apam chili samphanga.
Chieina Judasna thānda shipaila, pāngmon akhokabingna kachiho kathāna kaikhala kala Phariseebingla zangda zeighai ngahāla, thaomeila singlaga yāmgui chili vai.
Jishuna shokki kaji theiserhaoda, athumwui mangāli shokngahāna, “Nathum khipāli kaphākhala?”
Athumna, “Nazarethwui Jishuli kaphāna” da ngahānkai.
Jishuna, “Chi ina” da hānga.
Ali yorkazāpa Judasla athumli nganingrumsai.
Ana “Chi ina” da kahāng eina sa̱na̱ungda ngaleili kongluizanga.
Jishuna athumli ngahānluishita, “Nathum khipāli kaphākhala?”
Athumna “Nazarethwui Jishuli kaphāna” da hānga.
Jishuna hānga, “Chi ina, da nathumli ina hānghaira.”
Jishuna kahāng hi ana hānghaikasā “Nana ili mikahai athum akhala mashimānmana” kaji chi ungshung ngasak khavai kahāngna.
Simon Peterna raighai akha singsāda chi sutkhuilaga pāngmon khareiwui rao akhawui khanā yāvāk yortāmihaowa. Raopā chiwui aming Malchus hoi.
Jishuna Peterli hānga, “Nawui raighai chi ahonli sanghaolu. Avāna ili mikahai tengkot chi I mamangmarala?”
Kala athumna rimeikapta Annas kaja chikum pāngmon kharei sākasā Caiaphaswui awovāwuili khuivai.
Jihudibingli, mi katongawui vang mi akhali thikhangasakna phāmeiya da hāngkhamachinpa chi Caiaphasna.
Kha Peterva kayāngli khamongwui ngalemli nganinghaowa. Chieina pāngmon khareili theikhamasuia sākhangatha̱ china shoklaga khamong khāmayonva̱ chili shokhānglaga Peterlila alungvāk khuizanga.
Khamong khāmayonva̱ china Peterli hānga, “Nala mipā chiwui sākhangatha̱ akha maningmala?”
Peterna “Maningmana” da ngahānkai.
Siknāhaida raobing eina khamayonbingna mei sālaga kuimareida meili tikpama. Peterla athumli ngasoda meili vāpama.
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina apuk-apagva̱li phonglāk eina hāngchinga; Jihudi katongana rākakazip synagogue kala khorumshimli tamchitheichinga; ina ngathumda kahāng khikha maleilakmana.
Chieina khisāda ili khangahānkhala? Ina athumli khi hāngkhala kaji kashābingli ngahānlu; ina khi hāngkhala kaji athumna thei.”
Jishuna hi hāngkahai eina ngalemli khalei otshina akhana apāng eina ali shaoda hānga, “Pāngmon khareili nana hithada ngahānkāla?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Ina nguida hānghaira jiakha khangui chi hānglu, kha ina kahāng chi mashunga jiakha khisāda ili kashaokhala?”
Chieina khalaphailaga Annasna ali pāngmon kharei Caiaphaswuili chihovāhaowa.
Peterna khanā yortāmi kahaipawui athei-asā kashoka pāngmon khareiwui rao akhana hānga, “Yāmgui chili ali ngasozatkasā ina matheimala?”
Peterna, “Maningmana” da ngahānkai, kala chichangli harvā khonguwa.
Chieina Pilatena ayarli athumli shoksamphangda hānga, “Nathumna mipa hili kaphen khi leikhala?”
Athumna ngahānkai, “Mipa hina yom ot masāsāsi kaja nawuili makhuirāmara.”
Pilatena athumli hānga, “Chithākha ali khuithuiulu, kala nathumwui ain athishurda bichar asālu.” Jihudibingna ngahānkai, “Ithumwui vanga khipālikha shaothat khavai ainna mamayāmana.”
Jishuna kachikathā mithit eina thira̱khala da ana hāngkahai chi ungshung khavai hi kashokna.
Pilatena kārotli zangluishitlaga Jishuli hokhuida hānga, “Na Jihudiwui Awunga chila?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “Hi naning eina kahāngka, khangateina iwuipongli hāngmida kahāngkhala?”
Pilatena ngahānkai, “I Jihudinaona da phaningla? Nali nawui mibing kala pāngmon akhokabingna iwuili chihokharāna, nana khi sāhaokhala?”

Jishuna hānga, “Iwui wungmung hi apuk-apagva̱wui maningmana; iwui wungmung hi apuk-apagva̱wui sāsāsi kaja ili Jihudibingwui pāngli mahorsang khavai iwui kashurabingna ngararhairara; kha iwui wungmung apuk-apagva̱wui eina maningmana.”

Pilatena ali hānga, “Thakha na awunga akharali!” Jishuna ngahānkai, “I awungana kaji hi nana hāngda lei. Ili hiwui vang kapharāna, kala hiwui vang khamashung chili shākhi mikhavai I apuk-apagva̱li kharāna. Khamashunga mi kachivana iwui tui khuisanga.”
Pilatena, “Khamashung chi khikhala?” da ngahāna.
Chi hānghailaga Pilatena shoklaga Jihudibingli hānga, “Ina awuili khayon khikhala masamphangmana.
Kha nathumwui zatkhanāwui athishurda Makānkhami phanitli phātop kazanga mi akhali ina chihomiphalungra; Jihudiwui Awunga hili chihomilu jila?”
Athumna panglāk eina vaoluishita, “Mipa hi maningmana; kha Barabbaslina!” (Barabbas hi pha̱ma̱kashao mina).
Chiwui thili Pilatena Jishuli shaongasaka.
Kala shipaibingna ka̱shatthing eina wungkuihon sākhuilga akuili ngahonmi; kala mengchin kahai kachon akha ngavaimi;
kala “Jihudiwui Awungali okpeimeiranu” da hānglaga athumna maili kākapheya.
Pilatena kayāngli shokluishitta yaruili hānga, “Awuili ina khayon khikha masamphangmana da nathumna theikhavai ina ali hili khuishokta lei.”
Chieina Jishuna ka̱shat kuihon ngahonda kala mengchin kahai kachon ngavaida kayāngli shoka. Pilatena athumli hānga, “Yanglu, mi chi hina!”

Pāngmon akhokabing kala kathānabingna ali kathei eina “Krushli shaoshānhaolu! krushli shaoshānhaolu!” da vaokazama. Pilatena athumli hānga, “Chithākha nathumna rākhuilaga krushli shaoshānlu, kaja iya awuili khikha khayon masamphangmana.”
Jihudibingna ngahānkai, “Ana Varewui Naomayarana da kahāngwui vang a thingayiphalunga kaji hi ainli kapihaida lei.”
Chi shālaga Pilate ngacheemeihaowa.
Ana kārotli zangluishitta Jishuli hānga, “Na kachiwui eina kharākhala?”
Kha Jishuna mangahānkāthuwa.
Chieina Pilatena hānga, “Na ili mangahānmarala? Nali chihomikashap kala krushli shaoshānkashap pangshap iwuili lei kaji na matheimala?”
Jishuna ali ngahānkai, “Varena nali khami chiwui vangmāng nana iwuitungli pangshap khaleimaya. Chieina ili nawui pāngli horsangkhame mibing chiwui morei hakmei.”
Pilatena chi shālaga Jishuli khuishoka kala Hebrew tuili Gabbatha kaho Lungham bichar pamkhong chili shokpama.
Chithang chi Makānkhami phanitwui vang khangarān kasā zimikshona kala pung katharuka atamna. Pilatena Jihudibingli hānga, “Yanglu, nathumwui awunga!”

Athumna vaoda hānga, “Ali khuithuihaolu, ali khuithuihaolu, krushtungli shaoshānhaolu!” Pilatena hānga, “Nathumwui Awungali krushli shaoshān ngasakngaila?” Pāngmon akhokabingna ngahānkai, “Ithumwui awunga Caesar maningla khangatei maleimana.”
Chieina Pilatena Jishuli krushli shaoshān khavai athumwui pāngli horsangmihaowa.
Chieina athumna Jishuli khuithuihaowa,
kala awui krush phungda Mikuira̱ kaho apam chili vai, chi Hebrew tuili Golgotha hoi.
Apam chili athumna Jishuli krushli shaoshāna, kala khangatei mi khanilila lākharip, Jishuna alungli zangda krushli shaoshānruma.
Pilatena tuipeng akha kapikhuilaga krushli shāphai; tui chi hithai: “Nazarethwui Jishu, Jihudiwui Awunga”
Jihudi kachungkhana chi kapā samphanga, kaja Jishuli shaokashān apam chi keinungwui eina matānāmana. Kapi kahai chi Hebrew, Latin kala Greek tui eina kapihai.
Jihudiwui pāngmon khareibingna Pilateli hānga, “‘Jihudiwui Awunga’ da makapimialu, kha mipa hina ‘I Jihudiwui Awungana da hānga’ da kapilu.”
Pilatena ngahānkai, “Ina kapi kahai chi kapi kahaina.”

Shipaibingna Jishuli krushli shaoshān kahaiwui thili awui kashankachon khuida akhum mati sālaga shipai ava̱va̱na akhum ava̱va̱ khui. Phahon katuma chila khui. Kha awui phahon katuma che amalak mavaila ato eina thuida aze tāshungda rakrumhaisai.
Chieina athum akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta “He maserkhākhaisa, khipāwui ngasānikhala, ka̱lā yanghaosa” da mayāngaroka.
Hi kathara tuili hāngkahai,
“Athumna iwui kashankachon ngayara;
kala iwui phahon katumawui vang ka̱lā yangra” kaji chi ungshung khavaina.
Jishuna ava̱ eina leikashiya sākhangatha̱ akha chi nganingkasā theida ava̱va̱li hānga, “Sha̱nao, yanglu, nanao mayarali!”
Chiwui thili sākhangatha̱pa chili hānga, “Chi nava̱na.” Chithang eina thuida sākhangatha̱pa china ava̱va̱ chi ashi shimli thanunghaowa.
Chili drakhāthei kathur tengkotkha haisai; chieina athumna chonshi akha thing akhali khalapshānhailaga atheira̱ chumkhuilaga Jishuwui khamorli sangmi.
Jishuna atheira̱ chi manglaga “Ngachanghaira” da hānglaga kui mashunzangda thihaowa.
Chieina shipaibingna nganaimeikap kaje chiwui aphei sātekhaowa, kala chiwui thili Jishuwui lākhavāk khaleipāwuila sāteka.
Kha Jishuli vākhayang eina a thihaira̱kasā chi theihaida masātekmana.
Kha shipai akhana Jishuwui arapli kazei eina runga, kala chichangli ashee eina tara̱ manātta longshoka.
Hi mik eina katheia mipa china shākhi khamina— awui shākhi chi mashunga kala a khamashung tui matui kaji ana thei—chieina nathumnala shitsangpaira.
Kathara lairikli “Awui ara̱kui akhala matek ngasakmara” da hāngkahai chi ungshung ngasaka.
Kathara tui khangatei akhalila hithada hānga, “Athumna rungthat kahaia chili athumna yangkāra.”
Jishuli thangngayākha rasamkaphanga Nicodemusla myrrh eina aloes khamanāta nganamkaphā thao pound shākha sha̱kha khuiphungda Josephli ngasovai.
Anina Jishuwui phasā chi khuitālaga Jihudiwui kachizan khangachā athishurda khamanaka kachon eina romkhui kala nganamkaphā thao neomi.
Jishuli shaokathat apam chili yāmgui akha leisai, kala chiwui alungli khipālikha machizanlakrang kasā kashophutkakhui chikhur kadhar akha leisai.
Akhama kathā Jihudiwui Sabbath zimiksho sāhaogada kala chiwui ngalemli chikhurla leisāda Jishuli chili chizanhaowa.
Chieina ana ngasamungda Peter kala Jishuna leikashi sākhangatha̱pa chili unghānga, “Athumna Prohowui angun chikhurwui eina khuithuihaira kala kali haihaokhala kaji matheimana.”
Chieina Peter eina sākhangatha̱pā china chikhurli ayang khavai vai.
Anina ngasamvai, kha sākhangatha̱ akhapāna Peterli thākmeihaoda vāshungrihaowa.
Kala ana hamzangda yangkazang eina khamanaka kachon chi thei, kha chikhurwui alungli mazangmana.
Simon Peterna naoda rālaga mangasāmlakla chikhurlungli zangyanga, kala neikhavai khamanaka kachon chi thei,
kala kuili neimi kahai kachon chi chili maleila khaluilaga ngateida leisai.
Chikhurpamli rāshungkhare sākhangatha̱ akhapā chila zangyanga, kala chi theilaga ana shitsanghaowa.
Kathara lairikli hāngkahai, “A kathiwui eina ringshokphalungra” kaji hi matheirangsai.
Chieina ani shimli unghaowa.
Maryna chikhur ngalemli chappama kala chapsasui eina chikhurli yangkazang tharan,
kazingrao khani Jishuli chipethaikasā apam chili akhana kuishakli, akhana pheivāk, kachara sāri ngavaida pamkasā chi thei.
Anina hānga, “Sha̱nao, khisāda chapkhala?”
Maryna ngahānkai, “Iwui Proholi athumna khuithuihaowa, kala kali haihaokhala kaji matheithuwa.”
Ana chi hānghailaga ngareikhaung eina Jishu chili nganingsai, kha chi Jishuna kaji ana matheimana.
Jishuna hānga, “Sha̱nao, khisāda chaplikhala? Khipāli kaphākhala?”
Yāmgui khamayonapā-eili da phaningda Maryna hānga, “Amei, phasā chi nana khuihaida leiakha kali ahaihaokhala, ili kahāngmilu, ina akhuira.”
Jishuna hānga, “Mary!”
Chieina Maryna ngareiungda Hebrew tui eina “Rabboni!” ji. Hiwui kakhalatna “Ojā” kajina.
Chieina Mary Magdalenena Proholi ana kathei kala Prohona hithada unghānglu kaji chi sākhangatha̱bingli unghānga.
Laga awui pāngmayā eina ari chithei. Sākhangatha̱bing chi Proholi theilaga khamathānna pemhaowa.
Chieina Jishuna hāngluishita, “Nathumli chingrihairanu. Avāna ili kashirāt thada ina nathumli kashivātna.”
Chiwui thili Jishuna athumli khakkhārorda hānga, “Manglā Kathara chi khuilu.
Nathumna kachikathāwui morei pheomiakha athumli pheomihaira; nathumna mapheomiakha athumli mapheomithura.”

Chieina khangateibingna “Ithum Proholi theihaira” da hānga. Kha Thomasna hānga, “Awui pāngmayāwui yotpichon imik eina matheiranglakha kala yotpi khamāli ipāngmareng eina masāza̱ranglakha, arili ipāng eina makhamāza̱ranglakha I mashitsangmara.”
Haptā akha shānglaga kazipluishita, kala Thomasla chili zanga. Khamong rarser kahaina, kha Jishuna athumwui ngachaili rānganingda hānga, “Nathumli chingrihairanu.”
Kala Thomasli hānga, “Napāngmareng hili rāhailu, kala ipāngli yanglu, napāng katingrāda iwui arili khamāyanglu. Ning khamaong masaalu, kha shitsanglu.”
Thomasna ngahānkai, “Iwui Proho, iwui Vare!”
Jishuna ali hānga, “Ili theihaoda ara nana shitkasangla? Mik eina matheila shitkasanga athum chi sokhamina.”
kha Jishu hi Varewui Naomayara, Khrista china da nathumna shitsang khavaiwui vang kala shitkasangda awui mingli kharing samphang khavai hibing hi kapi kahaina.
Chiwui thili Jishuna sākhangatha̱bingli Tiberi-as shamadru ngalemli rachitheiluishita; kala a khalatta hithada rachithei.
Chili Simon Peter, Ngashirra kaho Thomas, Galileewui Cana eina kharā Nathana-el, Zebedeewui naomayara khani kala Jishuwui sākhangatha̱ khangatei khani da kazipsai.
Simon Peterna athumli hānga, “I khaih aphaura.” Athumna ali hānga, “Ithumla nali ngasoda vara.” Chieina athumna marikhongli kātonga, kha ngayā pongda athum akhala makhuimana.
Ngathor zimik shoknanai Jishuna ngayipheili rānganinga, kha sākhangatha̱bingna chi Jishuna kaji matheimana.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Inaongarā, nathum khaih kaphākhuila?” “Makhuimana,” da athumna ngahānkai.
Jishuna athumli hānga, “Nathumwui khaihlan chi marikhongwui yāvāk horsanglu, chili kasamphangra.” Athumna khaihlan chi horkasang eina mangakhunshokrarthuwa, kaja khaih sorngasaida kāhaowa.
Jishuna leikashia sākhangatha̱ china Peterli hānga, “Hi Proholaka!” Peterna chi Prohona kaji kashā eina phahon mangavaila leikasā chi awui phahon chi sangkhuilaga tara̱lungli yongzanghaowa.
Sākhangatha̱ khangateibingna marikhong tongda khaihlanli khai pemting eina shimenshoka, kaja athum ngalei kathengwui eina lam hangphangā sha̱khamāng mataksai.
Athumna ngalei kathengli kashok eina chili mei sāhailaga chiwuitungli khaih ruikasā kala khamui haikasā chi thei.
Chieina Jishuna athumli hānga, “Arui phākakhui khaih kakhuirālu.”
Simon Peterna khaihlan chi angakhunkashok eina khaih kahahak pemting eina shākha hangphangāda kathum zangsai; kala khaih chiyākha kālala khaihlan chi makākmana.
Jishuna athumli “Rāphazālu” da hānga. Sākhangatha̱ khipānakha ali “Na khipākhala?” da mangahānlengmana, kaja a Prohona kaji athumna thei.
Chieina Jishuna khamui chi akhuilaga athumli yaowa; khaihla chithada yaopapama.
Jishuna ringlui kahaiwui thili sākhangatha̱bingli rākachithei chi hina kakathumana.
Jishuna ali kakhaneli hāngluishita, “Johnwui naomayara Simon, na ili leishila?” Ana “Mha, Proho, ina nali leishiya kaji nana thei,” da ngahānkai.
Jishuna ali hānga, “Iwui yaobingli homlu.”

Kakathumali Jishuna hānglui, “Johnwui naomayara Simon, na ili leishila?” Kakathumalila “Na ili leishila?” da khangahānwui vang Peter wukkhananghaowa; kala hithada ngahānkai, “Proho, nana saikora katheina; ina nali leishiya kaji nana thei.” Jishuna ali hānga, “Iwui yaobingli phāuilu.”

“Kachangkhat ina nali kahāngna, nganuilakha na khalatta shānneira̱ neilaga nawui zatkhangangaili zata; kha ara rarkahai eina napāng khāngkāda nawui shānneira̱ mi khangateina neimilaga mavākhangaipamli thānzatra.”
(Jishuna kahāng hi Peterna kachikathā mithit eina Vareli tekmatei ngasakrakhala kaji kachitheina). Chiwui thili Jishuna ali hānga, “Ithi shurlu.”
Peterna ali kathei eina Jishuli hānga, “Proho, mipa hi kathārakhala?”
Jishuna ngahānkai, “I marāranglakha eina tangda ina ali leisa ngasakngai jilala, china nali khi saura? Ithi shurmalu.”

Chieina sākhangatha̱pa hi mathimara da Jishuwui kashurabingwui ngachaili pao hi ngayaohaowa; thalala Jishuna chi kahāng maningmana; ana kahāngva, “I mararanglakha eina tangda ina ali ringsā ngasakngaiakha, nali china khi sara̱khala?” kajina.
ali kazingramli makhuikāranglakha awui paokazata sāda kapangkhui kahai mibingli Manglā Katharawui pangshap eina hāngmathinkhami chi ina kapihaira.

Ana thikahaiwui thili zimiksho hangmati thangwui alungli athumli rāsamphangda apong kachungkha eina a ringda lei kaji tharzā eina azak eina chithei. Athumna ali mik eina thei kala ana athumli ngazekta Vare wungramwui pongli tamchithei.
Ana athumli ngasopamda leilakha, Jerusalemwui eina mathuihaila Avāva̱na ngashitmi kahai chi honpamsā khavai hithada hānga, “Nathumna iwui eina shāhaira,
kaja Johnna tara̱ eina ra̱hikmi kha ara masāngla nathumli Manglā Kathara eina ra̱hikmira.”
Athum rākakazip tharan, athumna ali ngahāna, “Proho, atam hitharan nana Israelli wungram chi samphang ngasakmiluishitrala?”
Jishuna hānga, “Atam angarit chi Avāna a khalattawui sāshap eina retkahaina, chi nathumna theikapai maningmana.

Kha Manglā Kathara chi nathumwuitungli tāshungkhami tharan, nathumna pangshap samphanglākra. Cheina nathumna Jerusalemlila, Judea ngalei katongalila, Samarialila kala okathuiwui akatanga vāshungda iwui vang shākhi sāra.”
Hi hānghailaga athumwui miktāli ali khuikāhaowa, kala muiyāna tākhaluikhuida chiwui alungli shimānhaowa.
Ana kakā chi athumna yangda leilakha, yanglu, kachon kachara khangavai mayarnao khanina athumwui ngalemli nganingda hānga;
“Galileenaobing, nathum kachiwui vang eina kazingramli ngashānkhayangkhala? Nathumwui eina kazingramli khuikā kahai Jishu hi, arui kazingli khuikakā kathei hi tākam eina ana latrāluira.”
Chiwui thili athumna Jerusalemwui ngalemli khalei, kilometer akha sha̱kha katā, Olive phungreiwui eina Jerusalemli latunga.

Athumna keinung chili kazang eina Peter, John, James, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, Alphaeuswui naomayara James kala Zealot kaho Simon kala Jameswui naomayara Judaslong pamkasa mathāng atowui kā chili kai.
Athumna Jishuwui ava̱ Mary eina achināngarā kala sha̱nao kateila zangda atam kasang kharei ungkaziplaga seihā sāchinga.
Chitharan Peterna avānaobingwui (athum mi shakha maga̱ sha̱kha ngasokapam chiwui) ngachaili nganingda hānga,
“Ivānaobing, Jishuli tukkakhuibingli kathāna Judaswui apongli Manglā Katharawui pangshap eina achālakha Davidna hāngkahai kathara tui chi ungshungphalungra.
Ali ithumwui ngachaili shānsanghaisai, kala otram khangatha̱ hili awui yarla mihaisai.”
(Mayara hina awui makhayāwui sāman eina lui akha lokhui; kala chili kashuirak eina kongluida akhari akharā ngapophātserhaowa.
Kala chi Jerusalemli khalei mi saikorana theisera, chieina lui chi athumwui tui eina Akeldama, “Asheewui Lui” da phokmi.)
“Kaja Laa lairikli hithada kapihaida leili,
‘Awui shim machohaoranu,
khipānakha chili maokthuiranu.’
kala
‘Mi khangatei akhana awui otpam chi khuiranu.’
“Chiwui vang eina Proho Jishuna ithumwui ngachaili leilakha atam kachida ithumli ngasokasā,
Johnna ra̱hikkhamiwui ot sākaphok eina thuilaga Proholi khuikakā eina tangda chiwui alungli kazangabingwui ngachaili akhana ithumli ngasoda ringkhaluiwui pongli shākhi sāphalungra.”
Chieina athumna Joseph, Barsabbasla kaho (Justusdala kaho) eina Matthiasli kapangshoka.
Chiwui thili athumna seihā sai, “Proho, mi kachiva̱wui kaphaning nana thei, chieina khalattana vākhangayiya apamli vākhavai
Judaswui mahut sāda paokazata sākhavai khani hiwui ngachaili nana kapangkakhui chi chitheimilu.”
Athumna aniwuitungli ka̱lā yanga; yanglaga Matthiaswuitungli tāhaoda rida leikasā pāokazata tharāda akha chiwui alungli ngarumsanghaowa.
Pentecost zimiksho kharā eina shitkasangabing saikora apam akhali kaziprumsai.
Kashuirak eina masi panglāk eina kaphan thada akhon akha kazingramwui eina tālaga athumna pamkasa shim chi pemtinghaowa.
Kala malezak kakhui meiwon thada rāda mi kachiva̱wuitungli rāsāza̱mi.
Chieina athum Manglā Katharana pemtinghaoda Manglāna athumli matui khangasak tuiyur khangatei eina matuiphokhaowa.
Chitharan okathui apam kachiva̱wui eina kharā shitkasang khangazipa Jihudi kachungkha Jerusalemli leisai.
Athumna akhon chi kashā eina, mi kachungkha rakazipa, kala athum matakhakhaowa kaja shitkasangbingna kachichāramtui eina matuikasa chi athum kachivana shai.
Chieina athumna khakshingakta kala matakhakhaida hānga, “Matuida khaleibing hi Galilee mi maningsermala?
Kala ithum kachiva̱na kachicharamtui eina matuida khalei ithumna kashā hi kathada rāhaokhala?
Ithum Parthia, Media, Elam kala Mesopotamia, Judea, Cappadocia, Pontus kala Asia,
Phrygia, Pamphylia, Egypt kala Cyrene ngaleili khalei Libyawui ngakaikha, Romewui eina kharā Jihudibing kala Jihudi onkahaibing,
Crete, eina Arabia mibing, ithumna Varewui matakhak kahai otsak athumna imaramtui eina hāngda khalei ithumna shai.”
Chieina athum saikora matakhakhaoda maphākhuilakla akha eina akha hāngngaroka, “Hi khiwui kakhalatkhala?”
Kha khangatei kaikhana mana̱shida, “Athum zamshei manglaga malip kahaina” da hānga.
Kha Peterna tharāda akha chili ngasoda nganingkālaga akhon panglāk eina vaoda hānga: “He Judea mibing kala Jerusalemli kapama saikora, nathumna hi theimilu kala iwui tui hi ningsangda khanganāmilu,
kaja nathumna kaphaning thada athum khamalip maningmana, arui pung kakathumamāng tāthadharmaya.
Shokta khalei hi Joel marānna hānghaikasā china:
Kaja mi saikorali iwui manglā heirorra,
kala nathumwui naomayarabing eina naongalāva̱bingna marānra,
mahākhami nathumwui khanuithotna theira,
kala ararnaobingna mang shimanra,
Mha, iwui rao sha̱nao mayarnaobingwuitungli chitharan
ina iwui Manglā heirorra kala athumna marānra.
Ina atungshong kazingramli matakhak kahai chitheira,
azingshong okathuili machut mira,
ashee kala mei kala tara̱ akahurwui meikhutla theingasakra,
zimikla tangkhamang onngasakhaora,
kachāngla ashee onhaora,
Prohowui hakkhamahā
tekhamatei zimiksho chi marāranglakha.
Kala Prohowui mingli khangakao mi kachiva̱ makahatlakla kahui samphangra.
“Isrealnaobing, tui hi nganāmilu, Nazarethwui Jishu hi Varewui ngasokhami mangā eina nathumwui ngachaili hakkhamahā otla, matakhak kahaila kala machutkakhui otla kasā nathumna theihaira.
Rilak eina Varena ngarānping kahai athishurda Jishuli nathumwui pāngli horsangmi kala makaphābingwui pāng zangda ali krushtungli shaothat ngasaka.
Kha Varena ali kathiwui kachotkachāng eina khalāmihaida ringngasakhaowa. Kathiwui pangshap china matuknarrarmana.
Kaja Davidna awui pongli hānga,
‘Proholi ina iwui mangāli theichinga,
A iwui yashongli lei, chieina ina mangatha̱luimara.
Chieina iwui ning ringphai kala imale khamathānna pemtinghai.
Kala thikapai iphasāna chihansa̱ ngasāmkhuira,
Khikhalajila nana ili kazeiramli manothahaimara
lah nawui Katharapa chili chikhurli mashuitā ngasakmara.
Nana ili kharingwui shongfa theingasakhaira,
Nawui ngasokhami china ili khamathān chipemmira.’
“Ivānaobing, ina pinglak eina awo kharar Davidwui pongli hangshapa; kaja a thihaida kachizanla chizanhaira, kala awui chikhur aja eina tangda ithumwuili lei.
A marān akhana kala awui wungpamkhongli awui naotun akha chipamra da Varena ngashitmi kahai chi ana thei.
Ana naoda khi shokrakhala kaji theida, Khristana ringshokluiki kajiwui pongli hithada hānga, ‘Ali kazeiramli manothāhaimana, awui phasāla chikhurli mashuitāmana.’
Varena Jishuli ringkhangasak ithum saikorana shākhina.
Ara Varewui yāshong pamngasakta, ngashit kahai Manglā Kathara chi Avāva̱wui eina samphanga kala ithumwuitungli heirorkhami chi nathumna kathei kala kashā hina.
Kaja Davidna kazing makāmana, chithālala ana hānga,
‘Prohona iwui Proholi hānga;
iwui yāshong pamlu.
Nawui yangkashebingli ina nawui pheinai masangasakranglakha eina tangda.’
“Chiwui vang eina, nathumna krushli shaothat kahaia Jishu hili Varena Prohola, Khristala sāngasakhaira kaji hi Isrealnao saikorana theikazazakhairanu.”
Tui chi kashā tharan, athumwui ning sāza̱haoda Peter kala paokazatbing chili hānga, “Ivānaobing, ithumli khi saulu jikhala?”
Chieina Peterna hānga, “Ning ngateihaolu, kala nathumwui morei pheomi khavai Jishu Khristawui ming singda nathum kachiva̱ ra̱hikhaolu, chithākha Manglā Katharawui lemmet chi nathumna samphangra.
Tuingashit hi nathum kala nathumwui naongarāli kala katāva̱li khalei ithumwui Proho Varena hokakhui mi kachiva̱li khamina.”
Peterna khangatei tui kachungkha eina shākhi mida athumli kasatsangda poi, “Makhamashunga mithot hiwui eina yāmshok khavai sālu.”
Awui tui khuikasanga mi saikorali ra̱hikmi kala chithanghon mi thingkathum sha̱kha ngarumsanga.
Athumna paokazatbingwui tamkachitheilila, ngarumsakla, kala khamui shaikhangarum eina seihā kasālila ningtumlak eina sakruma.
Paokazatbingwui mangā eina matakhak kahai machutkakhui kachungkha sāda mi kachiva̱wuitungli khangachee rai.
Shitkasanga saikora akha sāda ot saikora ngaraichāda sāngarumsai.
Athumwui khalalei lan, thongthāng saikora yorhaida kachikathāthā khavātabing saikorali ngayarmi.
Thangkachida khorumshimli kāngarumda athumwui shimli khamuila shaingarumda shaohaha phazāngarumchinga.
Kala Vareli sochikatta mi saikorana ngahānngai. Huimi kahai mi Prohona athumli thangthang ngarumsangmichinga.
Chitharan seiha kasa atam, pung kachiko katā tharan Peter eina Johnna seihā sākhavai khorumshimli kai.
Kala kapharāwui eina phei sheikasha̱ mi akha, khorumshimli kharābingwuili pozāpai khavai Khamathā kaho khorumshimwui ngavei chili rāchipampam ji.
Peter eina Johnna khorumshimli zanguki kaji eina ana pheisānao poi.
Peter eina Johnna yangtitta hānga, “Inili yanglu.”
Chieina aniwui eina khikhikha samphanglapai da ningsanglak eina yanga.
Kha Peterna hānga, “I sinala, lupāla maleimana, kha iwui khalei chi nali khamina, Nazarethwui Jishu Khristawui mingli ina nali ngakarthuida zatlu da kakasona.”
Chiwui thili awui yāpang singkhuida khāngkhamathot eina ngalāngda awui phei, pheimikra̱ sheikasha̱ chi phāhaowa.
Ngakarthuida ana ngalonglaga zatung zatvai; kala Vareli masot chikatta khorumshimli anili ngasozanga.
Ana zatmamānda Vareli masot kachigat chi mi saikorana thei,
kala khorumshimwui Khamathā Ngavei kaho chiwui pheili pokapama chipāna da theihaoda ali kathada rāshokmamei kahaikhala da mibingna phaninglaga matakhakhaowa.
Ana Peter eina Johnli ngathānkazat chi theilaga mibingna matakhakhaida Solomonwui khamrei kaho chili yongra ngaroka.
Chi theida Peterna hānga, “Isrealnaobing, hili khisāda matakhakhaokhala, iniwui pangshap lah khamathā eina ali zatngasak kahai thada khisāda inili matakhak eina yangtitlikhala?
Pilatena chihomihaoga kaji tharan nathumna mamayāmada khalan kahaia awui rao Jishuli, Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, kala ithumwui avāngarābingwui Varena tekmatei ngasakhaira.
Kha nathumna Kathara kala Khangarongpali khalanhailaga mi shaokathatapāli chihomi khavai poi.
Kharingawui akhavāli nathumna shaothathaowa, kha Varena kathiwui eina ali ringngasaka, hiwui shākhi ithumna.
Awui mingli shitkasang china nathumna theida khalei mipa hili pangngasakhaira, kala Jishuwui mangā eina shitkasang china nathum saikorawui mangāli awui phasā pongngasakhaira.
“Ara, ivānaobing, nathumwui kathānabingna sākahai thada, nathumnala matheimada sāhaira da ina thei.
Kha Varena awui marānbing saikorawui khamor eina Khristana kachotkachāng phungphalungra da rida hāngkahai chi ana ungshung ngasakhaowa.
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui morei pheomipai khavai mai ngareiungda ningngateilu.
Chieina Prohowui eina manglāwui pangshap samphangra kala kapang kahaia Khristala kaho Jishuli nathumwui vang chihorāpaira.
Achālakhawui eina thuida Varena awui kathara marānbingli shichinlaga hāngngasak kahai saikora chi maungshungranglakha eina tangda a kazingramli leisāphalungra.
Kaja Mosesna hānga, ‘Ili chihokharā thada Proho Varena nachinā marān akha chihorāra. Ana kahāng saikora nathum nganāphalungra.
Marān chili manganākasang mi kachiva̱li yurwui eina katathaora.’
Samuelwui eina thuilaga maron maron eina kharā marān saikoranala atam hiwui tui hānghaisai.
Nathum marānbing kala Varena tuingashit mikahai navā ngarāwui naongarāna, kaja Abrahamli hithada hānga, ‘Nawui ara̱-azāwui mangā eina okathuili khalei shimkhur saikorali somira.’
Varena awui rao chi kapangkhuida, mi kachiva̱na makaphā-makhayāwui eina mai ngareiungda sokhami samphang khavai rimeikapta nathumwuili chihorai.”
Peter eina Johnna yaruili matuimahungda leilakha, pāngmonbing, khorumshim kashina akhavābing kala Sadduceebing rārāsai.
Anina Jishu kathiwui eina ringkhaluiwi tui tamkachithei chiwui vang athumna malungvāthaowa.
Chieina anili tukkhuida ngayā phāthopli narpihaowa, kaja tukkakhui atam chi kazing yinghairasai.
Kha aniwui tui kashā mi kachungkhana shitsanghaowa, kala shitkasang mi thingphangā sha̱kha kashunghaowa.
Akhama kathā athumwui kathānabing eina ararbing kala ain kathemabing zangda Jerusalemli kazipa.
Kakazip chili Annas pāngmon khareila, Caiaphasla, Johnla, Alexander kala pāngmon khareiwui shimkhur saikorala zanga.
Anili alungthungli nganing ngasaklaga ngahāna, “Khiwui pangshap eina kala khipāwui ming eina nanina hi kasākhala?”
Chieina Manglā Katharana pemkahaiya Peterna hānga, “Yaruiwui kathānabing kala ararnaobing!
Inina phei kateka mi akhali kaphā ot sāmi kahai, ali kathada raimihaokhala da inili hānglu jiakha,

hi nathum saikora, kala Israelwui mi saikorana theikhuiranu kaja nathumna krushli shaothat kahaia kala kathiwui eina Varena ringlui ngasak kahaia Nazarethwui Jishu Khristawui ming chiwui pangshap eina mipā hili raimihaida nathumwui mangāli nganingli.
Hi nathum shim kasābingna horkahai kha achithekwui akhoka sāthui kahai lunggui china.
Huikhami hi khangatei khipākhawuilila maleimana, okathui hupva̱li mibingwui ngachaili aming hi maningla khangatei huimishapa aming mikahai maleilakmana.”
Hangva̱naobingna Peter eina Johnwui kaping chi theilaga kala ani lairik makatama mina kaji phaningvālaga matakhakhaowa. Chieina ani Jishuli ngasosai kaji athumna theikhui.
Kha kakazā raimi kahai mipā chi aniwui ngalemli khanganing chi athumna theilaga athum khikha hānglui khavai maleithuwa.
Chieina anili hanga̱shimwui eina shoksāpaira da hānglaga athum akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta hānga,
“Ithumna anili khi kasā phameirakhala? Jerusalemli khalei mi kachiva̱na anina matakhak kahai sākahai chi theihaira, kala ithumna chi makhamayā masārarmana.
Kha ara hili lāngda tui hi mangayao khavai, kaja Jishuwui ming singlaga mamatuilui khavai anili hāngmachinhaosa.”
Chieina athumna anili hozangkhuilaga, Jishuwui ming singda khamatuila, tamkachitheila masāpailakmara da hāngluishita.
Kha Peter eina Johnna athumli ngahānkai, “Varewui miktāli awui tui khanganāli nathumwui tui khanganāna mashungmeila, nathum khalatta machukyanglu.
Kaja ithumna kathei, kashā chi makahāng masārarmara.”
Chi kahāng eina athumna mibingli khangacheewui vang, anili kashong lāngkhavai shongfa masamphangthuda hāngmachinlaga thuingasakhaowa. Chi mi saikorana theilaga Vareli masot chikata.
Matakkhak kahai otsak eina raimi kahai mipa chi zingkum hangmati lānghairasai.
Anili chiho kahaiwui thili ngasotnaobingwuili vāda pāngmon akhokabing eina ararnaobingna hāngkahai saikora chi vahāngchithei.
Tui chi shālaga, athum khokkha sāda Vareli masochikatta hānga, “Kazingram, okathui kala shamadru kala chiwui alungli khalei saikora kasā Sashap-pangshapa Proho!
Manglā Katharawui pangshap eina nawui rao, ithumwui avāva̱ Davidli awui khamor eina hithada hāngkhangasaka;
‘Khisāda Gentilebingna malungvātkhala?
Khisāda mibingna aremawui ot phaningphāphākhala?
Okathuiwui awungabingna ngaranda,
kala khamungabing kazip ngarumda,
Proho kala awui Thaoh neomi kahaiali yangshi.’
athumna kakazip hi nawui pangshap kala kaphaning eina shokkhavai ngarānping kahaina.
Ara, Proho, athumwui khamachit hi nana yangmida, nawui raobingli malung pinglak eina nawui tui matui ngasakmilu.
Raimi khavai napāng katingshokmilu kala nawui kathara rao Jishuwui ming kasing mangā eina matakhak kahai kala machutkakhui sapai khavai mayāmilu.”
Seihā sāchang kahai eina athumna kakazip apam chi nganukhaowa; kala athum saikora Manglā Katharana pemhaida Varewui tui pinglak eina matui.
Paokazatbingna pangshap leilak eina Proho Jishuwui ringkhaluiwui shākhi mi kala athum saikorawuitungli Varewui sokhami heirormi.
Athumwui alungli khavāta mi akhala maleisāmana, kaja atam atamli shimla luila khaleibingna chi yorhailaga samkaphang pheisā saikora khuiungda,
paokazatbingwui pāngli horsangmi, kala khavāt khalei mi kachiva̱li ngayarmi.
Chithada sāda Cyprusli kapharā Joseph kaho Levi akha, paokazatbingna Barnabbasla kaphoka, (chiwui kakhalata “Kasatkasangwui naomayara”) ana,
awui lui yorhailaga samkaphang lupā chi paokazatbingwui pāngli horsangmi.
Kha Ananias kaho mayarnao akha eina apreiva̱ Sapphirana lam kateo akha yora,
kala apreiva̱wui khamayā zangda aman chi ngakaida haihailaga khumkhamāng paokazatbingwui pāngli rāsangmi.
Chiwui thili Peterna hānga, “Ananias, kathada nana chipeewui tui khuilaga Manglā Katharali kapikta lam khayorwui aman ngayarda thumhaokhala?

Lam chi mayorranglakha nawui maningmala? Yorkahaiwui thili chiwui aman chila nawui maningmala? Chithākha, khiwui vang eina nana chikathā ot sahaokhala? Hiya mikumoli kakapik maningla Vareli kakapikna!”
Ananiasna tui hi kashā eina kongluisangda thihaowa, kala kashā saikorana ngacheelakhaowa.
Chiwui thili yaronnaobingna ngakarthuida kachon eina romlaga ayarli achizanhaowa.
Pung kathum sha̱kha shānglaga khi shokhairakhala kaji matheila apreiva̱ rārāsai.
Peterna ali ngahāna “Nani preigaharna lam yorlaga samkaphang pheisā chi himalā?”
Ana ngahānkai, “Mha, himana.”
Chieina Peterna ali hānga, “Khisāda nani khani mayāngarokta Prohowui Manglāli chāng yanghaokhala? Yanglu, nagaharali vākachizanbing khamongpheili ungshunghaira kala nalila athumna ngazonshokhaora.”
Chili ngalāngda ala Peterwui pheizingli saosangda thihaowa. Yaronnaobing china shimlung kazang eina ala thihairasāda agaharawui ngalemli achizanhaowa.
Church katongana kala hi kashā mi saikorana ngacheelakhaowa.
Chitharan paokazatbingwui pāng eina mibingwui alungli matakhak kahaila kala machutkakhuila tarākha sai kala athum saikorana Solomonwui khāmreili kazipruma.
Athum phāya da mibingna ngazeklala mi khipānakha athumwui alungli mavāzanglengmana.
Chitha-ilala, mayarnaola, sha̱naola Proholi shitkasang mi ashang eina chungmeikharda ngarumsanghaowa.
Chiwui vang eina Peterna khaung khavā atamli aka̱lāmāngla saza̱khui khavai, athumna shongfapheili petla khomphāla hamlaga kakazānaobingli khuirāda chipethai.
Jerusalemwui kuikhamareili khalei keinungbingwui einala kakazābing kala makathar manglā kazangbing khuirāda raimisera.
Kha pāngmon kharei eina ali khangaso Sadduceebingna athumli yuishihaowa.
Chieina athumna paokazatbingli tukkhuida khangachā phātop shimli narhai.
Kha ngayāshong Prohowui kazingrao akhana phātop shimwui khamongbing chi shomihailaga athumli khuishokta hānga,
“Nathumna khorumshimli vanganingda mibingli kharingawui tui saikora hi ahāngchitheilu.”
Athumna tui chi shāda kazing kathang eina khorumshimli atamchitheiphoka.
Chitharan pāngmon kharei eina ali khangasobing china hanga̱ kazipngarum khavai Jihudiwui ararbingli hokhui, kala paokazatbing chili akhui khavai phātop shimli mi chihovai,
kha akhavābingna phātop shimli vākashung tharan paokazatbing chi maleisāthuda, athumna hanunglaga hithada unghānga,
“Phātop shim lonkazaklaga haikasā ithumna thei, kala khamayonabing china khamong saikorali nganingsai, kha ithumna khamong chi kasho eina shimlungli khipākha maleisāmana.”
Khorumshim kashinabing eina pāngmon akhokabingna tui saikora chi shālaga paokazatbing chi kathada shokhaokhala da matakhakhai.
Khaleilaga mi akhana rāhānga, “Nathumna phātop shimli sanghaikasābing chi khorumshimli nganinglaga mibingli tamchitheida lei.”
Chieina akhavā china kashinabingli ngasovālaga athumli akhuiluishita, kha mibingna lunggui eina horpaishina da khangacheewui vang zakshilāk eina masāmana.
Athumna paokazatbing chili khuiungda hangva̱wui mangāli nganing ngasaka, kala pāngmon kharei china athumli hānga,

“Nathumli mipa hiwui ming eina matamchitheilakalu da kaso kahaina, kha nathumna nathumwui tamkachithei hi Jerusalem peida ngayao ngasakhaira kala mayara hiwui ashee katā chi ithumwuitungli tāngasakida sai.”
Kha Peter eina paokazatbingna ngahānkai, “Mibingwui tui nganāki kajipale Varewui tui nganātha̱ra.
Ishawo ngarāwui Vare china, nathumna thingtungli shaoshanda sāthat kahaia Jishu chili ringngasakhaira,
Varena ali Isrealnaobingli ningngateida, morei pheomi khavai kathāna Huikhame akha sāngasakta awui yāshong chipama.
Kala ithumna ot saikora hiwui shākhina. Chithada sāda awui kahāng khanganā athumli Varena khami Manglā Kathara chinala shākhina.”
Hangva̱naobing china hi kashā eina malungkangnāhaida paokazatbing chili shaothatngai.
Kha chān khangazek chiwui alungli, ain kachishuta kala saikorana khayākashi Gamaliel kaho Pharisee akhana nganingda mibing chili kasha̱khawui vang kayāngli khuishokhaisalu da kasoi.
Ana athumli hānga, “Isrealnaobing, nathumna mibing hili khi sarakhala da phaningkazaklu.
Khare kachāng Theudasna a khalatta mi akhana da phaninga kala mayar shāmati sha̱khana thi shura kha ali shaothat kahai eina athi kashurabing chila ngapha̱haoda khikha mashokthuwa.
Awui thili mishān kakhui atamli Galileewui Judasna mi kaikhali athi shurkhavai khomkhui, kha ala shimānhaowa, kala athi kashurabingla ngapha̱haowa.
Chieina ajawui tuishot hili ina nathumli kachangkhat eina kahāngna, mibing hili khikha masālaklu. Athum ningsasakranu. Athumna khangarān kala otsak hi mikumowui eina kashokna jiakha shimānhaora.
Kha hi Varewui eina kharāna jiakha, nathumna athumli mashimān ngasakrarmara. Kala nathumna Vareli ngakaikashi ngasāsāpai!”
Athumna Gamalielna hāngkachithei chi khuisanga.
Chieina paokazatbing chili hosanglaga athumli shaowa kala Jishuwui ming singda mamatui khavai kasolaga thuingasakhaowa.
Jishu mingwui vang athumna kakhayak samkaphang chi khangayi otna da theikhamiwui vang mathānthup eina athumna hanga̱shim eina thuihaowa.
Kala thangkachida athumna khorumshimlila, shimlila Jishu hi Khristana kaji hākashok, tamkachithei mathāhailakmana.

Chitharan sākhangthābingwui mishān mataisangmamān kaji eina Greek khamatui Jihudibingna athumwui ra̱meinaobingli thangthangwui kashakazā mathada mayangkhamiwui vang Aramaic khamatui Jihudibingli maringkaphā tui matuiphoka.
Chieina paokazata tharāda khani china shitkasangbing saikorali hokhuilaga hānga, “Varewui tui hākashok chihohailaga kashakazāwui vang otram khangatha̱ mamashungmana.
Chiwui vang eina ivānaobing, Manglā Katharana kapem kala theithangkhamei mi shini nathumwui eina kapangkhuilu, athumli ot hiwui yangkhame sāngasakra.
Laga ithumva seihā kasā kala pao hākashok māngli ningyāng chigatra.”

Athumwui tui hi shālaga saikorana ningyāng unglakhaowa, chieina athumna shitkasang kala Manglā Katharana pemting kahaia Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas kala Antiochwui eina Jihudi onkahai Nicalaus athumli kapangkhui.
Kapangkhui kahaibing chili yaruina paokazatbingwui mangāli khuikai, kala athumwuitungli pāng khāngkāda seihā sāmi.
Chieina Varewui tui ngayaovāshumda Jerusalemli sākhangatha̱bingwui mishān mataikhangai mataisanghaowa, kala pāngmon kachungkhala shitsanghaowa.
Varewui lukhamashan kala pangshapna pemting kahai Stephenna mibingwui ngachaili matakhak kahai kala machut tarākha sai.
Kha synagoguewui alungli ningkhān kasā mi kaikha, Cyrenewui mila, Alexandriawui mila, Cilicia eina Asiawui mibingla zangda Stephenli mamayāmada thuingayāta.
Kha Stephenli Manglāna thangkhamei sangmida khamatui chitharan, athumna mangasungrarthuwa.
Chieina athumna mi kaikhali ngathumda suikhuilaga, “Ana Moses eina Vareli khamashāt ithumna shāhaira” da hāngngasaka.
Hithada sāda mibinglila, ararnaobinglila kala ain kathembinglila athumna ning ngatha̱ ngasaka. Chieina athumna ali atukkhuilaga hanga̱li khuikai.
Kala athumna makhamashunga shākhi khuirāda hānga, “Mipa hina kathara apam hili kala Moseswui ainli makhamayā tui matuishonda lei.
Kaja kathara shim hi Nazarethwui Jishuna sākhayānghaora kala Mosesna ithumli mikahai khangachāyan chila ngachei ngasakra da kahāng ithumna shāhaira.”
Hanga̱shimli kapam saikorana Stephenli yangvāser kaji eina awui mai kazingraowui thada thei.
Chiwui thili pāngmon kharei china ali ngahāna, “Kaphenbing hi mashungla?”
Chieina Stephenna ngahānkhai, “Ivānao ngarā kala ishāvā ngarā, iwui tui nganāmilu. Ithumwui awokharar Abrahamna Haranli mavāpānranglakha Mesopotamiali tekhamateiwui Varena rāsamphanga,
kala ali hānga: ‘Nali pharāsang kahai ram kala nawui shangnao chihohailaga ina chitheiki kaji ramli vālu.’
Chiwui thili ana Chaldea ngalei chihohailaga Haranli vāpānthuihaowa. Avāva̱ thikahaiwui thili, Varena ali arui nathumna pānda khalei ngalei hili khuirai.
Chithālala Varena ali apam hili awui pamkhavai ngalei khuiningkhala mamimana, kha awui nao akhala maleisālala Varena ngalei chi ali kala awui ara̱-azāli mira da ngashitmi.
Hiwui pongli Varena ali hāngna: ‘Nawui ara̱-azāna miram khangateili pānra, chili athum rao sāda zingkum shāmati athumli zakshilāk eina sāra.
Kha athumna otram ngatha̱khame mibing chiwuitungli ina bichar sāra, chiwui thili athumna ngalei hiwui eina shokta apam hili ili khorumra.

Chieina Varena Abrahamli tuingashitwui khudam sāda ahui rimkashokwui otsin mi. Abrahamna Isaacli pharākhuida hapta akhawui thili ahui rimshoka, kala Isaacna awui naomayara Jacobli pharākhui kala Jacobna ithumwui avākharar ngarā awui nao tharāda khani pharākhui.

kala awui kakhanang ringkashi saikorawui eina ali kanmi, Egypt awunga Pharaohwui lumkakā samphangpai khavai Josephli Varena thangkhamei mi, chieina awungana ali Egypt katonga kala Pharaohwui shimkhurwuitungli mungkhavai governor sāngasaka.
Chitharan Egypt kala Canaan ngaleili chāmrei rāhaoda kachotkachāng tarākha samphang ngasaka. Ishawo ishayi ngarā zāt masamphangthuwa,
kala Jacobna Egyptli kashakazā lei kaji kashā tharan, awui naongarā, ishawobing chili chihovai.
Athum rākakhaneli, athumli Josephna a khipākhala kaji hāngchithei, chieina Pharaoh awungana Josephwui shimkhurli theihaowa.
Jacobna Egyptli tai kala chili ala, awui naongarābingla thisangsera.
Athumwui phasā chi Shechemli khuiunga kala chili Abrahamna Hamorwui naongarāwui eina lokakhui chikhur chili ungchizana.
Chitharan Josephli makatheia awunga akhana Egyptli mungphokuwa.
Ana ithumwui miyurli sāshilak eina sai kala athumwui angangnaobing chi chithit khavai ishawo ngarābingli tandi sai.
Atam chitharan Mosesli pharai kala Varewui miktāli a khamathā naona. Avāva̱wui shimli ali kachāng kathum nganaowa.
Ali ayarli vahor kahai tharan Pharaohwui naongalāva̱na khuida awui nao thada nganaokhui.
Mosesli Egyptnaobingwui wortam saikora tamchitheisera, chieina tuimatuilila, otsaklila pangshap khalei mi akha ngasāhaowa.
Kala Israelnao akhali Egyptnao akhana zakshilāk eina kasā chi ana theilaga, Egyptnaopa chili shaothathaida athut khuimi.
Awui miyurli Varena ningkhān ngasak khavai ali shichinra kaji hi athumna bhap tāra da ana phaningsai, kha athumna chi bhap matāthuwa.
Akhama kathā ana Israelnao khani ngama̱kasā theilaga mashit khavai ahānga, ‘Nganālu nani Israelnaona, khisāda nani khani ngama̱khala?’
Kha khayonapa china Mosesli sheikārvāhailaga hānga, ‘Nali khipāna ithumwuitungli akhavā sāda bichar sākhavai kasokhala?
Nana ayā Egyptnao akhali shaothat kahai thada ilila shaothatluingaila?’
Ngaworkakā tui hi shālaga Mosesna Egyptwui eina yāmlaga Midian ngaleili vāpānhaowa kala chili nao mayarnao khani pharākhui.
Mosesna chi kathei eina matakhakhaoda mathāmeida yangkhui khavai nganaimeida vai. Kha Prohowui akhon ana shāhaowa.
‘I navā ngarāwui Vare, Abraham, Isaac kala Jacobwui Vare china.’ Moses kathirriri ngacheenāhaoda mayanglengthuwa.
Chieina Prohona ali hānga, ‘Nawui pheihop khuishokhaolu, kaja nana nganingda khalei pam chi kathara ngaleina.’
Egypt ngaleili iwui miyurli sāshilak eina kasā chi theihaira, kala athumwui ringkhangā akhon ina shāhaira. Athumli ngatangkhui khavai katāna. Ara rālu, ina nali Egyptli chihovāra”
Ana mibingli thānshokta Egyptlila, Red Sealila kala kum hangmati lamhānglila thānzatta matakhak kahai kala machut tarākha sai.
‘Varena ili shokkhangasak thada nathumwui vang nachinā ngarāwui eina marān akha shokngasakra’ da Israelnaobingli kahāng chi Moses hilaka.

Sinai kaphungli chān rākhangazeka kazingrao eina ithumwui ishawo ngarābingli ngasoda lamhāngli yārui kazipkhangarumli kazang chi alaka kala ithumli mimaron khavai Varewui kharinga chānpao chila ana samphanga.
athumna Aaronli hānga, ‘Ithumli thānkhavai meoma̱ akha sāmilu, kaja ithumli Egyptwui eina thānkashoka Mosesli khi shokhaokhala kaji ithum matheithura.’
Chieina athumna seinao akha sākhui, kala meoma̱ chili pha̱ya kala athumwui pāng eina sākakhui meoma̱ chili khayāshida mathāna.
Kha Varena athumwui eina mai ngareithuihaowa kala kazingli khalei sirābingli khorum khavai horsangmihaowa, hi marānbingwui lairikli hithada kapihai:
‘He Israelnaobing! Lamhāngli zingkum hangmati zatlakha,
nathumna sāyur ili pha̱kaphayā chigatla?
Nathumna khorum khavai pāng eina sākakhui Moloch kala Rephan kameo sirawui kachonshim khaningkai,
chiwui vang ina nathumli
Babylon vāklaida khuivāhaora.’

Varena kasham kahai miyurbingwui eina athumna Joshuali ngasozangda zangkakhui chitharan ishawo ngarāna athumwui avāva̱ ngarāwui eina samkaphang kachonshim chi khuizanga. Chi Davidwui thot eina tangda leisai.
Davidna Varewui ngahānkhangai samphanga kala Jacobwui Vare pamkhavai shim akha sakākhavai Vareli khamayā poi.
Kha shim sākakāpāva Solomon ngasāhaowa.
“Chithālala, Juikhamataiya Varena miwui pāngna sākakhui shimli mapammana; marānna hāngkahai thada;
okathuina iwui pheiparna.
Iwui vang nathumna kachikathā shim sāmirakhala?
Iwui vang ngasāmkhui khavai pam kali leikhala?
Ot saikora hi ina kasā maningmala?’ da Prohona hānga.
Navā wongarāna marekakharek marān khaleisāla? Khamashunga rao rāki kajiwui tui hāngkhame Varewui paophungabinglila athumna sāthata. Khamashunga rao chili nathumna yansaida shaothathaira.
Nathum kazingraobingna mikhamaron Varewui ain samkaphangbingna, kha nathumna chi mamayonmana.”
Hangva̱naobing china Stephenwui tui chi nganālaga malungvātlakhaoda ahā kachetlaga yanga.
Kha Stephen Manglā Katharana pemhaida kazingramli yangkakā eina Varewui tekhamatei kala Jishuna Varewui yāshong khanganing chi theida,
ana hānga, “Yanglu, kazingram shohaida miwui Naomayarana Varewui yāshong nganingda khalei ina thei.”
Hi kashā eina athumna athumwui khanā kafakhamhailaga panglāk eina vaoda ali ayongrora,
kala keinungwui ayarli khuishoklaga lunggui eina horthathaowa. Chitharan shākhibing china athumwui kashankachon raitāda Saul kaho yaronnao chiwui pheizingli haimisera.
Athumna Stephenli lunggui eina horda leilakha Stephenna, “Proho Jishu, iwui manglā kakhuimilu” da seihā sai.
Ana khuktizangda, “Proho! morei hiwui kashong athumli matāmialu” da panglāk eina vaolaga amanglā chihohaowa.
Shitkasanga mi kaikhana chapngachāda Stephenli chizana.
Kha Saulna church hi shimān khavai sāda shim shimli zanglaga shitkasanga mayarnaolila, sha̱naolila shimenshokta phātopli vāsanga.
Chitharan ngapha̱ kahaibing china apam kachida paokaphā tamchithei.
Philipna Samariawui keinung akhali vāda mibingli Khristawui pao hāshoka.
Philipwui tui kala ana kasā matakhak kahai machut chi theilaga mibing saikorana ana kahāng chili ningsanglak eina nganai.
Mi kachungkhawui eina makathar manglāna panglāk eina vaolaga shoka kala sheikasha̱ kala pheikatekbinglila raimi.
Chiwui vang eina keinung chili chithang khamathān tarākha samphanga.
Keinung chili meowor kathema Samarianaobingli matakhakhai khangasaka, khalatta akhana da langkasoa, Simon kaho mayarnao akha leisai,
kala kateo kharei mi saikorana, “Mipa hi Varewui Pangshap, Kahaka kaho china” da shitsanga.
Athumna ali saklāk eina khuisai kaja awui meowor eina mibingli matakhakhai khangasak atam kasāngkhahairasai.
Kha Philipna Vare wungram eina Jishu Khristawui mingwui paokaphā tamkachithei chi athumna shitsanghaoda mayarnaolila, sha̱naolila ra̱hikmi.
Simonnala shitsanghaoda alila ra̱hikmi. Kala ra̱hikmi kahaiwui thili Philipli ngasozatchinga kala matakhak kahai kala machut tarākha kasā chi theilaga matakhakhai.
Jerusalemli leikasā paokazatbing china, Samariawui mibingna Varewui tui khuisanghaira kaji kashā eina, athumna Peter eina Johnli athumwuili chihovai.
Athumnala Manglā Kathara samphangpai khavai anina vākashung eina athumwui vang seihā sāmi.
Kaja Proho Jishuwui ming singda ra̱hikkhami maningla athum khipākhawuitungli Manglā Kathara matāzangrangsai.
Chiwui thili athumwuitungli anina pāng khāngkāmida Manglā Kathara samphanghaowa.
Paokazatbingna pāng parkharor eina Manglā Kathara samphanga kaji hi Simonna kathei tharan lupā mida
hānga, “Kachikathā mili ina pāng parrorlaga Manglā Kathara samphangpai khavai ilila pangshap milu.”
Kha Peterna hānga, “Nawui pheisā chi nali shimānrumra kaja Varewui lemmet hi lupā eina lokhuipai da nana phaninga!
Hiwui ot hili nawui yar mazangmana; kaja Varewui miktāli kaphaning mamashungmana.
Chiwui vang eina nawui makaphā hiwui vang ningngateilu, kala sāpaiakha nawui ningrin chi pheomi khavai Vareli seihā sālu.
Kaja na mikpaikashi pemting kahai kala moreiwui phātopli leiyada ina thei.”
Simonna hānga, “Zingarāda iwui vang seihā sāmilu, chithākha nanina hāngkahaibing chiwui eina akhala iwuitungli matārormara.”
Athumna Prohowui tui shākhi sāda Varewui tui tamchithei kahaiwui thili, Peter eina Johnna Jerusalemli latunghaowa. Awunlam Samariawui kha̱ung kachungkhali paokaphā hāshoka.
Prohowui kazingrao akhana Philipli hānga, “Ngakarthuida Jerusalemwui eina Gazali tākhavai azingshongwui shongfa chili tāulu.” Hi siwuk shongfana.
Chieina Philipna ngakarthuida zatuwa. Ana zatta leilakha Ethiopiawui awungva̱ Candacewui lan saikora singkhame kahaka akhava, Ethiopiawui ahonga akha Jerusalemli vākhorumlaga shimshong hanungukida,
sigui-gari tonglaga Isaiah marān lairik chi pāzatsai.
Kala Manglā Katharana Philipli hānga “Garipamshong nganaimeida vālu.”
Philipna ngasamvai, kala ana Isaiah marānwui lairik pākasa tui chi shāda ngahāna, “Nana pāda khalei chi khikhala da bhap tāla?”
Chieina ana ngahānkai, “Kachikathā mi akhana mahāngchitheiakha ina kathada bhap tarakhala?” Ana Philipli garili kāpamlu da hokhui.
Ana pāda leikasā kathara tuipam chi hina:
“Taithat khavaipamli khuivā khavai khuikaphunga yaonao,
ahā kachichāpawui mangāli yaonaona
akhon makashok thada,
anala khamor mamakāmana,
Ali maikashi mida mashun hatmihaowa.
Awui okthot khipāna hāngmishapra?
Khikhalajila okathui hili awui mirin ngachanghaira.”
Chieina ahonga china Philipli hānga, “Marānna kahāng hi khipālikhala? Ili kahāngmilu, a khalattali kahāngkā khangatei akhali kahāngkhala?”
Chiwui thili Philipna kathara tuipam hi eina haophoklaga Jishuwui khamathā chānpao hāngchithei.
Anina zatmamānda leilakha tara̱ khaleipam akhali vāshunga. Chieina akhavā china hānga, “Yanglu, hili tara̱ leili, ili ra̱hikmikida khi pankhavai leikhala?”
Philipna ali hānga, “Nana ningtongda shitsangakha ra̱hikmipaira.” Chieina ana ngahānkai, “Ina Khrista hi Varewui naona da shitsanga.”
Kala ana siguigari chi ngasām ngasaka, kala ani khanini tara̱lungli zangda Philipna ahonga chili ra̱hikmi.
Anina tara̱wui eina kashok tharan kashuirak eina Prohowui Manglāna Philipli khuithuihaowa, kala ahonga china Philipli matheiluithuwa, kha awui vāki kajipamli ringphālak eina thuihaowa.
Philip Azotusli leisai. Ana Caesareali vākhavai zatmamānlakha shongfali khalei keinung saikorali paokhamathā hāshokzata.
kala Damascuswui synagoguebingli mikhavai, kaja apam chili Apong hili kashura sha̱naola mayarnaola saikorali atukkhuida Jerusalemli khuiung khavaiwui chithi kapimilu da apoi.
Saulna zatmamānda Damascusli vāshungnanai kashuirak eina kuimareida kahor akha kazingramwui eina ali kaprorra.
Chieina ana ngaleili saosanghaowa, kala ali kaho akhon akha shai, “Saul, Saul, khiwui vang eina nana ili rekharekhaokhala?”
“Proho! na khipākhala?” da ana ngahāna. Akhon china hānga, “Nana rekharekta khalei Jishu chi ina.
Kha ngakarthuida keinungli zanglu, chili nana sāki kaji hāngminaora.”
Ali ngasokazatbing chi khituikha mamatuila nganingshinghaowa; athumna akhonva shai kha khizakkha matheimana.
Saulna ngakarthuida mik kharak tharan khikha akhala matheirarthuwa; chieina athumna apāngli singlaga Damascusli thara̱vai.
Ana zimiksho kathumthang mik matheila pama kala khikha mashai-mashakmana.
Chitharan Ananias kaho sākhangatha̱ akha Damascusli leisai. Prohona ali mahāmida hānga, “Ananias!” Chieina, “I hili leili, Proho,” da ngahānkai.
Prohona ali hānga, “Khangatar Shongfa kaho chili vālu, kala Judaswui shimli Saul kaho Tarsuswui mi akha angathingkhuilu. A seihā sāda leili,
kala Ananias kaho mayarnao akhana awui mik theiluishit khavai awuitungli pāng parrorkida rārāli kaji ali mahāmihaira.”
Kha Ananiasna ngahānkai, “Proho, ana Jerusalemli khalei nawui mibingli kayākha ngasakshida sākhala kaji ili mi kachungkhana hānghaira.
Kala Damascusli nali khokharumbingli tukkhui khavai khamataia pāngmon khareibingwui pangshap khuida rākahaina.”
Prohona ali hānga, “Zatlu, ina ali miyur khangateibing, awungabing kala Isrealnaobingli iwui ming theingasak khavai kapangkhui kahai khutlaina.
Ana iwui mingwui vang kayākha chotchangra̱khala kaji ina ali chitheira.”

Chieina Ananiasna vāda shim chili azanga kala Saulwuitungli pāng parrorda “Ivānao Saul,” da hānga, “nana kathei samphangluishit khavai kala Manglā Katharana pemtinghai khavai, na apam hili rākhavai zatta leilakha shongfali rākachitheia Proho Jishu china ili shirāt kharāna.”
Chili ngalāngda khaihor thada amik eina ngajarta kahai eina kathei samphangluishithaowa. Laga ana ngakarthuida ra̱hikhaowa.
Chiwui thili kashakazā khuida pangshap samphangluishita.
Ana sākhangatha̱bingli ngasoda Damascusli zimiksho sha̱rākhathang pama.
Ana ngalāngda synagogueli vāda “Jishu hi Varivarawui Naomayarana” da tamchithei.

Awui tui kashā saikorana ngahāna, “Mipa hi Jerusalemli Jishuli khokharumabingli shaokathatapā chi maningmala? Kala ana athumli tukkhuilaga pāngmon khareibingwui mangāli khuivā khavai apam hili kharā maningmala?” da matakhakhaowa.
Kha Saulna tamkachitheiwui pangshap mataisangmamānda Jishu hi Khristalaka da theishingkhui khangasak eina Damascusli kapama Jihudibing chili pa̱ngapā ngasakhaowa.
Khaleilaga Jihudibingna Saulli shaothat khavai ngakukphoka,
kha khangarān chi Saulna theihaowa. Ngashun ngayā athumna ali shaothat khavai ngaveili rimpama.
Kha thangngayākha awui kashurabingna ali sopkai akhali sanglaga phākhowui eina chihotāhaowa.
Saulna Jerusalemli unglaga sākhangatha̱bingli ngarum khavai khangarān sai. Kha athum saikorana ali ngacheehaowa, kaja ala sākhangatha̱ akha sāhaira kaji mashitsangthuwa.

Chiwui vang ali Barnabasna paokazatbingwuili thānvai, laga ana awui khāram khavāli kathada Proholi thei kala Prohona ali kathada ngazekkhala kaji athumli hāngchithei. Chili lāngda Saulna kathada Damascusli Jishuwui ming singda pinglak eina pao hāshokkhala kajila athumli hāngchithei.
Chieina Saulna athumli ngasopamda, Prohowui ming singda Jerusalemli zatung zatvāda pinglak eina matuida,
Greek khamatuia Jihudinaobinglila hāngchithei kala khangaphatla ngaphata, kha athumna ali sāthat khavai sai.
Ali sāthat khavai kasā chi shitkasangbingna kathei eina Saulli Caesareali khuitālaga Tarsusli chihounghaowa.

Chitharan Judeali, Galileeli kala Samariali khalei church saikora chingri eina okathui samphanga, Proholi khangachee eina okthuida, Manglā Katharana athumli ringphā ngasakta mishānla chungsangkhangai chungsanga.
Peterna apam saikorali zatung zatvālaga, thangkha Lyddali khalei shitkasangabingli samphang khavai vai.
Apam chili phasā ngakaida thikahai kum chishat petwui eina mangakarthuikharara Aeneas kaho mayarnao akhali samphanga.
“Aeneas,” Peterna ali hānga, “Jishu Khristana nali phāngasakhaira. Ngakarthuida nawui pet masankhuilu.” Chieina ana ngalāngda ngakarthui.
Lydda eina Sharonli okthuida khalei mibing saikorana ali theilaga athumna Proholi mai ngareiunga.
Joppali Tabitha, chiwui kakhalata Dorcas kaho sākhangatha̱va sha̱nao akha okthuisai. Ana kaphā ot kala ngachonkhami ot kachungkha sai.
Atam chitharan a kazāhaoda thihaowa. Chieina athumna awui phasā chi ra̱vaimihailaga atung kā akhali chipethai.
Joppa hi Lyddawui eina chiyākha matāmana, kala sākhangatha̱bingna Peter apam chili leili kaji kashā eina mi khanili, “Thāklak eina kharāmilu” da ahongasaka.

Chieina Peterna athumli ngasovai kala ana vākashung eina athumna khamato kāli khuikai. Ra̱meinao saikorana Dorcasna athumli ngasopamlakha sākhami kashankachonbing chi ali chitheilaga awui ngalemli rāchapa.
Peterna athum saikorali kayāng shokngasakhailaga khuktida seihā sai; chiwui thili ana kathi angunshong ngareiungda hānga, “Tabitha, ngakarthuilu!” Ana mik kharak eina Peterli theida thuipama.
Peterna awui pāng singkhuida khāngmathota, chiwui thili shitkasangabing kala rāmeinaobing saikorali hokhuida ringngasak kahaiva̱ chi athumli mihaowa.
Kashok ot hi Joppa peichaoda kashā eina mi kachungkhana Proholi shitsanga.
Peterna Joppali sāhui khamathena Simonwui shimli zimiksho sha̱rākhathang pamsanga.
awui shimkhurwui mi saikora zangda Vareli khangacheea, mibingli sailamlak eina mikashoka, kala seiha sāching kaje mi akha leisai.
Chithangwui pung kachiko sha̱kha katā atamli, Varewui kazingrao akhana awuili kharā chi tarārik eina mahāmida thei kala “Cornelius” da hoi.
Ana kazingrao chili ngacheerarang yanglaga, “Khikhala Amei” da hānga.
Kazingrao china ngahānkai, “Nawui seihā kasā kala khangachon khamiwui otsak saikora chi Varewui mangāli phaningungkapai sāda kāshunghaira.
Ara Joppali mi chihovāda Simon kohopa Peter chili ahokhui ngasaklu;
ā shamadrupheili kapama, sāhui khamathena Simonwui shimli shimzun sāda lei.”
Kazingrao chi thuikahai eina Corneliusna awui rao khani kala shitkasang khangazipa shipai akha da athumli hokhui.
Shokkahai saikora chi ana athumli hāngchitheilaga Joppali chihovai.
Akhama kathā athumna shongfa zatmamānda Joppali rāshungnanai, ngashunlung atamli, Peterna seihā sākhavai dolāntungli kai.
Ali thaihaoda khikhikha shaingaihaowa; kashakazā ngarān mahungda leilakha ali pingairisihaowa;
chitharan kazingram shohailaga kachon kahaka kathā akhawui chonmarei matili singlaga okathuili chihokatā ali mahāmi.
Chiwui alungli sāyur saikorala, phara̱-pharāyur saikorala kala vānaoyur saikorala zangsera.
Kala akhon akhana ali hānga, “Peter, thuishaothatshailu.”
Kha Peterna hānga, “Ngga, Proho, I makathar lah khamakhao ot akhala mashailakranga”
Kha akhon china hāngluishita, “Varena tharngasak kahai hili nana khamakhaoana majipaimara.”
Hithada kathum shihailaga ot chi kazingram khuikāluihaowa.
Mahākhami chi khikhala da Peterna chukmajalakha, Corneliusna chihokhavā mibing china Simonwui shim ngathingrāmamānlaga ashiwui ngaveili nganingsai.
Kala athumna ahokhuilaga “Peter kaho Simon chi hili maleikhala?” da ngahāna.
Mahākhami chi Peterna phaningkachungda leilakha, Manglāna ali hānga, “Simon nali mi kathumna phāda leili.
Chieina ngakarthuida tālaga ning kachihui maleila athumli ngasothalu, kaja ina athumli chihokharāna.”
Chieina Peterna zanghānga, “Nathumna phāda khalei mi chi ina, khiwui vang kharākhala?”

Athumna hānga, “Shipai shākhawui akhavā Corneliusna chihokharāna. Ava Vareli khokharuma kala Jihudi yur katongana kasoa kaphā mi akhana. Nali awui shimli hounglaga nana hāngmikhangai chi nganākhui khavai Varewui kazingraona nali ahokhuilu da ali hānga.”
Chieina Peterna athumli hozangda chithang ngayā awuili simzun sāngasaka.
Akhama kathā athumli ngasovai kala Joppawui einala avānao kaikhala ngasovai.
Khanaothang kathā Caesareali vāshunga kala Corneliusna awui athei-asābing eina khamashit ngasotnaobingli hokhuilaga ali ngaraipamsai.
Peterna shimlungli kazang eina Corneliusna ali samngarokkhuida awui pheizingli khayākashi eina ngakhumshamzanga.
Kha Peterna ali khāngmathotta hānga, “Ngakarthuilu, ila mikumo akhana.”
Ana Corneliusli ngazekmamānda shimlung kazang eina mi tarākha kazipkasā ana zangthei.

Ana athumli hānga, “Jihudi akhana Gentile akhawui shimli khavā lah khangaso hi masākapai otna kaji nathumna thei. Kha mi khipālikha matharmana lah khamakhaoana da makhuipaimana kaji hi ili Varena chitheimihaira.
Chiwui vang eina ili rākaho tharan ningkhamaong maleila ina kharāna. Ara ili khiwui vang rākahokhala kaji hāngmilu.”
Chieina Corneliusna hānga, “Matithang shānghaira, arui atam himaikha ina iwui shimli pung kachikowui seiha salakha; yanglu, kahāna kachon khangavai mi akha kashuirak iwui mangāli ranganingda
hānga, ‘Cornelius, Varena nawui seihā kasā shāhaira kala nana khangachon khamiwui ot sākahai chi ana phaningungmira.
Kachikathāli Joppali chihovāda Peterla kaho Simonli aholu. Shamadrupheili kapama, sāhui khamathena Simonwuili ā shimzun sāda lei.’ ji.

Chiwui vang eina ina nawui pamli mi hengsāda chihovai, kala nana lumashanmida rāmi kahai hi phālakhaira; Prohona nali hāngmi ngasak khavai kaso kahai chi nganākhui khavai ithum saikora hili kakazipna.”
Chieina Peterna hāngphokuwa, “Ara ina thei kaja Vare hiya mimai mayangmana,
kha yur kachivawui eina ali khangachee mi kala khamashunga ot kasābingli ana mayāsera.
Saikorawui Proho Jishu Khristawui mangā eina chingri kahaiwui paokaphā hāngchitheida Varena Israelnaobingli chānpao chihokharā nathumna thei.
Johnna ra̱kahikwui chānpao hāshok kahaiwui thili Galileewui eina haophoklaga Judea ngalei katongali khamataia otshot shokkahai chi nathumna thei.

Nathumna Nazarethwui Jishuwui pongli kala kathada Varena awuitungli Manglā Kathara kala pangshap heirormikhala kaji thei. Ana apam saikorali vāda kaphā ot sai kala kameo kazangbing saikorali raimi, kaja ali Varena ngasomi.
Ana Israelwui ngaleili kala Jerusalemli sākahai ot saikorawui shākhi chi ithumna. Athumna ali krushtungli shaoshānda sāthathaowa.
Kha Varena kakathumathang kathiwui eina ringngasakta phongshar eina chitheimi,
chi mi saikorali theikhangsak maningmana, kha ana kathiwui eina ringshok kahaiwui thili ali ngasoda phāshak-phazā khangaruma, Varena kapangkhui kahaia shākhi kasābing ithumli theikhangasakna.
Kala kharingabing eina kathebingli bichar sāmi khavai Varena ali kapangkhui kahaina kaji mibingli shākhi sākhavai kala hāshok khavai ithumli ana kaso kahaina.
