Marān saikoranala awui pongli shākhi sai kaja ali shitkasanga mi kachiva̱na awui ming chiwui mangā eina morei pheokhami samphangra.”
Peterna tui hi hāngmahunglakha, pao hi kashā saikorawuitungli Manglā Kathara tāshunga.
Peterli ngasokharā ahui rimkashokbingwui eina shitkasang Jihudibing chi matakhakhaowa, kaja Varena Gentilebinglila Manglā Katharawui lemmet tāshungmi.
Kaja athumna tuiyur khangatei eina khamatui kala Vareli sokachikat chi athumna shai. Chiwui thili Peterna hānga:
“Ithumna Manglā Kathara samphang kahai thada mibing hila samphanghaira. Athumli tara̱li ra̱hikmikida khipāna khāmshaprakhala?”
Chieina ana Jishuwui ming singda ra̱hik khavai athumli kasoi. Chiwui thili athumna ali zimiksho kasha̱khawui vang ngasopamfasa da poi.
Judea ngalei saikorali khalei paokazatbing kala shitkasangabingna Gentilebingnala Varewui tui khuisanghaira kaji shai.
Peterna Jerusalemli khavā tharan, ahui rimkashoka shitkasangabingna ali yetta hānga,
“Khisāda ahui marimkashokbingwui shimli vāzangda phākazāla phazārumkhala?”
Kha Peterna shokkahai chi haokaphokwui eina thuida meisā eina hāngchithei.
“Ina Joppa keinungli seihā sāda leilakha ili hithada rāmahāmi: Kachon kahaka akhawui chonmarei matili singlaga kazingramwui eina chihokatā ina thei kala chi iwui ngalemli tāshunga.
Ina munlak eina khayang tharan aphei mati kakā sāyurla, phara̱-pharāla, yongkazata vānaoyurla thei.
Chiwui thili ili akhon akhana, ‘Peter, thuishaothatshailu’ da kahāng ina shai.
Kha ina ‘Ngga, Proho, makathar khamakhao ot ina ikhamorli masanglakranga’ da hānga.
Kha akhon china hāngluishita, ‘Varena tharngasak kahai hili nana khamakhaona majipaimara.’
Hithada kathum shida shokhailaga saikora chi kazingram khuikāluihaowa.
Atam chichangli Caesareawui eina chihokharā mi kathum chi ina kapama shim chili rāshunga.
Athumli ningkhamaong maleila ngasovā khavai ili Manglāna hānga. Joppawui eina shitkasanga ivānao tharukla Caesareali ili ngasovai kala ithum saikora Corneliuswui shimli azanga.
Kha ana kathada awui shimli kazingrao rānganinglaga, ‘Joppali mi chihovāda Peter kaho Simonli ahokhuilu,
ana nashili chānpao khuirāmida chiwui mangā eina nala kala nashi shimkhurla kahui samphangra’ da rāhāngkhala kaji ithumli hāngchithei.
Ina matuikaphok eina, haokaphokli ithumwuitungli katā thada athumwuitunglila Manglā Kathara tāzanga.
Chieina ‘Johnna tara̱ eina ra̱hikmi, kha nathumli Manglā Kathara eina ra̱hikmira’ da Prohona hāngkahai chi ina phaningunga.
Proho Jishu Khristali shitkasangwui vang eina Varena ithumli khami lemmet chi tākam eina athumlila miakha, I khipāda Vareli ngakaishipairakhala!”
Athumna hi kashā eina athumwui khayetla thāhaowa kala athumna Vareli masotchitkatta hānga, “Chithākha Gentilela ningngateikhuida kharing samphang khavai Varena mayāmihaira.”
Kha Cyprus eina Cyrenewui mi kaikhana Antiochli vākashung eina Greeknaobinglila Proho Jishuwui paokaphā chi hāshoka.
Prohowui pangshapna athumli ngasomi, chieina mi kachungkhana shitsangda Proholi ngareiunga.
Hiwui pao hi Jerusalemli khalei churchna kashā eina Barnabasli Antiochli chihovai.
Ana vākashung eina mibing chili kathada somikhala kaji theilaga a ringphālakhaowa kala Proholi ningtongda shitsangching khavai athumli kasatsanga.
Barnabas hi Manglā Kathara kala shitkasangna pemting kahai kaphā mina kala Proholi shitkasang mi kachungkhala mataisang ngasaka.
Chiwui thili Barnabasna Saulli Tarsusli phāvai,
kala ali samphang kahai eina Antiochli thānunga. Anina chiwui churchli zingkum akha pongzongri ngasopamda mi kachungkhali tamchithei. Shitkasangabingli Christian hokhare hi Antiochlina.
Atam chitharan marānbingna Jerusalemwui eina Antiochli vai.
Athumwui ngachaili Agabus kaho china nganingkada, okathui hili chāmrei akha rāra da Manglāwui pangshap eina phongmi. Hi Claudiusna awunga sāda leilakha shoka.
Chieina sākhangatha̱bingna Judeali khalei shitkasang khangarumbing chili khangachon chihovā khavai mi kachiva̱na kachichāwui mikashap athishurda mingaroksa da ngazeka;
kala athumna chi sāda Barnabas eina Saulwui pāngli mida anina ararbingli chiphunvai.
Atam hitharan Herod awungana church mipha̱ kaikhawuitungli pāng parda sāshilak eina rekharekphoka.
Ana Johnwui agato Jamesli raighai eina sāthathaowa;
hina Jihudibingli ningyāng ungngasakta lei kaji kathei eina Peterlila tukkhui. Hi Khawok-makazang Khamui phanitwui atamli kashokna.

Ali tukkhuida phātopli sanghailaga shipai matitina kānglup kasema kānglup matili shantri sākhavai athumwui pāngli horsangmi. Herodna ali Makānkhami phanitwui thili yaruili khuishoklaga bichar sākhavai ngarānhai.
Chiwui vang Peterli phātopli sanghai, kha churchna awui vang Vareli seihā thuklak eina sāmishonshona.
Herodna yaruiwui mangāli khuishoklaga bichar sāra jithang ngayā, Peterli marikhānghui khani eina khalaplaga shantri khaniwui ngachaili chipethai, kala shantribingna phātop khamongli mayonpama.

Kashuirak eina Prohowui kazingrao akha chili tānganingda phātop shim chi horchamrihaowa. Kazingrao china Peterli yartui khanuklaga “Thakta ngakarthuilu” da mathota. Ngalāngda marikhanghui chi Peterwui eina ngalatāhaowa.
Chiwui thili kazingrao china hānga, “Shaksākhuida pheihopla sangkhuilu.” Chieina Peterna chithada sai kala kazingrao china hānglui, “Nawui kachon ngavaikhuida ithi shurlu.”
Peterna ali shurshoka, kha kazingraona sāda khalei chi kachangshonglaka kaji matheisāmana kha mahākhamina da phaningsai.

Anina shantri khare kala kakhane chi kānshokta naomeikapta keinungli shok khavai mariwui ngavei chili shokshunga. Ngavei china aningsasak shomida shokhaowa. Kala anina shongfa akhali zatta leilakha kashuirak eina kazingrao chi thuihaowa.

Chiwui thili Peterna ning mathingkhaung eina phaningkhuida hānga, “Ara ina theishinghaira, Prohona awui kazingrao shirātāda ili Herodwui pāng eina kala Jihudibingna honkasā saikora chiwui eina kanmihaira.”
Hi phaningkhuilaga, ana John, Markla kahopawui ava̱ Maryshiwui shimli vai, chili mi kachungkha kaziplaga seihā sāsai.
Peterna ngavei khamong chi kashao eina shokshomikida Rhoda kahova̱ rao sha̱nao akha shoka.
Peterwui khak kashā eina ringphanāhaida khamong mashomila shimlungli ngasamzangda, “Peter khamongli nganingda lei” da zanghānga.
Chieina athumna, “Na pāhaira” ji. Kha ana “Kachangkhatna” da hānga. Chithākha “Chi awui kazingraona” da athumna hānga.
Kha Peter khāmong shaopama kala athumna khamong shoda ali kathei tharan athum matakhakserhaowa.

Peterna athumli akhon mashok khavai apāng eina ingkit sai kala kathada Prohona ali phātopwui eina khuishokmikhala kaji hāngchithei. “Hi James eina ivānaobingli hānglu” da hānglaga apam khangteili thuihaowa.
Kazing kathang tharan Peterli khi shokhaokhala da shantribing apam chili maphākhuilakla ngaunlophaowa.

Herodna Peterli phākhavai kasoi, kha athum maphākhuirarthuwa. Chieina ana shantribingli ngahānung ngahānvā sai kala athumli shaothat khavai hukum mihaowa. Chiwui thili Herodna Judeawui eina thuihailaga Caesareali atam kasha̱nakha tāpama.

Chitharan Herodna Tyre eina Sidonwui mibingli malungvātlak eina leisai. Chieina athumna khokkha sākhuilaga ali asamphang khavai khangarān sai. Rimeikapta athumna awungawui kashina Blastusli suikhuilaga mashitta okthui khavai Herodli apoi, kaja aram ngalei chi awungawui eina kashakazā samkaphangna.
Langchin sāhaithang Herodna awungawui sāri ngavaikhuilaga wungpamkhongli pama, kala mibingli tamchithei.
Chieina mibing china, “He mitui maningmana, kameotuina” da vaowa.
Ngalangda Prohowui kazingraona yapkārsanghaowa, khikhalajila Herodna Vareli mamasotchikatmana; kala ali kachaina shaida thihaowa.
Kha Varewui tuiva mataisangda chungmei ngayaovai.
Barnabas eina Saulna aniwui sāphalungki kaji ot chi sakuphailaga, awui ming Markla kaho Johnli thānkhuiphungda Jerusalemwui eina latunghaowa.
Chitharan Antioch churchli marānbing kala kachishutabing leisai, athum chiya Barnabas, Kazika kaho Simeon, Cyrenewui Lucius, Governor Herodli nganaokākhangaruma Mana-en, kala Saul athumna.
Athum kakhum eina Proholi seihā sāda leilakha Manglā Katharana hānga, “Ina sāngasakkhangai ot chiwui vang Barnabas eina Saulli phaishokmilu.”
Chieina athumna kakhum eina seihā kasā kupkahaiwui thili aniwuitungli pāng khāngkāda seihā sāmilaga chihohaowa.
Manglā Katharana kachiho athishurda anina Seleuciali vai kala chiwui eina marikhong tongkhuida Cyprusli vāzanga.
Athumna Salamisli vākashung eina Jihudiwui Synagogueli Varewui tui tamchithei. Aniwui ot kasāli ngachon khavai John Marklila thānphunga.
Athumna tara̱na kuinam kahai ngalei kachungkha kānvāda Paphosli vākashung tharan, Jihudinao akha Bar-Jishu hoda, meowor kathema kala minama marān akha samphanga.
Mipa hi, Varetui nganā khavai Barnabas eina Saulli hokahaia thangmeilak kahaia governor Sergius Paulusli ngasopamsai.
Kha meowor kathema Elymas (Chi Greek tuiwui amingna)na athumli mamayāmana kala governorli shitkasang chili mazang khavai khangarān sai.
Kha Saul, Paulla kaho china Manglā Kathara pemtinghaoda Elymasli mik taringda yanglaga hānga,
“Chipeewui naotun, khamashung saikorawui yangkashe, nava kachipat eina makaphāwui marei-marā kathemana. Prohowui khamashung shongfa mashongachei ngasakchingrala?

Prohowui makhamayā nawuitungli leihaira; namik ngapeohaida zimikwui kahor atam kasha̱khawui vang matheimara.” Chili ngalāngda leichui khangapui thada amik tangmangtinghaowa kala ali thara̱zatmi khavai mi phaung phāvai.
Kashok chi governorna kathei eina Prohowui pongli tamkachithei chi shālaga matakhakhaowa.
Chiwui thili Paul eina ali khangasobingna Paphoswui eina marikhong tonglaga Pamphylia ngaleiwui keinung Pergali vai. John Markna athumli, apam chili chihohailaga Jerusalemli latunghaowa.
Athumna Pergawui eina Pesidiawui Antiochli vāshunga, kala Sabbaththang athumna synagogueli akai.
Moseswui ain lairik kala marānbingwui lairik pākup kahaiwui thili synagoguewui akhavābingna anili pao chihovai, “Ivānao khani, nanina mibing hili kasatsangkhangai leiakha kasatsangmilu.”
Chieina Paulna nganingkāda pāng yailaga matuiphoka: “Vareli khokharuma Israelnaobing eina nathum Vareli khangacheebing, nganāmilu!
Israel yurwui Varena ishāvā ngarāli kapangkhuida Egypt ngaleili okthuilakha kahaka miyur sāngasaka. Varena athumli awui pangshap eina Egyptwui eina thānshoka,
kala lamhāngli zingkum hangmati athumli ja̱miya.
Ana Canaan ngaleiwui yur shinili sākazamhailaga awui miyurli ngalei chiwui akhavā sāngasaka.
Saikora hi kum shāmati hangphangā sha̱kha zanga.
“Hiwui thili Varena marān Samuel marāranglakha eina tangda wungva̱-wungvābing kapangsangmi.
Chiwui thili mibingna awunga akha poi, chieina Varena Benjamin shangli kapharā Kishwui naomayara Saulli kum hangmati mungkhavai mi.
Saulli khuishok kahaiwui thili Varena Davidli awunga sākhavai kapangkhuida hithada hānga: ‘Iwui kaphaning eina ngaraikachā ina sāngasakkhangai sāki kaje Jessewui naomayara David hina’.
Varena ngashitmi kahai athishurda Davidwui naotun Jishuli Israel yurwui Huikhame sāngasakhaira.
Jishuna marāranglakha Johnna moreiwui eina ning ngateida ra̱kahikwui tui Israelnao saikorali tamchitheihairasai.

Kala Johnna awui ot kupnanaili hānga, ‘Nathumna ili khipāna da phaningkhala? Nathumna honda khalei chi I maningmana. Kha iwui thili a rārāda lei, awui pheihop khara̱ eina tangda khalāmikida I matik machāmana.’

Kaja Jerusalemli kapam mibing eina kathānabingna a Huikhamena kaji matheithuwa, lah sabbath kachida pāda khalei marānbingwui tuila bhap matāthuwa. Kha Jishuli khayon khami china marānbingwui tui chi ungshung ngasaka.
Athumna awuitungli thikhavai shongrān masamphanglala shaothat ngasak khavai Pilateli poi.
Kathara Lairikli hāngkahai saikora athumna ungshung ngasak kahaiwui thili krushwui eina khuitāda chikhurli chizana.
Kha Varena ali kathiwui eina ringshok ngasaka,
kala Galileewui eina Jerusalemli ngasokakābing kachungkhali zimiksho kasāngkhawui vang awui azak chithei. Ara athumna mibingli awui shākhi mi.
Chiwui vang eina Varena ishāvā ngarāli ngashitmi kahai paokaphā chi nathumli khuirāmi khavai hili ithum leili,
kala Jishuli ringshok ngasakta athumwui ara̱-azā ithumwui thotli ungshung ngasakhaira. Laa lairik kakhanelila hithada kapihai.
‘Na inaomayarana;
aja̱ ina nali pharākhuihaira.’
‘Davidwui kathara makhangapata sokhami chi ina nathumli mira.’
‘Nana nawui katharapa chili kashui mathei ngasakmara.’
Davidna awui thotli Varewui kharin chi ungshung ngasakhailaga thihaowa, kala awui avāva̱ ngarābingli ngasoda chizana kala aphasā shuitāhaowa.
Kha Varena ringshok ngasak kahaia a chiya kashui kaho matheimana.
Chiwui vang eina ivānaobing, nathumli hi theikhui ngasakkhangaina kaja mi hipāwui mangā eina morei pheokhamiwui tui nathumli hākashokna.
Moseswui ainna nathumli ningkhān masā ngasakkharar chi hipāwui mangā eina shitkasanga kachiva̱li ningkhān ngasakhaira.
Marānbingna hāngkahai chi nathumli mashok khavai ningngasharlu;
Nathum matakhakhaida shimānhaora,
kaja ina aja nathumwui thotli kasā otsak hi,
khangatei akhana hāngchitheilala nathumna mashitsangphāphāki kaji otsakna!’”
Paul eina Barnabasna synagoguewui eina zathaoki kaji eina khanaowa sabbaththangla chiwui pongli chungmeida rātamchitheilui khavai mibingna poi.

Synagoguewui kazip ngathān kahaiwui thili Jihudi kachungkha kala Jihudi dharma khuisang kahaia Gentilebing kachungkhala aniwui thi shurrai. Anina athumli Varewui lukhamashanlungli leiching khavai katomda tamchithei.
Khanaowui Sabbaththang keinung chiwui mi kachungkhana Varewui tui nganākida rākazipa.
Yarui kachungkha kakazip chi Jihudibingna theilaga mikpaishihaowa kala athumna Paulna kahānghāng chili yetta ali kazeila zeiya.

Kha Paul eina Barnabasna pingmeida hānga, “Rimeikapta Varewui tui hi nathumli hāngchitheiphalungki kajina. Kha nathumna katang makhavai mirin masamphangngaimada khalan kahaiwui vang, nathumli haiphungda ithum Gentilebingli vāhaora.
Kaja Prohona ithumli kasoda hānga:
‘Ina nathumli Gentilebingwui kahor sāngasak kahaina,
chieina okathui saikora hi huikhuipaira’ ”
Gentilebingna hi kashā tharan athum mathānlakhaoda Varewui tuili sochikata, kala katang makhavai kharing samphang khavai tharchisin kahai athum kachungkhana shitsanga.
Varewui tui chi ngalei saikorali ngayaovai.
Kha keinungwui kathānabing eina khangatara khamaho sha̱naobingli Jihudinaobingna thara̱sanglaga Paul eina Barnabasli rekhareka kala aramwui eina kashamhaowa.
Chieina athumli makhamayā chitheida anina aniwui pheili chifa kakā chi kathangtāhailaga Iconiumli vāhaowa.
Kala sākhangatha̱bing chi khamathān kala Manglā Katharana pemtinghaowa.
Ara athumna Iconiumli Jihudiwui synagogueli vālaga tamkachithei eina Jihudinao kala Greeknao kachungkhana shitsanghaowa.
Kha mashitkasanga Jihudinaobingna Gentilebingli hāngkasotta shitsang kahaibing chili mamayā khavai sai.
Chieina anina chili atam kasāngkha pamsangda Prohowui vang pinglak eina tamchithei kala lukhamashanwui chānpao chi mashunga da shākhi mida aniwui pāng eina machut kala matakhak kahai otla sai.
Keinung chiwui mibing khum khani sāhaowa, kaikhana Jihudibingwui kala khangatei kaikhana paokazatbingwui mijang zanga.
Gentile eina Jihudi kaikhana athumwui kathānabingli ngasoda paokazatbingli zakshilāk eina sālaga lunggui eina horthat khavai khangarān sāhaowa.
Paokazatbingna chi kathei eina Lycaoniawui keinung Lystra eina Derbe kala chiwui ruinganaili yāmvāhaowa.
Chili athumna Paokaphā hāshoka.
Lystra keinungli, kapharāwui eina phei tekhaida mazatkharar mi akha leisai.
Ana Paulwui tamkachithei chi ningsanglak eina nganai, kala awuila raimi ngasakra kajiwui shitkasang lei kaji kathei eina
Paulna ali hānga, “Ngatartei eina nganinglu.” Ana ngalongkāda zata.
Paulna sākahai chi theida Lycaoniawui tui eina athum saikorana vaoda hānga, “Kameonao mizak khuida ithumli tāshunghaira!”
Athumna Barnabasli Zeus phokmi kala Paulli ana chungmeida matuihaoda Hermes phokmi.
Keinung mangāchangli khalei Zeus kameoshimwui sharva̱a china yaruili ngasoda anili pha̱kaphayā ot chigatngaihaoda mukvā eina awon khuiphunglaga ngaveili khuirai.
Kha paokazata Barnabas eina Paulna chi kashā eina aniwui kachon serkhaklaga yaruiwui lungli yongshokta vaowa,

“Itaongarā, nathumna kachiwui vang eina hithada kasākhala? Inila nathum eina ngaraikachā mikumona. Makānkhanā otbing hiwui eina mai ngareithuihailaga kazingla, ngaleila, shamadrula kala chiwui alungli khalei ot saikora kasā kharinga Vareli ngareiung khavai paokaphā hāshok khavai ithum hili khaleina.
Thuikahai atamli yur saikorali kachichāwui zatkhangaingaili zatngasaksai.

Kha atam kachiva̱li kaphā sākhami china ā leichingda lei kaji shākhi mi; ana kazingramwui eina zingrotra̱ mida atam chālak eina athei samphang ngasaka; kashakazāla mida ningla ringkaphāna pemtinghai ngasaka.”
Hithada hānglaga yaruina pha̱kaphayā ot sāki kajiwui eina saklak eina khāmkhui.
Kha shitkasangabingna ali kuimareida rākakazip tharan ngakarthuida keinungli zangluishithaowa. Akhama kathā Barnabas ani Derbeli vāhaowa.
Keinung chili anina paokaphā hashokta sākhangatha̱ kachungkha yuikhui. Chiwui thili Lystra, Iconium kala Antiochli latungluishita.

Anina shitkasangabingli pangsang ngasaka kala khamashunga shitkasang chili mangacheilakla leiching khavai kasatsanga, kala “Vare wungramli zangkida ithumna kachotkachāng kachungkha phungphalungra” da tamchithei.
Church kachiva̱li anina ararbing kapangsangmi kala kakhum eina seihā sālaga kapang kahai athum chi athumna shitkasanga Prohowui pāngli horsangmi.
Pisidiawui ngaleili yaokup kahaiwui thili anina Pamphyliali rai.
Chili, anina Pergali pao hāshoka kala chiwui thili Attaliali vai,
kala chiwui eina marikhong tongkhuilaga Antiochli latunga. Hi anina sākupchamkahai otsinwui vang Varewui lukhamashan pāngli horsangkhami apamna.
Anina Antioch ungkashung eina Churchwui mibingli kaziprumda Varena anili shichinlaga kathada sāmamei kala kathada Gentilebingna shitsang khavai khāmong shomikhala kaji athumli hāngchithei.
Apam chili anina sākhangatha̱bingli atam kasāngkha ngasopama.

Hiwui pongli Paul eina Barnabasna athumli panglāk eina ngaphata. Chiwui vang eina Jerusalemli khalei paokazatbing eina ararbingli ngachamkhui khavai Paul eina mi kaikha zangda ngasova khavai kapangkhui.
Churchna athumli chihovai kala athumna Phoenicia kala Samaria vākānda Gentilena Vareli kathada shitsanghaokhala kaji hāngchithei kala pao hina shitkasangbing saikorali mathān ngasaka.
Athumna Jerusalemli rākazang tharan church, paokazatbing, kala ararbing saikorana ringphālak eina vāngarokkhuiya, kala Varena athumli shichinlaga sākahai saikora athumna hāngchithei.
Kha Phariseewui mijang kasā shitkasanga kaikhana nganingkāda, “Gentilebingli ahui rimshokphalungra kala Moseswui ain mayon khavai hāngphalungra” da hānga.
Paokazatbing eina ararnaobingna tuipong hi machukrum khavai kazipa.

Sha̱rākha ngayāt ngarok kahaiwui thili Peterna nganingkāda hānga, “Ivānaobing, atam kasāngkha thuihaira, nathumwui ngachaiwui eina Gentilebingli paokaphā hāshok khavai ili Varena kapangkhui, kaja ikhamorwui eina athumna Varetui shālaga shitsanga kaji nathumna thei.
Kala mi kachiva̱wui wuklung katheia Varena ithumli khami thada athumlila Manglā Kathara khami hina Varewui khamayā chitheimihaira.
Ana ithum eina athumli ngatei khangasak maleimana, kaja shitkasangwui mangā eina ana athumwui morei pheomi.
Chithākha ithumwui avāva̱ ngarābingnala, ithumnala maphungkhararra otrom hi khisāda shitkasangabingwui khumkhorli chiphunhailaga Vareli chāng tamyangngaihaokhala?
Ithumna shitsanga kaja Proho Jishuwui lukhamashan mangā eina athumli huikakhui thada ithumlila huikhuihaira.”
Barnabas eina Paulna Gentilebingwui alungli Varena anili shichinlaga machut kala matakhak kahai ot sākahai hāngkachithei chi athumna shālaga vari eina pamhaowa.
Anina hāngkup kahaiwui thili Jamesna hānga, “Ivānaobing khanganāmilu!
Varena rida kathada Gentilebingli athumwui ngachaiwui eina awui miyur sākhavai kapangkhuilaga nganaomikhala kaji Simeonna hāngchitheihaira.
Marānbingwui tui eina hi ngaraichai kaja hithada kapihaida lei:
kala Davidwui ja̱tā kahai shim chi sākāluira,
ngayang kahai chi chiphokhuiluira,
kala ngazipluishit ngasakra.
Chieina mi kateina kala iwui ming eina hokhui kahai Gentile saikorana Proholi phāra,
da achālakhawui eina saikora hi chitheimi kahai Proho china hānga.’
Chiwui vang eina, Vareli zangkahai Gentilebing hili khanang khangasak mamashungmana kaji, hi iwui kaphaningna.
Kha athumna meoma̱li pha̱kaphayā makathara kashakazā mazākhavai, khamathang khamarangli mazang khavai kala ngakhakkathi sā mashai khavai lah ashee mazā khavai athumli chithi kapiphalungra.
Kaja atam kasāngkhawui vang sabbath kachida synagogueli Moseswui ain pāchinga, kala awui tuibing chi keinung kachida hāshoka.”

Chiwui thili paokazatbing eina ararnaobing kala church hupva zangda mi saikorana Paul eina Barnabasli Antiochli ngasovā khavai athumwui ngachaiwui eina mi kaikha kapangkhuisa da mayāngaroka. Shitkasangabingna khayāshilak kahai Barsabbasla kaho Judas eina Silasli kapangkhui,
kala chithi chi hithada kapilaga anili sangmida chihovai:
“Paokazatbing ararnaobing kala navānaobingna Antioch, Syria kala Ciliciali khalei shitkasanga Gentilebingli shālam mili.
Ithumwui khamayā makhuila ithumwui mi kaikhana nathumwuili rālaga athumwui kahāng china nathumli khanang ngasakhaowa kaji ithumna shāhaira.
Chieina ithum kazipngarumlaga ningkha sāda paokaphunga kapangkhuilaga kachiho phārada mayā ngarok kahaina. Ani ithumwui leikashiya Barnabas eina Paulli ngasorāra.
Ani hiya Proho Jishu Khristawui vang mirin chigatchao kahai thathuiya.
Chiwui vang eina ithumna Judas eina Silasli chihorāli. Anina ithumna kapi kahai hi mashunga da mashā eina rāhāngrāsāra.
Nathumna sāphalungki kaji hili lāngda nathumli khiotkha eina makhananglui khangasakna phāmeira kaji hi Manglā Katharanala, ithumnala mayā ngarok kahaina.
Chieina nathumna meoma̱li pha̱kahai sā mashaialu, ashee mazālu, ngakhākkathi sā mashailu, kala shām kasāli mazangalu. Hikathā hili mazang khavai ning ngasharakha nathum ringphāmeira. Mahaimeiranu.”
Chieina athumna paokaphunga khani chili chihovāda Antiochli vākashung eina shitkasangabingli hokhuiserlaga chithi chi athumwui pāngli mi.
Athumna chithi chi pālaga, kasatsangkhamiwui chānpao chiwui vang khamathānna pemtinghaowa.
Judas eina Silas, anila marān sāthuda anina kasatsangmida avānaobing chili pangngsaka.
Apam chili atam kasha̱kha ngasopamlaga athumna aniwuitungli chingri kahaiwui sokhami milaga anili chihokharābingwuili shiunhaowa.
Kha Silasna chili pamfarada phaningda chieina pamhaowa.
Kha Paul eina Barnabasna mi khangatei kachungkhali ngasoda Prohowui tui tamchithei kala hāshoka.
Khaleilaga Paulna Barnabasli hānga “Keinung kachiva̱li yaovālaga, ivānaobing chi kathada leilikhala ayangsa.”
Barnabasna John Markli hophungngaiya.
Kha Paulna ali mahokaphungna phāmeira jihaowa, khikhalajila ana anili Pamphyliali nothāhailaga otla masāngarumluilakthuwa.
Chili ani ngaphatreihaoda pākngarokhaowa: Barnabasna Markli thānkhuiphungda marikhong tongphungda Cyprusli vāhaowa.
Kha Paulna Silasli kapangkhuida shitkasangabingna anili Prohowui lukhamashan pāngli horsangmilaga thuihaowa.
Ana Syria eina Cilicia ngaleili vālaga churchbingli pangsang ngasaka.
Paulna Derbe eina Lystrali vai. Chili Timothy kaho sākhangatha̱ akha leisai; ashāva̱ hi Jihudisālala Vareshi akhana kala avāva̱ Greeknaona.
Lystra eina Iconiumli khalei shitkasangbingna Timothyli solaka.
Paulna Timothyli khuiphungkhangai eina ali ahui rimshokmi. Khiwui vangkhala kaja apam chili khalei Jihudi saikorana avāva̱ hi Greeknaona da thei.
Anina keinung keinungli vālaga Jerusalemli khalei paokazatbing eina ararnaobingna tuitak tākahai chi mayon khavai tamchithei.
Chieina churchbing chi shitkasangwui lungli pangsanga kala mishānla thangkachida mataisanga.
Paul eina ali ngasokazatbingli Manglā Katharana Asia ngaleili pao hākashok hi khāmkahaiwui vang Phrygia eina Galatia ngalei peida yaovai.
Athumna Mysia kāroda vākashung tharan, Bithyniali vāzang khavai hotnai, kha Jishuwui Manglāna khāmhaowa.
Chieina athumna Mysia makānlaga Troasli tai.
Chithang ngayā Paulli mahākhami akha rāchithei: Macedoniawui mi akhana nganinglaga ali, “Macedoniali rāda ithumli ngachonmilu” da poi.
Ana chi theikahaiwui thili, ithumna Macedoniali vākhavai khangarān sāhaowa, khikhalajila apam chili khalei mibingli paokaphā hāshok khavai ithumli Varena hohaira da thei.
Chiwui vang ithumna Troaswui eina marikhong tonglaga angatar eina Samathrasli vai kala akhama kathā Neapolisli vāzanga.
Chiwui eina ithumna Macedonia ngaleiwui hakmeikap kaje keinung Philippili vai; apam hi Romenaowui ramsom akhana. Ithumna chili zimiksho sha̱rākhathang pamsangda
Sabbaththang ngavei kānshoklaga seihā sākhavai apam samphanglapai da kongpheili vai. Ithumna chili pamzangda chili kazipkasā sha̱naobing chili tamchithei.

Ithumwui tui khanganā athumwui ngachaili kachon khamenga khayorva̱, Thyatirawui eina kharā Lydia kahova̱ zanga. A Vareli khokharumva̱ sha̱nao akhana, chieina Paulna kahāng chi ningsanglak eina nganā khavai Prohona awui wuklung shomi.
Ala, ashi shimkhurwui mibingla, ra̱hik kahaiwui thili, ana ithumli, “Nathumna I hi Proholi shitkasanga mina da phaningakha ishi shimli kharāpammilu” da hoi. Kala awui kahāng chili ithumla mayāhaowa.
Thangkha ithumna seihā sākhavai apamli vākida zatlakha sha̱ ngasoda, shokki kaji hāngkhamiva̱ rao sha̱nao akha samphanga. Ana shokki kaji hāngkhami eina awui akhavāli lupā tarākha pheiungmiya.
Ana Paul eina ithumwui thi shurda panglāk eina, “Huikhamiwui tuipong nathumli vaomalānkhame mibing hi Juikhamataiya Varewui raobingna” da vaopama.

Tui hi ana thangkachida hāngchingda, chieina Paulna ningrākhaida ngareiunglaga sha̱ chili hānga, “Jishu Khristawui ming singda ina nali sha̱nao chiwui eina shokhaolu da kakasona!” Chichangli sha̱ chi awui eina shokhaowa.
Rao sha̱nao chiwui akhavāna lupā pheikhuikapaiwui kachihān chi shimānhaira kaji kathei tharan Paul eina Silasli tukkhuilaga leihngapha̱li shimenshokta akhavābingwui mangāli khuivai.
Athumna anili Romewui akhavābingli khuivāda hānga, “Mibing hi Jihudinaona, kala anina ithumwui keinungli khonzār ngasakta lei.
Anina ithumwui ainli makhamayā khangachāyan tamchithei; ithum Romewui ruichumnaona, chieina chikathā khangachāyan chi ithumna makhuisangpaimana lah mamayonpaimana.”
Kala yaruinala anili kaphen chili hāngsanga. Chieina bicharwobingna aniwui kashankachon serkhakmihailaga lijei eina ngaphit khavai hukhum mi.
Marlak eina shaomi kahaiwui thili athumna anili phātopli sanghailaga phātop khamayonali ningkachang eina mayon khavai kasoi.
Kakaso chiwui athishurda anili alunga phātop shimli khuizangda zurthing sanghai.
Paul eina Silasna ngayāsailung atamli Vareli seihāla, masotlaala sai kala phātopli kazangbingna aniwui chi nganāpama.
Kashuirak eina neina̱ khanukta phātop shim chiwui shimphung eina tangda nganukhaowa. Chili ngalāngda khamong saikora shohaowa kala mari khānghui saikora chi mi saikorawui eina ngalatāserhaowa.
Phātop khamayona china thuikhamathuk eina phātop shimwui khāmong shoser kahai chi theilaga phātopli sangkahaibing yāmserhairara da phaninga. Chieina awui raighai sutshoklaga ngaronthat khavai sai.
Kha Paulna panglāk eina vaoda hānga “Nakhalatta ka̱lāshi khavai masaalu! Ithum hili leiserli.”
Phātop khamayona china thaomei pokhuilaga ngasamzangda kathirriri Paul eina Silaswui mangāli khuktizanga.
Chiwui thili ana anili thānshoklaga hānga, “Amei khani, ina kahui samphang khavai khi sarakhala?”
Anina ngahānkai, “Proho Jishuli shitsanglu, chieina nala kala nashi shimkhurla kahui samphangra.”
Anina ali kala awui shimli khalei saikorali Prohowui tui hāngchithei.
Chithang ngayā ana anili hoshokta aniwui khamā saikora sāmathāmi. Chithang ngayā ali kala awui shimkhurwui mi saikorali ra̱hikmihaowa.
Chiwui thili ashi shimli thanungda kashakazā ngarānmi. Ashi shimkhur saikora khamathānna pemtinghaowa, khikhalajila athumna Vareli shitsanghaowa.
Akhama ngathor kathā bicharwobingna, “Mibing chili chihohaolu” kaji hukhum chi hāngmi khavai police chihovai.
Chieina phātop khamayona china Paulli hānga, “Bicharwobingna nanili chihohaolu kaji pao shirātrāhaira. Chieina ara nani shokpaira. Chingri eina zatulu.”

Kha Paulna athumli hānga, “Bichar masālakla Romewui ruichumnao ithumli athumna yaruiwui mangāli shaowa kala phātop sanghai. Laga ara athumna ithumli ngathumsāda chishotralā? Masāpailakmara! athum khalattana rākhuishokranu.”
Policebingna bicharwobing chili pao hi ahānga; kala ani Romewui ruichumnaona kaji kashā eina athum ngacheehaowa.
Chieina athumna anili ning angatei kala phātopwui eina rākhuishoklaga keinung chiwui eina kathuimihaolu da anili poi.
Paul eina Silasna phātopwui eina shokta Lydiawui shimli vai. Chili shitkasangbingli samphangda athumli katomkasangwui tui matuihailaga zathuihaowa.
Chiwui thili anina Amphipolis eina Apollonia kanvāda Jihudiwui Synagogue khalei Thessalonica apamli rai.
Paulwui khangachā athishurda ana synagogueli vai kala sabbath kathum athumli kathara lairikwui eina khuishoklaga ngaphat-ngayāt sai,
kala Khrista kachotkachāng phunglaga kathiwui eina ringshokphalungra kaji hi shākhi khami eina ngasoda tui chi meikhaichitheida Paulna hānga, “Ina hāngchitheida khalei Jishu hi Khristalaka.”
Athum kaikhana kahāng chili mayāchaoda Paul eina Silasli zanga kala sha̱nao kathānva̱ kachungkha eina Vareli shitkasanga Greeknao kachungkhala anili zanga.

Kha Jihudinaobingna mikpaishihaoda makaphā-makhayā mi kaikhali khomkhuilaga mi kachungkha kazipkhuida keinung chi khonzār khavai sai kala athumna anili yarui mangāli khuishok khavai Jasonwui shim akaiya.
Kha athumna anili masamphangthuda Jason eina shitkasanga kaikhali keinung chiwui akhavābingli shimenvāda vaowa, “Okathui saikorali mashongachei khangasaka mibing chi ara hili rāhaira,
kala Jasonna athumli awui shimli zunngasaka, kala athumna Caesarwui hukhum sākhailaga Jishu kaho awunga khangatei lei da hānga.”
Tui hi shālaga keinung hiwui mibing kala akhavābing ningli chingri mahairarthuwa.
Akhavābing china Jason eina khangateibingli tuingashit sāda athumwui vang nganingmi ngasaklaga athumli shokngasakhaowa.
Ngayākhaleoda shitkasangabingna Paul eina Silasli Bereali chihovāhaowa. Anina azangkhaleoda synagogueli vai.

Thessalonicawui mibingliva chiwui mibingna ning hakmeikhāra. Athumna chānpao chi ningsanglak eina nganai kala thangkachida Paulna kahāng chi kachangkhat mashungka mamashungmakhala kaji theikhavai kathara lairik chi pāchinga.
Jihudi kachungkhala shitsanga kala Greekwui kāshunglak kahaiya sha̱nao kala mayarnao kachungkhala shitsanghaowa.
Kha Thessalonicawui Jihudinaobingna Paulna Berealila Varewui tui hāshokhaira kaji kashā tharan athumna chili rālaga mibingli rāthara̱sanga kala rāthotsanga.
Shitkasangbing china Paulli ngalāngda shamadruvāk chihovāhaowa, kha Silas eina Timothyva Bereali pamhaowa.
Paulli thānkhavābing chi Athens eina tangda ali ngasovai kala Silas eina Timothyli awuili kashap eina tangda thaklāk eina rākhavai hāngkhami chi khuiphungda athum Bareali hanunghaowa.
Paulna anili Athensli ngaraikapam tharan, keinung chili meoma̱ pemting kahai chi kathei eina a khananglakhaowa.
Chieina ana Jihudinaobing eina Vareli shitkasangabingli synagogueli kala leihngapha̱li samkaphangphang mibingli ngayāt ngaroka.

Kachikathā Epicurean eina Stoicwui ojabingla ali ngaphat ngayātta kaikhana ngahāna, “Mangkhama̱pa hina khi hāngkhangaikhala?” Khangatei kaikhana ngahānkai, “Ana khangatei ramwui kameowui pongli khamatui thāli.” Paulna Jishu kala ringkhaluiwui pongli hāshoka.
Chieina athumna Paulli keinungwui hanga̱, Are-opagusla kaho chili khuivāda hānga, “Nana tuidhar tamchitheida khalei hi ithumla theingai.
Nawui eina ithumna kashā hi ngateihanghaili, chieina ithumna chiwui kakhalat theingai.”
Kaja Athennaobingla chili kapāna khamibingla khiotkha masāla tuidhar kahāng kala khanganā hili akachang sai.
Paulna keinung chiwui hanga̱wui mangāli nganingda hānga, “Athennaobing, nathum apong kachiva̱li shitkasang khangazip mibingna da ina thei.

Kaja ina nathumwui keinungli yāoung yaovālaga nathumna khorum khavaipamli khayang eina hanphutpam akhali ‘Makatheiya Vareli’ da kapi kahai samphanga. Chieina nathumna khorumda khalei makatheia chi ina nathumli arui hāngchitheida khalei hina.
Apuk-apaka kala chiwui alungli khalei ot saikora kasā Vare chi kazingram eina okathuiwui Proho sāhaoda ana mina sākakā khorum khavai shimli mapammana,
lah awuili khavāt leikahai tākam eina mikumowui pāngna ali otram mangatha̱mana, kaja mi kachiva̱li kharing khaksui kala ot saikora khamena.
Ana mi akhawui eina miyur kachiva̱ hi sākhuida okathui apam saikorali pamkhavai kachichāwui thari kala atamwui angarit ngavāmi.
Varena hi sai, chithākha a ithumwui eina tāda maleisālala mikumona ali phāra kala samphang khavai ngarānda ali phākhuira. A ithum khipākhawui eina tāda maleimana.
Kaja ‘Ithum awuili ringda lei, ngatha̱da lei kala ithumwui rin lei.’ Nathumwui laa kakape kaikhana hāngkahai thada, ‘Ithumla awui naotunna.’
Ithum awui naotun sāhaoda, ithumna awui khangachā chi mikumowui kathem pangshap eina sākakhui sināwui, lupāsāwui, ngalungwui meoma̱ kathāna da makhuipaimana.
Achālakha matheithangkhameiwui vang Varena yangkateomisai, kha apam kachiva̱li khalei mikumo saikorali ningngatei khavai ana kasoi.
Kaja ana kapangsang kahai mayarnao china okathui saikorali mashun bichar sāmi khavai zimiksho akha kak-kahaina. Ana mayara chili kathiwui eina ringngasakta mi kachiva̱li hiwui pongli shākhi mihaira!”
Kathiwui eina ringkashokwui pongli khamatui chi athumna shālaga ali mana̱shiya, kha kaikhana hānga, “Hiwui pongli nana khamatui ithum nganāluishitngaiya.”
Paulna chiwui eina thuihaowa.
Mi kaikhana Paulwui athi kashura ngasāthuihaowa kala shitsanghaowa. Athumwui ngachaili Are-opaguswui hangva̱nao Dionysius zanga. Chili Damaris kahova̱ sha̱nao akha kala mi katei kachungkhala zanga.
Hiwui thili Paulna Athenswui eina Corinthli vai.

Apam chili, Pontusli pharākakhui Jihudinao akha Aquila hoda Italywui eina apreiva̱ Priscillali ngasorādhadharda leikasāpāli ana samngaroka, kaja awunga Claudiusna Jihudinao saikorali Romewui eina zathaolu da hukhum sāhairasai. Paulna anili ayang khavai vai,
kala athumwui pāngthemsak ngarumhaoda athum ngasopama kaja athum kachonshim kasā mina.
Ana sabbath kachida synagogueli ngayātlaga Jihudinaobing eina Greeknaobingli shitsang khavai hotnai.
Silas eina Timothy Macedoniawui eina rākazang chitharan Paulva Jihudinaobingli Jishu hi Khristalaka da shākhi milaga pao hākashokli ningsanglak eina sāsai.

Kala athumna ali ngasungda awuitungli zakkashishi phorlaga khamatui tharan, awui kachonwui chifa kathanrorlaga maringkaphā phongshoka kala athumli hānga. “Nathumwui ashee chi nathumwuitungli tāranu! Iwui khayon maleimana. Arui hi eina thuida ina Gentilebingli vaura.”
Chieina ana apam chi chihohailaga Titus Justus kaho Vareli shitkasanga mi akhawui shimli vai. Awui shimva synagoguewui ngalemchangli lei.
Synagoguewui akhavā Crispusna awui shimkhur saikorali ngasoda Proholi shitsanga, kala Corinthwui mi kachungkhana Paulwui pao chi shālaga shitsanga kala athumli ra̱hikmi.
Thang ngayakha Paulli Prohona rāmahāmida hānga, “Mangacheealu, tamchitheilu, kasaikha mapamhaialu;
kaja ina nali ngasomida lei, nali khipānakha ka̱lā mashingasakmara, kaja keinung hili iwui mi kachungkha lei.”
Chiwui vang eina Paulna Varewui pao tamchitheida apam chili kum akha tangkhai pama.
Kha Galliona Roman governor kasā chitharan Jihudinaobing khokkha sākhuilaga Paulli tukkhuilaga kārotli khuikāda
“Mipa hina ainli makhamayā pong eina Vareli khorum khavai suizata” da athumna phena.
Paulna matuiuki kaji eina Galliona Jihudinaobingli hānga, “He, Jihudinaobing, hiya kachikathā khayon lah yom sākahaiwui vang kaphena jisi kaja ina nathumwui tui chi nganāmipai;
kha hiya tuimatuiwui, amingkaphorwui kala nathumwui ainwui pongli ngayāt khangarok sāhaokada nathum khalatta ngazekhuilu. Hikathāwui vang bichar masāmirarmara.”
Chieina ana athumli kārotwui eina kashamshokhaowa.
Athumna synagoguewui akhavā Sosthenesli tukkhuilaga bicharpamwui mangāchangli shaowa, kha chithālala Galliona khikha matheimimana.

Paulna zimiksho kasāngkha Corinthli shitkasangbingli ngasoda pamsanga, kala chiwui thili athumli pākngarokhailaga Syriali marikhong eina vāhaowa, Priscilla eina Aquilala ngasovai kala Cenchreali sam achichapa kaja a tuingashit akha sāhaisai.
Chieina Ephesusli vai, kala anili chili haihailaga synagogueli zangda Jihudibingli ngayāt ngaroka.
Athumna ali kasangda pamsang khavai poi, kha ana mamayāthuwa.
Kha ana zatuki kaji eina, “Varena mayāmiakha I rārāsānaoga” da athumli hānglaga mirikhong tongda Ephesuswui eina zatthuihaowa.
Ana Caesareali vākashung eina Churchwui mibingli shālam vāsākhui, laga Antiochli vāhaowa.
Ana chili kapamsanglaga zatthuihaowa kala Galatia eina Phrygia ngaleili yaovāda shitkasanga saikorali athumwui shitkasang ngatarmei khavai kasatsangmi.
Chitharan Alexandriali kapharā Apollos kaho Jihudi akha Ephesusli rai. Ava tui khayir kathema, kala Kathara Lairikwui tui theilak kahai mi akhana.
Prohowui apongli tamchitheihaogada, manglāli khangaphumwui vang ana Jishuwui pongli matuida tāzak eina tamchithei. Chithālala a Johnwui ra̱kahikmāng thei.
Ana synagogueli pinglak eina tamchitheiphoka. Chi Priscilla eina Aquilana shālaga ali hokhuida Varewui apongli mashungmeida tamchithei.

Chieina Apollosna Achaiali vangaihaoda Ephesuswui shitkasangabingna Achaiali khalei shitkasangabingli ali samngarokhui khavai lairik kapisangmi. Ana chili vākashung chitharan lukhamashan mangā eina shitkasanga ngasā kahai athumli tarākha ngachonmi.
Kaja Jishu hi Khristana da ana kathara lairikwui eina khuishoklaga yaruiwui ngaphat-ngayātli Jihudibingli maikashi mivai.
Apollosna Corinthli leilakha, Paulna ngalei chiwui alungli khalei ramwungbingli yaozatlaga Ephesusli rāshunga. Apam chili sākhangatha̱ kaikha samphanga
kala athumli ngahāna, “Nathum shitkasang tharan Manglā Kathara samphanglā?” “Masamphangmana, Manglā Kathara lei kaji eina tangda ithum mashālakranga.” da athumna hānga.
“Chithākha nathum kachikathā ra̱kahik samphangkhala?” da Paulna ngahāna. “Johnwui ra̱kahik china” da athumna ngahānkai.
Paulna hānga, “Johnva mibingli awui thili rāki kaje Jishuli shitsang khavai hānglaga ning khangateiwui ra̱hikkhamimaya.”
Athumna pao hi shākahaiwui thili athumli Proho Jishuwui mingli ra̱hikmi.
Kala Paulna athumwuitungli pāng parrormi, kala Manglā Kathara athumwuitungli tārormida athumna tuiyur khangatatei matui kala marāna.
Athum katonga chi mi tharāda khani sha̱khana.
Paulna synagogueli zangda Vare wungramwui pongli kachāng kathum pinglak eina matuida khangayātla ngayāta, kaphayatla phayeta.

Kha mi kaikhana ning makanghaoda mashitsangrarmana kala yaruiwui mangāli Prohowui pongli makaphā tui matui. Chieina Paulna athumli horhailaga shitkasangbingli thānkhuida Tyrannus kazipshimli thangkachida ngayāt ngaroka.
Hithada kum khani sāvāda Asiali khaleibing saikora, Jihudila, Greekla, Prohowui tui chi kashā samphangsera.
Varena Paulli shichinlaga matakhak kahai masākharar ot kachungkha sāngasaka.
Ana shikachina romalla kala shānnei kachonla awui eina kakazānaobingli khuivāda kazāt raimi, kala chipeela athumwui eina shokhaowa.
Chieina yaoung yaovāda kazata Jihudi khanong kaikhana chipee kazangbingli Proho Jishuwui ming singda kasham khavaila sāda athumna hānga, “Paulna hākashoka Jishuwui ming eina ina nali kakasona.”
Jihudiwui pāngmon kharei Sceva kaho chiwui naomayara shini china hikathā sāsai.
Kha chipee china athumli hānga, “Jishuli I thei, Paullila thei; kha nathum khipākhala?”

Chipee kazanga mi china athumli yongrorda nganurhaowa kala athumli sakchanglak eina nganurda athumli yuihaowa. Athum khamā za̱da kashankachonla mangavaila khamahong eina shim chiwui eina yongthuihaowa.
Ephesusli kapam Jihudinaobing eina Greeknaobingna chi shālaga ngacheelakhaowa, kala Proho Jishuwui mingli mataimeida masochikata.
Shitkasanga mi kachungkha rāda athumna sākahai yārui mangāli hāngphata.
Meowor kathema mi kachungkhala athumwui lairik chi khuirāda yaruiwui miktāli rāriktai. Athumna lairikbing chiwui aman chākyanglaga lupā thing hangphangā kāshunga.
Hithada sāda Prohowui paokaphā hi reisangmamānda ngayaokhangai ngayaohaowa.
Otshotbing chi shokkahaiwui thili Paulna Mecedonia eina Achaia akānlaga Jerusalemli vākhavai phaninghaowa.
Chieina ana ali khangachona khani Timothy eina Erastusli Macedoniali chihovai, kha ava Asia ngaleili atam kasāngmeida pamhaowa.
Atam chitharan Ephesusli Prohowui Apong chiwui vang khonzārlak eina leisai.
Lupāsawui ot kasāli them kathema Demetrius kaho akhana Artemiswui kameoshim maong chi lupāsā eina sākhuida hikathā pāngot kasā mi kachungkhali katong samphang ngasaksai.
Chieina hikathā pāngot kasābing saikorali ana ngahotkhuilaga hānga, “Itao ngarā, ithumna lan samphangda khalei hi hikathā otwui eina kharāna da nathumna thei.

Ara Paul kaho mipa hina khi sādalei kaji nathumna kathei kashā samphanghaira. Pāng eina sākakhui vare chi vare maningmana da Ephesusmāngli maningla Asia ngalei saikorali tamchitheida kachungkhali yuikhuihaira.

Ara ithumwui ka̱lāshātva ithumwui leihsak hi mamaholuimara, chimāng maningla kha khareia philava Artemiswui shim hi khikha maningthura kajiwui kalāshāt leihaira kala awui khangamkharei shimānhaora— ava Asiali kala apuk-apagva̱̱li khalei mi kachiva̱na khokharumva̱ varena.”
Yaruina hi kashā eina athum malungvātlākhaoda “Ephesuswui Artemis reikhamataiva̱” da panglāk eina vaophokuwa.
Rotkhamarāt chi keinung peida vāshunghaowa. Paulli ngasokazata Macedoniawui mi Gaius eina Aristarchusli yaruina tukkhuida kumei shimli namkachupzanghaowa.
Paulna yarui chili vangai kha shitkasangabingna mavāngasakthuwa.
Ngalei chiwui khangamkharei awui ngasotnao kaikhanala kumeishim chili awui azak ma-achithei khavai mi chihovāda pao shivāta.
Kaikhana akha vao, khangatei kaikhana khangatei akha vao da kazip chi pa̱ngapālakhaowa; mi kachungana khiwui vang chili rākakazipkhala dala matheimana.
Mi kaikhana Jihudibingna yarui mangāli vānganing khangasaka Alexanderwui eina tuishot hi kashokna da phaninghaowa. Alexanderna yaruili akhon mashok khavai pāng eina ingkit sāda matuikida sai.
Kha athumna a Jihudinaona da kathei eina pung khani sha̱kha athum saikora ngaraichā eina “Ephesuswui Artemis reikhamataiva̱na!” da vaosera.

Keinung chiwui kapimena yaruili vingasakhailaga hānga, “Ephesusnaobing, Ephesus keinung hi reikhamataiva̱ Artemiswui khorumshim khamayona kala kazing eina katā kathara lunggui haikhavai pamna kaji makathei khipā leikhala?
Khipānakha hi maningmana majirarmara. Chiwui vang eina nathum mangaunlophaila chingrihaiphalungra.
Ithumwui kameoli makachipat kala khayon makasā mibing nathumna hili khuirāhaira.
Demetrius eina ali khangaso pāngot kasābingna kachikathā akhawuitungli kaphen leiakha, ithumwui akhavābing lei kala khangachā kārot kakā atam lei; chili tuikat sāngarokranu.
Kha nathumna chili lāngda kaphen leiakha hanga̱shimli ainwui athishurda chān ngazekki kajina.
Kaja ajawui otshot hi ithumli phenkapaiwui ka̱lāshāt lei. Ngawunlop kahai hiwui vang phayetkhuikapaila maleimana kala hiwui pongli chālak kahai maramla mamirarmara.”
Tui hi hānglaga yarui kazip chi ngathānngasakhaowa.
Ngawunlop kahai chi vikahai eina Paulna shitkasangbingli hokhuilaga kazipngarumda kasatsangmi kala kapāngtuila matuilaga Macedoniali vāhaowa.
Ana apam chili vāmamānda mibingli chānpao kachungkha eina katomsanga. Chiwui thili ana Achaiali rai,

chili kachāng kathum pamsanga. Ara Syriali vākhavai khangarān sākupser kahai tharan Jihudinaobingna ali sāthat khavai khangarān sāda lei kaji theihaowa. Chieina ana Macedoniavāk eina latunghaora da phaninghaowa.
Berea ngaleiwui Pyrrhuswui naomayara Sopaterla ali ngasovai; kala Thessalonicawui Aristarcus kala Secundus; Derbewui Gaius; Asiawui eina Tychicus eina Trophimus; kala Timohyla zanga.
Ithumli athumna vārilaga Troasli ngaraisai.
Ithumna Khawok-makazanga Khamui phanitwui thili Philippiwui eina marikhong tongkhuida zimiksho matithangwui thili Troasli athumli angaphankhui kala chili zimiksho shinithang pamsanga.
Haptā chiwui kharethang ngazin ithumna kazipngarumda khamui shaikhangarum tharan Paulna akhama kathā zatura jihaoda mibingli ngayāsailung eina tangda tamchitheithaiya.
Ithumna kakazip kā ato chili thaomei tarākha shārthai.
Eutychus kaho mayarnao akha charfali pamsai, Paulna matuithai kaji eina ana pingaināhaida piphup kahai eina mathāng kakathuma chiwui eina saotāda kathi eina ali ngazonkai.
Kha Paulna zangvamkhuida hānga, “Makhanangalu, a mathiranga.”
Chiwui thili Paulna kālaga khamui serkhaida shailaga athumli ngasoda kazing mathangranglakha eina tangda khararchān sai kala chiwui thili zathaowa,
kala yaronnaopa chili athumna kharing eina shimli ringphālak eina khuiungmihaowa.
Ithumna rida marikhong tonglaga Assosli vai. Chili Paulli akhuiki kajina kaja ana chili ngaleivāk eina rāra da ithumli hānghairasai.
Ana ithumli Assosli samkaphang eina ali marikhongli khuikāda Mityleneli vāhaowa.
Chiwui eina huiphungda akhama kathā Chiosli azanga. Khanaothang kathā Samosli vāshunga kala kakathumathang Miletusli vāshunga.
Asia ngaleili atam mashimān khavai Paulna Ephesus kānda marikhong tonglaga zatkhavai phaninghaowa, kaja shapakha Pentecost zimiksholi ā Jerusalemli leisa khavai katotlak eina zathaowa.
Paulna Miletusli leilakha Ephesus Church ararbingli ali samphang khavai pao chihovai.
Athum awuili kharā eina ana athumli hānga, “Ina Asiali phei kārsang kharethang eina thuida atam kachiva̱li nathumwui ngachaili kathada pamsākhala kaji nathumna thei.
Jihudibingna shimān khavai kasāwui vang ina ichamchamlak eina kala chara̱ eina ngasoda kasaka atam chili Prohowui rao akha sāda ot sai.
Ina kathada shim shimli kala yarui ashangva̱li nathumwui kānna khavai chili mangasunlakla pao hāshok kala tamchitheisākhala kaji nathumna thei.
Jihudinaobing eina Gentilenaobing moreiwui eina ningngateida Varewuili latung khavai kala ithumwui Proho Jishuli shitsang khavai ina ngaraichā eina hāngmachinmi.
Ara iwuitungli khi rānikhala kaji matheila Manglā Katharawui kahāng nganāda Jerusalemli vākida zatta lei.
Ina katheiva keinung kachida phātop kazang kala kachotkachāngna ili ngaraida leili da Manglā Katharana ili hāngkhami chimānga.
Kha ina iwui mirin hi sakta makhuimana, Varewui lukhamashanwui paokaphā chi shākhi sākhavai Proho Jishuna khami chi sākupchaoshap khavai himang hi iwui ningkachāngna.
Kala yanglu, ina wungram hāshok kahaia nathum saikorana ara iwui zakmai kathei masamphangluimarada ina thei.
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui ngachaili kachikathā akha kashimān leisālala chi iwui khalāng maleiluimana da aja nathumli hāngkaphatna.
Kaja Varewui kharin saikora chi ina nathumli thumkahai maleilakla hāngmihaira.

Manglā Katharana nathumwui pāngli horsangmi kahai yaonao saikorawuitunglila, kala nathum khalattawuitunglila ngasharlak eina mayonlu kala Anaomayarana thikhami kala pha̱phayākhami mangā eina awui ngasā ngasak kahaia Varewui churchli homlu.
Ina thei kaja I thuikahaiwui thili sākashi ramfabingna nathumwui ngachaili rāzangda khipālikha haisāsa majilakmara.
Kala nathumwui ngachaiwui eina mashongacheida khamatuia kaikha shokta shitkasangabingli athumwui athi shurkhavai sāra.
Chiwui vang eina ina kum kathum peichaoda ngashun ngayā chara̱ tāda mi kachiva̱li tamkachithei mathāhailakmana kaji hi phaningungda nathum ningngasharmeilu.
Ara ina nathumli Varewui yangkhami kala awui lukhamashanwui tui chili horsangli, tui china nathumli reisang ngasakshapa kala awui mi saikorali Varewui sokhami mishapa.
Ina mi khipākhawui sinā-lupāla, kashankachonla makahaomana.
Iwui vangla, ili khangasobingwui vangla okthuipai khavai ipāng eina sāzāshapa kaji nathumna thei.

‘Kakhuiali khamena mataimeida sokhami samphanga’ da Prohona hāngkahai chi phaningungda, ina ot saikora nathumli sāchitheihaira, kaja mi akhana ot panglāk eina sālaga khangazanbingli ngachonmiphalungra kajina.”
Paulna hāngkup kahaiwui thili athumli ngasoda khuktizangda seihā sāngaruma.
Athumna ali ngavamkhuida kapāngwui shālam sāmamānda chapa.
Athumna matailak eina awui azak matheiluimara da ana hāngkahai chiwui vang wukhananga. Chieina athumna ali marikhong pam eina tangda ngasovai.
Ithumna athumli kapāng tui hānghailaga zathuihaowa. Ngatartei eina huivālaga ithumna Cosli vāzanga; akhama kathā Rhodesli vāzanga, kala chiwui eina Patarali vāhaowa.
Chili Phoeniciali vāki kaji jahas akha samphangda chieina tongvai.
Ithumna Cyprus ngashānda kathei apam vākashung eina azingshong huitāda Syriali vai. Ithumna Tyrewui shamadrupheili ashoka, kaja chili jahaswui ot khuitā khavai leihaowa.
Chili shitkasanga kaikha ithumna samphangda zimiksho shinithang pamsanga. Manglāwui pangshapna chitheimida athumna Paulli Jerusalemli mavaalu da hānga.

Kha apam chili ngasāmsangki kaji zimiksho peihaoda apam chi nothāhailaga ithumna vāki kajishong zatthuihaowa. Athum saikora preinaobing eina naoshinaobing ngasoda ithumli keinung kānshokta shamadruphei vāshungda ngasovai kala chili ithum saikora khuktizangda seihā sāruma.
Chiwui thili ithum akha eina akha kapāngtui hāngaroklaga ithumna marikhong kātonghao kala athumna shimli hanunghaowa.
Ithumna ithumwui shongzā zatmamānda Tyrewui eina Ptolemaisli vāshunga, chili shitkasangbingli vāsamphangda thangkha athumli ngasoda pamsanga.
Akhama kathā ithumna chiwui thot eina Caesareali vāshunga. Chili paokazata shiniwui ngachaili kazanga Philipwui shimli vāzunna.
Awui nao mafathuirang kaje ngalānao mati leisai, athumna phongkhami ot sai.
Ithumna chili pamsangda leilakha Agabus kaho marān akha Judeawui eina rai.

Ana ithumwuili rāda Paulwui shānneira̱ khuilaga khalattawui aphei apāng khalaphailaga hānga, “Hi Manglā Katharana kahāngna; Shanneira̱ hiwui akhavāli Jerusalemwui Jihudibingna hithada khalaphailaga Gentilebingwui pāngli horsangmihaora.”
Tui hi shālaga ithumnala kala apam chiwui mibingnala Paulli Jerusalemli mavākhavai poi.
Chieina Paulna ngahānkai, “Nathumna kachapla chapta iwui ning kaikhavai kasā hi khiot khala? Iva ili phātop kasangmāng maningla, Proho Jishuwui vang Jerusalemli thihaoga da khaleina.”
Ithumna ali mahāngkhuirarthuda “Prohowui kaphaning eina vaihaoranu” jihaowa.
Chiwui thili ithumna khangarān sākhuilaga Jerusalemli vākhavai zathaowa.
Kala Caesareawui eina kharā sākhangatha̱ kaikhala ithumli ngasovāda ithumna azunki kaje Cypruswui eina kharā Mnason, kharewui eina shitkasanga mi ngasāhairakasā chiwui shimli thānvai.
Ithumna Jerusalemli vākashung tharan shitkasangabingna mathānthathup samngaroka.
Akhama kathā Paulna ithumli ngasoda Jamesli asamphang khavai vai kala chili churchwui ararbingla leisersai.
Paulna athum saikorali shālam sākhuilaga, Gentilebingwui alungli awui otram khangatha̱wui mangā eina Varena sāmi kahai saikora chi athumli hāngchithei.
Athumna chi shālaga Vareli masochikata. Chieina athumna hānga, “Ivānao Paul, Jihudi thing kayākhana shitsanghaira kala athum ainli kayākha ningtongkhala kaji nana theipaira.
Gentilewui ngaleili okthuida khalei Jihudi saikorali Moseswui ain horhailaga nao ngarālila ahui marimshok khavai kala Jihudiwui shiyan-chikan mamayon khavai nana tamchitheia da athumli hānghaira ji.
Athumna na hili rāzanghaira kaji shāhairara, kathausikhala?
Chieina ithumna kahāng chi sali. Hili tuingashit khuikahai mi mati leili;

athumli ngasovaulu kala athumli ngarumda samatharkhuilu kala chiwui aman mihaolu, chithākha athum kui sitāpaira. Hithada kasā hi eina athumna nawuitungli hāngkakasot chi khamashung khikha maleimana kha nava ainwui athishurda okthuida lei kaji mi kachiva̱na theipaira.

Kha shitsang kahaia Gentilebingwui vanga, ithumwui chānngazek athishurda meoma̱li pha̱kahai sā, ashee kazā, ngakhakkathi sā kashai kala khamathang-khamarang, hikathāthā hi masāphalungmara da ithumna chithi chihovāhaira.”

Chieina Paulna athumli thānphungda akhama kathā athumli ngasoda sāmatharkhuilaga khorumshimli vāda athumwui tharkhangasakwui zimiksho katharān kupra kala athum ava̱va̱wui kachigat katharān mirakhala kaji athumli achishātmi.
Zimiksho shinithang peinanai khorumshimwui alungli Asia ngaleiwui eina kharā Jihudibingna Paulli thei. Athumna yaruili kasatsanglaga Paulli tukkhuida hānga,

“Israelnaobing, ngachonmilu, apam kachiva̱li yaoung yaovālaga, Israelwui mibing, Moseswui ain kala khorumshimli makhamayā tamkachitheipa chi hina. Chili lāngda ana khorumshimlungli Gentilewui mi khuizanglaga tharkhamathengpam makhao ngasakhaira.”
Kaja Ephesuswui eina kharā Trophimusli ana keinungli ngasokazat chi athumna theihaowa kala Paulna ali khorumshimli thānzanghaira da phaninghaowa.
Khonkazar chi keinung ngayaonaphaowa kala mibingna ngasamrā ngaroklaga Paulli tukkhuida khorumshimwui eina shimenshokhailaga ngalāngda khorumshimwui ngaveibing chi shungserhaowa.
Yaruina Paulli sāthat khavai sāda leilakha, Jerusalem keinung khonzarhaira kaji pao Romewui shipai akhavāli shivātvai.
Shipai akhavā china ngalāngda shipai kathāna kala shipai kaikha khuiphungda yarui chili yongvai. Athumna shipaibing chi kathei eina Paulli shaokasā chi ngasāmhaowa.
Akhavā china vālaga Paulli tukkhui kala marikhānghui khani eina khalaplu da kasoi. Laga ana athumli ngahānna, “Hi khipa, kala ana khi sāhao?”

Ashangva̱ chiwui ngachaili kaikhana tui akha, khangatei kaikhana khangatei tui akha da kachichā matui eina matuingaroka. Chili pa̱khangapā leihaida akhavā chi khi shoklākhaokhala kaji maphākhuirarthuwa, chieina Paulli shipaiwui pamli khuiunghaoluda kasoi.
Paulna chonchak shokkashung eina yaruina ngawunda nurkachup ngarokrāhaida ali shipaibingna ngazonkai.
Shurkazata yarui china “Ali shaothathaolu” da vaozata.
Paulli shipaibingna athumwui apamli khuizangki kaji eina ana shipai akhavā chili hānga,
“Tui kateokha mahāngpairakhala?” “Na Greek tui matuilama?” da akhavā china hānga.
“Chithākha achākachāng Sākathata mi thingmatili ngasoda lamhāngli rai sākhavai thānkashoka Egyptnaopa chi na maningmala?”
Paulna ngahānkai, “I Ciliciawui Tarsusli kapharā Jihudinao akhana kala kahaka keinungwui ruichumnaona. Ili yarui hili khamatui ngasakmilu.”
Shipai akhavā china mayāmida Paulna chonchakli nganingda mibing chili akhon mashok khavai pāng eina ingkit sai. Athum chingrihaira kaji eina Paulna athumli Hebrew tui eina matuiya.
“Ivānao ngarā kala ishāvā ngarā, ina nathumwui mangāli I khalattawui vang kaphayat hi khanganāmilu.”
Ana Hebrew tui eina khamatui chi shālaga mataimeida va̱rihaowa, chieina ana matuiluishita:

“Iva Cilicia ngaleili khalei Tarsusli kapharā Jihudi akhana, kha Jerusalemli Gameli-elwui katamnao akha sāda rarkai, ithumwui avā ngarabingwui khangazip ainwui lungli tamkakhui samphanga kala aja hili khalei nathum thada ila Vareli chigatchao kahai mina.
Apong hili kazata mibingli ina rekharekta shaothat ngasaka. Ina sha̱nao, mayarnaobingli tukkhuida phātopli sanga.

Pāngmon kharei eina hangva̱nao saikorana ina khamashung tui khamatuina da shākhi mishapra. Damascusli khalei avānaobingli athumna kakapi chithi chi ila samphanga. Chieina ina mibing chili vātukkhuilaga marikhanghui eina hokkhuilaga Jerusalemli khuiungda tandi mikhavai vai.
“Ina zazatta Damascus vāshungnanai ngashun kashuirak kazingramwui eina horchamri kahai kahor akhana ili kuimareida horra.
Chieina I ngaleili saosanghaowa kala akhon china kahāng ina shai, ‘Saul, Saul, khisāda nana ili rekharekkhala?’
‘Na khipākhala, Proho’ da ina ngahāna. ‘Nana shimān khavai kasā Nazarethwui Jishu chi ina’ da ana hānga.
Ili ngasokazatbing china kahor chi thei, kha ili kahānga akhon chi athum mashāmana.
Chieina ina ngahāna, ‘Proho, ina khi sarakhala?’ Chieina Prohona ili hānga, ‘Ngakarthuida Damascusli vālu, chili Varena nali sāngasakhangai chi hāngmisera.’
Kahor chiwui kahānna imik matheirarthuda ili khangasobingna ili Damascusli thara̱vai.
“Keinung chili ain chetlak eina khamayona kala Jihudibingna chuilak eina kakhuiya shitkasanga Ananias kaho mi akha leisai.
Ana iwui ngalemli rānganingda hānga, ‘Ivānao Saul, namik theihaoranu.’ Atam chichangli ina kathei samphangluishitta ali thei.
Ana hānga, ‘Ithumwui avā ngarāwui Varena awui kaphaning theikhavai, Khamashungapā chi theikhavai kala akhalattawui akhon eina khamatui chi shākhui khavai nali kapangkakhuina;
kaja nana kathathei kashāshā hi mi kachiva̱li hāngmi khavai awui shākhi kasaa ngasāra.
Chiwui vang eina khi ngarainganaosāra? Ngakarthuida ra̱hikhaolu kala awuili zangda nawui morei pheohaolu.’
“Ina Jerusalemli latungda khorumshimli seihā sāda leilakha ili mahākhami akha chithei,
chili ana ‘Thakta Jerusalemwui eina zatulu, khikhalajila iwui vang nana shākhi khami athumna makhuisangmara’” da Prohona ili hāngda khalei chi thei.
Chieina ina ngahānkai, “Proho, synagogueli vāda nali shitkasangbingli ina tukkhuida kashao chi athumna mathālak eina thei.
Nawui vang shākhi kasaa Stephenli shaokathat tharan ila mayāda ali shaokathatbing chiwui kashankachon mayonmida chiwui ngalemli nganingsai.
Chieina ana ili hānga, ‘Zatulu, ina nali katāva̱li khalei Gentilewuili chihovāra.’”
Hi mahāngranglakha eina tangda Paulna kahāng chi yarui china nganai. Kha chiwui thili athumna panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Hikatha mi hili okathui hiwui eina khuithuihaolu! A maokthuingayimana.”
Athumna panglāk eina vaoda athumwui kachon khayitta kazingramli chifa horkamahunglakha
Romewui shipai akhavā china awui shipaibingli Paulli shipaipamli khuizanghaolu da kasoi kala Jihudibingna awuitungli panglāk eina khavao hi khiwui vangkhala da phākhui khavai ali shaolu da hānga.
Kha athumna ali hokhailaga lijei eina shaouki kaji eina chili nganingkasā shipai akhavā chili Paulna hānga, “Romewui ruichumnao akhali khayon khikhikhawui vang chān mangazekla kashao hi ainla?”
Shipaiwui akhavā china hi kashā eina akhavā kahaka chili vāda ngahāna, “Nana khi phaningkhala? Mipa chi Romewui ruichumnaona.”
Chieina akhavā china Paulli vāda ngahāna, “Hāngmilu, na Romewui ruichumnao akhala?”
“Mha” da ana ngahānkai.
Akhavā china hānga, “Pheisā tarākha shānlaga I ruichumnaopam hi lokakhuina” “Kha iva ruichumnao sāda kapharāna” da Paulna ngahānkai.

Chieina ali ngahānkida leikasā mibing chi ngalāngda thuiserhaowa, kala shipai akhavā china Paul hi Romewui ruichumnaona kaji kathei eina ana ali marikhanghui eina kakhalap chi phaningungda ngacheelakhaowa.

Shipai akhavā china khiwui vang eina Jihudibingna Paulli kaphenkhala kaji theishingkhui khavai ningchānghaowa, chieina akhama kathā Paulli khalap kahai chi khalāmihaowa kala pāngmon kharei eina hangva̱naobing kazip khavai kasoi. Chiwui thili ana Paulli thānphungda athumwui mangāli ali kānganing ngasaka.
Chieina Paulna hangva̱naobing chili yangtitlaga hānga, “Varewui mangāli aja rāshungda ina kaphā mashun-makhui eina okthuirāhaira.”
Pāngmon kharei Ananiasna Paulwui ngalemli khanganingbing chili Paulwui khamorli kaphelu da kasoi.
Paulna ali hānga, “Varena nali makahatlākla kaphera, teimachar kahaia phākho! Ainwui athishurda ili bichar sākhavai pamlaga ain sākhailaga ili kaphe khavai kasolama!”
Paulwui ngalemli khanganing mibing china ali hānga, “Nana Varewui pāngmon khareili chipatrala?”
Paulna ngahānkai, “Ichināngarā, a pāngmon khareina da I matheisāmana. Hithada kapihaida lei, ‘Nawui mibingli khamungawuitungli zakkashi tui mamatuiphalungmara.’”

Mibing chi ngakhumpakna Pharisee kala ngakhumkhana Sadduceena kaji Paulna kathei eina hanga̱shimli ana vaosanga, “Ichināngarā, I Pharisee akhana, Phariseebingwui naomayara akhana; kathebingna ringluishitra da ina kachihānwui vang ili chan ngazek khavai hili nganingli.”
Ana chi hāngkhaleoda Phariseebing eina Saduceebing chi ngaphatreihaowa kala mijang khani shokhaowa.
Kaja Saduceebingna thihaiakha maringshokluimana kala kazingraola, manglāla maleimana da hānga; kha Phariseebingna saikora hi shitsanga.

Akhon chuingarok kahai eina Phariseebingwui mijang kazanga ain kathema kaikhana ngakarthuida panglāk eina thuiphayatta hānga, “Ithumna mipā hili khikha khayon masamphangmana. Khipāna thei ali manglāna lah kazingraona matui khangasakla honthei!”

Ngayāt khangarok chi marnā kahai eina Paulli athumna pāngkāda akha̱-akhā sāmihaipaishinada shipai akhavā chi ngacheehaoda, athumwui chili vālaga Paulli khuiphungda shipaipamli khuivā khavai awui shipaibingli kasoi.
Chithang ngayā Prohona Paulwui ngalemli ranganingda hānga, “Mangacheealu! nana iwui vang Jerusalemli shākhi kasā chithada Romelila shākhi sāphalungra.”
Akhama kathā ngathor Jihudibing china Paulli mashaothatranglakha eina tangda maphazā maphāshakmara da ngathumda tuingashit akha sāngaroka.
Ngathum tuingashit kasā hili mi hangmati lānga.
Chiwui thili athumna pāngmon khareibing eina ararbingli vāda hānga, “Ithumna Paulli mashaothatranglakha eina tangda maphazāmara da kasaka tuingashit khuirumhaira.

Chiwui vang eina nathum awui pongli munmeida theikhui khavai lei chikhaninglaga Romewui shipai akhavāli Paulli khuirā khavai nathum eina hangva̱naobingna pao chihovāmilu. Ana apam hili marāranglakha ithumna ali sāthat khavai khangarān sāra.”
Kha Paulwui azarva̱wui naomayarana athumwui khangarān chi shāhaoda ana shipaipamli vāda Paulli hānghaowa.
Chieina Paulna shipai akhavā akhali hokhuida hānga, “Yaronpā hili akhavāwuili thānvālu, ana ali hāngki kaji tui leili.”
Chieina ana ali thānphungda akhavāwuili khuivāda hānga, “Phātop kazanga, Paulna ili hokhuilaga yaronpa hina nali hāngkhavai leihaida nawuili thānvāmilu da poi.”
Akhavā china apāng singkhuida a khalattana thānkhuilaga ali ngahāna, “Khi hāngkhangai leikhala?”
Ana hānga, “Jihudibingna Paulwui pongli munmeida theikhui khavaina chikhaninglaga ali akhama hanga̱shimli khuirā khavai nali posa da athum mayāngarokhaira.

Kha athumwui kapo chi mamayāmialu, kaja mi hangmati langdana ali ngathumda rimpamsāra, athumna ali masāthatranglakha eina tangda maphazā maphāshakmara da tuingashit khuikahaina; ara athum ngarānpinghaira, nawui khamayāmāng ngaraida khaleina.”
Akhavā china hānga, “Nana tui hi ili hānghaira da khipālikha mahānglakalu.” Chiwui thili yaronnaopa chili shiunhaowa.

Chiwui thili ana akhavā khanili hokhuida hānga. “Aja ngayā pung kakathuma katā eina sigui katonga mi hangshini kala kazei kasinga shipai shākhanili ngasoda shipai shākhani Caesareali vākhavai khangarān sālu.
Paul tongkhavai sigui ngarānmilaga Governor Felixli mathālak eina khuivāmilu.”
Chieina akhavā china hiwui pongli chithi akha kapisangmiya:
Claudius Lysiasna
Phākhamataiya governor Felixli shālam mili.
Mipa hili Jihudibingna tukkhuida sāthat khavai sāda leilakha, a Romewui ruichumnaona da kashā eina ina iwui shipaibingli ngasoda akankakhuina.
Athumna ali khiwui vang kaphenkhala da theikhui khavai ina ali athumwui hanga̱shimli khuivai.
Awuitungli ana thikhangayi kala phātop zangkhangayi maram akhala masamphangmana; awuitungli kaphen chiya athumwui ainwui pongli ngasāsai.
Awuitungli khangathuma khangarān akha sāda lei kaji pao samkaphang eina ngalāngda ali nawuili chihokharāna. Ali kaphenbinglila athumwui mamayākhangai chi nawui mangāli hāngkhavai ina hānghaira.
Athumli kaso kahai athishurda shipaibingna Paulli chithang ngayā thānphungda Antipatris vāshungda khuivai.
Akhama kathā pheiwui shipaibing china shipaipamli hanunghaowa kala siguiwui raimibingli ali ngasovā ngasaka.
Athumna Caesareali vākashung eina governorli chithi chi miya kala Paullila awui pāngli horsangmi,
governorna chithi chi pālaga kachi ngaleiwui einakhala da Paulli ngahāna. A Ciliciawui eina kharāna da kathei eina
ana hānga, “Nali kaphenbing kharā eina nawui tui nganānaora.” Chieina Paulli governorwui chānngazekshimli hailaga mayonpamlu da ana kasoi.
Zimiksho phangāthangwui thili pāngmon kharei Ananiasna ararnao kaikha kala phayatme Tertullusli ngasoda Caesareali vai. Athumna Felixwui mangāli rāda Paulwuitungli mamayākhangai kaphen tui chi mikai.
Chieina Paulli hozanga kala Tertullusna awuitungli kaphen chi yirphokuwa:
“Phākhamataiya Felix! Nawui thangmei thānsak mangā eina ithumna atam kasāngkhawui vang chingri kahai samphanghaira kala ithumwui ngalei phāmei khavai khangacheila tarākha khuirāmihaira.
Phākhamataiya Felix, ithumna nali apam kachiva̱li kala atam kachida hiwui vang ningkashi chitheili.
Kha atam kasāngkha nali mahapkhano khavai, kasha̱ eina kahāng hi nana lumashanmida khanganāmilu.
Mipa hi khonzār khangasaka, okathuili khalei Jihudi saikorali kuikazā khangasaka kala Nazarene ashangwui kathāna akhana da ithumna theikhuihaira.
Ana khorumshimla makhao ngasak khavai hotnai, chieina ithumna ali tukkakhuina.
Kha akhavā Lyssiana ithumwui pāngwui eina namda rākhuithuihailaga ali kaphenbingli nawui mangāli rālu jihaowa.
Nana ali ngahānkhayang eina ithumna kaphenwui apong saikora chi paisor eina theikhuishapra.”
Jihudibingla zangda kaphen saikora hi mashunga da hānga.
Chieina Governorna Paulli matui khavai ingkit sai kala Paulna hānga.
“Nana zingkum sha̱rākhawui vang miyur hiwuitungli bicharwo sarā kahai hi ina thei, chiwui vang eina nawui mangāli I khalatta phayatki kajiwui vang ringphai.
Ina Jerusalemli khorum khavai kakā chi zimiksho tharāda khanithang makāranga kaji nana paisor eina theikhuipaira.

Ina khorumshimli kachikathā mi akhali ngayāt khangarok Jihudibingna masamphanglakmana lah keinunglila, synagoguelila kala apam kachi kachilikhala ina mibingli thotkasang athumna khikha masamphangmana.
Arui athumna iwuitungli kaphen hi mashunga da theikhui khavai athum shākhila mamirarmara.

Kha ina hi mayai, athumna mamashungmana kaji Apong chili shurda ina ithumwui avā ngarāna khokharuma Vare chili khoruma. Kha Moseswui ain lairikli kapi kahai saikora chili ina shitsanga kala marānbingna kapi kahai chilila shitsanga.
Mibing hina kachihān khalei tākam eina ila Vareli kachihān lei; chiya mi saikora kaphāla makaphāla ringluishitra.
Chiwui vang eina Varewui miktālila, mibingwui miktālila mashun-makhui chi tharzā eina atam kachida leikhavai ina hotnai.
“Zingkum kashānglaga ina iwui yurli khangachon kala kachigat mikhavai vai.
Ina hi sāmahunglakha khipākha mazangla kala khonkazār maleila tharkhangasak ot kasā chi athumna ili khorumshimli katheina; chili yaruila ili ngasoda maleisāmana kala khonkazār otla ina masāmana.
Kha chili Asia ngaleiwui eina Jihudi kaikha leisai, athumna iwuitungli makhamayā leiakha kaphen chi nawui mangāli rāmatui ngayia.
Chi maningakha ina hanga̱ mangāli khanganing hi eina athumna iwui khayon khi samphangkhala kaji hāngranu.
Athumwui mangāli kānganingda ‘Kathena ringluira kajili shitkasangwui vang aja nana ili bichar sāda lei’ kajili lāngda khikha mahāngmana.”
Kha Apong chili mathālak eina theihairakasa Felixna tui kasā chi thāngasakhaowa. Ana hānga, “Lysias, shipai akhavā chi kharā eina tuikat hiwui tuikup khuiminaora.”
Chiwui thili ana Paulli khamayona shipai shākhawui akhavā chili, Paulli narhai khavai thālala ningkhānva sākhavai kala awui ngasotnaobingna awui kasakli yangkhami tharan makhāmhai khavai kasoi.
Zimiksho kashānglaga Felixna Jihudipava̱ apreiva̱ Drusillali ngasorai. Ana Paulli hokhui ngasaka kala ana Khrista Jishuli shitkasangwui pongli khamatui chi nganai.
Kha Paulna mashun, khalatta khangarin, kala rāki kaji bichar zimikshowui pongli ngapheikachithei eina Felix ngacheehaida hānga, “Ara ungpaira, ina atam kaphā chitharan holuinaora.”
Paulna ali pheizā milapai da phaningsāhaoda ra̱ra̱ hokhuilaga ali chān ngazekchinga.
Kha kum khaniwui thili Felixwui mahut Porcius Festusna shinhaowa kala Felixna Jihudibingwui masot khuingaihaoda Paulli phātopli haihaowa.
Festusna awui ngaleili unglaga zimiksho kathumthangwui thili Caesareawui eina Jerusalemli vai.
Chili pāngmon khareibing eina Jihudiwui kathānabingna Paulwuitungli kaphen chi khuirai.
Athumna Festusli, Paulli Jerusalemli kakhuirāmilu da poi, kaja athumna Paulli shongfali rimda sāthat khavai ngathumda ngarānhairasai.
Festusna ngahānkai, “Paullia Caesareali phātop sanghaida lei kala ila chili thaklāk eina vaura.
Nathumwui kathānabing chi ili Caesareali ngasovāranu, kala mayarapa china khayon sāhaiakha chili kaphen tui chi aminaoranu.”
Festusna athumli zimiksho chishat lah tharāthang sha̱kha ngasopamlaga Caesareali vai, akhama kathā ana karotwui bicharpamli pamlaga Paulli khuizang khavai kasoi.
Paulna rāzangkhaleoda Jerusalemwui eina kharā Jihudibing china ali kuimareiphinhailaga awuitungli athum khalattana praman mamikharar kasasaka tui kachungkha phena.
Kha Paulna khalatta phayatta; “Ina Jihudiwui ainlila, khorumshimlila, kala Romewui awungalila khikha khayon masāhailakmana.” da hānga.
Kha Festusna Jihudibingwui ningyāng ungkhavai Paulli ngahāna, “Jerusalemli shanglaga nali phenda khalei chi chili iwui mangāli bichar sākhavai ningchāngla?”
Paulna ngahānkai, “I arui ili bichar sākhangayi apam, Caesarwui kārotli nganingda lei; ina Jihudibingli khikha khayon masāhailakmana kaji nana thatheihaira.

Ina ain sakhaihaida thikhangayi shongrān leiakha ina chiwui eina yāmkhavai mapolakmana; kha iwuitungli khuikharā kaphen chili khamashung mazangmana jiakha, khipānakha ili athumwui pāngli mamipaimara. Ina Caesarli khangakaona.”
Chiwui thili Festusna awui hanga̱li ngasanlaga ngahānkai, “Nana Caesarli kapowui vang, Caesarli vāpaira.”
Zimiksho khani kathumthangwui thili awunga Agrippa eina Bernicena ringkaphā shālamwui vang Festusli samphang khavai Caesareali rāzanga.
Ani khanina chili sha̱rākhathang pamsanghaoda Festusna Paulwui maramli awungali hāngchithei; “Hili Felixna phātop sanghaikasā mayarnao akha lei,
kala ina Jerusalemli khavā tharan Jihudiwui pāngmon khareibing eina ararnaobingna awuitungli kaphen khuirāda ali yomchiphun khavai rapoi.
Kha ina athumli ithum Romanwui khangachāli kaphena china phenkahaiapa chili mai yangngasungda khalatta maphayatkhuiranglakha eina tangda kateiwui pāngli mikakā hi khangachā maningmana da hāngkahaina.
Athum hili kharā tharan ngalāngda akhanama kathā bichar sākhavai ina ngahotkhui kala mipa chili khuirā khavai ina kasoi.
Kaphenabing china thuikahāng chili phenlapaida ina phaningkasā thada zakkashi phenkhangayi mazangmana.
Kha athumwuili mamayākhangarok khalei chiya athumwui dharmawui pongli kala thikahai Jishu chi ringdalei da Paulna kahāng chimaya.
Ina hiwui pongli kathada phākhuisikhala da matheithuda tui hi Jerusalemli bichar asāngaila da ina ali ngahāna.
Kha Paulna Caesarwui tuitak eina vaikhavai kapowui vang, ina ali Caesarwui pāngli machihovāranglakha ali hili haisalu da kaso kahaina.”
Chieina Agrippana Festusli hānga, “Mayara hiwui tui inala nganāyangngai.”
“Akhama nganāyanglu” da Festusna ngahānkai.
Akhanama kathā Agrippa eina Bernice hakmahālak eina rāda, raimi akhavābing eina keinungwui kathānabingli ngasoda yarui kazipshimli zanga. Chiwui thili Festusna kasoda Paulli khuirai.
Festusna hānga, “Awunga Agrippa kala hili ngasopamda khalei yarui; mipa hiwuitungli apam hilila, Jerusalemlila makhamayā kaphen tui ili khuirai. Athumna mipa hi maringpaimara da vāokazama.
Kha ana thikhangayiwui ot sākahai khikha ina masamphangmana. A khalattana Caesarli kapowui vang, ina ali chili chihovā khavai mayāmi kahaina.

Kha ina Caesarli mipā hiwui pongli hilāka da kapi khavai maram maleimana. Chiwui vang eina nathumwui mangāli, matailāk eina Awunga Agrippawui mangāli ali khuikharāna. Chieina ali mathālak eina ngahānshingkhui kahaiwui thili ina kapi khavai kachikathā samphanglapai.
Kaja awuitungli kaphen chi tharlak eina machitheila, phātop kazanga mi akhali chiho khavā hiya mangayimana.”
Agrippana Paulli hānga, “Na khalattawui maramli hāngkhangai chi hāngpaira.” Paulna apāng katingshokta hithada akhalattawui vang phayata:
“Awunga Agrippa, ina aja nawui mangāli, Jihudibingna ili kaphen saikora chiwui vang phayat khavai khanganing samkaphang hi iwui vang ka̱lā khamahaina da phaninga.
Kaja matailak eina nana Jihudiwui khangachā zatkhanā kala mamayā khangarok saikora mathālak eina katheina. Chiwui vang eina iwui hi zingarāda khānglaga khanganāmilu da kapona;
“Haokaphokwui eina thuida ina iyurwui alunglila, Jerusalemli rarkakālila kala chili lāngda nganuilakhawui eina thuida iwui kharingkharakrin Jihudi saikorana theisera.
Ithumwui sakmeikap kaji dharmawui athishurda ina Pharsiee akha sāda okthuisai kaji athumna theida kasāngkhahaira, athumna shākhi mingaisi kaja mipailaka.
Ithumwui avā ngarābingli ngashitmi kahai chili chihānhaowa kajiwui vang aja ili bichar sākhavai hili khanganingna,
hi ithumwui shang tharāda khanina samphangra da chihānchaoda Vareli ngashun ngayā mateila khokharum china. Kachihān hiwui vang, he awunga, Jihudibingna ili kaphenna.
Varena kathili ringngasaka kaji hili khisāda nathumna mashitsangkapaina da phaninghaokhala?
Jerusalemli chithada ina sai kala pāngmon khareibingwui eina pangshap samphangda Varewui mibing kachungkhali phātoplila sanga kala athumli shaothat khavai tuitak katā tharan inala iwui khamayā miya.
Ina kachungkhashida Synagogueli vāda athumli tandi mi kala athumwui shitkasang chi ngachei khavai khangarān sai; malungvātnahaida ina miram khangateiwui keinungli vāda athumli rekhareka.
“Hiwui kharinwui vang ina pāngmon khareibingwui eina panghap kala kakaso khuiphungda Damascusli vai.
He Awunga, ngashunlungwui atamli shongfa zatta leilakha kazingramwui eina zimikli horkhamei kahor akhana ili kala ili khangasobingli kuimareida kapkharor chi thei.
Ithum saikora ngaleili saosang kahai tharan Hebrew tui eina akhon akhana, ‘Saul, Saul, khisāda nana ili rekakharekhala? Lungguili kathakakha nakhalatta chotkhuira.’ da ili kahāng ina shai.
‘Na khipākhala, Proho’? da ina ngahāna. Chieina Prohona ngahānkai, ‘Nana shimānranu da kasā Jishu chi ina.
Kha ngakarthuida nganinglu, kaja nali rao akha sāda kapangsang khavai ina rākachitheina, kala aja nana ili theikahai kala ina naoda nali chitheiluiki kaji chi nana kateibingli shākhi sāphalungra.
Ina nali Israel yurwui eina kala Gentilebingwui eina kanmira.

Nana athumwui mik rakngasakra, kala tangkhamangwui eina kahorli latung ngasakra kala Satanwui pangshapwui eina Vareli latung ngasakra. Chithada sāda athumna ili shitkasangwui vang athumwui morei pheokhami samphangra kala Varewui kapangkhui kahai mibingwui ngachaili zangpaira.’
“Chiwui vang eina awunga Agrippa, kazingramwui eina kharā mahākhami chili ina kahāng makhanganā maleimana

Rimeikapta Damascusli khalei, chiwui thili Jerusalemli khalei kala Judeali khalei saikora kala Gentilebingli, moreiwui eina ning ngateida Vareli latunglu kala ning ngateihaira kaji otsak eina chitheiphalungra da ina pao hāshoka.
Chiwui vang eina Jihudibingna ili khorumshimli tukkhuida sāthat khavai sai.
Kha aja rāshungda ina Varewui khangachon samphanga. Chieina ina hili nganingda kharei kateo makhaila shākhi hi khamina. Marānbing eina Mosesna shokrada hāngkahai chili henda ina khikha mahāngmana.
Chiya Khristana kachotkachāng phungphalungra kala kathiwui eina ringshok khare sāda Jihudi eina Gentilebing khaninili huikhamiwui kahor chi vaomalānra.”
Hithada akhalattawui vang kaphayat eina Festusna panglāk eina vaoda ali hānga. “Paul, na pāhaira! tarākha tamkakhui china nali pāngasakhaira!”
Paulna ngahānkai, “Phākhamataiya Festus, I mapāmana! Ina tāzak kahai khamashung tui khamatuina.
Awunga Agrippa, ina nali hi machihuilakla matuikashapna, khikhalajila nana hiwui pongli theisera kaja saikora hi awungana matheila achithek akhali ngathumda kashok maningmana da ina shitsanga.
Awunga Agrippa, marānbingli na mashitsangmala? Nava shitsanga kaji ina thei.”
Agrippana Paulli hānga, “Atam kasha̱kha hiwui alungli nana ili Christian onngasakshapra da phaningla?”
Paulna ngahānkai, “Atam kasha̱ kasāngwui tui maningmana, namāng majila aja iwui tui nganāda khalei saikorala, marikhānghuikhana so kajimada khangateiva I kathā ngasāser khavai ina Vareli seihā sai.”
Chiwui thili awungana ngakarthui kala ali ngasoda Governor eina Bernice kala athumli ngasopamkasā saikora ngakarthuisera,
ngathān kahaiwui thili athumna akha eina akha ngazek ngarokta, “Mipa hi thikhangayi lah phātopli sangkhangyi ot akhala masāhaimana.” da hāngngaroka.
Kala Agrippana Festusli “Mipa hina Caesarli mapohaisāsi kaja chihohaipaiki kajina.” ji.
Ithumna marikhong eina Italy vaura da kupkahai tharan, Paul eina phātopli sangkahai mi kaikha Augustan Shipai Ashang kaho shipai shākhawui akhavā Julius kaho mipa chili horsangmi.
Chieina Asia ramphangwui jahas ngasām khavaipamli vāki kaji jahas chi ithumna Adramyttiumwui eina kātongkhuida zatphoka. Chili Thessalonicawui eina kharā Macedonianao Aristarchusla ithumli ngasovai.
Akhama kathā ithumna Sidonli vāshunga. Juliusna Paulli phaningmida awui ngasotnaobinglila vāyang ngasaka kala khangachonla khuingasaka.
Chiwui eina huiphokluilaga masina ithumli ngaronglak eina phanhaoda Cypruswui ngalei masi makaphanshong huivāhaowa.
Chiwui eina Cilicia eina Pamphylliawui shamadru chi kānhailaga Lyciawui lungli khalei Myrali vāshunga.
Shipai akhavā china apam chili Alexanderiawui eina kharā jahas, Italyli vāki kaji samphangda ithumli chili kātong ngasaka.
Ithumna zimiksho sha̱rakhathang ngairon eina huizatlaga saklak eina Cniduswui keinungli ungzanga, kala masina chivāk mahuipaithuda Solmoneli kāroda khalei Creteshong huivai.
Ithumna shamadruphei chili saklāk eina huivāmamānlaga Laseawui keinung eina matānāla khalei Fair Havens chili vāshunga.
Atamla tarakha shimanhao, shongzāwui ka̱lāshātla leihao kala Ngatangkhami Zimikshola kanthuihairasāda chieina Paulna athumli hānga;
“Ivānao ngarā, ithumwui shongzā hi ka̱lāshikapai lei; khuiphungda khalei ot kala jahas kashimānmāng maningla manglā kashimān eina tangda shokra kaji iwui ningli theikakhui lei.”
Kha shipai akhavā china Paulwui tuili manganāsangla jahaswui akhavā eina captainpawui kahāng khuisangthuihaowa.

Kala jahas ngasām khavaipam chi sikachāng pamkhavai machānāthuda kachungana ato-zingsho kala aze-zingsho khangarei Cretewui jahas ngasām khavaipam Phoenixli kashap eina tangda huivā khavai kala chili si atamli angasāmkhui khavai zatusa jihaowa.

Azingshongwui masina riri phankaphok eina athumna ngarān kahai athishurda huivāpaira da phaninga. Chieina khalap kahai jahas chi khalākhuilaga kashap eina tangda shamadruyar eina Creteshong huivā khavai sai.
Kha masāngleila ato-zingsho kaho kapanga masi chi panglāk eina ngalei chiwui eina phanrai.
Masi china jahasli ungkathangda chili ngasungda mahuipaithuda masina phankhavāvāshong vauranu da chihohaowa.
Tara̱na kuinam kahai ngalei Cauda kaho chiwui azingshong akakān tharan ithumna ngayin khavai kateokha samphanga. Chili jahaswui marikhongnao chi saklak eina yonkhui.

Athumna chi ngakhunkākhuilaga jahasli kuimareida khara̱ eina khalapshantithai. Athumna Libya shamadrupheiwui situitungli angatākpaishina da ngacheehaowa, chieina huikazat chi haitāhailaga aningsasak eina jahas chi masili khuiphung ngasaka.
Siphan zingrot chi phanshonhaoda, akhama kathā athumna jahasli khuikaphung ot kaikha horshokhaowa,
kala khanaothang kathā athumna jahaswui akapbing horshoklui.
Kaja sha̱rakhathang ithumna zimik, sirā matheirarthuwa kala masinala panglāk eina phanchinghaoda, naodava ithum ringra kajiwui kachihān akhala maleithuwa.
Mibing china kashakazā mazāla kasāngkha zatrā kahaiwui thili Paulna hānga, “Ivānaongarā, nathumna iwui tui khuida Cretewui eina mazatphoksāsi kaja kashimān kala ka̱lāshāt masamphangmara.
Kha ara malung pingmeilu da ina nathumli kapona! Jahas maningla nathum khipākha kashimān mashokmara.
Kaja āngayā, ina khokharuma iwui Varewui kazingrao akha ili rāda
hānga, ‘Paul, mangacheealu! Nana Caesarwui mangāli nganingphalungra kala yanglu, nali tongkhangaruma saikora Varena nali mihaira.’
Chiwui vang ivānaongarā, malung pingmeilu, kaja ana ili hāngkahai chi tāzak eina shokra da ina Vareli shitsanga.
Kha ithumli tara̱na kuinam kahai ngalei akhali aphanshokra.”
Tharāda khamatethangwui ngayā sailungphup maikhali ithumna Adriatic shamadruli noung novada phanzatlakha jahas kahuibingna ngalei katheng nganaiura da phaninga.
Athumna tara̱ chiwui kathuk tamyang khavai khara̱ chihozanglaga khayang eina feet shākha maga̱ thuksai, khaleilaga tamkhayang eina feet hangchiko thuksai.
Jahas chi lunghārli vangatākpaishina da ngacheehaoda akhanukvāk marikarhui mati chihozanghailaga seihā sāda kazing kathang ngarai.
Jahaswui mangāshong khalei jahas hokkhui khavai mari chi chihosang khavaina da sakhaninglaga kahuiabing chi yāmshok khavai sāda marikhongnao chi tara̱li chihozanga.
Kha Paulna shipai shākhawui akhavā eina shipaibingli hānga, “Kahuiabingna jahasli mapamakha, nathum ringkhavai kachichān akhala maleimana.”
Chieina marikhongwui khara̱ chi shipaibingna katatshathailaga chihohaowa.
Zingthanlam Paulna athumli kashakazā zākhui khavai kasoda hānga, “Nathumna mazālakla khumkharā hi ajana zimiksho tharāda khamate thangna,
chiwui vang eina pangshap samphang khavai kashakazā kazākhuilu, nathumwui ngachaili kachikathā mi akhawui sampā akhala mashimānmara.”
Paulna hi hāngchanghailaga khamui khuida athum saikorawui miktāli Vareli ningkashi mihailaga serkhaida shaiphokkuwa.
Chieina athum saikorala ringphauda phazāseruwa.
Jahas chili katonga ithum mi saikora shākhani hangshinida tharukna.
