Athumna shaishap shaikahaiwui thili jahas chi ngavengsang khavai kehu chi shamadrulungli horsanghaowa.
Kazing kathang tharan khi ngaleikhala kaji athumna matheithuwa, kha ngalei ngachaili ngayi ngaphangvā kahai theida, sapaiakha chiwui ngayipheili jahas angasāmkhui khavai khangarān sai.
Chieina athumna jahas hokkhui khavai marikarhui chi ngayili horsanglaga khalap khavai khara̱bing chi khalākhui, laga mangāshongwui kachon chi masi azatli yangda khāngkākhuilaga ngayipheishong huivai.

Kha apam chi mathukla pailatsā eina leisāda ngaleikathengli ashokhaowa kala akhamor situili shirshipsanghaida mangatha̱paithuwa; kala akhanukvāk chiya tara̱wui khangaphao chi pangnāhaida kathangkhaihaowa.
Kachikathāna ra̱yākshokta yāmhaipaishina da ngacheehaida shipaibingna phātop kazangbing chili sāthat khavai ngarāna.
Kha shipaiwui akhavā china Paulli kankhuingaihaoda athumwui sākhangai chi masā ngasakthuwa. Ra̱yāk kathei saikorana jahaswui eina ngawokshokta shamadrupheili ra̱yākshok khavai ana kasoi.
Kala mara̱yākkatheibingna chikhaili nilala jahaswui atek akaili nilala hokthānglaga athumwui athi shurshok khavai kasoi. Hithada ithumna shamadrupheili yāmshoksera.
Ithumna yāmshok kahaiwui thili yikuiram chiwui aming Malta hoya da shai.
Yikuiram chiwui mibingna ithumli teokha ngahānkhangai maningmana. Athumna mei sāmida ithumli ringphālak eina samngarokhui, kaja atam chitharan kazing rophokhairasāda siklak eina leisai.
Paulna thingtan akha khuilaga meili horkasang eina mei chiwui kasāna kathiri kaphunga phara̱ akha shokta Paulwui pāngli ngareishānhaowa.

Aramnaobingna apāngli phara̱ kāngkhayui chi theilaga athum akha eina akha ngazek ngaroka, “Mashoilakla mayara hi mi shaokathatara. Ana shamadruwui eina yāmshokhailala, mashun china ali maring ngasakmara.”
Kha ana phara̱ chi meili khayitsanghaida khikha mathālakthuwa.

Athumna awui phasā chi worshokrāsāra lah kashuirak eina saosangda thihaora da ngaraipama. Kha atam kasāngkha ngarailaga ali kalākashi khikha makashok eina athumwui kaphaning chi ngacheihailaga “A hi kameo akhara.” da hānga.
Apam chiwui eina matānāla yikuiram chiwui awunga Publiuswui lam kateokha leisai. Ana ithumli ngahānngailak eina samngarokkhuida zimiksho kathumthangwui vang awui shimli ngasāmkhui ngasaka.
Chitharan Publiuswui avāva̱ chi kakharur eina ashee kapai ngasoda kazāhaoda petli pipamda leisai. Paulna ali zangyangda seihā samida awuitungli pāng parrorda ali raimi.
Hi kashok eina yikuiramli khalei kakazānao saikora rāda raimisera.
Athumna ithumli apong kachungkhali khayāshilak eina sai kala ithum zatuki kaji eina ithumna darkar kasā kashakazā katonga ngarānsangmi.
Kachāng kathumwui thili yikuiram chili si peida rāngasāmkakhui Alexanderiawui eina kharā, mangāli Ngashirkata Kameo chinaoniwui ama̱ yeksang kahai jahasli tongda zatphoka.
Ithumna Syracuseli huishangda chili zimiksho kathumthang apamsanga.
Chiwui eina kuilaga Rhegiumli vāshunga kala akhama kathā azingshongwui eina masi phanphokuwa laga kakhanethang Puteoli vāshunga.
Apam chili shitkasanga mi kaikha samphangda ithumli zimiksho shinithang pamsang khavai poi. Hithada sāda ithumna Rome vāshunga.

Romeli khalei shitkasangbingna ithum rāda lei kaji kashā eina keinung chiwui Appius leihngapha̱ kala Three Inns kahowui keinung eina tangda rālaga ithumli rāsamphanga. Paulna athumli kathei eina Vareli ningshi kala ningkhanganung samphanga.
Ithumna Romeli vākazang tharan, shipai akhana mayonlaga Paulli amāng pam khavai mayāmihaowa.

Zimiksho kathumthangwui thili ana apam chiwui Jihudi kathānabingli hokhuisera. Athum saikora rākazip khangarum tharan ana hānga, “Ivānao ngarā, ina iyurwui mibingli lah ithumwui avā ngarāna mitā khamaron khangachā zatkhanā chili khikha kakai masāhaisālaklala, Jerusalemli ili phātop sanghailaga Romewui pāngli horsangmi.
Ili ngahānkup kahaiwui thili chiho khavai sai, khikhalajila thikapai khayon masamphangthuwa.
Kha iyurli phenkhavai khikha maleisālala Jihudibingna makhamayāwui vang ina Caesarli pokahaina.
Hiwui vang nathumli samphangda machukrum khavai kahona. Israelwui kachihān chiwui vang ili marikhānghui sangkahaina.”
Kala athumna ali hānga, “Ithumna nawui pongli Judeawui eina chithi akhala masamphangmana, lah chiwui eina hili kharā avānao khipānakha nawuitungli hāngkhamashāt tui marāhāngmana.
Kha nawui kaphaning khi leimameikhala kaji nawui eina shāngai; kaja apam kachiva̱li ashangva̱ hili mashātta khamatui ithumna thei.”

Chieina athumna Paulli langkasa̱ akha sai kala chithang ana kapam apam chili mi kachungkha rākazipa. Ana ngathor eina thuida ngazin vāshungda Vare wungramwui pongli meikhaichithei kala Moseswui ain lairik kala marānbingna kapi kahaiwui eina khuishoklaga athumli Jishuwui pongli meisā eina tamchithei.
Athum kaikhana awui tui khuisanga kala kaikhana mashitsangmana.
Chieina athum mamayā ngarokthuda Paulna tui hi hāngkahaiwui thili athum ngathānhaowa; “Manglā Katharana marān Isaiahwui mangā eina navā ngarāli hithada hānghaikasā chi mashunga!
Kaja ana hānga:
‘Mibing hili ahānglu:
Nathumna shālakra kha bhap matālakmara,
nathumna theilakra kha maphaningkhuilakmara.
Kaja athumwui ning mangma̱ ngasakhaira,
khanāla ngakhok ngasakhaira,
kala athumwui mikla mikpihaira,
chi maningsi kaja athumwui mikna theira,
athumwui khanāna shāra, athumwui ningna bhap tāra,
kala athumna ili latunghairara,
kala athumli raimihairara,
da Varena hānga.’”
Paulna hi hāngkahaiwui thili, Jihudibing athum khalatta nganangrei eina ngayāt ngaroklaga thuihaowa.
Ana apam chili kum khani peichaoda akhalattawui lan khuishoklaga pama, chili ali samphang khavai kharā mi kachiva̱li mathānthup samphangkhuida
Vare wungramwui pao hāshoka kala Proho Jishu Khristawui pongli sheikakhaut maleila phongshar eina tamchithei.
Kathara lairikbingli kapi kahai thada Varena achālakhawui eina awui marānbingli paokaphā hi hāshok khavai ngashitmihaira.
Tui hi awui Naomayara ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui aponglina. Mikumowuishong einava a Davidwui ara̱-azāna.
Varewui tharkhamathengshong einava kathiwui eina ringkashokwui vang ali pangshap khaleia Varewui Naomayara ngasā ngasaka.
Miyur saikorali shitkasang kala kahāng khanganāli thānsangmi khavai Khristawui mingwui vang awui mangā eina ili paokazata akha sāngasaka.
Hi Khristawui ngasā khavai Varena hokakhuili zangkahai Romeli khalei nathumla zanga.
Ithumwui Avāva̱ Varivara kala Proho Jishu Khristana nathumli lukhamashan kala chingri kahai miranu.
Anaomayarawui paokaphāwui vang ina ningtonglak eina otram khangatha̱ hi Varena shākhina. Iwui seihā kasā kachiva̱li nathumli khamalai masāla phaningungchinga kaji hila Varena thei.
Ara nathumli rāsamphangpai khavai Varena ngarānmira kaji hi iwui kapona.
Kaja manglāwui sokhamili ngarum khavai kala manglārin makangmei khavai nathumli samphangngailaka.
Khikhalajila iwui shitkasangna nathumli kala nathumwui shitkasangna ili pangmei khavai akhana akhali ngachonmi ngarokra kajina.

Ivānao ngarā, ina nathumli theingasakkhangaina kaja ina Gentilebingwui eina athei samkaphang thada nathumwui einala samphang khavai nathumli rākida tarākhashida khangarān sai, kha ili masākapai leichinghaowa.
Greekbinglila, makhaningbinglila, thangkhameibinglila, khaninili ina samikhangayi kachungkha lei.
Chiwui vang eina Romeli khalei nathumlila paokaphā hi hāshokngailak eina khaleina.

Kaja, Varivarana mikumoli kathada mashungmikhala kaji hi pao khamathāna phongmi: hi khare eina thuilaga khanao eina tangda shitkasang mangā einana. Hithada kapihaida lei, “Shitkasangwui mangā eina khangaronga ā chi ringra.”
Khikhalajila Varewui pongli theikhuiki kaji hi athumwui vang kasak maleimana, kachiwui vangkhala kaja chi Varena athumli chitheimihaira.

Okathui kasā eina thuilaga Varewui matheikharar magunbing, awui katang makhavai pangshap eina tharkhamathengwui khangachā chi ana semkahai otbing chiwui eina mibingna tharzā eina theihaira. Chiwui vang eina athumna phayatkhui khavai apong katei maleiluimana.
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja athumna Vareli thatheilaga ali Varelaka da khayāmashimana kala ningkashila mamimana, athumna phaningphāphā machukphāphāda athumwui ninglila mashun-makhui maleithuwa.
Athumna thangkhamana da hāngmāngmada mangkhama̱ ngasāhaowa,
kala athumna kathi makhangavā Vareli makhorumla thikapaiya mikumoli, vānaoyurbingli, sāyurbingli kala phara̱-pharāli ngamānda sākakhui ama̱bingli khorumhaowa.
Chiwui vang eina athumwui wuklungli makathar khamathangli leikashiwui vang Varena chihohaida athum akha eina akha khayākhamalā ot sai.
Athumna Varewui pongli khamashung chi kakapik sāngasakhaowa kala katang makhavai, sokhame Kasā Akhavā chili makhorumla ana sākakhuiya otbingli khorumthuihaowa, kala otram ngatha̱thuihaowa! Amen.
Chiwui vang eina Varena athumli horhaida khayākhamalā khamathang ot sāngasakhaowa. Sha̱naobingla khangachā khangaso maningla athum khalatta khayākhamalā ot sai.

Chithada sāda mayarnaobingnala khangachāwui khangashang chi horhailaga athum akha eina akha mathangmarangda mayarnao eina mayarnao khayākhamalā ot sai. Chieina athumna sāyon kahai chiwui samphangkhangayi shongrān chi athum khalatta samphangra.
Athumna Vareli theikhangai ning makhaleiwui vang Varena athumli makhamathā kala makhangayi achamli zatngasakhaowa.
Athumwui makaphā-makhayā, zakkashi, khangamar kala mikpaikashiwui acham, yangkashi, shaokathat, khangama̱-khangazai, kateikazā, shimān khavai kasā kala morkasapna pemtinghai.
Athuma satkakharata, Vareli ningkakachaia, mana̱kashe, langkasoa, kachorkashe, kachipata, ava̱ avāwui kahāng makhanganā,
mangkhama̱a, mashitsangkapai kala lukhamashan makatheibingna.
Hikathāthā ot saakha thira kaji Varewui ningkhami chi theilala athumna chi kasāmāng majila khangatei chithada kasābinglila mayāmi.
Hikathā kasābingli Varena bichar kasā chi mashunga kaji ithumna thei.
O mikumo, nathumna hikathāthā hi nathum khalatta saakha Varewui bicharwui eina yāmshokpaira da phaninglā?
Maningakha awui mahāngkharar lukhamashan, khāngkhami kala ja̱khami chili nana matheikhamila? Vare hi lumashankathana kaji nathumna thei. Chiwui vang eina ana nathumli ningngateikhui ngasakngai.
Kha nawui ning khamarar kala mangacheikhangai china Varewui malungkhavāt kala mashun bichar sāthanghon ritkhamei tandi samphang khavai nakhalatta kazipkakhui ngasāra.
Kaja Varena mi kachiva̱li kachichāwui otsak athishurda sāman mira.
Mi kaikhava kaphā ot sāchingda lei, kathi makhavai kharing phai; athumli Varena katang makhavai kharing mira.
Kha khamashungli manganāsangla tuikaili zangda makaphāli kazangbingli Varewui malungkhavāt khonshāt tāshungra.
Makaphā kasā mi kachiva̱li kachotkachāng eina wukakhanang tāshungra. Jihudili rira kala Gentilebinglila tāshungra.
Kha kaphā kasābingli Varena tekhamatei, khayākakā kala chingri kahai mira. Jihudibingli mirira kala Gentilebinglila mira.
Khikhalajila Vare mijang mavaimana.
kachiwui vangkhala kaja ain shāhaira kajiwui vang Varewui mangāli mashunghaira kaji maningmana, kha ainwui athishurda kasābing chili mashungkhamina.
Ain makhalei yurbingna athum aningsasak eina ainna sāngasakkhangai athishurda zatsaakha athumwui vanga chi ainna.
Athumwui ningli ain kapisanghaida lei kaji athumwui otsak eina chithei, kala athum khalatta yonkahaila, khamashungla phaningkakhui chieina hi mashunga da athumwui mashun-makhuina chitheimi.
Chiwui vang eina ina hāshokta khalei Paokaphā hiwui athishurda khanaowa zimiksholi Varena Jishu Khristawui mangā eina miwui wuklungli ngathum kahai saikora phongshoksera.
Na kathā? Nakhalatta Jihudiniji; ainli chihāna kala Vareli nganaiya da langsoi.
Varena nali khi sāngasakngaikhala kaji na thei kala khamashung chi khikhala kaji kapangkhuithei khavai nana ainwui eina tamkhuihaira.
Khangapeoawui thānkhamelaka, tangkhamangli khaleibingwui kahorna,
mangkhama̱bingwui kachishutana kala naoshinaobingwui ojā akhana da khui. Awor kala khamashungli zangki kaji katonga chi ainli leihaira kaji nana theitita.
Nana kateili tamchithei, khisāda na khalattali matamchitheithu? Nana “maleepaimana” da hāshoka— kha na maleeli?
“Maphophāpaimana” da hānga— kha na maphophā? Nana meoma̱li ningkachai ji— kha na khorumshim mangaponzatli?
Nana Varewui ain singhaowa da langsoi— kha ain chi sākhaida Vareli makhayak ngasakmala?
Hithada kapihaida lei, “Nathumwui vang eina Gentilebingwui ngachaili Varewui ming maishi ngasakhaira.”
Ahui marimkashoka mi akhana ainwui ningkhami chi mayonakha Varena ali ahui rimkashoka akha thada makhuimarala?

Chiwui vang eina nathum Jihudibing, ain leilaga ahui rimshoka, laga ain sākakhaiwui vang nathumli ahui marimkashokbingna ngashimshira. Khiwui vangkhala kaja athumva phasāli ahui marimshokchaolala ain mayona.
Chithākha kachangkhat ahui rimshok kahaia akachanga Jihudi chi khipākhala? Ayar kala phasāmāngli rimkashoka china Jihudi akachanga maningmana.

Kha alungli kala ningli rimkashoka china Jihudi akachangana, kaja hi kapi kahai ainwui otsak maningla kha Manglāwui otsakna. Chieina hikathā kasā mi chili mikumona maningla kha Varena kaso samphangra.
Chithākha chili Jihudiwui tongkaza khi leikhala, kala ahui rimkashokwui kānkhanā khi lei?
Kachungkha lei: Rimeikapta Varewui tui chi Jihudibingwui pāngli sangmi.
Kha kaikhana shitkasang ningmatongakha kathara? Athumwui mashitkasang ningmakatong china Varewui ningkatong chi shimān ngasakshapralā?
Maningphutmana! Kapi kahai thada mikumo hina khayona ngasāsālala Vareva khamashunga ngasāchingranu.
“Nawui tuina nali mashung ngasakta,
nali bichar kasā tharan nana yuira.”
Maningphutmana! Vare khangaronga maningsi kaje ana kathada okathuili bichar sapairakhala?
Iwui makhamashung china Varewui khamashung phongshokpaiakha kala ali tekmatei ngasakpaiakha khisāda ili arui eina tangda morei phunga da phenkhala?
Chithākha khisāda “Kaphā shokkhavai makaphā sāusa majithu?” Ina hi matuiya da ili mashātta kaphena mi kaikha lei! Athumli khayon khami chi mashunga.
Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Khamashunga mi akhala maleimana,
maleilakmana,
theishingkakhui khipākha maleimana lah Vareli kaphā khipākha maleimana.
Saikora mathuihaira;
athum tongda nguihaira;
khipākha kaphākasā maleimana,
akha eina tangtala maleimana.”
thuikhanam thai;
male eina kapikkhayanga, kala morchaili phara̱wui thada kathiri leiya.
Athum khalaleipamli kashimān eina ringkashi shokngasaka.
Athumna chingrikahaiwui apong matheimana.
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja ainwui otsak china mikumo khipālikha Varewui mangāli mashungkhami maleimana. Ainwui eina kashok chiya mikumona morei sāhaira da theikhui khangasakmanga.
Varena mikumoli mashungkhami hi Jishu Khristali shitkasangwui mangā einana. Jishu Khristali shitkasang mi saikorali Varena chithada sāmi, khikhalajila chili khikha khangatei akhala maleimana.
Mi saikora morei sāserhaoda Varewui tekhamatei chili makāshungmana.
Kha Varewui lukhamashan lemmet chiwui athishurda Jishu Khristana ngatangkhamiwui mangā eina athumli mashungmihaira.
Mikumowui morei chi shitkasangwui mangā eina pheomi khavai Varena Jishu Khristali pha̱mi. Hi Varewui khamashung-khangarong chithei khavaiwui vangna.

Ridava ana ja̱mida athumwui moreila yangkheimisai, kha ara a khamashung-khangarongana da chithei khavai morei chila mayangkheimimana. Hithada sāda Vare amāngna khamashungana kala Jishuli shitkasanga mi kachiva̱li ana mashungmi kaji chitheimi.
Chithākha ithumna khi langso khavai leili? Khikha maleilakmana. Khisāda? Ain khamayonwui vangla maningmana, kha shitkasangwui vangna.
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja mi akhali mashungkhami hi ain khamayon eina maningla shitkasangwui vangna kaji ithumna thei.
Chi maningakha Vare hi Jihudiwui vangmāngmalā? A Gentilebingwui Vare maningthulā? Mha, ā Gentilebingwui Varena.
Vare akhamaya, chieina Jihudibingli athumwui shitkasangwui mangā eina mashungmira.
Chithākha shitsanghaowada ain hi maleiluimana jirala? Chila maningmana. Ainla singpapamda lei.
Chithākha, ishi yurwui avāva̱ Abrahamwui pongli khi hangsikhala? Awui theikakhui khimameikhala?
Abrahamli awui otsakwui vang Varena mashungkhamina jisi kaja ana langsokapai lei, kha Varewui mangāli langsokapai maleimana.
Hithada kapihaida lei: “Abrahamna Vareli shitsanga kala chiwui vang ali khamashungana da shānkhui.”
Mi akhana ot sālaga samkaphang chi ali thada khami maningla kha ana samphang khangayi ngalangmanna.
Kha otsakli mayangla shitkasangli kachihānna kala khayonali mashungkhame Vareli shitkasanga mi chili mashungmi khavai awui shitkasang chi Varena shānkhuimi.
Hithada sāda otsakwui vang maningla khamashungana da Varena khuisangmi kahaia mi chiwui sokhamiwui pongli Davidna kahāng chi hina:
Prohona morei mashānkhuikhamia athum chi ringphai!”
Davidna hāngkahai sokhami tui chi ahui rimkashokmāngli kahānglā? Maningmana, ahui marimkashokbinglila kahāngna. “Abrahamna shitkasangwui vang Varena ali mashunga da shānkhui,” kaji ithumna hānghaira.
Chithākha katharān ali khuisangmihaokhala? Chi ahui rimshok kahaiwui thilikā, mirimshokranglakhakhala? Chiya ahui rimshok kahaiwui thili maningla kha marimshokranglakhana.

Ahui marimshokranglakha ana shitkasangwui vang khamashungana da khuisangkhami theikhavai ahui rimshoknao kajina. Chieina marimshoklala shitkasanga kala khamashungana da shānkhui kahaia athum saikorawui manglāwui pongli Abrahamna avāva̱na.
Kala a hi amingmāng eina ahui rimshok kahaibingwuimāng maningla kha ithumwui avāva̱ Abrahamna ahui marimshokranglakha shitkasang thada shitkasangabing saikorawui avāva̱na.
Ain khamayonabingna shimlui kāki kajina jisi kaja shitkasang chi makānnāmana kala tuingashit chi achona,
khikhalajila ain china Varewui malungkhavāt khuirai. Kha ain makhalei pamli chonkhamakān kaho maleimana.

Chiwui vang eina tuingashit hi shitkasangli pheisin kasana. Chithada sāda tuingashit Varewui lukhamashan chi Abrahamwui ara̱-azāli khamina; hi ain khamayonabingwui vang maningla kha Abrahamwui thada shitkasanga mibingwui vangla zangda khamina.

Hithada kapihaida lei: “Ina nali yur kachungkhawui avāva̱ sāngasakhaira.” Chieina Abrahamna shitkasanga katheli ringkhangasaka kala khikha maleikasāwui eina semkhuikashapa Vare chiwui mangāli tuingashit chi phālak kahai otna.
Chihānkapai apong maleisālaklala Abrahamna Vareli shitsangda kachihānwui vang yur saikorawui avāva̱ ngasāhaowa, kaja ali hithada hānghaisai: “Nawui ara̱-azā sirā ngayara.”
Zingkum shākha kānanaihaoda phasā ngazanhailala kala Sarah naoshuma jilala awui shitkasang masuitāmana.
Ana Varewui tuingashitli shitkasang mangacheilakmana, kha Vareli masot mida awui shitkasang ngatarmamāna.
Varena awui ngashit kahai chi sāshaplaka kaji ana shitsangchaowa.
Chiwui vang eina Varena Abrahamli khamashungana da shānkhui.
Kha “Ali khamashungana da khuisangmi” kaji tui chi amāngwui vang kapi kahai maningmana.
Kha ithumwui Proho Jishuli kathiwui eina ringshok khangasaka Vareli shitkasang ithumlila khamashungabingna da shānkhuimira.
Ithum moreiwui vang ali thingasaka kala mashungmi khavaiwui vang ringlui ngasaka.
Shitkasangwui mangā eina arui ithumna Varewui lukhamashan lungli ringda khalei hi mazapyangda lei kala Varewui tekhamatei chi ithum samphangarumra kajiwui kachihānwui vang mathāna.
Chili lāngda ithumna kachotkachānglila ringphai, khikhalajila ithumna thei kaja kachotkachāngwui eina khāngkathei shoka,
khāngkathei eina Varewui kapen, Varewui kapen eina kachihān shoka.
Kala kachihān hina ithumli kaphaning makai ngasakmana, kaja Varena ithumli thada khami Manglā Katharawui mangā eina awui leikashi chi ithumwui wuklungli heisangmihaira.
Ithumna ngazankasa tharan, Varena retkahai atam chi horzakta Khristana morei kaphungbingwui vang thimi.
Kachikathāna kaphā mi akhawui vang thimikashap leisālala, khipānakha khangaronga mi akhawui vanga mathimimana.
Kha Varena ithumli kayākha leishikhala kaji hina kaja ithumna morei phungda leilakha Khristana ithumwui vang thimi.
Chiwui vang eina ara awui thimalokhamiwui ashee china ithumli mashungmihaira; chithākha Varewui malungkhavāt chiwui eina ithumli ana kayākha mataida huimirakhala?

Kaja ithum Varewui yangkashe ngasāda leilakha, Anaomayarawui thikhami mangā eina Vareli ngashimi, langmeikharda ara ithum ali ngashimhaoda Khristawui kharing mirin china ithumli kayākha mataida huimirakhala!
Chimāng maningmana, kha ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui mangā eina ngashimmihaoda ithum ringphai.
Ain mamiranglakhawui eina morei hi okathuili leisai; kha ain maleisāthuda moreina kaji matheisāmana.

Adamwui eina thuilaga Moses tāshungda mi saikorawuitungli kathina mungsai, naoda rāki kaje chiwui amahā sāda khalei Adamna Varewui kakaso kakaiwui morei kasā thada morei makasaa athumwuitungli eina tangda mungsai.
Varewui lemmet eina mi akhawui moreiwui athei chi ngateiya. Mi akhawui moreiwui vang eina “Khayon” kaho chi theikhui ngasaka, kala morei kachungkha sākahaiwui thili lemmet china mashungkhami khuirai.

Mi akhawui moreiwui vang kathina mungsai kha Jishu Khristana sāmi kahai athei china kayākha hakmeikhala! Varewui makhavāta lukhamashan kala khamashung-khangarongwui lemmet samkaphanga athumna Jishu Khristawui mangā eina kharing samphangra.
Mi akhana morei kasāwui vang mi saikorali yonngasak kahai thada, mi akhawui khamashung otsak china mi saikorali ningkhān kala kharing samphang ngasaka.
Kala mi akhawui kahāng makhanganāwui shongrān china mi kachungkhali morei kaphunga sākhangasak thada, mi akhawui kahāng khanganāwui athei china mi kachungkhali mashung ngasaka.
Ain khuikharā chi khayon-khamang chungsang khavaina; kha morei chungkasang eina Varewui lukhamashan chi lāngmeikharda chungsanga.
Moreina kathiwuilungli khamung thada, Jishu Khristawui mangā eina samkaphang Varewui lukhamashan china mashung ngasakta ithumli katang makhavai kharing miya.
Maningphutmana! Ithum moreili thihaira, chithākha kathada chiwui lungli ringchingpairakhala?
Ithumna Jishu Khristali khangarumwui ra̱kahik kasā chitharan awui kathili khangarumwui ra̱kahik kasānada nathum matheimalā?

Chithada sāda ithumwui ra̱kahik chieina Khristali ngasoda chifarum kahaina kala awui kathi chili ngarumhaira. Avāva̱wui tekhamatei pangshap china ali kathiwui eina ringshok khangasak thada ithumla kadhara mirin chi ringpaira.
Ithumna thei kaja morei sākhangaiwui khangachā chi shimān khavai kachama khangachā chi Khristali ngasoda krushtungli thingasakhaira. Chieina ithum ara moreiwui rao masāluimana,
kachiwui vangkhala kaja mi akha thikahai tharan morei pangshapwui eina ningkhānhaira.
Ithumna Khristali ngasoda thihaogada ali ngasoda ringra kaji ithum shitsanga.
Ithumna thei kaja Khristali kathiwui eina ringngasakhaira kala mathiluilakmara, kathi kaho china awuitungli pangshap maleiluimana.
Ana akhashida thihaogada moreina khiyangkha maleiluimana kala ana kharing hi Vareli ngasoda kharingna.
Chithada sāda nathumla moreili thihailaga Khristawui mangā eina Varewuili ringda lei kaji phaningphalungra.
Khamathangli zangda shimānkapai nathumwui phasā hi moreili mamungngasakalu.

Nathumwui phasā akai akhanida makaphā-makhayāli ya majihaialu. Kha kathiwui eina kharingli khuiung kahaia mi thada nathum khalatta Vareli milu kala nathumwui phasā katonga khamashung otwui vang shichin khavai Vareli mayālu.
Moreili nathumwui akhavā masāngasakphalungmara, kaja nathum ainwui azingli maleila lukhamashanwui azingli lei.
Nathumna akhava akhawui rao sāga da mayāhaiakha awui kahāng khanganā rao sāga kaji maningmalā? Hithada sāda morei sākha kathili thānsangra, kahāng khanganāli zangakha nathumli mashungmira.
Kha Vareli ningshi! Kaja nathum atam akhali moreiwui rao sāsālala ara nathumli mikahai tamkachitheiwui eina samkaphang khamashung chili nathumwui wuklung tongda mayāhaira.
Kala moreiwui eina ningkhān ngasakhaoda nathum khamashungwui rao ngasāhaira.

Nathumwui khangazan khaleiwui vang ina hikathā tuiyār eina kahāngna, kaja atam akhali nathumwui phasāwui akaibing chi makathara kala makaphā chiwui rao sāsai. Ara nathumwui phasāwui akaibing chi tharngasak khavaiwui vang khamashung khangarongwui rao thada nathum khalatta hamsangphalungra.
Ara nathumna khayākhamalā ot kasā chieina khi tongkazā samphangkhala? Otsakbing chiwui athei chiya kathina.
Kha ara nathumli moreiwui eina ningkhān ngasakhaida Varewui rao sāhaira. Chiwui tongkazā samkaphang chiya tharkhangasak china kala chiwui athei chiya katang makhavai kharing china.
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja moreiwui sāman kathina, kha Varewui lemmet chiya ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui lungli katang makhavai kharing china.
Ivānaongarā, ain katheia nathumli kahāngna kaja mi akhali ainna kakhalap hi a ringlakhamānga.
Fathui kahai sha̱nao chili agahara mathiranglakha eina tangda gaharali pānrum khavai ainna khalappai, kha gahara chi thihaiakha ainna sha̱nao chili khalap kahai chiwui eina ningkhān ngasaka.

Hithada sāda, sha̱nao china agahara ringlakha mayarnao khangatei akhali aleihaiakha, ali phokaphava̱ hora. Kha agahara thihaiakha ain chiwui eina chihomihaira, kala mayarnao khangatei akhali ra̱sa̱sālala phokaphā maningmana.

Chiwui vang eina ivānaongarā, nathumlila chipapama; kaja nathum Khristawui akai ngasāhaoda, ainwui athishurdava nathum thihaira, kha Varewui otram khangatha̱li kannāmei khavai ringkhaluiya Khristali ringrumda awui ngasāhaira.
Ithumna phasāwui athishurda ringlakha, moreiwui ningkachāng chi ain china mathuk ngasakta ithumwui phasā akaibingli ot kasā eina kathi shokngasaka.
Atam akhali ainwui zurthingna khalaphaida thikasā chiwui eina ara ithumli khalāmihaira. Chieina kapi kahai ainwui athi mashurla kadhara Manglāwui pongli otram ngatha̱da lei.
Kha morei china ain chi singlaga atam kachā samkaphang tharan iwui ningli khangamar ot saikora leikhavai mathuk ngasaka. Ain maleisāsi kaja morei hiya kathina.
Atam akhali I ain mavaila okthuisai, kha ningkhami chi kharā eina morei ringluihaowa kala I thihaowa.
Kala kharing khuirāki kaje ningkhami china iwui vanga kathi khuikharā ngasahaowa.
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja morei china atam kachā samphangkhaleoda ningkhami chiwui mangā eina ili minamhaowa kala sāthathaowa.

Chithākha hiwui kakhalatva kaphā china ili thingasakhaowa kajilā? Maningphutmana! Chi moreinana, morei china awui kachangkhat khangachā chi phongshok khavai kaphā kaho chi singlaga ili thingasaka kala chiwui mangā eina hāngkhavai makhalei morei sāngasaka.
Ina kasā chi I khalattana bhap matāmana kaja ina sākhangai ot chi ina masāmana kha ina ningkakachai ot chi sai.
Ina masākhangai chi ina kasā tharan ain chi mashunga kaji khamayā thāhaowa.
Chieina hikathā kasā chi I maningmana kha iwui lungli khalei morei china kasāna.
Ina thei kaja iwuklungli chiya mikumowui khangachā chili kaphā kaho maleimana. Kaja khamashung chi sāngailala masārarmana,
kaphāna da theida sāngailak kahai chi ina masāmana, kha maphāmana da theilala chi ina sai.
Ina maningkachāng chi ina saakha; sāda khalei chi I maningluimana kha ili khalei morei chinana.
Ina kaphā sākhangai tharan makaphā chila nganailak eina leisāching kaji hi ina ain thada samphanga.
Varewui ain chi iwuklungli ningyāng unglaka.
Kha iphasāli ot kasā ain khangatei akhala thei— iwui ningna mayā kahai ain chili khangararra ain china iphasāli ot sāda khalei moreiwui ain china ili narkahaina.
I kayākha kakhanang mikhala! phasāthit hiwui eina ili khipāna kanmishaprakhala?
Ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui mangā eina Vareli ningshi!
Chieina ina iwui ning eina Varewui ainli otram ngatha̱sālala iwui mikumowui khangachānava moreiwui ainli otram ngatha̱da lei.
Kaja Khrista Jishuwui lungli ithumli kharing khame Manglāwui ain china moreiwui kala kathiwui eina ili ningkhān ngasakhaira.

Mikumowui phasāna ngazanhaoda ainna masākharar chi Varena sāshapa, chiya Varena Anaomayarali morei shimitmi khavai mikumowui khangachā chi khuingasakta chihorai, kala mikumowui khangachāli khalei morei chi Varena mamayāmana.
Varena hi kasā hiya mikumowui khangachā athishurda mazatla Manglāwui athishurda kazata ithumna ainwui khamashung ningkachāng chi ungshung ngasak khavaina.
Kaja phasāwui athishurda kharinga athumna phasāwui otmāngli ningsanga; kha Manglāwui athishurda kharinga athumna Manglāwui otmāngli ningsanga.
Phasāwui athishurda zatakha thira, kha Manglāwui athishurda zatakha chingri kahai kala kharing samphangra.
Kaja phasāwui athishurda kazata mi chiya Vareli yangkashena; ana Varewui ain mashurmana, kasāla masārarmana,
phasāwui athishurda kazata athumna Vareli ningyāng maung ngasakrarmana.
Kha Khristana nathumli leiakha, moreiwui vang nathumwui phasā thihailala mashungkhamiwui vang eina nathumwui manglā ringda lei.

Jishuli ringlui khangasaka Varewui Manglā china nathumwui lungli leiakha, Khrista Jishuli kathiwui eina ringkhangasaka kala nathumwui lungli leiching kaje awui Manglā china nathumwui shimānkapai phasā chi ringngasakra.
Chiwui vang eina ivānaongarā, ithumna sākhangayi lei, kha chi ithumwui phasāna ningkachāng thada ringki kaji maningmana.
Kaja nathumna phasāwui athishurda ringakha nathum thira. Kha Manglāwui mangā eina phasāwui otsak chi chithithaiakha ringra.
Varewui Manglāna thankhami athum saikora Varewui naongarāna.
Kaja Varena mikahai Manglā china nathumli rao masāngasakmana kala mangachee ngasakmana; kha Varewui naongarā sāngasaka kala Manglā chiwui pangshap eina ithumna Vareli “Abba” Ishava! da khangakaona.
Ithum Varewui naongarāna da chithei khavai Manglā china ithumwui manglāli ngaruma.
Ithum Varewui naongarā sāhaogada, awui shimluikatbingna samphangrānwui sokhami chi samphangra kala ithum Khristawui kachotkachāng phungrumakha tekhamatei yar chila samphangrumra.
Kaja sākahai saikorana Varewui naongarāna da phongkashok chi ngaraida lei.
Kaja sākahai saikora chili khayon mida arema ngasā ngasakhaowa, hi sākahaia chiwui ningkachāng maningla kha kasaa Varena chitharanu da ningmi kahaina. Chithālala chili kachihān leisai.
Chiya thangkha mathangkha sakahaiya khalatta shimānphalungki kajiwui eina ningkhān ngasakra kala Varewui naobingli matakhak kahai ningkhān samphang khangasak chi samphangrumra.
Sākhui kahai ot saikorana aja rāshungda nao khara̱wui kachot thada ringāda lei kaji ithumna thei.

Sākhui kahai katongamāng maningla kha ithum Manglāwui athei samphangkhare, Varena awui naongarā sāngasak khavai kala ithumwui kharing-kharak saikora ningkhān ngasak khavai ngaraida khaleia ithumla ringāda lei.
Kaja kachihān chiwui vang ithumli huimihaira. Kha kachihān chi ithumna mik eina theihaosi kaja chi kachangkhat kachihān maningmana. Kaja theikahai chili khipāna kachihān leikhala?
Kha ithumna makathei chili chihanakha chiwui vang ithumna khāngda ngaraipama.

Chithada sāda Manglā chinala ithumwui makharar chili rāngachona, kaja ithumna kathada seihā sarakhala kaji eina tangda matheimana, kha Manglāna kayākha chotta ithumwui vang pomikhala kaji khamor eina mahāngrarmana,
kala mibingwui wuklung katheia Varena manglā chiwui kaphaning khikhala kaji thei, Manglā china Varewui ningkachāng athishurda katharabingwui vang pomida lei.
Ithumna thei kaja Varena awui kharin leida hokhui kahaia ali leikashebingli ana ot saikorali kaphā sārumchinga.

Chinaongarā kachungkhawui ngachaili Anaomayarana naochizai ngasāngasak khavai Varena kapangping kahaibing chi Anaomayarali ngarui ngasak khavai phaishokhaira, kala Anaomayarana naongarā chiwui naochizai sāra.
Chithada sāda Varena kapangkhui kahaibing chili hokhui kala hokakhuibing chili ana mashungmi, kala athumli awui tekhamatei samphangrum ngasaka.
Anaomayarali mashivāmla ithum saikorawui vang chigatmiakha ithumli ot saikora khalem eina mamimaralā?
Varena kapang kahaibingli khipāna khayon mirakhala? Athumli Varena mashungmi kahaina.
Kachikathāna ithumli yonna da hangshapralā? Thimihailaga ringshok kahaia Varewui yāvāk pamda ithumwui vang pomida khalei Khrista Jishunala khayon mamimara.
Chithākha ithumli khipāna Khristawui leikashi chi eina ngatei ngasakshaprakhala? Kachotkachāngnakā, ringkashinakā, rekakhareknakā, chāmreinakā, ka̱lā kashinakā, raighainakhala?
Hithada kapihaida lei;
“Nawui vang eina atam kachida kathiwui ka̱lāshatli leichinga;
Taithatki kaje yaonao thada ithumli khui.”
Kaja kathinala, kharingnala, kazingraonala, khangam khareinala, shokta khalei otnala, shokki kaji otnala, pangshapnala,
okathuiwui atungnala, azingnala, sākahai saikora hiwui khikhikhanala Khrista Jishu ithumwui Prohowui alungli khalei Varewui leikashi chiwui eina mangateithui ngasakrarmara.
Ina kahāng tui hi mashun tuina; chiya I Khristawuina da ina kahāng hi kakapik tui maningmana. Manglā Katharana mungda khalei iwui mashun-makhui hina I makapikmana kaji shākhi sai.
Chiya iwui kakhanang hakmahālakhaowa kala kakhanang katang mavaimana,
kaja phasāwui pongli iwui theisābing kala ichināngarāwui phākhavai athumwui eina ili Varena khonshida Khristawui eina ngatei ngasakhaowa jilala khikha maleimana.

Athum Varena kapang kahaia miyurna: athumli Varewui naongarā sāngasakta awui tekhamateila samphang ngasaka, athumli tuingashit chi mida ainla singngasaka; khamashung khokharumla athumli lei; Varewui ngashit kahai chila athumna samphanga.
Athum mingkhamayanga Jihudi yurwui awo-ayibingwui ara̱-azāna kala Khrista hi phasāwui pongli athumwui yurna. Saikorawuitungli khamunga Vareli katang mavaila sochikatchingranu! Amen.
Abrahamwui ara̱-azā saikora Varewui naongarāna kajila maningmana kaja Varena Abrahamli hānga, “Isaacwui naotunbingmāngli nawui ara̱-azāna da shānkhuira.”
Hiwui kakhalata Varewui naongarā maningmana, kha Varewui ngashit kahai athishurda rākashoka naongarā chi khamashunga ara̱-azāna da khui.
Ngashit kahai tui chi hina, “Angarit ungkashung tharan ina rāluishitra kala Sarahna naomayara akha samphangra.”
Kha nao akhali kapangkakhui china Varewui kaphaning ungshungchao khavai sha̱nao chili Varena hithada hānga, “Khararrana khanganoli otram ngatha̱mira.”
Ana hi ani mapharāranglakha kala kaphā lah kashila khikhala masālakranglakha hāngkahaina. Chieina Varewui kapangkakhui hiya otsakli khayang maningla awui kaholi pheisin sai.
Hithada kapihaida lei, “Jacobli ina leishi kha Esauli ina ningkachai.”
Kaja ana Mosesli hānga, “Ina lumashankhangai chili lumashanra, leishikhangai chili leishira.”
Chieina hi miwui ningkachāng otsakli maleila Varewui lukhamashanli lei.
Kaja Kathara Lairikli Pharaohli hithada hānghai, “Iwui pangshap nawui eina theikhui khavai kaja okathui hupta iwui ming ngayao khavai khangarān chiwui vang nali awunga sākhangasakna.”
Hithada sāda Varena lumashankhangai chili lumashana kala wuklung makang ngasakkhangai chili makang ngasaka.
Chithākha nathum akhana ili hāngra, “Khisāda Varena mikumoli khayon phenkhala? Khipāna awui kaphaning khāmshaprakhala?”
Kha Vareli ngahānkākashapa na khipākhala? Ngaleihamna hamkasā chili “Ili khisāda hithada sākhala?” da hangpairalā?
Ham kasaa china ngalei chi eina sākhangaingai sai, kala ngaraikachā ngalei chi eina aman kasaka kala kapaiya ham sākhui.

Kala Varena kasā chila hithāpapama. Varena awui malungkhavāt chishotta mibingli awui pangshap theingasakngai, kha sāshimān khavai ngarānping kahai, ana malungvāt kahai mibingli kasāngkha ningzingharingmi.
Awui lukhamashan samphangda khalei, awui tekhamatei samphang ngasakkida ngarān kahai ithumli ana heirormi kahai awui khavāt makhalei tekhamatei chi chitheingai.
Kaja ithum ana hokhui kahaibingna, Jihudibingmāngli maningla kha Gentilebingla zanga.
Hi ana Hosea lairikli hāngkahai tuina:
“Iwui mibing makhaninga chili
Iwui mibing hora.
Ina maleikashe yur chili
Iwui Leikashe hora.
athumli kahāng apam chichang chili
‘Kharinga Varewui naongarā’ da athumli hora.”
Kaja Prohona okathui saikorali bichar kasā chi thaklāk eina kuphaora.”
Kala Isaiahna marānhaikasā thada “Pangshapa Prohona ara̱-azā kateokha mahaisasi kaja ithum Sodom eina Gomarrah thāhairara.”
Israelnaobingna khamashung hi ain eina phālala chiwui athishurda masamphangmana.
Khisāda masamphangthu? Athumna shitkasang eina maphāla otsak eina phāhaowa. “Ngaphok khavai ngalunggui” chili athumna phei ngaphokhaowa.
Kaja hithada kapihaida lei:
“Yanglu, ina Zionli lunggui haihaida lei,
chili mibingna phei ngaphokra,
lunghār china athumli konglui ngasakra.
Kha ali shitkasanga mi chili makhayak ngasakmara.”
Ivānaongarā, iwui ningchangmeikap kaji kala Vareli seihā kasā chiya, iwui miyurli huikhui khavai hina.
Ina hangshapa kaja athum Vareli lungtumlak kahai lei; kha athumwui lungkatum hi theishingkakhui awor chili maleimana.
Kaja athumna Varewui eina kharā mashungkhami chi matheimana, kha athum khalattawui apong phālaga Varena mashungkhami chili mamayāthuwa.
Kaja Khristana ainwui pangshap chi tangngasakhaira, chieina shitkasanga mi kachiva̱li Varena mashungmira.
Kha shitkasangwui mangā eina mashungkhamiwui apongli kathara lairikli hithada kapihai, “Kazingramli khipā kārakhala da na khalatta mangahānalu.” (chiya Khristali khuitā khavaina)
Kazeiramli khipā zangrakhala dala mangahānalu, (chiya Khristali kathiwui eina khuishok khavaina)
Hiwui kakhalatva, “Varena hāngkahai tui chi nali nganailaka, nawui morchai eina wuklungli lei.” (chiya, ithumna hākashoka shitkasangwui paokaphā china).
Kaja nawui khamorna Jishu hi Proholaka da hāngphatakha kala nawui wuklungli Varena ishāmei ali kathiwui eina ringshok ngasaka da shitsangakha nali huimira.
Kaja ithumwui wuklung eina shitkasangwui vang mashungmi kala ithumwui khamor eina hangphata kahui samphang ngasaka.
Kaja hithada kapihaida lei: “Ali shitkasang mi khipālikha kaphaning makaingasakmara.”
Chili mi saikora zanga, chiya Jihudi eina Gentilebing khangatei maleimana. Vare hiya saikorawui Prohona kala ali khangakao saikorali khavāt maleilakla somi.
Hithada kapihaida lei: “Prohowui ming singda khangakao mi kachiva̱li huimira.”
Kha athumna ali mashitsangakha kathada ngakaopairakhala? Kala athumna pao chi mashākha kathada shitsangrakhala? Kala pao chi mahāshokakha athumna kathada shārakhala?
Kala pao phungmebing machihoakha kathada hāshokrakhala? Hithada kapihaida lei: “Paokaphā khuikaphungbingwui kharā chi teokha matakhakhailakle!”
Kha athum saikorana paokaphā chili manganāsangmana. Isaiahna hānga, “Proho, khipāna ithumwui pao hi shitsanghairakhala?”
Chithada sāda kashā eina shitkasang shoka kala Khristawui apong hākashok eina kashā samphanga.
“Athumwui akhon chi okathui katongali vāhaira;
athumwui tui chi okathui katongali vāshunghaira.”
“Ina nathumli yur kachangkhat makhaninga mibingli yanglaga mik mathak ngasakra,
ina mangkhama̱ miyurli shichinlaga nathumli malungvāt ngasakra.”
“Makaphābingna ili samphanghaira;
Ili makhangathingbingli ina ikhalatta chitheihaira.”
Varena rida kapang kahai awui miyurli mahorhaimana, kathara lairikli Elijahna Israelwuitungli mamayāmada Varewui mangāli kahāng chi nathumna thei.
“Proho nawui marānbingli athumna sāthathaira kala nawui hanphutpam sākhaihaira, ara imang leili kala ilila sāthat khavai ngarānchinga.”
Varena ali khi ngahānkākhala? “Ina Baal kameoli makhokharuma mi thingshini iwui vang kaziphaida lei.”
Chi tākam eina aruila Varewui lukhamashan eina kapang kahaia kānglup kateowa akha lei.
Kaja Varewui kapangkakhui hi miwui otsakli khayangna jisi kaja awui lukhamashan chi khamashunga lukhamashan maningmana.
Chithākha khida? Israelnaobing athumna phākazat chi masamphangmana. Chiya, Varena kapang kahai kateowa kānglup china samkaphangna; kha khangateibing chiya khanā khangakhok thāhaowa.
Hithada kapihaida lei: “Varena athumli aja eina tangda ningmakashok manglā, yanglala makathei mik, nganālala makasha khanā mi.”
Davidna hānga.
“Athumwui zātkhān chi khalen ngasāda athum manranu;
chom kala tandi ngasāranu!
Mathei khavai athumwui mik ngapeohaoranu,
athumwui khumkhor kaogada leichingranu.”

Jihudiwui moreiwui vang okathuina sokhami chungmeida samphanga kala athumwui manglārin khangazanwui vang Gentilebingli sokhami tarākha samphang ngasaka. Chithākha Jihudi katonga ungzanghaosi kaja sokhami kayākha mataimeirali!
Kaja ina ot kasā eina iwui yurwui mibingna mik mathakhaolapai kha otsak chieina athum kaikhali Varena huikhuipai.
Athumli horkahai tharan Varewui yangkashe sākasā Gentilebingna awui khamashita ngasāhaowa, chithākha Varena athumli khuikasang tharan khi ngasāra! Kathebingna ringkhaluiwui ringkaphā thāhaora.
Khamui akai khare chi Vareli chigatakha, khamui ahāng katonga chila awuina, kala thingrongwui angayung chi Vareli chigatakha aphāng saikorala awuina.

Lingsang kahai oliverongwui aphāng tektāhaiakha khararwui oliverongwui aphāng khuilaga phonkhui. Gentile nathum chi khararwui Oliverong kathāna kala ara nathumna Jihudibingwui khamaling manglārin chi samphangrumda lei.

Chiwui vang eina nathumna aphāng thada tektā kahaibing chili machipatalu. Nathum kathada langsopairakhala? Nathumva aphāngmaya, nathumna angayung chi ringkhangasak maningmana, kha angayungna nathumli ringkhangasakna.
Kha nathumna hāngra, “Mha, I phonpai khavai aphāng chi tektā kahaina.”
Chi mashunga. Athumna mashitsangthuda tektāhaowa kala nathumva shitsanghaoda makhangacheina kajiwui vang malangsoalu kha ningngasharlu.
Varena aphāng akachanga Jihudibing eina tangtalila mashivāmakha nathumle shivāmra da phaninglā?

Hili Vare hiya kayākha lumashankatha kala sākashekhala kaji ithumna thei, chiya konglui kahaibingli sāshilaka, kha nathumna awui lukhamashanli ngasāmakha lumashanmi; chi mathaakha nathumlila katathaora.
Kala Jihudibingna athumwui mashitkasang chi horhaiakha, athumwui pamli unglui ngasakpapamra, kaja chi Varena sāshapa.

Gentile nathumva tektā kahai khararwui olive aphāng kathāna kala akachanga Oliverongli phonkasangna. Jihudibing hi lingkakhuiya Oliverong kathāna, chieina tektā kahaia Jihudiwui aphāngbing kharewui thingrongli ungphonkida Varewui vang paimeikhara.
Hithada sāda Israel katongali huikhuihaora. Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Huikhame chi Zionwui eina shokra.
Kala Jacobwui ara̱-azāwui eina makaphā-makhayā saikora khuishokmihaora.
athumli tuingashit hi sāra.”

Jihudibingna paokaphā khalan kahaiwui vang Varena Gentilebingli yanghaoda athum Varewui yangkashe ngasāhaowa. Kha Varena athumli kapangkakhui ngasāhaoda, athumwui awo-ayibingwui vang eina athum Varewui leikashebingna.
Kaja Varewui sokhami kala kaho hiya mangacheiluimana.
Gentile nathum achālakha Varewui kahāng manganāsāmana, kha ara Jihudibingna kahāng makhanganāwui vang eina nathum Varewui lukhamashan samphanghaira.
Nathumna lukhamashan samkaphang chi tākam eina Jihudibingnala chikathā chi samphangpai khavai, ara athumla Varewui kahāng manganāthura.
Kaja mi saikorali lukhamashan chithei khavai Varena athum saikorali kahāng makhanganāwui rao sāngasakhaira.
Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Khipāna Prohowui ning thei?
Khipāna ali hāngmachinshap?
khipāna ali ot ngaronhairakhala?”
Okathuiwui khangachāli mangarumhaialu, kha nathumwui ning chi onchang onngasaklu. Chieina nathumna Varewui ningkachāng kaphā, ningyāng ungkapai kala kākashung chi khikhala da theipaira.

Varena ili lumashankhamiwui mangā eina ina nathumli kahāngna: Nathum khalatta khangayi chili lāngda chuimeida maphaningalu, kha ayat ungda phaninglu, mi kachiva̱ kachichāli mikahai shitkasang chiwui angarit eina chukmaja̱ranu.
Mi akhawui phasāli akai kachungkha lei. Akaibing chiwui otsak ngatateida lei.
Chithada sāda ithum kachungkhalala Khristawui lungli phasā akhana, phasā akhawui akaibing thada ithum akha eina akha ngashik ngarokta lei.
Varena ithumli mikahai awui lukhamashan chiwui athishurda lemmet ngatateida leihaogada chiwui athishurda sāphalungrali. Khamarānakha, ithumwui shitkasang khaleiyakha sāra;
otram ngatha̱ khavai miakha, otram ngangatha̱phalungra; tamchithei khavai miakha tamchitheiphalungra;

katom khavai miakha chi sāphalungra; kachikathāna mishai-mishakakha haolak eina mishai-mishaklu; pangshap kasinga china ning horsangchaoda sāphalungra kala lukhamashanwui ot kasaa china mathānthup eina sāphalungra.
Kāshunglak eina leishilu, makaphāli ningkachailu, kaphā chi singtitlu.
Akha eina akha Khristawui lungli chinaongarāwui leikashi mida leishi ngaroklu. Akha eina akha khayāshi ngaroklu.
Lungsanda ot sālu, ngachāngmachatalu, Proholi ningtongda otram ngatha̱lu.
Nawui kachihān china nali ringphā ngasaklu, kachotkachāngli khāngda sālu kala seihā sāchinglu.
Khavatabingli nawui khalalei ngayarmilu kala kha̱mishimāli rāzang ngasaklu.
Ringkaphābingli ringphā ngarumlu, kachapbingli chapngarumlu.
Ningkha-yangkha sāda okthuilu; makachorshialu, kha ngahuirihailu kala mathangmeirekalu.
Mi saikorali mashitri eina okthuirum khavai kashap eina tangda sālu.
Leikashebing, athut makhuilakalu, kha Varewui malungkhavāt eina vairanu, kachiwui vangkhala kaja hithada kapihaida lei, “Athut kakhui chi iwuina, ina athut hāngsangmira da Prohona hānga.”
Hithada kapihaida lei; “Nawui yangkashena thaiakha mizālu, ana ra̱changakha mimanglu; hithada kasā eina nana ali chammalā ngasakra.”
Makaphā china nathumli mayui ngasaklu; kha makaphāli kaphā eina yuikhuilu.
Chiwui vang eina kachikathāna pangshap kasinga chili ngakaishiakha Varewui kaso kahai chili ngakaikashina kala chithada kasaa chi akhalatta kashong phākhuira.
Kaja kaphā kasābingna khamungbingli ngachee khavai maleimana, kha makaphā kasābingna khangacheena. Pangshap kasinga chili mangachee ngayimala? Chithākha kaphā ot sālu, ana nali sora.

Kaja ava nawui phākhavaiwui vang ot sāda khalei Varewui raona. Kha makaphā ot sākha ali ngacheelu, khiwui vangkhala jilaga tandi mikhavai pangshap chi awuina. A Varewui raona kala makaphā kasābingwuitungli Varewui tandi chi ana mi.
Hithada sāda Varewui malungkhavāt masamphang khavaiwui vangmāng maningla kha nathum khi sāngayikhala kaji mashun-makhui katheiwui vang khamungabingwui kahāng nganālu.
Chiwui vang eina nathumna khāshinā khamina; athumna athumwui sāki kaji ot kasā chi Varewui vang sākhamina.
Athumli miphalungki kaji chi milu; miphawui khāshinā mikhangayili milu kala khayāshi khangayili khayāshilu.

Ningkhamili “Maphopaimana, mashaothatpaimana, maleepaimana, mangamarpaimana,” da kapihai; kha saikora hi kala ningkhami khangatateila, “Nakhalatta leikashi thada nawui khongnainaoli leishiphalungra” kaji ningkhami hili zangsera.
Leikashe china khongnainaoli khayon masālakmara. Chiwui vang eina leikashi hina ain hi ungshung ngasaka.
Nathumna hi sāphalungra, khiwui vangkhala jilaga kapiwui eina thuimathukphalungki kaji atam rāhaira. Kaja huiki kaji atam chi ithumna shitsangkaphok eina yangakha nganaimeikharhaira.
Ngayā kanthuiki jiura, ngathor rārāli. Tangkhamangwui ot horhaosa, kahorwui lungli ngarar khavai raisari shaksāusa.
Kahorlungli okathui thada ithum khalatta mashungrik eina zatsa; kakharar, khamarip, ayat makasā, khamathang, ngama̱khangazai, kala mikpaikashi ot masaasa.
Kha Jishu Khristawui khutlai chi khangkāda moreiwui khangachā kala chi ningyāng ungkhavai hengsangkhami chi thahaolu.
Shitkasang khangazanali ngakuikhuilu, kala awui theikakhuiwui pongli mangayātalu.
Mi akhanava shaiphāphāpai da phaninglapai, kha shitkasang khangazana chiya hanthing-hanrāmāng shai.
Kashaiya china makashaiya chili mamana̱shiaranu kala makashaiya china kashaiwuitungli mamashātaranu. Kaja Varena alila mayā kahaina.

Na khipāda akhavā khangateiwui raoli bichar kasākhala? Awui ot ungkashung maungkashung bichar saki kaje chiya rao chiwui akhavāmānga kala rao china nganingshapra, khiwui vangkhala jilaga Prohona ali nganingshap ngasakshapa.

Mi akhana kachikathā zimiksho akhaliva khangatei zimiksho akhana phameiya da phaninglapai kala khangatei akhanala zimiksho katonga ngaraichāsera da phaninga. Chiwui vang eina mi kachiva̱na kachichāwui ningli theishingkakhui leiphalungra.

Kachikathā mina kachikathā zimiksho akhali saklak eina kaphaning chi Proholi khayākashina, kaja kachikathāna shaiser kaji chi Proholi khayākashiwui vangna, khikhalajila ana kashakazāwui vang Vareli ningkashi mi. Kachikathāna mashai-mashakphāphā kajila Proholi khayākashiwui vangna, anala Vareli ningkashi mi.
Ithum khipākha khalattawui vang kharing maningmana, khipākha khalattawui vang kathi maningmana.
Ithumna ringlala Prohowui vang kharingna; kala thilala Prohowui vang kathina. Chithākha thilala ringlala ithum Prohowuina,
kaja Khristana kharing kala kathiwui Proho sākhavai thimi kala ringluishita.
Nachināwuitungli khisāda bichar sākhala? Khisāda mana̱shikhala? Ithum Varewui bichar sākhavai karotli kānganingsera.
Hithada kapihaida lei;
“Prohona hānga, ina ringda khaleiwui vang
mi kachiva̱ khuktida ili khorumra,
kala I Varelaka da yur kachiva̱na hāngphatra.”
Chieina ithum ichichāna sākahai chi Vareli chitheira.
Ina Proho Jishuli khangashik eina makathar kashakazā maleimana kaji theishingkhui ngasaka, kha kashakazā chi matharmana da phaninghaiakha awui vanga makathar ngasāhaowa.
Nawui kashakazāna nachināli ning saza̱ ngasakakha leikashiwui otsak maningmana. Khristana thimi kahai mi chili nawui kashakazā china mashimān ngasakalu.
Nana phai da kasā chili shāt makā ngasaklu,
kaja Vare wungram hiliva kashaikashakna akachanga maningmana, kha Manglā Katharana khami khamashung-khangarong, chingri kahai kala ringkaphā china,
kala kachikathāna hi tākam eina Khristali otram ngatha̱khami tharan Vareli ningyāng ungngasaka kala mikumonala mayai.
kashakazāwui vang eina Varena sākahai chi mashimān ngasaklu. Kashakazā saikora zāpaisera, kha awui kashaikashak china kachikathā akhali moreili tāzang khavai leiakha chi khayonna.
Khamashunga otsak chiya: nachinā ngarā konglui khavai leiakha sā makashai, zamkhor makhamang mashunga.
Hiwui apongli nawui shitkasang chi Vare naniwui ngachaili hailu, kachikathā ot akha kasāli mashunga da theishingkhuilaga ningkakashak maleilakla kasā mi chili ringkaphā ngasāranu.
Ningmaongda zākasang chi khayonna, kaja shitkasang eina kasā maningmana. Shitkasangwui eina makashok otsak ayāyāva̱ moreina.
Shitkasang khangatara ithumna khangazanbingli athumwui makathuk chili ngachonmiphalungra, kala ithum khalattawui ningyāng ungkhavai masāphalungmara.
Kha khongnainaoli awui shitkasang mataisang khavai ningyāng ungngasakphalungra.
Khristana a khalattawui ningyāng khaung maphāmana; kha hithada kapihaida lei: “Nali mana̱kashibingwui mana̱kashi chi iwuitungli tāhaira.”
Achālakha kapi kahai chi ithumli hāngmachin khavaina, kaja ithumna nganingtitta kala kathara tuina kasatkasang athishurda kachihān leikhavaina.
Khrista Jishuna sāchithei kahai chi shurda khangachei makhalei kala ninglum khangasaka Vare china nathumli khokkha kasāwui ningngai miranu.
Chieina nathum saikorana khokkha sāda akhon akhamāng eina Vare kala ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui Avāva̱li masot chikatpaira.
Khristana nathumli khuisangkhami thada nathum akha eina akha khuisang ngarokta Vareli tekmatei ngasaklu.
Ina nathumli kahāngna kaja Varewui ningkatong kala awo-ayibingli ngashitmi kahai chi ungshunga da theikhavai Khristana Jihudibingwui mahut sāda otram ngatha̱mi.
Kala Varewui lukhamashan chiwui vang Gentilebingnala masotchikat khavaina. Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Chiwui vang eina Gentilebingwui ngachaili,
ina nali Varena da theingasakra.”
“He Gentilebing,
Varewui miyurli ngasoda mathānlu!”
“Gentile saikorana Proholi sochikatlu,
miyur saikoranala ali sochikatranu.”
“Jessewui ara̱-azā akha rāra,
Gentilebingli ana mungra kala
athumna ali chihānra.”
Kachihānwui ura̱ Vareli nathumna shitkasang khaleiwui mangā eina khamathān kala chingri kahai chipemiranu. Chieina nathumwui kachihān chi Manglā Katharawui pangshap eina mataisangra.
Ivānaongarā, ina kachangkhat theikhuihaira kaja nathum kaphāla phālaka, thangkhameila thangmeilaka kala akha eina akha tamchithei ngarokshapa.
Varena khami lukhamashan mangā eina apong kaikhali ina nathumli mangathumlakla chithilila phaningung khavai kapihaira.

Kaja Khristawui rao akha sāda Gentilebingli Varewui paokaphā tamchithei khavaiwui khamahai samphangda ina mangathumlakla kagapina. Gentilebingli Manglā Katharana dharchigatmihaida Varena khuisangkapai ngasāpai khavai pāngmon akha thada Varewui paokaphā hākashokli ina otram ngatha̱ya.
Chieina Jishu Khrista eina I akha ngasāda Varewui vang otram khangatha̱ hili lāngso kashapna.
Gentilebing Varewui kahāng nganā khavai Khristana ili shichinlaga kathada sākhala kajimāng ina pinglak eina matuira. Hi ana awui tuimatui, kala otsak kala
matakhak kahai khudam einala kala Varewui Manglāwui pangshap einala kasāsera. Chieina Jerusalemwui eina thuilaga Illyricum shangshungda ina Khristawui paokaphā peida hāshokhaira.
Khristawui pao mashārang kaji apam kachiva̱li paokaphā hākashok hi iwui ningrinna. Chieina mi kateina hashok kahai apamli I mavāmana.
Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Awui pongli mahāngchitheirang kajebingna theira,
mashārang kajebingna theishingkhuira.”
Kha ara apam hishong iwui ot kuphaira, kala zingkum hirankha nathumli rākhavai khangarān kasā athishurda ara rāpaiura da shitsanga.
Ina Spainli khavā atamli nathumli rida samphang khavai rāngasāmsangngai kala nathumwui khangachonla khuingai.
Kha aruicham katharabingli khangachon khuivāmi khavai Jerusalemli vāfara.
Kaja Achaia eina Macedoniali khalei churchbingna Jerusalemli khalei kachāma katharabingli haolak eina pheisā ngachonmira jihaira.

Athum khalattana sāra jikahaina; kachangkhat eina hangsa jiakha kachāmbingli ngachonmi ngayiphalunga; Jihudinaobingna Manglāwui sokhami hi Gentilebingli ngayarmi kahaina. Hithada sāda Gentilebingnala athumwui lanwui sokhami chieina Jihudinaobingli ngachonngayiya.
Chiwui vang eina ngashaikhui kahai lanbing chi athumli mikahaiwui thili nathumli samphangphungda Spainli vāra.
Ina nathumli kharā tharan Khristawui eina samkaphang hakkhamahā sokhami chi rāhāngchitheira.
Ivānaongarā, ina nathumli pongai kaja ithumwui Proho Jishu Khrista kala Manglāna khami leikashiwui mangā eina iwui vang Vareli thuklak eina seihā sāmichinglu.
Judeali khalei mashitkasangabingna ili mahapkhano khavai seihāla sāmilu, chieina Jerusalemli iwui otram khangatha̱ chi katharabingna khuisangkapai ngasāra.
Kala Varena mayāmiakha, ina ringphālak eina nathumli rāsamphangra.
Chingri kahaiwui ura̱ Vare china nathum saikorali ngasomiranu. Amen.
Cenchreaewui churchli deacon kasava̱ ithumwui azarva̱ Phoebe hi khamathā sha̱nao akhana da nathumli chitheingai.
Katharabingli sāmikhangayi thada Prohowui mingli ali ngarokkhuilu, kala nathumna ali ngachonkapai chi ngachonmilu, kaja ana kachungkhali ngachonmihaira, ilila ngachonmihaira.
Khrista Jishuwui vang otram ngatha̱kharuma Priscilla eina Aquilali iwui shālam hāngmilu.
Anina iwui vang manglā hamda ngachonmi. Anili ningshilaka, imāngna majila kha Gentilebingwui churchbingnala ningshisera.
Aniwui shimli kazip khangaruma churchlila shālam mili.
Asia ngaleili Khristali shitsangkhare iwui leikashiya ngasotnao Epaenetusli shālam mili.
Nathumwui vang eina panglāk eina ot kasava̱ Maryli shālam mili.
Ili phātop zangkharuma iyur Andrionicus eina Juniasli shālam mili; ani paokazatbingwui ngachaili maholaka kala ili anina Khristali samphangriya.
Prohowui lungli iwui khamashita Ampliatuslila shālam mili.
Khristawui mingli otsakruma Urbanus eina iwui khamashita Stachylila shālam mili.
Khristali ningkatum chithei kahaiya Apellesli shālam mili. Aristobulusshi shimkhurwui mi saikoralila shālam mili.
Iyurwui mi Herodion eina Narcisusshi shimkhur Khristali khuisang kahai ngasotnaobingli shālam mili.
Prohowui otram khangatha̱li kazanga Tryphaena eina Tryphosa kala Prohowui vang otram tarākha ngatha̱me iwui khamashita Persislonglila shālam mili.
Prohowui ot kasāli nganingshing kahai Rufus eina ili nao thada kasā ava̱va̱li iwui shālam mili.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas kala athumli ngasokapam ngasotnao saikorali shālam mili.
Philologus eina Julia, Nereus eina azarva̱ kala Olympas athumli ngasokapam katharabing saikorali shālam mili.
Nathum akha eina akha leishi ngarokta pāngla ngasinkhui ngaroklu. Khristawui church saikorana nathumli shālam mili.
Kaja hithada kasā athum chiya Khristawui otram khangatha̱ maningla paiphonwui vang ot kasāna, athumwui kashim tui kala sotkhamasao akhon eina matheithangkhameibingli yonngasaka.
Nathumna paokaphāli singtit kajiwui pao shāhaira, kala hiwui vang ina ringphai. Nathumli kaphāwui apongli thangkhamei kala zakkashiwui apongli mangkhama̱ ngasā ngasakngai.
Chingri kahaiwui ura̱ Vare china Satanli nathumwui phei eina naikazam ngasakhaora.
Ithumwui Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan chi nathumli leichingranu.
Ili otsakruma Timothyna nathumli shālam mili; kala iyur Lucius, Jason kala Sosipater athumnala shālam mili.
Chithi hi kapikhame Tertius ininala Prohowui mingli shālam mili.
Churchna kaziprumching kaje iwui shimva̱ Gaiusna shālam mili, keinung hiwui lanse Erastus eina ichinā Quartusnala shālam mili.
Ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan chi nathumli leichingranu. Amen.

Ithum Vareli tekkmatei ngasaksa! Ina hākashoka paokaphā Jishu Khristawui chānpao athishurda kala achālakhawui eina ngathumhaikasā khamashung chi phongmi kahai athishurda Varena nathumwui shitkasang pheisin ngatar ngasakshapa.
Kha marānbingna kapi kahai chiwui eina khamashung chi theingasakhaira, chiwui vang eina yur saikorana ali shitsang khavai kala kahāng nganā khavaina.
Khristawui mangā eina theivāser kaje Vare mingli tekkmateimeiranu. Amen.

Corinthli khalei Varewui church, Varewui kathara mi sākhavai hokhui kahaibing saikora, Khrista Jishuli khangarumwui vang Varewui mi sākahaibing kala apam kachiva̱li Proho Jishu Khristali athumwui kala ithumwui Prohonada khokharuma mi saikorali kakapi chithina.
Ithumwui Avāva̱ Vare kala Proho Jishu Khristana nathumli lukhamashan kala chingri kahai miranu.
Kaja Khristali khangarumwui vang nathumwui tuimatuilila, aworwui ponglila Varena nathumli ot saikora khavāt maleila mihaira.
Khristawui pao nathumwui ningli shāptitmihaira.
Chiya, ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui kharā nathumna honda leilakha Varewui lemmet akhala masamkaphang maleilakmana.
Proho Jishu Khristawui tekhamatei zimiksho marāranglakha nathumli khayon akhala malei khavai ana nathumli akatang eina tangda nganingtit khavai mayonmira.
Awui Naomayara, ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristali ngarumsak leikhavai hokhuikhame Vare hiva shitsangkapaiyana.
Ivānaongarā, Proho Jishu Khristawui ming singda nathumli kapona, nathum mayā ngaroklu, makai ngarokalu; kaphaning kala kharin akhamāng leilaga khokkha sāchaolu.
Kaja ivānaobing, nathumwui ngachaili kharar khangarok leili da Chloeshi shimkhurwui mi kaikhawui eina tharlak eina shāhaira.
Nathumwui ngachaili “Iya Paulwuina,” “Iya Apolloswuina”; khangateina “Iya Cephaswuina,” kala “Iya Khristawuina” da hāngngaroka ji.
Khristali ngakaipairalā? Nathumwui vang Paulli krushtungli shaothatlā? Kala nathumli Paulwui ming singda ra̱hikmilā?
Chiwui vang eina nathumli iwui sākhangatha̱ sākhavai ra̱hikkhamina da mi khipānakha mahāngpaimana.
(Oh, malaihaida ina Stephanaswui shimkhurlila ra̱hikmi. Chili lāngda ina khangateili ra̱hikkhami maphaningungmana).

Kaja ra̱hikmi khavai Khristana ili mashirātmana. Khristana krustungli thikhamiwui pangshap chi machāngmāng khavai Paokaphā chi mikumowui thangkhamei tuiyār eina maningla hāshok khavai ana ili kashirātna.
Kaja shimānda khalei athumwui vanga krushwui tui hi mangkhama̱ thai, kha huimida khalei ithumwui vanga Varewui pangshapna.
Hithada kapihaida lei;
“Ina thangkhameibingwui thangmei chi shimān ngasakra kala kathemabingwui ningkazan chi masāvai ngasakmara.”
Chithākha thangkhamei mi kali lei? Kathema kali lei? Mithot hiwui ngaphat ngayātkatheia mi kali lei? Okathuiwui thangkhamei hi mangkhama̱na da Varena chitheihaira.
Mikumona awui thangkhamei eina Vareli matheikhararwui vang mibingna mangkhama̱na da kakhuia ithumna hākashoka pao hili shitkasanga mibing chili Varena huimi.
Kaja Jihudibingna machutkhui khavai matakhak kahai ot ningchānga kala Gentilebingna thangkhamei phai.
Kha krushtungli shaoshān kahaia Khrista chi ithumna hākashokna, chi Jihudibingwui vanga phei ngaphok khavaiwui chānpaona kala Gentilebingwui vanga mangkhama̱ ngasāhaowa.
Kha Varena hokhui kahaibingwui vanga Jihudilala, Gentilelala chānpao chi Khrista, Varewui pangshap kala Varewui thangkhamei china.
Kaja Varewui mangkhama̱ kathā china mikumowui thangkhameili thangmamei kala awui khangazan china mikumowui pangshapli pangmei.
Ivānaobing, nathumli hokakhui tharan kathasākhala kaji phaningyanglu. Mikumowuishong eina yangakha nathumwui ngachaili thangkhameila, pangshap khaleila kala wungnao pharātla machungmana.
Kha thangkhameibing khayak khavai okathuina mangkhama̱na da kakhuibingli kala pangshap khaleibing khayak khavai okathuina ngazana da kakhuibingli Varena rinsit eina kapangkhui.
Okathuina saklak eina kaphaning chi shimān ngasak khavai, okathuina mayangkasanga kala khikha maningmana da kaphaninga chili Varena kapangkhui.
Chiwui vang eina mikumo khipānakha Varewui mangāli malangsopaimana.

Varena nathumli Khrista Jishuli ngarum khavai hokhuihaira kala Varena Khrista chi ithumwui thangmei sāngasakhaira. Awui mangā eina ithumli mashungmihaira; ithum Varewui kathara miyur ngasāhaira kala moreiwui eina ningkhān ngasakhaira.
Chiwui vang kapi kahai thada, “Langso khangayi china Prohowui vang langsoranu.”
Khikhalajila Jishu Khrista kala awui thimalokhami maningla ina nathumli ngasopamda leilakha katei akhala matamchitheilakmara jikahaina.
Chieina ina nathumli kharā tharan ngazansāhaoda ngacheerarang leisai.
Kha mikumowui tuiyār eina mamatuila manglāwui pangshap theishingkakhui eina ngasoda tamchithei.
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui shitkasang chi mikumowui thangkhameili maningla Varewui pangshapli khaleina.
Ina tamkachithei thangkhamei tui chi mikumona matheivākharar Varewui kathuka thangkhamei ngasāsalala okathui masāranglakha ithumli tekmatei ngasak khavai Varena ngarānpinghaikasana.
Hi apuk-apaka khamungabing khipānakha matheimana; athumna theisāsi kaja tekhamateiwui Proho chili masāthatmara.
Kha hithada kapihaida lei;
“Khipānakha mathei, mashālakrang kaji,
khipānakha shokra da maphaningsalak kaji,
chi Varena ali leikashebingwui vang ngarānmi kahaina.”
Mikumowui ningna mikumowui ningkhalang kathei thada Varewui Manglāmāngna Varewui pongli thei.
Ithumna okathui hiwui ningphanin samkaphang maningmana kha Varena chihokharā Manglāwui vang eina ithumli khamimi chi theikhuishapa.

Manglā makazanga mi china Varewui lemmet khamimi chi makhuirarmana; chikathā mi chi theishingkakhuila maleimana kala chi awui vanga kakhalat makhalei thāhaowa, kaja chiwui aman kasak chi manglārinwui pheisin eina theiki kajina.
Manglā kazanga mi china ot saikorali bichar sāshapa, kha ali khipānakha bichar masārarmana.
Hithada kapihaili,
“Khipāna Prohowui ning thei?
Khipāna ali hāngmachinshap?”
Chithālala, ithumwuili Khristawui ning lei.
Ina nathumli zāt khamarar mamizāla seina̱ eina mimangsai, kaja nathum mazātheirangsai. Arui eina tangda mazātheirangli.
Khikhalajila arui eina tangda okathuiwui mi thada okthuida lei. Nathum akha eina akha mikpaishida kharar ngaroka, chithākha okathuiwui khangachā sāchingda lei kaji chi hieina matheikhuipaimalā?
Nathum akhana, “I Paulwuina” kala khangatei akhana “I Apolloswuina” da hāngakha okathuiwui khangachā sāching kaji maningmalā?
Ina lingsanga, Apollosna tara̱ chaimi, kha Varena kharkhangasakna.
Chieina lingkasangla, tara̱ chaikhamela khikha maningmana, kha kharkhangasaka Vare china khamataiyana.
Lingkasanga eina tara̱ chaikhame chi khangatei maleimana; Varena mi ava̱va̱li awui ot kasā athishurda sāman mira.
Kaja ithum Varewui vang otsakrumabingna kala nathumna Varewui luiyam kala shimna.
Varena ili khami lemmet chiwui athishurda shim sākatha akha thada ina shimphung sema, kala khangatei akhana chiwuitungli shim sākai. Kha kasā mi china ningngasharlak eina sāranu.
Kaja Varena Jishu Khristali akhamāng kaje shimphunga sāngasakhaira. Chieina Jishu Khristali sākā kahai chi maningla shimphunga khangatei masākāluipaimana.
Kachikathāna shimphunga chiwuitungli shim sākakāli sinā, lupā, kasaka ngalunggui kala kaikhana thing, khawo, lanji shichinra,
kha Khristawui Zimikshothang mi ava̱va̱wui otsakwui magun phongshokra; kachangkhat otsak chiwui magun chi mei eina chāng yangra.
Shimphunga chiwuitungli sākā kahai chi meina machuitākha mipā chi sāman samphangra.
Kachikathā miwui otsak chi meina chuitāhaiakha chi awui vang kashimāna, kha a changliva meiwui eina yāmshok kahai thada huimira.
Kachikathā akhana khorumshim shimān ngasakakha Verena ali shimān ngasakra. Kaja khorumshim chiya katharana kala nathum awui khorumshimna.
Kaja okathui hiwui thangkhamei hiya Varewui mangāli mangkhama̱na. Hithada kapihaili, “Thangkhameibingwui awor kasā chi Varena paisor eina tukkhuishapa.”
Kala khangatei lairikli hithada hānghai, “Thangkhameibingwui kaphaning chi aremana da Prohona thei.”
Chiwui vang eina sākashap chiwui vang malangsoaranu. Kaja ot saikora nathumwuisera.
Paul jilala, Apollos jilala, Cephas jilala, okathui jilala, kharing jilala, kathi jilala, aruihon jilala naoda jilala saikora nathumwuisera.
Kala nathum Khristawuina kala Khrista Varewuina.
Hikathā otram khangatha̱bingva akhavāwui shitsangkapaibing ngasāphalungra.
Nathumna nilala, mikumowui shong eina nilala ili kaphen chiwui vang ina khikha mangangmana, kaja I khalatta bichar masāmana.
Ina khangui khalāng sākahai I matheimana, kha china I mashungchaowa kaji maningmana. Iwuitungli bichar kasaa chi Prohona.

Chiwui vang eina retkahai atam chi marāranglakha eina tangda khipālikha bichar masālu, Proho marāranglakha eina tangda ngaraisālu. Chithanghon tangkhamangli thumtit kahaibing kala mibingwui ningli kharin leilaga ngathum kahai saikora phongshokra. Chiwui thili mi kachiva̱ Verewui eina ana masot samphang khangayi chi samphangra.
Khipāna nathumli khangateibingli hakmei ngasakkhala? Nathumwui khalei saikora hi Varena khami maningmalā? Chithākha kathada nathumna samphangda khalei chi lemmet makhaning thada langsopaikhala?
Nathumwui ningkachāng samphangserhaira! Nathum shāngserhaira! Inina kajimada, nathumva wungnao sāserura! Nathum wungnaolaksi kaje inila nathumli ngasoda mungrumramā!

Kaja iwui theikakhuili, paokazata ithumliva kathi tandi mikahai mi thada yarui mangāli shaothata, apuk-apakva̱wui kazingraobing kala mibingna ngahorda yangnganao khavai Varena teolak kahaipamli kahai thai.
Khristawui vang eina ithumva mangkhama̱ana, nathumva Khristawui lungli thangkhameiana, kala ithuma khangazanana, nathuma kapangana! Ithumliva chinkai, nathumliva khayāshiya!
Aruichangva ithum zākhavai mangkhavai maleimana, chonshi-chonkai ngavai, mina kashaola shaowa, ngayin khavai maleimada zatshang zattai;
kala ringkhavai ot panglāk eina sai, ithumli khonkashi tharan ithumna somi, rekakharek tharan khānga;
kazei tharan malungkhanim tui eina ngahānkai. Okathui hili ithum hiya horkahai thothapli mamathāmeithuwa.
Nathumli khayakvairanu da hithada kakapi maningmana, kha leikashe inaongarā thada hāngkhamachinna.
Khristawuili nathumli thankhame thingthing leisālala Avāva̱ chiya akhamānga. Khrista Jishuwui mibing nathumli ina paokaphā khuirākhamiwui vang I nathumwui avāva̱ ngasāhaowa.
Chiwui vang eina ina nathumli sāchithei kahai sha̱khuida iwui thada sālu.

Maram hiwui vang eina iwui leikashe kala Proholi ningtongda shitkasanga inao kathā Timothyli chihokharāna. Ina Khrista Jishuli ngarumda kharing mirin kashurlungli iwui pheisin kala chiwui pongli ina church kachiva̱li tamchithei kahai chi nathumli ana phaningung ngasakra.
I marāluimara da nathumwui ngachaili kaikhana phaninglaga langsoi.
Chithālala Prohona mayāmiakha I thākta rārāsāra; kala langkasobing china khamatuimāng maningla khi sāshapkhala kaji rāphākhuihaora.
Khikhalajila Vare Wungram hiliva thangkhamei tuili maleimana kha manglāwui pangshapli lei.
Nathum kachipā ningchangmeikhala? Ili lijei singda rālu jika, malungkhanim leikashi ning eina rālu jikhala?
Laga nathum khalatta langsoli! Chiwui vang nathum sifada khanangphalungra kala chikathā miliva yaruiwui eina kashamhaiphalungra.

Iphasāna nathumwui eina katāva̱li leisālala nathumli manglā eina ngasopamda lei kala nathumli ngasokapam thada khangachee khangachā ot kasā mi chiwuitungli ithumwui Proho Jishuwui ming singda ina khak tāmihaira.
Nathumna Proho Jishuwui mingli kazip khangarum tharan iwui manglāla nathumli kaziprumda ithumwui lungli khalei Proho Jishuwui pangshap eina,
hikathā mili phasā shimān khavai chipeeli horsangmira, chithākha Prohowui Zimiksholi amanglā huikakhui samphangra.

Nathumwui kachama morei saikora horhaolu, chithākha nathum tharchaohaora. Na khawok makazangana, kaja ara nathumwui makānkhami phanitwui khangarān kuphaira kala makānkhami yaonao Khristali pha̱phayāmihaira.
Chiwui vang eina ithumna phanit khamayon tharan, khawok kazanga khamui thada makaphā-makhayā eina mamayonasa, kha khawok makazanga thada ningkathar kala khamashung eina mayonsa.
Arui ina hāngda khalei hiya shāmkasā, khangamar, phama̱kashao kala ama̱li khokharummabingli mangasoalu kaji maningmana. Athumli kahāngna jisi kaja okathui hili nathum mapanpaisāmara.
Kha ina kahāngpāva, chinaongarāwui aming ngakhumlaga shāmsākazat, khangamar, ama̱li kapha̱, khamashāt, khamarip kala phama̱kashao athum chili ot masakrumalu kala phakazāla maphazārumalu kajina.
Hithada kapihaida lei, “Makaphā mi chili nathumwui eina khuishokhaolu.”
Shitkasangbingna okathuili bichar sāra kaji nathum matheimalā? Kala okathuili nathumna bichar sāra jiakha, khikha makhaninga tuinao chi mangazekkhuitheimalā?
Ithumna kazingraobingli bichar sāra kaji nathum matheimalā? Chithākha okathui hiwui otli kayākhashida mataimeida ngazekshaprakhala?
Hikathāthā tuishot nathumwuili leiakha, kachiwui vang eina churchna matheimiphaphut kajebingwuili ngazekmi khavai khuivārakhala?
Hi khayak khavaina! Nathumwui ngachaili ngachami khavai theithangkhamei mi akhala mazangsāthulā?
Nathum akhana akhali kārotli khuivālaga mashitkasangbingli bichar sāngasaka kajilā?
Kha nathum khalatta akhana akhali khayon sāngarokta lei kala kateizā ngarokta lei.
Makaphā-makhayābingna Vare wungramli mazangmara da nathum matheimalā? Matheinguihaialu, shāmkasābing, ama̱li kapha̱bing, phokaphābing, mayarnao eina mayarnao, sha̱nao eina sha̱nao phasā khangasobing,
khalebing, kākharāmabing, khamaripabing, khamashātabing kala phama̱kashaobing khipākha Vare wungramli mazangmara.
Nathumwui ngachaili mi kaikhava hikathā sāsai, kha Varewui Manglā kala Proho Jishu Khristawui mingli nathumli pheomihaira, tharngasakhaira kala mashung ngasakhaira.

Khangateinala hithada hānga, “Kashakazā hi wukwui vangna, kala wuk hi kashakazāwui vangna.” Mha, chithālala Varena khanini chi shimān ngasakra. phasā hi Prohowui sāhaoda khamathang-khamarangli shichin khavai maningmana, kha Proholi otram ngatha̱ khavaina.
Varena Proholi ringluishit ngasaka. Awui pangshap eina ithumlila ringluishit ngasakra.
Khayorva̱li phasā khangasopā chi khayorva̱li asā akha sāhaira kaji nathumna matheimalā? Hi thada tharlak eina kapihaili, “Khani chi asā akha sāhaora.”
Kha Proholi kazanga mi chi manglā eina Proholi ngarumhaira.
Khamathang-khamarangli mazangalu. Khangatatei morei kasā hiya awui phasāli masāza̱mana; kha khamathang-khamarangwui khayon chiya a khalattawui phasāli morei kasāna.
Nathumwui phasā hi Varena khami Manglā Kathara nawui wuklungli pamkhavai khorumshimna da nathum matheimalā? Nathum hi nathum khalattawui maningmana kha Varewuina;
nathumli aman mida lokhuihaira. Chiwui vang eina nathumwui phasā eina Vareli tekmatei ngasaklu.
Nathumna ili kakapiwui tuipong chi ara hina. Ra̱sa̱ maphālala phai.
Kha shuikhangashai kasui tarākha leihaoda mayarnao kachiva̱na kachichā preiva̱ leiranu,
kala sha̱nao kachiva̱na kachichā gahara leiranu, mayarana gaharawui acham sāda kala sha̱naopāva̱na preiva̱wui acham sāda ningyang ungasak ngarokta ngakumranu.
Preiva̱na a khalatta aphasāwui akhavā maningmana. Chithada sāda gaharanala a khalatta aphasāwui akhavā maningmana, kha apreiva̱nana.

Seihā sākhui khavai khaninina mayāngarokta atam kasha̱nakhawui vang pākkhangarok maningakha akha eina akha mamayā khangarok masaalu, pāksālala ngakumluishitlu, maningakha khalatta mangarinkharar eina Satanwui kasuili tazanghaipaishina.
Ina nathumli hithāphalungra da kahāng maningmana, kha mayākhami kathā eina kahāngna.
Mi saikora I thāngasakngai, kha mi kachiva̱ Varewui eina samkaphang ngakheikhang kahai lemmet chi ngateisera. Mi akhali akha, khangatei akhali akha da mi.
Ra̱sa̱ mapharang kajibing eina ra̱meiva̱bingli kahāngna kaja athumwui vanga iwui thada ra̱sa makaphā phāmei.
Kha khalatta mangarinrarakha ra̱sa̱ phalu kaja malungkachāng meichotle ra̱sa̱ kaphāna phamei.
Ra̱sa̱ phakahaibingli kakaso hi ina maningmana kha Prohona kakasona kaja preiva̱na gaharali mahorhaipaimana.
Kha ana horhaiakha ra̱meipamphalungra, maningakha gahara chili mashitkhuiluiranu, kala gaharana preiva̱li mapāngpaimana.
shitkasanga sha̱nao akhana mashitkasanga mayarnao akhali ngakumlaga gahara china ali ngasopamra jiakha anala gahara chili mapāngpaimana.

Mashitkasanga gahara chi shitkasangva̱ preiva̱wui mangā eina Varewui mangāli khuisangkapai ngasāhaowa; kala mashitkasang preiva̱ chi shitkasanga gahara chiwui mangā eina Varewui mangāli khuisangkapai ngasāhaowa. Chi maningsi kaje nanaongarā matharmara, kha chithada leiakha athum thara.

Chithālala, mashitkasanga china pākhaora jiakha, pākhaoranu. Chikathā chile shitkasanga gaharalapai, preiva̱lapai khalap kahai maleimana. Khikhalajila Varena nathumli chingri eina okthui khavai hokakhuina.
Shitkasanga preiva̱, nagaharali nana mahuikhuirarmara da kathada nana hāngshapkhala? Kala shitkasanga gahara, nana napreiva̱li mahuikhuirarmara da kathada hangshapkhala?
Varena hokakhui tharan ahui rimshokhairasākha chithāpapamhaoranu. Marimkashok mili hokhuiakha marimshokluiaranu.
Kaja ahui rimkashoknala, marimkashoknala khikha maningmana, kha Varewui ningkhami khamayon hina khamataiyana.
Varewui kaho khuikasang chitharan ana leikasā chithada mi kachiva̱ chithada leiphalungra.
Varena kaho tharan rao sāsālā? Khikha maleimana, kha ningkhānkapai apong leili jiakha sākhuikhalailu.
Kaja Prohona hokhui kahai rao chi awui ningkhānwui mi sāhaira; chi tākam eina ningkhān mi chi Varena hokhuihaiakha Prohowui rao ngasāhaowa.
Varena aman mida nathumli lokhuihaira. Chieina mibingwui rao masāluialu.
Ivānaobing, mi kachiva̱na ali hokhuithang leikasā chi tākam eina Varewui ngarumsaklunglila chithada leiphalungra.
Ara ra̱sa̱ mapharang kajebingwui pongli nathumna kapikharā: Ina Prohowui eina kakaso masamphangmana kha shitsangkapaia akha sāda iwui kaphaning hi kachitheina.
Aruihonwui kakhanang hi theilaga mayarnaowui vanga ana khalei thada leikasāna phāmeira.
Na napreiva̱ leihairala? Pāngkhavai masālu. Na ra̱sa̱ maphāranglā? Phakhavai masālu.
Kha ra̱sa̱ phākhuilala morei kasā maningmana kala ngalānao akhana fathuilala morei maningmana. Kha ra̱sa̱ phākahaibingna thangthangwui kakhanang samphangki kaji chi masamphang ngasakngaimana.
kala chapkhangachābing china makakhanang thada, khamana̱bingna makhamathān thada, khalobingna athumwui makhaning thada,
kala okathuiwui otli sakta kaphaningbingnala makaphaning thada okthuiranu, kaja arui leida khalei okathui hi masangleiluimara.
Kha ra̱sa̱ phakahai mayarnaova apreiva̱li ningyāng ungngasak khavai okathuiwui otli sakmeida khuiya. Chieina awui ning pakrāhaowa.

Mafakathui sha̱nao lah ngalānaova Prohowui otli sakmeida khui, khikhalajila ana awui phasāla kala manglāla dharchigatngaiya. Kha fathui kahai sha̱naona agaharali ningyāng ungngasak khavai okathuiwui otli sakmeida khuiya.
Hi nathumwui vang phākhavai kahāngna, nathumli hapkhano khavai kakhām maningmana. Kha nathumli khamashung Prohowui otram ngatha̱ ngasakngai.

Khāmhailaga mangakumla thada pamngarokhaosa da mayā ngarokhailaga mayarana khāmkahaiva̱li yansaingaihaida kala awui malungkachāng maphungrarthuda ngakum kahaina phāmeira da phaningakha, awui ningkachāng athishurda ngakumhaoranu, chili morei khikha maleimana.
Kha kachikathāna mangakumlakmara da awui ningli nganingtithaiakha kala akhalatta ngarinshapakha mangakumlala phai.
Chieina khāmkahaiva̱li kakhui chi phālaka, kha mangakumlak kajina phameilui.
Agahara ringda leilakha preiva̱ china ningkhān masāpaimana. Agahara thihaiakha ana ngakumkhangai mi chili ngakumpai; kha Prohowui mingli fathuiphalungra.
Chithālala, ana mafathuila pamhaiakha ringphameikharra. Hi iwui kaphaningna, thalala hili Varewui Manglā zanga da shitsanga.
Kachikathā mi akhana a theimeia da phaningakha ana theikhangayi chila matheiranga.
Kha Vareli leikashe mili Varena theimi.
Kazingramlila, okathuilila “vare” kahobing kala “proho” kahobing kachungkha leilala;

ithumwui vanga saikora Kasā Akhava, Avāva̱ Varivara akhamānga kala awui vang ithum kharingna; kala Proho akhamānga, chiya Jishu Khristana, awui mangā eina ot saikora kasāsera kala awui mangā eina ithum kharingna.
Ithumli kashakazā china Vareli nganai ngasaki kaji maningmana, chi mamang mazālala kashimān maleimana; manglala, zālala katong maleimana.
Theithangkhama nana kameo shimli phāshak phazāda leilakha ning khangazana mi akhana theisi kaja pha̱kahai ot chi shaingai khavai ali kasatkasang kathā maningkhala?
Chieina Khristana thimi kahai navānao khangazana chili nawui awor china shimān ngasaka.
Hithada sāda, mashun-makhui makatheia navānao ngarāwuitungli morei sāda athumwui ningli khamā za̱khangasak chi Khristawuitungli morei kasāna.
Avānao akha nguikhavai leili jiakha ali morei masākhavai ina sā chi mashaiphalungmara.
Mi khangateibingwui vang paokazata maningsālala, nathumwui vanga I hi paokazatana; khikhalajila nathumna Prohowui mingli kharing china I paokazatana kajiwui machutna.
Ili mibingna phenphāphā kaji tharan iwui ngahānkakā chi hina.
Iwui ot kasāwui vang I kashakazā masamphangngayimalā?
Khangatei paokazatbing kala Prohowui agato ngarā kala Peterlongwui thada ithumla preiva̱ thānkaphungwui mashun maleimalā?
Maningakha ringkhavaiwui vang ot kasā hi Barnabas inimangmala?
Kachikathāna raimiwui lungli khalattawui lan shichinlaga shipai sālā? Drakhā yāmgui sālaga chiwui athei makashai khipā leikhala? Seikahoma khipāna awui seina̱ makhamang leikhala?
Hi ina mikumowui ningngai eina kahānglā? Ainnala hi tākam eina mahāngmalā?
Khikhalajila Moseswui Ainli hithada kapihai, “Mukvāna mā naida leilakha akhamor makhalaphaialu.” Varena mukvāmāngli phaningmila?
Ithumwui vangla kahāng maningmalā? Chi ithumwui vang kapi kahaina: lui khavaala, kahātala heithei chi awui yar samphangra da chihānda sāphalungra.
Ithumna nathumli manglāwui athā yaosanghaira. Nathumwui eina ithumna phasāwui kankhanā samphangakha chi marnāhaola?

Kateibingna nathumwui eina samphangngayiya da chihānakha ithumna mataimeida masamphang ngayimalā? Chithālala ithumna hikathā samphang khangayi mapolakmana, kha Khristawui paokaphā chiwui pongli mahapkhano khavai ithumna ot saikora phungrāhaira.
khorumshimli otram khangatha̱ athum china khorumshimwui eina kashakazā samphanga kala hanphutpamli otram khangatha̱ athum chinala kachigat chiwui eina athumwui yar samphanga da nathumna thei.
Chithada sāda, paokaphā hākashok athum china paokaphā chiwui eina kashakazā samphangra da Prohona ningmihai.
Ina paokaphā hāshokhaowa kajiwui vang malangsomana. Chi sākhavai ili ningmi kahaina. Ina paokaphā mahāshokakha kayākha khangachee otkhala!
Ina iwui ningkachāng athishurda ot kasāsi kaja iwui ngalangman samphangra; kha hi iwui sāran otna da kasāna. Khiwui vangkhala kaja Varena ot hi ili horsangmi kahaina.
Thākha, iwui ngalangman khi leikhala? Aman makhuila paokaphā tamkachithei hi iwui khamahaina, paokaphāwui vang iwui yar mapomana.
I khipākhawui rao maningla ningkhān mina, kha mi kachungkha yuikhuipai khavai I khalatta mi saikorawui rao sai.
Jihudibingli yuikhui khavai athumwui ngachaili Jihudi akha thada sai, ainwui azingli khaleibingli yuikhui khavai I khalatta ainwui azingli maleilala ainwui azingli khalei thada sai.

Chi tākam eina ina Gentilebingli sakkharum tharan, athumli yuikhui khavai Jihudiwui ain azingli maleila athum tākam eina sai. Hi kasā eina I Varewui ain mamayonmana kaji maningmana; kachangkhat I Khristawui ain azingli lei.

Shitkasang khangazanbingwui ngachaili athumli yuikhui khavai ila athum akha thada khangazana ngasāhaowa, chithada sāda apong aning-anangva̱ eina athum kaikhali huikhui khavai ina mi kachiva̱li athum thada ngasotheisera.
Ina paokaphāwui sokhami chi mi saikorali mishap khavai ot saikora hi kasāna.
Shongzā khangakhuili mi kachungkhana ngasāma, kha mi akhamāngna sāman samphanga kaji nathum matheimalā?
Khangareo mi kachiva̱na shimānhaoki kaji wonrui chiwui vang angarak tāzak eina mayona; kha ithumva kashimān kaho mavaiki kaje chiwui vangna.
Chiwui vang eina ina kharin maleila ngakhuizatphāphā kaji maningmana kala khamasaili shirphāphā kaji maningmana.
Mi kateili khangahān chili rāzang khavai ngahot kahaia ili makhalanshokhai khavai ina iwui phasā hi makang ngasaka.
Athum saikora Moseswui thikashura sāda muiyā eina ngayilungli ra̱hika.
Athum saikora ngaraikachā manglārinwui kashakazā zai kala tara̱ manga
kala athumli ngasokazata manglārinwui lunghār chiwui eina athumna khamang samphanga; lunghār chi Khrista a khalattana.
Chithālala athum kachungkhali Varena mapenthuda siwukli zatlakha athum sorkhangasaili chithithaowa.
