kala athum kaikha thada meoma̱li mokhorum khavaina. Hithada kapihaili, “Mibing china morsongda pha̱ kathui eina khamathang khamarangwui otla sai”
Mi kaikhana khamathang-khamarangwui ot kasāwui vang eina thangkhawui alungli mi thing maga̱da kathum thikahai chithada ithumna chikathā ot masāphalungmara.
Kaikhana Proholi chāng tamkhayangwui vang phara̱na makeithat kahai chithada ithumna Proholi chāng matamyangpaimara.
Kaikhana phenphāphā kajiwui vang kazingraona thingasak kahai chithada, ithumla maphenphāphā phalungmara.
Ot saikora hi kateibingli ngayoyang khavai shokkahaina, kala ithumwui vang hāngkhamathin sāda kapi kahaina. Kaja ithum okathui ngachangnanai atamli okthuida leili.
I nganingtitta lei da kaphaninga mi china mokonglui khavai ningngasharanu.

Nathumna chāng khayang samkaphang kachiva̱ chi mikumoli kharā khangachāna. Kha Varena awui ngashitkhami chi makailakmana kala nathumna maphungrarki kaji chili lāngda ana nathumli chāng mayang ngasakmana. Nathumli chāng khayang chitharan khāngshap khavai ana nathumli pangshap mira kala chili yuishap khavai apong ngarānmira.
Theikhuishapa mibingli kahāng thada ina khamatuina; ina kahāng hi nathum khalatta chukmaja̱lu.
Prohowui phākachizātli sokhami tengkotwui vang ithumna Vareli ningkashi khami hi Khristawui asheeli khangarumna, kala ithumna khamui serkhaida kashai tharan Khristawui phasāli khangarumna.
Khamuitang akha shaikhangarum thada ithum kachungkhalala asā akhamānga, kaja ithum khamui atang akha shaikhangarumna.
Ina kahāng hi khikhala da theilā? Meoma̱ kala chili pha̱kahai ot chi khikhikhana kajilā?
Maningmana, ina kahāngva, mashitkasangbingwui hanphutli kapha̱ chi Vareli maningla kameoli kapha̱na. Chiwui vang eina nathumli kameoli khangaruma masā ngasakngaimana.
Nathumna Prohowui tengkot kala kameowui tengkot khanini mamangpaimana. Prohowui khongkhai eina kala kameowui khongkhai khanini mazāpaimana.
Ithumna Proholi malungvāt ngasaksilā? Ali ithum pangmeiya da phaninglā?
Khipānakha akhalattawui vang phākhavaimāng maphaaranu, kha khongnainaowui phākhavai sāranu.
Nathumwui mashun-makhuiwui vang sāshimli khayora sā chi ningkhamaong maleila kala mangathingla kashai phamei.
Kaja hithada kapihaili; “Okathui kala chiwui alungli khalei saikora Prohowuina.”
Mashitkasanga akhana phākazā hoda vaakha khuikhamimi chi shailu, ningthar khavaina da mangathingalu.
Kha kachikathāna “Hi meoma̱li kapha̱ sāna” da hāngakha nathumli hangkhame mi chiwui mashun-makhui kala ning tharkhavaiwui vang mashaialu.
Chi nawui mashun-makhuiwui vang maningla hāngkhamepā chiwui mashun-makhuiwui vangna.
Kaikhana “Iwui sākhangai chili mi kateiwui mashun-makhuiwui vang khi khāmkhavai lei;
ina Vareli ningkashi mikahai kashakazā chiwui vang mina khi hāngkhavai leikhala?” da hānga.
Zālala, manglala, kasāsā saikora Vareli tekmatei khavai sālu.
Jihudibinglila, Greekbinglila kala Varewui churchlila makhanang ngasakalu.
Ina ot kasā kachiva̱li iwui māng maphāla saikorawui tongzā khavai kala athum ningyāng ungkhavai hotkhana chithada nathumnala sālu, chieina athumli huikhuipaira.
Kha ina nathumli theishingkhui ngasakngai kaja Khristana mi kachiva̱wui akhavāna, gaharana preiva̱wui akhavāna kala Varena Khristawuina.
Yarui kazipli kuirunlaga seihā kasā kala pao hākashoka mayara chi Khristali maishi khangasakna.
Kala yarui khokharum kazipli sha̱naona makuirunla seihā kasā kala khamatui chi gaharali maishi khangasakna; makuirunakha ā eina sam sitā kahai sha̱nao chi khangatei maleimana.
Sha̱naona makuirunakha awui sam chichaphaoranu. Sha̱naowui vang sam sikatā kala kachichāp hi chamkhamalā sāhaogada kuirunphalungra.
Mayarnaova makuirunmana kaja ava Varewui amahā kala tekhamatei china, kha sha̱naova mayarnaowui tekhamateina.
Kaja mayarnao hi sha̱naowui eina sākakhui maningmana. Kha sha̱nao hi mayarnaowui eina sākakhuina.
Mayarnao hi sha̱naowui vang kasā maningmana, kha sha̱nao hi mayarnaowui vang kasāna.
Chiwui vang eina kazingraobingwui vang eina shanaona kuirunngayia.
(Chithālala, Prohowuili shanaoranu, mayarnaola kachicha ningkhan masapaimana;
kaja sha̱nao hi mayarnaowui eina sākakhui thada, mayarnao hi sha̱naona kapharāna. Kala ot saikora hi Varena shokkhangasakna.)
Yarui khokharumpamli sha̱naona makuirunla seihā kasā hi ngayikā mangayikhala kaji nathum khalatta chukmaja̱yanglu.
Mayarnaona sam kaphung hi kakhayak otna da mikumowui khangachānala theingasaka.
Kha sha̱naowui vanga sam kasang hi matha khavaina, awui kuili faror khavai khamina.
Kha hiwui pongli kachikathāna ngayātkhangai leiakha hili lāngda ithumwui alungli kala churchwui khokharumlila khangatei zatkhanā maleiluimana.
Ara ina hāngki kaji hiliya nathumli masongaimana kaja khorum khavai nathumna kakazip tharan phāmei khavai masāla zakshimei khavai sai.
Rimeikapta nathumna church akha sāda kakazip tharan nathumwui ngachaili kaikhangarok lei da ili hānghaira, chi shitsangai.
(Mashunli nganingtit kajebingli ngahāhang eina theipai khavai nathumwui ngachaili kakaila leiphalungda leira)
Nathumna kazip khangarum chitharan Prohowui phākachizāt kakhui maningmana.
Kaja nathumwui phakazāli mangarai ngarokla phazāhaoda kaikhava thomalathao, kaikhava mathothuwa.

Nathumwui phāshak phazā khavai shim maleithulā? Chi maningakha nathumna Varewui churchli makachāplā kala kachāmbingli khayak khavai kasāla? Ili khi hānglu jikhala? Hiwui vang nathumli solu kajila? Maningphutmana, masolakmara.
Vareli ningkashi mijanghailaga serkhaida hānga, “Iwui phasā hi nathumwui vangna, hi ili phaningung khavai sālu.”
Chithada sāda zākup kahaiwui thili tengkotla khuida hānga, “Tengkot hi iwui asheeli khalei kadhara tuingashitna. Nathumna hi mangkachida ili phaningung khavai sālu.”
Chieina kachikathāna mangayila shaiphāphā mangphāphākha Prohowui phasā eina asheeli makhao khangasakwui vang khayon mira.
Kachichā khalatta shaingayiya, mashaingayimana kaji machuklaga khamui chi shairanu kala tengkotwui chi mangranu.
Kaja kachikathāna khamui kashai kala tengkotwui eina khamang chitharan hi Prohowui phasāna da matheishingkhuila shaiakha kala mangakha a khalattawuitungli bichar sākhavaina.
Chiwui vang nathumwui ngachaili kachungkhana khangazanla ngazana, kakazāla kazai, kala kaikha thihaira.
Kha ithum kachichā khalattana machukkazaklaga shaiakha ithumli bichar masāmara.
Okathuili mayonrum khavai Prohona ithumwuitungli pāng parda hāngmachinhaira.
Ivānaobing nathumna Prohowui phākachizāt kasā tharan akha eina akha ngarai ngaroklu.
Kachikathāna thaiakha shim eina zāphungda rāranu; chieina nathum saikora kakazip tharan malungkhavāt masamphangmara. Apong khangatateibing chiya I kharā chitharan ngazekminaora.
Ivānaobing, Manglā Katharawui lemmet pongli nathumna khangahān chi ina nathumli theishingkhui ngasakngai.
Nathum shitkasanga mi mangasāranglakha manglā makazanga meoma̱bingli khorumda khangui shongfali zatsai kaji nathumna thei.

Ina nathumli theishingkhui ngasakngai kaja Varewui Manglāna thankhami mi khipānakha “Jishuli khonkashi ngasāranu” da mahāngngayaomana, kala Manglā Katharana mangasomiakha khipānakha “Jishu hi Prohona” da mahāngphatrarmana.
Manglārinwui lemmet ngateida ngavai, chi Manglā Katharana khamina.
Otram khangatha̱ ayur kachungkha lei, kha akhamāng kaje Proholi khangatha̱na.
Ot kasāli khayar ayur tarākhaya, kha saikora sākhangasaka Vare chiya akhamānga.
Mi katongawui vang phākhavai mi ava̱va̱li ngasokhami apong ngatateida chitheimi.
Mi akhali Manglā Katharana thangkhamei mi kala khangatei akhali ngaraikachā Manglā china awor mi,
khangatei akhali ngaraikachā Manglā china Khristali shitsang khavai pangshap, katei akhali akhamāng kaje Manglā china kazat raimi khavai pangshap,

khangatei akhali matakhak kahai ot sākhavai, khangatei akhali marānkhami, khangatei akhali manglāwuina, maningmana kaji theishap khavai pangshap, khangatei akhali tuiyur matuikashap kala khangatei akhali khalatkashap pangshap mi.
Kha hi akhamāng kaje ngaraikachā Manglā china kasāna. Ana ningkachāng athishurda mi kachiva̱li lemmet ngateida mi.
Manglā akhamāngna ithum saikorali phasā akha sāda ra̱hikmi—kaja Jihudiranu, Gentileranu, raoranu, ningkhān kahaibingranu— ithum saikorali Manglā akhali mangrum ngasaka.
Phasā hi akai akhamāng eina masāmana, kha tarākha eina sākhui.
Pheina, “I pāng maningthukada phasāwui akai maningmana” da kahāng chieina phasāwui akai maningthuwa kaji maningmana.
Kala khanāna. “I mik maningthukada phasāwui akai maningmana,” da kahāng chieina phasāwui akai maningthuwa kaji maningmana.
Phasā katonga mikmāngsi kaja khi eina shaura? Kala khanāsersi kaja khi eina nganamura?
Varena awui ningkachāng athishurda phasālungli akai ngatateida sāmi kahaina.
Saikora chi phasākai akhamāng sāhaosi kaja kachili phasā kaho leirakhala?
Hithada sāda akai tarākha leilala phasā akhamānga.
Mikna pāngli “Ina nali masāvaimana” da mahāngpaimana. Kala kuina pheili, “Ina nali masāvaimana” da mahāngpaimana.
Lakhashong phaningakha ngazanmeiya da kaphaning akai chi mazangla ot masāpaimana.
Khayākālak majimana kaji phasākaili khayākashi mida sakta sai kala ngathumki kaje phasākaili sakmeida khui.
Chitheikapai akaibingva chi darkar masāmana. Kha teokhamei phasākaibingli hakkhamei khayākakā mida Varena phasā hi ayuk-ayan unglak eina semmi.
Chiwui vang eina phasāli ngakai khangarok maleimana, kha akai akhana akhawui vang phaningmi ngaroka.
Phasāwui akai akha kazākha saikora chotruma, akai akhali khayākashi miakha saikora mathānruma.

Varena churchwui alungli saikora hi kachichāwui pam ngarānmi: rimeikapta paokazata, kakhaneli marān, kakathumali ojā; chiwui thili matakhak kahai kasaa, chiwui thili kazāt raikhame, ngachonkhame, mawunwo, kala tuiyār tarākha khamatuia kapangsangmi.
Saikora paokazatala? Saikora marānla? Saikora ojāla? Mi kachiva̱ matakhak kahai ot saserla?
Saikora kazāt raikhami lemmet leila? Saikora tuiyur matuilā? Saikora tuiyur khalatmeserla?
Kha hili juikhameiya lemmet chili malungchangtha̱lu.
Saikorawuitungli mathāmeikapkaje chi hina.

Ina phongkhamiwui pangshap leilala, matheikharar khangathuma matakhak kahai kala awor saikora theishingkhuishaplala, kala shitkasang tongtinghaida kaphung khāngthuishaplala, leikashi maleiakha I khikha maningmana.
Ina iwui khalalei miserhailala kala iphasā eina tangda meili chichothailala, leikashi maleiakha I khikha matongkhuimana.
Leikashina ningzingharingthei kala lumashanthei; leikashina mikpaikashi kala khalatkaso mavaimana,
khayāning manganingmana kala achei-arei makathei otsak masāmana; khalattawui vang maphaningmana; kateili malungmavāt ngasakmana lah malungla mavātmana;
khalāng otli mamathānmana, kha khamashungli mathāna.
Leikashina ot saikora phungmi; saikora shitsanga, saikora chihāna; saikora ja̱mi.
Leikashi hi katang makhavaiana. Khamarānla shimānhaora; tuiyur khamatuila ngasāmhaora; theithangkhameila shimānhaora.
Kaja ithumli mikahai lemmet, theithangkhameila, khamarānla ngakaingakāsera;
kha kākashunga chi kharā chitharan makākashung chi shimānhaora.
Ina nganuilakha naoshinao thada matui, naoshinaowui ningphanin eina phaninga, naoshinao thada machuka; Ina rarkahai eina naoshinaowui acham chi horhaowa.

Khikhalajila arui ithumna ka̱lāra̱ngayotli mamachā eina thei, kha chiwui thili mai eina mai theira. Arui ina ngakai-ngakāda katheimaya; kha chiwui thili ana ili theishingkhui kahai thada inala ali theishingkhuira.
Chieina shitkasang, kachihān, kala leikashi; kathum hi leichinga: kala chiwui ngachaili leikashina mataimeikapa.
Leikashi hi nathumwui kharin ngasā ngasaklu. Manglāna khami lemmetbingwui ngachaili mataimeikapta marānkhami chili kahaolu.
Tuiyur khamatuia chi mikumoli maningla Vareli khamatuina, kaja khipānakha awui tui chi matheirarmana. Kha Varewui kathuka tui chi Manglāwui pangshapna matui khangasakna.
Chithā-ilala phongkhami chiya mibingli tamkachitheina kala athumli khangachon, kakatom kala ringphāmei, mathānmei khavai kasāna.
Tuiyur khamatuia chiya akhalatta katheimaya, kha phongkhami chiya church katongali ngachonmi.
Nathum saikorali tuiyur khangatei matui ngasakngai kha phongkhami lemmet khaleia sāngasakngaimei. Kaja tuiyur khamatui chi khalatkhame maleiakha church katongawui vang kānkhanā maleimana.

Ivānaobing, ina nathumli tuiyur eina rāmatuida nathumna iwui eina kānkhanā samphangrala? Varena phongkhami awor pao hākashok kala tamkachithei hibing hi ina makhuirāsāsi kaja nathumna kateokhala kānkhanā masamphangmara.
Manglā makhangavā sipa̱, tingteilā kathā eina tangda kachui khanem akhon mathālak eina makhongakha khilaa kasākhala kaji khipāna theira?
Kala talla̱ kakhongana mi khangahotwui talla̱khon mathālak eina makhongakha raili vāusa kajina da khipāna theira?
Chithada sāda tuiyur eina khamatui chi shenglak eina mashākhuiakha khipāna theirakhala? Matuiphāphā khanganao thāhaora.
Okathuili tuiyur kachungkha lei kha kakhalat makhalei tuiyur akhala maleimana:
Ina makashā tui eina mi akhana rāngazekakha a kha̱minao thāhaowa, kala awui vang ila kha̱minao thāhaowa.
Nathumna Manglāwui lemmet samphangngaihaogada, ot saikorawuitungli phāmeikap kaje church sākakāli khangachona lemmetbing chi shichinlu.
Tuiyur khamatuia china kakhalat mathālak eina meikhaimishap khavai seihā sālu.
Kaja chikathā tuiyur eina ina seihā sākha imanglāna seihā sai kha iwui ningva chili maleimana.
Chithākha ina khi sāra? Ina imanglā eina seihā sāra, ining einala sāra; imanglā eina laa sāra, ining einala laa sāra.
Nana Vareli ningkashiwui seihā kasāli manglāmāng eina sākha, khokharumli kazanga mibing china kathada nawui seihā kasāli “Amen” sāngrakhala? Kaja nana seihā kasā chi kateina bhap matāmana.
Nana mathālak eina seihā sālala kateiwui vang khikha khangachon maleimana.
Nathum saikorali ina tuiyur chungmeida khamatuiwui vang Vareli ningshi.
Kha churchwui khokharumliva tuiyurwui eina tuikhur thingthing hāngkhui kajiwui vanga theikhuikapai tuikhur phangāmāng kahāngna phāmei.
Ivānaobing nathumwui chukhamja̱li naoshinao mathaalu. Makaphā otli angangnao thada sālu kha chukhamaja̱li khararnao thada sālu.
Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Ngateihang kahai tuiyur khamatuia mibing
kala ngalei khangateiwui mibingwui morchai eina ina iwui mibingli matuira,
chithālala athumna ili manganāsangmara da
Prohona hānga.”

Chiwui vang eina tuiyur khamatui hi shitkasangbingwui vang maningla mashitkasangbingwui machutkhui khavaina. Kha Varewui phongkhami hiya mashitkasangbingwui vang maningla shitkasangbingwui machutkhui khavaina.
Chithākha church katongana kaziplakha saikorana tuiyur ngatateida matuiakha ayarwui mibingna kala mashitkasangbingna rāyanglaga kapāna majimarala?
Kha mi kachiva̱na phongsi kaje mashitkasangbingna kala ayarwui mina kashā samphanglaga awui morei phaningkhui ngasakra. Ana shākakhui china ali bichar sāra.
Awui ngathum kahai kaphaning chi phongyānghaora, kala kui mashungzangda Vareli khorumra kala “Kachangkhat Varena nathumli ngasoda lei” da ana hāngphatra.
Kachikathāna tuiyur matuiki kaji leiakha khani kathumli malāngaranu, kala ava̱va̱na matuida khangatei akhana meikhaimiranu.
Kha tui chi meikhaimishapa maleisaakha churchlungli kasaikha pamda a khalattali kala Vareli ngazekranu.
Varewui pao samkaphanga mi khani kathumna matuiranu kala athumna kahāng chi kateibingna machukranu.
Kha pamda khaleia akhana Varewui eina pao samphangakha matuikasāpā chi ngasāmhaoranu.
Nathum saikora ngatakta matuisera, chithada tamkhui ngarokta kasatsang ngarokra.
Marānbingwui manglā chi marānbingna kasingna.
Kaja Vare hi pa̱khangapāwui Vare maningmana, kha chingri kahaiwuina.
Katharabingwui church saikorali kasā thada
sha̱naobingna khokharumli kasaikha pamranu. Ainli hāngkahai thada athum mamatuipaimana, kha khangachona sāda pamranu.
Athumna theikhangai leiakha gahara ngarāli shimli ngahānranu. Sha̱naona churchlungli khamatui kakhayak otna.
Varewui tui chi nathumwui eina kharāla? Chi maningakha nathummāngli kharāla?
Kachikathā akhana a paokazata akhana kala manglāli khangaphuma mina da phaningakha ina nathumli kakapi hi Varewui ningkhamina da ana theiphalungra.
Kha ana hi khikha maningmana jiakha alila khikha maningmana jilu.
Chieina ivānaobing, Varewui pao hākashokli ningsanglu; chithālala tuiyur khamatuibingli mahaphailu.
Ot saikora achei-arei theilak eina kala ayat unglak eina sāphalungra.
Ivānaobing, ara ina nathumli hāshok kahai paokaphā chi nathumna shitsangda nganingtit kahai chiwui apongli phaningung ngasakngai.
Ina nathumli hāshok kahai paokaphā chili shitsangtitakha china nathumli huimira. Chi maningsi kaja nathumwui shitkasang chi aremana.
ali chizana kala kakathumathang ringshok ngasaka,
kala Peterli samphanga, chiwui thili sākhangatha̱ katongali samphanga.
Chiwui thili awui thikashura shāphangā langdali akhashida samphanga, athumwui ngachaili kaikha thihailala kharing zangkapta lei.
Chiwui thili Jamesli samphanga, chiwui thili paokazat saikorali samphanga.
Kaja paokazatbingwui ngachaili I teomeikapa. Varewui churchli yankasaiwui vang ili paokazata dala mahorānmana.

Kha Varewui lukhamashanna ili hokhuida hithada khaleina. Ana hokakhui chi arema maningmana. Lakhashong phaningakha paokazatbingwui ngachaili ina pangmeithuida ot sai. Chi ina kasā maningmana, kha Varewui lukhamashanna sākhangasakna.
Chithada sāda iwui eina nijilala, athumwui eina nijilala chi ithum saikorana hākashokna kala chili nathumna shitkasangna.
Khrista kathiwui eina ringshoka kaji pao ithumna hāshokta leilaga kathada nathum kaikhana kathebing maringluimara da hāngpairakhala?
Chi mashungsi kaja Khristala maringshokhaisāmara.
Khrista maringshokhaisāsi kaja ithumna hākashok pao hi aremana kala nathumwui shitkasang eina tangda aremana.

Chili lāngmeida Khristali kathiwui eina ringshok ngasakhaira kaji hi ithumna shākhi sāhaoda, Varewui pongli kakapik thāhaowa, kha kathebing chi maringshokluimana jisi kaja Varena Khristali maringshok ngasakmara.
Kaja kathebing chi maringshokmara jisi kaja Khristala maringshokhaisāmara.
Kala Khristali maringshok ngasakhaisāsi kaja nathumwui shitkasang chi aremana kala nathum moreilungli ngaphumchingda lei.
Chithāsi kaja Khristali shitsangda thikahaibing chila kashimānli tai.
Ithumna Khristali kachihān hi okathui hi eina tangmara jisi kaja okathui hili ithumli lāngmeida chāmkhamei maleiluimara.
Kha makhangapata tui chiya Khristali kathiwui eina ringshok ngasakhaira kaji hi kathebingna ringluishitra kajiwui ning nganung khangasakna.
Mi akhawui eina kathi kaho hi shoka, chithada sāda ringkhalui hila mi akhawui einana.
Adamli ngasoda saikora kathi thada, Khristali ngarum kahaiwui vang saikora ringluira.
Kha mi kachiva̱ ringkhalui hi khari khanao ngavāra, chiya rimeikapta Khrista, chiwui thili awui latkharā tharan awui ngasā kahaibing,
chiwui thili khangachang atam rāra, chitharan khamungabing, sāshap kala pangshap saikorali Khristana yuihailaga wungram chi Avāva̱ Varewui pāngli horsangmira.
Varena yangkashe saikorali yuihaida awui pheinai masāranglakha eina tangda Khristana awunga sāda mungra.
Naomeikapta shimān ngasaki kaji yangkashe chi kathi chilina.
Hithada kapihaida lei, “Varena ot saikora awui pheizingli haimihaira.” Kha “Ot saikora awui pheizingli haimihaira” kaji hili Vare mazangmana kaji hi tharlak eina thei.
Kha Varena ot saikora Khristali yuingasak kahaiwui thili Anaomayara khalatta Vareli hamsangra kala Varena ot saikorawuitungli mungra.
Chi maningakha kathebingwui mathun ra̱kahik khuikhamiwui kakhalat khikhala? Kathebing maringphalungluimara jiakha khisāda athumwui mathun sāda ra̱hikmirakhala?
Ringkhalui maleimana jiakha khisāda ithumna ka̱lākashi phungchingrakhala?
Ivānaobing, I thangkachida kathili ngasungchinga. Proho Jishu Khristali ngarumhaoda nathumwui vang ina lāngsongaida hāngkaphatna.
Phasāwuishong phaningsi kaje ina Ephesusli shangkha̱li khangama̱ chi khi kannārakhala? Kathe maringluimara jisi kaje mibingna kahāng thada “Akhama thihaola honthei, aja zākhui mangkhuisa” jira.
Maminam ngasakalu, “Makaphā ngasotnaona kaphā mili shimān ngasaka.”
Mashun phākhuida morei masāluialu. Nathum kaikhana Vareli makatheiwui vang khayakvairanu da kahāngna.
Mi akhana, “Kathada kathebingli ringluingasakhala, kachikathā phasārakhala? da ngahānlapai.”
He mangkhama̱! Nana khaling atha chi mathiakha makharshokmana.
Kala nana khaling chi athāmaya, chi kehulapai, athā khangateilapai, mapung phakahaiya arong maningmana.
Kha Varena ngarān kahai athishurda athā kachiva̱wui eina awui arong shonngasaka.
Manglākapai saikorawui asā mangaraichāmana, mikumowui ngatei, sāyurbingwui ngatei, vānaobingwui ngatei kala khaihbingwuila ngatei.
Kazinglila, okathuilila asā khangava lei. Kha khalei ayāyāva̱wui azak khamathā mangaraichasermana.
Zimikwui khamathā akhana, sirābingwui khamathāna ngatei, kala sirā eina sirāla khamathā ngatei ngaroka.
Phasā chi kachizan tharan zakshiya kha ringkhalui tharan tekhamateina.
Kachizan tharan asā khavai phasāna, ringkhalui tharan manglāwui phasāna. Asā khavai phasā leihaoda manglāwui phasāla vaiphalungra.
Hithada kapihaida lei; “Mikumo khare Adamli manglākapai akha sāda semkhui” kha khanaowa Adamva kharing khame manglāna.
Manglāna marimana kha phasāna ri, kala chiwui thili manglāna naowa.
Ngalei eina sākakhuiya khare Adam hi okathuiwuina, kakhane Adam hi kazingramwui einana.
Okathuiwui ngasāda khaleibing chiya ngalei eina sākakhuiya ā kathāna, kha kazingramwui chiya kazing eina kharā ā kathāna.
Ithumla ngalei eina sākakhui mi chiwui azak kakhui thada kazing eina kharā ā chiwui azakla khuira.
Ivānaongarā, ina kahāng chi hikathāna kaja phasā khavai kala ashee kazang china Varewui wungramli mazangrumpaimara; kala shimānkapai china mashimānkapai masamphangpaimana.
Shimankapai phasā chi mashimānkapai phasā ngasāhaora. Thikapai chi mathikapai onhaora.
Shimankapai chi mashimānkapai, thikapai chi mathikapai onngasak kahaiwui thili
“Kathili khayuiana mayuisanghaira” da kapi kahai chi ungshungra.
He kathi, nawui khaler kali lei?”
Kathina kathiri hi moreiwui eina samphanga kala moreina awui pangshap ainwui eina samphanga.
Kha Proho Jishu Khristawui mangā eina yuikhangasaka Vare chili ningshi.
Chiwui vang eina leikashe ivānaobing, nganingtitlu. Nana Proholi otram khangatha̱ hi arema mangasāmara kaji theida otram khangatha̱li marekta sāchinglu.
Haptā kachiva̱wui kharethang kachichāwui mikashap chi phaishokhaolu, chithākha I kharā tharan mangashailuimara.
I kharā tharan nathumna kapang kahaia mibing chili kachitheiwui chithi kapisangmira kala nathumna ngashaikhui kahai lan chi Jerusalemli khuivāmi khavai chihovāra.
Kala I khavā phāmeira jiakha athum ili ngasovāpaira.
Ina nathumli sangda ngasopamngai, sikachāng peilapai; chieina iwui kha̱ramvātli nathumna ngachonmipaira.
Ina khamakān atamli kasha̱khamang samkaphang chi masāngaimana. Prohona mayāmiakha sāngmeida ngasopamngai.
Hili ili khangasunga mi kachungkha leilala khamathā ot sapai khavai khamong mashālak eina shomihaira.
Khipānakha ali mashitkasang masaalu. Kha awui kazazatli mahapkhano khavai ngachonmida iwuili hanung ngasakmilu, kaja ā avānaobingli ngasoungra da honda lei.
Ot saikora leikashi eina sālu.
Ara, ivānaobing, nathumna thei kaja Achaiali Stephanas eina awui shimkhur hi shitsangkhareli zanga, ashi hi katharabingli ngachonmikatheia shimkhurna.
Ivānaobing, hikathā mibingwui kathān kala athumli ngasoda otsakruma kala otram ngatha̱kharuma athumwui thi shurkhavai kapona.
Stephanas, Fortunatus, kala Achaicuslong kharāwui vang ringphālaka. Athumli kathei nathumli kathei thai.
Nathumwui ning ringphā khangasak thada ilila ringphā ngasaka; hikathā mibingli songayi.
Hili khalei ivānao saikoranala shālam chiphunli. Shimkhurwui leikashi thada nathum akha eina akha leishi ngaroklu.
Khrista Jishuwui mangā eina iwui leikashi nathum saikorali leichingranu.
Ithumwui Avāva̱ Varivara kala Proho Jishu Khristana nathumli lukhamashan kala chingri kahai tāshungmiranu.
Ana ithumwui kachotkachāngli ringphā ngasakmi, chiwui vang eina ithumli Varena ringpha khangasak chi tākam eina ithumnala kakhanang samkaphanga athum chili ringpha ngasakmishapa.
Khristawui kakhanang tarākha ithumla phungkhangarum chithada Khristawui mangā eina ringkaphālila kachungkha ringphāruma.

Ithumna kachotkachāng samphangakha chi nathumli ngachon khavai kala kahui samphang khavaina. Ithumli ngachonmihaiakha nathumli ngachonmi kahaina kala ithumna kachotkachāng khāngkahai tākam eina nathumla khāngthei khavai pangshap mihaira.
Ithumna nathumli kachihān chi mangacheilakmana; kaja nathumna ithumli kakhanang phungkharum thada ringkaphālila mathānruma kaji ithumna thei.
Ivānaobing, Asiali ithumna kachotkachāng samkaphang chi nathumli phaningung ngasakngai. Ithumwuitungli parkahai kachotkachāng chi haknai; kala ritnāhaoda ithum ringrada machihānsāmana.
Shaothat khavai hukum mihao-eili da phaningsai; kha otshot chi ithum khalattali machihānla katheli ringkhangasaka Vareli chihānthei khavai ngasāsai.
Chiyakha ka̱lākashiwui eina ana kanshokmi, ana kanmiluira kala ana kanmichingra kaji ithumna chihāntitta lei.
Nathumna ithumwui vang seihāsak eina ngachonmi. Chithada sāda ithumwui vang seihā sāmi kahai saikora ngahānkāmira kala Varena ithumli somira, kala mi kachungkhana ithumwui vang Vareli ningshira.

Mikumowui thangkhameina maningla Varewui lukhamashanwui pangshap eina ithumna okathui hili mataimeikapta nathum eina ithumwui khangashik hi Varena khami ningkhakasā kala ningkathar eina munga kaji hi ithumwui mashun-makhuina chitheikhamiwui vang ithumna langsoi.
Nathumna pākhuishapki kaji kala theishingkhuishapki kajimāng ithumna kagapina

Kha nathumna ithumli teomeikha bhap tākahai thada, naoda nathumla bhap tāserhaora da phaninga, chieina ithumwui Proho Jishuwui Zimiksholi ithumna nathumwui vang lāngsokapai thada nathumna ithumwui vang eina lāngsopaira.
Ina hi theishingkakhuiwui vang nathumwuili rāri khavai phaningsai, chi nathum ringphāmei mahaimei khavaina.
Judea khavāli nathumwui khangachon samphang khavai ina Macedoniali khavāshongla, khaungshongla nathumli rāsamphang khavai phaningda lei.
Iwui khangarān hi ngacheizarnai da phaningla? Kala okathui ot kasā thada “Ya” jikhashi “Ngga” jikhashi kaji thada phaningla?
Varena khamashung tui khamatui thada, ina nathumli “Ninglapai” “Maninglapai” kaji tui mahānglakmana.
Silvanusna nilala, Timothyna nilala, ina nilala tamchitheida khalei Varewui Naomayara Jishu Khrista hiya “Ninglapai” “Maninglapai” kaji maningmana. Kha awuili Varewui “Ninga” kaji lei.
Kaja Varewui ngashit kahahaili “Ninga” kaje chi ana. Chiwui vang eina Vareli tekmatei khavai Jishu Khristawui mingli ithumna “Amen” kajina.
Nathum ithum Khristali okthuirum khavai Varena kasāna.
Ana ithumli mahor nammihaira kala naodala sokhami mira kajiwui khudam sāda ithumwui wuklungli Manglā Kathara sangmida ngashitmihaira.
Vare iwui shākhina, chiya nathumli masheikhautkhangaiwui vang ina Corinthli makharāna.
Nathumna khili shitsangrakhala da hāngchithei khavai kasā maningmana; nathumwui shitkasang ngatarda lei kaji thei. Nathumwui ringphā khavai ithumna sakkharumaya.
Nathum makhananglui khavai I marāluimara da machukhaira.
Kaja ina nathumli khanang ngasakhaiakha ili khipāna mathān ngasakrakhala? Khanang ngasak kahai nathum maningla katei maleimana.
Ili mathān khangasakbingli makhanang ngasak khangaiwui vang marāngaimada chithi hi kagapina. Kaja ina ringkaphā tharan nathumla ringphāra da shitsanga.
Ina ningchotlak eina chāra̱ tāda kakapi hi nathumli khanang khavai maningmana, kha nathumli kayākha leishikhala kaji theikhui khavaina.
Kachikathāna kachikathā akhali khanang ngasakakha, chi imāngli maningmana, kha apong akha eina nathum saikoralina (Ina hithada kahāng hi nathumli khāda mahāngkhangaiwui vangna).
Awuitungli yaruina ngazeklaga mayā khangarokwui tandi khami china shapa.
Chithālala nathumna ali pheomiphalungra kala katomphalungra, chithākha wukkhanangnā kahaiwui eina a mashimānmara.
Kala nathumna ali leishikachangkhata kaji hi theikhui ngasaklu.
Nathumna iwui kahāng kayākha nganākhala kaji theikhui khavai chithi chi kagapina da hāngpai.
Khalāng sākahai mili nathumna pheomiakha inala pheomi, kaja ina pheokhami chitharan nathumwui mangā eina Khristawui miktāli pheokhamina.
Chieina Satanna ithumli mayuimara kaja awui khangarān chi khikhala da ithumna thei.
Kha ivānao Titusli masamkaphangwui vang I ningkhariklākhaowa. Chiwui vang athumli kapāng shālam sākhuilaga Macedoniali vāhaowa.
Vareli ningshi, kaja Khristawuilungli Varena ithumli khayui samphang ngasaka kala ithumli shichinlaga nganamkaphā anganam thada Khristawui pongli apam kachiva̱li ngayaovai.
Kaja huikhuida khalei kala shimānhaokida khalei athumli ithum hiya Khristana Vareli kachigat nganamkaphā anganam kathāna.
Shimān kahai athumli ithum hiya kathinganam kathāna, khangateibingwui vang kharingwui anganamna. Chithākha khipāna sararrakhala?
Ithum Varewui chānpaoli paisor eina kaphaning athum kathā maningmana. Kha Varena kachihowui vang Khristawui rao sāda ithumna ningtharlak eina awui miktāli matuiya.
Nathum hiya mi kachiva̱na pākhuikapai kala theikhuikapai ithumwui ningli kapisang kahai chithi kathāna.
Lairik hi Khristana kapisanglaga ithumna kachiphuna kaji chitheilu. Hi lungphekli muk eina kapi kahai maningmana, kha kharinga Varewui Manglā eina miwui wuklungli kapi kahaina.
Khristawui mangā eina Vareli shitkasangwui vang tui hi kahāngna.
Ithumna ithum khalattawui eina khikhala sākashap maleimana, kha sākashap hi Varewui eina kharāna.
Kapi kahai ainwui maningla kha Manglāwui kadhara tuingashit chiwui vang otram ngatha̱ ngasak kashap pangshap chi ana mi. Ainna thingasaka kha Manglāna ringngasaka.
Manglāwui otsak chi kayākha hakmahāda tekmateimeirakhala?
Masāvaikapai arah khuikharā chi tekmateiakha, kahui khuirākhamiwui otsak chi kayākha tekmateimeirakhala?
Aruihonwui tekhamateina hormeikhārhaoda, mashimānki kaji khare kachāngwui tekhamatei chi shimānhaira.
Shimānki kaji ot tekmateiakha makashimān ot chiya kayākha tekmateimeirakhala?
Kachihān khalei chiwui vang ithumna kapingna.
Mai kahor kashimān chi Israelnaobingna mathei khavai Mosesna maili fakakham thada ithumna masāmana.

Athumwui ning chi kachangkhat farorhai kala aja rāshungda athumna kachama tuingashit kapā tharan athumwui mikli farorchingda lei. Khiwui vangkhala kaja Khristali kazanga mi chimāngli fakharor chi lānkhamina.
Arui eina tangda Moseswui ningkhami chi kapā tharan athumwui ningli fororchingda lei.
Kha hithada kapihaida lei, “Prohowui mangāli yangkakā tharan awui fakharor chi lānmihaira.”
Hili “Proho” kaji hi Manglā kajina, kala Prohowui Manglā khaleipamli ningkhān lei.
Kala mai mafakhamla awui tekhamatei yangda khalei ithum saikorava tekmateikhangai tekmateida awui sakrin thada ngacheihaora; kaja hi Mangla eina khaleia Prohowui eina kharāna.
Chithada sāda Varewui lukhamashan eina otram khangatha̱ hi samphanghaoda ithumna ning suikatā maleimana.

Khayākhamalā ngathumngateida kasā ot saikora horhaida ithumna mareimarā ot masāmana. Varewui tuila mashongachei khavai mahotnāmana, kha mashun chi phonglāk eina kachithei eina Varewui miktāli kachithei thada mi kachiva̱wui mashun-makhuili theikhuipai khavai ithum khalatta kachitheina.
Kaja ithumna hākashok paokaphā chi rānkham kahai leiakha, chi shimānhaokida khaleibingwui vangmāngmaya,
apuk-apaga hiwui makapha varenaona mashitkasangbingwui ning ngapeo ngasakhaoda, Varewui sakrin kakhuia Khristawui tekhamateiwui paokaphawui kahor chi mathei ngasakthuwa.
Ithumna hākashok hi ithumwui tui maningmana, kha Jishu Khrista hi Prohona kala Jishuwui vang ithum nathumwui raona da tamkachitheina.
“Tangkhamangwui eina kahor shokranu” da kahānga Vare china Khristawui maili Varewui tekhamateiwui kahor chi theikhui khavai ithumwui wuklungli hormihaira.
Tha-ilala manglārinwui lan hi khalei ithum hi ngaleiham kathāna, kaja juikhamataia pangshap chi Varewuina ithumwui maningmana da chithei khavaina.
Apong kachiva̱li ithumli khanang ngasaka, kha ning matheng ngasakmana; pa̱ngapā ngasaka, kha khāsut mahai ngasakmana.
Rekhareklala horkahai maleimana; hortāhailala mashimān ngasakmana.
Thangkachida shimānkapai ithumwui phasā hili Jishuwui kathi chi khuiphungchinga, chieina awui kharing chi ithumwui phasāli theipaira.
Ithumwui shimānkapai phasā hi eina awui kharing chi theikhuipai khavai Jishuwui vang ithum thikapai ka̱lāshat samphangchinga.
Chieina kathina ithumwuilungli kala kharingna nathumwuilungli ot sāda leili.
Kaja Khristali ringkhangasaka a china ithumlila, nathumlila Jishuli ngasoda ringngasakra kala awui mangāli vāngasakra.
Ot saikora hi nathumwui vāngna; kala lukhamashan hi mi chungmeidali vāshungda chungmeida masochikata Varewui tekhamateili ningshira.
Chiwui vang eina ithumna ning masuitāmana. Ayarwui khangacha chi kashimān thālala alungshongwui khangacha chi thangkachida dharngasakchinga.
Aruihon kakhanang kateokha samkaphang hiliva katang makhavai tekhamatei chi samphang khavai ithum wui vang ngarānmida lei.
Kachiwui vangkhala kaja ithumna mik eina kathei ot chili mayangla makathei otli yanga. Kaja mik eina kathei otbing chiya kasha̱khawui vangna, kha makathei otbing chiya katang makhavaina.
Ithumna thei kaja okathuili khalei ithumwui shim hi shimānhailala kazingramli mashimānla leichingki kaji miwui pāng eina makasā Varena ngarānkhami ithumwui pamkhavai shim akha lei.
Hili ithumna ngahuipamda kazingramwui shimli vāpān khavai kahaochinga,
chili khamahong eina maokthuimara.
Ithumna kachonshim hili leilakha kachotkachāngwui vang ningreikhāsuthai: kaja ithumli mangavaimimara kaji maningmana, kha mataimeida ngavaimi khavaina. Chieina shimānkapai phasā hi kharing onhaora.
Ithumli hi ngarānkhame chiya Manglā mida ngashitmi kahaia Vare china.
Chiwui vang ithumna atam kachida pingkashapna; ithumna phasārinlungli leilakha Prohowui eina tāthuihaira kaji thei.
Kaja ithumna shitkasang eina ringa, kathei eina maringmana.
Phasārin horhaida Proholi okthuirum khavai ithumna mangacheelakmana.
Chieina phasārinli okthuilala lah chiwui eina kānthuihailala awui ningyāng ungkhavai kasā hi ithumwui otna.
Ithum saikora Khristawui bicharli kānganingserphalungra, kala mi kachiva̱ ringlakha ana sākahai chiwui athishurda kaphā nilala, kashinilala sāman samphangra.
Chiwui vang eina Proholi ngacheekhangayi theida ithumna kateibinglila suikhui khavai ngarāna. Ithumli Varena theisera, kala nathumnala ningli theisera da shitsanga.
Nathum khalatta masochikatluishit khavai kahāng maningmana, kha ithumwui vang maiyālak eina alungliva khikha maninglaga ayarli langkasobingli nathumna ngahānkāshap khavai kachitheina.
Ithum kapā thada leiakha chi Varewui vāngna, lah ning mathingda leiakha chi nathumwui vāngna.
Khristawui leikashina ithumli kuinammi, khiwui vangkhala jilaga mi akhana katongawui vang thimihaira kaja kathili ithumla ngarumhaira.
Ana mi saikorawui vang thimi, hieina ringda khalei athumna athum khalattawui vang maringluila kha athumwui vang thimihailaga ringshok kahai awui vang ringranu.
Chiwui vang eina ithumna ara okathuiwui ningphanin eina mi khipālikha maphaningluimana. Atam akhali Khristali okathuiwui ningphanin eina phaningsai, kha ara chithada maphaningluimana.
Chiwui vang eina kachikathāna Khristali leiakha a kadhara pāngsemna; kachama chi kānthuihaira, yanglu; kadhara chi rāhaira.
Saikora hi Khristawui mangā eina ali ngashim khangasaka kala khangashimwui ot sākhavai ithumli otsin kachisina Varewui eina kharāsera;
chiya Varena Khristali zangda okathui hi ali ngashim ngasaka kala mikumowui khayonkhamāng mashānluila khangashim pao hi hāngkhavai ithumli horsangmihaira.
Kaja morei makhalei ali ithumwui vang eina morei phungngasaka, chiwui vang eina awui lungli ithum Varewui khamashung-khangaronga ngasāpai.
Vareli otsakruma ngasā kahaiwui vang nathumna samkaphanga lukhamashan chi arema mangasā ngasak khavai kapona.
Kaja Varena hānga:
“Khuisangmikapai atamli nathumwui tui shāmihaira;
huimi khavai zimiksho kharā tharan nathumli ngachonmihaira.”
Yanglu, arui khuisangmikapai atamna; arui huikhami zimikshona!
Ithumwui otram khangatha̱li khayon malei khavai khipākhawui shongfali hapkakhano masāmana.
Kha kakhananglila, kasak chitharānlila kala ka̱lākashi tharānlila, kachotkachāng phungda apong kachiva̱li ithumna Varewui otram mashungrik eina ngatha̱chithei.
Kashaola, phātop kazangla, khonkazārla, ot kasāla, makapila, kakhumla ithumna khānga.
Kathar eina, theikakhui eina, ja̱khami eina, lukhamashan eina, Manglā Kathara kala kachangkhat leikashiwui lungli
khamashung tui khamatui kala Varewui pangshaplungli wuiwui-yāyā khamashung khangarongwui khutlai sāda;
maishilala, maiyālala, solala, mashātlala, ithumli kakapik phenlala, khamashung tui matui.
Mina zeilala ithum mashun eina nganingchinga. Mina matheikhami thālala, theimisera; kathi thālala ringchingda lei, shaolala mashaothatmana;
khananglala ringphāchinga, chāmlala shānglak kahai thai, khikha maleilala, saikora vaisera.
Ithumna nathumli maleikashi maningmana.
Iwui naongarā thada ina nathumli kahāngna; ithumna leikashi chithada nathumla ithumli leishilu.
Mashitkasangabingli otrom maphungrumalu. Khamashung eina khayon khi khangarum leikhala? Kahor eina tangkhamang khi khangashik leikhala?
Khrista eina Belial khi mayā khangarok leikhala? Shitkasanga mi eina mashitkasanga mi khi ngarumpaikhala?
Varewui khorumshim eina meoma̱ khi mayā khangarok leikhala? Khikhalajila ithum kharinga Varewui shimna. Varena hithada hānga,
“Ina iwui mibingli ngasoda pamra kala athumli okthuirumra;
I athumwui Vare sāra,
kala athum iwui miyur sāra.”
“Athumwui eina yāmshoklu,
kala athumwui eina ngateihaolu.
Makathar ot masāza̱alu,
chithākha ina nathumli khuisangmira.
nathum iwui naongarā sāra, da
sāshapa Prohona hānga.”
Leikashebing ot saikora hi ithumli ngashitmihaira. Chiwui vang eina phasālila, manglālila mamakhao ngasakla Vareli khangachee eina ngasoda tharlak eina okthuisa.
ina nathumli khayon mikhavai hi kahāng maningmana, kha ina rida hānghaira kaja thilala thirip, ringlala ringrip jira da ithumwui ningli lei.
Nathumwuitungli iwui shitkasang haklak eina lei, nathumwui vang I langsongaishuna, iningli ringkaphāna pemtinghai, kakhanang kachungkha samphanglala mathānchinga.
Kha khangazanbingli ringphā khangasaka Vare china Titusli chihorāda ithumli ringphā ngasaka.

Kala kharāwui vāngmāng maningmana, kha nathumwui ngachaili leilakha ali nathumna ringphā khangasak chinala ithumli ringphā ngasaka. Nathumna ithumli theingailak eina kahon, nathumwui chapkhangachā, iwui vang nathumna chiyākha ningsangda phaningkhami saikora ana kahāng shālaga I mataimeida ringphāmeihaowa.
Nathumli wukkhanang khangasakwui vang ringkaphā maningmana; kha kakhananga nathumli ningngatei khangasakwui vang ringphai.
Varewui eina kharā malungkharing china huikhami samphang khavai ningli khangachei khuirai kala ningkakatat maleimana, kha okathuiwui ningkachotna thingasaka.

Kaja malungkharing chiwui vang Varena kayākha sāmihairakhala kaji theilu, kayākha ningtharda nathumwui mashun chitheihaira! Chiyākha ningkachot, chiyākha khangachee, makaphā kasāli tandi mikida, ningtongda phaning khangasak ot saikorali khangui maleilakla nathumna nganinghaira.
Chiwui vang ithumli ninglum ngasaka.
Ithummāngli maningmana; kha Titusli nathum saikorana kathada ngachonmikhala kaji ana hāngda ithum ringphāshunhaowa.
Ina nathumwui maramli lāngsolak eina ali hānghaira kala chiwui vang ili makhayak ngasakmana. Ithumna nathumli khamashung tui hāngchinga, chi tākam eina Titusli kahāng chi ungshunghaira.
Chieina nathum saikorawui kahāng khanganā, khangachee eina ngasoda ali samkaphang chi phaningungda ana mataimeida leishi.
Nathumli chihamchaokapai hi theida iwui ringkaphā hāngkhavai maleimana.
Ivānaobing, Macedoniawui churchbingli Varewui lukhamashan chitheimi kahai chi nathumlila theingasakngai.
Athumli yangkhui khavai kakhanang kachungkha eina chāng yanga. Kha athumwui kachām hailaklaga mingrairareo khamili khamathān hāngkhavai maleimana.
Kaja kachichāwui khalei athishurda mi, kala mikashap chili lāngmeida mingairareo eina miya da ina hāngshapa.
Shitkasangabingli khangachon khamili zangngasakmilu da ithumli saklak eina poi.
Rimeikapta athumna Proholi mi kala Varewui kaphaning athishurda ithumlila mi, hi ithumna machihānsālakmana.
Chiwui athishurda Titusna ot chi sāphokhaokada chi ana kupmi khavai ithumna ali pohaira.
Shitkasanglila, tuimatuilila, aworlila, ngachonkhamilila kala ithumli leikashilila mataimeithui kaji thada saikhalamlila nathumna mataimeithui khavai sālu.
Sāphalunglu da kahāng maningmana; kha akhana akhali ngachonmingairareo kahai chieina nathumwui leikashi kachangkhat machutkhui khavaina.
Proho Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan nathumna thei; kaja ana shānglaklala nathumwui vang eina chāmhaowa; awui kachām chi eina nathum shāngkhavaina.
Chieina mangasāmalu, kha kupkhavai sālu. Sāngairareo ngarankaphok thada kakup eina tangda ningsanglu, kala nathumwui khalalei chi khuishoklaga sālu.
Kachichawui khalei chi mingairareo miakha Varenala khuisangmira; makhalei chi milu majimana.
Khangateibingli chihohailaga nathummāngli kharit chiphunphalungra kaji maningmana.
Kha aruihon nathumwui tarākha khalei athishurda khangazanbingli ngachonngayiya. Athumna tarākha khalei tharan nathumwui makhalei atamli ngachonmira. Chithada sāda khanini ngaraichai.
Kathara tuili kapi kahai thada, “Kachungkha kazipkakhui china chungkhana mavaimana; kateokha samkaphang china teokhana maleimana.”
Ithumna nathumwmui vang samingairareo kahai tākam eina Tituswui ningli kasatkhami khaleiwui vang Vareli ningshi.
Kaja ithumwui kachihān khuikasangmāng maningla a khalatta ngachonngairareo nathumwuili rārada kuphaira.
Ali ngasoda paokaphā hākashokli church saikorana khayākashe ivānao akha nathumli chihorāli.
Kala chimāng maningmana, kha ithumna Prohowui tekhamateiwui vang kala kaphā sākhangai chitheiki kaje lukhamashanwui ot kasā hili ithumli ngaso khavai ali churchna kapang kahaina.
Mingairareo eina khami lemmet kasingwui pongli khipānakha maphen khavai ngasharlak eina sāda lei.
Prohowui miktāmāngli maningla mibingwui miktālila mashun eina sāshap khavai kasā hi ithumwui otna.
Chili lāngda atam kasāngkha chāng yangkahaiya ngachonmingailak kaja mina da theikhui kahaiya ivānao hili anili ngasoda chihorāli. Ana nathumli shitsangchaowa kala ngachonngailaka.
Titusva ili ngalengda sakruma kala nathumwui ngachaili otram ngatha̱kharuma akhana. Ali ngasorāki kaje avānao khani chiya Khristali tekmatei khavai churchbingwui pao kaphungabingna.
Athumli leikashi chitheilu, chieina ithumna nathumwui vang lāngkaso chi kachangkhata da church kachiva̱na theishingkhuira.
Nathumna sāmingairareo kahai chi ina theida Macedonianaobingli, “Achaianaobingna ngachonmi khavai achākum eina thuida ngarān kahaina” da ina mashonsei eina hānghaira.
Nathumwui vang ithumna lāngso kahai chi arema masā khavai ivānaongarāli rida chihokharāna. Chieina nathumna khangarān sāhaisālu.
Kha, kalikha Macedonianaobingna ili ngasoda chihānlak eina rālaga nathumna mangarānnhaisākha, nathumwui vaikashili hailaklaga ithumla khayaknāhaora.
Chiwui vang nathumna ngashit kahai athishurda khangarān sākhavai ivānaobingli rida rāngasakkhangaina. Chieina tandi maningla mingaireo khamina kaji chi I kharā tharan theikhuira.
Hithada hāngkahai lei: Ngarakri eina khayao china ngarakri eina hātkhuira, taimayāsā khayaowa china taimayāsā hātkhuira.
Kachichāwui kaphaning athishurda miki kajina, tandiwui ot maleimana, kaja mingairareo khame chili Varena leishi.
Nathumna darkar kasā chili lāngmeikhārda Varena awui lukhamashan mishapa. Chieina nathumwui mirinli kala kaphā ot kasāli khavāt maleimara.
Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Ana kachāmabingli thada mi; awui khamashung khangarong katang mavaimana.”
Khayaoali yaokhavai athā kala zākhavai zāt khame Varena nathumwui khalei chungsang ngasakra kala khamashung khangarongwui heithei mataisang ngasakra.
Sailāmlak eina mishap khavaiwui vang Varena nathumli shāngsang ngasakra. Chieina nathumna khami chi ithumwui eina samkaphanga mi kachungkhana Vareli masochikatra.
Hikathā otram khangatha̱ hiya Varewui miyurbingwui darkar kasāli ngachonkhamimāng maningla kha Vareli ningkashi mataisang ngasaka.
Nathumwui hikathā otram khangatha̱ hi theilaga nathumna mayāda Khristawui paokaphāli shitsangtit kaji kala mi saikorali sailāmlak eina khamiwui vang mi kachungkhana Vareli sochikata tekmatei ngasaka.
Varena nathumli hakkhamahā lukhamashan khami chiwui vang athumna nathumwui vang ningyāng tongchaoda seihā sāmira.
Khamor eina mahāngkhararra awui lemmetwui vang Vareli ningshisa!
Ina nathumli kharā tharan sāshida sākhavai tandi masāmialu; kaja ithumna okathuiwui ningphun-ningrin eina sāda lei da kahāngbing chili ina sāshilak eina sāshapa.
Mha, ithum okathuili pamda lei kha okathuiwui ningphun-ningrin eina mangararmana.
Khangarar hili ithumna kasing khutlai hi okathuiwui khutlai maningmana; kha raipan sakhaishapa Varewui khutlaina.
Ithumna makhamashung khangayāt, Varewui aworli kahapa saikora chi shimān ngasaka. Mikumowui kaphaning saikora Khristawui kahāng nganā khavai ngakhununga.
Nathumwui alungli kahāng khanganā chi theishingkhui kahai eina makhanganābing chili tandi mikhavai ngarānpinghaira.
Nathumli sākhai khavai maningla kha sakā khavai Prohona pangshap khami chiwui vang ina kateokha henda lāngsosālala I makhayakmana.
Nathumli chithi eina hāngkhamachitna da makhui ngasakngaimana.
Kaja athumna hānga, “Awui chithi tui ritlaka kala khālaka, kha ngasokapam tharan ā khalattava akachanga mila maningmana kala akachanga tuila mamatuimana!
Chithada kaphaninga mibingna bhap tāranu kaja ithumna makapam atamli chithi eina kakapi chithada samkaphanglila chithada hāngpapamra.

Khalatta juilak eina kaphaning athumli ithumna chāng matamlengmana. Athum kayakha mangma̱do! Athum kachicha khalatta retkhuilaga akha eina akha khān tamkhangarok kala athumna retkakhui chieina bichar sangaroka.
Ithumna angarit chili lāngda malāngsomara.
Nathum hi luiyam chiwui akai akha sāda kakhui tharan ithumna khikha chonkhamakān maleimana, kaja Khristawui paokaphā rimeikapta rāhākashok chi ithumna.
Ithumna maningla chi khangateina ot kasā chiwui vang ithumna malāngsomana. Kha nathumwui shitkasang mataisangda nathumwui ngachaili Varena mikahai luiyam chi ithumwui kachihāna.
Chieina kateina sākahai chiwui vang malāngsola, nathumli kānda ngalei khangateili paokaphā hāshok khavaina.
Khikhalajila Prohona phai da kaphaning mi chili khuisangkapaina, a khalatta phai kaji hi khuisangkapai maningmana.
Varewui thada ina nathumli shivāmlaka, kala kachingva̱ sha̱naona agaharali fakhavā thada nathumli ina Khristali khāmmi kahaina.
Kha phara̱wui mareimarāna Eveli mikhanam chithada, Khristali nathumwui khamashung kala kathar eina kachigat ning chi makhaohaipaishina da ngacheelaka.

Kaja ithumna tamchithei kahai chi maningla mi kateina khangatei Jishu akhawui tui tamkachitheila, kala ithumna hākashoka Manglā kala paokaphā chi maningla ngateihang kahai manglā kala chānpao hāngphāphā kajilila nathumna paisor eina khuisangphāphai.
Ina khamatuili themlāk majisālala, ila theithangkhamei mina. Hiwui pongli nathumli tharlak eina hāngchinghaira.
Varewui paokaphā tamkachitheiwui vang ina nathumli khikha mapomana. Nathumli haksang khavai kasāli I khalatta teosang kahai hiwui khayon leila?
Nathumli otram ngatha̱ khavai ina khangatei churchbingwui khangachon kakhui hi athumwui ngapaikazāna.
Ina nathumli ngasopamda leilakha iwui khavāt pheisāla mapomana; Macedoniawui avānaobingna iwui khavāt saikora khuirāmi. Khare kachāngwui thada aruila nathumli makhanang ngasakmara.
Khristawui khamashung ili zangmihaoda Achaia ngaleili khalei mi khipānakha iwui lāngsokhangai hi makhāmrarmara da hāngshapa.
Ina nathumli maleishimana jihaola? Ina nathumli leikashi Varena thei.
Athum hiya Khristawui paokazata tākam eina sakakhaninga minamma paokazata kala kakapik ot kasābingna.
Chi matakhak kahai maleimana. Satan eina tangda kahorwui kazingrao sākhuikhaningshapa.
Chiwui vang eina chipeewui raobingna khamashunga rao sākakhaning kasak ot maningmana. Naoda athumna sākahai chi tāzakta samphangra.
Ina hāngluishitli, I mangkhama̱ mina da khipānakha maphaningaranu, phaningsālala ila khalāngsopai khavai mangkhama̱ akha thada khamayāmilu.
Iwui tui hi Prohona hāngngasakkhangai maningmana, kha hiwui pongli langkaso hi mangkhama̱ kathā akhana.
Okathui otwui vang kachungkhana lāngsoakha, ila lāngsophalungrali.
Nathumna thangmeihaoda mangkhama̱bingli ja̱mishapa.
Mina nathumli tandi sālala, namzālala, khalen sanglala, mautshitlala, maili kaphelala, nathumna ja̱mishapa,
ithumva chi mathārarmana da kahāng hi kakhayak otna.
Kha kachikathāna khikhikhawui vang lāngsoshapakha— ina mangkhama̱ thada khamatuina— ila chithada sāshapra.
Athum Hebrewnaolā? Ila Hebrewnaona; athum Abrahamwui ara̱-azāla? Ila khangatei maleimana.
Athum Khristawui raola? Kapānao thada kahāngna— athumliva I mathāmei! Ina pangmeikharda ot sāhaira; phātoplila I chungmeida zanga, shaomi kahaila shānla makhuimana, thinanai sākhuikhui ji.
Jihudibingna lijei thumrāda chikoko eina phangāshi,
Romenaobingna kathumshida shaowa, kala akhashida ngalung eina horra. Marikhong kakaili kathum shida zanghaira kala akhashidava ngashun akha ngayā akha da tara̱lungli pamhaira.
Iwui kha̱ram kazatli tara̱kaphong, pha̱ma̱shaomi kahai, Jihudiwui eina, Gentilewui eina keinunglila, shamadrulila, ngahonglila, minama ngasotnaowui einala mahāngkhararra ka̱lākashi samphanga.
Ringkashi kachotkachāng ngayā mapikakhui, kathai, ra̱kachang, kasāngkharei kakhum, kasik kala kashankachon makhangavai kachungkha shida samphanghaira.
Saikora chi hailaga thangkachida ina church katongawui vang phaningkhamiwui malungkharing lei.
Kachikathāna ngazan kahai leiakha ila ali ngazanrum kahai thai, akhana morei sākha ining kateokha kachot maningmana.
Ina lāngsophalungra jiakha I kayākha ngazankhala da kathei chiwui vang lāngsora.
I makapikmana kaji hi Proho Jishuwui Avāva̱, katang mavaila sokhame Varena thei.
Damascusli leilakha awunga Aretaswui azingli governor kasāpāna ili tukkhui khavai keinungwui ngaveili shantri chipama.
Kha polāngli sanglaga phākhowui charfali chihotāda awui eina yāmshok kahaina.
Lāngkasona tongkazā maleilala ina lāngsora. Kha ara Prohona khami mahākhami kala phongkhamiwui pongli ina hāngra.
Kum tharāda mati thuihaira, Khristali kazanga mi akhali kazingram kakathumali khuikai, phasā zangda khuikāgā, phasā mazangla khuikākhala I matheimana—Varena thei;
kala mipā hili Paradiseli khuikai kaji ina thei: phasā zangda khuikāgā, phasā mazangla khuikākhala I matheimana— kha Varena thei
kala tui eina mahāngkapai, mikumowui male eina mahāngkharar tui kachungkha ana shai.
Chieina mipā hiwui vang ina lāngsora kha iwui khangazanwui vang maningla ina lāngso khavai maleimana.
Ina lāngsokhangai hi mangkhama̱wui vang maningmana, kaja ina khamashung tui khamatuina. Kha iwui eina theikakhui, shākakhui chili lāngda ili sakmeida maphaning khavai malāngsongaimana.
Phongkhami kachungkha ina kathei chiwui vang I khalatta sotmasaohaipaishina da hapkhano khavai iwui phasāli ka̱shāt kathā, Satanwui khutlai chi tophummihai.
Khuishokmi khavai ina Proholi poda kathumshihaira.

Kha ana ili hānga, “Iwui lukhamashan chi nawui vang shapa, kaja khangazan tharan iwui pangshap chi kāshung ngasaka.” Chiwui vang eina iwui khangazanwui vang mataimeida mathānda lāngsomeira, chithākha Khristawui pangshap chi iwuili leimichingra.
Khristawui vang khangazan, maikashi, kakhanang, rekakharek kala kasak saikora ina phungngailaka. Kaja khangazan tharan pangshap samphanga.
Kachangkhat paokazata akhana kaji theikhui khavai nathumwui mangāli kakhāng eina, machut kala matakhak kahai kasā kala masākharar kasā otbing china khudamna.
Iwui kaphaningli nathum church khangateili teomeiada kaphaning maleilakmana, nathumli iwui vang eina machot khangasak chimaya. Chiwui vang pheomilu.

Ina nathumli rākida hotkhanā hina kakathumana. Rālala nathumli makhanang ngasakmara; kaja nathumwui ot ningkachāng maningmana kha nathumli ningkachāngna. Naongarāna ava̱ avāwui vang ngarānsangki kaji maningmana, kha ava̱ avāna naongarāwui vang ngarānmiki kajina.
Nathumli ngachonmi khavai iwui khalei kala I khalattala mathānthathup chigatmira. Nathumli mataimeida leishiakha, ili suitāda leishirala?
Ina chihokharā athumli shichinlaga nathumwui eina I khalattawui tongkazā samphanghaola?
Hānglaksa jiakha Titus eina ali ngasokharā ichina hili saklak eina chihokharāna. Ithumwui ningphanin kala apong ngaraichada mazatthula?
Ithum khalatta mashung khavai phayatchinga da phaningchingla? Leikashebing, nathum reisang khavai Varewui mangāli ithumna Khristawui hāngngasakkhangai chi kahāngna.

Kaja ina kharā tharan ina ningkachāng chi nathumwuili makhalei kala nathumwui ningkachāng chi iwuili makhalei ngasāpaishina, kaja nathumwui alungli kharar khangarok, mikpaikashi, malungkhavāt, kākharām, khamashāt, misuichān, makakachang ot kala pa̱khangapā leisāpaishina da ngachee.

Ina rākhalui tharan Varena nathumwui miktāli ili khayak ngasakhaipaishinada ina ngacheeya; kala rida morei kasābingna athumwui makathar, shuikhangarui kala phokaphā otsakbing chi ning mangateila leichingkasāwui vang eina ina sikafa samphanghaipai.
Rida morei sākahaibinglila, kateibinglila hāngser kajina; rākakhanelila hānghaira, I mashā marālala aruila hānglui kajina kaja I rākhanāli chikathā mili mathāhailakmara.
Khristana ili matui khangasakna kaji nathumna ningkachāng theikhangai pramān saikora samphangra. Nathumli machinkida Khrista mangazanmana kha awui pangshap chi nathumli theingasakra.

Ali khangazana akha thada krushli shaothata kha Varewui pangshap eina ana kharingna. Ali ngasoda ithumla ngazanruma kha nathumli otram ngatha̱mi khavai Varewui pangshap china ithum ali ngasoda ringra.
Nathum shitsangtita leichinglā kaji nathum khalatta chāng yanglu kala machukkhuilu. Nathumna chāng khayang chili mangasungkharar maningakha Khrista nathumwuili lei da matheimala?
Ithumna chāng khayang chili mayuikharar maleimana kaji hi nathumna theira da shitsanga.

Ithumwui ot kasā ungshunghaira jikhavai maningla kha nathumna khayon ot masālui khavai ithumna Vareli seihā sāmi. Chieina chāng khayang chili ithum mangasungkharar thada theilala nathumna khamashung ot chi sāshapra.
Kaje khamashung otli ngakaishida masārarmana, kha khamashungwui vāngmang sāshapa.
Ithumna khangazan tharan nathum panghaoda ithum ringphai. Chieina nathum kāshungmei khavai ithumna seihā sāmi.
Sākhayāng khavai maningla sākā khavai Prohona ili pangshap mikahai chi eina ngasoda kharā tharan sāshida masā khavai lāchāda leilakha chithi hi kagapina.
Naomeikapta, ivānaobing ringphāmeilu. Kāshungmei khavai sālu, iwui kapo nganāmilu, ningkha sālu; chingri eina okthuirumlu. Leikashi kala chingri kahaiwui Varena nathumli ngasomichingranu.
Akha eina akha chinaongarāwui samkhangarokwui shālam sākakhui thada sāngaroklu.
Vareli shitkasangbing saikorana nathumli shālam chiphunli.
Proho Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan, Varewui leikashi kala Manglā Katharawui ngasokhami chi nathum saikorawuitungli leimichingranu.
Mikumowui eina maningla kha Jishu Khrista kala ali kathiwui eina ringshok khangasaka Avāva̱ Varivarana paokazata sākhangasaka Paul ina,
kala ili ngasokapama ivānaobing saikora zangda Galatiawui churchbingli shālam chiphunli.
Mashimānda Vareli tekmateichingranu. Amen.
Khristawui lukhamashan mangā eina nathumli hokakhuia ali nathumna hiyākha thākta hathailaga khangateili paokaphāna da thuikahai theilaga I matakhakhai.
Paokaphā khangatei maleiluimana, kha ina hi kahāngna kaja mi kaikhana nathumli pa̱ngapā ngasakta Khristawui paokaphā hi mashongachei khavai kasāna.
Ithumna tamchithei kahai chi maningla ngateihang kahai paokaphāna da kazingraona nilala, ithumna nilala tamchitheiakha, chikathā mili kalākashi ngasāranu.
Rida hāngkahai thada aruila hāngluili; nathumna samphang kahai paokaphā chi maningla ngateihang kahai tui tamkachithei mili ka̱lākashi ngasāranu.
Ina mikumo khipākhawui eina hi samkaphang maningmana kala mina tamkachitheila maningmana, kha Jishu Khrista ā khalattana ili phongkhamina.
Dharmawui pongli iwui tholabingwui ngachaili ina ningsangmeikapta awo-ayiwui khangachā chili phaningsai.
Ina Gentilebingli awui paokaphā hi tamchithei khavai Anaomayara hi khipākhala da theingasak kahaiwui thili ina mi khipākhali hiwui apongli mavāngasanluimana.
Ili rida paokazata sākasābingli samphang khavai Jerusalemlila mavāmana, kha heng sāda ina Arabiali vāhaowa kala chiwui thili Damascusli hanungluiya.
Kum kathumwui thili Peterli samphang khavai ina Jerusalemli vai kala zimiksho tharāda phangāthang angasopama.
Chili Prohowui achinā James maningla paokazata khangatei akhala matheimana.
Varewui mangāli ina nathumli kapikta kakapi maningmana.
Chiwui thili ina Cilicia eina Syriashong shanga.
Chitharan eina tangda Judeali khalei Vareshinaobingna ili matheirangsai.
Kha hithada mina khamatui ithumna shai, chiya, “Ithumli rekharekkasāpā china, atam akhali shimān ngasakngaikasā paokaphā chi ana tamchitheida lei.”
Kala hithada iwui vang eina athumna Vareli sochikata.

Varena I vāphalungra da chitheikhami athishurda ina vai kala kathānabing chili ngathumda vāsamphanglaga ina Gentilebingli hākashoka paokaphā chiwui pongli meikhaimi. Rida ina sākasā otla kala arui sāda khalei hila arema mangasā ngasakngaimana.
Ili khangaso Titus Greeknaona jilala ali ahui rimshok khavai tandi masāmana.

Ithumna Jishu Khristali khangashikwui eina ningkhān samphang kahaiwui apongli ngathum sāda rāra̱yangkhui khavai mi kaikhana shitkasang khangarumbingna da sāreklaga ithumwui kānglupli rāngathisanga. Athumna ithumli makaphā rao salui ngasakngaiya.
Kha khamashung paokaphā hi nathumwui vang haimihaisā khavai ithumna athumli mikkhayip akha eina tangda mahamsangmana.
Jihudibingli paokaphā hāshok khavai Varena Peterli khami thada Gentilebingli paokaphā hāshok khavai Varena ili chisinhaira kaji hi athumna ngateihang eina theikhuisai.
Kaja Peterli Jihudibingwui vang paokazata sākhangasak thada Varewui pangshap eina ilila Gentilebingwui paokazata sāngasaka.

Varena ili khamataia otsin mihaira kaji theilaga kathāna kasaa James, Peter kala John athumna Barnabas inili ithum saikora otsakrumabingna kaji kachithei sāda pāng rāngasinkhui. Barnabas inina Gentilebingli kala athumna Jihudibingli otram ngatha̱mi khavai mayāngaroka.
Athumna athumwui kānglupli khalei kachāmabing chili phaningungmi khavai poi, chi ina sāngaikasā otphalunga.
Kaja Jameswui eina mi machihorāranglakha ana Gentilewui Vareshinaobingli phazāngaruma, kha athum kharā eina ahui rimkashokwui mijang kasābingli ngacheehaoda Gentilebingli maphazāngarumluithuwa.
Jihudi khangteibingla Peterwui thada athumwui malung makaping otsak chili shurthuihaowa.

Kha ina athumwui kasākhavā chi paokaphāwui khamashungli mangaraikachā chi kathei tharan yarui mangāli ina Peterli maingātlak eina hānga, “Nava Jihudini ji, kha Jihudinao mathāla Gentile thada okthuirāhaira. Chithākha kathada nana Gentilebingli Jihudinao thada okthuiphalungra jipairakhala?”
Ithum Jihudi sāda pharai, “Morei kaphunga Gentilebing” da kaho athum kathā maningmana.

Thalala ithumna thei kaja ainwui otsakna khipalikha mamashungmirarmana, kha Jishu Khristali shitkasang manga einana, ainwui otsakna maningla Jishu Khristali shitkasang manga eina mashungmi khavai ithumna Jishu Khristali shitkasangna, kaja ainwui otsakna khipalikha mamashungmirarmana.
Chithākha ithumna Khristawui lungli mashungkhui khavai kasāli Gentilebingna morei khalei thada ithumlila morei leiching kaji hi Khristana sākhangasakna jirala? Maningphutmana.
Ina horkahai ain chi ina singluishitakha ain kakaiana kaji I khalatta kachitheina.
Varewui vang ringkhavai iya ainwui pongli kathina. Ain khalattana sākathatna. I Khristali ngasoda krushli thihaira,
chieina ringda khalei hi I maningluimana, kha Khristana ili kharingna. Arui ina ringda khalei hi Varewui Naomayara ili leishida amanglā chihokhame chili shitkasang mangā eina kharingna.
Varewui lukhamashanli ina makhamayā maningmana, kha kachikathā mi akhali ainwui mangā eina mashungkhuimipaisi kaja Khristana thikhami hiya aremana.
Mangkhama̱ Galatianaobing! Nathumli khipāna khara̱ sangmihaokhala? Nathumwui miktāli Jishu Khristali krushli shaokathat nathum mathālak eina theikahaina!
Hi hānglu: Varewui Manglā hi ain khamayon einaka, paokaphā shālaga shitkasang eina samkaphangkhala?
Kathada hiyākha mangma̱kahai! Varewui Manglā eina haophoklaga na khalattawui pangshap eina tanghaingaila?
Nathumna theikakhui chi aremala? Maningphutmana.
Varena manglā sangmida masākharar ot kasāsā chi ain khamayonwui vangla, chikā paokaphāli shitkasangwui vangkhala?
Nathumna theingayiphalunga kaja shitkasang khalei mibing chi Abrahamwui ara̱-azā akachangbingna.

Varetuili hithada phongmihaida lei chiya, shitkasang mangā eina Varena Gentilebinglila mashungmira. Chieina Varetuina Abrahamli paokaphā chi hithada hānghaisai; “Nawui mangā eina miyur saikorali Varena somira.”
Abrahamna shitsanga kala sokhami samphanga; chieina shitkasang mi saikorali ali sokhami thada somi
Ara ithumna tharzā eina theihaira kaja mi khipālikha ain eina mamashungmimana, khiwui vangkhala kaja hithada kapihaida lei, “Shitkasang mangā eina mashungmi kahai mi chimāng ringra.”
Kha Ain eina shitkasangwui khangashik khikha maleimana, kaja hithada kapihaida lei; “Ain khamayona china chiwui athishurda ringra.”

Khristawui mangā eina Gentilebingli Varena Abrahamli ngashitmi kahai sokhami chi samphangpai khavai Khristana chi tākam eina thimi, chieina Varena ngashitmi kahai Manglā chi shitkasang mangā eina ithumna samphangpaira.
Ivānaongarā, pailak kahai chānjam akha hangga, mi khanina kachikathā akha mayāngarokta tuingashit sālaga shoi sāngarok kahai tharan khipānakha chi masākhaipaimana lah mangarumsangluipaimana.

Ara Varena Abraham eina awui ara̱-azāli ngashitmihai, Vare tuili awui “Ara̱-azābingli” da mi tarākhali kahāng thada mahānghaimana kha awui “Ara̱-azāli” da mi akhamāngli hānga, chiwui kakhalat chiya Khrista, mi akha kajina.
Ina kahāng hiya; Varena Abrahamli tuingashit sai kala chi mayonchingra da ngashithai. Zingkum shāmati thumrāwui thili khami ain china Varewui ngashitmi kahai eina tuingashit chi masākhairarmana.
Varena lemmet hi ainwui athishurda khamina jisi kaja ngashitmi kahai chi makanāluimana. Kha Varena ngashitmi kahai lemmet chi ana Abrahamli khamina.
Kha mi akhamāngakha tuisak sāme darkar masāluimana kaja Vare akhamānga.
Kha hithada hānghai, kaja okathui katonga moreiwui pangshap azingli lei. Chieina pheisin sāda ngashitmi kahai lemmet chi shitkasanga athum chili mihaira
Kha shitkasangwui atam marāranglakha kala Varena maphongmiranglakha eina tangda ainna ithum saikorali phātopli narhaisai.
Shitkasangwui mangā eina ithumli mashungmipai khavai, Khristana marāranglakha eina tangda ainna ithumli akhavā sāsai.
Kha ara shitkasangwui atam sahaoda ainna ithumli akhavā masāluimana.
Kaja shitkasangwui mangā eina Khrista Jishuli ngarumhaoda nathum Varewui naosera,
Khristali zangda ra̱hik kahai nathum saikora, Khrista ā khalattawui mirina nathumwui sāri ngasahaira.
Chieina Jihudi eina Gentile, rao eina akhavā, sha̱nao eina mayarnao khangatei maleimana; Khrista Jishuli ngarumhaoda nathum akhamanga.
Nathum Khristawuina jiakha, Abrahamwui ara̱-azāna kala Varena ngashitmi kahai chiwui shimluikatna.
Kha shimlui katonga naomayarawuina jilala avāva̱wui shimlui khuiki kaje nao chila nganuilakhava rao eina ngaraichai,
avāva̱na ngarān kahai atam maungshungranglakha eina tangda mi khangateina yangmiya.
Chi tākam eina ithumla Manglārinwui kākashung chi masamphangranglakha apuk-apagawui manglāna mungkasā chiwui rao sāsai.
Kha atam ungkashung eina Varena awui Naomayarali chihorai, mikumo ava̱ akhawui naomayara akha sāda ana rai kala Jihudiwui ain azingli raokthuida
ainwui azingli khalei saikorali ngatangkhuida ithumli Varewui naongarā ngasā ngasaka.
Chiwui vang eina ara nathum rao maningluimana, kha Varewui naongarāna, kala nathum awui naongarā sāhaoda Varena awui naongarāli miki kaji mira.
Rida nathum Vareli matheisāmana, chieina khangacha eina vare makhaninga rinbingwui raonao sāsai.
Kha ara nathum Vareli theihaira, lah Varena nathumli thei— nathum kathada khangazana kala lumashankapai manglabingli hanungga jihaokhala? Khiwuivang athumwui rao saluingaihaokhala?
Nathumna kachikathā zimiksholi, kachāngli, zurkānli kala zingkumli saklak eina khuiya.
Ina nathumwui vang kasā ot saikora hi arema sāhaoki jihaidei da phaninglaga wukhananglaka.
Ivānaongarā, iwui thada sālu, ila nathum kathāna. Nathumna ili khalāng khikha masāhaimana.
Khareli ina nathumli paokaphā hākashok chi iwui kakazāwui vang eina kharāna da nathumna thei.
Iwui kakazāna nathumli kasak tarākha samphang ngasaklala, nathumna ili ningkakachai lah horkahai masāmana, kala Khrista Jishuli samngarokhuiki kaji thada ili samngarokmi.
Nathum ringphālaksai, ara khi sāthu? Sāpaisi kaja nathumwui mik latshoklaga ili mihairara kaji hi ina hāngshapa.
Ina nathumli mashun tui hāngkhamiwui vang ara I nathumwui yangkashe ngasāhaola?
Nathumli ngahānngailak eina kasābing chi ning matharmana. Athumna nathumli iwui eina ngatei ngasakngai kaja athumna nathumli ngahānkhangai thada nathumna athumli ngahānngai ngasaka.
Kharin chi mathada leiakha hikathā ngahānkhangai hi phālaka— ina nathumli ngasopamda leilakhawui atammāngli maningla kha atam kachida hi mashungchinga.
Inao ngarā, Khristawui khangachā chi nathumwuili maleiranglakha eina tangda ava̱na naokhara̱li kachot thada nathumwui vang ina chotluida lei.
Nathumwui vang ina kathada phaningmikhala kaji hi iwui wuklung rāmkhailaga machitheikapai jong! Nathumli kathada hāngchitheisikhala da I matheirarthuwa!
Ainwui azingli pamkhangaibingli khangahānna; Ainna khi hāngkhala kaji nathum mashāmala?
Hithada kapihai kaja Abrahamwui naomayara khani leisai, akhali raopāva̱na pharai kala akhapali akhavaiva̱na pharai.
Raopāva̱na kapharā naomayara chiya khangachā thada pharai, kha akhavaiva̱na kapharā naomayara chiya Varewui ngashitkhamiwui athishurda pharai.
Hikatha hi chānjam eina bhap tāpai; preiva̱ khani chi tuingashitwui mathunna. Raopamli pamda leilakha kapharā naobing chi Hagarwuina kala ana Sinai kaphungli tuingashit sākahai chiwui mathunna.
Arabiali khalei Sinai kaphungwui mathun sāda khalei Hagar eina awui naongarā zangda rao sāser kahai hi aruihonwui keinung Jerusalemwui chānjamna.
Kha atungshong khalei Jerusalem chiya ningkhān kahaiana, chi ithumwui ava̱na.
Kaja hithada kapihaida lei;
“Ringphālu, O nao makhavaiva̱ kashumva̱!
Mathānda vaolu, naopharātwui kachot matheilakrang kajiva̱!
Khikhalajila horkahai preiva̱na,
fakathuiva̱ preiva̱li nao chungmeira,”
Ara ivānaongarā, Isaac tākam eina nathum hi Varewui tuingashitwui naongarāna.
Atam chitharan Varewui Manglā eina kapharā nao chili khangachā pharāt eina kapharā naona rekakharek thada aruila chipapama.
Kha Varetuili khi hānghaili? Hithada kapihai; “Raopava̱ eina anao chili kashamhaolu, kaja raopāva̱wui nao eina akhavaiva̱wui nao shimlui makārumpaimana.”
Chiwui vang eina ivānaongarā, ithum raopava̱ chiwui nao maningmana, kha akhavaiva̱wui naongarāna.
Ithum ningkhānhaira— Khristana ithumli chihomihaira! Chieina ningkhān kahai mibing mara̱sa̱sa̱da nganingtitlu, laga na khalatta raonao mangasaluilu.
Nganālu! Paul ina kahāngna kaja nathum khalatta ahui rimshok khavai mayākha Khrista hi nathumwui vang khikha kānkhanā maleimana.
Kachikathāna a khalatta ahui rimshok khavai mayākha, ana ain katonga chi mayonphalungki kajina da ina machinluishit kajina.
Ain mayonlaga mashungkhuira da kasā athum chiya khalatta Khristawui eina shokkahaina. Nathum Varewui lukhamashanwui eina ayarli shokhaira.
Shitkasangwui vang manglāwui pangshap eina Varena mashungmira kaji hi ithumwui kachihānna; kala chiwui vang khangaraina.
Kaja ithumna Khrista Jishuli ngarum kahai tharan, ahui rimkashoknala, marimkashoknala ngatei khangasak khikha maleimana. Leikashi mangā eina ot sākhangasaka shitkasang china khamataina.
Nathum phālak eina sāsai! Khipāna khamashung chili mashur khavai nathumli khāmhaokhala? Khipāna suithuihaokhala?
Hi nathumli hokakhui Varena maningmana.
Athumna kahāng thada, “Khamui khongsaikhali khawok kateokhana kapchung ngasakshapa.”

Kha arui eina tangda nathumli iwui shitkasang lei. Ithum Proho mingli khangarumwui vang nathumna ngateithuihaora kaji mashitsangmana, kala khipā khipākharanu nathumli ning yaoyā khangasakpā chili Varena tandi minaora.

Kha iwui vanga, ivānaongarā, ahui rimshokphalungra da ina pao hāshokakha ili khiwui vang eina aruila rekharekchingda khaleikhala? Chi mashungsāsi kaja ina Khristawui krushwui pao hākashok hina khikha kahap maleimara.
Nathumli pa̱ngapā khangasakbing chi ahui rimkashokmāng majila athum khalatta akhāla sāchaohaoranu.
Ivānaongarā, nathumlila ningkhān khavai hokhuihaira. Kha ningkhān hina nathum phasāwui ningkachāngwui khutlai sāda nathumli mamung ngasakalu. Kha leishida akha eina akha ngachon ngaroklu,
kaja “Khongnainaoli na khalatta leikashi thada leishilu” kaji ningkhami hili ain saikora kharupserhaira.
Kha sāyur thada akha eina akha makei ngarokta chotngasakakha, ning ngasharlu, chi maningakha nathum saikora shimān ngarokra.
Ina kahāng chi hina: nathumwui mirin Manglāli thānngasaklu, chithākha phasawui ningkachang chili nathumna ningyang maung ngasakmara.

Kaja mikumowui khangachāna ningkachāng chi Manglāna maningchāngmana, kala Manglāna ningkachāng chi mikumowui khangachā china maningchāngmana: khani hi mamayāngarokmana. Chieina nathumna sākhangangai chi masāpaimana.
Manglāna thānmiakha nathum ainwui azingli maleiluimana.
meoma̱li khokharum, kala meowor kashon, yangshi khangarok, khangama̱, mikpaikashi, malungkhavāt, kākharām, mijang kakhom, kaikhangarok,
yuikashi, khamarip, khamang-kazāli akachang kasā hikathāthā, rida hāngkahai thada aruila hāngluishitli: hikathāthā ot kasābingwuili Vare wungram maleimana.
Kha Manglāna leikashi, khamathān, chingri kahai, ja̱khami, lumashankathei, kaphā ot, ningkatong,
malungkhanim kala khalatta khangarin hikathā shokngasaka. Hikathāwui vang ain mavaimana.
Jishu Khristawui ngasa kahaibing chiya mikumowui khangachā khamathang kala ningkachāng saikora chi chithithaira.
Manglāna ithumli ringngasaka; ana ithumwui mirin khayaiphalungra.
Ithum malāngsophalungmara, akha eina akha maningrāk ngarok ngasakphalungmara kala akha eina akha mamikpaishi ngarokphalungmara.

Ivānaongarā, kachikathāna khalāng ot kasā theiakha manglārinli khangaphumbing nathumna ali mashungkhuimiphalungra, kha chi malungkhanim eina sāphalungra. Nathum khalatta kasuili matāzang khavai ning ngasharlu.
Akhana akhawui khangazanli ngachonmi ngaroklu, chithākha nathum Khristawui kakaso khanganāna.
Kachikathā mi akhana ava khikha maninglaga khikha akhana da phaningakha ā khalatta kachipatna.
Kachichāna kachichāwui otsakli bichar sāki kajina. Sākahai ot chi phākha mi kateina sākahai chili mapāndamla a khalatta penlakhaira da lāngsopai.
Kaja mi kachiva̱na kachichāwui otphun chi phungki kajina.
Varewui tui tamkhui kahaia china kaphā ot chi awui ojali sakrumphalungra.
Khalatta machipatalu. Vareli mangashansāpaimana. Kachichāna khayao chi kachichāna hātra.
Khalatawui nigkachāng athishurda lingsangakha kashui hātkhuira, Manglāwui lungli lingsangakha makashimān mirin hātkhuira.
Chieina kaphā kasāli ngachāng machathaiasa kaja chi sāchingakha kahāt atam kharā eina hātkakhui samphangra.
Chiwui vang eina ithumna sāpaida leilakha mi saikorali kaphā sāmisersa, mataimeikapta shitkasang khangarumbingli sāmisa.
Nathumli ahui rimshokphalungra da tandi kasābing chiya akorli maikhayā chitheikhangaibingna. Athumna kasā hiya Khristawui krushwui vang eina athumli marekharek khavaina.
Ahui rimkashokbingla ain mamayonmana, kha phasāwui khangachā ahui rimkashok chili nathumla mayāhaira da athumna kayāng khareili maikhayā samphang khavai kasāna.
Iwui vanga, ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui krush maningla lāngso khavai maleimana, kaja krushwui vang eina okathui hi iwui vanga khikha masāvaimana kala okathuiwui vang ila khikha masāvaimana.
Ahui rimkashoknala lah marimkashoknala maningmana; kha midhar khangasā hina akachangana.
Hikathā ayin hi mirinli mayonrā kahai athumli chingri kahai kala phaningkhami chi leichingranu.
Naomeikapta, khipākha ili makhananglui ngasakalu, khiwui vangkhala kaja iphasāli khangakhai hina I Jishuwui rao akhana kaji shākhina.
Ivānaongarā, ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan nathum saikorali ngasomichingranu. Amen.
Varena mayāmida Jishu Khristawui paokazata Paul ina Ephesusli khalei Jishu Khristali ningtongda shitkasangbingli kagapina.
Ithumwui Avā Vare kala Proho Jishu Khristana nathumli lukhamashan kala chingri kahai miranu.
Okathui masāranglakhala Khristali khangashikwui vang Varena ithumli awui ngasā khavai kapangkhui. Chieina ithum awui mangāli khamakhao maleila kathara ngasāra.
Leikashiwui vang Khristawui mangā eina ithumli awui nao sākhavai Varena ngarānping kahaina, hi awui sākhangai ningkachāng kharin china.
Ithumna awui tekhamatei lukhamashanwui vang Vareli sochikatsa, kaja lemmet chi awui khaluma Naomayarawui lungli ithumli mihaira.
Kaja Khristawui asheena ithumli ningkhānmi, chiya ithumwui morei pheomihaira. Varewui lukhamashan kayākha hakmahākhala,
ana ithumli chiyakha ngashomrorkhami! Awui thangmei kala ningthei eina
Varena awui kharin chi sai kala Khristawui mangā eina tongda ungshung ngasakki kaji ngathum kahai khangarān chi ithumli theingasakhaira.
Retkahai atamli Varena pongngasaki kaji khangarān hi Khristana akuia sāda kazinglila, okathuilila khalei manglākapai saikora kharupkhui khavaina.

Ot saikora Varewui khangarān kala kaphaning athishurda kashokna, kala awui kharin haokaphokwui eina ana ngarānping kahai chili pheisin sāda ithum Khristali khangashiklungli awui mibing sākhavai Varena kapangkhui kahaina.
Chiwui vang eina Khristali chihānkhare saki kaje ithumna Varewui tekhamateili sochikatsa.

Nathumli huikhami khuirākhami khamashungwui paokaphā chi nathumna kashā eina nathumla Varewui mibing ngasāhaowa. Nathumna Khristali shitkasangwui vang awuina da theikhavai ngashitmi kahai Manglā Kathara chi mida nathumwuitungli mahor namhaira.
Varena awui mibingli ngashit kahai ithumna samphangki kaji shimlui chi masamphangranglakha eina tangda Manglā hina shākhina. Awui tekhamatei chili sochikatsa.
ina nathumwui vang Vareli ningkashi khami mathāhailakmana. Iwui seihā kasāli nathumli phaningungchinga,

kala ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui Varivara, tekhamatei Avāva̱, china Manglā chi nathumli mikhavai ina pomi. China nathumli theithangmei ngasakra kala Vareli theingasakta nathumna ali mathāmeida theikhuihaora.
Nathumwui ning shoda awui kahor theikhavai ina pomi, china nathumli hokakhuiwui kachihān chi khikhala kala awui mibingli kayākha tekhamatei lan ngashitmihaikhala da nathumna mathingrik theira,
kala ali shitkasanga ithumwuitungli awui hakkhamahā pangshap china kathada ot sāda leilikhala kajila theira. Ithumwui lungli ot sāda khalei pangshap chi sāshap pangshapa chi eina ngaraichai;
chi ana Khristali kathiwui eina ringngasakta kazingramli awui yāshong kachipam chili shichina.

Kazingramli khalei akhavā kasābing pangshap khalei, khangam-kharei saikorawuitungli Khristana munga; kala aruihon khalei, naoda rāki kaji okathuiwui mingpho saikorawuitungli reikhamei mingpho chi awuili lei.
Ot saikora Varena Khristawui pheizingli haimi, kala churchwui vang ot saikorawuitungli akhavā sāngasaka.
Church hi Khristawui phasāna, kala chi ana khavāt maleila pong ngasaka.
Kharekachāng kahāng makhanganāwui vang kala morei kasāwui vang nathum manglārinli thida leisai.
Chikachāng nathum okathuiwui makaphā shongfali zatsai. Nathum Varewui kahāng makhanganābingli singda khalei khamasai lungli khalei makathar manglāwui akhavā chiwui kahāng nganāsai.
Ithumla athum thada, phasāwui ningkachāng athishurda kala ningli sākhangai chi ungshung khavai sāda okthuisai. Chiwui vang eina ithumla athumwui thada Varena malungkhavāt naongarā ngasāsai.
Kha Varewui lukhamashan khavāt maleimana kala awui leikashi hakmahālaka,
chiya kahāng manganāmada manglārinli thikasāwui eina Khristali ngasoda ithumli ana ringngasakmi. Awui lukhamashana nathumli huimi.
Jishu Khristali kazangwui vang kazingram katha apuk-apagali mungkhavai ithumli ali ngasoda ringlui khangasakna.
Chithada sāda Khrista Jishuwui lungli awui leikashi chithei kahai chi khanaowa mithotli awui khavāt makhalei lukhamashan chi chitheipaira.
Kaja shitkasang mangā eina nathumli huikhami hi Varewui lukhamashanna, nathumna sākakhui maningmana, kha Varewui lemmetna.
Nathumwui ot kasana maningmana, kachikathana langsopaishina.
Ithum hi Varewui pāngthemna kala kaphā ot sākhavai Khrista Jishuwui lungli ithumli Varena sākahaina kala kaphā ot chi sākhavai ana rilāk eina ngarānpinghaikasāna.
Chiwui vang eina phaningunglu, “Ahui rimkashoka” da hokasā athumna nathumli kapharāwui eina Gentile, “Ahui marimkashoka” da hosai, (chi mikumona aphasāwui eina rimkashok chili kahāngna).

Chitharan nathum Khristawui eina ngateida leisai. Nathum kha̱minao sāhaoda Varewui miyurli ngashitmi kahai chili mazangsāmana. Nathum Varena awui miyurli ngashitmi kahai chili pheisinda tuingashit sākahai chili mazangsāmana kala okathui hili nathum kachihān maleila kala, Vare mazangla okthuisai.
Kha ara nathum Khristali zanghaoda, katāva̱li leikasāwui eina Khristana tāmi kahai asheewui mangā eina nganaikhameili khuiungmihaira.

Kaja Khrista khalattana Jihudibing eina Gentilebingli akha ngasā khangasakwui vang chingri kahai chi ithumli khuirāmihaira. Yangshi khangarok kala ngatei khangasak phākho chi khalattawui phasā chigatmida sākhaimihaira,
Jihudi yur khani hi awui mingli kadhara akha sāda chingrihai khavai ngarānmi.
Khristana krushli thimida yangshi khangarok chi tang ngasaka, kala krushwui mangā eina yur khanini hi phasa akha sāda Vareli ngashim ngasaka.
Chithada sāda Varewui eina tāda leikasā Gentile nathumlila, Vareli nganaida leikasā Jihudibinglila, chingri kahai paokaphā chi saikorali Khristana rāhāshoka.
Kaja Khristawui manga eina Jihudi eina Gentile, khanini Mangla akha eina Avāli zangkapaina.
Chiwui vang eina Gentile nathum ara kha̱mi kala katei maningluimana; ara Varewui mibingli ngasoda ngaraikachā ruichumnao akhana, kala Varewui shimkhur chiwui mibingna.
Nathumla paokazatbing eina marānbingna sākakā shimphung chiwuitungli sākā kahaina kala Khristana chiwui akhokana.
Shim hupva singlaga Proholi dharchigat kahai kathara khorumshim sāda reisang khangasaka chi ana.
Ali ngarumda nathumla khangateili ngasoda Varena awui Mangla eina pamkhavai apam sākakāli zangrumda lei.
Maram hiwui vang eina, Khrista Jishuwui vang phātop kazanga Paul ina Gentilebing nathumwui vang seihā sāmi.
Kachangkhat eina Varewui lukhamashan lungli nathumwui vanga kaphā sākhavai ot hi ili horsangmi kahaina kaji nathumna shāhaira.
Varena khangathuma angarān chi phongmida ili theingasakhaira (Hiwui pongli ina kasha̱-a eina kagapina,
kala ina kapi kahai chi nathumna paakha, Khristawui khangathuma chiwui pongli iwui bhap katā chi nathumna theikhuishapra.)
Khare thotli tui hi mili machitheisāmana, kha ara awui kathara paokazatbing eina marānbingli Manglāna phongmihaira.

Ngathum kahai tui chi hina; paokaphāwui mangā eina Gentilebingna Varewui sokhami chi Jihudibingli ngarumda samphanga kala shimluikatruma sāda Khrista Jishuwui mingli ngashitmi kahai chi samphangrumra.
Awui ot kasā pangshapwui mangā eina Varena ngakheikhang eina khami lemmet china ili paokaphawui rao sāngasaka.
Awui mibingwui ngachaili teomeikap kaje chilila I teomei, tha-ilala Khristawui mashānkharar kashāng chiwui paokaphā chi Gentileli hāshok khavai,
kala saikora kasā Varewuili thot-thot ngathumrā kahai matakhak kahai angarān chi mi saikorali chithei khavaiwui lukhamashan chi ili khamina;
kaja ara churchwui mangā eina apong saikorali Varewui thangkhamei chi kazingram katha apuk-apagali khamungabing kala pangshapbingli theingasak khavaina.
Ithumwui Proho Khrista Jishuwui mangā eina ana ungshung khangasak, awui katang makhavai kharin chiwui athishurda hi Varena kasāna.
Khristali khangarumwui vang kala ali shitkasangwui mangā eina ithumna maiyārong eina kala ning nganungkhung eina Varewui mangāli zangkashapna.
Ina nathumwui vang kakhanang samphanghaowa da ngachāng machatalu; hi nathumwui vang phākhavaina.
Maram hiwui vang Avāli ina khuktizangda seihā kasāna.
Kazingramlila okathuilila khalei shimkhur kachiva̱wui aming hi awui eina samkaphangna.
Ina Vareli awui Manglāwui mangā eina awui khavāt makhalei tekhamateiwui eina nathumli pangshap mida nathumwui ning ngatarmei khavai seihā sai.
Shitkasangwui mangā eina Khristana nathumwui wuklungli pamkhavai kala leikashili shimphung kala angayung sāda sa̱titkhui khavai ina seihā sai.
Chieina Varewui mibingli ngasoda nathumla Khristawui leikashi hi kayākha hak, kayākha sang, kayākha jui kala kayākha thukkhala kaji bhap tākashapwui pangshap samphangra.
Mha, leikashi chi nathumna kathei samphangranu, chithālala theiser majirarmara kha Varewui khangachā chi pemngasaklu.
