Ithumwui lungli pangshapna ot sāmida ithumna kahāngli kala kaphaningli langmeikharda ngarānkhame ā chili,
churchwui alunglila, Khrista Jishuwui alunglila, thot kachida mashimānda Vareli tekmateichingranu. Amen.
Chiwui vang eina Prohowui vang narkahaia ina kapona kaja, nathumli hokakhui tharan Varena ngarānmi kahai mirin chi tāzakta okthui khavai ngarānlu.
Atam kachiva̱li ngahuilu, tākuihailu kala ningzinghāringhailu. Akha eina akha khāngmi ngarokta nathumwui leikashi chitheilu.
Makaikapai chingri kahai chieina ngasoda manglāna khami ningkha kasā chi leiching khavai ngarānlu.
Varena nathumli hokakhui chili kachihān akhamāng kaji thada phasā akhamanga kala manglā akhamānga.
Prohola akha, shitkasangla akha kala ra̱kahikla akhamānga.
Vare akha kala mikumo saikorawui Avāva̱ akhamānga, ā saikorawui Prohona, saikorawui atungli saikorawui mangā eina saikorawui alungli lei.
Khristawui lemmet athishurda ithum kachiva̱la khamataia lemmet chi samphangsera.
Hithada hānghaida lei:
“Ana kajuiya chili kakā tharan,
narkahaiya kachungkhali thānkai, ana mikumoli lemmet mi.”
Ara, “Ana kai” kajiwui kakhalat khikhala? Hiwui kakhalatva, rida ana nemmeikap kaji okathuili tai kajina.
Chipem khavai azingli katā ā chi kazingli juikhameili kakā chipapama.
Kala “Mikumoli lemmet khame” chi ana. Ana kaikhali paokazata, kaikhali marān, kaikhali evangelist, khangatei kaikhali yaokahoma kala ojā sāngasaka.
Khristawui phasā chi sākā khavai ana Varewui mibingli Vareshiwui otram khangatha̱wui ot sākhavai ngarān kahaina.

Chieina ithum saikora ithumwui shitkasangli kala Varewui naomayarawui pongli ithumna kathei chili khokkha sāphalungra. Khristawui kāshungchao kahai chili kāngaphan khavai ithum mapungkaphā mi ngasāphalungra.
Chithākha ithum marei-marā awor eina kateibingli khanguili thānkasang mikhanamabingwui tamkachithei, chiwui masi china phanung-phanvāda yuiung-yuivā kaje naoshinaobing chikathā mangasāmara.
Kha leikashiwui ningngai lungli khamashung tui matuida apong kachiva̱li akuia Khristawuili ithum rarsangra.

Awui khayaikhamilungli phasākai saikora ngashik ngarokta lei kala phasā atonga chi aliklak kachiva̱wui eina ngasunkhui. Chithada sāda phasākai kachiva̱na kachichāwui ot sāda leikashiwui lungli phasā katonga reisang ngasaka.
Mashitkasangbingna wuklung mararda chukmaja̱phāphā kaji thada maokthui khavai ina Prohowui ming singda nathumli saklāk eina kahāngna.
Athum mangkhama̱wui vang ning makanghaoda Varena khami mirin chili athum mazangmana.
Athum kakhayak mavaimana, morei kasāli mangacheemana, kala khayākhamala ot saikorali khangaring maleila sai.
Nathumna Khristawui pongli chithada matamkhuimana.
Nathumna awui tui shākachangkhathaira, kala awui thi kashura sāda Jishuwui mashun nathumli tamchitheihaira.
Chieina kharewui mirin ringching khangasaka, minama khamathangna shimān khangasaka kachama khangachā chi horhaolu.
Nathumwui ningla, wuklungla kadhar onphalungra,
kala Varewui sakrin khuida sākahai chi khangarong kala katharwui lungli khamashunga mirin phongmi kahai kadhara khangachā chi nathumna ngavaikhuiphalungra.
Malungvāt ngaroklala morei masaalu kala langpongda malungmavātalu.
Chipeeli apong maphāmialu.
Khalena maleeluila khamashung ot sāphokta awui ringkhavai kala kachāmbingli ngachonmi khavai pharānu.
Ramkai tui mamatuialu, kha kānnakapai reisangkapai tui matuida kashābingwui vang phākhavai sālu.
Kala ngatangkhami zimikshowui vang nathumli mahor namkahai Varewui Manglā Kathara chili makhanang ngasakalu.
Ningkakhā, ningkachot, malungkhavāt, khonkazār, khamashāt, kala yangkharing khangarok saikora chi horserhaolu.
Chiwui mahutliva Khristawui mangā eina Varena nathumli pheokhami chithada, nathum akha eina akha pheomi ngarokta malungkhanim eina ningngaishi ngaroklu.
Nathum Varewui khaluma naongarā sākahaiwui vang ā thākhavai hotnāphalungra.
Khristana ithumli leishida ithumwui vang Vareli ningyāng ungkhavai nganamkaphā kachigat kala pha̱phayākhami chithada, nathumla leikashiwui lungli yaothuizatlu.
Nathum Varewui mibing ngasāhaoda, khamathang-khamarang, makathar, kākharām hikathāthā mamatuikhangayi tui mamatuialu.
Lha shuikhangaruitui, mangma̱ttui kala khayākhamalātui hikathā hāngki kajiwui vanga Vareli ningshitha̱lu.
Shāmkasā, makathara, kākharāma (kākharām hi meoma̱li khokharum kathāna) mi china Varewui kala Khristawui wungramli kachilikha shimlui makāpaimana.
Khipānakha nathumli makhaninga tui eina machipat ngasakalu, hikathāwui vang Varewui malungkhavāt chi kahāng makhanganābingwuitungli katāna.
Chiwui vang eina athum kathāli mangasoalu.
Nathum tangkhamangli okthuida leisai, kha Prohowui mi sākahaiwui vang, nathum kahorli okthuihaira. Chiwui vang eina nathum kahorli okthuida khalei mibing thāphalungra.
Kaja kahor china kaphā, khamashung-khangarong kala mashunwui athei kachungkha hātkakhui samphanga
Prohowui ningyāng khaung ot chi phākhui khavai ngarānlu.
Tangkhamangli khalei mibingna kasā khikha makānkhanā ot chi masaalu, chiwui mahutliva chibing chi kahorli khuishoktha̱lu.
(Athumna ngathumda sākahaiwui pongli khamatuimāng einala teokha khayākhamalā ot maningmana).
Ot saikora kahorli khuikashok eina athumwui kachangkhat khangachā chi mathingrik eina phongshokhaowa,
kaja kachikathā ot chi mathingrik eina phongkashok tharan theipaiserhaowa. Chiwui vang hithada hānga.
“Ngakarthuilu, he kape,
kathiwui eina ngakarthuilu,
Khristana nawuitungli hormira.”
Chieina nathumna kathada ringda leikhala da ngasharlu. Mangkhama̱ mibing mathala, thangkhamei mibing thada okthuilu.
Chāda samkaphang atam chi mathada singkhuilu, kaja hi makaphā atamna.
Chiwui vang eina mamangma̱alu kha Prohona nathumli khi sāngasakngaikhala kaji phākhuilu.
Nathumli shimān ngasaki kaji zamkhor manglaga mamariphaialu, kha Manglā Kathara eina pemtinghailu.
Nathum akha eina akha Laa lairikwui tui eina, masotlaawui tui eina kala Kathara Laa lairikwui tui eina chānsam ngarokta, nathumwui wuklungli masotkhami eina ngasoda Proholi masotchikatlu.
Atam kachida ot saikorawui vang ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui ming singda Avāva̱ Vareli ningshichinglu.
Khristali khayākashiwui vang nathum akha eina akha hamsang ngaroklu.
Khristana awui phasā, churchwui akhavā kasā thada gaharana preiva̱wui akhavāna; kala Khristana awui phasa, churchwui Huikhamena.
Chieina church khalattana Khristali hamkasang chithada preiva̱ngarāna gaharangarāli hamsangchaophalungra.
Gaharangarā, Khristana churchli leikashi thada kala chiwui vang a khalattawui manglā chihokhami chithada preiva̱ ngarāli leishilu.
Awui tui eina tara̱ eina kapheo thada pheohailaga church chi Vareli tharchigat khavaina.
Kaja church chi kathar eina khayon-khamāng, chukhara kala khavāt maleilakla church khalattali chigat khavaina.
Gaharangarāna athum khalattawui phasāli leikashi thada preiva̱ngarāli leishiphalungki kajina. Preiva̱li leikashi a chiya a khalattalila leishiya.
Khipānakha a khalattawui phasāli yangkakharing maleimana, kha Khristana church reisang khavai kasā thada, anala awui phasāli phāwuida reisang khavai sai;
kaja ithum awui phasākaisera.
Hithada Kathara lairikli hānghai, “Hiwui vang eina mayarnao akhana ava̱ avā horhaida apreiva̱li ngarumhaora; kala ani khani akha ngasāhaora.”
Kathara lairik hili kathuka ngathum kahaiwui mashun phongshok kahai hi Khrista eina churchwui pongli kahāngna da ina bhap tai.
Chithālala hila nathumli kahāngna: gahara kachiva̱na khalattali leikashi thada preiva̱li leishiphalungra kala preiva̱ kachiva̱nala gaharali khayāshiphalungra.
Naoshinaobing, Prohowui mangāli nava̱ navāwui kahāng nganālu, kaja hi nathumna sākhangayi khamashungana.
“Nava̱ navāli khayāshilu” kaji hi ngashitmi kahai ningkhami kharena.
Chithada saakha nathum ringphāra kala okpeimeira.
Ava̱-avāngarā, naongarāli athumna malungvātkapaiwui apong eina marākalu, kha Prohowui hāngkachithei kala kharāk chi eina rarkā ngasaklu.
Raobing, Khristali otram ngatha̱khamina da phaninglaga nathumwui akhavābingli khayākashi, khangachee kala ningkathar eina kahāng nganālu.
Athumwui kapen samphang khavai athumwui miktāmāngli kasā maningla kha Khristawui rao thada, Varewui ningkachāng chi ningtongda sālu.
Mili maningla, Proholi otram khangatha̱na da nathumwui ot chi rao thada mathānthathup sālu.
Phaningunglu kaja raolapai, ningkhān kahailapai, ana sākahai kaphā ot chiwui vang Prohona mi kachiva̱li sāman mira.

Akhavābing, nathumwui raobingli hi tākam eina sālu kala mamachitalu. Phaningunglu kaja nala kala nawui raobingla mi kachiva̱li ngaraikachā apong eina bichar sāki kaje kazingramli khalei Akhavāwui misera.
Naomeikapta, Proholi khangarum kala awui pangshap chieina nathumwui pangshap pangsang ngasaklu.
Nathumli Varena khami raisari katonga shaksākhuilu, chithākha makaphā Chipeena mareimarā kasā chili nathumna nganingshapra,
kaja ithumna mikumoli khangarar maningmana, kha kazingli khalei makathara manglābing, khamungabing, sāshap pangshapabing kala tangkhamang thotwui apuk-apagawui pangshapli khangararna.

Chiwui vang eina ara Varewui raisāri chi shaksākhuilu! Chithākha makaphā zimiksho kharā tharan yangkashebingna rai rākatāli ngasungshapra; kala raikup vāshungda ngarar kahaiwui thilila nathum leisachingra.
Kala chingri kahaiwui Pao Khamathā chishāt khavai ngarānping kahai china pheimakhei sālu.
Atam kachiva̱li shitkasang chi chāngvei sāda phunglu, kaja chi eina nathumna makaphāpā china kāpkharā meirikakā malāthing chi sāshimitshapra.
Kala huikhami chi raikuihon thada ngahonlu, kala Varewui tui chi Manglāna nathumli khami raighai thada singlu.
Manglāna thānkhami chiwui alungli Varewui khangachon samphang khavai otsak saikorali seihā kasā eina ngasoda polu. Varewui mibingwui vang seihā sāmichinglu.
Ina matui khavai khangarān kasā tharan, Varena awui chānpao chi mikhavai, iwui vangla seihā sāmilu, chithākha ina pinglak eina matuida paokaphāwui ngathum kahai tui chi theingasakpaira.
Ina phātop kazanga mi ngasāsālala, paokaphā hiwui paokazatana. Ina hāngphalungki kaji Paokaphā hi pinglak eina matuishap khavai seihā sāmilu.
Chiwui vang eina ithum kathada leilikhala kaji hāngchithei khavai kala nathumli kasatsangmi khavai ina ali nathumwuili chihokharāna.
Shitkasang eina ngasoda chingri kahai kala leikashi chi Avāva̱ Vare kala Proho Jishu Khristana shitkasanga avānaobing saikorali miranu.
Ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristali mathāhailakla leikashe athum saikorali Varewui lukhamashan china ngasomichingranu.
Ina nathumli phaningung kachida iwui Vareli ningshi;
seihā kasā kachiva̱li nathumwui vang khamathān eina ina seihā sai.
Kharewui eina thuida aja rāshungda paokaphāwui ot nathumna sākharumwui vang ringphai.
Kala nathumwui lungli kaphā ot sāphokkhame Varena, Khrista Jishuwui Zimiksho eina tangda ot chi sāchingrada shitsangchaowa.

Nathum iwui ningli leichinghaoda ina hithada kaphaning hi ngayilaka, kaja arui ina phātopli leilakhala kala paokaphā hi khamashungana da shākhi khami kala khanganing atamlila nathumna ili ngasoda Varewui lukhamashan samphangruma.
Ina nathumli leikashi hi Khrista Jishu a khalattana chitheimi kahai leikashi eina kharāna kaji hi mashun tuina da Varena thei.
Kala theikakhui eina chukkhamaja̱ ngasoda nathumwui leikashi mataisangmamān khavai ina seihā sai.
Chithada sāda nathumna phameikap kaje chi kapangkhuishapra kala Khristawui Zimiksholi makathar kala mina kaphen saikora maleisāmara.
Vareli tekmatei khavai kala masochikat khavai, Khrista Jishumāngna mikashap kaphā magunbing chi nathumwui mirinli pemtinghaora.
Khristali otram khangatha̱wui vang ili phātop sanghaowa kaji hi konung khamayonabing kala chili khalei mi khangateibing saikoranala thei.
Ina phātopli kazangwui vang avānao kachungkhali Proholi kachihān mataisang ngasaka. Chieina athumna khangachee maleila paokaphā hashok khavai thangkachida malung pingkhangai pinga.
Mi kaikhana yangshāt kala mikpaishāt eina Khristawui pao hāshoka, kha khangatei kaikhana kaphā ningngai eina hāshoka.
Chithada kasā chi leikashiwui eina kharāna, kaja Varena ili paokaphāwui vang nganing khavai mikahaina kaji hi athumna thei.
Kateibing chiya ningkathar eina Khristawui pao tamkachithei maningla khalattawui tongzā khavaiwui ningngai eina kasāna. Ina photopli leilakha mataimeida iwui vang eina khonzār khavai sārada phaninga.
Chithālala khikha maleimana! Sākakhaningranu, khamashungranu saikora chi Khristawui vang I mathāna kala mathānchingra.
Thilala, ringlala, atam kachida, mataimeikapta aruihon malungkaping eina I khalatta chikatchaohailaga Khrista maiyā khavai kasāli ina machihohailakmara kaji hi iwui ningkachāngna.
Iwui vanga ringlala Khristali kharingna; thihailala tongmei.
Kha ina ringvāfasi kaja kaphā ot kachungkha sākapai lei. Chithālala, kachipā kasāna phameinikhala da matheirarthura.
Khani hiwui ngachaili kapangkhui khavai iwui vang saklaka. Thihailaga Khristali ngasokapam hi iwui ningkachāngna, chi phāmeikhara.
Kha nathumwui vang eina I kharing phāmei.
Nathumwui reikasang kala shitkasangli khamathān chi mataisang khavai nathumli I okthuirumvāfara kaji ina theishinghaira.
Kaja hina nathumna Khristali tekkmatei khavai apong chungmeida samphangra.

Nathumwui mirin chi paokaphāwui athishurda kazata mirin ringphalungra. Chieina ina nathumli rātheilala, marātheilala nathumna paokaphāli shitkasangwui vang ning khokkha sāda ngararrumda lei, kala ning akha sāda nganingtitta lei kaji pao kashā samphangra.
Yangkashebingli mangacheelakalu. Atam kachida malung pinglu, chithākha nathumna yuichingra. Kachiwui vangkhala kaja khayui hi Varena khamina.
Khristali shitkasangmāng maningla kha awui vang kachotkachāng phungda otram ngatha̱ khavai nathumli atam kachā mihaira.
Ara nathumla ili ngasoda ngararrumpaihaora. Ina khangarar arui nathumna shāda khalei hila ina rida ngarar kahai chipapama.
Leikashi akhawui lungli ningphanin akha eina khokkha-yāngkha sāda ili ringphāchao ngasakmilu da poli.
Khalatta masotmasaoalu, kha akhana akhali phāmeiya da phaning ngaroklu.
Khalatawui vāngmāng maphaningalu, kha ningaishi ngaroklu.
Nathumla Jishuwui kasākhavā thada sālu.
Varewui khangachā chi awuili leichinga, kha ana Vareli ngaraichā khavai masālakmana.
Akhalattana mareojeo awui khalalei saikora horhailaga rao akhawui khangachā sai, mi akha ngasālaga mikumowui khangachā eina rai.
A malung nimlaka kala kathi eina tangda kahāng nganai— krushli thimi.
Chiwui vang eina Varena ali juimeikap kaji pamli khāngkai kala saikorawuitungli hakmeikap kaje aming chi phokmi.
Chieina kazingramlila, okathuilila, apuk-apagalila, manglākapai saikorana Jishuwui mingli khayāshida khuktilaga khorumra,
kala Avāva̱ Varivarali tekmatei khavai, yur saikorana Jishu Khrista hi Prohona da hāngphatra.

Chieina, iwui leikashebing, nathumna atam kachida kahāng nganā kahai thada, aruila, imiktāmāngli maningla kha lāngmeikharda I makhalei tharan Vareli khangachee kala kachiham eina nathumwui huikhami chi mapung phakhavai hotnakhuilu.
Kaja awui kaphaning chi sāngairareo sākhavai kala sāshap khavai Varena nathumwui alungli ot sāda lei.
Ot saikora ngakaikashi maleila sāngairareo eina sālu.

Chithākha khamakhao okathui hili nathumna morei kaphunga mibingwui alungli okthuilala khayon makhalei kala kathara, Varenao thada okthuira. Kharingwui chānpao chi athumli mida, sirāna kazingram horkhangasak thada athumwui ngachaili nathumna horphalungra.
Kharingwui tui singtitakha Khristawui Zimiksholi iwui sākahai ot saikora arema mangasāmana da nathumwui vang eina I langsokapai apong leisāra.
Nathumwui shitkasangwui pha̱kaphayā kachigatli iwui ashee heirorra jilala I ringphai, kala ina nathum saikorali mathānrumra.
Chi tākam eina nathumla ringphāphalungra kala nathumwui khamathān chila ili chitheiphalungra.
Prohowui khamayāna jiakha ina Timothyli nathumwuili thaklāk eina chihorāra, chieina nathumwui pao shāda I ringphāpaira.
Nathumwui vang phākhavai ningsangda samiki kaje a kathā mi khangatei maleimana.
Khangateibing chiya Jishu Khristawui otli ning masangla kachichāwui phakhavaimāng sai.
Kha Anaomayarana Avāva̱li otram khangatha̱ thada, ana ili ngasoda kathada paokaphāwui vang otram ngathahaira̱khala kajila, awui kākashungla nathumna theihaira.
Ina khi sāmameirakhala kaji theikhuikhaleoda ali chihorā khavai phaningda lei.
Ila nathumwuili thaklāk eina rāshaphaolapai da Proholi chihana.
Ili otsakruma kala otram ngatha̱mida nathumwui paokaphunga sāmida khalei ichinā Epaphroditusla nathumwuili chihovāphalungrali da phaninghaira.
Ana nathum saikorali theingailak eina leili, kala a kazāda leili kaji nathumna shāhaira kajiwui vang ning chotta lei.
Mha, a kazāpapama, kathila thinaikhaya: kha Varena ali lumashanmi; amāngli maningla kha wukkakhanang mangaror khavai ilila lumashanmi.
Nathumna ali theiluishitlaga ringphāpai khavai, kala iwui ning kachotla suitā khavai, ina ali chihorāngailaka.
Ringkaphā eina Prohowui mingli chinaongarā thada ali samphangmilu kala athum kathāli khayāshilu.
Kaja nathum khalattana ili mangachonmikharar chi ngachonmi khavai ana manglā hamlaga Khristawui vang ot sāda thinaikhaya.
Naomeikapta, ivānaobing. Prohowui mingli mathānlu, ina rida kapi kahai chi hāngluikida ngachang machatmana, chi nathumwui vāngla phākhavaina.
Makaphā ot kasā; ahui rimshokphalungra da kasā fa kathabing chili ning ngasharlu.

Akachang ahui rimkashok samphang kahaibing chi ithumna, athum maningmana, kaja ithumna Vareli awui Manglawui pangshap eina khoruma kala Khrista Jishuli ngarumda ithumwui mirinli mathāna. Ayarwui otsak khangalangli ithumna mashitsangmana.
Inala chikathāli shitsangpai. Nathum kachikathana ayarwui otsak khangalangli shitsangpai da phaningakha, ina langmeikharda phaning khavai apong lei.
Kachishata thang ili ahui rimshoka. I Benjaminwui shimkhurli kapharā Israelnao akhana, kākashunga Hebrewnaona, Jihudiwui ain khamayonli yangsa jiakha iva Phariseena,
kala ainli lungsansāhaoda ina Vareshinaobingli rekhareksai. Ainwui kakaso khamayona hikathā mili mashungmipai jisi kaja iva khayon makhaleia ngasāra.
Kha ina tongkazāna da phaningkasā chi ara Khristawui vang eina kashimānna da theikhuihaira.

Chimāng maningmana; iwui Proho Khrista Jishuli theikakhuiwui aman kasak chiwui vang eina ot saikora aremana da shānkhui. Awui vang eina ina ot saikora horhaira; chibing chi khamakhaowa thothap kathana da ina khuiya, chithākha ina Khrista chi samphangpai

kala ali ngarumchaohaipai. Ain khamayonwui vang I khalattawui khamashung khangarong chi I maleiluimana. Ara ina khalei chiya shitkasangli pheisinda Varewui eina kharā, Khristali shitkasang manga eina khami khamashung khangarong china.
Ina ningkachāng chiya Khristali kathei, awui ringkhalui pangshap mazapkhayang, awui kachotkachāng phungkhangarum kala awui kathi thada kathi,
ilila kathiwui eina ringshok ngasakra kaji iwui kachihānna.
Ina hi samphangchaohaira kala I kāshungchaohaira kaji maningmana; kha Khristana ili yuikakhuiwui sāman chi yuikhui khavai ina hotnāchingda lei.

Mha, ivānaobing, ina sāman chi samphanghaira da phaningchao majimana, thalala ina phaningda khalei chiya iwui khanukshong khalei chi malaihailaga, mangāshong khalei chili vāshung khavai ina kashap chi hotnāda lei.
Chiwui vang eina Khristawui mangā eina atungshong Varena ili kahowui sāman chi samphang khavai atāzanshong angatar eina ina kharomzatta lei.
Ithum manglārinwui pongli kāshung kahai saikorana chithada phaningphalungra. Kha kachikathāna ngateida kaphaning leiakha chila Varena nathumli chitheimira;
chithālala arui rāshungda ithumna shurrā kahai ainzā athishurda mangāshong muivāsa.
Ina nathumli hāngchinghaira kala aruila chāra̱ eina ngasoda kahāngna: Khristana krushtungli thikhamiwui kakhalat mashok khangasak mirin kharing mi kachungkha lei.
Athum meifali vātangsera, kaja phasāwui ningkachāngli phākazat chi athumwui vare ngasāhaowa; khayakkhamarao otsakli athumna langsoi, athum okathui otmāngli phaninga,
kha ithuma kazingramwui ruichumnaona kala chiwui eina rāki kaje Huikhame Proho Jishu Khristali ithum honda lei.
Awui pangshap chi eina ot saikora awui azingli leingasakta ithumwui khikha masākhavai phasā hi awui tekhamatei phasā thada onngasakhaora.
Chieina ivānaobing, nathumli ina kayākha leishida honlikhala? Nathumna ili ringphā ngasaka kala nathumwui vang I mai kālaka. Mha, chithada Prohowui vang nganingtitki kajina.
Euodia eina Syntyche, nani Prohowui mangāli chonnaoni kathāna da mayā ngaroklu da poli.

Ili ningtongda otsakruma nathumla sha̱nao khani hili khangachonmilu da poli. Khikhalajila ani khani hi pao hākashokli, Varewui kharinga lairikli aming yikahai Clement inili ngasoda panglāk eina ot sārumsai.
Atam kachida Proholi ringkhangarumwui vang mathānchinglu. Ina hāngluishitli: mathānlu!
Nathumwui ja̱mi kathei chi mi kachiva̱li chitheilu, Proho rāki kaji nganailakhaira.
Khiotkhawui vang malungmaringalu, kha ningkashi eina ngasoda nathumna khavavāt chiwui vang Vareli seihā sāda polu.
Mikumona maphaningvākharar Varewui chingri kahai china nathumwui wuklungla, ningla Khrista Jishuli khangarumwui alungli haimira.
Naomeikapta, ivānaobing, khamathā masot samphangkhangayi, khamashung, ningkahak, mashun, kathar, khamathā kala khayakakā hikathā hi nathumwui ningli shāptithailu.
Tui eina nilala, otsak eina nilala, nathumna iwui eina tamkhui kahai kala samphang kahai chiwui athishurda sālu; chieina chingri kahai Varena nathumli ngasomira.
I khavāt leikahaiwui vang hi kahāng maningmana, kaja iya iwui khalalei chi shapa kaji tamkhuihaira.
Khi ngavāphalungra kala khi henda leiphalungra kaji ina thei. Apam kaji, atam kajida thailala, tholala, pemlala, vātlala, ot saikorali ningyāng ungkatheiwui ngathum kahai awor chi ina tamkhuihaira.
Ili pangkhangasaka Khristawui mangā eina ina ot saikora sāshapsera.
Iwui kakhanangli nathumna phungkharum hi nathum ning kālaka.
Philippinaobing, ina paokaphā hāshokkhare kachāng, Macedoniawui eina kathui tharan, nashi churchmāngna ili ngachonmi kaji nathumna thei. Nashimāngna iwui ringkaphā, ringkashi phungrumma.
Thessalonicali leilakha nathumna ili khangachon mirāchinga.
Nathumna thada khami ot chi ningkachāng maningmana, kha nathumwui otsak khamathā chi mataisang ngasakngai.

Nathumna khami chi peida samphangserhaira, shapshaphaira. Epaphroditusnala nathumna khangachon chi khuirāmida ara khikha mavātlakmana. Hi Varewui mangāli khuisangkapai nganamkaphā pha̱kaphayā kathāna.
Kala Khrista Jishuwui mangā eina iwui Varena nathumwui darkar kasā saikora chi ngarumsangmiranu.
Ithumwui Avāva̱ Varivarali katang mavaila tekmateichingranu. Amen.
Khrista Jishuli khalei kathara mi kachiva̱li shālam mili. Ili ngasokapama shitkasangbingnala nathumli shālam mili.
Hili khalei Varewui mibing, matailak eina wungreiwui konungli khaleibingnala nathumli shālam mili.
Khrista Jishuwui paokazata Paul kala ithumwui ichinā Timothy inina Varewui ningkachāng athishurda —
Ithumwui Avāva̱ Varena nathumli lukhamashan eina chingri kahai miranu.
Kaja Jishu Khristali nathumwui shitkasang kala Vareshinao saikorali leikashi chi ithumna shāhaira.

Nathumli khamashung chānpao—Pao Khamathā, rimeikapta rāhāngkachithei tharan china nathumli kachihān mira kaji chi nathumna shāhaira. Chieina shitkasang kala leikashina pheisin sāda khalei nathumwui kachihān chi kazingramli mathālak eina pharimihaida lei.
Nathumna Varewui lukhamashan pao shāthanghon kala chi mashunga da theikhuithanghon eina thuida paokaphā hina sokhami khuirāmichingda lei kala okathui apam saikoralila ngayaovāda lei.
Nathumna Varewui lukhamashan pao hi ningtonglak eina Khristawui otram khangatha̱ ithumwui mathun Epapharaswui eina kashāna.
Manglāna kasatmida nathum kayākha leishi ngarokhala kaji ana ithumli hāngchitheihaira.
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui pao shāthang eina thuilaga atam kachida manglāna khami thangkhamei kala theishingkakhuilungli Varewui awor china nathumli chipemmi khavai sāmichinga.
Chieina Prohowui ningkachāng athishurda nathumna ringshapra kala atam kachida ali ningyāng ungngasakshapra. Nathumwui mirin china khamathā ot kachungkha sāshapra kala Vareli mataimeida theikhuira.
Nathumli Varewui tekhamatei pangshap china yāng kāngasakranu. Chithada, sāda nathumna ot saikorali ja̱khami eina khāngshapra.
Varena awui miyurbingwui vang ngarānmi kahai wungram chili nathumwui sharukla zangngasakhaowa kajiwui vang khamathān eina ngasoda Avāva̱li masotchikatlu.
Ana tangkhamangwui eina ithumli kanshokmida awui khaluma Naomayarawui wungramli khuiungmihaira.
Ara ithumli ningkhān ngasakhaira, kaja ithumwui morei pheomihaira.

Khikhalajila kazingramlila, okathuilila, mik eina theikapaila, matheikapaila, manglāwui pangshapla, akhavābingla, khamunga-bingla, pangshap kasingabingla Varena ot saikora hi awui mangā eina kasāna. Varena haori-haorang hupva hi awui mangā eina sai kala awui vangsera,
Ot saikora hi masāranglakha Khrista leisai kala ot saikora chi kachichāwui angayei makailakla leisai.
Ana awui phasā, kaja churchwui akuiana, haokaphoka, kathebingwui eina pharāshok kharena. Chieina ot saikorali ana mataimeikap kajina.
Varewui khangachā saikora chi Naomayara khalattawuili peida leiser kaji hi Varewui kaphaningna,
kala awui manga eina okathuilila, kazingramlila khalei saikora krushwui ashee china chingri eina ali ngashimkhui khavai sai.
Atam akhali nathumwui makaphā otsak kala ningphaninwui nathum Varewui eina tāda leisai kala awui yangkashe ngasāsai.
Kha ara awui Naomayarawui phasāthitwui mangā eina ana nathumli kathar eina, kasheng eina chuk-khara̱ maleila chikat khavai awui ngasotnao sangasakhaira.

Paul ina paokaphā chiwui otram khangatha̱ sāda kazingramwui azingli khalei manglākapai yur kachiva̱li tamchithei kahai nathumna shākahai paokaphāli kachihān chi mangacheila nganingtitta shitsangchinglu.

Ara ina nathumwui vang kachotkachāng samkaphang hi ringphai, kaja Khristana awui phasā, kaja churchwui vang kachotkachāng maphungkhangakan chi kāpei khavai ina iwui phasāli kachotkachāng phungda khalei hina ngachonmida lei.
Varena ili churchwui otram khangatha̱ akha sāngasaka. Hi nathumli ngachon khavai ana ili sākhangasakna. Otsin hiya ana hāngmi kahai chānpao saikora chi hāngchithei khavaiwui vangna.
Thot-thotli thumhaikasā kathuka tui chi ara awui kathara mibingli phongmihaira;

kathuka tui hi awui mibingli chithei khavai kala miyur saikorawui vang kayākha tekhamatei tuikhala da chitheikhangai hi Varewui khangarānna. Kathuka tui chiya Khrista nathumwuili zanghaoda Varewui tekhamatei chili nathumla zangrumhaira.

Chiwui vang eina ithumna mi kachiva̱li Khristawui pongli hākashokna, kashap eina tangda thangkhamei tui eina ithumna mi kachiva̱ hi Khristawui lungli kākashunga mi akha sāda Varewui mangāli zangkhavai athumli machina kala tamchithei.
Hi ungshung khavai Khristana ili khami yāng pangshap shichinlaga ina ngararda ot sai.
Nathumwui vangla, Laodiceali khaleibingwui vangla kala ili masamphanglakrang kajebingwui vangla ina kayākha chotta ot sākhala kaji hangga,
pingmeida kala leikashina kompeimida theishingkakhuiwui eina kharā ngashitmi kahai chi samphang khavai ina hi kasāna; chithākha athumna Varivarawui ngathum kahai Khrista chi theira.
Khrista hi Varewui thangkhamei kala aworwui thumkahai lan saikora shokhavai shona.
Ina nathumli kahāngna kaja makhamashunga ngaphat-ngayāt kasā chi kayākha khamashung thada theisālala china nathumli mangui ngasakhaialu.
Kaja nathumli ina mangasopamsālala nathumwui vang phaningmichinga, kala nathumna Khristali shitkasang chi ngaziplak eina khalei chi theilaga ringphai.
Nathumna Khrista Jishu hi Prohona da khuisang kahaiwui vang ali ringrumlu.
Nathumwui angayung awuili sa̱khuititlu, nathumwui mirin awuitungli sākālu kala nathumli tamchithei kahai thada nathumwui shitkasang pangsang ngasaklu. Kala ningkashina pemtinghailu.

Ngasharlu kaja Khristawui eina kharā maningla awo-ayiwui eina maron-maron tamchitheikharā, apuk-apaga khamunga makaphā manglāwui eina kharā kala mikumowui thangkhamei mareimarāwui eina kashok china nathumli rao masā ngasakalu.
Kaja Khristana mikumo sāda okthuilakha Varewui tharkhamatheng saikora chi ali leisera.
Chieina ali ngashikta okthuikharumlungli nathumli kākashunga mirin chi mihaira. Ava manglāwui khamunga kala sāshap pangshapa saikorawuitungli khamunga akhavāna.
Khristali khangarumwui alungli nathumli ahui rimshokhaira, mikumona kasā rimkashok maningla, kha khalattawui morei pangshapwui ningkhānkhami Khristana kasa rimkashokna.

Kaja nathumli ra̱hikkhami tharan nathum Khristali ngasoda chifarum kahaina, kala ali kathiwui eina ringkhangasaka sāshapa Vareli shitkasang mangā eina ra̱kahikwui otsak hieina nathumla Khristali ngasoda ringshokrumhaira.

Moreiwui vang kala ain makhangavā miyur ngasāsāhaoda nathum atam akhali manglāwui pongli thida leisai. Kha ara nathumli Varena Khristawui mangā eina ringngasakhaira kala ithumwui morei saikorala pheomihaira.
Leiman kazangwui eina ara kokmichaohaira.
Ana yuihaida makaphāwui khangamkharei kala sāshap pangshap saikora khikha maningmana da yarui mangāli kashankachon kharai thada phonglāk eina sāchithei.
Hikathā ot saikora hiya naodawui amahā kathāna. Kha akachanga chiya Khristana.

Theivākashap pangshap leihaowa da kateili phāmeiya da kaphaningbing, phākharekbing kazingraoli khokharumwui vang juimeiada kaphaningbingna nathumli mangui ngasakhailu. Chikathā mibing chiya maram makhaleilila okathui lāngsot ningngai eina matuikhangai matui,

kala churchwui akui Khristali athum mazangluimana. Khristawui mangā eina phasāwui akai katongali kashakazā mizai kala phasāwui akai katongali akha sāngasakta Varena haksang ngasakkhangai athishurda haksanga.
“Hi masāza̱alu”, “Hi mamazapalu”, “Hi masingalu.” kaji hi mayāhaokhala?
Hikathā hiya shichin kahaiwui thili shimānhaoki kaji mikumona semkakhuiya ayin kala tamkachitheimaya.

Kachangkhat eina hāngsa jiakha hikathā ayinbing hiya kazingraobingli khorum khavai tandi kasā phākharekbing kala phasāli rekharekta kachotkachāng khamebingli shikachinna. Kha ayinbing hi phasāwui khamathang lungli shimān ngasak khavai pangshap maleimana.
Nathumwui ning chi okathuiwui otbingli maningshaialu kha kazingramwui otbingli ningshailu.
Kaja nathum thihaira kala nathumwui mirin chi Khristali ngasoda Varewui lungli thumkahaina.
Nathumwui kachangkhat mirin chiya Khristana kala ana latkharā tharan nathumla ali ngasoda awui tekhamateili zangrumra.

Chiwui vang eina nathumna okathui phasāwui ningkachāng kaja, sopkhamasap, makathar, khamathang-khamarang, makaphāli ningkachāng kala kākharām (kaja kākharām hi meoma̱li khokharum kathāna) hikathāthā hi chithitphalungra.
Hikathā otsakbingwui vang Varewui malungkhavāt chi awui kahāng makhanganābingli tāra.
Atam akhali nathumwui mirin chikathā ningkachāngna mungda leilakha nathum chikathā mirin ringsai.
Kha ara nathumna malungkhavāt, khamathang, yangkakharingwui kaphaning saikora horhaiphalungra. Nathumwui khamor eina kazei tui kala shuikhangarui misuichān mamatuiphalungmara.
Nathum akha eina akha makapik ngarokalu, kaja nathumna sākasā kachama otsak saikora chi horserhaida kadhara mi ngasāhaira.
Hiya kasā Akhavā Varena a khipākhala da theishingkhui khavai awui sakrinlungli atam kachida nathumli dharngasakchingda lei.

Hithada sāda Gentilebing eina Jihudibing, ahui rimkashok eina marimkashokbing, makākashunga Scythianaobing kala raonao eina ningkhān kahaibing khangatei maleiluimana, kha saikorali khalei Khrista hi tongtingana, Khrista saikorali lei.
Nathum akha eina akha ya jimi ngaroklu. Khristana pheokhami thada nathum akha eina akha pheomi ngarokphalungra.
Kala hāngda khalei magunbing hili, kāshunglak eina khokkha sākhavai ot saikora khalaprumkhame leikashi chi ngarumsanglu.
Khristana khami chingri kahai china nathumwui wuklungli mungranu, kaja chili nathumli asā akha sākhavai Varena hokakhuina, chiwui vang ningshilu.

Khristawui tui hi nathumwui wuklungli pemtinghai ngasaklu. Nathum akha eina akha theithangmeilak eina tamchithei ngaroklu kala machin ngaroklu. Laa einala, masotlaa einala kala kathara laa einala Vareli nathumwui wuklungli ningkashi eina ngasoda sochikatlu.
Kala nathumna ot kasāli nilala, tui khamatuili nilala Avā Vareli ningkashi mida otsak kachiva̱li Proho Jishuwui ming eina sālu.
Gahara ngarā, preiva̱ ngarāli leishilu kala masāshialu.
Naongarābing, atam kachida nava̱ navāwui kahāng nganālu, kaja china Vareli ningyāng ungngasaka.
Ava̱ avā ngarā, naongarāli malungmavāt ngasakalu, ning suitāhaipaishina.
Raobing, nathumwui akhavāli athumwui miktāli ningyāng ungkhavaimāngwui vang maningla ot saikorali athumwui kahāng nganālu. Ot kasā saikorali Proholi khayākashiwui vang ningtonglak eina sālu.
Mibingli otram khangatha̱ maningla Proholi otram khangatha̱na da phaninglaga kasāsā chi ningtonglak eina sālu.
Prohona awui mibingwui vang ngarān kahai sāman chi nathumli mira kaji hi phaningungchinglu. Kaja nathumna otram ngatha̱da khalei Khrista chi Akhavā chilaka.
Makaphā kasā mi chili awui otsak athishurda kashong rāngra, kachiwui vangkhala kaja Varena mi kachiva̱li mimai mayangla bichar sai.
Nathumna seihā kasā tharan Khristawui kathuka ngathum kahai chānpao hāshok khavai Varena atam kachā khuirāmi khavai pomilu, kaja hiwui vang I phātop zangda khaleina.
Seihā sālu, chithākha ina matuiphalungki kaji chi tharzā eina matuishapra.
Nathumwui chānhān mathā ngasaklu kala ringphā ngasaklu, kala ngarakzak eina ngahānthei khavai sālu.
Ithumna kathada leilikhala da nathumna theipai khavai kala nathumli kasatsangda ringphā ngasak khavai hiwui vangmāng eina ina ali chihokharāna.
Kala ali ngasoda nathumwui ngasotnao shitsangkapai kala ngahānkhangai leikashia ivānao Onesimuslila chihorāli. Hili kashokshok saikora anina nathumli hāngmira.
Justusla kaho Joshuanala shālam chiphunli. athum hi ili ngasoda Vare wungramwui vang ot sakharuma Jihudiwui eina Vareshi sākahaibingna. Athumna ili tarākha ngachonmida lei.
Ana nathumwui vang kala Laodicea eina Hierapoliswui mibingwui vang panglāk eina ot sai da ina shākhi mishapa.
Ithumwui leikashe khanong Luke kala Demasna aniwui shālam chiphunli.
Ithumwui shālam hi Laodiceali khalei ivānaobing kala Nimphas kahova̱ eina awui shimli kazipkhangaruma Vareshibingli hāngmilu.
Nathumna chithi hi pākhuihailaga Laodiceawui Vareshibinglila pāngasaklaklu kala Laodiceawui ivānaobingna chiphunrāki kaji chithi chi nathum pāphalungra.
Kala Archippusli, “Prohowui otram ngatha̱ khavai nali mikahai ot chi sākuphalungra” da hānglu.
Varewui lukhamashan nathumli ngasomiranu.
Lukhamashan kala chingri kahai chi nathumwui ngasāranu.
Ithumwui Avāva̱ Varivarawui mangāli nathumwui shitkasang eina leikashiwui otsak kala ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristali chihāntitta khalei chi phaningungchinga.
Ivānaobing, Varena nathumli leishida awui ngasā khavai kapangkhuihaira da ithumna thei.

Kaja, paokaphā chi nathumli ithumna tuimāng eina khuikharā maningla kha Varewui pangshap kala Manglā Kathara kala chiwui khamashungwui theishingkakhui eina khuirai. Nathumli ngasopamda leilakha nathumwui vang phāmei khavai kathada pānrumsākhala kaji nathumna machutkhuihaira.
Nathumna ithum kala Prohowui kasākhavā sha̱khui kaja nathumna kachotkachāng samphangsālala paokaphā chi Manglā Katharana khami khamathān chi eina khuisanga.
Hithada sāda nathum Macedonia eina Achaiawui shitkasangbing saikorawui ngayo khavaina.
Kaja Achaia eina Macedoniawui alungli nathumna tui chi hākashok chili ithumna khikha hānglui khavai maleimana.
Ithumna kharā tharan nathumna ithumli samkhangarok kala meoma̱ horhaida khamashung kala kharinga Vareli kathada otram ngatha̱haokhala kaji mi saikorana ngazeksera.
Ithumli rāki kaji malungkhavāt chiwui eina kanshokkhame, kathiwui eina Varena ringkhangasaka Anaomayara Jishuwui pongli athumna ngazeksera.
Ivānaobing, ithumna nathumwuili kharā chi arema maningmana da nathumna thei.
Nathumli marāranglakha, Philippili rekharekta ithumli maishi khangasak chi nathumna thei, kala chili ngasung khavai tarākha leisālala paokaphā chi nathumli hāshok khavai ithumli malungkaping sangmi.
Kaja ithumli tamkachithei hi makhamashung, makathar kala minamda sākakhaibing maningmana.
Kha Varena mayāmida ithumli horsangkhami paokaphā, ana hāngngasakkhangai chi khamatuina. Hi mikumoli maningla kha ithumwui wuklung katheia Vareli ningyāng ungngasak khavaina.
Ithumna sotkhamasao tui mamatuimana kaji nathumna thei kala karāmda masāmana kajila Varena shākhina.
Khristawui paokazatbingna da hāngngayilala, nathumwui eina nilala, khangateibingwui eina nilala, ithumna mibingwui masot maphāmana.
Kha ava̱va̱na anaongarāli sophayolak eina khanganao thada nathumwui ngachaili ithumna malungnimlak eina sai.
Nathumli hiyākha leikashiwui vang Varewui paokaphāmāng mikhangai maningla, ithum khalatta eina tangda chigatngai, kaja nathumli leishilāka.
Ivānaobing, ithumna ngalangzarda ot panglāk eina kasā chi nathumna phaningungra; Varewui paokaphā chi nathumli tamchitheilakha, nathum khipākha makhanang khavai, ithumna ngashun ngayā mateila ot sai.
Shitkasanga nathumli ithumna kasā acham aram chi kathara, khamashunga kala khayon makhaleiana kaji nathum kala Varena shākhina.
Ava̱va̱na anaongarāli kasā thada ithumna nathum ava̱va̱li chithada sai kaji nathumna thei.
Nathumli awui khamung kala tekhamatei chili zangrum khavai kaho Varewui ningyāngkhaung mirin chikathā ringkhavai ithumna kasatta ninglum ngasaka kala hāngchithei.

Ivānaobing, Judea ngaleili khalei Varewui churchbing, Khrista Jishuli kazanga mibingli kashok tākam eina nathumlila shoka. Jihudibingwui pāngli athumna kachotkachāng samkaphang chithada nathumla nathumwui miyurwui pāngli kachotkachāng samphanga.
Jihudibingna Proho Jishulila, marānbinglila shaothata, ithumlila rekhareka kala Vareli malungvāt ngasaka kala mi saikorali mamayāmana.
Huikhami khuirāki kaji paokaphā chi Gentilebingli mahāshok khavai ithumli athumna hapa.
Nathumli rāngailaka, Paul ina rākida hotna khani-kathum shihaira, kha Satanna hapkhanohaowa.
Kaja ithumwui Proho Jishu kharā atamli awui mangāli ithumwui kachihān, ringkaphā khayuiwui lāngso khavai chi nathum maningla khangatei khipā leikhala?
Nathum hi ithumwui mathān khavai kala mai kākhavailaka.
Kala Khristawui paokaphā hākashoklungli Varewui vang ithumli otsakruma Timothyli nathumwui shitkasang ngatarmei khavai kala kasatsang khavai kachihona.
Chithākha hikathā rekakharek hina nathum masa̱na̱ungmara. Chikathā rekakharek chiya ithumwui vang Varewui kaphaningwui akai akhana da nathumna thei.
Nathumli ngasopamda leilakha ithumli kachotkachāng rāra da ithumna nathumli hānghaikasā chi rāshokkachanghaira da nathumna thei.

Chiwui vang eina ina phaningla mararthuda nathumwui shitkasang pongli kathada leilikhala kaji theikhui khavai kaja chipeena suikhuihaida ithumna sākahai saikora arema ngasāhaipaishinada ngacheeda Timothyli kachihona.
Ivānaobing nathumwui pao shālaga nathumwui shitkasang mangā eina ithumwui kachotkachāng saikora malai ngasaka.
Kaja nathumna Proholi nganingtitta lei kajiwui vang ithumli ninglum ngasaka.
Ara nathumwui vang Vareli ningshi. Varewui mangāli nathumwui vang khamathān khalei chiwui vang ningkashina.
Ithum mai eina mai thei ngarok khavai kala nathumwui shitkasangli vātta khalei chili chipemmi khavai ngashun ngayā thuklak eina seihā sāda lei.
Nathumli rāsamphang khavai ithumwui Avāva̱ Varivara kala Proho Jishuna shongfa chitheimiranu.
Ithumna nathumli leikashi chiyākha khalei thada nathum akha eina akha leikashi kala mi saikorali leikashi chi Prohona mataimeida ngarumsangmiranu.
Hithada sāda nathumli pangsang ngasakra kala ithumwui Proho Jishuna ali kazangbingli ngasoda kharā tharan ithumwui Avāva̱ Varivarawui mangāli nathum kākashunga kala kathara ngasāra.

Ivānaobing, naomeikapta Vareli ningyāng ungngasak khavai nathum kathada okthuirakhala kaji ithumwui eina tamkhuihaira. Hi nathumna ringda khalei mirin chipapama. Ara Proho Jishuwui mingli nathumna chili mataimeida ringkhavai kapona.
Proho Jishuwui ming eina ithumna nathumli tamchithei kahai chi nathumna thei.
Nathumna tharda leikhavai khamathang-khamarangwui eina ningkhānchao kahai hi Varewui ningkachāngna.
Nathumwui alungli mi kachiva̱na apreiva̱li kathar eina kala khayākākapai apong eina kathada okthuirumrakhala kaji theiphalungra.
Vareli makatheibing thada phasāwui khamathang-khamarang eina maokthuipaimara.
Khipākha hiwui pongli achināli khalāng masāpaimara, kala hikathā khalanga mili Prohona kashong lāngra da nathumli rida hānghaira.
Varena ithumli khamathang-khamarangwui lungli okthui khavai hokakhui maningla kha katharwui alungli okthui khavai hokakhuina.
Chiwui vang eina tui hili mahengkasangapā china mikumoli maningla kha nathumli Manglā Kathara sangkhame Vare chili mahengkasangna.

Shitkasang khangaruma avānaobingli leishilu kajiwui pongli nathumli kapiluishit kaji darkar masāmana. Nathum khalatta akha eina akha kathada leishi ngarokrakhala kaji chi Varena nathumli tamchitheihaira.
Kala nathumna Macedoniawui ngalei katongali khalei avānaobing saikorali chithada leishi. Chieina ivānaobing, nathumna chili mataimeida sākhavai kapona.
Ithumna rida hāngkahai thada chingri kahai mirin ringkhavai, na khalattawui otli ningkasang kala nathumwui pāng eina ot kasā chi nathumwui mirinwui kharin ngasā ngasaklu.
Chithākha nathumli mashitkasangbingna khayāshira kala nathum khipālikha mapozāmara.
Jishu thihaira kala ringluishithaira kaji ithumna shitsanga. Chiwui vang eina ali shitsangda thikahaibingli Varena Jishuli ngasoda hokuiluira kaji ithumwui shitkasangna.
Ithumna tamkachithei hila Prohona tamchithei kahai chipapama. Prohona rāthang ringkasābingna kathebingli marimara.
Chithang ningkhamiwui kakaso khavao, kazingrao akhavāwui akhon, kala Varewui talla̱khon eina ngasoda Proho a khalatta kazingramwui eina rāra. Khristali shitsangda thikahaibingna rida ringshokra.
Chiwui thili ringda khaleibing ithumla athumli ngasoda muiyālungli Proholi ngarok khavai kazingli khuikārumra.
Chiwui vang eina nathum akha eina akha tui hi eina kasatsang ngarokchinglu.
Kaja khalena ngayāshong kharā thada Prohona rāra kaji hi nathumna theikazak kahaina.
Mibingna, “Ara chingrihaira kala kalākashi maleimana” da kahāng tharan naokhara̱ thada kashuirak eina athumwuitungli kashimān rāra, chili yāmshok khavai maleisāmara.
Kha ivānaobing, nathum tangkhamangli maleimana, chiwui vang eina Prohowui latkharā Zimiksho chi khale thada kashuirak eina rālala matakhak kahai masālu.
Nathum saikora kahorwui kala ngahunwui naongarāsera. Ithum tangkhamang eina ngayāwui naongarā maningmana.
Chiwui vang eina kathebing thada ithum mapihaiasa, kha mikringmeida mathingmeisa.
Mibingna ngayāshong piya kala khamaripbing china ngayāshong maripa.
Kha ithum kahorwui naongarā sāhaokada mathingphalungra. Ithumna shitkasang eina leikashi hi thikhom thada khomra kala huikhamiwui kachihān hi raikuihon thada ngahonphalungra.
Varena ithumli awui malungkhavāt samphang khavai kapangkakhui maningmana, kha Proho Jishu Khristawui mangā eina kahui samphang khavai kapang kakhuina.
Ana thimi kahaiwui vang ithum thihaisālala, ringsālala, ana kharā chitharan ali ngasoda okthuirumra.
Chiwui vang eina aruihon nathumna sāda khalei chithada nathum akha eina akha kasatsang ngarokta ngachon ngaroklu.
Athumna sākhami chiwui vang athumli khayākashi kala leikashi eina saklak eina sāmilu da poli. Nathum khangama̱ khangazai maleila okthuirumlu.
Mi khipānakha khayonwui vang khayon masāroralu, kha atam kachida akhana akhawui vang kala mi kachiva̱wui vang kaphā sākhami hi nathumwui kharin ngasālu.
Mathāhaila seihā sāchinglu.
Kashoshok ot saikorawui vang ningshilu; Khrista Jishuli khangarumwui vang nathumli hi Varena sāngasakngailaka.
kasatkhami chānpao chili maningkachaialu,
ot saikora chāng tamyanglu, kaphā chi singtitlu,
makaphā katonga chi chihochaohaolu.
Nathumli hokakhuia ava ningkatongana; ana chi sāmilakra.
Ivānaobing, ithumwui vangla seihā sāmilu.
Ithumwui Avāva̱ Varivara kala Proho Jishu Khristawui alungli khalei kala Thessalonicawui churchli kagapina:
Nathumli rekakharek kala kachotkachāng khami tharan nathumwui ningzinghākharing kala shitkasang khangatar chi theida ithumna Varewui churchbingwui miktāli nathumwui mangā eina lāngsoi.
Saikora hina Varewui bichar hi khamashungana kaji chithei kala nathumna samphangda khalei kachotkachāngwui athei sāda Vare wungramli zangkhangayena da shānkhuira.
Varena phāvaira kaji chi ana sāra, nathumli kachotkachāng khamibingli, ana kachotkachāng mira,
chotkahaia nathumlila, ithumlila ana ngasāmkhui ngasakra. Jishuna, pangshap khaleiya awui kazingraobingli mei eina ngasoda kharā chitharan;
Vareli makhuikasangbing kala ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui paokaphāli makhanganābingli tandi mira.
Katang makhavai shongrān chi athumna samphangda Prohowui kala sāshap pangshapwui tekhamatei chili mazangmara.
Ana rāthanghon shitkasangbingna ali tekmatei ngasakra kala maiyā ngasakra. Nathumla chili zangra, khiwui vangkhala jilaga ithumna tamchithei kahai paokaphā chili nathumna shitsanghaowa.
Hithada sāda ithumwui Varivara kala Proho Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan mangā eina Jishu Khristawui mingli nathumli tekmatei ngasakra.
Kaja Prohowui Zimiksho rāhaira da khamatui china nathumwui ningli mapa̱ngapā kala makhanang ngasakalu. Hi ithumna khamarānli, hākashokli kala kakapili kahāngna da mibingna kaphaning thai.
Mi khipānakha nathumli khikhikhawui apong eina machipat ngasakalu. Kaja naomeikap kaji Ngakaikashi atam kala meifali vāki kaje Makaphā-Makhayā chi mashokranglakha eina tangda Zimiksho chi marāmara.
Ana, varena da kahobing kala khokharumwui otsak saikorali yetra kala ā khalatta saikora chiwuitungli chipamkhuira. Varewui khorumshimli eina tangda vāzanglaga Varena da kāpamra.
Thalala aruichang chi mashok khavai kahapa akha lei kala chi khikhala da nathumna thei. Retkahai atam chili Makaphā-Makhayā chi shokrāsāra.
Matheikharara Makaphā-Makhayā ā chi ara ot sāphokhaira, kha kahapapā china shongfa machikāranglakha eina tangda shokki kaji chi mashokfamara.

Chiwui thili Makaphā-Makhayāpa chi khipākhala kaji phongshokra kha Proho Jishuna kharā tharan awui khamor eina kashoka khaksuina ali suithathaora kala Prohona kharāwui kahān china ali shimānchao ngasakra.
Makaphā-Makhayā china Satanwui pangshap eina shokta mina masākharar makhamashung kala matakhak kahai ot kachungkha sāchitheira,
kala shimānki kaje athumli makaphā-makhayā ot kachungkha eina minamra. Athum shimānra, kaja kahui samphang khavai khamashung chi athumna makhuisangthu kala maleishithuwa.
Chiwui vang eina khayonwui pangshap china ot sāda makhamashung chi shitsang khavai Varena athumwui alungli khayonwui pangshap chi chihovai.
Chiwui athei chiya khamashungli mashitkasang kha morei kasāli ringkaphā athum chili yonngasakra.
Ithumna paokaphā tamkachithei mangā eina Varena nathumli hokhui, kala ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui tekhamatei samphang khavaina.
Chiwui vang eina ivānaobing, ithumna nathumli pao hākashokli nilala, chithi kakapili nilala khamashung tamchithei kahai chili singtitta nganingchinglu.
kaphā ot chi sāshap khavai kala kaphā chiwui vang matuishap khavai nathumli katommiranu kala pingngasakranu.
Makaphā-makhayābingwui eina Varena ithumli kanshokmi khavai seihā sāmilu, kaja mi kachiva̱na pao chi shitkasang maningmana.
Ithumna nathumli hāngchithei kahai chi sāda leili kala sāchingra da chihāna kala kachihān hi Prohona ithumli sangkhamina.
Varewui leikashi hakmeida theikhui khavai kala Khristawui ja̱khami chi nathumli leikhavai Prohona thānmichingranu.
Ithumna kasā tākam eina nathumla sāphalungra kaji nathumna thatheihaira. Nathumli ngasopamda leilakha ithum ngachāng makakā ot masālakmana.
Ithumna khipākhawui kashakazā lem eina mashak-mazāmana kala khipākhalila makhanang ngasakla ngashun ngayā mateila ngalang zarda ot panglāk eina sai.
Chi ithumwui mashun makhaleiwui vang maningmana, kha nathumna ngayolaga sha̱khui khavai kasāna.
Ithumna nathumli ngasopamda leilakha hi kasochinghaira, chiya “Ot masākhangai mi chi maphazāranu.”
Hikatha mibingli Proho Jishu Khristawui ming singda, athumwui ot shukshuk sākhavai kala kachichāwui kashakazā pheikhui khavai kakasona kala khamachinna.
Ithumna kachiphun chithi hiwui tuili mashitkasang mi kaikha leisālapai. Leisākha chikathā mi chili machuttithailu kala ali khangasola mangasoalu, chieina a khayakhaora.
Kha ali yangkashena da makhuihaila achinā akhana da machinlu.
Ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan nathum saikorali ngasomiranu.
Ithumwui kachihāna Khrista Jishu kala ithumwui Huikhame Varewui kakaso eina Khrista Jishuwui paokazata Paulwui eina,
shitkasangwui pongli kachangkhat inao sārān kaje Timothylina: Avāva̱ Vare kala ithumwui Proho Khrista Jishuna lukhamashan, phaningkhami kala chingri kahai miranu.
Ina Macedoniali vauki kaji tharan pokahai thada, nali Ephesusli leisā ngasakngai. Chithākha apam chili mi kaikhana minama pao tamchitheida khalei chi matamchithei khavai kasoshapra.

Ngaphat-ngayāt shok khangasaka khararchān kala awo-ayibingwui mitun aming hāngkachithei chi thāngasak khavai hānglu. Chikathā chi shitkasang eina theikashapa Varewui angarān angayeili khikha kankhanā maleimana.
Ithumna kakaso hiwui ningrin chiya, kathara wuklung, tharzā kahai mashun-makhui kala kachangkhatwui shitkasang eina kharā leikashi chi mataisang khavaina.
Mi kaikhana hi horhailaklaga aremawui ngaphat-ngayātli akachang sāhaowa.
Athum khalattawui tui kala khiwui apongli khamatuikhala kaji matheilaga Varewui ain tamkachitheia mi sāngai.
Ithumna thei kaja ain hi mathada singakha phai.

Hi mamalaiphalungmara, kaja ain hi kaphā mibingwui vang kasā maningmana, kha ain sākakhaibing, kahāng makhanganābing, Vareli makathei, morei kaphungabing, dharma lah manglārin makhalei, ava̱ avāli shaokathatbing, mi sākathatbing,
shuikhangaruibing, khamathang-khamarangbing, khalee-kasa̱bing, kapiklaga minama shākhi khamibing lah khamashunga tamkachitheili masho-ngachei khangasakbingwui vangna.
Tamkachithei chi tekhamatei kala sokhame Varewui eina kharā, chi chishāt khavai ili horsangmi kahai paokaphāli samphanga.
Ili ot sākhavai pangshap khame ithumwui Proho Khrista Jishuli ningshi. Kānārada khuimida awui otram ngatha̱ khavai ili kapangkhuikhamiwui vang ningshiya;
khareli ina ali mashāta, rekhareka, kala chipata. Kha Varena ili lumashanmi kaja I mashitsangmana, chieina ina kasā chi I matheisamana.
Khrista Jishuwui lungli khalei shitkasang kala leikashi eina ngasoda ithumwui Prohowui lukhamashan chi iwuitungli mavātlakla heirormi.
Hi khuisangkapai kala shitsangkapai khamashunga chānjamna. Khrista Jishuna morei kaphungbingli huimi khavai okathuili rai. Chiwui ngachaili I morei phungmeikapa.
Kha naoda kateibingna ali shitsangda makashimān mirin samphang khavaiwui ngayoyan sāda Khrista Jishuwui kākashung ja̱khami chiwui eina theikhui khavai Varena ili lumashankhamina.
Kathi makhangavā, mik eina matheikharar, thot kachida awunga sāda khalei akhamāng kaje Vareli katang mavaila khayāshiranu, kala tekmateiranu. Amen.
Inaomayara Timothy, nawui maramli hāngkahai marāntui chiwui athishurda ningkhami hi ina nali horsangkhamina. Nana mathāmeida ngararpai khavai tuibing chi raisāri sāda shichinlu.
Kala nawui shitkasang eina mashun-makhui chi tharzā eina haipaira. Kachikathāna mashun-makhui chi manganāsangthuda athumwui shitkasang chi arema ngasā ngasakhaira.
Athumwui ngachaili ina tandi khami sāda Satanwui pāngli horsangmi kahai chili Hymenaeus eina Alexanderla zanga. Hi athum kachipat tui mamatuilui khavai tamkhui khavaina.
Rimeikapta ina pokhangai hina, kaja kapolila, seihā kasālila, khangakaolila kala ningkashi khamilila, mi saikorawui vang Vareli pomilu,
awungabing kala pangshap kasingbingwui vangla pomilu, chithākha ithum dharmawui ponglila, acham-aramwui ponglila khonkazar maleila chingri eina okthuira.
Hi kaphā otna kala hina ithumwui Huikhame Vareli ningyāng ungngasaka.
Ishameina mi saikorali kahui samphang ngasakngai, khamashungwui ponglila theikhui ngasakngai.
Kaja Vare akha lei, kala Vare eina miwui ngachaili ngashikkhame akha lei— chiya Khrista Jishu,
atam chālak eina shākhi khame mi saikorawui vang ngatangman akhalatta chigatkhame china.
Hiwui vang ili paokazata akha thada kala Gentilebingwui ojā sāda chihovai. Hi mashunglaka, kakapik tui maningmana.
Chiwui vang eina mayarnaobingna kakhararla, malungkhavātla maleila apam kachiva̱li pāng khangkāda seihā sāmi ngasakngai.
Chithada sāda sha̱naobingnala ning mazinglak eina, ayuk-ayan unglak eina kashankachon ngavailu, sināwui, muktāwui kala aman kasasak eina phorsanglu kaji maningmana.
Kha dharma khalei matik kachā sha̱nao thada sāranu,
sha̱naona kahāng khanganā eina kasaikha pamda tamkhuiranu,
sha̱naona mayarnaowuitungli akhavā kasā nilala, tamkachithei nilala ina mamayāmana, a kasaikha pamki kajina.
Kaja Adamli sārilaga Eveli sānaowa,
Adamli machipatmana, sha̱naopava̱li chipatta yonngasaka.
Chithālala ana ningmazingda shitkasangli, leikashili kala tharkhamathengli poktitakha nao kapharāwui vang ali huimira.
Hi khamashung chānsam tuina; Kachikathā mina churchwui kathāna sāngaiakha, ana kaphā otli ningkachāngna.
Chieina churchwui kathāna kasāpā chiya sui makakā, preiva̱ akhamāng kaje, ngarakzak kahaiya, khalatta ngarinkatha, khayākakā, kha̱mimāli ngahānkatha, tamchiteikatha ngasāphalungra.
Kala makhamaripa, masākashe, malungkhanima, makhararkazāra, kala lupāli maleikashe mi ngasāphalungra.
Apong saikorali anaongarāli kahāng nganā ngasakta khayā kākhavai awui shimkhur mirin mathada khangarān sāphalungra.
Mi akhana awui shimkhurli manganaokhuitheiakha, Varewui churchli ana kathada ngakuitheirakhala?
A sādhadhara Vareshi maningphalungmara, kaja khayāning nganinghaida chipeewui pāngli tāzanghaipai.
Chili lāngda khangateibingnala khayākashia mi akha ngasāphalungra, chi maningakha morei phungda chipeewui khalenli tāzanghaipai.
Chi tākam eina deacon sāki kajibingla ning mazingphalungra, tui khani mamatuipaimana, mamarippaimana, kākharāmli akachanga masāpaimana;
shitkasangwui kathuka tui chi athumna singtitphalungra.
Rida athumli chāng yangfalu, laga chukhara̱ maleimana da theikhui kahaiwui thili deacon sānaoranu.
Chithada sāda athumwui preiva̱ ngarāla mina khayāshikapaia, maphenphāphākapaia, ngarakzak kahaia kala ot saikorali shitsangkapaiva̱ ngasāphalungra.
Deaconpā chi preiva̱ akhamāng kaje, kala naongarāli, shimkhurli nganaokatheia ngasāphalungra.
Deacon sāda mathālak eina otram khangatha̱bing china mai kai, kala Jishu Khristali shitkasang chiwui tongkazā kachungkha samphanga.
Ina nawuili thaklāk eina rāra da phaningsālala, hāngkhamathin tuibing hi ina nali kagapina.
Kalikha huihaisākha Varewui shimkhur kaja kharinga Varewui church, khamashungwui shimphunga kala pakra̱ chili mibingna kathada sāmameirakhala kaji nana theikhui khavai kagapina.
Ithumwui dharmawui ngathum kahai hakhamahā chi khipānakha maningmana majirarmara:
A mikumowui phasā kāda rai,
hi Manglāna mashunga da chithei,
kala kazingraobingna thei.
Awui pongli miyur saikorali hāshoka,
okathui peidana shitsanga,
kala tekhamatei eina khuikāhaowa.
Manglā Katharana tharlak eina hānghaira, kaja naoda mi kaikhana mikhanama manglā kala kameobingwui sha̱tui nganāda shitkasangwui eina thuihaora.
Hikathā mikhanam tui hi kakapika kala mashun-makhui thengkahaiya athumwui eina kashokna.

Chikathā mibingna ngalā kakhui kala kashakazā kaikha kashai-kashak hi mamashungmana da tamchithei. Kha chikathā kashakazā chi shitkasangabing kala khamashung theikahaibingna ningkashiwui seihā sāhailaga khuizā khuimang khavai Varena semkahaina.
Kaja Varena sākahai ot saikora phāsera kala seihā kasā eina ngasoda ningshitheiakha horhaikapai mazanglakmana.
Chiwui vang eina seihā kasā kala Varewui tui eina tharngasak kahaina.
Nana Manglāwui kashakazā zāda kala shitkasang chiwui athishurda navānaobingli hi tākam eina tamchitheiakha, na Khrista Jishuwui otram khangatha̱ kaphā mi akhana.
Vareli makathei, hāngnganaophāphā kaji tuili manganāsangalu. Nakhalatta Vareli kaphaning tamlu.
Phasāwui pongli tamkakhui tongkazā chi kateokhamaya, kha Vareli kaphaning hiya aruihonwui mirinlila, rāki kaji mirinwui vangla khangashit khaleiwui vang apong kachiva̱li tongzai.
Hi khuisangphalungki kaji kala shitsangchao phalungki kaji chānsamna.
Khanganurla nganurda otla panglāk eina sai. khikhala jila mi saikorawui Huikhame kala mataimeikapta shitkasangbingwui vang ringching kaje Vareli ithumwui kachihān shāpkahaina.
Tuibing hi tamchitheida ningmilu.
Na nganuida leiya da mi khipānakha machipat ngasakalu, kha katharli, shitkasangli, leikashili, kasākhavāli kala tuimatuili shitkasangbingna ngayokhavai sālu.
I marāranglakha eina tangda yaruili Varewui tui pākachithei, pao hākashok kala tamkachitheili ngalangzarlu.
Ararbingna nawuitungli pāng parrorda kala marānbingna hāngmi kahai nawui wuklungli khalei manglāwui lemmet chi khikha maningmana da maphaninghaialu.
Ot chi ningsanglak eina sāmasuilu, chithākha nakhalatta kala nawui tui khanganābingla huikhuipaira.
Na khalattala kala nawui tamkachitheilila ning ngasharlu, mamalaialu, chithākha nawui tui khanganābingla huikhuira.
Rarkhameiya mili makaharlu, kha navāli kapo thada hānglu; nganuikhameibingli nachinā ngarā thada phaninglu.
Rarkhamei sha̱naobingli nashava̱ thada, kala nganuikhamei sha̱naobingli nazarva̱ thada ningkathar eina phaninglu.
Kachangkhat ra̱meikapamva̱bingli khayāshilu.

Ra̱meiva̱ akhana naongarā nilala, ara̱-azā nilala leiakha rimeikapta athumna shimkhurli sāmikhangayi chi sāmi khavai tamkhuiphalungra kala hithada kasā hi eina ava̱ avābingli kala awo-ayibingli runkhamina. Hi Varewui ningyāng khaungna.
Kachangkhat ra̱meipamda amāng eina khaleiva̱ chiya, awui kachihān Varewuili shāphaida ngashun ngayā seihā sāda kapo mathāhailakmana.
Kha akhalatta ringphā khavai kasāva̱ a chiya ringlala kathina.
Athumli khamashāt malei khavai, ningkhami chi hāngchitheilu.
Kachikathāna awui athei-asābingwui vang mataimeikapta ashi shimkhurwui vang mangarānmitheiakha awui shitkasang maleimana. Chitkathā mi chiya mashitkasangbingli zakshimei.
Zingkum hangtharuk henkahaibing maningla ra̱meinaowui mishānli mashānsangalu. Chili lāngda, akhashimang fakathuiva̱,
kala kaphā otsak kasava̱; misui morei makaphungva̱, nao nganaokatheiva̱, shitkasangbingli phei pheokhamiva̱, kakhanangbingli ngachonkhamiva̱ kala kaphā ot kasāli ningkasangva̱ ngasāphalungra.
Lārongpongbingli ra̱meinaowui mishānli mashānsangalu, kaja athumna Khristali dharchigat kahai chili phasāwui khamathangna yuikahai tharan fathuingaihaowa.
Chieina athumwui ngashit kahai chi kaikahaiwui vang khayon samphanga.
Kala athumna shim shimli zangzatta ngachāng makakā tamkhui, kha chili zakshikhameiva khipālikha matheimila morsāpta mamatuikhangayi tui matuiphāphāhaowa.
Chiwui vang eina lārongpongbingna fathuida naola pharālaga shimkhurli kachingda ithumwui yangkashebingna ithumli khamashāt maleikhavai kasā phāmei.
Kaja ra̱meinao kaikhana Satanwuishong thuihaira.
Kachikathā shitkasangva̱ sha̱nao akhawui athei-asāli ra̱meinao leiakha, ana athumli ngachonmiranu kala churchli machot ngasakaranu. Chieina churchna rarkhameibing chili ngachonpaira.
Mathada yangkhame khararnaobing chili, mataimeikapta tamkachithei eina pao hākashok athum chili mataimeida khayāshiranu.
Kaja hithada kapihaida lei: “Mā khanaia mukvā chili khamor makhalaphaipaimara” kala “Ot kasapā china awui langhai samphangngayiya.”
Khararnaowuitungli kaphen tui chi mi khani lah kathumli langda shākhi maleiakha makhuisangalu.
Mi khangateinala ngachee khavai morei kasā mibingli saikorawui mangāli machinlu.
Mimai mayangalu, ngahānkhangai masāla, tuibing hi mayon khavai Varewui, Khrista Jishu kala kazingraobingwui miktāli ina kakasona.
Pāng khangkāda dharkachigat ot kasāli makatotnālu, miwui makaphā otsakli nalila phenpaishina. Tharlak eina pamlu.
Tara̱māng mamangalu, kha khaluizā khavaiwui vang, kala nali kazāching kajiwui vang, drakhāra̱ kateteo manglu.
Mi kaikhawui moreiva thatheihaoda bichar kasāna rihaowa. Kha kaikhawui moreiva naolak eina rātheiya.
Chithada sāda kaphā otsakbing chi thatheihai; ngalāngda matheisālala mangathumpaimana.
Varewui mingli kala ithumwui tamkachitheili mamashāt khavai rao sāda khalei saikorana athumwui akhavābingli khayāshida phaningserranu.

Vareshi akhavābingwui raobingna akhavābingli mayangkharingpaimana, kaja athumla athumwui chinaongarāna, honda athumli mathāmeida otram ngatha̱miki kajina, khikhalajila athumwui otsak eina kankhanā samkaphangbing athum chi leikashi shitkasangabingna.
Hibing hi tamchitheilu kala hāshoklu.
Kachikathāna ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui khamashung tui kala dharmawui tamkachithei chili mamayāmada mikhanam tui tamchitheiakha,
a chiya khayāning khanganinga kala khikha matheithangkhama mina. Awui ningli ngaphatkhangai kala ngama̱-ngashaokhangai ningna pema. China yuikashi khangama̱-khangashao shokngasaka,
wuklung makhao kahai kala khamashungli makhalei mibingwui ningli atam kachida khonkazar shokngasaka kala dharma hiya shāngkhavaina da phaninghaowa.
Ningyāng unglak eina dharma kazatli tongkazā kahakva lei,
kaja ithum okathuili khikha makhuirāmana, okathuiwui eina khikhala makhuithuipaimana.
Chieina ithumwui kashakazā eina kashankachon samphanghaiakha, chi shapa da phaningsa.
Kha shāngkhangayiya athum china kasuili, khalenli, chukhamaja̱ makhalei kala shimānhaoki kaji ningkachāng kachungkhali tāzanga, chieina mibingli kashimān kala kathi pongli vāngasaka.
Lupāli leikashi hi makaphā saikorawui angayungna. Mi kaikhana ningchangnā kahaiwui vang shitkasangwui eina katāva̱li thuihaoda wukakhanang sikafa kachungkha samphanga.
Kha Varewui mi nava, chikathā ot chi masaalu. Khamashung khangarong, Varetuili shitkasang, leikashi, ningzinghākharing kala malungkhanim phālu.
Shitkasangwui kaphā rai khangarar chi ngararlu; nana shākhi kachungkhawui mangāli hāngkaphat tharan nali hokhui kahai athishurda katang makhavai kharing chili singtitlu.
Ot saikorali kharing mirinkhame Vare kala Pontius Pilatewui mangāli mashungrik eina shitkasang hāngkaphatwui shākhi khame Jishu Khristawui mangāli
ana marāranglakha eina tangda nawui kakaso chi athumna ningtonglak eina mayon khavai ina kakasona.
Awui kharā chi sokhame Vare kala akhamāng kaje Khamunga, awungabingwui Awunga, prohobingwui Prohona retkahai atamli khuirāmira.
Makathe kala khipānakha marānganaikhararra kahora ramli kapāna chi a mānga. Ali khipānakha matheiranga, katheila matheirarmana. Khayākakā kala mashimānda khamung chi awui ngasāranu. Amen.
Okathuili kashāngbingli malangso khavai kala akachang makhaning lanli machihān khavai, kha ot saikora ithumli ringphā khavai mavātla khame Vareli chihānthei khavai machinlu.
Kaphā ot sākhavai kala kaphā ot kasāli ngachāng kāmei khavai, sailamlak eina kateibingli mithei khavai athumli machinlu.
Chithākha athum khalattawui vang anaolamshongwui kaphā shimphung sākā kahaina. Chieina kachangkhat athumna mirinwui kharing chi samphangpaira.
Timothy, nali chisin kahai chi singtitlu. Khamakhao tui kala mangkhama̱wui ngaphat-ngayāt chili mi kaikhana “Aworna” da khamatui kala kakhui chili mazangalu.
Kaja kaikhana chi samphanghaira da phaning kahaiwui vang, chiwui athei sāda athum shitkasangwui apong chi shimānhaowa.
Varewui lukhamashan nathum saikorali ngasomiranu.
Khrista Jishuli ngarumhaoda ithumna samkaphanga ngashitmi kahai mirin chi hāshok khavai Varena mayāda Khrista Jishuwui paokazata Paul ina;
khaluma inaomayara Timothyli kagapina. Avāva̱ Varivara, kala ithumwui Proho Khrista Jishuna nali lukhamashan, phaningkhami kala chingri kahai miranu.
Ishawo-ishayi ngarāwui thada mashun-makhui tharlak kahai eina ina Vareli otram khangatha̱wui vang ali ningshi. Kala ngashun ngayā mateila seihā kasā kachiva̱li nali phaningungda ningshi.
Nawui chāra̱ katā chi phaningungda ning tāphuphai khavai nali samphangngailak eina lei.
Nashāyi Lois eina nashāva̱ Eunicewui shitkasang katha nawui ningkathar shitkasang chi ina phaningunga kala chi nali leichingrada shitsangchaowa.
Ina pāng parda seihā sākhami tharan Varena nali lemmet mikahai chi leiching khavai phaningung khangasakna.
Kaja Varena ithumli ngacheekazarwui manglā mamihaimana, kha pangshapwui, leikashiwui kala khalatta ngarinkashapwui manglā chi mi.
Chieina Prohowui vang shākhi kasāli makhayakalu; awui vang phātop kazanga iwui vangla makhayakalu. Kha Varena pangshap mikahai athishurda paokaphāwui vang kachot phungrumlu.
Varena ithumli huimi kala a khalattawui mibing ngasā khavai hokhuihaira. Hi ithumwui kaphā otsakwui vang maningmana, kha awui lukhamashan kala kharin chiwui vangna.
Ara ithumwui huikhame kharā eina phongmihaira. Ana kathiwui pangshap shimān ngasakhaira kala paokaphāwui mangā eina makathi mirin chi phongmihaira.
Paokaphā hi hāshok khavai kala tamchithei khavai Varena ili kapangkhui.

Chiwui vang eina ina kakhanang ringkashi hi samkaphangna. Kaja ina khipāli shitsanghairakhala kaji nathumna thei, kala zimiksho chi maungshungranglakha eina tangda ana ili chisin kahai chi ana mayonmishapa da ina theishingkhuihaira.
Nawui vang shurpai khavai ngayoyan thada ina tamchithei kahai khamashung tui chi singtitlu, kala Khrista Jishuwuili khalei shitkasang kala leikashi chili leichinglu.
Ithumwui wuklungli khalei Manglā Kathara chi eina nali chisin kahai chi mayonlu.
Asiali khalei mi kachiva̱ iwui eina mai ngareithuihaira kaji nana thei. Athumwui ngachaili Phygelus eina Hermogenesla zanga.
Prohona Onesiphoruswui shimkhurli lumashanmiranu, kaja ana iwui kachot vānngasakchinga.
Kaja ana Romeli rāshungkhaleoda ili masamphangranglakha eina tangda phāshang phatai.
Khanaowa zimiksholi Prohowui phaningkhami awuitungli tāshungmiranu. Ephesusli leilakha ana iwui vang kayākha samikhala kaji nanala katheina.
Chiwui vang eina inaomayara, Khrista Jishuli zangda samkaphang lukhamashan chiwui alungli kapinga ngasālu,
kala shākhi kachungkhawui mangāli iwui eina shākahahai chi mi khangateibinglila tamchitheishapki kaje shitsangkapaia mibingli chisinlu.
Khrista Jishuwui kaphā raimi akha sāda kachotkachāng phunglu.
Akhavāli ningyāng ungngasaki kaji raimi khipānakha yarui ashangva̱wui mirin maphāzatmana.
Khangareoa china ayinwui athishurda mangahanakha sāman masamphangmara.
Heithei hātkhare samphangkhangayia chi ot panglāk eina kasaa luikhavā mi china.
Ina nali kahāng hi phaningkazaklu, khikhalajila chi Prohona nali bhap tāngasakra.
Ina paokaphā hākashokli tamkachithei kathiwui eina ringshok kahaia kala Davidwui naotun Jishu Khristali phaningunglu.
Paokaphā hākashokwui vang ina kachotkachāng phunga kala yomnao thada marikhanghui sanga. Kha Varewui tui chiya manarhaipaimana.
Chiwui vang eina kapangkhui kahaibingna katang makhavai tekhamatei eina ngasoda Khrista Jishuwuili huikhami chi samphangpai khavai ina ot saikorali kakhāngna.
Hi khamashunga chānsam tuina:
“Ithum ali thirumakha,
ithumnala ali ringrumra.
Ithumna khāngakha, ithumla ali ngasoda mungra.
Ithumna ali mamayākha ithumlila ana mamayāmara.
Ithumna maningtonglala, ava ningtongchinga.
kaja ava akhalatta maminamana.”
Prohowui mangāli makankhanā tui mangayāt ngarok khavai athumli phaningung ngasaklu kala hāngmachinlu. Chiwui kaphā khikha maleimana, kha khanganābingli shimān ngasaka.
Varewui pao mashungrik eina tamkachitheia akha sāda nawui otwui vang makhayakla Varewui miktāli tongchaoda mayākhami samphang khavai sālu.
Mibingli Varewui eina yāmkhangasaka kachipat ngaphat-ngayātli mazangalu.
Athumwui tamkachithei chi aphili kakazā kazātyur kathāna. Hymenaeus eina Philetus ani khani hi chikathā tamkachithei mina.
Anina ringkhalui hi maleimana da tamchitheilaga mibingli mashongachei ngasakta khamashungwui eina lachāthuihaowa.

Kha Varewui khangazipa shimphunga chi mangachei ngasakrarmana, kala chiwuitungli hithada kapihaida lei: “Prohona awui mibingli thei kala Prohowui mina kajibing chi makhamashungwui eina latungphalungra.”
Shim kahaka akhali lupāsā eina sināwui khorkhongmāng maleimana, kha ngaleiwuila, thingwuila lei kala kaikhava saklak eina shichin khavaina, khangatei kaikhava ichamchamlak eina shichinna.
Kachikathā mina makaphāwui eina akhalatta tharngasakhaiakha, kasaka otwui vang shichinra, kaja khamathā ot sākhavai awui akhavāli chigat kahaina.
Yaron ngalāwui khamathang chi horhaida ningkathar eina Proholi khangakao mibingli ngasoda khamashung khangarong, shitkasang, leikashi kala chingri kahai phālu.
Mangkhama̱ kala ning makhaleiwui ngaphat-ngayāt chili mazangalu. Hikathā eina naoda kakharar shoka kaji nala thei.
Prohowui otram khangatha̱ miva makharar ngarokphalungmara, kha mi saikorali lumashankatha, kaphākasā, kala khāngkathei ojā ngasāphalungra.
Yangkashebingli kaphā eina mashungkakhui ngasāphalungra. Chithākha Varena athumli ningngatei ngasakta khamashung theikhui ngasakpai.
Chieina athumna ning phākhuida, chipeena rao sākhavai tuknar kahaiwui eina athum yāmshokpaira.
Hi theilu kaja khangachang zimiksholi kachotkachāng kachungkha rāra.
Mibingna kachichā khalattali leishira, ngamara, lāngsora, khayāning nganingra, chipatra, ava̱ avāwui kahāng manganāmara, ningkashi matheimara, dharma maleimara,
lukhamashan matheimara, phaningkhami maleimara, mashātzara, khalatta khangarin maleimara, sāshira, kaphāli yangkharingra,
mikhanam, ningngaikasā, kachorkashi kala Vareli leikashebing mangasāla lumkhalaoli leikashebing ngasāthuihaora.
Athumna akorli phārekta dharmarinwui otsak sālaga kachangkhat chiwui pangshapliva makhuisangmara.
Kaja mibing chiwui ngachaili kaikhana shim shimli zangzatta moreina shiren kahai khangazana, phaningphāphā kaje sha̱naobingli suikhui.
Sha̱naobing china tamkhui khavai panglāk eina hotnai kha khamashung chi matamkhuirarmana.
Jannes eina Jambresna Mosesli makhamayā chithada ning makhalei kala shitkasang makhalei mibing china khamashung chili mamayāmana.
Chithālala athumwui chi kasāngkha majimara, kaja aniwui thada athumwui mangkhama̱ chi mi kachiva̱na theihaora.
Kha nana iwui tamkachithei, iwui acham-aram kala iwui mirinwui kharin chi shurkhuihaira, kala iwui shitkasang, iwui khāngkathei, iwui leikashi,

ili rekakharek, kala ina kachotkachāng kaphung chi nana theikhuihaira. Antioch, Iconium kala Lystrali hāngkhavai makhalei rekakharek ina khānghaira kaji nana thei! Kha saikora hiwui eina Prohona ili kanshokmi.
Kachangkhat eina Khrista Jishuwui lungli zangda tharda ringkhangai mi kachiva̱li rekharekra.
Makaphā kala sākharekbing chi zakshikhangai zakshimamānra, kateili chipatra, athum khalattala chipatra.
Kha nawui vanga nali tamchithei kahai khamashung chi sāchinglu kala chili shitsangtitlu. Nawui ojābing khipalongkhala kaji nana thei,
kala nganuilakhawui eina thuida, Khrista Jishuli shitkasang mangā eina huikhami samphang khavaiwui apongli thanvākhamiwui thangkhamei mishapa kathara tui chi nana theihaira kaji phaningunglu.
Kathara tui saikora Varena kasatkhami tuina. Chieina tamkachithei, hāngkhamachin, mashung khangasak kala khamashung khangarong tamchithei khavaiwui vang kannai.
Chiwui vang eina Vareli otram khangatha̱ chili khamathā ot sākhavai, sāri khangavai thada kāshung ngasaka.
Kharingabinglila, kathebinglila bichar sāki kaje Vare kala Khrista Jishuwui miktāli kala ana Awunga sāda rāmungki jihaoda ina nali hi saklak eina kapona.
Tui chi hāshoklu, kumkashok kumkazang mayangalu, theikhui ngasaklu, machinlu, katomlu, ningzingharingda tamkachithei machokchaihailu.
Mibingna khamashung tamkachitheili mahengsangla athum khalattawui ningkachāngli kashur kala nganākhangai hāngkachithei ojābing kachungkha chili kharomkazat atam rāra.
Khamashungli manganāsangla hāngkhanganao khararchānli ningchāngmeira.
Kha nava ngarakzak eina sālu, kachotkachāng khānglu. Evangelist akhana sāran ot chi sālu, kala Varewui otram khangatha̱ akha sāda nana sāran ot chi ungshung ngasaklu.
Iwui vanga ili shaothatki kaji atam nganailakhaira, kala iwui kapāng atam rāhaira.
Ina kaphā khangarar chi ngararhaira, yongki kaji chi yonghaira, kala shitkasang chi ina mayonhaira.
Chithang Zimiksho khangaronga mashunwona, imāngli maningla kha leikashi eina ngasoda ali khangaraibing saikorali miki kaji khamashung khangarongwui wungkuihon china ili ngaraili.
Iwuili thākta rākhavai kashap eina tangda ngarānlu.
Demasna aruihonwui okathuili leishimeihaoda ili chihohailaga Thessalonicali vāhaira. Crescensla Galatiali vāhaira kala Titusna Dalmatiali vāhaira.
Lukemāngna ili ngasopamda lei. Markli ngasorālu, ana iwui ot kasāli ngachonshapra.
Tychicusli ina Ephesusli chihovāhaira.
Troasli ina Carpuswui pāngli haimi kahai kachon eina lairikbing, matailak eina sāhui eina sākahaibing chi na kharā atamli khuirāmilu.
Mari kasā Alexanderna ili zakshilāk eina sai. Awui otsak chiwui vang Prohona sāman miranu.
Ali ngasharlu, kaja ithumwui paokaphā hili ana panglāk eina yeta.
Ina I khalattawui vang phayetkharethang iwui vang nganingmi khavai mi khipākha maleisāmana, saikorana nothāhaowa.
Kha Prohona nganingmi kala ili pangshapla mi. Chieina Gentilebing saikorana nganāsang khavai paokaphā chi ina hāshokshaphaowa; a kala ili shaothat khavai khak tāki kaji chiwui eina kanshokmi.
Prohona makaphā kachiva̱wui eina kanshokmida awui zingwungramli thānzangmira. Ishamei ali mashimānda tekmateichingranu. Amen.
Priscilla eina Aquilali kala Onesiphoruswui shimkhurli shālam chiphunli.
Erastusna Corinthli pamhaowa. Trophimus kazāhaoda ali ina Miletusli nothāhaowa.
Kashap eina tangda si marāranglakha rākhavai hotnālu.
Eubulusna nali shālam mili; Pudens, Linus, Claudia kala ichinā ngarā saikoranala shālam chiphunli.
Prohona nawui manglāli ngasomiranu.
Varewui lukhamashan nathum saikorali ngasomiranu.

Varewui rao kala Jishu Khristawui paokazata Paul, ithumwui dharmarinna khamashung tamchithei kahai chili thānmi khavai kala Varena kapangkhui kahai miyurwui shitkasangli ngachonmi khavai ili kapangkhuida kachihona.
Chi makashimān mirinwui kachihānli pheisin sai. Makakapika Varena okathui masāranglakha mirin chi ngashitmihaikasāna,
kala retkahai atam chili awui paokaphāli phongshokmiya. Hi ili chisin kahaina, kala chi ithumwui Huikhame Varewui kakaso eina hākashokna.
Ina shitkasangwui lungli inaomayara hokapaiya Titusli kagapina:
Avāva̱ Varivara kala ithumwui Huikhame Khrista Jishuwui lukhamashan kala chingri kahai tāshungmiranu.
Sakhangayi apam kachiva̱li churchwui kathāna kapangsang khavai ina nali Creteli chipam kahaina. Ina hāngchithei kahai chi phaningunglu.
Kathāna saki kaje mi chi shāt makakā sāphalungra, preiva̱ akhamāngphalungra, naongarāla shitkasanga, kapā ot masāla kahāng khanganā ngasāphalungra.
Kaja yaokahoma hiya Varewui lanse akha sāda shātmakakā mi sāphalungra, malangsophalungmara, malungmavātzarphalungmara, khamarip, khangashao kala tongzā khavai khangamar ot masāphalungmara.
Kha kha̱mimāli ngahānkatha, kaphā sākhangaia, khalatta ngarinkatha, khamashunga, kathara chamsin katheia sāphalungra.
Tamchithei kahai khamashung tui chi singtitphalungra. Chithākha khamashung tamkachithei chi ana hāngchitheishapra, kala tui khangayātbing chili athumwui khayon chitheishapra.
Kaja pāreklaga ngakaikashe kala mikhanama mi kachungkha lei, mataimeikapta chi Jihudibingna.
Athumna tongzā khavai hokhamahā matamchitheikhangayi chi tamchitheida shimkhur katongali pa̱ngapā ngasaka. Chikathā chi khāmphalungra.
Cretenaobing athum khalattawui ngachaili marān akhana “Cretewui mibinga atam kachiva̱li kakapik, makaphā ramsā, ngachangmakakā kala morkahakbingna” da hānga.
Awui tui chi mashunglaka. Chiwui vang athumli saklak eina hāngmachinphalungra. Chithākha athumwui shitkasang ngatarpaira.
Kala khamashung horkahaia mibingwui eina kashok mikumowui ningkhami kala Jihudibingwui phorchān manganāsangluimara.
Katharabingwui vanga ot saikora tharsera. Kha khamakhao mashitkasangbingwui vanga khikhala kathar maleimana. Kaja awui ning kala mashun-makhui hi makhaoserhaowa.
Athumna Vareli thei da hānga, kha athumwui otsakva chili mamayāmana. Athum hiya kaphā ot sākhavai matik makachā, yangkharingkapai kala kahāng makhanganābingna.
Kha tamkachithei khamathā chili khangaruma chi nana chishutphalungra.
Khararnaobingli ngarakzakhai khavai, ningkā khavai, khalatta ngarinthei khavai, shitkasang, leikashi kala kakhāngli nganingtit khavai tamchitheilu.
Chithada preirarbingli kathara preirarwui mirin zatkhavai hāngchitheilu. Athum morkasāp lah khamarip otsakli mazangphalungmara. Kaphā chi khikhala da lārongpongbingna tamkhui khavai
athumna lārongpongbingli gahara ngarā eina naongarāli leishi khavai,
ningkakāva̱, shim pānkatheiva̱, lumashankatheiva̱ kala gahara ngarāwui kahāng khanganava̱ sākhavai tamchitheiphalungra; chithākha Varewui eina kharā chānpao chili mi khipānakha mamashātmara.
Chithada sāda yaronnaobinglila athum khalatta ngarinshap khavai kasatsanglu.
Apong saikorali na khalatta acham-aram kaphāwui ngayoyan sāphalungra. Nawui tamkachitheili ningkathar kala ningkasang eina sālu.
Maphenkapai tui matuilu, chithākha ithumwui apongli athumna makaphā khikha hāngkhavai masamphangmada yangkashibing khayakkhuira.
Raobingna athumwui akhavābingwui kahāng nganā khavai kala apong kachiva̱li ningyāng ungngasak khavai tamchitheilu. Athumli mangakaishi ngasakalu

kala malee ngasakalu, kha athumna atam kachida kaphā kala kahāng khanganā lei kaji chitheiphalungra. Chithākha athumwui otsak saikorali ithumwui Huikhame Varewui pongli tamkachithei chi aman leingasakra.
Kaja mikumo saikorali huikhui khavai Varena awui lukhamashan chitheimihaira.
Lukhamashan china ithumli Vare makathei mirin kala okathuiwui khamathang horngasakhailaga khalatta khangarin mirin, mashungrik eina kala Vareli theida okathui hili okthui khavai tamchitheimi.
Ithumna kachihān khamahaiya zimiksholi ngaraida ithumwui Huikhame Jishu Khrista kala hakkhamahā Varewui tekhamatei chi rāthanghon
makaphā makhayāwui eina ngatangkhuida awui kathara kala khamareka mi sākhavai a khalatta ithumwui vang chigatmi.
Kasatkasang eina ngasoda mangasunglakla kahāngla hāngmachinlu. Mi khipānakha nali mayangkateo ngasaklu.
Khamungabing eina pangshap kasingabingli mayā khavai, athumwui kahāng nganā khavai, kala khamashung ot sāngairareohai khavai nawui mibingli phaningung ngasaklu.
Khipalikha kashi

Ithum atam akhali mangma̱sai, kahāngla manganāsāmana kala khangui pongli zatsai. Mik khamathak, pha̱sāwui ringkaphāmangli phāda kala yuikashi yangkashina pemhaida akha eina akha yangkharing ngaroksai.
Kha ithumwui huikhame Varewui lukhamashan kala leikashi phongkhami tharan,
ithumli ana huimi. Ithumna khamashung khangarong ot kasāwui vang maningmana; kha awui lukhamashan mangā eina pheomihaida Manglā Katharana pharā khangasak mirin kadhar chi ithumli thada mi.
Ithumwui Huikhame Jishu Khristawui mangā eina Varena ithumwuitungli Manglā Kathara pemting eina heirormi.
Chieina awui lukhamashan mangā eina ithumli mashungmida ithumna kachihān makashimān kharing mirin chi samphang ngasaka.
Hi khamashunga chānsamna;
Ina nali hiwui pongli saklak eina hāng ngasakngai. Chithākha Vareli shitkasangabingna kaphā ot kasāli chekchinmeira kala hikathā hi mibingwui vang phai kala kānnai.
Kha mangkhama̱wui ngaphat khangarok, miun kaphei, ningkhokkha makasā kala ainwui pongli khararkhangarokli mazangalu. Chi makankhanā otmānga.
Kaikhangasaka mi chili khani shida hāngmachinlu. Chiwui thiliva khikha mahāngluilu.
Kaja hikathā mi hiya morei kasā kala makathara mina da nana thei. Awui moreina a yonna da theikhui ngasakra.
Phayetme Zenas eina Apollosli kashap eina thākta chihoungmilu. Ani khavāt malei khavaila yangmilu.
Kachangkhat darkar khalei chi mishap khavai ithumwui mibingna kaphā ot kasāli ngalang chigathei khavai tamkhuiphalungra kala aremawui mirin maringphalungmara.
Ili ngasokapambing saikorana nali shālam chiphunli. Shitkasanglungli shālam chiphunli. Shitkasanglungli ithumli leikashebing chili ithumwui shālam hāngmihailu.
Nathum saikorali Varewui lukhamashan china ngasomichingranu.
Khrista Jishuwui vang eina phātop kazanga Paul kala ivānao Timothy inina
ithumwui ngasota kala otsakruma Philemon;
nawui shimli kazip khangaruma churchwui mibing, izara̱ Apphia kala Khristawui raimi sākhangaruma Archipusli kagapina.
Kaja Proho Jishuli nawui shitkasang kala katharabing saikorali nawui leikashi pao ina shāhaira.
Shitkasangabing thada nali ot sākhangarum hina Khristali ithum ringrumda sokhami samphangda khalei chi thukmeida theikhuipaira kaji hi iwui seihā kasāna.
Leikashiya ivānao, nawui leikashi china ili tarākha khamathān kala kakatom miya, kaja shitkasangbing saikorali nana ning ringphā ngasakhaowa.
Chiwui vang eina Khristawui alungli nachinā akha sāda, sāki kaji chi sākhavai nali kakasoli pingshapa.
Chithālala leikashiwui mangā eina Khristawui mathun akha sāda kala awui vang eina arui phātopli narkahaia, Paul ina nali makasola kapona.
Khristawui lungli inaomayara ngasā kahaia Onesimuswui mahut eina ina kapona kaja phātopli leilakha I awui manglāwui avāva̱ sākahaina.
Khareli nawui vang makannāsāmana, kha ara nawui vangla, iwui vangla kānnai.
Ali nawuili chihorāluishitli; iwui ningkatongla zanga.
Paokaphāwui vang eina I phātopli leilakha nawui mahut sāda ili otram ngatha̱mi khavai ali ngasopamngai.
