Kha ili ngachonmi khavai nali tandi masāngaimana; nawui ningkatong chi eina vaingasakngai. Chieina nana mayākhami maningla ina khikhikhala masālakmara.
Nana ali ngasopamchingpai khavai atam kasha̱khawui vang Onesimusna nawui eina thuikahailapai.

Ara a hi raona jilala raoli mataimeikhārda Khristawui lungli leikashe chinaongarā akha sāhaira. Iwui vanga a hi aman saklaka. Kala Prohowui lungli rao kala chinaongarā akha sāda a hi nawui vang aman kayākha sakmataimeirakhala!
Chiwui vang eina ili nawui ot sākhangaruma akhana da phaningakha ili nana samphangkhuiki kaji thada ali samphangkhuimilu.
Nali khayon sahaisālala kala leiman zangsālala chi ina runra.
Paul ina ipāng eina hi kagapina, Ina runra—naphasā, namanglā tongda ili leiman zanga kaji kahāng maningmana.
Chieina ivānao, Prohowuilungli nawui eina khangachon hi samphang ngasakmilu. Ining ringphā ngasakmilu.
Nawui kahāng khanganāli shitsangda, ina kapoli lāngmeida samilakra kaji theida ina hi kagapina.
Chili lāngda iwui vang shim kā akha ngarānmihaisalu, kaja nathumwui seihā kasā ngahānkāmida Varena nathumwuili rālui ngasakra kajiwui kachihān lei.
Kala ili ot sakhangarumbing, Mark, Aristachus, Demas kala Luke longnala shālam chiphunli.
Proho Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan chi nathumli ngasomiranu.
Achālakha awo ayibingli Varena kachungkha shida matuiya kala apong kachungkha eina marānbingli shichinda hāngmi.
Kha khanaowa atam hiliva Naomayarali shichinda ithumli hāngmihaira. Apuk-apaga hi awui mangā eina sai kala ot saikora awui sāngasaka.

Anaona Varewui tekhamateiwui kahān chi hāna kala Varewui azak tākamhai. Awui tui china apuk-apaga hi ringkhangasakna. Mikumowui morei pheokhami samphang kahaiwui thili, ana kazingramli Reikhamatai Varewui yāshong pama.
Varena Anaomayarali khami aming china kazingraobingwui amingli reikhamei thada athumli Anaomayara reimeida sākahaina.
“Na Inaomayarana;
ina nali aja pharākhuihaira” jikhala?
Lha kazingrao khipākhawui vang
“I awui Avāva̱ sāra,
a iwui Naomayara sāra” da hāngkhala?
“Varewui kazingrao saikorana
ali khorumranu”
“Varena awui kazingraobingli masi sāngasaka,
kala awui raobingli meiwon sāngasaka.”
“He Varivara! nawui wungpamkhong mashimānda leichingra!
Nawui mibingli nana mashun eina mungra.
Nana khamashungli leishi kala khanguili ningkachai.
Chiwui vang eina Vare, nawui Varena nawui ngasotnaobingli lāngmeikharda ringkaphāwui thao chi nali neomihaira.”
kala kazingramla napāngthem otsakna.
Saikora chi shimānserhaora, kha na leichingra;
athum saikora kachon thada chamserhaora.
Katuma phahon thada nana khaluikhuihaora,
kala chibing chi ngacheikhuihaora,
kha nava chichingra,
kala atam zingkum kakum mavaimara.”
“Iwui yāshong pamlu,
yangkashibingli nawui pheinai
masā ngasakranglakha eina tangda” da mahānglakmana.
Athum hi kahui samphangki kaje athumli otram ngatha̱mi khavai chihorā kahai sheba sāme manglābing maningmala? Kala huimiki kajibingli ngachonmi khavai chihokharā manglā maningmala?
Chiwui vang eina ithumna shākahai khamashung chi ngazipmeida singphalungra, chithākha ithum chiwui eina mangaphongthuimara.
Kazingraona khami pao chi khamashungna da chitheimihaira; chithākha chiwui athi makashurbingna samphang khangayi tandi chi samphangra.
Hiyākha kahaka huikhami hili ithumna manganāsangla kathada yāmshokpairakhala? Khareli Prohona huikhami hi hāngmi. Kala kashābingna chi mashunga da shākhi mihaira.
Varena machutbing, matakhak kahai kala mina masākharar otsakbing kala awui ningkachāng athishurda ngayarkhami Manglā Katharawui lemmet chieina shākhi mi.
Ithumna matuida khalei rāki kaji okathui hi kazingraobingna mungkhavai mamihaimana.
Kha kathara Varetuili hāngkahai thada,
“Mikumo hi khida,
nana awui vang hiyākha phaningmi,
khikha makhaning mikumo hili nana
hiyākha sakta khuimikhala?
Atam kasha̱khawui vang nana ali kazingraobingli kateokha nemmeida sākhui,
tekhamatei kala khayākakā eina kuihon sāda ngahonmi.
Kala ot saikora awui pheizingli leingasaka.”
Ot saikora awui pheizingli leingasakta ot saikora awui pāngli horsangmi, mahorsangkhami akhala maleimana. Chithālala arui eina tangda ot saikora awui pheizingli leihaira kaji ithumna matheiranga.

Kha Varewui lukhamashan mangā eina mi kachiva̱wui vang thimiki kaje atam kasha̱khawui vang kazingraoli nemmeida sākahai Jishuli ithumna thei. Kathiwui kachotkachāng phungkhamiwui vang tekhamatei kala khayākakā eina kuihon sāda ngahonmi kahai chi ithumwui mik eina thei.
Ot saikora kasā kala phāri khavai Varena mi kachungkhali Anaomayarawui tekhamatei chi samphangrum khavai mingasakphalungra kaji hi mashunglaka.
Kaja tharkhame eina tharmi kahaibing saikorawui haophok khavaipam akhamānga. Chiwui vang eina Jishuna athumli ichināngarā hokida makhayakmada
hithada hānga,
“Ina nawui ming ichinā ngarāli vaomalānra, yarui
kazipli nali ina masot chikatra.”
kala hithada hānglui.
“Ila, Varena mikahai naongarābingla
hili lei.”
Chieina naoshinaobing chi phasā khavaia kala ashee kazanga mi sāhaoda Jishula athum thāpapama. Kaja ana thikhami mangā eina kathiwui pangshap kasinga chipee chili shimān ngasaka.
Kala kathili khangacheewui vang eina athum mirin peida rao sākasābingli ningkhān ngasaka.
Kaja ana khangachon chi kazingraobingli maningla Abrahamwui ara̱-azālina kaji hi khamashung tuina.
Ningtongda shitsangkapai kala Varewui mangāli lumashankatha pāngmon kharei sākhavai; ana otsak kachiva̱li achināngarā thada kasāna, kaja mibingwui morei pheomi khavaina.
Alila suida kakhanang samphang kahaiwui vang, ara kasui samphangda khaleibing chili ana ngachonmira.
Varena hokhui kahai kathara ivānaobing, ithumna hāngkaphata paokazata kala pāngmon kharei Jishuli phaninglu.
Mosesna Varewui shimkhurli shitsanglak kahai thada Jishunala ali khāngkhuikhame Vareli ningtongda shitsanga.
Shim kasaa china shim chili lāngmeida khayā kai. Chithada sāda Mosesli lāngmeikharda Jishuna tekmatei ngayiya.
Shim kachiva̱ chiwui kasaa mi leisera, kala saikora kasaa chi Varena.
Mosesna Varewui shimli rao akha sāda ningtonglak eina shitsanga, kala naoda shokki kaji Varena kahāng chi ana shākhi mi.
Kha Khristana anaomayara sāda Varewui shim ningtongda mayonmi. Ithumna kachihān chiwui vang khanao eina tangda ninglumtur eina singtitakha, ithum awui shimna.
“Aja nathumna Varewui akhon shaakha,
achālakha nawo-nayingarāna Vareli ngakaikashi thada
ning mamararhaialu,
lamhāngli kazat tharan chāng khayang thada.
Chili athumna ili chāng tamyanga,
kum hangmati ina athumli sākhami chi thatheilala,
da Varena hānga.
Chiwui vang eina mithot hili
ina malungvātta hānga,
‘Athumna khayonmāng phaningchinga,
iwui tuila manganāmana.’
Lungvāt eina ina khangashit sai;
‘Iwui ngasāmkakhui chili
nathum khipākha mazanglakmara!’”
Ivānaongarā! Kharinga Varivarawui eina mangareithui khavai zakkashi ning kala mashitkasang ot maphaning khavai ning ngasharlu.
Moreina nathum khipālikha chipatta ning mamakang ngasak khavai “Aja” kaho hi leilakha nathum akha eina akha kasatkasang eina ngasoda thangkachida machin ngaroklu.
Kharewui eina ithumna shitkasang khalei chi khangachang eina tangda singtitakha ithum Khristawui otsakrumasera.
Kathara lairikli hithada hānghaida lei,
“Aja nathumna Varewui akhon shaakha;
achālakha nawo-nayingarāna ngakaikashi thada,
ning mamakanghaialu.”
Kum hangmati Varena khipāli malungvātkhala? Morei kasābing kala lamhāngli thisang kahaibing chi maningmala?
Athum ili ngasoda khangasām masamphanglakmara da Varena khangashit kasā chi khipālonglikhala? Ali ngakaikashibingli kahāng maningmala?
Athumna mashitsangthuda mazangrarthuwa kaji ara ithumna theiya.
Ara, Varewui ngasāmkakhui chili zangkhavai ana ithumli ngashitkhami chi mida lei. Chiwui vang eina khipākha ngasāmkakhui chili mazangkharar malei khavai ning ngasharra.
Kaja athumna kashā thada ithumla paokaphā chi shāhaira, shālala athumwui vang kānkhanā maleimana. Khiwui vangkhala kaja athumna kashā tharan shitkasang eina ngasoda makhuisangthuwa.
Hithada hāngkahai thada ana ngashitmi kahai ngasāmkakhui chi ali shitkasanga ithumna samphanghaira. Ana okathui sāda kupkahaiwui thili hithada hānga.
“Lungvāt eina ina khangashit sai;
‘Iwui ngasāmkakhui chili athum khipākha mazanglakmara,’”
chitharan ana sāki kaji saikora apuk-apaga kasā atamli kuphairasai.
Kashinethangwui pongli kathara lairik apam akhali hithada hānghai, “Ot saikora kupserhaida kashinethang Varena ngasāmkhui”,
ngaraikachā apamli hithada hāngluishita, “Iwui ngasāmkakhui chili athum khipākha mazanglakmara.”
Paokaphā shākharebing chi ngasāmkakhui masamphangmana, kachiwui vangkhala jilaga athumna mashitsangthuwa. Kha kaikhana ngasāmkakhui samphangra.
Kaja Varena khangatei zimiksho akha phākhuida “Aja” kaji hi eina theikhui. Tui hi zingkum kasāngkhawui thili Davidwui eina kashā samphanga, kaja kathara lairikli hithada hānghai;
“Aja nathumna Varewui khon shaakha, wuk mamakanghaialu.”
Varena ngashitmi kahai ngasāmkakhui chi Jishuna mibingli mihaisāsi kaja khangatei zimiksho akhawui pongli Varena mamatuihaisāmara.
Chiwui vang eina aruila, Varena sabbaththang ngasāmkakhui thada awui mibingla ngasāmkhui khavai lei.
Varena awui ot sālaga ngasāmkakhui thada, ali kazangbingla kachichāwui ot kasāwui eina ngasāmkhuira.
Chiwui vang eina ngasāmkakhui chi samphang khavai ithum kashap eina tangda sāsa, chithākha shitkasang khavātwui vang athumna masamkaphang chithada ithum khipākha masamkaphang maleimara.

Varewui tui hiya kharinga kala pangshapana. Zankhangasung raighaili zanmei. Hiya kharing eina manglā ngashik khavai pam, kala ara̱-ngasun eina angating ngachaipam kachida vāza̱sera. Miwui ningkachāng kala kaphaningla hina kashikaphā chitheimi.
Varivarawui eina ngathumkapai khikha maleimana. Ot saikora awui miktāli ngakheikhang eina theisera; kala ithumna sākahai ot saikora ali hāngphatserki kajina.
Jishu, Varewui Naomayara pāngmon kharei kazingramli vāhaira, chiwui vang eina ithumna khuisang kahai shitkasang chi singtitsa.
Ava ithumwui khangazanli malukhamashana pāngmon kharei maningmana. Lākhashong phaningakha, ithumwui thada alila suihaira, kha ava morei masālakmana.
Chiwui vang eina lukhamashan khaleipam Varewui wungpamkhongli chihansa̱ vāsa. Chili ithum lukhamashan samphangra kala ithumna khavāt tharan ngachonmi khavai lukhamashan samphangra.
Athumwui mahut eina Vareli otram ngatha̱mi khavai mibingna pāngmon kharei kapangkhui, kala ana moreiwui vang kachigat kala pha̱kaphayā ot sai.
Ala apong kachungkhali khangazanwui vang, matheithangkhamabingna khayon kasā saikora chili malungkhanim eina ot sāshapa.
Chiwui vang eina mibingwui vāngmāng maningla a khalattawui moreiwui vangla pha̱kaphayā ot sai.
Khayākakā pāngmon kharei sākhavai khalatta makapangkhuimana. Aaronli hokakhui thada Varena hokakhui mi chili sākhangasakna.
Chithada sāda Khristanala pāngmon kharei ngasā khavai a khalatta makhāngkāmana kha hithada kahāng a china ali ngapham hi mi;
“Na inao Mayarana;
aja I nawui Avā ngasāhaira.”
“Na Melchizedekwui thada,
mashimānda pāngmon sāchingra.”
Varewui Naomayarana jilala kachotkachāng kaphung eina kahāng khanganā tamkhui.
Kāshungchao ngasak kahai tharan awui kahāng khanganābing saikorawui vang katang makhavai huikhamiwui ura̱ok ngasāhaowa,
kala Melchizedek kathā pāngmon kharei akhana da Varena chitheimi.
Hiwui pongli hāngki kaji kachungkha lei, kha nathumna bhap matākhui katheiwui vang hāngsaklaka.
Nathum ara ojā sātheirānhaira, kha Varetui pheisin khare chi nathumli tamchithei khavai khangatei akha phāsangfarali. Nathum zāt khamarar zāki kajiwui mahutli seina̱ mangchingda leili.
Seina̱ mangda khaleibing chi mashun-makhui matheila nganuichingda khaleibingna.
Kha zāt khamarar hi khararnaobingwui vang, ningphaninwui pangshap eina kashikaphā theishapabingwui vangna.

Khristawui pongli theiphokdhadhar kajiwui arah chi horhailaga kāshungmei khavai sausa. Kathe otsakbingwui eina ningkhangatei kala Vareli shitkasang haokaphokwui shimphung chili singtitta maleichingsa.
Ra̱kahik, pāng khāngkāda sokhami, kathiwui eina ringkhangasaka kala katang makhavai bichar hikathā tamkachithei himāngli maleichingsa.
Ithum mangāshong muivausa! Varena mayāmiakha ithumna hi sāra.
Varewui kahor samphang kahaibingna kazingramwui sokhami mazapyanghailaga, Manglā Katharawui apongla samphanghailaga,
Vare tuiwui khamathā kala, rāki kaji thotwui pangshapla mazapyanghailaga,
mai ngareithui kahaibing! Athumli ning ngateilui khavai khuiungluiki kaji masākapai otna, kaja Varewui Naomayarali athumna krushtungli shāoshānluishitta yarui mangāli maishi ngasakta lei.
Zingrot tārorda mazimkakhui kala lui khavābingwui vang kānkhanā arongbing khar khangasaka ngalei chili Varena somi.
Kha ka̱shāt eina khawomāng kaphor ngalei chi kānkhanā maleimana; chili Varena khonshikapaiwui kalāshāt lei kala mei eina shimān ngasakra.
Leikashebing, hikathā tui hānglaga, nathumwui vanga huikhamiwui phākhamei sokhami lei da shitsangchaowa.

Vareva mashun bichar sākhamena. Chiwui vang eina nathumna sāmi kahai otsak lah katharabingli ngachonkhami eina nathumna ali leikashi chithei kahai kala aruila athumli ngachonmida khalei chi ana mamalaimara.
Nathumwui kachihān chi ungshungchao khavai nathum kachiva̱na khanao eina tangda mayontit kaji hi ithumwui ningkachāngna.
Chiwui vang eina nathumli ngachāng makakā mi mangasā ngasakngaimana, kha Varena ngashitmi kahai chi samphang khavai shitkasang eina lāngkatha̱bing kathā sāngasakngai.
Ana hānga, “Ina somida nawui ara̱-azā kachungkha mira da shākhi kasāna.”
Abrahamna khāngkatheiwui vang Varewui ngashit kahai chi samphanga.
Kachikathāna khangashit kasā tharan ali reikhameiya kachikathā akhawui mingli mingzaiya kala khangashit chi kupkhui.
Varena ngashitmi kahai samphangki kajebingli, awui kharin chi mangacheilākmana kaji hi theishingkhui ngasakkhangaiwui vang khangashit chili shākhi sāmi.

Chili khamataia khani lei, chiya mangacheipaiki kaji kala Varena maningmana majiki kaji china. Chieina awuili ningkhalum samphang kahai ithumwui vanga ithumwui mangāli haimi kahai kachihān chili singtit khavai panglāk eina kasatmiya.
Kachihān hi ithumwui mirinwui pokkhui khavai katha sāda lei. Hiya kalākashi makhalei, makhangapatana, chonrān chi kānzangda zangkhamei kathara shim chili zangshunga.
Ithumwui vang eina Jishuna chili rida zanghaira, kala Melchizedek thada katang makhavai pāngmon kharei sāhaira.

kala Abrahamna awui khalei saikorawui sharuk tharāwui akha ali mi. (Melchizedek kajiwui kakhalat khareva, “Khamashung khangarongwui Awunga” kajina; a Salemwui awunga ngasā kahaiwui vang awui ming “Chingri kahai Awunga” dala khalatpai).
Melchizedekwui ava̱ avā, awo-ayi lei kaji khikha makapihaimana, kala awui kapharā eina kathila kapi kahai maleimana. A Varewui Naomayara kathāna kala katang mavaila pāngmon akha sāda leichinga.
Chithākha a kayākha kahaka mikhala? Awo kharar Abrahamnala raili samkaphang sharuk tharāwui akha mi.
Kala Leviwui ara̱-azā pāngmonbingli Israelnaobingwui eina sharuk tharāwui akha ngashaikhui khavai ainna kasohai, chiya Abrahamwui ara̱-azā ngasesenglala aramnaowui eina ngashaikhui.
Melchizedek Leviwui shangnao maningmana, kha Varewui ngashit kahai samkaphanga Abrahamwui eina sharuk tharāwui akha khuida somi;
sokhami khamena sokhami kakhuiali reimei kaji hili ningmaong khavai maleimana.
Kathara Lairikli kahāng thada, pāngmonbingwui shong jiakha thikapai mina sharuk tharāwui akha chi ngashaikhui, Melchizedekwuishongva kharinga china ngashaikhui.
Hānglaksa jiakha, Abrahamna katharā chi khami tharan, Levinala (sharuk katharā khangashaiya ara̱-azā) miya.
Abraham eina Melchizedek samkaphang tharan Levi mapharārangsai, wuklungli leikasā kathāna.
Pāngmon ngacheiakha ainla ngacheiphalungra.
Hiwui pongli ithumwui Prohova shang khangateina, ashi shangwui eina khipānakha pāngmon sāda otram mangatha̱mana.
Ali Judah shimkhurli pharai kaji tharlak eina theikahaina; kala pāngmonwui pongli Mosesna khamatui tharan shang hiwui pongli khikha mahāngmana.
Hi Melchizedek kathā khangatei pāngmon akha shokhaira kaji hina tharmeikharda theingasaka.
Ali mikumowui ayin eina pāngmon sākhangasak maningmana, kha katang makhavai kharing chiwui pangshap eina pāngmon sākhangasakna.
Kathara Lairikli hithada hānga, “Melchizedek thada nana katang mavaila pāngmon sāra.”
Kachama ain chi ngazanhaoda kala makannāthuda horhaowa.
Kaja Moseswui ainna khilikhala makāshung ngasakrarmana. Ara phākhamei kachihān ithumli chitheimihaira. Chiwui mangā eina ithumna Vareli nganaimeihaira.
Hili tuingashit makazang maningmana.
Rida pāngmon otsin kasingbingna tuingashit makhuila pāngmon sāsai, hipā hiva tuingashit zangda pāngmon ngapham khui; kaja Varena hithada hānga:
“Prohona khangashit sāhaira,
awui ning mangacheiluimara;
mashimānda nana pāngmon sāra”
Khani hiwui khangatei athishurda Jishuna phākhamei ngashit kahaiwui nganingkhamena.
Ngatei khangarok akhala lei; athumwui pāngmon kachungkhaya, kaja kathi kaho hi ngavāhaoda, ngapham hi mathila singpamshon majipaithuwa.
Kha Jishuva ringchingda lei, chieina khangatei pāngmonli mikhamaron maleimana.
Chiwui vang awui ming eina Vareli kazanga saikorali aruila kala atam kachida ana huimishapa. Khikhalajila ana athumwui vang Vareli phayetmichinga.

Chiwui vang eina ithumwui ningkachāng ungshung khavai pāngmon kharei chi Jishuna. A Katharana; ali khayon kala morei maleimana; morei kaphungbingwui eina ngateimihaida kazingramli chuimeida khuikāhaira.

Ava khangatei pāngmon khareibing kathā maningmana, ana rimeikapta awui moreiwui vang, chiwui thili kateibingwui moreiwui vang da thangkachida pha̱phayā khavai darkar masāluimana, a khalatta pha̱phayā khavai kachigat tharan, pha̱kha kashi china saikorawui vang pha̱mi kahaina.
Makaphayo mikumoli ainna pāngmon kharei sāngasaka, kha ainwui thili kharā Varewui ngashit kahai tui china katang mavaila kāshungchao ngasak kahai Anaomayarali kapangsanga.
Kala mina maningla Prohona sākahai shim akachang chiwui Tharmathengmeikap kaji pamli, Pāngmon Kharei sāda otram ngatha̱mida lei.
Pāngmon Kharei kachiva̱ hi Vareli kachigat kala pha̱kaphayāwui ot sākhavai kapangkasangna. Chithada sāda ithumwui Pāngmon Khareipāla khikhakha chigatphalungra.
A okathuili leisi kaje kachilikha pāngmon masālakmara, kaja ot kasā pāngmon kachungkha lei.

Athumna kasā hiya kazingramli sāda khalei ot chiwui aka̱la kathā sha̱kakhuina. Hi Mosesna sākasā chieina tākamhai. Ana Tabernacle sauki kaji tharan Varena ali hānga, “Kaphungtungli hāngkahai chi tākam eina mangapeilakla sālu.”
Vare eina mikumowui ngachaili phākhameia tuingashit ain ngarānkhamiwui vang, hakkhameiya pāngmonwui ot chi Khristali mihaira, kaja phākhameiya ngashikkhami ana sakāmi.
Khare tuingashit chili khayon maleisāsi kaje, kakhane darkar masāmara.
Kha Varena mibingwui khayon samphanghaoda hānga,
“Zimiksho chi rārāli da Prohona hānga;
kaja, Israelnao eina Judahnaoli kadhara tuingashit akha sāra.
Awo-ayibingli Egypt ngaleiwui eina ina thara̱kashok tharan
khangashit chithada masāluimara.
Ina athumli tuingashit kasā chili athumna maningtongmana,
chiwui vang inala mayangkhamina da Prohona hānga.
Ina Israelnaobingli tuingashit sāki kaji chi hina da Prohona hānga:
Rārāda khalei atamle ina iwui ainbing hi athumwui ningli sangmira,
kala athumwui wuklungli kapisangmira.
I athumwui Vare sāra,
athum iwui mi sāra.
Akha eina akha tamchithei ngarokta awui khongnainaobinglila,
achinā ngarālila,
‘Proholi theilu’ da mahāngmara.
Kaja athum saikorana ili theira,
teomeikap kaje eina thuida reimeikap kaje kāshungda.
Athumwui khayon pheomira,
athumwui moreila maphaningungmiluimara.”
Kadhara tuingashit khalei china khare chi chamngasakhaowa, kala kasāngkhahaida chamkahai ot chi thākta shimānhaowa.
Kachonshim akha sākhuilaga shokkhamayara kā chili Kathara Apam hoi. Chili meishong kala table eina ngasoda Ngasokhamiwui khamui hai.
Kā kakhane alungshong khalei chili Tharmathengmeikap kaje Apam hoi.

Chili nganamkaphā riktā khavai sināwui hanphutpam sinā eina kharoma tuingashit oko hai. Oko chiwui alungli manna sangkhavai sinakhong, lijeili awon khawon Aaronwui khāmshui, kala ningkhami kapisang kahai lungphek khani chila sanghai.
Okotung chili angachāng kakā sāyurna Vare khaleiwui mathun sāda, lukhamashanpam chiwuitungli angachāngna farorhai. Kha saikora chi arui mahāngrarmana.
Ot saikora ngarānserhailaga shokkhamayara kāli pāngmonbingna thangkachida zanglaga athumwui shiyansin singkai.
Kha Pāngmon Khareimāngna alungwui kā chili zanga, kala kumkhali akha shida zanga. Ana ashee khuiphungda awui vangla mibingwui vangla, matheimada morei sākahahai chiwui vang Vareli chigata.
Angayei-angayā saikora hi eina Manglā Katharana tharzā eina khare kachonshim leilakha eina tangda Tharmathengmeikap kaje Apamli zangkhavai mashomimana kaji chithei.
Hi ajawui atam hili theikhuipai khavaiwui vang kasāmaya. Hina kachitheiva Varivarali kachigat kala sā kapha̱ hina khokharumbingwui ning kāshungchao maji ngasakrarmana,

khiwui vangkhala kaja hiya ra̱shakshirei kala sākhamatharwui sharphahormānga. Varewui khangarān kadhar marāranglakha sāsā khavai akorwui ainzāmanga. Khamayonmāng kasāwui vang Varewui khangarān kadhara marāranglakha shichinkasā akorwui ainmānga.

Kha hili khamathā ot leiping kahai chiwui vang Khristana Pāngmon Kharei sāda rāmihaira. Ana otram ngatha̱ khavai hakkhameia kala kāshung khameia shim chi mina sākakhui kachonshim maningmana, sākahai okathuiwui akai maningmana.

Ithum saikorawui vang Tharmathengmeikap kaji Apamli Khristana akhashida kazang tharan, pha̱phayā khavai meshee, seishee, makhuizangmana, kha khalattawui ashee khuizangda katang makhavai ngatangkhami samphanga.
Meshee, seishee kala seinao rikkatāwui hotla chi ikrorlaga makathar athumli tharmisai.

Chithākha Khristawui ashee eina kayākha mataida tharmirakhala? Katang makhavai Manglā chieina chukkhara maleila a khalatta Vareli pha̱mi. Awui ashee eina ithumwui mashun-makhui chi makaphā otsakwui eina tharmihaida kharinga Vareli otram ngatha̱pai khavai sāmi.

Hiwui vang eina Khristana kadhara tuingashitwui ngashikmena. Varena ngashit kahai katang makhavai sokhami chi ana hokhui kahaibingli samphang ngasaka, kaja khare tuingashit chiwui eina ningkhān khavai thikhamina.
Hāngthi kahai leiakha kahānga mipā chi thihaira kaji shākhi leiphalungra.
Hāngkathi kaho hiya kahāngapā chi mathiranglakhava kānkhanā maleimana, kha thikahaiwui thili khuisangpai kajina.
Chiwui vang khare tuingashit chi ashee katā maleiakha kānkhanā maleimana.

Kharena, ainli kapi kahai ningkhami saikora chi Mosesna mi saikorali hāngchitheihailaga seishee eina meshee tara̱ manātlaga hungrisi kahai sāhā eina hyssop kaho thingnā chi khuilaga lairik eina mibing khaninili ikrorda
hānga, “Hi nathumna mayon khavai Varena kaso kahai tuingashit chi mahor namkhami asheena.”
Chi tākam eina Mosesnala kachonshimlila kala khokharumli shikachina ot saikoralila ashee ikrorra;
kachangkhata ainwui athishurda ot saikora ashee eina tharmi ngasakpapama; kala ashee tākhami maningla morei mapheomipaimana.
Kazingramli leiping kahai chiwui amahā namkakhuibing chiya chithada sāmathākhui phalungra. Kha kazingramwui otchao kajibing chiya hili lāngkhamei phākhamei pha̱kaphayā darkar sai.
Kaja akachangwui amahā kasā mikumona sākakhui Kathara Pam chili Khrista mazangmana, kha kazingramli zangda Varewui mangāli ithumwui vang nganingmida lei.
Jehudiwui Pāngmon Khareina ashee eina ngasoda kum kachida Tharmathengmeikap kaji Apamli zanga, kha Khristava akhali lāngda pha̱phayā khavai mazangmana.
Chi maningsāsi kaja okathui kasāwui eina thuida pha̱phayāchingmara. Kha khangachang atam rānanai morei khāngthuimi khavai saikorawui vang akhashida a khalatta thikhamina.
Mi saikora akhashida thiphalungra.
Chiwui eina kachungkhawui morei pheomi khavai Khristali akhashida pha̱kaphayāna. Moreili bichar sākhavai maningla kha ali khangaraibingli huikhui khavai kakhane sāda rāluira.

Ain hiya akachanga chiwui kākashung kala khangazip maong maningmana, hiya rāki kaji khamathā otbing chiwui aka̱lāna. Ngaraikachā pha̱kaphayā chi katang mavaila kumshirinda rāchigatchinga, chithākha hithada kachigatwui vang ainna kathada Vareli zangkida kharābingli kāshung ngasakpairakhala?
Vareli khokharumbingli moreiwui eina tharmikachanga jisi kaja moreiwui khayon chi athumwui ningli maleiluimara kala pha̱kaphayāla maleiluimara.
Kha kumshirinda pha̱kaphayā kasā hina athumwui morei phaningungching ngasaka.
Seishee, mesheena morei mapheorarlakmana.
“Pha̱kaphayā kala kachigat nana maningchāngmana,
kha nana ili phasā phonmihaira.
Rikkatā kachigat kala moreiwui vang kachigatli
nana ningyāng khaung maleimana.
Chieina ina hānga, O Varivara,
nawui kaphaning sākida,
I hili lei,
lairik khalui chili iwui pongli kapi kahai thada.”

Rimeikapta ana hānga: “Pha̱kaphayālapai, kachigatlapai lha hanphutli sha̱kei rikkatālapai kala morei sonthui khavai pha̱kaphayālapai, chili nawui ningkachāng kala ningyāngkhaung maleimana.” (Pha̱kaphayā saikora hi ainwui athishurda kachigatna kaji thatheilaga ana chi kahāngna.)
Chieina ana hānga, “Nawui kaphaning sākida I hili lei, he Varivara” Chieina kachama pha̱kaphayā chi shimān ngasakhailaga Khristawui pha̱kaphayā chi mi.
Chiwui vang eina Varena ningkachāng chi Jishu Khristana kasāwui vang awui phasā akhashi chigatkhami china morei tharmida kupchaohaira.
Jehudiwui pāngmon kachiva̱na thangkachida awui sākhangayi otram khangatha̱ ot chi sai kala ngaraikachā pha̱kaphayā chi kachungkhashida pha̱phayai; kha china morei makhuithuirarlakmana.
Kha Khristana moreiwui vang katang makhavaiwui pha̱kaphayā akhashi chigatmihailaga Varewui yāshong pamhaowa.
Ara ana chili, awui yangkashebingli Varena awui pheinai masā ngasakranglakha eina tangda ngaraipamda lei.
Morei tharmi kahaibingli akhashida pha̱phayāmi kahai china kāshung ngasakhaira.
Manglā Katharanala ithumli awui shākhi mi. Rimeikapta ana hānga.
Ina iwui ainbing hi athumwui wuklungli sangmira.
Kala chi athumwui ningli kapisangmira.”
Chiwui thili ana hānglui, “Ina athumwui khayon kala moreila maphaningungmiluimara.”
Saikora hi pheomihaiakha moreiwui vang kachigat che masāvailuimana.
Chiwui vang eina ivānaongarā, Jishuna thimi kahaiwui vang Tharmathengmeikap kaji Apamli ithumla zangpaihaira.
Rānkham kahai kachon—chiya aphasāwui mangā eina ithumwui vang kadhara kala kharinga shongfa ana shomihaira.
Varewui shim khamayona ithumwui kahaka pāngmon akha leihaira.
Chieina ningkathar kala makhangapat shitkasang eina kala khayona chukkhamaja̱wui eina tharmi kahai wuklung eina ngasoda tara̱ kathar eina phasāla ra̱vaihaida ithum Vareli nganaimeisa.
Ithumna kachihān chili singtitsa, kaja ngashit khame a chiya ningtonglaka.
Akhana akhali ningngaishida kaphā ot sākhami, leikashi chithei khavai ngachon ngaroksa.
Mi kaikhana kasā thada masāla ithumva mamalaihaila kazipngarumchingsa. Kala akha eina akha mataimeida kasatsang ngaroksa kaja Prohowui Zimiksho chi rānganaihaira kaji nathumna mik eina thei.
Khamashung kaho chi theikahaiwui thili, sāphalungra da morei sāchingakha moreiwui vang pha̱kaphayā maleiluimana.
Kha taikahai saikorana, rāki kaji bichar kala Vareli ngakaikashebing saikorali mei eina shimān ngasaki kaji chili khangachee eina ngaraira.
Moseswui Ain makhanganā mi kachiva̱li, mi khani lah kathumna shākhi mihaiakha, lukhamashan maleila shaothata.

Chithākha Varewui naomayarali makachāpa, moreiwui eina tharmi kahai Varewui tuingashitwui asheeli paisor eina kaphaninga mi, lukhamashanwui Manglāli mana̱kashe mi chi khi ngasāra? Awui tandi kayākha sakmeirakhala da phaningyanglu!
“Athut kakhui chi iwuina; ina hāngsangmira,” da kahāngapa chili ithumna thei; kala hithadala hānga, “Prohona awui mibingli bichar sāra” da kahāngpa chi thei.
Kharinga Varewui pāngli tākazang hiya khangachee khangacham otna.
Nathumna Varewui kahor samphang kahai chiwui thili kachot kachungkha samphanglala maikashi masamphanglak kaji atam chi phaningunglu.
Mararakli yarui mangāli khayak ngasaka, zakshilāk einala sai. Mararakliva rekakharek samkaphangbingli ot sakruma.
Phātop kazangbingli nathumna chotruma, kala nathumwui ot ngapaithuihailala kashimān chiwui vang ringphai, kaja makashimān kala phākhamei lan ngarānhaida lei kaji nathumna thei.
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui ning khanganung masuitāhaialu, khamataia sāman samphangra.
Varewui ningkachāng athishurda sākhavai kala ana ngashit kahai chi samphang khavai nathum khāngthei khavai sālu.
“Kasha̱khawui thili
rāki kaje chi rāra;
masāngmara.
Iwui khangaronga china shitkasang eina ringra,
kha ana ngalanakha,
awuitungli iwui kapen maleimana.”
Ithum ngalanthui kahaia kala shimān kahai yur maningmana; kha shitsangda huimi kahai yurna.
Mik eina matheiranglala samphanglakra da ningnganungda chihantit kaji hi shitkasangna.
Achālakhawui mibingna shitkasang mangā eina Varewui khamayā samphanga.
Shitkasang mangā eina ithumna theishingkhui kaja apuk-apagva̱̱ hi Varewui tui eina sākhui. Chieina theikapai otbing hi mik eina matheikhararra chiwui eina sākakhuina.
Shitkasang maleila khipānakha Vareli ningyāng maung ngasakrarmana. Vareli kharā mi chiya Vare lei kala ali kaphā mili sāman mira kaji shitkasang leiphalungra.
shitkasang mangā eina ana Varena ngashitmi kahai ngalei chili ayarwui mi thada asoma, Varewui ngaraikachā ngashitkhami samkaphanga Isaac eina Jacob thada ala kachonshimli okthui.
Kaja Varena sakakā kala semkhami shimphung khalei keinung chiwui vang ana honchinga.
Chieina kathi eina ngaraichā kahaia mi akhawui eina ara̱-azā kazingramwui sirā kala shamadrupheiwui situi ngayāda shoka.
Hikatha kahāngabing hiya ramsom phākazatna da tharzā eina chithei.
Athumna chiho kahai ram chili maphaningshonmana, phaningungsi kaja athum latungluilapai.
Kha athumna phākhamei ram, kazingramwui ramsom ningchānga. Chiwui vang eina athumna Vareli athumwui Vare kaho hili makhayakmana; kaja athumwui vang ana keinung akha ngarānmihaira.
Awui pongli hithada hānghai, “Isaacwui eina nawui ara̱-azā tarākha shokngasakra.”
Varena Isaacli kathiwui eina ringngasakluishapa da Abrahamna shitsanga, kala kachangda Isaacli thiki kajiwui eina samphangkhuilui.
Shitkasang mangā eina Josephna thinanai, Israelnaobingna Egyptwui eina yāmshokki kaji tui hāngmi, kala ali chifaki kajiwui ponglila hāngsera.
Moreilungli kasha̱kha ringphāki kajiwui vanga Varewui mibingli ngasoda kakhanang kaphung ana ningchāngmei.
Egyptwui lan saikorale Messiahwui vang maikashi phāmeikhāra da ana theikhui; kaja naoda samphangki kaji sāman chimāngli yanga.
Shitkasang mangā eina ana Makānkhami Phanit mayonda khāmongli ashee ikror ngasaka. Chieina kathewui kazingraona Israelwui naochizaibingli masāthatmana.
Shitkasang mangā eina khayorva̱ Rahabna Vareli ngakai kashebingli ngasoda kathili mazangmana, kaja ana rairui kazata khanili zunkhui ngasaka.
Shitkasang mangā eina athumna khangarar apam kachida wungram yuikhuiya, mashun sāngasaka, ngashitmi kahai samphanga, kazingkha̱ khamor khalapmi,
khamalinga mei shimitmi, raighaiwui eina nganaishoka, khangazanwui eina pangshap samphanga, raili pingshuna, ayar ngaleiwui raimili kashamshapa.
Shitkasang preinaobingna thikahaiya athei-asābing kharing eina samphangluishita. Phākhamei mirin ringshok khavai kaikhava ningkakhān maningchāngmada rekakharek kachotkachāng phunga.
Kaikhali mana̱shida kashaola shaowa; khangatei kaikhali pheipāng khalaplaga phātop sanga.
Athumli ngalung eina horthata, ngahunpattala hātkhai, raikhai einala yorthata. Athumna mehui, yaohui ngahonda okthui kala kachām-khangai rekakharek mirin kala kachotkachāng phunga.
Okathui hi athumwui vang khikha makannāthuwa! Yāmkazatbing thada athumna kaphungli, khangaili, lungkhur thingkhurli ngayinzata.
Shitkasang mangā eina athumna kayākha khamathā ot sāchitheihairakhala? Chithālala Varena ngashitmi kahai chi athum masamphangmana,
khikhalajila ithumwui vang mathākhamei akha ngarānmihaira, chiya ithum mazangla athummāngli kāshungchao kahai chi masamphang ngasakmara.

Chiwui vang eina ithumwui vanga kuimareida khayanga shākhi kachungkha leihaoda, hapkakhano saikora kala ngathānshang ngathāntā da khalei morei chi hortāhailaga ithumwui shongzā khangakhui chili makhunlak eina zatsa.

Haokaphok eina thuilaga akatang eina tangda ithumwui shitkasang phumhaiki kaja Jishuli yangchingsa. Ana krushli ngacheeda mayāmmana! Kha ali ngaraida khalei khamathān chiwui vang, krushtungli kathiwui maishātli ana khikha mahengsangmimana, kala ara Varewui wungpamkhong yāshong pamda lei.
Morei kaphungbingna ali kaphen chi ana kathada khāngmikhala kaji phaninglu. Chithākha nathum malungkharing kala ning suikatā maleimara.
Kaja moreili khangararwui vang nathumli shaokathat mashokrangli.
Varena awui nao thada malung pingkhavai kahāng chi malaihairala?
“Inaomayara, Prohona hāngkhamachinli paisor eina makhuialu,
kakharar tharan ning masuitālu.
Prohona leikashe mili rākka kala anaomayarana da khuikasanga kachiva̱li tandi mi.”
Avāva̱wui tandi khamiwui kachot chi khānglu; nathumwui kakhanang china nathum Varewui naobingna kaji chi theira. Avāva̱na tandi makhami nao khipā leikhala?
Naongarā saikorali khamachin thada nathumli mamachinakha awui nao akachangbing maningmana.
Okathui avāva̱ ngarāwuishong jiakha athumna ithumli machina kala ithumna athumli khayāshi. Chithākha Manglāwui avāva̱li kayākha sakmeida khayākashi eina ngasoda ringrakhala?
Phasāwui avāva̱ ngarāna athumwui ningkachāng athishurda kasha̱khawui vang ithumli machina. Kha Varena awui kathar chili zangkhavai ithumwui kaphāwui vang machinmi.
Kasha̱khawui vang machinkhami saikora hi ringkaphā maningla kakhanangmāng thai, kha naodava, machinkhami eina kharāk samkaphangbing china khamashung khangarongwui chingri kahai athei samphanga.
Khangatar shongfali zatlu, chithākha khangasong phei chi masheishimara, honda kharai samphangra.
Mi kachiva̱li chingri eina ngasopamda kathar eina okthuilu, chi maningakha Proholi khipākha kathei masamphangmara.
Varewui lukhamashanwui eina khipākha mangareithui khavai ngasharlu, khipākha kakhā thing kaphor thada chiwui hu eina yaruili makhonzār ngasakalu.
Khipākha khongkhai akhawui vang eina khararpam yorzākahaia khamathang-khamarang kala shitkasang makhalei Esau kathā mangasaalu.
Nathumna thei kaja naoda ana avāva̱wui sokhami chi ningchāngda samphanglui khavai phālala ali khalanhaowa, kaja ana chāra̱ tāda kahaolala ningngatei khavai atam masamphangluimana.
talla̱khon kala tuikhon chili kharā maningmana. Mibingna khamatui akhon chi maningla khangatei mashā ngasak khavai poi.
Kaja “Sāyur eina tangda kaphung chili sākaza̱a chili lunggui eina horthata” da kakaso chi manganārarmana.
Katheimāngla ngacheenāhaida Mosesna hānga, “Ina ngacheenāhaida kathira,”
Kha nathumna Zion kaphungli kala kharinga Varewui keinung, kazingramwui Jerusalemli, kazingrao thingthingna lumlaoda kakazip,
kazingramli aming kapi kahaia naochizaibingwui kazip kala saikorawui bicharwo Vare, kāshung kahaia khamashungbingwui manglā,
kadhara tuingashitwui tuisak sāme Jishu, kala Abelwui asheeli mataimeida lukhamashan tui khamatuia ikror kahai ashee chili lāngmeida phākhamei ngashitkhami chili rāhaira.
Chitharan awui akhon china okathui nganuk ngasaka, kha ara ana ngashitmihaira, “Okathuimāng maningla, kazingramla zangda ina akhashida nganuk ngasakfara.”
“Akha shida” kaji tui china tharlak eina theikhuiya kaja sākahaiya ot saikora khanukshimitserhaora, laga makhangatha̱ chimāng leimara kajina.
Makhangatha̱ wungram ithumna samkaphangwui vang ningshisa. Varena ningyāng ungkhavai kakhayak khangachee eina ngasoda ali ningshida khorumsa.
Kaja ithumwui Vare hiya kachuia meina.
Chinaongarāwui leishāt nathumwuili leingasakchinglu.
Kha̱mi-mā ngahān kathei eina kaikhana matheila kazingraoli zunkhui ngasakhaira.
Phātop kazangbingli nathumla zangkharum thada phaninglu. Kakhanangbingli nathumla khanangkharum thada phaninglu.
Shakazā ot hi khayākakā otna, shakazā pet mamakhao ngasakalu. Varena khamathang-khamarangbingli kala phokaphābingli bichar sāra.
Chiwui vang eina pingmeida ithumna hāngsa.
“Proho, iwui ngachonkhamena,
ina mangacheemara;
mina ili khi sathukrakhala?”
Varewui tui hāngkhame nathumwui kathānabingli phaningunglu. Athumna kathada ringsā, kathada thi kaji phaningungda athumwui shitkasang sha̱khuilu.
Jishu Khrista ayāla, ajala kala katang mavaila chichinga.

Ngateihahang kahai tamkachithei china nathumli mangui ngasakalu. Varewui lukhamashan eina ithumwui manglā pangkhangasak phālaka, kha kashakazā khangalang eina maningmana. Hikatha ain khamayonabingli china khikha ngachonkhami maleimana.
Ithumwui hanphut akha lei, chili pha̱kaphayā chi kachonshimli otram khangatha̱bingna mashaipaimana.
Jehudiwui pāngmon kharei china moreiwui vang pha̱kaphayā sāda ashee chi chigat khavai Tharmathengmeikap kaje Apamli khuizanga. Kha asāva so ayarli riktai.
Chithada sāda Jishunala awui ashee eina mibingwui morei tharmi khavai keinungwui ayarli thimi.
Chiwui vang eina ithumla keinungwui ayarli vāda awui kakhayak chi phungrumsa.
Okathuili ithumwui rungshinga keinung maleimana, kha rāki kaji keinung chiwui vang khangaraina.
Jishuwui mangā eina ithumwui pha̱kaphayā sāda Vareli atam kachida masotchikatsa; hi ithumwui khamor eina a Prohona da hāngkaphatwui kachigatna.
Akha eina akha kaphā sāda ngachon khangarok mamalaialu, hikathā hi Vareli ningyāng ungkhangasaka pha̱kaphayāna.

Kathānabingwui kahāng nganāda athumwui thi shurlu. Athumwui otsak Vareli chitheiki jihaoda khangasām maleila athumna nathumwui manglāli yangmichingra. Nathumna kahāng nganaakha, athumna athumwui ot chi mathānthathup sāra, chi maningakha, athumna kakhanang eina sāra, chi nathumwui vang khikha kānkhanā maleimana.
Ithumwui vang seihā sāmichinglu. Ithumwui mashun tharlak eina lei da thei, khikhalajila ithumna atam kachida khamashung otmāng sāngai.
Kala nathumli thākta rāsamphang khavai iwui vang matailak eina seihā sāmilu.
awui kaphaning sākhavai Varena kaphā chi ngarumsangmida, Khristawui mangā eina awui ningyāng ungkhavai ithumwui eina shokranu. Khristali mashimānda tekmateichingranu. Amen.
Ivānaobing, kasatkasang tui hili ningsangda khanganāmilu, ina chithi hi sha̱lak eina kagapina.
Ivānao Timothy phātopwui eina shokhaira kaji nathumlila theingasakngaiya. Ana thākta raakha, ina nathumwuili kharā tharan ini ngasorāra.
Kathānabing kala Varewui mibing saikorali ithumwui shālam hāngmilu. Italyli khalei avānaobingna nathumli shālam mili.
Varewui lukhamashan nathum saikorali ngasomichingrānu. Amen.
Vare kala Proho Jishu Khristawui otram khangatha̱a Jamesna okathui peida chaiyāng eina khalei shang tharāda khanili shālam chiphunli.
Ivānaobing, chāng khayang yur saikora, nathumna samkaphang tharan ka̱lā khamahaina da shānkhuilu.
Kaja chikathā shitkasang chāng khayang china ngatar ngasaka kaji nathumna thei.
Khangatar chi athei mathei ngasaklu, chithākha nathum kāshungchaohaida kala peichaohaida khikha khavāt maleimara.
Kha nathumwui ngachaili kachikathā theithangkhamei vatta leiakha, kakharar maleila mingairareo eina mi saikorali khame Vareli seihā sāranu. Chieina ana mira.
Seihā kasā tharan shitsangda ningkhamaong maleila pophalungra; khikhalajila ningkhamaonga ā chiya masina phanung-phanvāda khangaphao shamadruwui rawon kathāna.
Chikathā mi china Prohowui eina khikha samphangra da maphaningaranu.
Kaja a chiya ning khani sāda otsak kachida hilaka kaji makhalei mina.
Khangazana avānao china ali juikhameili khangkākhami tharan ringpharanu kala
kashānga chinala nemkatā tharan ringphāranu, khikhalajila kashāng kaho hila awon thada ja̱tāhaora.
Zimikna malinglak eina kashok tharan arong chi ngahuihaowa kala ja̱tāhaoda chiwui khamathāla shimānhaowa. Chi tākam eina kashānga mi chila lan ngahomzatta leilakha shimānhaowa.
Chāng khayangli shitkasang makhangachei mi chi sokhamina, kaja ana chāng khayangli nganingshapakha ishameili leikashebingli ngashitmi kahai kharingwui wungkuihon chi awui sāman sāda samphangra.
Kachikathā mi akhali kasui kharā tharan, “Ili Varena suiya” da maphenalu; kaja Vareli makaphāna masuirarmana kala ana khipālikha masuimana.
Kha khalattawui ningkachāngli kazat tharan ali kasuina.
Ningkachāng chi chungkasang tharan morei shokka kala morei hakkasang tharan kathi shoka.
Leikashe ivānaongarā, maminam ngasaklu.
Kaphā lemmet kala thada khami saikora hi atungshongwui eina katāsera. Hi aka̱lā thada ngacheiung ngachei khavā makhalei kazingramwui kahor Avāva̱wui eina kharāna.
Khamashung tui chiwui mangā eina ā khalattana ithumli raokthui ngasaka. Chieina ana sākahai saikorawui ngachaili ithum hi pharākhare kathā ngasai.
Leikashe ivānaongarā, hi theilu. Mi kachiva̱na nganākakhuili thākranu, kha khamatui eina malungkhavātli ngaironhairanu kaji hi phaningunglu.
Miwui malungkhavātna Varewui khamashung khangarong ot sāvaiki kaji maningmana.
Chiwui vang eina makathar kala makaphā-makhayā acham aram saikora chihohaida Vareli mayālu, kala nathumwui ningli lingsangmi kahai huimishapa tui chi malungkhanim eina khuisanglu.
Nakhalatta machipat khavai kashāmang eina mavaila chiwui athishurda otla sālu.
Khikhalajila mi akhana tui hi shālaga ot masaakha ka̱lāra̱ngayotli ngayolaga khalattawui azak kathei kathāna.
Kaja akhalatta ngayolaga zatthui kahai eina a khalattawui azak malai kahai kathāna.
Kha kachikathāna kākashung kala ningkhān khangasaka ainli saklak eina singda mayontitakha kala kashāmāng maningla otsak eina ngasoda saakha awui kasāsāli Varena somira.
Kachikathāna dharma leilaka da phaninglala maleli makhāmrarakha awui dharma chi aremana, chi akhalatta mikhanamna.
Varivara kala Avāva̱wui mangāli kashenga kala khamakhao makhalei dharma chi: marānao eina ra̱meinaowui kakhanangli yangkhami kala okathuiwui khamakhaoli makazang hina.
Ivānaongarā, tekhamateiwui Proho Jishu Khristali shitkasangbing sāhaoda, mimai yangda ot masālu.
Kaja kashānga mi akhana sinā khutop sang, kashankachon mathālak eina ngavailaga kala kachāma akhana chonshi ngavailaga nathumwui kazippamli rālaga
nathumna kashankachon mathada khangavaipāli “Hili pammilu,” kala kachāmapāli “Chili nganingsālu” lha “Ngalei chili pamlu” da hāngakha
nathum khalattana nachināli ngatei ngasaka kala makaphā ningngai eina bichar sai.
Nganāmilu, leikashiya ivānaobing, Vareli leikashebingli ana ngashitmi kahai wungram chiwui shimluikat kala shitkasangli kashānga mi ngasā khavai okathuili kachāmabingli Varena kapangkhui.
Kha nathumna kachāma mili mautshitmana. Nathumli singkakharenga kala karotshimli shimenkhavā chi kashāngabing maningmalā?
Nathumli Varena khami khayākakā mingpho chili khamashāta chi athumna.
Chi maningla mimai yangda saakha nathumna morei sai, chieina nathumli ain china ain sākakhaibingna da khuira.
Kaja kachikathāna ain katonga mayonlala kateo akha kaihaiakha saikora sākhai kahai kathāna.
Kaja “Maphophaalu” da kahānga a china “Kashaola mashaothatalu” da hāngranu. Nana maphophālala shaothathaiakha ningkhami kakaiya ngasā kahaina.
Ningkhān khangasaka ainwui azingli bichar sāki kaji mi thada matuilu kala ot sālu.
Kaja bichar kasā tharan lumashanmi kahai makhaleia ā chili Varena malumashanmimara, kha bicharliva lukhamashana yui.
Ivānaongarā, mi akhana “I shitsanga” da hānglala ot kasā maleiakha china khi tongzākhala? Shitkasang china huimishapralā?
Avānao akha lah azarva̱ akha kashankachon simasailak eina ngavailaga, thangthangwui zākhavaila masamphangla leida
nathumwui ngachaili akhana “Chingri eina ungulu, lumturhairanu, kathola thotinghairanu” da hānglaga awui khavātwui vang khikha mamiakha chi kahāngwui tongkazā khi leikhalā?
Chithada sāda shitkasangla chipapama, otsak maleiakha shitkasangmāng kathina.
Kachikathā mina “Nawui shitkasang lei kala iwui otsak lei” da hāngra. Ots maleila nawui shitkasang ili chitheilu, ina iwui shitkasang otsak eina nali chitheira.
Vare hi akhamānga da nathumna shitsanga. Chi phālakhaira. Chipeela chithada shitsanga kala ngacheelaka.
He mangkhama̱bing! otsak maleila shitkasang hi aremana kaji hi chithei ngasakngailā?
Ithumwui avāva̱ Abrahamna awui naomayara Isaacli hanphuttungli kapha̱ tharan awui otsak chieina mashungkhami maningmalā?
Awui shitkasang eina otsak ngaruma, kala shitkasang chi otsakna kāshung ngasaka da nathumna thei.
Kala hithada hāngkahai tui chi ungshunga, “Abrahamna Vareli shitsanga kala ningtongda shitkasangwui vang khamashung khangaronga da ali shānkhui”, kala ali Varewui ngasotnao hoi.
Nathumna thei kaja shitkasangmāng eina maningla otsak eina mili mashung ngasaka.
Manglā mazangakha pha̱sāmāng kathina, otsak mazangakha shitkasangmāng kathina.
Ivānaobing, nathum kachungana ojā mangasaaranu, khikhalajila nathumna thei kaja tamkachitheia ithumli sakmeida bichar sāra.
Ithum saikora khangui kachungkha lei. Khamatuili khangui makhaleia chi kāshungchao kahaia akhalatta aphasāli ngarinkashapa mina.
Siguili ithumwui kahāng nganā khavai akhamorli yāchan sangmilaga ithumna vāngasakkhangai apamli vāngasaka.
Jahaslila yanglu, chiyākha kahaka ot kaphung chi masimāngna phanzatshaplala kahuiya mipā china huikhavai kateowa akapnao chieina vāngasakkhangai apamli vāngasakshapa.
Chithada sāda male hi pha̱sāwui kateowa akai akhana kha kahaka ot sai. Meipā kateonao akhana ngahong chumpava̱ kathada chuitāshapkhala kaji phaningyanglu.
Male hi mei kathāna. Okathuili male hina khayon otmāng sai, kala phasā akai sāda phasā katongali maphāngasakmana. Kazeiramwui mei chi thotsangda mirin chuitā ngasaka.
Sāyurla, vānaoyurla, ngarikazat phara̱pharā, kala khaihyur kachiva̱ nuingasakpai, chi eina mikumona nuingasakserhaira.
Kha maleli khipānakha manui ngasakrarmana, hiya makaphā manuikapaiya, kathirina pemtinghai.
Male eina ithumwui Proho kala Avāva̱li sochikata kala Varewui sakrin khuilaga sākahai mikumolila khonshiya.
Khamor akhawui eina masotkhamila, khonkashila shoka. Ivānaobing chikathā chi mashok ngasakphalungmara.
Ura̱ok akhawui eina kashima eina kakhā tara̱ shokthathuipaila?
Ivānaongarā, khaorārongna fashongthei mamatheimana, drakhārongna khaorāthei mamatheimana; rumra̱li khamathing tara̱ maungshokmana.
Nathumwui ngachaili thangkhamei kala theishingkakhui khipā leikhala? Thangkhameiwui khangahuilungli ana awui kaphā mirin chi awui otsak eina chitheiranu.
Kha nathumwui wuklungli mikpaikashi, ningkakhā, ichāchāwui kaphaning leiakha lāngsoda khamashung chili makapikalu.
Chikathā thangkhamei chi kazingramwui eina kharā maningmana, okathuiwui eina kharāna; kaja manglā makazang kala chipeewui otsakna.
Mikpaikashi ichāchāwui kaphaning khaleipam chili khonkazār kala makaphā otsak katonga lei.

Kha atungshongwui eina kharā thangkhamei chili rimeikapta kathar, chiwui thili chingrihaikapai, tākui kahai, mayā khangarok, lukhamashana kapem kala kaphā atheimānga, phākakhaning kala ningmakathar maleimana.
Khamashung khangarongwui heithei chiya chingrihai khavai kasābingna chingri eina yaosang kahaiwui atheina.
Nathumwui alungli khangama̱ khangashao hi khina shokkhangasakhala? Chi nathumwui ningli phasāwui ningkachāng otmāng kaphaning eina kashokna.

Nathumna kahaolala masamphangrarmana; chiwui vang mi shaothatngai kala ngamarlala nathumna makhuirarmana, chieina nathumna ngama̱ ngashaowa. Nathumna Vareli makapowui vang kakahao ot chi masamkaphangna.
Nathumna polala masamphangmana, kachiwui vangkhala kaja nathumwui ningrin mamashungla phasāna ningkachāng chimāng poi.
He mashitkasanga mibing! Okathuili ngasotnao kasā hiya Vareli yangkashena da nathum matheimalā? Okathuili ngasotnao sākhangaia mi chi Varewui yangkashena.
Kathara tuili, “Varena ithumwui wuklungli sangmi kahai manglā chili makaphā ningkachāngna pemthuihaowa” da hāngkahai hili khamashung maleimana da phaninglā?
Kha Varena hakkhamei lukhamashan mi, chiwui vang eina hithada hānga, “Varena lāngkasobingli ngasunga, kha khangahuibingli lumashanmi.”
Chiwui vang eina Vareli mayālu kha chipeeli ngasunglu, chithākha nathumwui eina yāmhaora.
Vareli nganailu, chithākha ana nathumli rānganaimira. Morei kaphungabing, nathumwui pāng maziklu. Phākakhaningbing, nathumwui wuklung tharngasaklu.
Khanangda sifalaga chapngachālu. Nathumwui khamana̱ chi sikafa kala khamathān chi kakhanang onngasakra.
Prohowui mangāli malungnimlu chithākha ana nathumli reingasakra.

Ivānaongarā, nathum akhana akhali mamashāt ngarokalu. Avānao akhana avānao akhawuitungli khamashāt lah bichar kasā chi Ainli khamashāt kala bichar kasāna. Ainli bichar saakha nava Ain khamayona maningluimana, kha bichar kasaana.
Ain khame kala bicharwo chi Varemānga. Amāngna huimishapa kala shimān ngasakshapa. Khongnainaoli bichar kasaa na khipāna da phaningkhala?
“Aja maningakha akhama ithum keinung chili vāra kala kumkha vāpamlaga leih londa tongkhuira” da kahāngabing, nathum nganālu.
Nathumwui mirinli akhama khi shokrakhala da matheimana. Nathum hiya kasha̱khawui vang ngachuilaga shimān kahai leichui kathāna.
Nathumna “Prohona mayāmida ithum ringakha hila chila sāra” da hāngki kajina.
Kha nathumna khayāning nganingda langsoi, hi khangui otna.
Kaphā sāki kaji thatheilaga makasā chi moreina.
Ara nganālu, he kashāngabing! Nathumwuitungli rāki kaji kakhanang ringkashi chiwui vang chapngachālu.
Nathumwui lan parhaira kala kashankachon makungna shaihaira.
Nathumwui sinā lupā maripai paihaira, kala maripai china nathumwuitungli makhamayā shākhi sāda nathumwui asā meichot thada chuitāhaora. Nathumna khanaowa zimikshowui vang lan kazipkhui.
Yanglu, lui vākhamebingli nathumna ngalangman makhamiwui vang athumna chapta lei kala athumwui kachapkhon Reikhamatai Proho Varena shāhaira.
Okathuili ringphālak eina sākhangangai sāda nathum okthuihaira. Taithatki kaji zimikshowui vang nathum khalatta uimathaohaira.
Angalang makhalei mili nathumna yonngasakta shaothathaira, ana nathumli mangasungmana.
Ivānaongarā, Prohona marāranglakha eina tangda khāngtheilu. Lui khavā mina ngaleiwui heithei samphang khavai zur, kān mateila zingrotra̱ ngaraipama.
Nathumla khāngtheiphalungra. Nathumwui kachihān ngatar ngasaklu, kaja Prohowui kharā zimiksho nganaihaira.
Ivānaongarā, nathum akha eina akha maphen ngarokalu, chithākha Varena nathumli bichar masāmara. Bicharwo rākida nganaikhailakhaira, rākachangrāli.
Ivānaongarā, Prohowui ming singda khamarānbing chili phaningunglu kala kachotkachānglungli ningzinghāringda khāngkahai athum chili ngayo khavai sāda khuilu;

athumli khamahai hoi kaja athumna sipkasā khānga. Nathumna Jobwui ningzinghākharing shāhaira kala Prohona naoda ali kayākha mataisangmikhala kajila nathumna theihaira, khikhalajila phaningkhami kala leikashina pemtinghai.
Nathumwui ngachaili kakhanang kachot leihaola? Ana seihā sāranu. Kachikathāna ringphāda leila? Anala laa sāda sochikatranu.
Kakazānao leihaola? Ana churchwui ararbingli holaga Prohowui ming singda thao neomilaga seihā sākhami
china kakazā mi chili kanmida Prohona ali ngakarthui ngasakra kala ana morei sākahai chila pheomira.
Chiwui vang eina kakazā raikhavai, akha eina akha morei hangphat ngaroklu, kala akhana akhawui vang seihā sāmilu. Khamashunga miwui seihā kasā ungshunglaka.
Elijahla ithum thada phasā khavaia mina. Ana kazing maro khavai panglāk eina seihā sai, chieina zingkum kathum, kachāng tharuk okathuili kazing maromana.
Chiwui thili ana seihā saluishit kaji eina kazing roluishita kala ngaleinala athei kharluishit ngasaka.
Ivānaobing, nathumwui ngachaili kachikathāna khamashungwui eina thuihaida zatphāphā kahai tharan kachikathāna ali hanung ngasakluishitakha,
hi phaningunglu, kaja moreiwui khangui shongzāwui eina hanung khangasaka ana mipā chiwui manglā kathiwui eina kanmi kala morei kachungkha farormi ngasaka.
Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia kala Bithyniali ngapha̱yang eina kashamvā kahaibingli paokazata Peterna,
Avāva̱ Varewui kharin athishurda kapangkhui kahaia kala Jishu Khristawui kahāng nganā khavai kala awui ashee eina chairormi khavai Manglā china kathara mibing sāngasak kahaibingli kagapina.
Lukhamashan kala chingri kahai chi chungmataimeida nathumwui ngasāranu.

Ithumna Proho Jishu Khristawui Avāva̱ Vare chili ningkashi misa! Khikhalajila Jishu Khristali kathiwui eina ringlui khangasak mangā eina ithumli awui hakkhamahā leikashiwui alungli mirin kadhar mihaira. China ithumli kharing kachihān chipemmi.
Chiwui vang Varena awui mibingli haikhami shānla makakhui sokhami samphang khavai ithumna mangāshong yangvai. Ana nathumwui vang mashuikapai, mamakhaokapai kala mashimānkapai chi kazipmihaili.
Khanaowa zimiksholi phongmiki kaji huikhamili ngaraida ningtongda shitkasang mangā eina Varewui pangshapna mayonmida khaleina.
Atam kasha̱khawui vang nathum kachotkachāng samphanglala, lan hiwui vang ringphālu.

Hiwui khangarān hiya nathumwui shitkasang akachanga chi phongshok khavaina. Shimankapai sinā meili ruikhayang thada sakmeikhar kaja nathumwui shitkasangla chāng yangphalungra, chi nathumwui shitkasang ngatarmei khavaina. Chiwui thili Jishu Khristali rāchitheithanghon nathumna masot, tekhamatei kala maikhayā samphangra.
Ali nathumna matheirangsālala leishi kala mik eina matheilala shitsangada ringkaphā khamathān khamor eina mahāngrarmana.
Khikhalajila ali shitkasangwui kharin, manglāwui huikhami chi nathumna samphangda lei.
Huikhami hiwui pongli marānbingna munlak eina ngathingkhuida Varena nathumli miki kaji sokhami tui athumna phongmihaisai.

Athumna atam chi katharān kala kathada rānikhala da theikhavai ngarāna. Kala Khristana kachotkachāng kachungkha samphangra, kala khāngmida chiwui thili tekhamatei rāra da Khristawui Manglāna marānbingwui wuklungli atam chi chiza̱mi.

Marānbingli Varena phongkhami hi athumwui vang maningmana, kha nathumwui vangna kaja paokazatbingna kazingramwui eina kashirāt Manglā Katharawui mangā eina nathumli hāngkhami ot hi kazingraobingnala theingai.
Chiwui vang eina nathumwui ning ngazipmeilu. Ningkhariklu kala sokhami chiwui vang nathumwui kachihān leichingda Jishu Khristali theithang nathumli sokhami mira.
Varewui kahāng nganālu, achālakha mangma̱da leilakha pha̱sāwui ningkachāngmāng kaphaning thada maokthuialu.
Kha nathumli hokakhuia awui kathar thada nathumwui acham-aram saikorali tharlu.
Hithada kapihaida lei, “Nathum tharlu, khikhalajila I katharana”.
Nathumna Vareli seihā kasā tharan Avā da hoi. Ana saikorali kachichāna sākahai chiwui athishurda ngaraichā eina bichar sai. Chieina okathuili ringda leilakha ali khayākashi eina ngasoda okthuilu.
Nathumli navā ngarāwui eina shākhuikhamaron khikha masākhavai mirinwui eina ngatangkakhui chi shimānkapai sinā lupā eina maningmana kaji nathumna thei,
kha chukhara̱ makhalei achukkapei yaonao kathā Khristawui aman kasaka ashee einana.
Okathui masāranglakhawui eina ali chukkahaina kha nathumwui vang eina khanaowa atamli chitheinao kajina.
Awui mangā eina nathumna Vareli shitsanga. Ali Varena kathiwui eina khangmathotta tekhamatei chi mi; chieina nathumwui shitkasang kala kachihān chi Vareli lei.
Achinā ngarāli ningtharda leishi khavai khamashung chili kahāng khanganāwui vang nathum khalatta tharhaogada, nathum akha eina akha ningtongda wuklung eina leishi ngaroklu.
Varivarawui kharinga kala leiching kaje tui chiwui mangā eina shimānkapai athā eina maningla mashimānkapai athā eina nathumli pharā ngasakluishithaira,
kaja hithada kapihaida lei;
“Phasā khavaia saikora khawo kathāna,
athumwui tekhamatei awon kathāna,
khawola ngahui kala awonla pa̱tai,
kha Prohowui tui chiya katang mavaila ngayurzatchinga,
tui chi nathumli hāshok kahai khamathā paokaphā china.”
Chieina nathum khalatta makaphā-makhayā chi horhaolu. Makapikluialu, maphārekalu, mayuishialu kala kaphor tui mamatuialu.
Pharādhadhar angangnao thada atam kachida kashenga manglāwui seina̱ ningchānglu. Chithada sāda chi khamangwui vang nathum rarsangda kahui samphangra.
Hithada kapihaida lei; “Prohowui lukhamashan nathumna mazaphaira.”
Nathum khalatta kharinga lunggui ngasāda manglāwui shim sākālu. Kathara pāngmon ngasā khavai Jishu Khristawui mangā eina Varena khuisangkapai manglāwui hanphut chigatlu.
Hithada kapihaida lei;
“Yanglu, aman kasaka ngalung akha ina kapangkhui,
kala Zionwui akhoka sāda shunhai;
ali shitkasangbing ning makatatlakmara.”
kha mashitkasangbingwui vanga kapi kahai hithada:
“Makānāmana, da shim kasaana horkahai
ngalung chi phāmeikap kaje akhoka ngasāhaowa.”
“Mibingli phei ngaphok ngasakki kaji lunggui,
athumli konglui ngasakki kaji lunghār”
kaja athumna kahāng makhanganāwui vang phei ngaphoka; chi Varewui kaphaningna.
Atam akhali nathum Varewui mi mangasāsamana, kha ara awui mibingna. Atam akhali nathum awui lukhamashan matheisāmana kha ara nathum theihaira.
Ngapha̱yang eina ngayinkazata leikashebing, ina nathumli ngakaoli. Manglāli rai ngararda khalei phasāwui khamathang chili mamayaalu.
Yurkhangateibingwui alungli acham-aram mathada zatlu, chithākha nathumli khangui khalāng mina da phensālala nathumwui kaphā ot chi athumna theira kala a rāthang Vareli tekkmatei ngasakra.
Prohowui vang eina nathumna okathuiwui pangshap kasingbing: juimeikap kaje wungreilapai,
lah makaphā kasaali tandi mikhavai kala khamashung kasaali sākhavai ana shirāt kahaia governorbingli mayālu.
Kaja nathumwui kaphā kasā china phenphāphā kajebingli mamorsap khangasak hi Varewui ningkachāngna.
Ningkhān kahaia mibing thada okthuilu, chithālala nathumwui ningkhān kasā chi makaphā-makhayāwui vang masā ngasakalu. Kha Varewui raobing thada okthuilu.
Mi saikorali khayāshilu, avānao ngarāli leishilu, Vareli ngacheelu, kala wungreili khayāshilu.
Raobing, nathumwui akhavābingli khayākashi eina ngasoda mayāchaolu, lumashankatha a eina khanima māngli maningla sāshida kasā akhavābinglila khayāshilu.
Nathumna maphungkhangayi kachotkachāng chi Varewui kaphaningnada theilaga phungshapakha nathumli Varena somira.

Nana khalāng ot sākahaiwui vang samphangkhangayi tandi samkaphang tharan kakhāngwui tongkazā khi leikhala? Kha nana khamashung ot sāhailala nali tandi mida chiwui vang khāngakha Varena chiwui vang somira.
Varena hikathāwui vang nathumli kahona, kaja Khrista khalatta nathumwui vang chotmi kala ngayo khavai haimi. Chieina nathumna awui pheichon kazunpaira.
A morei masāmana kala kakapik tui khamatui khipānakha mashāmana.
Ali kachipat chitharan ana kachipat tui eina mangahānkāmana; Ana kachot tharan mamachitmana, kha khamashung bicharsame Vare chili awui kachihān leichinga.
Nathum yaonao thada ma̱zatsai, kha ara Yaokahoma kala Manglā Mayonkhame chili latunghaira.

Hithada sāda preiva̱ ngarā, nathum khalatta gahara ngarāli hamsanglu. Chieina athum kaikhana Vare tui hili mashitsangsālala nathumwui acham-aramna athumli yuikhuida shitsang ngasakakha nathumna tuikhur akha hānglui khavai maleiluimana.
Kaja nathumwui acham-aram chi kayākha tharkhala kala khayāshingaikhala da athumna theira.
Nathumna sam hākharikta kasā, ngachānsari kasā kala khamathā kashankachon khangavai chithada akormāngli mathā khavai masaalu.
Kha Varewui miktāli aman kasaka tākui kahai kala khanima ningngai, mashimānkapai eina wuklungwui khangathuma mi sāthulu.
Achālakhawui shitkasanga sha̱naobingna Vareli chihānda gahara ngarāli hamsanglaga athum khalatta mathā ngasaka.
Sarahna chithada sai; agahara Abrahamwui kahāng nganai kala ali “Iwui amei” da hoi.

Chithada sāda gahara ngarā, preiva̱ ngarāli ngasopamda athum ngazanmei kaji theiphalungra. Khayākashiwui khalum eina ngasoda ot sakrumlu. Chieina Varewui lukhamashan mirinwui lemmet chi nathumna samphangra. Chithākha nathumwui seihā kasāli masheikhautmara.

Naomeikapta, nathum saikora ngaraikachā ningphanin kala ningngai leiphalungra; akha eina akha chinaongarā thada leishilu, kala akha eina akha lumashanthei ngarokta lāngkaso ningngai malei ngarokphalungmara.
Makaphāwui vang makaphā masaalu, khonkashiwui vang makhonshialu, kha somitha̱lu, khikhalajila nali hokhuithang Varena sokhami hi ngashitsang kahaina.
Hithada kapihaili:
“Ringkaphā mirin ningkachangpā kala khamathā atam theikhangaipā china,
makaphā tui khamatui kala kakapik tui khamatui thāhaiphalungra.
Makaphā-makhayāwui eina ana ngareithuihailaga kaphā sāranu;
chingri kahai phāda chi kharomranu.
Khikhalajila Prohona khamashungabingli yangmida lei,
kala athumwui seihā kasā chi nganāmi;
kha makaphā kasābing chili ana ngasunga.”
Nathumna kaphā chi sangaiakha khipāna zakkashi sāshaprakhala?
Khamashung khangarongwui vang nathumna kachotkachāng samphangsālala, nathumli somira, khipālikha mangacheealu kala wukla makhanangalu.
Kha nathumwui wuklungli Khristali khayāshilu kala Prohona da mayālu. Ali kachihānwui pongli nathumli ngahānakha ngahānkāthei khavai ngarān kharirikhailu.
Kha khanim kala khayākashi eina ngasoda sālu. Nathumwui mashun-makhui ngatarteihailu, chithākha Khristawui thikashurana da kaphā kasāwui vang nathumli kachipat tharan athum khalatta khayakkhuira.
Khikhalajila Varewui kaphaningna jiakha makaphā kasāwui vang kachotkachāng kaphungle kaphā kasāwui vang kaphungna phāmei.
Kaja Khristanala morei kaphungbingwui vang thimikhashida ngachanghaira, ithumli Vareli thānzang khavai katharali makatharabingwui vang phasā eina chithita, kha manglā eina ringlui ngasaka.
Ana manglā eina vāda narkahai manglābingli atamchithei.
Manglābing chiya Noahna awui marikhong semlakha Varena honsānlak eina honlaga makhuikasangbing china. Marikhonglungli leikasā athum chishatmāng tara̱wui eina huikhuiya.

Hi arui nathumli huikakhui ra̱kahikwui amahāna. Hi pha̱sāwui khamakhao pheokatā maningmana, kha ana Vareli mayāda ning horsangchaolaga awui kahāng nganāra da ra̱kahikwui otsak kasāna. Jishu Khristawui ringkashok china nathumli huimi.
A kazingramli vāhaira kala Varewui yāshong pamda kazingraobingla, kazingwui khangamkharei kala saikorala awui pāngli leisera.
Khristana kachotkachāng phunghaokada nathumla Khristawui kaphaning thada phaning khavai ngarānlu. Khiwui vangkhala jilaga phasāli kachotkachāng samphang kahaibing moreili mazangluimana.
Chiwui vang eina ara hiwui eina thuida nawui okathuiwui mirin hi mikumowui ningkachāng eina maningla Varewui kaphaning eina okthuilu.
Nathumwui mirinli mashitkasangbingna kasā thada sopkhamasāp, khamathang, khamarip, lumlaokasa kala khangama̱ khangazai, kameoli kapha̱ hikathathamāng sākasā chi shaphaira.
Ara nathumna athumli ngasoda makaphā-makhayā chili makazangwui vang matakhakhaoda athumna nathumli khamashātna.
Kha athumna kharingbinglila, kathebinglila bichar sāki kaje Vareli athumwui sākahai saikora chiwui hishap misera.
Hiwui vang eina kathebingli eina tangda Paokaphā hi tamchithei kahaina kaja mikumo thada phasāli bichar sāhailala, Varewui thada manglā eina ringkhavaina.
Ot saikora ngachangki kaji nganaihaira; khalatta ngarinda kala ngasharda seihā sāshap khavai ngarānlu.
Akha eina akha leishi khangarok hina mataimeikap kajena, khiwui vangkhala kaja khayon-khamāng kasā saikora leikashina pheomishapa.
Ning khamakhao maleila mathānthathup kha̱mishimāli ngahānlu.
Varivarana ngatateida khami lukhamashanwui kaphaa kashina sāda, mi ava̱va̱li lemmet ngatateida mikahai chi akhana akhawui vang kānnā khavaili shichinlu.

Pao hākashoka a china Varewui pao hāshokphalungra; otram ngatha̱mena Varena ali mikahai pangshap chieina ngatha̱phalungra. Chithada sāda katang makhavai tekhamatei Khristawui mangā eina Vareli masot mipaira. Amen.
Leikashe ivānaobing, nathumna kachotkachāngwui chāng khayang samkaphang chili ngateihang kahai otshotnada matakhak kahai masaalu.
Kha Khristawui kachotkachāng phungkhangarumana da ringphālu. Chithada sāda awui tekhamatei chi phongshokthanghon nathum ringkaphāna pemtinghaora.
Khristawui thi kashurwui vang mina zeiakha nathum ringphālu; hiwui kakhalata tekhamatei manglā, Varewui Manglā chi nathumwui lungli lei.

Nathumwui ngachaili kachikathā mi akhana mi sākathatwui vang, khaleewui vang, ain kakaiwui vang kala yomsakwui vang kala mi kateiwui otli sheikakhautwui vang kachotkachāng samkaphangna jiakha ringphā khavai maleimana.
Kha shitkasanga mi akha sāda kachotkachāng samphangakha chiwui vang makhayakalu. Khristawui ming samkaphangwui vang Vareli ningshitha̱ki kajina.
Bichar sāki kaji atam chi rāhaira, kala bichar chi Varewui shimkhur mibingli rira, kala hi ithumwui eina haophokra jiakha, Varewui Paokaphāli mashitkasang athumwui akatang chi katharali?
Hithada kapihaida lei:
“Khamashung khangarongalila saklak eina huikhuiakha makathara morei kaphungbing kali vaura?”
Chiwui vang eina Varewui kaphaning athishurda kachotkachāng kaphungbingna khamashung ot sāranu kala athumwui manglā makhangachei Kasā Akhavāli horsangchaoranu.
Ila churchwui arar akha sāda nathumwui church ararbingli kapona: I Khristawui kachotkachāngwui shākhi khame akhana kala rāphongmiki kaji tekhamatei chili ila zangrumra.
Nathumwui pāngli Varena horsangmi kahai yaobingli mathālak eina homlu, Varewui ningkachāng athishurda yangmilu, tandi thada masāla mathanthathup sālu, amanwui vang maningla sāngairereo ngatha̱milu.
Nathumli mikahai athumwuitungli akhavā masaalu; kha yaobingna sha̱khui khavai acham sāchitheilu.
Chieina Yaokahoma akhavā kharā tharan mashimānkapai tekhamateiwui kuihon chi nathumna samphangra.
Chiwui vang eina nathum Varewui pāngthei kharei chiwui azingli hamsanglu, chithākha awui atam kachāli nathumli khāngchikatra.
Nathumwui malungkharing saikora awui pāngli horsanglu, ana nathumli yangmilaka.
Mikringda ngasharlu, nathumwui yangkashe chipee chi kazingkha̱ thada nirlaga kachikathāli shaikhavai zatung zatvāda phāzatta lei.
Shitsangtitta ngasunglu, khiwui vangkhala kaja okathuili nachinā ngarāla chikathā kachotkachāng phungda lei kaji nathumna thei.

Kha nathumna kasha̱nakha kachotkachāng samphang kahaiwui thili Khristali ngarum kahaiwui vang katang makhavai tekhamatei samphangrum khavai hokhuikhame, lumashankatha Varena nathumli kākashung, khangazip, pangshap kala rungshing kahai mira.
Katang makhavai pangshap chi awui ngasāranu. Amen.
Shitsangkapai ichinā Silaswui khangachon khuilaga sha̱lak kahai chithi hi kagapina. Kasatkasang eina ngasoda tui hi Varewui lukhamashanlaka da shākhi khamina. Tui hili nganingtitlu.
Nathumli kapangkakhui thada Varena kapangkhui kahai Babylonli khalei kala inaomayara kathā Marknala nathumli shālam chiphunli.
Shitkasangbingwui leishāt eina akha eina akha shālam sāngaroklu.
Khristali kazanga nathum saikorali chingrihairanu.
Varewui khamashung khangarongli kala Jishu Khristawui lungli ithum shitkasang samphang kahaibingli ngaraichā eina Jishu Khristawui rao kala paokazata Simon Peterna kagapina.
Vare kala ithumwui Proho Jishuli kathei mangā eina lukhamashan kala chingri kahai nathumli pemtinghairanu.

Ithumli awui phākhamataia tekhamatei samphangrum khavai kahoa chili katheiwui vang Varewui tharkhamatheng pangshap china ithumwui mirin kala dharmarinli ringkhavai darkar kasā saikora ithumli mihaira.
Hithada sāda okathuili leida khalei sāshimānkapai khamathangwui eina yāmshokpai khavai kala Varewui tharkhamatheng khangachā chili ngashitmi kahai kasaka lemmet chi mihaira.
Hiwui vang eina nathumwui shitkasangli khamathā, khamathāli awor,
aworli khalatta khangarin, khalatta khangarinli, ningzinghākharing, ningzinghākharingli dharma kaphaning,
dharma kaphaningli chinao ngarāwui khamashit kala chinaongarāwui khamashitli khalem leishāt ngarumsanglu.
Magunbing hi nathumwui ngasā ngasakta mataisang ngasakakha, ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristali theishingkakhuiwui khamashung chi makankhanā kala athei makhamathei mangasālakmara.
Hikathā makhaleia mi chiva khangapeowa ningkasha̱ana, kala ana sākahai morei pheomihaira kaji malaikahaina.
Chiwui vang eina ivānaobing, nathumli hokakhui kala kapangkakhui chi shengmeida theikhui khavai sakmeida phaninglu. Chithākha nathum mangaphoklakmara,
kala ithumwui Proho kala Huikhame Jishu Khristawui katang makhavai Varewui wungramli zangpai khavai apong tārakha eina ithumli ngarānmira.
Chiwui vang eina nathumna theihaisālala kala khamashung chili pheisin sākhuitithaisālala tui hi atam kachida ina phaningung ngasakngaichinga.
I ringlakha eina tangda nathum mathuk khavai phaningung khangasak hi mashunga da phaninga,
Kaja ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristana chitheikhami athishurda I ara masāngluila okathuiwui eina kānthuihaora.
Thikahaiwui thili nathum saikorana hi phaningungching khavai apong chi ina kashap eina tangda khangarān sāmira.
Ithumwui Proho Jishu Khristawui pangshap kala ana rāki kajiwui pongli ithumna kahāng chi ningkap eina semkakhui khararchān maningmana; kha ithumwui mik eina awui khangam-kharei chi theikahaina.
Avāva̱ Varewui eina tekhamatei khayākakā samphangda tekhamatei Awungawui eina, “Hi iwui khaluma Naomayarana, ina ali ningyāng unglaka” da kazingramwui eina
vaokatā akhon chi ithumna shai, kaja kathara kaphungli ithum ngasopamsai.

Khamarān tui chi ithumna mathāmeida theikhui. Tui chili nathumna ningsangmeida nganākhuiakha phāmeikharra, khiwui vangkhala kaja hiya kazing mathangranglakha kala nathumwui ningli zingthanwo mashokranglakha, tangkhamang pamli thaomei kashar kathāna.
Mataimeikapta, nathumna hi theiphalungra kaja Kathara tuili phongmi kahai tui chi kachikathā marān akhana aningsasak eina khalatkhui kaji maningmana.
Kaja khamarān hi miwui ning eina haokaphok maningmana, kha Manglā Katharana kasatmilaga Varewui eina kharā tui chi mikumona khamatuina.
Mi kachungkhana athumwui sokhamasap chili shurra kala athumwui otsak chiwui vang khamashung shongfa chilila mashātra.

Karāmhaoda minama ojābing hina nathumli athumwui ningkap eina semkakhui khararchān chieina kateizāra, kaja hikathā mibing hiya shimānphalungra kaji hi achālakhawui eina hāngmarān kahaina, kha atam kasha̱nakhawui vang mashimānki kaji thasālala athum chiya shimānphalungra.
Kaja morei sāhaikha kazingraobingli eina tangda Varena yangkhei kahai maleimana, athumli kazeiramli haida bichartam marāranglakha eina tangda tangmangting kahaipamli tuknarhaiakha,
achālakhawui okathuilila Varena yangkhei kahai maleila shimān ngasakta khangarong hākashoka Noah eina athum katei shini chi maningla Varena ali makachāpabingli tara̱kaphong eina shimān ngasakakha,
Varena Sodom eina Gomorrah keinung khani chili malungkhavāt thada mei eina shimān khangasak hi Vareli makachapbingli naoda khi shokrakhala da theikhuikhavai saakha,
mikumona masākhangayi acham-aram kazatbingwui vang ning chotkhame kaphā a Lotli Varena kanmiakha,
(Kaja khamashung khangaronga china athumwui ngachaili okthuida athumwui makaphā otsak chi kathei kashā eina thangkachida awui ningli khāngchinga)
khamashungbingli kathada kachotkachāngwui eina kanshokrakhala kala bichar sāki kaji zimiksho marāranglakha makaphābingli kathada tandi mida narhairakhala kaji Prohona thei.
Matailak eina ningkakachai phasāwui khamathangli kashurbing kala Varewui pangshapli makachāpbingli tandi mira.
Athum hi kapingla ping, lāngkasola langsoda kazingraobinglila khangachee maleila mashātphāphai.
Athumli yāng pangshap leikhameia kazingraobing eina tangda Prohowui mangāli athumli mashātta mamatuimana.
Athum hiya ning makazang ramsā rengkhuilaga sāthat khavai pharā kahai sāyur kathāna. Athumna matheikharar chili zeilaga hāngphāphā kajiwui vang sāyurbingwui kashimān thada athumli shimān ngasakra.

Kala athumna khanang ngasak kahai thada athumlila khanang ngasakra. Ngashun langpongda phasāwui ringkaphā samphang khavai kasā chi athumwui kapena. Sākharekli ringphāshonshon kaje athum hikathāli phāshak phazā khangarumwui maikashi kala khayākhamalā samphang khavaina.
Athum phophākhangai mikyanmāng eina yanga kala morei ot kasāli kapen mavaimana. Ning khangazanbingli athumna suikhui kala athumwui ningli kākharāmna pemtinghai. Athum khonshi kahai naongarāna!
Khamashung pongwui eina ma̱thuihaida khangui otsak eina lanli leikashe Beorwui naomayara Balaamwui thi shurhaowa.
Chieina khak makashoka gadhāna mitui matuida awui sāyon kahai chiwui vang kharara kala marān chiwui otsak chi khāmmihaowa.
Athum hiya thengkahai ura̱wok kala masina phankazat leichui kathāna. Varena kazeiramli athumwui vang pam ngarānhaida lei.
Athumna mangkhama̱wui lāngsot tui tham-tham matuida moreiwui eina yāmshoknanaida khalei athumli phasāwui khamathang eina suiya.
Athumna ningkhān mirada ngashitzata, kha athum khalatta shimānhaoki kaji makaphā-makhayāwui raobingna. Kaja kachikathā ot akhana mi akhali yuihaiakha mipā chi ot chiwui raona.
Huikhame Proho Jishu Khristawui mangā eina theithangmeida okathuiwui khamakhaowui eina yāmshoklaga chiwui khalenli tāzangluiakha, khare mirinli khanaopā zakshimei.
Athumna kathara ningkhami chi thatheihailaga chiwui eina yāmluishitki kajiwui vanga khamashung khangaronga apong chi matheisālak kajina phamei.
Chānsamtuili “Fa̱na maloshokhailaga zālui kala hokli ra̱vaimihailaga khorchopli ngakhorlui.” kaji hi athumwui vang mashunglaka.
Leikashebing! Chithi hi ina nathumli kapi kakhanena, kala chithi khaninili nathumwui ning mathuklui khavai ina phaningung khangasakna;
achālakha kathara marānbingna hāngmarānmi kahai kala Huikhame Prohowui ningkhami chi nathumwui paokazatbingwui mangā eina phaningungchingphalungra.
Rimeikapta nathumna hi bhap tāphalungra kaja khanaowa zimiksholi mana̱kashebing shokta athumli khalattawui khamathangna singyuida athumna nathumli mana̱shida
hithada hāngra, “A rāluishitra kaji tuingashit chi kali vāhao? Ishavā ngarā thithang eina thuida ot saikora haokaphokli leikasā chi tākam eina aruila leichingpapamli”
Achālakha Varena kasoda kazing eina okathui sākhui kaji hi thatheilaga athumna matheirekthuwa. Okathui hi tara̱wui eina, tara̱ eina sākhui,
kala tara̱na kaja phongkhashilong tara̱na kachama okathui chi shimān ngasakpapama;

kha arui leida khalei kazingram eina okathui hi Varena ngaraikachā kakaso mida mei eina sāshimān khavai phāri kahaina, kaja mashitkasangbingli bichar sālaga shimān ngasaki kaji zimikshowui vang haikahaina.

Prohona ngashit kahai chi aruila maungshung ngasakmana da kaikhana phaninga, kha mi khipālikha mashimān ngasakkhangaiwui vang ana nathumli ngaraikhamina, kaja mi saikorali athumwui moreiwui eina ningngateikhui ngasakngai.
Kha Prohowui zimiksho chi khale thada rāra. Chithang kazingramla akhon panglāk eina ngashumda shimānhaora kala chiwui alungli khalei saikora mei eina chuitāserhaora.
Ot saikora hithada shimān ngasaki jihaoda nathum kachikathā mi ngasāra? Nathumwui mirin chi kathar eina Vareli chigatphalungra.
Varewui zimiksho ngaraimamānda; chi thākta rāngasak khavai sālu—kazingram meina chuida shimānhaoki kaji kala kazingramli khalei saikora menghaoki kaji zimiksho chi.
Kha awui ngashit kahai athishurda khamashung khangarongbingna pānki kaji kadhara kazingram eina okathui chiwui vang ithumna khangaraina.
Chiwui vang eina leikashebing! nathumna zimiksho hi ngaraimamānda Varewui miktāli nathum tharda kala achuk kapeia ngasāda ali ngasoda chingri eina okthuirum khavai sālu.
Prohowui ningzinghākharing chi nathumli kahui samphang khavai atam khamina, kaji hi ithumwui leikashe Paulnala ali mikahai thangkhamei chiwui athishurda nathumli kapihaira.

Hiwui pongli kakapi tharan ana chithi katongali maram hi kapichinga. Awui chithibingli kasak kaikhala zanga, chibing chi matheithangkhama ningsā makhangazipabingna kathara lairikwui tui kaikha khalatphāphākhui kaji thada kasakbing chi athumna nguida tamkachithei lei. Chiwui vang eina athum khalattali kashimān khuirākhui.
Kha ivānaongarā, nathumna hi rida theihaira, ningngasharlu, nathumli ain makhavai mibingna thannguihaipaishina kala nathumwui ningsā khangazip shimān ngasakhaipaishina.
Kha ithumwui Proho kala Huikhame Jishu Khristawui lukhamashan kala aworwui lungli nathum rarsanglu. Awui mingli aruila, naodala mashimānda tekmateichingra̱nu. Amen.
Kharing kaho chi azak eina theipai kahai tharan ithumna mik eina thei, chiwui vang eina Avāva̱li ngasoda khalei kala ithumli chitheimi kahai makashimān kharingwui pongli nathumli matuida kahāngna.
Ithumna theikahai kala shākahai chi nathumlila hāngkachitheina. Chieina ithumna Avāva̱ kala Anaomayara Jishu Khristali ngarumsak khalei chili nathumla ithumli ngasoda zangpaira.
Ithumwui khamathān chi kashungmei khavai hi kagapina.
Ithumna ali ngarumsak lei jilaga tangkhamanglungli leiakha, tuimāng maningla otsak einala ithum kakapikna.
Kha ana kahorli khalei thada— ithumna kahorli okthuiakha ithum akha eina akha ngarumsak lei, kala Anaomayara Jishuwui ashee china ithumli morei saikorawui eina tharmi.
Ithumna ithum morei maphungmana jiakha ithum khalatta mikhanamna, kala ithumwui alungli khamashung maleimana.
Kha ithumna ithumwui morei Vareli hāngphatakha ana awui tuingashit chi makaimara, kala mashun chi sāmira: ithumwui moreila pheomida khayon sākahai saikorawui eina ana tharmira.
Kha ithumna morei masāmana da hāngakha ali kakapika sāngasaka, kala awui tui ithumwuili maleimana.
Ithumna Varewui ningkhami nganākha ali ithumna thei da theishingkhui.
Ishameili thei jilaga awui ningkhami manganāsangakha a chi kakapika mina kala awuili khamashung maleimana.
Kha kachikathāna awui tui mayonakha, kachangkhat awuili ana Vareli leikashe chi kāshunghaira, hi eina ithum awuili lei kaji ithumna theishingkhuipai.
Vareli zanga kaji mi china Jishu Khristawui thada okthuichingranu.
Chithālala ina nathumli kadhara kakaso khamina. Hiwui khamashung hi Khristawuili lei kala nathumwuili lei. Kaja tangkhamang kānthuimamānhaida kachangkhatwui kahor shokpinghaira.
Kahor lungli lei jilaga nachināli yangkharingakha chikathā mi chi tangmangting eina leifaya.
Achināli leikashe mi chi kahorlungli lei, kala awui eina mi kateibingna phei ngaphok khavai maleimana.
Achināli yangkakharinga a chiya tangkhamangli lei. Ana chiwui alungli leihaoda kali vanikhala dala matheimana, khikhalajila tangkhamang china ali mik ngapeo ngasakhaowa.
Inaongarā, Khristawui mangā eina nathumwui morei pheomihaira kajiwui pongli ina kagapina.

Avāva̱ ngarā, ina nathumli kagapina kaje haokaphok eina thuida leikasā ali nathumna thei; yaronnaobing, nathumna makaphā chili yuihaira kajiwui vang ina hi kagapina; naoshinaobing, ina nathumli kagapina kaja nathumna Avāva̱ chili thei.

Avāva̱ ngarā, ina nathumli kagapina kaja haokaphokwui eina leikasā ali nathumna thei. Yaronnaobing, nathumli kagapina kaja nathum panglaka kala Varewui tuina nathumli ngasomida nathumna makaphā chili yuihaira.
Okathui kala chiwui alungli khalei otbing chili maleishialu. Nathumna okathuili leishiakha Avāva̱li maleishimana.
Okathui otli ningchāngmeida morei kasā, mikwui kakahao, okathuiwui lāngsot saikora hi Avāva̱wui eina kharā maningmana, kha okathuiwui otsera.
Okathui kala chiwui alungli khalei mibingna ningkachāng saikora shimānserhaora kha Varewui kaphaning kasābing mashimānda ringra.

Athum chi ithumwui ngarumsakli kachangkhat makazangwui vang thuikahaina; ithumli zangchaosi kaja athum mayāmlakmara. Kha ithumwuili mazangchaomana kaji ngahāhang eina theikhui khavai athum thuikahaina.
Kha Khristana heirorkhami Manglā Kathara chi nathumna samphanghaira, chiwui vang eina nathum saikorana khamashung chi theikahaina.
Nathumna khamashung chi matheimana kajiwui vang kakapi maningmana, kha nathumna chi katheiwui vang kala khamashungwuili kakapik mashokmana kajila katheiwui vang kagapina.
Anaomayarali makhamayā mi chi Avāva̱lila mamayāmana. Anaomayarali khamayā chi Avāva̱lila mayai.
Haokaphokwui eina shākahai chi nathumwuili leichingranu. Haokaphokwui eina shākahai chi nathumli leichingakha, nathumla Anaomayara eina Avāva̱li ngasoda okthuirumchinga.
Khristana ithumli mira da ngashitmi kahai chi makashimān mirin china.
Nathumli minamki kajebingwui pongli ina hi kagapina,

kha nathumwui vanga Khristana nathumli Manglā Kathara heirormihaira. Awui Manglāna nathumli ngasomida leilakha eina tangda nathumli khangateina tamkachithei kankhanā maleimana, kaja awui Manglāna saikora tamchithei kala ana tamchithei kahai chi khamashungmānga, khalāng mazanglakmana. Tamchithei kahai saikora chi mayonda Khristali leichinglu.
Khristava khamashungana da nathumna thei. Chiwui vang eina mashun ot kasā mi kachiva̱ Varewui naona da theiphalungra.

Leikashebing, ara ithum Varewui naongarāna. Kha ithum naoda kathasānikhala kaji arui matheirarmana. Chithālala ithumna thei kaja Khristana kharā tharan ithumla a thahaora kala a hithālaka kaji ithumwui mik eina theira.
Hikathā kachihān khalei mi kachiva̱ Khristana kathar tākam eina ala thara.
Morei kasā mi chi Varewui ningkhami sākakhai mina, kaja morei kasā hi ain kakaina.
Khristana morei sonthuimi khavai kharāna kala awuili morei maleimana kaji nathumna thei.
Khristali kazanga mi khipākha moreili mangaphummana. Kha moreili ngaphumda khalei mi china mik einala, ning einala ali matheiranga.
Naoshinaobing, khipānakha nathumli maminamaranu, ana khangarong thada khamashung kasā mi chi khangarongana.
Morei kasaa chi chipeewui mina, kaja haokaphokwui eina thuida chipeena morei sai. Chiwui vang eina Varewui Naomayarana chipeewui otsak shimān ngasak khavai kharāna.
Varewui naongarā eina chipeewui naongarā ngakheikhang eina theikhuipai; khamashung ot makasā kala achināli maleikashe mi chi Varewui nao maningmana.
Ithum Cain mathāphalungmara, ava makaphā mina, kala agato Abelli shaokathata mina. Khiwui vang Cainna Abelli shaothathaokhala? Ana kasā saikora khayonna kha agatona kasā chiya khamashungmānga.
Ithumli kathiwui eina kanshokmihaira kaji ithumna thei, kaja ithumna achināngarāli leishi. Maleikashebing chi aruila thida lei.
