Achināli yangkakharinga a chiya mi khayumana kala mi khayumabingli kharing kaho chi maleimana da nathumna thei.
Chithada sāda leikashi hi khikhala da chiwui eina ithumna theikhuipai; Khristana ithumwui vang amanglā chihomi. Chiwui vang eina avānaobingwui vang ithumnala manglā chihomi phalungki kajina.
Kachikathā mi akhana avānao akhawui khavāt thatheilaga malumashanngaiakha, ana Vareli leishiya da kathada hāngpairakhala?
Inaongarā, male kala tuimāng eina maleishikhaningla kha otsak eina ngasoda khamashung eina leishiphalungra.
Ithum khamashungwui vangna kaji chi hi eina theikhuipaira; hithada ithumna Varewui miktāli ningkhanganung leira;
kaja ithumwui mashun-makhuina ithum yonhaira da kachithei tharan, ithumwui mashun-makhuili Vare hakmei kala ot saikora ana theisera da ithumna thei.
Chiwui vang eina leikashebing, ithumwui mashun-makhuina makhamayā maleiakha Varewui miktāli ithum ningkhanganung lei.
Awui kahāng nganāda ali ningyāng ungkhangasakwui vang ithumna kapopo chi awui eina samphanga.
Awui kakaso chi hina; ithum Anaomayara Jishu Khristali shitsangphalungra kala Khristana kaso kahai thada akha eina akha leishi ngarokphalungra.
Varewui kahāng khanganābingna Vareli ngashikta okthui, kala ali Vare lei. Varena ithumli mikahai Manglā Katharawui mangā eina a ithumli lei kaji theikhuishapa.
Leikashebing, Manglā kachiva̱li mashitsangalu: kha Varewui eina samkaphang manglākā maningkhala kaji chāng yanglu, kaja mikhanama marān kachungkha okathuili shokhaira.
Hithada nathumna Varewui Manglākā maningmakhala kaji theikhuipaira; chiya, Jishu Khristana mikumo akha sāda rai da hāngkaphat mi kachiva̱ chi Varewui Manglāna;
kala Jishuli makhamayā kachiva̱ Varewui maningmana. Hi rārada nathumna shākahai kala okathuili leiping kahai Khristali makhamayāwui manglāna.
Naoshinaobing, nathum Varewui nao sāhaoda minama paokazatbingli nathumna yuihaira, kaja nathumwuili khalei a china okathuili khalei a chili hakmei.
Athuma okathuiwuina, chieina athumna khamatui chi okathuiwuina kala okathuina athumwui tui khui.
Ithumva Varewuina, Vareli theikahaibingna ithumwui tui khuisanga; kha Varewui mi makhaningbingna makhuisangmana. Hithada sāda khamashung manglā eina makhamashung manglāwui khangatei theishapa.
Maleishikatha a chiya Vareli matheimana; kaja Vare hi leikashena.
Varena awui leikashi ithumli hithada chithei; awui naohonaotong chihorāda awui mangā eina ithumli kahui samphang khavai sai.
Leikashi kaho chi hithai; ithumna Vareli leishikhare maningmana kha ana ithumli leishida ithumwui morei pheomi khavaiwui vang maseimi khavai Anaomayarali chihorāmi.
Leikashebing, Varena ithumli hiyākha leishiakha ithum akha eina akha leishi ngarokphalungrali.
Vareli khipānakha mik eina matheilakranga, kha ithum akha eina akha leishingarokakha Vare ithumwuili lei, kala awui leikashi chi ithumwuili pong ngasaka.
Chiwui vang eina okathuiwui Huikhame sākhavai Varena Anaomayara mihaira kaji hi ithumna mik eina theida mi kachiva̱li kahāngna.
Jishu hi Varewui naona da hāngkaphata a chili Vare lei, kala Vareli a lei.
Chieina Varena ithumli leikashi khalei chi ithum khalattana thei kala shitsanga.
Vare leikashena, leikashili khalei a chi Vareli lei kala Varena ali lei.
Bichar zimiksholi ninganungmei khavai ithumwui lungli leikashi chi pongngasaka kala chi ithumna samphangra, khikhalajila okathuili ithumwui mirin hi Khristawui thāpapamma.
Leikashili khangachee maleimana. Kākashung leikashina khangachee shimān ngasaka. Chiwui vang eina, ngacheekazarbing hi leikashi makākashungna kaja khangachee hili khayon ot lei.
Kachikathāna “I Vareli leishi” jilaga avānaoli yangkharingakha a kakapikna, kaja ana mik eina kathei achināli maleishiakha, mik eina makathei Vareli maleishirarmana.
Chieina Khristana hithada kahāngna; Vareli leikashe china avānaolila leishiphalungra.
Varewui naongarāli leikashi hi Vareli leishida awui kahāng khanganā chi eina theikhui.
Vareli leikashiwui vang awui ningkhami khamayona, kala awui ningkhami ritnā kahai maleimana.
Khikhalajila Varewui nao kachiva̱na okathuili maishi ngasakshapa kala shitkasang mangā eina okathuili ithumna khayuina.
Jishu hi Varivarawui Naomayarana da shitkasanga china okathuili khayui maningmala?
kala Manglāna chiwui shākhina. Kaja Manglā hi khamashungana.
Chiwui shākhi kathum lei: Manglā, Tara̱ kala Ashee; kathum hi mayā ngaroksera.
Miwui shākhili ithumna shitsanga, kha Varewui shākhina pangmeikhara kala Varena Anaomayarawui pongli shākhi mihaira.

Chiwui vang eina Varewui Naoli shitkasanga mi china awui wuklungli shākhi hi lei; kha Vareli mashitkasangbingna ali kakapika sāngasakhaowa, kaja Varena Anaomayarawui pongli kahāng chi athumna mashitsangmana.
Varena ithumli kharing Manglā mihaira, kala hi Anaomayarawui mangā eina ithumna samkaphangna kaji hina shākhina.
Naomayarali khuikasang mi china kharing hi samphanga, kha makhuikasang mi china kharing masamphangmana.
Ithumna awuili ningkhanganung hi lei kaja awui ningkachāng athishurda ithumna poakha ana khuisangmi.
Ithumna kapo chi ana mirada theiakha ithumna kapo chi samphanghaira da thei,

kachikathā mi akhana, avānao akhana mathikapai morei kasā theiakha ana awui vang seihā sāmiranu, chieina mathikapai morei kasāwui vanga Varena ali ringngasakra. Thikapai morei lei; chikathāwui vang seihā sāmilu da ina kahāng maningmana.
Khalāng kasā saikora moreisera, kha mathikapai morei lei.
Varewui nao khipānakha morei sālui sālui majimana kaji ithumna thei, kaja Varewui Naomayarana ali yangmihaida makaphā china ali khikha masāthukmana.
Apuk-apaga hi makaphā pangshapwui azingli leilala ithum Varewuina kaji ithum thei.

Varewui Naomayara rāhaira kala ithumli theishingkhui ngasakhaira kaji ithumna thei. Ithum khamashunga Vare, Anaomayara Jishu Khristali ringrumda lei. Hi khamashunga Vare kala makashimān Kharing china.
Inaongarā, meoma̱li makhorumalu.
kaja khamashung chi ithumli lei kala katang mavaila leichingra.
Avāva̱ Varivara kala Avāva̱wui naomayara Jishu Khristawui eina kharā lukhamashan, phaningkhami kala chingri kahai china ithumli khamashung kala leikashi eina ngasomira.
Avāva̱na ithumli kakaso athishurda nanao ngarā kaikhana khamashung eina okathuili kaji shālaga ringphālaka.
Chiwui vang eina achon, ithum akha eina akha leishi ngaroksa. Hi ningkhami kadhar maningmana, kha haokaphokwui eina samphang kahai leishi ngaroklu kaji chipapama.
Ina hāngda khalei leikashi hiwui kakhalatva Varewui kakaso nganāda okthuisa kajina. Haokaphokwui eina nathumna shākahai ningkhami chi hina, nathum leikashi eina okthuilu.
Jishu Khristana mikumo thada rai kaji makhuikasang mi kachungkha okathuili leihaira. Hikathā mi hi mashongachei khangasak Khristali Makhamayāna.
Ithumna nathumwui vang sāmi kahai chi mashimān khavai, kha nathumwui sāman pongzongri eina samphang khavai hikathā mibingli ningngasharlu.
Khristawui tamkachithei mamayonla, kānda sākazat mi chi Varewuili maleimana. Kha Khristawui tamkachithei khamayona mi china Avāva̱lila, Anaolila lei.
Chieina kachikathā mina hikathā mashun pheisin matamchitheiakha, chikathā mili shimlila, mazang ngasakalu kala shālamtuila mahāngalu.
Kaja chikathā mili shālamtui kahāng mi chi awui makaphā otsakli khangarumna.
Nawui leikashiva̱ nachināva̱wui nao ngarābingna shālam chiphunli.
Leikashe ngasotnao, ot saikora tāchamhai khavai kala makhanang-makazā khavai ina seihā sali. Chieina ngasoda Manglāwui pongli na ringphāchinga kaji ina thei.
Nana mashun eina okthuiching kaji thada khamashungwui pongli nana kayākha ningtongkhala kaji avānao kaikhana rakahāng shālaga ringkaphā khi hāngra!
Inaongarā khamashung eina okthuida lei kaji paoli lāngmeida ringphākhamei maleiluimana.
Leikashe ngasotnao, achinā kaikha kha̱mi sāsālala ningtonglak eina nana otram ngatha̱mi.
Nawui leikashi kachitheiwui pongli athumna church hili unghānghaira. Varewui ningyāng ungkapai, apongli ot sāda athum kha̱ram zatpaimei khavai ngachonmilu.
Khristawui otram ngatha̱ khavai mashitkasangbingwui eina khikha makhuilakla athum zatthui kahaina.
Athumna khamashungwui ot kasā chili ithumwui yarla zangkhavai chikathā mibingli ithumnala ngachonngayiya.
Ina churchli chithinao akha kapiya, kha athumwui kathāna sākhangai Diotrephesna ina kahāngli khikha machāpmilakmana.

I kharā tharan ana sākahai saikora rāhāngsera: ithumwuitungli mahāngkhaleng tui kahāng, awui kakapik-kakhayāng chi rāhāngsera, kha awui vang china mashapmana; ana avānaobingli marā ngasakmana, rākhangaibinglila ana khāma kala churchwui einala ana kasham khavai sai.
Leikashe ngasotnao, makaphā masha̱alu, kha kaphā sha̱khuilu. Kaphā kasā chi Varewuina, kha makaphā ot kasāpā chi Vareli matheimana.
Mi kachiva̱na Demetriusli sosera, mashun khalattanala chiwui shākhina. Ithumla chiwui shākhina kala ithumwui shākhi mashunga da nathumna thei.
Thakta rāsamphang khavai chihānda lei, chitharan mashā eina ngazeknaosa.
Chingrihairanu.
Nawui ngasotnaobing saikorana shālam chiphunli. Ngasotnao saikorali namashā eina shālam tui kahāngmihailu.
Jameswui agato kala Jishu Khristawui otram khangatha̱a Judena,
Jishu Khristana ngākkhami kala Avāva̱ Varewui leikashilungli kharinga Varena hokhui kahaibingli kagapina.
Phaningkhami, chingri kahai kala leikashi chi nathumli mataisangmiranu.
Leikashebing, ithumna samphangrumda khalei huikhamiwui pongli kapingailakhaoda, katharabingli metkhakashi eina vaikahai shitkasang chiwui vang ngarar khavai nathumli kapo hi darkar salakhaowa.

Ithumwui Akhavā Proho Jishu Khristali makhamayā kala athumwui morei thumkhavai Varewui lukhamashan otli nguida tamkachithei ithumwui alungli rāngathizanghaira. Athumwui khayon otsak hi achālakha kathara tuili kapihaisai.

Hiwui pongli nathumna theida lei jilala Israelnaobingli Prohona Egyptwui eina kathada thānshokmi, kala naoda mashitkasangbingli kathada shimān ngasakhao kajiwui pongli ina nathumli phaningung ngasakli.

Kazingraobingna athumwui pangshap chi shichinnguihaida athumwui pam chiho kahaiwui vang, khanaowa zimiksho chi marāranglakha eina tangda Varena katang makhavai marikhānghui eina khalaplaga tangkhamangli haira, chi phaningung ngasakngai.

Sodom eina Gomorrah kala chiwui luinganaili khaleibing athumna chikathā kazingraobingwui thada kasā, khamathang-khamarang kala makaphā-makhayā otmāng kasāwui vang makhamit meiwui tandi samphangra da saikorali theikhangasak hi phaningunglu.
Chi tākam eina mibing hinala athumwui phasāli khalatta morei sākhavaimāng chukmaja̱ya; Varewui pangshaplila athumna ningkachai kala atungshongwui tekhamatei chili machāpmimana.

Kathāna kazingrao Michael eina tangda chithada masāmana. Moseswui phasā khipāna khuirakhala da khangaphat tharan Michaelna chipeeli kazei tui eina makaharmana; kha hithada hānga, “Prohona nali hāngmachinra.”
Kha mibing hina athumna bhap makatā otlila zeiphāphai; kala sāyur thada athumna ningli kaza̱za̱ china athumli shimān ngasaka,
kayākha khangachee-khangacha otkhala! Athum Cainwui athi shura; thada tongzā khavai vang khayon otmāng sai, kala Korahna khangashao thada, athumlila khangashaona shimān ngasakra.

Athumwui khamarip china ngarumsakwui morsonli nathumli maishi ngasakta hamak neokhami kathāna. Athumna athum khalattawui vangmāng phaninga. Athum chi zingrot makazang muiyā masina phankazat kathāna. Athum chi māthei kachāng eina tangda athei makhamathei kala angayung phurshoklaga thichao kahai thingrong kathāna.

Athuma shamadruwui sākashe ra̱ngaphao thada athumwui khayākhamala otsak chi amalao kashok thada phongshoka. Athum hi sirāpai kathāna, athumwui vang Varena makashimān tangkhamang chi ngarānmihaida lei.
Adamwui naothot kashine Enochna athumwui pongli rida marānhaikasā chiya: “Yanglu, Prohona, kathara kazingrao thingthingli ngasoda rāra.”
Kala varebingli kaphaningabing, Vareli ngakaikashe, morei kasābingna makaphā-makhayā kaphentui khamatui saikorawui vang bichar sāda khayon mira.
Mibing hina chānkhalop eina kateili phenphāphai, kachorkashe, malungkachāng, katho-kachir makhavai kala tongzā khavai mili sotkhamasaoli akachanga sai.
Ivānaobing, Proho Jishu Khristawui paokazatbingna rida hāngkahai chi phaningunglu.
Athumna, “Khangachang atamli makaphā otli kazata athum china nathumli mana̱shinganaora” da hānghai.
Hikathā mibing hiya phasāwui otli ningkachāngna pemkahaiya kala tui kakaili akachanga kasā mibingna. Athumwuili Manglāwui otsak maleimana.
Kha leikashebing, nathumwui kathara shitkasang chi reisang khavai sālu, kala Manglā Katharawui pangshap eina ngasoda seihā sālu.
Proho Jishu Khristawui phaningkhami chiwui mangā eina makashimān mirin miki kaji chi ngaraimamānda Varewui leikashilungli leichinglu.
Ningmaongda khaleibingli theishingkhui ngasaklu.
Meifawui eina shimenshokmida kanmilu. Mi kaikhali, moreiwui khamathang china makhao ngasak kahai kashankachon chili yangkharinglala, athum shimānhaipainada malungkharingwui phaningkhami chitheilu.
Ara kongluipaishinada mayonkhame, tekhamateiwui mangāli chukhara̱ maleila mathānthathup eina thānzangkhame,
kala Proho Jishu Khristawui mangā eina ithumwui Huikhame Vare chili tekhamatei khangam-kharei, khamashung kala sāshap pangshap saikora thot kachida, aruila naodala mashimānda awui sachingrānu. Amen.
Thākta rāshokphalungki kaji, awui raobingli chithei khavai Varena ali khami Jishu Khristawui phongkhami; hi ana awui kazingrao chihoda awui rao John,
Varewui tui kala Jishu Khristawui vang kala ana kathathei saikora shākhi sakhame Johnli chitheimi.
Phongkhami tuibing hi kapā mi, kala kashābing kala hiwui alungli kapi kahai otbing khuikasangbing ka̱lā mahairanu! Kaja atam chi nganaihaira.
Aruila, achāla, kala naodala chiching kaje, kala wungpamkhong mangāli khalei Manglā shini chiwui eina,
kala ningtongda shākhi sākhame Jishu Khrista, kathiwui eina pharākhare kala okathuili awungabingli khamungawui eina lukhamashan kala chingri kahai ngasāranu.
Ana ithumli leishi kala awui thikhamiwui pha̱kaphayā eina ana ithumli moreiwui eina ningkhān ngasakhaira.
Kala Vare, Avāva̱li otram ngatha̱ khavai ithumli pāngmonwui wungram sāmihaira. Jishu Khristali mashimānda tekhamatei kala pangshap ngasāranu. Amen.

I nathumwui achinā Johnna, kala Jishuwui thikashura akha sāda, awui wungramwui mi ngasā kahaibingwuitungli kharā kakhanang kachot chi khāngda nathumli phungruma. Varewui tui kala Jishuna phongkhami mashuntui shākhiwui vang I Patmos kaho yikuiramli leisai.
Prohowui zimiksholi I Manglā eina leisai, kala talla̱khon thada chuilak kahai akhon akhana ikhanukshong khamatui shai.
Kala china hānga, “Nana kathei chi kapikhuilu kala lairik chi church shini hili chihovālu; chiya, Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, kala Laodicea.”
Ili khangazeka akhon chi khipākhala da yangkhui khavai ngareikhaung eina sinā thaomeishong shini thei;
Thaomeishong chiwui ngachaili miwui naomayara thada, kachon akha phei tumda khangava, kala sināwui shānneira̱ eina mathikli neikahai akha thei.
Akui kala kuisam sahā thada kala horam thada charshihai, kala amik meiwon thai,
aphei meili ruimaling kahai pithrai thai; kala akhon kong kathui thai.
Awui yāpāngli sirā shini singa; kala akhamorli zankhangasunga kazana raikhai akha shoka. Awui mai zimik malingting kahaiwui kahor thai.
Ali theilaga I kathi thada awui pheizingli pizanghaowa. Kha awui yāpāng ili parza̱da hānga, “Mangacheealu! I khare eina khanaowana,
kala kharing chi Ina; I thihailaga, yanglu ara mashimānda ringdalei kala Kathi eina Kazeiramwui pangshap lei.
Chiwui vang eina nana theikahai, theida khalei kala naoda rākikaji otbing chi kapikhuilu.
Iwui yāpāngli nana sirā shini kathei, kala sināwui thaomeishong shini chiwui khangathum kakhalat chi hina; sirā shini chi church shiniwui kazingraobingna, kala thaomei shini chi Church shini china.
“Ephesus Churchwui kazingraoli hithada kapilu:
“Yāpāngli sirā shini singlaga thaomeishong shiniwui ngachaili yaothui kazata chiwui eina kharā paona.

Ina nawui otsakbing, nawui kachot kala ningzinghākharing, makaphā mibingli nana mamayāngaiphalung kaji, kala athum khalatta pao kazata holaga, nana tamkhayang eina akachang makhaninganada samphang kahai ina theisera.
Nana ningzingharingda iwui mingwui vang khāngmihaira, thālala mathāhailakrangli kaji ina thei.
Kha nali mamayākhangai hi lei; khareli nana ili leikashi leishāt chi ara maleithura.

Kachiwui eina na tātunghaokhala da phaningyanglu; laga ningngateida kharewui sākasā thada sālu. Nawui moreiwui eina ning mangateiakha ina nali rāda nawui thaomeishong chi awui apamwui eina rākhuithuihaora.
Hichang hi na sai; ina ningkakachai thada nathumna Nocolaitannaobingwui otsak chili ningkachai.
“Khayuiya chili, Varewui Paradiseli khalei kharing thingrongwui athei chi ina shaingasakra.
“Khare eina khanaowa, thihailaga ringkhaluiya chiwui eina kharā paona.
Ina nawui kachotkachāng kala kachām thei, (kha nathum shānglaka). Jehudina da hānglaga maningkasā athumna khamashāt ina thei, athum Satanwui synagogue akhana.

Nathum khanangki kaji khikhikhawui vang mangangalu. Yanglu nathumli chāng tamyang khavai chipeena kaikhali phātop sangra; kala tharāthangwui vang kakhanang samphangra. Kathi eina tangda ili shitsangmalu; Ina kharingawui kuihon mira.
“Manglāna churchbingli kahāng chi khanā kakaana nganākhuiranu!
“Khayuiapa chili thikakhanena masāza̱rarmara.
“Pergamum churchwui kazingraoli kapilu:
“Zankhangasunga kazana raikhai kasingpā chiwui eina kharā paona.

Ina nawui pamkhavai thei; chi Satanwui wungpamkhonglina. Chithālala iming nana singtita, nana iwui kahāng nganai kala Satanna kapam apam chili shākhi khame ili ningkatonga Antipasli sākathat tharan nana ili shitkasang mangacheilakmana.

Kha nathumli mamayākhangai kateokha lei; nathumwui ngachaili Balaamwui tamkachithei khuikasang mi kha lei, ana Balakwui tui tamchitheida Israelnaobingli phei ngaphok khavai sai. Kameoli kapha̱sā shaikhavai, ngalā ngashām khavai ana kasatsanga.
Chi tākam eina Nicolaitanbingna tamkachithei chi khuikasanga mi nathumwui ngachaili zanga.
Chiwui vang eina ning ngateilu. Chi maningakha ina thākta rāda ikhamorwui raighai chi singda ina athumwuitungli rai rātāra.
“Khayuia athum chili ina ngathum kahai manna mizāra; Ina kachara ngalung akhala mira, ngalung chiwuitungli aming kadhara akha kapisanghai. Aming chi samkaphangapa maningla khipānakha matheimana.
“Amik meiwon kathā kala aphei hānshi kahai pithrai kathā Varewui Naomayara chiwui paona.
Ina nawui otsak, leikashi, ningkatong, ngachon khangarok kala ningzinghākharinglila, nathum khare otsakli aruihonwuina phākhamei ina thei.
Kha nali mamayākhangai hi lei: Jezebel, khalatta marān kahova̱ chili nana mayai. Awui tamkachitheina iwui raobingli yonngasaka, khamathang-khamarang meoma̱li pha̱kahai sā chi ana shaingasaka.
Ning ngatei khavai ina ali atam mihaira, kha ana shām kasāwui eina ning mangateingaithuwa.
Chiwui vang ali petli pingasakra kala ali leikashebing ning mangateiakha, athumli kakhanang khangacheeli horsanghaora.
Awui thikashurabingli ina sāthatserhaora, chieina church saikorana I hi mi saikorawui kaphaning sākhangai katheiana da theikhuira. Kala nathum kachiva̱li kachichāna sākahai athishurda mira.

Kha Thyatirali khalei kateibing, tamkachithei chi makakhuiabing, kaikhana Satanwui kathuka otbing da kaho chi matheithangkhamabing, nathumli ina kahāngna, nathumwuitungli ina otphun khangatei machiphunmara.
Kha I marāranglakha eina tangda nathumwui khalei chi singtitmalu.
Khayuia kala khanao eina tangda iwui ot kasāpa chili yurbingwuitungli ina pangshap mira;
ina iwui Avāwui eina pangshap samkaphang thada, ana mari khāmshui singda athumwuitungli mungra kala ham kasaawui hambing shaokakhai thada shaokachupra,
kala ali zingthanwola mira.
“Manglāna churchbingli kahāng chi khanā kakaa a china nganākhuira̱nu!
“Sardis churchwui kazingraoli kapilu;
“Varivarawui manglā shini, sirā shini kasinga chiwui paona. Ina nawui otsak theisera, na ringdalei kaji amingli leilala na thihaira.
Mathichaoranglakha ngakarthuida kateokha khalei chi pangsang ngasaklu, kaja Varewui miktāli nana sākahai kāshung kahai ina matheimana.
Chiwui vang eina nana kathada samphangkhuida shākhuikhala kaji phaningunglu, chi mayonda ningngateilu, mamathukakha, ina khale thada rāra, kala ina kharā pung chi na matheimara.
Thālala Sardiswui alungli kashankachon mamakhaola kahai kha lei, athumna ili ngasoda charshi kahai kachon ngavailaga yaothuira kaja, athum chi khangayebingna.
Khayuiapa chili chithada kachara sāri ngavaimira kala ina awui ming kharinga lairikwui eina mashimitmimara; kaja iwui Avāwui kala awui raobingwui miktāli athum iwuina da tharlāk eina phongmira.
“Manglāna churchbingli kahāng chi khanā kakaa a china nganākhuiranu!
Ina nawui otsak theisera kala yanglu, ina nawui mangāli khipānakha mashungkharar khāmong akha shomihaira; khikhalajila nawui pangshap teolaka, thālala iwui tui mayonhaira kala iming mahorhailakmana.

Yanglu, Jehudina jilaga akachanga Jehudi makhaning, kha kakapika, Satanwui synagogueli khaleibing athumli nawuili rāngasakta napheizingli ngakhumzang ngasakra, kala ina nali leishiya kaji theingasakra,
khikhalajila nana iwui tui mayontit kahaiwui vang okathuili okthuida khalei mi saikorali chāng yangkhavai apuk-apagawuitungli rāki kaji kachotkachāng chiwui eina ina nali kanmira.
Yanglu, I thākta rāra; nawui khalei chi singtitlu, chithākha nawui kuihon kateina makhuithuimara.

Khayuia chili ina iwui Varewui khorumshim pakra̱ akha sāngasakra; ana chiwui eina mangapākluimara kala ina awuitungli iwui Varewui ming kala kazingramwui eina iwui Varewui eina tāki kaji iwui Varewui keinung kadhara Jerusalemwui aming chi kapisangmira; kala iwui kadhara aming chila kapisangmira.
“Manglāna churchbingli kahāng chi khanā kakaa a china nganākhuiranu!
“Amen kaho ningkatonga kala khamashunga shākhi, Varena sākahai ot saikorawui angayung chiwui paona.
Ina nawui otsak theisera; na khamakuila maning, kasāla maning, makuiakha makui, saakha sā jisi kaja teokha phārala!
Kha lumra̱sa̱ eina khamakuila mamakui, kasāla maning kajiwui vang ikhamor eina nali kapha̱shokhaora.
Nakhalatta ‘I shāngshuna, ringphāshuna, kala khavāt akhala meleimana’ da hānga kha na makathuka, khikha masā khavai, kachāma khangapeowa, kala kachon makhangavaiana kajiva matheimana.

Meili lāngkahaiya sinā iwui eina lokhuida shāngchang khavai kala kachon kachara iwui eina lokhuida ngavailaga, mahonghat kahaiwui kakhayak malei khavai, kala mikli ari neolaga theikhavai nali hāngkachitheina.
Ina leishilak kajebingli hāngmachinda tandila mi; chiwui vang eina ningmazingda ningngateilu.
Yanglu ina khāmongli nganingda shaoda lei, kachikathāna iwui khon shāda khāmong shomiakha ina ali zangra kala ina ali kala ana ili phazārumra.
Ina khayui samphangda Ishāvāli ngasoda awui wungpamkhongli ngasokapam thada khayuiyapā chili iwui wungpamkhongli ili ngasopam khavai ina mayāmira.
“Manglāna churchbingli kahāng chi khanā kakaa a china nganākhuiranu!”
Kala chithākhaleoda I Manglā eina leihaowa, kala yanglu kazingramli wungpamkhong akha runghailaga wungpamkhong chili akhana pama,
chili kapamapā chiwui zakmai amankasaka ngalung jasper eina cornelianwui kahān thai kala wungpamkhong chi aman kasaka ngalung emerald machu kathā changjeengawut akhana ngawutphina,
Wungpamkhong chi kuimareida khangatei wungpamkhong maga̱da mati lei, chili kachara wungsari ngavaida sinā kuihon khangahona arar maga̱da mati pama.
Wungpamkhong chiwui eina rikhān ngasheiya, kazing ngashuma kala akhon shoka, wungpamkhong mangāli thaomei shini shārhai. Chi Varewui manglā shinina.
Wungpamkhong chiwui mangāli mathingrik kahai shamadru mengshen thada lei kala kuimareida shingāla, khanukla mikmāng kaja manglākapaiyur mati lei.
Khare manglākapai chi kazingkha̱ thai, kakhane chi mukvā thai, kakathuma chiya mimai thai, khamate chi yongkazat khalāng thai.
Manglākapaiyur mati chi angachāng tharukrip kai, alung ayar mikna pema, ngashun ngayā laa kasā mangasāmmana.
“Kathara, Kathara, Kathara, Sāshap-pangshapa Proho Vare,
leikasā, khaleia kala rāki kaje!”
wungpamkhongli kapama arar maga̱da mati china ngakhumshām eina, katang mavaila ringching kaje wungpamkhongli kapama chili khoruma. Athumna athumwui kuihon chi wungpamkhongwui mangāli laa sāda haitai;
“Ithumwui Proho Vare, tekhamatei, khayākakā pangshap
samphangngayilaka,
khikhalajila ot saikora nana sākhuisera,
saikora nawui kaphaning eina
shoksera kala sākhuisera.”
kala kapanga kazingrao akhana panglāk eina hithada vaoda hānga, “Lairik akhalui hi harlaga, mahor namkahai sakhaikhangayia chi khipakhala?”
Kazinglila, okathuilila, ngaleizingshonglila lairik hi hārshapa, kala yangshapa khipākha maleisāmana.
Lairik chi hārkhavai kala chiwui alungli kazang chi yangkhavai khangayia khipākha maleikasā chi theilaga na chapsasuihai.
Chieina arar akhana hānga, “Machapalu, yanglu, Davidwui Angayung, Judah shangwui Kazingkha̱ china yuihaira, chieina ana lairik akhalui kala mahor shini chi sākhaishapra.”
Kala Yaonao china wungpamkhongli kapama chiwui yāpāngwui eina lairik chi akhui.

Kakhui eina kharinga sāyur mati kala arar maga̱da mati china Yaonao chiwui mangāli ngakhumsangsera. Athum chi tingteilā ava̱va̱, kala nganamkaphā thao pemting eina kazang sinā tengkot akharip singa, chi kathara mibingwui seihā kasāna,
kala athumna laa kadhar akha sai:
“Lairik akhalui chi khuida chiwui mahor namkahai sākhaingayilak kaje chi nalāka,
khikhalajila nali sāthathaowa,
laga nawui asheena shang kachiva̱wui eina,
tuiyur kachiva̱wui eina,
miyur kachiva̱wui eina,
kala ngalei kachiva̱wui eina,
Varewui vang mi lokhuihaira.
kala athumna okathui hi mungra.”
kala akhon chi pangda vaowa,
“Shaothat kahai Yaonao chi pangshap, kashāng, thangkhamei,
yāng, khayākakā, tekhamatei kala masot samphangngayilaka!”
Chiwui thili kazingramli, okathuili, ngaleizingshongli kala ngayilungli kala haori-haorāngli khalei manglākapai yur saikorana, laa kasā ina shai:
“Masotlaa, khayākakāla, tekhamateila, pangshapla;
katang mavaila wungpamkhongli kapama,
Yaonao chiwui sāranu.”
Kala kharinga sāyur mati china ngahānkai, “Amen!” kala ararbing china ngakhumshāmhaida khoruma.
Chiwui thili Yaonao china mahor khare sakakhai chi ina thei; kala sāyur matiwui ngachaili akhana kazing khangashumwui akhon thada, “Ralu” da kahāng chi ina shai.
Kala yanglu ina kachara sigui akha thei, chili katongapa chi malā akha singa. Ali kuihon akha mi, kala ana yuiyuida yuishum khavai zatthuihaowa.
Yaonao china kakhane mahor sākakhai eina, sāyur kakhanepā china “Rālu” da kahāng ina shai.
Kala chili hungping kahai sigui akha shoka. Chili katongapali okathuiwui eina chingri kahai khuithuihaida athum akha eina akha shaothat ngarok khavai pangshap mi, kala ali raighai kahakva̱ akha mi.
Kala Yaonao china kakathuma mahor sākakhai eina, kakathuma sāyur china “Ralu” da kahāng ina shai. Chieina yanglu, ina sigui kazika akha thei; chili katongapana pāngli khān onkhavai akha singa.
Kala sāyur mati chiwui alungli ina akhon akha shai, “Thangkhawui ngalangman gehu horsaikha kala thangkhawui ngalangman barley horsai kathum, kha olive thao eina drakhāra̱ chi masāza̱alu.”
Kala khamate mahor chi ana sākakhai eina, khamate sāyur china “Ralu” da kahāng ina shai,

kala yanglu ina charrisi kahai sigui akha thei, chili katongapawui ming Kathi hoi, kala kazeiramna ali shurzata. Ali okathui khum mati sālaga khumkhawuitungli raikhai, chām, kazātkashi kala ramsā eina chithit khavai pangshap mi.
Kala kaphangā mahor chi sākakhai eina, Varewui tuiwui vang kala Vare tuili shākhi kasāwui vang shaothat kahaibingwui manglā hanphutwui azingli leisāser kaji ina thei.
Athumna panglāk eina vaowa: “O Proho, kathara, khamashunga, okathuili khalei mibingna ithumli shaokathatwui bichar kala tandi miki kaji atam chi leifala?”
Athum ava̱va̱li kachara kachon akharip mi, kala athumwui otram ngatha̱kharum achinābingli athumwui thada masāthatranglakha kasha̱kha ngasāmsālu da athumli hānga.
Unshimuili khaorāthei kapa̱ thada kazingramwui sirāla, okathuili tātungserhaowa;
kazingla lairik thada khaluithuihaowa; kala phungreila yikuiramla athumwui apam eina ngacheiserhaowa.

Chiwui thili okathuiwui awungabing, khangam-khareibing, shipaiwui akhavābing, kashānga, akhavā kasābing, pangshap khaleia, rao kachiva̱la, kachichā khalatta okathuibingla lungkhurli kala kaphungkhurli ngathumserhaowa.
Kala athumna phungreibingli kala lunghārbingli ngakaoda vaowa, “Wungpamkhongli kapama chiwui miktheiwui eina, kala Yaonao chiwui malungvātwui eina thummida ithumwuitungli minrormilu,
kachiwui vangkhala kaja athumwui malungkhavātwui kahaka zimiksho rāhaira, khipāna nganingshaprakhala?”

Chiwui thili zingshoshong eina khangatei kazingrao akha kharinga Varewui mahor singlaga kharā chi ina thei; kala ngalei eina ngayili sāshimān khavai pangshap mikahaia kazingrao mati chili panglāk eina ana vaoda hānga.
“Varewui raobingwui khaveili ithumna mahor manammiranglakha eina tangda shamadruli, ngaleili maningakha thingrongbingli khikha mashimān ngasaklu.”
Kala mahor nammi kahaibingwui mashing chi ina shai; Israel shang saikorawui eina thing shākha hangmatida matili mahor namhaowa.
Judah shangnaowui eina thingtharāda khani, Reubenshi thingtharāda khani, Gadshi thingtharāda khani,
Ashershi thingtharāda khani, Naphtalishi thingtharāda khani; Manassehshi thingtharāda khani,
Simeonshi thingtharāda khani, Levishi thingtharāda khani, Issacharshi thingtharāda khani,
Zebulunshi thingtharāda khani, Josephshi thingtharāda khani, kala Benjaminshi thingtharāda khanina.

Chiwui thili ina khayang tharan, yanglu, mina mashānkharar mikazip akha ngalei kachiva̱wui eina, shang kachiva̱wui eina, miyur kala tuiyur kachiva̱wui eina kachara sāri shaksālaga pāngli khaneinā singriplaga wungpamkhong kala Yaonaowui mangāli nganingserlaga;
akhon pangda vaosera: “Huikhami hi wungpamkhongli kapama, ithumwui Varivara kala Yaonao chiwuina.”
Kazingrao saikorana wungpamkhong, ararbing, kala kharinga sāyur mati chili kuimareida nganinga kala athumna ngakhumshām eina Vareli khorumserda hānga,
“Amen! masotla, tekhamateila, aworla, ningkashila, khayākakāla, pangshapla, saikora mashimānda ithumwui Varewuina! Amen”.
Kala arar akhana ili hānga, “Sari kachar khangavaibing hi khipālong kala kachiwui eina kharākhala?”
Chieina ana ili hānga, “Athum hiya kachotkachāngwui eina shokkahaibingna kala athumwui sāri Yaonaowui ashee eina ngasa̱hailaga charshi eina sākhui kahaibingna.
Chiwui vang eina athumna Varewui wungpamkhong ngalemli nganingda ngashun ngayā awui shimli otram khangatha̱na; kala wungpamkhongli kapama china awui ngasokhami china athumli khayinmira.
Athum mathailuilakmara, mara̱changluimara, zimikwui kala khangateiwui kasānala athumli makāng ngasakmara;
khikhalajila wungpamkhong alungthungli kapama Yaonao china athumli hommida kharinga tara̱ khawur ura̱pamli thanvāmira; kala Varena athumwui mikwui chara̱ mitmisera.”
Yaonao china kashine mahor chi sākakhai tharan pungkhai sha̱kha kazingram va̱rihaphaowa.
Chiwui thili Varewui mangāli kazingrao shini khanganing chi ina thei, kala athumli talla̱ shini mihaowa.
Kazingrao chiwui pāng eina anganam chiwui akhut chi katharabingwui seihā kasā eina ngasoda Varewui mangāli kashunghaowa.
Chiwui thili kazingrao china anganamkhong chi khuida chi hanphutwui mei eina chipemkhui kala okathuili hortāhaowa; chieina kazing ngashumkakang rikhān ngasheida neina̱la khanuka.
Chiwui thili talla̱ shini kasinga kazingrao shini china talla̱ khongkhavai khangarān sāhaowa.
Shamadru katonga khum kathumwui khumkha ashee onhaowa. Chili khalei manglākapai khum kathumwui khumkha thihaowa, kala chili zatkasā jahas khum kathumwui khumkha shimānhaowa.
Sirā chiwui aming Khāshi kahai hoi; kala tara̱ khum kathumwui khumkha khāshihaowa; chieina khāshi kahai tara̱ chi khamang eina mi kachungkha thihaowa.

Khamate kazingrao china awui talla̱ chi khonguwa; kala zimik kai kathumwui kaikha, kachāng kai kathumwui kaikha, sirā kai kathumwui kaikhali sāza̱da khum kathumwui khumkha tangmanghaowa, ngashunla, ngayāla khum kathumwui khumkha ngamihaowa.

Ina yangkhavā tharan khalāng akha kazingramli yongzatta panglāk eina khavao shai, “Kakhanang, kakhanang, kakhanang ngasāranu, okathuili kapambing, kazingrao kathum china khongluifaki kaji talla̱khon chiwui vang.”
Chiwui thili kaphangā kazingrao china awui talla̱ chi khonguwa; kala sirā akha kazingramwui eina okathuili tākatung ina thei, kala sirā chili makatang leizingkhur shokhavai sho chi mi.

Chieina ana leizingkhurwui akhur chi shohaowa, kala meifa shatrung kahaiwui meikhut thada, akhur chiwui eina meikhut ngapuishokuwa. Chieina akhur chiwui meikhut china zimikla kazingramla tangmangtinghaowa,
meikhut chiwui eina khaoh shokta okathuili tai kala ngaleiwui seithatna pangshap khalei thada athumlila pangshap sangmihaowa.
Khawoli, khamateka thingnā-rahāli kala thingrongli masāza̱paimara, kha khaveili Varewui mahor makakābingli makei khavai athumli kasoi.
Mibingli sākathatva masāthatla seithatna mili kapharikwui khangashei thada ngashei khavai athumli kachāng phangā rekharek khavai mayāmi;
chitharan mibingna thikhavai phāshang phatāra, kha kalikha masamphanglakmara; athum thingaināra; kha kathina yāmhaora.
Athumwui samna sha̱naobingwui kuisam thai, athumwui ahāna kazingkha̱hā thada kai;
kala athumwui thikkom chi mari thikkom thai; athumwui angachāngwui akhon chi raili vaukida sigui-gari kachungkha ngasamkazatkhon thai;
Athumwui akhamei chi seithat thai, kala akhaler kai kala mikumoli kachāng phangā rekharek khavai akhameili pangshap sangmi.
Athumwuitungli awunga akha lei, chi makatang leizingkhurwui kazingraona, awui ming Hebrew tuili Abaddon hoi, Greek tuili Apollyon (Kakhalatna “Sākakhaiya”) hoi.
Khare khonshāt kānhaira, yanglu, khani rāluifara.
Akhon china talla̱ singda khalei katharuka kazingrao chili hānga: “Kahaka Euphrates kongli narkahai kazingrao mati chili chihohaolu.”
Chieina kazingrao mati chili chihohaowa, athum hiya pung, zimiksho, kachāng kala zingkum chi tāzak eina mikumo saikorawui khum kathumwui khumkha chi shaothat ngasak khavai ngarān kahaibingna.
Kala sigui katong raimibing chiwui mishān chi thingnam thing shākhaninada ina shai.

Kala ili mahākhamili sigui chi hithada thei; katongbingwui thikkom chi meiwui kahung, sapphire thada kazing machu kala meiri thada yaingang machu thai; siguikuina kazingkha̱kui thai, kala athumwui khamor eina mei, meikhut, kala meiri shoka.
Kazātyur kathum kaja sigui khamor eina kashoka unshimui kathum, chiya; meiwon, meikhut kala meiri china miyur khum kathumwui khumkha chithithaowa.
Kaja Siguibingwui pangshap akhamor eina akhameili lei, akhamei phara̱ thada akui kālaga chi eina makei.
Kala mi shaokathat, khara̱kasang, khamathang-khamarang lah khaleekasa̱wui eina ningla mangateimana.
Chiwui thili pangshap khalei kazingrao akha kazingram eina katā ina thei. Muiya eina romma, akuili changjeengawuta; amai zimik thada horra kala aphei meiwui pakra̱ thai.
Apāngli lairik akhaluinao akha hārlaga singa. Awui yāphei shamadrutungli nai, wuiphei ngaleili nai.
Chiwui thili kazingkha̱ kakhangang thada panglāk eina vaowa; ana khavao eina kazing khangashum shini china matuishoka.
Kazing khangashumna hāngkhaleoda, ina kapikida sai. Kha kazingramwui eina akhon akha hithada hāngkharā ina shai, “Kazing khangashum shinina kahāng chi thumtithaisālu, makapikhuialu.”
okathuila, kazingla, shamadrula, kala chibingwui alungli khalei saikora kasaa kala mashimānda ringching kaje chiwui ming singda ina katheiya kazingrao china “Atam maleiluimana” da shākhi kasā thei.
Kha kashine kazingraona talla̱ kakhong eina, Varena awui raobing kala paokazatbingli chithei kahai athishurda awui ngathum kahai angarān chi ungshung ngasaka.
Chiwui thili ina kazingramwui eina kashākhon china ili hāngluishit kaji ina shai, “Shamadru eina ngaleitungli nganingda khalei kazingraowui pāngli hārkahai lairik chi akhuilu.”
Kazingrao chiwui pāng eina lairiknao chi khuilaga ina shaitāhaowa, kala ikhamorli khuira̱ thada shimshuna, kha shaikatā eina wuklungli khāshihaowa.
Chiwui thili ili hānga, “Ngalei kachungkhawui, miyur kachungkhawui, tuiyur kachungkhawui kala awunga kachungkhawui maramli Varewui pao nana marānmiphalungra.”
Kha khorumshimwui ayar yāngkhup chi matamkhuialu; chiya miyur khangateili mikahaina kala athumna kathara keinungtungli kachāng hangmatida khani naikazamra.
Ina iwui shākhi khanili bora ngavailaga zimiksho thingkha shākhani hangtharukthang marān ngasakra.”
Kachikathāna anili makaphā sākida khangarān saakha, khamorwui eina mei shokta yangkashibingli shimān ngasakra; kala anili makaphā saki kaje mi chili chithada sāthatra.

Ani hi kazing shungkham khavai pangshap lei, chieina anina khamarān atamli kazing maromara; kala tara̱ ashee onkhavai ura̱okwuitungli aniwui pangshap lei, okathuili kazātkashishi rāngasak khangangaili chihoshapa pangshapla lei.
Kala aniwui angun chi athumwui Proholi shaothat khavai apam, kahaka keinung chiwui chānreili haira. Khudam eina kaho keinung chili Sodom eina Egypt hoi.
Zimiksho kathum tangkhai thang, miyur, tuiyur kala jat kachiva̱na angun chi theilala machifa ngasakmara.
Okathui mibingna ani kathiwui vang mathānmareoda kala ringphāda otla ngalon ngarokra, kaja marān khani china okathuili kapambingli chotchāng ngasaksai.
Kha zimiksho kathum tangkhaiwui thili Varewui khaksui zangmida anina ngakarthuiuwa kala chi kathei mi kachiva̱ ngacheeyikhaowa.
Chiwui thili kazingramwui eina akhon panglāk eina khavao anina shai, “Hishong kālu”. Chieina ani muiyā tongda kazingram kakā chi yangkashibingna thei.

Pung chichangli neina̱ panglāk eina khanuka, kala keinung khum tharāwui khumkha shimānhaowa. Neina̱ kakhanuk chili mi thingshini thihaowa; kateibing china ngacheeshunhaida kazingramwui Vareli masot chikata.
Kakhane kakhanang thuihaira, yanglu, kakathuma kakhanang thākta rāluira.
Chiwui thili wungpamkhongli pamda khalei arar maga̱da mati china mai mashunzangda Vareli khorumda
hānga:
“Aruila, achāla chiching kaje sashap-pangshapa Proho Vare,
Ithumna nali ningshi, khikhalajila nana nawui kharei pangshap chi singda mungphokhaira!
kha nawui malungkhavāt rāhaira;
kathebingli bichar sākhavai,
narao paokazatbing, katharabingli,
namingli khangacheebing,
kharei kateoli sāman mikhavai kala
okathuili sākakhaibingli sākazamki kaji atam rāhaira.”
Chiwui thili matakhak kahai akha kazingramli shoka: sha̱nao akha zimik eina sāri sai, kachāngli pheinai sai, kala awui kuihonli sirā tharāda khani kāda leisai.
A nao vaisāda pharaukida nao ra̱khaung eina ringai.
Ana akhamei eina kazingwui sirā khum kathumwui khumkha okathuili khayittāhaowa. Nao pharātākhaleoda shaikhavai dragon china preiva̱wui mangāli nganinga.
Yur saikorali mari khāmshui singlaga mungki kaje mayarnao akha pharāhaowa. Kha nao chili Varewuili kala awui wungpamkhongli khuikāhaowa;
kala preiva̱ chi zimiksho thingkha shākhani hangtharukthang nganaomiki kaje Varena ngarānmi kahai lamhāngli yāmvāhaowa.
Kha dragon chili maikashi mihaoda a eina awui kazingraobing kazingramli pamkhavai athumwui pam maleithuwa.
Chieina phara̱ kasara, okathui katongali thānkhanguia, aming Satanla, Chipeela kaho dragon chi awui kazingraobingli ngasoda okathuili hortāhaowa.
Yaonao chigatkhami mangā eina, kala kathar tui athumna shākhi kasā chi eina ali yuihaira; kaja athumna manglā kachiho mashivāmana.

Chiwui vang eina mathānlu, O kazingram kala chili khaleibing! Kha okathui eina shamadru, kakhanang ngasāranu, kaja chipee china awui atam ungshungrāli kaji theida nathumwuili malungvātlak eina tāhaira.”
Okathuili hortā kahai chi theilaga dragon china naomayara pharākakhui preiva̱ chili suiphokuwa.
Kha lamhāngli kum kathum yongung-yongvā khavai khalāngwui angachāng kahakva̱ khani preiva̱ chili mi, chiya dragon china mangaphan khavaina.
Preiva̱ chili tara̱na kheithui khavai dragon china akhamor eina tara̱ kachungkha kapha̱vai.
Kha ngaleina ngachonmida dragonna kapha̱kashok tara̱ saikora chi ngaleikakaili zimsanghaowa.
Chi theilaga dragon china preiva̱ chili malungvātshunhaida, anaongarā kateibingli, kaja Varewui ningkhami khamayonabing chili rai sākhavai thuihaowa.
Kala dragon china shamarupheili anganinga.
Ina kathei sāyur chi kuirāng thai, phei singom thai, akhamor kazingkha̱ thai. Dragon china awui pangshap, awui wungpamkhong kala awui khamungsin sā chili mi.
Akui akhava thikapai khamā za̱kahai thai, kha khamāva raihairasai. Matakhakhaida okathui katongana sāyur chili shurzata.
Mibingna dragon chili khoruma, kaja ana awui pangshap chi sāyur chili mihaowa. Sāyur chilila khorumda hānga, “Sāyur hikathā khipā leikhala, ali ngararshapa khipā leikhala?”
Ana khamor makāda Vareli kachipat tui matui; awui ming kala kazingramli pamda khaleibingli mashāta.
Varewui mibingli rai ngararda yuikhavaila mayāmi, kala yur jat kala tuiyur kachiva̱wuitungli mungkhavai pangshapla mi.
Okathui masāranglakha shaothat kahaia Yaonaowui kharinga lairikli kapisang kahaibing chi maningla okathui katongana ali khorumra.
Tukhuiki kaje chili tukhuiphalungra. Raighai eina shātthatphalungki kaje chili mashoila raighai chieina shātthatphalungra. Hili ja̱mikatha kala ningkatonga Varewui mibingwui ot lei.
Chiwui thili ngalei eina kashok sāyur akha theilui; yao thada angachee khani kai, kha dragon thada matui.
Ana sāyur kharewui pangshap saikora chi shichina, kala okathuila chili khalei saikorala akuiwui khamā raikahai sāyur khare chili khorum khavai tandi sai.
Ana matakhak kahai ot kachungkha sai; mi saikorawui mangāli kazingramwui eina okathuili mei tāngasaka.
Ali sāyur khare chiwui mangāli matakkhak kahai ot sākhangasak chiwui mangā eina ana okathuili minamda, akui khamā za̱laga raikahaiya sāyur chiwui meoma̱ sākhui ngasaka.
Kala ana sā chiwui ama̱ chili khak suikhavai pangshap sangmida matui ngasaka kala ama̱ chili makhokharumbingli thingasaka.
Chili lāngda machutkhui khavai ana kateola, khareila, kachāmala, kashāngala, raola, shimva̱la yāpāngli maningakha khaveili machut sāsang khavai tandi sai.
Machut kaja sāyur chiwui aming maningakha sāyur chiwui amingwui mashing makakāpa chi ot khayorla mayorpai, khalola malopaimana.
Hi thangmeiwui tuina; theishingkakhui khalei mi china sā chiwui number chi ngachākkhuiranu, kaja hi mi akhawui mashingna, awui mashing hi shātharuk hangtharukta tharukna.
Kala kong kathui thada kala kazing khangashum thada kazingramwui eina akhon akha ina shai: Chiya tingleila kahuiwui akhonna.

Athum china wungpamkhong, kharinga sāyur mati kala arar maga̱da mati chiwui mangāli laadhar akha sai. Okathui katongawui eina ngatangkhui kahai athum thing shākha hangmatida mati maningla khangatei khipānakha laa chi matamkhuirarmana.
Mibing chiya sha̱naoli makhayonabing; kachingbingmānga kala Yaonaona khavāvāli ngasozatching kajebingna, Vare eina Yaonaowui vang athumli mikumowui matheikhare sāda ngatangkhui kahaina.
Athumwui maleli kakapik maleimana, khikhalajila athum chukkakhara̱ maleimana.
Chiwui thili kazingram alungthungli kazingrao akha yongkazat ina thei, ana katang makhavai paokhamathā khuiphungda okathuili khalei yur, jat kala tuiyur kachiva̱li hāshokazatna.
Ana panglāk eina vaoda hānga, “Vareli ngacheeda khorumlu; kaja ana mibingli bichar sākhavai atam rāhaira. Kazingla ngaleila tara̱ kala ura̱ kasaa chili khorumlu!”
Kakathuma kazingrao china khare khaniwui thi shurshokta hānga, “Sayur chili kala awui ama̱li khokharuma kala khaveili nilala, pāngli nilala awui machut khavai achuk kakāpā chi
Varewui malungkhavātwui drakhāra̱ mangra, khikha mamanātlakla malungkhavātwui tengkotli mangra. Athumli kathara kazingraobing eina Yaonao chiwui mangāli mei kala meiri eina rekharekra.
Athumli rekakharekwui meikhut mashimānda ngapuira; sāyur chili kala awui ama̱li khokharumbing kala awui mingwui achuk samkaphangbing ngashun ngayā ngasāmkakhui mavaimara.”
Varewui ningkhami khamayona kala Jishuli shitsangtit kaje katharabingna khāngshap khavai khangahotna.

Chili lāngda, kazingramwui eina akhon akhana kahāng ina shai; “Hi kapikhuilu, aja eina thuida Prohowui vang eina thikahaibing sokhami ngasāranu,” “Sokhami ngasākachangkhatranu, kaja athum kachotkachāngwui eina ngasāmkhuipaira; athumwui khamathā otsak chi athumli ngasozatta lei,” da Manglāna hānga.

Chiwui thili kazingrao khangatei akha khorumshim eina shoklaga muiyālungli kapampā chili panglāk eina hānga: “Nawui chāngkui singda hātkhuilu, kaja mā kahāt atam rāhaira, okathuiwui heithei minchaohaira,”
chieina muiyāli kapama china awui chāngkui okathuiwuitungli khayitta okathui hi hātkhuihaowa.
Chiwui thili kazingrao khangatei akha kazingramwui khorumshim eina shoka, ala chāngkui akha singa.

Khangatei akhala hanphutwui eina shoklui, ava meiwuitungli pangshap khalei kazingraona, kala kazana chāngkui kasingpa chili vaoda hānga, “Chāngkui khāngkāda okathui drakhā yāmguiwui eina amazānbing chi hātkhuilu, athei saikora minhaira!”
Chieina kazingrao china chāngkui singda okathuiwui drakhāthei saikora hātkhui, kala Varewui malungkhavātwui drakhāthei surkhavai chili horsanghaowa.
Surkhavai keinungwui ayarli naikazama, kala surkhavai chiwui eina ashee longkashok chi sigui nārenra̱ kāshunga kala mile shākhani longvai.
Mingshenwui shamadruli mei khamanāt katha akha thei. Sāyur kala awui ama̱, chili lāngda amingwui mashing chili khayuibing china Varena khami tingteilā singda shamadru chiwui ngalemli nganinga.
Athumna Varewui rao Moseswui laa, kala Yaonaowui laa sai:
“Hakhamahā, matakhak kahai nawui otsakna,
O Sāshap-pangshapa Proho!
Kaphā eina mashun nawui apongna,
O thotthotwui Awunga!
kala matekmatei ngasakrakhala, O Proho?
Khikhalajila namāngna katharana.
Yur saikorana rāda nali rākhorumra;
kaja nawui mashun bichar theiserhaira.”
Kala chiwui eina unshimui shini khuikaphunga kazingrao shini chi shoka. Athum kachon ngavai kala mathikli sināwui shānneira̱ neiya.
Chiwui thili sāyur matiwui ngachaili akhana kazingrao shini chili mashimānda makashimān kharinga Varewui malungkhavātwui sinā tengkot shini chi mi.
Kala Varewui tekhamatei kala pangshap china kathara shim chi meikhut thada puihaida, kazingrao shini china unshimui shini chi makhuishokranglakha eina tangda khipākha khorumshim chili mazangrarthuwa.
Kakathumana awui tengkot chi kong eina ura̱okli heisanga, kala tara̱ chi ashee ngasāthuiserhaowa.
Chiwui thili tara̱wui kazingraona kahāng shai, “Nawui bichar mashungrikhai, aruila kharelila na chiching.
Mibingna katharabing eina marānbingwui ashee heitai. Chieina ara athumli ashee mangkhavai nana mihaira. Athumna samphangkhangayi chi samkaphangna.”
Chiwui thili hanphutwui eina khavaokhon chi shai, “Sashap pangshapa Vare Proho! Nawui bichar mashungrikhai.”
Khamate kazingraona awui tengkot zimikli heirora; kala kasā china mili chuingasaka.
Athumli chiyākha kasāna ngator ngasaklala unshimui hiwuitungli pangshap khaleia Vareli khonshida ningla mangateingai, khayāla mashingaithuwa.
kha kakazā kachot chiwui vang Vareli khonshi, athumna sākahai chiwui vang ning mangateingaimana.
Chiwui thili dragonwui khamor eina, sāyur chiwui khamor eina, minama marānwui khamor eina, makathar manglā khaifa thada kathum kashok thei.
Manglābing chi chipeena, athumna matakhak kahai ot sāshapa. Khamunga Proho Varewui kahaka zimiksholi rai sāki kajiwui vang okathuiwui awungabingli hokhui khavai athumna yongshang yongtai.
Chithākhaleoda rikhān phikphik phākphāk ngasheida, kazing ngashuma, kala neina̱ panglāk eina khanuka. Okathuili mi okthuikaphok eina thuida aja rāshungda chikathā mashoklakranga.
Kahaka keinung chi kaikathum sāhaowa; miyurbingwui keinungbing kongluihaowa kala Varena kahaka Babylonli mamalailakmana, chieina awui khangachee-khangacha athut kakhuina pemkahai tengkot chi mimanga.
Yikuiram saikora shimānserhaowa; phungreila akhanida matheithuwa.
Theih sorkhangasai, pound shākhashikha kharitana miwuitungli tākrora; theih katā marnāhaida mibingna Vareli khonshi.
Okathui awungabingna ali ngashāma, kala okathuiwui mibingna awui shāmsak zam eina maripa.”

Manglā eina ana ili lamhāng akhali thānvai, kala chili sha̱nao akha hungping kahai sāyur akha tongda thei; sāyur chiwuitungli zeikakharui ming tarākha kapihai. Sāyur chi akui shini angachee tharā kai.

Sha̱naopava̱ chiya hungrisi eina hungping kahai sāri ngavai, sinā, khayingmukta kala amankasaka ngalung eina thāngpeohai. Apāngli shamkasāwui kala ningkakachaina pemting kahai sinā tengkot akha singa,
akhaveili ngathum kahai kakhalat khalei aming hithada kapihai: “Khareia Babylon, pha̱khayorva̱̱bing kala okathuiwui ningkakachaiwui ava̱va̱”,
sha̱naopava̱ chi kathara mibingwui ashee kala Jishuwui vang khamashung khangarong eina thimi kahaibingwui ashee mangda mariprei eina khalei ina thei.
Ina ali kathei tharan I matakhakhaowa.
Kha kazingrao china hānga, “Khisāda matakhakhaikhala? Sha̱nao kala ali phungkazata akui shini, angachee thara kakā sāyur chiwui ngathum kahai pongli ina hāngmira.

Nana kathei sāyur chi rida ringsai, kha ara maringluimana, ana katang makhalei leizingkhurwui eina shokra kala kashimānli azangra. Okathui haokaphok eina thuilaga kharingawui lairikli aming makapi kahaibingna sāyur chili theilaga matakhakhaira, kaja akhashida ringlaga, maringlui, laga rāchitheiluishitki kajiwui vangna.
“Hi thangkhamei kala theishingkakhui khaleiwui tuina. Akui shini chi sha̱naopāva̱na pamkhavai kaphung shini china,
athum chi wungnao shinina, phangāva kongluihaira, akhana mungda lei, akhava marārangli, kha ana rālala kasha̱khawui vang māngmara.
Rida ringkasā, ara maleilui kaje chi kachishatana, kha shiniwui ngachaili akhana, kala ana kashimānli azangra.
Athumwui ningrin ngaraichāhaoda athumwui pangshap sāyur chili mi.

Athumna Yaonaoli rai ngararra, kha Yaonao china ana hokhui kahaibing kapangkakhuibing kala ningtongda kashurabingli ngasoda athumli maikashi mira, khikhalajila a prohobingwui Proho, awungabingwui Awungana.”
Kazingraona ili hānga “Pha̱khayorva̱̱na kapama tara̱ nana kathei chi mibing, yarui, miyur kala tuiyurbingna.
Kala nana kathei angachee tharā kala sāyur china khayorva̱̱ chili ningkachaira; kala ali horhailaga awui kashankachon raimihaida khamahong eina haira, awui asāla shaira kala mei eina riktāra

Khikhalajila Varena awui sāki kaji ot wungshung khavai athumwui ningli sangmihaira, kaja Varena hāngtā kahai maungshungranglakha eina tangda, athum khokkha sāda sāyur chiwuitungli pangshap horsangmira.
“Nana kathei sha̱nao chiya okathui awungabingwuitungli khamunga reikhamatai keinung china.”
Chiwui thili ina kazingrao khangatei akha kazingram eina katā thei; pangshap leilak kahai akhana, awui kahān china okathui horchamrihaowa.
Kala mashonsei eina ana vaotai.
“Kongluihaira, khareia Babylon kongluihaira! Kameobingwui pamkhavai makathar manglā ngapha̱ khavai; makathar ningkakachai vānaopam sāthuihaira,
kaja yur saikorana awui makathar khamathangwui zamshei manghaira, okathuiwui awungabing ali ngashāmserhaira kala okathuiwui leihkhalonbing awui saphāphā kaji lan eina shāngkhuiserhaira,”
“Iwui mibing! awui eina yāmulu.
Awui morei kasāli zangpaishina,
awui ka̱lāshatli zangpaishina!
Varena awui khayonkhalāng phaningunghaira.
ana sākahai chili khumkha mataida runkālu,
ana khamanāta tengkotli khumkha mataida chipemmilu.
rekakharek chapkhangachā alila tāzakta milu.
Awui ningli, ‘Ina awungva̱ sāda pama,
rameiva̱ maningmana,
chapkhangachā matheilakmara’, da phaninga.
Awui kasaka tandi thangkhawui alungli rāra;
sākazāt chapkhangchā kala zāt kasak rāra,
ali meina chuithathaora;
kaja ali bichar kasaa Proho Varivara chi Pangshap sāshapana”.
Ali rekakharek chi theilaga ngacheenahaida khalāda nganingda hāngra,
“Iyavo, iyavo, khareia keinung! Sāshapva̱ keinung, Babylon! Pung akhawui alungli nawui bichar rāshunghaira.”
hirā, mukta, kachon kahunga, hungrisi, silk, khameng kachon, nganamkaphā thingyur, mafahā, amankasak thingyur, pithrai, mari, marble, sākom, maroimarāng,
nganamkaphā thao myrrh, frankincense, zam, thao, mathir, kehu, yao, sei, sigui, siguigari kala raonao kaja miwui manglā eina tangda khipānakha maloluithuwa.
“Naningna kakahao athei nawui eina thuihaira, nawui lan kala kasaka ot shimānserhaira, masamphangluimara”
Otbing hi leih sāda awui eina samkaphang leihkhalonbing china rekakharek chi theida khalāda nganingra, kala malung ringda chapngachāda hāngra,
“Iyavo! iyavo, khareia keinung! Hungrisi, hungping kahai khangavaiva̱, sinā kala hirā muktā thāngpeo kahaiva̱!
Pung akhawui alungli lan hupta shimānhaowa.”
Chiwui thili marikhong akhavābing, chili katongbing, marikhong kahuibing, kala shamadruli zatta leihkhalonbing china khalāda nganingda
ali chuikatāwui meikhut chi theilaga hānga, “Khareia keinung hikathā kali leiluirakhala!”
Athumna kuili hotlā parrorda chapsasui hānga, “Iyavo, iyavo, khareia keinung! Shamadruli jahas leida leihkhalonbingna shāngkhui khavaipam! Pung akhawui alungli shimānngalānghaira.”
nawuili tingteilā kahuikhon, mazuikhon, sipa̱khon, talla̱khon mashāluimara; pāngthem ot akhala maleiluimara; mā kharungkhon mashāluimara!
Thaohmei akhala mahorluimara, mākkhām kahaia kala mākkhām kahaiva̱wui akhon mashāluimara; kaja nawuili leihkhalonbing okathuiwui khangam-khareimānga, kala yur saikorali nawui meowor eina minama!”
Chiwui thili kazingramwui eina mi kachungkhawui akhon thada ina shai; kala vaowa; “Hallelujah! Huikhami, tekhamatei pangshap Varewuina,
awui bichar mashungrik kahaina; shāmsāda okathui makhao khangasaka khayora akhavaiva̱li Varena bichar sāhaira. Varewui raobingwui ashee tākahai chiwui vang ali athut khuimihaira.”
Akha shida vaolui, “Hallelujah! sha̱naowui eina meikhut katang mavaila kāda lei.”
Kala arar maga̱da mati kala kharinga sāyur mati china ngakhumshamhaida wungpamkhongli kapama Vareli khorumda hānga, “Amen. Hallelujah!”
Chiwui thili mi kachungkhawui akhon-akhak thada, kongkathui thada kala kazing khangashum thada hithada shāluishita, “Hallelujah, khikhalajila ithumwui Proho Vare Sāshapa china munghaira:
Ithum mathānda ringphāsa kala aming tekmatei ngasaksa, khikhalajila Yaonaowui shakzāt atam rāhaira, awui Mākkhām kahaiva̱ ngarānpinghaira;
khamenga, kahora, kathara kachon ngavai khavai mayāmihaira, kaja khamenga sāri kachon hi katharabingwui khamashung khangarong otsakna.”
Kala kazingraona ili hānga, “Hi kapikhuilu: Yaonaowui shakazā zātkhānli kahobing chi sokhami ngasāranu” kala ana ili hānga, “Hi Varewui tuilaka.”
Chieina ina ali khorum khavai ngakhumzanga kha ana ili hānga, “Chi mathāpaimara! ila na thada kala Jishuwui vang shākhi kasā nachinā ngarā thada otram ngatha̱kharuma akhana. Varivarali khorumlu.”
Khikhalajila Jishuwui shākhi chi phongkhamiwui manglāna ngashitkhami chilaka.
Awui mik meiwon thai kala kuihon kachungkha ngahona. Awuili kapisang kahai aming chi a maningla khipākha matheimana.
Ana asheeli rurkahai kachon ngavai, awui aming Varewui Tui hoi,
Kazingramwui raimibingna kachara sigui tongda tāngpat hānshi kahai khamenga sāri shaksāda awui thi shurzata.
Miyurbingli maikashi mikhavai akhamorwui eina kazana raighai shoka. Ana mari-khāmshui eina mungra, kala khamunga Varivarawui malungkhavāt surkhui khavai chili ana naikazamra.
Awui kachonli kala akhaishāngli “Awungabingwui Awunga kala prohobingwui Proho” da aming kapisanghai.
Awungabingwui, raimibingwui, pangshap khaleibingwui, sigui kala katongbingwui, mi saikora kaja rao kala shimva̱ kala kharei kateo huptawui asā rāshaiserlu!”
Chiwui thili sā eina awungabing china raimi thānphungda sigui katonga eina awui raimibingli ngarar khavai kharā ina thei.

Sāyur chili kala ali ngasoda minama marān, awui mangāli matakhak kahai ot sāda sāyur chiwui mahor namkahai kala awui ama̱li khokharumbingli minamkakhuiya chili tuknarhaowa. Ani khanili meiri eina chuida khalei meiwui ngayili kharing eina horsanghaowa.
Kateibingli sigui katongawui khamor eina kashoka raighai eina sāthatserhaowa; kala vānaobingna athumwui asā eina thokhui.
Chiwui thili kazingramwui eina kazingrao akha katā ina thei; ana makatang leizingkhurwui sho kala kharita mari-khara̱ akha apāngli singa.
Ana dragon, kasara phara̱, Chipeela, Satanla kaho chili tukhuida mari-khara̱ eina khalapa, kala kum thingkhawui vang narhai;
leizingkhurli horsanghaida shungnamhailaga mahor namshānhaowa, kaja kum thingkha makāshungranglakha eina tangda ana mili maminamlui khavaina. Chiwui thili hunkhawui vang chiholuinaora.
khangatei kathebing chi zingkum thingkha makāshungranglakha maringungmana. Hi ringkhalui khare china.

Ringkhalui khareli kazang athum sokhami kala kathara ngasāranu! Chikathāwuitungli kakhane kathi china khipangshapkha maleimana kha athum Vare eina Khristawui pāngmon sāda athumna ali ngasoda zingkum thingkha mungrumra.
Zingkum thingkha kāshung kahai eina Satanli zurshimwui eina chihora;
ana okathui achikun mati kaja Gog eina Magogli khalei hupvali minamda rai sākhavai kazipkhui khavai shokra, athumwui raimi yireiwui situi ngayāra.
Chithada athumna khamashā okathuili zatta katharabing kala Varewui leikashe keinungli kuinamra. Kha kazingwui eina mei tāda athumli mutngasaka; kala
athumli mikhanama chipee chili rida sāyur eina minama marānli horsang kahai meiri eina kachuia meiwui ngayili horsanghaowa kala athumli chili ngashun ngayā katang mavaila rekharekra.

Kathebing khareila kateola wungpamkong mangāli khanganing kala lairikbing harkahai chi ina thei. Khangatei lairik akhala harluihaowa, chiya kharingawui lairikna. Lairik hili kapi kahai tākam eina kathebingli athum kachichāna sākahai athishurda bichar sai.
Shamadruna kathebingli chishota, Kathe eina Kazeiramnala kathi chi mathumrarmada chishota; kala saikorali kachichāna sākahai athishurda bichar sāsera.
Chiwui thili Kathe eina Kazeiramli meiwui ngayili horsanghaowa. Meiwui ngayi hi thikakhanena;
kala kachikathāwui aming kharingawui lairikli mazangthura̱-akha chikathā mili meiwui ngayi hili horsanghaowa.
kala mākhām kahaiva̱na gaharali samphang khavai shaksākazak kahai thada kathara keinung, kadhara Jerusalem chi kazingramwui Varivarawui eina katā chi ina thei,
kala wungpamkhongwui eina panglāk eina khavaokhon akha ina shai; “Yanglu, Varena mili okthuirumkachangda lei! Ana athumli ringrumra kala athum awui mi sāra, Varivara A khalattana athumli ngasopamra.
Ana athumwui chara̱ mitmira; kathi, malung kharing, kachot, chapkhangachāla maleiluimara, kaja kachama chi shimānhaira!”
kala ili hānga, “Kuphaira! I Alpha eina Omegana kaja haokaphok eina katangana, ra̱kachanga chili kharinga uraokwui eina ina khalem eina mimangra.
Khayuia china shimluikat kāra kala I awui Vare sāra, a inaomayara sāra.

Kha malungmakazanga, mashitkasanga, khamakhaoa, mi shaokathata, ngalā khangashāma, meoworkathema, meoma̱li khokharuma, kala kapikkazarra, athumwui apam chiya meiri eina chuida khalei meiwui ngayi china, chi thikakhane china.”
Chiwui thili kazingrao shiniwui ngachaili naomeikap kaje unshimui shini pemting eina kasinga kazingrao akhana ili rāhānga, “Ralu, mākhām kahaiva̱, Yaonao chiwui preiva̱ chi ina chitheira.”
Laga phungrei kahak kajuiva akhali Manglā eina ili thānkai, kala Varewui kazingramwui eina kathara keinung Jerusalem katā chi chithei.
Varewui tekhamatei chi aman kasaka hirāmukta kala jasperwui kahān thada mathingrikhai.
Chiwui phākho haklaka kala juishuna, kala ngavei tharāda khanili kazingrao tharāda khani lei, chili Israel shang tharāda khaniwui aming kapisanghai
Zingshoshong ngavei kathum, atungshong kathum, azingshong kathum, zingtunshong kathum lei.
Keinung chiwui phākho shunkhui khavai ngalungphei tharāda khani lei, kala chili Yaonaowui paokazata tharāda khaniwui aming kapihai.
Ili khangazeka kazingrao china keinung kala chiwui ngavei eina phākhowui asān-aret nāp tamkhui khavai sinā khāmshui akha singa.
Keinung chi chithek mati sai, asān eina aret ngaraichai, awui tamkhavai thing chi eina onlaga kilometer thingkhani shāmati sānga; asānla aretla kajuila ngaraichāsera.
Kazingrao china phākho chi tamlaga khuining shākha hangmatida mati juiya, kaja ana miwui pānglam eina tamkhui.
Phākho chi jasper eina sai, kha keinung chiya sināmāng eina sai, kala mingshenwui kahān thai.
Keinung chiwui phākho shimphung chi hirā ayur peida sanga, khare chi jasperna, kakhanena sapphire, kakathumana agate, khamatena emerald,
kaphangāna onyx, katharukana cornelian, kashinena chrysolite, kachishatana beryli, kachikona topaz, katharana chrysoprase, tharāda kharena jacinth, kala tharāda kakhanena amethystna.
Ngavei tharāda khani chiya khaying mānga, khayingwui khamtong ava̱va̱sera. Keinung chiwui shongfa sināmāng eina sai, ka̱lāra̱ngayot thada mathingrikhai.
Kala keinung chili hormi khavai zimikla kachāngla khikha masāvaimana; kaja Varewui tekhamateina chiwui kahorna, kala Yaonaona chiwui thaomeina.
Kahor chieina yur saikorana yaothuira, kala okathuiwui awungabingna athumwui lan khuirāsera.
Keinung chiwui ngavei shungkahai mavaimara, khangayāla mavaimara,
yur saikorawui tekhamatei kala khayākakā hili khuirāsera
Kha khamakhao ot akhala hili mazangpaimara, sākakhamāng kala khayon-khamāng ot kasābing mazangpaimara; kha Yaonaowui kharinga lairikli aming kapikahaibingmāng zangra.
Chiwui thili kharingwui tara̱ khalonga kong akha ili chithei, mathingrikhai, Varewui wungpamkhong kala Yaonaowui eina longshoka,
konungwui chānrei alungthungli longa; kongphei lākharipta atheiyur tharāda khani khamathei kharingwui thingrong phora, kala kachāng kachida mathei. Chiwui thingnah miyurbingwui kazāt raikhavaina.
Chili Varena khonshi kahai kaho akhala maleiluimara.
Kha chili Varewui eina Yaonaowui wungpamkhong haida, awui raobingna ali khorumra;
athumna awui mai theira kala athumwui khaveili awui aming kapisangsera.
Khangayā mavailuimara, thaomeiwui kala zimikwui kahor masāvailuimara kaja Proho Varena athumwui kahor sāra; kala athumna mashimānda mungra.

Chiwui thili kazingrao china ili hānga, “Tuibing hi shitsangpaiphalung kaje khamashung tuina. Marānbingwui Manglāwui Vare Proho china thākta shokki kaji awui raobingli chithei khavai kazingraoli chihohaira.”
“Yanglu, I thākta rāra. Phongkhami lairik hiwui tui khamayonabing sokhami ngasāranu,”
Saikora hi kashā kala katheia chi John ina. Hibing hi ina kashā kala kathei eina ili chitheikhame kazingrao chili khorum khavai ina ngakhumzanga.
Kha ana hānga, “Chi mathāpaimana! Iya nali, nachinā ngarā marānbingli, kala lairik hiwui tui khamayonbingli ngasoda otram ngatha̱kharum akhana. Vareli khorumlu.”
Kala ana hānga, “Lairik hiwui phongkhami tuibing hi mahor manamshānhaialu, khikhalajila atam chi nganaihaira.
Makaphā kasaa china makaphā sāsāranu, khamakhaoa china awui khamakhaoa chili ngaphumsāranu, khangaronga china mashun chi sāsāranu, kala kathara china tharda leisāranu”
I Alpha eina Omegana, khare eina khanaoana, haokaphok eina katangana.”
Ayarle, fa, meoworkashon mi, shāmkasā, mi shaokathat, kameoli kapha̱ kala mikhanamli akachang kasābingmānga.
Nganāda khalei mi kachiva̱nala “Rālu” da hāngranu.
Ra̱kachanga mi china rāranu, ningkachānga a china kharingwui tara̱ chi aman mamila rāmangkhuiranu.
Lairik hiwui phongkhami tui kashā mi kachiva̱li ningngashar khavai ina hāngkhamathinna; kachikathāna hili mataisangakha lairik hili hāngkahai unshimuibing chi Varena awuitungli mataisangmira;
kala kachikathāna phongkhami lairik hiwui tui khuishokhaiakha lairik hili hāngkahai kharingwui thingrong kala kathara keinung chiwui eina awui sharuk khuishokhaora.
Saikora hili shākhi khame china hānga: “Kachangkhat I thākta rāra!”
Amen, rāmilu, Proho Jishu!
